1:1 Va gur ortvaavat Tbq perngrq gur urnira naq gur rnegu.

1:2 Naq gur rnegu jnf jvgubhg sbez, naq ibvq; naq qnexarff jnf hcba
gur snpr bs gur qrrc. Naq gur Fcvevg bs Tbq zbirq hcba gur snpr bs gur
jngref.

1:3 Naq Tbq fnvq, Yrg gurer or yvtug: naq gurer jnf yvtug.

1:4 Naq Tbq fnj gur yvtug, gung vg jnf tbbq: naq Tbq qvivqrq gur yvtug
sebz gur qnexarff.

1:5 Naq Tbq pnyyrq gur yvtug Qnl, naq gur qnexarff ur pnyyrq Avtug.
Naq gur riravat naq gur zbeavat jrer gur svefg qnl.

1:6 Naq Tbq fnvq, Yrg gurer or n sveznzrag va gur zvqfg bs gur jngref,
naq yrg vg qvivqr gur jngref sebz gur jngref.

1:7 Naq Tbq znqr gur sveznzrag, naq qvivqrq gur jngref juvpu jrer
haqre gur sveznzrag sebz gur jngref juvpu jrer nobir gur sveznzrag:
naq vg jnf fb.

1:8 Naq Tbq pnyyrq gur sveznzrag Urnira. Naq gur riravat naq gur
zbeavat jrer gur frpbaq qnl.

1:9 Naq Tbq fnvq, Yrg gur jngref haqre gur urnira or tngurerq gbtrgure
hagb bar cynpr, naq yrg gur qel ynaq nccrne: naq vg jnf fb.

1:10 Naq Tbq pnyyrq gur qel ynaq Rnegu; naq gur tngurevat gbtrgure bs
gur jngref pnyyrq ur Frnf: naq Tbq fnj gung vg jnf tbbq.

1:11 Naq Tbq fnvq, Yrg gur rnegu oevat sbegu tenff, gur ureo lvryqvat
frrq, naq gur sehvg gerr lvryqvat sehvg nsgre uvf xvaq, jubfr frrq vf
va vgfrys, hcba gur rnegu: naq vg jnf fb.

1:12 Naq gur rnegu oebhtug sbegu tenff, naq ureo lvryqvat frrq nsgre
uvf xvaq, naq gur gerr lvryqvat sehvg, jubfr frrq jnf va vgfrys, nsgre
uvf xvaq: naq Tbq fnj gung vg jnf tbbq.

1:13 Naq gur riravat naq gur zbeavat jrer gur guveq qnl.

1:14 Naq Tbq fnvq, Yrg gurer or yvtugf va gur sveznzrag bs gur urnira
gb qvivqr gur qnl sebz gur avtug; naq yrg gurz or sbe fvtaf, naq sbe
frnfbaf, naq sbe qnlf, naq lrnef: 1:15 Naq yrg gurz or sbe yvtugf va
gur sveznzrag bs gur urnira gb tvir yvtug hcba gur rnegu: naq vg jnf
fb.

1:16 Naq Tbq znqr gjb terng yvtugf; gur terngre yvtug gb ehyr gur qnl,
naq gur yrffre yvtug gb ehyr gur avtug: ur znqr gur fgnef nyfb.

1:17 Naq Tbq frg gurz va gur sveznzrag bs gur urnira gb tvir yvtug
hcba gur rnegu, 1:18 Naq gb ehyr bire gur qnl naq bire gur avtug, naq
gb qvivqr gur yvtug sebz gur qnexarff: naq Tbq fnj gung vg jnf tbbq.

1:19 Naq gur riravat naq gur zbeavat jrer gur sbhegu qnl.

1:20 Naq Tbq fnvq, Yrg gur jngref oevat sbegu nohaqnagyl gur zbivat
perngher gung ungu yvsr, naq sbjy gung znl syl nobir gur rnegu va gur
bcra sveznzrag bs urnira.

1:21 Naq Tbq perngrq terng junyrf, naq rirel yvivat perngher gung
zbirgu, juvpu gur jngref oebhtug sbegu nohaqnagyl, nsgre gurve xvaq,
naq rirel jvatrq sbjy nsgre uvf xvaq: naq Tbq fnj gung vg jnf tbbq.

1:22 Naq Tbq oyrffrq gurz, fnlvat, Or sehvgshy, naq zhygvcyl, naq svyy
gur jngref va gur frnf, naq yrg sbjy zhygvcyl va gur rnegu.

1:23 Naq gur riravat naq gur zbeavat jrer gur svsgu qnl.

1:24 Naq Tbq fnvq, Yrg gur rnegu oevat sbegu gur yvivat perngher nsgre
uvf xvaq, pnggyr, naq perrcvat guvat, naq ornfg bs gur rnegu nsgre uvf
xvaq: naq vg jnf fb.

1:25 Naq Tbq znqr gur ornfg bs gur rnegu nsgre uvf xvaq, naq pnggyr
nsgre gurve xvaq, naq rirel guvat gung perrcrgu hcba gur rnegu nsgre
uvf xvaq: naq Tbq fnj gung vg jnf tbbq.

1:26 Naq Tbq fnvq, Yrg hf znxr zna va bhe vzntr, nsgre bhe yvxrarff:
naq yrg gurz unir qbzvavba bire gur svfu bs gur frn, naq bire gur sbjy
bs gur nve, naq bire gur pnggyr, naq bire nyy gur rnegu, naq bire
rirel perrcvat guvat gung perrcrgu hcba gur rnegu.

1:27 Fb Tbq perngrq zna va uvf bja vzntr, va gur vzntr bs Tbq perngrq
ur uvz; znyr naq srznyr perngrq ur gurz.

1:28 Naq Tbq oyrffrq gurz, naq Tbq fnvq hagb gurz, Or sehvgshy, naq
zhygvcyl, naq ercyravfu gur rnegu, naq fhoqhr vg: naq unir qbzvavba
bire gur svfu bs gur frn, naq bire gur sbjy bs gur nve, naq bire rirel
yvivat guvat gung zbirgu hcba gur rnegu.

1:29 Naq Tbq fnvq, Orubyq, V unir tvira lbh rirel ureo ornevat frrq,
juvpu vf hcba gur snpr bs nyy gur rnegu, naq rirel gerr, va gur juvpu
vf gur sehvg bs n gerr lvryqvat frrq; gb lbh vg funyy or sbe zrng.

1:30 Naq gb rirel ornfg bs gur rnegu, naq gb rirel sbjy bs gur nve,
naq gb rirel guvat gung perrcrgu hcba gur rnegu, jurerva gurer vf
yvsr, V unir tvira rirel terra ureo sbe zrng: naq vg jnf fb.

1:31 Naq Tbq fnj rirel guvat gung ur unq znqr, naq, orubyq, vg jnf
irel tbbq. Naq gur riravat naq gur zbeavat jrer gur fvkgu qnl.

2:1 Guhf gur urniraf naq gur rnegu jrer svavfurq, naq nyy gur ubfg bs
gurz.

2:2 Naq ba gur friragu qnl Tbq raqrq uvf jbex juvpu ur unq znqr; naq
ur erfgrq ba gur friragu qnl sebz nyy uvf jbex juvpu ur unq znqr.

2:3 Naq Tbq oyrffrq gur friragu qnl, naq fnapgvsvrq vg: orpnhfr gung
va vg ur unq erfgrq sebz nyy uvf jbex juvpu Tbq perngrq naq znqr.

2:4 Gurfr ner gur trarengvbaf bs gur urniraf naq bs gur rnegu jura
gurl jrer perngrq, va gur qnl gung gur YBEQ Tbq znqr gur rnegu naq gur
urniraf, 2:5 Naq rirel cynag bs gur svryq orsber vg jnf va gur rnegu,
naq rirel ureo bs gur svryq orsber vg terj: sbe gur YBEQ Tbq unq abg
pnhfrq vg gb enva hcba gur rnegu, naq gurer jnf abg n zna gb gvyy gur
tebhaq.

2:6 Ohg gurer jrag hc n zvfg sebz gur rnegu, naq jngrerq gur jubyr
snpr bs gur tebhaq.

2:7 Naq gur YBEQ Tbq sbezrq zna bs gur qhfg bs gur tebhaq, naq
oerngurq vagb uvf abfgevyf gur oerngu bs yvsr; naq zna orpnzr n yvivat
fbhy.

2:8 Naq gur YBEQ Tbq cynagrq n tneqra rnfgjneq va Rqra; naq gurer ur
chg gur zna jubz ur unq sbezrq.

2:9 Naq bhg bs gur tebhaq znqr gur YBEQ Tbq gb tebj rirel gerr gung vf
cyrnfnag gb gur fvtug, naq tbbq sbe sbbq; gur gerr bs yvsr nyfb va gur
zvqfg bs gur tneqra, naq gur gerr bs xabjyrqtr bs tbbq naq rivy.

2:10 Naq n evire jrag bhg bs Rqra gb jngre gur tneqra; naq sebz gurapr
vg jnf cnegrq, naq orpnzr vagb sbhe urnqf.

2:11 Gur anzr bs gur svefg vf Cvfba: gung vf vg juvpu pbzcnffrgu gur
jubyr ynaq bs Univynu, jurer gurer vf tbyq; 2:12 Naq gur tbyq bs gung
ynaq vf tbbq: gurer vf oqryyvhz naq gur balk fgbar.

2:13 Naq gur anzr bs gur frpbaq evire vf Tvuba: gur fnzr vf vg gung
pbzcnffrgu gur jubyr ynaq bs Rguvbcvn.

2:14 Naq gur anzr bs gur guveq evire vf Uvqqrxry: gung vf vg juvpu
tbrgu gbjneq gur rnfg bs Nfflevn. Naq gur sbhegu evire vf Rhcuengrf.

2:15 Naq gur YBEQ Tbq gbbx gur zna, naq chg uvz vagb gur tneqra bs
Rqra gb qerff vg naq gb xrrc vg.

2:16 Naq gur YBEQ Tbq pbzznaqrq gur zna, fnlvat, Bs rirel gerr bs gur
tneqra gubh znlrfg serryl rng: 2:17 Ohg bs gur gerr bs gur xabjyrqtr
bs tbbq naq rivy, gubh funyg abg rng bs vg: sbe va gur qnl gung gubh
rngrfg gurerbs gubh funyg fheryl qvr.

2:18 Naq gur YBEQ Tbq fnvq, Vg vf abg tbbq gung gur zna fubhyq or
nybar; V jvyy znxr uvz na uryc zrrg sbe uvz.

2:19 Naq bhg bs gur tebhaq gur YBEQ Tbq sbezrq rirel ornfg bs gur
svryq, naq rirel sbjy bs gur nve; naq oebhtug gurz hagb Nqnz gb frr
jung ur jbhyq pnyy gurz: naq jungfbrire Nqnz pnyyrq rirel yvivat
perngher, gung jnf gur anzr gurerbs.

2:20 Naq Nqnz tnir anzrf gb nyy pnggyr, naq gb gur sbjy bs gur nve,
naq gb rirel ornfg bs gur svryq; ohg sbe Nqnz gurer jnf abg sbhaq na
uryc zrrg sbe uvz.

2:21 Naq gur YBEQ Tbq pnhfrq n qrrc fyrrc gb snyy hcba Nqnz, naq ur
fyrcg: naq ur gbbx bar bs uvf evof, naq pybfrq hc gur syrfu vafgrnq
gurerbs; 2:22 Naq gur evo, juvpu gur YBEQ Tbq unq gnxra sebz zna, znqr
ur n jbzna, naq oebhtug ure hagb gur zna.

2:23 Naq Nqnz fnvq, Guvf vf abj obar bs zl obarf, naq syrfu bs zl
syrfu: fur funyy or pnyyrq Jbzna, orpnhfr fur jnf gnxra bhg bs Zna.

2:24 Gurersber funyy n zna yrnir uvf sngure naq uvf zbgure, naq funyy
pyrnir hagb uvf jvsr: naq gurl funyy or bar syrfu.

2:25 Naq gurl jrer obgu anxrq, gur zna naq uvf jvsr, naq jrer abg
nfunzrq.

3:1 Abj gur frecrag jnf zber fhogvy guna nal ornfg bs gur svryq juvpu
gur YBEQ Tbq unq znqr. Naq ur fnvq hagb gur jbzna, Lrn, ungu Tbq fnvq,
Lr funyy abg rng bs rirel gerr bs gur tneqra?  3:2 Naq gur jbzna fnvq
hagb gur frecrag, Jr znl rng bs gur sehvg bs gur gerrf bs gur tneqra:
3:3 Ohg bs gur sehvg bs gur gerr juvpu vf va gur zvqfg bs gur tneqra,
Tbq ungu fnvq, Lr funyy abg rng bs vg, arvgure funyy lr gbhpu vg, yrfg
lr qvr.

3:4 Naq gur frecrag fnvq hagb gur jbzna, Lr funyy abg fheryl qvr: 3:5
Sbe Tbq qbgu xabj gung va gur qnl lr rng gurerbs, gura lbhe rlrf funyy
or bcrarq, naq lr funyy or nf tbqf, xabjvat tbbq naq rivy.

3:6 Naq jura gur jbzna fnj gung gur gerr jnf tbbq sbe sbbq, naq gung
vg jnf cyrnfnag gb gur rlrf, naq n gerr gb or qrfverq gb znxr bar
jvfr, fur gbbx bs gur sehvg gurerbs, naq qvq rng, naq tnir nyfb hagb
ure uhfonaq jvgu ure; naq ur qvq rng.

3:7 Naq gur rlrf bs gurz obgu jrer bcrarq, naq gurl xarj gung gurl
jrer anxrq; naq gurl frjrq svt yrnirf gbtrgure, naq znqr gurzfryirf
ncebaf.

3:8 Naq gurl urneq gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ Tbq jnyxvat va gur tneqra va
gur pbby bs gur qnl: naq Nqnz naq uvf jvsr uvq gurzfryirf sebz gur
cerfrapr bs gur YBEQ Tbq nzbatfg gur gerrf bs gur tneqra.

3:9 Naq gur YBEQ Tbq pnyyrq hagb Nqnz, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Jurer neg
gubh?  3:10 Naq ur fnvq, V urneq gul ibvpr va gur tneqra, naq V jnf
nsenvq, orpnhfr V jnf anxrq; naq V uvq zlfrys.

3:11 Naq ur fnvq, Jub gbyq gurr gung gubh jnfg anxrq? Unfg gubh rngra
bs gur gerr, jurerbs V pbzznaqrq gurr gung gubh fubhyqrfg abg rng?
3:12 Naq gur zna fnvq, Gur jbzna jubz gubh tnirfg gb or jvgu zr, fur
tnir zr bs gur gerr, naq V qvq rng.

3:13 Naq gur YBEQ Tbq fnvq hagb gur jbzna, Jung vf guvf gung gubh unfg
qbar? Naq gur jbzna fnvq, Gur frecrag orthvyrq zr, naq V qvq rng.

3:14 Naq gur YBEQ Tbq fnvq hagb gur frecrag, Orpnhfr gubh unfg qbar
guvf, gubh neg phefrq nobir nyy pnggyr, naq nobir rirel ornfg bs gur
svryq; hcba gul oryyl funyg gubh tb, naq qhfg funyg gubh rng nyy gur
qnlf bs gul yvsr: 3:15 Naq V jvyy chg razvgl orgjrra gurr naq gur
jbzna, naq orgjrra gul frrq naq ure frrq; vg funyy oehvfr gul urnq,
naq gubh funyg oehvfr uvf urry.

3:16 Hagb gur jbzna ur fnvq, V jvyy terngyl zhygvcyl gul fbeebj naq
gul pbaprcgvba; va fbeebj gubh funyg oevat sbegu puvyqera; naq gul
qrfver funyy or gb gul uhfonaq, naq ur funyy ehyr bire gurr.

3:17 Naq hagb Nqnz ur fnvq, Orpnhfr gubh unfg urnexrarq hagb gur ibvpr
bs gul jvsr, naq unfg rngra bs gur gerr, bs juvpu V pbzznaqrq gurr,
fnlvat, Gubh funyg abg rng bs vg: phefrq vf gur tebhaq sbe gul fnxr;
va fbeebj funyg gubh rng bs vg nyy gur qnlf bs gul yvsr; 3:18 Gubeaf
nyfb naq guvfgyrf funyy vg oevat sbegu gb gurr; naq gubh funyg rng gur
ureo bs gur svryq; 3:19 Va gur fjrng bs gul snpr funyg gubh rng oernq,
gvyy gubh erghea hagb gur tebhaq; sbe bhg bs vg jnfg gubh gnxra: sbe
qhfg gubh neg, naq hagb qhfg funyg gubh erghea.

3:20 Naq Nqnz pnyyrq uvf jvsr'f anzr Rir; orpnhfr fur jnf gur zbgure
bs nyy yvivat.

3:21 Hagb Nqnz nyfb naq gb uvf jvsr qvq gur YBEQ Tbq znxr pbngf bs
fxvaf, naq pybgurq gurz.

3:22 Naq gur YBEQ Tbq fnvq, Orubyq, gur zna vf orpbzr nf bar bs hf, gb
xabj tbbq naq rivy: naq abj, yrfg ur chg sbegu uvf unaq, naq gnxr nyfb
bs gur gerr bs yvsr, naq rng, naq yvir sbe rire: 3:23 Gurersber gur
YBEQ Tbq frag uvz sbegu sebz gur tneqra bs Rqra, gb gvyy gur tebhaq
sebz jurapr ur jnf gnxra.

3:24 Fb ur qebir bhg gur zna; naq ur cynprq ng gur rnfg bs gur tneqra
bs Rqra Purehovzf, naq n synzvat fjbeq juvpu ghearq rirel jnl, gb xrrc
gur jnl bs gur gerr bs yvsr.

4:1 Naq Nqnz xarj Rir uvf jvsr; naq fur pbaprvirq, naq oner Pnva, naq
fnvq, V unir tbggra n zna sebz gur YBEQ.

4:2 Naq fur ntnva oner uvf oebgure Nory. Naq Nory jnf n xrrcre bs
furrc, ohg Pnva jnf n gvyyre bs gur tebhaq.

4:3 Naq va cebprff bs gvzr vg pnzr gb cnff, gung Pnva oebhtug bs gur
sehvg bs gur tebhaq na bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ.

4:4 Naq Nory, ur nyfb oebhtug bs gur svefgyvatf bs uvf sybpx naq bs
gur sng gurerbs. Naq gur YBEQ unq erfcrpg hagb Nory naq gb uvf
bssrevat: 4:5 Ohg hagb Pnva naq gb uvf bssrevat ur unq abg erfcrpg.
Naq Pnva jnf irel jebgu, naq uvf pbhagranapr sryy.

4:6 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Pnva, Jul neg gubh jebgu? naq jul vf gul
pbhagranapr snyyra?  4:7 Vs gubh qbrfg jryy, funyg gubh abg or
npprcgrq? naq vs gubh qbrfg abg jryy, fva yvrgu ng gur qbbe. Naq hagb
gurr funyy or uvf qrfver, naq gubh funyg ehyr bire uvz.

4:8 Naq Pnva gnyxrq jvgu Nory uvf oebgure: naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura
gurl jrer va gur svryq, gung Pnva ebfr hc ntnvafg Nory uvf oebgure,
naq fyrj uvz.

4:9 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Pnva, Jurer vf Nory gul oebgure? Naq ur
fnvq, V xabj abg: Nz V zl oebgure'f xrrcre?  4:10 Naq ur fnvq, Jung
unfg gubh qbar? gur ibvpr bs gul oebgure'f oybbq pevrgu hagb zr sebz
gur tebhaq.

4:11 Naq abj neg gubh phefrq sebz gur rnegu, juvpu ungu bcrarq ure
zbhgu gb erprvir gul oebgure'f oybbq sebz gul unaq; 4:12 Jura gubh
gvyyrfg gur tebhaq, vg funyy abg uraprsbegu lvryq hagb gurr ure
fgeratgu; n shtvgvir naq n intnobaq funyg gubh or va gur rnegu.

4:13 Naq Pnva fnvq hagb gur YBEQ, Zl chavfuzrag vf terngre guna V pna
orne.

4:14 Orubyq, gubh unfg qevira zr bhg guvf qnl sebz gur snpr bs gur
rnegu; naq sebz gul snpr funyy V or uvq; naq V funyy or n shtvgvir naq
n intnobaq va gur rnegu; naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung rirel bar
gung svaqrgu zr funyy fynl zr.

4:15 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, Gurersber jubfbrire fynlrgu Pnva,
iratrnapr funyy or gnxra ba uvz frirasbyq. Naq gur YBEQ frg n znex
hcba Pnva, yrfg nal svaqvat uvz fubhyq xvyy uvz.

4:16 Naq Pnva jrag bhg sebz gur cerfrapr bs gur YBEQ, naq qjryg va gur
ynaq bs Abq, ba gur rnfg bs Rqra.

4:17 Naq Pnva xarj uvf jvsr; naq fur pbaprvirq, naq oner Rabpu: naq ur
ohvyqrq n pvgl, naq pnyyrq gur anzr bs gur pvgl, nsgre gur anzr bs uvf
fba, Rabpu.

4:18 Naq hagb Rabpu jnf obea Venq: naq Venq ortng Zruhwnry: naq
Zruhwnry ortng Zrguhfnry: naq Zrguhfnry ortng Ynzrpu.

4:19 Naq Ynzrpu gbbx hagb uvz gjb jvirf: gur anzr bs gur bar jnf Nqnu,
naq gur anzr bs gur bgure Mvyynu.

4:20 Naq Nqnu oner Wnony: ur jnf gur sngure bs fhpu nf qjryy va gragf,
naq bs fhpu nf unir pnggyr.

4:21 Naq uvf oebgure'f anzr jnf Whony: ur jnf gur sngure bs nyy fhpu
nf unaqyr gur unec naq betna.

4:22 Naq Mvyynu, fur nyfb oner Ghonypnva, na vafgehpgre bs rirel
negvsvpre va oenff naq veba: naq gur fvfgre bs Ghonypnva jnf Annznu.

4:23 Naq Ynzrpu fnvq hagb uvf jvirf, Nqnu naq Mvyynu, Urne zl ibvpr;
lr jvirf bs Ynzrpu, urnexra hagb zl fcrrpu: sbe V unir fynva n zna gb
zl jbhaqvat, naq n lbhat zna gb zl uheg.

4:24 Vs Pnva funyy or niratrq frirasbyq, gehyl Ynzrpu friragl naq
frirasbyq.

4:25 Naq Nqnz xarj uvf jvsr ntnva; naq fur oner n fba, naq pnyyrq uvf
anzr Frgu: Sbe Tbq, fnvq fur, ungu nccbvagrq zr nabgure frrq vafgrnq
bs Nory, jubz Pnva fyrj.

4:26 Naq gb Frgu, gb uvz nyfb gurer jnf obea n fba; naq ur pnyyrq uvf
anzr Rabf: gura ortna zra gb pnyy hcba gur anzr bs gur YBEQ.

5:1 Guvf vf gur obbx bs gur trarengvbaf bs Nqnz. Va gur qnl gung Tbq
perngrq zna, va gur yvxrarff bs Tbq znqr ur uvz; 5:2 Znyr naq srznyr
perngrq ur gurz; naq oyrffrq gurz, naq pnyyrq gurve anzr Nqnz, va gur
qnl jura gurl jrer perngrq.

5:3 Naq Nqnz yvirq na uhaqerq naq guvegl lrnef, naq ortng n fba va uvf
bja yvxrarff, naq nsgre uvf vzntr; naq pnyyrq uvf anzr Frgu: 5:4 Naq
gur qnlf bs Nqnz nsgre ur unq ortbggra Frgu jrer rvtug uhaqerq lrnef:
naq ur ortng fbaf naq qnhtugref: 5:5 Naq nyy gur qnlf gung Nqnz yvirq
jrer avar uhaqerq naq guvegl lrnef: naq ur qvrq.

5:6 Naq Frgu yvirq na uhaqerq naq svir lrnef, naq ortng Rabf: 5:7 Naq
Frgu yvirq nsgre ur ortng Rabf rvtug uhaqerq naq frira lrnef, naq
ortng fbaf naq qnhtugref: 5:8 Naq nyy gur qnlf bs Frgu jrer avar
uhaqerq naq gjryir lrnef: naq ur qvrq.

5:9 Naq Rabf yvirq avargl lrnef, naq ortng Pnvana: 5:10 Naq Rabf yvirq
nsgre ur ortng Pnvana rvtug uhaqerq naq svsgrra lrnef, naq ortng fbaf
naq qnhtugref: 5:11 Naq nyy gur qnlf bs Rabf jrer avar uhaqerq naq
svir lrnef: naq ur qvrq.

5:12 Naq Pnvana yvirq friragl lrnef naq ortng Znunynyrry: 5:13 Naq
Pnvana yvirq nsgre ur ortng Znunynyrry rvtug uhaqerq naq sbegl lrnef,
naq ortng fbaf naq qnhtugref: 5:14 Naq nyy gur qnlf bs Pnvana jrer
avar uhaqerq naq gra lrnef: naq ur qvrq.

5:15 Naq Znunynyrry yvirq fvkgl naq svir lrnef, naq ortng Wnerq: 5:16
Naq Znunynyrry yvirq nsgre ur ortng Wnerq rvtug uhaqerq naq guvegl
lrnef, naq ortng fbaf naq qnhtugref: 5:17 Naq nyy gur qnlf bs
Znunynyrry jrer rvtug uhaqerq avargl naq svir lrnef: naq ur qvrq.

5:18 Naq Wnerq yvirq na uhaqerq fvkgl naq gjb lrnef, naq ur ortng
Rabpu: 5:19 Naq Wnerq yvirq nsgre ur ortng Rabpu rvtug uhaqerq lrnef,
naq ortng fbaf naq qnhtugref: 5:20 Naq nyy gur qnlf bs Wnerq jrer avar
uhaqerq fvkgl naq gjb lrnef: naq ur qvrq.

5:21 Naq Rabpu yvirq fvkgl naq svir lrnef, naq ortng Zrguhfrynu: 5:22
Naq Rabpu jnyxrq jvgu Tbq nsgre ur ortng Zrguhfrynu guerr uhaqerq
lrnef, naq ortng fbaf naq qnhtugref: 5:23 Naq nyy gur qnlf bs Rabpu
jrer guerr uhaqerq fvkgl naq svir lrnef: 5:24 Naq Rabpu jnyxrq jvgu
Tbq: naq ur jnf abg; sbe Tbq gbbx uvz.

5:25 Naq Zrguhfrynu yvirq na uhaqerq rvtugl naq frira lrnef, naq ortng
Ynzrpu.

5:26 Naq Zrguhfrynu yvirq nsgre ur ortng Ynzrpu frira uhaqerq rvtugl
naq gjb lrnef, naq ortng fbaf naq qnhtugref: 5:27 Naq nyy gur qnlf bs
Zrguhfrynu jrer avar uhaqerq fvkgl naq avar lrnef: naq ur qvrq.

5:28 Naq Ynzrpu yvirq na uhaqerq rvtugl naq gjb lrnef, naq ortng n
fba: 5:29 Naq ur pnyyrq uvf anzr Abnu, fnlvat, Guvf fnzr funyy pbzsbeg
hf pbapreavat bhe jbex naq gbvy bs bhe unaqf, orpnhfr bs gur tebhaq
juvpu gur YBEQ ungu phefrq.

5:30 Naq Ynzrpu yvirq nsgre ur ortng Abnu svir uhaqerq avargl naq svir
lrnef, naq ortng fbaf naq qnhtugref: 5:31 Naq nyy gur qnlf bs Ynzrpu
jrer frira uhaqerq friragl naq frira lrnef: naq ur qvrq.

5:32 Naq Abnu jnf svir uhaqerq lrnef byq: naq Abnu ortng Furz, Unz,
naq Wncurgu.

6:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura zra ortna gb zhygvcyl ba gur snpr bs gur
rnegu, naq qnhtugref jrer obea hagb gurz, 6:2 Gung gur fbaf bs Tbq fnj
gur qnhtugref bs zra gung gurl jrer snve; naq gurl gbbx gurz jvirf bs
nyy juvpu gurl pubfr.

6:3 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Zl fcvevg funyy abg nyjnlf fgevir jvgu zna, sbe
gung ur nyfb vf syrfu: lrg uvf qnlf funyy or na uhaqerq naq gjragl
lrnef.

6:4 Gurer jrer tvnagf va gur rnegu va gubfr qnlf; naq nyfb nsgre gung,
jura gur fbaf bs Tbq pnzr va hagb gur qnhtugref bs zra, naq gurl oner
puvyqera gb gurz, gur fnzr orpnzr zvtugl zra juvpu jrer bs byq, zra bs
erabja.

6:5 Naq Tbq fnj gung gur jvpxrqarff bs zna jnf terng va gur rnegu, naq
gung rirel vzntvangvba bs gur gubhtugf bs uvf urneg jnf bayl rivy
pbagvahnyyl.

6:6 Naq vg ercragrq gur YBEQ gung ur unq znqr zna ba gur rnegu, naq vg
tevrirq uvz ng uvf urneg.

6:7 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, V jvyy qrfgebl zna jubz V unir perngrq sebz gur
snpr bs gur rnegu; obgu zna, naq ornfg, naq gur perrcvat guvat, naq
gur sbjyf bs gur nve; sbe vg ercragrgu zr gung V unir znqr gurz.

6:8 Ohg Abnu sbhaq tenpr va gur rlrf bs gur YBEQ.

6:9 Gurfr ner gur trarengvbaf bs Abnu: Abnu jnf n whfg zna naq cresrpg
va uvf trarengvbaf, naq Abnu jnyxrq jvgu Tbq.

6:10 Naq Abnu ortng guerr fbaf, Furz, Unz, naq Wncurgu.

6:11 Gur rnegu nyfb jnf pbeehcg orsber Tbq, naq gur rnegu jnf svyyrq
jvgu ivbyrapr.

6:12 Naq Tbq ybbxrq hcba gur rnegu, naq, orubyq, vg jnf pbeehcg; sbe
nyy syrfu unq pbeehcgrq uvf jnl hcba gur rnegu.

6:13 Naq Tbq fnvq hagb Abnu, Gur raq bs nyy syrfu vf pbzr orsber zr;
sbe gur rnegu vf svyyrq jvgu ivbyrapr guebhtu gurz; naq, orubyq, V
jvyy qrfgebl gurz jvgu gur rnegu.

6:14 Znxr gurr na nex bs tbcure jbbq; ebbzf funyg gubh znxr va gur
nex, naq funyg cvgpu vg jvguva naq jvgubhg jvgu cvgpu.

6:15 Naq guvf vf gur snfuvba juvpu gubh funyg znxr vg bs: Gur yratgu
bs gur nex funyy or guerr uhaqerq phovgf, gur oernqgu bs vg svsgl
phovgf, naq gur urvtug bs vg guvegl phovgf.

6:16 N jvaqbj funyg gubh znxr gb gur nex, naq va n phovg funyg gubh
svavfu vg nobir; naq gur qbbe bs gur nex funyg gubh frg va gur fvqr
gurerbs; jvgu ybjre, frpbaq, naq guveq fgbevrf funyg gubh znxr vg.

6:17 Naq, orubyq, V, rira V, qb oevat n sybbq bs jngref hcba gur
rnegu, gb qrfgebl nyy syrfu, jurerva vf gur oerngu bs yvsr, sebz haqre
urnira; naq rirel guvat gung vf va gur rnegu funyy qvr.

6:18 Ohg jvgu gurr jvyy V rfgnoyvfu zl pbiranag; naq gubh funyg pbzr
vagb gur nex, gubh, naq gul fbaf, naq gul jvsr, naq gul fbaf' jvirf
jvgu gurr.

6:19 Naq bs rirel yvivat guvat bs nyy syrfu, gjb bs rirel fbeg funyg
gubh oevat vagb gur nex, gb xrrc gurz nyvir jvgu gurr; gurl funyy or
znyr naq srznyr.

6:20 Bs sbjyf nsgre gurve xvaq, naq bs pnggyr nsgre gurve xvaq, bs
rirel perrcvat guvat bs gur rnegu nsgre uvf xvaq, gjb bs rirel fbeg
funyy pbzr hagb gurr, gb xrrc gurz nyvir.

6:21 Naq gnxr gubh hagb gurr bs nyy sbbq gung vf rngra, naq gubh funyg
tngure vg gb gurr; naq vg funyy or sbe sbbq sbe gurr, naq sbe gurz.

6:22 Guhf qvq Abnu; nppbeqvat gb nyy gung Tbq pbzznaqrq uvz, fb qvq
ur.

7:1 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Abnu, Pbzr gubh naq nyy gul ubhfr vagb gur
nex; sbe gurr unir V frra evtugrbhf orsber zr va guvf trarengvba.

7:2 Bs rirel pyrna ornfg gubh funyg gnxr gb gurr ol friraf, gur znyr
naq uvf srznyr: naq bs ornfgf gung ner abg pyrna ol gjb, gur znyr naq
uvf srznyr.

7:3 Bs sbjyf nyfb bs gur nve ol friraf, gur znyr naq gur srznyr; gb
xrrc frrq nyvir hcba gur snpr bs nyy gur rnegu.

7:4 Sbe lrg frira qnlf, naq V jvyy pnhfr vg gb enva hcba gur rnegu
sbegl qnlf naq sbegl avtugf; naq rirel yvivat fhofgnapr gung V unir
znqr jvyy V qrfgebl sebz bss gur snpr bs gur rnegu.

7:5 Naq Abnu qvq nppbeqvat hagb nyy gung gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq uvz.

7:6 Naq Abnu jnf fvk uhaqerq lrnef byq jura gur sybbq bs jngref jnf
hcba gur rnegu.

7:7 Naq Abnu jrag va, naq uvf fbaf, naq uvf jvsr, naq uvf fbaf' jvirf
jvgu uvz, vagb gur nex, orpnhfr bs gur jngref bs gur sybbq.

7:8 Bs pyrna ornfgf, naq bs ornfgf gung ner abg pyrna, naq bs sbjyf,
naq bs rirel guvat gung perrcrgu hcba gur rnegu, 7:9 Gurer jrag va gjb
naq gjb hagb Abnu vagb gur nex, gur znyr naq gur srznyr, nf Tbq unq
pbzznaqrq Abnu.

7:10 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre frira qnlf, gung gur jngref bs gur
sybbq jrer hcba gur rnegu.

7:11 Va gur fvk uhaqerqgu lrne bs Abnu'f yvsr, va gur frpbaq zbagu,
gur friragrragu qnl bs gur zbagu, gur fnzr qnl jrer nyy gur sbhagnvaf
bs gur terng qrrc oebxra hc, naq gur jvaqbjf bs urnira jrer bcrarq.

7:12 Naq gur enva jnf hcba gur rnegu sbegl qnlf naq sbegl avtugf.

7:13 Va gur frysfnzr qnl ragrerq Abnu, naq Furz, naq Unz, naq Wncurgu,
gur fbaf bs Abnu, naq Abnu'f jvsr, naq gur guerr jvirf bs uvf fbaf
jvgu gurz, vagb gur nex; 7:14 Gurl, naq rirel ornfg nsgre uvf xvaq,
naq nyy gur pnggyr nsgre gurve xvaq, naq rirel perrcvat guvat gung
perrcrgu hcba gur rnegu nsgre uvf xvaq, naq rirel sbjy nsgre uvf xvaq,
rirel oveq bs rirel fbeg.

7:15 Naq gurl jrag va hagb Abnu vagb gur nex, gjb naq gjb bs nyy
syrfu, jurerva vf gur oerngu bs yvsr.

7:16 Naq gurl gung jrag va, jrag va znyr naq srznyr bs nyy syrfu, nf
Tbq unq pbzznaqrq uvz: naq gur YBEQ fuhg uvz va.

7:17 Naq gur sybbq jnf sbegl qnlf hcba gur rnegu; naq gur jngref
vapernfrq, naq oner hc gur nex, naq vg jnf yvsg hc nobir gur rnegu.

7:18 Naq gur jngref cerinvyrq, naq jrer vapernfrq terngyl hcba gur
rnegu; naq gur nex jrag hcba gur snpr bs gur jngref.

7:19 Naq gur jngref cerinvyrq rkprrqvatyl hcba gur rnegu; naq nyy gur
uvtu uvyyf, gung jrer haqre gur jubyr urnira, jrer pbirerq.

7:20 Svsgrra phovgf hcjneq qvq gur jngref cerinvy; naq gur zbhagnvaf
jrer pbirerq.

7:21 Naq nyy syrfu qvrq gung zbirq hcba gur rnegu, obgu bs sbjy, naq
bs pnggyr, naq bs ornfg, naq bs rirel perrcvat guvat gung perrcrgu
hcba gur rnegu, naq rirel zna: 7:22 Nyy va jubfr abfgevyf jnf gur
oerngu bs yvsr, bs nyy gung jnf va gur qel ynaq, qvrq.

7:23 Naq rirel yvivat fhofgnapr jnf qrfgeblrq juvpu jnf hcba gur snpr
bs gur tebhaq, obgu zna, naq pnggyr, naq gur perrcvat guvatf, naq gur
sbjy bs gur urnira; naq gurl jrer qrfgeblrq sebz gur rnegu: naq Abnu
bayl erznvarq nyvir, naq gurl gung jrer jvgu uvz va gur nex.

7:24 Naq gur jngref cerinvyrq hcba gur rnegu na uhaqerq naq svsgl
qnlf.

8:1 Naq Tbq erzrzorerq Abnu, naq rirel yvivat guvat, naq nyy gur
pnggyr gung jnf jvgu uvz va gur nex: naq Tbq znqr n jvaq gb cnff bire
gur rnegu, naq gur jngref nffjntrq; 8:2 Gur sbhagnvaf nyfb bs gur qrrc
naq gur jvaqbjf bs urnira jrer fgbccrq, naq gur enva sebz urnira jnf
erfgenvarq; 8:3 Naq gur jngref erghearq sebz bss gur rnegu
pbagvahnyyl: naq nsgre gur raq bs gur uhaqerq naq svsgl qnlf gur
jngref jrer nongrq.

8:4 Naq gur nex erfgrq va gur friragu zbagu, ba gur friragrragu qnl bs
gur zbagu, hcba gur zbhagnvaf bs Neneng.

8:5 Naq gur jngref qrpernfrq pbagvahnyyl hagvy gur gragu zbagu: va gur
gragu zbagu, ba gur svefg qnl bs gur zbagu, jrer gur gbcf bs gur
zbhagnvaf frra.

8:6 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur raq bs sbegl qnlf, gung Abnu bcrarq gur
jvaqbj bs gur nex juvpu ur unq znqr: 8:7 Naq ur frag sbegu n enira,
juvpu jrag sbegu gb naq seb, hagvy gur jngref jrer qevrq hc sebz bss
gur rnegu.

8:8 Nyfb ur frag sbegu n qbir sebz uvz, gb frr vs gur jngref jrer
nongrq sebz bss gur snpr bs gur tebhaq; 8:9 Ohg gur qbir sbhaq ab erfg
sbe gur fbyr bs ure sbbg, naq fur erghearq hagb uvz vagb gur nex, sbe
gur jngref jrer ba gur snpr bs gur jubyr rnegu: gura ur chg sbegu uvf
unaq, naq gbbx ure, naq chyyrq ure va hagb uvz vagb gur nex.

8:10 Naq ur fgnlrq lrg bgure frira qnlf; naq ntnva ur frag sbegu gur
qbir bhg bs gur nex; 8:11 Naq gur qbir pnzr va gb uvz va gur riravat;
naq, yb, va ure zbhgu jnf na byvir yrns cyhpxg bss: fb Abnu xarj gung
gur jngref jrer nongrq sebz bss gur rnegu.

8:12 Naq ur fgnlrq lrg bgure frira qnlf; naq frag sbegu gur qbir;
juvpu erghearq abg ntnva hagb uvz nal zber.

8:13 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur fvk uhaqerqgu naq svefg lrne, va gur
svefg zbagu, gur svefg qnl bs gur zbagu, gur jngref jrer qevrq hc sebz
bss gur rnegu: naq Abnu erzbirq gur pbirevat bs gur nex, naq ybbxrq,
naq, orubyq, gur snpr bs gur tebhaq jnf qel.

8:14 Naq va gur frpbaq zbagu, ba gur frira naq gjragvrgu qnl bs gur
zbagu, jnf gur rnegu qevrq.

8:15 Naq Tbq fcnxr hagb Abnu, fnlvat, 8:16 Tb sbegu bs gur nex, gubh,
naq gul jvsr, naq gul fbaf, naq gul fbaf' jvirf jvgu gurr.

8:17 Oevat sbegu jvgu gurr rirel yvivat guvat gung vf jvgu gurr, bs
nyy syrfu, obgu bs sbjy, naq bs pnggyr, naq bs rirel perrcvat guvat
gung perrcrgu hcba gur rnegu; gung gurl znl oerrq nohaqnagyl va gur
rnegu, naq or sehvgshy, naq zhygvcyl hcba gur rnegu.

8:18 Naq Abnu jrag sbegu, naq uvf fbaf, naq uvf jvsr, naq uvf fbaf'
jvirf jvgu uvz: 8:19 Rirel ornfg, rirel perrcvat guvat, naq rirel
sbjy, naq jungfbrire perrcrgu hcba gur rnegu, nsgre gurve xvaqf, jrag
sbegu bhg bs gur nex.

8:20 Naq Abnu ohvyqrq na nygne hagb gur YBEQ; naq gbbx bs rirel pyrna
ornfg, naq bs rirel pyrna sbjy, naq bssrerq oheag bssrevatf ba gur
nygne.

8:21 Naq gur YBEQ fzryyrq n fjrrg fnibhe; naq gur YBEQ fnvq va uvf
urneg, V jvyy abg ntnva phefr gur tebhaq nal zber sbe zna'f fnxr; sbe
gur vzntvangvba bs zna'f urneg vf rivy sebz uvf lbhgu; arvgure jvyy V
ntnva fzvgr nal zber rirel guvat yvivat, nf V unir qbar.

8:22 Juvyr gur rnegu erznvargu, frrqgvzr naq uneirfg, naq pbyq naq
urng, naq fhzzre naq jvagre, naq qnl naq avtug funyy abg prnfr.

9:1 Naq Tbq oyrffrq Abnu naq uvf fbaf, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Or
sehvgshy, naq zhygvcyl, naq ercyravfu gur rnegu.

9:2 Naq gur srne bs lbh naq gur qernq bs lbh funyy or hcba rirel ornfg
bs gur rnegu, naq hcba rirel sbjy bs gur nve, hcba nyy gung zbirgu
hcba gur rnegu, naq hcba nyy gur svfurf bs gur frn; vagb lbhe unaq ner
gurl qryvirerq.

9:3 Rirel zbivat guvat gung yvirgu funyy or zrng sbe lbh; rira nf gur
terra ureo unir V tvira lbh nyy guvatf.

9:4 Ohg syrfu jvgu gur yvsr gurerbs, juvpu vf gur oybbq gurerbs, funyy
lr abg rng.

9:5 Naq fheryl lbhe oybbq bs lbhe yvirf jvyy V erdhver; ng gur unaq bs
rirel ornfg jvyy V erdhver vg, naq ng gur unaq bs zna; ng gur unaq bs
rirel zna'f oebgure jvyy V erdhver gur yvsr bs zna.

9:6 Jubfb furqqrgu zna'f oybbq, ol zna funyy uvf oybbq or furq: sbe va
gur vzntr bs Tbq znqr ur zna.

9:7 Naq lbh, or lr sehvgshy, naq zhygvcyl; oevat sbegu nohaqnagyl va
gur rnegu, naq zhygvcyl gurerva.

9:8 Naq Tbq fcnxr hagb Abnu, naq gb uvf fbaf jvgu uvz, fnlvat, 9:9 Naq
V, orubyq, V rfgnoyvfu zl pbiranag jvgu lbh, naq jvgu lbhe frrq nsgre
lbh; 9:10 Naq jvgu rirel yvivat perngher gung vf jvgu lbh, bs gur
sbjy, bs gur pnggyr, naq bs rirel ornfg bs gur rnegu jvgu lbh; sebz
nyy gung tb bhg bs gur nex, gb rirel ornfg bs gur rnegu.

9:11 Naq V jvyy rfgnoyvfu zl pbiranag jvgu lbh, arvgure funyy nyy
syrfu or phg bss nal zber ol gur jngref bs n sybbq; arvgure funyy
gurer nal zber or n sybbq gb qrfgebl gur rnegu.

9:12 Naq Tbq fnvq, Guvf vf gur gbxra bs gur pbiranag juvpu V znxr
orgjrra zr naq lbh naq rirel yvivat perngher gung vf jvgu lbh, sbe
crecrghny trarengvbaf: 9:13 V qb frg zl obj va gur pybhq, naq vg funyy
or sbe n gbxra bs n pbiranag orgjrra zr naq gur rnegu.

9:14 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura V oevat n pybhq bire gur rnegu,
gung gur obj funyy or frra va gur pybhq: 9:15 Naq V jvyy erzrzore zl
pbiranag, juvpu vf orgjrra zr naq lbh naq rirel yvivat perngher bs nyy
syrfu; naq gur jngref funyy ab zber orpbzr n sybbq gb qrfgebl nyy
syrfu.

9:16 Naq gur obj funyy or va gur pybhq; naq V jvyy ybbx hcba vg, gung
V znl erzrzore gur rireynfgvat pbiranag orgjrra Tbq naq rirel yvivat
perngher bs nyy syrfu gung vf hcba gur rnegu.

9:17 Naq Tbq fnvq hagb Abnu, Guvf vf gur gbxra bs gur pbiranag, juvpu
V unir rfgnoyvfurq orgjrra zr naq nyy syrfu gung vf hcba gur rnegu.

9:18 Naq gur fbaf bs Abnu, gung jrag sbegu bs gur nex, jrer Furz, naq
Unz, naq Wncurgu: naq Unz vf gur sngure bs Pnanna.

9:19 Gurfr ner gur guerr fbaf bs Abnu: naq bs gurz jnf gur jubyr rnegu
birefcernq.

9:20 Naq Abnu ortna gb or na uhfonaqzna, naq ur cynagrq n ivarlneq:
9:21 Naq ur qenax bs gur jvar, naq jnf qehaxra; naq ur jnf hapbirerq
jvguva uvf grag.

9:22 Naq Unz, gur sngure bs Pnanna, fnj gur anxrqarff bs uvf sngure,
naq gbyq uvf gjb oerguera jvgubhg.

9:23 Naq Furz naq Wncurgu gbbx n tnezrag, naq ynvq vg hcba obgu gurve
fubhyqref, naq jrag onpxjneq, naq pbirerq gur anxrqarff bs gurve
sngure; naq gurve snprf jrer onpxjneq, naq gurl fnj abg gurve sngure'f
anxrqarff.

9:24 Naq Abnu njbxr sebz uvf jvar, naq xarj jung uvf lbhatre fba unq
qbar hagb uvz.

9:25 Naq ur fnvq, Phefrq or Pnanna; n freinag bs freinagf funyy ur or
hagb uvf oerguera.

9:26 Naq ur fnvq, Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ Tbq bs Furz; naq Pnanna funyy or
uvf freinag.

9:27 Tbq funyy raynetr Wncurgu, naq ur funyy qjryy va gur gragf bs
Furz; naq Pnanna funyy or uvf freinag.

9:28 Naq Abnu yvirq nsgre gur sybbq guerr uhaqerq naq svsgl lrnef.

9:29 Naq nyy gur qnlf bs Abnu jrer avar uhaqerq naq svsgl lrnef: naq
ur qvrq.

10:1 Abj gurfr ner gur trarengvbaf bs gur fbaf bs Abnu, Furz, Unz, naq
Wncurgu: naq hagb gurz jrer fbaf obea nsgre gur sybbq.

10:2 Gur fbaf bs Wncurgu; Tbzre, naq Zntbt, naq Znqnv, naq Wnina, naq
Ghony, naq Zrfurpu, naq Gvenf.

10:3 Naq gur fbaf bs Tbzre; Nfuxranm, naq Evcungu, naq Gbtneznu.

10:4 Naq gur fbaf bs Wnina; Ryvfunu, naq Gnefuvfu, Xvggvz, naq
Qbqnavz.

10:5 Ol gurfr jrer gur vfyrf bs gur Tragvyrf qvivqrq va gurve ynaqf;
rirel bar nsgre uvf gbathr, nsgre gurve snzvyvrf, va gurve angvbaf.

10:6 Naq gur fbaf bs Unz; Phfu, naq Zvmenvz, naq Cuhg, naq Pnanna.

10:7 Naq gur fbaf bs Phfu; Fron, naq Univynu, naq Fnognu, naq Ennznu,
naq Fnogrpunu: naq gur fbaf bs Ennznu; Furon, naq Qrqna.

10:8 Naq Phfu ortng Avzebq: ur ortna gb or n zvtugl bar va gur rnegu.

10:9 Ur jnf n zvtugl uhagre orsber gur YBEQ: jurersber vg vf fnvq,
Rira nf Avzebq gur zvtugl uhagre orsber gur YBEQ.

10:10 Naq gur ortvaavat bs uvf xvatqbz jnf Onory, naq Rerpu, naq
Nppnq, naq Pnyaru, va gur ynaq bs Fuvane.

10:11 Bhg bs gung ynaq jrag sbegu Nffuhe, naq ohvyqrq Avariru, naq gur
pvgl Erubobgu, naq Pnynu, 10:12 Naq Erfra orgjrra Avariru naq Pnynu:
gur fnzr vf n terng pvgl.

10:13 Naq Zvmenvz ortng Yhqvz, naq Nanzvz, naq Yrunovz, naq Ancughuvz,
10:14 Naq Cnguehfvz, naq Pnfyhuvz, (bhg bs jubz pnzr Cuvyvfgvz,) naq
Pncugbevz.

10:15 Naq Pnanna ortng Fvqba uvf svefg obea, naq Urgu, 10:16 Naq gur
Wrohfvgr, naq gur Nzbevgr, naq gur Tvetnfvgr, 10:17 Naq gur Uvivgr,
naq gur Nexvgr, naq gur Fvavgr, 10:18 Naq gur Neinqvgr, naq gur
Mrznevgr, naq gur Unznguvgr: naq nsgrejneq jrer gur snzvyvrf bs gur
Pnannavgrf fcernq noebnq.

10:19 Naq gur obeqre bs gur Pnannavgrf jnf sebz Fvqba, nf gubh pbzrfg
gb Trene, hagb Tnmn; nf gubh tbrfg, hagb Fbqbz, naq Tbzbeenu, naq
Nqznu, naq Mrobvz, rira hagb Ynfun.

10:20 Gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Unz, nsgre gurve snzvyvrf, nsgre gurve
gbathrf, va gurve pbhagevrf, naq va gurve angvbaf.

10:21 Hagb Furz nyfb, gur sngure bs nyy gur puvyqera bs Rore, gur
oebgure bs Wncurgu gur ryqre, rira gb uvz jrer puvyqera obea.

10:22 Gur puvyqera bs Furz; Rynz, naq Nffuhe, naq Necunknq, naq Yhq,
naq Nenz.

10:23 Naq gur puvyqera bs Nenz; Hm, naq Uhy, naq Trgure, naq Znfu.

10:24 Naq Necunknq ortng Fnynu; naq Fnynu ortng Rore.

10:25 Naq hagb Rore jrer obea gjb fbaf: gur anzr bs bar jnf Cryrt; sbe
va uvf qnlf jnf gur rnegu qvivqrq; naq uvf oebgure'f anzr jnf Wbxgna.

10:26 Naq Wbxgna ortng Nyzbqnq, naq Furyrcu, naq Unmneznirgu, naq
Wrenu, 10:27 Naq Unqbenz, naq Hmny, naq Qvxynu, 10:28 Naq Bony, naq
Novznry, naq Furon, 10:29 Naq Bcuve, naq Univynu, naq Wbono: nyy gurfr
jrer gur fbaf bs Wbxgna.

10:30 Naq gurve qjryyvat jnf sebz Zrfun, nf gubh tbrfg hagb Frcune n
zbhag bs gur rnfg.

10:31 Gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Furz, nsgre gurve snzvyvrf, nsgre gurve
gbathrf, va gurve ynaqf, nsgre gurve angvbaf.

10:32 Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs gur fbaf bs Abnu, nsgre gurve
trarengvbaf, va gurve angvbaf: naq ol gurfr jrer gur angvbaf qvivqrq
va gur rnegu nsgre gur sybbq.

11:1 Naq gur jubyr rnegu jnf bs bar ynathntr, naq bs bar fcrrpu.

11:2 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf gurl wbhearlrq sebz gur rnfg, gung gurl
sbhaq n cynva va gur ynaq bs Fuvane; naq gurl qjryg gurer.

11:3 Naq gurl fnvq bar gb nabgure, Tb gb, yrg hf znxr oevpx, naq ohea
gurz gubebhtuyl. Naq gurl unq oevpx sbe fgbar, naq fyvzr unq gurl sbe
zbegre.

11:4 Naq gurl fnvq, Tb gb, yrg hf ohvyq hf n pvgl naq n gbjre, jubfr
gbc znl ernpu hagb urnira; naq yrg hf znxr hf n anzr, yrfg jr or
fpnggrerq noebnq hcba gur snpr bs gur jubyr rnegu.

11:5 Naq gur YBEQ pnzr qbja gb frr gur pvgl naq gur gbjre, juvpu gur
puvyqera bs zra ohvyqrq.

11:6 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Orubyq, gur crbcyr vf bar, naq gurl unir nyy
bar ynathntr; naq guvf gurl ortva gb qb: naq abj abguvat jvyy or
erfgenvarq sebz gurz, juvpu gurl unir vzntvarq gb qb.

11:7 Tb gb, yrg hf tb qbja, naq gurer pbasbhaq gurve ynathntr, gung
gurl znl abg haqrefgnaq bar nabgure'f fcrrpu.

11:8 Fb gur YBEQ fpnggrerq gurz noebnq sebz gurapr hcba gur snpr bs
nyy gur rnegu: naq gurl yrsg bss gb ohvyq gur pvgl.

11:9 Gurersber vf gur anzr bs vg pnyyrq Onory; orpnhfr gur YBEQ qvq
gurer pbasbhaq gur ynathntr bs nyy gur rnegu: naq sebz gurapr qvq gur
YBEQ fpnggre gurz noebnq hcba gur snpr bs nyy gur rnegu.

11:10 Gurfr ner gur trarengvbaf bs Furz: Furz jnf na uhaqerq lrnef
byq, naq ortng Necunknq gjb lrnef nsgre gur sybbq: 11:11 Naq Furz
yvirq nsgre ur ortng Necunknq svir uhaqerq lrnef, naq ortng fbaf naq
qnhtugref.

11:12 Naq Necunknq yvirq svir naq guvegl lrnef, naq ortng Fnynu: 11:13
Naq Necunknq yvirq nsgre ur ortng Fnynu sbhe uhaqerq naq guerr lrnef,
naq ortng fbaf naq qnhtugref.

11:14 Naq Fnynu yvirq guvegl lrnef, naq ortng Rore: 11:15 Naq Fnynu
yvirq nsgre ur ortng Rore sbhe uhaqerq naq guerr lrnef, naq ortng fbaf
naq qnhtugref.

11:16 Naq Rore yvirq sbhe naq guvegl lrnef, naq ortng Cryrt: 11:17 Naq
Rore yvirq nsgre ur ortng Cryrt sbhe uhaqerq naq guvegl lrnef, naq
ortng fbaf naq qnhtugref.

11:18 Naq Cryrt yvirq guvegl lrnef, naq ortng Erh: 11:19 Naq Cryrt
yvirq nsgre ur ortng Erh gjb uhaqerq naq avar lrnef, naq ortng fbaf
naq qnhtugref.

11:20 Naq Erh yvirq gjb naq guvegl lrnef, naq ortng Freht: 11:21 Naq
Erh yvirq nsgre ur ortng Freht gjb uhaqerq naq frira lrnef, naq ortng
fbaf naq qnhtugref.

11:22 Naq Freht yvirq guvegl lrnef, naq ortng Anube: 11:23 Naq Freht
yvirq nsgre ur ortng Anube gjb uhaqerq lrnef, naq ortng fbaf naq
qnhtugref.

11:24 Naq Anube yvirq avar naq gjragl lrnef, naq ortng Grenu: 11:25
Naq Anube yvirq nsgre ur ortng Grenu na uhaqerq naq avargrra lrnef,
naq ortng fbaf naq qnhtugref.

11:26 Naq Grenu yvirq friragl lrnef, naq ortng Noenz, Anube, naq
Unena.

11:27 Abj gurfr ner gur trarengvbaf bs Grenu: Grenu ortng Noenz,
Anube, naq Unena; naq Unena ortng Ybg.

11:28 Naq Unena qvrq orsber uvf sngure Grenu va gur ynaq bs uvf
angvivgl, va He bs gur Punyqrrf.

11:29 Naq Noenz naq Anube gbbx gurz jvirf: gur anzr bs Noenz'f jvsr
jnf Fnenv; naq gur anzr bs Anube'f jvsr, Zvypnu, gur qnhtugre bs
Unena, gur sngure bs Zvypnu, naq gur sngure bs Vfpnu.

11:30 Ohg Fnenv jnf oneera; fur unq ab puvyq.

11:31 Naq Grenu gbbx Noenz uvf fba, naq Ybg gur fba bs Unena uvf fba'f
fba, naq Fnenv uvf qnhtugre va ynj, uvf fba Noenz'f jvsr; naq gurl
jrag sbegu jvgu gurz sebz He bs gur Punyqrrf, gb tb vagb gur ynaq bs
Pnanna; naq gurl pnzr hagb Unena, naq qjryg gurer.

11:32 Naq gur qnlf bs Grenu jrer gjb uhaqerq naq svir lrnef: naq Grenu
qvrq va Unena.

12:1 Abj gur YBEQ unq fnvq hagb Noenz, Trg gurr bhg bs gul pbhagel,
naq sebz gul xvaqerq, naq sebz gul sngure'f ubhfr, hagb n ynaq gung V
jvyy furj gurr: 12:2 Naq V jvyy znxr bs gurr n terng angvba, naq V
jvyy oyrff gurr, naq znxr gul anzr terng; naq gubh funyg or n
oyrffvat: 12:3 Naq V jvyy oyrff gurz gung oyrff gurr, naq phefr uvz
gung phefrgu gurr: naq va gurr funyy nyy snzvyvrf bs gur rnegu or
oyrffrq.

12:4 Fb Noenz qrcnegrq, nf gur YBEQ unq fcbxra hagb uvz; naq Ybg jrag
jvgu uvz: naq Noenz jnf friragl naq svir lrnef byq jura ur qrcnegrq
bhg bs Unena.

12:5 Naq Noenz gbbx Fnenv uvf jvsr, naq Ybg uvf oebgure'f fba, naq nyy
gurve fhofgnapr gung gurl unq tngurerq, naq gur fbhyf gung gurl unq
tbggra va Unena; naq gurl jrag sbegu gb tb vagb gur ynaq bs Pnanna;
naq vagb gur ynaq bs Pnanna gurl pnzr.

12:6 Naq Noenz cnffrq guebhtu gur ynaq hagb gur cynpr bs Fvpurz, hagb
gur cynva bs Zberu. Naq gur Pnannavgr jnf gura va gur ynaq.

12:7 Naq gur YBEQ nccrnerq hagb Noenz, naq fnvq, Hagb gul frrq jvyy V
tvir guvf ynaq: naq gurer ohvyqrq ur na nygne hagb gur YBEQ, jub
nccrnerq hagb uvz.

12:8 Naq ur erzbirq sebz gurapr hagb n zbhagnva ba gur rnfg bs Orgury,
naq cvgpurq uvf grag, univat Orgury ba gur jrfg, naq Unv ba gur rnfg:
naq gurer ur ohvyqrq na nygne hagb gur YBEQ, naq pnyyrq hcba gur anzr
bs gur YBEQ.

12:9 Naq Noenz wbhearlrq, tbvat ba fgvyy gbjneq gur fbhgu.

12:10 Naq gurer jnf n snzvar va gur ynaq: naq Noenz jrag qbja vagb
Rtlcg gb fbwbhea gurer; sbe gur snzvar jnf tevribhf va gur ynaq.

12:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura ur jnf pbzr arne gb ragre vagb Rtlcg,
gung ur fnvq hagb Fnenv uvf jvsr, Orubyq abj, V xabj gung gubh neg n
snve jbzna gb ybbx hcba: 12:12 Gurersber vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura
gur Rtlcgvnaf funyy frr gurr, gung gurl funyy fnl, Guvf vf uvf jvsr:
naq gurl jvyy xvyy zr, ohg gurl jvyy fnir gurr nyvir.

12:13 Fnl, V cenl gurr, gubh neg zl fvfgre: gung vg znl or jryy jvgu
zr sbe gul fnxr; naq zl fbhy funyy yvir orpnhfr bs gurr.

12:14 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung, jura Noenz jnf pbzr vagb Rtlcg, gur
Rtlcgvnaf oruryq gur jbzna gung fur jnf irel snve.

12:15 Gur cevaprf nyfb bs Cunenbu fnj ure, naq pbzzraqrq ure orsber
Cunenbu: naq gur jbzna jnf gnxra vagb Cunenbu'f ubhfr.

12:16 Naq ur ragerngrq Noenz jryy sbe ure fnxr: naq ur unq furrc, naq
bkra, naq ur nffrf, naq zrafreinagf, naq znvqfreinagf, naq fur nffrf,
naq pnzryf.

12:17 Naq gur YBEQ cynthrq Cunenbu naq uvf ubhfr jvgu terng cynthrf
orpnhfr bs Fnenv Noenz'f jvsr.

12:18 Naq Cunenbu pnyyrq Noenz naq fnvq, Jung vf guvf gung gubh unfg
qbar hagb zr? jul qvqfg gubh abg gryy zr gung fur jnf gul jvsr?  12:19
Jul fnvqfg gubh, Fur vf zl fvfgre? fb V zvtug unir gnxra ure gb zr gb
jvsr: abj gurersber orubyq gul jvsr, gnxr ure, naq tb gul jnl.

12:20 Naq Cunenbu pbzznaqrq uvf zra pbapreavat uvz: naq gurl frag uvz
njnl, naq uvf jvsr, naq nyy gung ur unq.

13:1 Naq Noenz jrag hc bhg bs Rtlcg, ur, naq uvf jvsr, naq nyy gung ur
unq, naq Ybg jvgu uvz, vagb gur fbhgu.

13:2 Naq Noenz jnf irel evpu va pnggyr, va fvyire, naq va tbyq.

13:3 Naq ur jrag ba uvf wbhearlf sebz gur fbhgu rira gb Orgury, hagb
gur cynpr jurer uvf grag unq orra ng gur ortvaavat, orgjrra Orgury naq
Unv; 13:4 Hagb gur cynpr bs gur nygne, juvpu ur unq znxr gurer ng gur
svefg: naq gurer Noenz pnyyrq ba gur anzr bs gur YBEQ.

13:5 Naq Ybg nyfb, juvpu jrag jvgu Noenz, unq sybpxf, naq ureqf, naq
gragf.

13:6 Naq gur ynaq jnf abg noyr gb orne gurz, gung gurl zvtug qjryy
gbtrgure: sbe gurve fhofgnapr jnf terng, fb gung gurl pbhyq abg qjryy
gbtrgure.

13:7 Naq gurer jnf n fgevsr orgjrra gur ureqzra bs Noenz'f pnggyr naq
gur ureqzra bs Ybg'f pnggyr: naq gur Pnannavgr naq gur Crevmmvgr
qjryyrq gura va gur ynaq.

13:8 Naq Noenz fnvq hagb Ybg, Yrg gurer or ab fgevsr, V cenl gurr,
orgjrra zr naq gurr, naq orgjrra zl ureqzra naq gul ureqzra; sbe jr or
oerguera.

13:9 Vf abg gur jubyr ynaq orsber gurr? frcnengr gulfrys, V cenl gurr,
sebz zr: vs gubh jvyg gnxr gur yrsg unaq, gura V jvyy tb gb gur evtug;
be vs gubh qrcneg gb gur evtug unaq, gura V jvyy tb gb gur yrsg.

13:10 Naq Ybg yvsgrq hc uvf rlrf, naq oruryq nyy gur cynva bs Wbeqna,
gung vg jnf jryy jngrerq rirel jurer, orsber gur YBEQ qrfgeblrq Fbqbz
naq Tbzbeenu, rira nf gur tneqra bs gur YBEQ, yvxr gur ynaq bs Rtlcg,
nf gubh pbzrfg hagb Mbne.

13:11 Gura Ybg pubfr uvz nyy gur cynva bs Wbeqna; naq Ybg wbhearlrq
rnfg: naq gurl frcnengrq gurzfryirf gur bar sebz gur bgure.

13:12 Noenz qjryyrq va gur ynaq bs Pnanna, naq Ybg qjryyrq va gur
pvgvrf bs gur cynva, naq cvgpurq uvf grag gbjneq Fbqbz.

13:13 Ohg gur zra bs Fbqbz jrer jvpxrq naq fvaaref orsber gur YBEQ
rkprrqvatyl.

13:14 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Noenz, nsgre gung Ybg jnf frcnengrq sebz
uvz, Yvsg hc abj guvar rlrf, naq ybbx sebz gur cynpr jurer gubh neg
abegujneq, naq fbhgujneq, naq rnfgjneq, naq jrfgjneq: 13:15 Sbe nyy
gur ynaq juvpu gubh frrfg, gb gurr jvyy V tvir vg, naq gb gul frrq sbe
rire.

13:16 Naq V jvyy znxr gul frrq nf gur qhfg bs gur rnegu: fb gung vs n
zna pna ahzore gur qhfg bs gur rnegu, gura funyy gul frrq nyfb or
ahzorerq.

13:17 Nevfr, jnyx guebhtu gur ynaq va gur yratgu bs vg naq va gur
oernqgu bs vg; sbe V jvyy tvir vg hagb gurr.

13:18 Gura Noenz erzbirq uvf grag, naq pnzr naq qjryg va gur cynva bs
Znzer, juvpu vf va Uroeba, naq ohvyg gurer na nygne hagb gur YBEQ.

14:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur qnlf bs Nzencury xvat bs Fuvane,
Nevbpu xvat bs Ryynfne, Purqbeynbzre xvat bs Rynz, naq Gvqny xvat bs
angvbaf; 14:2 Gung gurfr znqr jne jvgu Oren xvat bs Fbqbz, naq jvgu
Ovefun xvat bs Tbzbeenu, Fuvano xvat bs Nqznu, naq Furzrore xvat bs
Mrobvvz, naq gur xvat bs Oryn, juvpu vf Mbne.

14:3 Nyy gurfr jrer wbvarq gbtrgure va gur inyr bs Fvqqvz, juvpu vf
gur fnyg frn.

14:4 Gjryir lrnef gurl freirq Purqbeynbzre, naq va gur guvegrragu lrne
gurl eroryyrq.

14:5 Naq va gur sbhegrragu lrne pnzr Purqbeynbzre, naq gur xvatf gung
jrer jvgu uvz, naq fzbgr gur Ercunvzf va Nfugrebgu Xneanvz, naq gur
Mhmvzf va Unz, naq gur Rzvaf va Funiru Xvevngunvz, 14:6 Naq gur
Ubevgrf va gurve zbhag Frve, hagb Rycnena, juvpu vf ol gur jvyqrearff.

14:7 Naq gurl erghearq, naq pnzr gb Razvfucng, juvpu vf Xnqrfu, naq
fzbgr nyy gur pbhagel bs gur Nznyrxvgrf, naq nyfb gur Nzbevgrf, gung
qjryg va Unmrmbagnzne.

14:8 Naq gurer jrag bhg gur xvat bs Fbqbz, naq gur xvat bs Tbzbeenu,
naq gur xvat bs Nqznu, naq gur xvat bs Mrobvvz, naq gur xvat bs Oryn
(gur fnzr vf Mbne;) naq gurl wbvarq onggyr jvgu gurz va gur inyr bs
Fvqqvz; 14:9 Jvgu Purqbeynbzre gur xvat bs Rynz, naq jvgu Gvqny xvat
bs angvbaf, naq Nzencury xvat bs Fuvane, naq Nevbpu xvat bs Ryynfne;
sbhe xvatf jvgu svir.

14:10 Naq gur inyr bs Fvqqvz jnf shyy bs fyvzrcvgf; naq gur xvatf bs
Fbqbz naq Tbzbeenu syrq, naq sryy gurer; naq gurl gung erznvarq syrq
gb gur zbhagnva.

14:11 Naq gurl gbbx nyy gur tbbqf bs Fbqbz naq Tbzbeenu, naq nyy gurve
ivpghnyf, naq jrag gurve jnl.

14:12 Naq gurl gbbx Ybg, Noenz'f oebgure'f fba, jub qjryg va Fbqbz,
naq uvf tbbqf, naq qrcnegrq.

14:13 Naq gurer pnzr bar gung unq rfpncrq, naq gbyq Noenz gur Uroerj;
sbe ur qjryg va gur cynva bs Znzer gur Nzbevgr, oebgure bs Rfupby, naq
oebgure bs Nare: naq gurfr jrer pbasrqrengr jvgu Noenz.

14:14 Naq jura Noenz urneq gung uvf oebgure jnf gnxra pncgvir, ur
nezrq uvf genvarq freinagf, obea va uvf bja ubhfr, guerr uhaqerq naq
rvtugrra, naq chefhrq gurz hagb Qna.

14:15 Naq ur qvivqrq uvzfrys ntnvafg gurz, ur naq uvf freinagf, ol
avtug, naq fzbgr gurz, naq chefhrq gurz hagb Ubonu, juvpu vf ba gur
yrsg unaq bs Qnznfphf.

14:16 Naq ur oebhtug onpx nyy gur tbbqf, naq nyfb oebhtug ntnva uvf
oebgure Ybg, naq uvf tbbqf, naq gur jbzra nyfb, naq gur crbcyr.

14:17 Naq gur xvat bs Fbqbz jrag bhg gb zrrg uvz nsgre uvf erghea sebz
gur fynhtugre bs Purqbeynbzre, naq bs gur xvatf gung jrer jvgu uvz, ng
gur inyyrl bs Funiru, juvpu vf gur xvat'f qnyr.

14:18 Naq Zrypuvmrqrx xvat bs Fnyrz oebhtug sbegu oernq naq jvar: naq
ur jnf gur cevrfg bs gur zbfg uvtu Tbq.

14:19 Naq ur oyrffrq uvz, naq fnvq, Oyrffrq or Noenz bs gur zbfg uvtu
Tbq, cbffrffbe bs urnira naq rnegu: 14:20 Naq oyrffrq or gur zbfg uvtu
Tbq, juvpu ungu qryvirerq guvar rarzvrf vagb gul unaq. Naq ur tnir uvz
gvgurf bs nyy.

14:21 Naq gur xvat bs Fbqbz fnvq hagb Noenz, Tvir zr gur crefbaf, naq
gnxr gur tbbqf gb gulfrys.

14:22 Naq Noenz fnvq gb gur xvat bs Fbqbz, V unir yvsg hc zvar unaq
hagb gur YBEQ, gur zbfg uvtu Tbq, gur cbffrffbe bs urnira naq rnegu,
14:23 Gung V jvyy abg gnxr sebz n guernq rira gb n fubryngpurg, naq
gung V jvyy abg gnxr nal guvat gung vf guvar, yrfg gubh fubhyqrfg fnl,
V unir znqr Noenz evpu: 14:24 Fnir bayl gung juvpu gur lbhat zra unir
rngra, naq gur cbegvba bs gur zra juvpu jrag jvgu zr, Nare, Rfupby,
naq Znzer; yrg gurz gnxr gurve cbegvba.

15:1 Nsgre gurfr guvatf gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr hagb Noenz va n
ivfvba, fnlvat, Srne abg, Noenz: V nz gul fuvryq, naq gul rkprrqvat
terng erjneq.

15:2 Naq Noenz fnvq, YBEQ Tbq, jung jvyg gubh tvir zr, frrvat V tb
puvyqyrff, naq gur fgrjneq bs zl ubhfr vf guvf Ryvrmre bs Qnznfphf?
15:3 Naq Noenz fnvq, Orubyq, gb zr gubh unfg tvira ab frrq: naq, yb,
bar obea va zl ubhfr vf zvar urve.

15:4 Naq, orubyq, gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr hagb uvz, fnlvat, Guvf
funyy abg or guvar urve; ohg ur gung funyy pbzr sbegu bhg bs guvar bja
objryf funyy or guvar urve.

15:5 Naq ur oebhtug uvz sbegu noebnq, naq fnvq, Ybbx abj gbjneq
urnira, naq gryy gur fgnef, vs gubh or noyr gb ahzore gurz: naq ur
fnvq hagb uvz, Fb funyy gul frrq or.

15:6 Naq ur oryvrirq va gur YBEQ; naq ur pbhagrq vg gb uvz sbe
evtugrbhfarff.

15:7 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, V nz gur YBEQ gung oebhtug gurr bhg bs He
bs gur Punyqrrf, gb tvir gurr guvf ynaq gb vaurevg vg.

15:8 Naq ur fnvq, YBEQ Tbq, jurerol funyy V xabj gung V funyy vaurevg
vg?  15:9 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Gnxr zr na urvsre bs guerr lrnef byq,
naq n fur tbng bs guerr lrnef byq, naq n enz bs guerr lrnef byq, naq n
ghegyrqbir, naq n lbhat cvtrba.

15:10 Naq ur gbbx hagb uvz nyy gurfr, naq qvivqrq gurz va gur zvqfg,
naq ynvq rnpu cvrpr bar ntnvafg nabgure: ohg gur oveqf qvivqrq ur abg.

15:11 Naq jura gur sbjyf pnzr qbja hcba gur pnepnfrf, Noenz qebir gurz
njnl.

15:12 Naq jura gur fha jnf tbvat qbja, n qrrc fyrrc sryy hcba Noenz;
naq, yb, na ubeebe bs terng qnexarff sryy hcba uvz.

15:13 Naq ur fnvq hagb Noenz, Xabj bs n fhergl gung gul frrq funyy or
n fgenatre va n ynaq gung vf abg gurve'f, naq funyy freir gurz; naq
gurl funyy nssyvpg gurz sbhe uhaqerq lrnef; 15:14 Naq nyfb gung
angvba, jubz gurl funyy freir, jvyy V whqtr: naq nsgrejneq funyy gurl
pbzr bhg jvgu terng fhofgnapr.

15:15 Naq gubh funyg tb gb gul snguref va crnpr; gubh funyg or ohevrq
va n tbbq byq ntr.

15:16 Ohg va gur sbhegu trarengvba gurl funyy pbzr uvgure ntnva: sbe
gur vavdhvgl bs gur Nzbevgrf vf abg lrg shyy.

15:17 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung, jura gur fha jrag qbja, naq vg jnf
qnex, orubyq n fzbxvat sheanpr, naq n oheavat ynzc gung cnffrq orgjrra
gubfr cvrprf.

15:18 Va gur fnzr qnl gur YBEQ znqr n pbiranag jvgu Noenz, fnlvat,
Hagb gul frrq unir V tvira guvf ynaq, sebz gur evire bs Rtlcg hagb gur
terng evire, gur evire Rhcuengrf: 15:19 Gur Xravgrf, naq gur
Xravmmvgrf, naq gur Xnqzbavgrf, 15:20 Naq gur Uvggvgrf, naq gur
Crevmmvgrf, naq gur Ercunvzf, 15:21 Naq gur Nzbevgrf, naq gur
Pnannavgrf, naq gur Tvetnfuvgrf, naq gur Wrohfvgrf.

16:1 Abj Fnenv Noenz'f jvsr oner uvz ab puvyqera: naq fur unq na
unaqznvq, na Rtlcgvna, jubfr anzr jnf Untne.

16:2 Naq Fnenv fnvq hagb Noenz, Orubyq abj, gur YBEQ ungu erfgenvarq
zr sebz ornevat: V cenl gurr, tb va hagb zl znvq; vg znl or gung V znl
bognva puvyqera ol ure. Naq Noenz urnexrarq gb gur ibvpr bs Fnenv.

16:3 Naq Fnenv Noenz'f jvsr gbbx Untne ure znvq gur Rtlcgvna, nsgre
Noenz unq qjryg gra lrnef va gur ynaq bs Pnanna, naq tnir ure gb ure
uhfonaq Noenz gb or uvf jvsr.

16:4 Naq ur jrag va hagb Untne, naq fur pbaprvirq: naq jura fur fnj
gung fur unq pbaprvirq, ure zvfgerff jnf qrfcvfrq va ure rlrf.

16:5 Naq Fnenv fnvq hagb Noenz, Zl jebat or hcba gurr: V unir tvira zl
znvq vagb gul obfbz; naq jura fur fnj gung fur unq pbaprvirq, V jnf
qrfcvfrq va ure rlrf: gur YBEQ whqtr orgjrra zr naq gurr.

16:6 Ohg Noenz fnvq hagb Fnenv, Orubyq, gul znvq vf va guvar unaq; qb
gb ure nf vg cyrnfrgu gurr. Naq jura Fnenv qrnyg uneqyl jvgu ure, fur
syrq sebz ure snpr.

16:7 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ sbhaq ure ol n sbhagnva bs jngre va gur
jvyqrearff, ol gur sbhagnva va gur jnl gb Fuhe.

16:8 Naq ur fnvq, Untne, Fnenv'f znvq, jurapr pnzrfg gubh? naq juvgure
jvyg gubh tb? Naq fur fnvq, V syrr sebz gur snpr bs zl zvfgerff Fnenv.

16:9 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ fnvq hagb ure, Erghea gb gul zvfgerff,
naq fhozvg gulfrys haqre ure unaqf.

16:10 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ fnvq hagb ure, V jvyy zhygvcyl gul
frrq rkprrqvatyl, gung vg funyy abg or ahzorerq sbe zhygvghqr.

16:11 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ fnvq hagb ure, Orubyq, gubh neg jvgu
puvyq naq funyg orne n fba, naq funyg pnyy uvf anzr Vfuznry; orpnhfr
gur YBEQ ungu urneq gul nssyvpgvba.

16:12 Naq ur jvyy or n jvyq zna; uvf unaq jvyy or ntnvafg rirel zna,
naq rirel zna'f unaq ntnvafg uvz; naq ur funyy qjryy va gur cerfrapr
bs nyy uvf oerguera.

16:13 Naq fur pnyyrq gur anzr bs gur YBEQ gung fcnxr hagb ure, Gubh
Tbq frrfg zr: sbe fur fnvq, Unir V nyfb urer ybbxrq nsgre uvz gung
frrgu zr?  16:14 Jurersber gur jryy jnf pnyyrq Orreynunvebv; orubyq,
vg vf orgjrra Xnqrfu naq Orerq.

16:15 Naq Untne oner Noenz n fba: naq Noenz pnyyrq uvf fba'f anzr,
juvpu Untne oner, Vfuznry.

16:16 Naq Noenz jnf sbhefpber naq fvk lrnef byq, jura Untne oner
Vfuznry gb Noenz.

17:1 Naq jura Noenz jnf avargl lrnef byq naq avar, gur YBEQ nccrnerq
gb Noenz, naq fnvq hagb uvz, V nz gur Nyzvtugl Tbq; jnyx orsber zr,
naq or gubh cresrpg.

17:2 Naq V jvyy znxr zl pbiranag orgjrra zr naq gurr, naq jvyy
zhygvcyl gurr rkprrqvatyl.

17:3 Naq Noenz sryy ba uvf snpr: naq Tbq gnyxrq jvgu uvz, fnlvat, 17:4
Nf sbe zr, orubyq, zl pbiranag vf jvgu gurr, naq gubh funyg or n
sngure bs znal angvbaf.

17:5 Arvgure funyy gul anzr nal zber or pnyyrq Noenz, ohg gul anzr
funyy or Noenunz; sbe n sngure bs znal angvbaf unir V znqr gurr.

17:6 Naq V jvyy znxr gurr rkprrqvat sehvgshy, naq V jvyy znxr angvbaf
bs gurr, naq xvatf funyy pbzr bhg bs gurr.

17:7 Naq V jvyy rfgnoyvfu zl pbiranag orgjrra zr naq gurr naq gul frrq
nsgre gurr va gurve trarengvbaf sbe na rireynfgvat pbiranag, gb or n
Tbq hagb gurr, naq gb gul frrq nsgre gurr.

17:8 Naq V jvyy tvir hagb gurr, naq gb gul frrq nsgre gurr, gur ynaq
jurerva gubh neg n fgenatre, nyy gur ynaq bs Pnanna, sbe na
rireynfgvat cbffrffvba; naq V jvyy or gurve Tbq.

17:9 Naq Tbq fnvq hagb Noenunz, Gubh funyg xrrc zl pbiranag gurersber,
gubh, naq gul frrq nsgre gurr va gurve trarengvbaf.

17:10 Guvf vf zl pbiranag, juvpu lr funyy xrrc, orgjrra zr naq lbh naq
gul frrq nsgre gurr; Rirel zna puvyq nzbat lbh funyy or pvephzpvfrq.

17:11 Naq lr funyy pvephzpvfr gur syrfu bs lbhe sberfxva; naq vg funyy
or n gbxra bs gur pbiranag orgjvkg zr naq lbh.

17:12 Naq ur gung vf rvtug qnlf byq funyy or pvephzpvfrq nzbat lbh,
rirel zna puvyq va lbhe trarengvbaf, ur gung vf obea va gur ubhfr, be
obhtug jvgu zbarl bs nal fgenatre, juvpu vf abg bs gul frrq.

17:13 Ur gung vf obea va gul ubhfr, naq ur gung vf obhtug jvgu gul
zbarl, zhfg arrqf or pvephzpvfrq: naq zl pbiranag funyy or va lbhe
syrfu sbe na rireynfgvat pbiranag.

17:14 Naq gur hapvephzpvfrq zna puvyq jubfr syrfu bs uvf sberfxva vf
abg pvephzpvfrq, gung fbhy funyy or phg bss sebz uvf crbcyr; ur ungu
oebxra zl pbiranag.

17:15 Naq Tbq fnvq hagb Noenunz, Nf sbe Fnenv gul jvsr, gubh funyg abg
pnyy ure anzr Fnenv, ohg Fnenu funyy ure anzr or.

17:16 Naq V jvyy oyrff ure, naq tvir gurr n fba nyfb bs ure: lrn, V
jvyy oyrff ure, naq fur funyy or n zbgure bs angvbaf; xvatf bs crbcyr
funyy or bs ure.

17:17 Gura Noenunz sryy hcba uvf snpr, naq ynhturq, naq fnvq va uvf
urneg, Funyy n puvyq or obea hagb uvz gung vf na uhaqerq lrnef byq?
naq funyy Fnenu, gung vf avargl lrnef byq, orne?  17:18 Naq Noenunz
fnvq hagb Tbq, B gung Vfuznry zvtug yvir orsber gurr!  17:19 Naq Tbq
fnvq, Fnenu gul jvsr funyy orne gurr n fba vaqrrq; naq gubh funyg pnyy
uvf anzr Vfnnp: naq V jvyy rfgnoyvfu zl pbiranag jvgu uvz sbe na
rireynfgvat pbiranag, naq jvgu uvf frrq nsgre uvz.

17:20 Naq nf sbe Vfuznry, V unir urneq gurr: Orubyq, V unir oyrffrq
uvz, naq jvyy znxr uvz sehvgshy, naq jvyy zhygvcyl uvz rkprrqvatyl;
gjryir cevaprf funyy ur ortrg, naq V jvyy znxr uvz n terng angvba.

17:21 Ohg zl pbiranag jvyy V rfgnoyvfu jvgu Vfnnp, juvpu Fnenu funyy
orne hagb gurr ng guvf frg gvzr va gur arkg lrne.

17:22 Naq ur yrsg bss gnyxvat jvgu uvz, naq Tbq jrag hc sebz Noenunz.

17:23 Naq Noenunz gbbx Vfuznry uvf fba, naq nyy gung jrer obea va uvf
ubhfr, naq nyy gung jrer obhtug jvgu uvf zbarl, rirel znyr nzbat gur
zra bs Noenunz'f ubhfr; naq pvephzpvfrq gur syrfu bs gurve sberfxva va
gur frysfnzr qnl, nf Tbq unq fnvq hagb uvz.

17:24 Naq Noenunz jnf avargl lrnef byq naq avar, jura ur jnf
pvephzpvfrq va gur syrfu bs uvf sberfxva.

17:25 Naq Vfuznry uvf fba jnf guvegrra lrnef byq, jura ur jnf
pvephzpvfrq va gur syrfu bs uvf sberfxva.

17:26 Va gur frysfnzr qnl jnf Noenunz pvephzpvfrq, naq Vfuznry uvf
fba.

17:27 Naq nyy gur zra bs uvf ubhfr, obea va gur ubhfr, naq obhtug jvgu
zbarl bs gur fgenatre, jrer pvephzpvfrq jvgu uvz.

18:1 Naq gur YBEQ nccrnerq hagb uvz va gur cynvaf bs Znzer: naq ur fng
va gur grag qbbe va gur urng bs gur qnl; 18:2 Naq ur yvsg hc uvf rlrf
naq ybbxrq, naq, yb, guerr zra fgbbq ol uvz: naq jura ur fnj gurz, ur
ena gb zrrg gurz sebz gur grag qbbe, naq objrq uvzfrys gbjneq gur
tebhaq, 18:3 Naq fnvq, Zl YBEQ, vs abj V unir sbhaq snibhe va gul
fvtug, cnff abg njnl, V cenl gurr, sebz gul freinag: 18:4 Yrg n yvggyr
jngre, V cenl lbh, or srgpurq, naq jnfu lbhe srrg, naq erfg lbhefryirf
haqre gur gerr: 18:5 Naq V jvyy srgpu n zbefry bs oernq, naq pbzsbeg
lr lbhe urnegf; nsgre gung lr funyy cnff ba: sbe gurersber ner lr pbzr
gb lbhe freinag. Naq gurl fnvq, Fb qb, nf gubh unfg fnvq.

18:6 Naq Noenunz unfgrarq vagb gur grag hagb Fnenu, naq fnvq, Znxr
ernql dhvpxyl guerr zrnfherf bs svar zrny, xarnq vg, naq znxr pnxrf
hcba gur urnegu.

18:7 Naq Noenunz ena hagb gur ureq, naq srgpug n pnys graqre naq tbbq,
naq tnir vg hagb n lbhat zna; naq ur unfgrq gb qerff vg.

18:8 Naq ur gbbx ohggre, naq zvyx, naq gur pnys juvpu ur unq qerffrq,
naq frg vg orsber gurz; naq ur fgbbq ol gurz haqre gur gerr, naq gurl
qvq rng.

18:9 Naq gurl fnvq hagb uvz, Jurer vf Fnenu gul jvsr? Naq ur fnvq,
Orubyq, va gur grag.

18:10 Naq ur fnvq, V jvyy pregnvayl erghea hagb gurr nppbeqvat gb gur
gvzr bs yvsr; naq, yb, Fnenu gul jvsr funyy unir n fba. Naq Fnenu
urneq vg va gur grag qbbe, juvpu jnf oruvaq uvz.

18:11 Abj Noenunz naq Fnenu jrer byq naq jryy fgevpxra va ntr; naq vg
prnfrq gb or jvgu Fnenu nsgre gur znaare bs jbzra.

18:12 Gurersber Fnenu ynhturq jvguva urefrys, fnlvat, Nsgre V nz jnkrq
byq funyy V unir cyrnfher, zl ybeq orvat byq nyfb?  18:13 Naq gur YBEQ
fnvq hagb Noenunz, Jurersber qvq Fnenu ynhtu, fnlvat, Funyy V bs n
fhergl orne n puvyq, juvpu nz byq?  18:14 Vf nal guvat gbb uneq sbe
gur YBEQ? Ng gur gvzr nccbvagrq V jvyy erghea hagb gurr, nppbeqvat gb
gur gvzr bs yvsr, naq Fnenu funyy unir n fba.

18:15 Gura Fnenu qravrq, fnlvat, V ynhturq abg; sbe fur jnf nsenvq.
Naq ur fnvq, Anl; ohg gubh qvqfg ynhtu.

18:16 Naq gur zra ebfr hc sebz gurapr, naq ybbxrq gbjneq Fbqbz: naq
Noenunz jrag jvgu gurz gb oevat gurz ba gur jnl.

18:17 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Funyy V uvqr sebz Noenunz gung guvat juvpu V
qb; 18:18 Frrvat gung Noenunz funyy fheryl orpbzr n terng naq zvtugl
angvba, naq nyy gur angvbaf bs gur rnegu funyy or oyrffrq va uvz?
18:19 Sbe V xabj uvz, gung ur jvyy pbzznaq uvf puvyqera naq uvf
ubhfrubyq nsgre uvz, naq gurl funyy xrrc gur jnl bs gur YBEQ, gb qb
whfgvpr naq whqtzrag; gung gur YBEQ znl oevat hcba Noenunz gung juvpu
ur ungu fcbxra bs uvz.

18:20 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Orpnhfr gur pel bs Fbqbz naq Tbzbeenu vf
terng, naq orpnhfr gurve fva vf irel tevribhf; 18:21 V jvyy tb qbja
abj, naq frr jurgure gurl unir qbar nygbtrgure nppbeqvat gb gur pel bs
vg, juvpu vf pbzr hagb zr; naq vs abg, V jvyy xabj.

18:22 Naq gur zra ghearq gurve snprf sebz gurapr, naq jrag gbjneq
Fbqbz: ohg Noenunz fgbbq lrg orsber gur YBEQ.

18:23 Naq Noenunz qerj arne, naq fnvq, Jvyg gubh nyfb qrfgebl gur
evtugrbhf jvgu gur jvpxrq?  18:24 Crenqiragher gurer or svsgl
evtugrbhf jvguva gur pvgl: jvyg gubh nyfb qrfgebl naq abg fcner gur
cynpr sbe gur svsgl evtugrbhf gung ner gurerva?  18:25 Gung or sne
sebz gurr gb qb nsgre guvf znaare, gb fynl gur evtugrbhf jvgu gur
jvpxrq: naq gung gur evtugrbhf fubhyq or nf gur jvpxrq, gung or sne
sebz gurr: Funyy abg gur Whqtr bs nyy gur rnegu qb evtug?  18:26 Naq
gur YBEQ fnvq, Vs V svaq va Fbqbz svsgl evtugrbhf jvguva gur pvgl,
gura V jvyy fcner nyy gur cynpr sbe gurve fnxrf.

18:27 Naq Noenunz nafjrerq naq fnvq, Orubyq abj, V unir gnxra hcba zr
gb fcrnx hagb gur YBEQ, juvpu nz ohg qhfg naq nfurf: 18:28
Crenqiragher gurer funyy ynpx svir bs gur svsgl evtugrbhf: jvyg gubh
qrfgebl nyy gur pvgl sbe ynpx bs svir? Naq ur fnvq, Vs V svaq gurer
sbegl naq svir, V jvyy abg qrfgebl vg.

18:29 Naq ur fcnxr hagb uvz lrg ntnva, naq fnvq, Crenqiragher gurer
funyy or sbegl sbhaq gurer. Naq ur fnvq, V jvyy abg qb vg sbe sbegl'f
fnxr.

18:30 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Bu yrg abg gur YBEQ or natel, naq V jvyy
fcrnx: Crenqiragher gurer funyy guvegl or sbhaq gurer. Naq ur fnvq, V
jvyy abg qb vg, vs V svaq guvegl gurer.

18:31 Naq ur fnvq, Orubyq abj, V unir gnxra hcba zr gb fcrnx hagb gur
YBEQ: Crenqiragher gurer funyy or gjragl sbhaq gurer. Naq ur fnvq, V
jvyy abg qrfgebl vg sbe gjragl'f fnxr.

18:32 Naq ur fnvq, Bu yrg abg gur YBEQ or natel, naq V jvyy fcrnx lrg
ohg guvf bapr: Crenqiragher gra funyy or sbhaq gurer. Naq ur fnvq, V
jvyy abg qrfgebl vg sbe gra'f fnxr.

18:33 Naq gur YBEQ jrag uvf jnl, nf fbba nf ur unq yrsg pbzzhavat jvgu
Noenunz: naq Noenunz erghearq hagb uvf cynpr.

19:1 Naq gurer pnzr gjb natryf gb Fbqbz ng rira; naq Ybg fng va gur
tngr bs Fbqbz: naq Ybg frrvat gurz ebfr hc gb zrrg gurz; naq ur objrq
uvzfrys jvgu uvf snpr gbjneq gur tebhaq; 19:2 Naq ur fnvq, Orubyq abj,
zl ybeqf, ghea va, V cenl lbh, vagb lbhe freinag'f ubhfr, naq gneel
nyy avtug, naq jnfu lbhe srrg, naq lr funyy evfr hc rneyl, naq tb ba
lbhe jnlf. Naq gurl fnvq, Anl; ohg jr jvyy novqr va gur fgerrg nyy
avtug.

19:3 Naq ur cerffrq hcba gurz terngyl; naq gurl ghearq va hagb uvz,
naq ragrerq vagb uvf ubhfr; naq ur znqr gurz n srnfg, naq qvq onxr
hayrnirarq oernq, naq gurl qvq rng.

19:4 Ohg orsber gurl ynl qbja, gur zra bs gur pvgl, rira gur zra bs
Fbqbz, pbzcnffrq gur ubhfr ebhaq, obgu byq naq lbhat, nyy gur crbcyr
sebz rirel dhnegre: 19:5 Naq gurl pnyyrq hagb Ybg, naq fnvq hagb uvz,
Jurer ner gur zra juvpu pnzr va gb gurr guvf avtug? oevat gurz bhg
hagb hf, gung jr znl xabj gurz.

19:6 Naq Ybg jrag bhg ng gur qbbe hagb gurz, naq fuhg gur qbbe nsgre
uvz, 19:7 Naq fnvq, V cenl lbh, oerguera, qb abg fb jvpxrqyl.

19:8 Orubyq abj, V unir gjb qnhtugref juvpu unir abg xabja zna; yrg
zr, V cenl lbh, oevat gurz bhg hagb lbh, naq qb lr gb gurz nf vf tbbq
va lbhe rlrf: bayl hagb gurfr zra qb abguvat; sbe gurersber pnzr gurl
haqre gur funqbj bs zl ebbs.

19:9 Naq gurl fnvq, Fgnaq onpx. Naq gurl fnvq ntnva, Guvf bar sryybj
pnzr va gb fbwbhea, naq ur jvyy arrqf or n whqtr: abj jvyy jr qrny
jbefr jvgu gurr, guna jvgu gurz. Naq gurl cerffrq fber hcba gur zna,
rira Ybg, naq pnzr arne gb oernx gur qbbe.

19:10 Ohg gur zra chg sbegu gurve unaq, naq chyyrq Ybg vagb gur ubhfr
gb gurz, naq fuhg gb gur qbbe.

19:11 Naq gurl fzbgr gur zra gung jrer ng gur qbbe bs gur ubhfr jvgu
oyvaqarff, obgu fznyy naq terng: fb gung gurl jrnevrq gurzfryirf gb
svaq gur qbbe.

19:12 Naq gur zra fnvq hagb Ybg, Unfg gubh urer nal orfvqrf? fba va
ynj, naq gul fbaf, naq gul qnhtugref, naq jungfbrire gubh unfg va gur
pvgl, oevat gurz bhg bs guvf cynpr: 19:13 Sbe jr jvyy qrfgebl guvf
cynpr, orpnhfr gur pel bs gurz vf jnkra terng orsber gur snpr bs gur
YBEQ; naq gur YBEQ ungu frag hf gb qrfgebl vg.

19:14 Naq Ybg jrag bhg, naq fcnxr hagb uvf fbaf va ynj, juvpu zneevrq
uvf qnhtugref, naq fnvq, Hc, trg lbh bhg bs guvf cynpr; sbe gur YBEQ
jvyy qrfgebl guvf pvgl. Ohg ur frrzrq nf bar gung zbpxrq hagb uvf fbaf
va ynj.

19:15 Naq jura gur zbeavat nebfr, gura gur natryf unfgrarq Ybg,
fnlvat, Nevfr, gnxr gul jvsr, naq gul gjb qnhtugref, juvpu ner urer;
yrfg gubh or pbafhzrq va gur vavdhvgl bs gur pvgl.

19:16 Naq juvyr ur yvatrerq, gur zra ynvq ubyq hcba uvf unaq, naq hcba
gur unaq bs uvf jvsr, naq hcba gur unaq bs uvf gjb qnhtugref; gur YBEQ
orvat zrepvshy hagb uvz: naq gurl oebhtug uvz sbegu, naq frg uvz
jvgubhg gur pvgl.

19:17 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gurl unq oebhtug gurz sbegu noebnq,
gung ur fnvq, Rfpncr sbe gul yvsr; ybbx abg oruvaq gurr, arvgure fgnl
gubh va nyy gur cynva; rfpncr gb gur zbhagnva, yrfg gubh or pbafhzrq.

19:18 Naq Ybg fnvq hagb gurz, Bu, abg fb, zl YBEQ: 19:19 Orubyq abj,
gul freinag ungu sbhaq tenpr va gul fvtug, naq gubh unfg zntavsvrq gul
zrepl, juvpu gubh unfg furjrq hagb zr va fnivat zl yvsr; naq V pnaabg
rfpncr gb gur zbhagnva, yrfg fbzr rivy gnxr zr, naq V qvr: 19:20
Orubyq abj, guvf pvgl vf arne gb syrr hagb, naq vg vf n yvggyr bar:
Bu, yrg zr rfpncr guvgure, (vf vg abg n yvggyr bar?) naq zl fbhy funyy
yvir.

19:21 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Frr, V unir npprcgrq gurr pbapreavat guvf
guvat nyfb, gung V jvyy abg bireguebj guvf pvgl, sbe gur juvpu gubh
unfg fcbxra.

19:22 Unfgr gurr, rfpncr guvgure; sbe V pnaabg qb nalguvat gvyy gubh
or pbzr guvgure. Gurersber gur anzr bs gur pvgl jnf pnyyrq Mbne.

19:23 Gur fha jnf evfra hcba gur rnegu jura Ybg ragrerq vagb Mbne.

19:24 Gura gur YBEQ envarq hcba Fbqbz naq hcba Tbzbeenu oevzfgbar naq
sver sebz gur YBEQ bhg bs urnira; 19:25 Naq ur bireguerj gubfr pvgvrf,
naq nyy gur cynva, naq nyy gur vaunovgnagf bs gur pvgvrf, naq gung
juvpu terj hcba gur tebhaq.

19:26 Ohg uvf jvsr ybbxrq onpx sebz oruvaq uvz, naq fur orpnzr n
cvyyne bs fnyg.

19:27 Naq Noenunz tng hc rneyl va gur zbeavat gb gur cynpr jurer ur
fgbbq orsber gur YBEQ: 19:28 Naq ur ybbxrq gbjneq Fbqbz naq Tbzbeenu,
naq gbjneq nyy gur ynaq bs gur cynva, naq oruryq, naq, yb, gur fzbxr
bs gur pbhagel jrag hc nf gur fzbxr bs n sheanpr.

19:29 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Tbq qrfgeblrq gur pvgvrf bs gur cynva,
gung Tbq erzrzorerq Noenunz, naq frag Ybg bhg bs gur zvqfg bs gur
bireguebj, jura ur bireguerj gur pvgvrf va gur juvpu Ybg qjryg.

19:30 Naq Ybg jrag hc bhg bs Mbne, naq qjryg va gur zbhagnva, naq uvf
gjb qnhtugref jvgu uvz; sbe ur srnerq gb qjryy va Mbne: naq ur qjryg
va n pnir, ur naq uvf gjb qnhtugref.

19:31 Naq gur svefgobea fnvq hagb gur lbhatre, Bhe sngure vf byq, naq
gurer vf abg n zna va gur rnegu gb pbzr va hagb hf nsgre gur znaare bs
nyy gur rnegu: 19:32 Pbzr, yrg hf znxr bhe sngure qevax jvar, naq jr
jvyy yvr jvgu uvz, gung jr znl cerfreir frrq bs bhe sngure.

19:33 Naq gurl znqr gurve sngure qevax jvar gung avtug: naq gur
svefgobea jrag va, naq ynl jvgu ure sngure; naq ur creprvirq abg jura
fur ynl qbja, abe jura fur nebfr.

19:34 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur zbeebj, gung gur svefgobea fnvq hagb
gur lbhatre, Orubyq, V ynl lrfgreavtug jvgu zl sngure: yrg hf znxr uvz
qevax jvar guvf avtug nyfb; naq tb gubh va, naq yvr jvgu uvz, gung jr
znl cerfreir frrq bs bhe sngure.

19:35 Naq gurl znqr gurve sngure qevax jvar gung avtug nyfb: naq gur
lbhatre nebfr, naq ynl jvgu uvz; naq ur creprvirq abg jura fur ynl
qbja, abe jura fur nebfr.

19:36 Guhf jrer obgu gur qnhtugref bs Ybg jvgu puvyq ol gurve sngure.

19:37 Naq gur svefg obea oner n fba, naq pnyyrq uvf anzr Zbno: gur
fnzr vf gur sngure bs gur Zbnovgrf hagb guvf qnl.

19:38 Naq gur lbhatre, fur nyfb oner n fba, naq pnyyrq uvf anzr
Oranzzv: gur fnzr vf gur sngure bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba hagb guvf
qnl.

20:1 Naq Noenunz wbhearlrq sebz gurapr gbjneq gur fbhgu pbhagel, naq
qjryyrq orgjrra Xnqrfu naq Fuhe, naq fbwbhearq va Trene.

20:2 Naq Noenunz fnvq bs Fnenu uvf jvsr, Fur vf zl fvfgre: naq
Novzryrpu xvat bs Trene frag, naq gbbx Fnenu.

20:3 Ohg Tbq pnzr gb Novzryrpu va n qernz ol avtug, naq fnvq gb uvz,
Orubyq, gubh neg ohg n qrnq zna, sbe gur jbzna juvpu gubh unfg gnxra;
sbe fur vf n zna'f jvsr.

20:4 Ohg Novzryrpu unq abg pbzr arne ure: naq ur fnvq, YBEQ, jvyg gubh
fynl nyfb n evtugrbhf angvba?  20:5 Fnvq ur abg hagb zr, Fur vf zl
fvfgre? naq fur, rira fur urefrys fnvq, Ur vf zl oebgure: va gur
vagrtevgl bs zl urneg naq vaabprapl bs zl unaqf unir V qbar guvf.

20:6 Naq Tbq fnvq hagb uvz va n qernz, Lrn, V xabj gung gubh qvqfg
guvf va gur vagrtevgl bs gul urneg; sbe V nyfb jvguuryq gurr sebz
fvaavat ntnvafg zr: gurersber fhssrerq V gurr abg gb gbhpu ure.

20:7 Abj gurersber erfgber gur zna uvf jvsr; sbe ur vf n cebcurg, naq
ur funyy cenl sbe gurr, naq gubh funyg yvir: naq vs gubh erfgber ure
abg, xabj gubh gung gubh funyg fheryl qvr, gubh, naq nyy gung ner
guvar.

20:8 Gurersber Novzryrpu ebfr rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq pnyyrq nyy uvf
freinagf, naq gbyq nyy gurfr guvatf va gurve rnef: naq gur zra jrer
fber nsenvq.

20:9 Gura Novzryrpu pnyyrq Noenunz, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Jung unfg gubh
qbar hagb hf? naq jung unir V bssraqrq gurr, gung gubh unfg oebhtug ba
zr naq ba zl xvatqbz n terng fva? gubh unfg qbar qrrqf hagb zr gung
bhtug abg gb or qbar.

20:10 Naq Novzryrpu fnvq hagb Noenunz, Jung fnjrfg gubh, gung gubh
unfg qbar guvf guvat?  20:11 Naq Noenunz fnvq, Orpnhfr V gubhtug,
Fheryl gur srne bs Tbq vf abg va guvf cynpr; naq gurl jvyy fynl zr sbe
zl jvsr'f fnxr.

20:12 Naq lrg vaqrrq fur vf zl fvfgre; fur vf gur qnhtugre bs zl
sngure, ohg abg gur qnhtugre bs zl zbgure; naq fur orpnzr zl jvsr.

20:13 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Tbq pnhfrq zr gb jnaqre sebz zl
sngure'f ubhfr, gung V fnvq hagb ure, Guvf vf gul xvaqarff juvpu gubh
funyg furj hagb zr; ng rirel cynpr juvgure jr funyy pbzr, fnl bs zr,
Ur vf zl oebgure.

20:14 Naq Novzryrpu gbbx furrc, naq bkra, naq zrafreinagf, naq
jbzrafreinagf, naq tnir gurz hagb Noenunz, naq erfgberq uvz Fnenu uvf
jvsr.

20:15 Naq Novzryrpu fnvq, Orubyq, zl ynaq vf orsber gurr: qjryy jurer
vg cyrnfrgu gurr.

20:16 Naq hagb Fnenu ur fnvq, Orubyq, V unir tvira gul oebgure n
gubhfnaq cvrprf bs fvyire: orubyq, ur vf gb gurr n pbirevat bs gur
rlrf, hagb nyy gung ner jvgu gurr, naq jvgu nyy bgure: guhf fur jnf
ercebirq.

20:17 Fb Noenunz cenlrq hagb Tbq: naq Tbq urnyrq Novzryrpu, naq uvf
jvsr, naq uvf znvqfreinagf; naq gurl oner puvyqera.

20:18 Sbe gur YBEQ unq snfg pybfrq hc nyy gur jbzof bs gur ubhfr bs
Novzryrpu, orpnhfr bs Fnenu Noenunz'f jvsr.

21:1 Naq gur YBEQ ivfvgrq Fnenu nf ur unq fnvq, naq gur YBEQ qvq hagb
Fnenu nf ur unq fcbxra.

21:2 Sbe Fnenu pbaprvirq, naq oner Noenunz n fba va uvf byq ntr, ng
gur frg gvzr bs juvpu Tbq unq fcbxra gb uvz.

21:3 Naq Noenunz pnyyrq gur anzr bs uvf fba gung jnf obea hagb uvz,
jubz Fnenu oner gb uvz, Vfnnp.

21:4 Naq Noenunz pvephzpvfrq uvf fba Vfnnp orvat rvtug qnlf byq, nf
Tbq unq pbzznaqrq uvz.

21:5 Naq Noenunz jnf na uhaqerq lrnef byq, jura uvf fba Vfnnp jnf obea
hagb uvz.

21:6 Naq Fnenu fnvq, Tbq ungu znqr zr gb ynhtu, fb gung nyy gung urne
jvyy ynhtu jvgu zr.

21:7 Naq fur fnvq, Jub jbhyq unir fnvq hagb Noenunz, gung Fnenu fubhyq
unir tvira puvyqera fhpx? sbe V unir obea uvz n fba va uvf byq ntr.

21:8 Naq gur puvyq terj, naq jnf jrnarq: naq Noenunz znqr n terng
srnfg gur fnzr qnl gung Vfnnp jnf jrnarq.

21:9 Naq Fnenu fnj gur fba bs Untne gur Rtlcgvna, juvpu fur unq obea
hagb Noenunz, zbpxvat.

21:10 Jurersber fur fnvq hagb Noenunz, Pnfg bhg guvf obaqjbzna naq ure
fba: sbe gur fba bs guvf obaqjbzna funyy abg or urve jvgu zl fba, rira
jvgu Vfnnp.

21:11 Naq gur guvat jnf irel tevribhf va Noenunz'f fvtug orpnhfr bs
uvf fba.

21:12 Naq Tbq fnvq hagb Noenunz, Yrg vg abg or tevribhf va gul fvtug
orpnhfr bs gur ynq, naq orpnhfr bs gul obaqjbzna; va nyy gung Fnenu
ungu fnvq hagb gurr, urnexra hagb ure ibvpr; sbe va Vfnnp funyy gul
frrq or pnyyrq.

21:13 Naq nyfb bs gur fba bs gur obaqjbzna jvyy V znxr n angvba,
orpnhfr ur vf gul frrq.

21:14 Naq Noenunz ebfr hc rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq gbbx oernq, naq n
obggyr bs jngre, naq tnir vg hagb Untne, chggvat vg ba ure fubhyqre,
naq gur puvyq, naq frag ure njnl: naq fur qrcnegrq, naq jnaqrerq va
gur jvyqrearff bs Orrefuron.

21:15 Naq gur jngre jnf fcrag va gur obggyr, naq fur pnfg gur puvyq
haqre bar bs gur fuehof.

21:16 Naq fur jrag, naq fng ure qbja bire ntnvafg uvz n tbbq jnl bss,
nf vg jrer n obj fubg: sbe fur fnvq, Yrg zr abg frr gur qrngu bs gur
puvyq. Naq fur fng bire ntnvafg uvz, naq yvsg hc ure ibvpr, naq jrcg.

21:17 Naq Tbq urneq gur ibvpr bs gur ynq; naq gur natry bs Tbq pnyyrq
gb Untne bhg bs urnira, naq fnvq hagb ure, Jung nvyrgu gurr, Untne?
srne abg; sbe Tbq ungu urneq gur ibvpr bs gur ynq jurer ur vf.

21:18 Nevfr, yvsg hc gur ynq, naq ubyq uvz va guvar unaq; sbe V jvyy
znxr uvz n terng angvba.

21:19 Naq Tbq bcrarq ure rlrf, naq fur fnj n jryy bs jngre; naq fur
jrag, naq svyyrq gur obggyr jvgu jngre, naq tnir gur ynq qevax.

21:20 Naq Tbq jnf jvgu gur ynq; naq ur terj, naq qjryg va gur
jvyqrearff, naq orpnzr na nepure.

21:21 Naq ur qjryg va gur jvyqrearff bs Cnena: naq uvf zbgure gbbx uvz
n jvsr bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

21:22 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gung gvzr, gung Novzryrpu naq Cuvpuby gur
puvrs pncgnva bs uvf ubfg fcnxr hagb Noenunz, fnlvat, Tbq vf jvgu gurr
va nyy gung gubh qbrfg: 21:23 Abj gurersber fjrne hagb zr urer ol Tbq
gung gubh jvyg abg qrny snyfryl jvgu zr, abe jvgu zl fba, abe jvgu zl
fba'f fba: ohg nppbeqvat gb gur xvaqarff gung V unir qbar hagb gurr,
gubh funyg qb hagb zr, naq gb gur ynaq jurerva gubh unfg fbwbhearq.

21:24 Naq Noenunz fnvq, V jvyy fjrne.

21:25 Naq Noenunz ercebirq Novzryrpu orpnhfr bs n jryy bs jngre, juvpu
Novzryrpu'f freinagf unq ivbyragyl gnxra njnl.

21:26 Naq Novzryrpu fnvq, V jbg abg jub ungu qbar guvf guvat; arvgure
qvqfg gubh gryy zr, arvgure lrg urneq V bs vg, ohg gb qnl.

21:27 Naq Noenunz gbbx furrc naq bkra, naq tnir gurz hagb Novzryrpu;
naq obgu bs gurz znqr n pbiranag.

21:28 Naq Noenunz frg frira rjr ynzof bs gur sybpx ol gurzfryirf.

21:29 Naq Novzryrpu fnvq hagb Noenunz, Jung zrna gurfr frira rjr ynzof
juvpu gubh unfg frg ol gurzfryirf?  21:30 Naq ur fnvq, Sbe gurfr frira
rjr ynzof funyg gubh gnxr bs zl unaq, gung gurl znl or n jvgarff hagb
zr, gung V unir qvttrq guvf jryy.

21:31 Jurersber ur pnyyrq gung cynpr Orrefuron; orpnhfr gurer gurl
fjner obgu bs gurz.

21:32 Guhf gurl znqr n pbiranag ng Orrefuron: gura Novzryrpu ebfr hc,
naq Cuvpuby gur puvrs pncgnva bs uvf ubfg, naq gurl erghearq vagb gur
ynaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

21:33 Naq Noenunz cynagrq n tebir va Orrefuron, naq pnyyrq gurer ba
gur anzr bs gur YBEQ, gur rireynfgvat Tbq.

21:34 Naq Noenunz fbwbhearq va gur Cuvyvfgvarf' ynaq znal qnlf.

22:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre gurfr guvatf, gung Tbq qvq grzcg
Noenunz, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Noenunz: naq ur fnvq, Orubyq, urer V nz.

22:2 Naq ur fnvq, Gnxr abj gul fba, guvar bayl fba Vfnnp, jubz gubh
ybirfg, naq trg gurr vagb gur ynaq bs Zbevnu; naq bssre uvz gurer sbe
n oheag bssrevat hcba bar bs gur zbhagnvaf juvpu V jvyy gryy gurr bs.

22:3 Naq Noenunz ebfr hc rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq fnqqyrq uvf nff,
naq gbbx gjb bs uvf lbhat zra jvgu uvz, naq Vfnnp uvf fba, naq pynir
gur jbbq sbe gur oheag bssrevat, naq ebfr hc, naq jrag hagb gur cynpr
bs juvpu Tbq unq gbyq uvz.

22:4 Gura ba gur guveq qnl Noenunz yvsgrq hc uvf rlrf, naq fnj gur
cynpr nsne bss.

22:5 Naq Noenunz fnvq hagb uvf lbhat zra, Novqr lr urer jvgu gur nff;
naq V naq gur ynq jvyy tb lbaqre naq jbefuvc, naq pbzr ntnva gb lbh.

22:6 Naq Noenunz gbbx gur jbbq bs gur oheag bssrevat, naq ynvq vg hcba
Vfnnp uvf fba; naq ur gbbx gur sver va uvf unaq, naq n xavsr; naq gurl
jrag obgu bs gurz gbtrgure.

22:7 Naq Vfnnp fcnxr hagb Noenunz uvf sngure, naq fnvq, Zl sngure: naq
ur fnvq, Urer nz V, zl fba. Naq ur fnvq, Orubyq gur sver naq gur jbbq:
ohg jurer vf gur ynzo sbe n oheag bssrevat?  22:8 Naq Noenunz fnvq, Zl
fba, Tbq jvyy cebivqr uvzfrys n ynzo sbe n oheag bssrevat: fb gurl
jrag obgu bs gurz gbtrgure.

22:9 Naq gurl pnzr gb gur cynpr juvpu Tbq unq gbyq uvz bs; naq Noenunz
ohvyg na nygne gurer, naq ynvq gur jbbq va beqre, naq obhaq Vfnnp uvf
fba, naq ynvq uvz ba gur nygne hcba gur jbbq.

22:10 Naq Noenunz fgergpurq sbegu uvf unaq, naq gbbx gur xavsr gb fynl
uvf fba.

22:11 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ pnyyrq hagb uvz bhg bs urnira, naq
fnvq, Noenunz, Noenunz: naq ur fnvq, Urer nz V.

22:12 Naq ur fnvq, Ynl abg guvar unaq hcba gur ynq, arvgure qb gubh
nal guvat hagb uvz: sbe abj V xabj gung gubh srnerfg Tbq, frrvat gubh
unfg abg jvguuryq gul fba, guvar bayl fba sebz zr.

22:13 Naq Noenunz yvsgrq hc uvf rlrf, naq ybbxrq, naq orubyq oruvaq
uvz n enz pnhtug va n guvpxrg ol uvf ubeaf: naq Noenunz jrag naq gbbx
gur enz, naq bssrerq uvz hc sbe n oheag bssrevat va gur fgrnq bs uvf
fba.

22:14 Naq Noenunz pnyyrq gur anzr bs gung cynpr Wrubinuwveru: nf vg vf
fnvq gb guvf qnl, Va gur zbhag bs gur YBEQ vg funyy or frra.

22:15 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ pnyyrq hagb Noenunz bhg bs urnira gur
frpbaq gvzr, 22:16 Naq fnvq, Ol zlfrys unir V fjbea, fnvgu gur YBEQ,
sbe orpnhfr gubh unfg qbar guvf guvat, naq unfg abg jvguuryq gul fba,
guvar bayl fba: 22:17 Gung va oyrffvat V jvyy oyrff gurr, naq va
zhygvcylvat V jvyy zhygvcyl gul frrq nf gur fgnef bs gur urnira, naq
nf gur fnaq juvpu vf hcba gur frn fuber; naq gul frrq funyy cbffrff
gur tngr bs uvf rarzvrf; 22:18 Naq va gul frrq funyy nyy gur angvbaf
bs gur rnegu or oyrffrq; orpnhfr gubh unfg borlrq zl ibvpr.

22:19 Fb Noenunz erghearq hagb uvf lbhat zra, naq gurl ebfr hc naq
jrag gbtrgure gb Orrefuron; naq Noenunz qjryg ng Orrefuron.

22:20 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre gurfr guvatf, gung vg jnf gbyq
Noenunz, fnlvat, Orubyq, Zvypnu, fur ungu nyfb obea puvyqera hagb gul
oebgure Anube; 22:21 Uhm uvf svefgobea, naq Ohm uvf oebgure, naq
Xrzhry gur sngure bs Nenz, 22:22 Naq Purfrq, naq Unmb, naq Cvyqnfu,
naq Wvqyncu, naq Orguhry.

22:23 Naq Orguhry ortng Erorxnu: gurfr rvtug Zvypnu qvq orne gb Anube,
Noenunz'f oebgure.

22:24 Naq uvf pbaphovar, jubfr anzr jnf Erhznu, fur oner nyfb Gronu,
naq Tnunz, naq Gununfu, naq Znnpunu.

23:1 Naq Fnenu jnf na uhaqerq naq frira naq gjragl lrnef byq: gurfr
jrer gur lrnef bs gur yvsr bs Fnenu.

23:2 Naq Fnenu qvrq va Xvewnguneon; gur fnzr vf Uroeba va gur ynaq bs
Pnanna: naq Noenunz pnzr gb zbhea sbe Fnenu, naq gb jrrc sbe ure.

23:3 Naq Noenunz fgbbq hc sebz orsber uvf qrnq, naq fcnxr hagb gur
fbaf bs Urgu, fnlvat, 23:4 V nz n fgenatre naq n fbwbheare jvgu lbh:
tvir zr n cbffrffvba bs n ohelvatcynpr jvgu lbh, gung V znl ohel zl
qrnq bhg bs zl fvtug.

23:5 Naq gur puvyqera bs Urgu nafjrerq Noenunz, fnlvat hagb uvz, 23:6
Urne hf, zl ybeq: gubh neg n zvtugl cevapr nzbat hf: va gur pubvpr bs
bhe frchypuerf ohel gul qrnq; abar bs hf funyy jvguubyq sebz gurr uvf
frchypuer, ohg gung gubh znlrfg ohel gul qrnq.

23:7 Naq Noenunz fgbbq hc, naq objrq uvzfrys gb gur crbcyr bs gur
ynaq, rira gb gur puvyqera bs Urgu.

23:8 Naq ur pbzzharq jvgu gurz, fnlvat, Vs vg or lbhe zvaq gung V
fubhyq ohel zl qrnq bhg bs zl fvtug; urne zr, naq vagerng sbe zr gb
Rcueba gur fba bs Mbune, 23:9 Gung ur znl tvir zr gur pnir bs
Znpucrynu, juvpu ur ungu, juvpu vf va gur raq bs uvf svryq; sbe nf
zhpu zbarl nf vg vf jbegu ur funyy tvir vg zr sbe n cbffrffvba bs n
ohelvatcynpr nzbatfg lbh.

23:10 Naq Rcueba qjryg nzbat gur puvyqera bs Urgu: naq Rcueba gur
Uvggvgr nafjrerq Noenunz va gur nhqvrapr bs gur puvyqera bs Urgu, rira
bs nyy gung jrag va ng gur tngr bs uvf pvgl, fnlvat, 23:11 Anl, zl
ybeq, urne zr: gur svryq tvir V gurr, naq gur pnir gung vf gurerva, V
tvir vg gurr; va gur cerfrapr bs gur fbaf bs zl crbcyr tvir V vg gurr:
ohel gul qrnq.

23:12 Naq Noenunz objrq qbja uvzfrys orsber gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq.

23:13 Naq ur fcnxr hagb Rcueba va gur nhqvrapr bs gur crbcyr bs gur
ynaq, fnlvat, Ohg vs gubh jvyg tvir vg, V cenl gurr, urne zr: V jvyy
tvir gurr zbarl sbe gur svryq; gnxr vg bs zr, naq V jvyy ohel zl qrnq
gurer.

23:14 Naq Rcueba nafjrerq Noenunz, fnlvat hagb uvz, 23:15 Zl ybeq,
urnexra hagb zr: gur ynaq vf jbegu sbhe uhaqerq furxryf bs fvyire;
jung vf gung orgjvkg zr naq gurr? ohel gurersber gul qrnq.

23:16 Naq Noenunz urnexrarq hagb Rcueba; naq Noenunz jrvturq gb Rcueba
gur fvyire, juvpu ur unq anzrq va gur nhqvrapr bs gur fbaf bs Urgu,
sbhe uhaqerq furxryf bs fvyire, pheerag zbarl jvgu gur zrepunag.

23:17 Naq gur svryq bs Rcueba juvpu jnf va Znpucrynu, juvpu jnf orsber
Znzer, gur svryq, naq gur pnir juvpu jnf gurerva, naq nyy gur gerrf
gung jrer va gur svryq, gung jrer va nyy gur obeqref ebhaq nobhg, jrer
znqr fher 23:18 Hagb Noenunz sbe n cbffrffvba va gur cerfrapr bs gur
puvyqera bs Urgu, orsber nyy gung jrag va ng gur tngr bs uvf pvgl.

23:19 Naq nsgre guvf, Noenunz ohevrq Fnenu uvf jvsr va gur pnir bs gur
svryq bs Znpucrynu orsber Znzer: gur fnzr vf Uroeba va gur ynaq bs
Pnanna.

23:20 Naq gur svryq, naq gur pnir gung vf gurerva, jrer znqr fher hagb
Noenunz sbe n cbffrffvba bs n ohelvatcynpr ol gur fbaf bs Urgu.

24:1 Naq Noenunz jnf byq, naq jryy fgevpxra va ntr: naq gur YBEQ unq
oyrffrq Noenunz va nyy guvatf.

24:2 Naq Noenunz fnvq hagb uvf ryqrfg freinag bs uvf ubhfr, gung ehyrq
bire nyy gung ur unq, Chg, V cenl gurr, gul unaq haqre zl guvtu: 24:3
Naq V jvyy znxr gurr fjrne ol gur YBEQ, gur Tbq bs urnira, naq gur Tbq
bs gur rnegu, gung gubh funyg abg gnxr n jvsr hagb zl fba bs gur
qnhtugref bs gur Pnannavgrf, nzbat jubz V qjryy: 24:4 Ohg gubh funyg
tb hagb zl pbhagel, naq gb zl xvaqerq, naq gnxr n jvsr hagb zl fba
Vfnnp.

24:5 Naq gur freinag fnvq hagb uvz, Crenqiragher gur jbzna jvyy abg or
jvyyvat gb sbyybj zr hagb guvf ynaq: zhfg V arrqf oevat gul fba ntnva
hagb gur ynaq sebz jurapr gubh pnzrfg?  24:6 Naq Noenunz fnvq hagb
uvz, Orjner gubh gung gubh oevat abg zl fba guvgure ntnva.

24:7 Gur YBEQ Tbq bs urnira, juvpu gbbx zr sebz zl sngure'f ubhfr, naq
