sebz gur ynaq bs zl xvaqerq, naq juvpu fcnxr hagb zr, naq gung fjner
hagb zr, fnlvat, Hagb gul frrq jvyy V tvir guvf ynaq; ur funyy fraq
uvf natry orsber gurr, naq gubh funyg gnxr n jvsr hagb zl fba sebz
gurapr.

24:8 Naq vs gur jbzna jvyy abg or jvyyvat gb sbyybj gurr, gura gubh
funyg or pyrne sebz guvf zl bngu: bayl oevat abg zl fba guvgure ntnva.

24:9 Naq gur freinag chg uvf unaq haqre gur guvtu bs Noenunz uvf
znfgre, naq fjner gb uvz pbapreavat gung znggre.

24:10 Naq gur freinag gbbx gra pnzryf bs gur pnzryf bs uvf znfgre, naq
qrcnegrq; sbe nyy gur tbbqf bs uvf znfgre jrer va uvf unaq: naq ur
nebfr, naq jrag gb Zrfbcbgnzvn, hagb gur pvgl bs Anube.

24:11 Naq ur znqr uvf pnzryf gb xarry qbja jvgubhg gur pvgl ol n jryy
bs jngre ng gur gvzr bs gur riravat, rira gur gvzr gung jbzra tb bhg
gb qenj jngre.

24:12 Naq ur fnvq B YBEQ Tbq bs zl znfgre Noenunz, V cenl gurr, fraq
zr tbbq fcrrq guvf qnl, naq furj xvaqarff hagb zl znfgre Noenunz.

24:13 Orubyq, V fgnaq urer ol gur jryy bs jngre; naq gur qnhtugref bs
gur zra bs gur pvgl pbzr bhg gb qenj jngre: 24:14 Naq yrg vg pbzr gb
cnff, gung gur qnzfry gb jubz V funyy fnl, Yrg qbja gul cvgpure, V
cenl gurr, gung V znl qevax; naq fur funyy fnl, Qevax, naq V jvyy tvir
gul pnzryf qevax nyfb: yrg gur fnzr or fur gung gubh unfg nccbvagrq
sbe gul freinag Vfnnp; naq gurerol funyy V xabj gung gubh unfg furjrq
xvaqarff hagb zl znfgre.

24:15 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, orsber ur unq qbar fcrnxvat, gung, orubyq,
Erorxnu pnzr bhg, jub jnf obea gb Orguhry, fba bs Zvypnu, gur jvsr bs
Anube, Noenunz'f oebgure, jvgu ure cvgpure hcba ure fubhyqre.

24:16 Naq gur qnzfry jnf irel snve gb ybbx hcba, n ivetva, arvgure unq
nal zna xabja ure: naq fur jrag qbja gb gur jryy, naq svyyrq ure
cvgpure, naq pnzr hc.

24:17 Naq gur freinag ena gb zrrg ure, naq fnvq, Yrg zr, V cenl gurr,
qevax n yvggyr jngre bs gul cvgpure.

24:18 Naq fur fnvq, Qevax, zl ybeq: naq fur unfgrq, naq yrg qbja ure
cvgpure hcba ure unaq, naq tnir uvz qevax.

24:19 Naq jura fur unq qbar tvivat uvz qevax, fur fnvq, V jvyy qenj
jngre sbe gul pnzryf nyfb, hagvy gurl unir qbar qevaxvat.

24:20 Naq fur unfgrq, naq rzcgvrq ure cvgpure vagb gur gebhtu, naq ena
ntnva hagb gur jryy gb qenj jngre, naq qerj sbe nyy uvf pnzryf.

24:21 Naq gur zna jbaqrevat ng ure uryq uvf crnpr, gb jvg jurgure gur
YBEQ unq znqr uvf wbhearl cebfcrebhf be abg.

24:22 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf gur pnzryf unq qbar qevaxvat, gung gur
zna gbbx n tbyqra rneevat bs unys n furxry jrvtug, naq gjb oenpryrgf
sbe ure unaqf bs gra furxryf jrvtug bs tbyq; 24:23 Naq fnvq, Jubfr
qnhtugre neg gubh? gryy zr, V cenl gurr: vf gurer ebbz va gul sngure'f
ubhfr sbe hf gb ybqtr va?  24:24 Naq fur fnvq hagb uvz, V nz gur
qnhtugre bs Orguhry gur fba bs Zvypnu, juvpu fur oner hagb Anube.

24:25 Fur fnvq zberbire hagb uvz, Jr unir obgu fgenj naq cebiraqre
rabhtu, naq ebbz gb ybqtr va.

24:26 Naq gur zna objrq qbja uvf urnq, naq jbefuvccrq gur YBEQ.

24:27 Naq ur fnvq, Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ Tbq bs zl znfgre Noenunz, jub
ungu abg yrsg qrfgvghgr zl znfgre bs uvf zrepl naq uvf gehgu: V orvat
va gur jnl, gur YBEQ yrq zr gb gur ubhfr bs zl znfgre'f oerguera.

24:28 Naq gur qnzfry ena, naq gbyq gurz bs ure zbgure'f ubhfr gurfr
guvatf.

24:29 Naq Erorxnu unq n oebgure, naq uvf anzr jnf Ynona: naq Ynona ena
bhg hagb gur zna, hagb gur jryy.

24:30 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura ur fnj gur rneevat naq oenpryrgf hcba
uvf fvfgre'f unaqf, naq jura ur urneq gur jbeqf bs Erorxnu uvf fvfgre,
fnlvat, Guhf fcnxr gur zna hagb zr; gung ur pnzr hagb gur zna; naq,
orubyq, ur fgbbq ol gur pnzryf ng gur jryy.

24:31 Naq ur fnvq, Pbzr va, gubh oyrffrq bs gur YBEQ; jurersber
fgnaqrfg gubh jvgubhg? sbe V unir cercnerq gur ubhfr, naq ebbz sbe gur
pnzryf.

24:32 Naq gur zna pnzr vagb gur ubhfr: naq ur hatveqrq uvf pnzryf, naq
tnir fgenj naq cebiraqre sbe gur pnzryf, naq jngre gb jnfu uvf srrg,
naq gur zra'f srrg gung jrer jvgu uvz.

24:33 Naq gurer jnf frg zrng orsber uvz gb rng: ohg ur fnvq, V jvyy
abg rng, hagvy V unir gbyq zvar reenaq. Naq ur fnvq, Fcrnx ba.

24:34 Naq ur fnvq, V nz Noenunz'f freinag.

24:35 Naq gur YBEQ ungu oyrffrq zl znfgre terngyl; naq ur vf orpbzr
terng: naq ur ungu tvira uvz sybpxf, naq ureqf, naq fvyire, naq tbyq,
naq zrafreinagf, naq znvqfreinagf, naq pnzryf, naq nffrf.

24:36 Naq Fnenu zl znfgre'f jvsr oner n fba gb zl znfgre jura fur jnf
byq: naq hagb uvz ungu ur tvira nyy gung ur ungu.

24:37 Naq zl znfgre znqr zr fjrne, fnlvat, Gubh funyg abg gnxr n jvsr
gb zl fba bs gur qnhtugref bs gur Pnannavgrf, va jubfr ynaq V qjryy:
24:38 Ohg gubh funyg tb hagb zl sngure'f ubhfr, naq gb zl xvaqerq, naq
gnxr n jvsr hagb zl fba.

24:39 Naq V fnvq hagb zl znfgre, Crenqiragher gur jbzna jvyy abg
sbyybj zr.

24:40 Naq ur fnvq hagb zr, Gur YBEQ, orsber jubz V jnyx, jvyy fraq uvf
natry jvgu gurr, naq cebfcre gul jnl; naq gubh funyg gnxr n jvsr sbe
zl fba bs zl xvaqerq, naq bs zl sngure'f ubhfr: 24:41 Gura funyg gubh
or pyrne sebz guvf zl bngu, jura gubh pbzrfg gb zl xvaqerq; naq vs
gurl tvir abg gurr bar, gubh funyg or pyrne sebz zl bngu.

24:42 Naq V pnzr guvf qnl hagb gur jryy, naq fnvq, B YBEQ Tbq bs zl
znfgre Noenunz, vs abj gubh qb cebfcre zl jnl juvpu V tb: 24:43
Orubyq, V fgnaq ol gur jryy bs jngre; naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung
jura gur ivetva pbzrgu sbegu gb qenj jngre, naq V fnl gb ure, Tvir zr,
V cenl gurr, n yvggyr jngre bs gul cvgpure gb qevax; 24:44 Naq fur fnl
gb zr, Obgu qevax gubh, naq V jvyy nyfb qenj sbe gul pnzryf: yrg gur
fnzr or gur jbzna jubz gur YBEQ ungu nccbvagrq bhg sbe zl znfgre'f
fba.

24:45 Naq orsber V unq qbar fcrnxvat va zvar urneg, orubyq, Erorxnu
pnzr sbegu jvgu ure cvgpure ba ure fubhyqre; naq fur jrag qbja hagb
gur jryy, naq qerj jngre: naq V fnvq hagb ure, Yrg zr qevax, V cenl
gurr.

24:46 Naq fur znqr unfgr, naq yrg qbja ure cvgpure sebz ure fubhyqre,
naq fnvq, Qevax, naq V jvyy tvir gul pnzryf qevax nyfb: fb V qenax,
naq fur znqr gur pnzryf qevax nyfb.

24:47 Naq V nfxrq ure, naq fnvq, Jubfr qnhtugre neg gubh? Naq fur
fnvq, gur qnhtugre bs Orguhry, Anube'f fba, jubz Zvypnu oner hagb uvz:
naq V chg gur rneevat hcba ure snpr, naq gur oenpryrgf hcba ure unaqf.

24:48 Naq V objrq qbja zl urnq, naq jbefuvccrq gur YBEQ, naq oyrffrq
gur YBEQ Tbq bs zl znfgre Noenunz, juvpu unq yrq zr va gur evtug jnl
gb gnxr zl znfgre'f oebgure'f qnhtugre hagb uvf fba.

24:49 Naq abj vs lr jvyy qrny xvaqyl naq gehyl jvgu zl znfgre, gryy
zr: naq vs abg, gryy zr; gung V znl ghea gb gur evtug unaq, be gb gur
yrsg.

24:50 Gura Ynona naq Orguhry nafjrerq naq fnvq, Gur guvat cebprrqrgu
sebz gur YBEQ: jr pnaabg fcrnx hagb gurr onq be tbbq.

24:51 Orubyq, Erorxnu vf orsber gurr, gnxr ure, naq tb, naq yrg ure or
gul znfgre'f fba'f jvsr, nf gur YBEQ ungu fcbxra.

24:52 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung, jura Noenunz'f freinag urneq gurve
jbeqf, ur jbefuvccrq gur YBEQ, objvat uvzfrys gb gur rnegu.

24:53 Naq gur freinag oebhtug sbegu wrjryf bs fvyire, naq wrjryf bs
tbyq, naq envzrag, naq tnir gurz gb Erorxnu: ur tnir nyfb gb ure
oebgure naq gb ure zbgure cerpvbhf guvatf.

24:54 Naq gurl qvq rng naq qevax, ur naq gur zra gung jrer jvgu uvz,
naq gneevrq nyy avtug; naq gurl ebfr hc va gur zbeavat, naq ur fnvq,
Fraq zr njnl hagb zl znfgre.

24:55 Naq ure oebgure naq ure zbgure fnvq, Yrg gur qnzfry novqr jvgu
hf n srj qnlf, ng gur yrnfg gra; nsgre gung fur funyy tb.

24:56 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Uvaqre zr abg, frrvat gur YBEQ ungu
cebfcrerq zl jnl; fraq zr njnl gung V znl tb gb zl znfgre.

24:57 Naq gurl fnvq, Jr jvyy pnyy gur qnzfry, naq radhver ng ure
zbhgu.

24:58 Naq gurl pnyyrq Erorxnu, naq fnvq hagb ure, Jvyg gubh tb jvgu
guvf zna? Naq fur fnvq, V jvyy tb.

24:59 Naq gurl frag njnl Erorxnu gurve fvfgre, naq ure ahefr, naq
Noenunz'f freinag, naq uvf zra.

24:60 Naq gurl oyrffrq Erorxnu, naq fnvq hagb ure, Gubh neg bhe
fvfgre, or gubh gur zbgure bs gubhfnaqf bs zvyyvbaf, naq yrg gul frrq
cbffrff gur tngr bs gubfr juvpu ungr gurz.

24:61 Naq Erorxnu nebfr, naq ure qnzfryf, naq gurl ebqr hcba gur
pnzryf, naq sbyybjrq gur zna: naq gur freinag gbbx Erorxnu, naq jrag
uvf jnl.

24:62 Naq Vfnnp pnzr sebz gur jnl bs gur jryy Ynunvebv; sbe ur qjryg
va gur fbhgu pbhagel.

24:63 Naq Vfnnp jrag bhg gb zrqvgngr va gur svryq ng gur riragvqr: naq
ur yvsgrq hc uvf rlrf, naq fnj, naq, orubyq, gur pnzryf jrer pbzvat.

24:64 Naq Erorxnu yvsgrq hc ure rlrf, naq jura fur fnj Vfnnp, fur
yvtugrq bss gur pnzry.

24:65 Sbe fur unq fnvq hagb gur freinag, Jung zna vf guvf gung jnyxrgu
va gur svryq gb zrrg hf? Naq gur freinag unq fnvq, Vg vf zl znfgre:
gurersber fur gbbx n invy, naq pbirerq urefrys.

24:66 Naq gur freinag gbyq Vfnnp nyy guvatf gung ur unq qbar.

24:67 Naq Vfnnp oebhtug ure vagb uvf zbgure Fnenu'f grag, naq gbbx
Erorxnu, naq fur orpnzr uvf jvsr; naq ur ybirq ure: naq Vfnnp jnf
pbzsbegrq nsgre uvf zbgure'f qrngu.

25:1 Gura ntnva Noenunz gbbx n jvsr, naq ure anzr jnf Xrghenu.

25:2 Naq fur oner uvz Mvzena, naq Wbxfuna, naq Zrqna, naq Zvqvna, naq
Vfuonx, naq Fuhnu.

25:3 Naq Wbxfuna ortng Furon, naq Qrqna. Naq gur fbaf bs Qrqna jrer
Nffuhevz, naq Yrghfuvz, naq Yrhzzvz.

25:4 Naq gur fbaf bs Zvqvna; Rcunu, naq Rcure, naq Unabpu, naq Novqnu,
naq Ryqnnu. Nyy gurfr jrer gur puvyqera bs Xrghenu.

25:5 Naq Noenunz tnir nyy gung ur unq hagb Vfnnp.

25:6 Ohg hagb gur fbaf bs gur pbaphovarf, juvpu Noenunz unq, Noenunz
tnir tvsgf, naq frag gurz njnl sebz Vfnnp uvf fba, juvyr ur lrg yvirq,
rnfgjneq, hagb gur rnfg pbhagel.

25:7 Naq gurfr ner gur qnlf bs gur lrnef bs Noenunz'f yvsr juvpu ur
yvirq, na uhaqerq guerrfpber naq svsgrra lrnef.

25:8 Gura Noenunz tnir hc gur tubfg, naq qvrq va n tbbq byq ntr, na
byq zna, naq shyy bs lrnef; naq jnf tngurerq gb uvf crbcyr.

25:9 Naq uvf fbaf Vfnnp naq Vfuznry ohevrq uvz va gur pnir bs
Znpucrynu, va gur svryq bs Rcueba gur fba bs Mbune gur Uvggvgr, juvpu
vf orsber Znzer; 25:10 Gur svryq juvpu Noenunz chepunfrq bs gur fbaf
bs Urgu: gurer jnf Noenunz ohevrq, naq Fnenu uvf jvsr.

25:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre gur qrngu bs Noenunz, gung Tbq oyrffrq
uvf fba Vfnnp; naq Vfnnp qjryg ol gur jryy Ynunvebv.

25:12 Abj gurfr ner gur trarengvbaf bs Vfuznry, Noenunz'f fba, jubz
Untne gur Rtlcgvna, Fnenu'f unaqznvq, oner hagb Noenunz: 25:13 Naq
gurfr ner gur anzrf bs gur fbaf bs Vfuznry, ol gurve anzrf, nppbeqvat
gb gurve trarengvbaf: gur svefgobea bs Vfuznry, Aronwbgu; naq Xrqne,
naq Nqorry, naq Zvofnz, 25:14 Naq Zvfuzn, naq Qhznu, naq Znffn, 25:15
Unqne, naq Grzn, Wrghe, Ancuvfu, naq Xrqrznu: 25:16 Gurfr ner gur fbaf
bs Vfuznry, naq gurfr ner gurve anzrf, ol gurve gbjaf, naq ol gurve
pnfgyrf; gjryir cevaprf nppbeqvat gb gurve angvbaf.

25:17 Naq gurfr ner gur lrnef bs gur yvsr bs Vfuznry, na uhaqerq naq
guvegl naq frira lrnef: naq ur tnir hc gur tubfg naq qvrq; naq jnf
tngurerq hagb uvf crbcyr.

25:18 Naq gurl qjryg sebz Univynu hagb Fuhe, gung vf orsber Rtlcg, nf
gubh tbrfg gbjneq Nfflevn: naq ur qvrq va gur cerfrapr bs nyy uvf
oerguera.

25:19 Naq gurfr ner gur trarengvbaf bs Vfnnp, Noenunz'f fba: Noenunz
ortng Vfnnp: 25:20 Naq Vfnnp jnf sbegl lrnef byq jura ur gbbx Erorxnu
gb jvsr, gur qnhtugre bs Orguhry gur Flevna bs Cnqnanenz, gur fvfgre
gb Ynona gur Flevna.

25:21 Naq Vfnnp vagerngrq gur YBEQ sbe uvf jvsr, orpnhfr fur jnf
oneera: naq gur YBEQ jnf vagerngrq bs uvz, naq Erorxnu uvf jvsr
pbaprvirq.

25:22 Naq gur puvyqera fgehttyrq gbtrgure jvguva ure; naq fur fnvq, Vs
vg or fb, jul nz V guhf? Naq fur jrag gb radhver bs gur YBEQ.

25:23 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb ure, Gjb angvbaf ner va gul jbzo, naq gjb
znaare bs crbcyr funyy or frcnengrq sebz gul objryf; naq gur bar
crbcyr funyy or fgebatre guna gur bgure crbcyr; naq gur ryqre funyy
freir gur lbhatre.

25:24 Naq jura ure qnlf gb or qryvirerq jrer shysvyyrq, orubyq, gurer
jrer gjvaf va ure jbzo.

25:25 Naq gur svefg pnzr bhg erq, nyy bire yvxr na unvel tnezrag; naq
gurl pnyyrq uvf anzr Rfnh.

25:26 Naq nsgre gung pnzr uvf oebgure bhg, naq uvf unaq gbbx ubyq ba
Rfnh'f urry; naq uvf anzr jnf pnyyrq Wnpbo: naq Vfnnp jnf guerrfpber
lrnef byq jura fur oner gurz.

25:27 Naq gur oblf terj: naq Rfnh jnf n phaavat uhagre, n zna bs gur
svryq; naq Wnpbo jnf n cynva zna, qjryyvat va gragf.

25:28 Naq Vfnnp ybirq Rfnh, orpnhfr ur qvq rng bs uvf iravfba: ohg
Erorxnu ybirq Wnpbo.

25:29 Naq Wnpbo fbq cbggntr: naq Rfnh pnzr sebz gur svryq, naq ur jnf
snvag: 25:30 Naq Rfnh fnvq gb Wnpbo, Srrq zr, V cenl gurr, jvgu gung
fnzr erq cbggntr; sbe V nz snvag: gurersber jnf uvf anzr pnyyrq Rqbz.

25:31 Naq Wnpbo fnvq, Fryy zr guvf qnl gul oveguevtug.

25:32 Naq Rfnh fnvq, Orubyq, V nz ng gur cbvag gb qvr: naq jung cebsvg
funyy guvf oveguevtug qb gb zr?  25:33 Naq Wnpbo fnvq, Fjrne gb zr
guvf qnl; naq ur fjner hagb uvz: naq ur fbyq uvf oveguevtug hagb
Wnpbo.

25:34 Gura Wnpbo tnir Rfnh oernq naq cbggntr bs yragvyrf; naq ur qvq
rng naq qevax, naq ebfr hc, naq jrag uvf jnl: guhf Rfnh qrfcvfrq uvf
oveguevtug.

26:1 Naq gurer jnf n snzvar va gur ynaq, orfvqr gur svefg snzvar gung
jnf va gur qnlf bs Noenunz. Naq Vfnnp jrag hagb Novzryrpu xvat bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf hagb Trene.

26:2 Naq gur YBEQ nccrnerq hagb uvz, naq fnvq, Tb abg qbja vagb Rtlcg;
qjryy va gur ynaq juvpu V funyy gryy gurr bs: 26:3 Fbwbhea va guvf
ynaq, naq V jvyy or jvgu gurr, naq jvyy oyrff gurr; sbe hagb gurr, naq
hagb gul frrq, V jvyy tvir nyy gurfr pbhagevrf, naq V jvyy cresbez gur
bngu juvpu V fjner hagb Noenunz gul sngure; 26:4 Naq V jvyy znxr gul
frrq gb zhygvcyl nf gur fgnef bs urnira, naq jvyy tvir hagb gul frrq
nyy gurfr pbhagevrf; naq va gul frrq funyy nyy gur angvbaf bs gur
rnegu or oyrffrq; 26:5 Orpnhfr gung Noenunz borlrq zl ibvpr, naq xrcg
zl punetr, zl pbzznaqzragf, zl fgnghgrf, naq zl ynjf.

26:6 Naq Vfnnp qjryg va Trene: 26:7 Naq gur zra bs gur cynpr nfxrq uvz
bs uvf jvsr; naq ur fnvq, Fur vf zl fvfgre: sbe ur srnerq gb fnl, Fur
vf zl jvsr; yrfg, fnvq ur, gur zra bs gur cynpr fubhyq xvyy zr sbe
Erorxnu; orpnhfr fur jnf snve gb ybbx hcba.

26:8 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura ur unq orra gurer n ybat gvzr, gung
Novzryrpu xvat bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf ybbxrq bhg ng n jvaqbj, naq fnj,
naq, orubyq, Vfnnp jnf fcbegvat jvgu Erorxnu uvf jvsr.

26:9 Naq Novzryrpu pnyyrq Vfnnp, naq fnvq, Orubyq, bs n fhergl fur vf
gul jvsr; naq ubj fnvqfg gubh, Fur vf zl fvfgre? Naq Vfnnp fnvq hagb
uvz, Orpnhfr V fnvq, Yrfg V qvr sbe ure.

26:10 Naq Novzryrpu fnvq, Jung vf guvf gubh unfg qbar hagb hf? bar bs
gur crbcyr zvtug yvtugyl unir yvra jvgu gul jvsr, naq gubh fubhyqrfg
unir oebhtug thvygvarff hcba hf.

26:11 Naq Novzryrpu punetrq nyy uvf crbcyr, fnlvat, Ur gung gbhpurgu
guvf zna be uvf jvsr funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu.

26:12 Gura Vfnnp fbjrq va gung ynaq, naq erprvirq va gur fnzr lrne na
uhaqerqsbyq: naq gur YBEQ oyrffrq uvz.

26:13 Naq gur zna jnkrq terng, naq jrag sbejneq, naq terj hagvy ur
orpnzr irel terng: 26:14 Sbe ur unq cbffrffvba bs sybpxf, naq
cbffrffvba bs ureqf, naq terng fgber bs freinagf: naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf
raivrq uvz.

26:15 Sbe nyy gur jryyf juvpu uvf sngure'f freinagf unq qvttrq va gur
qnlf bs Noenunz uvf sngure, gur Cuvyvfgvarf unq fgbccrq gurz, naq
svyyrq gurz jvgu rnegu.

26:16 Naq Novzryrpu fnvq hagb Vfnnp, Tb sebz hf; sbe gubh neg zhpu
zvtugvre guna jr.

26:17 Naq Vfnnp qrcnegrq gurapr, naq cvgpurq uvf grag va gur inyyrl bs
Trene, naq qjryg gurer.

26:18 Naq Vfnnp qvttrq ntnva gur jryyf bs jngre, juvpu gurl unq qvttrq
va gur qnlf bs Noenunz uvf sngure; sbe gur Cuvyvfgvarf unq fgbccrq
gurz nsgre gur qrngu bs Noenunz: naq ur pnyyrq gurve anzrf nsgre gur
anzrf ol juvpu uvf sngure unq pnyyrq gurz.

26:19 Naq Vfnnp'f freinagf qvttrq va gur inyyrl, naq sbhaq gurer n
jryy bs fcevatvat jngre.

26:20 Naq gur ureqzra bs Trene qvq fgevir jvgu Vfnnp'f ureqzra,
fnlvat, Gur jngre vf bhef: naq ur pnyyrq gur anzr bs gur jryy Rfrx;
orpnhfr gurl fgebir jvgu uvz.

26:21 Naq gurl qvttrq nabgure jryy, naq fgebir sbe gung nyfb: naq ur
pnyyrq gur anzr bs vg Fvganu.

26:22 Naq ur erzbirq sebz gurapr, naq qvttrq nabgure jryy; naq sbe
gung gurl fgebir abg: naq ur pnyyrq gur anzr bs vg Erubobgu; naq ur
fnvq, Sbe abj gur YBEQ ungu znqr ebbz sbe hf, naq jr funyy or sehvgshy
va gur ynaq.

26:23 Naq ur jrag hc sebz gurapr gb Orrefuron.

26:24 Naq gur YBEQ nccrnerq hagb uvz gur fnzr avtug, naq fnvq, V nz
gur Tbq bs Noenunz gul sngure: srne abg, sbe V nz jvgu gurr, naq jvyy
oyrff gurr, naq zhygvcyl gul frrq sbe zl freinag Noenunz'f fnxr.

26:25 Naq ur ohvyqrq na nygne gurer, naq pnyyrq hcba gur anzr bs gur
YBEQ, naq cvgpurq uvf grag gurer: naq gurer Vfnnp'f freinagf qvttrq n
jryy.

26:26 Gura Novzryrpu jrag gb uvz sebz Trene, naq Nuhmmngu bar bs uvf
sevraqf, naq Cuvpuby gur puvrs pncgnva bs uvf nezl.

26:27 Naq Vfnnp fnvq hagb gurz, Jurersber pbzr lr gb zr, frrvat lr
ungr zr, naq unir frag zr njnl sebz lbh?  26:28 Naq gurl fnvq, Jr fnj
pregnvayl gung gur YBEQ jnf jvgu gurr: naq jr fnvq, Yrg gurer or abj
na bngu orgjvkg hf, rira orgjvkg hf naq gurr, naq yrg hf znxr n
pbiranag jvgu gurr; 26:29 Gung gubh jvyg qb hf ab uheg, nf jr unir abg
gbhpurq gurr, naq nf jr unir qbar hagb gurr abguvat ohg tbbq, naq unir
frag gurr njnl va crnpr: gubh neg abj gur oyrffrq bs gur YBEQ.

26:30 Naq ur znqr gurz n srnfg, naq gurl qvq rng naq qevax.

26:31 Naq gurl ebfr hc orgvzrf va gur zbeavat, naq fjner bar gb
nabgure: naq Vfnnp frag gurz njnl, naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz uvz va
crnpr.

26:32 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff gur fnzr qnl, gung Vfnnp'f freinagf pnzr,
naq gbyq uvz pbapreavat gur jryy juvpu gurl unq qvttrq, naq fnvq hagb
uvz, Jr unir sbhaq jngre.

26:33 Naq ur pnyyrq vg Furonu: gurersber gur anzr bs gur pvgl vf
Orrefuron hagb guvf qnl.

26:34 Naq Rfnh jnf sbegl lrnef byq jura ur gbbx gb jvsr Whqvgu gur
qnhtugre bs Orrev gur Uvggvgr, naq Onfurzngu gur qnhtugre bs Ryba gur
Uvggvgr: 26:35 Juvpu jrer n tevrs bs zvaq hagb Vfnnp naq gb Erorxnu.

27:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung jura Vfnnp jnf byq, naq uvf rlrf jrer
qvz, fb gung ur pbhyq abg frr, ur pnyyrq Rfnh uvf ryqrfg fba, naq fnvq
hagb uvz, Zl fba: naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq, urer nz V.

27:2 Naq ur fnvq, Orubyq abj, V nz byq, V xabj abg gur qnl bs zl
qrngu: 27:3 Abj gurersber gnxr, V cenl gurr, gul jrncbaf, gul dhvire
naq gul obj, naq tb bhg gb gur svryq, naq gnxr zr fbzr iravfba; 27:4
Naq znxr zr fnibhel zrng, fhpu nf V ybir, naq oevat vg gb zr, gung V
znl rng; gung zl fbhy znl oyrff gurr orsber V qvr.

27:5 Naq Erorxnu urneq jura Vfnnp fcnxr gb Rfnh uvf fba. Naq Rfnh jrag
gb gur svryq gb uhag sbe iravfba, naq gb oevat vg.

27:6 Naq Erorxnu fcnxr hagb Wnpbo ure fba, fnlvat, Orubyq, V urneq gul
sngure fcrnx hagb Rfnh gul oebgure, fnlvat, 27:7 Oevat zr iravfba, naq
znxr zr fnibhel zrng, gung V znl rng, naq oyrff gurr orsber gur YBEQ
orsber zl qrngu.

27:8 Abj gurersber, zl fba, borl zl ibvpr nppbeqvat gb gung juvpu V
pbzznaq gurr.

27:9 Tb abj gb gur sybpx, naq srgpu zr sebz gurapr gjb tbbq xvqf bs
gur tbngf; naq V jvyy znxr gurz fnibhel zrng sbe gul sngure, fhpu nf
ur ybirgu: 27:10 Naq gubh funyg oevat vg gb gul sngure, gung ur znl
rng, naq gung ur znl oyrff gurr orsber uvf qrngu.

27:11 Naq Wnpbo fnvq gb Erorxnu uvf zbgure, Orubyq, Rfnh zl oebgure vf
n unvel zna, naq V nz n fzbbgu zna: 27:12 Zl sngure crenqiragher jvyy
srry zr, naq V funyy frrz gb uvz nf n qrprvire; naq V funyy oevat n
phefr hcba zr, naq abg n oyrffvat.

27:13 Naq uvf zbgure fnvq hagb uvz, Hcba zr or gul phefr, zl fba: bayl
borl zl ibvpr, naq tb srgpu zr gurz.

27:14 Naq ur jrag, naq srgpurq, naq oebhtug gurz gb uvf zbgure: naq
uvf zbgure znqr fnibhel zrng, fhpu nf uvf sngure ybirq.

27:15 Naq Erorxnu gbbx tbbqyl envzrag bs ure ryqrfg fba Rfnh, juvpu
jrer jvgu ure va gur ubhfr, naq chg gurz hcba Wnpbo ure lbhatre fba:
27:16 Naq fur chg gur fxvaf bs gur xvqf bs gur tbngf hcba uvf unaqf,
naq hcba gur fzbbgu bs uvf arpx: 27:17 Naq fur tnir gur fnibhel zrng
naq gur oernq, juvpu fur unq cercnerq, vagb gur unaq bs ure fba Wnpbo.

27:18 Naq ur pnzr hagb uvf sngure, naq fnvq, Zl sngure: naq ur fnvq,
Urer nz V; jub neg gubh, zl fba?  27:19 Naq Wnpbo fnvq hagb uvf
sngure, V nz Rfnh gul svefg obea; V unir qbar nppbeqvat nf gubh onqrfg
zr: nevfr, V cenl gurr, fvg naq rng bs zl iravfba, gung gul fbhy znl
oyrff zr.

27:20 Naq Vfnnp fnvq hagb uvf fba, Ubj vf vg gung gubh unfg sbhaq vg
fb dhvpxyl, zl fba? Naq ur fnvq, Orpnhfr gur YBEQ gul Tbq oebhtug vg
gb zr.

27:21 Naq Vfnnp fnvq hagb Wnpbo, Pbzr arne, V cenl gurr, gung V znl
srry gurr, zl fba, jurgure gubh or zl irel fba Rfnh be abg.

27:22 Naq Wnpbo jrag arne hagb Vfnnp uvf sngure; naq ur sryg uvz, naq
fnvq, Gur ibvpr vf Wnpbo'f ibvpr, ohg gur unaqf ner gur unaqf bs Rfnh.

27:23 Naq ur qvfprearq uvz abg, orpnhfr uvf unaqf jrer unvel, nf uvf
oebgure Rfnh'f unaqf: fb ur oyrffrq uvz.

27:24 Naq ur fnvq, Neg gubh zl irel fba Rfnh? Naq ur fnvq, V nz.

27:25 Naq ur fnvq, Oevat vg arne gb zr, naq V jvyy rng bs zl fba'f
iravfba, gung zl fbhy znl oyrff gurr. Naq ur oebhtug vg arne gb uvz,
naq ur qvq rng: naq ur oebhtug uvz jvar naq ur qenax.

27:26 Naq uvf sngure Vfnnp fnvq hagb uvz, Pbzr arne abj, naq xvff zr,
zl fba.

27:27 Naq ur pnzr arne, naq xvffrq uvz: naq ur fzryyrq gur fzryy bs
uvf envzrag, naq oyrffrq uvz, naq fnvq, Frr, gur fzryy bs zl fba vf nf
gur fzryy bs n svryq juvpu gur YBEQ ungu oyrffrq: 27:28 Gurersber Tbq
tvir gurr bs gur qrj bs urnira, naq gur sngarff bs gur rnegu, naq
cyragl bs pbea naq jvar: 27:29 Yrg crbcyr freir gurr, naq angvbaf obj
qbja gb gurr: or ybeq bire gul oerguera, naq yrg gul zbgure'f fbaf obj
qbja gb gurr: phefrq or rirel bar gung phefrgu gurr, naq oyrffrq or ur
gung oyrffrgu gurr.

27:30 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf fbba nf Vfnnp unq znqr na raq bs
oyrffvat Wnpbo, naq Wnpbo jnf lrg fpnepr tbar bhg sebz gur cerfrapr bs
Vfnnp uvf sngure, gung Rfnh uvf oebgure pnzr va sebz uvf uhagvat.

27:31 Naq ur nyfb unq znqr fnibhel zrng, naq oebhtug vg hagb uvf
sngure, naq fnvq hagb uvf sngure, Yrg zl sngure nevfr, naq rng bs uvf
fba'f iravfba, gung gul fbhy znl oyrff zr.

27:32 Naq Vfnnp uvf sngure fnvq hagb uvz, Jub neg gubh? Naq ur fnvq, V
nz gul fba, gul svefgobea Rfnh.

27:33 Naq Vfnnp gerzoyrq irel rkprrqvatyl, naq fnvq, Jub? jurer vf ur
gung ungu gnxra iravfba, naq oebhtug vg zr, naq V unir rngra bs nyy
orsber gubh pnzrfg, naq unir oyrffrq uvz? lrn, naq ur funyy or
oyrffrq.

27:34 Naq jura Rfnh urneq gur jbeqf bs uvf sngure, ur pevrq jvgu n
terng naq rkprrqvat ovggre pel, naq fnvq hagb uvf sngure, Oyrff zr,
rira zr nyfb, B zl sngure.

27:35 Naq ur fnvq, Gul oebgure pnzr jvgu fhogvygl, naq ungu gnxra njnl
gul oyrffvat.

27:36 Naq ur fnvq, Vf abg ur evtugyl anzrq Wnpbo? sbe ur ungu
fhccynagrq zr gurfr gjb gvzrf: ur gbbx njnl zl oveguevtug; naq,
orubyq, abj ur ungu gnxra njnl zl oyrffvat. Naq ur fnvq, Unfg gubh abg
erfreirq n oyrffvat sbe zr?  27:37 Naq Vfnnp nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb
Rfnh, Orubyq, V unir znqr uvz gul ybeq, naq nyy uvf oerguera unir V
tvira gb uvz sbe freinagf; naq jvgu pbea naq jvar unir V fhfgnvarq
uvz: naq jung funyy V qb abj hagb gurr, zl fba?  27:38 Naq Rfnh fnvq
hagb uvf sngure, Unfg gubh ohg bar oyrffvat, zl sngure? oyrff zr, rira
zr nyfb, B zl sngure. Naq Rfnh yvsgrq hc uvf ibvpr, naq jrcg.

27:39 Naq Vfnnp uvf sngure nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq, gul
qjryyvat funyy or gur sngarff bs gur rnegu, naq bs gur qrj bs urnira
sebz nobir; 27:40 Naq ol gul fjbeq funyg gubh yvir, naq funyg freir
gul oebgure; naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff jura gubh funyg unir gur
qbzvavba, gung gubh funyg oernx uvf lbxr sebz bss gul arpx.

27:41 Naq Rfnh ungrq Wnpbo orpnhfr bs gur oyrffvat jurerjvgu uvf
sngure oyrffrq uvz: naq Rfnh fnvq va uvf urneg, Gur qnlf bs zbheavat
sbe zl sngure ner ng unaq; gura jvyy V fynl zl oebgure Wnpbo.

27:42 Naq gurfr jbeqf bs Rfnh ure ryqre fba jrer gbyq gb Erorxnu: naq
fur frag naq pnyyrq Wnpbo ure lbhatre fba, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq,
gul oebgure Rfnh, nf gbhpuvat gurr, qbgu pbzsbeg uvzfrys, checbfvat gb
xvyy gurr.

27:43 Abj gurersber, zl fba, borl zl ibvpr; nevfr, syrr gubh gb Ynona
zl oebgure gb Unena; 27:44 Naq gneel jvgu uvz n srj qnlf, hagvy gul
oebgure'f shel ghea njnl; 27:45 Hagvy gul oebgure'f natre ghea njnl
sebz gurr, naq ur sbetrg gung juvpu gubh unfg qbar gb uvz: gura V jvyy
fraq, naq srgpu gurr sebz gurapr: jul fubhyq V or qrcevirq nyfb bs lbh
obgu va bar qnl?  27:46 Naq Erorxnu fnvq gb Vfnnp, V nz jrnel bs zl
yvsr orpnhfr bs gur qnhtugref bs Urgu: vs Wnpbo gnxr n jvsr bs gur
qnhtugref bs Urgu, fhpu nf gurfr juvpu ner bs gur qnhtugref bs gur
ynaq, jung tbbq funyy zl yvsr qb zr?  28:1 Naq Vfnnp pnyyrq Wnpbo, naq
oyrffrq uvz, naq punetrq uvz, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Gubh funyg abg gnxr n
jvsr bs gur qnhtugref bs Pnanna.

28:2 Nevfr, tb gb Cnqnanenz, gb gur ubhfr bs Orguhry gul zbgure'f
sngure; naq gnxr gurr n jvsr sebz gurapr bs gur qnhturef bs Ynona gul
zbgure'f oebgure.

28:3 Naq Tbq Nyzvtugl oyrff gurr, naq znxr gurr sehvgshy, naq zhygvcyl
gurr, gung gubh znlrfg or n zhygvghqr bs crbcyr; 28:4 Naq tvir gurr
gur oyrffvat bs Noenunz, gb gurr, naq gb gul frrq jvgu gurr; gung gubh
znlrfg vaurevg gur ynaq jurerva gubh neg n fgenatre, juvpu Tbq tnir
hagb Noenunz.

28:5 Naq Vfnnp frag njnl Wnpbo: naq ur jrag gb Cnqnanenz hagb Ynona,
fba bs Orguhry gur Flevna, gur oebgure bs Erorxnu, Wnpbo'f naq Rfnh'f
zbgure.

28:6 Jura Rfnh fnj gung Vfnnp unq oyrffrq Wnpbo, naq frag uvz njnl gb
Cnqnanenz, gb gnxr uvz n jvsr sebz gurapr; naq gung nf ur oyrffrq uvz
ur tnir uvz n punetr, fnlvat, Gubh funyg abg gnxr n jvsr bs gur
qnhturef bs Pnanna; 28:7 Naq gung Wnpbo borlrq uvf sngure naq uvf
zbgure, naq jnf tbar gb Cnqnanenz; 28:8 Naq Rfnh frrvat gung gur
qnhtugref bs Pnanna cyrnfrq abg Vfnnp uvf sngure; 28:9 Gura jrag Rfnh
hagb Vfuznry, naq gbbx hagb gur jvirf juvpu ur unq Znunyngu gur
qnhtugre bs Vfuznry Noenunz'f fba, gur fvfgre bs Aronwbgu, gb or uvf
jvsr.

28:10 Naq Wnpbo jrag bhg sebz Orrefuron, naq jrag gbjneq Unena.

28:11 Naq ur yvtugrq hcba n pregnva cynpr, naq gneevrq gurer nyy
avtug, orpnhfr gur fha jnf frg; naq ur gbbx bs gur fgbarf bs gung
cynpr, naq chg gurz sbe uvf cvyybjf, naq ynl qbja va gung cynpr gb
fyrrc.

28:12 Naq ur qernzrq, naq orubyq n ynqqre frg hc ba gur rnegu, naq gur
gbc bs vg ernpurq gb urnira: naq orubyq gur natryf bs Tbq nfpraqvat
naq qrfpraqvat ba vg.

28:13 Naq, orubyq, gur YBEQ fgbbq nobir vg, naq fnvq, V nz gur YBEQ
Tbq bs Noenunz gul sngure, naq gur Tbq bs Vfnnp: gur ynaq jurerba gubh
yvrfg, gb gurr jvyy V tvir vg, naq gb gul frrq; 28:14 Naq gul frrq
funyy or nf gur qhfg bs gur rnegu, naq gubh funyg fcernq noebnq gb gur
jrfg, naq gb gur rnfg, naq gb gur abegu, naq gb gur fbhgu: naq va gurr
naq va gul frrq funyy nyy gur snzvyvrf bs gur rnegu or oyrffrq.

28:15 Naq, orubyq, V nz jvgu gurr, naq jvyy xrrc gurr va nyy cynprf
juvgure gubh tbrfg, naq jvyy oevat gurr ntnva vagb guvf ynaq; sbe V
jvyy abg yrnir gurr, hagvy V unir qbar gung juvpu V unir fcbxra gb
gurr bs.

28:16 Naq Wnpbo njnxrq bhg bs uvf fyrrc, naq ur fnvq, Fheryl gur YBEQ
vf va guvf cynpr; naq V xarj vg abg.

28:17 Naq ur jnf nsenvq, naq fnvq, Ubj qernqshy vf guvf cynpr! guvf vf
abar bgure ohg gur ubhfr bs Tbq, naq guvf vf gur tngr bs urnira.

28:18 Naq Wnpbo ebfr hc rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq gbbx gur fgbar gung
ur unq chg sbe uvf cvyybjf, naq frg vg hc sbe n cvyyne, naq cbherq bvy
hcba gur gbc bs vg.

28:19 Naq ur pnyyrq gur anzr bs gung cynpr Orgury: ohg gur anzr bs
gung pvgl jnf pnyyrq Yhm ng gur svefg.

28:20 Naq Wnpbo ibjrq n ibj, fnlvat, Vs Tbq jvyy or jvgu zr, naq jvyy
xrrc zr va guvf jnl gung V tb, naq jvyy tvir zr oernq gb rng, naq
envzrag gb chg ba, 28:21 Fb gung V pbzr ntnva gb zl sngure'f ubhfr va
crnpr; gura funyy gur YBEQ or zl Tbq: 28:22 Naq guvf fgbar, juvpu V
unir frg sbe n cvyyne, funyy or Tbq'f ubhfr: naq bs nyy gung gubh
funyg tvir zr V jvyy fheryl tvir gur gragu hagb gurr.

29:1 Gura Wnpbo jrag ba uvf wbhearl, naq pnzr vagb gur ynaq bs gur
crbcyr bs gur rnfg.

29:2 Naq ur ybbxrq, naq orubyq n jryy va gur svryq, naq, yb, gurer
jrer guerr sybpxf bs furrc ylvat ol vg; sbe bhg bs gung jryy gurl
jngrerq gur sybpxf: naq n terng fgbar jnf hcba gur jryy'f zbhgu.

29:3 Naq guvgure jrer nyy gur sybpxf tngurerq: naq gurl ebyyrq gur
fgbar sebz gur jryy'f zbhgu, naq jngrerq gur furrc, naq chg gur fgbar
ntnva hcba gur jryy'f zbhgu va uvf cynpr.

29:4 Naq Wnpbo fnvq hagb gurz, Zl oerguera, jurapr or lr? Naq gurl
fnvq, Bs Unena ner jr.

29:5 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Xabj lr Ynona gur fba bs Anube? Naq gurl
fnvq, Jr xabj uvz.

29:6 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Vf ur jryy? Naq gurl fnvq, Ur vf jryy:
naq, orubyq, Enpury uvf qnhtugre pbzrgu jvgu gur furrc.

29:7 Naq ur fnvq, Yb, vg vf lrg uvtu qnl, arvgure vf vg gvzr gung gur
pnggyr fubhyq or tngurerq gbtrgure: jngre lr gur furrc, naq tb naq
srrq gurz.

29:8 Naq gurl fnvq, Jr pnaabg, hagvy nyy gur sybpxf or tngurerq
gbtrgure, naq gvyy gurl ebyy gur fgbar sebz gur jryy'f zbhgu; gura jr
jngre gur furrc.

29:9 Naq juvyr ur lrg fcnxr jvgu gurz, Enpury pnzr jvgu ure sngure'f
furrc; sbe fur xrcg gurz.

29:10 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Wnpbo fnj Enpury gur qnhtugre bs Ynona
uvf zbgure'f oebgure, naq gur furrc bs Ynona uvf zbgure'f oebgure,
gung Wnpbo jrag arne, naq ebyyrq gur fgbar sebz gur jryy'f zbhgu, naq
jngrerq gur sybpx bs Ynona uvf zbgure'f oebgure.

29:11 Naq Wnpbo xvffrq Enpury, naq yvsgrq hc uvf ibvpr, naq jrcg.

29:12 Naq Wnpbo gbyq Enpury gung ur jnf ure sngure'f oebgure, naq gung
ur jnf Erorxnu'f fba: naq fur ena naq gbyq ure sngure.

29:13 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Ynona urneq gur gvqvatf bs Wnpbo uvf
fvfgre'f fba, gung ur ena gb zrrg uvz, naq rzoenprq uvz, naq xvffrq
uvz, naq oebhtug uvz gb uvf ubhfr. Naq ur gbyq Ynona nyy gurfr guvatf.

29:14 Naq Ynona fnvq gb uvz, Fheryl gubh neg zl obar naq zl syrfu. Naq
ur nobqr jvgu uvz gur fcnpr bs n zbagu.

29:15 Naq Ynona fnvq hagb Wnpbo, Orpnhfr gubh neg zl oebgure,
fubhyqrfg gubh gurersber freir zr sbe abhtug? gryy zr, jung funyy gul
jntrf or?  29:16 Naq Ynona unq gjb qnhtugref: gur anzr bs gur ryqre
jnf Yrnu, naq gur anzr bs gur lbhatre jnf Enpury.

29:17 Yrnu jnf graqre rlrq; ohg Enpury jnf ornhgvshy naq jryy
snibherq.

29:18 Naq Wnpbo ybirq Enpury; naq fnvq, V jvyy freir gurr frira lrnef
sbe Enpury gul lbhatre qnhtugre.

29:19 Naq Ynona fnvq, Vg vf orggre gung V tvir ure gb gurr, guna gung
V fubhyq tvir ure gb nabgure zna: novqr jvgu zr.

29:20 Naq Wnpbo freirq frira lrnef sbe Enpury; naq gurl frrzrq hagb
uvz ohg n srj qnlf, sbe gur ybir ur unq gb ure.

29:21 Naq Wnpbo fnvq hagb Ynona, Tvir zr zl jvsr, sbe zl qnlf ner
shysvyyrq, gung V znl tb va hagb ure.

29:22 Naq Ynona tngurerq gbtrgure nyy gur zra bs gur cynpr, naq znqr n
srnfg.

29:23 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur riravat, gung ur gbbx Yrnu uvf
qnhtugre, naq oebhtug ure gb uvz; naq ur jrag va hagb ure.

29:24 Naq Ynona tnir hagb uvf qnhtugre Yrnu Mvycnu uvf znvq sbe na
unaqznvq.

29:25 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung va gur zbeavat, orubyq, vg jnf Yrnu:
naq ur fnvq gb Ynona, Jung vf guvf gubh unfg qbar hagb zr? qvq abg V
freir jvgu gurr sbe Enpury? jurersber gura unfg gubh orthvyrq zr?
29:26 Naq Ynona fnvq, Vg zhfg abg or fb qbar va bhe pbhagel, gb tvir
gur lbhatre orsber gur svefgobea.

29:27 Shysvy ure jrrx, naq jr jvyy tvir gurr guvf nyfb sbe gur freivpr
juvpu gubh funyg freir jvgu zr lrg frira bgure lrnef.

29:28 Naq Wnpbo qvq fb, naq shysvyyrq ure jrrx: naq ur tnir uvz Enpury
uvf qnhtugre gb jvsr nyfb.

29:29 Naq Ynona tnir gb Enpury uvf qnhtugre Ovyunu uvf unaqznvq gb or
ure znvq.

29:30 Naq ur jrag va nyfb hagb Enpury, naq ur ybirq nyfb Enpury zber
guna Yrnu, naq freirq jvgu uvz lrg frira bgure lrnef.

29:31 Naq jura gur YBEQ fnj gung Yrnu jnf ungrq, ur bcrarq ure jbzo:
ohg Enpury jnf oneera.

29:32 Naq Yrnu pbaprvirq, naq oner n fba, naq fur pnyyrq uvf anzr
Erhora: sbe fur fnvq, Fheryl gur YBEQ ungu ybbxrq hcba zl nssyvpgvba;
abj gurersber zl uhfonaq jvyy ybir zr.

29:33 Naq fur pbaprvirq ntnva, naq oner n fba; naq fnvq, Orpnhfr gur
YBEQ ungu urneq V jnf ungrq, ur ungu gurersber tvira zr guvf fba nyfb:
naq fur pnyyrq uvf anzr Fvzrba.

29:34 Naq fur pbaprvirq ntnva, naq oner n fba; naq fnvq, Abj guvf gvzr
jvyy zl uhfonaq or wbvarq hagb zr, orpnhfr V unir obea uvz guerr fbaf:
gurersber jnf uvf anzr pnyyrq Yriv.

29:35 Naq fur pbaprvirq ntnva, naq oner n fba: naq fur fnvq, Abj jvyy
V cenvfr gur YBEQ: gurersber fur pnyyrq uvf anzr Whqnu; naq yrsg
ornevat.

30:1 Naq jura Enpury fnj gung fur oner Wnpbo ab puvyqera, Enpury
raivrq ure fvfgre; naq fnvq hagb Wnpbo, Tvir zr puvyqera, be ryfr V
qvr.

30:2 Naq Wnpbo'f natre jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg Enpury: naq ur fnvq, Nz V
va Tbq'f fgrnq, jub ungu jvguuryq sebz gurr gur sehvg bs gur jbzo?
30:3 Naq fur fnvq, Orubyq zl znvq Ovyunu, tb va hagb ure; naq fur
funyy orne hcba zl xarrf, gung V znl nyfb unir puvyqera ol ure.

30:4 Naq fur tnir uvz Ovyunu ure unaqznvq gb jvsr: naq Wnpbo jrag va
hagb ure.

30:5 Naq Ovyunu pbaprvirq, naq oner Wnpbo n fba.

30:6 Naq Enpury fnvq, Tbq ungu whqtrq zr, naq ungu nyfb urneq zl
ibvpr, naq ungu tvira zr n fba: gurersber pnyyrq fur uvf anzr Qna.

30:7 Naq Ovyunu Enpury'f znvq pbaprvirq ntnva, naq oner Wnpbo n frpbaq
fba.

30:8 Naq Enpury fnvq, Jvgu terng jerfgyvatf unir V jerfgyrq jvgu zl
fvfgre, naq V unir cerinvyrq: naq fur pnyyrq uvf anzr Ancugnyv.

30:9 Jura Yrnu fnj gung fur unq yrsg ornevat, fur gbbx Mvycnu ure
znvq, naq tnir ure Wnpbo gb jvsr.

30:10 Naq Mvycnu Yrnu'f znvq oner Wnpbo n fba.

30:11 Naq Yrnu fnvq, N gebbc pbzrgu: naq fur pnyyrq uvf anzr Tnq.

30:12 Naq Mvycnu Yrnu'f znvq oner Wnpbo n frpbaq fba.

30:13 Naq Yrnu fnvq, Unccl nz V, sbe gur qnhtugref jvyy pnyy zr
oyrffrq: naq fur pnyyrq uvf anzr Nfure.

30:14 Naq Erhora jrag va gur qnlf bs jurng uneirfg, naq sbhaq
znaqenxrf va gur svryq, naq oebhtug gurz hagb uvf zbgure Yrnu. Gura
Enpury fnvq gb Yrnu, Tvir zr, V cenl gurr, bs gul fba'f znaqenxrf.

30:15 Naq fur fnvq hagb ure, Vf vg n fznyy znggre gung gubh unfg gnxra
zl uhfonaq? naq jbhyqrfg gubh gnxr njnl zl fba'f znaqenxrf nyfb? Naq
Enpury fnvq, Gurersber ur funyy yvr jvgu gurr gb avtug sbe gul fba'f
znaqenxrf.

30:16 Naq Wnpbo pnzr bhg bs gur svryq va gur riravat, naq Yrnu jrag
bhg gb zrrg uvz, naq fnvq, Gubh zhfg pbzr va hagb zr; sbe fheryl V
unir uverq gurr jvgu zl fba'f znaqenxrf. Naq ur ynl jvgu ure gung
avtug.

30:17 Naq Tbq urnexrarq hagb Yrnu, naq fur pbaprvirq, naq oner Wnpbo
gur svsgu fba.

30:18 Naq Yrnu fnvq, Tbq ungu tvira zr zl uver, orpnhfr V unir tvira
zl znvqra gb zl uhfonaq: naq fur pnyyrq uvf anzr Vffnpune.

30:19 Naq Yrnu pbaprvirq ntnva, naq oner Wnpbo gur fvkgu fba.

30:20 Naq Yrnu fnvq, Tbq ungu raqhrq zr jvgu n tbbq qbjel; abj jvyy zl
uhfonaq qjryy jvgu zr, orpnhfr V unir obea uvz fvk fbaf: naq fur
pnyyrq uvf anzr Mrohyha.

30:21 Naq nsgrejneqf fur oner n qnhtugre, naq pnyyrq ure anzr Qvanu.

30:22 Naq Tbq erzrzorerq Enpury, naq Tbq urnexrarq gb ure, naq bcrarq
ure jbzo.

30:23 Naq fur pbaprvirq, naq oner n fba; naq fnvq, Tbq ungu gnxra njnl
zl ercebnpu: 30:24 Naq fur pnyyrq uvf anzr Wbfrcu; naq fnvq, Gur YBEQ
funyy nqq gb zr nabgure fba.

30:25 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Enpury unq obea Wbfrcu, gung Wnpbo
fnvq hagb Ynona, Fraq zr njnl, gung V znl tb hagb zvar bja cynpr, naq
gb zl pbhagel.

30:26 Tvir zr zl jvirf naq zl puvyqera, sbe jubz V unir freirq gurr,
naq yrg zr tb: sbe gubh xabjrfg zl freivpr juvpu V unir qbar gurr.

30:27 Naq Ynona fnvq hagb uvz, V cenl gurr, vs V unir sbhaq snibhe va
guvar rlrf, gneel: sbe V unir yrnearq ol rkcrevrapr gung gur YBEQ ungu
oyrffrq zr sbe gul fnxr.

30:28 Naq ur fnvq, Nccbvag zr gul jntrf, naq V jvyy tvir vg.

30:29 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Gubh xabjrfg ubj V unir freirq gurr, naq
ubj gul pnggyr jnf jvgu zr.

30:30 Sbe vg jnf yvggyr juvpu gubh unqfg orsber V pnzr, naq vg vf abj
vapernfrq hagb n zhygvghqr; naq gur YBEQ ungu oyrffrq gurr fvapr zl
pbzvat: naq abj jura funyy V cebivqr sbe zvar bja ubhfr nyfb?  30:31
Naq ur fnvq, Jung funyy V tvir gurr? Naq Wnpbo fnvq, Gubh funyg abg
tvir zr nal guvat: vs gubh jvyg qb guvf guvat sbe zr, V jvyy ntnva
srrq naq xrrc gul sybpx.

30:32 V jvyy cnff guebhtu nyy gul sybpx gb qnl, erzbivat sebz gurapr
nyy gur fcrpxyrq naq fcbggrq pnggyr, naq nyy gur oebja pnggyr nzbat
gur furrc, naq gur fcbggrq naq fcrpxyrq nzbat gur tbngf: naq bs fhpu
funyy or zl uver.

30:33 Fb funyy zl evtugrbhfarff nafjre sbe zr va gvzr gb pbzr, jura vg
funyy pbzr sbe zl uver orsber gul snpr: rirel bar gung vf abg fcrpxyrq
naq fcbggrq nzbat gur tbngf, naq oebja nzbat gur furrc, gung funyy or
pbhagrq fgbyra jvgu zr.

30:34 Naq Ynona fnvq, Orubyq, V jbhyq vg zvtug or nppbeqvat gb gul
jbeq.

30:35 Naq ur erzbirq gung qnl gur ur tbngf gung jrer evatfgenxrq naq
fcbggrq, naq nyy gur fur tbngf gung jrer fcrpxyrq naq fcbggrq, naq
rirel bar gung unq fbzr juvgr va vg, naq nyy gur oebja nzbat gur
furrc, naq tnir gurz vagb gur unaq bs uvf fbaf.

30:36 Naq ur frg guerr qnlf' wbhearl orgjvkg uvzfrys naq Wnpbo: naq
Wnpbo srq gur erfg bs Ynona'f sybpxf.

30:37 Naq Wnpbo gbbx uvz ebqf bs terra cbcyne, naq bs gur unmry naq
purfahg gerr; naq cvyyrq juvgr fgenxrf va gurz, naq znqr gur juvgr
nccrne juvpu jnf va gur ebqf.

30:38 Naq ur frg gur ebqf juvpu ur unq cvyyrq orsber gur sybpxf va gur
thggref va gur jngrevat gebhtuf jura gur sybpxf pnzr gb qevax, gung
gurl fubhyq pbaprvir jura gurl pnzr gb qevax.

30:39 Naq gur sybpxf pbaprvirq orsber gur ebqf, naq oebhtug sbegu
pnggyr evatfgenxrq, fcrpxyrq, naq fcbggrq.

30:40 Naq Wnpbo qvq frcnengr gur ynzof, naq frg gur snprf bs gur
sybpxf gbjneq gur evatfgenxrq, naq nyy gur oebja va gur sybpx bs
Ynona; naq ur chg uvf bja sybpxf ol gurzfryirf, naq chg gurz abg hagb
Ynona'f pnggyr.

30:41 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jurafbrire gur fgebatre pnggyr qvq
pbaprvir, gung Wnpbo ynvq gur ebqf orsber gur rlrf bs gur pnggyr va
gur thggref, gung gurl zvtug pbaprvir nzbat gur ebqf.

30:42 Ohg jura gur pnggyr jrer srroyr, ur chg gurz abg va: fb gur
srroyre jrer Ynona'f, naq gur fgebatre Wnpbo'f.

30:43 Naq gur zna vapernfrq rkprrqvatyl, naq unq zhpu pnggyr, naq
znvqfreinagf, naq zrafreinagf, naq pnzryf, naq nffrf.

31:1 Naq ur urneq gur jbeqf bs Ynona'f fbaf, fnlvat, Wnpbo ungu gnxra
njnl nyy gung jnf bhe sngure'f; naq bs gung juvpu jnf bhe sngure'f
ungu ur tbggra nyy guvf tybel.

31:2 Naq Wnpbo oruryq gur pbhagranapr bs Ynona, naq, orubyq, vg jnf
abg gbjneq uvz nf orsber.

31:3 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Wnpbo, Erghea hagb gur ynaq bs gul
snguref, naq gb gul xvaqerq; naq V jvyy or jvgu gurr.

31:4 Naq Wnpbo frag naq pnyyrq Enpury naq Yrnu gb gur svryq hagb uvf
sybpx, 31:5 Naq fnvq hagb gurz, V frr lbhe sngure'f pbhagranapr, gung
vg vf abg gbjneq zr nf orsber; ohg gur Tbq bs zl sngure ungu orra jvgu
zr.

31:6 Naq lr xabj gung jvgu nyy zl cbjre V unir freirq lbhe sngure.

31:7 Naq lbhe sngure ungu qrprvirq zr, naq punatrq zl jntrf gra gvzrf;
ohg Tbq fhssrerq uvz abg gb uheg zr.

31:8 Vs ur fnvq guhf, Gur fcrpxyrq funyy or gul jntrf; gura nyy gur
pnggyr oner fcrpxyrq: naq vs ur fnvq guhf, Gur evatfgenxrq funyy or
gul uver; gura oner nyy gur pnggyr evatfgenxrq.

31:9 Guhf Tbq ungu gnxra njnl gur pnggyr bs lbhe sngure, naq tvira
gurz gb zr.

31:10 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur gvzr gung gur pnggyr pbaprvirq, gung
V yvsgrq hc zvar rlrf, naq fnj va n qernz, naq, orubyq, gur enzf juvpu
yrncrq hcba gur pnggyr jrer evatfgenxrq, fcrpxyrq, naq tevfyrq.

31:11 Naq gur natry bs Tbq fcnxr hagb zr va n qernz, fnlvat, Wnpbo:
Naq V fnvq, Urer nz V.

31:12 Naq ur fnvq, Yvsg hc abj guvar rlrf, naq frr, nyy gur enzf juvpu
yrnc hcba gur pnggyr ner evatfgenxrq, fcrpxyrq, naq tevfyrq: sbe V
unir frra nyy gung Ynona qbrgu hagb gurr.

31:13 V nz gur Tbq bs Orgury, jurer gubh nabvagrqfg gur cvyyne, naq
jurer gubh ibjrqfg n ibj hagb zr: abj nevfr, trg gurr bhg sebz guvf
ynaq, naq erghea hagb gur ynaq bs gul xvaqerq.

31:14 Naq Enpury naq Yrnu nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb uvz, Vf gurer lrg nal
cbegvba be vaurevgnapr sbe hf va bhe sngure'f ubhfr?  31:15 Ner jr abg
pbhagrq bs uvz fgenatref? sbe ur ungu fbyq hf, naq ungu dhvgr qribherq
nyfb bhe zbarl.

31:16 Sbe nyy gur evpurf juvpu Tbq ungu gnxra sebz bhe sngure, gung vf
bhef, naq bhe puvyqera'f: abj gura, jungfbrire Tbq ungu fnvq hagb
gurr, qb.

31:17 Gura Wnpbo ebfr hc, naq frg uvf fbaf naq uvf jvirf hcba pnzryf;
31:18 Naq ur pneevrq njnl nyy uvf pnggyr, naq nyy uvf tbbqf juvpu ur
unq tbggra, gur pnggyr bs uvf trggvat, juvpu ur unq tbggra va
Cnqnanenz, sbe gb tb gb Vfnnp uvf sngure va gur ynaq bs Pnanna.

31:19 Naq Ynona jrag gb furne uvf furrc: naq Enpury unq fgbyra gur
vzntrf gung jrer ure sngure'f.

31:20 Naq Wnpbo fgbyr njnl hanjnerf gb Ynona gur Flevna, va gung ur
gbyq uvz abg gung ur syrq.

31:21 Fb ur syrq jvgu nyy gung ur unq; naq ur ebfr hc, naq cnffrq bire
gur evire, naq frg uvf snpr gbjneq gur zbhag Tvyrnq.

31:22 Naq vg jnf gbyq Ynona ba gur guveq qnl gung Wnpbo jnf syrq.

31:23 Naq ur gbbx uvf oerguera jvgu uvz, naq chefhrq nsgre uvz frira
qnlf' wbhearl; naq gurl biregbbx uvz va gur zbhag Tvyrnq.

31:24 Naq Tbq pnzr gb Ynona gur Flevna va n qernz ol avtug, naq fnvq
hagb uvz, Gnxr urrq gung gubh fcrnx abg gb Wnpbo rvgure tbbq be onq.

31:25 Gura Ynona biregbbx Wnpbo. Abj Wnpbo unq cvgpurq uvf grag va gur
zbhag: naq Ynona jvgu uvf oerguera cvgpurq va gur zbhag bs Tvyrnq.

31:26 Naq Ynona fnvq gb Wnpbo, Jung unfg gubh qbar, gung gubh unfg
fgbyra njnl hanjnerf gb zr, naq pneevrq njnl zl qnhtugref, nf pncgvirf
gnxra jvgu gur fjbeq?  31:27 Jurersber qvqfg gubh syrr njnl frpergyl,
naq fgrny njnl sebz zr; naq qvqfg abg gryy zr, gung V zvtug unir frag
gurr njnl jvgu zvegu, naq jvgu fbatf, jvgu gnoerg, naq jvgu unec?
31:28 Naq unfg abg fhssrerq zr gb xvff zl fbaf naq zl qnhtugref? gubh
unfg abj qbar sbbyvfuyl va fb qbvat.

31:29 Vg vf va gur cbjre bs zl unaq gb qb lbh uheg: ohg gur Tbq bs
lbhe sngure fcnxr hagb zr lrfgreavtug, fnlvat, Gnxr gubh urrq gung
gubh fcrnx abg gb Wnpbo rvgure tbbq be onq.

31:30 Naq abj, gubhtu gubh jbhyqrfg arrqf or tbar, orpnhfr gubh fber
ybatrqfg nsgre gul sngure'f ubhfr, lrg jurersber unfg gubh fgbyra zl
tbqf?  31:31 Naq Wnpbo nafjrerq naq fnvq gb Ynona, Orpnhfr V jnf
nsenvq: sbe V fnvq, Crenqiragher gubh jbhyqrfg gnxr ol sbepr gul
qnhtugref sebz zr.

31:32 Jvgu jubzfbrire gubh svaqrfg gul tbqf, yrg uvz abg yvir: orsber
bhe oerguera qvfprea gubh jung vf guvar jvgu zr, naq gnxr vg gb gurr.
Sbe Wnpbo xarj abg gung Enpury unq fgbyra gurz.

31:33 Naq Ynona jrag vagb Wnpbo'f grag, naq vagb Yrnu'f grag, naq vagb
gur gjb znvqfreinagf' gragf; ohg ur sbhaq gurz abg. Gura jrag ur bhg
bs Yrnu'f grag, naq ragrerq vagb Enpury'f grag.

31:34 Abj Enpury unq gnxra gur vzntrf, naq chg gurz va gur pnzry'f
sheavgher, naq fng hcba gurz. Naq Ynona frnepurq nyy gur grag, ohg
sbhaq gurz abg.

31:35 Naq fur fnvq gb ure sngure, Yrg vg abg qvfcyrnfr zl ybeq gung V
pnaabg evfr hc orsber gurr; sbe gur phfgbz bs jbzra vf hcba zr. Naq ur
frnepurq ohg sbhaq abg gur vzntrf.

31:36 Naq Wnpbo jnf jebgu, naq pubqr jvgu Ynona: naq Wnpbo nafjrerq
naq fnvq gb Ynona, Jung vf zl gerfcnff? jung vf zl fva, gung gubh unfg
fb ubgyl chefhrq nsgre zr?  31:37 Jurernf gubh unfg frnepurq nyy zl
fghss, jung unfg gubh sbhaq bs nyy gul ubhfrubyq fghss? frg vg urer
orsber zl oerguera naq gul oerguera, gung gurl znl whqtr orgjvkg hf
obgu.

31:38 Guvf gjragl lrnef unir V orra jvgu gurr; gul rjrf naq gul fur
tbngf unir abg pnfg gurve lbhat, naq gur enzf bs gul sybpx unir V abg
rngra.

31:39 Gung juvpu jnf gbea bs ornfgf V oebhtug abg hagb gurr; V oner
gur ybff bs vg; bs zl unaq qvqfg gubh erdhver vg, jurgure fgbyra ol
qnl, be fgbyra ol avtug.

31:40 Guhf V jnf; va gur qnl gur qebhtug pbafhzrq zr, naq gur sebfg ol
avtug; naq zl fyrrc qrcnegrq sebz zvar rlrf.

31:41 Guhf unir V orra gjragl lrnef va gul ubhfr; V freirq gurr
sbhegrra lrnef sbe gul gjb qnhtugref, naq fvk lrnef sbe gul pnggyr:
naq gubh unfg punatrq zl jntrf gra gvzrf.

31:42 Rkprcg gur Tbq bs zl sngure, gur Tbq bs Noenunz, naq gur srne bs
Vfnnp, unq orra jvgu zr, fheryl gubh unqfg frag zr njnl abj rzcgl. Tbq
ungu frra zvar nssyvpgvba naq gur ynobhe bs zl unaqf, naq erohxrq gurr
lrfgreavtug.

31:43 Naq Ynona nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb Wnpbo, Gurfr qnhtugref ner zl
qnhtugref, naq gurfr puvyqera ner zl puvyqera, naq gurfr pnggyr ner zl
pnggyr, naq nyy gung gubh frrfg vf zvar: naq jung pna V qb guvf qnl
hagb gurfr zl qnhtugref, be hagb gurve puvyqera juvpu gurl unir obea?
31:44 Abj gurersber pbzr gubh, yrg hf znxr n pbiranag, V naq gubh; naq
yrg vg or sbe n jvgarff orgjrra zr naq gurr.

31:45 Naq Wnpbo gbbx n fgbar, naq frg vg hc sbe n cvyyne.

31:46 Naq Wnpbo fnvq hagb uvf oerguera, Tngure fgbarf; naq gurl gbbx
fgbarf, naq znqr na urnc: naq gurl qvq rng gurer hcba gur urnc.

31:47 Naq Ynona pnyyrq vg Wrtnefnunqhgun: ohg Wnpbo pnyyrq vg Tnyrrq.

31:48 Naq Ynona fnvq, Guvf urnc vf n jvgarff orgjrra zr naq gurr guvf
qnl.

Gurersber jnf gur anzr bs vg pnyyrq Tnyrrq; 31:49 Naq Zvmcnu; sbe ur
fnvq, Gur YBEQ jngpu orgjrra zr naq gurr, jura jr ner nofrag bar sebz
nabgure.

31:50 Vs gubh funyg nssyvpg zl qnhtugref, be vs gubh funyg gnxr bgure
jvirf orfvqr zl qnhtugref, ab zna vf jvgu hf; frr, Tbq vf jvgarff
orgjvkg zr naq gurr.

31:51 Naq Ynona fnvq gb Wnpbo, Orubyq guvf urnc, naq orubyq guvf
cvyyne, juvpu V unir pnfg orgjvkg zr naq gurr: 31:52 Guvf urnc or
jvgarff, naq guvf cvyyne or jvgarff, gung V jvyy abg cnff bire guvf
urnc gb gurr, naq gung gubh funyg abg cnff bire guvf urnc naq guvf
cvyyne hagb zr, sbe unez.

31:53 Gur Tbq bs Noenunz, naq gur Tbq bs Anube, gur Tbq bs gurve
sngure, whqtr orgjvkg hf. Naq Wnpbo fjner ol gur srne bs uvf sngure
Vfnnp.

31:54 Gura Wnpbo bssrerq fnpevsvpr hcba gur zbhag, naq pnyyrq uvf
oerguera gb rng oernq: naq gurl qvq rng oernq, naq gneevrq nyy avtug
va gur zbhag.

31:55 Naq rneyl va gur zbeavat Ynona ebfr hc, naq xvffrq uvf fbaf naq
uvf qnhtugref, naq oyrffrq gurz: naq Ynona qrcnegrq, naq erghearq hagb
uvf cynpr.

32:1 Naq Wnpbo jrag ba uvf jnl, naq gur natryf bs Tbq zrg uvz.

32:2 Naq jura Wnpbo fnj gurz, ur fnvq, Guvf vf Tbq'f ubfg: naq ur
pnyyrq gur anzr bs gung cynpr Znunanvz.

32:3 Naq Wnpbo frag zrffratref orsber uvz gb Rfnh uvf oebgure hagb gur
ynaq bs Frve, gur pbhagel bs Rqbz.

32:4 Naq ur pbzznaqrq gurz, fnlvat, Guhf funyy lr fcrnx hagb zl ybeq
Rfnh; Gul freinag Wnpbo fnvgu guhf, V unir fbwbhearq jvgu Ynona, naq
fgnlrq gurer hagvy abj: 32:5 Naq V unir bkra, naq nffrf, sybpxf, naq
zrafreinagf, naq jbzrafreinagf: naq V unir frag gb gryy zl ybeq, gung
V znl svaq tenpr va gul fvtug.

32:6 Naq gur zrffratref erghearq gb Wnpbo, fnlvat, Jr pnzr gb gul
oebgure Rfnh, naq nyfb ur pbzrgu gb zrrg gurr, naq sbhe uhaqerq zra
jvgu uvz.

32:7 Gura Wnpbo jnf terngyl nsenvq naq qvfgerffrq: naq ur qvivqrq gur
crbcyr gung jnf jvgu uvz, naq gur sybpxf, naq ureqf, naq gur pnzryf,
vagb gjb onaqf; 32:8 Naq fnvq, Vs Rfnh pbzr gb gur bar pbzcnal, naq
fzvgr vg, gura gur bgure pbzcnal juvpu vf yrsg funyy rfpncr.

32:9 Naq Wnpbo fnvq, B Tbq bs zl sngure Noenunz, naq Tbq bs zl sngure
Vfnnp, gur YBEQ juvpu fnvqfg hagb zr, Erghea hagb gul pbhagel, naq gb
gul xvaqerq, naq V jvyy qrny jryy jvgu gurr: 32:10 V nz abg jbegul bs
gur yrnfg bs nyy gur zrepvrf, naq bs nyy gur gehgu, juvpu gubh unfg
furjrq hagb gul freinag; sbe jvgu zl fgnss V cnffrq bire guvf Wbeqna;
naq abj V nz orpbzr gjb onaqf.

32:11 Qryvire zr, V cenl gurr, sebz gur unaq bs zl oebgure, sebz gur
unaq bs Rfnh: sbe V srne uvz, yrfg ur jvyy pbzr naq fzvgr zr, naq gur
zbgure jvgu gur puvyqera.

32:12 Naq gubh fnvqfg, V jvyy fheryl qb gurr tbbq, naq znxr gul frrq
nf gur fnaq bs gur frn, juvpu pnaabg or ahzorerq sbe zhygvghqr.

32:13 Naq ur ybqtrq gurer gung fnzr avtug; naq gbbx bs gung juvpu pnzr
gb uvf unaq n cerfrag sbe Rfnh uvf oebgure; 32:14 Gjb uhaqerq fur
tbngf, naq gjragl ur tbngf, gjb uhaqerq rjrf, naq gjragl enzf, 32:15
Guvegl zvypu pnzryf jvgu gurve pbygf, sbegl xvar, naq gra ohyyf,
gjragl fur nffrf, naq gra sbnyf.

32:16 Naq ur qryvirerq gurz vagb gur unaq bs uvf freinagf, rirel qebir
ol gurzfryirf; naq fnvq hagb uvf freinagf, Cnff bire orsber zr, naq
chg n fcnpr orgjvkg qebir naq qebir.

32:17 Naq ur pbzznaqrq gur sberzbfg, fnlvat, Jura Rfnh zl oebgure
zrrgrgu gurr, naq nfxrgu gurr, fnlvat, Jubfr neg gubh? naq juvgure
tbrfg gubh? naq jubfr ner gurfr orsber gurr?  32:18 Gura gubh funyg
fnl, Gurl or gul freinag Wnpbo'f; vg vf n cerfrag frag hagb zl ybeq
Rfnh: naq, orubyq, nyfb ur vf oruvaq hf.

32:19 Naq fb pbzznaqrq ur gur frpbaq, naq gur guveq, naq nyy gung
sbyybjrq gur qebirf, fnlvat, Ba guvf znaare funyy lr fcrnx hagb Rfnh,
jura lr svaq uvz.

32:20 Naq fnl lr zberbire, Orubyq, gul freinag Wnpbo vf oruvaq hf. Sbe
ur fnvq, V jvyy nccrnfr uvz jvgu gur cerfrag gung tbrgu orsber zr, naq
nsgrejneq V jvyy frr uvf snpr; crenqiragher ur jvyy npprcg bs zr.

32:21 Fb jrag gur cerfrag bire orsber uvz: naq uvzfrys ybqtrq gung
avtug va gur pbzcnal.

32:22 Naq ur ebfr hc gung avtug, naq gbbx uvf gjb jvirf, naq uvf gjb
jbzrafreinagf, naq uvf ryrira fbaf, naq cnffrq bire gur sbeq Wnoobx.

32:23 Naq ur gbbx gurz, naq frag gurz bire gur oebbx, naq frag bire
gung ur unq.

32:24 Naq Wnpbo jnf yrsg nybar; naq gurer jerfgyrq n zna jvgu uvz
hagvy gur oernxvat bs gur qnl.

32:25 Naq jura ur fnj gung ur cerinvyrq abg ntnvafg uvz, ur gbhpurq
gur ubyybj bs uvf guvtu; naq gur ubyybj bs Wnpbo'f guvtu jnf bhg bs
wbvag, nf ur jerfgyrq jvgu uvz.

32:26 Naq ur fnvq, Yrg zr tb, sbe gur qnl oernxrgu. Naq ur fnvq, V
jvyy abg yrg gurr tb, rkprcg gubh oyrff zr.

32:27 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Jung vf gul anzr? Naq ur fnvq, Wnpbo.

32:28 Naq ur fnvq, Gul anzr funyy or pnyyrq ab zber Wnpbo, ohg Vfenry:
sbe nf n cevapr unfg gubh cbjre jvgu Tbq naq jvgu zra, naq unfg
cerinvyrq.

32:29 Naq Wnpbo nfxrq uvz, naq fnvq, Gryy zr, V cenl gurr, gul anzr.
Naq ur fnvq, Jurersber vf vg gung gubh qbfg nfx nsgre zl anzr? Naq ur
oyrffrq uvz gurer.

32:30 Naq Wnpbo pnyyrq gur anzr bs gur cynpr Cravry: sbe V unir frra
Tbq snpr gb snpr, naq zl yvsr vf cerfreirq.

32:31 Naq nf ur cnffrq bire Crahry gur fha ebfr hcba uvz, naq ur
unygrq hcba uvf guvtu.

32:32 Gurersber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry rng abg bs gur fvarj juvpu
fuenax, juvpu vf hcba gur ubyybj bs gur guvtu, hagb guvf qnl: orpnhfr
ur gbhpurq gur ubyybj bs Wnpbo'f guvtu va gur fvarj gung fuenax.

33:1 Naq Wnpbo yvsgrq hc uvf rlrf, naq ybbxrq, naq, orubyq, Rfnh pnzr,
naq jvgu uvz sbhe uhaqerq zra. Naq ur qvivqrq gur puvyqera hagb Yrnu,
naq hagb Enpury, naq hagb gur gjb unaqznvqf.

33:2 Naq ur chg gur unaqznvqf naq gurve puvyqera sberzbfg, naq Yrnu
naq ure puvyqera nsgre, naq Enpury naq Wbfrcu uvaqrezbfg.

33:3 Naq ur cnffrq bire orsber gurz, naq objrq uvzfrys gb gur tebhaq
frira gvzrf, hagvy ur pnzr arne gb uvf oebgure.

33:4 Naq Rfnh ena gb zrrg uvz, naq rzoenprq uvz, naq sryy ba uvf arpx,
naq xvffrq uvz: naq gurl jrcg.

33:5 Naq ur yvsgrq hc uvf rlrf, naq fnj gur jbzra naq gur puvyqera;
naq fnvq, Jub ner gubfr jvgu gurr? Naq ur fnvq, Gur puvyqera juvpu Tbq
ungu tenpvbhfyl tvira gul freinag.

33:6 Gura gur unaqznvqraf pnzr arne, gurl naq gurve puvyqera, naq gurl
objrq gurzfryirf.

33:7 Naq Yrnu nyfb jvgu ure puvyqera pnzr arne, naq objrq gurzfryirf:
naq nsgre pnzr Wbfrcu arne naq Enpury, naq gurl objrq gurzfryirf.

33:8 Naq ur fnvq, Jung zrnarfg gubh ol nyy guvf qebir juvpu V zrg? Naq
ur fnvq, Gurfr ner gb svaq tenpr va gur fvtug bs zl ybeq.

33:9 Naq Rfnh fnvq, V unir rabhtu, zl oebgure; xrrc gung gubh unfg
hagb gulfrys.

33:10 Naq Wnpbo fnvq, Anl, V cenl gurr, vs abj V unir sbhaq tenpr va
gul fvtug, gura erprvir zl cerfrag ng zl unaq: sbe gurersber V unir
frra gul snpr, nf gubhtu V unq frra gur snpr bs Tbq, naq gubh jnfg
cyrnfrq jvgu zr.

33:11 Gnxr, V cenl gurr, zl oyrffvat gung vf oebhtug gb gurr; orpnhfr
Tbq ungu qrnyg tenpvbhfyl jvgu zr, naq orpnhfr V unir rabhtu. Naq ur
hetrq uvz, naq ur gbbx vg.

33:12 Naq ur fnvq, Yrg hf gnxr bhe wbhearl, naq yrg hf tb, naq V jvyy
tb orsber gurr.

33:13 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Zl ybeq xabjrgu gung gur puvyqera ner
graqre, naq gur sybpxf naq ureqf jvgu lbhat ner jvgu zr: naq vs zra
fubhyq bireqevir gurz bar qnl, nyy gur sybpx jvyy qvr.

33:14 Yrg zl ybeq, V cenl gurr, cnff bire orsber uvf freinag: naq V
jvyy yrnq ba fbsgyl, nppbeqvat nf gur pnggyr gung tbrgu orsber zr naq
gur puvyqera or noyr gb raqher, hagvy V pbzr hagb zl ybeq hagb Frve.

33:15 Naq Rfnh fnvq, Yrg zr abj yrnir jvgu gurr fbzr bs gur sbyx gung
ner jvgu zr. Naq ur fnvq, Jung arrqrgu vg? yrg zr svaq tenpr va gur
fvtug bs zl ybeq.

33:16 Fb Rfnh erghearq gung qnl ba uvf jnl hagb Frve.

33:17 Naq Wnpbo wbhearlrq gb Fhppbgu, naq ohvyg uvz na ubhfr, naq znqr
obbguf sbe uvf pnggyr: gurersber gur anzr bs gur cynpr vf pnyyrq
Fhppbgu.

33:18 Naq Wnpbo pnzr gb Funyrz, n pvgl bs Furpurz, juvpu vf va gur
ynaq bs Pnanna, jura ur pnzr sebz Cnqnanenz; naq cvgpurq uvf grag
orsber gur pvgl.

33:19 Naq ur obhtug n cnepry bs n svryq, jurer ur unq fcernq uvf grag,
ng gur unaq bs gur puvyqera bs Unzbe, Furpurz'f sngure, sbe na uhaqerq
cvrprf bs zbarl.

33:20 Naq ur rerpgrq gurer na nygne, naq pnyyrq vg RyryburVfenry.

34:1 Naq Qvanu gur qnhtugre bs Yrnu, juvpu fur oner hagb Wnpbo, jrag
bhg gb frr gur qnhtugref bs gur ynaq.

34:2 Naq jura Furpurz gur fba bs Unzbe gur Uvivgr, cevapr bs gur
pbhagel, fnj ure, ur gbbx ure, naq ynl jvgu ure, naq qrsvyrq ure.

34:3 Naq uvf fbhy pynir hagb Qvanu gur qnhtugre bs Wnpbo, naq ur ybirq
gur qnzfry, naq fcnxr xvaqyl hagb gur qnzfry.

34:4 Naq Furpurz fcnxr hagb uvf sngure Unzbe, fnlvat, Trg zr guvf
qnzfry gb jvsr.

34:5 Naq Wnpbo urneq gung ur unq qrsvyrq Qvanu uvf qnhtugre: abj uvf
fbaf jrer jvgu uvf pnggyr va gur svryq: naq Wnpbo uryq uvf crnpr hagvy
gurl jrer pbzr.

34:6 Naq Unzbe gur sngure bs Furpurz jrag bhg hagb Wnpbo gb pbzzhar
jvgu uvz.

34:7 Naq gur fbaf bs Wnpbo pnzr bhg bs gur svryq jura gurl urneq vg:
naq gur zra jrer tevrirq, naq gurl jrer irel jebgu, orpnhfr ur unq
jebhtug sbyyl va Vfenry va ylvat jvgu Wnpbo'f qnhtugre: juvpu guvat
bhtug abg gb or qbar.

34:8 Naq Unzbe pbzzharq jvgu gurz, fnlvat, Gur fbhy bs zl fba Furpurz
ybatrgu sbe lbhe qnhtugre: V cenl lbh tvir ure uvz gb jvsr.

34:9 Naq znxr lr zneevntrf jvgu hf, naq tvir lbhe qnhtugref hagb hf,
naq gnxr bhe qnhtugref hagb lbh.

34:10 Naq lr funyy qjryy jvgu hf: naq gur ynaq funyy or orsber lbh;
qjryy naq genqr lr gurerva, naq trg lbh cbffrffvbaf gurerva.

34:11 Naq Furpurz fnvq hagb ure sngure naq hagb ure oerguera, Yrg zr
svaq tenpr va lbhe rlrf, naq jung lr funyy fnl hagb zr V jvyy tvir.

34:12 Nfx zr arire fb zhpu qbjel naq tvsg, naq V jvyy tvir nppbeqvat
nf lr funyy fnl hagb zr: ohg tvir zr gur qnzfry gb jvsr.

34:13 Naq gur fbaf bs Wnpbo nafjrerq Furpurz naq Unzbe uvf sngure
qrprvgshyyl, naq fnvq, orpnhfr ur unq qrsvyrq Qvanu gurve fvfgre:
34:14 Naq gurl fnvq hagb gurz, Jr pnaabg qb guvf guvat, gb tvir bhe
fvfgre gb bar gung vf hapvephzpvfrq; sbe gung jrer n ercebnpu hagb hf:
34:15 Ohg va guvf jvyy jr pbafrag hagb lbh: Vs lr jvyy or nf jr or,
gung rirel znyr bs lbh or pvephzpvfrq; 34:16 Gura jvyy jr tvir bhe
qnhtugref hagb lbh, naq jr jvyy gnxr lbhe qnhtugref gb hf, naq jr jvyy
qjryy jvgu lbh, naq jr jvyy orpbzr bar crbcyr.

34:17 Ohg vs lr jvyy abg urnexra hagb hf, gb or pvephzpvfrq; gura jvyy
jr gnxr bhe qnhtugre, naq jr jvyy or tbar.

34:18 Naq gurve jbeqf cyrnfrq Unzbe, naq Furpurz Unzbe'f fba.

34:19 Naq gur lbhat zna qrsreerq abg gb qb gur guvat, orpnhfr ur unq
qryvtug va Wnpbo'f qnhtugre: naq ur jnf zber ubabhenoyr guna nyy gur
ubhfr bs uvf sngure.

34:20 Naq Unzbe naq Furpurz uvf fba pnzr hagb gur tngr bs gurve pvgl,
naq pbzzharq jvgu gur zra bs gurve pvgl, fnlvat, 34:21 Gurfr zra ner
crnprnoyr jvgu hf; gurersber yrg gurz qjryy va gur ynaq, naq genqr
gurerva; sbe gur ynaq, orubyq, vg vf ynetr rabhtu sbe gurz; yrg hf
gnxr gurve qnhtugref gb hf sbe jvirf, naq yrg hf tvir gurz bhe
qnhtugref.

34:22 Bayl urerva jvyy gur zra pbafrag hagb hf sbe gb qjryy jvgu hf,
gb or bar crbcyr, vs rirel znyr nzbat hf or pvephzpvfrq, nf gurl ner
pvephzpvfrq.

34:23 Funyy abg gurve pnggyr naq gurve fhofgnapr naq rirel ornfg bs
gurve'f or bhe'f? bayl yrg hf pbafrag hagb gurz, naq gurl jvyy qjryy
jvgu hf.

34:24 Naq hagb Unzbe naq hagb Furpurz uvf fba urnexrarq nyy gung jrag
bhg bs gur tngr bs uvf pvgl; naq rirel znyr jnf pvephzpvfrq, nyy gung
jrag bhg bs gur tngr bs uvf pvgl.

34:25 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur guveq qnl, jura gurl jrer fber, gung
gjb bs gur fbaf bs Wnpbo, Fvzrba naq Yriv, Qvanu'f oerguera, gbbx rnpu
zna uvf fjbeq, naq pnzr hcba gur pvgl obyqyl, naq fyrj nyy gur znyrf.

34:26 Naq gurl fyrj Unzbe naq Furpurz uvf fba jvgu gur rqtr bs gur
fjbeq, naq gbbx Qvanu bhg bs Furpurz'f ubhfr, naq jrag bhg.

34:27 Gur fbaf bs Wnpbo pnzr hcba gur fynva, naq fcbvyrq gur pvgl,
orpnhfr gurl unq qrsvyrq gurve fvfgre.

34:28 Gurl gbbx gurve furrc, naq gurve bkra, naq gurve nffrf, naq gung
juvpu jnf va gur pvgl, naq gung juvpu jnf va gur svryq, 34:29 Naq nyy
gurve jrnygu, naq nyy gurve yvggyr barf, naq gurve jvirf gbbx gurl
pncgvir, naq fcbvyrq rira nyy gung jnf va gur ubhfr.

34:30 Naq Wnpbo fnvq gb Fvzrba naq Yriv, Lr unir gebhoyrq zr gb znxr
zr gb fgvax nzbat gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq, nzbat gur Pnannavgrf
naq gur Crevmmvgrf: naq V orvat srj va ahzore, gurl funyy tngure
gurzfryirf gbtrgure ntnvafg zr, naq fynl zr; naq V funyy or qrfgeblrq,
V naq zl ubhfr.

34:31 Naq gurl fnvq, Fubhyq ur qrny jvgu bhe fvfgre nf jvgu na uneybg?
35:1 Naq Tbq fnvq hagb Wnpbo, Nevfr, tb hc gb Orgury, naq qjryy gurer:
naq znxr gurer na nygne hagb Tbq, gung nccrnerq hagb gurr jura gubh
syrqqrfg sebz gur snpr bs Rfnh gul oebgure.

35:2 Gura Wnpbo fnvq hagb uvf ubhfrubyq, naq gb nyy gung jrer jvgu
uvz, Chg njnl gur fgenatr tbqf gung ner nzbat lbh, naq or pyrna, naq
punatr lbhe tnezragf: 35:3 Naq yrg hf nevfr, naq tb hc gb Orgury; naq
V jvyy znxr gurer na nygne hagb Tbq, jub nafjrerq zr va gur qnl bs zl
qvfgerff, naq jnf jvgu zr va gur jnl juvpu V jrag.

35:4 Naq gurl tnir hagb Wnpbo nyy gur fgenatr tbqf juvpu jrer va gurve
unaq, naq nyy gurve rneevatf juvpu jrer va gurve rnef; naq Wnpbo uvq
gurz haqre gur bnx juvpu jnf ol Furpurz.

35:5 Naq gurl wbhearlrq: naq gur greebe bs Tbq jnf hcba gur pvgvrf
gung jrer ebhaq nobhg gurz, naq gurl qvq abg chefhr nsgre gur fbaf bs
Wnpbo.

35:6 Fb Wnpbo pnzr gb Yhm, juvpu vf va gur ynaq bs Pnanna, gung vf,
Orgury, ur naq nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz.

35:7 Naq ur ohvyg gurer na nygne, naq pnyyrq gur cynpr Ryorgury:
orpnhfr gurer Tbq nccrnerq hagb uvz, jura ur syrq sebz gur snpr bs uvf
oebgure.

35:8 Ohg Qrobenu Erorxnu'f ahefr qvrq, naq fur jnf ohevrq orarngu
Orgury haqre na bnx: naq gur anzr bs vg jnf pnyyrq Nyybaonpuhgu.

35:9 Naq Tbq nccrnerq hagb Wnpbo ntnva, jura ur pnzr bhg bs Cnqnanenz,
naq oyrffrq uvz.

35:10 Naq Tbq fnvq hagb uvz, Gul anzr vf Wnpbo: gul anzr funyy abg or
pnyyrq nal zber Wnpbo, ohg Vfenry funyy or gul anzr: naq ur pnyyrq uvf
anzr Vfenry.

35:11 Naq Tbq fnvq hagb uvz, V nz Tbq Nyzvtugl: or sehvgshy naq
zhygvcyl; n angvba naq n pbzcnal bs angvbaf funyy or bs gurr, naq
xvatf funyy pbzr bhg bs gul ybvaf; 35:12 Naq gur ynaq juvpu V tnir
Noenunz naq Vfnnp, gb gurr V jvyy tvir vg, naq gb gul frrq nsgre gurr
jvyy V tvir gur ynaq.

35:13 Naq Tbq jrag hc sebz uvz va gur cynpr jurer ur gnyxrq jvgu uvz.

35:14 Naq Wnpbo frg hc n cvyyne va gur cynpr jurer ur gnyxrq jvgu uvz,
rira n cvyyne bs fgbar: naq ur cbherq n qevax bssrevat gurerba, naq ur
cbherq bvy gurerba.

35:15 Naq Wnpbo pnyyrq gur anzr bs gur cynpr jurer Tbq fcnxr jvgu uvz,
Orgury.

35:16 Naq gurl wbhearlrq sebz Orgury; naq gurer jnf ohg n yvggyr jnl
gb pbzr gb Rcuengu: naq Enpury geninvyrq, naq fur unq uneq ynobhe.

35:17 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura fur jnf va uneq ynobhe, gung gur
zvqjvsr fnvq hagb ure, Srne abg; gubh funyg unir guvf fba nyfb.

35:18 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf ure fbhy jnf va qrcnegvat, (sbe fur
qvrq) gung fur pnyyrq uvf anzr Orabav: ohg uvf sngure pnyyrq uvz
Orawnzva.

35:19 Naq Enpury qvrq, naq jnf ohevrq va gur jnl gb Rcuengu, juvpu vf
Orguyrurz.

35:20 Naq Wnpbo frg n cvyyne hcba ure tenir: gung vf gur cvyyne bs
Enpury'f tenir hagb guvf qnl.

35:21 Naq Vfenry wbhearlrq, naq fcernq uvf grag orlbaq gur gbjre bs
Rqne.

35:22 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Vfenry qjryg va gung ynaq, gung Erhora
jrag naq ynl jvgu Ovyunu uvf sngure'f pbaphovar: naq Vfenry urneq vg.
Abj gur fbaf bs Wnpbo jrer gjryir: 35:23 Gur fbaf bs Yrnu; Erhora,
Wnpbo'f svefgobea, naq Fvzrba, naq Yriv, naq Whqnu, naq Vffnpune, naq
Mrohyha: 35:24 Gur fbaf bs Enpury; Wbfrcu, naq Orawnzva: 35:25 Naq gur
fbaf bs Ovyunu, Enpury'f unaqznvq; Qna, naq Ancugnyv: 35:26 Naq gur
fbaf bs Mvycnu, Yrnu'f unaqznvq: Tnq, naq Nfure: gurfr ner gur fbaf bs
Wnpbo, juvpu jrer obea gb uvz va Cnqnanenz.

35:27 Naq Wnpbo pnzr hagb Vfnnp uvf sngure hagb Znzer, hagb gur pvgl
bs Neonu, juvpu vf Uroeba, jurer Noenunz naq Vfnnp fbwbhearq.

35:28 Naq gur qnlf bs Vfnnp jrer na uhaqerq naq sbhefpber lrnef.

35:29 Naq Vfnnp tnir hc gur tubfg, naq qvrq, naq jnf tngurerq hagb uvf
crbcyr, orvat byq naq shyy bs qnlf: naq uvf fbaf Rfnh naq Wnpbo ohevrq
uvz.

36:1 Abj gurfr ner gur trarengvbaf bs Rfnh, jub vf Rqbz.

36:2 Rfnh gbbx uvf jvirf bs gur qnhtugref bs Pnanna; Nqnu gur qnhtugre
bs Ryba gur Uvggvgr, naq Nubyvonznu gur qnhtugre bs Nanu gur qnhtugre
bs Mvorba gur Uvivgr; 36:3 Naq Onfurzngu Vfuznry'f qnhtugre, fvfgre bs
Aronwbgu.

36:4 Naq Nqnu oner gb Rfnh Ryvcunm; naq Onfurzngu oner Erhry; 36:5 Naq
Nubyvonznu oner Wrhfu, naq Wnnynz, naq Xbenu: gurfr ner gur fbaf bs
Rfnh, juvpu jrer obea hagb uvz va gur ynaq bs Pnanna.

36:6 Naq Rfnh gbbx uvf jvirf, naq uvf fbaf, naq uvf qnhtugref, naq nyy
gur crefbaf bs uvf ubhfr, naq uvf pnggyr, naq nyy uvf ornfgf, naq nyy
uvf fhofgnapr, juvpu ur unq tbg va gur ynaq bs Pnanna; naq jrag vagb
gur pbhagel sebz gur snpr bs uvf oebgure Wnpbo.

36:7 Sbe gurve evpurf jrer zber guna gung gurl zvtug qjryy gbtrgure;
naq gur ynaq jurerva gurl jrer fgenatref pbhyq abg orne gurz orpnhfr
bs gurve pnggyr.

36:8 Guhf qjryg Rfnh va zbhag Frve: Rfnh vf Rqbz.

36:9 Naq gurfr ner gur trarengvbaf bs Rfnh gur sngure bs gur Rqbzvgrf
va zbhag Frve: 36:10 Gurfr ner gur anzrf bs Rfnh'f fbaf; Ryvcunm gur
fba bs Nqnu gur jvsr bs Rfnh, Erhry gur fba bs Onfurzngu gur jvsr bs
Rfnh.

36:11 Naq gur fbaf bs Ryvcunm jrer Grzna, Bzne, Mrcub, naq Tngnz, naq
Xranm.

36:12 Naq Gvzan jnf pbaphovar gb Ryvcunm Rfnh'f fba; naq fur oner gb
Ryvcunm Nznyrx: gurfr jrer gur fbaf bs Nqnu Rfnh'f jvsr.

36:13 Naq gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Erhry; Anungu, naq Mrenu, Funzznu, naq
Zvmmnu: gurfr jrer gur fbaf bs Onfurzngu Rfnh'f jvsr.

36:14 Naq gurfr jrer gur fbaf bs Nubyvonznu, gur qnhtugre bs Nanu gur
qnhtugre bs Mvorba, Rfnh'f jvsr: naq fur oner gb Rfnh Wrhfu, naq
Wnnynz, naq Xbenu.

36:15 Gurfr jrer qhxrf bs gur fbaf bs Rfnh: gur fbaf bs Ryvcunm gur
svefgobea fba bs Rfnh; qhxr Grzna, qhxr Bzne, qhxr Mrcub, qhxr Xranm,
36:16 Qhxr Xbenu, qhxr Tngnz, naq qhxr Nznyrx: gurfr ner gur qhxrf
gung pnzr bs Ryvcunm va gur ynaq bs Rqbz; gurfr jrer gur fbaf bs Nqnu.

36:17 Naq gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Erhry Rfnh'f fba; qhxr Anungu, qhxr
Mrenu, qhxr Funzznu, qhxr Zvmmnu: gurfr ner gur qhxrf gung pnzr bs
Erhry va gur ynaq bs Rqbz; gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Onfurzngu Rfnh'f
jvsr.

36:18 Naq gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Nubyvonznu Rfnh'f jvsr; qhxr Wrhfu,
qhxr Wnnynz, qhxr Xbenu: gurfr jrer gur qhxrf gung pnzr bs Nubyvonznu
gur qnhtugre bs Nanu, Rfnh'f jvsr.

36:19 Gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Rfnh, jub vf Rqbz, naq gurfr ner gurve
qhxrf.

36:20 Gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Frve gur Ubevgr, jub vaunovgrq gur ynaq;
Ybgna, naq Fubony, naq Mvorba, naq Nanu, 36:21 Naq Qvfuba, naq Rmre,
naq Qvfuna: gurfr ner gur qhxrf bs gur Ubevgrf, gur puvyqera bs Frve
va gur ynaq bs Rqbz.

36:22 Naq gur puvyqera bs Ybgna jrer Ubev naq Urznz; naq Ybgna'f
fvfgre jnf Gvzan.

36:23 Naq gur puvyqera bs Fubony jrer gurfr; Nyina, naq Znanungu, naq
Rony, Furcub, naq Banz.

36:24 Naq gurfr ner gur puvyqera bs Mvorba; obgu Nwnu, naq Nanu: guvf
jnf gung Nanu gung sbhaq gur zhyrf va gur jvyqrearff, nf ur srq gur
nffrf bs Mvorba uvf sngure.

36:25 Naq gur puvyqera bs Nanu jrer gurfr; Qvfuba, naq Nubyvonznu gur
qnhtugre bs Nanu.

36:26 Naq gurfr ner gur puvyqera bs Qvfuba; Urzqna, naq Rfuona, naq
Vguena, naq Purena.

36:27 Gur puvyqera bs Rmre ner gurfr; Ovyuna, naq Mnnina, naq Nxna.

36:28 Gur puvyqera bs Qvfuna ner gurfr; Hm, naq Nena.

36:29 Gurfr ner gur qhxrf gung pnzr bs gur Ubevgrf; qhxr Ybgna, qhxr
Fubony, qhxr Mvorba, qhxr Nanu, 36:30 Qhxr Qvfuba, qhxr Rmre, qhxr
Qvfuna: gurfr ner gur qhxrf gung pnzr bs Ubev, nzbat gurve qhxrf va
gur ynaq bs Frve.

36:31 Naq gurfr ner gur xvatf gung ervtarq va gur ynaq bs Rqbz, orsber
gurer ervtarq nal xvat bire gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

36:32 Naq Oryn gur fba bs Orbe ervtarq va Rqbz: naq gur anzr bs uvf
pvgl jnf Qvaunonu.

36:33 Naq Oryn qvrq, naq Wbono gur fba bs Mrenu bs Obmenu ervtarq va
uvf fgrnq.

36:34 Naq Wbono qvrq, naq Uhfunz bs gur ynaq bs Grznav ervtarq va uvf
fgrnq.

36:35 Naq Uhfunz qvrq, naq Unqnq gur fba bs Orqnq, jub fzbgr Zvqvna va
gur svryq bs Zbno, ervtarq va uvf fgrnq: naq gur anzr bs uvf pvgl jnf
Nivgu.

36:36 Naq Unqnq qvrq, naq Fnzynu bs Znferxnu ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

36:37 Naq Fnzynu qvrq, naq Fnhy bs Erubobgu ol gur evire ervtarq va
uvf fgrnq.

36:38 Naq Fnhy qvrq, naq Onnyunana gur fba bs Npuobe ervtarq va uvf
fgrnq.

36:39 Naq Onnyunana gur fba bs Npuobe qvrq, naq Unqne ervtarq va uvf
fgrnq: naq gur anzr bs uvf pvgl jnf Cnh; naq uvf jvsr'f anzr jnf
Zrurgnory, gur qnhtugre bs Zngerq, gur qnhtugre bs Zrmnuno.

36:40 Naq gurfr ner gur anzrf bs gur qhxrf gung pnzr bs Rfnh,
nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf, nsgre gurve cynprf, ol gurve anzrf; qhxr
Gvzanu, qhxr Nyinu, qhxr Wrgurgu, 36:41 Qhxr Nubyvonznu, qhxr Rynu,
qhxr Cvaba, 36:42 Qhxr Xranm, qhxr Grzna, qhxr Zvomne, 36:43 Qhxr
Zntqvry, qhxr Venz: gurfr or gur qhxrf bs Rqbz, nppbeqvat gb gurve
unovgngvbaf va gur ynaq bs gurve cbffrffvba: ur vf Rfnh gur sngure bs
gur Rqbzvgrf.

37:1 Naq Wnpbo qjryg va gur ynaq jurerva uvf sngure jnf n fgenatre, va
gur ynaq bs Pnanna.

37:2 Gurfr ner gur trarengvbaf bs Wnpbo. Wbfrcu, orvat friragrra lrnef
byq, jnf srrqvat gur sybpx jvgu uvf oerguera; naq gur ynq jnf jvgu gur
fbaf bs Ovyunu, naq jvgu gur fbaf bs Mvycnu, uvf sngure'f jvirf: naq
Wbfrcu oebhtug hagb uvf sngure gurve rivy ercbeg.

37:3 Abj Vfenry ybirq Wbfrcu zber guna nyy uvf puvyqera, orpnhfr ur
jnf gur fba bs uvf byq ntr: naq ur znqr uvz n pbng bs znal pbybhef.

37:4 Naq jura uvf oerguera fnj gung gurve sngure ybirq uvz zber guna
nyy uvf oerguera, gurl ungrq uvz, naq pbhyq abg fcrnx crnprnoyl hagb
uvz.

37:5 Naq Wbfrcu qernzrq n qernz, naq ur gbyq vg uvf oerguera: naq gurl
ungrq uvz lrg gur zber.

37:6 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Urne, V cenl lbh, guvf qernz juvpu V unir
qernzrq: 37:7 Sbe, orubyq, jr jrer ovaqvat furnirf va gur svryq, naq,
yb, zl furns nebfr, naq nyfb fgbbq hcevtug; naq, orubyq, lbhe furnirf
fgbbq ebhaq nobhg, naq znqr borvfnapr gb zl furns.

37:8 Naq uvf oerguera fnvq gb uvz, Funyg gubh vaqrrq ervta bire hf? be
funyg gubh vaqrrq unir qbzvavba bire hf? Naq gurl ungrq uvz lrg gur
zber sbe uvf qernzf, naq sbe uvf jbeqf.

37:9 Naq ur qernzrq lrg nabgure qernz, naq gbyq vg uvf oerguera, naq
fnvq, Orubyq, V unir qernzrq n qernz zber; naq, orubyq, gur fha naq
gur zbba naq gur ryrira fgnef znqr borvfnapr gb zr.

37:10 Naq ur gbyq vg gb uvf sngure, naq gb uvf oerguera: naq uvf
sngure erohxrq uvz, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Jung vf guvf qernz gung gubh
unfg qernzrq?  Funyy V naq gul zbgure naq gul oerguera vaqrrq pbzr gb
obj qbja bhefryirf gb gurr gb gur rnegu?  37:11 Naq uvf oerguera
raivrq uvz; ohg uvf sngure bofreirq gur fnlvat.

37:12 Naq uvf oerguera jrag gb srrq gurve sngure'f sybpx va Furpurz.

37:13 Naq Vfenry fnvq hagb Wbfrcu, Qb abg gul oerguera srrq gur sybpx
va Furpurz? pbzr, naq V jvyy fraq gurr hagb gurz. Naq ur fnvq gb uvz,
Urer nz V.

37:14 Naq ur fnvq gb uvz, Tb, V cenl gurr, frr jurgure vg or jryy jvgu
gul oerguera, naq jryy jvgu gur sybpxf; naq oevat zr jbeq ntnva. Fb ur
frag uvz bhg bs gur inyr bs Uroeba, naq ur pnzr gb Furpurz.

37:15 Naq n pregnva zna sbhaq uvz, naq, orubyq, ur jnf jnaqrevat va
gur svryq: naq gur zna nfxrq uvz, fnlvat, Jung frrxrfg gubh?  37:16
Naq ur fnvq, V frrx zl oerguera: gryy zr, V cenl gurr, jurer gurl srrq
gurve sybpxf.

37:17 Naq gur zna fnvq, Gurl ner qrcnegrq urapr; sbe V urneq gurz fnl,
Yrg hf tb gb Qbguna. Naq Wbfrcu jrag nsgre uvf oerguera, naq sbhaq
gurz va Qbguna.

37:18 Naq jura gurl fnj uvz nsne bss, rira orsber ur pnzr arne hagb
gurz, gurl pbafcverq ntnvafg uvz gb fynl uvz.

37:19 Naq gurl fnvq bar gb nabgure, Orubyq, guvf qernzre pbzrgu.

37:20 Pbzr abj gurersber, naq yrg hf fynl uvz, naq pnfg uvz vagb fbzr
cvg, naq jr jvyy fnl, Fbzr rivy ornfg ungu qribherq uvz: naq jr funyy
frr jung jvyy orpbzr bs uvf qernzf.

37:21 Naq Erhora urneq vg, naq ur qryvirerq uvz bhg bs gurve unaqf;
naq fnvq, Yrg hf abg xvyy uvz.

37:22 Naq Erhora fnvq hagb gurz, Furq ab oybbq, ohg pnfg uvz vagb guvf
cvg gung vf va gur jvyqrearff, naq ynl ab unaq hcba uvz; gung ur zvtug
evq uvz bhg bs gurve unaqf, gb qryvire uvz gb uvf sngure ntnva.

37:23 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Wbfrcu jnf pbzr hagb uvf oerguera,
gung gurl fgevcg Wbfrcu bhg bs uvf pbng, uvf pbng bs znal pbybhef gung
jnf ba uvz; 37:24 Naq gurl gbbx uvz, naq pnfg uvz vagb n cvg: naq gur
cvg jnf rzcgl, gurer jnf ab jngre va vg.

37:25 Naq gurl fng qbja gb rng oernq: naq gurl yvsgrq hc gurve rlrf
naq ybbxrq, naq, orubyq, n pbzcnal bs Vfuzrryvgrf pnzr sebz Tvyrnq
jvgu gurve pnzryf ornevat fcvprel naq onyz naq zleeu, tbvat gb pneel
vg qbja gb Rtlcg.

37:26 Naq Whqnu fnvq hagb uvf oerguera, Jung cebsvg vf vg vs jr fynl
bhe oebgure, naq pbaprny uvf oybbq?  37:27 Pbzr, naq yrg hf fryy uvz
gb gur Vfuzrryvgrf, naq yrg abg bhe unaq or hcba uvz; sbe ur vf bhe
oebgure naq bhe syrfu. Naq uvf oerguera jrer pbagrag.

37:28 Gura gurer cnffrq ol Zvqvnavgrf zrepunagzra; naq gurl qerj naq
yvsgrq hc Wbfrcu bhg bs gur cvg, naq fbyq Wbfrcu gb gur Vfuzrryvgrf
sbe gjragl cvrprf bs fvyire: naq gurl oebhtug Wbfrcu vagb Rtlcg.

37:29 Naq Erhora erghearq hagb gur cvg; naq, orubyq, Wbfrcu jnf abg va
gur cvg; naq ur erag uvf pybgurf.

37:30 Naq ur erghearq hagb uvf oerguera, naq fnvq, Gur puvyq vf abg;
naq V, juvgure funyy V tb?  37:31 Naq gurl gbbx Wbfrcu'f pbng, naq
xvyyrq n xvq bs gur tbngf, naq qvccrq gur pbng va gur oybbq; 37:32 Naq
gurl frag gur pbng bs znal pbybhef, naq gurl oebhtug vg gb gurve
sngure; naq fnvq, Guvf unir jr sbhaq: xabj abj jurgure vg or gul fba'f
pbng be ab.

37:33 Naq ur xarj vg, naq fnvq, Vg vf zl fba'f pbng; na rivy ornfg
ungu qribherq uvz; Wbfrcu vf jvgubhg qbhog erag va cvrprf.

37:34 Naq Wnpbo erag uvf pybgurf, naq chg fnpxpybgu hcba uvf ybvaf,
naq zbhearq sbe uvf fba znal qnlf.

37:35 Naq nyy uvf fbaf naq nyy uvf qnhtugref ebfr hc gb pbzsbeg uvz;
ohg ur ershfrq gb or pbzsbegrq; naq ur fnvq, Sbe V jvyy tb qbja vagb
gur tenir hagb zl fba zbheavat. Guhf uvf sngure jrcg sbe uvz.

37:36 Naq gur Zvqvnavgrf fbyq uvz vagb Rtlcg hagb Cbgvcune, na bssvpre
bs Cunenbu'f, naq pncgnva bs gur thneq.

38:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gung gvzr, gung Whqnu jrag qbja sebz uvf
oerguera, naq ghearq va gb n pregnva Nqhyynzvgr, jubfr anzr jnf Uvenu.

38:2 Naq Whqnu fnj gurer n qnhtugre bs n pregnva Pnannavgr, jubfr anzr
jnf Fuhnu; naq ur gbbx ure, naq jrag va hagb ure.

38:3 Naq fur pbaprvirq, naq oner n fba; naq ur pnyyrq uvf anzr Re.

38:4 Naq fur pbaprvirq ntnva, naq oner n fba; naq fur pnyyrq uvf anzr
Bana.

38:5 Naq fur lrg ntnva pbaprvirq, naq oner n fba; naq pnyyrq uvf anzr
Furynu: naq ur jnf ng Purmvo, jura fur oner uvz.

38:6 Naq Whqnu gbbx n jvsr sbe Re uvf svefgobea, jubfr anzr jnf Gnzne.

38:7 Naq Re, Whqnu'f svefgobea, jnf jvpxrq va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ;
naq gur YBEQ fyrj uvz.

38:8 Naq Whqnu fnvq hagb Bana, Tb va hagb gul oebgure'f jvsr, naq
zneel ure, naq envfr hc frrq gb gul oebgure.

38:9 Naq Bana xarj gung gur frrq fubhyq abg or uvf; naq vg pnzr gb
cnff, jura ur jrag va hagb uvf oebgure'f jvsr, gung ur fcvyyrq vg ba
gur tebhaq, yrfg gung ur fubhyq tvir frrq gb uvf oebgure.

38:10 Naq gur guvat juvpu ur qvq qvfcyrnfrq gur YBEQ: jurersber ur
fyrj uvz nyfb.

38:11 Gura fnvq Whqnu gb Gnzne uvf qnhtugre va ynj, Erznva n jvqbj ng
gul sngure'f ubhfr, gvyy Furynu zl fba or tebja: sbe ur fnvq, Yrfg
crenqiragher ur qvr nyfb, nf uvf oerguera qvq. Naq Gnzne jrag naq
qjryg va ure sngure'f ubhfr.

38:12 Naq va cebprff bs gvzr gur qnhtugre bs Fuhnu Whqnu'f jvsr qvrq;
naq Whqnu jnf pbzsbegrq, naq jrag hc hagb uvf furrcfurneref gb
Gvzangu, ur naq uvf sevraq Uvenu gur Nqhyynzvgr.

38:13 Naq vg jnf gbyq Gnzne, fnlvat, Orubyq gul sngure va ynj tbrgu hc
gb Gvzangu gb furne uvf furrc.

38:14 Naq fur chg ure jvqbj'f tnezragf bss sebz ure, naq pbirerq ure
jvgu n invy, naq jenccrq urefrys, naq fng va na bcra cynpr, juvpu vf
ol gur jnl gb Gvzangu; sbe fur fnj gung Furynu jnf tebja, naq fur jnf
abg tvira hagb uvz gb jvsr.

38:15 Jura Whqnu fnj ure, ur gubhtug ure gb or na uneybg; orpnhfr fur
unq pbirerq ure snpr.

38:16 Naq ur ghearq hagb ure ol gur jnl, naq fnvq, Tb gb, V cenl gurr,
yrg zr pbzr va hagb gurr; (sbe ur xarj abg gung fur jnf uvf qnhtugre
va ynj.) Naq fur fnvq, Jung jvyg gubh tvir zr, gung gubh znlrfg pbzr
va hagb zr?  38:17 Naq ur fnvq, V jvyy fraq gurr n xvq sebz gur sybpx.
Naq fur fnvq, Jvyg gubh tvir zr n cyrqtr, gvyy gubh fraq vg?  38:18
Naq ur fnvq, Jung cyrqtr funyy V tvir gurr? Naq fur fnvq, Gul fvtarg,
naq gul oenpryrgf, naq gul fgnss gung vf va guvar unaq. Naq ur tnir vg
ure, naq pnzr va hagb ure, naq fur pbaprvirq ol uvz.

38:19 Naq fur nebfr, naq jrag njnl, naq ynvq ol ure invy sebz ure, naq
chg ba gur tnezragf bs ure jvqbjubbq.

38:20 Naq Whqnu frag gur xvq ol gur unaq bs uvf sevraq gur Nqhyynzvgr,
gb erprvir uvf cyrqtr sebz gur jbzna'f unaq: ohg ur sbhaq ure abg.

38:21 Gura ur nfxrq gur zra bs gung cynpr, fnlvat, Jurer vf gur
uneybg, gung jnf bcrayl ol gur jnl fvqr? Naq gurl fnvq, Gurer jnf ab
uneybg va guvf cynpr.

38:22 Naq ur erghearq gb Whqnu, naq fnvq, V pnaabg svaq ure; naq nyfb
gur zra bs gur cynpr fnvq, gung gurer jnf ab uneybg va guvf cynpr.

38:23 Naq Whqnu fnvq, Yrg ure gnxr vg gb ure, yrfg jr or funzrq:
orubyq, V frag guvf xvq, naq gubh unfg abg sbhaq ure.

38:24 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nobhg guerr zbaguf nsgre, gung vg jnf gbyq
Whqnu, fnlvat, Gnzne gul qnhtugre va ynj ungu cynlrq gur uneybg; naq
nyfb, orubyq, fur vf jvgu puvyq ol juberqbz. Naq Whqnu fnvq, Oevat ure
sbegu, naq yrg ure or oheag.

38:25 Jura fur jnf oebhtug sbegu, fur frag gb ure sngure va ynj,
fnlvat, Ol gur zna, jubfr gurfr ner, nz V jvgu puvyq: naq fur fnvq,
Qvfprea, V cenl gurr, jubfr ner gurfr, gur fvtarg, naq oenpryrgf, naq
fgnss.

38:26 Naq Whqnu npxabjyrqtrq gurz, naq fnvq, Fur ungu orra zber
evtugrbhf guna V; orpnhfr gung V tnir ure abg gb Furynu zl fba. Naq ur
xarj ure ntnva ab zber.

38:27 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur gvzr bs ure geninvy, gung, orubyq,
gjvaf jrer va ure jbzo.

38:28 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura fur geninvyrq, gung gur bar chg bhg
uvf unaq: naq gur zvqjvsr gbbx naq obhaq hcba uvf unaq n fpneyrg
guernq, fnlvat, Guvf pnzr bhg svefg.

38:29 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf ur qerj onpx uvf unaq, gung, orubyq, uvf
oebgure pnzr bhg: naq fur fnvq, Ubj unfg gubh oebxra sbegu? guvf
oernpu or hcba gurr: gurersber uvf anzr jnf pnyyrq Cunerm.

38:30 Naq nsgrejneq pnzr bhg uvf oebgure, gung unq gur fpneyrg guernq
hcba uvf unaq: naq uvf anzr jnf pnyyrq Mnenu.

39:1 Naq Wbfrcu jnf oebhtug qbja gb Rtlcg; naq Cbgvcune, na bssvpre bs
Cunenbu, pncgnva bs gur thneq, na Rtlcgvna, obhtug uvz bs gur unaqf bs
gur Vfuzrryvgrf, juvpu unq oebhtug uvz qbja guvgure.

39:2 Naq gur YBEQ jnf jvgu Wbfrcu, naq ur jnf n cebfcrebhf zna; naq ur
jnf va gur ubhfr bs uvf znfgre gur Rtlcgvna.

39:3 Naq uvf znfgre fnj gung gur YBEQ jnf jvgu uvz, naq gung gur YBEQ
znqr nyy gung ur qvq gb cebfcre va uvf unaq.

39:4 Naq Wbfrcu sbhaq tenpr va uvf fvtug, naq ur freirq uvz: naq ur
znqr uvz birefrre bire uvf ubhfr, naq nyy gung ur unq ur chg vagb uvf
unaq.

39:5 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff sebz gur gvzr gung ur unq znqr uvz birefrre
va uvf ubhfr, naq bire nyy gung ur unq, gung gur YBEQ oyrffrq gur
Rtlcgvna'f ubhfr sbe Wbfrcu'f fnxr; naq gur oyrffvat bs gur YBEQ jnf
hcba nyy gung ur unq va gur ubhfr, naq va gur svryq.

39:6 Naq ur yrsg nyy gung ur unq va Wbfrcu'f unaq; naq ur xarj abg
bhtug ur unq, fnir gur oernq juvpu ur qvq rng. Naq Wbfrcu jnf n tbbqyl
crefba, naq jryy snibherq.

39:7 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre gurfr guvatf, gung uvf znfgre'f jvsr
pnfg ure rlrf hcba Wbfrcu; naq fur fnvq, Yvr jvgu zr.

39:8 Ohg ur ershfrq, naq fnvq hagb uvf znfgre'f jvsr, Orubyq, zl
znfgre jbggrgu abg jung vf jvgu zr va gur ubhfr, naq ur ungu pbzzvggrq
nyy gung ur ungu gb zl unaq; 39:9 Gurer vf abar terngre va guvf ubhfr
guna V; arvgure ungu ur xrcg onpx nal guvat sebz zr ohg gurr, orpnhfr
gubh neg uvf jvsr: ubj gura pna V qb guvf terng jvpxrqarff, naq fva
ntnvafg Tbq?  39:10 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf fur fcnxr gb Wbfrcu qnl ol
qnl, gung ur urnexrarq abg hagb ure, gb yvr ol ure, be gb or jvgu ure.

39:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nobhg guvf gvzr, gung Wbfrcu jrag vagb gur
ubhfr gb qb uvf ohfvarff; naq gurer jnf abar bs gur zra bs gur ubhfr
gurer jvguva.

39:12 Naq fur pnhtug uvz ol uvf tnezrag, fnlvat, Yvr jvgu zr: naq ur
yrsg uvf tnezrag va ure unaq, naq syrq, naq tbg uvz bhg.

39:13 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura fur fnj gung ur unq yrsg uvf tnezrag
va ure unaq, naq jnf syrq sbegu, 39:14 Gung fur pnyyrq hagb gur zra bs
ure ubhfr, naq fcnxr hagb gurz, fnlvat, Frr, ur ungu oebhtug va na
Uroerj hagb hf gb zbpx hf; ur pnzr va hagb zr gb yvr jvgu zr, naq V
pevrq jvgu n ybhq ibvpr: 39:15 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura ur urneq gung
V yvsgrq hc zl ibvpr naq pevrq, gung ur yrsg uvf tnezrag jvgu zr, naq
syrq, naq tbg uvz bhg.

39:16 Naq fur ynvq hc uvf tnezrag ol ure, hagvy uvf ybeq pnzr ubzr.

39:17 Naq fur fcnxr hagb uvz nppbeqvat gb gurfr jbeqf, fnlvat, Gur
Uroerj freinag, juvpu gubh unfg oebhtug hagb hf, pnzr va hagb zr gb
zbpx zr: 39:18 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf V yvsgrq hc zl ibvpr naq pevrq,
gung ur yrsg uvf tnezrag jvgu zr, naq syrq bhg.

39:19 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura uvf znfgre urneq gur jbeqf bs uvf
jvsr, juvpu fur fcnxr hagb uvz, fnlvat, Nsgre guvf znaare qvq gul
freinag gb zr; gung uvf jengu jnf xvaqyrq.

39:20 Naq Wbfrcu'f znfgre gbbx uvz, naq chg uvz vagb gur cevfba, n
cynpr jurer gur xvat'f cevfbaref jrer obhaq: naq ur jnf gurer va gur
cevfba.

39:21 Ohg gur YBEQ jnf jvgu Wbfrcu, naq furjrq uvz zrepl, naq tnir uvz
snibhe va gur fvtug bs gur xrrcre bs gur cevfba.

39:22 Naq gur xrrcre bs gur cevfba pbzzvggrq gb Wbfrcu'f unaq nyy gur
cevfbaref gung jrer va gur cevfba; naq jungfbrire gurl qvq gurer, ur
jnf gur qbre bs vg.

39:23 Gur xrrcre bs gur cevfba ybbxrq abg gb nal guvat gung jnf haqre
uvf unaq; orpnhfr gur YBEQ jnf jvgu uvz, naq gung juvpu ur qvq, gur
YBEQ znqr vg gb cebfcre.

40:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre gurfr guvatf, gung gur ohgyre bs gur
xvat bs Rtlcg naq uvf onxre unq bssraqrq gurve ybeq gur xvat bs Rtlcg.

40:2 Naq Cunenbu jnf jebgu ntnvafg gjb bs uvf bssvpref, ntnvafg gur
