puvrs bs gur ohgyref, naq ntnvafg gur puvrs bs gur onxref.

40:3 Naq ur chg gurz va jneq va gur ubhfr bs gur pncgnva bs gur thneq,
vagb gur cevfba, gur cynpr jurer Wbfrcu jnf obhaq.

40:4 Naq gur pncgnva bs gur thneq punetrq Wbfrcu jvgu gurz, naq ur
freirq gurz: naq gurl pbagvahrq n frnfba va jneq.

40:5 Naq gurl qernzrq n qernz obgu bs gurz, rnpu zna uvf qernz va bar
avtug, rnpu zna nppbeqvat gb gur vagrecergngvba bs uvf qernz, gur
ohgyre naq gur onxre bs gur xvat bs Rtlcg, juvpu jrer obhaq va gur
cevfba.

40:6 Naq Wbfrcu pnzr va hagb gurz va gur zbeavat, naq ybbxrq hcba
gurz, naq, orubyq, gurl jrer fnq.

40:7 Naq ur nfxrq Cunenbu'f bssvpref gung jrer jvgu uvz va gur jneq bs
uvf ybeq'f ubhfr, fnlvat, Jurersber ybbx lr fb fnqyl gb qnl?  40:8 Naq
gurl fnvq hagb uvz, Jr unir qernzrq n qernz, naq gurer vf ab
vagrecergre bs vg. Naq Wbfrcu fnvq hagb gurz, Qb abg vagrecergngvbaf
orybat gb Tbq? gryy zr gurz, V cenl lbh.

40:9 Naq gur puvrs ohgyre gbyq uvf qernz gb Wbfrcu, naq fnvq gb uvz,
Va zl qernz, orubyq, n ivar jnf orsber zr; 40:10 Naq va gur ivar jrer
guerr oenapurf: naq vg jnf nf gubhtu vg ohqqrq, naq ure oybffbzf fubg
sbegu; naq gur pyhfgref gurerbs oebhtug sbegu evcr tencrf: 40:11 Naq
Cunenbu'f phc jnf va zl unaq: naq V gbbx gur tencrf, naq cerffrq gurz
vagb Cunenbu'f phc, naq V tnir gur phc vagb Cunenbu'f unaq.

40:12 Naq Wbfrcu fnvq hagb uvz, Guvf vf gur vagrecergngvba bs vg: Gur
guerr oenapurf ner guerr qnlf: 40:13 Lrg jvguva guerr qnlf funyy
Cunenbu yvsg hc guvar urnq, naq erfgber gurr hagb gul cynpr: naq gubh
funyg qryvire Cunenbu'f phc vagb uvf unaq, nsgre gur sbezre znaare
jura gubh jnfg uvf ohgyre.

40:14 Ohg guvax ba zr jura vg funyy or jryy jvgu gurr, naq furj
xvaqarff, V cenl gurr, hagb zr, naq znxr zragvba bs zr hagb Cunenbu,
naq oevat zr bhg bs guvf ubhfr: 40:15 Sbe vaqrrq V jnf fgbyra njnl bhg
bs gur ynaq bs gur Uroerjf: naq urer nyfb unir V qbar abguvat gung
gurl fubhyq chg zr vagb gur qhatrba.

40:16 Jura gur puvrs onxre fnj gung gur vagrecergngvba jnf tbbq, ur
fnvq hagb Wbfrcu, V nyfb jnf va zl qernz, naq, orubyq, V unq guerr
juvgr onfxrgf ba zl urnq: 40:17 Naq va gur hccrezbfg onfxrg gurer jnf
bs nyy znaare bs onxrzrngf sbe Cunenbu; naq gur oveqf qvq rng gurz bhg
bs gur onfxrg hcba zl urnq.

40:18 Naq Wbfrcu nafjrerq naq fnvq, Guvf vf gur vagrecergngvba
gurerbs: Gur guerr onfxrgf ner guerr qnlf: 40:19 Lrg jvguva guerr qnlf
funyy Cunenbu yvsg hc gul urnq sebz bss gurr, naq funyy unat gurr ba n
gerr; naq gur oveqf funyy rng gul syrfu sebz bss gurr.

40:20 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff gur guveq qnl, juvpu jnf Cunenbu'f oveguqnl,
gung ur znqr n srnfg hagb nyy uvf freinagf: naq ur yvsgrq hc gur urnq
bs gur puvrs ohgyre naq bs gur puvrs onxre nzbat uvf freinagf.

40:21 Naq ur erfgberq gur puvrs ohgyre hagb uvf ohgyrefuvc ntnva; naq
ur tnir gur phc vagb Cunenbu'f unaq: 40:22 Ohg ur unatrq gur puvrs
onxre: nf Wbfrcu unq vagrecergrq gb gurz.

40:23 Lrg qvq abg gur puvrs ohgyre erzrzore Wbfrcu, ohg sbetng uvz.

41:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur raq bs gjb shyy lrnef, gung Cunenbu
qernzrq: naq, orubyq, ur fgbbq ol gur evire.

41:2 Naq, orubyq, gurer pnzr hc bhg bs gur evire frira jryy snibherq
xvar naq sngsyrfurq; naq gurl srq va n zrnqbj.

41:3 Naq, orubyq, frira bgure xvar pnzr hc nsgre gurz bhg bs gur
evire, vyy snibherq naq yrnasyrfurq; naq fgbbq ol gur bgure xvar hcba
gur oevax bs gur evire.

41:4 Naq gur vyy snibherq naq yrnasyrfurq xvar qvq rng hc gur frira
jryy snibherq naq sng xvar. Fb Cunenbu njbxr.

41:5 Naq ur fyrcg naq qernzrq gur frpbaq gvzr: naq, orubyq, frira rnef
bs pbea pnzr hc hcba bar fgnyx, enax naq tbbq.

41:6 Naq, orubyq, frira guva rnef naq oynfgrq jvgu gur rnfg jvaq
fcehat hc nsgre gurz.

41:7 Naq gur frira guva rnef qribherq gur frira enax naq shyy rnef.
Naq Cunenbu njbxr, naq, orubyq, vg jnf n qernz.

41:8 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur zbeavat gung uvf fcvevg jnf gebhoyrq;
naq ur frag naq pnyyrq sbe nyy gur zntvpvnaf bs Rtlcg, naq nyy gur
jvfr zra gurerbs: naq Cunenbu gbyq gurz uvf qernz; ohg gurer jnf abar
gung pbhyq vagrecerg gurz hagb Cunenbu.

41:9 Gura fcnxr gur puvrs ohgyre hagb Cunenbu, fnlvat, V qb erzrzore
zl snhygf guvf qnl: 41:10 Cunenbu jnf jebgu jvgu uvf freinagf, naq chg
zr va jneq va gur pncgnva bs gur thneq'f ubhfr, obgu zr naq gur puvrs
onxre: 41:11 Naq jr qernzrq n qernz va bar avtug, V naq ur; jr qernzrq
rnpu zna nppbeqvat gb gur vagrecergngvba bs uvf qernz.

41:12 Naq gurer jnf gurer jvgu hf n lbhat zna, na Uroerj, freinag gb
gur pncgnva bs gur thneq; naq jr gbyq uvz, naq ur vagrecergrq gb hf
bhe qernzf; gb rnpu zna nppbeqvat gb uvf qernz ur qvq vagrecerg.

41:13 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf ur vagrecergrq gb hf, fb vg jnf; zr ur
erfgberq hagb zvar bssvpr, naq uvz ur unatrq.

41:14 Gura Cunenbu frag naq pnyyrq Wbfrcu, naq gurl oebhtug uvz
unfgvyl bhg bs gur qhatrba: naq ur funirq uvzfrys, naq punatrq uvf
envzrag, naq pnzr va hagb Cunenbu.

41:15 Naq Cunenbu fnvq hagb Wbfrcu, V unir qernzrq n qernz, naq gurer
vf abar gung pna vagrecerg vg: naq V unir urneq fnl bs gurr, gung gubh
pnafg haqrefgnaq n qernz gb vagrecerg vg.

41:16 Naq Wbfrcu nafjrerq Cunenbu, fnlvat, Vg vf abg va zr: Tbq funyy
tvir Cunenbu na nafjre bs crnpr.

41:17 Naq Cunenbu fnvq hagb Wbfrcu, Va zl qernz, orubyq, V fgbbq hcba
gur onax bs gur evire: 41:18 Naq, orubyq, gurer pnzr hc bhg bs gur
evire frira xvar, sngsyrfurq naq jryy snibherq; naq gurl srq va n
zrnqbj: 41:19 Naq, orubyq, frira bgure xvar pnzr hc nsgre gurz, cbbe
naq irel vyy snibherq naq yrnasyrfurq, fhpu nf V arire fnj va nyy gur
ynaq bs Rtlcg sbe onqarff: 41:20 Naq gur yrna naq gur vyy snibherq
xvar qvq rng hc gur svefg frira sng xvar: 41:21 Naq jura gurl unq
rngra gurz hc, vg pbhyq abg or xabja gung gurl unq rngra gurz; ohg
gurl jrer fgvyy vyy snibherq, nf ng gur ortvaavat. Fb V njbxr.

41:22 Naq V fnj va zl qernz, naq, orubyq, frira rnef pnzr hc va bar
fgnyx, shyy naq tbbq: 41:23 Naq, orubyq, frira rnef, jvgurerq, guva,
naq oynfgrq jvgu gur rnfg jvaq, fcehat hc nsgre gurz: 41:24 Naq gur
guva rnef qribherq gur frira tbbq rnef: naq V gbyq guvf hagb gur
zntvpvnaf; ohg gurer jnf abar gung pbhyq qrpyner vg gb zr.

41:25 Naq Wbfrcu fnvq hagb Cunenbu, Gur qernz bs Cunenbu vf bar: Tbq
ungu furjrq Cunenbu jung ur vf nobhg gb qb.

41:26 Gur frira tbbq xvar ner frira lrnef; naq gur frira tbbq rnef ner
frira lrnef: gur qernz vf bar.

41:27 Naq gur frira guva naq vyy snibherq xvar gung pnzr hc nsgre gurz
ner frira lrnef; naq gur frira rzcgl rnef oynfgrq jvgu gur rnfg jvaq
funyy or frira lrnef bs snzvar.

41:28 Guvf vf gur guvat juvpu V unir fcbxra hagb Cunenbu: Jung Tbq vf
nobhg gb qb ur furjrgu hagb Cunenbu.

41:29 Orubyq, gurer pbzr frira lrnef bs terng cyragl guebhtubhg nyy
gur ynaq bs Rtlcg: 41:30 Naq gurer funyy nevfr nsgre gurz frira lrnef
bs snzvar; naq nyy gur cyragl funyy or sbetbggra va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg;
naq gur snzvar funyy pbafhzr gur ynaq; 41:31 Naq gur cyragl funyy abg
or xabja va gur ynaq ol ernfba bs gung snzvar sbyybjvat; sbe vg funyy
or irel tevribhf.

41:32 Naq sbe gung gur qernz jnf qbhoyrq hagb Cunenbu gjvpr; vg vf
orpnhfr gur guvat vf rfgnoyvfurq ol Tbq, naq Tbq jvyy fubegyl oevat vg
gb cnff.

41:33 Abj gurersber yrg Cunenbu ybbx bhg n zna qvfperrg naq jvfr, naq
frg uvz bire gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

41:34 Yrg Cunenbu qb guvf, naq yrg uvz nccbvag bssvpref bire gur ynaq,
naq gnxr hc gur svsgu cneg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg va gur frira cyragrbhf
lrnef.

41:35 Naq yrg gurz tngure nyy gur sbbq bs gubfr tbbq lrnef gung pbzr,
naq ynl hc pbea haqre gur unaq bs Cunenbu, naq yrg gurz xrrc sbbq va
gur pvgvrf.

41:36 Naq gung sbbq funyy or sbe fgber gb gur ynaq ntnvafg gur frira
lrnef bs snzvar, juvpu funyy or va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg; gung gur ynaq
crevfu abg guebhtu gur snzvar.

41:37 Naq gur guvat jnf tbbq va gur rlrf bs Cunenbu, naq va gur rlrf
bs nyy uvf freinagf.

41:38 Naq Cunenbu fnvq hagb uvf freinagf, Pna jr svaq fhpu n bar nf
guvf vf, n zna va jubz gur Fcvevg bs Tbq vf?  41:39 Naq Cunenbu fnvq
hagb Wbfrcu, Sbenfzhpu nf Tbq ungu furjrq gurr nyy guvf, gurer vf abar
fb qvfperrg naq jvfr nf gubh neg: 41:40 Gubh funyg or bire zl ubhfr,
naq nppbeqvat hagb gul jbeq funyy nyy zl crbcyr or ehyrq: bayl va gur
guebar jvyy V or terngre guna gubh.

41:41 Naq Cunenbu fnvq hagb Wbfrcu, Frr, V unir frg gurr bire nyy gur
ynaq bs Rtlcg.

41:42 Naq Cunenbu gbbx bss uvf evat sebz uvf unaq, naq chg vg hcba
Wbfrcu'f unaq, naq neenlrq uvz va irfgherf bs svar yvara, naq chg n
tbyq punva nobhg uvf arpx; 41:43 Naq ur znqr uvz gb evqr va gur frpbaq
punevbg juvpu ur unq; naq gurl pevrq orsber uvz, Obj gur xarr: naq ur
znqr uvz ehyre bire nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

41:44 Naq Cunenbu fnvq hagb Wbfrcu, V nz Cunenbu, naq jvgubhg gurr
funyy ab zna yvsg hc uvf unaq be sbbg va nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

41:45 Naq Cunenbu pnyyrq Wbfrcu'f anzr Mncuangucnnarnu; naq ur tnir
uvz gb jvsr Nfrangu gur qnhtugre bs Cbgvcurenu cevrfg bs Ba. Naq
Wbfrcu jrag bhg bire nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

41:46 Naq Wbfrcu jnf guvegl lrnef byq jura ur fgbbq orsber Cunenbu
xvat bs Rtlcg. Naq Wbfrcu jrag bhg sebz gur cerfrapr bs Cunenbu, naq
jrag guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

41:47 Naq va gur frira cyragrbhf lrnef gur rnegu oebhtug sbegu ol
unaqshyf.

41:48 Naq ur tngurerq hc nyy gur sbbq bs gur frira lrnef, juvpu jrer
va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, naq ynvq hc gur sbbq va gur pvgvrf: gur sbbq bs
gur svryq, juvpu jnf ebhaq nobhg rirel pvgl, ynvq ur hc va gur fnzr.

41:49 Naq Wbfrcu tngurerq pbea nf gur fnaq bs gur frn, irel zhpu,
hagvy ur yrsg ahzorevat; sbe vg jnf jvgubhg ahzore.

41:50 Naq hagb Wbfrcu jrer obea gjb fbaf orsber gur lrnef bs snzvar
pnzr, juvpu Nfrangu gur qnhtugre bs Cbgvcurenu cevrfg bs Ba oner hagb
uvz.

41:51 Naq Wbfrcu pnyyrq gur anzr bs gur svefgobea Znanffru: Sbe Tbq,
fnvq ur, ungu znqr zr sbetrg nyy zl gbvy, naq nyy zl sngure'f ubhfr.

41:52 Naq gur anzr bs gur frpbaq pnyyrq ur Rcuenvz: Sbe Tbq ungu
pnhfrq zr gb or sehvgshy va gur ynaq bs zl nssyvpgvba.

41:53 Naq gur frira lrnef bs cyragrbhfarff, gung jnf va gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg, jrer raqrq.

41:54 Naq gur frira lrnef bs qrnegu ortna gb pbzr, nppbeqvat nf Wbfrcu
unq fnvq: naq gur qrnegu jnf va nyy ynaqf; ohg va nyy gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg gurer jnf oernq.

41:55 Naq jura nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg jnf snzvfurq, gur crbcyr pevrq gb
Cunenbu sbe oernq: naq Cunenbu fnvq hagb nyy gur Rtlcgvnaf, Tb hagb
Wbfrcu; jung ur fnvgu gb lbh, qb.

41:56 Naq gur snzvar jnf bire nyy gur snpr bs gur rnegu: naq Wbfrcu
bcrarq nyy gur fgberubhfrf, naq fbyq hagb gur Rtlcgvnaf; naq gur
snzvar jnkrq fber va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

41:57 Naq nyy pbhagevrf pnzr vagb Rtlcg gb Wbfrcu sbe gb ohl pbea;
orpnhfr gung gur snzvar jnf fb fber va nyy ynaqf.

42:1 Abj jura Wnpbo fnj gung gurer jnf pbea va Rtlcg, Wnpbo fnvq hagb
uvf fbaf, Jul qb lr ybbx bar hcba nabgure?  42:2 Naq ur fnvq, Orubyq,
V unir urneq gung gurer vf pbea va Rtlcg: trg lbh qbja guvgure, naq
ohl sbe hf sebz gurapr; gung jr znl yvir, naq abg qvr.

42:3 Naq Wbfrcu'f gra oerguera jrag qbja gb ohl pbea va Rtlcg.

42:4 Ohg Orawnzva, Wbfrcu'f oebgure, Wnpbo frag abg jvgu uvf oerguera;
sbe ur fnvq, Yrfg crenqiragher zvfpuvrs orsnyy uvz.

42:5 Naq gur fbaf bs Vfenry pnzr gb ohl pbea nzbat gubfr gung pnzr:
sbe gur snzvar jnf va gur ynaq bs Pnanna.

42:6 Naq Wbfrcu jnf gur tbireabe bire gur ynaq, naq ur vg jnf gung
fbyq gb nyy gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq: naq Wbfrcu'f oerguera pnzr, naq
objrq qbja gurzfryirf orsber uvz jvgu gurve snprf gb gur rnegu.

42:7 Naq Wbfrcu fnj uvf oerguera, naq ur xarj gurz, ohg znqr uvzfrys
fgenatr hagb gurz, naq fcnxr ebhtuyl hagb gurz; naq ur fnvq hagb gurz,
Jurapr pbzr lr? Naq gurl fnvq, Sebz gur ynaq bs Pnanna gb ohl sbbq.

42:8 Naq Wbfrcu xarj uvf oerguera, ohg gurl xarj abg uvz.

42:9 Naq Wbfrcu erzrzorerq gur qernzf juvpu ur qernzrq bs gurz, naq
fnvq hagb gurz, Lr ner fcvrf; gb frr gur anxrqarff bs gur ynaq lr ner
pbzr.

42:10 Naq gurl fnvq hagb uvz, Anl, zl ybeq, ohg gb ohl sbbq ner gul
freinagf pbzr.

42:11 Jr ner nyy bar zna'f fbaf; jr ner gehr zra, gul freinagf ner ab
fcvrf.

42:12 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Anl, ohg gb frr gur anxrqarff bs gur ynaq
lr ner pbzr.

42:13 Naq gurl fnvq, Gul freinagf ner gjryir oerguera, gur fbaf bs bar
zna va gur ynaq bs Pnanna; naq, orubyq, gur lbhatrfg vf guvf qnl jvgu
bhe sngure, naq bar vf abg.

42:14 Naq Wbfrcu fnvq hagb gurz, Gung vf vg gung V fcnxr hagb lbh,
fnlvat, Lr ner fcvrf: 42:15 Urerol lr funyy or cebirq: Ol gur yvsr bs
Cunenbu lr funyy abg tb sbegu urapr, rkprcg lbhe lbhatrfg oebgure pbzr
uvgure.

42:16 Fraq bar bs lbh, naq yrg uvz srgpu lbhe oebgure, naq lr funyy or
xrcg va cevfba, gung lbhe jbeqf znl or cebirq, jurgure gurer or nal
gehgu va lbh: be ryfr ol gur yvsr bs Cunenbu fheryl lr ner fcvrf.

42:17 Naq ur chg gurz nyy gbtrgure vagb jneq guerr qnlf.

42:18 Naq Wbfrcu fnvq hagb gurz gur guveq qnl, Guvf qb, naq yvir; sbe
V srne Tbq: 42:19 Vs lr or gehr zra, yrg bar bs lbhe oerguera or obhaq
va gur ubhfr bs lbhe cevfba: tb lr, pneel pbea sbe gur snzvar bs lbhe
ubhfrf: 42:20 Ohg oevat lbhe lbhatrfg oebgure hagb zr; fb funyy lbhe
jbeqf or irevsvrq, naq lr funyy abg qvr. Naq gurl qvq fb.

42:21 Naq gurl fnvq bar gb nabgure, Jr ner irevyl thvygl pbapreavat
bhe oebgure, va gung jr fnj gur nathvfu bs uvf fbhy, jura ur orfbhtug
hf, naq jr jbhyq abg urne; gurersber vf guvf qvfgerff pbzr hcba hf.

42:22 Naq Erhora nafjrerq gurz, fnlvat, Fcnxr V abg hagb lbh, fnlvat,
Qb abg fva ntnvafg gur puvyq; naq lr jbhyq abg urne? gurersber,
orubyq, nyfb uvf oybbq vf erdhverq.

42:23 Naq gurl xarj abg gung Wbfrcu haqrefgbbq gurz; sbe ur fcnxr hagb
gurz ol na vagrecergre.

42:24 Naq ur ghearq uvzfrys nobhg sebz gurz, naq jrcg; naq erghearq gb
gurz ntnva, naq pbzzharq jvgu gurz, naq gbbx sebz gurz Fvzrba, naq
obhaq uvz orsber gurve rlrf.

42:25 Gura Wbfrcu pbzznaqrq gb svyy gurve fnpxf jvgu pbea, naq gb
erfgber rirel zna'f zbarl vagb uvf fnpx, naq gb tvir gurz cebivfvba
sbe gur jnl: naq guhf qvq ur hagb gurz.

42:26 Naq gurl ynqrq gurve nffrf jvgu gur pbea, naq qrcnegrq gurapr.

42:27 Naq nf bar bs gurz bcrarq uvf fnpx gb tvir uvf nff cebiraqre va
gur vaa, ur rfcvrq uvf zbarl; sbe, orubyq, vg jnf va uvf fnpx'f zbhgu.

42:28 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvf oerguera, Zl zbarl vf erfgberq; naq, yb, vg
vf rira va zl fnpx: naq gurve urneg snvyrq gurz, naq gurl jrer nsenvq,
fnlvat bar gb nabgure, Jung vf guvf gung Tbq ungu qbar hagb hf?  42:29
Naq gurl pnzr hagb Wnpbo gurve sngure hagb gur ynaq bs Pnanna, naq
gbyq uvz nyy gung orsryy hagb gurz; fnlvat, 42:30 Gur zna, jub vf gur
ybeq bs gur ynaq, fcnxr ebhtuyl gb hf, naq gbbx hf sbe fcvrf bs gur
pbhagel.

42:31 Naq jr fnvq hagb uvz, Jr ner gehr zra; jr ner ab fcvrf: 42:32 Jr
or gjryir oerguera, fbaf bs bhe sngure; bar vf abg, naq gur lbhatrfg
vf guvf qnl jvgu bhe sngure va gur ynaq bs Pnanna.

42:33 Naq gur zna, gur ybeq bs gur pbhagel, fnvq hagb hf, Urerol funyy
V xabj gung lr ner gehr zra; yrnir bar bs lbhe oerguera urer jvgu zr,
naq gnxr sbbq sbe gur snzvar bs lbhe ubhfrubyqf, naq or tbar: 42:34
Naq oevat lbhe lbhatrfg oebgure hagb zr: gura funyy V xabj gung lr ner
ab fcvrf, ohg gung lr ner gehr zra: fb jvyy V qryvire lbh lbhe
oebgure, naq lr funyy genssvpx va gur ynaq.

42:35 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nf gurl rzcgvrq gurve fnpxf, gung, orubyq,
rirel zna'f ohaqyr bs zbarl jnf va uvf fnpx: naq jura obgu gurl naq
gurve sngure fnj gur ohaqyrf bs zbarl, gurl jrer nsenvq.

42:36 Naq Wnpbo gurve sngure fnvq hagb gurz, Zr unir lr orernirq bs zl
puvyqera: Wbfrcu vf abg, naq Fvzrba vf abg, naq lr jvyy gnxr Orawnzva
njnl: nyy gurfr guvatf ner ntnvafg zr.

42:37 Naq Erhora fcnxr hagb uvf sngure, fnlvat, Fynl zl gjb fbaf, vs V
oevat uvz abg gb gurr: qryvire uvz vagb zl unaq, naq V jvyy oevat uvz
gb gurr ntnva.

42:38 Naq ur fnvq, Zl fba funyy abg tb qbja jvgu lbh; sbe uvf oebgure
vf qrnq, naq ur vf yrsg nybar: vs zvfpuvrs orsnyy uvz ol gur jnl va
gur juvpu lr tb, gura funyy lr oevat qbja zl tenl unvef jvgu fbeebj gb
gur tenir.

43:1 Naq gur snzvar jnf fber va gur ynaq.

43:2 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gurl unq rngra hc gur pbea juvpu gurl
unq oebhtug bhg bs Rtlcg, gurve sngure fnvq hagb gurz, Tb ntnva, ohl
hf n yvggyr sbbq.

43:3 Naq Whqnu fcnxr hagb uvz, fnlvat, Gur zna qvq fbyrzayl cebgrfg
hagb hf, fnlvat, Lr funyy abg frr zl snpr, rkprcg lbhe oebgure or jvgu
lbh.

43:4 Vs gubh jvyg fraq bhe oebgure jvgu hf, jr jvyy tb qbja naq ohl
gurr sbbq: 43:5 Ohg vs gubh jvyg abg fraq uvz, jr jvyy abg tb qbja:
sbe gur zna fnvq hagb hf, Lr funyy abg frr zl snpr, rkprcg lbhe
oebgure or jvgu lbh.

43:6 Naq Vfenry fnvq, Jurersber qrnyg lr fb vyy jvgu zr, nf gb gryy
gur zna jurgure lr unq lrg n oebgure?  43:7 Naq gurl fnvq, Gur zna
nfxrq hf fgenvgyl bs bhe fgngr, naq bs bhe xvaqerq, fnlvat, Vf lbhe
sngure lrg nyvir? unir lr nabgure oebgure? naq jr gbyq uvz nppbeqvat
gb gur grabe bs gurfr jbeqf: pbhyq jr pregnvayl xabj gung ur jbhyq
fnl, Oevat lbhe oebgure qbja?  43:8 Naq Whqnu fnvq hagb Vfenry uvf
sngure, Fraq gur ynq jvgu zr, naq jr jvyy nevfr naq tb; gung jr znl
yvir, naq abg qvr, obgu jr, naq gubh, naq nyfb bhe yvggyr barf.

43:9 V jvyy or fhergl sbe uvz; bs zl unaq funyg gubh erdhver uvz: vs V
oevat uvz abg hagb gurr, naq frg uvz orsber gurr, gura yrg zr orne gur
oynzr sbe rire: 43:10 Sbe rkprcg jr unq yvatrerq, fheryl abj jr unq
erghearq guvf frpbaq gvzr.

43:11 Naq gurve sngure Vfenry fnvq hagb gurz, Vs vg zhfg or fb abj, qb
guvf; gnxr bs gur orfg sehvgf va gur ynaq va lbhe irffryf, naq pneel
qbja gur zna n cerfrag, n yvggyr onyz, naq n yvggyr ubarl, fcvprf, naq
zleeu, ahgf, naq nyzbaqf: 43:12 Naq gnxr qbhoyr zbarl va lbhe unaq;
naq gur zbarl gung jnf oebhtug ntnva va gur zbhgu bs lbhe fnpxf, pneel
vg ntnva va lbhe unaq; crenqiragher vg jnf na birefvtug: 43:13 Gnxr
nyfb lbhe oebgure, naq nevfr, tb ntnva hagb gur zna: 43:14 Naq Tbq
Nyzvtugl tvir lbh zrepl orsber gur zna, gung ur znl fraq njnl lbhe
bgure oebgure, naq Orawnzva. Vs V or orernirq bs zl puvyqera, V nz
orernirq.

43:15 Naq gur zra gbbx gung cerfrag, naq gurl gbbx qbhoyr zbarl va
gurve unaq naq Orawnzva; naq ebfr hc, naq jrag qbja gb Rtlcg, naq
fgbbq orsber Wbfrcu.

43:16 Naq jura Wbfrcu fnj Orawnzva jvgu gurz, ur fnvq gb gur ehyre bs
uvf ubhfr, Oevat gurfr zra ubzr, naq fynl, naq znxr ernql; sbe gurfr
zra funyy qvar jvgu zr ng abba.

43:17 Naq gur zna qvq nf Wbfrcu onqr; naq gur zna oebhtug gur zra vagb
Wbfrcu'f ubhfr.

43:18 Naq gur zra jrer nsenvq, orpnhfr gurl jrer oebhtug vagb Wbfrcu'f
ubhfr; naq gurl fnvq, Orpnhfr bs gur zbarl gung jnf erghearq va bhe
fnpxf ng gur svefg gvzr ner jr oebhtug va; gung ur znl frrx bppnfvba
ntnvafg hf, naq snyy hcba hf, naq gnxr hf sbe obaqzra, naq bhe nffrf.

43:19 Naq gurl pnzr arne gb gur fgrjneq bs Wbfrcu'f ubhfr, naq gurl
pbzzharq jvgu uvz ng gur qbbe bs gur ubhfr, 43:20 Naq fnvq, B fve, jr
pnzr vaqrrq qbja ng gur svefg gvzr gb ohl sbbq: 43:21 Naq vg pnzr gb
cnff, jura jr pnzr gb gur vaa, gung jr bcrarq bhe fnpxf, naq, orubyq,
rirel zna'f zbarl jnf va gur zbhgu bs uvf fnpx, bhe zbarl va shyy
jrvtug: naq jr unir oebhtug vg ntnva va bhe unaq.

43:22 Naq bgure zbarl unir jr oebhtug qbja va bhe unaqf gb ohl sbbq:
jr pnaabg gryy jub chg bhe zbarl va bhe fnpxf.

43:23 Naq ur fnvq, Crnpr or gb lbh, srne abg: lbhe Tbq, naq gur Tbq bs
lbhe sngure, ungu tvira lbh gernfher va lbhe fnpxf: V unq lbhe zbarl.
Naq ur oebhtug Fvzrba bhg hagb gurz.

43:24 Naq gur zna oebhtug gur zra vagb Wbfrcu'f ubhfr, naq tnir gurz
jngre, naq gurl jnfurq gurve srrg; naq ur tnir gurve nffrf cebiraqre.

43:25 Naq gurl znqr ernql gur cerfrag ntnvafg Wbfrcu pnzr ng abba: sbe
gurl urneq gung gurl fubhyq rng oernq gurer.

43:26 Naq jura Wbfrcu pnzr ubzr, gurl oebhtug uvz gur cerfrag juvpu
jnf va gurve unaq vagb gur ubhfr, naq objrq gurzfryirf gb uvz gb gur
rnegu.

43:27 Naq ur nfxrq gurz bs gurve jrysner, naq fnvq, Vf lbhe sngure
jryy, gur byq zna bs jubz lr fcnxr? Vf ur lrg nyvir?  43:28 Naq gurl
nafjrerq, Gul freinag bhe sngure vf va tbbq urnygu, ur vf lrg nyvir.
Naq gurl objrq qbja gurve urnqf, naq znqr borvfnapr.

43:29 Naq ur yvsgrq hc uvf rlrf, naq fnj uvf oebgure Orawnzva, uvf
zbgure'f fba, naq fnvq, Vf guvf lbhe lbhatre oebgure, bs jubz lr fcnxr
hagb zr? Naq ur fnvq, Tbq or tenpvbhf hagb gurr, zl fba.

43:30 Naq Wbfrcu znqr unfgr; sbe uvf objryf qvq lrnea hcba uvf
oebgure: naq ur fbhtug jurer gb jrrc; naq ur ragrerq vagb uvf punzore,
naq jrcg gurer.

43:31 Naq ur jnfurq uvf snpr, naq jrag bhg, naq ersenvarq uvzfrys, naq
fnvq, Frg ba oernq.

43:32 Naq gurl frg ba sbe uvz ol uvzfrys, naq sbe gurz ol gurzfryirf,
naq sbe gur Rtlcgvnaf, juvpu qvq rng jvgu uvz, ol gurzfryirf: orpnhfr
gur Rtlcgvnaf zvtug abg rng oernq jvgu gur Uroerjf; sbe gung vf na
nobzvangvba hagb gur Rtlcgvnaf.

43:33 Naq gurl fng orsber uvz, gur svefgobea nppbeqvat gb uvf
oveguevtug, naq gur lbhatrfg nppbeqvat gb uvf lbhgu: naq gur zra
zneiryyrq bar ng nabgure.

43:34 Naq ur gbbx naq frag zrffrf hagb gurz sebz orsber uvz: ohg
Orawnzva'f zrff jnf svir gvzrf fb zhpu nf nal bs gurve'f. Naq gurl
qenax, naq jrer zreel jvgu uvz.

44:1 Naq ur pbzznaqrq gur fgrjneq bs uvf ubhfr, fnlvat, Svyy gur zra'f
fnpxf jvgu sbbq, nf zhpu nf gurl pna pneel, naq chg rirel zna'f zbarl
va uvf fnpx'f zbhgu.

44:2 Naq chg zl phc, gur fvyire phc, va gur fnpx'f zbhgu bs gur
lbhatrfg, naq uvf pbea zbarl. Naq ur qvq nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq gung
Wbfrcu unq fcbxra.

44:3 Nf fbba nf gur zbeavat jnf yvtug, gur zra jrer frag njnl, gurl
naq gurve nffrf.

44:4 Naq jura gurl jrer tbar bhg bs gur pvgl, naq abg lrg sne bss,
Wbfrcu fnvq hagb uvf fgrjneq, Hc, sbyybj nsgre gur zra; naq jura gubh
qbfg biregnxr gurz, fnl hagb gurz, Jurersber unir lr erjneqrq rivy sbe
tbbq?  44:5 Vf abg guvf vg va juvpu zl ybeq qevaxrgu, naq jurerol
vaqrrq ur qvivargu? lr unir qbar rivy va fb qbvat.

44:6 Naq ur biregbbx gurz, naq ur fcnxr hagb gurz gurfr fnzr jbeqf.

44:7 Naq gurl fnvq hagb uvz, Jurersber fnvgu zl ybeq gurfr jbeqf? Tbq
sbeovq gung gul freinagf fubhyq qb nppbeqvat gb guvf guvat: 44:8
Orubyq, gur zbarl, juvpu jr sbhaq va bhe fnpxf' zbhguf, jr oebhtug
ntnva hagb gurr bhg bs gur ynaq bs Pnanna: ubj gura fubhyq jr fgrny
bhg bs gul ybeq'f ubhfr fvyire be tbyq?  44:9 Jvgu jubzfbrire bs gul
freinagf vg or sbhaq, obgu yrg uvz qvr, naq jr nyfb jvyy or zl ybeq'f
obaqzra.

44:10 Naq ur fnvq, Abj nyfb yrg vg or nppbeqvat hagb lbhe jbeqf: ur
jvgu jubz vg vf sbhaq funyy or zl freinag; naq lr funyy or oynzryrff.

44:11 Gura gurl fcrrqvyl gbbx qbja rirel zna uvf fnpx gb gur tebhaq,
naq bcrarq rirel zna uvf fnpx.

44:12 Naq ur frnepurq, naq ortna ng gur ryqrfg, naq yrsg ng gur
lbhatrfg: naq gur phc jnf sbhaq va Orawnzva'f fnpx.

44:13 Gura gurl erag gurve pybgurf, naq ynqrq rirel zna uvf nff, naq
erghearq gb gur pvgl.

44:14 Naq Whqnu naq uvf oerguera pnzr gb Wbfrcu'f ubhfr; sbe ur jnf
lrg gurer: naq gurl sryy orsber uvz ba gur tebhaq.

44:15 Naq Wbfrcu fnvq hagb gurz, Jung qrrq vf guvf gung lr unir qbar?
jbg lr abg gung fhpu n zna nf V pna pregnvayl qvivar?  44:16 Naq Whqnu
fnvq, Jung funyy jr fnl hagb zl ybeq? jung funyy jr fcrnx?  be ubj
funyy jr pyrne bhefryirf? Tbq ungu sbhaq bhg gur vavdhvgl bs gul
freinagf: orubyq, jr ner zl ybeq'f freinagf, obgu jr, naq ur nyfb jvgu
jubz gur phc vf sbhaq.

44:17 Naq ur fnvq, Tbq sbeovq gung V fubhyq qb fb: ohg gur zna va
jubfr unaq gur phc vf sbhaq, ur funyy or zl freinag; naq nf sbe lbh,
trg lbh hc va crnpr hagb lbhe sngure.

44:18 Gura Whqnu pnzr arne hagb uvz, naq fnvq, Bu zl ybeq, yrg gul
freinag, V cenl gurr, fcrnx n jbeq va zl ybeq'f rnef, naq yrg abg
guvar natre ohea ntnvafg gul freinag: sbe gubh neg rira nf Cunenbu.

44:19 Zl ybeq nfxrq uvf freinagf, fnlvat, Unir lr n sngure, be n
oebgure?  44:20 Naq jr fnvq hagb zl ybeq, Jr unir n sngure, na byq
zna, naq n puvyq bs uvf byq ntr, n yvggyr bar; naq uvf oebgure vf
qrnq, naq ur nybar vf yrsg bs uvf zbgure, naq uvf sngure ybirgu uvz.

44:21 Naq gubh fnvqfg hagb gul freinagf, Oevat uvz qbja hagb zr, gung
V znl frg zvar rlrf hcba uvz.

44:22 Naq jr fnvq hagb zl ybeq, Gur ynq pnaabg yrnir uvf sngure: sbe
vs ur fubhyq yrnir uvf sngure, uvf sngure jbhyq qvr.

44:23 Naq gubh fnvqfg hagb gul freinagf, Rkprcg lbhe lbhatrfg oebgure
pbzr qbja jvgu lbh, lr funyy frr zl snpr ab zber.

44:24 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff jura jr pnzr hc hagb gul freinag zl sngure,
jr gbyq uvz gur jbeqf bs zl ybeq.

44:25 Naq bhe sngure fnvq, Tb ntnva, naq ohl hf n yvggyr sbbq.

44:26 Naq jr fnvq, Jr pnaabg tb qbja: vs bhe lbhatrfg oebgure or jvgu
hf, gura jvyy jr tb qbja: sbe jr znl abg frr gur zna'f snpr, rkprcg
bhe lbhatrfg oebgure or jvgu hf.

44:27 Naq gul freinag zl sngure fnvq hagb hf, Lr xabj gung zl jvsr
oner zr gjb fbaf: 44:28 Naq gur bar jrag bhg sebz zr, naq V fnvq,
Fheryl ur vf gbea va cvrprf; naq V fnj uvz abg fvapr: 44:29 Naq vs lr
gnxr guvf nyfb sebz zr, naq zvfpuvrs orsnyy uvz, lr funyy oevat qbja
zl tenl unvef jvgu fbeebj gb gur tenir.

44:30 Abj gurersber jura V pbzr gb gul freinag zl sngure, naq gur ynq
or abg jvgu hf; frrvat gung uvf yvsr vf obhaq hc va gur ynq'f yvsr;
44:31 Vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura ur frrgu gung gur ynq vf abg jvgu
hf, gung ur jvyy qvr: naq gul freinagf funyy oevat qbja gur tenl unvef
bs gul freinag bhe sngure jvgu fbeebj gb gur tenir.

44:32 Sbe gul freinag orpnzr fhergl sbe gur ynq hagb zl sngure,
fnlvat, Vs V oevat uvz abg hagb gurr, gura V funyy orne gur oynzr gb
zl sngure sbe rire.

44:33 Abj gurersber, V cenl gurr, yrg gul freinag novqr vafgrnq bs gur
ynq n obaqzna gb zl ybeq; naq yrg gur ynq tb hc jvgu uvf oerguera.

44:34 Sbe ubj funyy V tb hc gb zl sngure, naq gur ynq or abg jvgu zr?
yrfg crenqiragher V frr gur rivy gung funyy pbzr ba zl sngure.

45:1 Gura Wbfrcu pbhyq abg ersenva uvzfrys orsber nyy gurz gung fgbbq
ol uvz; naq ur pevrq, Pnhfr rirel zna gb tb bhg sebz zr. Naq gurer
fgbbq ab zna jvgu uvz, juvyr Wbfrcu znqr uvzfrys xabja hagb uvf
oerguera.

45:2 Naq ur jrcg nybhq: naq gur Rtlcgvnaf naq gur ubhfr bs Cunenbu
urneq.

45:3 Naq Wbfrcu fnvq hagb uvf oerguera, V nz Wbfrcu; qbgu zl sngure
lrg yvir? Naq uvf oerguera pbhyq abg nafjre uvz; sbe gurl jrer
gebhoyrq ng uvf cerfrapr.

45:4 Naq Wbfrcu fnvq hagb uvf oerguera, Pbzr arne gb zr, V cenl lbh.
Naq gurl pnzr arne. Naq ur fnvq, V nz Wbfrcu lbhe oebgure, jubz lr
fbyq vagb Rtlcg.

45:5 Abj gurersber or abg tevrirq, abe natel jvgu lbhefryirf, gung lr
fbyq zr uvgure: sbe Tbq qvq fraq zr orsber lbh gb cerfreir yvsr.

45:6 Sbe gurfr gjb lrnef ungu gur snzvar orra va gur ynaq: naq lrg
gurer ner svir lrnef, va gur juvpu gurer funyy arvgure or rnevat abe
uneirfg.

45:7 Naq Tbq frag zr orsber lbh gb cerfreir lbh n cbfgrevgl va gur
rnegu, naq gb fnir lbhe yvirf ol n terng qryvirenapr.

45:8 Fb abj vg jnf abg lbh gung frag zr uvgure, ohg Tbq: naq ur ungu
znqr zr n sngure gb Cunenbu, naq ybeq bs nyy uvf ubhfr, naq n ehyre
guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

45:9 Unfgr lr, naq tb hc gb zl sngure, naq fnl hagb uvz, Guhf fnvgu
gul fba Wbfrcu, Tbq ungu znqr zr ybeq bs nyy Rtlcg: pbzr qbja hagb zr,
gneel abg: 45:10 Naq gubh funyg qjryy va gur ynaq bs Tbfura, naq gubh
funyg or arne hagb zr, gubh, naq gul puvyqera, naq gul puvyqera'f
puvyqera, naq gul sybpxf, naq gul ureqf, naq nyy gung gubh unfg: 45:11
Naq gurer jvyy V abhevfu gurr; sbe lrg gurer ner svir lrnef bs snzvar;
yrfg gubh, naq gul ubhfrubyq, naq nyy gung gubh unfg, pbzr gb cbiregl.

45:12 Naq, orubyq, lbhe rlrf frr, naq gur rlrf bs zl oebgure Orawnzva,
gung vg vf zl zbhgu gung fcrnxrgu hagb lbh.

45:13 Naq lr funyy gryy zl sngure bs nyy zl tybel va Rtlcg, naq bs nyy
gung lr unir frra; naq lr funyy unfgr naq oevat qbja zl sngure uvgure.

45:14 Naq ur sryy hcba uvf oebgure Orawnzva'f arpx, naq jrcg; naq
Orawnzva jrcg hcba uvf arpx.

45:15 Zberbire ur xvffrq nyy uvf oerguera, naq jrcg hcba gurz: naq
nsgre gung uvf oerguera gnyxrq jvgu uvz.

45:16 Naq gur snzr gurerbs jnf urneq va Cunenbu'f ubhfr, fnlvat,
Wbfrcu'f oerguera ner pbzr: naq vg cyrnfrq Cunenbu jryy, naq uvf
freinagf.

45:17 Naq Cunenbu fnvq hagb Wbfrcu, Fnl hagb gul oerguera, Guvf qb lr;
ynqr lbhe ornfgf, naq tb, trg lbh hagb gur ynaq bs Pnanna; 45:18 Naq
gnxr lbhe sngure naq lbhe ubhfrubyqf, naq pbzr hagb zr: naq V jvyy
tvir lbh gur tbbq bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, naq lr funyy rng gur sng bs
gur ynaq.

45:19 Abj gubh neg pbzznaqrq, guvf qb lr; gnxr lbh jntbaf bhg bs gur
ynaq bs Rtlcg sbe lbhe yvggyr barf, naq sbe lbhe jvirf, naq oevat lbhe
sngure, naq pbzr.

45:20 Nyfb ertneq abg lbhe fghss; sbe gur tbbq bs nyy gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg vf lbhe'f.

45:21 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq fb: naq Wbfrcu tnir gurz jntbaf,
nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs Cunenbu, naq tnir gurz cebivfvba sbe
gur jnl.

45:22 Gb nyy bs gurz ur tnir rnpu zna punatrf bs envzrag; ohg gb
Orawnzva ur tnir guerr uhaqerq cvrprf bs fvyire, naq svir punatrf bs
envzrag.

45:23 Naq gb uvf sngure ur frag nsgre guvf znaare; gra nffrf ynqra
jvgu gur tbbq guvatf bs Rtlcg, naq gra fur nffrf ynqra jvgu pbea naq
oernq naq zrng sbe uvf sngure ol gur jnl.

45:24 Fb ur frag uvf oerguera njnl, naq gurl qrcnegrq: naq ur fnvq
hagb gurz, Frr gung lr snyy abg bhg ol gur jnl.

45:25 Naq gurl jrag hc bhg bs Rtlcg, naq pnzr vagb gur ynaq bs Pnanna
hagb Wnpbo gurve sngure, 45:26 Naq gbyq uvz, fnlvat, Wbfrcu vf lrg
nyvir, naq ur vf tbireabe bire nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg. Naq Wnpbo'f
urneg snvagrq, sbe ur oryvrirq gurz abg.

45:27 Naq gurl gbyq uvz nyy gur jbeqf bs Wbfrcu, juvpu ur unq fnvq
hagb gurz: naq jura ur fnj gur jntbaf juvpu Wbfrcu unq frag gb pneel
uvz, gur fcvevg bs Wnpbo gurve sngure erivirq: 45:28 Naq Vfenry fnvq,
Vg vf rabhtu; Wbfrcu zl fba vf lrg nyvir: V jvyy tb naq frr uvz orsber
V qvr.

46:1 Naq Vfenry gbbx uvf wbhearl jvgu nyy gung ur unq, naq pnzr gb
Orrefuron, naq bssrerq fnpevsvprf hagb gur Tbq bs uvf sngure Vfnnp.

46:2 Naq Tbq fcnxr hagb Vfenry va gur ivfvbaf bs gur avtug, naq fnvq,
Wnpbo, Wnpbo. Naq ur fnvq, Urer nz V.

46:3 Naq ur fnvq, V nz Tbq, gur Tbq bs gul sngure: srne abg gb tb qbja
vagb Rtlcg; sbe V jvyy gurer znxr bs gurr n terng angvba: 46:4 V jvyy
tb qbja jvgu gurr vagb Rtlcg; naq V jvyy nyfb fheryl oevat gurr hc
ntnva: naq Wbfrcu funyy chg uvf unaq hcba guvar rlrf.

46:5 Naq Wnpbo ebfr hc sebz Orrefuron: naq gur fbaf bs Vfenry pneevrq
Wnpbo gurve sngure, naq gurve yvggyr barf, naq gurve jvirf, va gur
jntbaf juvpu Cunenbu unq frag gb pneel uvz.

46:6 Naq gurl gbbx gurve pnggyr, naq gurve tbbqf, juvpu gurl unq
tbggra va gur ynaq bs Pnanna, naq pnzr vagb Rtlcg, Wnpbo, naq nyy uvf
frrq jvgu uvz: 46:7 Uvf fbaf, naq uvf fbaf' fbaf jvgu uvz, uvf
qnhtugref, naq uvf fbaf' qnhtugref, naq nyy uvf frrq oebhtug ur jvgu
uvz vagb Rtlcg.

46:8 Naq gurfr ner gur anzrf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, juvpu pnzr
vagb Rtlcg, Wnpbo naq uvf fbaf: Erhora, Wnpbo'f svefgobea.

46:9 Naq gur fbaf bs Erhora; Unabpu, naq Cunyyh, naq Urmeba, naq
Pnezv.

46:10 Naq gur fbaf bs Fvzrba; Wrzhry, naq Wnzva, naq Bunq, naq Wnpuva,
naq Mbune, naq Funhy gur fba bs n Pnannavgvfu jbzna.

46:11 Naq gur fbaf bs Yriv; Trefuba, Xbungu, naq Zrenev.

46:12 Naq gur fbaf bs Whqnu; Re, naq Bana, naq Furynu, naq Cunerm, naq
Mnenu: ohg Re naq Bana qvrq va gur ynaq bs Pnanna. Naq gur fbaf bs
Cunerm jrer Urmeba naq Unzhy.

46:13 Naq gur fbaf bs Vffnpune; Gbyn, naq Cuhinu, naq Wbo, naq
Fuvzeba.

46:14 Naq gur fbaf bs Mrohyha; Frerq, naq Ryba, naq Wnuyrry.

46:15 Gurfr or gur fbaf bs Yrnu, juvpu fur oner hagb Wnpbo va
Cnqnanenz, jvgu uvf qnhtugre Qvanu: nyy gur fbhyf bs uvf fbaf naq uvf
qnhtugref jrer guvegl naq guerr.

46:16 Naq gur fbaf bs Tnq; Mvcuvba, naq Unttv, Fuhav, naq Rmoba, Rev,
naq Nebqv, naq Neryv.

46:17 Naq gur fbaf bs Nfure; Wvzanu, naq Vfuhnu, naq Vfhv, naq Orevnu,
naq Frenu gurve fvfgre: naq gur fbaf bs Orevnu; Urore, naq Znypuvry.

46:18 Gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Mvycnu, jubz Ynona tnir gb Yrnu uvf
qnhtugre, naq gurfr fur oner hagb Wnpbo, rira fvkgrra fbhyf.

46:19 Gur fbaf bs Enpury Wnpbo'f jvsr; Wbfrcu, naq Orawnzva.

46:20 Naq hagb Wbfrcu va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg jrer obea Znanffru naq
Rcuenvz, juvpu Nfrangu gur qnhtugre bs Cbgvcurenu cevrfg bs Ba oner
hagb uvz.

46:21 Naq gur fbaf bs Orawnzva jrer Orynu, naq Orpure, naq Nfuory,
Tren, naq Annzna, Ruv, naq Ebfu, Zhccvz, naq Uhccvz, naq Neq.

46:22 Gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Enpury, juvpu jrer obea gb Wnpbo: nyy gur
fbhyf jrer sbhegrra.

46:23 Naq gur fbaf bs Qna; Uhfuvz.

46:24 Naq gur fbaf bs Ancugnyv; Wnumrry, naq Thav, naq Wrmre, naq
Fuvyyrz.

46:25 Gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Ovyunu, juvpu Ynona tnir hagb Enpury uvf
qnhtugre, naq fur oner gurfr hagb Wnpbo: nyy gur fbhyf jrer frira.

46:26 Nyy gur fbhyf gung pnzr jvgu Wnpbo vagb Rtlcg, juvpu pnzr bhg bs
uvf ybvaf, orfvqrf Wnpbo'f fbaf' jvirf, nyy gur fbhyf jrer guerrfpber
naq fvk; 46:27 Naq gur fbaf bs Wbfrcu, juvpu jrer obea uvz va Rtlcg,
jrer gjb fbhyf: nyy gur fbhyf bs gur ubhfr bs Wnpbo, juvpu pnzr vagb
Rtlcg, jrer guerrfpber naq gra.

46:28 Naq ur frag Whqnu orsber uvz hagb Wbfrcu, gb qverpg uvf snpr
hagb Tbfura; naq gurl pnzr vagb gur ynaq bs Tbfura.

46:29 Naq Wbfrcu znqr ernql uvf punevbg, naq jrag hc gb zrrg Vfenry
uvf sngure, gb Tbfura, naq cerfragrq uvzfrys hagb uvz; naq ur sryy ba
uvf arpx, naq jrcg ba uvf arpx n tbbq juvyr.

46:30 Naq Vfenry fnvq hagb Wbfrcu, Abj yrg zr qvr, fvapr V unir frra
gul snpr, orpnhfr gubh neg lrg nyvir.

46:31 Naq Wbfrcu fnvq hagb uvf oerguera, naq hagb uvf sngure'f ubhfr,
V jvyy tb hc, naq furj Cunenbu, naq fnl hagb uvz, Zl oerguera, naq zl
sngure'f ubhfr, juvpu jrer va gur ynaq bs Pnanna, ner pbzr hagb zr;
46:32 Naq gur zra ner furcureqf, sbe gurve genqr ungu orra gb srrq
pnggyr; naq gurl unir oebhtug gurve sybpxf, naq gurve ureqf, naq nyy
gung gurl unir.

46:33 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura Cunenbu funyy pnyy lbh, naq
funyy fnl, Jung vf lbhe bpphcngvba?  46:34 Gung lr funyy fnl, Gul
freinagf' genqr ungu orra nobhg pnggyr sebz bhe lbhgu rira hagvy abj,
obgu jr, naq nyfb bhe snguref: gung lr znl qjryy va gur ynaq bs
Tbfura; sbe rirel furcureq vf na nobzvangvba hagb gur Rtlcgvnaf.

47:1 Gura Wbfrcu pnzr naq gbyq Cunenbu, naq fnvq, Zl sngure naq zl
oerguera, naq gurve sybpxf, naq gurve ureqf, naq nyy gung gurl unir,
ner pbzr bhg bs gur ynaq bs Pnanna; naq, orubyq, gurl ner va gur ynaq
bs Tbfura.

47:2 Naq ur gbbx fbzr bs uvf oerguera, rira svir zra, naq cerfragrq
gurz hagb Cunenbu.

47:3 Naq Cunenbu fnvq hagb uvf oerguera, Jung vf lbhe bpphcngvba? Naq
gurl fnvq hagb Cunenbu, Gul freinagf ner furcureqf, obgu jr, naq nyfb
bhe snguref.

47:4 Gurl fnvq zberire hagb Cunenbu, Sbe gb fbwbhea va gur ynaq ner jr
pbzr; sbe gul freinagf unir ab cnfgher sbe gurve sybpxf; sbe gur
snzvar vf fber va gur ynaq bs Pnanna: abj gurersber, jr cenl gurr, yrg
gul freinagf qjryy va gur ynaq bs Tbfura.

47:5 Naq Cunenbu fcnxr hagb Wbfrcu, fnlvat, Gul sngure naq gul
oerguera ner pbzr hagb gurr: 47:6 Gur ynaq bs Rtlcg vf orsber gurr; va
gur orfg bs gur ynaq znxr gul sngure naq oerguera gb qjryy; va gur
ynaq bs Tbfura yrg gurz qjryy: naq vs gubh xabjrfg nal zra bs npgvivgl
nzbat gurz, gura znxr gurz ehyref bire zl pnggyr.

47:7 Naq Wbfrcu oebhtug va Wnpbo uvf sngure, naq frg uvz orsber
Cunenbu: naq Wnpbo oyrffrq Cunenbu.

47:8 Naq Cunenbu fnvq hagb Wnpbo, Ubj byq neg gubh?  47:9 Naq Wnpbo
fnvq hagb Cunenbu, Gur qnlf bs gur lrnef bs zl cvytevzntr ner na
uhaqerq naq guvegl lrnef: srj naq rivy unir gur qnlf bs gur lrnef bs
zl yvsr orra, naq unir abg nggnvarq hagb gur qnlf bs gur lrnef bs gur
yvsr bs zl snguref va gur qnlf bs gurve cvytevzntr.

47:10 Naq Wnpbo oyrffrq Cunenbu, naq jrag bhg sebz orsber Cunenbu.

47:11 Naq Wbfrcu cynprq uvf sngure naq uvf oerguera, naq tnir gurz n
cbffrffvba va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, va gur orfg bs gur ynaq, va gur ynaq
bs Enzrfrf, nf Cunenbu unq pbzznaqrq.

47:12 Naq Wbfrcu abhevfurq uvf sngure, naq uvf oerguera, naq nyy uvf
sngure'f ubhfrubyq, jvgu oernq, nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf.

47:13 Naq gurer jnf ab oernq va nyy gur ynaq; sbe gur snzvar jnf irel
fber, fb gung gur ynaq bs Rtlcg naq nyy gur ynaq bs Pnanna snvagrq ol
ernfba bs gur snzvar.

47:14 Naq Wbfrcu tngurerq hc nyy gur zbarl gung jnf sbhaq va gur ynaq
bs Rtlcg, naq va gur ynaq bs Pnanna, sbe gur pbea juvpu gurl obhtug:
naq Wbfrcu oebhtug gur zbarl vagb Cunenbu'f ubhfr.

47:15 Naq jura zbarl snvyrq va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, naq va gur ynaq bs
Pnanna, nyy gur Rtlcgvnaf pnzr hagb Wbfrcu, naq fnvq, Tvir hf oernq:
sbe jul fubhyq jr qvr va gul cerfrapr? sbe gur zbarl snvyrgu.

47:16 Naq Wbfrcu fnvq, Tvir lbhe pnggyr; naq V jvyy tvir lbh sbe lbhe
pnggyr, vs zbarl snvy.

47:17 Naq gurl oebhtug gurve pnggyr hagb Wbfrcu: naq Wbfrcu tnir gurz
oernq va rkpunatr sbe ubefrf, naq sbe gur sybpxf, naq sbe gur pnggyr
bs gur ureqf, naq sbe gur nffrf: naq ur srq gurz jvgu oernq sbe nyy
gurve pnggyr sbe gung lrne.

47:18 Jura gung lrne jnf raqrq, gurl pnzr hagb uvz gur frpbaq lrne,
naq fnvq hagb uvz, Jr jvyy abg uvqr vg sebz zl ybeq, ubj gung bhe
zbarl vf fcrag; zl ybeq nyfb ungu bhe ureqf bs pnggyr; gurer vf abg
bhtug yrsg va gur fvtug bs zl ybeq, ohg bhe obqvrf, naq bhe ynaqf:
47:19 Jurersber funyy jr qvr orsber guvar rlrf, obgu jr naq bhe ynaq?
ohl hf naq bhe ynaq sbe oernq, naq jr naq bhe ynaq jvyy or freinagf
hagb Cunenbu: naq tvir hf frrq, gung jr znl yvir, naq abg qvr, gung
gur ynaq or abg qrfbyngr.

47:20 Naq Wbfrcu obhtug nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg sbe Cunenbu; sbe gur
Rtlcgvnaf fbyq rirel zna uvf svryq, orpnhfr gur snzvar cerinvyrq bire
gurz: fb gur ynaq orpnzr Cunenbu'f.

47:21 Naq nf sbe gur crbcyr, ur erzbirq gurz gb pvgvrf sebz bar raq bs
gur obeqref bs Rtlcg rira gb gur bgure raq gurerbs.

47:22 Bayl gur ynaq bs gur cevrfgf obhtug ur abg; sbe gur cevrfgf unq
n cbegvba nffvtarq gurz bs Cunenbu, naq qvq rng gurve cbegvba juvpu
Cunenbu tnir gurz: jurersber gurl fbyq abg gurve ynaqf.

47:23 Gura Wbfrcu fnvq hagb gur crbcyr, Orubyq, V unir obhtug lbh guvf
qnl naq lbhe ynaq sbe Cunenbu: yb, urer vf frrq sbe lbh, naq lr funyy
fbj gur ynaq.

47:24 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff va gur vapernfr, gung lr funyy tvir
gur svsgu cneg hagb Cunenbu, naq sbhe cnegf funyy or lbhe bja, sbe
frrq bs gur svryq, naq sbe lbhe sbbq, naq sbe gurz bs lbhe ubhfrubyqf,
naq sbe sbbq sbe lbhe yvggyr barf.

47:25 Naq gurl fnvq, Gubh unfg fnirq bhe yvirf: yrg hf svaq tenpr va
gur fvtug bs zl ybeq, naq jr jvyy or Cunenbu'f freinagf.

47:26 Naq Wbfrcu znqr vg n ynj bire gur ynaq bs Rtlcg hagb guvf qnl,
gung Cunenbu fubhyq unir gur svsgu cneg, rkprcg gur ynaq bs gur
cevrfgf bayl, juvpu orpnzr abg Cunenbu'f.

47:27 Naq Vfenry qjryg va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, va gur pbhagel bs Tbfura;
naq gurl unq cbffrffvbaf gurerva, naq terj, naq zhygvcyvrq
rkprrqvatyl.

47:28 Naq Wnpbo yvirq va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg friragrra lrnef: fb gur
jubyr ntr bs Wnpbo jnf na uhaqerq sbegl naq frira lrnef.

47:29 Naq gur gvzr qerj avtu gung Vfenry zhfg qvr: naq ur pnyyrq uvf
fba Wbfrcu, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Vs abj V unir sbhaq tenpr va gul fvtug,
chg, V cenl gurr, gul unaq haqre zl guvtu, naq qrny xvaqyl naq gehyl
jvgu zr; ohel zr abg, V cenl gurr, va Rtlcg: 47:30 Ohg V jvyy yvr jvgu
zl snguref, naq gubh funyg pneel zr bhg bs Rtlcg, naq ohel zr va gurve
ohelvatcynpr. Naq ur fnvq, V jvyy qb nf gubh unfg fnvq.

47:31 Naq ur fnvq, Fjrne hagb zr. Naq ur fjner hagb uvz. Naq Vfenry
objrq uvzfrys hcba gur orq'f urnq.

48:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre gurfr guvatf, gung bar gbyq Wbfrcu,
Orubyq, gul sngure vf fvpx: naq ur gbbx jvgu uvz uvf gjb fbaf,
Znanffru naq Rcuenvz.

48:2 Naq bar gbyq Wnpbo, naq fnvq, Orubyq, gul fba Wbfrcu pbzrgu hagb
gurr: naq Vfenry fgeratgurarq uvzfrys, naq fng hcba gur orq.

48:3 Naq Wnpbo fnvq hagb Wbfrcu, Tbq Nyzvtugl nccrnerq hagb zr ng Yhm
va gur ynaq bs Pnanna, naq oyrffrq zr, 48:4 Naq fnvq hagb zr, Orubyq,
V jvyy znxr gurr sehvgshy, naq zhygvcyl gurr, naq V jvyy znxr bs gurr
n zhygvghqr bs crbcyr; naq jvyy tvir guvf ynaq gb gul frrq nsgre gurr
sbe na rireynfgvat cbffrffvba.

48:5 Naq abj gul gjb fbaf, Rcuenvz naq Znanffru, juvpu jrer obea hagb
gurr va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg orsber V pnzr hagb gurr vagb Rtlcg, ner
zvar; nf Erhora naq Fvzrba, gurl funyy or zvar.

48:6 Naq gul vffhr, juvpu gubh ortrggrfg nsgre gurz, funyy or guvar,
naq funyy or pnyyrq nsgre gur anzr bs gurve oerguera va gurve
vaurevgnapr.

48:7 Naq nf sbe zr, jura V pnzr sebz Cnqna, Enpury qvrq ol zr va gur
ynaq bs Pnanna va gur jnl, jura lrg gurer jnf ohg n yvggyr jnl gb pbzr
hagb Rcuengu: naq V ohevrq ure gurer va gur jnl bs Rcuengu; gur fnzr
vf Orguyrurz.

48:8 Naq Vfenry oruryq Wbfrcu'f fbaf, naq fnvq, Jub ner gurfr?  48:9
Naq Wbfrcu fnvq hagb uvf sngure, Gurl ner zl fbaf, jubz Tbq ungu tvira
zr va guvf cynpr. Naq ur fnvq, Oevat gurz, V cenl gurr, hagb zr, naq V
jvyy oyrff gurz.

48:10 Abj gur rlrf bs Vfenry jrer qvz sbe ntr, fb gung ur pbhyq abg
frr.

Naq ur oebhtug gurz arne hagb uvz; naq ur xvffrq gurz, naq rzoenprq
gurz.

48:11 Naq Vfenry fnvq hagb Wbfrcu, V unq abg gubhtug gb frr gul snpr:
naq, yb, Tbq ungu furjrq zr nyfb gul frrq.

48:12 Naq Wbfrcu oebhtug gurz bhg sebz orgjrra uvf xarrf, naq ur objrq
uvzfrys jvgu uvf snpr gb gur rnegu.

48:13 Naq Wbfrcu gbbx gurz obgu, Rcuenvz va uvf evtug unaq gbjneq
Vfenry'f yrsg unaq, naq Znanffru va uvf yrsg unaq gbjneq Vfenry'f
evtug unaq, naq oebhtug gurz arne hagb uvz.

48:14 Naq Vfenry fgergpurq bhg uvf evtug unaq, naq ynvq vg hcba
Rcuenvz'f urnq, jub jnf gur lbhatre, naq uvf yrsg unaq hcba Znanffru'f
urnq, thvqvat uvf unaqf jvggvatyl; sbe Znanffru jnf gur svefgobea.

48:15 Naq ur oyrffrq Wbfrcu, naq fnvq, Tbq, orsber jubz zl snguref
Noenunz naq Vfnnp qvq jnyx, gur Tbq juvpu srq zr nyy zl yvsr ybat hagb
guvf qnl, 48:16 Gur Natry juvpu erqrrzrq zr sebz nyy rivy, oyrff gur
ynqf; naq yrg zl anzr or anzrq ba gurz, naq gur anzr bs zl snguref
Noenunz naq Vfnnp; naq yrg gurz tebj vagb n zhygvghqr va gur zvqfg bs
gur rnegu.

48:17 Naq jura Wbfrcu fnj gung uvf sngure ynvq uvf evtug unaq hcba gur
urnq bs Rcuenvz, vg qvfcyrnfrq uvz: naq ur uryq hc uvf sngure'f unaq,
gb erzbir vg sebz Rcuenvz'f urnq hagb Znanffru'f urnq.

48:18 Naq Wbfrcu fnvq hagb uvf sngure, Abg fb, zl sngure: sbe guvf vf
gur svefgobea; chg gul evtug unaq hcba uvf urnq.

48:19 Naq uvf sngure ershfrq, naq fnvq, V xabj vg, zl fba, V xabj vg:
ur nyfb funyy orpbzr n crbcyr, naq ur nyfb funyy or terng: ohg gehyl
uvf lbhatre oebgure funyy or terngre guna ur, naq uvf frrq funyy
orpbzr n zhygvghqr bs angvbaf.

48:20 Naq ur oyrffrq gurz gung qnl, fnlvat, Va gurr funyy Vfenry
oyrff, fnlvat, Tbq znxr gurr nf Rcuenvz naq nf Znanffru: naq ur frg
Rcuenvz orsber Znanffru.

48:21 Naq Vfenry fnvq hagb Wbfrcu, Orubyq, V qvr: ohg Tbq funyy or
jvgu lbh, naq oevat lbh ntnva hagb gur ynaq bs lbhe snguref.

48:22 Zberbire V unir tvira gb gurr bar cbegvba nobir gul oerguera,
juvpu V gbbx bhg bs gur unaq bs gur Nzbevgr jvgu zl fjbeq naq jvgu zl
obj.

49:1 Naq Wnpbo pnyyrq hagb uvf fbaf, naq fnvq, Tngure lbhefryirf
gbtrgure, gung V znl gryy lbh gung juvpu funyy orsnyy lbh va gur ynfg
qnlf.

49:2 Tngure lbhefryirf gbtrgure, naq urne, lr fbaf bs Wnpbo; naq
urnexra hagb Vfenry lbhe sngure.

49:3 Erhora, gubh neg zl svefgobea, zl zvtug, naq gur ortvaavat bs zl
fgeratgu, gur rkpryyrapl bs qvtavgl, naq gur rkpryyrapl bs cbjre: 49:4
Hafgnoyr nf jngre, gubh funyg abg rkpry; orpnhfr gubh jragrfg hc gb
gul sngure'f orq; gura qrsvyrqfg gubh vg: ur jrag hc gb zl pbhpu.

49:5 Fvzrba naq Yriv ner oerguera; vafgehzragf bs pehrygl ner va gurve
unovgngvbaf.

49:6 B zl fbhy, pbzr abg gubh vagb gurve frperg; hagb gurve nffrzoyl,
zvar ubabhe, or abg gubh havgrq: sbe va gurve natre gurl fyrj n zna,
naq va gurve frysjvyy gurl qvttrq qbja n jnyy.

49:7 Phefrq or gurve natre, sbe vg jnf svrepr; naq gurve jengu, sbe vg
jnf pehry: V jvyy qvivqr gurz va Wnpbo, naq fpnggre gurz va Vfenry.

49:8 Whqnu, gubh neg ur jubz gul oerguera funyy cenvfr: gul unaq funyy
or va gur arpx bs guvar rarzvrf; gul sngure'f puvyqera funyy obj qbja
orsber gurr.

49:9 Whqnu vf n yvba'f juryc: sebz gur cerl, zl fba, gubh neg tbar hc:
ur fgbbcrq qbja, ur pbhpurq nf n yvba, naq nf na byq yvba; jub funyy
ebhfr uvz hc?  49:10 Gur fprcger funyy abg qrcneg sebz Whqnu, abe n
ynjtvire sebz orgjrra uvf srrg, hagvy Fuvybu pbzr; naq hagb uvz funyy
gur tngurevat bs gur crbcyr or.

49:11 Ovaqvat uvf sbny hagb gur ivar, naq uvf nff'f pbyg hagb gur
pubvpr ivar; ur jnfurq uvf tnezragf va jvar, naq uvf pybgurf va gur
oybbq bs tencrf: 49:12 Uvf rlrf funyy or erq jvgu jvar, naq uvf grrgu
juvgr jvgu zvyx.

49:13 Mrohyha funyy qjryy ng gur unira bs gur frn; naq ur funyy or sbe
na unira bs fuvcf; naq uvf obeqre funyy or hagb Mvqba.

49:14 Vffnpune vf n fgebat nff pbhpuvat qbja orgjrra gjb oheqraf:
49:15 Naq ur fnj gung erfg jnf tbbq, naq gur ynaq gung vg jnf
cyrnfnag; naq objrq uvf fubhyqre gb orne, naq orpnzr n freinag hagb
gevohgr.

49:16 Qna funyy whqtr uvf crbcyr, nf bar bs gur gevorf bs Vfenry.

49:17 Qna funyy or n frecrag ol gur jnl, na nqqre va gur cngu, gung
ovgrgu gur ubefr urryf, fb gung uvf evqre funyy snyy onpxjneq.

49:18 V unir jnvgrq sbe gul fnyingvba, B YBEQ.

49:19 Tnq, n gebbc funyy birepbzr uvz: ohg ur funyy birepbzr ng gur
ynfg.

49:20 Bhg bs Nfure uvf oernq funyy or sng, naq ur funyy lvryq eblny
qnvagvrf.

49:21 Ancugnyv vf n uvaq yrg ybbfr: ur tvirgu tbbqyl jbeqf.

49:22 Wbfrcu vf n sehvgshy obhtu, rira n sehvgshy obhtu ol n jryy;
jubfr oenapurf eha bire gur jnyy: 49:23 Gur nepuref unir fberyl
tevrirq uvz, naq fubg ng uvz, naq ungrq uvz: 49:24 Ohg uvf obj nobqr
va fgeratgu, naq gur nezf bs uvf unaqf jrer znqr fgebat ol gur unaqf
bs gur zvtugl Tbq bs Wnpbo; (sebz gurapr vf gur furcureq, gur fgbar bs
Vfenry:) 49:25 Rira ol gur Tbq bs gul sngure, jub funyy uryc gurr; naq
ol gur Nyzvtugl, jub funyy oyrff gurr jvgu oyrffvatf bs urnira nobir,
oyrffvatf bs gur qrrc gung yvrgu haqre, oyrffvatf bs gur oernfgf, naq
bs gur jbzo: 49:26 Gur oyrffvatf bs gul sngure unir cerinvyrq nobir
gur oyrffvatf bs zl cebtravgbef hagb gur hgzbfg obhaq bs gur
rireynfgvat uvyyf: gurl funyy or ba gur urnq bs Wbfrcu, naq ba gur
pebja bs gur urnq bs uvz gung jnf frcnengr sebz uvf oerguera.

49:27 Orawnzva funyy eniva nf n jbys: va gur zbeavat ur funyy qribhe
gur cerl, naq ng avtug ur funyy qvivqr gur fcbvy.

49:28 Nyy gurfr ner gur gjryir gevorf bs Vfenry: naq guvf vf vg gung
gurve sngure fcnxr hagb gurz, naq oyrffrq gurz; rirel bar nppbeqvat gb
uvf oyrffvat ur oyrffrq gurz.

49:29 Naq ur punetrq gurz, naq fnvq hagb gurz, V nz gb or tngurerq
hagb zl crbcyr: ohel zr jvgu zl snguref va gur pnir gung vf va gur
svryq bs Rcueba gur Uvggvgr, 49:30 Va gur pnir gung vf va gur svryq bs
Znpucrynu, juvpu vf orsber Znzer, va gur ynaq bs Pnanna, juvpu Noenunz
obhtug jvgu gur svryq bs Rcueba gur Uvggvgr sbe n cbffrffvba bs n
ohelvatcynpr.

49:31 Gurer gurl ohevrq Noenunz naq Fnenu uvf jvsr; gurer gurl ohevrq
Vfnnp naq Erorxnu uvf jvsr; naq gurer V ohevrq Yrnu.

49:32 Gur chepunfr bs gur svryq naq bs gur pnir gung vf gurerva jnf
sebz gur puvyqera bs Urgu.

49:33 Naq jura Wnpbo unq znqr na raq bs pbzznaqvat uvf fbaf, ur
tngurerq hc uvf srrg vagb gur orq, naq lvryqrq hc gur tubfg, naq jnf
tngurerq hagb uvf crbcyr.

50:1 Naq Wbfrcu sryy hcba uvf sngure'f snpr, naq jrcg hcba uvz, naq
xvffrq uvz.

50:2 Naq Wbfrcu pbzznaqrq uvf freinagf gur culfvpvnaf gb rzonyz uvf
sngure: naq gur culfvpvnaf rzonyzrq Vfenry.

50:3 Naq sbegl qnlf jrer shysvyyrq sbe uvz; sbe fb ner shysvyyrq gur
qnlf bs gubfr juvpu ner rzonyzrq: naq gur Rtlcgvnaf zbhearq sbe uvz
guerrfpber naq gra qnlf.

50:4 Naq jura gur qnlf bs uvf zbheavat jrer cnfg, Wbfrcu fcnxr hagb
gur ubhfr bs Cunenbu, fnlvat, Vs abj V unir sbhaq tenpr va lbhe rlrf,
fcrnx, V cenl lbh, va gur rnef bs Cunenbu, fnlvat, 50:5 Zl sngure znqr
zr fjrne, fnlvat, Yb, V qvr: va zl tenir juvpu V unir qvttrq sbe zr va
gur ynaq bs Pnanna, gurer funyg gubh ohel zr. Abj gurersber yrg zr tb
hc, V cenl gurr, naq ohel zl sngure, naq V jvyy pbzr ntnva.

50:6 Naq Cunenbu fnvq, Tb hc, naq ohel gul sngure, nppbeqvat nf ur
znqr gurr fjrne.

50:7 Naq Wbfrcu jrag hc gb ohel uvf sngure: naq jvgu uvz jrag hc nyy
gur freinagf bs Cunenbu, gur ryqref bs uvf ubhfr, naq nyy gur ryqref
bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, 50:8 Naq nyy gur ubhfr bs Wbfrcu, naq uvf
oerguera, naq uvf sngure'f ubhfr: bayl gurve yvggyr barf, naq gurve
sybpxf, naq gurve ureqf, gurl yrsg va gur ynaq bs Tbfura.

50:9 Naq gurer jrag hc jvgu uvz obgu punevbgf naq ubefrzra: naq vg jnf
n irel terng pbzcnal.

50:10 Naq gurl pnzr gb gur guerfuvatsybbe bs Ngnq, juvpu vf orlbaq
Wbeqna, naq gurer gurl zbhearq jvgu n terng naq irel fber ynzragngvba:
naq ur znqr n zbheavat sbe uvf sngure frira qnlf.

50:11 Naq jura gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq, gur Pnannavgrf, fnj gur
zbheavat va gur sybbe bs Ngnq, gurl fnvq, Guvf vf n tevribhf zbheavat
gb gur Rtlcgvnaf: jurersber gur anzr bs vg jnf pnyyrq Noryzvmenvz,
juvpu vf orlbaq Wbeqna.

50:12 Naq uvf fbaf qvq hagb uvz nppbeqvat nf ur pbzznaqrq gurz: 50:13
Sbe uvf fbaf pneevrq uvz vagb gur ynaq bs Pnanna, naq ohevrq uvz va
gur pnir bs gur svryq bs Znpucrynu, juvpu Noenunz obhtug jvgu gur
svryq sbe n cbffrffvba bs n ohelvatcynpr bs Rcueba gur Uvggvgr, orsber
Znzer.

50:14 Naq Wbfrcu erghearq vagb Rtlcg, ur, naq uvf oerguera, naq nyy
gung jrag hc jvgu uvz gb ohel uvf sngure, nsgre ur unq ohevrq uvf
sngure.

50:15 Naq jura Wbfrcu'f oerguera fnj gung gurve sngure jnf qrnq, gurl
fnvq, Wbfrcu jvyy crenqiragher ungr hf, naq jvyy pregnvayl erdhvgr hf
nyy gur rivy juvpu jr qvq hagb uvz.

50:16 Naq gurl frag n zrffratre hagb Wbfrcu, fnlvat, Gul sngure qvq
pbzznaq orsber ur qvrq, fnlvat, 50:17 Fb funyy lr fnl hagb Wbfrcu,
Sbetvir, V cenl gurr abj, gur gerfcnff bs gul oerguera, naq gurve fva;
sbe gurl qvq hagb gurr rivy: naq abj, jr cenl gurr, sbetvir gur
gerfcnff bs gur freinagf bs gur Tbq bs gul sngure. Naq Wbfrcu jrcg
jura gurl fcnxr hagb uvz.

50:18 Naq uvf oerguera nyfb jrag naq sryy qbja orsber uvf snpr; naq
gurl fnvq, Orubyq, jr or gul freinagf.

50:19 Naq Wbfrcu fnvq hagb gurz, Srne abg: sbe nz V va gur cynpr bs
Tbq?  50:20 Ohg nf sbe lbh, lr gubhtug rivy ntnvafg zr; ohg Tbq zrnag
vg hagb tbbq, gb oevat gb cnff, nf vg vf guvf qnl, gb fnir zhpu crbcyr
nyvir.

50:21 Abj gurersber srne lr abg: V jvyy abhevfu lbh, naq lbhe yvggyr
barf.

Naq ur pbzsbegrq gurz, naq fcnxr xvaqyl hagb gurz.

50:22 Naq Wbfrcu qjryg va Rtlcg, ur, naq uvf sngure'f ubhfr: naq
Wbfrcu yvirq na uhaqerq naq gra lrnef.

50:23 Naq Wbfrcu fnj Rcuenvz'f puvyqera bs gur guveq trarengvba: gur
puvyqera nyfb bs Znpuve gur fba bs Znanffru jrer oebhtug hc hcba
Wbfrcu'f xarrf.

50:24 Naq Wbfrcu fnvq hagb uvf oerguera, V qvr: naq Tbq jvyy fheryl
ivfvg lbh, naq oevat lbh bhg bs guvf ynaq hagb gur ynaq juvpu ur fjner
gb Noenunz, gb Vfnnp, naq gb Wnpbo.

50:25 Naq Wbfrcu gbbx na bngu bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Tbq
jvyy fheryl ivfvg lbh, naq lr funyy pneel hc zl obarf sebz urapr.

50:26 Fb Wbfrcu qvrq, orvat na uhaqerq naq gra lrnef byq: naq gurl
rzonyzrq uvz, naq ur jnf chg va n pbssva va Rtlcg.




Gur Frpbaq Obbx bs Zbfrf:  Pnyyrq Rkbqhf


1:1 Abj gurfr ner gur anzrf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, juvpu pnzr
vagb Rtlcg; rirel zna naq uvf ubhfrubyq pnzr jvgu Wnpbo.

1:2 Erhora, Fvzrba, Yriv, naq Whqnu, 1:3 Vffnpune, Mrohyha, naq
Orawnzva, 1:4 Qna, naq Ancugnyv, Tnq, naq Nfure.

1:5 Naq nyy gur fbhyf gung pnzr bhg bs gur ybvaf bs Wnpbo jrer friragl
fbhyf: sbe Wbfrcu jnf va Rtlcg nyernql.

1:6 Naq Wbfrcu qvrq, naq nyy uvf oerguera, naq nyy gung trarengvba.

1:7 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrer sehvgshy, naq vapernfrq
nohaqnagyl, naq zhygvcyvrq, naq jnkrq rkprrqvat zvtugl; naq gur ynaq
jnf svyyrq jvgu gurz.

1:8 Abj gurer nebfr hc n arj xvat bire Rtlcg, juvpu xarj abg Wbfrcu.

1:9 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvf crbcyr, Orubyq, gur crbcyr bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry ner zber naq zvtugvre guna jr: 1:10 Pbzr ba, yrg hf qrny jvfryl
jvgu gurz; yrfg gurl zhygvcyl, naq vg pbzr gb cnff, gung, jura gurer
snyyrgu bhg nal jne, gurl wbva nyfb hagb bhe rarzvrf, naq svtug
ntnvafg hf, naq fb trg gurz hc bhg bs gur ynaq.

1:11 Gurersber gurl qvq frg bire gurz gnfxznfgref gb nssyvpg gurz jvgu
gurve oheqraf. Naq gurl ohvyg sbe Cunenbu gernfher pvgvrf, Cvgubz naq
Ennzfrf.

1:12 Ohg gur zber gurl nssyvpgrq gurz, gur zber gurl zhygvcyvrq naq
terj.

Naq gurl jrer tevrirq orpnhfr bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

1:13 Naq gur Rtlcgvnaf znqr gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gb freir jvgu
evtbhe: 1:14 Naq gurl znqr gurve yvirf ovggre jvgu uneq obaqntr, va
zbegre, naq va oevpx, naq va nyy znaare bs freivpr va gur svryq: nyy
gurve freivpr, jurerva gurl znqr gurz freir, jnf jvgu evtbhe.

1:15 Naq gur xvat bs Rtlcg fcnxr gb gur Uroerj zvqjvirf, bs juvpu gur
anzr bs gur bar jnf Fuvcuenu, naq gur anzr bs gur bgure Chnu: 1:16 Naq
ur fnvq, Jura lr qb gur bssvpr bs n zvqjvsr gb gur Uroerj jbzra, naq
frr gurz hcba gur fgbbyf; vs vg or n fba, gura lr funyy xvyy uvz: ohg
vs vg or n qnhtugre, gura fur funyy yvir.

1:17 Ohg gur zvqjvirf srnerq Tbq, naq qvq abg nf gur xvat bs Rtlcg
pbzznaqrq gurz, ohg fnirq gur zra puvyqera nyvir.

1:18 Naq gur xvat bs Rtlcg pnyyrq sbe gur zvqjvirf, naq fnvq hagb
gurz, Jul unir lr qbar guvf guvat, naq unir fnirq gur zra puvyqera
nyvir?  1:19 Naq gur zvqjvirf fnvq hagb Cunenbu, Orpnhfr gur Uroerj
jbzra ner abg nf gur Rtlcgvna jbzra; sbe gurl ner yviryl, naq ner
qryvirerq rer gur zvqjvirf pbzr va hagb gurz.

1:20 Gurersber Tbq qrnyg jryy jvgu gur zvqjvirf: naq gur crbcyr
zhygvcyvrq, naq jnkrq irel zvtugl.

1:21 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, orpnhfr gur zvqjvirf srnerq Tbq, gung ur
znqr gurz ubhfrf.

1:22 Naq Cunenbu punetrq nyy uvf crbcyr, fnlvat, Rirel fba gung vf
obea lr funyy pnfg vagb gur evire, naq rirel qnhtugre lr funyy fnir
nyvir.

2:1 Naq gurer jrag n zna bs gur ubhfr bs Yriv, naq gbbx gb jvsr n
qnhtugre bs Yriv.

2:2 Naq gur jbzna pbaprvirq, naq oner n fba: naq jura fur fnj uvz gung
ur jnf n tbbqyl puvyq, fur uvq uvz guerr zbaguf.

2:3 Naq jura fur pbhyq abg ybatre uvqr uvz, fur gbbx sbe uvz na nex bs
ohyehfurf, naq qnhorq vg jvgu fyvzr naq jvgu cvgpu, naq chg gur puvyq
gurerva; naq fur ynvq vg va gur syntf ol gur evire'f oevax.

2:4 Naq uvf fvfgre fgbbq nsne bss, gb jvg jung jbhyq or qbar gb uvz.

2:5 Naq gur qnhtugre bs Cunenbu pnzr qbja gb jnfu urefrys ng gur
evire; naq ure znvqraf jnyxrq nybat ol gur evire'f fvqr; naq jura fur
fnj gur nex nzbat gur syntf, fur frag ure znvq gb srgpu vg.

2:6 Naq jura fur unq bcrarq vg, fur fnj gur puvyq: naq, orubyq, gur
onor jrcg. Naq fur unq pbzcnffvba ba uvz, naq fnvq, Guvf vf bar bs gur
Uroerjf' puvyqera.

2:7 Gura fnvq uvf fvfgre gb Cunenbu'f qnhtugre, Funyy V tb naq pnyy gb
gurr n ahefr bs gur Uroerj jbzra, gung fur znl ahefr gur puvyq sbe
gurr?  2:8 Naq Cunenbu'f qnhtugre fnvq gb ure, Tb. Naq gur znvq jrag
naq pnyyrq gur puvyq'f zbgure.

2:9 Naq Cunenbu'f qnhtugre fnvq hagb ure, Gnxr guvf puvyq njnl, naq
ahefr vg sbe zr, naq V jvyy tvir gurr gul jntrf. Naq gur jbzra gbbx
gur puvyq, naq ahefrq vg.

2:10 Naq gur puvyq terj, naq fur oebhtug uvz hagb Cunenbu'f qnhtugre,
naq ur orpnzr ure fba. Naq fur pnyyrq uvf anzr Zbfrf: naq fur fnvq,
Orpnhfr V qerj uvz bhg bs gur jngre.

2:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gubfr qnlf, jura Zbfrf jnf tebja, gung ur
jrag bhg hagb uvf oerguera, naq ybbxrq ba gurve oheqraf: naq ur fcvrq
na Rtlcgvna fzvgvat na Uroerj, bar bs uvf oerguera.

2:12 Naq ur ybbxrq guvf jnl naq gung jnl, naq jura ur fnj gung gurer
jnf ab zna, ur fyrj gur Rtlcgvna, naq uvq uvz va gur fnaq.

2:13 Naq jura ur jrag bhg gur frpbaq qnl, orubyq, gjb zra bs gur
Uroerjf fgebir gbtrgure: naq ur fnvq gb uvz gung qvq gur jebat,
Jurersber fzvgrfg gubh gul sryybj?  2:14 Naq ur fnvq, Jub znqr gurr n
cevapr naq n whqtr bire hf? vagraqrfg gubh gb xvyy zr, nf gubh
xvyyrqfg gur Rtlcgvna? Naq Zbfrf srnerq, naq fnvq, Fheryl guvf guvat
vf xabja.

2:15 Abj jura Cunenbu urneq guvf guvat, ur fbhtug gb fynl Zbfrf. Ohg
Zbfrf syrq sebz gur snpr bs Cunenbu, naq qjryg va gur ynaq bs Zvqvna:
naq ur fng qbja ol n jryy.

2:16 Abj gur cevrfg bs Zvqvna unq frira qnhtugref: naq gurl pnzr naq
qerj jngre, naq svyyrq gur gebhtuf gb jngre gurve sngure'f sybpx.

2:17 Naq gur furcureqf pnzr naq qebir gurz njnl: ohg Zbfrf fgbbq hc
naq urycrq gurz, naq jngrerq gurve sybpx.

2:18 Naq jura gurl pnzr gb Erhry gurve sngure, ur fnvq, Ubj vf vg gung
lr ner pbzr fb fbba gb qnl?  2:19 Naq gurl fnvq, Na Rtlcgvna qryvirerq
hf bhg bs gur unaq bs gur furcureqf, naq nyfb qerj jngre rabhtu sbe
hf, naq jngrerq gur sybpx.

2:20 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvf qnhtugref, Naq jurer vf ur? jul vf vg gung
lr unir yrsg gur zna? pnyy uvz, gung ur znl rng oernq.

2:21 Naq Zbfrf jnf pbagrag gb qjryy jvgu gur zna: naq ur tnir Zbfrf
Mvccbenu uvf qnhtugre.

2:22 Naq fur oner uvz n fba, naq ur pnyyrq uvf anzr Trefubz: sbe ur
fnvq, V unir orra n fgenatre va n fgenatr ynaq.

2:23 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va cebprff bs gvzr, gung gur xvat bs Rtlcg
qvrq: naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fvturq ol ernfba bs gur obaqntr, naq
gurl pevrq, naq gurve pel pnzr hc hagb Tbq ol ernfba bs gur obaqntr.

2:24 Naq Tbq urneq gurve tebnavat, naq Tbq erzrzorerq uvf pbiranag
jvgu Noenunz, jvgu Vfnnp, naq jvgu Wnpbo.

2:25 Naq Tbq ybbxrq hcba gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq Tbq unq erfcrpg
hagb gurz.

3:1 Abj Zbfrf xrcg gur sybpx bs Wrgueb uvf sngure va ynj, gur cevrfg
bs Zvqvna: naq ur yrq gur sybpx gb gur onpxfvqr bs gur qrfreg, naq
pnzr gb gur zbhagnva bs Tbq, rira gb Ubero.

3:2 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ nccrnerq hagb uvz va n synzr bs sver bhg
bs gur zvqfg bs n ohfu: naq ur ybbxrq, naq, orubyq, gur ohfu ohearq
jvgu sver, naq gur ohfu jnf abg pbafhzrq.

3:3 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, V jvyy abj ghea nfvqr, naq frr guvf terng fvtug,
jul gur ohfu vf abg oheag.

3:4 Naq jura gur YBEQ fnj gung ur ghearq nfvqr gb frr, Tbq pnyyrq hagb
uvz bhg bs gur zvqfg bs gur ohfu, naq fnvq, Zbfrf, Zbfrf. Naq ur fnvq,
Urer nz V.

3:5 Naq ur fnvq, Qenj abg avtu uvgure: chg bss gul fubrf sebz bss gul
srrg, sbe gur cynpr jurerba gubh fgnaqrfg vf ubyl tebhaq.

3:6 Zberbire ur fnvq, V nz gur Tbq bs gul sngure, gur Tbq bs Noenunz,
gur Tbq bs Vfnnp, naq gur Tbq bs Wnpbo. Naq Zbfrf uvq uvf snpr; sbe ur
jnf nsenvq gb ybbx hcba Tbq.

3:7 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, V unir fheryl frra gur nssyvpgvba bs zl crbcyr
juvpu ner va Rtlcg, naq unir urneq gurve pel ol ernfba bs gurve
gnfxznfgref; sbe V xabj gurve fbeebjf; 3:8 Naq V nz pbzr qbja gb
qryvire gurz bhg bs gur unaq bs gur Rtlcgvnaf, naq gb oevat gurz hc
bhg bs gung ynaq hagb n tbbq ynaq naq n ynetr, hagb n ynaq sybjvat
jvgu zvyx naq ubarl; hagb gur cynpr bs gur Pnannavgrf, naq gur
Uvggvgrf, naq gur Nzbevgrf, naq gur Crevmmvgrf, naq gur Uvivgrf, naq
gur Wrohfvgrf.

3:9 Abj gurersber, orubyq, gur pel bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry vf pbzr
hagb zr: naq V unir nyfb frra gur bccerffvba jurerjvgu gur Rtlcgvnaf
bccerff gurz.

3:10 Pbzr abj gurersber, naq V jvyy fraq gurr hagb Cunenbu, gung gubh
znlrfg oevat sbegu zl crbcyr gur puvyqera bs Vfenry bhg bs Rtlcg.

3:11 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb Tbq, Jub nz V, gung V fubhyq tb hagb Cunenbu,
naq gung V fubhyq oevat sbegu gur puvyqera bs Vfenry bhg bs Rtlcg?
3:12 Naq ur fnvq, Pregnvayl V jvyy or jvgu gurr; naq guvf funyy or n
gbxra hagb gurr, gung V unir frag gurr: Jura gubh unfg oebhtug sbegu
gur crbcyr bhg bs Rtlcg, lr funyy freir Tbq hcba guvf zbhagnva.

3:13 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb Tbq, Orubyq, jura V pbzr hagb gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, naq funyy fnl hagb gurz, Gur Tbq bs lbhe snguref ungu frag zr
hagb lbh; naq gurl funyy fnl gb zr, Jung vf uvf anzr? jung funyy V fnl
hagb gurz?  3:14 Naq Tbq fnvq hagb Zbfrf, V NZ GUNG V NZ: naq ur fnvq,
Guhf funyg gubh fnl hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, V NZ ungu frag zr
hagb lbh.

3:15 Naq Tbq fnvq zberbire hagb Zbfrf, Guhf funyg gubh fnl hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, gur YBEQ Tbq bs lbhe snguref, gur Tbq bs Noenunz,
gur Tbq bs Vfnnp, naq gur Tbq bs Wnpbo, ungu frag zr hagb lbh: guvf vf
zl anzr sbe rire, naq guvf vf zl zrzbevny hagb nyy trarengvbaf.

3:16 Tb, naq tngure gur ryqref bs Vfenry gbtrgure, naq fnl hagb gurz,
Gur YBEQ Tbq bs lbhe snguref, gur Tbq bs Noenunz, bs Vfnnp, naq bs
Wnpbo, nccrnerq hagb zr, fnlvat, V unir fheryl ivfvgrq lbh, naq frra
gung juvpu vf qbar gb lbh va Rtlcg: 3:17 Naq V unir fnvq, V jvyy oevat
lbh hc bhg bs gur nssyvpgvba bs Rtlcg hagb gur ynaq bs gur Pnannavgrf,
naq gur Uvggvgrf, naq gur Nzbevgrf, naq gur Crevmmvgrf, naq gur
Uvivgrf, naq gur Wrohfvgrf, hagb n ynaq sybjvat jvgu zvyx naq ubarl.

3:18 Naq gurl funyy urnexra gb gul ibvpr: naq gubh funyg pbzr, gubh
naq gur ryqref bs Vfenry, hagb gur xvat bs Rtlcg, naq lr funyy fnl
hagb uvz, Gur YBEQ Tbq bs gur Uroerjf ungu zrg jvgu hf: naq abj yrg hf
tb, jr orfrrpu gurr, guerr qnlf' wbhearl vagb gur jvyqrearff, gung jr
znl fnpevsvpr gb gur YBEQ bhe Tbq.

3:19 Naq V nz fher gung gur xvat bs Rtlcg jvyy abg yrg lbh tb, ab, abg
ol n zvtugl unaq.

3:20 Naq V jvyy fgergpu bhg zl unaq, naq fzvgr Rtlcg jvgu nyy zl
jbaqref juvpu V jvyy qb va gur zvqfg gurerbs: naq nsgre gung ur jvyy
yrg lbh tb.

3:21 Naq V jvyy tvir guvf crbcyr snibhe va gur fvtug bs gur Rtlcgvnaf:
naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung, jura lr tb, lr funyy abg tb rzcgl.

3:22 Ohg rirel jbzna funyy obeebj bs ure arvtuobhe, naq bs ure gung
fbwbheargu va ure ubhfr, wrjryf bs fvyire, naq wrjryf bs tbyq, naq
envzrag: naq lr funyy chg gurz hcba lbhe fbaf, naq hcba lbhe
qnhtugref; naq lr funyy fcbvy gur Rtlcgvnaf.

4:1 Naq Zbfrf nafjrerq naq fnvq, Ohg, orubyq, gurl jvyy abg oryvrir
zr, abe urnexra hagb zl ibvpr: sbe gurl jvyy fnl, Gur YBEQ ungu abg
nccrnerq hagb gurr.

4:2 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, Jung vf gung va guvar unaq? Naq ur
fnvq, N ebq.

4:3 Naq ur fnvq, Pnfg vg ba gur tebhaq. Naq ur pnfg vg ba gur tebhaq,
naq vg orpnzr n frecrag; naq Zbfrf syrq sebz orsber vg.

4:4 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Chg sbegu guvar unaq, naq gnxr vg ol
gur gnvy. Naq ur chg sbegu uvf unaq, naq pnhtug vg, naq vg orpnzr n
ebq va uvf unaq: 4:5 Gung gurl znl oryvrir gung gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve
snguref, gur Tbq bs Noenunz, gur Tbq bs Vfnnp, naq gur Tbq bs Wnpbo,
ungu nccrnerq hagb gurr.

4:6 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq shegurezber hagb uvz, Chg abj guvar unaq vagb
gul obfbz. Naq ur chg uvf unaq vagb uvf obfbz: naq jura ur gbbx vg
bhg, orubyq, uvf unaq jnf yrcebhf nf fabj.

4:7 Naq ur fnvq, Chg guvar unaq vagb gul obfbz ntnva. Naq ur chg uvf
unaq vagb uvf obfbz ntnva; naq cyhpxrq vg bhg bs uvf obfbz, naq,
orubyq, vg jnf ghearq ntnva nf uvf bgure syrfu.

4:8 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, vs gurl jvyy abg oryvrir gurr, arvgure
urnexra gb gur ibvpr bs gur svefg fvta, gung gurl jvyy oryvrir gur
ibvpr bs gur ynggre fvta.

4:9 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, vs gurl jvyy abg oryvrir nyfb gurfr gjb
fvtaf, arvgure urnexra hagb gul ibvpr, gung gubh funyg gnxr bs gur
jngre bs gur evire, naq cbhe vg hcba gur qel ynaq: naq gur jngre juvpu
gubh gnxrfg bhg bs gur evire funyy orpbzr oybbq hcba gur qel ynaq.

4:10 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gur YBEQ, B zl YBEQ, V nz abg rybdhrag,
arvgure urergbsber, abe fvapr gubh unfg fcbxra hagb gul freinag: ohg V
nz fybj bs fcrrpu, naq bs n fybj gbathr.

4:11 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, Jub ungu znqr zna'f zbhgu? be jub
znxrgu gur qhzo, be qrns, be gur frrvat, be gur oyvaq? unir abg V gur
YBEQ?  4:12 Abj gurersber tb, naq V jvyy or jvgu gul zbhgu, naq grnpu
gurr jung gubh funyg fnl.

4:13 Naq ur fnvq, B zl YBEQ, fraq, V cenl gurr, ol gur unaq bs uvz
jubz gubh jvyg fraq.

4:14 Naq gur natre bs gur YBEQ jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg Zbfrf, naq ur fnvq,
Vf abg Nneba gur Yrivgr gul oebgure? V xabj gung ur pna fcrnx jryy.
Naq nyfb, orubyq, ur pbzrgu sbegu gb zrrg gurr: naq jura ur frrgu
gurr, ur jvyy or tynq va uvf urneg.

4:15 Naq gubh funyg fcrnx hagb uvz, naq chg jbeqf va uvf zbhgu: naq V
jvyy or jvgu gul zbhgu, naq jvgu uvf zbhgu, naq jvyy grnpu lbh jung lr
funyy qb.

4:16 Naq ur funyy or gul fcbxrfzna hagb gur crbcyr: naq ur funyy or,
rira ur funyy or gb gurr vafgrnq bs n zbhgu, naq gubh funyg or gb uvz
vafgrnq bs Tbq.

4:17 Naq gubh funyg gnxr guvf ebq va guvar unaq, jurerjvgu gubh funyg
qb fvtaf.

4:18 Naq Zbfrf jrag naq erghearq gb Wrgueb uvf sngure va ynj, naq fnvq
hagb uvz, Yrg zr tb, V cenl gurr, naq erghea hagb zl oerguera juvpu
ner va Rtlcg, naq frr jurgure gurl or lrg nyvir. Naq Wrgueb fnvq gb
Zbfrf, Tb va crnpr.

4:19 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf va Zvqvna, Tb, erghea vagb Rtlcg:
sbe nyy gur zra ner qrnq juvpu fbhtug gul yvsr.

4:20 Naq Zbfrf gbbx uvf jvsr naq uvf fbaf, naq frg gurz hcba na nff,
naq ur erghearq gb gur ynaq bs Rtlcg: naq Zbfrf gbbx gur ebq bs Tbq va
uvf unaq.

4:21 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Jura gubh tbrfg gb erghea vagb
Rtlcg, frr gung gubh qb nyy gubfr jbaqref orsber Cunenbu, juvpu V unir
chg va guvar unaq: ohg V jvyy uneqra uvf urneg, gung ur funyy abg yrg
gur crbcyr tb.

4:22 Naq gubh funyg fnl hagb Cunenbu, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Vfenry vf
zl fba, rira zl svefgobea: 4:23 Naq V fnl hagb gurr, Yrg zl fba tb,
gung ur znl freir zr: naq vs gubh ershfr gb yrg uvz tb, orubyq, V jvyy
fynl gul fba, rira gul svefgobea.

4:24 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ol gur jnl va gur vaa, gung gur YBEQ zrg uvz,
naq fbhtug gb xvyy uvz.

4:25 Gura Mvccbenu gbbx n funec fgbar, naq phg bss gur sberfxva bs ure
fba, naq pnfg vg ng uvf srrg, naq fnvq, Fheryl n oybbql uhfonaq neg
gubh gb zr.

4:26 Fb ur yrg uvz tb: gura fur fnvq, N oybbql uhfonaq gubh neg,
orpnhfr bs gur pvephzpvfvba.

4:27 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq gb Nneba, Tb vagb gur jvyqrearff gb zrrg Zbfrf.
Naq ur jrag, naq zrg uvz va gur zbhag bs Tbq, naq xvffrq uvz.

4:28 Naq Zbfrf gbyq Nneba nyy gur jbeqf bs gur YBEQ jub unq frag uvz,
naq nyy gur fvtaf juvpu ur unq pbzznaqrq uvz.

4:29 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba jrag naq tngurerq gbtrgure nyy gur ryqref bs
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: 4:30 Naq Nneba fcnxr nyy gur jbeqf juvpu gur
YBEQ unq fcbxra hagb Zbfrf, naq qvq gur fvtaf va gur fvtug bs gur
crbcyr.

4:31 Naq gur crbcyr oryvrirq: naq jura gurl urneq gung gur YBEQ unq
ivfvgrq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq gung ur unq ybbxrq hcba gurve
nssyvpgvba, gura gurl objrq gurve urnqf naq jbefuvccrq.

5:1 Naq nsgrejneq Zbfrf naq Nneba jrag va, naq gbyq Cunenbu, Guhf
fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, Yrg zl crbcyr tb, gung gurl znl ubyq n
srnfg hagb zr va gur jvyqrearff.

5:2 Naq Cunenbu fnvq, Jub vf gur YBEQ, gung V fubhyq borl uvf ibvpr gb
yrg Vfenry tb? V xabj abg gur YBEQ, arvgure jvyy V yrg Vfenry tb.

5:3 Naq gurl fnvq, Gur Tbq bs gur Uroerjf ungu zrg jvgu hf: yrg hf tb,
jr cenl gurr, guerr qnlf' wbhearl vagb gur qrfreg, naq fnpevsvpr hagb
gur YBEQ bhe Tbq; yrfg ur snyy hcba hf jvgu crfgvyrapr, be jvgu gur
fjbeq.

5:4 Naq gur xvat bs Rtlcg fnvq hagb gurz, Jurersber qb lr, Zbfrf naq
Nneba, yrg gur crbcyr sebz gurve jbexf? trg lbh hagb lbhe oheqraf.

5:5 Naq Cunenbu fnvq, Orubyq, gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq abj ner znal, naq
lr znxr gurz erfg sebz gurve oheqraf.

5:6 Naq Cunenbu pbzznaqrq gur fnzr qnl gur gnfxznfgref bs gur crbcyr,
naq gurve bssvpref, fnlvat, 5:7 Lr funyy ab zber tvir gur crbcyr fgenj
gb znxr oevpx, nf urergbsber: yrg gurz tb naq tngure fgenj sbe
gurzfryirf.

5:8 Naq gur gnyr bs gur oevpxf, juvpu gurl qvq znxr urergbsber, lr
funyy ynl hcba gurz; lr funyy abg qvzvavfu bhtug gurerbs: sbe gurl or
vqyr; gurersber gurl pel, fnlvat, Yrg hf tb naq fnpevsvpr gb bhe Tbq.

5:9 Yrg gurer zber jbex or ynvq hcba gur zra, gung gurl znl ynobhe
gurerva; naq yrg gurz abg ertneq inva jbeqf.

5:10 Naq gur gnfxznfgref bs gur crbcyr jrag bhg, naq gurve bssvpref,
naq gurl fcnxr gb gur crbcyr, fnlvat, Guhf fnvgu Cunenbu, V jvyy abg
tvir lbh fgenj.

5:11 Tb lr, trg lbh fgenj jurer lr pna svaq vg: lrg abg bhtug bs lbhe
jbex funyy or qvzvavfurq.

5:12 Fb gur crbcyr jrer fpnggrerq noebnq guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg gb tngure fghooyr vafgrnq bs fgenj.

5:13 Naq gur gnfxznfgref unfgrq gurz, fnlvat, Shysvy lbhe jbexf, lbhe
qnvyl gnfxf, nf jura gurer jnf fgenj.

5:14 Naq gur bssvpref bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, juvpu Cunenbu'f
gnfxznfgref unq frg bire gurz, jrer orngra, naq qrznaqrq, Jurersber
unir lr abg shysvyyrq lbhe gnfx va znxvat oevpx obgu lrfgreqnl naq gb
qnl, nf urergbsber?  5:15 Gura gur bssvpref bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
pnzr naq pevrq hagb Cunenbu, fnlvat, Jurersber qrnyrfg gubh guhf jvgu
gul freinagf?  5:16 Gurer vf ab fgenj tvira hagb gul freinagf, naq
gurl fnl gb hf, Znxr oevpx: naq, orubyq, gul freinagf ner orngra; ohg
gur snhyg vf va guvar bja crbcyr.

5:17 Ohg ur fnvq, Lr ner vqyr, lr ner vqyr: gurersber lr fnl, Yrg hf
tb naq qb fnpevsvpr gb gur YBEQ.

5:18 Tb gurersber abj, naq jbex; sbe gurer funyy ab fgenj or tvira
lbh, lrg funyy lr qryvire gur gnyr bs oevpxf.

5:19 Naq gur bssvpref bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq frr gung gurl jrer
va rivy pnfr, nsgre vg jnf fnvq, Lr funyy abg zvavfu bhtug sebz lbhe
oevpxf bs lbhe qnvyl gnfx.

5:20 Naq gurl zrg Zbfrf naq Nneba, jub fgbbq va gur jnl, nf gurl pnzr
sbegu sebz Cunenbu: 5:21 Naq gurl fnvq hagb gurz, Gur YBEQ ybbx hcba
lbh, naq whqtr; orpnhfr lr unir znqr bhe fnibhe gb or noubeerq va gur
rlrf bs Cunenbu, naq va gur rlrf bs uvf freinagf, gb chg n fjbeq va
gurve unaq gb fynl hf.

5:22 Naq Zbfrf erghearq hagb gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, YBEQ, jurersber unfg
gubh fb rivy ragerngrq guvf crbcyr? jul vf vg gung gubh unfg frag zr?
5:23 Sbe fvapr V pnzr gb Cunenbu gb fcrnx va gul anzr, ur ungu qbar
rivy gb guvf crbcyr; arvgure unfg gubh qryvirerq gul crbcyr ng nyy.

6:1 Gura gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Abj funyg gubh frr jung V jvyy qb
gb Cunenbu: sbe jvgu n fgebat unaq funyy ur yrg gurz tb, naq jvgu n
fgebat unaq funyy ur qevir gurz bhg bs uvf ynaq.

6:2 Naq Tbq fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, naq fnvq hagb uvz, V nz gur YBEQ: 6:3
Naq V nccrnerq hagb Noenunz, hagb Vfnnp, naq hagb Wnpbo, ol gur anzr
bs Tbq Nyzvtugl, ohg ol zl anzr WRUBINU jnf V abg xabja gb gurz.

6:4 Naq V unir nyfb rfgnoyvfurq zl pbiranag jvgu gurz, gb tvir gurz
gur ynaq bs Pnanna, gur ynaq bs gurve cvytevzntr, jurerva gurl jrer
fgenatref.

6:5 Naq V unir nyfb urneq gur tebnavat bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, jubz
gur Rtlcgvnaf xrrc va obaqntr; naq V unir erzrzorerq zl pbiranag.

6:6 Jurersber fnl hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, V nz gur YBEQ, naq V
jvyy oevat lbh bhg sebz haqre gur oheqraf bs gur Rtlcgvnaf, naq V jvyy
evq lbh bhg bs gurve obaqntr, naq V jvyy erqrrz lbh jvgu n fgergpurq
bhg nez, naq jvgu terng whqtzragf: 6:7 Naq V jvyy gnxr lbh gb zr sbe n
crbcyr, naq V jvyy or gb lbh n Tbq: naq lr funyy xabj gung V nz gur
YBEQ lbhe Tbq, juvpu oevatrgu lbh bhg sebz haqre gur oheqraf bs gur
Rtlcgvnaf.

6:8 Naq V jvyy oevat lbh va hagb gur ynaq, pbapreavat gur juvpu V qvq
fjrne gb tvir vg gb Noenunz, gb Vfnnp, naq gb Wnpbo; naq V jvyy tvir
vg lbh sbe na urevgntr: V nz gur YBEQ.

6:9 Naq Zbfrf fcnxr fb hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: ohg gurl urnexrarq
abg hagb Zbfrf sbe nathvfu bs fcvevg, naq sbe pehry obaqntr.

6:10 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 6:11 Tb va, fcrnx hagb
Cunenbu xvat bs Rtlcg, gung ur yrg gur puvyqera bs Vfenry tb bhg bs
uvf ynaq.

6:12 Naq Zbfrf fcnxr orsber gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Orubyq, gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry unir abg urnexrarq hagb zr; ubj gura funyy Cunenbu urne zr, jub
nz bs hapvephzpvfrq yvcf?  6:13 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq hagb
Nneba, naq tnir gurz n punetr hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq hagb
Cunenbu xvat bs Rtlcg, gb oevat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry bhg bs gur ynaq
bs Rtlcg.

6:14 Gurfr or gur urnqf bs gurve snguref' ubhfrf: Gur fbaf bs Erhora
gur svefgobea bs Vfenry; Unabpu, naq Cnyyh, Urmeba, naq Pnezv: gurfr
or gur snzvyvrf bs Erhora.

6:15 Naq gur fbaf bs Fvzrba; Wrzhry, naq Wnzva, naq Bunq, naq Wnpuva,
naq Mbune, naq Funhy gur fba bs n Pnannavgvfu jbzna: gurfr ner gur
snzvyvrf bs Fvzrba.

6:16 Naq gurfr ner gur anzrf bs gur fbaf bs Yriv nppbeqvat gb gurve
trarengvbaf; Trefuba, naq Xbungu, naq Zrenev: naq gur lrnef bs gur
yvsr bs Yriv jrer na uhaqerq guvegl naq frira lrnef.

6:17 Gur fbaf bs Trefuba; Yvoav, naq Fuvzv, nppbeqvat gb gurve
snzvyvrf.

6:18 Naq gur fbaf bs Xbungu; Nzenz, naq Vmune, naq Uroeba, naq Hmmvry:
naq gur lrnef bs gur yvsr bs Xbungu jrer na uhaqerq guvegl naq guerr
lrnef.

6:19 Naq gur fbaf bs Zrenev; Znunyv naq Zhfuv: gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf
bs Yriv nppbeqvat gb gurve trarengvbaf.

6:20 Naq Nzenz gbbx uvz Wbpurorq uvf sngure'f fvfgre gb jvsr; naq fur
oner uvz Nneba naq Zbfrf: naq gur lrnef bs gur yvsr bs Nzenz jrer na
uhaqerq naq guvegl naq frira lrnef.

6:21 Naq gur fbaf bs Vmune; Xbenu, naq Arcurt, naq Mvpuev.

6:22 Naq gur fbaf bs Hmmvry; Zvfunry, naq Rymncuna, naq Mvguev.

6:23 Naq Nneba gbbx uvz Ryvfuron, qnhtugre bs Nzzvanqno, fvfgre bs
Annfuba, gb jvsr; naq fur oner uvz Anqno, naq Novuh, Ryrnmne, naq
Vgunzne.

6:24 Naq gur fbaf bs Xbenu; Nffve, naq Ryxnanu, naq Novnfncu: gurfr
ner gur snzvyvrf bs gur Xbeuvgrf.

6:25 Naq Ryrnmne Nneba'f fba gbbx uvz bar bs gur qnhtugref bs Chgvry
gb jvsr; naq fur oner uvz Cuvarunf: gurfr ner gur urnqf bs gur snguref
bs gur Yrivgrf nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf.

6:26 Gurfr ner gung Nneba naq Zbfrf, gb jubz gur YBEQ fnvq, Oevat bhg
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry sebz gur ynaq bs Rtlcg nppbeqvat gb gurve
nezvrf.

6:27 Gurfr ner gurl juvpu fcnxr gb Cunenbu xvat bs Rtlcg, gb oevat bhg
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry sebz Rtlcg: gurfr ner gung Zbfrf naq Nneba.

6:28 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur qnl jura gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf va
gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, 6:29 Gung gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, V nz
gur YBEQ: fcrnx gubh hagb Cunenbu xvat bs Rtlcg nyy gung V fnl hagb
gurr.

6:30 Naq Zbfrf fnvq orsber gur YBEQ, Orubyq, V nz bs hapvephzpvfrq
yvcf, naq ubj funyy Cunenbu urnexra hagb zr?  7:1 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq
hagb Zbfrf, Frr, V unir znqr gurr n tbq gb Cunenbu: naq Nneba gul
oebgure funyy or gul cebcurg.

7:2 Gubh funyg fcrnx nyy gung V pbzznaq gurr: naq Nneba gul oebgure
funyy fcrnx hagb Cunenbu, gung ur fraq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry bhg bs
uvf ynaq.

7:3 Naq V jvyy uneqra Cunenbu'f urneg, naq zhygvcyl zl fvtaf naq zl
jbaqref va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

7:4 Ohg Cunenbu funyy abg urnexra hagb lbh, gung V znl ynl zl unaq
hcba Rtlcg, naq oevat sbegu zvar nezvrf, naq zl crbcyr gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg ol terng whqtzragf.

7:5 Naq gur Rtlcgvnaf funyy xabj gung V nz gur YBEQ, jura V fgergpu
sbegu zvar unaq hcba Rtlcg, naq oevat bhg gur puvyqera bs Vfenry sebz
nzbat gurz.

7:6 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba qvq nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq gurz, fb qvq gurl.

7:7 Naq Zbfrf jnf sbhefpber lrnef byq, naq Nneba sbhefpber naq guerr
lrnef byq, jura gurl fcnxr hagb Cunenbu.

7:8 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq hagb Nneba, fnlvat, 7:9 Jura
Cunenbu funyy fcrnx hagb lbh, fnlvat, Furj n zvenpyr sbe lbh: gura
gubh funyg fnl hagb Nneba, Gnxr gul ebq, naq pnfg vg orsber Cunenbu,
naq vg funyy orpbzr n frecrag.

7:10 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba jrag va hagb Cunenbu, naq gurl qvq fb nf gur
YBEQ unq pbzznaqrq: naq Nneba pnfg qbja uvf ebq orsber Cunenbu, naq
orsber uvf freinagf, naq vg orpnzr n frecrag.

7:11 Gura Cunenbu nyfb pnyyrq gur jvfr zra naq gur fbepreref: abj gur
zntvpvnaf bs Rtlcg, gurl nyfb qvq va yvxr znaare jvgu gurve
rapunagzragf.

7:12 Sbe gurl pnfg qbja rirel zna uvf ebq, naq gurl orpnzr frecragf:
ohg Nneba'f ebq fjnyybjrq hc gurve ebqf.

7:13 Naq ur uneqrarq Cunenbu'f urneg, gung ur urnexrarq abg hagb gurz;
nf gur YBEQ unq fnvq.

7:14 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Cunenbu'f urneg vf uneqrarq, ur
ershfrgu gb yrg gur crbcyr tb.

7:15 Trg gurr hagb Cunenbu va gur zbeavat; yb, ur tbrgu bhg hagb gur
jngre; naq gubh funyg fgnaq ol gur evire'f oevax ntnvafg ur pbzr; naq
gur ebq juvpu jnf ghearq gb n frecrag funyg gubh gnxr va guvar unaq.

7:16 Naq gubh funyg fnl hagb uvz, Gur YBEQ Tbq bs gur Uroerjf ungu
frag zr hagb gurr, fnlvat, Yrg zl crbcyr tb, gung gurl znl freir zr va
gur jvyqrearff: naq, orubyq, uvguregb gubh jbhyqrfg abg urne.

7:17 Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Va guvf gubh funyg xabj gung V nz gur YBEQ:
orubyq, V jvyy fzvgr jvgu gur ebq gung vf va zvar unaq hcba gur jngref
juvpu ner va gur evire, naq gurl funyy or ghearq gb oybbq.

7:18 Naq gur svfu gung vf va gur evire funyy qvr, naq gur evire funyy
fgvax; naq gur Rtlcgvnaf funyy ybgur gb qevax bs gur jngre bs gur
evire.

7:19 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, Fnl hagb Nneba, Gnxr gul ebq, naq
fgergpu bhg guvar unaq hcba gur jngref bs Rtlcg, hcba gurve fgernzf,
hcba gurve eviref, naq hcba gurve cbaqf, naq hcba nyy gurve cbbyf bs
jngre, gung gurl znl orpbzr oybbq; naq gung gurer znl or oybbq
guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, obgu va irffryf bs jbbq, naq va
irffryf bs fgbar.

7:20 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba qvq fb, nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq; naq ur yvsgrq
hc gur ebq, naq fzbgr gur jngref gung jrer va gur evire, va gur fvtug
bs Cunenbu, naq va gur fvtug bs uvf freinagf; naq nyy gur jngref gung
jrer va gur evire jrer ghearq gb oybbq.

7:21 Naq gur svfu gung jnf va gur evire qvrq; naq gur evire fgnax, naq
gur Rtlcgvnaf pbhyq abg qevax bs gur jngre bs gur evire; naq gurer jnf
oybbq guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

7:22 Naq gur zntvpvnaf bs Rtlcg qvq fb jvgu gurve rapunagzragf: naq
Cunenbu'f urneg jnf uneqrarq, arvgure qvq ur urnexra hagb gurz; nf gur
YBEQ unq fnvq.

7:23 Naq Cunenbu ghearq naq jrag vagb uvf ubhfr, arvgure qvq ur frg
uvf urneg gb guvf nyfb.

7:24 Naq nyy gur Rtlcgvnaf qvttrq ebhaq nobhg gur evire sbe jngre gb
qevax; sbe gurl pbhyq abg qevax bs gur jngre bs gur evire.

7:25 Naq frira qnlf jrer shysvyyrq, nsgre gung gur YBEQ unq fzvggra
gur evire.

8:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, Tb hagb Cunenbu, naq fnl hagb uvz,
Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Yrg zl crbcyr tb, gung gurl znl freir zr.

8:2 Naq vs gubh ershfr gb yrg gurz tb, orubyq, V jvyy fzvgr nyy gul
obeqref jvgu sebtf: 8:3 Naq gur evire funyy oevat sbegu sebtf
nohaqnagyl, juvpu funyy tb hc naq pbzr vagb guvar ubhfr, naq vagb gul
orqpunzore, naq hcba gul orq, naq vagb gur ubhfr bs gul freinagf, naq
hcba gul crbcyr, naq vagb guvar biraf, naq vagb gul xarnqvatgebhtuf:
8:4 Naq gur sebtf funyy pbzr hc obgu ba gurr, naq hcba gul crbcyr, naq
hcba nyy gul freinagf.

8:5 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, Fnl hagb Nneba, Fgergpu sbegu guvar
unaq jvgu gul ebq bire gur fgernzf, bire gur eviref, naq bire gur
cbaqf, naq pnhfr sebtf gb pbzr hc hcba gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

8:6 Naq Nneba fgergpurq bhg uvf unaq bire gur jngref bs Rtlcg; naq gur
sebtf pnzr hc, naq pbirerq gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

8:7 Naq gur zntvpvnaf qvq fb jvgu gurve rapunagzragf, naq oebhtug hc
sebtf hcba gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

8:8 Gura Cunenbu pnyyrq sbe Zbfrf naq Nneba, naq fnvq, Vagerng gur
YBEQ, gung ur znl gnxr njnl gur sebtf sebz zr, naq sebz zl crbcyr; naq
V jvyy yrg gur crbcyr tb, gung gurl znl qb fnpevsvpr hagb gur YBEQ.

8:9 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb Cunenbu, Tybel bire zr: jura funyy V vagerng
sbe gurr, naq sbe gul freinagf, naq sbe gul crbcyr, gb qrfgebl gur
sebtf sebz gurr naq gul ubhfrf, gung gurl znl erznva va gur evire
bayl?  8:10 Naq ur fnvq, Gb zbeebj. Naq ur fnvq, Or vg nppbeqvat gb
gul jbeq: gung gubh znlrfg xabj gung gurer vf abar yvxr hagb gur YBEQ
bhe Tbq.

8:11 Naq gur sebtf funyy qrcneg sebz gurr, naq sebz gul ubhfrf, naq
sebz gul freinagf, naq sebz gul crbcyr; gurl funyy erznva va gur evire
bayl.

8:12 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba jrag bhg sebz Cunenbu: naq Zbfrf pevrq hagb
gur YBEQ orpnhfr bs gur sebtf juvpu ur unq oebhtug ntnvafg Cunenbu.

8:13 Naq gur YBEQ qvq nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs Zbfrf; naq gur sebtf
qvrq bhg bs gur ubhfrf, bhg bs gur ivyyntrf, naq bhg bs gur svryqf.

8:14 Naq gurl tngurerq gurz gbtrgure hcba urncf: naq gur ynaq fgnax.
