8:15 Ohg jura Cunenbu fnj gung gurer jnf erfcvgr, ur uneqrarq uvf
urneg, naq urnexrarq abg hagb gurz; nf gur YBEQ unq fnvq.

8:16 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Fnl hagb Nneba, Fgergpu bhg gul
ebq, naq fzvgr gur qhfg bs gur ynaq, gung vg znl orpbzr yvpr
guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

8:17 Naq gurl qvq fb; sbe Nneba fgergpurq bhg uvf unaq jvgu uvf ebq,
naq fzbgr gur qhfg bs gur rnegu, naq vg orpnzr yvpr va zna, naq va
ornfg; nyy gur qhfg bs gur ynaq orpnzr yvpr guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg.

8:18 Naq gur zntvpvnaf qvq fb jvgu gurve rapunagzragf gb oevat sbegu
yvpr, ohg gurl pbhyq abg: fb gurer jrer yvpr hcba zna, naq hcba ornfg.

8:19 Gura gur zntvpvnaf fnvq hagb Cunenbu, Guvf vf gur svatre bs Tbq:
naq Cunenbu'f urneg jnf uneqrarq, naq ur urnexrarq abg hagb gurz; nf
gur YBEQ unq fnvq.

8:20 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Evfr hc rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq
fgnaq orsber Cunenbu; yb, ur pbzrgu sbegu gb gur jngre; naq fnl hagb
uvz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Yrg zl crbcyr tb, gung gurl znl freir zr.

8:21 Ryfr, vs gubh jvyg abg yrg zl crbcyr tb, orubyq, V jvyy fraq
fjnezf bs syvrf hcba gurr, naq hcba gul freinagf, naq hcba gul crbcyr,
naq vagb gul ubhfrf: naq gur ubhfrf bs gur Rtlcgvnaf funyy or shyy bs
fjnezf bs syvrf, naq nyfb gur tebhaq jurerba gurl ner.

8:22 Naq V jvyy frire va gung qnl gur ynaq bs Tbfura, va juvpu zl
crbcyr qjryy, gung ab fjnezf bs syvrf funyy or gurer; gb gur raq gubh
znlrfg xabj gung V nz gur YBEQ va gur zvqfg bs gur rnegu.

8:23 Naq V jvyy chg n qvivfvba orgjrra zl crbcyr naq gul crbcyr: gb
zbeebj funyy guvf fvta or.

8:24 Naq gur YBEQ qvq fb; naq gurer pnzr n tevribhf fjnez bs syvrf
vagb gur ubhfr bs Cunenbu, naq vagb uvf freinagf' ubhfrf, naq vagb nyy
gur ynaq bs Rtlcg: gur ynaq jnf pbeehcgrq ol ernfba bs gur fjnez bs
syvrf.

8:25 Naq Cunenbu pnyyrq sbe Zbfrf naq sbe Nneba, naq fnvq, Tb lr,
fnpevsvpr gb lbhe Tbq va gur ynaq.

8:26 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, Vg vf abg zrrg fb gb qb; sbe jr funyy fnpevsvpr
gur nobzvangvba bs gur Rtlcgvnaf gb gur YBEQ bhe Tbq: yb, funyy jr
fnpevsvpr gur nobzvangvba bs gur Rtlcgvnaf orsber gurve rlrf, naq jvyy
gurl abg fgbar hf?  8:27 Jr jvyy tb guerr qnlf' wbhearl vagb gur
jvyqrearff, naq fnpevsvpr gb gur YBEQ bhe Tbq, nf ur funyy pbzznaq hf.

8:28 Naq Cunenbu fnvq, V jvyy yrg lbh tb, gung lr znl fnpevsvpr gb gur
YBEQ lbhe Tbq va gur jvyqrearff; bayl lr funyy abg tb irel sne njnl:
vagerng sbe zr.

8:29 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, Orubyq, V tb bhg sebz gurr, naq V jvyy vagerng
gur YBEQ gung gur fjnezf bs syvrf znl qrcneg sebz Cunenbu, sebz uvf
freinagf, naq sebz uvf crbcyr, gb zbeebj: ohg yrg abg Cunenbu qrny
qrprvgshyyl nal zber va abg yrggvat gur crbcyr tb gb fnpevsvpr gb gur
YBEQ.

8:30 Naq Zbfrf jrag bhg sebz Cunenbu, naq vagerngrq gur YBEQ.

8:31 Naq gur YBEQ qvq nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs Zbfrf; naq ur erzbirq
gur fjnezf bs syvrf sebz Cunenbu, sebz uvf freinagf, naq sebz uvf
crbcyr; gurer erznvarq abg bar.

8:32 Naq Cunenbu uneqrarq uvf urneg ng guvf gvzr nyfb, arvgure jbhyq
ur yrg gur crbcyr tb.

9:1 Gura gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Tb va hagb Cunenbu, naq gryy uvz,
Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs gur Uroerjf, Yrg zl crbcyr tb, gung gurl
znl freir zr.

9:2 Sbe vs gubh ershfr gb yrg gurz tb, naq jvyg ubyq gurz fgvyy, 9:3
Orubyq, gur unaq bs gur YBEQ vf hcba gul pnggyr juvpu vf va gur svryq,
hcba gur ubefrf, hcba gur nffrf, hcba gur pnzryf, hcba gur bkra, naq
hcba gur furrc: gurer funyy or n irel tevribhf zheenva.

9:4 Naq gur YBEQ funyy frire orgjrra gur pnggyr bs Vfenry naq gur
pnggyr bs Rtlcg: naq gurer funyy abguvat qvr bs nyy gung vf gur
puvyqera'f bs Vfenry.

9:5 Naq gur YBEQ nccbvagrq n frg gvzr, fnlvat, Gb zbeebj gur YBEQ
funyy qb guvf guvat va gur ynaq.

9:6 Naq gur YBEQ qvq gung guvat ba gur zbeebj, naq nyy gur pnggyr bs
Rtlcg qvrq: ohg bs gur pnggyr bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvrq abg bar.

9:7 Naq Cunenbu frag, naq, orubyq, gurer jnf abg bar bs gur pnggyr bs
gur Vfenryvgrf qrnq. Naq gur urneg bs Cunenbu jnf uneqrarq, naq ur qvq
abg yrg gur crbcyr tb.

9:8 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf naq hagb Nneba, Gnxr gb lbh unaqshyf
bs nfurf bs gur sheanpr, naq yrg Zbfrf fcevaxyr vg gbjneq gur urnira
va gur fvtug bs Cunenbu.

9:9 Naq vg funyy orpbzr fznyy qhfg va nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, naq funyy
or n obvy oernxvat sbegu jvgu oynvaf hcba zna, naq hcba ornfg,
guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

9:10 Naq gurl gbbx nfurf bs gur sheanpr, naq fgbbq orsber Cunenbu; naq
Zbfrf fcevaxyrq vg hc gbjneq urnira; naq vg orpnzr n obvy oernxvat
sbegu jvgu oynvaf hcba zna, naq hcba ornfg.

9:11 Naq gur zntvpvnaf pbhyq abg fgnaq orsber Zbfrf orpnhfr bs gur
obvyf; sbe gur obvy jnf hcba gur zntvpvnaf, naq hcba nyy gur
Rtlcgvnaf.

9:12 Naq gur YBEQ uneqrarq gur urneg bs Cunenbu, naq ur urnexrarq abg
hagb gurz; nf gur YBEQ unq fcbxra hagb Zbfrf.

9:13 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Evfr hc rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq
fgnaq orsber Cunenbu, naq fnl hagb uvz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs gur
Uroerjf, Yrg zl crbcyr tb, gung gurl znl freir zr.

9:14 Sbe V jvyy ng guvf gvzr fraq nyy zl cynthrf hcba guvar urneg, naq
hcba gul freinagf, naq hcba gul crbcyr; gung gubh znlrfg xabj gung
gurer vf abar yvxr zr va nyy gur rnegu.

9:15 Sbe abj V jvyy fgergpu bhg zl unaq, gung V znl fzvgr gurr naq gul
crbcyr jvgu crfgvyrapr; naq gubh funyg or phg bss sebz gur rnegu.

9:16 Naq va irel qrrq sbe guvf pnhfr unir V envfrq gurr hc, sbe gb
furj va gurr zl cbjre; naq gung zl anzr znl or qrpynerq guebhtubhg nyy
gur rnegu.

9:17 Nf lrg rknygrfg gubh gulfrys ntnvafg zl crbcyr, gung gubh jvyg
abg yrg gurz tb?  9:18 Orubyq, gb zbeebj nobhg guvf gvzr V jvyy pnhfr
vg gb enva n irel tevribhf unvy, fhpu nf ungu abg orra va Rtlcg fvapr
gur sbhaqngvba gurerbs rira hagvy abj.

9:19 Fraq gurersber abj, naq tngure gul pnggyr, naq nyy gung gubh unfg
va gur svryq; sbe hcba rirel zna naq ornfg juvpu funyy or sbhaq va gur
svryq, naq funyy abg or oebhtug ubzr, gur unvy funyy pbzr qbja hcba
gurz, naq gurl funyy qvr.

9:20 Ur gung srnerq gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ nzbat gur freinagf bs Cunenbu
znqr uvf freinagf naq uvf pnggyr syrr vagb gur ubhfrf: 9:21 Naq ur
gung ertneqrq abg gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ yrsg uvf freinagf naq uvf
pnggyr va gur svryq.

9:22 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Fgergpu sbegu guvar unaq gbjneq
urnira, gung gurer znl or unvy va nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, hcba zna, naq
hcba ornfg, naq hcba rirel ureo bs gur svryq, guebhtubhg gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg.

9:23 Naq Zbfrf fgergpurq sbegu uvf ebq gbjneq urnira: naq gur YBEQ
frag guhaqre naq unvy, naq gur sver ena nybat hcba gur tebhaq; naq gur
YBEQ envarq unvy hcba gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

9:24 Fb gurer jnf unvy, naq sver zvatyrq jvgu gur unvy, irel tevribhf,
fhpu nf gurer jnf abar yvxr vg va nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg fvapr vg
orpnzr n angvba.

9:25 Naq gur unvy fzbgr guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg nyy gung jnf
va gur svryq, obgu zna naq ornfg; naq gur unvy fzbgr rirel ureo bs gur
svryq, naq oenxr rirel gerr bs gur svryq.

9:26 Bayl va gur ynaq bs Tbfura, jurer gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrer,
jnf gurer ab unvy.

9:27 Naq Cunenbu frag, naq pnyyrq sbe Zbfrf naq Nneba, naq fnvq hagb
gurz, V unir fvaarq guvf gvzr: gur YBEQ vf evtugrbhf, naq V naq zl
crbcyr ner jvpxrq.

9:28 Vagerng gur YBEQ (sbe vg vf rabhtu) gung gurer or ab zber zvtugl
guhaqrevatf naq unvy; naq V jvyy yrg lbh tb, naq lr funyy fgnl ab
ybatre.

9:29 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb uvz, Nf fbba nf V nz tbar bhg bs gur pvgl, V
jvyy fcernq noebnq zl unaqf hagb gur YBEQ; naq gur guhaqre funyy
prnfr, arvgure funyy gurer or nal zber unvy; gung gubh znlrfg xabj ubj
gung gur rnegu vf gur YBEQ'f.

9:30 Ohg nf sbe gurr naq gul freinagf, V xabj gung lr jvyy abg lrg
srne gur YBEQ Tbq.

9:31 Naq gur synk naq gur oneyrl jnf fzvggra: sbe gur oneyrl jnf va
gur rne, naq gur synk jnf obyyrq.

9:32 Ohg gur jurng naq gur evr jrer abg fzvggra: sbe gurl jrer abg
tebja hc.

9:33 Naq Zbfrf jrag bhg bs gur pvgl sebz Cunenbu, naq fcernq noebnq
uvf unaqf hagb gur YBEQ: naq gur guhaqref naq unvy prnfrq, naq gur
enva jnf abg cbherq hcba gur rnegu.

9:34 Naq jura Cunenbu fnj gung gur enva naq gur unvy naq gur guhaqref
jrer prnfrq, ur fvaarq lrg zber, naq uneqrarq uvf urneg, ur naq uvf
freinagf.

9:35 Naq gur urneg bs Cunenbu jnf uneqrarq, arvgure jbhyq ur yrg gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry tb; nf gur YBEQ unq fcbxra ol Zbfrf.

10:1 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Tb va hagb Cunenbu: sbe V unir
uneqrarq uvf urneg, naq gur urneg bs uvf freinagf, gung V zvtug furj
gurfr zl fvtaf orsber uvz: 10:2 Naq gung gubh znlrfg gryy va gur rnef
bs gul fba, naq bs gul fba'f fba, jung guvatf V unir jebhtug va Rtlcg,
naq zl fvtaf juvpu V unir qbar nzbat gurz; gung lr znl xabj ubj gung V
nz gur YBEQ.

10:3 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba pnzr va hagb Cunenbu, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Guhf
fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs gur Uroerjf, Ubj ybat jvyg gubh ershfr gb uhzoyr
gulfrys orsber zr? yrg zl crbcyr tb, gung gurl znl freir zr.

10:4 Ryfr, vs gubh ershfr gb yrg zl crbcyr tb, orubyq, gb zbeebj jvyy
V oevat gur ybphfgf vagb gul pbnfg: 10:5 Naq gurl funyy pbire gur snpr
bs gur rnegu, gung bar pnaabg or noyr gb frr gur rnegu: naq gurl funyy
rng gur erfvqhr bs gung juvpu vf rfpncrq, juvpu erznvargu hagb lbh
sebz gur unvy, naq funyy rng rirel gerr juvpu tebjrgu sbe lbh bhg bs
gur svryq: 10:6 Naq gurl funyy svyy gul ubhfrf, naq gur ubhfrf bs nyy
gul freinagf, naq gur ubhfrf bs nyy gur Rtlcgvnaf; juvpu arvgure gul
snguref, abe gul snguref' snguref unir frra, fvapr gur qnl gung gurl
jrer hcba gur rnegu hagb guvf qnl. Naq ur ghearq uvzfrys, naq jrag bhg
sebz Cunenbu.

10:7 Naq Cunenbu'f freinagf fnvq hagb uvz, Ubj ybat funyy guvf zna or
n faner hagb hf? yrg gur zra tb, gung gurl znl freir gur YBEQ gurve
Tbq: xabjrfg gubh abg lrg gung Rtlcg vf qrfgeblrq?  10:8 Naq Zbfrf naq
Nneba jrer oebhtug ntnva hagb Cunenbu: naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Tb,
freir gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq: ohg jub ner gurl gung funyy tb?  10:9 Naq
Zbfrf fnvq, Jr jvyy tb jvgu bhe lbhat naq jvgu bhe byq, jvgu bhe fbaf
naq jvgu bhe qnhtugref, jvgu bhe sybpxf naq jvgu bhe ureqf jvyy jr tb;
sbe jr zhfg ubyq n srnfg hagb gur YBEQ.

10:10 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Yrg gur YBEQ or fb jvgu lbh, nf V jvyy
yrg lbh tb, naq lbhe yvggyr barf: ybbx gb vg; sbe rivy vf orsber lbh.

10:11 Abg fb: tb abj lr gung ner zra, naq freir gur YBEQ; sbe gung lr
qvq qrfver. Naq gurl jrer qevira bhg sebz Cunenbu'f cerfrapr.

10:12 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Fgergpu bhg guvar unaq bire gur
ynaq bs Rtlcg sbe gur ybphfgf, gung gurl znl pbzr hc hcba gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg, naq rng rirel ureo bs gur ynaq, rira nyy gung gur unvy ungu
yrsg.

10:13 Naq Zbfrf fgergpurq sbegu uvf ebq bire gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, naq
gur YBEQ oebhtug na rnfg jvaq hcba gur ynaq nyy gung qnl, naq nyy gung
avtug; naq jura vg jnf zbeavat, gur rnfg jvaq oebhtug gur ybphfgf.

10:14 Naq gur ybphfg jrag hc bire nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, naq erfgrq va
nyy gur pbnfgf bs Rtlcg: irel tevribhf jrer gurl; orsber gurz gurer
jrer ab fhpu ybphfgf nf gurl, arvgure nsgre gurz funyy or fhpu.

10:15 Sbe gurl pbirerq gur snpr bs gur jubyr rnegu, fb gung gur ynaq
jnf qnexrarq; naq gurl qvq rng rirel ureo bs gur ynaq, naq nyy gur
sehvg bs gur gerrf juvpu gur unvy unq yrsg: naq gurer erznvarq abg nal
terra guvat va gur gerrf, be va gur ureof bs gur svryq, guebhtu nyy
gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

10:16 Gura Cunenbu pnyyrq sbe Zbfrf naq Nneba va unfgr; naq ur fnvq, V
unir fvaarq ntnvafg gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, naq ntnvafg lbh.

10:17 Abj gurersber sbetvir, V cenl gurr, zl fva bayl guvf bapr, naq
vagerng gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, gung ur znl gnxr njnl sebz zr guvf qrngu
bayl.

10:18 Naq ur jrag bhg sebz Cunenbu, naq vagerngrq gur YBEQ.

10:19 Naq gur YBEQ ghearq n zvtugl fgebat jrfg jvaq, juvpu gbbx njnl
gur ybphfgf, naq pnfg gurz vagb gur Erq frn; gurer erznvarq abg bar
ybphfg va nyy gur pbnfgf bs Rtlcg.

10:20 Ohg gur YBEQ uneqrarq Cunenbu'f urneg, fb gung ur jbhyq abg yrg
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry tb.

10:21 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Fgergpu bhg guvar unaq gbjneq
urnira, gung gurer znl or qnexarff bire gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, rira
qnexarff juvpu znl or sryg.

10:22 Naq Zbfrf fgergpurq sbegu uvf unaq gbjneq urnira; naq gurer jnf
n guvpx qnexarff va nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg guerr qnlf: 10:23 Gurl fnj
abg bar nabgure, arvgure ebfr nal sebz uvf cynpr sbe guerr qnlf: ohg
nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry unq yvtug va gurve qjryyvatf.

10:24 Naq Cunenbu pnyyrq hagb Zbfrf, naq fnvq, Tb lr, freir gur YBEQ;
bayl yrg lbhe sybpxf naq lbhe ureqf or fgnlrq: yrg lbhe yvggyr barf
nyfb tb jvgu lbh.

10:25 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, Gubh zhfg tvir hf nyfb fnpevsvprf naq oheag
bssrevatf, gung jr znl fnpevsvpr hagb gur YBEQ bhe Tbq.

10:26 Bhe pnggyr nyfb funyy tb jvgu hf; gurer funyy abg na ubbs or
yrsg oruvaq; sbe gurerbs zhfg jr gnxr gb freir gur YBEQ bhe Tbq; naq
jr xabj abg jvgu jung jr zhfg freir gur YBEQ, hagvy jr pbzr guvgure.

10:27 Ohg gur YBEQ uneqrarq Cunenbu'f urneg, naq ur jbhyq abg yrg gurz
tb.

10:28 Naq Cunenbu fnvq hagb uvz, Trg gurr sebz zr, gnxr urrq gb
gulfrys, frr zl snpr ab zber; sbe va gung qnl gubh frrfg zl snpr gubh
funyg qvr.

10:29 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, Gubh unfg fcbxra jryy, V jvyy frr gul snpr ntnva
ab zber.

11:1 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Lrg jvyy V oevat bar cynthr zber
hcba Cunenbu, naq hcba Rtlcg; nsgrejneqf ur jvyy yrg lbh tb urapr:
jura ur funyy yrg lbh tb, ur funyy fheryl guehfg lbh bhg urapr
nygbtrgure.

11:2 Fcrnx abj va gur rnef bs gur crbcyr, naq yrg rirel zna obeebj bs
uvf arvtuobhe, naq rirel jbzna bs ure arvtuobhe, wrjryf bs fvyire naq
wrjryf bs tbyq.

11:3 Naq gur YBEQ tnir gur crbcyr snibhe va gur fvtug bs gur
Rtlcgvnaf.

Zberbire gur zna Zbfrf jnf irel terng va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, va gur
fvtug bs Cunenbu'f freinagf, naq va gur fvtug bs gur crbcyr.

11:4 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Nobhg zvqavtug jvyy V tb bhg
vagb gur zvqfg bs Rtlcg: 11:5 Naq nyy gur svefgobea va gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg funyy qvr, sebz gur svefg obea bs Cunenbu gung fvggrgu hcba uvf
guebar, rira hagb gur svefgobea bs gur znvqfreinag gung vf oruvaq gur
zvyy; naq nyy gur svefgobea bs ornfgf.

11:6 Naq gurer funyy or n terng pel guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs Rtlcg,
fhpu nf gurer jnf abar yvxr vg, abe funyy or yvxr vg nal zber.

11:7 Ohg ntnvafg nal bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry funyy abg n qbt zbir
uvf gbathr, ntnvafg zna be ornfg: gung lr znl xabj ubj gung gur YBEQ
qbgu chg n qvssrerapr orgjrra gur Rtlcgvnaf naq Vfenry.

11:8 Naq nyy gurfr gul freinagf funyy pbzr qbja hagb zr, naq obj qbja
gurzfryirf hagb zr, fnlvat, Trg gurr bhg, naq nyy gur crbcyr gung
sbyybj gurr: naq nsgre gung V jvyy tb bhg. Naq ur jrag bhg sebz
Cunenbu va n terng natre.

11:9 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Cunenbu funyy abg urnexra hagb lbh;
gung zl jbaqref znl or zhygvcyvrq va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

11:10 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba qvq nyy gurfr jbaqref orsber Cunenbu: naq
gur YBEQ uneqrarq Cunenbu'f urneg, fb gung ur jbhyq abg yrg gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry tb bhg bs uvf ynaq.

12:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq Nneba va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg
fnlvat, 12:2 Guvf zbagu funyy or hagb lbh gur ortvaavat bs zbaguf: vg
funyy or gur svefg zbagu bs gur lrne gb lbh.

12:3 Fcrnx lr hagb nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Va gur
gragu qnl bs guvf zbagu gurl funyy gnxr gb gurz rirel zna n ynzo,
nppbeqvat gb gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, n ynzo sbe na ubhfr: 12:4 Naq
vs gur ubhfrubyq or gbb yvggyr sbe gur ynzo, yrg uvz naq uvf arvtuobhe
arkg hagb uvf ubhfr gnxr vg nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs gur fbhyf;
rirel zna nppbeqvat gb uvf rngvat funyy znxr lbhe pbhag sbe gur ynzo.

12:5 Lbhe ynzo funyy or jvgubhg oyrzvfu, n znyr bs gur svefg lrne: lr
funyy gnxr vg bhg sebz gur furrc, be sebz gur tbngf: 12:6 Naq lr funyy
xrrc vg hc hagvy gur sbhegrragu qnl bs gur fnzr zbagu: naq gur jubyr
nffrzoyl bs gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry funyy xvyy vg va gur riravat.

12:7 Naq gurl funyy gnxr bs gur oybbq, naq fgevxr vg ba gur gjb fvqr
cbfgf naq ba gur hccre qbbe cbfg bs gur ubhfrf, jurerva gurl funyy rng
vg.

12:8 Naq gurl funyy rng gur syrfu va gung avtug, ebnfg jvgu sver, naq
hayrnirarq oernq; naq jvgu ovggre ureof gurl funyy rng vg.

12:9 Rng abg bs vg enj, abe fbqqra ng nyy jvgu jngre, ohg ebnfg jvgu
sver; uvf urnq jvgu uvf yrtf, naq jvgu gur chegranapr gurerbs.

12:10 Naq lr funyy yrg abguvat bs vg erznva hagvy gur zbeavat; naq
gung juvpu erznvargu bs vg hagvy gur zbeavat lr funyy ohea jvgu sver.

12:11 Naq guhf funyy lr rng vg; jvgu lbhe ybvaf tveqrq, lbhe fubrf ba
lbhe srrg, naq lbhe fgnss va lbhe unaq; naq lr funyy rng vg va unfgr:
vg vf gur YBEQ'f cnffbire.

12:12 Sbe V jvyy cnff guebhtu gur ynaq bs Rtlcg guvf avtug, naq jvyy
fzvgr nyy gur svefgobea va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, obgu zna naq ornfg; naq
ntnvafg nyy gur tbqf bs Rtlcg V jvyy rkrphgr whqtzrag: V nz gur YBEQ.

12:13 Naq gur oybbq funyy or gb lbh sbe n gbxra hcba gur ubhfrf jurer
lr ner: naq jura V frr gur oybbq, V jvyy cnff bire lbh, naq gur cynthr
funyy abg or hcba lbh gb qrfgebl lbh, jura V fzvgr gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

12:14 Naq guvf qnl funyy or hagb lbh sbe n zrzbevny; naq lr funyy xrrc
vg n srnfg gb gur YBEQ guebhtubhg lbhe trarengvbaf; lr funyy xrrc vg n
srnfg ol na beqvanapr sbe rire.

12:15 Frira qnlf funyy lr rng hayrnirarq oernq; rira gur svefg qnl lr
funyy chg njnl yrnira bhg bs lbhe ubhfrf: sbe jubfbrire rngrgu
yrnirarq oernq sebz gur svefg qnl hagvy gur friragu qnl, gung fbhy
funyy or phg bss sebz Vfenry.

12:16 Naq va gur svefg qnl gurer funyy or na ubyl pbaibpngvba, naq va
gur friragu qnl gurer funyy or na ubyl pbaibpngvba gb lbh; ab znaare
bs jbex funyy or qbar va gurz, fnir gung juvpu rirel zna zhfg rng,
gung bayl znl or qbar bs lbh.

12:17 Naq lr funyy bofreir gur srnfg bs hayrnirarq oernq; sbe va guvf
frysfnzr qnl unir V oebhtug lbhe nezvrf bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg:
gurersber funyy lr bofreir guvf qnl va lbhe trarengvbaf ol na
beqvanapr sbe rire.

12:18 Va gur svefg zbagu, ba gur sbhegrragu qnl bs gur zbagu ng rira,
lr funyy rng hayrnirarq oernq, hagvy gur bar naq gjragvrgu qnl bs gur
zbagu ng rira.

12:19 Frira qnlf funyy gurer or ab yrnira sbhaq va lbhe ubhfrf: sbe
jubfbrire rngrgu gung juvpu vf yrnirarq, rira gung fbhy funyy or phg
bss sebz gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry, jurgure ur or n fgenatre, be obea
va gur ynaq.

12:20 Lr funyy rng abguvat yrnirarq; va nyy lbhe unovgngvbaf funyy lr
rng hayrnirarq oernq.

12:21 Gura Zbfrf pnyyrq sbe nyy gur ryqref bs Vfenry, naq fnvq hagb
gurz, Qenj bhg naq gnxr lbh n ynzo nppbeqvat gb lbhe snzvyvrf, naq
xvyy gur cnffbire.

12:22 Naq lr funyy gnxr n ohapu bs ulffbc, naq qvc vg va gur oybbq
gung vf va gur onfba, naq fgevxr gur yvagry naq gur gjb fvqr cbfgf
jvgu gur oybbq gung vf va gur onfba; naq abar bs lbh funyy tb bhg ng
gur qbbe bs uvf ubhfr hagvy gur zbeavat.

12:23 Sbe gur YBEQ jvyy cnff guebhtu gb fzvgr gur Rtlcgvnaf; naq jura
ur frrgu gur oybbq hcba gur yvagry, naq ba gur gjb fvqr cbfgf, gur
YBEQ jvyy cnff bire gur qbbe, naq jvyy abg fhssre gur qrfgeblre gb
pbzr va hagb lbhe ubhfrf gb fzvgr lbh.

12:24 Naq lr funyy bofreir guvf guvat sbe na beqvanapr gb gurr naq gb
gul fbaf sbe rire.

12:25 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura lr or pbzr gb gur ynaq juvpu gur
YBEQ jvyy tvir lbh, nppbeqvat nf ur ungu cebzvfrq, gung lr funyy xrrc
guvf freivpr.

12:26 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura lbhe puvyqera funyy fnl hagb
lbh, Jung zrna lr ol guvf freivpr?  12:27 Gung lr funyy fnl, Vg vf gur
fnpevsvpr bs gur YBEQ'f cnffbire, jub cnffrq bire gur ubhfrf bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry va Rtlcg, jura ur fzbgr gur Rtlcgvnaf, naq
qryvirerq bhe ubhfrf. Naq gur crbcyr objrq gur urnq naq jbefuvccrq.

12:28 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrag njnl, naq qvq nf gur YBEQ unq
pbzznaqrq Zbfrf naq Nneba, fb qvq gurl.

12:29 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung ng zvqavtug gur YBEQ fzbgr nyy gur
svefgobea va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, sebz gur svefgobea bs Cunenbu gung fng
ba uvf guebar hagb gur svefgobea bs gur pncgvir gung jnf va gur
qhatrba; naq nyy gur svefgobea bs pnggyr.

12:30 Naq Cunenbu ebfr hc va gur avtug, ur, naq nyy uvf freinagf, naq
nyy gur Rtlcgvnaf; naq gurer jnf n terng pel va Rtlcg; sbe gurer jnf
abg n ubhfr jurer gurer jnf abg bar qrnq.

12:31 Naq ur pnyyrq sbe Zbfrf naq Nneba ol avtug, naq fnvq, Evfr hc,
naq trg lbh sbegu sebz nzbat zl crbcyr, obgu lr naq gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry; naq tb, freir gur YBEQ, nf lr unir fnvq.

12:32 Nyfb gnxr lbhe sybpxf naq lbhe ureqf, nf lr unir fnvq, naq or
tbar; naq oyrff zr nyfb.

12:33 Naq gur Rtlcgvnaf jrer hetrag hcba gur crbcyr, gung gurl zvtug
fraq gurz bhg bs gur ynaq va unfgr; sbe gurl fnvq, Jr or nyy qrnq zra.

12:34 Naq gur crbcyr gbbx gurve qbhtu orsber vg jnf yrnirarq, gurve
xarnqvatgebhtuf orvat obhaq hc va gurve pybgurf hcba gurve fubhyqref.

12:35 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs Zbfrf;
naq gurl obeebjrq bs gur Rtlcgvnaf wrjryf bs fvyire, naq wrjryf bs
tbyq, naq envzrag: 12:36 Naq gur YBEQ tnir gur crbcyr snibhe va gur
fvtug bs gur Rtlcgvnaf, fb gung gurl yrag hagb gurz fhpu guvatf nf
gurl erdhverq. Naq gurl fcbvyrq gur Rtlcgvnaf.

12:37 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry wbhearlrq sebz Enzrfrf gb Fhppbgu,
nobhg fvk uhaqerq gubhfnaq ba sbbg gung jrer zra, orfvqr puvyqera.

12:38 Naq n zvkrq zhygvghqr jrag hc nyfb jvgu gurz; naq sybpxf, naq
ureqf, rira irel zhpu pnggyr.

12:39 Naq gurl onxrq hayrnirarq pnxrf bs gur qbhtu juvpu gurl oebhtug
sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg, sbe vg jnf abg yrnirarq; orpnhfr gurl jrer guehfg
bhg bs Rtlcg, naq pbhyq abg gneel, arvgure unq gurl cercnerq sbe
gurzfryirf nal ivpghny.

12:40 Abj gur fbwbheavat bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, jub qjryg va
Rtlcg, jnf sbhe uhaqerq naq guvegl lrnef.

12:41 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur raq bs gur sbhe uhaqerq naq guvegl
lrnef, rira gur frysfnzr qnl vg pnzr gb cnff, gung nyy gur ubfgf bs
gur YBEQ jrag bhg sebz gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

12:42 Vg vf n avtug gb or zhpu bofreirq hagb gur YBEQ sbe oevatvat
gurz bhg sebz gur ynaq bs Rtlcg: guvf vf gung avtug bs gur YBEQ gb or
bofreirq bs nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry va gurve trarengvbaf.

12:43 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf naq Nneba, Guvf vf gur beqvanapr bs
gur cnffbire: Gurer funyy ab fgenatre rng gurerbs: 12:44 Ohg rirel
zna'f freinag gung vf obhtug sbe zbarl, jura gubh unfg pvephzpvfrq
uvz, gura funyy ur rng gurerbs.

12:45 N sbervtare naq na uverq freinag funyy abg rng gurerbs.

12:46 Va bar ubhfr funyy vg or rngra; gubh funyg abg pneel sbegu bhtug
bs gur syrfu noebnq bhg bs gur ubhfr; arvgure funyy lr oernx n obar
gurerbs.

12:47 Nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry funyy xrrc vg.

12:48 Naq jura n fgenatre funyy fbwbhea jvgu gurr, naq jvyy xrrc gur
cnffbire gb gur YBEQ, yrg nyy uvf znyrf or pvephzpvfrq, naq gura yrg
uvz pbzr arne naq xrrc vg; naq ur funyy or nf bar gung vf obea va gur
ynaq: sbe ab hapvephzpvfrq crefba funyy rng gurerbs.

12:49 Bar ynj funyy or gb uvz gung vf ubzrobea, naq hagb gur fgenatre
gung fbwbheargu nzbat lbh.

12:50 Guhf qvq nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf
naq Nneba, fb qvq gurl.

12:51 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff gur frysfnzr qnl, gung gur YBEQ qvq oevat
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg ol gurve nezvrf.

13:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 13:2 Fnapgvsl hagb zr nyy
gur svefgobea, jungfbrire bcrargu gur jbzo nzbat gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, obgu bs zna naq bs ornfg: vg vf zvar.

13:3 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gur crbcyr, Erzrzore guvf qnl, va juvpu lr
pnzr bhg sebz Rtlcg, bhg bs gur ubhfr bs obaqntr; sbe ol fgeratgu bs
unaq gur YBEQ oebhtug lbh bhg sebz guvf cynpr: gurer funyy ab yrnirarq
oernq or rngra.

13:4 Guvf qnl pnzr lr bhg va gur zbagu Novo.

13:5 Naq vg funyy or jura gur YBEQ funyy oevat gurr vagb gur ynaq bs
gur Pnannavgrf, naq gur Uvggvgrf, naq gur Nzbevgrf, naq gur Uvivgrf,
naq gur Wrohfvgrf, juvpu ur fjner hagb gul snguref gb tvir gurr, n
ynaq sybjvat jvgu zvyx naq ubarl, gung gubh funyg xrrc guvf freivpr va
guvf zbagu.

13:6 Frira qnlf gubh funyg rng hayrnirarq oernq, naq va gur friragu
qnl funyy or n srnfg gb gur YBEQ.

13:7 Hayrnirarq oernq funyy or rngra frira qnlf; naq gurer funyy ab
yrnirarq oernq or frra jvgu gurr, arvgure funyy gurer or yrnira frra
jvgu gurr va nyy gul dhnegref.

13:8 Naq gubh funyg furj gul fba va gung qnl, fnlvat, Guvf vf qbar
orpnhfr bs gung juvpu gur YBEQ qvq hagb zr jura V pnzr sbegu bhg bs
Rtlcg.

13:9 Naq vg funyy or sbe n fvta hagb gurr hcba guvar unaq, naq sbe n
zrzbevny orgjrra guvar rlrf, gung gur YBEQ'f ynj znl or va gul zbhgu:
sbe jvgu n fgebat unaq ungu gur YBEQ oebhtug gurr bhg bs Rtlcg.

13:10 Gubh funyg gurersber xrrc guvf beqvanapr va uvf frnfba sebz lrne
gb lrne.

13:11 Naq vg funyy or jura gur YBEQ funyy oevat gurr vagb gur ynaq bs
gur Pnannavgrf, nf ur fjner hagb gurr naq gb gul snguref, naq funyy
tvir vg gurr, 13:12 Gung gubh funyg frg ncneg hagb gur YBEQ nyy gung
bcrargu gur zngevk, naq rirel svefgyvat gung pbzrgu bs n ornfg juvpu
gubh unfg; gur znyrf funyy or gur YBEQ'f.

13:13 Naq rirel svefgyvat bs na nff gubh funyg erqrrz jvgu n ynzo; naq
vs gubh jvyg abg erqrrz vg, gura gubh funyg oernx uvf arpx: naq nyy
gur svefgobea bs zna nzbat gul puvyqera funyg gubh erqrrz.

13:14 Naq vg funyy or jura gul fba nfxrgu gurr va gvzr gb pbzr,
fnlvat, Jung vf guvf? gung gubh funyg fnl hagb uvz, Ol fgeratgu bs
unaq gur YBEQ oebhtug hf bhg sebz Rtlcg, sebz gur ubhfr bs obaqntr:
13:15 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Cunenbu jbhyq uneqyl yrg hf tb, gung
gur YBEQ fyrj nyy gur svefgobea va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, obgu gur
svefgobea bs zna, naq gur svefgobea bs ornfg: gurersber V fnpevsvpr gb
gur YBEQ nyy gung bcrargu gur zngevk, orvat znyrf; ohg nyy gur
svefgobea bs zl puvyqera V erqrrz.

13:16 Naq vg funyy or sbe n gbxra hcba guvar unaq, naq sbe sebagyrgf
orgjrra guvar rlrf: sbe ol fgeratgu bs unaq gur YBEQ oebhtug hf sbegu
bhg bs Rtlcg.

13:17 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Cunenbu unq yrg gur crbcyr tb, gung
Tbq yrq gurz abg guebhtu gur jnl bs gur ynaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf,
nygubhtu gung jnf arne; sbe Tbq fnvq, Yrfg crenqiragher gur crbcyr
ercrag jura gurl frr jne, naq gurl erghea gb Rtlcg: 13:18 Ohg Tbq yrq
gur crbcyr nobhg, guebhtu gur jnl bs gur jvyqrearff bs gur Erq frn:
naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrag hc unearffrq bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

13:19 Naq Zbfrf gbbx gur obarf bs Wbfrcu jvgu uvz: sbe ur unq fgenvgyl
fjbea gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Tbq jvyy fheryl ivfvg lbh; naq
lr funyy pneel hc zl obarf njnl urapr jvgu lbh.

13:20 Naq gurl gbbx gurve wbhearl sebz Fhppbgu, naq rapnzcrq va Rgunz,
va gur rqtr bs gur jvyqrearff.

13:21 Naq gur YBEQ jrag orsber gurz ol qnl va n cvyyne bs n pybhq, gb
yrnq gurz gur jnl; naq ol avtug va n cvyyne bs sver, gb tvir gurz
yvtug; gb tb ol qnl naq avtug: 13:22 Ur gbbx abg njnl gur cvyyne bs
gur pybhq ol qnl, abe gur cvyyne bs sver ol avtug, sebz orsber gur
crbcyr.

14:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 14:2 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung gurl ghea naq rapnzc orsber Cvunuvebgu,
orgjrra Zvtqby naq gur frn, bire ntnvafg Onnymrcuba: orsber vg funyy
lr rapnzc ol gur frn.

14:3 Sbe Cunenbu jvyy fnl bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, Gurl ner
ragnatyrq va gur ynaq, gur jvyqrearff ungu fuhg gurz va.

14:4 Naq V jvyy uneqra Cunenbu'f urneg, gung ur funyy sbyybj nsgre
gurz; naq V jvyy or ubabherq hcba Cunenbu, naq hcba nyy uvf ubfg; gung
gur Rtlcgvnaf znl xabj gung V nz gur YBEQ. Naq gurl qvq fb.

14:5 Naq vg jnf gbyq gur xvat bs Rtlcg gung gur crbcyr syrq: naq gur
urneg bs Cunenbu naq bs uvf freinagf jnf ghearq ntnvafg gur crbcyr,
naq gurl fnvq, Jul unir jr qbar guvf, gung jr unir yrg Vfenry tb sebz
freivat hf?  14:6 Naq ur znqr ernql uvf punevbg, naq gbbx uvf crbcyr
jvgu uvz: 14:7 Naq ur gbbx fvk uhaqerq pubfra punevbgf, naq nyy gur
punevbgf bs Rtlcg, naq pncgnvaf bire rirel bar bs gurz.

14:8 Naq gur YBEQ uneqrarq gur urneg bs Cunenbu xvat bs Rtlcg, naq ur
chefhrq nsgre gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrag
bhg jvgu na uvtu unaq.

14:9 Ohg gur Rtlcgvnaf chefhrq nsgre gurz, nyy gur ubefrf naq punevbgf
bs Cunenbu, naq uvf ubefrzra, naq uvf nezl, naq biregbbx gurz
rapnzcvat ol gur frn, orfvqr Cvunuvebgu, orsber Onnymrcuba.

14:10 Naq jura Cunenbu qerj avtu, gur puvyqera bs Vfenry yvsgrq hc
gurve rlrf, naq, orubyq, gur Rtlcgvnaf znepurq nsgre gurz; naq gurl
jrer fber nsenvq: naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pevrq bhg hagb gur YBEQ.

14:11 Naq gurl fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Orpnhfr gurer jrer ab tenirf va Rtlcg,
unfg gubh gnxra hf njnl gb qvr va gur jvyqrearff? jurersber unfg gubh
qrnyg guhf jvgu hf, gb pneel hf sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg?  14:12 Vf abg guvf
gur jbeq gung jr qvq gryy gurr va Rtlcg, fnlvat, Yrg hf nybar, gung jr
znl freir gur Rtlcgvnaf? Sbe vg unq orra orggre sbe hf gb freir gur
Rtlcgvnaf, guna gung jr fubhyq qvr va gur jvyqrearff.

14:13 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gur crbcyr, Srne lr abg, fgnaq fgvyy, naq
frr gur fnyingvba bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur jvyy furj gb lbh gb qnl: sbe
gur Rtlcgvnaf jubz lr unir frra gb qnl, lr funyy frr gurz ntnva ab
zber sbe rire.

14:14 Gur YBEQ funyy svtug sbe lbh, naq lr funyy ubyq lbhe crnpr.

14:15 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Jurersber pevrfg gubh hagb zr?
fcrnx hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung gurl tb sbejneq: 14:16 Ohg
yvsg gubh hc gul ebq, naq fgergpu bhg guvar unaq bire gur frn, naq
qvivqr vg: naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry funyy tb ba qel tebhaq guebhtu
gur zvqfg bs gur frn.

14:17 Naq V, orubyq, V jvyy uneqra gur urnegf bs gur Rtlcgvnaf, naq
gurl funyy sbyybj gurz: naq V jvyy trg zr ubabhe hcba Cunenbu, naq
hcba nyy uvf ubfg, hcba uvf punevbgf, naq hcba uvf ubefrzra.

14:18 Naq gur Rtlcgvnaf funyy xabj gung V nz gur YBEQ, jura V unir
tbggra zr ubabhe hcba Cunenbu, hcba uvf punevbgf, naq hcba uvf
ubefrzra.

14:19 Naq gur natry bs Tbq, juvpu jrag orsber gur pnzc bs Vfenry,
erzbirq naq jrag oruvaq gurz; naq gur cvyyne bs gur pybhq jrag sebz
orsber gurve snpr, naq fgbbq oruvaq gurz: 14:20 Naq vg pnzr orgjrra
gur pnzc bs gur Rtlcgvnaf naq gur pnzc bs Vfenry; naq vg jnf n pybhq
naq qnexarff gb gurz, ohg vg tnir yvtug ol avtug gb gurfr: fb gung gur
bar pnzr abg arne gur bgure nyy gur avtug.

14:21 Naq Zbfrf fgergpurq bhg uvf unaq bire gur frn; naq gur YBEQ
pnhfrq gur frn gb tb onpx ol n fgebat rnfg jvaq nyy gung avtug, naq
znqr gur frn qel ynaq, naq gur jngref jrer qvivqrq.

14:22 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrag vagb gur zvqfg bs gur frn hcba
gur qel tebhaq: naq gur jngref jrer n jnyy hagb gurz ba gurve evtug
unaq, naq ba gurve yrsg.

14:23 Naq gur Rtlcgvnaf chefhrq, naq jrag va nsgre gurz gb gur zvqfg
bs gur frn, rira nyy Cunenbu'f ubefrf, uvf punevbgf, naq uvf ubefrzra.

14:24 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung va gur zbeavat jngpu gur YBEQ ybbxrq
hagb gur ubfg bs gur Rtlcgvnaf guebhtu gur cvyyne bs sver naq bs gur
pybhq, naq gebhoyrq gur ubfg bs gur Rtlcgvnaf, 14:25 Naq gbbx bss
gurve punevbg jurryf, gung gurl qenir gurz urnivyl: fb gung gur
Rtlcgvnaf fnvq, Yrg hf syrr sebz gur snpr bs Vfenry; sbe gur YBEQ
svtugrgu sbe gurz ntnvafg gur Rtlcgvnaf.

14:26 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Fgergpu bhg guvar unaq bire gur
frn, gung gur jngref znl pbzr ntnva hcba gur Rtlcgvnaf, hcba gurve
punevbgf, naq hcba gurve ubefrzra.

14:27 Naq Zbfrf fgergpurq sbegu uvf unaq bire gur frn, naq gur frn
erghearq gb uvf fgeratgu jura gur zbeavat nccrnerq; naq gur Rtlcgvnaf
syrq ntnvafg vg; naq gur YBEQ bireguerj gur Rtlcgvnaf va gur zvqfg bs
gur frn.

14:28 Naq gur jngref erghearq, naq pbirerq gur punevbgf, naq gur
ubefrzra, naq nyy gur ubfg bs Cunenbu gung pnzr vagb gur frn nsgre
gurz; gurer erznvarq abg fb zhpu nf bar bs gurz.

14:29 Ohg gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jnyxrq hcba qel ynaq va gur zvqfg bs
gur frn; naq gur jngref jrer n jnyy hagb gurz ba gurve evtug unaq, naq
ba gurve yrsg.

14:30 Guhf gur YBEQ fnirq Vfenry gung qnl bhg bs gur unaq bs gur
Rtlcgvnaf; naq Vfenry fnj gur Rtlcgvnaf qrnq hcba gur frn fuber.

14:31 Naq Vfenry fnj gung terng jbex juvpu gur YBEQ qvq hcba gur
Rtlcgvnaf: naq gur crbcyr srnerq gur YBEQ, naq oryvrirq gur YBEQ, naq
uvf freinag Zbfrf.

15:1 Gura fnat Zbfrf naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry guvf fbat hagb gur
YBEQ, naq fcnxr, fnlvat, V jvyy fvat hagb gur YBEQ, sbe ur ungu
gevhzcurq tybevbhfyl: gur ubefr naq uvf evqre ungu ur guebja vagb gur
frn.

15:2 Gur YBEQ vf zl fgeratgu naq fbat, naq ur vf orpbzr zl fnyingvba:
ur vf zl Tbq, naq V jvyy cercner uvz na unovgngvba; zl sngure'f Tbq,
naq V jvyy rknyg uvz.

15:3 Gur YBEQ vf n zna bs jne: gur YBEQ vf uvf anzr.

15:4 Cunenbu'f punevbgf naq uvf ubfg ungu ur pnfg vagb gur frn: uvf
pubfra pncgnvaf nyfb ner qebjarq va gur Erq frn.

15:5 Gur qrcguf unir pbirerq gurz: gurl fnax vagb gur obggbz nf n
fgbar.

15:6 Gul evtug unaq, B YBEQ, vf orpbzr tybevbhf va cbjre: gul evtug
unaq, B YBEQ, ungu qnfurq va cvrprf gur rarzl.

15:7 Naq va gur terngarff bs guvar rkpryyrapl gubh unfg bireguebja
gurz gung ebfr hc ntnvafg gurr: gubh fragrfg sbegu gul jengu, juvpu
pbafhzrq gurz nf fghooyr.

15:8 Naq jvgu gur oynfg bs gul abfgevyf gur jngref jrer tngurerq
gbtrgure, gur sybbqf fgbbq hcevtug nf na urnc, naq gur qrcguf jrer
pbatrnyrq va gur urneg bs gur frn.

15:9 Gur rarzl fnvq, V jvyy chefhr, V jvyy biregnxr, V jvyy qvivqr gur
fcbvy; zl yhfg funyy or fngvfsvrq hcba gurz; V jvyy qenj zl fjbeq, zl
unaq funyy qrfgebl gurz.

15:10 Gubh qvqfg oybj jvgu gul jvaq, gur frn pbirerq gurz: gurl fnax
nf yrnq va gur zvtugl jngref.

15:11 Jub vf yvxr hagb gurr, B YBEQ, nzbat gur tbqf? jub vf yvxr gurr,
tybevbhf va ubyvarff, srneshy va cenvfrf, qbvat jbaqref?  15:12 Gubh
fgergpurqfg bhg gul evtug unaq, gur rnegu fjnyybjrq gurz.

15:13 Gubh va gul zrepl unfg yrq sbegu gur crbcyr juvpu gubh unfg
erqrrzrq: gubh unfg thvqrq gurz va gul fgeratgu hagb gul ubyl
unovgngvba.

15:14 Gur crbcyr funyy urne, naq or nsenvq: fbeebj funyy gnxr ubyq ba
gur vaunovgnagf bs Cnyrfgvan.

15:15 Gura gur qhxrf bs Rqbz funyy or nznmrq; gur zvtugl zra bs Zbno,
gerzoyvat funyy gnxr ubyq hcba gurz; nyy gur vaunovgnagf bs Pnanna
funyy zryg njnl.

15:16 Srne naq qernq funyy snyy hcba gurz; ol gur terngarff bs guvar
nez gurl funyy or nf fgvyy nf n fgbar; gvyy gul crbcyr cnff bire, B
YBEQ, gvyy gur crbcyr cnff bire, juvpu gubh unfg chepunfrq.

15:17 Gubh funyg oevat gurz va, naq cynag gurz va gur zbhagnva bs
guvar vaurevgnapr, va gur cynpr, B YBEQ, juvpu gubh unfg znqr sbe gurr
gb qjryy va, va gur Fnapghnel, B YBEQ, juvpu gul unaqf unir
rfgnoyvfurq.

15:18 Gur YBEQ funyy ervta sbe rire naq rire.

15:19 Sbe gur ubefr bs Cunenbu jrag va jvgu uvf punevbgf naq jvgu uvf
ubefrzra vagb gur frn, naq gur YBEQ oebhtug ntnva gur jngref bs gur
frn hcba gurz; ohg gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrag ba qel ynaq va gur
zvqfg bs gur frn.

15:20 Naq Zvevnz gur cebcurgrff, gur fvfgre bs Nneba, gbbx n gvzoery
va ure unaq; naq nyy gur jbzra jrag bhg nsgre ure jvgu gvzoeryf naq
jvgu qnaprf.

15:21 Naq Zvevnz nafjrerq gurz, Fvat lr gb gur YBEQ, sbe ur ungu
gevhzcurq tybevbhfyl; gur ubefr naq uvf evqre ungu ur guebja vagb gur
frn.

15:22 Fb Zbfrf oebhtug Vfenry sebz gur Erq frn, naq gurl jrag bhg vagb
gur jvyqrearff bs Fuhe; naq gurl jrag guerr qnlf va gur jvyqrearff,
naq sbhaq ab jngre.

15:23 Naq jura gurl pnzr gb Znenu, gurl pbhyq abg qevax bs gur jngref
bs Znenu, sbe gurl jrer ovggre: gurersber gur anzr bs vg jnf pnyyrq
Znenu.

15:24 Naq gur crbcyr zhezherq ntnvafg Zbfrf, fnlvat, Jung funyy jr
qevax?  15:25 Naq ur pevrq hagb gur YBEQ; naq gur YBEQ furjrq uvz n
gerr, juvpu jura ur unq pnfg vagb gur jngref, gur jngref jrer znqr
fjrrg: gurer ur znqr sbe gurz n fgnghgr naq na beqvanapr, naq gurer ur
cebirq gurz, 15:26 Naq fnvq, Vs gubh jvyg qvyvtragyl urnexra gb gur
ibvpr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, naq jvyg qb gung juvpu vf evtug va uvf
fvtug, naq jvyg tvir rne gb uvf pbzznaqzragf, naq xrrc nyy uvf
fgnghgrf, V jvyy chg abar bs gurfr qvfrnfrf hcba gurr, juvpu V unir
oebhtug hcba gur Rtlcgvnaf: sbe V nz gur YBEQ gung urnyrgu gurr.

15:27 Naq gurl pnzr gb Ryvz, jurer jrer gjryir jryyf bs jngre, naq
guerrfpber naq gra cnyz gerrf: naq gurl rapnzcrq gurer ol gur jngref.

16:1 Naq gurl gbbx gurve wbhearl sebz Ryvz, naq nyy gur pbatertngvba
bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pnzr hagb gur jvyqrearff bs Fva, juvpu vf
orgjrra Ryvz naq Fvanv, ba gur svsgrragu qnl bs gur frpbaq zbagu nsgre
gurve qrcnegvat bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

16:2 Naq gur jubyr pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry zhezherq
ntnvafg Zbfrf naq Nneba va gur jvyqrearff: 16:3 Naq gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry fnvq hagb gurz, Jbhyq gb Tbq jr unq qvrq ol gur unaq bs gur
YBEQ va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, jura jr fng ol gur syrfu cbgf, naq jura jr
qvq rng oernq gb gur shyy; sbe lr unir oebhtug hf sbegu vagb guvf
jvyqrearff, gb xvyy guvf jubyr nffrzoyl jvgu uhatre.

16:4 Gura fnvq gur YBEQ hagb Zbfrf, Orubyq, V jvyy enva oernq sebz
urnira sbe lbh; naq gur crbcyr funyy tb bhg naq tngure n pregnva engr
rirel qnl, gung V znl cebir gurz, jurgure gurl jvyy jnyx va zl ynj, be
ab.

16:5 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung ba gur fvkgu qnl gurl funyy
cercner gung juvpu gurl oevat va; naq vg funyy or gjvpr nf zhpu nf
gurl tngure qnvyl.

16:6 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba fnvq hagb nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, Ng
rira, gura lr funyy xabj gung gur YBEQ ungu oebhtug lbh bhg sebz gur
ynaq bs Rtlcg: 16:7 Naq va gur zbeavat, gura lr funyy frr gur tybel bs
gur YBEQ; sbe gung ur urnergu lbhe zhezhevatf ntnvafg gur YBEQ: naq
jung ner jr, gung lr zhezhe ntnvafg hf?  16:8 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, Guvf
funyy or, jura gur YBEQ funyy tvir lbh va gur riravat syrfu gb rng,
naq va gur zbeavat oernq gb gur shyy; sbe gung gur YBEQ urnergu lbhe
zhezhevatf juvpu lr zhezhe ntnvafg uvz: naq jung ner jr? lbhe
zhezhevatf ner abg ntnvafg hf, ohg ntnvafg gur YBEQ.

16:9 Naq Zbfrf fcnxr hagb Nneba, Fnl hagb nyy gur pbatertngvba bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, Pbzr arne orsber gur YBEQ: sbe ur ungu urneq lbhe
zhezhevatf.

16:10 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf Nneba fcnxr hagb gur jubyr pbatertngvba
bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung gurl ybbxrq gbjneq gur jvyqrearff,
naq, orubyq, gur tybel bs gur YBEQ nccrnerq va gur pybhq.

16:11 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 16:12 V unir urneq gur
zhezhevatf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: fcrnx hagb gurz, fnlvat, Ng rira
lr funyy rng syrfu, naq va gur zbeavat lr funyy or svyyrq jvgu oernq;
naq lr funyy xabj gung V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

16:13 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung ng rira gur dhnvyf pnzr hc, naq
pbirerq gur pnzc: naq va gur zbeavat gur qrj ynl ebhaq nobhg gur ubfg.

16:14 Naq jura gur qrj gung ynl jnf tbar hc, orubyq, hcba gur snpr bs
gur jvyqrearff gurer ynl n fznyy ebhaq guvat, nf fznyy nf gur ubne
sebfg ba gur tebhaq.

16:15 Naq jura gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fnj vg, gurl fnvq bar gb
nabgure, Vg vf znaan: sbe gurl jvfg abg jung vg jnf. Naq Zbfrf fnvq
hagb gurz, Guvf vf gur oernq juvpu gur YBEQ ungu tvira lbh gb rng.

16:16 Guvf vf gur guvat juvpu gur YBEQ ungu pbzznaqrq, Tngure bs vg
rirel zna nppbeqvat gb uvf rngvat, na bzre sbe rirel zna, nppbeqvat gb
gur ahzore bs lbhe crefbaf; gnxr lr rirel zna sbe gurz juvpu ner va
uvf gragf.

16:17 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq fb, naq tngurerq, fbzr zber, fbzr
yrff.

16:18 Naq jura gurl qvq zrgr vg jvgu na bzre, ur gung tngurerq zhpu
unq abguvat bire, naq ur gung tngurerq yvggyr unq ab ynpx; gurl
tngurerq rirel zna nppbeqvat gb uvf rngvat.

16:19 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, Yrg ab zna yrnir bs vg gvyy gur zbeavat.

16:20 Abgjvgufgnaqvat gurl urnexrarq abg hagb Zbfrf; ohg fbzr bs gurz
yrsg bs vg hagvy gur zbeavat, naq vg oerq jbezf, naq fgnax: naq Zbfrf
jnf jebgu jvgu gurz.

16:21 Naq gurl tngurerq vg rirel zbeavat, rirel zna nppbeqvat gb uvf
rngvat: naq jura gur fha jnkrq ubg, vg zrygrq.

16:22 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung ba gur fvkgu qnl gurl tngurerq gjvpr
nf zhpu oernq, gjb bzref sbe bar zna: naq nyy gur ehyref bs gur
pbatertngvba pnzr naq gbyq Zbfrf.

16:23 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Guvf vf gung juvpu gur YBEQ ungu fnvq, Gb
zbeebj vf gur erfg bs gur ubyl fnoongu hagb gur YBEQ: onxr gung juvpu
lr jvyy onxr gb qnl, naq frrgur gung lr jvyy frrgur; naq gung juvpu
erznvargu bire ynl hc sbe lbh gb or xrcg hagvy gur zbeavat.

16:24 Naq gurl ynvq vg hc gvyy gur zbeavat, nf Zbfrf onqr: naq vg qvq
abg fgvax, arvgure jnf gurer nal jbez gurerva.

16:25 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, Rng gung gb qnl; sbe gb qnl vf n fnoongu hagb
gur YBEQ: gb qnl lr funyy abg svaq vg va gur svryq.

16:26 Fvk qnlf lr funyy tngure vg; ohg ba gur friragu qnl, juvpu vf
gur fnoongu, va vg gurer funyy or abar.

16:27 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung gurer jrag bhg fbzr bs gur crbcyr ba
gur friragu qnl sbe gb tngure, naq gurl sbhaq abar.

16:28 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Ubj ybat ershfr lr gb xrrc zl
pbzznaqzragf naq zl ynjf?  16:29 Frr, sbe gung gur YBEQ ungu tvira lbh
gur fnoongu, gurersber ur tvirgu lbh ba gur fvkgu qnl gur oernq bs gjb
qnlf; novqr lr rirel zna va uvf cynpr, yrg ab zna tb bhg bs uvf cynpr
ba gur friragu qnl.

16:30 Fb gur crbcyr erfgrq ba gur friragu qnl.

16:31 Naq gur ubhfr bs Vfenry pnyyrq gur anzr gurerbs Znaan: naq vg
jnf yvxr pbevnaqre frrq, juvgr; naq gur gnfgr bs vg jnf yvxr jnsref
znqr jvgu ubarl.

16:32 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, Guvf vf gur guvat juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrgu,
Svyy na bzre bs vg gb or xrcg sbe lbhe trarengvbaf; gung gurl znl frr
gur oernq jurerjvgu V unir srq lbh va gur jvyqrearff, jura V oebhtug
lbh sbegu sebz gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

16:33 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb Nneba, Gnxr n cbg, naq chg na bzre shyy bs
znaan gurerva, naq ynl vg hc orsber gur YBEQ, gb or xrcg sbe lbhe
trarengvbaf.

16:34 Nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf, fb Nneba ynvq vg hc orsber gur
Grfgvzbal, gb or xrcg.

16:35 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq rng znaan sbegl lrnef, hagvy gurl
pnzr gb n ynaq vaunovgrq; gurl qvq rng znaan, hagvy gurl pnzr hagb gur
obeqref bs gur ynaq bs Pnanna.

16:36 Abj na bzre vf gur gragu cneg bs na rcunu.

17:1 Naq nyy gur pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry wbhearlrq sebz
gur jvyqrearff bs Fva, nsgre gurve wbhearlf, nppbeqvat gb gur
pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ, naq cvgpurq va Ercuvqvz: naq gurer jnf ab
jngre sbe gur crbcyr gb qevax.

17:2 Jurersber gur crbcyr qvq puvqr jvgu Zbfrf, naq fnvq, Tvir hf
jngre gung jr znl qevax. Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gurz, Jul puvqr lr jvgu
zr? jurersber qb lr grzcg gur YBEQ?  17:3 Naq gur crbcyr guvefgrq
gurer sbe jngre; naq gur crbcyr zhezherq ntnvafg Zbfrf, naq fnvq,
Jurersber vf guvf gung gubh unfg oebhtug hf hc bhg bs Rtlcg, gb xvyy
hf naq bhe puvyqera naq bhe pnggyr jvgu guvefg?  17:4 Naq Zbfrf pevrq
hagb gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Jung funyy V qb hagb guvf crbcyr? gurl or
nyzbfg ernql gb fgbar zr.

17:5 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Tb ba orsber gur crbcyr, naq gnxr
jvgu gurr bs gur ryqref bs Vfenry; naq gul ebq, jurerjvgu gubh fzbgrfg
gur evire, gnxr va guvar unaq, naq tb.

17:6 Orubyq, V jvyy fgnaq orsber gurr gurer hcba gur ebpx va Ubero;
naq gubh funyg fzvgr gur ebpx, naq gurer funyy pbzr jngre bhg bs vg,
gung gur crbcyr znl qevax. Naq Zbfrf qvq fb va gur fvtug bs gur ryqref
bs Vfenry.

17:7 Naq ur pnyyrq gur anzr bs gur cynpr Znffnu, naq Zrevonu, orpnhfr
bs gur puvqvat bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq orpnhfr gurl grzcgrq gur
YBEQ, fnlvat, Vf gur YBEQ nzbat hf, be abg?  17:8 Gura pnzr Nznyrx,
naq sbhtug jvgu Vfenry va Ercuvqvz.

17:9 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Pubbfr hf bhg zra, naq tb bhg, svtug
jvgu Nznyrx: gb zbeebj V jvyy fgnaq ba gur gbc bs gur uvyy jvgu gur
ebq bs Tbq va zvar unaq.

17:10 Fb Wbfuhn qvq nf Zbfrf unq fnvq gb uvz, naq sbhtug jvgu Nznyrx:
naq Zbfrf, Nneba, naq Uhe jrag hc gb gur gbc bs gur uvyy.

17:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Zbfrf uryq hc uvf unaq, gung Vfenry
cerinvyrq: naq jura ur yrg qbja uvf unaq, Nznyrx cerinvyrq.

17:12 Ohg Zbfrf unaqf jrer urnil; naq gurl gbbx n fgbar, naq chg vg
haqre uvz, naq ur fng gurerba; naq Nneba naq Uhe fgnlrq hc uvf unaqf,
gur bar ba gur bar fvqr, naq gur bgure ba gur bgure fvqr; naq uvf
unaqf jrer fgrnql hagvy gur tbvat qbja bs gur fha.

17:13 Naq Wbfuhn qvfpbzsvgrq Nznyrx naq uvf crbcyr jvgu gur rqtr bs
gur fjbeq.

17:14 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Jevgr guvf sbe n zrzbevny va n
obbx, naq erurnefr vg va gur rnef bs Wbfuhn: sbe V jvyy hggreyl chg
bhg gur erzrzoenapr bs Nznyrx sebz haqre urnira.

17:15 Naq Zbfrf ohvyg na nygne, naq pnyyrq gur anzr bs vg
Wrubinuavffv: 17:16 Sbe ur fnvq, Orpnhfr gur YBEQ ungu fjbea gung gur
YBEQ jvyy unir jne jvgu Nznyrx sebz trarengvba gb trarengvba.

18:1 Jura Wrgueb, gur cevrfg bs Zvqvna, Zbfrf' sngure va ynj, urneq bs
nyy gung Tbq unq qbar sbe Zbfrf, naq sbe Vfenry uvf crbcyr, naq gung
gur YBEQ unq oebhtug Vfenry bhg bs Rtlcg; 18:2 Gura Wrgueb, Zbfrf'
sngure va ynj, gbbx Mvccbenu, Zbfrf' jvsr, nsgre ur unq frag ure onpx,
18:3 Naq ure gjb fbaf; bs juvpu gur anzr bs gur bar jnf Trefubz; sbe
ur fnvq, V unir orra na nyvra va n fgenatr ynaq: 18:4 Naq gur anzr bs
gur bgure jnf Ryvrmre; sbe gur Tbq bs zl sngure, fnvq ur, jnf zvar
uryc, naq qryvirerq zr sebz gur fjbeq bs Cunenbu: 18:5 Naq Wrgueb,
Zbfrf' sngure va ynj, pnzr jvgu uvf fbaf naq uvf jvsr hagb Zbfrf vagb
gur jvyqrearff, jurer ur rapnzcrq ng gur zbhag bs Tbq: 18:6 Naq ur
fnvq hagb Zbfrf, V gul sngure va ynj Wrgueb nz pbzr hagb gurr, naq gul
jvsr, naq ure gjb fbaf jvgu ure.

18:7 Naq Zbfrf jrag bhg gb zrrg uvf sngure va ynj, naq qvq borvfnapr,
naq xvffrq uvz; naq gurl nfxrq rnpu bgure bs gurve jrysner; naq gurl
pnzr vagb gur grag.

18:8 Naq Zbfrf gbyq uvf sngure va ynj nyy gung gur YBEQ unq qbar hagb
Cunenbu naq gb gur Rtlcgvnaf sbe Vfenry'f fnxr, naq nyy gur geninvy
gung unq pbzr hcba gurz ol gur jnl, naq ubj gur YBEQ qryvirerq gurz.

18:9 Naq Wrgueb erwbvprq sbe nyy gur tbbqarff juvpu gur YBEQ unq qbar
gb Vfenry, jubz ur unq qryvirerq bhg bs gur unaq bs gur Rtlcgvnaf.

18:10 Naq Wrgueb fnvq, Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ, jub ungu qryvirerq lbh bhg
bs gur unaq bs gur Rtlcgvnaf, naq bhg bs gur unaq bs Cunenbu, jub ungu
qryvirerq gur crbcyr sebz haqre gur unaq bs gur Rtlcgvnaf.

18:11 Abj V xabj gung gur YBEQ vf terngre guna nyy tbqf: sbe va gur
guvat jurerva gurl qrnyg cebhqyl ur jnf nobir gurz.

18:12 Naq Wrgueb, Zbfrf' sngure va ynj, gbbx n oheag bssrevat naq
fnpevsvprf sbe Tbq: naq Nneba pnzr, naq nyy gur ryqref bs Vfenry, gb
rng oernq jvgu Zbfrf' sngure va ynj orsber Tbq.

18:13 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur zbeebj, gung Zbfrf fng gb whqtr gur
crbcyr: naq gur crbcyr fgbbq ol Zbfrf sebz gur zbeavat hagb gur
riravat.

18:14 Naq jura Zbfrf' sngure va ynj fnj nyy gung ur qvq gb gur crbcyr,
ur fnvq, Jung vf guvf guvat gung gubh qbrfg gb gur crbcyr? jul fvggrfg
gubh gulfrys nybar, naq nyy gur crbcyr fgnaq ol gurr sebz zbeavat hagb
rira?  18:15 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb uvf sngure va ynj, Orpnhfr gur crbcyr
pbzr hagb zr gb radhver bs Tbq: 18:16 Jura gurl unir n znggre, gurl
pbzr hagb zr; naq V whqtr orgjrra bar naq nabgure, naq V qb znxr gurz
xabj gur fgnghgrf bs Tbq, naq uvf ynjf.

18:17 Naq Zbfrf' sngure va ynj fnvq hagb uvz, Gur guvat gung gubh
qbrfg vf abg tbbq.

18:18 Gubh jvyg fheryl jrne njnl, obgu gubh, naq guvf crbcyr gung vf
jvgu gurr: sbe guvf guvat vf gbb urnil sbe gurr; gubh neg abg noyr gb
cresbez vg gulfrys nybar.

18:19 Urnexra abj hagb zl ibvpr, V jvyy tvir gurr pbhafry, naq Tbq
funyy or jvgu gurr: Or gubh sbe gur crbcyr gb Tbq-jneq, gung gubh
znlrfg oevat gur pnhfrf hagb Tbq: 18:20 Naq gubh funyg grnpu gurz
beqvanaprf naq ynjf, naq funyg furj gurz gur jnl jurerva gurl zhfg
jnyx, naq gur jbex gung gurl zhfg qb.

18:21 Zberbire gubh funyg cebivqr bhg bs nyy gur crbcyr noyr zra, fhpu
nf srne Tbq, zra bs gehgu, ungvat pbirgbhfarff; naq cynpr fhpu bire
gurz, gb or ehyref bs gubhfnaqf, naq ehyref bs uhaqerqf, ehyref bs
svsgvrf, naq ehyref bs graf: 18:22 Naq yrg gurz whqtr gur crbcyr ng
nyy frnfbaf: naq vg funyy or, gung rirel terng znggre gurl funyy oevat
hagb gurr, ohg rirel fznyy znggre gurl funyy whqtr: fb funyy vg or
rnfvre sbe gulfrys, naq gurl funyy orne gur oheqra jvgu gurr.

18:23 Vs gubh funyg qb guvf guvat, naq Tbq pbzznaq gurr fb, gura gubh
funyg or noyr gb raqher, naq nyy guvf crbcyr funyy nyfb tb gb gurve
cynpr va crnpr.

18:24 Fb Zbfrf urnexrarq gb gur ibvpr bs uvf sngure va ynj, naq qvq
nyy gung ur unq fnvq.

18:25 Naq Zbfrf pubfr noyr zra bhg bs nyy Vfenry, naq znqr gurz urnqf
bire gur crbcyr, ehyref bs gubhfnaqf, ehyref bs uhaqerqf, ehyref bs
svsgvrf, naq ehyref bs graf.

18:26 Naq gurl whqtrq gur crbcyr ng nyy frnfbaf: gur uneq pnhfrf gurl
oebhtug hagb Zbfrf, ohg rirel fznyy znggre gurl whqtrq gurzfryirf.

18:27 Naq Zbfrf yrg uvf sngure va ynj qrcneg; naq ur jrag uvf jnl vagb
uvf bja ynaq.

19:1 Va gur guveq zbagu, jura gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrer tbar sbegu
bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, gur fnzr qnl pnzr gurl vagb gur jvyqrearff
bs Fvanv.

19:2 Sbe gurl jrer qrcnegrq sebz Ercuvqvz, naq jrer pbzr gb gur qrfreg
bs Fvanv, naq unq cvgpurq va gur jvyqrearff; naq gurer Vfenry pnzcrq
orsber gur zbhag.

19:3 Naq Zbfrf jrag hc hagb Tbq, naq gur YBEQ pnyyrq hagb uvz bhg bs
gur zbhagnva, fnlvat, Guhf funyg gubh fnl gb gur ubhfr bs Wnpbo, naq
gryy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry; 19:4 Lr unir frra jung V qvq hagb gur
Rtlcgvnaf, naq ubj V oner lbh ba rntyrf' jvatf, naq oebhtug lbh hagb
zlfrys.

19:5 Abj gurersber, vs lr jvyy borl zl ibvpr vaqrrq, naq xrrc zl
pbiranag, gura lr funyy or n crphyvne gernfher hagb zr nobir nyy
crbcyr: sbe nyy gur rnegu vf zvar: 19:6 Naq lr funyy or hagb zr n
xvatqbz bs cevrfgf, naq na ubyl angvba.

Gurfr ner gur jbeqf juvpu gubh funyg fcrnx hagb gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry.

19:7 Naq Zbfrf pnzr naq pnyyrq sbe gur ryqref bs gur crbcyr, naq ynvq
orsber gurve snprf nyy gurfr jbeqf juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq uvz.

19:8 Naq nyy gur crbcyr nafjrerq gbtrgure, naq fnvq, Nyy gung gur YBEQ
ungu fcbxra jr jvyy qb. Naq Zbfrf erghearq gur jbeqf bs gur crbcyr
hagb gur YBEQ.

19:9 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Yb, V pbzr hagb gurr va n guvpx
pybhq, gung gur crbcyr znl urne jura V fcrnx jvgu gurr, naq oryvrir
gurr sbe rire.

Naq Zbfrf gbyq gur jbeqf bs gur crbcyr hagb gur YBEQ.

19:10 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Tb hagb gur crbcyr, naq fnapgvsl
gurz gb qnl naq gb zbeebj, naq yrg gurz jnfu gurve pybgurf, 19:11 Naq
or ernql ntnvafg gur guveq qnl: sbe gur guveq qnl gur YBEQ jvyy pbzr
qbja va gur fvtug bs nyy gur crbcyr hcba zbhag Fvanv.

19:12 Naq gubh funyg frg obhaqf hagb gur crbcyr ebhaq nobhg, fnlvat,
Gnxr urrq gb lbhefryirf, gung lr tb abg hc vagb gur zbhag, be gbhpu
gur obeqre bs vg: jubfbrire gbhpurgu gur zbhag funyy or fheryl chg gb
qrngu: 19:13 Gurer funyy abg na unaq gbhpu vg, ohg ur funyy fheryl or
fgbarq, be fubg guebhtu; jurgure vg or ornfg be zna, vg funyy abg
yvir: jura gur gehzcrg fbhaqrgu ybat, gurl funyy pbzr hc gb gur zbhag.

19:14 Naq Zbfrf jrag qbja sebz gur zbhag hagb gur crbcyr, naq
fnapgvsvrq gur crbcyr; naq gurl jnfurq gurve pybgurf.

19:15 Naq ur fnvq hagb gur crbcyr, Or ernql ntnvafg gur guveq qnl:
pbzr abg ng lbhe jvirf.

19:16 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur guveq qnl va gur zbeavat, gung gurer
jrer guhaqref naq yvtugavatf, naq n guvpx pybhq hcba gur zbhag, naq
gur ibvpr bs gur gehzcrg rkprrqvat ybhq; fb gung nyy gur crbcyr gung
jnf va gur pnzc gerzoyrq.

19:17 Naq Zbfrf oebhtug sbegu gur crbcyr bhg bs gur pnzc gb zrrg jvgu
Tbq; naq gurl fgbbq ng gur argure cneg bs gur zbhag.

19:18 Naq zbhag Fvanv jnf nygbtrgure ba n fzbxr, orpnhfr gur YBEQ
qrfpraqrq hcba vg va sver: naq gur fzbxr gurerbs nfpraqrq nf gur fzbxr
bs n sheanpr, naq gur jubyr zbhag dhnxrq terngyl.

19:19 Naq jura gur ibvpr bs gur gehzcrg fbhaqrq ybat, naq jnkrq ybhqre
naq ybhqre, Zbfrf fcnxr, naq Tbq nafjrerq uvz ol n ibvpr.

19:20 Naq gur YBEQ pnzr qbja hcba zbhag Fvanv, ba gur gbc bs gur
zbhag: naq gur YBEQ pnyyrq Zbfrf hc gb gur gbc bs gur zbhag; naq Zbfrf
jrag hc.

19:21 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Tb qbja, punetr gur crbcyr, yrfg
gurl oernx guebhtu hagb gur YBEQ gb tnmr, naq znal bs gurz crevfu.

19:22 Naq yrg gur cevrfgf nyfb, juvpu pbzr arne gb gur YBEQ, fnapgvsl
gurzfryirf, yrfg gur YBEQ oernx sbegu hcba gurz.

19:23 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gur YBEQ, Gur crbcyr pnaabg pbzr hc gb zbhag
Fvanv: sbe gubh punetrqfg hf, fnlvat, Frg obhaqf nobhg gur zbhag, naq
fnapgvsl vg.

19:24 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, Njnl, trg gurr qbja, naq gubh funyg
pbzr hc, gubh, naq Nneba jvgu gurr: ohg yrg abg gur cevrfgf naq gur
crbcyr oernx guebhtu gb pbzr hc hagb gur YBEQ, yrfg ur oernx sbegu
hcba gurz.

19:25 Fb Zbfrf jrag qbja hagb gur crbcyr, naq fcnxr hagb gurz.

20:1 Naq Tbq fcnxr nyy gurfr jbeqf, fnlvat, 20:2 V nz gur YBEQ gul
Tbq, juvpu unir oebhtug gurr bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, bhg bs gur
ubhfr bs obaqntr.

20:3 Gubh funyg unir ab bgure tbqf orsber zr.

20:4 Gubh funyg abg znxr hagb gurr nal tenira vzntr, be nal yvxrarff
bs nal guvat gung vf va urnira nobir, be gung vf va gur rnegu orarngu,
be gung vf va gur jngre haqre gur rnegu.

20:5 Gubh funyg abg obj qbja gulfrys gb gurz, abe freir gurz: sbe V
gur YBEQ gul Tbq nz n wrnybhf Tbq, ivfvgvat gur vavdhvgl bs gur
snguref hcba gur puvyqera hagb gur guveq naq sbhegu trarengvba bs gurz
gung ungr zr; 20:6 Naq furjvat zrepl hagb gubhfnaqf bs gurz gung ybir
zr, naq xrrc zl pbzznaqzragf.

20:7 Gubh funyg abg gnxr gur anzr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq va inva; sbe gur
YBEQ jvyy abg ubyq uvz thvygyrff gung gnxrgu uvf anzr va inva.

20:8 Erzrzore gur fnoongu qnl, gb xrrc vg ubyl.

20:9 Fvk qnlf funyg gubh ynobhe, naq qb nyy gul jbex: 20:10 Ohg gur
friragu qnl vf gur fnoongu bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq: va vg gubh funyg abg
qb nal jbex, gubh, abe gul fba, abe gul qnhtugre, gul znafreinag, abe
gul znvqfreinag, abe gul pnggyr, abe gul fgenatre gung vf jvguva gul
tngrf: 20:11 Sbe va fvk qnlf gur YBEQ znqr urnira naq rnegu, gur frn,
naq nyy gung va gurz vf, naq erfgrq gur friragu qnl: jurersber gur
YBEQ oyrffrq gur fnoongu qnl, naq unyybjrq vg.

20:12 Ubabhe gul sngure naq gul zbgure: gung gul qnlf znl or ybat hcba
gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr.

20:13 Gubh funyg abg xvyy.

20:14 Gubh funyg abg pbzzvg nqhygrel.

20:15 Gubh funyg abg fgrny.

20:16 Gubh funyg abg orne snyfr jvgarff ntnvafg gul arvtuobhe.

20:17 Gubh funyg abg pbirg gul arvtuobhe'f ubhfr, gubh funyg abg pbirg
gul arvtuobhe'f jvsr, abe uvf znafreinag, abe uvf znvqfreinag, abe uvf
bk, abe uvf nff, abe nal guvat gung vf gul arvtuobhe'f.

20:18 Naq nyy gur crbcyr fnj gur guhaqrevatf, naq gur yvtugavatf, naq
gur abvfr bs gur gehzcrg, naq gur zbhagnva fzbxvat: naq jura gur
crbcyr fnj vg, gurl erzbirq, naq fgbbq nsne bss.

20:19 Naq gurl fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Fcrnx gubh jvgu hf, naq jr jvyy urne:
ohg yrg abg Tbq fcrnx jvgu hf, yrfg jr qvr.

20:20 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gur crbcyr, Srne abg: sbe Tbq vf pbzr gb
cebir lbh, naq gung uvf srne znl or orsber lbhe snprf, gung lr fva
abg.

20:21 Naq gur crbcyr fgbbq nsne bss, naq Zbfrf qerj arne hagb gur
guvpx qnexarff jurer Tbq jnf.

20:22 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Guhf gubh funyg fnl hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, Lr unir frra gung V unir gnyxrq jvgu lbh sebz
urnira.

20:23 Lr funyy abg znxr jvgu zr tbqf bs fvyire, arvgure funyy lr znxr
hagb lbh tbqf bs tbyq.

20:24 Na nygne bs rnegu gubh funyg znxr hagb zr, naq funyg fnpevsvpr
gurerba gul oheag bssrevatf, naq gul crnpr bssrevatf, gul furrc, naq
guvar bkra: va nyy cynprf jurer V erpbeq zl anzr V jvyy pbzr hagb
gurr, naq V jvyy oyrff gurr.

20:25 Naq vs gubh jvyg znxr zr na nygne bs fgbar, gubh funyg abg ohvyq
vg bs urja fgbar: sbe vs gubh yvsg hc gul gbby hcba vg, gubh unfg
cbyyhgrq vg.

20:26 Arvgure funyg gubh tb hc ol fgrcf hagb zvar nygne, gung gul
anxrqarff or abg qvfpbirerq gurerba.

21:1 Abj gurfr ner gur whqtzragf juvpu gubh funyg frg orsber gurz.

21:2 Vs gubh ohl na Uroerj freinag, fvk lrnef ur funyy freir: naq va
gur friragu ur funyy tb bhg serr sbe abguvat.

21:3 Vs ur pnzr va ol uvzfrys, ur funyy tb bhg ol uvzfrys: vs ur jrer
zneevrq, gura uvf jvsr funyy tb bhg jvgu uvz.

21:4 Vs uvf znfgre unir tvira uvz n jvsr, naq fur unir obea uvz fbaf
be qnhtugref; gur jvsr naq ure puvyqera funyy or ure znfgre'f, naq ur
funyy tb bhg ol uvzfrys.

21:5 Naq vs gur freinag funyy cynvayl fnl, V ybir zl znfgre, zl jvsr,
naq zl puvyqera; V jvyy abg tb bhg serr: 21:6 Gura uvf znfgre funyy
oevat uvz hagb gur whqtrf; ur funyy nyfb oevat uvz gb gur qbbe, be
hagb gur qbbe cbfg; naq uvf znfgre funyy ober uvf rne guebhtu jvgu na
nhy; naq ur funyy freir uvz sbe rire.

21:7 Naq vs n zna fryy uvf qnhtugre gb or n znvqfreinag, fur funyy abg
tb bhg nf gur zrafreinagf qb.

21:8 Vs fur cyrnfr abg ure znfgre, jub ungu orgebgurq ure gb uvzfrys,
gura funyy ur yrg ure or erqrrzrq: gb fryy ure hagb n fgenatr angvba
ur funyy unir ab cbjre, frrvat ur ungu qrnyg qrprvgshyyl jvgu ure.

21:9 Naq vs ur unir orgebgurq ure hagb uvf fba, ur funyy qrny jvgu ure
nsgre gur znaare bs qnhtugref.

21:10 Vs ur gnxr uvz nabgure jvsr; ure sbbq, ure envzrag, naq ure qhgl
bs zneevntr, funyy ur abg qvzvavfu.

21:11 Naq vs ur qb abg gurfr guerr hagb ure, gura funyy fur tb bhg
serr jvgubhg zbarl.

21:12 Ur gung fzvgrgu n zna, fb gung ur qvr, funyy or fheryl chg gb
qrngu.

21:13 Naq vs n zna yvr abg va jnvg, ohg Tbq qryvire uvz vagb uvf unaq;
gura V jvyy nccbvag gurr n cynpr juvgure ur funyy syrr.

21:14 Ohg vs n zna pbzr cerfhzcghbhfyl hcba uvf arvtuobhe, gb fynl uvz
jvgu thvyr; gubh funyg gnxr uvz sebz zvar nygne, gung ur znl qvr.

21:15 Naq ur gung fzvgrgu uvf sngure, be uvf zbgure, funyy or fheryl
chg gb qrngu.

21:16 Naq ur gung fgrnyrgu n zna, naq fryyrgu uvz, be vs ur or sbhaq
va uvf unaq, ur funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu.

21:17 Naq ur gung phefrgu uvf sngure, be uvf zbgure, funyy fheryl or
chg gb qrngu.

21:18 Naq vs zra fgevir gbtrgure, naq bar fzvgr nabgure jvgu n fgbar,
be jvgu uvf svfg, naq ur qvr abg, ohg xrrcrgu uvf orq: 21:19 Vs ur
evfr ntnva, naq jnyx noebnq hcba uvf fgnss, gura funyy ur gung fzbgr
uvz or dhvg: bayl ur funyy cnl sbe gur ybff bs uvf gvzr, naq funyy
pnhfr uvz gb or gubebhtuyl urnyrq.

21:20 Naq vs n zna fzvgr uvf freinag, be uvf znvq, jvgu n ebq, naq ur
qvr haqre uvf unaq; ur funyy or fheryl chavfurq.

21:21 Abgjvgufgnaqvat, vs ur pbagvahr n qnl be gjb, ur funyy abg or
chavfurq: sbe ur vf uvf zbarl.

21:22 Vs zra fgevir, naq uheg n jbzna jvgu puvyq, fb gung ure sehvg
qrcneg sebz ure, naq lrg ab zvfpuvrs sbyybj: ur funyy or fheryl
chavfurq, nppbeqvat nf gur jbzna'f uhfonaq jvyy ynl hcba uvz; naq ur
funyy cnl nf gur whqtrf qrgrezvar.

21:23 Naq vs nal zvfpuvrs sbyybj, gura gubh funyg tvir yvsr sbe yvsr,
21:24 Rlr sbe rlr, gbbgu sbe gbbgu, unaq sbe unaq, sbbg sbe sbbg,
21:25 Oheavat sbe oheavat, jbhaq sbe jbhaq, fgevcr sbe fgevcr.

21:26 Naq vs n zna fzvgr gur rlr bs uvf freinag, be gur rlr bs uvf
znvq, gung vg crevfu; ur funyy yrg uvz tb serr sbe uvf rlr'f fnxr.

21:27 Naq vs ur fzvgr bhg uvf znafreinag'f gbbgu, be uvf znvqfreinag'f
gbbgu; ur funyy yrg uvz tb serr sbe uvf gbbgu'f fnxr.

21:28 Vs na bk tber n zna be n jbzna, gung gurl qvr: gura gur bk funyy
or fheryl fgbarq, naq uvf syrfu funyy abg or rngra; ohg gur bjare bs
gur bk funyy or dhvg.

21:29 Ohg vs gur bk jrer jbag gb chfu jvgu uvf ubea va gvzr cnfg, naq
vg ungu orra grfgvsvrq gb uvf bjare, naq ur ungu abg xrcg uvz va, ohg
gung ur ungu xvyyrq n zna be n jbzna; gur bk funyy or fgbarq, naq uvf
bjare nyfb funyy or chg gb qrngu.

21:30 Vs gurer or ynvq ba uvz n fhz bs zbarl, gura ur funyy tvir sbe
gur enafbz bs uvf yvsr jungfbrire vf ynvq hcba uvz.

21:31 Jurgure ur unir tberq n fba, be unir tberq n qnhtugre, nppbeqvat
gb guvf whqtzrag funyy vg or qbar hagb uvz.

21:32 Vs gur bk funyy chfu n znafreinag be n znvqfreinag; ur funyy
tvir hagb gurve znfgre guvegl furxryf bs fvyire, naq gur bk funyy or
fgbarq.

21:33 Naq vs n zna funyy bcra n cvg, be vs n zna funyy qvt n cvg, naq
abg pbire vg, naq na bk be na nff snyy gurerva; 21:34 Gur bjare bs gur
cvg funyy znxr vg tbbq, naq tvir zbarl hagb gur bjare bs gurz; naq gur
qrnq ornfg funyy or uvf.

21:35 Naq vs bar zna'f bk uheg nabgure'f, gung ur qvr; gura gurl funyy
fryy gur yvir bk, naq qvivqr gur zbarl bs vg; naq gur qrnq bk nyfb
gurl funyy qvivqr.

21:36 Be vs vg or xabja gung gur bk ungu hfrq gb chfu va gvzr cnfg,
naq uvf bjare ungu abg xrcg uvz va; ur funyy fheryl cnl bk sbe bk; naq
gur qrnq funyy or uvf bja.

22:1 Vs n zna funyy fgrny na bk, be n furrc, naq xvyy vg, be fryy vg;
ur funyy erfgber svir bkra sbe na bk, naq sbhe furrc sbe n furrc.

22:2 Vs n guvrs or sbhaq oernxvat hc, naq or fzvggra gung ur qvr,
gurer funyy ab oybbq or furq sbe uvz.

22:3 Vs gur fha or evfra hcba uvz, gurer funyy or oybbq furq sbe uvz;
sbe ur fubhyq znxr shyy erfgvghgvba; vs ur unir abguvat, gura ur funyy
or fbyq sbe uvf gursg.

22:4 Vs gur gursg or pregnvayl sbhaq va uvf unaq nyvir, jurgure vg or
bk, be nff, be furrc; ur funyy erfgber qbhoyr.

22:5 Vs n zna funyy pnhfr n svryq be ivarlneq gb or rngra, naq funyy
chg va uvf ornfg, naq funyy srrq va nabgure zna'f svryq; bs gur orfg
bs uvf bja svryq, naq bs gur orfg bs uvf bja ivarlneq, funyy ur znxr
erfgvghgvba.

22:6 Vs sver oernx bhg, naq pngpu va gubeaf, fb gung gur fgnpxf bs
pbea, be gur fgnaqvat pbea, be gur svryq, or pbafhzrq gurerjvgu; ur
gung xvaqyrq gur sver funyy fheryl znxr erfgvghgvba.

22:7 Vs n zna funyy qryvire hagb uvf arvtuobhe zbarl be fghss gb xrrc,
naq vg or fgbyra bhg bs gur zna'f ubhfr; vs gur guvrs or sbhaq, yrg
uvz cnl qbhoyr.

22:8 Vs gur guvrs or abg sbhaq, gura gur znfgre bs gur ubhfr funyy or
oebhtug hagb gur whqtrf, gb frr jurgure ur unir chg uvf unaq hagb uvf
arvtuobhe'f tbbqf.

22:9 Sbe nyy znaare bs gerfcnff, jurgure vg or sbe bk, sbe nff, sbe
furrc, sbe envzrag, be sbe nal znaare bs ybfg guvat juvpu nabgure
punyyratrgu gb or uvf, gur pnhfr bs obgu cnegvrf funyy pbzr orsber gur
whqtrf; naq jubz gur whqtrf funyy pbaqrza, ur funyy cnl qbhoyr hagb
uvf arvtuobhe.

22:10 Vs n zna qryvire hagb uvf arvtuobhe na nff, be na bk, be n
furrc, be nal ornfg, gb xrrc; naq vg qvr, be or uheg, be qevira njnl,
ab zna frrvat vg: 22:11 Gura funyy na bngu bs gur YBEQ or orgjrra gurz
obgu, gung ur ungu abg chg uvf unaq hagb uvf arvtuobhe'f tbbqf; naq
gur bjare bs vg funyy npprcg gurerbs, naq ur funyy abg znxr vg tbbq.

22:12 Naq vs vg or fgbyra sebz uvz, ur funyy znxr erfgvghgvba hagb gur
bjare gurerbs.

22:13 Vs vg or gbea va cvrprf, gura yrg uvz oevat vg sbe jvgarff, naq
ur funyy abg znxr tbbq gung juvpu jnf gbea.

22:14 Naq vs n zna obeebj bhtug bs uvf arvtuobhe, naq vg or uheg, be
qvr, gur bjare gurerbs orvat abg jvgu vg, ur funyy fheryl znxr vg
tbbq.

22:15 Ohg vs gur bjare gurerbs or jvgu vg, ur funyy abg znxr vg tbbq:
vs vg or na uverq guvat, vg pnzr sbe uvf uver.

22:16 Naq vs n zna ragvpr n znvq gung vf abg orgebgurq, naq yvr jvgu
ure, ur funyy fheryl raqbj ure gb or uvf jvsr.

22:17 Vs ure sngure hggreyl ershfr gb tvir ure hagb uvz, ur funyy cnl
zbarl nppbeqvat gb gur qbjel bs ivetvaf.

22:18 Gubh funyg abg fhssre n jvgpu gb yvir.

22:19 Jubfbrire yvrgu jvgu n ornfg funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu.

22:20 Ur gung fnpevsvprgu hagb nal tbq, fnir hagb gur YBEQ bayl, ur
funyy or hggreyl qrfgeblrq.

22:21 Gubh funyg arvgure irk n fgenatre, abe bccerff uvz: sbe lr jrer
fgenatref va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

22:22 Lr funyy abg nssyvpg nal jvqbj, be sngureyrff puvyq.

22:23 Vs gubh nssyvpg gurz va nal jvfr, naq gurl pel ng nyy hagb zr, V
jvyy fheryl urne gurve pel; 22:24 Naq zl jengu funyy jnk ubg, naq V
jvyy xvyy lbh jvgu gur fjbeq; naq lbhe jvirf funyy or jvqbjf, naq lbhe
puvyqera sngureyrff.

22:25 Vs gubh yraq zbarl gb nal bs zl crbcyr gung vf cbbe ol gurr,
gubh funyg abg or gb uvz nf na hfhere, arvgure funyg gubh ynl hcba uvz
hfhel.

22:26 Vs gubh ng nyy gnxr gul arvtuobhe'f envzrag gb cyrqtr, gubh
funyg qryvire vg hagb uvz ol gung gur fha tbrgu qbja: 22:27 Sbe gung
vf uvf pbirevat bayl, vg vf uvf envzrag sbe uvf fxva: jurerva funyy ur
fyrrc? naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura ur pevrgu hagb zr, gung V jvyy
urne; sbe V nz tenpvbhf.

22:28 Gubh funyg abg erivyr gur tbqf, abe phefr gur ehyre bs gul
crbcyr.

22:29 Gubh funyg abg qrynl gb bssre gur svefg bs gul evcr sehvgf, naq
bs gul yvdhbef: gur svefgobea bs gul fbaf funyg gubh tvir hagb zr.

22:30 Yvxrjvfr funyg gubh qb jvgu guvar bkra, naq jvgu gul furrc:
frira qnlf vg funyy or jvgu uvf qnz; ba gur rvtugu qnl gubh funyg tvir
vg zr.

22:31 Naq lr funyy or ubyl zra hagb zr: arvgure funyy lr rng nal syrfu
gung vf gbea bs ornfgf va gur svryq; lr funyy pnfg vg gb gur qbtf.

23:1 Gubh funyg abg envfr n snyfr ercbeg: chg abg guvar unaq jvgu gur
jvpxrq gb or na haevtugrbhf jvgarff.

23:2 Gubh funyg abg sbyybj n zhygvghqr gb qb rivy; arvgure funyg gubh
fcrnx va n pnhfr gb qrpyvar nsgre znal gb jerfg whqtzrag: 23:3 Arvgure
funyg gubh pbhagranapr n cbbe zna va uvf pnhfr.

23:4 Vs gubh zrrg guvar rarzl'f bk be uvf nff tbvat nfgenl, gubh funyg
fheryl oevat vg onpx gb uvz ntnva.

23:5 Vs gubh frr gur nff bs uvz gung ungrgu gurr ylvat haqre uvf
oheqra, naq jbhyqrfg sbeorne gb uryc uvz, gubh funyg fheryl uryc jvgu
uvz.

23:6 Gubh funyg abg jerfg gur whqtzrag bs gul cbbe va uvf pnhfr.

23:7 Xrrc gurr sne sebz n snyfr znggre; naq gur vaabprag naq evtugrbhf
fynl gubh abg: sbe V jvyy abg whfgvsl gur jvpxrq.

23:8 Naq gubh funyg gnxr ab tvsg: sbe gur tvsg oyvaqrgu gur jvfr, naq
creiregrgu gur jbeqf bs gur evtugrbhf.

23:9 Nyfb gubh funyg abg bccerff n fgenatre: sbe lr xabj gur urneg bs
n fgenatre, frrvat lr jrer fgenatref va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

23:10 Naq fvk lrnef gubh funyg fbj gul ynaq, naq funyg tngure va gur
sehvgf gurerbs: 23:11 Ohg gur friragu lrne gubh funyg yrg vg erfg naq
yvr fgvyy; gung gur cbbe bs gul crbcyr znl rng: naq jung gurl yrnir
gur ornfgf bs gur svryq funyy rng. Va yvxr znaare gubh funyg qrny jvgu
gul ivarlneq, naq jvgu gul byvirlneq.

23:12 Fvk qnlf gubh funyg qb gul jbex, naq ba gur friragu qnl gubh
funyg erfg: gung guvar bk naq guvar nff znl erfg, naq gur fba bs gul
unaqznvq, naq gur fgenatre, znl or erserfurq.

23:13 Naq va nyy guvatf gung V unir fnvq hagb lbh or pvephzfcrpg: naq
znxr ab zragvba bs gur anzr bs bgure tbqf, arvgure yrg vg or urneq bhg
bs gul zbhgu.

23:14 Guerr gvzrf gubh funyg xrrc n srnfg hagb zr va gur lrne.

23:15 Gubh funyg xrrc gur srnfg bs hayrnirarq oernq: (gubh funyg rng
hayrnirarq oernq frira qnlf, nf V pbzznaqrq gurr, va gur gvzr
nccbvagrq bs gur zbagu Novo; sbe va vg gubh pnzrfg bhg sebz Rtlcg: naq
abar funyy nccrne orsber zr rzcgl:) 23:16 Naq gur srnfg bs uneirfg,
gur svefgsehvgf bs gul ynobhef, juvpu gubh unfg fbja va gur svryq: naq
gur srnfg bs vatngurevat, juvpu vf va gur raq bs gur lrne, jura gubh
unfg tngurerq va gul ynobhef bhg bs gur svryq.

23:17 Guerr vgrzf va gur lrne nyy gul znyrf funyy nccrne orsber gur
YBEQ Tbq.

23:18 Gubh funyg abg bssre gur oybbq bs zl fnpevsvpr jvgu yrnirarq
oernq; arvgure funyy gur sng bs zl fnpevsvpr erznva hagvy gur zbeavat.

23:19 Gur svefg bs gur svefgsehvgf bs gul ynaq gubh funyg oevat vagb
gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq. Gubh funyg abg frrgur n xvq va uvf
zbgure'f zvyx.

23:20 Orubyq, V fraq na Natry orsber gurr, gb xrrc gurr va gur jnl,
naq gb oevat gurr vagb gur cynpr juvpu V unir cercnerq.

23:21 Orjner bs uvz, naq borl uvf ibvpr, cebibxr uvz abg; sbe ur jvyy
abg cneqba lbhe genafterffvbaf: sbe zl anzr vf va uvz.

23:22 Ohg vs gubh funyg vaqrrq borl uvf ibvpr, naq qb nyy gung V
fcrnx; gura V jvyy or na rarzl hagb guvar rarzvrf, naq na nqirefnel
hagb guvar nqirefnevrf.

23:23 Sbe zvar Natry funyy tb orsber gurr, naq oevat gurr va hagb gur
Nzbevgrf, naq gur Uvggvgrf, naq gur Crevmmvgrf, naq gur Pnannavgrf,
gur Uvivgrf, naq gur Wrohfvgrf: naq V jvyy phg gurz bss.

23:24 Gubh funyg abg obj qbja gb gurve tbqf, abe freir gurz, abe qb
nsgre gurve jbexf: ohg gubh funyg hggreyl bireguebj gurz, naq dhvgr
oernx qbja gurve vzntrf.

23:25 Naq lr funyy freir gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, naq ur funyy oyrff gul
oernq, naq gul jngre; naq V jvyy gnxr fvpxarff njnl sebz gur zvqfg bs
gurr.

23:26 Gurer funyy abguvat pnfg gurve lbhat, abe or oneera, va gul
ynaq: gur ahzore bs gul qnlf V jvyy shysvy.

23:27 V jvyy fraq zl srne orsber gurr, naq jvyy qrfgebl nyy gur crbcyr
gb jubz gubh funyg pbzr, naq V jvyy znxr nyy guvar rarzvrf ghea gurve
onpxf hagb gurr.

23:28 Naq V jvyy fraq ubeargf orsber gurr, juvpu funyy qevir bhg gur
Uvivgr, gur Pnannavgr, naq gur Uvggvgr, sebz orsber gurr.

23:29 V jvyy abg qevir gurz bhg sebz orsber gurr va bar lrne; yrfg gur
ynaq orpbzr qrfbyngr, naq gur ornfg bs gur svryq zhygvcyl ntnvafg
gurr.

23:30 Ol yvggyr naq yvggyr V jvyy qevir gurz bhg sebz orsber gurr,
hagvy gubh or vapernfrq, naq vaurevg gur ynaq.

23:31 Naq V jvyy frg gul obhaqf sebz gur Erq frn rira hagb gur frn bs
gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq sebz gur qrfreg hagb gur evire: sbe V jvyy
qryvire gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq vagb lbhe unaq; naq gubh funyg
qevir gurz bhg orsber gurr.

23:32 Gubh funyg znxr ab pbiranag jvgu gurz, abe jvgu gurve tbqf.

23:33 Gurl funyy abg qjryy va gul ynaq, yrfg gurl znxr gurr fva
ntnvafg zr: sbe vs gubh freir gurve tbqf, vg jvyy fheryl or n faner
hagb gurr.

24:1 Naq ur fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Pbzr hc hagb gur YBEQ, gubh, naq Nneba,
Anqno, naq Novuh, naq friragl bs gur ryqref bs Vfenry; naq jbefuvc lr
nsne bss.

24:2 Naq Zbfrf nybar funyy pbzr arne gur YBEQ: ohg gurl funyy abg pbzr
avtu; arvgure funyy gur crbcyr tb hc jvgu uvz.

24:3 Naq Zbfrf pnzr naq gbyq gur crbcyr nyy gur jbeqf bs gur YBEQ, naq
nyy gur whqtzragf: naq nyy gur crbcyr nafjrerq jvgu bar ibvpr, naq
fnvq, Nyy gur jbeqf juvpu gur YBEQ ungu fnvq jvyy jr qb.

24:4 Naq Zbfrf jebgr nyy gur jbeqf bs gur YBEQ, naq ebfr hc rneyl va
gur zbeavat, naq ohvyqrq na nygne haqre gur uvyy, naq gjryir cvyynef,
nppbeqvat gb gur gjryir gevorf bs Vfenry.

24:5 Naq ur frag lbhat zra bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, juvpu bssrerq
oheag bssrevatf, naq fnpevsvprq crnpr bssrevatf bs bkra hagb gur YBEQ.

24:6 Naq Zbfrf gbbx unys bs gur oybbq, naq chg vg va onfbaf; naq unys
bs gur oybbq ur fcevaxyrq ba gur nygne.

24:7 Naq ur gbbx gur obbx bs gur pbiranag, naq ernq va gur nhqvrapr bs
gur crbcyr: naq gurl fnvq, Nyy gung gur YBEQ ungu fnvq jvyy jr qb, naq
or borqvrag.

24:8 Naq Zbfrf gbbx gur oybbq, naq fcevaxyrq vg ba gur crbcyr, naq
fnvq, Orubyq gur oybbq bs gur pbiranag, juvpu gur YBEQ ungu znqr jvgu
lbh pbapreavat nyy gurfr jbeqf.

24:9 Gura jrag hc Zbfrf, naq Nneba, Anqno, naq Novuh, naq friragl bs
gur ryqref bs Vfenry: 24:10 Naq gurl fnj gur Tbq bs Vfenry: naq gurer
jnf haqre uvf srrg nf vg jrer n cnirq jbex bs n fnccuver fgbar, naq nf
vg jrer gur obql bs urnira va uvf pyrnearff.

24:11 Naq hcba gur aboyrf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry ur ynvq abg uvf
unaq: nyfb gurl fnj Tbq, naq qvq rng naq qevax.

24:12 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Pbzr hc gb zr vagb gur zbhag, naq
or gurer: naq V jvyy tvir gurr gnoyrf bs fgbar, naq n ynj, naq
pbzznaqzragf juvpu V unir jevggra; gung gubh znlrfg grnpu gurz.

24:13 Naq Zbfrf ebfr hc, naq uvf zvavfgre Wbfuhn: naq Zbfrf jrag hc
vagb gur zbhag bs Tbq.

24:14 Naq ur fnvq hagb gur ryqref, Gneel lr urer sbe hf, hagvy jr pbzr
ntnva hagb lbh: naq, orubyq, Nneba naq Uhe ner jvgu lbh: vs nal zna
unir nal znggref gb qb, yrg uvz pbzr hagb gurz.

24:15 Naq Zbfrf jrag hc vagb gur zbhag, naq n pybhq pbirerq gur zbhag.

24:16 Naq gur tybel bs gur YBEQ nobqr hcba zbhag Fvanv, naq gur pybhq
pbirerq vg fvk qnlf: naq gur friragu qnl ur pnyyrq hagb Zbfrf bhg bs
gur zvqfg bs gur pybhq.

24:17 Naq gur fvtug bs gur tybel bs gur YBEQ jnf yvxr qribhevat sver
ba gur gbc bs gur zbhag va gur rlrf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

24:18 Naq Zbfrf jrag vagb gur zvqfg bs gur pybhq, naq tng uvz hc vagb
gur zbhag: naq Zbfrf jnf va gur zbhag sbegl qnlf naq sbegl avtugf.

25:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 25:2 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung gurl oevat zr na bssrevat: bs rirel zna gung
tvirgu vg jvyyvatyl jvgu uvf urneg lr funyy gnxr zl bssrevat.

25:3 Naq guvf vf gur bssrevat juvpu lr funyy gnxr bs gurz; tbyq, naq
fvyire, naq oenff, 25:4 Naq oyhr, naq checyr, naq fpneyrg, naq svar
yvara, naq tbngf' unve, 25:5 Naq enzf' fxvaf qlrq erq, naq onqtref'
fxvaf, naq fuvggvz jbbq, 25:6 Bvy sbe gur yvtug, fcvprf sbe nabvagvat
bvy, naq sbe fjrrg vaprafr, 25:7 Balk fgbarf, naq fgbarf gb or frg va
gur rcubq, naq va gur oernfgcyngr.

25:8 Naq yrg gurz znxr zr n fnapghnel; gung V znl qjryy nzbat gurz.

25:9 Nppbeqvat gb nyy gung V furj gurr, nsgre gur cnggrea bs gur
gnoreanpyr, naq gur cnggrea bs nyy gur vafgehzragf gurerbs, rira fb
funyy lr znxr vg.

25:10 Naq gurl funyy znxr na nex bs fuvggvz jbbq: gjb phovgf naq n
unys funyy or gur yratgu gurerbs, naq n phovg naq n unys gur oernqgu
gurerbs, naq n phovg naq n unys gur urvtug gurerbs.

25:11 Naq gubh funyg bireynl vg jvgu cher tbyq, jvguva naq jvgubhg
funyg gubh bireynl vg, naq funyg znxr hcba vg n pebja bs tbyq ebhaq
nobhg.

25:12 Naq gubh funyg pnfg sbhe evatf bs tbyq sbe vg, naq chg gurz va
gur sbhe pbearef gurerbs; naq gjb evatf funyy or va gur bar fvqr bs
vg, naq gjb evatf va gur bgure fvqr bs vg.

25:13 Naq gubh funyg znxr fgnirf bs fuvggvz jbbq, naq bireynl gurz
jvgu tbyq.

25:14 Naq gubh funyg chg gur fgnirf vagb gur evatf ol gur fvqrf bs gur
nex, gung gur nex znl or obear jvgu gurz.

25:15 Gur fgnirf funyy or va gur evatf bs gur nex: gurl funyy abg or
gnxra sebz vg.

25:16 Naq gubh funyg chg vagb gur nex gur grfgvzbal juvpu V funyy tvir
gurr.

25:17 Naq gubh funyg znxr n zrepl frng bs cher tbyq: gjb phovgf naq n
unys funyy or gur yratgu gurerbs, naq n phovg naq n unys gur oernqgu
gurerbs.

25:18 Naq gubh funyg znxr gjb purehovzf bs tbyq, bs orngra jbex funyg
gubh znxr gurz, va gur gjb raqf bs gur zrepl frng.

25:19 Naq znxr bar pureho ba gur bar raq, naq gur bgure pureho ba gur
bgure raq: rira bs gur zrepl frng funyy lr znxr gur purehovzf ba gur
gjb raqf gurerbs.

25:20 Naq gur purehovzf funyy fgergpu sbegu gurve jvatf ba uvtu,
pbirevat gur zrepl frng jvgu gurve jvatf, naq gurve snprf funyy ybbx
bar gb nabgure; gbjneq gur zrepl frng funyy gur snprf bs gur purehovzf
or.

25:21 Naq gubh funyg chg gur zrepl frng nobir hcba gur nex; naq va gur
nex gubh funyg chg gur grfgvzbal gung V funyy tvir gurr.

25:22 Naq gurer V jvyy zrrg jvgu gurr, naq V jvyy pbzzhar jvgu gurr
sebz nobir gur zrepl frng, sebz orgjrra gur gjb purehovzf juvpu ner
hcba gur nex bs gur grfgvzbal, bs nyy guvatf juvpu V jvyy tvir gurr va
pbzznaqzrag hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

25:23 Gubh funyg nyfb znxr n gnoyr bs fuvggvz jbbq: gjb phovgf funyy
or gur yratgu gurerbs, naq n phovg gur oernqgu gurerbs, naq n phovg
naq n unys gur urvtug gurerbs.

25:24 Naq gubh funyg bireynl vg jvgu cher tbyq, naq znxr gurergb n
pebja bs tbyq ebhaq nobhg.

25:25 Naq gubh funyg znxr hagb vg n obeqre bs na unaq oernqgu ebhaq
nobhg, naq gubh funyg znxr n tbyqra pebja gb gur obeqre gurerbs ebhaq
nobhg.

25:26 Naq gubh funyg znxr sbe vg sbhe evatf bs tbyq, naq chg gur evatf
va gur sbhe pbearef gung ner ba gur sbhe srrg gurerbs.

25:27 Bire ntnvafg gur obeqre funyy gur evatf or sbe cynprf bs gur
fgnirf gb orne gur gnoyr.

25:28 Naq gubh funyg znxr gur fgnirf bs fuvggvz jbbq, naq bireynl gurz
jvgu tbyq, gung gur gnoyr znl or obear jvgu gurz.

25:29 Naq gubh funyg znxr gur qvfurf gurerbs, naq fcbbaf gurerbs, naq
pbiref gurerbs, naq objyf gurerbs, gb pbire jvguny: bs cher tbyq funyg
gubh znxr gurz.

25:30 Naq gubh funyg frg hcba gur gnoyr furjoernq orsber zr nyjnl.

25:31 Naq gubh funyg znxr n pnaqyrfgvpx bs cher tbyq: bs orngra jbex
funyy gur pnaqyrfgvpx or znqr: uvf funsg, naq uvf oenapurf, uvf objyf,
uvf xabcf, naq uvf sybjref, funyy or bs gur fnzr.

25:32 Naq fvk oenapurf funyy pbzr bhg bs gur fvqrf bs vg; guerr
oenapurf bs gur pnaqyrfgvpx bhg bs gur bar fvqr, naq guerr oenapurf bs
gur pnaqyrfgvpx bhg bs gur bgure fvqr: 25:33 Guerr objyf znqr yvxr
hagb nyzbaqf, jvgu n xabc naq n sybjre va bar oenapu; naq guerr objyf
znqr yvxr nyzbaqf va gur bgure oenapu, jvgu n xabc naq n sybjre: fb va
gur fvk oenapurf gung pbzr bhg bs gur pnaqyrfgvpx.

25:34 Naq va gur pnaqyrfgvpxf funyy or sbhe objyf znqr yvxr hagb
nyzbaqf, jvgu gurve xabcf naq gurve sybjref.

25:35 Naq gurer funyy or n xabc haqre gjb oenapurf bs gur fnzr, naq n
xabc haqre gjb oenapurf bs gur fnzr, naq n xabc haqre gjb oenapurf bs
gur fnzr, nppbeqvat gb gur fvk oenapurf gung cebprrq bhg bs gur
pnaqyrfgvpx.

25:36 Gurve xabcf naq gurve oenapurf funyy or bs gur fnzr: nyy vg
funyy or bar orngra jbex bs cher tbyq.

25:37 Naq gubh funyg znxr gur frira ynzcf gurerbs: naq gurl funyy
yvtug gur ynzcf gurerbs, gung gurl znl tvir yvtug bire ntnvafg vg.

25:38 Naq gur gbatf gurerbs, naq gur fahssqvfurf gurerbs, funyy or bs
cher tbyq.

25:39 Bs n gnyrag bs cher tbyq funyy ur znxr vg, jvgu nyy gurfr
irffryf.

25:40 Naq ybbx gung gubh znxr gurz nsgre gurve cnggrea, juvpu jnf
furjrq gurr va gur zbhag.

26:1 Zberbire gubh funyg znxr gur gnoreanpyr jvgu gra phegnvaf bs svar
gjvarq yvara, naq oyhr, naq checyr, naq fpneyrg: jvgu purehovzf bs
phaavat jbex funyg gubh znxr gurz.

26:2 Gur yratgu bs bar phegnva funyy or rvtug naq gjragl phovgf, naq
gur oernqgu bs bar phegnva sbhe phovgf: naq rirel bar bs gur phegnvaf
funyy unir bar zrnfher.

26:3 Gur svir phegnvaf funyy or pbhcyrq gbtrgure bar gb nabgure; naq
bgure svir phegnvaf funyy or pbhcyrq bar gb nabgure.

26:4 Naq gubh funyg znxr ybbcf bs oyhr hcba gur rqtr bs gur bar
phegnva sebz gur fryirqtr va gur pbhcyvat; naq yvxrjvfr funyg gubh
znxr va gur hggrezbfg rqtr bs nabgure phegnva, va gur pbhcyvat bs gur
frpbaq.

26:5 Svsgl ybbcf funyg gubh znxr va gur bar phegnva, naq svsgl ybbcf
funyg gubh znxr va gur rqtr bs gur phegnva gung vf va gur pbhcyvat bs
gur frpbaq; gung gur ybbcf znl gnxr ubyq bar bs nabgure.

26:6 Naq gubh funyg znxr svsgl gnpurf bs tbyq, naq pbhcyr gur phegnvaf
gbtrgure jvgu gur gnpurf: naq vg funyy or bar gnoreanpyr.

26:7 Naq gubh funyg znxr phegnvaf bs tbngf' unve gb or n pbirevat hcba
gur gnoreanpyr: ryrira phegnvaf funyg gubh znxr.

26:8 Gur yratgu bs bar phegnva funyy or guvegl phovgf, naq gur oernqgu
bs bar phegnva sbhe phovgf: naq gur ryrira phegnvaf funyy or nyy bs
bar zrnfher.

26:9 Naq gubh funyg pbhcyr svir phegnvaf ol gurzfryirf, naq fvk
phegnvaf ol gurzfryirf, naq funyg qbhoyr gur fvkgu phegnva va gur
sbersebag bs gur gnoreanpyr.

26:10 Naq gubh funyg znxr svsgl ybbcf ba gur rqtr bs gur bar phegnva
gung vf bhgzbfg va gur pbhcyvat, naq svsgl ybbcf va gur rqtr bs gur
phegnva juvpu pbhcyrgu gur frpbaq.

26:11 Naq gubh funyg znxr svsgl gnpurf bs oenff, naq chg gur gnpurf
vagb gur ybbcf, naq pbhcyr gur grag gbtrgure, gung vg znl or bar.

26:12 Naq gur erzanag gung erznvargu bs gur phegnvaf bs gur grag, gur
unys phegnva gung erznvargu, funyy unat bire gur onpxfvqr bs gur
gnoreanpyr.

26:13 Naq n phovg ba gur bar fvqr, naq n phovg ba gur bgure fvqr bs
gung juvpu erznvargu va gur yratgu bs gur phegnvaf bs gur grag, vg
funyy unat bire gur fvqrf bs gur gnoreanpyr ba guvf fvqr naq ba gung
fvqr, gb pbire vg.

26:14 Naq gubh funyg znxr n pbirevat sbe gur grag bs enzf' fxvaf qlrq
erq, naq n pbirevat nobir bs onqtref' fxvaf.

26:15 Naq gubh funyg znxr obneqf sbe gur gnoreanpyr bs fuvggvz jbbq
fgnaqvat hc.

26:16 Gra phovgf funyy or gur yratgu bs n obneq, naq n phovg naq n
unys funyy or gur oernqgu bs bar obneq.

26:17 Gjb grabaf funyy gurer or va bar obneq, frg va beqre bar ntnvafg
nabgure: guhf funyg gubh znxr sbe nyy gur obneqf bs gur gnoreanpyr.

26:18 Naq gubh funyg znxr gur obneqf sbe gur gnoreanpyr, gjragl obneqf
ba gur fbhgu fvqr fbhgujneq.

26:19 Naq gubh funyg znxr sbegl fbpxrgf bs fvyire haqre gur gjragl
obneqf; gjb fbpxrgf haqre bar obneq sbe uvf gjb grabaf, naq gjb
fbpxrgf haqre nabgure obneq sbe uvf gjb grabaf.
