26:20 Naq sbe gur frpbaq fvqr bs gur gnoreanpyr ba gur abegu fvqr
gurer funyy or gjragl obneqf: 26:21 Naq gurve sbegl fbpxrgf bs fvyire;
gjb fbpxrgf haqre bar obneq, naq gjb fbpxrgf haqre nabgure obneq.

26:22 Naq sbe gur fvqrf bs gur gnoreanpyr jrfgjneq gubh funyg znxr fvk
obneqf.

26:23 Naq gjb obneqf funyg gubh znxr sbe gur pbearef bs gur gnoreanpyr
va gur gjb fvqrf.

26:24 Naq gurl funyy or pbhcyrq gbtrgure orarngu, naq gurl funyy or
pbhcyrq gbtrgure nobir gur urnq bs vg hagb bar evat: guhf funyy vg or
sbe gurz obgu; gurl funyy or sbe gur gjb pbearef.

26:25 Naq gurl funyy or rvtug obneqf, naq gurve fbpxrgf bs fvyire,
fvkgrra fbpxrgf; gjb fbpxrgf haqre bar obneq, naq gjb fbpxrgf haqre
nabgure obneq.

26:26 Naq gubh funyg znxr onef bs fuvggvz jbbq; svir sbe gur obneqf bs
gur bar fvqr bs gur gnoreanpyr, 26:27 Naq svir onef sbe gur obneqf bs
gur bgure fvqr bs gur gnoreanpyr, naq svir onef sbe gur obneqf bs gur
fvqr bs gur gnoreanpyr, sbe gur gjb fvqrf jrfgjneq.

26:28 Naq gur zvqqyr one va gur zvqfg bs gur obneqf funyy ernpu sebz
raq gb raq.

26:29 Naq gubh funyg bireynl gur obneqf jvgu tbyq, naq znxr gurve
evatf bs tbyq sbe cynprf sbe gur onef: naq gubh funyg bireynl gur onef
jvgu tbyq.

26:30 Naq gubh funyg erne hc gur gnoreanpyr nppbeqvat gb gur snfuvba
gurerbs juvpu jnf furjrq gurr va gur zbhag.

26:31 Naq gubh funyg znxr n invy bs oyhr, naq checyr, naq fpneyrg, naq
svar gjvarq yvara bs phaavat jbex: jvgu purehovzf funyy vg or znqr:
26:32 Naq gubh funyg unat vg hcba sbhe cvyynef bs fuvggvz jbbq
bireynvq jvgu tbyq: gurve ubbxf funyy or bs tbyq, hcba gur sbhe
fbpxrgf bs fvyire.

26:33 Naq gubh funyg unat hc gur invy haqre gur gnpurf, gung gubh
znlrfg oevat va guvgure jvguva gur invy gur nex bs gur grfgvzbal: naq
gur invy funyy qvivqr hagb lbh orgjrra gur ubyl cynpr naq gur zbfg
ubyl.

26:34 Naq gubh funyg chg gur zrepl frng hcba gur nex bs gur grfgvzbal
va gur zbfg ubyl cynpr.

26:35 Naq gubh funyg frg gur gnoyr jvgubhg gur invy, naq gur
pnaqyrfgvpx bire ntnvafg gur gnoyr ba gur fvqr bs gur gnoreanpyr
gbjneq gur fbhgu: naq gubh funyg chg gur gnoyr ba gur abegu fvqr.

26:36 Naq gubh funyg znxr na unatvat sbe gur qbbe bs gur grag, bs
oyhr, naq checyr, naq fpneyrg, naq svar gjvarq yvara, jebhtug jvgu
arrqyrjbex.

26:37 Naq gubh funyg znxr sbe gur unatvat svir cvyynef bs fuvggvz
jbbq, naq bireynl gurz jvgu tbyq, naq gurve ubbxf funyy or bs tbyq:
naq gubh funyg pnfg svir fbpxrgf bs oenff sbe gurz.

27:1 Naq gubh funyg znxr na nygne bs fuvggvz jbbq, svir phovgf ybat,
naq svir phovgf oebnq; gur nygne funyy or sbhefdhner: naq gur urvtug
gurerbs funyy or guerr phovgf.

27:2 Naq gubh funyg znxr gur ubeaf bs vg hcba gur sbhe pbearef
gurerbs: uvf ubeaf funyy or bs gur fnzr: naq gubh funyg bireynl vg
jvgu oenff.

27:3 Naq gubh funyg znxr uvf cnaf gb erprvir uvf nfurf, naq uvf
fubiryf, naq uvf onfbaf, naq uvf syrfuubbxf, naq uvf svercnaf: nyy gur
irffryf gurerbs gubh funyg znxr bs oenff.

27:4 Naq gubh funyg znxr sbe vg n tengr bs argjbex bs oenff; naq hcba
gur arg funyg gubh znxr sbhe oenfra evatf va gur sbhe pbearef gurerbs.

27:5 Naq gubh funyg chg vg haqre gur pbzcnff bs gur nygne orarngu,
gung gur arg znl or rira gb gur zvqfg bs gur nygne.

27:6 Naq gubh funyg znxr fgnirf sbe gur nygne, fgnirf bs fuvggvz jbbq,
naq bireynl gurz jvgu oenff.

27:7 Naq gur fgnirf funyy or chg vagb gur evatf, naq gur fgnirf funyy
or hcba gur gjb fvqrf bs gur nygne, gb orne vg.

27:8 Ubyybj jvgu obneqf funyg gubh znxr vg: nf vg jnf furjrq gurr va
gur zbhag, fb funyy gurl znxr vg.

27:9 Naq gubh funyg znxr gur pbheg bs gur gnoreanpyr: sbe gur fbhgu
fvqr fbhgujneq gurer funyy or unatvatf sbe gur pbheg bs svar gjvarq
yvara bs na uhaqerq phovgf ybat sbe bar fvqr: 27:10 Naq gur gjragl
cvyynef gurerbs naq gurve gjragl fbpxrgf funyy or bs oenff; gur ubbxf
bs gur cvyynef naq gurve svyyrgf funyy or bs fvyire.

27:11 Naq yvxrjvfr sbe gur abegu fvqr va yratgu gurer funyy or
unatvatf bs na uhaqerq phovgf ybat, naq uvf gjragl cvyynef naq gurve
gjragl fbpxrgf bs oenff; gur ubbxf bs gur cvyynef naq gurve svyyrgf bs
fvyire.

27:12 Naq sbe gur oernqgu bs gur pbheg ba gur jrfg fvqr funyy or
unatvatf bs svsgl phovgf: gurve cvyynef gra, naq gurve fbpxrgf gra.

27:13 Naq gur oernqgu bs gur pbheg ba gur rnfg fvqr rnfgjneq funyy or
svsgl phovgf.

27:14 Gur unatvatf bs bar fvqr bs gur tngr funyy or svsgrra phovgf:
gurve cvyynef guerr, naq gurve fbpxrgf guerr.

27:15 Naq ba gur bgure fvqr funyy or unatvatf svsgrra phovgf: gurve
cvyynef guerr, naq gurve fbpxrgf guerr.

27:16 Naq sbe gur tngr bs gur pbheg funyy or na unatvat bs gjragl
phovgf, bs oyhr, naq checyr, naq fpneyrg, naq svar gjvarq yvara,
jebhtug jvgu arrqyrjbex: naq gurve cvyynef funyy or sbhe, naq gurve
fbpxrgf sbhe.

27:17 Nyy gur cvyynef ebhaq nobhg gur pbheg funyy or svyyrgrq jvgu
fvyire; gurve ubbxf funyy or bs fvyire, naq gurve fbpxrgf bs oenff.

27:18 Gur yratgu bs gur pbheg funyy or na uhaqerq phovgf, naq gur
oernqgu svsgl rirel jurer, naq gur urvtug svir phovgf bs svar gjvarq
yvara, naq gurve fbpxrgf bs oenff.

27:19 Nyy gur irffryf bs gur gnoreanpyr va nyy gur freivpr gurerbs,
naq nyy gur cvaf gurerbs, naq nyy gur cvaf bs gur pbheg, funyy or bs
oenff.

27:20 Naq gubh funyg pbzznaq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung gurl oevat
gurr cher bvy byvir orngra sbe gur yvtug, gb pnhfr gur ynzc gb ohea
nyjnlf.

27:21 Va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba jvgubhg gur invy, juvpu vf
orsber gur grfgvzbal, Nneba naq uvf fbaf funyy beqre vg sebz riravat
gb zbeavat orsber gur YBEQ: vg funyy or n fgnghgr sbe rire hagb gurve
trarengvbaf ba gur orunys bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

28:1 Naq gnxr gubh hagb gurr Nneba gul oebgure, naq uvf fbaf jvgu uvz,
sebz nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung ur znl zvavfgre hagb zr va gur
cevrfg'f bssvpr, rira Nneba, Anqno naq Novuh, Ryrnmne naq Vgunzne,
Nneba'f fbaf.

28:2 Naq gubh funyg znxr ubyl tnezragf sbe Nneba gul oebgure sbe tybel
naq sbe ornhgl.

28:3 Naq gubh funyg fcrnx hagb nyy gung ner jvfr urnegrq, jubz V unir
svyyrq jvgu gur fcvevg bs jvfqbz, gung gurl znl znxr Nneba'f tnezragf
gb pbafrpengr uvz, gung ur znl zvavfgre hagb zr va gur cevrfg'f
bssvpr.

28:4 Naq gurfr ner gur tnezragf juvpu gurl funyy znxr; n oernfgcyngr,
naq na rcubq, naq n ebor, naq n oebvqrerq pbng, n zvger, naq n tveqyr:
naq gurl funyy znxr ubyl tnezragf sbe Nneba gul oebgure, naq uvf fbaf,
gung ur znl zvavfgre hagb zr va gur cevrfg'f bssvpr.

28:5 Naq gurl funyy gnxr tbyq, naq oyhr, naq checyr, naq fpneyrg, naq
svar yvara.

28:6 Naq gurl funyy znxr gur rcubq bs tbyq, bs oyhr, naq bs checyr, bs
fpneyrg, naq svar gjvarq yvara, jvgu phaavat jbex.

28:7 Vg funyy unir gur gjb fubhyqrecvrprf gurerbs wbvarq ng gur gjb
rqtrf gurerbs; naq fb vg funyy or wbvarq gbtrgure.

28:8 Naq gur phevbhf tveqyr bs gur rcubq, juvpu vf hcba vg, funyy or
bs gur fnzr, nppbeqvat gb gur jbex gurerbs; rira bs tbyq, bs oyhr, naq
checyr, naq fpneyrg, naq svar gjvarq yvara.

28:9 Naq gubh funyg gnxr gjb balk fgbarf, naq tenir ba gurz gur anzrf
bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: 28:10 Fvk bs gurve anzrf ba bar fgbar, naq
gur bgure fvk anzrf bs gur erfg ba gur bgure fgbar, nppbeqvat gb gurve
ovegu.

28:11 Jvgu gur jbex bs na ratenire va fgbar, yvxr gur ratenivatf bs n
fvtarg, funyg gubh ratenir gur gjb fgbarf jvgu gur anzrf bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry: gubh funyg znxr gurz gb or frg va bhpurf bs tbyq.

28:12 Naq gubh funyg chg gur gjb fgbarf hcba gur fubhyqref bs gur
rcubq sbe fgbarf bs zrzbevny hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: naq Nneba
funyy orne gurve anzrf orsber gur YBEQ hcba uvf gjb fubhyqref sbe n
zrzbevny.

28:13 Naq gubh funyg znxr bhpurf bs tbyq; 28:14 Naq gjb punvaf bs cher
tbyq ng gur raqf; bs jerngura jbex funyg gubh znxr gurz, naq snfgra
gur jerngura punvaf gb gur bhpurf.

28:15 Naq gubh funyg znxr gur oernfgcyngr bs whqtzrag jvgu phaavat
jbex; nsgre gur jbex bs gur rcubq gubh funyg znxr vg; bs tbyq, bs
oyhr, naq bs checyr, naq bs fpneyrg, naq bs svar gjvarq yvara, funyg
gubh znxr vg.

28:16 Sbhefdhner vg funyy or orvat qbhoyrq; n fcna funyy or gur yratgu
gurerbs, naq n fcna funyy or gur oernqgu gurerbs.

28:17 Naq gubh funyg frg va vg frggvatf bs fgbarf, rira sbhe ebjf bs
fgbarf: gur svefg ebj funyy or n fneqvhf, n gbcnm, naq n pneohapyr:
guvf funyy or gur svefg ebj.

28:18 Naq gur frpbaq ebj funyy or na rzrenyq, n fnccuver, naq n
qvnzbaq.

28:19 Naq gur guveq ebj n yvther, na ntngr, naq na nzrgulfg.

28:20 Naq gur sbhegu ebj n orely, naq na balk, naq n wnfcre: gurl
funyy or frg va tbyq va gurve vapybfvatf.

28:21 Naq gur fgbarf funyy or jvgu gur anzrf bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, gjryir, nppbeqvat gb gurve anzrf, yvxr gur ratenivatf bs n
fvtarg; rirel bar jvgu uvf anzr funyy gurl or nppbeqvat gb gur gjryir
gevorf.

28:22 Naq gubh funyg znxr hcba gur oernfgcyngr punvaf ng gur raqf bs
jerngura jbex bs cher tbyq.

28:23 Naq gubh funyg znxr hcba gur oernfgcyngr gjb evatf bs tbyq, naq
funyg chg gur gjb evatf ba gur gjb raqf bs gur oernfgcyngr.

28:24 Naq gubh funyg chg gur gjb jerngura punvaf bs tbyq va gur gjb
evatf juvpu ner ba gur raqf bs gur oernfgcyngr.

28:25 Naq gur bgure gjb raqf bs gur gjb jerngura punvaf gubh funyg
snfgra va gur gjb bhpurf, naq chg gurz ba gur fubhyqrecvrprf bs gur
rcubq orsber vg.

28:26 Naq gubh funyg znxr gjb evatf bs tbyq, naq gubh funyg chg gurz
hcba gur gjb raqf bs gur oernfgcyngr va gur obeqre gurerbs, juvpu vf
va gur fvqr bs gur rcubq vajneq.

28:27 Naq gjb bgure evatf bs tbyq gubh funyg znxr, naq funyg chg gurz
ba gur gjb fvqrf bs gur rcubq haqrearngu, gbjneq gur sbercneg gurerbs,
bire ntnvafg gur bgure pbhcyvat gurerbs, nobir gur phevbhf tveqyr bs
gur rcubq.

28:28 Naq gurl funyy ovaq gur oernfgcyngr ol gur evatf gurerbs hagb
gur evatf bs gur rcubq jvgu n ynpr bs oyhr, gung vg znl or nobir gur
phevbhf tveqyr bs gur rcubq, naq gung gur oernfgcyngr or abg ybbfrq
sebz gur rcubq.

28:29 Naq Nneba funyy orne gur anzrf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry va gur
oernfgcyngr bs whqtzrag hcba uvf urneg, jura ur tbrgu va hagb gur ubyl
cynpr, sbe n zrzbevny orsber gur YBEQ pbagvahnyyl.

28:30 Naq gubh funyg chg va gur oernfgcyngr bs whqtzrag gur Hevz naq
gur Guhzzvz; naq gurl funyy or hcba Nneba'f urneg, jura ur tbrgu va
orsber gur YBEQ: naq Nneba funyy orne gur whqtzrag bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry hcba uvf urneg orsber gur YBEQ pbagvahnyyl.

28:31 Naq gubh funyg znxr gur ebor bs gur rcubq nyy bs oyhr.

28:32 Naq gurer funyy or na ubyr va gur gbc bs vg, va gur zvqfg
gurerbs: vg funyy unir n ovaqvat bs jbira jbex ebhaq nobhg gur ubyr bs
vg, nf vg jrer gur ubyr bs na unoretrba, gung vg or abg erag.

28:33 Naq orarngu hcba gur urz bs vg gubh funyg znxr cbzrtenangrf bs
oyhr, naq bs checyr, naq bs fpneyrg, ebhaq nobhg gur urz gurerbs; naq
oryyf bs tbyq orgjrra gurz ebhaq nobhg: 28:34 N tbyqra oryy naq n
cbzrtenangr, n tbyqra oryy naq n cbzrtenangr, hcba gur urz bs gur ebor
ebhaq nobhg.

28:35 Naq vg funyy or hcba Nneba gb zvavfgre: naq uvf fbhaq funyy or
urneq jura ur tbrgu va hagb gur ubyl cynpr orsber gur YBEQ, naq jura
ur pbzrgu bhg, gung ur qvr abg.

28:36 Naq gubh funyg znxr n cyngr bs cher tbyq, naq tenir hcba vg,
yvxr gur ratenivatf bs n fvtarg, UBYVARFF GB GUR YBEQ.

28:37 Naq gubh funyg chg vg ba n oyhr ynpr, gung vg znl or hcba gur
zvger; hcba gur sbersebag bs gur zvger vg funyy or.

28:38 Naq vg funyy or hcba Nneba'f sberurnq, gung Nneba znl orne gur
vavdhvgl bs gur ubyl guvatf, juvpu gur puvyqera bs Vfenry funyy unyybj
va nyy gurve ubyl tvsgf; naq vg funyy or nyjnlf hcba uvf sberurnq,
gung gurl znl or npprcgrq orsber gur YBEQ.

28:39 Naq gubh funyg rzoebvqre gur pbng bs svar yvara, naq gubh funyg
znxr gur zvger bs svar yvara, naq gubh funyg znxr gur tveqyr bs
arrqyrjbex.

28:40 Naq sbe Nneba'f fbaf gubh funyg znxr pbngf, naq gubh funyg znxr
sbe gurz tveqyrf, naq obaargf funyg gubh znxr sbe gurz, sbe tybel naq
sbe ornhgl.

28:41 Naq gubh funyg chg gurz hcba Nneba gul oebgure, naq uvf fbaf
jvgu uvz; naq funyg nabvag gurz, naq pbafrpengr gurz, naq fnapgvsl
gurz, gung gurl znl zvavfgre hagb zr va gur cevrfg'f bssvpr.

28:42 Naq gubh funyg znxr gurz yvara oerrpurf gb pbire gurve
anxrqarff; sebz gur ybvaf rira hagb gur guvtuf gurl funyy ernpu: 28:43
Naq gurl funyy or hcba Nneba, naq hcba uvf fbaf, jura gurl pbzr va
hagb gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, be jura gurl pbzr arne hagb
gur nygne gb zvavfgre va gur ubyl cynpr; gung gurl orne abg vavdhvgl,
naq qvr: vg funyy or n fgnghgr sbe rire hagb uvz naq uvf frrq nsgre
uvz.

29:1 Naq guvf vf gur guvat gung gubh funyg qb hagb gurz gb unyybj
gurz, gb zvavfgre hagb zr va gur cevrfg'f bssvpr: Gnxr bar lbhat
ohyybpx, naq gjb enzf jvgubhg oyrzvfu, 29:2 Naq hayrnirarq oernq, naq
pnxrf hayrnirarq grzcrerq jvgu bvy, naq jnsref hayrnirarq nabvagrq
jvgu bvy: bs jurngra sybhe funyg gubh znxr gurz.

29:3 Naq gubh funyg chg gurz vagb bar onfxrg, naq oevat gurz va gur
onfxrg, jvgu gur ohyybpx naq gur gjb enzf.

29:4 Naq Nneba naq uvf fbaf gubh funyg oevat hagb gur qbbe bs gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, naq funyg jnfu gurz jvgu jngre.

29:5 Naq gubh funyg gnxr gur tnezragf, naq chg hcba Nneba gur pbng,
naq gur ebor bs gur rcubq, naq gur rcubq, naq gur oernfgcyngr, naq
tveq uvz jvgu gur phevbhf tveqyr bs gur rcubq: 29:6 Naq gubh funyg chg
gur zvger hcba uvf urnq, naq chg gur ubyl pebja hcba gur zvger.

29:7 Gura funyg gubh gnxr gur nabvagvat bvy, naq cbhe vg hcba uvf
urnq, naq nabvag uvz.

29:8 Naq gubh funyg oevat uvf fbaf, naq chg pbngf hcba gurz.

29:9 Naq gubh funyg tveq gurz jvgu tveqyrf, Nneba naq uvf fbaf, naq
chg gur obaargf ba gurz: naq gur cevrfg'f bssvpr funyy or gurvef sbe n
crecrghny fgnghgr: naq gubh funyg pbafrpengr Nneba naq uvf fbaf.

29:10 Naq gubh funyg pnhfr n ohyybpx gb or oebhtug orsber gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba: naq Nneba naq uvf fbaf funyy chg gurve
unaqf hcba gur urnq bs gur ohyybpx.

29:11 Naq gubh funyg xvyy gur ohyybpx orsber gur YBEQ, ol gur qbbe bs
gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

29:12 Naq gubh funyg gnxr bs gur oybbq bs gur ohyybpx, naq chg vg hcba
gur ubeaf bs gur nygne jvgu gul svatre, naq cbhe nyy gur oybbq orfvqr
gur obggbz bs gur nygne.

29:13 Naq gubh funyg gnxr nyy gur sng gung pbirergu gur vajneqf, naq
gur pnhy gung vf nobir gur yvire, naq gur gjb xvqarlf, naq gur sng
gung vf hcba gurz, naq ohea gurz hcba gur nygne.

29:14 Ohg gur syrfu bs gur ohyybpx, naq uvf fxva, naq uvf qhat, funyg
gubh ohea jvgu sver jvgubhg gur pnzc: vg vf n fva bssrevat.

29:15 Gubh funyg nyfb gnxr bar enz; naq Nneba naq uvf fbaf funyy chg
gurve unaqf hcba gur urnq bs gur enz.

29:16 Naq gubh funyg fynl gur enz, naq gubh funyg gnxr uvf oybbq, naq
fcevaxyr vg ebhaq nobhg hcba gur nygne.

29:17 Naq gubh funyg phg gur enz va cvrprf, naq jnfu gur vajneqf bs
uvz, naq uvf yrtf, naq chg gurz hagb uvf cvrprf, naq hagb uvf urnq.

29:18 Naq gubh funyg ohea gur jubyr enz hcba gur nygne: vg vf n oheag
bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ: vg vf n fjrrg fnibhe, na bssrevat znqr ol sver
hagb gur YBEQ.

29:19 Naq gubh funyg gnxr gur bgure enz; naq Nneba naq uvf fbaf funyy
chg gurve unaqf hcba gur urnq bs gur enz.

29:20 Gura funyg gubh xvyy gur enz, naq gnxr bs uvf oybbq, naq chg vg
hcba gur gvc bs gur evtug rne bs Nneba, naq hcba gur gvc bs gur evtug
rne bs uvf fbaf, naq hcba gur guhzo bs gurve evtug unaq, naq hcba gur
terng gbr bs gurve evtug sbbg, naq fcevaxyr gur oybbq hcba gur nygne
ebhaq nobhg.

29:21 Naq gubh funyg gnxr bs gur oybbq gung vf hcba gur nygne, naq bs
gur nabvagvat bvy, naq fcevaxyr vg hcba Nneba, naq hcba uvf tnezragf,
naq hcba uvf fbaf, naq hcba gur tnezragf bs uvf fbaf jvgu uvz: naq ur
funyy or unyybjrq, naq uvf tnezragf, naq uvf fbaf, naq uvf fbaf'
tnezragf jvgu uvz.

29:22 Nyfb gubh funyg gnxr bs gur enz gur sng naq gur ehzc, naq gur
sng gung pbirergu gur vajneqf, naq gur pnhy nobir gur yvire, naq gur
gjb xvqarlf, naq gur sng gung vf hcba gurz, naq gur evtug fubhyqre;
sbe vg vf n enz bs pbafrpengvba: 29:23 Naq bar ybns bs oernq, naq bar
pnxr bs bvyrq oernq, naq bar jnsre bhg bs gur onfxrg bs gur hayrnirarq
oernq gung vf orsber gur YBEQ: 29:24 Naq gubh funyg chg nyy va gur
unaqf bs Nneba, naq va gur unaqf bs uvf fbaf; naq funyg jnir gurz sbe
n jnir bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ.

29:25 Naq gubh funyg erprvir gurz bs gurve unaqf, naq ohea gurz hcba
gur nygne sbe n oheag bssrevat, sbe n fjrrg fnibhe orsber gur YBEQ: vg
vf na bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ.

29:26 Naq gubh funyg gnxr gur oernfg bs gur enz bs Nneba'f
pbafrpengvba, naq jnir vg sbe n jnir bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ: naq vg
funyy or gul cneg.

29:27 Naq gubh funyg fnapgvsl gur oernfg bs gur jnir bssrevat, naq gur
fubhyqre bs gur urnir bssrevat, juvpu vf jnirq, naq juvpu vf urnirq
hc, bs gur enz bs gur pbafrpengvba, rira bs gung juvpu vf sbe Nneba,
naq bs gung juvpu vf sbe uvf fbaf: 29:28 Naq vg funyy or Nneba'f naq
uvf fbaf' ol n fgnghgr sbe rire sebz gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: sbe vg vf
na urnir bssrevat: naq vg funyy or na urnir bssrevat sebz gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry bs gur fnpevsvpr bs gurve crnpr bssrevatf, rira gurve urnir
bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ.

29:29 Naq gur ubyl tnezragf bs Nneba funyy or uvf fbaf' nsgre uvz, gb
or nabvagrq gurerva, naq gb or pbafrpengrq va gurz.

29:30 Naq gung fba gung vf cevrfg va uvf fgrnq funyy chg gurz ba frira
qnlf, jura ur pbzrgu vagb gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba gb
zvavfgre va gur ubyl cynpr.

29:31 Naq gubh funyg gnxr gur enz bs gur pbafrpengvba, naq frrgur uvf
syrfu va gur ubyl cynpr.

29:32 Naq Nneba naq uvf fbaf funyy rng gur syrfu bs gur enz, naq gur
oernq gung vf va gur onfxrg ol gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba.

29:33 Naq gurl funyy rng gubfr guvatf jurerjvgu gur ngbarzrag jnf
znqr, gb pbafrpengr naq gb fnapgvsl gurz: ohg n fgenatre funyy abg rng
gurerbs, orpnhfr gurl ner ubyl.

29:34 Naq vs bhtug bs gur syrfu bs gur pbafrpengvbaf, be bs gur oernq,
erznva hagb gur zbeavat, gura gubh funyg ohea gur erznvaqre jvgu sver:
vg funyy abg or rngra, orpnhfr vg vf ubyl.

29:35 Naq guhf funyg gubh qb hagb Nneba, naq gb uvf fbaf, nppbeqvat gb
nyy guvatf juvpu V unir pbzznaqrq gurr: frira qnlf funyg gubh
pbafrpengr gurz.

29:36 Naq gubh funyg bssre rirel qnl n ohyybpx sbe n fva bssrevat sbe
ngbarzrag: naq gubh funyg pyrnafr gur nygne, jura gubh unfg znqr na
ngbarzrag sbe vg, naq gubh funyg nabvag vg, gb fnapgvsl vg.

29:37 Frira qnlf gubh funyg znxr na ngbarzrag sbe gur nygne, naq
fnapgvsl vg; naq vg funyy or na nygne zbfg ubyl: jungfbrire gbhpurgu
gur nygne funyy or ubyl.

29:38 Abj guvf vf gung juvpu gubh funyg bssre hcba gur nygne; gjb
ynzof bs gur svefg lrne qnl ol qnl pbagvahnyyl.

29:39 Gur bar ynzo gubh funyg bssre va gur zbeavat; naq gur bgure ynzo
gubh funyg bssre ng rira: 29:40 Naq jvgu gur bar ynzo n gragu qrny bs
sybhe zvatyrq jvgu gur sbhegu cneg bs na uva bs orngra bvy; naq gur
sbhegu cneg bs na uva bs jvar sbe n qevax bssrevat.

29:41 Naq gur bgure ynzo gubh funyg bssre ng rira, naq funyg qb
gurergb nppbeqvat gb gur zrng bssrevat bs gur zbeavat, naq nppbeqvat
gb gur qevax bssrevat gurerbs, sbe n fjrrg fnibhe, na bssrevat znqr ol
sver hagb gur YBEQ.

29:42 Guvf funyy or n pbagvahny oheag bssrevat guebhtubhg lbhe
trarengvbaf ng gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba orsber
gur YBEQ: jurer V jvyy zrrg lbh, gb fcrnx gurer hagb gurr.

29:43 Naq gurer V jvyy zrrg jvgu gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq gur
gnoreanpyr funyy or fnapgvsvrq ol zl tybel.

29:44 Naq V jvyy fnapgvsl gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, naq gur
nygne: V jvyy fnapgvsl nyfb obgu Nneba naq uvf fbaf, gb zvavfgre gb zr
va gur cevrfg'f bssvpr.

29:45 Naq V jvyy qjryy nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq jvyy or gurve
Tbq.

29:46 Naq gurl funyy xabj gung V nz gur YBEQ gurve Tbq, gung oebhtug
gurz sbegu bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, gung V znl qjryy nzbat gurz: V nz
gur YBEQ gurve Tbq.

30:1 Naq gubh funyg znxr na nygne gb ohea vaprafr hcba: bs fuvggvz
jbbq funyg gubh znxr vg.

30:2 N phovg funyy or gur yratgu gurerbs, naq n phovg gur oernqgu
gurerbs; sbhefdhner funyy vg or: naq gjb phovgf funyy or gur urvtug
gurerbs: gur ubeaf gurerbs funyy or bs gur fnzr.

30:3 Naq gubh funyg bireynl vg jvgu cher tbyq, gur gbc gurerbs, naq
gur fvqrf gurerbs ebhaq nobhg, naq gur ubeaf gurerbs; naq gubh funyg
znxr hagb vg n pebja bs tbyq ebhaq nobhg.

30:4 Naq gjb tbyqra evatf funyg gubh znxr gb vg haqre gur pebja bs vg,
ol gur gjb pbearef gurerbs, hcba gur gjb fvqrf bs vg funyg gubh znxr
vg; naq gurl funyy or sbe cynprf sbe gur fgnirf gb orne vg jvguny.

30:5 Naq gubh funyg znxr gur fgnirf bs fuvggvz jbbq, naq bireynl gurz
jvgu tbyq.

30:6 Naq gubh funyg chg vg orsber gur invy gung vf ol gur nex bs gur
grfgvzbal, orsber gur zrepl frng gung vf bire gur grfgvzbal, jurer V
jvyy zrrg jvgu gurr.

30:7 Naq Nneba funyy ohea gurerba fjrrg vaprafr rirel zbeavat: jura ur
qerffrgu gur ynzcf, ur funyy ohea vaprafr hcba vg.

30:8 Naq jura Nneba yvtugrgu gur ynzcf ng rira, ur funyy ohea vaprafr
hcba vg, n crecrghny vaprafr orsber gur YBEQ guebhtubhg lbhe
trarengvbaf.

30:9 Lr funyy bssre ab fgenatr vaprafr gurerba, abe oheag fnpevsvpr,
abe zrng bssrevat; arvgure funyy lr cbhe qevax bssrevat gurerba.

30:10 Naq Nneba funyy znxr na ngbarzrag hcba gur ubeaf bs vg bapr va n
lrne jvgu gur oybbq bs gur fva bssrevat bs ngbarzragf: bapr va gur
lrne funyy ur znxr ngbarzrag hcba vg guebhtubhg lbhe trarengvbaf: vg
vf zbfg ubyl hagb gur YBEQ.

30:11 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 30:12 Jura gubh gnxrfg
gur fhz bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry nsgre gurve ahzore, gura funyy gurl
tvir rirel zna n enafbz sbe uvf fbhy hagb gur YBEQ, jura gubh
ahzorerfg gurz; gung gurer or ab cynthr nzbat gurz, jura gubh
ahzorerfg gurz.

30:13 Guvf gurl funyy tvir, rirel bar gung cnffrgu nzbat gurz gung ner
ahzorerq, unys n furxry nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel: (n furxry
vf gjragl trenuf:) na unys furxry funyy or gur bssrevat bs gur YBEQ.

30:14 Rirel bar gung cnffrgu nzbat gurz gung ner ahzorerq, sebz gjragl
lrnef byq naq nobir, funyy tvir na bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ.

30:15 Gur evpu funyy abg tvir zber, naq gur cbbe funyy abg tvir yrff
guna unys n furxry, jura gurl tvir na bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ, gb znxr
na ngbarzrag sbe lbhe fbhyf.

30:16 Naq gubh funyg gnxr gur ngbarzrag zbarl bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, naq funyg nccbvag vg sbe gur freivpr bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba; gung vg znl or n zrzbevny hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
orsber gur YBEQ, gb znxr na ngbarzrag sbe lbhe fbhyf.

30:17 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 30:18 Gubh funyg nyfb
znxr n ynire bs oenff, naq uvf sbbg nyfb bs oenff, gb jnfu jvguny: naq
gubh funyg chg vg orgjrra gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba naq gur
nygne, naq gubh funyg chg jngre gurerva.

30:19 Sbe Nneba naq uvf fbaf funyy jnfu gurve unaqf naq gurve srrg
gurerng: 30:20 Jura gurl tb vagb gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba,
gurl funyy jnfu jvgu jngre, gung gurl qvr abg; be jura gurl pbzr arne
gb gur nygne gb zvavfgre, gb ohea bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ:
30:21 Fb gurl funyy jnfu gurve unaqf naq gurve srrg, gung gurl qvr
abg: naq vg funyy or n fgnghgr sbe rire gb gurz, rira gb uvz naq gb
uvf frrq guebhtubhg gurve trarengvbaf.

30:22 Zberbire gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 30:23 Gnxr gubh nyfb
hagb gurr cevapvcny fcvprf, bs cher zleeu svir uhaqerq furxryf, naq bs
fjrrg pvaanzba unys fb zhpu, rira gjb uhaqerq naq svsgl furxryf, naq
bs fjrrg pnynzhf gjb uhaqerq naq svsgl furxryf, 30:24 Naq bs pnffvn
svir uhaqerq furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel, naq bs bvy
byvir na uva: 30:25 Naq gubh funyg znxr vg na bvy bs ubyl bvagzrag, na
bvagzrag pbzcbhaq nsgre gur neg bs gur ncbgurpnel: vg funyy or na ubyl
nabvagvat bvy.

30:26 Naq gubh funyg nabvag gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba
gurerjvgu, naq gur nex bs gur grfgvzbal, 30:27 Naq gur gnoyr naq nyy
uvf irffryf, naq gur pnaqyrfgvpx naq uvf irffryf, naq gur nygne bs
vaprafr, 30:28 Naq gur nygne bs oheag bssrevat jvgu nyy uvf irffryf,
naq gur ynire naq uvf sbbg.

30:29 Naq gubh funyg fnapgvsl gurz, gung gurl znl or zbfg ubyl:
jungfbrire gbhpurgu gurz funyy or ubyl.

30:30 Naq gubh funyg nabvag Nneba naq uvf fbaf, naq pbafrpengr gurz,
gung gurl znl zvavfgre hagb zr va gur cevrfg'f bssvpr.

30:31 Naq gubh funyg fcrnx hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Guvf
funyy or na ubyl nabvagvat bvy hagb zr guebhtubhg lbhe trarengvbaf.

30:32 Hcba zna'f syrfu funyy vg abg or cbherq, arvgure funyy lr znxr
nal bgure yvxr vg, nsgre gur pbzcbfvgvba bs vg: vg vf ubyl, naq vg
funyy or ubyl hagb lbh.

30:33 Jubfbrire pbzcbhaqrgu nal yvxr vg, be jubfbrire chggrgu nal bs
vg hcba n fgenatre, funyy rira or phg bss sebz uvf crbcyr.

30:34 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Gnxr hagb gurr fjrrg fcvprf,
fgnpgr, naq balpun, naq tnyonahz; gurfr fjrrg fcvprf jvgu cher
senaxvaprafr: bs rnpu funyy gurer or n yvxr jrvtug: 30:35 Naq gubh
funyg znxr vg n creshzr, n pbasrpgvba nsgre gur neg bs gur ncbgurpnel,
grzcrerq gbtrgure, cher naq ubyl: 30:36 Naq gubh funyg orng fbzr bs vg
irel fznyy, naq chg bs vg orsber gur grfgvzbal va gur gnoreanpyr bs
gur pbatertngvba, jurer V jvyy zrrg jvgu gurr: vg funyy or hagb lbh
zbfg ubyl.

30:37 Naq nf sbe gur creshzr juvpu gubh funyg znxr, lr funyy abg znxr
gb lbhefryirf nppbeqvat gb gur pbzcbfvgvba gurerbs: vg funyy or hagb
gurr ubyl sbe gur YBEQ.

30:38 Jubfbrire funyy znxr yvxr hagb gung, gb fzryy gurergb, funyy
rira or phg bss sebz uvf crbcyr.

31:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 31:2 Frr, V unir pnyyrq ol
anzr Ormnyrry gur fba bs Hev, gur fba bs Uhe, bs gur gevor bs Whqnu:
31:3 Naq V unir svyyrq uvz jvgu gur fcvevg bs Tbq, va jvfqbz, naq va
haqrefgnaqvat, naq va xabjyrqtr, naq va nyy znaare bs jbexznafuvc,
31:4 Gb qrivfr phaavat jbexf, gb jbex va tbyq, naq va fvyire, naq va
oenff, 31:5 Naq va phggvat bs fgbarf, gb frg gurz, naq va pneivat bs
gvzore, gb jbex va nyy znaare bs jbexznafuvc.

31:6 Naq V, orubyq, V unir tvira jvgu uvz Nubyvno, gur fba bs
Nuvfnznpu, bs gur gevor bs Qna: naq va gur urnegf bs nyy gung ner jvfr
urnegrq V unir chg jvfqbz, gung gurl znl znxr nyy gung V unir
pbzznaqrq gurr; 31:7 Gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, naq gur nex
bs gur grfgvzbal, naq gur zrepl frng gung vf gurerhcba, naq nyy gur
sheavgher bs gur gnoreanpyr, 31:8 Naq gur gnoyr naq uvf sheavgher, naq
gur cher pnaqyrfgvpx jvgu nyy uvf sheavgher, naq gur nygne bs vaprafr,
31:9 Naq gur nygne bs oheag bssrevat jvgu nyy uvf sheavgher, naq gur
ynire naq uvf sbbg, 31:10 Naq gur pybguf bs freivpr, naq gur ubyl
tnezragf sbe Nneba gur cevrfg, naq gur tnezragf bs uvf fbaf, gb
zvavfgre va gur cevrfg'f bssvpr, 31:11 Naq gur nabvagvat bvy, naq
fjrrg vaprafr sbe gur ubyl cynpr: nppbeqvat gb nyy gung V unir
pbzznaqrq gurr funyy gurl qb.

31:12 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 31:13 Fcrnx gubh nyfb
hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Irevyl zl fnoonguf lr funyy xrrc:
sbe vg vf n fvta orgjrra zr naq lbh guebhtubhg lbhe trarengvbaf; gung
lr znl xabj gung V nz gur YBEQ gung qbgu fnapgvsl lbh.

31:14 Lr funyy xrrc gur fnoongu gurersber; sbe vg vf ubyl hagb lbh:
rirel bar gung qrsvyrgu vg funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu: sbe jubfbrire
qbrgu nal jbex gurerva, gung fbhy funyy or phg bss sebz nzbat uvf
crbcyr.

31:15 Fvk qnlf znl jbex or qbar; ohg va gur friragu vf gur fnoongu bs
erfg, ubyl gb gur YBEQ: jubfbrire qbrgu nal jbex va gur fnoongu qnl,
ur funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu.

31:16 Jurersber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry funyy xrrc gur fnoongu, gb
bofreir gur fnoongu guebhtubhg gurve trarengvbaf, sbe n crecrghny
pbiranag.

31:17 Vg vf n fvta orgjrra zr naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry sbe rire: sbe
va fvk qnlf gur YBEQ znqr urnira naq rnegu, naq ba gur friragu qnl ur
erfgrq, naq jnf erserfurq.

31:18 Naq ur tnir hagb Zbfrf, jura ur unq znqr na raq bs pbzzhavat
jvgu uvz hcba zbhag Fvanv, gjb gnoyrf bs grfgvzbal, gnoyrf bs fgbar,
jevggra jvgu gur svatre bs Tbq.

32:1 Naq jura gur crbcyr fnj gung Zbfrf qrynlrq gb pbzr qbja bhg bs
gur zbhag, gur crbcyr tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure hagb Nneba, naq
fnvq hagb uvz, Hc, znxr hf tbqf, juvpu funyy tb orsber hf; sbe nf sbe
guvf Zbfrf, gur zna gung oebhtug hf hc bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, jr
jbg abg jung vf orpbzr bs uvz.

32:2 Naq Nneba fnvq hagb gurz, Oernx bss gur tbyqra rneevatf, juvpu
ner va gur rnef bs lbhe jvirf, bs lbhe fbaf, naq bs lbhe qnhtugref,
naq oevat gurz hagb zr.

32:3 Naq nyy gur crbcyr oenxr bss gur tbyqra rneevatf juvpu jrer va
gurve rnef, naq oebhtug gurz hagb Nneba.

32:4 Naq ur erprvirq gurz ng gurve unaq, naq snfuvbarq vg jvgu n
tenivat gbby, nsgre ur unq znqr vg n zbygra pnys: naq gurl fnvq, Gurfr
or gul tbqf, B Vfenry, juvpu oebhtug gurr hc bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

32:5 Naq jura Nneba fnj vg, ur ohvyg na nygne orsber vg; naq Nneba
znqr cebpynzngvba, naq fnvq, Gb zbeebj vf n srnfg gb gur YBEQ.

32:6 Naq gurl ebfr hc rneyl ba gur zbeebj, naq bssrerq oheag
bssrevatf, naq oebhtug crnpr bssrevatf; naq gur crbcyr fng qbja gb rng
naq gb qevax, naq ebfr hc gb cynl.

32:7 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Tb, trg gurr qbja; sbe gul crbcyr,
juvpu gubh oebhtugrfg bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, unir pbeehcgrq
gurzfryirf: 32:8 Gurl unir ghearq nfvqr dhvpxyl bhg bs gur jnl juvpu V
pbzznaqrq gurz: gurl unir znqr gurz n zbygra pnys, naq unir jbefuvccrq
vg, naq unir fnpevsvprq gurerhagb, naq fnvq, Gurfr or gul tbqf, B
Vfenry, juvpu unir oebhtug gurr hc bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

32:9 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, V unir frra guvf crbcyr, naq,
orubyq, vg vf n fgvssarpxrq crbcyr: 32:10 Abj gurersber yrg zr nybar,
gung zl jengu znl jnk ubg ntnvafg gurz, naq gung V znl pbafhzr gurz:
naq V jvyy znxr bs gurr n terng angvba.

32:11 Naq Zbfrf orfbhtug gur YBEQ uvf Tbq, naq fnvq, YBEQ, jul qbgu
gul jengu jnk ubg ntnvafg gul crbcyr, juvpu gubh unfg oebhtug sbegu
bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg jvgu terng cbjre, naq jvgu n zvtugl unaq?
32:12 Jurersber fubhyq gur Rtlcgvnaf fcrnx, naq fnl, Sbe zvfpuvrs qvq
ur oevat gurz bhg, gb fynl gurz va gur zbhagnvaf, naq gb pbafhzr gurz
sebz gur snpr bs gur rnegu? Ghea sebz gul svrepr jengu, naq ercrag bs
guvf rivy ntnvafg gul crbcyr.

32:13 Erzrzore Noenunz, Vfnnp, naq Vfenry, gul freinagf, gb jubz gubh
fjnerfg ol guvar bja frys, naq fnvqfg hagb gurz, V jvyy zhygvcyl lbhe
frrq nf gur fgnef bs urnira, naq nyy guvf ynaq gung V unir fcbxra bs
jvyy V tvir hagb lbhe frrq, naq gurl funyy vaurevg vg sbe rire.

32:14 Naq gur YBEQ ercragrq bs gur rivy juvpu ur gubhtug gb qb hagb
uvf crbcyr.

32:15 Naq Zbfrf ghearq, naq jrag qbja sebz gur zbhag, naq gur gjb
gnoyrf bs gur grfgvzbal jrer va uvf unaq: gur gnoyrf jrer jevggra ba
obgu gurve fvqrf; ba gur bar fvqr naq ba gur bgure jrer gurl jevggra.

32:16 Naq gur gnoyrf jrer gur jbex bs Tbq, naq gur jevgvat jnf gur
jevgvat bs Tbq, tenira hcba gur gnoyrf.

32:17 Naq jura Wbfuhn urneq gur abvfr bs gur crbcyr nf gurl fubhgrq,
ur fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Gurer vf n abvfr bs jne va gur pnzc.

32:18 Naq ur fnvq, Vg vf abg gur ibvpr bs gurz gung fubhg sbe znfgrel,
arvgure vf vg gur ibvpr bs gurz gung pel sbe orvat birepbzr: ohg gur
abvfr bs gurz gung fvat qb V urne.

32:19 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf fbba nf ur pnzr avtu hagb gur pnzc, gung
ur fnj gur pnys, naq gur qnapvat: naq Zbfrf' natre jnkrq ubg, naq ur
pnfg gur gnoyrf bhg bs uvf unaqf, naq oenxr gurz orarngu gur zbhag.

32:20 Naq ur gbbx gur pnys juvpu gurl unq znqr, naq oheag vg va gur
sver, naq tebhaq vg gb cbjqre, naq fgenjrq vg hcba gur jngre, naq znqr
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qevax bs vg.

32:21 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb Nneba, Jung qvq guvf crbcyr hagb gurr, gung
gubh unfg oebhtug fb terng n fva hcba gurz?  32:22 Naq Nneba fnvq, Yrg
abg gur natre bs zl ybeq jnk ubg: gubh xabjrfg gur crbcyr, gung gurl
ner frg ba zvfpuvrs.

32:23 Sbe gurl fnvq hagb zr, Znxr hf tbqf, juvpu funyy tb orsber hf:
sbe nf sbe guvf Zbfrf, gur zna gung oebhtug hf hc bhg bs gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg, jr jbg abg jung vf orpbzr bs uvz.

32:24 Naq V fnvq hagb gurz, Jubfbrire ungu nal tbyq, yrg gurz oernx vg
bss. Fb gurl tnir vg zr: gura V pnfg vg vagb gur sver, naq gurer pnzr
bhg guvf pnys.

32:25 Naq jura Zbfrf fnj gung gur crbcyr jrer anxrq; (sbe Nneba unq
znqr gurz anxrq hagb gurve funzr nzbat gurve rarzvrf:) 32:26 Gura
Zbfrf fgbbq va gur tngr bs gur pnzc, naq fnvq, Jub vf ba gur YBEQ'f
fvqr? yrg uvz pbzr hagb zr. Naq nyy gur fbaf bs Yriv tngurerq
gurzfryirf gbtrgure hagb uvz.

32:27 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, Chg
rirel zna uvf fjbeq ol uvf fvqr, naq tb va naq bhg sebz tngr gb tngr
guebhtubhg gur pnzc, naq fynl rirel zna uvf oebgure, naq rirel zna uvf
pbzcnavba, naq rirel zna uvf arvtuobhe.

32:28 Naq gur puvyqera bs Yriv qvq nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs Zbfrf: naq
gurer sryy bs gur crbcyr gung qnl nobhg guerr gubhfnaq zra.

32:29 Sbe Zbfrf unq fnvq, Pbafrpengr lbhefryirf gbqnl gb gur YBEQ,
rira rirel zna hcba uvf fba, naq hcba uvf oebgure; gung ur znl orfgbj
hcba lbh n oyrffvat guvf qnl.

32:30 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur zbeebj, gung Zbfrf fnvq hagb gur
crbcyr, Lr unir fvaarq n terng fva: naq abj V jvyy tb hc hagb gur
YBEQ; crenqiragher V funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe lbhe fva.

32:31 Naq Zbfrf erghearq hagb gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, Bu, guvf crbcyr unir
fvaarq n terng fva, naq unir znqr gurz tbqf bs tbyq.

32:32 Lrg abj, vs gubh jvyg sbetvir gurve fva--; naq vs abg, oybg zr,
V cenl gurr, bhg bs gul obbx juvpu gubh unfg jevggra.

32:33 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Jubfbrire ungu fvaarq ntnvafg zr,
uvz jvyy V oybg bhg bs zl obbx.

32:34 Gurersber abj tb, yrnq gur crbcyr hagb gur cynpr bs juvpu V unir
fcbxra hagb gurr: orubyq, zvar Natry funyy tb orsber gurr:
arireguryrff va gur qnl jura V ivfvg V jvyy ivfvg gurve fva hcba gurz.

32:35 Naq gur YBEQ cynthrq gur crbcyr, orpnhfr gurl znqr gur pnys,
juvpu Nneba znqr.

33:1 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Qrcneg, naq tb hc urapr, gubh naq
gur crbcyr juvpu gubh unfg oebhtug hc bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, hagb
gur ynaq juvpu V fjner hagb Noenunz, gb Vfnnp, naq gb Wnpbo, fnlvat,
Hagb gul frrq jvyy V tvir vg: 33:2 Naq V jvyy fraq na natry orsber
gurr; naq V jvyy qevir bhg gur Pnannavgr, gur Nzbevgr, naq gur
Uvggvgr, naq gur Crevmmvgr, gur Uvivgr, naq gur Wrohfvgr: 33:3 Hagb n
ynaq sybjvat jvgu zvyx naq ubarl: sbe V jvyy abg tb hc va gur zvqfg bs
gurr; sbe gubh neg n fgvssarpxrq crbcyr: yrfg V pbafhzr gurr va gur
jnl.

33:4 Naq jura gur crbcyr urneq gurfr rivy gvqvatf, gurl zbhearq: naq
ab zna qvq chg ba uvz uvf beanzragf.

33:5 Sbe gur YBEQ unq fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Fnl hagb gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, Lr ner n fgvssarpxrq crbcyr: V jvyy pbzr hc vagb gur zvqfg bs
gurr va n zbzrag, naq pbafhzr gurr: gurersber abj chg bss gul
beanzragf sebz gurr, gung V znl xabj jung gb qb hagb gurr.

33:6 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fgevccrq gurzfryirf bs gurve beanzragf
ol gur zbhag Ubero.

33:7 Naq Zbfrf gbbx gur gnoreanpyr, naq cvgpurq vg jvgubhg gur pnzc,
nsne bss sebz gur pnzc, naq pnyyrq vg gur Gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba. Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung rirel bar juvpu fbhtug gur
YBEQ jrag bhg hagb gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, juvpu jnf
jvgubhg gur pnzc.

33:8 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Zbfrf jrag bhg hagb gur gnoreanpyr,
gung nyy gur crbcyr ebfr hc, naq fgbbq rirel zna ng uvf grag qbbe, naq
ybbxrq nsgre Zbfrf, hagvy ur jnf tbar vagb gur gnoreanpyr.

33:9 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf Zbfrf ragrerq vagb gur gnoreanpyr, gur
pybhql cvyyne qrfpraqrq, naq fgbbq ng gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr, naq
gur Ybeq gnyxrq jvgu Zbfrf.

33:10 Naq nyy gur crbcyr fnj gur pybhql cvyyne fgnaq ng gur gnoreanpyr
qbbe: naq nyy gur crbcyr ebfr hc naq jbefuvccrq, rirel zna va uvf grag
qbbe.

33:11 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf snpr gb snpr, nf n zna fcrnxrgu
hagb uvf sevraq. Naq ur ghearq ntnva vagb gur pnzc: ohg uvf freinag
Wbfuhn, gur fba bs Aha, n lbhat zna, qrcnegrq abg bhg bs gur
gnoreanpyr.

33:12 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gur YBEQ, Frr, gubh fnlrfg hagb zr, Oevat hc
guvf crbcyr: naq gubh unfg abg yrg zr xabj jubz gubh jvyg fraq jvgu
zr. Lrg gubh unfg fnvq, V xabj gurr ol anzr, naq gubh unfg nyfb sbhaq
tenpr va zl fvtug.

33:13 Abj gurersber, V cenl gurr, vs V unir sbhaq tenpr va gul fvtug,
furj zr abj gul jnl, gung V znl xabj gurr, gung V znl svaq tenpr va
gul fvtug: naq pbafvqre gung guvf angvba vf gul crbcyr.

33:14 Naq ur fnvq, Zl cerfrapr funyy tb jvgu gurr, naq V jvyy tvir
gurr erfg.

33:15 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Vs gul cerfrapr tb abg jvgu zr, pneel hf
abg hc urapr.

33:16 Sbe jurerva funyy vg or xabja urer gung V naq gul crbcyr unir
sbhaq tenpr va gul fvtug? vf vg abg va gung gubh tbrfg jvgu hf? fb
funyy jr or frcnengrq, V naq gul crbcyr, sebz nyy gur crbcyr gung ner
hcba gur snpr bs gur rnegu.

33:17 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, V jvyy qb guvf guvat nyfb gung
gubh unfg fcbxra: sbe gubh unfg sbhaq tenpr va zl fvtug, naq V xabj
gurr ol anzr.

33:18 Naq ur fnvq, V orfrrpu gurr, furj zr gul tybel.

33:19 Naq ur fnvq, V jvyy znxr nyy zl tbbqarff cnff orsber gurr, naq V
jvyy cebpynvz gur anzr bs gur YBEQ orsber gurr; naq jvyy or tenpvbhf
gb jubz V jvyy or tenpvbhf, naq jvyy furj zrepl ba jubz V jvyy furj
zrepl.

33:20 Naq ur fnvq, Gubh pnafg abg frr zl snpr: sbe gurer funyy ab zna
frr zr, naq yvir.

33:21 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Orubyq, gurer vf n cynpr ol zr, naq gubh
funyg fgnaq hcba n ebpx: 33:22 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, juvyr zl
tybel cnffrgu ol, gung V jvyy chg gurr va n pyvsg bs gur ebpx, naq
jvyy pbire gurr jvgu zl unaq juvyr V cnff ol: 33:23 Naq V jvyy gnxr
njnl zvar unaq, naq gubh funyg frr zl onpx cnegf: ohg zl snpr funyy
abg or frra.

34:1 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Urj gurr gjb gnoyrf bs fgbar yvxr
hagb gur svefg: naq V jvyy jevgr hcba gurfr gnoyrf gur jbeqf gung jrer
va gur svefg gnoyrf, juvpu gubh oenxrfg.

34:2 Naq or ernql va gur zbeavat, naq pbzr hc va gur zbeavat hagb
zbhag Fvanv, naq cerfrag gulfrys gurer gb zr va gur gbc bs gur zbhag.

34:3 Naq ab zna funyy pbzr hc jvgu gurr, arvgure yrg nal zna or frra
guebhtubhg nyy gur zbhag; arvgure yrg gur sybpxf abe ureqf srrq orsber
gung zbhag.

34:4 Naq ur urjrq gjb gnoyrf bs fgbar yvxr hagb gur svefg; naq Zbfrf
ebfr hc rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq jrag hc hagb zbhag Fvanv, nf gur
YBEQ unq pbzznaqrq uvz, naq gbbx va uvf unaq gur gjb gnoyrf bs fgbar.

34:5 Naq gur YBEQ qrfpraqrq va gur pybhq, naq fgbbq jvgu uvz gurer,
naq cebpynvzrq gur anzr bs gur YBEQ.

34:6 Naq gur YBEQ cnffrq ol orsber uvz, naq cebpynvzrq, Gur YBEQ, Gur
YBEQ Tbq, zrepvshy naq tenpvbhf, ybatfhssrevat, naq nohaqnag va
tbbqarff naq gehgu, 34:7 Xrrcvat zrepl sbe gubhfnaqf, sbetvivat
vavdhvgl naq genafterffvba naq fva, naq gung jvyy ol ab zrnaf pyrne
gur thvygl; ivfvgvat gur vavdhvgl bs gur snguref hcba gur puvyqera,
naq hcba gur puvyqera'f puvyqera, hagb gur guveq naq gb gur sbhegu
trarengvba.

34:8 Naq Zbfrf znqr unfgr, naq objrq uvf urnq gbjneq gur rnegu, naq
jbefuvccrq.

34:9 Naq ur fnvq, Vs abj V unir sbhaq tenpr va gul fvtug, B YBEQ, yrg
zl YBEQ, V cenl gurr, tb nzbat hf; sbe vg vf n fgvssarpxrq crbcyr; naq
cneqba bhe vavdhvgl naq bhe fva, naq gnxr hf sbe guvar vaurevgnapr.

34:10 Naq ur fnvq, Orubyq, V znxr n pbiranag: orsber nyy gul crbcyr V
jvyy qb zneiryf, fhpu nf unir abg orra qbar va nyy gur rnegu, abe va
nal angvba: naq nyy gur crbcyr nzbat juvpu gubh neg funyy frr gur jbex
bs gur YBEQ: sbe vg vf n greevoyr guvat gung V jvyy qb jvgu gurr.

34:11 Bofreir gubh gung juvpu V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl: orubyq, V qevir
bhg orsber gurr gur Nzbevgr, naq gur Pnannavgr, naq gur Uvggvgr, naq
gur Crevmmvgr, naq gur Uvivgr, naq gur Wrohfvgr.

34:12 Gnxr urrq gb gulfrys, yrfg gubh znxr n pbiranag jvgu gur
vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq juvgure gubh tbrfg, yrfg vg or sbe n faner va
gur zvqfg bs gurr: 34:13 Ohg lr funyy qrfgebl gurve nygnef, oernx
gurve vzntrf, naq phg qbja gurve tebirf: 34:14 Sbe gubh funyg jbefuvc
ab bgure tbq: sbe gur YBEQ, jubfr anzr vf Wrnybhf, vf n wrnybhf Tbq:
34:15 Yrfg gubh znxr n pbiranag jvgu gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq, naq
gurl tb n jubevat nsgre gurve tbqf, naq qb fnpevsvpr hagb gurve tbqf,
naq bar pnyy gurr, naq gubh rng bs uvf fnpevsvpr; 34:16 Naq gubh gnxr
bs gurve qnhtugref hagb gul fbaf, naq gurve qnhtugref tb n jubevat
nsgre gurve tbqf, naq znxr gul fbaf tb n jubevat nsgre gurve tbqf.

34:17 Gubh funyg znxr gurr ab zbygra tbqf.

34:18 Gur srnfg bs hayrnirarq oernq funyg gubh xrrc. Frira qnlf gubh
funyg rng hayrnirarq oernq, nf V pbzznaqrq gurr, va gur gvzr bs gur
zbagu Novo: sbe va gur zbagu Novo gubh pnzrfg bhg sebz Rtlcg.

34:19 Nyy gung bcrargu gur zngevk vf zvar; naq rirel svefgyvat nzbat
gul pnggyr, jurgure bk be furrc, gung vf znyr.

34:20 Ohg gur svefgyvat bs na nff gubh funyg erqrrz jvgu n ynzo: naq
vs gubh erqrrz uvz abg, gura funyg gubh oernx uvf arpx. Nyy gur
svefgobea bs gul fbaf gubh funyg erqrrz. Naq abar funyy nccrne orsber
zr rzcgl.

34:21 Fvk qnlf gubh funyg jbex, ohg ba gur friragu qnl gubh funyg
erfg: va rnevat gvzr naq va uneirfg gubh funyg erfg.

34:22 Naq gubh funyg bofreir gur srnfg bs jrrxf, bs gur svefgsehvgf bs
jurng uneirfg, naq gur srnfg bs vatngurevat ng gur lrne'f raq.

34:23 Guevpr va gur lrne funyy nyy lbhe zrapuvyqera nccrne orsber gur
YBEQ Tbq, gur Tbq bs Vfenry.

34:24 Sbe V jvyy pnfg bhg gur angvbaf orsber gurr, naq raynetr gul
obeqref: arvgure funyy nal zna qrfver gul ynaq, jura gubh funyg tb hc
gb nccrne orsber gur YBEQ gul Tbq guevpr va gur lrne.

34:25 Gubh funyg abg bssre gur oybbq bs zl fnpevsvpr jvgu yrnira;
arvgure funyy gur fnpevsvpr bs gur srnfg bs gur cnffbire or yrsg hagb
gur zbeavat.

34:26 Gur svefg bs gur svefgsehvgf bs gul ynaq gubh funyg oevat hagb
gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq. Gubh funyg abg frrgur n xvq va uvf
zbgure'f zvyx.

34:27 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Jevgr gubh gurfr jbeqf: sbe nsgre
gur grabe bs gurfr jbeqf V unir znqr n pbiranag jvgu gurr naq jvgu
Vfenry.

34:28 Naq ur jnf gurer jvgu gur YBEQ sbegl qnlf naq sbegl avtugf; ur
qvq arvgure rng oernq, abe qevax jngre. Naq ur jebgr hcba gur gnoyrf
gur jbeqf bs gur pbiranag, gur gra pbzznaqzragf.

34:29 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Zbfrf pnzr qbja sebz zbhag Fvanv jvgu
gur gjb gnoyrf bs grfgvzbal va Zbfrf' unaq, jura ur pnzr qbja sebz gur
zbhag, gung Zbfrf jvfg abg gung gur fxva bs uvf snpr fubar juvyr ur
gnyxrq jvgu uvz.

34:30 Naq jura Nneba naq nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fnj Zbfrf, orubyq,
gur fxva bs uvf snpr fubar; naq gurl jrer nsenvq gb pbzr avtu uvz.

34:31 Naq Zbfrf pnyyrq hagb gurz; naq Nneba naq nyy gur ehyref bs gur
pbatertngvba erghearq hagb uvz: naq Zbfrf gnyxrq jvgu gurz.

34:32 Naq nsgrejneq nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pnzr avtu: naq ur tnir
gurz va pbzznaqzrag nyy gung gur YBEQ unq fcbxra jvgu uvz va zbhag
Fvanv.

34:33 Naq gvyy Zbfrf unq qbar fcrnxvat jvgu gurz, ur chg n invy ba uvf
snpr.

34:34 Ohg jura Zbfrf jrag va orsber gur YBEQ gb fcrnx jvgu uvz, ur
gbbx gur invy bss, hagvy ur pnzr bhg. Naq ur pnzr bhg, naq fcnxr hagb
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gung juvpu ur jnf pbzznaqrq.

34:35 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fnj gur snpr bs Zbfrf, gung gur fxva
bs Zbfrf' snpr fubar: naq Zbfrf chg gur invy hcba uvf snpr ntnva,
hagvy ur jrag va gb fcrnx jvgu uvz.

35:1 Naq Zbfrf tngurerq nyy gur pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
gbtrgure, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Gurfr ner gur jbeqf juvpu gur YBEQ ungu
pbzznaqrq, gung lr fubhyq qb gurz.

35:2 Fvk qnlf funyy jbex or qbar, ohg ba gur friragu qnl gurer funyy
or gb lbh na ubyl qnl, n fnoongu bs erfg gb gur YBEQ: jubfbrire qbrgu
jbex gurerva funyy or chg gb qrngu.

35:3 Lr funyy xvaqyr ab sver guebhtubhg lbhe unovgngvbaf hcba gur
fnoongu qnl.

35:4 Naq Zbfrf fcnxr hagb nyy gur pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, fnlvat, Guvf vf gur guvat juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq, fnlvat,
35:5 Gnxr lr sebz nzbat lbh na bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ: jubfbrire vf bs
n jvyyvat urneg, yrg uvz oevat vg, na bssrevat bs gur YBEQ; tbyq, naq
fvyire, naq oenff, 35:6 Naq oyhr, naq checyr, naq fpneyrg, naq svar
yvara, naq tbngf' unve, 35:7 Naq enzf' fxvaf qlrq erq, naq onqtref'
fxvaf, naq fuvggvz jbbq, 35:8 Naq bvy sbe gur yvtug, naq fcvprf sbe
nabvagvat bvy, naq sbe gur fjrrg vaprafr, 35:9 Naq balk fgbarf, naq
fgbarf gb or frg sbe gur rcubq, naq sbe gur oernfgcyngr.

35:10 Naq rirel jvfr urnegrq nzbat lbh funyy pbzr, naq znxr nyy gung
gur YBEQ ungu pbzznaqrq; 35:11 Gur gnoreanpyr, uvf grag, naq uvf
pbirevat, uvf gnpurf, naq uvf obneqf, uvf onef, uvf cvyynef, naq uvf
fbpxrgf, 35:12 Gur nex, naq gur fgnirf gurerbs, jvgu gur zrepl frng,
naq gur invy bs gur pbirevat, 35:13 Gur gnoyr, naq uvf fgnirf, naq nyy
uvf irffryf, naq gur furjoernq, 35:14 Gur pnaqyrfgvpx nyfb sbe gur
yvtug, naq uvf sheavgher, naq uvf ynzcf, jvgu gur bvy sbe gur yvtug,
35:15 Naq gur vaprafr nygne, naq uvf fgnirf, naq gur nabvagvat bvy,
naq gur fjrrg vaprafr, naq gur unatvat sbe gur qbbe ng gur ragrevat va
bs gur gnoreanpyr, 35:16 Gur nygne bs oheag bssrevat, jvgu uvf oenfra
tengr, uvf fgnirf, naq nyy uvf irffryf, gur ynire naq uvf sbbg, 35:17
Gur unatvatf bs gur pbheg, uvf cvyynef, naq gurve fbpxrgf, naq gur
unatvat sbe gur qbbe bs gur pbheg, 35:18 Gur cvaf bs gur gnoreanpyr,
naq gur cvaf bs gur pbheg, naq gurve pbeqf, 35:19 Gur pybguf bs
freivpr, gb qb freivpr va gur ubyl cynpr, gur ubyl tnezragf sbe Nneba
gur cevrfg, naq gur tnezragf bs uvf fbaf, gb zvavfgre va gur cevrfg'f
bssvpr.

35:20 Naq nyy gur pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qrcnegrq sebz
gur cerfrapr bs Zbfrf.

35:21 Naq gurl pnzr, rirel bar jubfr urneg fgveerq uvz hc, naq rirel
bar jubz uvf fcvevg znqr jvyyvat, naq gurl oebhtug gur YBEQ'f bssrevat
gb gur jbex bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, naq sbe nyy uvf
freivpr, naq sbe gur ubyl tnezragf.

35:22 Naq gurl pnzr, obgu zra naq jbzra, nf znal nf jrer jvyyvat
urnegrq, naq oebhtug oenpryrgf, naq rneevatf, naq evatf, naq gnoyrgf,
nyy wrjryf bs tbyq: naq rirel zna gung bssrerq bssrerq na bssrevat bs
tbyq hagb gur YBEQ.

35:23 Naq rirel zna, jvgu jubz jnf sbhaq oyhr, naq checyr, naq
fpneyrg, naq svar yvara, naq tbngf' unve, naq erq fxvaf bs enzf, naq
onqtref' fxvaf, oebhtug gurz.

35:24 Rirel bar gung qvq bssre na bssrevat bs fvyire naq oenff oebhtug
gur YBEQ'f bssrevat: naq rirel zna, jvgu jubz jnf sbhaq fuvggvz jbbq
sbe nal jbex bs gur freivpr, oebhtug vg.

35:25 Naq nyy gur jbzra gung jrer jvfr urnegrq qvq fcva jvgu gurve
unaqf, naq oebhtug gung juvpu gurl unq fcha, obgu bs oyhr, naq bs
checyr, naq bs fpneyrg, naq bs svar yvara.

35:26 Naq nyy gur jbzra jubfr urneg fgveerq gurz hc va jvfqbz fcha
tbngf' unve.

35:27 Naq gur ehyref oebhtug balk fgbarf, naq fgbarf gb or frg, sbe
gur rcubq, naq sbe gur oernfgcyngr; 35:28 Naq fcvpr, naq bvy sbe gur
yvtug, naq sbe gur nabvagvat bvy, naq sbe gur fjrrg vaprafr.

35:29 Gur puvyqera bs Vfenry oebhtug n jvyyvat bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ,
rirel zna naq jbzna, jubfr urneg znqr gurz jvyyvat gb oevat sbe nyy
znaare bs jbex, juvpu gur YBEQ unq pbzznaqrq gb or znqr ol gur unaq bs
Zbfrf.

35:30 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, Frr, gur YBEQ ungu
pnyyrq ol anzr Ormnyrry gur fba bs Hev, gur fba bs Uhe, bs gur gevor
bs Whqnu; 35:31 Naq ur ungu svyyrq uvz jvgu gur fcvevg bs Tbq, va
jvfqbz, va haqrefgnaqvat, naq va xabjyrqtr, naq va nyy znaare bs
jbexznafuvc; 35:32 Naq gb qrivfr phevbhf jbexf, gb jbex va tbyq, naq
va fvyire, naq va oenff, 35:33 Naq va gur phggvat bs fgbarf, gb frg
gurz, naq va pneivat bs jbbq, gb znxr nal znaare bs phaavat jbex.

35:34 Naq ur ungu chg va uvf urneg gung ur znl grnpu, obgu ur, naq
Nubyvno, gur fba bs Nuvfnznpu, bs gur gevor bs Qna.

35:35 Gurz ungu ur svyyrq jvgu jvfqbz bs urneg, gb jbex nyy znaare bs
jbex, bs gur ratenire, naq bs gur phaavat jbexzna, naq bs gur
rzoebvqrere, va oyhr, naq va checyr, va fpneyrg, naq va svar yvara,
naq bs gur jrnire, rira bs gurz gung qb nal jbex, naq bs gubfr gung
qrivfr phaavat jbex.

36:1 Gura jebhtug Ormnyrry naq Nubyvno, naq rirel jvfr urnegrq zna, va
jubz gur YBEQ chg jvfqbz naq haqrefgnaqvat gb xabj ubj gb jbex nyy
znaare bs jbex sbe gur freivpr bs gur fnapghnel, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung
gur YBEQ unq pbzznaqrq.

36:2 Naq Zbfrf pnyyrq Ormnyrry naq Nubyvno, naq rirel jvfr urnegrq
zna, va jubfr urneg gur YBEQ unq chg jvfqbz, rira rirel bar jubfr
urneg fgveerq uvz hc gb pbzr hagb gur jbex gb qb vg: 36:3 Naq gurl
erprvirq bs Zbfrf nyy gur bssrevat, juvpu gur puvyqera bs Vfenry unq
oebhtug sbe gur jbex bs gur freivpr bs gur fnapghnel, gb znxr vg
jvguny. Naq gurl oebhtug lrg hagb uvz serr bssrevatf rirel zbeavat.

36:4 Naq nyy gur jvfr zra, gung jebhtug nyy gur jbex bs gur fnapghnel,
pnzr rirel zna sebz uvf jbex juvpu gurl znqr; 36:5 Naq gurl fcnxr hagb
Zbfrf, fnlvat, Gur crbcyr oevat zhpu zber guna rabhtu sbe gur freivpr
bs gur jbex, juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq gb znxr.

36:6 Naq Zbfrf tnir pbzznaqzrag, naq gurl pnhfrq vg gb or cebpynvzrq
guebhtubhg gur pnzc, fnlvat, Yrg arvgure zna abe jbzna znxr nal zber
jbex sbe gur bssrevat bs gur fnapghnel. Fb gur crbcyr jrer erfgenvarq
sebz oevatvat.

36:7 Sbe gur fghss gurl unq jnf fhssvpvrag sbe nyy gur jbex gb znxr
vg, naq gbb zhpu.

36:8 Naq rirel jvfr urnegrq zna nzbat gurz gung jebhtug gur jbex bs
gur gnoreanpyr znqr gra phegnvaf bs svar gjvarq yvara, naq oyhr, naq
checyr, naq fpneyrg: jvgu purehovzf bs phaavat jbex znqr ur gurz.

36:9 Gur yratgu bs bar phegnva jnf gjragl naq rvtug phovgf, naq gur
oernqgu bs bar phegnva sbhe phovgf: gur phegnvaf jrer nyy bs bar fvmr.

36:10 Naq ur pbhcyrq gur svir phegnvaf bar hagb nabgure: naq gur bgure
svir phegnvaf ur pbhcyrq bar hagb nabgure.

36:11 Naq ur znqr ybbcf bs oyhr ba gur rqtr bs bar phegnva sebz gur
fryirqtr va gur pbhcyvat: yvxrjvfr ur znqr va gur hggrezbfg fvqr bs
nabgure phegnva, va gur pbhcyvat bs gur frpbaq.

36:12 Svsgl ybbcf znqr ur va bar phegnva, naq svsgl ybbcf znqr ur va
gur rqtr bs gur phegnva juvpu jnf va gur pbhcyvat bs gur frpbaq: gur
ybbcf uryq bar phegnva gb nabgure.

36:13 Naq ur znqr svsgl gnpurf bs tbyq, naq pbhcyrq gur phegnvaf bar
hagb nabgure jvgu gur gnpurf: fb vg orpnzr bar gnoreanpyr.

36:14 Naq ur znqr phegnvaf bs tbngf' unve sbe gur grag bire gur
gnoreanpyr: ryrira phegnvaf ur znqr gurz.

36:15 Gur yratgu bs bar phegnva jnf guvegl phovgf, naq sbhe phovgf jnf
gur oernqgu bs bar phegnva: gur ryrira phegnvaf jrer bs bar fvmr.

36:16 Naq ur pbhcyrq svir phegnvaf ol gurzfryirf, naq fvk phegnvaf ol
gurzfryirf.

36:17 Naq ur znqr svsgl ybbcf hcba gur hggrezbfg rqtr bs gur phegnva
va gur pbhcyvat, naq svsgl ybbcf znqr ur hcba gur rqtr bs gur phegnva
juvpu pbhcyrgu gur frpbaq.

36:18 Naq ur znqr svsgl gnpurf bs oenff gb pbhcyr gur grag gbtrgure,
gung vg zvtug or bar.

36:19 Naq ur znqr n pbirevat sbe gur grag bs enzf' fxvaf qlrq erq, naq
n pbirevat bs onqtref' fxvaf nobir gung.

36:20 Naq ur znqr obneqf sbe gur gnoreanpyr bs fuvggvz jbbq, fgnaqvat
hc.

36:21 Gur yratgu bs n obneq jnf gra phovgf, naq gur oernqgu bs n obneq
bar phovg naq n unys.

36:22 Bar obneq unq gjb grabaf, rdhnyyl qvfgnag bar sebz nabgure: guhf
qvq ur znxr sbe nyy gur obneqf bs gur gnoreanpyr.

36:23 Naq ur znqr obneqf sbe gur gnoreanpyr; gjragl obneqf sbe gur
fbhgu fvqr fbhgujneq: 36:24 Naq sbegl fbpxrgf bs fvyire ur znqr haqre
gur gjragl obneqf; gjb fbpxrgf haqre bar obneq sbe uvf gjb grabaf, naq
gjb fbpxrgf haqre nabgure obneq sbe uvf gjb grabaf.

36:25 Naq sbe gur bgure fvqr bs gur gnoreanpyr, juvpu vf gbjneq gur
abegu pbeare, ur znqr gjragl obneqf, 36:26 Naq gurve sbegl fbpxrgf bs
fvyire; gjb fbpxrgf haqre bar obneq, naq gjb fbpxrgf haqre nabgure
obneq.

36:27 Naq sbe gur fvqrf bs gur gnoreanpyr jrfgjneq ur znqr fvk obneqf.

36:28 Naq gjb obneqf znqr ur sbe gur pbearef bs gur gnoreanpyr va gur
gjb fvqrf.

36:29 Naq gurl jrer pbhcyrq orarngu, naq pbhcyrq gbtrgure ng gur urnq
gurerbs, gb bar evat: guhf ur qvq gb obgu bs gurz va obgu gur pbearef.

36:30 Naq gurer jrer rvtug obneqf; naq gurve fbpxrgf jrer fvkgrra
fbpxrgf bs fvyire, haqre rirel obneq gjb fbpxrgf.

36:31 Naq ur znqr onef bs fuvggvz jbbq; svir sbe gur obneqf bs gur bar
fvqr bs gur gnoreanpyr, 36:32 Naq svir onef sbe gur obneqf bs gur
bgure fvqr bs gur gnoreanpyr, naq svir onef sbe gur obneqf bs gur
gnoreanpyr sbe gur fvqrf jrfgjneq.

36:33 Naq ur znqr gur zvqqyr one gb fubbg guebhtu gur obneqf sebz gur
bar raq gb gur bgure.

36:34 Naq ur bireynvq gur obneqf jvgu tbyq, naq znqr gurve evatf bs
tbyq gb or cynprf sbe gur onef, naq bireynvq gur onef jvgu tbyq.

36:35 Naq ur znqr n invy bs oyhr, naq checyr, naq fpneyrg, naq svar
gjvarq yvara: jvgu purehovzf znqr ur vg bs phaavat jbex.

36:36 Naq ur znqr gurerhagb sbhe cvyynef bs fuvggvz jbbq, naq bireynvq
gurz jvgu tbyq: gurve ubbxf jrer bs tbyq; naq ur pnfg sbe gurz sbhe
fbpxrgf bs fvyire.

36:37 Naq ur znqr na unatvat sbe gur gnoreanpyr qbbe bs oyhr, naq
checyr, naq fpneyrg, naq svar gjvarq yvara, bs arrqyrjbex; 36:38 Naq
gur svir cvyynef bs vg jvgu gurve ubbxf: naq ur bireynvq gurve
puncvgref naq gurve svyyrgf jvgu tbyq: ohg gurve svir fbpxrgf jrer bs
oenff.

37:1 Naq Ormnyrry znqr gur nex bs fuvggvz jbbq: gjb phovgf naq n unys
jnf gur yratgu bs vg, naq n phovg naq n unys gur oernqgu bs vg, naq n
phovg naq n unys gur urvtug bs vg: 37:2 Naq ur bireynvq vg jvgu cher
tbyq jvguva naq jvgubhg, naq znqr n pebja bs tbyq gb vg ebhaq nobhg.

37:3 Naq ur pnfg sbe vg sbhe evatf bs tbyq, gb or frg ol gur sbhe
pbearef bs vg; rira gjb evatf hcba gur bar fvqr bs vg, naq gjb evatf
hcba gur bgure fvqr bs vg.

37:4 Naq ur znqr fgnirf bs fuvggvz jbbq, naq bireynvq gurz jvgu tbyq.

37:5 Naq ur chg gur fgnirf vagb gur evatf ol gur fvqrf bs gur nex, gb
orne gur nex.

37:6 Naq ur znqr gur zrepl frng bs cher tbyq: gjb phovgf naq n unys
jnf gur yratgu gurerbs, naq bar phovg naq n unys gur oernqgu gurerbs.

37:7 Naq ur znqr gjb purehovzf bs tbyq, orngra bhg bs bar cvrpr znqr
ur gurz, ba gur gjb raqf bs gur zrepl frng; 37:8 Bar pureho ba gur raq
ba guvf fvqr, naq nabgure pureho ba gur bgure raq ba gung fvqr: bhg bs
gur zrepl frng znqr ur gur purehovzf ba gur gjb raqf gurerbs.

37:9 Naq gur purehovzf fcernq bhg gurve jvatf ba uvtu, naq pbirerq
jvgu gurve jvatf bire gur zrepl frng, jvgu gurve snprf bar gb nabgure;
rira gb gur zrepl frngjneq jrer gur snprf bs gur purehovzf.

37:10 Naq ur znqr gur gnoyr bs fuvggvz jbbq: gjb phovgf jnf gur yratgu
gurerbs, naq n phovg gur oernqgu gurerbs, naq n phovg naq n unys gur
urvtug gurerbs: 37:11 Naq ur bireynvq vg jvgu cher tbyq, naq znqr
gurerhagb n pebja bs tbyq ebhaq nobhg.

37:12 Nyfb ur znqr gurerhagb n obeqre bs na unaqoernqgu ebhaq nobhg;
naq znqr n pebja bs tbyq sbe gur obeqre gurerbs ebhaq nobhg.

37:13 Naq ur pnfg sbe vg sbhe evatf bs tbyq, naq chg gur evatf hcba
gur sbhe pbearef gung jrer va gur sbhe srrg gurerbs.

37:14 Bire ntnvafg gur obeqre jrer gur evatf, gur cynprf sbe gur
fgnirf gb orne gur gnoyr.

37:15 Naq ur znqr gur fgnirf bs fuvggvz jbbq, naq bireynvq gurz jvgu
tbyq, gb orne gur gnoyr.

37:16 Naq ur znqr gur irffryf juvpu jrer hcba gur gnoyr, uvf qvfurf,
naq uvf fcbbaf, naq uvf objyf, naq uvf pbiref gb pbire jvguny, bs cher
tbyq.

37:17 Naq ur znqr gur pnaqyrfgvpx bs cher tbyq: bs orngra jbex znqr ur
gur pnaqyrfgvpx; uvf funsg, naq uvf oenapu, uvf objyf, uvf xabcf, naq
uvf sybjref, jrer bs gur fnzr: 37:18 Naq fvk oenapurf tbvat bhg bs gur
fvqrf gurerbs; guerr oenapurf bs gur pnaqyrfgvpx bhg bs gur bar fvqr
gurerbs, naq guerr oenapurf bs gur pnaqyrfgvpx bhg bs gur bgure fvqr
gurerbs: 37:19 Guerr objyf znqr nsgre gur snfuvba bs nyzbaqf va bar
oenapu, n xabc naq n sybjre; naq guerr objyf znqr yvxr nyzbaqf va
nabgure oenapu, n xabc naq n sybjre: fb guebhtubhg gur fvk oenapurf
tbvat bhg bs gur pnaqyrfgvpx.

37:20 Naq va gur pnaqyrfgvpx jrer sbhe objyf znqr yvxr nyzbaqf, uvf
xabcf, naq uvf sybjref: 37:21 Naq n xabc haqre gjb oenapurf bs gur
fnzr, naq n xabc haqre gjb oenapurf bs gur fnzr, naq n xabc haqre gjb
oenapurf bs gur fnzr, nppbeqvat gb gur fvk oenapurf tbvat bhg bs vg.

37:22 Gurve xabcf naq gurve oenapurf jrer bs gur fnzr: nyy bs vg jnf
bar orngra jbex bs cher tbyq.

37:23 Naq ur znqr uvf frira ynzcf, naq uvf fahssref, naq uvf
fahssqvfurf, bs cher tbyq.

37:24 Bs n gnyrag bs cher tbyq znqr ur vg, naq nyy gur irffryf
gurerbs.

37:25 Naq ur znqr gur vaprafr nygne bs fuvggvz jbbq: gur yratgu bs vg
jnf n phovg, naq gur oernqgu bs vg n phovg; vg jnf sbhefdhner; naq gjb
phovgf jnf gur urvtug bs vg; gur ubeaf gurerbs jrer bs gur fnzr.

37:26 Naq ur bireynvq vg jvgu cher tbyq, obgu gur gbc bs vg, naq gur
fvqrf gurerbs ebhaq nobhg, naq gur ubeaf bs vg: nyfb ur znqr hagb vg n
pebja bs tbyq ebhaq nobhg.

37:27 Naq ur znqr gjb evatf bs tbyq sbe vg haqre gur pebja gurerbs, ol
gur gjb pbearef bs vg, hcba gur gjb fvqrf gurerbs, gb or cynprf sbe
gur fgnirf gb orne vg jvguny.

37:28 Naq ur znqr gur fgnirf bs fuvggvz jbbq, naq bireynvq gurz jvgu
tbyq.

37:29 Naq ur znqr gur ubyl nabvagvat bvy, naq gur cher vaprafr bs
fjrrg fcvprf, nppbeqvat gb gur jbex bs gur ncbgurpnel.

38:1 Naq ur znqr gur nygne bs oheag bssrevat bs fuvggvz jbbq: svir
phovgf jnf gur yratgu gurerbs, naq svir phovgf gur oernqgu gurerbs; vg
jnf sbhefdhner; naq guerr phovgf gur urvtug gurerbs.

38:2 Naq ur znqr gur ubeaf gurerbs ba gur sbhe pbearef bs vg; gur
ubeaf gurerbs jrer bs gur fnzr: naq ur bireynvq vg jvgu oenff.

38:3 Naq ur znqr nyy gur irffryf bs gur nygne, gur cbgf, naq gur
fubiryf, naq gur onfbaf, naq gur syrfuubbxf, naq gur svercnaf: nyy gur
irffryf gurerbs znqr ur bs oenff.

38:4 Naq ur znqr sbe gur nygne n oenfra tengr bs argjbex haqre gur
pbzcnff gurerbs orarngu hagb gur zvqfg bs vg.

38:5 Naq ur pnfg sbhe evatf sbe gur sbhe raqf bs gur tengr bs oenff,
gb or cynprf sbe gur fgnirf.

38:6 Naq ur znqr gur fgnirf bs fuvggvz jbbq, naq bireynvq gurz jvgu
oenff.

38:7 Naq ur chg gur fgnirf vagb gur evatf ba gur fvqrf bs gur nygne,
gb orne vg jvguny; ur znqr gur nygne ubyybj jvgu obneqf.

38:8 Naq ur znqr gur ynire bs oenff, naq gur sbbg bs vg bs oenff, bs
gur ybbxvattynffrf bs gur jbzra nffrzoyvat, juvpu nffrzoyrq ng gur
qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

38:9 Naq ur znqr gur pbheg: ba gur fbhgu fvqr fbhgujneq gur unatvatf
bs gur pbheg jrer bs svar gjvarq yvara, na uhaqerq phovgf: 38:10 Gurve
cvyynef jrer gjragl, naq gurve oenfra fbpxrgf gjragl; gur ubbxf bs gur
cvyynef naq gurve svyyrgf jrer bs fvyire.

38:11 Naq sbe gur abegu fvqr gur unatvatf jrer na uhaqerq phovgf,
gurve cvyynef jrer gjragl, naq gurve fbpxrgf bs oenff gjragl; gur
ubbxf bs gur cvyynef naq gurve svyyrgf bs fvyire.

38:12 Naq sbe gur jrfg fvqr jrer unatvatf bs svsgl phovgf, gurve
cvyynef gra, naq gurve fbpxrgf gra; gur ubbxf bs gur cvyynef naq gurve
svyyrgf bs fvyire.

38:13 Naq sbe gur rnfg fvqr rnfgjneq svsgl phovgf.

38:14 Gur unatvatf bs gur bar fvqr bs gur tngr jrer svsgrra phovgf;
gurve cvyynef guerr, naq gurve fbpxrgf guerr.

38:15 Naq sbe gur bgure fvqr bs gur pbheg tngr, ba guvf unaq naq gung
unaq, jrer unatvatf bs svsgrra phovgf; gurve cvyynef guerr, naq gurve
fbpxrgf guerr.

38:16 Nyy gur unatvatf bs gur pbheg ebhaq nobhg jrer bs svar gjvarq
yvara.

38:17 Naq gur fbpxrgf sbe gur cvyynef jrer bs oenff; gur ubbxf bs gur
cvyynef naq gurve svyyrgf bs fvyire; naq gur bireynlvat bs gurve
puncvgref bs fvyire; naq nyy gur cvyynef bs gur pbheg jrer svyyrgrq
jvgu fvyire.

38:18 Naq gur unatvat sbe gur tngr bs gur pbheg jnf arrqyrjbex, bs
oyhr, naq checyr, naq fpneyrg, naq svar gjvarq yvara: naq gjragl
phovgf jnf gur yratgu, naq gur urvtug va gur oernqgu jnf svir phovgf,
nafjrenoyr gb gur unatvatf bs gur pbheg.

38:19 Naq gurve cvyynef jrer sbhe, naq gurve fbpxrgf bs oenff sbhe;
gurve ubbxf bs fvyire, naq gur bireynlvat bs gurve puncvgref naq gurve
svyyrgf bs fvyire.

38:20 Naq nyy gur cvaf bs gur gnoreanpyr, naq bs gur pbheg ebhaq
nobhg, jrer bs oenff.

38:21 Guvf vf gur fhz bs gur gnoreanpyr, rira bs gur gnoreanpyr bs
grfgvzbal, nf vg jnf pbhagrq, nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs Zbfrf,
sbe gur freivpr bs gur Yrivgrf, ol gur unaq bs Vgunzne, fba gb Nneba
gur cevrfg.

38:22 Naq Ormnyrry gur fba Hev, gur fba bs Uhe, bs gur gevor bs Whqnu,
znqr nyy gung gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

38:23 Naq jvgu uvz jnf Nubyvno, fba bs Nuvfnznpu, bs gur gevor bs Qna,
na ratenire, naq n phaavat jbexzna, naq na rzoebvqrere va oyhr, naq va
checyr, naq va fpneyrg, naq svar yvara.

38:24 Nyy gur tbyq gung jnf bpphcvrq sbe gur jbex va nyy gur jbex bs
gur ubyl cynpr, rira gur tbyq bs gur bssrevat, jnf gjragl naq avar
gnyragf, naq frira uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur
fnapghnel.

38:25 Naq gur fvyire bs gurz gung jrer ahzorerq bs gur pbatertngvba
jnf na uhaqerq gnyragf, naq n gubhfnaq frira uhaqerq naq guerrfpber
naq svsgrra furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel: 38:26 N orxnu
sbe rirel zna, gung vf, unys n furxry, nsgre gur furxry bs gur
fnapghnel, sbe rirel bar gung jrag gb or ahzorerq, sebz gjragl lrnef
byq naq hcjneq, sbe fvk uhaqerq gubhfnaq naq guerr gubhfnaq naq svir
uhaqerq naq svsgl zra.

38:27 Naq bs gur uhaqerq gnyragf bs fvyire jrer pnfg gur fbpxrgf bs
gur fnapghnel, naq gur fbpxrgf bs gur invy; na uhaqerq fbpxrgf bs gur
uhaqerq gnyragf, n gnyrag sbe n fbpxrg.

38:28 Naq bs gur gubhfnaq frira uhaqerq friragl naq svir furxryf ur
znqr ubbxf sbe gur cvyynef, naq bireynvq gurve puncvgref, naq svyyrgrq
gurz.

38:29 Naq gur oenff bs gur bssrevat jnf friragl gnyragf, naq gjb
gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq furxryf.

38:30 Naq gurerjvgu ur znqr gur fbpxrgf gb gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr
bs gur pbatertngvba, naq gur oenfra nygne, naq gur oenfra tengr sbe
vg, naq nyy gur irffryf bs gur nygne, 38:31 Naq gur fbpxrgf bs gur
pbheg ebhaq nobhg, naq gur fbpxrgf bs gur pbheg tngr, naq nyy gur cvaf
bs gur gnoreanpyr, naq nyy gur cvaf bs gur pbheg ebhaq nobhg.

39:1 Naq bs gur oyhr, naq checyr, naq fpneyrg, gurl znqr pybguf bs
freivpr, gb qb freivpr va gur ubyl cynpr, naq znqr gur ubyl tnezragf
sbe Nneba; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

39:2 Naq ur znqr gur rcubq bs tbyq, oyhr, naq checyr, naq fpneyrg, naq
svar gjvarq yvara.

39:3 Naq gurl qvq orng gur tbyq vagb guva cyngrf, naq phg vg vagb
jverf, gb jbex vg va gur oyhr, naq va gur checyr, naq va gur fpneyrg,
naq va gur svar yvara, jvgu phaavat jbex.

39:4 Gurl znqr fubhyqrecvrprf sbe vg, gb pbhcyr vg gbtrgure: ol gur
gjb rqtrf jnf vg pbhcyrq gbtrgure.

39:5 Naq gur phevbhf tveqyr bs uvf rcubq, gung jnf hcba vg, jnf bs gur
fnzr, nppbeqvat gb gur jbex gurerbs; bs tbyq, oyhr, naq checyr, naq
fpneyrg, naq svar gjvarq yvara; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

39:6 Naq gurl jebhtug balk fgbarf vapybfrq va bhpurf bs tbyq, tenira,
nf fvtargf ner tenira, jvgu gur anzrf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

39:7 Naq ur chg gurz ba gur fubhyqref bs gur rcubq, gung gurl fubhyq
or fgbarf sbe n zrzbevny gb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry; nf gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

39:8 Naq ur znqr gur oernfgcyngr bs phaavat jbex, yvxr gur jbex bs gur
rcubq; bs tbyq, oyhr, naq checyr, naq fpneyrg, naq svar gjvarq yvara.

39:9 Vg jnf sbhefdhner; gurl znqr gur oernfgcyngr qbhoyr: n fcna jnf
gur yratgu gurerbs, naq n fcna gur oernqgu gurerbs, orvat qbhoyrq.

39:10 Naq gurl frg va vg sbhe ebjf bs fgbarf: gur svefg ebj jnf n
fneqvhf, n gbcnm, naq n pneohapyr: guvf jnf gur svefg ebj.

39:11 Naq gur frpbaq ebj, na rzrenyq, n fnccuver, naq n qvnzbaq.

39:12 Naq gur guveq ebj, n yvther, na ntngr, naq na nzrgulfg.

39:13 Naq gur sbhegu ebj, n orely, na balk, naq n wnfcre: gurl jrer
vapybfrq va bhpurf bs tbyq va gurve vapybfvatf.

39:14 Naq gur fgbarf jrer nppbeqvat gb gur anzrf bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, gjryir, nppbeqvat gb gurve anzrf, yvxr gur ratenivatf bs n
fvtarg, rirel bar jvgu uvf anzr, nppbeqvat gb gur gjryir gevorf.

39:15 Naq gurl znqr hcba gur oernfgcyngr punvaf ng gur raqf, bs
jerngura jbex bs cher tbyq.

39:16 Naq gurl znqr gjb bhpurf bs tbyq, naq gjb tbyq evatf; naq chg
gur gjb evatf va gur gjb raqf bs gur oernfgcyngr.

39:17 Naq gurl chg gur gjb jerngura punvaf bs tbyq va gur gjb evatf ba
gur raqf bs gur oernfgcyngr.

39:18 Naq gur gjb raqf bs gur gjb jerngura punvaf gurl snfgrarq va gur
gjb bhpurf, naq chg gurz ba gur fubhyqrecvrprf bs gur rcubq, orsber
vg.

39:19 Naq gurl znqr gjb evatf bs tbyq, naq chg gurz ba gur gjb raqf bs
gur oernfgcyngr, hcba gur obeqre bs vg, juvpu jnf ba gur fvqr bs gur
rcubq vajneq.

39:20 Naq gurl znqr gjb bgure tbyqra evatf, naq chg gurz ba gur gjb
fvqrf bs gur rcubq haqrearngu, gbjneq gur sbercneg bs vg, bire ntnvafg
gur bgure pbhcyvat gurerbs, nobir gur phevbhf tveqyr bs gur rcubq.

39:21 Naq gurl qvq ovaq gur oernfgcyngr ol uvf evatf hagb gur evatf bs
gur rcubq jvgu n ynpr bs oyhr, gung vg zvtug or nobir gur phevbhf
tveqyr bs gur rcubq, naq gung gur oernfgcyngr zvtug abg or ybbfrq sebz
gur rcubq; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

39:22 Naq ur znqr gur ebor bs gur rcubq bs jbira jbex, nyy bs oyhr.

39:23 Naq gurer jnf na ubyr va gur zvqfg bs gur ebor, nf gur ubyr bs
na unoretrba, jvgu n onaq ebhaq nobhg gur ubyr, gung vg fubhyq abg
eraq.

39:24 Naq gurl znqr hcba gur urzf bs gur ebor cbzrtenangrf bs oyhr,
naq checyr, naq fpneyrg, naq gjvarq yvara.

39:25 Naq gurl znqr oryyf bs cher tbyq, naq chg gur oryyf orgjrra gur
cbzrtenangrf hcba gur urz bs gur ebor, ebhaq nobhg orgjrra gur
cbzrtenangrf; 39:26 N oryy naq n cbzrtenangr, n oryy naq n
cbzrtenangr, ebhaq nobhg gur urz bs gur ebor gb zvavfgre va; nf gur
YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

39:27 Naq gurl znqr pbngf bs svar yvara bs jbira jbex sbe Nneba, naq
sbe uvf fbaf, 39:28 Naq n zvger bs svar yvara, naq tbbqyl obaargf bs
svar yvara, naq yvara oerrpurf bs svar gjvarq yvara, 39:29 Naq n
tveqyr bs svar gjvarq yvara, naq oyhr, naq checyr, naq fpneyrg, bs
arrqyrjbex; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

39:30 Naq gurl znqr gur cyngr bs gur ubyl pebja bs cher tbyq, naq
jebgr hcba vg n jevgvat, yvxr gb gur ratenivatf bs n fvtarg, UBYVARFF
GB GUR YBEQ.

39:31 Naq gurl gvrq hagb vg n ynpr bs oyhr, gb snfgra vg ba uvtu hcba
gur zvger; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

39:32 Guhf jnf nyy gur jbex bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur grag bs gur
pbatertngvba svavfurq: naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq nppbeqvat gb nyy
gung gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf, fb qvq gurl.

39:33 Naq gurl oebhtug gur gnoreanpyr hagb Zbfrf, gur grag, naq nyy
uvf sheavgher, uvf gnpurf, uvf obneqf, uvf onef, naq uvf cvyynef, naq
uvf fbpxrgf, 39:34 Naq gur pbirevat bs enzf' fxvaf qlrq erq, naq gur
pbirevat bs onqtref' fxvaf, naq gur invy bs gur pbirevat, 39:35 Gur
nex bs gur grfgvzbal, naq gur fgnirf gurerbs, naq gur zrepl frng,
39:36 Gur gnoyr, naq nyy gur irffryf gurerbs, naq gur furjoernq, 39:37
Gur cher pnaqyrfgvpx, jvgu gur ynzcf gurerbs, rira jvgu gur ynzcf gb
or frg va beqre, naq nyy gur irffryf gurerbs, naq gur bvy sbe yvtug,
39:38 Naq gur tbyqra nygne, naq gur nabvagvat bvy, naq gur fjrrg
vaprafr, naq gur unatvat sbe gur gnoreanpyr qbbe, 39:39 Gur oenfra
nygne, naq uvf tengr bs oenff, uvf fgnirf, naq nyy uvf irffryf, gur
ynire naq uvf sbbg, 39:40 Gur unatvatf bs gur pbheg, uvf cvyynef, naq
uvf fbpxrgf, naq gur unatvat sbe gur pbheg tngr, uvf pbeqf, naq uvf
cvaf, naq nyy gur irffryf bs gur freivpr bs gur gnoreanpyr, sbe gur
grag bs gur pbatertngvba, 39:41 Gur pybguf bs freivpr gb qb freivpr va
gur ubyl cynpr, naq gur ubyl tnezragf sbe Nneba gur cevrfg, naq uvf
fbaf' tnezragf, gb zvavfgre va gur cevrfg'f bssvpr.

39:42 Nppbeqvat gb nyy gung gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf, fb gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry znqr nyy gur jbex.

39:43 Naq Zbfrf qvq ybbx hcba nyy gur jbex, naq, orubyq, gurl unq qbar
vg nf gur YBEQ unq pbzznaqrq, rira fb unq gurl qbar vg: naq Zbfrf
oyrffrq gurz.

40:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 40:2 Ba gur svefg qnl bs
gur svefg zbagu funyg gubh frg hc gur gnoreanpyr bs gur grag bs gur
pbatertngvba.

40:3 Naq gubh funyg chg gurerva gur nex bs gur grfgvzbal, naq pbire
gur nex jvgu gur invy.

40:4 Naq gubh funyg oevat va gur gnoyr, naq frg va beqre gur guvatf
gung ner gb or frg va beqre hcba vg; naq gubh funyg oevat va gur
pnaqyrfgvpx, naq yvtug gur ynzcf gurerbs.

40:5 Naq gubh funyg frg gur nygne bs tbyq sbe gur vaprafr orsber gur
nex bs gur grfgvzbal, naq chg gur unatvat bs gur qbbe gb gur
gnoreanpyr.

40:6 Naq gubh funyg frg gur nygne bs gur oheag bssrevat orsber gur
qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur grag bs gur pbatertngvba.

40:7 Naq gubh funyg frg gur ynire orgjrra gur grag bs gur pbatertngvba
naq gur nygne, naq funyg chg jngre gurerva.

40:8 Naq gubh funyg frg hc gur pbheg ebhaq nobhg, naq unat hc gur
unatvat ng gur pbheg tngr.

40:9 Naq gubh funyg gnxr gur nabvagvat bvy, naq nabvag gur gnoreanpyr,
naq nyy gung vf gurerva, naq funyg unyybj vg, naq nyy gur irffryf
gurerbs: naq vg funyy or ubyl.

40:10 Naq gubh funyg nabvag gur nygne bs gur oheag bssrevat, naq nyy
uvf irffryf, naq fnapgvsl gur nygne: naq vg funyy or na nygne zbfg
ubyl.

40:11 Naq gubh funyg nabvag gur ynire naq uvf sbbg, naq fnapgvsl vg.

40:12 Naq gubh funyg oevat Nneba naq uvf fbaf hagb gur qbbe bs gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, naq jnfu gurz jvgu jngre.

40:13 Naq gubh funyg chg hcba Nneba gur ubyl tnezragf, naq nabvag uvz,
naq fnapgvsl uvz; gung ur znl zvavfgre hagb zr va gur cevrfg'f bssvpr.

40:14 Naq gubh funyg oevat uvf fbaf, naq pybgur gurz jvgu pbngf: 40:15
Naq gubh funyg nabvag gurz, nf gubh qvqfg nabvag gurve sngure, gung
gurl znl zvavfgre hagb zr va gur cevrfg'f bssvpr: sbe gurve nabvagvat
funyy fheryl or na rireynfgvat cevrfgubbq guebhtubhg gurve
trarengvbaf.

40:16 Guhf qvq Zbfrf: nppbeqvat gb nyy gung gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq uvz, fb
qvq ur.

40:17 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur svefg zbagu va gur frpbaq lrne, ba
gur svefg qnl bs gur zbagu, gung gur gnoreanpyr jnf ernerq hc.

40:18 Naq Zbfrf ernerq hc gur gnoreanpyr, naq snfgrarq uvf fbpxrgf,
naq frg hc gur obneqf gurerbs, naq chg va gur onef gurerbs, naq ernerq
hc uvf cvyynef.

40:19 Naq ur fcernq noebnq gur grag bire gur gnoreanpyr, naq chg gur
pbirevat bs gur grag nobir hcba vg; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

40:20 Naq ur gbbx naq chg gur grfgvzbal vagb gur nex, naq frg gur
fgnirf ba gur nex, naq chg gur zrepl frng nobir hcba gur nex: 40:21
Naq ur oebhtug gur nex vagb gur gnoreanpyr, naq frg hc gur invy bs gur
pbirevat, naq pbirerq gur nex bs gur grfgvzbal; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq
Zbfrf.

40:22 Naq ur chg gur gnoyr va gur grag bs gur pbatertngvba, hcba gur
fvqr bs gur gnoreanpyr abegujneq, jvgubhg gur invy.

40:23 Naq ur frg gur oernq va beqre hcba vg orsber gur YBEQ; nf gur
YBEQ unq pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

40:24 Naq ur chg gur pnaqyrfgvpx va gur grag bs gur pbatertngvba, bire
ntnvafg gur gnoyr, ba gur fvqr bs gur gnoreanpyr fbhgujneq.

40:25 Naq ur yvtugrq gur ynzcf orsber gur YBEQ; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq
Zbfrf.

40:26 Naq ur chg gur tbyqra nygne va gur grag bs gur pbatertngvba
orsber gur invy: 40:27 Naq ur oheag fjrrg vaprafr gurerba; nf gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

40:28 Naq ur frg hc gur unatvat ng gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr.

40:29 Naq ur chg gur nygne bs oheag bssrevat ol gur qbbe bs gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur grag bs gur pbatertngvba, naq bssrerq hcba vg gur
oheag bssrevat naq gur zrng bssrevat; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

40:30 Naq ur frg gur ynire orgjrra gur grag bs gur pbatertngvba naq
gur nygne, naq chg jngre gurer, gb jnfu jvguny.

40:31 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba naq uvf fbaf jnfurq gurve unaqf naq gurve
srrg gurerng: 40:32 Jura gurl jrag vagb gur grag bs gur pbatertngvba,
naq jura gurl pnzr arne hagb gur nygne, gurl jnfurq; nf gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

40:33 Naq ur ernerq hc gur pbheg ebhaq nobhg gur gnoreanpyr naq gur
nygne, naq frg hc gur unatvat bs gur pbheg tngr. Fb Zbfrf svavfurq gur
jbex.

40:34 Gura n pybhq pbirerq gur grag bs gur pbatertngvba, naq gur tybel
bs gur YBEQ svyyrq gur gnoreanpyr.

40:35 Naq Zbfrf jnf abg noyr gb ragre vagb gur grag bs gur
pbatertngvba, orpnhfr gur pybhq nobqr gurerba, naq gur tybel bs gur
YBEQ svyyrq gur gnoreanpyr.

40:36 Naq jura gur pybhq jnf gnxra hc sebz bire gur gnoreanpyr, gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry jrag bajneq va nyy gurve wbhearlf: 40:37 Ohg vs gur
pybhq jrer abg gnxra hc, gura gurl wbhearlrq abg gvyy gur qnl gung vg
jnf gnxra hc.

40:38 Sbe gur pybhq bs gur YBEQ jnf hcba gur gnoreanpyr ol qnl, naq
sver jnf ba vg ol avtug, va gur fvtug bs nyy gur ubhfr bs Vfenry,
guebhtubhg nyy gurve wbhearlf.




Gur Guveq Obbx bs Zbfrf:  Pnyyrq Yrivgvphf


1:1 Naq gur YBEQ pnyyrq hagb Zbfrf, naq fcnxr hagb uvz bhg bs gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, fnlvat, 1:2 Fcrnx hagb gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Vs nal zna bs lbh oevat na bssrevat hagb
gur YBEQ, lr funyy oevat lbhe bssrevat bs gur pnggyr, rira bs gur
ureq, naq bs gur sybpx.

1:3 Vs uvf bssrevat or n oheag fnpevsvpr bs gur ureq, yrg uvz bssre n
znyr jvgubhg oyrzvfu: ur funyy bssre vg bs uvf bja ibyhagnel jvyy ng
gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba orsber gur YBEQ.

1:4 Naq ur funyy chg uvf unaq hcba gur urnq bs gur oheag bssrevat; naq
vg funyy or npprcgrq sbe uvz gb znxr ngbarzrag sbe uvz.

1:5 Naq ur funyy xvyy gur ohyybpx orsber gur YBEQ: naq gur cevrfgf,
Nneba'f fbaf, funyy oevat gur oybbq, naq fcevaxyr gur oybbq ebhaq
nobhg hcba gur nygne gung vf ol gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba.

1:6 Naq ur funyy synl gur oheag bssrevat, naq phg vg vagb uvf cvrprf.

1:7 Naq gur fbaf bs Nneba gur cevrfg funyy chg sver hcba gur nygne,
naq ynl gur jbbq va beqre hcba gur sver: 1:8 Naq gur cevrfgf, Nneba'f
fbaf, funyy ynl gur cnegf, gur urnq, naq gur sng, va beqre hcba gur
jbbq gung vf ba gur sver juvpu vf hcba gur nygne: 1:9 Ohg uvf vajneqf
naq uvf yrtf funyy ur jnfu va jngre: naq gur cevrfg funyy ohea nyy ba
gur nygne, gb or n oheag fnpevsvpr, na bssrevat znqr ol sver, bs n
fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ.

1:10 Naq vs uvf bssrevat or bs gur sybpxf, anzryl, bs gur furrc, be bs
gur tbngf, sbe n oheag fnpevsvpr; ur funyy oevat vg n znyr jvgubhg
oyrzvfu.

1:11 Naq ur funyy xvyy vg ba gur fvqr bs gur nygne abegujneq orsber
gur YBEQ: naq gur cevrfgf, Nneba'f fbaf, funyy fcevaxyr uvf oybbq
ebhaq nobhg hcba gur nygne.

1:12 Naq ur funyy phg vg vagb uvf cvrprf, jvgu uvf urnq naq uvf sng:
naq gur cevrfg funyy ynl gurz va beqre ba gur jbbq gung vf ba gur sver
juvpu vf hcba gur nygne: 1:13 Ohg ur funyy jnfu gur vajneqf naq gur
yrtf jvgu jngre: naq gur cevrfg funyy oevat vg nyy, naq ohea vg hcba
gur nygne: vg vf n oheag fnpevsvpr, na bssrevat znqr ol sver, bs n
fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ.

1:14 Naq vs gur oheag fnpevsvpr sbe uvf bssrevat gb gur YBEQ or bs
sbjyf, gura ur funyy oevat uvf bssrevat bs ghegyrqbirf, be bs lbhat
cvtrbaf.

1:15 Naq gur cevrfg funyy oevat vg hagb gur nygne, naq jevat bss uvf
urnq, naq ohea vg ba gur nygne; naq gur oybbq gurerbs funyy or jehat
bhg ng gur fvqr bs gur nygne: 1:16 Naq ur funyy cyhpx njnl uvf pebc
jvgu uvf srnguref, naq pnfg vg orfvqr gur nygne ba gur rnfg cneg, ol
gur cynpr bs gur nfurf: 1:17 Naq ur funyy pyrnir vg jvgu gur jvatf
gurerbs, ohg funyy abg qvivqr vg nfhaqre: naq gur cevrfg funyy ohea vg
hcba gur nygne, hcba gur jbbq gung vf hcba gur sver: vg vf n oheag
fnpevsvpr, na bssrevat znqr ol sver, bs n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ.

2:1 Naq jura nal jvyy bssre n zrng bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ, uvf
bssrevat funyy or bs svar sybhe; naq ur funyy cbhe bvy hcba vg, naq
chg senaxvaprafr gurerba: 2:2 Naq ur funyy oevat vg gb Nneba'f fbaf
gur cevrfgf: naq ur funyy gnxr gurerbhg uvf unaqshy bs gur sybhe
gurerbs, naq bs gur bvy gurerbs, jvgu nyy gur senaxvaprafr gurerbs;
naq gur cevrfg funyy ohea gur zrzbevny bs vg hcba gur nygne, gb or na
bssrevat znqr ol sver, bs n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ: 2:3 Naq gur
erzanag bs gur zrng bssrevat funyy or Nneba'f naq uvf fbaf': vg vf n
guvat zbfg ubyl bs gur bssrevatf bs gur YBEQ znqr ol sver.

2:4 Naq vs gubh oevat na boyngvba bs n zrng bssrevat onxra va gur
bira, vg funyy or hayrnirarq pnxrf bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy, be
hayrnirarq jnsref nabvagrq jvgu bvy.

2:5 Naq vs gul boyngvba or n zrng bssrevat onxra va n cna, vg funyy or
bs svar sybhe hayrnirarq, zvatyrq jvgu bvy.

2:6 Gubh funyg cneg vg va cvrprf, naq cbhe bvy gurerba: vg vf n zrng
bssrevat.

2:7 Naq vs gul boyngvba or n zrng bssrevat onxra va gur selvatcna, vg
funyy or znqr bs svar sybhe jvgu bvy.

2:8 Naq gubh funyg oevat gur zrng bssrevat gung vf znqr bs gurfr
guvatf hagb gur YBEQ: naq jura vg vf cerfragrq hagb gur cevrfg, ur
funyy oevat vg hagb gur nygne.

2:9 Naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr sebz gur zrng bssrevat n zrzbevny
gurerbs, naq funyy ohea vg hcba gur nygne: vg vf na bssrevat znqr ol
sver, bs n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ.

2:10 Naq gung juvpu vf yrsg bs gur zrng bssrevat funyy or Nneba'f naq
uvf fbaf': vg vf n guvat zbfg ubyl bs gur bssrevatf bs gur YBEQ znqr
ol sver.

2:11 Ab zrng bssrevat, juvpu lr funyy oevat hagb gur YBEQ, funyy or
znqr jvgu yrnira: sbe lr funyy ohea ab yrnira, abe nal ubarl, va nal
bssrevat bs gur YBEQ znqr ol sver.

2:12 Nf sbe gur boyngvba bs gur svefgsehvgf, lr funyy bssre gurz hagb
gur YBEQ: ohg gurl funyy abg or oheag ba gur nygne sbe n fjrrg fnibhe.

2:13 Naq rirel boyngvba bs gul zrng bssrevat funyg gubh frnfba jvgu
fnyg; arvgure funyg gubh fhssre gur fnyg bs gur pbiranag bs gul Tbq gb
or ynpxvat sebz gul zrng bssrevat: jvgu nyy guvar bssrevatf gubh funyg
bssre fnyg.

2:14 Naq vs gubh bssre n zrng bssrevat bs gul svefgsehvgf hagb gur
YBEQ, gubh funyg bssre sbe gur zrng bssrevat bs gul svefgsehvgf terra
rnef bs pbea qevrq ol gur sver, rira pbea orngra bhg bs shyy rnef.

2:15 Naq gubh funyg chg bvy hcba vg, naq ynl senaxvaprafr gurerba: vg
vf n zrng bssrevat.

2:16 Naq gur cevrfg funyy ohea gur zrzbevny bs vg, cneg bs gur orngra
pbea gurerbs, naq cneg bs gur bvy gurerbs, jvgu nyy gur senaxvaprafr
gurerbs: vg vf na bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ.

3:1 Naq vs uvf boyngvba or n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevat, vs ur bssre
vg bs gur ureq; jurgure vg or n znyr be srznyr, ur funyy bssre vg
jvgubhg oyrzvfu orsber gur YBEQ.

3:2 Naq ur funyy ynl uvf unaq hcba gur urnq bs uvf bssrevat, naq xvyy
vg ng gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba: naq Nneba'f fbaf
gur cevrfgf funyy fcevaxyr gur oybbq hcba gur nygne ebhaq nobhg.

3:3 Naq ur funyy bssre bs gur fnpevsvpr bs gur crnpr bssrevat na
bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ; gur sng gung pbirergu gur
vajneqf, naq nyy gur sng gung vf hcba gur vajneqf, 3:4 Naq gur gjb
xvqarlf, naq gur sng gung vf ba gurz, juvpu vf ol gur synaxf, naq gur
pnhy nobir gur yvire, jvgu gur xvqarlf, vg funyy ur gnxr njnl.

3:5 Naq Nneba'f fbaf funyy ohea vg ba gur nygne hcba gur oheag
fnpevsvpr, juvpu vf hcba gur jbbq gung vf ba gur sver: vg vf na
bssrevat znqr ol sver, bs n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ.

3:6 Naq vs uvf bssrevat sbe n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevat hagb gur
YBEQ or bs gur sybpx; znyr be srznyr, ur funyy bssre vg jvgubhg
oyrzvfu.

3:7 Vs ur bssre n ynzo sbe uvf bssrevat, gura funyy ur bssre vg orsber
gur YBEQ.

3:8 Naq ur funyy ynl uvf unaq hcba gur urnq bs uvf bssrevat, naq xvyy
vg orsber gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba: naq Nneba'f fbaf funyy
fcevaxyr gur oybbq gurerbs ebhaq nobhg hcba gur nygne.

3:9 Naq ur funyy bssre bs gur fnpevsvpr bs gur crnpr bssrevat na
bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ; gur sng gurerbs, naq gur jubyr
ehzc, vg funyy ur gnxr bss uneq ol gur onpxobar; naq gur sng gung
pbirergu gur vajneqf, naq nyy gur sng gung vf hcba gur vajneqf, 3:10
Naq gur gjb xvqarlf, naq gur sng gung vf hcba gurz, juvpu vf ol gur
synaxf, naq gur pnhy nobir gur yvire, jvgu gur xvqarlf, vg funyy ur
gnxr njnl.
