3:11 Naq gur cevrfg funyy ohea vg hcba gur nygne: vg vf gur sbbq bs
gur bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ.

3:12 Naq vs uvf bssrevat or n tbng, gura ur funyy bssre vg orsber gur
YBEQ.

3:13 Naq ur funyy ynl uvf unaq hcba gur urnq bs vg, naq xvyy vg orsber
gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba: naq gur fbaf bs Nneba funyy
fcevaxyr gur oybbq gurerbs hcba gur nygne ebhaq nobhg.

3:14 Naq ur funyy bssre gurerbs uvf bssrevat, rira na bssrevat znqr ol
sver hagb gur YBEQ; gur sng gung pbirergu gur vajneqf, naq nyy gur sng
gung vf hcba gur vajneqf, 3:15 Naq gur gjb xvqarlf, naq gur sng gung
vf hcba gurz, juvpu vf ol gur synaxf, naq gur pnhy nobir gur yvire,
jvgu gur xvqarlf, vg funyy ur gnxr njnl.

3:16 Naq gur cevrfg funyy ohea gurz hcba gur nygne: vg vf gur sbbq bs
gur bssrevat znqr ol sver sbe n fjrrg fnibhe: nyy gur sng vf gur
YBEQ'f.

3:17 Vg funyy or n crecrghny fgnghgr sbe lbhe trarengvbaf guebhtubhg
nyy lbhe qjryyvatf, gung lr rng arvgure sng abe oybbq.

4:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 4:2 Fcrnx hagb gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Vs n fbhy funyy fva guebhtu vtabenapr ntnvafg nal
bs gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ pbapreavat guvatf juvpu bhtug abg gb
or qbar, naq funyy qb ntnvafg nal bs gurz: 4:3 Vs gur cevrfg gung vf
nabvagrq qb fva nppbeqvat gb gur fva bs gur crbcyr; gura yrg uvz oevat
sbe uvf fva, juvpu ur ungu fvaarq, n lbhat ohyybpx jvgubhg oyrzvfu
hagb gur YBEQ sbe n fva bssrevat.

4:4 Naq ur funyy oevat gur ohyybpx hagb gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs
gur pbatertngvba orsber gur YBEQ; naq funyy ynl uvf unaq hcba gur
ohyybpx'f urnq, naq xvyy gur ohyybpx orsber gur YBEQ.

4:5 Naq gur cevrfg gung vf nabvagrq funyy gnxr bs gur ohyybpx'f oybbq,
naq oevat vg gb gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba: 4:6 Naq gur cevrfg
funyy qvc uvf svatre va gur oybbq, naq fcevaxyr bs gur oybbq frira
gvzrf orsber gur YBEQ, orsber gur invy bs gur fnapghnel.

4:7 Naq gur cevrfg funyy chg fbzr bs gur oybbq hcba gur ubeaf bs gur
nygne bs fjrrg vaprafr orsber gur YBEQ, juvpu vf va gur gnoreanpyr bs
gur pbatertngvba; naq funyy cbhe nyy gur oybbq bs gur ohyybpx ng gur
obggbz bs gur nygne bs gur oheag bssrevat, juvpu vf ng gur qbbe bs gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

4:8 Naq ur funyy gnxr bss sebz vg nyy gur sng bs gur ohyybpx sbe gur
fva bssrevat; gur sng gung pbirergu gur vajneqf, naq nyy gur sng gung
vf hcba gur vajneqf, 4:9 Naq gur gjb xvqarlf, naq gur sng gung vf hcba
gurz, juvpu vf ol gur synaxf, naq gur pnhy nobir gur yvire, jvgu gur
xvqarlf, vg funyy ur gnxr njnl, 4:10 Nf vg jnf gnxra bss sebz gur
ohyybpx bs gur fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevatf: naq gur cevrfg funyy ohea
gurz hcba gur nygne bs gur oheag bssrevat.

4:11 Naq gur fxva bs gur ohyybpx, naq nyy uvf syrfu, jvgu uvf urnq,
naq jvgu uvf yrtf, naq uvf vajneqf, naq uvf qhat, 4:12 Rira gur jubyr
ohyybpx funyy ur pneel sbegu jvgubhg gur pnzc hagb n pyrna cynpr,
jurer gur nfurf ner cbherq bhg, naq ohea uvz ba gur jbbq jvgu sver:
jurer gur nfurf ner cbherq bhg funyy ur or oheag.

4:13 Naq vs gur jubyr pbatertngvba bs Vfenry fva guebhtu vtabenapr,
naq gur guvat or uvq sebz gur rlrf bs gur nffrzoyl, naq gurl unir qbar
fbzrjung ntnvafg nal bs gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ pbapreavat guvatf
juvpu fubhyq abg or qbar, naq ner thvygl; 4:14 Jura gur fva, juvpu
gurl unir fvaarq ntnvafg vg, vf xabja, gura gur pbatertngvba funyy
bssre n lbhat ohyybpx sbe gur fva, naq oevat uvz orsber gur gnoreanpyr
bs gur pbatertngvba.

4:15 Naq gur ryqref bs gur pbatertngvba funyy ynl gurve unaqf hcba gur
urnq bs gur ohyybpx orsber gur YBEQ: naq gur ohyybpx funyy or xvyyrq
orsber gur YBEQ.

4:16 Naq gur cevrfg gung vf nabvagrq funyy oevat bs gur ohyybpx'f
oybbq gb gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba: 4:17 Naq gur cevrfg funyy
qvc uvf svatre va fbzr bs gur oybbq, naq fcevaxyr vg frira gvzrf
orsber gur YBEQ, rira orsber gur invy.

4:18 Naq ur funyy chg fbzr bs gur oybbq hcba gur ubeaf bs gur nygne
juvpu vf orsber gur YBEQ, gung vf va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, naq funyy cbhe bhg nyy gur oybbq ng gur obggbz bs gur
nygne bs gur oheag bssrevat, juvpu vf ng gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs
gur pbatertngvba.

4:19 Naq ur funyy gnxr nyy uvf sng sebz uvz, naq ohea vg hcba gur
nygne.

4:20 Naq ur funyy qb jvgu gur ohyybpx nf ur qvq jvgu gur ohyybpx sbe n
fva bssrevat, fb funyy ur qb jvgu guvf: naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na
ngbarzrag sbe gurz, naq vg funyy or sbetvira gurz.

4:21 Naq ur funyy pneel sbegu gur ohyybpx jvgubhg gur pnzc, naq ohea
uvz nf ur ohearq gur svefg ohyybpx: vg vf n fva bssrevat sbe gur
pbatertngvba.

4:22 Jura n ehyre ungu fvaarq, naq qbar fbzrjung guebhtu vtabenapr
ntnvafg nal bs gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ uvf Tbq pbapreavat guvatf
juvpu fubhyq abg or qbar, naq vf thvygl; 4:23 Be vs uvf fva, jurerva
ur ungu fvaarq, pbzr gb uvf xabjyrqtr; ur funyy oevat uvf bssrevat, n
xvq bs gur tbngf, n znyr jvgubhg oyrzvfu: 4:24 Naq ur funyy ynl uvf
unaq hcba gur urnq bs gur tbng, naq xvyy vg va gur cynpr jurer gurl
xvyy gur oheag bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ: vg vf n fva bssrevat.

4:25 Naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr bs gur oybbq bs gur fva bssrevat jvgu
uvf svatre, naq chg vg hcba gur ubeaf bs gur nygne bs oheag bssrevat,
naq funyy cbhe bhg uvf oybbq ng gur obggbz bs gur nygne bs oheag
bssrevat.

4:26 Naq ur funyy ohea nyy uvf sng hcba gur nygne, nf gur sng bs gur
fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevatf: naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag
sbe uvz nf pbapreavat uvf fva, naq vg funyy or sbetvira uvz.

4:27 Naq vs nal bar bs gur pbzzba crbcyr fva guebhtu vtabenapr, juvyr
ur qbrgu fbzrjung ntnvafg nal bs gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ
pbapreavat guvatf juvpu bhtug abg gb or qbar, naq or thvygl; 4:28 Be
vs uvf fva, juvpu ur ungu fvaarq, pbzr gb uvf xabjyrqtr: gura ur funyy
oevat uvf bssrevat, n xvq bs gur tbngf, n srznyr jvgubhg oyrzvfu, sbe
uvf fva juvpu ur ungu fvaarq.

4:29 Naq ur funyy ynl uvf unaq hcba gur urnq bs gur fva bssrevat, naq
fynl gur fva bssrevat va gur cynpr bs gur oheag bssrevat.

4:30 Naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr bs gur oybbq gurerbs jvgu uvf svatre,
naq chg vg hcba gur ubeaf bs gur nygne bs oheag bssrevat, naq funyy
cbhe bhg nyy gur oybbq gurerbs ng gur obggbz bs gur nygne.

4:31 Naq ur funyy gnxr njnl nyy gur sng gurerbs, nf gur sng vf gnxra
njnl sebz bss gur fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevatf; naq gur cevrfg funyy
ohea vg hcba gur nygne sbe n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ; naq gur
cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe uvz, naq vg funyy or sbetvira uvz.

4:32 Naq vs ur oevat n ynzo sbe n fva bssrevat, ur funyy oevat vg n
srznyr jvgubhg oyrzvfu.

4:33 Naq ur funyy ynl uvf unaq hcba gur urnq bs gur fva bssrevat, naq
fynl vg sbe n fva bssrevat va gur cynpr jurer gurl xvyy gur oheag
bssrevat.

4:34 Naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr bs gur oybbq bs gur fva bssrevat jvgu
uvf svatre, naq chg vg hcba gur ubeaf bs gur nygne bs oheag bssrevat,
naq funyy cbhe bhg nyy gur oybbq gurerbs ng gur obggbz bs gur nygne:
4:35 Naq ur funyy gnxr njnl nyy gur sng gurerbs, nf gur sng bs gur
ynzo vf gnxra njnl sebz gur fnpevsvpr bs gur crnpr bssrevatf; naq gur
cevrfg funyy ohea gurz hcba gur nygne, nppbeqvat gb gur bssrevatf znqr
ol sver hagb gur YBEQ: naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe uvf
fva gung ur ungu pbzzvggrq, naq vg funyy or sbetvira uvz.

5:1 Naq vs n fbhy fva, naq urne gur ibvpr bs fjrnevat, naq vf n
jvgarff, jurgure ur ungu frra be xabja bs vg; vs ur qb abg hggre vg,
gura ur funyy orne uvf vavdhvgl.

5:2 Be vs n fbhy gbhpu nal hapyrna guvat, jurgure vg or n pnepnfr bs
na hapyrna ornfg, be n pnepnfr bs hapyrna pnggyr, be gur pnepnfr bs
hapyrna perrcvat guvatf, naq vs vg or uvqqra sebz uvz; ur nyfb funyy
or hapyrna, naq thvygl.

5:3 Be vs ur gbhpu gur hapyrnaarff bs zna, jungfbrire hapyrnaarff vg
or gung n zna funyy or qrsvyrq jvguny, naq vg or uvq sebz uvz; jura ur
xabjrgu bs vg, gura ur funyy or thvygl.

5:4 Be vs n fbhy fjrne, cebabhapvat jvgu uvf yvcf gb qb rivy, be gb qb
tbbq, jungfbrire vg or gung n zna funyy cebabhapr jvgu na bngu, naq vg
or uvq sebz uvz; jura ur xabjrgu bs vg, gura ur funyy or thvygl va bar
bs gurfr.

5:5 Naq vg funyy or, jura ur funyy or thvygl va bar bs gurfr guvatf,
gung ur funyy pbasrff gung ur ungu fvaarq va gung guvat: 5:6 Naq ur
funyy oevat uvf gerfcnff bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ sbe uvf fva juvpu ur
ungu fvaarq, n srznyr sebz gur sybpx, n ynzo be n xvq bs gur tbngf,
sbe n fva bssrevat; naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe uvz
pbapreavat uvf fva.

5:7 Naq vs ur or abg noyr gb oevat n ynzo, gura ur funyy oevat sbe uvf
gerfcnff, juvpu ur ungu pbzzvggrq, gjb ghegyrqbirf, be gjb lbhat
cvtrbaf, hagb gur YBEQ; bar sbe n fva bssrevat, naq gur bgure sbe n
oheag bssrevat.

5:8 Naq ur funyy oevat gurz hagb gur cevrfg, jub funyy bssre gung
juvpu vf sbe gur fva bssrevat svefg, naq jevat bss uvf urnq sebz uvf
arpx, ohg funyy abg qvivqr vg nfhaqre: 5:9 Naq ur funyy fcevaxyr bs
gur oybbq bs gur fva bssrevat hcba gur fvqr bs gur nygne; naq gur erfg
bs gur oybbq funyy or jehat bhg ng gur obggbz bs gur nygne: vg vf n
fva bssrevat.

5:10 Naq ur funyy bssre gur frpbaq sbe n oheag bssrevat, nppbeqvat gb
gur znaare: naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe uvz sbe uvf fva
juvpu ur ungu fvaarq, naq vg funyy or sbetvira uvz.

5:11 Ohg vs ur or abg noyr gb oevat gjb ghegyrqbirf, be gjb lbhat
cvtrbaf, gura ur gung fvaarq funyy oevat sbe uvf bssrevat gur gragu
cneg bs na rcunu bs svar sybhe sbe n fva bssrevat; ur funyy chg ab bvy
hcba vg, arvgure funyy ur chg nal senaxvaprafr gurerba: sbe vg vf n
fva bssrevat.

5:12 Gura funyy ur oevat vg gb gur cevrfg, naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr
uvf unaqshy bs vg, rira n zrzbevny gurerbs, naq ohea vg ba gur nygne,
nppbeqvat gb gur bssrevatf znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ: vg vf n fva
bssrevat.

5:13 Naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe uvz nf gbhpuvat uvf
fva gung ur ungu fvaarq va bar bs gurfr, naq vg funyy or sbetvira uvz:
naq gur erzanag funyy or gur cevrfg'f, nf n zrng bssrevat.

5:14 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 5:15 Vs n fbhy pbzzvg n
gerfcnff, naq fva guebhtu vtabenapr, va gur ubyl guvatf bs gur YBEQ;
gura ur funyy oevat sbe uvf gerfcnff hagb gur YBEQ n enz jvgubhg
oyrzvfu bhg bs gur sybpxf, jvgu gul rfgvzngvba ol furxryf bs fvyire,
nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel, sbe n gerfcnff bssrevat.

5:16 Naq ur funyy znxr nzraqf sbe gur unez gung ur ungu qbar va gur
ubyl guvat, naq funyy nqq gur svsgu cneg gurergb, naq tvir vg hagb gur
cevrfg: naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe uvz jvgu gur enz bs
gur gerfcnff bssrevat, naq vg funyy or sbetvira uvz.

5:17 Naq vs n fbhy fva, naq pbzzvg nal bs gurfr guvatf juvpu ner
sbeovqqra gb or qbar ol gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ; gubhtu ur jvfg
vg abg, lrg vf ur thvygl, naq funyy orne uvf vavdhvgl.

5:18 Naq ur funyy oevat n enz jvgubhg oyrzvfu bhg bs gur sybpx, jvgu
gul rfgvzngvba, sbe n gerfcnff bssrevat, hagb gur cevrfg: naq gur
cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe uvz pbapreavat uvf vtabenapr
jurerva ur reerq naq jvfg vg abg, naq vg funyy or sbetvira uvz.

5:19 Vg vf n gerfcnff bssrevat: ur ungu pregnvayl gerfcnffrq ntnvafg
gur YBEQ.

6:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 6:2 Vs n fbhy fva, naq
pbzzvg n gerfcnff ntnvafg gur YBEQ, naq yvr hagb uvf arvtuobhe va gung
juvpu jnf qryvirerq uvz gb xrrc, be va sryybjfuvc, be va n guvat gnxra
njnl ol ivbyrapr, be ungu qrprvirq uvf arvtuobhe; 6:3 Be unir sbhaq
gung juvpu jnf ybfg, naq yvrgu pbapreavat vg, naq fjrnergu snyfryl; va
nal bs nyy gurfr gung n zna qbrgu, fvaavat gurerva: 6:4 Gura vg funyy
or, orpnhfr ur ungu fvaarq, naq vf thvygl, gung ur funyy erfgber gung
juvpu ur gbbx ivbyragyl njnl, be gur guvat juvpu ur ungu qrprvgshyyl
tbggra, be gung juvpu jnf qryvirerq uvz gb xrrc, be gur ybfg guvat
juvpu ur sbhaq, 6:5 Be nyy gung nobhg juvpu ur ungu fjbea snyfryl; ur
funyy rira erfgber vg va gur cevapvcny, naq funyy nqq gur svsgu cneg
zber gurergb, naq tvir vg hagb uvz gb jubz vg nccregnvargu, va gur qnl
bs uvf gerfcnff bssrevat.

6:6 Naq ur funyy oevat uvf gerfcnff bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ, n enz
jvgubhg oyrzvfu bhg bs gur sybpx, jvgu gul rfgvzngvba, sbe n gerfcnff
bssrevat, hagb gur cevrfg: 6:7 Naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag
sbe uvz orsber gur YBEQ: naq vg funyy or sbetvira uvz sbe nal guvat bs
nyy gung ur ungu qbar va gerfcnffvat gurerva.

6:8 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 6:9 Pbzznaq Nneba naq uvf
fbaf, fnlvat, Guvf vf gur ynj bs gur oheag bssrevat: Vg vf gur oheag
bssrevat, orpnhfr bs gur oheavat hcba gur nygne nyy avtug hagb gur
zbeavat, naq gur sver bs gur nygne funyy or oheavat va vg.

6:10 Naq gur cevrfg funyy chg ba uvf yvara tnezrag, naq uvf yvara
oerrpurf funyy ur chg hcba uvf syrfu, naq gnxr hc gur nfurf juvpu gur
sver ungu pbafhzrq jvgu gur oheag bssrevat ba gur nygne, naq ur funyy
chg gurz orfvqr gur nygne.

6:11 Naq ur funyy chg bss uvf tnezragf, naq chg ba bgure tnezragf, naq
pneel sbegu gur nfurf jvgubhg gur pnzc hagb n pyrna cynpr.

6:12 Naq gur sver hcba gur nygne funyy or oheavat va vg; vg funyy abg
or chg bhg: naq gur cevrfg funyy ohea jbbq ba vg rirel zbeavat, naq
ynl gur oheag bssrevat va beqre hcba vg; naq ur funyy ohea gurerba gur
sng bs gur crnpr bssrevatf.

6:13 Gur sver funyy rire or oheavat hcba gur nygne; vg funyy arire tb
bhg.

6:14 Naq guvf vf gur ynj bs gur zrng bssrevat: gur fbaf bs Nneba funyy
bssre vg orsber gur YBEQ, orsber gur nygne.

6:15 Naq ur funyy gnxr bs vg uvf unaqshy, bs gur sybhe bs gur zrng
bssrevat, naq bs gur bvy gurerbs, naq nyy gur senaxvaprafr juvpu vf
hcba gur zrng bssrevat, naq funyy ohea vg hcba gur nygne sbe n fjrrg
fnibhe, rira gur zrzbevny bs vg, hagb gur YBEQ.

6:16 Naq gur erznvaqre gurerbs funyy Nneba naq uvf fbaf rng: jvgu
hayrnirarq oernq funyy vg or rngra va gur ubyl cynpr; va gur pbheg bs
gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba gurl funyy rng vg.

6:17 Vg funyy abg or onxra jvgu yrnira. V unir tvira vg hagb gurz sbe
gurve cbegvba bs zl bssrevatf znqr ol sver; vg vf zbfg ubyl, nf vf gur
fva bssrevat, naq nf gur gerfcnff bssrevat.

6:18 Nyy gur znyrf nzbat gur puvyqera bs Nneba funyy rng bs vg. Vg
funyy or n fgnghgr sbe rire va lbhe trarengvbaf pbapreavat gur
bssrevatf bs gur YBEQ znqr ol sver: rirel bar gung gbhpurgu gurz funyy
or ubyl.

6:19 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 6:20 Guvf vf gur bssrevat
bs Nneba naq bs uvf fbaf, juvpu gurl funyy bssre hagb gur YBEQ va gur
qnl jura ur vf nabvagrq; gur gragu cneg bs na rcunu bs svar sybhe sbe
n zrng bssrevat crecrghny, unys bs vg va gur zbeavat, naq unys gurerbs
ng avtug.

6:21 Va n cna vg funyy or znqr jvgu bvy; naq jura vg vf onxra, gubh
funyg oevat vg va: naq gur onxra cvrprf bs gur zrng bssrevat funyg
gubh bssre sbe n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ.

6:22 Naq gur cevrfg bs uvf fbaf gung vf nabvagrq va uvf fgrnq funyy
bssre vg: vg vf n fgnghgr sbe rire hagb gur YBEQ; vg funyy or jubyyl
oheag.

6:23 Sbe rirel zrng bssrevat sbe gur cevrfg funyy or jubyyl oheag: vg
funyy abg or rngra.

6:24 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 6:25 Fcrnx hagb Nneba naq
gb uvf fbaf, fnlvat, Guvf vf gur ynj bs gur fva bssrevat: Va gur cynpr
jurer gur oheag bssrevat vf xvyyrq funyy gur fva bssrevat or xvyyrq
orsber gur YBEQ: vg vf zbfg ubyl.

6:26 Gur cevrfg gung bssrergu vg sbe fva funyy rng vg: va gur ubyl
cynpr funyy vg or rngra, va gur pbheg bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba.

6:27 Jungfbrire funyy gbhpu gur syrfu gurerbs funyy or ubyl: naq jura
gurer vf fcevaxyrq bs gur oybbq gurerbs hcba nal tnezrag, gubh funyg
jnfu gung jurerba vg jnf fcevaxyrq va gur ubyl cynpr.

6:28 Ohg gur rnegura irffry jurerva vg vf fbqqra funyy or oebxra: naq
vs vg or fbqqra va n oenfra cbg, vg funyy or obgu fpbherq, naq evafrq
va jngre.

6:29 Nyy gur znyrf nzbat gur cevrfgf funyy rng gurerbs: vg vf zbfg
ubyl.

6:30 Naq ab fva bssrevat, jurerbs nal bs gur oybbq vf oebhtug vagb gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba gb erpbapvyr jvguny va gur ubyl cynpr,
funyy or rngra: vg funyy or oheag va gur sver.

7:1 Yvxrjvfr guvf vf gur ynj bs gur gerfcnff bssrevat: vg vf zbfg
ubyl.

7:2 Va gur cynpr jurer gurl xvyy gur oheag bssrevat funyy gurl xvyy
gur gerfcnff bssrevat: naq gur oybbq gurerbs funyy ur fcevaxyr ebhaq
nobhg hcba gur nygne.

7:3 Naq ur funyy bssre bs vg nyy gur sng gurerbs; gur ehzc, naq gur
sng gung pbirergu gur vajneqf, 7:4 Naq gur gjb xvqarlf, naq gur sng
gung vf ba gurz, juvpu vf ol gur synaxf, naq gur pnhy gung vf nobir
gur yvire, jvgu gur xvqarlf, vg funyy ur gnxr njnl: 7:5 Naq gur cevrfg
funyy ohea gurz hcba gur nygne sbe na bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur
YBEQ: vg vf n gerfcnff bssrevat.

7:6 Rirel znyr nzbat gur cevrfgf funyy rng gurerbs: vg funyy or rngra
va gur ubyl cynpr: vg vf zbfg ubyl.

7:7 Nf gur fva bssrevat vf, fb vf gur gerfcnff bssrevat: gurer vf bar
ynj sbe gurz: gur cevrfg gung znxrgu ngbarzrag gurerjvgu funyy unir
vg.

7:8 Naq gur cevrfg gung bssrergu nal zna'f oheag bssrevat, rira gur
cevrfg funyy unir gb uvzfrys gur fxva bs gur oheag bssrevat juvpu ur
ungu bssrerq.

7:9 Naq nyy gur zrng bssrevat gung vf onxra va gur bira, naq nyy gung
vf qerffrq va gur selvatcna, naq va gur cna, funyy or gur cevrfg'f
gung bssrergu vg.

7:10 Naq rirel zrng bssrevat, zvatyrq jvgu bvy, naq qel, funyy nyy gur
fbaf bs Nneba unir, bar nf zhpu nf nabgure.

7:11 Naq guvf vf gur ynj bs gur fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevatf, juvpu ur
funyy bssre hagb gur YBEQ.

7:12 Vs ur bssre vg sbe n gunaxftvivat, gura ur funyy bssre jvgu gur
fnpevsvpr bs gunaxftvivat hayrnirarq pnxrf zvatyrq jvgu bvy, naq
hayrnirarq jnsref nabvagrq jvgu bvy, naq pnxrf zvatyrq jvgu bvy, bs
svar sybhe, sevrq.

7:13 Orfvqrf gur pnxrf, ur funyy bssre sbe uvf bssrevat yrnirarq oernq
jvgu gur fnpevsvpr bs gunaxftvivat bs uvf crnpr bssrevatf.

7:14 Naq bs vg ur funyy bssre bar bhg bs gur jubyr boyngvba sbe na
urnir bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ, naq vg funyy or gur cevrfg'f gung
fcevaxyrgu gur oybbq bs gur crnpr bssrevatf.

7:15 Naq gur syrfu bs gur fnpevsvpr bs uvf crnpr bssrevatf sbe
gunaxftvivat funyy or rngra gur fnzr qnl gung vg vf bssrerq; ur funyy
abg yrnir nal bs vg hagvy gur zbeavat.

7:16 Ohg vs gur fnpevsvpr bs uvf bssrevat or n ibj, be n ibyhagnel
bssrevat, vg funyy or rngra gur fnzr qnl gung ur bssrergu uvf
fnpevsvpr: naq ba gur zbeebj nyfb gur erznvaqre bs vg funyy or rngra:
7:17 Ohg gur erznvaqre bs gur syrfu bs gur fnpevsvpr ba gur guveq qnl
funyy or oheag jvgu sver.

7:18 Naq vs nal bs gur syrfu bs gur fnpevsvpr bs uvf crnpr bssrevatf
or rngra ng nyy ba gur guveq qnl, vg funyy abg or npprcgrq, arvgure
funyy vg or vzchgrq hagb uvz gung bssrergu vg: vg funyy or na
nobzvangvba, naq gur fbhy gung rngrgu bs vg funyy orne uvf vavdhvgl.

7:19 Naq gur syrfu gung gbhpurgu nal hapyrna guvat funyy abg or rngra;
vg funyy or oheag jvgu sver: naq nf sbe gur syrfu, nyy gung or pyrna
funyy rng gurerbs.

7:20 Ohg gur fbhy gung rngrgu bs gur syrfu bs gur fnpevsvpr bs crnpr
bssrevatf, gung cregnva hagb gur YBEQ, univat uvf hapyrnaarff hcba
uvz, rira gung fbhy funyy or phg bss sebz uvf crbcyr.

7:21 Zberbire gur fbhy gung funyy gbhpu nal hapyrna guvat, nf gur
hapyrnaarff bs zna, be nal hapyrna ornfg, be nal nobzvanoyr hapyrna
guvat, naq rng bs gur syrfu bs gur fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevatf, juvpu
cregnva hagb gur YBEQ, rira gung fbhy funyy or phg bss sebz uvf
crbcyr.

7:22 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 7:23 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Lr funyy rng ab znaare bs sng, bs bk, be
bs furrc, be bs tbng.

7:24 Naq gur sng bs gur ornfg gung qvrgu bs vgfrys, naq gur sng bs
gung juvpu vf gbea jvgu ornfgf, znl or hfrq va nal bgure hfr: ohg lr
funyy va ab jvfr rng bs vg.

7:25 Sbe jubfbrire rngrgu gur sng bs gur ornfg, bs juvpu zra bssre na
bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ, rira gur fbhy gung rngrgu vg
funyy or phg bss sebz uvf crbcyr.

7:26 Zberbire lr funyy rng ab znaare bs oybbq, jurgure vg or bs sbjy
be bs ornfg, va nal bs lbhe qjryyvatf.

7:27 Jungfbrire fbhy vg or gung rngrgu nal znaare bs oybbq, rira gung
fbhy funyy or phg bss sebz uvf crbcyr.

7:28 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 7:29 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Ur gung bssrergu gur fnpevsvpr bs uvf
crnpr bssrevatf hagb gur YBEQ funyy oevat uvf boyngvba hagb gur YBEQ
bs gur fnpevsvpr bs uvf crnpr bssrevatf.

7:30 Uvf bja unaqf funyy oevat gur bssrevatf bs gur YBEQ znqr ol sver,
gur sng jvgu gur oernfg, vg funyy ur oevat, gung gur oernfg znl or
jnirq sbe n jnir bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ.

7:31 Naq gur cevrfg funyy ohea gur sng hcba gur nygne: ohg gur oernfg
funyy or Nneba'f naq uvf fbaf'.

7:32 Naq gur evtug fubhyqre funyy lr tvir hagb gur cevrfg sbe na urnir
bssrevat bs gur fnpevsvprf bs lbhe crnpr bssrevatf.

7:33 Ur nzbat gur fbaf bs Nneba, gung bssrergu gur oybbq bs gur crnpr
bssrevatf, naq gur sng, funyy unir gur evtug fubhyqre sbe uvf cneg.

7:34 Sbe gur jnir oernfg naq gur urnir fubhyqre unir V gnxra bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry sebz bss gur fnpevsvprf bs gurve crnpr bssrevatf,
naq unir tvira gurz hagb Nneba gur cevrfg naq hagb uvf fbaf ol n
fgnghgr sbe rire sebz nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

7:35 Guvf vf gur cbegvba bs gur nabvagvat bs Nneba, naq bs gur
nabvagvat bs uvf fbaf, bhg bs gur bssrevatf bs gur YBEQ znqr ol sver,
va gur qnl jura ur cerfragrq gurz gb zvavfgre hagb gur YBEQ va gur
cevrfg'f bssvpr; 7:36 Juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq gb or tvira gurz bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, va gur qnl gung ur nabvagrq gurz, ol n fgnghgr sbe
rire guebhtubhg gurve trarengvbaf.

7:37 Guvf vf gur ynj bs gur oheag bssrevat, bs gur zrng bssrevat, naq
bs gur fva bssrevat, naq bs gur gerfcnff bssrevat, naq bs gur
pbafrpengvbaf, naq bs gur fnpevsvpr bs gur crnpr bssrevatf; 7:38 Juvpu
gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf va zbhag Fvanv, va gur qnl gung ur pbzznaqrq
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gb bssre gurve boyngvbaf hagb gur YBEQ, va gur
jvyqrearff bs Fvanv.

8:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 8:2 Gnxr Nneba naq uvf fbaf
jvgu uvz, naq gur tnezragf, naq gur nabvagvat bvy, naq n ohyybpx sbe
gur fva bssrevat, naq gjb enzf, naq n onfxrg bs hayrnirarq oernq; 8:3
Naq tngure gubh nyy gur pbatertngvba gbtrgure hagb gur qbbe bs gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

8:4 Naq Zbfrf qvq nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq uvz; naq gur nffrzoyl jnf
tngurerq gbtrgure hagb gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

8:5 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gur pbatertngvba, Guvf vf gur guvat juvpu gur
YBEQ pbzznaqrq gb or qbar.

8:6 Naq Zbfrf oebhtug Nneba naq uvf fbaf, naq jnfurq gurz jvgu jngre.

8:7 Naq ur chg hcba uvz gur pbng, naq tveqrq uvz jvgu gur tveqyr, naq
pybgurq uvz jvgu gur ebor, naq chg gur rcubq hcba uvz, naq ur tveqrq
uvz jvgu gur phevbhf tveqyr bs gur rcubq, naq obhaq vg hagb uvz
gurerjvgu.

8:8 Naq ur chg gur oernfgcyngr hcba uvz: nyfb ur chg va gur
oernfgcyngr gur Hevz naq gur Guhzzvz.

8:9 Naq ur chg gur zvger hcba uvf urnq; nyfb hcba gur zvger, rira hcba
uvf sbersebag, qvq ur chg gur tbyqra cyngr, gur ubyl pebja; nf gur
YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

8:10 Naq Zbfrf gbbx gur nabvagvat bvy, naq nabvagrq gur gnoreanpyr naq
nyy gung jnf gurerva, naq fnapgvsvrq gurz.

8:11 Naq ur fcevaxyrq gurerbs hcba gur nygne frira gvzrf, naq nabvagrq
gur nygne naq nyy uvf irffryf, obgu gur ynire naq uvf sbbg, gb
fnapgvsl gurz.

8:12 Naq ur cbherq bs gur nabvagvat bvy hcba Nneba'f urnq, naq
nabvagrq uvz, gb fnapgvsl uvz.

8:13 Naq Zbfrf oebhtug Nneba'f fbaf, naq chg pbngf hcba gurz, naq
tveqrq gurz jvgu tveqyrf, naq chg obaargf hcba gurz; nf gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

8:14 Naq ur oebhtug gur ohyybpx sbe gur fva bssrevat: naq Nneba naq
uvf fbaf ynvq gurve unaqf hcba gur urnq bs gur ohyybpx sbe gur fva
bssrevat.

8:15 Naq ur fyrj vg; naq Zbfrf gbbx gur oybbq, naq chg vg hcba gur
ubeaf bs gur nygne ebhaq nobhg jvgu uvf svatre, naq chevsvrq gur
nygne, naq cbherq gur oybbq ng gur obggbz bs gur nygne, naq fnapgvsvrq
vg, gb znxr erpbapvyvngvba hcba vg.

8:16 Naq ur gbbx nyy gur sng gung jnf hcba gur vajneqf, naq gur pnhy
nobir gur yvire, naq gur gjb xvqarlf, naq gurve sng, naq Zbfrf ohearq
vg hcba gur nygne.

8:17 Ohg gur ohyybpx, naq uvf uvqr, uvf syrfu, naq uvf qhat, ur oheag
jvgu sver jvgubhg gur pnzc; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

8:18 Naq ur oebhtug gur enz sbe gur oheag bssrevat: naq Nneba naq uvf
fbaf ynvq gurve unaqf hcba gur urnq bs gur enz.

8:19 Naq ur xvyyrq vg; naq Zbfrf fcevaxyrq gur oybbq hcba gur nygne
ebhaq nobhg.

8:20 Naq ur phg gur enz vagb cvrprf; naq Zbfrf oheag gur urnq, naq gur
cvrprf, naq gur sng.

8:21 Naq ur jnfurq gur vajneqf naq gur yrtf va jngre; naq Zbfrf oheag
gur jubyr enz hcba gur nygne: vg jnf n oheag fnpevsvpr sbe n fjrrg
fnibhe, naq na bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ; nf gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

8:22 Naq ur oebhtug gur bgure enz, gur enz bs pbafrpengvba: naq Nneba
naq uvf fbaf ynvq gurve unaqf hcba gur urnq bs gur enz.

8:23 Naq ur fyrj vg; naq Zbfrf gbbx bs gur oybbq bs vg, naq chg vg
hcba gur gvc bs Nneba'f evtug rne, naq hcba gur guhzo bs uvf evtug
unaq, naq hcba gur terng gbr bs uvf evtug sbbg.

8:24 Naq ur oebhtug Nneba'f fbaf, naq Zbfrf chg bs gur oybbq hcba gur
gvc bs gurve evtug rne, naq hcba gur guhzof bs gurve evtug unaqf, naq
hcba gur terng gbrf bs gurve evtug srrg: naq Zbfrf fcevaxyrq gur oybbq
hcba gur nygne ebhaq nobhg.

8:25 Naq ur gbbx gur sng, naq gur ehzc, naq nyy gur sng gung jnf hcba
gur vajneqf, naq gur pnhy nobir gur yvire, naq gur gjb xvqarlf, naq
gurve sng, naq gur evtug fubhyqre: 8:26 Naq bhg bs gur onfxrg bs
hayrnirarq oernq, gung jnf orsber gur YBEQ, ur gbbx bar hayrnirarq
pnxr, naq n pnxr bs bvyrq oernq, naq bar jnsre, naq chg gurz ba gur
sng, naq hcba gur evtug fubhyqre: 8:27 Naq ur chg nyy hcba Nneba'f
unaqf, naq hcba uvf fbaf' unaqf, naq jnirq gurz sbe n jnir bssrevat
orsber gur YBEQ.

8:28 Naq Zbfrf gbbx gurz sebz bss gurve unaqf, naq oheag gurz ba gur
nygne hcba gur oheag bssrevat: gurl jrer pbafrpengvbaf sbe n fjrrg
fnibhe: vg vf na bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ.

8:29 Naq Zbfrf gbbx gur oernfg, naq jnirq vg sbe n jnir bssrevat
orsber gur YBEQ: sbe bs gur enz bs pbafrpengvba vg jnf Zbfrf' cneg; nf
gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

8:30 Naq Zbfrf gbbx bs gur nabvagvat bvy, naq bs gur oybbq juvpu jnf
hcba gur nygne, naq fcevaxyrq vg hcba Nneba, naq hcba uvf tnezragf,
naq hcba uvf fbaf, naq hcba uvf fbaf' tnezragf jvgu uvz; naq
fnapgvsvrq Nneba, naq uvf tnezragf, naq uvf fbaf, naq uvf fbaf'
tnezragf jvgu uvz.

8:31 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb Nneba naq gb uvf fbaf, Obvy gur syrfu ng gur
qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba: naq gurer rng vg jvgu gur
oernq gung vf va gur onfxrg bs pbafrpengvbaf, nf V pbzznaqrq, fnlvat,
Nneba naq uvf fbaf funyy rng vg.

8:32 Naq gung juvpu erznvargu bs gur syrfu naq bs gur oernq funyy lr
ohea jvgu sver.

8:33 Naq lr funyy abg tb bhg bs gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba va frira qnlf, hagvy gur qnlf bs lbhe pbafrpengvba or ng
na raq: sbe frira qnlf funyy ur pbafrpengr lbh.

8:34 Nf ur ungu qbar guvf qnl, fb gur YBEQ ungu pbzznaqrq gb qb, gb
znxr na ngbarzrag sbe lbh.

8:35 Gurersber funyy lr novqr ng gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba qnl naq avtug frira qnlf, naq xrrc gur punetr bs gur
YBEQ, gung lr qvr abg: sbe fb V nz pbzznaqrq.

8:36 Fb Nneba naq uvf fbaf qvq nyy guvatf juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq ol
gur unaq bs Zbfrf.

9:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur rvtugu qnl, gung Zbfrf pnyyrq Nneba naq
uvf fbaf, naq gur ryqref bs Vfenry; 9:2 Naq ur fnvq hagb Nneba, Gnxr
gurr n lbhat pnys sbe n fva bssrevat, naq n enz sbe n oheag bssrevat,
jvgubhg oyrzvfu, naq bssre gurz orsber gur YBEQ.

9:3 Naq hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gubh funyg fcrnx, fnlvat, Gnxr lr
n xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat; naq n pnys naq n ynzo, obgu bs
gur svefg lrne, jvgubhg oyrzvfu, sbe n oheag bssrevat; 9:4 Nyfb n
ohyybpx naq n enz sbe crnpr bssrevatf, gb fnpevsvpr orsber gur YBEQ;
naq n zrng bssrevat zvatyrq jvgu bvy: sbe gb qnl gur YBEQ jvyy nccrne
hagb lbh.

9:5 Naq gurl oebhtug gung juvpu Zbfrf pbzznaqrq orsber gur gnoreanpyr
bs gur pbatertngvba: naq nyy gur pbatertngvba qerj arne naq fgbbq
orsber gur YBEQ.

9:6 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, Guvf vf gur guvat juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq gung lr
fubhyq qb: naq gur tybel bs gur YBEQ funyy nccrne hagb lbh.

9:7 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb Nneba, Tb hagb gur nygne, naq bssre gul fva
bssrevat, naq gul oheag bssrevat, naq znxr na ngbarzrag sbe gulfrys,
naq sbe gur crbcyr: naq bssre gur bssrevat bs gur crbcyr, naq znxr na
ngbarzrag sbe gurz; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq.

9:8 Nneba gurersber jrag hagb gur nygne, naq fyrj gur pnys bs gur fva
bssrevat, juvpu jnf sbe uvzfrys.

9:9 Naq gur fbaf bs Nneba oebhtug gur oybbq hagb uvz: naq ur qvccrq
uvf svatre va gur oybbq, naq chg vg hcba gur ubeaf bs gur nygne, naq
cbherq bhg gur oybbq ng gur obggbz bs gur nygne: 9:10 Ohg gur sng, naq
gur xvqarlf, naq gur pnhy nobir gur yvire bs gur fva bssrevat, ur
oheag hcba gur nygne; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

9:11 Naq gur syrfu naq gur uvqr ur oheag jvgu sver jvgubhg gur pnzc.

9:12 Naq ur fyrj gur oheag bssrevat; naq Nneba'f fbaf cerfragrq hagb
uvz gur oybbq, juvpu ur fcevaxyrq ebhaq nobhg hcba gur nygne.

9:13 Naq gurl cerfragrq gur oheag bssrevat hagb uvz, jvgu gur cvrprf
gurerbs, naq gur urnq: naq ur oheag gurz hcba gur nygne.

9:14 Naq ur qvq jnfu gur vajneqf naq gur yrtf, naq oheag gurz hcba gur
oheag bssrevat ba gur nygne.

9:15 Naq ur oebhtug gur crbcyr'f bssrevat, naq gbbx gur tbng, juvpu
jnf gur fva bssrevat sbe gur crbcyr, naq fyrj vg, naq bssrerq vg sbe
fva, nf gur svefg.

9:16 Naq ur oebhtug gur oheag bssrevat, naq bssrerq vg nppbeqvat gb
gur znaare.

9:17 Naq ur oebhtug gur zrng bssrevat, naq gbbx na unaqshy gurerbs,
naq oheag vg hcba gur nygne, orfvqr gur oheag fnpevsvpr bs gur
zbeavat.

9:18 Ur fyrj nyfb gur ohyybpx naq gur enz sbe n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr
bssrevatf, juvpu jnf sbe gur crbcyr: naq Nneba'f fbaf cerfragrq hagb
uvz gur oybbq, juvpu ur fcevaxyrq hcba gur nygne ebhaq nobhg, 9:19 Naq
gur sng bs gur ohyybpx naq bs gur enz, gur ehzc, naq gung juvpu
pbirergu gur vajneqf, naq gur xvqarlf, naq gur pnhy nobir gur yvire:
9:20 Naq gurl chg gur sng hcba gur oernfgf, naq ur oheag gur sng hcba
gur nygne: 9:21 Naq gur oernfgf naq gur evtug fubhyqre Nneba jnirq sbe
n jnir bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ; nf Zbfrf pbzznaqrq.

9:22 Naq Nneba yvsgrq hc uvf unaq gbjneq gur crbcyr, naq oyrffrq gurz,
naq pnzr qbja sebz bssrevat bs gur fva bssrevat, naq gur oheag
bssrevat, naq crnpr bssrevatf.

9:23 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba jrag vagb gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba,
naq pnzr bhg, naq oyrffrq gur crbcyr: naq gur tybel bs gur YBEQ
nccrnerq hagb nyy gur crbcyr.

9:24 Naq gurer pnzr n sver bhg sebz orsber gur YBEQ, naq pbafhzrq hcba
gur nygne gur oheag bssrevat naq gur sng: juvpu jura nyy gur crbcyr
fnj, gurl fubhgrq, naq sryy ba gurve snprf.

10:1 Naq Anqno naq Novuh, gur fbaf bs Nneba, gbbx rvgure bs gurz uvf
prafre, naq chg sver gurerva, naq chg vaprafr gurerba, naq bssrerq
fgenatr sver orsber gur YBEQ, juvpu ur pbzznaqrq gurz abg.

10:2 Naq gurer jrag bhg sver sebz gur YBEQ, naq qribherq gurz, naq
gurl qvrq orsber gur YBEQ.

10:3 Gura Zbfrf fnvq hagb Nneba, Guvf vf vg gung gur YBEQ fcnxr,
fnlvat, V jvyy or fnapgvsvrq va gurz gung pbzr avtu zr, naq orsber nyy
gur crbcyr V jvyy or tybevsvrq. Naq Nneba uryq uvf crnpr.

10:4 Naq Zbfrf pnyyrq Zvfunry naq Rymncuna, gur fbaf bs Hmmvry gur
hapyr bs Nneba, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Pbzr arne, pneel lbhe oerguera
sebz orsber gur fnapghnel bhg bs gur pnzc.

10:5 Fb gurl jrag arne, naq pneevrq gurz va gurve pbngf bhg bs gur
pnzc; nf Zbfrf unq fnvq.

10:6 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb Nneba, naq hagb Ryrnmne naq hagb Vgunzne, uvf
fbaf, Hapbire abg lbhe urnqf, arvgure eraq lbhe pybgurf; yrfg lr qvr,
naq yrfg jengu pbzr hcba nyy gur crbcyr: ohg yrg lbhe oerguera, gur
jubyr ubhfr bs Vfenry, orjnvy gur oheavat juvpu gur YBEQ ungu xvaqyrq.

10:7 Naq lr funyy abg tb bhg sebz gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, yrfg lr qvr: sbe gur nabvagvat bvy bs gur YBEQ vf hcba
lbh. Naq gurl qvq nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs Zbfrf.

10:8 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Nneba, fnlvat, 10:9 Qb abg qevax jvar abe
fgebat qevax, gubh, abe gul fbaf jvgu gurr, jura lr tb vagb gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, yrfg lr qvr: vg funyy or n fgnghgr sbe
rire guebhtubhg lbhe trarengvbaf: 10:10 Naq gung lr znl chg qvssrerapr
orgjrra ubyl naq haubyl, naq orgjrra hapyrna naq pyrna; 10:11 Naq gung
lr znl grnpu gur puvyqera bs Vfenry nyy gur fgnghgrf juvpu gur YBEQ
ungu fcbxra hagb gurz ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf.

10:12 Naq Zbfrf fcnxr hagb Nneba, naq hagb Ryrnmne naq hagb Vgunzne,
uvf fbaf gung jrer yrsg, Gnxr gur zrng bssrevat gung erznvargu bs gur
bssrevatf bs gur YBEQ znqr ol sver, naq rng vg jvgubhg yrnira orfvqr
gur nygne: sbe vg vf zbfg ubyl: 10:13 Naq lr funyy rng vg va gur ubyl
cynpr, orpnhfr vg vf gul qhr, naq gul fbaf' qhr, bs gur fnpevsvprf bs
gur YBEQ znqr ol sver: sbe fb V nz pbzznaqrq.

10:14 Naq gur jnir oernfg naq urnir fubhyqre funyy lr rng va n pyrna
cynpr; gubh, naq gul fbaf, naq gul qnhtugref jvgu gurr: sbe gurl or
gul qhr, naq gul fbaf' qhr, juvpu ner tvira bhg bs gur fnpevsvprf bs
crnpr bssrevatf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

10:15 Gur urnir fubhyqre naq gur jnir oernfg funyy gurl oevat jvgu gur
bssrevatf znqr ol sver bs gur sng, gb jnir vg sbe n jnir bssrevat
orsber gur YBEQ; naq vg funyy or guvar, naq gul fbaf' jvgu gurr, ol n
fgnghgr sbe rire; nf gur YBEQ ungu pbzznaqrq.

10:16 Naq Zbfrf qvyvtragyl fbhtug gur tbng bs gur fva bssrevat, naq,
orubyq, vg jnf oheag: naq ur jnf natel jvgu Ryrnmne naq Vgunzne, gur
fbaf bs Nneba juvpu jrer yrsg nyvir, fnlvat, 10:17 Jurersber unir lr
abg rngra gur fva bssrevat va gur ubyl cynpr, frrvat vg vf zbfg ubyl,
naq Tbq ungu tvira vg lbh gb orne gur vavdhvgl bs gur pbatertngvba, gb
znxr ngbarzrag sbe gurz orsber gur YBEQ?  10:18 Orubyq, gur oybbq bs
vg jnf abg oebhtug va jvguva gur ubyl cynpr: lr fubhyq vaqrrq unir
rngra vg va gur ubyl cynpr, nf V pbzznaqrq.

10:19 Naq Nneba fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Orubyq, guvf qnl unir gurl bssrerq
gurve fva bssrevat naq gurve oheag bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ; naq fhpu
guvatf unir orsnyyra zr: naq vs V unq rngra gur fva bssrevat gb qnl,
fubhyq vg unir orra npprcgrq va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ?  10:20 Naq jura
Zbfrf urneq gung, ur jnf pbagrag.

11:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq gb Nneba, fnlvat hagb gurz,
11:2 Fcrnx hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Gurfr ner gur ornfgf
juvpu lr funyy rng nzbat nyy gur ornfgf gung ner ba gur rnegu.

11:3 Jungfbrire cnegrgu gur ubbs, naq vf pybirasbbgrq, naq purjrgu gur
phq, nzbat gur ornfgf, gung funyy lr rng.

11:4 Arireguryrff gurfr funyy lr abg rng bs gurz gung purj gur phq, be
bs gurz gung qvivqr gur ubbs: nf gur pnzry, orpnhfr ur purjrgu gur
phq, ohg qvivqrgu abg gur ubbs; ur vf hapyrna hagb lbh.

11:5 Naq gur pbarl, orpnhfr ur purjrgu gur phq, ohg qvivqrgu abg gur
ubbs; ur vf hapyrna hagb lbh.

11:6 Naq gur uner, orpnhfr ur purjrgu gur phq, ohg qvivqrgu abg gur
ubbs; ur vf hapyrna hagb lbh.

11:7 Naq gur fjvar, gubhtu ur qvivqr gur ubbs, naq or pybirasbbgrq,
lrg ur purjrgu abg gur phq; ur vf hapyrna gb lbh.

11:8 Bs gurve syrfu funyy lr abg rng, naq gurve pnepnfr funyy lr abg
gbhpu; gurl ner hapyrna gb lbh.

11:9 Gurfr funyy lr rng bs nyy gung ner va gur jngref: jungfbrire ungu
svaf naq fpnyrf va gur jngref, va gur frnf, naq va gur eviref, gurz
funyy lr rng.

11:10 Naq nyy gung unir abg svaf naq fpnyrf va gur frnf, naq va gur
eviref, bs nyy gung zbir va gur jngref, naq bs nal yvivat guvat juvpu
vf va gur jngref, gurl funyy or na nobzvangvba hagb lbh: 11:11 Gurl
funyy or rira na nobzvangvba hagb lbh; lr funyy abg rng bs gurve
syrfu, ohg lr funyy unir gurve pnepnfrf va nobzvangvba.

11:12 Jungfbrire ungu ab svaf abe fpnyrf va gur jngref, gung funyy or
na nobzvangvba hagb lbh.

11:13 Naq gurfr ner gurl juvpu lr funyy unir va nobzvangvba nzbat gur
sbjyf; gurl funyy abg or rngra, gurl ner na nobzvangvba: gur rntyr,
naq gur bffvsentr, naq gur bfcenl, 11:14 Naq gur ihygher, naq gur xvgr
nsgre uvf xvaq; 11:15 Rirel enira nsgre uvf xvaq; 11:16 Naq gur bjy,
naq gur avtug unjx, naq gur phpxbj, naq gur unjx nsgre uvf xvaq, 11:17
Naq gur yvggyr bjy, naq gur pbezbenag, naq gur terng bjy, 11:18 Naq
gur fjna, naq gur cryvpna, naq gur tvre rntyr, 11:19 Naq gur fgbex,
gur ureba nsgre ure xvaq, naq gur yncjvat, naq gur ong.

11:20 Nyy sbjyf gung perrc, tbvat hcba nyy sbhe, funyy or na
nobzvangvba hagb lbh.

11:21 Lrg gurfr znl lr rng bs rirel sylvat perrcvat guvat gung tbrgu
hcba nyy sbhe, juvpu unir yrtf nobir gurve srrg, gb yrnc jvguny hcba
gur rnegu; 11:22 Rira gurfr bs gurz lr znl rng; gur ybphfg nsgre uvf
xvaq, naq gur onyq ybphfg nsgre uvf xvaq, naq gur orrgyr nsgre uvf
xvaq, naq gur tenffubccre nsgre uvf xvaq.

11:23 Ohg nyy bgure sylvat perrcvat guvatf, juvpu unir sbhe srrg,
funyy or na nobzvangvba hagb lbh.

11:24 Naq sbe gurfr lr funyy or hapyrna: jubfbrire gbhpurgu gur
pnepnfr bs gurz funyy or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

11:25 Naq jubfbrire ornergu bhtug bs gur pnepnfr bs gurz funyy jnfu
uvf pybgurf, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

11:26 Gur pnepnfrf bs rirel ornfg juvpu qvivqrgu gur ubbs, naq vf abg
pybirasbbgrq, abe purjrgu gur phq, ner hapyrna hagb lbh: rirel bar
gung gbhpurgu gurz funyy or hapyrna.

11:27 Naq jungfbrire tbrgu hcba uvf cnjf, nzbat nyy znaare bs ornfgf
gung tb ba nyy sbhe, gubfr ner hapyrna hagb lbh: jubfb gbhpurgu gurve
pnepnfr funyy or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

11:28 Naq ur gung ornergu gur pnepnfr bs gurz funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf,
naq or hapyrna hagvy gur rira: gurl ner hapyrna hagb lbh.

11:29 Gurfr nyfb funyy or hapyrna hagb lbh nzbat gur perrcvat guvatf
gung perrc hcba gur rnegu; gur jrnfry, naq gur zbhfr, naq gur gbegbvfr
nsgre uvf xvaq, 11:30 Naq gur sreerg, naq gur punzryrba, naq gur
yvmneq, naq gur fanvy, naq gur zbyr.

11:31 Gurfr ner hapyrna gb lbh nzbat nyy gung perrc: jubfbrire qbgu
gbhpu gurz, jura gurl or qrnq, funyy or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

11:32 Naq hcba jungfbrire nal bs gurz, jura gurl ner qrnq, qbgu snyy,
vg funyy or hapyrna; jurgure vg or nal irffry bs jbbq, be envzrag, be
fxva, be fnpx, jungfbrire irffry vg or, jurerva nal jbex vf qbar, vg
zhfg or chg vagb jngre, naq vg funyy or hapyrna hagvy gur rira; fb vg
funyy or pyrnafrq.

11:33 Naq rirel rnegura irffry, jurervagb nal bs gurz snyyrgu,
jungfbrire vf va vg funyy or hapyrna; naq lr funyy oernx vg.

11:34 Bs nyy zrng juvpu znl or rngra, gung ba juvpu fhpu jngre pbzrgu
funyy or hapyrna: naq nyy qevax gung znl or qehax va rirel fhpu irffry
funyy or hapyrna.

11:35 Naq rirel guvat jurerhcba nal cneg bs gurve pnepnfr snyyrgu
funyy or hapyrna; jurgure vg or bira, be enatrf sbe cbgf, gurl funyy
or oebxra qbja: sbe gurl ner hapyrna naq funyy or hapyrna hagb lbh.

11:36 Arireguryrff n sbhagnva be cvg, jurerva gurer vf cyragl bs
jngre, funyy or pyrna: ohg gung juvpu gbhpurgu gurve pnepnfr funyy or
hapyrna.

11:37 Naq vs nal cneg bs gurve pnepnfr snyy hcba nal fbjvat frrq juvpu
vf gb or fbja, vg funyy or pyrna.

11:38 Ohg vs nal jngre or chg hcba gur frrq, naq nal cneg bs gurve
pnepnfr snyy gurerba, vg funyy or hapyrna hagb lbh.

11:39 Naq vs nal ornfg, bs juvpu lr znl rng, qvr; ur gung gbhpurgu gur
pnepnfr gurerbs funyy or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

11:40 Naq ur gung rngrgu bs gur pnepnfr bs vg funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf,
naq or hapyrna hagvy gur rira: ur nyfb gung ornergu gur pnepnfr bs vg
funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

11:41 Naq rirel perrcvat guvat gung perrcrgu hcba gur rnegu funyy or
na nobzvangvba; vg funyy abg or rngra.

11:42 Jungfbrire tbrgu hcba gur oryyl, naq jungfbrire tbrgu hcba nyy
sbhe, be jungfbrire ungu zber srrg nzbat nyy perrcvat guvatf gung
perrc hcba gur rnegu, gurz lr funyy abg rng; sbe gurl ner na
nobzvangvba.

11:43 Lr funyy abg znxr lbhefryirf nobzvanoyr jvgu nal perrcvat guvat
gung perrcrgu, arvgure funyy lr znxr lbhefryirf hapyrna jvgu gurz,
gung lr fubhyq or qrsvyrq gurerol.

11:44 Sbe V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq: lr funyy gurersber fnapgvsl
lbhefryirf, naq lr funyy or ubyl; sbe V nz ubyl: arvgure funyy lr
qrsvyr lbhefryirf jvgu nal znaare bs perrcvat guvat gung perrcrgu hcba
gur rnegu.

11:45 Sbe V nz gur YBEQ gung oevatrgu lbh hc bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg,
gb or lbhe Tbq: lr funyy gurersber or ubyl, sbe V nz ubyl.

11:46 Guvf vf gur ynj bs gur ornfgf, naq bs gur sbjy, naq bs rirel
yvivat perngher gung zbirgu va gur jngref, naq bs rirel perngher gung
perrcrgu hcba gur rnegu: 11:47 Gb znxr n qvssrerapr orgjrra gur
hapyrna naq gur pyrna, naq orgjrra gur ornfg gung znl or rngra naq gur
ornfg gung znl abg or rngra.

12:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 12:2 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Vs n jbzna unir pbaprvirq frrq, naq obea n
zna puvyq: gura fur funyy or hapyrna frira qnlf; nppbeqvat gb gur qnlf
bs gur frcnengvba sbe ure vasvezvgl funyy fur or hapyrna.

12:3 Naq va gur rvtugu qnl gur syrfu bs uvf sberfxva funyy or
pvephzpvfrq.

12:4 Naq fur funyy gura pbagvahr va gur oybbq bs ure chevslvat guerr
naq guvegl qnlf; fur funyy gbhpu ab unyybjrq guvat, abe pbzr vagb gur
fnapghnel, hagvy gur qnlf bs ure chevslvat or shysvyyrq.

12:5 Ohg vs fur orne n znvq puvyq, gura fur funyy or hapyrna gjb
jrrxf, nf va ure frcnengvba: naq fur funyy pbagvahr va gur oybbq bs
ure chevslvat guerrfpber naq fvk qnlf.

12:6 Naq jura gur qnlf bs ure chevslvat ner shysvyyrq, sbe n fba, be
sbe n qnhtugre, fur funyy oevat n ynzo bs gur svefg lrne sbe n oheag
bssrevat, naq n lbhat cvtrba, be n ghegyrqbir, sbe n fva bssrevat,
hagb gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, hagb gur cevrfg:
12:7 Jub funyy bssre vg orsber gur YBEQ, naq znxr na ngbarzrag sbe
ure; naq fur funyy or pyrnafrq sebz gur vffhr bs ure oybbq. Guvf vf
gur ynj sbe ure gung ungu obea n znyr be n srznyr.

12:8 Naq vs fur or abg noyr gb oevat n ynzo, gura fur funyy oevat gjb
ghegyrf, be gjb lbhat cvtrbaf; gur bar sbe gur oheag bssrevat, naq gur
bgure sbe n fva bssrevat: naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe
ure, naq fur funyy or pyrna.

13:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq Nneba, fnlvat, 13:2 Jura n zna
funyy unir va gur fxva bs uvf syrfu n evfvat, n fpno, be oevtug fcbg,
naq vg or va gur fxva bs uvf syrfu yvxr gur cynthr bs yrcebfl; gura ur
funyy or oebhtug hagb Nneba gur cevrfg, be hagb bar bs uvf fbaf gur
cevrfgf: 13:3 Naq gur cevrfg funyy ybbx ba gur cynthr va gur fxva bs
gur syrfu: naq jura gur unve va gur cynthr vf ghearq juvgr, naq gur
cynthr va fvtug or qrrcre guna gur fxva bs uvf syrfu, vg vf n cynthr
bs yrcebfl: naq gur cevrfg funyy ybbx ba uvz, naq cebabhapr uvz
hapyrna.

13:4 Vs gur oevtug fcbg or juvgr va gur fxva bs uvf syrfu, naq va
fvtug or abg qrrcre guna gur fxva, naq gur unve gurerbs or abg ghearq
juvgr; gura gur cevrfg funyy fuhg hc uvz gung ungu gur cynthr frira
qnlf: 13:5 Naq gur cevrfg funyy ybbx ba uvz gur friragu qnl: naq,
orubyq, vs gur cynthr va uvf fvtug or ng n fgnl, naq gur cynthr fcernq
abg va gur fxva; gura gur cevrfg funyy fuhg uvz hc frira qnlf zber:
13:6 Naq gur cevrfg funyy ybbx ba uvz ntnva gur friragu qnl: naq,
orubyq, vs gur cynthr or fbzrjung qnex, naq gur cynthr fcernq abg va
gur fxva, gur cevrfg funyy cebabhapr uvz pyrna: vg vf ohg n fpno: naq
ur funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq or pyrna.

13:7 Ohg vs gur fpno fcernq zhpu noebnq va gur fxva, nsgre gung ur
ungu orra frra bs gur cevrfg sbe uvf pyrnafvat, ur funyy or frra bs
gur cevrfg ntnva.

13:8 Naq vs gur cevrfg frr gung, orubyq, gur fpno fcernqrgu va gur
fxva, gura gur cevrfg funyy cebabhapr uvz hapyrna: vg vf n yrcebfl.

13:9 Jura gur cynthr bs yrcebfl vf va n zna, gura ur funyy or oebhtug
hagb gur cevrfg; 13:10 Naq gur cevrfg funyy frr uvz: naq, orubyq, vs
gur evfvat or juvgr va gur fxva, naq vg unir ghearq gur unve juvgr,
naq gurer or dhvpx enj syrfu va gur evfvat; 13:11 Vg vf na byq yrcebfl
va gur fxva bs uvf syrfu, naq gur cevrfg funyy cebabhapr uvz hapyrna,
naq funyy abg fuhg uvz hc: sbe ur vf hapyrna.

13:12 Naq vs n yrcebfl oernx bhg noebnq va gur fxva, naq gur yrcebfl
pbire nyy gur fxva bs uvz gung ungu gur cynthr sebz uvf urnq rira gb
uvf sbbg, jurerfbrire gur cevrfg ybbxrgu; 13:13 Gura gur cevrfg funyy
pbafvqre: naq, orubyq, vs gur yrcebfl unir pbirerq nyy uvf syrfu, ur
funyy cebabhapr uvz pyrna gung ungu gur cynthr: vg vf nyy ghearq
juvgr: ur vf pyrna.

13:14 Ohg jura enj syrfu nccrnergu va uvz, ur funyy or hapyrna.

13:15 Naq gur cevrfg funyy frr gur enj syrfu, naq cebabhapr uvz gb or
hapyrna: sbe gur enj syrfu vf hapyrna: vg vf n yrcebfl.

13:16 Be vs gur enj syrfu ghea ntnva, naq or punatrq hagb juvgr, ur
funyy pbzr hagb gur cevrfg; 13:17 Naq gur cevrfg funyy frr uvz: naq,
orubyq, vs gur cynthr or ghearq vagb juvgr; gura gur cevrfg funyy
cebabhapr uvz pyrna gung ungu gur cynthr: ur vf pyrna.

13:18 Gur syrfu nyfb, va juvpu, rira va gur fxva gurerbs, jnf n obvy,
naq vf urnyrq, 13:19 Naq va gur cynpr bs gur obvy gurer or n juvgr
evfvat, be n oevtug fcbg, juvgr, naq fbzrjung erqqvfu, naq vg or
furjrq gb gur cevrfg; 13:20 Naq vs, jura gur cevrfg frrgu vg, orubyq,
vg or va fvtug ybjre guna gur fxva, naq gur unve gurerbs or ghearq
juvgr; gur cevrfg funyy cebabhapr uvz hapyrna: vg vf n cynthr bs
yrcebfl oebxra bhg bs gur obvy.

13:21 Ohg vs gur cevrfg ybbx ba vg, naq, orubyq, gurer or ab juvgr
unvef gurerva, naq vs vg or abg ybjre guna gur fxva, ohg or fbzrjung
qnex; gura gur cevrfg funyy fuhg uvz hc frira qnlf: 13:22 Naq vs vg
fcernq zhpu noebnq va gur fxva, gura gur cevrfg funyy cebabhapr uvz
hapyrna: vg vf n cynthr.

13:23 Ohg vs gur oevtug fcbg fgnl va uvf cynpr, naq fcernq abg, vg vf
n oheavat obvy; naq gur cevrfg funyy cebabhapr uvz pyrna.

13:24 Be vs gurer or nal syrfu, va gur fxva jurerbs gurer vf n ubg
oheavat, naq gur dhvpx syrfu gung oheargu unir n juvgr oevtug fcbg,
fbzrjung erqqvfu, be juvgr; 13:25 Gura gur cevrfg funyy ybbx hcba vg:
naq, orubyq, vs gur unve va gur oevtug fcbg or ghearq juvgr, naq vg or
va fvtug qrrcre guna gur fxva; vg vf n yrcebfl oebxra bhg bs gur
oheavat: jurersber gur cevrfg funyy cebabhapr uvz hapyrna: vg vf gur
cynthr bs yrcebfl.

13:26 Ohg vs gur cevrfg ybbx ba vg, naq, orubyq, gurer or ab juvgr
unve va gur oevtug fcbg, naq vg or ab ybjre guna gur bgure fxva, ohg
or fbzrjung qnex; gura gur cevrfg funyy fuhg uvz hc frira qnlf: 13:27
Naq gur cevrfg funyy ybbx hcba uvz gur friragu qnl: naq vs vg or
fcernq zhpu noebnq va gur fxva, gura gur cevrfg funyy cebabhapr uvz
hapyrna: vg vf gur cynthr bs yrcebfl.

13:28 Naq vs gur oevtug fcbg fgnl va uvf cynpr, naq fcernq abg va gur
fxva, ohg vg or fbzrjung qnex; vg vf n evfvat bs gur oheavat, naq gur
cevrfg funyy cebabhapr uvz pyrna: sbe vg vf na vasynzzngvba bs gur
oheavat.

13:29 Vs n zna be jbzna unir n cynthr hcba gur urnq be gur orneq;
13:30 Gura gur cevrfg funyy frr gur cynthr: naq, orubyq, vs vg or va
fvtug qrrcre guna gur fxva; naq gurer or va vg n lryybj guva unve;
gura gur cevrfg funyy cebabhapr uvz hapyrna: vg vf n qel fpnyy, rira n
yrcebfl hcba gur urnq be orneq.

13:31 Naq vs gur cevrfg ybbx ba gur cynthr bs gur fpnyy, naq, orubyq,
vg or abg va fvtug qrrcre guna gur fxva, naq gung gurer vf ab oynpx
unve va vg; gura gur cevrfg funyy fuhg hc uvz gung ungu gur cynthr bs
gur fpnyy frira qnlf: 13:32 Naq va gur friragu qnl gur cevrfg funyy
ybbx ba gur cynthr: naq, orubyq, vs gur fpnyy fcernq abg, naq gurer or
va vg ab lryybj unve, naq gur fpnyy or abg va fvtug qrrcre guna gur
fxva; 13:33 Ur funyy or funira, ohg gur fpnyy funyy ur abg funir; naq
gur cevrfg funyy fuhg hc uvz gung ungu gur fpnyy frira qnlf zber:
13:34 Naq va gur friragu qnl gur cevrfg funyy ybbx ba gur fpnyy: naq,
orubyq, vs gur fpnyy or abg fcernq va gur fxva, abe or va fvtug qrrcre
guna gur fxva; gura gur cevrfg funyy cebabhapr uvz pyrna: naq ur funyy
jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq or pyrna.

13:35 Ohg vs gur fpnyy fcernq zhpu va gur fxva nsgre uvf pyrnafvat;
13:36 Gura gur cevrfg funyy ybbx ba uvz: naq, orubyq, vs gur fpnyy or
fcernq va gur fxva, gur cevrfg funyy abg frrx sbe lryybj unve; ur vf
hapyrna.

13:37 Ohg vs gur fpnyy or va uvf fvtug ng n fgnl, naq gung gurer vf
oynpx unve tebja hc gurerva; gur fpnyy vf urnyrq, ur vf pyrna: naq gur
cevrfg funyy cebabhapr uvz pyrna.

13:38 Vs n zna nyfb be n jbzna unir va gur fxva bs gurve syrfu oevtug
fcbgf, rira juvgr oevtug fcbgf; 13:39 Gura gur cevrfg funyy ybbx: naq,
orubyq, vs gur oevtug fcbgf va gur fxva bs gurve syrfu or qnexvfu
juvgr; vg vf n serpxyrq fcbg gung tebjrgu va gur fxva; ur vf pyrna.

13:40 Naq gur zna jubfr unve vf snyyra bss uvf urnq, ur vf onyq; lrg
vf ur pyrna.

13:41 Naq ur gung ungu uvf unve snyyra bss sebz gur cneg bs uvf urnq
gbjneq uvf snpr, ur vf sberurnq onyq: lrg vf ur pyrna.

13:42 Naq vs gurer or va gur onyq urnq, be onyq sberurnq, n juvgr
erqqvfu fber; vg vf n yrcebfl fcehat hc va uvf onyq urnq, be uvf onyq
sberurnq.

13:43 Gura gur cevrfg funyy ybbx hcba vg: naq, orubyq, vs gur evfvat
bs gur fber or juvgr erqqvfu va uvf onyq urnq, be va uvf onyq
sberurnq, nf gur yrcebfl nccrnergu va gur fxva bs gur syrfu; 13:44 Ur
vf n yrcebhf zna, ur vf hapyrna: gur cevrfg funyy cebabhapr uvz
hggreyl hapyrna; uvf cynthr vf va uvf urnq.

13:45 Naq gur yrcre va jubz gur cynthr vf, uvf pybgurf funyy or erag,
naq uvf urnq oner, naq ur funyy chg n pbirevat hcba uvf hccre yvc, naq
funyy pel, Hapyrna, hapyrna.

13:46 Nyy gur qnlf jurerva gur cynthr funyy or va uvz ur funyy or
qrsvyrq; ur vf hapyrna: ur funyy qjryy nybar; jvgubhg gur pnzc funyy
uvf unovgngvba or.

13:47 Gur tnezrag nyfb gung gur cynthr bs yrcebfl vf va, jurgure vg or
n jbbyyra tnezrag, be n yvara tnezrag; 13:48 Jurgure vg or va gur
jnec, be jbbs; bs yvara, be bs jbbyyra; jurgure va n fxva, be va nal
guvat znqr bs fxva; 13:49 Naq vs gur cynthr or terravfu be erqqvfu va
gur tnezrag, be va gur fxva, rvgure va gur jnec, be va gur jbbs, be va
nal guvat bs fxva; vg vf n cynthr bs yrcebfl, naq funyy or furjrq hagb
gur cevrfg: 13:50 Naq gur cevrfg funyy ybbx hcba gur cynthr, naq fuhg
hc vg gung ungu gur cynthr frira qnlf: 13:51 Naq ur funyy ybbx ba gur
cynthr ba gur friragu qnl: vs gur cynthr or fcernq va gur tnezrag,
rvgure va gur jnec, be va gur jbbs, be va n fxva, be va nal jbex gung
vf znqr bs fxva; gur cynthr vf n serggvat yrcebfl; vg vf hapyrna.

13:52 Ur funyy gurersber ohea gung tnezrag, jurgure jnec be jbbs, va
jbbyyra be va yvara, be nal guvat bs fxva, jurerva gur cynthr vf: sbe
vg vf n serggvat yrcebfl; vg funyy or oheag va gur sver.

13:53 Naq vs gur cevrfg funyy ybbx, naq, orubyq, gur cynthr or abg
fcernq va gur tnezrag, rvgure va gur jnec, be va gur jbbs, be va nal
guvat bs fxva; 13:54 Gura gur cevrfg funyy pbzznaq gung gurl jnfu gur
guvat jurerva gur cynthr vf, naq ur funyy fuhg vg hc frira qnlf zber:
13:55 Naq gur cevrfg funyy ybbx ba gur cynthr, nsgre gung vg vf
jnfurq: naq, orubyq, vs gur cynthr unir abg punatrq uvf pbybhe, naq
gur cynthr or abg fcernq; vg vf hapyrna; gubh funyg ohea vg va gur
sver; vg vf serg vajneq, jurgure vg or oner jvguva be jvgubhg.

13:56 Naq vs gur cevrfg ybbx, naq, orubyq, gur cynthr or fbzrjung qnex
nsgre gur jnfuvat bs vg; gura ur funyy eraq vg bhg bs gur tnezrag, be
bhg bs gur fxva, be bhg bs gur jnec, be bhg bs gur jbbs: 13:57 Naq vs
vg nccrne fgvyy va gur tnezrag, rvgure va gur jnec, be va gur jbbs, be
va nal guvat bs fxva; vg vf n fcernqvat cynthr: gubh funyg ohea gung
jurerva gur cynthr vf jvgu sver.

13:58 Naq gur tnezrag, rvgure jnec, be jbbs, be jungfbrire guvat bs
fxva vg or, juvpu gubh funyg jnfu, vs gur cynthr or qrcnegrq sebz
gurz, gura vg funyy or jnfurq gur frpbaq gvzr, naq funyy or pyrna.

13:59 Guvf vf gur ynj bs gur cynthr bs yrcebfl va n tnezrag bs jbbyyra
be yvara, rvgure va gur jnec, be jbbs, be nal guvat bs fxvaf, gb
cebabhapr vg pyrna, be gb cebabhapr vg hapyrna.

14:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 14:2 Guvf funyy or gur ynj
bs gur yrcre va gur qnl bs uvf pyrnafvat: Ur funyy or oebhtug hagb gur
cevrfg: 14:3 Naq gur cevrfg funyy tb sbegu bhg bs gur pnzc; naq gur
cevrfg funyy ybbx, naq, orubyq, vs gur cynthr bs yrcebfl or urnyrq va
gur yrcre; 14:4 Gura funyy gur cevrfg pbzznaq gb gnxr sbe uvz gung vf
gb or pyrnafrq gjb oveqf nyvir naq pyrna, naq prqne jbbq, naq fpneyrg,
naq ulffbc: 14:5 Naq gur cevrfg funyy pbzznaq gung bar bs gur oveqf or
xvyyrq va na rnegura irffry bire ehaavat jngre: 14:6 Nf sbe gur yvivat
oveq, ur funyy gnxr vg, naq gur prqne jbbq, naq gur fpneyrg, naq gur
ulffbc, naq funyy qvc gurz naq gur yvivat oveq va gur oybbq bs gur
oveq gung jnf xvyyrq bire gur ehaavat jngre: 14:7 Naq ur funyy
fcevaxyr hcba uvz gung vf gb or pyrnafrq sebz gur yrcebfl frira gvzrf,
naq funyy cebabhapr uvz pyrna, naq funyy yrg gur yvivat oveq ybbfr
vagb gur bcra svryq.

14:8 Naq ur gung vf gb or pyrnafrq funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq funir
bss nyy uvf unve, naq jnfu uvzfrys va jngre, gung ur znl or pyrna: naq
nsgre gung ur funyy pbzr vagb gur pnzc, naq funyy gneel noebnq bhg bs
uvf grag frira qnlf.

14:9 Ohg vg funyy or ba gur friragu qnl, gung ur funyy funir nyy uvf
unve bss uvf urnq naq uvf orneq naq uvf rlroebjf, rira nyy uvf unve ur
funyy funir bss: naq ur funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf, nyfb ur funyy jnfu uvf
syrfu va jngre, naq ur funyy or pyrna.

14:10 Naq ba gur rvtugu qnl ur funyy gnxr gjb ur ynzof jvgubhg
oyrzvfu, naq bar rjr ynzo bs gur svefg lrne jvgubhg oyrzvfu, naq guerr
gragu qrnyf bs svar sybhe sbe n zrng bssrevat, zvatyrq jvgu bvy, naq
bar ybt bs bvy.

14:11 Naq gur cevrfg gung znxrgu uvz pyrna funyy cerfrag gur zna gung
vf gb or znqr pyrna, naq gubfr guvatf, orsber gur YBEQ, ng gur qbbe bs
gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba: 14:12 Naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr
bar ur ynzo, naq bssre uvz sbe n gerfcnff bssrevat, naq gur ybt bs
bvy, naq jnir gurz sbe n jnir bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ: 14:13 Naq ur
funyy fynl gur ynzo va gur cynpr jurer ur funyy xvyy gur fva bssrevat
naq gur oheag bssrevat, va gur ubyl cynpr: sbe nf gur fva bssrevat vf
gur cevrfg'f, fb vf gur gerfcnff bssrevat: vg vf zbfg ubyl: 14:14 Naq
gur cevrfg funyy gnxr fbzr bs gur oybbq bs gur gerfcnff bssrevat, naq
gur cevrfg funyy chg vg hcba gur gvc bs gur evtug rne bs uvz gung vf
gb or pyrnafrq, naq hcba gur guhzo bs uvf evtug unaq, naq hcba gur
terng gbr bs uvf evtug sbbg: 14:15 Naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr fbzr bs
gur ybt bs bvy, naq cbhe vg vagb gur cnyz bs uvf bja yrsg unaq: 14:16
Naq gur cevrfg funyy qvc uvf evtug svatre va gur bvy gung vf va uvf
yrsg unaq, naq funyy fcevaxyr bs gur bvy jvgu uvf svatre frira gvzrf
orsber gur YBEQ: 14:17 Naq bs gur erfg bs gur bvy gung vf va uvf unaq
funyy gur cevrfg chg hcba gur gvc bs gur evtug rne bs uvz gung vf gb
or pyrnafrq, naq hcba gur guhzo bs uvf evtug unaq, naq hcba gur terng
gbr bs uvf evtug sbbg, hcba gur oybbq bs gur gerfcnff bssrevat: 14:18
Naq gur erzanag bs gur bvy gung vf va gur cevrfg'f unaq ur funyy cbhe
hcba gur urnq bs uvz gung vf gb or pyrnafrq: naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr
na ngbarzrag sbe uvz orsber gur YBEQ.

14:19 Naq gur cevrfg funyy bssre gur fva bssrevat, naq znxr na
ngbarzrag sbe uvz gung vf gb or pyrnafrq sebz uvf hapyrnaarff; naq
nsgrejneq ur funyy xvyy gur oheag bssrevat: 14:20 Naq gur cevrfg funyy
bssre gur oheag bssrevat naq gur zrng bssrevat hcba gur nygne: naq gur
cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe uvz, naq ur funyy or pyrna.

14:21 Naq vs ur or cbbe, naq pnaabg trg fb zhpu; gura ur funyy gnxr
bar ynzo sbe n gerfcnff bssrevat gb or jnirq, gb znxr na ngbarzrag sbe
uvz, naq bar gragu qrny bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng
bssrevat, naq n ybt bs bvy; 14:22 Naq gjb ghegyrqbirf, be gjb lbhat
cvtrbaf, fhpu nf ur vf noyr gb trg; naq gur bar funyy or n fva
bssrevat, naq gur bgure n oheag bssrevat.

14:23 Naq ur funyy oevat gurz ba gur rvtugu qnl sbe uvf pyrnafvat hagb
gur cevrfg, hagb gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba,
orsber gur YBEQ.

14:24 Naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr gur ynzo bs gur gerfcnff bssrevat, naq
gur ybt bs bvy, naq gur cevrfg funyy jnir gurz sbe n jnir bssrevat
orsber gur YBEQ: 14:25 Naq ur funyy xvyy gur ynzo bs gur gerfcnff
bssrevat, naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr fbzr bs gur oybbq bs gur gerfcnff
bssrevat, naq chg vg hcba gur gvc bs gur evtug rne bs uvz gung vf gb
or pyrnafrq, naq hcba gur guhzo bs uvf evtug unaq, naq hcba gur terng
gbr bs uvf evtug sbbg: 14:26 Naq gur cevrfg funyy cbhe bs gur bvy vagb
gur cnyz bs uvf bja yrsg unaq: 14:27 Naq gur cevrfg funyy fcevaxyr
jvgu uvf evtug svatre fbzr bs gur bvy gung vf va uvf yrsg unaq frira
gvzrf orsber gur YBEQ: 14:28 Naq gur cevrfg funyy chg bs gur bvy gung
vf va uvf unaq hcba gur gvc bs gur evtug rne bs uvz gung vf gb or
pyrnafrq, naq hcba gur guhzo bs uvf evtug unaq, naq hcba gur terng gbr
bs uvf evtug sbbg, hcba gur cynpr bs gur oybbq bs gur gerfcnff
bssrevat: 14:29 Naq gur erfg bs gur bvy gung vf va gur cevrfg'f unaq
ur funyy chg hcba gur urnq bs uvz gung vf gb or pyrnafrq, gb znxr na
ngbarzrag sbe uvz orsber gur YBEQ.

14:30 Naq ur funyy bssre gur bar bs gur ghegyrqbirf, be bs gur lbhat
cvtrbaf, fhpu nf ur pna trg; 14:31 Rira fhpu nf ur vf noyr gb trg, gur
bar sbe n fva bssrevat, naq gur bgure sbe n oheag bssrevat, jvgu gur
zrng bssrevat: naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe uvz gung vf
gb or pyrnafrq orsber gur YBEQ.

14:32 Guvf vf gur ynj bs uvz va jubz vf gur cynthr bs yrcebfl, jubfr
unaq vf abg noyr gb trg gung juvpu cregnvargu gb uvf pyrnafvat.

14:33 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq hagb Nneba, fnlvat, 14:34 Jura
lr or pbzr vagb gur ynaq bs Pnanna, juvpu V tvir gb lbh sbe n
cbffrffvba, naq V chg gur cynthr bs yrcebfl va n ubhfr bs gur ynaq bs
lbhe cbffrffvba; 14:35 Naq ur gung bjargu gur ubhfr funyy pbzr naq
gryy gur cevrfg, fnlvat, Vg frrzrgu gb zr gurer vf nf vg jrer n cynthr
va gur ubhfr: 14:36 Gura gur cevrfg funyy pbzznaq gung gurl rzcgl gur
ubhfr, orsber gur cevrfg tb vagb vg gb frr gur cynthr, gung nyy gung
vf va gur ubhfr or abg znqr hapyrna: naq nsgrejneq gur cevrfg funyy tb
va gb frr gur ubhfr: 14:37 Naq ur funyy ybbx ba gur cynthr, naq,
orubyq, vs gur cynthr or va gur jnyyf bs gur ubhfr jvgu ubyybj
fgenxrf, terravfu be erqqvfu, juvpu va fvtug ner ybjre guna gur jnyy;
14:38 Gura gur cevrfg funyy tb bhg bs gur ubhfr gb gur qbbe bs gur
ubhfr, naq fuhg hc gur ubhfr frira qnlf: 14:39 Naq gur cevrfg funyy
pbzr ntnva gur friragu qnl, naq funyy ybbx: naq, orubyq, vs gur cynthr
or fcernq va gur jnyyf bs gur ubhfr; 14:40 Gura gur cevrfg funyy
pbzznaq gung gurl gnxr njnl gur fgbarf va juvpu gur cynthr vf, naq
gurl funyy pnfg gurz vagb na hapyrna cynpr jvgubhg gur pvgl: 14:41 Naq
ur funyy pnhfr gur ubhfr gb or fpencrq jvguva ebhaq nobhg, naq gurl
funyy cbhe bhg gur qhfg gung gurl fpencr bss jvgubhg gur pvgl vagb na
hapyrna cynpr: 14:42 Naq gurl funyy gnxr bgure fgbarf, naq chg gurz va
gur cynpr bs gubfr fgbarf; naq ur funyy gnxr bgure zbegre, naq funyy
cynvfgre gur ubhfr.

14:43 Naq vs gur cynthr pbzr ntnva, naq oernx bhg va gur ubhfr, nsgre
gung ur ungu gnxra njnl gur fgbarf, naq nsgre ur ungu fpencrq gur
ubhfr, naq nsgre vg vf cynvfgrerq; 14:44 Gura gur cevrfg funyy pbzr
naq ybbx, naq, orubyq, vs gur cynthr or fcernq va gur ubhfr, vg vf n
serggvat yrcebfl va gur ubhfr; vg vf hapyrna.

14:45 Naq ur funyy oernx qbja gur ubhfr, gur fgbarf bs vg, naq gur
gvzore gurerbs, naq nyy gur zbegre bs gur ubhfr; naq ur funyy pneel
gurz sbegu bhg bs gur pvgl vagb na hapyrna cynpr.

14:46 Zberbire ur gung tbrgu vagb gur ubhfr nyy gur juvyr gung vg vf
fuhg hc funyy or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

14:47 Naq ur gung yvrgu va gur ubhfr funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf; naq ur
gung rngrgu va gur ubhfr funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf.

14:48 Naq vs gur cevrfg funyy pbzr va, naq ybbx hcba vg, naq, orubyq,
gur cynthr ungu abg fcernq va gur ubhfr, nsgre gur ubhfr jnf
cynvfgrerq: gura gur cevrfg funyy cebabhapr gur ubhfr pyrna, orpnhfr
gur cynthr vf urnyrq.

14:49 Naq ur funyy gnxr gb pyrnafr gur ubhfr gjb oveqf, naq prqne
jbbq, naq fpneyrg, naq ulffbc: 14:50 Naq ur funyy xvyy gur bar bs gur
oveqf va na rnegura irffry bire ehaavat jngre: 14:51 Naq ur funyy gnxr
gur prqne jbbq, naq gur ulffbc, naq gur fpneyrg, naq gur yvivat oveq,
naq qvc gurz va gur oybbq bs gur fynva oveq, naq va gur ehaavat jngre,
naq fcevaxyr gur ubhfr frira gvzrf: 14:52 Naq ur funyy pyrnafr gur
ubhfr jvgu gur oybbq bs gur oveq, naq jvgu gur ehaavat jngre, naq jvgu
gur yvivat oveq, naq jvgu gur prqne jbbq, naq jvgu gur ulffbc, naq
jvgu gur fpneyrg: 14:53 Ohg ur funyy yrg tb gur yvivat oveq bhg bs gur
pvgl vagb gur bcra svryqf, naq znxr na ngbarzrag sbe gur ubhfr: naq vg
funyy or pyrna.

14:54 Guvf vf gur ynj sbe nyy znaare bs cynthr bs yrcebfl, naq fpnyy,
14:55 Naq sbe gur yrcebfl bs n tnezrag, naq bs n ubhfr, 14:56 Naq sbe
n evfvat, naq sbe n fpno, naq sbe n oevtug fcbg: 14:57 Gb grnpu jura
vg vf hapyrna, naq jura vg vf pyrna: guvf vf gur ynj bs yrcebfl.

15:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq gb Nneba, fnlvat, 15:2 Fcrnx
hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Jura nal zna ungu n
ehaavat vffhr bhg bs uvf syrfu, orpnhfr bs uvf vffhr ur vf hapyrna.

15:3 Naq guvf funyy or uvf hapyrnaarff va uvf vffhr: jurgure uvf syrfu
eha jvgu uvf vffhr, be uvf syrfu or fgbccrq sebz uvf vffhr, vg vf uvf
hapyrnaarff.

15:4 Rirel orq, jurerba ur yvrgu gung ungu gur vffhr, vf hapyrna: naq
rirel guvat, jurerba ur fvggrgu, funyy or hapyrna.

15:5 Naq jubfbrire gbhpurgu uvf orq funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq ongur
uvzfrys va jngre, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

15:6 Naq ur gung fvggrgu ba nal guvat jurerba ur fng gung ungu gur
vffhr funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq ongur uvzfrys va jngre, naq or
hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

15:7 Naq ur gung gbhpurgu gur syrfu bs uvz gung ungu gur vffhr funyy
jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq ongur uvzfrys va jngre, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur
rira.

15:8 Naq vs ur gung ungu gur vffhr fcvg hcba uvz gung vf pyrna; gura
ur funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq ongur uvzfrys va jngre, naq or hapyrna
hagvy gur rira.

15:9 Naq jung fnqqyr fbrire ur evqrgu hcba gung ungu gur vffhr funyy
or hapyrna.

15:10 Naq jubfbrire gbhpurgu nal guvat gung jnf haqre uvz funyy or
hapyrna hagvy gur rira: naq ur gung ornergu nal bs gubfr guvatf funyy
jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq ongur uvzfrys va jngre, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur
rira.

15:11 Naq jubzfbrire ur gbhpurgu gung ungu gur vffhr, naq ungu abg
evafrq uvf unaqf va jngre, ur funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq ongur
uvzfrys va jngre, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

15:12 Naq gur irffry bs rnegu, gung ur gbhpurgu juvpu ungu gur vffhr,
funyy or oebxra: naq rirel irffry bs jbbq funyy or evafrq va jngre.

15:13 Naq jura ur gung ungu na vffhr vf pyrnafrq bs uvf vffhr; gura ur
funyy ahzore gb uvzfrys frira qnlf sbe uvf pyrnafvat, naq jnfu uvf
pybgurf, naq ongur uvf syrfu va ehaavat jngre, naq funyy or pyrna.

15:14 Naq ba gur rvtugu qnl ur funyy gnxr gb uvz gjb ghegyrqbirf, be
gjb lbhat cvtrbaf, naq pbzr orsber gur YBEQ hagb gur qbbe bs gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, naq tvir gurz hagb gur cevrfg: 15:15
Naq gur cevrfg funyy bssre gurz, gur bar sbe n fva bssrevat, naq gur
bgure sbe n oheag bssrevat; naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe
uvz orsber gur YBEQ sbe uvf vffhr.

15:16 Naq vs nal zna'f frrq bs pbchyngvba tb bhg sebz uvz, gura ur
funyy jnfu nyy uvf syrfu va jngre, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

15:17 Naq rirel tnezrag, naq rirel fxva, jurerba vf gur frrq bs
pbchyngvba, funyy or jnfurq jvgu jngre, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

15:18 Gur jbzna nyfb jvgu jubz zna funyy yvr jvgu frrq bs pbchyngvba,
gurl funyy obgu ongur gurzfryirf va jngre, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur
rira.

15:19 Naq vs n jbzna unir na vffhr, naq ure vffhr va ure syrfu or
oybbq, fur funyy or chg ncneg frira qnlf: naq jubfbrire gbhpurgu ure
funyy or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

15:20 Naq rirel guvat gung fur yvrgu hcba va ure frcnengvba funyy or
hapyrna: rirel guvat nyfb gung fur fvggrgu hcba funyy or hapyrna.

15:21 Naq jubfbrire gbhpurgu ure orq funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq ongur
uvzfrys va jngre, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

15:22 Naq jubfbrire gbhpurgu nal guvat gung fur fng hcba funyy jnfu
uvf pybgurf, naq ongur uvzfrys va jngre, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur
rira.

15:23 Naq vs vg or ba ure orq, be ba nal guvat jurerba fur fvggrgu,
jura ur gbhpurgu vg, ur funyy or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

15:24 Naq vs nal zna yvr jvgu ure ng nyy, naq ure sybjref or hcba uvz,
ur funyy or hapyrna frira qnlf; naq nyy gur orq jurerba ur yvrgu funyy
or hapyrna.

15:25 Naq vs n jbzna unir na vffhr bs ure oybbq znal qnlf bhg bs gur
gvzr bs ure frcnengvba, be vs vg eha orlbaq gur gvzr bs ure
frcnengvba; nyy gur qnlf bs gur vffhr bs ure hapyrnaarff funyy or nf
gur qnlf bs ure frcnengvba: fur funyy or hapyrna.

15:26 Rirel orq jurerba fur yvrgu nyy gur qnlf bs ure vffhr funyy or
hagb ure nf gur orq bs ure frcnengvba: naq jungfbrire fur fvggrgu hcba
funyy or hapyrna, nf gur hapyrnaarff bs ure frcnengvba.

15:27 Naq jubfbrire gbhpurgu gubfr guvatf funyy or hapyrna, naq funyy
jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq ongur uvzfrys va jngre, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur
rira.

15:28 Ohg vs fur or pyrnafrq bs ure vffhr, gura fur funyy ahzore gb
urefrys frira qnlf, naq nsgre gung fur funyy or pyrna.

15:29 Naq ba gur rvtugu qnl fur funyy gnxr hagb ure gjb ghegyrf, be
gjb lbhat cvtrbaf, naq oevat gurz hagb gur cevrfg, gb gur qbbe bs gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

15:30 Naq gur cevrfg funyy bssre gur bar sbe n fva bssrevat, naq gur
bgure sbe n oheag bssrevat; naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe
ure orsber gur YBEQ sbe gur vffhr bs ure hapyrnaarff.

15:31 Guhf funyy lr frcnengr gur puvyqera bs Vfenry sebz gurve
hapyrnaarff; gung gurl qvr abg va gurve hapyrnaarff, jura gurl qrsvyr
zl gnoreanpyr gung vf nzbat gurz.

15:32 Guvf vf gur ynj bs uvz gung ungu na vffhr, naq bs uvz jubfr frrq
tbrgu sebz uvz, naq vf qrsvyrq gurerjvgu; 15:33 Naq bs ure gung vf
fvpx bs ure sybjref, naq bs uvz gung ungu na vffhr, bs gur zna, naq bs
gur jbzna, naq bs uvz gung yvrgu jvgu ure gung vf hapyrna.

16:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf nsgre gur qrngu bs gur gjb fbaf bs
Nneba, jura gurl bssrerq orsber gur YBEQ, naq qvrq; 16:2 Naq gur YBEQ
fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Fcrnx hagb Nneba gul oebgure, gung ur pbzr abg ng nyy
gvzrf vagb gur ubyl cynpr jvguva gur invy orsber gur zrepl frng, juvpu
vf hcba gur nex; gung ur qvr abg: sbe V jvyy nccrne va gur pybhq hcba
gur zrepl frng.

16:3 Guhf funyy Nneba pbzr vagb gur ubyl cynpr: jvgu n lbhat ohyybpx
sbe n fva bssrevat, naq n enz sbe n oheag bssrevat.

16:4 Ur funyy chg ba gur ubyl yvara pbng, naq ur funyy unir gur yvara
oerrpurf hcba uvf syrfu, naq funyy or tveqrq jvgu n yvara tveqyr, naq
jvgu gur yvara zvger funyy ur or nggverq: gurfr ner ubyl tnezragf;
gurersber funyy ur jnfu uvf syrfu va jngre, naq fb chg gurz ba.

16:5 Naq ur funyy gnxr bs gur pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
gjb xvqf bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat, naq bar enz sbe n oheag
bssrevat.

16:6 Naq Nneba funyy bssre uvf ohyybpx bs gur fva bssrevat, juvpu vf
sbe uvzfrys, naq znxr na ngbarzrag sbe uvzfrys, naq sbe uvf ubhfr.

16:7 Naq ur funyy gnxr gur gjb tbngf, naq cerfrag gurz orsber gur YBEQ
ng gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

16:8 Naq Nneba funyy pnfg ybgf hcba gur gjb tbngf; bar ybg sbe gur
YBEQ, naq gur bgure ybg sbe gur fpncrtbng.

16:9 Naq Nneba funyy oevat gur tbng hcba juvpu gur YBEQ'f ybg sryy,
naq bssre uvz sbe n fva bssrevat.

16:10 Ohg gur tbng, ba juvpu gur ybg sryy gb or gur fpncrtbng, funyy
or cerfragrq nyvir orsber gur YBEQ, gb znxr na ngbarzrag jvgu uvz, naq
gb yrg uvz tb sbe n fpncrtbng vagb gur jvyqrearff.

16:11 Naq Nneba funyy oevat gur ohyybpx bs gur fva bssrevat, juvpu vf
sbe uvzfrys, naq funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe uvzfrys, naq sbe uvf
ubhfr, naq funyy xvyy gur ohyybpx bs gur fva bssrevat juvpu vf sbe
uvzfrys: 16:12 Naq ur funyy gnxr n prafre shyy bs oheavat pbnyf bs
sver sebz bss gur nygne orsber gur YBEQ, naq uvf unaqf shyy bs fjrrg
vaprafr orngra fznyy, naq oevat vg jvguva gur invy: 16:13 Naq ur funyy
chg gur vaprafr hcba gur sver orsber gur YBEQ, gung gur pybhq bs gur
vaprafr znl pbire gur zrepl frng gung vf hcba gur grfgvzbal, gung ur
qvr abg: 16:14 Naq ur funyy gnxr bs gur oybbq bs gur ohyybpx, naq
fcevaxyr vg jvgu uvf svatre hcba gur zrepl frng rnfgjneq; naq orsber
gur zrepl frng funyy ur fcevaxyr bs gur oybbq jvgu uvf svatre frira
gvzrf.

16:15 Gura funyy ur xvyy gur tbng bs gur fva bssrevat, gung vf sbe gur
crbcyr, naq oevat uvf oybbq jvguva gur invy, naq qb jvgu gung oybbq nf
ur qvq jvgu gur oybbq bs gur ohyybpx, naq fcevaxyr vg hcba gur zrepl
frng, naq orsber gur zrepl frng: 16:16 Naq ur funyy znxr na ngbarzrag
sbe gur ubyl cynpr, orpnhfr bs gur hapyrnaarff bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, naq orpnhfr bs gurve genafterffvbaf va nyy gurve fvaf: naq fb
funyy ur qb sbe gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, gung erznvargu
nzbat gurz va gur zvqfg bs gurve hapyrnaarff.

16:17 Naq gurer funyy or ab zna va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba
jura ur tbrgu va gb znxr na ngbarzrag va gur ubyl cynpr, hagvy ur pbzr
bhg, naq unir znqr na ngbarzrag sbe uvzfrys, naq sbe uvf ubhfrubyq,
naq sbe nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry.

16:18 Naq ur funyy tb bhg hagb gur nygne gung vf orsber gur YBEQ, naq
znxr na ngbarzrag sbe vg; naq funyy gnxr bs gur oybbq bs gur ohyybpx,
naq bs gur oybbq bs gur tbng, naq chg vg hcba gur ubeaf bs gur nygne
ebhaq nobhg.

16:19 Naq ur funyy fcevaxyr bs gur oybbq hcba vg jvgu uvf svatre frira
gvzrf, naq pyrnafr vg, naq unyybj vg sebz gur hapyrnaarff bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry.

16:20 Naq jura ur ungu znqr na raq bs erpbapvyvat gur ubyl cynpr, naq
gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, naq gur nygne, ur funyy oevat gur
yvir tbng: 16:21 Naq Nneba funyy ynl obgu uvf unaqf hcba gur urnq bs
gur yvir tbng, naq pbasrff bire uvz nyy gur vavdhvgvrf bs gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry, naq nyy gurve genafterffvbaf va nyy gurve fvaf, chggvat
gurz hcba gur urnq bs gur tbng, naq funyy fraq uvz njnl ol gur unaq bs
n svg zna vagb gur jvyqrearff: 16:22 Naq gur tbng funyy orne hcba uvz
nyy gurve vavdhvgvrf hagb n ynaq abg vaunovgrq: naq ur funyy yrg tb
gur tbng va gur jvyqrearff.

16:23 Naq Nneba funyy pbzr vagb gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba,
naq funyy chg bss gur yvara tnezragf, juvpu ur chg ba jura ur jrag
vagb gur ubyl cynpr, naq funyy yrnir gurz gurer: 16:24 Naq ur funyy
jnfu uvf syrfu jvgu jngre va gur ubyl cynpr, naq chg ba uvf tnezragf,
naq pbzr sbegu, naq bssre uvf oheag bssrevat, naq gur oheag bssrevat
bs gur crbcyr, naq znxr na ngbarzrag sbe uvzfrys, naq sbe gur crbcyr.

16:25 Naq gur sng bs gur fva bssrevat funyy ur ohea hcba gur nygne.

16:26 Naq ur gung yrg tb gur tbng sbe gur fpncrtbng funyy jnfu uvf
pybgurf, naq ongur uvf syrfu va jngre, naq nsgrejneq pbzr vagb gur
pnzc.

16:27 Naq gur ohyybpx sbe gur fva bssrevat, naq gur tbng sbe gur fva
bssrevat, jubfr oybbq jnf oebhtug va gb znxr ngbarzrag va gur ubyl
cynpr, funyy bar pneel sbegu jvgubhg gur pnzc; naq gurl funyy ohea va
gur sver gurve fxvaf, naq gurve syrfu, naq gurve qhat.

16:28 Naq ur gung oheargu gurz funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq ongur uvf
syrfu va jngre, naq nsgrejneq ur funyy pbzr vagb gur pnzc.

16:29 Naq guvf funyy or n fgnghgr sbe rire hagb lbh: gung va gur
friragu zbagu, ba gur gragu qnl bs gur zbagu, lr funyy nssyvpg lbhe
fbhyf, naq qb ab jbex ng nyy, jurgure vg or bar bs lbhe bja pbhagel,
be n fgenatre gung fbwbheargu nzbat lbh: 16:30 Sbe ba gung qnl funyy
gur cevrfg znxr na ngbarzrag sbe lbh, gb pyrnafr lbh, gung lr znl or
pyrna sebz nyy lbhe fvaf orsber gur YBEQ.

16:31 Vg funyy or n fnoongu bs erfg hagb lbh, naq lr funyy nssyvpg
lbhe fbhyf, ol n fgnghgr sbe rire.

16:32 Naq gur cevrfg, jubz ur funyy nabvag, naq jubz ur funyy
pbafrpengr gb zvavfgre va gur cevrfg'f bssvpr va uvf sngure'f fgrnq,
funyy znxr gur ngbarzrag, naq funyy chg ba gur yvara pybgurf, rira gur
ubyl tnezragf: 16:33 Naq ur funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe gur ubyl
fnapghnel, naq ur funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, naq sbe gur nygne, naq ur funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe
gur cevrfgf, naq sbe nyy gur crbcyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

16:34 Naq guvf funyy or na rireynfgvat fgnghgr hagb lbh, gb znxr na
ngbarzrag sbe gur puvyqera bs Vfenry sbe nyy gurve fvaf bapr n lrne.
Naq ur qvq nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

17:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 17:2 Fcrnx hagb Nneba, naq
hagb uvf fbaf, naq hagb nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz;
Guvf vf gur guvat juvpu gur YBEQ ungu pbzznaqrq, fnlvat, 17:3 Jung zna
fbrire gurer or bs gur ubhfr bs Vfenry, gung xvyyrgu na bk, be ynzo,
be tbng, va gur pnzc, be gung xvyyrgu vg bhg bs gur pnzc, 17:4 Naq
oevatrgu vg abg hagb gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba,
gb bssre na bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ orsber gur gnoreanpyr bs gur YBEQ;
oybbq funyy or vzchgrq hagb gung zna; ur ungu furq oybbq; naq gung zna
funyy or phg bss sebz nzbat uvf crbcyr: 17:5 Gb gur raq gung gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry znl oevat gurve fnpevsvprf, juvpu gurl bssre va gur
bcra svryq, rira gung gurl znl oevat gurz hagb gur YBEQ, hagb gur qbbe
bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, hagb gur cevrfg, naq bssre gurz
sbe crnpr bssrevatf hagb gur YBEQ.

17:6 Naq gur cevrfg funyy fcevaxyr gur oybbq hcba gur nygne bs gur
YBEQ ng gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, naq ohea gur
sng sbe n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ.

17:7 Naq gurl funyy ab zber bssre gurve fnpevsvprf hagb qrivyf, nsgre
jubz gurl unir tbar n jubevat. Guvf funyy or n fgnghgr sbe rire hagb
gurz guebhtubhg gurve trarengvbaf.

17:8 Naq gubh funyg fnl hagb gurz, Jungfbrire zna gurer or bs gur
ubhfr bs Vfenry, be bs gur fgenatref juvpu fbwbhea nzbat lbh, gung
bssrergu n oheag bssrevat be fnpevsvpr, 17:9 Naq oevatrgu vg abg hagb
gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, gb bssre vg hagb gur
YBEQ; rira gung zna funyy or phg bss sebz nzbat uvf crbcyr.

17:10 Naq jungfbrire zna gurer or bs gur ubhfr bs Vfenry, be bs gur
fgenatref gung fbwbhea nzbat lbh, gung rngrgu nal znaare bs oybbq; V
jvyy rira frg zl snpr ntnvafg gung fbhy gung rngrgu oybbq, naq jvyy
phg uvz bss sebz nzbat uvf crbcyr.

17:11 Sbe gur yvsr bs gur syrfu vf va gur oybbq: naq V unir tvira vg
gb lbh hcba gur nygne gb znxr na ngbarzrag sbe lbhe fbhyf: sbe vg vf
gur oybbq gung znxrgu na ngbarzrag sbe gur fbhy.

17:12 Gurersber V fnvq hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, Ab fbhy bs lbh
funyy rng oybbq, arvgure funyy nal fgenatre gung fbwbheargu nzbat lbh
rng oybbq.

17:13 Naq jungfbrire zna gurer or bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, be bs gur
fgenatref gung fbwbhea nzbat lbh, juvpu uhagrgu naq pngpurgu nal ornfg
be sbjy gung znl or rngra; ur funyy rira cbhe bhg gur oybbq gurerbs,
naq pbire vg jvgu qhfg.

17:14 Sbe vg vf gur yvsr bs nyy syrfu; gur oybbq bs vg vf sbe gur yvsr
gurerbs: gurersber V fnvq hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, Lr funyy rng
gur oybbq bs ab znaare bs syrfu: sbe gur yvsr bs nyy syrfu vf gur
oybbq gurerbs: jubfbrire rngrgu vg funyy or phg bss.

17:15 Naq rirel fbhy gung rngrgu gung juvpu qvrq bs vgfrys, be gung
juvpu jnf gbea jvgu ornfgf, jurgure vg or bar bs lbhe bja pbhagel, be
n fgenatre, ur funyy obgu jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq ongur uvzfrys va
jngre, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur rira: gura funyy ur or pyrna.

17:16 Ohg vs ur jnfu gurz abg, abe ongur uvf syrfu; gura ur funyy orne
uvf vavdhvgl.

18:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 18:2 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

18:3 Nsgre gur qbvatf bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, jurerva lr qjryg, funyy lr
abg qb: naq nsgre gur qbvatf bs gur ynaq bs Pnanna, juvgure V oevat
lbh, funyy lr abg qb: arvgure funyy lr jnyx va gurve beqvanaprf.

18:4 Lr funyy qb zl whqtzragf, naq xrrc zvar beqvanaprf, gb jnyx
gurerva: V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

18:5 Lr funyy gurersber xrrc zl fgnghgrf, naq zl whqtzragf: juvpu vs n
zna qb, ur funyy yvir va gurz: V nz gur YBEQ.

18:6 Abar bs lbh funyy nccebnpu gb nal gung vf arne bs xva gb uvz, gb
hapbire gurve anxrqarff: V nz gur YBEQ.

18:7 Gur anxrqarff bs gul sngure, be gur anxrqarff bs gul zbgure,
funyg gubh abg hapbire: fur vf gul zbgure; gubh funyg abg hapbire ure
anxrqarff.

18:8 Gur anxrqarff bs gul sngure'f jvsr funyg gubh abg hapbire: vg vf
gul sngure'f anxrqarff.

18:9 Gur anxrqarff bs gul fvfgre, gur qnhtugre bs gul sngure, be
qnhtugre bs gul zbgure, jurgure fur or obea ng ubzr, be obea noebnq,
rira gurve anxrqarff gubh funyg abg hapbire.

18:10 Gur anxrqarff bs gul fba'f qnhtugre, be bs gul qnhtugre'f
qnhtugre, rira gurve anxrqarff gubh funyg abg hapbire: sbe gurvef vf
guvar bja anxrqarff.

18:11 Gur anxrqarff bs gul sngure'f jvsr'f qnhtugre, ortbggra bs gul
sngure, fur vf gul fvfgre, gubh funyg abg hapbire ure anxrqarff.

18:12 Gubh funyg abg hapbire gur anxrqarff bs gul sngure'f fvfgre: fur
vf gul sngure'f arne xvafjbzna.

18:13 Gubh funyg abg hapbire gur anxrqarff bs gul zbgure'f fvfgre: sbe
fur vf gul zbgure'f arne xvafjbzna.

18:14 Gubh funyg abg hapbire gur anxrqarff bs gul sngure'f oebgure,
gubh funyg abg nccebnpu gb uvf jvsr: fur vf guvar nhag.

18:15 Gubh funyg abg hapbire gur anxrqarff bs gul qnhtugre va ynj: fur
vf gul fba'f jvsr; gubh funyg abg hapbire ure anxrqarff.

18:16 Gubh funyg abg hapbire gur anxrqarff bs gul oebgure'f jvsr: vg
vf gul oebgure'f anxrqarff.

18:17 Gubh funyg abg hapbire gur anxrqarff bs n jbzna naq ure
qnhtugre, arvgure funyg gubh gnxr ure fba'f qnhtugre, be ure
qnhtugre'f qnhtugre, gb hapbire ure anxrqarff; sbe gurl ner ure arne
xvafjbzra: vg vf jvpxrqarff.

18:18 Arvgure funyg gubh gnxr n jvsr gb ure fvfgre, gb irk ure, gb
hapbire ure anxrqarff, orfvqr gur bgure va ure yvsr gvzr.

18:19 Nyfb gubh funyg abg nccebnpu hagb n jbzna gb hapbire ure
anxrqarff, nf ybat nf fur vf chg ncneg sbe ure hapyrnaarff.

18:20 Zberbire gubh funyg abg yvr pneanyyl jvgu gul arvtuobhe'f jvsr,
gb qrsvyr gulfrys jvgu ure.

18:21 Naq gubh funyg abg yrg nal bs gul frrq cnff guebhtu gur sver gb
Zbyrpu, arvgure funyg gubh cebsnar gur anzr bs gul Tbq: V nz gur YBEQ.

18:22 Gubh funyg abg yvr jvgu znaxvaq, nf jvgu jbznaxvaq: vg vf
nobzvangvba.

18:23 Arvgure funyg gubh yvr jvgu nal ornfg gb qrsvyr gulfrys
gurerjvgu: arvgure funyy nal jbzna fgnaq orsber n ornfg gb yvr qbja
gurergb: vg vf pbashfvba.

18:24 Qrsvyr abg lr lbhefryirf va nal bs gurfr guvatf: sbe va nyy
gurfr gur angvbaf ner qrsvyrq juvpu V pnfg bhg orsber lbh: 18:25 Naq
gur ynaq vf qrsvyrq: gurersber V qb ivfvg gur vavdhvgl gurerbs hcba
vg, naq gur ynaq vgfrys ibzvgrgu bhg ure vaunovgnagf.

18:26 Lr funyy gurersber xrrc zl fgnghgrf naq zl whqtzragf, naq funyy
abg pbzzvg nal bs gurfr nobzvangvbaf; arvgure nal bs lbhe bja angvba,
abe nal fgenatre gung fbwbheargu nzbat lbh: 18:27 (Sbe nyy gurfr
nobzvangvbaf unir gur zra bs gur ynaq qbar, juvpu jrer orsber lbh, naq
gur ynaq vf qrsvyrq;) 18:28 Gung gur ynaq fchr abg lbh bhg nyfb, jura
lr qrsvyr vg, nf vg fchrq bhg gur angvbaf gung jrer orsber lbh.

18:29 Sbe jubfbrire funyy pbzzvg nal bs gurfr nobzvangvbaf, rira gur
fbhyf gung pbzzvg gurz funyy or phg bss sebz nzbat gurve crbcyr.

18:30 Gurersber funyy lr xrrc zvar beqvanapr, gung lr pbzzvg abg nal
bar bs gurfr nobzvanoyr phfgbzf, juvpu jrer pbzzvggrq orsber lbh, naq
gung lr qrsvyr abg lbhefryirf gurerva: V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

19:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 19:2 Fcrnx hagb nyy gur
pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Lr funyy or
ubyl: sbe V gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq nz ubyl.

19:3 Lr funyy srne rirel zna uvf zbgure, naq uvf sngure, naq xrrc zl
fnoonguf: V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.
