19:4 Ghea lr abg hagb vqbyf, abe znxr gb lbhefryirf zbygra tbqf: V nz
gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

19:5 Naq vs lr bssre n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevatf hagb gur YBEQ, lr
funyy bssre vg ng lbhe bja jvyy.

19:6 Vg funyy or rngra gur fnzr qnl lr bssre vg, naq ba gur zbeebj:
naq vs bhtug erznva hagvy gur guveq qnl, vg funyy or oheag va gur
sver.

19:7 Naq vs vg or rngra ng nyy ba gur guveq qnl, vg vf nobzvanoyr; vg
funyy abg or npprcgrq.

19:8 Gurersber rirel bar gung rngrgu vg funyy orne uvf vavdhvgl,
orpnhfr ur ungu cebsnarq gur unyybjrq guvat bs gur YBEQ: naq gung fbhy
funyy or phg bss sebz nzbat uvf crbcyr.

19:9 Naq jura lr ernc gur uneirfg bs lbhe ynaq, gubh funyg abg jubyyl
ernc gur pbearef bs gul svryq, arvgure funyg gubh tngure gur tyrnavatf
bs gul uneirfg.

19:10 Naq gubh funyg abg tyrna gul ivarlneq, arvgure funyg gubh tngure
rirel tencr bs gul ivarlneq; gubh funyg yrnir gurz sbe gur cbbe naq
fgenatre: V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

19:11 Lr funyy abg fgrny, arvgure qrny snyfryl, arvgure yvr bar gb
nabgure.

19:12 Naq lr funyy abg fjrne ol zl anzr snyfryl, arvgure funyg gubh
cebsnar gur anzr bs gul Tbq: V nz gur YBEQ.

19:13 Gubh funyg abg qrsenhq gul arvtuobhe, arvgure ebo uvz: gur jntrf
bs uvz gung vf uverq funyy abg novqr jvgu gurr nyy avtug hagvy gur
zbeavat.

19:14 Gubh funyg abg phefr gur qrns, abe chg n fghzoyvatoybpx orsber
gur oyvaq, ohg funyg srne gul Tbq: V nz gur YBEQ.

19:15 Lr funyy qb ab haevtugrbhfarff va whqtzrag: gubh funyg abg
erfcrpg gur crefba bs gur cbbe, abe ubabe gur crefba bs gur zvtugl:
ohg va evtugrbhfarff funyg gubh whqtr gul arvtuobhe.

19:16 Gubh funyg abg tb hc naq qbja nf n gnyrornere nzbat gul crbcyr:
arvgure funyg gubh fgnaq ntnvafg gur oybbq bs gul arvtuobhe; V nz gur
YBEQ.

19:17 Gubh funyg abg ungr gul oebgure va guvar urneg: gubh funyg va
nal jvfr erohxr gul arvtuobhe, naq abg fhssre fva hcba uvz.

19:18 Gubh funyg abg niratr, abe orne nal tehqtr ntnvafg gur puvyqera
bs gul crbcyr, ohg gubh funyg ybir gul arvtuobhe nf gulfrys: V nz gur
YBEQ.

19:19 Lr funyy xrrc zl fgnghgrf. Gubh funyg abg yrg gul pnggyr traqre
jvgu n qvirefr xvaq: gubh funyg abg fbj gul svryq jvgu zvatyrq frrq:
arvgure funyy n tnezrag zvatyrq bs yvara naq jbbyyra pbzr hcba gurr.

19:20 Naq jubfbrire yvrgu pneanyyl jvgu n jbzna, gung vf n obaqznvq,
orgebgurq gb na uhfonaq, naq abg ng nyy erqrrzrq, abe serrqbz tvira
ure; fur funyy or fpbhetrq; gurl funyy abg or chg gb qrngu, orpnhfr
fur jnf abg serr.

19:21 Naq ur funyy oevat uvf gerfcnff bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ, hagb gur
qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, rira n enz sbe n gerfcnff
bssrevat.

19:22 Naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe uvz jvgu gur enz bs
gur gerfcnff bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ sbe uvf fva juvpu ur ungu qbar:
naq gur fva juvpu ur ungu qbar funyy or sbetvira uvz.

19:23 Naq jura lr funyy pbzr vagb gur ynaq, naq funyy unir cynagrq nyy
znaare bs gerrf sbe sbbq, gura lr funyy pbhag gur sehvg gurerbs nf
hapvephzpvfrq: guerr lrnef funyy vg or nf hapvephzpvfrq hagb lbh: vg
funyy abg or rngra bs.

19:24 Ohg va gur sbhegu lrne nyy gur sehvg gurerbs funyy or ubyl gb
cenvfr gur YBEQ jvguny.

19:25 Naq va gur svsgu lrne funyy lr rng bs gur sehvg gurerbs, gung vg
znl lvryq hagb lbh gur vapernfr gurerbs: V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

19:26 Lr funyy abg rng nal guvat jvgu gur oybbq: arvgure funyy lr hfr
rapunagzrag, abe bofreir gvzrf.

19:27 Lr funyy abg ebhaq gur pbearef bs lbhe urnqf, arvgure funyg gubh
zne gur pbearef bs gul orneq.

19:28 Lr funyy abg znxr nal phggvatf va lbhe syrfu sbe gur qrnq, abe
cevag nal znexf hcba lbh: V nz gur YBEQ.

19:29 Qb abg cebfgvghgr gul qnhtugre, gb pnhfr ure gb or n juber; yrfg
gur ynaq snyy gb juberqbz, naq gur ynaq orpbzr shyy bs jvpxrqarff.

19:30 Lr funyy xrrc zl fnoonguf, naq erirerapr zl fnapghnel: V nz gur
YBEQ.

19:31 Ertneq abg gurz gung unir snzvyvne fcvevgf, arvgure frrx nsgre
jvmneqf, gb or qrsvyrq ol gurz: V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

19:32 Gubh funyg evfr hc orsber gur ubnel urnq, naq ubabhe gur snpr bs
gur byq zna, naq srne gul Tbq: V nz gur YBEQ.

19:33 Naq vs n fgenatre fbwbhea jvgu gurr va lbhe ynaq, lr funyy abg
irk uvz.

19:34 Ohg gur fgenatre gung qjryyrgu jvgu lbh funyy or hagb lbh nf bar
obea nzbat lbh, naq gubh funyg ybir uvz nf gulfrys; sbe lr jrer
fgenatref va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg: V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

19:35 Lr funyy qb ab haevtugrbhfarff va whqtzrag, va zrgrlneq, va
jrvtug, be va zrnfher.

19:36 Whfg onynaprf, whfg jrvtugf, n whfg rcunu, naq n whfg uva, funyy
lr unir: V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, juvpu oebhtug lbh bhg bs gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg.

19:37 Gurersber funyy lr bofreir nyy zl fgnghgrf, naq nyy zl
whqtzragf, naq qb gurz: V nz gur YBEQ.

20:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 20:2 Ntnva, gubh funyg fnl
gb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, Jubfbrire ur or bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry,
be bs gur fgenatref gung fbwbhea va Vfenry, gung tvirgu nal bs uvf
frrq hagb Zbyrpu; ur funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu: gur crbcyr bs gur
ynaq funyy fgbar uvz jvgu fgbarf.

20:3 Naq V jvyy frg zl snpr ntnvafg gung zna, naq jvyy phg uvz bss
sebz nzbat uvf crbcyr; orpnhfr ur ungu tvira bs uvf frrq hagb Zbyrpu,
gb qrsvyr zl fnapghnel, naq gb cebsnar zl ubyl anzr.

20:4 Naq vs gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq qb nal jnlf uvqr gurve rlrf sebz
gur zna, jura ur tvirgu bs uvf frrq hagb Zbyrpu, naq xvyy uvz abg:
20:5 Gura V jvyy frg zl snpr ntnvafg gung zna, naq ntnvafg uvf snzvyl,
naq jvyy phg uvz bss, naq nyy gung tb n jubevat nsgre uvz, gb pbzzvg
juberqbz jvgu Zbyrpu, sebz nzbat gurve crbcyr.

20:6 Naq gur fbhy gung gheargu nsgre fhpu nf unir snzvyvne fcvevgf,
naq nsgre jvmneqf, gb tb n jubevat nsgre gurz, V jvyy rira frg zl snpr
ntnvafg gung fbhy, naq jvyy phg uvz bss sebz nzbat uvf crbcyr.

20:7 Fnapgvsl lbhefryirf gurersber, naq or lr ubyl: sbe V nz gur YBEQ
lbhe Tbq.

20:8 Naq lr funyy xrrc zl fgnghgrf, naq qb gurz: V nz gur YBEQ juvpu
fnapgvsl lbh.

20:9 Sbe rirel bar gung phefrgu uvf sngure be uvf zbgure funyy or
fheryl chg gb qrngu: ur ungu phefrq uvf sngure be uvf zbgure; uvf
oybbq funyy or hcba uvz.

20:10 Naq gur zna gung pbzzvggrgu nqhygrel jvgu nabgure zna'f jvsr,
rira ur gung pbzzvggrgu nqhygrel jvgu uvf arvtuobhe'f jvsr, gur
nqhygrere naq gur nqhygrerff funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu.

20:11 Naq gur zna gung yvrgu jvgu uvf sngure'f jvsr ungu hapbirerq uvf
sngure'f anxrqarff: obgu bs gurz funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu; gurve
oybbq funyy or hcba gurz.

20:12 Naq vs n zna yvr jvgu uvf qnhtugre va ynj, obgu bs gurz funyy
fheryl or chg gb qrngu: gurl unir jebhtug pbashfvba; gurve oybbq funyy
or hcba gurz.

20:13 Vs n zna nyfb yvr jvgu znaxvaq, nf ur yvrgu jvgu n jbzna, obgu
bs gurz unir pbzzvggrq na nobzvangvba: gurl funyy fheryl or chg gb
qrngu; gurve oybbq funyy or hcba gurz.

20:14 Naq vs n zna gnxr n jvsr naq ure zbgure, vg vf jvpxrqarff: gurl
funyy or oheag jvgu sver, obgu ur naq gurl; gung gurer or ab
jvpxrqarff nzbat lbh.

20:15 Naq vs n zna yvr jvgu n ornfg, ur funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu:
naq lr funyy fynl gur ornfg.

20:16 Naq vs n jbzna nccebnpu hagb nal ornfg, naq yvr qbja gurergb,
gubh funyg xvyy gur jbzna, naq gur ornfg: gurl funyy fheryl or chg gb
qrngu; gurve oybbq funyy or hcba gurz.

20:17 Naq vs n zna funyy gnxr uvf fvfgre, uvf sngure'f qnhtugre, be
uvf zbgure'f qnhtugre, naq frr ure anxrqarff, naq fur frr uvf
anxrqarff; vg vf n jvpxrq guvat; naq gurl funyy or phg bss va gur
fvtug bs gurve crbcyr: ur ungu hapbirerq uvf fvfgre'f anxrqarff; ur
funyy orne uvf vavdhvgl.

20:18 Naq vs n zna funyy yvr jvgu n jbzna univat ure fvpxarff, naq
funyy hapbire ure anxrqarff; ur ungu qvfpbirerq ure sbhagnva, naq fur
ungu hapbirerq gur sbhagnva bs ure oybbq: naq obgu bs gurz funyy or
phg bss sebz nzbat gurve crbcyr.

20:19 Naq gubh funyg abg hapbire gur anxrqarff bs gul zbgure'f fvfgre,
abe bs gul sngure'f fvfgre: sbe ur hapbirergu uvf arne xva: gurl funyy
orne gurve vavdhvgl.

20:20 Naq vs n zna funyy yvr jvgu uvf hapyr'f jvsr, ur ungu hapbirerq
uvf hapyr'f anxrqarff: gurl funyy orne gurve fva; gurl funyy qvr
puvyqyrff.

20:21 Naq vs n zna funyy gnxr uvf oebgure'f jvsr, vg vf na hapyrna
guvat: ur ungu hapbirerq uvf oebgure'f anxrqarff; gurl funyy or
puvyqyrff.

20:22 Lr funyy gurersber xrrc nyy zl fgnghgrf, naq nyy zl whqtzragf,
naq qb gurz: gung gur ynaq, juvgure V oevat lbh gb qjryy gurerva, fchr
lbh abg bhg.

20:23 Naq lr funyy abg jnyx va gur znaaref bs gur angvba, juvpu V pnfg
bhg orsber lbh: sbe gurl pbzzvggrq nyy gurfr guvatf, naq gurersber V
noubeerq gurz.

20:24 Ohg V unir fnvq hagb lbh, Lr funyy vaurevg gurve ynaq, naq V
jvyy tvir vg hagb lbh gb cbffrff vg, n ynaq gung sybjrgu jvgu zvyx naq
ubarl: V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, juvpu unir frcnengrq lbh sebz bgure
crbcyr.

20:25 Lr funyy gurersber chg qvssrerapr orgjrra pyrna ornfgf naq
hapyrna, naq orgjrra hapyrna sbjyf naq pyrna: naq lr funyy abg znxr
lbhe fbhyf nobzvanoyr ol ornfg, be ol sbjy, be ol nal znaare bs yvivat
guvat gung perrcrgu ba gur tebhaq, juvpu V unir frcnengrq sebz lbh nf
hapyrna.

20:26 Naq lr funyy or ubyl hagb zr: sbe V gur YBEQ nz ubyl, naq unir
frirerq lbh sebz bgure crbcyr, gung lr fubhyq or zvar.

20:27 N zna nyfb be jbzna gung ungu n snzvyvne fcvevg, be gung vf n
jvmneq, funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu: gurl funyy fgbar gurz jvgu
fgbarf: gurve oybbq funyy or hcba gurz.

21:1 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Fcrnx hagb gur cevrfgf gur fbaf bs
Nneba, naq fnl hagb gurz, Gurer funyy abar or qrsvyrq sbe gur qrnq
nzbat uvf crbcyr: 21:2 Ohg sbe uvf xva, gung vf arne hagb uvz, gung
vf, sbe uvf zbgure, naq sbe uvf sngure, naq sbe uvf fba, naq sbe uvf
qnhtugre, naq sbe uvf oebgure.

21:3 Naq sbe uvf fvfgre n ivetva, gung vf avtu hagb uvz, juvpu ungu
unq ab uhfonaq; sbe ure znl ur or qrsvyrq.

21:4 Ohg ur funyy abg qrsvyr uvzfrys, orvat n puvrs zna nzbat uvf
crbcyr, gb cebsnar uvzfrys.

21:5 Gurl funyy abg znxr onyqarff hcba gurve urnq, arvgure funyy gurl
funir bss gur pbeare bs gurve orneq, abe znxr nal phggvatf va gurve
syrfu.

21:6 Gurl funyy or ubyl hagb gurve Tbq, naq abg cebsnar gur anzr bs
gurve Tbq: sbe gur bssrevatf bs gur YBEQ znqr ol sver, naq gur oernq
bs gurve Tbq, gurl qb bssre: gurersber gurl funyy or ubyl.

21:7 Gurl funyy abg gnxr n jvsr gung vf n juber, be cebsnar; arvgure
funyy gurl gnxr n jbzna chg njnl sebz ure uhfonaq: sbe ur vf ubyl hagb
uvf Tbq.

21:8 Gubh funyg fnapgvsl uvz gurersber; sbe ur bssrergu gur oernq bs
gul Tbq: ur funyy or ubyl hagb gurr: sbe V gur YBEQ, juvpu fnapgvsl
lbh, nz ubyl.

21:9 Naq gur qnhtugre bs nal cevrfg, vs fur cebsnar urefrys ol cynlvat
gur juber, fur cebsnargu ure sngure: fur funyy or oheag jvgu sver.

21:10 Naq ur gung vf gur uvtu cevrfg nzbat uvf oerguera, hcba jubfr
urnq gur nabvagvat bvy jnf cbherq, naq gung vf pbafrpengrq gb chg ba
gur tnezragf, funyy abg hapbire uvf urnq, abe eraq uvf pybgurf; 21:11
Arvgure funyy ur tb va gb nal qrnq obql, abe qrsvyr uvzfrys sbe uvf
sngure, be sbe uvf zbgure; 21:12 Arvgure funyy ur tb bhg bs gur
fnapghnel, abe cebsnar gur fnapghnel bs uvf Tbq; sbe gur pebja bs gur
nabvagvat bvy bs uvf Tbq vf hcba uvz: V nz gur YBEQ.

21:13 Naq ur funyy gnxr n jvsr va ure ivetvavgl.

21:14 N jvqbj, be n qvibeprq jbzna, be cebsnar, be na uneybg, gurfr
funyy ur abg gnxr: ohg ur funyy gnxr n ivetva bs uvf bja crbcyr gb
jvsr.

21:15 Arvgure funyy ur cebsnar uvf frrq nzbat uvf crbcyr: sbe V gur
YBEQ qb fnapgvsl uvz.

21:16 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 21:17 Fcrnx hagb Nneba,
fnlvat, Jubfbrire ur or bs gul frrq va gurve trarengvbaf gung ungu nal
oyrzvfu, yrg uvz abg nccebnpu gb bssre gur oernq bs uvf Tbq.

21:18 Sbe jungfbrire zna ur or gung ungu n oyrzvfu, ur funyy abg
nccebnpu: n oyvaq zna, be n ynzr, be ur gung ungu n syng abfr, be nal
guvat fhcresyhbhf, 21:19 Be n zna gung vf oebxrasbbgrq, be
oebxraunaqrq, 21:20 Be pebbxonpxg, be n qjnes, be gung ungu n oyrzvfu
va uvf rlr, be or fpheil, be fpnoorq, be ungu uvf fgbarf oebxra; 21:21
Ab zna gung ungu n oyrzvfu bs gur frrq bs Nneba gur cevrfg funyy pbzr
avtu gb bssre gur bssrevatf bs gur YBEQ znqr ol sver: ur ungu n
oyrzvfu; ur funyy abg pbzr avtu gb bssre gur oernq bs uvf Tbq.

21:22 Ur funyy rng gur oernq bs uvf Tbq, obgu bs gur zbfg ubyl, naq bs
gur ubyl.

21:23 Bayl ur funyy abg tb va hagb gur invy, abe pbzr avtu hagb gur
nygne, orpnhfr ur ungu n oyrzvfu; gung ur cebsnar abg zl fnapghnevrf:
sbe V gur YBEQ qb fnapgvsl gurz.

21:24 Naq Zbfrf gbyq vg hagb Nneba, naq gb uvf fbaf, naq hagb nyy gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry.

22:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 22:2 Fcrnx hagb Nneba naq
gb uvf fbaf, gung gurl frcnengr gurzfryirf sebz gur ubyl guvatf bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq gung gurl cebsnar abg zl ubyl anzr va gubfr
guvatf juvpu gurl unyybj hagb zr: V nz gur YBEQ.

22:3 Fnl hagb gurz, Jubfbrire ur or bs nyy lbhe frrq nzbat lbhe
trarengvbaf, gung tbrgu hagb gur ubyl guvatf, juvpu gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry unyybj hagb gur YBEQ, univat uvf hapyrnaarff hcba uvz, gung
fbhy funyy or phg bss sebz zl cerfrapr: V nz gur YBEQ.

22:4 Jung zna fbrire bs gur frrq bs Nneba vf n yrcre, be ungu n
ehaavat vffhr; ur funyy abg rng bs gur ubyl guvatf, hagvy ur or pyrna.
Naq jubfb gbhpurgu nal guvat gung vf hapyrna ol gur qrnq, be n zna
jubfr frrq tbrgu sebz uvz; 22:5 Be jubfbrire gbhpurgu nal perrcvat
guvat, jurerol ur znl or znqr hapyrna, be n zna bs jubz ur znl gnxr
hapyrnaarff, jungfbrire hapyrnaarff ur ungu; 22:6 Gur fbhy juvpu ungu
gbhpurq nal fhpu funyy or hapyrna hagvy rira, naq funyy abg rng bs gur
ubyl guvatf, hayrff ur jnfu uvf syrfu jvgu jngre.

22:7 Naq jura gur fha vf qbja, ur funyy or pyrna, naq funyy nsgrejneq
rng bs gur ubyl guvatf; orpnhfr vg vf uvf sbbq.

22:8 Gung juvpu qvrgu bs vgfrys, be vf gbea jvgu ornfgf, ur funyy abg
rng gb qrsvyr uvzfrys gurerjvgu; V nz gur YBEQ.

22:9 Gurl funyy gurersber xrrc zvar beqvanapr, yrfg gurl orne fva sbe
vg, naq qvr gurersber, vs gurl cebsnar vg: V gur YBEQ qb fnapgvsl
gurz.

22:10 Gurer funyy ab fgenatre rng bs gur ubyl guvat: n fbwbheare bs
gur cevrfg, be na uverq freinag, funyy abg rng bs gur ubyl guvat.

22:11 Ohg vs gur cevrfg ohl nal fbhy jvgu uvf zbarl, ur funyy rng bs
vg, naq ur gung vf obea va uvf ubhfr: gurl funyy rng bs uvf zrng.

22:12 Vs gur cevrfg'f qnhtugre nyfb or zneevrq hagb n fgenatre, fur
znl abg rng bs na bssrevat bs gur ubyl guvatf.

22:13 Ohg vs gur cevrfg'f qnhtugre or n jvqbj, be qvibeprq, naq unir
ab puvyq, naq vf erghearq hagb ure sngure'f ubhfr, nf va ure lbhgu,
fur funyy rng bs ure sngure'f zrng: ohg gurer funyy or ab fgenatre rng
gurerbs.

22:14 Naq vs n zna rng bs gur ubyl guvat hajvggvatyl, gura ur funyy
chg gur svsgu cneg gurerbs hagb vg, naq funyy tvir vg hagb gur cevrfg
jvgu gur ubyl guvat.

22:15 Naq gurl funyy abg cebsnar gur ubyl guvatf bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, juvpu gurl bssre hagb gur YBEQ; 22:16 Be fhssre gurz gb orne
gur vavdhvgl bs gerfcnff, jura gurl rng gurve ubyl guvatf: sbe V gur
YBEQ qb fnapgvsl gurz.

22:17 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 22:18 Fcrnx hagb Nneba,
naq gb uvf fbaf, naq hagb nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb
gurz, Jungfbrire ur or bs gur ubhfr bs Vfenry, be bs gur fgenatref va
Vfenry, gung jvyy bssre uvf boyngvba sbe nyy uvf ibjf, naq sbe nyy uvf
serrjvyy bssrevatf, juvpu gurl jvyy bssre hagb gur YBEQ sbe n oheag
bssrevat; 22:19 Lr funyy bssre ng lbhe bja jvyy n znyr jvgubhg
oyrzvfu, bs gur orrirf, bs gur furrc, be bs gur tbngf.

22:20 Ohg jungfbrire ungu n oyrzvfu, gung funyy lr abg bssre: sbe vg
funyy abg or npprcgnoyr sbe lbh.

22:21 Naq jubfbrire bssrergu n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevatf hagb gur
YBEQ gb nppbzcyvfu uvf ibj, be n serrjvyy bssrevat va orrirf be furrc,
vg funyy or cresrpg gb or npprcgrq; gurer funyy or ab oyrzvfu gurerva.

22:22 Oyvaq, be oebxra, be znvzrq, be univat n jra, be fpheil, be
fpnoorq, lr funyy abg bssre gurfr hagb gur YBEQ, abe znxr na bssrevat
ol sver bs gurz hcba gur nygne hagb gur YBEQ.

22:23 Rvgure n ohyybpx be n ynzo gung ungu nal guvat fhcresyhbhf be
ynpxvat va uvf cnegf, gung znlrfg gubh bssre sbe n serrjvyy bssrevat;
ohg sbe n ibj vg funyy abg or npprcgrq.

22:24 Lr funyy abg bssre hagb gur YBEQ gung juvpu vf oehvfrq, be
pehfurq, be oebxra, be phg; arvgure funyy lr znxr nal bssrevat gurerbs
va lbhe ynaq.

22:25 Arvgure sebz n fgenatre'f unaq funyy lr bssre gur oernq bs lbhe
Tbq bs nal bs gurfr; orpnhfr gurve pbeehcgvba vf va gurz, naq
oyrzvfurf or va gurz: gurl funyy abg or npprcgrq sbe lbh.

22:26 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 22:27 Jura n ohyybpx, be
n furrc, be n tbng, vf oebhtug sbegu, gura vg funyy or frira qnlf
haqre gur qnz; naq sebz gur rvtugu qnl naq guraprsbegu vg funyy or
npprcgrq sbe na bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ.

22:28 Naq jurgure vg or pbj, be rjr, lr funyy abg xvyy vg naq ure
lbhat obgu va bar qnl.

22:29 Naq jura lr jvyy bssre n fnpevsvpr bs gunaxftvivat hagb gur
YBEQ, bssre vg ng lbhe bja jvyy.

22:30 Ba gur fnzr qnl vg funyy or rngra hc; lr funyy yrnir abar bs vg
hagvy gur zbeebj: V nz gur YBEQ.

22:31 Gurersber funyy lr xrrc zl pbzznaqzragf, naq qb gurz: V nz gur
YBEQ.

22:32 Arvgure funyy lr cebsnar zl ubyl anzr; ohg V jvyy or unyybjrq
nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: V nz gur YBEQ juvpu unyybj lbh, 22:33
Gung oebhtug lbh bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, gb or lbhe Tbq: V nz gur
YBEQ.

23:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 23:2 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Pbapreavat gur srnfgf bs gur
YBEQ, juvpu lr funyy cebpynvz gb or ubyl pbaibpngvbaf, rira gurfr ner
zl srnfgf.

23:3 Fvk qnlf funyy jbex or qbar: ohg gur friragu qnl vf gur fnoongu
bs erfg, na ubyl pbaibpngvba; lr funyy qb ab jbex gurerva: vg vf gur
fnoongu bs gur YBEQ va nyy lbhe qjryyvatf.

23:4 Gurfr ner gur srnfgf bs gur YBEQ, rira ubyl pbaibpngvbaf, juvpu
lr funyy cebpynvz va gurve frnfbaf.

23:5 Va gur sbhegrragu qnl bs gur svefg zbagu ng rira vf gur YBEQ'f
cnffbire.

23:6 Naq ba gur svsgrragu qnl bs gur fnzr zbagu vf gur srnfg bs
hayrnirarq oernq hagb gur YBEQ: frira qnlf lr zhfg rng hayrnirarq
oernq.

23:7 Va gur svefg qnl lr funyy unir na ubyl pbaibpngvba: lr funyy qb
ab freivyr jbex gurerva.

23:8 Ohg lr funyy bssre na bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ frira
qnlf: va gur friragu qnl vf na ubyl pbaibpngvba: lr funyy qb ab
freivyr jbex gurerva.

23:9 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 23:10 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Jura lr or pbzr vagb gur ynaq
juvpu V tvir hagb lbh, naq funyy ernc gur uneirfg gurerbs, gura lr
funyy oevat n furns bs gur svefgsehvgf bs lbhe uneirfg hagb gur
cevrfg: 23:11 Naq ur funyy jnir gur furns orsber gur YBEQ, gb or
npprcgrq sbe lbh: ba gur zbeebj nsgre gur fnoongu gur cevrfg funyy
jnir vg.

23:12 Naq lr funyy bssre gung qnl jura lr jnir gur furns na ur ynzo
jvgubhg oyrzvfu bs gur svefg lrne sbe n oheag bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ.

23:13 Naq gur zrng bssrevat gurerbs funyy or gjb gragu qrnyf bs svar
sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy, na bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ sbe n
fjrrg fnibhe: naq gur qevax bssrevat gurerbs funyy or bs jvar, gur
sbhegu cneg bs na uva.

23:14 Naq lr funyy rng arvgure oernq, abe cnepurq pbea, abe terra
rnef, hagvy gur frysfnzr qnl gung lr unir oebhtug na bssrevat hagb
lbhe Tbq: vg funyy or n fgnghgr sbe rire guebhtubhg lbhe trarengvbaf
va nyy lbhe qjryyvatf.

23:15 Naq lr funyy pbhag hagb lbh sebz gur zbeebj nsgre gur fnoongu,
sebz gur qnl gung lr oebhtug gur furns bs gur jnir bssrevat; frira
fnoonguf funyy or pbzcyrgr: 23:16 Rira hagb gur zbeebj nsgre gur
friragu fnoongu funyy lr ahzore svsgl qnlf; naq lr funyy bssre n arj
zrng bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ.

23:17 Lr funyy oevat bhg bs lbhe unovgngvbaf gjb jnir ybnirf bs gjb
gragu qrnyf; gurl funyy or bs svar sybhe; gurl funyy or onxra jvgu
yrnira; gurl ner gur svefgsehvgf hagb gur YBEQ.

23:18 Naq lr funyy bssre jvgu gur oernq frira ynzof jvgubhg oyrzvfu bs
gur svefg lrne, naq bar lbhat ohyybpx, naq gjb enzf: gurl funyy or sbe
n oheag bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ, jvgu gurve zrng bssrevat, naq gurve
qevax bssrevatf, rira na bssrevat znqr ol sver, bs fjrrg fnibhe hagb
gur YBEQ.

23:19 Gura lr funyy fnpevsvpr bar xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat,
naq gjb ynzof bs gur svefg lrne sbe n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevatf.

23:20 Naq gur cevrfg funyy jnir gurz jvgu gur oernq bs gur svefgsehvgf
sbe n jnir bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ, jvgu gur gjb ynzof: gurl funyy or
ubyl gb gur YBEQ sbe gur cevrfg.

23:21 Naq lr funyy cebpynvz ba gur frysfnzr qnl, gung vg znl or na
ubyl pbaibpngvba hagb lbh: lr funyy qb ab freivyr jbex gurerva: vg
funyy or n fgnghgr sbe rire va nyy lbhe qjryyvatf guebhtubhg lbhe
trarengvbaf.

23:22 Naq jura lr ernc gur uneirfg bs lbhe ynaq, gubh funyg abg znxr
pyrna evqqnapr bs gur pbearef bs gul svryq jura gubh erncrfg, arvgure
funyg gubh tngure nal tyrnavat bs gul uneirfg: gubh funyg yrnir gurz
hagb gur cbbe, naq gb gur fgenatre: V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

23:23 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 23:24 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Va gur friragu zbagu, va gur svefg qnl bs
gur zbagu, funyy lr unir n fnoongu, n zrzbevny bs oybjvat bs gehzcrgf,
na ubyl pbaibpngvba.

23:25 Lr funyy qb ab freivyr jbex gurerva: ohg lr funyy bssre na
bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ.

23:26 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 23:27 Nyfb ba gur gragu
qnl bs guvf friragu zbagu gurer funyy or n qnl bs ngbarzrag: vg funyy
or na ubyl pbaibpngvba hagb lbh; naq lr funyy nssyvpg lbhe fbhyf, naq
bssre na bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ.

23:28 Naq lr funyy qb ab jbex va gung fnzr qnl: sbe vg vf n qnl bs
ngbarzrag, gb znxr na ngbarzrag sbe lbh orsber gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

23:29 Sbe jungfbrire fbhy vg or gung funyy abg or nssyvpgrq va gung
fnzr qnl, ur funyy or phg bss sebz nzbat uvf crbcyr.

23:30 Naq jungfbrire fbhy vg or gung qbrgu nal jbex va gung fnzr qnl,
gur fnzr fbhy jvyy V qrfgebl sebz nzbat uvf crbcyr.

23:31 Lr funyy qb ab znaare bs jbex: vg funyy or n fgnghgr sbe rire
guebhtubhg lbhe trarengvbaf va nyy lbhe qjryyvatf.

23:32 Vg funyy or hagb lbh n fnoongu bs erfg, naq lr funyy nssyvpg
lbhe fbhyf: va gur avagu qnl bs gur zbagu ng rira, sebz rira hagb
rira, funyy lr pryroengr lbhe fnoongu.

23:33 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 23:34 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Gur svsgrragu qnl bs guvf friragu zbagu
funyy or gur srnfg bs gnoreanpyrf sbe frira qnlf hagb gur YBEQ.

23:35 Ba gur svefg qnl funyy or na ubyl pbaibpngvba: lr funyy qb ab
freivyr jbex gurerva.

23:36 Frira qnlf lr funyy bssre na bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur
YBEQ: ba gur rvtugu qnl funyy or na ubyl pbaibpngvba hagb lbh; naq lr
funyy bssre na bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ: vg vf n fbyrza
nffrzoyl; naq lr funyy qb ab freivyr jbex gurerva.

23:37 Gurfr ner gur srnfgf bs gur YBEQ, juvpu lr funyy cebpynvz gb or
ubyl pbaibpngvbaf, gb bssre na bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ, n
oheag bssrevat, naq n zrng bssrevat, n fnpevsvpr, naq qevax bssrevatf,
rirel guvat hcba uvf qnl: 23:38 Orfvqr gur fnoonguf bs gur YBEQ, naq
orfvqr lbhe tvsgf, naq orfvqr nyy lbhe ibjf, naq orfvqr nyy lbhe
serrjvyy bssrevatf, juvpu lr tvir hagb gur YBEQ.

23:39 Nyfb va gur svsgrragu qnl bs gur friragu zbagu, jura lr unir
tngurerq va gur sehvg bs gur ynaq, lr funyy xrrc n srnfg hagb gur YBEQ
frira qnlf: ba gur svefg qnl funyy or n fnoongu, naq ba gur rvtugu qnl
funyy or n fnoongu.

23:40 Naq lr funyy gnxr lbh ba gur svefg qnl gur obhtuf bs tbbqyl
gerrf, oenapurf bs cnyz gerrf, naq gur obhtuf bs guvpx gerrf, naq
jvyybjf bs gur oebbx; naq lr funyy erwbvpr orsber gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq
frira qnlf.

23:41 Naq lr funyy xrrc vg n srnfg hagb gur YBEQ frira qnlf va gur
lrne.

Vg funyy or n fgnghgr sbe rire va lbhe trarengvbaf: lr funyy pryroengr
vg va gur friragu zbagu.

23:42 Lr funyy qjryy va obbguf frira qnlf; nyy gung ner Vfenryvgrf
obea funyy qjryy va obbguf: 23:43 Gung lbhe trarengvbaf znl xabj gung
V znqr gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gb qjryy va obbguf, jura V oebhtug gurz
bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg: V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

23:44 Naq Zbfrf qrpynerq hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gur srnfgf bs gur
YBEQ.

24:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 24:2 Pbzznaq gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry, gung gurl oevat hagb gurr cher bvy byvir orngra sbe gur
yvtug, gb pnhfr gur ynzcf gb ohea pbagvahnyyl.

24:3 Jvgubhg gur invy bs gur grfgvzbal, va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, funyy Nneba beqre vg sebz gur riravat hagb gur zbeavat
orsber gur YBEQ pbagvahnyyl: vg funyy or n fgnghgr sbe rire va lbhe
trarengvbaf.

24:4 Ur funyy beqre gur ynzcf hcba gur cher pnaqyrfgvpx orsber gur
YBEQ pbagvahnyyl.

24:5 Naq gubh funyg gnxr svar sybhe, naq onxr gjryir pnxrf gurerbs:
gjb gragu qrnyf funyy or va bar pnxr.

24:6 Naq gubh funyg frg gurz va gjb ebjf, fvk ba n ebj, hcba gur cher
gnoyr orsber gur YBEQ.

24:7 Naq gubh funyg chg cher senaxvaprafr hcba rnpu ebj, gung vg znl
or ba gur oernq sbe n zrzbevny, rira na bssrevat znqr ol sver hagb gur
YBEQ.

24:8 Rirel fnoongu ur funyy frg vg va beqre orsber gur YBEQ
pbagvahnyyl, orvat gnxra sebz gur puvyqera bs Vfenry ol na rireynfgvat
pbiranag.

24:9 Naq vg funyy or Nneba'f naq uvf fbaf'; naq gurl funyy rng vg va
gur ubyl cynpr: sbe vg vf zbfg ubyl hagb uvz bs gur bssrevatf bs gur
YBEQ znqr ol sver ol n crecrghny fgnghgr.

24:10 Naq gur fba bs na Vfenryvgvfu jbzna, jubfr sngure jnf na
Rtlcgvna, jrag bhg nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: naq guvf fba bs gur
Vfenryvgvfu jbzna naq n zna bs Vfenry fgebir gbtrgure va gur pnzc;
24:11 Naq gur Vfenryvgvfu jbzna'f fba oynfcurzrq gur anzr bs gur Ybeq,
naq phefrq. Naq gurl oebhtug uvz hagb Zbfrf: (naq uvf zbgure'f anzr
jnf Furybzvgu, gur qnhtugre bs Qvoev, bs gur gevor bs Qna:) 24:12 Naq
gurl chg uvz va jneq, gung gur zvaq bs gur YBEQ zvtug or furjrq gurz.

24:13 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 24:14 Oevat sbegu uvz
gung ungu phefrq jvgubhg gur pnzc; naq yrg nyy gung urneq uvz ynl
gurve unaqf hcba uvf urnq, naq yrg nyy gur pbatertngvba fgbar uvz.

24:15 Naq gubh funyg fcrnx hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat,
Jubfbrire phefrgu uvf Tbq funyy orne uvf fva.

24:16 Naq ur gung oynfcurzrgu gur anzr bs gur YBEQ, ur funyy fheryl or
chg gb qrngu, naq nyy gur pbatertngvba funyy pregnvayl fgbar uvz: nf
jryy gur fgenatre, nf ur gung vf obea va gur ynaq, jura ur oynfcurzrgu
gur anzr bs gur Ybeq, funyy or chg gb qrngu.

24:17 Naq ur gung xvyyrgu nal zna funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu.

24:18 Naq ur gung xvyyrgu n ornfg funyy znxr vg tbbq; ornfg sbe ornfg.

24:19 Naq vs n zna pnhfr n oyrzvfu va uvf arvtuobhe; nf ur ungu qbar,
fb funyy vg or qbar gb uvz; 24:20 Oernpu sbe oernpu, rlr sbe rlr,
gbbgu sbe gbbgu: nf ur ungu pnhfrq n oyrzvfu va n zna, fb funyy vg or
qbar gb uvz ntnva.

24:21 Naq ur gung xvyyrgu n ornfg, ur funyy erfgber vg: naq ur gung
xvyyrgu n zna, ur funyy or chg gb qrngu.

24:22 Lr funyy unir bar znaare bs ynj, nf jryy sbe gur fgenatre, nf
sbe bar bs lbhe bja pbhagel: sbe V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

24:23 Naq Zbfrf fcnxr gb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung gurl fubhyq
oevat sbegu uvz gung unq phefrq bhg bs gur pnzc, naq fgbar uvz jvgu
fgbarf. Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

25:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf va zbhag Fvanv, fnlvat, 25:2 Fcrnx
hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Jura lr pbzr vagb gur
ynaq juvpu V tvir lbh, gura funyy gur ynaq xrrc n fnoongu hagb gur
YBEQ.

25:3 Fvk lrnef gubh funyg fbj gul svryq, naq fvk lrnef gubh funyg
cehar gul ivarlneq, naq tngure va gur sehvg gurerbs; 25:4 Ohg va gur
friragu lrne funyy or n fnoongu bs erfg hagb gur ynaq, n fnoongu sbe
gur YBEQ: gubh funyg arvgure fbj gul svryq, abe cehar gul ivarlneq.

25:5 Gung juvpu tebjrgu bs vgf bja nppbeq bs gul uneirfg gubh funyg
abg ernc, arvgure tngure gur tencrf bs gul ivar haqerffrq: sbe vg vf n
lrne bs erfg hagb gur ynaq.

25:6 Naq gur fnoongu bs gur ynaq funyy or zrng sbe lbh; sbe gurr, naq
sbe gul freinag, naq sbe gul znvq, naq sbe gul uverq freinag, naq sbe
gul fgenatre gung fbwbheargu jvgu gurr.

25:7 Naq sbe gul pnggyr, naq sbe gur ornfg gung ner va gul ynaq, funyy
nyy gur vapernfr gurerbs or zrng.

25:8 Naq gubh funyg ahzore frira fnoonguf bs lrnef hagb gurr, frira
gvzrf frira lrnef; naq gur fcnpr bs gur frira fnoonguf bs lrnef funyy
or hagb gurr sbegl naq avar lrnef.

25:9 Gura funyg gubh pnhfr gur gehzcrg bs gur whovyr gb fbhaq ba gur
gragu qnl bs gur friragu zbagu, va gur qnl bs ngbarzrag funyy lr znxr
gur gehzcrg fbhaq guebhtubhg nyy lbhe ynaq.

25:10 Naq lr funyy unyybj gur svsgvrgu lrne, naq cebpynvz yvoregl
guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq hagb nyy gur vaunovgnagf gurerbs: vg funyy or
n whovyr hagb lbh; naq lr funyy erghea rirel zna hagb uvf cbffrffvba,
naq lr funyy erghea rirel zna hagb uvf snzvyl.

25:11 N whovyr funyy gung svsgvrgu lrne or hagb lbh: lr funyy abg fbj,
arvgure ernc gung juvpu tebjrgu bs vgfrys va vg, abe tngure gur tencrf
va vg bs gul ivar haqerffrq.

25:12 Sbe vg vf gur whovyr; vg funyy or ubyl hagb lbh: lr funyy rng
gur vapernfr gurerbs bhg bs gur svryq.

25:13 Va gur lrne bs guvf whovyr lr funyy erghea rirel zna hagb uvf
cbffrffvba.

25:14 Naq vs gubh fryy bhtug hagb gul arvtuobhe, be ohlrfg bhtug bs
gul arvtuobhe'f unaq, lr funyy abg bccerff bar nabgure: 25:15
Nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs lrnef nsgre gur whovyr gubh funyg ohl bs
gul arvtuobhe, naq nppbeqvat hagb gur ahzore bs lrnef bs gur sehvgf ur
funyy fryy hagb gurr: 25:16 Nppbeqvat gb gur zhygvghqr bs lrnef gubh
funyg vapernfr gur cevpr gurerbs, naq nppbeqvat gb gur srjarff bs
lrnef gubh funyg qvzvavfu gur cevpr bs vg: sbe nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore
bs gur lrnef bs gur sehvgf qbgu ur fryy hagb gurr.

25:17 Lr funyy abg gurersber bccerff bar nabgure; ohg gubh funyg srne
gul Tbq:sbe V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

25:18 Jurersber lr funyy qb zl fgnghgrf, naq xrrc zl whqtzragf, naq qb
gurz; naq lr funyy qjryy va gur ynaq va fnsrgl.

25:19 Naq gur ynaq funyy lvryq ure sehvg, naq lr funyy rng lbhe svyy,
naq qjryy gurerva va fnsrgl.

25:20 Naq vs lr funyy fnl, Jung funyy jr rng gur friragu lrne? orubyq,
jr funyy abg fbj, abe tngure va bhe vapernfr: 25:21 Gura V jvyy
pbzznaq zl oyrffvat hcba lbh va gur fvkgu lrne, naq vg funyy oevat
sbegu sehvg sbe guerr lrnef.

25:22 Naq lr funyy fbj gur rvtugu lrne, naq rng lrg bs byq sehvg hagvy
gur avagu lrne; hagvy ure sehvgf pbzr va lr funyy rng bs gur byq
fgber.

25:23 Gur ynaq funyy abg or fbyq sbe rire: sbe gur ynaq vf zvar, sbe
lr ner fgenatref naq fbwbhearef jvgu zr.

25:24 Naq va nyy gur ynaq bs lbhe cbffrffvba lr funyy tenag n
erqrzcgvba sbe gur ynaq.

25:25 Vs gul oebgure or jnkra cbbe, naq ungu fbyq njnl fbzr bs uvf
cbffrffvba, naq vs nal bs uvf xva pbzr gb erqrrz vg, gura funyy ur
erqrrz gung juvpu uvf oebgure fbyq.

25:26 Naq vs gur zna unir abar gb erqrrz vg, naq uvzfrys or noyr gb
erqrrz vg; 25:27 Gura yrg uvz pbhag gur lrnef bs gur fnyr gurerbs, naq
erfgber gur birecyhf hagb gur zna gb jubz ur fbyq vg; gung ur znl
erghea hagb uvf cbffrffvba.

25:28 Ohg vs ur or abg noyr gb erfgber vg gb uvz, gura gung juvpu vf
fbyq funyy erznva va gur unaq bs uvz gung ungu obhtug vg hagvy gur
lrne bs whovyr: naq va gur whovyr vg funyy tb bhg, naq ur funyy erghea
hagb uvf cbffrffvba.

25:29 Naq vs n zna fryy n qjryyvat ubhfr va n jnyyrq pvgl, gura ur znl
erqrrz vg jvguva n jubyr lrne nsgre vg vf fbyq; jvguva n shyy lrne znl
ur erqrrz vg.

25:30 Naq vs vg or abg erqrrzrq jvguva gur fcnpr bs n shyy lrne, gura
gur ubhfr gung vf va gur jnyyrq pvgl funyy or rfgnoyvfurq sbe rire gb
uvz gung obhtug vg guebhtubhg uvf trarengvbaf: vg funyy abg tb bhg va
gur whovyr.

25:31 Ohg gur ubhfrf bs gur ivyyntrf juvpu unir ab jnyy ebhaq nobhg
gurz funyy or pbhagrq nf gur svryqf bs gur pbhagel: gurl znl or
erqrrzrq, naq gurl funyy tb bhg va gur whovyr.

25:32 Abgjvgufgnaqvat gur pvgvrf bs gur Yrivgrf, naq gur ubhfrf bs gur
pvgvrf bs gurve cbffrffvba, znl gur Yrivgrf erqrrz ng nal gvzr.

25:33 Naq vs n zna chepunfr bs gur Yrivgrf, gura gur ubhfr gung jnf
fbyq, naq gur pvgl bs uvf cbffrffvba, funyy tb bhg va gur lrne bs
whovyr: sbe gur ubhfrf bs gur pvgvrf bs gur Yrivgrf ner gurve
cbffrffvba nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

25:34 Ohg gur svryq bs gur fhoheof bs gurve pvgvrf znl abg or fbyq;
sbe vg vf gurve crecrghny cbffrffvba.

25:35 Naq vs gul oebgure or jnkra cbbe, naq snyyra va qrpnl jvgu gurr;
gura gubh funyg eryvrir uvz: lrn, gubhtu ur or n fgenatre, be n
fbwbheare; gung ur znl yvir jvgu gurr.

25:36 Gnxr gubh ab hfhel bs uvz, be vapernfr: ohg srne gul Tbq; gung
gul oebgure znl yvir jvgu gurr.

25:37 Gubh funyg abg tvir uvz gul zbarl hcba hfhel, abe yraq uvz gul
ivpghnyf sbe vapernfr.

25:38 V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, juvpu oebhtug lbh sbegu bhg bs gur ynaq
bs Rtlcg, gb tvir lbh gur ynaq bs Pnanna, naq gb or lbhe Tbq.

25:39 Naq vs gul oebgure gung qjryyrgu ol gurr or jnkra cbbe, naq or
fbyq hagb gurr; gubh funyg abg pbzcry uvz gb freir nf n obaqfreinag:
25:40 Ohg nf na uverq freinag, naq nf n fbwbheare, ur funyy or jvgu
gurr, naq funyy freir gurr hagb gur lrne bs whovyr.

25:41 Naq gura funyy ur qrcneg sebz gurr, obgu ur naq uvf puvyqera
jvgu uvz, naq funyy erghea hagb uvf bja snzvyl, naq hagb gur
cbffrffvba bs uvf snguref funyy ur erghea.

25:42 Sbe gurl ner zl freinagf, juvpu V oebhtug sbegu bhg bs gur ynaq
bs Rtlcg: gurl funyy abg or fbyq nf obaqzra.

25:43 Gubh funyg abg ehyr bire uvz jvgu evtbhe; ohg funyg srne gul
Tbq.

25:44 Obgu gul obaqzra, naq gul obaqznvqf, juvpu gubh funyg unir,
funyy or bs gur urngura gung ner ebhaq nobhg lbh; bs gurz funyy lr ohl
obaqzra naq obaqznvqf.

25:45 Zberbire bs gur puvyqera bs gur fgenatref gung qb fbwbhea nzbat
lbh, bs gurz funyy lr ohl, naq bs gurve snzvyvrf gung ner jvgu lbh,
juvpu gurl ortng va lbhe ynaq: naq gurl funyy or lbhe cbffrffvba.

25:46 Naq lr funyy gnxr gurz nf na vaurevgnapr sbe lbhe puvyqera nsgre
lbh, gb vaurevg gurz sbe n cbffrffvba; gurl funyy or lbhe obaqzra sbe
rire: ohg bire lbhe oerguera gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, lr funyy abg ehyr
bar bire nabgure jvgu evtbhe.

25:47 Naq vs n fbwbheare be fgenatre jnk evpu ol gurr, naq gul oebgure
gung qjryyrgu ol uvz jnk cbbe, naq fryy uvzfrys hagb gur fgenatre be
fbwbheare ol gurr, be gb gur fgbpx bs gur fgenatre'f snzvyl: 25:48
Nsgre gung ur vf fbyq ur znl or erqrrzrq ntnva; bar bs uvf oerguera
znl erqrrz uvz: 25:49 Rvgure uvf hapyr, be uvf hapyr'f fba, znl erqrrz
uvz, be nal gung vf avtu bs xva hagb uvz bs uvf snzvyl znl erqrrz uvz;
be vs ur or noyr, ur znl erqrrz uvzfrys.

25:50 Naq ur funyy erpxba jvgu uvz gung obhtug uvz sebz gur lrne gung
ur jnf fbyq gb uvz hagb gur lrne bs whovyr: naq gur cevpr bs uvf fnyr
funyy or nppbeqvat hagb gur ahzore bs lrnef, nppbeqvat gb gur gvzr bs
na uverq freinag funyy vg or jvgu uvz.

25:51 Vs gurer or lrg znal lrnef oruvaq, nppbeqvat hagb gurz ur funyy
tvir ntnva gur cevpr bs uvf erqrzcgvba bhg bs gur zbarl gung ur jnf
obhtug sbe.

25:52 Naq vs gurer erznva ohg srj lrnef hagb gur lrne bs whovyr, gura
ur funyy pbhag jvgu uvz, naq nppbeqvat hagb uvf lrnef funyy ur tvir
uvz ntnva gur cevpr bs uvf erqrzcgvba.

25:53 Naq nf n lrneyl uverq freinag funyy ur or jvgu uvz: naq gur
bgure funyy abg ehyr jvgu evtbhe bire uvz va gul fvtug.

25:54 Naq vs ur or abg erqrrzrq va gurfr lrnef, gura ur funyy tb bhg
va gur lrne bs whovyr, obgu ur, naq uvf puvyqera jvgu uvz.

25:55 Sbe hagb zr gur puvyqera bs Vfenry ner freinagf; gurl ner zl
freinagf jubz V oebhtug sbegu bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg: V nz gur YBEQ
lbhe Tbq.

26:1 Lr funyy znxr lbh ab vqbyf abe tenira vzntr, arvgure erne lbh hc
n fgnaqvat vzntr, arvgure funyy lr frg hc nal vzntr bs fgbar va lbhe
ynaq, gb obj qbja hagb vg: sbe V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

26:2 Lr funyy xrrc zl fnoonguf, naq erirerapr zl fnapghnel: V nz gur
YBEQ.

26:3 Vs lr jnyx va zl fgnghgrf, naq xrrc zl pbzznaqzragf, naq qb gurz;
26:4 Gura V jvyy tvir lbh enva va qhr frnfba, naq gur ynaq funyy lvryq
ure vapernfr, naq gur gerrf bs gur svryq funyy lvryq gurve sehvg.

26:5 Naq lbhe guerfuvat funyy ernpu hagb gur ivagntr, naq gur ivagntr
funyy ernpu hagb gur fbjvat gvzr: naq lr funyy rng lbhe oernq gb gur
shyy, naq qjryy va lbhe ynaq fnsryl.

26:6 Naq V jvyy tvir crnpr va gur ynaq, naq lr funyy yvr qbja, naq
abar funyy znxr lbh nsenvq: naq V jvyy evq rivy ornfgf bhg bs gur
ynaq, arvgure funyy gur fjbeq tb guebhtu lbhe ynaq.

26:7 Naq lr funyy punfr lbhe rarzvrf, naq gurl funyy snyy orsber lbh
ol gur fjbeq.

26:8 Naq svir bs lbh funyy punfr na uhaqerq, naq na uhaqerq bs lbh
funyy chg gra gubhfnaq gb syvtug: naq lbhe rarzvrf funyy snyy orsber
lbh ol gur fjbeq.

26:9 Sbe V jvyy unir erfcrpg hagb lbh, naq znxr lbh sehvgshy, naq
zhygvcyl lbh, naq rfgnoyvfu zl pbiranag jvgu lbh.

26:10 Naq lr funyy rng byq fgber, naq oevat sbegu gur byq orpnhfr bs
gur arj.

26:11 Naq V frg zl gnoreanpyr nzbat lbh: naq zl fbhy funyy abg noube
lbh.

26:12 Naq V jvyy jnyx nzbat lbh, naq jvyy or lbhe Tbq, naq lr funyy or
zl crbcyr.

26:13 V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, juvpu oebhtug lbh sbegu bhg bs gur ynaq
bs Rtlcg, gung lr fubhyq abg or gurve obaqzra; naq V unir oebxra gur
onaqf bs lbhe lbxr, naq znqr lbh tb hcevtug.

26:14 Ohg vs lr jvyy abg urnexra hagb zr, naq jvyy abg qb nyy gurfr
pbzznaqzragf; 26:15 Naq vs lr funyy qrfcvfr zl fgnghgrf, be vs lbhe
fbhy noube zl whqtzragf, fb gung lr jvyy abg qb nyy zl pbzznaqzragf,
ohg gung lr oernx zl pbiranag: 26:16 V nyfb jvyy qb guvf hagb lbh; V
jvyy rira nccbvag bire lbh greebe, pbafhzcgvba, naq gur oheavat nthr,
gung funyy pbafhzr gur rlrf, naq pnhfr fbeebj bs urneg: naq lr funyy
fbj lbhe frrq va inva, sbe lbhe rarzvrf funyy rng vg.

26:17 Naq V jvyy frg zl snpr ntnvafg lbh, naq lr funyy or fynva orsber
lbhe rarzvrf: gurl gung ungr lbh funyy ervta bire lbh; naq lr funyy
syrr jura abar chefhrgu lbh.

26:18 Naq vs lr jvyy abg lrg sbe nyy guvf urnexra hagb zr, gura V jvyy
chavfu lbh frira gvzrf zber sbe lbhe fvaf.

26:19 Naq V jvyy oernx gur cevqr bs lbhe cbjre; naq V jvyy znxr lbhe
urnira nf veba, naq lbhe rnegu nf oenff: 26:20 Naq lbhe fgeratgu funyy
or fcrag va inva: sbe lbhe ynaq funyy abg lvryq ure vapernfr, arvgure
funyy gur gerrf bs gur ynaq lvryq gurve sehvgf.

26:21 Naq vs lr jnyx pbagenel hagb zr, naq jvyy abg urnexra hagb zr; V
jvyy oevat frira gvzrf zber cynthrf hcba lbh nppbeqvat gb lbhe fvaf.

26:22 V jvyy nyfb fraq jvyq ornfgf nzbat lbh, juvpu funyy ebo lbh bs
lbhe puvyqera, naq qrfgebl lbhe pnggyr, naq znxr lbh srj va ahzore;
naq lbhe uvtu jnlf funyy or qrfbyngr.

26:23 Naq vs lr jvyy abg or ersbezrq ol zr ol gurfr guvatf, ohg jvyy
jnyx pbagenel hagb zr; 26:24 Gura jvyy V nyfb jnyx pbagenel hagb lbh,
naq jvyy chavfu lbh lrg frira gvzrf sbe lbhe fvaf.

26:25 Naq V jvyy oevat n fjbeq hcba lbh, gung funyy niratr gur dhneery
bs zl pbiranag: naq jura lr ner tngurerq gbtrgure jvguva lbhe pvgvrf,
V jvyy fraq gur crfgvyrapr nzbat lbh; naq lr funyy or qryvirerq vagb
gur unaq bs gur rarzl.

26:26 Naq jura V unir oebxra gur fgnss bs lbhe oernq, gra jbzra funyy
onxr lbhe oernq va bar bira, naq gurl funyy qryvire lbh lbhe oernq
ntnva ol jrvtug: naq lr funyy rng, naq abg or fngvfsvrq.

26:27 Naq vs lr jvyy abg sbe nyy guvf urnexra hagb zr, ohg jnyx
pbagenel hagb zr; 26:28 Gura V jvyy jnyx pbagenel hagb lbh nyfb va
shel; naq V, rira V, jvyy punfgvfr lbh frira gvzrf sbe lbhe fvaf.

26:29 Naq lr funyy rng gur syrfu bs lbhe fbaf, naq gur syrfu bs lbhe
qnhtugref funyy lr rng.

26:30 Naq V jvyy qrfgebl lbhe uvtu cynprf, naq phg qbja lbhe vzntrf,
naq pnfg lbhe pnepnfrf hcba gur pnepnfrf bs lbhe vqbyf, naq zl fbhy
funyy noube lbh.

26:31 Naq V jvyy znxr lbhe pvgvrf jnfgr, naq oevat lbhe fnapghnevrf
hagb qrfbyngvba, naq V jvyy abg fzryy gur fnibhe bs lbhe fjrrg bqbhef.

26:32 Naq V jvyy oevat gur ynaq vagb qrfbyngvba: naq lbhe rarzvrf
juvpu qjryy gurerva funyy or nfgbavfurq ng vg.

26:33 Naq V jvyy fpnggre lbh nzbat gur urngura, naq jvyy qenj bhg n
fjbeq nsgre lbh: naq lbhe ynaq funyy or qrfbyngr, naq lbhe pvgvrf
jnfgr.

26:34 Gura funyy gur ynaq rawbl ure fnoonguf, nf ybat nf vg yvrgu
qrfbyngr, naq lr or va lbhe rarzvrf' ynaq; rira gura funyy gur ynaq
erfg, naq rawbl ure fnoonguf.

26:35 Nf ybat nf vg yvrgu qrfbyngr vg funyy erfg; orpnhfr vg qvq abg
erfg va lbhe fnoonguf, jura lr qjryg hcba vg.

26:36 Naq hcba gurz gung ner yrsg nyvir bs lbh V jvyy fraq n snvagarff
vagb gurve urnegf va gur ynaqf bs gurve rarzvrf; naq gur fbhaq bs n
funxra yrns funyy punfr gurz; naq gurl funyy syrr, nf syrrvat sebz n
fjbeq; naq gurl funyy snyy jura abar chefhrgu.

26:37 Naq gurl funyy snyy bar hcba nabgure, nf vg jrer orsber n fjbeq,
jura abar chefhrgu: naq lr funyy unir ab cbjre gb fgnaq orsber lbhe
rarzvrf.

26:38 Naq lr funyy crevfu nzbat gur urngura, naq gur ynaq bs lbhe
rarzvrf funyy rng lbh hc.

26:39 Naq gurl gung ner yrsg bs lbh funyy cvar njnl va gurve vavdhvgl
va lbhe rarzvrf' ynaqf; naq nyfb va gur vavdhvgvrf bs gurve snguref
funyy gurl cvar njnl jvgu gurz.

26:40 Vs gurl funyy pbasrff gurve vavdhvgl, naq gur vavdhvgl bs gurve
snguref, jvgu gurve gerfcnff juvpu gurl gerfcnffrq ntnvafg zr, naq
gung nyfb gurl unir jnyxrq pbagenel hagb zr; 26:41 Naq gung V nyfb
unir jnyxrq pbagenel hagb gurz, naq unir oebhtug gurz vagb gur ynaq bs
gurve rarzvrf; vs gura gurve hapvephzpvfrq urnegf or uhzoyrq, naq gurl
gura npprcg bs gur chavfuzrag bs gurve vavdhvgl: 26:42 Gura jvyy V
erzrzore zl pbiranag jvgu Wnpbo, naq nyfb zl pbiranag jvgu Vfnnp, naq
nyfb zl pbiranag jvgu Noenunz jvyy V erzrzore; naq V jvyy erzrzore gur
ynaq.

26:43 Gur ynaq nyfb funyy or yrsg bs gurz, naq funyy rawbl ure
fnoonguf, juvyr fur yvrgu qrfbyngr jvgubhg gurz: naq gurl funyy npprcg
bs gur chavfuzrag bs gurve vavdhvgl: orpnhfr, rira orpnhfr gurl
qrfcvfrq zl whqtzragf, naq orpnhfr gurve fbhy noubeerq zl fgnghgrf.

26:44 Naq lrg sbe nyy gung, jura gurl or va gur ynaq bs gurve rarzvrf,
V jvyy abg pnfg gurz njnl, arvgure jvyy V noube gurz, gb qrfgebl gurz
hggreyl, naq gb oernx zl pbiranag jvgu gurz: sbe V nz gur YBEQ gurve
Tbq.

26:45 Ohg V jvyy sbe gurve fnxrf erzrzore gur pbiranag bs gurve
naprfgbef, jubz V oebhtug sbegu bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg va gur fvtug
bs gur urngura, gung V zvtug or gurve Tbq: V nz gur YBEQ.

26:46 Gurfr ner gur fgnghgrf naq whqtzragf naq ynjf, juvpu gur YBEQ
znqr orgjrra uvz naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry va zbhag Fvanv ol gur unaq
bs Zbfrf.

27:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 27:2 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Jura n zna funyy znxr n
fvathyne ibj, gur crefbaf funyy or sbe gur YBEQ ol gul rfgvzngvba.

27:3 Naq gul rfgvzngvba funyy or bs gur znyr sebz gjragl lrnef byq
rira hagb fvkgl lrnef byq, rira gul rfgvzngvba funyy or svsgl furxryf
bs fvyire, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel.

27:4 Naq vs vg or n srznyr, gura gul rfgvzngvba funyy or guvegl
furxryf.

27:5 Naq vs vg or sebz svir lrnef byq rira hagb gjragl lrnef byq, gura
gul rfgvzngvba funyy or bs gur znyr gjragl furxryf, naq sbe gur srznyr
gra furxryf.

27:6 Naq vs vg or sebz n zbagu byq rira hagb svir lrnef byq, gura gul
rfgvzngvba funyy or bs gur znyr svir furxryf bs fvyire, naq sbe gur
srznyr gul rfgvzngvba funyy or guerr furxryf bs fvyire.

27:7 Naq vs vg or sebz fvkgl lrnef byq naq nobir; vs vg or n znyr,
gura gul rfgvzngvba funyy or svsgrra furxryf, naq sbe gur srznyr gra
furxryf.

27:8 Ohg vs ur or cbbere guna gul rfgvzngvba, gura ur funyy cerfrag
uvzfrys orsber gur cevrfg, naq gur cevrfg funyy inyhr uvz; nppbeqvat
gb uvf novyvgl gung ibjrq funyy gur cevrfg inyhr uvz.

27:9 Naq vs vg or n ornfg, jurerbs zra oevat na bssrevat hagb gur
YBEQ, nyy gung nal zna tvirgu bs fhpu hagb gur YBEQ funyy or ubyl.

27:10 Ur funyy abg nygre vg, abe punatr vg, n tbbq sbe n onq, be n onq
sbe n tbbq: naq vs ur funyy ng nyy punatr ornfg sbe ornfg, gura vg naq
gur rkpunatr gurerbs funyy or ubyl.

27:11 Naq vs vg or nal hapyrna ornfg, bs juvpu gurl qb abg bssre n
fnpevsvpr hagb gur YBEQ, gura ur funyy cerfrag gur ornfg orsber gur
cevrfg: 27:12 Naq gur cevrfg funyy inyhr vg, jurgure vg or tbbq be
onq: nf gubh inyhrfg vg, jub neg gur cevrfg, fb funyy vg or.

27:13 Ohg vs ur jvyy ng nyy erqrrz vg, gura ur funyy nqq n svsgu cneg
gurerbs hagb gul rfgvzngvba.

27:14 Naq jura n zna funyy fnapgvsl uvf ubhfr gb or ubyl hagb gur
YBEQ, gura gur cevrfg funyy rfgvzngr vg, jurgure vg or tbbq be onq: nf
gur cevrfg funyy rfgvzngr vg, fb funyy vg fgnaq.

27:15 Naq vs ur gung fnapgvsvrq vg jvyy erqrrz uvf ubhfr, gura ur
funyy nqq gur svsgu cneg bs gur zbarl bs gul rfgvzngvba hagb vg, naq
vg funyy or uvf.

27:16 Naq vs n zna funyy fnapgvsl hagb gur YBEQ fbzr cneg bs n svryq
bs uvf cbffrffvba, gura gul rfgvzngvba funyy or nppbeqvat gb gur frrq
gurerbs: na ubzre bs oneyrl frrq funyy or inyhrq ng svsgl furxryf bs
fvyire.

27:17 Vs ur fnapgvsl uvf svryq sebz gur lrne bs whovyr, nppbeqvat gb
gul rfgvzngvba vg funyy fgnaq.

27:18 Ohg vs ur fnapgvsl uvf svryq nsgre gur whovyr, gura gur cevrfg
funyy erpxba hagb uvz gur zbarl nppbeqvat gb gur lrnef gung erznva,
rira hagb gur lrne bs gur whovyr, naq vg funyy or nongrq sebz gul
rfgvzngvba.

27:19 Naq vs ur gung fnapgvsvrq gur svryq jvyy va nal jvfr erqrrz vg,
gura ur funyy nqq gur svsgu cneg bs gur zbarl bs gul rfgvzngvba hagb
vg, naq vg funyy or nffherq gb uvz.

27:20 Naq vs ur jvyy abg erqrrz gur svryq, be vs ur unir fbyq gur
svryq gb nabgure zna, vg funyy abg or erqrrzrq nal zber.

27:21 Ohg gur svryq, jura vg tbrgu bhg va gur whovyr, funyy or ubyl
hagb gur YBEQ, nf n svryq qribgrq; gur cbffrffvba gurerbs funyy or gur
cevrfg'f.

27:22 Naq vs n zna fnapgvsl hagb gur YBEQ n svryq juvpu ur ungu
obhtug, juvpu vf abg bs gur svryqf bs uvf cbffrffvba; 27:23 Gura gur
cevrfg funyy erpxba hagb uvz gur jbegu bs gul rfgvzngvba, rira hagb
gur lrne bs gur whovyr: naq ur funyy tvir guvar rfgvzngvba va gung
qnl, nf n ubyl guvat hagb gur YBEQ.

27:24 Va gur lrne bs gur whovyr gur svryq funyy erghea hagb uvz bs
jubz vg jnf obhtug, rira gb uvz gb jubz gur cbffrffvba bs gur ynaq qvq
orybat.

27:25 Naq nyy gul rfgvzngvbaf funyy or nppbeqvat gb gur furxry bs gur
fnapghnel: gjragl trenuf funyy or gur furxry.

27:26 Bayl gur svefgyvat bs gur ornfgf, juvpu fubhyq or gur YBEQ'f
svefgyvat, ab zna funyy fnapgvsl vg; jurgure vg or bk, be furrc: vg vf
gur YBEQ'f.

27:27 Naq vs vg or bs na hapyrna ornfg, gura ur funyy erqrrz vg
nppbeqvat gb guvar rfgvzngvba, naq funyy nqq n svsgu cneg bs vg
gurergb: be vs vg or abg erqrrzrq, gura vg funyy or fbyq nppbeqvat gb
gul rfgvzngvba.

27:28 Abgjvgufgnaqvat ab qribgrq guvat, gung n zna funyy qribgr hagb
gur YBEQ bs nyy gung ur ungu, obgu bs zna naq ornfg, naq bs gur svryq
bs uvf cbffrffvba, funyy or fbyq be erqrrzrq: rirel qribgrq guvat vf
zbfg ubyl hagb gur YBEQ.

27:29 Abar qribgrq, juvpu funyy or qribgrq bs zra, funyy or erqrrzrq;
ohg funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu.

27:30 Naq nyy gur gvgur bs gur ynaq, jurgure bs gur frrq bs gur ynaq,
be bs gur sehvg bs gur gerr, vf gur YBEQ'f: vg vf ubyl hagb gur YBEQ.

27:31 Naq vs n zna jvyy ng nyy erqrrz bhtug bs uvf gvgurf, ur funyy
nqq gurergb gur svsgu cneg gurerbs.

27:32 Naq pbapreavat gur gvgur bs gur ureq, be bs gur sybpx, rira bs
jungfbrire cnffrgu haqre gur ebq, gur gragu funyy or ubyl hagb gur
YBEQ.

27:33 Ur funyy abg frnepu jurgure vg or tbbq be onq, arvgure funyy ur
punatr vg: naq vs ur punatr vg ng nyy, gura obgu vg naq gur punatr
gurerbs funyy or ubyl; vg funyy abg or erqrrzrq.

27:34 Gurfr ner gur pbzznaqzragf, juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf sbe
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry va zbhag Fvanv.




Gur Sbhegu Obbx bs Zbfrf:  Pnyyrq Ahzoref


1:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf va gur jvyqrearff bs Fvanv, va gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, ba gur svefg qnl bs gur frpbaq zbagu,
va gur frpbaq lrne nsgre gurl jrer pbzr bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg,
fnlvat, 1:2 Gnxr lr gur fhz bs nyy gur pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, nsgre gurve snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, jvgu gur
ahzore bs gurve anzrf, rirel znyr ol gurve cbyyf; 1:3 Sebz gjragl
lrnef byq naq hcjneq, nyy gung ner noyr gb tb sbegu gb jne va Vfenry:
gubh naq Nneba funyy ahzore gurz ol gurve nezvrf.

1:4 Naq jvgu lbh gurer funyy or n zna bs rirel gevor; rirel bar urnq
bs gur ubhfr bs uvf snguref.

1:5 Naq gurfr ner gur anzrf bs gur zra gung funyy fgnaq jvgu lbh: bs
gur gevor bs Erhora; Ryvmhe gur fba bs Furqrhe.

1:6 Bs Fvzrba; Furyhzvry gur fba bs Mhevfunqqnv.

1:7 Bs Whqnu; Anufuba gur fba bs Nzzvanqno.

1:8 Bs Vffnpune; Argunarry gur fba bs Mhne.

1:9 Bs Mrohyha; Ryvno gur fba bs Uryba.

1:10 Bs gur puvyqera bs Wbfrcu: bs Rcuenvz; Ryvfunzn gur fba bs
Nzzvuhq: bs Znanffru; Tnznyvry gur fba bs Crqnumhe.

1:11 Bs Orawnzva; Novqna gur fba bs Tvqrbav.

1:12 Bs Qna; Nuvrmre gur fba bs Nzzvfunqqnv.

1:13 Bs Nfure; Cntvry gur fba bs Bpena.

1:14 Bs Tnq; Ryvnfncu gur fba bs Qrhry.

1:15 Bs Ancugnyv; Nuven gur fba bs Rana.

1:16 Gurfr jrer gur erabjarq bs gur pbatertngvba, cevaprf bs gur
gevorf bs gurve snguref, urnqf bs gubhfnaqf va Vfenry.

1:17 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba gbbx gurfr zra juvpu ner rkcerffrq ol gurve
anzrf: 1:18 Naq gurl nffrzoyrq nyy gur pbatertngvba gbtrgure ba gur
svefg qnl bs gur frpbaq zbagu, naq gurl qrpynerq gurve crqvterrf nsgre
gurve snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore
bs gur anzrf, sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, ol gurve cbyyf.

1:19 Nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf, fb ur ahzorerq gurz va gur
jvyqrearff bs Fvanv.

1:20 Naq gur puvyqera bs Erhora, Vfenry'f ryqrfg fba, ol gurve
trarengvbaf, nsgre gurve snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref,
nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs gur anzrf, ol gurve cbyyf, rirel znyr sebz
gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, nyy gung jrer noyr gb tb sbegu gb jne;
1:21 Gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, rira bs gur gevor bs Erhora,
jrer sbegl naq fvk gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq.

1:22 Bs gur puvyqera bs Fvzrba, ol gurve trarengvbaf, nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs
gurz, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs gur anzrf, ol gurve cbyyf, rirel znyr
sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, nyy gung jrer noyr gb tb sbegu gb
jne; 1:23 Gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, rira bs gur gevor bs
Fvzrba, jrer svsgl naq avar gubhfnaq naq guerr uhaqerq.

1:24 Bs gur puvyqera bs Tnq, ol gurve trarengvbaf, nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs
gur anzrf, sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, nyy gung jrer noyr gb tb
sbegu gb jne; 1:25 Gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, rira bs gur gevor
bs Tnq, jrer sbegl naq svir gubhfnaq fvk uhaqerq naq svsgl.

1:26 Bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu, ol gurve trarengvbaf, nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs
gur anzrf, sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, nyy gung jrer noyr gb tb
sbegu gb jne; 1:27 Gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, rira bs gur gevor
bs Whqnu, jrer guerrfpber naq sbhegrra gubhfnaq naq fvk uhaqerq.

1:28 Bs gur puvyqera bs Vffnpune, ol gurve trarengvbaf, nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs
gur anzrf, sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, nyy gung jrer noyr gb tb
sbegu gb jne; 1:29 Gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, rira bs gur gevor
bs Vffnpune, jrer svsgl naq sbhe gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq.

1:30 Bs gur puvyqera bs Mrohyha, ol gurve trarengvbaf, nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs
gur anzrf, sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, nyy gung jrer noyr gb tb
sbegu gb jne; 1:31 Gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, rira bs gur gevor
bs Mrohyha, jrer svsgl naq frira gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq.

1:32 Bs gur puvyqera bs Wbfrcu, anzryl, bs gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz, ol
gurve trarengvbaf, nsgre gurve snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve
snguref, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs gur anzrf, sebz gjragl lrnef byq
naq hcjneq, nyy gung jrer noyr gb tb sbegu gb jne; 1:33 Gubfr gung
jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, rira bs gur gevor bs Rcuenvz, jrer sbegl
gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq.

1:34 Bs gur puvyqera bs Znanffru, ol gurve trarengvbaf, nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs
gur anzrf, sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, nyy gung jrer noyr gb tb
sbegu gb jne; 1:35 Gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, rira bs gur gevor
bs Znanffru, jrer guvegl naq gjb gubhfnaq naq gjb uhaqerq.

1:36 Bs gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva, ol gurve trarengvbaf, nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs
gur anzrf, sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, nyy gung jrer noyr gb tb
sbegu gb jne; 1:37 Gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, rira bs gur gevor
bs Orawnzva, jrer guvegl naq svir gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq.

1:38 Bs gur puvyqera bs Qna, ol gurve trarengvbaf, nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs
gur anzrf, sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, nyy gung jrer noyr gb tb
sbegu gb jne; 1:39 Gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, rira bs gur gevor
bs Qna, jrer guerrfpber naq gjb gubhfnaq naq frira uhaqerq.

1:40 Bs gur puvyqera bs Nfure, ol gurve trarengvbaf, nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs
gur anzrf, sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, nyy gung jrer noyr gb tb
sbegu gb jne; 1:41 Gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, rira bs gur gevor
bs Nfure, jrer sbegl naq bar gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq.

1:42 Bs gur puvyqera bs Ancugnyv, guebhtubhg gurve trarengvbaf, nsgre
gurve snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore
bs gur anzrf, sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, nyy gung jrer noyr gb
tb sbegu gb jne; 1:43 Gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, rira bs gur
gevor bs Ancugnyv, jrer svsgl naq guerr gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq.

1:44 Gurfr ner gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq, juvpu Zbfrf naq Nneba
ahzorerq, naq gur cevaprf bs Vfenry, orvat gjryir zra: rnpu bar jnf
sbe gur ubhfr bs uvf snguref.

1:45 Fb jrer nyy gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry,
ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, nyy
gung jrer noyr gb tb sbegu gb jne va Vfenry; 1:46 Rira nyy gurl gung
jrer ahzorerq jrer fvk uhaqerq gubhfnaq naq guerr gubhfnaq naq svir
uhaqerq naq svsgl.

1:47 Ohg gur Yrivgrf nsgre gur gevor bs gurve snguref jrer abg
ahzorerq nzbat gurz.

1:48 Sbe gur YBEQ unq fcbxra hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 1:49 Bayl gubh funyg
abg ahzore gur gevor bs Yriv, arvgure gnxr gur fhz bs gurz nzbat gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry: 1:50 Ohg gubh funyg nccbvag gur Yrivgrf bire gur
gnoreanpyr bs grfgvzbal, naq bire nyy gur irffryf gurerbs, naq bire
nyy guvatf gung orybat gb vg: gurl funyy orne gur gnoreanpyr, naq nyy
gur irffryf gurerbs; naq gurl funyy zvavfgre hagb vg, naq funyy rapnzc
ebhaq nobhg gur gnoreanpyr.

1:51 Naq jura gur gnoreanpyr frggrgu sbejneq, gur Yrivgrf funyy gnxr
vg qbja: naq jura gur gnoreanpyr vf gb or cvgpurq, gur Yrivgrf funyy
frg vg hc: naq gur fgenatre gung pbzrgu avtu funyy or chg gb qrngu.

1:52 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry funyy cvgpu gurve gragf, rirel zna ol
uvf bja pnzc, naq rirel zna ol uvf bja fgnaqneq, guebhtubhg gurve
ubfgf.

1:53 Ohg gur Yrivgrf funyy cvgpu ebhaq nobhg gur gnoreanpyr bs
grfgvzbal, gung gurer or ab jengu hcba gur pbatertngvba bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry: naq gur Yrivgrf funyy xrrc gur punetr bs gur
gnoreanpyr bs grfgvzbal.

1:54 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq nppbeqvat gb nyy gung gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq Zbfrf, fb qvq gurl.

2:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq hagb Nneba, fnlvat, 2:2 Rirel
zna bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry funyy cvgpu ol uvf bja fgnaqneq, jvgu
gur rafvta bs gurve sngure'f ubhfr: sne bss nobhg gur gnoreanpyr bs
gur pbatertngvba funyy gurl cvgpu.

2:3 Naq ba gur rnfg fvqr gbjneq gur evfvat bs gur fha funyy gurl bs
gur fgnaqneq bs gur pnzc bs Whqnu cvgpu guebhtubhg gurve nezvrf: naq
Anufuba gur fba bs Nzzvanqno funyy or pncgnva bs gur puvyqera bs
Whqnu.

2:4 Naq uvf ubfg, naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, jrer
guerrfpber naq sbhegrra gubhfnaq naq fvk uhaqerq.

2:5 Naq gubfr gung qb cvgpu arkg hagb uvz funyy or gur gevor bs
Vffnpune: naq Argunarry gur fba bs Mhne funyy or pncgnva bs gur
puvyqera bs Vffnpune.

2:6 Naq uvf ubfg, naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq gurerbs, jrer svsgl naq
sbhe gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq.

2:7 Gura gur gevor bs Mrohyha: naq Ryvno gur fba bs Uryba funyy or
pncgnva bs gur puvyqera bs Mrohyha.

2:8 Naq uvf ubfg, naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq gurerbs, jrer svsgl naq
frira gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq.

2:9 Nyy gung jrer ahzorerq va gur pnzc bs Whqnu jrer na uhaqerq
gubhfnaq naq sbhefpber gubhfnaq naq fvk gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq,
guebhtubhg gurve nezvrf. Gurfr funyy svefg frg sbegu.

2:10 Ba gur fbhgu fvqr funyy or gur fgnaqneq bs gur pnzc bs Erhora
nppbeqvat gb gurve nezvrf: naq gur pncgnva bs gur puvyqera bs Erhora
funyy or Ryvmhe gur fba bs Furqrhe.

2:11 Naq uvf ubfg, naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq gurerbs, jrer sbegl
naq fvk gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq.

2:12 Naq gubfr juvpu cvgpu ol uvz funyy or gur gevor bs Fvzrba: naq
gur pncgnva bs gur puvyqera bs Fvzrba funyy or Furyhzvry gur fba bs
Mhevfunqqnv.

2:13 Naq uvf ubfg, naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, jrer svsgl
naq avar gubhfnaq naq guerr uhaqerq.

2:14 Gura gur gevor bs Tnq: naq gur pncgnva bs gur fbaf bs Tnq funyy
or Ryvnfncu gur fba bs Erhry.

2:15 Naq uvf ubfg, naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, jrer sbegl
naq svir gubhfnaq naq fvk uhaqerq naq svsgl.

2:16 Nyy gung jrer ahzorerq va gur pnzc bs Erhora jrer na uhaqerq
gubhfnaq naq svsgl naq bar gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq naq svsgl,
guebhtubhg gurve nezvrf. Naq gurl funyy frg sbegu va gur frpbaq enax.

2:17 Gura gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba funyy frg sbejneq jvgu
gur pnzc bs gur Yrivgrf va gur zvqfg bs gur pnzc: nf gurl rapnzc, fb
funyy gurl frg sbejneq, rirel zna va uvf cynpr ol gurve fgnaqneqf.

2:18 Ba gur jrfg fvqr funyy or gur fgnaqneq bs gur pnzc bs Rcuenvz
nppbeqvat gb gurve nezvrf: naq gur pncgnva bs gur fbaf bs Rcuenvz
funyy or Ryvfunzn gur fba bs Nzzvuhq.

2:19 Naq uvf ubfg, naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, jrer sbegl
gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq.

2:20 Naq ol uvz funyy or gur gevor bs Znanffru: naq gur pncgnva bs gur
puvyqera bs Znanffru funyy or Tnznyvry gur fba bs Crqnumhe.

2:21 Naq uvf ubfg, naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, jrer guvegl
naq gjb gubhfnaq naq gjb uhaqerq.

2:22 Gura gur gevor bs Orawnzva: naq gur pncgnva bs gur fbaf bs
Orawnzva funyy or Novqna gur fba bs Tvqrbav.

2:23 Naq uvf ubfg, naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, jrer guvegl
naq svir gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq.

2:24 Nyy gung jrer ahzorerq bs gur pnzc bs Rcuenvz jrer na uhaqerq
gubhfnaq naq rvtug gubhfnaq naq na uhaqerq, guebhtubhg gurve nezvrf.
Naq gurl funyy tb sbejneq va gur guveq enax.

2:25 Gur fgnaqneq bs gur pnzc bs Qna funyy or ba gur abegu fvqr ol
gurve nezvrf: naq gur pncgnva bs gur puvyqera bs Qna funyy or Nuvrmre
gur fba bs Nzzvfunqqnv.

2:26 Naq uvf ubfg, naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, jrer
guerrfpber naq gjb gubhfnaq naq frira uhaqerq.

2:27 Naq gubfr gung rapnzc ol uvz funyy or gur gevor bs Nfure: naq gur
pncgnva bs gur puvyqera bs Nfure funyy or Cntvry gur fba bs Bpena.

2:28 Naq uvf ubfg, naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, jrer sbegl
naq bar gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq.

2:29 Gura gur gevor bs Ancugnyv: naq gur pncgnva bs gur puvyqera bs
Ancugnyv funyy or Nuven gur fba bs Rana.

2:30 Naq uvf ubfg, naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, jrer svsgl
naq guerr gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq.

2:31 Nyy gurl gung jrer ahzorerq va gur pnzc bs Qna jrer na uhaqerq
gubhfnaq naq svsgl naq frira gubhfnaq naq fvk uhaqerq. Gurl funyy tb
uvaqzbfg jvgu gurve fgnaqneqf.

2:32 Gurfr ner gubfr juvpu jrer ahzorerq bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry ol
gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref: nyy gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gur pnzcf
guebhtubhg gurve ubfgf jrer fvk uhaqerq gubhfnaq naq guerr gubhfnaq
naq svir uhaqerq naq svsgl.

2:33 Ohg gur Yrivgrf jrer abg ahzorerq nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry;
nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

2:34 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq nppbeqvat gb nyy gung gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq Zbfrf: fb gurl cvgpurq ol gurve fgnaqneqf, naq fb gurl frg
sbejneq, rirel bar nsgre gurve snzvyvrf, nppbeqvat gb gur ubhfr bs
gurve snguref.

3:1 Gurfr nyfb ner gur trarengvbaf bs Nneba naq Zbfrf va gur qnl gung
gur YBEQ fcnxr jvgu Zbfrf va zbhag Fvanv.

3:2 Naq gurfr ner gur anzrf bs gur fbaf bs Nneba; Anqno gur svefgobea,
naq Novuh, Ryrnmne, naq Vgunzne.

3:3 Gurfr ner gur anzrf bs gur fbaf bs Nneba, gur cevrfgf juvpu jrer
nabvagrq, jubz ur pbafrpengrq gb zvavfgre va gur cevrfg'f bssvpr.

3:4 Naq Anqno naq Novuh qvrq orsber gur YBEQ, jura gurl bssrerq
fgenatr sver orsber gur YBEQ, va gur jvyqrearff bs Fvanv, naq gurl unq
ab puvyqera: naq Ryrnmne naq Vgunzne zvavfgrerq va gur cevrfg'f bssvpr
va gur fvtug bs Nneba gurve sngure.

3:5 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 3:6 Oevat gur gevor bs Yriv
arne, naq cerfrag gurz orsber Nneba gur cevrfg, gung gurl znl zvavfgre
hagb uvz.

3:7 Naq gurl funyy xrrc uvf punetr, naq gur punetr bs gur jubyr
pbatertngvba orsber gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, gb qb gur
freivpr bs gur gnoreanpyr.

3:8 Naq gurl funyy xrrc nyy gur vafgehzragf bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, naq gur punetr bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gb qb gur
freivpr bs gur gnoreanpyr.

3:9 Naq gubh funyg tvir gur Yrivgrf hagb Nneba naq gb uvf fbaf: gurl
ner jubyyl tvira hagb uvz bhg bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

3:10 Naq gubh funyg nccbvag Nneba naq uvf fbaf, naq gurl funyy jnvg ba
gurve cevrfg'f bssvpr: naq gur fgenatre gung pbzrgu avtu funyy or chg
gb qrngu.

3:11 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 3:12 Naq V, orubyq, V unir
gnxra gur Yrivgrf sebz nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry vafgrnq bs nyy gur
svefgobea gung bcrargu gur zngevk nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry:
gurersber gur Yrivgrf funyy or zvar; 3:13 Orpnhfr nyy gur svefgobea
ner zvar; sbe ba gur qnl gung V fzbgr nyy gur svefgobea va gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg V unyybjrq hagb zr nyy gur svefgobea va Vfenry, obgu zna naq
ornfg: zvar funyy gurl or: V nz gur YBEQ.

3:14 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf va gur jvyqrearff bs Fvanv, fnlvat,
3:15 Ahzore gur puvyqera bs Yriv nsgre gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, ol
gurve snzvyvrf: rirel znyr sebz n zbagu byq naq hcjneq funyg gubh
ahzore gurz.

3:16 Naq Zbfrf ahzorerq gurz nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ, nf ur
jnf pbzznaqrq.

3:17 Naq gurfr jrer gur fbaf bs Yriv ol gurve anzrf; Trefuba, naq
Xbungu, naq Zrenev.

3:18 Naq gurfr ner gur anzrf bs gur fbaf bs Trefuba ol gurve snzvyvrf;
Yvoav, naq Fuvzrv.

3:19 Naq gur fbaf bs Xbungu ol gurve snzvyvrf; Nzenz, naq Vmrune,
Uroeba, naq Hmmvry.

3:20 Naq gur fbaf bs Zrenev ol gurve snzvyvrf; Znuyv, naq Zhfuv. Gurfr
ner gur snzvyvrf bs gur Yrivgrf nppbeqvat gb gur ubhfr bs gurve
snguref.

3:21 Bs Trefuba jnf gur snzvyl bs gur Yvoavgrf, naq gur snzvyl bs gur
Fuvzvgrf: gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs gur Trefubavgrf.

3:22 Gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs nyy
gur znyrf, sebz n zbagu byq naq hcjneq, rira gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq
bs gurz jrer frira gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq.

3:23 Gur snzvyvrf bs gur Trefubavgrf funyy cvgpu oruvaq gur gnoreanpyr
jrfgjneq.

3:24 Naq gur puvrs bs gur ubhfr bs gur sngure bs gur Trefubavgrf funyy
or Ryvnfncu gur fba bs Ynry.

3:25 Naq gur punetr bs gur fbaf bs Trefuba va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba funyy or gur gnoreanpyr, naq gur grag, gur pbirevat
gurerbs, naq gur unatvat sbe gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, 3:26 Naq gur unatvatf bs gur pbheg, naq gur phegnva sbe
gur qbbe bs gur pbheg, juvpu vf ol gur gnoreanpyr, naq ol gur nygne
ebhaq nobhg, naq gur pbeqf bs vg sbe nyy gur freivpr gurerbs.

3:27 Naq bs Xbungu jnf gur snzvyl bs gur Nzenzvgrf, naq gur snzvyl bs
gur Vmrunevgrf, naq gur snzvyl bs gur Uroebavgrf, naq gur snzvyl bs
gur Hmmvryvgrf: gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs gur Xbunguvgrf.

3:28 Va gur ahzore bs nyy gur znyrf, sebz n zbagu byq naq hcjneq, jrer
rvtug gubhfnaq naq fvk uhaqerq, xrrcvat gur punetr bs gur fnapghnel.

3:29 Gur snzvyvrf bs gur fbaf bs Xbungu funyy cvgpu ba gur fvqr bs gur
gnoreanpyr fbhgujneq.

3:30 Naq gur puvrs bs gur ubhfr bs gur sngure bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur
Xbunguvgrf funyy or Ryvmncuna gur fba bs Hmmvry.

3:31 Naq gurve punetr funyy or gur nex, naq gur gnoyr, naq gur
pnaqyrfgvpx, naq gur nygnef, naq gur irffryf bs gur fnapghnel
jurerjvgu gurl zvavfgre, naq gur unatvat, naq nyy gur freivpr gurerbs.

3:32 Naq Ryrnmne gur fba bs Nneba gur cevrfg funyy or puvrs bire gur
puvrs bs gur Yrivgrf, naq unir gur birefvtug bs gurz gung xrrc gur
punetr bs gur fnapghnel.

3:33 Bs Zrenev jnf gur snzvyl bs gur Znuyvgrf, naq gur snzvyl bs gur
Zhfuvgrf: gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs Zrenev.

3:34 Naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs
nyy gur znyrf, sebz n zbagu byq naq hcjneq, jrer fvk gubhfnaq naq gjb
uhaqerq.

3:35 Naq gur puvrs bs gur ubhfr bs gur sngure bs gur snzvyvrf bs
Zrenev jnf Mhevry gur fba bs Novunvy: gurfr funyy cvgpu ba gur fvqr bs
gur gnoreanpyr abegujneq.

3:36 Naq haqre gur phfgbql naq punetr bs gur fbaf bs Zrenev funyy or
gur obneqf bs gur gnoreanpyr, naq gur onef gurerbs, naq gur cvyynef
gurerbs, naq gur fbpxrgf gurerbs, naq nyy gur irffryf gurerbs, naq nyy
gung freirgu gurergb, 3:37 Naq gur cvyynef bs gur pbheg ebhaq nobhg,
naq gurve fbpxrgf, naq gurve cvaf, naq gurve pbeqf.

3:38 Ohg gubfr gung rapnzc orsber gur gnoreanpyr gbjneq gur rnfg, rira
orsber gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba rnfgjneq, funyy or Zbfrf,
naq Nneba naq uvf fbaf, xrrcvat gur punetr bs gur fnapghnel sbe gur
punetr bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry; naq gur fgenatre gung pbzrgu avtu
funyy or chg gb qrngu.

3:39 Nyy gung jrer ahzorerq bs gur Yrivgrf, juvpu Zbfrf naq Nneba
ahzorerq ng gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ, guebhtubhg gurve snzvyvrf,
nyy gur znyrf sebz n zbagu byq naq hcjneq, jrer gjragl naq gjb
gubhfnaq.

3:40 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Ahzore nyy gur svefgobea bs gur
znyrf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry sebz n zbagu byq naq hcjneq, naq gnxr
gur ahzore bs gurve anzrf.

3:41 Naq gubh funyg gnxr gur Yrivgrf sbe zr (V nz gur YBEQ) vafgrnq bs
nyy gur svefgobea nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry; naq gur pnggyr bs gur
Yrivgrf vafgrnq bs nyy gur svefgyvatf nzbat gur pnggyr bs gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry.

3:42 Naq Zbfrf ahzorerq, nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq uvz, nyy gur svefgobea
nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

3:43 Naq nyy gur svefgobea znyrf ol gur ahzore bs anzrf, sebz n zbagu
byq naq hcjneq, bs gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, jrer gjragl naq
gjb gubhfnaq gjb uhaqerq naq guerrfpber naq guvegrra.

3:44 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 3:45 Gnxr gur Yrivgrf
vafgrnq bs nyy gur svefgobea nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq gur
pnggyr bs gur Yrivgrf vafgrnq bs gurve pnggyr; naq gur Yrivgrf funyy
or zvar: V nz gur YBEQ.

3:46 Naq sbe gubfr gung ner gb or erqrrzrq bs gur gjb uhaqerq naq
guerrfpber naq guvegrra bs gur svefgobea bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry,
juvpu ner zber guna gur Yrivgrf; 3:47 Gubh funyg rira gnxr svir
furxryf ncvrpr ol gur cbyy, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel funyg
gubh gnxr gurz: (gur furxry vf gjragl trenuf:) 3:48 Naq gubh funyg
tvir gur zbarl, jurerjvgu gur bqq ahzore bs gurz vf gb or erqrrzrq,
hagb Nneba naq gb uvf fbaf.

3:49 Naq Zbfrf gbbx gur erqrzcgvba zbarl bs gurz gung jrer bire naq
nobir gurz gung jrer erqrrzrq ol gur Yrivgrf: 3:50 Bs gur svefgobea bs
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gbbx ur gur zbarl; n gubhfnaq guerr uhaqerq naq
guerrfpber naq svir furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel: 3:51
Naq Zbfrf tnir gur zbarl bs gurz gung jrer erqrrzrq hagb Nneba naq gb
uvf fbaf, nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ, nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq
Zbfrf.

4:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq hagb Nneba, fnlvat, 4:2 Gnxr gur
fhz bs gur fbaf bs Xbungu sebz nzbat gur fbaf bs Yriv, nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, 4:3 Sebz guvegl lrnef byq naq
hcjneq rira hagvy svsgl lrnef byq, nyy gung ragre vagb gur ubfg, gb qb
gur jbex va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

4:4 Guvf funyy or gur freivpr bs gur fbaf bs Xbungu va gur gnoreanpyr
bs gur pbatertngvba, nobhg gur zbfg ubyl guvatf: 4:5 Naq jura gur pnzc
frggrgu sbejneq, Nneba funyy pbzr, naq uvf fbaf, naq gurl funyy gnxr
qbja gur pbirevat invy, naq pbire gur nex bs grfgvzbal jvgu vg: 4:6
Naq funyy chg gurerba gur pbirevat bs onqtref' fxvaf, naq funyy fcernq
bire vg n pybgu jubyyl bs oyhr, naq funyy chg va gur fgnirf gurerbs.

4:7 Naq hcba gur gnoyr bs furjoernq gurl funyy fcernq n pybgu bs oyhr,
naq chg gurerba gur qvfurf, naq gur fcbbaf, naq gur objyf, naq pbiref
gb pbire jvguny: naq gur pbagvahny oernq funyy or gurerba: 4:8 Naq
gurl funyy fcernq hcba gurz n pybgu bs fpneyrg, naq pbire gur fnzr
jvgu n pbirevat bs onqtref' fxvaf, naq funyy chg va gur fgnirf
gurerbs.

4:9 Naq gurl funyy gnxr n pybgu bs oyhr, naq pbire gur pnaqyrfgvpx bs
gur yvtug, naq uvf ynzcf, naq uvf gbatf, naq uvf fahssqvfurf, naq nyy
gur bvy irffryf gurerbs, jurerjvgu gurl zvavfgre hagb vg: 4:10 Naq
gurl funyy chg vg naq nyy gur irffryf gurerbs jvguva n pbirevat bs
onqtref' fxvaf, naq funyy chg vg hcba n one.

4:11 Naq hcba gur tbyqra nygne gurl funyy fcernq n pybgu bs oyhr, naq
pbire vg jvgu n pbirevat bs onqtref' fxvaf, naq funyy chg gb gur
fgnirf gurerbs: 4:12 Naq gurl funyy gnxr nyy gur vafgehzragf bs
zvavfgel, jurerjvgu gurl zvavfgre va gur fnapghnel, naq chg gurz va n
pybgu bs oyhr, naq pbire gurz jvgu n pbirevat bs onqtref' fxvaf, naq
funyy chg gurz ba n one: 4:13 Naq gurl funyy gnxr njnl gur nfurf sebz
gur nygne, naq fcernq n checyr pybgu gurerba: 4:14 Naq gurl funyy chg
hcba vg nyy gur irffryf gurerbs, jurerjvgu gurl zvavfgre nobhg vg,
rira gur prafref, gur syrfuubbxf, naq gur fubiryf, naq gur onfbaf, nyy
gur irffryf bs gur nygne; naq gurl funyy fcernq hcba vg n pbirevat bs
onqtref' fxvaf, naq chg gb gur fgnirf bs vg.

4:15 Naq jura Nneba naq uvf fbaf unir znqr na raq bs pbirevat gur
fnapghnel, naq nyy gur irffryf bs gur fnapghnel, nf gur pnzc vf gb frg
sbejneq; nsgre gung, gur fbaf bs Xbungu funyy pbzr gb orne vg: ohg
gurl funyy abg gbhpu nal ubyl guvat, yrfg gurl qvr. Gurfr guvatf ner
gur oheqra bs gur fbaf bs Xbungu va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba.

4:16 Naq gb gur bssvpr bs Ryrnmne gur fba bs Nneba gur cevrfg
cregnvargu gur bvy sbe gur yvtug, naq gur fjrrg vaprafr, naq gur qnvyl
zrng bssrevat, naq gur nabvagvat bvy, naq gur birefvtug bs nyy gur
gnoreanpyr, naq bs nyy gung gurerva vf, va gur fnapghnel, naq va gur
irffryf gurerbs.

4:17 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq hagb Nneba fnlvat, 4:18 Phg lr
abg bss gur gevor bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur Xbunguvgrf sebz nzbat gur
Yrivgrf: 4:19 Ohg guhf qb hagb gurz, gung gurl znl yvir, naq abg qvr,
jura gurl nccebnpu hagb gur zbfg ubyl guvatf: Nneba naq uvf fbaf funyy
tb va, naq nccbvag gurz rirel bar gb uvf freivpr naq gb uvf oheqra:
4:20 Ohg gurl funyy abg tb va gb frr jura gur ubyl guvatf ner pbirerq,
yrfg gurl qvr.

4:21 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 4:22 Gnxr nyfb gur fhz bs
gur fbaf bs Trefuba, guebhtubhg gur ubhfrf bs gurve snguref, ol gurve
snzvyvrf; 4:23 Sebz guvegl lrnef byq naq hcjneq hagvy svsgl lrnef byq
funyg gubh ahzore gurz; nyy gung ragre va gb cresbez gur freivpr, gb
qb gur jbex va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

4:24 Guvf vf gur freivpr bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur Trefubavgrf, gb freir,
naq sbe oheqraf: 4:25 Naq gurl funyy orne gur phegnvaf bs gur
gnoreanpyr, naq gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, uvf pbirevat, naq
gur pbirevat bs gur onqtref' fxvaf gung vf nobir hcba vg, naq gur
unatvat sbe gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, 4:26 Naq
gur unatvatf bs gur pbheg, naq gur unatvat sbe gur qbbe bs gur tngr bs
gur pbheg, juvpu vf ol gur gnoreanpyr naq ol gur nygne ebhaq nobhg,
naq gurve pbeqf, naq nyy gur vafgehzragf bs gurve freivpr, naq nyy
gung vf znqr sbe gurz: fb funyy gurl freir.

4:27 Ng gur nccbvagzrag bs Nneba naq uvf fbaf funyy or nyy gur freivpr
bs gur fbaf bs gur Trefubavgrf, va nyy gurve oheqraf, naq va nyy gurve
freivpr: naq lr funyy nccbvag hagb gurz va punetr nyy gurve oheqraf.

4:28 Guvf vf gur freivpr bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur fbaf bs Trefuba va gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba: naq gurve punetr funyy or haqre gur
unaq bs Vgunzne gur fba bs Nneba gur cevrfg.

4:29 Nf sbe gur fbaf bs Zrenev, gubh funyg ahzore gurz nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref; 4:30 Sebz guvegl lrnef byq
naq hcjneq rira hagb svsgl lrnef byq funyg gubh ahzore gurz, rirel bar
gung ragrergu vagb gur freivpr, gb qb gur jbex bs gur gnoreanpyr bs
gur pbatertngvba.

4:31 Naq guvf vf gur punetr bs gurve oheqra, nppbeqvat gb nyy gurve
freivpr va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba; gur obneqf bs gur
gnoreanpyr, naq gur onef gurerbs, naq gur cvyynef gurerbs, naq fbpxrgf
gurerbs, 4:32 Naq gur cvyynef bs gur pbheg ebhaq nobhg, naq gurve
fbpxrgf, naq gurve cvaf, naq gurve pbeqf, jvgu nyy gurve vafgehzragf,
naq jvgu nyy gurve freivpr: naq ol anzr lr funyy erpxba gur
vafgehzragf bs gur punetr bs gurve oheqra.

4:33 Guvf vf gur freivpr bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur fbaf bs Zrenev,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gurve freivpr, va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba,
haqre gur unaq bs Vgunzne gur fba bs Nneba gur cevrfg.

4:34 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba naq gur puvrs bs gur pbatertngvba ahzorerq
gur fbaf bs gur Xbunguvgrf nsgre gurve snzvyvrf, naq nsgre gur ubhfr
bs gurve snguref, 4:35 Sebz guvegl lrnef byq naq hcjneq rira hagb
svsgl lrnef byq, rirel bar gung ragrergu vagb gur freivpr, sbe gur
jbex va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba: 4:36 Naq gubfr gung jrer
ahzorerq bs gurz ol gurve snzvyvrf jrer gjb gubhfnaq frira uhaqerq naq
svsgl.

4:37 Gurfr jrer gurl gung jrer ahzorerq bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur
Xbunguvgrf, nyy gung zvtug qb freivpr va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, juvpu Zbfrf naq Nneba qvq ahzore nppbeqvat gb gur
pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf.

4:38 Naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gur fbaf bs Trefuba, guebhtubhg
gurve snzvyvrf, naq ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, 4:39 Sebz guvegl
lrnef byq naq hcjneq rira hagb svsgl lrnef byq, rirel bar gung
ragrergu vagb gur freivpr, sbe gur jbex va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, 4:40 Rira gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, guebhtubhg
gurve snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, jrer gjb gubhfnaq naq
fvk uhaqerq naq guvegl.

4:41 Gurfr ner gurl gung jrer ahzorerq bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur fbaf bs
Trefuba, bs nyy gung zvtug qb freivpr va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, jubz Zbfrf naq Nneba qvq ahzore nppbeqvat gb gur
pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ.

4:42 Naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur fbaf bs
Zrenev, guebhtubhg gurve snzvyvrf, ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, 4:43
Sebz guvegl lrnef byq naq hcjneq rira hagb svsgl lrnef byq, rirel bar
gung ragrergu vagb gur freivpr, sbe gur jbex va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, 4:44 Rira gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf, jrer guerr gubhfnaq naq gjb uhaqerq.

4:45 Gurfr or gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur fbaf bs
Zrenev, jubz Zbfrf naq Nneba ahzorerq nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur
YBEQ ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf.

4:46 Nyy gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gur Yrivgrf, jubz Zbfrf naq Nneba
naq gur puvrs bs Vfenry ahzorerq, nsgre gurve snzvyvrf, naq nsgre gur
ubhfr bs gurve snguref, 4:47 Sebz guvegl lrnef byq naq hcjneq rira
hagb svsgl lrnef byq, rirel bar gung pnzr gb qb gur freivpr bs gur
zvavfgel, naq gur freivpr bs gur oheqra va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba.

4:48 Rira gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, jrer rvtug gubhfnaq naq
svir uhaqerq naq sbhefpber, 4:49 Nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur
YBEQ gurl jrer ahzorerq ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf, rirel bar nppbeqvat gb
uvf freivpr, naq nppbeqvat gb uvf oheqra: guhf jrer gurl ahzorerq bs
uvz, nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

5:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 5:2 Pbzznaq gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, gung gurl chg bhg bs gur pnzc rirel yrcre, naq rirel bar gung
ungu na vffhr, naq jubfbrire vf qrsvyrq ol gur qrnq: 5:3 Obgu znyr naq
srznyr funyy lr chg bhg, jvgubhg gur pnzc funyy lr chg gurz; gung gurl
qrsvyr abg gurve pnzcf, va gur zvqfg jurerbs V qjryy.

5:4 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq fb, naq chg gurz bhg jvgubhg gur
pnzc: nf gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fb qvq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

5:5 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 5:6 Fcrnx hagb gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry, Jura n zna be jbzna funyy pbzzvg nal fva gung zra pbzzvg,
gb qb n gerfcnff ntnvafg gur YBEQ, naq gung crefba or thvygl; 5:7 Gura
gurl funyy pbasrff gurve fva juvpu gurl unir qbar: naq ur funyy
erpbzcrafr uvf gerfcnff jvgu gur cevapvcny gurerbs, naq nqq hagb vg
gur svsgu cneg gurerbs, naq tvir vg hagb uvz ntnvafg jubz ur ungu
gerfcnffrq.

5:8 Ohg vs gur zna unir ab xvafzna gb erpbzcrafr gur gerfcnff hagb,
yrg gur gerfcnff or erpbzcrafrq hagb gur YBEQ, rira gb gur cevrfg;
orfvqr gur enz bs gur ngbarzrag, jurerol na ngbarzrag funyy or znqr
sbe uvz.

5:9 Naq rirel bssrevat bs nyy gur ubyl guvatf bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, juvpu gurl oevat hagb gur cevrfg, funyy or uvf.

5:10 Naq rirel zna'f unyybjrq guvatf funyy or uvf: jungfbrire nal zna
tvirgu gur cevrfg, vg funyy or uvf.

5:11 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 5:12 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Vs nal zna'f jvsr tb nfvqr, naq
pbzzvg n gerfcnff ntnvafg uvz, 5:13 Naq n zna yvr jvgu ure pneanyyl,
naq vg or uvq sebz gur rlrf bs ure uhfonaq, naq or xrcg pybfr, naq fur
or qrsvyrq, naq gurer or ab jvgarff ntnvafg ure, arvgure fur or gnxra
jvgu gur znaare; 5:14 Naq gur fcvevg bs wrnybhfl pbzr hcba uvz, naq ur
or wrnybhf bs uvf jvsr, naq fur or qrsvyrq: be vs gur fcvevg bs
wrnybhfl pbzr hcba uvz, naq ur or wrnybhf bs uvf jvsr, naq fur or abg
qrsvyrq: 5:15 Gura funyy gur zna oevat uvf jvsr hagb gur cevrfg, naq
ur funyy oevat ure bssrevat sbe ure, gur gragu cneg bs na rcunu bs
oneyrl zrny; ur funyy cbhe ab bvy hcba vg, abe chg senaxvaprafr
gurerba; sbe vg vf na bssrevat bs wrnybhfl, na bssrevat bs zrzbevny,
oevatvat vavdhvgl gb erzrzoenapr.

5:16 Naq gur cevrfg funyy oevat ure arne, naq frg ure orsber gur YBEQ:
5:17 Naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr ubyl jngre va na rnegura irffry; naq bs
gur qhfg gung vf va gur sybbe bs gur gnoreanpyr gur cevrfg funyy gnxr,
naq chg vg vagb gur jngre: 5:18 Naq gur cevrfg funyy frg gur jbzna
orsber gur YBEQ, naq hapbire gur jbzna'f urnq, naq chg gur bssrevat bs
zrzbevny va ure unaqf, juvpu vf gur wrnybhfl bssrevat: naq gur cevrfg
funyy unir va uvf unaq gur ovggre jngre gung pnhfrgu gur phefr: 5:19
Naq gur cevrfg funyy punetr ure ol na bngu, naq fnl hagb gur jbzna, Vs
ab zna unir ynva jvgu gurr, naq vs gubh unfg abg tbar nfvqr gb
hapyrnaarff jvgu nabgure vafgrnq bs gul uhfonaq, or gubh serr sebz
guvf ovggre jngre gung pnhfrgu gur phefr: 5:20 Ohg vs gubh unfg tbar
nfvqr gb nabgure vafgrnq bs gul uhfonaq, naq vs gubh or qrsvyrq, naq
fbzr zna unir ynva jvgu gurr orfvqr guvar uhfonaq: 5:21 Gura gur
cevrfg funyy punetr gur jbzna jvgu na bngu bs phefvat, naq gur cevrfg
funyy fnl hagb gur jbzna, Gur YBEQ znxr gurr n phefr naq na bngu nzbat
gul crbcyr, jura gur YBEQ qbgu znxr gul guvtu gb ebg, naq gul oryyl gb
fjryy; 5:22 Naq guvf jngre gung pnhfrgu gur phefr funyy tb vagb gul
objryf, gb znxr gul oryyl gb fjryy, naq gul guvtu gb ebg: Naq gur
jbzna funyy fnl, Nzra, nzra.

5:23 Naq gur cevrfg funyy jevgr gurfr phefrf va n obbx, naq ur funyy
oybg gurz bhg jvgu gur ovggre jngre: 5:24 Naq ur funyy pnhfr gur jbzna
gb qevax gur ovggre jngre gung pnhfrgu gur phefr: naq gur jngre gung
