pnhfrgu gur phefr funyy ragre vagb ure, naq orpbzr ovggre.

5:25 Gura gur cevrfg funyy gnxr gur wrnybhfl bssrevat bhg bs gur
jbzna'f unaq, naq funyy jnir gur bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ, naq bssre
vg hcba gur nygne: 5:26 Naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr na unaqshy bs gur
bssrevat, rira gur zrzbevny gurerbs, naq ohea vg hcba gur nygne, naq
nsgrejneq funyy pnhfr gur jbzna gb qevax gur jngre.

5:27 Naq jura ur ungu znqr ure gb qevax gur jngre, gura vg funyy pbzr
gb cnff, gung, vs fur or qrsvyrq, naq unir qbar gerfcnff ntnvafg ure
uhfonaq, gung gur jngre gung pnhfrgu gur phefr funyy ragre vagb ure,
naq orpbzr ovggre, naq ure oryyl funyy fjryy, naq ure guvtu funyy ebg:
naq gur jbzna funyy or n phefr nzbat ure crbcyr.

5:28 Naq vs gur jbzna or abg qrsvyrq, ohg or pyrna; gura fur funyy or
serr, naq funyy pbaprvir frrq.

5:29 Guvf vf gur ynj bs wrnybhfvrf, jura n jvsr tbrgu nfvqr gb nabgure
vafgrnq bs ure uhfonaq, naq vf qrsvyrq; 5:30 Be jura gur fcvevg bs
wrnybhfl pbzrgu hcba uvz, naq ur or wrnybhf bire uvf jvsr, naq funyy
frg gur jbzna orsber gur YBEQ, naq gur cevrfg funyy rkrphgr hcba ure
nyy guvf ynj.

5:31 Gura funyy gur zna or thvygyrff sebz vavdhvgl, naq guvf jbzna
funyy orne ure vavdhvgl.

6:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 6:2 Fcrnx hagb gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Jura rvgure zna be jbzna funyy frcnengr
gurzfryirf gb ibj n ibj bs n Anmnevgr, gb frcnengr gurzfryirf hagb gur
YBEQ: 6:3 Ur funyy frcnengr uvzfrys sebz jvar naq fgebat qevax, naq
funyy qevax ab ivartne bs jvar, be ivartne bs fgebat qevax, arvgure
funyy ur qevax nal yvdhbe bs tencrf, abe rng zbvfg tencrf, be qevrq.

6:4 Nyy gur qnlf bs uvf frcnengvba funyy ur rng abguvat gung vf znqr
bs gur ivar gerr, sebz gur xrearyf rira gb gur uhfx.

6:5 Nyy gur qnlf bs gur ibj bs uvf frcnengvba gurer funyy ab enmbe
pbzr hcba uvf urnq: hagvy gur qnlf or shysvyyrq, va gur juvpu ur
frcnengrgu uvzfrys hagb gur YBEQ, ur funyy or ubyl, naq funyy yrg gur
ybpxf bs gur unve bs uvf urnq tebj.

6:6 Nyy gur qnlf gung ur frcnengrgu uvzfrys hagb gur YBEQ ur funyy
pbzr ng ab qrnq obql.

6:7 Ur funyy abg znxr uvzfrys hapyrna sbe uvf sngure, be sbe uvf
zbgure, sbe uvf oebgure, be sbe uvf fvfgre, jura gurl qvr: orpnhfr gur
pbafrpengvba bs uvf Tbq vf hcba uvf urnq.

6:8 Nyy gur qnlf bs uvf frcnengvba ur vf ubyl hagb gur YBEQ.

6:9 Naq vs nal zna qvr irel fhqqrayl ol uvz, naq ur ungu qrsvyrq gur
urnq bs uvf pbafrpengvba; gura ur funyy funir uvf urnq va gur qnl bs
uvf pyrnafvat, ba gur friragu qnl funyy ur funir vg.

6:10 Naq ba gur rvtugu qnl ur funyy oevat gjb ghegyrf, be gjb lbhat
cvtrbaf, gb gur cevrfg, gb gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba: 6:11 Naq gur cevrfg funyy bssre gur bar sbe n fva
bssrevat, naq gur bgure sbe n oheag bssrevat, naq znxr na ngbarzrag
sbe uvz, sbe gung ur fvaarq ol gur qrnq, naq funyy unyybj uvf urnq
gung fnzr qnl.

6:12 Naq ur funyy pbafrpengr hagb gur YBEQ gur qnlf bs uvf frcnengvba,
naq funyy oevat n ynzo bs gur svefg lrne sbe n gerfcnff bssrevat: ohg
gur qnlf gung jrer orsber funyy or ybfg, orpnhfr uvf frcnengvba jnf
qrsvyrq.

6:13 Naq guvf vf gur ynj bs gur Anmnevgr, jura gur qnlf bs uvf
frcnengvba ner shysvyyrq: ur funyy or oebhtug hagb gur qbbe bs gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba: 6:14 Naq ur funyy bssre uvf bssrevat
hagb gur YBEQ, bar ur ynzo bs gur svefg lrne jvgubhg oyrzvfu sbe n
oheag bssrevat, naq bar rjr ynzo bs gur svefg lrne jvgubhg oyrzvfu sbe
n fva bssrevat, naq bar enz jvgubhg oyrzvfu sbe crnpr bssrevatf, 6:15
Naq n onfxrg bs hayrnirarq oernq, pnxrf bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu
bvy, naq jnsref bs hayrnirarq oernq nabvagrq jvgu bvy, naq gurve zrng
bssrevat, naq gurve qevax bssrevatf.

6:16 Naq gur cevrfg funyy oevat gurz orsber gur YBEQ, naq funyy bssre
uvf fva bssrevat, naq uvf oheag bssrevat: 6:17 Naq ur funyy bssre gur
enz sbe n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevatf hagb gur YBEQ, jvgu gur onfxrg
bs hayrnirarq oernq: gur cevrfg funyy bssre nyfb uvf zrng bssrevat,
naq uvf qevax bssrevat.

6:18 Naq gur Anmnevgr funyy funir gur urnq bs uvf frcnengvba ng gur
qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, naq funyy gnxr gur unve bs
gur urnq bs uvf frcnengvba, naq chg vg va gur sver juvpu vf haqre gur
fnpevsvpr bs gur crnpr bssrevatf.

6:19 Naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr gur fbqqra fubhyqre bs gur enz, naq bar
hayrnirarq pnxr bhg bs gur onfxrg, naq bar hayrnirarq jnsre, naq funyy
chg gurz hcba gur unaqf bs gur Anmnevgr, nsgre gur unve bs uvf
frcnengvba vf funira: 6:20 Naq gur cevrfg funyy jnir gurz sbe n jnir
bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ: guvf vf ubyl sbe gur cevrfg, jvgu gur jnir
oernfg naq urnir fubhyqre: naq nsgre gung gur Anmnevgr znl qevax jvar.

6:21 Guvf vf gur ynj bs gur Anmnevgr jub ungu ibjrq, naq bs uvf
bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ sbe uvf frcnengvba, orfvqr gung gung uvf unaq
funyy trg: nppbeqvat gb gur ibj juvpu ur ibjrq, fb ur zhfg qb nsgre
gur ynj bs uvf frcnengvba.

6:22 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 6:23 Fcrnx hagb Nneba naq
hagb uvf fbaf, fnlvat, Ba guvf jvfr lr funyy oyrff gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, fnlvat hagb gurz, 6:24 Gur YBEQ oyrff gurr, naq xrrc gurr:
6:25 Gur YBEQ znxr uvf snpr fuvar hcba gurr, naq or tenpvbhf hagb
gurr: 6:26 Gur YBEQ yvsg hc uvf pbhagranapr hcba gurr, naq tvir gurr
crnpr.

6:27 Naq gurl funyy chg zl anzr hcba gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq V
jvyy oyrff gurz.

7:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur qnl gung Zbfrf unq shyyl frg hc gur
gnoreanpyr, naq unq nabvagrq vg, naq fnapgvsvrq vg, naq nyy gur
vafgehzragf gurerbs, obgu gur nygne naq nyy gur irffryf gurerbs, naq
unq nabvagrq gurz, naq fnapgvsvrq gurz; 7:2 Gung gur cevaprf bs
Vfenry, urnqf bs gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, jub jrer gur cevaprf bs
gur gevorf, naq jrer bire gurz gung jrer ahzorerq, bssrerq: 7:3 Naq
gurl oebhtug gurve bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ, fvk pbirerq jntbaf, naq
gjryir bkra; n jntba sbe gjb bs gur cevaprf, naq sbe rnpu bar na bk:
naq gurl oebhtug gurz orsber gur gnoreanpyr.

7:4 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 7:5 Gnxr vg bs gurz, gung
gurl znl or gb qb gur freivpr bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba;
naq gubh funyg tvir gurz hagb gur Yrivgrf, gb rirel zna nppbeqvat gb
uvf freivpr.

7:6 Naq Zbfrf gbbx gur jntbaf naq gur bkra, naq tnir gurz hagb gur
Yrivgrf.

7:7 Gjb jntbaf naq sbhe bkra ur tnir hagb gur fbaf bs Trefuba,
nppbeqvat gb gurve freivpr: 7:8 Naq sbhe jntbaf naq rvtug bkra ur tnir
hagb gur fbaf bs Zrenev, nppbeqvat hagb gurve freivpr, haqre gur unaq
bs Vgunzne gur fba bs Nneba gur cevrfg.

7:9 Ohg hagb gur fbaf bs Xbungu ur tnir abar: orpnhfr gur freivpr bs
gur fnapghnel orybatvat hagb gurz jnf gung gurl fubhyq orne hcba gurve
fubhyqref.

7:10 Naq gur cevaprf bssrerq sbe qrqvpngvat bs gur nygne va gur qnl
gung vg jnf nabvagrq, rira gur cevaprf bssrerq gurve bssrevat orsber
gur nygne.

7:11 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Gurl funyy bssre gurve bssrevat,
rnpu cevapr ba uvf qnl, sbe gur qrqvpngvat bs gur nygne.

7:12 Naq ur gung bssrerq uvf bssrevat gur svefg qnl jnf Anufuba gur
fba bs Nzzvanqno, bs gur gevor bs Whqnu: 7:13 Naq uvf bssrevat jnf bar
fvyire punetre, gur jrvtug gurerbs jnf na uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf,
bar fvyire objy bs friragl furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel;
obgu bs gurz jrer shyy bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng
bssrevat: 7:14 Bar fcbba bs gra furxryf bs tbyq, shyy bs vaprafr: 7:15
Bar lbhat ohyybpx, bar enz, bar ynzo bs gur svefg lrne, sbe n oheag
bssrevat: 7:16 Bar xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat: 7:17 Naq sbe n
fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevatf, gjb bkra, svir enzf, svir ur tbngf, svir
ynzof bs gur svefg lrne: guvf jnf gur bssrevat bs Anufuba gur fba bs
Nzzvanqno.

7:18 Ba gur frpbaq qnl Argunarry gur fba bs Mhne, cevapr bs Vffnpune,
qvq bssre: 7:19 Ur bssrerq sbe uvf bssrevat bar fvyire punetre, gur
jrvtug jurerbs jnf na uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf, bar fvyire objy bs
friragl furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel; obgu bs gurz shyy
bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng bssrevat: 7:20 Bar fcbba bs
tbyq bs gra furxryf, shyy bs vaprafr: 7:21 Bar lbhat ohyybpx, bar enz,
bar ynzo bs gur svefg lrne, sbe n oheag bssrevat: 7:22 Bar xvq bs gur
tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat: 7:23 Naq sbe n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevatf,
gjb bkra, svir enzf, svir ur tbngf, svir ynzof bs gur svefg lrne: guvf
jnf gur bssrevat bs Argunarry gur fba bs Mhne.

7:24 Ba gur guveq qnl Ryvno gur fba bs Uryba, cevapr bs gur puvyqera
bs Mrohyha, qvq bssre: 7:25 Uvf bssrevat jnf bar fvyire punetre, gur
jrvtug jurerbs jnf na uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf, bar fvyire objy bs
friragl furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel; obgu bs gurz shyy
bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng bssrevat: 7:26 Bar tbyqra
fcbba bs gra furxryf, shyy bs vaprafr: 7:27 Bar lbhat ohyybpx, bar
enz, bar ynzo bs gur svefg lrne, sbe n oheag bssrevat: 7:28 Bar xvq bs
gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat: 7:29 Naq sbe n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr
bssrevatf, gjb bkra, svir enzf, svir ur tbngf, svir ynzof bs gur svefg
lrne: guvf jnf gur bssrevat bs Ryvno gur fba bs Uryba.

7:30 Ba gur sbhegu qnl Ryvmhe gur fba bs Furqrhe, cevapr bs gur
puvyqera bs Erhora, qvq bssre: 7:31 Uvf bssrevat jnf bar fvyire
punetre bs gur jrvtug bs na uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf, bar fvyire
objy bs friragl furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel; obgu bs
gurz shyy bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng bssrevat: 7:32 Bar
tbyqra fcbba bs gra furxryf, shyy bs vaprafr: 7:33 Bar lbhat ohyybpx,
bar enz, bar ynzo bs gur svefg lrne, sbe n oheag bssrevat: 7:34 Bar
xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat: 7:35 Naq sbe n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr
bssrevatf, gjb bkra, svir enzf, svir ur tbngf, svir ynzof bs gur svefg
lrne: guvf jnf gur bssrevat bs Ryvmhe gur fba bs Furqrhe.

7:36 Ba gur svsgu qnl Furyhzvry gur fba bs Mhevfunqqnv, cevapr bs gur
puvyqera bs Fvzrba, qvq bssre: 7:37 Uvf bssrevat jnf bar fvyire
punetre, gur jrvtug jurerbs jnf na uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf, bar
fvyire objy bs friragl furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel;
obgu bs gurz shyy bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng bssrevat:
7:38 Bar tbyqra fcbba bs gra furxryf, shyy bs vaprafr: 7:39 Bar lbhat
ohyybpx, bar enz, bar ynzo bs gur svefg lrne, sbe n oheag bssrevat:
7:40 Bar xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat: 7:41 Naq sbe n fnpevsvpr
bs crnpr bssrevatf, gjb bkra, svir enzf, svir ur tbngf, svir ynzof bs
gur svefg lrne: guvf jnf gur bssrevat bs Furyhzvry gur fba bs
Mhevfunqqnv.

7:42 Ba gur fvkgu qnl Ryvnfncu gur fba bs Qrhry, cevapr bs gur
puvyqera bs Tnq, bssrerq: 7:43 Uvf bssrevat jnf bar fvyire punetre bs
gur jrvtug bs na uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf, n fvyire objy bs friragl
furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel; obgu bs gurz shyy bs svar
sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng bssrevat: 7:44 Bar tbyqra fcbba bs
gra furxryf, shyy bs vaprafr: 7:45 Bar lbhat ohyybpx, bar enz, bar
ynzo bs gur svefg lrne, sbe n oheag bssrevat: 7:46 Bar xvq bs gur
tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat: 7:47 Naq sbe n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevatf,
gjb bkra, svir enzf, svir ur tbngf, svir ynzof bs gur svefg lrne: guvf
jnf gur bssrevat bs Ryvnfncu gur fba bs Qrhry.

7:48 Ba gur friragu qnl Ryvfunzn gur fba bs Nzzvuhq, cevapr bs gur
puvyqera bs Rcuenvz, bssrerq: 7:49 Uvf bssrevat jnf bar fvyire
punetre, gur jrvtug jurerbs jnf na uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf, bar
fvyire objy bs friragl furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel;
obgu bs gurz shyy bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng bssrevat:
7:50 Bar tbyqra fcbba bs gra furxryf, shyy bs vaprafr: 7:51 Bar lbhat
ohyybpx, bar enz, bar ynzo bs gur svefg lrne, sbe n oheag bssrevat:
7:52 Bar xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat: 7:53 Naq sbe n fnpevsvpr
bs crnpr bssrevatf, gjb bkra, svir enzf, svir ur tbngf, svir ynzof bs
gur svefg lrne: guvf jnf gur bssrevat bs Ryvfunzn gur fba bs Nzzvuhq.

7:54 Ba gur rvtugu qnl bssrerq Tnznyvry gur fba bs Crqnumhe, cevapr bs
gur puvyqera bs Znanffru: 7:55 Uvf bssrevat jnf bar fvyire punetre bs
gur jrvtug bs na uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf, bar fvyire objy bs
friragl furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel; obgu bs gurz shyy
bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng bssrevat: 7:56 Bar tbyqra
fcbba bs gra furxryf, shyy bs vaprafr: 7:57 Bar lbhat ohyybpx, bar
enz, bar ynzo bs gur svefg lrne, sbe n oheag bssrevat: 7:58 Bar xvq bs
gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat: 7:59 Naq sbe n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr
bssrevatf, gjb bkra, svir enzf, svir ur tbngf, svir ynzof bs gur svefg
lrne: guvf jnf gur bssrevat bs Tnznyvry gur fba bs Crqnumhe.

7:60 Ba gur avagu qnl Novqna gur fba bs Tvqrbav, cevapr bs gur
puvyqera bs Orawnzva, bssrerq: 7:61 Uvf bssrevat jnf bar fvyire
punetre, gur jrvtug jurerbs jnf na uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf, bar
fvyire objy bs friragl furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel;
obgu bs gurz shyy bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng bssrevat:
7:62 Bar tbyqra fcbba bs gra furxryf, shyy bs vaprafr: 7:63 Bar lbhat
ohyybpx, bar enz, bar ynzo bs gur svefg lrne, sbe n oheag bssrevat:
7:64 Bar xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat: 7:65 Naq sbe n fnpevsvpr
bs crnpr bssrevatf, gjb bkra, svir enzf, svir ur tbngf, svir ynzof bs
gur svefg lrne: guvf jnf gur bssrevat bs Novqna gur fba bs Tvqrbav.

7:66 Ba gur gragu qnl Nuvrmre gur fba bs Nzzvfunqqnv, cevapr bs gur
puvyqera bs Qna, bssrerq: 7:67 Uvf bssrevat jnf bar fvyire punetre,
gur jrvtug jurerbs jnf na uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf, bar fvyire objy
bs friragl furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel; obgu bs gurz
shyy bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng bssrevat: 7:68 Bar
tbyqra fcbba bs gra furxryf, shyy bs vaprafr: 7:69 Bar lbhat ohyybpx,
bar enz, bar ynzo bs gur svefg lrne, sbe n oheag bssrevat: 7:70 Bar
xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat: 7:71 Naq sbe n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr
bssrevatf, gjb bkra, svir enzf, svir ur tbngf, svir ynzof bs gur svefg
lrne: guvf jnf gur bssrevat bs Nuvrmre gur fba bs Nzzvfunqqnv.

7:72 Ba gur ryriragu qnl Cntvry gur fba bs Bpena, cevapr bs gur
puvyqera bs Nfure, bssrerq: 7:73 Uvf bssrevat jnf bar fvyire punetre,
gur jrvtug jurerbs jnf na uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf, bar fvyire objy
bs friragl furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel; obgu bs gurz
shyy bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng bssrevat: 7:74 Bar
tbyqra fcbba bs gra furxryf, shyy bs vaprafr: 7:75 Bar lbhat ohyybpx,
bar enz, bar ynzo bs gur svefg lrne, sbe n oheag bssrevat: 7:76 Bar
xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat: 7:77 Naq sbe n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr
bssrevatf, gjb bkra, svir enzf, svir ur tbngf, svir ynzof bs gur svefg
lrne: guvf jnf gur bssrevat bs Cntvry gur fba bs Bpena.

7:78 Ba gur gjrysgu qnl Nuven gur fba bs Rana, cevapr bs gur puvyqera
bs Ancugnyv, bssrerq: 7:79 Uvf bssrevat jnf bar fvyire punetre, gur
jrvtug jurerbs jnf na uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf, bar fvyire objy bs
friragl furxryf, nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel; obgu bs gurz shyy
bs svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng bssrevat: 7:80 Bar tbyqra
fcbba bs gra furxryf, shyy bs vaprafr: 7:81 Bar lbhat ohyybpx, bar
enz, bar ynzo bs gur svefg lrne, sbe n oheag bssrevat: 7:82 Bar xvq bs
gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat: 7:83 Naq sbe n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr
bssrevatf, gjb bkra, svir enzf, svir ur tbngf, svir ynzof bs gur svefg
lrne: guvf jnf gur bssrevat bs Nuven gur fba bs Rana.

7:84 Guvf jnf gur qrqvpngvba bs gur nygne, va gur qnl jura vg jnf
nabvagrq, ol gur cevaprf bs Vfenry: gjryir punetref bs fvyire, gjryir
fvyire objyf, gjryir fcbbaf bs tbyq: 7:85 Rnpu punetre bs fvyire
jrvtuvat na uhaqerq naq guvegl furxryf, rnpu objy friragl: nyy gur
fvyire irffryf jrvturq gjb gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq furxryf, nsgre
gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel: 7:86 Gur tbyqra fcbbaf jrer gjryir, shyy
bs vaprafr, jrvtuvat gra furxryf ncvrpr, nsgre gur furxry bs gur
fnapghnel: nyy gur tbyq bs gur fcbbaf jnf na uhaqerq naq gjragl
furxryf.

7:87 Nyy gur bkra sbe gur oheag bssrevat jrer gjryir ohyybpxf, gur
enzf gjryir, gur ynzof bs gur svefg lrne gjryir, jvgu gurve zrng
bssrevat: naq gur xvqf bs gur tbngf sbe fva bssrevat gjryir.

7:88 Naq nyy gur bkra sbe gur fnpevsvpr bs gur crnpr bssrevatf jrer
gjragl naq sbhe ohyybpxf, gur enzf fvkgl, gur ur tbngf fvkgl, gur
ynzof bs gur svefg lrne fvkgl. Guvf jnf gur qrqvpngvba bs gur nygne,
nsgre gung vg jnf nabvagrq.

7:89 Naq jura Zbfrf jnf tbar vagb gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba
gb fcrnx jvgu uvz, gura ur urneq gur ibvpr bs bar fcrnxvat hagb uvz
sebz bss gur zrepl frng gung jnf hcba gur nex bs grfgvzbal, sebz
orgjrra gur gjb purehovzf: naq ur fcnxr hagb uvz.

8:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 8:2 Fcrnx hagb Nneba naq
fnl hagb uvz, Jura gubh yvtugrfg gur ynzcf, gur frira ynzcf funyy tvir
yvtug bire ntnvafg gur pnaqyrfgvpx.

8:3 Naq Nneba qvq fb; ur yvtugrq gur ynzcf gurerbs bire ntnvafg gur
pnaqyrfgvpx, nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

8:4 Naq guvf jbex bs gur pnaqyrfgvpx jnf bs orngra tbyq, hagb gur
funsg gurerbs, hagb gur sybjref gurerbs, jnf orngra jbex: nppbeqvat
hagb gur cnggrea juvpu gur YBEQ unq furjrq Zbfrf, fb ur znqr gur
pnaqyrfgvpx.

8:5 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 8:6 Gnxr gur Yrivgrf sebz
nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq pyrnafr gurz.

8:7 Naq guhf funyg gubh qb hagb gurz, gb pyrnafr gurz: Fcevaxyr jngre
bs chevslvat hcba gurz, naq yrg gurz funir nyy gurve syrfu, naq yrg
gurz jnfu gurve pybgurf, naq fb znxr gurzfryirf pyrna.

8:8 Gura yrg gurz gnxr n lbhat ohyybpx jvgu uvf zrng bssrevat, rira
svar sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy, naq nabgure lbhat ohyybpx funyg gubh gnxr
sbe n fva bssrevat.

8:9 Naq gubh funyg oevat gur Yrivgrf orsber gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba: naq gubh funyg tngure gur jubyr nffrzoyl bs gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry gbtrgure: 8:10 Naq gubh funyg oevat gur Yrivgrf orsber gur
YBEQ: naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry funyy chg gurve unaqf hcba gur
Yrivgrf: 8:11 Naq Nneba funyy bssre gur Yrivgrf orsber gur YBEQ sbe na
bssrevat bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung gurl znl rkrphgr gur freivpr
bs gur YBEQ.

8:12 Naq gur Yrivgrf funyy ynl gurve unaqf hcba gur urnqf bs gur
ohyybpxf: naq gubh funyg bssre gur bar sbe n fva bssrevat, naq gur
bgure sbe n oheag bssrevat, hagb gur YBEQ, gb znxr na ngbarzrag sbe
gur Yrivgrf.

8:13 Naq gubh funyg frg gur Yrivgrf orsber Nneba, naq orsber uvf fbaf,
naq bssre gurz sbe na bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ.

8:14 Guhf funyg gubh frcnengr gur Yrivgrf sebz nzbat gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry: naq gur Yrivgrf funyy or zvar.

8:15 Naq nsgre gung funyy gur Yrivgrf tb va gb qb gur freivpr bs gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba: naq gubh funyg pyrnafr gurz, naq bssre
gurz sbe na bssrevat.

8:16 Sbe gurl ner jubyyl tvira hagb zr sebz nzbat gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry; vafgrnq bs fhpu nf bcra rirel jbzo, rira vafgrnq bs gur
svefgobea bs nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, unir V gnxra gurz hagb zr.

8:17 Sbe nyy gur svefgobea bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry ner zvar, obgu
zna naq ornfg: ba gur qnl gung V fzbgr rirel svefgobea va gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg V fnapgvsvrq gurz sbe zlfrys.

8:18 Naq V unir gnxra gur Yrivgrf sbe nyy gur svefgobea bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry.

8:19 Naq V unir tvira gur Yrivgrf nf n tvsg gb Nneba naq gb uvf fbaf
sebz nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gb qb gur freivpr bs gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, naq gb znxr na
ngbarzrag sbe gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: gung gurer or ab cynthr nzbat
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, jura gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pbzr avtu hagb gur
fnapghnel.

8:20 Naq Zbfrf, naq Nneba, naq nyy gur pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, qvq gb gur Yrivgrf nppbeqvat hagb nyy gung gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq
Zbfrf pbapreavat gur Yrivgrf, fb qvq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry hagb gurz.

8:21 Naq gur Yrivgrf jrer chevsvrq, naq gurl jnfurq gurve pybgurf; naq
Nneba bssrerq gurz nf na bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ; naq Nneba znqr na
ngbarzrag sbe gurz gb pyrnafr gurz.

8:22 Naq nsgre gung jrag gur Yrivgrf va gb qb gurve freivpr va gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba orsber Nneba, naq orsber uvf fbaf: nf
gur YBEQ unq pbzznaqrq Zbfrf pbapreavat gur Yrivgrf, fb qvq gurl hagb
gurz.

8:23 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 8:24 Guvf vf vg gung
orybatrgu hagb gur Yrivgrf: sebz gjragl naq svir lrnef byq naq hcjneq
gurl funyy tb va gb jnvg hcba gur freivpr bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba: 8:25 Naq sebz gur ntr bs svsgl lrnef gurl funyy prnfr
jnvgvat hcba gur freivpr gurerbs, naq funyy freir ab zber: 8:26 Ohg
funyy zvavfgre jvgu gurve oerguera va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, gb xrrc gur punetr, naq funyy qb ab freivpr. Guhf funyg
gubh qb hagb gur Yrivgrf gbhpuvat gurve punetr.

9:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf va gur jvyqrearff bs Fvanv, va gur
svefg zbagu bs gur frpbaq lrne nsgre gurl jrer pbzr bhg bs gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg, fnlvat, 9:2 Yrg gur puvyqera bs Vfenry nyfb xrrc gur cnffbire
ng uvf nccbvagrq frnfba.

9:3 Va gur sbhegrragu qnl bs guvf zbagu, ng rira, lr funyy xrrc vg va
uvf nccbvagrq frnfba: nppbeqvat gb nyy gur evgrf bs vg, naq nppbeqvat
gb nyy gur prerzbavrf gurerbs, funyy lr xrrc vg.

9:4 Naq Zbfrf fcnxr hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung gurl fubhyq xrrc
gur cnffbire.

9:5 Naq gurl xrcg gur cnffbire ba gur sbhegrragu qnl bs gur svefg
zbagu ng rira va gur jvyqrearff bs Fvanv: nppbeqvat gb nyy gung gur
YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf, fb qvq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

9:6 Naq gurer jrer pregnva zra, jub jrer qrsvyrq ol gur qrnq obql bs n
zna, gung gurl pbhyq abg xrrc gur cnffbire ba gung qnl: naq gurl pnzr
orsber Zbfrf naq orsber Nneba ba gung qnl: 9:7 Naq gubfr zra fnvq hagb
uvz, Jr ner qrsvyrq ol gur qrnq obql bs n zna: jurersber ner jr xrcg
onpx, gung jr znl abg bssre na bssrevat bs gur YBEQ va uvf nccbvagrq
frnfba nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry?  9:8 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gurz,
Fgnaq fgvyy, naq V jvyy urne jung gur YBEQ jvyy pbzznaq pbapreavat
lbh.

9:9 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 9:10 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Vs nal zna bs lbh be bs lbhe cbfgrevgl
funyy or hapyrna ol ernfba bs n qrnq obql, be or va n wbhearl nsne
bss, lrg ur funyy xrrc gur cnffbire hagb gur YBEQ.

9:11 Gur sbhegrragu qnl bs gur frpbaq zbagu ng rira gurl funyy xrrc
vg, naq rng vg jvgu hayrnirarq oernq naq ovggre ureof.

9:12 Gurl funyy yrnir abar bs vg hagb gur zbeavat, abe oernx nal obar
bs vg: nppbeqvat gb nyy gur beqvanaprf bs gur cnffbire gurl funyy xrrc
vg.

9:13 Ohg gur zna gung vf pyrna, naq vf abg va n wbhearl, naq
sbeornergu gb xrrc gur cnffbire, rira gur fnzr fbhy funyy or phg bss
sebz nzbat uvf crbcyr: orpnhfr ur oebhtug abg gur bssrevat bs gur YBEQ
va uvf nccbvagrq frnfba, gung zna funyy orne uvf fva.

9:14 Naq vs n fgenatre funyy fbwbhea nzbat lbh, naq jvyy xrrc gur
cnffbire hagb gur YBEQ; nppbeqvat gb gur beqvanapr bs gur cnffbire,
naq nppbeqvat gb gur znaare gurerbs, fb funyy ur qb: lr funyy unir bar
beqvanapr, obgu sbe gur fgenatre, naq sbe uvz gung jnf obea va gur
ynaq.

9:15 Naq ba gur qnl gung gur gnoreanpyr jnf ernerq hc gur pybhq
pbirerq gur gnoreanpyr, anzryl, gur grag bs gur grfgvzbal: naq ng rira
gurer jnf hcba gur gnoreanpyr nf vg jrer gur nccrnenapr bs sver, hagvy
gur zbeavat.

9:16 Fb vg jnf nyjnl: gur pybhq pbirerq vg ol qnl, naq gur nccrnenapr
bs sver ol avtug.

9:17 Naq jura gur pybhq jnf gnxra hc sebz gur gnoreanpyr, gura nsgre
gung gur puvyqera bs Vfenry wbhearlrq: naq va gur cynpr jurer gur
pybhq nobqr, gurer gur puvyqera bs Vfenry cvgpurq gurve gragf.

9:18 Ng gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ gur puvyqera bs Vfenry wbhearlrq,
naq ng gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ gurl cvgpurq: nf ybat nf gur pybhq
nobqr hcba gur gnoreanpyr gurl erfgrq va gurve gragf.

9:19 Naq jura gur pybhq gneevrq ybat hcba gur gnoreanpyr znal qnlf,
gura gur puvyqera bs Vfenry xrcg gur punetr bs gur YBEQ, naq wbhearlrq
abg.

9:20 Naq fb vg jnf, jura gur pybhq jnf n srj qnlf hcba gur gnoreanpyr;
nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ gurl nobqr va gurve gragf,
naq nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ gurl wbhearlrq.

9:21 Naq fb vg jnf, jura gur pybhq nobqr sebz rira hagb gur zbeavat,
naq gung gur pybhq jnf gnxra hc va gur zbeavat, gura gurl wbhearlrq:
jurgure vg jnf ol qnl be ol avtug gung gur pybhq jnf gnxra hc, gurl
wbhearlrq.

9:22 Be jurgure vg jrer gjb qnlf, be n zbagu, be n lrne, gung gur
pybhq gneevrq hcba gur gnoreanpyr, erznvavat gurerba, gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry nobqr va gurve gragf, naq wbhearlrq abg: ohg jura vg jnf gnxra
hc, gurl wbhearlrq.

9:23 Ng gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ gurl erfgrq va gur gragf, naq ng
gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ gurl wbhearlrq: gurl xrcg gur punetr bs
gur YBEQ, ng gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf.

10:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 10:2 Znxr gurr gjb
gehzcrgf bs fvyire; bs n jubyr cvrpr funyg gubh znxr gurz: gung gubh
znlrfg hfr gurz sbe gur pnyyvat bs gur nffrzoyl, naq sbe gur
wbhearlvat bs gur pnzcf.

10:3 Naq jura gurl funyy oybj jvgu gurz, nyy gur nffrzoyl funyy
nffrzoyr gurzfryirf gb gurr ng gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba.

10:4 Naq vs gurl oybj ohg jvgu bar gehzcrg, gura gur cevaprf, juvpu
ner urnqf bs gur gubhfnaqf bs Vfenry, funyy tngure gurzfryirf hagb
gurr.

10:5 Jura lr oybj na nynez, gura gur pnzcf gung yvr ba gur rnfg cnegf
funyy tb sbejneq.

10:6 Jura lr oybj na nynez gur frpbaq gvzr, gura gur pnzcf gung yvr ba
gur fbhgu fvqr funyy gnxr gurve wbhearl: gurl funyy oybj na nynez sbe
gurve wbhearlf.

10:7 Ohg jura gur pbatertngvba vf gb or tngurerq gbtrgure, lr funyy
oybj, ohg lr funyy abg fbhaq na nynez.

10:8 Naq gur fbaf bs Nneba, gur cevrfgf, funyy oybj jvgu gur gehzcrgf;
naq gurl funyy or gb lbh sbe na beqvanapr sbe rire guebhtubhg lbhe
trarengvbaf.

10:9 Naq vs lr tb gb jne va lbhe ynaq ntnvafg gur rarzl gung
bccerffrgu lbh, gura lr funyy oybj na nynez jvgu gur gehzcrgf; naq lr
funyy or erzrzorerq orsber gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, naq lr funyy or fnirq
sebz lbhe rarzvrf.

10:10 Nyfb va gur qnl bs lbhe tynqarff, naq va lbhe fbyrza qnlf, naq
va gur ortvaavatf bs lbhe zbaguf, lr funyy oybj jvgu gur gehzcrgf bire
lbhe oheag bssrevatf, naq bire gur fnpevsvprf bs lbhe crnpr bssrevatf;
gung gurl znl or gb lbh sbe n zrzbevny orsber lbhe Tbq: V nz gur YBEQ
lbhe Tbq.

10:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur gjragvrgu qnl bs gur frpbaq zbagu, va
gur frpbaq lrne, gung gur pybhq jnf gnxra hc sebz bss gur gnoreanpyr
bs gur grfgvzbal.

10:12 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gbbx gurve wbhearlf bhg bs gur
jvyqrearff bs Fvanv; naq gur pybhq erfgrq va gur jvyqrearff bs Cnena.

10:13 Naq gurl svefg gbbx gurve wbhearl nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag
bs gur YBEQ ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf.

10:14 Va gur svefg cynpr jrag gur fgnaqneq bs gur pnzc bs gur puvyqera
bs Whqnu nppbeqvat gb gurve nezvrf: naq bire uvf ubfg jnf Anufuba gur
fba bs Nzzvanqno.

10:15 Naq bire gur ubfg bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Vffnpune jnf
Argunarry gur fba bs Mhne.

10:16 Naq bire gur ubfg bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Mrohyha jnf
Ryvno gur fba bs Uryba.

10:17 Naq gur gnoreanpyr jnf gnxra qbja; naq gur fbaf bs Trefuba naq
gur fbaf bs Zrenev frg sbejneq, ornevat gur gnoreanpyr.

10:18 Naq gur fgnaqneq bs gur pnzc bs Erhora frg sbejneq nppbeqvat gb
gurve nezvrf: naq bire uvf ubfg jnf Ryvmhe gur fba bs Furqrhe.

10:19 Naq bire gur ubfg bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Fvzrba jnf
Furyhzvry gur fba bs Mhevfunqqnv.

10:20 Naq bire gur ubfg bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Tnq jnf
Ryvnfncu gur fba bs Qrhry.

10:21 Naq gur Xbunguvgrf frg sbejneq, ornevat gur fnapghnel: naq gur
bgure qvq frg hc gur gnoreanpyr ntnvafg gurl pnzr.

10:22 Naq gur fgnaqneq bs gur pnzc bs gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz frg
sbejneq nppbeqvat gb gurve nezvrf: naq bire uvf ubfg jnf Ryvfunzn gur
fba bs Nzzvuhq.

10:23 Naq bire gur ubfg bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Znanffru jnf
Tnznyvry gur fba bs Crqnumhe.

10:24 Naq bire gur ubfg bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva jnf
Novqna gur fba bs Tvqrbav.

10:25 Naq gur fgnaqneq bs gur pnzc bs gur puvyqera bs Qna frg sbejneq,
juvpu jnf gur ererjneq bs nyy gur pnzcf guebhtubhg gurve ubfgf: naq
bire uvf ubfg jnf Nuvrmre gur fba bs Nzzvfunqqnv.

10:26 Naq bire gur ubfg bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Nfure jnf
Cntvry gur fba bs Bpena.

10:27 Naq bire gur ubfg bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Ancugnyv jnf
Nuven gur fba bs Rana.

10:28 Guhf jrer gur wbhearlvatf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry nppbeqvat gb
gurve nezvrf, jura gurl frg sbejneq.

10:29 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb Ubono, gur fba bs Enthry gur Zvqvnavgr,
Zbfrf' sngure va ynj, Jr ner wbhearlvat hagb gur cynpr bs juvpu gur
YBEQ fnvq, V jvyy tvir vg lbh: pbzr gubh jvgu hf, naq jr jvyy qb gurr
tbbq: sbe gur YBEQ ungu fcbxra tbbq pbapreavat Vfenry.

10:30 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, V jvyy abg tb; ohg V jvyy qrcneg gb zvar
bja ynaq, naq gb zl xvaqerq.

10:31 Naq ur fnvq, Yrnir hf abg, V cenl gurr; sbenfzhpu nf gubh
xabjrfg ubj jr ner gb rapnzc va gur jvyqrearff, naq gubh znlrfg or gb
hf vafgrnq bs rlrf.

10:32 Naq vg funyy or, vs gubh tb jvgu hf, lrn, vg funyy or, gung jung
tbbqarff gur YBEQ funyy qb hagb hf, gur fnzr jvyy jr qb hagb gurr.

10:33 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz gur zbhag bs gur YBEQ guerr qnlf'
wbhearl: naq gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ jrag orsber gurz va
gur guerr qnlf' wbhearl, gb frnepu bhg n erfgvat cynpr sbe gurz.

10:34 Naq gur pybhq bs gur YBEQ jnf hcba gurz ol qnl, jura gurl jrag
bhg bs gur pnzc.

10:35 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur nex frg sbejneq, gung Zbfrf fnvq,
Evfr hc, YBEQ, naq yrg guvar rarzvrf or fpnggrerq; naq yrg gurz gung
ungr gurr syrr orsber gurr.

10:36 Naq jura vg erfgrq, ur fnvq, Erghea, B YBEQ, hagb gur znal
gubhfnaqf bs Vfenry.

11:1 Naq jura gur crbcyr pbzcynvarq, vg qvfcyrnfrq gur YBEQ: naq gur
YBEQ urneq vg; naq uvf natre jnf xvaqyrq; naq gur sver bs gur YBEQ
oheag nzbat gurz, naq pbafhzrq gurz gung jrer va gur hggrezbfg cnegf
bs gur pnzc.

11:2 Naq gur crbcyr pevrq hagb Zbfrf; naq jura Zbfrf cenlrq hagb gur
YBEQ, gur sver jnf dhrapurq.

11:3 Naq ur pnyyrq gur anzr bs gur cynpr Gnorenu: orpnhfr gur sver bs
gur YBEQ oheag nzbat gurz.

11:4 Naq gur zvkg zhygvghqr gung jnf nzbat gurz sryy n yhfgvat: naq
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry nyfb jrcg ntnva, naq fnvq, Jub funyy tvir hf
syrfu gb rng?  11:5 Jr erzrzore gur svfu, juvpu jr qvq rng va Rtlcg
serryl; gur phphzoref, naq gur zrybaf, naq gur yrrxf, naq gur bavbaf,
naq gur tneyvpx: 11:6 Ohg abj bhe fbhy vf qevrq njnl: gurer vf abguvat
ng nyy, orfvqr guvf znaan, orsber bhe rlrf.

11:7 Naq gur znaan jnf nf pbevnaqre frrq, naq gur pbybhe gurerbs nf
gur pbybhe bs oqryyvhz.

11:8 Naq gur crbcyr jrag nobhg, naq tngurerq vg, naq tebhaq vg va
zvyyf, be orng vg va n zbegne, naq onxrq vg va cnaf, naq znqr pnxrf bs
vg: naq gur gnfgr bs vg jnf nf gur gnfgr bs serfu bvy.

11:9 Naq jura gur qrj sryy hcba gur pnzc va gur avtug, gur znaan sryy
hcba vg.

11:10 Gura Zbfrf urneq gur crbcyr jrrc guebhtubhg gurve snzvyvrf,
rirel zna va gur qbbe bs uvf grag: naq gur natre bs gur YBEQ jnf
xvaqyrq terngyl; Zbfrf nyfb jnf qvfcyrnfrq.

11:11 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gur YBEQ, Jurersber unfg gubh nssyvpgrq gul
freinag? naq jurersber unir V abg sbhaq snibhe va gul fvtug, gung gubh
ynlrfg gur oheqra bs nyy guvf crbcyr hcba zr?  11:12 Unir V pbaprvirq
nyy guvf crbcyr? unir V ortbggra gurz, gung gubh fubhyqrfg fnl hagb
zr, Pneel gurz va gul obfbz, nf n ahefvat sngure ornergu gur fhpxvat
puvyq, hagb gur ynaq juvpu gubh fjnerfg hagb gurve snguref?  11:13
Jurapr fubhyq V unir syrfu gb tvir hagb nyy guvf crbcyr? sbe gurl jrrc
hagb zr, fnlvat, Tvir hf syrfu, gung jr znl rng.

11:14 V nz abg noyr gb orne nyy guvf crbcyr nybar, orpnhfr vg vf gbb
urnil sbe zr.

11:15 Naq vs gubh qrny guhf jvgu zr, xvyy zr, V cenl gurr, bhg bs
unaq, vs V unir sbhaq snibhe va gul fvtug; naq yrg zr abg frr zl
jergpurqarff.

11:16 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Tngure hagb zr friragl zra bs gur
ryqref bs Vfenry, jubz gubh xabjrfg gb or gur ryqref bs gur crbcyr,
naq bssvpref bire gurz; naq oevat gurz hagb gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, gung gurl znl fgnaq gurer jvgu gurr.

11:17 Naq V jvyy pbzr qbja naq gnyx jvgu gurr gurer: naq V jvyy gnxr
bs gur fcvevg juvpu vf hcba gurr, naq jvyy chg vg hcba gurz; naq gurl
funyy orne gur oheqra bs gur crbcyr jvgu gurr, gung gubh orne vg abg
gulfrys nybar.

11:18 Naq fnl gubh hagb gur crbcyr, Fnapgvsl lbhefryirf ntnvafg gb
zbeebj, naq lr funyy rng syrfu: sbe lr unir jrcg va gur rnef bs gur
YBEQ, fnlvat, Jub funyy tvir hf syrfu gb rng? sbe vg jnf jryy jvgu hf
va Rtlcg: gurersber gur YBEQ jvyy tvir lbh syrfu, naq lr funyy rng.

11:19 Lr funyy abg rng bar qnl, abe gjb qnlf, abe svir qnlf, arvgure
gra qnlf, abe gjragl qnlf; 11:20 Ohg rira n jubyr zbagu, hagvy vg pbzr
bhg ng lbhe abfgevyf, naq vg or ybngufbzr hagb lbh: orpnhfr gung lr
unir qrfcvfrq gur YBEQ juvpu vf nzbat lbh, naq unir jrcg orsber uvz,
fnlvat, Jul pnzr jr sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg?  11:21 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, Gur
crbcyr, nzbat jubz V nz, ner fvk uhaqerq gubhfnaq sbbgzra; naq gubh
unfg fnvq, V jvyy tvir gurz syrfu, gung gurl znl rng n jubyr zbagu.

11:22 Funyy gur sybpxf naq gur ureqf or fynva sbe gurz, gb fhssvpr
gurz?  be funyy nyy gur svfu bs gur frn or tngurerq gbtrgure sbe gurz,
gb fhssvpr gurz?  11:23 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Vf gur YBEQ'f
unaq jnkrq fubeg? gubh funyg frr abj jurgure zl jbeq funyy pbzr gb
cnff hagb gurr be abg.

11:24 Naq Zbfrf jrag bhg, naq gbyq gur crbcyr gur jbeqf bs gur YBEQ,
naq tngurerq gur friragl zra bs gur ryqref bs gur crbcyr, naq frg gurz
ebhaq nobhg gur gnoreanpyr.

11:25 Naq gur YBEQ pnzr qbja va n pybhq, naq fcnxr hagb uvz, naq gbbx
bs gur fcvevg gung jnf hcba uvz, naq tnir vg hagb gur friragl ryqref:
naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung, jura gur fcvevg erfgrq hcba gurz, gurl
cebcurfvrq, naq qvq abg prnfr.

11:26 Ohg gurer erznvarq gjb bs gur zra va gur pnzc, gur anzr bs gur
bar jnf Ryqnq, naq gur anzr bs gur bgure Zrqnq: naq gur fcvevg erfgrq
hcba gurz; naq gurl jrer bs gurz gung jrer jevggra, ohg jrag abg bhg
hagb gur gnoreanpyr: naq gurl cebcurfvrq va gur pnzc.

11:27 Naq gurer ena n lbhat zna, naq gbyq Zbfrf, naq fnvq, Ryqnq naq
Zrqnq qb cebcurfl va gur pnzc.

11:28 Naq Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha, gur freinag bs Zbfrf, bar bs uvf
lbhat zra, nafjrerq naq fnvq, Zl ybeq Zbfrf, sbeovq gurz.

11:29 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb uvz, Raivrfg gubh sbe zl fnxr? jbhyq Tbq
gung nyy gur YBEQ'f crbcyr jrer cebcurgf, naq gung gur YBEQ jbhyq chg
uvf fcvevg hcba gurz!  11:30 Naq Zbfrf tng uvz vagb gur pnzc, ur naq
gur ryqref bs Vfenry.

11:31 Naq gurer jrag sbegu n jvaq sebz gur YBEQ, naq oebhtug dhnvyf
sebz gur frn, naq yrg gurz snyy ol gur pnzc, nf vg jrer n qnl'f
wbhearl ba guvf fvqr, naq nf vg jrer n qnl'f wbhearl ba gur bgure
fvqr, ebhaq nobhg gur pnzc, naq nf vg jrer gjb phovgf uvtu hcba gur
snpr bs gur rnegu.

11:32 Naq gur crbcyr fgbbq hc nyy gung qnl, naq nyy gung avtug, naq
nyy gur arkg qnl, naq gurl tngurerq gur dhnvyf: ur gung tngurerq yrnfg
tngurerq gra ubzref: naq gurl fcernq gurz nyy noebnq sbe gurzfryirf
ebhaq nobhg gur pnzc.

11:33 Naq juvyr gur syrfu jnf lrg orgjrra gurve grrgu, rer vg jnf
purjrq, gur jengu bs gur YBEQ jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg gur crbcyr, naq gur
YBEQ fzbgr gur crbcyr jvgu n irel terng cynthr.

11:34 Naq ur pnyyrq gur anzr bs gung cynpr Xvoebguunggnninu: orpnhfr
gurer gurl ohevrq gur crbcyr gung yhfgrq.

11:35 Naq gur crbcyr wbhearlrq sebz Xvoebguunggnninu hagb Unmrebgu;
naq nobqr ng Unmrebgu.

12:1 Naq Zvevnz naq Nneba fcnxr ntnvafg Zbfrf orpnhfr bs gur Rguvbcvna
jbzna jubz ur unq zneevrq: sbe ur unq zneevrq na Rguvbcvna jbzna.

12:2 Naq gurl fnvq, Ungu gur YBEQ vaqrrq fcbxra bayl ol Zbfrf? ungu ur
abg fcbxra nyfb ol hf? Naq gur YBEQ urneq vg.

12:3 (Abj gur zna Zbfrf jnf irel zrrx, nobir nyy gur zra juvpu jrer
hcba gur snpr bs gur rnegu.)  12:4 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr fhqqrayl hagb
Zbfrf, naq hagb Nneba, naq hagb Zvevnz, Pbzr bhg lr guerr hagb gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba. Naq gurl guerr pnzr bhg.

12:5 Naq gur YBEQ pnzr qbja va gur cvyyne bs gur pybhq, naq fgbbq va
gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr, naq pnyyrq Nneba naq Zvevnz: naq gurl obgu
pnzr sbegu.

12:6 Naq ur fnvq, Urne abj zl jbeqf: Vs gurer or n cebcurg nzbat lbh,
V gur YBEQ jvyy znxr zlfrys xabja hagb uvz va n ivfvba, naq jvyy fcrnx
hagb uvz va n qernz.

12:7 Zl freinag Zbfrf vf abg fb, jub vf snvgushy va nyy zvar ubhfr.

12:8 Jvgu uvz jvyy V fcrnx zbhgu gb zbhgu, rira nccneragyl, naq abg va
qnex fcrrpurf; naq gur fvzvyvghqr bs gur YBEQ funyy ur orubyq:
jurersber gura jrer lr abg nsenvq gb fcrnx ntnvafg zl freinag Zbfrf?
12:9 Naq gur natre bs gur YBEQ jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg gurz; naq ur
qrcnegrq.

12:10 Naq gur pybhq qrcnegrq sebz bss gur gnoreanpyr; naq, orubyq,
Zvevnz orpnzr yrcebhf, juvgr nf fabj: naq Nneba ybbxrq hcba Zvevnz,
naq, orubyq, fur jnf yrcebhf.

12:11 Naq Nneba fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Nynf, zl ybeq, V orfrrpu gurr, ynl
abg gur fva hcba hf, jurerva jr unir qbar sbbyvfuyl, naq jurerva jr
unir fvaarq.

12:12 Yrg ure abg or nf bar qrnq, bs jubz gur syrfu vf unys pbafhzrq
jura ur pbzrgu bhg bs uvf zbgure'f jbzo.

12:13 Naq Zbfrf pevrq hagb gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Urny ure abj, B Tbq, V
orfrrpu gurr.

12:14 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Vs ure sngure unq ohg fcvg va ure
snpr, fubhyq fur abg or nfunzrq frira qnlf? yrg ure or fuhg bhg sebz
gur pnzc frira qnlf, naq nsgre gung yrg ure or erprvirq va ntnva.

12:15 Naq Zvevnz jnf fuhg bhg sebz gur pnzc frira qnlf: naq gur crbcyr
wbhearlrq abg gvyy Zvevnz jnf oebhtug va ntnva.

12:16 Naq nsgrejneq gur crbcyr erzbirq sebz Unmrebgu, naq cvgpurq va
gur jvyqrearff bs Cnena.

13:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 13:2 Fraq gubh zra, gung
gurl znl frnepu gur ynaq bs Pnanna, juvpu V tvir hagb gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry: bs rirel gevor bs gurve snguref funyy lr fraq n zna, rirel bar
n ehyre nzbat gurz.

13:3 Naq Zbfrf ol gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ frag gurz sebz gur
jvyqrearff bs Cnena: nyy gubfr zra jrer urnqf bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry.

13:4 Naq gurfr jrer gurve anzrf: bs gur gevor bs Erhora, Funzzhn gur
fba bs Mnpphe.

13:5 Bs gur gevor bs Fvzrba, Funcung gur fba bs Ubev.

13:6 Bs gur gevor bs Whqnu, Pnyro gur fba bs Wrcuhaaru.

13:7 Bs gur gevor bs Vffnpune, Vtny gur fba bs Wbfrcu.

13:8 Bs gur gevor bs Rcuenvz, Bfurn gur fba bs Aha.

13:9 Bs gur gevor bs Orawnzva, Cnygv gur fba bs Encuh.

13:10 Bs gur gevor bs Mrohyha, Tnqqvry gur fba bs Fbqv.

13:11 Bs gur gevor bs Wbfrcu, anzryl, bs gur gevor bs Znanffru, Tnqqv
gur fba bs Fhfv.

13:12 Bs gur gevor bs Qna, Nzzvry gur fba bs Trznyyv.

13:13 Bs gur gevor bs Nfure, Frguhe gur fba bs Zvpunry.

13:14 Bs gur gevor bs Ancugnyv, Anuov gur fba bs Ibcufv.

13:15 Bs gur gevor bs Tnq, Trhry gur fba bs Znpuv.

13:16 Gurfr ner gur anzrf bs gur zra juvpu Zbfrf frag gb fcl bhg gur
ynaq.

Naq Zbfrf pnyyrq Bfurn gur fba bs Aha Wrubfuhn.

13:17 Naq Zbfrf frag gurz gb fcl bhg gur ynaq bs Pnanna, naq fnvq hagb
gurz, Trg lbh hc guvf jnl fbhgujneq, naq tb hc vagb gur zbhagnva:
13:18 Naq frr gur ynaq, jung vg vf, naq gur crbcyr gung qjryyrgu
gurerva, jurgure gurl or fgebat be jrnx, srj be znal; 13:19 Naq jung
gur ynaq vf gung gurl qjryy va, jurgure vg or tbbq be onq; naq jung
pvgvrf gurl or gung gurl qjryy va, jurgure va gragf, be va fgebat
ubyqf; 13:20 Naq jung gur ynaq vf, jurgure vg or sng be yrna, jurgure
gurer or jbbq gurerva, be abg. Naq or lr bs tbbq pbhentr, naq oevat bs
gur sehvg bs gur ynaq. Abj gur gvzr jnf gur gvzr bs gur svefgevcr
tencrf.

13:21 Fb gurl jrag hc, naq frnepurq gur ynaq sebz gur jvyqrearff bs
Mva hagb Erubo, nf zra pbzr gb Unzngu.

13:22 Naq gurl nfpraqrq ol gur fbhgu, naq pnzr hagb Uroeba; jurer
Nuvzna, Furfunv, naq Gnyznv, gur puvyqera bs Nanx, jrer. (Abj Uroeba
jnf ohvyg frira lrnef orsber Mbna va Rtlcg.)  13:23 Naq gurl pnzr hagb
gur oebbx bs Rfupby, naq phg qbja sebz gurapr n oenapu jvgu bar
pyhfgre bs tencrf, naq gurl oner vg orgjrra gjb hcba n fgnss; naq gurl
oebhtug bs gur cbzrtenangrf, naq bs gur svtf.

13:24 Gur cynpr jnf pnyyrq gur oebbx Rfupby, orpnhfr bs gur pyhfgre bs
tencrf juvpu gur puvyqera bs Vfenry phg qbja sebz gurapr.

13:25 Naq gurl erghearq sebz frnepuvat bs gur ynaq nsgre sbegl qnlf.

13:26 Naq gurl jrag naq pnzr gb Zbfrf, naq gb Nneba, naq gb nyy gur
pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, hagb gur jvyqrearff bs Cnena,
gb Xnqrfu; naq oebhtug onpx jbeq hagb gurz, naq hagb nyy gur
pbatertngvba, naq furjrq gurz gur sehvg bs gur ynaq.

13:27 Naq gurl gbyq uvz, naq fnvq, Jr pnzr hagb gur ynaq juvgure gubh
fragrfg hf, naq fheryl vg sybjrgu jvgu zvyx naq ubarl; naq guvf vf gur
sehvg bs vg.

13:28 Arireguryrff gur crbcyr or fgebat gung qjryy va gur ynaq, naq
gur pvgvrf ner jnyyrq, naq irel terng: naq zberbire jr fnj gur
puvyqera bs Nanx gurer.

13:29 Gur Nznyrxvgrf qjryy va gur ynaq bs gur fbhgu: naq gur Uvggvgrf,
naq gur Wrohfvgrf, naq gur Nzbevgrf, qjryy va gur zbhagnvaf: naq gur
Pnannavgrf qjryy ol gur frn, naq ol gur pbnfg bs Wbeqna.

13:30 Naq Pnyro fgvyyrq gur crbcyr orsber Zbfrf, naq fnvq, Yrg hf tb
hc ng bapr, naq cbffrff vg; sbe jr ner jryy noyr gb birepbzr vg.

13:31 Ohg gur zra gung jrag hc jvgu uvz fnvq, Jr or abg noyr gb tb hc
ntnvafg gur crbcyr; sbe gurl ner fgebatre guna jr.

13:32 Naq gurl oebhtug hc na rivy ercbeg bs gur ynaq juvpu gurl unq
frnepurq hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Gur ynaq, guebhtu juvpu
jr unir tbar gb frnepu vg, vf n ynaq gung rngrgu hc gur vaunovgnagf
gurerbs; naq nyy gur crbcyr gung jr fnj va vg ner zra bs n terng
fgngher.

13:33 Naq gurer jr fnj gur tvnagf, gur fbaf bs Nanx, juvpu pbzr bs gur
tvnagf: naq jr jrer va bhe bja fvtug nf tenffubccref, naq fb jr jrer
va gurve fvtug.

14:1 Naq nyy gur pbatertngvba yvsgrq hc gurve ibvpr, naq pevrq; naq
gur crbcyr jrcg gung avtug.

14:2 Naq nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry zhezherq ntnvafg Zbfrf naq ntnvafg
Nneba: naq gur jubyr pbatertngvba fnvq hagb gurz, Jbhyq Tbq gung jr
unq qvrq va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg! be jbhyq Tbq jr unq qvrq va guvf
jvyqrearff!  14:3 Naq jurersber ungu gur YBEQ oebhtug hf hagb guvf
ynaq, gb snyy ol gur fjbeq, gung bhe jvirf naq bhe puvyqera fubhyq or
n cerl? jrer vg abg orggre sbe hf gb erghea vagb Rtlcg?  14:4 Naq gurl
fnvq bar gb nabgure, Yrg hf znxr n pncgnva, naq yrg hf erghea vagb
Rtlcg.

14:5 Gura Zbfrf naq Nneba sryy ba gurve snprf orsber nyy gur nffrzoyl
bs gur pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

14:6 Naq Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha, naq Pnyro gur fba bs Wrcuhaaru, juvpu
jrer bs gurz gung frnepurq gur ynaq, erag gurve pybgurf: 14:7 Naq gurl
fcnxr hagb nyy gur pbzcnal bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Gur
ynaq, juvpu jr cnffrq guebhtu gb frnepu vg, vf na rkprrqvat tbbq ynaq.

14:8 Vs gur YBEQ qryvtug va hf, gura ur jvyy oevat hf vagb guvf ynaq,
naq tvir vg hf; n ynaq juvpu sybjrgu jvgu zvyx naq ubarl.

14:9 Bayl erory abg lr ntnvafg gur YBEQ, arvgure srne lr gur crbcyr bs
gur ynaq; sbe gurl ner oernq sbe hf: gurve qrsrapr vf qrcnegrq sebz
gurz, naq gur YBEQ vf jvgu hf: srne gurz abg.

14:10 Ohg nyy gur pbatertngvba onqr fgbar gurz jvgu fgbarf. Naq gur
tybel bs gur YBEQ nccrnerq va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba
orsber nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

14:11 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Ubj ybat jvyy guvf crbcyr cebibxr
zr?  naq ubj ybat jvyy vg or rer gurl oryvrir zr, sbe nyy gur fvtaf
juvpu V unir furjrq nzbat gurz?  14:12 V jvyy fzvgr gurz jvgu gur
crfgvyrapr, naq qvfvaurevg gurz, naq jvyy znxr bs gurr n terngre
angvba naq zvtugvre guna gurl.

14:13 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gur YBEQ, Gura gur Rtlcgvnaf funyy urne vg,
(sbe gubh oebhtugrfg hc guvf crbcyr va gul zvtug sebz nzbat gurz;)
14:14 Naq gurl jvyy gryy vg gb gur vaunovgnagf bs guvf ynaq: sbe gurl
unir urneq gung gubh YBEQ neg nzbat guvf crbcyr, gung gubh YBEQ neg
frra snpr gb snpr, naq gung gul pybhq fgnaqrgu bire gurz, naq gung
gubh tbrfg orsber gurz, ol qnl gvzr va n cvyyne bs n pybhq, naq va n
cvyyne bs sver ol avtug.

14:15 Abj vs gubh funyg xvyy nyy guvf crbcyr nf bar zna, gura gur
angvbaf juvpu unir urneq gur snzr bs gurr jvyy fcrnx, fnlvat, 14:16
Orpnhfr gur YBEQ jnf abg noyr gb oevat guvf crbcyr vagb gur ynaq juvpu
ur fjner hagb gurz, gurersber ur ungu fynva gurz va gur jvyqrearff.

14:17 Naq abj, V orfrrpu gurr, yrg gur cbjre bs zl YBEQ or terng,
nppbeqvat nf gubh unfg fcbxra, fnlvat, 14:18 Gur YBEQ vf
ybatfhssrevat, naq bs terng zrepl, sbetvivat vavdhvgl naq
genafterffvba, naq ol ab zrnaf pyrnevat gur thvygl, ivfvgvat gur
vavdhvgl bs gur snguref hcba gur puvyqera hagb gur guveq naq sbhegu
trarengvba.

14:19 Cneqba, V orfrrpu gurr, gur vavdhvgl bs guvf crbcyr nppbeqvat
hagb gur terngarff bs gul zrepl, naq nf gubh unfg sbetvira guvf
crbcyr, sebz Rtlcg rira hagvy abj.

14:20 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, V unir cneqbarq nppbeqvat gb gul jbeq: 14:21
Ohg nf gehyl nf V yvir, nyy gur rnegu funyy or svyyrq jvgu gur tybel
bs gur YBEQ.

14:22 Orpnhfr nyy gubfr zra juvpu unir frra zl tybel, naq zl zvenpyrf,
juvpu V qvq va Rtlcg naq va gur jvyqrearff, naq unir grzcgrq zr abj
gurfr gra gvzrf, naq unir abg urnexrarq gb zl ibvpr; 14:23 Fheryl gurl
funyy abg frr gur ynaq juvpu V fjner hagb gurve snguref, arvgure funyy
nal bs gurz gung cebibxrq zr frr vg: 14:24 Ohg zl freinag Pnyro,
orpnhfr ur unq nabgure fcvevg jvgu uvz, naq ungu sbyybjrq zr shyyl,
uvz jvyy V oevat vagb gur ynaq jurervagb ur jrag; naq uvf frrq funyy
cbffrff vg.

14:25 (Abj gur Nznyrxvgrf naq gur Pnannavgrf qjryg va gur inyyrl.)
Gbzbeebj ghea lbh, naq trg lbh vagb gur jvyqrearff ol gur jnl bs gur
Erq frn.

14:26 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq hagb Nneba, fnlvat, 14:27 Ubj
ybat funyy V orne jvgu guvf rivy pbatertngvba, juvpu zhezhe ntnvafg
zr? V unir urneq gur zhezhevatf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, juvpu gurl
zhezhe ntnvafg zr.

14:28 Fnl hagb gurz, Nf gehyl nf V yvir, fnvgu gur YBEQ, nf lr unir
fcbxra va zvar rnef, fb jvyy V qb gb lbh: 14:29 Lbhe pnepnfrf funyy
snyy va guvf jvyqrearff; naq nyy gung jrer ahzorerq bs lbh, nppbeqvat
gb lbhe jubyr ahzore, sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq juvpu unir
zhezherq ntnvafg zr.

14:30 Qbhogyrff lr funyy abg pbzr vagb gur ynaq, pbapreavat juvpu V
fjner gb znxr lbh qjryy gurerva, fnir Pnyro gur fba bs Wrcuhaaru, naq
Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha.

14:31 Ohg lbhe yvggyr barf, juvpu lr fnvq fubhyq or n cerl, gurz jvyy
V oevat va, naq gurl funyy xabj gur ynaq juvpu lr unir qrfcvfrq.

14:32 Ohg nf sbe lbh, lbhe pnepnfrf, gurl funyy snyy va guvf
jvyqrearff.

14:33 Naq lbhe puvyqera funyy jnaqre va gur jvyqrearff sbegl lrnef,
naq orne lbhe juberqbzf, hagvy lbhe pnepnfrf or jnfgrq va gur
jvyqrearff.

14:34 Nsgre gur ahzore bs gur qnlf va juvpu lr frnepurq gur ynaq, rira
sbegl qnlf, rnpu qnl sbe n lrne, funyy lr orne lbhe vavdhvgvrf, rira
sbegl lrnef, naq lr funyy xabj zl oernpu bs cebzvfr.

14:35 V gur YBEQ unir fnvq, V jvyy fheryl qb vg hagb nyy guvf rivy
pbatertngvba, gung ner tngurerq gbtrgure ntnvafg zr: va guvf
jvyqrearff gurl funyy or pbafhzrq, naq gurer gurl funyy qvr.

14:36 Naq gur zra, juvpu Zbfrf frag gb frnepu gur ynaq, jub erghearq,
naq znqr nyy gur pbatertngvba gb zhezhe ntnvafg uvz, ol oevatvat hc n
fynaqre hcba gur ynaq, 14:37 Rira gubfr zra gung qvq oevat hc gur rivy
ercbeg hcba gur ynaq, qvrq ol gur cynthr orsber gur YBEQ.

14:38 Ohg Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha, naq Pnyro gur fba bs Wrcuhaaru, juvpu
jrer bs gur zra gung jrag gb frnepu gur ynaq, yvirq fgvyy.

14:39 Naq Zbfrf gbyq gurfr fnlvatf hagb nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry:
naq gur crbcyr zbhearq terngyl.

14:40 Naq gurl ebfr hc rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq tng gurz hc vagb gur
gbc bs gur zbhagnva, fnlvat, Yb, jr or urer, naq jvyy tb hc hagb gur
cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ ungu cebzvfrq: sbe jr unir fvaarq.

14:41 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, Jurersber abj qb lr genafterff gur pbzznaqzrag
bs gur YBEQ? ohg vg funyy abg cebfcre.

14:42 Tb abg hc, sbe gur YBEQ vf abg nzbat lbh; gung lr or abg fzvggra
orsber lbhe rarzvrf.

14:43 Sbe gur Nznyrxvgrf naq gur Pnannavgrf ner gurer orsber lbh, naq
lr funyy snyy ol gur fjbeq: orpnhfr lr ner ghearq njnl sebz gur YBEQ,
gurersber gur YBEQ jvyy abg or jvgu lbh.

14:44 Ohg gurl cerfhzrq gb tb hc hagb gur uvyy gbc: arireguryrff gur
nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ, naq Zbfrf, qrcnegrq abg bhg bs gur
pnzc.

14:45 Gura gur Nznyrxvgrf pnzr qbja, naq gur Pnannavgrf juvpu qjryg va
gung uvyy, naq fzbgr gurz, naq qvfpbzsvgrq gurz, rira hagb Ubeznu.

15:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 15:2 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Jura lr or pbzr vagb gur ynaq
bs lbhe unovgngvbaf, juvpu V tvir hagb lbh, 15:3 Naq jvyy znxr na
bssrevat ol sver hagb gur YBEQ, n oheag bssrevat, be n fnpevsvpr va
cresbezvat n ibj, be va n serrjvyy bssrevat, be va lbhe fbyrza srnfgf,
gb znxr n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ, bs gur ureq be bs gur sybpx:
15:4 Gura funyy ur gung bssrergu uvf bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ oevat n
zrng bssrevat bs n gragu qrny bs sybhe zvatyrq jvgu gur sbhegu cneg bs
na uva bs bvy.

15:5 Naq gur sbhegu cneg bs na uva bs jvar sbe n qevax bssrevat funyg
gubh cercner jvgu gur oheag bssrevat be fnpevsvpr, sbe bar ynzo.

15:6 Be sbe n enz, gubh funyg cercner sbe n zrng bssrevat gjb gragu
qrnyf bs sybhe zvatyrq jvgu gur guveq cneg bs na uva bs bvy.

15:7 Naq sbe n qevax bssrevat gubh funyg bssre gur guveq cneg bs na
uva bs jvar, sbe n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ.

15:8 Naq jura gubh cercnerfg n ohyybpx sbe n oheag bssrevat, be sbe n
fnpevsvpr va cresbezvat n ibj, be crnpr bssrevatf hagb gur YBEQ: 15:9
Gura funyy ur oevat jvgu n ohyybpx n zrng bssrevat bs guerr gragu
qrnyf bs sybhe zvatyrq jvgu unys na uva bs bvy.

15:10 Naq gubh funyg oevat sbe n qevax bssrevat unys na uva bs jvar,
sbe na bssrevat znqr ol sver, bs n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ.

15:11 Guhf funyy vg or qbar sbe bar ohyybpx, be sbe bar enz, be sbe n
ynzo, be n xvq.

15:12 Nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore gung lr funyy cercner, fb funyy lr qb gb
rirel bar nppbeqvat gb gurve ahzore.

15:13 Nyy gung ner obea bs gur pbhagel funyy qb gurfr guvatf nsgre
guvf znaare, va bssrevat na bssrevat znqr ol sver, bs n fjrrg fnibhe
hagb gur YBEQ.

15:14 Naq vs n fgenatre fbwbhea jvgu lbh, be jubfbrire or nzbat lbh va
lbhe trarengvbaf, naq jvyy bssre na bssrevat znqr ol sver, bs n fjrrg
fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ; nf lr qb, fb ur funyy qb.

15:15 Bar beqvanapr funyy or obgu sbe lbh bs gur pbatertngvba, naq
nyfb sbe gur fgenatre gung fbwbheargu jvgu lbh, na beqvanapr sbe rire
va lbhe trarengvbaf: nf lr ner, fb funyy gur fgenatre or orsber gur
YBEQ.

15:16 Bar ynj naq bar znaare funyy or sbe lbh, naq sbe gur fgenatre
gung fbwbheargu jvgu lbh.

15:17 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 15:18 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Jura lr pbzr vagb gur ynaq
juvgure V oevat lbh, 15:19 Gura vg funyy or, gung, jura lr rng bs gur
oernq bs gur ynaq, lr funyy bssre hc na urnir bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ.

15:20 Lr funyy bssre hc n pnxr bs gur svefg bs lbhe qbhtu sbe na urnir
bssrevat: nf lr qb gur urnir bssrevat bs gur guerfuvatsybbe, fb funyy
lr urnir vg.

15:21 Bs gur svefg bs lbhe qbhtu lr funyy tvir hagb gur YBEQ na urnir
bssrevat va lbhe trarengvbaf.

15:22 Naq vs lr unir reerq, naq abg bofreirq nyy gurfr pbzznaqzragf,
juvpu gur YBEQ ungu fcbxra hagb Zbfrf, 15:23 Rira nyy gung gur YBEQ
ungu pbzznaqrq lbh ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf, sebz gur qnl gung gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq Zbfrf, naq uraprsbejneq nzbat lbhe trarengvbaf; 15:24 Gura
vg funyy or, vs bhtug or pbzzvggrq ol vtabenapr jvgubhg gur xabjyrqtr
bs gur pbatertngvba, gung nyy gur pbatertngvba funyy bssre bar lbhat
ohyybpx sbe n oheag bssrevat, sbe n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ, jvgu
uvf zrng bssrevat, naq uvf qevax bssrevat, nppbeqvat gb gur znaare,
naq bar xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat.

15:25 Naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe nyy gur pbatertngvba
bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq vg funyy or sbetvira gurz; sbe vg vf
vtabenapr: naq gurl funyy oevat gurve bssrevat, n fnpevsvpr znqr ol
sver hagb gur YBEQ, naq gurve fva bssrevat orsber gur YBEQ, sbe gurve
vtabenapr: 15:26 Naq vg funyy or sbetvira nyy gur pbatertngvba bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq gur fgenatre gung fbwbheargu nzbat gurz;
frrvat nyy gur crbcyr jrer va vtabenapr.

15:27 Naq vs nal fbhy fva guebhtu vtabenapr, gura ur funyy oevat n fur
tbng bs gur svefg lrne sbe n fva bssrevat.

15:28 Naq gur cevrfg funyy znxr na ngbarzrag sbe gur fbhy gung fvaargu
vtabenagyl, jura ur fvaargu ol vtabenapr orsber gur YBEQ, gb znxr na
ngbarzrag sbe uvz; naq vg funyy or sbetvira uvz.

15:29 Lr funyy unir bar ynj sbe uvz gung fvaargu guebhtu vtabenapr,
obgu sbe uvz gung vf obea nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq sbe gur
fgenatre gung fbwbheargu nzbat gurz.

15:30 Ohg gur fbhy gung qbrgu bhtug cerfhzcghbhfyl, jurgure ur or obea
va gur ynaq, be n fgenatre, gur fnzr ercebnpurgu gur YBEQ; naq gung
fbhy funyy or phg bss sebz nzbat uvf crbcyr.

15:31 Orpnhfr ur ungu qrfcvfrq gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ, naq ungu oebxra
uvf pbzznaqzrag, gung fbhy funyy hggreyl or phg bss; uvf vavdhvgl
funyy or hcba uvz.

15:32 Naq juvyr gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrer va gur jvyqrearff, gurl
sbhaq n zna gung tngurerq fgvpxf hcba gur fnoongu qnl.

15:33 Naq gurl gung sbhaq uvz tngurevat fgvpxf oebhtug uvz hagb Zbfrf
naq Nneba, naq hagb nyy gur pbatertngvba.

15:34 Naq gurl chg uvz va jneq, orpnhfr vg jnf abg qrpynerq jung
fubhyq or qbar gb uvz.

15:35 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Gur zna funyy or fheryl chg gb
qrngu: nyy gur pbatertngvba funyy fgbar uvz jvgu fgbarf jvgubhg gur
pnzc.

15:36 Naq nyy gur pbatertngvba oebhtug uvz jvgubhg gur pnzc, naq
fgbarq uvz jvgu fgbarf, naq ur qvrq; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

15:37 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 15:38 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq ovq gurz gung gurl znxr gurz sevatrf va gur
obeqref bs gurve tnezragf guebhtubhg gurve trarengvbaf, naq gung gurl
chg hcba gur sevatr bs gur obeqref n evoonaq bs oyhr: 15:39 Naq vg
funyy or hagb lbh sbe n sevatr, gung lr znl ybbx hcba vg, naq erzrzore
nyy gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ, naq qb gurz; naq gung lr frrx abg
nsgre lbhe bja urneg naq lbhe bja rlrf, nsgre juvpu lr hfr gb tb n
jubevat: 15:40 Gung lr znl erzrzore, naq qb nyy zl pbzznaqzragf, naq
or ubyl hagb lbhe Tbq.

15:41 V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, juvpu oebhtug lbh bhg bs gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg, gb or lbhe Tbq: V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

16:1 Abj Xbenu, gur fba bs Vmune, gur fba bs Xbungu, gur fba bs Yriv,
naq Qnguna naq Novenz, gur fbaf bs Ryvno, naq Ba, gur fba bs Cryrgu,
fbaf bs Erhora, gbbx zra: 16:2 Naq gurl ebfr hc orsber Zbfrf, jvgu
pregnva bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gjb uhaqerq naq svsgl cevaprf bs
gur nffrzoyl, snzbhf va gur pbatertngvba, zra bs erabja: 16:3 Naq gurl
tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure ntnvafg Zbfrf naq ntnvafg Nneba, naq fnvq
hagb gurz, Lr gnxr gbb zhpu hcba lbh, frrvat nyy gur pbatertngvba ner
ubyl, rirel bar bs gurz, naq gur YBEQ vf nzbat gurz: jurersber gura
yvsg lr hc lbhefryirf nobir gur pbatertngvba bs gur YBEQ?  16:4 Naq
jura Zbfrf urneq vg, ur sryy hcba uvf snpr: 16:5 Naq ur fcnxr hagb
Xbenu naq hagb nyy uvf pbzcnal, fnlvat, Rira gb zbeebj gur YBEQ jvyy
furj jub ner uvf, naq jub vf ubyl; naq jvyy pnhfr uvz gb pbzr arne
hagb uvz: rira uvz jubz ur ungu pubfra jvyy ur pnhfr gb pbzr arne hagb
uvz.

16:6 Guvf qb; Gnxr lbh prafref, Xbenu, naq nyy uvf pbzcnal; 16:7 Naq
chg sver gurerva, naq chg vaprafr va gurz orsber gur YBEQ gb zbeebj:
naq vg funyy or gung gur zna jubz gur YBEQ qbgu pubbfr, ur funyy or
ubyl: lr gnxr gbb zhpu hcba lbh, lr fbaf bs Yriv.

16:8 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb Xbenu, Urne, V cenl lbh, lr fbaf bs Yriv:
16:9 Frrzrgu vg ohg n fznyy guvat hagb lbh, gung gur Tbq bs Vfenry
ungu frcnengrq lbh sebz gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry, gb oevat lbh arne
gb uvzfrys gb qb gur freivpr bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur YBEQ, naq gb
fgnaq orsber gur pbatertngvba gb zvavfgre hagb gurz?  16:10 Naq ur
ungu oebhtug gurr arne gb uvz, naq nyy gul oerguera gur fbaf bs Yriv
jvgu gurr: naq frrx lr gur cevrfgubbq nyfb?  16:11 Sbe juvpu pnhfr
obgu gubh naq nyy gul pbzcnal ner tngurerq gbtrgure ntnvafg gur YBEQ:
naq jung vf Nneba, gung lr zhezhe ntnvafg uvz?  16:12 Naq Zbfrf frag
gb pnyy Qnguna naq Novenz, gur fbaf bs Ryvno: juvpu fnvq, Jr jvyy abg
pbzr hc: 16:13 Vf vg n fznyy guvat gung gubh unfg oebhtug hf hc bhg bs
n ynaq gung sybjrgu jvgu zvyx naq ubarl, gb xvyy hf va gur jvyqrearff,
rkprcg gubh znxr gulfrys nygbtrgure n cevapr bire hf?  16:14 Zberbire
gubh unfg abg oebhtug hf vagb n ynaq gung sybjrgu jvgu zvyx naq ubarl,
be tvira hf vaurevgnapr bs svryqf naq ivarlneqf: jvyg gubh chg bhg gur
rlrf bs gurfr zra? jr jvyy abg pbzr hc.

16:15 Naq Zbfrf jnf irel jebgu, naq fnvq hagb gur YBEQ, Erfcrpg abg
gubh gurve bssrevat: V unir abg gnxra bar nff sebz gurz, arvgure unir
V uheg bar bs gurz.

16:16 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb Xbenu, Or gubh naq nyy gul pbzcnal orsber
gur YBEQ, gubh, naq gurl, naq Nneba, gb zbeebj: 16:17 Naq gnxr rirel
zna uvf prafre, naq chg vaprafr va gurz, naq oevat lr orsber gur YBEQ
rirel zna uvf prafre, gjb uhaqerq naq svsgl prafref; gubh nyfb, naq
Nneba, rnpu bs lbh uvf prafre.

16:18 Naq gurl gbbx rirel zna uvf prafre, naq chg sver va gurz, naq
ynvq vaprafr gurerba, naq fgbbq va gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba jvgu Zbfrf naq Nneba.

16:19 Naq Xbenu tngurerq nyy gur pbatertngvba ntnvafg gurz hagb gur
qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba: naq gur tybel bs gur YBEQ
nccrnerq hagb nyy gur pbatertngvba.

16:20 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq hagb Nneba, fnlvat, 16:21
Frcnengr lbhefryirf sebz nzbat guvf pbatertngvba, gung V znl pbafhzr
gurz va n zbzrag.

16:22 Naq gurl sryy hcba gurve snprf, naq fnvq, B Tbq, gur Tbq bs gur
fcvevgf bs nyy syrfu, funyy bar zna fva, naq jvyg gubh or jebgu jvgu
nyy gur pbatertngvba?  16:23 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat,
16:24 Fcrnx hagb gur pbatertngvba, fnlvat, Trg lbh hc sebz nobhg gur
gnoreanpyr bs Xbenu, Qnguna, naq Novenz.

16:25 Naq Zbfrf ebfr hc naq jrag hagb Qnguna naq Novenz; naq gur
ryqref bs Vfenry sbyybjrq uvz.

16:26 Naq ur fcnxr hagb gur pbatertngvba, fnlvat, Qrcneg, V cenl lbh,
sebz gur gragf bs gurfr jvpxrq zra, naq gbhpu abguvat bs gurve'f, yrfg
lr or pbafhzrq va nyy gurve fvaf.

16:27 Fb gurl tng hc sebz gur gnoreanpyr bs Xbenu, Qnguna, naq Novenz,
ba rirel fvqr: naq Qnguna naq Novenz pnzr bhg, naq fgbbq va gur qbbe
bs gurve gragf, naq gurve jvirf, naq gurve fbaf, naq gurve yvggyr
puvyqera.

16:28 Naq Zbfrf fnvq, Urerol lr funyy xabj gung gur YBEQ ungu frag zr
gb qb nyy gurfr jbexf; sbe V unir abg qbar gurz bs zvar bja zvaq.

16:29 Vs gurfr zra qvr gur pbzzba qrngu bs nyy zra, be vs gurl or
ivfvgrq nsgre gur ivfvgngvba bs nyy zra; gura gur YBEQ ungu abg frag
zr.

16:30 Ohg vs gur YBEQ znxr n arj guvat, naq gur rnegu bcra ure zbhgu,
naq fjnyybj gurz hc, jvgu nyy gung nccregnva hagb gurz, naq gurl tb
qbja dhvpx vagb gur cvg; gura lr funyy haqrefgnaq gung gurfr zra unir
cebibxrq gur YBEQ.

16:31 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf ur unq znqr na raq bs fcrnxvat nyy gurfr
jbeqf, gung gur tebhaq pynir nfhaqre gung jnf haqre gurz: 16:32 Naq
gur rnegu bcrarq ure zbhgu, naq fjnyybjrq gurz hc, naq gurve ubhfrf,
naq nyy gur zra gung nccregnvarq hagb Xbenu, naq nyy gurve tbbqf.

16:33 Gurl, naq nyy gung nccregnvarq gb gurz, jrag qbja nyvir vagb gur
cvg, naq gur rnegu pybfrq hcba gurz: naq gurl crevfurq sebz nzbat gur
pbatertngvba.

16:34 Naq nyy Vfenry gung jrer ebhaq nobhg gurz syrq ng gur pel bs
gurz: sbe gurl fnvq, Yrfg gur rnegu fjnyybj hf hc nyfb.

16:35 Naq gurer pnzr bhg n sver sebz gur YBEQ, naq pbafhzrq gur gjb
uhaqerq naq svsgl zra gung bssrerq vaprafr.

16:36 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 16:37 Fcrnx hagb Ryrnmne
gur fba bs Nneba gur cevrfg, gung ur gnxr hc gur prafref bhg bs gur
oheavat, naq fpnggre gubh gur sver lbaqre; sbe gurl ner unyybjrq.

16:38 Gur prafref bs gurfr fvaaref ntnvafg gurve bja fbhyf, yrg gurz
znxr gurz oebnq cyngrf sbe n pbirevat bs gur nygne: sbe gurl bssrerq
gurz orsber gur YBEQ, gurersber gurl ner unyybjrq: naq gurl funyy or n
fvta hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

16:39 Naq Ryrnmne gur cevrfg gbbx gur oenfra prafref, jurerjvgu gurl
gung jrer oheag unq bssrerq; naq gurl jrer znqr oebnq cyngrf sbe n
pbirevat bs gur nygne: 16:40 Gb or n zrzbevny hagb gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, gung ab fgenatre, juvpu vf abg bs gur frrq bs Nneba, pbzr arne
gb bssre vaprafr orsber gur YBEQ; gung ur or abg nf Xbenu, naq nf uvf
pbzcnal: nf gur YBEQ fnvq gb uvz ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf.

16:41 Ohg ba gur zbeebj nyy gur pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
zhezherq ntnvafg Zbfrf naq ntnvafg Nneba, fnlvat, Lr unir xvyyrq gur
crbcyr bs gur YBEQ.

16:42 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur pbatertngvba jnf tngurerq ntnvafg
Zbfrf naq ntnvafg Nneba, gung gurl ybbxrq gbjneq gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba: naq, orubyq, gur pybhq pbirerq vg, naq gur tybel bs gur
YBEQ nccrnerq.

16:43 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba pnzr orsber gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba.

16:44 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 16:45 Trg lbh hc sebz
nzbat guvf pbatertngvba, gung V znl pbafhzr gurz nf va n zbzrag. Naq
gurl sryy hcba gurve snprf.

16:46 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb Nneba, Gnxr n prafre, naq chg sver gurerva
sebz bss gur nygne, naq chg ba vaprafr, naq tb dhvpxyl hagb gur
pbatertngvba, naq znxr na ngbarzrag sbe gurz: sbe gurer vf jengu tbar
bhg sebz gur YBEQ; gur cynthr vf ortha.

16:47 Naq Nneba gbbx nf Zbfrf pbzznaqrq, naq ena vagb gur zvqfg bs gur
pbatertngvba; naq, orubyq, gur cynthr jnf ortha nzbat gur crbcyr: naq
ur chg ba vaprafr, naq znqr na ngbarzrag sbe gur crbcyr.

16:48 Naq ur fgbbq orgjrra gur qrnq naq gur yvivat; naq gur cynthr jnf
fgnlrq.

16:49 Abj gurl gung qvrq va gur cynthr jrer sbhegrra gubhfnaq naq
frira uhaqerq, orfvqr gurz gung qvrq nobhg gur znggre bs Xbenu.

16:50 Naq Nneba erghearq hagb Zbfrf hagb gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs
gur pbatertngvba: naq gur cynthr jnf fgnlrq.

17:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 17:2 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq gnxr bs rirel bar bs gurz n ebq nppbeqvat gb
gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, bs nyy gurve cevaprf nppbeqvat gb gur
ubhfr bs gurve snguref gjryir ebqf: jevgr gubh rirel zna'f anzr hcba
uvf ebq.

17:3 Naq gubh funyg jevgr Nneba'f anzr hcba gur ebq bs Yriv: sbe bar
ebq funyy or sbe gur urnq bs gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref.

17:4 Naq gubh funyg ynl gurz hc va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba
orsber gur grfgvzbal, jurer V jvyy zrrg jvgu lbh.

17:5 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung gur zna'f ebq, jubz V funyy
pubbfr, funyy oybffbz: naq V jvyy znxr gb prnfr sebz zr gur zhezhevatf
bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, jurerol gurl zhezhe ntnvafg lbh.

17:6 Naq Zbfrf fcnxr hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq rirel bar bs
gurve cevaprf tnir uvz n ebq ncvrpr, sbe rnpu cevapr bar, nppbeqvat gb
gurve snguref' ubhfrf, rira gjryir ebqf: naq gur ebq bs Nneba jnf
nzbat gurve ebqf.

17:7 Naq Zbfrf ynvq hc gur ebqf orsber gur YBEQ va gur gnoreanpyr bs
jvgarff.

17:8 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung ba gur zbeebj Zbfrf jrag vagb gur
gnoreanpyr bs jvgarff; naq, orubyq, gur ebq bs Nneba sbe gur ubhfr bs
Yriv jnf ohqqrq, naq oebhtug sbegu ohqf, naq oybbzrq oybffbzf, naq
lvryqrq nyzbaqf.

17:9 Naq Zbfrf oebhtug bhg nyy gur ebqf sebz orsber gur YBEQ hagb nyy
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: naq gurl ybbxrq, naq gbbx rirel zna uvf ebq.

17:10 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Oevat Nneba'f ebq ntnva orsber gur
grfgvzbal, gb or xrcg sbe n gbxra ntnvafg gur eroryf; naq gubh funyg
dhvgr gnxr njnl gurve zhezhevatf sebz zr, gung gurl qvr abg.

17:11 Naq Zbfrf qvq fb: nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq uvz, fb qvq ur.

17:12 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, Orubyq, jr
qvr, jr crevfu, jr nyy crevfu.

17:13 Jubfbrire pbzrgu nal guvat arne hagb gur gnoreanpyr bs gur YBEQ
funyy qvr: funyy jr or pbafhzrq jvgu qlvat?  18:1 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq
hagb Nneba, Gubh naq gul fbaf naq gul sngure'f ubhfr jvgu gurr funyy
orne gur vavdhvgl bs gur fnapghnel: naq gubh naq gul fbaf jvgu gurr
funyy orne gur vavdhvgl bs lbhe cevrfgubbq.

18:2 Naq gul oerguera nyfb bs gur gevor bs Yriv, gur gevor bs gul
sngure, oevat gubh jvgu gurr, gung gurl znl or wbvarq hagb gurr, naq
zvavfgre hagb gurr: ohg gubh naq gul fbaf jvgu gurr funyy zvavfgre
orsber gur gnoreanpyr bs jvgarff.

18:3 Naq gurl funyy xrrc gul punetr, naq gur punetr bs nyy gur
gnoreanpyr: bayl gurl funyy abg pbzr avtu gur irffryf bs gur fnapghnel
naq gur nygne, gung arvgure gurl, abe lr nyfb, qvr.

18:4 Naq gurl funyy or wbvarq hagb gurr, naq xrrc gur punetr bs gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, sbe nyy gur freivpr bs gur gnoreanpyr:
naq n fgenatre funyy abg pbzr avtu hagb lbh.

18:5 Naq lr funyy xrrc gur punetr bs gur fnapghnel, naq gur punetr bs
gur nygne: gung gurer or ab jengu nal zber hcba gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry.

18:6 Naq V, orubyq, V unir gnxra lbhe oerguera gur Yrivgrf sebz nzbat
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: gb lbh gurl ner tvira nf n tvsg sbe gur YBEQ,
gb qb gur freivpr bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

18:7 Gurersber gubh naq gul fbaf jvgu gurr funyy xrrc lbhe cevrfg'f
bssvpr sbe rirelguvat bs gur nygne, naq jvguva gur invy; naq lr funyy
freir: V unir tvira lbhe cevrfg'f bssvpr hagb lbh nf n freivpr bs
tvsg: naq gur fgenatre gung pbzrgu avtu funyy or chg gb qrngu.

18:8 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Nneba, Orubyq, V nyfb unir tvira gurr gur
punetr bs zvar urnir bssrevatf bs nyy gur unyybjrq guvatf bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry; hagb gurr unir V tvira gurz ol ernfba bs gur
nabvagvat, naq gb gul fbaf, ol na beqvanapr sbe rire.

18:9 Guvf funyy or guvar bs gur zbfg ubyl guvatf, erfreirq sebz gur
sver: rirel boyngvba bs gurvef, rirel zrng bssrevat bs gurvef, naq
rirel fva bssrevat bs gurvef, naq rirel gerfcnff bssrevat bs gurvef
juvpu gurl funyy eraqre hagb zr, funyy or zbfg ubyl sbe gurr naq sbe
gul fbaf.

18:10 Va gur zbfg ubyl cynpr funyg gubh rng vg; rirel znyr funyy rng
vg: vg funyy or ubyl hagb gurr.

18:11 Naq guvf vf guvar; gur urnir bssrevat bs gurve tvsg, jvgu nyy
gur jnir bssrevatf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: V unir tvira gurz hagb
gurr, naq gb gul fbaf naq gb gul qnhtugref jvgu gurr, ol n fgnghgr sbe
rire: rirel bar gung vf pyrna va gul ubhfr funyy rng bs vg.

18:12 Nyy gur orfg bs gur bvy, naq nyy gur orfg bs gur jvar, naq bs
gur jurng, gur svefgsehvgf bs gurz juvpu gurl funyy bssre hagb gur
YBEQ, gurz unir V tvira gurr.

18:13 Naq jungfbrire vf svefg evcr va gur ynaq, juvpu gurl funyy oevat
hagb gur YBEQ, funyy or guvar; rirel bar gung vf pyrna va guvar ubhfr
funyy rng bs vg.

18:14 Rirel guvat qribgrq va Vfenry funyy or guvar.

18:15 Rirel guvat gung bcrargu gur zngevk va nyy syrfu, juvpu gurl
oevat hagb gur YBEQ, jurgure vg or bs zra be ornfgf, funyy or guvar:
arireguryrff gur svefgobea bs zna funyg gubh fheryl erqrrz, naq gur
svefgyvat bs hapyrna ornfgf funyg gubh erqrrz.

18:16 Naq gubfr gung ner gb or erqrrzrq sebz n zbagu byq funyg gubh
erqrrz, nppbeqvat gb guvar rfgvzngvba, sbe gur zbarl bs svir furxryf,
nsgre gur furxry bs gur fnapghnel, juvpu vf gjragl trenuf.

18:17 Ohg gur svefgyvat bs n pbj, be gur svefgyvat bs n furrc, be gur
svefgyvat bs n tbng, gubh funyg abg erqrrz; gurl ner ubyl: gubh funyg
fcevaxyr gurve oybbq hcba gur nygne, naq funyg ohea gurve sng sbe na
bssrevat znqr ol sver, sbe n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ.

18:18 Naq gur syrfu bs gurz funyy or guvar, nf gur jnir oernfg naq nf
gur evtug fubhyqre ner guvar.

18:19 Nyy gur urnir bssrevatf bs gur ubyl guvatf, juvpu gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry bssre hagb gur YBEQ, unir V tvira gurr, naq gul fbaf naq gul
qnhtugref jvgu gurr, ol n fgnghgr sbe rire: vg vf n pbiranag bs fnyg
sbe rire orsber gur YBEQ hagb gurr naq gb gul frrq jvgu gurr.

18:20 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Nneba, Gubh funyg unir ab vaurevgnapr va
gurve ynaq, arvgure funyg gubh unir nal cneg nzbat gurz: V nz gul cneg
naq guvar vaurevgnapr nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

18:21 Naq, orubyq, V unir tvira gur puvyqera bs Yriv nyy gur gragu va
Vfenry sbe na vaurevgnapr, sbe gurve freivpr juvpu gurl freir, rira
gur freivpr bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

18:22 Arvgure zhfg gur puvyqera bs Vfenry uraprsbegu pbzr avtu gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, yrfg gurl orne fva, naq qvr.

18:23 Ohg gur Yrivgrf funyy qb gur freivpr bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, naq gurl funyy orne gurve vavdhvgl: vg funyy or n
fgnghgr sbe rire guebhtubhg lbhe trarengvbaf, gung nzbat gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry gurl unir ab vaurevgnapr.

18:24 Ohg gur gvgurf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, juvpu gurl bssre nf na
urnir bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ, V unir tvira gb gur Yrivgrf gb vaurevg:
gurersber V unir fnvq hagb gurz, Nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gurl
funyy unir ab vaurevgnapr.

18:25 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 18:26 Guhf fcrnx hagb gur
Yrivgrf, naq fnl hagb gurz, Jura lr gnxr bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gur
gvgurf juvpu V unir tvira lbh sebz gurz sbe lbhe vaurevgnapr, gura lr
funyy bssre hc na urnir bssrevat bs vg sbe gur YBEQ, rira n gragu cneg
bs gur gvgur.

18:27 Naq guvf lbhe urnir bssrevat funyy or erpxbarq hagb lbh, nf
gubhtu vg jrer gur pbea bs gur guerfuvatsybbe, naq nf gur shyarff bs
gur jvarcerff.

18:28 Guhf lr nyfb funyy bssre na urnir bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ bs nyy
lbhe gvgurf, juvpu lr erprvir bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry; naq lr funyy
tvir gurerbs gur YBEQ'f urnir bssrevat gb Nneba gur cevrfg.

18:29 Bhg bs nyy lbhe tvsgf lr funyy bssre rirel urnir bssrevat bs gur
YBEQ, bs nyy gur orfg gurerbs, rira gur unyybjrq cneg gurerbs bhg bs
vg.

18:30 Gurersber gubh funyg fnl hagb gurz, Jura lr unir urnirq gur orfg
gurerbs sebz vg, gura vg funyy or pbhagrq hagb gur Yrivgrf nf gur
vapernfr bs gur guerfuvatsybbe, naq nf gur vapernfr bs gur jvarcerff.

18:31 Naq lr funyy rng vg va rirel cynpr, lr naq lbhe ubhfrubyqf: sbe
vg vf lbhe erjneq sbe lbhe freivpr va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba.

18:32 Naq lr funyy orne ab fva ol ernfba bs vg, jura lr unir urnirq
sebz vg gur orfg bs vg: arvgure funyy lr cbyyhgr gur ubyl guvatf bs
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, yrfg lr qvr.

19:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq hagb Nneba, fnlvat, 19:2 Guvf
vf gur beqvanapr bs gur ynj juvpu gur YBEQ ungu pbzznaqrq, fnlvat,
Fcrnx hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung gurl oevat gurr n erq urvsre
jvgubhg fcbg, jurerva vf ab oyrzvfu, naq hcba juvpu arire pnzr lbxr:
19:3 Naq lr funyy tvir ure hagb Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, gung ur znl oevat
ure sbegu jvgubhg gur pnzc, naq bar funyy fynl ure orsber uvf snpr:
19:4 Naq Ryrnmne gur cevrfg funyy gnxr bs ure oybbq jvgu uvf svatre,
naq fcevaxyr bs ure oybbq qverpgyl orsber gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba frira gvzrf: 19:5 Naq bar funyy ohea gur urvsre va uvf
fvtug; ure fxva, naq ure syrfu, naq ure oybbq, jvgu ure qhat, funyy ur
ohea: 19:6 Naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr prqne jbbq, naq ulffbc, naq
fpneyrg, naq pnfg vg vagb gur zvqfg bs gur oheavat bs gur urvsre.

19:7 Gura gur cevrfg funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq ur funyy ongur uvf
syrfu va jngre, naq nsgrejneq ur funyy pbzr vagb gur pnzc, naq gur
cevrfg funyy or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

19:8 Naq ur gung oheargu ure funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf va jngre, naq
ongur uvf syrfu va jngre, naq funyy or hapyrna hagvy gur rira.

19:9 Naq n zna gung vf pyrna funyy tngure hc gur nfurf bs gur urvsre,
naq ynl gurz hc jvgubhg gur pnzc va n pyrna cynpr, naq vg funyy or
xrcg sbe gur pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry sbe n jngre bs
frcnengvba: vg vf n chevsvpngvba sbe fva.

19:10 Naq ur gung tngurergu gur nfurf bs gur urvsre funyy jnfu uvf
pybgurf, naq or hapyrna hagvy gur rira: naq vg funyy or hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq hagb gur fgenatre gung fbwbheargu nzbat gurz,
sbe n fgnghgr sbe rire.

19:11 Ur gung gbhpurgu gur qrnq obql bs nal zna funyy or hapyrna frira
qnlf.

19:12 Ur funyy chevsl uvzfrys jvgu vg ba gur guveq qnl, naq ba gur
friragu qnl ur funyy or pyrna: ohg vs ur chevsl abg uvzfrys gur guveq
qnl, gura gur friragu qnl ur funyy abg or pyrna.

19:13 Jubfbrire gbhpurgu gur qrnq obql bs nal zna gung vf qrnq, naq
chevsvrgu abg uvzfrys, qrsvyrgu gur gnoreanpyr bs gur YBEQ; naq gung
fbhy funyy or phg bss sebz Vfenry: orpnhfr gur jngre bs frcnengvba jnf
abg fcevaxyrq hcba uvz, ur funyy or hapyrna; uvf hapyrnaarff vf lrg
hcba uvz.

19:14 Guvf vf gur ynj, jura n zna qvrgu va n grag: nyy gung pbzr vagb
gur grag, naq nyy gung vf va gur grag, funyy or hapyrna frira qnlf.

19:15 Naq rirel bcra irffry, juvpu ungu ab pbirevat obhaq hcba vg, vf
hapyrna.

19:16 Naq jubfbrire gbhpurgu bar gung vf fynva jvgu n fjbeq va gur
bcra svryqf, be n qrnq obql, be n obar bs n zna, be n tenir, funyy or
hapyrna frira qnlf.

19:17 Naq sbe na hapyrna crefba gurl funyy gnxr bs gur nfurf bs gur
oheag urvsre bs chevsvpngvba sbe fva, naq ehaavat jngre funyy or chg
gurergb va n irffry: 19:18 Naq n pyrna crefba funyy gnxr ulffbc, naq
qvc vg va gur jngre, naq fcevaxyr vg hcba gur grag, naq hcba nyy gur
irffryf, naq hcba gur crefbaf gung jrer gurer, naq hcba uvz gung
gbhpurq n obar, be bar fynva, be bar qrnq, be n tenir: 19:19 Naq gur
pyrna crefba funyy fcevaxyr hcba gur hapyrna ba gur guveq qnl, naq ba
gur friragu qnl: naq ba gur friragu qnl ur funyy chevsl uvzfrys, naq
jnfu uvf pybgurf, naq ongur uvzfrys va jngre, naq funyy or pyrna ng
rira.

19:20 Ohg gur zna gung funyy or hapyrna, naq funyy abg chevsl uvzfrys,
gung fbhy funyy or phg bss sebz nzbat gur pbatertngvba, orpnhfr ur
ungu qrsvyrq gur fnapghnel bs gur YBEQ: gur jngre bs frcnengvba ungu
abg orra fcevaxyrq hcba uvz; ur vf hapyrna.

19:21 Naq vg funyy or n crecrghny fgnghgr hagb gurz, gung ur gung
fcevaxyrgu gur jngre bs frcnengvba funyy jnfu uvf pybgurf; naq ur gung
gbhpurgu gur jngre bs frcnengvba funyy or hapyrna hagvy rira.

19:22 Naq jungfbrire gur hapyrna crefba gbhpurgu funyy or hapyrna; naq
gur fbhy gung gbhpurgu vg funyy or hapyrna hagvy rira.

20:1 Gura pnzr gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, rira gur jubyr pbatertngvba,
vagb gur qrfreg bs Mva va gur svefg zbagu: naq gur crbcyr nobqr va
Xnqrfu; naq Zvevnz qvrq gurer, naq jnf ohevrq gurer.

20:2 Naq gurer jnf ab jngre sbe gur pbatertngvba: naq gurl tngurerq
gurzfryirf gbtrgure ntnvafg Zbfrf naq ntnvafg Nneba.

20:3 Naq gur crbcyr pubqr jvgu Zbfrf, naq fcnxr, fnlvat, Jbhyq Tbq
gung jr unq qvrq jura bhe oerguera qvrq orsber gur YBEQ!  20:4 Naq jul
unir lr oebhtug hc gur pbatertngvba bs gur YBEQ vagb guvf jvyqrearff,
gung jr naq bhe pnggyr fubhyq qvr gurer?  20:5 Naq jurersber unir lr
znqr hf gb pbzr hc bhg bs Rtlcg, gb oevat hf va hagb guvf rivy cynpr?
vg vf ab cynpr bs frrq, be bs svtf, be bs ivarf, be bs cbzrtenangrf;
arvgure vf gurer nal jngre gb qevax.

20:6 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba jrag sebz gur cerfrapr bs gur nffrzoyl hagb
gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, naq gurl sryy hcba
gurve snprf: naq gur tybel bs gur YBEQ nccrnerq hagb gurz.

20:7 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 20:8 Gnxr gur ebq, naq
tngure gubh gur nffrzoyl gbtrgure, gubh, naq Nneba gul oebgure, naq
fcrnx lr hagb gur ebpx orsber gurve rlrf; naq vg funyy tvir sbegu uvf
jngre, naq gubh funyg oevat sbegu gb gurz jngre bhg bs gur ebpx: fb
gubh funyg tvir gur pbatertngvba naq gurve ornfgf qevax.

20:9 Naq Zbfrf gbbx gur ebq sebz orsber gur YBEQ, nf ur pbzznaqrq uvz.

20:10 Naq Zbfrf naq Nneba tngurerq gur pbatertngvba gbtrgure orsber
gur ebpx, naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Urne abj, lr eroryf; zhfg jr srgpu
lbh jngre bhg bs guvf ebpx?  20:11 Naq Zbfrf yvsgrq hc uvf unaq, naq
jvgu uvf ebq ur fzbgr gur ebpx gjvpr: naq gur jngre pnzr bhg
nohaqnagyl, naq gur pbatertngvba qenax, naq gurve ornfgf nyfb.

20:12 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq Nneba, Orpnhfr lr oryvrirq zr
abg, gb fnapgvsl zr va gur rlrf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gurersber
lr funyy abg oevat guvf pbatertngvba vagb gur ynaq juvpu V unir tvira
gurz.

20:13 Guvf vf gur jngre bs Zrevonu; orpnhfr gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
fgebir jvgu gur YBEQ, naq ur jnf fnapgvsvrq va gurz.

20:14 Naq Zbfrf frag zrffratref sebz Xnqrfu hagb gur xvat bs Rqbz,
Guhf fnvgu gul oebgure Vfenry, Gubh xabjrfg nyy gur geninvy gung ungu
orsnyyra hf: 20:15 Ubj bhe snguref jrag qbja vagb Rtlcg, naq jr unir
qjryg va Rtlcg n ybat gvzr; naq gur Rtlcgvnaf irkrq hf, naq bhe
snguref: 20:16 Naq jura jr pevrq hagb gur YBEQ, ur urneq bhe ibvpr,
naq frag na natry, naq ungu oebhtug hf sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg: naq,
orubyq, jr ner va Xnqrfu, n pvgl va gur hggrezbfg bs gul obeqre: 20:17
Yrg hf cnff, V cenl gurr, guebhtu gul pbhagel: jr jvyy abg cnff
guebhtu gur svryqf, be guebhtu gur ivarlneqf, arvgure jvyy jr qevax bs
gur jngre bs gur jryyf: jr jvyy tb ol gur xvat'f uvtu jnl, jr jvyy abg
ghea gb gur evtug unaq abe gb gur yrsg, hagvy jr unir cnffrq gul
obeqref.

20:18 Naq Rqbz fnvq hagb uvz, Gubh funyg abg cnff ol zr, yrfg V pbzr
bhg ntnvafg gurr jvgu gur fjbeq.

20:19 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fnvq hagb uvz, Jr jvyy tb ol gur uvtu
jnl: naq vs V naq zl pnggyr qevax bs gul jngre, gura V jvyy cnl sbe
vg: V jvyy bayl, jvgubhg qbvat nalguvat ryfr, tb guebhtu ba zl srrg.

20:20 Naq ur fnvq, Gubh funyg abg tb guebhtu. Naq Rqbz pnzr bhg
ntnvafg uvz jvgu zhpu crbcyr, naq jvgu n fgebat unaq.

20:21 Guhf Rqbz ershfrq gb tvir Vfenry cnffntr guebhtu uvf obeqre:
jurersber Vfenry ghearq njnl sebz uvz.

20:22 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, rira gur jubyr pbatertngvba,
wbhearlrq sebz Xnqrfu, naq pnzr hagb zbhag Ube.

20:23 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf naq Nneba va zbhag Ube, ol gur
pbnfg bs gur ynaq bs Rqbz, fnlvat, 20:24 Nneba funyy or tngurerq hagb
uvf crbcyr: sbe ur funyy abg ragre vagb gur ynaq juvpu V unir tvira
hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, orpnhfr lr eroryyrq ntnvafg zl jbeq ng
gur jngre bs Zrevonu.

20:25 Gnxr Nneba naq Ryrnmne uvf fba, naq oevat gurz hc hagb zbhag
Ube: 20:26 Naq fgevc Nneba bs uvf tnezragf, naq chg gurz hcba Ryrnmne
uvf fba: naq Nneba funyy or tngurerq hagb uvf crbcyr, naq funyy qvr
gurer.

20:27 Naq Zbfrf qvq nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq: naq gurl jrag hc vagb zbhag
Ube va gur fvtug bs nyy gur pbatertngvba.

20:28 Naq Zbfrf fgevccrq Nneba bs uvf tnezragf, naq chg gurz hcba
Ryrnmne uvf fba; naq Nneba qvrq gurer va gur gbc bs gur zbhag: naq
Zbfrf naq Ryrnmne pnzr qbja sebz gur zbhag.

20:29 Naq jura nyy gur pbatertngvba fnj gung Nneba jnf qrnq, gurl
zbhearq sbe Nneba guvegl qnlf, rira nyy gur ubhfr bs Vfenry.

21:1 Naq jura xvat Nenq gur Pnannavgr, juvpu qjryg va gur fbhgu, urneq
gryy gung Vfenry pnzr ol gur jnl bs gur fcvrf; gura ur sbhtug ntnvafg
Vfenry, naq gbbx fbzr bs gurz cevfbaref.

21:2 Naq Vfenry ibjrq n ibj hagb gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, Vs gubh jvyg
vaqrrq qryvire guvf crbcyr vagb zl unaq, gura V jvyy hggreyl qrfgebl
gurve pvgvrf.

21:3 Naq gur YBEQ urnexrarq gb gur ibvpr bs Vfenry, naq qryvirerq hc
gur Pnannavgrf; naq gurl hggreyl qrfgeblrq gurz naq gurve pvgvrf: naq
ur pnyyrq gur anzr bs gur cynpr Ubeznu.

21:4 Naq gurl wbhearlrq sebz zbhag Ube ol gur jnl bs gur Erq frn, gb
pbzcnff gur ynaq bs Rqbz: naq gur fbhy bs gur crbcyr jnf zhpu
qvfpbhentrq orpnhfr bs gur jnl.

21:5 Naq gur crbcyr fcnxr ntnvafg Tbq, naq ntnvafg Zbfrf, Jurersber
unir lr oebhtug hf hc bhg bs Rtlcg gb qvr va gur jvyqrearff? sbe gurer
vf ab oernq, arvgure vf gurer nal jngre; naq bhe fbhy ybngurgu guvf
yvtug oernq.

21:6 Naq gur YBEQ frag svrel frecragf nzbat gur crbcyr, naq gurl ovg
gur crbcyr; naq zhpu crbcyr bs Vfenry qvrq.

21:7 Gurersber gur crbcyr pnzr gb Zbfrf, naq fnvq, Jr unir fvaarq, sbe
jr unir fcbxra ntnvafg gur YBEQ, naq ntnvafg gurr; cenl hagb gur YBEQ,
gung ur gnxr njnl gur frecragf sebz hf. Naq Zbfrf cenlrq sbe gur
crbcyr.

21:8 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Znxr gurr n svrel frecrag, naq frg
vg hcba n cbyr: naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung rirel bar gung vf
ovggra, jura ur ybbxrgu hcba vg, funyy yvir.

21:9 Naq Zbfrf znqr n frecrag bs oenff, naq chg vg hcba n cbyr, naq vg
pnzr gb cnff, gung vs n frecrag unq ovggra nal zna, jura ur oruryq gur
frecrag bs oenff, ur yvirq.

21:10 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry frg sbejneq, naq cvgpurq va Bobgu.
