21:11 Naq gurl wbhearlrq sebz Bobgu, naq cvgpurq ng Vwrnonevz, va gur
jvyqrearff juvpu vf orsber Zbno, gbjneq gur fhaevfvat.

21:12 Sebz gurapr gurl erzbirq, naq cvgpurq va gur inyyrl bs Mnerq.

21:13 Sebz gurapr gurl erzbirq, naq cvgpurq ba gur bgure fvqr bs
Neaba, juvpu vf va gur jvyqrearff gung pbzrgu bhg bs gur pbnfgf bs gur
Nzbevgrf: sbe Neaba vf gur obeqre bs Zbno, orgjrra Zbno naq gur
Nzbevgrf.

21:14 Jurersber vg vf fnvq va gur obbx bs gur jnef bs gur YBEQ, Jung
ur qvq va gur Erq frn, naq va gur oebbxf bs Neaba, 21:15 Naq ng gur
fgernz bs gur oebbxf gung tbrgu qbja gb gur qjryyvat bs Ne, naq yvrgu
hcba gur obeqre bs Zbno.

21:16 Naq sebz gurapr gurl jrag gb Orre: gung vf gur jryy jurerbs gur
YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, Tngure gur crbcyr gbtrgure, naq V jvyy tvir
gurz jngre.

21:17 Gura Vfenry fnat guvf fbat, Fcevat hc, B jryy; fvat lr hagb vg:
21:18 Gur cevaprf qvttrq gur jryy, gur aboyrf bs gur crbcyr qvttrq vg,
ol gur qverpgvba bs gur ynjtvire, jvgu gurve fgnirf. Naq sebz gur
jvyqrearff gurl jrag gb Znggnanu: 21:19 Naq sebz Znggnanu gb Anunyvry:
naq sebz Anunyvry gb Onzbgu: 21:20 Naq sebz Onzbgu va gur inyyrl, gung
vf va gur pbhagel bs Zbno, gb gur gbc bs Cvftnu, juvpu ybbxrgu gbjneq
Wrfuvzba.

21:21 Naq Vfenry frag zrffratref hagb Fvuba xvat bs gur Nzbevgrf,
fnlvat, 21:22 Yrg zr cnff guebhtu gul ynaq: jr jvyy abg ghea vagb gur
svryqf, be vagb gur ivarlneqf; jr jvyy abg qevax bs gur jngref bs gur
jryy: ohg jr jvyy tb nybat ol gur xvat'f uvtu jnl, hagvy jr or cnfg
gul obeqref.

21:23 Naq Fvuba jbhyq abg fhssre Vfenry gb cnff guebhtu uvf obeqre:
ohg Fvuba tngurerq nyy uvf crbcyr gbtrgure, naq jrag bhg ntnvafg
Vfenry vagb gur jvyqrearff: naq ur pnzr gb Wnunm, naq sbhtug ntnvafg
Vfenry.

21:24 Naq Vfenry fzbgr uvz jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq, naq cbffrffrq
uvf ynaq sebz Neaba hagb Wnoobx, rira hagb gur puvyqera bs Nzzba: sbe
gur obeqre bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba jnf fgebat.

21:25 Naq Vfenry gbbx nyy gurfr pvgvrf: naq Vfenry qjryg va nyy gur
pvgvrf bs gur Nzbevgrf, va Urfuoba, naq va nyy gur ivyyntrf gurerbs.

21:26 Sbe Urfuoba jnf gur pvgl bs Fvuba gur xvat bs gur Nzbevgrf, jub
unq sbhtug ntnvafg gur sbezre xvat bs Zbno, naq gnxra nyy uvf ynaq bhg
bs uvf unaq, rira hagb Neaba.

21:27 Jurersber gurl gung fcrnx va cebireof fnl, Pbzr vagb Urfuoba,
yrg gur pvgl bs Fvuba or ohvyg naq cercnerq: 21:28 Sbe gurer vf n sver
tbar bhg bs Urfuoba, n synzr sebz gur pvgl bs Fvuba: vg ungu pbafhzrq
Ne bs Zbno, naq gur ybeqf bs gur uvtu cynprf bs Neaba.

21:29 Jbr gb gurr, Zbno! gubh neg haqbar, B crbcyr bs Purzbfu: ur ungu
tvira uvf fbaf gung rfpncrq, naq uvf qnhtugref, vagb pncgvivgl hagb
Fvuba xvat bs gur Nzbevgrf.

21:30 Jr unir fubg ng gurz; Urfuoba vf crevfurq rira hagb Qvoba, naq
jr unir ynvq gurz jnfgr rira hagb Abcunu, juvpu ernpurgu hagb Zrqron.

21:31 Guhf Vfenry qjryg va gur ynaq bs gur Nzbevgrf.

21:32 Naq Zbfrf frag gb fcl bhg Wnnmre, naq gurl gbbx gur ivyyntrf
gurerbs, naq qebir bhg gur Nzbevgrf gung jrer gurer.

21:33 Naq gurl ghearq naq jrag hc ol gur jnl bs Onfuna: naq Bt gur
xvat bs Onfuna jrag bhg ntnvafg gurz, ur, naq nyy uvf crbcyr, gb gur
onggyr ng Rqerv.

21:34 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Srne uvz abg: sbe V unir qryvirerq
uvz vagb gul unaq, naq nyy uvf crbcyr, naq uvf ynaq; naq gubh funyg qb
gb uvz nf gubh qvqfg hagb Fvuba xvat bs gur Nzbevgrf, juvpu qjryg ng
Urfuoba.

21:35 Fb gurl fzbgr uvz, naq uvf fbaf, naq nyy uvf crbcyr, hagvy gurer
jnf abar yrsg uvz nyvir: naq gurl cbffrffrq uvf ynaq.

22:1 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry frg sbejneq, naq cvgpurq va gur cynvaf
bs Zbno ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna ol Wrevpub.

22:2 Naq Onynx gur fba bs Mvccbe fnj nyy gung Vfenry unq qbar gb gur
Nzbevgrf.

22:3 Naq Zbno jnf fber nsenvq bs gur crbcyr, orpnhfr gurl jrer znal:
naq Zbno jnf qvfgerffrq orpnhfr bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

22:4 Naq Zbno fnvq hagb gur ryqref bs Zvqvna, Abj funyy guvf pbzcnal
yvpx hc nyy gung ner ebhaq nobhg hf, nf gur bk yvpxrgu hc gur tenff bs
gur svryq.

Naq Onynx gur fba bs Mvccbe jnf xvat bs gur Zbnovgrf ng gung gvzr.

22:5 Ur frag zrffratref gurersber hagb Onynnz gur fba bs Orbe gb
Crgube, juvpu vf ol gur evire bs gur ynaq bs gur puvyqera bs uvf
crbcyr, gb pnyy uvz, fnlvat, Orubyq, gurer vf n crbcyr pbzr bhg sebz
Rtlcg: orubyq, gurl pbire gur snpr bs gur rnegu, naq gurl novqr bire
ntnvafg zr: 22:6 Pbzr abj gurersber, V cenl gurr, phefr zr guvf
crbcyr; sbe gurl ner gbb zvtugl sbe zr: crenqiragher V funyy cerinvy,
gung jr znl fzvgr gurz, naq gung V znl qevir gurz bhg bs gur ynaq: sbe
V jbg gung ur jubz gubh oyrffrfg vf oyrffrq, naq ur jubz gubh phefrfg
vf phefrq.

22:7 Naq gur ryqref bs Zbno naq gur ryqref bs Zvqvna qrcnegrq jvgu gur
erjneqf bs qvivangvba va gurve unaq; naq gurl pnzr hagb Onynnz, naq
fcnxr hagb uvz gur jbeqf bs Onynx.

22:8 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Ybqtr urer guvf avtug, naq V jvyy oevat
lbh jbeq ntnva, nf gur YBEQ funyy fcrnx hagb zr: naq gur cevaprf bs
Zbno nobqr jvgu Onynnz.

22:9 Naq Tbq pnzr hagb Onynnz, naq fnvq, Jung zra ner gurfr jvgu gurr?
22:10 Naq Onynnz fnvq hagb Tbq, Onynx gur fba bs Mvccbe, xvat bs Zbno,
ungu frag hagb zr, fnlvat, 22:11 Orubyq, gurer vf n crbcyr pbzr bhg bs
Rtlcg, juvpu pbirergu gur snpr bs gur rnegu: pbzr abj, phefr zr gurz;
crenqiragher V funyy or noyr gb birepbzr gurz, naq qevir gurz bhg.

22:12 Naq Tbq fnvq hagb Onynnz, Gubh funyg abg tb jvgu gurz; gubh
funyg abg phefr gur crbcyr: sbe gurl ner oyrffrq.

22:13 Naq Onynnz ebfr hc va gur zbeavat, naq fnvq hagb gur cevaprf bs
Onynx, Trg lbh vagb lbhe ynaq: sbe gur YBEQ ershfrgu gb tvir zr yrnir
gb tb jvgu lbh.

22:14 Naq gur cevaprf bs Zbno ebfr hc, naq gurl jrag hagb Onynx, naq
fnvq, Onynnz ershfrgu gb pbzr jvgu hf.

22:15 Naq Onynx frag lrg ntnva cevaprf, zber, naq zber ubabhenoyr guna
gurl.

22:16 Naq gurl pnzr gb Onynnz, naq fnvq gb uvz, Guhf fnvgu Onynx gur
fba bs Mvccbe, Yrg abguvat, V cenl gurr, uvaqre gurr sebz pbzvat hagb
zr: 22:17 Sbe V jvyy cebzbgr gurr hagb irel terng ubabhe, naq V jvyy
qb jungfbrire gubh fnlrfg hagb zr: pbzr gurersber, V cenl gurr, phefr
zr guvf crbcyr.

22:18 Naq Onynnz nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb gur freinagf bs Onynx, Vs
Onynx jbhyq tvir zr uvf ubhfr shyy bs fvyire naq tbyq, V pnaabg tb
orlbaq gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ zl Tbq, gb qb yrff be zber.

22:19 Abj gurersber, V cenl lbh, gneel lr nyfb urer guvf avtug, gung V
znl xabj jung gur YBEQ jvyy fnl hagb zr zber.

22:20 Naq Tbq pnzr hagb Onynnz ng avtug, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Vs gur zra
pbzr gb pnyy gurr, evfr hc, naq tb jvgu gurz; ohg lrg gur jbeq juvpu V
funyy fnl hagb gurr, gung funyg gubh qb.

22:21 Naq Onynnz ebfr hc va gur zbeavat, naq fnqqyrq uvf nff, naq jrag
jvgu gur cevaprf bs Zbno.

22:22 Naq Tbq'f natre jnf xvaqyrq orpnhfr ur jrag: naq gur natry bs
gur YBEQ fgbbq va gur jnl sbe na nqirefnel ntnvafg uvz. Abj ur jnf
evqvat hcba uvf nff, naq uvf gjb freinagf jrer jvgu uvz.

22:23 Naq gur nff fnj gur natry bs gur YBEQ fgnaqvat va gur jnl, naq
uvf fjbeq qenja va uvf unaq: naq gur nff ghearq nfvqr bhg bs gur jnl,
naq jrag vagb gur svryq: naq Onynnz fzbgr gur nff, gb ghea ure vagb
gur jnl.

22:24 Ohg gur natry bs gur YBEQ fgbbq va n cngu bs gur ivarlneqf, n
jnyy orvat ba guvf fvqr, naq n jnyy ba gung fvqr.

22:25 Naq jura gur nff fnj gur natry bs gur YBEQ, fur guehfg urefrys
hagb gur jnyy, naq pehfurq Onynnz'f sbbg ntnvafg gur jnyy: naq ur
fzbgr ure ntnva.

22:26 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ jrag shegure, naq fgbbq va n aneebj
cynpr, jurer jnf ab jnl gb ghea rvgure gb gur evtug unaq be gb gur
yrsg.

22:27 Naq jura gur nff fnj gur natry bs gur YBEQ, fur sryy qbja haqre
Onynnz: naq Onynnz'f natre jnf xvaqyrq, naq ur fzbgr gur nff jvgu n
fgnss.

22:28 Naq gur YBEQ bcrarq gur zbhgu bs gur nff, naq fur fnvq hagb
Onynnz, Jung unir V qbar hagb gurr, gung gubh unfg fzvggra zr gurfr
guerr gvzrf?  22:29 Naq Onynnz fnvq hagb gur nff, Orpnhfr gubh unfg
zbpxrq zr: V jbhyq gurer jrer n fjbeq va zvar unaq, sbe abj jbhyq V
xvyy gurr.

22:30 Naq gur nff fnvq hagb Onynnz, Nz abg V guvar nff, hcba juvpu
gubh unfg evqqra rire fvapr V jnf guvar hagb guvf qnl? jnf V rire jbag
gb qb fb hagb gurr? Naq ur fnvq, Anl.

22:31 Gura gur YBEQ bcrarq gur rlrf bs Onynnz, naq ur fnj gur natry bs
gur YBEQ fgnaqvat va gur jnl, naq uvf fjbeq qenja va uvf unaq: naq ur
objrq qbja uvf urnq, naq sryy syng ba uvf snpr.

22:32 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, Jurersber unfg gubh
fzvggra guvar nff gurfr guerr gvzrf? orubyq, V jrag bhg gb jvgufgnaq
gurr, orpnhfr gul jnl vf creirefr orsber zr: 22:33 Naq gur nff fnj zr,
naq ghearq sebz zr gurfr guerr gvzrf: hayrff fur unq ghearq sebz zr,
fheryl abj nyfb V unq fynva gurr, naq fnirq ure nyvir.

22:34 Naq Onynnz fnvq hagb gur natry bs gur YBEQ, V unir fvaarq; sbe V
xarj abg gung gubh fgbbqrfg va gur jnl ntnvafg zr: abj gurersber, vs
vg qvfcyrnfr gurr, V jvyy trg zr onpx ntnva.

22:35 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Onynnz, Tb jvgu gur zra: ohg
bayl gur jbeq gung V funyy fcrnx hagb gurr, gung gubh funyg fcrnx. Fb
Onynnz jrag jvgu gur cevaprf bs Onynx.

22:36 Naq jura Onynx urneq gung Onynnz jnf pbzr, ur jrag bhg gb zrrg
uvz hagb n pvgl bs Zbno, juvpu vf va gur obeqre bs Neaba, juvpu vf va
gur hgzbfg pbnfg.

22:37 Naq Onynx fnvq hagb Onynnz, Qvq V abg rnearfgyl fraq hagb gurr
gb pnyy gurr? jurersber pnzrfg gubh abg hagb zr? nz V abg noyr vaqrrq
gb cebzbgr gurr gb ubabhe?  22:38 Naq Onynnz fnvq hagb Onynx, Yb, V nz
pbzr hagb gurr: unir V abj nal cbjre ng nyy gb fnl nal guvat? gur jbeq
gung Tbq chggrgu va zl zbhgu, gung funyy V fcrnx.

22:39 Naq Onynnz jrag jvgu Onynx, naq gurl pnzr hagb Xvewnguuhmbgu.

22:40 Naq Onynx bssrerq bkra naq furrc, naq frag gb Onynnz, naq gb gur
cevaprf gung jrer jvgu uvz.

22:41 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur zbeebj, gung Onynx gbbx Onynnz, naq
oebhtug uvz hc vagb gur uvtu cynprf bs Onny, gung gurapr ur zvtug frr
gur hgzbfg cneg bs gur crbcyr.

23:1 Naq Onynnz fnvq hagb Onynx, Ohvyq zr urer frira nygnef, naq
cercner zr urer frira bkra naq frira enzf.

23:2 Naq Onynx qvq nf Onynnz unq fcbxra; naq Onynx naq Onynnz bssrerq
ba rirel nygne n ohyybpx naq n enz.

23:3 Naq Onynnz fnvq hagb Onynx, Fgnaq ol gul oheag bssrevat, naq V
jvyy tb: crenqiragher gur YBEQ jvyy pbzr gb zrrg zr: naq jungfbrire ur
furjrgu zr V jvyy gryy gurr. Naq ur jrag gb na uvtu cynpr.

23:4 Naq Tbq zrg Onynnz: naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, V unir cercnerq frira
nygnef, naq V unir bssrerq hcba rirel nygne n ohyybpx naq n enz.

23:5 Naq gur YBEQ chg n jbeq va Onynnz'f zbhgu, naq fnvq, Erghea hagb
Onynx, naq guhf gubh funyg fcrnx.

23:6 Naq ur erghearq hagb uvz, naq, yb, ur fgbbq ol uvf oheag
fnpevsvpr, ur, naq nyy gur cevaprf bs Zbno.

23:7 Naq ur gbbx hc uvf cnenoyr, naq fnvq, Onynx gur xvat bs Zbno ungu
oebhtug zr sebz Nenz, bhg bs gur zbhagnvaf bs gur rnfg, fnlvat, Pbzr,
phefr zr Wnpbo, naq pbzr, qrsl Vfenry.

23:8 Ubj funyy V phefr, jubz Tbq ungu abg phefrq? be ubj funyy V qrsl,
jubz gur YBEQ ungu abg qrsvrq?  23:9 Sbe sebz gur gbc bs gur ebpxf V
frr uvz, naq sebz gur uvyyf V orubyq uvz: yb, gur crbcyr funyy qjryy
nybar, naq funyy abg or erpxbarq nzbat gur angvbaf.

23:10 Jub pna pbhag gur qhfg bs Wnpbo, naq gur ahzore bs gur sbhegu
cneg bs Vfenry? Yrg zr qvr gur qrngu bs gur evtugrbhf, naq yrg zl ynfg
raq or yvxr uvf!  23:11 Naq Onynx fnvq hagb Onynnz, Jung unfg gubh
qbar hagb zr? V gbbx gurr gb phefr zvar rarzvrf, naq, orubyq, gubh
unfg oyrffrq gurz nygbtrgure.

23:12 Naq ur nafjrerq naq fnvq, Zhfg V abg gnxr urrq gb fcrnx gung
juvpu gur YBEQ ungu chg va zl zbhgu?  23:13 Naq Onynx fnvq hagb uvz,
Pbzr, V cenl gurr, jvgu zr hagb nabgure cynpr, sebz jurapr gubh znlrfg
frr gurz: gubh funyg frr ohg gur hgzbfg cneg bs gurz, naq funyg abg
frr gurz nyy: naq phefr zr gurz sebz gurapr.

23:14 Naq ur oebhtug uvz vagb gur svryq bs Mbcuvz, gb gur gbc bs
Cvftnu, naq ohvyg frira nygnef, naq bssrerq n ohyybpx naq n enz ba
rirel nygne.

23:15 Naq ur fnvq hagb Onynx, Fgnaq urer ol gul oheag bssrevat, juvyr
V zrrg gur YBEQ lbaqre.

23:16 Naq gur YBEQ zrg Onynnz, naq chg n jbeq va uvf zbhgu, naq fnvq,
Tb ntnva hagb Onynx, naq fnl guhf.

23:17 Naq jura ur pnzr gb uvz, orubyq, ur fgbbq ol uvf oheag bssrevat,
naq gur cevaprf bs Zbno jvgu uvz. Naq Onynx fnvq hagb uvz, Jung ungu
gur YBEQ fcbxra?  23:18 Naq ur gbbx hc uvf cnenoyr, naq fnvq, Evfr hc,
Onynx, naq urne; urnexra hagb zr, gubh fba bs Mvccbe: 23:19 Tbq vf abg
n zna, gung ur fubhyq yvr; arvgure gur fba bs zna, gung ur fubhyq
ercrag: ungu ur fnvq, naq funyy ur abg qb vg? be ungu ur fcbxra, naq
funyy ur abg znxr vg tbbq?  23:20 Orubyq, V unir erprvirq pbzznaqzrag
gb oyrff: naq ur ungu oyrffrq; naq V pnaabg erirefr vg.

23:21 Ur ungu abg oruryq vavdhvgl va Wnpbo, arvgure ungu ur frra
creirefrarff va Vfenry: gur YBEQ uvf Tbq vf jvgu uvz, naq gur fubhg bs
n xvat vf nzbat gurz.

23:22 Tbq oebhtug gurz bhg bs Rtlcg; ur ungu nf vg jrer gur fgeratgu
bs na havpbea.

23:23 Fheryl gurer vf ab rapunagzrag ntnvafg Wnpbo, arvgure vf gurer
nal qvivangvba ntnvafg Vfenry: nppbeqvat gb guvf gvzr vg funyy or fnvq
bs Wnpbo naq bs Vfenry, Jung ungu Tbq jebhtug!  23:24 Orubyq, gur
crbcyr funyy evfr hc nf n terng yvba, naq yvsg hc uvzfrys nf n lbhat
yvba: ur funyy abg yvr qbja hagvy ur rng bs gur cerl, naq qevax gur
oybbq bs gur fynva.

23:25 Naq Onynx fnvq hagb Onynnz, Arvgure phefr gurz ng nyy, abe oyrff
gurz ng nyy.

23:26 Ohg Onynnz nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb Onynx, Gbyq abg V gurr,
fnlvat, Nyy gung gur YBEQ fcrnxrgu, gung V zhfg qb?  23:27 Naq Onynx
fnvq hagb Onynnz, Pbzr, V cenl gurr, V jvyy oevat gurr hagb nabgure
cynpr; crenqiragher vg jvyy cyrnfr Tbq gung gubh znlrfg phefr zr gurz
sebz gurapr.

23:28 Naq Onynx oebhtug Onynnz hagb gur gbc bs Crbe, gung ybbxrgu
gbjneq Wrfuvzba.

23:29 Naq Onynnz fnvq hagb Onynx, Ohvyq zr urer frira nygnef, naq
cercner zr urer frira ohyybpxf naq frira enzf.

23:30 Naq Onynx qvq nf Onynnz unq fnvq, naq bssrerq n ohyybpx naq n
enz ba rirel nygne.

24:1 Naq jura Onynnz fnj gung vg cyrnfrq gur YBEQ gb oyrff Vfenry, ur
jrag abg, nf ng bgure gvzrf, gb frrx sbe rapunagzragf, ohg ur frg uvf
snpr gbjneq gur jvyqrearff.

24:2 Naq Onynnz yvsgrq hc uvf rlrf, naq ur fnj Vfenry novqvat va uvf
gragf nppbeqvat gb gurve gevorf; naq gur fcvevg bs Tbq pnzr hcba uvz.

24:3 Naq ur gbbx hc uvf cnenoyr, naq fnvq, Onynnz gur fba bs Orbe ungu
fnvq, naq gur zna jubfr rlrf ner bcra ungu fnvq: 24:4 Ur ungu fnvq,
juvpu urneq gur jbeqf bs Tbq, juvpu fnj gur ivfvba bs gur Nyzvtugl,
snyyvat vagb n genapr, ohg univat uvf rlrf bcra: 24:5 Ubj tbbqyl ner
gul gragf, B Wnpbo, naq gul gnoreanpyrf, B Vfenry!  24:6 Nf gur
inyyrlf ner gurl fcernq sbegu, nf tneqraf ol gur evire'f fvqr, nf gur
gerrf bs yvta nybrf juvpu gur YBEQ ungu cynagrq, naq nf prqne gerrf
orfvqr gur jngref.

24:7 Ur funyy cbhe gur jngre bhg bs uvf ohpxrgf, naq uvf frrq funyy or
va znal jngref, naq uvf xvat funyy or uvture guna Ntnt, naq uvf
xvatqbz funyy or rknygrq.

24:8 Tbq oebhtug uvz sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg; ur ungu nf vg jrer gur
fgeratgu bs na havpbea: ur funyy rng hc gur angvbaf uvf rarzvrf, naq
funyy oernx gurve obarf, naq cvrepr gurz guebhtu jvgu uvf neebjf.

24:9 Ur pbhpurq, ur ynl qbja nf n yvba, naq nf n terng yvba: jub funyy
fgve uvz hc? Oyrffrq vf ur gung oyrffrgu gurr, naq phefrq vf ur gung
phefrgu gurr.

24:10 Naq Onynx'f natre jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg Onynnz, naq ur fzbgr uvf
unaqf gbtrgure: naq Onynx fnvq hagb Onynnz, V pnyyrq gurr gb phefr
zvar rarzvrf, naq, orubyq, gubh unfg nygbtrgure oyrffrq gurz gurfr
guerr gvzrf.

24:11 Gurersber abj syrr gubh gb gul cynpr: V gubhtug gb cebzbgr gurr
hagb terng ubabhe; ohg, yb, gur YBEQ ungu xrcg gurr onpx sebz ubabhe.

24:12 Naq Onynnz fnvq hagb Onynx, Fcnxr V abg nyfb gb gul zrffratref
juvpu gubh fragrfg hagb zr, fnlvat, 24:13 Vs Onynx jbhyq tvir zr uvf
ubhfr shyy bs fvyire naq tbyq, V pnaabg tb orlbaq gur pbzznaqzrag bs
gur YBEQ, gb qb rvgure tbbq be onq bs zvar bja zvaq; ohg jung gur YBEQ
fnvgu, gung jvyy V fcrnx?  24:14 Naq abj, orubyq, V tb hagb zl crbcyr:
pbzr gurersber, naq V jvyy nqiregvfr gurr jung guvf crbcyr funyy qb gb
gul crbcyr va gur ynggre qnlf.

24:15 Naq ur gbbx hc uvf cnenoyr, naq fnvq, Onynnz gur fba bs Orbe
ungu fnvq, naq gur zna jubfr rlrf ner bcra ungu fnvq: 24:16 Ur ungu
fnvq, juvpu urneq gur jbeqf bs Tbq, naq xarj gur xabjyrqtr bs gur zbfg
Uvtu, juvpu fnj gur ivfvba bs gur Nyzvtugl, snyyvat vagb n genapr, ohg
univat uvf rlrf bcra: 24:17 V funyy frr uvz, ohg abg abj: V funyy
orubyq uvz, ohg abg avtu: gurer funyy pbzr n Fgne bhg bs Wnpbo, naq n
Fprcger funyy evfr bhg bs Vfenry, naq funyy fzvgr gur pbearef bs Zbno,
naq qrfgebl nyy gur puvyqera bs Furgu.

24:18 Naq Rqbz funyy or n cbffrffvba, Frve nyfb funyy or n cbffrffvba
sbe uvf rarzvrf; naq Vfenry funyy qb inyvnagyl.

24:19 Bhg bs Wnpbo funyy pbzr ur gung funyy unir qbzvavba, naq funyy
qrfgebl uvz gung erznvargu bs gur pvgl.

24:20 Naq jura ur ybbxrq ba Nznyrx, ur gbbx hc uvf cnenoyr, naq fnvq,
Nznyrx jnf gur svefg bs gur angvbaf; ohg uvf ynggre raq funyy or gung
ur crevfu sbe rire.

24:21 Naq ur ybbxrq ba gur Xravgrf, naq gbbx hc uvf cnenoyr, naq fnvq,
Fgebat vf gul qjryyvatcynpr, naq gubh chggrfg gul arfg va n ebpx.

24:22 Arireguryrff gur Xravgr funyy or jnfgrq, hagvy Nffuhe funyy
pneel gurr njnl pncgvir.

24:23 Naq ur gbbx hc uvf cnenoyr, naq fnvq, Nynf, jub funyy yvir jura
Tbq qbrgu guvf!  24:24 Naq fuvcf funyy pbzr sebz gur pbnfg bs Puvggvz,
naq funyy nssyvpg Nffuhe, naq funyy nssyvpg Rore, naq ur nyfb funyy
crevfu sbe rire.

24:25 Naq Onynnz ebfr hc, naq jrag naq erghearq gb uvf cynpr: naq
Onynx nyfb jrag uvf jnl.

25:1 Naq Vfenry nobqr va Fuvggvz, naq gur crbcyr ortna gb pbzzvg
juberqbz jvgu gur qnhtugref bs Zbno.

25:2 Naq gurl pnyyrq gur crbcyr hagb gur fnpevsvprf bs gurve tbqf: naq
gur crbcyr qvq rng, naq objrq qbja gb gurve tbqf.

25:3 Naq Vfenry wbvarq uvzfrys hagb Onnycrbe: naq gur natre bs gur
YBEQ jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg Vfenry.

25:4 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Gnxr nyy gur urnqf bs gur crbcyr,
naq unat gurz hc orsber gur YBEQ ntnvafg gur fha, gung gur svrepr
natre bs gur YBEQ znl or ghearq njnl sebz Vfenry.

25:5 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gur whqtrf bs Vfenry, Fynl lr rirel bar uvf
zra gung jrer wbvarq hagb Onnycrbe.

25:6 Naq, orubyq, bar bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pnzr naq oebhtug hagb
uvf oerguera n Zvqvnavgvfu jbzna va gur fvtug bs Zbfrf, naq va gur
fvtug bs nyy gur pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, jub jrer
jrrcvat orsber gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

25:7 Naq jura Cuvarunf, gur fba bs Ryrnmne, gur fba bs Nneba gur
cevrfg, fnj vg, ur ebfr hc sebz nzbat gur pbatertngvba, naq gbbx n
wniryva va uvf unaq; 25:8 Naq ur jrag nsgre gur zna bs Vfenry vagb gur
grag, naq guehfg obgu bs gurz guebhtu, gur zna bs Vfenry, naq gur
jbzna guebhtu ure oryyl. Fb gur cynthr jnf fgnlrq sebz gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry.

25:9 Naq gubfr gung qvrq va gur cynthr jrer gjragl naq sbhe gubhfnaq.

25:10 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 25:11 Cuvarunf, gur fba
bs Ryrnmne, gur fba bs Nneba gur cevrfg, ungu ghearq zl jengu njnl
sebz gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, juvyr ur jnf mrnybhf sbe zl fnxr nzbat
gurz, gung V pbafhzrq abg gur puvyqera bs Vfenry va zl wrnybhfl.

25:12 Jurersber fnl, Orubyq, V tvir hagb uvz zl pbiranag bs crnpr:
25:13 Naq ur funyy unir vg, naq uvf frrq nsgre uvz, rira gur pbiranag
bs na rireynfgvat cevrfgubbq; orpnhfr ur jnf mrnybhf sbe uvf Tbq, naq
znqr na ngbarzrag sbe gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

25:14 Abj gur anzr bs gur Vfenryvgr gung jnf fynva, rira gung jnf
fynva jvgu gur Zvqvnavgvfu jbzna, jnf Mvzev, gur fba bs Fnyh, n cevapr
bs n puvrs ubhfr nzbat gur Fvzrbavgrf.

25:15 Naq gur anzr bs gur Zvqvnavgvfu jbzna gung jnf fynva jnf Pbmov,
gur qnhtugre bs Mhe; ur jnf urnq bire n crbcyr, naq bs n puvrs ubhfr
va Zvqvna.

25:16 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 25:17 Irk gur Zvqvnavgrf,
naq fzvgr gurz: 25:18 Sbe gurl irk lbh jvgu gurve jvyrf, jurerjvgu
gurl unir orthvyrq lbh va gur znggre bs Crbe, naq va gur znggre bs
Pbmov, gur qnhtugre bs n cevapr bs Zvqvna, gurve fvfgre, juvpu jnf
fynva va gur qnl bs gur cynthr sbe Crbe'f fnxr.

26:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre gur cynthr, gung gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb
Zbfrf naq hagb Ryrnmne gur fba bs Nneba gur cevrfg, fnlvat, 26:2 Gnxr
gur fhz bs nyy gur pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, sebz gjragl
lrnef byq naq hcjneq, guebhtubhg gurve snguref' ubhfr, nyy gung ner
noyr gb tb gb jne va Vfenry.

26:3 Naq Zbfrf naq Ryrnmne gur cevrfg fcnxr jvgu gurz va gur cynvaf bs
Zbno ol Wbeqna arne Wrevpub, fnlvat, 26:4 Gnxr gur fhz bs gur crbcyr,
sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf naq gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, juvpu jrag sbegu bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

26:5 Erhora, gur ryqrfg fba bs Vfenry: gur puvyqera bs Erhora; Unabpu,
bs jubz pbzrgu gur snzvyl bs gur Unabpuvgrf: bs Cnyyh, gur snzvyl bs
gur Cnyyhvgrf: 26:6 Bs Urmeba, gur snzvyl bs gur Urmebavgrf: bs Pnezv,
gur snzvyl bs gur Pnezvgrf.

26:7 Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs gur Erhoravgrf: naq gurl gung jrer
ahzorerq bs gurz jrer sbegl naq guerr gubhfnaq naq frira uhaqerq naq
guvegl.

26:8 Naq gur fbaf bs Cnyyh; Ryvno.

26:9 Naq gur fbaf bs Ryvno; Arzhry, naq Qnguna, naq Novenz. Guvf vf
gung Qnguna naq Novenz, juvpu jrer snzbhf va gur pbatertngvba, jub
fgebir ntnvafg Zbfrf naq ntnvafg Nneba va gur pbzcnal bs Xbenu, jura
gurl fgebir ntnvafg gur YBEQ: 26:10 Naq gur rnegu bcrarq ure zbhgu,
naq fjnyybjrq gurz hc gbtrgure jvgu Xbenu, jura gung pbzcnal qvrq,
jung gvzr gur sver qribherq gjb uhaqerq naq svsgl zra: naq gurl orpnzr
n fvta.

26:11 Abgjvgufgnaqvat gur puvyqera bs Xbenu qvrq abg.

26:12 Gur fbaf bs Fvzrba nsgre gurve snzvyvrf: bs Arzhry, gur snzvyl
bs gur Arzhryvgrf: bs Wnzva, gur snzvyl bs gur Wnzvavgrf: bs Wnpuva,
gur snzvyl bs gur Wnpuvavgrf: 26:13 Bs Mrenu, gur snzvyl bs gur
Mneuvgrf: bs Funhy, gur snzvyl bs gur Funhyvgrf.

26:14 Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs gur Fvzrbavgrf, gjragl naq gjb
gubhfnaq naq gjb uhaqerq.

26:15 Gur puvyqera bs Tnq nsgre gurve snzvyvrf: bs Mrcuba, gur snzvyl
bs gur Mrcubavgrf: bs Unttv, gur snzvyl bs gur Unttvgrf: bs Fuhav, gur
snzvyl bs gur Fuhavgrf: 26:16 Bs Bmav, gur snzvyl bs gur Bmavgrf: bs
Rev, gur snzvyl bs gur Revgrf: 26:17 Bs Nebq, gur snzvyl bs gur
Nebqvgrf: bs Neryv, gur snzvyl bs gur Neryvgrf.

26:18 Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs gur puvyqera bs Tnq nppbeqvat gb gubfr
gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, sbegl gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq.

26:19 Gur fbaf bs Whqnu jrer Re naq Bana: naq Re naq Bana qvrq va gur
ynaq bs Pnanna.

26:20 Naq gur fbaf bs Whqnu nsgre gurve snzvyvrf jrer; bs Furynu, gur
snzvyl bs gur Furynavgrf: bs Cunerm, gur snzvyl bs gur Cunemvgrf: bs
Mrenu, gur snzvyl bs gur Mneuvgrf.

26:21 Naq gur fbaf bs Cunerm jrer; bs Urmeba, gur snzvyl bs gur
Urmebavgrf: bs Unzhy, gur snzvyl bs gur Unzhyvgrf.

26:22 Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs Whqnu nppbeqvat gb gubfr gung jrer
ahzorerq bs gurz, guerrfpber naq fvkgrra gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq.

26:23 Bs gur fbaf bs Vffnpune nsgre gurve snzvyvrf: bs Gbyn, gur
snzvyl bs gur Gbynvgrf: bs Chn, gur snzvyl bs gur Chavgrf: 26:24 Bs
Wnfuho, gur snzvyl bs gur Wnfuhovgrf: bs Fuvzeba, gur snzvyl bs gur
Fuvzebavgrf.

26:25 Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs Vffnpune nppbeqvat gb gubfr gung jrer
ahzorerq bs gurz, guerrfpber naq sbhe gubhfnaq naq guerr uhaqerq.

26:26 Bs gur fbaf bs Mrohyha nsgre gurve snzvyvrf: bs Frerq, gur
snzvyl bs gur Fneqvgrf: bs Ryba, gur snzvyl bs gur Rybavgrf: bs
Wnuyrry, gur snzvyl bs gur Wnuyrryvgrf.

26:27 Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs gur Mrohyhavgrf nppbeqvat gb gubfr
gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, guerrfpber gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq.

26:28 Gur fbaf bs Wbfrcu nsgre gurve snzvyvrf jrer Znanffru naq
Rcuenvz.

26:29 Bs gur fbaf bs Znanffru: bs Znpuve, gur snzvyl bs gur
Znpuvevgrf: naq Znpuve ortng Tvyrnq: bs Tvyrnq pbzr gur snzvyl bs gur
Tvyrnqvgrf.

26:30 Gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Tvyrnq: bs Wrrmre, gur snzvyl bs gur
Wrrmrevgrf: bs Uryrx, gur snzvyl bs gur Uryrxvgrf: 26:31 Naq bs
Nfevry, gur snzvyl bs gur Nfevryvgrf: naq bs Furpurz, gur snzvyl bs
gur Furpurzvgrf: 26:32 Naq bs Furzvqn, gur snzvyl bs gur Furzvqnvgrf:
naq bs Urcure, gur snzvyl bs gur Urcurevgrf.

26:33 Naq Mrybcurunq gur fba bs Urcure unq ab fbaf, ohg qnhtugref: naq
gur anzrf bs gur qnhtugref bs Mrybcurunq jrer Znuynu, naq Abnu,
Ubtynu, Zvypnu, naq Gvemnu.

26:34 Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs Znanffru, naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq
bs gurz, svsgl naq gjb gubhfnaq naq frira uhaqerq.

26:35 Gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Rcuenvz nsgre gurve snzvyvrf: bs
Fuhgurynu, gur snzvyl bs gur Fuhgunyuvgrf: bs Orpure, gur snzvyl bs
gur Onpuevgrf: bs Gnuna, gur snzvyl bs gur Gnunavgrf.

26:36 Naq gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Fuhgurynu: bs Rena, gur snzvyl bs gur
Renavgrf.

26:37 Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs gur fbaf bs Rcuenvz nppbeqvat gb gubfr
gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz, guvegl naq gjb gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq.
Gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Wbfrcu nsgre gurve snzvyvrf.

26:38 Gur fbaf bs Orawnzva nsgre gurve snzvyvrf: bs Oryn, gur snzvyl
bs gur Orynvgrf: bs Nfuory, gur snzvyl bs gur Nfuoryvgrf: bs Nuvenz,
gur snzvyl bs gur Nuvenzvgrf: 26:39 Bs Fuhcunz, gur snzvyl bs gur
Fuhcunzvgrf: bs Uhcunz, gur snzvyl bs gur Uhcunzvgrf.

26:40 Naq gur fbaf bs Oryn jrer Neq naq Annzna: bs Neq, gur snzvyl bs
gur Neqvgrf: naq bs Annzna, gur snzvyl bs gur Annzvgrf.

26:41 Gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Orawnzva nsgre gurve snzvyvrf: naq gurl
gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz jrer sbegl naq svir gubhfnaq naq fvk
uhaqerq.

26:42 Gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Qna nsgre gurve snzvyvrf: bs Fuhunz, gur
snzvyl bs gur Fuhunzvgrf. Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs Qna nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf.

26:43 Nyy gur snzvyvrf bs gur Fuhunzvgrf, nppbeqvat gb gubfr gung jrer
ahzorerq bs gurz, jrer guerrfpber naq sbhe gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq.

26:44 Bs gur puvyqera bs Nfure nsgre gurve snzvyvrf: bs Wvzan, gur
snzvyl bs gur Wvzavgrf: bs Wrfhv, gur snzvyl bs gur Wrfhvgrf: bs
Orevnu, gur snzvyl bs gur Orevvgrf.

26:45 Bs gur fbaf bs Orevnu: bs Urore, gur snzvyl bs gur Urorevgrf: bs
Znypuvry, gur snzvyl bs gur Znypuvryvgrf.

26:46 Naq gur anzr bs gur qnhtugre bs Nfure jnf Fnenu.

26:47 Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs gur fbaf bs Nfure nppbeqvat gb gubfr
gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz; jub jrer svsgl naq guerr gubhfnaq naq sbhe
uhaqerq.

26:48 Bs gur fbaf bs Ancugnyv nsgre gurve snzvyvrf: bs Wnumrry, gur
snzvyl bs gur Wnumrryvgrf: bs Thav, gur snzvyl bs gur Thavgrf: 26:49
Bs Wrmre, gur snzvyl bs gur Wrmrevgrf: bs Fuvyyrz, gur snzvyl bs gur
Fuvyyrzvgrf.

26:50 Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs Ancugnyv nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf:
naq gurl gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz jrer sbegl naq svir gubhfnaq naq
sbhe uhaqerq.

26:51 Gurfr jrer gur ahzorerq bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, fvk uhaqerq
gubhfnaq naq n gubhfnaq frira uhaqerq naq guvegl.

26:52 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 26:53 Hagb gurfr gur ynaq
funyy or qvivqrq sbe na vaurevgnapr nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs anzrf.

26:54 Gb znal gubh funyg tvir gur zber vaurevgnapr, naq gb srj gubh
funyg tvir gur yrff vaurevgnapr: gb rirel bar funyy uvf vaurevgnapr or
tvira nppbeqvat gb gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs uvz.

26:55 Abgjvgufgnaqvat gur ynaq funyy or qvivqrq ol ybg: nppbeqvat gb
gur anzrf bs gur gevorf bs gurve snguref gurl funyy vaurevg.

26:56 Nppbeqvat gb gur ybg funyy gur cbffrffvba gurerbs or qvivqrq
orgjrra znal naq srj.

26:57 Naq gurfr ner gurl gung jrer ahzorerq bs gur Yrivgrf nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf: bs Trefuba, gur snzvyl bs gur Trefubavgrf: bs Xbungu, gur
snzvyl bs gur Xbunguvgrf: bs Zrenev, gur snzvyl bs gur Zrenevgrf.

26:58 Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs gur Yrivgrf: gur snzvyl bs gur
Yvoavgrf, gur snzvyl bs gur Uroebavgrf, gur snzvyl bs gur Znuyvgrf,
gur snzvyl bs gur Zhfuvgrf, gur snzvyl bs gur Xbenguvgrf. Naq Xbungu
ortng Nzenz.

26:59 Naq gur anzr bs Nzenz'f jvsr jnf Wbpurorq, gur qnhtugre bs Yriv,
jubz ure zbgure oner gb Yriv va Rtlcg: naq fur oner hagb Nzenz Nneba
naq Zbfrf, naq Zvevnz gurve fvfgre.

26:60 Naq hagb Nneba jnf obea Anqno, naq Novuh, Ryrnmne, naq Vgunzne.

26:61 Naq Anqno naq Novuh qvrq, jura gurl bssrerq fgenatr sver orsber
gur YBEQ.

26:62 Naq gubfr gung jrer ahzorerq bs gurz jrer gjragl naq guerr
gubhfnaq, nyy znyrf sebz n zbagu byq naq hcjneq: sbe gurl jrer abg
ahzorerq nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, orpnhfr gurer jnf ab
vaurevgnapr tvira gurz nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

26:63 Gurfr ner gurl gung jrer ahzorerq ol Zbfrf naq Ryrnmne gur
cevrfg, jub ahzorerq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry va gur cynvaf bs Zbno ol
Wbeqna arne Wrevpub.

26:64 Ohg nzbat gurfr gurer jnf abg n zna bs gurz jubz Zbfrf naq Nneba
gur cevrfg ahzorerq, jura gurl ahzorerq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry va gur
jvyqrearff bs Fvanv.

26:65 Sbe gur YBEQ unq fnvq bs gurz, Gurl funyy fheryl qvr va gur
jvyqrearff. Naq gurer jnf abg yrsg n zna bs gurz, fnir Pnyro gur fba
bs Wrcuhaaru, naq Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha.

27:1 Gura pnzr gur qnhtugref bs Mrybcurunq, gur fba bs Urcure, gur fba
bs Tvyrnq, gur fba bs Znpuve, gur fba bs Znanffru, bs gur snzvyvrf bs
Znanffru gur fba bs Wbfrcu: naq gurfr ner gur anzrf bs uvf qnhtugref;
Znuynu, Abnu, naq Ubtynu, naq Zvypnu, naq Gvemnu.

27:2 Naq gurl fgbbq orsber Zbfrf, naq orsber Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, naq
orsber gur cevaprf naq nyy gur pbatertngvba, ol gur qbbe bs gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, fnlvat, 27:3 Bhe sngure qvrq va gur
jvyqrearff, naq ur jnf abg va gur pbzcnal bs gurz gung tngurerq
gurzfryirf gbtrgure ntnvafg gur YBEQ va gur pbzcnal bs Xbenu; ohg qvrq
va uvf bja fva, naq unq ab fbaf.

27:4 Jul fubhyq gur anzr bs bhe sngure or qbar njnl sebz nzbat uvf
snzvyl, orpnhfr ur ungu ab fba? Tvir hagb hf gurersber n cbffrffvba
nzbat gur oerguera bs bhe sngure.

27:5 Naq Zbfrf oebhtug gurve pnhfr orsber gur YBEQ.

27:6 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 27:7 Gur qnhtugref bs
Mrybcurunq fcrnx evtug: gubh funyg fheryl tvir gurz n cbffrffvba bs na
vaurevgnapr nzbat gurve sngure'f oerguera; naq gubh funyg pnhfr gur
vaurevgnapr bs gurve sngure gb cnff hagb gurz.

27:8 Naq gubh funyg fcrnx hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Vs n
zna qvr, naq unir ab fba, gura lr funyy pnhfr uvf vaurevgnapr gb cnff
hagb uvf qnhtugre.

27:9 Naq vs ur unir ab qnhtugre, gura lr funyy tvir uvf vaurevgnapr
hagb uvf oerguera.

27:10 Naq vs ur unir ab oerguera, gura lr funyy tvir uvf vaurevgnapr
hagb uvf sngure'f oerguera.

27:11 Naq vs uvf sngure unir ab oerguera, gura lr funyy tvir uvf
vaurevgnapr hagb uvf xvafzna gung vf arkg gb uvz bs uvf snzvyl, naq ur
funyy cbffrff vg: naq vg funyy or hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry n
fgnghgr bs whqtzrag, nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

27:12 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Trg gurr hc vagb guvf zbhag
Nonevz, naq frr gur ynaq juvpu V unir tvira hagb gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry.

27:13 Naq jura gubh unfg frra vg, gubh nyfb funyg or tngurerq hagb gul
crbcyr, nf Nneba gul oebgure jnf tngurerq.

27:14 Sbe lr eroryyrq ntnvafg zl pbzznaqzrag va gur qrfreg bs Mva, va
gur fgevsr bs gur pbatertngvba, gb fnapgvsl zr ng gur jngre orsber
gurve rlrf: gung vf gur jngre bs Zrevonu va Xnqrfu va gur jvyqrearff
bs Mva.

27:15 Naq Zbfrf fcnxr hagb gur YBEQ, fnlvat, 27:16 Yrg gur YBEQ, gur
Tbq bs gur fcvevgf bs nyy syrfu, frg n zna bire gur pbatertngvba,
27:17 Juvpu znl tb bhg orsber gurz, naq juvpu znl tb va orsber gurz,
naq juvpu znl yrnq gurz bhg, naq juvpu znl oevat gurz va; gung gur
pbatertngvba bs gur YBEQ or abg nf furrc juvpu unir ab furcureq.

27:18 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Gnxr gurr Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha, n
zna va jubz vf gur fcvevg, naq ynl guvar unaq hcba uvz; 27:19 Naq frg
uvz orsber Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, naq orsber nyy gur pbatertngvba; naq
tvir uvz n punetr va gurve fvtug.

27:20 Naq gubh funyg chg fbzr bs guvar ubabhe hcba uvz, gung nyy gur
pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry znl or borqvrag.

27:21 Naq ur funyy fgnaq orsber Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, jub funyy nfx
pbhafry sbe uvz nsgre gur whqtzrag bs Hevz orsber gur YBEQ: ng uvf
jbeq funyy gurl tb bhg, naq ng uvf jbeq gurl funyy pbzr va, obgu ur,
naq nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jvgu uvz, rira nyy gur pbatertngvba.

27:22 Naq Zbfrf qvq nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq uvz: naq ur gbbx Wbfuhn, naq
frg uvz orsber Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, naq orsber nyy gur pbatertngvba:
27:23 Naq ur ynvq uvf unaqf hcba uvz, naq tnir uvz n punetr, nf gur
YBEQ pbzznaqrq ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf.

28:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 28:2 Pbzznaq gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Zl bssrevat, naq zl oernq sbe zl
fnpevsvprf znqr ol sver, sbe n fjrrg fnibhe hagb zr, funyy lr bofreir
gb bssre hagb zr va gurve qhr frnfba.

28:3 Naq gubh funyg fnl hagb gurz, Guvf vf gur bssrevat znqr ol sver
juvpu lr funyy bssre hagb gur YBEQ; gjb ynzof bs gur svefg lrne
jvgubhg fcbg qnl ol qnl, sbe n pbagvahny oheag bssrevat.

28:4 Gur bar ynzo funyg gubh bssre va gur zbeavat, naq gur bgure ynzo
funyg gubh bssre ng rira; 28:5 Naq n gragu cneg bs na rcunu bs sybhe
sbe n zrng bssrevat, zvatyrq jvgu gur sbhegu cneg bs na uva bs orngra
bvy.

28:6 Vg vf n pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, juvpu jnf beqnvarq va zbhag
Fvanv sbe n fjrrg fnibhe, n fnpevsvpr znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ.

28:7 Naq gur qevax bssrevat gurerbs funyy or gur sbhegu cneg bs na uva
sbe gur bar ynzo: va gur ubyl cynpr funyg gubh pnhfr gur fgebat jvar
gb or cbherq hagb gur YBEQ sbe n qevax bssrevat.

28:8 Naq gur bgure ynzo funyg gubh bssre ng rira: nf gur zrng bssrevat
bs gur zbeavat, naq nf gur qevax bssrevat gurerbs, gubh funyg bssre
vg, n fnpevsvpr znqr ol sver, bs n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ.

28:9 Naq ba gur fnoongu qnl gjb ynzof bs gur svefg lrne jvgubhg fcbg,
naq gjb gragu qrnyf bs sybhe sbe n zrng bssrevat, zvatyrq jvgu bvy,
naq gur qevax bssrevat gurerbs: 28:10 Guvf vf gur oheag bssrevat bs
rirel fnoongu, orfvqr gur pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, naq uvf qevax
bssrevat.

28:11 Naq va gur ortvaavatf bs lbhe zbaguf lr funyy bssre n oheag
bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ; gjb lbhat ohyybpxf, naq bar enz, frira ynzof
bs gur svefg lrne jvgubhg fcbg; 28:12 Naq guerr gragu qrnyf bs sybhe
sbe n zrng bssrevat, zvatyrq jvgu bvy, sbe bar ohyybpx; naq gjb gragu
qrnyf bs sybhe sbe n zrng bssrevat, zvatyrq jvgu bvy, sbe bar enz;
28:13 Naq n frireny gragu qrny bs sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy sbe n zrng
bssrevat hagb bar ynzo; sbe n oheag bssrevat bs n fjrrg fnibhe, n
fnpevsvpr znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ.

28:14 Naq gurve qevax bssrevatf funyy or unys na uva bs jvar hagb n
ohyybpx, naq gur guveq cneg bs na uva hagb n enz, naq n sbhegu cneg bs
na uva hagb n ynzo: guvf vf gur oheag bssrevat bs rirel zbagu
guebhtubhg gur zbaguf bs gur lrne.

28:15 Naq bar xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ funyy
or bssrerq, orfvqr gur pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, naq uvf qevax
bssrevat.

28:16 Naq va gur sbhegrragu qnl bs gur svefg zbagu vf gur cnffbire bs
gur YBEQ.

28:17 Naq va gur svsgrragu qnl bs guvf zbagu vf gur srnfg: frira qnlf
funyy hayrnirarq oernq or rngra.

28:18 Va gur svefg qnl funyy or na ubyl pbaibpngvba; lr funyy qb ab
znaare bs freivyr jbex gurerva: 28:19 Ohg lr funyy bssre n fnpevsvpr
znqr ol sver sbe n oheag bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ; gjb lbhat ohyybpxf,
naq bar enz, naq frira ynzof bs gur svefg lrne: gurl funyy or hagb lbh
jvgubhg oyrzvfu: 28:20 Naq gurve zrng bssrevat funyy or bs sybhe
zvatyrq jvgu bvy: guerr gragu qrnyf funyy lr bssre sbe n ohyybpx, naq
gjb gragu qrnyf sbe n enz; 28:21 N frireny gragu qrny funyg gubh bssre
sbe rirel ynzo, guebhtubhg gur frira ynzof: 28:22 Naq bar tbng sbe n
fva bssrevat, gb znxr na ngbarzrag sbe lbh.

28:23 Lr funyy bssre gurfr orfvqr gur oheag bssrevat va gur zbeavat,
juvpu vf sbe n pbagvahny oheag bssrevat.

28:24 Nsgre guvf znaare lr funyy bssre qnvyl, guebhtubhg gur frira
qnlf, gur zrng bs gur fnpevsvpr znqr ol sver, bs n fjrrg fnibhe hagb
gur YBEQ: vg funyy or bssrerq orfvqr gur pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, naq
uvf qevax bssrevat.

28:25 Naq ba gur friragu qnl lr funyy unir na ubyl pbaibpngvba; lr
funyy qb ab freivyr jbex.

28:26 Nyfb va gur qnl bs gur svefgsehvgf, jura lr oevat n arj zrng
bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ, nsgre lbhe jrrxf or bhg, lr funyy unir na ubyl
pbaibpngvba; lr funyy qb ab freivyr jbex: 28:27 Ohg lr funyy bssre gur
oheag bssrevat sbe n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ; gjb lbhat ohyybpxf,
bar enz, frira ynzof bs gur svefg lrne; 28:28 Naq gurve zrng bssrevat
bs sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy, guerr gragu qrnyf hagb bar ohyybpx, gjb
gragu qrnyf hagb bar enz, 28:29 N frireny gragu qrny hagb bar ynzo,
guebhtubhg gur frira ynzof; 28:30 Naq bar xvq bs gur tbngf, gb znxr na
ngbarzrag sbe lbh.

28:31 Lr funyy bssre gurz orfvqr gur pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, naq uvf
zrng bssrevat, (gurl funyy or hagb lbh jvgubhg oyrzvfu) naq gurve
qevax bssrevatf.

29:1 Naq va gur friragu zbagu, ba gur svefg qnl bs gur zbagu, lr funyy
unir na ubyl pbaibpngvba; lr funyy qb ab freivyr jbex: vg vf n qnl bs
oybjvat gur gehzcrgf hagb lbh.

29:2 Naq lr funyy bssre n oheag bssrevat sbe n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur
YBEQ; bar lbhat ohyybpx, bar enz, naq frira ynzof bs gur svefg lrne
jvgubhg oyrzvfu: 29:3 Naq gurve zrng bssrevat funyy or bs sybhe
zvatyrq jvgu bvy, guerr gragu qrnyf sbe n ohyybpx, naq gjb gragu qrnyf
sbe n enz, 29:4 Naq bar gragu qrny sbe bar ynzo, guebhtubhg gur frira
ynzof: 29:5 Naq bar xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat, gb znxr na
ngbarzrag sbe lbh: 29:6 Orfvqr gur oheag bssrevat bs gur zbagu, naq
uvf zrng bssrevat, naq gur qnvyl oheag bssrevat, naq uvf zrng
bssrevat, naq gurve qevax bssrevatf, nppbeqvat hagb gurve znaare, sbe
n fjrrg fnibhe, n fnpevsvpr znqr ol sver hagb gur YBEQ.

29:7 Naq lr funyy unir ba gur gragu qnl bs guvf friragu zbagu na ubyl
pbaibpngvba; naq lr funyy nssyvpg lbhe fbhyf: lr funyy abg qb nal jbex
gurerva: 29:8 Ohg lr funyy bssre n oheag bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ sbe n
fjrrg fnibhe; bar lbhat ohyybpx, bar enz, naq frira ynzof bs gur svefg
lrne; gurl funyy or hagb lbh jvgubhg oyrzvfu: 29:9 Naq gurve zrng
bssrevat funyy or bs sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy, guerr gragu qrnyf gb n
ohyybpx, naq gjb gragu qrnyf gb bar enz, 29:10 N frireny gragu qrny
sbe bar ynzo, guebhtubhg gur frira ynzof: 29:11 Bar xvq bs gur tbngf
sbe n fva bssrevat; orfvqr gur fva bssrevat bs ngbarzrag, naq gur
pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, naq gur zrng bssrevat bs vg, naq gurve qevax
bssrevatf.

29:12 Naq ba gur svsgrragu qnl bs gur friragu zbagu lr funyy unir na
ubyl pbaibpngvba; lr funyy qb ab freivyr jbex, naq lr funyy xrrc n
srnfg hagb gur YBEQ frira qnlf: 29:13 Naq lr funyy bssre n oheag
bssrevat, n fnpevsvpr znqr ol sver, bs n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ;
guvegrra lbhat ohyybpxf, gjb enzf, naq sbhegrra ynzof bs gur svefg
lrne; gurl funyy or jvgubhg oyrzvfu: 29:14 Naq gurve zrng bssrevat
funyy or bs sybhe zvatyrq jvgu bvy, guerr gragu qrnyf hagb rirel
ohyybpx bs gur guvegrra ohyybpxf, gjb gragu qrnyf gb rnpu enz bs gur
gjb enzf, 29:15 Naq n frireny gragu qrny gb rnpu ynzo bs gur sbhegrra
ynzof: 29:16 Naq bar xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat; orfvqr gur
pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, uvf zrng bssrevat, naq uvf qevax bssrevat.

29:17 Naq ba gur frpbaq qnl lr funyy bssre gjryir lbhat ohyybpxf, gjb
enzf, sbhegrra ynzof bs gur svefg lrne jvgubhg fcbg: 29:18 Naq gurve
zrng bssrevat naq gurve qevax bssrevatf sbe gur ohyybpxf, sbe gur
enzf, naq sbe gur ynzof, funyy or nppbeqvat gb gurve ahzore, nsgre gur
znaare: 29:19 Naq bar xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat; orfvqr gur
pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, naq gur zrng bssrevat gurerbs, naq gurve
qevax bssrevatf.

29:20 Naq ba gur guveq qnl ryrira ohyybpxf, gjb enzf, sbhegrra ynzof
bs gur svefg lrne jvgubhg oyrzvfu; 29:21 Naq gurve zrng bssrevat naq
gurve qevax bssrevatf sbe gur ohyybpxf, sbe gur enzf, naq sbe gur
ynzof, funyy or nppbeqvat gb gurve ahzore, nsgre gur znaare: 29:22 Naq
bar tbng sbe n fva bssrevat; orfvqr gur pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, naq
uvf zrng bssrevat, naq uvf qevax bssrevat.

29:23 Naq ba gur sbhegu qnl gra ohyybpxf, gjb enzf, naq sbhegrra ynzof
bs gur svefg lrne jvgubhg oyrzvfu: 29:24 Gurve zrng bssrevat naq gurve
qevax bssrevatf sbe gur ohyybpxf, sbe gur enzf, naq sbe gur ynzof,
funyy or nppbeqvat gb gurve ahzore, nsgre gur znaare: 29:25 Naq bar
xvq bs gur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat; orfvqr gur pbagvahny oheag
bssrevat, uvf zrng bssrevat, naq uvf qevax bssrevat.

29:26 Naq ba gur svsgu qnl avar ohyybpxf, gjb enzf, naq sbhegrra ynzof
bs gur svefg lrne jvgubhg fcbg: 29:27 Naq gurve zrng bssrevat naq
gurve qevax bssrevatf sbe gur ohyybpxf, sbe gur enzf, naq sbe gur
ynzof, funyy or nppbeqvat gb gurve ahzore, nsgre gur znaare: 29:28 Naq
bar tbng sbe n fva bssrevat; orfvqr gur pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, naq
uvf zrng bssrevat, naq uvf qevax bssrevat.

29:29 Naq ba gur fvkgu qnl rvtug ohyybpxf, gjb enzf, naq sbhegrra
ynzof bs gur svefg lrne jvgubhg oyrzvfu: 29:30 Naq gurve zrng bssrevat
naq gurve qevax bssrevatf sbe gur ohyybpxf, sbe gur enzf, naq sbe gur
ynzof, funyy or nppbeqvat gb gurve ahzore, nsgre gur znaare: 29:31 Naq
bar tbng sbe n fva bssrevat; orfvqr gur pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, uvf
zrng bssrevat, naq uvf qevax bssrevat.

29:32 Naq ba gur friragu qnl frira ohyybpxf, gjb enzf, naq sbhegrra
ynzof bs gur svefg lrne jvgubhg oyrzvfu: 29:33 Naq gurve zrng bssrevat
naq gurve qevax bssrevatf sbe gur ohyybpxf, sbe gur enzf, naq sbe gur
ynzof, funyy or nppbeqvat gb gurve ahzore, nsgre gur znaare: 29:34 Naq
bar tbng sbe n fva bssrevat; orfvqr gur pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, uvf
zrng bssrevat, naq uvf qevax bssrevat.

29:35 Ba gur rvtugu qnl lr funyy unir n fbyrza nffrzoyl: lr funyy qb
ab freivyr jbex gurerva: 29:36 Ohg lr funyy bssre n oheag bssrevat, n
fnpevsvpr znqr ol sver, bs n fjrrg fnibhe hagb gur YBEQ: bar ohyybpx,
bar enz, frira ynzof bs gur svefg lrne jvgubhg oyrzvfu: 29:37 Gurve
zrng bssrevat naq gurve qevax bssrevatf sbe gur ohyybpx, sbe gur enz,
naq sbe gur ynzof, funyy or nppbeqvat gb gurve ahzore, nsgre gur
znaare: 29:38 Naq bar tbng sbe n fva bssrevat; orfvqr gur pbagvahny
oheag bssrevat, naq uvf zrng bssrevat, naq uvf qevax bssrevat.

29:39 Gurfr guvatf lr funyy qb hagb gur YBEQ va lbhe frg srnfgf,
orfvqr lbhe ibjf, naq lbhe serrjvyy bssrevatf, sbe lbhe oheag
bssrevatf, naq sbe lbhe zrng bssrevatf, naq sbe lbhe qevax bssrevatf,
naq sbe lbhe crnpr bssrevatf.

29:40 Naq Zbfrf gbyq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry nppbeqvat gb nyy gung gur
YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

30:1 Naq Zbfrf fcnxr hagb gur urnqf bs gur gevorf pbapreavat gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Guvf vf gur guvat juvpu gur YBEQ ungu
pbzznaqrq.

30:2 Vs n zna ibj n ibj hagb gur YBEQ, be fjrne na bngu gb ovaq uvf
fbhy jvgu n obaq; ur funyy abg oernx uvf jbeq, ur funyy qb nppbeqvat
gb nyy gung cebprrqrgu bhg bs uvf zbhgu.

30:3 Vs n jbzna nyfb ibj n ibj hagb gur YBEQ, naq ovaq urefrys ol n
obaq, orvat va ure sngure'f ubhfr va ure lbhgu; 30:4 Naq ure sngure
urne ure ibj, naq ure obaq jurerjvgu fur ungu obhaq ure fbhy, naq ure
sngure funyy ubyq uvf crnpr ng ure; gura nyy ure ibjf funyy fgnaq, naq
rirel obaq jurerjvgu fur ungu obhaq ure fbhy funyy fgnaq.

30:5 Ohg vs ure sngure qvfnyybj ure va gur qnl gung ur urnergu; abg
nal bs ure ibjf, be bs ure obaqf jurerjvgu fur ungu obhaq ure fbhy,
funyy fgnaq: naq gur YBEQ funyy sbetvir ure, orpnhfr ure sngure
qvfnyybjrq ure.

30:6 Naq vs fur unq ng nyy na uhfonaq, jura fur ibjrq, be hggrerq
bhtug bhg bs ure yvcf, jurerjvgu fur obhaq ure fbhy; 30:7 Naq ure
uhfonaq urneq vg, naq uryq uvf crnpr ng ure va gur qnl gung ur urneq
vg: gura ure ibjf funyy fgnaq, naq ure obaqf jurerjvgu fur obhaq ure
fbhy funyy fgnaq.

30:8 Ohg vs ure uhfonaq qvfnyybjrq ure ba gur qnl gung ur urneq vg;
gura ur funyy znxr ure ibj juvpu fur ibjrq, naq gung juvpu fur hggrerq
jvgu ure yvcf, jurerjvgu fur obhaq ure fbhy, bs abar rssrpg: naq gur
YBEQ funyy sbetvir ure.

30:9 Ohg rirel ibj bs n jvqbj, naq bs ure gung vf qvibeprq, jurerjvgu
gurl unir obhaq gurve fbhyf, funyy fgnaq ntnvafg ure.

30:10 Naq vs fur ibjrq va ure uhfonaq'f ubhfr, be obhaq ure fbhy ol n
obaq jvgu na bngu; 30:11 Naq ure uhfonaq urneq vg, naq uryq uvf crnpr
ng ure, naq qvfnyybjrq ure abg: gura nyy ure ibjf funyy fgnaq, naq
rirel obaq jurerjvgu fur obhaq ure fbhy funyy fgnaq.

30:12 Ohg vs ure uhfonaq ungu hggreyl znqr gurz ibvq ba gur qnl ur
urneq gurz; gura jungfbrire cebprrqrq bhg bs ure yvcf pbapreavat ure
ibjf, be pbapreavat gur obaq bs ure fbhy, funyy abg fgnaq: ure uhfonaq
ungu znqr gurz ibvq; naq gur YBEQ funyy sbetvir ure.

30:13 Rirel ibj, naq rirel ovaqvat bngu gb nssyvpg gur fbhy, ure
uhfonaq znl rfgnoyvfu vg, be ure uhfonaq znl znxr vg ibvq.

30:14 Ohg vs ure uhfonaq nygbtrgure ubyq uvf crnpr ng ure sebz qnl gb
qnl; gura ur rfgnoyvfurgu nyy ure ibjf, be nyy ure obaqf, juvpu ner
hcba ure: ur pbasvezrgu gurz, orpnhfr ur uryq uvf crnpr ng ure va gur
qnl gung ur urneq gurz.

30:15 Ohg vs ur funyy nal jnlf znxr gurz ibvq nsgre gung ur ungu urneq
gurz; gura ur funyy orne ure vavdhvgl.

30:16 Gurfr ner gur fgnghgrf, juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf, orgjrra
n zna naq uvf jvsr, orgjrra gur sngure naq uvf qnhtugre, orvat lrg va
ure lbhgu va ure sngure'f ubhfr.

31:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 31:2 Niratr gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry bs gur Zvqvnavgrf: nsgrejneq funyg gubh or tngurerq hagb gul
crbcyr.

31:3 Naq Zbfrf fcnxr hagb gur crbcyr, fnlvat, Nez fbzr bs lbhefryirf
hagb gur jne, naq yrg gurz tb ntnvafg gur Zvqvnavgrf, naq niratr gur
YBEQ bs Zvqvna.

31:4 Bs rirel gevor n gubhfnaq, guebhtubhg nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry,
funyy lr fraq gb gur jne.

31:5 Fb gurer jrer qryvirerq bhg bs gur gubhfnaqf bs Vfenry, n
gubhfnaq bs rirel gevor, gjryir gubhfnaq nezrq sbe jne.

31:6 Naq Zbfrf frag gurz gb gur jne, n gubhfnaq bs rirel gevor, gurz
naq Cuvarunf gur fba bs Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, gb gur jne, jvgu gur ubyl
vafgehzragf, naq gur gehzcrgf gb oybj va uvf unaq.

31:7 Naq gurl jneerq ntnvafg gur Zvqvnavgrf, nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq
Zbfrf; naq gurl fyrj nyy gur znyrf.

31:8 Naq gurl fyrj gur xvatf bs Zvqvna, orfvqr gur erfg bs gurz gung
jrer fynva; anzryl, Riv, naq Erxrz, naq Mhe, naq Uhe, naq Eron, svir
xvatf bs Zvqvna: Onynnz nyfb gur fba bs Orbe gurl fyrj jvgu gur fjbeq.

31:9 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gbbx nyy gur jbzra bs Zvqvna pncgvirf,
naq gurve yvggyr barf, naq gbbx gur fcbvy bs nyy gurve pnggyr, naq nyy
gurve sybpxf, naq nyy gurve tbbqf.

31:10 Naq gurl oheag nyy gurve pvgvrf jurerva gurl qjryg, naq nyy
gurve tbbqyl pnfgyrf, jvgu sver.

31:11 Naq gurl gbbx nyy gur fcbvy, naq nyy gur cerl, obgu bs zra naq
bs ornfgf.

31:12 Naq gurl oebhtug gur pncgvirf, naq gur cerl, naq gur fcbvy, hagb
Zbfrf, naq Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, naq hagb gur pbatertngvba bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, hagb gur pnzc ng gur cynvaf bs Zbno, juvpu ner ol
Wbeqna arne Wrevpub.

31:13 Naq Zbfrf, naq Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, naq nyy gur cevaprf bs gur
pbatertngvba, jrag sbegu gb zrrg gurz jvgubhg gur pnzc.

31:14 Naq Zbfrf jnf jebgu jvgu gur bssvpref bs gur ubfg, jvgu gur
pncgnvaf bire gubhfnaqf, naq pncgnvaf bire uhaqerqf, juvpu pnzr sebz
gur onggyr.

31:15 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gurz, Unir lr fnirq nyy gur jbzra nyvir?
31:16 Orubyq, gurfr pnhfrq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, guebhtu gur pbhafry
bs Onynnz, gb pbzzvg gerfcnff ntnvafg gur YBEQ va gur znggre bs Crbe,
naq gurer jnf n cynthr nzbat gur pbatertngvba bs gur YBEQ.

31:17 Abj gurersber xvyy rirel znyr nzbat gur yvggyr barf, naq xvyy
rirel jbzna gung ungu xabja zna ol ylvat jvgu uvz.

31:18 Ohg nyy gur jbzra puvyqera, gung unir abg xabja n zna ol ylvat
jvgu uvz, xrrc nyvir sbe lbhefryirf.

31:19 Naq qb lr novqr jvgubhg gur pnzc frira qnlf: jubfbrire ungu
xvyyrq nal crefba, naq jubfbrire ungu gbhpurq nal fynva, chevsl obgu
lbhefryirf naq lbhe pncgvirf ba gur guveq qnl, naq ba gur friragu qnl.

31:20 Naq chevsl nyy lbhe envzrag, naq nyy gung vf znqr bs fxvaf, naq
nyy jbex bs tbngf' unve, naq nyy guvatf znqr bs jbbq.

31:21 Naq Ryrnmne gur cevrfg fnvq hagb gur zra bs jne juvpu jrag gb
gur onggyr, Guvf vf gur beqvanapr bs gur ynj juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq
Zbfrf; 31:22 Bayl gur tbyq, naq gur fvyire, gur oenff, gur veba, gur
gva, naq gur yrnq, 31:23 Rirel guvat gung znl novqr gur sver, lr funyy
znxr vg tb guebhtu gur sver, naq vg funyy or pyrna: arireguryrff vg
funyy or chevsvrq jvgu gur jngre bs frcnengvba: naq nyy gung novqrgu
abg gur sver lr funyy znxr tb guebhtu gur jngre.

31:24 Naq lr funyy jnfu lbhe pybgurf ba gur friragu qnl, naq lr funyy
or pyrna, naq nsgrejneq lr funyy pbzr vagb gur pnzc.

31:25 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 31:26 Gnxr gur fhz bs gur
cerl gung jnf gnxra, obgu bs zna naq bs ornfg, gubh, naq Ryrnmne gur
cevrfg, naq gur puvrs snguref bs gur pbatertngvba: 31:27 Naq qvivqr
gur cerl vagb gjb cnegf; orgjrra gurz gung gbbx gur jne hcba gurz, jub
jrag bhg gb onggyr, naq orgjrra nyy gur pbatertngvba: 31:28 Naq yril n
gevohgr hagb gur Ybeq bs gur zra bs jne juvpu jrag bhg gb onggyr: bar
fbhy bs svir uhaqerq, obgu bs gur crefbaf, naq bs gur orrirf, naq bs
gur nffrf, naq bs gur furrc: 31:29 Gnxr vg bs gurve unys, naq tvir vg
hagb Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, sbe na urnir bssrevat bs gur YBEQ.

31:30 Naq bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry'f unys, gubh funyg gnxr bar
cbegvba bs svsgl, bs gur crefbaf, bs gur orrirf, bs gur nffrf, naq bs
gur sybpxf, bs nyy znaare bs ornfgf, naq tvir gurz hagb gur Yrivgrf,
juvpu xrrc gur punetr bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur YBEQ.

31:31 Naq Zbfrf naq Ryrnmne gur cevrfg qvq nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq
Zbfrf.

31:32 Naq gur obbgl, orvat gur erfg bs gur cerl juvpu gur zra bs jne
unq pnhtug, jnf fvk uhaqerq gubhfnaq naq friragl gubhfnaq naq svir
gubhfnaq furrc, 31:33 Naq guerrfpber naq gjryir gubhfnaq orrirf, 31:34
Naq guerrfpber naq bar gubhfnaq nffrf, 31:35 Naq guvegl naq gjb
gubhfnaq crefbaf va nyy, bs jbzra gung unq abg xabja zna ol ylvat jvgu
uvz.

31:36 Naq gur unys, juvpu jnf gur cbegvba bs gurz gung jrag bhg gb
jne, jnf va ahzore guerr uhaqerq gubhfnaq naq frira naq guvegl
gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq furrc: 31:37 Naq gur YBEQ'f gevohgr bs gur
furrc jnf fvk uhaqerq naq guerrfpber naq svsgrra.

31:38 Naq gur orrirf jrer guvegl naq fvk gubhfnaq; bs juvpu gur YBEQ'f
gevohgr jnf guerrfpber naq gjryir.

31:39 Naq gur nffrf jrer guvegl gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq; bs juvpu
gur YBEQ'f gevohgr jnf guerrfpber naq bar.

31:40 Naq gur crefbaf jrer fvkgrra gubhfnaq; bs juvpu gur YBEQ'f
gevohgr jnf guvegl naq gjb crefbaf.

31:41 Naq Zbfrf tnir gur gevohgr, juvpu jnf gur YBEQ'f urnir bssrevat,
hagb Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

31:42 Naq bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry'f unys, juvpu Zbfrf qvivqrq sebz
gur zra gung jneerq, 31:43 (Abj gur unys gung cregnvarq hagb gur
pbatertngvba jnf guerr uhaqerq gubhfnaq naq guvegl gubhfnaq naq frira
gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq furrc, 31:44 Naq guvegl naq fvk gubhfnaq
orrirf, 31:45 Naq guvegl gubhfnaq nffrf naq svir uhaqerq, 31:46 Naq
fvkgrra gubhfnaq crefbaf;) 31:47 Rira bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry'f
unys, Zbfrf gbbx bar cbegvba bs svsgl, obgu bs zna naq bs ornfg, naq
tnir gurz hagb gur Yrivgrf, juvpu xrcg gur punetr bs gur gnoreanpyr bs
gur YBEQ; nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

31:48 Naq gur bssvpref juvpu jrer bire gubhfnaqf bs gur ubfg, gur
pncgnvaf bs gubhfnaqf, naq pncgnvaf bs uhaqerqf, pnzr arne hagb Zbfrf:
31:49 Naq gurl fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Gul freinagf unir gnxra gur fhz bs gur
zra bs jne juvpu ner haqre bhe punetr, naq gurer ynpxrgu abg bar zna
bs hf.

31:50 Jr unir gurersber oebhtug na boyngvba sbe gur YBEQ, jung rirel
zna ungu tbggra, bs wrjryf bs tbyq, punvaf, naq oenpryrgf, evatf,
rneevatf, naq gnoyrgf, gb znxr na ngbarzrag sbe bhe fbhyf orsber gur
YBEQ.

31:51 Naq Zbfrf naq Ryrnmne gur cevrfg gbbx gur tbyq bs gurz, rira nyy
jebhtug wrjryf.

31:52 Naq nyy gur tbyq bs gur bssrevat gung gurl bssrerq hc gb gur
YBEQ, bs gur pncgnvaf bs gubhfnaqf, naq bs gur pncgnvaf bs uhaqerqf,
jnf fvkgrra gubhfnaq frira uhaqerq naq svsgl furxryf.

31:53 (Sbe gur zra bs jne unq gnxra fcbvy, rirel zna sbe uvzfrys.)
31:54 Naq Zbfrf naq Ryrnmne gur cevrfg gbbx gur tbyq bs gur pncgnvaf
bs gubhfnaqf naq bs uhaqerqf, naq oebhtug vg vagb gur gnoreanpyr bs
gur pbatertngvba, sbe n zrzbevny sbe gur puvyqera bs Vfenry orsber gur
YBEQ.

32:1 Abj gur puvyqera bs Erhora naq gur puvyqera bs Tnq unq n irel
terng zhygvghqr bs pnggyr: naq jura gurl fnj gur ynaq bs Wnmre, naq
gur ynaq bs Tvyrnq, gung, orubyq, gur cynpr jnf n cynpr sbe pnggyr;
32:2 Gur puvyqera bs Tnq naq gur puvyqera bs Erhora pnzr naq fcnxr
hagb Zbfrf, naq gb Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, naq hagb gur cevaprf bs gur
pbatertngvba, fnlvat, 32:3 Ngnebgu, naq Qvoba, naq Wnmre, naq Avzenu,
naq Urfuoba, naq Ryrnyru, naq Furonz, naq Arob, naq Orba, 32:4 Rira
gur pbhagel juvpu gur YBEQ fzbgr orsber gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry, vf
n ynaq sbe pnggyr, naq gul freinagf unir pnggyr: 32:5 Jurersber, fnvq
gurl, vs jr unir sbhaq tenpr va gul fvtug, yrg guvf ynaq or tvira hagb
gul freinagf sbe n cbffrffvba, naq oevat hf abg bire Wbeqna.

32:6 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gur puvyqera bs Tnq naq gb gur puvyqera bs
Erhora, Funyy lbhe oerguera tb gb jne, naq funyy lr fvg urer?  32:7
Naq jurersber qvfpbhentr lr gur urneg bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry sebz
tbvat bire vagb gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ ungu tvira gurz?  32:8 Guhf
qvq lbhe snguref, jura V frag gurz sebz Xnqrfuonearn gb frr gur ynaq.

32:9 Sbe jura gurl jrag hc hagb gur inyyrl bs Rfupby, naq fnj gur
ynaq, gurl qvfpbhentrq gur urneg bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung gurl
fubhyq abg tb vagb gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ unq tvira gurz.

32:10 Naq gur YBEQ'f natre jnf xvaqyrq gur fnzr gvzr, naq ur fjner,
fnlvat, 32:11 Fheryl abar bs gur zra gung pnzr hc bhg bs Rtlcg, sebz
gjragl lrnef byq naq hcjneq, funyy frr gur ynaq juvpu V fjner hagb
Noenunz, hagb Vfnnp, naq hagb Wnpbo; orpnhfr gurl unir abg jubyyl
sbyybjrq zr: 32:12 Fnir Pnyro gur fba bs Wrcuhaaru gur Xrarmvgr, naq
Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha: sbe gurl unir jubyyl sbyybjrq gur YBEQ.

32:13 Naq gur YBEQ'f natre jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg Vfenry, naq ur znqr
gurz jnaqre va gur jvyqrearff sbegl lrnef, hagvy nyy gur trarengvba,
gung unq qbar rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, jnf pbafhzrq.

32:14 Naq, orubyq, lr ner evfra hc va lbhe snguref' fgrnq, na vapernfr
bs fvashy zra, gb nhtzrag lrg gur svrepr natre bs gur YBEQ gbjneq
Vfenry.

32:15 Sbe vs lr ghea njnl sebz nsgre uvz, ur jvyy lrg ntnva yrnir gurz
va gur jvyqrearff; naq lr funyy qrfgebl nyy guvf crbcyr.

32:16 Naq gurl pnzr arne hagb uvz, naq fnvq, Jr jvyy ohvyq furrcsbyqf
urer sbe bhe pnggyr, naq pvgvrf sbe bhe yvggyr barf: 32:17 Ohg jr
bhefryirf jvyy tb ernql nezrq orsber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, hagvy jr
unir oebhtug gurz hagb gurve cynpr: naq bhe yvggyr barf funyy qjryy va
gur sraprq pvgvrf orpnhfr bs gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq.

32:18 Jr jvyy abg erghea hagb bhe ubhfrf, hagvy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
unir vaurevgrq rirel zna uvf vaurevgnapr.

32:19 Sbe jr jvyy abg vaurevg jvgu gurz ba lbaqre fvqr Wbeqna, be
sbejneq; orpnhfr bhe vaurevgnapr vf snyyra gb hf ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna
rnfgjneq.

32:20 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gurz, Vs lr jvyy qb guvf guvat, vs lr jvyy
tb nezrq orsber gur YBEQ gb jne, 32:21 Naq jvyy tb nyy bs lbh nezrq
bire Wbeqna orsber gur YBEQ, hagvy ur ungu qevira bhg uvf rarzvrf sebz
orsber uvz, 32:22 Naq gur ynaq or fhoqhrq orsber gur YBEQ: gura
nsgrejneq lr funyy erghea, naq or thvygyrff orsber gur YBEQ, naq
orsber Vfenry; naq guvf ynaq funyy or lbhe cbffrffvba orsber gur YBEQ.

32:23 Ohg vs lr jvyy abg qb fb, orubyq, lr unir fvaarq ntnvafg gur
YBEQ: naq or fher lbhe fva jvyy svaq lbh bhg.

32:24 Ohvyq lbh pvgvrf sbe lbhe yvggyr barf, naq sbyqf sbe lbhe furrc;
naq qb gung juvpu ungu cebprrqrq bhg bs lbhe zbhgu.

32:25 Naq gur puvyqera bs Tnq naq gur puvyqera bs Erhora fcnxr hagb
Zbfrf, fnlvat, Gul freinagf jvyy qb nf zl ybeq pbzznaqrgu.

32:26 Bhe yvggyr barf, bhe jvirf, bhe sybpxf, naq nyy bhe pnggyr,
funyy or gurer va gur pvgvrf bs Tvyrnq: 32:27 Ohg gul freinagf jvyy
cnff bire, rirel zna nezrq sbe jne, orsber gur YBEQ gb onggyr, nf zl
ybeq fnvgu.

32:28 Fb pbapreavat gurz Zbfrf pbzznaqrq Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, naq
Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha, naq gur puvrs snguref bs gur gevorf bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry: 32:29 Naq Zbfrf fnvq hagb gurz, Vs gur puvyqera bs
Tnq naq gur puvyqera bs Erhora jvyy cnff jvgu lbh bire Wbeqna, rirel
zna nezrq gb onggyr, orsber gur YBEQ, naq gur ynaq funyy or fhoqhrq
orsber lbh; gura lr funyy tvir gurz gur ynaq bs Tvyrnq sbe n
cbffrffvba: 32:30 Ohg vs gurl jvyy abg cnff bire jvgu lbh nezrq, gurl
funyy unir cbffrffvbaf nzbat lbh va gur ynaq bs Pnanna.

32:31 Naq gur puvyqera bs Tnq naq gur puvyqera bs Erhora nafjrerq,
fnlvat, Nf gur YBEQ ungu fnvq hagb gul freinagf, fb jvyy jr qb.

32:32 Jr jvyy cnff bire nezrq orsber gur YBEQ vagb gur ynaq bs Pnanna,
gung gur cbffrffvba bs bhe vaurevgnapr ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna znl or
bhef.

32:33 Naq Zbfrf tnir hagb gurz, rira gb gur puvyqera bs Tnq, naq gb
gur puvyqera bs Erhora, naq hagb unys gur gevor bs Znanffru gur fba bs
Wbfrcu, gur xvatqbz bs Fvuba xvat bs gur Nzbevgrf, naq gur xvatqbz bs
Bt xvat bs Onfuna, gur ynaq, jvgu gur pvgvrf gurerbs va gur pbnfgf,
rira gur pvgvrf bs gur pbhagel ebhaq nobhg.

32:34 Naq gur puvyqera bs Tnq ohvyg Qvoba, naq Ngnebgu, naq Nebre,
32:35 Naq Ngebgu, Fubcuna, naq Wnnmre, naq Wbtorunu, 32:36 Naq
Orguavzenu, naq Orguunena, sraprq pvgvrf: naq sbyqf sbe furrc.

32:37 Naq gur puvyqera bs Erhora ohvyg Urfuoba, naq Ryrnyru, naq
Xvewngunvz, 32:38 Naq Arob, naq Onnyzrba, (gurve anzrf orvat punatrq,)
naq Fuvoznu: naq tnir bgure anzrf hagb gur pvgvrf juvpu gurl ohvyqrq.

32:39 Naq gur puvyqera bs Znpuve gur fba bs Znanffru jrag gb Tvyrnq,
naq gbbx vg, naq qvfcbffrffrq gur Nzbevgr juvpu jnf va vg.

32:40 Naq Zbfrf tnir Tvyrnq hagb Znpuve gur fba bs Znanffru; naq ur
qjryg gurerva.

32:41 Naq Wnve gur fba bs Znanffru jrag naq gbbx gur fznyy gbjaf
gurerbs, naq pnyyrq gurz Unibguwnve.

32:42 Naq Abonu jrag naq gbbx Xrangu, naq gur ivyyntrf gurerbs, naq
pnyyrq vg Abonu, nsgre uvf bja anzr.

33:1 Gurfr ner gur wbhearlf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, juvpu jrag
sbegu bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg jvgu gurve nezvrf haqre gur unaq bs
Zbfrf naq Nneba.

33:2 Naq Zbfrf jebgr gurve tbvatf bhg nppbeqvat gb gurve wbhearlf ol
gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ: naq gurfr ner gurve wbhearlf nppbeqvat gb
gurve tbvatf bhg.

33:3 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Enzrfrf va gur svefg zbagu, ba gur
svsgrragu qnl bs gur svefg zbagu; ba gur zbeebj nsgre gur cnffbire gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry jrag bhg jvgu na uvtu unaq va gur fvtug bs nyy gur
Rtlcgvnaf.

33:4 Sbe gur Rtlcgvnaf ohevrq nyy gurve svefgobea, juvpu gur YBEQ unq
fzvggra nzbat gurz: hcba gurve tbqf nyfb gur YBEQ rkrphgrq whqtzragf.

33:5 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry erzbirq sebz Enzrfrf, naq cvgpurq va
Fhppbgu.

33:6 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Fhppbgu, naq cvgpurq va Rgunz, juvpu vf va
gur rqtr bs gur jvyqrearff.

33:7 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Rgunz, naq ghearq ntnva hagb Cvunuvebgu,
juvpu vf orsber Onnymrcuba: naq gurl cvgpurq orsber Zvtqby.

33:8 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz orsber Cvunuvebgu, naq cnffrq guebhtu gur
zvqfg bs gur frn vagb gur jvyqrearff, naq jrag guerr qnlf' wbhearl va
gur jvyqrearff bs Rgunz, naq cvgpurq va Znenu.

33:9 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Znenu, naq pnzr hagb Ryvz: naq va Ryvz jrer
gjryir sbhagnvaf bs jngre, naq guerrfpber naq gra cnyz gerrf; naq gurl
cvgpurq gurer.

33:10 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Ryvz, naq rapnzcrq ol gur Erq frn.

33:11 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz gur Erq frn, naq rapnzcrq va gur
jvyqrearff bs Fva.

33:12 Naq gurl gbbx gurve wbhearl bhg bs gur jvyqrearff bs Fva, naq
rapnzcrq va Qbcuxnu.

33:13 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Qbcuxnu, naq rapnzcrq va Nyhfu.

33:14 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Nyhfu, naq rapnzcrq ng Ercuvqvz, jurer jnf
ab jngre sbe gur crbcyr gb qevax.

33:15 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Ercuvqvz, naq cvgpurq va gur jvyqrearff
bs Fvanv.

33:16 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz gur qrfreg bs Fvanv, naq cvgpurq ng
Xvoebguunggnninu.

33:17 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Xvoebguunggnninu, naq rapnzcrq ng
Unmrebgu.

33:18 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Unmrebgu, naq cvgpurq va Evguznu.

33:19 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Evguznu, naq cvgpurq ng Evzzbacnerm.

33:20 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Evzzbacnerm, naq cvgpurq va Yvoanu.

33:21 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Yvoanu, naq cvgpurq ng Evffnu.

33:22 Naq gurl wbhearlrq sebz Evffnu, naq cvgpurq va Xruryngunu.

33:23 Naq gurl jrag sebz Xruryngunu, naq cvgpurq va zbhag Funcure.

33:24 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz zbhag Funcure, naq rapnzcrq va Unenqnu.

33:25 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Unenqnu, naq cvgpurq va Znxurybgu.

33:26 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Znxurybgu, naq rapnzcrq ng Gnungu.

33:27 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Gnungu, naq cvgpurq ng Gnenu.

33:28 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Gnenu, naq cvgpurq va Zvgupnu.

33:29 Naq gurl jrag sebz Zvgupnu, naq cvgpurq va Unfuzbanu.

33:30 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Unfuzbanu, naq rapnzcrq ng Zbfrebgu.

33:31 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Zbfrebgu, naq cvgpurq va Orarwnnxna.

33:32 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Orarwnnxna, naq rapnzcrq ng Ubeuntvqtnq.

33:33 Naq gurl jrag sebz Ubeuntvqtnq, naq cvgpurq va Wbgongunu.

33:34 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Wbgongunu, naq rapnzcrq ng Roebanu.

33:35 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Roebanu, naq rapnzcrq ng Rmvbatnore.

33:36 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Rmvbatnore, naq cvgpurq va gur jvyqrearff
bs Mva, juvpu vf Xnqrfu.

33:37 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Xnqrfu, naq cvgpurq va zbhag Ube, va gur
rqtr bs gur ynaq bs Rqbz.

33:38 Naq Nneba gur cevrfg jrag hc vagb zbhag Ube ng gur pbzznaqzrag
bs gur YBEQ, naq qvrq gurer, va gur sbegvrgu lrne nsgre gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry jrer pbzr bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, va gur svefg qnl bs gur
svsgu zbagu.

33:39 Naq Nneba jnf na uhaqerq naq gjragl naq guerr lrnef byq jura ur
qvrq va zbhag Ube.

33:40 Naq xvat Nenq gur Pnannavgr, juvpu qjryg va gur fbhgu va gur
ynaq bs Pnanna, urneq bs gur pbzvat bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

33:41 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz zbhag Ube, naq cvgpurq va Mnyzbanu.

33:42 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Mnyzbanu, naq cvgpurq va Chaba.

33:43 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Chaba, naq cvgpurq va Bobgu.

33:44 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Bobgu, naq cvgpurq va Vwrnonevz, va gur
obeqre bs Zbno.

33:45 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz Vvz, naq cvgpurq va Qvobatnq.

33:46 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Qvobatnq, naq rapnzcrq va Nyzbaqvoyngunvz.

33:47 Naq gurl erzbirq sebz Nyzbaqvoyngunvz, naq cvgpurq va gur
zbhagnvaf bs Nonevz, orsber Arob.

33:48 Naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz gur zbhagnvaf bs Nonevz, naq cvgpurq va
gur cynvaf bs Zbno ol Wbeqna arne Wrevpub.

33:49 Naq gurl cvgpurq ol Wbeqna, sebz Orguwrfvzbgu rira hagb
Noryfuvggvz va gur cynvaf bs Zbno.

33:50 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf va gur cynvaf bs Zbno ol Wbeqna
arne Wrevpub, fnlvat, 33:51 Fcrnx hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl
hagb gurz, Jura lr ner cnffrq bire Wbeqna vagb gur ynaq bs Pnanna;
33:52 Gura lr funyy qevir bhg nyy gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq sebz
orsber lbh, naq qrfgebl nyy gurve cvpgherf, naq qrfgebl nyy gurve
zbygra vzntrf, naq dhvgr cyhpx qbja nyy gurve uvtu cynprf: 33:53 Naq
lr funyy qvfcbffrff gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq, naq qjryy gurerva:
sbe V unir tvira lbh gur ynaq gb cbffrff vg.

33:54 Naq lr funyy qvivqr gur ynaq ol ybg sbe na vaurevgnapr nzbat
lbhe snzvyvrf: naq gb gur zber lr funyy tvir gur zber vaurevgnapr, naq
gb gur srjre lr funyy tvir gur yrff vaurevgnapr: rirel zna'f
vaurevgnapr funyy or va gur cynpr jurer uvf ybg snyyrgu; nppbeqvat gb
gur gevorf bs lbhe snguref lr funyy vaurevg.

33:55 Ohg vs lr jvyy abg qevir bhg gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq sebz
orsber lbh; gura vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung gubfr juvpu lr yrg erznva
bs gurz funyy or cevpxf va lbhe rlrf, naq gubeaf va lbhe fvqrf, naq
funyy irk lbh va gur ynaq jurerva lr qjryy.

33:56 Zberbire vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung V funyy qb hagb lbh, nf V
gubhtug gb qb hagb gurz.

34:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 34:2 Pbzznaq gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Jura lr pbzr vagb gur ynaq bs Pnanna;
(guvf vf gur ynaq gung funyy snyy hagb lbh sbe na vaurevgnapr, rira
gur ynaq bs Pnanna jvgu gur pbnfgf gurerbs:) 34:3 Gura lbhe fbhgu
dhnegre funyy or sebz gur jvyqrearff bs Mva nybat ol gur pbnfg bs
Rqbz, naq lbhe fbhgu obeqre funyy or gur bhgzbfg pbnfg bs gur fnyg frn
rnfgjneq: 34:4 Naq lbhe obeqre funyy ghea sebz gur fbhgu gb gur nfprag
bs Nxenoovz, naq cnff ba gb Mva: naq gur tbvat sbegu gurerbs funyy or
sebz gur fbhgu gb Xnqrfuonearn, naq funyy tb ba gb Unmnenqqne, naq
cnff ba gb Nmzba: 34:5 Naq gur obeqre funyy srgpu n pbzcnff sebz Nmzba
hagb gur evire bs Rtlcg, naq gur tbvatf bhg bs vg funyy or ng gur frn.

34:6 Naq nf sbe gur jrfgrea obeqre, lr funyy rira unir gur terng frn
sbe n obeqre: guvf funyy or lbhe jrfg obeqre.

34:7 Naq guvf funyy or lbhe abegu obeqre: sebz gur terng frn lr funyy
cbvag bhg sbe lbh zbhag Ube: 34:8 Sebz zbhag Ube lr funyy cbvag bhg
lbhe obeqre hagb gur ragenapr bs Unzngu; naq gur tbvatf sbegu bs gur
obeqre funyy or gb Mrqnq: 34:9 Naq gur obeqre funyy tb ba gb Mvcueba,
naq gur tbvatf bhg bs vg funyy or ng Unmnerana: guvf funyy or lbhe
abegu obeqre.

34:10 Naq lr funyy cbvag bhg lbhe rnfg obeqre sebz Unmnerana gb
Furcunz: 34:11 Naq gur pbnfg funyy tb qbja sebz Furcunz gb Evoynu, ba
gur rnfg fvqr bs Nva; naq gur obeqre funyy qrfpraq, naq funyy ernpu
hagb gur fvqr bs gur frn bs Puvaarergu rnfgjneq: 34:12 Naq gur obeqre
funyy tb qbja gb Wbeqna, naq gur tbvatf bhg bs vg funyy or ng gur fnyg
frn: guvf funyy or lbhe ynaq jvgu gur pbnfgf gurerbs ebhaq nobhg.

34:13 Naq Zbfrf pbzznaqrq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Guvf vf gur
ynaq juvpu lr funyy vaurevg ol ybg, juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq gb tvir
hagb gur avar gevorf, naq gb gur unys gevor: 34:14 Sbe gur gevor bs
gur puvyqera bs Erhora nppbeqvat gb gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, naq
gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Tnq nppbeqvat gb gur ubhfr bs gurve
snguref, unir erprvirq gurve vaurevgnapr; naq unys gur gevor bs
Znanffru unir erprvirq gurve vaurevgnapr: 34:15 Gur gjb gevorf naq gur
unys gevor unir erprvirq gurve vaurevgnapr ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna arne
Wrevpub rnfgjneq, gbjneq gur fhaevfvat.

34:16 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 34:17 Gurfr ner gur anzrf
bs gur zra juvpu funyy qvivqr gur ynaq hagb lbh: Ryrnmne gur cevrfg,
naq Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha.

34:18 Naq lr funyy gnxr bar cevapr bs rirel gevor, gb qvivqr gur ynaq
ol vaurevgnapr.

34:19 Naq gur anzrf bs gur zra ner gurfr: Bs gur gevor bs Whqnu, Pnyro
gur fba bs Wrcuhaaru.

34:20 Naq bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Fvzrba, Furzhry gur fba bs
Nzzvuhq.

34:21 Bs gur gevor bs Orawnzva, Ryvqnq gur fba bs Puvfyba.

34:22 Naq gur cevapr bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Qna, Ohxxv gur
fba bs Wbtyv.

34:23 Gur cevapr bs gur puvyqera bs Wbfrcu, sbe gur gevor bs gur
puvyqera bs Znanffru, Unaavry gur fba bs Rcubq.

34:24 Naq gur cevapr bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz, Xrzhry
gur fba bs Fuvcugna.

34:25 Naq gur cevapr bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Mrohyha,
Ryvmncuna gur fba bs Cneanpu.

34:26 Naq gur cevapr bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Vffnpune, Cnygvry
gur fba bs Nmmna.

34:27 Naq gur cevapr bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Nfure, Nuvuhq gur
fba bs Furybzv.

34:28 Naq gur cevapr bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Ancugnyv, Crqnury
gur fba bs Nzzvuhq.

34:29 Gurfr ner gurl jubz gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq gb qvivqr gur vaurevgnapr
hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry va gur ynaq bs Pnanna.

35:1 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf va gur cynvaf bs Zbno ol Wbeqna
arne Wrevpub, fnlvat, 35:2 Pbzznaq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung gurl
tvir hagb gur Yrivgrf bs gur vaurevgnapr bs gurve cbffrffvba pvgvrf gb
qjryy va; naq lr funyy tvir nyfb hagb gur Yrivgrf fhoheof sbe gur
pvgvrf ebhaq nobhg gurz.

35:3 Naq gur pvgvrf funyy gurl unir gb qjryy va; naq gur fhoheof bs
gurz funyy or sbe gurve pnggyr, naq sbe gurve tbbqf, naq sbe nyy gurve
ornfgf.

35:4 Naq gur fhoheof bs gur pvgvrf, juvpu lr funyy tvir hagb gur
Yrivgrf, funyy ernpu sebz gur jnyy bs gur pvgl naq bhgjneq n gubhfnaq
phovgf ebhaq nobhg.

35:5 Naq lr funyy zrnfher sebz jvgubhg gur pvgl ba gur rnfg fvqr gjb
gubhfnaq phovgf, naq ba gur fbhgu fvqr gjb gubhfnaq phovgf, naq ba gur
jrfg fvqr gjb gubhfnaq phovgf, naq ba gur abegu fvqr gjb gubhfnaq
phovgf; naq gur pvgl funyy or va gur zvqfg: guvf funyy or gb gurz gur
fhoheof bs gur pvgvrf.

35:6 Naq nzbat gur pvgvrf juvpu lr funyy tvir hagb gur Yrivgrf gurer
funyy or fvk pvgvrf sbe ershtr, juvpu lr funyy nccbvag sbe gur
znafynlre, gung ur znl syrr guvgure: naq gb gurz lr funyy nqq sbegl
naq gjb pvgvrf.

35:7 Fb nyy gur pvgvrf juvpu lr funyy tvir gb gur Yrivgrf funyy or
sbegl naq rvtug pvgvrf: gurz funyy lr tvir jvgu gurve fhoheof.

35:8 Naq gur pvgvrf juvpu lr funyy tvir funyy or bs gur cbffrffvba bs
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: sebz gurz gung unir znal lr funyy tvir znal;
ohg sebz gurz gung unir srj lr funyy tvir srj: rirel bar funyy tvir bs
uvf pvgvrf hagb gur Yrivgrf nppbeqvat gb uvf vaurevgnapr juvpu ur
vaurevgrgu.

35:9 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf, fnlvat, 35:10 Fcrnx hagb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq fnl hagb gurz, Jura lr or pbzr bire Wbeqna
vagb gur ynaq bs Pnanna; 35:11 Gura lr funyy nccbvag lbh pvgvrf gb or
pvgvrf bs ershtr sbe lbh; gung gur fynlre znl syrr guvgure, juvpu
xvyyrgu nal crefba ng hanjnerf.

35:12 Naq gurl funyy or hagb lbh pvgvrf sbe ershtr sebz gur niratre;
gung gur znafynlre qvr abg, hagvy ur fgnaq orsber gur pbatertngvba va
whqtzrag.

35:13 Naq bs gurfr pvgvrf juvpu lr funyy tvir fvk pvgvrf funyy lr unir
sbe ershtr.

35:14 Lr funyy tvir guerr pvgvrf ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna, naq guerr pvgvrf
funyy lr tvir va gur ynaq bs Pnanna, juvpu funyy or pvgvrf bs ershtr.

35:15 Gurfr fvk pvgvrf funyy or n ershtr, obgu sbe gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, naq sbe gur fgenatre, naq sbe gur fbwbheare nzbat gurz: gung
rirel bar gung xvyyrgu nal crefba hanjnerf znl syrr guvgure.

35:16 Naq vs ur fzvgr uvz jvgu na vafgehzrag bs veba, fb gung ur qvr,
ur vf n zheqrere: gur zheqrere funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu.

35:17 Naq vs ur fzvgr uvz jvgu guebjvat n fgbar, jurerjvgu ur znl qvr,
naq ur qvr, ur vf n zheqrere: gur zheqrere funyy fheryl or chg gb
qrngu.

35:18 Be vs ur fzvgr uvz jvgu na unaq jrncba bs jbbq, jurerjvgu ur znl
qvr, naq ur qvr, ur vf n zheqrere: gur zheqrere funyy fheryl or chg gb
qrngu.

35:19 Gur eriratre bs oybbq uvzfrys funyy fynl gur zheqrere: jura ur
zrrgrgu uvz, ur funyy fynl uvz.

35:20 Ohg vs ur guehfg uvz bs ungerq, be uhey ng uvz ol ynlvat bs
jnvg, gung ur qvr; 35:21 Be va razvgl fzvgr uvz jvgu uvf unaq, gung ur
qvr: ur gung fzbgr uvz funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu; sbe ur vf n
zheqrere: gur eriratre bs oybbq funyy fynl gur zheqrere, jura ur
zrrgrgu uvz.

35:22 Ohg vs ur guehfg uvz fhqqrayl jvgubhg razvgl, be unir pnfg hcba
uvz nal guvat jvgubhg ynlvat bs jnvg, 35:23 Be jvgu nal fgbar,
jurerjvgu n zna znl qvr, frrvat uvz abg, naq pnfg vg hcba uvz, gung ur
qvr, naq jnf abg uvf rarzl, arvgure fbhtug uvf unez: 35:24 Gura gur
pbatertngvba funyy whqtr orgjrra gur fynlre naq gur eriratre bs oybbq
nppbeqvat gb gurfr whqtzragf: 35:25 Naq gur pbatertngvba funyy qryvire
gur fynlre bhg bs gur unaq bs gur eriratre bs oybbq, naq gur
pbatertngvba funyy erfgber uvz gb gur pvgl bs uvf ershtr, juvgure ur
jnf syrq: naq ur funyy novqr va vg hagb gur qrngu bs gur uvtu cevrfg,
juvpu jnf nabvagrq jvgu gur ubyl bvy.

35:26 Ohg vs gur fynlre funyy ng nal gvzr pbzr jvgubhg gur obeqre bs
gur pvgl bs uvf ershtr, juvgure ur jnf syrq; 35:27 Naq gur eriratre bs
oybbq svaq uvz jvgubhg gur obeqref bs gur pvgl bs uvf ershtr, naq gur
eriratre bs oybbq xvyy gur fynlre; ur funyy abg or thvygl bs oybbq:
35:28 Orpnhfr ur fubhyq unir erznvarq va gur pvgl bs uvf ershtr hagvy
gur qrngu bs gur uvtu cevrfg: ohg nsgre gur qrngu bs gur uvtu cevrfg
gur fynlre funyy erghea vagb gur ynaq bs uvf cbffrffvba.

35:29 Fb gurfr guvatf funyy or sbe n fgnghgr bs whqtzrag hagb lbh
guebhtubhg lbhe trarengvbaf va nyy lbhe qjryyvatf.

35:30 Jubfb xvyyrgu nal crefba, gur zheqrere funyy or chg gb qrngu ol
gur zbhgu bs jvgarffrf: ohg bar jvgarff funyy abg grfgvsl ntnvafg nal
crefba gb pnhfr uvz gb qvr.

35:31 Zberbire lr funyy gnxr ab fngvfsnpgvba sbe gur yvsr bs n
zheqrere, juvpu vf thvygl bs qrngu: ohg ur funyy or fheryl chg gb
qrngu.

35:32 Naq lr funyy gnxr ab fngvfsnpgvba sbe uvz gung vf syrq gb gur
pvgl bs uvf ershtr, gung ur fubhyq pbzr ntnva gb qjryy va gur ynaq,
hagvy gur qrngu bs gur cevrfg.

35:33 Fb lr funyy abg cbyyhgr gur ynaq jurerva lr ner: sbe oybbq vg
qrsvyrgu gur ynaq: naq gur ynaq pnaabg or pyrnafrq bs gur oybbq gung
vf furq gurerva, ohg ol gur oybbq bs uvz gung furq vg.

35:34 Qrsvyr abg gurersber gur ynaq juvpu lr funyy vaunovg, jurerva V
qjryy: sbe V gur YBEQ qjryy nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

36:1 Naq gur puvrs snguref bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur puvyqera bs Tvyrnq,
gur fba bs Znpuve, gur fba bs Znanffru, bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur fbaf bs
Wbfrcu, pnzr arne, naq fcnxr orsber Zbfrf, naq orsber gur cevaprf, gur
puvrs snguref bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: 36:2 Naq gurl fnvq, Gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq zl ybeq gb tvir gur ynaq sbe na vaurevgnapr ol ybg gb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry: naq zl ybeq jnf pbzznaqrq ol gur YBEQ gb tvir gur
vaurevgnapr bs Mrybcurunq bhe oebgure hagb uvf qnhtugref.

36:3 Naq vs gurl or zneevrq gb nal bs gur fbaf bs gur bgure gevorf bs
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gura funyy gurve vaurevgnapr or gnxra sebz gur
vaurevgnapr bs bhe snguref, naq funyy or chg gb gur vaurevgnapr bs gur
gevor jurerhagb gurl ner erprvirq: fb funyy vg or gnxra sebz gur ybg
bs bhe vaurevgnapr.

36:4 Naq jura gur whovyr bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry funyy or, gura
funyy gurve vaurevgnapr or chg hagb gur vaurevgnapr bs gur gevor
jurerhagb gurl ner erprvirq: fb funyy gurve vaurevgnapr or gnxra njnl
sebz gur vaurevgnapr bs gur gevor bs bhe snguref.

36:5 Naq Zbfrf pbzznaqrq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq
bs gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Gur gevor bs gur fbaf bs Wbfrcu ungu fnvq jryy.

36:6 Guvf vf gur guvat juvpu gur YBEQ qbgu pbzznaq pbapreavat gur
qnhtugref bs Mrybcurunq, fnlvat, Yrg gurz zneel gb jubz gurl guvax
orfg; bayl gb gur snzvyl bs gur gevor bs gurve sngure funyy gurl
zneel.

36:7 Fb funyy abg gur vaurevgnapr bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry erzbir
sebz gevor gb gevor: sbe rirel bar bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry funyy
xrrc uvzfrys gb gur vaurevgnapr bs gur gevor bs uvf snguref.

36:8 Naq rirel qnhtugre, gung cbffrffrgu na vaurevgnapr va nal gevor
bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, funyy or jvsr hagb bar bs gur snzvyl bs gur
gevor bs ure sngure, gung gur puvyqera bs Vfenry znl rawbl rirel zna
gur vaurevgnapr bs uvf snguref.

36:9 Arvgure funyy gur vaurevgnapr erzbir sebz bar gevor gb nabgure
gevor; ohg rirel bar bs gur gevorf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry funyy
xrrc uvzfrys gb uvf bja vaurevgnapr.

36:10 Rira nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf, fb qvq gur qnhtugref bs
Mrybcurunq: 36:11 Sbe Znuynu, Gvemnu, naq Ubtynu, naq Zvypnu, naq
Abnu, gur qnhtugref bs Mrybcurunq, jrer zneevrq hagb gurve sngure'f
oebguref' fbaf: 36:12 Naq gurl jrer zneevrq vagb gur snzvyvrf bs gur
fbaf bs Znanffru gur fba bs Wbfrcu, naq gurve vaurevgnapr erznvarq va
gur gevor bs gur snzvyl bs gurve sngure.

36:13 Gurfr ner gur pbzznaqzragf naq gur whqtzragf, juvpu gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry va gur
cynvaf bs Zbno ol Wbeqna arne Wrevpub.




Gur Svsgu Obbx bs Zbfrf:  Pnyyrq Qrhgrebabzl


1:1 Gurfr or gur jbeqf juvpu Zbfrf fcnxr hagb nyy Vfenry ba guvf fvqr
Wbeqna va gur jvyqrearff, va gur cynva bire ntnvafg gur Erq frn,
orgjrra Cnena, naq Gbcury, naq Ynona, naq Unmrebgu, naq Qvmnuno.

1:2 (Gurer ner ryrira qnlf' wbhearl sebz Ubero ol gur jnl bs zbhag
Frve hagb Xnqrfuonearn.)  1:3 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur sbegvrgu
lrne, va gur ryriragu zbagu, ba gur svefg qnl bs gur zbagu, gung Zbfrf
fcnxr hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, nppbeqvat hagb nyy gung gur YBEQ
unq tvira uvz va pbzznaqzrag hagb gurz; 1:4 Nsgre ur unq fynva Fvuba
gur xvat bs gur Nzbevgrf, juvpu qjryg va Urfuoba, naq Bt gur xvat bs
Onfuna, juvpu qjryg ng Nfgnebgu va Rqerv: 1:5 Ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna, va
gur ynaq bs Zbno, ortna Zbfrf gb qrpyner guvf ynj, fnlvat, 1:6 Gur
YBEQ bhe Tbq fcnxr hagb hf va Ubero, fnlvat, Lr unir qjryg ybat rabhtu
va guvf zbhag: 1:7 Ghea lbh, naq gnxr lbhe wbhearl, naq tb gb gur
zbhag bs gur Nzbevgrf, naq hagb nyy gur cynprf avtu gurerhagb, va gur
cynva, va gur uvyyf, naq va gur inyr, naq va gur fbhgu, naq ol gur frn
fvqr, gb gur ynaq bs gur Pnannavgrf, naq hagb Yronaba, hagb gur terng
evire, gur evire Rhcuengrf.

1:8 Orubyq, V unir frg gur ynaq orsber lbh: tb va naq cbffrff gur ynaq
juvpu gur YBEQ fjner hagb lbhe snguref, Noenunz, Vfnnp, naq Wnpbo, gb
tvir hagb gurz naq gb gurve frrq nsgre gurz.

1:9 Naq V fcnxr hagb lbh ng gung gvzr, fnlvat, V nz abg noyr gb orne
lbh zlfrys nybar: 1:10 Gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ungu zhygvcyvrq lbh, naq,
orubyq, lr ner guvf qnl nf gur fgnef bs urnira sbe zhygvghqr.

1:11 (Gur YBEQ Tbq bs lbhe snguref znxr lbh n gubhfnaq gvzrf fb znal
zber nf lr ner, naq oyrff lbh, nf ur ungu cebzvfrq lbh!)  1:12 Ubj pna
V zlfrys nybar orne lbhe phzoenapr, naq lbhe oheqra, naq lbhe fgevsr?
1:13 Gnxr lbh jvfr zra, naq haqrefgnaqvat, naq xabja nzbat lbhe
gevorf, naq V jvyy znxr gurz ehyref bire lbh.

1:14 Naq lr nafjrerq zr, naq fnvq, Gur guvat juvpu gubh unfg fcbxra vf
tbbq sbe hf gb qb.

1:15 Fb V gbbx gur puvrs bs lbhe gevorf, jvfr zra, naq xabja, naq znqr
gurz urnqf bire lbh, pncgnvaf bire gubhfnaqf, naq pncgnvaf bire
uhaqerqf, naq pncgnvaf bire svsgvrf, naq pncgnvaf bire graf, naq
bssvpref nzbat lbhe gevorf.

1:16 Naq V punetrq lbhe whqtrf ng gung gvzr, fnlvat, Urne gur pnhfrf
orgjrra lbhe oerguera, naq whqtr evtugrbhfyl orgjrra rirel zna naq uvf
oebgure, naq gur fgenatre gung vf jvgu uvz.

1:17 Lr funyy abg erfcrpg crefbaf va whqtzrag; ohg lr funyy urne gur
fznyy nf jryy nf gur terng; lr funyy abg or nsenvq bs gur snpr bs zna;
sbe gur whqtzrag vf Tbq'f: naq gur pnhfr gung vf gbb uneq sbe lbh,
oevat vg hagb zr, naq V jvyy urne vg.

1:18 Naq V pbzznaqrq lbh ng gung gvzr nyy gur guvatf juvpu lr fubhyq
qb.

1:19 Naq jura jr qrcnegrq sebz Ubero, jr jrag guebhtu nyy gung terng
naq greevoyr jvyqrearff, juvpu lr fnj ol gur jnl bs gur zbhagnva bs
gur Nzbevgrf, nf gur YBEQ bhe Tbq pbzznaqrq hf; naq jr pnzr gb
Xnqrfuonearn.

1:20 Naq V fnvq hagb lbh, Lr ner pbzr hagb gur zbhagnva bs gur
Nzbevgrf, juvpu gur YBEQ bhe Tbq qbgu tvir hagb hf.

1:21 Orubyq, gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu frg gur ynaq orsber gurr: tb hc naq
cbffrff vg, nf gur YBEQ Tbq bs gul snguref ungu fnvq hagb gurr; srne
abg, arvgure or qvfpbhentrq.

1:22 Naq lr pnzr arne hagb zr rirel bar bs lbh, naq fnvq, Jr jvyy fraq
zra orsber hf, naq gurl funyy frnepu hf bhg gur ynaq, naq oevat hf
jbeq ntnva ol jung jnl jr zhfg tb hc, naq vagb jung pvgvrf jr funyy
pbzr.

1:23 Naq gur fnlvat cyrnfrq zr jryy: naq V gbbx gjryir zra bs lbh, bar
bs n gevor: 1:24 Naq gurl ghearq naq jrag hc vagb gur zbhagnva, naq
pnzr hagb gur inyyrl bs Rfupby, naq frnepurq vg bhg.

1:25 Naq gurl gbbx bs gur sehvg bs gur ynaq va gurve unaqf, naq
oebhtug vg qbja hagb hf, naq oebhtug hf jbeq ntnva, naq fnvq, Vg vf n
tbbq ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ bhe Tbq qbgu tvir hf.

1:26 Abgjvgufgnaqvat lr jbhyq abg tb hc, ohg eroryyrq ntnvafg gur
pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq: 1:27 Naq lr zhezherq va lbhe gragf,
naq fnvq, Orpnhfr gur YBEQ ungrq hf, ur ungu oebhtug hf sbegu bhg bs
gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, gb qryvire hf vagb gur unaq bs gur Nzbevgrf, gb
qrfgebl hf.

1:28 Juvgure funyy jr tb hc? bhe oerguera unir qvfpbhentrq bhe urneg,
fnlvat, Gur crbcyr vf terngre naq gnyyre guna jr; gur pvgvrf ner terng
naq jnyyrq hc gb urnira; naq zberbire jr unir frra gur fbaf bs gur
Nanxvzf gurer.

1:29 Gura V fnvq hagb lbh, Qernq abg, arvgure or nsenvq bs gurz.
