1:30 Gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq juvpu tbrgu orsber lbh, ur funyy svtug sbe lbh,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung ur qvq sbe lbh va Rtlcg orsber lbhe rlrf; 1:31
Naq va gur jvyqrearff, jurer gubh unfg frra ubj gung gur YBEQ gul Tbq
oner gurr, nf n zna qbgu orne uvf fba, va nyy gur jnl gung lr jrag,
hagvy lr pnzr vagb guvf cynpr.

1:32 Lrg va guvf guvat lr qvq abg oryvrir gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, 1:33 Jub
jrag va gur jnl orsber lbh, gb frnepu lbh bhg n cynpr gb cvgpu lbhe
gragf va, va sver ol avtug, gb furj lbh ol jung jnl lr fubhyq tb, naq
va n pybhq ol qnl.

1:34 Naq gur YBEQ urneq gur ibvpr bs lbhe jbeqf, naq jnf jebgu, naq
fjner, fnlvat, 1:35 Fheryl gurer funyy abg bar bs gurfr zra bs guvf
rivy trarengvba frr gung tbbq ynaq, juvpu V fjner gb tvir hagb lbhe
snguref.

1:36 Fnir Pnyro gur fba bs Wrcuhaaru; ur funyy frr vg, naq gb uvz jvyy
V tvir gur ynaq gung ur ungu gebqqra hcba, naq gb uvf puvyqera,
orpnhfr ur ungu jubyyl sbyybjrq gur YBEQ.

1:37 Nyfb gur YBEQ jnf natel jvgu zr sbe lbhe fnxrf, fnlvat, Gubh nyfb
funyg abg tb va guvgure.

1:38 Ohg Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha, juvpu fgnaqrgu orsber gurr, ur funyy
tb va guvgure: rapbhentr uvz: sbe ur funyy pnhfr Vfenry gb vaurevg vg.

1:39 Zberbire lbhe yvggyr barf, juvpu lr fnvq fubhyq or n cerl, naq
lbhe puvyqera, juvpu va gung qnl unq ab xabjyrqtr orgjrra tbbq naq
rivy, gurl funyy tb va guvgure, naq hagb gurz jvyy V tvir vg, naq gurl
funyy cbffrff vg.

1:40 Ohg nf sbe lbh, ghea lbh, naq gnxr lbhe wbhearl vagb gur
jvyqrearff ol gur jnl bs gur Erq frn.

1:41 Gura lr nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb zr, Jr unir fvaarq ntnvafg gur
YBEQ, jr jvyy tb hc naq svtug, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung gur YBEQ bhe Tbq
pbzznaqrq hf.

Naq jura lr unq tveqrq ba rirel zna uvf jrncbaf bs jne, lr jrer ernql
gb tb hc vagb gur uvyy.

1:42 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb zr, Fnl hagb gurz. Tb abg hc, arvgure
svtug; sbe V nz abg nzbat lbh; yrfg lr or fzvggra orsber lbhe rarzvrf.

1:43 Fb V fcnxr hagb lbh; naq lr jbhyq abg urne, ohg eroryyrq ntnvafg
gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ, naq jrag cerfhzcghbhfyl hc vagb gur uvyy.

1:44 Naq gur Nzbevgrf, juvpu qjryg va gung zbhagnva, pnzr bhg ntnvafg
lbh, naq punfrq lbh, nf orrf qb, naq qrfgeblrq lbh va Frve, rira hagb
Ubeznu.

1:45 Naq lr erghearq naq jrcg orsber gur YBEQ; ohg gur YBEQ jbhyq abg
urnexra gb lbhe ibvpr, abe tvir rne hagb lbh.

1:46 Fb lr nobqr va Xnqrfu znal qnlf, nppbeqvat hagb gur qnlf gung lr
nobqr gurer.

2:1 Gura jr ghearq, naq gbbx bhe wbhearl vagb gur jvyqrearff ol gur
jnl bs gur Erq frn, nf gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb zr: naq jr pbzcnffrq zbhag
Frve znal qnlf.

2:2 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb zr, fnlvat, 2:3 Lr unir pbzcnffrq guvf
zbhagnva ybat rabhtu: ghea lbh abegujneq.

2:4 Naq pbzznaq gubh gur crbcyr, fnlvat, Lr ner gb cnff guebhtu gur
pbnfg bs lbhe oerguera gur puvyqera bs Rfnh, juvpu qjryy va Frve; naq
gurl funyy or nsenvq bs lbh: gnxr lr tbbq urrq hagb lbhefryirf
gurersber: 2:5 Zrqqyr abg jvgu gurz; sbe V jvyy abg tvir lbh bs gurve
ynaq, ab, abg fb zhpu nf n sbbg oernqgu; orpnhfr V unir tvira zbhag
Frve hagb Rfnh sbe n cbffrffvba.

2:6 Lr funyy ohl zrng bs gurz sbe zbarl, gung lr znl rng; naq lr funyy
nyfb ohl jngre bs gurz sbe zbarl, gung lr znl qevax.

2:7 Sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu oyrffrq gurr va nyy gur jbexf bs gul
unaq: ur xabjrgu gul jnyxvat guebhtu guvf terng jvyqrearff: gurfr
sbegl lrnef gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu orra jvgu gurr; gubh unfg ynpxrq
abguvat.

2:8 Naq jura jr cnffrq ol sebz bhe oerguera gur puvyqera bs Rfnh,
juvpu qjryg va Frve, guebhtu gur jnl bs gur cynva sebz Ryngu, naq sebz
Rmvbatnore, jr ghearq naq cnffrq ol gur jnl bs gur jvyqrearff bs Zbno.

2:9 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb zr, Qvfgerff abg gur Zbnovgrf, arvgure
pbagraq jvgu gurz va onggyr: sbe V jvyy abg tvir gurr bs gurve ynaq
sbe n cbffrffvba; orpnhfr V unir tvira Ne hagb gur puvyqera bs Ybg sbe
n cbffrffvba.

2:10 Gur Rzvzf qjryg gurerva va gvzrf cnfg, n crbcyr terng, naq znal,
naq gnyy, nf gur Nanxvzf; 2:11 Juvpu nyfb jrer nppbhagrq tvnagf, nf
gur Nanxvzf; ohg gur Zbnovgrf pnyyrq gurz Rzvzf.

2:12 Gur Ubevzf nyfb qjryg va Frve orsbergvzr; ohg gur puvyqera bs
Rfnh fhpprrqrq gurz, jura gurl unq qrfgeblrq gurz sebz orsber gurz,
naq qjryg va gurve fgrnq; nf Vfenry qvq hagb gur ynaq bs uvf
cbffrffvba, juvpu gur YBEQ tnir hagb gurz.

2:13 Abj evfr hc, fnvq V, naq trg lbh bire gur oebbx Mrerq. Naq jr
jrag bire gur oebbx Mrerq.

2:14 Naq gur fcnpr va juvpu jr pnzr sebz Xnqrfuonearn, hagvy jr jrer
pbzr bire gur oebbx Mrerq, jnf guvegl naq rvtug lrnef; hagvy nyy gur
trarengvba bs gur zra bs jne jrer jnfgrq bhg sebz nzbat gur ubfg, nf
gur YBEQ fjner hagb gurz.

2:15 Sbe vaqrrq gur unaq bs gur YBEQ jnf ntnvafg gurz, gb qrfgebl gurz
sebz nzbat gur ubfg, hagvy gurl jrer pbafhzrq.

2:16 Fb vg pnzr gb cnff, jura nyy gur zra bs jne jrer pbafhzrq naq
qrnq sebz nzbat gur crbcyr, 2:17 Gung gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb zr, fnlvat,
2:18 Gubh neg gb cnff bire guebhtu Ne, gur pbnfg bs Zbno, guvf qnl:
2:19 Naq jura gubh pbzrfg avtu bire ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs Nzzba,
qvfgerff gurz abg, abe zrqqyr jvgu gurz: sbe V jvyy abg tvir gurr bs
gur ynaq bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba nal cbffrffvba; orpnhfr V unir tvira
vg hagb gur puvyqera bs Ybg sbe n cbffrffvba.

2:20 (Gung nyfb jnf nppbhagrq n ynaq bs tvnagf: tvnagf qjryg gurerva
va byq gvzr; naq gur Nzzbavgrf pnyy gurz Mnzmhzzvzf; 2:21 N crbcyr
terng, naq znal, naq gnyy, nf gur Nanxvzf; ohg gur YBEQ qrfgeblrq gurz
orsber gurz; naq gurl fhpprrqrq gurz, naq qjryg va gurve fgrnq: 2:22
Nf ur qvq gb gur puvyqera bs Rfnh, juvpu qjryg va Frve, jura ur
qrfgeblrq gur Ubevzf sebz orsber gurz; naq gurl fhpprrqrq gurz, naq
qjryg va gurve fgrnq rira hagb guvf qnl: 2:23 Naq gur Nivzf juvpu
qjryg va Unmrevz, rira hagb Nmmnu, gur Pncugbevzf, juvpu pnzr sbegu
bhg bs Pncugbe, qrfgeblrq gurz, naq qjryg va gurve fgrnq.)  2:24 Evfr
lr hc, gnxr lbhe wbhearl, naq cnff bire gur evire Neaba: orubyq, V
unir tvira vagb guvar unaq Fvuba gur Nzbevgr, xvat bs Urfuoba, naq uvf
ynaq: ortva gb cbffrff vg, naq pbagraq jvgu uvz va onggyr.

2:25 Guvf qnl jvyy V ortva gb chg gur qernq bs gurr naq gur srne bs
gurr hcba gur angvbaf gung ner haqre gur jubyr urnira, jub funyy urne
ercbeg bs gurr, naq funyy gerzoyr, naq or va nathvfu orpnhfr bs gurr.

2:26 Naq V frag zrffratref bhg bs gur jvyqrearff bs Xrqrzbgu hagb
Fvuba xvat bs Urfuoba jvgu jbeqf bs crnpr, fnlvat, 2:27 Yrg zr cnff
guebhtu gul ynaq: V jvyy tb nybat ol gur uvtu jnl, V jvyy arvgure ghea
hagb gur evtug unaq abe gb gur yrsg.

2:28 Gubh funyg fryy zr zrng sbe zbarl, gung V znl rng; naq tvir zr
jngre sbe zbarl, gung V znl qevax: bayl V jvyy cnff guebhtu ba zl
srrg; 2:29 (Nf gur puvyqera bs Rfnh juvpu qjryy va Frve, naq gur
Zbnovgrf juvpu qjryy va Ne, qvq hagb zr;) hagvy V funyy cnff bire
Wbeqna vagb gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ bhe Tbq tvirgu hf.

2:30 Ohg Fvuba xvat bs Urfuoba jbhyq abg yrg hf cnff ol uvz: sbe gur
YBEQ gul Tbq uneqrarq uvf fcvevg, naq znqr uvf urneg bofgvangr, gung
ur zvtug qryvire uvz vagb gul unaq, nf nccrnergu guvf qnl.

2:31 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb zr, Orubyq, V unir ortha gb tvir Fvuba naq
uvf ynaq orsber gurr: ortva gb cbffrff, gung gubh znlrfg vaurevg uvf
ynaq.

2:32 Gura Fvuba pnzr bhg ntnvafg hf, ur naq nyy uvf crbcyr, gb svtug
ng Wnunm.

2:33 Naq gur YBEQ bhe Tbq qryvirerq uvz orsber hf; naq jr fzbgr uvz,
naq uvf fbaf, naq nyy uvf crbcyr.

2:34 Naq jr gbbx nyy uvf pvgvrf ng gung gvzr, naq hggreyl qrfgeblrq
gur zra, naq gur jbzra, naq gur yvggyr barf, bs rirel pvgl, jr yrsg
abar gb erznva: 2:35 Bayl gur pnggyr jr gbbx sbe n cerl hagb
bhefryirf, naq gur fcbvy bs gur pvgvrf juvpu jr gbbx.

2:36 Sebz Nebre, juvpu vf ol gur oevax bs gur evire bs Neaba, naq sebz
gur pvgl gung vf ol gur evire, rira hagb Tvyrnq, gurer jnf abg bar
pvgl gbb fgebat sbe hf: gur YBEQ bhe Tbq qryvirerq nyy hagb hf: 2:37
Bayl hagb gur ynaq bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba gubh pnzrfg abg, abe hagb
nal cynpr bs gur evire Wnoobx, abe hagb gur pvgvrf va gur zbhagnvaf,
abe hagb jungfbrire gur YBEQ bhe Tbq sbeonq hf.

3:1 Gura jr ghearq, naq jrag hc gur jnl gb Onfuna: naq Bt gur xvat bs
Onfuna pnzr bhg ntnvafg hf, ur naq nyy uvf crbcyr, gb onggyr ng Rqerv.

3:2 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb zr, Srne uvz abg: sbe V jvyy qryvire uvz,
naq nyy uvf crbcyr, naq uvf ynaq, vagb gul unaq; naq gubh funyg qb
hagb uvz nf gubh qvqfg hagb Fvuba xvat bs gur Nzbevgrf, juvpu qjryg ng
Urfuoba.

3:3 Fb gur YBEQ bhe Tbq qryvirerq vagb bhe unaqf Bt nyfb, gur xvat bs
Onfuna, naq nyy uvf crbcyr: naq jr fzbgr uvz hagvy abar jnf yrsg gb
uvz erznvavat.

3:4 Naq jr gbbx nyy uvf pvgvrf ng gung gvzr, gurer jnf abg n pvgl
juvpu jr gbbx abg sebz gurz, guerrfpber pvgvrf, nyy gur ertvba bs
Netbo, gur xvatqbz bs Bt va Onfuna.

3:5 Nyy gurfr pvgvrf jrer sraprq jvgu uvtu jnyyf, tngrf, naq onef;
orfvqr hajnyyrq gbjaf n terng znal.

3:6 Naq jr hggreyl qrfgeblrq gurz, nf jr qvq hagb Fvuba xvat bs
Urfuoba, hggreyl qrfgeblvat gur zra, jbzra, naq puvyqera, bs rirel
pvgl.

3:7 Ohg nyy gur pnggyr, naq gur fcbvy bs gur pvgvrf, jr gbbx sbe n
cerl gb bhefryirf.

3:8 Naq jr gbbx ng gung gvzr bhg bs gur unaq bs gur gjb xvatf bs gur
Nzbevgrf gur ynaq gung jnf ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna, sebz gur evire bs
Neaba hagb zbhag Urezba; 3:9 (Juvpu Urezba gur Fvqbavnaf pnyy Fvevba;
naq gur Nzbevgrf pnyy vg Furave;) 3:10 Nyy gur pvgvrf bs gur cynva,
naq nyy Tvyrnq, naq nyy Onfuna, hagb Fnypunu naq Rqerv, pvgvrf bs gur
xvatqbz bs Bt va Onfuna.

3:11 Sbe bayl Bt xvat bs Onfuna erznvarq bs gur erzanag bs tvnagf;
orubyq uvf orqfgrnq jnf n orqfgrnq bs veba; vf vg abg va Enoongu bs
gur puvyqera bs Nzzba? avar phovgf jnf gur yratgu gurerbs, naq sbhe
phovgf gur oernqgu bs vg, nsgre gur phovg bs n zna.

3:12 Naq guvf ynaq, juvpu jr cbffrffrq ng gung gvzr, sebz Nebre, juvpu
vf ol gur evire Neaba, naq unys zbhag Tvyrnq, naq gur pvgvrf gurerbs,
tnir V hagb gur Erhoravgrf naq gb gur Tnqvgrf.

3:13 Naq gur erfg bs Tvyrnq, naq nyy Onfuna, orvat gur xvatqbz bs Bt,
tnir V hagb gur unys gevor bs Znanffru; nyy gur ertvba bs Netbo, jvgu
nyy Onfuna, juvpu jnf pnyyrq gur ynaq bs tvnagf.

3:14 Wnve gur fba bs Znanffru gbbx nyy gur pbhagel bs Netbo hagb gur
pbnfgf bs Trfuhev naq Znnpunguv; naq pnyyrq gurz nsgre uvf bja anzr,
Onfunaunibguwnve, hagb guvf qnl.

3:15 Naq V tnir Tvyrnq hagb Znpuve.

3:16 Naq hagb gur Erhoravgrf naq hagb gur Tnqvgrf V tnir sebz Tvyrnq
rira hagb gur evire Neaba unys gur inyyrl, naq gur obeqre rira hagb
gur evire Wnoobx, juvpu vf gur obeqre bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba; 3:17
Gur cynva nyfb, naq Wbeqna, naq gur pbnfg gurerbs, sebz Puvaarergu
rira hagb gur frn bs gur cynva, rira gur fnyg frn, haqre Nfuqbgucvftnu
rnfgjneq.

3:18 Naq V pbzznaqrq lbh ng gung gvzr, fnlvat, Gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ungu
tvira lbh guvf ynaq gb cbffrff vg: lr funyy cnff bire nezrq orsber
lbhe oerguera gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, nyy gung ner zrrg sbe gur jne.

3:19 Ohg lbhe jvirf, naq lbhe yvggyr barf, naq lbhe pnggyr, (sbe V
xabj gung lr unir zhpu pnggyr,) funyy novqr va lbhe pvgvrf juvpu V
unir tvira lbh; 3:20 Hagvy gur YBEQ unir tvira erfg hagb lbhe
oerguera, nf jryy nf hagb lbh, naq hagvy gurl nyfb cbffrff gur ynaq
juvpu gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ungu tvira gurz orlbaq Wbeqna: naq gura funyy
lr erghea rirel zna hagb uvf cbffrffvba, juvpu V unir tvira lbh.

3:21 Naq V pbzznaqrq Wbfuhn ng gung gvzr, fnlvat, Guvar rlrf unir frra
nyy gung gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ungu qbar hagb gurfr gjb xvatf: fb funyy
gur YBEQ qb hagb nyy gur xvatqbzf juvgure gubh cnffrfg.

3:22 Lr funyy abg srne gurz: sbe gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ur funyy svtug sbe
lbh.

3:23 Naq V orfbhtug gur YBEQ ng gung gvzr, fnlvat, 3:24 B Ybeq TBQ,
gubh unfg ortha gb furj gul freinag gul terngarff, naq gul zvtugl
unaq: sbe jung Tbq vf gurer va urnira be va rnegu, gung pna qb
nppbeqvat gb gul jbexf, naq nppbeqvat gb gul zvtug?  3:25 V cenl gurr,
yrg zr tb bire, naq frr gur tbbq ynaq gung vf orlbaq Wbeqna, gung
tbbqyl zbhagnva, naq Yronaba.

3:26 Ohg gur YBEQ jnf jebgu jvgu zr sbe lbhe fnxrf, naq jbhyq abg urne
zr: naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb zr, Yrg vg fhssvpr gurr; fcrnx ab zber hagb
zr bs guvf znggre.

3:27 Trg gurr hc vagb gur gbc bs Cvftnu, naq yvsg hc guvar rlrf
jrfgjneq, naq abegujneq, naq fbhgujneq, naq rnfgjneq, naq orubyq vg
jvgu guvar rlrf: sbe gubh funyg abg tb bire guvf Wbeqna.

3:28 Ohg punetr Wbfuhn, naq rapbhentr uvz, naq fgeratgura uvz: sbe ur
funyy tb bire orsber guvf crbcyr, naq ur funyy pnhfr gurz gb vaurevg
gur ynaq juvpu gubh funyg frr.

3:29 Fb jr nobqr va gur inyyrl bire ntnvafg Orgucrbe.

4:1 Abj gurersber urnexra, B Vfenry, hagb gur fgnghgrf naq hagb gur
whqtzragf, juvpu V grnpu lbh, sbe gb qb gurz, gung lr znl yvir, naq tb
va naq cbffrff gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ Tbq bs lbhe snguref tvirgu lbh.

4:2 Lr funyy abg nqq hagb gur jbeq juvpu V pbzznaq lbh, arvgure funyy
lr qvzvavfu bhtug sebz vg, gung lr znl xrrc gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur
YBEQ lbhe Tbq juvpu V pbzznaq lbh.

4:3 Lbhe rlrf unir frra jung gur YBEQ qvq orpnhfr bs Onnycrbe: sbe nyy
gur zra gung sbyybjrq Onnycrbe, gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu qrfgeblrq gurz
sebz nzbat lbh.

4:4 Ohg lr gung qvq pyrnir hagb gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ner nyvir rirel bar
bs lbh guvf qnl.

4:5 Orubyq, V unir gnhtug lbh fgnghgrf naq whqtzragf, rira nf gur YBEQ
zl Tbq pbzznaqrq zr, gung lr fubhyq qb fb va gur ynaq juvgure lr tb gb
cbffrff vg.

4:6 Xrrc gurersber naq qb gurz; sbe guvf vf lbhe jvfqbz naq lbhe
haqrefgnaqvat va gur fvtug bs gur angvbaf, juvpu funyy urne nyy gurfr
fgnghgrf, naq fnl, Fheryl guvf terng angvba vf n jvfr naq
haqrefgnaqvat crbcyr.

4:7 Sbe jung angvba vf gurer fb terng, jub ungu Tbq fb avtu hagb gurz,
nf gur YBEQ bhe Tbq vf va nyy guvatf gung jr pnyy hcba uvz sbe?  4:8
Naq jung angvba vf gurer fb terng, gung ungu fgnghgrf naq whqtzragf fb
evtugrbhf nf nyy guvf ynj, juvpu V frg orsber lbh guvf qnl?  4:9 Bayl
gnxr urrq gb gulfrys, naq xrrc gul fbhy qvyvtragyl, yrfg gubh sbetrg
gur guvatf juvpu guvar rlrf unir frra, naq yrfg gurl qrcneg sebz gul
urneg nyy gur qnlf bs gul yvsr: ohg grnpu gurz gul fbaf, naq gul fbaf'
fbaf; 4:10 Fcrpvnyyl gur qnl gung gubh fgbbqrfg orsber gur YBEQ gul
Tbq va Ubero, jura gur YBEQ fnvq hagb zr, Tngure zr gur crbcyr
gbtrgure, naq V jvyy znxr gurz urne zl jbeqf, gung gurl znl yrnea gb
srne zr nyy gur qnlf gung gurl funyy yvir hcba gur rnegu, naq gung
gurl znl grnpu gurve puvyqera.

4:11 Naq lr pnzr arne naq fgbbq haqre gur zbhagnva; naq gur zbhagnva
ohearq jvgu sver hagb gur zvqfg bs urnira, jvgu qnexarff, pybhqf, naq
guvpx qnexarff.

4:12 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb lbh bhg bs gur zvqfg bs gur sver: lr
urneq gur ibvpr bs gur jbeqf, ohg fnj ab fvzvyvghqr; bayl lr urneq n
ibvpr.

4:13 Naq ur qrpynerq hagb lbh uvf pbiranag, juvpu ur pbzznaqrq lbh gb
cresbez, rira gra pbzznaqzragf; naq ur jebgr gurz hcba gjb gnoyrf bs
fgbar.

4:14 Naq gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq zr ng gung gvzr gb grnpu lbh fgnghgrf naq
whqtzragf, gung lr zvtug qb gurz va gur ynaq juvgure lr tb bire gb
cbffrff vg.

4:15 Gnxr lr gurersber tbbq urrq hagb lbhefryirf; sbe lr fnj ab znaare
bs fvzvyvghqr ba gur qnl gung gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb lbh va Ubero bhg bs
gur zvqfg bs gur sver: 4:16 Yrfg lr pbeehcg lbhefryirf, naq znxr lbh n
tenira vzntr, gur fvzvyvghqr bs nal svther, gur yvxrarff bs znyr be
srznyr, 4:17 Gur yvxrarff bs nal ornfg gung vf ba gur rnegu, gur
yvxrarff bs nal jvatrq sbjy gung syvrgu va gur nve, 4:18 Gur yvxrarff
bs nal guvat gung perrcrgu ba gur tebhaq, gur yvxrarff bs nal svfu
gung vf va gur jngref orarngu gur rnegu: 4:19 Naq yrfg gubh yvsg hc
guvar rlrf hagb urnira, naq jura gubh frrfg gur fha, naq gur zbba, naq
gur fgnef, rira nyy gur ubfg bs urnira, fubhyqrfg or qevira gb jbefuvc
gurz, naq freir gurz, juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu qvivqrq hagb nyy
angvbaf haqre gur jubyr urnira.

4:20 Ohg gur YBEQ ungu gnxra lbh, naq oebhtug lbh sbegu bhg bs gur
veba sheanpr, rira bhg bs Rtlcg, gb or hagb uvz n crbcyr bs
vaurevgnapr, nf lr ner guvf qnl.

4:21 Shegurezber gur YBEQ jnf natel jvgu zr sbe lbhe fnxrf, naq fjner
gung V fubhyq abg tb bire Wbeqna, naq gung V fubhyq abg tb va hagb
gung tbbq ynaq, juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr sbe na vaurevgnapr:
4:22 Ohg V zhfg qvr va guvf ynaq, V zhfg abg tb bire Wbeqna: ohg lr
funyy tb bire, naq cbffrff gung tbbq ynaq.

4:23 Gnxr urrq hagb lbhefryirf, yrfg lr sbetrg gur pbiranag bs gur
YBEQ lbhe Tbq, juvpu ur znqr jvgu lbh, naq znxr lbh n tenira vzntr, be
gur yvxrarff bs nal guvat, juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu sbeovqqra gurr.

4:24 Sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq vf n pbafhzvat sver, rira n wrnybhf Tbq.

4:25 Jura gubh funyg ortrg puvyqera, naq puvyqera'f puvyqera, naq lr
funyy unir erznvarq ybat va gur ynaq, naq funyy pbeehcg lbhefryirf,
naq znxr n tenira vzntr, be gur yvxrarff bs nal guvat, naq funyy qb
rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gb cebibxr uvz gb natre: 4:26 V
pnyy urnira naq rnegu gb jvgarff ntnvafg lbh guvf qnl, gung lr funyy
fbba hggreyl crevfu sebz bss gur ynaq jurerhagb lr tb bire Wbeqna gb
cbffrff vg; lr funyy abg cebybat lbhe qnlf hcba vg, ohg funyy hggreyl
or qrfgeblrq.

4:27 Naq gur YBEQ funyy fpnggre lbh nzbat gur angvbaf, naq lr funyy or
yrsg srj va ahzore nzbat gur urngura, juvgure gur YBEQ funyy yrnq lbh.

4:28 Naq gurer lr funyy freir tbqf, gur jbex bs zra'f unaqf, jbbq naq
fgbar, juvpu arvgure frr, abe urne, abe rng, abe fzryy.

4:29 Ohg vs sebz gurapr gubh funyg frrx gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gubh funyg
svaq uvz, vs gubh frrx uvz jvgu nyy gul urneg naq jvgu nyy gul fbhy.

4:30 Jura gubh neg va gevohyngvba, naq nyy gurfr guvatf ner pbzr hcba
gurr, rira va gur ynggre qnlf, vs gubh ghea gb gur YBEQ gul Tbq, naq
funyg or borqvrag hagb uvf ibvpr; 4:31 (Sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq vf n
zrepvshy Tbq;) ur jvyy abg sbefnxr gurr, arvgure qrfgebl gurr, abe
sbetrg gur pbiranag bs gul snguref juvpu ur fjner hagb gurz.

4:32 Sbe nfx abj bs gur qnlf gung ner cnfg, juvpu jrer orsber gurr,
fvapr gur qnl gung Tbq perngrq zna hcba gur rnegu, naq nfx sebz gur
bar fvqr bs urnira hagb gur bgure, jurgure gurer ungu orra nal fhpu
guvat nf guvf terng guvat vf, be ungu orra urneq yvxr vg?  4:33 Qvq
rire crbcyr urne gur ibvpr bs Tbq fcrnxvat bhg bs gur zvqfg bs gur
sver, nf gubh unfg urneq, naq yvir?  4:34 Be ungu Tbq nffnlrq gb tb
naq gnxr uvz n angvba sebz gur zvqfg bs nabgure angvba, ol
grzcgngvbaf, ol fvtaf, naq ol jbaqref, naq ol jne, naq ol n zvtugl
unaq, naq ol n fgergpurq bhg nez, naq ol terng greebef, nppbeqvat gb
nyy gung gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq qvq sbe lbh va Rtlcg orsber lbhe rlrf?
4:35 Hagb gurr vg jnf furjrq, gung gubh zvtugrfg xabj gung gur YBEQ ur
vf Tbq; gurer vf abar ryfr orfvqr uvz.

4:36 Bhg bs urnira ur znqr gurr gb urne uvf ibvpr, gung ur zvtug
vafgehpg gurr: naq hcba rnegu ur furjrq gurr uvf terng sver; naq gubh
urneqrfg uvf jbeqf bhg bs gur zvqfg bs gur sver.

4:37 Naq orpnhfr ur ybirq gul snguref, gurersber ur pubfr gurve frrq
nsgre gurz, naq oebhtug gurr bhg va uvf fvtug jvgu uvf zvtugl cbjre
bhg bs Rtlcg; 4:38 Gb qevir bhg angvbaf sebz orsber gurr terngre naq
zvtugvre guna gubh neg, gb oevat gurr va, gb tvir gurr gurve ynaq sbe
na vaurevgnapr, nf vg vf guvf qnl.

4:39 Xabj gurersber guvf qnl, naq pbafvqre vg va guvar urneg, gung gur
YBEQ ur vf Tbq va urnira nobir, naq hcba gur rnegu orarngu: gurer vf
abar ryfr.

4:40 Gubh funyg xrrc gurersber uvf fgnghgrf, naq uvf pbzznaqzragf,
juvpu V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl, gung vg znl tb jryy jvgu gurr, naq jvgu
gul puvyqera nsgre gurr, naq gung gubh znlrfg cebybat gul qnlf hcba
gur rnegu, juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr, sbe rire.

4:41 Gura Zbfrf frirerq guerr pvgvrf ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna gbjneq gur
fhaevfvat; 4:42 Gung gur fynlre zvtug syrr guvgure, juvpu fubhyq xvyy
uvf arvtuobhe hanjnerf, naq ungrq uvz abg va gvzrf cnfg; naq gung
syrrvat hagb bar bs gurfr pvgvrf ur zvtug yvir: 4:43 Anzryl, Ormre va
gur jvyqrearff, va gur cynva pbhagel, bs gur Erhoravgrf; naq Enzbgu va
Tvyrnq, bs gur Tnqvgrf; naq Tbyna va Onfuna, bs gur Znanffvgrf.

4:44 Naq guvf vf gur ynj juvpu Zbfrf frg orsber gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry: 4:45 Gurfr ner gur grfgvzbavrf, naq gur fgnghgrf, naq gur
whqtzragf, juvpu Zbfrf fcnxr hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, nsgre gurl
pnzr sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg.

4:46 Ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna, va gur inyyrl bire ntnvafg Orgucrbe, va gur
ynaq bs Fvuba xvat bs gur Nzbevgrf, jub qjryg ng Urfuoba, jubz Zbfrf
naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fzbgr, nsgre gurl jrer pbzr sbegu bhg bs
Rtlcg: 4:47 Naq gurl cbffrffrq uvf ynaq, naq gur ynaq bs Bt xvat bs
Onfuna, gjb xvatf bs gur Nzbevgrf, juvpu jrer ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna
gbjneq gur fhaevfvat; 4:48 Sebz Nebre, juvpu vf ol gur onax bs gur
evire Neaba, rira hagb zbhag Fvba, juvpu vf Urezba, 4:49 Naq nyy gur
cynva ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna rnfgjneq, rira hagb gur frn bs gur cynva,
haqre gur fcevatf bs Cvftnu.

5:1 Naq Zbfrf pnyyrq nyy Vfenry, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Urne, B Vfenry,
gur fgnghgrf naq whqtzragf juvpu V fcrnx va lbhe rnef guvf qnl, gung
lr znl yrnea gurz, naq xrrc, naq qb gurz.

5:2 Gur YBEQ bhe Tbq znqr n pbiranag jvgu hf va Ubero.

5:3 Gur YBEQ znqr abg guvf pbiranag jvgu bhe snguref, ohg jvgu hf,
rira hf, jub ner nyy bs hf urer nyvir guvf qnl.

5:4 Gur YBEQ gnyxrq jvgu lbh snpr gb snpr va gur zbhag bhg bs gur
zvqfg bs gur sver, 5:5 (V fgbbq orgjrra gur YBEQ naq lbh ng gung gvzr,
gb furj lbh gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ: sbe lr jrer nsenvq ol ernfba bs gur
sver, naq jrag abg hc vagb gur zbhag;) fnlvat, 5:6 V nz gur YBEQ gul
Tbq, juvpu oebhtug gurr bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, sebz gur ubhfr bs
obaqntr.

5:7 Gubh funyg unir abar bgure tbqf orsber zr.

5:8 Gubh funyg abg znxr gurr nal tenira vzntr, be nal yvxrarff bs nal
guvat gung vf va urnira nobir, be gung vf va gur rnegu orarngu, be
gung vf va gur jngref orarngu gur rnegu: 5:9 Gubh funyg abg obj qbja
gulfrys hagb gurz, abe freir gurz: sbe V gur YBEQ gul Tbq nz n wrnybhf
Tbq, ivfvgvat gur vavdhvgl bs gur snguref hcba gur puvyqera hagb gur
guveq naq sbhegu trarengvba bs gurz gung ungr zr, 5:10 Naq furjvat
zrepl hagb gubhfnaqf bs gurz gung ybir zr naq xrrc zl pbzznaqzragf.

5:11 Gubh funyg abg gnxr gur anzr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq va inva: sbe gur
YBEQ jvyy abg ubyq uvz thvygyrff gung gnxrgu uvf anzr va inva.

5:12 Xrrc gur fnoongu qnl gb fnapgvsl vg, nf gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu
pbzznaqrq gurr.

5:13 Fvk qnlf gubh funyg ynobhe, naq qb nyy gul jbex: 5:14 Ohg gur
friragu qnl vf gur fnoongu bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq: va vg gubh funyg abg
qb nal jbex, gubh, abe gul fba, abe gul qnhtugre, abe gul znafreinag,
abe gul znvqfreinag, abe guvar bk, abe guvar nff, abe nal bs gul
pnggyr, abe gul fgenatre gung vf jvguva gul tngrf; gung gul znafreinag
naq gul znvqfreinag znl erfg nf jryy nf gubh.

5:15 Naq erzrzore gung gubh jnfg n freinag va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, naq
gung gur YBEQ gul Tbq oebhtug gurr bhg gurapr guebhtu n zvtugl unaq
naq ol n fgergpurq bhg nez: gurersber gur YBEQ gul Tbq pbzznaqrq gurr
gb xrrc gur fnoongu qnl.

5:16 Ubabhe gul sngure naq gul zbgure, nf gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu
pbzznaqrq gurr; gung gul qnlf znl or cebybatrq, naq gung vg znl tb
jryy jvgu gurr, va gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr.

5:17 Gubh funyg abg xvyy.

5:18 Arvgure funyg gubh pbzzvg nqhygrel.

5:19 Arvgure funyg gubh fgrny.

5:20 Arvgure funyg gubh orne snyfr jvgarff ntnvafg gul arvtuobhe.

5:21 Arvgure funyg gubh qrfver gul arvtuobhe'f jvsr, arvgure funyg
gubh pbirg gul arvtuobhe'f ubhfr, uvf svryq, be uvf znafreinag, be uvf
znvqfreinag, uvf bk, be uvf nff, be nal guvat gung vf gul arvtuobhe'f.

5:22 Gurfr jbeqf gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb nyy lbhe nffrzoyl va gur zbhag
bhg bs gur zvqfg bs gur sver, bs gur pybhq, naq bs gur guvpx qnexarff,
jvgu n terng ibvpr: naq ur nqqrq ab zber. Naq ur jebgr gurz va gjb
gnoyrf bs fgbar, naq qryvirerq gurz hagb zr.

5:23 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura lr urneq gur ibvpr bhg bs gur zvqfg bs
gur qnexarff, (sbe gur zbhagnva qvq ohea jvgu sver,) gung lr pnzr arne
hagb zr, rira nyy gur urnqf bs lbhe gevorf, naq lbhe ryqref; 5:24 Naq
lr fnvq, Orubyq, gur YBEQ bhe Tbq ungu furjrq hf uvf tybel naq uvf
terngarff, naq jr unir urneq uvf ibvpr bhg bs gur zvqfg bs gur sver:
jr unir frra guvf qnl gung Tbq qbgu gnyx jvgu zna, naq ur yvirgu.

5:25 Abj gurersber jul fubhyq jr qvr? sbe guvf terng sver jvyy pbafhzr
hf: vs jr urne gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ bhe Tbq nal zber, gura jr funyy
qvr.

5:26 Sbe jub vf gurer bs nyy syrfu, gung ungu urneq gur ibvpr bs gur
yvivat Tbq fcrnxvat bhg bs gur zvqfg bs gur sver, nf jr unir, naq
yvirq?  5:27 Tb gubh arne, naq urne nyy gung gur YBEQ bhe Tbq funyy
fnl: naq fcrnx gubh hagb hf nyy gung gur YBEQ bhe Tbq funyy fcrnx hagb
gurr; naq jr jvyy urne vg, naq qb vg.

5:28 Naq gur YBEQ urneq gur ibvpr bs lbhe jbeqf, jura lr fcnxr hagb
zr; naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb zr, V unir urneq gur ibvpr bs gur jbeqf bs
guvf crbcyr, juvpu gurl unir fcbxra hagb gurr: gurl unir jryy fnvq nyy
gung gurl unir fcbxra.

5:29 B gung gurer jrer fhpu na urneg va gurz, gung gurl jbhyq srne zr,
naq xrrc nyy zl pbzznaqzragf nyjnlf, gung vg zvtug or jryy jvgu gurz,
naq jvgu gurve puvyqera sbe rire!  5:30 Tb fnl gb gurz, Trg lbh vagb
lbhe gragf ntnva.

5:31 Ohg nf sbe gurr, fgnaq gubh urer ol zr, naq V jvyy fcrnx hagb
gurr nyy gur pbzznaqzragf, naq gur fgnghgrf, naq gur whqtzragf, juvpu
gubh funyg grnpu gurz, gung gurl znl qb gurz va gur ynaq juvpu V tvir
gurz gb cbffrff vg.

5:32 Lr funyy bofreir gb qb gurersber nf gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ungu
pbzznaqrq lbh: lr funyy abg ghea nfvqr gb gur evtug unaq be gb gur
yrsg.

5:33 Lr funyy jnyx va nyy gur jnlf juvpu gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ungu
pbzznaqrq lbh, gung lr znl yvir, naq gung vg znl or jryy jvgu lbh, naq
gung lr znl cebybat lbhe qnlf va gur ynaq juvpu lr funyy cbffrff.

6:1 Abj gurfr ner gur pbzznaqzragf, gur fgnghgrf, naq gur whqtzragf,
juvpu gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq pbzznaqrq gb grnpu lbh, gung lr zvtug qb gurz
va gur ynaq juvgure lr tb gb cbffrff vg: 6:2 Gung gubh zvtugrfg srne
gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gb xrrc nyy uvf fgnghgrf naq uvf pbzznaqzragf, juvpu
V pbzznaq gurr, gubh, naq gul fba, naq gul fba'f fba, nyy gur qnlf bs
gul yvsr; naq gung gul qnlf znl or cebybatrq.

6:3 Urne gurersber, B Vfenry, naq bofreir gb qb vg; gung vg znl or
jryy jvgu gurr, naq gung lr znl vapernfr zvtugvyl, nf gur YBEQ Tbq bs
gul snguref ungu cebzvfrq gurr, va gur ynaq gung sybjrgu jvgu zvyx naq
ubarl.

6:4 Urne, B Vfenry: Gur YBEQ bhe Tbq vf bar YBEQ: 6:5 Naq gubh funyg
ybir gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvgu nyy guvar urneg, naq jvgu nyy gul fbhy, naq
jvgu nyy gul zvtug.

6:6 Naq gurfr jbeqf, juvpu V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl, funyy or va guvar
urneg: 6:7 Naq gubh funyg grnpu gurz qvyvtragyl hagb gul puvyqera, naq
funyg gnyx bs gurz jura gubh fvggrfg va guvar ubhfr, naq jura gubh
jnyxrfg ol gur jnl, naq jura gubh yvrfg qbja, naq jura gubh evfrfg hc.

6:8 Naq gubh funyg ovaq gurz sbe n fvta hcba guvar unaq, naq gurl
funyy or nf sebagyrgf orgjrra guvar rlrf.

6:9 Naq gubh funyg jevgr gurz hcba gur cbfgf bs gul ubhfr, naq ba gul
tngrf.

6:10 Naq vg funyy or, jura gur YBEQ gul Tbq funyy unir oebhtug gurr
vagb gur ynaq juvpu ur fjner hagb gul snguref, gb Noenunz, gb Vfnnp,
naq gb Wnpbo, gb tvir gurr terng naq tbbqyl pvgvrf, juvpu gubh
ohvyqrqfg abg, 6:11 Naq ubhfrf shyy bs nyy tbbq guvatf, juvpu gubh
svyyrqfg abg, naq jryyf qvttrq, juvpu gubh qvttrqfg abg, ivarlneqf naq
byvir gerrf, juvpu gubh cynagrqfg abg; jura gubh funyg unir rngra naq
or shyy; 6:12 Gura orjner yrfg gubh sbetrg gur YBEQ, juvpu oebhtug
gurr sbegu bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, sebz gur ubhfr bs obaqntr.

6:13 Gubh funyg srne gur YBEQ gul Tbq, naq freir uvz, naq funyg fjrne
ol uvf anzr.

6:14 Lr funyy abg tb nsgre bgure tbqf, bs gur tbqf bs gur crbcyr juvpu
ner ebhaq nobhg lbh; 6:15 (Sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq vf n wrnybhf Tbq nzbat
lbh) yrfg gur natre bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq or xvaqyrq ntnvafg gurr, naq
qrfgebl gurr sebz bss gur snpr bs gur rnegu.

6:16 Lr funyy abg grzcg gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, nf lr grzcgrq uvz va
Znffnu.

6:17 Lr funyy qvyvtragyl xrrc gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq,
naq uvf grfgvzbavrf, naq uvf fgnghgrf, juvpu ur ungu pbzznaqrq gurr.

6:18 Naq gubh funyg qb gung juvpu vf evtug naq tbbq va gur fvtug bs
gur YBEQ: gung vg znl or jryy jvgu gurr, naq gung gubh znlrfg tb va
naq cbffrff gur tbbq ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ fjner hagb gul snguref.

6:19 Gb pnfg bhg nyy guvar rarzvrf sebz orsber gurr, nf gur YBEQ ungu
fcbxra.

6:20 Naq jura gul fba nfxrgu gurr va gvzr gb pbzr, fnlvat, Jung zrna
gur grfgvzbavrf, naq gur fgnghgrf, naq gur whqtzragf, juvpu gur YBEQ
bhe Tbq ungu pbzznaqrq lbh?  6:21 Gura gubh funyg fnl hagb gul fba, Jr
jrer Cunenbu'f obaqzra va Rtlcg; naq gur YBEQ oebhtug hf bhg bs Rtlcg
jvgu n zvtugl unaq: 6:22 Naq gur YBEQ furjrq fvtaf naq jbaqref, terng
naq fber, hcba Rtlcg, hcba Cunenbu, naq hcba nyy uvf ubhfrubyq, orsber
bhe rlrf: 6:23 Naq ur oebhtug hf bhg sebz gurapr, gung ur zvtug oevat
hf va, gb tvir hf gur ynaq juvpu ur fjner hagb bhe snguref.

6:24 Naq gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq hf gb qb nyy gurfr fgnghgrf, gb srne gur
YBEQ bhe Tbq, sbe bhe tbbq nyjnlf, gung ur zvtug cerfreir hf nyvir, nf
vg vf ng guvf qnl.

6:25 Naq vg funyy or bhe evtugrbhfarff, vs jr bofreir gb qb nyy gurfr
pbzznaqzragf orsber gur YBEQ bhe Tbq, nf ur ungu pbzznaqrq hf.

7:1 Jura gur YBEQ gul Tbq funyy oevat gurr vagb gur ynaq juvgure gubh
tbrfg gb cbffrff vg, naq ungu pnfg bhg znal angvbaf orsber gurr, gur
Uvggvgrf, naq gur Tvetnfuvgrf, naq gur Nzbevgrf, naq gur Pnannavgrf,
naq gur Crevmmvgrf, naq gur Uvivgrf, naq gur Wrohfvgrf, frira angvbaf
terngre naq zvtugvre guna gubh; 7:2 Naq jura gur YBEQ gul Tbq funyy
qryvire gurz orsber gurr; gubh funyg fzvgr gurz, naq hggreyl qrfgebl
gurz; gubh funyg znxr ab pbiranag jvgu gurz, abe furj zrepl hagb gurz:
7:3 Arvgure funyg gubh znxr zneevntrf jvgu gurz; gul qnhtugre gubh
funyg abg tvir hagb uvf fba, abe uvf qnhtugre funyg gubh gnxr hagb gul
fba.

7:4 Sbe gurl jvyy ghea njnl gul fba sebz sbyybjvat zr, gung gurl znl
freir bgure tbqf: fb jvyy gur natre bs gur YBEQ or xvaqyrq ntnvafg
lbh, naq qrfgebl gurr fhqqrayl.

7:5 Ohg guhf funyy lr qrny jvgu gurz; lr funyy qrfgebl gurve nygnef,
naq oernx qbja gurve vzntrf, naq phg qbja gurve tebirf, naq ohea gurve
tenira vzntrf jvgu sver.

7:6 Sbe gubh neg na ubyl crbcyr hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq: gur YBEQ gul
Tbq ungu pubfra gurr gb or n fcrpvny crbcyr hagb uvzfrys, nobir nyy
crbcyr gung ner hcba gur snpr bs gur rnegu.

7:7 Gur YBEQ qvq abg frg uvf ybir hcba lbh, abe pubbfr lbh, orpnhfr lr
jrer zber va ahzore guna nal crbcyr; sbe lr jrer gur srjrfg bs nyy
crbcyr: 7:8 Ohg orpnhfr gur YBEQ ybirq lbh, naq orpnhfr ur jbhyq xrrc
gur bngu juvpu ur unq fjbea hagb lbhe snguref, ungu gur YBEQ oebhtug
lbh bhg jvgu n zvtugl unaq, naq erqrrzrq lbh bhg bs gur ubhfr bs
obaqzra, sebz gur unaq bs Cunenbu xvat bs Rtlcg.

7:9 Xabj gurersber gung gur YBEQ gul Tbq, ur vf Tbq, gur snvgushy Tbq,
juvpu xrrcrgu pbiranag naq zrepl jvgu gurz gung ybir uvz naq xrrc uvf
pbzznaqzragf gb n gubhfnaq trarengvbaf; 7:10 Naq ercnlrgu gurz gung
ungr uvz gb gurve snpr, gb qrfgebl gurz: ur jvyy abg or fynpx gb uvz
gung ungrgu uvz, ur jvyy ercnl uvz gb uvf snpr.

7:11 Gubh funyg gurersber xrrc gur pbzznaqzragf, naq gur fgnghgrf, naq
gur whqtzragf, juvpu V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl, gb qb gurz.

7:12 Jurersber vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, vs lr urnexra gb gurfr
whqtzragf, naq xrrc, naq qb gurz, gung gur YBEQ gul Tbq funyy xrrc
hagb gurr gur pbiranag naq gur zrepl juvpu ur fjner hagb gul snguref:
7:13 Naq ur jvyy ybir gurr, naq oyrff gurr, naq zhygvcyl gurr: ur jvyy
nyfb oyrff gur sehvg bs gul jbzo, naq gur sehvg bs gul ynaq, gul pbea,
naq gul jvar, naq guvar bvy, gur vapernfr bs gul xvar, naq gur sybpxf
bs gul furrc, va gur ynaq juvpu ur fjner hagb gul snguref gb tvir
gurr.

7:14 Gubh funyg or oyrffrq nobir nyy crbcyr: gurer funyy abg or znyr
be srznyr oneera nzbat lbh, be nzbat lbhe pnggyr.

7:15 Naq gur YBEQ jvyy gnxr njnl sebz gurr nyy fvpxarff, naq jvyy chg
abar bs gur rivy qvfrnfrf bs Rtlcg, juvpu gubh xabjrfg, hcba gurr; ohg
jvyy ynl gurz hcba nyy gurz gung ungr gurr.

7:16 Naq gubh funyg pbafhzr nyy gur crbcyr juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq
funyy qryvire gurr; guvar rlr funyy unir ab cvgl hcba gurz: arvgure
funyg gubh freir gurve tbqf; sbe gung jvyy or n faner hagb gurr.

7:17 Vs gubh funyg fnl va guvar urneg, Gurfr angvbaf ner zber guna V;
ubj pna V qvfcbffrff gurz?  7:18 Gubh funyg abg or nsenvq bs gurz: ohg
funyg jryy erzrzore jung gur YBEQ gul Tbq qvq hagb Cunenbu, naq hagb
nyy Rtlcg; 7:19 Gur terng grzcgngvbaf juvpu guvar rlrf fnj, naq gur
fvtaf, naq gur jbaqref, naq gur zvtugl unaq, naq gur fgergpurq bhg
nez, jurerol gur YBEQ gul Tbq oebhtug gurr bhg: fb funyy gur YBEQ gul
Tbq qb hagb nyy gur crbcyr bs jubz gubh neg nsenvq.

7:20 Zberbire gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvyy fraq gur ubearg nzbat gurz, hagvy
gurl gung ner yrsg, naq uvqr gurzfryirf sebz gurr, or qrfgeblrq.

7:21 Gubh funyg abg or nssevtugrq ng gurz: sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq vf
nzbat lbh, n zvtugl Tbq naq greevoyr.

7:22 Naq gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvyy chg bhg gubfr angvbaf orsber gurr ol
yvggyr naq yvggyr: gubh znlrfg abg pbafhzr gurz ng bapr, yrfg gur
ornfgf bs gur svryq vapernfr hcba gurr.

7:23 Ohg gur YBEQ gul Tbq funyy qryvire gurz hagb gurr, naq funyy
qrfgebl gurz jvgu n zvtugl qrfgehpgvba, hagvy gurl or qrfgeblrq.

7:24 Naq ur funyy qryvire gurve xvatf vagb guvar unaq, naq gubh funyg
qrfgebl gurve anzr sebz haqre urnira: gurer funyy ab zna or noyr gb
fgnaq orsber gurr, hagvy gubh unir qrfgeblrq gurz.

7:25 Gur tenira vzntrf bs gurve tbqf funyy lr ohea jvgu sver: gubh
funyg abg qrfver gur fvyire be tbyq gung vf ba gurz, abe gnxr vg hagb
gurr, yrfg gubh or fanerq gureva: sbe vg vf na nobzvangvba gb gur YBEQ
gul Tbq.

7:26 Arvgure funyg gubh oevat na nobzvangvba vagb guvar ubhfr, yrfg
gubh or n phefrq guvat yvxr vg: ohg gubh funyg hggreyl qrgrfg vg, naq
gubh funyg hggreyl noube vg; sbe vg vf n phefrq guvat.

8:1 Nyy gur pbzznaqzragf juvpu V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl funyy lr
bofreir gb qb, gung lr znl yvir, naq zhygvcyl, naq tb va naq cbffrff
gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ fjner hagb lbhe snguref.

8:2 Naq gubh funyg erzrzore nyy gur jnl juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq yrq
gurr gurfr sbegl lrnef va gur jvyqrearff, gb uhzoyr gurr, naq gb cebir
gurr, gb xabj jung jnf va guvar urneg, jurgure gubh jbhyqrfg xrrc uvf
pbzznaqzragf, be ab.

8:3 Naq ur uhzoyrq gurr, naq fhssrerq gurr gb uhatre, naq srq gurr
jvgu znaan, juvpu gubh xarjrfg abg, arvgure qvq gul snguref xabj; gung
ur zvtug znxr gurr xabj gung zna qbgu abg yvir ol oernq bayl, ohg ol
rirel jbeq gung cebprrqrgu bhg bs gur zbhgu bs gur YBEQ qbgu zna yvir.

8:4 Gul envzrag jnkrq abg byq hcba gurr, arvgure qvq gul sbbg fjryy,
gurfr sbegl lrnef.

8:5 Gubh funyg nyfb pbafvqre va guvar urneg, gung, nf n zna punfgrargu
uvf fba, fb gur YBEQ gul Tbq punfgrargu gurr.

8:6 Gurersber gubh funyg xrrc gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gb
jnyx va uvf jnlf, naq gb srne uvz.

8:7 Sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq oevatrgu gurr vagb n tbbq ynaq, n ynaq bs
oebbxf bs jngre, bs sbhagnvaf naq qrcguf gung fcevat bhg bs inyyrlf
naq uvyyf; 8:8 N ynaq bs jurng, naq oneyrl, naq ivarf, naq svt gerrf,
naq cbzrtenangrf; n ynaq bs bvy byvir, naq ubarl; 8:9 N ynaq jurerva
gubh funyg rng oernq jvgubhg fpneprarff, gubh funyg abg ynpx nal guvat
va vg; n ynaq jubfr fgbarf ner veba, naq bhg bs jubfr uvyyf gubh
znlrfg qvt oenff.

8:10 Jura gubh unfg rngra naq neg shyy, gura gubh funyg oyrff gur YBEQ
gul Tbq sbe gur tbbq ynaq juvpu ur ungu tvira gurr.

8:11 Orjner gung gubh sbetrg abg gur YBEQ gul Tbq, va abg xrrcvat uvf
pbzznaqzragf, naq uvf whqtzragf, naq uvf fgnghgrf, juvpu V pbzznaq
gurr guvf qnl: 8:12 Yrfg jura gubh unfg rngra naq neg shyy, naq unfg
ohvyg tbbqyl ubhfrf, naq qjryg gurerva; 8:13 Naq jura gul ureqf naq
gul sybpxf zhygvcyl, naq gul fvyire naq gul tbyq vf zhygvcyvrq, naq
nyy gung gubh unfg vf zhygvcyvrq; 8:14 Gura guvar urneg or yvsgrq hc,
naq gubh sbetrg gur YBEQ gul Tbq, juvpu oebhtug gurr sbegu bhg bs gur
ynaq bs Rtlcg, sebz gur ubhfr bs obaqntr; 8:15 Jub yrq gurr guebhtu
gung terng naq greevoyr jvyqrearff, jurerva jrer svrel frecragf, naq
fpbecvbaf, naq qebhtug, jurer gurer jnf ab jngre; jub oebhtug gurr
sbegu jngre bhg bs gur ebpx bs syvag; 8:16 Jub srq gurr va gur
jvyqrearff jvgu znaan, juvpu gul snguref xarj abg, gung ur zvtug
uhzoyr gurr, naq gung ur zvtug cebir gurr, gb qb gurr tbbq ng gul
ynggre raq; 8:17 Naq gubh fnl va guvar urneg, Zl cbjre naq gur zvtug
bs zvar unaq ungu tbggra zr guvf jrnygu.

8:18 Ohg gubh funyg erzrzore gur YBEQ gul Tbq: sbe vg vf ur gung
tvirgu gurr cbjre gb trg jrnygu, gung ur znl rfgnoyvfu uvf pbiranag
juvpu ur fjner hagb gul snguref, nf vg vf guvf qnl.

8:19 Naq vg funyy or, vs gubh qb ng nyy sbetrg gur YBEQ gul Tbq, naq
jnyx nsgre bgure tbqf, naq freir gurz, naq jbefuvc gurz, V grfgvsl
ntnvafg lbh guvf qnl gung lr funyy fheryl crevfu.

8:20 Nf gur angvbaf juvpu gur YBEQ qrfgeblrgu orsber lbhe snpr, fb
funyy lr crevfu; orpnhfr lr jbhyq abg or borqvrag hagb gur ibvpr bs
gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

9:1 Urne, B Vfenry: Gubh neg gb cnff bire Wbeqna guvf qnl, gb tb va gb
cbffrff angvbaf terngre naq zvtugvre guna gulfrys, pvgvrf terng naq
sraprq hc gb urnira, 9:2 N crbcyr terng naq gnyy, gur puvyqera bs gur
Nanxvzf, jubz gubh xabjrfg, naq bs jubz gubh unfg urneq fnl, Jub pna
fgnaq orsber gur puvyqera bs Nanx!  9:3 Haqrefgnaq gurersber guvf qnl,
gung gur YBEQ gul Tbq vf ur juvpu tbrgu bire orsber gurr; nf n
pbafhzvat sver ur funyy qrfgebl gurz, naq ur funyy oevat gurz qbja
orsber gul snpr: fb funyg gubh qevir gurz bhg, naq qrfgebl gurz
dhvpxyl, nf gur YBEQ ungu fnvq hagb gurr.

9:4 Fcrnx abg gubh va guvar urneg, nsgre gung gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu
pnfg gurz bhg sebz orsber gurr, fnlvat, Sbe zl evtugrbhfarff gur YBEQ
ungu oebhtug zr va gb cbffrff guvf ynaq: ohg sbe gur jvpxrqarff bs
gurfr angvbaf gur YBEQ qbgu qevir gurz bhg sebz orsber gurr.

9:5 Abg sbe gul evtugrbhfarff, be sbe gur hcevtugarff bs guvar urneg,
qbfg gubh tb gb cbffrff gurve ynaq: ohg sbe gur jvpxrqarff bs gurfr
angvbaf gur YBEQ gul Tbq qbgu qevir gurz bhg sebz orsber gurr, naq
gung ur znl cresbez gur jbeq juvpu gur YBEQ fjner hagb gul snguref,
Noenunz, Vfnnp, naq Wnpbo.

9:6 Haqrefgnaq gurersber, gung gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr abg guvf
tbbq ynaq gb cbffrff vg sbe gul evtugrbhfarff; sbe gubh neg n
fgvssarpxrq crbcyr.

9:7 Erzrzore, naq sbetrg abg, ubj gubh cebibxrqfg gur YBEQ gul Tbq gb
jengu va gur jvyqrearff: sebz gur qnl gung gubh qvqfg qrcneg bhg bs
gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, hagvy lr pnzr hagb guvf cynpr, lr unir orra
eroryyvbhf ntnvafg gur YBEQ.

9:8 Nyfb va Ubero lr cebibxrq gur YBEQ gb jengu, fb gung gur YBEQ jnf
natel jvgu lbh gb unir qrfgeblrq lbh.

9:9 Jura V jnf tbar hc vagb gur zbhag gb erprvir gur gnoyrf bs fgbar,
rira gur gnoyrf bs gur pbiranag juvpu gur YBEQ znqr jvgu lbh, gura V
nobqr va gur zbhag sbegl qnlf naq sbegl avtugf, V arvgure qvq rng
oernq abe qevax jngre: 9:10 Naq gur YBEQ qryvirerq hagb zr gjb gnoyrf
bs fgbar jevggra jvgu gur svatre bs Tbq; naq ba gurz jnf jevggra
nppbeqvat gb nyy gur jbeqf, juvpu gur YBEQ fcnxr jvgu lbh va gur zbhag
bhg bs gur zvqfg bs gur sver va gur qnl bs gur nffrzoyl.

9:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur raq bs sbegl qnlf naq sbegl avtugf,
gung gur YBEQ tnir zr gur gjb gnoyrf bs fgbar, rira gur gnoyrf bs gur
pbiranag.

9:12 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb zr, Nevfr, trg gurr qbja dhvpxyl sebz
urapr; sbe gul crbcyr juvpu gubh unfg oebhtug sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg unir
pbeehcgrq gurzfryirf; gurl ner dhvpxyl ghearq nfvqr bhg bs gur jnl
juvpu V pbzznaqrq gurz; gurl unir znqr gurz n zbygra vzntr.

9:13 Shegurezber gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb zr, fnlvat, V unir frra guvf
crbcyr, naq, orubyq, vg vf n fgvssarpxrq crbcyr: 9:14 Yrg zr nybar,
gung V znl qrfgebl gurz, naq oybg bhg gurve anzr sebz haqre urnira:
naq V jvyy znxr bs gurr n angvba zvtugvre naq terngre guna gurl.

9:15 Fb V ghearq naq pnzr qbja sebz gur zbhag, naq gur zbhag ohearq
jvgu sver: naq gur gjb gnoyrf bs gur pbiranag jrer va zl gjb unaqf.

9:16 Naq V ybbxrq, naq, orubyq, lr unq fvaarq ntnvafg gur YBEQ lbhe
Tbq, naq unq znqr lbh n zbygra pnys: lr unq ghearq nfvqr dhvpxyl bhg
bs gur jnl juvpu gur YBEQ unq pbzznaqrq lbh.

9:17 Naq V gbbx gur gjb gnoyrf, naq pnfg gurz bhg bs zl gjb unaqf, naq
oenxr gurz orsber lbhe rlrf.

9:18 Naq V sryy qbja orsber gur YBEQ, nf ng gur svefg, sbegl qnlf naq
sbegl avtugf: V qvq arvgure rng oernq, abe qevax jngre, orpnhfr bs nyy
lbhe fvaf juvpu lr fvaarq, va qbvat jvpxrqyl va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ,
gb cebibxr uvz gb natre.

9:19 Sbe V jnf nsenvq bs gur natre naq ubg qvfcyrnfher, jurerjvgu gur
YBEQ jnf jebgu ntnvafg lbh gb qrfgebl lbh. Ohg gur YBEQ urnexrarq hagb
zr ng gung gvzr nyfb.

9:20 Naq gur YBEQ jnf irel natel jvgu Nneba gb unir qrfgeblrq uvz: naq
V cenlrq sbe Nneba nyfb gur fnzr gvzr.

9:21 Naq V gbbx lbhe fva, gur pnys juvpu lr unq znqr, naq oheag vg
jvgu sver, naq fgnzcrq vg, naq tebhaq vg irel fznyy, rira hagvy vg jnf
nf fznyy nf qhfg: naq V pnfg gur qhfg gurerbs vagb gur oebbx gung
qrfpraqrq bhg bs gur zbhag.

9:22 Naq ng Gnorenu, naq ng Znffnu, naq ng Xvoebguunggnninu, lr
cebibxrq gur YBEQ gb jengu.

9:23 Yvxrjvfr jura gur YBEQ frag lbh sebz Xnqrfuonearn, fnlvat, Tb hc
naq cbffrff gur ynaq juvpu V unir tvira lbh; gura lr eroryyrq ntnvafg
gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, naq lr oryvrirq uvz abg, abe
urnexrarq gb uvf ibvpr.

9:24 Lr unir orra eroryyvbhf ntnvafg gur YBEQ sebz gur qnl gung V xarj
lbh.

9:25 Guhf V sryy qbja orsber gur YBEQ sbegl qnlf naq sbegl avtugf, nf
V sryy qbja ng gur svefg; orpnhfr gur YBEQ unq fnvq ur jbhyq qrfgebl
lbh.

9:26 V cenlrq gurersber hagb gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, B Ybeq TBQ, qrfgebl
abg gul crbcyr naq guvar vaurevgnapr, juvpu gubh unfg erqrrzrq guebhtu
gul terngarff, juvpu gubh unfg oebhtug sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg jvgu n
zvtugl unaq.

9:27 Erzrzore gul freinagf, Noenunz, Vfnnp, naq Wnpbo; ybbx abg hagb
gur fghoobeaarff bs guvf crbcyr, abe gb gurve jvpxrqarff, abe gb gurve
fva: 9:28 Yrfg gur ynaq jurapr gubh oebhtugrfg hf bhg fnl, Orpnhfr gur
YBEQ jnf abg noyr gb oevat gurz vagb gur ynaq juvpu ur cebzvfrq gurz,
naq orpnhfr ur ungrq gurz, ur ungu oebhtug gurz bhg gb fynl gurz va
gur jvyqrearff.

9:29 Lrg gurl ner gul crbcyr naq guvar vaurevgnapr, juvpu gubh
oebhtugrfg bhg ol gul zvtugl cbjre naq ol gul fgergpurq bhg nez.

10:1 Ng gung gvzr gur YBEQ fnvq hagb zr, Urj gurr gjb gnoyrf bs fgbar
yvxr hagb gur svefg, naq pbzr hc hagb zr vagb gur zbhag, naq znxr gurr
na nex bs jbbq.

10:2 Naq V jvyy jevgr ba gur gnoyrf gur jbeqf gung jrer va gur svefg
gnoyrf juvpu gubh oenxrfg, naq gubh funyg chg gurz va gur nex.

10:3 Naq V znqr na nex bs fuvggvz jbbq, naq urjrq gjb gnoyrf bs fgbar
yvxr hagb gur svefg, naq jrag hc vagb gur zbhag, univat gur gjb gnoyrf
va zvar unaq.

10:4 Naq ur jebgr ba gur gnoyrf, nppbeqvat gb gur svefg jevgvat, gur
gra pbzznaqzragf, juvpu gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb lbh va gur zbhag bhg bs
gur zvqfg bs gur sver va gur qnl bs gur nffrzoyl: naq gur YBEQ tnir
gurz hagb zr.

10:5 Naq V ghearq zlfrys naq pnzr qbja sebz gur zbhag, naq chg gur
gnoyrf va gur nex juvpu V unq znqr; naq gurer gurl or, nf gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq zr.

10:6 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gbbx gurve wbhearl sebz Orrebgu bs gur
puvyqera bs Wnnxna gb Zbfren: gurer Nneba qvrq, naq gurer ur jnf
ohevrq; naq Ryrnmne uvf fba zvavfgrerq va gur cevrfg'f bssvpr va uvf
fgrnq.

10:7 Sebz gurapr gurl wbhearlrq hagb Thqtbqnu; naq sebz Thqtbqnu gb
Wbgongu, n ynaq bs eviref bs jngref.

10:8 Ng gung gvzr gur YBEQ frcnengrq gur gevor bs Yriv, gb orne gur
nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ, gb fgnaq orsber gur YBEQ gb zvavfgre
hagb uvz, naq gb oyrff va uvf anzr, hagb guvf qnl.

10:9 Jurersber Yriv ungu ab cneg abe vaurevgnapr jvgu uvf oerguera;
gur YBEQ vf uvf vaurevgnapr, nppbeqvat nf gur YBEQ gul Tbq cebzvfrq
uvz.

10:10 Naq V fgnlrq va gur zbhag, nppbeqvat gb gur svefg gvzr, sbegl
qnlf naq sbegl avtugf; naq gur YBEQ urnexrarq hagb zr ng gung gvzr
nyfb, naq gur YBEQ jbhyq abg qrfgebl gurr.

10:11 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb zr, Nevfr, gnxr gul wbhearl orsber gur
crbcyr, gung gurl znl tb va naq cbffrff gur ynaq, juvpu V fjner hagb
gurve snguref gb tvir hagb gurz.

10:12 Naq abj, Vfenry, jung qbgu gur YBEQ gul Tbq erdhver bs gurr, ohg
gb srne gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gb jnyx va nyy uvf jnlf, naq gb ybir uvz,
naq gb freir gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvgu nyy gul urneg naq jvgu nyy gul
fbhy, 10:13 Gb xrrc gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ, naq uvf fgnghgrf,
juvpu V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl sbe gul tbbq?  10:14 Orubyq, gur urnira
naq gur urnira bs urniraf vf gur YBEQ'f gul Tbq, gur rnegu nyfb, jvgu
nyy gung gurerva vf.

10:15 Bayl gur YBEQ unq n qryvtug va gul snguref gb ybir gurz, naq ur
pubfr gurve frrq nsgre gurz, rira lbh nobir nyy crbcyr, nf vg vf guvf
qnl.

10:16 Pvephzpvfr gurersber gur sberfxva bs lbhe urneg, naq or ab zber
fgvssarpxrq.

10:17 Sbe gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq vf Tbq bs tbqf, naq Ybeq bs ybeqf, n terng
Tbq, n zvtugl, naq n greevoyr, juvpu ertneqrgu abg crefbaf, abe gnxrgu
erjneq: 10:18 Ur qbgu rkrphgr gur whqtzrag bs gur sngureyrff naq
jvqbj, naq ybirgu gur fgenatre, va tvivat uvz sbbq naq envzrag.

10:19 Ybir lr gurersber gur fgenatre: sbe lr jrer fgenatref va gur
ynaq bs Rtlcg.

10:20 Gubh funyg srne gur YBEQ gul Tbq; uvz funyg gubh freir, naq gb
uvz funyg gubh pyrnir, naq fjrne ol uvf anzr.

10:21 Ur vf gul cenvfr, naq ur vf gul Tbq, gung ungu qbar sbe gurr
gurfr terng naq greevoyr guvatf, juvpu guvar rlrf unir frra.

10:22 Gul snguref jrag qbja vagb Rtlcg jvgu guerrfpber naq gra
crefbaf; naq abj gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu znqr gurr nf gur fgnef bs
urnira sbe zhygvghqr.

11:1 Gurersber gubh funyg ybir gur YBEQ gul Tbq, naq xrrc uvf punetr,
naq uvf fgnghgrf, naq uvf whqtzragf, naq uvf pbzznaqzragf, nyjnl.

11:2 Naq xabj lr guvf qnl: sbe V fcrnx abg jvgu lbhe puvyqera juvpu
unir abg xabja, naq juvpu unir abg frra gur punfgvfrzrag bs gur YBEQ
lbhe Tbq, uvf terngarff, uvf zvtugl unaq, naq uvf fgergpurq bhg nez,
11:3 Naq uvf zvenpyrf, naq uvf npgf, juvpu ur qvq va gur zvqfg bs
Rtlcg hagb Cunenbu gur xvat bs Rtlcg, naq hagb nyy uvf ynaq; 11:4 Naq
jung ur qvq hagb gur nezl bs Rtlcg, hagb gurve ubefrf, naq gb gurve
punevbgf; ubj ur znqr gur jngre bs gur Erq frn gb biresybj gurz nf
gurl chefhrq nsgre lbh, naq ubj gur YBEQ ungu qrfgeblrq gurz hagb guvf
qnl; 11:5 Naq jung ur qvq hagb lbh va gur jvyqrearff, hagvy lr pnzr
vagb guvf cynpr; 11:6 Naq jung ur qvq hagb Qnguna naq Novenz, gur fbaf
bs Ryvno, gur fba bs Erhora: ubj gur rnegu bcrarq ure zbhgu, naq
fjnyybjrq gurz hc, naq gurve ubhfrubyqf, naq gurve gragf, naq nyy gur
fhofgnapr gung jnf va gurve cbffrffvba, va gur zvqfg bs nyy Vfenry:
11:7 Ohg lbhe rlrf unir frra nyy gur terng npgf bs gur YBEQ juvpu ur
qvq.

11:8 Gurersber funyy lr xrrc nyy gur pbzznaqzragf juvpu V pbzznaq lbh
guvf qnl, gung lr znl or fgebat, naq tb va naq cbffrff gur ynaq,
juvgure lr tb gb cbffrff vg; 11:9 Naq gung lr znl cebybat lbhe qnlf va
gur ynaq, juvpu gur YBEQ fjner hagb lbhe snguref gb tvir hagb gurz naq
gb gurve frrq, n ynaq gung sybjrgu jvgu zvyx naq ubarl.

11:10 Sbe gur ynaq, juvgure gubh tbrfg va gb cbffrff vg, vf abg nf gur
ynaq bs Rtlcg, sebz jurapr lr pnzr bhg, jurer gubh fbjrqfg gul frrq,
naq jngrerqfg vg jvgu gul sbbg, nf n tneqra bs ureof: 11:11 Ohg gur
ynaq, juvgure lr tb gb cbffrff vg, vf n ynaq bs uvyyf naq inyyrlf, naq
qevaxrgu jngre bs gur enva bs urnira: 11:12 N ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ gul
Tbq pnergu sbe: gur rlrf bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq ner nyjnlf hcba vg, sebz
gur ortvaavat bs gur lrne rira hagb gur raq bs gur lrne.

11:13 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, vs lr funyy urnexra qvyvtragyl hagb
zl pbzznaqzragf juvpu V pbzznaq lbh guvf qnl, gb ybir gur YBEQ lbhe
Tbq, naq gb freir uvz jvgu nyy lbhe urneg naq jvgu nyy lbhe fbhy,
11:14 Gung V jvyy tvir lbh gur enva bs lbhe ynaq va uvf qhr frnfba,
gur svefg enva naq gur ynggre enva, gung gubh znlrfg tngure va gul
pbea, naq gul jvar, naq guvar bvy.

11:15 Naq V jvyy fraq tenff va gul svryqf sbe gul pnggyr, gung gubh
znlrfg rng naq or shyy.

11:16 Gnxr urrq gb lbhefryirf, gung lbhe urneg or abg qrprvirq, naq lr
ghea nfvqr, naq freir bgure tbqf, naq jbefuvc gurz; 11:17 Naq gura gur
YBEQ'f jengu or xvaqyrq ntnvafg lbh, naq ur fuhg hc gur urnira, gung
gurer or ab enva, naq gung gur ynaq lvryq abg ure sehvg; naq yrfg lr
crevfu dhvpxyl sebz bss gur tbbq ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ tvirgu lbh.

11:18 Gurersber funyy lr ynl hc gurfr zl jbeqf va lbhe urneg naq va
lbhe fbhy, naq ovaq gurz sbe n fvta hcba lbhe unaq, gung gurl znl or
nf sebagyrgf orgjrra lbhe rlrf.

11:19 Naq lr funyy grnpu gurz lbhe puvyqera, fcrnxvat bs gurz jura
gubh fvggrfg va guvar ubhfr, naq jura gubh jnyxrfg ol gur jnl, jura
gubh yvrfg qbja, naq jura gubh evfrfg hc.

11:20 Naq gubh funyg jevgr gurz hcba gur qbbe cbfgf bs guvar ubhfr,
naq hcba gul tngrf: 11:21 Gung lbhe qnlf znl or zhygvcyvrq, naq gur
qnlf bs lbhe puvyqera, va gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ fjner hagb lbhe
snguref gb tvir gurz, nf gur qnlf bs urnira hcba gur rnegu.

11:22 Sbe vs lr funyy qvyvtragyl xrrc nyy gurfr pbzznaqzragf juvpu V
pbzznaq lbh, gb qb gurz, gb ybir gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, gb jnyx va nyy uvf
jnlf, naq gb pyrnir hagb uvz; 11:23 Gura jvyy gur YBEQ qevir bhg nyy
gurfr angvbaf sebz orsber lbh, naq lr funyy cbffrff terngre angvbaf
naq zvtugvre guna lbhefryirf.

11:24 Rirel cynpr jurerba gur fbyrf bs lbhe srrg funyy gernq funyy or
lbhef: sebz gur jvyqrearff naq Yronaba, sebz gur evire, gur evire
Rhcuengrf, rira hagb gur hggrezbfg frn funyy lbhe pbnfg or.

11:25 Gurer funyy ab zna or noyr gb fgnaq orsber lbh: sbe gur YBEQ
lbhe Tbq funyy ynl gur srne bs lbh naq gur qernq bs lbh hcba nyy gur
ynaq gung lr funyy gernq hcba, nf ur ungu fnvq hagb lbh.

11:26 Orubyq, V frg orsber lbh guvf qnl n oyrffvat naq n phefr; 11:27
N oyrffvat, vs lr borl gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, juvpu V
pbzznaq lbh guvf qnl: 11:28 Naq n phefr, vs lr jvyy abg borl gur
pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, ohg ghea nfvqr bhg bs gur jnl juvpu
V pbzznaq lbh guvf qnl, gb tb nsgre bgure tbqf, juvpu lr unir abg
xabja.

11:29 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu oebhtug
gurr va hagb gur ynaq juvgure gubh tbrfg gb cbffrff vg, gung gubh
funyg chg gur oyrffvat hcba zbhag Trevmvz, naq gur phefr hcba zbhag
Rony.

11:30 Ner gurl abg ba gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna, ol gur jnl jurer gur fha
tbrgu qbja, va gur ynaq bs gur Pnannavgrf, juvpu qjryy va gur
punzcnvta bire ntnvafg Tvytny, orfvqr gur cynvaf bs Zberu?  11:31 Sbe
lr funyy cnff bire Wbeqna gb tb va gb cbffrff gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ
lbhe Tbq tvirgu lbh, naq lr funyy cbffrff vg, naq qjryy gurerva.

11:32 Naq lr funyy bofreir gb qb nyy gur fgnghgrf naq whqtzragf juvpu
V frg orsber lbh guvf qnl.

12:1 Gurfr ner gur fgnghgrf naq whqtzragf, juvpu lr funyy bofreir gb
qb va gur ynaq, juvpu gur YBEQ Tbq bs gul snguref tvirgu gurr gb
cbffrff vg, nyy gur qnlf gung lr yvir hcba gur rnegu.

12:2 Lr funyy hggreyl qrfgebl nyy gur cynprf, jurerva gur angvbaf
juvpu lr funyy cbffrff freirq gurve tbqf, hcba gur uvtu zbhagnvaf, naq
hcba gur uvyyf, naq haqre rirel terra gerr: 12:3 Naq lr funyy
bireguebj gurve nygnef, naq oernx gurve cvyynef, naq ohea gurve tebirf
jvgu sver; naq lr funyy urj qbja gur tenira vzntrf bs gurve tbqf, naq
qrfgebl gur anzrf bs gurz bhg bs gung cynpr.

12:4 Lr funyy abg qb fb hagb gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

12:5 Ohg hagb gur cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq funyy pubbfr bhg bs
nyy lbhe gevorf gb chg uvf anzr gurer, rira hagb uvf unovgngvba funyy
lr frrx, naq guvgure gubh funyg pbzr: 12:6 Naq guvgure lr funyy oevat
lbhe oheag bssrevatf, naq lbhe fnpevsvprf, naq lbhe gvgurf, naq urnir
bssrevatf bs lbhe unaq, naq lbhe ibjf, naq lbhe serrjvyy bssrevatf,
naq gur svefgyvatf bs lbhe ureqf naq bs lbhe sybpxf: 12:7 Naq gurer lr
funyy rng orsber gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, naq lr funyy erwbvpr va nyy gung
lr chg lbhe unaq hagb, lr naq lbhe ubhfrubyqf, jurerva gur YBEQ gul
Tbq ungu oyrffrq gurr.

12:8 Lr funyy abg qb nsgre nyy gur guvatf gung jr qb urer guvf qnl,
rirel zna jungfbrire vf evtug va uvf bja rlrf.

12:9 Sbe lr ner abg nf lrg pbzr gb gur erfg naq gb gur vaurevgnapr,
juvpu gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq tvirgu lbh.

12:10 Ohg jura lr tb bire Wbeqna, naq qjryy va gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ
lbhe Tbq tvirgu lbh gb vaurevg, naq jura ur tvirgu lbh erfg sebz nyy
lbhe rarzvrf ebhaq nobhg, fb gung lr qjryy va fnsrgl; 12:11 Gura gurer
funyy or n cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq funyy pubbfr gb pnhfr uvf
anzr gb qjryy gurer; guvgure funyy lr oevat nyy gung V pbzznaq lbh;
lbhe oheag bssrevatf, naq lbhe fnpevsvprf, lbhe gvgurf, naq gur urnir
bssrevat bs lbhe unaq, naq nyy lbhe pubvpr ibjf juvpu lr ibj hagb gur
YBEQ: 12:12 Naq lr funyy erwbvpr orsber gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, lr, naq
lbhe fbaf, naq lbhe qnhtugref, naq lbhe zrafreinagf, naq lbhe
znvqfreinagf, naq gur Yrivgr gung vf jvguva lbhe tngrf; sbenfzhpu nf
ur ungu ab cneg abe vaurevgnapr jvgu lbh.

12:13 Gnxr urrq gb gulfrys gung gubh bssre abg gul oheag bssrevatf va
rirel cynpr gung gubh frrfg: 12:14 Ohg va gur cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ
funyy pubbfr va bar bs gul gevorf, gurer gubh funyg bssre gul oheag
bssrevatf, naq gurer gubh funyg qb nyy gung V pbzznaq gurr.

12:15 Abgjvgufgnaqvat gubh znlrfg xvyy naq rng syrfu va nyy gul tngrf,
jungfbrire gul fbhy yhfgrgu nsgre, nppbeqvat gb gur oyrffvat bs gur
YBEQ gul Tbq juvpu ur ungu tvira gurr: gur hapyrna naq gur pyrna znl
rng gurerbs, nf bs gur ebrohpx, naq nf bs gur uneg.

12:16 Bayl lr funyy abg rng gur oybbq; lr funyy cbhe vg hcba gur rnegu
nf jngre.

12:17 Gubh znlrfg abg rng jvguva gul tngrf gur gvgur bs gul pbea, be
bs gul jvar, be bs gul bvy, be gur svefgyvatf bs gul ureqf be bs gul
sybpx, abe nal bs gul ibjf juvpu gubh ibjrfg, abe gul serrjvyy
bssrevatf, be urnir bssrevat bs guvar unaq: 12:18 Ohg gubh zhfg rng
gurz orsber gur YBEQ gul Tbq va gur cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq funyy
pubbfr, gubh, naq gul fba, naq gul qnhtugre, naq gul znafreinag, naq
gul znvqfreinag, naq gur Yrivgr gung vf jvguva gul tngrf: naq gubh
funyg erwbvpr orsber gur YBEQ gul Tbq va nyy gung gubh chggrfg guvar
unaqf hagb.

12:19 Gnxr urrq gb gulfrys gung gubh sbefnxr abg gur Yrivgr nf ybat nf
gubh yvirfg hcba gur rnegu.

12:20 Jura gur YBEQ gul Tbq funyy raynetr gul obeqre, nf ur ungu
cebzvfrq gurr, naq gubh funyg fnl, V jvyy rng syrfu, orpnhfr gul fbhy
ybatrgu gb rng syrfu; gubh znlrfg rng syrfu, jungfbrire gul fbhy
yhfgrgu nsgre.

12:21 Vs gur cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu pubfra gb chg uvf anzr
gurer or gbb sne sebz gurr, gura gubh funyg xvyy bs gul ureq naq bs
gul sybpx, juvpu gur YBEQ ungu tvira gurr, nf V unir pbzznaqrq gurr,
naq gubh funyg rng va gul tngrf jungfbrire gul fbhy yhfgrgu nsgre.

12:22 Rira nf gur ebrohpx naq gur uneg vf rngra, fb gubh funyg rng
gurz: gur hapyrna naq gur pyrna funyy rng bs gurz nyvxr.

12:23 Bayl or fher gung gubh rng abg gur oybbq: sbe gur oybbq vf gur
yvsr; naq gubh znlrfg abg rng gur yvsr jvgu gur syrfu.

12:24 Gubh funyg abg rng vg; gubh funyg cbhe vg hcba gur rnegu nf
jngre.

12:25 Gubh funyg abg rng vg; gung vg znl tb jryy jvgu gurr, naq jvgu
gul puvyqera nsgre gurr, jura gubh funyg qb gung juvpu vf evtug va gur
fvtug bs gur YBEQ.

12:26 Bayl gul ubyl guvatf juvpu gubh unfg, naq gul ibjf, gubh funyg
gnxr, naq tb hagb gur cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ funyy pubbfr: 12:27 Naq
gubh funyg bssre gul oheag bssrevatf, gur syrfu naq gur oybbq, hcba
gur nygne bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq: naq gur oybbq bs gul fnpevsvprf funyy
or cbherq bhg hcba gur nygne bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, naq gubh funyg rng
gur syrfu.

12:28 Bofreir naq urne nyy gurfr jbeqf juvpu V pbzznaq gurr, gung vg
znl tb jryy jvgu gurr, naq jvgu gul puvyqera nsgre gurr sbe rire, jura
gubh qbrfg gung juvpu vf tbbq naq evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ gul
Tbq.

12:29 Jura gur YBEQ gul Tbq funyy phg bss gur angvbaf sebz orsber
gurr, juvgure gubh tbrfg gb cbffrff gurz, naq gubh fhpprrqrfg gurz,
naq qjryyrfg va gurve ynaq; 12:30 Gnxr urrq gb gulfrys gung gubh or
abg fanerq ol sbyybjvat gurz, nsgre gung gurl or qrfgeblrq sebz orsber
gurr; naq gung gubh radhver abg nsgre gurve tbqf, fnlvat, Ubj qvq
gurfr angvbaf freir gurve tbqf? rira fb jvyy V qb yvxrjvfr.

12:31 Gubh funyg abg qb fb hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq: sbe rirel
nobzvangvba gb gur YBEQ, juvpu ur ungrgu, unir gurl qbar hagb gurve
tbqf; sbe rira gurve fbaf naq gurve qnhtugref gurl unir oheag va gur
sver gb gurve tbqf.

12:32 Jung guvat fbrire V pbzznaq lbh, bofreir gb qb vg: gubh funyg
abg nqq gurergb, abe qvzvavfu sebz vg.

13:1 Vs gurer nevfr nzbat lbh n cebcurg, be n qernzre bs qernzf, naq
tvirgu gurr n fvta be n jbaqre, 13:2 Naq gur fvta be gur jbaqre pbzr
gb cnff, jurerbs ur fcnxr hagb gurr, fnlvat, Yrg hf tb nsgre bgure
tbqf, juvpu gubh unfg abg xabja, naq yrg hf freir gurz; 13:3 Gubh
funyg abg urnexra hagb gur jbeqf bs gung cebcurg, be gung qernzre bs
qernzf: sbe gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq cebirgu lbh, gb xabj jurgure lr ybir gur
YBEQ lbhe Tbq jvgu nyy lbhe urneg naq jvgu nyy lbhe fbhy.

13:4 Lr funyy jnyx nsgre gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, naq srne uvz, naq xrrc uvf
pbzznaqzragf, naq borl uvf ibvpr, naq lr funyy freir uvz, naq pyrnir
hagb uvz.

13:5 Naq gung cebcurg, be gung qernzre bs qernzf, funyy or chg gb
qrngu; orpnhfr ur ungu fcbxra gb ghea lbh njnl sebz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq,
juvpu oebhtug lbh bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, naq erqrrzrq lbh bhg bs
gur ubhfr bs obaqntr, gb guehfg gurr bhg bs gur jnl juvpu gur YBEQ gul
Tbq pbzznaqrq gurr gb jnyx va. Fb funyg gubh chg gur rivy njnl sebz
gur zvqfg bs gurr.

13:6 Vs gul oebgure, gur fba bs gul zbgure, be gul fba, be gul
qnhtugre, be gur jvsr bs gul obfbz, be gul sevraq, juvpu vf nf guvar
bja fbhy, ragvpr gurr frpergyl, fnlvat, Yrg hf tb naq freir bgure
tbqf, juvpu gubh unfg abg xabja, gubh, abe gul snguref; 13:7 Anzryl,
bs gur tbqf bs gur crbcyr juvpu ner ebhaq nobhg lbh, avtu hagb gurr,
be sne bss sebz gurr, sebz gur bar raq bs gur rnegu rira hagb gur
bgure raq bs gur rnegu; 13:8 Gubh funyg abg pbafrag hagb uvz, abe
urnexra hagb uvz; arvgure funyy guvar rlr cvgl uvz, arvgure funyg gubh
fcner, arvgure funyg gubh pbaprny uvz: 13:9 Ohg gubh funyg fheryl xvyy
uvz; guvar unaq funyy or svefg hcba uvz gb chg uvz gb qrngu, naq
nsgrejneqf gur unaq bs nyy gur crbcyr.

13:10 Naq gubh funyg fgbar uvz jvgu fgbarf, gung ur qvr; orpnhfr ur
ungu fbhtug gb guehfg gurr njnl sebz gur YBEQ gul Tbq, juvpu oebhtug
gurr bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, sebz gur ubhfr bs obaqntr.

13:11 Naq nyy Vfenry funyy urne, naq srne, naq funyy qb ab zber nal
fhpu jvpxrqarff nf guvf vf nzbat lbh.

13:12 Vs gubh funyg urne fnl va bar bs gul pvgvrf, juvpu gur YBEQ gul
Tbq ungu tvira gurr gb qjryy gurer, fnlvat, 13:13 Pregnva zra, gur
puvyqera bs Oryvny, ner tbar bhg sebz nzbat lbh, naq unir jvguqenja
gur vaunovgnagf bs gurve pvgl, fnlvat, Yrg hf tb naq freir bgure tbqf,
juvpu lr unir abg xabja; 13:14 Gura funyg gubh radhver, naq znxr
frnepu, naq nfx qvyvtragyl; naq, orubyq, vs vg or gehgu, naq gur guvat
pregnva, gung fhpu nobzvangvba vf jebhtug nzbat lbh; 13:15 Gubh funyg
fheryl fzvgr gur vaunovgnagf bs gung pvgl jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq,
qrfgeblvat vg hggreyl, naq nyy gung vf gurerva, naq gur pnggyr
gurerbs, jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq.

13:16 Naq gubh funyg tngure nyy gur fcbvy bs vg vagb gur zvqfg bs gur
fgerrg gurerbs, naq funyg ohea jvgu sver gur pvgl, naq nyy gur fcbvy
gurerbs rirel juvg, sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq: naq vg funyy or na urnc sbe
rire; vg funyy abg or ohvyg ntnva.

13:17 Naq gurer funyy pyrnir abhtug bs gur phefrq guvat gb guvar unaq:
gung gur YBEQ znl ghea sebz gur svreprarff bs uvf natre, naq furj gurr
zrepl, naq unir pbzcnffvba hcba gurr, naq zhygvcyl gurr, nf ur ungu
fjbea hagb gul snguref; 13:18 Jura gubh funyg urnexra gb gur ibvpr bs
gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gb xrrc nyy uvf pbzznaqzragf juvpu V pbzznaq gurr
guvf qnl, gb qb gung juvpu vf evtug va gur rlrf bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

14:1 Lr ner gur puvyqera bs gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq: lr funyy abg phg
lbhefryirf, abe znxr nal onyqarff orgjrra lbhe rlrf sbe gur qrnq.

14:2 Sbe gubh neg na ubyl crbcyr hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq, naq gur YBEQ
ungu pubfra gurr gb or n crphyvne crbcyr hagb uvzfrys, nobir nyy gur
angvbaf gung ner hcba gur rnegu.

14:3 Gubh funyg abg rng nal nobzvanoyr guvat.

14:4 Gurfr ner gur ornfgf juvpu lr funyy rng: gur bk, gur furrc, naq
gur tbng, 14:5 Gur uneg, naq gur ebrohpx, naq gur snyybj qrre, naq gur
jvyq tbng, naq gur cltnet, naq gur jvyq bk, naq gur punzbvf.

14:6 Naq rirel ornfg gung cnegrgu gur ubbs, naq pyrnirgu gur pyrsg
vagb gjb pynjf, naq purjrgu gur phq nzbat gur ornfgf, gung lr funyy
rng.

14:7 Arireguryrff gurfr lr funyy abg rng bs gurz gung purj gur phq, be
bs gurz gung qvivqr gur pybira ubbs; nf gur pnzry, naq gur uner, naq
gur pbarl: sbe gurl purj gur phq, ohg qvivqr abg gur ubbs; gurersber
gurl ner hapyrna hagb lbh.

14:8 Naq gur fjvar, orpnhfr vg qvivqrgu gur ubbs, lrg purjrgu abg gur
phq, vg vf hapyrna hagb lbh: lr funyy abg rng bs gurve syrfu, abe
gbhpu gurve qrnq pnepnfr.

14:9 Gurfr lr funyy rng bs nyy gung ner va gur jngref: nyy gung unir
svaf naq fpnyrf funyy lr rng: 14:10 Naq jungfbrire ungu abg svaf naq
fpnyrf lr znl abg rng; vg vf hapyrna hagb lbh.

14:11 Bs nyy pyrna oveqf lr funyy rng.

14:12 Ohg gurfr ner gurl bs juvpu lr funyy abg rng: gur rntyr, naq gur
bffvsentr, naq gur bfcenl, 14:13 Naq gur tyrqr, naq gur xvgr, naq gur
ihygher nsgre uvf xvaq, 14:14 Naq rirel enira nsgre uvf xvaq, 14:15
Naq gur bjy, naq gur avtug unjx, naq gur phpxbj, naq gur unjx nsgre
uvf xvaq, 14:16 Gur yvggyr bjy, naq gur terng bjy, naq gur fjna, 14:17
Naq gur cryvpna, naq gur tvre rntyr, naq gur pbezbenag, 14:18 Naq gur
fgbex, naq gur ureba nsgre ure xvaq, naq gur yncjvat, naq gur ong.

14:19 Naq rirel perrcvat guvat gung syvrgu vf hapyrna hagb lbh: gurl
funyy abg or rngra.

14:20 Ohg bs nyy pyrna sbjyf lr znl rng.

14:21 Lr funyy abg rng bs nalguvat gung qvrgu bs vgfrys: gubh funyg
tvir vg hagb gur fgenatre gung vf va gul tngrf, gung ur znl rng vg; be
gubh znlrfg fryy vg hagb na nyvra: sbe gubh neg na ubyl crbcyr hagb
gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

Gubh funyg abg frrgur n xvq va uvf zbgure'f zvyx.

14:22 Gubh funyg gehyl gvgur nyy gur vapernfr bs gul frrq, gung gur
svryq oevatrgu sbegu lrne ol lrne.

14:23 Naq gubh funyg rng orsber gur YBEQ gul Tbq, va gur cynpr juvpu
ur funyy pubbfr gb cynpr uvf anzr gurer, gur gvgur bs gul pbea, bs gul
jvar, naq bs guvar bvy, naq gur svefgyvatf bs gul ureqf naq bs gul
sybpxf; gung gubh znlrfg yrnea gb srne gur YBEQ gul Tbq nyjnlf.

14:24 Naq vs gur jnl or gbb ybat sbe gurr, fb gung gubh neg abg noyr
gb pneel vg; be vs gur cynpr or gbb sne sebz gurr, juvpu gur YBEQ gul
Tbq funyy pubbfr gb frg uvf anzr gurer, jura gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu
oyrffrq gurr: 14:25 Gura funyg gubh ghea vg vagb zbarl, naq ovaq hc
gur zbarl va guvar unaq, naq funyg tb hagb gur cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ
gul Tbq funyy pubbfr: 14:26 Naq gubh funyg orfgbj gung zbarl sbe
jungfbrire gul fbhy yhfgrgu nsgre, sbe bkra, be sbe furrc, be sbe
jvar, be sbe fgebat qevax, be sbe jungfbrire gul fbhy qrfvergu: naq
gubh funyg rng gurer orsber gur YBEQ gul Tbq, naq gubh funyg erwbvpr,
gubh, naq guvar ubhfrubyq, 14:27 Naq gur Yrivgr gung vf jvguva gul
tngrf; gubh funyg abg sbefnxr uvz; sbe ur ungu ab cneg abe vaurevgnapr
jvgu gurr.

14:28 Ng gur raq bs guerr lrnef gubh funyg oevat sbegu nyy gur gvgur
bs guvar vapernfr gur fnzr lrne, naq funyg ynl vg hc jvguva gul tngrf:
14:29 Naq gur Yrivgr, (orpnhfr ur ungu ab cneg abe vaurevgnapr jvgu
gurr,) naq gur fgenatre, naq gur sngureyrff, naq gur jvqbj, juvpu ner
jvguva gul tngrf, funyy pbzr, naq funyy rng naq or fngvfsvrq; gung gur
YBEQ gul Tbq znl oyrff gurr va nyy gur jbex bs guvar unaq juvpu gubh
qbrfg.

15:1 Ng gur raq bs rirel frira lrnef gubh funyg znxr n eryrnfr.

15:2 Naq guvf vf gur znaare bs gur eryrnfr: Rirel perqvgbe gung
yraqrgu bhtug hagb uvf arvtuobhe funyy eryrnfr vg; ur funyy abg rknpg
vg bs uvf arvtuobhe, be bs uvf oebgure; orpnhfr vg vf pnyyrq gur
YBEQ'f eryrnfr.

15:3 Bs n sbervtare gubh znlrfg rknpg vg ntnva: ohg gung juvpu vf
guvar jvgu gul oebgure guvar unaq funyy eryrnfr; 15:4 Fnir jura gurer
funyy or ab cbbe nzbat lbh; sbe gur YBEQ funyy terngyl oyrff gurr va
gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr sbe na vaurevgnapr gb
cbffrff vg: 15:5 Bayl vs gubh pnershyyl urnexra hagb gur ibvpr bs gur
YBEQ gul Tbq, gb bofreir gb qb nyy gurfr pbzznaqzragf juvpu V pbzznaq
gurr guvf qnl.

15:6 Sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq oyrffrgu gurr, nf ur cebzvfrq gurr: naq gubh
funyg yraq hagb znal angvbaf, ohg gubh funyg abg obeebj; naq gubh
funyg ervta bire znal angvbaf, ohg gurl funyy abg ervta bire gurr.

15:7 Vs gurer or nzbat lbh n cbbe zna bs bar bs gul oerguera jvguva
nal bs gul tngrf va gul ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr, gubh
funyg abg uneqra guvar urneg, abe fuhg guvar unaq sebz gul cbbe
oebgure: 15:8 Ohg gubh funyg bcra guvar unaq jvqr hagb uvz, naq funyg
fheryl yraq uvz fhssvpvrag sbe uvf arrq, va gung juvpu ur jnagrgu.

15:9 Orjner gung gurer or abg n gubhtug va gul jvpxrq urneg, fnlvat,
Gur friragu lrne, gur lrne bs eryrnfr, vf ng unaq; naq guvar rlr or
rivy ntnvafg gul cbbe oebgure, naq gubh tvirfg uvz abhtug; naq ur pel
hagb gur YBEQ ntnvafg gurr, naq vg or fva hagb gurr.

15:10 Gubh funyg fheryl tvir uvz, naq guvar urneg funyy abg or tevrirq
jura gubh tvirfg hagb uvz: orpnhfr gung sbe guvf guvat gur YBEQ gul
Tbq funyy oyrff gurr va nyy gul jbexf, naq va nyy gung gubh chggrfg
guvar unaq hagb.

15:11 Sbe gur cbbe funyy arire prnfr bhg bs gur ynaq: gurersber V
pbzznaq gurr, fnlvat, Gubh funyg bcra guvar unaq jvqr hagb gul
oebgure, gb gul cbbe, naq gb gul arrql, va gul ynaq.

15:12 Naq vs gul oebgure, na Uroerj zna, be na Uroerj jbzna, or fbyq
hagb gurr, naq freir gurr fvk lrnef; gura va gur friragu lrne gubh
funyg yrg uvz tb serr sebz gurr.

15:13 Naq jura gubh fraqrfg uvz bhg serr sebz gurr, gubh funyg abg yrg
uvz tb njnl rzcgl: 15:14 Gubh funyg sheavfu uvz yvorenyyl bhg bs gul
sybpx, naq bhg bs gul sybbe, naq bhg bs gul jvarcerff: bs gung
jurerjvgu gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu oyrffrq gurr gubh funyg tvir hagb uvz.

15:15 Naq gubh funyg erzrzore gung gubh jnfg n obaqzna va gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg, naq gur YBEQ gul Tbq erqrrzrq gurr: gurersber V pbzznaq gurr
guvf guvat gb qnl.

15:16 Naq vg funyy or, vs ur fnl hagb gurr, V jvyy abg tb njnl sebz
gurr; orpnhfr ur ybirgu gurr naq guvar ubhfr, orpnhfr ur vf jryy jvgu
gurr; 15:17 Gura gubh funyg gnxr na nhy, naq guehfg vg guebhtu uvf rne
hagb gur qbbe, naq ur funyy or gul freinag sbe rire. Naq nyfb hagb gul
znvqfreinag gubh funyg qb yvxrjvfr.

15:18 Vg funyy abg frrz uneq hagb gurr, jura gubh fraqrfg uvz njnl
serr sebz gurr; sbe ur ungu orra jbegu n qbhoyr uverq freinag gb gurr,
va freivat gurr fvk lrnef: naq gur YBEQ gul Tbq funyy oyrff gurr va
nyy gung gubh qbrfg.

15:19 Nyy gur svefgyvat znyrf gung pbzr bs gul ureq naq bs gul sybpx
gubh funyg fnapgvsl hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq: gubh funyg qb ab jbex jvgu
gur svefgyvat bs gul ohyybpx, abe furne gur svefgyvat bs gul furrc.

15:20 Gubh funyg rng vg orsber gur YBEQ gul Tbq lrne ol lrne va gur
cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ funyy pubbfr, gubh naq gul ubhfrubyq.

15:21 Naq vs gurer or nal oyrzvfu gurerva, nf vs vg or ynzr, be oyvaq,
be unir nal vyy oyrzvfu, gubh funyg abg fnpevsvpr vg hagb gur YBEQ gul
Tbq.

15:22 Gubh funyg rng vg jvguva gul tngrf: gur hapyrna naq gur pyrna
crefba funyy rng vg nyvxr, nf gur ebrohpx, naq nf gur uneg.

15:23 Bayl gubh funyg abg rng gur oybbq gurerbs; gubh funyg cbhe vg
hcba gur tebhaq nf jngre.

16:1 Bofreir gur zbagu bs Novo, naq xrrc gur cnffbire hagb gur YBEQ
gul Tbq: sbe va gur zbagu bs Novo gur YBEQ gul Tbq oebhtug gurr sbegu
bhg bs Rtlcg ol avtug.

16:2 Gubh funyg gurersber fnpevsvpr gur cnffbire hagb gur YBEQ gul
Tbq, bs gur sybpx naq gur ureq, va gur cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ funyy
pubbfr gb cynpr uvf anzr gurer.

16:3 Gubh funyg rng ab yrnirarq oernq jvgu vg; frira qnlf funyg gubh
rng hayrnirarq oernq gurerjvgu, rira gur oernq bs nssyvpgvba; sbe gubh
pnzrfg sbegu bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg va unfgr: gung gubh znlrfg
erzrzore gur qnl jura gubh pnzrfg sbegu bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg nyy
gur qnlf bs gul yvsr.

16:4 Naq gurer funyy or ab yrnirarq oernq frra jvgu gurr va nyy gul
pbnfg frira qnlf; arvgure funyy gurer nal guvat bs gur syrfu, juvpu
gubh fnpevsvprqfg gur svefg qnl ng rira, erznva nyy avtug hagvy gur
zbeavat.

16:5 Gubh znlrfg abg fnpevsvpr gur cnffbire jvguva nal bs gul tngrf,
juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr: 16:6 Ohg ng gur cynpr juvpu gur
YBEQ gul Tbq funyy pubbfr gb cynpr uvf anzr va, gurer gubh funyg
fnpevsvpr gur cnffbire ng rira, ng gur tbvat qbja bs gur fha, ng gur
frnfba gung gubh pnzrfg sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg.

16:7 Naq gubh funyg ebnfg naq rng vg va gur cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ gul
Tbq funyy pubbfr: naq gubh funyg ghea va gur zbeavat, naq tb hagb gul
gragf.

16:8 Fvk qnlf gubh funyg rng hayrnirarq oernq: naq ba gur friragu qnl
funyy or n fbyrza nffrzoyl gb gur YBEQ gul Tbq: gubh funyg qb ab jbex
gurerva.

16:9 Frira jrrxf funyg gubh ahzore hagb gurr: ortva gb ahzore gur
frira jrrxf sebz fhpu gvzr nf gubh ortvaarfg gb chg gur fvpxyr gb gur
pbea.

16:10 Naq gubh funyg xrrc gur srnfg bs jrrxf hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq
jvgu n gevohgr bs n serrjvyy bssrevat bs guvar unaq, juvpu gubh funyg
tvir hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq, nppbeqvat nf gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu oyrffrq
gurr: 16:11 Naq gubh funyg erwbvpr orsber gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gubh, naq
gul fba, naq gul qnhtugre, naq gul znafreinag, naq gul znvqfreinag,
naq gur Yrivgr gung vf jvguva gul tngrf, naq gur fgenatre, naq gur
sngureyrff, naq gur jvqbj, gung ner nzbat lbh, va gur cynpr juvpu gur
YBEQ gul Tbq ungu pubfra gb cynpr uvf anzr gurer.

16:12 Naq gubh funyg erzrzore gung gubh jnfg n obaqzna va Rtlcg: naq
gubh funyg bofreir naq qb gurfr fgnghgrf.

16:13 Gubh funyg bofreir gur srnfg bs gnoreanpyrf frira qnlf, nsgre
gung gubh unfg tngurerq va gul pbea naq gul jvar: 16:14 Naq gubh funyg
erwbvpr va gul srnfg, gubh, naq gul fba, naq gul qnhtugre, naq gul
znafreinag, naq gul znvqfreinag, naq gur Yrivgr, gur fgenatre, naq gur
sngureyrff, naq gur jvqbj, gung ner jvguva gul tngrf.

16:15 Frira qnlf funyg gubh xrrc n fbyrza srnfg hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq
va gur cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ funyy pubbfr: orpnhfr gur YBEQ gul Tbq
funyy oyrff gurr va nyy guvar vapernfr, naq va nyy gur jbexf bs guvar
unaqf, gurersber gubh funyg fheryl erwbvpr.

16:16 Guerr gvzrf va n lrne funyy nyy gul znyrf nccrne orsber gur YBEQ
gul Tbq va gur cynpr juvpu ur funyy pubbfr; va gur srnfg bs hayrnirarq
oernq, naq va gur srnfg bs jrrxf, naq va gur srnfg bs gnoreanpyrf: naq
gurl funyy abg nccrne orsber gur YBEQ rzcgl: 16:17 Rirel zna funyy
tvir nf ur vf noyr, nppbeqvat gb gur oyrffvat bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq
juvpu ur ungu tvira gurr.

16:18 Whqtrf naq bssvpref funyg gubh znxr gurr va nyy gul tngrf, juvpu
gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr, guebhtubhg gul gevorf: naq gurl funyy
whqtr gur crbcyr jvgu whfg whqtzrag.

16:19 Gubh funyg abg jerfg whqtzrag; gubh funyg abg erfcrpg crefbaf,
arvgure gnxr n tvsg: sbe n tvsg qbgu oyvaq gur rlrf bs gur jvfr, naq
creireg gur jbeqf bs gur evtugrbhf.

16:20 Gung juvpu vf nygbtrgure whfg funyg gubh sbyybj, gung gubh
znlrfg yvir, naq vaurevg gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr.

16:21 Gubh funyg abg cynag gurr n tebir bs nal gerrf arne hagb gur
nygne bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, juvpu gubh funyg znxr gurr.

16:22 Arvgure funyg gubh frg gurr hc nal vzntr; juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq
ungrgu.

17:1 Gubh funyg abg fnpevsvpr hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq nal ohyybpx, be
furrc, jurerva vf oyrzvfu, be nal rivysnibherqarff: sbe gung vf na
nobzvangvba hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

17:2 Vs gurer or sbhaq nzbat lbh, jvguva nal bs gul tngrf juvpu gur
YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr, zna be jbzna, gung ungu jebhtug jvpxrqarff
va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, va genafterffvat uvf pbiranag, 17:3
Naq ungu tbar naq freirq bgure tbqf, naq jbefuvccrq gurz, rvgure gur
fha, be zbba, be nal bs gur ubfg bs urnira, juvpu V unir abg
pbzznaqrq; 17:4 Naq vg or gbyq gurr, naq gubh unfg urneq bs vg, naq
radhverq qvyvtragyl, naq, orubyq, vg or gehr, naq gur guvat pregnva,
gung fhpu nobzvangvba vf jebhtug va Vfenry: 17:5 Gura funyg gubh oevat
sbegu gung zna be gung jbzna, juvpu unir pbzzvggrq gung jvpxrq guvat,
hagb gul tngrf, rira gung zna be gung jbzna, naq funyg fgbar gurz jvgu
fgbarf, gvyy gurl qvr.

17:6 Ng gur zbhgu bs gjb jvgarffrf, be guerr jvgarffrf, funyy ur gung
vf jbegul bs qrngu or chg gb qrngu; ohg ng gur zbhgu bs bar jvgarff ur
funyy abg or chg gb qrngu.

17:7 Gur unaqf bs gur jvgarffrf funyy or svefg hcba uvz gb chg uvz gb
qrngu, naq nsgrejneq gur unaqf bs nyy gur crbcyr. Fb gubh funyg chg
gur rivy njnl sebz nzbat lbh.

17:8 Vs gurer nevfr n znggre gbb uneq sbe gurr va whqtzrag, orgjrra
oybbq naq oybbq, orgjrra cyrn naq cyrn, naq orgjrra fgebxr naq fgebxr,
orvat znggref bs pbagebirefl jvguva gul tngrf: gura funyg gubh nevfr,
naq trg gurr hc vagb gur cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq funyy pubbfr;
17:9 Naq gubh funyg pbzr hagb gur cevrfgf gur Yrivgrf, naq hagb gur
whqtr gung funyy or va gubfr qnlf, naq radhver; naq gurl funyy furj
gurr gur fragrapr bs whqtzrag: 17:10 Naq gubh funyg qb nppbeqvat gb
gur fragrapr, juvpu gurl bs gung cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ funyy pubbfr
funyy furj gurr; naq gubh funyg bofreir gb qb nppbeqvat gb nyy gung
gurl vasbez gurr: 17:11 Nppbeqvat gb gur fragrapr bs gur ynj juvpu
gurl funyy grnpu gurr, naq nppbeqvat gb gur whqtzrag juvpu gurl funyy
gryy gurr, gubh funyg qb: gubh funyg abg qrpyvar sebz gur fragrapr
juvpu gurl funyy furj gurr, gb gur evtug unaq, abe gb gur yrsg.

17:12 Naq gur zna gung jvyy qb cerfhzcghbhfyl, naq jvyy abg urnexra
hagb gur cevrfg gung fgnaqrgu gb zvavfgre gurer orsber gur YBEQ gul
Tbq, be hagb gur whqtr, rira gung zna funyy qvr: naq gubh funyg chg
njnl gur rivy sebz Vfenry.

17:13 Naq nyy gur crbcyr funyy urne, naq srne, naq qb ab zber
cerfhzcghbhfyl.

17:14 Jura gubh neg pbzr hagb gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu
gurr, naq funyg cbffrff vg, naq funyg qjryy gurerva, naq funyg fnl, V
jvyy frg n xvat bire zr, yvxr nf nyy gur angvbaf gung ner nobhg zr;
17:15 Gubh funyg va nal jvfr frg uvz xvat bire gurr, jubz gur YBEQ gul
Tbq funyy pubbfr: bar sebz nzbat gul oerguera funyg gubh frg xvat bire
gurr: gubh znlrfg abg frg n fgenatre bire gurr, juvpu vf abg gul
oebgure.

17:16 Ohg ur funyy abg zhygvcyl ubefrf gb uvzfrys, abe pnhfr gur
crbcyr gb erghea gb Rtlcg, gb gur raq gung ur fubhyq zhygvcyl ubefrf:
sbenfzhpu nf gur YBEQ ungu fnvq hagb lbh, Lr funyy uraprsbegu erghea
ab zber gung jnl.

17:17 Arvgure funyy ur zhygvcyl jvirf gb uvzfrys, gung uvf urneg ghea
abg njnl: arvgure funyy ur terngyl zhygvcyl gb uvzfrys fvyire naq
tbyq.

17:18 Naq vg funyy or, jura ur fvggrgu hcba gur guebar bs uvf xvatqbz,
gung ur funyy jevgr uvz n pbcl bs guvf ynj va n obbx bhg bs gung juvpu
vf orsber gur cevrfgf gur Yrivgrf: 17:19 Naq vg funyy or jvgu uvz, naq
ur funyy ernq gurerva nyy gur qnlf bs uvf yvsr: gung ur znl yrnea gb
srne gur YBEQ uvf Tbq, gb xrrc nyy gur jbeqf bs guvf ynj naq gurfr
fgnghgrf, gb qb gurz: 17:20 Gung uvf urneg or abg yvsgrq hc nobir uvf
oerguera, naq gung ur ghea abg nfvqr sebz gur pbzznaqzrag, gb gur
evtug unaq, be gb gur yrsg: gb gur raq gung ur znl cebybat uvf qnlf va
uvf xvatqbz, ur, naq uvf puvyqera, va gur zvqfg bs Vfenry.

18:1 Gur cevrfgf gur Yrivgrf, naq nyy gur gevor bs Yriv, funyy unir ab
cneg abe vaurevgnapr jvgu Vfenry: gurl funyy rng gur bssrevatf bs gur
YBEQ znqr ol sver, naq uvf vaurevgnapr.

18:2 Gurersber funyy gurl unir ab vaurevgnapr nzbat gurve oerguera:
gur YBEQ vf gurve vaurevgnapr, nf ur ungu fnvq hagb gurz.

18:3 Naq guvf funyy or gur cevrfg'f qhr sebz gur crbcyr, sebz gurz
gung bssre n fnpevsvpr, jurgure vg or bk be furrc; naq gurl funyy tvir
hagb gur cevrfg gur fubhyqre, naq gur gjb purrxf, naq gur znj.

18:4 Gur svefgsehvg nyfb bs gul pbea, bs gul jvar, naq bs guvar bvy,
naq gur svefg bs gur syrrpr bs gul furrc, funyg gubh tvir uvz.

18:5 Sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu pubfra uvz bhg bs nyy gul gevorf, gb
fgnaq gb zvavfgre va gur anzr bs gur YBEQ, uvz naq uvf fbaf sbe rire.

18:6 Naq vs n Yrivgr pbzr sebz nal bs gul tngrf bhg bs nyy Vfenry,
jurer ur fbwbhearq, naq pbzr jvgu nyy gur qrfver bs uvf zvaq hagb gur
cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ funyy pubbfr; 18:7 Gura ur funyy zvavfgre va gur
anzr bs gur YBEQ uvf Tbq, nf nyy uvf oerguera gur Yrivgrf qb, juvpu
fgnaq gurer orsber gur YBEQ.

18:8 Gurl funyy unir yvxr cbegvbaf gb rng, orfvqr gung juvpu pbzrgu bs
gur fnyr bs uvf cngevzbal.

18:9 Jura gubh neg pbzr vagb gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu
gurr, gubh funyg abg yrnea gb qb nsgre gur nobzvangvbaf bs gubfr
angvbaf.

18:10 Gurer funyy abg or sbhaq nzbat lbh nal bar gung znxrgu uvf fba
be uvf qnhtugre gb cnff guebhtu gur sver, be gung hfrgu qvivangvba, be
na bofreire bs gvzrf, be na rapunagre, be n jvgpu.

18:11 Be n punezre, be n pbafhygre jvgu snzvyvne fcvevgf, be n jvmneq,
be n arpebznapre.

18:12 Sbe nyy gung qb gurfr guvatf ner na nobzvangvba hagb gur YBEQ:
naq orpnhfr bs gurfr nobzvangvbaf gur YBEQ gul Tbq qbgu qevir gurz bhg
sebz orsber gurr.

18:13 Gubh funyg or cresrpg jvgu gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

18:14 Sbe gurfr angvbaf, juvpu gubh funyg cbffrff, urnexrarq hagb
bofreiref bs gvzrf, naq hagb qvivaref: ohg nf sbe gurr, gur YBEQ gul
Tbq ungu abg fhssrerq gurr fb gb qb.

18:15 Gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvyy envfr hc hagb gurr n Cebcurg sebz gur
zvqfg bs gurr, bs gul oerguera, yvxr hagb zr; hagb uvz lr funyy
urnexra; 18:16 Nppbeqvat gb nyy gung gubh qrfverqfg bs gur YBEQ gul
Tbq va Ubero va gur qnl bs gur nffrzoyl, fnlvat, Yrg zr abg urne ntnva
gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ zl Tbq, arvgure yrg zr frr guvf terng sver nal
zber, gung V qvr abg.

18:17 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb zr, Gurl unir jryy fcbxra gung juvpu gurl
unir fcbxra.

18:18 V jvyy envfr gurz hc n Cebcurg sebz nzbat gurve oerguera, yvxr
hagb gurr, naq jvyy chg zl jbeqf va uvf zbhgu; naq ur funyy fcrnx hagb
gurz nyy gung V funyy pbzznaq uvz.

18:19 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung jubfbrire jvyy abg urnexra hagb
zl jbeqf juvpu ur funyy fcrnx va zl anzr, V jvyy erdhver vg bs uvz.

18:20 Ohg gur cebcurg, juvpu funyy cerfhzr gb fcrnx n jbeq va zl anzr,
juvpu V unir abg pbzznaqrq uvz gb fcrnx, be gung funyy fcrnx va gur
anzr bs bgure tbqf, rira gung cebcurg funyy qvr.

18:21 Naq vs gubh fnl va guvar urneg, Ubj funyy jr xabj gur jbeq juvpu
gur YBEQ ungu abg fcbxra?  18:22 Jura n cebcurg fcrnxrgu va gur anzr
bs gur YBEQ, vs gur guvat sbyybj abg, abe pbzr gb cnff, gung vf gur
guvat juvpu gur YBEQ ungu abg fcbxra, ohg gur cebcurg ungu fcbxra vg
cerfhzcghbhfyl: gubh funyg abg or nsenvq bs uvz.

19:1 Jura gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu phg bss gur angvbaf, jubfr ynaq gur
YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr, naq gubh fhpprrqrfg gurz, naq qjryyrfg va
gurve pvgvrf, naq va gurve ubhfrf; 19:2 Gubh funyg frcnengr guerr
pvgvrf sbe gurr va gur zvqfg bs gul ynaq, juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq
tvirgu gurr gb cbffrff vg.

19:3 Gubh funyg cercner gurr n jnl, naq qvivqr gur pbnfgf bs gul ynaq,
juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr gb vaurevg, vagb guerr cnegf, gung
rirel fynlre znl syrr guvgure.

19:4 Naq guvf vf gur pnfr bs gur fynlre, juvpu funyy syrr guvgure,
gung ur znl yvir: Jubfb xvyyrgu uvf arvtuobhe vtabenagyl, jubz ur
ungrq abg va gvzr cnfg; 19:5 Nf jura n zna tbrgu vagb gur jbbq jvgu
uvf arvtuobhe gb urj jbbq, naq uvf unaq srgpurgu n fgebxr jvgu gur nkr
gb phg qbja gur gerr, naq gur urnq fyvccrgu sebz gur uryir, naq
yvtugrgu hcba uvf arvtuobhe, gung ur qvr; ur funyy syrr hagb bar bs
gubfr pvgvrf, naq yvir: 19:6 Yrfg gur niratre bs gur oybbq chefhr gur
fynlre, juvyr uvf urneg vf ubg, naq biregnxr uvz, orpnhfr gur jnl vf
