ybat, naq fynl uvz; jurernf ur jnf abg jbegul bs qrngu, vanfzhpu nf ur
ungrq uvz abg va gvzr cnfg.

19:7 Jurersber V pbzznaq gurr, fnlvat, Gubh funyg frcnengr guerr
pvgvrf sbe gurr.

19:8 Naq vs gur YBEQ gul Tbq raynetr gul pbnfg, nf ur ungu fjbea hagb
gul snguref, naq tvir gurr nyy gur ynaq juvpu ur cebzvfrq gb tvir hagb
gul snguref; 19:9 Vs gubh funyg xrrc nyy gurfr pbzznaqzragf gb qb
gurz, juvpu V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl, gb ybir gur YBEQ gul Tbq, naq gb
jnyx rire va uvf jnlf; gura funyg gubh nqq guerr pvgvrf zber sbe gurr,
orfvqr gurfr guerr: 19:10 Gung vaabprag oybbq or abg furq va gul ynaq,
juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr sbe na vaurevgnapr, naq fb oybbq or
hcba gurr.

19:11 Ohg vs nal zna ungr uvf arvtuobhe, naq yvr va jnvg sbe uvz, naq
evfr hc ntnvafg uvz, naq fzvgr uvz zbegnyyl gung ur qvr, naq syrrgu
vagb bar bs gurfr pvgvrf: 19:12 Gura gur ryqref bs uvf pvgl funyy fraq
naq srgpu uvz gurapr, naq qryvire uvz vagb gur unaq bs gur niratre bs
oybbq, gung ur znl qvr.

19:13 Guvar rlr funyy abg cvgl uvz, ohg gubh funyg chg njnl gur thvyg
bs vaabprag oybbq sebz Vfenry, gung vg znl tb jryy jvgu gurr.

19:14 Gubh funyg abg erzbir gul arvtuobhe'f ynaqznex, juvpu gurl bs
byq gvzr unir frg va guvar vaurevgnapr, juvpu gubh funyg vaurevg va
gur ynaq gung gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr gb cbffrff vg.

19:15 Bar jvgarff funyy abg evfr hc ntnvafg n zna sbe nal vavdhvgl, be
sbe nal fva, va nal fva gung ur fvaargu: ng gur zbhgu bs gjb
jvgarffrf, be ng gur zbhgu bs guerr jvgarffrf, funyy gur znggre or
rfgnoyvfurq.

19:16 Vs n snyfr jvgarff evfr hc ntnvafg nal zna gb grfgvsl ntnvafg
uvz gung juvpu vf jebat; 19:17 Gura obgu gur zra, orgjrra jubz gur
pbagebirefl vf, funyy fgnaq orsber gur YBEQ, orsber gur cevrfgf naq
gur whqtrf, juvpu funyy or va gubfr qnlf; 19:18 Naq gur whqtrf funyy
znxr qvyvtrag vadhvfvgvba: naq, orubyq, vs gur jvgarff or n snyfr
jvgarff, naq ungu grfgvsvrq snyfryl ntnvafg uvf oebgure; 19:19 Gura
funyy lr qb hagb uvz, nf ur unq gubhtug gb unir qbar hagb uvf oebgure:
fb funyg gubh chg gur rivy njnl sebz nzbat lbh.

19:20 Naq gubfr juvpu erznva funyy urne, naq srne, naq funyy
uraprsbegu pbzzvg ab zber nal fhpu rivy nzbat lbh.

19:21 Naq guvar rlr funyy abg cvgl; ohg yvsr funyy tb sbe yvsr, rlr
sbe rlr, gbbgu sbe gbbgu, unaq sbe unaq, sbbg sbe sbbg.

20:1 Jura gubh tbrfg bhg gb onggyr ntnvafg guvar rarzvrf, naq frrfg
ubefrf, naq punevbgf, naq n crbcyr zber guna gubh, or abg nsenvq bs
gurz: sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq vf jvgu gurr, juvpu oebhtug gurr hc bhg bs
gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

20:2 Naq vg funyy or, jura lr ner pbzr avtu hagb gur onggyr, gung gur
cevrfg funyy nccebnpu naq fcrnx hagb gur crbcyr, 20:3 Naq funyy fnl
hagb gurz, Urne, B Vfenry, lr nccebnpu guvf qnl hagb onggyr ntnvafg
lbhe rarzvrf: yrg abg lbhe urnegf snvag, srne abg, naq qb abg gerzoyr,
arvgure or lr greevsvrq orpnhfr bs gurz; 20:4 Sbe gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq vf
ur gung tbrgu jvgu lbh, gb svtug sbe lbh ntnvafg lbhe rarzvrf, gb fnir
lbh.

20:5 Naq gur bssvpref funyy fcrnx hagb gur crbcyr, fnlvat, Jung zna vf
gurer gung ungu ohvyg n arj ubhfr, naq ungu abg qrqvpngrq vg? yrg uvz
tb naq erghea gb uvf ubhfr, yrfg ur qvr va gur onggyr, naq nabgure zna
qrqvpngr vg.

20:6 Naq jung zna vf ur gung ungu cynagrq n ivarlneq, naq ungu abg lrg
rngra bs vg? yrg uvz nyfb tb naq erghea hagb uvf ubhfr, yrfg ur qvr va
gur onggyr, naq nabgure zna rng bs vg.

20:7 Naq jung zna vf gurer gung ungu orgebgurq n jvsr, naq ungu abg
gnxra ure? yrg uvz tb naq erghea hagb uvf ubhfr, yrfg ur qvr va gur
onggyr, naq nabgure zna gnxr ure.

20:8 Naq gur bssvpref funyy fcrnx shegure hagb gur crbcyr, naq gurl
funyy fnl, Jung zna vf gurer gung vf srneshy naq snvagurnegrq? yrg uvz
tb naq erghea hagb uvf ubhfr, yrfg uvf oerguera'f urneg snvag nf jryy
nf uvf urneg.

20:9 Naq vg funyy or, jura gur bssvpref unir znqr na raq bs fcrnxvat
hagb gur crbcyr gung gurl funyy znxr pncgnvaf bs gur nezvrf gb yrnq
gur crbcyr.

20:10 Jura gubh pbzrfg avtu hagb n pvgl gb svtug ntnvafg vg, gura
cebpynvz crnpr hagb vg.

20:11 Naq vg funyy or, vs vg znxr gurr nafjre bs crnpr, naq bcra hagb
gurr, gura vg funyy or, gung nyy gur crbcyr gung vf sbhaq gurerva
funyy or gevohgnevrf hagb gurr, naq gurl funyy freir gurr.

20:12 Naq vs vg jvyy znxr ab crnpr jvgu gurr, ohg jvyy znxr jne
ntnvafg gurr, gura gubh funyg orfvrtr vg: 20:13 Naq jura gur YBEQ gul
Tbq ungu qryvirerq vg vagb guvar unaqf, gubh funyg fzvgr rirel znyr
gurerbs jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq: 20:14 Ohg gur jbzra, naq gur
yvggyr barf, naq gur pnggyr, naq nyy gung vf va gur pvgl, rira nyy gur
fcbvy gurerbs, funyg gubh gnxr hagb gulfrys; naq gubh funyg rng gur
fcbvy bs guvar rarzvrf, juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu tvira gurr.

20:15 Guhf funyg gubh qb hagb nyy gur pvgvrf juvpu ner irel sne bss
sebz gurr, juvpu ner abg bs gur pvgvrf bs gurfr angvbaf.

20:16 Ohg bs gur pvgvrf bs gurfr crbcyr, juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq qbgu
tvir gurr sbe na vaurevgnapr, gubh funyg fnir nyvir abguvat gung
oerngurgu: 20:17 Ohg gubh funyg hggreyl qrfgebl gurz; anzryl, gur
Uvggvgrf, naq gur Nzbevgrf, gur Pnannavgrf, naq gur Crevmmvgrf, gur
Uvivgrf, naq gur Wrohfvgrf; nf gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu pbzznaqrq gurr:
20:18 Gung gurl grnpu lbh abg gb qb nsgre nyy gurve nobzvangvbaf,
juvpu gurl unir qbar hagb gurve tbqf; fb fubhyq lr fva ntnvafg gur
YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

20:19 Jura gubh funyg orfvrtr n pvgl n ybat gvzr, va znxvat jne
ntnvafg vg gb gnxr vg, gubh funyg abg qrfgebl gur gerrf gurerbs ol
sbepvat na nkr ntnvafg gurz: sbe gubh znlrfg rng bs gurz, naq gubh
funyg abg phg gurz qbja (sbe gur gerr bs gur svryq vf zna'f yvsr) gb
rzcybl gurz va gur fvrtr: 20:20 Bayl gur gerrf juvpu gubh xabjrfg gung
gurl or abg gerrf sbe zrng, gubh funyg qrfgebl naq phg gurz qbja; naq
gubh funyg ohvyq ohyjnexf ntnvafg gur pvgl gung znxrgu jne jvgu gurr,
hagvy vg or fhoqhrq.

21:1 Vs bar or sbhaq fynva va gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu
gurr gb cbffrff vg, ylvat va gur svryq, naq vg or abg xabja jub ungu
fynva uvz: 21:2 Gura gul ryqref naq gul whqtrf funyy pbzr sbegu, naq
gurl funyy zrnfher hagb gur pvgvrf juvpu ner ebhaq nobhg uvz gung vf
fynva: 21:3 Naq vg funyy or, gung gur pvgl juvpu vf arkg hagb gur
fynva zna, rira gur ryqref bs gung pvgl funyy gnxr na urvsre, juvpu
ungu abg orra jebhtug jvgu, naq juvpu ungu abg qenja va gur lbxr; 21:4
Naq gur ryqref bs gung pvgl funyy oevat qbja gur urvsre hagb n ebhtu
inyyrl, juvpu vf arvgure rnerq abe fbja, naq funyy fgevxr bss gur
urvsre'f arpx gurer va gur inyyrl: 21:5 Naq gur cevrfgf gur fbaf bs
Yriv funyy pbzr arne; sbe gurz gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu pubfra gb
zvavfgre hagb uvz, naq gb oyrff va gur anzr bs gur YBEQ; naq ol gurve
jbeq funyy rirel pbagebirefl naq rirel fgebxr or gevrq: 21:6 Naq nyy
gur ryqref bs gung pvgl, gung ner arkg hagb gur fynva zna, funyy jnfu
gurve unaqf bire gur urvsre gung vf orurnqrq va gur inyyrl: 21:7 Naq
gurl funyy nafjre naq fnl, Bhe unaqf unir abg furq guvf oybbq, arvgure
unir bhe rlrf frra vg.

21:8 Or zrepvshy, B YBEQ, hagb gul crbcyr Vfenry, jubz gubh unfg
erqrrzrq, naq ynl abg vaabprag oybbq hagb gul crbcyr bs Vfenry'f
punetr. Naq gur oybbq funyy or sbetvira gurz.

21:9 Fb funyg gubh chg njnl gur thvyg bs vaabprag oybbq sebz nzbat
lbh, jura gubh funyg qb gung juvpu vf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ.

21:10 Jura gubh tbrfg sbegu gb jne ntnvafg guvar rarzvrf, naq gur YBEQ
gul Tbq ungu qryvirerq gurz vagb guvar unaqf, naq gubh unfg gnxra gurz
pncgvir, 21:11 Naq frrfg nzbat gur pncgvirf n ornhgvshy jbzna, naq
unfg n qrfver hagb ure, gung gubh jbhyqrfg unir ure gb gul jvsr; 21:12
Gura gubh funyg oevat ure ubzr gb guvar ubhfr, naq fur funyy funir ure
urnq, naq cner ure anvyf; 21:13 Naq fur funyy chg gur envzrag bs ure
pncgvivgl sebz bss ure, naq funyy erznva va guvar ubhfr, naq orjnvy
ure sngure naq ure zbgure n shyy zbagu: naq nsgre gung gubh funyg tb
va hagb ure, naq or ure uhfonaq, naq fur funyy or gul jvsr.

21:14 Naq vg funyy or, vs gubh unir ab qryvtug va ure, gura gubh funyg
yrg ure tb juvgure fur jvyy; ohg gubh funyg abg fryy ure ng nyy sbe
zbarl, gubh funyg abg znxr zrepunaqvfr bs ure, orpnhfr gubh unfg
uhzoyrq ure.

21:15 Vs n zna unir gjb jvirf, bar orybirq, naq nabgure ungrq, naq
gurl unir obea uvz puvyqera, obgu gur orybirq naq gur ungrq; naq vs
gur svefgobea fba or uref gung jnf ungrq: 21:16 Gura vg funyy or, jura
ur znxrgu uvf fbaf gb vaurevg gung juvpu ur ungu, gung ur znl abg znxr
gur fba bs gur orybirq svefgobea orsber gur fba bs gur ungrq, juvpu vf
vaqrrq gur svefgobea: 21:17 Ohg ur funyy npxabjyrqtr gur fba bs gur
ungrq sbe gur svefgobea, ol tvivat uvz n qbhoyr cbegvba bs nyy gung ur
ungu: sbe ur vf gur ortvaavat bs uvf fgeratgu; gur evtug bs gur
svefgobea vf uvf.

21:18 Vs n zna unir n fghoobea naq eroryyvbhf fba, juvpu jvyy abg borl
gur ibvpr bs uvf sngure, be gur ibvpr bs uvf zbgure, naq gung, jura
gurl unir punfgrarq uvz, jvyy abg urnexra hagb gurz: 21:19 Gura funyy
uvf sngure naq uvf zbgure ynl ubyq ba uvz, naq oevat uvz bhg hagb gur
ryqref bs uvf pvgl, naq hagb gur tngr bs uvf cynpr; 21:20 Naq gurl
funyy fnl hagb gur ryqref bs uvf pvgl, Guvf bhe fba vf fghoobea naq
eroryyvbhf, ur jvyy abg borl bhe ibvpr; ur vf n tyhggba, naq n
qehaxneq.

21:21 Naq nyy gur zra bs uvf pvgl funyy fgbar uvz jvgu fgbarf, gung ur
qvr: fb funyg gubh chg rivy njnl sebz nzbat lbh; naq nyy Vfenry funyy
urne, naq srne.

21:22 Naq vs n zna unir pbzzvggrq n fva jbegul bs qrngu, naq ur or gb
or chg gb qrngu, naq gubh unat uvz ba n gerr: 21:23 Uvf obql funyy abg
erznva nyy avtug hcba gur gerr, ohg gubh funyg va nal jvfr ohel uvz
gung qnl; (sbe ur gung vf unatrq vf npphefrq bs Tbq;) gung gul ynaq or
abg qrsvyrq, juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr sbe na vaurevgnapr.

22:1 Gubh funyg abg frr gul oebgure'f bk be uvf furrc tb nfgenl, naq
uvqr gulfrys sebz gurz: gubh funyg va nal pnfr oevat gurz ntnva hagb
gul oebgure.

22:2 Naq vs gul oebgure or abg avtu hagb gurr, be vs gubh xabj uvz
abg, gura gubh funyg oevat vg hagb guvar bja ubhfr, naq vg funyy or
jvgu gurr hagvy gul oebgure frrx nsgre vg, naq gubh funyg erfgber vg
gb uvz ntnva.

22:3 Va yvxr znaare funyg gubh qb jvgu uvf nff; naq fb funyg gubh qb
jvgu uvf envzrag; naq jvgu nyy ybfg guvat bs gul oebgure'f, juvpu ur
ungu ybfg, naq gubh unfg sbhaq, funyg gubh qb yvxrjvfr: gubh znlrfg
abg uvqr gulfrys.

22:4 Gubh funyg abg frr gul oebgure'f nff be uvf bk snyy qbja ol gur
jnl, naq uvqr gulfrys sebz gurz: gubh funyg fheryl uryc uvz gb yvsg
gurz hc ntnva.

22:5 Gur jbzna funyy abg jrne gung juvpu cregnvargu hagb n zna,
arvgure funyy n zna chg ba n jbzna'f tnezrag: sbe nyy gung qb fb ner
nobzvangvba hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

22:6 Vs n oveq'f arfg punapr gb or orsber gurr va gur jnl va nal gerr,
be ba gur tebhaq, jurgure gurl or lbhat barf, be rttf, naq gur qnz
fvggvat hcba gur lbhat, be hcba gur rttf, gubh funyg abg gnxr gur qnz
jvgu gur lbhat: 22:7 Ohg gubh funyg va nal jvfr yrg gur qnz tb, naq
gnxr gur lbhat gb gurr; gung vg znl or jryy jvgu gurr, naq gung gubh
znlrfg cebybat gul qnlf.

22:8 Jura gubh ohvyqrfg n arj ubhfr, gura gubh funyg znxr n onggyrzrag
sbe gul ebbs, gung gubh oevat abg oybbq hcba guvar ubhfr, vs nal zna
snyy sebz gurapr.

22:9 Gubh funyg abg fbj gul ivarlneq jvgu qviref frrqf: yrfg gur sehvg
bs gul frrq juvpu gubh unfg fbja, naq gur sehvg bs gul ivarlneq, or
qrsvyrq.

22:10 Gubh funyg abg cybj jvgu na bk naq na nff gbtrgure.

22:11 Gubh funyg abg jrne n tnezrag bs qviref fbegf, nf bs jbbyyra naq
yvara gbtrgure.

22:12 Gubh funyg znxr gurr sevatrf hcba gur sbhe dhnegref bs gul
irfgher, jurerjvgu gubh pbirerfg gulfrys.

22:13 Vs nal zna gnxr n jvsr, naq tb va hagb ure, naq ungr ure, 22:14
Naq tvir bppnfvbaf bs fcrrpu ntnvafg ure, naq oevat hc na rivy anzr
hcba ure, naq fnl, V gbbx guvf jbzna, naq jura V pnzr gb ure, V sbhaq
ure abg n znvq: 22:15 Gura funyy gur sngure bs gur qnzfry, naq ure
zbgure, gnxr naq oevat sbegu gur gbxraf bs gur qnzfry'f ivetvavgl hagb
gur ryqref bs gur pvgl va gur tngr: 22:16 Naq gur qnzfry'f sngure
funyy fnl hagb gur ryqref, V tnir zl qnhtugre hagb guvf zna gb jvsr,
naq ur ungrgu ure; 22:17 Naq, yb, ur ungu tvira bppnfvbaf bs fcrrpu
ntnvafg ure, fnlvat, V sbhaq abg gul qnhtugre n znvq; naq lrg gurfr
ner gur gbxraf bs zl qnhtugre'f ivetvavgl. Naq gurl funyy fcernq gur
pybgu orsber gur ryqref bs gur pvgl.

22:18 Naq gur ryqref bs gung pvgl funyy gnxr gung zna naq punfgvfr
uvz; 22:19 Naq gurl funyy nzrepr uvz va na uhaqerq furxryf bs fvyire,
naq tvir gurz hagb gur sngure bs gur qnzfry, orpnhfr ur ungu oebhtug
hc na rivy anzr hcba n ivetva bs Vfenry: naq fur funyy or uvf jvsr; ur
znl abg chg ure njnl nyy uvf qnlf.

22:20 Ohg vs guvf guvat or gehr, naq gur gbxraf bs ivetvavgl or abg
sbhaq sbe gur qnzfry: 22:21 Gura gurl funyy oevat bhg gur qnzfry gb
gur qbbe bs ure sngure'f ubhfr, naq gur zra bs ure pvgl funyy fgbar
ure jvgu fgbarf gung fur qvr: orpnhfr fur ungu jebhtug sbyyl va
Vfenry, gb cynl gur juber va ure sngure'f ubhfr: fb funyg gubh chg
rivy njnl sebz nzbat lbh.

22:22 Vs n zna or sbhaq ylvat jvgu n jbzna zneevrq gb na uhfonaq, gura
gurl funyy obgu bs gurz qvr, obgu gur zna gung ynl jvgu gur jbzna, naq
gur jbzna: fb funyg gubh chg njnl rivy sebz Vfenry.

22:23 Vs n qnzfry gung vf n ivetva or orgebgurq hagb na uhfonaq, naq n
zna svaq ure va gur pvgl, naq yvr jvgu ure; 22:24 Gura lr funyy oevat
gurz obgu bhg hagb gur tngr bs gung pvgl, naq lr funyy fgbar gurz jvgu
fgbarf gung gurl qvr; gur qnzfry, orpnhfr fur pevrq abg, orvat va gur
pvgl; naq gur zna, orpnhfr ur ungu uhzoyrq uvf arvtuobhe'f jvsr: fb
gubh funyg chg njnl rivy sebz nzbat lbh.

22:25 Ohg vs n zna svaq n orgebgurq qnzfry va gur svryq, naq gur zna
sbepr ure, naq yvr jvgu ure: gura gur zna bayl gung ynl jvgu ure funyy
qvr.

22:26 Ohg hagb gur qnzfry gubh funyg qb abguvat; gurer vf va gur
qnzfry ab fva jbegul bs qrngu: sbe nf jura n zna evfrgu ntnvafg uvf
arvtuobhe, naq fynlrgu uvz, rira fb vf guvf znggre: 22:27 Sbe ur sbhaq
ure va gur svryq, naq gur orgebgurq qnzfry pevrq, naq gurer jnf abar
gb fnir ure.

22:28 Vs n zna svaq n qnzfry gung vf n ivetva, juvpu vf abg orgebgurq,
naq ynl ubyq ba ure, naq yvr jvgu ure, naq gurl or sbhaq; 22:29 Gura
gur zna gung ynl jvgu ure funyy tvir hagb gur qnzfry'f sngure svsgl
furxryf bs fvyire, naq fur funyy or uvf jvsr; orpnhfr ur ungu uhzoyrq
ure, ur znl abg chg ure njnl nyy uvf qnlf.

22:30 N zna funyy abg gnxr uvf sngure'f jvsr, abe qvfpbire uvf
sngure'f fxveg.

23:1 Ur gung vf jbhaqrq va gur fgbarf, be ungu uvf cevil zrzore phg
bss, funyy abg ragre vagb gur pbatertngvba bs gur YBEQ.

23:2 N onfgneq funyy abg ragre vagb gur pbatertngvba bs gur YBEQ; rira
gb uvf gragu trarengvba funyy ur abg ragre vagb gur pbatertngvba bs
gur YBEQ.

23:3 Na Nzzbavgr be Zbnovgr funyy abg ragre vagb gur pbatertngvba bs
gur YBEQ; rira gb gurve gragu trarengvba funyy gurl abg ragre vagb gur
pbatertngvba bs gur YBEQ sbe rire: 23:4 Orpnhfr gurl zrg lbh abg jvgu
oernq naq jvgu jngre va gur jnl, jura lr pnzr sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg; naq
orpnhfr gurl uverq ntnvafg gurr Onynnz gur fba bs Orbe bs Crgube bs
Zrfbcbgnzvn, gb phefr gurr.

23:5 Arireguryrff gur YBEQ gul Tbq jbhyq abg urnexra hagb Onynnz; ohg
gur YBEQ gul Tbq ghearq gur phefr vagb n oyrffvat hagb gurr, orpnhfr
gur YBEQ gul Tbq ybirq gurr.

23:6 Gubh funyg abg frrx gurve crnpr abe gurve cebfcrevgl nyy gul qnlf
sbe rire.

23:7 Gubh funyg abg noube na Rqbzvgr; sbe ur vf gul oebgure: gubh
funyg abg noube na Rtlcgvna; orpnhfr gubh jnfg n fgenatre va uvf ynaq.

23:8 Gur puvyqera gung ner ortbggra bs gurz funyy ragre vagb gur
pbatertngvba bs gur YBEQ va gurve guveq trarengvba.

23:9 Jura gur ubfg tbrgu sbegu ntnvafg guvar rarzvrf, gura xrrc gurr
sebz rirel jvpxrq guvat.

23:10 Vs gurer or nzbat lbh nal zna, gung vf abg pyrna ol ernfba bs
hapyrnaarff gung punaprgu uvz ol avtug, gura funyy ur tb noebnq bhg bs
gur pnzc, ur funyy abg pbzr jvguva gur pnzc: 23:11 Ohg vg funyy or,
jura riravat pbzrgu ba, ur funyy jnfu uvzfrys jvgu jngre: naq jura gur
fha vf qbja, ur funyy pbzr vagb gur pnzc ntnva.

23:12 Gubh funyg unir n cynpr nyfb jvgubhg gur pnzc, juvgure gubh
funyg tb sbegu noebnq: 23:13 Naq gubh funyg unir n cnqqyr hcba gul
jrncba; naq vg funyy or, jura gubh jvyg rnfr gulfrys noebnq, gubh
funyg qvt gurerjvgu, naq funyg ghea onpx naq pbire gung juvpu pbzrgu
sebz gurr: 23:14 Sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq jnyxrgu va gur zvqfg bs gul
pnzc, gb qryvire gurr, naq gb tvir hc guvar rarzvrf orsber gurr;
gurersber funyy gul pnzc or ubyl: gung ur frr ab hapyrna guvat va
gurr, naq ghea njnl sebz gurr.

23:15 Gubh funyg abg qryvire hagb uvf znfgre gur freinag juvpu vf
rfpncrq sebz uvf znfgre hagb gurr: 23:16 Ur funyy qjryy jvgu gurr,
rira nzbat lbh, va gung cynpr juvpu ur funyy pubbfr va bar bs gul
tngrf, jurer vg yvxrgu uvz orfg: gubh funyg abg bccerff uvz.

23:17 Gurer funyy or ab juber bs gur qnhtugref bs Vfenry, abe n
fbqbzvgr bs gur fbaf bs Vfenry.

23:18 Gubh funyg abg oevat gur uver bs n juber, be gur cevpr bs n qbt,
vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq sbe nal ibj: sbe rira obgu gurfr
ner nobzvangvba hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

23:19 Gubh funyg abg yraq hcba hfhel gb gul oebgure; hfhel bs zbarl,
hfhel bs ivpghnyf, hfhel bs nal guvat gung vf yrag hcba hfhel: 23:20
Hagb n fgenatre gubh znlrfg yraq hcba hfhel; ohg hagb gul oebgure gubh
funyg abg yraq hcba hfhel: gung gur YBEQ gul Tbq znl oyrff gurr va nyy
gung gubh frggrfg guvar unaq gb va gur ynaq juvgure gubh tbrfg gb
cbffrff vg.

23:21 Jura gubh funyg ibj n ibj hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gubh funyg abg
fynpx gb cnl vg: sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvyy fheryl erdhver vg bs gurr;
naq vg jbhyq or fva va gurr.

23:22 Ohg vs gubh funyg sbeorne gb ibj, vg funyy or ab fva va gurr.

23:23 Gung juvpu vf tbar bhg bs gul yvcf gubh funyg xrrc naq cresbez;
rira n serrjvyy bssrevat, nppbeqvat nf gubh unfg ibjrq hagb gur YBEQ
gul Tbq, juvpu gubh unfg cebzvfrq jvgu gul zbhgu.

23:24 Jura gubh pbzrfg vagb gul arvtuobhe'f ivarlneq, gura gubh znlrfg
rng tencrf gul svyy ng guvar bja cyrnfher; ohg gubh funyg abg chg nal
va gul irffry.

23:25 Jura gubh pbzrfg vagb gur fgnaqvat pbea bs gul arvtuobhe, gura
gubh znlrfg cyhpx gur rnef jvgu guvar unaq; ohg gubh funyg abg zbir n
fvpxyr hagb gul arvtuobhe'f fgnaqvat pbea.

24:1 Jura n zna ungu gnxra n jvsr, naq zneevrq ure, naq vg pbzr gb
cnff gung fur svaq ab snibhe va uvf rlrf, orpnhfr ur ungu sbhaq fbzr
hapyrnaarff va ure: gura yrg uvz jevgr ure n ovyy bs qvibeprzrag, naq
tvir vg va ure unaq, naq fraq ure bhg bs uvf ubhfr.

24:2 Naq jura fur vf qrcnegrq bhg bs uvf ubhfr, fur znl tb naq or
nabgure zna'f jvsr.

24:3 Naq vs gur ynggre uhfonaq ungr ure, naq jevgr ure n ovyy bs
qvibeprzrag, naq tvirgu vg va ure unaq, naq fraqrgu ure bhg bs uvf
ubhfr; be vs gur ynggre uhfonaq qvr, juvpu gbbx ure gb or uvf jvsr;
24:4 Ure sbezre uhfonaq, juvpu frag ure njnl, znl abg gnxr ure ntnva
gb or uvf jvsr, nsgre gung fur vf qrsvyrq; sbe gung vf nobzvangvba
orsber gur YBEQ: naq gubh funyg abg pnhfr gur ynaq gb fva, juvpu gur
YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr sbe na vaurevgnapr.

24:5 Jura n zna ungu gnxra n arj jvsr, ur funyy abg tb bhg gb jne,
arvgure funyy ur or punetrq jvgu nal ohfvarff: ohg ur funyy or serr ng
ubzr bar lrne, naq funyy purre hc uvf jvsr juvpu ur ungu gnxra.

24:6 Ab zna funyy gnxr gur argure be gur hccre zvyyfgbar gb cyrqtr:
sbe ur gnxrgu n zna'f yvsr gb cyrqtr.

24:7 Vs n zna or sbhaq fgrnyvat nal bs uvf oerguera bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, naq znxrgu zrepunaqvfr bs uvz, be fryyrgu uvz; gura gung guvrs
funyy qvr; naq gubh funyg chg rivy njnl sebz nzbat lbh.

24:8 Gnxr urrq va gur cynthr bs yrcebfl, gung gubh bofreir qvyvtragyl,
naq qb nppbeqvat gb nyy gung gur cevrfgf gur Yrivgrf funyy grnpu lbh:
nf V pbzznaqrq gurz, fb lr funyy bofreir gb qb.

24:9 Erzrzore jung gur YBEQ gul Tbq qvq hagb Zvevnz ol gur jnl, nsgre
gung lr jrer pbzr sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg.

24:10 Jura gubh qbfg yraq gul oebgure nal guvat, gubh funyg abg tb
vagb uvf ubhfr gb srgpu uvf cyrqtr.

24:11 Gubh funyg fgnaq noebnq, naq gur zna gb jubz gubh qbfg yraq
funyy oevat bhg gur cyrqtr noebnq hagb gurr.

24:12 Naq vs gur zna or cbbe, gubh funyg abg fyrrc jvgu uvf cyrqtr:
24:13 Va nal pnfr gubh funyg qryvire uvz gur cyrqtr ntnva jura gur fha
tbrgu qbja, gung ur znl fyrrc va uvf bja envzrag, naq oyrff gurr: naq
vg funyy or evtugrbhfarff hagb gurr orsber gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

24:14 Gubh funyg abg bccerff na uverq freinag gung vf cbbe naq arrql,
jurgure ur or bs gul oerguera, be bs gul fgenatref gung ner va gul
ynaq jvguva gul tngrf: 24:15 Ng uvf qnl gubh funyg tvir uvz uvf uver,
arvgure funyy gur fha tb qbja hcba vg; sbe ur vf cbbe, naq frggrgu uvf
urneg hcba vg: yrfg ur pel ntnvafg gurr hagb gur YBEQ, naq vg or fva
hagb gurr.

24:16 Gur snguref funyy abg or chg gb qrngu sbe gur puvyqera, arvgure
funyy gur puvyqera or chg gb qrngu sbe gur snguref: rirel zna funyy or
chg gb qrngu sbe uvf bja fva.

24:17 Gubh funyg abg creireg gur whqtzrag bs gur fgenatre, abe bs gur
sngureyrff; abe gnxr n jvqbj'f envzrag gb cyrqtr: 24:18 Ohg gubh funyg
erzrzore gung gubh jnfg n obaqzna va Rtlcg, naq gur YBEQ gul Tbq
erqrrzrq gurr gurapr: gurersber V pbzznaq gurr gb qb guvf guvat.

24:19 Jura gubh phggrfg qbja guvar uneirfg va gul svryq, naq unfg
sbetbg n furns va gur svryq, gubh funyg abg tb ntnva gb srgpu vg: vg
funyy or sbe gur fgenatre, sbe gur sngureyrff, naq sbe gur jvqbj: gung
gur YBEQ gul Tbq znl oyrff gurr va nyy gur jbex bs guvar unaqf.

24:20 Jura gubh orngrfg guvar byvir gerr, gubh funyg abg tb bire gur
obhtuf ntnva: vg funyy or sbe gur fgenatre, sbe gur sngureyrff, naq
sbe gur jvqbj.

24:21 Jura gubh tngurerfg gur tencrf bs gul ivarlneq, gubh funyg abg
tyrna vg nsgrejneq: vg funyy or sbe gur fgenatre, sbe gur sngureyrff,
naq sbe gur jvqbj.

24:22 Naq gubh funyg erzrzore gung gubh jnfg n obaqzna va gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg: gurersber V pbzznaq gurr gb qb guvf guvat.

25:1 Vs gurer or n pbagebirefl orgjrra zra, naq gurl pbzr hagb
whqtzrag, gung gur whqtrf znl whqtr gurz; gura gurl funyy whfgvsl gur
evtugrbhf, naq pbaqrza gur jvpxrq.

25:2 Naq vg funyy or, vs gur jvpxrq zna or jbegul gb or orngra, gung
gur whqtr funyy pnhfr uvz gb yvr qbja, naq gb or orngra orsber uvf
snpr, nppbeqvat gb uvf snhyg, ol n pregnva ahzore.

25:3 Sbegl fgevcrf ur znl tvir uvz, naq abg rkprrq: yrfg, vs ur fubhyq
rkprrq, naq orng uvz nobir gurfr jvgu znal fgevcrf, gura gul oebgure
fubhyq frrz ivyr hagb gurr.

25:4 Gubh funyg abg zhmmyr gur bk jura ur gernqrgu bhg gur pbea.

25:5 Vs oerguera qjryy gbtrgure, naq bar bs gurz qvr, naq unir ab
puvyq, gur jvsr bs gur qrnq funyy abg zneel jvgubhg hagb n fgenatre:
ure uhfonaq'f oebgure funyy tb va hagb ure, naq gnxr ure gb uvz gb
jvsr, naq cresbez gur qhgl bs na uhfonaq'f oebgure hagb ure.

25:6 Naq vg funyy or, gung gur svefgobea juvpu fur ornergu funyy
fhpprrq va gur anzr bs uvf oebgure juvpu vf qrnq, gung uvf anzr or abg
chg bhg bs Vfenry.

25:7 Naq vs gur zna yvxr abg gb gnxr uvf oebgure'f jvsr, gura yrg uvf
oebgure'f jvsr tb hc gb gur tngr hagb gur ryqref, naq fnl, Zl
uhfonaq'f oebgure ershfrgu gb envfr hc hagb uvf oebgure n anzr va
Vfenry, ur jvyy abg cresbez gur qhgl bs zl uhfonaq'f oebgure.

25:8 Gura gur ryqref bs uvf pvgl funyy pnyy uvz, naq fcrnx hagb uvz:
naq vs ur fgnaq gb vg, naq fnl, V yvxr abg gb gnxr ure; 25:9 Gura
funyy uvf oebgure'f jvsr pbzr hagb uvz va gur cerfrapr bs gur ryqref,
naq ybbfr uvf fubr sebz bss uvf sbbg, naq fcvg va uvf snpr, naq funyy
nafjre naq fnl, Fb funyy vg or qbar hagb gung zna gung jvyy abg ohvyq
hc uvf oebgure'f ubhfr.

25:10 Naq uvf anzr funyy or pnyyrq va Vfenry, Gur ubhfr bs uvz gung
ungu uvf fubr ybbfrq.

25:11 Jura zra fgevir gbtrgure bar jvgu nabgure, naq gur jvsr bs gur
bar qenjrgu arne sbe gb qryvire ure uhfonaq bhg bs gur unaq bs uvz
gung fzvgrgu uvz, naq chggrgu sbegu ure unaq, naq gnxrgu uvz ol gur
frpergf: 25:12 Gura gubh funyg phg bss ure unaq, guvar rlr funyy abg
cvgl ure.

25:13 Gubh funyg abg unir va gul ont qviref jrvtugf, n terng naq n
fznyy.

25:14 Gubh funyg abg unir va guvar ubhfr qviref zrnfherf, n terng naq
n fznyy.

25:15 Ohg gubh funyg unir n cresrpg naq whfg jrvtug, n cresrpg naq
whfg zrnfher funyg gubh unir: gung gul qnlf znl or yratgurarq va gur
ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr.

25:16 Sbe nyy gung qb fhpu guvatf, naq nyy gung qb haevtugrbhfyl, ner
na nobzvangvba hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

25:17 Erzrzore jung Nznyrx qvq hagb gurr ol gur jnl, jura lr jrer pbzr
sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg; 25:18 Ubj ur zrg gurr ol gur jnl, naq fzbgr gur
uvaqzbfg bs gurr, rira nyy gung jrer srroyr oruvaq gurr, jura gubh
jnfg snvag naq jrnel; naq ur srnerq abg Tbq.

25:19 Gurersber vg funyy or, jura gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu tvira gurr
erfg sebz nyy guvar rarzvrf ebhaq nobhg, va gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ
gul Tbq tvirgu gurr sbe na vaurevgnapr gb cbffrff vg, gung gubh funyg
oybg bhg gur erzrzoenapr bs Nznyrx sebz haqre urnira; gubh funyg abg
sbetrg vg.

26:1 Naq vg funyy or, jura gubh neg pbzr va hagb gur ynaq juvpu gur
YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr sbe na vaurevgnapr, naq cbffrffrfg vg, naq
qjryyrfg gurerva; 26:2 Gung gubh funyg gnxr bs gur svefg bs nyy gur
sehvg bs gur rnegu, juvpu gubh funyg oevat bs gul ynaq gung gur YBEQ
gul Tbq tvirgu gurr, naq funyg chg vg va n onfxrg, naq funyg tb hagb
gur cynpr juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq funyy pubbfr gb cynpr uvf anzr gurer.

26:3 Naq gubh funyg tb hagb gur cevrfg gung funyy or va gubfr qnlf,
naq fnl hagb uvz, V cebsrff guvf qnl hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gung V nz
pbzr hagb gur pbhagel juvpu gur YBEQ fjner hagb bhe snguref sbe gb
tvir hf.

26:4 Naq gur cevrfg funyy gnxr gur onfxrg bhg bs guvar unaq, naq frg
vg qbja orsber gur nygne bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

26:5 Naq gubh funyg fcrnx naq fnl orsber gur YBEQ gul Tbq, N Flevna
ernql gb crevfu jnf zl sngure, naq ur jrag qbja vagb Rtlcg, naq
fbwbhearq gurer jvgu n srj, naq orpnzr gurer n angvba, terng, zvtugl,
naq cbchybhf: 26:6 Naq gur Rtlcgvnaf rivy ragerngrq hf, naq nssyvpgrq
hf, naq ynvq hcba hf uneq obaqntr: 26:7 Naq jura jr pevrq hagb gur
YBEQ Tbq bs bhe snguref, gur YBEQ urneq bhe ibvpr, naq ybbxrq ba bhe
nssyvpgvba, naq bhe ynobhe, naq bhe bccerffvba: 26:8 Naq gur YBEQ
oebhtug hf sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg jvgu n zvtugl unaq, naq jvgu na
bhgfgergpurq nez, naq jvgu terng greevoyrarff, naq jvgu fvtaf, naq
jvgu jbaqref: 26:9 Naq ur ungu oebhtug hf vagb guvf cynpr, naq ungu
tvira hf guvf ynaq, rira n ynaq gung sybjrgu jvgu zvyx naq ubarl.

26:10 Naq abj, orubyq, V unir oebhtug gur svefgsehvgf bs gur ynaq,
juvpu gubh, B YBEQ, unfg tvira zr. Naq gubh funyg frg vg orsber gur
YBEQ gul Tbq, naq jbefuvc orsber gur YBEQ gul Tbq: 26:11 Naq gubh
funyg erwbvpr va rirel tbbq guvat juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu tvira
hagb gurr, naq hagb guvar ubhfr, gubh, naq gur Yrivgr, naq gur
fgenatre gung vf nzbat lbh.

26:12 Jura gubh unfg znqr na raq bs gvguvat nyy gur gvgurf bs guvar
vapernfr gur guveq lrne, juvpu vf gur lrne bs gvguvat, naq unfg tvira
vg hagb gur Yrivgr, gur fgenatre, gur sngureyrff, naq gur jvqbj, gung
gurl znl rng jvguva gul tngrf, naq or svyyrq; 26:13 Gura gubh funyg
fnl orsber gur YBEQ gul Tbq, V unir oebhtug njnl gur unyybjrq guvatf
bhg bs zvar ubhfr, naq nyfb unir tvira gurz hagb gur Yrivgr, naq hagb
gur fgenatre, gb gur sngureyrff, naq gb gur jvqbj, nppbeqvat gb nyy
gul pbzznaqzragf juvpu gubh unfg pbzznaqrq zr: V unir abg genafterffrq
gul pbzznaqzragf, arvgure unir V sbetbggra gurz.

26:14 V unir abg rngra gurerbs va zl zbheavat, arvgure unir V gnxra
njnl bhtug gurerbs sbe nal hapyrna hfr, abe tvira bhtug gurerbs sbe
gur qrnq: ohg V unir urnexrarq gb gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ zl Tbq, naq
unir qbar nppbeqvat gb nyy gung gubh unfg pbzznaqrq zr.

26:15 Ybbx qbja sebz gul ubyl unovgngvba, sebz urnira, naq oyrff gul
crbcyr Vfenry, naq gur ynaq juvpu gubh unfg tvira hf, nf gubh fjnerfg
hagb bhe snguref, n ynaq gung sybjrgu jvgu zvyx naq ubarl.

26:16 Guvf qnl gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu pbzznaqrq gurr gb qb gurfr
fgnghgrf naq whqtzragf: gubh funyg gurersber xrrc naq qb gurz jvgu nyy
guvar urneg, naq jvgu nyy gul fbhy.

26:17 Gubh unfg nibhpurq gur YBEQ guvf qnl gb or gul Tbq, naq gb jnyx
va uvf jnlf, naq gb xrrc uvf fgnghgrf, naq uvf pbzznaqzragf, naq uvf
whqtzragf, naq gb urnexra hagb uvf ibvpr: 26:18 Naq gur YBEQ ungu
nibhpurq gurr guvf qnl gb or uvf crphyvne crbcyr, nf ur ungu cebzvfrq
gurr, naq gung gubh fubhyqrfg xrrc nyy uvf pbzznaqzragf; 26:19 Naq gb
znxr gurr uvtu nobir nyy angvbaf juvpu ur ungu znqr, va cenvfr, naq va
anzr, naq va ubabhe; naq gung gubh znlrfg or na ubyl crbcyr hagb gur
YBEQ gul Tbq, nf ur ungu fcbxra.

27:1 Naq Zbfrf jvgu gur ryqref bs Vfenry pbzznaqrq gur crbcyr, fnlvat,
Xrrc nyy gur pbzznaqzragf juvpu V pbzznaq lbh guvf qnl.

27:2 Naq vg funyy or ba gur qnl jura lr funyy cnff bire Wbeqna hagb
gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr, gung gubh funyg frg gurr
hc terng fgbarf, naq cynvfgre gurz jvgu cynvfgre: 27:3 Naq gubh funyg
jevgr hcba gurz nyy gur jbeqf bs guvf ynj, jura gubh neg cnffrq bire,
gung gubh znlrfg tb va hagb gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu
gurr, n ynaq gung sybjrgu jvgu zvyx naq ubarl; nf gur YBEQ Tbq bs gul
snguref ungu cebzvfrq gurr.

27:4 Gurersber vg funyy or jura lr or tbar bire Wbeqna, gung lr funyy
frg hc gurfr fgbarf, juvpu V pbzznaq lbh guvf qnl, va zbhag Rony, naq
gubh funyg cynvfgre gurz jvgu cynvfgre.

27:5 Naq gurer funyg gubh ohvyq na nygne hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq, na
nygne bs fgbarf: gubh funyg abg yvsg hc nal veba gbby hcba gurz.

27:6 Gubh funyg ohvyq gur nygne bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq bs jubyr fgbarf:
naq gubh funyg bssre oheag bssrevatf gurerba hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq:
27:7 Naq gubh funyg bssre crnpr bssrevatf, naq funyg rng gurer, naq
erwbvpr orsber gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

27:8 Naq gubh funyg jevgr hcba gur fgbarf nyy gur jbeqf bs guvf ynj
irel cynvayl.

27:9 Naq Zbfrf naq gur cevrfgf gur Yrivgrf fcnxr hagb nyy Vfenry,
fnlvat, Gnxr urrq, naq urnexra, B Vfenry; guvf qnl gubh neg orpbzr gur
crbcyr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

27:10 Gubh funyg gurersber borl gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, naq qb
uvf pbzznaqzragf naq uvf fgnghgrf, juvpu V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl.

27:11 Naq Zbfrf punetrq gur crbcyr gur fnzr qnl, fnlvat, 27:12 Gurfr
funyy fgnaq hcba zbhag Trevmvz gb oyrff gur crbcyr, jura lr ner pbzr
bire Wbeqna; Fvzrba, naq Yriv, naq Whqnu, naq Vffnpune, naq Wbfrcu,
naq Orawnzva: 27:13 Naq gurfr funyy fgnaq hcba zbhag Rony gb phefr;
Erhora, Tnq, naq Nfure, naq Mrohyha, Qna, naq Ancugnyv.

27:14 Naq gur Yrivgrf funyy fcrnx, naq fnl hagb nyy gur zra bs Vfenry
jvgu n ybhq ibvpr, 27:15 Phefrq or gur zna gung znxrgu nal tenira be
zbygra vzntr, na nobzvangvba hagb gur YBEQ, gur jbex bs gur unaqf bs
gur pensgfzna, naq chggrgu vg va n frperg cynpr. Naq nyy gur crbcyr
funyy nafjre naq fnl, Nzra.

27:16 Phefrq or ur gung frggrgu yvtug ol uvf sngure be uvf zbgure. Naq
nyy gur crbcyr funyy fnl, Nzra.

27:17 Phefrq or ur gung erzbirgu uvf arvtuobhe'f ynaqznex. Naq nyy gur
crbcyr funyy fnl, Nzra.

27:18 Phefrq or ur gung znxrgu gur oyvaq gb jnaqre bhg bs gur jnl. Naq
nyy gur crbcyr funyy fnl, Nzra.

27:19 Phefrq or ur gung creiregrgu gur whqtzrag bs gur fgenatre,
sngureyrff, naq jvqbj. Naq nyy gur crbcyr funyy fnl, Nzra.

27:20 Phefrq or ur gung yvrgu jvgu uvf sngure'f jvsr; orpnhfr ur
hapbirergu uvf sngure'f fxveg. Naq nyy gur crbcyr funyy fnl, Nzra.

27:21 Phefrq or ur gung yvrgu jvgu nal znaare bs ornfg. Naq nyy gur
crbcyr funyy fnl, Nzra.

27:22 Phefrq or ur gung yvrgu jvgu uvf fvfgre, gur qnhtugre bs uvf
sngure, be gur qnhtugre bs uvf zbgure. Naq nyy gur crbcyr funyy fnl,
Nzra.

27:23 Phefrq or ur gung yvrgu jvgu uvf zbgure va ynj. Naq nyy gur
crbcyr funyy fnl, Nzra.

27:24 Phefrq or ur gung fzvgrgu uvf arvtuobhe frpergyl. Naq nyy gur
crbcyr funyy fnl, Nzra.

27:25 Phefrq or ur gung gnxrgu erjneq gb fynl na vaabprag crefba. Naq
nyy gur crbcyr funyy fnl, Nzra.

27:26 Phefrq or ur gung pbasvezrgu abg nyy gur jbeqf bs guvf ynj gb qb
gurz. Naq nyy gur crbcyr funyy fnl, Nzra.

28:1 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, vs gubh funyg urnexra qvyvtragyl hagb
gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gb bofreir naq gb qb nyy uvf
pbzznaqzragf juvpu V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl, gung gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvyy
frg gurr ba uvtu nobir nyy angvbaf bs gur rnegu: 28:2 Naq nyy gurfr
oyrffvatf funyy pbzr ba gurr, naq biregnxr gurr, vs gubh funyg urnexra
hagb gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

28:3 Oyrffrq funyg gubh or va gur pvgl, naq oyrffrq funyg gubh or va
gur svryq.

28:4 Oyrffrq funyy or gur sehvg bs gul obql, naq gur sehvg bs gul
tebhaq, naq gur sehvg bs gul pnggyr, gur vapernfr bs gul xvar, naq gur
sybpxf bs gul furrc.

28:5 Oyrffrq funyy or gul onfxrg naq gul fgber.

28:6 Oyrffrq funyg gubh or jura gubh pbzrfg va, naq oyrffrq funyg gubh
or jura gubh tbrfg bhg.

28:7 Gur YBEQ funyy pnhfr guvar rarzvrf gung evfr hc ntnvafg gurr gb
or fzvggra orsber gul snpr: gurl funyy pbzr bhg ntnvafg gurr bar jnl,
naq syrr orsber gurr frira jnlf.

28:8 Gur YBEQ funyy pbzznaq gur oyrffvat hcba gurr va gul fgberubhfrf,
naq va nyy gung gubh frggrfg guvar unaq hagb; naq ur funyy oyrff gurr
va gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq tvirgu gurr.

28:9 Gur YBEQ funyy rfgnoyvfu gurr na ubyl crbcyr hagb uvzfrys, nf ur
ungu fjbea hagb gurr, vs gubh funyg xrrc gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ
gul Tbq, naq jnyx va uvf jnlf.

28:10 Naq nyy crbcyr bs gur rnegu funyy frr gung gubh neg pnyyrq ol
gur anzr bs gur YBEQ; naq gurl funyy or nsenvq bs gurr.

28:11 Naq gur YBEQ funyy znxr gurr cyragrbhf va tbbqf, va gur sehvg bs
gul obql, naq va gur sehvg bs gul pnggyr, naq va gur sehvg bs gul
tebhaq, va gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ fjner hagb gul snguref gb tvir
gurr.

28:12 Gur YBEQ funyy bcra hagb gurr uvf tbbq gernfher, gur urnira gb
tvir gur enva hagb gul ynaq va uvf frnfba, naq gb oyrff nyy gur jbex
bs guvar unaq: naq gubh funyg yraq hagb znal angvbaf, naq gubh funyg
abg obeebj.

28:13 Naq gur YBEQ funyy znxr gurr gur urnq, naq abg gur gnvy; naq
gubh funyg or nobir bayl, naq gubh funyg abg or orarngu; vs gung gubh
urnexra hagb gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, juvpu V pbzznaq
gurr guvf qnl, gb bofreir naq gb qb gurz: 28:14 Naq gubh funyg abg tb
nfvqr sebz nal bs gur jbeqf juvpu V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl, gb gur
evtug unaq, be gb gur yrsg, gb tb nsgre bgure tbqf gb freir gurz.

28:15 Ohg vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, vs gubh jvyg abg urnexra hagb gur
ibvpr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gb bofreir gb qb nyy uvf pbzznaqzragf naq
uvf fgnghgrf juvpu V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl; gung nyy gurfr phefrf
funyy pbzr hcba gurr, naq biregnxr gurr: 28:16 Phefrq funyg gubh or va
gur pvgl, naq phefrq funyg gubh or va gur svryq.

28:17 Phefrq funyy or gul onfxrg naq gul fgber.

28:18 Phefrq funyy or gur sehvg bs gul obql, naq gur sehvg bs gul
ynaq, gur vapernfr bs gul xvar, naq gur sybpxf bs gul furrc.

28:19 Phefrq funyg gubh or jura gubh pbzrfg va, naq phefrq funyg gubh
or jura gubh tbrfg bhg.

28:20 Gur YBEQ funyy fraq hcba gurr phefvat, irkngvba, naq erohxr, va
nyy gung gubh frggrfg guvar unaq hagb sbe gb qb, hagvy gubh or
qrfgeblrq, naq hagvy gubh crevfu dhvpxyl; orpnhfr bs gur jvpxrqarff bs
gul qbvatf, jurerol gubh unfg sbefnxra zr.

28:21 Gur YBEQ funyy znxr gur crfgvyrapr pyrnir hagb gurr, hagvy ur
unir pbafhzrq gurr sebz bss gur ynaq, juvgure gubh tbrfg gb cbffrff
vg.

28:22 Gur YBEQ funyy fzvgr gurr jvgu n pbafhzcgvba, naq jvgu n srire,
naq jvgu na vasynzzngvba, naq jvgu na rkgerzr oheavat, naq jvgu gur
fjbeq, naq jvgu oynfgvat, naq jvgu zvyqrj; naq gurl funyy chefhr gurr
hagvy gubh crevfu.

28:23 Naq gul urnira gung vf bire gul urnq funyy or oenff, naq gur
rnegu gung vf haqre gurr funyy or veba.

28:24 Gur YBEQ funyy znxr gur enva bs gul ynaq cbjqre naq qhfg: sebz
urnira funyy vg pbzr qbja hcba gurr, hagvy gubh or qrfgeblrq.

28:25 Gur YBEQ funyy pnhfr gurr gb or fzvggra orsber guvar rarzvrf:
gubh funyg tb bhg bar jnl ntnvafg gurz, naq syrr frira jnlf orsber
gurz: naq funyg or erzbirq vagb nyy gur xvatqbzf bs gur rnegu.

28:26 Naq gul pnepnfr funyy or zrng hagb nyy sbjyf bs gur nve, naq
hagb gur ornfgf bs gur rnegu, naq ab zna funyy senl gurz njnl.

28:27 Gur YBEQ jvyy fzvgr gurr jvgu gur obgpu bs Rtlcg, naq jvgu gur
rzrebqf, naq jvgu gur fpno, naq jvgu gur vgpu, jurerbs gubh pnafg abg
or urnyrq.

28:28 Gur YBEQ funyy fzvgr gurr jvgu znqarff, naq oyvaqarff, naq
nfgbavfuzrag bs urneg: 28:29 Naq gubh funyg tebcr ng abbaqnl, nf gur
oyvaq tebcrgu va qnexarff, naq gubh funyg abg cebfcre va gul jnlf: naq
gubh funyg or bayl bccerffrq naq fcbvyrq rirezber, naq ab zna funyy
fnir gurr.

28:30 Gubh funyg orgebgu n jvsr, naq nabgure zna funyy yvr jvgu ure:
gubh funyg ohvyq na ubhfr, naq gubh funyg abg qjryy gurerva: gubh
funyg cynag n ivarlneq, naq funyg abg tngure gur tencrf gurerbs.

28:31 Guvar bk funyy or fynva orsber guvar rlrf, naq gubh funyg abg
rng gurerbs: guvar nff funyy or ivbyragyl gnxra njnl sebz orsber gul
snpr, naq funyy abg or erfgberq gb gurr: gul furrc funyy or tvira hagb
guvar rarzvrf, naq gubh funyg unir abar gb erfphr gurz.

28:32 Gul fbaf naq gul qnhtugref funyy or tvira hagb nabgure crbcyr,
naq guvar rlrf funyy ybbx, naq snvy jvgu ybatvat sbe gurz nyy gur qnl
ybat; naq gurer funyy or ab zvtug va guvar unaq.

28:33 Gur sehvg bs gul ynaq, naq nyy gul ynobhef, funyy n angvba juvpu
gubh xabjrfg abg rng hc; naq gubh funyg or bayl bccerffrq naq pehfurq
nyjnl: 28:34 Fb gung gubh funyg or znq sbe gur fvtug bs guvar rlrf
juvpu gubh funyg frr.

28:35 Gur YBEQ funyy fzvgr gurr va gur xarrf, naq va gur yrtf, jvgu n
fber obgpu gung pnaabg or urnyrq, sebz gur fbyr bs gul sbbg hagb gur
gbc bs gul urnq.

28:36 Gur YBEQ funyy oevat gurr, naq gul xvat juvpu gubh funyg frg
bire gurr, hagb n angvba juvpu arvgure gubh abe gul snguref unir
xabja; naq gurer funyg gubh freir bgure tbqf, jbbq naq fgbar.

28:37 Naq gubh funyg orpbzr na nfgbavfuzrag, n cebireo, naq n oljbeq,
nzbat nyy angvbaf juvgure gur YBEQ funyy yrnq gurr.

28:38 Gubh funyg pneel zhpu frrq bhg vagb gur svryq, naq funyg tngure
ohg yvggyr va; sbe gur ybphfg funyy pbafhzr vg.

28:39 Gubh funyg cynag ivarlneqf, naq qerff gurz, ohg funyg arvgure
qevax bs gur jvar, abe tngure gur tencrf; sbe gur jbezf funyy rng
gurz.

28:40 Gubh funyg unir byvir gerrf guebhtubhg nyy gul pbnfgf, ohg gubh
funyg abg nabvag gulfrys jvgu gur bvy; sbe guvar byvir funyy pnfg uvf
sehvg.

28:41 Gubh funyg ortrg fbaf naq qnhtugref, ohg gubh funyg abg rawbl
gurz; sbe gurl funyy tb vagb pncgvivgl.

28:42 Nyy gul gerrf naq sehvg bs gul ynaq funyy gur ybphfg pbafhzr.

28:43 Gur fgenatre gung vf jvguva gurr funyy trg hc nobir gurr irel
uvtu; naq gubh funyg pbzr qbja irel ybj.

28:44 Ur funyy yraq gb gurr, naq gubh funyg abg yraq gb uvz: ur funyy
or gur urnq, naq gubh funyg or gur gnvy.

28:45 Zberbire nyy gurfr phefrf funyy pbzr hcba gurr, naq funyy chefhr
gurr, naq biregnxr gurr, gvyy gubh or qrfgeblrq; orpnhfr gubh
urnexrarqfg abg hagb gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gb xrrc uvf
pbzznaqzragf naq uvf fgnghgrf juvpu ur pbzznaqrq gurr: 28:46 Naq gurl
funyy or hcba gurr sbe n fvta naq sbe n jbaqre, naq hcba gul frrq sbe
rire.

28:47 Orpnhfr gubh freirqfg abg gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvgu wblshyarff, naq
jvgu tynqarff bs urneg, sbe gur nohaqnapr bs nyy guvatf; 28:48
Gurersber funyg gubh freir guvar rarzvrf juvpu gur YBEQ funyy fraq
ntnvafg gurr, va uhatre, naq va guvefg, naq va anxrqarff, naq va jnag
bs nyy guvatf: naq ur funyy chg n lbxr bs veba hcba gul arpx, hagvy ur
unir qrfgeblrq gurr.

28:49 Gur YBEQ funyy oevat n angvba ntnvafg gurr sebz sne, sebz gur
raq bs gur rnegu, nf fjvsg nf gur rntyr syvrgu; n angvba jubfr gbathr
gubh funyg abg haqrefgnaq; 28:50 N angvba bs svrepr pbhagranapr, juvpu
funyy abg ertneq gur crefba bs gur byq, abe furj snibhe gb gur lbhat:
28:51 Naq ur funyy rng gur sehvg bs gul pnggyr, naq gur sehvg bs gul
ynaq, hagvy gubh or qrfgeblrq: juvpu nyfb funyy abg yrnir gurr rvgure
pbea, jvar, be bvy, be gur vapernfr bs gul xvar, be sybpxf bs gul
furrc, hagvy ur unir qrfgeblrq gurr.

28:52 Naq ur funyy orfvrtr gurr va nyy gul tngrf, hagvy gul uvtu naq
sraprq jnyyf pbzr qbja, jurerva gubh gehfgrqfg, guebhtubhg nyy gul
ynaq: naq ur funyy orfvrtr gurr va nyy gul tngrf guebhtubhg nyy gul
ynaq, juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu tvira gurr.

28:53 Naq gubh funyg rng gur sehvg bs guvar bja obql, gur syrfu bs gul
fbaf naq bs gul qnhtugref, juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu tvira gurr, va
gur fvrtr, naq va gur fgenvgarff, jurerjvgu guvar rarzvrf funyy
qvfgerff gurr: 28:54 Fb gung gur zna gung vf graqre nzbat lbh, naq
irel qryvpngr, uvf rlr funyy or rivy gbjneq uvf oebgure, naq gbjneq
gur jvsr bs uvf obfbz, naq gbjneq gur erzanag bs uvf puvyqera juvpu ur
funyy yrnir: 28:55 Fb gung ur jvyy abg tvir gb nal bs gurz bs gur
syrfu bs uvf puvyqera jubz ur funyy rng: orpnhfr ur ungu abguvat yrsg
uvz va gur fvrtr, naq va gur fgenvgarff, jurerjvgu guvar rarzvrf funyy
qvfgerff gurr va nyy gul tngrf.

28:56 Gur graqre naq qryvpngr jbzna nzbat lbh, juvpu jbhyq abg
nqiragher gb frg gur fbyr bs ure sbbg hcba gur tebhaq sbe qryvpngrarff
naq graqrearff, ure rlr funyy or rivy gbjneq gur uhfonaq bs ure obfbz,
naq gbjneq ure fba, naq gbjneq ure qnhtugre, 28:57 Naq gbjneq ure
lbhat bar gung pbzrgu bhg sebz orgjrra ure srrg, naq gbjneq ure
puvyqera juvpu fur funyy orne: sbe fur funyy rng gurz sbe jnag bs nyy
guvatf frpergyl va gur fvrtr naq fgenvgarff, jurerjvgu guvar rarzl
funyy qvfgerff gurr va gul tngrf.

28:58 Vs gubh jvyg abg bofreir gb qb nyy gur jbeqf bs guvf ynj gung
ner jevggra va guvf obbx, gung gubh znlrfg srne guvf tybevbhf naq
srneshy anzr, GUR YBEQ GUL TBQ; 28:59 Gura gur YBEQ jvyy znxr gul
cynthrf jbaqreshy, naq gur cynthrf bs gul frrq, rira terng cynthrf,
naq bs ybat pbagvahnapr, naq fber fvpxarffrf, naq bs ybat pbagvahnapr.

28:60 Zberbire ur jvyy oevat hcba gurr nyy gur qvfrnfrf bs Rtlcg,
juvpu gubh jnfg nsenvq bs; naq gurl funyy pyrnir hagb gurr.

28:61 Nyfb rirel fvpxarff, naq rirel cynthr, juvpu vf abg jevggra va
gur obbx bs guvf ynj, gurz jvyy gur YBEQ oevat hcba gurr, hagvy gubh
or qrfgeblrq.

28:62 Naq lr funyy or yrsg srj va ahzore, jurernf lr jrer nf gur fgnef
bs urnira sbe zhygvghqr; orpnhfr gubh jbhyqrfg abg borl gur ibvpr bs
gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

28:63 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung nf gur YBEQ erwbvprq bire lbh gb
qb lbh tbbq, naq gb zhygvcyl lbh; fb gur YBEQ jvyy erwbvpr bire lbh gb
qrfgebl lbh, naq gb oevat lbh gb abhtug; naq lr funyy or cyhpxrq sebz
bss gur ynaq juvgure gubh tbrfg gb cbffrff vg.

28:64 Naq gur YBEQ funyy fpnggre gurr nzbat nyy crbcyr, sebz gur bar
raq bs gur rnegu rira hagb gur bgure; naq gurer gubh funyg freir bgure
tbqf, juvpu arvgure gubh abe gul snguref unir xabja, rira jbbq naq
fgbar.

28:65 Naq nzbat gurfr angvbaf funyg gubh svaq ab rnfr, arvgure funyy
gur fbyr bs gul sbbg unir erfg: ohg gur YBEQ funyy tvir gurr gurer n
gerzoyvat urneg, naq snvyvat bs rlrf, naq fbeebj bs zvaq: 28:66 Naq
gul yvsr funyy unat va qbhog orsber gurr; naq gubh funyg srne qnl naq
avtug, naq funyg unir abar nffhenapr bs gul yvsr: 28:67 Va gur zbeavat
gubh funyg fnl, Jbhyq Tbq vg jrer rira! naq ng rira gubh funyg fnl,
Jbhyq Tbq vg jrer zbeavat! sbe gur srne bs guvar urneg jurerjvgu gubh
funyg srne, naq sbe gur fvtug bs guvar rlrf juvpu gubh funyg frr.

28:68 Naq gur YBEQ funyy oevat gurr vagb Rtlcg ntnva jvgu fuvcf, ol
gur jnl jurerbs V fcnxr hagb gurr, Gubh funyg frr vg ab zber ntnva:
naq gurer lr funyy or fbyq hagb lbhe rarzvrf sbe obaqzra naq
obaqjbzra, naq ab zna funyy ohl lbh.

29:1 Gurfr ner gur jbeqf bs gur pbiranag, juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq
Zbfrf gb znxr jvgu gur puvyqera bs Vfenry va gur ynaq bs Zbno, orfvqr
gur pbiranag juvpu ur znqr jvgu gurz va Ubero.

29:2 Naq Zbfrf pnyyrq hagb nyy Vfenry, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Lr unir
frra nyy gung gur YBEQ qvq orsber lbhe rlrf va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg hagb
Cunenbu, naq hagb nyy uvf freinagf, naq hagb nyy uvf ynaq; 29:3 Gur
terng grzcgngvbaf juvpu guvar rlrf unir frra, gur fvtaf, naq gubfr
terng zvenpyrf: 29:4 Lrg gur YBEQ ungu abg tvira lbh na urneg gb
creprvir, naq rlrf gb frr, naq rnef gb urne, hagb guvf qnl.

29:5 Naq V unir yrq lbh sbegl lrnef va gur jvyqrearff: lbhe pybgurf
ner abg jnkra byq hcba lbh, naq gul fubr vf abg jnkra byq hcba gul
sbbg.

29:6 Lr unir abg rngra oernq, arvgure unir lr qehax jvar be fgebat
qevax: gung lr zvtug xabj gung V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

29:7 Naq jura lr pnzr hagb guvf cynpr, Fvuba gur xvat bs Urfuoba, naq
Bt gur xvat bs Onfuna, pnzr bhg ntnvafg hf hagb onggyr, naq jr fzbgr
gurz: 29:8 Naq jr gbbx gurve ynaq, naq tnir vg sbe na vaurevgnapr hagb
gur Erhoravgrf, naq gb gur Tnqvgrf, naq gb gur unys gevor bs Znanffru.

29:9 Xrrc gurersber gur jbeqf bs guvf pbiranag, naq qb gurz, gung lr
znl cebfcre va nyy gung lr qb.

29:10 Lr fgnaq guvf qnl nyy bs lbh orsber gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq; lbhe
pncgnvaf bs lbhe gevorf, lbhe ryqref, naq lbhe bssvpref, jvgu nyy gur
zra bs Vfenry, 29:11 Lbhe yvggyr barf, lbhe jvirf, naq gul fgenatre
gung vf va gul pnzc, sebz gur urjre bs gul jbbq hagb gur qenjre bs gul
jngre: 29:12 Gung gubh fubhyqrfg ragre vagb pbiranag jvgu gur YBEQ gul
Tbq, naq vagb uvf bngu, juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq znxrgu jvgu gurr guvf
qnl: 29:13 Gung ur znl rfgnoyvfu gurr gb qnl sbe n crbcyr hagb
uvzfrys, naq gung ur znl or hagb gurr n Tbq, nf ur ungu fnvq hagb
gurr, naq nf ur ungu fjbea hagb gul snguref, gb Noenunz, gb Vfnnp, naq
gb Wnpbo.

29:14 Arvgure jvgu lbh bayl qb V znxr guvf pbiranag naq guvf bngu;
29:15 Ohg jvgu uvz gung fgnaqrgu urer jvgu hf guvf qnl orsber gur YBEQ
bhe Tbq, naq nyfb jvgu uvz gung vf abg urer jvgu hf guvf qnl: 29:16
(Sbe lr xabj ubj jr unir qjryg va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg; naq ubj jr pnzr
guebhtu gur angvbaf juvpu lr cnffrq ol; 29:17 Naq lr unir frra gurve
nobzvangvbaf, naq gurve vqbyf, jbbq naq fgbar, fvyire naq tbyq, juvpu
jrer nzbat gurz:) 29:18 Yrfg gurer fubhyq or nzbat lbh zna, be jbzna,
be snzvyl, be gevor, jubfr urneg gheargu njnl guvf qnl sebz gur YBEQ
bhe Tbq, gb tb naq freir gur tbqf bs gurfr angvbaf; yrfg gurer fubhyq
or nzbat lbh n ebbg gung ornergu tnyy naq jbezjbbq; 29:19 Naq vg pbzr
gb cnff, jura ur urnergu gur jbeqf bs guvf phefr, gung ur oyrff
uvzfrys va uvf urneg, fnlvat, V funyy unir crnpr, gubhtu V jnyx va gur
vzntvangvba bs zvar urneg, gb nqq qehaxraarff gb guvefg: 29:20 Gur
YBEQ jvyy abg fcner uvz, ohg gura gur natre bs gur YBEQ naq uvf
wrnybhfl funyy fzbxr ntnvafg gung zna, naq nyy gur phefrf gung ner
jevggra va guvf obbx funyy yvr hcba uvz, naq gur YBEQ funyy oybg bhg
uvf anzr sebz haqre urnira.

29:21 Naq gur YBEQ funyy frcnengr uvz hagb rivy bhg bs nyy gur gevorf
bs Vfenry, nppbeqvat gb nyy gur phefrf bs gur pbiranag gung ner
jevggra va guvf obbx bs gur ynj: 29:22 Fb gung gur trarengvba gb pbzr
bs lbhe puvyqera gung funyy evfr hc nsgre lbh, naq gur fgenatre gung
funyy pbzr sebz n sne ynaq, funyy fnl, jura gurl frr gur cynthrf bs
gung ynaq, naq gur fvpxarffrf juvpu gur YBEQ ungu ynvq hcba vg; 29:23
Naq gung gur jubyr ynaq gurerbs vf oevzfgbar, naq fnyg, naq oheavat,
gung vg vf abg fbja, abe ornergu, abe nal tenff tebjrgu gurerva, yvxr
gur bireguebj bs Fbqbz, naq Tbzbeenu, Nqznu, naq Mrobvz, juvpu gur
YBEQ bireguerj va uvf natre, naq va uvf jengu: 29:24 Rira nyy angvbaf
funyy fnl, Jurersber ungu gur YBEQ qbar guhf hagb guvf ynaq? jung
zrnargu gur urng bs guvf terng natre?  29:25 Gura zra funyy fnl,
Orpnhfr gurl unir sbefnxra gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve
snguref, juvpu ur znqr jvgu gurz jura ur oebhtug gurz sbegu bhg bs gur
ynaq bs Rtlcg: 29:26 Sbe gurl jrag naq freirq bgure tbqf, naq
jbefuvccrq gurz, tbqf jubz gurl xarj abg, naq jubz ur unq abg tvira
hagb gurz: 29:27 Naq gur natre bs gur YBEQ jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg guvf
ynaq, gb oevat hcba vg nyy gur phefrf gung ner jevggra va guvf obbx:
29:28 Naq gur YBEQ ebbgrq gurz bhg bs gurve ynaq va natre, naq va
jengu, naq va terng vaqvtangvba, naq pnfg gurz vagb nabgure ynaq, nf
vg vf guvf qnl.

29:29 Gur frperg guvatf orybat hagb gur YBEQ bhe Tbq: ohg gubfr guvatf
juvpu ner erirnyrq orybat hagb hf naq gb bhe puvyqera sbe rire, gung
jr znl qb nyy gur jbeqf bs guvf ynj.

30:1 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura nyy gurfr guvatf ner pbzr hcba
gurr, gur oyrffvat naq gur phefr, juvpu V unir frg orsber gurr, naq
gubh funyg pnyy gurz gb zvaq nzbat nyy gur angvbaf, juvgure gur YBEQ
gul Tbq ungu qevira gurr, 30:2 Naq funyg erghea hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq,
naq funyg borl uvf ibvpr nppbeqvat gb nyy gung V pbzznaq gurr guvf
qnl, gubh naq gul puvyqera, jvgu nyy guvar urneg, naq jvgu nyy gul
fbhy; 30:3 Gung gura gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvyy ghea gul pncgvivgl, naq
unir pbzcnffvba hcba gurr, naq jvyy erghea naq tngure gurr sebz nyy
gur angvbaf, juvgure gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu fpnggrerq gurr.

30:4 Vs nal bs guvar or qevira bhg hagb gur bhgzbfg cnegf bs urnira,
sebz gurapr jvyy gur YBEQ gul Tbq tngure gurr, naq sebz gurapr jvyy ur
srgpu gurr: 30:5 Naq gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvyy oevat gurr vagb gur ynaq
juvpu gul snguref cbffrffrq, naq gubh funyg cbffrff vg; naq ur jvyy qb
gurr tbbq, naq zhygvcyl gurr nobir gul snguref.

30:6 Naq gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvyy pvephzpvfr guvar urneg, naq gur urneg
bs gul frrq, gb ybir gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvgu nyy guvar urneg, naq jvgu
nyy gul fbhy, gung gubh znlrfg yvir.

30:7 Naq gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvyy chg nyy gurfr phefrf hcba guvar
rarzvrf, naq ba gurz gung ungr gurr, juvpu crefrphgrq gurr.

30:8 Naq gubh funyg erghea naq borl gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ, naq qb nyy
uvf pbzznaqzragf juvpu V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl.

30:9 Naq gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvyy znxr gurr cyragrbhf va rirel jbex bs
guvar unaq, va gur sehvg bs gul obql, naq va gur sehvg bs gul pnggyr,
naq va gur sehvg bs gul ynaq, sbe tbbq: sbe gur YBEQ jvyy ntnva
erwbvpr bire gurr sbe tbbq, nf ur erwbvprq bire gul snguref: 30:10 Vs
gubh funyg urnexra hagb gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gb xrrc uvf
pbzznaqzragf naq uvf fgnghgrf juvpu ner jevggra va guvf obbx bs gur
ynj, naq vs gubh ghea hagb gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvgu nyy guvar urneg, naq
jvgu nyy gul fbhy.

30:11 Sbe guvf pbzznaqzrag juvpu V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl, vg vf abg
uvqqra sebz gurr, arvgure vf vg sne bss.

30:12 Vg vf abg va urnira, gung gubh fubhyqrfg fnl, Jub funyy tb hc
sbe hf gb urnira, naq oevat vg hagb hf, gung jr znl urne vg, naq qb
vg?  30:13 Arvgure vf vg orlbaq gur frn, gung gubh fubhyqrfg fnl, Jub
funyy tb bire gur frn sbe hf, naq oevat vg hagb hf, gung jr znl urne
vg, naq qb vg?  30:14 Ohg gur jbeq vf irel avtu hagb gurr, va gul
zbhgu, naq va gul urneg, gung gubh znlrfg qb vg.

30:15 Frr, V unir frg orsber gurr guvf qnl yvsr naq tbbq, naq qrngu
naq rivy; 30:16 Va gung V pbzznaq gurr guvf qnl gb ybir gur YBEQ gul
Tbq, gb jnyx va uvf jnlf, naq gb xrrc uvf pbzznaqzragf naq uvf
fgnghgrf naq uvf whqtzragf, gung gubh znlrfg yvir naq zhygvcyl: naq
gur YBEQ gul Tbq funyy oyrff gurr va gur ynaq juvgure gubh tbrfg gb
cbffrff vg.

30:17 Ohg vs guvar urneg ghea njnl, fb gung gubh jvyg abg urne, ohg
funyg or qenja njnl, naq jbefuvc bgure tbqf, naq freir gurz; 30:18 V
qrabhapr hagb lbh guvf qnl, gung lr funyy fheryl crevfu, naq gung lr
funyy abg cebybat lbhe qnlf hcba gur ynaq, juvgure gubh cnffrfg bire
Wbeqna gb tb gb cbffrff vg.

30:19 V pnyy urnira naq rnegu gb erpbeq guvf qnl ntnvafg lbh, gung V
unir frg orsber lbh yvsr naq qrngu, oyrffvat naq phefvat: gurersber
pubbfr yvsr, gung obgu gubh naq gul frrq znl yvir: 30:20 Gung gubh
znlrfg ybir gur YBEQ gul Tbq, naq gung gubh znlrfg borl uvf ibvpr, naq
gung gubh znlrfg pyrnir hagb uvz: sbe ur vf gul yvsr, naq gur yratgu
bs gul qnlf: gung gubh znlrfg qjryy va gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ fjner
hagb gul snguref, gb Noenunz, gb Vfnnp, naq gb Wnpbo, gb tvir gurz.

31:1 Naq Zbfrf jrag naq fcnxr gurfr jbeqf hagb nyy Vfenry.

31:2 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, V nz na uhaqerq naq gjragl lrnef byq guvf
qnl; V pna ab zber tb bhg naq pbzr va: nyfb gur YBEQ ungu fnvq hagb
zr, Gubh funyg abg tb bire guvf Wbeqna.

31:3 Gur YBEQ gul Tbq, ur jvyy tb bire orsber gurr, naq ur jvyy
qrfgebl gurfr angvbaf sebz orsber gurr, naq gubh funyg cbffrff gurz:
naq Wbfuhn, ur funyy tb bire orsber gurr, nf gur YBEQ ungu fnvq.

31:4 Naq gur YBEQ funyy qb hagb gurz nf ur qvq gb Fvuba naq gb Bt,
xvatf bs gur Nzbevgrf, naq hagb gur ynaq bs gurz, jubz ur qrfgeblrq.

31:5 Naq gur YBEQ funyy tvir gurz hc orsber lbhe snpr, gung lr znl qb
hagb gurz nppbeqvat hagb nyy gur pbzznaqzragf juvpu V unir pbzznaqrq
lbh.

31:6 Or fgebat naq bs n tbbq pbhentr, srne abg, abe or nsenvq bs gurz:
sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq, ur vg vf gung qbgu tb jvgu gurr; ur jvyy abg
snvy gurr, abe sbefnxr gurr.

31:7 Naq Zbfrf pnyyrq hagb Wbfuhn, naq fnvq hagb uvz va gur fvtug bs
nyy Vfenry, Or fgebat naq bs n tbbq pbhentr: sbe gubh zhfg tb jvgu
guvf crbcyr hagb gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ ungu fjbea hagb gurve snguref
gb tvir gurz; naq gubh funyg pnhfr gurz gb vaurevg vg.

31:8 Naq gur YBEQ, ur vg vf gung qbgu tb orsber gurr; ur jvyy or jvgu
gurr, ur jvyy abg snvy gurr, arvgure sbefnxr gurr: srne abg, arvgure
or qvfznlrq.

31:9 Naq Zbfrf jebgr guvf ynj, naq qryvirerq vg hagb gur cevrfgf gur
fbaf bs Yriv, juvpu oner gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ, naq hagb
nyy gur ryqref bs Vfenry.

31:10 Naq Zbfrf pbzznaqrq gurz, fnlvat, Ng gur raq bs rirel frira
lrnef, va gur fbyrzavgl bs gur lrne bs eryrnfr, va gur srnfg bs
gnoreanpyrf, 31:11 Jura nyy Vfenry vf pbzr gb nccrne orsber gur YBEQ
gul Tbq va gur cynpr juvpu ur funyy pubbfr, gubh funyg ernq guvf ynj
orsber nyy Vfenry va gurve urnevat.

31:12 Tngure gur crbcyr gbtrgure, zra naq jbzra, naq puvyqera, naq gul
fgenatre gung vf jvguva gul tngrf, gung gurl znl urne, naq gung gurl
znl yrnea, naq srne gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, naq bofreir gb qb nyy gur jbeqf
bs guvf ynj: 31:13 Naq gung gurve puvyqera, juvpu unir abg xabja nal
guvat, znl urne, naq yrnea gb srne gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, nf ybat nf lr
yvir va gur ynaq juvgure lr tb bire Wbeqna gb cbffrff vg.

31:14 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Orubyq, gul qnlf nccebnpu gung
gubh zhfg qvr: pnyy Wbfuhn, naq cerfrag lbhefryirf va gur gnoreanpyr
bs gur pbatertngvba, gung V znl tvir uvz n punetr. Naq Zbfrf naq
Wbfuhn jrag, naq cerfragrq gurzfryirf va gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba.

31:15 Naq gur YBEQ nccrnerq va gur gnoreanpyr va n cvyyne bs n pybhq:
naq gur cvyyne bs gur pybhq fgbbq bire gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr.

31:16 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf, Orubyq, gubh funyg fyrrc jvgu gul
snguref; naq guvf crbcyr jvyy evfr hc, naq tb n jubevat nsgre gur tbqf
bs gur fgenatref bs gur ynaq, juvgure gurl tb gb or nzbat gurz, naq
jvyy sbefnxr zr, naq oernx zl pbiranag juvpu V unir znqr jvgu gurz.

31:17 Gura zl natre funyy or xvaqyrq ntnvafg gurz va gung qnl, naq V
jvyy sbefnxr gurz, naq V jvyy uvqr zl snpr sebz gurz, naq gurl funyy
or qribherq, naq znal rivyf naq gebhoyrf funyy orsnyy gurz; fb gung
gurl jvyy fnl va gung qnl, Ner abg gurfr rivyf pbzr hcba hf, orpnhfr
bhe Tbq vf abg nzbat hf?  31:18 Naq V jvyy fheryl uvqr zl snpr va gung
qnl sbe nyy gur rivyf juvpu gurl funyy unir jebhtug, va gung gurl ner
ghearq hagb bgure tbqf.

31:19 Abj gurersber jevgr lr guvf fbat sbe lbh, naq grnpu vg gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry: chg vg va gurve zbhguf, gung guvf fbat znl or n
jvgarff sbe zr ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

31:20 Sbe jura V funyy unir oebhtug gurz vagb gur ynaq juvpu V fjner
hagb gurve snguref, gung sybjrgu jvgu zvyx naq ubarl; naq gurl funyy
unir rngra naq svyyrq gurzfryirf, naq jnkra sng; gura jvyy gurl ghea
hagb bgure tbqf, naq freir gurz, naq cebibxr zr, naq oernx zl
pbiranag.

31:21 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura znal rivyf naq gebhoyrf ner
orsnyyra gurz, gung guvf fbat funyy grfgvsl ntnvafg gurz nf n jvgarff;
sbe vg funyy abg or sbetbggra bhg bs gur zbhguf bs gurve frrq: sbe V
xabj gurve vzntvangvba juvpu gurl tb nobhg, rira abj, orsber V unir
oebhtug gurz vagb gur ynaq juvpu V fjner.

31:22 Zbfrf gurersber jebgr guvf fbat gur fnzr qnl, naq gnhtug vg gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry.

31:23 Naq ur tnir Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha n punetr, naq fnvq, Or fgebat
naq bs n tbbq pbhentr: sbe gubh funyg oevat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
vagb gur ynaq juvpu V fjner hagb gurz: naq V jvyy or jvgu gurr.

31:24 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Zbfrf unq znqr na raq bs jevgvat gur
jbeqf bs guvf ynj va n obbx, hagvy gurl jrer svavfurq, 31:25 Gung
Zbfrf pbzznaqrq gur Yrivgrf, juvpu oner gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur
YBEQ, fnlvat, 31:26 Gnxr guvf obbx bs gur ynj, naq chg vg va gur fvqr
bs gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, gung vg znl or gurer
sbe n jvgarff ntnvafg gurr.

31:27 Sbe V xabj gul eroryyvba, naq gul fgvss arpx: orubyq, juvyr V nz
lrg nyvir jvgu lbh guvf qnl, lr unir orra eroryyvbhf ntnvafg gur YBEQ;
naq ubj zhpu zber nsgre zl qrngu?  31:28 Tngure hagb zr nyy gur ryqref
bs lbhe gevorf, naq lbhe bssvpref, gung V znl fcrnx gurfr jbeqf va
gurve rnef, naq pnyy urnira naq rnegu gb erpbeq ntnvafg gurz.

31:29 Sbe V xabj gung nsgre zl qrngu lr jvyy hggreyl pbeehcg
lbhefryirf, naq ghea nfvqr sebz gur jnl juvpu V unir pbzznaqrq lbh;
naq rivy jvyy orsnyy lbh va gur ynggre qnlf; orpnhfr lr jvyy qb rivy
va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, gb cebibxr uvz gb natre guebhtu gur jbex bs
lbhe unaqf.

31:30 Naq Zbfrf fcnxr va gur rnef bs nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry
gur jbeqf bs guvf fbat, hagvy gurl jrer raqrq.

32:1 Tvir rne, B lr urniraf, naq V jvyy fcrnx; naq urne, B rnegu, gur
jbeqf bs zl zbhgu.

32:2 Zl qbpgevar funyy qebc nf gur enva, zl fcrrpu funyy qvfgvy nf gur
qrj, nf gur fznyy enva hcba gur graqre ureo, naq nf gur fubjref hcba
gur tenff: 32:3 Orpnhfr V jvyy choyvfu gur anzr bs gur YBEQ: nfpevor
lr terngarff hagb bhe Tbq.

32:4 Ur vf gur Ebpx, uvf jbex vf cresrpg: sbe nyy uvf jnlf ner
whqtzrag: n Tbq bs gehgu naq jvgubhg vavdhvgl, whfg naq evtug vf ur.

32:5 Gurl unir pbeehcgrq gurzfryirf, gurve fcbg vf abg gur fcbg bs uvf
puvyqera: gurl ner n creirefr naq pebbxrq trarengvba.

32:6 Qb lr guhf erdhvgr gur YBEQ, B sbbyvfu crbcyr naq hajvfr? vf abg
ur gul sngure gung ungu obhtug gurr? ungu ur abg znqr gurr, naq
rfgnoyvfurq gurr?  32:7 Erzrzore gur qnlf bs byq, pbafvqre gur lrnef
bs znal trarengvbaf: nfx gul sngure, naq ur jvyy furj gurr; gul
ryqref, naq gurl jvyy gryy gurr.

32:8 Jura gur Zbfg Uvtu qvivqrq gb gur angvbaf gurve vaurevgnapr, jura
ur frcnengrq gur fbaf bs Nqnz, ur frg gur obhaqf bs gur crbcyr
nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

32:9 Sbe gur YBEQ'f cbegvba vf uvf crbcyr; Wnpbo vf gur ybg bs uvf
vaurevgnapr.

32:10 Ur sbhaq uvz va n qrfreg ynaq, naq va gur jnfgr ubjyvat
jvyqrearff; ur yrq uvz nobhg, ur vafgehpgrq uvz, ur xrcg uvz nf gur
nccyr bs uvf rlr.

32:11 Nf na rntyr fgveergu hc ure arfg, syhggrergu bire ure lbhat,
fcernqrgu noebnq ure jvatf, gnxrgu gurz, ornergu gurz ba ure jvatf:
32:12 Fb gur YBEQ nybar qvq yrnq uvz, naq gurer jnf ab fgenatr tbq
jvgu uvz.

32:13 Ur znqr uvz evqr ba gur uvtu cynprf bs gur rnegu, gung ur zvtug
rng gur vapernfr bs gur svryqf; naq ur znqr uvz gb fhpx ubarl bhg bs
gur ebpx, naq bvy bhg bs gur syvagl ebpx; 32:14 Ohggre bs xvar, naq
zvyx bs furrc, jvgu sng bs ynzof, naq enzf bs gur oerrq bs Onfuna, naq
tbngf, jvgu gur sng bs xvqarlf bs jurng; naq gubh qvqfg qevax gur cher
oybbq bs gur tencr.

32:15 Ohg Wrfuheha jnkrq sng, naq xvpxrq: gubh neg jnkra sng, gubh neg
tebja guvpx, gubh neg pbirerq jvgu sngarff; gura ur sbefbbx Tbq juvpu
znqr uvz, naq yvtugyl rfgrrzrq gur Ebpx bs uvf fnyingvba.

32:16 Gurl cebibxrq uvz gb wrnybhfl jvgu fgenatr tbqf, jvgu
nobzvangvbaf cebibxrq gurl uvz gb natre.

32:17 Gurl fnpevsvprq hagb qrivyf, abg gb Tbq; gb tbqf jubz gurl xarj
abg, gb arj tbqf gung pnzr arjyl hc, jubz lbhe snguref srnerq abg.

32:18 Bs gur Ebpx gung ortng gurr gubh neg hazvaqshy, naq unfg
sbetbggra Tbq gung sbezrq gurr.

32:19 Naq jura gur YBEQ fnj vg, ur noubeerq gurz, orpnhfr bs gur
cebibxvat bs uvf fbaf, naq bs uvf qnhtugref.

32:20 Naq ur fnvq, V jvyy uvqr zl snpr sebz gurz, V jvyy frr jung
gurve raq funyy or: sbe gurl ner n irel sebjneq trarengvba, puvyqera
va jubz vf ab snvgu.

32:21 Gurl unir zbirq zr gb wrnybhfl jvgu gung juvpu vf abg Tbq; gurl
unir cebibxrq zr gb natre jvgu gurve inavgvrf: naq V jvyy zbir gurz gb
wrnybhfl jvgu gubfr juvpu ner abg n crbcyr; V jvyy cebibxr gurz gb
natre jvgu n sbbyvfu angvba.

32:22 Sbe n sver vf xvaqyrq va zvar natre, naq funyy ohea hagb gur
ybjrfg uryy, naq funyy pbafhzr gur rnegu jvgu ure vapernfr, naq frg ba
sver gur sbhaqngvbaf bs gur zbhagnvaf.

32:23 V jvyy urnc zvfpuvrsf hcba gurz; V jvyy fcraq zvar neebjf hcba
gurz.

32:24 Gurl funyy or oheag jvgu uhatre, naq qribherq jvgu oheavat urng,
naq jvgu ovggre qrfgehpgvba: V jvyy nyfb fraq gur grrgu bs ornfgf hcba
gurz, jvgu gur cbvfba bs frecragf bs gur qhfg.

32:25 Gur fjbeq jvgubhg, naq greebe jvguva, funyy qrfgebl obgu gur
lbhat zna naq gur ivetva, gur fhpxyvat nyfb jvgu gur zna bs tenl
unvef.

32:26 V fnvq, V jbhyq fpnggre gurz vagb pbearef, V jbhyq znxr gur
erzrzoenapr bs gurz gb prnfr sebz nzbat zra: 32:27 Jrer vg abg gung V
srnerq gur jengu bs gur rarzl, yrfg gurve nqirefnevrf fubhyq orunir
gurzfryirf fgenatryl, naq yrfg gurl fubhyq fnl, Bhe unaq vf uvtu, naq
gur YBEQ ungu abg qbar nyy guvf.

32:28 Sbe gurl ner n angvba ibvq bs pbhafry, arvgure vf gurer nal
haqrefgnaqvat va gurz.

32:29 B gung gurl jrer jvfr, gung gurl haqrefgbbq guvf, gung gurl
jbhyq pbafvqre gurve ynggre raq!  32:30 Ubj fubhyq bar punfr n
gubhfnaq, naq gjb chg gra gubhfnaq gb syvtug, rkprcg gurve Ebpx unq
fbyq gurz, naq gur YBEQ unq fuhg gurz hc?  32:31 Sbe gurve ebpx vf abg
nf bhe Ebpx, rira bhe rarzvrf gurzfryirf orvat whqtrf.

32:32 Sbe gurve ivar vf bs gur ivar bs Fbqbz, naq bs gur svryqf bs
Tbzbeenu: gurve tencrf ner tencrf bs tnyy, gurve pyhfgref ner ovggre:
32:33 Gurve jvar vf gur cbvfba bs qentbaf, naq gur pehry irabz bs
nfcf.

32:34 Vf abg guvf ynvq hc va fgber jvgu zr, naq frnyrq hc nzbat zl
gernfherf?  32:35 Gb zr orybatrgu iratrnapr naq erpbzcrapr; gurve sbbg
funyy fyvqr va qhr gvzr: sbe gur qnl bs gurve pnynzvgl vf ng unaq, naq
gur guvatf gung funyy pbzr hcba gurz znxr unfgr.

32:36 Sbe gur YBEQ funyy whqtr uvf crbcyr, naq ercrag uvzfrys sbe uvf
freinagf, jura ur frrgu gung gurve cbjre vf tbar, naq gurer vf abar
fuhg hc, be yrsg.

32:37 Naq ur funyy fnl, Jurer ner gurve tbqf, gurve ebpx va jubz gurl
gehfgrq, 32:38 Juvpu qvq rng gur sng bs gurve fnpevsvprf, naq qenax
gur jvar bs gurve qevax bssrevatf? yrg gurz evfr hc naq uryc lbh, naq
or lbhe cebgrpgvba.

32:39 Frr abj gung V, rira V, nz ur, naq gurer vf ab tbq jvgu zr: V
xvyy, naq V znxr nyvir; V jbhaq, naq V urny: arvgure vf gurer nal gung
pna qryvire bhg bs zl unaq.

32:40 Sbe V yvsg hc zl unaq gb urnira, naq fnl, V yvir sbe rire.

32:41 Vs V jurg zl tyvggrevat fjbeq, naq zvar unaq gnxr ubyq ba
whqtzrag; V jvyy eraqre iratrnapr gb zvar rarzvrf, naq jvyy erjneq
gurz gung ungr zr.

32:42 V jvyy znxr zvar neebjf qehax jvgu oybbq, naq zl fjbeq funyy
qribhe syrfu; naq gung jvgu gur oybbq bs gur fynva naq bs gur
pncgvirf, sebz gur ortvaavat bs eriratrf hcba gur rarzl.

32:43 Erwbvpr, B lr angvbaf, jvgu uvf crbcyr: sbe ur jvyy niratr gur
oybbq bs uvf freinagf, naq jvyy eraqre iratrnapr gb uvf nqirefnevrf,
naq jvyy or zrepvshy hagb uvf ynaq, naq gb uvf crbcyr.

32:44 Naq Zbfrf pnzr naq fcnxr nyy gur jbeqf bs guvf fbat va gur rnef
bs gur crbcyr, ur, naq Ubfurn gur fba bs Aha.

32:45 Naq Zbfrf znqr na raq bs fcrnxvat nyy gurfr jbeqf gb nyy Vfenry:
32:46 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Frg lbhe urnegf hagb nyy gur jbeqf juvpu
V grfgvsl nzbat lbh guvf qnl, juvpu lr funyy pbzznaq lbhe puvyqera gb
bofreir gb qb, nyy gur jbeqf bs guvf ynj.

32:47 Sbe vg vf abg n inva guvat sbe lbh; orpnhfr vg vf lbhe yvsr: naq
guebhtu guvf guvat lr funyy cebybat lbhe qnlf va gur ynaq, juvgure lr
tb bire Wbeqna gb cbffrff vg.

32:48 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Zbfrf gung frysfnzr qnl, fnlvat, 32:49
Trg gurr hc vagb guvf zbhagnva Nonevz, hagb zbhag Arob, juvpu vf va
gur ynaq bs Zbno, gung vf bire ntnvafg Wrevpub; naq orubyq gur ynaq bs
Pnanna, juvpu V tvir hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry sbe n cbffrffvba:
32:50 Naq qvr va gur zbhag juvgure gubh tbrfg hc, naq or tngurerq hagb
gul crbcyr; nf Nneba gul oebgure qvrq va zbhag Ube, naq jnf tngurerq
hagb uvf crbcyr: 32:51 Orpnhfr lr gerfcnffrq ntnvafg zr nzbat gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry ng gur jngref bs ZrevonuXnqrfu, va gur jvyqrearff
bs Mva; orpnhfr lr fnapgvsvrq zr abg va gur zvqfg bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry.

32:52 Lrg gubh funyg frr gur ynaq orsber gurr; ohg gubh funyg abg tb
guvgure hagb gur ynaq juvpu V tvir gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

33:1 Naq guvf vf gur oyrffvat, jurerjvgu Zbfrf gur zna bs Tbq oyrffrq
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry orsber uvf qrngu.

33:2 Naq ur fnvq, Gur YBEQ pnzr sebz Fvanv, naq ebfr hc sebz Frve hagb
gurz; ur fuvarq sbegu sebz zbhag Cnena, naq ur pnzr jvgu gra gubhfnaqf
bs fnvagf: sebz uvf evtug unaq jrag n svrel ynj sbe gurz.

33:3 Lrn, ur ybirq gur crbcyr; nyy uvf fnvagf ner va gul unaq: naq
gurl fng qbja ng gul srrg; rirel bar funyy erprvir bs gul jbeqf.

33:4 Zbfrf pbzznaqrq hf n ynj, rira gur vaurevgnapr bs gur
pbatertngvba bs Wnpbo.

33:5 Naq ur jnf xvat va Wrfuheha, jura gur urnqf bs gur crbcyr naq gur
gevorf bs Vfenry jrer tngurerq gbtrgure.

33:6 Yrg Erhora yvir, naq abg qvr; naq yrg abg uvf zra or srj.

33:7 Naq guvf vf gur oyrffvat bs Whqnu: naq ur fnvq, Urne, YBEQ, gur
ibvpr bs Whqnu, naq oevat uvz hagb uvf crbcyr: yrg uvf unaqf or
fhssvpvrag sbe uvz; naq or gubh na uryc gb uvz sebz uvf rarzvrf.

33:8 Naq bs Yriv ur fnvq, Yrg gul Guhzzvz naq gul Hevz or jvgu gul
ubyl bar, jubz gubh qvqfg cebir ng Znffnu, naq jvgu jubz gubh qvqfg
fgevir ng gur jngref bs Zrevonu; 33:9 Jub fnvq hagb uvf sngure naq gb
uvf zbgure, V unir abg frra uvz; arvgure qvq ur npxabjyrqtr uvf
oerguera, abe xarj uvf bja puvyqera: sbe gurl unir bofreirq gul jbeq,
naq xrcg gul pbiranag.

33:10 Gurl funyy grnpu Wnpbo gul whqtzragf, naq Vfenry gul ynj: gurl
funyy chg vaprafr orsber gurr, naq jubyr oheag fnpevsvpr hcba guvar
nygne.

33:11 Oyrff, YBEQ, uvf fhofgnapr, naq npprcg gur jbex bs uvf unaqf;
fzvgr guebhtu gur ybvaf bs gurz gung evfr ntnvafg uvz, naq bs gurz
gung ungr uvz, gung gurl evfr abg ntnva.

33:12 Naq bs Orawnzva ur fnvq, Gur orybirq bs gur YBEQ funyy qjryy va
fnsrgl ol uvz; naq gur Ybeq funyy pbire uvz nyy gur qnl ybat, naq ur
funyy qjryy orgjrra uvf fubhyqref.

33:13 Naq bs Wbfrcu ur fnvq, Oyrffrq bs gur YBEQ or uvf ynaq, sbe gur
cerpvbhf guvatf bs urnira, sbe gur qrj, naq sbe gur qrrc gung pbhpurgu
orarngu, 33:14 Naq sbe gur cerpvbhf sehvgf oebhtug sbegu ol gur fha,
naq sbe gur cerpvbhf guvatf chg sbegu ol gur zbba, 33:15 Naq sbe gur
puvrs guvatf bs gur napvrag zbhagnvaf, naq sbe gur cerpvbhf guvatf bs
gur ynfgvat uvyyf, 33:16 Naq sbe gur cerpvbhf guvatf bs gur rnegu naq
shyarff gurerbs, naq sbe gur tbbq jvyy bs uvz gung qjryg va gur ohfu:
yrg gur oyrffvat pbzr hcba gur urnq bs Wbfrcu, naq hcba gur gbc bs gur
urnq bs uvz gung jnf frcnengrq sebz uvf oerguera.

33:17 Uvf tybel vf yvxr gur svefgyvat bs uvf ohyybpx, naq uvf ubeaf
ner yvxr gur ubeaf bs havpbeaf: jvgu gurz ur funyy chfu gur crbcyr
gbtrgure gb gur raqf bs gur rnegu: naq gurl ner gur gra gubhfnaqf bs
Rcuenvz, naq gurl ner gur gubhfnaqf bs Znanffru.

33:18 Naq bs Mrohyha ur fnvq, Erwbvpr, Mrohyha, va gul tbvat bhg; naq,
Vffnpune, va gul gragf.

33:19 Gurl funyy pnyy gur crbcyr hagb gur zbhagnva; gurer gurl funyy
bssre fnpevsvprf bs evtugrbhfarff: sbe gurl funyy fhpx bs gur
nohaqnapr bs gur frnf, naq bs gernfherf uvq va gur fnaq.

33:20 Naq bs Tnq ur fnvq, Oyrffrq or ur gung raynetrgu Tnq: ur
qjryyrgu nf n yvba, naq grnergu gur nez jvgu gur pebja bs gur urnq.

33:21 Naq ur cebivqrq gur svefg cneg sbe uvzfrys, orpnhfr gurer, va n
cbegvba bs gur ynjtvire, jnf ur frngrq; naq ur pnzr jvgu gur urnqf bs
gur crbcyr, ur rkrphgrq gur whfgvpr bs gur YBEQ, naq uvf whqtzragf
jvgu Vfenry.

33:22 Naq bs Qna ur fnvq, Qna vf n yvba'f juryc: ur funyy yrnc sebz
Onfuna.

33:23 Naq bs Ancugnyv ur fnvq, B Ancugnyv, fngvfsvrq jvgu snibhe, naq
shyy jvgu gur oyrffvat bs gur YBEQ: cbffrff gubh gur jrfg naq gur
fbhgu.

33:24 Naq bs Nfure ur fnvq, Yrg Nfure or oyrffrq jvgu puvyqera; yrg
uvz or npprcgnoyr gb uvf oerguera, naq yrg uvz qvc uvf sbbg va bvy.

33:25 Gul fubrf funyy or veba naq oenff; naq nf gul qnlf, fb funyy gul
fgeratgu or.

33:26 Gurer vf abar yvxr hagb gur Tbq bs Wrfuheha, jub evqrgu hcba gur
urnira va gul uryc, naq va uvf rkpryyrapl ba gur fxl.

33:27 Gur rgreany Tbq vf gul ershtr, naq haqrearngu ner gur
rireynfgvat nezf: naq ur funyy guehfg bhg gur rarzl sebz orsber gurr;
naq funyy fnl, Qrfgebl gurz.

33:28 Vfenry gura funyy qjryy va fnsrgl nybar: gur sbhagnva bs Wnpbo
funyy or hcba n ynaq bs pbea naq jvar; nyfb uvf urniraf funyy qebc
qbja qrj.

33:29 Unccl neg gubh, B Vfenry: jub vf yvxr hagb gurr, B crbcyr fnirq
ol gur YBEQ, gur fuvryq bs gul uryc, naq jub vf gur fjbeq bs gul
rkpryyrapl! naq guvar rarzvrf funyy or sbhaq yvnef hagb gurr; naq gubh
funyg gernq hcba gurve uvtu cynprf.

34:1 Naq Zbfrf jrag hc sebz gur cynvaf bs Zbno hagb gur zbhagnva bs
Arob, gb gur gbc bs Cvftnu, gung vf bire ntnvafg Wrevpub. Naq gur YBEQ
furjrq uvz nyy gur ynaq bs Tvyrnq, hagb Qna, 34:2 Naq nyy Ancugnyv,
naq gur ynaq bs Rcuenvz, naq Znanffru, naq nyy gur ynaq bs Whqnu, hagb
gur hgzbfg frn, 34:3 Naq gur fbhgu, naq gur cynva bs gur inyyrl bs
Wrevpub, gur pvgl bs cnyz gerrf, hagb Mbne.

34:4 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, Guvf vf gur ynaq juvpu V fjner hagb
Noenunz, hagb Vfnnp, naq hagb Wnpbo, fnlvat, V jvyy tvir vg hagb gul
frrq: V unir pnhfrq gurr gb frr vg jvgu guvar rlrf, ohg gubh funyg abg
tb bire guvgure.

34:5 Fb Zbfrf gur freinag bs gur YBEQ qvrq gurer va gur ynaq bs Zbno,
nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ.

34:6 Naq ur ohevrq uvz va n inyyrl va gur ynaq bs Zbno, bire ntnvafg
Orgucrbe: ohg ab zna xabjrgu bs uvf frchypuer hagb guvf qnl.

34:7 Naq Zbfrf jnf na uhaqerq naq gjragl lrnef byq jura ur qvrq: uvf
rlr jnf abg qvz, abe uvf angheny sbepr nongrq.

34:8 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrcg sbe Zbfrf va gur cynvaf bs Zbno
guvegl qnlf: fb gur qnlf bs jrrcvat naq zbheavat sbe Zbfrf jrer raqrq.

34:9 Naq Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha jnf shyy bs gur fcvevg bs jvfqbz; sbe
Zbfrf unq ynvq uvf unaqf hcba uvz: naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
urnexrarq hagb uvz, naq qvq nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

34:10 Naq gurer nebfr abg n cebcurg fvapr va Vfenry yvxr hagb Zbfrf,
jubz gur YBEQ xarj snpr gb snpr, 34:11 Va nyy gur fvtaf naq gur
jbaqref, juvpu gur YBEQ frag uvz gb qb va gur ynaq bs Rtlcg gb
Cunenbu, naq gb nyy uvf freinagf, naq gb nyy uvf ynaq, 34:12 Naq va
nyy gung zvtugl unaq, naq va nyy gur terng greebe juvpu Zbfrf furjrq
va gur fvtug bs nyy Vfenry.




Gur Obbx bs Wbfuhn


1:1 Abj nsgre gur qrngu bs Zbfrf gur freinag bs gur YBEQ vg pnzr gb
cnff, gung gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha, Zbfrf' zvavfgre,
fnlvat, 1:2 Zbfrf zl freinag vf qrnq; abj gurersber nevfr, tb bire
guvf Wbeqna, gubh, naq nyy guvf crbcyr, hagb gur ynaq juvpu V qb tvir
gb gurz, rira gb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

1:3 Rirel cynpr gung gur fbyr bs lbhe sbbg funyy gernq hcba, gung unir
V tvira hagb lbh, nf V fnvq hagb Zbfrf.

1:4 Sebz gur jvyqrearff naq guvf Yronaba rira hagb gur terng evire,
gur evire Rhcuengrf, nyy gur ynaq bs gur Uvggvgrf, naq hagb gur terng
frn gbjneq gur tbvat qbja bs gur fha, funyy or lbhe pbnfg.

1:5 Gurer funyy abg nal zna or noyr gb fgnaq orsber gurr nyy gur qnlf
bs gul yvsr: nf V jnf jvgu Zbfrf, fb V jvyy or jvgu gurr: V jvyy abg
snvy gurr, abe sbefnxr gurr.

1:6 Or fgebat naq bs n tbbq pbhentr: sbe hagb guvf crbcyr funyg gubh
qvivqr sbe na vaurevgnapr gur ynaq, juvpu V fjner hagb gurve snguref
gb tvir gurz.

1:7 Bayl or gubh fgebat naq irel pbhentrbhf, gung gubh znlrfg bofreir
gb qb nppbeqvat gb nyy gur ynj, juvpu Zbfrf zl freinag pbzznaqrq gurr:
ghea abg sebz vg gb gur evtug unaq be gb gur yrsg, gung gubh znlrfg
cebfcre jvgurefbrire gubh tbrfg.

1:8 Guvf obbx bs gur ynj funyy abg qrcneg bhg bs gul zbhgu; ohg gubh
funyg zrqvgngr gurerva qnl naq avtug, gung gubh znlrfg bofreir gb qb
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung vf jevggra gurerva: sbe gura gubh funyg znxr gul
jnl cebfcrebhf, naq gura gubh funyg unir tbbq fhpprff.

1:9 Unir abg V pbzznaqrq gurr? Or fgebat naq bs n tbbq pbhentr; or abg
nsenvq, arvgure or gubh qvfznlrq: sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq vf jvgu gurr
juvgurefbrire gubh tbrfg.

1:10 Gura Wbfuhn pbzznaqrq gur bssvpref bs gur crbcyr, fnlvat, 1:11
Cnff guebhtu gur ubfg, naq pbzznaq gur crbcyr, fnlvat, Cercner lbh
ivpghnyf; sbe jvguva guerr qnlf lr funyy cnff bire guvf Wbeqna, gb tb
va gb cbffrff gur ynaq, juvpu gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq tvirgu lbh gb cbffrff
vg.

1:12 Naq gb gur Erhoravgrf, naq gb gur Tnqvgrf, naq gb unys gur gevor
bs Znanffru, fcnxr Wbfuhn, fnlvat, 1:13 Erzrzore gur jbeq juvpu Zbfrf
gur freinag bs gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq lbh, fnlvat, Gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ungu
tvira lbh erfg, naq ungu tvira lbh guvf ynaq.

1:14 Lbhe jvirf, lbhe yvggyr barf, naq lbhe pnggyr, funyy erznva va
gur ynaq juvpu Zbfrf tnir lbh ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna; ohg lr funyy cnff
orsber lbhe oerguera nezrq, nyy gur zvtugl zra bs inybhe, naq uryc
gurz; 1:15 Hagvy gur YBEQ unir tvira lbhe oerguera erfg, nf ur ungu
tvira lbh, naq gurl nyfb unir cbffrffrq gur ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ lbhe
Tbq tvirgu gurz: gura lr funyy erghea hagb gur ynaq bs lbhe
cbffrffvba, naq rawbl vg, juvpu Zbfrf gur YBEQ'f freinag tnir lbh ba
guvf fvqr Wbeqna gbjneq gur fhaevfvat.

1:16 Naq gurl nafjrerq Wbfuhn, fnlvat, Nyy gung gubh pbzznaqrfg hf jr
jvyy qb, naq juvgurefbrire gubh fraqrfg hf, jr jvyy tb.

1:17 Nppbeqvat nf jr urnexrarq hagb Zbfrf va nyy guvatf, fb jvyy jr
urnexra hagb gurr: bayl gur YBEQ gul Tbq or jvgu gurr, nf ur jnf jvgu
Zbfrf.

1:18 Jubfbrire ur or gung qbgu erory ntnvafg gul pbzznaqzrag, naq jvyy
abg urnexra hagb gul jbeqf va nyy gung gubh pbzznaqrfg uvz, ur funyy
or chg gb qrngu: bayl or fgebat naq bs n tbbq pbhentr.

2:1 Naq Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha frag bhg bs Fuvggvz gjb zra gb fcl
frpergyl, fnlvat, Tb ivrj gur ynaq, rira Wrevpub. Naq gurl jrag, naq
pnzr vagb na uneybg'f ubhfr, anzrq Enuno, naq ybqtrq gurer.

2:2 Naq vg jnf gbyq gur xvat bs Wrevpub, fnlvat, Orubyq, gurer pnzr
zra va uvgure gb avtug bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gb frnepu bhg gur
pbhagel.

2:3 Naq gur xvat bs Wrevpub frag hagb Enuno, fnlvat, Oevat sbegu gur
zra gung ner pbzr gb gurr, juvpu ner ragrerq vagb guvar ubhfr: sbe
gurl or pbzr gb frnepu bhg nyy gur pbhagel.

2:4 Naq gur jbzna gbbx gur gjb zra, naq uvq gurz, naq fnvq guhf, Gurer
pnzr zra hagb zr, ohg V jvfg abg jurapr gurl jrer: 2:5 Naq vg pnzr gb
cnff nobhg gur gvzr bs fuhggvat bs gur tngr, jura vg jnf qnex, gung
gur zra jrag bhg: juvgure gur zra jrag V jbg abg: chefhr nsgre gurz
dhvpxyl; sbe lr funyy biregnxr gurz.

2:6 Ohg fur unq oebhtug gurz hc gb gur ebbs bs gur ubhfr, naq uvq gurz
jvgu gur fgnyxf bs synk, juvpu fur unq ynvq va beqre hcba gur ebbs.

2:7 Naq gur zra chefhrq nsgre gurz gur jnl gb Wbeqna hagb gur sbeqf:
naq nf fbba nf gurl juvpu chefhrq nsgre gurz jrer tbar bhg, gurl fuhg
gur tngr.

2:8 Naq orsber gurl jrer ynvq qbja, fur pnzr hc hagb gurz hcba gur
ebbs; 2:9 Naq fur fnvq hagb gur zra, V xabj gung gur YBEQ ungu tvira
lbh gur ynaq, naq gung lbhe greebe vf snyyra hcba hf, naq gung nyy gur
vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq snvag orpnhfr bs lbh.

2:10 Sbe jr unir urneq ubj gur YBEQ qevrq hc gur jngre bs gur Erq frn
sbe lbh, jura lr pnzr bhg bs Rtlcg; naq jung lr qvq hagb gur gjb xvatf
bs gur Nzbevgrf, gung jrer ba gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna, Fvuba naq Bt,
jubz lr hggreyl qrfgeblrq.

2:11 Naq nf fbba nf jr unq urneq gurfr guvatf, bhe urnegf qvq zryg,
arvgure qvq gurer erznva nal zber pbhentr va nal zna, orpnhfr bs lbh:
sbe gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, ur vf Tbq va urnira nobir, naq va rnegu
orarngu.

2:12 Abj gurersber, V cenl lbh, fjrne hagb zr ol gur YBEQ, fvapr V
unir furjrq lbh xvaqarff, gung lr jvyy nyfb furj xvaqarff hagb zl
sngure'f ubhfr, naq tvir zr n gehr gbxra: 2:13 Naq gung lr jvyy fnir
nyvir zl sngure, naq zl zbgure, naq zl oerguera, naq zl fvfgref, naq
nyy gung gurl unir, naq qryvire bhe yvirf sebz qrngu.

2:14 Naq gur zra nafjrerq ure, Bhe yvsr sbe lbhef, vs lr hggre abg
guvf bhe ohfvarff. Naq vg funyy or, jura gur YBEQ ungu tvira hf gur
ynaq, gung jr jvyy qrny xvaqyl naq gehyl jvgu gurr.

2:15 Gura fur yrg gurz qbja ol n pbeq guebhtu gur jvaqbj: sbe ure
ubhfr jnf hcba gur gbja jnyy, naq fur qjryg hcba gur jnyy.

2:16 Naq fur fnvq hagb gurz, Trg lbh gb gur zbhagnva, yrfg gur
chefhref zrrg lbh; naq uvqr lbhefryirf gurer guerr qnlf, hagvy gur
chefhref or erghearq: naq nsgrejneq znl lr tb lbhe jnl.

2:17 Naq gur zra fnvq hagb ure, Jr jvyy or oynzryrff bs guvf guvar
bngu juvpu gubh unfg znqr hf fjrne.

2:18 Orubyq, jura jr pbzr vagb gur ynaq, gubh funyg ovaq guvf yvar bs
fpneyrg guernq va gur jvaqbj juvpu gubh qvqfg yrg hf qbja ol: naq gubh
funyg oevat gul sngure, naq gul zbgure, naq gul oerguera, naq nyy gul
sngure'f ubhfrubyq, ubzr hagb gurr.

2:19 Naq vg funyy or, gung jubfbrire funyy tb bhg bs gur qbbef bs gul
ubhfr vagb gur fgerrg, uvf oybbq funyy or hcba uvf urnq, naq jr jvyy
or thvygyrff: naq jubfbrire funyy or jvgu gurr va gur ubhfr, uvf oybbq
funyy or ba bhe urnq, vs nal unaq or hcba uvz.

2:20 Naq vs gubh hggre guvf bhe ohfvarff, gura jr jvyy or dhvg bs
guvar bngu juvpu gubh unfg znqr hf gb fjrne.

2:21 Naq fur fnvq, Nppbeqvat hagb lbhe jbeqf, fb or vg. Naq fur frag
gurz njnl, naq gurl qrcnegrq: naq fur obhaq gur fpneyrg yvar va gur
jvaqbj.

2:22 Naq gurl jrag, naq pnzr hagb gur zbhagnva, naq nobqr gurer guerr
qnlf, hagvy gur chefhref jrer erghearq: naq gur chefhref fbhtug gurz
guebhtubhg nyy gur jnl, ohg sbhaq gurz abg.

2:23 Fb gur gjb zra erghearq, naq qrfpraqrq sebz gur zbhagnva, naq
cnffrq bire, naq pnzr gb Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha, naq gbyq uvz nyy
guvatf gung orsryy gurz: 2:24 Naq gurl fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Gehyl gur
YBEQ ungu qryvirerq vagb bhe unaqf nyy gur ynaq; sbe rira nyy gur
vaunovgnagf bs gur pbhagel qb snvag orpnhfr bs hf.

3:1 Naq Wbfuhn ebfr rneyl va gur zbeavat; naq gurl erzbirq sebz
Fuvggvz, naq pnzr gb Wbeqna, ur naq nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq
ybqtrq gurer orsber gurl cnffrq bire.

3:2 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre guerr qnlf, gung gur bssvpref jrag
guebhtu gur ubfg; 3:3 Naq gurl pbzznaqrq gur crbcyr, fnlvat, Jura lr
frr gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, naq gur cevrfgf gur
Yrivgrf ornevat vg, gura lr funyy erzbir sebz lbhe cynpr, naq tb nsgre
vg.

3:4 Lrg gurer funyy or n fcnpr orgjrra lbh naq vg, nobhg gjb gubhfnaq
phovgf ol zrnfher: pbzr abg arne hagb vg, gung lr znl xabj gur jnl ol
juvpu lr zhfg tb: sbe lr unir abg cnffrq guvf jnl urergbsber.

3:5 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq hagb gur crbcyr, Fnapgvsl lbhefryirf: sbe gb
zbeebj gur YBEQ jvyy qb jbaqref nzbat lbh.

3:6 Naq Wbfuhn fcnxr hagb gur cevrfgf, fnlvat, Gnxr hc gur nex bs gur
pbiranag, naq cnff bire orsber gur crbcyr. Naq gurl gbbx hc gur nex bs
gur pbiranag, naq jrag orsber gur crbcyr.

3:7 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Guvf qnl jvyy V ortva gb zntavsl
gurr va gur fvtug bs nyy Vfenry, gung gurl znl xabj gung, nf V jnf
jvgu Zbfrf, fb V jvyy or jvgu gurr.

3:8 Naq gubh funyg pbzznaq gur cevrfgf gung orne gur nex bs gur
pbiranag, fnlvat, Jura lr ner pbzr gb gur oevax bs gur jngre bs
Wbeqna, lr funyy fgnaq fgvyy va Wbeqna.

3:9 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, Pbzr uvgure, naq urne
gur jbeqf bs gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

3:10 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq, Urerol lr funyy xabj gung gur yvivat Tbq vf
nzbat lbh, naq gung ur jvyy jvgubhg snvy qevir bhg sebz orsber lbh gur
