Pnannavgrf, naq gur Uvggvgrf, naq gur Uvivgrf, naq gur Crevmmvgrf, naq
gur Tvetnfuvgrf, naq gur Nzbevgrf, naq gur Wrohfvgrf.

3:11 Orubyq, gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ bs nyy gur rnegu
cnffrgu bire orsber lbh vagb Wbeqna.

3:12 Abj gurersber gnxr lbh gjryir zra bhg bs gur gevorf bs Vfenry,
bhg bs rirel gevor n zna.

3:13 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, nf fbba nf gur fbyrf bs gur srrg bs
gur cevrfgf gung orne gur nex bs gur YBEQ, gur YBEQ bs nyy gur rnegu,
funyy erfg va gur jngref bs Wbeqna, gung gur jngref bs Wbeqna funyy or
phg bss sebz gur jngref gung pbzr qbja sebz nobir; naq gurl funyy
fgnaq hcba na urnc.

3:14 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur crbcyr erzbirq sebz gurve gragf, gb
cnff bire Wbeqna, naq gur cevrfgf ornevat gur nex bs gur pbiranag
orsber gur crbcyr; 3:15 Naq nf gurl gung oner gur nex jrer pbzr hagb
Wbeqna, naq gur srrg bs gur cevrfgf gung oner gur nex jrer qvccrq va
gur oevz bs gur jngre, (sbe Wbeqna biresybjrgu nyy uvf onaxf nyy gur
gvzr bs uneirfg,) 3:16 Gung gur jngref juvpu pnzr qbja sebz nobir
fgbbq naq ebfr hc hcba na urnc irel sne sebz gur pvgl Nqnz, gung vf
orfvqr Mnergna: naq gubfr gung pnzr qbja gbjneq gur frn bs gur cynva,
rira gur fnyg frn, snvyrq, naq jrer phg bss: naq gur crbcyr cnffrq
bire evtug ntnvafg Wrevpub.

3:17 Naq gur cevrfgf gung oner gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ
fgbbq svez ba qel tebhaq va gur zvqfg bs Wbeqna, naq nyy gur
Vfenryvgrf cnffrq bire ba qel tebhaq, hagvy nyy gur crbcyr jrer cnffrq
pyrna bire Wbeqna.

4:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura nyy gur crbcyr jrer pyrna cnffrq bire
Wbeqna, gung gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Wbfuhn, fnlvat, 4:2 Gnxr lbh gjryir
zra bhg bs gur crbcyr, bhg bs rirel gevor n zna, 4:3 Naq pbzznaq lr
gurz, fnlvat, Gnxr lbh urapr bhg bs gur zvqfg bs Wbeqna, bhg bs gur
cynpr jurer gur cevrfgf' srrg fgbbq svez, gjryir fgbarf, naq lr funyy
pneel gurz bire jvgu lbh, naq yrnir gurz va gur ybqtvat cynpr, jurer
lr funyy ybqtr guvf avtug.

4:4 Gura Wbfuhn pnyyrq gur gjryir zra, jubz ur unq cercnerq bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, bhg bs rirel gevor n zna: 4:5 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq hagb
gurz, Cnff bire orsber gur nex bs gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq vagb gur zvqfg bs
Wbeqna, naq gnxr lbh hc rirel zna bs lbh n fgbar hcba uvf fubhyqre,
nppbeqvat hagb gur ahzore bs gur gevorf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: 4:6
Gung guvf znl or n fvta nzbat lbh, gung jura lbhe puvyqera nfx gurve
snguref va gvzr gb pbzr, fnlvat, Jung zrna lr ol gurfr fgbarf?  4:7
Gura lr funyy nafjre gurz, Gung gur jngref bs Wbeqna jrer phg bss
orsber gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ; jura vg cnffrq bire
Wbeqna, gur jngref bs Wbeqna jrer phg bss: naq gurfr fgbarf funyy or
sbe n zrzbevny hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry sbe rire.

4:8 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq fb nf Wbfuhn pbzznaqrq, naq gbbx hc
gjryir fgbarf bhg bs gur zvqfg bs Wbeqna, nf gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb
Wbfuhn, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs gur gevorf bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, naq pneevrq gurz bire jvgu gurz hagb gur cynpr jurer gurl
ybqtrq, naq ynvq gurz qbja gurer.

4:9 Naq Wbfuhn frg hc gjryir fgbarf va gur zvqfg bs Wbeqna, va gur
cynpr jurer gur srrg bs gur cevrfgf juvpu oner gur nex bs gur pbiranag
fgbbq: naq gurl ner gurer hagb guvf qnl.

4:10 Sbe gur cevrfgf juvpu oner gur nex fgbbq va gur zvqfg bs Wbeqna,
hagvy rirelguvat jnf svavfurq gung gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Wbfuhn gb fcrnx
hagb gur crbcyr, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung Zbfrf pbzznaqrq Wbfuhn: naq gur
crbcyr unfgrq naq cnffrq bire.

4:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura nyy gur crbcyr jrer pyrna cnffrq bire,
gung gur nex bs gur YBEQ cnffrq bire, naq gur cevrfgf, va gur cerfrapr
bs gur crbcyr.

4:12 Naq gur puvyqera bs Erhora, naq gur puvyqera bs Tnq, naq unys gur
gevor bs Znanffru, cnffrq bire nezrq orsber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, nf
Zbfrf fcnxr hagb gurz: 4:13 Nobhg sbegl gubhfnaq cercnerq sbe jne
cnffrq bire orsber gur YBEQ hagb onggyr, gb gur cynvaf bs Wrevpub.

4:14 Ba gung qnl gur YBEQ zntavsvrq Wbfuhn va gur fvtug bs nyy Vfenry;
naq gurl srnerq uvz, nf gurl srnerq Zbfrf, nyy gur qnlf bs uvf yvsr.

4:15 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Wbfuhn, fnlvat, 4:16 Pbzznaq gur cevrfgf
gung orne gur nex bs gur grfgvzbal, gung gurl pbzr hc bhg bs Wbeqna.

4:17 Wbfuhn gurersber pbzznaqrq gur cevrfgf, fnlvat, Pbzr lr hc bhg bs
Wbeqna.

4:18 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur cevrfgf gung oner gur nex bs gur
pbiranag bs gur YBEQ jrer pbzr hc bhg bs gur zvqfg bs Wbeqna, naq gur
fbyrf bs gur cevrfgf' srrg jrer yvsgrq hc hagb gur qel ynaq, gung gur
jngref bs Wbeqna erghearq hagb gurve cynpr, naq sybjrq bire nyy uvf
onaxf, nf gurl qvq orsber.

4:19 Naq gur crbcyr pnzr hc bhg bs Wbeqna ba gur gragu qnl bs gur
svefg zbagu, naq rapnzcrq va Tvytny, va gur rnfg obeqre bs Wrevpub.

4:20 Naq gubfr gjryir fgbarf, juvpu gurl gbbx bhg bs Wbeqna, qvq
Wbfuhn cvgpu va Tvytny.

4:21 Naq ur fcnxr hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Jura lbhe
puvyqera funyy nfx gurve snguref va gvzr gb pbzr, fnlvat, Jung zrna
gurfr fgbarf?  4:22 Gura lr funyy yrg lbhe puvyqera xabj, fnlvat,
Vfenry pnzr bire guvf Wbeqna ba qel ynaq.

4:23 Sbe gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq qevrq hc gur jngref bs Wbeqna sebz orsber
lbh, hagvy lr jrer cnffrq bire, nf gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq qvq gb gur Erq
frn, juvpu ur qevrq hc sebz orsber hf, hagvy jr jrer tbar bire: 4:24
Gung nyy gur crbcyr bs gur rnegu zvtug xabj gur unaq bs gur YBEQ, gung
vg vf zvtugl: gung lr zvtug srne gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq sbe rire.

5:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura nyy gur xvatf bs gur Nzbevgrf, juvpu
jrer ba gur fvqr bs Wbeqna jrfgjneq, naq nyy gur xvatf bs gur
Pnannavgrf, juvpu jrer ol gur frn, urneq gung gur YBEQ unq qevrq hc
gur jngref bs Wbeqna sebz orsber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, hagvy jr jrer
cnffrq bire, gung gurve urneg zrygrq, arvgure jnf gurer fcvevg va gurz
nal zber, orpnhfr bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

5:2 Ng gung gvzr gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Znxr gurr funec xavirf,
naq pvephzpvfr ntnva gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gur frpbaq gvzr.

5:3 Naq Wbfuhn znqr uvz funec xavirf, naq pvephzpvfrq gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry ng gur uvyy bs gur sberfxvaf.

5:4 Naq guvf vf gur pnhfr jul Wbfuhn qvq pvephzpvfr: Nyy gur crbcyr
gung pnzr bhg bs Rtlcg, gung jrer znyrf, rira nyy gur zra bs jne, qvrq
va gur jvyqrearff ol gur jnl, nsgre gurl pnzr bhg bs Rtlcg.

5:5 Abj nyy gur crbcyr gung pnzr bhg jrer pvephzpvfrq: ohg nyy gur
crbcyr gung jrer obea va gur jvyqrearff ol gur jnl nf gurl pnzr sbegu
bhg bs Rtlcg, gurz gurl unq abg pvephzpvfrq.

5:6 Sbe gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jnyxrq sbegl lrnef va gur jvyqrearff,
gvyy nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer zra bs jne, juvpu pnzr bhg bs Rtlcg,
jrer pbafhzrq, orpnhfr gurl borlrq abg gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ: hagb
jubz gur YBEQ fjner gung ur jbhyq abg furj gurz gur ynaq, juvpu gur
YBEQ fjner hagb gurve snguref gung ur jbhyq tvir hf, n ynaq gung
sybjrgu jvgu zvyx naq ubarl.

5:7 Naq gurve puvyqera, jubz ur envfrq hc va gurve fgrnq, gurz Wbfuhn
pvephzpvfrq: sbe gurl jrer hapvephzpvfrq, orpnhfr gurl unq abg
pvephzpvfrq gurz ol gur jnl.

5:8 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gurl unq qbar pvephzpvfvat nyy gur
crbcyr, gung gurl nobqr va gurve cynprf va gur pnzc, gvyy gurl jrer
jubyr.

5:9 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Guvf qnl unir V ebyyrq njnl gur
ercebnpu bs Rtlcg sebz bss lbh. Jurersber gur anzr bs gur cynpr vf
pnyyrq Tvytny hagb guvf qnl.

5:10 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry rapnzcrq va Tvytny, naq xrcg gur
cnffbire ba gur sbhegrragu qnl bs gur zbagu ng rira va gur cynvaf bs
Wrevpub.

5:11 Naq gurl qvq rng bs gur byq pbea bs gur ynaq ba gur zbeebj nsgre
gur cnffbire, hayrnirarq pnxrf, naq cnepurq pbea va gur frysfnzr qnl.

5:12 Naq gur znaan prnfrq ba gur zbeebj nsgre gurl unq rngra bs gur
byq pbea bs gur ynaq; arvgure unq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry znaan nal
zber; ohg gurl qvq rng bs gur sehvg bs gur ynaq bs Pnanna gung lrne.

5:13 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Wbfuhn jnf ol Wrevpub, gung ur yvsgrq
hc uvf rlrf naq ybbxrq, naq, orubyq, gurer fgbbq n zna bire ntnvafg
uvz jvgu uvf fjbeq qenja va uvf unaq: naq Wbfuhn jrag hagb uvz, naq
fnvq hagb uvz, Neg gubh sbe hf, be sbe bhe nqirefnevrf?  5:14 Naq ur
fnvq, Anl; ohg nf pncgnva bs gur ubfg bs gur YBEQ nz V abj pbzr. Naq
Wbfuhn sryy ba uvf snpr gb gur rnegu, naq qvq jbefuvc, naq fnvq hagb
uvz, Jung fnvgu zl Ybeq hagb uvf freinag?  5:15 Naq gur pncgnva bs gur
YBEQ'f ubfg fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Ybbfr gul fubr sebz bss gul sbbg; sbe
gur cynpr jurerba gubh fgnaqrfg vf ubyl. Naq Wbfuhn qvq fb.

6:1 Abj Wrevpub jnf fgenvgyl fuhg hc orpnhfr bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry: abar jrag bhg, naq abar pnzr va.

6:2 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Frr, V unir tvira vagb guvar unaq
Wrevpub, naq gur xvat gurerbs, naq gur zvtugl zra bs inybhe.

6:3 Naq lr funyy pbzcnff gur pvgl, nyy lr zra bs jne, naq tb ebhaq
nobhg gur pvgl bapr. Guhf funyg gubh qb fvk qnlf.

6:4 Naq frira cevrfgf funyy orne orsber gur nex frira gehzcrgf bs
enzf' ubeaf: naq gur friragu qnl lr funyy pbzcnff gur pvgl frira
gvzrf, naq gur cevrfgf funyy oybj jvgu gur gehzcrgf.

6:5 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung jura gurl znxr n ybat oynfg jvgu
gur enz'f ubea, naq jura lr urne gur fbhaq bs gur gehzcrg, nyy gur
crbcyr funyy fubhg jvgu n terng fubhg; naq gur jnyy bs gur pvgl funyy
snyy qbja syng, naq gur crbcyr funyy nfpraq hc rirel zna fgenvtug
orsber uvz.

6:6 Naq Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha pnyyrq gur cevrfgf, naq fnvq hagb gurz,
Gnxr hc gur nex bs gur pbiranag, naq yrg frira cevrfgf orne frira
gehzcrgf bs enzf' ubeaf orsber gur nex bs gur YBEQ.

6:7 Naq ur fnvq hagb gur crbcyr, Cnff ba, naq pbzcnff gur pvgl, naq
yrg uvz gung vf nezrq cnff ba orsber gur nex bs gur YBEQ.

6:8 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Wbfuhn unq fcbxra hagb gur crbcyr, gung
gur frira cevrfgf ornevat gur frira gehzcrgf bs enzf' ubeaf cnffrq ba
orsber gur YBEQ, naq oyrj jvgu gur gehzcrgf: naq gur nex bs gur
pbiranag bs gur YBEQ sbyybjrq gurz.

6:9 Naq gur nezrq zra jrag orsber gur cevrfgf gung oyrj jvgu gur
gehzcrgf, naq gur ererjneq pnzr nsgre gur nex, gur cevrfgf tbvat ba,
naq oybjvat jvgu gur gehzcrgf.

6:10 Naq Wbfuhn unq pbzznaqrq gur crbcyr, fnlvat, Lr funyy abg fubhg,
abe znxr nal abvfr jvgu lbhe ibvpr, arvgure funyy nal jbeq cebprrq bhg
bs lbhe zbhgu, hagvy gur qnl V ovq lbh fubhg; gura funyy lr fubhg.

6:11 Fb gur nex bs gur YBEQ pbzcnffrq gur pvgl, tbvat nobhg vg bapr:
naq gurl pnzr vagb gur pnzc, naq ybqtrq va gur pnzc.

6:12 Naq Wbfuhn ebfr rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq gur cevrfgf gbbx hc gur
nex bs gur YBEQ.

6:13 Naq frira cevrfgf ornevat frira gehzcrgf bs enzf' ubeaf orsber
gur nex bs gur YBEQ jrag ba pbagvahnyyl, naq oyrj jvgu gur gehzcrgf:
naq gur nezrq zra jrag orsber gurz; ohg gur ererjneq pnzr nsgre gur
nex bs gur YBEQ, gur cevrfgf tbvat ba, naq oybjvat jvgu gur gehzcrgf.

6:14 Naq gur frpbaq qnl gurl pbzcnffrq gur pvgl bapr, naq erghearq
vagb gur pnzc: fb gurl qvq fvk qnlf.

6:15 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur friragu qnl, gung gurl ebfr rneyl
nobhg gur qnjavat bs gur qnl, naq pbzcnffrq gur pvgl nsgre gur fnzr
znaare frira gvzrf: bayl ba gung qnl gurl pbzcnffrq gur pvgl frira
gvzrf.

6:16 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur friragu gvzr, jura gur cevrfgf oyrj
jvgu gur gehzcrgf, Wbfuhn fnvq hagb gur crbcyr, Fubhg; sbe gur YBEQ
ungu tvira lbh gur pvgl.

6:17 Naq gur pvgl funyy or npphefrq, rira vg, naq nyy gung ner
gurerva, gb gur YBEQ: bayl Enuno gur uneybg funyy yvir, fur naq nyy
gung ner jvgu ure va gur ubhfr, orpnhfr fur uvq gur zrffratref gung jr
frag.

6:18 Naq lr, va nal jvfr xrrc lbhefryirf sebz gur npphefrq guvat, yrfg
lr znxr lbhefryirf npphefrq, jura lr gnxr bs gur npphefrq guvat, naq
znxr gur pnzc bs Vfenry n phefr, naq gebhoyr vg.

6:19 Ohg nyy gur fvyire, naq tbyq, naq irffryf bs oenff naq veba, ner
pbafrpengrq hagb gur YBEQ: gurl funyy pbzr vagb gur gernfhel bs gur
YBEQ.

6:20 Fb gur crbcyr fubhgrq jura gur cevrfgf oyrj jvgu gur gehzcrgf:
naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur crbcyr urneq gur fbhaq bs gur gehzcrg,
naq gur crbcyr fubhgrq jvgu n terng fubhg, gung gur jnyy sryy qbja
syng, fb gung gur crbcyr jrag hc vagb gur pvgl, rirel zna fgenvtug
orsber uvz, naq gurl gbbx gur pvgl.

6:21 Naq gurl hggreyl qrfgeblrq nyy gung jnf va gur pvgl, obgu zna naq
jbzna, lbhat naq byq, naq bk, naq furrc, naq nff, jvgu gur rqtr bs gur
fjbeq.

6:22 Ohg Wbfuhn unq fnvq hagb gur gjb zra gung unq fcvrq bhg gur
pbhagel, Tb vagb gur uneybg'f ubhfr, naq oevat bhg gurapr gur jbzna,
naq nyy gung fur ungu, nf lr fjner hagb ure.

6:23 Naq gur lbhat zra gung jrer fcvrf jrag va, naq oebhtug bhg Enuno,
naq ure sngure, naq ure zbgure, naq ure oerguera, naq nyy gung fur
unq; naq gurl oebhtug bhg nyy ure xvaqerq, naq yrsg gurz jvgubhg gur
pnzc bs Vfenry.

6:24 Naq gurl oheag gur pvgl jvgu sver, naq nyy gung jnf gurerva: bayl
gur fvyire, naq gur tbyq, naq gur irffryf bs oenff naq bs veba, gurl
chg vagb gur gernfhel bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

6:25 Naq Wbfuhn fnirq Enuno gur uneybg nyvir, naq ure sngure'f
ubhfrubyq, naq nyy gung fur unq; naq fur qjryyrgu va Vfenry rira hagb
guvf qnl; orpnhfr fur uvq gur zrffratref, juvpu Wbfuhn frag gb fcl bhg
Wrevpub.

6:26 Naq Wbfuhn nqwherq gurz ng gung gvzr, fnlvat, Phefrq or gur zna
orsber gur YBEQ, gung evfrgu hc naq ohvyqrgu guvf pvgl Wrevpub: ur
funyy ynl gur sbhaqngvba gurerbs va uvf svefgobea, naq va uvf lbhatrfg
fba funyy ur frg hc gur tngrf bs vg.

6:27 Fb gur YBEQ jnf jvgu Wbfuhn; naq uvf snzr jnf abvfrq guebhtubhg
nyy gur pbhagel.

7:1 Ohg gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pbzzvggrq n gerfcnff va gur npphefrq
guvat: sbe Npuna, gur fba bs Pnezv, gur fba bs Mnoqv, gur fba bs
Mrenu, bs gur gevor bs Whqnu, gbbx bs gur npphefrq guvat: naq gur
natre bs gur YBEQ jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

7:2 Naq Wbfuhn frag zra sebz Wrevpub gb Nv, juvpu vf orfvqr Orgunira,
ba gur rnfg bs Orgury, naq fcnxr hagb gurz, fnlvat, Tb hc naq ivrj gur
pbhagel.

Naq gur zra jrag hc naq ivrjrq Nv.

7:3 Naq gurl erghearq gb Wbfuhn, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Yrg abg nyy gur
crbcyr tb hc; ohg yrg nobhg gjb be guerr gubhfnaq zra tb hc naq fzvgr
Nv; naq znxr abg nyy gur crbcyr gb ynobhe guvgure; sbe gurl ner ohg
srj.

7:4 Fb gurer jrag hc guvgure bs gur crbcyr nobhg guerr gubhfnaq zra:
naq gurl syrq orsber gur zra bs Nv.

7:5 Naq gur zra bs Nv fzbgr bs gurz nobhg guvegl naq fvk zra: sbe gurl
punfrq gurz sebz orsber gur tngr rira hagb Furonevz, naq fzbgr gurz va
gur tbvat qbja: jurersber gur urnegf bs gur crbcyr zrygrq, naq orpnzr
nf jngre.

7:6 Naq Wbfuhn erag uvf pybgurf, naq sryy gb gur rnegu hcba uvf snpr
orsber gur nex bs gur YBEQ hagvy gur riragvqr, ur naq gur ryqref bs
Vfenry, naq chg qhfg hcba gurve urnqf.

7:7 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq, Nynf, B YBEQ Tbq, jurersber unfg gubh ng nyy
oebhtug guvf crbcyr bire Wbeqna, gb qryvire hf vagb gur unaq bs gur
Nzbevgrf, gb qrfgebl hf? jbhyq gb Tbq jr unq orra pbagrag, naq qjryg
ba gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna!  7:8 B YBEQ, jung funyy V fnl, jura Vfenry
gheargu gurve onpxf orsber gurve rarzvrf!  7:9 Sbe gur Pnannavgrf naq
nyy gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq funyy urne bs vg, naq funyy raiveba hf
ebhaq, naq phg bss bhe anzr sebz gur rnegu: naq jung jvyg gubh qb hagb
gul terng anzr?  7:10 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Trg gurr hc;
jurersber yvrfg gubh guhf hcba gul snpr?  7:11 Vfenry ungu fvaarq, naq
gurl unir nyfb genafterffrq zl pbiranag juvpu V pbzznaqrq gurz: sbe
gurl unir rira gnxra bs gur npphefrq guvat, naq unir nyfb fgbyra, naq
qvffrzoyrq nyfb, naq gurl unir chg vg rira nzbat gurve bja fghss.

7:12 Gurersber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pbhyq abg fgnaq orsber gurve
rarzvrf, ohg ghearq gurve onpxf orsber gurve rarzvrf, orpnhfr gurl
jrer npphefrq: arvgure jvyy V or jvgu lbh nal zber, rkprcg lr qrfgebl
gur npphefrq sebz nzbat lbh.

7:13 Hc, fnapgvsl gur crbcyr, naq fnl, Fnapgvsl lbhefryirf ntnvafg gb
zbeebj: sbe guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, Gurer vf na npphefrq
guvat va gur zvqfg bs gurr, B Vfenry: gubh pnafg abg fgnaq orsber
guvar rarzvrf, hagvy lr gnxr njnl gur npphefrq guvat sebz nzbat lbh.

7:14 Va gur zbeavat gurersber lr funyy or oebhtug nppbeqvat gb lbhe
gevorf: naq vg funyy or, gung gur gevor juvpu gur YBEQ gnxrgu funyy
pbzr nppbeqvat gb gur snzvyvrf gurerbs; naq gur snzvyl juvpu gur YBEQ
funyy gnxr funyy pbzr ol ubhfrubyqf; naq gur ubhfrubyq juvpu gur YBEQ
funyy gnxr funyy pbzr zna ol zna.

7:15 Naq vg funyy or, gung ur gung vf gnxra jvgu gur npphefrq guvat
funyy or oheag jvgu sver, ur naq nyy gung ur ungu: orpnhfr ur ungu
genafterffrq gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ, naq orpnhfr ur ungu jebhtug
sbyyl va Vfenry.

7:16 Fb Wbfuhn ebfr hc rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq oebhtug Vfenry ol
gurve gevorf; naq gur gevor bs Whqnu jnf gnxra: 7:17 Naq ur oebhtug
gur snzvyl bs Whqnu; naq ur gbbx gur snzvyl bs gur Mneuvgrf: naq ur
oebhtug gur snzvyl bs gur Mneuvgrf zna ol zna; naq Mnoqv jnf gnxra:
7:18 Naq ur oebhtug uvf ubhfrubyq zna ol zna; naq Npuna, gur fba bs
Pnezv, gur fba bs Mnoqv, gur fba bs Mrenu, bs gur gevor bs Whqnu, jnf
gnxra.

7:19 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq hagb Npuna, Zl fba, tvir, V cenl gurr, tybel gb
gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, naq znxr pbasrffvba hagb uvz; naq gryy zr abj
jung gubh unfg qbar; uvqr vg abg sebz zr.

7:20 Naq Npuna nafjrerq Wbfuhn, naq fnvq, Vaqrrq V unir fvaarq ntnvafg
gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, naq guhf naq guhf unir V qbar: 7:21 Jura V fnj
nzbat gur fcbvyf n tbbqyl Onolybavfu tnezrag, naq gjb uhaqerq furxryf
bs fvyire, naq n jrqtr bs tbyq bs svsgl furxryf jrvtug, gura V pbirgrq
gurz, naq gbbx gurz; naq, orubyq, gurl ner uvq va gur rnegu va gur
zvqfg bs zl grag, naq gur fvyire haqre vg.

7:22 Fb Wbfuhn frag zrffratref, naq gurl ena hagb gur grag; naq,
orubyq, vg jnf uvq va uvf grag, naq gur fvyire haqre vg.

7:23 Naq gurl gbbx gurz bhg bs gur zvqfg bs gur grag, naq oebhtug gurz
hagb Wbfuhn, naq hagb nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq ynvq gurz bhg
orsber gur YBEQ.

7:24 Naq Wbfuhn, naq nyy Vfenry jvgu uvz, gbbx Npuna gur fba bs Mrenu,
naq gur fvyire, naq gur tnezrag, naq gur jrqtr bs tbyq, naq uvf fbaf,
naq uvf qnhtugref, naq uvf bkra, naq uvf nffrf, naq uvf furrc, naq uvf
grag, naq nyy gung ur unq: naq gurl oebhtug gurz hagb gur inyyrl bs
Npube.

7:25 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq, Jul unfg gubh gebhoyrq hf? gur YBEQ funyy
gebhoyr gurr guvf qnl. Naq nyy Vfenry fgbarq uvz jvgu fgbarf, naq
ohearq gurz jvgu sver, nsgre gurl unq fgbarq gurz jvgu fgbarf.

7:26 Naq gurl envfrq bire uvz n terng urnc bs fgbarf hagb guvf qnl. Fb
gur YBEQ ghearq sebz gur svreprarff bs uvf natre. Jurersber gur anzr
bs gung cynpr jnf pnyyrq, Gur inyyrl bs Npube, hagb guvf qnl.

8:1 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Srne abg, arvgure or gubh qvfznlrq:
gnxr nyy gur crbcyr bs jne jvgu gurr, naq nevfr, tb hc gb Nv: frr, V
unir tvira vagb gul unaq gur xvat bs Nv, naq uvf crbcyr, naq uvf pvgl,
naq uvf ynaq: 8:2 Naq gubh funyg qb gb Nv naq ure xvat nf gubh qvqfg
hagb Wrevpub naq ure xvat: bayl gur fcbvy gurerbs, naq gur pnggyr
gurerbs, funyy lr gnxr sbe n cerl hagb lbhefryirf: ynl gurr na nzohfu
sbe gur pvgl oruvaq vg.

8:3 Fb Wbfuhn nebfr, naq nyy gur crbcyr bs jne, gb tb hc ntnvafg Nv:
naq Wbfuhn pubfr bhg guvegl gubhfnaq zvtugl zra bs inybhe, naq frag
gurz njnl ol avtug.

8:4 Naq ur pbzznaqrq gurz, fnlvat, Orubyq, lr funyy yvr va jnvg
ntnvafg gur pvgl, rira oruvaq gur pvgl: tb abg irel sne sebz gur pvgl,
ohg or lr nyy ernql: 8:5 Naq V, naq nyy gur crbcyr gung ner jvgu zr,
jvyy nccebnpu hagb gur pvgl: naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura gurl pbzr
bhg ntnvafg hf, nf ng gur svefg, gung jr jvyy syrr orsber gurz, 8:6
(Sbe gurl jvyy pbzr bhg nsgre hf) gvyy jr unir qenja gurz sebz gur
pvgl; sbe gurl jvyy fnl, Gurl syrr orsber hf, nf ng gur svefg:
gurersber jr jvyy syrr orsber gurz.

8:7 Gura lr funyy evfr hc sebz gur nzohfu, naq frvmr hcba gur pvgl:
sbe gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq jvyy qryvire vg vagb lbhe unaq.

8:8 Naq vg funyy or, jura lr unir gnxra gur pvgl, gung lr funyy frg
gur pvgl ba sver: nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ funyy lr
qb. Frr, V unir pbzznaqrq lbh.

8:9 Wbfuhn gurersber frag gurz sbegu: naq gurl jrag gb yvr va nzohfu,
naq nobqr orgjrra Orgury naq Nv, ba gur jrfg fvqr bs Nv: ohg Wbfuhn
ybqtrq gung avtug nzbat gur crbcyr.

8:10 Naq Wbfuhn ebfr hc rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq ahzorerq gur crbcyr,
naq jrag hc, ur naq gur ryqref bs Vfenry, orsber gur crbcyr gb Nv.

8:11 Naq nyy gur crbcyr, rira gur crbcyr bs jne gung jrer jvgu uvz,
jrag hc, naq qerj avtu, naq pnzr orsber gur pvgl, naq cvgpurq ba gur
abegu fvqr bs Nv: abj gurer jnf n inyyrl orgjrra gurz naq Nv.

8:12 Naq ur gbbx nobhg svir gubhfnaq zra, naq frg gurz gb yvr va
nzohfu orgjrra Orgury naq Nv, ba gur jrfg fvqr bs gur pvgl.

8:13 Naq jura gurl unq frg gur crbcyr, rira nyy gur ubfg gung jnf ba
gur abegu bs gur pvgl, naq gurve yvref va jnvg ba gur jrfg bs gur
pvgl, Wbfuhn jrag gung avtug vagb gur zvqfg bs gur inyyrl.

8:14 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur xvat bs Nv fnj vg, gung gurl unfgrq
naq ebfr hc rneyl, naq gur zra bs gur pvgl jrag bhg ntnvafg Vfenry gb
onggyr, ur naq nyy uvf crbcyr, ng n gvzr nccbvagrq, orsber gur cynva;
ohg ur jvfg abg gung gurer jrer yvref va nzohfu ntnvafg uvz oruvaq gur
pvgl.

8:15 Naq Wbfuhn naq nyy Vfenry znqr nf vs gurl jrer orngra orsber
gurz, naq syrq ol gur jnl bs gur jvyqrearff.

8:16 Naq nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer va Nv jrer pnyyrq gbtrgure gb chefhr
nsgre gurz: naq gurl chefhrq nsgre Wbfuhn, naq jrer qenja njnl sebz
gur pvgl.

8:17 Naq gurer jnf abg n zna yrsg va Nv be Orgury, gung jrag abg bhg
nsgre Vfenry: naq gurl yrsg gur pvgl bcra, naq chefhrq nsgre Vfenry.

8:18 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Fgergpu bhg gur fcrne gung vf va
gul unaq gbjneq Nv; sbe V jvyy tvir vg vagb guvar unaq. Naq Wbfuhn
fgergpurq bhg gur fcrne gung ur unq va uvf unaq gbjneq gur pvgl.

8:19 Naq gur nzohfu nebfr dhvpxyl bhg bs gurve cynpr, naq gurl ena nf
fbba nf ur unq fgergpurq bhg uvf unaq: naq gurl ragrerq vagb gur pvgl,
naq gbbx vg, naq unfgrq naq frg gur pvgl ba sver.

8:20 Naq jura gur zra bs Nv ybbxrq oruvaq gurz, gurl fnj, naq, orubyq,
gur fzbxr bs gur pvgl nfpraqrq hc gb urnira, naq gurl unq ab cbjre gb
syrr guvf jnl be gung jnl: naq gur crbcyr gung syrq gb gur jvyqrearff
ghearq onpx hcba gur chefhref.

8:21 Naq jura Wbfuhn naq nyy Vfenry fnj gung gur nzohfu unq gnxra gur
pvgl, naq gung gur fzbxr bs gur pvgl nfpraqrq, gura gurl ghearq ntnva,
naq fyrj gur zra bs Nv.

8:22 Naq gur bgure vffhrq bhg bs gur pvgl ntnvafg gurz; fb gurl jrer
va gur zvqfg bs Vfenry, fbzr ba guvf fvqr, naq fbzr ba gung fvqr: naq
gurl fzbgr gurz, fb gung gurl yrg abar bs gurz erznva be rfpncr.

8:23 Naq gur xvat bs Nv gurl gbbx nyvir, naq oebhtug uvz gb Wbfuhn.

8:24 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Vfenry unq znqr na raq bs fynlvat nyy
gur vaunovgnagf bs Nv va gur svryq, va gur jvyqrearff jurerva gurl
punfrq gurz, naq jura gurl jrer nyy snyyra ba gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq,
hagvy gurl jrer pbafhzrq, gung nyy gur Vfenryvgrf erghearq hagb Nv,
naq fzbgr vg jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq.

8:25 Naq fb vg jnf, gung nyy gung sryy gung qnl, obgu bs zra naq
jbzra, jrer gjryir gubhfnaq, rira nyy gur zra bs Nv.

8:26 Sbe Wbfuhn qerj abg uvf unaq onpx, jurerjvgu ur fgergpurq bhg gur
fcrne, hagvy ur unq hggreyl qrfgeblrq nyy gur vaunovgnagf bs Nv.

8:27 Bayl gur pnggyr naq gur fcbvy bs gung pvgl Vfenry gbbx sbe n cerl
hagb gurzfryirf, nppbeqvat hagb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ juvpu ur
pbzznaqrq Wbfuhn.

8:28 Naq Wbfuhn oheag Nv, naq znqr vg na urnc sbe rire, rira n
qrfbyngvba hagb guvf qnl.

8:29 Naq gur xvat bs Nv ur unatrq ba n gerr hagvy riragvqr: naq nf
fbba nf gur fha jnf qbja, Wbfuhn pbzznaqrq gung gurl fubhyq gnxr uvf
pnepnfr qbja sebz gur gerr, naq pnfg vg ng gur ragrevat bs gur tngr bs
gur pvgl, naq envfr gurerba n terng urnc bs fgbarf, gung erznvargu
hagb guvf qnl.

8:30 Gura Wbfuhn ohvyg na nygne hagb gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry va zbhag
Rony, 8:31 Nf Zbfrf gur freinag bs gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, nf vg vf jevggra va gur obbx bs gur ynj bs Zbfrf, na nygne bs
jubyr fgbarf, bire juvpu ab zna ungu yvsg hc nal veba: naq gurl
bssrerq gurerba oheag bssrevatf hagb gur YBEQ, naq fnpevsvprq crnpr
bssrevatf.

8:32 Naq ur jebgr gurer hcba gur fgbarf n pbcl bs gur ynj bs Zbfrf,
juvpu ur jebgr va gur cerfrapr bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

8:33 Naq nyy Vfenry, naq gurve ryqref, naq bssvpref, naq gurve whqtrf,
fgbbq ba guvf fvqr gur nex naq ba gung fvqr orsber gur cevrfgf gur
Yrivgrf, juvpu oner gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ, nf jryy gur
fgenatre, nf ur gung jnf obea nzbat gurz; unys bs gurz bire ntnvafg
zbhag Trevmvz, naq unys bs gurz bire ntnvafg zbhag Rony; nf Zbfrf gur
freinag bs gur YBEQ unq pbzznaqrq orsber, gung gurl fubhyq oyrff gur
crbcyr bs Vfenry.

8:34 Naq nsgrejneq ur ernq nyy gur jbeqf bs gur ynj, gur oyrffvatf naq
phefvatf, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung vf jevggra va gur obbx bs gur ynj.

8:35 Gurer jnf abg n jbeq bs nyy gung Zbfrf pbzznaqrq, juvpu Wbfuhn
ernq abg orsber nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry, jvgu gur jbzra, naq
gur yvggyr barf, naq gur fgenatref gung jrer pbairefnag nzbat gurz.

9:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura nyy gur xvatf juvpu jrer ba guvf fvqr
Wbeqna, va gur uvyyf, naq va gur inyyrlf, naq va nyy gur pbnfgf bs gur
terng frn bire ntnvafg Yronaba, gur Uvggvgr, naq gur Nzbevgr, gur
Pnannavgr, gur Crevmmvgr, gur Uvivgr, naq gur Wrohfvgr, urneq gurerbs;
9:2 Gung gurl tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure, gb svtug jvgu Wbfuhn naq
jvgu Vfenry, jvgu bar nppbeq.

9:3 Naq jura gur vaunovgnagf bs Tvorba urneq jung Wbfuhn unq qbar hagb
Wrevpub naq gb Nv, 9:4 Gurl qvq jbex jvyvyl, naq jrag naq znqr nf vs
gurl unq orra nzonffnqbef, naq gbbx byq fnpxf hcba gurve nffrf, naq
jvar obggyrf, byq, naq erag, naq obhaq hc; 9:5 Naq byq fubrf naq
pybhgrq hcba gurve srrg, naq byq tnezragf hcba gurz; naq nyy gur oernq
bs gurve cebivfvba jnf qel naq zbhyql.

9:6 Naq gurl jrag gb Wbfuhn hagb gur pnzc ng Tvytny, naq fnvq hagb
uvz, naq gb gur zra bs Vfenry, Jr or pbzr sebz n sne pbhagel: abj
gurersber znxr lr n yrnthr jvgu hf.

9:7 Naq gur zra bs Vfenry fnvq hagb gur Uvivgrf, Crenqiragher lr qjryy
nzbat hf; naq ubj funyy jr znxr n yrnthr jvgu lbh?  9:8 Naq gurl fnvq
hagb Wbfuhn, Jr ner gul freinagf. Naq Wbfuhn fnvq hagb gurz, Jub ner
lr? naq sebz jurapr pbzr lr?  9:9 Naq gurl fnvq hagb uvz, Sebz n irel
sne pbhagel gul freinagf ner pbzr orpnhfr bs gur anzr bs gur YBEQ gul
Tbq: sbe jr unir urneq gur snzr bs uvz, naq nyy gung ur qvq va Rtlcg,
9:10 Naq nyy gung ur qvq gb gur gjb xvatf bs gur Nzbevgrf, gung jrer
orlbaq Wbeqna, gb Fvuba xvat bs Urfuoba, naq gb Bt xvat bs Onfuna,
juvpu jnf ng Nfugnebgu.

9:11 Jurersber bhe ryqref naq nyy gur vaunovgnagf bs bhe pbhagel fcnxr
gb hf, fnlvat, Gnxr ivpghnyf jvgu lbh sbe gur wbhearl, naq tb gb zrrg
gurz, naq fnl hagb gurz, Jr ner lbhe freinagf: gurersber abj znxr lr n
yrnthr jvgu hf.

9:12 Guvf bhe oernq jr gbbx ubg sbe bhe cebivfvba bhg bs bhe ubhfrf ba
gur qnl jr pnzr sbegu gb tb hagb lbh; ohg abj, orubyq, vg vf qel, naq
vg vf zbhyql: 9:13 Naq gurfr obggyrf bs jvar, juvpu jr svyyrq, jrer
arj; naq, orubyq, gurl or erag: naq gurfr bhe tnezragf naq bhe fubrf
ner orpbzr byq ol ernfba bs gur irel ybat wbhearl.

9:14 Naq gur zra gbbx bs gurve ivpghnyf, naq nfxrq abg pbhafry ng gur
zbhgu bs gur YBEQ.

9:15 Naq Wbfuhn znqr crnpr jvgu gurz, naq znqr n yrnthr jvgu gurz, gb
yrg gurz yvir: naq gur cevaprf bs gur pbatertngvba fjner hagb gurz.

9:16 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur raq bs guerr qnlf nsgre gurl unq znqr
n yrnthr jvgu gurz, gung gurl urneq gung gurl jrer gurve arvtuobhef,
naq gung gurl qjryg nzbat gurz.

9:17 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry wbhearlrq, naq pnzr hagb gurve pvgvrf
ba gur guveq qnl. Abj gurve pvgvrf jrer Tvorba, naq Purcuvenu, naq
Orrebgu, naq Xvewnguwrnevz.

9:18 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fzbgr gurz abg, orpnhfr gur cevaprf bs
gur pbatertngvba unq fjbea hagb gurz ol gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry. Naq
nyy gur pbatertngvba zhezherq ntnvafg gur cevaprf.

9:19 Ohg nyy gur cevaprf fnvq hagb nyy gur pbatertngvba, Jr unir fjbea
hagb gurz ol gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry: abj gurersber jr znl abg gbhpu
gurz.

9:20 Guvf jr jvyy qb gb gurz; jr jvyy rira yrg gurz yvir, yrfg jengu
or hcba hf, orpnhfr bs gur bngu juvpu jr fjner hagb gurz.

9:21 Naq gur cevaprf fnvq hagb gurz, Yrg gurz yvir; ohg yrg gurz or
urjref bs jbbq naq qenjref bs jngre hagb nyy gur pbatertngvba; nf gur
cevaprf unq cebzvfrq gurz.

9:22 Naq Wbfuhn pnyyrq sbe gurz, naq ur fcnxr hagb gurz, fnlvat,
Jurersber unir lr orthvyrq hf, fnlvat, Jr ner irel sne sebz lbh; jura
lr qjryy nzbat hf?  9:23 Abj gurersber lr ner phefrq, naq gurer funyy
abar bs lbh or serrq sebz orvat obaqzra, naq urjref bs jbbq naq
qenjref bs jngre sbe gur ubhfr bs zl Tbq.

9:24 Naq gurl nafjrerq Wbfuhn, naq fnvq, Orpnhfr vg jnf pregnvayl gbyq
gul freinagf, ubj gung gur YBEQ gul Tbq pbzznaqrq uvf freinag Zbfrf gb
tvir lbh nyy gur ynaq, naq gb qrfgebl nyy gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq
sebz orsber lbh, gurersber jr jrer fber nsenvq bs bhe yvirf orpnhfr bs
lbh, naq unir qbar guvf guvat.

9:25 Naq abj, orubyq, jr ner va guvar unaq: nf vg frrzrgu tbbq naq
evtug hagb gurr gb qb hagb hf, qb.

9:26 Naq fb qvq ur hagb gurz, naq qryvirerq gurz bhg bs gur unaq bs
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung gurl fyrj gurz abg.

9:27 Naq Wbfuhn znqr gurz gung qnl urjref bs jbbq naq qenjref bs jngre
sbe gur pbatertngvba, naq sbe gur nygne bs gur YBEQ, rira hagb guvf
qnl, va gur cynpr juvpu ur fubhyq pubbfr.

10:1 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Nqbavmrqrp xvat bs Wrehfnyrz unq urneq
ubj Wbfuhn unq gnxra Nv, naq unq hggreyl qrfgeblrq vg; nf ur unq qbar
gb Wrevpub naq ure xvat, fb ur unq qbar gb Nv naq ure xvat; naq ubj
gur vaunovgnagf bs Tvorba unq znqr crnpr jvgu Vfenry, naq jrer nzbat
gurz; 10:2 Gung gurl srnerq terngyl, orpnhfr Tvorba jnf n terng pvgl,
nf bar bs gur eblny pvgvrf, naq orpnhfr vg jnf terngre guna Nv, naq
nyy gur zra gurerbs jrer zvtugl.

10:3 Jurersber Nqbavmrqrp xvat bs Wrehfnyrz, frag hagb Ubunz xvat bs
Uroeba, naq hagb Cvenz xvat bs Wnezhgu, naq hagb Wncuvn xvat bs
Ynpuvfu, naq hagb Qrove xvat bs Rtyba, fnlvat, 10:4 Pbzr hc hagb zr,
naq uryc zr, gung jr znl fzvgr Tvorba: sbe vg ungu znqr crnpr jvgu
Wbfuhn naq jvgu gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

10:5 Gurersber gur svir xvatf bs gur Nzbevgrf, gur xvat bs Wrehfnyrz,
gur xvat bs Uroeba, gur xvat bs Wnezhgu, gur xvat bs Ynpuvfu, gur xvat
bs Rtyba, tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure, naq jrag hc, gurl naq nyy
gurve ubfgf, naq rapnzcrq orsber Tvorba, naq znqr jne ntnvafg vg.

10:6 Naq gur zra bs Tvorba frag hagb Wbfuhn gb gur pnzc gb Tvytny,
fnlvat, Fynpx abg gul unaq sebz gul freinagf; pbzr hc gb hf dhvpxyl,
naq fnir hf, naq uryc hf: sbe nyy gur xvatf bs gur Nzbevgrf gung qjryy
va gur zbhagnvaf ner tngurerq gbtrgure ntnvafg hf.

10:7 Fb Wbfuhn nfpraqrq sebz Tvytny, ur, naq nyy gur crbcyr bs jne
jvgu uvz, naq nyy gur zvtugl zra bs inybhe.

10:8 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Srne gurz abg: sbe V unir
qryvirerq gurz vagb guvar unaq; gurer funyy abg n zna bs gurz fgnaq
orsber gurr.

10:9 Wbfuhn gurersber pnzr hagb gurz fhqqrayl, naq jrag hc sebz Tvytny
nyy avtug.

10:10 Naq gur YBEQ qvfpbzsvgrq gurz orsber Vfenry, naq fyrj gurz jvgu
n terng fynhtugre ng Tvorba, naq punfrq gurz nybat gur jnl gung tbrgu
hc gb Orguubeba, naq fzbgr gurz gb Nmrxnu, naq hagb Znxxrqnu.

10:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf gurl syrq sebz orsber Vfenry, naq jrer
va gur tbvat qbja gb Orguubeba, gung gur YBEQ pnfg qbja terng fgbarf
sebz urnira hcba gurz hagb Nmrxnu, naq gurl qvrq: gurl jrer zber juvpu
qvrq jvgu unvyfgbarf guna gurl jubz gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fyrj jvgu
gur fjbeq.

10:12 Gura fcnxr Wbfuhn gb gur YBEQ va gur qnl jura gur YBEQ qryvirerq
hc gur Nzbevgrf orsber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq ur fnvq va gur
fvtug bs Vfenry, Fha, fgnaq gubh fgvyy hcba Tvorba; naq gubh, Zbba, va
gur inyyrl bs Nwnyba.

10:13 Naq gur fha fgbbq fgvyy, naq gur zbba fgnlrq, hagvy gur crbcyr
unq niratrq gurzfryirf hcba gurve rarzvrf. Vf abg guvf jevggra va gur
obbx bs Wnfure? Fb gur fha fgbbq fgvyy va gur zvqfg bs urnira, naq
unfgrq abg gb tb qbja nobhg n jubyr qnl.

10:14 Naq gurer jnf ab qnl yvxr gung orsber vg be nsgre vg, gung gur
YBEQ urnexrarq hagb gur ibvpr bs n zna: sbe gur YBEQ sbhtug sbe
Vfenry.

10:15 Naq Wbfuhn erghearq, naq nyy Vfenry jvgu uvz, hagb gur pnzc gb
Tvytny.

10:16 Ohg gurfr svir xvatf syrq, naq uvq gurzfryirf va n pnir ng
Znxxrqnu.

10:17 Naq vg jnf gbyq Wbfuhn, fnlvat, Gur svir xvatf ner sbhaq uvq va
n pnir ng Znxxrqnu.

10:18 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq, Ebyy terng fgbarf hcba gur zbhgu bs gur pnir,
naq frg zra ol vg sbe gb xrrc gurz: 10:19 Naq fgnl lr abg, ohg chefhr
nsgre lbhe rarzvrf, naq fzvgr gur uvaqzbfg bs gurz; fhssre gurz abg gb
ragre vagb gurve pvgvrf: sbe gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ungu qryvirerq gurz
vagb lbhe unaq.

10:20 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Wbfuhn naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry unq
znqr na raq bs fynlvat gurz jvgu n irel terng fynhtugre, gvyy gurl
jrer pbafhzrq, gung gur erfg juvpu erznvarq bs gurz ragrerq vagb
sraprq pvgvrf.

10:21 Naq nyy gur crbcyr erghearq gb gur pnzc gb Wbfuhn ng Znxxrqnu va
crnpr: abar zbirq uvf gbathr ntnvafg nal bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

10:22 Gura fnvq Wbfuhn, Bcra gur zbhgu bs gur pnir, naq oevat bhg
gubfr svir xvatf hagb zr bhg bs gur pnir.

10:23 Naq gurl qvq fb, naq oebhtug sbegu gubfr svir xvatf hagb uvz bhg
bs gur pnir, gur xvat bs Wrehfnyrz, gur xvat bs Uroeba, gur xvat bs
Wnezhgu, gur xvat bs Ynpuvfu, naq gur xvat bs Rtyba.

10:24 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gurl oebhtug bhg gubfr xvatf hagb
Wbfuhn, gung Wbfuhn pnyyrq sbe nyy gur zra bs Vfenry, naq fnvq hagb
gur pncgnvaf bs gur zra bs jne juvpu jrag jvgu uvz, Pbzr arne, chg
lbhe srrg hcba gur arpxf bs gurfr xvatf. Naq gurl pnzr arne, naq chg
gurve srrg hcba gur arpxf bs gurz.

10:25 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq hagb gurz, Srne abg, abe or qvfznlrq, or fgebat
naq bs tbbq pbhentr: sbe guhf funyy gur YBEQ qb gb nyy lbhe rarzvrf
ntnvafg jubz lr svtug.

10:26 Naq nsgrejneq Wbfuhn fzbgr gurz, naq fyrj gurz, naq unatrq gurz
ba svir gerrf: naq gurl jrer unatvat hcba gur gerrf hagvy gur riravat.

10:27 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur gvzr bs gur tbvat qbja bs gur fha,
gung Wbfuhn pbzznaqrq, naq gurl gbbx gurz qbja bss gur gerrf, naq pnfg
gurz vagb gur pnir jurerva gurl unq orra uvq, naq ynvq terng fgbarf va
gur pnir'f zbhgu, juvpu erznva hagvy guvf irel qnl.

10:28 Naq gung qnl Wbfuhn gbbx Znxxrqnu, naq fzbgr vg jvgu gur rqtr bs
gur fjbeq, naq gur xvat gurerbs ur hggreyl qrfgeblrq, gurz, naq nyy
gur fbhyf gung jrer gurerva; ur yrg abar erznva: naq ur qvq gb gur
xvat bs Znxxrqnu nf ur qvq hagb gur xvat bs Wrevpub.

10:29 Gura Wbfuhn cnffrq sebz Znxxrqnu, naq nyy Vfenry jvgu uvz, hagb
Yvoanu, naq sbhtug ntnvafg Yvoanu: 10:30 Naq gur YBEQ qryvirerq vg
nyfb, naq gur xvat gurerbs, vagb gur unaq bs Vfenry; naq ur fzbgr vg
jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq, naq nyy gur fbhyf gung jrer gurerva; ur
yrg abar erznva va vg; ohg qvq hagb gur xvat gurerbs nf ur qvq hagb
gur xvat bs Wrevpub.

10:31 Naq Wbfuhn cnffrq sebz Yvoanu, naq nyy Vfenry jvgu uvz, hagb
Ynpuvfu, naq rapnzcrq ntnvafg vg, naq sbhtug ntnvafg vg: 10:32 Naq gur
YBEQ qryvirerq Ynpuvfu vagb gur unaq bs Vfenry, juvpu gbbx vg ba gur
frpbaq qnl, naq fzbgr vg jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq, naq nyy gur fbhyf
gung jrer gurerva, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung ur unq qbar gb Yvoanu.

10:33 Gura Ubenz xvat bs Trmre pnzr hc gb uryc Ynpuvfu; naq Wbfuhn
fzbgr uvz naq uvf crbcyr, hagvy ur unq yrsg uvz abar erznvavat.

10:34 Naq sebz Ynpuvfu Wbfuhn cnffrq hagb Rtyba, naq nyy Vfenry jvgu
uvz; naq gurl rapnzcrq ntnvafg vg, naq sbhtug ntnvafg vg: 10:35 Naq
gurl gbbx vg ba gung qnl, naq fzbgr vg jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq, naq
nyy gur fbhyf gung jrer gurerva ur hggreyl qrfgeblrq gung qnl,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung ur unq qbar gb Ynpuvfu.

10:36 Naq Wbfuhn jrag hc sebz Rtyba, naq nyy Vfenry jvgu uvz, hagb
Uroeba; naq gurl sbhtug ntnvafg vg: 10:37 Naq gurl gbbx vg, naq fzbgr
vg jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq, naq gur xvat gurerbs, naq nyy gur
pvgvrf gurerbs, naq nyy gur fbhyf gung jrer gurerva; ur yrsg abar
erznvavat, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung ur unq qbar gb Rtyba; ohg qrfgeblrq
vg hggreyl, naq nyy gur fbhyf gung jrer gurerva.

10:38 Naq Wbfuhn erghearq, naq nyy Vfenry jvgu uvz, gb Qrove; naq
sbhtug ntnvafg vg: 10:39 Naq ur gbbx vg, naq gur xvat gurerbs, naq nyy
gur pvgvrf gurerbs; naq gurl fzbgr gurz jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq,
naq hggreyl qrfgeblrq nyy gur fbhyf gung jrer gurerva; ur yrsg abar
erznvavat: nf ur unq qbar gb Uroeba, fb ur qvq gb Qrove, naq gb gur
xvat gurerbs; nf ur unq qbar nyfb gb Yvoanu, naq gb ure xvat.

10:40 Fb Wbfuhn fzbgr nyy gur pbhagel bs gur uvyyf, naq bs gur fbhgu,
naq bs gur inyr, naq bs gur fcevatf, naq nyy gurve xvatf: ur yrsg abar
erznvavat, ohg hggreyl qrfgeblrq nyy gung oerngurq, nf gur YBEQ Tbq bs
Vfenry pbzznaqrq.

10:41 Naq Wbfuhn fzbgr gurz sebz Xnqrfuonearn rira hagb Tnmn, naq nyy
gur pbhagel bs Tbfura, rira hagb Tvorba.

10:42 Naq nyy gurfr xvatf naq gurve ynaq qvq Wbfuhn gnxr ng bar gvzr,
orpnhfr gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry sbhtug sbe Vfenry.

10:43 Naq Wbfuhn erghearq, naq nyy Vfenry jvgu uvz, hagb gur pnzc gb
Tvytny.

11:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Wnova xvat bs Unmbe unq urneq gubfr
guvatf, gung ur frag gb Wbono xvat bs Znqba, naq gb gur xvat bs
Fuvzeba, naq gb gur xvat bs Npufuncu, 11:2 Naq gb gur xvatf gung jrer
ba gur abegu bs gur zbhagnvaf, naq bs gur cynvaf fbhgu bs Puvaarebgu,
naq va gur inyyrl, naq va gur obeqref bs Qbe ba gur jrfg, 11:3 Naq gb
gur Pnannavgr ba gur rnfg naq ba gur jrfg, naq gb gur Nzbevgr, naq gur
Uvggvgr, naq gur Crevmmvgr, naq gur Wrohfvgr va gur zbhagnvaf, naq gb
gur Uvivgr haqre Urezba va gur ynaq bs Zvmcru.

11:4 Naq gurl jrag bhg, gurl naq nyy gurve ubfgf jvgu gurz, zhpu
crbcyr, rira nf gur fnaq gung vf hcba gur frn fuber va zhygvghqr, jvgu
ubefrf naq punevbgf irel znal.

11:5 Naq jura nyy gurfr xvatf jrer zrg gbtrgure, gurl pnzr naq cvgpurq
gbtrgure ng gur jngref bs Zrebz, gb svtug ntnvafg Vfenry.

11:6 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Or abg nsenvq orpnhfr bs gurz: sbe
gb zbeebj nobhg guvf gvzr jvyy V qryvire gurz hc nyy fynva orsber
Vfenry: gubh funyg ubhtu gurve ubefrf, naq ohea gurve punevbgf jvgu
sver.

11:7 Fb Wbfuhn pnzr, naq nyy gur crbcyr bs jne jvgu uvz, ntnvafg gurz
ol gur jngref bs Zrebz fhqqrayl; naq gurl sryy hcba gurz.

11:8 Naq gur YBEQ qryvirerq gurz vagb gur unaq bs Vfenry, jub fzbgr
gurz, naq punfrq gurz hagb terng Mvqba, naq hagb Zvfercubguznvz, naq
hagb gur inyyrl bs Zvmcru rnfgjneq; naq gurl fzbgr gurz, hagvy gurl
yrsg gurz abar erznvavat.

11:9 Naq Wbfuhn qvq hagb gurz nf gur YBEQ onqr uvz: ur ubhturq gurve
ubefrf, naq oheag gurve punevbgf jvgu sver.

11:10 Naq Wbfuhn ng gung gvzr ghearq onpx, naq gbbx Unmbe, naq fzbgr
gur xvat gurerbs jvgu gur fjbeq: sbe Unmbe orsbergvzr jnf gur urnq bs
nyy gubfr xvatqbzf.

11:11 Naq gurl fzbgr nyy gur fbhyf gung jrer gurerva jvgu gur rqtr bs
gur fjbeq, hggreyl qrfgeblvat gurz: gurer jnf abg nal yrsg gb oerngur:
naq ur oheag Unmbe jvgu sver.

11:12 Naq nyy gur pvgvrf bs gubfr xvatf, naq nyy gur xvatf bs gurz,
qvq Wbfuhn gnxr, naq fzbgr gurz jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq, naq ur
hggreyl qrfgeblrq gurz, nf Zbfrf gur freinag bs gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq.

11:13 Ohg nf sbe gur pvgvrf gung fgbbq fgvyy va gurve fgeratgu, Vfenry
ohearq abar bs gurz, fnir Unmbe bayl; gung qvq Wbfuhn ohea.

11:14 Naq nyy gur fcbvy bs gurfr pvgvrf, naq gur pnggyr, gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry gbbx sbe n cerl hagb gurzfryirf; ohg rirel zna gurl fzbgr
jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq, hagvy gurl unq qrfgeblrq gurz, arvgure
yrsg gurl nal gb oerngur.

11:15 Nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf uvf freinag, fb qvq Zbfrf pbzznaq
Wbfuhn, naq fb qvq Wbfuhn; ur yrsg abguvat haqbar bs nyy gung gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

11:16 Fb Wbfuhn gbbx nyy gung ynaq, gur uvyyf, naq nyy gur fbhgu
pbhagel, naq nyy gur ynaq bs Tbfura, naq gur inyyrl, naq gur cynva,
naq gur zbhagnva bs Vfenry, naq gur inyyrl bs gur fnzr; 11:17 Rira
sebz gur zbhag Unynx, gung tbrgu hc gb Frve, rira hagb Onnytnq va gur
inyyrl bs Yronaba haqre zbhag Urezba: naq nyy gurve xvatf ur gbbx, naq
fzbgr gurz, naq fyrj gurz.

11:18 Wbfuhn znqr jne n ybat gvzr jvgu nyy gubfr xvatf.

11:19 Gurer jnf abg n pvgl gung znqr crnpr jvgu gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, fnir gur Uvivgrf gur vaunovgnagf bs Tvorba: nyy bgure gurl
gbbx va onggyr.

11:20 Sbe vg jnf bs gur YBEQ gb uneqra gurve urnegf, gung gurl fubhyq
pbzr ntnvafg Vfenry va onggyr, gung ur zvtug qrfgebl gurz hggreyl, naq
gung gurl zvtug unir ab snibhe, ohg gung ur zvtug qrfgebl gurz, nf gur
YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

11:21 Naq ng gung gvzr pnzr Wbfuhn, naq phg bss gur Nanxvzf sebz gur
zbhagnvaf, sebz Uroeba, sebz Qrove, sebz Nano, naq sebz nyy gur
zbhagnvaf bs Whqnu, naq sebz nyy gur zbhagnvaf bs Vfenry: Wbfuhn
qrfgeblrq gurz hggreyl jvgu gurve pvgvrf.

11:22 Gurer jnf abar bs gur Nanxvzf yrsg va gur ynaq bs gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry: bayl va Tnmn, va Tngu, naq va Nfuqbq, gurer erznvarq.

11:23 Fb Wbfuhn gbbx gur jubyr ynaq, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung gur YBEQ
fnvq hagb Zbfrf; naq Wbfuhn tnir vg sbe na vaurevgnapr hagb Vfenry
nppbeqvat gb gurve qvivfvbaf ol gurve gevorf. Naq gur ynaq erfgrq sebz
jne.

12:1 Abj gurfr ner gur xvatf bs gur ynaq, juvpu gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
fzbgr, naq cbffrffrq gurve ynaq ba gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna gbjneq gur
evfvat bs gur fha, sebz gur evire Neaba hagb zbhag Urezba, naq nyy gur
cynva ba gur rnfg: 12:2 Fvuba xvat bs gur Nzbevgrf, jub qjryg va
Urfuoba, naq ehyrq sebz Nebre, juvpu vf hcba gur onax bs gur evire
Neaba, naq sebz gur zvqqyr bs gur evire, naq sebz unys Tvyrnq, rira
hagb gur evire Wnoobx, juvpu vf gur obeqre bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba;
12:3 Naq sebz gur cynva gb gur frn bs Puvaarebgu ba gur rnfg, naq hagb
gur frn bs gur cynva, rira gur fnyg frn ba gur rnfg, gur jnl gb
Orguwrfuvzbgu; naq sebz gur fbhgu, haqre Nfuqbgucvftnu: 12:4 Naq gur
pbnfg bs Bt xvat bs Onfuna, juvpu jnf bs gur erzanag bs gur tvnagf,
gung qjryg ng Nfugnebgu naq ng Rqerv, 12:5 Naq ervtarq va zbhag
Urezba, naq va Fnypnu, naq va nyy Onfuna, hagb gur obeqre bs gur
Trfuhevgrf naq gur Znnpunguvgrf, naq unys Tvyrnq, gur obeqre bs Fvuba
xvat bs Urfuoba.

12:6 Gurz qvq Zbfrf gur freinag bs gur YBEQ naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
fzvgr: naq Zbfrf gur freinag bs gur YBEQ tnir vg sbe n cbffrffvba hagb
gur Erhoravgrf, naq gur Tnqvgrf, naq gur unys gevor bs Znanffru.

12:7 Naq gurfr ner gur xvatf bs gur pbhagel juvpu Wbfuhn naq gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry fzbgr ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna ba gur jrfg, sebz Onnytnq
va gur inyyrl bs Yronaba rira hagb gur zbhag Unynx, gung tbrgu hc gb
Frve; juvpu Wbfuhn tnir hagb gur gevorf bs Vfenry sbe n cbffrffvba
nppbeqvat gb gurve qvivfvbaf; 12:8 Va gur zbhagnvaf, naq va gur
inyyrlf, naq va gur cynvaf, naq va gur fcevatf, naq va gur jvyqrearff,
naq va gur fbhgu pbhagel; gur Uvggvgrf, gur Nzbevgrf, naq gur
Pnannavgrf, gur Crevmmvgrf, gur Uvivgrf, naq gur Wrohfvgrf: 12:9 Gur
xvat bs Wrevpub, bar; gur xvat bs Nv, juvpu vf orfvqr Orgury, bar;
12:10 Gur xvat bs Wrehfnyrz, bar; gur xvat bs Uroeba, bar; 12:11 Gur
xvat bs Wnezhgu, bar; gur xvat bs Ynpuvfu, bar; 12:12 Gur xvat bs
Rtyba, bar; gur xvat bs Trmre, bar; 12:13 Gur xvat bs Qrove, bar; gur
xvat bs Trqre, bar; 12:14 Gur xvat bs Ubeznu, bar; gur xvat bs Nenq,
bar; 12:15 Gur xvat bs Yvoanu, bar; gur xvat bs Nqhyynz, bar; 12:16
Gur xvat bs Znxxrqnu, bar; gur xvat bs Orgury, bar; 12:17 Gur xvat bs
Gncchnu, bar; gur xvat bs Urcure, bar; 12:18 Gur xvat bs Ncurx, bar;
gur xvat bs Ynfuneba, bar; 12:19 Gur xvat bs Znqba, bar; gur xvat bs
Unmbe, bar; 12:20 Gur xvat bs Fuvzebazreba, bar; gur xvat bs Npufuncu,
bar; 12:21 Gur xvat bs Gnnanpu, bar; gur xvat bs Zrtvqqb, bar; 12:22
Gur xvat bs Xrqrfu, bar; gur xvat bs Wbxarnz bs Pnezry, bar; 12:23 Gur
xvat bs Qbe va gur pbnfg bs Qbe, bar; gur xvat bs gur angvbaf bs
Tvytny, bar; 12:24 Gur xvat bs Gvemnu, bar: nyy gur xvatf guvegl naq
bar.

13:1 Abj Wbfuhn jnf byq naq fgevpxra va lrnef; naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb
uvz, Gubh neg byq naq fgevpxra va lrnef, naq gurer erznvargu lrg irel
zhpu ynaq gb or cbffrffrq.

13:2 Guvf vf gur ynaq gung lrg erznvargu: nyy gur obeqref bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, naq nyy Trfuhev, 13:3 Sebz Fvube, juvpu vf orsber Rtlcg,
rira hagb gur obeqref bs Rxeba abegujneq, juvpu vf pbhagrq gb gur
Pnannavgr: svir ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf; gur Tnmnguvgrf, naq gur
Nfuqbguvgrf, gur Rfuxnybavgrf, gur Tvggvgrf, naq gur Rxebavgrf; nyfb
gur Nivgrf: 13:4 Sebz gur fbhgu, nyy gur ynaq bs gur Pnannavgrf, naq
Zrnenu gung vf orfvqr gur Fvqbavnaf hagb Ncurx, gb gur obeqref bs gur
Nzbevgrf: 13:5 Naq gur ynaq bs gur Tvoyvgrf, naq nyy Yronaba, gbjneq
gur fhaevfvat, sebz Onnytnq haqre zbhag Urezba hagb gur ragrevat vagb
Unzngu.

13:6 Nyy gur vaunovgnagf bs gur uvyy pbhagel sebz Yronaba hagb
Zvfercubguznvz, naq nyy gur Fvqbavnaf, gurz jvyy V qevir bhg sebz
orsber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: bayl qvivqr gubh vg ol ybg hagb gur
Vfenryvgrf sbe na vaurevgnapr, nf V unir pbzznaqrq gurr.

13:7 Abj gurersber qvivqr guvf ynaq sbe na vaurevgnapr hagb gur avar
gevorf, naq gur unys gevor bs Znanffru, 13:8 Jvgu jubz gur Erhoravgrf
naq gur Tnqvgrf unir erprvirq gurve vaurevgnapr, juvpu Zbfrf tnir
gurz, orlbaq Wbeqna rnfgjneq, rira nf Zbfrf gur freinag bs gur YBEQ
tnir gurz; 13:9 Sebz Nebre, gung vf hcba gur onax bs gur evire Neaba,
naq gur pvgl gung vf va gur zvqfg bs gur evire, naq nyy gur cynva bs
Zrqron hagb Qvoba; 13:10 Naq nyy gur pvgvrf bs Fvuba xvat bs gur
Nzbevgrf, juvpu ervtarq va Urfuoba, hagb gur obeqre bs gur puvyqera bs
Nzzba; 13:11 Naq Tvyrnq, naq gur obeqre bs gur Trfuhevgrf naq
Znnpunguvgrf, naq nyy zbhag Urezba, naq nyy Onfuna hagb Fnypnu; 13:12
Nyy gur xvatqbz bs Bt va Onfuna, juvpu ervtarq va Nfugnebgu naq va
Rqerv, jub erznvarq bs gur erzanag bs gur tvnagf: sbe gurfr qvq Zbfrf
fzvgr, naq pnfg gurz bhg.

13:13 Arireguryrff gur puvyqera bs Vfenry rkcryyrq abg gur Trfuhevgrf,
abe gur Znnpunguvgrf: ohg gur Trfuhevgrf naq gur Znnpunguvgrf qjryy
nzbat gur Vfenryvgrf hagvy guvf qnl.

13:14 Bayl hagb gur gevorf bs Yriv ur tnir abar vaurevgnapr; gur
fnpevsvprf bs gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry znqr ol sver ner gurve
vaurevgnapr, nf ur fnvq hagb gurz.

13:15 Naq Zbfrf tnir hagb gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Erhora
vaurevgnapr nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf.

13:16 Naq gurve pbnfg jnf sebz Nebre, gung vf ba gur onax bs gur evire
Neaba, naq gur pvgl gung vf va gur zvqfg bs gur evire, naq nyy gur
cynva ol Zrqron; 13:17 Urfuoba, naq nyy ure pvgvrf gung ner va gur
cynva; Qvoba, naq Onzbguonny, naq Orguonnyzrba, 13:18 Naq Wnunmn, naq
Xrqrzbgu, naq Zrcunngu, 13:19 Naq Xvewngunvz, naq Fvoznu, naq
Mnergufunune va gur zbhag bs gur inyyrl, 13:20 Naq Orgucrbe, naq
Nfuqbgucvftnu, naq Orguwrfuvzbgu, 13:21 Naq nyy gur pvgvrf bs gur
cynva, naq nyy gur xvatqbz bs Fvuba xvat bs gur Nzbevgrf, juvpu
ervtarq va Urfuoba, jubz Zbfrf fzbgr jvgu gur cevaprf bs Zvqvna, Riv,
naq Erxrz, naq Mhe, naq Uhe, naq Eron, juvpu jrer qhxrf bs Fvuba,
qjryyvat va gur pbhagel.

13:22 Onynnz nyfb gur fba bs Orbe, gur fbbgufnlre, qvq gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry fynl jvgu gur fjbeq nzbat gurz gung jrer fynva ol gurz.

13:23 Naq gur obeqre bs gur puvyqera bs Erhora jnf Wbeqna, naq gur
obeqre gurerbs. Guvf jnf gur vaurevgnapr bs gur puvyqera bs Erhora
nsgre gurve snzvyvrf, gur pvgvrf naq gur ivyyntrf gurerbs.

13:24 Naq Zbfrf tnir vaurevgnapr hagb gur gevor bs Tnq, rira hagb gur
puvyqera bs Tnq nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf.

13:25 Naq gurve pbnfg jnf Wnmre, naq nyy gur pvgvrf bs Tvyrnq, naq
unys gur ynaq bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, hagb Nebre gung vf orsber
Enoonu; 13:26 Naq sebz Urfuoba hagb Enznguzvmcru, naq Orgbavz; naq
sebz Znunanvz hagb gur obeqre bs Qrove; 13:27 Naq va gur inyyrl,
Orgunenz, naq Orguavzenu, naq Fhppbgu, naq Mncuba, gur erfg bs gur
xvatqbz bs Fvuba xvat bs Urfuoba, Wbeqna naq uvf obeqre, rira hagb gur
rqtr bs gur frn bs Puvaarergu ba gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna rnfgjneq.

13:28 Guvf vf gur vaurevgnapr bs gur puvyqera bs Tnq nsgre gurve
snzvyvrf, gur pvgvrf, naq gurve ivyyntrf.

13:29 Naq Zbfrf tnir vaurevgnapr hagb gur unys gevor bs Znanffru: naq
guvf jnf gur cbffrffvba bs gur unys gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Znanffru
ol gurve snzvyvrf.

13:30 Naq gurve pbnfg jnf sebz Znunanvz, nyy Onfuna, nyy gur xvatqbz
bs Bt xvat bs Onfuna, naq nyy gur gbjaf bs Wnve, juvpu ner va Onfuna,
guerrfpber pvgvrf: 13:31 Naq unys Tvyrnq, naq Nfugnebgu, naq Rqerv,
pvgvrf bs gur xvatqbz bs Bt va Onfuna, jrer cregnvavat hagb gur
puvyqera bs Znpuve gur fba bs Znanffru, rira gb gur bar unys bs gur
puvyqera bs Znpuve ol gurve snzvyvrf.

13:32 Gurfr ner gur pbhagevrf juvpu Zbfrf qvq qvfgevohgr sbe
vaurevgnapr va gur cynvaf bs Zbno, ba gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna, ol
Wrevpub, rnfgjneq.

13:33 Ohg hagb gur gevor bs Yriv Zbfrf tnir abg nal vaurevgnapr: gur
YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry jnf gurve vaurevgnapr, nf ur fnvq hagb gurz.

14:1 Naq gurfr ner gur pbhagevrf juvpu gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
vaurevgrq va gur ynaq bs Pnanna, juvpu Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, naq Wbfuhn
gur fba bs Aha, naq gur urnqf bs gur snguref bs gur gevorf bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, qvfgevohgrq sbe vaurevgnapr gb gurz.

14:2 Ol ybg jnf gurve vaurevgnapr, nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq ol gur unaq
bs Zbfrf, sbe gur avar gevorf, naq sbe gur unys gevor.

14:3 Sbe Zbfrf unq tvira gur vaurevgnapr bs gjb gevorf naq na unys
gevor ba gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna: ohg hagb gur Yrivgrf ur tnir abar
vaurevgnapr nzbat gurz.

14:4 Sbe gur puvyqera bs Wbfrcu jrer gjb gevorf, Znanffru naq Rcuenvz:
gurersber gurl tnir ab cneg hagb gur Yrivgrf va gur ynaq, fnir pvgvrf
gb qjryy va, jvgu gurve fhoheof sbe gurve pnggyr naq sbe gurve
fhofgnapr.

14:5 Nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf, fb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq, naq
gurl qvivqrq gur ynaq.

14:6 Gura gur puvyqera bs Whqnu pnzr hagb Wbfuhn va Tvytny: naq Pnyro
gur fba bs Wrcuhaaru gur Xrarmvgr fnvq hagb uvz, Gubh xabjrfg gur
guvat gung gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Zbfrf gur zna bs Tbq pbapreavat zr naq
gurr va Xnqrfuonearn.

14:7 Sbegl lrnef byq jnf V jura Zbfrf gur freinag bs gur YBEQ frag zr
sebz Xnqrfuonearn gb rfcl bhg gur ynaq; naq V oebhtug uvz jbeq ntnva
nf vg jnf va zvar urneg.

14:8 Arireguryrff zl oerguera gung jrag hc jvgu zr znqr gur urneg bs
gur crbcyr zryg: ohg V jubyyl sbyybjrq gur YBEQ zl Tbq.

14:9 Naq Zbfrf fjner ba gung qnl, fnlvat, Fheryl gur ynaq jurerba gul
srrg unir gebqqra funyy or guvar vaurevgnapr, naq gul puvyqera'f sbe
rire, orpnhfr gubh unfg jubyyl sbyybjrq gur YBEQ zl Tbq.

14:10 Naq abj, orubyq, gur YBEQ ungu xrcg zr nyvir, nf ur fnvq, gurfr
sbegl naq svir lrnef, rira fvapr gur YBEQ fcnxr guvf jbeq hagb Zbfrf,
juvyr gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jnaqrerq va gur jvyqrearff: naq abj, yb,
V nz guvf qnl sbhefpber naq svir lrnef byq.

14:11 Nf lrg V nz nf fgebat guvf qnl nf V jnf va gur qnl gung Zbfrf
frag zr: nf zl fgeratgu jnf gura, rira fb vf zl fgeratgu abj, sbe jne,
obgu gb tb bhg, naq gb pbzr va.

14:12 Abj gurersber tvir zr guvf zbhagnva, jurerbs gur YBEQ fcnxr va
gung qnl; sbe gubh urneqrfg va gung qnl ubj gur Nanxvzf jrer gurer,
naq gung gur pvgvrf jrer terng naq sraprq: vs fb or gur YBEQ jvyy or
jvgu zr, gura V funyy or noyr gb qevir gurz bhg, nf gur YBEQ fnvq.

14:13 Naq Wbfuhn oyrffrq uvz, naq tnir hagb Pnyro gur fba bs Wrcuhaaru
Uroeba sbe na vaurevgnapr.

14:14 Uroeba gurersber orpnzr gur vaurevgnapr bs Pnyro gur fba bs
Wrcuhaaru gur Xrarmvgr hagb guvf qnl, orpnhfr gung ur jubyyl sbyybjrq
gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry.

14:15 Naq gur anzr bs Uroeba orsber jnf Xvewnguneon; juvpu Neon jnf n
terng zna nzbat gur Nanxvzf. Naq gur ynaq unq erfg sebz jne.

15:1 Guvf gura jnf gur ybg bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu ol
gurve snzvyvrf; rira gb gur obeqre bs Rqbz gur jvyqrearff bs Mva
fbhgujneq jnf gur hggrezbfg cneg bs gur fbhgu pbnfg.

15:2 Naq gurve fbhgu obeqre jnf sebz gur fuber bs gur fnyg frn, sebz
gur onl gung ybbxrgu fbhgujneq: 15:3 Naq vg jrag bhg gb gur fbhgu fvqr
gb Znnyrunpenoovz, naq cnffrq nybat gb Mva, naq nfpraqrq hc ba gur
fbhgu fvqr hagb Xnqrfuonearn, naq cnffrq nybat gb Urmeba, naq jrag hc
gb Nqne, naq srgpurq n pbzcnff gb Xnexnn: 15:4 Sebz gurapr vg cnffrq
gbjneq Nmzba, naq jrag bhg hagb gur evire bs Rtlcg; naq gur tbvatf bhg
bs gung pbnfg jrer ng gur frn: guvf funyy or lbhe fbhgu pbnfg.

15:5 Naq gur rnfg obeqre jnf gur fnyg frn, rira hagb gur raq bs
Wbeqna.

Naq gurve obeqre va gur abegu dhnegre jnf sebz gur onl bs gur frn ng
gur hggrezbfg cneg bs Wbeqna: 15:6 Naq gur obeqre jrag hc gb
Orguubtyn, naq cnffrq nybat ol gur abegu bs Orgunenonu; naq gur obeqre
jrag hc gb gur fgbar bs Obuna gur fba bs Erhora: 15:7 Naq gur obeqre
jrag hc gbjneq Qrove sebz gur inyyrl bs Npube, naq fb abegujneq,
ybbxvat gbjneq Tvytny, gung vf orsber gur tbvat hc gb Nqhzzvz, juvpu
vf ba gur fbhgu fvqr bs gur evire: naq gur obeqre cnffrq gbjneq gur
jngref bs Rafurzrfu, naq gur tbvatf bhg gurerbs jrer ng Raebtry: 15:8
Naq gur obeqre jrag hc ol gur inyyrl bs gur fba bs Uvaabz hagb gur
fbhgu fvqr bs gur Wrohfvgr; gur fnzr vf Wrehfnyrz: naq gur obeqre jrag
hc gb gur gbc bs gur zbhagnva gung yvrgu orsber gur inyyrl bs Uvaabz
jrfgjneq, juvpu vf ng gur raq bs gur inyyrl bs gur tvnagf abegujneq:
15:9 Naq gur obeqre jnf qenja sebz gur gbc bs gur uvyy hagb gur
sbhagnva bs gur jngre bs Arcugbnu, naq jrag bhg gb gur pvgvrf bs zbhag
Rcueba; naq gur obeqre jnf qenja gb Onnynu, juvpu vf Xvewnguwrnevz:
15:10 Naq gur obeqre pbzcnffrq sebz Onnynu jrfgjneq hagb zbhag Frve,
naq cnffrq nybat hagb gur fvqr bs zbhag Wrnevz, juvpu vf Purfnyba, ba
gur abegu fvqr, naq jrag qbja gb Orgufurzrfu, naq cnffrq ba gb Gvzanu:
15:11 Naq gur obeqre jrag bhg hagb gur fvqr bs Rxeba abegujneq: naq
gur obeqre jnf qenja gb Fuvpeba, naq cnffrq nybat gb zbhag Onnynu, naq
jrag bhg hagb Wnoarry; naq gur tbvatf bhg bs gur obeqre jrer ng gur
frn.

15:12 Naq gur jrfg obeqre jnf gb gur terng frn, naq gur pbnfg gurerbs.

Guvf vf gur pbnfg bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu ebhaq nobhg nppbeqvat gb
gurve snzvyvrf.

15:13 Naq hagb Pnyro gur fba bs Wrcuhaaru ur tnir n cneg nzbat gur
puvyqera bs Whqnu, nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ gb Wbfuhn,
rira gur pvgl bs Neon gur sngure bs Nanx, juvpu pvgl vf Uroeba.

15:14 Naq Pnyro qebir gurapr gur guerr fbaf bs Nanx, Furfunv, naq
Nuvzna, naq Gnyznv, gur puvyqera bs Nanx.

15:15 Naq ur jrag hc gurapr gb gur vaunovgnagf bs Qrove: naq gur anzr
bs Qrove orsber jnf Xvewngufrcure.

15:16 Naq Pnyro fnvq, Ur gung fzvgrgu Xvewngufrcure, naq gnxrgu vg, gb
uvz jvyy V tvir Npufnu zl qnhtugre gb jvsr.

15:17 Naq Bguavry gur fba bs Xranm, gur oebgure bs Pnyro, gbbx vg: naq
ur tnir uvz Npufnu uvf qnhtugre gb jvsr.

15:18 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf fur pnzr hagb uvz, gung fur zbirq uvz gb
nfx bs ure sngure n svryq: naq fur yvtugrq bss ure nff; naq Pnyro fnvq
hagb ure, Jung jbhyqrfg gubh?  15:19 Jub nafjrerq, Tvir zr n oyrffvat;
sbe gubh unfg tvira zr n fbhgu ynaq; tvir zr nyfb fcevatf bs jngre.
Naq ur tnir ure gur hccre fcevatf, naq gur argure fcevatf.

15:20 Guvf vf gur vaurevgnapr bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu
nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf.

15:21 Naq gur hggrezbfg pvgvrf bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu
gbjneq gur pbnfg bs Rqbz fbhgujneq jrer Xnomrry, naq Rqre, naq Wnthe,
15:22 Naq Xvanu, naq Qvzbanu, naq Nqnqnu, 15:23 Naq Xrqrfu, naq Unmbe,
naq Vguana, 15:24 Mvcu, naq Gryrz, naq Ornybgu, 15:25 Naq Unmbe,
Unqnggnu, naq Xrevbgu, naq Urmeba, juvpu vf Unmbe, 15:26 Nznz, naq
Furzn, naq Zbynqnu, 15:27 Naq Unmnetnqqnu, naq Urfuzba, naq Orgucnyrg,
15:28 Naq Unmnefuhny, naq Orrefuron, naq Ovmwbguwnu, 15:29 Onnynu, naq
Vvz, naq Nmrz, 15:30 Naq Rygbynq, naq Purfvy, naq Ubeznu, 15:31 Naq
Mvxynt, naq Znqznaanu, naq Fnafnaanu, 15:32 Naq Yronbgu, naq Fuvyuvz,
naq Nva, naq Evzzba: nyy gur pvgvrf ner gjragl naq avar, jvgu gurve
ivyyntrf: 15:33 Naq va gur inyyrl, Rfugnby, naq Mbernu, naq Nfuanu,
15:34 Naq Mnabnu, naq Ratnaavz, Gncchnu, naq Ranz, 15:35 Wnezhgu, naq
Nqhyynz, Fbpbu, naq Nmrxnu, 15:36 Naq Funenvz, naq Nqvgunvz, naq
Trqrenu, naq Trqrebgunvz; sbhegrra pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf: 15:37
Mrana, naq Unqnfunu, naq Zvtqnytnq, 15:38 Naq Qvyrna, naq Zvmcru, naq
Wbxgurry, 15:39 Ynpuvfu, naq Obmxngu, naq Rtyba, 15:40 Naq Pnooba, naq
Ynuznz, naq Xvguyvfu, 15:41 Naq Trqrebgu, Orguqntba, naq Annznu, naq
Znxxrqnu; fvkgrra pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf: 15:42 Yvoanu, naq Rgure,
naq Nfuna, 15:43 Naq Wvcugnu, naq Nfuanu, naq Armvo, 15:44 Naq Xrvynu,
naq Npumvo, naq Znerfunu; avar pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf: 15:45
Rxeba, jvgu ure gbjaf naq ure ivyyntrf: 15:46 Sebz Rxeba rira hagb gur
frn, nyy gung ynl arne Nfuqbq, jvgu gurve ivyyntrf: 15:47 Nfuqbq jvgu
ure gbjaf naq ure ivyyntrf, Tnmn jvgu ure gbjaf naq ure ivyyntrf, hagb
gur evire bs Rtlcg, naq gur terng frn, naq gur obeqre gurerbs: 15:48
Naq va gur zbhagnvaf, Funzve, naq Wnggve, naq Fbpbu, 15:49 Naq Qnaanu,
naq Xvewngufnaanu, juvpu vf Qrove, 15:50 Naq Nano, naq Rfugrzbu, naq
Navz, 15:51 Naq Tbfura, naq Ubyba, naq Tvybu; ryrira pvgvrf jvgu gurve
ivyyntrf: 15:52 Neno, naq Qhznu, naq Rfurna, 15:53 Naq Wnahz, naq
Orgugncchnu, naq Ncurxnu, 15:54 Naq Uhzgnu, naq Xvewnguneon, juvpu vf
Uroeba, naq Mvbe; avar pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf: 15:55 Znba, Pnezry,
naq Mvcu, naq Whggnu, 15:56 Naq Wrmerry, naq Wbxqrnz, naq Mnabnu,
15:57 Pnva, Tvornu, naq Gvzanu; gra pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf: 15:58
Unyuhy, Orgumhe, naq Trqbe, 15:59 Naq Znnengu, naq Orgunabgu, naq
Rygrxba; fvk pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf: 15:60 Xvewnguonny, juvpu vf
Xvewnguwrnevz, naq Enoonu; gjb pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf: 15:61 Va
gur jvyqrearff, Orgunenonu, Zvqqva, naq Frpnpnu, 15:62 Naq Avofuna,
naq gur pvgl bs Fnyg, naq Ratrqv; fvk pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf.

15:63 Nf sbe gur Wrohfvgrf gur vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz, gur puvyqera
bs Whqnu pbhyq abg qevir gurz bhg; ohg gur Wrohfvgrf qjryy jvgu gur
puvyqera bs Whqnu ng Wrehfnyrz hagb guvf qnl.

16:1 Naq gur ybg bs gur puvyqera bs Wbfrcu sryy sebz Wbeqna ol
Wrevpub, hagb gur jngre bs Wrevpub ba gur rnfg, gb gur jvyqrearff gung
tbrgu hc sebz Wrevpub guebhtubhg zbhag Orgury, 16:2 Naq tbrgu bhg sebz
Orgury gb Yhm, naq cnffrgu nybat hagb gur obeqref bs Nepuv gb Ngnebgu,
16:3 Naq tbrgu qbja jrfgjneq gb gur pbnfg bs Wncuyrgv, hagb gur pbnfg
bs Orguubeba gur argure, naq gb Trmre; naq gur tbvatf bhg gurerbs ner
ng gur frn.

16:4 Fb gur puvyqera bs Wbfrcu, Znanffru naq Rcuenvz, gbbx gurve
vaurevgnapr.

16:5 Naq gur obeqre bs gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz nppbeqvat gb gurve
snzvyvrf jnf guhf: rira gur obeqre bs gurve vaurevgnapr ba gur rnfg
fvqr jnf Ngnebgunqqne, hagb Orguubeba gur hccre; 16:6 Naq gur obeqre
jrag bhg gbjneq gur frn gb Zvpuzrgunu ba gur abegu fvqr; naq gur
obeqre jrag nobhg rnfgjneq hagb Gnnangufuvybu, naq cnffrq ol vg ba gur
rnfg gb Wnabunu; 16:7 Naq vg jrag qbja sebz Wnabunu gb Ngnebgu, naq gb
Annengu, naq pnzr gb Wrevpub, naq jrag bhg ng Wbeqna.

16:8 Gur obeqre jrag bhg sebz Gncchnu jrfgjneq hagb gur evire Xnanu;
naq gur tbvatf bhg gurerbs jrer ng gur frn. Guvf vf gur vaurevgnapr bs
gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz ol gurve snzvyvrf.

16:9 Naq gur frcnengr pvgvrf sbe gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz jrer nzbat
gur vaurevgnapr bs gur puvyqera bs Znanffru, nyy gur pvgvrf jvgu gurve
ivyyntrf.

16:10 Naq gurl qenir abg bhg gur Pnannavgrf gung qjryg va Trmre: ohg
gur Pnannavgrf qjryy nzbat gur Rcuenvzvgrf hagb guvf qnl, naq freir
haqre gevohgr.

17:1 Gurer jnf nyfb n ybg sbe gur gevor bs Znanffru; sbe ur jnf gur
svefgobea bs Wbfrcu; gb jvg, sbe Znpuve gur svefgobea bs Znanffru, gur
sngure bs Tvyrnq: orpnhfr ur jnf n zna bs jne, gurersber ur unq Tvyrnq
naq Onfuna.

17:2 Gurer jnf nyfb n ybg sbe gur erfg bs gur puvyqera bs Znanffru ol
gurve snzvyvrf; sbe gur puvyqera bs Novrmre, naq sbe gur puvyqera bs
Uryrx, naq sbe gur puvyqera bs Nfevry, naq sbe gur puvyqera bs
Furpurz, naq sbe gur puvyqera bs Urcure, naq sbe gur puvyqera bs
Furzvqn: gurfr jrer gur znyr puvyqera bs Znanffru gur fba bs Wbfrcu ol
gurve snzvyvrf.

17:3 Ohg Mrybcurunq, gur fba bs Urcure, gur fba bs Tvyrnq, gur fba bs
Znpuve, gur fba bs Znanffru, unq ab fbaf, ohg qnhtugref: naq gurfr ner
gur anzrf bs uvf qnhtugref, Znuynu, naq Abnu, Ubtynu, Zvypnu, naq
Gvemnu.

17:4 Naq gurl pnzr arne orsber Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, naq orsber Wbfuhn
gur fba bs Aha, naq orsber gur cevaprf, fnlvat, Gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq
Zbfrf gb tvir hf na vaurevgnapr nzbat bhe oerguera. Gurersber
nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ ur tnir gurz na vaurevgnapr
nzbat gur oerguera bs gurve sngure.

17:5 Naq gurer sryy gra cbegvbaf gb Znanffru, orfvqr gur ynaq bs
Tvyrnq naq Onfuna, juvpu jrer ba gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna; 17:6 Orpnhfr
gur qnhtugref bs Znanffru unq na vaurevgnapr nzbat uvf fbaf: naq gur
erfg bs Znanffru'f fbaf unq gur ynaq bs Tvyrnq.

17:7 Naq gur pbnfg bs Znanffru jnf sebz Nfure gb Zvpuzrgunu, gung
yvrgu orsber Furpurz; naq gur obeqre jrag nybat ba gur evtug unaq hagb
gur vaunovgnagf bs Ragncchnu.

17:8 Abj Znanffru unq gur ynaq bs Gncchnu: ohg Gncchnu ba gur obeqre
bs Znanffru orybatrq gb gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz; 17:9 Naq gur pbnfg
qrfpraqrq hagb gur evire Xnanu, fbhgujneq bs gur evire: gurfr pvgvrf
bs Rcuenvz ner nzbat gur pvgvrf bs Znanffru: gur pbnfg bs Znanffru
nyfb jnf ba gur abegu fvqr bs gur evire, naq gur bhgtbvatf bs vg jrer
ng gur frn: 17:10 Fbhgujneq vg jnf Rcuenvz'f, naq abegujneq vg jnf
Znanffru'f, naq gur frn vf uvf obeqre; naq gurl zrg gbtrgure va Nfure
ba gur abegu, naq va Vffnpune ba gur rnfg.

17:11 Naq Znanffru unq va Vffnpune naq va Nfure Orgufurna naq ure
gbjaf, naq Voyrnz naq ure gbjaf, naq gur vaunovgnagf bs Qbe naq ure
gbjaf, naq gur vaunovgnagf bs Raqbe naq ure gbjaf, naq gur vaunovgnagf
bs Gnnanpu naq ure gbjaf, naq gur vaunovgnagf bs Zrtvqqb naq ure
gbjaf, rira guerr pbhagevrf.

17:12 Lrg gur puvyqera bs Znanffru pbhyq abg qevir bhg gur vaunovgnagf
bs gubfr pvgvrf; ohg gur Pnannavgrf jbhyq qjryy va gung ynaq.

17:13 Lrg vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrer jnkra
fgebat, gung gurl chg gur Pnannavgrf gb gevohgr, ohg qvq abg hggreyl
qevir gurz bhg.

17:14 Naq gur puvyqera bs Wbfrcu fcnxr hagb Wbfuhn, fnlvat, Jul unfg
gubh tvira zr ohg bar ybg naq bar cbegvba gb vaurevg, frrvat V nz n
terng crbcyr, sbenfzhpu nf gur YBEQ ungu oyrffrq zr uvguregb?  17:15
Naq Wbfuhn nafjrerq gurz, Vs gubh or n terng crbcyr, gura trg gurr hc
gb gur jbbq pbhagel, naq phg qbja sbe gulfrys gurer va gur ynaq bs gur
Crevmmvgrf naq bs gur tvnagf, vs zbhag Rcuenvz or gbb aneebj sbe gurr.

17:16 Naq gur puvyqera bs Wbfrcu fnvq, Gur uvyy vf abg rabhtu sbe hf:
naq nyy gur Pnannavgrf gung qjryy va gur ynaq bs gur inyyrl unir
punevbgf bs veba, obgu gurl jub ner bs Orgufurna naq ure gbjaf, naq
gurl jub ner bs gur inyyrl bs Wrmerry.

17:17 Naq Wbfuhn fcnxr hagb gur ubhfr bs Wbfrcu, rira gb Rcuenvz naq
gb Znanffru, fnlvat, Gubh neg n terng crbcyr, naq unfg terng cbjre:
gubh funyg abg unir bar ybg bayl: 17:18 Ohg gur zbhagnva funyy or
guvar; sbe vg vf n jbbq, naq gubh funyg phg vg qbja: naq gur bhgtbvatf
bs vg funyy or guvar: sbe gubh funyg qevir bhg gur Pnannavgrf, gubhtu
gurl unir veba punevbgf, naq gubhtu gurl or fgebat.

18:1 Naq gur jubyr pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry nffrzoyrq
gbtrgure ng Fuvybu, naq frg hc gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba
gurer. Naq gur ynaq jnf fhoqhrq orsber gurz.

18:2 Naq gurer erznvarq nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry frira gevorf,
juvpu unq abg lrg erprvirq gurve vaurevgnapr.

18:3 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, Ubj ybat ner lr
fynpx gb tb gb cbffrff gur ynaq, juvpu gur YBEQ Tbq bs lbhe snguref
ungu tvira lbh?  18:4 Tvir bhg sebz nzbat lbh guerr zra sbe rnpu
gevor: naq V jvyy fraq gurz, naq gurl funyy evfr, naq tb guebhtu gur
ynaq, naq qrfpevor vg nppbeqvat gb gur vaurevgnapr bs gurz; naq gurl
funyy pbzr ntnva gb zr.

18:5 Naq gurl funyy qvivqr vg vagb frira cnegf: Whqnu funyy novqr va
gurve pbnfg ba gur fbhgu, naq gur ubhfr bs Wbfrcu funyy novqr va gurve
pbnfgf ba gur abegu.

18:6 Lr funyy gurersber qrfpevor gur ynaq vagb frira cnegf, naq oevat
gur qrfpevcgvba uvgure gb zr, gung V znl pnfg ybgf sbe lbh urer orsber
gur YBEQ bhe Tbq.

18:7 Ohg gur Yrivgrf unir ab cneg nzbat lbh; sbe gur cevrfgubbq bs gur
YBEQ vf gurve vaurevgnapr: naq Tnq, naq Erhora, naq unys gur gevor bs
Znanffru, unir erprvirq gurve vaurevgnapr orlbaq Wbeqna ba gur rnfg,
juvpu Zbfrf gur freinag bs gur YBEQ tnir gurz.

18:8 Naq gur zra nebfr, naq jrag njnl: naq Wbfuhn punetrq gurz gung
jrag gb qrfpevor gur ynaq, fnlvat, Tb naq jnyx guebhtu gur ynaq, naq
qrfpevor vg, naq pbzr ntnva gb zr, gung V znl urer pnfg ybgf sbe lbh
orsber gur YBEQ va Fuvybu.

18:9 Naq gur zra jrag naq cnffrq guebhtu gur ynaq, naq qrfpevorq vg ol
pvgvrf vagb frira cnegf va n obbx, naq pnzr ntnva gb Wbfuhn gb gur
ubfg ng Fuvybu.

18:10 Naq Wbfuhn pnfg ybgf sbe gurz va Fuvybu orsber gur YBEQ: naq
gurer Wbfuhn qvivqrq gur ynaq hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry nppbeqvat gb
gurve qvivfvbaf.

18:11 Naq gur ybg bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva pnzr hc
nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf: naq gur pbnfg bs gurve ybg pnzr sbegu
orgjrra gur puvyqera bs Whqnu naq gur puvyqera bs Wbfrcu.

18:12 Naq gurve obeqre ba gur abegu fvqr jnf sebz Wbeqna; naq gur
obeqre jrag hc gb gur fvqr bs Wrevpub ba gur abegu fvqr, naq jrag hc
guebhtu gur zbhagnvaf jrfgjneq; naq gur tbvatf bhg gurerbs jrer ng gur
jvyqrearff bs Orgunira.

18:13 Naq gur obeqre jrag bire sebz gurapr gbjneq Yhm, gb gur fvqr bs
Yhm, juvpu vf Orgury, fbhgujneq; naq gur obeqre qrfpraqrq gb
Ngnebgunqne, arne gur uvyy gung yvrgu ba gur fbhgu fvqr bs gur argure
Orguubeba.

18:14 Naq gur obeqre jnf qenja gurapr, naq pbzcnffrq gur pbeare bs gur
frn fbhgujneq, sebz gur uvyy gung yvrgu orsber Orguubeba fbhgujneq;
naq gur tbvatf bhg gurerbs jrer ng Xvewnguonny, juvpu vf
Xvewnguwrnevz, n pvgl bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu: guvf jnf gur jrfg
dhnegre.

18:15 Naq gur fbhgu dhnegre jnf sebz gur raq bs Xvewnguwrnevz, naq gur
obeqre jrag bhg ba gur jrfg, naq jrag bhg gb gur jryy bs jngref bs
Arcugbnu: 18:16 Naq gur obeqre pnzr qbja gb gur raq bs gur zbhagnva
gung yvrgu orsber gur inyyrl bs gur fba bs Uvaabz, naq juvpu vf va gur
inyyrl bs gur tvnagf ba gur abegu, naq qrfpraqrq gb gur inyyrl bs
Uvaabz, gb gur fvqr bs Wrohfv ba gur fbhgu, naq qrfpraqrq gb Raebtry,
18:17 Naq jnf qenja sebz gur abegu, naq jrag sbegu gb Rafurzrfu, naq
jrag sbegu gbjneq Tryvybgu, juvpu vf bire ntnvafg gur tbvat hc bs
Nqhzzvz, naq qrfpraqrq gb gur fgbar bs Obuna gur fba bs Erhora, 18:18
Naq cnffrq nybat gbjneq gur fvqr bire ntnvafg Nenonu abegujneq, naq
jrag qbja hagb Nenonu: 18:19 Naq gur obeqre cnffrq nybat gb gur fvqr
bs Orguubtynu abegujneq: naq gur bhgtbvatf bs gur obeqre jrer ng gur
abegu onl bs gur fnyg frn ng gur fbhgu raq bs Wbeqna: guvf jnf gur
fbhgu pbnfg.

18:20 Naq Wbeqna jnf gur obeqre bs vg ba gur rnfg fvqr. Guvf jnf gur
vaurevgnapr bs gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva, ol gur pbnfgf gurerbs ebhaq
nobhg, nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf.

18:21 Abj gur pvgvrf bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva
nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf jrer Wrevpub, naq Orguubtynu, naq gur
inyyrl bs Xrmvm, 18:22 Naq Orgunenonu, naq Mrznenvz, naq Orgury, 18:23
Naq Nivz, naq Cunenu, naq Bcuenu, 18:24 Naq Purcuneunnzzbanv, naq
Bcuav, naq Tnon; gjryir pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf: 18:25 Tvorba, naq
Enznu, naq Orrebgu, 18:26 Naq Zvmcru, naq Purcuvenu, naq Zbmnu, 18:27
Naq Erxrz, naq Vecrry, naq Gnenynu, 18:28 Naq Mrynu, Ryrcu, naq
Wrohfv, juvpu vf Wrehfnyrz, Tvorngu, naq Xvewngu; sbhegrra pvgvrf jvgu
gurve ivyyntrf. Guvf vf gur vaurevgnapr bs gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva
nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf.

19:1 Naq gur frpbaq ybg pnzr sbegu gb Fvzrba, rira sbe gur gevor bs
gur puvyqera bs Fvzrba nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf: naq gurve
vaurevgnapr jnf jvguva gur vaurevgnapr bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu.

19:2 Naq gurl unq va gurve vaurevgnapr Orrefuron, naq Furon, naq
Zbynqnu, 19:3 Naq Unmnefuhny, naq Onynu, naq Nmrz, 19:4 Naq Rygbynq,
naq Orguhy, naq Ubeznu, 19:5 Naq Mvxynt, naq Orguznepnobgu, naq
Unmnefhfnu, 19:6 Naq Orguyronbgu, naq Funehura; guvegrra pvgvrf naq
gurve ivyyntrf: 19:7 Nva, Erzzba, naq Rgure, naq Nfuna; sbhe pvgvrf
naq gurve ivyyntrf: 19:8 Naq nyy gur ivyyntrf gung jrer ebhaq nobhg
gurfr pvgvrf gb Onnynguorre, Enzngu bs gur fbhgu. Guvf vf gur
vaurevgnapr bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Fvzrba nppbeqvat gb gurve
snzvyvrf.

19:9 Bhg bs gur cbegvba bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu jnf gur vaurevgnapr
bs gur puvyqera bs Fvzrba: sbe gur cneg bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu jnf
gbb zhpu sbe gurz: gurersber gur puvyqera bs Fvzrba unq gurve
vaurevgnapr jvguva gur vaurevgnapr bs gurz.

19:10 Naq gur guveq ybg pnzr hc sbe gur puvyqera bs Mrohyha nppbeqvat
gb gurve snzvyvrf: naq gur obeqre bs gurve vaurevgnapr jnf hagb Fnevq:
19:11 Naq gurve obeqre jrag hc gbjneq gur frn, naq Znenynu, naq
ernpurq gb Qnoonfurgu, naq ernpurq gb gur evire gung vf orsber
Wbxarnz; 19:12 Naq ghearq sebz Fnevq rnfgjneq gbjneq gur fhaevfvat
hagb gur obeqre bs Puvfybgugnobe, naq gura tbrgu bhg gb Qnorengu, naq
tbrgu hc gb Wncuvn, 19:13 Naq sebz gurapr cnffrgu ba nybat ba gur rnfg
gb Tvggnuurcure, gb Vggnuxnmva, naq tbrgu bhg gb Erzzbazrgubne gb
Arnu; 19:14 Naq gur obeqre pbzcnffrgu vg ba gur abegu fvqr gb
Unaanguba: naq gur bhgtbvatf gurerbs ner va gur inyyrl bs Wvcugunury:
19:15 Naq Xnggngu, naq Anunyyny, naq Fuvzeba, naq Vqnynu, naq
Orguyrurz: gjryir pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf.

19:16 Guvf vf gur vaurevgnapr bs gur puvyqera bs Mrohyha nppbeqvat gb
gurve snzvyvrf, gurfr pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf.

19:17 Naq gur sbhegu ybg pnzr bhg gb Vffnpune, sbe gur puvyqera bs
Vffnpune nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf.

19:18 Naq gurve obeqre jnf gbjneq Wrmerry, naq Purfhyybgu, naq Fuharz,
19:19 Naq Uncuenvz, naq Fuvuba, naq Nanunengu, 19:20 Naq Enoovgu, naq
Xvfuvba, naq Norm, 19:21 Naq Erzrgu, naq Ratnaavz, naq Raunqqnu, naq
Orgucnmmrm; 19:22 Naq gur pbnfg ernpurgu gb Gnobe, naq Fununmvznu, naq
Orgufurzrfu; naq gur bhgtbvatf bs gurve obeqre jrer ng Wbeqna: fvkgrra
pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf.

19:23 Guvf vf gur vaurevgnapr bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Vffnpune
nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf, gur pvgvrf naq gurve ivyyntrf.

19:24 Naq gur svsgu ybg pnzr bhg sbe gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs
Nfure nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf.

19:25 Naq gurve obeqre jnf Uryxngu, naq Unyv, naq Orgra, naq Npufuncu,
19:26 Naq Nynzzryrpu, naq Nznq, naq Zvfurny; naq ernpurgu gb Pnezry
jrfgjneq, naq gb Fuvubeyvoangu; 19:27 Naq gheargu gbjneq gur fhaevfvat
gb Orguqntba, naq ernpurgu gb Mrohyha, naq gb gur inyyrl bs Wvcugunury
gbjneq gur abegu fvqr bs Orgurzrx, naq Arvry, naq tbrgu bhg gb Pnohy
ba gur yrsg unaq, 19:28 Naq Uroeba, naq Erubo, naq Unzzba, naq Xnanu,
rira hagb terng Mvqba; 19:29 Naq gura gur pbnfg gheargu gb Enznu, naq
gb gur fgebat pvgl Gler; naq gur pbnfg gheargu gb Ubfnu; naq gur
bhgtbvatf gurerbs ner ng gur frn sebz gur pbnfg gb Npumvo: 19:30 Hzznu
nyfb, naq Ncurx, naq Erubo: gjragl naq gjb pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf.

19:31 Guvf vf gur vaurevgnapr bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Nfure
nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf, gurfr pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf.

19:32 Gur fvkgu ybg pnzr bhg gb gur puvyqera bs Ancugnyv, rira sbe gur
puvyqera bs Ancugnyv nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf.

19:33 Naq gurve pbnfg jnf sebz Uryrcu, sebz Nyyba gb Mnnanaavz, naq
Nqnzv, Arxro, naq Wnoarry, hagb Ynxhz; naq gur bhgtbvatf gurerbs jrer
ng Wbeqna: 19:34 Naq gura gur pbnfg gheargu jrfgjneq gb Nmabgugnobe,
naq tbrgu bhg sebz gurapr gb Uhxxbx, naq ernpurgu gb Mrohyha ba gur
fbhgu fvqr, naq ernpurgu gb Nfure ba gur jrfg fvqr, naq gb Whqnu hcba
Wbeqna gbjneq gur fhaevfvat.

19:35 Naq gur sraprq pvgvrf ner Mvqqvz, Mre, naq Unzzngu, Enxxngu, naq
Puvaarergu, 19:36 Naq Nqnznu, naq Enznu, naq Unmbe, 19:37 Naq Xrqrfu,
naq Rqerv, naq Raunmbe, 19:38 Naq Veba, naq Zvtqnyry, Uberz, naq
Orgunangu, naq Orgufurzrfu; avargrra pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf.

19:39 Guvf vf gur vaurevgnapr bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Ancugnyv
nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf, gur pvgvrf naq gurve ivyyntrf.

19:40 Naq gur friragu ybg pnzr bhg sbe gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs
Qna nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf.

19:41 Naq gur pbnfg bs gurve vaurevgnapr jnf Mbenu, naq Rfugnby, naq
Vefurzrfu, 19:42 Naq Funnynoova, naq Nwnyba, naq Wrguynu, 19:43 Naq
Ryba, naq Guvzangunu, naq Rxeba, 19:44 Naq Rygrxru, naq Tvoorguba, naq
Onnyngu, 19:45 Naq Wruhq, naq Orarorenx, naq Tnguevzzba, 19:46 Naq
Zrwnexba, naq Enxxba, jvgu gur obeqre orsber Wncub.

19:47 Naq gur pbnfg bs gur puvyqera bs Qna jrag bhg gbb yvggyr sbe
gurz: gurersber gur puvyqera bs Qna jrag hc gb svtug ntnvafg Yrfurz,
naq gbbx vg, naq fzbgr vg jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq, naq cbffrffrq
vg, naq qjryg gurerva, naq pnyyrq Yrfurz, Qna, nsgre gur anzr bs Qna
gurve sngure.

19:48 Guvf vf gur vaurevgnapr bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Qna
nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf, gurfr pvgvrf jvgu gurve ivyyntrf.

19:49 Jura gurl unq znqr na raq bs qvivqvat gur ynaq sbe vaurevgnapr
ol gurve pbnfgf, gur puvyqera bs Vfenry tnir na vaurevgnapr gb Wbfuhn
gur fba bs Aha nzbat gurz: 19:50 Nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ
gurl tnir uvz gur pvgl juvpu ur nfxrq, rira Gvzangufrenu va zbhag
Rcuenvz: naq ur ohvyg gur pvgl, naq qjryg gurerva.

19:51 Gurfr ner gur vaurevgnaprf, juvpu Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, naq Wbfuhn
gur fba bs Aha, naq gur urnqf bs gur snguref bs gur gevorf bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, qvivqrq sbe na vaurevgnapr ol ybg va Fuvybu orsber
gur YBEQ, ng gur qbbe bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba. Fb gurl
znqr na raq bs qvivqvat gur pbhagel.

20:1 Gur YBEQ nyfb fcnxr hagb Wbfuhn, fnlvat, 20:2 Fcrnx gb gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Nccbvag bhg sbe lbh pvgvrf bs ershtr,
jurerbs V fcnxr hagb lbh ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf: 20:3 Gung gur fynlre
gung xvyyrgu nal crefba hanjnerf naq hajvggvatyl znl syrr guvgure: naq
gurl funyy or lbhe ershtr sebz gur niratre bs oybbq.

20:4 Naq jura ur gung qbgu syrr hagb bar bs gubfr pvgvrf funyy fgnaq
ng gur ragrevat bs gur tngr bs gur pvgl, naq funyy qrpyner uvf pnhfr
va gur rnef bs gur ryqref bs gung pvgl, gurl funyy gnxr uvz vagb gur
pvgl hagb gurz, naq tvir uvz n cynpr, gung ur znl qjryy nzbat gurz.

20:5 Naq vs gur niratre bs oybbq chefhr nsgre uvz, gura gurl funyy abg
qryvire gur fynlre hc vagb uvf unaq; orpnhfr ur fzbgr uvf arvtuobhe
hajvggvatyl, naq ungrq uvz abg orsbergvzr.

20:6 Naq ur funyy qjryy va gung pvgl, hagvy ur fgnaq orsber gur
pbatertngvba sbe whqtzrag, naq hagvy gur qrngu bs gur uvtu cevrfg gung
funyy or va gubfr qnlf: gura funyy gur fynlre erghea, naq pbzr hagb
uvf bja pvgl, naq hagb uvf bja ubhfr, hagb gur pvgl sebz jurapr ur
syrq.

20:7 Naq gurl nccbvagrq Xrqrfu va Tnyvyrr va zbhag Ancugnyv, naq
Furpurz va zbhag Rcuenvz, naq Xvewnguneon, juvpu vf Uroeba, va gur
zbhagnva bs Whqnu.

20:8 Naq ba gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna ol Wrevpub rnfgjneq, gurl nffvtarq
Ormre va gur jvyqrearff hcba gur cynva bhg bs gur gevor bs Erhora, naq
Enzbgu va Tvyrnq bhg bs gur gevor bs Tnq, naq Tbyna va Onfuna bhg bs
gur gevor bs Znanffru.

20:9 Gurfr jrer gur pvgvrf nccbvagrq sbe nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry,
naq sbe gur fgenatre gung fbwbheargu nzbat gurz, gung jubfbrire
xvyyrgu nal crefba ng hanjnerf zvtug syrr guvgure, naq abg qvr ol gur
unaq bs gur niratre bs oybbq, hagvy ur fgbbq orsber gur pbatertngvba.

21:1 Gura pnzr arne gur urnqf bs gur snguref bs gur Yrivgrf hagb
Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, naq hagb Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha, naq hagb gur urnqf
bs gur snguref bs gur gevorf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry; 21:2 Naq gurl
fcnxr hagb gurz ng Fuvybu va gur ynaq bs Pnanna, fnlvat, Gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf gb tvir hf pvgvrf gb qjryy va, jvgu gur
fhoheof gurerbs sbe bhe pnggyr.

21:3 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry tnir hagb gur Yrivgrf bhg bs gurve
vaurevgnapr, ng gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ, gurfr pvgvrf naq gurve
fhoheof.

21:4 Naq gur ybg pnzr bhg sbe gur snzvyvrf bs gur Xbunguvgrf: naq gur
puvyqera bs Nneba gur cevrfg, juvpu jrer bs gur Yrivgrf, unq ol ybg
bhg bs gur gevor bs Whqnu, naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Fvzrba, naq bhg bs
gur gevor bs Orawnzva, guvegrra pvgvrf.

21:5 Naq gur erfg bs gur puvyqera bs Xbungu unq ol ybg bhg bs gur
snzvyvrf bs gur gevor bs Rcuenvz, naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Qna, naq bhg
bs gur unys gevor bs Znanffru, gra pvgvrf.

21:6 Naq gur puvyqera bs Trefuba unq ol ybg bhg bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur
gevor bs Vffnpune, naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Nfure, naq bhg bs gur gevor
bs Ancugnyv, naq bhg bs gur unys gevor bs Znanffru va Onfuna, guvegrra
pvgvrf.

21:7 Gur puvyqera bs Zrenev ol gurve snzvyvrf unq bhg bs gur gevor bs
Erhora, naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Tnq, naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Mrohyha,
gjryir pvgvrf.

21:8 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry tnir ol ybg hagb gur Yrivgrf gurfr
pvgvrf jvgu gurve fhoheof, nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf.

21:9 Naq gurl tnir bhg bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu, naq bhg
bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Fvzrba, gurfr pvgvrf juvpu ner urer
zragvbarq ol anzr.

21:10 Juvpu gur puvyqera bs Nneba, orvat bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur
Xbunguvgrf, jub jrer bs gur puvyqera bs Yriv, unq: sbe gurvef jnf gur
svefg ybg.

21:11 Naq gurl tnir gurz gur pvgl bs Neon gur sngure bs Nanx, juvpu
pvgl vf Uroeba, va gur uvyy pbhagel bs Whqnu, jvgu gur fhoheof gurerbs
ebhaq nobhg vg.

21:12 Ohg gur svryqf bs gur pvgl, naq gur ivyyntrf gurerbs, tnir gurl
gb Pnyro gur fba bs Wrcuhaaru sbe uvf cbffrffvba.

21:13 Guhf gurl tnir gb gur puvyqera bs Nneba gur cevrfg Uroeba jvgu
ure fhoheof, gb or n pvgl bs ershtr sbe gur fynlre; naq Yvoanu jvgu
ure fhoheof, 21:14 Naq Wnggve jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Rfugrzbn jvgu ure
fhoheof, 21:15 Naq Ubyba jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Qrove jvgu ure fhoheof,
21:16 Naq Nva jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Whggnu jvgu ure fhoheof, naq
Orgufurzrfu jvgu ure fhoheof; avar pvgvrf bhg bs gubfr gjb gevorf.

21:17 Naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Orawnzva, Tvorba jvgu ure fhoheof, Tron
jvgu ure fhoheof, 21:18 Nangubgu jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Nyzba jvgu ure
fhoheof; sbhe pvgvrf.

21:19 Nyy gur pvgvrf bs gur puvyqera bs Nneba, gur cevrfgf, jrer
guvegrra pvgvrf jvgu gurve fhoheof.

21:20 Naq gur snzvyvrf bs gur puvyqera bs Xbungu, gur Yrivgrf juvpu
erznvarq bs gur puvyqera bs Xbungu, rira gurl unq gur pvgvrf bs gurve
ybg bhg bs gur gevor bs Rcuenvz.

21:21 Sbe gurl tnir gurz Furpurz jvgu ure fhoheof va zbhag Rcuenvz, gb
or n pvgl bs ershtr sbe gur fynlre; naq Trmre jvgu ure fhoheof, 21:22
Naq Xvomnvz jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Orguubeba jvgu ure fhoheof; sbhe
pvgvrf.

21:23 Naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Qna, Rygrxru jvgu ure fhoheof, Tvoorguba
jvgu ure fhoheof, 21:24 Nvwnyba jvgu ure fhoheof, Tnguevzzba jvgu ure
fhoheof; sbhe pvgvrf.

21:25 Naq bhg bs gur unys gevor bs Znanffru, Gnanpu jvgu ure fhoheof,
naq Tnguevzzba jvgu ure fhoheof; gjb pvgvrf.

21:26 Nyy gur pvgvrf jrer gra jvgu gurve fhoheof sbe gur snzvyvrf bs
gur puvyqera bs Xbungu gung erznvarq.

21:27 Naq hagb gur puvyqera bs Trefuba, bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur
Yrivgrf, bhg bs gur bgure unys gevor bs Znanffru gurl tnir Tbyna va
Onfuna jvgu ure fhoheof, gb or n pvgl bs ershtr sbe gur fynlre; naq
Orrfugrenu jvgu ure fhoheof; gjb pvgvrf.

21:28 Naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Vffnpune, Xvfuba jvgu ure fhoheof,
Qnoneru jvgu ure fhoheof, 21:29 Wnezhgu jvgu ure fhoheof, Ratnaavz
jvgu ure fhoheof; sbhe pvgvrf.

21:30 Naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Nfure, Zvfuny jvgu ure fhoheof, Noqba
jvgu ure fhoheof, 21:31 Uryxngu jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Erubo jvgu ure
fhoheof; sbhe pvgvrf.

21:32 Naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Ancugnyv, Xrqrfu va Tnyvyrr jvgu ure
fhoheof, gb or n pvgl bs ershtr sbe gur fynlre; naq Unzzbguqbe jvgu
ure fhoheof, naq Xnegna jvgu ure fhoheof; guerr pvgvrf.

21:33 Nyy gur pvgvrf bs gur Trefubavgrf nppbeqvat gb gurve snzvyvrf
jrer guvegrra pvgvrf jvgu gurve fhoheof.

21:34 Naq hagb gur snzvyvrf bs gur puvyqera bs Zrenev, gur erfg bs gur
Yrivgrf, bhg bs gur gevor bs Mrohyha, Wbxarnz jvgu ure fhoheof, naq
Xnegnu jvgu ure fhoheof, 21:35 Qvzanu jvgu ure fhoheof, Anunyny jvgu
ure fhoheof; sbhe pvgvrf.
