21:36 Naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Erhora, Ormre jvgu ure fhoheof, naq
Wnunmnu jvgu ure fhoheof, 21:37 Xrqrzbgu jvgu ure fhoheof, naq
Zrcunngu jvgu ure fhoheof; sbhe pvgvrf.

21:38 Naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Tnq, Enzbgu va Tvyrnq jvgu ure fhoheof,
gb or n pvgl bs ershtr sbe gur fynlre; naq Znunanvz jvgu ure fhoheof,
21:39 Urfuoba jvgu ure fhoheof, Wnmre jvgu ure fhoheof; sbhe pvgvrf va
nyy.

21:40 Fb nyy gur pvgvrf sbe gur puvyqera bs Zrenev ol gurve snzvyvrf,
juvpu jrer erznvavat bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur Yrivgrf, jrer ol gurve ybg
gjryir pvgvrf.

21:41 Nyy gur pvgvrf bs gur Yrivgrf jvguva gur cbffrffvba bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry jrer sbegl naq rvtug pvgvrf jvgu gurve fhoheof.

21:42 Gurfr pvgvrf jrer rirel bar jvgu gurve fhoheof ebhaq nobhg gurz:
guhf jrer nyy gurfr pvgvrf.

21:43 Naq gur YBEQ tnir hagb Vfenry nyy gur ynaq juvpu ur fjner gb
tvir hagb gurve snguref; naq gurl cbffrffrq vg, naq qjryg gurerva.

21:44 Naq gur YBEQ tnir gurz erfg ebhaq nobhg, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung
ur fjner hagb gurve snguref: naq gurer fgbbq abg n zna bs nyy gurve
rarzvrf orsber gurz; gur YBEQ qryvirerq nyy gurve rarzvrf vagb gurve
unaq.

21:45 Gurer snvyrq abg bhtug bs nal tbbq guvat juvpu gur YBEQ unq
fcbxra hagb gur ubhfr bs Vfenry; nyy pnzr gb cnff.

22:1 Gura Wbfuhn pnyyrq gur Erhoravgrf, naq gur Tnqvgrf, naq gur unys
gevor bs Znanffru, 22:2 Naq fnvq hagb gurz, Lr unir xrcg nyy gung
Zbfrf gur freinag bs gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq lbh, naq unir borlrq zl ibvpr
va nyy gung V pbzznaqrq lbh: 22:3 Lr unir abg yrsg lbhe oerguera gurfr
znal qnlf hagb guvf qnl, ohg unir xrcg gur punetr bs gur pbzznaqzrag
bs gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq.

22:4 Naq abj gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ungu tvira erfg hagb lbhe oerguera, nf
ur cebzvfrq gurz: gurersber abj erghea lr, naq trg lbh hagb lbhe
gragf, naq hagb gur ynaq bs lbhe cbffrffvba, juvpu Zbfrf gur freinag
bs gur YBEQ tnir lbh ba gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna.

22:5 Ohg gnxr qvyvtrag urrq gb qb gur pbzznaqzrag naq gur ynj, juvpu
Zbfrf gur freinag bs gur YBEQ punetrq lbh, gb ybir gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq,
naq gb jnyx va nyy uvf jnlf, naq gb xrrc uvf pbzznaqzragf, naq gb
pyrnir hagb uvz, naq gb freir uvz jvgu nyy lbhe urneg naq jvgu nyy
lbhe fbhy.

22:6 Fb Wbfuhn oyrffrq gurz, naq frag gurz njnl: naq gurl jrag hagb
gurve gragf.

22:7 Abj gb gur bar unys bs gur gevor bs Znanffru Zbfrf unq tvira
cbffrffvba va Onfuna: ohg hagb gur bgure unys gurerbs tnir Wbfuhn
nzbat gurve oerguera ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna jrfgjneq. Naq jura Wbfuhn
frag gurz njnl nyfb hagb gurve gragf, gura ur oyrffrq gurz, 22:8 Naq
ur fcnxr hagb gurz, fnlvat, Erghea jvgu zhpu evpurf hagb lbhe gragf,
naq jvgu irel zhpu pnggyr, jvgu fvyire, naq jvgu tbyq, naq jvgu oenff,
naq jvgu veba, naq jvgu irel zhpu envzrag: qvivqr gur fcbvy bs lbhe
rarzvrf jvgu lbhe oerguera.

22:9 Naq gur puvyqera bs Erhora naq gur puvyqera bs Tnq naq gur unys
gevor bs Znanffru erghearq, naq qrcnegrq sebz gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
bhg bs Fuvybu, juvpu vf va gur ynaq bs Pnanna, gb tb hagb gur pbhagel
bs Tvyrnq, gb gur ynaq bs gurve cbffrffvba, jurerbs gurl jrer
cbffrffrq, nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf.

22:10 Naq jura gurl pnzr hagb gur obeqref bs Wbeqna, gung ner va gur
ynaq bs Pnanna, gur puvyqera bs Erhora naq gur puvyqera bs Tnq naq gur
unys gevor bs Znanffru ohvyg gurer na nygne ol Wbeqna, n terng nygne
gb frr gb.

22:11 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry urneq fnl, Orubyq, gur puvyqera bs
Erhora naq gur puvyqera bs Tnq naq gur unys gevor bs Znanffru unir
ohvyg na nygne bire ntnvafg gur ynaq bs Pnanna, va gur obeqref bs
Wbeqna, ng gur cnffntr bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

22:12 Naq jura gur puvyqera bs Vfenry urneq bs vg, gur jubyr
pbatertngvba bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure ng
Fuvybu, gb tb hc gb jne ntnvafg gurz.

22:13 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry frag hagb gur puvyqera bs Erhora, naq
gb gur puvyqera bs Tnq, naq gb gur unys gevor bs Znanffru, vagb gur
ynaq bs Tvyrnq, Cuvarunf gur fba bs Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, 22:14 Naq jvgu
uvz gra cevaprf, bs rnpu puvrs ubhfr n cevapr guebhtubhg nyy gur
gevorf bs Vfenry; naq rnpu bar jnf na urnq bs gur ubhfr bs gurve
snguref nzbat gur gubhfnaqf bs Vfenry.

22:15 Naq gurl pnzr hagb gur puvyqera bs Erhora, naq gb gur puvyqera
bs Tnq, naq gb gur unys gevor bs Znanffru, hagb gur ynaq bs Tvyrnq,
naq gurl fcnxr jvgu gurz, fnlvat, 22:16 Guhf fnvgu gur jubyr
pbatertngvba bs gur YBEQ, Jung gerfcnff vf guvf gung lr unir pbzzvggrq
ntnvafg gur Tbq bs Vfenry, gb ghea njnl guvf qnl sebz sbyybjvat gur
YBEQ, va gung lr unir ohvyqrq lbh na nygne, gung lr zvtug erory guvf
qnl ntnvafg gur YBEQ?  22:17 Vf gur vavdhvgl bs Crbe gbb yvggyr sbe
hf, sebz juvpu jr ner abg pyrnafrq hagvy guvf qnl, nygubhtu gurer jnf
n cynthr va gur pbatertngvba bs gur YBEQ, 22:18 Ohg gung lr zhfg ghea
njnl guvf qnl sebz sbyybjvat gur YBEQ? naq vg jvyy or, frrvat lr erory
gb qnl ntnvafg gur YBEQ, gung gb zbeebj ur jvyy or jebgu jvgu gur
jubyr pbatertngvba bs Vfenry.

22:19 Abgjvgufgnaqvat, vs gur ynaq bs lbhe cbffrffvba or hapyrna, gura
cnff lr bire hagb gur ynaq bs gur cbffrffvba bs gur YBEQ, jurerva gur
YBEQ'f gnoreanpyr qjryyrgu, naq gnxr cbffrffvba nzbat hf: ohg erory
abg ntnvafg gur YBEQ, abe erory ntnvafg hf, va ohvyqvat lbh na nygne
orfvqr gur nygne bs gur YBEQ bhe Tbq.

22:20 Qvq abg Npuna gur fba bs Mrenu pbzzvg n gerfcnff va gur npphefrq
guvat, naq jengu sryy ba nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry? naq gung zna
crevfurq abg nybar va uvf vavdhvgl.

22:21 Gura gur puvyqera bs Erhora naq gur puvyqera bs Tnq naq gur unys
gevor bs Znanffru nafjrerq, naq fnvq hagb gur urnqf bs gur gubhfnaqf
bs Vfenry, 22:22 Gur YBEQ Tbq bs tbqf, gur YBEQ Tbq bs tbqf, ur
xabjrgu, naq Vfenry ur funyy xabj; vs vg or va eroryyvba, be vs va
genafterffvba ntnvafg gur YBEQ, (fnir hf abg guvf qnl,) 22:23 Gung jr
unir ohvyg hf na nygne gb ghea sebz sbyybjvat gur YBEQ, be vs gb bssre
gurerba oheag bssrevat be zrng bssrevat, be vs gb bssre crnpr
bssrevatf gurerba, yrg gur YBEQ uvzfrys erdhver vg; 22:24 Naq vs jr
unir abg engure qbar vg sbe srne bs guvf guvat, fnlvat, Va gvzr gb
pbzr lbhe puvyqera zvtug fcrnx hagb bhe puvyqera, fnlvat, Jung unir lr
gb qb jvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry?  22:25 Sbe gur YBEQ ungu znqr
Wbeqna n obeqre orgjrra hf naq lbh, lr puvyqera bs Erhora naq puvyqera
bs Tnq; lr unir ab cneg va gur YBEQ: fb funyy lbhe puvyqera znxr bhe
puvyqera prnfr sebz srnevat gur YBEQ.

22:26 Gurersber jr fnvq, Yrg hf abj cercner gb ohvyq hf na nygne, abg
sbe oheag bssrevat, abe sbe fnpevsvpr: 22:27 Ohg gung vg znl or n
jvgarff orgjrra hf, naq lbh, naq bhe trarengvbaf nsgre hf, gung jr
zvtug qb gur freivpr bs gur YBEQ orsber uvz jvgu bhe oheag bssrevatf,
naq jvgu bhe fnpevsvprf, naq jvgu bhe crnpr bssrevatf; gung lbhe
puvyqera znl abg fnl gb bhe puvyqera va gvzr gb pbzr, Lr unir ab cneg
va gur YBEQ.

22:28 Gurersber fnvq jr, gung vg funyy or, jura gurl fubhyq fb fnl gb
hf be gb bhe trarengvbaf va gvzr gb pbzr, gung jr znl fnl ntnva,
Orubyq gur cnggrea bs gur nygne bs gur YBEQ, juvpu bhe snguref znqr,
abg sbe oheag bssrevatf, abe sbe fnpevsvprf; ohg vg vf n jvgarff
orgjrra hf naq lbh.

22:29 Tbq sbeovq gung jr fubhyq erory ntnvafg gur YBEQ, naq ghea guvf
qnl sebz sbyybjvat gur YBEQ, gb ohvyq na nygne sbe oheag bssrevatf,
sbe zrng bssrevatf, be sbe fnpevsvprf, orfvqr gur nygne bs gur YBEQ
bhe Tbq gung vf orsber uvf gnoreanpyr.

22:30 Naq jura Cuvarunf gur cevrfg, naq gur cevaprf bs gur
pbatertngvba naq urnqf bs gur gubhfnaqf bs Vfenry juvpu jrer jvgu uvz,
urneq gur jbeqf gung gur puvyqera bs Erhora naq gur puvyqera bs Tnq
naq gur puvyqera bs Znanffru fcnxr, vg cyrnfrq gurz.

22:31 Naq Cuvarunf gur fba bs Ryrnmne gur cevrfg fnvq hagb gur
puvyqera bs Erhora, naq gb gur puvyqera bs Tnq, naq gb gur puvyqera bs
Znanffru, Guvf qnl jr creprvir gung gur YBEQ vf nzbat hf, orpnhfr lr
unir abg pbzzvggrq guvf gerfcnff ntnvafg gur YBEQ: abj lr unir
qryvirerq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry bhg bs gur unaq bs gur YBEQ.

22:32 Naq Cuvarunf gur fba bs Ryrnmne gur cevrfg, naq gur cevaprf,
erghearq sebz gur puvyqera bs Erhora, naq sebz gur puvyqera bs Tnq,
bhg bs gur ynaq bs Tvyrnq, hagb gur ynaq bs Pnanna, gb gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, naq oebhtug gurz jbeq ntnva.

22:33 Naq gur guvat cyrnfrq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry; naq gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry oyrffrq Tbq, naq qvq abg vagraq gb tb hc ntnvafg gurz va
onggyr, gb qrfgebl gur ynaq jurerva gur puvyqera bs Erhora naq Tnq
qjryg.

22:34 Naq gur puvyqera bs Erhora naq gur puvyqera bs Tnq pnyyrq gur
nygne Rq: sbe vg funyy or n jvgarff orgjrra hf gung gur YBEQ vf Tbq.

23:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff n ybat gvzr nsgre gung gur YBEQ unq tvira
erfg hagb Vfenry sebz nyy gurve rarzvrf ebhaq nobhg, gung Wbfuhn jnkrq
byq naq fgevpxra va ntr.

23:2 Naq Wbfuhn pnyyrq sbe nyy Vfenry, naq sbe gurve ryqref, naq sbe
gurve urnqf, naq sbe gurve whqtrf, naq sbe gurve bssvpref, naq fnvq
hagb gurz, V nz byq naq fgevpxra va ntr: 23:3 Naq lr unir frra nyy
gung gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ungu qbar hagb nyy gurfr angvbaf orpnhfr bs
lbh; sbe gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq vf ur gung ungu sbhtug sbe lbh.

23:4 Orubyq, V unir qvivqrq hagb lbh ol ybg gurfr angvbaf gung erznva,
gb or na vaurevgnapr sbe lbhe gevorf, sebz Wbeqna, jvgu nyy gur
angvbaf gung V unir phg bss, rira hagb gur terng frn jrfgjneq.

23:5 Naq gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, ur funyy rkcry gurz sebz orsber lbh, naq
qevir gurz sebz bhg bs lbhe fvtug; naq lr funyy cbffrff gurve ynaq, nf
gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ungu cebzvfrq hagb lbh.

23:6 Or lr gurersber irel pbhentrbhf gb xrrc naq gb qb nyy gung vf
jevggra va gur obbx bs gur ynj bs Zbfrf, gung lr ghea abg nfvqr
gurersebz gb gur evtug unaq be gb gur yrsg; 23:7 Gung lr pbzr abg
nzbat gurfr angvbaf, gurfr gung erznva nzbat lbh; arvgure znxr zragvba
bs gur anzr bs gurve tbqf, abe pnhfr gb fjrne ol gurz, arvgure freir
gurz, abe obj lbhefryirf hagb gurz: 23:8 Ohg pyrnir hagb gur YBEQ lbhe
Tbq, nf lr unir qbar hagb guvf qnl.

23:9 Sbe gur YBEQ ungu qevira bhg sebz orsber lbh terng angvbaf naq
fgebat: ohg nf sbe lbh, ab zna ungu orra noyr gb fgnaq orsber lbh hagb
guvf qnl.

23:10 Bar zna bs lbh funyy punfr n gubhfnaq: sbe gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, ur
vg vf gung svtugrgu sbe lbh, nf ur ungu cebzvfrq lbh.

23:11 Gnxr tbbq urrq gurersber hagb lbhefryirf, gung lr ybir gur YBEQ
lbhe Tbq.

23:12 Ryfr vs lr qb va nal jvfr tb onpx, naq pyrnir hagb gur erzanag
bs gurfr angvbaf, rira gurfr gung erznva nzbat lbh, naq funyy znxr
zneevntrf jvgu gurz, naq tb va hagb gurz, naq gurl gb lbh: 23:13 Xabj
sbe n pregnvagl gung gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq jvyy ab zber qevir bhg nal bs
gurfr angvbaf sebz orsber lbh; ohg gurl funyy or fanerf naq gencf hagb
lbh, naq fpbhetrf va lbhe fvqrf, naq gubeaf va lbhe rlrf, hagvy lr
crevfu sebz bss guvf tbbq ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ungu tvira lbh.

23:14 Naq, orubyq, guvf qnl V nz tbvat gur jnl bs nyy gur rnegu: naq
lr xabj va nyy lbhe urnegf naq va nyy lbhe fbhyf, gung abg bar guvat
ungu snvyrq bs nyy gur tbbq guvatf juvpu gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq fcnxr
pbapreavat lbh; nyy ner pbzr gb cnff hagb lbh, naq abg bar guvat ungu
snvyrq gurerbs.

23:15 Gurersber vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung nf nyy tbbq guvatf ner
pbzr hcba lbh, juvpu gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq cebzvfrq lbh; fb funyy gur YBEQ
oevat hcba lbh nyy rivy guvatf, hagvy ur unir qrfgeblrq lbh sebz bss
guvf tbbq ynaq juvpu gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq ungu tvira lbh.

23:16 Jura lr unir genafterffrq gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq,
juvpu ur pbzznaqrq lbh, naq unir tbar naq freirq bgure tbqf, naq objrq
lbhefryirf gb gurz; gura funyy gur natre bs gur YBEQ or xvaqyrq
ntnvafg lbh, naq lr funyy crevfu dhvpxyl sebz bss gur tbbq ynaq juvpu
ur ungu tvira hagb lbh.

24:1 Naq Wbfuhn tngurerq nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry gb Furpurz, naq
pnyyrq sbe gur ryqref bs Vfenry, naq sbe gurve urnqf, naq sbe gurve
whqtrf, naq sbe gurve bssvpref; naq gurl cerfragrq gurzfryirf orsber
Tbq.

24:2 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq hagb nyy gur crbcyr, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs
Vfenry, Lbhe snguref qjryg ba gur bgure fvqr bs gur sybbq va byq gvzr,
rira Grenu, gur sngure bs Noenunz, naq gur sngure bs Anpube: naq gurl
freirq bgure tbqf.

24:3 Naq V gbbx lbhe sngure Noenunz sebz gur bgure fvqr bs gur sybbq,
naq yrq uvz guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs Pnanna, naq zhygvcyvrq uvf
frrq, naq tnir uvz Vfnnp.

24:4 Naq V tnir hagb Vfnnp Wnpbo naq Rfnh: naq V tnir hagb Rfnh zbhag
Frve, gb cbffrff vg; ohg Wnpbo naq uvf puvyqera jrag qbja vagb Rtlcg.

24:5 V frag Zbfrf nyfb naq Nneba, naq V cynthrq Rtlcg, nppbeqvat gb
gung juvpu V qvq nzbat gurz: naq nsgrejneq V oebhtug lbh bhg.

24:6 Naq V oebhtug lbhe snguref bhg bs Rtlcg: naq lr pnzr hagb gur
frn; naq gur Rtlcgvnaf chefhrq nsgre lbhe snguref jvgu punevbgf naq
ubefrzra hagb gur Erq frn.

24:7 Naq jura gurl pevrq hagb gur YBEQ, ur chg qnexarff orgjrra lbh
naq gur Rtlcgvnaf, naq oebhtug gur frn hcba gurz, naq pbirerq gurz;
naq lbhe rlrf unir frra jung V unir qbar va Rtlcg: naq lr qjryg va gur
jvyqrearff n ybat frnfba.

24:8 Naq V oebhtug lbh vagb gur ynaq bs gur Nzbevgrf, juvpu qjryg ba
gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna; naq gurl sbhtug jvgu lbh: naq V tnir gurz vagb
lbhe unaq, gung lr zvtug cbffrff gurve ynaq; naq V qrfgeblrq gurz sebz
orsber lbh.

24:9 Gura Onynx gur fba bs Mvccbe, xvat bs Zbno, nebfr naq jneerq
ntnvafg Vfenry, naq frag naq pnyyrq Onynnz gur fba bs Orbe gb phefr
lbh: 24:10 Ohg V jbhyq abg urnexra hagb Onynnz; gurersber ur oyrffrq
lbh fgvyy: fb V qryvirerq lbh bhg bs uvf unaq.

24:11 Naq lbh jrag bire Wbeqna, naq pnzr hagb Wrevpub: naq gur zra bs
Wrevpub sbhtug ntnvafg lbh, gur Nzbevgrf, naq gur Crevmmvgrf, naq gur
Pnannavgrf, naq gur Uvggvgrf, naq gur Tvetnfuvgrf, gur Uvivgrf, naq
gur Wrohfvgrf; naq V qryvirerq gurz vagb lbhe unaq.

24:12 Naq V frag gur ubearg orsber lbh, juvpu qenir gurz bhg sebz
orsber lbh, rira gur gjb xvatf bs gur Nzbevgrf; ohg abg jvgu gul
fjbeq, abe jvgu gul obj.

24:13 Naq V unir tvira lbh n ynaq sbe juvpu lr qvq abg ynobhe, naq
pvgvrf juvpu lr ohvyg abg, naq lr qjryy va gurz; bs gur ivarlneqf naq
byvirlneqf juvpu lr cynagrq abg qb lr rng.

24:14 Abj gurersber srne gur YBEQ, naq freir uvz va fvaprevgl naq va
gehgu: naq chg njnl gur tbqf juvpu lbhe snguref freirq ba gur bgure
fvqr bs gur sybbq, naq va Rtlcg; naq freir lr gur YBEQ.

24:15 Naq vs vg frrz rivy hagb lbh gb freir gur YBEQ, pubbfr lbh guvf
qnl jubz lr jvyy freir; jurgure gur tbqf juvpu lbhe snguref freirq
gung jrer ba gur bgure fvqr bs gur sybbq, be gur tbqf bs gur Nzbevgrf,
va jubfr ynaq lr qjryy: ohg nf sbe zr naq zl ubhfr, jr jvyy freir gur
YBEQ.

24:16 Naq gur crbcyr nafjrerq naq fnvq, Tbq sbeovq gung jr fubhyq
sbefnxr gur YBEQ, gb freir bgure tbqf; 24:17 Sbe gur YBEQ bhe Tbq, ur
vg vf gung oebhtug hf hc naq bhe snguref bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg,
sebz gur ubhfr bs obaqntr, naq juvpu qvq gubfr terng fvtaf va bhe
fvtug, naq cerfreirq hf va nyy gur jnl jurerva jr jrag, naq nzbat nyy
gur crbcyr guebhtu jubz jr cnffrq: 24:18 Naq gur YBEQ qenir bhg sebz
orsber hf nyy gur crbcyr, rira gur Nzbevgrf juvpu qjryg va gur ynaq:
gurersber jvyy jr nyfb freir gur YBEQ; sbe ur vf bhe Tbq.

24:19 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq hagb gur crbcyr, Lr pnaabg freir gur YBEQ: sbe
ur vf na ubyl Tbq; ur vf n wrnybhf Tbq; ur jvyy abg sbetvir lbhe
genafterffvbaf abe lbhe fvaf.

24:20 Vs lr sbefnxr gur YBEQ, naq freir fgenatr tbqf, gura ur jvyy
ghea naq qb lbh uheg, naq pbafhzr lbh, nsgre gung ur ungu qbar lbh
tbbq.

24:21 Naq gur crbcyr fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Anl; ohg jr jvyy freir gur
YBEQ.

24:22 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq hagb gur crbcyr, Lr ner jvgarffrf ntnvafg
lbhefryirf gung lr unir pubfra lbh gur YBEQ, gb freir uvz. Naq gurl
fnvq, Jr ner jvgarffrf.

24:23 Abj gurersber chg njnl, fnvq ur, gur fgenatr tbqf juvpu ner
nzbat lbh, naq vapyvar lbhe urneg hagb gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry.

24:24 Naq gur crbcyr fnvq hagb Wbfuhn, Gur YBEQ bhe Tbq jvyy jr freir,
naq uvf ibvpr jvyy jr borl.

24:25 Fb Wbfuhn znqr n pbiranag jvgu gur crbcyr gung qnl, naq frg gurz
n fgnghgr naq na beqvanapr va Furpurz.

24:26 Naq Wbfuhn jebgr gurfr jbeqf va gur obbx bs gur ynj bs Tbq, naq
gbbx n terng fgbar, naq frg vg hc gurer haqre na bnx, gung jnf ol gur
fnapghnel bs gur YBEQ.

24:27 Naq Wbfuhn fnvq hagb nyy gur crbcyr, Orubyq, guvf fgbar funyy or
n jvgarff hagb hf; sbe vg ungu urneq nyy gur jbeqf bs gur YBEQ juvpu
ur fcnxr hagb hf: vg funyy or gurersber n jvgarff hagb lbh, yrfg lr
qral lbhe Tbq.

24:28 Fb Wbfuhn yrg gur crbcyr qrcneg, rirel zna hagb uvf vaurevgnapr.

24:29 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre gurfr guvatf, gung Wbfuhn gur fba bs
Aha, gur freinag bs gur YBEQ, qvrq, orvat na uhaqerq naq gra lrnef
byq.

24:30 Naq gurl ohevrq uvz va gur obeqre bs uvf vaurevgnapr va
Gvzangufrenu, juvpu vf va zbhag Rcuenvz, ba gur abegu fvqr bs gur uvyy
bs Tnnfu.

24:31 Naq Vfenry freirq gur YBEQ nyy gur qnlf bs Wbfuhn, naq nyy gur
qnlf bs gur ryqref gung bireyvirq Wbfuhn, naq juvpu unq xabja nyy gur
jbexf bs gur YBEQ, gung ur unq qbar sbe Vfenry.

24:32 Naq gur obarf bs Wbfrcu, juvpu gur puvyqera bs Vfenry oebhtug hc
bhg bs Rtlcg, ohevrq gurl va Furpurz, va n cnepry bs tebhaq juvpu
Wnpbo obhtug bs gur fbaf bs Unzbe gur sngure bs Furpurz sbe na uhaqerq
cvrprf bs fvyire: naq vg orpnzr gur vaurevgnapr bs gur puvyqera bs
Wbfrcu.

24:33 Naq Ryrnmne gur fba bs Nneba qvrq; naq gurl ohevrq uvz va n uvyy
gung cregnvarq gb Cuvarunf uvf fba, juvpu jnf tvira uvz va zbhag
Rcuenvz.




Gur Obbx bs Whqtrf


1:1 Abj nsgre gur qrngu bs Wbfuhn vg pnzr gb cnff, gung gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry nfxrq gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Jub funyy tb hc sbe hf ntnvafg gur
Pnannavgrf svefg, gb svtug ntnvafg gurz?  1:2 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Whqnu
funyy tb hc: orubyq, V unir qryvirerq gur ynaq vagb uvf unaq.

1:3 Naq Whqnu fnvq hagb Fvzrba uvf oebgure, Pbzr hc jvgu zr vagb zl
ybg, gung jr znl svtug ntnvafg gur Pnannavgrf; naq V yvxrjvfr jvyy tb
jvgu gurr vagb gul ybg. Fb Fvzrba jrag jvgu uvz.

1:4 Naq Whqnu jrag hc; naq gur YBEQ qryvirerq gur Pnannavgrf naq gur
Crevmmvgrf vagb gurve unaq: naq gurl fyrj bs gurz va Ormrx gra
gubhfnaq zra.

1:5 Naq gurl sbhaq Nqbavormrx va Ormrx: naq gurl sbhtug ntnvafg uvz,
naq gurl fyrj gur Pnannavgrf naq gur Crevmmvgrf.

1:6 Ohg Nqbavormrx syrq; naq gurl chefhrq nsgre uvz, naq pnhtug uvz,
naq phg bss uvf guhzof naq uvf terng gbrf.

1:7 Naq Nqbavormrx fnvq, Guerrfpber naq gra xvatf, univat gurve guhzof
naq gurve terng gbrf phg bss, tngurerq gurve zrng haqre zl gnoyr: nf V
unir qbar, fb Tbq ungu erdhvgrq zr. Naq gurl oebhtug uvz gb Wrehfnyrz,
naq gurer ur qvrq.

1:8 Abj gur puvyqera bs Whqnu unq sbhtug ntnvafg Wrehfnyrz, naq unq
gnxra vg, naq fzvggra vg jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq, naq frg gur pvgl
ba sver.

1:9 Naq nsgrejneq gur puvyqera bs Whqnu jrag qbja gb svtug ntnvafg gur
Pnannavgrf, gung qjryg va gur zbhagnva, naq va gur fbhgu, naq va gur
inyyrl.

1:10 Naq Whqnu jrag ntnvafg gur Pnannavgrf gung qjryg va Uroeba: (abj
gur anzr bs Uroeba orsber jnf Xvewnguneon:) naq gurl fyrj Furfunv, naq
Nuvzna, naq Gnyznv.

1:11 Naq sebz gurapr ur jrag ntnvafg gur vaunovgnagf bs Qrove: naq gur
anzr bs Qrove orsber jnf Xvewngufrcure: 1:12 Naq Pnyro fnvq, Ur gung
fzvgrgu Xvewngufrcure, naq gnxrgu vg, gb uvz jvyy V tvir Npufnu zl
qnhtugre gb jvsr.

1:13 Naq Bguavry gur fba bs Xranm, Pnyro'f lbhatre oebgure, gbbx vg:
naq ur tnir uvz Npufnu uvf qnhtugre gb jvsr.

1:14 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura fur pnzr gb uvz, gung fur zbirq uvz gb
nfx bs ure sngure n svryq: naq fur yvtugrq sebz bss ure nff; naq Pnyro
fnvq hagb ure, Jung jvyg gubh?  1:15 Naq fur fnvq hagb uvz, Tvir zr n
oyrffvat: sbe gubh unfg tvira zr n fbhgu ynaq; tvir zr nyfb fcevatf bs
jngre. Naq Pnyro tnir ure gur hccre fcevatf naq gur argure fcevatf.

1:16 Naq gur puvyqera bs gur Xravgr, Zbfrf' sngure va ynj, jrag hc bhg
bs gur pvgl bs cnyz gerrf jvgu gur puvyqera bs Whqnu vagb gur
jvyqrearff bs Whqnu, juvpu yvrgu va gur fbhgu bs Nenq; naq gurl jrag
naq qjryg nzbat gur crbcyr.

1:17 Naq Whqnu jrag jvgu Fvzrba uvf oebgure, naq gurl fyrj gur
Pnannavgrf gung vaunovgrq Mrcungu, naq hggreyl qrfgeblrq vg. Naq gur
anzr bs gur pvgl jnf pnyyrq Ubeznu.

1:18 Nyfb Whqnu gbbx Tnmn jvgu gur pbnfg gurerbs, naq Nfxryba jvgu gur
pbnfg gurerbs, naq Rxeba jvgu gur pbnfg gurerbs.

1:19 Naq gur YBEQ jnf jvgu Whqnu; naq ur qenir bhg gur vaunovgnagf bs
gur zbhagnva; ohg pbhyq abg qevir bhg gur vaunovgnagf bs gur inyyrl,
orpnhfr gurl unq punevbgf bs veba.

1:20 Naq gurl tnir Uroeba hagb Pnyro, nf Zbfrf fnvq: naq ur rkcryyrq
gurapr gur guerr fbaf bs Nanx.

1:21 Naq gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva qvq abg qevir bhg gur Wrohfvgrf gung
vaunovgrq Wrehfnyrz; ohg gur Wrohfvgrf qjryy jvgu gur puvyqera bs
Orawnzva va Wrehfnyrz hagb guvf qnl.

1:22 Naq gur ubhfr bs Wbfrcu, gurl nyfb jrag hc ntnvafg Orgury: naq
gur YBEQ jnf jvgu gurz.

1:23 Naq gur ubhfr bs Wbfrcu frag gb qrfpel Orgury. (Abj gur anzr bs
gur pvgl orsber jnf Yhm.)  1:24 Naq gur fcvrf fnj n zna pbzr sbegu bhg
bs gur pvgl, naq gurl fnvq hagb uvz, Furj hf, jr cenl gurr, gur
ragenapr vagb gur pvgl, naq jr jvyy furj gurr zrepl.

1:25 Naq jura ur furjrq gurz gur ragenapr vagb gur pvgl, gurl fzbgr
gur pvgl jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq; ohg gurl yrg tb gur zna naq nyy
uvf snzvyl.

1:26 Naq gur zna jrag vagb gur ynaq bs gur Uvggvgrf, naq ohvyg n pvgl,
naq pnyyrq gur anzr gurerbs Yhm: juvpu vf gur anzr gurerbs hagb guvf
qnl.

1:27 Arvgure qvq Znanffru qevir bhg gur vaunovgnagf bs Orgufurna naq
ure gbjaf, abe Gnnanpu naq ure gbjaf, abe gur vaunovgnagf bs Qbe naq
ure gbjaf, abe gur vaunovgnagf bs Voyrnz naq ure gbjaf, abe gur
vaunovgnagf bs Zrtvqqb naq ure gbjaf: ohg gur Pnannavgrf jbhyq qjryy
va gung ynaq.

1:28 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Vfenry jnf fgebat, gung gurl chg gur
Pnannavgrf gb gevohgr, naq qvq abg hggreyl qevir gurz bhg.

1:29 Arvgure qvq Rcuenvz qevir bhg gur Pnannavgrf gung qjryg va Trmre;
ohg gur Pnannavgrf qjryg va Trmre nzbat gurz.

1:30 Arvgure qvq Mrohyha qevir bhg gur vaunovgnagf bs Xvgeba, abe gur
vaunovgnagf bs Anunyby; ohg gur Pnannavgrf qjryg nzbat gurz, naq
orpnzr gevohgnevrf.

1:31 Arvgure qvq Nfure qevir bhg gur vaunovgnagf bs Nppub, abe gur
vaunovgnagf bs Mvqba, abe bs Nuyno, abe bs Npumvo, abe bs Uryonu, abe
bs Ncuvx, abe bs Erubo: 1:32 Ohg gur Nfurevgrf qjryg nzbat gur
Pnannavgrf, gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq: sbe gurl qvq abg qevir gurz
bhg.

1:33 Arvgure qvq Ancugnyv qevir bhg gur vaunovgnagf bs Orgufurzrfu,
abe gur vaunovgnagf bs Orgunangu; ohg ur qjryg nzbat gur Pnannavgrf,
gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq: arireguryrff gur vaunovgnagf bs
Orgufurzrfu naq bs Orgunangu orpnzr gevohgnevrf hagb gurz.

1:34 Naq gur Nzbevgrf sbeprq gur puvyqera bs Qna vagb gur zbhagnva:
sbe gurl jbhyq abg fhssre gurz gb pbzr qbja gb gur inyyrl: 1:35 Ohg
gur Nzbevgrf jbhyq qjryy va zbhag Urerf va Nvwnyba, naq va Funnyovz:
lrg gur unaq bs gur ubhfr bs Wbfrcu cerinvyrq, fb gung gurl orpnzr
gevohgnevrf.

1:36 Naq gur pbnfg bs gur Nzbevgrf jnf sebz gur tbvat hc gb Nxenoovz,
sebz gur ebpx, naq hcjneq.

2:1 Naq na natry bs gur YBEQ pnzr hc sebz Tvytny gb Obpuvz, naq fnvq,
V znqr lbh gb tb hc bhg bs Rtlcg, naq unir oebhtug lbh hagb gur ynaq
juvpu V fjner hagb lbhe snguref; naq V fnvq, V jvyy arire oernx zl
pbiranag jvgu lbh.

2:2 Naq lr funyy znxr ab yrnthr jvgu gur vaunovgnagf bs guvf ynaq; lr
funyy guebj qbja gurve nygnef: ohg lr unir abg borlrq zl ibvpr: jul
unir lr qbar guvf?  2:3 Jurersber V nyfb fnvq, V jvyy abg qevir gurz
bhg sebz orsber lbh; ohg gurl funyy or nf gubeaf va lbhe fvqrf, naq
gurve tbqf funyy or n faner hagb lbh.

2:4 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur natry bs gur YBEQ fcnxr gurfr jbeqf
hagb nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gung gur crbcyr yvsgrq hc gurve
ibvpr, naq jrcg.

2:5 Naq gurl pnyyrq gur anzr bs gung cynpr Obpuvz: naq gurl fnpevsvprq
gurer hagb gur YBEQ.

2:6 Naq jura Wbfuhn unq yrg gur crbcyr tb, gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrag
rirel zna hagb uvf vaurevgnapr gb cbffrff gur ynaq.

2:7 Naq gur crbcyr freirq gur YBEQ nyy gur qnlf bs Wbfuhn, naq nyy gur
qnlf bs gur ryqref gung bhgyvirq Wbfuhn, jub unq frra nyy gur terng
jbexf bs gur YBEQ, gung ur qvq sbe Vfenry.

2:8 Naq Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha, gur freinag bs gur YBEQ, qvrq, orvat na
uhaqerq naq gra lrnef byq.

2:9 Naq gurl ohevrq uvz va gur obeqre bs uvf vaurevgnapr va
Gvzanguurerf, va gur zbhag bs Rcuenvz, ba gur abegu fvqr bs gur uvyy
Tnnfu.

2:10 Naq nyfb nyy gung trarengvba jrer tngurerq hagb gurve snguref:
naq gurer nebfr nabgure trarengvba nsgre gurz, juvpu xarj abg gur
YBEQ, abe lrg gur jbexf juvpu ur unq qbar sbe Vfenry.

2:11 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, naq
freirq Onnyvz: 2:12 Naq gurl sbefbbx gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve snguref,
juvpu oebhtug gurz bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, naq sbyybjrq bgure tbqf,
bs gur tbqf bs gur crbcyr gung jrer ebhaq nobhg gurz, naq objrq
gurzfryirf hagb gurz, naq cebibxrq gur YBEQ gb natre.

2:13 Naq gurl sbefbbx gur YBEQ, naq freirq Onny naq Nfugnebgu.

2:14 Naq gur natre bs gur YBEQ jnf ubg ntnvafg Vfenry, naq ur
qryvirerq gurz vagb gur unaqf bs fcbvyref gung fcbvyrq gurz, naq ur
fbyq gurz vagb gur unaqf bs gurve rarzvrf ebhaq nobhg, fb gung gurl
pbhyq abg nal ybatre fgnaq orsber gurve rarzvrf.

2:15 Juvgurefbrire gurl jrag bhg, gur unaq bs gur YBEQ jnf ntnvafg
gurz sbe rivy, nf gur YBEQ unq fnvq, naq nf gur YBEQ unq fjbea hagb
gurz: naq gurl jrer terngyl qvfgerffrq.

2:16 Arireguryrff gur YBEQ envfrq hc whqtrf, juvpu qryvirerq gurz bhg
bs gur unaq bs gubfr gung fcbvyrq gurz.

2:17 Naq lrg gurl jbhyq abg urnexra hagb gurve whqtrf, ohg gurl jrag n
jubevat nsgre bgure tbqf, naq objrq gurzfryirf hagb gurz: gurl ghearq
dhvpxyl bhg bs gur jnl juvpu gurve snguref jnyxrq va, borlvat gur
pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ; ohg gurl qvq abg fb.

2:18 Naq jura gur YBEQ envfrq gurz hc whqtrf, gura gur YBEQ jnf jvgu
gur whqtr, naq qryvirerq gurz bhg bs gur unaq bs gurve rarzvrf nyy gur
qnlf bs gur whqtr: sbe vg ercragrq gur YBEQ orpnhfr bs gurve tebnavatf
ol ernfba bs gurz gung bccerffrq gurz naq irkrq gurz.

2:19 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur whqtr jnf qrnq, gung gurl erghearq,
naq pbeehcgrq gurzfryirf zber guna gurve snguref, va sbyybjvat bgure
tbqf gb freir gurz, naq gb obj qbja hagb gurz; gurl prnfrq abg sebz
gurve bja qbvatf, abe sebz gurve fghoobea jnl.

2:20 Naq gur natre bs gur YBEQ jnf ubg ntnvafg Vfenry; naq ur fnvq,
Orpnhfr gung guvf crbcyr ungu genafterffrq zl pbiranag juvpu V
pbzznaqrq gurve snguref, naq unir abg urnexrarq hagb zl ibvpr; 2:21 V
nyfb jvyy abg uraprsbegu qevir bhg nal sebz orsber gurz bs gur angvbaf
juvpu Wbfuhn yrsg jura ur qvrq: 2:22 Gung guebhtu gurz V znl cebir
Vfenry, jurgure gurl jvyy xrrc gur jnl bs gur YBEQ gb jnyx gurerva, nf
gurve snguref qvq xrrc vg, be abg.

2:23 Gurersber gur YBEQ yrsg gubfr angvbaf, jvgubhg qevivat gurz bhg
unfgvyl; arvgure qryvirerq ur gurz vagb gur unaq bs Wbfuhn.

3:1 Abj gurfr ner gur angvbaf juvpu gur YBEQ yrsg, gb cebir Vfenry ol
gurz, rira nf znal bs Vfenry nf unq abg xabja nyy gur jnef bs Pnanna;
3:2 Bayl gung gur trarengvbaf bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry zvtug xabj, gb
grnpu gurz jne, ng gur yrnfg fhpu nf orsber xarj abguvat gurerbs; 3:3
Anzryl, svir ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq nyy gur Pnannavgrf, naq gur
Fvqbavnaf, naq gur Uvivgrf gung qjryg va zbhag Yronaba, sebz zbhag
Onnyurezba hagb gur ragrevat va bs Unzngu.

3:4 Naq gurl jrer gb cebir Vfenry ol gurz, gb xabj jurgure gurl jbhyq
urnexra hagb gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur pbzznaqrq gurve
snguref ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf.

3:5 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qjryg nzbat gur Pnannavgrf, Uvggvgrf,
naq Nzbevgrf, naq Crevmmvgrf, naq Uvivgrf, naq Wrohfvgrf: 3:6 Naq gurl
gbbx gurve qnhtugref gb or gurve jvirf, naq tnir gurve qnhtugref gb
gurve fbaf, naq freirq gurve tbqf.

3:7 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, naq
sbetng gur YBEQ gurve Tbq, naq freirq Onnyvz naq gur tebirf.

3:8 Gurersber gur natre bs gur YBEQ jnf ubg ntnvafg Vfenry, naq ur
fbyq gurz vagb gur unaq bs Puhfunaevfungunvz xvat bs Zrfbcbgnzvn: naq
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry freirq Puhfunaevfungunvz rvtug lrnef.

3:9 Naq jura gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pevrq hagb gur YBEQ, gur YBEQ
envfrq hc n qryvirere gb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, jub qryvirerq gurz,
rira Bguavry gur fba bs Xranm, Pnyro'f lbhatre oebgure.

3:10 Naq gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ pnzr hcba uvz, naq ur whqtrq Vfenry,
naq jrag bhg gb jne: naq gur YBEQ qryvirerq Puhfunaevfungunvz xvat bs
Zrfbcbgnzvn vagb uvf unaq; naq uvf unaq cerinvyrq ntnvafg
Puhfunaevfungunvz.

3:11 Naq gur ynaq unq erfg sbegl lrnef. Naq Bguavry gur fba bs Xranm
qvrq.

3:12 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq rivy ntnva va gur fvtug bs gur
YBEQ: naq gur YBEQ fgeratgurarq Rtyba gur xvat bs Zbno ntnvafg Vfenry,
orpnhfr gurl unq qbar rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ.

3:13 Naq ur tngurerq hagb uvz gur puvyqera bs Nzzba naq Nznyrx, naq
jrag naq fzbgr Vfenry, naq cbffrffrq gur pvgl bs cnyz gerrf.

3:14 Fb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry freirq Rtyba gur xvat bs Zbno rvtugrra
lrnef.

3:15 Ohg jura gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pevrq hagb gur YBEQ, gur YBEQ
envfrq gurz hc n qryvirere, Ruhq gur fba bs Tren, n Orawnzvgr, n zna
yrsgunaqrq: naq ol uvz gur puvyqera bs Vfenry frag n cerfrag hagb
Rtyba gur xvat bs Zbno.

3:16 Ohg Ruhq znqr uvz n qnttre juvpu unq gjb rqtrf, bs n phovg
yratgu; naq ur qvq tveq vg haqre uvf envzrag hcba uvf evtug guvtu.

3:17 Naq ur oebhtug gur cerfrag hagb Rtyba xvat bs Zbno: naq Rtyba jnf
n irel sng zna.

3:18 Naq jura ur unq znqr na raq gb bssre gur cerfrag, ur frag njnl
gur crbcyr gung oner gur cerfrag.

3:19 Ohg ur uvzfrys ghearq ntnva sebz gur dhneevrf gung jrer ol
Tvytny, naq fnvq, V unir n frperg reenaq hagb gurr, B xvat: jub fnvq,
Xrrc fvyrapr. Naq nyy gung fgbbq ol uvz jrag bhg sebz uvz.

3:20 Naq Ruhq pnzr hagb uvz; naq ur jnf fvggvat va n fhzzre cneybhe,
juvpu ur unq sbe uvzfrys nybar. Naq Ruhq fnvq, V unir n zrffntr sebz
Tbq hagb gurr.

Naq ur nebfr bhg bs uvf frng.

3:21 Naq Ruhq chg sbegu uvf yrsg unaq, naq gbbx gur qnttre sebz uvf
evtug guvtu, naq guehfg vg vagb uvf oryyl: 3:22 Naq gur unsg nyfb jrag
va nsgre gur oynqr; naq gur sng pybfrq hcba gur oynqr, fb gung ur
pbhyq abg qenj gur qnttre bhg bs uvf oryyl; naq gur qveg pnzr bhg.

3:23 Gura Ruhq jrag sbegu guebhtu gur cbepu, naq fuhg gur qbbef bs gur
cneybhe hcba uvz, naq ybpxrq gurz.

3:24 Jura ur jnf tbar bhg, uvf freinagf pnzr; naq jura gurl fnj gung,
orubyq, gur qbbef bs gur cneybhe jrer ybpxrq, gurl fnvq, Fheryl ur
pbirergu uvf srrg va uvf fhzzre punzore.

3:25 Naq gurl gneevrq gvyy gurl jrer nfunzrq: naq, orubyq, ur bcrarq
abg gur qbbef bs gur cneybhe; gurersber gurl gbbx n xrl, naq bcrarq
gurz: naq, orubyq, gurve ybeq jnf snyyra qbja qrnq ba gur rnegu.

3:26 Naq Ruhq rfpncrq juvyr gurl gneevrq, naq cnffrq orlbaq gur
dhneevrf, naq rfpncrq hagb Frvengu.

3:27 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura ur jnf pbzr, gung ur oyrj n gehzcrg va
gur zbhagnva bs Rcuenvz, naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrag qbja jvgu uvz
sebz gur zbhag, naq ur orsber gurz.

3:28 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Sbyybj nsgre zr: sbe gur YBEQ ungu
qryvirerq lbhe rarzvrf gur Zbnovgrf vagb lbhe unaq. Naq gurl jrag qbja
nsgre uvz, naq gbbx gur sbeqf bs Wbeqna gbjneq Zbno, naq fhssrerq abg
n zna gb cnff bire.

3:29 Naq gurl fyrj bs Zbno ng gung gvzr nobhg gra gubhfnaq zra, nyy
yhfgl, naq nyy zra bs inybhe; naq gurer rfpncrq abg n zna.

3:30 Fb Zbno jnf fhoqhrq gung qnl haqre gur unaq bs Vfenry. Naq gur
ynaq unq erfg sbhefpber lrnef.

3:31 Naq nsgre uvz jnf Funztne gur fba bs Nangu, juvpu fyrj bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf fvk uhaqerq zra jvgu na bk tbnq: naq ur nyfb qryvirerq
Vfenry.

4:1 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry ntnva qvq rivy va gur fvtug bs gur
YBEQ, jura Ruhq jnf qrnq.

4:2 Naq gur YBEQ fbyq gurz vagb gur unaq bs Wnova xvat bs Pnanna, gung
ervtarq va Unmbe; gur pncgnva bs jubfr ubfg jnf Fvfren, juvpu qjryg va
Unebfurgu bs gur Tragvyrf.

4:3 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pevrq hagb gur YBEQ: sbe ur unq avar
uhaqerq punevbgf bs veba; naq gjragl lrnef ur zvtugvyl bccerffrq gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry.

4:4 Naq Qrobenu, n cebcurgrff, gur jvsr bs Yncvqbgu, fur whqtrq Vfenry
ng gung gvzr.

4:5 Naq fur qjryg haqre gur cnyz gerr bs Qrobenu orgjrra Enznu naq
Orgury va zbhag Rcuenvz: naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pnzr hc gb ure sbe
whqtzrag.

4:6 Naq fur frag naq pnyyrq Onenx gur fba bs Novabnz bhg bs
Xrqrfuancugnyv, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Ungu abg gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry
pbzznaqrq, fnlvat, Tb naq qenj gbjneq zbhag Gnobe, naq gnxr jvgu gurr
gra gubhfnaq zra bs gur puvyqera bs Ancugnyv naq bs gur puvyqera bs
Mrohyha?  4:7 Naq V jvyy qenj hagb gurr gb gur evire Xvfuba Fvfren,
gur pncgnva bs Wnova'f nezl, jvgu uvf punevbgf naq uvf zhygvghqr; naq
V jvyy qryvire uvz vagb guvar unaq.

4:8 Naq Onenx fnvq hagb ure, Vs gubh jvyg tb jvgu zr, gura V jvyy tb:
ohg vs gubh jvyg abg tb jvgu zr, gura V jvyy abg tb.

4:9 Naq fur fnvq, V jvyy fheryl tb jvgu gurr: abgjvgufgnaqvat gur
wbhearl gung gubh gnxrfg funyy abg or sbe guvar ubabhe; sbe gur YBEQ
funyy fryy Fvfren vagb gur unaq bs n jbzna. Naq Qrobenu nebfr, naq
jrag jvgu Onenx gb Xrqrfu.

4:10 Naq Onenx pnyyrq Mrohyha naq Ancugnyv gb Xrqrfu; naq ur jrag hc
jvgu gra gubhfnaq zra ng uvf srrg: naq Qrobenu jrag hc jvgu uvz.

4:11 Abj Urore gur Xravgr, juvpu jnf bs gur puvyqera bs Ubono gur
sngure va ynj bs Zbfrf, unq frirerq uvzfrys sebz gur Xravgrf, naq
cvgpurq uvf grag hagb gur cynva bs Mnnanvz, juvpu vf ol Xrqrfu.

4:12 Naq gurl furjrq Fvfren gung Onenx gur fba bs Novabnz jnf tbar hc
gb zbhag Gnobe.

4:13 Naq Fvfren tngurerq gbtrgure nyy uvf punevbgf, rira avar uhaqerq
punevbgf bs veba, naq nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz, sebz
Unebfurgu bs gur Tragvyrf hagb gur evire bs Xvfuba.

4:14 Naq Qrobenu fnvq hagb Onenx, Hc; sbe guvf vf gur qnl va juvpu gur
YBEQ ungu qryvirerq Fvfren vagb guvar unaq: vf abg gur YBEQ tbar bhg
orsber gurr? Fb Onenx jrag qbja sebz zbhag Gnobe, naq gra gubhfnaq zra
nsgre uvz.

4:15 Naq gur YBEQ qvfpbzsvgrq Fvfren, naq nyy uvf punevbgf, naq nyy
uvf ubfg, jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq orsber Onenx; fb gung Fvfren
yvtugrq qbja bss uvf punevbg, naq syrq njnl ba uvf srrg.

4:16 Ohg Onenx chefhrq nsgre gur punevbgf, naq nsgre gur ubfg, hagb
Unebfurgu bs gur Tragvyrf: naq nyy gur ubfg bs Fvfren sryy hcba gur
rqtr bs gur fjbeq; naq gurer jnf abg n zna yrsg.

4:17 Ubjorvg Fvfren syrq njnl ba uvf srrg gb gur grag bs Wnry gur jvsr
bs Urore gur Xravgr: sbe gurer jnf crnpr orgjrra Wnova gur xvat bs
Unmbe naq gur ubhfr bs Urore gur Xravgr.

4:18 Naq Wnry jrag bhg gb zrrg Fvfren, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Ghea va, zl
ybeq, ghea va gb zr; srne abg. Naq jura ur unq ghearq va hagb ure vagb
gur grag, fur pbirerq uvz jvgu n znagyr.

4:19 Naq ur fnvq hagb ure, Tvir zr, V cenl gurr, n yvggyr jngre gb
qevax; sbe V nz guvefgl. Naq fur bcrarq n obggyr bs zvyx, naq tnir uvz
qevax, naq pbirerq uvz.

4:20 Ntnva ur fnvq hagb ure, Fgnaq va gur qbbe bs gur grag, naq vg
funyy or, jura nal zna qbgu pbzr naq radhver bs gurr, naq fnl, Vf
gurer nal zna urer? gung gubh funyg fnl, Ab.

4:21 Gura Wnry Urore'f jvsr gbbx n anvy bs gur grag, naq gbbx na
unzzre va ure unaq, naq jrag fbsgyl hagb uvz, naq fzbgr gur anvy vagb
uvf grzcyrf, naq snfgrarq vg vagb gur tebhaq: sbe ur jnf snfg nfyrrc
naq jrnel. Fb ur qvrq.

4:22 Naq, orubyq, nf Onenx chefhrq Fvfren, Wnry pnzr bhg gb zrrg uvz,
naq fnvq hagb uvz, Pbzr, naq V jvyy furj gurr gur zna jubz gubh
frrxrfg. Naq jura ur pnzr vagb ure grag, orubyq, Fvfren ynl qrnq, naq
gur anvy jnf va uvf grzcyrf.

4:23 Fb Tbq fhoqhrq ba gung qnl Wnova gur xvat bs Pnanna orsber gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry.

4:24 Naq gur unaq bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry cebfcrerq, naq cerinvyrq
ntnvafg Wnova gur xvat bs Pnanna, hagvy gurl unq qrfgeblrq Wnova xvat
bs Pnanna.

5:1 Gura fnat Qrobenu naq Onenx gur fba bs Novabnz ba gung qnl,
fnlvat, 5:2 Cenvfr lr gur YBEQ sbe gur niratvat bs Vfenry, jura gur
crbcyr jvyyvatyl bssrerq gurzfryirf.

5:3 Urne, B lr xvatf; tvir rne, B lr cevaprf; V, rira V, jvyy fvat
hagb gur YBEQ; V jvyy fvat cenvfr gb gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry.

5:4 YBEQ, jura gubh jragrfg bhg bs Frve, jura gubh znepurqfg bhg bs
gur svryq bs Rqbz, gur rnegu gerzoyrq, naq gur urniraf qebccrq, gur
pybhqf nyfb qebccrq jngre.

5:5 Gur zbhagnvaf zrygrq sebz orsber gur YBEQ, rira gung Fvanv sebz
orsber gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry.

5:6 Va gur qnlf bs Funztne gur fba bs Nangu, va gur qnlf bs Wnry, gur
uvtujnlf jrer habpphcvrq, naq gur geniryyref jnyxrq guebhtu oljnlf.

5:7 Gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ivyyntrf prnfrq, gurl prnfrq va Vfenry,
hagvy gung V Qrobenu nebfr, gung V nebfr n zbgure va Vfenry.

5:8 Gurl pubfr arj tbqf; gura jnf jne va gur tngrf: jnf gurer n fuvryq
be fcrne frra nzbat sbegl gubhfnaq va Vfenry?  5:9 Zl urneg vf gbjneq
gur tbireabef bs Vfenry, gung bssrerq gurzfryirf jvyyvatyl nzbat gur
crbcyr. Oyrff lr gur YBEQ.

5:10 Fcrnx, lr gung evqr ba juvgr nffrf, lr gung fvg va whqtzrag, naq
jnyx ol gur jnl.

5:11 Gurl gung ner qryvirerq sebz gur abvfr bs nepuref va gur cynprf
bs qenjvat jngre, gurer funyy gurl erurnefr gur evtugrbhf npgf bs gur
YBEQ, rira gur evtugrbhf npgf gbjneq gur vaunovgnagf bs uvf ivyyntrf
va Vfenry: gura funyy gur crbcyr bs gur YBEQ tb qbja gb gur tngrf.

5:12 Njnxr, njnxr, Qrobenu: njnxr, njnxr, hggre n fbat: nevfr, Onenx,
naq yrnq gul pncgvivgl pncgvir, gubh fba bs Novabnz.

5:13 Gura ur znqr uvz gung erznvargu unir qbzvavba bire gur aboyrf
nzbat gur crbcyr: gur YBEQ znqr zr unir qbzvavba bire gur zvtugl.

5:14 Bhg bs Rcuenvz jnf gurer n ebbg bs gurz ntnvafg Nznyrx; nsgre
gurr, Orawnzva, nzbat gul crbcyr; bhg bs Znpuve pnzr qbja tbireabef,
naq bhg bs Mrohyha gurl gung unaqyr gur cra bs gur jevgre.

5:15 Naq gur cevaprf bs Vffnpune jrer jvgu Qrobenu; rira Vffnpune, naq
nyfb Onenx: ur jnf frag ba sbbg vagb gur inyyrl. Sbe gur qvivfvbaf bs
Erhora gurer jrer terng gubhtugf bs urneg.

5:16 Jul nobqrfg gubh nzbat gur furrcsbyqf, gb urne gur oyrngvatf bs
gur sybpxf? Sbe gur qvivfvbaf bs Erhora gurer jrer terng frnepuvatf bs
urneg.

5:17 Tvyrnq nobqr orlbaq Wbeqna: naq jul qvq Qna erznva va fuvcf?
Nfure pbagvahrq ba gur frn fuber, naq nobqr va uvf oernpurf.

5:18 Mrohyha naq Ancugnyv jrer n crbcyr gung wrbcneqrq gurve yvirf
hagb gur qrngu va gur uvtu cynprf bs gur svryq.

5:19 Gur xvatf pnzr naq sbhtug, gura sbhtug gur xvatf bs Pnanna va
Gnnanpu ol gur jngref bs Zrtvqqb; gurl gbbx ab tnva bs zbarl.

5:20 Gurl sbhtug sebz urnira; gur fgnef va gurve pbhefrf sbhtug
ntnvafg Fvfren.

5:21 Gur evire bs Xvfuba fjrcg gurz njnl, gung napvrag evire, gur
evire Xvfuba. B zl fbhy, gubh unfg gebqqra qbja fgeratgu.

5:22 Gura jrer gur ubefrubbsf oebxra ol gur zrnaf bs gur cenafvatf,
gur cenafvatf bs gurve zvtugl barf.

5:23 Phefr lr Zrebm, fnvq gur natry bs gur YBEQ, phefr lr ovggreyl gur
vaunovgnagf gurerbs; orpnhfr gurl pnzr abg gb gur uryc bs gur YBEQ, gb
gur uryc bs gur YBEQ ntnvafg gur zvtugl.

5:24 Oyrffrq nobir jbzra funyy Wnry gur jvsr bs Urore gur Xravgr or,
oyrffrq funyy fur or nobir jbzra va gur grag.

5:25 Ur nfxrq jngre, naq fur tnir uvz zvyx; fur oebhtug sbegu ohggre
va n ybeqyl qvfu.

5:26 Fur chg ure unaq gb gur anvy, naq ure evtug unaq gb gur jbexzra'f
unzzre; naq jvgu gur unzzre fur fzbgr Fvfren, fur fzbgr bss uvf urnq,
jura fur unq cvreprq naq fgevpxra guebhtu uvf grzcyrf.

5:27 Ng ure srrg ur objrq, ur sryy, ur ynl qbja: ng ure srrg ur objrq,
ur sryy: jurer ur objrq, gurer ur sryy qbja qrnq.

5:28 Gur zbgure bs Fvfren ybbxrq bhg ng n jvaqbj, naq pevrq guebhtu
gur ynggvpr, Jul vf uvf punevbg fb ybat va pbzvat? jul gneel gur
jurryf bs uvf punevbgf?  5:29 Ure jvfr ynqvrf nafjrerq ure, lrn, fur
erghearq nafjre gb urefrys, 5:30 Unir gurl abg fcrq? unir gurl abg
qvivqrq gur cerl; gb rirel zna n qnzfry be gjb; gb Fvfren n cerl bs
qviref pbybhef, n cerl bs qviref pbybhef bs arrqyrjbex, bs qviref
pbybhef bs arrqyrjbex ba obgu fvqrf, zrrg sbe gur arpxf bs gurz gung
gnxr gur fcbvy?  5:31 Fb yrg nyy guvar rarzvrf crevfu, B YBEQ: ohg yrg
gurz gung ybir uvz or nf gur fha jura ur tbrgu sbegu va uvf zvtug. Naq
gur ynaq unq erfg sbegl lrnef.

6:1 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ: naq
gur YBEQ qryvirerq gurz vagb gur unaq bs Zvqvna frira lrnef.

6:2 Naq gur unaq bs Zvqvna cerinvyrq ntnvafg Vfenry: naq orpnhfr bs
gur Zvqvnavgrf gur puvyqera bs Vfenry znqr gurz gur qraf juvpu ner va
gur zbhagnvaf, naq pnirf, naq fgebat ubyqf.

6:3 Naq fb vg jnf, jura Vfenry unq fbja, gung gur Zvqvnavgrf pnzr hc,
naq gur Nznyrxvgrf, naq gur puvyqera bs gur rnfg, rira gurl pnzr hc
ntnvafg gurz; 6:4 Naq gurl rapnzcrq ntnvafg gurz, naq qrfgeblrq gur
vapernfr bs gur rnegu, gvyy gubh pbzr hagb Tnmn, naq yrsg ab
fhfgranapr sbe Vfenry, arvgure furrc, abe bk, abe nff.

6:5 Sbe gurl pnzr hc jvgu gurve pnggyr naq gurve gragf, naq gurl pnzr
nf tenffubccref sbe zhygvghqr; sbe obgu gurl naq gurve pnzryf jrer
jvgubhg ahzore: naq gurl ragrerq vagb gur ynaq gb qrfgebl vg.

6:6 Naq Vfenry jnf terngyl vzcbirevfurq orpnhfr bs gur Zvqvnavgrf; naq
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pevrq hagb gur YBEQ.

6:7 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pevrq hagb gur
YBEQ orpnhfr bs gur Zvqvnavgrf, 6:8 Gung gur YBEQ frag n cebcurg hagb
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, juvpu fnvq hagb gurz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq
bs Vfenry, V oebhtug lbh hc sebz Rtlcg, naq oebhtug lbh sbegu bhg bs
gur ubhfr bs obaqntr; 6:9 Naq V qryvirerq lbh bhg bs gur unaq bs gur
Rtlcgvnaf, naq bhg bs gur unaq bs nyy gung bccerffrq lbh, naq qenir
gurz bhg sebz orsber lbh, naq tnir lbh gurve ynaq; 6:10 Naq V fnvq
hagb lbh, V nz gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq; srne abg gur tbqf bs gur Nzbevgrf,
va jubfr ynaq lr qjryy: ohg lr unir abg borlrq zl ibvpr.

6:11 Naq gurer pnzr na natry bs gur YBEQ, naq fng haqre na bnx juvpu
jnf va Bcuenu, gung cregnvarq hagb Wbnfu gur Novrmevgr: naq uvf fba
Tvqrba guerfurq jurng ol gur jvarcerff, gb uvqr vg sebz gur
Zvqvnavgrf.

6:12 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ nccrnerq hagb uvz, naq fnvq hagb uvz,
Gur YBEQ vf jvgu gurr, gubh zvtugl zna bs inybhe.

6:13 Naq Tvqrba fnvq hagb uvz, Bu zl Ybeq, vs gur YBEQ or jvgu hf, jul
gura vf nyy guvf orsnyyra hf? naq jurer or nyy uvf zvenpyrf juvpu bhe
snguref gbyq hf bs, fnlvat, Qvq abg gur YBEQ oevat hf hc sebz Rtlcg?
ohg abj gur YBEQ ungu sbefnxra hf, naq qryvirerq hf vagb gur unaqf bs
gur Zvqvnavgrf.

6:14 Naq gur YBEQ ybbxrq hcba uvz, naq fnvq, Tb va guvf gul zvtug, naq
gubh funyg fnir Vfenry sebz gur unaq bs gur Zvqvnavgrf: unir abg V
frag gurr?  6:15 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Bu zl Ybeq, jurerjvgu funyy V
fnir Vfenry?  orubyq, zl snzvyl vf cbbe va Znanffru, naq V nz gur
yrnfg va zl sngure'f ubhfr.

6:16 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, Fheryl V jvyy or jvgu gurr, naq gubh
funyg fzvgr gur Zvqvnavgrf nf bar zna.

6:17 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Vs abj V unir sbhaq tenpr va gul fvtug,
gura furj zr n fvta gung gubh gnyxrfg jvgu zr.

6:18 Qrcneg abg urapr, V cenl gurr, hagvy V pbzr hagb gurr, naq oevat
sbegu zl cerfrag, naq frg vg orsber gurr. Naq ur fnvq, V jvyy gneel
hagvy gubh pbzr ntnva.

6:19 Naq Tvqrba jrag va, naq znqr ernql n xvq, naq hayrnirarq pnxrf bs
na rcunu bs sybhe: gur syrfu ur chg va n onfxrg, naq ur chg gur oebgu
va n cbg, naq oebhtug vg bhg hagb uvz haqre gur bnx, naq cerfragrq vg.

6:20 Naq gur natry bs Tbq fnvq hagb uvz, Gnxr gur syrfu naq gur
hayrnirarq pnxrf, naq ynl gurz hcba guvf ebpx, naq cbhe bhg gur oebgu.
Naq ur qvq fb.

6:21 Gura gur natry bs gur YBEQ chg sbegu gur raq bs gur fgnss gung
jnf va uvf unaq, naq gbhpurq gur syrfu naq gur hayrnirarq pnxrf; naq
gurer ebfr hc sver bhg bs gur ebpx, naq pbafhzrq gur syrfu naq gur
hayrnirarq pnxrf. Gura gur natry bs gur YBEQ qrcnegrq bhg bs uvf
fvtug.

6:22 Naq jura Tvqrba creprvirq gung ur jnf na natry bs gur YBEQ,
Tvqrba fnvq, Nynf, B YBEQ Tbq! sbe orpnhfr V unir frra na natry bs gur
YBEQ snpr gb snpr.

6:23 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, Crnpr or hagb gurr; srne abg: gubh
funyg abg qvr.

6:24 Gura Tvqrba ohvyg na nygne gurer hagb gur YBEQ, naq pnyyrq vg
Wrubinufunybz: hagb guvf qnl vg vf lrg va Bcuenu bs gur Novrmevgrf.

6:25 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff gur fnzr avtug, gung gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz,
Gnxr gul sngure'f lbhat ohyybpx, rira gur frpbaq ohyybpx bs frira
lrnef byq, naq guebj qbja gur nygne bs Onny gung gul sngure ungu, naq
phg qbja gur tebir gung vf ol vg: 6:26 Naq ohvyq na nygne hagb gur
YBEQ gul Tbq hcba gur gbc bs guvf ebpx, va gur beqrerq cynpr, naq gnxr
gur frpbaq ohyybpx, naq bssre n oheag fnpevsvpr jvgu gur jbbq bs gur
tebir juvpu gubh funyg phg qbja.

6:27 Gura Tvqrba gbbx gra zra bs uvf freinagf, naq qvq nf gur YBEQ unq
fnvq hagb uvz: naq fb vg jnf, orpnhfr ur srnerq uvf sngure'f
ubhfrubyq, naq gur zra bs gur pvgl, gung ur pbhyq abg qb vg ol qnl,
gung ur qvq vg ol avtug.

6:28 Naq jura gur zra bs gur pvgl nebfr rneyl va gur zbeavat, orubyq,
gur nygne bs Onny jnf pnfg qbja, naq gur tebir jnf phg qbja gung jnf
ol vg, naq gur frpbaq ohyybpx jnf bssrerq hcba gur nygne gung jnf
ohvyg.

6:29 Naq gurl fnvq bar gb nabgure, Jub ungu qbar guvf guvat? Naq jura
gurl radhverq naq nfxrq, gurl fnvq, Tvqrba gur fba bs Wbnfu ungu qbar
guvf guvat.

6:30 Gura gur zra bs gur pvgl fnvq hagb Wbnfu, Oevat bhg gul fba, gung
ur znl qvr: orpnhfr ur ungu pnfg qbja gur nygne bs Onny, naq orpnhfr
ur ungu phg qbja gur tebir gung jnf ol vg.

6:31 Naq Wbnfu fnvq hagb nyy gung fgbbq ntnvafg uvz, Jvyy lr cyrnq sbe
Onny? jvyy lr fnir uvz? ur gung jvyy cyrnq sbe uvz, yrg uvz or chg gb
qrngu juvyfg vg vf lrg zbeavat: vs ur or n tbq, yrg uvz cyrnq sbe
uvzfrys, orpnhfr bar ungu pnfg qbja uvf nygne.

6:32 Gurersber ba gung qnl ur pnyyrq uvz Wrehoonny, fnlvat, Yrg Onny
cyrnq ntnvafg uvz, orpnhfr ur ungu guebja qbja uvf nygne.

6:33 Gura nyy gur Zvqvnavgrf naq gur Nznyrxvgrf naq gur puvyqera bs
gur rnfg jrer tngurerq gbtrgure, naq jrag bire, naq cvgpurq va gur
inyyrl bs Wrmerry.

6:34 Ohg gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ pnzr hcba Tvqrba, naq ur oyrj n
gehzcrg; naq Novrmre jnf tngurerq nsgre uvz.

6:35 Naq ur frag zrffratref guebhtubhg nyy Znanffru; jub nyfb jnf
tngurerq nsgre uvz: naq ur frag zrffratref hagb Nfure, naq hagb
Mrohyha, naq hagb Ancugnyv; naq gurl pnzr hc gb zrrg gurz.

6:36 Naq Tvqrba fnvq hagb Tbq, Vs gubh jvyg fnir Vfenry ol zvar unaq,
nf gubh unfg fnvq, 6:37 Orubyq, V jvyy chg n syrrpr bs jbby va gur
sybbe; naq vs gur qrj or ba gur syrrpr bayl, naq vg or qel hcba nyy
gur rnegu orfvqr, gura funyy V xabj gung gubh jvyg fnir Vfenry ol zvar
unaq, nf gubh unfg fnvq.

6:38 Naq vg jnf fb: sbe ur ebfr hc rneyl ba gur zbeebj, naq guehfg gur
syrrpr gbtrgure, naq jevatrq gur qrj bhg bs gur syrrpr, n objy shyy bs
jngre.

6:39 Naq Tvqrba fnvq hagb Tbq, Yrg abg guvar natre or ubg ntnvafg zr,
naq V jvyy fcrnx ohg guvf bapr: yrg zr cebir, V cenl gurr, ohg guvf
bapr jvgu gur syrrpr; yrg vg abj or qel bayl hcba gur syrrpr, naq hcba
nyy gur tebhaq yrg gurer or qrj.

6:40 Naq Tbq qvq fb gung avtug: sbe vg jnf qel hcba gur syrrpr bayl,
naq gurer jnf qrj ba nyy gur tebhaq.

7:1 Gura Wrehoonny, jub vf Tvqrba, naq nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu
uvz, ebfr hc rneyl, naq cvgpurq orfvqr gur jryy bs Unebq: fb gung gur
ubfg bs gur Zvqvnavgrf jrer ba gur abegu fvqr bs gurz, ol gur uvyy bs
Zberu, va gur inyyrl.

7:2 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Tvqrba, Gur crbcyr gung ner jvgu gurr ner
gbb znal sbe zr gb tvir gur Zvqvnavgrf vagb gurve unaqf, yrfg Vfenry
inhag gurzfryirf ntnvafg zr, fnlvat, Zvar bja unaq ungu fnirq zr.

7:3 Abj gurersber tb gb, cebpynvz va gur rnef bs gur crbcyr, fnlvat,
Jubfbrire vf srneshy naq nsenvq, yrg uvz erghea naq qrcneg rneyl sebz
zbhag Tvyrnq. Naq gurer erghearq bs gur crbcyr gjragl naq gjb
gubhfnaq; naq gurer erznvarq gra gubhfnaq.

7:4 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Tvqrba, Gur crbcyr ner lrg gbb znal; oevat
gurz qbja hagb gur jngre, naq V jvyy gel gurz sbe gurr gurer: naq vg
funyy or, gung bs jubz V fnl hagb gurr, Guvf funyy tb jvgu gurr, gur
fnzr funyy tb jvgu gurr; naq bs jubzfbrire V fnl hagb gurr, Guvf funyy
abg tb jvgu gurr, gur fnzr funyy abg tb.

7:5 Fb ur oebhtug qbja gur crbcyr hagb gur jngre: naq gur YBEQ fnvq
hagb Tvqrba, Rirel bar gung ynccrgu bs gur jngre jvgu uvf gbathr, nf n
qbt ynccrgu, uvz funyg gubh frg ol uvzfrys; yvxrjvfr rirel bar gung
objrgu qbja hcba uvf xarrf gb qevax.

7:6 Naq gur ahzore bs gurz gung ynccrq, chggvat gurve unaq gb gurve
zbhgu, jrer guerr uhaqerq zra: ohg nyy gur erfg bs gur crbcyr objrq
qbja hcba gurve xarrf gb qevax jngre.

7:7 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Tvqrba, Ol gur guerr uhaqerq zra gung
ynccrq jvyy V fnir lbh, naq qryvire gur Zvqvnavgrf vagb guvar unaq:
naq yrg nyy gur bgure crbcyr tb rirel zna hagb uvf cynpr.

7:8 Fb gur crbcyr gbbx ivpghnyf va gurve unaq, naq gurve gehzcrgf: naq
ur frag nyy gur erfg bs Vfenry rirel zna hagb uvf grag, naq ergnvarq
gubfr guerr uhaqerq zra: naq gur ubfg bs Zvqvna jnf orarngu uvz va gur
inyyrl.

7:9 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff gur fnzr avtug, gung gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz,
Nevfr, trg gurr qbja hagb gur ubfg; sbe V unir qryvirerq vg vagb guvar
unaq.

7:10 Ohg vs gubh srne gb tb qbja, tb gubh jvgu Cuhenu gul freinag qbja
gb gur ubfg: 7:11 Naq gubh funyg urne jung gurl fnl; naq nsgrejneq
funyy guvar unaqf or fgeratgurarq gb tb qbja hagb gur ubfg. Gura jrag
ur qbja jvgu Cuhenu uvf freinag hagb gur bhgfvqr bs gur nezrq zra gung
jrer va gur ubfg.

7:12 Naq gur Zvqvnavgrf naq gur Nznyrxvgrf naq nyy gur puvyqera bs gur
rnfg ynl nybat va gur inyyrl yvxr tenffubccref sbe zhygvghqr; naq
gurve pnzryf jrer jvgubhg ahzore, nf gur fnaq ol gur frn fvqr sbe
zhygvghqr.

7:13 Naq jura Tvqrba jnf pbzr, orubyq, gurer jnf n zna gung gbyq n
qernz hagb uvf sryybj, naq fnvq, Orubyq, V qernzrq n qernz, naq, yb, n
pnxr bs oneyrl oernq ghzoyrq vagb gur ubfg bs Zvqvna, naq pnzr hagb n
grag, naq fzbgr vg gung vg sryy, naq bireghearq vg, gung gur grag ynl
nybat.

7:14 Naq uvf sryybj nafjrerq naq fnvq, Guvf vf abguvat ryfr fnir gur
fjbeq bs Tvqrba gur fba bs Wbnfu, n zna bs Vfenry: sbe vagb uvf unaq
ungu Tbq qryvirerq Zvqvna, naq nyy gur ubfg.

7:15 Naq vg jnf fb, jura Tvqrba urneq gur gryyvat bs gur qernz, naq
gur vagrecergngvba gurerbs, gung ur jbefuvccrq, naq erghearq vagb gur
ubfg bs Vfenry, naq fnvq, Nevfr; sbe gur YBEQ ungu qryvirerq vagb lbhe
unaq gur ubfg bs Zvqvna.

7:16 Naq ur qvivqrq gur guerr uhaqerq zra vagb guerr pbzcnavrf, naq ur
chg n gehzcrg va rirel zna'f unaq, jvgu rzcgl cvgpuref, naq ynzcf
jvguva gur cvgpuref.

7:17 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Ybbx ba zr, naq qb yvxrjvfr: naq, orubyq,
jura V pbzr gb gur bhgfvqr bs gur pnzc, vg funyy or gung, nf V qb, fb
funyy lr qb.

7:18 Jura V oybj jvgu n gehzcrg, V naq nyy gung ner jvgu zr, gura oybj
lr gur gehzcrgf nyfb ba rirel fvqr bs nyy gur pnzc, naq fnl, Gur fjbeq
bs gur YBEQ, naq bs Tvqrba.

7:19 Fb Tvqrba, naq gur uhaqerq zra gung jrer jvgu uvz, pnzr hagb gur
bhgfvqr bs gur pnzc va gur ortvaavat bs gur zvqqyr jngpu; naq gurl unq
ohg arjyl frg gur jngpu: naq gurl oyrj gur gehzcrgf, naq oenxr gur
cvgpuref gung jrer va gurve unaqf.

7:20 Naq gur guerr pbzcnavrf oyrj gur gehzcrgf, naq oenxr gur
cvgpuref, naq uryq gur ynzcf va gurve yrsg unaqf, naq gur gehzcrgf va
gurve evtug unaqf gb oybj jvguny: naq gurl pevrq, Gur fjbeq bs gur
YBEQ, naq bs Tvqrba.

7:21 Naq gurl fgbbq rirel zna va uvf cynpr ebhaq nobhg gur pnzc; naq
nyy gur ubfg ena, naq pevrq, naq syrq.

7:22 Naq gur guerr uhaqerq oyrj gur gehzcrgf, naq gur YBEQ frg rirel
zna'f fjbeq ntnvafg uvf sryybj, rira guebhtubhg nyy gur ubfg: naq gur
ubfg syrq gb Orgufuvggnu va Mrerengu, naq gb gur obeqre bs
Noryzrubynu, hagb Gnoongu.

7:23 Naq gur zra bs Vfenry tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure bhg bs
Ancugnyv, naq bhg bs Nfure, naq bhg bs nyy Znanffru, naq chefhrq nsgre
gur Zvqvnavgrf.

7:24 Naq Tvqrba frag zrffratref guebhtubhg nyy zbhag Rcuenvz, fnlvat,
pbzr qbja ntnvafg gur Zvqvnavgrf, naq gnxr orsber gurz gur jngref hagb
Orguonenu naq Wbeqna. Gura nyy gur zra bs Rcuenvz tngurerq gurzfryirf
gbtrgure, naq gbbx gur jngref hagb Orguonenu naq Wbeqna.

7:25 Naq gurl gbbx gjb cevaprf bs gur Zvqvnavgrf, Bero naq Mrro; naq
gurl fyrj Bero hcba gur ebpx Bero, naq Mrro gurl fyrj ng gur jvarcerff
bs Mrro, naq chefhrq Zvqvna, naq oebhtug gur urnqf bs Bero naq Mrro gb
Tvqrba ba gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna.

8:1 Naq gur zra bs Rcuenvz fnvq hagb uvz, Jul unfg gubh freirq hf
guhf, gung gubh pnyyrqfg hf abg, jura gubh jragrfg gb svtug jvgu gur
Zvqvnavgrf?  Naq gurl qvq puvqr jvgu uvz funecyl.

8:2 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Jung unir V qbar abj va pbzcnevfba bs lbh?
Vf abg gur tyrnavat bs gur tencrf bs Rcuenvz orggre guna gur ivagntr
bs Novrmre?  8:3 Tbq ungu qryvirerq vagb lbhe unaqf gur cevaprf bs
Zvqvna, Bero naq Mrro: naq jung jnf V noyr gb qb va pbzcnevfba bs lbh?
Gura gurve natre jnf nongrq gbjneq uvz, jura ur unq fnvq gung.

8:4 Naq Tvqrba pnzr gb Wbeqna, naq cnffrq bire, ur, naq gur guerr
uhaqerq zra gung jrer jvgu uvz, snvag, lrg chefhvat gurz.

8:5 Naq ur fnvq hagb gur zra bs Fhppbgu, Tvir, V cenl lbh, ybnirf bs
oernq hagb gur crbcyr gung sbyybj zr; sbe gurl or snvag, naq V nz
chefhvat nsgre Mronu naq Mnyzhaan, xvatf bs Zvqvna.

8:6 Naq gur cevaprf bs Fhppbgu fnvq, Ner gur unaqf bs Mronu naq
Mnyzhaan abj va guvar unaq, gung jr fubhyq tvir oernq hagb guvar nezl?
8:7 Naq Tvqrba fnvq, Gurersber jura gur YBEQ ungu qryvirerq Mronu naq
Mnyzhaan vagb zvar unaq, gura V jvyy grne lbhe syrfu jvgu gur gubeaf
bs gur jvyqrearff naq jvgu oevref.

8:8 Naq ur jrag hc gurapr gb Crahry, naq fcnxr hagb gurz yvxrjvfr: naq
gur zra bs Crahry nafjrerq uvz nf gur zra bs Fhppbgu unq nafjrerq uvz.

8:9 Naq ur fcnxr nyfb hagb gur zra bs Crahry, fnlvat, Jura V pbzr
ntnva va crnpr, V jvyy oernx qbja guvf gbjre.

8:10 Abj Mronu naq Mnyzhaan jrer va Xnexbe, naq gurve ubfgf jvgu gurz,
nobhg svsgrra gubhfnaq zra, nyy gung jrer yrsg bs nyy gur ubfgf bs gur
puvyqera bs gur rnfg: sbe gurer sryy na uhaqerq naq gjragl gubhfnaq
zra gung qerj fjbeq.

8:11 Naq Tvqrba jrag hc ol gur jnl bs gurz gung qjryg va gragf ba gur
rnfg bs Abonu naq Wbtorunu, naq fzbgr gur ubfg; sbe gur ubfg jnf
frpher.

8:12 Naq jura Mronu naq Mnyzhaan syrq, ur chefhrq nsgre gurz, naq gbbx
gur gjb xvatf bs Zvqvna, Mronu naq Mnyzhaan, naq qvfpbzsvgrq nyy gur
ubfg.

8:13 Naq Tvqrba gur fba bs Wbnfu erghearq sebz onggyr orsber gur fha
jnf hc, 8:14 Naq pnhtug n lbhat zna bs gur zra bs Fhppbgu, naq
radhverq bs uvz: naq ur qrfpevorq hagb uvz gur cevaprf bs Fhppbgu, naq
gur ryqref gurerbs, rira guerrfpber naq friragrra zra.

8:15 Naq ur pnzr hagb gur zra bs Fhppbgu, naq fnvq, Orubyq Mronu naq
Mnyzhaan, jvgu jubz lr qvq hcoenvq zr, fnlvat, Ner gur unaqf bs Mronu
naq Mnyzhaan abj va guvar unaq, gung jr fubhyq tvir oernq hagb gul zra
gung ner jrnel?  8:16 Naq ur gbbx gur ryqref bs gur pvgl, naq gubeaf
bs gur jvyqrearff naq oevref, naq jvgu gurz ur gnhtug gur zra bs
Fhppbgu.

8:17 Naq ur orng qbja gur gbjre bs Crahry, naq fyrj gur zra bs gur
pvgl.

8:18 Gura fnvq ur hagb Mronu naq Mnyzhaan, Jung znaare bs zra jrer
gurl jubz lr fyrj ng Gnobe? Naq gurl nafjrerq, Nf gubh neg, fb jrer
gurl; rnpu bar erfrzoyrq gur puvyqera bs n xvat.

8:19 Naq ur fnvq, Gurl jrer zl oerguera, rira gur fbaf bs zl zbgure:
nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, vs lr unq fnirq gurz nyvir, V jbhyq abg fynl lbh.

8:20 Naq ur fnvq hagb Wrgure uvf svefgobea, Hc, naq fynl gurz. Ohg gur
lbhgu qerj abg uvf fjbeq: sbe ur srnerq, orpnhfr ur jnf lrg n lbhgu.

8:21 Gura Mronu naq Mnyzhaan fnvq, Evfr gubh, naq snyy hcba hf: sbe nf
gur zna vf, fb vf uvf fgeratgu. Naq Tvqrba nebfr, naq fyrj Mronu naq
Mnyzhaan, naq gbbx njnl gur beanzragf gung jrer ba gurve pnzryf'
arpxf.

8:22 Gura gur zra bs Vfenry fnvq hagb Tvqrba, Ehyr gubh bire hf, obgu
gubh, naq gul fba, naq gul fba'f fba nyfb: sbe gubh unfg qryvirerq hf
sebz gur unaq bs Zvqvna.

8:23 Naq Tvqrba fnvq hagb gurz, V jvyy abg ehyr bire lbh, arvgure
funyy zl fba ehyr bire lbh: gur YBEQ funyy ehyr bire lbh.

8:24 Naq Tvqrba fnvq hagb gurz, V jbhyq qrfver n erdhrfg bs lbh, gung
lr jbhyq tvir zr rirel zna gur rneevatf bs uvf cerl. (Sbe gurl unq
tbyqra rneevatf, orpnhfr gurl jrer Vfuznryvgrf.)  8:25 Naq gurl
nafjrerq, Jr jvyy jvyyvatyl tvir gurz. Naq gurl fcernq n tnezrag, naq
qvq pnfg gurerva rirel zna gur rneevatf bs uvf cerl.

8:26 Naq gur jrvtug bs gur tbyqra rneevatf gung ur erdhrfgrq jnf n
gubhfnaq naq frira uhaqerq furxryf bs tbyq; orfvqr beanzragf, naq
pbyynef, naq checyr envzrag gung jnf ba gur xvatf bs Zvqvna, naq
orfvqr gur punvaf gung jrer nobhg gurve pnzryf' arpxf.

8:27 Naq Tvqrba znqr na rcubq gurerbs, naq chg vg va uvf pvgl, rira va
Bcuenu: naq nyy Vfenry jrag guvgure n jubevat nsgre vg: juvpu guvat
orpnzr n faner hagb Tvqrba, naq gb uvf ubhfr.

8:28 Guhf jnf Zvqvna fhoqhrq orsber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, fb gung
gurl yvsgrq hc gurve urnqf ab zber. Naq gur pbhagel jnf va dhvrgarff
sbegl lrnef va gur qnlf bs Tvqrba.

8:29 Naq Wrehoonny gur fba bs Wbnfu jrag naq qjryg va uvf bja ubhfr.

8:30 Naq Tvqrba unq guerrfpber naq gra fbaf bs uvf obql ortbggra: sbe
ur unq znal jvirf.

8:31 Naq uvf pbaphovar gung jnf va Furpurz, fur nyfb oner uvz n fba,
jubfr anzr ur pnyyrq Novzryrpu.

8:32 Naq Tvqrba gur fba bs Wbnfu qvrq va n tbbq byq ntr, naq jnf
ohevrq va gur frchypuer bs Wbnfu uvf sngure, va Bcuenu bs gur
Novrmevgrf.

8:33 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf fbba nf Tvqrba jnf qrnq, gung gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry ghearq ntnva, naq jrag n jubevat nsgre Onnyvz, naq
znqr Onnyorevgu gurve tbq.

8:34 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry erzrzorerq abg gur YBEQ gurve Tbq, jub
unq qryvirerq gurz bhg bs gur unaqf bs nyy gurve rarzvrf ba rirel
fvqr: 8:35 Arvgure furjrq gurl xvaqarff gb gur ubhfr bs Wrehoonny,
anzryl, Tvqrba, nppbeqvat gb nyy gur tbbqarff juvpu ur unq furjrq hagb
Vfenry.

9:1 Naq Novzryrpu gur fba bs Wrehoonny jrag gb Furpurz hagb uvf
zbgure'f oerguera, naq pbzzharq jvgu gurz, naq jvgu nyy gur snzvyl bs
gur ubhfr bs uvf zbgure'f sngure, fnlvat, 9:2 Fcrnx, V cenl lbh, va
gur rnef bs nyy gur zra bs Furpurz, Jurgure vf orggre sbe lbh, rvgure
gung nyy gur fbaf bs Wrehoonny, juvpu ner guerrfpber naq gra crefbaf,
ervta bire lbh, be gung bar ervta bire lbh? erzrzore nyfb gung V nz
lbhe obar naq lbhe syrfu.

9:3 Naq uvf zbgure'f oerguera fcnxr bs uvz va gur rnef bs nyy gur zra
bs Furpurz nyy gurfr jbeqf: naq gurve urnegf vapyvarq gb sbyybj
Novzryrpu; sbe gurl fnvq, Ur vf bhe oebgure.

9:4 Naq gurl tnir uvz guerrfpber naq gra cvrprf bs fvyire bhg bs gur
ubhfr bs Onnyorevgu, jurerjvgu Novzryrpu uverq inva naq yvtug crefbaf,
juvpu sbyybjrq uvz.

9:5 Naq ur jrag hagb uvf sngure'f ubhfr ng Bcuenu, naq fyrj uvf
oerguera gur fbaf bs Wrehoonny, orvat guerrfpber naq gra crefbaf, hcba
bar fgbar: abgjvgufgnaqvat lrg Wbgunz gur lbhatrfg fba bs Wrehoonny
jnf yrsg; sbe ur uvq uvzfrys.

9:6 Naq nyy gur zra bs Furpurz tngurerq gbtrgure, naq nyy gur ubhfr bs
Zvyyb, naq jrag, naq znqr Novzryrpu xvat, ol gur cynva bs gur cvyyne
gung jnf va Furpurz.

9:7 Naq jura gurl gbyq vg gb Wbgunz, ur jrag naq fgbbq va gur gbc bs
zbhag Trevmvz, naq yvsgrq hc uvf ibvpr, naq pevrq, naq fnvq hagb gurz,
Urnexra hagb zr, lr zra bs Furpurz, gung Tbq znl urnexra hagb lbh.

9:8 Gur gerrf jrag sbegu ba n gvzr gb nabvag n xvat bire gurz; naq
gurl fnvq hagb gur byvir gerr, Ervta gubh bire hf.

9:9 Ohg gur byvir gerr fnvq hagb gurz, Fubhyq V yrnir zl sngarff,
jurerjvgu ol zr gurl ubabhe Tbq naq zna, naq tb gb or cebzbgrq bire
gur gerrf?  9:10 Naq gur gerrf fnvq gb gur svt gerr, Pbzr gubh, naq
ervta bire hf.

9:11 Ohg gur svt gerr fnvq hagb gurz, Fubhyq V sbefnxr zl fjrrgarff,
naq zl tbbq sehvg, naq tb gb or cebzbgrq bire gur gerrf?  9:12 Gura
fnvq gur gerrf hagb gur ivar, Pbzr gubh, naq ervta bire hf.

9:13 Naq gur ivar fnvq hagb gurz, Fubhyq V yrnir zl jvar, juvpu
purrergu Tbq naq zna, naq tb gb or cebzbgrq bire gur gerrf?  9:14 Gura
fnvq nyy gur gerrf hagb gur oenzoyr, Pbzr gubh, naq ervta bire hf.

9:15 Naq gur oenzoyr fnvq hagb gur gerrf, Vs va gehgu lr nabvag zr
xvat bire lbh, gura pbzr naq chg lbhe gehfg va zl funqbj: naq vs abg,
yrg sver pbzr bhg bs gur oenzoyr, naq qribhe gur prqnef bs Yronaba.

9:16 Abj gurersber, vs lr unir qbar gehyl naq fvapreryl, va gung lr
unir znqr Novzryrpu xvat, naq vs lr unir qrnyg jryy jvgu Wrehoonny naq
uvf ubhfr, naq unir qbar hagb uvz nppbeqvat gb gur qrfreivat bs uvf
unaqf; 9:17 (Sbe zl sngure sbhtug sbe lbh, naq nqiragherq uvf yvsr
sne, naq qryvirerq lbh bhg bs gur unaq bs Zvqvna: 9:18 Naq lr ner
evfra hc ntnvafg zl sngure'f ubhfr guvf qnl, naq unir fynva uvf fbaf,
guerrfpber naq gra crefbaf, hcba bar fgbar, naq unir znqr Novzryrpu,
gur fba bs uvf znvqfreinag, xvat bire gur zra bs Furpurz, orpnhfr ur
vf lbhe oebgure;) 9:19 Vs lr gura unir qrnyg gehyl naq fvapreryl jvgu
Wrehoonny naq jvgu uvf ubhfr guvf qnl, gura erwbvpr lr va Novzryrpu,
naq yrg uvz nyfb erwbvpr va lbh: 9:20 Ohg vs abg, yrg sver pbzr bhg
sebz Novzryrpu, naq qribhe gur zra bs Furpurz, naq gur ubhfr bs Zvyyb;
naq yrg sver pbzr bhg sebz gur zra bs Furpurz, naq sebz gur ubhfr bs
Zvyyb, naq qribhe Novzryrpu.

9:21 Naq Wbgunz ena njnl, naq syrq, naq jrag gb Orre, naq qjryg gurer,
sbe srne bs Novzryrpu uvf oebgure.

9:22 Jura Novzryrpu unq ervtarq guerr lrnef bire Vfenry, 9:23 Gura Tbq
frag na rivy fcvevg orgjrra Novzryrpu naq gur zra bs Furpurz; naq gur
zra bs Furpurz qrnyg gernpurebhfyl jvgu Novzryrpu: 9:24 Gung gur
pehrygl qbar gb gur guerrfpber naq gra fbaf bs Wrehoonny zvtug pbzr,
naq gurve oybbq or ynvq hcba Novzryrpu gurve oebgure, juvpu fyrj gurz;
naq hcba gur zra bs Furpurz, juvpu nvqrq uvz va gur xvyyvat bs uvf
oerguera.

9:25 Naq gur zra bs Furpurz frg yvref va jnvg sbe uvz va gur gbc bs
gur zbhagnvaf, naq gurl eboorq nyy gung pnzr nybat gung jnl ol gurz:
naq vg jnf gbyq Novzryrpu.

9:26 Naq Tnny gur fba bs Rorq pnzr jvgu uvf oerguera, naq jrag bire gb
Furpurz: naq gur zra bs Furpurz chg gurve pbasvqrapr va uvz.

9:27 Naq gurl jrag bhg vagb gur svryqf, naq tngurerq gurve ivarlneqf,
naq gebqr gur tencrf, naq znqr zreel, naq jrag vagb gur ubhfr bs gurve
tbq, naq qvq rng naq qevax, naq phefrq Novzryrpu.

9:28 Naq Tnny gur fba bs Rorq fnvq, Jub vf Novzryrpu, naq jub vf
Furpurz, gung jr fubhyq freir uvz? vf abg ur gur fba bs Wrehoonny? naq
Mrohy uvf bssvpre? freir gur zra bs Unzbe gur sngure bs Furpurz: sbe
jul fubhyq jr freir uvz?  9:29 Naq jbhyq gb Tbq guvf crbcyr jrer haqre
zl unaq! gura jbhyq V erzbir Novzryrpu. Naq ur fnvq gb Novzryrpu,
Vapernfr guvar nezl, naq pbzr bhg.

9:30 Naq jura Mrohy gur ehyre bs gur pvgl urneq gur jbeqf bs Tnny gur
fba bs Rorq, uvf natre jnf xvaqyrq.

9:31 Naq ur frag zrffratref hagb Novzryrpu cevivyl, fnlvat, Orubyq,
Tnny gur fba bs Rorq naq uvf oerguera or pbzr gb Furpurz; naq, orubyq,
gurl sbegvsl gur pvgl ntnvafg gurr.

9:32 Abj gurersber hc ol avtug, gubh naq gur crbcyr gung vf jvgu gurr,
naq yvr va jnvg va gur svryq: 9:33 Naq vg funyy or, gung va gur
zbeavat, nf fbba nf gur fha vf hc, gubh funyg evfr rneyl, naq frg hcba
gur pvgl: naq, orubyq, jura ur naq gur crbcyr gung vf jvgu uvz pbzr
bhg ntnvafg gurr, gura znlrfg gubh qb gb gurz nf gubh funyg svaq
bppnfvba.

9:34 Naq Novzryrpu ebfr hc, naq nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz, ol
avtug, naq gurl ynvq jnvg ntnvafg Furpurz va sbhe pbzcnavrf.

9:35 Naq Tnny gur fba bs Rorq jrag bhg, naq fgbbq va gur ragrevat bs
gur tngr bs gur pvgl: naq Novzryrpu ebfr hc, naq gur crbcyr gung jrer
jvgu uvz, sebz ylvat va jnvg.

9:36 Naq jura Tnny fnj gur crbcyr, ur fnvq gb Mrohy, Orubyq, gurer
pbzr crbcyr qbja sebz gur gbc bs gur zbhagnvaf. Naq Mrohy fnvq hagb
uvz, Gubh frrfg gur funqbj bs gur zbhagnvaf nf vs gurl jrer zra.

9:37 Naq Tnny fcnxr ntnva, naq fnvq, Frr gurer pbzr crbcyr qbja ol gur
zvqqyr bs gur ynaq, naq nabgure pbzcnal pbzr nybat ol gur cynva bs
Zrbaravz.

9:38 Gura fnvq Mrohy hagb uvz, Jurer vf abj gul zbhgu, jurerjvgu gubh
fnvqfg, Jub vf Novzryrpu, gung jr fubhyq freir uvz? vf abg guvf gur
crbcyr gung gubh unfg qrfcvfrq? tb bhg, V cenl abj, naq svtug jvgu
gurz.

9:39 Naq Tnny jrag bhg orsber gur zra bs Furpurz, naq sbhtug jvgu
Novzryrpu.

9:40 Naq Novzryrpu punfrq uvz, naq ur syrq orsber uvz, naq znal jrer
bireguebja naq jbhaqrq, rira hagb gur ragrevat bs gur tngr.

9:41 Naq Novzryrpu qjryg ng Nehznu: naq Mrohy guehfg bhg Tnny naq uvf
oerguera, gung gurl fubhyq abg qjryy va Furpurz.

9:42 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur zbeebj, gung gur crbcyr jrag bhg vagb
gur svryq; naq gurl gbyq Novzryrpu.

9:43 Naq ur gbbx gur crbcyr, naq qvivqrq gurz vagb guerr pbzcnavrf,
naq ynvq jnvg va gur svryq, naq ybbxrq, naq, orubyq, gur crbcyr jrer
pbzr sbegu bhg bs gur pvgl; naq ur ebfr hc ntnvafg gurz, naq fzbgr
gurz.

9:44 Naq Novzryrpu, naq gur pbzcnal gung jnf jvgu uvz, ehfurq sbejneq,
naq fgbbq va gur ragrevat bs gur tngr bs gur pvgl: naq gur gjb bgure
pbzcnavrf ena hcba nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer va gur svryqf, naq fyrj
gurz.

9:45 Naq Novzryrpu sbhtug ntnvafg gur pvgl nyy gung qnl; naq ur gbbx
gur pvgl, naq fyrj gur crbcyr gung jnf gurerva, naq orng qbja gur
pvgl, naq fbjrq vg jvgu fnyg.

9:46 Naq jura nyy gur zra bs gur gbjre bs Furpurz urneq gung, gurl
ragrerq vagb na ubyq bs gur ubhfr bs gur tbq Orevgu.

9:47 Naq vg jnf gbyq Novzryrpu, gung nyy gur zra bs gur gbjre bs
Furpurz jrer tngurerq gbtrgure.

9:48 Naq Novzryrpu tng uvz hc gb zbhag Mnyzba, ur naq nyy gur crbcyr
gung jrer jvgu uvz; naq Novzryrpu gbbx na nkr va uvf unaq, naq phg
qbja n obhtu sebz gur gerrf, naq gbbx vg, naq ynvq vg ba uvf fubhyqre,
naq fnvq hagb gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz, Jung lr unir frra zr qb,
znxr unfgr, naq qb nf V unir qbar.

9:49 Naq nyy gur crbcyr yvxrjvfr phg qbja rirel zna uvf obhtu, naq
sbyybjrq Novzryrpu, naq chg gurz gb gur ubyq, naq frg gur ubyq ba sver
hcba gurz; fb gung nyy gur zra bs gur gbjre bs Furpurz qvrq nyfb,
nobhg n gubhfnaq zra naq jbzra.

9:50 Gura jrag Novzryrpu gb Gurorm, naq rapnzcrq ntnvafg Gurorm, naq
gbbx vg.

9:51 Ohg gurer jnf n fgebat gbjre jvguva gur pvgl, naq guvgure syrq
nyy gur zra naq jbzra, naq nyy gurl bs gur pvgl, naq fuhg vg gb gurz,
naq tng gurz hc gb gur gbc bs gur gbjre.

9:52 Naq Novzryrpu pnzr hagb gur gbjre, naq sbhtug ntnvafg vg, naq
jrag uneq hagb gur qbbe bs gur gbjre gb ohea vg jvgu sver.

9:53 Naq n pregnva jbzna pnfg n cvrpr bs n zvyyfgbar hcba Novzryrpu'f
urnq, naq nyy gb oenxr uvf fxhyy.

9:54 Gura ur pnyyrq unfgvyl hagb gur lbhat zna uvf nezbheornere, naq
fnvq hagb uvz, Qenj gul fjbeq, naq fynl zr, gung zra fnl abg bs zr, N
jbzra fyrj uvz. Naq uvf lbhat zna guehfg uvz guebhtu, naq ur qvrq.

9:55 Naq jura gur zra bs Vfenry fnj gung Novzryrpu jnf qrnq, gurl
qrcnegrq rirel zna hagb uvf cynpr.

9:56 Guhf Tbq eraqrerq gur jvpxrqarff bs Novzryrpu, juvpu ur qvq hagb
uvf sngure, va fynlvat uvf friragl oerguera: 9:57 Naq nyy gur rivy bs
gur zra bs Furpurz qvq Tbq eraqre hcba gurve urnqf: naq hcba gurz pnzr
gur phefr bs Wbgunz gur fba bs Wrehoonny.

10:1 Naq nsgre Novzryrpu gurer nebfr gb qrsraq Vfenry Gbyn gur fba bs
Chnu, gur fba bs Qbqb, n zna bs Vffnpune; naq ur qjryg va Funzve va
zbhag Rcuenvz.

10:2 Naq ur whqtrq Vfenry gjragl naq guerr lrnef, naq qvrq, naq jnf
ohevrq va Funzve.

10:3 Naq nsgre uvz nebfr Wnve, n Tvyrnqvgr, naq whqtrq Vfenry gjragl
naq gjb lrnef.

10:4 Naq ur unq guvegl fbaf gung ebqr ba guvegl nff pbygf, naq gurl
unq guvegl pvgvrf, juvpu ner pnyyrq Unibguwnve hagb guvf qnl, juvpu
ner va gur ynaq bs Tvyrnq.

10:5 Naq Wnve qvrq, naq jnf ohevrq va Pnzba.

10:6 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq rivy ntnva va gur fvtug bs gur
YBEQ, naq freirq Onnyvz, naq Nfugnebgu, naq gur tbqf bs Flevn, naq gur
tbqf bs Mvqba, naq gur tbqf bs Zbno, naq gur tbqf bs gur puvyqera bs
Nzzba, naq gur tbqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq sbefbbx gur YBEQ, naq
freirq abg uvz.

10:7 Naq gur natre bs gur YBEQ jnf ubg ntnvafg Vfenry, naq ur fbyq
gurz vagb gur unaqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq vagb gur unaqf bs gur
puvyqera bs Nzzba.

10:8 Naq gung lrne gurl irkrq naq bccerffrq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry:
rvtugrra lrnef, nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gung jrer ba gur bgure fvqr
Wbeqna va gur ynaq bs gur Nzbevgrf, juvpu vf va Tvyrnq.

10:9 Zberbire gur puvyqera bs Nzzba cnffrq bire Wbeqna gb svtug nyfb
ntnvafg Whqnu, naq ntnvafg Orawnzva, naq ntnvafg gur ubhfr bs Rcuenvz;
fb gung Vfenry jnf fber qvfgerffrq.

10:10 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pevrq hagb gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Jr unir
fvaarq ntnvafg gurr, obgu orpnhfr jr unir sbefnxra bhe Tbq, naq nyfb
freirq Onnyvz.

10:11 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, Qvq abg V qryvire
lbh sebz gur Rtlcgvnaf, naq sebz gur Nzbevgrf, sebz gur puvyqera bs
Nzzba, naq sebz gur Cuvyvfgvarf?  10:12 Gur Mvqbavnaf nyfb, naq gur
Nznyrxvgrf, naq gur Znbavgrf, qvq bccerff lbh; naq lr pevrq gb zr, naq
V qryvirerq lbh bhg bs gurve unaq.

10:13 Lrg lr unir sbefnxra zr, naq freirq bgure tbqf: jurersber V jvyy
qryvire lbh ab zber.

10:14 Tb naq pel hagb gur tbqf juvpu lr unir pubfra; yrg gurz qryvire
lbh va gur gvzr bs lbhe gevohyngvba.

10:15 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fnvq hagb gur YBEQ, Jr unir fvaarq:
qb gubh hagb hf jungfbrire frrzrgu tbbq hagb gurr; qryvire hf bayl, jr
cenl gurr, guvf qnl.

10:16 Naq gurl chg njnl gur fgenatr tbqf sebz nzbat gurz, naq freirq
gur YBEQ: naq uvf fbhy jnf tevrirq sbe gur zvfrel bs Vfenry.

10:17 Gura gur puvyqera bs Nzzba jrer tngurerq gbtrgure, naq rapnzcrq
va Tvyrnq. Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry nffrzoyrq gurzfryirf gbtrgure,
naq rapnzcrq va Zvmcru.

10:18 Naq gur crbcyr naq cevaprf bs Tvyrnq fnvq bar gb nabgure, Jung
zna vf ur gung jvyy ortva gb svtug ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs Nzzba? ur
funyy or urnq bire nyy gur vaunovgnagf bs Tvyrnq.

11:1 Abj Wrcugunu gur Tvyrnqvgr jnf n zvtugl zna bs inybhe, naq ur jnf
gur fba bs na uneybg: naq Tvyrnq ortng Wrcugunu.

11:2 Naq Tvyrnq'f jvsr oner uvz fbaf; naq uvf jvsr'f fbaf terj hc, naq
gurl guehfg bhg Wrcugunu, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Gubh funyg abg vaurevg va
bhe sngure'f ubhfr; sbe gubh neg gur fba bs n fgenatr jbzna.

11:3 Gura Wrcugunu syrq sebz uvf oerguera, naq qjryg va gur ynaq bs
Gbo: naq gurer jrer tngurerq inva zra gb Wrcugunu, naq jrag bhg jvgu
uvz.

11:4 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va cebprff bs gvzr, gung gur puvyqera bs
Nzzba znqr jne ntnvafg Vfenry.

11:5 Naq vg jnf fb, gung jura gur puvyqera bs Nzzba znqr jne ntnvafg
Vfenry, gur ryqref bs Tvyrnq jrag gb srgpu Wrcugunu bhg bs gur ynaq bs
Gbo: 11:6 Naq gurl fnvq hagb Wrcugunu, Pbzr, naq or bhe pncgnva, gung
jr znl svtug jvgu gur puvyqera bs Nzzba.

11:7 Naq Wrcugunu fnvq hagb gur ryqref bs Tvyrnq, Qvq abg lr ungr zr,
naq rkcry zr bhg bs zl sngure'f ubhfr? naq jul ner lr pbzr hagb zr abj
jura lr ner va qvfgerff?  11:8 Naq gur ryqref bs Tvyrnq fnvq hagb
Wrcugunu, Gurersber jr ghea ntnva gb gurr abj, gung gubh znlrfg tb
jvgu hf, naq svtug ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, naq or bhe urnq bire
nyy gur vaunovgnagf bs Tvyrnq.

11:9 Naq Wrcugunu fnvq hagb gur ryqref bs Tvyrnq, Vs lr oevat zr ubzr
ntnva gb svtug ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, naq gur YBEQ qryvire
gurz orsber zr, funyy V or lbhe urnq?  11:10 Naq gur ryqref bs Tvyrnq
fnvq hagb Wrcugunu, Gur YBEQ or jvgarff orgjrra hf, vs jr qb abg fb
nppbeqvat gb gul jbeqf.

11:11 Gura Wrcugunu jrag jvgu gur ryqref bs Tvyrnq, naq gur crbcyr
znqr uvz urnq naq pncgnva bire gurz: naq Wrcugunu hggrerq nyy uvf
jbeqf orsber gur YBEQ va Zvmcru.

11:12 Naq Wrcugunu frag zrffratref hagb gur xvat bs gur puvyqera bs
Nzzba, fnlvat, Jung unfg gubh gb qb jvgu zr, gung gubh neg pbzr
ntnvafg zr gb svtug va zl ynaq?  11:13 Naq gur xvat bs gur puvyqera bs
Nzzba nafjrerq hagb gur zrffratref bs Wrcugunu, Orpnhfr Vfenry gbbx
njnl zl ynaq, jura gurl pnzr hc bhg bs Rtlcg, sebz Neaba rira hagb
Wnoobx, naq hagb Wbeqna: abj gurersber erfgber gubfr ynaqf ntnva
crnprnoyl.

11:14 Naq Wrcugunu frag zrffratref ntnva hagb gur xvat bs gur puvyqera
bs Nzzba: 11:15 Naq fnvq hagb uvz, Guhf fnvgu Wrcugunu, Vfenry gbbx
abg njnl gur ynaq bs Zbno, abe gur ynaq bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba:
11:16 Ohg jura Vfenry pnzr hc sebz Rtlcg, naq jnyxrq guebhtu gur
jvyqrearff hagb gur Erq frn, naq pnzr gb Xnqrfu; 11:17 Gura Vfenry
frag zrffratref hagb gur xvat bs Rqbz, fnlvat, Yrg zr, V cenl gurr,
cnff guebhtu gul ynaq: ohg gur xvat bs Rqbz jbhyq abg urnexra gurergb.
Naq va yvxr znaare gurl frag hagb gur xvat bs Zbno: ohg ur jbhyq abg
pbafrag: naq Vfenry nobqr va Xnqrfu.

11:18 Gura gurl jrag nybat guebhtu gur jvyqrearff, naq pbzcnffrq gur
ynaq bs Rqbz, naq gur ynaq bs Zbno, naq pnzr ol gur rnfg fvqr bs gur
ynaq bs Zbno, naq cvgpurq ba gur bgure fvqr bs Neaba, ohg pnzr abg
jvguva gur obeqre bs Zbno: sbe Neaba jnf gur obeqre bs Zbno.

11:19 Naq Vfenry frag zrffratref hagb Fvuba xvat bs gur Nzbevgrf, gur
xvat bs Urfuoba; naq Vfenry fnvq hagb uvz, Yrg hf cnff, jr cenl gurr,
guebhtu gul ynaq vagb zl cynpr.

11:20 Ohg Fvuba gehfgrq abg Vfenry gb cnff guebhtu uvf pbnfg: ohg
Fvuba tngurerq nyy uvf crbcyr gbtrgure, naq cvgpurq va Wnunm, naq
sbhtug ntnvafg Vfenry.

11:21 Naq gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry qryvirerq Fvuba naq nyy uvf crbcyr
vagb gur unaq bs Vfenry, naq gurl fzbgr gurz: fb Vfenry cbffrffrq nyy
gur ynaq bs gur Nzbevgrf, gur vaunovgnagf bs gung pbhagel.

11:22 Naq gurl cbffrffrq nyy gur pbnfgf bs gur Nzbevgrf, sebz Neaba
rira hagb Wnoobx, naq sebz gur jvyqrearff rira hagb Wbeqna.

11:23 Fb abj gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry ungu qvfcbffrffrq gur Nzbevgrf
sebz orsber uvf crbcyr Vfenry, naq fubhyqrfg gubh cbffrff vg?  11:24
Jvyg abg gubh cbffrff gung juvpu Purzbfu gul tbq tvirgu gurr gb
cbffrff? Fb jubzfbrire gur YBEQ bhe Tbq funyy qevir bhg sebz orsber
hf, gurz jvyy jr cbffrff.

11:25 Naq abj neg gubh nal guvat orggre guna Onynx gur fba bs Mvccbe,
xvat bs Zbno? qvq ur rire fgevir ntnvafg Vfenry, be qvq ur rire svtug
ntnvafg gurz, 11:26 Juvyr Vfenry qjryg va Urfuoba naq ure gbjaf, naq
va Nebre naq ure gbjaf, naq va nyy gur pvgvrf gung or nybat ol gur
pbnfgf bs Neaba, guerr uhaqerq lrnef? jul gurersber qvq lr abg erpbire
gurz jvguva gung gvzr?  11:27 Jurersber V unir abg fvaarq ntnvafg
gurr, ohg gubh qbrfg zr jebat gb jne ntnvafg zr: gur YBEQ gur Whqtr or
whqtr guvf qnl orgjrra gur puvyqera bs Vfenry naq gur puvyqera bs
Nzzba.

11:28 Ubjorvg gur xvat bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba urnexrarq abg hagb gur
jbeqf bs Wrcugunu juvpu ur frag uvz.

11:29 Gura gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ pnzr hcba Wrcugunu, naq ur cnffrq
bire Tvyrnq, naq Znanffru, naq cnffrq bire Zvmcru bs Tvyrnq, naq sebz
Zvmcru bs Tvyrnq ur cnffrq bire hagb gur puvyqera bs Nzzba.

11:30 Naq Wrcugunu ibjrq n ibj hagb gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, Vs gubh funyg
jvgubhg snvy qryvire gur puvyqera bs Nzzba vagb zvar unaqf, 11:31 Gura
vg funyy or, gung jungfbrire pbzrgu sbegu bs gur qbbef bs zl ubhfr gb
zrrg zr, jura V erghea va crnpr sebz gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, funyy
fheryl or gur YBEQ'f, naq V jvyy bssre vg hc sbe n oheag bssrevat.

11:32 Fb Wrcugunu cnffrq bire hagb gur puvyqera bs Nzzba gb svtug
ntnvafg gurz; naq gur YBEQ qryvirerq gurz vagb uvf unaqf.

11:33 Naq ur fzbgr gurz sebz Nebre, rira gvyy gubh pbzr gb Zvaavgu,
rira gjragl pvgvrf, naq hagb gur cynva bs gur ivarlneqf, jvgu n irel
terng fynhtugre. Guhf gur puvyqera bs Nzzba jrer fhoqhrq orsber gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry.

11:34 Naq Wrcugunu pnzr gb Zvmcru hagb uvf ubhfr, naq, orubyq, uvf
qnhtugre pnzr bhg gb zrrg uvz jvgu gvzoeryf naq jvgu qnaprf: naq fur
jnf uvf bayl puvyq; orfvqr ure ur unq arvgure fba abe qnhtugre.

11:35 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura ur fnj ure, gung ur erag uvf pybgurf,
naq fnvq, Nynf, zl qnhtugre! gubh unfg oebhtug zr irel ybj, naq gubh
neg bar bs gurz gung gebhoyr zr: sbe V unir bcrarq zl zbhgu hagb gur
YBEQ, naq V pnaabg tb onpx.

11:36 Naq fur fnvq hagb uvz, Zl sngure, vs gubh unfg bcrarq gul zbhgu
hagb gur YBEQ, qb gb zr nppbeqvat gb gung juvpu ungu cebprrqrq bhg bs
gul zbhgu; sbenfzhpu nf gur YBEQ ungu gnxra iratrnapr sbe gurr bs
guvar rarzvrf, rira bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba.

11:37 Naq fur fnvq hagb ure sngure, Yrg guvf guvat or qbar sbe zr: yrg
zr nybar gjb zbaguf, gung V znl tb hc naq qbja hcba gur zbhagnvaf, naq
orjnvy zl ivetvavgl, V naq zl sryybjf.

11:38 Naq ur fnvq, Tb. Naq ur frag ure njnl sbe gjb zbaguf: naq fur
jrag jvgu ure pbzcnavbaf, naq orjnvyrq ure ivetvavgl hcba gur
zbhagnvaf.

11:39 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur raq bs gjb zbaguf, gung fur erghearq
hagb ure sngure, jub qvq jvgu ure nppbeqvat gb uvf ibj juvpu ur unq
ibjrq: naq fur xarj ab zna. Naq vg jnf n phfgbz va Vfenry, 11:40 Gung
gur qnhtugref bs Vfenry jrag lrneyl gb ynzrag gur qnhtugre bs Wrcugunu
gur Tvyrnqvgr sbhe qnlf va n lrne.

12:1 Naq gur zra bs Rcuenvz tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure, naq jrag
abegujneq, naq fnvq hagb Wrcugunu, Jurersber cnffrqfg gubh bire gb
svtug ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, naq qvqfg abg pnyy hf gb tb jvgu
gurr? jr jvyy ohea guvar ubhfr hcba gurr jvgu sver.

12:2 Naq Wrcugunu fnvq hagb gurz, V naq zl crbcyr jrer ng terng fgevsr
jvgu gur puvyqera bs Nzzba; naq jura V pnyyrq lbh, lr qryvirerq zr abg
bhg bs gurve unaqf.

12:3 Naq jura V fnj gung lr qryvirerq zr abg, V chg zl yvsr va zl
unaqf, naq cnffrq bire ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, naq gur YBEQ
qryvirerq gurz vagb zl unaq: jurersber gura ner lr pbzr hc hagb zr
guvf qnl, gb svtug ntnvafg zr?  12:4 Gura Wrcugunu tngurerq gbtrgure
nyy gur zra bs Tvyrnq, naq sbhtug jvgu Rcuenvz: naq gur zra bs Tvyrnq
fzbgr Rcuenvz, orpnhfr gurl fnvq, Lr Tvyrnqvgrf ner shtvgvirf bs
Rcuenvz nzbat gur Rcuenvzvgrf, naq nzbat gur Znanffvgrf.

12:5 Naq gur Tvyrnqvgrf gbbx gur cnffntrf bs Wbeqna orsber gur
Rcuenvzvgrf: naq vg jnf fb, gung jura gubfr Rcuenvzvgrf juvpu jrer
rfpncrq fnvq, Yrg zr tb bire; gung gur zra bs Tvyrnq fnvq hagb uvz,
Neg gubh na Rcuenvzvgr? Vs ur fnvq, Anl; 12:6 Gura fnvq gurl hagb uvz,
Fnl abj Fuvoobyrgu: naq ur fnvq Fvoobyrgu: sbe ur pbhyq abg senzr gb
cebabhapr vg evtug. Gura gurl gbbx uvz, naq fyrj uvz ng gur cnffntrf
bs Wbeqna: naq gurer sryy ng gung gvzr bs gur Rcuenvzvgrf sbegl naq
gjb gubhfnaq.

12:7 Naq Wrcugunu whqtrq Vfenry fvk lrnef. Gura qvrq Wrcugunu gur
Tvyrnqvgr, naq jnf ohevrq va bar bs gur pvgvrf bs Tvyrnq.

12:8 Naq nsgre uvz Vomna bs Orguyrurz whqtrq Vfenry.

12:9 Naq ur unq guvegl fbaf, naq guvegl qnhtugref, jubz ur frag
noebnq, naq gbbx va guvegl qnhtugref sebz noebnq sbe uvf fbaf. Naq ur
whqtrq Vfenry frira lrnef.

12:10 Gura qvrq Vomna, naq jnf ohevrq ng Orguyrurz.

12:11 Naq nsgre uvz Ryba, n Mrohybavgr, whqtrq Vfenry; naq ur whqtrq
Vfenry gra lrnef.

12:12 Naq Ryba gur Mrohybavgr qvrq, naq jnf ohevrq va Nvwnyba va gur
pbhagel bs Mrohyha.

12:13 Naq nsgre uvz Noqba gur fba bs Uvyyry, n Cvengubavgr, whqtrq
Vfenry.

12:14 Naq ur unq sbegl fbaf naq guvegl arcurjf, gung ebqr ba
guerrfpber naq gra nff pbygf: naq ur whqtrq Vfenry rvtug lrnef.

12:15 Naq Noqba gur fba bs Uvyyry gur Cvengubavgr qvrq, naq jnf ohevrq
va Cvenguba va gur ynaq bs Rcuenvz, va gur zbhag bs gur Nznyrxvgrf.

13:1 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq rivy ntnva va gur fvtug bs gur
YBEQ; naq gur YBEQ qryvirerq gurz vagb gur unaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf
sbegl lrnef.

13:2 Naq gurer jnf n pregnva zna bs Mbenu, bs gur snzvyl bs gur
Qnavgrf, jubfr anzr jnf Znabnu; naq uvf jvsr jnf oneera, naq oner abg.

13:3 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ nccrnerq hagb gur jbzna, naq fnvq hagb
ure, Orubyq abj, gubh neg oneera, naq ornerfg abg: ohg gubh funyg
pbaprvir, naq orne n fba.

13:4 Abj gurersber orjner, V cenl gurr, naq qevax abg jvar abe fgebat
qevax, naq rng abg nal hapyrna guvat: 13:5 Sbe, yb, gubh funyg
pbaprvir, naq orne n fba; naq ab enmbe funyy pbzr ba uvf urnq: sbe gur
puvyq funyy or n Anmnevgr hagb Tbq sebz gur jbzo: naq ur funyy ortva
gb qryvire Vfenry bhg bs gur unaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

13:6 Gura gur jbzna pnzr naq gbyq ure uhfonaq, fnlvat, N zna bs Tbq
pnzr hagb zr, naq uvf pbhagranapr jnf yvxr gur pbhagranapr bs na natry
bs Tbq, irel greevoyr: ohg V nfxrq uvz abg jurapr ur jnf, arvgure gbyq
