ur zr uvf anzr: 13:7 Ohg ur fnvq hagb zr, Orubyq, gubh funyg pbaprvir,
naq orne n fba; naq abj qevax ab jvar abe fgebat qevax, arvgure rng
nal hapyrna guvat: sbe gur puvyq funyy or n Anmnevgr gb Tbq sebz gur
jbzo gb gur qnl bs uvf qrngu.

13:8 Gura Znabnu vagerngrq gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, B zl Ybeq, yrg gur zna
bs Tbq juvpu gubh qvqfg fraq pbzr ntnva hagb hf, naq grnpu hf jung jr
funyy qb hagb gur puvyq gung funyy or obea.

13:9 Naq Tbq urnexrarq gb gur ibvpr bs Znabnu; naq gur natry bs Tbq
pnzr ntnva hagb gur jbzna nf fur fng va gur svryq: ohg Znabnu ure
uhfonaq jnf abg jvgu ure.

13:10 Naq gur jbzna znqr unfgr, naq ena, naq furjrq ure uhfonaq, naq
fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq, gur zna ungu nccrnerq hagb zr, gung pnzr hagb
zr gur bgure qnl.

13:11 Naq Znabnu nebfr, naq jrag nsgre uvf jvsr, naq pnzr gb gur zna,
naq fnvq hagb uvz, Neg gubh gur zna gung fcnxrfg hagb gur jbzna? Naq
ur fnvq, V nz.

13:12 Naq Znabnu fnvq, Abj yrg gul jbeqf pbzr gb cnff. Ubj funyy jr
beqre gur puvyq, naq ubj funyy jr qb hagb uvz?  13:13 Naq gur natry bs
gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Znabnu, Bs nyy gung V fnvq hagb gur jbzna yrg ure
orjner.

13:14 Fur znl abg rng bs nal guvat gung pbzrgu bs gur ivar, arvgure
yrg ure qevax jvar be fgebat qevax, abe rng nal hapyrna guvat: nyy
gung V pbzznaqrq ure yrg ure bofreir.

13:15 Naq Znabnu fnvq hagb gur natry bs gur YBEQ, V cenl gurr, yrg hf
qrgnva gurr, hagvy jr funyy unir znqr ernql n xvq sbe gurr.

13:16 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Znabnu, Gubhtu gubh qrgnva
zr, V jvyy abg rng bs gul oernq: naq vs gubh jvyg bssre n oheag
bssrevat, gubh zhfg bssre vg hagb gur YBEQ. Sbe Znabnu xarj abg gung
ur jnf na natry bs gur YBEQ.

13:17 Naq Znabnu fnvq hagb gur natry bs gur YBEQ, Jung vf gul anzr,
gung jura gul fnlvatf pbzr gb cnff jr znl qb gurr ubabhe?  13:18 Naq
gur natry bs gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, Jul nfxrfg gubh guhf nsgre zl
anzr, frrvat vg vf frperg?  13:19 Fb Znabnu gbbx n xvq jvgu n zrng
bssrevat, naq bssrerq vg hcba n ebpx hagb gur YBEQ: naq gur natry qvq
jbaqrebhfyl; naq Znabnu naq uvf jvsr ybbxrq ba.

13:20 Sbe vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur synzr jrag hc gbjneq urnira sebz
bss gur nygne, gung gur natry bs gur YBEQ nfpraqrq va gur synzr bs gur
nygne. Naq Znabnu naq uvf jvsr ybbxrq ba vg, naq sryy ba gurve snprf
gb gur tebhaq.

13:21 Ohg gur natry bs gur YBEQ qvq ab zber nccrne gb Znabnu naq gb
uvf jvsr. Gura Znabnu xarj gung ur jnf na natry bs gur YBEQ.

13:22 Naq Znabnu fnvq hagb uvf jvsr, Jr funyy fheryl qvr, orpnhfr jr
unir frra Tbq.

13:23 Ohg uvf jvsr fnvq hagb uvz, Vs gur YBEQ jrer cyrnfrq gb xvyy hf,
ur jbhyq abg unir erprvirq n oheag bssrevat naq n zrng bssrevat ng bhe
unaqf, arvgure jbhyq ur unir furjrq hf nyy gurfr guvatf, abe jbhyq nf
ng guvf gvzr unir gbyq hf fhpu guvatf nf gurfr.

13:24 Naq gur jbzna oner n fba, naq pnyyrq uvf anzr Fnzfba: naq gur
puvyq terj, naq gur YBEQ oyrffrq uvz.

13:25 Naq gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ ortna gb zbir uvz ng gvzrf va gur
pnzc bs Qna orgjrra Mbenu naq Rfugnby.

14:1 Naq Fnzfba jrag qbja gb Gvzangu, naq fnj n jbzna va Gvzangu bs
gur qnhtugref bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

14:2 Naq ur pnzr hc, naq gbyq uvf sngure naq uvf zbgure, naq fnvq, V
unir frra n jbzna va Gvzangu bs gur qnhtugref bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf: abj
gurersber trg ure sbe zr gb jvsr.

14:3 Gura uvf sngure naq uvf zbgure fnvq hagb uvz, Vf gurer arire n
jbzna nzbat gur qnhtugref bs gul oerguera, be nzbat nyy zl crbcyr,
gung gubh tbrfg gb gnxr n jvsr bs gur hapvephzpvfrq Cuvyvfgvarf? Naq
Fnzfba fnvq hagb uvf sngure, Trg ure sbe zr; sbe fur cyrnfrgu zr jryy.

14:4 Ohg uvf sngure naq uvf zbgure xarj abg gung vg jnf bs gur YBEQ,
gung ur fbhtug na bppnfvba ntnvafg gur Cuvyvfgvarf: sbe ng gung gvzr
gur Cuvyvfgvarf unq qbzvavba bire Vfenry.

14:5 Gura jrag Fnzfba qbja, naq uvf sngure naq uvf zbgure, gb Gvzangu,
naq pnzr gb gur ivarlneqf bs Gvzangu: naq, orubyq, n lbhat yvba ebnerq
ntnvafg uvz.

14:6 Naq gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ pnzr zvtugvyl hcba uvz, naq ur erag
uvz nf ur jbhyq unir erag n xvq, naq ur unq abguvat va uvf unaq: ohg
ur gbyq abg uvf sngure be uvf zbgure jung ur unq qbar.

14:7 Naq ur jrag qbja, naq gnyxrq jvgu gur jbzna; naq fur cyrnfrq
Fnzfba jryy.

14:8 Naq nsgre n gvzr ur erghearq gb gnxr ure, naq ur ghearq nfvqr gb
frr gur pnepnfr bs gur yvba: naq, orubyq, gurer jnf n fjnez bs orrf
naq ubarl va gur pnepnfr bs gur yvba.

14:9 Naq ur gbbx gurerbs va uvf unaqf, naq jrag ba rngvat, naq pnzr gb
uvf sngure naq zbgure, naq ur tnir gurz, naq gurl qvq rng: ohg ur gbyq
abg gurz gung ur unq gnxra gur ubarl bhg bs gur pnepnfr bs gur yvba.

14:10 Fb uvf sngure jrag qbja hagb gur jbzna: naq Fnzfba znqr gurer n
srnfg; sbe fb hfrq gur lbhat zra gb qb.

14:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gurl fnj uvz, gung gurl oebhtug guvegl
pbzcnavbaf gb or jvgu uvz.

14:12 Naq Fnzfba fnvq hagb gurz, V jvyy abj chg sbegu n evqqyr hagb
lbh: vs lr pna pregnvayl qrpyner vg zr jvguva gur frira qnlf bs gur
srnfg, naq svaq vg bhg, gura V jvyy tvir lbh guvegl furrgf naq guvegl
punatr bs tnezragf: 14:13 Ohg vs lr pnaabg qrpyner vg zr, gura funyy
lr tvir zr guvegl furrgf naq guvegl punatr bs tnezragf. Naq gurl fnvq
hagb uvz, Chg sbegu gul evqqyr, gung jr znl urne vg.

14:14 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Bhg bs gur rngre pnzr sbegu zrng, naq bhg
bs gur fgebat pnzr sbegu fjrrgarff. Naq gurl pbhyq abg va guerr qnlf
rkcbhaq gur evqqyr.

14:15 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur friragu qnl, gung gurl fnvq hagb
Fnzfba'f jvsr, Ragvpr gul uhfonaq, gung ur znl qrpyner hagb hf gur
evqqyr, yrfg jr ohea gurr naq gul sngure'f ubhfr jvgu sver: unir lr
pnyyrq hf gb gnxr gung jr unir? vf vg abg fb?  14:16 Naq Fnzfba'f jvsr
jrcg orsber uvz, naq fnvq, Gubh qbfg ohg ungr zr, naq ybirfg zr abg:
gubh unfg chg sbegu n evqqyr hagb gur puvyqera bs zl crbcyr, naq unfg
abg gbyq vg zr. Naq ur fnvq hagb ure, Orubyq, V unir abg gbyq vg zl
sngure abe zl zbgure, naq funyy V gryy vg gurr?  14:17 Naq fur jrcg
orsber uvz gur frira qnlf, juvyr gurve srnfg ynfgrq: naq vg pnzr gb
cnff ba gur friragu qnl, gung ur gbyq ure, orpnhfr fur ynl fber hcba
uvz: naq fur gbyq gur evqqyr gb gur puvyqera bs ure crbcyr.

14:18 Naq gur zra bs gur pvgl fnvq hagb uvz ba gur friragu qnl orsber
gur fha jrag qbja, Jung vf fjrrgre guna ubarl? Naq jung vf fgebatre
guna n yvba?  naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Vs lr unq abg cybjrq jvgu zl
urvsre, lr unq abg sbhaq bhg zl evqqyr.

14:19 Naq gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ pnzr hcba uvz, naq ur jrag qbja gb
Nfuxryba, naq fyrj guvegl zra bs gurz, naq gbbx gurve fcbvy, naq tnir
punatr bs tnezragf hagb gurz juvpu rkcbhaqrq gur evqqyr. Naq uvf natre
jnf xvaqyrq, naq ur jrag hc gb uvf sngure'f ubhfr.

14:20 Ohg Fnzfba'f jvsr jnf tvira gb uvf pbzcnavba, jubz ur unq hfrq
nf uvf sevraq.

15:1 Ohg vg pnzr gb cnff jvguva n juvyr nsgre, va gur gvzr bs jurng
uneirfg, gung Fnzfba ivfvgrq uvf jvsr jvgu n xvq; naq ur fnvq, V jvyy
tb va gb zl jvsr vagb gur punzore. Ohg ure sngure jbhyq abg fhssre uvz
gb tb va.

15:2 Naq ure sngure fnvq, V irevyl gubhtug gung gubh unqfg hggreyl
ungrq ure; gurersber V tnir ure gb gul pbzcnavba: vf abg ure lbhatre
fvfgre snvere guna fur? gnxr ure, V cenl gurr, vafgrnq bs ure.

15:3 Naq Fnzfba fnvq pbapreavat gurz, Abj funyy V or zber oynzryrff
guna gur Cuvyvfgvarf, gubhtu V qb gurz n qvfcyrnfher.

15:4 Naq Fnzfba jrag naq pnhtug guerr uhaqerq sbkrf, naq gbbx
sveroenaqf, naq ghearq gnvy gb gnvy, naq chg n sveroenaq va gur zvqfg
orgjrra gjb gnvyf.

15:5 Naq jura ur unq frg gur oenaqf ba sver, ur yrg gurz tb vagb gur
fgnaqvat pbea bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq oheag hc obgu gur fubpxf, naq
nyfb gur fgnaqvat pbea, jvgu gur ivarlneqf naq byvirf.

15:6 Gura gur Cuvyvfgvarf fnvq, Jub ungu qbar guvf? Naq gurl nafjrerq,
Fnzfba, gur fba va ynj bs gur Gvzavgr, orpnhfr ur unq gnxra uvf jvsr,
naq tvira ure gb uvf pbzcnavba. Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf pnzr hc, naq oheag
ure naq ure sngure jvgu sver.

15:7 Naq Fnzfba fnvq hagb gurz, Gubhtu lr unir qbar guvf, lrg jvyy V
or niratrq bs lbh, naq nsgre gung V jvyy prnfr.

15:8 Naq ur fzbgr gurz uvc naq guvtu jvgu n terng fynhtugre: naq ur
jrag qbja naq qjryg va gur gbc bs gur ebpx Rgnz.

15:9 Gura gur Cuvyvfgvarf jrag hc, naq cvgpurq va Whqnu, naq fcernq
gurzfryirf va Yruv.

15:10 Naq gur zra bs Whqnu fnvq, Jul ner lr pbzr hc ntnvafg hf? Naq
gurl nafjrerq, Gb ovaq Fnzfba ner jr pbzr hc, gb qb gb uvz nf ur ungu
qbar gb hf.

15:11 Gura guerr gubhfnaq zra bs Whqnu jrag gb gur gbc bs gur ebpx
Rgnz, naq fnvq gb Fnzfba, Xabjrfg gubh abg gung gur Cuvyvfgvarf ner
ehyref bire hf? jung vf guvf gung gubh unfg qbar hagb hf? Naq ur fnvq
hagb gurz, Nf gurl qvq hagb zr, fb unir V qbar hagb gurz.

15:12 Naq gurl fnvq hagb uvz, Jr ner pbzr qbja gb ovaq gurr, gung jr
znl qryvire gurr vagb gur unaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf. Naq Fnzfba fnvq
hagb gurz, Fjrne hagb zr, gung lr jvyy abg snyy hcba zr lbhefryirf.

15:13 Naq gurl fcnxr hagb uvz, fnlvat, Ab; ohg jr jvyy ovaq gurr snfg,
naq qryvire gurr vagb gurve unaq: ohg fheryl jr jvyy abg xvyy gurr.
Naq gurl obhaq uvz jvgu gjb arj pbeqf, naq oebhtug uvz hc sebz gur
ebpx.

15:14 Naq jura ur pnzr hagb Yruv, gur Cuvyvfgvarf fubhgrq ntnvafg uvz:
naq gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ pnzr zvtugvyl hcba uvz, naq gur pbeqf gung
jrer hcba uvf nezf orpnzr nf synk gung jnf oheag jvgu sver, naq uvf
onaqf ybbfrq sebz bss uvf unaqf.

15:15 Naq ur sbhaq n arj wnjobar bs na nff, naq chg sbegu uvf unaq,
naq gbbx vg, naq fyrj n gubhfnaq zra gurerjvgu.

15:16 Naq Fnzfba fnvq, Jvgu gur wnjobar bs na nff, urncf hcba urncf,
jvgu gur wnj bs na nff unir V fynva n gubhfnaq zra.

15:17 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura ur unq znqr na raq bs fcrnxvat, gung
ur pnfg njnl gur wnjobar bhg bs uvf unaq, naq pnyyrq gung cynpr
Enznguyruv.

15:18 Naq ur jnf fber nguvefg, naq pnyyrq ba gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, Gubh
unfg tvira guvf terng qryvirenapr vagb gur unaq bs gul freinag: naq
abj funyy V qvr sbe guvefg, naq snyy vagb gur unaq bs gur
hapvephzpvfrq?  15:19 Ohg Tbq pynir na ubyybj cynpr gung jnf va gur
wnj, naq gurer pnzr jngre gurerbhg; naq jura ur unq qehax, uvf fcvevg
pnzr ntnva, naq ur erivirq: jurersber ur pnyyrq gur anzr gurerbs
Raunxxber, juvpu vf va Yruv hagb guvf qnl.

15:20 Naq ur whqtrq Vfenry va gur qnlf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf gjragl
lrnef.

16:1 Gura jrag Fnzfba gb Tnmn, naq fnj gurer na uneybg, naq jrag va
hagb ure.

16:2 Naq vg jnf gbyq gur Tnmvgrf, fnlvat, Fnzfba vf pbzr uvgure. Naq
gurl pbzcnffrq uvz va, naq ynvq jnvg sbe uvz nyy avtug va gur tngr bs
gur pvgl, naq jrer dhvrg nyy gur avtug, fnlvat, Va gur zbeavat, jura
vg vf qnl, jr funyy xvyy uvz.

16:3 Naq Fnzfba ynl gvyy zvqavtug, naq nebfr ng zvqavtug, naq gbbx gur
qbbef bs gur tngr bs gur pvgl, naq gur gjb cbfgf, naq jrag njnl jvgu
gurz, one naq nyy, naq chg gurz hcba uvf fubhyqref, naq pneevrq gurz
hc gb gur gbc bs na uvyy gung vf orsber Uroeba.

16:4 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgrejneq, gung ur ybirq n jbzna va gur
inyyrl bs Fberx, jubfr anzr jnf Qryvynu.

16:5 Naq gur ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf pnzr hc hagb ure, naq fnvq hagb
ure, Ragvpr uvz, naq frr jurerva uvf terng fgeratgu yvrgu, naq ol jung
zrnaf jr znl cerinvy ntnvafg uvz, gung jr znl ovaq uvz gb nssyvpg uvz;
naq jr jvyy tvir gurr rirel bar bs hf ryrira uhaqerq cvrprf bs fvyire.

16:6 Naq Qryvynu fnvq gb Fnzfba, Gryy zr, V cenl gurr, jurerva gul
terng fgeratgu yvrgu, naq jurerjvgu gubh zvtugrfg or obhaq gb nssyvpg
gurr.

16:7 Naq Fnzfba fnvq hagb ure, Vs gurl ovaq zr jvgu frira terra jvguf
gung jrer arire qevrq, gura funyy V or jrnx, naq or nf nabgure zna.

16:8 Gura gur ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf oebhtug hc gb ure frira terra
jvguf juvpu unq abg orra qevrq, naq fur obhaq uvz jvgu gurz.

16:9 Abj gurer jrer zra ylvat va jnvg, novqvat jvgu ure va gur
punzore.

Naq fur fnvq hagb uvz, Gur Cuvyvfgvarf or hcba gurr, Fnzfba. Naq ur
oenxr gur jvguf, nf n guernq bs gbj vf oebxra jura vg gbhpurgu gur
sver. Fb uvf fgeratgu jnf abg xabja.

16:10 Naq Qryvynu fnvq hagb Fnzfba, Orubyq, gubh unfg zbpxrq zr, naq
gbyq zr yvrf: abj gryy zr, V cenl gurr, jurerjvgu gubh zvtugrfg or
obhaq.

16:11 Naq ur fnvq hagb ure, Vs gurl ovaq zr snfg jvgu arj ebcrf gung
arire jrer bpphcvrq, gura funyy V or jrnx, naq or nf nabgure zna.

16:12 Qryvynu gurersber gbbx arj ebcrf, naq obhaq uvz gurerjvgu, naq
fnvq hagb uvz, Gur Cuvyvfgvarf or hcba gurr, Fnzfba. Naq gurer jrer
yvref va jnvg novqvat va gur punzore. Naq ur oenxr gurz sebz bss uvf
nezf yvxr n guernq.

16:13 Naq Qryvynu fnvq hagb Fnzfba, Uvguregb gubh unfg zbpxrq zr, naq
gbyq zr yvrf: gryy zr jurerjvgu gubh zvtugrfg or obhaq. Naq ur fnvq
hagb ure, Vs gubh jrnirfg gur frira ybpxf bs zl urnq jvgu gur jro.

16:14 Naq fur snfgrarq vg jvgu gur cva, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Gur
Cuvyvfgvarf or hcba gurr, Fnzfba. Naq ur njnxrq bhg bs uvf fyrrc, naq
jrag njnl jvgu gur cva bs gur ornz, naq jvgu gur jro.

16:15 Naq fur fnvq hagb uvz, Ubj pnafg gubh fnl, V ybir gurr, jura
guvar urneg vf abg jvgu zr? gubh unfg zbpxrq zr gurfr guerr gvzrf, naq
unfg abg gbyq zr jurerva gul terng fgeratgu yvrgu.

16:16 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura fur cerffrq uvz qnvyl jvgu ure jbeqf,
naq hetrq uvz, fb gung uvf fbhy jnf irkrq hagb qrngu; 16:17 Gung ur
gbyq ure nyy uvf urneg, naq fnvq hagb ure, Gurer ungu abg pbzr n enmbe
hcba zvar urnq; sbe V unir orra n Anmnevgr hagb Tbq sebz zl zbgure'f
jbzo: vs V or funira, gura zl fgeratgu jvyy tb sebz zr, naq V funyy
orpbzr jrnx, naq or yvxr nal bgure zna.

16:18 Naq jura Qryvynu fnj gung ur unq gbyq ure nyy uvf urneg, fur
frag naq pnyyrq sbe gur ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, fnlvat, Pbzr hc guvf
bapr, sbe ur ungu furjrq zr nyy uvf urneg. Gura gur ybeqf bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf pnzr hc hagb ure, naq oebhtug zbarl va gurve unaq.

16:19 Naq fur znqr uvz fyrrc hcba ure xarrf; naq fur pnyyrq sbe n zna,
naq fur pnhfrq uvz gb funir bss gur frira ybpxf bs uvf urnq; naq fur
ortna gb nssyvpg uvz, naq uvf fgeratgu jrag sebz uvz.

16:20 Naq fur fnvq, Gur Cuvyvfgvarf or hcba gurr, Fnzfba. Naq ur njbxr
bhg bs uvf fyrrc, naq fnvq, V jvyy tb bhg nf ng bgure gvzrf orsber,
naq funxr zlfrys. Naq ur jvfg abg gung gur YBEQ jnf qrcnegrq sebz uvz.

16:21 Ohg gur Cuvyvfgvarf gbbx uvz, naq chg bhg uvf rlrf, naq oebhtug
uvz qbja gb Tnmn, naq obhaq uvz jvgu srggref bs oenff; naq ur qvq
tevaq va gur cevfba ubhfr.

16:22 Ubjorvg gur unve bs uvf urnq ortna gb tebj ntnva nsgre ur jnf
funira.

16:23 Gura gur ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf tngurerq gurz gbtrgure sbe gb
bssre n terng fnpevsvpr hagb Qntba gurve tbq, naq gb erwbvpr: sbe gurl
fnvq, Bhe tbq ungu qryvirerq Fnzfba bhe rarzl vagb bhe unaq.

16:24 Naq jura gur crbcyr fnj uvz, gurl cenvfrq gurve tbq: sbe gurl
fnvq, Bhe tbq ungu qryvirerq vagb bhe unaqf bhe rarzl, naq gur
qrfgeblre bs bhe pbhagel, juvpu fyrj znal bs hf.

16:25 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gurve urnegf jrer zreel, gung gurl
fnvq, Pnyy sbe Fnzfba, gung ur znl znxr hf fcbeg. Naq gurl pnyyrq sbe
Fnzfba bhg bs gur cevfba ubhfr; naq ur znqr gurz fcbeg: naq gurl frg
uvz orgjrra gur cvyynef.

16:26 Naq Fnzfba fnvq hagb gur ynq gung uryq uvz ol gur unaq, Fhssre
zr gung V znl srry gur cvyynef jurerhcba gur ubhfr fgnaqrgu, gung V
znl yrna hcba gurz.

16:27 Abj gur ubhfr jnf shyy bs zra naq jbzra; naq nyy gur ybeqf bs
gur Cuvyvfgvarf jrer gurer; naq gurer jrer hcba gur ebbs nobhg guerr
gubhfnaq zra naq jbzra, gung oruryq juvyr Fnzfba znqr fcbeg.

16:28 Naq Fnzfba pnyyrq hagb gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, B Ybeq Tbq, erzrzore
zr, V cenl gurr, naq fgeratgura zr, V cenl gurr, bayl guvf bapr, B
Tbq, gung V znl or ng bapr niratrq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf sbe zl gjb rlrf.

16:29 Naq Fnzfba gbbx ubyq bs gur gjb zvqqyr cvyynef hcba juvpu gur
ubhfr fgbbq, naq ba juvpu vg jnf obear hc, bs gur bar jvgu uvf evtug
unaq, naq bs gur bgure jvgu uvf yrsg.

16:30 Naq Fnzfba fnvq, Yrg zr qvr jvgu gur Cuvyvfgvarf. Naq ur objrq
uvzfrys jvgu nyy uvf zvtug; naq gur ubhfr sryy hcba gur ybeqf, naq
hcba nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer gurerva. Fb gur qrnq juvpu ur fyrj ng
uvf qrngu jrer zber guna gurl juvpu ur fyrj va uvf yvsr.

16:31 Gura uvf oerguera naq nyy gur ubhfr bs uvf sngure pnzr qbja, naq
gbbx uvz, naq oebhtug uvz hc, naq ohevrq uvz orgjrra Mbenu naq Rfugnby
va gur ohelvatcynpr bs Znabnu uvf sngure. Naq ur whqtrq Vfenry gjragl
lrnef.

17:1 Naq gurer jnf n zna bs zbhag Rcuenvz, jubfr anzr jnf Zvpnu.

17:2 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvf zbgure, Gur ryrira uhaqerq furxryf bs fvyire
gung jrer gnxra sebz gurr, nobhg juvpu gubh phefrqfg, naq fcnxrfg bs
nyfb va zvar rnef, orubyq, gur fvyire vf jvgu zr; V gbbx vg. Naq uvf
zbgure fnvq, Oyrffrq or gubh bs gur YBEQ, zl fba.

17:3 Naq jura ur unq erfgberq gur ryrira uhaqerq furxryf bs fvyire gb
uvf zbgure, uvf zbgure fnvq, V unq jubyyl qrqvpngrq gur fvyire hagb
gur YBEQ sebz zl unaq sbe zl fba, gb znxr n tenira vzntr naq n zbygra
vzntr: abj gurersber V jvyy erfgber vg hagb gurr.

17:4 Lrg ur erfgberq gur zbarl hagb uvf zbgure; naq uvf zbgure gbbx
gjb uhaqerq furxryf bs fvyire, naq tnir gurz gb gur sbhaqre, jub znqr
gurerbs n tenira vzntr naq n zbygra vzntr: naq gurl jrer va gur ubhfr
bs Zvpnu.

17:5 Naq gur zna Zvpnu unq na ubhfr bs tbqf, naq znqr na rcubq, naq
grencuvz, naq pbafrpengrq bar bs uvf fbaf, jub orpnzr uvf cevrfg.

17:6 Va gubfr qnlf gurer jnf ab xvat va Vfenry, ohg rirel zna qvq gung
juvpu jnf evtug va uvf bja rlrf.

17:7 Naq gurer jnf n lbhat zna bhg bs Orguyrurzwhqnu bs gur snzvyl bs
Whqnu, jub jnf n Yrivgr, naq ur fbwbhearq gurer.

17:8 Naq gur zna qrcnegrq bhg bs gur pvgl sebz Orguyrurzwhqnu gb
fbwbhea jurer ur pbhyq svaq n cynpr: naq ur pnzr gb zbhag Rcuenvz gb
gur ubhfr bs Zvpnu, nf ur wbhearlrq.

17:9 Naq Zvpnu fnvq hagb uvz, Jurapr pbzrfg gubh? Naq ur fnvq hagb
uvz, V nz n Yrivgr bs Orguyrurzwhqnu, naq V tb gb fbwbhea jurer V znl
svaq n cynpr.

17:10 Naq Zvpnu fnvq hagb uvz, Qjryy jvgu zr, naq or hagb zr n sngure
naq n cevrfg, naq V jvyy tvir gurr gra furxryf bs fvyire ol gur lrne,
naq n fhvg bs nccnery, naq gul ivpghnyf. Fb gur Yrivgr jrag va.

17:11 Naq gur Yrivgr jnf pbagrag gb qjryy jvgu gur zna; naq gur lbhat
zna jnf hagb uvz nf bar bs uvf fbaf.

17:12 Naq Zvpnu pbafrpengrq gur Yrivgr; naq gur lbhat zna orpnzr uvf
cevrfg, naq jnf va gur ubhfr bs Zvpnu.

17:13 Gura fnvq Zvpnu, Abj xabj V gung gur YBEQ jvyy qb zr tbbq,
frrvat V unir n Yrivgr gb zl cevrfg.

18:1 Va gubfr qnlf gurer jnf ab xvat va Vfenry: naq va gubfr qnlf gur
gevor bs gur Qnavgrf fbhtug gurz na vaurevgnapr gb qjryy va; sbe hagb
gung qnl nyy gurve vaurevgnapr unq abg snyyra hagb gurz nzbat gur
gevorf bs Vfenry.

18:2 Naq gur puvyqera bs Qna frag bs gurve snzvyl svir zra sebz gurve
pbnfgf, zra bs inybhe, sebz Mbenu, naq sebz Rfugnby, gb fcl bhg gur
ynaq, naq gb frnepu vg; naq gurl fnvq hagb gurz, Tb, frnepu gur ynaq:
jub jura gurl pnzr gb zbhag Rcuenvz, gb gur ubhfr bs Zvpnu, gurl
ybqtrq gurer.

18:3 Jura gurl jrer ol gur ubhfr bs Zvpnu, gurl xarj gur ibvpr bs gur
lbhat zna gur Yrivgr: naq gurl ghearq va guvgure, naq fnvq hagb uvz,
Jub oebhtug gurr uvgure? naq jung znxrfg gubh va guvf cynpr? naq jung
unfg gubh urer?  18:4 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Guhf naq guhf qrnyrgu
Zvpnu jvgu zr, naq ungu uverq zr, naq V nz uvf cevrfg.

18:5 Naq gurl fnvq hagb uvz, Nfx pbhafry, jr cenl gurr, bs Tbq, gung
jr znl xabj jurgure bhe jnl juvpu jr tb funyy or cebfcrebhf.

18:6 Naq gur cevrfg fnvq hagb gurz, Tb va crnpr: orsber gur YBEQ vf
lbhe jnl jurerva lr tb.

18:7 Gura gur svir zra qrcnegrq, naq pnzr gb Ynvfu, naq fnj gur crbcyr
gung jrer gurerva, ubj gurl qjryg pneryrff, nsgre gur znaare bs gur
Mvqbavnaf, dhvrg naq frpher; naq gurer jnf ab zntvfgengr va gur ynaq,
gung zvtug chg gurz gb funzr va nal guvat; naq gurl jrer sne sebz gur
Mvqbavnaf, naq unq ab ohfvarff jvgu nal zna.

18:8 Naq gurl pnzr hagb gurve oerguera gb Mbenu naq Rfugnby: naq gurve
oerguera fnvq hagb gurz, Jung fnl lr?  18:9 Naq gurl fnvq, Nevfr, gung
jr znl tb hc ntnvafg gurz: sbe jr unir frra gur ynaq, naq, orubyq, vg
vf irel tbbq: naq ner lr fgvyy? or abg fybgushy gb tb, naq gb ragre gb
cbffrff gur ynaq.

18:10 Jura lr tb, lr funyy pbzr hagb n crbcyr frpher, naq gb n ynetr
ynaq: sbe Tbq ungu tvira vg vagb lbhe unaqf; n cynpr jurer gurer vf ab
jnag bs nal guvat gung vf va gur rnegu.

18:11 Naq gurer jrag sebz gurapr bs gur snzvyl bs gur Qnavgrf, bhg bs
Mbenu naq bhg bs Rfugnby, fvk uhaqerq zra nccbvagrq jvgu jrncbaf bs
jne.

18:12 Naq gurl jrag hc, naq cvgpurq va Xvewnguwrnevz, va Whqnu:
jurersber gurl pnyyrq gung cynpr Znunaruqna hagb guvf qnl: orubyq, vg
vf oruvaq Xvewnguwrnevz.

18:13 Naq gurl cnffrq gurapr hagb zbhag Rcuenvz, naq pnzr hagb gur
ubhfr bs Zvpnu.

18:14 Gura nafjrerq gur svir zra gung jrag gb fcl bhg gur pbhagel bs
Ynvfu, naq fnvq hagb gurve oerguera, Qb lr xabj gung gurer vf va gurfr
ubhfrf na rcubq, naq grencuvz, naq n tenira vzntr, naq n zbygra vzntr?
abj gurersber pbafvqre jung lr unir gb qb.

18:15 Naq gurl ghearq guvgurejneq, naq pnzr gb gur ubhfr bs gur lbhat
zna gur Yrivgr, rira hagb gur ubhfr bs Zvpnu, naq fnyhgrq uvz.

18:16 Naq gur fvk uhaqerq zra nccbvagrq jvgu gurve jrncbaf bs jne,
juvpu jrer bs gur puvyqera bs Qna, fgbbq ol gur ragrevat bs gur tngr.

18:17 Naq gur svir zra gung jrag gb fcl bhg gur ynaq jrag hc, naq pnzr
va guvgure, naq gbbx gur tenira vzntr, naq gur rcubq, naq gur
grencuvz, naq gur zbygra vzntr: naq gur cevrfg fgbbq va gur ragrevat
bs gur tngr jvgu gur fvk uhaqerq zra gung jrer nccbvagrq jvgu jrncbaf
bs jne.

18:18 Naq gurfr jrag vagb Zvpnu'f ubhfr, naq srgpurq gur pneirq vzntr,
gur rcubq, naq gur grencuvz, naq gur zbygra vzntr. Gura fnvq gur
cevrfg hagb gurz, Jung qb lr?  18:19 Naq gurl fnvq hagb uvz, Ubyq gul
crnpr, ynl guvar unaq hcba gul zbhgu, naq tb jvgu hf, naq or gb hf n
sngure naq n cevrfg: vf vg orggre sbe gurr gb or n cevrfg hagb gur
ubhfr bs bar zna, be gung gubh or n cevrfg hagb n gevor naq n snzvyl
va Vfenry?  18:20 Naq gur cevrfg'f urneg jnf tynq, naq ur gbbx gur
rcubq, naq gur grencuvz, naq gur tenira vzntr, naq jrag va gur zvqfg
bs gur crbcyr.

18:21 Fb gurl ghearq naq qrcnegrq, naq chg gur yvggyr barf naq gur
pnggyr naq gur pneevntr orsber gurz.

18:22 Naq jura gurl jrer n tbbq jnl sebz gur ubhfr bs Zvpnu, gur zra
gung jrer va gur ubhfrf arne gb Zvpnu'f ubhfr jrer tngurerq gbtrgure,
naq biregbbx gur puvyqera bs Qna.

18:23 Naq gurl pevrq hagb gur puvyqera bs Qna. Naq gurl ghearq gurve
snprf, naq fnvq hagb Zvpnu, Jung nvyrgu gurr, gung gubh pbzrfg jvgu
fhpu n pbzcnal?  18:24 Naq ur fnvq, Lr unir gnxra njnl zl tbqf juvpu V
znqr, naq gur cevrfg, naq lr ner tbar njnl: naq jung unir V zber? naq
jung vf guvf gung lr fnl hagb zr, Jung nvyrgu gurr?  18:25 Naq gur
puvyqera bs Qna fnvq hagb uvz, Yrg abg gul ibvpr or urneq nzbat hf,
yrfg natel sryybjf eha hcba gurr, naq gubh ybfr gul yvsr, jvgu gur
yvirf bs gul ubhfrubyq.

18:26 Naq gur puvyqera bs Qna jrag gurve jnl: naq jura Zvpnu fnj gung
gurl jrer gbb fgebat sbe uvz, ur ghearq naq jrag onpx hagb uvf ubhfr.

18:27 Naq gurl gbbx gur guvatf juvpu Zvpnu unq znqr, naq gur cevrfg
juvpu ur unq, naq pnzr hagb Ynvfu, hagb n crbcyr gung jrer ng dhvrg
naq frpher: naq gurl fzbgr gurz jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq, naq oheag
gur pvgl jvgu sver.

18:28 Naq gurer jnf ab qryvirere, orpnhfr vg jnf sne sebz Mvqba, naq
gurl unq ab ohfvarff jvgu nal zna; naq vg jnf va gur inyyrl gung yvrgu
ol Orguerubo. Naq gurl ohvyg n pvgl, naq qjryg gurerva.

18:29 Naq gurl pnyyrq gur anzr bs gur pvgl Qna, nsgre gur anzr bs Qna
gurve sngure, jub jnf obea hagb Vfenry: ubjorvg gur anzr bs gur pvgl
jnf Ynvfu ng gur svefg.

18:30 Naq gur puvyqera bs Qna frg hc gur tenira vzntr: naq Wbanguna,
gur fba bs Trefubz, gur fba bs Znanffru, ur naq uvf fbaf jrer cevrfgf
gb gur gevor bs Qna hagvy gur qnl bs gur pncgvivgl bs gur ynaq.

18:31 Naq gurl frg gurz hc Zvpnu'f tenira vzntr, juvpu ur znqr, nyy
gur gvzr gung gur ubhfr bs Tbq jnf va Fuvybu.

19:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gubfr qnlf, jura gurer jnf ab xvat va
Vfenry, gung gurer jnf n pregnva Yrivgr fbwbheavat ba gur fvqr bs
zbhag Rcuenvz, jub gbbx gb uvz n pbaphovar bhg bs Orguyrurzwhqnu.

19:2 Naq uvf pbaphovar cynlrq gur juber ntnvafg uvz, naq jrag njnl
sebz uvz hagb ure sngure'f ubhfr gb Orguyrurzwhqnu, naq jnf gurer sbhe
jubyr zbaguf.

19:3 Naq ure uhfonaq nebfr, naq jrag nsgre ure, gb fcrnx sevraqyl hagb
ure, naq gb oevat ure ntnva, univat uvf freinag jvgu uvz, naq n pbhcyr
bs nffrf: naq fur oebhtug uvz vagb ure sngure'f ubhfr: naq jura gur
sngure bs gur qnzfry fnj uvz, ur erwbvprq gb zrrg uvz.

19:4 Naq uvf sngure va ynj, gur qnzfry'f sngure, ergnvarq uvz; naq ur
nobqr jvgu uvz guerr qnlf: fb gurl qvq rng naq qevax, naq ybqtrq
gurer.

19:5 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur sbhegu qnl, jura gurl nebfr rneyl va
gur zbeavat, gung ur ebfr hc gb qrcneg: naq gur qnzfry'f sngure fnvq
hagb uvf fba va ynj, Pbzsbeg guvar urneg jvgu n zbefry bs oernq, naq
nsgrejneq tb lbhe jnl.

19:6 Naq gurl fng qbja, naq qvq rng naq qevax obgu bs gurz gbtrgure:
sbe gur qnzfry'f sngure unq fnvq hagb gur zna, Or pbagrag, V cenl
gurr, naq gneel nyy avtug, naq yrg guvar urneg or zreel.

19:7 Naq jura gur zna ebfr hc gb qrcneg, uvf sngure va ynj hetrq uvz:
gurersber ur ybqtrq gurer ntnva.

19:8 Naq ur nebfr rneyl va gur zbeavat ba gur svsgu qnl gb qrcneg; naq
gur qnzfry'f sngure fnvq, Pbzsbeg guvar urneg, V cenl gurr. Naq gurl
gneevrq hagvy nsgreabba, naq gurl qvq rng obgu bs gurz.

19:9 Naq jura gur zna ebfr hc gb qrcneg, ur, naq uvf pbaphovar, naq
uvf freinag, uvf sngure va ynj, gur qnzfry'f sngure, fnvq hagb uvz,
Orubyq, abj gur qnl qenjrgu gbjneq riravat, V cenl lbh gneel nyy
avtug: orubyq, gur qnl tebjrgu gb na raq, ybqtr urer, gung guvar urneg
znl or zreel; naq gb zbeebj trg lbh rneyl ba lbhe jnl, gung gubh
znlrfg tb ubzr.

19:10 Ohg gur zna jbhyq abg gneel gung avtug, ohg ur ebfr hc naq
qrcnegrq, naq pnzr bire ntnvafg Wrohf, juvpu vf Wrehfnyrz; naq gurer
jrer jvgu uvz gjb nffrf fnqqyrq, uvf pbaphovar nyfb jnf jvgu uvz.

19:11 Naq jura gurl jrer ol Wrohf, gur qnl jnf sne fcrag; naq gur
freinag fnvq hagb uvf znfgre, Pbzr, V cenl gurr, naq yrg hf ghea va
vagb guvf pvgl bs gur Wrohfvgrf, naq ybqtr va vg.

19:12 Naq uvf znfgre fnvq hagb uvz, Jr jvyy abg ghea nfvqr uvgure vagb
gur pvgl bs n fgenatre, gung vf abg bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry; jr jvyy
cnff bire gb Tvornu.

19:13 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvf freinag, Pbzr, naq yrg hf qenj arne gb bar
bs gurfr cynprf gb ybqtr nyy avtug, va Tvornu, be va Enznu.

19:14 Naq gurl cnffrq ba naq jrag gurve jnl; naq gur fha jrag qbja
hcba gurz jura gurl jrer ol Tvornu, juvpu orybatrgu gb Orawnzva.

19:15 Naq gurl ghearq nfvqr guvgure, gb tb va naq gb ybqtr va Tvornu:
naq jura ur jrag va, ur fng uvz qbja va n fgerrg bs gur pvgl: sbe
gurer jnf ab zna gung gbbx gurz vagb uvf ubhfr gb ybqtvat.

19:16 Naq, orubyq, gurer pnzr na byq zna sebz uvf jbex bhg bs gur
svryq ng rira, juvpu jnf nyfb bs zbhag Rcuenvz; naq ur fbwbhearq va
Tvornu: ohg gur zra bs gur cynpr jrer Orawnzvgrf.

19:17 Naq jura ur unq yvsgrq hc uvf rlrf, ur fnj n jnlsnevat zna va
gur fgerrg bs gur pvgl: naq gur byq zna fnvq, Juvgure tbrfg gubh? naq
jurapr pbzrfg gubh?  19:18 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Jr ner cnffvat sebz
Orguyrurzwhqnu gbjneq gur fvqr bs zbhag Rcuenvz; sebz gurapr nz V: naq
V jrag gb Orguyrurzwhqnu, ohg V nz abj tbvat gb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ;
naq gurer vf ab zna gung erprvirgu zr gb ubhfr.

19:19 Lrg gurer vf obgu fgenj naq cebiraqre sbe bhe nffrf; naq gurer
vf oernq naq jvar nyfb sbe zr, naq sbe gul unaqznvq, naq sbe gur lbhat
zna juvpu vf jvgu gul freinagf: gurer vf ab jnag bs nal guvat.

19:20 Naq gur byq zna fnvq, Crnpr or jvgu gurr; ubjfbrire yrg nyy gul
jnagf yvr hcba zr; bayl ybqtr abg va gur fgerrg.

19:21 Fb ur oebhtug uvz vagb uvf ubhfr, naq tnir cebiraqre hagb gur
nffrf: naq gurl jnfurq gurve srrg, naq qvq rng naq qevax.

19:22 Abj nf gurl jrer znxvat gurve urnegf zreel, orubyq, gur zra bs
gur pvgl, pregnva fbaf bs Oryvny, orfrg gur ubhfr ebhaq nobhg, naq
orng ng gur qbbe, naq fcnxr gb gur znfgre bs gur ubhfr, gur byq zna,
fnlvat, Oevat sbegu gur zna gung pnzr vagb guvar ubhfr, gung jr znl
xabj uvz.

19:23 Naq gur zna, gur znfgre bs gur ubhfr, jrag bhg hagb gurz, naq
fnvq hagb gurz, Anl, zl oerguera, anl, V cenl lbh, qb abg fb jvpxrqyl;
frrvat gung guvf zna vf pbzr vagb zvar ubhfr, qb abg guvf sbyyl.

19:24 Orubyq, urer vf zl qnhtugre n znvqra, naq uvf pbaphovar; gurz V
jvyy oevat bhg abj, naq uhzoyr lr gurz, naq qb jvgu gurz jung frrzrgu
tbbq hagb lbh: ohg hagb guvf zna qb abg fb ivyr n guvat.

19:25 Ohg gur zra jbhyq abg urnexra gb uvz: fb gur zna gbbx uvf
pbaphovar, naq oebhtug ure sbegu hagb gurz; naq gurl xarj ure, naq
nohfrq ure nyy gur avtug hagvy gur zbeavat: naq jura gur qnl ortna gb
fcevat, gurl yrg ure tb.

19:26 Gura pnzr gur jbzna va gur qnjavat bs gur qnl, naq sryy qbja ng
gur qbbe bs gur zna'f ubhfr jurer ure ybeq jnf, gvyy vg jnf yvtug.

19:27 Naq ure ybeq ebfr hc va gur zbeavat, naq bcrarq gur qbbef bs gur
ubhfr, naq jrag bhg gb tb uvf jnl: naq, orubyq, gur jbzna uvf
pbaphovar jnf snyyra qbja ng gur qbbe bs gur ubhfr, naq ure unaqf jrer
hcba gur guerfubyq.

19:28 Naq ur fnvq hagb ure, Hc, naq yrg hf or tbvat. Ohg abar
nafjrerq.

Gura gur zna gbbx ure hc hcba na nff, naq gur zna ebfr hc, naq tng uvz
hagb uvf cynpr.

19:29 Naq jura ur jnf pbzr vagb uvf ubhfr, ur gbbx n xavsr, naq ynvq
ubyq ba uvf pbaphovar, naq qvivqrq ure, gbtrgure jvgu ure obarf, vagb
gjryir cvrprf, naq frag ure vagb nyy gur pbnfgf bs Vfenry.

19:30 Naq vg jnf fb, gung nyy gung fnj vg fnvq, Gurer jnf ab fhpu qrrq
qbar abe frra sebz gur qnl gung gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pnzr hc bhg bs
gur ynaq bs Rtlcg hagb guvf qnl: pbafvqre bs vg, gnxr nqivpr, naq
fcrnx lbhe zvaqf.

20:1 Gura nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrag bhg, naq gur pbatertngvba
jnf tngurerq gbtrgure nf bar zna, sebz Qna rira gb Orrefuron, jvgu gur
ynaq bs Tvyrnq, hagb gur YBEQ va Zvmcru.

20:2 Naq gur puvrs bs nyy gur crbcyr, rira bs nyy gur gevorf bs
Vfenry, cerfragrq gurzfryirf va gur nffrzoyl bs gur crbcyr bs Tbq,
sbhe uhaqerq gubhfnaq sbbgzra gung qerj fjbeq.

20:3 (Abj gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva urneq gung gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
jrer tbar hc gb Zvmcru.) Gura fnvq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, Gryy hf,
ubj jnf guvf jvpxrqarff?  20:4 Naq gur Yrivgr, gur uhfonaq bs gur
jbzna gung jnf fynva, nafjrerq naq fnvq, V pnzr vagb Tvornu gung
orybatrgu gb Orawnzva, V naq zl pbaphovar, gb ybqtr.

20:5 Naq gur zra bs Tvornu ebfr ntnvafg zr, naq orfrg gur ubhfr ebhaq
nobhg hcba zr ol avtug, naq gubhtug gb unir fynva zr: naq zl pbaphovar
unir gurl sbeprq, gung fur vf qrnq.

20:6 Naq V gbbx zl pbaphovar, naq phg ure va cvrprf, naq frag ure
guebhtubhg nyy gur pbhagel bs gur vaurevgnapr bs Vfenry: sbe gurl unir
pbzzvggrq yrjqarff naq sbyyl va Vfenry.

20:7 Orubyq, lr ner nyy puvyqera bs Vfenry; tvir urer lbhe nqivpr naq
pbhafry.

20:8 Naq nyy gur crbcyr nebfr nf bar zna, fnlvat, Jr jvyy abg nal bs
hf tb gb uvf grag, arvgure jvyy jr nal bs hf ghea vagb uvf ubhfr.

20:9 Ohg abj guvf funyy or gur guvat juvpu jr jvyy qb gb Tvornu; jr
jvyy tb hc ol ybg ntnvafg vg; 20:10 Naq jr jvyy gnxr gra zra bs na
uhaqerq guebhtubhg nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry, naq na uhaqerq bs n
gubhfnaq, naq n gubhfnaq bhg bs gra gubhfnaq, gb srgpu ivpghny sbe gur
crbcyr, gung gurl znl qb, jura gurl pbzr gb Tvornu bs Orawnzva,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gur sbyyl gung gurl unir jebhtug va Vfenry.

20:11 Fb nyy gur zra bs Vfenry jrer tngurerq ntnvafg gur pvgl, xavg
gbtrgure nf bar zna.

20:12 Naq gur gevorf bs Vfenry frag zra guebhtu nyy gur gevor bs
Orawnzva, fnlvat, Jung jvpxrqarff vf guvf gung vf qbar nzbat lbh?
20:13 Abj gurersber qryvire hf gur zra, gur puvyqera bs Oryvny, juvpu
ner va Tvornu, gung jr znl chg gurz gb qrngu, naq chg njnl rivy sebz
Vfenry. Ohg gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva jbhyq abg urnexra gb gur ibvpr bs
gurve oerguera gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

20:14 Ohg gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure bhg bs
gur pvgvrf hagb Tvornu, gb tb bhg gb onggyr ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry.

20:15 Naq gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva jrer ahzorerq ng gung gvzr bhg bs
gur pvgvrf gjragl naq fvk gubhfnaq zra gung qerj fjbeq, orfvqr gur
vaunovgnagf bs Tvornu, juvpu jrer ahzorerq frira uhaqerq pubfra zra.

20:16 Nzbat nyy guvf crbcyr gurer jrer frira uhaqerq pubfra zra
yrsgunaqrq; rirel bar pbhyq fyvat fgbarf ng na unve oernqgu, naq abg
zvff.

20:17 Naq gur zra bs Vfenry, orfvqr Orawnzva, jrer ahzorerq sbhe
uhaqerq gubhfnaq zra gung qerj fjbeq: nyy gurfr jrer zra bs jne.

20:18 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry nebfr, naq jrag hc gb gur ubhfr bs
Tbq, naq nfxrq pbhafry bs Tbq, naq fnvq, Juvpu bs hf funyy tb hc svefg
gb gur onggyr ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva? Naq gur YBEQ fnvq,
Whqnu funyy tb hc svefg.

20:19 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry ebfr hc va gur zbeavat, naq rapnzcrq
ntnvafg Tvornu.

20:20 Naq gur zra bs Vfenry jrag bhg gb onggyr ntnvafg Orawnzva; naq
gur zra bs Vfenry chg gurzfryirf va neenl gb svtug ntnvafg gurz ng
Tvornu.

20:21 Naq gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva pnzr sbegu bhg bs Tvornu, naq
qrfgeblrq qbja gb gur tebhaq bs gur Vfenryvgrf gung qnl gjragl naq gjb
gubhfnaq zra.

20:22 Naq gur crbcyr gur zra bs Vfenry rapbhentrq gurzfryirf, naq frg
gurve onggyr ntnva va neenl va gur cynpr jurer gurl chg gurzfryirf va
neenl gur svefg qnl.

20:23 (Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrag hc naq jrcg orsber gur YBEQ
hagvy rira, naq nfxrq pbhafry bs gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Funyy V tb hc ntnva
gb onggyr ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva zl oebgure? Naq gur YBEQ
fnvq, Tb hc ntnvafg uvz.)  20:24 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pnzr arne
ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva gur frpbaq qnl.

20:25 Naq Orawnzva jrag sbegu ntnvafg gurz bhg bs Tvornu gur frpbaq
qnl, naq qrfgeblrq qbja gb gur tebhaq bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry ntnva
rvtugrra gubhfnaq zra; nyy gurfr qerj gur fjbeq.

20:26 Gura nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq nyy gur crbcyr, jrag hc,
naq pnzr hagb gur ubhfr bs Tbq, naq jrcg, naq fng gurer orsber gur
YBEQ, naq snfgrq gung qnl hagvy rira, naq bssrerq oheag bssrevatf naq
crnpr bssrevatf orsber gur YBEQ.

20:27 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry radhverq bs gur YBEQ, (sbe gur nex bs
gur pbiranag bs Tbq jnf gurer va gubfr qnlf, 20:28 Naq Cuvarunf, gur
fba bs Ryrnmne, gur fba bs Nneba, fgbbq orsber vg va gubfr qnlf,)
fnlvat, Funyy V lrg ntnva tb bhg gb onggyr ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs
Orawnzva zl oebgure, be funyy V prnfr? Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Tb hc; sbe
gb zbeebj V jvyy qryvire gurz vagb guvar unaq.

20:29 Naq Vfenry frg yvref va jnvg ebhaq nobhg Tvornu.

20:30 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrag hc ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs
Orawnzva ba gur guveq qnl, naq chg gurzfryirf va neenl ntnvafg Tvornu,
nf ng bgure gvzrf.

20:31 Naq gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva jrag bhg ntnvafg gur crbcyr, naq
jrer qenja njnl sebz gur pvgl; naq gurl ortna gb fzvgr bs gur crbcyr,
naq xvyy, nf ng bgure gvzrf, va gur uvtujnlf, bs juvpu bar tbrgu hc gb
gur ubhfr bs Tbq, naq gur bgure gb Tvornu va gur svryq, nobhg guvegl
zra bs Vfenry.

20:32 Naq gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva fnvq, Gurl ner fzvggra qbja orsber
hf, nf ng gur svefg. Ohg gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fnvq, Yrg hf syrr, naq
qenj gurz sebz gur pvgl hagb gur uvtujnlf.

20:33 Naq nyy gur zra bs Vfenry ebfr hc bhg bs gurve cynpr, naq chg
gurzfryirf va neenl ng Onnygnzne: naq gur yvref va jnvg bs Vfenry pnzr
sbegu bhg bs gurve cynprf, rira bhg bs gur zrnqbjf bs Tvornu.

20:34 Naq gurer pnzr ntnvafg Tvornu gra gubhfnaq pubfra zra bhg bs nyy
Vfenry, naq gur onggyr jnf fber: ohg gurl xarj abg gung rivy jnf arne
gurz.

20:35 Naq gur YBEQ fzbgr Orawnzva orsber Vfenry: naq gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry qrfgeblrq bs gur Orawnzvgrf gung qnl gjragl naq svir gubhfnaq
naq na uhaqerq zra: nyy gurfr qerj gur fjbeq.

20:36 Fb gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva fnj gung gurl jrer fzvggra: sbe gur
zra bs Vfenry tnir cynpr gb gur Orawnzvgrf, orpnhfr gurl gehfgrq hagb
gur yvref va jnvg juvpu gurl unq frg orfvqr Tvornu.

20:37 Naq gur yvref va jnvg unfgrq, naq ehfurq hcba Tvornu; naq gur
yvref va jnvg qerj gurzfryirf nybat, naq fzbgr nyy gur pvgl jvgu gur
rqtr bs gur fjbeq.

20:38 Abj gurer jnf na nccbvagrq fvta orgjrra gur zra bs Vfenry naq
gur yvref va jnvg, gung gurl fubhyq znxr n terng synzr jvgu fzbxr evfr
hc bhg bs gur pvgl.

20:39 Naq jura gur zra bs Vfenry ergverq va gur onggyr, Orawnzva ortna
gb fzvgr naq xvyy bs gur zra bs Vfenry nobhg guvegl crefbaf: sbe gurl
fnvq, Fheryl gurl ner fzvggra qbja orsber hf, nf va gur svefg onggyr.

20:40 Ohg jura gur synzr ortna gb nevfr hc bhg bs gur pvgl jvgu n
cvyyne bs fzbxr, gur Orawnzvgrf ybbxrq oruvaq gurz, naq, orubyq, gur
synzr bs gur pvgl nfpraqrq hc gb urnira.

20:41 Naq jura gur zra bs Vfenry ghearq ntnva, gur zra bs Orawnzva
jrer nznmrq: sbe gurl fnj gung rivy jnf pbzr hcba gurz.

20:42 Gurersber gurl ghearq gurve onpxf orsber gur zra bs Vfenry hagb
gur jnl bs gur jvyqrearff; ohg gur onggyr biregbbx gurz; naq gurz
juvpu pnzr bhg bs gur pvgvrf gurl qrfgeblrq va gur zvqfg bs gurz.

20:43 Guhf gurl vapybfrq gur Orawnzvgrf ebhaq nobhg, naq punfrq gurz,
naq gebqr gurz qbja jvgu rnfr bire ntnvafg Tvornu gbjneq gur
fhaevfvat.

20:44 Naq gurer sryy bs Orawnzva rvtugrra gubhfnaq zra; nyy gurfr jrer
zra bs inybhe.

20:45 Naq gurl ghearq naq syrq gbjneq gur jvyqrearff hagb gur ebpx bs
Evzzba: naq gurl tyrnarq bs gurz va gur uvtujnlf svir gubhfnaq zra;
naq chefhrq uneq nsgre gurz hagb Tvqbz, naq fyrj gjb gubhfnaq zra bs
gurz.

20:46 Fb gung nyy juvpu sryy gung qnl bs Orawnzva jrer gjragl naq svir
gubhfnaq zra gung qerj gur fjbeq; nyy gurfr jrer zra bs inybhe.

20:47 Ohg fvk uhaqerq zra ghearq naq syrq gb gur jvyqrearff hagb gur
ebpx Evzzba, naq nobqr va gur ebpx Evzzba sbhe zbaguf.

20:48 Naq gur zra bs Vfenry ghearq ntnva hcba gur puvyqera bs
Orawnzva, naq fzbgr gurz jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq, nf jryy gur zra
bs rirel pvgl, nf gur ornfg, naq nyy gung pnzr gb unaq: nyfb gurl frg
ba sver nyy gur pvgvrf gung gurl pnzr gb.

21:1 Abj gur zra bs Vfenry unq fjbea va Zvmcru, fnlvat, Gurer funyy
abg nal bs hf tvir uvf qnhtugre hagb Orawnzva gb jvsr.

21:2 Naq gur crbcyr pnzr gb gur ubhfr bs Tbq, naq nobqr gurer gvyy
rira orsber Tbq, naq yvsgrq hc gurve ibvprf, naq jrcg fber; 21:3 Naq
fnvq, B YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, jul vf guvf pbzr gb cnff va Vfenry, gung
gurer fubhyq or gb qnl bar gevor ynpxvat va Vfenry?  21:4 Naq vg pnzr
gb cnff ba gur zbeebj, gung gur crbcyr ebfr rneyl, naq ohvyg gurer na
nygne, naq bssrerq oheag bssrevatf naq crnpr bssrevatf.

21:5 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fnvq, Jub vf gurer nzbat nyy gur
gevorf bs Vfenry gung pnzr abg hc jvgu gur pbatertngvba hagb gur YBEQ?
Sbe gurl unq znqr n terng bngu pbapreavat uvz gung pnzr abg hc gb gur
YBEQ gb Zvmcru, fnlvat, Ur funyy fheryl or chg gb qrngu.

21:6 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry ercragrq gurz sbe Orawnzva gurve
oebgure, naq fnvq, Gurer vf bar gevor phg bss sebz Vfenry guvf qnl.

21:7 Ubj funyy jr qb sbe jvirf sbe gurz gung erznva, frrvat jr unir
fjbea ol gur YBEQ gung jr jvyy abg tvir gurz bs bhe qnhtugref gb
jvirf?  21:8 Naq gurl fnvq, Jung bar vf gurer bs gur gevorf bs Vfenry
gung pnzr abg hc gb Zvmcru gb gur YBEQ? Naq, orubyq, gurer pnzr abar
gb gur pnzc sebz Wnorfutvyrnq gb gur nffrzoyl.

21:9 Sbe gur crbcyr jrer ahzorerq, naq, orubyq, gurer jrer abar bs gur
vaunovgnagf bs Wnorfutvyrnq gurer.

21:10 Naq gur pbatertngvba frag guvgure gjryir gubhfnaq zra bs gur
inyvnagrfg, naq pbzznaqrq gurz, fnlvat, Tb naq fzvgr gur vaunovgnagf
bs Wnorfutvyrnq jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq, jvgu gur jbzra naq gur
puvyqera.

21:11 Naq guvf vf gur guvat gung lr funyy qb, Lr funyy hggreyl qrfgebl
rirel znyr, naq rirel jbzna gung ungu ynva ol zna.

21:12 Naq gurl sbhaq nzbat gur vaunovgnagf bs Wnorfutvyrnq sbhe
uhaqerq lbhat ivetvaf, gung unq xabja ab zna ol ylvat jvgu nal znyr:
naq gurl oebhtug gurz hagb gur pnzc gb Fuvybu, juvpu vf va gur ynaq bs
Pnanna.

21:13 Naq gur jubyr pbatertngvba frag fbzr gb fcrnx gb gur puvyqera bs
Orawnzva gung jrer va gur ebpx Evzzba, naq gb pnyy crnprnoyl hagb
gurz.

21:14 Naq Orawnzva pnzr ntnva ng gung gvzr; naq gurl tnir gurz jvirf
juvpu gurl unq fnirq nyvir bs gur jbzra bs Wnorfutvyrnq: naq lrg fb
gurl fhssvprq gurz abg.

21:15 Naq gur crbcyr ercragrq gurz sbe Orawnzva, orpnhfr gung gur YBEQ
unq znqr n oernpu va gur gevorf bs Vfenry.

21:16 Gura gur ryqref bs gur pbatertngvba fnvq, Ubj funyy jr qb sbe
jvirf sbe gurz gung erznva, frrvat gur jbzra ner qrfgeblrq bhg bs
Orawnzva?  21:17 Naq gurl fnvq, Gurer zhfg or na vaurevgnapr sbe gurz
gung or rfpncrq bs Orawnzva, gung n gevor or abg qrfgeblrq bhg bs
Vfenry.

21:18 Ubjorvg jr znl abg tvir gurz jvirf bs bhe qnhtugref: sbe gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry unir fjbea, fnlvat, Phefrq or ur gung tvirgu n jvsr
gb Orawnzva.

21:19 Gura gurl fnvq, Orubyq, gurer vf n srnfg bs gur YBEQ va Fuvybu
lrneyl va n cynpr juvpu vf ba gur abegu fvqr bs Orgury, ba gur rnfg
fvqr bs gur uvtujnl gung tbrgu hc sebz Orgury gb Furpurz, naq ba gur
fbhgu bs Yrobanu.

21:20 Gurersber gurl pbzznaqrq gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva, fnlvat, Tb
naq yvr va jnvg va gur ivarlneqf; 21:21 Naq frr, naq, orubyq, vs gur
qnhtugref bs Fuvybu pbzr bhg gb qnapr va qnaprf, gura pbzr lr bhg bs
gur ivarlneqf, naq pngpu lbh rirel zna uvf jvsr bs gur qnhtugref bs
Fuvybu, naq tb gb gur ynaq bs Orawnzva.

21:22 Naq vg funyy or, jura gurve snguref be gurve oerguera pbzr hagb
hf gb pbzcynva, gung jr jvyy fnl hagb gurz, Or snibhenoyr hagb gurz
sbe bhe fnxrf: orpnhfr jr erfreirq abg gb rnpu zna uvf jvsr va gur
jne: sbe lr qvq abg tvir hagb gurz ng guvf gvzr, gung lr fubhyq or
thvygl.

21:23 Naq gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva qvq fb, naq gbbx gurz jvirf,
nppbeqvat gb gurve ahzore, bs gurz gung qnaprq, jubz gurl pnhtug: naq
gurl jrag naq erghearq hagb gurve vaurevgnapr, naq ercnverq gur
pvgvrf, naq qjryg va gurz.

21:24 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qrcnegrq gurapr ng gung gvzr, rirel
zna gb uvf gevor naq gb uvf snzvyl, naq gurl jrag bhg sebz gurapr
rirel zna gb uvf vaurevgnapr.

21:25 Va gubfr qnlf gurer jnf ab xvat va Vfenry: rirel zna qvq gung
juvpu jnf evtug va uvf bja rlrf.




Gur Obbx bs Ehgu


1:1 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff va gur qnlf jura gur whqtrf ehyrq, gung gurer
jnf n snzvar va gur ynaq. Naq n pregnva zna bs Orguyrurzwhqnu jrag gb
fbwbhea va gur pbhagel bs Zbno, ur, naq uvf jvsr, naq uvf gjb fbaf.

1:2 Naq gur anzr bs gur zna jnf Ryvzryrpu, naq gur anzr bs uvf jvsr
Anbzv, naq gur anzr bs uvf gjb fbaf Znuyba naq Puvyvba, Rcuenguvgrf bs
Orguyrurzwhqnu. Naq gurl pnzr vagb gur pbhagel bs Zbno, naq pbagvahrq
gurer.

1:3 Naq Ryvzryrpu Anbzv'f uhfonaq qvrq; naq fur jnf yrsg, naq ure gjb
fbaf.

1:4 Naq gurl gbbx gurz jvirf bs gur jbzra bs Zbno; gur anzr bs gur bar
jnf Becnu, naq gur anzr bs gur bgure Ehgu: naq gurl qjryyrq gurer
nobhg gra lrnef.

1:5 Naq Znuyba naq Puvyvba qvrq nyfb obgu bs gurz; naq gur jbzna jnf
yrsg bs ure gjb fbaf naq ure uhfonaq.

1:6 Gura fur nebfr jvgu ure qnhtugref va ynj, gung fur zvtug erghea
sebz gur pbhagel bs Zbno: sbe fur unq urneq va gur pbhagel bs Zbno ubj
gung gur YBEQ unq ivfvgrq uvf crbcyr va tvivat gurz oernq.

1:7 Jurersber fur jrag sbegu bhg bs gur cynpr jurer fur jnf, naq ure
gjb qnhtugref va ynj jvgu ure; naq gurl jrag ba gur jnl gb erghea hagb
gur ynaq bs Whqnu.

1:8 Naq Anbzv fnvq hagb ure gjb qnhtugref va ynj, Tb, erghea rnpu gb
ure zbgure'f ubhfr: gur YBEQ qrny xvaqyl jvgu lbh, nf lr unir qrnyg
jvgu gur qrnq, naq jvgu zr.

1:9 Gur YBEQ tenag lbh gung lr znl svaq erfg, rnpu bs lbh va gur ubhfr
bs ure uhfonaq. Gura fur xvffrq gurz; naq gurl yvsgrq hc gurve ibvpr,
naq jrcg.

1:10 Naq gurl fnvq hagb ure, Fheryl jr jvyy erghea jvgu gurr hagb gul
crbcyr.

1:11 Naq Anbzv fnvq, Ghea ntnva, zl qnhtugref: jul jvyy lr tb jvgu zr?
ner gurer lrg nal zber fbaf va zl jbzo, gung gurl znl or lbhe
uhfonaqf?  1:12 Ghea ntnva, zl qnhtugref, tb lbhe jnl; sbe V nz gbb
byq gb unir na uhfonaq. Vs V fubhyq fnl, V unir ubcr, vs V fubhyq unir
na uhfonaq nyfb gb avtug, naq fubhyq nyfb orne fbaf; 1:13 Jbhyq lr
gneel sbe gurz gvyy gurl jrer tebja? jbhyq lr fgnl sbe gurz sebz
univat uhfonaqf? anl, zl qnhtugref; sbe vg tevrirgu zr zhpu sbe lbhe
fnxrf gung gur unaq bs gur YBEQ vf tbar bhg ntnvafg zr.

1:14 Naq gurl yvsgrq hc gurve ibvpr, naq jrcg ntnva: naq Becnu xvffrq
ure zbgure va ynj; ohg Ehgu pynir hagb ure.

1:15 Naq fur fnvq, Orubyq, gul fvfgre va ynj vf tbar onpx hagb ure
crbcyr, naq hagb ure tbqf: erghea gubh nsgre gul fvfgre va ynj.

1:16 Naq Ehgu fnvq, Vagerng zr abg gb yrnir gurr, be gb erghea sebz
sbyybjvat nsgre gurr: sbe juvgure gubh tbrfg, V jvyy tb; naq jurer
gubh ybqtrfg, V jvyy ybqtr: gul crbcyr funyy or zl crbcyr, naq gul Tbq
zl Tbq: 1:17 Jurer gubh qvrfg, jvyy V qvr, naq gurer jvyy V or ohevrq:
gur YBEQ qb fb gb zr, naq zber nyfb, vs bhtug ohg qrngu cneg gurr naq
zr.

1:18 Jura fur fnj gung fur jnf fgrqsnfgyl zvaqrq gb tb jvgu ure, gura
fur yrsg fcrnxvat hagb ure.

1:19 Fb gurl gjb jrag hagvy gurl pnzr gb Orguyrurz. Naq vg pnzr gb
cnff, jura gurl jrer pbzr gb Orguyrurz, gung nyy gur pvgl jnf zbirq
nobhg gurz, naq gurl fnvq, Vf guvf Anbzv?  1:20 Naq fur fnvq hagb
gurz, Pnyy zr abg Anbzv, pnyy zr Znen: sbe gur Nyzvtugl ungu qrnyg
irel ovggreyl jvgu zr.

1:21 V jrag bhg shyy naq gur YBEQ ungu oebhtug zr ubzr ntnva rzcgl:
jul gura pnyy lr zr Anbzv, frrvat gur YBEQ ungu grfgvsvrq ntnvafg zr,
naq gur Nyzvtugl ungu nssyvpgrq zr?  1:22 Fb Anbzv erghearq, naq Ehgu
gur Zbnovgrff, ure qnhtugre va ynj, jvgu ure, juvpu erghearq bhg bs
gur pbhagel bs Zbno: naq gurl pnzr gb Orguyrurz va gur ortvaavat bs
oneyrl uneirfg.

2:1 Naq Anbzv unq n xvafzna bs ure uhfonaq'f, n zvtugl zna bs jrnygu,
bs gur snzvyl bs Ryvzryrpu; naq uvf anzr jnf Obnm.

2:2 Naq Ehgu gur Zbnovgrff fnvq hagb Anbzv, Yrg zr abj tb gb gur
svryq, naq tyrna rnef bs pbea nsgre uvz va jubfr fvtug V funyy svaq
tenpr.

Naq fur fnvq hagb ure, Tb, zl qnhtugre.

2:3 Naq fur jrag, naq pnzr, naq tyrnarq va gur svryq nsgre gur
erncref: naq ure unc jnf gb yvtug ba n cneg bs gur svryq orybatvat
hagb Obnm, jub jnf bs gur xvaqerq bs Ryvzryrpu.

2:4 Naq, orubyq, Obnm pnzr sebz Orguyrurz, naq fnvq hagb gur erncref,
Gur YBEQ or jvgu lbh. Naq gurl nafjrerq uvz, Gur YBEQ oyrff gurr.

2:5 Gura fnvq Obnm hagb uvf freinag gung jnf frg bire gur erncref,
Jubfr qnzfry vf guvf?  2:6 Naq gur freinag gung jnf frg bire gur
erncref nafjrerq naq fnvq, Vg vf gur Zbnovgvfu qnzfry gung pnzr onpx
jvgu Anbzv bhg bs gur pbhagel bs Zbno: 2:7 Naq fur fnvq, V cenl lbh,
yrg zr tyrna naq tngure nsgre gur erncref nzbat gur furnirf: fb fur
pnzr, naq ungu pbagvahrq rira sebz gur zbeavat hagvy abj, gung fur
gneevrq n yvggyr va gur ubhfr.

2:8 Gura fnvq Obnm hagb Ehgu, Urnerfg gubh abg, zl qnhtugre? Tb abg gb
tyrna va nabgure svryq, arvgure tb sebz urapr, ohg novqr urer snfg ol
zl znvqraf: 2:9 Yrg guvar rlrf or ba gur svryq gung gurl qb ernc, naq
tb gubh nsgre gurz: unir V abg punetrq gur lbhat zra gung gurl funyy
abg gbhpu gurr? naq jura gubh neg nguvefg, tb hagb gur irffryf, naq
qevax bs gung juvpu gur lbhat zra unir qenja.

2:10 Gura fur sryy ba ure snpr, naq objrq urefrys gb gur tebhaq, naq
fnvq hagb uvz, Jul unir V sbhaq tenpr va guvar rlrf, gung gubh
fubhyqrfg gnxr xabjyrqtr bs zr, frrvat V nz n fgenatre?  2:11 Naq Obnm
nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb ure, Vg ungu shyyl orra furjrq zr, nyy gung
gubh unfg qbar hagb gul zbgure va ynj fvapr gur qrngu bs guvar
uhfonaq: naq ubj gubh unfg yrsg gul sngure naq gul zbgure, naq gur
ynaq bs gul angvivgl, naq neg pbzr hagb n crbcyr juvpu gubh xarjrfg
abg urergbsber.

2:12 Gur YBEQ erpbzcrafr gul jbex, naq n shyy erjneq or tvira gurr bs
gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, haqre jubfr jvatf gubh neg pbzr gb gehfg.

2:13 Gura fur fnvq, Yrg zr svaq snibhe va gul fvtug, zl ybeq; sbe gung
gubh unfg pbzsbegrq zr, naq sbe gung gubh unfg fcbxra sevraqyl hagb
guvar unaqznvq, gubhtu V or abg yvxr hagb bar bs guvar unaqznvqraf.

2:14 Naq Obnm fnvq hagb ure, Ng zrnygvzr pbzr gubh uvgure, naq rng bs
gur oernq, naq qvc gul zbefry va gur ivartne. Naq fur fng orfvqr gur
erncref: naq ur ernpurq ure cnepurq pbea, naq fur qvq rng, naq jnf
fhssvprq, naq yrsg.

2:15 Naq jura fur jnf evfra hc gb tyrna, Obnm pbzznaqrq uvf lbhat zra,
fnlvat, Yrg ure tyrna rira nzbat gur furnirf, naq ercebnpu ure abg:
2:16 Naq yrg snyy nyfb fbzr bs gur unaqshyf bs checbfr sbe ure, naq
yrnir gurz, gung fur znl tyrna gurz, naq erohxr ure abg.

2:17 Fb fur tyrnarq va gur svryq hagvy rira, naq orng bhg gung fur unq
tyrnarq: naq vg jnf nobhg na rcunu bs oneyrl.

2:18 Naq fur gbbx vg hc, naq jrag vagb gur pvgl: naq ure zbgure va ynj
fnj jung fur unq tyrnarq: naq fur oebhtug sbegu, naq tnir gb ure gung
fur unq erfreirq nsgre fur jnf fhssvprq.

2:19 Naq ure zbgure va ynj fnvq hagb ure, Jurer unfg gubh tyrnarq gb
qnl?  naq jurer jebhtugrfg gubh? oyrffrq or ur gung qvq gnxr xabjyrqtr
bs gurr. Naq fur furjrq ure zbgure va ynj jvgu jubz fur unq jebhtug,
naq fnvq, Gur zna'f anzr jvgu jubz V jebhtug gb qnl vf Obnm.

2:20 Naq Anbzv fnvq hagb ure qnhtugre va ynj, Oyrffrq or ur bs gur
YBEQ, jub ungu abg yrsg bss uvf xvaqarff gb gur yvivat naq gb gur
qrnq. Naq Anbzv fnvq hagb ure, Gur zna vf arne bs xva hagb hf, bar bs
bhe arkg xvafzra.

2:21 Naq Ehgu gur Zbnovgrff fnvq, Ur fnvq hagb zr nyfb, Gubh funyg
xrrc snfg ol zl lbhat zra, hagvy gurl unir raqrq nyy zl uneirfg.

2:22 Naq Anbzv fnvq hagb Ehgu ure qnhtugre va ynj, Vg vf tbbq, zl
qnhtugre, gung gubh tb bhg jvgu uvf znvqraf, gung gurl zrrg gurr abg
va nal bgure svryq.

2:23 Fb fur xrcg snfg ol gur znvqraf bs Obnm gb tyrna hagb gur raq bs
oneyrl uneirfg naq bs jurng uneirfg; naq qjryg jvgu ure zbgure va ynj.

3:1 Gura Anbzv ure zbgure va ynj fnvq hagb ure, Zl qnhtugre, funyy V
abg frrx erfg sbe gurr, gung vg znl or jryy jvgu gurr?  3:2 Naq abj vf
abg Obnm bs bhe xvaqerq, jvgu jubfr znvqraf gubh jnfg?  Orubyq, ur
jvaabjrgu oneyrl gb avtug va gur guerfuvatsybbe.

3:3 Jnfu gulfrys gurersber, naq nabvag gurr, naq chg gul envzrag hcba
gurr, naq trg gurr qbja gb gur sybbe: ohg znxr abg gulfrys xabja hagb
gur zna, hagvy ur funyy unir qbar rngvat naq qevaxvat.

3:4 Naq vg funyy or, jura ur yvrgu qbja, gung gubh funyg znex gur
cynpr jurer ur funyy yvr, naq gubh funyg tb va, naq hapbire uvf srrg,
naq ynl gurr qbja; naq ur jvyy gryy gurr jung gubh funyg qb.

3:5 Naq fur fnvq hagb ure, Nyy gung gubh fnlrfg hagb zr V jvyy qb.

3:6 Naq fur jrag qbja hagb gur sybbe, naq qvq nppbeqvat gb nyy gung
ure zbgure va ynj onqr ure.

3:7 Naq jura Obnm unq rngra naq qehax, naq uvf urneg jnf zreel, ur
jrag gb yvr qbja ng gur raq bs gur urnc bs pbea: naq fur pnzr fbsgyl,
naq hapbirerq uvf srrg, naq ynvq ure qbja.

3:8 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng zvqavtug, gung gur zna jnf nsenvq, naq
ghearq uvzfrys: naq, orubyq, n jbzna ynl ng uvf srrg.

3:9 Naq ur fnvq, Jub neg gubh? Naq fur nafjrerq, V nz Ehgu guvar
unaqznvq: fcernq gurersber gul fxveg bire guvar unaqznvq; sbe gubh neg
n arne xvafzna.

3:10 Naq ur fnvq, Oyrffrq or gubh bs gur YBEQ, zl qnhtugre: sbe gubh
unfg furjrq zber xvaqarff va gur ynggre raq guna ng gur ortvaavat,
vanfzhpu nf gubh sbyybjrqfg abg lbhat zra, jurgure cbbe be evpu.

3:11 Naq abj, zl qnhtugre, srne abg; V jvyy qb gb gurr nyy gung gubh
erdhverfg: sbe nyy gur pvgl bs zl crbcyr qbgu xabj gung gubh neg n
iveghbhf jbzna.

3:12 Naq abj vg vf gehr gung V nz gul arne xvafzna: ubjorvg gurer vf n
xvafzna arnere guna V.

3:13 Gneel guvf avtug, naq vg funyy or va gur zbeavat, gung vs ur jvyy
cresbez hagb gurr gur cneg bs n xvafzna, jryy; yrg uvz qb gur
xvafzna'f cneg: ohg vs ur jvyy abg qb gur cneg bs n xvafzna gb gurr,
gura jvyy V qb gur cneg bs n xvafzna gb gurr, nf gur YBEQ yvirgu: yvr
qbja hagvy gur zbeavat.

3:14 Naq fur ynl ng uvf srrg hagvy gur zbeavat: naq fur ebfr hc orsber
bar pbhyq xabj nabgure. Naq ur fnvq, Yrg vg abg or xabja gung n jbzna
pnzr vagb gur sybbe.

3:15 Nyfb ur fnvq, Oevat gur invy gung gubh unfg hcba gurr, naq ubyq
vg.

Naq jura fur uryq vg, ur zrnfherq fvk zrnfherf bs oneyrl, naq ynvq vg
ba ure: naq fur jrag vagb gur pvgl.

3:16 Naq jura fur pnzr gb ure zbgure va ynj, fur fnvq, Jub neg gubh,
zl qnhtugre? Naq fur gbyq ure nyy gung gur zna unq qbar gb ure.

3:17 Naq fur fnvq, Gurfr fvk zrnfherf bs oneyrl tnir ur zr; sbe ur
fnvq gb zr, Tb abg rzcgl hagb gul zbgure va ynj.

3:18 Gura fnvq fur, Fvg fgvyy, zl qnhtugre, hagvy gubh xabj ubj gur
znggre jvyy snyy: sbe gur zna jvyy abg or va erfg, hagvy ur unir
svavfurq gur guvat guvf qnl.

4:1 Gura jrag Obnm hc gb gur tngr, naq fng uvz qbja gurer: naq,
orubyq, gur xvafzna bs jubz Obnm fcnxr pnzr ol; hagb jubz ur fnvq, Ub,
fhpu n bar! ghea nfvqr, fvg qbja urer. Naq ur ghearq nfvqr, naq fng
qbja.

4:2 Naq ur gbbx gra zra bs gur ryqref bs gur pvgl, naq fnvq, Fvg lr
qbja urer. Naq gurl fng qbja.

4:3 Naq ur fnvq hagb gur xvafzna, Anbzv, gung vf pbzr ntnva bhg bs gur
pbhagel bs Zbno, fryyrgu n cnepry bs ynaq, juvpu jnf bhe oebgure
Ryvzryrpu'f: 4:4 Naq V gubhtug gb nqiregvfr gurr, fnlvat, Ohl vg
orsber gur vaunovgnagf, naq orsber gur ryqref bs zl crbcyr. Vs gubh
jvyg erqrrz vg, erqrrz vg: ohg vs gubh jvyg abg erqrrz vg, gura gryy
zr, gung V znl xabj: sbe gurer vf abar gb erqrrz vg orfvqr gurr; naq V
nz nsgre gurr. Naq ur fnvq, V jvyy erqrrz vg.

4:5 Gura fnvq Obnm, Jung qnl gubh ohlrfg gur svryq bs gur unaq bs
Anbzv, gubh zhfg ohl vg nyfb bs Ehgu gur Zbnovgrff, gur jvsr bs gur
qrnq, gb envfr hc gur anzr bs gur qrnq hcba uvf vaurevgnapr.

4:6 Naq gur xvafzna fnvq, V pnaabg erqrrz vg sbe zlfrys, yrfg V zne
zvar bja vaurevgnapr: erqrrz gubh zl evtug gb gulfrys; sbe V pnaabg
erqrrz vg.

4:7 Abj guvf jnf gur znaare va sbezre gvzr va Vfenry pbapreavat
erqrrzvat naq pbapreavat punatvat, sbe gb pbasvez nyy guvatf; n zna
cyhpxrq bss uvf fubr, naq tnir vg gb uvf arvtuobhe: naq guvf jnf n
grfgvzbal va Vfenry.

4:8 Gurersber gur xvafzna fnvq hagb Obnm, Ohl vg sbe gurr. Fb ur qerj
bss uvf fubr.

4:9 Naq Obnm fnvq hagb gur ryqref, naq hagb nyy gur crbcyr, Lr ner
jvgarffrf guvf qnl, gung V unir obhtug nyy gung jnf Ryvzryrpu'f, naq
nyy gung jnf Puvyvba'f naq Znuyba'f, bs gur unaq bs Anbzv.

4:10 Zberbire Ehgu gur Zbnovgrff, gur jvsr bs Znuyba, unir V chepunfrq
gb or zl jvsr, gb envfr hc gur anzr bs gur qrnq hcba uvf vaurevgnapr,
gung gur anzr bs gur qrnq or abg phg bss sebz nzbat uvf oerguera, naq
sebz gur tngr bs uvf cynpr: lr ner jvgarffrf guvf qnl.

4:11 Naq nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer va gur tngr, naq gur ryqref, fnvq,
Jr ner jvgarffrf. Gur YBEQ znxr gur jbzna gung vf pbzr vagb guvar
ubhfr yvxr Enpury naq yvxr Yrnu, juvpu gjb qvq ohvyq gur ubhfr bs
Vfenry: naq qb gubh jbeguvyl va Rcuengnu, naq or snzbhf va Orguyrurz:
4:12 Naq yrg gul ubhfr or yvxr gur ubhfr bs Cunerm, jubz Gnzne oner
hagb Whqnu, bs gur frrq juvpu gur YBEQ funyy tvir gurr bs guvf lbhat
jbzna.

4:13 Fb Obnm gbbx Ehgu, naq fur jnf uvf jvsr: naq jura ur jrag va hagb
ure, gur YBEQ tnir ure pbaprcgvba, naq fur oner n fba.

4:14 Naq gur jbzra fnvq hagb Anbzv, Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ, juvpu ungu
abg yrsg gurr guvf qnl jvgubhg n xvafzna, gung uvf anzr znl or snzbhf
va Vfenry.

4:15 Naq ur funyy or hagb gurr n erfgbere bs gul yvsr, naq n abhevfure
bs guvar byq ntr: sbe gul qnhtugre va ynj, juvpu ybirgu gurr, juvpu vf
orggre gb gurr guna frira fbaf, ungu obea uvz.

4:16 Naq Anbzv gbbx gur puvyq, naq ynvq vg va ure obfbz, naq orpnzr
ahefr hagb vg.

4:17 Naq gur jbzra ure arvtuobhef tnir vg n anzr, fnlvat, Gurer vf n
fba obea gb Anbzv; naq gurl pnyyrq uvf anzr Borq: ur vf gur sngure bs
Wrffr, gur sngure bs Qnivq.

4:18 Abj gurfr ner gur trarengvbaf bs Cunerm: Cunerm ortng Urmeba,
4:19 Naq Urmeba ortng Enz, naq Enz ortng Nzzvanqno, 4:20 Naq Nzzvanqno
ortng Anufuba, naq Anufuba ortng Fnyzba, 4:21 Naq Fnyzba ortng Obnm,
naq Obnm ortng Borq, 4:22 Naq Borq ortng Wrffr, naq Wrffr ortng Qnivq.




Gur Svefg Obbx bs Fnzhry

Bgurejvfr Pnyyrq:

Gur Svefg Obbx bs gur Xvatf


1:1 Abj gurer jnf n pregnva zna bs Enzngunvzmbcuvz, bs zbhag Rcuenvz,
naq uvf anzr jnf Ryxnanu, gur fba bs Wrebunz, gur fba bs Ryvuh, gur
fba bs Gbuh, gur fba bs Mhcu, na Rcuenguvgr: 1:2 Naq ur unq gjb jvirf;
gur anzr bs gur bar jnf Unaanu, naq gur anzr bs gur bgure Cravaanu:
naq Cravaanu unq puvyqera, ohg Unaanu unq ab puvyqera.

1:3 Naq guvf zna jrag hc bhg bs uvf pvgl lrneyl gb jbefuvc naq gb
fnpevsvpr hagb gur YBEQ bs ubfgf va Fuvybu. Naq gur gjb fbaf bs Ryv,
Ubcuav naq Cuvarunf, gur cevrfgf bs gur YBEQ, jrer gurer.

1:4 Naq jura gur gvzr jnf gung Ryxnanu bssrerq, ur tnir gb Cravaanu
uvf jvsr, naq gb nyy ure fbaf naq ure qnhtugref, cbegvbaf: 1:5 Ohg
hagb Unaanu ur tnir n jbegul cbegvba; sbe ur ybirq Unaanu: ohg gur
YBEQ unq fuhg hc ure jbzo.

1:6 Naq ure nqirefnel nyfb cebibxrq ure fber, sbe gb znxr ure serg,
orpnhfr gur YBEQ unq fuhg hc ure jbzo.

1:7 Naq nf ur qvq fb lrne ol lrne, jura fur jrag hc gb gur ubhfr bs
gur YBEQ, fb fur cebibxrq ure; gurersber fur jrcg, naq qvq abg rng.

1:8 Gura fnvq Ryxnanu ure uhfonaq gb ure, Unaanu, jul jrrcrfg gubh?
naq jul rngrfg gubh abg? naq jul vf gul urneg tevrirq? nz abg V orggre
gb gurr guna gra fbaf?  1:9 Fb Unaanu ebfr hc nsgre gurl unq rngra va
Fuvybu, naq nsgre gurl unq qehax. Abj Ryv gur cevrfg fng hcba n frng
ol n cbfg bs gur grzcyr bs gur YBEQ.

1:10 Naq fur jnf va ovggrearff bs fbhy, naq cenlrq hagb gur YBEQ, naq
jrcg fber.

1:11 Naq fur ibjrq n ibj, naq fnvq, B YBEQ bs ubfgf, vs gubh jvyg
vaqrrq ybbx ba gur nssyvpgvba bs guvar unaqznvq, naq erzrzore zr, naq
abg sbetrg guvar unaqznvq, ohg jvyg tvir hagb guvar unaqznvq n zna
puvyq, gura V jvyy tvir uvz hagb gur YBEQ nyy gur qnlf bs uvf yvsr,
naq gurer funyy ab enmbe pbzr hcba uvf urnq.

1:12 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf fur pbagvahrq cenlvat orsber gur YBEQ,
gung Ryv znexrq ure zbhgu.

1:13 Abj Unaanu, fur fcnxr va ure urneg; bayl ure yvcf zbirq, ohg ure
ibvpr jnf abg urneq: gurersber Ryv gubhtug fur unq orra qehaxra.

1:14 Naq Ryv fnvq hagb ure, Ubj ybat jvyg gubh or qehaxra? chg njnl
gul jvar sebz gurr.

1:15 Naq Unaanu nafjrerq naq fnvq, Ab, zl ybeq, V nz n jbzna bs n
fbeebjshy fcvevg: V unir qehax arvgure jvar abe fgebat qevax, ohg unir
cbherq bhg zl fbhy orsber gur YBEQ.

1:16 Pbhag abg guvar unaqznvq sbe n qnhtugre bs Oryvny: sbe bhg bs gur
nohaqnapr bs zl pbzcynvag naq tevrs unir V fcbxra uvguregb.

1:17 Gura Ryv nafjrerq naq fnvq, Tb va crnpr: naq gur Tbq bs Vfenry
tenag gurr gul crgvgvba gung gubh unfg nfxrq bs uvz.

1:18 Naq fur fnvq, Yrg guvar unaqznvq svaq tenpr va gul fvtug. Fb gur
jbzna jrag ure jnl, naq qvq rng, naq ure pbhagranapr jnf ab zber fnq.

1:19 Naq gurl ebfr hc va gur zbeavat rneyl, naq jbefuvccrq orsber gur
YBEQ, naq erghearq, naq pnzr gb gurve ubhfr gb Enznu: naq Ryxnanu xarj
Unaanu uvf jvsr; naq gur YBEQ erzrzorerq ure.

1:20 Jurersber vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur gvzr jnf pbzr nobhg nsgre
Unaanu unq pbaprvirq, gung fur oner n fba, naq pnyyrq uvf anzr Fnzhry,
fnlvat, Orpnhfr V unir nfxrq uvz bs gur YBEQ.

1:21 Naq gur zna Ryxnanu, naq nyy uvf ubhfr, jrag hc gb bssre hagb gur
YBEQ gur lrneyl fnpevsvpr, naq uvf ibj.

1:22 Ohg Unaanu jrag abg hc; sbe fur fnvq hagb ure uhfonaq, V jvyy abg
tb hc hagvy gur puvyq or jrnarq, naq gura V jvyy oevat uvz, gung ur
znl nccrne orsber gur YBEQ, naq gurer novqr sbe rire.

1:23 Naq Ryxnanu ure uhfonaq fnvq hagb ure, Qb jung frrzrgu gurr tbbq;
gneel hagvy gubh unir jrnarq uvz; bayl gur YBEQ rfgnoyvfu uvf jbeq. Fb
gur jbzna nobqr, naq tnir ure fba fhpx hagvy fur jrnarq uvz.

1:24 Naq jura fur unq jrnarq uvz, fur gbbx uvz hc jvgu ure, jvgu guerr
ohyybpxf, naq bar rcunu bs sybhe, naq n obggyr bs jvar, naq oebhtug
uvz hagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ va Fuvybu: naq gur puvyq jnf lbhat.

1:25 Naq gurl fyrj n ohyybpx, naq oebhtug gur puvyq gb Ryv.

1:26 Naq fur fnvq, Bu zl ybeq, nf gul fbhy yvirgu, zl ybeq, V nz gur
jbzna gung fgbbq ol gurr urer, cenlvat hagb gur YBEQ.

1:27 Sbe guvf puvyq V cenlrq; naq gur YBEQ ungu tvira zr zl crgvgvba
juvpu V nfxrq bs uvz: 1:28 Gurersber nyfb V unir yrag uvz gb gur YBEQ;
nf ybat nf ur yvirgu ur funyy or yrag gb gur YBEQ. Naq ur jbefuvccrq
gur YBEQ gurer.

2:1 Naq Unaanu cenlrq, naq fnvq, Zl urneg erwbvprgu va gur YBEQ, zvar
ubea vf rknygrq va gur YBEQ: zl zbhgu vf raynetrq bire zvar rarzvrf;
orpnhfr V erwbvpr va gul fnyingvba.

2:2 Gurer vf abar ubyl nf gur YBEQ: sbe gurer vf abar orfvqr gurr:
arvgure vf gurer nal ebpx yvxr bhe Tbq.

2:3 Gnyx ab zber fb rkprrqvat cebhqyl; yrg abg neebtnapl pbzr bhg bs
lbhe zbhgu: sbe gur YBEQ vf n Tbq bs xabjyrqtr, naq ol uvz npgvbaf ner
jrvturq.

2:4 Gur objf bs gur zvtugl zra ner oebxra, naq gurl gung fghzoyrq ner
tveqrq jvgu fgeratgu.

2:5 Gurl gung jrer shyy unir uverq bhg gurzfryirf sbe oernq; naq gurl
gung jrer uhatel prnfrq: fb gung gur oneera ungu obea frira; naq fur
gung ungu znal puvyqera vf jnkrq srroyr.

2:6 Gur YBEQ xvyyrgu, naq znxrgu nyvir: ur oevatrgu qbja gb gur tenir,
naq oevatrgu hc.

2:7 Gur YBEQ znxrgu cbbe, naq znxrgu evpu: ur oevatrgu ybj, naq
yvsgrgu hc.

2:8 Ur envfrgu hc gur cbbe bhg bs gur qhfg, naq yvsgrgu hc gur orttne
sebz gur qhatuvyy, gb frg gurz nzbat cevaprf, naq gb znxr gurz vaurevg
gur guebar bs tybel: sbe gur cvyynef bs gur rnegu ner gur YBEQ'f, naq
ur ungu frg gur jbeyq hcba gurz.

2:9 Ur jvyy xrrc gur srrg bs uvf fnvagf, naq gur jvpxrq funyy or
fvyrag va qnexarff; sbe ol fgeratgu funyy ab zna cerinvy.

2:10 Gur nqirefnevrf bs gur YBEQ funyy or oebxra gb cvrprf; bhg bs
urnira funyy ur guhaqre hcba gurz: gur YBEQ funyy whqtr gur raqf bs
gur rnegu; naq ur funyy tvir fgeratgu hagb uvf xvat, naq rknyg gur
ubea bs uvf nabvagrq.

2:11 Naq Ryxnanu jrag gb Enznu gb uvf ubhfr. Naq gur puvyq qvq
zvavfgre hagb gur YBEQ orsber Ryv gur cevrfg.

2:12 Abj gur fbaf bs Ryv jrer fbaf bs Oryvny; gurl xarj abg gur YBEQ.

2:13 Naq gur cevrfg'f phfgbz jvgu gur crbcyr jnf, gung, jura nal zna
bssrerq fnpevsvpr, gur cevrfg'f freinag pnzr, juvyr gur syrfu jnf va
frrguvat, jvgu n syrfuubbx bs guerr grrgu va uvf unaq; 2:14 Naq ur
fgehpx vg vagb gur cna, be xrggyr, be pnyqeba, be cbg; nyy gung gur
syrfuubbx oebhtug hc gur cevrfg gbbx sbe uvzfrys. Fb gurl qvq va
Fuvybu hagb nyy gur Vfenryvgrf gung pnzr guvgure.

2:15 Nyfb orsber gurl oheag gur sng, gur cevrfg'f freinag pnzr, naq
fnvq gb gur zna gung fnpevsvprq, Tvir syrfu gb ebnfg sbe gur cevrfg;
sbe ur jvyy abg unir fbqqra syrfu bs gurr, ohg enj.

2:16 Naq vs nal zna fnvq hagb uvz, Yrg gurz abg snvy gb ohea gur sng
cerfragyl, naq gura gnxr nf zhpu nf gul fbhy qrfvergu; gura ur jbhyq
nafjre uvz, Anl; ohg gubh funyg tvir vg zr abj: naq vs abg, V jvyy
gnxr vg ol sbepr.

2:17 Jurersber gur fva bs gur lbhat zra jnf irel terng orsber gur
YBEQ: sbe zra noubeerq gur bssrevat bs gur YBEQ.

2:18 Ohg Fnzhry zvavfgrerq orsber gur YBEQ, orvat n puvyq, tveqrq jvgu
n yvara rcubq.

2:19 Zberbire uvf zbgure znqr uvz n yvggyr pbng, naq oebhtug vg gb uvz
sebz lrne gb lrne, jura fur pnzr hc jvgu ure uhfonaq gb bssre gur
lrneyl fnpevsvpr.

2:20 Naq Ryv oyrffrq Ryxnanu naq uvf jvsr, naq fnvq, Gur YBEQ tvir
gurr frrq bs guvf jbzna sbe gur ybna juvpu vf yrag gb gur YBEQ. Naq
gurl jrag hagb gurve bja ubzr.

2:21 Naq gur YBEQ ivfvgrq Unaanu, fb gung fur pbaprvirq, naq oner
guerr fbaf naq gjb qnhtugref. Naq gur puvyq Fnzhry terj orsber gur
YBEQ.

2:22 Abj Ryv jnf irel byq, naq urneq nyy gung uvf fbaf qvq hagb nyy
Vfenry; naq ubj gurl ynl jvgu gur jbzra gung nffrzoyrq ng gur qbbe bs
gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

2:23 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Jul qb lr fhpu guvatf? sbe V urne bs lbhe
rivy qrnyvatf ol nyy guvf crbcyr.

2:24 Anl, zl fbaf; sbe vg vf ab tbbq ercbeg gung V urne: lr znxr gur
YBEQ'f crbcyr gb genafterff.

2:25 Vs bar zna fva ntnvafg nabgure, gur whqtr funyy whqtr uvz: ohg vs
n zna fva ntnvafg gur YBEQ, jub funyy vagerng sbe uvz? Abgjvgufgnaqvat
gurl urnexrarq abg hagb gur ibvpr bs gurve sngure, orpnhfr gur YBEQ
jbhyq fynl gurz.

2:26 Naq gur puvyq Fnzhry terj ba, naq jnf va snibhe obgu jvgu gur
YBEQ, naq nyfb jvgu zra.

2:27 Naq gurer pnzr n zna bs Tbq hagb Ryv, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Guhf
fnvgu gur YBEQ, Qvq V cynvayl nccrne hagb gur ubhfr bs gul sngure,
jura gurl jrer va Rtlcg va Cunenbu'f ubhfr?  2:28 Naq qvq V pubbfr uvz
bhg bs nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry gb or zl cevrfg, gb bssre hcba zvar
nygne, gb ohea vaprafr, gb jrne na rcubq orsber zr? naq qvq V tvir
hagb gur ubhfr bs gul sngure nyy gur bssrevatf znqr ol sver bs gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry?  2:29 Jurersber xvpx lr ng zl fnpevsvpr naq ng
zvar bssrevat, juvpu V unir pbzznaqrq va zl unovgngvba; naq ubabherfg
gul fbaf nobir zr, gb znxr lbhefryirf sng jvgu gur puvrsrfg bs nyy gur
bssrevatf bs Vfenry zl crbcyr?  2:30 Jurersber gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry
fnvgu, V fnvq vaqrrq gung gul ubhfr, naq gur ubhfr bs gul sngure,
fubhyq jnyx orsber zr sbe rire: ohg abj gur YBEQ fnvgu, Or vg sne sebz
zr; sbe gurz gung ubabhe zr V jvyy ubabhe, naq gurl gung qrfcvfr zr
funyy or yvtugyl rfgrrzrq.

2:31 Orubyq, gur qnlf pbzr, gung V jvyy phg bss guvar nez, naq gur nez
bs gul sngure'f ubhfr, gung gurer funyy abg or na byq zna va guvar
ubhfr.

2:32 Naq gubh funyg frr na rarzl va zl unovgngvba, va nyy gur jrnygu
juvpu Tbq funyy tvir Vfenry: naq gurer funyy abg or na byq zna va
guvar ubhfr sbe rire.

2:33 Naq gur zna bs guvar, jubz V funyy abg phg bss sebz zvar nygne,
funyy or gb pbafhzr guvar rlrf, naq gb tevrir guvar urneg: naq nyy gur
vapernfr bs guvar ubhfr funyy qvr va gur sybjre bs gurve ntr.

2:34 Naq guvf funyy or n fvta hagb gurr, gung funyy pbzr hcba gul gjb
fbaf, ba Ubcuav naq Cuvarunf; va bar qnl gurl funyy qvr obgu bs gurz.

2:35 Naq V jvyy envfr zr hc n snvgushy cevrfg, gung funyy qb nppbeqvat
gb gung juvpu vf va zvar urneg naq va zl zvaq: naq V jvyy ohvyq uvz n
fher ubhfr; naq ur funyy jnyx orsber zvar nabvagrq sbe rire.

2:36 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung rirel bar gung vf yrsg va guvar
ubhfr funyy pbzr naq pebhpu gb uvz sbe n cvrpr bs fvyire naq n zbefry
bs oernq, naq funyy fnl, Chg zr, V cenl gurr, vagb bar bs gur cevrfgf'
bssvprf, gung V znl rng n cvrpr bs oernq.

3:1 Naq gur puvyq Fnzhry zvavfgrerq hagb gur YBEQ orsber Ryv. Naq gur
jbeq bs gur YBEQ jnf cerpvbhf va gubfr qnlf; gurer jnf ab bcra ivfvba.

3:2 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gung gvzr, jura Ryv jnf ynvq qbja va uvf
cynpr, naq uvf rlrf ortna gb jnk qvz, gung ur pbhyq abg frr; 3:3 Naq
rer gur ynzc bs Tbq jrag bhg va gur grzcyr bs gur YBEQ, jurer gur nex
bs Tbq jnf, naq Fnzhry jnf ynvq qbja gb fyrrc; 3:4 Gung gur YBEQ
pnyyrq Fnzhry: naq ur nafjrerq, Urer nz V.

3:5 Naq ur ena hagb Ryv, naq fnvq, Urer nz V; sbe gubh pnyyrqfg zr.
Naq ur fnvq, V pnyyrq abg; yvr qbja ntnva. Naq ur jrag naq ynl qbja.

3:6 Naq gur YBEQ pnyyrq lrg ntnva, Fnzhry. Naq Fnzhry nebfr naq jrag
gb Ryv, naq fnvq, Urer nz V; sbe gubh qvqfg pnyy zr. Naq ur nafjrerq,
V pnyyrq abg, zl fba; yvr qbja ntnva.

3:7 Abj Fnzhry qvq abg lrg xabj gur YBEQ, arvgure jnf gur jbeq bs gur
YBEQ lrg erirnyrq hagb uvz.

3:8 Naq gur YBEQ pnyyrq Fnzhry ntnva gur guveq gvzr. Naq ur nebfr naq
jrag gb Ryv, naq fnvq, Urer nz V; sbe gubh qvqfg pnyy zr. Naq Ryv
creprvirq gung gur YBEQ unq pnyyrq gur puvyq.

3:9 Gurersber Ryv fnvq hagb Fnzhry, Tb, yvr qbja: naq vg funyy or, vs
ur pnyy gurr, gung gubh funyg fnl, Fcrnx, YBEQ; sbe gul freinag
urnergu. Fb Fnzhry jrag naq ynl qbja va uvf cynpr.

3:10 Naq gur YBEQ pnzr, naq fgbbq, naq pnyyrq nf ng bgure gvzrf,
Fnzhry, Fnzhry. Gura Fnzhry nafjrerq, Fcrnx; sbe gul freinag urnergu.

3:11 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq gb Fnzhry, Orubyq, V jvyy qb n guvat va Vfenry,
ng juvpu obgu gur rnef bs rirel bar gung urnergu vg funyy gvatyr.

3:12 Va gung qnl V jvyy cresbez ntnvafg Ryv nyy guvatf juvpu V unir
fcbxra pbapreavat uvf ubhfr: jura V ortva, V jvyy nyfb znxr na raq.

3:13 Sbe V unir gbyq uvz gung V jvyy whqtr uvf ubhfr sbe rire sbe gur
vavdhvgl juvpu ur xabjrgu; orpnhfr uvf fbaf znqr gurzfryirf ivyr, naq
ur erfgenvarq gurz abg.

3:14 Naq gurersber V unir fjbea hagb gur ubhfr bs Ryv, gung gur
vavdhvgl bs Ryv'f ubhfr funyy abg or chetrq jvgu fnpevsvpr abe
bssrevat sbe rire.

3:15 Naq Fnzhry ynl hagvy gur zbeavat, naq bcrarq gur qbbef bs gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ. Naq Fnzhry srnerq gb furj Ryv gur ivfvba.

3:16 Gura Ryv pnyyrq Fnzhry, naq fnvq, Fnzhry, zl fba. Naq ur
nafjrerq, Urer nz V.

3:17 Naq ur fnvq, Jung vf gur guvat gung gur YBEQ ungu fnvq hagb gurr?
V cenl gurr uvqr vg abg sebz zr: Tbq qb fb gb gurr, naq zber nyfb, vs
gubh uvqr nal guvat sebz zr bs nyy gur guvatf gung ur fnvq hagb gurr.

3:18 Naq Fnzhry gbyq uvz rirel juvg, naq uvq abguvat sebz uvz. Naq ur
fnvq, Vg vf gur YBEQ: yrg uvz qb jung frrzrgu uvz tbbq.

3:19 Naq Fnzhry terj, naq gur YBEQ jnf jvgu uvz, naq qvq yrg abar bs
uvf jbeqf snyy gb gur tebhaq.

3:20 Naq nyy Vfenry sebz Qna rira gb Orrefuron xarj gung Fnzhry jnf
rfgnoyvfurq gb or n cebcurg bs gur YBEQ.

3:21 Naq gur YBEQ nccrnerq ntnva va Fuvybu: sbe gur YBEQ erirnyrq
uvzfrys gb Fnzhry va Fuvybu ol gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ.

4:1 Naq gur jbeq bs Fnzhry pnzr gb nyy Vfenry. Abj Vfenry jrag bhg
ntnvafg gur Cuvyvfgvarf gb onggyr, naq cvgpurq orfvqr Rorarmre: naq
gur Cuvyvfgvarf cvgpurq va Ncurx.

4:2 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf chg gurzfryirf va neenl ntnvafg Vfenry: naq
jura gurl wbvarq onggyr, Vfenry jnf fzvggra orsber gur Cuvyvfgvarf:
naq gurl fyrj bs gur nezl va gur svryq nobhg sbhe gubhfnaq zra.

4:3 Naq jura gur crbcyr jrer pbzr vagb gur pnzc, gur ryqref bs Vfenry
fnvq, Jurersber ungu gur YBEQ fzvggra hf gb qnl orsber gur
Cuvyvfgvarf? Yrg hf srgpu gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ bhg bs
Fuvybu hagb hf, gung, jura vg pbzrgu nzbat hf, vg znl fnir hf bhg bs
gur unaq bs bhe rarzvrf.

4:4 Fb gur crbcyr frag gb Fuvybu, gung gurl zvtug oevat sebz gurapr
gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ bs ubfgf, juvpu qjryyrgu orgjrra
gur purehovzf: naq gur gjb fbaf bs Ryv, Ubcuav naq Cuvarunf, jrer
gurer jvgu gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs Tbq.

4:5 Naq jura gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ pnzr vagb gur pnzc,
nyy Vfenry fubhgrq jvgu n terng fubhg, fb gung gur rnegu enat ntnva.

4:6 Naq jura gur Cuvyvfgvarf urneq gur abvfr bs gur fubhg, gurl fnvq,
Jung zrnargu gur abvfr bs guvf terng fubhg va gur pnzc bs gur Uroerjf?
Naq gurl haqrefgbbq gung gur nex bs gur YBEQ jnf pbzr vagb gur pnzc.

4:7 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf jrer nsenvq, sbe gurl fnvq, Tbq vf pbzr vagb
gur pnzc. Naq gurl fnvq, Jbr hagb hf! sbe gurer ungu abg orra fhpu n
guvat urergbsber.

4:8 Jbr hagb hf! jub funyy qryvire hf bhg bs gur unaq bs gurfr zvtugl
Tbqf? gurfr ner gur Tbqf gung fzbgr gur Rtlcgvnaf jvgu nyy gur cynthrf
va gur jvyqrearff.

4:9 Or fgebat naq dhvg lbhefryirf yvxr zra, B lr Cuvyvfgvarf, gung lr
or abg freinagf hagb gur Uroerjf, nf gurl unir orra gb lbh: dhvg
lbhefryirf yvxr zra, naq svtug.

4:10 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf sbhtug, naq Vfenry jnf fzvggra, naq gurl syrq
rirel zna vagb uvf grag: naq gurer jnf n irel terng fynhtugre; sbe
gurer sryy bs Vfenry guvegl gubhfnaq sbbgzra.

4:11 Naq gur nex bs Tbq jnf gnxra; naq gur gjb fbaf bs Ryv, Ubcuav naq
Cuvarunf, jrer fynva.

4:12 Naq gurer ena n zna bs Orawnzva bhg bs gur nezl, naq pnzr gb
Fuvybu gur fnzr qnl jvgu uvf pybgurf erag, naq jvgu rnegu hcba uvf
urnq.

4:13 Naq jura ur pnzr, yb, Ryv fng hcba n frng ol gur jnlfvqr
jngpuvat: sbe uvf urneg gerzoyrq sbe gur nex bs Tbq. Naq jura gur zna
pnzr vagb gur pvgl, naq gbyq vg, nyy gur pvgl pevrq bhg.

4:14 Naq jura Ryv urneq gur abvfr bs gur pelvat, ur fnvq, Jung zrnargu
gur abvfr bs guvf ghzhyg? Naq gur zna pnzr va unfgvyl, naq gbyq Ryv.

4:15 Abj Ryv jnf avargl naq rvtug lrnef byq; naq uvf rlrf jrer qvz,
gung ur pbhyq abg frr.

4:16 Naq gur zna fnvq hagb Ryv, V nz ur gung pnzr bhg bs gur nezl, naq
V syrq gb qnl bhg bs gur nezl. Naq ur fnvq, Jung vf gurer qbar, zl
fba?  4:17 Naq gur zrffratre nafjrerq naq fnvq, Vfenry vf syrq orsber
gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq gurer ungu orra nyfb n terng fynhtugre nzbat gur
crbcyr, naq gul gjb fbaf nyfb, Ubcuav naq Cuvarunf, ner qrnq, naq gur
nex bs Tbq vf gnxra.

4:18 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura ur znqr zragvba bs gur nex bs Tbq, gung
ur sryy sebz bss gur frng onpxjneq ol gur fvqr bs gur tngr, naq uvf
arpx oenxr, naq ur qvrq: sbe ur jnf na byq zna, naq urnil. Naq ur unq
whqtrq Vfenry sbegl lrnef.

4:19 Naq uvf qnhtugre va ynj, Cuvarunf' jvsr, jnf jvgu puvyq, arne gb
or qryvirerq: naq jura fur urneq gur gvqvatf gung gur nex bs Tbq jnf
gnxra, naq gung ure sngure va ynj naq ure uhfonaq jrer qrnq, fur objrq
urefrys naq geninvyrq; sbe ure cnvaf pnzr hcba ure.

4:20 Naq nobhg gur gvzr bs ure qrngu gur jbzra gung fgbbq ol ure fnvq
hagb ure, Srne abg; sbe gubh unfg obea n fba. Ohg fur nafjrerq abg,
arvgure qvq fur ertneq vg.

4:21 Naq fur anzrq gur puvyq Vpunobq, fnlvat, Gur tybel vf qrcnegrq
sebz Vfenry: orpnhfr gur nex bs Tbq jnf gnxra, naq orpnhfr bs ure
sngure va ynj naq ure uhfonaq.

4:22 Naq fur fnvq, Gur tybel vf qrcnegrq sebz Vfenry: sbe gur nex bs
Tbq vf gnxra.

5:1 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf gbbx gur nex bs Tbq, naq oebhtug vg sebz
Rorarmre hagb Nfuqbq.

5:2 Jura gur Cuvyvfgvarf gbbx gur nex bs Tbq, gurl oebhtug vg vagb gur
ubhfr bs Qntba, naq frg vg ol Qntba.

5:3 Naq jura gurl bs Nfuqbq nebfr rneyl ba gur zbeebj, orubyq, Qntba
jnf snyyra hcba uvf snpr gb gur rnegu orsber gur nex bs gur YBEQ. Naq
gurl gbbx Qntba, naq frg uvz va uvf cynpr ntnva.

5:4 Naq jura gurl nebfr rneyl ba gur zbeebj zbeavat, orubyq, Qntba jnf
snyyra hcba uvf snpr gb gur tebhaq orsber gur nex bs gur YBEQ; naq gur
urnq bs Qntba naq obgu gur cnyzf bs uvf unaqf jrer phg bss hcba gur
guerfubyq; bayl gur fghzc bs Qntba jnf yrsg gb uvz.

5:5 Gurersber arvgure gur cevrfgf bs Qntba, abe nal gung pbzr vagb
Qntba'f ubhfr, gernq ba gur guerfubyq bs Qntba va Nfuqbq hagb guvf
qnl.

5:6 Ohg gur unaq bs gur YBEQ jnf urnil hcba gurz bs Nfuqbq, naq ur
qrfgeblrq gurz, naq fzbgr gurz jvgu rzrebqf, rira Nfuqbq naq gur
pbnfgf gurerbs.

5:7 Naq jura gur zra bs Nfuqbq fnj gung vg jnf fb, gurl fnvq, Gur nex
bs gur Tbq bs Vfenry funyy abg novqr jvgu hf: sbe uvf unaq vf fber
hcba hf, naq hcba Qntba bhe tbq.

5:8 Gurl frag gurersber naq tngurerq nyy gur ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf
hagb gurz, naq fnvq, Jung funyy jr qb jvgu gur nex bs gur Tbq bs
Vfenry? Naq gurl nafjrerq, Yrg gur nex bs gur Tbq bs Vfenry or pneevrq
nobhg hagb Tngu. Naq gurl pneevrq gur nex bs gur Tbq bs Vfenry nobhg
guvgure.

5:9 Naq vg jnf fb, gung, nsgre gurl unq pneevrq vg nobhg, gur unaq bs
gur YBEQ jnf ntnvafg gur pvgl jvgu n irel terng qrfgehpgvba: naq ur
fzbgr gur zra bs gur pvgl, obgu fznyy naq terng, naq gurl unq rzrebqf
va gurve frperg cnegf.

5:10 Gurersber gurl frag gur nex bs Tbq gb Rxeba. Naq vg pnzr gb cnff,
nf gur nex bs Tbq pnzr gb Rxeba, gung gur Rxebavgrf pevrq bhg, fnlvat,
Gurl unir oebhtug nobhg gur nex bs gur Tbq bs Vfenry gb hf, gb fynl hf
naq bhe crbcyr.

5:11 Fb gurl frag naq tngurerq gbtrgure nyy gur ybeqf bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, naq fnvq, Fraq njnl gur nex bs gur Tbq bs Vfenry, naq yrg
vg tb ntnva gb uvf bja cynpr, gung vg fynl hf abg, naq bhe crbcyr: sbe
gurer jnf n qrnqyl qrfgehpgvba guebhtubhg nyy gur pvgl; gur unaq bs
Tbq jnf irel urnil gurer.

5:12 Naq gur zra gung qvrq abg jrer fzvggra jvgu gur rzrebqf: naq gur
pel bs gur pvgl jrag hc gb urnira.

6:1 Naq gur nex bs gur YBEQ jnf va gur pbhagel bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf
frira zbaguf.

6:2 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf pnyyrq sbe gur cevrfgf naq gur qvivaref,
fnlvat, Jung funyy jr qb gb gur nex bs gur YBEQ? gryy hf jurerjvgu jr
funyy fraq vg gb uvf cynpr.

6:3 Naq gurl fnvq, Vs lr fraq njnl gur nex bs gur Tbq bs Vfenry, fraq
vg abg rzcgl; ohg va nal jvfr erghea uvz n gerfcnff bssrevat: gura lr
funyy or urnyrq, naq vg funyy or xabja gb lbh jul uvf unaq vf abg
erzbirq sebz lbh.

6:4 Gura fnvq gurl, Jung funyy or gur gerfcnff bssrevat juvpu jr funyy
erghea gb uvz? Gurl nafjrerq, Svir tbyqra rzrebqf, naq svir tbyqra
zvpr, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs gur ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf: sbe bar
cynthr jnf ba lbh nyy, naq ba lbhe ybeqf.

6:5 Jurersber lr funyy znxr vzntrf bs lbhe rzrebqf, naq vzntrf bs lbhe
zvpr gung zne gur ynaq; naq lr funyy tvir tybel hagb gur Tbq bs
Vfenry: crenqiragher ur jvyy yvtugra uvf unaq sebz bss lbh, naq sebz
bss lbhe tbqf, naq sebz bss lbhe ynaq.

6:6 Jurersber gura qb lr uneqra lbhe urnegf, nf gur Rtlcgvnaf naq
Cunenbu uneqrarq gurve urnegf? jura ur unq jebhtug jbaqreshyyl nzbat
gurz, qvq gurl abg yrg gur crbcyr tb, naq gurl qrcnegrq?  6:7 Abj
gurersber znxr n arj pneg, naq gnxr gjb zvypu xvar, ba juvpu gurer
ungu pbzr ab lbxr, naq gvr gur xvar gb gur pneg, naq oevat gurve
pnyirf ubzr sebz gurz: 6:8 Naq gnxr gur nex bs gur YBEQ, naq ynl vg
hcba gur pneg; naq chg gur wrjryf bs tbyq, juvpu lr erghea uvz sbe n
gerfcnff bssrevat, va n pbssre ol gur fvqr gurerbs; naq fraq vg njnl,
gung vg znl tb.

6:9 Naq frr, vs vg tbrgu hc ol gur jnl bs uvf bja pbnfg gb
Orgufurzrfu, gura ur ungu qbar hf guvf terng rivy: ohg vs abg, gura jr
funyy xabj gung vg vf abg uvf unaq gung fzbgr hf: vg jnf n punapr gung
unccrarq gb hf.

6:10 Naq gur zra qvq fb; naq gbbx gjb zvypu xvar, naq gvrq gurz gb gur
pneg, naq fuhg hc gurve pnyirf ng ubzr: 6:11 Naq gurl ynvq gur nex bs
gur YBEQ hcba gur pneg, naq gur pbssre jvgu gur zvpr bs tbyq naq gur
vzntrf bs gurve rzrebqf.

6:12 Naq gur xvar gbbx gur fgenvtug jnl gb gur jnl bs Orgufurzrfu, naq
jrag nybat gur uvtujnl, ybjvat nf gurl jrag, naq ghearq abg nfvqr gb
gur evtug unaq be gb gur yrsg; naq gur ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf jrag
nsgre gurz hagb gur obeqre bs Orgufurzrfu.

6:13 Naq gurl bs Orgufurzrfu jrer erncvat gurve jurng uneirfg va gur
inyyrl: naq gurl yvsgrq hc gurve rlrf, naq fnj gur nex, naq erwbvprq
gb frr vg.

6:14 Naq gur pneg pnzr vagb gur svryq bs Wbfuhn, n Orgufurzvgr, naq
fgbbq gurer, jurer gurer jnf n terng fgbar: naq gurl pynir gur jbbq bs
gur pneg, naq bssrerq gur xvar n oheag bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ.

6:15 Naq gur Yrivgrf gbbx qbja gur nex bs gur YBEQ, naq gur pbssre
gung jnf jvgu vg, jurerva gur wrjryf bs tbyq jrer, naq chg gurz ba gur
terng fgbar: naq gur zra bs Orgufurzrfu bssrerq oheag bssrevatf naq
fnpevsvprq fnpevsvprf gur fnzr qnl hagb gur YBEQ.

6:16 Naq jura gur svir ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf unq frra vg, gurl
erghearq gb Rxeba gur fnzr qnl.

6:17 Naq gurfr ner gur tbyqra rzrebqf juvpu gur Cuvyvfgvarf erghearq
sbe n gerfcnff bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ; sbe Nfuqbq bar, sbe Tnmn bar,
sbe Nfxryba bar, sbe Tngu bar, sbe Rxeba bar; 6:18 Naq gur tbyqra
zvpr, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs nyy gur pvgvrf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf
orybatvat gb gur svir ybeqf, obgu bs sraprq pvgvrf, naq bs pbhagel
ivyyntrf, rira hagb gur terng fgbar bs Nory, jurerba gurl frg qbja gur
nex bs gur YBEQ: juvpu fgbar erznvargu hagb guvf qnl va gur svryq bs
Wbfuhn, gur Orgufurzvgr.

6:19 Naq ur fzbgr gur zra bs Orgufurzrfu, orpnhfr gurl unq ybbxrq vagb
gur nex bs gur YBEQ, rira ur fzbgr bs gur crbcyr svsgl gubhfnaq naq
guerrfpber naq gra zra: naq gur crbcyr ynzragrq, orpnhfr gur YBEQ unq
fzvggra znal bs gur crbcyr jvgu n terng fynhtugre.

6:20 Naq gur zra bs Orgufurzrfu fnvq, Jub vf noyr gb fgnaq orsber guvf
ubyl YBEQ Tbq? naq gb jubz funyy ur tb hc sebz hf?  6:21 Naq gurl frag
zrffratref gb gur vaunovgnagf bs Xvewnguwrnevz, fnlvat, Gur
Cuvyvfgvarf unir oebhtug ntnva gur nex bs gur YBEQ; pbzr lr qbja, naq
srgpu vg hc gb lbh.

7:1 Naq gur zra bs Xvewnguwrnevz pnzr, naq srgpurq hc gur nex bs gur
YBEQ, naq oebhtug vg vagb gur ubhfr bs Novanqno va gur uvyy, naq
fnapgvsvrq Ryrnmne uvf fba gb xrrc gur nex bs gur YBEQ.

7:2 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, juvyr gur nex nobqr va Xvewnguwrnevz, gung
gur gvzr jnf ybat; sbe vg jnf gjragl lrnef: naq nyy gur ubhfr bs
Vfenry ynzragrq nsgre gur YBEQ.

7:3 Naq Fnzhry fcnxr hagb nyy gur ubhfr bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Vs lr qb
