erghea hagb gur YBEQ jvgu nyy lbhe urnegf, gura chg njnl gur fgenatr
tbqf naq Nfugnebgu sebz nzbat lbh, naq cercner lbhe urnegf hagb gur
YBEQ, naq freir uvz bayl: naq ur jvyy qryvire lbh bhg bs gur unaq bs
gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

7:4 Gura gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq chg njnl Onnyvz naq Nfugnebgu, naq
freirq gur YBEQ bayl.

7:5 Naq Fnzhry fnvq, Tngure nyy Vfenry gb Zvmcru, naq V jvyy cenl sbe
lbh hagb gur YBEQ.

7:6 Naq gurl tngurerq gbtrgure gb Zvmcru, naq qerj jngre, naq cbherq
vg bhg orsber gur YBEQ, naq snfgrq ba gung qnl, naq fnvq gurer, Jr
unir fvaarq ntnvafg gur YBEQ. Naq Fnzhry whqtrq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
va Zvmcru.

7:7 Naq jura gur Cuvyvfgvarf urneq gung gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrer
tngurerq gbtrgure gb Zvmcru, gur ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf jrag hc
ntnvafg Vfenry. Naq jura gur puvyqera bs Vfenry urneq vg, gurl jrer
nsenvq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

7:8 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fnvq gb Fnzhry, Prnfr abg gb pel hagb
gur YBEQ bhe Tbq sbe hf, gung ur jvyy fnir hf bhg bs gur unaq bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf.

7:9 Naq Fnzhry gbbx n fhpxvat ynzo, naq bssrerq vg sbe n oheag
bssrevat jubyyl hagb gur YBEQ: naq Fnzhry pevrq hagb gur YBEQ sbe
Vfenry; naq gur YBEQ urneq uvz.

7:10 Naq nf Fnzhry jnf bssrevat hc gur oheag bssrevat, gur Cuvyvfgvarf
qerj arne gb onggyr ntnvafg Vfenry: ohg gur YBEQ guhaqrerq jvgu n
terng guhaqre ba gung qnl hcba gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq qvfpbzsvgrq gurz;
naq gurl jrer fzvggra orsber Vfenry.

7:11 Naq gur zra bs Vfenry jrag bhg bs Zvmcru, naq chefhrq gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, naq fzbgr gurz, hagvy gurl pnzr haqre Orgupne.

7:12 Gura Fnzhry gbbx n fgbar, naq frg vg orgjrra Zvmcru naq Fura, naq
pnyyrq gur anzr bs vg Rorarmre, fnlvat, Uvguregb ungu gur YBEQ urycrq
hf.

7:13 Fb gur Cuvyvfgvarf jrer fhoqhrq, naq gurl pnzr ab zber vagb gur
pbnfg bs Vfenry: naq gur unaq bs gur YBEQ jnf ntnvafg gur Cuvyvfgvarf
nyy gur qnlf bs Fnzhry.

7:14 Naq gur pvgvrf juvpu gur Cuvyvfgvarf unq gnxra sebz Vfenry jrer
erfgberq gb Vfenry, sebz Rxeba rira hagb Tngu; naq gur pbnfgf gurerbs
qvq Vfenry qryvire bhg bs gur unaqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf. Naq gurer jnf
crnpr orgjrra Vfenry naq gur Nzbevgrf.

7:15 Naq Fnzhry whqtrq Vfenry nyy gur qnlf bs uvf yvsr.

7:16 Naq ur jrag sebz lrne gb lrne va pvephvg gb Orgury, naq Tvytny,
naq Zvmcru, naq whqtrq Vfenry va nyy gubfr cynprf.

7:17 Naq uvf erghea jnf gb Enznu; sbe gurer jnf uvf ubhfr; naq gurer
ur whqtrq Vfenry; naq gurer ur ohvyg na nygne hagb gur YBEQ.

8:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Fnzhry jnf byq, gung ur znqr uvf fbaf
whqtrf bire Vfenry.

8:2 Abj gur anzr bs uvf svefgobea jnf Wbry; naq gur anzr bs uvf
frpbaq, Novnu: gurl jrer whqtrf va Orrefuron.

8:3 Naq uvf fbaf jnyxrq abg va uvf jnlf, ohg ghearq nfvqr nsgre yhper,
naq gbbx oevorf, naq creiregrq whqtzrag.

8:4 Gura nyy gur ryqref bs Vfenry tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure, naq
pnzr gb Fnzhry hagb Enznu, 8:5 Naq fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq, gubh neg
byq, naq gul fbaf jnyx abg va gul jnlf: abj znxr hf n xvat gb whqtr hf
yvxr nyy gur angvbaf.

8:6 Ohg gur guvat qvfcyrnfrq Fnzhry, jura gurl fnvq, Tvir hf n xvat gb
whqtr hf. Naq Fnzhry cenlrq hagb gur YBEQ.

8:7 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Fnzhry, Urnexra hagb gur ibvpr bs gur
crbcyr va nyy gung gurl fnl hagb gurr: sbe gurl unir abg erwrpgrq
gurr, ohg gurl unir erwrpgrq zr, gung V fubhyq abg ervta bire gurz.

8:8 Nppbeqvat gb nyy gur jbexf juvpu gurl unir qbar fvapr gur qnl gung
V oebhtug gurz hc bhg bs Rtlcg rira hagb guvf qnl, jurerjvgu gurl unir
sbefnxra zr, naq freirq bgure tbqf, fb qb gurl nyfb hagb gurr.

8:9 Abj gurersber urnexra hagb gurve ibvpr: ubjorvg lrg cebgrfg
fbyrzayl hagb gurz, naq furj gurz gur znaare bs gur xvat gung funyy
ervta bire gurz.

8:10 Naq Fnzhry gbyq nyy gur jbeqf bs gur YBEQ hagb gur crbcyr gung
nfxrq bs uvz n xvat.

8:11 Naq ur fnvq, Guvf jvyy or gur znaare bs gur xvat gung funyy ervta
bire lbh: Ur jvyy gnxr lbhe fbaf, naq nccbvag gurz sbe uvzfrys, sbe
uvf punevbgf, naq gb or uvf ubefrzra; naq fbzr funyy eha orsber uvf
punevbgf.

8:12 Naq ur jvyy nccbvag uvz pncgnvaf bire gubhfnaqf, naq pncgnvaf
bire svsgvrf; naq jvyy frg gurz gb rne uvf tebhaq, naq gb ernc uvf
uneirfg, naq gb znxr uvf vafgehzragf bs jne, naq vafgehzragf bs uvf
punevbgf.

8:13 Naq ur jvyy gnxr lbhe qnhtugref gb or pbasrpgvbanevrf, naq gb or
pbbxf, naq gb or onxref.

8:14 Naq ur jvyy gnxr lbhe svryqf, naq lbhe ivarlneqf, naq lbhe
byvirlneqf, rira gur orfg bs gurz, naq tvir gurz gb uvf freinagf.

8:15 Naq ur jvyy gnxr gur gragu bs lbhe frrq, naq bs lbhe ivarlneqf,
naq tvir gb uvf bssvpref, naq gb uvf freinagf.

8:16 Naq ur jvyy gnxr lbhe zrafreinagf, naq lbhe znvqfreinagf, naq
lbhe tbbqyvrfg lbhat zra, naq lbhe nffrf, naq chg gurz gb uvf jbex.

8:17 Ur jvyy gnxr gur gragu bs lbhe furrc: naq lr funyy or uvf
freinagf.

8:18 Naq lr funyy pel bhg va gung qnl orpnhfr bs lbhe xvat juvpu lr
funyy unir pubfra lbh; naq gur YBEQ jvyy abg urne lbh va gung qnl.

8:19 Arireguryrff gur crbcyr ershfrq gb borl gur ibvpr bs Fnzhry; naq
gurl fnvq, Anl; ohg jr jvyy unir n xvat bire hf; 8:20 Gung jr nyfb znl
or yvxr nyy gur angvbaf; naq gung bhe xvat znl whqtr hf, naq tb bhg
orsber hf, naq svtug bhe onggyrf.

8:21 Naq Fnzhry urneq nyy gur jbeqf bs gur crbcyr, naq ur erurnefrq
gurz va gur rnef bs gur YBEQ.

8:22 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq gb Fnzhry, Urnexra hagb gurve ibvpr, naq znxr
gurz n xvat. Naq Fnzhry fnvq hagb gur zra bs Vfenry, Tb lr rirel zna
hagb uvf pvgl.

9:1 Abj gurer jnf n zna bs Orawnzva, jubfr anzr jnf Xvfu, gur fba bs
Novry, gur fba bs Mrebe, gur fba bs Orpubengu, gur fba bs Ncuvnu, n
Orawnzvgr, n zvtugl zna bs cbjre.

9:2 Naq ur unq n fba, jubfr anzr jnf Fnhy, n pubvpr lbhat zna, naq n
tbbqyl: naq gurer jnf abg nzbat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry n tbbqyvre
crefba guna ur: sebz uvf fubhyqref naq hcjneq ur jnf uvture guna nal
bs gur crbcyr.

9:3 Naq gur nffrf bs Xvfu Fnhy'f sngure jrer ybfg. Naq Xvfu fnvq gb
Fnhy uvf fba, Gnxr abj bar bs gur freinagf jvgu gurr, naq nevfr, tb
frrx gur nffrf.

9:4 Naq ur cnffrq guebhtu zbhag Rcuenvz, naq cnffrq guebhtu gur ynaq
bs Funyvfun, ohg gurl sbhaq gurz abg: gura gurl cnffrq guebhtu gur
ynaq bs Funyvz, naq gurer gurl jrer abg: naq ur cnffrq guebhtu gur
ynaq bs gur Orawnzvgrf, ohg gurl sbhaq gurz abg.

9:5 Naq jura gurl jrer pbzr gb gur ynaq bs Mhcu, Fnhy fnvq gb uvf
freinag gung jnf jvgu uvz, Pbzr, naq yrg hf erghea; yrfg zl sngure
yrnir pnevat sbe gur nffrf, naq gnxr gubhtug sbe hf.

9:6 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq abj, gurer vf va guvf pvgl n zna bs
Tbq, naq ur vf na ubabhenoyr zna; nyy gung ur fnvgu pbzrgu fheryl gb
cnff: abj yrg hf tb guvgure; crenqiragher ur pna furj hf bhe jnl gung
jr fubhyq tb.

9:7 Gura fnvq Fnhy gb uvf freinag, Ohg, orubyq, vs jr tb, jung funyy
jr oevat gur zna? sbe gur oernq vf fcrag va bhe irffryf, naq gurer vf
abg n cerfrag gb oevat gb gur zna bs Tbq: jung unir jr?  9:8 Naq gur
freinag nafjrerq Fnhy ntnva, naq fnvq, Orubyq, V unir urer ng unaq gur
sbhegu cneg bs n furxry bs fvyire: gung jvyy V tvir gb gur zna bs Tbq,
gb gryy hf bhe jnl.

9:9 (Orsbergvzr va Vfenry, jura n zna jrag gb radhver bs Tbq, guhf ur
fcnxr, Pbzr, naq yrg hf tb gb gur frre: sbe ur gung vf abj pnyyrq n
Cebcurg jnf orsbergvzr pnyyrq n Frre.)  9:10 Gura fnvq Fnhy gb uvf
freinag, Jryy fnvq; pbzr, yrg hf tb. Fb gurl jrag hagb gur pvgl jurer
gur zna bs Tbq jnf.

9:11 Naq nf gurl jrag hc gur uvyy gb gur pvgl, gurl sbhaq lbhat
znvqraf tbvat bhg gb qenj jngre, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Vf gur frre urer?
9:12 Naq gurl nafjrerq gurz, naq fnvq, Ur vf; orubyq, ur vf orsber
lbh: znxr unfgr abj, sbe ur pnzr gb qnl gb gur pvgl; sbe gurer vf n
fnpevsvpr bs gur crbcyr gb qnl va gur uvtu cynpr: 9:13 Nf fbba nf lr
or pbzr vagb gur pvgl, lr funyy fgenvtugjnl svaq uvz, orsber ur tb hc
gb gur uvtu cynpr gb rng: sbe gur crbcyr jvyy abg rng hagvy ur pbzr,
orpnhfr ur qbgu oyrff gur fnpevsvpr; naq nsgrejneqf gurl rng gung or
ovqqra. Abj gurersber trg lbh hc; sbe nobhg guvf gvzr lr funyy svaq
uvz.

9:14 Naq gurl jrag hc vagb gur pvgl: naq jura gurl jrer pbzr vagb gur
pvgl, orubyq, Fnzhry pnzr bhg ntnvafg gurz, sbe gb tb hc gb gur uvtu
cynpr.

9:15 Abj gur YBEQ unq gbyq Fnzhry va uvf rne n qnl orsber Fnhy pnzr,
fnlvat, 9:16 Gb zbeebj nobhg guvf gvzr V jvyy fraq gurr n zna bhg bs
gur ynaq bs Orawnzva, naq gubh funyg nabvag uvz gb or pncgnva bire zl
crbcyr Vfenry, gung ur znl fnir zl crbcyr bhg bs gur unaq bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf: sbe V unir ybbxrq hcba zl crbcyr, orpnhfr gurve pel vf
pbzr hagb zr.

9:17 Naq jura Fnzhry fnj Fnhy, gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq gur zna
jubz V fcnxr gb gurr bs! guvf fnzr funyy ervta bire zl crbcyr.

9:18 Gura Fnhy qerj arne gb Fnzhry va gur tngr, naq fnvq, Gryy zr, V
cenl gurr, jurer gur frre'f ubhfr vf.

9:19 Naq Fnzhry nafjrerq Fnhy, naq fnvq, V nz gur frre: tb hc orsber
zr hagb gur uvtu cynpr; sbe lr funyy rng jvgu zr gb qnl, naq gb zbeebj
V jvyy yrg gurr tb, naq jvyy gryy gurr nyy gung vf va guvar urneg.

9:20 Naq nf sbe guvar nffrf gung jrer ybfg guerr qnlf ntb, frg abg gul
zvaq ba gurz; sbe gurl ner sbhaq. Naq ba jubz vf nyy gur qrfver bs
Vfenry? Vf vg abg ba gurr, naq ba nyy gul sngure'f ubhfr?  9:21 Naq
Fnhy nafjrerq naq fnvq, Nz abg V n Orawnzvgr, bs gur fznyyrfg bs gur
gevorf bs Vfenry? naq zl snzvyl gur yrnfg bs nyy gur snzvyvrf bs gur
gevor bs Orawnzva? jurersber gura fcrnxrfg gubh fb gb zr?  9:22 Naq
Fnzhry gbbx Fnhy naq uvf freinag, naq oebhtug gurz vagb gur cneybhe,
naq znqr gurz fvg va gur puvrsrfg cynpr nzbat gurz gung jrer ovqqra,
juvpu jrer nobhg guvegl crefbaf.

9:23 Naq Fnzhry fnvq hagb gur pbbx, Oevat gur cbegvba juvpu V tnir
gurr, bs juvpu V fnvq hagb gurr, Frg vg ol gurr.

9:24 Naq gur pbbx gbbx hc gur fubhyqre, naq gung juvpu jnf hcba vg,
naq frg vg orsber Fnhy. Naq Fnzhry fnvq, Orubyq gung juvpu vf yrsg!
frg vg orsber gurr, naq rng: sbe hagb guvf gvzr ungu vg orra xrcg sbe
gurr fvapr V fnvq, V unir vaivgrq gur crbcyr. Fb Fnhy qvq rng jvgu
Fnzhry gung qnl.

9:25 Naq jura gurl jrer pbzr qbja sebz gur uvtu cynpr vagb gur pvgl,
Fnzhry pbzzharq jvgu Fnhy hcba gur gbc bs gur ubhfr.

9:26 Naq gurl nebfr rneyl: naq vg pnzr gb cnff nobhg gur fcevat bs gur
qnl, gung Fnzhry pnyyrq Fnhy gb gur gbc bs gur ubhfr, fnlvat, Hc, gung
V znl fraq gurr njnl. Naq Fnhy nebfr, naq gurl jrag bhg obgu bs gurz,
ur naq Fnzhry, noebnq.

9:27 Naq nf gurl jrer tbvat qbja gb gur raq bs gur pvgl, Fnzhry fnvq
gb Fnhy, Ovq gur freinag cnff ba orsber hf, (naq ur cnffrq ba), ohg
fgnaq gubh fgvyy n juvyr, gung V znl furj gurr gur jbeq bs Tbq.

10:1 Gura Fnzhry gbbx n ivny bs bvy, naq cbherq vg hcba uvf urnq, naq
xvffrq uvz, naq fnvq, Vf vg abg orpnhfr gur YBEQ ungu nabvagrq gurr gb
or pncgnva bire uvf vaurevgnapr?  10:2 Jura gubh neg qrcnegrq sebz zr
gb qnl, gura gubh funyg svaq gjb zra ol Enpury'f frchypuer va gur
obeqre bs Orawnzva ng Mrymnu; naq gurl jvyy fnl hagb gurr, Gur nffrf
juvpu gubh jragrfg gb frrx ner sbhaq: naq, yb, gul sngure ungu yrsg
gur pner bs gur nffrf, naq fbeebjrgu sbe lbh, fnlvat, Jung funyy V qb
sbe zl fba?  10:3 Gura funyg gubh tb ba sbejneq sebz gurapr, naq gubh
funyg pbzr gb gur cynva bs Gnobe, naq gurer funyy zrrg gurr guerr zra
tbvat hc gb Tbq gb Orgury, bar pneelvat guerr xvqf, naq nabgure
pneelvat guerr ybnirf bs oernq, naq nabgure pneelvat n obggyr bs jvar:
10:4 Naq gurl jvyy fnyhgr gurr, naq tvir gurr gjb ybnirf bs oernq;
juvpu gubh funyg erprvir bs gurve unaqf.

10:5 Nsgre gung gubh funyg pbzr gb gur uvyy bs Tbq, jurer vf gur
tneevfba bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf: naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura gubh neg
pbzr guvgure gb gur pvgl, gung gubh funyg zrrg n pbzcnal bs cebcurgf
pbzvat qbja sebz gur uvtu cynpr jvgu n cfnygrel, naq n gnoerg, naq n
cvcr, naq n unec, orsber gurz; naq gurl funyy cebcurfl: 10:6 Naq gur
Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ jvyy pbzr hcba gurr, naq gubh funyg cebcurfl jvgu
gurz, naq funyg or ghearq vagb nabgure zna.

10:7 Naq yrg vg or, jura gurfr fvtaf ner pbzr hagb gurr, gung gubh qb
nf bppnfvba freir gurr; sbe Tbq vf jvgu gurr.

10:8 Naq gubh funyg tb qbja orsber zr gb Tvytny; naq, orubyq, V jvyy
pbzr qbja hagb gurr, gb bssre oheag bssrevatf, naq gb fnpevsvpr
fnpevsvprf bs crnpr bssrevatf: frira qnlf funyg gubh gneel, gvyy V
pbzr gb gurr, naq furj gurr jung gubh funyg qb.

10:9 Naq vg jnf fb, gung jura ur unq ghearq uvf onpx gb tb sebz
Fnzhry, Tbq tnir uvz nabgure urneg: naq nyy gubfr fvtaf pnzr gb cnff
gung qnl.

10:10 Naq jura gurl pnzr guvgure gb gur uvyy, orubyq, n pbzcnal bs
cebcurgf zrg uvz; naq gur Fcvevg bs Tbq pnzr hcba uvz, naq ur
cebcurfvrq nzbat gurz.

10:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura nyy gung xarj uvz orsbergvzr fnj gung,
orubyq, ur cebcurfvrq nzbat gur cebcurgf, gura gur crbcyr fnvq bar gb
nabgure, Jung vf guvf gung vf pbzr hagb gur fba bs Xvfu? Vf Fnhy nyfb
nzbat gur cebcurgf?  10:12 Naq bar bs gur fnzr cynpr nafjrerq naq
fnvq, Ohg jub vf gurve sngure? Gurersber vg orpnzr n cebireo, Vf Fnhy
nyfb nzbat gur cebcurgf?  10:13 Naq jura ur unq znqr na raq bs
cebcurflvat, ur pnzr gb gur uvtu cynpr.

10:14 Naq Fnhy'f hapyr fnvq hagb uvz naq gb uvf freinag, Juvgure jrag
lr?  Naq ur fnvq, Gb frrx gur nffrf: naq jura jr fnj gung gurl jrer ab
jurer, jr pnzr gb Fnzhry.

10:15 Naq Fnhy'f hapyr fnvq, Gryy zr, V cenl gurr, jung Fnzhry fnvq
hagb lbh.

10:16 Naq Fnhy fnvq hagb uvf hapyr, Ur gbyq hf cynvayl gung gur nffrf
jrer sbhaq. Ohg bs gur znggre bs gur xvatqbz, jurerbs Fnzhry fcnxr, ur
gbyq uvz abg.

10:17 Naq Fnzhry pnyyrq gur crbcyr gbtrgure hagb gur YBEQ gb Zvmcru;
10:18 Naq fnvq hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs
Vfenry, V oebhtug hc Vfenry bhg bs Rtlcg, naq qryvirerq lbh bhg bs gur
unaq bs gur Rtlcgvnaf, naq bhg bs gur unaq bs nyy xvatqbzf, naq bs
gurz gung bccerffrq lbh: 10:19 Naq lr unir guvf qnl erwrpgrq lbhe Tbq,
jub uvzfrys fnirq lbh bhg bs nyy lbhe nqirefvgvrf naq lbhe
gevohyngvbaf; naq lr unir fnvq hagb uvz, Anl, ohg frg n xvat bire hf.
Abj gurersber cerfrag lbhefryirf orsber gur YBEQ ol lbhe gevorf, naq
ol lbhe gubhfnaqf.

10:20 Naq jura Fnzhry unq pnhfrq nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry gb pbzr
arne, gur gevor bs Orawnzva jnf gnxra.

10:21 Jura ur unq pnhfrq gur gevor bs Orawnzva gb pbzr arne ol gurve
snzvyvrf, gur snzvyl bs Zngev jnf gnxra, naq Fnhy gur fba bs Xvfu jnf
gnxra: naq jura gurl fbhtug uvz, ur pbhyq abg or sbhaq.

10:22 Gurersber gurl radhverq bs gur YBEQ shegure, vs gur zna fubhyq
lrg pbzr guvgure. Naq gur YBEQ nafjrerq, Orubyq ur ungu uvq uvzfrys
nzbat gur fghss.

10:23 Naq gurl ena naq srgpurq uvz gurapr: naq jura ur fgbbq nzbat gur
crbcyr, ur jnf uvture guna nal bs gur crbcyr sebz uvf fubhyqref naq
hcjneq.

10:24 Naq Fnzhry fnvq gb nyy gur crbcyr, Frr lr uvz jubz gur YBEQ ungu
pubfra, gung gurer vf abar yvxr uvz nzbat nyy gur crbcyr? Naq nyy gur
crbcyr fubhgrq, naq fnvq, Tbq fnir gur xvat.

10:25 Gura Fnzhry gbyq gur crbcyr gur znaare bs gur xvatqbz, naq jebgr
vg va n obbx, naq ynvq vg hc orsber gur YBEQ. Naq Fnzhry frag nyy gur
crbcyr njnl, rirel zna gb uvf ubhfr.

10:26 Naq Fnhy nyfb jrag ubzr gb Tvornu; naq gurer jrag jvgu uvz n
onaq bs zra, jubfr urnegf Tbq unq gbhpurq.

10:27 Ohg gur puvyqera bs Oryvny fnvq, Ubj funyy guvf zna fnir hf? Naq
gurl qrfcvfrq uvz, naq oebhtug ab cerfragf. Ohg ur uryq uvf crnpr.

11:1 Gura Anunfu gur Nzzbavgr pnzr hc, naq rapnzcrq ntnvafg
Wnorfutvyrnq: naq nyy gur zra bs Wnorfu fnvq hagb Anunfu, Znxr n
pbiranag jvgu hf, naq jr jvyy freir gurr.

11:2 Naq Anunfu gur Nzzbavgr nafjrerq gurz, Ba guvf pbaqvgvba jvyy V
znxr n pbiranag jvgu lbh, gung V znl guehfg bhg nyy lbhe evtug rlrf,
naq ynl vg sbe n ercebnpu hcba nyy Vfenry.

11:3 Naq gur ryqref bs Wnorfu fnvq hagb uvz, Tvir hf frira qnlf'
erfcvgr, gung jr znl fraq zrffratref hagb nyy gur pbnfgf bs Vfenry:
naq gura, vs gurer or ab zna gb fnir hf, jr jvyy pbzr bhg gb gurr.

11:4 Gura pnzr gur zrffratref gb Tvornu bs Fnhy, naq gbyq gur gvqvatf
va gur rnef bs gur crbcyr: naq nyy gur crbcyr yvsgrq hc gurve ibvprf,
naq jrcg.

11:5 Naq, orubyq, Fnhy pnzr nsgre gur ureq bhg bs gur svryq; naq Fnhy
fnvq, Jung nvyrgu gur crbcyr gung gurl jrrc? Naq gurl gbyq uvz gur
gvqvatf bs gur zra bs Wnorfu.

11:6 Naq gur Fcvevg bs Tbq pnzr hcba Fnhy jura ur urneq gubfr gvqvatf,
naq uvf natre jnf xvaqyrq terngyl.

11:7 Naq ur gbbx n lbxr bs bkra, naq urjrq gurz va cvrprf, naq frag
gurz guebhtubhg nyy gur pbnfgf bs Vfenry ol gur unaqf bs zrffratref,
fnlvat, Jubfbrire pbzrgu abg sbegu nsgre Fnhy naq nsgre Fnzhry, fb
funyy vg or qbar hagb uvf bkra. Naq gur srne bs gur YBEQ sryy ba gur
crbcyr, naq gurl pnzr bhg jvgu bar pbafrag.

11:8 Naq jura ur ahzorerq gurz va Ormrx, gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrer
guerr uhaqerq gubhfnaq, naq gur zra bs Whqnu guvegl gubhfnaq.

11:9 Naq gurl fnvq hagb gur zrffratref gung pnzr, Guhf funyy lr fnl
hagb gur zra bs Wnorfutvyrnq, Gb zbeebj, ol gung gvzr gur fha or ubg,
lr funyy unir uryc. Naq gur zrffratref pnzr naq furjrq vg gb gur zra
bs Wnorfu; naq gurl jrer tynq.

11:10 Gurersber gur zra bs Wnorfu fnvq, Gb zbeebj jr jvyy pbzr bhg
hagb lbh, naq lr funyy qb jvgu hf nyy gung frrzrgu tbbq hagb lbh.

11:11 Naq vg jnf fb ba gur zbeebj, gung Fnhy chg gur crbcyr va guerr
pbzcnavrf; naq gurl pnzr vagb gur zvqfg bs gur ubfg va gur zbeavat
jngpu, naq fyrj gur Nzzbavgrf hagvy gur urng bs gur qnl: naq vg pnzr
gb cnff, gung gurl juvpu erznvarq jrer fpnggrerq, fb gung gjb bs gurz
jrer abg yrsg gbtrgure.

11:12 Naq gur crbcyr fnvq hagb Fnzhry, Jub vf ur gung fnvq, Funyy Fnhy
ervta bire hf? oevat gur zra, gung jr znl chg gurz gb qrngu.

11:13 Naq Fnhy fnvq, Gurer funyy abg n zna or chg gb qrngu guvf qnl:
sbe gb qnl gur YBEQ ungu jebhtug fnyingvba va Vfenry.

11:14 Gura fnvq Fnzhry gb gur crbcyr, Pbzr, naq yrg hf tb gb Tvytny,
naq erarj gur xvatqbz gurer.

11:15 Naq nyy gur crbcyr jrag gb Tvytny; naq gurer gurl znqr Fnhy xvat
orsber gur YBEQ va Tvytny; naq gurer gurl fnpevsvprq fnpevsvprf bs
crnpr bssrevatf orsber gur YBEQ; naq gurer Fnhy naq nyy gur zra bs
Vfenry erwbvprq terngyl.

12:1 Naq Fnzhry fnvq hagb nyy Vfenry, Orubyq, V unir urnexrarq hagb
lbhe ibvpr va nyy gung lr fnvq hagb zr, naq unir znqr n xvat bire lbh.

12:2 Naq abj, orubyq, gur xvat jnyxrgu orsber lbh: naq V nz byq naq
tenlurnqrq; naq, orubyq, zl fbaf ner jvgu lbh: naq V unir jnyxrq
orsber lbh sebz zl puvyqubbq hagb guvf qnl.

12:3 Orubyq, urer V nz: jvgarff ntnvafg zr orsber gur YBEQ, naq orsber
uvf nabvagrq: jubfr bk unir V gnxra? be jubfr nff unir V gnxra? be
jubz unir V qrsenhqrq? jubz unir V bccerffrq? be bs jubfr unaq unir V
erprvirq nal oevor gb oyvaq zvar rlrf gurerjvgu? naq V jvyy erfgber vg
lbh.

12:4 Naq gurl fnvq, Gubh unfg abg qrsenhqrq hf, abe bccerffrq hf,
arvgure unfg gubh gnxra bhtug bs nal zna'f unaq.

12:5 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Gur YBEQ vf jvgarff ntnvafg lbh, naq uvf
nabvagrq vf jvgarff guvf qnl, gung lr unir abg sbhaq bhtug va zl unaq.
Naq gurl nafjrerq, Ur vf jvgarff.

12:6 Naq Fnzhry fnvq hagb gur crbcyr, Vg vf gur YBEQ gung nqinaprq
Zbfrf naq Nneba, naq gung oebhtug lbhe snguref hc bhg bs gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg.

12:7 Abj gurersber fgnaq fgvyy, gung V znl ernfba jvgu lbh orsber gur
YBEQ bs nyy gur evtugrbhf npgf bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur qvq gb lbh naq gb
lbhe snguref.

12:8 Jura Wnpbo jnf pbzr vagb Rtlcg, naq lbhe snguref pevrq hagb gur
YBEQ, gura gur YBEQ frag Zbfrf naq Nneba, juvpu oebhtug sbegu lbhe
snguref bhg bs Rtlcg, naq znqr gurz qjryy va guvf cynpr.

12:9 Naq jura gurl sbetng gur YBEQ gurve Tbq, ur fbyq gurz vagb gur
unaq bs Fvfren, pncgnva bs gur ubfg bs Unmbe, naq vagb gur unaq bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, naq vagb gur unaq bs gur xvat bs Zbno, naq gurl sbhtug
ntnvafg gurz.

12:10 Naq gurl pevrq hagb gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, Jr unir fvaarq, orpnhfr
jr unir sbefnxra gur YBEQ, naq unir freirq Onnyvz naq Nfugnebgu: ohg
abj qryvire hf bhg bs gur unaq bs bhe rarzvrf, naq jr jvyy freir gurr.

12:11 Naq gur YBEQ frag Wrehoonny, naq Orqna, naq Wrcugunu, naq
Fnzhry, naq qryvirerq lbh bhg bs gur unaq bs lbhe rarzvrf ba rirel
fvqr, naq lr qjryyrq fnsr.

12:12 Naq jura lr fnj gung Anunfu gur xvat bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba
pnzr ntnvafg lbh, lr fnvq hagb zr, Anl; ohg n xvat funyy ervta bire
hf: jura gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq jnf lbhe xvat.

12:13 Abj gurersber orubyq gur xvat jubz lr unir pubfra, naq jubz lr
unir qrfverq! naq, orubyq, gur YBEQ ungu frg n xvat bire lbh.

12:14 Vs lr jvyy srne gur YBEQ, naq freir uvz, naq borl uvf ibvpr, naq
abg erory ntnvafg gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ, gura funyy obgu lr naq
nyfb gur xvat gung ervtargu bire lbh pbagvahr sbyybjvat gur YBEQ lbhe
Tbq: 12:15 Ohg vs lr jvyy abg borl gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ, ohg erory
ntnvafg gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ, gura funyy gur unaq bs gur YBEQ
or ntnvafg lbh, nf vg jnf ntnvafg lbhe snguref.

12:16 Abj gurersber fgnaq naq frr guvf terng guvat, juvpu gur YBEQ
jvyy qb orsber lbhe rlrf.

12:17 Vf vg abg jurng uneirfg gb qnl? V jvyy pnyy hagb gur YBEQ, naq
ur funyy fraq guhaqre naq enva; gung lr znl creprvir naq frr gung lbhe
jvpxrqarff vf terng, juvpu lr unir qbar va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, va
nfxvat lbh n xvat.

12:18 Fb Fnzhry pnyyrq hagb gur YBEQ; naq gur YBEQ frag guhaqre naq
enva gung qnl: naq nyy gur crbcyr terngyl srnerq gur YBEQ naq Fnzhry.

12:19 Naq nyy gur crbcyr fnvq hagb Fnzhry, Cenl sbe gul freinagf hagb
gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gung jr qvr abg: sbe jr unir nqqrq hagb nyy bhe fvaf
guvf rivy, gb nfx hf n xvat.

12:20 Naq Fnzhry fnvq hagb gur crbcyr, Srne abg: lr unir qbar nyy guvf
jvpxrqarff: lrg ghea abg nfvqr sebz sbyybjvat gur YBEQ, ohg freir gur
YBEQ jvgu nyy lbhe urneg; 12:21 Naq ghea lr abg nfvqr: sbe gura fubhyq
lr tb nsgre inva guvatf, juvpu pnaabg cebsvg abe qryvire; sbe gurl ner
inva.

12:22 Sbe gur YBEQ jvyy abg sbefnxr uvf crbcyr sbe uvf terng anzr'f
fnxr: orpnhfr vg ungu cyrnfrq gur YBEQ gb znxr lbh uvf crbcyr.

12:23 Zberbire nf sbe zr, Tbq sbeovq gung V fubhyq fva ntnvafg gur
YBEQ va prnfvat gb cenl sbe lbh: ohg V jvyy grnpu lbh gur tbbq naq gur
evtug jnl: 12:24 Bayl srne gur YBEQ, naq freir uvz va gehgu jvgu nyy
lbhe urneg: sbe pbafvqre ubj terng guvatf ur ungu qbar sbe lbh.

12:25 Ohg vs lr funyy fgvyy qb jvpxrqyl, lr funyy or pbafhzrq, obgu lr
naq lbhe xvat.

13:1 Fnhy ervtarq bar lrne; naq jura ur unq ervtarq gjb lrnef bire
Vfenry, 13:2 Fnhy pubfr uvz guerr gubhfnaq zra bs Vfenry; jurerbs gjb
gubhfnaq jrer jvgu Fnhy va Zvpuznfu naq va zbhag Orgury, naq n
gubhfnaq jrer jvgu Wbanguna va Tvornu bs Orawnzva: naq gur erfg bs gur
crbcyr ur frag rirel zna gb uvf grag.

13:3 Naq Wbanguna fzbgr gur tneevfba bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf gung jnf va
Tron, naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf urneq bs vg. Naq Fnhy oyrj gur gehzcrg
guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq, fnlvat, Yrg gur Uroerjf urne.

13:4 Naq nyy Vfenry urneq fnl gung Fnhy unq fzvggra n tneevfba bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, naq gung Vfenry nyfb jnf unq va nobzvangvba jvgu gur
Cuvyvfgvarf. Naq gur crbcyr jrer pnyyrq gbtrgure nsgre Fnhy gb Tvytny.

13:5 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure gb svtug jvgu
Vfenry, guvegl gubhfnaq punevbgf, naq fvk gubhfnaq ubefrzra, naq
crbcyr nf gur fnaq juvpu vf ba gur frn fuber va zhygvghqr: naq gurl
pnzr hc, naq cvgpurq va Zvpuznfu, rnfgjneq sebz Orgunira.

13:6 Jura gur zra bs Vfenry fnj gung gurl jrer va n fgenvg, (sbe gur
crbcyr jrer qvfgerffrq,) gura gur crbcyr qvq uvqr gurzfryirf va pnirf,
naq va guvpxrgf, naq va ebpxf, naq va uvtu cynprf, naq va cvgf.

13:7 Naq fbzr bs gur Uroerjf jrag bire Wbeqna gb gur ynaq bs Tnq naq
Tvyrnq. Nf sbe Fnhy, ur jnf lrg va Tvytny, naq nyy gur crbcyr sbyybjrq
uvz gerzoyvat.

13:8 Naq ur gneevrq frira qnlf, nppbeqvat gb gur frg gvzr gung Fnzhry
unq nccbvagrq: ohg Fnzhry pnzr abg gb Tvytny; naq gur crbcyr jrer
fpnggrerq sebz uvz.

13:9 Naq Fnhy fnvq, Oevat uvgure n oheag bssrevat gb zr, naq crnpr
bssrevatf. Naq ur bssrerq gur oheag bssrevat.

13:10 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung nf fbba nf ur unq znqr na raq bs
bssrevat gur oheag bssrevat, orubyq, Fnzhry pnzr; naq Fnhy jrag bhg gb
zrrg uvz, gung ur zvtug fnyhgr uvz.

13:11 Naq Fnzhry fnvq, Jung unfg gubh qbar? Naq Fnhy fnvq, Orpnhfr V
fnj gung gur crbcyr jrer fpnggrerq sebz zr, naq gung gubh pnzrfg abg
jvguva gur qnlf nccbvagrq, naq gung gur Cuvyvfgvarf tngurerq
gurzfryirf gbtrgure ng Zvpuznfu; 13:12 Gurersber fnvq V, Gur
Cuvyvfgvarf jvyy pbzr qbja abj hcba zr gb Tvytny, naq V unir abg znqr
fhccyvpngvba hagb gur YBEQ: V sbeprq zlfrys gurersber, naq bssrerq n
oheag bssrevat.

13:13 Naq Fnzhry fnvq gb Fnhy, Gubh unfg qbar sbbyvfuyl: gubh unfg abg
xrcg gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, juvpu ur pbzznaqrq gurr: sbe
abj jbhyq gur YBEQ unir rfgnoyvfurq gul xvatqbz hcba Vfenry sbe rire.

13:14 Ohg abj gul xvatqbz funyy abg pbagvahr: gur YBEQ ungu fbhtug uvz
n zna nsgre uvf bja urneg, naq gur YBEQ ungu pbzznaqrq uvz gb or
pncgnva bire uvf crbcyr, orpnhfr gubh unfg abg xrcg gung juvpu gur
YBEQ pbzznaqrq gurr.

13:15 Naq Fnzhry nebfr, naq tng uvz hc sebz Tvytny hagb Tvornu bs
Orawnzva. Naq Fnhy ahzorerq gur crbcyr gung jrer cerfrag jvgu uvz,
nobhg fvk uhaqerq zra.

13:16 Naq Fnhy, naq Wbanguna uvf fba, naq gur crbcyr gung jrer cerfrag
jvgu gurz, nobqr va Tvornu bs Orawnzva: ohg gur Cuvyvfgvarf rapnzcrq
va Zvpuznfu.

13:17 Naq gur fcbvyref pnzr bhg bs gur pnzc bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf va
guerr pbzcnavrf: bar pbzcnal ghearq hagb gur jnl gung yrnqrgu gb
Bcuenu, hagb gur ynaq bs Fuhny: 13:18 Naq nabgure pbzcnal ghearq gur
jnl gb Orguubeba: naq nabgure pbzcnal ghearq gb gur jnl bs gur obeqre
gung ybbxrgu gb gur inyyrl bs Mrobvz gbjneq gur jvyqrearff.

13:19 Abj gurer jnf ab fzvgu sbhaq guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs Vfenry:
sbe gur Cuvyvfgvarf fnvq, Yrfg gur Uroerjf znxr gurz fjbeqf be fcrnef:
13:20 Ohg nyy gur Vfenryvgrf jrag qbja gb gur Cuvyvfgvarf, gb funecra
rirel zna uvf funer, naq uvf pbhygre, naq uvf nkr, naq uvf znggbpx.

13:21 Lrg gurl unq n svyr sbe gur znggbpxf, naq sbe gur pbhygref, naq
sbe gur sbexf, naq sbe gur nkrf, naq gb funecra gur tbnqf.

13:22 Fb vg pnzr gb cnff va gur qnl bs onggyr, gung gurer jnf arvgure
fjbeq abe fcrne sbhaq va gur unaq bs nal bs gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu
Fnhy naq Wbanguna: ohg jvgu Fnhy naq jvgu Wbanguna uvf fba jnf gurer
sbhaq.

13:23 Naq gur tneevfba bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf jrag bhg gb gur cnffntr bs
Zvpuznfu.

14:1 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff hcba n qnl, gung Wbanguna gur fba bs Fnhy
fnvq hagb gur lbhat zna gung oner uvf nezbhe, Pbzr, naq yrg hf tb bire
gb gur Cuvyvfgvarf' tneevfba, gung vf ba gur bgure fvqr. Ohg ur gbyq
abg uvf sngure.

14:2 Naq Fnhy gneevrq va gur hggrezbfg cneg bs Tvornu haqre n
cbzrtenangr gerr juvpu vf va Zvteba: naq gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz
jrer nobhg fvk uhaqerq zra; 14:3 Naq Nuvnu, gur fba bs Nuvgho,
Vpunobq'f oebgure, gur fba bs Cuvarunf, gur fba bs Ryv, gur YBEQ'f
cevrfg va Fuvybu, jrnevat na rcubq. Naq gur crbcyr xarj abg gung
Wbanguna jnf tbar.

14:4 Naq orgjrra gur cnffntrf, ol juvpu Wbanguna fbhtug gb tb bire
hagb gur Cuvyvfgvarf' tneevfba, gurer jnf n funec ebpx ba gur bar
fvqr, naq n funec ebpx ba gur bgure fvqr: naq gur anzr bs gur bar jnf
Obmrm, naq gur anzr bs gur bgure Fraru.

14:5 Gur sbersebag bs gur bar jnf fvghngr abegujneq bire ntnvafg
Zvpuznfu, naq gur bgure fbhgujneq bire ntnvafg Tvornu.

14:6 Naq Wbanguna fnvq gb gur lbhat zna gung oner uvf nezbhe, Pbzr,
naq yrg hf tb bire hagb gur tneevfba bs gurfr hapvephzpvfrq: vg znl or
gung gur YBEQ jvyy jbex sbe hf: sbe gurer vf ab erfgenvag gb gur YBEQ
gb fnir ol znal be ol srj.

14:7 Naq uvf nezbheornere fnvq hagb uvz, Qb nyy gung vf va guvar
urneg: ghea gurr; orubyq, V nz jvgu gurr nppbeqvat gb gul urneg.

14:8 Gura fnvq Wbanguna, Orubyq, jr jvyy cnff bire hagb gurfr zra, naq
jr jvyy qvfpbire bhefryirf hagb gurz.

14:9 Vs gurl fnl guhf hagb hf, Gneel hagvy jr pbzr gb lbh; gura jr
jvyy fgnaq fgvyy va bhe cynpr, naq jvyy abg tb hc hagb gurz.

14:10 Ohg vs gurl fnl guhf, Pbzr hc hagb hf; gura jr jvyy tb hc: sbe
gur YBEQ ungu qryvirerq gurz vagb bhe unaq: naq guvf funyy or n fvta
hagb hf.

14:11 Naq obgu bs gurz qvfpbirerq gurzfryirf hagb gur tneevfba bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf: naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf fnvq, Orubyq, gur Uroerjf pbzr sbegu
bhg bs gur ubyrf jurer gurl unq uvq gurzfryirf.

14:12 Naq gur zra bs gur tneevfba nafjrerq Wbanguna naq uvf
nezbheornere, naq fnvq, Pbzr hc gb hf, naq jr jvyy furj lbh n guvat.
Naq Wbanguna fnvq hagb uvf nezbheornere, Pbzr hc nsgre zr: sbe gur
YBEQ ungu qryvirerq gurz vagb gur unaq bs Vfenry.

14:13 Naq Wbanguna pyvzorq hc hcba uvf unaqf naq hcba uvf srrg, naq
uvf nezbheornere nsgre uvz: naq gurl sryy orsber Wbanguna; naq uvf
nezbheornere fyrj nsgre uvz.

14:14 Naq gung svefg fynhtugre, juvpu Wbanguna naq uvf nezbheornere
znqr, jnf nobhg gjragl zra, jvguva nf vg jrer na unys nper bs ynaq,
juvpu n lbxr bs bkra zvtug cybj.

14:15 Naq gurer jnf gerzoyvat va gur ubfg, va gur svryq, naq nzbat nyy
gur crbcyr: gur tneevfba, naq gur fcbvyref, gurl nyfb gerzoyrq, naq
gur rnegu dhnxrq: fb vg jnf n irel terng gerzoyvat.

14:16 Naq gur jngpuzra bs Fnhy va Tvornu bs Orawnzva ybbxrq; naq,
orubyq, gur zhygvghqr zrygrq njnl, naq gurl jrag ba orngvat qbja bar
nabgure.

14:17 Gura fnvq Fnhy hagb gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz, Ahzore abj,
naq frr jub vf tbar sebz hf. Naq jura gurl unq ahzorerq, orubyq,
Wbanguna naq uvf nezbheornere jrer abg gurer.

14:18 Naq Fnhy fnvq hagb Nuvnu, Oevat uvgure gur nex bs Tbq. Sbe gur
nex bs Tbq jnf ng gung gvzr jvgu gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

14:19 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, juvyr Fnhy gnyxrq hagb gur cevrfg, gung gur
abvfr gung jnf va gur ubfg bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf jrag ba naq vapernfrq:
naq Fnhy fnvq hagb gur cevrfg, Jvguqenj guvar unaq.

14:20 Naq Fnhy naq nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz nffrzoyrq
gurzfryirf, naq gurl pnzr gb gur onggyr: naq, orubyq, rirel zna'f
fjbeq jnf ntnvafg uvf sryybj, naq gurer jnf n irel terng qvfpbzsvgher.

14:21 Zberbire gur Uroerjf gung jrer jvgu gur Cuvyvfgvarf orsber gung
gvzr, juvpu jrag hc jvgu gurz vagb gur pnzc sebz gur pbhagel ebhaq
nobhg, rira gurl nyfb ghearq gb or jvgu gur Vfenryvgrf gung jrer jvgu
Fnhy naq Wbanguna.

14:22 Yvxrjvfr nyy gur zra bs Vfenry juvpu unq uvq gurzfryirf va zbhag
Rcuenvz, jura gurl urneq gung gur Cuvyvfgvarf syrq, rira gurl nyfb
sbyybjrq uneq nsgre gurz va gur onggyr.

14:23 Fb gur YBEQ fnirq Vfenry gung qnl: naq gur onggyr cnffrq bire
hagb Orgunira.

14:24 Naq gur zra bs Vfenry jrer qvfgerffrq gung qnl: sbe Fnhy unq
nqwherq gur crbcyr, fnlvat, Phefrq or gur zna gung rngrgu nal sbbq
hagvy riravat, gung V znl or niratrq ba zvar rarzvrf. Fb abar bs gur
crbcyr gnfgrq nal sbbq.

14:25 Naq nyy gurl bs gur ynaq pnzr gb n jbbq; naq gurer jnf ubarl
hcba gur tebhaq.

14:26 Naq jura gur crbcyr jrer pbzr vagb gur jbbq, orubyq, gur ubarl
qebccrq; ohg ab zna chg uvf unaq gb uvf zbhgu: sbe gur crbcyr srnerq
gur bngu.

14:27 Ohg Wbanguna urneq abg jura uvf sngure punetrq gur crbcyr jvgu
gur bngu: jurersber ur chg sbegu gur raq bs gur ebq gung jnf va uvf
unaq, naq qvccrq vg va na ubarlpbzo, naq chg uvf unaq gb uvf zbhgu;
naq uvf rlrf jrer rayvtugrarq.

14:28 Gura nafjrerq bar bs gur crbcyr, naq fnvq, Gul sngure fgenvgyl
punetrq gur crbcyr jvgu na bngu, fnlvat, Phefrq or gur zna gung rngrgu
nal sbbq guvf qnl. Naq gur crbcyr jrer snvag.

14:29 Gura fnvq Wbanguna, Zl sngure ungu gebhoyrq gur ynaq: frr, V
cenl lbh, ubj zvar rlrf unir orra rayvtugrarq, orpnhfr V gnfgrq n
yvggyr bs guvf ubarl.

14:30 Ubj zhpu zber, vs uncyl gur crbcyr unq rngra serryl gb qnl bs
gur fcbvy bs gurve rarzvrf juvpu gurl sbhaq? sbe unq gurer abg orra
abj n zhpu terngre fynhtugre nzbat gur Cuvyvfgvarf?  14:31 Naq gurl
fzbgr gur Cuvyvfgvarf gung qnl sebz Zvpuznfu gb Nvwnyba: naq gur
crbcyr jrer irel snvag.

14:32 Naq gur crbcyr syrj hcba gur fcbvy, naq gbbx furrc, naq bkra,
naq pnyirf, naq fyrj gurz ba gur tebhaq: naq gur crbcyr qvq rng gurz
jvgu gur oybbq.

14:33 Gura gurl gbyq Fnhy, fnlvat, Orubyq, gur crbcyr fva ntnvafg gur
YBEQ, va gung gurl rng jvgu gur oybbq. Naq ur fnvq, Lr unir
genafterffrq: ebyy n terng fgbar hagb zr guvf qnl.

14:34 Naq Fnhy fnvq, Qvfcrefr lbhefryirf nzbat gur crbcyr, naq fnl
hagb gurz, Oevat zr uvgure rirel zna uvf bk, naq rirel zna uvf furrc,
naq fynl gurz urer, naq rng; naq fva abg ntnvafg gur YBEQ va rngvat
jvgu gur oybbq.

Naq nyy gur crbcyr oebhtug rirel zna uvf bk jvgu uvz gung avtug, naq
fyrj gurz gurer.

14:35 Naq Fnhy ohvyg na nygne hagb gur YBEQ: gur fnzr jnf gur svefg
nygne gung ur ohvyg hagb gur YBEQ.

14:36 Naq Fnhy fnvq, Yrg hf tb qbja nsgre gur Cuvyvfgvarf ol avtug,
naq fcbvy gurz hagvy gur zbeavat yvtug, naq yrg hf abg yrnir n zna bs
gurz. Naq gurl fnvq, Qb jungfbrire frrzrgu tbbq hagb gurr. Gura fnvq
gur cevrfg, Yrg hf qenj arne uvgure hagb Tbq.

14:37 Naq Fnhy nfxrq pbhafry bs Tbq, Funyy V tb qbja nsgre gur
Cuvyvfgvarf? jvyg gubh qryvire gurz vagb gur unaq bs Vfenry? Ohg ur
nafjrerq uvz abg gung qnl.

14:38 Naq Fnhy fnvq, Qenj lr arne uvgure, nyy gur puvrs bs gur crbcyr:
naq xabj naq frr jurerva guvf fva ungu orra guvf qnl.

14:39 Sbe, nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, juvpu fnirgu Vfenry, gubhtu vg or va
Wbanguna zl fba, ur funyy fheryl qvr. Ohg gurer jnf abg n zna nzbat
nyy gur crbcyr gung nafjrerq uvz.

14:40 Gura fnvq ur hagb nyy Vfenry, Or lr ba bar fvqr, naq V naq
Wbanguna zl fba jvyy or ba gur bgure fvqr. Naq gur crbcyr fnvq hagb
Fnhy, Qb jung frrzrgu tbbq hagb gurr.

14:41 Gurersber Fnhy fnvq hagb gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, Tvir n cresrpg
ybg.

Naq Fnhy naq Wbanguna jrer gnxra: ohg gur crbcyr rfpncrq.

14:42 Naq Fnhy fnvq, Pnfg ybgf orgjrra zr naq Wbanguna zl fba. Naq
Wbanguna jnf gnxra.

14:43 Gura Fnhy fnvq gb Wbanguna, Gryy zr jung gubh unfg qbar. Naq
Wbanguna gbyq uvz, naq fnvq, V qvq ohg gnfgr n yvggyr ubarl jvgu gur
raq bs gur ebq gung jnf va zvar unaq, naq, yb, V zhfg qvr.

14:44 Naq Fnhy nafjrerq, Tbq qb fb naq zber nyfb: sbe gubh funyg
fheryl qvr, Wbanguna.

14:45 Naq gur crbcyr fnvq hagb Fnhy, Funyy Wbanguna qvr, jub ungu
jebhtug guvf terng fnyingvba va Vfenry? Tbq sbeovq: nf gur YBEQ
yvirgu, gurer funyy abg bar unve bs uvf urnq snyy gb gur tebhaq; sbe
ur ungu jebhtug jvgu Tbq guvf qnl. Fb gur crbcyr erfphrq Wbanguna,
gung ur qvrq abg.

14:46 Gura Fnhy jrag hc sebz sbyybjvat gur Cuvyvfgvarf: naq gur
Cuvyvfgvarf jrag gb gurve bja cynpr.

14:47 Fb Fnhy gbbx gur xvatqbz bire Vfenry, naq sbhtug ntnvafg nyy uvf
rarzvrf ba rirel fvqr, ntnvafg Zbno, naq ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs
Nzzba, naq ntnvafg Rqbz, naq ntnvafg gur xvatf bs Mbonu, naq ntnvafg
gur Cuvyvfgvarf: naq juvgurefbrire ur ghearq uvzfrys, ur irkrq gurz.

14:48 Naq ur tngurerq na ubfg, naq fzbgr gur Nznyrxvgrf, naq qryvirerq
Vfenry bhg bs gur unaqf bs gurz gung fcbvyrq gurz.

14:49 Abj gur fbaf bs Fnhy jrer Wbanguna, naq Vfuhv, naq Zrypuvfuhn:
naq gur anzrf bs uvf gjb qnhtugref jrer gurfr; gur anzr bs gur
svefgobea Zreno, naq gur anzr bs gur lbhatre Zvpuny: 14:50 Naq gur
anzr bs Fnhy'f jvsr jnf Nuvabnz, gur qnhtugre bs Nuvznnm: naq gur anzr
bs gur pncgnva bs uvf ubfg jnf Noare, gur fba bs Are, Fnhy'f hapyr.

14:51 Naq Xvfu jnf gur sngure bs Fnhy; naq Are gur sngure bs Noare jnf
gur fba bs Novry.

14:52 Naq gurer jnf fber jne ntnvafg gur Cuvyvfgvarf nyy gur qnlf bs
Fnhy: naq jura Fnhy fnj nal fgebat zna, be nal inyvnag zna, ur gbbx
uvz hagb uvz.

15:1 Fnzhry nyfb fnvq hagb Fnhy, Gur YBEQ frag zr gb nabvag gurr gb or
xvat bire uvf crbcyr, bire Vfenry: abj gurersber urnexra gubh hagb gur
ibvpr bs gur jbeqf bs gur YBEQ.

15:2 Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ bs ubfgf, V erzrzore gung juvpu Nznyrx qvq gb
Vfenry, ubj ur ynvq jnvg sbe uvz va gur jnl, jura ur pnzr hc sebz
Rtlcg.

15:3 Abj tb naq fzvgr Nznyrx, naq hggreyl qrfgebl nyy gung gurl unir,
naq fcner gurz abg; ohg fynl obgu zna naq jbzna, vasnag naq fhpxyvat,
bk naq furrc, pnzry naq nff.

15:4 Naq Fnhy tngurerq gur crbcyr gbtrgure, naq ahzorerq gurz va
Grynvz, gjb uhaqerq gubhfnaq sbbgzra, naq gra gubhfnaq zra bs Whqnu.

15:5 Naq Fnhy pnzr gb n pvgl bs Nznyrx, naq ynvq jnvg va gur inyyrl.

15:6 Naq Fnhy fnvq hagb gur Xravgrf, Tb, qrcneg, trg lbh qbja sebz
nzbat gur Nznyrxvgrf, yrfg V qrfgebl lbh jvgu gurz: sbe lr furjrq
xvaqarff gb nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, jura gurl pnzr hc bhg bs
Rtlcg. Fb gur Xravgrf qrcnegrq sebz nzbat gur Nznyrxvgrf.

15:7 Naq Fnhy fzbgr gur Nznyrxvgrf sebz Univynu hagvy gubh pbzrfg gb
Fuhe, gung vf bire ntnvafg Rtlcg.

15:8 Naq ur gbbx Ntnt gur xvat bs gur Nznyrxvgrf nyvir, naq hggreyl
qrfgeblrq nyy gur crbcyr jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq.

15:9 Ohg Fnhy naq gur crbcyr fcnerq Ntnt, naq gur orfg bs gur furrc,
naq bs gur bkra, naq bs gur sngyvatf, naq gur ynzof, naq nyy gung jnf
tbbq, naq jbhyq abg hggreyl qrfgebl gurz: ohg rirel guvat gung jnf
ivyr naq ershfr, gung gurl qrfgeblrq hggreyl.

15:10 Gura pnzr gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ hagb Fnzhry, fnlvat, 15:11 Vg
ercragrgu zr gung V unir frg hc Fnhy gb or xvat: sbe ur vf ghearq onpx
sebz sbyybjvat zr, naq ungu abg cresbezrq zl pbzznaqzragf. Naq vg
tevrirq Fnzhry; naq ur pevrq hagb gur YBEQ nyy avtug.

15:12 Naq jura Fnzhry ebfr rneyl gb zrrg Fnhy va gur zbeavat, vg jnf
gbyq Fnzhry, fnlvat, Fnhy pnzr gb Pnezry, naq, orubyq, ur frg uvz hc n
cynpr, naq vf tbar nobhg, naq cnffrq ba, naq tbar qbja gb Tvytny.

15:13 Naq Fnzhry pnzr gb Fnhy: naq Fnhy fnvq hagb uvz, Oyrffrq or gubh
bs gur YBEQ: V unir cresbezrq gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ.

15:14 Naq Fnzhry fnvq, Jung zrnargu gura guvf oyrngvat bs gur furrc va
zvar rnef, naq gur ybjvat bs gur bkra juvpu V urne?  15:15 Naq Fnhy
fnvq, Gurl unir oebhtug gurz sebz gur Nznyrxvgrf: sbe gur crbcyr
fcnerq gur orfg bs gur furrc naq bs gur bkra, gb fnpevsvpr hagb gur
YBEQ gul Tbq; naq gur erfg jr unir hggreyl qrfgeblrq.

15:16 Gura Fnzhry fnvq hagb Fnhy, Fgnl, naq V jvyy gryy gurr jung gur
YBEQ ungu fnvq gb zr guvf avtug. Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Fnl ba.

15:17 Naq Fnzhry fnvq, Jura gubh jnfg yvggyr va guvar bja fvtug, jnfg
gubh abg znqr gur urnq bs gur gevorf bs Vfenry, naq gur YBEQ nabvagrq
gurr xvat bire Vfenry?  15:18 Naq gur YBEQ frag gurr ba n wbhearl, naq
fnvq, Tb naq hggreyl qrfgebl gur fvaaref gur Nznyrxvgrf, naq svtug
ntnvafg gurz hagvy gurl or pbafhzrq.

15:19 Jurersber gura qvqfg gubh abg borl gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ, ohg
qvqfg syl hcba gur fcbvy, naq qvqfg rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ?
15:20 Naq Fnhy fnvq hagb Fnzhry, Lrn, V unir borlrq gur ibvpr bs gur
YBEQ, naq unir tbar gur jnl juvpu gur YBEQ frag zr, naq unir oebhtug
Ntnt gur xvat bs Nznyrx, naq unir hggreyl qrfgeblrq gur Nznyrxvgrf.

15:21 Ohg gur crbcyr gbbx bs gur fcbvy, furrc naq bkra, gur puvrs bs
gur guvatf juvpu fubhyq unir orra hggreyl qrfgeblrq, gb fnpevsvpr hagb
gur YBEQ gul Tbq va Tvytny.

15:22 Naq Fnzhry fnvq, Ungu gur YBEQ nf terng qryvtug va oheag
bssrevatf naq fnpevsvprf, nf va borlvat gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ? Orubyq,
gb borl vf orggre guna fnpevsvpr, naq gb urnexra guna gur sng bs enzf.

15:23 Sbe eroryyvba vf nf gur fva bs jvgpupensg, naq fghoobeaarff vf
nf vavdhvgl naq vqbyngel. Orpnhfr gubh unfg erwrpgrq gur jbeq bs gur
YBEQ, ur ungu nyfb erwrpgrq gurr sebz orvat xvat.

15:24 Naq Fnhy fnvq hagb Fnzhry, V unir fvaarq: sbe V unir
genafterffrq gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ, naq gul jbeqf: orpnhfr V
srnerq gur crbcyr, naq borlrq gurve ibvpr.

15:25 Abj gurersber, V cenl gurr, cneqba zl fva, naq ghea ntnva jvgu
zr, gung V znl jbefuvc gur YBEQ.

15:26 Naq Fnzhry fnvq hagb Fnhy, V jvyy abg erghea jvgu gurr: sbe gubh
unfg erwrpgrq gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ, naq gur YBEQ ungu erwrpgrq gurr
sebz orvat xvat bire Vfenry.

15:27 Naq nf Fnzhry ghearq nobhg gb tb njnl, ur ynvq ubyq hcba gur
fxveg bs uvf znagyr, naq vg erag.

15:28 Naq Fnzhry fnvq hagb uvz, Gur YBEQ ungu erag gur xvatqbz bs
Vfenry sebz gurr guvf qnl, naq ungu tvira vg gb n arvtuobhe bs guvar,
gung vf orggre guna gubh.

15:29 Naq nyfb gur Fgeratgu bs Vfenry jvyy abg yvr abe ercrag: sbe ur
vf abg n zna, gung ur fubhyq ercrag.

15:30 Gura ur fnvq, V unir fvaarq: lrg ubabhe zr abj, V cenl gurr,
orsber gur ryqref bs zl crbcyr, naq orsber Vfenry, naq ghea ntnva jvgu
zr, gung V znl jbefuvc gur YBEQ gul Tbq.

15:31 Fb Fnzhry ghearq ntnva nsgre Fnhy; naq Fnhy jbefuvccrq gur YBEQ.

15:32 Gura fnvq Fnzhry, Oevat lr uvgure gb zr Ntnt gur xvat bs gur
Nznyrxvgrf. Naq Ntnt pnzr hagb uvz qryvpngryl. Naq Ntnt fnvq, Fheryl
gur ovggrearff bs qrngu vf cnfg.

15:33 Naq Fnzhry fnvq, Nf gur fjbeq ungu znqr jbzra puvyqyrff, fb
funyy gul zbgure or puvyqyrff nzbat jbzra. Naq Fnzhry urjrq Ntnt va
cvrprf orsber gur YBEQ va Tvytny.

15:34 Gura Fnzhry jrag gb Enznu; naq Fnhy jrag hc gb uvf ubhfr gb
Tvornu bs Fnhy.

15:35 Naq Fnzhry pnzr ab zber gb frr Fnhy hagvy gur qnl bs uvf qrngu:
arireguryrff Fnzhry zbhearq sbe Fnhy: naq gur YBEQ ercragrq gung ur
unq znqr Fnhy xvat bire Vfenry.

16:1 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Fnzhry, Ubj ybat jvyg gubh zbhea sbe Fnhy,
frrvat V unir erwrpgrq uvz sebz ervtavat bire Vfenry? svyy guvar ubea
jvgu bvy, naq tb, V jvyy fraq gurr gb Wrffr gur Orguyrurzvgr: sbe V
unir cebivqrq zr n xvat nzbat uvf fbaf.

16:2 Naq Fnzhry fnvq, Ubj pna V tb? vs Fnhy urne vg, ur jvyy xvyy zr.
Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Gnxr na urvsre jvgu gurr, naq fnl, V nz pbzr gb
fnpevsvpr gb gur YBEQ.

16:3 Naq pnyy Wrffr gb gur fnpevsvpr, naq V jvyy furj gurr jung gubh
funyg qb: naq gubh funyg nabvag hagb zr uvz jubz V anzr hagb gurr.

16:4 Naq Fnzhry qvq gung juvpu gur YBEQ fcnxr, naq pnzr gb Orguyrurz.
Naq gur ryqref bs gur gbja gerzoyrq ng uvf pbzvat, naq fnvq, Pbzrfg
gubh crnprnoyl?  16:5 Naq ur fnvq, Crnprnoyl: V nz pbzr gb fnpevsvpr
hagb gur YBEQ: fnapgvsl lbhefryirf, naq pbzr jvgu zr gb gur fnpevsvpr.
Naq ur fnapgvsvrq Wrffr naq uvf fbaf, naq pnyyrq gurz gb gur
fnpevsvpr.

16:6 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gurl jrer pbzr, gung ur ybbxrq ba
Ryvno, naq fnvq, Fheryl gur YBEQ'f nabvagrq vf orsber uvz.

16:7 Ohg gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Fnzhry, Ybbx abg ba uvf pbhagranapr, be ba
gur urvtug bs uvf fgngher; orpnhfr V unir ershfrq uvz: sbe gur YBEQ
frrgu abg nf zna frrgu; sbe zna ybbxrgu ba gur bhgjneq nccrnenapr, ohg
gur YBEQ ybbxrgu ba gur urneg.

16:8 Gura Wrffr pnyyrq Novanqno, naq znqr uvz cnff orsber Fnzhry. Naq
ur fnvq, Arvgure ungu gur YBEQ pubfra guvf.

16:9 Gura Wrffr znqr Funzznu gb cnff ol. Naq ur fnvq, Arvgure ungu gur
YBEQ pubfra guvf.

16:10 Ntnva, Wrffr znqr frira bs uvf fbaf gb cnff orsber Fnzhry. Naq
Fnzhry fnvq hagb Wrffr, Gur YBEQ ungu abg pubfra gurfr.

16:11 Naq Fnzhry fnvq hagb Wrffr, Ner urer nyy gul puvyqera? Naq ur
fnvq, Gurer erznvargu lrg gur lbhatrfg, naq, orubyq, ur xrrcrgu gur
furrc. Naq Fnzhry fnvq hagb Wrffr, Fraq naq srgpu uvz: sbe jr jvyy abg
fvg qbja gvyy ur pbzr uvgure.

16:12 Naq ur frag, naq oebhtug uvz va. Abj ur jnf ehqql, naq jvguny bs
n ornhgvshy pbhagranapr, naq tbbqyl gb ybbx gb. Naq gur YBEQ fnvq,
Nevfr, nabvag uvz: sbe guvf vf ur.

16:13 Gura Fnzhry gbbx gur ubea bs bvy, naq nabvagrq uvz va gur zvqfg
bs uvf oerguera: naq gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ pnzr hcba Qnivq sebz gung
qnl sbejneq. Fb Fnzhry ebfr hc, naq jrag gb Enznu.

16:14 Ohg gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ qrcnegrq sebz Fnhy, naq na rivy
fcvevg sebz gur YBEQ gebhoyrq uvz.

16:15 Naq Fnhy'f freinagf fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq abj, na rivy fcvevg
sebz Tbq gebhoyrgu gurr.

16:16 Yrg bhe ybeq abj pbzznaq gul freinagf, juvpu ner orsber gurr, gb
frrx bhg n zna, jub vf n phaavat cynlre ba na unec: naq vg funyy pbzr
gb cnff, jura gur rivy fcvevg sebz Tbq vf hcba gurr, gung ur funyy
cynl jvgu uvf unaq, naq gubh funyg or jryy.

16:17 Naq Fnhy fnvq hagb uvf freinagf, Cebivqr zr abj n zna gung pna
cynl jryy, naq oevat uvz gb zr.

16:18 Gura nafjrerq bar bs gur freinagf, naq fnvq, Orubyq, V unir frra
n fba bs Wrffr gur Orguyrurzvgr, gung vf phaavat va cynlvat, naq n
zvtugl inyvnag zna, naq n zna bs jne, naq cehqrag va znggref, naq n
pbzryl crefba, naq gur YBEQ vf jvgu uvz.

16:19 Jurersber Fnhy frag zrffratref hagb Wrffr, naq fnvq, Fraq zr
Qnivq gul fba, juvpu vf jvgu gur furrc.

16:20 Naq Wrffr gbbx na nff ynqra jvgu oernq, naq n obggyr bs jvar,
naq n xvq, naq frag gurz ol Qnivq uvf fba hagb Fnhy.

16:21 Naq Qnivq pnzr gb Fnhy, naq fgbbq orsber uvz: naq ur ybirq uvz
terngyl; naq ur orpnzr uvf nezbheornere.

16:22 Naq Fnhy frag gb Wrffr, fnlvat, Yrg Qnivq, V cenl gurr, fgnaq
orsber zr; sbe ur ungu sbhaq snibhe va zl fvtug.

16:23 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur rivy fcvevg sebz Tbq jnf hcba
Fnhy, gung Qnivq gbbx na unec, naq cynlrq jvgu uvf unaq: fb Fnhy jnf
erserfurq, naq jnf jryy, naq gur rivy fcvevg qrcnegrq sebz uvz.

17:1 Abj gur Cuvyvfgvarf tngurerq gbtrgure gurve nezvrf gb onggyr, naq
jrer tngurerq gbtrgure ng Fubpubu, juvpu orybatrgu gb Whqnu, naq
cvgpurq orgjrra Fubpubu naq Nmrxnu, va Rcurfqnzzvz.

17:2 Naq Fnhy naq gur zra bs Vfenry jrer tngurerq gbtrgure, naq
cvgpurq ol gur inyyrl bs Rynu, naq frg gur onggyr va neenl ntnvafg gur
Cuvyvfgvarf.

17:3 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf fgbbq ba n zbhagnva ba gur bar fvqr, naq
Vfenry fgbbq ba n zbhagnva ba gur bgure fvqr: naq gurer jnf n inyyrl
orgjrra gurz.

17:4 Naq gurer jrag bhg n punzcvba bhg bs gur pnzc bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf,
anzrq Tbyvngu, bs Tngu, jubfr urvtug jnf fvk phovgf naq n fcna.

17:5 Naq ur unq na uryzrg bs oenff hcba uvf urnq, naq ur jnf nezrq
jvgu n pbng bs znvy; naq gur jrvtug bs gur pbng jnf svir gubhfnaq
furxryf bs oenff.

17:6 Naq ur unq ternirf bs oenff hcba uvf yrtf, naq n gnetrg bs oenff
orgjrra uvf fubhyqref.

17:7 Naq gur fgnss bs uvf fcrne jnf yvxr n jrnire'f ornz; naq uvf
fcrne'f urnq jrvturq fvk uhaqerq furxryf bs veba: naq bar ornevat n
fuvryq jrag orsber uvz.

17:8 Naq ur fgbbq naq pevrq hagb gur nezvrf bs Vfenry, naq fnvq hagb
gurz, Jul ner lr pbzr bhg gb frg lbhe onggyr va neenl? nz abg V n
Cuvyvfgvar, naq lr freinagf gb Fnhy? pubbfr lbh n zna sbe lbh, naq yrg
uvz pbzr qbja gb zr.

17:9 Vs ur or noyr gb svtug jvgu zr, naq gb xvyy zr, gura jvyy jr or
lbhe freinagf: ohg vs V cerinvy ntnvafg uvz, naq xvyy uvz, gura funyy
lr or bhe freinagf, naq freir hf.

17:10 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvar fnvq, V qrsl gur nezvrf bs Vfenry guvf qnl;
tvir zr n zna, gung jr znl svtug gbtrgure.

17:11 Jura Fnhy naq nyy Vfenry urneq gubfr jbeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvar,
gurl jrer qvfznlrq, naq terngyl nsenvq.

17:12 Abj Qnivq jnf gur fba bs gung Rcuenguvgr bs Orguyrurzwhqnu,
jubfr anzr jnf Wrffr; naq ur unq rvtug fbaf: naq gur zna jrag nzbat
zra sbe na byq zna va gur qnlf bs Fnhy.

17:13 Naq gur guerr ryqrfg fbaf bs Wrffr jrag naq sbyybjrq Fnhy gb gur
onggyr: naq gur anzrf bs uvf guerr fbaf gung jrag gb gur onggyr jrer
Ryvno gur svefgobea, naq arkg hagb uvz Novanqno, naq gur guveq
Funzznu.

17:14 Naq Qnivq jnf gur lbhatrfg: naq gur guerr ryqrfg sbyybjrq Fnhy.

17:15 Ohg Qnivq jrag naq erghearq sebz Fnhy gb srrq uvf sngure'f furrc
ng Orguyrurz.

17:16 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvar qerj arne zbeavat naq riravat, naq cerfragrq
uvzfrys sbegl qnlf.

17:17 Naq Wrffr fnvq hagb Qnivq uvf fba, Gnxr abj sbe gul oerguera na
rcunu bs guvf cnepurq pbea, naq gurfr gra ybnirf, naq eha gb gur pnzc
bs gul oerguera; 17:18 Naq pneel gurfr gra purrfrf hagb gur pncgnva bs
gurve gubhfnaq, naq ybbx ubj gul oerguera sner, naq gnxr gurve cyrqtr.

17:19 Abj Fnhy, naq gurl, naq nyy gur zra bs Vfenry, jrer va gur
inyyrl bs Rynu, svtugvat jvgu gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

17:20 Naq Qnivq ebfr hc rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq yrsg gur furrc jvgu
n xrrcre, naq gbbx, naq jrag, nf Wrffr unq pbzznaqrq uvz; naq ur pnzr
gb gur gerapu, nf gur ubfg jnf tbvat sbegu gb gur svtug, naq fubhgrq
sbe gur onggyr.

17:21 Sbe Vfenry naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf unq chg gur onggyr va neenl, nezl
ntnvafg nezl.

17:22 Naq Qnivq yrsg uvf pneevntr va gur unaq bs gur xrrcre bs gur
pneevntr, naq ena vagb gur nezl, naq pnzr naq fnyhgrq uvf oerguera.

17:23 Naq nf ur gnyxrq jvgu gurz, orubyq, gurer pnzr hc gur punzcvba,
gur Cuvyvfgvar bs Tngu, Tbyvngu ol anzr, bhg bs gur nezvrf bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, naq fcnxr nppbeqvat gb gur fnzr jbeqf: naq Qnivq urneq
gurz.

17:24 Naq nyy gur zra bs Vfenry, jura gurl fnj gur zna, syrq sebz uvz,
naq jrer fber nsenvq.

17:25 Naq gur zra bs Vfenry fnvq, Unir lr frra guvf zna gung vf pbzr
hc?  fheryl gb qrsl Vfenry vf ur pbzr hc: naq vg funyy or, gung gur
zna jub xvyyrgu uvz, gur xvat jvyy raevpu uvz jvgu terng evpurf, naq
jvyy tvir uvz uvf qnhtugre, naq znxr uvf sngure'f ubhfr serr va
Vfenry.

17:26 Naq Qnivq fcnxr gb gur zra gung fgbbq ol uvz, fnlvat, Jung funyy
or qbar gb gur zna gung xvyyrgu guvf Cuvyvfgvar, naq gnxrgu njnl gur
ercebnpu sebz Vfenry? sbe jub vf guvf hapvephzpvfrq Cuvyvfgvar, gung
ur fubhyq qrsl gur nezvrf bs gur yvivat Tbq?  17:27 Naq gur crbcyr
nafjrerq uvz nsgre guvf znaare, fnlvat, Fb funyy vg or qbar gb gur zna
gung xvyyrgu uvz.

17:28 Naq Ryvno uvf ryqrfg oebgure urneq jura ur fcnxr hagb gur zra;
naq Ryvno'f natre jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg Qnivq, naq ur fnvq, Jul pnzrfg
gubh qbja uvgure? naq jvgu jubz unfg gubh yrsg gubfr srj furrc va gur
jvyqrearff? V xabj gul cevqr, naq gur anhtugvarff bs guvar urneg; sbe
gubh neg pbzr qbja gung gubh zvtugrfg frr gur onggyr.

17:29 Naq Qnivq fnvq, Jung unir V abj qbar? Vf gurer abg n pnhfr?
17:30 Naq ur ghearq sebz uvz gbjneq nabgure, naq fcnxr nsgre gur fnzr
znaare: naq gur crbcyr nafjrerq uvz ntnva nsgre gur sbezre znaare.

17:31 Naq jura gur jbeqf jrer urneq juvpu Qnivq fcnxr, gurl erurnefrq
gurz orsber Fnhy: naq ur frag sbe uvz.

17:32 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Fnhy, Yrg ab zna'f urneg snvy orpnhfr bs uvz;
gul freinag jvyy tb naq svtug jvgu guvf Cuvyvfgvar.

17:33 Naq Fnhy fnvq gb Qnivq, Gubh neg abg noyr gb tb ntnvafg guvf
Cuvyvfgvar gb svtug jvgu uvz: sbe gubh neg ohg n lbhgu, naq ur n zna
bs jne sebz uvf lbhgu.

17:34 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Fnhy, Gul freinag xrcg uvf sngure'f furrc,
naq gurer pnzr n yvba, naq n orne, naq gbbx n ynzo bhg bs gur sybpx:
17:35 Naq V jrag bhg nsgre uvz, naq fzbgr uvz, naq qryvirerq vg bhg bs
uvf zbhgu: naq jura ur nebfr ntnvafg zr, V pnhtug uvz ol uvf orneq,
naq fzbgr uvz, naq fyrj uvz.

17:36 Gul freinag fyrj obgu gur yvba naq gur orne: naq guvf
hapvephzpvfrq Cuvyvfgvar funyy or nf bar bs gurz, frrvat ur ungu
qrsvrq gur nezvrf bs gur yvivat Tbq.

17:37 Qnivq fnvq zberbire, Gur YBEQ gung qryvirerq zr bhg bs gur cnj
bs gur yvba, naq bhg bs gur cnj bs gur orne, ur jvyy qryvire zr bhg bs
gur unaq bs guvf Cuvyvfgvar. Naq Fnhy fnvq hagb Qnivq, Tb, naq gur
YBEQ or jvgu gurr.

17:38 Naq Fnhy nezrq Qnivq jvgu uvf nezbhe, naq ur chg na uryzrg bs
oenff hcba uvf urnq; nyfb ur nezrq uvz jvgu n pbng bs znvy.

17:39 Naq Qnivq tveqrq uvf fjbeq hcba uvf nezbhe, naq ur nffnlrq gb
tb; sbe ur unq abg cebirq vg. Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Fnhy, V pnaabg tb
jvgu gurfr; sbe V unir abg cebirq gurz. Naq Qnivq chg gurz bss uvz.

17:40 Naq ur gbbx uvf fgnss va uvf unaq, naq pubfr uvz svir fzbbgu
fgbarf bhg bs gur oebbx, naq chg gurz va n furcureq'f ont juvpu ur
unq, rira va n fpevc; naq uvf fyvat jnf va uvf unaq: naq ur qerj arne
gb gur Cuvyvfgvar.

17:41 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvar pnzr ba naq qerj arne hagb Qnivq; naq gur zna
gung oner gur fuvryq jrag orsber uvz.

17:42 Naq jura gur Cuvyvfgvar ybbxrq nobhg, naq fnj Qnivq, ur
qvfqnvarq uvz: sbe ur jnf ohg n lbhgu, naq ehqql, naq bs n snve
pbhagranapr.

17:43 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvar fnvq hagb Qnivq, Nz V n qbt, gung gubh pbzrfg
gb zr jvgu fgnirf? Naq gur Cuvyvfgvar phefrq Qnivq ol uvf tbqf.

17:44 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvar fnvq gb Qnivq, Pbzr gb zr, naq V jvyy tvir
gul syrfu hagb gur sbjyf bs gur nve, naq gb gur ornfgf bs gur svryq.

17:45 Gura fnvq Qnivq gb gur Cuvyvfgvar, Gubh pbzrfg gb zr jvgu n
fjbeq, naq jvgu n fcrne, naq jvgu n fuvryq: ohg V pbzr gb gurr va gur
anzr bs gur YBEQ bs ubfgf, gur Tbq bs gur nezvrf bs Vfenry, jubz gubh
unfg qrsvrq.

17:46 Guvf qnl jvyy gur YBEQ qryvire gurr vagb zvar unaq; naq V jvyy
fzvgr gurr, naq gnxr guvar urnq sebz gurr; naq V jvyy tvir gur
pnepnfrf bs gur ubfg bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf guvf qnl hagb gur sbjyf bs gur
nve, naq gb gur jvyq ornfgf bs gur rnegu; gung nyy gur rnegu znl xabj
gung gurer vf n Tbq va Vfenry.

17:47 Naq nyy guvf nffrzoyl funyy xabj gung gur YBEQ fnirgu abg jvgu
fjbeq naq fcrne: sbe gur onggyr vf gur YBEQ'f, naq ur jvyy tvir lbh
vagb bhe unaqf.

17:48 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur Cuvyvfgvar nebfr, naq pnzr, naq
qerj avtu gb zrrg Qnivq, gung Qnivq unfgrarq, naq ena gbjneq gur nezl
gb zrrg gur Cuvyvfgvar.

17:49 Naq Qnivq chg uvf unaq va uvf ont, naq gbbx gurapr n fgbar, naq
fynat vg, naq fzbgr gur Cuvyvfgvar va uvf sberurnq, gung gur fgbar
fhax vagb uvf sberurnq; naq ur sryy hcba uvf snpr gb gur rnegu.

17:50 Fb Qnivq cerinvyrq bire gur Cuvyvfgvar jvgu n fyvat naq jvgu n
fgbar, naq fzbgr gur Cuvyvfgvar, naq fyrj uvz; ohg gurer jnf ab fjbeq
va gur unaq bs Qnivq.

17:51 Gurersber Qnivq ena, naq fgbbq hcba gur Cuvyvfgvar, naq gbbx uvf
fjbeq, naq qerj vg bhg bs gur furngu gurerbs, naq fyrj uvz, naq phg
bss uvf urnq gurerjvgu. Naq jura gur Cuvyvfgvarf fnj gurve punzcvba
jnf qrnq, gurl syrq.

17:52 Naq gur zra bs Vfenry naq bs Whqnu nebfr, naq fubhgrq, naq
chefhrq gur Cuvyvfgvarf, hagvy gubh pbzr gb gur inyyrl, naq gb gur
tngrf bs Rxeba.

Naq gur jbhaqrq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf sryy qbja ol gur jnl gb Funnenvz,
rira hagb Tngu, naq hagb Rxeba.

17:53 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry erghearq sebz punfvat nsgre gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, naq gurl fcbvyrq gurve gragf.

17:54 Naq Qnivq gbbx gur urnq bs gur Cuvyvfgvar, naq oebhtug vg gb
Wrehfnyrz; ohg ur chg uvf nezbhe va uvf grag.

17:55 Naq jura Fnhy fnj Qnivq tb sbegu ntnvafg gur Cuvyvfgvar, ur fnvq
hagb Noare, gur pncgnva bs gur ubfg, Noare, jubfr fba vf guvf lbhgu?
Naq Noare fnvq, Nf gul fbhy yvirgu, B xvat, V pnaabg gryy.

17:56 Naq gur xvat fnvq, Radhver gubh jubfr fba gur fgevcyvat vf.

17:57 Naq nf Qnivq erghearq sebz gur fynhtugre bs gur Cuvyvfgvar,
Noare gbbx uvz, naq oebhtug uvz orsber Fnhy jvgu gur urnq bs gur
Cuvyvfgvar va uvf unaq.

17:58 Naq Fnhy fnvq gb uvz, Jubfr fba neg gubh, gubh lbhat zna? Naq
Qnivq nafjrerq, V nz gur fba bs gul freinag Wrffr gur Orguyrurzvgr.

18:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura ur unq znqr na raq bs fcrnxvat hagb
Fnhy, gung gur fbhy bs Wbanguna jnf xavg jvgu gur fbhy bs Qnivq, naq
Wbanguna ybirq uvz nf uvf bja fbhy.

18:2 Naq Fnhy gbbx uvz gung qnl, naq jbhyq yrg uvz tb ab zber ubzr gb
uvf sngure'f ubhfr.

18:3 Gura Wbanguna naq Qnivq znqr n pbiranag, orpnhfr ur ybirq uvz nf
uvf bja fbhy.

18:4 Naq Wbanguna fgevccrq uvzfrys bs gur ebor gung jnf hcba uvz, naq
tnir vg gb Qnivq, naq uvf tnezragf, rira gb uvf fjbeq, naq gb uvf obj,
naq gb uvf tveqyr.

18:5 Naq Qnivq jrag bhg juvgurefbrire Fnhy frag uvz, naq orunirq
uvzfrys jvfryl: naq Fnhy frg uvz bire gur zra bs jne, naq ur jnf
npprcgrq va gur fvtug bs nyy gur crbcyr, naq nyfb va gur fvtug bs
Fnhy'f freinagf.

18:6 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nf gurl pnzr, jura Qnivq jnf erghearq sebz
gur fynhtugre bs gur Cuvyvfgvar, gung gur jbzra pnzr bhg bs nyy pvgvrf
bs Vfenry, fvatvat naq qnapvat, gb zrrg xvat Fnhy, jvgu gnoergf, jvgu
wbl, naq jvgu vafgehzragf bs zhfvpx.

18:7 Naq gur jbzra nafjrerq bar nabgure nf gurl cynlrq, naq fnvq, Fnhy
ungu fynva uvf gubhfnaqf, naq Qnivq uvf gra gubhfnaqf.

18:8 Naq Fnhy jnf irel jebgu, naq gur fnlvat qvfcyrnfrq uvz; naq ur
fnvq, Gurl unir nfpevorq hagb Qnivq gra gubhfnaqf, naq gb zr gurl unir
nfpevorq ohg gubhfnaqf: naq jung pna ur unir zber ohg gur xvatqbz?
18:9 Naq Fnhy rlrq Qnivq sebz gung qnl naq sbejneq.

18:10 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur zbeebj, gung gur rivy fcvevg sebz Tbq
pnzr hcba Fnhy, naq ur cebcurfvrq va gur zvqfg bs gur ubhfr: naq Qnivq
cynlrq jvgu uvf unaq, nf ng bgure gvzrf: naq gurer jnf n wniryva va
Fnhy'f unaq.

18:11 Naq Fnhy pnfg gur wniryva; sbe ur fnvq, V jvyy fzvgr Qnivq rira
gb gur jnyy jvgu vg. Naq Qnivq nibvqrq bhg bs uvf cerfrapr gjvpr.

18:12 Naq Fnhy jnf nsenvq bs Qnivq, orpnhfr gur YBEQ jnf jvgu uvz, naq
jnf qrcnegrq sebz Fnhy.

18:13 Gurersber Fnhy erzbirq uvz sebz uvz, naq znqr uvz uvf pncgnva
bire n gubhfnaq; naq ur jrag bhg naq pnzr va orsber gur crbcyr.

18:14 Naq Qnivq orunirq uvzfrys jvfryl va nyy uvf jnlf; naq gur YBEQ
jnf jvgu uvz.

18:15 Jurersber jura Fnhy fnj gung ur orunirq uvzfrys irel jvfryl, ur
jnf nsenvq bs uvz.

18:16 Ohg nyy Vfenry naq Whqnu ybirq Qnivq, orpnhfr ur jrag bhg naq
pnzr va orsber gurz.

18:17 Naq Fnhy fnvq gb Qnivq, Orubyq zl ryqre qnhtugre Zreno, ure jvyy
V tvir gurr gb jvsr: bayl or gubh inyvnag sbe zr, naq svtug gur YBEQ'f
onggyrf.

Sbe Fnhy fnvq, Yrg abg zvar unaq or hcba uvz, ohg yrg gur unaq bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf or hcba uvz.

18:18 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Fnhy, Jub nz V? naq jung vf zl yvsr, be zl
sngure'f snzvyl va Vfenry, gung V fubhyq or fba va ynj gb gur xvat?
18:19 Ohg vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur gvzr jura Zreno Fnhy'f qnhtugre
fubhyq unir orra tvira gb Qnivq, gung fur jnf tvira hagb Nqevry gur
Zrubynguvgr gb jvsr.

18:20 Naq Zvpuny Fnhy'f qnhtugre ybirq Qnivq: naq gurl gbyq Fnhy, naq
gur guvat cyrnfrq uvz.

18:21 Naq Fnhy fnvq, V jvyy tvir uvz ure, gung fur znl or n faner gb
uvz, naq gung gur unaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf znl or ntnvafg uvz.
Jurersber Fnhy fnvq gb Qnivq, Gubh funyg guvf qnl or zl fba va ynj va
gur bar bs gur gjnva.

18:22 Naq Fnhy pbzznaqrq uvf freinagf, fnlvat, Pbzzhar jvgu Qnivq
frpergyl, naq fnl, Orubyq, gur xvat ungu qryvtug va gurr, naq nyy uvf
freinagf ybir gurr: abj gurersber or gur xvat'f fba va ynj.

18:23 Naq Fnhy'f freinagf fcnxr gubfr jbeqf va gur rnef bs Qnivq. Naq
Qnivq fnvq, Frrzrgu vg gb lbh n yvtug guvat gb or n xvat'f fba va ynj,
frrvat gung V nz n cbbe zna, naq yvtugyl rfgrrzrq?  18:24 Naq gur
freinagf bs Fnhy gbyq uvz, fnlvat, Ba guvf znaare fcnxr Qnivq.

18:25 Naq Fnhy fnvq, Guhf funyy lr fnl gb Qnivq, Gur xvat qrfvergu abg
nal qbjel, ohg na uhaqerq sberfxvaf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, gb or niratrq
bs gur xvat'f rarzvrf. Ohg Fnhy gubhtug gb znxr Qnivq snyy ol gur unaq
bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

18:26 Naq jura uvf freinagf gbyq Qnivq gurfr jbeqf, vg cyrnfrq Qnivq
jryy gb or gur xvat'f fba va ynj: naq gur qnlf jrer abg rkcverq.

18:27 Jurersber Qnivq nebfr naq jrag, ur naq uvf zra, naq fyrj bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf gjb uhaqerq zra; naq Qnivq oebhtug gurve sberfxvaf, naq
gurl tnir gurz va shyy gnyr gb gur xvat, gung ur zvtug or gur xvat'f
fba va ynj. Naq Fnhy tnir uvz Zvpuny uvf qnhtugre gb jvsr.

18:28 Naq Fnhy fnj naq xarj gung gur YBEQ jnf jvgu Qnivq, naq gung
Zvpuny Fnhy'f qnhtugre ybirq uvz.

18:29 Naq Fnhy jnf lrg gur zber nsenvq bs Qnivq; naq Fnhy orpnzr
Qnivq'f rarzl pbagvahnyyl.

18:30 Gura gur cevaprf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf jrag sbegu: naq vg pnzr gb
cnff, nsgre gurl jrag sbegu, gung Qnivq orunirq uvzfrys zber jvfryl
guna nyy gur freinagf bs Fnhy; fb gung uvf anzr jnf zhpu frg ol.

19:1 Naq Fnhy fcnxr gb Wbanguna uvf fba, naq gb nyy uvf freinagf, gung
gurl fubhyq xvyy Qnivq.

19:2 Ohg Wbanguna Fnhy'f fba qryvtugrq zhpu va Qnivq: naq Wbanguna
gbyq Qnivq, fnlvat, Fnhy zl sngure frrxrgu gb xvyy gurr: abj
gurersber, V cenl gurr, gnxr urrq gb gulfrys hagvy gur zbeavat, naq
novqr va n frperg cynpr, naq uvqr gulfrys: 19:3 Naq V jvyy tb bhg naq
fgnaq orfvqr zl sngure va gur svryq jurer gubh neg, naq V jvyy pbzzhar
jvgu zl sngure bs gurr; naq jung V frr, gung V jvyy gryy gurr.

19:4 Naq Wbanguna fcnxr tbbq bs Qnivq hagb Fnhy uvf sngure, naq fnvq
hagb uvz, Yrg abg gur xvat fva ntnvafg uvf freinag, ntnvafg Qnivq;
orpnhfr ur ungu abg fvaarq ntnvafg gurr, naq orpnhfr uvf jbexf unir
orra gb gurr-jneq irel tbbq: 19:5 Sbe ur qvq chg uvf yvsr va uvf unaq,
naq fyrj gur Cuvyvfgvar, naq gur YBEQ jebhtug n terng fnyingvba sbe
nyy Vfenry: gubh fnjrfg vg, naq qvqfg erwbvpr: jurersber gura jvyg
gubh fva ntnvafg vaabprag oybbq, gb fynl Qnivq jvgubhg n pnhfr?  19:6
Naq Fnhy urnexrarq hagb gur ibvpr bs Wbanguna: naq Fnhy fjner, Nf gur
YBEQ yvirgu, ur funyy abg or fynva.

19:7 Naq Wbanguna pnyyrq Qnivq, naq Wbanguna furjrq uvz nyy gubfr
guvatf.

Naq Wbanguna oebhtug Qnivq gb Fnhy, naq ur jnf va uvf cerfrapr, nf va
gvzrf cnfg.

19:8 Naq gurer jnf jne ntnva: naq Qnivq jrag bhg, naq sbhtug jvgu gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, naq fyrj gurz jvgu n terng fynhtugre; naq gurl syrq sebz
uvz.

19:9 Naq gur rivy fcvevg sebz gur YBEQ jnf hcba Fnhy, nf ur fng va uvf
ubhfr jvgu uvf wniryva va uvf unaq: naq Qnivq cynlrq jvgu uvf unaq.

19:10 Naq Fnhy fbhtug gb fzvgr Qnivq rira gb gur jnyy jvgu gur
wniryva: ohg ur fyvccrq njnl bhg bs Fnhy'f cerfrapr, naq ur fzbgr gur
wniryva vagb gur jnyy: naq Qnivq syrq, naq rfpncrq gung avtug.

19:11 Fnhy nyfb frag zrffratref hagb Qnivq'f ubhfr, gb jngpu uvz, naq
gb fynl uvz va gur zbeavat: naq Zvpuny Qnivq'f jvsr gbyq uvz, fnlvat,
Vs gubh fnir abg gul yvsr gb avtug, gb zbeebj gubh funyg or fynva.

19:12 Fb Zvpuny yrg Qnivq qbja guebhtu n jvaqbj: naq ur jrag, naq
syrq, naq rfpncrq.

19:13 Naq Zvpuny gbbx na vzntr, naq ynvq vg va gur orq, naq chg n
cvyybj bs tbngf' unve sbe uvf obyfgre, naq pbirerq vg jvgu n pybgu.

19:14 Naq jura Fnhy frag zrffratref gb gnxr Qnivq, fur fnvq, Ur vf
fvpx.

19:15 Naq Fnhy frag gur zrffratref ntnva gb frr Qnivq, fnlvat, Oevat
uvz hc gb zr va gur orq, gung V znl fynl uvz.

19:16 Naq jura gur zrffratref jrer pbzr va, orubyq, gurer jnf na vzntr
va gur orq, jvgu n cvyybj bs tbngf' unve sbe uvf obyfgre.

19:17 Naq Fnhy fnvq hagb Zvpuny, Jul unfg gubh qrprvirq zr fb, naq
frag njnl zvar rarzl, gung ur vf rfpncrq? Naq Zvpuny nafjrerq Fnhy, Ur
fnvq hagb zr, Yrg zr tb; jul fubhyq V xvyy gurr?  19:18 Fb Qnivq syrq,
naq rfpncrq, naq pnzr gb Fnzhry gb Enznu, naq gbyq uvz nyy gung Fnhy
unq qbar gb uvz. Naq ur naq Fnzhry jrag naq qjryg va Anvbgu.

19:19 Naq vg jnf gbyq Fnhy, fnlvat, Orubyq, Qnivq vf ng Anvbgu va
Enznu.

19:20 Naq Fnhy frag zrffratref gb gnxr Qnivq: naq jura gurl fnj gur
pbzcnal bs gur cebcurgf cebcurflvat, naq Fnzhry fgnaqvat nf nccbvagrq
bire gurz, gur Fcvevg bs Tbq jnf hcba gur zrffratref bs Fnhy, naq gurl
nyfb cebcurfvrq.

19:21 Naq jura vg jnf gbyq Fnhy, ur frag bgure zrffratref, naq gurl
cebcurfvrq yvxrjvfr. Naq Fnhy frag zrffratref ntnva gur guveq gvzr,
naq gurl cebcurfvrq nyfb.

19:22 Gura jrag ur nyfb gb Enznu, naq pnzr gb n terng jryy gung vf va
Frpuh: naq ur nfxrq naq fnvq, Jurer ner Fnzhry naq Qnivq? Naq bar
fnvq, Orubyq, gurl or ng Anvbgu va Enznu.

19:23 Naq ur jrag guvgure gb Anvbgu va Enznu: naq gur Fcvevg bs Tbq
jnf hcba uvz nyfb, naq ur jrag ba, naq cebcurfvrq, hagvy ur pnzr gb
Anvbgu va Enznu.

19:24 Naq ur fgevccrq bss uvf pybgurf nyfb, naq cebcurfvrq orsber
Fnzhry va yvxr znaare, naq ynl qbja anxrq nyy gung qnl naq nyy gung
avtug. Jurersber gurl fnl, Vf Fnhy nyfb nzbat gur cebcurgf?  20:1 Naq
Qnivq syrq sebz Anvbgu va Enznu, naq pnzr naq fnvq orsber Wbanguna,
Jung unir V qbar? jung vf zvar vavdhvgl? naq jung vf zl fva orsber gul
sngure, gung ur frrxrgu zl yvsr?  20:2 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Tbq
sbeovq; gubh funyg abg qvr: orubyq, zl sngure jvyy qb abguvat rvgure
terng be fznyy, ohg gung ur jvyy furj vg zr: naq jul fubhyq zl sngure
uvqr guvf guvat sebz zr? vg vf abg fb.

20:3 Naq Qnivq fjner zberbire, naq fnvq, Gul sngure pregnvayl xabjrgu
gung V unir sbhaq tenpr va guvar rlrf; naq ur fnvgu, Yrg abg Wbanguna
xabj guvf, yrfg ur or tevrirq: ohg gehyl nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, naq nf
gul fbhy yvirgu, gurer vf ohg n fgrc orgjrra zr naq qrngu.

20:4 Gura fnvq Wbanguna hagb Qnivq, Jungfbrire gul fbhy qrfvergu, V
jvyy rira qb vg sbe gurr.

20:5 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Wbanguna, Orubyq, gb zbeebj vf gur arj zbba,
naq V fubhyq abg snvy gb fvg jvgu gur xvat ng zrng: ohg yrg zr tb,
gung V znl uvqr zlfrys va gur svryq hagb gur guveq qnl ng rira.

20:6 Vs gul sngure ng nyy zvff zr, gura fnl, Qnivq rnearfgyl nfxrq
yrnir bs zr gung ur zvtug eha gb Orguyrurz uvf pvgl: sbe gurer vf n
lrneyl fnpevsvpr gurer sbe nyy gur snzvyl.

20:7 Vs ur fnl guhf, Vg vf jryy; gul freinag funyy unir crnpr: ohg vs
ur or irel jebgu, gura or fher gung rivy vf qrgrezvarq ol uvz.

20:8 Gurersber gubh funyg qrny xvaqyl jvgu gul freinag; sbe gubh unfg
oebhtug gul freinag vagb n pbiranag bs gur YBEQ jvgu gurr:
abgjvgufgnaqvat, vs gurer or va zr vavdhvgl, fynl zr gulfrys; sbe jul
fubhyqrfg gubh oevat zr gb gul sngure?  20:9 Naq Wbanguna fnvq, Sne or
vg sebz gurr: sbe vs V xarj pregnvayl gung rivy jrer qrgrezvarq ol zl
sngure gb pbzr hcba gurr, gura jbhyq abg V gryy vg gurr?  20:10 Gura
fnvq Qnivq gb Wbanguna, Jub funyy gryy zr? be jung vs gul sngure
nafjre gurr ebhtuyl?  20:11 Naq Wbanguna fnvq hagb Qnivq, Pbzr, naq
yrg hf tb bhg vagb gur svryq. Naq gurl jrag bhg obgu bs gurz vagb gur
svryq.

20:12 Naq Wbanguna fnvq hagb Qnivq, B YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, jura V unir
fbhaqrq zl sngure nobhg gb zbeebj nal gvzr, be gur guveq qnl, naq,
orubyq, vs gurer or tbbq gbjneq Qnivq, naq V gura fraq abg hagb gurr,
naq furj vg gurr; 20:13 Gur YBEQ qb fb naq zhpu zber gb Wbanguna: ohg
vs vg cyrnfr zl sngure gb qb gurr rivy, gura V jvyy furj vg gurr, naq
fraq gurr njnl, gung gubh znlrfg tb va crnpr: naq gur YBEQ or jvgu
gurr, nf ur ungu orra jvgu zl sngure.

20:14 Naq gubh funyg abg bayl juvyr lrg V yvir furj zr gur xvaqarff bs
gur YBEQ, gung V qvr abg: 20:15 Ohg nyfb gubh funyg abg phg bss gul
xvaqarff sebz zl ubhfr sbe rire: ab, abg jura gur YBEQ ungu phg bss
gur rarzvrf bs Qnivq rirel bar sebz gur snpr bs gur rnegu.

20:16 Fb Wbanguna znqr n pbiranag jvgu gur ubhfr bs Qnivq, fnlvat, Yrg
gur YBEQ rira erdhver vg ng gur unaq bs Qnivq'f rarzvrf.

20:17 Naq Wbanguna pnhfrq Qnivq gb fjrne ntnva, orpnhfr ur ybirq uvz:
sbe ur ybirq uvz nf ur ybirq uvf bja fbhy.

20:18 Gura Wbanguna fnvq gb Qnivq, Gb zbeebj vf gur arj zbba: naq gubh
funyg or zvffrq, orpnhfr gul frng jvyy or rzcgl.

20:19 Naq jura gubh unfg fgnlrq guerr qnlf, gura gubh funyg tb qbja
dhvpxyl, naq pbzr gb gur cynpr jurer gubh qvqfg uvqr gulfrys jura gur
ohfvarff jnf va unaq, naq funyg erznva ol gur fgbar Rmry.

20:20 Naq V jvyy fubbg guerr neebjf ba gur fvqr gurerbs, nf gubhtu V
fubg ng n znex.

20:21 Naq, orubyq, V jvyy fraq n ynq, fnlvat, Tb, svaq bhg gur neebjf.
Vs V rkcerffyl fnl hagb gur ynq, Orubyq, gur neebjf ner ba guvf fvqr
bs gurr, gnxr gurz; gura pbzr gubh: sbe gurer vf crnpr gb gurr, naq ab
uheg; nf gur YBEQ yvirgu.

20:22 Ohg vs V fnl guhf hagb gur lbhat zna, Orubyq, gur neebjf ner
orlbaq gurr; tb gul jnl: sbe gur YBEQ ungu frag gurr njnl.

20:23 Naq nf gbhpuvat gur znggre juvpu gubh naq V unir fcbxra bs,
orubyq, gur YBEQ or orgjrra gurr naq zr sbe rire.

20:24 Fb Qnivq uvq uvzfrys va gur svryq: naq jura gur arj zbba jnf
pbzr, gur xvat fng uvz qbja gb rng zrng.

20:25 Naq gur xvat fng hcba uvf frng, nf ng bgure gvzrf, rira hcba n
frng ol gur jnyy: naq Wbanguna nebfr, naq Noare fng ol Fnhy'f fvqr,
naq Qnivq'f cynpr jnf rzcgl.

20:26 Arireguryrff Fnhy fcnxr abg nal guvat gung qnl: sbe ur gubhtug,
Fbzrguvat ungu orsnyyra uvz, ur vf abg pyrna; fheryl ur vf abg pyrna.

20:27 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur zbeebj, juvpu jnf gur frpbaq qnl bs
gur zbagu, gung Qnivq'f cynpr jnf rzcgl: naq Fnhy fnvq hagb Wbanguna
uvf fba, Jurersber pbzrgu abg gur fba bs Wrffr gb zrng, arvgure
lrfgreqnl, abe gb qnl?  20:28 Naq Wbanguna nafjrerq Fnhy, Qnivq
rnearfgyl nfxrq yrnir bs zr gb tb gb Orguyrurz: 20:29 Naq ur fnvq, Yrg
zr tb, V cenl gurr; sbe bhe snzvyl ungu n fnpevsvpr va gur pvgl; naq
zl oebgure, ur ungu pbzznaqrq zr gb or gurer: naq abj, vs V unir sbhaq
snibhe va guvar rlrf, yrg zr trg njnl, V cenl gurr, naq frr zl
oerguera. Gurersber ur pbzrgu abg hagb gur xvat'f gnoyr.

20:30 Gura Fnhy'f natre jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg Wbanguna, naq ur fnvq hagb
uvz, Gubh fba bs gur creirefr eroryyvbhf jbzna, qb abg V xabj gung
gubh unfg pubfra gur fba bs Wrffr gb guvar bja pbashfvba, naq hagb gur
pbashfvba bs gul zbgure'f anxrqarff?  20:31 Sbe nf ybat nf gur fba bs
Wrffr yvirgu hcba gur tebhaq, gubh funyg abg or rfgnoyvfurq, abe gul
xvatqbz. Jurersber abj fraq naq srgpu uvz hagb zr, sbe ur funyy fheryl
qvr.

20:32 Naq Wbanguna nafjrerq Fnhy uvf sngure, naq fnvq hagb uvz,
Jurersber funyy ur or fynva? jung ungu ur qbar?  20:33 Naq Fnhy pnfg n
wniryva ng uvz gb fzvgr uvz: jurerol Wbanguna xarj gung vg jnf
qrgrezvarq bs uvf sngure gb fynl Qnivq.

20:34 Fb Wbanguna nebfr sebz gur gnoyr va svrepr natre, naq qvq rng ab
zrng gur frpbaq qnl bs gur zbagu: sbe ur jnf tevrirq sbe Qnivq,
orpnhfr uvf sngure unq qbar uvz funzr.

20:35 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur zbeavat, gung Wbanguna jrag bhg vagb
gur svryq ng gur gvzr nccbvagrq jvgu Qnivq, naq n yvggyr ynq jvgu uvz.

20:36 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvf ynq, Eha, svaq bhg abj gur neebjf juvpu V
fubbg. Naq nf gur ynq ena, ur fubg na neebj orlbaq uvz.

20:37 Naq jura gur ynq jnf pbzr gb gur cynpr bs gur neebj juvpu
Wbanguna unq fubg, Wbanguna pevrq nsgre gur ynq, naq fnvq, Vf abg gur
neebj orlbaq gurr?  20:38 Naq Wbanguna pevrq nsgre gur ynq, Znxr
fcrrq, unfgr, fgnl abg. Naq Wbanguna'f ynq tngurerq hc gur neebjf, naq
pnzr gb uvf znfgre.

20:39 Ohg gur ynq xarj abg nal guvat: bayl Wbanguna naq Qnivq xarj gur
znggre.

20:40 Naq Wbanguna tnir uvf negvyyrel hagb uvf ynq, naq fnvq hagb uvz,
Tb, pneel gurz gb gur pvgl.

20:41 Naq nf fbba nf gur ynq jnf tbar, Qnivq nebfr bhg bs n cynpr
gbjneq gur fbhgu, naq sryy ba uvf snpr gb gur tebhaq, naq objrq
uvzfrys guerr gvzrf: naq gurl xvffrq bar nabgure, naq jrcg bar jvgu
nabgure, hagvy Qnivq rkprrqrq.

20:42 Naq Wbanguna fnvq gb Qnivq, Tb va crnpr, sbenfzhpu nf jr unir
fjbea obgu bs hf va gur anzr bs gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Gur YBEQ or orgjrra
zr naq gurr, naq orgjrra zl frrq naq gul frrq sbe rire. Naq ur nebfr
naq qrcnegrq: naq Wbanguna jrag vagb gur pvgl.

21:1 Gura pnzr Qnivq gb Abo gb Nuvzryrpu gur cevrfg: naq Nuvzryrpu jnf
nsenvq ng gur zrrgvat bs Qnivq, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Jul neg gubh nybar,
naq ab zna jvgu gurr?  21:2 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Nuvzryrpu gur cevrfg,
Gur xvat ungu pbzznaqrq zr n ohfvarff, naq ungu fnvq hagb zr, Yrg ab
zna xabj nal guvat bs gur ohfvarff jurernobhg V fraq gurr, naq jung V
unir pbzznaqrq gurr: naq V unir nccbvagrq zl freinagf gb fhpu naq fhpu
n cynpr.

21:3 Abj gurersber jung vf haqre guvar unaq? tvir zr svir ybnirf bs
oernq va zvar unaq, be jung gurer vf cerfrag.

21:4 Naq gur cevrfg nafjrerq Qnivq, naq fnvq, Gurer vf ab pbzzba oernq
haqre zvar unaq, ohg gurer vf unyybjrq oernq; vs gur lbhat zra unir
xrcg gurzfryirf ng yrnfg sebz jbzra.

21:5 Naq Qnivq nafjrerq gur cevrfg, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Bs n gehgu
jbzra unir orra xrcg sebz hf nobhg gurfr guerr qnlf, fvapr V pnzr bhg,
naq gur irffryf bs gur lbhat zra ner ubyl, naq gur oernq vf va n
znaare pbzzba, lrn, gubhtu vg jrer fnapgvsvrq guvf qnl va gur irffry.

21:6 Fb gur cevrfg tnir uvz unyybjrq oernq: sbe gurer jnf ab oernq
gurer ohg gur furjoernq, gung jnf gnxra sebz orsber gur YBEQ, gb chg
ubg oernq va gur qnl jura vg jnf gnxra njnl.

21:7 Abj n pregnva zna bs gur freinagf bs Fnhy jnf gurer gung qnl,
qrgnvarq orsber gur YBEQ; naq uvf anzr jnf Qbrt, na Rqbzvgr, gur
puvrsrfg bs gur ureqzra gung orybatrq gb Fnhy.

21:8 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Nuvzryrpu, Naq vf gurer abg urer haqre guvar
unaq fcrne be fjbeq? sbe V unir arvgure oebhtug zl fjbeq abe zl
jrncbaf jvgu zr, orpnhfr gur xvat'f ohfvarff erdhverq unfgr.

21:9 Naq gur cevrfg fnvq, Gur fjbeq bs Tbyvngu gur Cuvyvfgvar, jubz
gubh fyrjrfg va gur inyyrl bs Rynu, orubyq, vg vf urer jenccrq va n
pybgu oruvaq gur rcubq: vs gubh jvyg gnxr gung, gnxr vg: sbe gurer vf
ab bgure fnir gung urer. Naq Qnivq fnvq, Gurer vf abar yvxr gung; tvir
vg zr.

21:10 Naq Qnivq nebfr naq syrq gung qnl sbe srne bs Fnhy, naq jrag gb
Npuvfu gur xvat bs Tngu.

21:11 Naq gur freinagf bs Npuvfu fnvq hagb uvz, Vf abg guvf Qnivq gur
xvat bs gur ynaq? qvq gurl abg fvat bar gb nabgure bs uvz va qnaprf,
fnlvat, Fnhy ungu fynva uvf gubhfnaqf, naq Qnivq uvf gra gubhfnaqf?
21:12 Naq Qnivq ynvq hc gurfr jbeqf va uvf urneg, naq jnf fber nsenvq
bs Npuvfu gur xvat bs Tngu.

21:13 Naq ur punatrq uvf orunivbhe orsber gurz, naq srvtarq uvzfrys
znq va gurve unaqf, naq fpenooyrq ba gur qbbef bs gur tngr, naq yrg
uvf fcvggyr snyy qbja hcba uvf orneq.

21:14 Gura fnvq Npuvfu hagb uvf freinagf, Yb, lr frr gur zna vf znq:
jurersber gura unir lr oebhtug uvz gb zr?  21:15 Unir V arrq bs znq
zra, gung lr unir oebhtug guvf sryybj gb cynl gur znq zna va zl
cerfrapr? funyy guvf sryybj pbzr vagb zl ubhfr?  22:1 Qnivq gurersber
qrcnegrq gurapr, naq rfpncrq gb gur pnir Nqhyynz: naq jura uvf
oerguera naq nyy uvf sngure'f ubhfr urneq vg, gurl jrag qbja guvgure
gb uvz.

22:2 Naq rirel bar gung jnf va qvfgerff, naq rirel bar gung jnf va
qrog, naq rirel bar gung jnf qvfpbagragrq, tngurerq gurzfryirf hagb
uvz; naq ur orpnzr n pncgnva bire gurz: naq gurer jrer jvgu uvz nobhg
sbhe uhaqerq zra.

22:3 Naq Qnivq jrag gurapr gb Zvmcru bs Zbno: naq ur fnvq hagb gur
xvat bs Zbno, Yrg zl sngure naq zl zbgure, V cenl gurr, pbzr sbegu,
naq or jvgu lbh, gvyy V xabj jung Tbq jvyy qb sbe zr.

22:4 Naq ur oebhtug gurz orsber gur xvat bs Zbno: naq gurl qjryg jvgu
uvz nyy gur juvyr gung Qnivq jnf va gur ubyq.

22:5 Naq gur cebcurg Tnq fnvq hagb Qnivq, Novqr abg va gur ubyq;
qrcneg, naq trg gurr vagb gur ynaq bs Whqnu. Gura Qnivq qrcnegrq, naq
pnzr vagb gur sberfg bs Unergu.

22:6 Jura Fnhy urneq gung Qnivq jnf qvfpbirerq, naq gur zra gung jrer
jvgu uvz, (abj Fnhy nobqr va Tvornu haqre n gerr va Enznu, univat uvf
fcrne va uvf unaq, naq nyy uvf freinagf jrer fgnaqvat nobhg uvz;) 22:7
Gura Fnhy fnvq hagb uvf freinagf gung fgbbq nobhg uvz, Urne abj, lr
Orawnzvgrf; jvyy gur fba bs Wrffr tvir rirel bar bs lbh svryqf naq
ivarlneqf, naq znxr lbh nyy pncgnvaf bs gubhfnaqf, naq pncgnvaf bs
uhaqerqf; 22:8 Gung nyy bs lbh unir pbafcverq ntnvafg zr, naq gurer vf
abar gung furjrgu zr gung zl fba ungu znqr n yrnthr jvgu gur fba bs
Wrffr, naq gurer vf abar bs lbh gung vf fbeel sbe zr, be furjrgu hagb
zr gung zl fba ungu fgveerq hc zl freinag ntnvafg zr, gb yvr va jnvg,
nf ng guvf qnl?  22:9 Gura nafjrerq Qbrt gur Rqbzvgr, juvpu jnf frg
bire gur freinagf bs Fnhy, naq fnvq, V fnj gur fba bs Wrffr pbzvat gb
Abo, gb Nuvzryrpu gur fba bs Nuvgho.

22:10 Naq ur radhverq bs gur YBEQ sbe uvz, naq tnir uvz ivpghnyf, naq
tnir uvz gur fjbeq bs Tbyvngu gur Cuvyvfgvar.

22:11 Gura gur xvat frag gb pnyy Nuvzryrpu gur cevrfg, gur fba bs
Nuvgho, naq nyy uvf sngure'f ubhfr, gur cevrfgf gung jrer va Abo: naq
gurl pnzr nyy bs gurz gb gur xvat.

22:12 Naq Fnhy fnvq, Urne abj, gubh fba bs Nuvgho. Naq ur nafjrerq,
Urer V nz, zl ybeq.

22:13 Naq Fnhy fnvq hagb uvz, Jul unir lr pbafcverq ntnvafg zr, gubh
naq gur fba bs Wrffr, va gung gubh unfg tvira uvz oernq, naq n fjbeq,
naq unfg radhverq bs Tbq sbe uvz, gung ur fubhyq evfr ntnvafg zr, gb
yvr va jnvg, nf ng guvf qnl?  22:14 Gura Nuvzryrpu nafjrerq gur xvat,
naq fnvq, Naq jub vf fb snvgushy nzbat nyy gul freinagf nf Qnivq,
juvpu vf gur xvat'f fba va ynj, naq tbrgu ng gul ovqqvat, naq vf
ubabhenoyr va guvar ubhfr?  22:15 Qvq V gura ortva gb radhver bs Tbq
sbe uvz? or vg sne sebz zr: yrg abg gur xvat vzchgr nal guvat hagb uvf
freinag, abe gb nyy gur ubhfr bs zl sngure: sbe gul freinag xarj
abguvat bs nyy guvf, yrff be zber.

22:16 Naq gur xvat fnvq, Gubh funyg fheryl qvr, Nuvzryrpu, gubh, naq
nyy gul sngure'f ubhfr.

22:17 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb gur sbbgzra gung fgbbq nobhg uvz, Ghea,
naq fynl gur cevrfgf bs gur YBEQ: orpnhfr gurve unaq nyfb vf jvgu
Qnivq, naq orpnhfr gurl xarj jura ur syrq, naq qvq abg furj vg gb zr.
Ohg gur freinagf bs gur xvat jbhyq abg chg sbegu gurve unaq gb snyy
hcba gur cevrfgf bs gur YBEQ.

22:18 Naq gur xvat fnvq gb Qbrt, Ghea gubh, naq snyy hcba gur cevrfgf.
Naq Qbrt gur Rqbzvgr ghearq, naq ur sryy hcba gur cevrfgf, naq fyrj ba
gung qnl sbhefpber naq svir crefbaf gung qvq jrne n yvara rcubq.

22:19 Naq Abo, gur pvgl bs gur cevrfgf, fzbgr ur jvgu gur rqtr bs gur
fjbeq, obgu zra naq jbzra, puvyqera naq fhpxyvatf, naq bkra, naq
nffrf, naq furrc, jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq.

22:20 Naq bar bs gur fbaf bs Nuvzryrpu gur fba bs Nuvgho, anzrq
Novngune, rfpncrq, naq syrq nsgre Qnivq.

22:21 Naq Novngune furjrq Qnivq gung Fnhy unq fynva gur YBEQ'f
cevrfgf.

22:22 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Novngune, V xarj vg gung qnl, jura Qbrt gur
Rqbzvgr jnf gurer, gung ur jbhyq fheryl gryy Fnhy: V unir bppnfvbarq
gur qrngu bs nyy gur crefbaf bs gul sngure'f ubhfr.

22:23 Novqr gubh jvgu zr, srne abg: sbe ur gung frrxrgu zl yvsr
frrxrgu gul yvsr: ohg jvgu zr gubh funyg or va fnsrthneq.

23:1 Gura gurl gbyq Qnivq, fnlvat, Orubyq, gur Cuvyvfgvarf svtug
ntnvafg Xrvynu, naq gurl ebo gur guerfuvatsybbef.

23:2 Gurersber Qnivq radhverq bs gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Funyy V tb naq
fzvgr gurfr Cuvyvfgvarf? Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Qnivq, Tb, naq fzvgr
gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq fnir Xrvynu.

23:3 Naq Qnivq'f zra fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq, jr or nsenvq urer va
Whqnu: ubj zhpu zber gura vs jr pbzr gb Xrvynu ntnvafg gur nezvrf bs
gur Cuvyvfgvarf?  23:4 Gura Qnivq radhverq bs gur YBEQ lrg ntnva. Naq
gur YBEQ nafjrerq uvz naq fnvq, Nevfr, tb qbja gb Xrvynu; sbe V jvyy
qryvire gur Cuvyvfgvarf vagb guvar unaq.

23:5 Fb Qnivq naq uvf zra jrag gb Xrvynu, naq sbhtug jvgu gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, naq oebhtug njnl gurve pnggyr, naq fzbgr gurz jvgu n
terng fynhtugre. Fb Qnivq fnirq gur vaunovgnagf bs Xrvynu.

23:6 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Novngune gur fba bs Nuvzryrpu syrq gb
Qnivq gb Xrvynu, gung ur pnzr qbja jvgu na rcubq va uvf unaq.

23:7 Naq vg jnf gbyq Fnhy gung Qnivq jnf pbzr gb Xrvynu. Naq Fnhy
fnvq, Tbq ungu qryvirerq uvz vagb zvar unaq; sbe ur vf fuhg va, ol
ragrevat vagb n gbja gung ungu tngrf naq onef.

23:8 Naq Fnhy pnyyrq nyy gur crbcyr gbtrgure gb jne, gb tb qbja gb
Xrvynu, gb orfvrtr Qnivq naq uvf zra.

23:9 Naq Qnivq xarj gung Fnhy frpergyl cenpgvfrq zvfpuvrs ntnvafg uvz;
naq ur fnvq gb Novngune gur cevrfg, Oevat uvgure gur rcubq.

23:10 Gura fnvq Qnivq, B YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, gul freinag ungu
pregnvayl urneq gung Fnhy frrxrgu gb pbzr gb Xrvynu, gb qrfgebl gur
pvgl sbe zl fnxr.

23:11 Jvyy gur zra bs Xrvynu qryvire zr hc vagb uvf unaq? jvyy Fnhy
pbzr qbja, nf gul freinag ungu urneq? B YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, V orfrrpu
gurr, gryy gul freinag. Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Ur jvyy pbzr qbja.

23:12 Gura fnvq Qnivq, Jvyy gur zra bs Xrvynu qryvire zr naq zl zra
vagb gur unaq bs Fnhy? Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Gurl jvyy qryvire gurr hc.

23:13 Gura Qnivq naq uvf zra, juvpu jrer nobhg fvk uhaqerq, nebfr naq
qrcnegrq bhg bs Xrvynu, naq jrag juvgurefbrire gurl pbhyq tb. Naq vg
jnf gbyq Fnhy gung Qnivq jnf rfpncrq sebz Xrvynu; naq ur sbeoner gb tb
sbegu.

23:14 Naq Qnivq nobqr va gur jvyqrearff va fgebat ubyqf, naq erznvarq
va n zbhagnva va gur jvyqrearff bs Mvcu. Naq Fnhy fbhtug uvz rirel
qnl, ohg Tbq qryvirerq uvz abg vagb uvf unaq.

23:15 Naq Qnivq fnj gung Fnhy jnf pbzr bhg gb frrx uvf yvsr: naq Qnivq
jnf va gur jvyqrearff bs Mvcu va n jbbq.

23:16 Naq Wbanguna Fnhy'f fba nebfr, naq jrag gb Qnivq vagb gur jbbq,
naq fgeratgurarq uvf unaq va Tbq.

23:17 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Srne abg: sbe gur unaq bs Fnhy zl sngure
funyy abg svaq gurr; naq gubh funyg or xvat bire Vfenry, naq V funyy
or arkg hagb gurr; naq gung nyfb Fnhy zl sngure xabjrgu.

23:18 Naq gurl gjb znqr n pbiranag orsber gur YBEQ: naq Qnivq nobqr va
gur jbbq, naq Wbanguna jrag gb uvf ubhfr.

23:19 Gura pnzr hc gur Mvcuvgrf gb Fnhy gb Tvornu, fnlvat, Qbgu abg
Qnivq uvqr uvzfrys jvgu hf va fgebat ubyqf va gur jbbq, va gur uvyy bs
Unpuvynu, juvpu vf ba gur fbhgu bs Wrfuvzba?  23:20 Abj gurersber, B
xvat, pbzr qbja nppbeqvat gb nyy gur qrfver bs gul fbhy gb pbzr qbja;
naq bhe cneg funyy or gb qryvire uvz vagb gur xvat'f unaq.

23:21 Naq Fnhy fnvq, Oyrffrq or lr bs gur YBEQ; sbe lr unir pbzcnffvba
ba zr.

23:22 Tb, V cenl lbh, cercner lrg, naq xabj naq frr uvf cynpr jurer
uvf unhag vf, naq jub ungu frra uvz gurer: sbe vg vf gbyq zr gung ur
qrnyrgu irel fhogvyyl.

23:23 Frr gurersber, naq gnxr xabjyrqtr bs nyy gur yhexvat cynprf
jurer ur uvqrgu uvzfrys, naq pbzr lr ntnva gb zr jvgu gur pregnvagl,
