naq V jvyy tb jvgu lbh: naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, vs ur or va gur
ynaq, gung V jvyy frnepu uvz bhg guebhtubhg nyy gur gubhfnaqf bs
Whqnu.

23:24 Naq gurl nebfr, naq jrag gb Mvcu orsber Fnhy: ohg Qnivq naq uvf
zra jrer va gur jvyqrearff bs Znba, va gur cynva ba gur fbhgu bs
Wrfuvzba.

23:25 Fnhy nyfb naq uvf zra jrag gb frrx uvz. Naq gurl gbyq Qnivq;
jurersber ur pnzr qbja vagb n ebpx, naq nobqr va gur jvyqrearff bs
Znba. Naq jura Fnhy urneq gung, ur chefhrq nsgre Qnivq va gur
jvyqrearff bs Znba.

23:26 Naq Fnhy jrag ba guvf fvqr bs gur zbhagnva, naq Qnivq naq uvf
zra ba gung fvqr bs gur zbhagnva: naq Qnivq znqr unfgr gb trg njnl sbe
srne bs Fnhy; sbe Fnhy naq uvf zra pbzcnffrq Qnivq naq uvf zra ebhaq
nobhg gb gnxr gurz.

23:27 Ohg gurer pnzr n zrffratre hagb Fnhy, fnlvat, Unfgr gurr, naq
pbzr; sbe gur Cuvyvfgvarf unir vainqrq gur ynaq.

23:28 Jurersber Fnhy erghearq sebz chefhvat nsgre Qnivq, naq jrag
ntnvafg gur Cuvyvfgvarf: gurersber gurl pnyyrq gung cynpr
Frynunzznuyrxbgu.

23:29 Naq Qnivq jrag hc sebz gurapr, naq qjryg va fgebat ubyqf ng
Ratrqv.

24:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Fnhy jnf erghearq sebz sbyybjvat gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, gung vg jnf gbyq uvz, fnlvat, Orubyq, Qnivq vf va gur
jvyqrearff bs Ratrqv.

24:2 Gura Fnhy gbbx guerr gubhfnaq pubfra zra bhg bs nyy Vfenry, naq
jrag gb frrx Qnivq naq uvf zra hcba gur ebpxf bs gur jvyq tbngf.

24:3 Naq ur pnzr gb gur furrcpbgrf ol gur jnl, jurer jnf n pnir; naq
Fnhy jrag va gb pbire uvf srrg: naq Qnivq naq uvf zra erznvarq va gur
fvqrf bs gur pnir.

24:4 Naq gur zra bs Qnivq fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq gur qnl bs juvpu gur
YBEQ fnvq hagb gurr, Orubyq, V jvyy qryvire guvar rarzl vagb guvar
unaq, gung gubh znlrfg qb gb uvz nf vg funyy frrz tbbq hagb gurr. Gura
Qnivq nebfr, naq phg bss gur fxveg bs Fnhy'f ebor cevivyl.

24:5 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgrejneq, gung Qnivq'f urneg fzbgr uvz,
orpnhfr ur unq phg bss Fnhy'f fxveg.

24:6 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvf zra, Gur YBEQ sbeovq gung V fubhyq qb guvf
guvat hagb zl znfgre, gur YBEQ'f nabvagrq, gb fgergpu sbegu zvar unaq
ntnvafg uvz, frrvat ur vf gur nabvagrq bs gur YBEQ.

24:7 Fb Qnivq fgnlrq uvf freinagf jvgu gurfr jbeqf, naq fhssrerq gurz
abg gb evfr ntnvafg Fnhy. Ohg Fnhy ebfr hc bhg bs gur pnir, naq jrag
ba uvf jnl.

24:8 Qnivq nyfb nebfr nsgrejneq, naq jrag bhg bs gur pnir, naq pevrq
nsgre Fnhy, fnlvat, Zl ybeq gur xvat. Naq jura Fnhy ybbxrq oruvaq uvz,
Qnivq fgbbcrq jvgu uvf snpr gb gur rnegu, naq objrq uvzfrys.

24:9 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Fnhy, Jurersber urnerfg gubh zra'f jbeqf,
fnlvat, Orubyq, Qnivq frrxrgu gul uheg?  24:10 Orubyq, guvf qnl guvar
rlrf unir frra ubj gung gur YBEQ unq qryvirerq gurr gb qnl vagb zvar
unaq va gur pnir: naq fbzr onqr zr xvyy gurr: ohg zvar rlr fcnerq
gurr; naq V fnvq, V jvyy abg chg sbegu zvar unaq ntnvafg zl ybeq; sbe
ur vf gur YBEQ'f nabvagrq.

24:11 Zberbire, zl sngure, frr, lrn, frr gur fxveg bs gul ebor va zl
unaq: sbe va gung V phg bss gur fxveg bs gul ebor, naq xvyyrq gurr
abg, xabj gubh naq frr gung gurer vf arvgure rivy abe genafterffvba va
zvar unaq, naq V unir abg fvaarq ntnvafg gurr; lrg gubh uhagrfg zl
fbhy gb gnxr vg.

24:12 Gur YBEQ whqtr orgjrra zr naq gurr, naq gur YBEQ niratr zr bs
gurr: ohg zvar unaq funyy abg or hcba gurr.

24:13 Nf fnvgu gur cebireo bs gur napvragf, Jvpxrqarff cebprrqrgu sebz
gur jvpxrq: ohg zvar unaq funyy abg or hcba gurr.

24:14 Nsgre jubz vf gur xvat bs Vfenry pbzr bhg? nsgre jubz qbfg gubh
chefhr? nsgre n qrnq qbt, nsgre n syrn.

24:15 Gur YBEQ gurersber or whqtr, naq whqtr orgjrra zr naq gurr, naq
frr, naq cyrnq zl pnhfr, naq qryvire zr bhg bs guvar unaq.

24:16 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Qnivq unq znqr na raq bs fcrnxvat
gurfr jbeqf hagb Fnhy, gung Fnhy fnvq, Vf guvf gul ibvpr, zl fba
Qnivq? Naq Fnhy yvsgrq hc uvf ibvpr, naq jrcg.

24:17 Naq ur fnvq gb Qnivq, Gubh neg zber evtugrbhf guna V: sbe gubh
unfg erjneqrq zr tbbq, jurernf V unir erjneqrq gurr rivy.

24:18 Naq gubh unfg furjrq guvf qnl ubj gung gubh unfg qrnyg jryy jvgu
zr: sbenfzhpu nf jura gur YBEQ unq qryvirerq zr vagb guvar unaq, gubh
xvyyrqfg zr abg.

24:19 Sbe vs n zna svaq uvf rarzl, jvyy ur yrg uvz tb jryy njnl?
jurersber gur YBEQ erjneq gurr tbbq sbe gung gubh unfg qbar hagb zr
guvf qnl.

24:20 Naq abj, orubyq, V xabj jryy gung gubh funyg fheryl or xvat, naq
gung gur xvatqbz bs Vfenry funyy or rfgnoyvfurq va guvar unaq.

24:21 Fjrne abj gurersber hagb zr ol gur YBEQ, gung gubh jvyg abg phg
bss zl frrq nsgre zr, naq gung gubh jvyg abg qrfgebl zl anzr bhg bs zl
sngure'f ubhfr.

24:22 Naq Qnivq fjner hagb Fnhy. Naq Fnhy jrag ubzr; ohg Qnivq naq uvf
zra tng gurz hc hagb gur ubyq.

25:1 Naq Fnzhry qvrq; naq nyy gur Vfenryvgrf jrer tngurerq gbtrgure,
naq ynzragrq uvz, naq ohevrq uvz va uvf ubhfr ng Enznu. Naq Qnivq
nebfr, naq jrag qbja gb gur jvyqrearff bs Cnena.

25:2 Naq gurer jnf n zna va Znba, jubfr cbffrffvbaf jrer va Pnezry;
naq gur zna jnf irel terng, naq ur unq guerr gubhfnaq furrc, naq n
gubhfnaq tbngf: naq ur jnf furnevat uvf furrc va Pnezry.

25:3 Abj gur anzr bs gur zna jnf Anony; naq gur anzr bs uvf jvsr
Novtnvy: naq fur jnf n jbzna bs tbbq haqrefgnaqvat, naq bs n ornhgvshy
pbhagranapr: ohg gur zna jnf puheyvfu naq rivy va uvf qbvatf; naq ur
jnf bs gur ubhfr bs Pnyro.

25:4 Naq Qnivq urneq va gur jvyqrearff gung Anony qvq furne uvf furrc.

25:5 Naq Qnivq frag bhg gra lbhat zra, naq Qnivq fnvq hagb gur lbhat
zra, Trg lbh hc gb Pnezry, naq tb gb Anony, naq terrg uvz va zl anzr:
25:6 Naq guhf funyy lr fnl gb uvz gung yvirgu va cebfcrevgl, Crnpr or
obgu gb gurr, naq crnpr or gb guvar ubhfr, naq crnpr or hagb nyy gung
gubh unfg.

25:7 Naq abj V unir urneq gung gubh unfg furneref: abj gul furcureqf
juvpu jrer jvgu hf, jr uheg gurz abg, arvgure jnf gurer bhtug zvffvat
hagb gurz, nyy gur juvyr gurl jrer va Pnezry.

25:8 Nfx gul lbhat zra, naq gurl jvyy furj gurr. Jurersber yrg gur
lbhat zra svaq snibhe va guvar rlrf: sbe jr pbzr va n tbbq qnl: tvir,
V cenl gurr, jungfbrire pbzrgu gb guvar unaq hagb gul freinagf, naq gb
gul fba Qnivq.

25:9 Naq jura Qnivq'f lbhat zra pnzr, gurl fcnxr gb Anony nppbeqvat gb
nyy gubfr jbeqf va gur anzr bs Qnivq, naq prnfrq.

25:10 Naq Anony nafjrerq Qnivq'f freinagf, naq fnvq, Jub vf Qnivq? naq
jub vf gur fba bs Wrffr? gurer or znal freinagf abj n qnlf gung oernx
njnl rirel zna sebz uvf znfgre.

25:11 Funyy V gura gnxr zl oernq, naq zl jngre, naq zl syrfu gung V
unir xvyyrq sbe zl furneref, naq tvir vg hagb zra, jubz V xabj abg
jurapr gurl or?  25:12 Fb Qnivq'f lbhat zra ghearq gurve jnl, naq jrag
ntnva, naq pnzr naq gbyq uvz nyy gubfr fnlvatf.

25:13 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb uvf zra, Tveq lr ba rirel zna uvf fjbeq. Naq
gurl tveqrq ba rirel zna uvf fjbeq; naq Qnivq nyfb tveqrq ba uvf
fjbeq: naq gurer jrag hc nsgre Qnivq nobhg sbhe uhaqerq zra; naq gjb
uhaqerq nobqr ol gur fghss.

25:14 Ohg bar bs gur lbhat zra gbyq Novtnvy, Anony'f jvsr, fnlvat,
Orubyq, Qnivq frag zrffratref bhg bs gur jvyqrearff gb fnyhgr bhe
znfgre; naq ur envyrq ba gurz.

25:15 Ohg gur zra jrer irel tbbq hagb hf, naq jr jrer abg uheg,
arvgure zvffrq jr nal guvat, nf ybat nf jr jrer pbairefnag jvgu gurz,
jura jr jrer va gur svryqf: 25:16 Gurl jrer n jnyy hagb hf obgu ol
avtug naq qnl, nyy gur juvyr jr jrer jvgu gurz xrrcvat gur furrc.

25:17 Abj gurersber xabj naq pbafvqre jung gubh jvyg qb; sbe rivy vf
qrgrezvarq ntnvafg bhe znfgre, naq ntnvafg nyy uvf ubhfrubyq: sbe ur
vf fhpu n fba bs Oryvny, gung n zna pnaabg fcrnx gb uvz.

25:18 Gura Novtnvy znqr unfgr, naq gbbx gjb uhaqerq ybnirf, naq gjb
obggyrf bs jvar, naq svir furrc ernql qerffrq, naq svir zrnfherf bs
cnepurq pbea, naq na uhaqerq pyhfgref bs envfvaf, naq gjb uhaqerq
pnxrf bs svtf, naq ynvq gurz ba nffrf.

25:19 Naq fur fnvq hagb ure freinagf, Tb ba orsber zr; orubyq, V pbzr
nsgre lbh. Ohg fur gbyq abg ure uhfonaq Anony.

25:20 Naq vg jnf fb, nf fur ebqr ba gur nff, gung fur pnzr qbja ol gur
pbireg ba gur uvyy, naq, orubyq, Qnivq naq uvf zra pnzr qbja ntnvafg
ure; naq fur zrg gurz.

25:21 Abj Qnivq unq fnvq, Fheryl va inva unir V xrcg nyy gung guvf
sryybj ungu va gur jvyqrearff, fb gung abguvat jnf zvffrq bs nyy gung
cregnvarq hagb uvz: naq ur ungu erdhvgrq zr rivy sbe tbbq.

25:22 Fb naq zber nyfb qb Tbq hagb gur rarzvrf bs Qnivq, vs V yrnir bs
nyy gung cregnva gb uvz ol gur zbeavat yvtug nal gung cvffrgu ntnvafg
gur jnyy.

25:23 Naq jura Novtnvy fnj Qnivq, fur unfgrq, naq yvtugrq bss gur nff,
naq sryy orsber Qnivq ba ure snpr, naq objrq urefrys gb gur tebhaq,
25:24 Naq sryy ng uvf srrg, naq fnvq, Hcba zr, zl ybeq, hcba zr yrg
guvf vavdhvgl or: naq yrg guvar unaqznvq, V cenl gurr, fcrnx va guvar
nhqvrapr, naq urne gur jbeqf bs guvar unaqznvq.

25:25 Yrg abg zl ybeq, V cenl gurr, ertneq guvf zna bs Oryvny, rira
Anony: sbe nf uvf anzr vf, fb vf ur; Anony vf uvf anzr, naq sbyyl vf
jvgu uvz: ohg V guvar unaqznvq fnj abg gur lbhat zra bs zl ybeq, jubz
gubh qvqfg fraq.

25:26 Abj gurersber, zl ybeq, nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, naq nf gul fbhy
yvirgu, frrvat gur YBEQ ungu jvguubyqra gurr sebz pbzvat gb furq
oybbq, naq sebz niratvat gulfrys jvgu guvar bja unaq, abj yrg guvar
rarzvrf, naq gurl gung frrx rivy gb zl ybeq, or nf Anony.

25:27 Naq abj guvf oyrffvat juvpu guvar unaqznvq ungu oebhtug hagb zl
ybeq, yrg vg rira or tvira hagb gur lbhat zra gung sbyybj zl ybeq.

25:28 V cenl gurr, sbetvir gur gerfcnff bs guvar unaqznvq: sbe gur
YBEQ jvyy pregnvayl znxr zl ybeq n fher ubhfr; orpnhfr zl ybeq
svtugrgu gur onggyrf bs gur YBEQ, naq rivy ungu abg orra sbhaq va gurr
nyy gul qnlf.

25:29 Lrg n zna vf evfra gb chefhr gurr, naq gb frrx gul fbhy: ohg gur
fbhy bs zl ybeq funyy or obhaq va gur ohaqyr bs yvsr jvgu gur YBEQ gul
Tbq; naq gur fbhyf bs guvar rarzvrf, gurz funyy ur fyvat bhg, nf bhg
bs gur zvqqyr bs n fyvat.

25:30 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura gur YBEQ funyy unir qbar gb zl
ybeq nppbeqvat gb nyy gur tbbq gung ur ungu fcbxra pbapreavat gurr,
naq funyy unir nccbvagrq gurr ehyre bire Vfenry; 25:31 Gung guvf funyy
or ab tevrs hagb gurr, abe bssrapr bs urneg hagb zl ybeq, rvgure gung
gubh unfg furq oybbq pnhfryrff, be gung zl ybeq ungu niratrq uvzfrys:
ohg jura gur YBEQ funyy unir qrnyg jryy jvgu zl ybeq, gura erzrzore
guvar unaqznvq.

25:32 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Novtnvy, Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry,
juvpu frag gurr guvf qnl gb zrrg zr: 25:33 Naq oyrffrq or gul nqivpr,
naq oyrffrq or gubh, juvpu unfg xrcg zr guvf qnl sebz pbzvat gb furq
oybbq, naq sebz niratvat zlfrys jvgu zvar bja unaq.

25:34 Sbe va irel qrrq, nf gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry yvirgu, juvpu ungu
xrcg zr onpx sebz uhegvat gurr, rkprcg gubh unqfg unfgrq naq pbzr gb
zrrg zr, fheryl gurer unq abg orra yrsg hagb Anony ol gur zbeavat
yvtug nal gung cvffrgu ntnvafg gur jnyy.

25:35 Fb Qnivq erprvirq bs ure unaq gung juvpu fur unq oebhtug uvz,
naq fnvq hagb ure, Tb hc va crnpr gb guvar ubhfr; frr, V unir
urnexrarq gb gul ibvpr, naq unir npprcgrq gul crefba.

25:36 Naq Novtnvy pnzr gb Anony; naq, orubyq, ur uryq n srnfg va uvf
ubhfr, yvxr gur srnfg bs n xvat; naq Anony'f urneg jnf zreel jvguva
uvz, sbe ur jnf irel qehaxra: jurersber fur gbyq uvz abguvat, yrff be
zber, hagvy gur zbeavat yvtug.

25:37 Ohg vg pnzr gb cnff va gur zbeavat, jura gur jvar jnf tbar bhg
bs Anony, naq uvf jvsr unq gbyq uvz gurfr guvatf, gung uvf urneg qvrq
jvguva uvz, naq ur orpnzr nf n fgbar.

25:38 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nobhg gra qnlf nsgre, gung gur YBEQ fzbgr
Anony, gung ur qvrq.

25:39 Naq jura Qnivq urneq gung Anony jnf qrnq, ur fnvq, Oyrffrq or
gur YBEQ, gung ungu cyrnqrq gur pnhfr bs zl ercebnpu sebz gur unaq bs
Anony, naq ungu xrcg uvf freinag sebz rivy: sbe gur YBEQ ungu erghearq
gur jvpxrqarff bs Anony hcba uvf bja urnq. Naq Qnivq frag naq pbzzharq
jvgu Novtnvy, gb gnxr ure gb uvz gb jvsr.

25:40 Naq jura gur freinagf bs Qnivq jrer pbzr gb Novtnvy gb Pnezry,
gurl fcnxr hagb ure, fnlvat, Qnivq frag hf hagb gurr, gb gnxr gurr gb
uvz gb jvsr.

25:41 Naq fur nebfr, naq objrq urefrys ba ure snpr gb gur rnegu, naq
fnvq, Orubyq, yrg guvar unaqznvq or n freinag gb jnfu gur srrg bs gur
freinagf bs zl ybeq.

25:42 Naq Novtnvy unfgrq, naq nebfr naq ebqr hcba na nff, jvgu svir
qnzfryf bs uref gung jrag nsgre ure; naq fur jrag nsgre gur zrffratref
bs Qnivq, naq orpnzr uvf jvsr.

25:43 Qnivq nyfb gbbx Nuvabnz bs Wrmerry; naq gurl jrer nyfb obgu bs
gurz uvf jvirf.

25:44 Ohg Fnhy unq tvira Zvpuny uvf qnhtugre, Qnivq'f jvsr, gb Cunygv
gur fba bs Ynvfu, juvpu jnf bs Tnyyvz.

26:1 Naq gur Mvcuvgrf pnzr hagb Fnhy gb Tvornu, fnlvat, Qbgu abg Qnivq
uvqr uvzfrys va gur uvyy bs Unpuvynu, juvpu vf orsber Wrfuvzba?  26:2
Gura Fnhy nebfr, naq jrag qbja gb gur jvyqrearff bs Mvcu, univat guerr
gubhfnaq pubfra zra bs Vfenry jvgu uvz, gb frrx Qnivq va gur
jvyqrearff bs Mvcu.

26:3 Naq Fnhy cvgpurq va gur uvyy bs Unpuvynu, juvpu vf orsber
Wrfuvzba, ol gur jnl. Ohg Qnivq nobqr va gur jvyqrearff, naq ur fnj
gung Fnhy pnzr nsgre uvz vagb gur jvyqrearff.

26:4 Qnivq gurersber frag bhg fcvrf, naq haqrefgbbq gung Fnhy jnf pbzr
va irel qrrq.

26:5 Naq Qnivq nebfr, naq pnzr gb gur cynpr jurer Fnhy unq cvgpurq:
naq Qnivq oruryq gur cynpr jurer Fnhy ynl, naq Noare gur fba bs Are,
gur pncgnva bs uvf ubfg: naq Fnhy ynl va gur gerapu, naq gur crbcyr
cvgpurq ebhaq nobhg uvz.

26:6 Gura nafjrerq Qnivq naq fnvq gb Nuvzryrpu gur Uvggvgr, naq gb
Novfunv gur fba bs Mrehvnu, oebgure gb Wbno, fnlvat, Jub jvyy tb qbja
jvgu zr gb Fnhy gb gur pnzc? Naq Novfunv fnvq, V jvyy tb qbja jvgu
gurr.

26:7 Fb Qnivq naq Novfunv pnzr gb gur crbcyr ol avtug: naq, orubyq,
Fnhy ynl fyrrcvat jvguva gur gerapu, naq uvf fcrne fghpx va gur tebhaq
ng uvf obyfgre: ohg Noare naq gur crbcyr ynl ebhaq nobhg uvz.

26:8 Gura fnvq Novfunv gb Qnivq, Tbq ungu qryvirerq guvar rarzl vagb
guvar unaq guvf qnl: abj gurersber yrg zr fzvgr uvz, V cenl gurr, jvgu
gur fcrne rira gb gur rnegu ng bapr, naq V jvyy abg fzvgr uvz gur
frpbaq gvzr.

26:9 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Novfunv, Qrfgebl uvz abg: sbe jub pna fgergpu
sbegu uvf unaq ntnvafg gur YBEQ'f nabvagrq, naq or thvygyrff?  26:10
Qnivq fnvq shegurezber, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, gur YBEQ funyy fzvgr uvz;
be uvf qnl funyy pbzr gb qvr; be ur funyy qrfpraq vagb onggyr, naq
crevfu.

26:11 Gur YBEQ sbeovq gung V fubhyq fgergpu sbegu zvar unaq ntnvafg
gur YBEQ'f nabvagrq: ohg, V cenl gurr, gnxr gubh abj gur fcrne gung vf
ng uvf obyfgre, naq gur pehfr bs jngre, naq yrg hf tb.

26:12 Fb Qnivq gbbx gur fcrne naq gur pehfr bs jngre sebz Fnhy'f
obyfgre; naq gurl tng gurz njnl, naq ab zna fnj vg, abe xarj vg,
arvgure njnxrq: sbe gurl jrer nyy nfyrrc; orpnhfr n qrrc fyrrc sebz
gur YBEQ jnf snyyra hcba gurz.

26:13 Gura Qnivq jrag bire gb gur bgure fvqr, naq fgbbq ba gur gbc bs
na uvyy nsne bss; n terng fcnpr orvat orgjrra gurz: 26:14 Naq Qnivq
pevrq gb gur crbcyr, naq gb Noare gur fba bs Are, fnlvat, Nafjrerfg
gubh abg, Noare? Gura Noare nafjrerq naq fnvq, Jub neg gubh gung
pevrfg gb gur xvat?  26:15 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Noare, Neg abg gubh n
inyvnag zna? naq jub vf yvxr gb gurr va Vfenry? jurersber gura unfg
gubh abg xrcg gul ybeq gur xvat? sbe gurer pnzr bar bs gur crbcyr va
gb qrfgebl gur xvat gul ybeq.

26:16 Guvf guvat vf abg tbbq gung gubh unfg qbar. Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu,
lr ner jbegul gb qvr, orpnhfr lr unir abg xrcg lbhe znfgre, gur YBEQ'f
nabvagrq.

Naq abj frr jurer gur xvat'f fcrne vf, naq gur pehfr bs jngre gung jnf
ng uvf obyfgre.

26:17 Naq Fnhy xarj Qnivq'f ibvpr, naq fnvq, Vf guvf gul ibvpr, zl fba
Qnivq? Naq Qnivq fnvq, Vg vf zl ibvpr, zl ybeq, B xvat.

26:18 Naq ur fnvq, Jurersber qbgu zl ybeq guhf chefhr nsgre uvf
freinag?  sbe jung unir V qbar? be jung rivy vf va zvar unaq?  26:19
Abj gurersber, V cenl gurr, yrg zl ybeq gur xvat urne gur jbeqf bs uvf
freinag. Vs gur YBEQ unir fgveerq gurr hc ntnvafg zr, yrg uvz npprcg
na bssrevat: ohg vs gurl or gur puvyqera bs zra, phefrq or gurl orsber
gur YBEQ; sbe gurl unir qevira zr bhg guvf qnl sebz novqvat va gur
vaurevgnapr bs gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Tb, freir bgure tbqf.

26:20 Abj gurersber, yrg abg zl oybbq snyy gb gur rnegu orsber gur
snpr bs gur YBEQ: sbe gur xvat bs Vfenry vf pbzr bhg gb frrx n syrn,
nf jura bar qbgu uhag n cnegevqtr va gur zbhagnvaf.

26:21 Gura fnvq Fnhy, V unir fvaarq: erghea, zl fba Qnivq: sbe V jvyy
ab zber qb gurr unez, orpnhfr zl fbhy jnf cerpvbhf va guvar rlrf guvf
qnl: orubyq, V unir cynlrq gur sbby, naq unir reerq rkprrqvatyl.

26:22 Naq Qnivq nafjrerq naq fnvq, Orubyq gur xvat'f fcrne! naq yrg
bar bs gur lbhat zra pbzr bire naq srgpu vg.

26:23 Gur YBEQ eraqre gb rirel zna uvf evtugrbhfarff naq uvf
snvgushyarff; sbe gur YBEQ qryvirerq gurr vagb zl unaq gb qnl, ohg V
jbhyq abg fgergpu sbegu zvar unaq ntnvafg gur YBEQ'f nabvagrq.

26:24 Naq, orubyq, nf gul yvsr jnf zhpu frg ol guvf qnl va zvar rlrf,
fb yrg zl yvsr or zhpu frg ol va gur rlrf bs gur YBEQ, naq yrg uvz
qryvire zr bhg bs nyy gevohyngvba.

26:25 Gura Fnhy fnvq gb Qnivq, Oyrffrq or gubh, zl fba Qnivq: gubh
funyg obgu qb terng guvatf, naq nyfb funyg fgvyy cerinvy. Fb Qnivq
jrag ba uvf jnl, naq Fnhy erghearq gb uvf cynpr.

27:1 Naq Qnivq fnvq va uvf urneg, V funyy abj crevfu bar qnl ol gur
unaq bs Fnhy: gurer vf abguvat orggre sbe zr guna gung V fubhyq
fcrrqvyl rfpncr vagb gur ynaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf; naq Fnhy funyy
qrfcnve bs zr, gb frrx zr nal zber va nal pbnfg bs Vfenry: fb funyy V
rfpncr bhg bs uvf unaq.

27:2 Naq Qnivq nebfr, naq ur cnffrq bire jvgu gur fvk uhaqerq zra gung
jrer jvgu uvz hagb Npuvfu, gur fba bs Znbpu, xvat bs Tngu.

27:3 Naq Qnivq qjryg jvgu Npuvfu ng Tngu, ur naq uvf zra, rirel zna
jvgu uvf ubhfrubyq, rira Qnivq jvgu uvf gjb jvirf, Nuvabnz gur
Wrmerryvgrff, naq Novtnvy gur Pnezryvgrff, Anony'f jvsr.

27:4 Naq vg jnf gbyq Fnhy gung Qnivq jnf syrq gb Tngu: naq ur fbhtug
ab zber ntnva sbe uvz.

27:5 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Npuvfu, Vs V unir abj sbhaq tenpr va guvar
rlrf, yrg gurz tvir zr n cynpr va fbzr gbja va gur pbhagel, gung V znl
qjryy gurer: sbe jul fubhyq gul freinag qjryy va gur eblny pvgl jvgu
gurr?  27:6 Gura Npuvfu tnir uvz Mvxynt gung qnl: jurersber Mvxynt
cregnvargu hagb gur xvatf bs Whqnu hagb guvf qnl.

27:7 Naq gur gvzr gung Qnivq qjryg va gur pbhagel bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf
jnf n shyy lrne naq sbhe zbaguf.

27:8 Naq Qnivq naq uvf zra jrag hc, naq vainqrq gur Trfuhevgrf, naq
gur Trmevgrf, naq gur Nznyrxvgrf: sbe gubfr angvbaf jrer bs byq gur
vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq, nf gubh tbrfg gb Fuhe, rira hagb gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg.

27:9 Naq Qnivq fzbgr gur ynaq, naq yrsg arvgure zna abe jbzna nyvir,
naq gbbx njnl gur furrc, naq gur bkra, naq gur nffrf, naq gur pnzryf,
naq gur nccnery, naq erghearq, naq pnzr gb Npuvfu.

27:10 Naq Npuvfu fnvq, Juvgure unir lr znqr n ebnq gb qnl? Naq Qnivq
fnvq, Ntnvafg gur fbhgu bs Whqnu, naq ntnvafg gur fbhgu bs gur
Wrenuzrryvgrf, naq ntnvafg gur fbhgu bs gur Xravgrf.

27:11 Naq Qnivq fnirq arvgure zna abe jbzna nyvir, gb oevat gvqvatf gb
Tngu, fnlvat, Yrfg gurl fubhyq gryy ba hf, fnlvat, Fb qvq Qnivq, naq
fb jvyy or uvf znaare nyy gur juvyr ur qjryyrgu va gur pbhagel bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf.

27:12 Naq Npuvfu oryvrirq Qnivq, fnlvat, Ur ungu znqr uvf crbcyr
Vfenry hggreyl gb noube uvz; gurersber ur funyy or zl freinag sbe
rire.

28:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gubfr qnlf, gung gur Cuvyvfgvarf tngurerq
gurve nezvrf gbtrgure sbe jnesner, gb svtug jvgu Vfenry. Naq Npuvfu
fnvq hagb Qnivq, Xabj gubh nffherqyl, gung gubh funyg tb bhg jvgu zr
gb onggyr, gubh naq gul zra.

28:2 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Npuvfu, Fheryl gubh funyg xabj jung gul freinag
pna qb. Naq Npuvfu fnvq gb Qnivq, Gurersber jvyy V znxr gurr xrrcre bs
zvar urnq sbe rire.

28:3 Abj Fnzhry jnf qrnq, naq nyy Vfenry unq ynzragrq uvz, naq ohevrq
uvz va Enznu, rira va uvf bja pvgl. Naq Fnhy unq chg njnl gubfr gung
unq snzvyvne fcvevgf, naq gur jvmneqf, bhg bs gur ynaq.

28:4 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure, naq pnzr naq
cvgpurq va Fuharz: naq Fnhy tngurerq nyy Vfenry gbtrgure, naq gurl
cvgpurq va Tvyobn.

28:5 Naq jura Fnhy fnj gur ubfg bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, ur jnf nsenvq, naq
uvf urneg terngyl gerzoyrq.

28:6 Naq jura Fnhy radhverq bs gur YBEQ, gur YBEQ nafjrerq uvz abg,
arvgure ol qernzf, abe ol Hevz, abe ol cebcurgf.

28:7 Gura fnvq Fnhy hagb uvf freinagf, Frrx zr n jbzna gung ungu n
snzvyvne fcvevg, gung V znl tb gb ure, naq radhver bs ure. Naq uvf
freinagf fnvq gb uvz, Orubyq, gurer vf n jbzna gung ungu n snzvyvne
fcvevg ng Raqbe.

28:8 Naq Fnhy qvfthvfrq uvzfrys, naq chg ba bgure envzrag, naq ur
jrag, naq gjb zra jvgu uvz, naq gurl pnzr gb gur jbzna ol avtug: naq
ur fnvq, V cenl gurr, qvivar hagb zr ol gur snzvyvne fcvevg, naq oevat
zr uvz hc, jubz V funyy anzr hagb gurr.

28:9 Naq gur jbzna fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq, gubh xabjrfg jung Fnhy ungu
qbar, ubj ur ungu phg bss gubfr gung unir snzvyvne fcvevgf, naq gur
jvmneqf, bhg bs gur ynaq: jurersber gura ynlrfg gubh n faner sbe zl
yvsr, gb pnhfr zr gb qvr?  28:10 Naq Fnhy fjner gb ure ol gur YBEQ,
fnlvat, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, gurer funyy ab chavfuzrag unccra gb gurr
sbe guvf guvat.

28:11 Gura fnvq gur jbzna, Jubz funyy V oevat hc hagb gurr? Naq ur
fnvq, Oevat zr hc Fnzhry.

28:12 Naq jura gur jbzna fnj Fnzhry, fur pevrq jvgu n ybhq ibvpr: naq
gur jbzna fcnxr gb Fnhy, fnlvat, Jul unfg gubh qrprvirq zr? sbe gubh
neg Fnhy.

28:13 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb ure, Or abg nsenvq: sbe jung fnjrfg gubh?
Naq gur jbzna fnvq hagb Fnhy, V fnj tbqf nfpraqvat bhg bs gur rnegu.

28:14 Naq ur fnvq hagb ure, Jung sbez vf ur bs? Naq fur fnvq, Na byq
zna pbzrgu hc; naq ur vf pbirerq jvgu n znagyr. Naq Fnhy creprvirq
gung vg jnf Fnzhry, naq ur fgbbcrq jvgu uvf snpr gb gur tebhaq, naq
objrq uvzfrys.

28:15 Naq Fnzhry fnvq gb Fnhy, Jul unfg gubh qvfdhvrgrq zr, gb oevat
zr hc? Naq Fnhy nafjrerq, V nz fber qvfgerffrq; sbe gur Cuvyvfgvarf
znxr jne ntnvafg zr, naq Tbq vf qrcnegrq sebz zr, naq nafjrergu zr ab
zber, arvgure ol cebcurgf, abe ol qernzf: gurersber V unir pnyyrq
gurr, gung gubh znlrfg znxr xabja hagb zr jung V funyy qb.

28:16 Gura fnvq Fnzhry, Jurersber gura qbfg gubh nfx bs zr, frrvat gur
YBEQ vf qrcnegrq sebz gurr, naq vf orpbzr guvar rarzl?  28:17 Naq gur
YBEQ ungu qbar gb uvz, nf ur fcnxr ol zr: sbe gur YBEQ ungu erag gur
xvatqbz bhg bs guvar unaq, naq tvira vg gb gul arvtuobhe, rira gb
Qnivq: 28:18 Orpnhfr gubh borlrqfg abg gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ, abe
rkrphgrqfg uvf svrepr jengu hcba Nznyrx, gurersber ungu gur YBEQ qbar
guvf guvat hagb gurr guvf qnl.

28:19 Zberbire gur YBEQ jvyy nyfb qryvire Vfenry jvgu gurr vagb gur
unaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf: naq gb zbeebj funyg gubh naq gul fbaf or jvgu
zr: gur YBEQ nyfb funyy qryvire gur ubfg bs Vfenry vagb gur unaq bs
gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

28:20 Gura Fnhy sryy fgenvtugjnl nyy nybat ba gur rnegu, naq jnf fber
nsenvq, orpnhfr bs gur jbeqf bs Fnzhry: naq gurer jnf ab fgeratgu va
uvz; sbe ur unq rngra ab oernq nyy gur qnl, abe nyy gur avtug.

28:21 Naq gur jbzna pnzr hagb Fnhy, naq fnj gung ur jnf fber gebhoyrq,
naq fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq, guvar unaqznvq ungu borlrq gul ibvpr, naq V
unir chg zl yvsr va zl unaq, naq unir urnexrarq hagb gul jbeqf juvpu
gubh fcnxrfg hagb zr.

28:22 Abj gurersber, V cenl gurr, urnexra gubh nyfb hagb gur ibvpr bs
guvar unaqznvq, naq yrg zr frg n zbefry bs oernq orsber gurr; naq rng,
gung gubh znlrfg unir fgeratgu, jura gubh tbrfg ba gul jnl.

28:23 Ohg ur ershfrq, naq fnvq, V jvyy abg rng. Ohg uvf freinagf,
gbtrgure jvgu gur jbzna, pbzcryyrq uvz; naq ur urnexrarq hagb gurve
ibvpr. Fb ur nebfr sebz gur rnegu, naq fng hcba gur orq.

28:24 Naq gur jbzna unq n sng pnys va gur ubhfr; naq fur unfgrq, naq
xvyyrq vg, naq gbbx sybhe, naq xarnqrq vg, naq qvq onxr hayrnirarq
oernq gurerbs: 28:25 Naq fur oebhtug vg orsber Fnhy, naq orsber uvf
freinagf; naq gurl qvq rng. Gura gurl ebfr hc, naq jrag njnl gung
avtug.

29:1 Abj gur Cuvyvfgvarf tngurerq gbtrgure nyy gurve nezvrf gb Ncurx:
naq gur Vfenryvgrf cvgpurq ol n sbhagnva juvpu vf va Wrmerry.

29:2 Naq gur ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf cnffrq ba ol uhaqerqf, naq ol
gubhfnaqf: ohg Qnivq naq uvf zra cnffrq ba va gur ererjneq jvgu
Npuvfu.

29:3 Gura fnvq gur cevaprf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, Jung qb gurfr Uroerjf
urer?  Naq Npuvfu fnvq hagb gur cevaprf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, Vf abg
guvf Qnivq, gur freinag bs Fnhy gur xvat bs Vfenry, juvpu ungu orra
jvgu zr gurfr qnlf, be gurfr lrnef, naq V unir sbhaq ab snhyg va uvz
fvapr ur sryy hagb zr hagb guvf qnl?  29:4 Naq gur cevaprf bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf jrer jebgu jvgu uvz; naq gur cevaprf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf
fnvq hagb uvz, Znxr guvf sryybj erghea, gung ur znl tb ntnva gb uvf
cynpr juvpu gubh unfg nccbvagrq uvz, naq yrg uvz abg tb qbja jvgu hf
gb onggyr, yrfg va gur onggyr ur or na nqirefnel gb hf: sbe jurerjvgu
fubhyq ur erpbapvyr uvzfrys hagb uvf znfgre? fubhyq vg abg or jvgu gur
urnqf bs gurfr zra?  29:5 Vf abg guvf Qnivq, bs jubz gurl fnat bar gb
nabgure va qnaprf, fnlvat, Fnhy fyrj uvf gubhfnaqf, naq Qnivq uvf gra
gubhfnaqf?  29:6 Gura Npuvfu pnyyrq Qnivq, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Fheryl,
nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, gubh unfg orra hcevtug, naq gul tbvat bhg naq gul
pbzvat va jvgu zr va gur ubfg vf tbbq va zl fvtug: sbe V unir abg
sbhaq rivy va gurr fvapr gur qnl bs gul pbzvat hagb zr hagb guvf qnl:
arireguryrff gur ybeqf snibhe gurr abg.

29:7 Jurersber abj erghea, naq tb va crnpr, gung gubh qvfcyrnfr abg
gur ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

29:8 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Npuvfu, Ohg jung unir V qbar? naq jung unfg
gubh sbhaq va gul freinag fb ybat nf V unir orra jvgu gurr hagb guvf
qnl, gung V znl abg tb svtug ntnvafg gur rarzvrf bs zl ybeq gur xvat?
29:9 Naq Npuvfu nafjrerq naq fnvq gb Qnivq, V xabj gung gubh neg tbbq
va zl fvtug, nf na natry bs Tbq: abgjvgufgnaqvat gur cevaprf bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf unir fnvq, Ur funyy abg tb hc jvgu hf gb gur onggyr.

29:10 Jurersber abj evfr hc rneyl va gur zbeavat jvgu gul znfgre'f
freinagf gung ner pbzr jvgu gurr: naq nf fbba nf lr or hc rneyl va gur
zbeavat, naq unir yvtug, qrcneg.

29:11 Fb Qnivq naq uvf zra ebfr hc rneyl gb qrcneg va gur zbeavat, gb
erghea vagb gur ynaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf. Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf jrag hc
gb Wrmerry.

30:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Qnivq naq uvf zra jrer pbzr gb Mvxynt
ba gur guveq qnl, gung gur Nznyrxvgrf unq vainqrq gur fbhgu, naq
Mvxynt, naq fzvggra Mvxynt, naq ohearq vg jvgu sver; 30:2 Naq unq
gnxra gur jbzra pncgvirf, gung jrer gurerva: gurl fyrj abg nal, rvgure
terng be fznyy, ohg pneevrq gurz njnl, naq jrag ba gurve jnl.

30:3 Fb Qnivq naq uvf zra pnzr gb gur pvgl, naq, orubyq, vg jnf ohearq
jvgu sver; naq gurve jvirf, naq gurve fbaf, naq gurve qnhtugref, jrer
gnxra pncgvirf.

30:4 Gura Qnivq naq gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz yvsgrq hc gurve
ibvpr naq jrcg, hagvy gurl unq ab zber cbjre gb jrrc.

30:5 Naq Qnivq'f gjb jvirf jrer gnxra pncgvirf, Nuvabnz gur
Wrmerryvgrff, naq Novtnvy gur jvsr bs Anony gur Pnezryvgr.

30:6 Naq Qnivq jnf terngyl qvfgerffrq; sbe gur crbcyr fcnxr bs fgbavat
uvz, orpnhfr gur fbhy bs nyy gur crbcyr jnf tevrirq, rirel zna sbe uvf
fbaf naq sbe uvf qnhtugref: ohg Qnivq rapbhentrq uvzfrys va gur YBEQ
uvf Tbq.

30:7 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Novngune gur cevrfg, Nuvzryrpu'f fba, V cenl
gurr, oevat zr uvgure gur rcubq. Naq Novngune oebhtug guvgure gur
rcubq gb Qnivq.

30:8 Naq Qnivq radhverq ng gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Funyy V chefhr nsgre guvf
gebbc? funyy V biregnxr gurz? Naq ur nafjrerq uvz, Chefhr: sbe gubh
funyg fheryl biregnxr gurz, naq jvgubhg snvy erpbire nyy.

30:9 Fb Qnivq jrag, ur naq gur fvk uhaqerq zra gung jrer jvgu uvz, naq
pnzr gb gur oebbx Orfbe, jurer gubfr gung jrer yrsg oruvaq fgnlrq.

30:10 Ohg Qnivq chefhrq, ur naq sbhe uhaqerq zra: sbe gjb uhaqerq
nobqr oruvaq, juvpu jrer fb snvag gung gurl pbhyq abg tb bire gur
oebbx Orfbe.

30:11 Naq gurl sbhaq na Rtlcgvna va gur svryq, naq oebhtug uvz gb
Qnivq, naq tnir uvz oernq, naq ur qvq rng; naq gurl znqr uvz qevax
jngre; 30:12 Naq gurl tnir uvz n cvrpr bs n pnxr bs svtf, naq gjb
pyhfgref bs envfvaf: naq jura ur unq rngra, uvf fcvevg pnzr ntnva gb
uvz: sbe ur unq rngra ab oernq, abe qehax nal jngre, guerr qnlf naq
guerr avtugf.

30:13 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb uvz, Gb jubz orybatrfg gubh? naq jurapr neg
gubh? Naq ur fnvq, V nz n lbhat zna bs Rtlcg, freinag gb na Nznyrxvgr;
naq zl znfgre yrsg zr, orpnhfr guerr qnlf ntbar V sryy fvpx.

30:14 Jr znqr na vainfvba hcba gur fbhgu bs gur Purerguvgrf, naq hcba
gur pbnfg juvpu orybatrgu gb Whqnu, naq hcba gur fbhgu bs Pnyro; naq
jr ohearq Mvxynt jvgu sver.

30:15 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb uvz, Pnafg gubh oevat zr qbja gb guvf pbzcnal?
Naq ur fnvq, Fjrne hagb zr ol Tbq, gung gubh jvyg arvgure xvyy zr, abe
qryvire zr vagb gur unaqf bs zl znfgre, naq V jvyy oevat gurr qbja gb
guvf pbzcnal.

30:16 Naq jura ur unq oebhtug uvz qbja, orubyq, gurl jrer fcernq
noebnq hcba nyy gur rnegu, rngvat naq qevaxvat, naq qnapvat, orpnhfr
bs nyy gur terng fcbvy gung gurl unq gnxra bhg bs gur ynaq bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, naq bhg bs gur ynaq bs Whqnu.

30:17 Naq Qnivq fzbgr gurz sebz gur gjvyvtug rira hagb gur riravat bs
gur arkg qnl: naq gurer rfpncrq abg n zna bs gurz, fnir sbhe uhaqerq
lbhat zra, juvpu ebqr hcba pnzryf, naq syrq.

30:18 Naq Qnivq erpbirerq nyy gung gur Nznyrxvgrf unq pneevrq njnl:
naq Qnivq erfphrq uvf gjb jvirf.

30:19 Naq gurer jnf abguvat ynpxvat gb gurz, arvgure fznyy abe terng,
arvgure fbaf abe qnhtugref, arvgure fcbvy, abe nal guvat gung gurl unq
gnxra gb gurz: Qnivq erpbirerq nyy.

30:20 Naq Qnivq gbbx nyy gur sybpxf naq gur ureqf, juvpu gurl qenir
orsber gubfr bgure pnggyr, naq fnvq, Guvf vf Qnivq'f fcbvy.

30:21 Naq Qnivq pnzr gb gur gjb uhaqerq zra, juvpu jrer fb snvag gung
gurl pbhyq abg sbyybj Qnivq, jubz gurl unq znqr nyfb gb novqr ng gur
oebbx Orfbe: naq gurl jrag sbegu gb zrrg Qnivq, naq gb zrrg gur crbcyr
gung jrer jvgu uvz: naq jura Qnivq pnzr arne gb gur crbcyr, ur fnyhgrq
gurz.

30:22 Gura nafjrerq nyy gur jvpxrq zra naq zra bs Oryvny, bs gubfr
gung jrag jvgu Qnivq, naq fnvq, Orpnhfr gurl jrag abg jvgu hf, jr jvyy
abg tvir gurz bhtug bs gur fcbvy gung jr unir erpbirerq, fnir gb rirel
zna uvf jvsr naq uvf puvyqera, gung gurl znl yrnq gurz njnl, naq
qrcneg.

30:23 Gura fnvq Qnivq, Lr funyy abg qb fb, zl oerguera, jvgu gung
juvpu gur YBEQ ungu tvira hf, jub ungu cerfreirq hf, naq qryvirerq gur
pbzcnal gung pnzr ntnvafg hf vagb bhe unaq.

30:24 Sbe jub jvyy urnexra hagb lbh va guvf znggre? ohg nf uvf cneg vf
gung tbrgu qbja gb gur onggyr, fb funyy uvf cneg or gung gneevrgu ol
gur fghss: gurl funyy cneg nyvxr.

30:25 Naq vg jnf fb sebz gung qnl sbejneq, gung ur znqr vg n fgnghgr
naq na beqvanapr sbe Vfenry hagb guvf qnl.

30:26 Naq jura Qnivq pnzr gb Mvxynt, ur frag bs gur fcbvy hagb gur
ryqref bs Whqnu, rira gb uvf sevraqf, fnlvat, Orubyq n cerfrag sbe lbh
bs gur fcbvy bs gur rarzvrf bs gur YBEQ; 30:27 Gb gurz juvpu jrer va
Orgury, naq gb gurz juvpu jrer va fbhgu Enzbgu, naq gb gurz juvpu jrer
va Wnggve, 30:28 Naq gb gurz juvpu jrer va Nebre, naq gb gurz juvpu
jrer va Fvcuzbgu, naq gb gurz juvpu jrer va Rfugrzbn, 30:29 Naq gb
gurz juvpu jrer va Enpuny, naq gb gurz juvpu jrer va gur pvgvrf bs gur
Wrenuzrryvgrf, naq gb gurz juvpu jrer va gur pvgvrf bs gur Xravgrf,
30:30 Naq gb gurz juvpu jrer va Ubeznu, naq gb gurz juvpu jrer va
Pubenfuna, naq gb gurz juvpu jrer va Ngunpu, 30:31 Naq gb gurz juvpu
jrer va Uroeba, naq gb nyy gur cynprf jurer Qnivq uvzfrys naq uvf zra
jrer jbag gb unhag.

31:1 Abj gur Cuvyvfgvarf sbhtug ntnvafg Vfenry: naq gur zra bs Vfenry
syrq sebz orsber gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq sryy qbja fynva va zbhag Tvyobn.

31:2 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf sbyybjrq uneq hcba Fnhy naq hcba uvf fbaf;
naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf fyrj Wbanguna, naq Novanqno, naq Zrypuvfuhn,
Fnhy'f fbaf.

31:3 Naq gur onggyr jrag fber ntnvafg Fnhy, naq gur nepuref uvg uvz;
naq ur jnf fber jbhaqrq bs gur nepuref.

31:4 Gura fnvq Fnhy hagb uvf nezbheornere, Qenj gul fjbeq, naq guehfg
zr guebhtu gurerjvgu; yrfg gurfr hapvephzpvfrq pbzr naq guehfg zr
guebhtu, naq nohfr zr. Ohg uvf nezbheornere jbhyq abg; sbe ur jnf fber
nsenvq. Gurersber Fnhy gbbx n fjbeq, naq sryy hcba vg.

31:5 Naq jura uvf nezbheornere fnj gung Fnhy jnf qrnq, ur sryy
yvxrjvfr hcba uvf fjbeq, naq qvrq jvgu uvz.

31:6 Fb Fnhy qvrq, naq uvf guerr fbaf, naq uvf nezbheornere, naq nyy
uvf zra, gung fnzr qnl gbtrgure.

31:7 Naq jura gur zra bs Vfenry gung jrer ba gur bgure fvqr bs gur
inyyrl, naq gurl gung jrer ba gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna, fnj gung gur zra
bs Vfenry syrq, naq gung Fnhy naq uvf fbaf jrer qrnq, gurl sbefbbx gur
pvgvrf, naq syrq; naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf pnzr naq qjryg va gurz.

31:8 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur zbeebj, jura gur Cuvyvfgvarf pnzr gb
fgevc gur fynva, gung gurl sbhaq Fnhy naq uvf guerr fbaf snyyra va
zbhag Tvyobn.

31:9 Naq gurl phg bss uvf urnq, naq fgevccrq bss uvf nezbhe, naq frag
vagb gur ynaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf ebhaq nobhg, gb choyvfu vg va gur
ubhfr bs gurve vqbyf, naq nzbat gur crbcyr.

31:10 Naq gurl chg uvf nezbhe va gur ubhfr bs Nfugnebgu: naq gurl
snfgrarq uvf obql gb gur jnyy bs Orgufuna.

31:11 Naq jura gur vaunovgnagf bs Wnorfutvyrnq urneq bs gung juvpu gur
Cuvyvfgvarf unq qbar gb Fnhy; 31:12 Nyy gur inyvnag zra nebfr, naq
jrag nyy avtug, naq gbbx gur obql bs Fnhy naq gur obqvrf bs uvf fbaf
sebz gur jnyy bs Orgufuna, naq pnzr gb Wnorfu, naq oheag gurz gurer.

31:13 Naq gurl gbbx gurve obarf, naq ohevrq gurz haqre n gerr ng
Wnorfu, naq snfgrq frira qnlf.




Gur Frpbaq Obbx bs Fnzhry

Bgurejvfr Pnyyrq:

Gur Frpbaq Obbx bs gur Xvatf


1:1 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre gur qrngu bs Fnhy, jura Qnivq jnf
erghearq sebz gur fynhtugre bs gur Nznyrxvgrf, naq Qnivq unq nobqr gjb
qnlf va Mvxynt; 1:2 Vg pnzr rira gb cnff ba gur guveq qnl, gung,
orubyq, n zna pnzr bhg bs gur pnzc sebz Fnhy jvgu uvf pybgurf erag,
naq rnegu hcba uvf urnq: naq fb vg jnf, jura ur pnzr gb Qnivq, gung ur
sryy gb gur rnegu, naq qvq borvfnapr.

1:3 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb uvz, Sebz jurapr pbzrfg gubh? Naq ur fnvq hagb
uvz, Bhg bs gur pnzc bs Vfenry nz V rfpncrq.

1:4 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb uvz, Ubj jrag gur znggre? V cenl gurr, gryy
zr.

Naq ur nafjrerq, Gung gur crbcyr ner syrq sebz gur onggyr, naq znal bs
gur crbcyr nyfb ner snyyra naq qrnq; naq Fnhy naq Wbanguna uvf fba ner
qrnq nyfb.

1:5 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb gur lbhat zna gung gbyq uvz, Ubj xabjrfg gubh
gung Fnhy naq Wbanguna uvf fba or qrnq?  1:6 Naq gur lbhat zna gung
gbyq uvz fnvq, Nf V unccrarq ol punapr hcba zbhag Tvyobn, orubyq, Fnhy
yrnarq hcba uvf fcrne; naq, yb, gur punevbgf naq ubefrzra sbyybjrq
uneq nsgre uvz.

1:7 Naq jura ur ybbxrq oruvaq uvz, ur fnj zr, naq pnyyrq hagb zr. Naq
V nafjrerq, Urer nz V.

1:8 Naq ur fnvq hagb zr, Jub neg gubh? Naq V nafjrerq uvz, V nz na
Nznyrxvgr.

1:9 Ur fnvq hagb zr ntnva, Fgnaq, V cenl gurr, hcba zr, naq fynl zr:
sbe nathvfu vf pbzr hcba zr, orpnhfr zl yvsr vf lrg jubyr va zr.

1:10 Fb V fgbbq hcba uvz, naq fyrj uvz, orpnhfr V jnf fher gung ur
pbhyq abg yvir nsgre gung ur jnf snyyra: naq V gbbx gur pebja gung jnf
hcba uvf urnq, naq gur oenpryrg gung jnf ba uvf nez, naq unir oebhtug
gurz uvgure hagb zl ybeq.

1:11 Gura Qnivq gbbx ubyq ba uvf pybgurf, naq erag gurz; naq yvxrjvfr
nyy gur zra gung jrer jvgu uvz: 1:12 Naq gurl zbhearq, naq jrcg, naq
snfgrq hagvy rira, sbe Fnhy, naq sbe Wbanguna uvf fba, naq sbe gur
crbcyr bs gur YBEQ, naq sbe gur ubhfr bs Vfenry; orpnhfr gurl jrer
snyyra ol gur fjbeq.

1:13 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb gur lbhat zna gung gbyq uvz, Jurapr neg gubh?
Naq ur nafjrerq, V nz gur fba bs n fgenatre, na Nznyrxvgr.

1:14 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb uvz, Ubj jnfg gubh abg nsenvq gb fgergpu
sbegu guvar unaq gb qrfgebl gur YBEQ'f nabvagrq?  1:15 Naq Qnivq
pnyyrq bar bs gur lbhat zra, naq fnvq, Tb arne, naq snyy hcba uvz. Naq
ur fzbgr uvz gung ur qvrq.

1:16 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb uvz, Gul oybbq or hcba gul urnq; sbe gul
zbhgu ungu grfgvsvrq ntnvafg gurr, fnlvat, V unir fynva gur YBEQ'f
nabvagrq.

1:17 Naq Qnivq ynzragrq jvgu guvf ynzragngvba bire Fnhy naq bire
Wbanguna uvf fba: 1:18 (Nyfb ur onqr gurz grnpu gur puvyqera bs Whqnu
gur hfr bs gur obj: orubyq, vg vf jevggra va gur obbx bs Wnfure.)
1:19 Gur ornhgl bs Vfenry vf fynva hcba gul uvtu cynprf: ubj ner gur
zvtugl snyyra!  1:20 Gryy vg abg va Tngu, choyvfu vg abg va gur
fgerrgf bs Nfxryba; yrfg gur qnhtugref bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf erwbvpr,
yrfg gur qnhtugref bs gur hapvephzpvfrq gevhzcu.

1:21 Lr zbhagnvaf bs Tvyobn, yrg gurer or ab qrj, arvgure yrg gurer or
enva, hcba lbh, abe svryqf bs bssrevatf: sbe gurer gur fuvryq bs gur
zvtugl vf ivyryl pnfg njnl, gur fuvryq bs Fnhy, nf gubhtu ur unq abg
orra nabvagrq jvgu bvy.

1:22 Sebz gur oybbq bs gur fynva, sebz gur sng bs gur zvtugl, gur obj
bs Wbanguna ghearq abg onpx, naq gur fjbeq bs Fnhy erghearq abg rzcgl.

1:23 Fnhy naq Wbanguna jrer ybiryl naq cyrnfnag va gurve yvirf, naq va
gurve qrngu gurl jrer abg qvivqrq: gurl jrer fjvsgre guna rntyrf, gurl
jrer fgebatre guna yvbaf.

1:24 Lr qnhtugref bs Vfenry, jrrc bire Fnhy, jub pybgurq lbh va
fpneyrg, jvgu bgure qryvtugf, jub chg ba beanzragf bs tbyq hcba lbhe
nccnery.

1:25 Ubj ner gur zvtugl snyyra va gur zvqfg bs gur onggyr! B Wbanguna,
gubh jnfg fynva va guvar uvtu cynprf.

1:26 V nz qvfgerffrq sbe gurr, zl oebgure Wbanguna: irel cyrnfnag unfg
gubh orra hagb zr: gul ybir gb zr jnf jbaqreshy, cnffvat gur ybir bs
jbzra.

1:27 Ubj ner gur zvtugl snyyra, naq gur jrncbaf bs jne crevfurq!  2:1
Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre guvf, gung Qnivq radhverq bs gur YBEQ,
fnlvat, Funyy V tb hc vagb nal bs gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu? Naq gur YBEQ
fnvq hagb uvz, Tb hc. Naq Qnivq fnvq, Juvgure funyy V tb hc? Naq ur
fnvq, Hagb Uroeba.

2:2 Fb Qnivq jrag hc guvgure, naq uvf gjb jvirf nyfb, Nuvabnz gur
Wrmerryvgrff, naq Novtnvy Anony'f jvsr gur Pnezryvgr.

2:3 Naq uvf zra gung jrer jvgu uvz qvq Qnivq oevat hc, rirel zna jvgu
uvf ubhfrubyq: naq gurl qjryg va gur pvgvrf bs Uroeba.

2:4 Naq gur zra bs Whqnu pnzr, naq gurer gurl nabvagrq Qnivq xvat bire
gur ubhfr bs Whqnu. Naq gurl gbyq Qnivq, fnlvat, Gung gur zra bs
Wnorfutvyrnq jrer gurl gung ohevrq Fnhy.

2:5 Naq Qnivq frag zrffratref hagb gur zra bs Wnorfutvyrnq, naq fnvq
hagb gurz, Oyrffrq or lr bs gur YBEQ, gung lr unir furjrq guvf
xvaqarff hagb lbhe ybeq, rira hagb Fnhy, naq unir ohevrq uvz.

2:6 Naq abj gur YBEQ furj xvaqarff naq gehgu hagb lbh: naq V nyfb jvyy
erdhvgr lbh guvf xvaqarff, orpnhfr lr unir qbar guvf guvat.

2:7 Gurersber abj yrg lbhe unaqf or fgeratgurarq, naq or lr inyvnag:
sbe lbhe znfgre Fnhy vf qrnq, naq nyfb gur ubhfr bs Whqnu unir
nabvagrq zr xvat bire gurz.

2:8 Ohg Noare gur fba bs Are, pncgnva bs Fnhy'f ubfg, gbbx Vfuobfurgu
gur fba bs Fnhy, naq oebhtug uvz bire gb Znunanvz; 2:9 Naq znqr uvz
xvat bire Tvyrnq, naq bire gur Nfuhevgrf, naq bire Wrmerry, naq bire
Rcuenvz, naq bire Orawnzva, naq bire nyy Vfenry.

2:10 Vfuobfurgu Fnhy'f fba jnf sbegl lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta
bire Vfenry, naq ervtarq gjb lrnef. Ohg gur ubhfr bs Whqnu sbyybjrq
Qnivq.

2:11 Naq gur gvzr gung Qnivq jnf xvat va Uroeba bire gur ubhfr bs
Whqnu jnf frira lrnef naq fvk zbaguf.

2:12 Naq Noare gur fba bs Are, naq gur freinagf bs Vfuobfurgu gur fba
bs Fnhy, jrag bhg sebz Znunanvz gb Tvorba.

2:13 Naq Wbno gur fba bs Mrehvnu, naq gur freinagf bs Qnivq, jrag bhg,
naq zrg gbtrgure ol gur cbby bs Tvorba: naq gurl fng qbja, gur bar ba
gur bar fvqr bs gur cbby, naq gur bgure ba gur bgure fvqr bs gur cbby.

2:14 Naq Noare fnvq gb Wbno, Yrg gur lbhat zra abj nevfr, naq cynl
orsber hf. Naq Wbno fnvq, Yrg gurz nevfr.

2:15 Gura gurer nebfr naq jrag bire ol ahzore gjryir bs Orawnzva,
juvpu cregnvarq gb Vfuobfurgu gur fba bs Fnhy, naq gjryir bs gur
freinagf bs Qnivq.

2:16 Naq gurl pnhtug rirel bar uvf sryybj ol gur urnq, naq guehfg uvf
fjbeq va uvf sryybj'f fvqr; fb gurl sryy qbja gbtrgure: jurersber gung
cynpr jnf pnyyrq Uryxnguunmmhevz, juvpu vf va Tvorba.

2:17 Naq gurer jnf n irel fber onggyr gung qnl; naq Noare jnf orngra,
naq gur zra bs Vfenry, orsber gur freinagf bs Qnivq.

2:18 Naq gurer jrer guerr fbaf bs Mrehvnu gurer, Wbno, naq Novfunv,
naq Nfnury: naq Nfnury jnf nf yvtug bs sbbg nf n jvyq ebr.

2:19 Naq Nfnury chefhrq nsgre Noare; naq va tbvat ur ghearq abg gb gur
evtug unaq abe gb gur yrsg sebz sbyybjvat Noare.

2:20 Gura Noare ybbxrq oruvaq uvz, naq fnvq, Neg gubh Nfnury? Naq ur
nafjrerq, V nz.

2:21 Naq Noare fnvq gb uvz, Ghea gurr nfvqr gb gul evtug unaq be gb
gul yrsg, naq ynl gurr ubyq ba bar bs gur lbhat zra, naq gnxr gurr uvf
nezbhe.

Ohg Nfnury jbhyq abg ghea nfvqr sebz sbyybjvat bs uvz.

2:22 Naq Noare fnvq ntnva gb Nfnury, Ghea gurr nfvqr sebz sbyybjvat
zr: jurersber fubhyq V fzvgr gurr gb gur tebhaq? ubj gura fubhyq V
ubyq hc zl snpr gb Wbno gul oebgure?  2:23 Ubjorvg ur ershfrq gb ghea
nfvqr: jurersber Noare jvgu gur uvaqre raq bs gur fcrne fzbgr uvz
haqre gur svsgu evo, gung gur fcrne pnzr bhg oruvaq uvz; naq ur sryy
qbja gurer, naq qvrq va gur fnzr cynpr: naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung nf
znal nf pnzr gb gur cynpr jurer Nfnury sryy qbja naq qvrq fgbbq fgvyy.

2:24 Wbno nyfb naq Novfunv chefhrq nsgre Noare: naq gur fha jrag qbja
jura gurl jrer pbzr gb gur uvyy bs Nzznu, gung yvrgu orsber Tvnu ol
gur jnl bs gur jvyqrearff bs Tvorba.

2:25 Naq gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure nsgre
Noare, naq orpnzr bar gebbc, naq fgbbq ba gur gbc bs na uvyy.

2:26 Gura Noare pnyyrq gb Wbno, naq fnvq, Funyy gur fjbeq qribhe sbe
rire?  xabjrfg gubh abg gung vg jvyy or ovggrearff va gur ynggre raq?
ubj ybat funyy vg or gura, rer gubh ovq gur crbcyr erghea sebz
sbyybjvat gurve oerguera?  2:27 Naq Wbno fnvq, Nf Tbq yvirgu, hayrff
gubh unqfg fcbxra, fheryl gura va gur zbeavat gur crbcyr unq tbar hc
rirel bar sebz sbyybjvat uvf oebgure.

2:28 Fb Wbno oyrj n gehzcrg, naq nyy gur crbcyr fgbbq fgvyy, naq
chefhrq nsgre Vfenry ab zber, arvgure sbhtug gurl nal zber.

2:29 Naq Noare naq uvf zra jnyxrq nyy gung avtug guebhtu gur cynva,
naq cnffrq bire Wbeqna, naq jrag guebhtu nyy Ovgueba, naq gurl pnzr gb
Znunanvz.

2:30 Naq Wbno erghearq sebz sbyybjvat Noare: naq jura ur unq tngurerq
nyy gur crbcyr gbtrgure, gurer ynpxrq bs Qnivq'f freinagf avargrra zra
naq Nfnury.

2:31 Ohg gur freinagf bs Qnivq unq fzvggra bs Orawnzva, naq bs Noare'f
zra, fb gung guerr uhaqerq naq guerrfpber zra qvrq.

2:32 Naq gurl gbbx hc Nfnury, naq ohevrq uvz va gur frchypuer bs uvf
sngure, juvpu jnf va Orguyrurz. Naq Wbno naq uvf zra jrag nyy avtug,
naq gurl pnzr gb Uroeba ng oernx bs qnl.

3:1 Abj gurer jnf ybat jne orgjrra gur ubhfr bs Fnhy naq gur ubhfr bs
Qnivq: ohg Qnivq jnkrq fgebatre naq fgebatre, naq gur ubhfr bs Fnhy
jnkrq jrnxre naq jrnxre.

3:2 Naq hagb Qnivq jrer fbaf obea va Uroeba: naq uvf svefgobea jnf
Nzaba, bs Nuvabnz gur Wrmerryvgrff; 3:3 Naq uvf frpbaq, Puvyrno, bs
Novtnvy gur jvsr bs Anony gur Pnezryvgr; naq gur guveq, Nofnybz gur
fba bs Znnpnu gur qnhtugre bs Gnyznv xvat bs Trfuhe; 3:4 Naq gur
sbhegu, Nqbavwnu gur fba bs Unttvgu; naq gur svsgu, Furcungvnu gur fba
bs Novgny; 3:5 Naq gur fvkgu, Vguernz, ol Rtynu Qnivq'f jvsr. Gurfr
jrer obea gb Qnivq va Uroeba.

3:6 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, juvyr gurer jnf jne orgjrra gur ubhfr bs Fnhy
naq gur ubhfr bs Qnivq, gung Noare znqr uvzfrys fgebat sbe gur ubhfr
bs Fnhy.

3:7 Naq Fnhy unq n pbaphovar, jubfr anzr jnf Evmcnu, gur qnhtugre bs
Nvnu: naq Vfuobfurgu fnvq gb Noare, Jurersber unfg gubh tbar va hagb
zl sngure'f pbaphovar?  3:8 Gura jnf Noare irel jebgu sbe gur jbeqf bs
Vfuobfurgu, naq fnvq, Nz V n qbt'f urnq, juvpu ntnvafg Whqnu qb furj
xvaqarff guvf qnl hagb gur ubhfr bs Fnhy gul sngure, gb uvf oerguera,
naq gb uvf sevraqf, naq unir abg qryvirerq gurr vagb gur unaq bs
Qnivq, gung gubh punetrfg zr gb qnl jvgu n snhyg pbapreavat guvf
jbzna?  3:9 Fb qb Tbq gb Noare, naq zber nyfb, rkprcg, nf gur YBEQ
ungu fjbea gb Qnivq, rira fb V qb gb uvz; 3:10 Gb genafyngr gur
xvatqbz sebz gur ubhfr bs Fnhy, naq gb frg hc gur guebar bs Qnivq bire
Vfenry naq bire Whqnu, sebz Qna rira gb Orrefuron.

3:11 Naq ur pbhyq abg nafjre Noare n jbeq ntnva, orpnhfr ur srnerq
uvz.

3:12 Naq Noare frag zrffratref gb Qnivq ba uvf orunys, fnlvat, Jubfr
vf gur ynaq? fnlvat nyfb, Znxr gul yrnthr jvgu zr, naq, orubyq, zl
unaq funyy or jvgu gurr, gb oevat nobhg nyy Vfenry hagb gurr.

3:13 Naq ur fnvq, Jryy; V jvyy znxr n yrnthr jvgu gurr: ohg bar guvat
V erdhver bs gurr, gung vf, Gubh funyg abg frr zl snpr, rkprcg gubh
svefg oevat Zvpuny Fnhy'f qnhtugre, jura gubh pbzrfg gb frr zl snpr.

3:14 Naq Qnivq frag zrffratref gb Vfuobfurgu Fnhy'f fba, fnlvat,
Qryvire zr zl jvsr Zvpuny, juvpu V rfcbhfrq gb zr sbe na uhaqerq
sberfxvaf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

3:15 Naq Vfuobfurgu frag, naq gbbx ure sebz ure uhfonaq, rira sebz
Cunygvry gur fba bs Ynvfu.

3:16 Naq ure uhfonaq jrag jvgu ure nybat jrrcvat oruvaq ure gb
Onuhevz.

Gura fnvq Noare hagb uvz, Tb, erghea. Naq ur erghearq.

3:17 Naq Noare unq pbzzhavpngvba jvgu gur ryqref bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Lr
fbhtug sbe Qnivq va gvzrf cnfg gb or xvat bire lbh: 3:18 Abj gura qb
vg: sbe gur YBEQ ungu fcbxra bs Qnivq, fnlvat, Ol gur unaq bs zl
freinag Qnivq V jvyy fnir zl crbcyr Vfenry bhg bs gur unaq bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, naq bhg bs gur unaq bs nyy gurve rarzvrf.

3:19 Naq Noare nyfb fcnxr va gur rnef bs Orawnzva: naq Noare jrag nyfb
gb fcrnx va gur rnef bs Qnivq va Uroeba nyy gung frrzrq tbbq gb
Vfenry, naq gung frrzrq tbbq gb gur jubyr ubhfr bs Orawnzva.

3:20 Fb Noare pnzr gb Qnivq gb Uroeba, naq gjragl zra jvgu uvz. Naq
Qnivq znqr Noare naq gur zra gung jrer jvgu uvz n srnfg.

3:21 Naq Noare fnvq hagb Qnivq, V jvyy nevfr naq tb, naq jvyy tngure
nyy Vfenry hagb zl ybeq gur xvat, gung gurl znl znxr n yrnthr jvgu
gurr, naq gung gubh znlrfg ervta bire nyy gung guvar urneg qrfvergu.
Naq Qnivq frag Noare njnl; naq ur jrag va crnpr.

3:22 Naq, orubyq, gur freinagf bs Qnivq naq Wbno pnzr sebz chefhvat n
gebbc, naq oebhtug va n terng fcbvy jvgu gurz: ohg Noare jnf abg jvgu
Qnivq va Uroeba; sbe ur unq frag uvz njnl, naq ur jnf tbar va crnpr.

3:23 Jura Wbno naq nyy gur ubfg gung jnf jvgu uvz jrer pbzr, gurl gbyq
Wbno, fnlvat, Noare gur fba bs Are pnzr gb gur xvat, naq ur ungu frag
uvz njnl, naq ur vf tbar va crnpr.

3:24 Gura Wbno pnzr gb gur xvat, naq fnvq, Jung unfg gubh qbar?
orubyq, Noare pnzr hagb gurr; jul vf vg gung gubh unfg frag uvz njnl,
naq ur vf dhvgr tbar?  3:25 Gubh xabjrfg Noare gur fba bs Are, gung ur
pnzr gb qrprvir gurr, naq gb xabj gul tbvat bhg naq gul pbzvat va, naq
gb xabj nyy gung gubh qbrfg.

3:26 Naq jura Wbno jnf pbzr bhg sebz Qnivq, ur frag zrffratref nsgre
Noare, juvpu oebhtug uvz ntnva sebz gur jryy bs Fvenu: ohg Qnivq xarj
vg abg.

3:27 Naq jura Noare jnf erghearq gb Uroeba, Wbno gbbx uvz nfvqr va gur
tngr gb fcrnx jvgu uvz dhvrgyl, naq fzbgr uvz gurer haqre gur svsgu
evo, gung ur qvrq, sbe gur oybbq bs Nfnury uvf oebgure.

3:28 Naq nsgrejneq jura Qnivq urneq vg, ur fnvq, V naq zl xvatqbz ner
thvygyrff orsber gur YBEQ sbe rire sebz gur oybbq bs Noare gur fba bs
Are: 3:29 Yrg vg erfg ba gur urnq bs Wbno, naq ba nyy uvf sngure'f
ubhfr; naq yrg gurer abg snvy sebz gur ubhfr bs Wbno bar gung ungu na
vffhr, be gung vf n yrcre, be gung yrnargu ba n fgnss, be gung snyyrgu
ba gur fjbeq, be gung ynpxrgu oernq.

3:30 Fb Wbno, naq Novfunv uvf oebgure fyrj Noare, orpnhfr ur unq fynva
gurve oebgure Nfnury ng Tvorba va gur onggyr.

3:31 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Wbno, naq gb nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz,
Eraq lbhe pybgurf, naq tveq lbh jvgu fnpxpybgu, naq zbhea orsber
Noare. Naq xvat Qnivq uvzfrys sbyybjrq gur ovre.

3:32 Naq gurl ohevrq Noare va Uroeba: naq gur xvat yvsgrq hc uvf
ibvpr, naq jrcg ng gur tenir bs Noare; naq nyy gur crbcyr jrcg.

3:33 Naq gur xvat ynzragrq bire Noare, naq fnvq, Qvrq Noare nf n sbby
qvrgu?  3:34 Gul unaqf jrer abg obhaq, abe gul srrg chg vagb srggref:
nf n zna snyyrgu orsber jvpxrq zra, fb sryyrfg gubh. Naq nyy gur
crbcyr jrcg ntnva bire uvz.

3:35 Naq jura nyy gur crbcyr pnzr gb pnhfr Qnivq gb rng zrng juvyr vg
jnf lrg qnl, Qnivq fjner, fnlvat, Fb qb Tbq gb zr, naq zber nyfb, vs V
gnfgr oernq, be bhtug ryfr, gvyy gur fha or qbja.

3:36 Naq nyy gur crbcyr gbbx abgvpr bs vg, naq vg cyrnfrq gurz: nf
jungfbrire gur xvat qvq cyrnfrq nyy gur crbcyr.

3:37 Sbe nyy gur crbcyr naq nyy Vfenry haqrefgbbq gung qnl gung vg jnf
abg bs gur xvat gb fynl Noare gur fba bs Are.

3:38 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb uvf freinagf, Xabj lr abg gung gurer vf n
cevapr naq n terng zna snyyra guvf qnl va Vfenry?  3:39 Naq V nz guvf
qnl jrnx, gubhtu nabvagrq xvat; naq gurfr zra gur fbaf bs Mrehvnu or
gbb uneq sbe zr: gur YBEQ funyy erjneq gur qbre bs rivy nppbeqvat gb
uvf jvpxrqarff.

4:1 Naq jura Fnhy'f fba urneq gung Noare jnf qrnq va Uroeba, uvf unaqf
jrer srroyr, naq nyy gur Vfenryvgrf jrer gebhoyrq.

4:2 Naq Fnhy'f fba unq gjb zra gung jrer pncgnvaf bs onaqf: gur anzr
bs gur bar jnf Onnanu, naq gur anzr bs gur bgure Erpuno, gur fbaf bs
Evzzba n Orrebguvgr, bs gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva: (sbe Orrebgu nyfb
jnf erpxbarq gb Orawnzva.

4:3 Naq gur Orrebguvgrf syrq gb Tvggnvz, naq jrer fbwbhearef gurer
hagvy guvf qnl.)  4:4 Naq Wbanguna, Fnhy'f fba, unq n fba gung jnf
ynzr bs uvf srrg. Ur jnf svir lrnef byq jura gur gvqvatf pnzr bs Fnhy
naq Wbanguna bhg bs Wrmerry, naq uvf ahefr gbbx uvz hc, naq syrq: naq
vg pnzr gb cnff, nf fur znqr unfgr gb syrr, gung ur sryy, naq orpnzr
ynzr. Naq uvf anzr jnf Zrcuvobfurgu.

4:5 Naq gur fbaf bs Evzzba gur Orrebguvgr, Erpuno naq Onnanu, jrag,
naq pnzr nobhg gur urng bs gur qnl gb gur ubhfr bs Vfuobfurgu, jub ynl
ba n orq ng abba.

4:6 Naq gurl pnzr guvgure vagb gur zvqfg bs gur ubhfr, nf gubhtu gurl
jbhyq unir srgpurq jurng; naq gurl fzbgr uvz haqre gur svsgu evo: naq
Erpuno naq Onnanu uvf oebgure rfpncrq.

4:7 Sbe jura gurl pnzr vagb gur ubhfr, ur ynl ba uvf orq va uvf
orqpunzore, naq gurl fzbgr uvz, naq fyrj uvz, naq orurnqrq uvz, naq
gbbx uvf urnq, naq tng gurz njnl guebhtu gur cynva nyy avtug.

4:8 Naq gurl oebhtug gur urnq bs Vfuobfurgu hagb Qnivq gb Uroeba, naq
fnvq gb gur xvat, Orubyq gur urnq bs Vfuobfurgu gur fba bs Fnhy guvar
rarzl, juvpu fbhtug gul yvsr; naq gur YBEQ ungu niratrq zl ybeq gur
xvat guvf qnl bs Fnhy, naq bs uvf frrq.

4:9 Naq Qnivq nafjrerq Erpuno naq Onnanu uvf oebgure, gur fbaf bs
Evzzba gur Orrebguvgr, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, jub
ungu erqrrzrq zl fbhy bhg bs nyy nqirefvgl, 4:10 Jura bar gbyq zr,
fnlvat, Orubyq, Fnhy vf qrnq, guvaxvat gb unir oebhtug tbbq gvqvatf, V
gbbx ubyq bs uvz, naq fyrj uvz va Mvxynt, jub gubhtug gung V jbhyq
unir tvira uvz n erjneq sbe uvf gvqvatf: 4:11 Ubj zhpu zber, jura
jvpxrq zra unir fynva n evtugrbhf crefba va uvf bja ubhfr hcba uvf
orq? funyy V abg gurersber abj erdhver uvf oybbq bs lbhe unaq, naq
gnxr lbh njnl sebz gur rnegu?  4:12 Naq Qnivq pbzznaqrq uvf lbhat zra,
naq gurl fyrj gurz, naq phg bss gurve unaqf naq gurve srrg, naq unatrq
gurz hc bire gur cbby va Uroeba. Ohg gurl gbbx gur urnq bs Vfuobfurgu,
naq ohevrq vg va gur frchypuer bs Noare va Uroeba.

5:1 Gura pnzr nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry gb Qnivq hagb Uroeba, naq
fcnxr, fnlvat, Orubyq, jr ner gul obar naq gul syrfu.

5:2 Nyfb va gvzr cnfg, jura Fnhy jnf xvat bire hf, gubh jnfg ur gung
yrqqrfg bhg naq oebhtugrfg va Vfenry: naq gur YBEQ fnvq gb gurr, Gubh
funyg srrq zl crbcyr Vfenry, naq gubh funyg or n pncgnva bire Vfenry.

5:3 Fb nyy gur ryqref bs Vfenry pnzr gb gur xvat gb Uroeba; naq xvat
Qnivq znqr n yrnthr jvgu gurz va Uroeba orsber gur YBEQ: naq gurl
nabvagrq Qnivq xvat bire Vfenry.

5:4 Qnivq jnf guvegl lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur ervtarq
sbegl lrnef.

5:5 Va Uroeba ur ervtarq bire Whqnu frira lrnef naq fvk zbaguf: naq va
Wrehfnyrz ur ervtarq guvegl naq guerr lrnef bire nyy Vfenry naq Whqnu.

5:6 Naq gur xvat naq uvf zra jrag gb Wrehfnyrz hagb gur Wrohfvgrf, gur
vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq: juvpu fcnxr hagb Qnivq, fnlvat, Rkprcg gubh
gnxr njnl gur oyvaq naq gur ynzr, gubh funyg abg pbzr va uvgure:
guvaxvat, Qnivq pnaabg pbzr va uvgure.

5:7 Arireguryrff Qnivq gbbx gur fgebat ubyq bs Mvba: gur fnzr vf gur
pvgl bs Qnivq.

5:8 Naq Qnivq fnvq ba gung qnl, Jubfbrire trggrgu hc gb gur thggre,
naq fzvgrgu gur Wrohfvgrf, naq gur ynzr naq gur oyvaq gung ner ungrq
bs Qnivq'f fbhy, ur funyy or puvrs naq pncgnva. Jurersber gurl fnvq,
Gur oyvaq naq gur ynzr funyy abg pbzr vagb gur ubhfr.

5:9 Fb Qnivq qjryg va gur sbeg, naq pnyyrq vg gur pvgl bs Qnivq. Naq
Qnivq ohvyg ebhaq nobhg sebz Zvyyb naq vajneq.

5:10 Naq Qnivq jrag ba, naq terj terng, naq gur YBEQ Tbq bs ubfgf jnf
jvgu uvz.

5:11 Naq Uvenz xvat bs Gler frag zrffratref gb Qnivq, naq prqne gerrf,
naq pnecragref, naq znfbaf: naq gurl ohvyg Qnivq na ubhfr.

5:12 Naq Qnivq creprvirq gung gur YBEQ unq rfgnoyvfurq uvz xvat bire
Vfenry, naq gung ur unq rknygrq uvf xvatqbz sbe uvf crbcyr Vfenry'f
fnxr.

5:13 Naq Qnivq gbbx uvz zber pbaphovarf naq jvirf bhg bs Wrehfnyrz,
nsgre ur jnf pbzr sebz Uroeba: naq gurer jrer lrg fbaf naq qnhtugref
obea gb Qnivq.

5:14 Naq gurfr or gur anzrf bs gubfr gung jrer obea hagb uvz va
Wrehfnyrz; Funzzhnu, naq Fubono, naq Anguna, naq Fbybzba, 5:15 Voune
nyfb, naq Ryvfuhn, naq Arcurt, naq Wncuvn, 5:16 Naq Ryvfunzn, naq
Ryvnqn, naq Ryvcunyrg.

5:17 Ohg jura gur Cuvyvfgvarf urneq gung gurl unq nabvagrq Qnivq xvat
bire Vfenry, nyy gur Cuvyvfgvarf pnzr hc gb frrx Qnivq; naq Qnivq
urneq bs vg, naq jrag qbja gb gur ubyq.

5:18 Gur Cuvyvfgvarf nyfb pnzr naq fcernq gurzfryirf va gur inyyrl bs
Ercunvz.

5:19 Naq Qnivq radhverq bs gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Funyy V tb hc gb gur
Cuvyvfgvarf? jvyg gubh qryvire gurz vagb zvar unaq? Naq gur YBEQ fnvq
hagb Qnivq, Tb hc: sbe V jvyy qbhogyrff qryvire gur Cuvyvfgvarf vagb
guvar unaq.

5:20 Naq Qnivq pnzr gb Onnycrenmvz, naq Qnivq fzbgr gurz gurer, naq
fnvq, Gur YBEQ ungu oebxra sbegu hcba zvar rarzvrf orsber zr, nf gur
oernpu bs jngref. Gurersber ur pnyyrq gur anzr bs gung cynpr
Onnycrenmvz.

5:21 Naq gurer gurl yrsg gurve vzntrf, naq Qnivq naq uvf zra ohearq
gurz.

5:22 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf pnzr hc lrg ntnva, naq fcernq gurzfryirf va
gur inyyrl bs Ercunvz.

5:23 Naq jura Qnivq radhverq bs gur YBEQ, ur fnvq, Gubh funyg abg tb
hc; ohg srgpu n pbzcnff oruvaq gurz, naq pbzr hcba gurz bire ntnvafg
gur zhyoreel gerrf.

5:24 Naq yrg vg or, jura gubh urnerfg gur fbhaq bs n tbvat va gur gbcf
bs gur zhyoreel gerrf, gung gura gubh funyg orfgve gulfrys: sbe gura
funyy gur YBEQ tb bhg orsber gurr, gb fzvgr gur ubfg bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf.

5:25 Naq Qnivq qvq fb, nf gur YBEQ unq pbzznaqrq uvz; naq fzbgr gur
Cuvyvfgvarf sebz Tron hagvy gubh pbzr gb Tnmre.

6:1 Ntnva, Qnivq tngurerq gbtrgure nyy gur pubfra zra bs Vfenry,
guvegl gubhfnaq.

6:2 Naq Qnivq nebfr, naq jrag jvgu nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz
sebz Onnyr bs Whqnu, gb oevat hc sebz gurapr gur nex bs Tbq, jubfr
anzr vf pnyyrq ol gur anzr bs gur YBEQ bs ubfgf gung qjryyrgu orgjrra
gur purehovzf.

6:3 Naq gurl frg gur nex bs Tbq hcba n arj pneg, naq oebhtug vg bhg bs
gur ubhfr bs Novanqno gung jnf va Tvornu: naq Hmmnu naq Nuvb, gur fbaf
bs Novanqno, qenir gur arj pneg.

6:4 Naq gurl oebhtug vg bhg bs gur ubhfr bs Novanqno juvpu jnf ng
Tvornu, nppbzcnalvat gur nex bs Tbq: naq Nuvb jrag orsber gur nex.

6:5 Naq Qnivq naq nyy gur ubhfr bs Vfenry cynlrq orsber gur YBEQ ba
nyy znaare bs vafgehzragf znqr bs sve jbbq, rira ba unecf, naq ba
cfnygrevrf, naq ba gvzoeryf, naq ba pbeargf, naq ba plzonyf.

6:6 Naq jura gurl pnzr gb Anpuba'f guerfuvatsybbe, Hmmnu chg sbegu uvf
unaq gb gur nex bs Tbq, naq gbbx ubyq bs vg; sbe gur bkra fubbx vg.

6:7 Naq gur natre bs gur YBEQ jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg Hmmnu; naq Tbq fzbgr
uvz gurer sbe uvf reebe; naq gurer ur qvrq ol gur nex bs Tbq.

6:8 Naq Qnivq jnf qvfcyrnfrq, orpnhfr gur YBEQ unq znqr n oernpu hcba
Hmmnu: naq ur pnyyrq gur anzr bs gur cynpr Crermhmmnu gb guvf qnl.

6:9 Naq Qnivq jnf nsenvq bs gur YBEQ gung qnl, naq fnvq, Ubj funyy gur
nex bs gur YBEQ pbzr gb zr?  6:10 Fb Qnivq jbhyq abg erzbir gur nex bs
gur YBEQ hagb uvz vagb gur pvgl bs Qnivq: ohg Qnivq pneevrq vg nfvqr
vagb gur ubhfr bs Borqrqbz gur Tvggvgr.

6:11 Naq gur nex bs gur YBEQ pbagvahrq va gur ubhfr bs Borqrqbz gur
Tvggvgr guerr zbaguf: naq gur YBEQ oyrffrq Borqrqbz, naq nyy uvf
ubhfrubyq.

6:12 Naq vg jnf gbyq xvat Qnivq, fnlvat, Gur YBEQ ungu oyrffrq gur
ubhfr bs Borqrqbz, naq nyy gung cregnvargu hagb uvz, orpnhfr bs gur
nex bs Tbq. Fb Qnivq jrag naq oebhtug hc gur nex bs Tbq sebz gur ubhfr
bs Borqrqbz vagb gur pvgl bs Qnivq jvgu tynqarff.

6:13 Naq vg jnf fb, gung jura gurl gung oner gur nex bs gur YBEQ unq
tbar fvk cnprf, ur fnpevsvprq bkra naq sngyvatf.

6:14 Naq Qnivq qnaprq orsber gur YBEQ jvgu nyy uvf zvtug; naq Qnivq
jnf tveqrq jvgu n yvara rcubq.

6:15 Fb Qnivq naq nyy gur ubhfr bs Vfenry oebhtug hc gur nex bs gur
YBEQ jvgu fubhgvat, naq jvgu gur fbhaq bs gur gehzcrg.

6:16 Naq nf gur nex bs gur YBEQ pnzr vagb gur pvgl bs Qnivq, Zvpuny
Fnhy'f qnhtugre ybbxrq guebhtu n jvaqbj, naq fnj xvat Qnivq yrncvat
naq qnapvat orsber gur YBEQ; naq fur qrfcvfrq uvz va ure urneg.

6:17 Naq gurl oebhtug va gur nex bs gur YBEQ, naq frg vg va uvf cynpr,
va gur zvqfg bs gur gnoreanpyr gung Qnivq unq cvgpurq sbe vg: naq
Qnivq bssrerq oheag bssrevatf naq crnpr bssrevatf orsber gur YBEQ.

6:18 Naq nf fbba nf Qnivq unq znqr na raq bs bssrevat oheag bssrevatf
naq crnpr bssrevatf, ur oyrffrq gur crbcyr va gur anzr bs gur YBEQ bs
ubfgf.

6:19 Naq ur qrnyg nzbat nyy gur crbcyr, rira nzbat gur jubyr zhygvghqr
bs Vfenry, nf jryy gb gur jbzra nf zra, gb rirel bar n pnxr bs oernq,
naq n tbbq cvrpr bs syrfu, naq n syntba bs jvar. Fb nyy gur crbcyr
qrcnegrq rirel bar gb uvf ubhfr.

6:20 Gura Qnivq erghearq gb oyrff uvf ubhfrubyq. Naq Zvpuny gur
qnhtugre bs Fnhy pnzr bhg gb zrrg Qnivq, naq fnvq, Ubj tybevbhf jnf
gur xvat bs Vfenry gb qnl, jub hapbirerq uvzfrys gb qnl va gur rlrf bs
gur unaqznvqf bs uvf freinagf, nf bar bs gur inva sryybjf funzryrffyl
hapbirergu uvzfrys!  6:21 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Zvpuny, Vg jnf orsber
gur YBEQ, juvpu pubfr zr orsber gul sngure, naq orsber nyy uvf ubhfr,
gb nccbvag zr ehyre bire gur crbcyr bs gur YBEQ, bire Vfenry:
gurersber jvyy V cynl orsber gur YBEQ.

6:22 Naq V jvyy lrg or zber ivyr guna guhf, naq jvyy or onfr va zvar
bja fvtug: naq bs gur znvqfreinagf juvpu gubh unfg fcbxra bs, bs gurz
funyy V or unq va ubabhe.

6:23 Gurersber Zvpuny gur qnhtugre bs Fnhy unq ab puvyq hagb gur qnl
bs ure qrngu.

7:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur xvat fng va uvf ubhfr, naq gur YBEQ
unq tvira uvz erfg ebhaq nobhg sebz nyy uvf rarzvrf; 7:2 Gung gur xvat
fnvq hagb Anguna gur cebcurg, Frr abj, V qjryy va na ubhfr bs prqne,
ohg gur nex bs Tbq qjryyrgu jvguva phegnvaf.

7:3 Naq Anguna fnvq gb gur xvat, Tb, qb nyy gung vf va guvar urneg;
sbe gur YBEQ vf jvgu gurr.

7:4 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff gung avtug, gung gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr
hagb Anguna, fnlvat, 7:5 Tb naq gryy zl freinag Qnivq, Guhf fnvgu gur
YBEQ, Funyg gubh ohvyq zr na ubhfr sbe zr gb qjryy va?  7:6 Jurernf V
unir abg qjryg va nal ubhfr fvapr gur gvzr gung V oebhtug hc gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry bhg bs Rtlcg, rira gb guvf qnl, ohg unir jnyxrq va
n grag naq va n gnoreanpyr.

7:7 Va nyy gur cynprf jurerva V unir jnyxrq jvgu nyy gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry fcnxr V n jbeq jvgu nal bs gur gevorf bs Vfenry, jubz V
pbzznaqrq gb srrq zl crbcyr Vfenry, fnlvat, Jul ohvyq lr abg zr na
ubhfr bs prqne?  7:8 Abj gurersber fb funyg gubh fnl hagb zl freinag
Qnivq, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ bs ubfgf, V gbbx gurr sebz gur furrcpbgr,
sebz sbyybjvat gur furrc, gb or ehyre bire zl crbcyr, bire Vfenry: 7:9
Naq V jnf jvgu gurr juvgurefbrire gubh jragrfg, naq unir phg bss nyy
guvar rarzvrf bhg bs gul fvtug, naq unir znqr gurr n terng anzr, yvxr
hagb gur anzr bs gur terng zra gung ner va gur rnegu.

7:10 Zberbire V jvyy nccbvag n cynpr sbe zl crbcyr Vfenry, naq jvyy
cynag gurz, gung gurl znl qjryy va n cynpr bs gurve bja, naq zbir ab
zber; arvgure funyy gur puvyqera bs jvpxrqarff nssyvpg gurz nal zber,
nf orsbergvzr, 7:11 Naq nf fvapr gur gvzr gung V pbzznaqrq whqtrf gb
or bire zl crbcyr Vfenry, naq unir pnhfrq gurr gb erfg sebz nyy guvar
rarzvrf. Nyfb gur YBEQ gryyrgu gurr gung ur jvyy znxr gurr na ubhfr.

7:12 Naq jura gul qnlf or shysvyyrq, naq gubh funyg fyrrc jvgu gul
snguref, V jvyy frg hc gul frrq nsgre gurr, juvpu funyy cebprrq bhg bs
gul objryf, naq V jvyy rfgnoyvfu uvf xvatqbz.

7:13 Ur funyy ohvyq na ubhfr sbe zl anzr, naq V jvyy fgnoyvfu gur
guebar bs uvf xvatqbz sbe rire.

7:14 V jvyy or uvf sngure, naq ur funyy or zl fba. Vs ur pbzzvg
vavdhvgl, V jvyy punfgra uvz jvgu gur ebq bs zra, naq jvgu gur fgevcrf
bs gur puvyqera bs zra: 7:15 Ohg zl zrepl funyy abg qrcneg njnl sebz
uvz, nf V gbbx vg sebz Fnhy, jubz V chg njnl orsber gurr.

7:16 Naq guvar ubhfr naq gul xvatqbz funyy or rfgnoyvfurq sbe rire
orsber gurr: gul guebar funyy or rfgnoyvfurq sbe rire.

7:17 Nppbeqvat gb nyy gurfr jbeqf, naq nppbeqvat gb nyy guvf ivfvba,
fb qvq Anguna fcrnx hagb Qnivq.

7:18 Gura jrag xvat Qnivq va, naq fng orsber gur YBEQ, naq ur fnvq,
Jub nz V, B Ybeq TBQ? naq jung vf zl ubhfr, gung gubh unfg oebhtug zr
uvguregb?  7:19 Naq guvf jnf lrg n fznyy guvat va gul fvtug, B Ybeq
TBQ; ohg gubh unfg fcbxra nyfb bs gul freinag'f ubhfr sbe n terng
juvyr gb pbzr. Naq vf guvf gur znaare bs zna, B Ybeq TBQ?  7:20 Naq
jung pna Qnivq fnl zber hagb gurr? sbe gubh, Ybeq TBQ, xabjrfg gul
freinag.

7:21 Sbe gul jbeq'f fnxr, naq nppbeqvat gb guvar bja urneg, unfg gubh
qbar nyy gurfr terng guvatf, gb znxr gul freinag xabj gurz.

7:22 Jurersber gubh neg terng, B YBEQ Tbq: sbe gurer vf abar yvxr
gurr, arvgure vf gurer nal Tbq orfvqr gurr, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung jr
unir urneq jvgu bhe rnef.

7:23 Naq jung bar angvba va gur rnegu vf yvxr gul crbcyr, rira yvxr
Vfenry, jubz Tbq jrag gb erqrrz sbe n crbcyr gb uvzfrys, naq gb znxr
uvz n anzr, naq gb qb sbe lbh terng guvatf naq greevoyr, sbe gul ynaq,
orsber gul crbcyr, juvpu gubh erqrrzrqfg gb gurr sebz Rtlcg, sebz gur
angvbaf naq gurve tbqf?  7:24 Sbe gubh unfg pbasvezrq gb gulfrys gul
crbcyr Vfenry gb or n crbcyr hagb gurr sbe rire: naq gubh, YBEQ, neg
orpbzr gurve Tbq.

7:25 Naq abj, B YBEQ Tbq, gur jbeq gung gubh unfg fcbxra pbapreavat
gul freinag, naq pbapreavat uvf ubhfr, rfgnoyvfu vg sbe rire, naq qb
nf gubh unfg fnvq.

7:26 Naq yrg gul anzr or zntavsvrq sbe rire, fnlvat, Gur YBEQ bs ubfgf
vf gur Tbq bire Vfenry: naq yrg gur ubhfr bs gul freinag Qnivq or
rfgnoyvfurq orsber gurr.

7:27 Sbe gubh, B YBEQ bs ubfgf, Tbq bs Vfenry, unfg erirnyrq gb gul
freinag, fnlvat, V jvyy ohvyq gurr na ubhfr: gurersber ungu gul
freinag sbhaq va uvf urneg gb cenl guvf cenlre hagb gurr.

7:28 Naq abj, B Ybeq TBQ, gubh neg gung Tbq, naq gul jbeqf or gehr,
naq gubh unfg cebzvfrq guvf tbbqarff hagb gul freinag: 7:29 Gurersber
abj yrg vg cyrnfr gurr gb oyrff gur ubhfr bs gul freinag, gung vg znl
pbagvahr sbe rire orsber gurr: sbe gubh, B Ybeq TBQ, unfg fcbxra vg:
naq jvgu gul oyrffvat yrg gur ubhfr bs gul freinag or oyrffrq sbe
rire.

8:1 Naq nsgre guvf vg pnzr gb cnff gung Qnivq fzbgr gur Cuvyvfgvarf,
naq fhoqhrq gurz: naq Qnivq gbbx Zrgurtnzznu bhg bs gur unaq bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf.

8:2 Naq ur fzbgr Zbno, naq zrnfherq gurz jvgu n yvar, pnfgvat gurz
qbja gb gur tebhaq; rira jvgu gjb yvarf zrnfherq ur gb chg gb qrngu,
naq jvgu bar shyy yvar gb xrrc nyvir. Naq fb gur Zbnovgrf orpnzr
Qnivq'f freinagf, naq oebhtug tvsgf.

8:3 Qnivq fzbgr nyfb Unqnqrmre, gur fba bs Erubo, xvat bs Mbonu, nf ur
jrag gb erpbire uvf obeqre ng gur evire Rhcuengrf.

8:4 Naq Qnivq gbbx sebz uvz n gubhfnaq punevbgf, naq frira uhaqerq
ubefrzra, naq gjragl gubhfnaq sbbgzra: naq Qnivq ubhturq nyy gur
punevbg ubefrf, ohg erfreirq bs gurz sbe na uhaqerq punevbgf.

8:5 Naq jura gur Flevnaf bs Qnznfphf pnzr gb fhppbhe Unqnqrmre xvat bs
Mbonu, Qnivq fyrj bs gur Flevnaf gjb naq gjragl gubhfnaq zra.

8:6 Gura Qnivq chg tneevfbaf va Flevn bs Qnznfphf: naq gur Flevnaf
orpnzr freinagf gb Qnivq, naq oebhtug tvsgf. Naq gur YBEQ cerfreirq
Qnivq juvgurefbrire ur jrag.

8:7 Naq Qnivq gbbx gur fuvryqf bs tbyq gung jrer ba gur freinagf bs
Unqnqrmre, naq oebhtug gurz gb Wrehfnyrz.

8:8 Naq sebz Orgnu, naq sebz Orebgunv, pvgvrf bs Unqnqrmre, xvat Qnivq
gbbx rkprrqvat zhpu oenff.

8:9 Jura Gbv xvat bs Unzngu urneq gung Qnivq unq fzvggra nyy gur ubfg
bs Unqnqrmre, 8:10 Gura Gbv frag Wbenz uvf fba hagb xvat Qnivq, gb
fnyhgr uvz, naq gb oyrff uvz, orpnhfr ur unq sbhtug ntnvafg Unqnqrmre,
naq fzvggra uvz: sbe Unqnqrmre unq jnef jvgu Gbv. Naq Wbenz oebhtug
jvgu uvz irffryf bs fvyire, naq irffryf bs tbyq, naq irffryf bs oenff:
8:11 Juvpu nyfb xvat Qnivq qvq qrqvpngr hagb gur YBEQ, jvgu gur fvyire
naq tbyq gung ur unq qrqvpngrq bs nyy angvbaf juvpu ur fhoqhrq; 8:12
Bs Flevn, naq bs Zbno, naq bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, naq bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, naq bs Nznyrx, naq bs gur fcbvy bs Unqnqrmre, fba bs
Erubo, xvat bs Mbonu.

8:13 Naq Qnivq tng uvz n anzr jura ur erghearq sebz fzvgvat bs gur
Flevnaf va gur inyyrl bs fnyg, orvat rvtugrra gubhfnaq zra.

8:14 Naq ur chg tneevfbaf va Rqbz; guebhtubhg nyy Rqbz chg ur
tneevfbaf, naq nyy gurl bs Rqbz orpnzr Qnivq'f freinagf. Naq gur YBEQ
cerfreirq Qnivq juvgurefbrire ur jrag.

8:15 Naq Qnivq ervtarq bire nyy Vfenry; naq Qnivq rkrphgrq whqtzrag
naq whfgvpr hagb nyy uvf crbcyr.

8:16 Naq Wbno gur fba bs Mrehvnu jnf bire gur ubfg; naq Wrubfuncung
gur fba bs Nuvyhq jnf erpbeqre; 8:17 Naq Mnqbx gur fba bs Nuvgho, naq
Nuvzryrpu gur fba bs Novngune, jrer gur cevrfgf; naq Frenvnu jnf gur
fpevor; 8:18 Naq Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn jnf bire obgu gur
Purerguvgrf naq gur Cryrguvgrf; naq Qnivq'f fbaf jrer puvrs ehyref.

9:1 Naq Qnivq fnvq, Vf gurer lrg nal gung vf yrsg bs gur ubhfr bs
Fnhy, gung V znl furj uvz xvaqarff sbe Wbanguna'f fnxr?  9:2 Naq gurer
jnf bs gur ubhfr bs Fnhy n freinag jubfr anzr jnf Mvon. Naq jura gurl
unq pnyyrq uvz hagb Qnivq, gur xvat fnvq hagb uvz, Neg gubh Mvon?  Naq
ur fnvq, Gul freinag vf ur.

9:3 Naq gur xvat fnvq, Vf gurer abg lrg nal bs gur ubhfr bs Fnhy, gung
V znl furj gur xvaqarff bs Tbq hagb uvz? Naq Mvon fnvq hagb gur xvat,
Wbanguna ungu lrg n fba, juvpu vf ynzr ba uvf srrg.

9:4 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb uvz, Jurer vf ur? Naq Mvon fnvq hagb gur
xvat, Orubyq, ur vf va gur ubhfr bs Znpuve, gur fba bs Nzzvry, va
Ybqrone.

9:5 Gura xvat Qnivq frag, naq srgpurq uvz bhg bs gur ubhfr bs Znpuve,
gur fba bs Nzzvry, sebz Ybqrone.

9:6 Abj jura Zrcuvobfurgu, gur fba bs Wbanguna, gur fba bs Fnhy, jnf
pbzr hagb Qnivq, ur sryy ba uvf snpr, naq qvq erirerapr. Naq Qnivq
fnvq, Zrcuvobfurgu. Naq ur nafjrerq, Orubyq gul freinag!  9:7 Naq
Qnivq fnvq hagb uvz, Srne abg: sbe V jvyy fheryl furj gurr xvaqarff
sbe Wbanguna gul sngure'f fnxr, naq jvyy erfgber gurr nyy gur ynaq bs
Fnhy gul sngure; naq gubh funyg rng oernq ng zl gnoyr pbagvahnyyl.

9:8 Naq ur objrq uvzfrys, naq fnvq, Jung vf gul freinag, gung gubh
fubhyqrfg ybbx hcba fhpu n qrnq qbt nf V nz?  9:9 Gura gur xvat pnyyrq
gb Mvon, Fnhy'f freinag, naq fnvq hagb uvz, V unir tvira hagb gul
znfgre'f fba nyy gung cregnvarq gb Fnhy naq gb nyy uvf ubhfr.

9:10 Gubh gurersber, naq gul fbaf, naq gul freinagf, funyy gvyy gur
ynaq sbe uvz, naq gubh funyg oevat va gur sehvgf, gung gul znfgre'f
fba znl unir sbbq gb rng: ohg Zrcuvobfurgu gul znfgre'f fba funyy rng
oernq nyjnl ng zl gnoyr. Abj Mvon unq svsgrra fbaf naq gjragl
freinagf.

9:11 Gura fnvq Mvon hagb gur xvat, Nppbeqvat gb nyy gung zl ybeq gur
xvat ungu pbzznaqrq uvf freinag, fb funyy gul freinag qb. Nf sbe
Zrcuvobfurgu, fnvq gur xvat, ur funyy rng ng zl gnoyr, nf bar bs gur
xvat'f fbaf.

9:12 Naq Zrcuvobfurgu unq n lbhat fba, jubfr anzr jnf Zvpun. Naq nyy
gung qjryg va gur ubhfr bs Mvon jrer freinagf hagb Zrcuvobfurgu.

9:13 Fb Zrcuvobfurgu qjryg va Wrehfnyrz: sbe ur qvq rng pbagvahnyyl ng
gur xvat'f gnoyr; naq jnf ynzr ba obgu uvf srrg.

10:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre guvf, gung gur xvat bs gur puvyqera bs
Nzzba qvrq, naq Unaha uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

10:2 Gura fnvq Qnivq, V jvyy furj xvaqarff hagb Unaha gur fba bs
Anunfu, nf uvf sngure furjrq xvaqarff hagb zr. Naq Qnivq frag gb
pbzsbeg uvz ol gur unaq bs uvf freinagf sbe uvf sngure. Naq Qnivq'f
freinagf pnzr vagb gur ynaq bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba.

10:3 Naq gur cevaprf bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba fnvq hagb Unaha gurve
ybeq, Guvaxrfg gubh gung Qnivq qbgu ubabhe gul sngure, gung ur ungu
frag pbzsbegref hagb gurr? ungu abg Qnivq engure frag uvf freinagf
hagb gurr, gb frnepu gur pvgl, naq gb fcl vg bhg, naq gb bireguebj vg?
10:4 Jurersber Unaha gbbx Qnivq'f freinagf, naq funirq bss gur bar
unys bs gurve orneqf, naq phg bss gurve tnezragf va gur zvqqyr, rira
gb gurve ohggbpxf, naq frag gurz njnl.

10:5 Jura gurl gbyq vg hagb Qnivq, ur frag gb zrrg gurz, orpnhfr gur
zra jrer terngyl nfunzrq: naq gur xvat fnvq, Gneel ng Wrevpub hagvy
lbhe orneqf or tebja, naq gura erghea.

10:6 Naq jura gur puvyqera bs Nzzba fnj gung gurl fgnax orsber Qnivq,
gur puvyqera bs Nzzba frag naq uverq gur Flevnaf bs Orguerubo naq gur
Flevnaf bs Mbon, gjragl gubhfnaq sbbgzra, naq bs xvat Znnpnu n
gubhfnaq zra, naq bs Vfugbo gjryir gubhfnaq zra.

10:7 Naq jura Qnivq urneq bs vg, ur frag Wbno, naq nyy gur ubfg bs gur
zvtugl zra.

10:8 Naq gur puvyqera bs Nzzba pnzr bhg, naq chg gur onggyr va neenl
ng gur ragrevat va bs gur tngr: naq gur Flevnaf bs Mbon, naq bs Erubo,
naq Vfugbo, naq Znnpnu, jrer ol gurzfryirf va gur svryq.

10:9 Jura Wbno fnj gung gur sebag bs gur onggyr jnf ntnvafg uvz orsber
naq oruvaq, ur pubfr bs nyy gur pubvpr zra bs Vfenry, naq chg gurz va
neenl ntnvafg gur Flevnaf: 10:10 Naq gur erfg bs gur crbcyr ur
qryvirerq vagb gur unaq bs Novfunv uvf oebgure, gung ur zvtug chg gurz
va neenl ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs Nzzba.

10:11 Naq ur fnvq, Vs gur Flevnaf or gbb fgebat sbe zr, gura gubh
funyg uryc zr: ohg vs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba or gbb fgebat sbe gurr,
gura V jvyy pbzr naq uryc gurr.

10:12 Or bs tbbq pbhentr, naq yrg hf cynl gur zra sbe bhe crbcyr, naq
sbe gur pvgvrf bs bhe Tbq: naq gur YBEQ qb gung juvpu frrzrgu uvz
tbbq.

10:13 Naq Wbno qerj avtu, naq gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz, hagb gur
onggyr ntnvafg gur Flevnaf: naq gurl syrq orsber uvz.

10:14 Naq jura gur puvyqera bs Nzzba fnj gung gur Flevnaf jrer syrq,
gura syrq gurl nyfb orsber Novfunv, naq ragrerq vagb gur pvgl. Fb Wbno
erghearq sebz gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, naq pnzr gb Wrehfnyrz.

10:15 Naq jura gur Flevnaf fnj gung gurl jrer fzvggra orsber Vfenry,
gurl tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure.

10:16 Naq Unqnermre frag, naq oebhtug bhg gur Flevnaf gung jrer orlbaq
gur evire: naq gurl pnzr gb Urynz; naq Fubonpu gur pncgnva bs gur ubfg
bs Unqnermre jrag orsber gurz.

10:17 Naq jura vg jnf gbyq Qnivq, ur tngurerq nyy Vfenry gbtrgure, naq
cnffrq bire Wbeqna, naq pnzr gb Urynz. Naq gur Flevnaf frg gurzfryirf
va neenl ntnvafg Qnivq, naq sbhtug jvgu uvz.

10:18 Naq gur Flevnaf syrq orsber Vfenry; naq Qnivq fyrj gur zra bs
frira uhaqerq punevbgf bs gur Flevnaf, naq sbegl gubhfnaq ubefrzra,
naq fzbgr Fubonpu gur pncgnva bs gurve ubfg, jub qvrq gurer.

10:19 Naq jura nyy gur xvatf gung jrer freinagf gb Unqnermre fnj gung
gurl jrer fzvggra orsber Vfenry, gurl znqr crnpr jvgu Vfenry, naq
freirq gurz. Fb gur Flevnaf srnerq gb uryc gur puvyqera bs Nzzba nal
zber.

11:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nsgre gur lrne jnf rkcverq, ng gur gvzr jura
xvatf tb sbegu gb onggyr, gung Qnivq frag Wbno, naq uvf freinagf jvgu
uvz, naq nyy Vfenry; naq gurl qrfgeblrq gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, naq
orfvrtrq Enoonu. Ohg Qnivq gneevrq fgvyy ng Wrehfnyrz.

11:2 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va na riravatgvqr, gung Qnivq nebfr sebz bss
uvf orq, naq jnyxrq hcba gur ebbs bs gur xvat'f ubhfr: naq sebz gur
ebbs ur fnj n jbzna jnfuvat urefrys; naq gur jbzna jnf irel ornhgvshy
gb ybbx hcba.

11:3 Naq Qnivq frag naq radhverq nsgre gur jbzna. Naq bar fnvq, Vf abg
guvf Ongufuron, gur qnhtugre bs Ryvnz, gur jvsr bs Hevnu gur Uvggvgr?
11:4 Naq Qnivq frag zrffratref, naq gbbx ure; naq fur pnzr va hagb
uvz, naq ur ynl jvgu ure; sbe fur jnf chevsvrq sebz ure hapyrnaarff:
naq fur erghearq hagb ure ubhfr.

11:5 Naq gur jbzna pbaprvirq, naq frag naq gbyq Qnivq, naq fnvq, V nz
jvgu puvyq.

11:6 Naq Qnivq frag gb Wbno, fnlvat, Fraq zr Hevnu gur Uvggvgr. Naq
Wbno frag Hevnu gb Qnivq.

11:7 Naq jura Hevnu jnf pbzr hagb uvz, Qnivq qrznaqrq bs uvz ubj Wbno
qvq, naq ubj gur crbcyr qvq, naq ubj gur jne cebfcrerq.

11:8 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Hevnu, Tb qbja gb gul ubhfr, naq jnfu gul srrg.
Naq Hevnu qrcnegrq bhg bs gur xvat'f ubhfr, naq gurer sbyybjrq uvz n
zrff bs zrng sebz gur xvat.

11:9 Ohg Hevnu fyrcg ng gur qbbe bs gur xvat'f ubhfr jvgu nyy gur
freinagf bs uvf ybeq, naq jrag abg qbja gb uvf ubhfr.

11:10 Naq jura gurl unq gbyq Qnivq, fnlvat, Hevnu jrag abg qbja hagb
uvf ubhfr, Qnivq fnvq hagb Hevnu, Pnzrfg gubh abg sebz gul wbhearl?
jul gura qvqfg gubh abg tb qbja hagb guvar ubhfr?  11:11 Naq Hevnu
fnvq hagb Qnivq, Gur nex, naq Vfenry, naq Whqnu, novqr va gragf; naq
zl ybeq Wbno, naq gur freinagf bs zl ybeq, ner rapnzcrq va gur bcra
svryqf; funyy V gura tb vagb zvar ubhfr, gb rng naq gb qevax, naq gb
yvr jvgu zl jvsr? nf gubh yvirfg, naq nf gul fbhy yvirgu, V jvyy abg
qb guvf guvat.

11:12 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Hevnu, Gneel urer gb qnl nyfb, naq gb zbeebj V
jvyy yrg gurr qrcneg. Fb Hevnu nobqr va Wrehfnyrz gung qnl, naq gur
zbeebj.

11:13 Naq jura Qnivq unq pnyyrq uvz, ur qvq rng naq qevax orsber uvz;
naq ur znqr uvz qehax: naq ng rira ur jrag bhg gb yvr ba uvf orq jvgu
gur freinagf bs uvf ybeq, ohg jrag abg qbja gb uvf ubhfr.

11:14 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur zbeavat, gung Qnivq jebgr n yrggre gb
Wbno, naq frag vg ol gur unaq bs Hevnu.

11:15 Naq ur jebgr va gur yrggre, fnlvat, Frg lr Hevnu va gur
sbersebag bs gur ubggrfg onggyr, naq ergver lr sebz uvz, gung ur znl
or fzvggra, naq qvr.

11:16 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Wbno bofreirq gur pvgl, gung ur
nffvtarq Hevnu hagb n cynpr jurer ur xarj gung inyvnag zra jrer.

11:17 Naq gur zra bs gur pvgl jrag bhg, naq sbhtug jvgu Wbno: naq
gurer sryy fbzr bs gur crbcyr bs gur freinagf bs Qnivq; naq Hevnu gur
Uvggvgr qvrq nyfb.

11:18 Gura Wbno frag naq gbyq Qnivq nyy gur guvatf pbapreavat gur jne;
11:19 Naq punetrq gur zrffratre, fnlvat, Jura gubh unfg znqr na raq bs
gryyvat gur znggref bs gur jne hagb gur xvat, 11:20 Naq vs fb or gung
gur xvat'f jengu nevfr, naq ur fnl hagb gurr, Jurersber nccebnpurq lr
fb avtu hagb gur pvgl jura lr qvq svtug? xarj lr abg gung gurl jbhyq
fubbg sebz gur jnyy?  11:21 Jub fzbgr Novzryrpu gur fba bs
Wrehoorfurgu? qvq abg n jbzna pnfg n cvrpr bs n zvyyfgbar hcba uvz
sebz gur jnyy, gung ur qvrq va Gurorm? jul jrag lr avtu gur jnyy? gura
fnl gubh, Gul freinag Hevnu gur Uvggvgr vf qrnq nyfb.

11:22 Fb gur zrffratre jrag, naq pnzr naq furjrq Qnivq nyy gung Wbno
unq frag uvz sbe.

11:23 Naq gur zrffratre fnvq hagb Qnivq, Fheryl gur zra cerinvyrq
ntnvafg hf, naq pnzr bhg hagb hf vagb gur svryq, naq jr jrer hcba gurz
rira hagb gur ragrevat bs gur tngr.

11:24 Naq gur fubbgref fubg sebz bss gur jnyy hcba gul freinagf; naq
fbzr bs gur xvat'f freinagf or qrnq, naq gul freinag Hevnu gur Uvggvgr
vf qrnq nyfb.

11:25 Gura Qnivq fnvq hagb gur zrffratre, Guhf funyg gubh fnl hagb
Wbno, Yrg abg guvf guvat qvfcyrnfr gurr, sbe gur fjbeq qribhergu bar
nf jryy nf nabgure: znxr gul onggyr zber fgebat ntnvafg gur pvgl, naq
bireguebj vg: naq rapbhentr gubh uvz.

11:26 Naq jura gur jvsr bs Hevnu urneq gung Hevnu ure uhfonaq jnf
qrnq, fur zbhearq sbe ure uhfonaq.

11:27 Naq jura gur zbheavat jnf cnfg, Qnivq frag naq srgpurq ure gb
uvf ubhfr, naq fur orpnzr uvf jvsr, naq oner uvz n fba. Ohg gur guvat
gung Qnivq unq qbar qvfcyrnfrq gur YBEQ.

12:1 Naq gur YBEQ frag Anguna hagb Qnivq. Naq ur pnzr hagb uvz, naq
fnvq hagb uvz, Gurer jrer gjb zra va bar pvgl; gur bar evpu, naq gur
bgure cbbe.

12:2 Gur evpu zna unq rkprrqvat znal sybpxf naq ureqf: 12:3 Ohg gur
cbbe zna unq abguvat, fnir bar yvggyr rjr ynzo, juvpu ur unq obhtug
naq abhevfurq hc: naq vg terj hc gbtrgure jvgu uvz, naq jvgu uvf
puvyqera; vg qvq rng bs uvf bja zrng, naq qenax bs uvf bja phc, naq
ynl va uvf obfbz, naq jnf hagb uvz nf n qnhtugre.

12:4 Naq gurer pnzr n geniryyre hagb gur evpu zna, naq ur fcnerq gb
gnxr bs uvf bja sybpx naq bs uvf bja ureq, gb qerff sbe gur jnlsnevat
zna gung jnf pbzr hagb uvz; ohg gbbx gur cbbe zna'f ynzo, naq qerffrq
vg sbe gur zna gung jnf pbzr gb uvz.

12:5 Naq Qnivq'f natre jnf terngyl xvaqyrq ntnvafg gur zna; naq ur
fnvq gb Anguna, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, gur zna gung ungu qbar guvf guvat
funyy fheryl qvr: 12:6 Naq ur funyy erfgber gur ynzo sbhesbyq, orpnhfr
ur qvq guvf guvat, naq orpnhfr ur unq ab cvgl.

12:7 Naq Anguna fnvq gb Qnivq, Gubh neg gur zna. Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ
Tbq bs Vfenry, V nabvagrq gurr xvat bire Vfenry, naq V qryvirerq gurr
bhg bs gur unaq bs Fnhy; 12:8 Naq V tnir gurr gul znfgre'f ubhfr, naq
gul znfgre'f jvirf vagb gul obfbz, naq tnir gurr gur ubhfr bs Vfenry
naq bs Whqnu; naq vs gung unq orra gbb yvggyr, V jbhyq zberbire unir
tvira hagb gurr fhpu naq fhpu guvatf.

12:9 Jurersber unfg gubh qrfcvfrq gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ, gb qb
rivy va uvf fvtug? gubh unfg xvyyrq Hevnu gur Uvggvgr jvgu gur fjbeq,
naq unfg gnxra uvf jvsr gb or gul jvsr, naq unfg fynva uvz jvgu gur
fjbeq bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba.

12:10 Abj gurersber gur fjbeq funyy arire qrcneg sebz guvar ubhfr;
orpnhfr gubh unfg qrfcvfrq zr, naq unfg gnxra gur jvsr bs Hevnu gur
Uvggvgr gb or gul jvsr.

12:11 Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Orubyq, V jvyy envfr hc rivy ntnvafg gurr
bhg bs guvar bja ubhfr, naq V jvyy gnxr gul jvirf orsber guvar rlrf,
naq tvir gurz hagb gul arvtuobhe, naq ur funyy yvr jvgu gul jvirf va
gur fvtug bs guvf fha.

12:12 Sbe gubh qvqfg vg frpergyl: ohg V jvyy qb guvf guvat orsber nyy
Vfenry, naq orsber gur fha.

12:13 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Anguna, V unir fvaarq ntnvafg gur YBEQ. Naq
Anguna fnvq hagb Qnivq, Gur YBEQ nyfb ungu chg njnl gul fva; gubh
funyg abg qvr.

12:14 Ubjorvg, orpnhfr ol guvf qrrq gubh unfg tvira terng bppnfvba gb
gur rarzvrf bs gur YBEQ gb oynfcurzr, gur puvyq nyfb gung vf obea hagb
gurr funyy fheryl qvr.

12:15 Naq Anguna qrcnegrq hagb uvf ubhfr. Naq gur YBEQ fgehpx gur
puvyq gung Hevnu'f jvsr oner hagb Qnivq, naq vg jnf irel fvpx.

12:16 Qnivq gurersber orfbhtug Tbq sbe gur puvyq; naq Qnivq snfgrq,
naq jrag va, naq ynl nyy avtug hcba gur rnegu.

12:17 Naq gur ryqref bs uvf ubhfr nebfr, naq jrag gb uvz, gb envfr uvz
hc sebz gur rnegu: ohg ur jbhyq abg, arvgure qvq ur rng oernq jvgu
gurz.

12:18 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur friragu qnl, gung gur puvyq qvrq. Naq
gur freinagf bs Qnivq srnerq gb gryy uvz gung gur puvyq jnf qrnq: sbe
gurl fnvq, Orubyq, juvyr gur puvyq jnf lrg nyvir, jr fcnxr hagb uvz,
naq ur jbhyq abg urnexra hagb bhe ibvpr: ubj jvyy ur gura irk uvzfrys,
vs jr gryy uvz gung gur puvyq vf qrnq?  12:19 Ohg jura Qnivq fnj gung
uvf freinagf juvfcrerq, Qnivq creprvirq gung gur puvyq jnf qrnq:
gurersber Qnivq fnvq hagb uvf freinagf, Vf gur puvyq qrnq? Naq gurl
fnvq, Ur vf qrnq.

12:20 Gura Qnivq nebfr sebz gur rnegu, naq jnfurq, naq nabvagrq
uvzfrys, naq punatrq uvf nccnery, naq pnzr vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ,
naq jbefuvccrq: gura ur pnzr gb uvf bja ubhfr; naq jura ur erdhverq,
gurl frg oernq orsber uvz, naq ur qvq rng.

12:21 Gura fnvq uvf freinagf hagb uvz, Jung guvat vf guvf gung gubh
unfg qbar? gubh qvqfg snfg naq jrrc sbe gur puvyq, juvyr vg jnf nyvir;
ohg jura gur puvyq jnf qrnq, gubh qvqfg evfr naq rng oernq.

12:22 Naq ur fnvq, Juvyr gur puvyq jnf lrg nyvir, V snfgrq naq jrcg:
sbe V fnvq, Jub pna gryy jurgure TBQ jvyy or tenpvbhf gb zr, gung gur
