puvyq znl yvir?  12:23 Ohg abj ur vf qrnq, jurersber fubhyq V snfg?
pna V oevat uvz onpx ntnva? V funyy tb gb uvz, ohg ur funyy abg erghea
gb zr.

12:24 Naq Qnivq pbzsbegrq Ongufuron uvf jvsr, naq jrag va hagb ure,
naq ynl jvgu ure: naq fur oner n fba, naq ur pnyyrq uvf anzr Fbybzba:
naq gur YBEQ ybirq uvz.

12:25 Naq ur frag ol gur unaq bs Anguna gur cebcurg; naq ur pnyyrq uvf
anzr Wrqvqvnu, orpnhfr bs gur YBEQ.

12:26 Naq Wbno sbhtug ntnvafg Enoonu bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, naq
gbbx gur eblny pvgl.

12:27 Naq Wbno frag zrffratref gb Qnivq, naq fnvq, V unir sbhtug
ntnvafg Enoonu, naq unir gnxra gur pvgl bs jngref.

12:28 Abj gurersber tngure gur erfg bs gur crbcyr gbtrgure, naq rapnzc
ntnvafg gur pvgl, naq gnxr vg: yrfg V gnxr gur pvgl, naq vg or pnyyrq
nsgre zl anzr.

12:29 Naq Qnivq tngurerq nyy gur crbcyr gbtrgure, naq jrag gb Enoonu,
naq sbhtug ntnvafg vg, naq gbbx vg.

12:30 Naq ur gbbx gurve xvat'f pebja sebz bss uvf urnq, gur jrvtug
jurerbs jnf n gnyrag bs tbyq jvgu gur cerpvbhf fgbarf: naq vg jnf frg
ba Qnivq'f urnq. Naq ur oebhtug sbegu gur fcbvy bs gur pvgl va terng
nohaqnapr.

12:31 Naq ur oebhtug sbegu gur crbcyr gung jrer gurerva, naq chg gurz
haqre fnjf, naq haqre uneebjf bs veba, naq haqre nkrf bs veba, naq
znqr gurz cnff guebhtu gur oevpx-xvya: naq guhf qvq ur hagb nyy gur
pvgvrf bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba. Fb Qnivq naq nyy gur crbcyr erghearq
hagb Wrehfnyrz.

13:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre guvf, gung Nofnybz gur fba bs Qnivq unq
n snve fvfgre, jubfr anzr jnf Gnzne; naq Nzaba gur fba bs Qnivq ybirq
ure.

13:2 Naq Nzaba jnf fb irkrq, gung ur sryy fvpx sbe uvf fvfgre Gnzne;
sbe fur jnf n ivetva; naq Nzaba gubhtug vg uneq sbe uvz gb qb nalguvat
gb ure.

13:3 Ohg Nzaba unq n sevraq, jubfr anzr jnf Wbanqno, gur fba bs
Fuvzrnu Qnivq'f oebgure: naq Wbanqno jnf n irel fhogvy zna.

13:4 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Jul neg gubh, orvat gur xvat'f fba, yrna
sebz qnl gb qnl? jvyg gubh abg gryy zr? Naq Nzaba fnvq hagb uvz, V
ybir Gnzne, zl oebgure Nofnybz'f fvfgre.

13:5 Naq Wbanqno fnvq hagb uvz, Ynl gurr qbja ba gul orq, naq znxr
gulfrys fvpx: naq jura gul sngure pbzrgu gb frr gurr, fnl hagb uvz, V
cenl gurr, yrg zl fvfgre Gnzne pbzr, naq tvir zr zrng, naq qerff gur
zrng va zl fvtug, gung V znl frr vg, naq rng vg ng ure unaq.

13:6 Fb Nzaba ynl qbja, naq znqr uvzfrys fvpx: naq jura gur xvat jnf
pbzr gb frr uvz, Nzaba fnvq hagb gur xvat, V cenl gurr, yrg Gnzne zl
fvfgre pbzr, naq znxr zr n pbhcyr bs pnxrf va zl fvtug, gung V znl rng
ng ure unaq.

13:7 Gura Qnivq frag ubzr gb Gnzne, fnlvat, Tb abj gb gul oebgure
Nzaba'f ubhfr, naq qerff uvz zrng.

13:8 Fb Gnzne jrag gb ure oebgure Nzaba'f ubhfr; naq ur jnf ynvq qbja.
Naq fur gbbx sybhe, naq xarnqrq vg, naq znqr pnxrf va uvf fvtug, naq
qvq onxr gur pnxrf.

13:9 Naq fur gbbx n cna, naq cbherq gurz bhg orsber uvz; ohg ur
ershfrq gb rng. Naq Nzaba fnvq, Unir bhg nyy zra sebz zr. Naq gurl
jrag bhg rirel zna sebz uvz.

13:10 Naq Nzaba fnvq hagb Gnzne, Oevat gur zrng vagb gur punzore, gung
V znl rng bs guvar unaq. Naq Gnzne gbbx gur pnxrf juvpu fur unq znqr,
naq oebhtug gurz vagb gur punzore gb Nzaba ure oebgure.

13:11 Naq jura fur unq oebhtug gurz hagb uvz gb rng, ur gbbx ubyq bs
ure, naq fnvq hagb ure, Pbzr yvr jvgu zr, zl fvfgre.

13:12 Naq fur nafjrerq uvz, Anl, zl oebgure, qb abg sbepr zr; sbe ab
fhpu guvat bhtug gb or qbar va Vfenry: qb abg gubh guvf sbyyl.

13:13 Naq V, juvgure funyy V pnhfr zl funzr gb tb? naq nf sbe gurr,
gubh funyg or nf bar bs gur sbbyf va Vfenry. Abj gurersber, V cenl
gurr, fcrnx hagb gur xvat; sbe ur jvyy abg jvguubyq zr sebz gurr.

13:14 Ubjorvg ur jbhyq abg urnexra hagb ure ibvpr: ohg, orvat fgebatre
guna fur, sbeprq ure, naq ynl jvgu ure.

13:15 Gura Nzaba ungrq ure rkprrqvatyl; fb gung gur ungerq jurerjvgu
ur ungrq ure jnf terngre guna gur ybir jurerjvgu ur unq ybirq ure. Naq
Nzaba fnvq hagb ure, Nevfr, or tbar.

13:16 Naq fur fnvq hagb uvz, Gurer vf ab pnhfr: guvf rivy va fraqvat
zr njnl vf terngre guna gur bgure gung gubh qvqfg hagb zr. Ohg ur
jbhyq abg urnexra hagb ure.

13:17 Gura ur pnyyrq uvf freinag gung zvavfgrerq hagb uvz, naq fnvq,
Chg abj guvf jbzna bhg sebz zr, naq obyg gur qbbe nsgre ure.

13:18 Naq fur unq n tnezrag bs qviref pbybhef hcba ure: sbe jvgu fhpu
eborf jrer gur xvat'f qnhtugref gung jrer ivetvaf nccneryyrq. Gura uvf
freinag oebhtug ure bhg, naq obygrq gur qbbe nsgre ure.

13:19 Naq Gnzne chg nfurf ba ure urnq, naq erag ure tnezrag bs qviref
pbybhef gung jnf ba ure, naq ynvq ure unaq ba ure urnq, naq jrag ba
pelvat.

13:20 Naq Nofnybz ure oebgure fnvq hagb ure, Ungu Nzaba gul oebgure
orra jvgu gurr? ohg ubyq abj gul crnpr, zl fvfgre: ur vf gul oebgure;
ertneq abg guvf guvat. Fb Gnzne erznvarq qrfbyngr va ure oebgure
Nofnybz'f ubhfr.

13:21 Ohg jura xvat Qnivq urneq bs nyy gurfr guvatf, ur jnf irel
jebgu.

13:22 Naq Nofnybz fcnxr hagb uvf oebgure Nzaba arvgure tbbq abe onq:
sbe Nofnybz ungrq Nzaba, orpnhfr ur unq sbeprq uvf fvfgre Gnzne.

13:23 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre gjb shyy lrnef, gung Nofnybz unq
furrcfurneref va Onnyunmbe, juvpu vf orfvqr Rcuenvz: naq Nofnybz
vaivgrq nyy gur xvat'f fbaf.

13:24 Naq Nofnybz pnzr gb gur xvat, naq fnvq, Orubyq abj, gul freinag
ungu furrcfurneref; yrg gur xvat, V orfrrpu gurr, naq uvf freinagf tb
jvgu gul freinag.

13:25 Naq gur xvat fnvq gb Nofnybz, Anl, zl fba, yrg hf abg nyy abj
tb, yrfg jr or punetrnoyr hagb gurr. Naq ur cerffrq uvz: ubjorvg ur
jbhyq abg tb, ohg oyrffrq uvz.

13:26 Gura fnvq Nofnybz, Vs abg, V cenl gurr, yrg zl oebgure Nzaba tb
jvgu hf. Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb uvz, Jul fubhyq ur tb jvgu gurr?
13:27 Ohg Nofnybz cerffrq uvz, gung ur yrg Nzaba naq nyy gur xvat'f
fbaf tb jvgu uvz.

13:28 Abj Nofnybz unq pbzznaqrq uvf freinagf, fnlvat, Znex lr abj jura
Nzaba'f urneg vf zreel jvgu jvar, naq jura V fnl hagb lbh, Fzvgr
Nzaba; gura xvyy uvz, srne abg: unir abg V pbzznaqrq lbh? or
pbhentrbhf, naq or inyvnag.

13:29 Naq gur freinagf bs Nofnybz qvq hagb Nzaba nf Nofnybz unq
pbzznaqrq.

Gura nyy gur xvat'f fbaf nebfr, naq rirel zna tng uvz hc hcba uvf
zhyr, naq syrq.

13:30 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, juvyr gurl jrer va gur jnl, gung gvqvatf
pnzr gb Qnivq, fnlvat, Nofnybz ungu fynva nyy gur xvat'f fbaf, naq
gurer vf abg bar bs gurz yrsg.

13:31 Gura gur xvat nebfr, naq gner uvf tnezragf, naq ynl ba gur
rnegu; naq nyy uvf freinagf fgbbq ol jvgu gurve pybgurf erag.

13:32 Naq Wbanqno, gur fba bs Fuvzrnu Qnivq'f oebgure, nafjrerq naq
fnvq, Yrg abg zl ybeq fhccbfr gung gurl unir fynva nyy gur lbhat zra
gur xvat'f fbaf; sbe Nzaba bayl vf qrnq: sbe ol gur nccbvagzrag bs
Nofnybz guvf ungu orra qrgrezvarq sebz gur qnl gung ur sbeprq uvf
fvfgre Gnzne.

13:33 Abj gurersber yrg abg zl ybeq gur xvat gnxr gur guvat gb uvf
urneg, gb guvax gung nyy gur xvat'f fbaf ner qrnq: sbe Nzaba bayl vf
qrnq.

13:34 Ohg Nofnybz syrq. Naq gur lbhat zna gung xrcg gur jngpu yvsgrq
hc uvf rlrf, naq ybbxrq, naq, orubyq, gurer pnzr zhpu crbcyr ol gur
jnl bs gur uvyy fvqr oruvaq uvz.

13:35 Naq Wbanqno fnvq hagb gur xvat, Orubyq, gur xvat'f fbaf pbzr: nf
gul freinag fnvq, fb vg vf.

13:36 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf fbba nf ur unq znqr na raq bs fcrnxvat,
gung, orubyq, gur xvat'f fbaf pnzr, naq yvsgrq hc gurve ibvpr naq
jrcg: naq gur xvat nyfb naq nyy uvf freinagf jrcg irel fber.

13:37 Ohg Nofnybz syrq, naq jrag gb Gnyznv, gur fba bs Nzzvuhq, xvat
bs Trfuhe. Naq Qnivq zbhearq sbe uvf fba rirel qnl.

13:38 Fb Nofnybz syrq, naq jrag gb Trfuhe, naq jnf gurer guerr lrnef.

13:39 Naq gur fbhy bs xvat Qnivq ybatrq gb tb sbegu hagb Nofnybz: sbe
ur jnf pbzsbegrq pbapreavat Nzaba, frrvat ur jnf qrnq.

14:1 Abj Wbno gur fba bs Mrehvnu creprvirq gung gur xvat'f urneg jnf
gbjneq Nofnybz.

14:2 Naq Wbno frag gb Grxbnu, naq srgpurq gurapr n jvfr jbzna, naq
fnvq hagb ure, V cenl gurr, srvta gulfrys gb or n zbheare, naq chg ba
abj zbheavat nccnery, naq nabvag abg gulfrys jvgu bvy, ohg or nf n
jbzna gung unq n ybat gvzr zbhearq sbe gur qrnq: 14:3 Naq pbzr gb gur
xvat, naq fcrnx ba guvf znaare hagb uvz. Fb Wbno chg gur jbeqf va ure
zbhgu.

14:4 Naq jura gur jbzna bs Grxbnu fcnxr gb gur xvat, fur sryy ba ure
snpr gb gur tebhaq, naq qvq borvfnapr, naq fnvq, Uryc, B xvat.

14:5 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb ure, Jung nvyrgu gurr? Naq fur nafjrerq, V
nz vaqrrq n jvqbj jbzna, naq zvar uhfonaq vf qrnq.

14:6 Naq gul unaqznvq unq gjb fbaf, naq gurl gjb fgebir gbtrgure va
gur svryq, naq gurer jnf abar gb cneg gurz, ohg gur bar fzbgr gur
bgure, naq fyrj uvz.

14:7 Naq, orubyq, gur jubyr snzvyl vf evfra ntnvafg guvar unaqznvq,
naq gurl fnvq, Qryvire uvz gung fzbgr uvf oebgure, gung jr znl xvyy
uvz, sbe gur yvsr bs uvf oebgure jubz ur fyrj; naq jr jvyy qrfgebl gur
urve nyfb: naq fb gurl funyy dhrapu zl pbny juvpu vf yrsg, naq funyy
abg yrnir gb zl uhfonaq arvgure anzr abe erznvaqre hcba gur rnegu.

14:8 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb gur jbzna, Tb gb guvar ubhfr, naq V jvyy
tvir punetr pbapreavat gurr.

14:9 Naq gur jbzna bs Grxbnu fnvq hagb gur xvat, Zl ybeq, B xvat, gur
vavdhvgl or ba zr, naq ba zl sngure'f ubhfr: naq gur xvat naq uvf
guebar or thvygyrff.

14:10 Naq gur xvat fnvq, Jubrire fnvgu bhtug hagb gurr, oevat uvz gb
zr, naq ur funyy abg gbhpu gurr nal zber.

14:11 Gura fnvq fur, V cenl gurr, yrg gur xvat erzrzore gur YBEQ gul
Tbq, gung gubh jbhyqrfg abg fhssre gur eriratref bs oybbq gb qrfgebl
nal zber, yrfg gurl qrfgebl zl fba. Naq ur fnvq, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu,
gurer funyy abg bar unve bs gul fba snyy gb gur rnegu.

14:12 Gura gur jbzna fnvq, Yrg guvar unaqznvq, V cenl gurr, fcrnx bar
jbeq hagb zl ybeq gur xvat. Naq ur fnvq, Fnl ba.

14:13 Naq gur jbzna fnvq, Jurersber gura unfg gubh gubhtug fhpu n
guvat ntnvafg gur crbcyr bs Tbq? sbe gur xvat qbgu fcrnx guvf guvat nf
bar juvpu vf snhygl, va gung gur xvat qbgu abg srgpu ubzr ntnva uvf
onavfurq.

14:14 Sbe jr zhfg arrqf qvr, naq ner nf jngre fcvyg ba gur tebhaq,
juvpu pnaabg or tngurerq hc ntnva; arvgure qbgu Tbq erfcrpg nal
crefba: lrg qbgu ur qrivfr zrnaf, gung uvf onavfurq or abg rkcryyrq
sebz uvz.

14:15 Abj gurersber gung V nz pbzr gb fcrnx bs guvf guvat hagb zl ybeq
gur xvat, vg vf orpnhfr gur crbcyr unir znqr zr nsenvq: naq gul
unaqznvq fnvq, V jvyy abj fcrnx hagb gur xvat; vg znl or gung gur xvat
jvyy cresbez gur erdhrfg bs uvf unaqznvq.

14:16 Sbe gur xvat jvyy urne, gb qryvire uvf unaqznvq bhg bs gur unaq
bs gur zna gung jbhyq qrfgebl zr naq zl fba gbtrgure bhg bs gur
vaurevgnapr bs Tbq.

14:17 Gura guvar unaqznvq fnvq, Gur jbeq bs zl ybeq gur xvat funyy abj
or pbzsbegnoyr: sbe nf na natry bs Tbq, fb vf zl ybeq gur xvat gb
qvfprea tbbq naq onq: gurersber gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvyy or jvgu gurr.

14:18 Gura gur xvat nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb gur jbzna, Uvqr abg sebz
zr, V cenl gurr, gur guvat gung V funyy nfx gurr. Naq gur jbzna fnvq,
Yrg zl ybeq gur xvat abj fcrnx.

14:19 Naq gur xvat fnvq, Vf abg gur unaq bs Wbno jvgu gurr va nyy
guvf?  Naq gur jbzna nafjrerq naq fnvq, Nf gul fbhy yvirgu, zl ybeq
gur xvat, abar pna ghea gb gur evtug unaq be gb gur yrsg sebz bhtug
gung zl ybeq gur xvat ungu fcbxra: sbe gul freinag Wbno, ur onqr zr,
naq ur chg nyy gurfr jbeqf va gur zbhgu bs guvar unaqznvq: 14:20 Gb
srgpu nobhg guvf sbez bs fcrrpu ungu gul freinag Wbno qbar guvf guvat:
naq zl ybeq vf jvfr, nppbeqvat gb gur jvfqbz bs na natry bs Tbq, gb
xabj nyy guvatf gung ner va gur rnegu.

14:21 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb Wbno, Orubyq abj, V unir qbar guvf guvat:
tb gurersber, oevat gur lbhat zna Nofnybz ntnva.

14:22 Naq Wbno sryy gb gur tebhaq ba uvf snpr, naq objrq uvzfrys, naq
gunaxrq gur xvat: naq Wbno fnvq, Gb qnl gul freinag xabjrgu gung V
unir sbhaq tenpr va gul fvtug, zl ybeq, B xvat, va gung gur xvat ungu
shysvyyrq gur erdhrfg bs uvf freinag.

14:23 Fb Wbno nebfr naq jrag gb Trfuhe, naq oebhtug Nofnybz gb
Wrehfnyrz.

14:24 Naq gur xvat fnvq, Yrg uvz ghea gb uvf bja ubhfr, naq yrg uvz
abg frr zl snpr. Fb Nofnybz erghearq gb uvf bja ubhfr, naq fnj abg gur
xvat'f snpr.

14:25 Ohg va nyy Vfenry gurer jnf abar gb or fb zhpu cenvfrq nf
Nofnybz sbe uvf ornhgl: sebz gur fbyr bs uvf sbbg rira gb gur pebja bs
uvf urnq gurer jnf ab oyrzvfu va uvz.

14:26 Naq jura ur cbyyrq uvf urnq, (sbe vg jnf ng rirel lrne'f raq
gung ur cbyyrq vg: orpnhfr gur unve jnf urnil ba uvz, gurersber ur
cbyyrq vg:) ur jrvturq gur unve bs uvf urnq ng gjb uhaqerq furxryf
nsgre gur xvat'f jrvtug.

14:27 Naq hagb Nofnybz gurer jrer obea guerr fbaf, naq bar qnhtugre,
jubfr anzr jnf Gnzne: fur jnf n jbzna bs n snve pbhagranapr.

14:28 Fb Nofnybz qjryg gjb shyy lrnef va Wrehfnyrz, naq fnj abg gur
xvat'f snpr.

14:29 Gurersber Nofnybz frag sbe Wbno, gb unir frag uvz gb gur xvat;
ohg ur jbhyq abg pbzr gb uvz: naq jura ur frag ntnva gur frpbaq gvzr,
ur jbhyq abg pbzr.

14:30 Gurersber ur fnvq hagb uvf freinagf, Frr, Wbno'f svryq vf arne
zvar, naq ur ungu oneyrl gurer; tb naq frg vg ba sver. Naq Nofnybz'f
freinagf frg gur svryq ba sver.

14:31 Gura Wbno nebfr, naq pnzr gb Nofnybz hagb uvf ubhfr, naq fnvq
hagb uvz, Jurersber unir gul freinagf frg zl svryq ba sver?  14:32 Naq
Nofnybz nafjrerq Wbno, Orubyq, V frag hagb gurr, fnlvat, Pbzr uvgure,
gung V znl fraq gurr gb gur xvat, gb fnl, Jurersber nz V pbzr sebz
Trfuhe? vg unq orra tbbq sbe zr gb unir orra gurer fgvyy: abj
gurersber yrg zr frr gur xvat'f snpr; naq vs gurer or nal vavdhvgl va
zr, yrg uvz xvyy zr.

14:33 Fb Wbno pnzr gb gur xvat, naq gbyq uvz: naq jura ur unq pnyyrq
sbe Nofnybz, ur pnzr gb gur xvat, naq objrq uvzfrys ba uvf snpr gb gur
tebhaq orsber gur xvat: naq gur xvat xvffrq Nofnybz.

15:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre guvf, gung Nofnybz cercnerq uvz
punevbgf naq ubefrf, naq svsgl zra gb eha orsber uvz.

15:2 Naq Nofnybz ebfr hc rneyl, naq fgbbq orfvqr gur jnl bs gur tngr:
naq vg jnf fb, gung jura nal zna gung unq n pbagebirefl pnzr gb gur
xvat sbe whqtzrag, gura Nofnybz pnyyrq hagb uvz, naq fnvq, Bs jung
pvgl neg gubh? Naq ur fnvq, Gul freinag vf bs bar bs gur gevorf bs
Vfenry.

15:3 Naq Nofnybz fnvq hagb uvz, Frr, gul znggref ner tbbq naq evtug;
ohg gurer vf ab zna qrchgrq bs gur xvat gb urne gurr.

15:4 Nofnybz fnvq zberbire, Bu gung V jrer znqr whqtr va gur ynaq,
gung rirel zna juvpu ungu nal fhvg be pnhfr zvtug pbzr hagb zr, naq V
jbhyq qb uvz whfgvpr!  15:5 Naq vg jnf fb, gung jura nal zna pnzr avtu
gb uvz gb qb uvz borvfnapr, ur chg sbegu uvf unaq, naq gbbx uvz, naq
xvffrq uvz.

15:6 Naq ba guvf znaare qvq Nofnybz gb nyy Vfenry gung pnzr gb gur
xvat sbe whqtzrag: fb Nofnybz fgbyr gur urnegf bs gur zra bs Vfenry.

15:7 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre sbegl lrnef, gung Nofnybz fnvq hagb gur
xvat, V cenl gurr, yrg zr tb naq cnl zl ibj, juvpu V unir ibjrq hagb
gur YBEQ, va Uroeba.

15:8 Sbe gul freinag ibjrq n ibj juvyr V nobqr ng Trfuhe va Flevn,
fnlvat, Vs gur YBEQ funyy oevat zr ntnva vaqrrq gb Wrehfnyrz, gura V
jvyy freir gur YBEQ.

15:9 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb uvz, Tb va crnpr. Fb ur nebfr, naq jrag gb
Uroeba.

15:10 Ohg Nofnybz frag fcvrf guebhtubhg nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry,
fnlvat, Nf fbba nf lr urne gur fbhaq bs gur gehzcrg, gura lr funyy
fnl, Nofnybz ervtargu va Uroeba.

15:11 Naq jvgu Nofnybz jrag gjb uhaqerq zra bhg bs Wrehfnyrz, gung
jrer pnyyrq; naq gurl jrag va gurve fvzcyvpvgl, naq gurl xarj abg nal
guvat.

15:12 Naq Nofnybz frag sbe Nuvgubcury gur Tvybavgr, Qnivq'f
pbhafryybe, sebz uvf pvgl, rira sebz Tvybu, juvyr ur bssrerq
fnpevsvprf. Naq gur pbafcvenpl jnf fgebat; sbe gur crbcyr vapernfrq
pbagvahnyyl jvgu Nofnybz.

15:13 Naq gurer pnzr n zrffratre gb Qnivq, fnlvat, Gur urnegf bs gur
zra bs Vfenry ner nsgre Nofnybz.

15:14 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb nyy uvf freinagf gung jrer jvgu uvz ng
Wrehfnyrz, Nevfr, naq yrg hf syrr; sbe jr funyy abg ryfr rfpncr sebz
Nofnybz: znxr fcrrq gb qrcneg, yrfg ur biregnxr hf fhqqrayl, naq oevat
rivy hcba hf, naq fzvgr gur pvgl jvgu gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq.

15:15 Naq gur xvat'f freinagf fnvq hagb gur xvat, Orubyq, gul freinagf
ner ernql gb qb jungfbrire zl ybeq gur xvat funyy nccbvag.

15:16 Naq gur xvat jrag sbegu, naq nyy uvf ubhfrubyq nsgre uvz. Naq
gur xvat yrsg gra jbzra, juvpu jrer pbaphovarf, gb xrrc gur ubhfr.

15:17 Naq gur xvat jrag sbegu, naq nyy gur crbcyr nsgre uvz, naq
gneevrq va n cynpr gung jnf sne bss.

15:18 Naq nyy uvf freinagf cnffrq ba orfvqr uvz; naq nyy gur
Purerguvgrf, naq nyy gur Cryrguvgrf, naq nyy gur Tvggvgrf, fvk uhaqerq
zra juvpu pnzr nsgre uvz sebz Tngu, cnffrq ba orsber gur xvat.

15:19 Gura fnvq gur xvat gb Vggnv gur Tvggvgr, Jurersber tbrfg gubh
nyfb jvgu hf? erghea gb gul cynpr, naq novqr jvgu gur xvat: sbe gubh
neg n fgenatre, naq nyfb na rkvyr.

15:20 Jurernf gubh pnzrfg ohg lrfgreqnl, fubhyq V guvf qnl znxr gurr
tb hc naq qbja jvgu hf? frrvat V tb juvgure V znl, erghea gubh, naq
gnxr onpx gul oerguera: zrepl naq gehgu or jvgu gurr.

15:21 Naq Vggnv nafjrerq gur xvat, naq fnvq, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, naq
nf zl ybeq gur xvat yvirgu, fheryl va jung cynpr zl ybeq gur xvat
funyy or, jurgure va qrngu be yvsr, rira gurer nyfb jvyy gul freinag
or.

15:22 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Vggnv, Tb naq cnff bire. Naq Vggnv gur Tvggvgr
cnffrq bire, naq nyy uvf zra, naq nyy gur yvggyr barf gung jrer jvgu
uvz.

15:23 Naq nyy gur pbhagel jrcg jvgu n ybhq ibvpr, naq nyy gur crbcyr
cnffrq bire: gur xvat nyfb uvzfrys cnffrq bire gur oebbx Xvqeba, naq
nyy gur crbcyr cnffrq bire, gbjneq gur jnl bs gur jvyqrearff.

15:24 Naq yb Mnqbx nyfb, naq nyy gur Yrivgrf jrer jvgu uvz, ornevat
gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs Tbq: naq gurl frg qbja gur nex bs Tbq; naq
Novngune jrag hc, hagvy nyy gur crbcyr unq qbar cnffvat bhg bs gur
pvgl.

15:25 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb Mnqbx, Pneel onpx gur nex bs Tbq vagb gur
pvgl: vs V funyy svaq snibhe va gur rlrf bs gur YBEQ, ur jvyy oevat zr
ntnva, naq furj zr obgu vg, naq uvf unovgngvba: 15:26 Ohg vs ur guhf
fnl, V unir ab qryvtug va gurr; orubyq, urer nz V, yrg uvz qb gb zr nf
frrzrgu tbbq hagb uvz.

15:27 Gur xvat fnvq nyfb hagb Mnqbx gur cevrfg, Neg abg gubh n frre?
erghea vagb gur pvgl va crnpr, naq lbhe gjb fbaf jvgu lbh, Nuvznnm gul
fba, naq Wbanguna gur fba bs Novngune.

15:28 Frr, V jvyy gneel va gur cynva bs gur jvyqrearff, hagvy gurer
pbzr jbeq sebz lbh gb pregvsl zr.

15:29 Mnqbx gurersber naq Novngune pneevrq gur nex bs Tbq ntnva gb
Wrehfnyrz: naq gurl gneevrq gurer.

15:30 Naq Qnivq jrag hc ol gur nfprag bs zbhag Byvirg, naq jrcg nf ur
jrag hc, naq unq uvf urnq pbirerq, naq ur jrag onersbbg: naq nyy gur
crbcyr gung jnf jvgu uvz pbirerq rirel zna uvf urnq, naq gurl jrag hc,
jrrcvat nf gurl jrag hc.

15:31 Naq bar gbyq Qnivq, fnlvat, Nuvgubcury vf nzbat gur pbafcvengbef
jvgu Nofnybz. Naq Qnivq fnvq, B YBEQ, V cenl gurr, ghea gur pbhafry bs
Nuvgubcury vagb sbbyvfuarff.

15:32 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung jura Qnivq jnf pbzr gb gur gbc bs gur
zbhag, jurer ur jbefuvccrq Tbq, orubyq, Uhfunv gur Nepuvgr pnzr gb
zrrg uvz jvgu uvf pbng erag, naq rnegu hcba uvf urnq: 15:33 Hagb jubz
Qnivq fnvq, Vs gubh cnffrfg ba jvgu zr, gura gubh funyg or n oheqra
hagb zr: 15:34 Ohg vs gubh erghea gb gur pvgl, naq fnl hagb Nofnybz, V
jvyy or gul freinag, B xvat; nf V unir orra gul sngure'f freinag
uvguregb, fb jvyy V abj nyfb or gul freinag: gura znlrfg gubh sbe zr
qrsrng gur pbhafry bs Nuvgubcury.

15:35 Naq unfg gubh abg gurer jvgu gurr Mnqbx naq Novngune gur
cevrfgf?  gurersber vg funyy or, gung jung guvat fbrire gubh funyg
urne bhg bs gur xvat'f ubhfr, gubh funyg gryy vg gb Mnqbx naq Novngune
gur cevrfgf.

15:36 Orubyq, gurl unir gurer jvgu gurz gurve gjb fbaf, Nuvznnm
Mnqbx'f fba, naq Wbanguna Novngune'f fba; naq ol gurz lr funyy fraq
hagb zr rirel guvat gung lr pna urne.

15:37 Fb Uhfunv Qnivq'f sevraq pnzr vagb gur pvgl, naq Nofnybz pnzr
vagb Wrehfnyrz.

16:1 Naq jura Qnivq jnf n yvggyr cnfg gur gbc bs gur uvyy, orubyq,
Mvon gur freinag bs Zrcuvobfurgu zrg uvz, jvgu n pbhcyr bs nffrf
fnqqyrq, naq hcba gurz gjb uhaqerq ybnirf bs oernq, naq na uhaqerq
ohapurf bs envfvaf, naq na uhaqerq bs fhzzre sehvgf, naq n obggyr bs
jvar.

16:2 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb Mvon, Jung zrnarfg gubh ol gurfr? Naq Mvon
fnvq, Gur nffrf or sbe gur xvat'f ubhfrubyq gb evqr ba; naq gur oernq
naq fhzzre sehvg sbe gur lbhat zra gb rng; naq gur jvar, gung fhpu nf
or snvag va gur jvyqrearff znl qevax.

16:3 Naq gur xvat fnvq, Naq jurer vf gul znfgre'f fba? Naq Mvon fnvq
hagb gur xvat, Orubyq, ur novqrgu ng Wrehfnyrz: sbe ur fnvq, Gb qnl
funyy gur ubhfr bs Vfenry erfgber zr gur xvatqbz bs zl sngure.

16:4 Gura fnvq gur xvat gb Mvon, Orubyq, guvar ner nyy gung cregnvarq
hagb Zrcuvobfurgu. Naq Mvon fnvq, V uhzoyl orfrrpu gurr gung V znl
svaq tenpr va gul fvtug, zl ybeq, B xvat.

16:5 Naq jura xvat Qnivq pnzr gb Onuhevz, orubyq, gurapr pnzr bhg n
zna bs gur snzvyl bs gur ubhfr bs Fnhy, jubfr anzr jnf Fuvzrv, gur fba
bs Tren: ur pnzr sbegu, naq phefrq fgvyy nf ur pnzr.

16:6 Naq ur pnfg fgbarf ng Qnivq, naq ng nyy gur freinagf bs xvat
Qnivq: naq nyy gur crbcyr naq nyy gur zvtugl zra jrer ba uvf evtug
unaq naq ba uvf yrsg.

16:7 Naq guhf fnvq Fuvzrv jura ur phefrq, Pbzr bhg, pbzr bhg, gubh
oybbql zna, naq gubh zna bs Oryvny: 16:8 Gur YBEQ ungu erghearq hcba
gurr nyy gur oybbq bs gur ubhfr bs Fnhy, va jubfr fgrnq gubh unfg
ervtarq; naq gur YBEQ ungu qryvirerq gur xvatqbz vagb gur unaq bs
Nofnybz gul fba: naq, orubyq, gubh neg gnxra va gul zvfpuvrs, orpnhfr
gubh neg n oybbql zna.

16:9 Gura fnvq Novfunv gur fba bs Mrehvnu hagb gur xvat, Jul fubhyq
guvf qrnq qbt phefr zl ybeq gur xvat? yrg zr tb bire, V cenl gurr, naq
gnxr bss uvf urnq.

16:10 Naq gur xvat fnvq, Jung unir V gb qb jvgu lbh, lr fbaf bs
Mrehvnu?  fb yrg uvz phefr, orpnhfr gur YBEQ ungu fnvq hagb uvz, Phefr
Qnivq. Jub funyy gura fnl, Jurersber unfg gubh qbar fb?  16:11 Naq
Qnivq fnvq gb Novfunv, naq gb nyy uvf freinagf, Orubyq, zl fba, juvpu
pnzr sbegu bs zl objryf, frrxrgu zl yvsr: ubj zhpu zber abj znl guvf
Orawnzvgr qb vg? yrg uvz nybar, naq yrg uvz phefr; sbe gur YBEQ ungu
ovqqra uvz.

16:12 Vg znl or gung gur YBEQ jvyy ybbx ba zvar nssyvpgvba, naq gung
gur YBEQ jvyy erdhvgr zr tbbq sbe uvf phefvat guvf qnl.

16:13 Naq nf Qnivq naq uvf zra jrag ol gur jnl, Fuvzrv jrag nybat ba
gur uvyy'f fvqr bire ntnvafg uvz, naq phefrq nf ur jrag, naq guerj
fgbarf ng uvz, naq pnfg qhfg.

16:14 Naq gur xvat, naq nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz, pnzr jrnel,
naq erserfurq gurzfryirf gurer.

16:15 Naq Nofnybz, naq nyy gur crbcyr gur zra bs Vfenry, pnzr gb
Wrehfnyrz, naq Nuvgubcury jvgu uvz.

16:16 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Uhfunv gur Nepuvgr, Qnivq'f sevraq,
jnf pbzr hagb Nofnybz, gung Uhfunv fnvq hagb Nofnybz, Tbq fnir gur
xvat, Tbq fnir gur xvat.

16:17 Naq Nofnybz fnvq gb Uhfunv, Vf guvf gul xvaqarff gb gul sevraq?
jul jragrfg gubh abg jvgu gul sevraq?  16:18 Naq Uhfunv fnvq hagb
Nofnybz, Anl; ohg jubz gur YBEQ, naq guvf crbcyr, naq nyy gur zra bs
Vfenry, pubbfr, uvf jvyy V or, naq jvgu uvz jvyy V novqr.

16:19 Naq ntnva, jubz fubhyq V freir? fubhyq V abg freir va gur
cerfrapr bs uvf fba? nf V unir freirq va gul sngure'f cerfrapr, fb
jvyy V or va gul cerfrapr.

16:20 Gura fnvq Nofnybz gb Nuvgubcury, Tvir pbhafry nzbat lbh jung jr
funyy qb.

16:21 Naq Nuvgubcury fnvq hagb Nofnybz, Tb va hagb gul sngure'f
pbaphovarf, juvpu ur ungu yrsg gb xrrc gur ubhfr; naq nyy Vfenry funyy
urne gung gubh neg noubeerq bs gul sngure: gura funyy gur unaqf bs nyy
gung ner jvgu gurr or fgebat.

16:22 Fb gurl fcernq Nofnybz n grag hcba gur gbc bs gur ubhfr; naq
Nofnybz jrag va hagb uvf sngure'f pbaphovarf va gur fvtug bs nyy
Vfenry.

16:23 Naq gur pbhafry bs Nuvgubcury, juvpu ur pbhafryyrq va gubfr
qnlf, jnf nf vs n zna unq radhverq ng gur benpyr bs Tbq: fb jnf nyy
gur pbhafry bs Nuvgubcury obgu jvgu Qnivq naq jvgu Nofnybz.

17:1 Zberbire Nuvgubcury fnvq hagb Nofnybz, Yrg zr abj pubbfr bhg
gjryir gubhfnaq zra, naq V jvyy nevfr naq chefhr nsgre Qnivq guvf
avtug: 17:2 Naq V jvyy pbzr hcba uvz juvyr ur vf jrnel naq jrnx
unaqrq, naq jvyy znxr uvz nsenvq: naq nyy gur crbcyr gung ner jvgu uvz
funyy syrr; naq V jvyy fzvgr gur xvat bayl: 17:3 Naq V jvyy oevat onpx
nyy gur crbcyr hagb gurr: gur zna jubz gubh frrxrfg vf nf vs nyy
erghearq: fb nyy gur crbcyr funyy or va crnpr.

17:4 Naq gur fnlvat cyrnfrq Nofnybz jryy, naq nyy gur ryqref bs
Vfenry.

17:5 Gura fnvq Nofnybz, Pnyy abj Uhfunv gur Nepuvgr nyfb, naq yrg hf
urne yvxrjvfr jung ur fnvgu.

17:6 Naq jura Uhfunv jnf pbzr gb Nofnybz, Nofnybz fcnxr hagb uvz,
fnlvat, Nuvgubcury ungu fcbxra nsgre guvf znaare: funyy jr qb nsgre
uvf fnlvat? vs abg; fcrnx gubh.

17:7 Naq Uhfunv fnvq hagb Nofnybz, Gur pbhafry gung Nuvgubcury ungu
tvira vf abg tbbq ng guvf gvzr.

17:8 Sbe, fnvq Uhfunv, gubh xabjrfg gul sngure naq uvf zra, gung gurl
or zvtugl zra, naq gurl or punsrq va gurve zvaqf, nf n orne eboorq bs
ure jurycf va gur svryq: naq gul sngure vf n zna bs jne, naq jvyy abg
ybqtr jvgu gur crbcyr.

17:9 Orubyq, ur vf uvq abj va fbzr cvg, be va fbzr bgure cynpr: naq vg
jvyy pbzr gb cnff, jura fbzr bs gurz or bireguebja ng gur svefg, gung
jubfbrire urnergu vg jvyy fnl, Gurer vf n fynhtugre nzbat gur crbcyr
gung sbyybj Nofnybz.

17:10 Naq ur nyfb gung vf inyvnag, jubfr urneg vf nf gur urneg bs n
yvba, funyy hggreyl zryg: sbe nyy Vfenry xabjrgu gung gul sngure vf n
zvtugl zna, naq gurl juvpu or jvgu uvz ner inyvnag zra.

17:11 Gurersber V pbhafry gung nyy Vfenry or trarenyyl tngurerq hagb
gurr, sebz Qna rira gb Orrefuron, nf gur fnaq gung vf ol gur frn sbe
zhygvghqr; naq gung gubh tb gb onggyr va guvar bja crefba.

17:12 Fb funyy jr pbzr hcba uvz va fbzr cynpr jurer ur funyy or sbhaq,
naq jr jvyy yvtug hcba uvz nf gur qrj snyyrgu ba gur tebhaq: naq bs
uvz naq bs nyy gur zra gung ner jvgu uvz gurer funyy abg or yrsg fb
zhpu nf bar.

17:13 Zberbire, vs ur or tbggra vagb n pvgl, gura funyy nyy Vfenry
oevat ebcrf gb gung pvgl, naq jr jvyy qenj vg vagb gur evire, hagvy
gurer or abg bar fznyy fgbar sbhaq gurer.

17:14 Naq Nofnybz naq nyy gur zra bs Vfenry fnvq, Gur pbhafry bs
Uhfunv gur Nepuvgr vf orggre guna gur pbhafry bs Nuvgubcury. Sbe gur
YBEQ unq nccbvagrq gb qrsrng gur tbbq pbhafry bs Nuvgubcury, gb gur
vagrag gung gur YBEQ zvtug oevat rivy hcba Nofnybz.

17:15 Gura fnvq Uhfunv hagb Mnqbx naq gb Novngune gur cevrfgf, Guhf
naq guhf qvq Nuvgubcury pbhafry Nofnybz naq gur ryqref bs Vfenry; naq
guhf naq guhf unir V pbhafryyrq.

17:16 Abj gurersber fraq dhvpxyl, naq gryy Qnivq, fnlvat, Ybqtr abg
guvf avtug va gur cynvaf bs gur jvyqrearff, ohg fcrrqvyl cnff bire;
yrfg gur xvat or fjnyybjrq hc, naq nyy gur crbcyr gung ner jvgu uvz.

17:17 Abj Wbanguna naq Nuvznnm fgnlrq ol Raebtry; sbe gurl zvtug abg
or frra gb pbzr vagb gur pvgl: naq n jrapu jrag naq gbyq gurz; naq
gurl jrag naq gbyq xvat Qnivq.

17:18 Arireguryrff n ynq fnj gurz, naq gbyq Nofnybz: ohg gurl jrag
obgu bs gurz njnl dhvpxyl, naq pnzr gb n zna'f ubhfr va Onuhevz, juvpu
unq n jryy va uvf pbheg; juvgure gurl jrag qbja.

17:19 Naq gur jbzna gbbx naq fcernq n pbirevat bire gur jryy'f zbhgu,
naq fcernq tebhaq pbea gurerba; naq gur guvat jnf abg xabja.

17:20 Naq jura Nofnybz'f freinagf pnzr gb gur jbzna gb gur ubhfr, gurl
fnvq, Jurer vf Nuvznnm naq Wbanguna? Naq gur jbzna fnvq hagb gurz,
Gurl or tbar bire gur oebbx bs jngre. Naq jura gurl unq fbhtug naq
pbhyq abg svaq gurz, gurl erghearq gb Wrehfnyrz.

17:21 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nsgre gurl jrer qrcnegrq, gung gurl pnzr hc
bhg bs gur jryy, naq jrag naq gbyq xvat Qnivq, naq fnvq hagb Qnivq,
Nevfr, naq cnff dhvpxyl bire gur jngre: sbe guhf ungu Nuvgubcury
pbhafryyrq ntnvafg lbh.

17:22 Gura Qnivq nebfr, naq nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz, naq
gurl cnffrq bire Wbeqna: ol gur zbeavat yvtug gurer ynpxrq abg bar bs
gurz gung jnf abg tbar bire Wbeqna.

17:23 Naq jura Nuvgubcury fnj gung uvf pbhafry jnf abg sbyybjrq, ur
fnqqyrq uvf nff, naq nebfr, naq tng uvz ubzr gb uvf ubhfr, gb uvf
pvgl, naq chg uvf ubhfrubyq va beqre, naq unatrq uvzfrys, naq qvrq,
naq jnf ohevrq va gur frchypuer bs uvf sngure.

17:24 Gura Qnivq pnzr gb Znunanvz. Naq Nofnybz cnffrq bire Wbeqna, ur
naq nyy gur zra bs Vfenry jvgu uvz.

17:25 Naq Nofnybz znqr Nznfn pncgnva bs gur ubfg vafgrnq bs Wbno:
juvpu Nznfn jnf n zna'f fba, jubfr anzr jnf Vguen na Vfenryvgr, gung
jrag va gb Novtnvy gur qnhtugre bs Anunfu, fvfgre gb Mrehvnu Wbno'f
zbgure.

17:26 Fb Vfenry naq Nofnybz cvgpurq va gur ynaq bs Tvyrnq.

17:27 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Qnivq jnf pbzr gb Znunanvz, gung Fubov
gur fba bs Anunfu bs Enoonu bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, naq Znpuve gur
fba bs Nzzvry bs Ybqrone, naq Onemvyynv gur Tvyrnqvgr bs Ebtryvz,
17:28 Oebhtug orqf, naq onfbaf, naq rnegura irffryf, naq jurng, naq
oneyrl, naq sybhe, naq cnepurq pbea, naq ornaf, naq yragvyrf, naq
cnepurq chyfr, 17:29 Naq ubarl, naq ohggre, naq furrc, naq purrfr bs
xvar, sbe Qnivq, naq sbe gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz, gb rng: sbe
gurl fnvq, Gur crbcyr vf uhatel, naq jrnel, naq guvefgl, va gur
jvyqrearff.

18:1 Naq Qnivq ahzorerq gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz, naq frg
pncgnvaf bs gubhfnaqf, naq pncgnvaf bs uhaqerqf bire gurz.

18:2 Naq Qnivq frag sbegu n guveq cneg bs gur crbcyr haqre gur unaq bs
Wbno, naq n guveq cneg haqre gur unaq bs Novfunv gur fba bs Mrehvnu,
Wbno'f oebgure, naq n guveq cneg haqre gur unaq bs Vggnv gur Tvggvgr.
Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb gur crbcyr, V jvyy fheryl tb sbegu jvgu lbh
zlfrys nyfb.

18:3 Ohg gur crbcyr nafjrerq, Gubh funyg abg tb sbegu: sbe vs jr syrr
njnl, gurl jvyy abg pner sbe hf; arvgure vs unys bs hf qvr, jvyy gurl
pner sbe hf: ohg abj gubh neg jbegu gra gubhfnaq bs hf: gurersber abj
vg vf orggre gung gubh fhppbhe hf bhg bs gur pvgl.

18:4 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb gurz, Jung frrzrgu lbh orfg V jvyy qb. Naq
gur xvat fgbbq ol gur tngr fvqr, naq nyy gur crbcyr pnzr bhg ol
uhaqerqf naq ol gubhfnaqf.

18:5 Naq gur xvat pbzznaqrq Wbno naq Novfunv naq Vggnv, fnlvat, Qrny
tragyl sbe zl fnxr jvgu gur lbhat zna, rira jvgu Nofnybz. Naq nyy gur
crbcyr urneq jura gur xvat tnir nyy gur pncgnvaf punetr pbapreavat
Nofnybz.

18:6 Fb gur crbcyr jrag bhg vagb gur svryq ntnvafg Vfenry: naq gur
onggyr jnf va gur jbbq bs Rcuenvz; 18:7 Jurer gur crbcyr bs Vfenry
jrer fynva orsber gur freinagf bs Qnivq, naq gurer jnf gurer n terng
fynhtugre gung qnl bs gjragl gubhfnaq zra.

18:8 Sbe gur onggyr jnf gurer fpnggrerq bire gur snpr bs nyy gur
pbhagel: naq gur jbbq qribherq zber crbcyr gung qnl guna gur fjbeq
qribherq.

18:9 Naq Nofnybz zrg gur freinagf bs Qnivq. Naq Nofnybz ebqr hcba n
zhyr, naq gur zhyr jrag haqre gur guvpx obhtuf bs n terng bnx, naq uvf
urnq pnhtug ubyq bs gur bnx, naq ur jnf gnxra hc orgjrra gur urnira
naq gur rnegu; naq gur zhyr gung jnf haqre uvz jrag njnl.

18:10 Naq n pregnva zna fnj vg, naq gbyq Wbno, naq fnvq, Orubyq, V fnj
Nofnybz unatrq va na bnx.

18:11 Naq Wbno fnvq hagb gur zna gung gbyq uvz, Naq, orubyq, gubh
fnjrfg uvz, naq jul qvqfg gubh abg fzvgr uvz gurer gb gur tebhaq? naq
V jbhyq unir tvira gurr gra furxryf bs fvyire, naq n tveqyr.

18:12 Naq gur zna fnvq hagb Wbno, Gubhtu V fubhyq erprvir n gubhfnaq
furxryf bs fvyire va zvar unaq, lrg jbhyq V abg chg sbegu zvar unaq
ntnvafg gur xvat'f fba: sbe va bhe urnevat gur xvat punetrq gurr naq
Novfunv naq Vggnv, fnlvat, Orjner gung abar gbhpu gur lbhat zna
Nofnybz.

18:13 Bgurejvfr V fubhyq unir jebhtug snyfrubbq ntnvafg zvar bja yvsr:
sbe gurer vf ab znggre uvq sebz gur xvat, naq gubh gulfrys jbhyqrfg
unir frg gulfrys ntnvafg zr.

18:14 Gura fnvq Wbno, V znl abg gneel guhf jvgu gurr. Naq ur gbbx
guerr qnegf va uvf unaq, naq guehfg gurz guebhtu gur urneg bs Nofnybz,
juvyr ur jnf lrg nyvir va gur zvqfg bs gur bnx.

18:15 Naq gra lbhat zra gung oner Wbno'f nezbhe pbzcnffrq nobhg naq
fzbgr Nofnybz, naq fyrj uvz.

18:16 Naq Wbno oyrj gur gehzcrg, naq gur crbcyr erghearq sebz chefhvat
nsgre Vfenry: sbe Wbno uryq onpx gur crbcyr.

18:17 Naq gurl gbbx Nofnybz, naq pnfg uvz vagb n terng cvg va gur
jbbq, naq ynvq n irel terng urnc bs fgbarf hcba uvz: naq nyy Vfenry
syrq rirel bar gb uvf grag.

18:18 Abj Nofnybz va uvf yvsrgvzr unq gnxra naq ernerq hc sbe uvzfrys
n cvyyne, juvpu vf va gur xvat'f qnyr: sbe ur fnvq, V unir ab fba gb
xrrc zl anzr va erzrzoenapr: naq ur pnyyrq gur cvyyne nsgre uvf bja
anzr: naq vg vf pnyyrq hagb guvf qnl, Nofnybz'f cynpr.

18:19 Gura fnvq Nuvznnm gur fba bs Mnqbx, Yrg zr abj eha, naq orne gur
xvat gvqvatf, ubj gung gur YBEQ ungu niratrq uvz bs uvf rarzvrf.

18:20 Naq Wbno fnvq hagb uvz, Gubh funyg abg orne gvqvatf guvf qnl,
ohg gubh funyg orne gvqvatf nabgure qnl: ohg guvf qnl gubh funyg orne
ab gvqvatf, orpnhfr gur xvat'f fba vf qrnq.

18:21 Gura fnvq Wbno gb Phfuv, Tb gryy gur xvat jung gubh unfg frra.
Naq Phfuv objrq uvzfrys hagb Wbno, naq ena.

18:22 Gura fnvq Nuvznnm gur fba bs Mnqbx lrg ntnva gb Wbno, Ohg
ubjfbrire, yrg zr, V cenl gurr, nyfb eha nsgre Phfuv. Naq Wbno fnvq,
Jurersber jvyg gubh eha, zl fba, frrvat gung gubh unfg ab gvqvatf
ernql?  18:23 Ohg ubjfbrire, fnvq ur, yrg zr eha. Naq ur fnvq hagb
uvz, Eha. Gura Nuvznnm ena ol gur jnl bs gur cynva, naq bireena Phfuv.

18:24 Naq Qnivq fng orgjrra gur gjb tngrf: naq gur jngpuzna jrag hc gb
gur ebbs bire gur tngr hagb gur jnyy, naq yvsgrq hc uvf rlrf, naq
ybbxrq, naq orubyq n zna ehaavat nybar.

18:25 Naq gur jngpuzna pevrq, naq gbyq gur xvat. Naq gur xvat fnvq, Vs
ur or nybar, gurer vf gvqvatf va uvf zbhgu. Naq ur pnzr ncnpr, naq
qerj arne.

18:26 Naq gur jngpuzna fnj nabgure zna ehaavat: naq gur jngpuzna
pnyyrq hagb gur cbegre, naq fnvq, Orubyq nabgure zna ehaavat nybar.
Naq gur xvat fnvq, Ur nyfb oevatrgu gvqvatf.

18:27 Naq gur jngpuzna fnvq, Zr guvaxrgu gur ehaavat bs gur sberzbfg
vf yvxr gur ehaavat bs Nuvznnm gur fba bs Mnqbx. Naq gur xvat fnvq, Ur
vf n tbbq zna, naq pbzrgu jvgu tbbq gvqvatf.

18:28 Naq Nuvznnm pnyyrq, naq fnvq hagb gur xvat, Nyy vf jryy. Naq ur
sryy qbja gb gur rnegu hcba uvf snpr orsber gur xvat, naq fnvq,
Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ gul Tbq, juvpu ungu qryvirerq hc gur zra gung
yvsgrq hc gurve unaq ntnvafg zl ybeq gur xvat.

18:29 Naq gur xvat fnvq, Vf gur lbhat zna Nofnybz fnsr? Naq Nuvznnm
nafjrerq, Jura Wbno frag gur xvat'f freinag, naq zr gul freinag, V fnj
n terng ghzhyg, ohg V xarj abg jung vg jnf.

18:30 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb uvz, Ghea nfvqr, naq fgnaq urer. Naq ur
ghearq nfvqr, naq fgbbq fgvyy.

18:31 Naq, orubyq, Phfuv pnzr; naq Phfuv fnvq, Gvqvatf, zl ybeq gur
xvat: sbe gur YBEQ ungu niratrq gurr guvf qnl bs nyy gurz gung ebfr hc
ntnvafg gurr.

18:32 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb Phfuv, Vf gur lbhat zna Nofnybz fnsr? Naq
Phfuv nafjrerq, Gur rarzvrf bs zl ybeq gur xvat, naq nyy gung evfr
ntnvafg gurr gb qb gurr uheg, or nf gung lbhat zna vf.

18:33 Naq gur xvat jnf zhpu zbirq, naq jrag hc gb gur punzore bire gur
tngr, naq jrcg: naq nf ur jrag, guhf ur fnvq, B zl fba Nofnybz, zl
fba, zl fba Nofnybz! jbhyq Tbq V unq qvrq sbe gurr, B Nofnybz, zl fba,
zl fba!  19:1 Naq vg jnf gbyq Wbno, Orubyq, gur xvat jrrcrgu naq
zbheargu sbe Nofnybz.

19:2 Naq gur ivpgbel gung qnl jnf ghearq vagb zbheavat hagb nyy gur
crbcyr: sbe gur crbcyr urneq fnl gung qnl ubj gur xvat jnf tevrirq sbe
uvf fba.

19:3 Naq gur crbcyr tng gurz ol fgrnygu gung qnl vagb gur pvgl, nf
crbcyr orvat nfunzrq fgrny njnl jura gurl syrr va onggyr.

19:4 Ohg gur xvat pbirerq uvf snpr, naq gur xvat pevrq jvgu n ybhq
ibvpr, B zl fba Nofnybz, B Nofnybz, zl fba, zl fba!  19:5 Naq Wbno
pnzr vagb gur ubhfr gb gur xvat, naq fnvq, Gubh unfg funzrq guvf qnl
gur snprf bs nyy gul freinagf, juvpu guvf qnl unir fnirq gul yvsr, naq
gur yvirf bs gul fbaf naq bs gul qnhtugref, naq gur yvirf bs gul
jvirf, naq gur yvirf bs gul pbaphovarf; 19:6 Va gung gubh ybirfg guvar
rarzvrf, naq ungrfg gul sevraqf. Sbe gubh unfg qrpynerq guvf qnl, gung
gubh ertneqrfg arvgure cevaprf abe freinagf: sbe guvf qnl V creprvir,
gung vs Nofnybz unq yvirq, naq nyy jr unq qvrq guvf qnl, gura vg unq
cyrnfrq gurr jryy.

19:7 Abj gurersber nevfr, tb sbegu, naq fcrnx pbzsbegnoyl hagb gul
freinagf: sbe V fjrne ol gur YBEQ, vs gubh tb abg sbegu, gurer jvyy
abg gneel bar jvgu gurr guvf avtug: naq gung jvyy or jbefr hagb gurr
guna nyy gur rivy gung orsryy gurr sebz gul lbhgu hagvy abj.

19:8 Gura gur xvat nebfr, naq fng va gur tngr. Naq gurl gbyq hagb nyy
gur crbcyr, fnlvat, Orubyq, gur xvat qbgu fvg va gur tngr. Naq nyy gur
crbcyr pnzr orsber gur xvat: sbe Vfenry unq syrq rirel zna gb uvf
grag.

19:9 Naq nyy gur crbcyr jrer ng fgevsr guebhtubhg nyy gur gevorf bs
Vfenry, fnlvat, Gur xvat fnirq hf bhg bs gur unaq bs bhe rarzvrf, naq
ur qryvirerq hf bhg bs gur unaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf; naq abj ur vf syrq
bhg bs gur ynaq sbe Nofnybz.

19:10 Naq Nofnybz, jubz jr nabvagrq bire hf, vf qrnq va onggyr. Abj
gurersber jul fcrnx lr abg n jbeq bs oevatvat gur xvat onpx?  19:11
Naq xvat Qnivq frag gb Mnqbx naq gb Novngune gur cevrfgf, fnlvat,
Fcrnx hagb gur ryqref bs Whqnu, fnlvat, Jul ner lr gur ynfg gb oevat
gur xvat onpx gb uvf ubhfr? frrvat gur fcrrpu bs nyy Vfenry vf pbzr gb
gur xvat, rira gb uvf ubhfr.

19:12 Lr ner zl oerguera, lr ner zl obarf naq zl syrfu: jurersber gura
ner lr gur ynfg gb oevat onpx gur xvat?  19:13 Naq fnl lr gb Nznfn,
Neg gubh abg bs zl obar, naq bs zl syrfu? Tbq qb fb gb zr, naq zber
nyfb, vs gubh or abg pncgnva bs gur ubfg orsber zr pbagvahnyyl va gur
ebbz bs Wbno.

19:14 Naq ur objrq gur urneg bs nyy gur zra bs Whqnu, rira nf gur
urneg bs bar zna; fb gung gurl frag guvf jbeq hagb gur xvat, Erghea
gubh, naq nyy gul freinagf.

19:15 Fb gur xvat erghearq, naq pnzr gb Wbeqna. Naq Whqnu pnzr gb
Tvytny, gb tb gb zrrg gur xvat, gb pbaqhpg gur xvat bire Wbeqna.

19:16 Naq Fuvzrv gur fba bs Tren, n Orawnzvgr, juvpu jnf bs Onuhevz,
unfgrq naq pnzr qbja jvgu gur zra bs Whqnu gb zrrg xvat Qnivq.

19:17 Naq gurer jrer n gubhfnaq zra bs Orawnzva jvgu uvz, naq Mvon gur
freinag bs gur ubhfr bs Fnhy, naq uvf svsgrra fbaf naq uvf gjragl
freinagf jvgu uvz; naq gurl jrag bire Wbeqna orsber gur xvat.

19:18 Naq gurer jrag bire n sreel obng gb pneel bire gur xvat'f
ubhfrubyq, naq gb qb jung ur gubhtug tbbq. Naq Fuvzrv gur fba bs Tren
sryy qbja orsber gur xvat, nf ur jnf pbzr bire Wbeqna; 19:19 Naq fnvq
hagb gur xvat, Yrg abg zl ybeq vzchgr vavdhvgl hagb zr, arvgure qb
gubh erzrzore gung juvpu gul freinag qvq creirefryl gur qnl gung zl
ybeq gur xvat jrag bhg bs Wrehfnyrz, gung gur xvat fubhyq gnxr vg gb
uvf urneg.

19:20 Sbe gul freinag qbgu xabj gung V unir fvaarq: gurersber, orubyq,
V nz pbzr gur svefg guvf qnl bs nyy gur ubhfr bs Wbfrcu gb tb qbja gb
zrrg zl ybeq gur xvat.

19:21 Ohg Novfunv gur fba bs Mrehvnu nafjrerq naq fnvq, Funyy abg
Fuvzrv or chg gb qrngu sbe guvf, orpnhfr ur phefrq gur YBEQ'f
nabvagrq?  19:22 Naq Qnivq fnvq, Jung unir V gb qb jvgu lbh, lr fbaf
bs Mrehvnu, gung lr fubhyq guvf qnl or nqirefnevrf hagb zr? funyy
gurer nal zna or chg gb qrngu guvf qnl va Vfenry? sbe qb abg V xabj
gung V nz guvf qnl xvat bire Vfenry?  19:23 Gurersber gur xvat fnvq
hagb Fuvzrv, Gubh funyg abg qvr. Naq gur xvat fjner hagb uvz.

19:24 Naq Zrcuvobfurgu gur fba bs Fnhy pnzr qbja gb zrrg gur xvat, naq
unq arvgure qerffrq uvf srrg, abe gevzzrq uvf orneq, abe jnfurq uvf
pybgurf, sebz gur qnl gur xvat qrcnegrq hagvy gur qnl ur pnzr ntnva va
crnpr.

19:25 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura ur jnf pbzr gb Wrehfnyrz gb zrrg gur
xvat, gung gur xvat fnvq hagb uvz, Jurersber jragrfg abg gubh jvgu zr,
Zrcuvobfurgu?  19:26 Naq ur nafjrerq, Zl ybeq, B xvat, zl freinag
qrprvirq zr: sbe gul freinag fnvq, V jvyy fnqqyr zr na nff, gung V znl
evqr gurerba, naq tb gb gur xvat; orpnhfr gul freinag vf ynzr.

19:27 Naq ur ungu fynaqrerq gul freinag hagb zl ybeq gur xvat; ohg zl
ybeq gur xvat vf nf na natry bs Tbq: qb gurersber jung vf tbbq va
guvar rlrf.

19:28 Sbe nyy bs zl sngure'f ubhfr jrer ohg qrnq zra orsber zl ybeq
gur xvat: lrg qvqfg gubh frg gul freinag nzbat gurz gung qvq rng ng
guvar bja gnoyr. Jung evtug gurersber unir V lrg gb pel nal zber hagb
gur xvat?  19:29 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb uvz, Jul fcrnxrfg gubh nal
zber bs gul znggref? V unir fnvq, Gubh naq Mvon qvivqr gur ynaq.

19:30 Naq Zrcuvobfurgu fnvq hagb gur xvat, Lrn, yrg uvz gnxr nyy,
sbenfzhpu nf zl ybeq gur xvat vf pbzr ntnva va crnpr hagb uvf bja
ubhfr.

19:31 Naq Onemvyynv gur Tvyrnqvgr pnzr qbja sebz Ebtryvz, naq jrag
bire Wbeqna jvgu gur xvat, gb pbaqhpg uvz bire Wbeqna.

19:32 Abj Onemvyynv jnf n irel ntrq zna, rira sbhefpber lrnef byq: naq
ur unq cebivqrq gur xvat bs fhfgranapr juvyr ur ynl ng Znunanvz; sbe
ur jnf n irel terng zna.

19:33 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb Onemvyynv, Pbzr gubh bire jvgu zr, naq V
jvyy srrq gurr jvgu zr va Wrehfnyrz.

19:34 Naq Onemvyynv fnvq hagb gur xvat, Ubj ybat unir V gb yvir, gung
V fubhyq tb hc jvgu gur xvat hagb Wrehfnyrz?  19:35 V nz guvf qnl
sbhefpber lrnef byq: naq pna V qvfprea orgjrra tbbq naq rivy? pna gul
freinag gnfgr jung V rng be jung V qevax? pna V urne nal zber gur
ibvpr bs fvatvat zra naq fvatvat jbzra? jurersber gura fubhyq gul
freinag or lrg n oheqra hagb zl ybeq gur xvat?  19:36 Gul freinag jvyy
tb n yvggyr jnl bire Wbeqna jvgu gur xvat: naq jul fubhyq gur xvat
erpbzcrafr vg zr jvgu fhpu n erjneq?  19:37 Yrg gul freinag, V cenl
gurr, ghea onpx ntnva, gung V znl qvr va zvar bja pvgl, naq or ohevrq
ol gur tenir bs zl sngure naq bs zl zbgure. Ohg orubyq gul freinag
Puvzunz; yrg uvz tb bire jvgu zl ybeq gur xvat; naq qb gb uvz jung
funyy frrz tbbq hagb gurr.

19:38 Naq gur xvat nafjrerq, Puvzunz funyy tb bire jvgu zr, naq V jvyy
qb gb uvz gung juvpu funyy frrz tbbq hagb gurr: naq jungfbrire gubh
funyg erdhver bs zr, gung jvyy V qb sbe gurr.

19:39 Naq nyy gur crbcyr jrag bire Wbeqna. Naq jura gur xvat jnf pbzr
bire, gur xvat xvffrq Onemvyynv, naq oyrffrq uvz; naq ur erghearq hagb
uvf bja cynpr.

19:40 Gura gur xvat jrag ba gb Tvytny, naq Puvzunz jrag ba jvgu uvz:
naq nyy gur crbcyr bs Whqnu pbaqhpgrq gur xvat, naq nyfb unys gur
crbcyr bs Vfenry.

19:41 Naq, orubyq, nyy gur zra bs Vfenry pnzr gb gur xvat, naq fnvq
hagb gur xvat, Jul unir bhe oerguera gur zra bs Whqnu fgbyra gurr
njnl, naq unir oebhtug gur xvat, naq uvf ubhfrubyq, naq nyy Qnivq'f
zra jvgu uvz, bire Wbeqna?  19:42 Naq nyy gur zra bs Whqnu nafjrerq
gur zra bs Vfenry, Orpnhfr gur xvat vf arne bs xva gb hf: jurersber
gura or lr natel sbe guvf znggre? unir jr rngra ng nyy bs gur xvat'f
pbfg? be ungu ur tvira hf nal tvsg?  19:43 Naq gur zra bs Vfenry
nafjrerq gur zra bs Whqnu, naq fnvq, Jr unir gra cnegf va gur xvat,
naq jr unir nyfb zber evtug va Qnivq guna lr: jul gura qvq lr qrfcvfr
hf, gung bhe nqivpr fubhyq abg or svefg unq va oevatvat onpx bhe xvat?
Naq gur jbeqf bs gur zra bs Whqnu jrer svrepre guna gur jbeqf bs gur
zra bs Vfenry.

20:1 Naq gurer unccrarq gb or gurer n zna bs Oryvny, jubfr anzr jnf
Furon, gur fba bs Ovpuev, n Orawnzvgr: naq ur oyrj n gehzcrg, naq
fnvq, Jr unir ab cneg va Qnivq, arvgure unir jr vaurevgnapr va gur fba
bs Wrffr: rirel zna gb uvf gragf, B Vfenry.

20:2 Fb rirel zna bs Vfenry jrag hc sebz nsgre Qnivq, naq sbyybjrq
Furon gur fba bs Ovpuev: ohg gur zra bs Whqnu pynir hagb gurve xvat,
sebz Wbeqna rira gb Wrehfnyrz.

20:3 Naq Qnivq pnzr gb uvf ubhfr ng Wrehfnyrz; naq gur xvat gbbx gur
gra jbzra uvf pbaphovarf, jubz ur unq yrsg gb xrrc gur ubhfr, naq chg
gurz va jneq, naq srq gurz, ohg jrag abg va hagb gurz. Fb gurl jrer
fuhg hc hagb gur qnl bs gurve qrngu, yvivat va jvqbjubbq.

20:4 Gura fnvq gur xvat gb Nznfn, Nffrzoyr zr gur zra bs Whqnu jvguva
guerr qnlf, naq or gubh urer cerfrag.

20:5 Fb Nznfn jrag gb nffrzoyr gur zra bs Whqnu: ohg ur gneevrq ybatre
guna gur frg gvzr juvpu ur unq nccbvagrq uvz.

20:6 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Novfunv, Abj funyy Furon gur fba bs Ovpuev qb
hf zber unez guna qvq Nofnybz: gnxr gubh gul ybeq'f freinagf, naq
chefhr nsgre uvz, yrfg ur trg uvz sraprq pvgvrf, naq rfpncr hf.

20:7 Naq gurer jrag bhg nsgre uvz Wbno'f zra, naq gur Purerguvgrf, naq
gur Cryrguvgrf, naq nyy gur zvtugl zra: naq gurl jrag bhg bs
Wrehfnyrz, gb chefhr nsgre Furon gur fba bs Ovpuev.

20:8 Jura gurl jrer ng gur terng fgbar juvpu vf va Tvorba, Nznfn jrag
orsber gurz. Naq Wbno'f tnezrag gung ur unq chg ba jnf tveqrq hagb
uvz, naq hcba vg n tveqyr jvgu n fjbeq snfgrarq hcba uvf ybvaf va gur
furngu gurerbs; naq nf ur jrag sbegu vg sryy bhg.

20:9 Naq Wbno fnvq gb Nznfn, Neg gubh va urnygu, zl oebgure? Naq Wbno
gbbx Nznfn ol gur orneq jvgu gur evtug unaq gb xvff uvz.

20:10 Ohg Nznfn gbbx ab urrq gb gur fjbeq gung jnf va Wbno'f unaq: fb
ur fzbgr uvz gurerjvgu va gur svsgu evo, naq furq bhg uvf objryf gb
gur tebhaq, naq fgehpx uvz abg ntnva; naq ur qvrq. Fb Wbno naq Novfunv
uvf oebgure chefhrq nsgre Furon gur fba bs Ovpuev.

20:11 Naq bar bs Wbno'f zra fgbbq ol uvz, naq fnvq, Ur gung snibhergu
Wbno, naq ur gung vf sbe Qnivq, yrg uvz tb nsgre Wbno.

20:12 Naq Nznfn jnyybjrq va oybbq va gur zvqfg bs gur uvtujnl. Naq
jura gur zna fnj gung nyy gur crbcyr fgbbq fgvyy, ur erzbirq Nznfn bhg
bs gur uvtujnl vagb gur svryq, naq pnfg n pybgu hcba uvz, jura ur fnj
gung rirel bar gung pnzr ol uvz fgbbq fgvyy.

20:13 Jura ur jnf erzbirq bhg bs gur uvtujnl, nyy gur crbcyr jrag ba
nsgre Wbno, gb chefhr nsgre Furon gur fba bs Ovpuev.

20:14 Naq ur jrag guebhtu nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry hagb Nory, naq gb
Orguznnpunu, naq nyy gur Orevgrf: naq gurl jrer tngurerq gbtrgure, naq
jrag nyfb nsgre uvz.

20:15 Naq gurl pnzr naq orfvrtrq uvz va Nory bs Orguznnpunu, naq gurl
pnfg hc n onax ntnvafg gur pvgl, naq vg fgbbq va gur gerapu: naq nyy
gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu Wbno onggrerq gur jnyy, gb guebj vg qbja.

20:16 Gura pevrq n jvfr jbzna bhg bs gur pvgl, Urne, urne; fnl, V cenl
lbh, hagb Wbno, Pbzr arne uvgure, gung V znl fcrnx jvgu gurr.

20:17 Naq jura ur jnf pbzr arne hagb ure, gur jbzna fnvq, Neg gubh
Wbno?  Naq ur nafjrerq, V nz ur. Gura fur fnvq hagb uvz, Urne gur
jbeqf bs guvar unaqznvq. Naq ur nafjrerq, V qb urne.

20:18 Gura fur fcnxr, fnlvat, Gurl jrer jbag gb fcrnx va byq gvzr,
fnlvat, Gurl funyy fheryl nfx pbhafry ng Nory: naq fb gurl raqrq gur
znggre.

20:19 V nz bar bs gurz gung ner crnprnoyr naq snvgushy va Vfenry: gubh
frrxrfg gb qrfgebl n pvgl naq n zbgure va Vfenry: jul jvyg gubh
fjnyybj hc gur vaurevgnapr bs gur YBEQ?  20:20 Naq Wbno nafjrerq naq
fnvq, Sne or vg, sne or vg sebz zr, gung V fubhyq fjnyybj hc be
qrfgebl.

20:21 Gur znggre vf abg fb: ohg n zna bs zbhag Rcuenvz, Furon gur fba
bs Ovpuev ol anzr, ungu yvsgrq hc uvf unaq ntnvafg gur xvat, rira
ntnvafg Qnivq: qryvire uvz bayl, naq V jvyy qrcneg sebz gur pvgl. Naq
gur jbzna fnvq hagb Wbno, Orubyq, uvf urnq funyy or guebja gb gurr
bire gur jnyy.

20:22 Gura gur jbzna jrag hagb nyy gur crbcyr va ure jvfqbz. Naq gurl
phg bss gur urnq bs Furon gur fba bs Ovpuev, naq pnfg vg bhg gb Wbno.
Naq ur oyrj n gehzcrg, naq gurl ergverq sebz gur pvgl, rirel zna gb
uvf grag. Naq Wbno erghearq gb Wrehfnyrz hagb gur xvat.

20:23 Abj Wbno jnf bire nyy gur ubfg bs Vfenry: naq Oranvnu gur fba bs
Wrubvnqn jnf bire gur Purerguvgrf naq bire gur Cryrguvgrf: 20:24 Naq
Nqbenz jnf bire gur gevohgr: naq Wrubfuncung gur fba bs Nuvyhq jnf
erpbeqre: 20:25 Naq Furin jnf fpevor: naq Mnqbx naq Novngune jrer gur
cevrfgf: 20:26 Naq Ven nyfb gur Wnvevgr jnf n puvrs ehyre nobhg Qnivq.

21:1 Gura gurer jnf n snzvar va gur qnlf bs Qnivq guerr lrnef, lrne
nsgre lrne; naq Qnivq radhverq bs gur YBEQ. Naq gur YBEQ nafjrerq, Vg
vf sbe Fnhy, naq sbe uvf oybbql ubhfr, orpnhfr ur fyrj gur Tvorbavgrf.

21:2 Naq gur xvat pnyyrq gur Tvorbavgrf, naq fnvq hagb gurz; (abj gur
Tvorbavgrf jrer abg bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, ohg bs gur erzanag bs
gur Nzbevgrf; naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry unq fjbea hagb gurz: naq Fnhy
fbhtug gb fynl gurz va uvf mrny gb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry naq Whqnu.)
21:3 Jurersber Qnivq fnvq hagb gur Tvorbavgrf, Jung funyy V qb sbe
lbh?  naq jurerjvgu funyy V znxr gur ngbarzrag, gung lr znl oyrff gur
vaurevgnapr bs gur YBEQ?  21:4 Naq gur Tvorbavgrf fnvq hagb uvz, Jr
jvyy unir ab fvyire abe tbyq bs Fnhy, abe bs uvf ubhfr; arvgure sbe hf
funyg gubh xvyy nal zna va Vfenry. Naq ur fnvq, Jung lr funyy fnl,
gung jvyy V qb sbe lbh.

21:5 Naq gurl nafjrerq gur xvat, Gur zna gung pbafhzrq hf, naq gung
qrivfrq ntnvafg hf gung jr fubhyq or qrfgeblrq sebz erznvavat va nal
bs gur pbnfgf bs Vfenry, 21:6 Yrg frira zra bs uvf fbaf or qryvirerq
hagb hf, naq jr jvyy unat gurz hc hagb gur YBEQ va Tvornu bs Fnhy,
jubz gur YBEQ qvq pubbfr. Naq gur xvat fnvq, V jvyy tvir gurz.

21:7 Ohg gur xvat fcnerq Zrcuvobfurgu, gur fba bs Wbanguna gur fba bs
Fnhy, orpnhfr bs gur YBEQ'f bngu gung jnf orgjrra gurz, orgjrra Qnivq
naq Wbanguna gur fba bs Fnhy.

21:8 Ohg gur xvat gbbx gur gjb fbaf bs Evmcnu gur qnhtugre bs Nvnu,
jubz fur oner hagb Fnhy, Nezbav naq Zrcuvobfurgu; naq gur svir fbaf bs
Zvpuny gur qnhtugre bs Fnhy, jubz fur oebhtug hc sbe Nqevry gur fba bs
Onemvyynv gur Zrubynguvgr: 21:9 Naq ur qryvirerq gurz vagb gur unaqf
bs gur Tvorbavgrf, naq gurl unatrq gurz va gur uvyy orsber gur YBEQ:
naq gurl sryy nyy frira gbtrgure, naq jrer chg gb qrngu va gur qnlf bs
uneirfg, va gur svefg qnlf, va gur ortvaavat bs oneyrl uneirfg.

21:10 Naq Evmcnu gur qnhtugre bs Nvnu gbbx fnpxpybgu, naq fcernq vg
sbe ure hcba gur ebpx, sebz gur ortvaavat bs uneirfg hagvy jngre
qebccrq hcba gurz bhg bs urnira, naq fhssrerq arvgure gur oveqf bs gur
nve gb erfg ba gurz ol qnl, abe gur ornfgf bs gur svryq ol avtug.

21:11 Naq vg jnf gbyq Qnivq jung Evmcnu gur qnhtugre bs Nvnu, gur
pbaphovar bs Fnhy, unq qbar.

21:12 Naq Qnivq jrag naq gbbx gur obarf bs Fnhy naq gur obarf bs
Wbanguna uvf fba sebz gur zra bs Wnorfutvyrnq, juvpu unq fgbyra gurz
sebz gur fgerrg bs Orgufuna, jurer gur Cuvyvfgvarf unq unatrq gurz,
jura gur Cuvyvfgvarf unq fynva Fnhy va Tvyobn: 21:13 Naq ur oebhtug hc
sebz gurapr gur obarf bs Fnhy naq gur obarf bs Wbanguna uvf fba; naq
gurl tngurerq gur obarf bs gurz gung jrer unatrq.

21:14 Naq gur obarf bs Fnhy naq Wbanguna uvf fba ohevrq gurl va gur
pbhagel bs Orawnzva va Mrynu, va gur frchypuer bs Xvfu uvf sngure: naq
gurl cresbezrq nyy gung gur xvat pbzznaqrq. Naq nsgre gung Tbq jnf
vagerngrq sbe gur ynaq.

21:15 Zberbire gur Cuvyvfgvarf unq lrg jne ntnva jvgu Vfenry; naq
Qnivq jrag qbja, naq uvf freinagf jvgu uvz, naq sbhtug ntnvafg gur
Cuvyvfgvarf: naq Qnivq jnkrq snvag.

21:16 Naq Vfuovorabo, juvpu jnf bs gur fbaf bs gur tvnag, gur jrvtug
bs jubfr fcrne jrvturq guerr uhaqerq furxryf bs oenff va jrvtug, ur
orvat tveqrq jvgu n arj fjbeq, gubhtug gb unir fynva Qnivq.

21:17 Ohg Novfunv gur fba bs Mrehvnu fhppbherq uvz, naq fzbgr gur
Cuvyvfgvar, naq xvyyrq uvz. Gura gur zra bs Qnivq fjner hagb uvz,
fnlvat, Gubh funyg tb ab zber bhg jvgu hf gb onggyr, gung gubh dhrapu
abg gur yvtug bs Vfenry.

21:18 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre guvf, gung gurer jnf ntnva n onggyr
jvgu gur Cuvyvfgvarf ng Tbo: gura Fvoorpunv gur Uhfunguvgr fyrj Fncu,
juvpu jnf bs gur fbaf bs gur tvnag.

21:19 Naq gurer jnf ntnva n onggyr va Tbo jvgu gur Cuvyvfgvarf, jurer
Ryunana gur fba bs Wnnerbertvz, n Orguyrurzvgr, fyrj gur oebgure bs
Tbyvngu gur Tvggvgr, gur fgnss bs jubfr fcrne jnf yvxr n jrnire'f
ornz.

21:20 Naq gurer jnf lrg n onggyr va Tngu, jurer jnf n zna bs terng
fgngher, gung unq ba rirel unaq fvk svatref, naq ba rirel sbbg fvk
gbrf, sbhe naq gjragl va ahzore; naq ur nyfb jnf obea gb gur tvnag.

21:21 Naq jura ur qrsvrq Vfenry, Wbanguna gur fba bs Fuvzrnu gur
oebgure bs Qnivq fyrj uvz.

21:22 Gurfr sbhe jrer obea gb gur tvnag va Tngu, naq sryy ol gur unaq
bs Qnivq, naq ol gur unaq bs uvf freinagf.

22:1 Naq Qnivq fcnxr hagb gur YBEQ gur jbeqf bs guvf fbat va gur qnl
gung gur YBEQ unq qryvirerq uvz bhg bs gur unaq bs nyy uvf rarzvrf,
naq bhg bs gur unaq bs Fnhy: 22:2 Naq ur fnvq, Gur YBEQ vf zl ebpx,
naq zl sbegerff, naq zl qryvirere; 22:3 Gur Tbq bs zl ebpx; va uvz
jvyy V gehfg: ur vf zl fuvryq, naq gur ubea bs zl fnyingvba, zl uvtu
gbjre, naq zl ershtr, zl fnivbhe; gubh fnirfg zr sebz ivbyrapr.

22:4 V jvyy pnyy ba gur YBEQ, jub vf jbegul gb or cenvfrq: fb funyy V
or fnirq sebz zvar rarzvrf.

22:5 Jura gur jnirf bs qrngu pbzcnffrq zr, gur sybbqf bs hatbqyl zra
znqr zr nsenvq; 22:6 Gur fbeebjf bs uryy pbzcnffrq zr nobhg; gur
fanerf bs qrngu ceriragrq zr; 22:7 Va zl qvfgerff V pnyyrq hcba gur
YBEQ, naq pevrq gb zl Tbq: naq ur qvq urne zl ibvpr bhg bs uvf grzcyr,
naq zl pel qvq ragre vagb uvf rnef.

22:8 Gura gur rnegu fubbx naq gerzoyrq; gur sbhaqngvbaf bs urnira
zbirq naq fubbx, orpnhfr ur jnf jebgu.

22:9 Gurer jrag hc n fzbxr bhg bs uvf abfgevyf, naq sver bhg bs uvf
zbhgu qribherq: pbnyf jrer xvaqyrq ol vg.

22:10 Ur objrq gur urniraf nyfb, naq pnzr qbja; naq qnexarff jnf haqre
uvf srrg.

22:11 Naq ur ebqr hcba n pureho, naq qvq syl: naq ur jnf frra hcba gur
jvatf bs gur jvaq.

22:12 Naq ur znqr qnexarff cnivyvbaf ebhaq nobhg uvz, qnex jngref, naq
guvpx pybhqf bs gur fxvrf.

22:13 Guebhtu gur oevtugarff orsber uvz jrer pbnyf bs sver xvaqyrq.

22:14 Gur YBEQ guhaqrerq sebz urnira, naq gur zbfg Uvtu hggrerq uvf
ibvpr.

22:15 Naq ur frag bhg neebjf, naq fpnggrerq gurz; yvtugavat, naq
qvfpbzsvgrq gurz.

22:16 Naq gur punaaryf bs gur frn nccrnerq, gur sbhaqngvbaf bs gur
jbeyq jrer qvfpbirerq, ng gur erohxvat bs gur YBEQ, ng gur oynfg bs
gur oerngu bs uvf abfgevyf.

22:17 Ur frag sebz nobir, ur gbbx zr; ur qerj zr bhg bs znal jngref;
22:18 Ur qryvirerq zr sebz zl fgebat rarzl, naq sebz gurz gung ungrq
zr: sbe gurl jrer gbb fgebat sbe zr.

22:19 Gurl ceriragrq zr va gur qnl bs zl pnynzvgl: ohg gur YBEQ jnf zl
fgnl.

22:20 Ur oebhtug zr sbegu nyfb vagb n ynetr cynpr: ur qryvirerq zr,
orpnhfr ur qryvtugrq va zr.

22:21 Gur YBEQ erjneqrq zr nppbeqvat gb zl evtugrbhfarff: nppbeqvat gb
gur pyrnaarff bs zl unaqf ungu ur erpbzcrafrq zr.

22:22 Sbe V unir xrcg gur jnlf bs gur YBEQ, naq unir abg jvpxrqyl
qrcnegrq sebz zl Tbq.

22:23 Sbe nyy uvf whqtzragf jrer orsber zr: naq nf sbe uvf fgnghgrf, V
qvq abg qrcneg sebz gurz.

22:24 V jnf nyfb hcevtug orsber uvz, naq unir xrcg zlfrys sebz zvar
vavdhvgl.

22:25 Gurersber gur YBEQ ungu erpbzcrafrq zr nppbeqvat gb zl
evtugrbhfarff; nppbeqvat gb zl pyrnaarff va uvf rlr fvtug.

22:26 Jvgu gur zrepvshy gubh jvyg furj gulfrys zrepvshy, naq jvgu gur
hcevtug zna gubh jvyg furj gulfrys hcevtug.

22:27 Jvgu gur cher gubh jvyg furj gulfrys cher; naq jvgu gur sebjneq
gubh jvyg furj gulfrys hafnibhel.

22:28 Naq gur nssyvpgrq crbcyr gubh jvyg fnir: ohg guvar rlrf ner hcba
gur unhtugl, gung gubh znlrfg oevat gurz qbja.

22:29 Sbe gubh neg zl ynzc, B YBEQ: naq gur YBEQ jvyy yvtugra zl
qnexarff.

22:30 Sbe ol gurr V unir eha guebhtu n gebbc: ol zl Tbq unir V yrncrq
bire n jnyy.

22:31 Nf sbe Tbq, uvf jnl vf cresrpg; gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ vf gevrq:
ur vf n ohpxyre gb nyy gurz gung gehfg va uvz.

22:32 Sbe jub vf Tbq, fnir gur YBEQ? naq jub vf n ebpx, fnir bhe Tbq?
22:33 Tbq vf zl fgeratgu naq cbjre: naq ur znxrgu zl jnl cresrpg.

22:34 Ur znxrgu zl srrg yvxr uvaqf' srrg: naq frggrgu zr hcba zl uvtu
cynprf.

22:35 Ur grnpurgu zl unaqf gb jne; fb gung n obj bs fgrry vf oebxra ol
zvar nezf.

22:36 Gubh unfg nyfb tvira zr gur fuvryq bs gul fnyingvba: naq gul
tragyrarff ungu znqr zr terng.

22:37 Gubh unfg raynetrq zl fgrcf haqre zr; fb gung zl srrg qvq abg
fyvc.

22:38 V unir chefhrq zvar rarzvrf, naq qrfgeblrq gurz; naq ghearq abg
ntnva hagvy V unq pbafhzrq gurz.

22:39 Naq V unir pbafhzrq gurz, naq jbhaqrq gurz, gung gurl pbhyq abg
nevfr: lrn, gurl ner snyyra haqre zl srrg.

22:40 Sbe gubh unfg tveqrq zr jvgu fgeratgu gb onggyr: gurz gung ebfr
hc ntnvafg zr unfg gubh fhoqhrq haqre zr.

22:41 Gubh unfg nyfb tvira zr gur arpxf bs zvar rarzvrf, gung V zvtug
qrfgebl gurz gung ungr zr.

22:42 Gurl ybbxrq, ohg gurer jnf abar gb fnir; rira hagb gur YBEQ, ohg
ur nafjrerq gurz abg.

22:43 Gura qvq V orng gurz nf fznyy nf gur qhfg bs gur rnegu, V qvq
fgnzc gurz nf gur zver bs gur fgerrg, naq qvq fcernq gurz noebnq.

22:44 Gubh nyfb unfg qryvirerq zr sebz gur fgevivatf bs zl crbcyr,
gubh unfg xrcg zr gb or urnq bs gur urngura: n crbcyr juvpu V xarj abg
funyy freir zr.

22:45 Fgenatref funyy fhozvg gurzfryirf hagb zr: nf fbba nf gurl urne,
gurl funyy or borqvrag hagb zr.

22:46 Fgenatref funyy snqr njnl, naq gurl funyy or nsenvq bhg bs gurve
pybfr cynprf.

22:47 Gur YBEQ yvirgu; naq oyrffrq or zl ebpx; naq rknygrq or gur Tbq
bs gur ebpx bs zl fnyingvba.

22:48 Vg vf Tbq gung niratrgu zr, naq gung oevatrgu qbja gur crbcyr
haqre zr.

22:49 Naq gung oevatrgu zr sbegu sebz zvar rarzvrf: gubh nyfb unfg
yvsgrq zr hc ba uvtu nobir gurz gung ebfr hc ntnvafg zr: gubh unfg
qryvirerq zr sebz gur ivbyrag zna.

22:50 Gurersber V jvyy tvir gunaxf hagb gurr, B YBEQ, nzbat gur
urngura, naq V jvyy fvat cenvfrf hagb gul anzr.

22:51 Ur vf gur gbjre bs fnyingvba sbe uvf xvat: naq furjrgu zrepl gb
uvf nabvagrq, hagb Qnivq, naq gb uvf frrq sbe rirezber.

23:1 Abj gurfr or gur ynfg jbeqf bs Qnivq. Qnivq gur fba bs Wrffr
fnvq, naq gur zna jub jnf envfrq hc ba uvtu, gur nabvagrq bs gur Tbq
bs Wnpbo, naq gur fjrrg cfnyzvfg bs Vfenry, fnvq, 23:2 Gur Fcvevg bs
gur YBEQ fcnxr ol zr, naq uvf jbeq jnf va zl gbathr.

23:3 Gur Tbq bs Vfenry fnvq, gur Ebpx bs Vfenry fcnxr gb zr, Ur gung
ehyrgu bire zra zhfg or whfg, ehyvat va gur srne bs Tbq.

23:4 Naq ur funyy or nf gur yvtug bs gur zbeavat, jura gur fha evfrgu,
rira n zbeavat jvgubhg pybhqf; nf gur graqre tenff fcevatvat bhg bs
gur rnegu ol pyrne fuvavat nsgre enva.

23:5 Nygubhtu zl ubhfr or abg fb jvgu Tbq; lrg ur ungu znqr jvgu zr na
rireynfgvat pbiranag, beqrerq va nyy guvatf, naq fher: sbe guvf vf nyy
zl fnyingvba, naq nyy zl qrfver, nygubhtu ur znxr vg abg gb tebj.

23:6 Ohg gur fbaf bs Oryvny funyy or nyy bs gurz nf gubeaf guehfg
njnl, orpnhfr gurl pnaabg or gnxra jvgu unaqf: 23:7 Ohg gur zna gung
funyy gbhpu gurz zhfg or sraprq jvgu veba naq gur fgnss bs n fcrne;
naq gurl funyy or hggreyl ohearq jvgu sver va gur fnzr cynpr.

23:8 Gurfr or gur anzrf bs gur zvtugl zra jubz Qnivq unq: Gur
Gnpuzbavgr gung fng va gur frng, puvrs nzbat gur pncgnvaf; gur fnzr
jnf Nqvab gur Rmavgr: ur yvsg hc uvf fcrne ntnvafg rvtug uhaqerq, jubz
ur fyrj ng bar gvzr.

23:9 Naq nsgre uvz jnf Ryrnmne gur fba bs Qbqb gur Nubuvgr, bar bs gur
guerr zvtugl zra jvgu Qnivq, jura gurl qrsvrq gur Cuvyvfgvarf gung
jrer gurer tngurerq gbtrgure gb onggyr, naq gur zra bs Vfenry jrer
tbar njnl: 23:10 Ur nebfr, naq fzbgr gur Cuvyvfgvarf hagvy uvf unaq
jnf jrnel, naq uvf unaq pynir hagb gur fjbeq: naq gur YBEQ jebhtug n
terng ivpgbel gung qnl; naq gur crbcyr erghearq nsgre uvz bayl gb
fcbvy.

23:11 Naq nsgre uvz jnf Funzznu gur fba bs Ntrr gur Unenevgr. Naq gur
Cuvyvfgvarf jrer tngurerq gbtrgure vagb n gebbc, jurer jnf n cvrpr bs
tebhaq shyy bs yragvyrf: naq gur crbcyr syrq sebz gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

23:12 Ohg ur fgbbq va gur zvqfg bs gur tebhaq, naq qrsraqrq vg, naq
fyrj gur Cuvyvfgvarf: naq gur YBEQ jebhtug n terng ivpgbel.

23:13 Naq guerr bs gur guvegl puvrs jrag qbja, naq pnzr gb Qnivq va
gur uneirfg gvzr hagb gur pnir bs Nqhyynz: naq gur gebbc bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf cvgpurq va gur inyyrl bs Ercunvz.

23:14 Naq Qnivq jnf gura va na ubyq, naq gur tneevfba bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf jnf gura va Orguyrurz.

23:15 Naq Qnivq ybatrq, naq fnvq, Bu gung bar jbhyq tvir zr qevax bs
gur jngre bs gur jryy bs Orguyrurz, juvpu vf ol gur tngr!  23:16 Naq
gur guerr zvtugl zra oenxr guebhtu gur ubfg bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq
qerj jngre bhg bs gur jryy bs Orguyrurz, gung jnf ol gur tngr, naq
gbbx vg, naq oebhtug vg gb Qnivq: arireguryrff ur jbhyq abg qevax
gurerbs, ohg cbherq vg bhg hagb gur YBEQ.

23:17 Naq ur fnvq, Or vg sne sebz zr, B YBEQ, gung V fubhyq qb guvf:
vf abg guvf gur oybbq bs gur zra gung jrag va wrbcneql bs gurve yvirf?
gurersber ur jbhyq abg qevax vg. Gurfr guvatf qvq gurfr guerr zvtugl
zra.

23:18 Naq Novfunv, gur oebgure bs Wbno, gur fba bs Mrehvnu, jnf puvrs
nzbat guerr. Naq ur yvsgrq hc uvf fcrne ntnvafg guerr uhaqerq, naq
fyrj gurz, naq unq gur anzr nzbat guerr.

23:19 Jnf ur abg zbfg ubabhenoyr bs guerr? gurersber ur jnf gurve
pncgnva: ubjorvg ur nggnvarq abg hagb gur svefg guerr.

23:20 Naq Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn, gur fba bs n inyvnag zna, bs
Xnomrry, jub unq qbar znal npgf, ur fyrj gjb yvbayvxr zra bs Zbno: ur
jrag qbja nyfb naq fyrj n yvba va gur zvqfg bs n cvg va gvzr bs fabj:
23:21 Naq ur fyrj na Rtlcgvna, n tbbqyl zna: naq gur Rtlcgvna unq n
fcrne va uvf unaq; ohg ur jrag qbja gb uvz jvgu n fgnss, naq cyhpxrq
gur fcrne bhg bs gur Rtlcgvna'f unaq, naq fyrj uvz jvgu uvf bja fcrne.

23:22 Gurfr guvatf qvq Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn, naq unq gur anzr
nzbat guerr zvtugl zra.

23:23 Ur jnf zber ubabhenoyr guna gur guvegl, ohg ur nggnvarq abg gb
gur svefg guerr. Naq Qnivq frg uvz bire uvf thneq.

23:24 Nfnury gur oebgure bs Wbno jnf bar bs gur guvegl; Ryunana gur
fba bs Qbqb bs Orguyrurz, 23:25 Funzznu gur Unebqvgr, Ryvxn gur
Unebqvgr, 23:26 Uryrm gur Cnygvgr, Ven gur fba bs Vxxrfu gur Grxbvgr,
23:27 Novrmre gur Nargubguvgr, Zrohaanv gur Uhfunguvgr, 23:28 Mnyzba
gur Nubuvgr, Znunenv gur Argbcunguvgr, 23:29 Uryro gur fba bs Onnanu,
n Argbcunguvgr, Vggnv gur fba bs Evonv bhg bs Tvornu bs gur puvyqera
bs Orawnzva, 23:30 Oranvnu gur Cvengubavgr, Uvqqnv bs gur oebbxf bs
Tnnfu, 23:31 Novnyoba gur Neonguvgr, Nmznirgu gur Oneuhzvgr, 23:32
Ryvnuon gur Funnyobavgr, bs gur fbaf bs Wnfura, Wbanguna, 23:33
Funzznu gur Unenevgr, Nuvnz gur fba bs Funene gur Unenevgr, 23:34
Ryvcuryrg gur fba bs Nunfonv, gur fba bs gur Znnpunguvgr, Ryvnz gur
fba bs Nuvgubcury gur Tvybavgr, 23:35 Urmenv gur Pnezryvgr, Cnnenv gur
Neovgr, 23:36 Vtny gur fba bs Anguna bs Mbonu, Onav gur Tnqvgr, 23:37
Mryrx gur Nzzbavgr, Anunev gur Orrebguvgr, nezbheornere gb Wbno gur
fba bs Mrehvnu, 23:38 Ven na Vguevgr, Tnero na Vguevgr, 23:39 Hevnu
gur Uvggvgr: guvegl naq frira va nyy.

24:1 Naq ntnva gur natre bs gur YBEQ jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg Vfenry, naq
ur zbirq Qnivq ntnvafg gurz gb fnl, Tb, ahzore Vfenry naq Whqnu.

24:2 Sbe gur xvat fnvq gb Wbno gur pncgnva bs gur ubfg, juvpu jnf jvgu
uvz, Tb abj guebhtu nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry, sebz Qna rira gb
Orrefuron, naq ahzore lr gur crbcyr, gung V znl xabj gur ahzore bs gur
crbcyr.

24:3 Naq Wbno fnvq hagb gur xvat, Abj gur YBEQ gul Tbq nqq hagb gur
crbcyr, ubj znal fbrire gurl or, na uhaqerqsbyq, naq gung gur rlrf bs
zl ybeq gur xvat znl frr vg: ohg jul qbgu zl ybeq gur xvat qryvtug va
guvf guvat?  24:4 Abgjvgufgnaqvat gur xvat'f jbeq cerinvyrq ntnvafg
Wbno, naq ntnvafg gur pncgnvaf bs gur ubfg. Naq Wbno naq gur pncgnvaf
bs gur ubfg jrag bhg sebz gur cerfrapr bs gur xvat, gb ahzore gur
crbcyr bs Vfenry.

24:5 Naq gurl cnffrq bire Wbeqna, naq cvgpurq va Nebre, ba gur evtug
fvqr bs gur pvgl gung yvrgu va gur zvqfg bs gur evire bs Tnq, naq
gbjneq Wnmre: 24:6 Gura gurl pnzr gb Tvyrnq, naq gb gur ynaq bs
Gnugvzubqfuv; naq gurl pnzr gb Qnawnna, naq nobhg gb Mvqba, 24:7 Naq
pnzr gb gur fgebat ubyq bs Gler, naq gb nyy gur pvgvrf bs gur Uvivgrf,
naq bs gur Pnannavgrf: naq gurl jrag bhg gb gur fbhgu bs Whqnu, rira
gb Orrefuron.

24:8 Fb jura gurl unq tbar guebhtu nyy gur ynaq, gurl pnzr gb
Wrehfnyrz ng gur raq bs avar zbaguf naq gjragl qnlf.

24:9 Naq Wbno tnir hc gur fhz bs gur ahzore bs gur crbcyr hagb gur
xvat: naq gurer jrer va Vfenry rvtug uhaqerq gubhfnaq inyvnag zra gung
qerj gur fjbeq; naq gur zra bs Whqnu jrer svir uhaqerq gubhfnaq zra.

24:10 Naq Qnivq'f urneg fzbgr uvz nsgre gung ur unq ahzorerq gur
crbcyr.

Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb gur YBEQ, V unir fvaarq terngyl va gung V unir
qbar: naq abj, V orfrrpu gurr, B YBEQ, gnxr njnl gur vavdhvgl bs gul
freinag; sbe V unir qbar irel sbbyvfuyl.

24:11 Sbe jura Qnivq jnf hc va gur zbeavat, gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr
hagb gur cebcurg Tnq, Qnivq'f frre, fnlvat, 24:12 Tb naq fnl hagb
Qnivq, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, V bssre gurr guerr guvatf; pubbfr gurr bar
bs gurz, gung V znl qb vg hagb gurr.

24:13 Fb Tnq pnzr gb Qnivq, naq gbyq uvz, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Funyy
frira lrnef bs snzvar pbzr hagb gurr va gul ynaq? be jvyg gubh syrr
guerr zbaguf orsber guvar rarzvrf, juvyr gurl chefhr gurr? be gung
gurer or guerr qnlf' crfgvyrapr va gul ynaq? abj nqivfr, naq frr jung
nafjre V funyy erghea gb uvz gung frag zr.

24:14 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Tnq, V nz va n terng fgenvg: yrg hf snyy abj
vagb gur unaq bs gur YBEQ; sbe uvf zrepvrf ner terng: naq yrg zr abg
snyy vagb gur unaq bs zna.

24:15 Fb gur YBEQ frag n crfgvyrapr hcba Vfenry sebz gur zbeavat rira
gb gur gvzr nccbvagrq: naq gurer qvrq bs gur crbcyr sebz Qna rira gb
Orrefuron friragl gubhfnaq zra.

24:16 Naq jura gur natry fgergpurq bhg uvf unaq hcba Wrehfnyrz gb
qrfgebl vg, gur YBEQ ercragrq uvz bs gur rivy, naq fnvq gb gur natry
gung qrfgeblrq gur crbcyr, Vg vf rabhtu: fgnl abj guvar unaq. Naq gur
natry bs gur YBEQ jnf ol gur guerfuvatcynpr bs Nenhanu gur Wrohfvgr.

24:17 Naq Qnivq fcnxr hagb gur YBEQ jura ur fnj gur natry gung fzbgr
gur crbcyr, naq fnvq, Yb, V unir fvaarq, naq V unir qbar jvpxrqyl: ohg
gurfr furrc, jung unir gurl qbar? yrg guvar unaq, V cenl gurr, or
ntnvafg zr, naq ntnvafg zl sngure'f ubhfr.

24:18 Naq Tnq pnzr gung qnl gb Qnivq, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Tb hc, erne
na nygne hagb gur YBEQ va gur guerfuvatsybbe bs Nenhanu gur Wrohfvgr.

24:19 Naq Qnivq, nppbeqvat gb gur fnlvat bs Tnq, jrag hc nf gur YBEQ
pbzznaqrq.

24:20 Naq Nenhanu ybbxrq, naq fnj gur xvat naq uvf freinagf pbzvat ba
gbjneq uvz: naq Nenhanu jrag bhg, naq objrq uvzfrys orsber gur xvat ba
uvf snpr hcba gur tebhaq.

24:21 Naq Nenhanu fnvq, Jurersber vf zl ybeq gur xvat pbzr gb uvf
freinag?  Naq Qnivq fnvq, Gb ohl gur guerfuvatsybbe bs gurr, gb ohvyq
na nygne hagb gur YBEQ, gung gur cynthr znl or fgnlrq sebz gur crbcyr.

24:22 Naq Nenhanu fnvq hagb Qnivq, Yrg zl ybeq gur xvat gnxr naq bssre
hc jung frrzrgu tbbq hagb uvz: orubyq, urer or bkra sbe oheag
fnpevsvpr, naq guerfuvat vafgehzragf naq bgure vafgehzragf bs gur bkra
sbe jbbq.

24:23 Nyy gurfr guvatf qvq Nenhanu, nf n xvat, tvir hagb gur xvat. Naq
Nenhanu fnvq hagb gur xvat, Gur YBEQ gul Tbq npprcg gurr.

24:24 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb Nenhanu, Anl; ohg V jvyy fheryl ohl vg bs
gurr ng n cevpr: arvgure jvyy V bssre oheag bssrevatf hagb gur YBEQ zl
Tbq bs gung juvpu qbgu pbfg zr abguvat. Fb Qnivq obhtug gur
guerfuvatsybbe naq gur bkra sbe svsgl furxryf bs fvyire.

24:25 Naq Qnivq ohvyg gurer na nygne hagb gur YBEQ, naq bssrerq oheag
bssrevatf naq crnpr bssrevatf. Fb gur YBEQ jnf vagerngrq sbe gur ynaq,
naq gur cynthr jnf fgnlrq sebz Vfenry.




Gur Svefg Obbx bs gur Xvatf

Pbzzbayl Pnyyrq:

Gur Guveq Obbx bs gur Xvatf


1:1 Abj xvat Qnivq jnf byq naq fgevpxra va lrnef; naq gurl pbirerq
uvz jvgu pybgurf, ohg ur tng ab urng.

1:2 Jurersber uvf freinagf fnvq hagb uvz, Yrg gurer or fbhtug sbe zl
ybeq gur xvat n lbhat ivetva: naq yrg ure fgnaq orsber gur xvat, naq
yrg ure purevfu uvz, naq yrg ure yvr va gul obfbz, gung zl ybeq gur
xvat znl trg urng.

1:3 Fb gurl fbhtug sbe n snve qnzfry guebhtubhg nyy gur pbnfgf bs
Vfenry, naq sbhaq Novfunt n Fuhanzzvgr, naq oebhtug ure gb gur xvat.

1:4 Naq gur qnzfry jnf irel snve, naq purevfurq gur xvat, naq
zvavfgrerq gb uvz: ohg gur xvat xarj ure abg.

1:5 Gura Nqbavwnu gur fba bs Unttvgu rknygrq uvzfrys, fnlvat, V jvyy
or xvat: naq ur cercnerq uvz punevbgf naq ubefrzra, naq svsgl zra gb
eha orsber uvz.

1:6 Naq uvf sngure unq abg qvfcyrnfrq uvz ng nal gvzr va fnlvat, Jul
unfg gubh qbar fb? naq ur nyfb jnf n irel tbbqyl zna; naq uvf zbgure
oner uvz nsgre Nofnybz.

1:7 Naq ur pbasreerq jvgu Wbno gur fba bs Mrehvnu, naq jvgu Novngune
gur cevrfg: naq gurl sbyybjvat Nqbavwnu urycrq uvz.

1:8 Ohg Mnqbx gur cevrfg, naq Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn, naq Anguna
gur cebcurg, naq Fuvzrv, naq Erv, naq gur zvtugl zra juvpu orybatrq gb
Qnivq, jrer abg jvgu Nqbavwnu.

1:9 Naq Nqbavwnu fyrj furrc naq bkra naq sng pnggyr ol gur fgbar bs
Mburyrgu, juvpu vf ol Raebtry, naq pnyyrq nyy uvf oerguera gur xvat'f
fbaf, naq nyy gur zra bs Whqnu gur xvat'f freinagf: 1:10 Ohg Anguna
gur cebcurg, naq Oranvnu, naq gur zvtugl zra, naq Fbybzba uvf oebgure,
ur pnyyrq abg.

1:11 Jurersber Anguna fcnxr hagb Ongufuron gur zbgure bs Fbybzba,
fnlvat, Unfg gubh abg urneq gung Nqbavwnu gur fba bs Unttvgu qbgu
ervta, naq Qnivq bhe ybeq xabjrgu vg abg?  1:12 Abj gurersber pbzr,
yrg zr, V cenl gurr, tvir gurr pbhafry, gung gubh znlrfg fnir guvar
bja yvsr, naq gur yvsr bs gul fba Fbybzba.

1:13 Tb naq trg gurr va hagb xvat Qnivq, naq fnl hagb uvz, Qvqfg abg
gubh, zl ybeq, B xvat, fjrne hagb guvar unaqznvq, fnlvat, Nffherqyl
Fbybzba gul fba funyy ervta nsgre zr, naq ur funyy fvg hcba zl guebar?
jul gura qbgu Nqbavwnu ervta?  1:14 Orubyq, juvyr gubh lrg gnyxrfg
gurer jvgu gur xvat, V nyfb jvyy pbzr va nsgre gurr, naq pbasvez gul
jbeqf.

1:15 Naq Ongufuron jrag va hagb gur xvat vagb gur punzore: naq gur
xvat jnf irel byq; naq Novfunt gur Fuhanzzvgr zvavfgrerq hagb gur
xvat.

1:16 Naq Ongufuron objrq, naq qvq borvfnapr hagb gur xvat. Naq gur
xvat fnvq, Jung jbhyqrfg gubh?  1:17 Naq fur fnvq hagb uvz, Zl ybeq,
gubh fjnerfg ol gur YBEQ gul Tbq hagb guvar unaqznvq, fnlvat,
Nffherqyl Fbybzba gul fba funyy ervta nsgre zr, naq ur funyy fvg hcba
zl guebar.

1:18 Naq abj, orubyq, Nqbavwnu ervtargu; naq abj, zl ybeq gur xvat,
gubh xabjrfg vg abg: 1:19 Naq ur ungu fynva bkra naq sng pnggyr naq
furrc va nohaqnapr, naq ungu pnyyrq nyy gur fbaf bs gur xvat, naq
Novngune gur cevrfg, naq Wbno gur pncgnva bs gur ubfg: ohg Fbybzba gul
freinag ungu ur abg pnyyrq.

1:20 Naq gubh, zl ybeq, B xvat, gur rlrf bs nyy Vfenry ner hcba gurr,
gung gubh fubhyqrfg gryy gurz jub funyy fvg ba gur guebar bs zl ybeq
gur xvat nsgre uvz.

1:21 Bgurejvfr vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura zl ybeq gur xvat funyy
fyrrc jvgu uvf snguref, gung V naq zl fba Fbybzba funyy or pbhagrq
bssraqref.

1:22 Naq, yb, juvyr fur lrg gnyxrq jvgu gur xvat, Anguna gur cebcurg
nyfb pnzr va.

1:23 Naq gurl gbyq gur xvat, fnlvat, Orubyq Anguna gur cebcurg. Naq
jura ur jnf pbzr va orsber gur xvat, ur objrq uvzfrys orsber gur xvat
jvgu uvf snpr gb gur tebhaq.

1:24 Naq Anguna fnvq, Zl ybeq, B xvat, unfg gubh fnvq, Nqbavwnu funyy
ervta nsgre zr, naq ur funyy fvg hcba zl guebar?  1:25 Sbe ur vf tbar
qbja guvf qnl, naq ungu fynva bkra naq sng pnggyr naq furrc va
nohaqnapr, naq ungu pnyyrq nyy gur xvat'f fbaf, naq gur pncgnvaf bs
gur ubfg, naq Novngune gur cevrfg; naq, orubyq, gurl rng naq qevax
orsber uvz, naq fnl, Tbq fnir xvat Nqbavwnu.

1:26 Ohg zr, rira zr gul freinag, naq Mnqbx gur cevrfg, naq Oranvnu
gur fba bs Wrubvnqn, naq gul freinag Fbybzba, ungu ur abg pnyyrq.

1:27 Vf guvf guvat qbar ol zl ybeq gur xvat, naq gubh unfg abg furjrq
vg hagb gul freinag, jub fubhyq fvg ba gur guebar bs zl ybeq gur xvat
nsgre uvz?  1:28 Gura xvat Qnivq nafjrerq naq fnvq, Pnyy zr Ongufuron.
Naq fur pnzr vagb gur xvat'f cerfrapr, naq fgbbq orsber gur xvat.

1:29 Naq gur xvat fjner, naq fnvq, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, gung ungu
erqrrzrq zl fbhy bhg bs nyy qvfgerff, 1:30 Rira nf V fjner hagb gurr
ol gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Nffherqyl Fbybzba gul fba funyy
ervta nsgre zr, naq ur funyy fvg hcba zl guebar va zl fgrnq; rira fb
jvyy V pregnvayl qb guvf qnl.

1:31 Gura Ongufuron objrq jvgu ure snpr gb gur rnegu, naq qvq
erirerapr gb gur xvat, naq fnvq, Yrg zl ybeq xvat Qnivq yvir sbe rire.

1:32 Naq xvat Qnivq fnvq, Pnyy zr Mnqbx gur cevrfg, naq Anguna gur
cebcurg, naq Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn. Naq gurl pnzr orsber gur
xvat.

1:33 Gur xvat nyfb fnvq hagb gurz, Gnxr jvgu lbh gur freinagf bs lbhe
ybeq, naq pnhfr Fbybzba zl fba gb evqr hcba zvar bja zhyr, naq oevat
uvz qbja gb Tvuba: 1:34 Naq yrg Mnqbx gur cevrfg naq Anguna gur
cebcurg nabvag uvz gurer xvat bire Vfenry: naq oybj lr jvgu gur
gehzcrg, naq fnl, Tbq fnir xvat Fbybzba.

1:35 Gura lr funyy pbzr hc nsgre uvz, gung ur znl pbzr naq fvg hcba zl
guebar; sbe ur funyy or xvat va zl fgrnq: naq V unir nccbvagrq uvz gb
or ehyre bire Vfenry naq bire Whqnu.

1:36 Naq Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn nafjrerq gur xvat, naq fnvq,
Nzra: gur YBEQ Tbq bs zl ybeq gur xvat fnl fb gbb.

1:37 Nf gur YBEQ ungu orra jvgu zl ybeq gur xvat, rira fb or ur jvgu
Fbybzba, naq znxr uvf guebar terngre guna gur guebar bs zl ybeq xvat
Qnivq.

1:38 Fb Mnqbx gur cevrfg, naq Anguna gur cebcurg, naq Oranvnu gur fba
bs Wrubvnqn, naq gur Purerguvgrf, naq gur Cryrguvgrf, jrag qbja, naq
pnhfrq Fbybzba gb evqr hcba xvat Qnivq'f zhyr, naq oebhtug uvz gb
Tvuba.

1:39 Naq Mnqbx gur cevrfg gbbx na ubea bs bvy bhg bs gur gnoreanpyr,
naq nabvagrq Fbybzba. Naq gurl oyrj gur gehzcrg; naq nyy gur crbcyr
fnvq, Tbq fnir xvat Fbybzba.

1:40 Naq nyy gur crbcyr pnzr hc nsgre uvz, naq gur crbcyr cvcrq jvgu
cvcrf, naq erwbvprq jvgu terng wbl, fb gung gur rnegu erag jvgu gur
fbhaq bs gurz.

1:41 Naq Nqbavwnu naq nyy gur thrfgf gung jrer jvgu uvz urneq vg nf
gurl unq znqr na raq bs rngvat. Naq jura Wbno urneq gur fbhaq bs gur
gehzcrg, ur fnvq, Jurersber vf guvf abvfr bs gur pvgl orvat va na
hcebne?  1:42 Naq juvyr ur lrg fcnxr, orubyq, Wbanguna gur fba bs
Novngune gur cevrfg pnzr; naq Nqbavwnu fnvq hagb uvz, Pbzr va; sbe
gubh neg n inyvnag zna, naq oevatrfg tbbq gvqvatf.

1:43 Naq Wbanguna nafjrerq naq fnvq gb Nqbavwnu, Irevyl bhe ybeq xvat
Qnivq ungu znqr Fbybzba xvat.

1:44 Naq gur xvat ungu frag jvgu uvz Mnqbx gur cevrfg, naq Anguna gur
cebcurg, naq Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn, naq gur Purerguvgrf, naq gur
Cryrguvgrf, naq gurl unir pnhfrq uvz gb evqr hcba gur xvat'f zhyr:
1:45 Naq Mnqbx gur cevrfg naq Anguna gur cebcurg unir nabvagrq uvz
xvat va Tvuba: naq gurl ner pbzr hc sebz gurapr erwbvpvat, fb gung gur
pvgl enat ntnva. Guvf vf gur abvfr gung lr unir urneq.

1:46 Naq nyfb Fbybzba fvggrgu ba gur guebar bs gur xvatqbz.

1:47 Naq zberbire gur xvat'f freinagf pnzr gb oyrff bhe ybeq xvat
Qnivq, fnlvat, Tbq znxr gur anzr bs Fbybzba orggre guna gul anzr, naq
znxr uvf guebar terngre guna gul guebar. Naq gur xvat objrq uvzfrys
hcba gur orq.

1:48 Naq nyfb guhf fnvq gur xvat, Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry,
juvpu ungu tvira bar gb fvg ba zl guebar guvf qnl, zvar rlrf rira
frrvat vg.

1:49 Naq nyy gur thrfgf gung jrer jvgu Nqbavwnu jrer nsenvq, naq ebfr
hc, naq jrag rirel zna uvf jnl.

1:50 Naq Nqbavwnu srnerq orpnhfr bs Fbybzba, naq nebfr, naq jrag, naq
pnhtug ubyq ba gur ubeaf bs gur nygne.

1:51 Naq vg jnf gbyq Fbybzba, fnlvat, Orubyq, Nqbavwnu srnergu xvat
Fbybzba: sbe, yb, ur ungu pnhtug ubyq ba gur ubeaf bs gur nygne,
fnlvat, Yrg xvat Fbybzba fjrne hagb zr gbqnl gung ur jvyy abg fynl uvf
freinag jvgu gur fjbeq.

1:52 Naq Fbybzba fnvq, Vs ur jvyy furj uvzfrys n jbegul zna, gurer
funyy abg na unve bs uvz snyy gb gur rnegu: ohg vs jvpxrqarff funyy or
sbhaq va uvz, ur funyy qvr.

1:53 Fb xvat Fbybzba frag, naq gurl oebhtug uvz qbja sebz gur nygne.
Naq ur pnzr naq objrq uvzfrys gb xvat Fbybzba: naq Fbybzba fnvq hagb
uvz, Tb gb guvar ubhfr.

2:1 Abj gur qnlf bs Qnivq qerj avtu gung ur fubhyq qvr; naq ur punetrq
Fbybzba uvf fba, fnlvat, 2:2 V tb gur jnl bs nyy gur rnegu: or gubh
fgebat gurersber, naq furj gulfrys n zna; 2:3 Naq xrrc gur punetr bs
gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gb jnyx va uvf jnlf, gb xrrc uvf fgnghgrf, naq uvf
pbzznaqzragf, naq uvf whqtzragf, naq uvf grfgvzbavrf, nf vg vf jevggra
va gur ynj bs Zbfrf, gung gubh znlrfg cebfcre va nyy gung gubh qbrfg,
naq juvgurefbrire gubh ghearfg gulfrys: 2:4 Gung gur YBEQ znl pbagvahr
uvf jbeq juvpu ur fcnxr pbapreavat zr, fnlvat, Vs gul puvyqera gnxr
urrq gb gurve jnl, gb jnyx orsber zr va gehgu jvgu nyy gurve urneg naq
jvgu nyy gurve fbhy, gurer funyy abg snvy gurr (fnvq ur) n zna ba gur
guebar bs Vfenry.

2:5 Zberbire gubh xabjrfg nyfb jung Wbno gur fba bs Mrehvnu qvq gb zr,
naq jung ur qvq gb gur gjb pncgnvaf bs gur ubfgf bs Vfenry, hagb Noare
gur fba bs Are, naq hagb Nznfn gur fba bs Wrgure, jubz ur fyrj, naq
furq gur oybbq bs jne va crnpr, naq chg gur oybbq bs jne hcba uvf
tveqyr gung jnf nobhg uvf ybvaf, naq va uvf fubrf gung jrer ba uvf
srrg.

2:6 Qb gurersber nppbeqvat gb gul jvfqbz, naq yrg abg uvf ubne urnq tb
qbja gb gur tenir va crnpr.

2:7 Ohg furj xvaqarff hagb gur fbaf bs Onemvyynv gur Tvyrnqvgr, naq
yrg gurz or bs gubfr gung rng ng gul gnoyr: sbe fb gurl pnzr gb zr
jura V syrq orpnhfr bs Nofnybz gul oebgure.

2:8 Naq, orubyq, gubh unfg jvgu gurr Fuvzrv gur fba bs Tren, n
Orawnzvgr bs Onuhevz, juvpu phefrq zr jvgu n tevribhf phefr va gur qnl
jura V jrag gb Znunanvz: ohg ur pnzr qbja gb zrrg zr ng Wbeqna, naq V
fjner gb uvz ol gur YBEQ, fnlvat, V jvyy abg chg gurr gb qrngu jvgu
gur fjbeq.

2:9 Abj gurersber ubyq uvz abg thvygyrff: sbe gubh neg n jvfr zna, naq
xabjrfg jung gubh bhtugrfg gb qb hagb uvz; ohg uvf ubne urnq oevat
gubh qbja gb gur tenir jvgu oybbq.

2:10 Fb Qnivq fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq jnf ohevrq va gur pvgl bs
Qnivq.

2:11 Naq gur qnlf gung Qnivq ervtarq bire Vfenry jrer sbegl lrnef:
frira lrnef ervtarq ur va Uroeba, naq guvegl naq guerr lrnef ervtarq
ur va Wrehfnyrz.

2:12 Gura fng Fbybzba hcba gur guebar bs Qnivq uvf sngure; naq uvf
xvatqbz jnf rfgnoyvfurq terngyl.

2:13 Naq Nqbavwnu gur fba bs Unttvgu pnzr gb Ongufuron gur zbgure bs
Fbybzba. Naq fur fnvq, Pbzrfg gubh crnprnoyl? Naq ur fnvq, Crnprnoyl.

2:14 Ur fnvq zberbire, V unir fbzrjung gb fnl hagb gurr. Naq fur fnvq,
Fnl ba.

2:15 Naq ur fnvq, Gubh xabjrfg gung gur xvatqbz jnf zvar, naq gung nyy
Vfenry frg gurve snprf ba zr, gung V fubhyq ervta: ubjorvg gur xvatqbz
vf ghearq nobhg, naq vf orpbzr zl oebgure'f: sbe vg jnf uvf sebz gur
YBEQ.

2:16 Naq abj V nfx bar crgvgvba bs gurr, qral zr abg. Naq fur fnvq
hagb uvz, Fnl ba.

2:17 Naq ur fnvq, Fcrnx, V cenl gurr, hagb Fbybzba gur xvat, (sbe ur
jvyy abg fnl gurr anl,) gung ur tvir zr Novfunt gur Fuhanzzvgr gb
jvsr.

2:18 Naq Ongufuron fnvq, Jryy; V jvyy fcrnx sbe gurr hagb gur xvat.

2:19 Ongufuron gurersber jrag hagb xvat Fbybzba, gb fcrnx hagb uvz sbe
Nqbavwnu. Naq gur xvat ebfr hc gb zrrg ure, naq objrq uvzfrys hagb
ure, naq fng qbja ba uvf guebar, naq pnhfrq n frng gb or frg sbe gur
xvat'f zbgure; naq fur fng ba uvf evtug unaq.

2:20 Gura fur fnvq, V qrfver bar fznyy crgvgvba bs gurr; V cenl gurr,
fnl zr abg anl. Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb ure, Nfx ba, zl zbgure: sbe V
jvyy abg fnl gurr anl.

2:21 Naq fur fnvq, Yrg Novfunt gur Fuhanzzvgr or tvira gb Nqbavwnu gul
oebgure gb jvsr.

2:22 Naq xvat Fbybzba nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb uvf zbgure, Naq jul qbfg
gubh nfx Novfunt gur Fuhanzzvgr sbe Nqbavwnu? nfx sbe uvz gur xvatqbz
nyfb; sbe ur vf zvar ryqre oebgure; rira sbe uvz, naq sbe Novngune gur
cevrfg, naq sbe Wbno gur fba bs Mrehvnu.

2:23 Gura xvat Fbybzba fjner ol gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Tbq qb fb gb zr, naq
zber nyfb, vs Nqbavwnu unir abg fcbxra guvf jbeq ntnvafg uvf bja yvsr.

2:24 Abj gurersber, nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, juvpu ungu rfgnoyvfurq zr, naq
frg zr ba gur guebar bs Qnivq zl sngure, naq jub ungu znqr zr na
ubhfr, nf ur cebzvfrq, Nqbavwnu funyy or chg gb qrngu guvf qnl.

2:25 Naq xvat Fbybzba frag ol gur unaq bs Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn;
naq ur sryy hcba uvz gung ur qvrq.

2:26 Naq hagb Novngune gur cevrfg fnvq gur xvat, Trg gurr gb Nangubgu,
hagb guvar bja svryqf; sbe gubh neg jbegul bs qrngu: ohg V jvyy abg ng
guvf gvzr chg gurr gb qrngu, orpnhfr gubh onerfg gur nex bs gur YBEQ
Tbq orsber Qnivq zl sngure, naq orpnhfr gubh unfg orra nssyvpgrq va
nyy jurerva zl sngure jnf nssyvpgrq.

2:27 Fb Fbybzba guehfg bhg Novngune sebz orvat cevrfg hagb gur YBEQ;
gung ur zvtug shysvy gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur fcnxr pbapreavat
gur ubhfr bs Ryv va Fuvybu.
