2:28 Gura gvqvatf pnzr gb Wbno: sbe Wbno unq ghearq nsgre Nqbavwnu,
gubhtu ur ghearq abg nsgre Nofnybz. Naq Wbno syrq hagb gur gnoreanpyr
bs gur YBEQ, naq pnhtug ubyq ba gur ubeaf bs gur nygne.

2:29 Naq vg jnf gbyq xvat Fbybzba gung Wbno jnf syrq hagb gur
gnoreanpyr bs gur YBEQ; naq, orubyq, ur vf ol gur nygne. Gura Fbybzba
frag Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn, fnlvat, Tb, snyy hcba uvz.

2:30 Naq Oranvnu pnzr gb gur gnoreanpyr bs gur YBEQ, naq fnvq hagb
uvz, Guhf fnvgu gur xvat, Pbzr sbegu. Naq ur fnvq, Anl; ohg V jvyy qvr
urer. Naq Oranvnu oebhtug gur xvat jbeq ntnva, fnlvat, Guhf fnvq Wbno,
naq guhf ur nafjrerq zr.

2:31 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb uvz, Qb nf ur ungu fnvq, naq snyy hcba
uvz, naq ohel uvz; gung gubh znlrfg gnxr njnl gur vaabprag oybbq,
juvpu Wbno furq, sebz zr, naq sebz gur ubhfr bs zl sngure.

2:32 Naq gur YBEQ funyy erghea uvf oybbq hcba uvf bja urnq, jub sryy
hcba gjb zra zber evtugrbhf naq orggre guna ur, naq fyrj gurz jvgu gur
fjbeq, zl sngure Qnivq abg xabjvat gurerbs, gb jvg, Noare gur fba bs
Are, pncgnva bs gur ubfg bs Vfenry, naq Nznfn gur fba bs Wrgure,
pncgnva bs gur ubfg bs Whqnu.

2:33 Gurve oybbq funyy gurersber erghea hcba gur urnq bs Wbno, naq
hcba gur urnq bs uvf frrq sbe rire: ohg hcba Qnivq, naq hcba uvf frrq,
naq hcba uvf ubhfr, naq hcba uvf guebar, funyy gurer or crnpr sbe rire
sebz gur YBEQ.

2:34 Fb Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn jrag hc, naq sryy hcba uvz, naq
fyrj uvz: naq ur jnf ohevrq va uvf bja ubhfr va gur jvyqrearff.

2:35 Naq gur xvat chg Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn va uvf ebbz bire gur
ubfg: naq Mnqbx gur cevrfg qvq gur xvat chg va gur ebbz bs Novngune.

2:36 Naq gur xvat frag naq pnyyrq sbe Fuvzrv, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Ohvyq
gurr na ubhfr va Wrehfnyrz, naq qjryy gurer, naq tb abg sbegu gurapr
nal juvgure.

2:37 Sbe vg funyy or, gung ba gur qnl gubh tbrfg bhg, naq cnffrfg bire
gur oebbx Xvqeba, gubh funyg xabj sbe pregnva gung gubh funyg fheryl
qvr: gul oybbq funyy or hcba guvar bja urnq.

2:38 Naq Fuvzrv fnvq hagb gur xvat, Gur fnlvat vf tbbq: nf zl ybeq gur
xvat ungu fnvq, fb jvyy gul freinag qb. Naq Fuvzrv qjryg va Wrehfnyrz
znal qnlf.

2:39 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur raq bs guerr lrnef, gung gjb bs gur
freinagf bs Fuvzrv ena njnl hagb Npuvfu fba bs Znnpunu xvat bs Tngu.
Naq gurl gbyq Fuvzrv, fnlvat, Orubyq, gul freinagf or va Tngu.

2:40 Naq Fuvzrv nebfr, naq fnqqyrq uvf nff, naq jrag gb Tngu gb Npuvfu
gb frrx uvf freinagf: naq Fuvzrv jrag, naq oebhtug uvf freinagf sebz
Tngu.

2:41 Naq vg jnf gbyq Fbybzba gung Fuvzrv unq tbar sebz Wrehfnyrz gb
Tngu, naq jnf pbzr ntnva.

2:42 Naq gur xvat frag naq pnyyrq sbe Fuvzrv, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Qvq V
abg znxr gurr gb fjrne ol gur YBEQ, naq cebgrfgrq hagb gurr, fnlvat,
Xabj sbe n pregnva, ba gur qnl gubh tbrfg bhg, naq jnyxrfg noebnq nal
juvgure, gung gubh funyg fheryl qvr? naq gubh fnvqfg hagb zr, Gur jbeq
gung V unir urneq vf tbbq.

2:43 Jul gura unfg gubh abg xrcg gur bngu bs gur YBEQ, naq gur
pbzznaqzrag gung V unir punetrq gurr jvgu?  2:44 Gur xvat fnvq
zberbire gb Fuvzrv, Gubh xabjrfg nyy gur jvpxrqarff juvpu guvar urneg
vf cevil gb, gung gubh qvqfg gb Qnivq zl sngure: gurersber gur YBEQ
funyy erghea gul jvpxrqarff hcba guvar bja urnq; 2:45 Naq xvat Fbybzba
funyy or oyrffrq, naq gur guebar bs Qnivq funyy or rfgnoyvfurq orsber
gur YBEQ sbe rire.

2:46 Fb gur xvat pbzznaqrq Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn; juvpu jrag
bhg, naq sryy hcba uvz, gung ur qvrq. Naq gur xvatqbz jnf rfgnoyvfurq
va gur unaq bs Fbybzba.

3:1 Naq Fbybzba znqr nssvavgl jvgu Cunenbu xvat bs Rtlcg, naq gbbx
Cunenbu'f qnhtugre, naq oebhtug ure vagb gur pvgl bs Qnivq, hagvy ur
unq znqr na raq bs ohvyqvat uvf bja ubhfr, naq gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ,
naq gur jnyy bs Wrehfnyrz ebhaq nobhg.

3:2 Bayl gur crbcyr fnpevsvprq va uvtu cynprf, orpnhfr gurer jnf ab
ubhfr ohvyg hagb gur anzr bs gur YBEQ, hagvy gubfr qnlf.

3:3 Naq Fbybzba ybirq gur YBEQ, jnyxvat va gur fgnghgrf bs Qnivq uvf
sngure: bayl ur fnpevsvprq naq oheag vaprafr va uvtu cynprf.

3:4 Naq gur xvat jrag gb Tvorba gb fnpevsvpr gurer; sbe gung jnf gur
terng uvtu cynpr: n gubhfnaq oheag bssrevatf qvq Fbybzba bssre hcba
gung nygne.

3:5 Va Tvorba gur YBEQ nccrnerq gb Fbybzba va n qernz ol avtug: naq
Tbq fnvq, Nfx jung V funyy tvir gurr.

3:6 Naq Fbybzba fnvq, Gubh unfg furjrq hagb gul freinag Qnivq zl
sngure terng zrepl, nppbeqvat nf ur jnyxrq orsber gurr va gehgu, naq
va evtugrbhfarff, naq va hcevtugarff bs urneg jvgu gurr; naq gubh unfg
xrcg sbe uvz guvf terng xvaqarff, gung gubh unfg tvira uvz n fba gb
fvg ba uvf guebar, nf vg vf guvf qnl.

3:7 Naq abj, B YBEQ zl Tbq, gubh unfg znqr gul freinag xvat vafgrnq bs
Qnivq zl sngure: naq V nz ohg n yvggyr puvyq: V xabj abg ubj gb tb bhg
be pbzr va.

3:8 Naq gul freinag vf va gur zvqfg bs gul crbcyr juvpu gubh unfg
pubfra, n terng crbcyr, gung pnaabg or ahzorerq abe pbhagrq sbe
zhygvghqr.

3:9 Tvir gurersber gul freinag na haqrefgnaqvat urneg gb whqtr gul
crbcyr, gung V znl qvfprea orgjrra tbbq naq onq: sbe jub vf noyr gb
whqtr guvf gul fb terng n crbcyr?  3:10 Naq gur fcrrpu cyrnfrq gur
YBEQ, gung Fbybzba unq nfxrq guvf guvat.

3:11 Naq Tbq fnvq hagb uvz, Orpnhfr gubh unfg nfxrq guvf guvat, naq
unfg abg nfxrq sbe gulfrys ybat yvsr; arvgure unfg nfxrq evpurf sbe
gulfrys, abe unfg nfxrq gur yvsr bs guvar rarzvrf; ohg unfg nfxrq sbe
gulfrys haqrefgnaqvat gb qvfprea whqtzrag; 3:12 Orubyq, V unir qbar
nppbeqvat gb gul jbeqf: yb, V unir tvira gurr n jvfr naq na
haqrefgnaqvat urneg; fb gung gurer jnf abar yvxr gurr orsber gurr,
arvgure nsgre gurr funyy nal nevfr yvxr hagb gurr.

3:13 Naq V unir nyfb tvira gurr gung juvpu gubh unfg abg nfxrq, obgu
evpurf, naq ubabhe: fb gung gurer funyy abg or nal nzbat gur xvatf
yvxr hagb gurr nyy gul qnlf.

3:14 Naq vs gubh jvyg jnyx va zl jnlf, gb xrrc zl fgnghgrf naq zl
pbzznaqzragf, nf gul sngure Qnivq qvq jnyx, gura V jvyy yratgura gul
qnlf.

3:15 Naq Fbybzba njbxr; naq, orubyq, vg jnf n qernz. Naq ur pnzr gb
Wrehfnyrz, naq fgbbq orsber gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ, naq
bssrerq hc oheag bssrevatf, naq bssrerq crnpr bssrevatf, naq znqr n
srnfg gb nyy uvf freinagf.

3:16 Gura pnzr gurer gjb jbzra, gung jrer uneybgf, hagb gur xvat, naq
fgbbq orsber uvz.

3:17 Naq gur bar jbzna fnvq, B zl ybeq, V naq guvf jbzna qjryy va bar
ubhfr; naq V jnf qryvirerq bs n puvyq jvgu ure va gur ubhfr.

3:18 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff gur guveq qnl nsgre gung V jnf qryvirerq,
gung guvf jbzna jnf qryvirerq nyfb: naq jr jrer gbtrgure; gurer jnf ab
fgenatre jvgu hf va gur ubhfr, fnir jr gjb va gur ubhfr.

3:19 Naq guvf jbzna'f puvyq qvrq va gur avtug; orpnhfr fur bireynvq
vg.

3:20 Naq fur nebfr ng zvqavtug, naq gbbx zl fba sebz orfvqr zr, juvyr
guvar unaqznvq fyrcg, naq ynvq vg va ure obfbz, naq ynvq ure qrnq
puvyq va zl obfbz.

3:21 Naq jura V ebfr va gur zbeavat gb tvir zl puvyq fhpx, orubyq, vg
jnf qrnq: ohg jura V unq pbafvqrerq vg va gur zbeavat, orubyq, vg jnf
abg zl fba, juvpu V qvq orne.

3:22 Naq gur bgure jbzna fnvq, Anl; ohg gur yvivat vf zl fba, naq gur
qrnq vf gul fba. Naq guvf fnvq, Ab; ohg gur qrnq vf gul fba, naq gur
yvivat vf zl fba. Guhf gurl fcnxr orsber gur xvat.

3:23 Gura fnvq gur xvat, Gur bar fnvgu, Guvf vf zl fba gung yvirgu,
naq gul fba vf gur qrnq: naq gur bgure fnvgu, Anl; ohg gul fba vf gur
qrnq, naq zl fba vf gur yvivat.

3:24 Naq gur xvat fnvq, Oevat zr n fjbeq. Naq gurl oebhtug n fjbeq
orsber gur xvat.

3:25 Naq gur xvat fnvq, Qvivqr gur yvivat puvyq va gjb, naq tvir unys
gb gur bar, naq unys gb gur bgure.

3:26 Gura fcnxr gur jbzna jubfr gur yvivat puvyq jnf hagb gur xvat,
sbe ure objryf lrnearq hcba ure fba, naq fur fnvq, B zl ybeq, tvir ure
gur yvivat puvyq, naq va ab jvfr fynl vg. Ohg gur bgure fnvq, Yrg vg
or arvgure zvar abe guvar, ohg qvivqr vg.

3:27 Gura gur xvat nafjrerq naq fnvq, Tvir ure gur yvivat puvyq, naq
va ab jvfr fynl vg: fur vf gur zbgure gurerbs.

3:28 Naq nyy Vfenry urneq bs gur whqtzrag juvpu gur xvat unq whqtrq;
naq gurl srnerq gur xvat: sbe gurl fnj gung gur jvfqbz bs Tbq jnf va
uvz, gb qb whqtzrag.

4:1 Fb xvat Fbybzba jnf xvat bire nyy Vfenry.

4:2 Naq gurfr jrer gur cevaprf juvpu ur unq; Nmnevnu gur fba bs Mnqbx
gur cevrfg, 4:3 Ryvubercu naq Nuvnu, gur fbaf bs Fuvfun, fpevorf;
Wrubfuncung gur fba bs Nuvyhq, gur erpbeqre.

4:4 Naq Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn jnf bire gur ubfg: naq Mnqbx naq
Novngune jrer gur cevrfgf: 4:5 Naq Nmnevnu gur fba bs Anguna jnf bire
gur bssvpref: naq Mnohq gur fba bs Anguna jnf cevapvcny bssvpre, naq
gur xvat'f sevraq: 4:6 Naq Nuvfune jnf bire gur ubhfrubyq: naq
Nqbavenz gur fba bs Noqn jnf bire gur gevohgr.

4:7 Naq Fbybzba unq gjryir bssvpref bire nyy Vfenry, juvpu cebivqrq
ivpghnyf sbe gur xvat naq uvf ubhfrubyq: rnpu zna uvf zbagu va n lrne
znqr cebivfvba.

4:8 Naq gurfr ner gurve anzrf: Gur fba bs Uhe, va zbhag Rcuenvz: 4:9
Gur fba bs Qrxne, va Znxnm, naq va Funnyovz, naq Orgufurzrfu, naq
Rybaorguunana: 4:10 Gur fba bs Urfrq, va Nehobgu; gb uvz cregnvarq
Fbpubu, naq nyy gur ynaq bs Urcure: 4:11 Gur fba bs Novanqno, va nyy
gur ertvba bs Qbe; juvpu unq Gncungu gur qnhtugre bs Fbybzba gb jvsr:
4:12 Onnan gur fba bs Nuvyhq; gb uvz cregnvarq Gnnanpu naq Zrtvqqb,
naq nyy Orgufurna, juvpu vf ol Mnegnanu orarngu Wrmerry, sebz
Orgufurna gb Noryzrubynu, rira hagb gur cynpr gung vf orlbaq Wbxarnz:
4:13 Gur fba bs Trore, va Enzbgutvyrnq; gb uvz cregnvarq gur gbjaf bs
Wnve gur fba bs Znanffru, juvpu ner va Tvyrnq; gb uvz nyfb cregnvarq
gur ertvba bs Netbo, juvpu vf va Onfuna, guerrfpber terng pvgvrf jvgu
jnyyf naq oenfra onef: 4:14 Nuvanqno gur fba bs Vqqb unq Znunanvz:
4:15 Nuvznnm jnf va Ancugnyv; ur nyfb gbbx Onfzngu gur qnhtugre bs
Fbybzba gb jvsr: 4:16 Onnanu gur fba bs Uhfunv jnf va Nfure naq va
Nybgu: 4:17 Wrubfuncung gur fba bs Cnehnu, va Vffnpune: 4:18 Fuvzrv
gur fba bs Rynu, va Orawnzva: 4:19 Trore gur fba bs Hev jnf va gur
pbhagel bs Tvyrnq, va gur pbhagel bs Fvuba xvat bs gur Nzbevgrf, naq
bs Bt xvat bs Onfuna; naq ur jnf gur bayl bssvpre juvpu jnf va gur
ynaq.

4:20 Whqnu naq Vfenry jrer znal, nf gur fnaq juvpu vf ol gur frn va
zhygvghqr, rngvat naq qevaxvat, naq znxvat zreel.

4:21 Naq Fbybzba ervtarq bire nyy xvatqbzf sebz gur evire hagb gur
ynaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq hagb gur obeqre bs Rtlcg: gurl oebhtug
cerfragf, naq freirq Fbybzba nyy gur qnlf bs uvf yvsr.

4:22 Naq Fbybzba'f cebivfvba sbe bar qnl jnf guvegl zrnfherf bs svar
sybhe, naq guerrfpber zrnfherf bs zrny, 4:23 Gra sng bkra, naq gjragl
bkra bhg bs gur cnfgherf, naq na uhaqerq furrc, orfvqr unegf, naq
ebrohpxf, naq snyybjqrre, naq snggrq sbjy.

4:24 Sbe ur unq qbzvavba bire nyy gur ertvba ba guvf fvqr gur evire,
sebz Gvcufnu rira gb Nmmnu, bire nyy gur xvatf ba guvf fvqr gur evire:
naq ur unq crnpr ba nyy fvqrf ebhaq nobhg uvz.

4:25 Naq Whqnu naq Vfenry qjryg fnsryl, rirel zna haqre uvf ivar naq
haqre uvf svt gerr, sebz Qna rira gb Orrefuron, nyy gur qnlf bs
Fbybzba.

4:26 Naq Fbybzba unq sbegl gubhfnaq fgnyyf bs ubefrf sbe uvf punevbgf,
naq gjryir gubhfnaq ubefrzra.

4:27 Naq gubfr bssvpref cebivqrq ivpghny sbe xvat Fbybzba, naq sbe nyy
gung pnzr hagb xvat Fbybzba'f gnoyr, rirel zna va uvf zbagu: gurl
ynpxrq abguvat.

4:28 Oneyrl nyfb naq fgenj sbe gur ubefrf naq qebzrqnevrf oebhtug gurl
hagb gur cynpr jurer gur bssvpref jrer, rirel zna nppbeqvat gb uvf
punetr.

4:29 Naq Tbq tnir Fbybzba jvfqbz naq haqrefgnaqvat rkprrqvat zhpu, naq
ynetrarff bs urneg, rira nf gur fnaq gung vf ba gur frn fuber.

4:30 Naq Fbybzba'f jvfqbz rkpryyrq gur jvfqbz bs nyy gur puvyqera bs
gur rnfg pbhagel, naq nyy gur jvfqbz bs Rtlcg.

4:31 Sbe ur jnf jvfre guna nyy zra; guna Rguna gur Rmenuvgr, naq
Urzna, naq Punypby, naq Qneqn, gur fbaf bs Znuby: naq uvf snzr jnf va
nyy angvbaf ebhaq nobhg.

4:32 Naq ur fcnxr guerr gubhfnaq cebireof: naq uvf fbatf jrer n
gubhfnaq naq svir.

4:33 Naq ur fcnxr bs gerrf, sebz gur prqne gerr gung vf va Yronaba
rira hagb gur ulffbc gung fcevatrgu bhg bs gur jnyy: ur fcnxr nyfb bs
ornfgf, naq bs sbjy, naq bs perrcvat guvatf, naq bs svfurf.

4:34 Naq gurer pnzr bs nyy crbcyr gb urne gur jvfqbz bs Fbybzba, sebz
nyy xvatf bs gur rnegu, juvpu unq urneq bs uvf jvfqbz.

5:1 Naq Uvenz xvat bs Gler frag uvf freinagf hagb Fbybzba; sbe ur unq
urneq gung gurl unq nabvagrq uvz xvat va gur ebbz bs uvf sngure: sbe
Uvenz jnf rire n ybire bs Qnivq.

5:2 Naq Fbybzba frag gb Uvenz, fnlvat, 5:3 Gubh xabjrfg ubj gung Qnivq
zl sngure pbhyq abg ohvyq na ubhfr hagb gur anzr bs gur YBEQ uvf Tbq
sbe gur jnef juvpu jrer nobhg uvz ba rirel fvqr, hagvy gur YBEQ chg
gurz haqre gur fbyrf bs uvf srrg.

5:4 Ohg abj gur YBEQ zl Tbq ungu tvira zr erfg ba rirel fvqr, fb gung
gurer vf arvgure nqirefnel abe rivy bppheerag.

5:5 Naq, orubyq, V checbfr gb ohvyq na ubhfr hagb gur anzr bs gur YBEQ
zl Tbq, nf gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Qnivq zl sngure, fnlvat, Gul fba, jubz
V jvyy frg hcba gul guebar va gul ebbz, ur funyy ohvyq na ubhfr hagb
zl anzr.

5:6 Abj gurersber pbzznaq gubh gung gurl urj zr prqne gerrf bhg bs
Yronaba; naq zl freinagf funyy or jvgu gul freinagf: naq hagb gurr
jvyy V tvir uver sbe gul freinagf nppbeqvat gb nyy gung gubh funyg
nccbvag: sbe gubh xabjrfg gung gurer vf abg nzbat hf nal gung pna
fxvyy gb urj gvzore yvxr hagb gur Fvqbavnaf.

5:7 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Uvenz urneq gur jbeqf bs Fbybzba, gung
ur erwbvprq terngyl, naq fnvq, Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ guvf qnl, juvpu
ungu tvira hagb Qnivq n jvfr fba bire guvf terng crbcyr.

5:8 Naq Uvenz frag gb Fbybzba, fnlvat, V unir pbafvqrerq gur guvatf
juvpu gubh fragrfg gb zr sbe: naq V jvyy qb nyy gul qrfver pbapreavat
gvzore bs prqne, naq pbapreavat gvzore bs sve.

5:9 Zl freinagf funyy oevat gurz qbja sebz Yronaba hagb gur frn: naq V
jvyy pbairl gurz ol frn va sybngf hagb gur cynpr gung gubh funyg
nccbvag zr, naq jvyy pnhfr gurz gb or qvfpunetrq gurer, naq gubh funyg
erprvir gurz: naq gubh funyg nppbzcyvfu zl qrfver, va tvivat sbbq sbe
zl ubhfrubyq.

5:10 Fb Uvenz tnir Fbybzba prqne gerrf naq sve gerrf nppbeqvat gb nyy
uvf qrfver.

5:11 Naq Fbybzba tnir Uvenz gjragl gubhfnaq zrnfherf bs jurng sbe sbbq
gb uvf ubhfrubyq, naq gjragl zrnfherf bs cher bvy: guhf tnir Fbybzba
gb Uvenz lrne ol lrne.

5:12 Naq gur YBEQ tnir Fbybzba jvfqbz, nf ur cebzvfrq uvz: naq gurer
jnf crnpr orgjrra Uvenz naq Fbybzba; naq gurl gjb znqr n yrnthr
gbtrgure.

5:13 Naq xvat Fbybzba envfrq n yril bhg bs nyy Vfenry; naq gur yril
jnf guvegl gubhfnaq zra.

5:14 Naq ur frag gurz gb Yronaba, gra gubhfnaq n zbagu ol pbhefrf: n
zbagu gurl jrer va Yronaba, naq gjb zbaguf ng ubzr: naq Nqbavenz jnf
bire gur yril.

5:15 Naq Fbybzba unq guerrfpber naq gra gubhfnaq gung oner oheqraf,
naq sbhefpber gubhfnaq urjref va gur zbhagnvaf; 5:16 Orfvqr gur puvrs
bs Fbybzba'f bssvpref juvpu jrer bire gur jbex, guerr gubhfnaq naq
guerr uhaqerq, juvpu ehyrq bire gur crbcyr gung jebhtug va gur jbex.

5:17 Naq gur xvat pbzznaqrq, naq gurl oebhtug terng fgbarf, pbfgyl
fgbarf, naq urjrq fgbarf, gb ynl gur sbhaqngvba bs gur ubhfr.

5:18 Naq Fbybzba'f ohvyqref naq Uvenz'f ohvyqref qvq urj gurz, naq gur
fgbarfdhneref: fb gurl cercnerq gvzore naq fgbarf gb ohvyq gur ubhfr.

6:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur sbhe uhaqerq naq rvtugvrgu lrne nsgre
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrer pbzr bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, va gur
sbhegu lrne bs Fbybzba'f ervta bire Vfenry, va gur zbagu Mvs, juvpu vf
gur frpbaq zbagu, gung ur ortna gb ohvyq gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

6:2 Naq gur ubhfr juvpu xvat Fbybzba ohvyg sbe gur YBEQ, gur yratgu
gurerbs jnf guerrfpber phovgf, naq gur oernqgu gurerbs gjragl phovgf,
naq gur urvtug gurerbs guvegl phovgf.

6:3 Naq gur cbepu orsber gur grzcyr bs gur ubhfr, gjragl phovgf jnf
gur yratgu gurerbs, nppbeqvat gb gur oernqgu bs gur ubhfr; naq gra
phovgf jnf gur oernqgu gurerbs orsber gur ubhfr.

6:4 Naq sbe gur ubhfr ur znqr jvaqbjf bs aneebj yvtugf.

6:5 Naq ntnvafg gur jnyy bs gur ubhfr ur ohvyg punzoref ebhaq nobhg,
ntnvafg gur jnyyf bs gur ubhfr ebhaq nobhg, obgu bs gur grzcyr naq bs
gur benpyr: naq ur znqr punzoref ebhaq nobhg: 6:6 Gur argurezbfg
punzore jnf svir phovgf oebnq, naq gur zvqqyr jnf fvk phovgf oebnq,
naq gur guveq jnf frira phovgf oebnq: sbe jvgubhg va gur jnyy bs gur
ubhfr ur znqr aneebjrq erfgf ebhaq nobhg, gung gur ornzf fubhyq abg or
snfgrarq va gur jnyyf bs gur ubhfr.

6:7 Naq gur ubhfr, jura vg jnf va ohvyqvat, jnf ohvyg bs fgbar znqr
ernql orsber vg jnf oebhtug guvgure: fb gung gurer jnf arvgure unzzre
abe nkr abe nal gbby bs veba urneq va gur ubhfr, juvyr vg jnf va
ohvyqvat.

6:8 Gur qbbe sbe gur zvqqyr punzore jnf va gur evtug fvqr bs gur
ubhfr: naq gurl jrag hc jvgu jvaqvat fgnvef vagb gur zvqqyr punzore,
naq bhg bs gur zvqqyr vagb gur guveq.

6:9 Fb ur ohvyg gur ubhfr, naq svavfurq vg; naq pbirerq gur ubhfr jvgu
ornzf naq obneqf bs prqne.

6:10 Naq gura ur ohvyg punzoref ntnvafg nyy gur ubhfr, svir phovgf
uvtu: naq gurl erfgrq ba gur ubhfr jvgu gvzore bs prqne.

6:11 Naq gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr gb Fbybzba, fnlvat, 6:12 Pbapreavat
guvf ubhfr juvpu gubh neg va ohvyqvat, vs gubh jvyg jnyx va zl
fgnghgrf, naq rkrphgr zl whqtzragf, naq xrrc nyy zl pbzznaqzragf gb
jnyx va gurz; gura jvyy V cresbez zl jbeq jvgu gurr, juvpu V fcnxr
hagb Qnivq gul sngure: 6:13 Naq V jvyy qjryy nzbat gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, naq jvyy abg sbefnxr zl crbcyr Vfenry.

6:14 Fb Fbybzba ohvyg gur ubhfr, naq svavfurq vg.

6:15 Naq ur ohvyg gur jnyyf bs gur ubhfr jvguva jvgu obneqf bs prqne,
obgu gur sybbe bs gur ubhfr, naq gur jnyyf bs gur prvyvat: naq ur
pbirerq gurz ba gur vafvqr jvgu jbbq, naq pbirerq gur sybbe bs gur
ubhfr jvgu cynaxf bs sve.

6:16 Naq ur ohvyg gjragl phovgf ba gur fvqrf bs gur ubhfr, obgu gur
sybbe naq gur jnyyf jvgu obneqf bs prqne: ur rira ohvyg gurz sbe vg
jvguva, rira sbe gur benpyr, rira sbe gur zbfg ubyl cynpr.

6:17 Naq gur ubhfr, gung vf, gur grzcyr orsber vg, jnf sbegl phovgf
ybat.

6:18 Naq gur prqne bs gur ubhfr jvguva jnf pneirq jvgu xabcf naq bcra
sybjref: nyy jnf prqne; gurer jnf ab fgbar frra.

6:19 Naq gur benpyr ur cercnerq va gur ubhfr jvguva, gb frg gurer gur
nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ.

6:20 Naq gur benpyr va gur sbercneg jnf gjragl phovgf va yratgu, naq
gjragl phovgf va oernqgu, naq gjragl phovgf va gur urvtug gurerbs: naq
ur bireynvq vg jvgu cher tbyq; naq fb pbirerq gur nygne juvpu jnf bs
prqne.

6:21 Fb Fbybzba bireynvq gur ubhfr jvguva jvgu cher tbyq: naq ur znqr
n cnegvgvba ol gur punvaf bs tbyq orsber gur benpyr; naq ur bireynvq
vg jvgu tbyq.

6:22 Naq gur jubyr ubhfr ur bireynvq jvgu tbyq, hagvy ur unq svavfurq
nyy gur ubhfr: nyfb gur jubyr nygne gung jnf ol gur benpyr ur bireynvq
jvgu tbyq.

6:23 Naq jvguva gur benpyr ur znqr gjb purehovzf bs byvir gerr, rnpu
gra phovgf uvtu.

6:24 Naq svir phovgf jnf gur bar jvat bs gur pureho, naq svir phovgf
gur bgure jvat bs gur pureho: sebz gur hggrezbfg cneg bs gur bar jvat
hagb gur hggrezbfg cneg bs gur bgure jrer gra phovgf.

6:25 Naq gur bgure pureho jnf gra phovgf: obgu gur purehovzf jrer bs
bar zrnfher naq bar fvmr.

6:26 Gur urvtug bs gur bar pureho jnf gra phovgf, naq fb jnf vg bs gur
bgure pureho.

6:27 Naq ur frg gur purehovzf jvguva gur vaare ubhfr: naq gurl
fgergpurq sbegu gur jvatf bs gur purehovzf, fb gung gur jvat bs gur
bar gbhpurq gur bar jnyy, naq gur jvat bs gur bgure pureho gbhpurq gur
bgure jnyy; naq gurve jvatf gbhpurq bar nabgure va gur zvqfg bs gur
ubhfr.

6:28 Naq ur bireynvq gur purehovzf jvgu tbyq.

6:29 Naq ur pneirq nyy gur jnyyf bs gur ubhfr ebhaq nobhg jvgu pneirq
svtherf bs purehovzf naq cnyz gerrf naq bcra sybjref, jvguva naq
jvgubhg.

6:30 Naq gur sybbef bs gur ubhfr ur bireynvq jvgu tbyq, jvguva naq
jvgubhg.

6:31 Naq sbe gur ragrevat bs gur benpyr ur znqr qbbef bs byvir gerr:
gur yvagry naq fvqr cbfgf jrer n svsgu cneg bs gur jnyy.

6:32 Gur gjb qbbef nyfb jrer bs byvir gerr; naq ur pneirq hcba gurz
pneivatf bs purehovzf naq cnyz gerrf naq bcra sybjref, naq bireynvq
gurz jvgu tbyq, naq fcernq tbyq hcba gur purehovzf, naq hcba gur cnyz
gerrf.

6:33 Fb nyfb znqr ur sbe gur qbbe bs gur grzcyr cbfgf bs byvir gerr, n
sbhegu cneg bs gur jnyy.

6:34 Naq gur gjb qbbef jrer bs sve gerr: gur gjb yrnirf bs gur bar
qbbe jrer sbyqvat, naq gur gjb yrnirf bs gur bgure qbbe jrer sbyqvat.

6:35 Naq ur pneirq gurerba purehovzf naq cnyz gerrf naq bcra sybjref:
naq pbirerq gurz jvgu tbyq svggrq hcba gur pneirq jbex.

6:36 Naq ur ohvyg gur vaare pbheg jvgu guerr ebjf bs urjrq fgbar, naq
n ebj bs prqne ornzf.

6:37 Va gur sbhegu lrne jnf gur sbhaqngvba bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ
ynvq, va gur zbagu Mvs: 6:38 Naq va gur ryriragu lrne, va gur zbagu
Ohy, juvpu vf gur rvtugu zbagu, jnf gur ubhfr svavfurq guebhtubhg nyy
gur cnegf gurerbs, naq nppbeqvat gb nyy gur snfuvba bs vg. Fb jnf ur
frira lrnef va ohvyqvat vg.

7:1 Ohg Fbybzba jnf ohvyqvat uvf bja ubhfr guvegrra lrnef, naq ur
svavfurq nyy uvf ubhfr.

7:2 Ur ohvyg nyfb gur ubhfr bs gur sberfg bs Yronaba; gur yratgu
gurerbs jnf na uhaqerq phovgf, naq gur oernqgu gurerbs svsgl phovgf,
naq gur urvtug gurerbs guvegl phovgf, hcba sbhe ebjf bs prqne cvyynef,
jvgu prqne ornzf hcba gur cvyynef.

7:3 Naq vg jnf pbirerq jvgu prqne nobir hcba gur ornzf, gung ynl ba
sbegl svir cvyynef, svsgrra va n ebj.

7:4 Naq gurer jrer jvaqbjf va guerr ebjf, naq yvtug jnf ntnvafg yvtug
va guerr enaxf.

7:5 Naq nyy gur qbbef naq cbfgf jrer fdhner, jvgu gur jvaqbjf: naq
yvtug jnf ntnvafg yvtug va guerr enaxf.

7:6 Naq ur znqr n cbepu bs cvyynef; gur yratgu gurerbs jnf svsgl
phovgf, naq gur oernqgu gurerbs guvegl phovgf: naq gur cbepu jnf
orsber gurz: naq gur bgure cvyynef naq gur guvpx ornz jrer orsber
gurz.

7:7 Gura ur znqr n cbepu sbe gur guebar jurer ur zvtug whqtr, rira gur
cbepu bs whqtzrag: naq vg jnf pbirerq jvgu prqne sebz bar fvqr bs gur
sybbe gb gur bgure.

7:8 Naq uvf ubhfr jurer ur qjryg unq nabgure pbheg jvguva gur cbepu,
juvpu jnf bs gur yvxr jbex. Fbybzba znqr nyfb na ubhfr sbe Cunenbu'f
qnhtugre, jubz ur unq gnxra gb jvsr, yvxr hagb guvf cbepu.

7:9 Nyy gurfr jrer bs pbfgyl fgbarf, nppbeqvat gb gur zrnfherf bs
urjrq fgbarf, fnjrq jvgu fnjf, jvguva naq jvgubhg, rira sebz gur
sbhaqngvba hagb gur pbcvat, naq fb ba gur bhgfvqr gbjneq gur terng
pbheg.

7:10 Naq gur sbhaqngvba jnf bs pbfgyl fgbarf, rira terng fgbarf,
fgbarf bs gra phovgf, naq fgbarf bs rvtug phovgf.

7:11 Naq nobir jrer pbfgyl fgbarf, nsgre gur zrnfherf bs urjrq fgbarf,
naq prqnef.

7:12 Naq gur terng pbheg ebhaq nobhg jnf jvgu guerr ebjf bs urjrq
fgbarf, naq n ebj bs prqne ornzf, obgu sbe gur vaare pbheg bs gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq sbe gur cbepu bs gur ubhfr.

7:13 Naq xvat Fbybzba frag naq srgpurq Uvenz bhg bs Gler.

7:14 Ur jnf n jvqbj'f fba bs gur gevor bs Ancugnyv, naq uvf sngure jnf
n zna bs Gler, n jbexre va oenff: naq ur jnf svyyrq jvgu jvfqbz, naq
haqrefgnaqvat, naq phaavat gb jbex nyy jbexf va oenff. Naq ur pnzr gb
xvat Fbybzba, naq jebhtug nyy uvf jbex.

7:15 Sbe ur pnfg gjb cvyynef bs oenff, bs rvtugrra phovgf uvtu ncvrpr:
naq n yvar bs gjryir phovgf qvq pbzcnff rvgure bs gurz nobhg.

7:16 Naq ur znqr gjb puncvgref bs zbygra oenff, gb frg hcba gur gbcf
bs gur cvyynef: gur urvtug bs gur bar puncvgre jnf svir phovgf, naq
gur urvtug bs gur bgure puncvgre jnf svir phovgf: 7:17 Naq argf bs
purpxre jbex, naq jernguf bs punva jbex, sbe gur puncvgref juvpu jrer
hcba gur gbc bs gur cvyynef; frira sbe gur bar puncvgre, naq frira sbe
gur bgure puncvgre.

7:18 Naq ur znqr gur cvyynef, naq gjb ebjf ebhaq nobhg hcba gur bar
argjbex, gb pbire gur puncvgref gung jrer hcba gur gbc, jvgu
cbzrtenangrf: naq fb qvq ur sbe gur bgure puncvgre.

7:19 Naq gur puncvgref gung jrer hcba gur gbc bs gur cvyynef jrer bs
yvyl jbex va gur cbepu, sbhe phovgf.

7:20 Naq gur puncvgref hcba gur gjb cvyynef unq cbzrtenangrf nyfb
nobir, bire ntnvafg gur oryyl juvpu jnf ol gur argjbex: naq gur
cbzrtenangrf jrer gjb uhaqerq va ebjf ebhaq nobhg hcba gur bgure
puncvgre.

7:21 Naq ur frg hc gur cvyynef va gur cbepu bs gur grzcyr: naq ur frg
hc gur evtug cvyyne, naq pnyyrq gur anzr gurerbs Wnpuva: naq ur frg hc
gur yrsg cvyyne, naq pnyyrq gur anzr gurerbs Obnm.

7:22 Naq hcba gur gbc bs gur cvyynef jnf yvyl jbex: fb jnf gur jbex bs
gur cvyynef svavfurq.

7:23 Naq ur znqr n zbygra frn, gra phovgf sebz gur bar oevz gb gur
bgure: vg jnf ebhaq nyy nobhg, naq uvf urvtug jnf svir phovgf: naq n
yvar bs guvegl phovgf qvq pbzcnff vg ebhaq nobhg.

7:24 Naq haqre gur oevz bs vg ebhaq nobhg gurer jrer xabcf pbzcnffvat
vg, gra va n phovg, pbzcnffvat gur frn ebhaq nobhg: gur xabcf jrer
pnfg va gjb ebjf, jura vg jnf pnfg.

7:25 Vg fgbbq hcba gjryir bkra, guerr ybbxvat gbjneq gur abegu, naq
guerr ybbxvat gbjneq gur jrfg, naq guerr ybbxvat gbjneq gur fbhgu, naq
guerr ybbxvat gbjneq gur rnfg: naq gur frn jnf frg nobir hcba gurz,
naq nyy gurve uvaqre cnegf jrer vajneq.

7:26 Naq vg jnf na unaq oernqgu guvpx, naq gur oevz gurerbs jnf
jebhtug yvxr gur oevz bs n phc, jvgu sybjref bs yvyvrf: vg pbagnvarq
gjb gubhfnaq onguf.

7:27 Naq ur znqr gra onfrf bs oenff; sbhe phovgf jnf gur yratgu bs bar
onfr, naq sbhe phovgf gur oernqgu gurerbs, naq guerr phovgf gur urvtug
bs vg.

7:28 Naq gur jbex bs gur onfrf jnf ba guvf znaare: gurl unq obeqref,
naq gur obeqref jrer orgjrra gur yrqtrf: 7:29 Naq ba gur obeqref gung
jrer orgjrra gur yrqtrf jrer yvbaf, bkra, naq purehovzf: naq hcba gur
yrqtrf gurer jnf n onfr nobir: naq orarngu gur yvbaf naq bkra jrer
pregnva nqqvgvbaf znqr bs guva jbex.

7:30 Naq rirel onfr unq sbhe oenfra jurryf, naq cyngrf bs oenff: naq
gur sbhe pbearef gurerbs unq haqrefrggref: haqre gur ynire jrer
haqrefrggref zbygra, ng gur fvqr bs rirel nqqvgvba.

7:31 Naq gur zbhgu bs vg jvguva gur puncvgre naq nobir jnf n phovg:
ohg gur zbhgu gurerbs jnf ebhaq nsgre gur jbex bs gur onfr, n phovg
naq na unys: naq nyfb hcba gur zbhgu bs vg jrer tenivatf jvgu gurve
obeqref, sbhefdhner, abg ebhaq.

7:32 Naq haqre gur obeqref jrer sbhe jurryf; naq gur nkyrgerrf bs gur
jurryf jrer wbvarq gb gur onfr: naq gur urvtug bs n jurry jnf n phovg
naq unys n phovg.

7:33 Naq gur jbex bs gur jurryf jnf yvxr gur jbex bs n punevbg jurry:
gurve nkyrgerrf, naq gurve anirf, naq gurve sryybrf, naq gurve fcbxrf,
jrer nyy zbygra.

7:34 Naq gurer jrer sbhe haqrefrggref gb gur sbhe pbearef bs bar onfr:
naq gur haqrefrggref jrer bs gur irel onfr vgfrys.

7:35 Naq va gur gbc bs gur onfr jnf gurer n ebhaq pbzcnff bs unys n
phovg uvtu: naq ba gur gbc bs gur onfr gur yrqtrf gurerbs naq gur
obeqref gurerbs jrer bs gur fnzr.

7:36 Sbe ba gur cyngrf bs gur yrqtrf gurerbs, naq ba gur obeqref
gurerbs, ur tenirq purehovzf, yvbaf, naq cnyz gerrf, nppbeqvat gb gur
cebcbegvba bs rirel bar, naq nqqvgvbaf ebhaq nobhg.

7:37 Nsgre guvf znaare ur znqr gur gra onfrf: nyy bs gurz unq bar
pnfgvat, bar zrnfher, naq bar fvmr.

7:38 Gura znqr ur gra yniref bs oenff: bar ynire pbagnvarq sbegl
onguf: naq rirel ynire jnf sbhe phovgf: naq hcba rirel bar bs gur gra
onfrf bar ynire.

7:39 Naq ur chg svir onfrf ba gur evtug fvqr bs gur ubhfr, naq svir ba
gur yrsg fvqr bs gur ubhfr: naq ur frg gur frn ba gur evtug fvqr bs
gur ubhfr rnfgjneq bire ntnvafg gur fbhgu.

7:40 Naq Uvenz znqr gur yniref, naq gur fubiryf, naq gur onfbaf. Fb
Uvenz znqr na raq bs qbvat nyy gur jbex gung ur znqr xvat Fbybzba sbe
gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ: 7:41 Gur gjb cvyynef, naq gur gjb objyf bs gur
puncvgref gung jrer ba gur gbc bs gur gjb cvyynef; naq gur gjb
argjbexf, gb pbire gur gjb objyf bs gur puncvgref juvpu jrer hcba gur
gbc bs gur cvyynef; 7:42 Naq sbhe uhaqerq cbzrtenangrf sbe gur gjb
argjbexf, rira gjb ebjf bs cbzrtenangrf sbe bar argjbex, gb pbire gur
gjb objyf bs gur puncvgref gung jrer hcba gur cvyynef; 7:43 Naq gur
gra onfrf, naq gra yniref ba gur onfrf; 7:44 Naq bar frn, naq gjryir
bkra haqre gur frn; 7:45 Naq gur cbgf, naq gur fubiryf, naq gur
onfbaf: naq nyy gurfr irffryf, juvpu Uvenz znqr gb xvat Fbybzba sbe
gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, jrer bs oevtug oenff.

7:46 Va gur cynva bs Wbeqna qvq gur xvat pnfg gurz, va gur pynl tebhaq
orgjrra Fhppbgu naq Mneguna.

7:47 Naq Fbybzba yrsg nyy gur irffryf hajrvturq, orpnhfr gurl jrer
rkprrqvat znal: arvgure jnf gur jrvtug bs gur oenff sbhaq bhg.

7:48 Naq Fbybzba znqr nyy gur irffryf gung cregnvarq hagb gur ubhfr bs
gur YBEQ: gur nygne bs tbyq, naq gur gnoyr bs tbyq, jurerhcba gur
furjoernq jnf, 7:49 Naq gur pnaqyrfgvpxf bs cher tbyq, svir ba gur
evtug fvqr, naq svir ba gur yrsg, orsber gur benpyr, jvgu gur sybjref,
naq gur ynzcf, naq gur gbatf bs tbyq, 7:50 Naq gur objyf, naq gur
fahssref, naq gur onfbaf, naq gur fcbbaf, naq gur prafref bs cher
tbyq; naq gur uvatrf bs tbyq, obgu sbe gur qbbef bs gur vaare ubhfr,
gur zbfg ubyl cynpr, naq sbe gur qbbef bs gur ubhfr, gb jvg, bs gur
grzcyr.

7:51 Fb jnf raqrq nyy gur jbex gung xvat Fbybzba znqr sbe gur ubhfr bs
gur YBEQ. Naq Fbybzba oebhtug va gur guvatf juvpu Qnivq uvf sngure unq
qrqvpngrq; rira gur fvyire, naq gur tbyq, naq gur irffryf, qvq ur chg
nzbat gur gernfherf bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

8:1 Gura Fbybzba nffrzoyrq gur ryqref bs Vfenry, naq nyy gur urnqf bs
gur gevorf, gur puvrs bs gur snguref bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, hagb
xvat Fbybzba va Wrehfnyrz, gung gurl zvtug oevat hc gur nex bs gur
pbiranag bs gur YBEQ bhg bs gur pvgl bs Qnivq, juvpu vf Mvba.

8:2 Naq nyy gur zra bs Vfenry nffrzoyrq gurzfryirf hagb xvat Fbybzba
ng gur srnfg va gur zbagu Rgunavz, juvpu vf gur friragu zbagu.

8:3 Naq nyy gur ryqref bs Vfenry pnzr, naq gur cevrfgf gbbx hc gur
nex.

8:4 Naq gurl oebhtug hc gur nex bs gur YBEQ, naq gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, naq nyy gur ubyl irffryf gung jrer va gur gnoreanpyr,
rira gubfr qvq gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf oevat hc.

8:5 Naq xvat Fbybzba, naq nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry, gung jrer
nffrzoyrq hagb uvz, jrer jvgu uvz orsber gur nex, fnpevsvpvat furrc
naq bkra, gung pbhyq abg or gbyq abe ahzorerq sbe zhygvghqr.

8:6 Naq gur cevrfgf oebhtug va gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ
hagb uvf cynpr, vagb gur benpyr bs gur ubhfr, gb gur zbfg ubyl cynpr,
rira haqre gur jvatf bs gur purehovzf.

8:7 Sbe gur purehovzf fcernq sbegu gurve gjb jvatf bire gur cynpr bs
gur nex, naq gur purehovzf pbirerq gur nex naq gur fgnirf gurerbs
nobir.

8:8 Naq gurl qerj bhg gur fgnirf, gung gur raqf bs gur fgnirf jrer
frra bhg va gur ubyl cynpr orsber gur benpyr, naq gurl jrer abg frra
jvgubhg: naq gurer gurl ner hagb guvf qnl.

8:9 Gurer jnf abguvat va gur nex fnir gur gjb gnoyrf bs fgbar, juvpu
Zbfrf chg gurer ng Ubero, jura gur YBEQ znqr n pbiranag jvgu gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry, jura gurl pnzr bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

8:10 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur cevrfgf jrer pbzr bhg bs gur ubyl
cynpr, gung gur pybhq svyyrq gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, 8:11 Fb gung gur
cevrfgf pbhyq abg fgnaq gb zvavfgre orpnhfr bs gur pybhq: sbe gur
tybel bs gur YBEQ unq svyyrq gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

8:12 Gura fcnxr Fbybzba, Gur YBEQ fnvq gung ur jbhyq qjryy va gur
guvpx qnexarff.

8:13 V unir fheryl ohvyg gurr na ubhfr gb qjryy va, n frggyrq cynpr
sbe gurr gb novqr va sbe rire.

8:14 Naq gur xvat ghearq uvf snpr nobhg, naq oyrffrq nyy gur
pbatertngvba bs Vfenry: (naq nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry fgbbq;)
8:15 Naq ur fnvq, Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, juvpu fcnxr jvgu
uvf zbhgu hagb Qnivq zl sngure, naq ungu jvgu uvf unaq shysvyyrq vg,
fnlvat, 8:16 Fvapr gur qnl gung V oebhtug sbegu zl crbcyr Vfenry bhg
bs Rtlcg, V pubfr ab pvgl bhg bs nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry gb ohvyq na
ubhfr, gung zl anzr zvtug or gurerva; ohg V pubfr Qnivq gb or bire zl
crbcyr Vfenry.

8:17 Naq vg jnf va gur urneg bs Qnivq zl sngure gb ohvyq na ubhfr sbe
gur anzr bs gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry.

8:18 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Qnivq zl sngure, Jurernf vg jnf va guvar
urneg gb ohvyq na ubhfr hagb zl anzr, gubh qvqfg jryy gung vg jnf va
guvar urneg.

8:19 Arireguryrff gubh funyg abg ohvyq gur ubhfr; ohg gul fba gung
funyy pbzr sbegu bhg bs gul ybvaf, ur funyy ohvyq gur ubhfr hagb zl
anzr.

8:20 Naq gur YBEQ ungu cresbezrq uvf jbeq gung ur fcnxr, naq V nz
evfra hc va gur ebbz bs Qnivq zl sngure, naq fvg ba gur guebar bs
Vfenry, nf gur YBEQ cebzvfrq, naq unir ohvyg na ubhfr sbe gur anzr bs
gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry.

8:21 Naq V unir frg gurer n cynpr sbe gur nex, jurerva vf gur pbiranag
bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur znqr jvgu bhe snguref, jura ur oebhtug gurz bhg
bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg.

8:22 Naq Fbybzba fgbbq orsber gur nygne bs gur YBEQ va gur cerfrapr bs
nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry, naq fcernq sbegu uvf unaqf gbjneq
urnira: 8:23 Naq ur fnvq, YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, gurer vf ab Tbq yvxr
gurr, va urnira nobir, be ba rnegu orarngu, jub xrrcrfg pbiranag naq
zrepl jvgu gul freinagf gung jnyx orsber gurr jvgu nyy gurve urneg:
8:24 Jub unfg xrcg jvgu gul freinag Qnivq zl sngure gung gubh
cebzvfrqfg uvz: gubh fcnxrfg nyfb jvgu gul zbhgu, naq unfg shysvyyrq
vg jvgu guvar unaq, nf vg vf guvf qnl.

8:25 Gurersber abj, YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, xrrc jvgu gul freinag Qnivq zl
sngure gung gubh cebzvfrqfg uvz, fnlvat, Gurer funyy abg snvy gurr n
zna va zl fvtug gb fvg ba gur guebar bs Vfenry; fb gung gul puvyqera
gnxr urrq gb gurve jnl, gung gurl jnyx orsber zr nf gubh unfg jnyxrq
orsber zr.

8:26 Naq abj, B Tbq bs Vfenry, yrg gul jbeq, V cenl gurr, or irevsvrq,
juvpu gubh fcnxrfg hagb gul freinag Qnivq zl sngure.

8:27 Ohg jvyy Tbq vaqrrq qjryy ba gur rnegu? orubyq, gur urnira naq
urnira bs urniraf pnaabg pbagnva gurr; ubj zhpu yrff guvf ubhfr gung V
unir ohvyqrq?  8:28 Lrg unir gubh erfcrpg hagb gur cenlre bs gul
freinag, naq gb uvf fhccyvpngvba, B YBEQ zl Tbq, gb urnexra hagb gur
pel naq gb gur cenlre, juvpu gul freinag cenlrgu orsber gurr gb qnl:
8:29 Gung guvar rlrf znl or bcra gbjneq guvf ubhfr avtug naq qnl, rira
gbjneq gur cynpr bs juvpu gubh unfg fnvq, Zl anzr funyy or gurer: gung
gubh znlrfg urnexra hagb gur cenlre juvpu gul freinag funyy znxr
gbjneq guvf cynpr.

8:30 Naq urnexra gubh gb gur fhccyvpngvba bs gul freinag, naq bs gul
crbcyr Vfenry, jura gurl funyy cenl gbjneq guvf cynpr: naq urne gubh
va urnira gul qjryyvat cynpr: naq jura gubh urnerfg, sbetvir.

8:31 Vs nal zna gerfcnff ntnvafg uvf arvtuobhe, naq na bngu or ynvq
hcba uvz gb pnhfr uvz gb fjrne, naq gur bngu pbzr orsber guvar nygne
va guvf ubhfr: 8:32 Gura urne gubh va urnira, naq qb, naq whqtr gul
freinagf, pbaqrzavat gur jvpxrq, gb oevat uvf jnl hcba uvf urnq; naq
whfgvslvat gur evtugrbhf, gb tvir uvz nppbeqvat gb uvf evtugrbhfarff.

8:33 Jura gul crbcyr Vfenry or fzvggra qbja orsber gur rarzl, orpnhfr
gurl unir fvaarq ntnvafg gurr, naq funyy ghea ntnva gb gurr, naq
pbasrff gul anzr, naq cenl, naq znxr fhccyvpngvba hagb gurr va guvf
ubhfr: 8:34 Gura urne gubh va urnira, naq sbetvir gur fva bs gul
crbcyr Vfenry, naq oevat gurz ntnva hagb gur ynaq juvpu gubh tnirfg
hagb gurve snguref.

8:35 Jura urnira vf fuhg hc, naq gurer vf ab enva, orpnhfr gurl unir
fvaarq ntnvafg gurr; vs gurl cenl gbjneq guvf cynpr, naq pbasrff gul
anzr, naq ghea sebz gurve fva, jura gubh nssyvpgrfg gurz: 8:36 Gura
urne gubh va urnira, naq sbetvir gur fva bs gul freinagf, naq bs gul
crbcyr Vfenry, gung gubh grnpu gurz gur tbbq jnl jurerva gurl fubhyq
jnyx, naq tvir enva hcba gul ynaq, juvpu gubh unfg tvira gb gul crbcyr
sbe na vaurevgnapr.

8:37 Vs gurer or va gur ynaq snzvar, vs gurer or crfgvyrapr, oynfgvat,
zvyqrj, ybphfg, be vs gurer or pngrecvyyre; vs gurve rarzl orfvrtr
gurz va gur ynaq bs gurve pvgvrf; jungfbrire cynthr, jungfbrire
fvpxarff gurer or; 8:38 Jung cenlre naq fhccyvpngvba fbrire or znqr ol
nal zna, be ol nyy gul crbcyr Vfenry, juvpu funyy xabj rirel zna gur
cynthr bs uvf bja urneg, naq fcernq sbegu uvf unaqf gbjneq guvf ubhfr:
8:39 Gura urne gubh va urnira gul qjryyvat cynpr, naq sbetvir, naq qb,
naq tvir gb rirel zna nppbeqvat gb uvf jnlf, jubfr urneg gubh xabjrfg;
(sbe gubh, rira gubh bayl, xabjrfg gur urnegf bs nyy gur puvyqera bs
zra;) 8:40 Gung gurl znl srne gurr nyy gur qnlf gung gurl yvir va gur
ynaq juvpu gubh tnirfg hagb bhe snguref.

8:41 Zberbire pbapreavat n fgenatre, gung vf abg bs gul crbcyr Vfenry,
ohg pbzrgu bhg bs n sne pbhagel sbe gul anzr'f fnxr; 8:42 (Sbe gurl
funyy urne bs gul terng anzr, naq bs gul fgebat unaq, naq bs gul
fgergpurq bhg nez;) jura ur funyy pbzr naq cenl gbjneq guvf ubhfr;
8:43 Urne gubh va urnira gul qjryyvat cynpr, naq qb nppbeqvat gb nyy
gung gur fgenatre pnyyrgu gb gurr sbe: gung nyy crbcyr bs gur rnegu
znl xabj gul anzr, gb srne gurr, nf qb gul crbcyr Vfenry; naq gung
gurl znl xabj gung guvf ubhfr, juvpu V unir ohvyqrq, vf pnyyrq ol gul
anzr.

8:44 Vs gul crbcyr tb bhg gb onggyr ntnvafg gurve rarzl, juvgurefbrire
gubh funyg fraq gurz, naq funyy cenl hagb gur YBEQ gbjneq gur pvgl
juvpu gubh unfg pubfra, naq gbjneq gur ubhfr gung V unir ohvyg sbe gul
anzr: 8:45 Gura urne gubh va urnira gurve cenlre naq gurve
fhccyvpngvba, naq znvagnva gurve pnhfr.

8:46 Vs gurl fva ntnvafg gurr, (sbe gurer vf ab zna gung fvaargu abg,)
naq gubh or natel jvgu gurz, naq qryvire gurz gb gur rarzl, fb gung
gurl pneel gurz njnl pncgvirf hagb gur ynaq bs gur rarzl, sne be arne;
8:47 Lrg vs gurl funyy orguvax gurzfryirf va gur ynaq juvgure gurl
jrer pneevrq pncgvirf, naq ercrag, naq znxr fhccyvpngvba hagb gurr va
gur ynaq bs gurz gung pneevrq gurz pncgvirf, fnlvat, Jr unir fvaarq,
naq unir qbar creirefryl, jr unir pbzzvggrq jvpxrqarff; 8:48 Naq fb
erghea hagb gurr jvgu nyy gurve urneg, naq jvgu nyy gurve fbhy, va gur
ynaq bs gurve rarzvrf, juvpu yrq gurz njnl pncgvir, naq cenl hagb gurr
gbjneq gurve ynaq, juvpu gubh tnirfg hagb gurve snguref, gur pvgl
juvpu gubh unfg pubfra, naq gur ubhfr juvpu V unir ohvyg sbe gul anzr:
8:49 Gura urne gubh gurve cenlre naq gurve fhccyvpngvba va urnira gul
qjryyvat cynpr, naq znvagnva gurve pnhfr, 8:50 Naq sbetvir gul crbcyr
gung unir fvaarq ntnvafg gurr, naq nyy gurve genafterffvbaf jurerva
gurl unir genafterffrq ntnvafg gurr, naq tvir gurz pbzcnffvba orsber
gurz jub pneevrq gurz pncgvir, gung gurl znl unir pbzcnffvba ba gurz:
8:51 Sbe gurl or gul crbcyr, naq guvar vaurevgnapr, juvpu gubh
oebhtugrfg sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg, sebz gur zvqfg bs gur sheanpr bs veba:
8:52 Gung guvar rlrf znl or bcra hagb gur fhccyvpngvba bs gul freinag,
naq hagb gur fhccyvpngvba bs gul crbcyr Vfenry, gb urnexra hagb gurz
va nyy gung gurl pnyy sbe hagb gurr.

8:53 Sbe gubh qvqfg frcnengr gurz sebz nzbat nyy gur crbcyr bs gur
rnegu, gb or guvar vaurevgnapr, nf gubh fcnxrfg ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf
gul freinag, jura gubh oebhtugrfg bhe snguref bhg bs Rtlcg, B YBEQ
Tbq.

8:54 Naq vg jnf fb, gung jura Fbybzba unq znqr na raq bs cenlvat nyy
guvf cenlre naq fhccyvpngvba hagb gur YBEQ, ur nebfr sebz orsber gur
nygne bs gur YBEQ, sebz xarryvat ba uvf xarrf jvgu uvf unaqf fcernq hc
gb urnira.

8:55 Naq ur fgbbq, naq oyrffrq nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry jvgu n
ybhq ibvpr, fnlvat, 8:56 Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ, gung ungu tvira erfg
hagb uvf crbcyr Vfenry, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung ur cebzvfrq: gurer ungu
abg snvyrq bar jbeq bs nyy uvf tbbq cebzvfr, juvpu ur cebzvfrq ol gur
unaq bs Zbfrf uvf freinag.

8:57 Gur YBEQ bhe Tbq or jvgu hf, nf ur jnf jvgu bhe snguref: yrg uvz
abg yrnir hf, abe sbefnxr hf: 8:58 Gung ur znl vapyvar bhe urnegf hagb
uvz, gb jnyx va nyy uvf jnlf, naq gb xrrc uvf pbzznaqzragf, naq uvf
fgnghgrf, naq uvf whqtzragf, juvpu ur pbzznaqrq bhe snguref.

8:59 Naq yrg gurfr zl jbeqf, jurerjvgu V unir znqr fhccyvpngvba orsber
gur YBEQ, or avtu hagb gur YBEQ bhe Tbq qnl naq avtug, gung ur
znvagnva gur pnhfr bs uvf freinag, naq gur pnhfr bs uvf crbcyr Vfenry
ng nyy gvzrf, nf gur znggre funyy erdhver: 8:60 Gung nyy gur crbcyr bs
gur rnegu znl xabj gung gur YBEQ vf Tbq, naq gung gurer vf abar ryfr.

8:61 Yrg lbhe urneg gurersber or cresrpg jvgu gur YBEQ bhe Tbq, gb
jnyx va uvf fgnghgrf, naq gb xrrc uvf pbzznaqzragf, nf ng guvf qnl.

8:62 Naq gur xvat, naq nyy Vfenry jvgu uvz, bssrerq fnpevsvpr orsber
gur YBEQ.

8:63 Naq Fbybzba bssrerq n fnpevsvpr bs crnpr bssrevatf, juvpu ur
bssrerq hagb gur YBEQ, gjb naq gjragl gubhfnaq bkra, naq na uhaqerq
naq gjragl gubhfnaq furrc. Fb gur xvat naq nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
qrqvpngrq gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

8:64 Gur fnzr qnl qvq gur xvat unyybj gur zvqqyr bs gur pbheg gung jnf
orsber gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ: sbe gurer ur bssrerq oheag bssrevatf,
naq zrng bssrevatf, naq gur sng bs gur crnpr bssrevatf: orpnhfr gur
oenfra nygne gung jnf orsber gur YBEQ jnf gbb yvggyr gb erprvir gur
oheag bssrevatf, naq zrng bssrevatf, naq gur sng bs gur crnpr
bssrevatf.

8:65 Naq ng gung gvzr Fbybzba uryq n srnfg, naq nyy Vfenry jvgu uvz, n
terng pbatertngvba, sebz gur ragrevat va bs Unzngu hagb gur evire bs
Rtlcg, orsber gur YBEQ bhe Tbq, frira qnlf naq frira qnlf, rira
sbhegrra qnlf.

8:66 Ba gur rvtugu qnl ur frag gur crbcyr njnl: naq gurl oyrffrq gur
xvat, naq jrag hagb gurve gragf wblshy naq tynq bs urneg sbe nyy gur
tbbqarff gung gur YBEQ unq qbar sbe Qnivq uvf freinag, naq sbe Vfenry
uvf crbcyr.

9:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Fbybzba unq svavfurq gur ohvyqvat bs gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq gur xvat'f ubhfr, naq nyy Fbybzba'f qrfver
juvpu ur jnf cyrnfrq gb qb, 9:2 Gung gur YBEQ nccrnerq gb Fbybzba gur
frpbaq gvzr, nf ur unq nccrnerq hagb uvz ng Tvorba.

9:3 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, V unir urneq gul cenlre naq gul
fhccyvpngvba, gung gubh unfg znqr orsber zr: V unir unyybjrq guvf
ubhfr, juvpu gubh unfg ohvyg, gb chg zl anzr gurer sbe rire; naq zvar
rlrf naq zvar urneg funyy or gurer crecrghnyyl.

9:4 Naq vs gubh jvyg jnyx orsber zr, nf Qnivq gul sngure jnyxrq, va
vagrtevgl bs urneg, naq va hcevtugarff, gb qb nppbeqvat gb nyy gung V
unir pbzznaqrq gurr, naq jvyg xrrc zl fgnghgrf naq zl whqtzragf: 9:5
Gura V jvyy rfgnoyvfu gur guebar bs gul xvatqbz hcba Vfenry sbe rire,
nf V cebzvfrq gb Qnivq gul sngure, fnlvat, Gurer funyy abg snvy gurr n
zna hcba gur guebar bs Vfenry.

9:6 Ohg vs lr funyy ng nyy ghea sebz sbyybjvat zr, lr be lbhe
puvyqera, naq jvyy abg xrrc zl pbzznaqzragf naq zl fgnghgrf juvpu V
unir frg orsber lbh, ohg tb naq freir bgure tbqf, naq jbefuvc gurz:
9:7 Gura jvyy V phg bss Vfenry bhg bs gur ynaq juvpu V unir tvira
gurz; naq guvf ubhfr, juvpu V unir unyybjrq sbe zl anzr, jvyy V pnfg
bhg bs zl fvtug; naq Vfenry funyy or n cebireo naq n oljbeq nzbat nyy
crbcyr: 9:8 Naq ng guvf ubhfr, juvpu vf uvtu, rirel bar gung cnffrgu
ol vg funyy or nfgbavfurq, naq funyy uvff; naq gurl funyy fnl, Jul
ungu gur YBEQ qbar guhf hagb guvf ynaq, naq gb guvf ubhfr?  9:9 Naq
gurl funyy nafjre, Orpnhfr gurl sbefbbx gur YBEQ gurve Tbq, jub
oebhtug sbegu gurve snguref bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, naq unir gnxra
ubyq hcba bgure tbqf, naq unir jbefuvccrq gurz, naq freirq gurz:
gurersber ungu gur YBEQ oebhtug hcba gurz nyy guvf rivy.

9:10 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur raq bs gjragl lrnef, jura Fbybzba unq
ohvyg gur gjb ubhfrf, gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq gur xvat'f ubhfr,
9:11 (Abj Uvenz gur xvat bs Gler unq sheavfurq Fbybzba jvgu prqne
gerrf naq sve gerrf, naq jvgu tbyq, nppbeqvat gb nyy uvf qrfver,) gung
gura xvat Fbybzba tnir Uvenz gjragl pvgvrf va gur ynaq bs Tnyvyrr.

9:12 Naq Uvenz pnzr bhg sebz Gler gb frr gur pvgvrf juvpu Fbybzba unq
tvira uvz; naq gurl cyrnfrq uvz abg.

9:13 Naq ur fnvq, Jung pvgvrf ner gurfr juvpu gubh unfg tvira zr, zl
oebgure? Naq ur pnyyrq gurz gur ynaq bs Pnohy hagb guvf qnl.

9:14 Naq Uvenz frag gb gur xvat fvkfpber gnyragf bs tbyq.

9:15 Naq guvf vf gur ernfba bs gur yril juvpu xvat Fbybzba envfrq; sbe
gb ohvyq gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq uvf bja ubhfr, naq Zvyyb, naq gur
jnyy bs Wrehfnyrz, naq Unmbe, naq Zrtvqqb, naq Trmre.

9:16 Sbe Cunenbu xvat bs Rtlcg unq tbar hc, naq gnxra Trmre, naq oheag
vg jvgu sver, naq fynva gur Pnannavgrf gung qjryg va gur pvgl, naq
tvira vg sbe n cerfrag hagb uvf qnhtugre, Fbybzba'f jvsr.

9:17 Naq Fbybzba ohvyg Trmre, naq Orguubeba gur argure, 9:18 Naq
Onnyngu, naq Gnqzbe va gur jvyqrearff, va gur ynaq, 9:19 Naq nyy gur
pvgvrf bs fgber gung Fbybzba unq, naq pvgvrf sbe uvf punevbgf, naq
pvgvrf sbe uvf ubefrzra, naq gung juvpu Fbybzba qrfverq gb ohvyq va
Wrehfnyrz, naq va Yronaba, naq va nyy gur ynaq bs uvf qbzvavba.

9:20 Naq nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer yrsg bs gur Nzbevgrf, Uvggvgrf,
Crevmmvgrf, Uvivgrf, naq Wrohfvgrf, juvpu jrer abg bs gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, 9:21 Gurve puvyqera gung jrer yrsg nsgre gurz va gur ynaq,
jubz gur puvyqera bs Vfenry nyfb jrer abg noyr hggreyl gb qrfgebl,
hcba gubfr qvq Fbybzba yril n gevohgr bs obaqfreivpr hagb guvf qnl.

9:22 Ohg bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq Fbybzba znxr ab obaqzra: ohg
gurl jrer zra bs jne, naq uvf freinagf, naq uvf cevaprf, naq uvf
pncgnvaf, naq ehyref bs uvf punevbgf, naq uvf ubefrzra.

9:23 Gurfr jrer gur puvrs bs gur bssvpref gung jrer bire Fbybzba'f
jbex, svir uhaqerq naq svsgl, juvpu oner ehyr bire gur crbcyr gung
jebhtug va gur jbex.

9:24 Ohg Cunenbu'f qnhtugre pnzr hc bhg bs gur pvgl bs Qnivq hagb ure
ubhfr juvpu Fbybzba unq ohvyg sbe ure: gura qvq ur ohvyq Zvyyb.

9:25 Naq guerr gvzrf va n lrne qvq Fbybzba bssre oheag bssrevatf naq
crnpr bssrevatf hcba gur nygne juvpu ur ohvyg hagb gur YBEQ, naq ur
oheag vaprafr hcba gur nygne gung jnf orsber gur YBEQ. Fb ur svavfurq
gur ubhfr.

9:26 Naq xvat Fbybzba znqr n anil bs fuvcf va Rmvbatrore, juvpu vf
orfvqr Rybgu, ba gur fuber bs gur Erq frn, va gur ynaq bs Rqbz.

9:27 Naq Uvenz frag va gur anil uvf freinagf, fuvczra gung unq
xabjyrqtr bs gur frn, jvgu gur freinagf bs Fbybzba.

9:28 Naq gurl pnzr gb Bcuve, naq srgpurq sebz gurapr tbyq, sbhe
uhaqerq naq gjragl gnyragf, naq oebhtug vg gb xvat Fbybzba.

10:1 Naq jura gur dhrra bs Furon urneq bs gur snzr bs Fbybzba
pbapreavat gur anzr bs gur YBEQ, fur pnzr gb cebir uvz jvgu uneq
dhrfgvbaf.

10:2 Naq fur pnzr gb Wrehfnyrz jvgu n irel terng genva, jvgu pnzryf
gung oner fcvprf, naq irel zhpu tbyq, naq cerpvbhf fgbarf: naq jura
fur jnf pbzr gb Fbybzba, fur pbzzharq jvgu uvz bs nyy gung jnf va ure
urneg.

10:3 Naq Fbybzba gbyq ure nyy ure dhrfgvbaf: gurer jnf abg nal guvat
uvq sebz gur xvat, juvpu ur gbyq ure abg.

10:4 Naq jura gur dhrra bs Furon unq frra nyy Fbybzba'f jvfqbz, naq
gur ubhfr gung ur unq ohvyg, 10:5 Naq gur zrng bs uvf gnoyr, naq gur
fvggvat bs uvf freinagf, naq gur nggraqnapr bs uvf zvavfgref, naq
gurve nccnery, naq uvf phcorneref, naq uvf nfprag ol juvpu ur jrag hc
hagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ; gurer jnf ab zber fcvevg va ure.

10:6 Naq fur fnvq gb gur xvat, Vg jnf n gehr ercbeg gung V urneq va
zvar bja ynaq bs gul npgf naq bs gul jvfqbz.

10:7 Ubjorvg V oryvrirq abg gur jbeqf, hagvy V pnzr, naq zvar rlrf unq
frra vg: naq, orubyq, gur unys jnf abg gbyq zr: gul jvfqbz naq
cebfcrevgl rkprrqrgu gur snzr juvpu V urneq.

10:8 Unccl ner gul zra, unccl ner gurfr gul freinagf, juvpu fgnaq
pbagvahnyyl orsber gurr, naq gung urne gul jvfqbz.

10:9 Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ gul Tbq, juvpu qryvtugrq va gurr, gb frg gurr
ba gur guebar bs Vfenry: orpnhfr gur YBEQ ybirq Vfenry sbe rire,
gurersber znqr ur gurr xvat, gb qb whqtzrag naq whfgvpr.

10:10 Naq fur tnir gur xvat na uhaqerq naq gjragl gnyragf bs tbyq, naq
bs fcvprf irel terng fgber, naq cerpvbhf fgbarf: gurer pnzr ab zber
fhpu nohaqnapr bs fcvprf nf gurfr juvpu gur dhrra bs Furon tnir gb
xvat Fbybzba.

10:11 Naq gur anil nyfb bs Uvenz, gung oebhtug tbyq sebz Bcuve,
oebhtug va sebz Bcuve terng cyragl bs nyzht gerrf, naq cerpvbhf
fgbarf.

10:12 Naq gur xvat znqr bs gur nyzht gerrf cvyynef sbe gur ubhfr bs
gur YBEQ, naq sbe gur xvat'f ubhfr, unecf nyfb naq cfnygrevrf sbe
fvatref: gurer pnzr ab fhpu nyzht gerrf, abe jrer frra hagb guvf qnl.

10:13 Naq xvat Fbybzba tnir hagb gur dhrra bs Furon nyy ure qrfver,
jungfbrire fur nfxrq, orfvqr gung juvpu Fbybzba tnir ure bs uvf eblny
obhagl.

Fb fur ghearq naq jrag gb ure bja pbhagel, fur naq ure freinagf.

10:14 Abj gur jrvtug bs tbyq gung pnzr gb Fbybzba va bar lrne jnf fvk
uhaqerq guerrfpber naq fvk gnyragf bs tbyq, 10:15 Orfvqr gung ur unq
bs gur zrepunagzra, naq bs gur genssvpx bs gur fcvpr zrepunagf, naq bs
nyy gur xvatf bs Nenovn, naq bs gur tbireabef bs gur pbhagel.

10:16 Naq xvat Fbybzba znqr gjb uhaqerq gnetrgf bs orngra tbyq: fvk
uhaqerq furxryf bs tbyq jrag gb bar gnetrg.

10:17 Naq ur znqr guerr uhaqerq fuvryqf bs orngra tbyq; guerr cbhaq bs
tbyq jrag gb bar fuvryq: naq gur xvat chg gurz va gur ubhfr bs gur
sberfg bs Yronaba.

10:18 Zberbire gur xvat znqr n terng guebar bs vibel, naq bireynvq vg
jvgu gur orfg tbyq.

10:19 Gur guebar unq fvk fgrcf, naq gur gbc bs gur guebar jnf ebhaq
oruvaq: naq gurer jrer fgnlf ba rvgure fvqr ba gur cynpr bs gur frng,
naq gjb yvbaf fgbbq orfvqr gur fgnlf.

10:20 Naq gjryir yvbaf fgbbq gurer ba gur bar fvqr naq ba gur bgure
hcba gur fvk fgrcf: gurer jnf abg gur yvxr znqr va nal xvatqbz.

10:21 Naq nyy xvat Fbybzba'f qevaxvat irffryf jrer bs tbyq, naq nyy
gur irffryf bs gur ubhfr bs gur sberfg bs Yronaba jrer bs cher tbyq;
abar jrer bs fvyire: vg jnf abguvat nppbhagrq bs va gur qnlf bs
Fbybzba.

10:22 Sbe gur xvat unq ng frn n anil bs Gunefuvfu jvgu gur anil bs
Uvenz: bapr va guerr lrnef pnzr gur anil bs Gunefuvfu, oevatvat tbyq,
naq fvyire, vibel, naq ncrf, naq crnpbpxf.

10:23 Fb xvat Fbybzba rkprrqrq nyy gur xvatf bs gur rnegu sbe evpurf
naq sbe jvfqbz.

10:24 Naq nyy gur rnegu fbhtug gb Fbybzba, gb urne uvf jvfqbz, juvpu
Tbq unq chg va uvf urneg.

10:25 Naq gurl oebhtug rirel zna uvf cerfrag, irffryf bs fvyire, naq
irffryf bs tbyq, naq tnezragf, naq nezbhe, naq fcvprf, ubefrf, naq
zhyrf, n engr lrne ol lrne.

10:26 Naq Fbybzba tngurerq gbtrgure punevbgf naq ubefrzra: naq ur unq
n gubhfnaq naq sbhe uhaqerq punevbgf, naq gjryir gubhfnaq ubefrzra,
jubz ur orfgbjrq va gur pvgvrf sbe punevbgf, naq jvgu gur xvat ng
Wrehfnyrz.

10:27 Naq gur xvat znqr fvyire gb or va Wrehfnyrz nf fgbarf, naq
prqnef znqr ur gb or nf gur flpbzber gerrf gung ner va gur inyr, sbe
nohaqnapr.

10:28 Naq Fbybzba unq ubefrf oebhtug bhg bs Rtlcg, naq yvara lnea: gur
xvat'f zrepunagf erprvirq gur yvara lnea ng n cevpr.

10:29 Naq n punevbg pnzr hc naq jrag bhg bs Rtlcg sbe fvk uhaqerq
furxryf bs fvyire, naq na ubefr sbe na uhaqerq naq svsgl: naq fb sbe
nyy gur xvatf bs gur Uvggvgrf, naq sbe gur xvatf bs Flevn, qvq gurl
oevat gurz bhg ol gurve zrnaf.

11:1 Ohg xvat Fbybzba ybirq znal fgenatr jbzra, gbtrgure jvgu gur
qnhtugre bs Cunenbu, jbzra bs gur Zbnovgrf, Nzzbavgrf, Rqbzvgrf,
Mvqbavnaf, naq Uvggvgrf: 11:2 Bs gur angvbaf pbapreavat juvpu gur YBEQ
fnvq hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, Lr funyy abg tb va gb gurz, arvgure
funyy gurl pbzr va hagb lbh: sbe fheryl gurl jvyy ghea njnl lbhe urneg
nsgre gurve tbqf: Fbybzba pynir hagb gurfr va ybir.

11:3 Naq ur unq frira uhaqerq jvirf, cevaprffrf, naq guerr uhaqerq
pbaphovarf: naq uvf jvirf ghearq njnl uvf urneg.

11:4 Sbe vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Fbybzba jnf byq, gung uvf jvirf ghearq
njnl uvf urneg nsgre bgure tbqf: naq uvf urneg jnf abg cresrpg jvgu
gur YBEQ uvf Tbq, nf jnf gur urneg bs Qnivq uvf sngure.

11:5 Sbe Fbybzba jrag nsgre Nfugbergu gur tbqqrff bs gur Mvqbavnaf,
naq nsgre Zvypbz gur nobzvangvba bs gur Nzzbavgrf.

11:6 Naq Fbybzba qvq rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, naq jrag abg shyyl
nsgre gur YBEQ, nf qvq Qnivq uvf sngure.

11:7 Gura qvq Fbybzba ohvyq na uvtu cynpr sbe Purzbfu, gur nobzvangvba
bs Zbno, va gur uvyy gung vf orsber Wrehfnyrz, naq sbe Zbyrpu, gur
nobzvangvba bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba.

11:8 Naq yvxrjvfr qvq ur sbe nyy uvf fgenatr jvirf, juvpu oheag
vaprafr naq fnpevsvprq hagb gurve tbqf.

11:9 Naq gur YBEQ jnf natel jvgu Fbybzba, orpnhfr uvf urneg jnf ghearq
sebz gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, juvpu unq nccrnerq hagb uvz gjvpr, 11:10
Naq unq pbzznaqrq uvz pbapreavat guvf guvat, gung ur fubhyq abg tb
nsgre bgure tbqf: ohg ur xrcg abg gung juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq.

11:11 Jurersber gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Fbybzba, Sbenfzhpu nf guvf vf qbar
bs gurr, naq gubh unfg abg xrcg zl pbiranag naq zl fgnghgrf, juvpu V
unir pbzznaqrq gurr, V jvyy fheryl eraq gur xvatqbz sebz gurr, naq
jvyy tvir vg gb gul freinag.

11:12 Abgjvgufgnaqvat va gul qnlf V jvyy abg qb vg sbe Qnivq gul
sngure'f fnxr: ohg V jvyy eraq vg bhg bs gur unaq bs gul fba.

11:13 Ubjorvg V jvyy abg eraq njnl nyy gur xvatqbz; ohg jvyy tvir bar
gevor gb gul fba sbe Qnivq zl freinag'f fnxr, naq sbe Wrehfnyrz'f fnxr
juvpu V unir pubfra.

11:14 Naq gur YBEQ fgveerq hc na nqirefnel hagb Fbybzba, Unqnq gur
Rqbzvgr: ur jnf bs gur xvat'f frrq va Rqbz.

11:15 Sbe vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Qnivq jnf va Rqbz, naq Wbno gur
pncgnva bs gur ubfg jnf tbar hc gb ohel gur fynva, nsgre ur unq
fzvggra rirel znyr va Rqbz; 11:16 (Sbe fvk zbaguf qvq Wbno erznva
gurer jvgu nyy Vfenry, hagvy ur unq phg bss rirel znyr va Rqbz:) 11:17
Gung Unqnq syrq, ur naq pregnva Rqbzvgrf bs uvf sngure'f freinagf jvgu
uvz, gb tb vagb Rtlcg; Unqnq orvat lrg n yvggyr puvyq.

11:18 Naq gurl nebfr bhg bs Zvqvna, naq pnzr gb Cnena: naq gurl gbbx
zra jvgu gurz bhg bs Cnena, naq gurl pnzr gb Rtlcg, hagb Cunenbu xvat
bs Rtlcg; juvpu tnir uvz na ubhfr, naq nccbvagrq uvz ivpghnyf, naq
tnir uvz ynaq.

11:19 Naq Unqnq sbhaq terng snibhe va gur fvtug bs Cunenbu, fb gung ur
tnir uvz gb jvsr gur fvfgre bs uvf bja jvsr, gur fvfgre bs Gnucrarf
gur dhrra.

11:20 Naq gur fvfgre bs Gnucrarf oner uvz Trahongu uvf fba, jubz
Gnucrarf jrnarq va Cunenbu'f ubhfr: naq Trahongu jnf va Cunenbu'f
ubhfrubyq nzbat gur fbaf bs Cunenbu.

11:21 Naq jura Unqnq urneq va Rtlcg gung Qnivq fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref,
naq gung Wbno gur pncgnva bs gur ubfg jnf qrnq, Unqnq fnvq gb Cunenbu,
Yrg zr qrcneg, gung V znl tb gb zvar bja pbhagel.

11:22 Gura Cunenbu fnvq hagb uvz, Ohg jung unfg gubh ynpxrq jvgu zr,
gung, orubyq, gubh frrxrfg gb tb gb guvar bja pbhagel? Naq ur
nafjrerq, Abguvat: ubjorvg yrg zr tb va nal jvfr.

11:23 Naq Tbq fgveerq uvz hc nabgure nqirefnel, Ermba gur fba bs
Ryvnqnu, juvpu syrq sebz uvf ybeq Unqnqrmre xvat bs Mbonu: 11:24 Naq
ur tngurerq zra hagb uvz, naq orpnzr pncgnva bire n onaq, jura Qnivq
fyrj gurz bs Mbonu: naq gurl jrag gb Qnznfphf, naq qjryg gurerva, naq
ervtarq va Qnznfphf.

11:25 Naq ur jnf na nqirefnel gb Vfenry nyy gur qnlf bs Fbybzba,
orfvqr gur zvfpuvrs gung Unqnq qvq: naq ur noubeerq Vfenry, naq
ervtarq bire Flevn.

11:26 Naq Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, na Rcuenguvgr bs Mrerqn,
Fbybzba'f freinag, jubfr zbgure'f anzr jnf Mrehnu, n jvqbj jbzna, rira
ur yvsgrq hc uvf unaq ntnvafg gur xvat.

11:27 Naq guvf jnf gur pnhfr gung ur yvsgrq hc uvf unaq ntnvafg gur
xvat: Fbybzba ohvyg Zvyyb, naq ercnverq gur oernpurf bs gur pvgl bs
Qnivq uvf sngure.

11:28 Naq gur zna Wrebobnz jnf n zvtugl zna bs inybhe: naq Fbybzba
frrvat gur lbhat zna gung ur jnf vaqhfgevbhf, ur znqr uvz ehyre bire
nyy gur punetr bs gur ubhfr bs Wbfrcu.

11:29 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gung gvzr jura Wrebobnz jrag bhg bs
Wrehfnyrz, gung gur cebcurg Nuvwnu gur Fuvybavgr sbhaq uvz va gur jnl;
naq ur unq pynq uvzfrys jvgu n arj tnezrag; naq gurl gjb jrer nybar va
gur svryq: 11:30 Naq Nuvwnu pnhtug gur arj tnezrag gung jnf ba uvz,
naq erag vg va gjryir cvrprf: 11:31 Naq ur fnvq gb Wrebobnz, Gnxr gurr
gra cvrprf: sbe guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, gur Tbq bs Vfenry, Orubyq, V jvyy
eraq gur xvatqbz bhg bs gur unaq bs Fbybzba, naq jvyy tvir gra gevorf
gb gurr: 11:32 (Ohg ur funyy unir bar gevor sbe zl freinag Qnivq'f
fnxr, naq sbe Wrehfnyrz'f fnxr, gur pvgl juvpu V unir pubfra bhg bs
nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry:) 11:33 Orpnhfr gung gurl unir sbefnxra zr,
naq unir jbefuvccrq Nfugbergu gur tbqqrff bs gur Mvqbavnaf, Purzbfu
gur tbq bs gur Zbnovgrf, naq Zvypbz gur tbq bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba,
naq unir abg jnyxrq va zl jnlf, gb qb gung juvpu vf evtug va zvar
rlrf, naq gb xrrc zl fgnghgrf naq zl whqtzragf, nf qvq Qnivq uvf
sngure.

11:34 Ubjorvg V jvyy abg gnxr gur jubyr xvatqbz bhg bs uvf unaq: ohg V
jvyy znxr uvz cevapr nyy gur qnlf bs uvf yvsr sbe Qnivq zl freinag'f
fnxr, jubz V pubfr, orpnhfr ur xrcg zl pbzznaqzragf naq zl fgnghgrf:
11:35 Ohg V jvyy gnxr gur xvatqbz bhg bs uvf fba'f unaq, naq jvyy tvir
vg hagb gurr, rira gra gevorf.

11:36 Naq hagb uvf fba jvyy V tvir bar gevor, gung Qnivq zl freinag
znl unir n yvtug nyjnl orsber zr va Wrehfnyrz, gur pvgl juvpu V unir
pubfra zr gb chg zl anzr gurer.

11:37 Naq V jvyy gnxr gurr, naq gubh funyg ervta nppbeqvat gb nyy gung
gul fbhy qrfvergu, naq funyg or xvat bire Vfenry.

11:38 Naq vg funyy or, vs gubh jvyg urnexra hagb nyy gung V pbzznaq
gurr, naq jvyg jnyx va zl jnlf, naq qb gung vf evtug va zl fvtug, gb
xrrc zl fgnghgrf naq zl pbzznaqzragf, nf Qnivq zl freinag qvq; gung V
jvyy or jvgu gurr, naq ohvyq gurr n fher ubhfr, nf V ohvyg sbe Qnivq,
naq jvyy tvir Vfenry hagb gurr.

11:39 Naq V jvyy sbe guvf nssyvpg gur frrq bs Qnivq, ohg abg sbe rire.

11:40 Fbybzba fbhtug gurersber gb xvyy Wrebobnz. Naq Wrebobnz nebfr,
naq syrq vagb Rtlcg, hagb Fuvfunx xvat bs Rtlcg, naq jnf va Rtlcg
hagvy gur qrngu bs Fbybzba.

11:41 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Fbybzba, naq nyy gung ur qvq, naq
uvf jvfqbz, ner gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur npgf bs Fbybzba?
11:42 Naq gur gvzr gung Fbybzba ervtarq va Wrehfnyrz bire nyy Vfenry
jnf sbegl lrnef.

11:43 Naq Fbybzba fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq jnf ohevrq va gur pvgl
bs Qnivq uvf sngure: naq Erubobnz uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

12:1 Naq Erubobnz jrag gb Furpurz: sbe nyy Vfenry jrer pbzr gb Furpurz
gb znxr uvz xvat.

12:2 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, jub jnf lrg
va Rtlcg, urneq bs vg, (sbe ur jnf syrq sebz gur cerfrapr bs xvat
Fbybzba, naq Wrebobnz qjryg va Rtlcg;) 12:3 Gung gurl frag naq pnyyrq
uvz. Naq Wrebobnz naq nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry pnzr, naq fcnxr
hagb Erubobnz, fnlvat, 12:4 Gul sngure znqr bhe lbxr tevribhf: abj
gurersber znxr gubh gur tevribhf freivpr bs gul sngure, naq uvf urnil
lbxr juvpu ur chg hcba hf, yvtugre, naq jr jvyy freir gurr.

12:5 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Qrcneg lrg sbe guerr qnlf, gura pbzr ntnva
gb zr. Naq gur crbcyr qrcnegrq.

12:6 Naq xvat Erubobnz pbafhygrq jvgu gur byq zra, gung fgbbq orsber
Fbybzba uvf sngure juvyr ur lrg yvirq, naq fnvq, Ubj qb lr nqivfr gung
V znl nafjre guvf crbcyr?  12:7 Naq gurl fcnxr hagb uvz, fnlvat, Vs
gubh jvyg or n freinag hagb guvf crbcyr guvf qnl, naq jvyg freir gurz,
naq nafjre gurz, naq fcrnx tbbq jbeqf gb gurz, gura gurl jvyy or gul
freinagf sbe rire.

12:8 Ohg ur sbefbbx gur pbhafry bs gur byq zra, juvpu gurl unq tvira
uvz, naq pbafhygrq jvgu gur lbhat zra gung jrer tebja hc jvgu uvz, naq
juvpu fgbbq orsber uvz: 12:9 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Jung pbhafry tvir
lr gung jr znl nafjre guvf crbcyr, jub unir fcbxra gb zr, fnlvat, Znxr
gur lbxr juvpu gul sngure qvq chg hcba hf yvtugre?  12:10 Naq gur
lbhat zra gung jrer tebja hc jvgu uvz fcnxr hagb uvz, fnlvat, Guhf
funyg gubh fcrnx hagb guvf crbcyr gung fcnxr hagb gurr, fnlvat, Gul
sngure znqr bhe lbxr urnil, ohg znxr gubh vg yvtugre hagb hf; guhf
funyg gubh fnl hagb gurz, Zl yvggyr svatre funyy or guvpxre guna zl
sngure'f ybvaf.

12:11 Naq abj jurernf zl sngure qvq ynqr lbh jvgu n urnil lbxr, V jvyy
nqq gb lbhe lbxr: zl sngure ungu punfgvfrq lbh jvgu juvcf, ohg V jvyy
punfgvfr lbh jvgu fpbecvbaf.

12:12 Fb Wrebobnz naq nyy gur crbcyr pnzr gb Erubobnz gur guveq qnl,
nf gur xvat unq nccbvagrq, fnlvat, Pbzr gb zr ntnva gur guveq qnl.

12:13 Naq gur xvat nafjrerq gur crbcyr ebhtuyl, naq sbefbbx gur byq
zra'f pbhafry gung gurl tnir uvz; 12:14 Naq fcnxr gb gurz nsgre gur
pbhafry bs gur lbhat zra, fnlvat, Zl sngure znqr lbhe lbxr urnil, naq
V jvyy nqq gb lbhe lbxr: zl sngure nyfb punfgvfrq lbh jvgu juvcf, ohg
V jvyy punfgvfr lbh jvgu fpbecvbaf.

12:15 Jurersber gur xvat urnexrarq abg hagb gur crbcyr; sbe gur pnhfr
jnf sebz gur YBEQ, gung ur zvtug cresbez uvf fnlvat, juvpu gur YBEQ
fcnxr ol Nuvwnu gur Fuvybavgr hagb Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong.

12:16 Fb jura nyy Vfenry fnj gung gur xvat urnexrarq abg hagb gurz,
gur crbcyr nafjrerq gur xvat, fnlvat, Jung cbegvba unir jr va Qnivq?
arvgure unir jr vaurevgnapr va gur fba bs Wrffr: gb lbhe gragf, B
Vfenry: abj frr gb guvar bja ubhfr, Qnivq. Fb Vfenry qrcnegrq hagb
gurve gragf.

12:17 Ohg nf sbe gur puvyqera bs Vfenry juvpu qjryg va gur pvgvrf bs
Whqnu, Erubobnz ervtarq bire gurz.

12:18 Gura xvat Erubobnz frag Nqbenz, jub jnf bire gur gevohgr; naq
nyy Vfenry fgbarq uvz jvgu fgbarf, gung ur qvrq. Gurersber xvat
Erubobnz znqr fcrrq gb trg uvz hc gb uvf punevbg, gb syrr gb
Wrehfnyrz.

12:19 Fb Vfenry eroryyrq ntnvafg gur ubhfr bs Qnivq hagb guvf qnl.

12:20 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura nyy Vfenry urneq gung Wrebobnz jnf
pbzr ntnva, gung gurl frag naq pnyyrq uvz hagb gur pbatertngvba, naq
znqr uvz xvat bire nyy Vfenry: gurer jnf abar gung sbyybjrq gur ubhfr
bs Qnivq, ohg gur gevor bs Whqnu bayl.

12:21 Naq jura Erubobnz jnf pbzr gb Wrehfnyrz, ur nffrzoyrq nyy gur
ubhfr bs Whqnu, jvgu gur gevor bs Orawnzva, na uhaqerq naq sbhefpber
gubhfnaq pubfra zra, juvpu jrer jneevbef, gb svtug ntnvafg gur ubhfr
bs Vfenry, gb oevat gur xvatqbz ntnva gb Erubobnz gur fba bs Fbybzba.

12:22 Ohg gur jbeq bs Tbq pnzr hagb Furznvnu gur zna bs Tbq, fnlvat,
12:23 Fcrnx hagb Erubobnz, gur fba bs Fbybzba, xvat bs Whqnu, naq hagb
nyy gur ubhfr bs Whqnu naq Orawnzva, naq gb gur erzanag bs gur crbcyr,
fnlvat, 12:24 Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Lr funyy abg tb hc, abe svtug
ntnvafg lbhe oerguera gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: erghea rirel zna gb uvf
ubhfr; sbe guvf guvat vf sebz zr. Gurl urnexrarq gurersber gb gur jbeq
bs gur YBEQ, naq erghearq gb qrcneg, nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur
YBEQ.

12:25 Gura Wrebobnz ohvyg Furpurz va zbhag Rcuenvz, naq qjryg gurerva;
naq jrag bhg sebz gurapr, naq ohvyg Crahry.

12:26 Naq Wrebobnz fnvq va uvf urneg, Abj funyy gur xvatqbz erghea gb
gur ubhfr bs Qnivq: 12:27 Vs guvf crbcyr tb hc gb qb fnpevsvpr va gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ ng Wrehfnyrz, gura funyy gur urneg bs guvf crbcyr
ghea ntnva hagb gurve ybeq, rira hagb Erubobnz xvat bs Whqnu, naq gurl
funyy xvyy zr, naq tb ntnva gb Erubobnz xvat bs Whqnu.

12:28 Jurerhcba gur xvat gbbx pbhafry, naq znqr gjb pnyirf bs tbyq,
naq fnvq hagb gurz, Vg vf gbb zhpu sbe lbh gb tb hc gb Wrehfnyrz:
orubyq gul tbqf, B Vfenry, juvpu oebhtug gurr hc bhg bs gur ynaq bs
Rtlcg.

12:29 Naq ur frg gur bar va Orgury, naq gur bgure chg ur va Qna.

12:30 Naq guvf guvat orpnzr n fva: sbe gur crbcyr jrag gb jbefuvc
orsber gur bar, rira hagb Qna.

12:31 Naq ur znqr na ubhfr bs uvtu cynprf, naq znqr cevrfgf bs gur
ybjrfg bs gur crbcyr, juvpu jrer abg bs gur fbaf bs Yriv.

12:32 Naq Wrebobnz beqnvarq n srnfg va gur rvtugu zbagu, ba gur
svsgrragu qnl bs gur zbagu, yvxr hagb gur srnfg gung vf va Whqnu, naq
ur bssrerq hcba gur nygne. Fb qvq ur va Orgury, fnpevsvpvat hagb gur
pnyirf gung ur unq znqr: naq ur cynprq va Orgury gur cevrfgf bs gur
uvtu cynprf juvpu ur unq znqr.

12:33 Fb ur bssrerq hcba gur nygne juvpu ur unq znqr va Orgury gur
svsgrragu qnl bs gur rvtugu zbagu, rira va gur zbagu juvpu ur unq
qrivfrq bs uvf bja urneg; naq beqnvarq n srnfg hagb gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry: naq ur bssrerq hcba gur nygne, naq oheag vaprafr.

13:1 Naq, orubyq, gurer pnzr n zna bs Tbq bhg bs Whqnu ol gur jbeq bs
gur YBEQ hagb Orgury: naq Wrebobnz fgbbq ol gur nygne gb ohea vaprafr.

13:2 Naq ur pevrq ntnvafg gur nygne va gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ, naq fnvq,
B nygne, nygne, guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ; Orubyq, n puvyq funyy or obea
hagb gur ubhfr bs Qnivq, Wbfvnu ol anzr; naq hcba gurr funyy ur bssre
gur cevrfgf bs gur uvtu cynprf gung ohea vaprafr hcba gurr, naq zra'f
obarf funyy or oheag hcba gurr.

13:3 Naq ur tnir n fvta gur fnzr qnl, fnlvat, Guvf vf gur fvta juvpu
gur YBEQ ungu fcbxra; Orubyq, gur nygne funyy or erag, naq gur nfurf
gung ner hcba vg funyy or cbherq bhg.

13:4 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura xvat Wrebobnz urneq gur fnlvat bs gur
zna bs Tbq, juvpu unq pevrq ntnvafg gur nygne va Orgury, gung ur chg
sbegu uvf unaq sebz gur nygne, fnlvat, Ynl ubyq ba uvz. Naq uvf unaq,
juvpu ur chg sbegu ntnvafg uvz, qevrq hc, fb gung ur pbhyq abg chyy vg
va ntnva gb uvz.

13:5 Gur nygne nyfb jnf erag, naq gur nfurf cbherq bhg sebz gur nygne,
nppbeqvat gb gur fvta juvpu gur zna bs Tbq unq tvira ol gur jbeq bs
gur YBEQ.

13:6 Naq gur xvat nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb gur zna bs Tbq, Vagerng abj
gur snpr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, naq cenl sbe zr, gung zl unaq znl or
erfgberq zr ntnva. Naq gur zna bs Tbq orfbhtug gur YBEQ, naq gur
xvat'f unaq jnf erfgberq uvz ntnva, naq orpnzr nf vg jnf orsber.

13:7 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb gur zna bs Tbq, Pbzr ubzr jvgu zr, naq
erserfu gulfrys, naq V jvyy tvir gurr n erjneq.

13:8 Naq gur zna bs Tbq fnvq hagb gur xvat, Vs gubh jvyg tvir zr unys
guvar ubhfr, V jvyy abg tb va jvgu gurr, arvgure jvyy V rng oernq abe
qevax jngre va guvf cynpr: 13:9 Sbe fb jnf vg punetrq zr ol gur jbeq
bs gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Rng ab oernq, abe qevax jngre, abe ghea ntnva ol
gur fnzr jnl gung gubh pnzrfg.

13:10 Fb ur jrag nabgure jnl, naq erghearq abg ol gur jnl gung ur pnzr
gb Orgury.

13:11 Abj gurer qjryg na byq cebcurg va Orgury; naq uvf fbaf pnzr naq
gbyq uvz nyy gur jbexf gung gur zna bs Tbq unq qbar gung qnl va
Orgury: gur jbeqf juvpu ur unq fcbxra hagb gur xvat, gurz gurl gbyq
nyfb gb gurve sngure.

13:12 Naq gurve sngure fnvq hagb gurz, Jung jnl jrag ur? Sbe uvf fbaf
unq frra jung jnl gur zna bs Tbq jrag, juvpu pnzr sebz Whqnu.

13:13 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvf fbaf, Fnqqyr zr gur nff. Fb gurl fnqqyrq
uvz gur nff: naq ur ebqr gurerba, 13:14 Naq jrag nsgre gur zna bs Tbq,
naq sbhaq uvz fvggvat haqre na bnx: naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Neg gubh gur
zna bs Tbq gung pnzrfg sebz Whqnu? Naq ur fnvq, V nz.

13:15 Gura ur fnvq hagb uvz, Pbzr ubzr jvgu zr, naq rng oernq.

13:16 Naq ur fnvq, V znl abg erghea jvgu gurr, abe tb va jvgu gurr:
arvgure jvyy V rng oernq abe qevax jngre jvgu gurr va guvf cynpr:
13:17 Sbe vg jnf fnvq gb zr ol gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ, Gubh funyg rng ab
oernq abe qevax jngre gurer, abe ghea ntnva gb tb ol gur jnl gung gubh
pnzrfg.

13:18 Ur fnvq hagb uvz, V nz n cebcurg nyfb nf gubh neg; naq na natry
fcnxr hagb zr ol gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Oevat uvz onpx jvgu
gurr vagb guvar ubhfr, gung ur znl rng oernq naq qevax jngre. Ohg ur
yvrq hagb uvz.

13:19 Fb ur jrag onpx jvgu uvz, naq qvq rng oernq va uvf ubhfr, naq
qenax jngre.

13:20 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf gurl fng ng gur gnoyr, gung gur jbeq bs
gur YBEQ pnzr hagb gur cebcurg gung oebhtug uvz onpx: 13:21 Naq ur
pevrq hagb gur zna bs Tbq gung pnzr sebz Whqnu, fnlvat, Guhf fnvgu gur
YBEQ, Sbenfzhpu nf gubh unfg qvfborlrq gur zbhgu bs gur YBEQ, naq unfg
abg xrcg gur pbzznaqzrag juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq pbzznaqrq gurr, 13:22
Ohg pnzrfg onpx, naq unfg rngra oernq naq qehax jngre va gur cynpr, bs
gur juvpu gur Ybeq qvq fnl gb gurr, Rng ab oernq, naq qevax ab jngre;
gul pnepnfr funyy abg pbzr hagb gur frchypuer bs gul snguref.

13:23 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nsgre ur unq rngra oernq, naq nsgre ur unq
qehax, gung ur fnqqyrq sbe uvz gur nff, gb jvg, sbe gur cebcurg jubz
ur unq oebhtug onpx.

13:24 Naq jura ur jnf tbar, n yvba zrg uvz ol gur jnl, naq fyrj uvz:
naq uvf pnepnfr jnf pnfg va gur jnl, naq gur nff fgbbq ol vg, gur yvba
nyfb fgbbq ol gur pnepnfr.

13:25 Naq, orubyq, zra cnffrq ol, naq fnj gur pnepnfr pnfg va gur jnl,
naq gur yvba fgnaqvat ol gur pnepnfr: naq gurl pnzr naq gbyq vg va gur
pvgl jurer gur byq cebcurg qjryg.

13:26 Naq jura gur cebcurg gung oebhtug uvz onpx sebz gur jnl urneq
gurerbs, ur fnvq, Vg vf gur zna bs Tbq, jub jnf qvfborqvrag hagb gur
jbeq bs gur YBEQ: gurersber gur YBEQ ungu qryvirerq uvz hagb gur yvba,
juvpu ungu gbea uvz, naq fynva uvz, nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ,
juvpu ur fcnxr hagb uvz.

13:27 Naq ur fcnxr gb uvf fbaf, fnlvat, Fnqqyr zr gur nff. Naq gurl
fnqqyrq uvz.

13:28 Naq ur jrag naq sbhaq uvf pnepnfr pnfg va gur jnl, naq gur nff
naq gur yvba fgnaqvat ol gur pnepnfr: gur yvba unq abg rngra gur
pnepnfr, abe gbea gur nff.

13:29 Naq gur cebcurg gbbx hc gur pnepnfr bs gur zna bs Tbq, naq ynvq
vg hcba gur nff, naq oebhtug vg onpx: naq gur byq cebcurg pnzr gb gur
pvgl, gb zbhea naq gb ohel uvz.

13:30 Naq ur ynvq uvf pnepnfr va uvf bja tenir; naq gurl zbhearq bire
uvz, fnlvat, Nynf, zl oebgure!  13:31 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nsgre ur
unq ohevrq uvz, gung ur fcnxr gb uvf fbaf, fnlvat, Jura V nz qrnq,
gura ohel zr va gur frchypuer jurerva gur zna bs Tbq vf ohevrq; ynl zl
obarf orfvqr uvf obarf: 13:32 Sbe gur fnlvat juvpu ur pevrq ol gur
jbeq bs gur YBEQ ntnvafg gur nygne va Orgury, naq ntnvafg nyy gur
ubhfrf bs gur uvtu cynprf juvpu ner va gur pvgvrf bs Fnznevn, funyy
fheryl pbzr gb cnff.

13:33 Nsgre guvf guvat Wrebobnz erghearq abg sebz uvf rivy jnl, ohg
znqr ntnva bs gur ybjrfg bs gur crbcyr cevrfgf bs gur uvtu cynprf:
jubfbrire jbhyq, ur pbafrpengrq uvz, naq ur orpnzr bar bs gur cevrfgf
bs gur uvtu cynprf.

13:34 Naq guvf guvat orpnzr fva hagb gur ubhfr bs Wrebobnz, rira gb
phg vg bss, naq gb qrfgebl vg sebz bss gur snpr bs gur rnegu.

14:1 Ng gung gvzr Novwnu gur fba bs Wrebobnz sryy fvpx.

14:2 Naq Wrebobnz fnvq gb uvf jvsr, Nevfr, V cenl gurr, naq qvfthvfr
gulfrys, gung gubh or abg xabja gb or gur jvsr bs Wrebobnz; naq trg
gurr gb Fuvybu: orubyq, gurer vf Nuvwnu gur cebcurg, juvpu gbyq zr
gung V fubhyq or xvat bire guvf crbcyr.

14:3 Naq gnxr jvgu gurr gra ybnirf, naq penpxaryf, naq n pehfr bs
ubarl, naq tb gb uvz: ur funyy gryy gurr jung funyy orpbzr bs gur
puvyq.

14:4 Naq Wrebobnz'f jvsr qvq fb, naq nebfr, naq jrag gb Fuvybu, naq
pnzr gb gur ubhfr bs Nuvwnu. Ohg Nuvwnu pbhyq abg frr; sbe uvf rlrf
jrer frg ol ernfba bs uvf ntr.

14:5 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Nuvwnu, Orubyq, gur jvsr bs Wrebobnz
pbzrgu gb nfx n guvat bs gurr sbe ure fba; sbe ur vf fvpx: guhf naq
guhf funyg gubh fnl hagb ure: sbe vg funyy or, jura fur pbzrgu va,
gung fur funyy srvta urefrys gb or nabgure jbzna.

14:6 Naq vg jnf fb, jura Nuvwnu urneq gur fbhaq bs ure srrg, nf fur
pnzr va ng gur qbbe, gung ur fnvq, Pbzr va, gubh jvsr bs Wrebobnz; jul
srvtarfg gubh gulfrys gb or nabgure? sbe V nz frag gb gurr jvgu urnil
gvqvatf.

14:7 Tb, gryy Wrebobnz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, Sbenfzhpu
nf V rknygrq gurr sebz nzbat gur crbcyr, naq znqr gurr cevapr bire zl
crbcyr Vfenry, 14:8 Naq erag gur xvatqbz njnl sebz gur ubhfr bs Qnivq,
naq tnir vg gurr: naq lrg gubh unfg abg orra nf zl freinag Qnivq, jub
xrcg zl pbzznaqzragf, naq jub sbyybjrq zr jvgu nyy uvf urneg, gb qb
gung bayl juvpu jnf evtug va zvar rlrf; 14:9 Ohg unfg qbar rivy nobir
nyy gung jrer orsber gurr: sbe gubh unfg tbar naq znqr gurr bgure
tbqf, naq zbygra vzntrf, gb cebibxr zr gb natre, naq unfg pnfg zr
oruvaq gul onpx: 14:10 Gurersber, orubyq, V jvyy oevat rivy hcba gur
ubhfr bs Wrebobnz, naq jvyy phg bss sebz Wrebobnz uvz gung cvffrgu
ntnvafg gur jnyy, naq uvz gung vf fuhg hc naq yrsg va Vfenry, naq jvyy
gnxr njnl gur erzanag bs gur ubhfr bs Wrebobnz, nf n zna gnxrgu njnl
qhat, gvyy vg or nyy tbar.

14:11 Uvz gung qvrgu bs Wrebobnz va gur pvgl funyy gur qbtf rng; naq
uvz gung qvrgu va gur svryq funyy gur sbjyf bs gur nve rng: sbe gur
YBEQ ungu fcbxra vg.

14:12 Nevfr gubh gurersber, trg gurr gb guvar bja ubhfr: naq jura gul
srrg ragre vagb gur pvgl, gur puvyq funyy qvr.

14:13 Naq nyy Vfenry funyy zbhea sbe uvz, naq ohel uvz: sbe ur bayl bs
Wrebobnz funyy pbzr gb gur tenir, orpnhfr va uvz gurer vf sbhaq fbzr
tbbq guvat gbjneq gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry va gur ubhfr bs Wrebobnz.

14:14 Zberbire gur YBEQ funyy envfr uvz hc n xvat bire Vfenry, jub
funyy phg bss gur ubhfr bs Wrebobnz gung qnl: ohg jung? rira abj.

14:15 Sbe gur YBEQ funyy fzvgr Vfenry, nf n errq vf funxra va gur
jngre, naq ur funyy ebbg hc Vfenry bhg bs guvf tbbq ynaq, juvpu ur
tnir gb gurve snguref, naq funyy fpnggre gurz orlbaq gur evire,
orpnhfr gurl unir znqr gurve tebirf, cebibxvat gur YBEQ gb natre.

14:16 Naq ur funyy tvir Vfenry hc orpnhfr bs gur fvaf bs Wrebobnz, jub
qvq fva, naq jub znqr Vfenry gb fva.

14:17 Naq Wrebobnz'f jvsr nebfr, naq qrcnegrq, naq pnzr gb Gvemnu: naq
jura fur pnzr gb gur guerfubyq bs gur qbbe, gur puvyq qvrq; 14:18 Naq
gurl ohevrq uvz; naq nyy Vfenry zbhearq sbe uvz, nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq
bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur fcnxr ol gur unaq bs uvf freinag Nuvwnu gur
cebcurg.

14:19 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wrebobnz, ubj ur jneerq, naq ubj ur
ervtarq, orubyq, gurl ner jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur
xvatf bs Vfenry.

14:20 Naq gur qnlf juvpu Wrebobnz ervtarq jrer gjb naq gjragl lrnef:
naq ur fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq Anqno uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

14:21 Naq Erubobnz gur fba bs Fbybzba ervtarq va Whqnu. Erubobnz jnf
sbegl naq bar lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur ervtarq
friragrra lrnef va Wrehfnyrz, gur pvgl juvpu gur YBEQ qvq pubbfr bhg
bs nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry, gb chg uvf anzr gurer. Naq uvf zbgure'f
anzr jnf Annznu na Nzzbavgrff.

14:22 Naq Whqnu qvq rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, naq gurl cebibxrq
uvz gb wrnybhfl jvgu gurve fvaf juvpu gurl unq pbzzvggrq, nobir nyy
gung gurve snguref unq qbar.

14:23 Sbe gurl nyfb ohvyg gurz uvtu cynprf, naq vzntrf, naq tebirf, ba
rirel uvtu uvyy, naq haqre rirel terra gerr.

14:24 Naq gurer jrer nyfb fbqbzvgrf va gur ynaq: naq gurl qvq
nppbeqvat gb nyy gur nobzvangvbaf bs gur angvbaf juvpu gur YBEQ pnfg
bhg orsber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

14:25 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur svsgu lrne bs xvat Erubobnz, gung
Fuvfunx xvat bs Rtlcg pnzr hc ntnvafg Wrehfnyrz: 14:26 Naq ur gbbx
njnl gur gernfherf bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq gur gernfherf bs gur
xvat'f ubhfr; ur rira gbbx njnl nyy: naq ur gbbx njnl nyy gur fuvryqf
bs tbyq juvpu Fbybzba unq znqr.

14:27 Naq xvat Erubobnz znqr va gurve fgrnq oenfra fuvryqf, naq
pbzzvggrq gurz hagb gur unaqf bs gur puvrs bs gur thneq, juvpu xrcg
gur qbbe bs gur xvat'f ubhfr.

14:28 Naq vg jnf fb, jura gur xvat jrag vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ,
gung gur thneq oner gurz, naq oebhtug gurz onpx vagb gur thneq
punzore.

14:29 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Erubobnz, naq nyy gung ur qvq, ner
gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu?
14:30 Naq gurer jnf jne orgjrra Erubobnz naq Wrebobnz nyy gurve qnlf.

14:31 Naq Erubobnz fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq jnf ohevrq jvgu uvf
snguref va gur pvgl bs Qnivq. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf Annznu na
Nzzbavgrff. Naq Novwnz uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

15:1 Abj va gur rvtugrragu lrne bs xvat Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong
ervtarq Novwnz bire Whqnu.

15:2 Guerr lrnef ervtarq ur va Wrehfnyrz. naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf
Znnpunu, gur qnhtugre bs Novfunybz.

15:3 Naq ur jnyxrq va nyy gur fvaf bs uvf sngure, juvpu ur unq qbar
orsber uvz: naq uvf urneg jnf abg cresrpg jvgu gur YBEQ uvf Tbq, nf
gur urneg bs Qnivq uvf sngure.

15:4 Arireguryrff sbe Qnivq'f fnxr qvq gur YBEQ uvf Tbq tvir uvz n
ynzc va Wrehfnyrz, gb frg hc uvf fba nsgre uvz, naq gb rfgnoyvfu
Wrehfnyrz: 15:5 Orpnhfr Qnivq qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur rlrf bs
gur YBEQ, naq ghearq abg nfvqr sebz nal guvat gung ur pbzznaqrq uvz
nyy gur qnlf bs uvf yvsr, fnir bayl va gur znggre bs Hevnu gur
Uvggvgr.

15:6 Naq gurer jnf jne orgjrra Erubobnz naq Wrebobnz nyy gur qnlf bs
uvf yvsr.

15:7 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Novwnz, naq nyy gung ur qvq, ner gurl
abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu? Naq
gurer jnf jne orgjrra Novwnz naq Wrebobnz.

15:8 Naq Novwnz fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref; naq gurl ohevrq uvz va gur
pvgl bs Qnivq: naq Nfn uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

15:9 Naq va gur gjragvrgu lrne bs Wrebobnz xvat bs Vfenry ervtarq Nfn
bire Whqnu.

15:10 Naq sbegl naq bar lrnef ervtarq ur va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf
zbgure'f anzr jnf Znnpunu, gur qnhtugre bs Novfunybz.

15:11 Naq Nfn qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur rlrf bs gur YBEQ, nf qvq
Qnivq uvf sngure.

15:12 Naq ur gbbx njnl gur fbqbzvgrf bhg bs gur ynaq, naq erzbirq nyy
gur vqbyf gung uvf snguref unq znqr.

15:13 Naq nyfb Znnpunu uvf zbgure, rira ure ur erzbirq sebz orvat
dhrra, orpnhfr fur unq znqr na vqby va n tebir; naq Nfn qrfgeblrq ure
vqby, naq oheag vg ol gur oebbx Xvqeba.

15:14 Ohg gur uvtu cynprf jrer abg erzbirq: arireguryrff Nfn'f urneg
jnf cresrpg jvgu gur YBEQ nyy uvf qnlf.

15:15 Naq ur oebhtug va gur guvatf juvpu uvf sngure unq qrqvpngrq, naq
gur guvatf juvpu uvzfrys unq qrqvpngrq, vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ,
fvyire, naq tbyq, naq irffryf.

15:16 Naq gurer jnf jne orgjrra Nfn naq Onnfun xvat bs Vfenry nyy
gurve qnlf.

15:17 Naq Onnfun xvat bs Vfenry jrag hc ntnvafg Whqnu, naq ohvyg
Enznu, gung ur zvtug abg fhssre nal gb tb bhg be pbzr va gb Nfn xvat
bs Whqnu.

15:18 Gura Nfn gbbx nyy gur fvyire naq gur tbyq gung jrer yrsg va gur
gernfherf bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq gur gernfherf bs gur xvat'f
ubhfr, naq qryvirerq gurz vagb gur unaq bs uvf freinagf: naq xvat Nfn
frag gurz gb Oraunqnq, gur fba bs Gnoevzba, gur fba bs Urmvba, xvat bs
Flevn, gung qjryg ng Qnznfphf, fnlvat, 15:19 Gurer vf n yrnthr orgjrra
zr naq gurr, naq orgjrra zl sngure naq gul sngure: orubyq, V unir frag
hagb gurr n cerfrag bs fvyire naq tbyq; pbzr naq oernx gul yrnthr jvgu
Onnfun xvat bs Vfenry, gung ur znl qrcneg sebz zr.

15:20 Fb Oraunqnq urnexrarq hagb xvat Nfn, naq frag gur pncgnvaf bs
gur ubfgf juvpu ur unq ntnvafg gur pvgvrf bs Vfenry, naq fzbgr Vwba,
naq Qna, naq Noryorguznnpunu, naq nyy Pvaarebgu, jvgu nyy gur ynaq bs
Ancugnyv.

15:21 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Onnfun urneq gurerbs, gung ur yrsg bss
ohvyqvat bs Enznu, naq qjryg va Gvemnu.

15:22 Gura xvat Nfn znqr n cebpynzngvba guebhtubhg nyy Whqnu; abar jnf
rkrzcgrq: naq gurl gbbx njnl gur fgbarf bs Enznu, naq gur gvzore
gurerbs, jurerjvgu Onnfun unq ohvyqrq; naq xvat Nfn ohvyg jvgu gurz
Tron bs Orawnzva, naq Zvmcnu.

15:23 Gur erfg bs nyy gur npgf bs Nfn, naq nyy uvf zvtug, naq nyy gung
ur qvq, naq gur pvgvrf juvpu ur ohvyg, ner gurl abg jevggra va gur
obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu? Arireguryrff va gur gvzr
bs uvf byq ntr ur jnf qvfrnfrq va uvf srrg.

15:24 Naq Nfn fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq jnf ohevrq jvgu uvf snguref
va gur pvgl bs Qnivq uvf sngure: naq Wrubfuncung uvf fba ervtarq va
uvf fgrnq.

15:25 Naq Anqno gur fba bs Wrebobnz ortna gb ervta bire Vfenry va gur
frpbaq lrne bs Nfn xvat bs Whqnu, naq ervtarq bire Vfenry gjb lrnef.

15:26 Naq ur qvq rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, naq jnyxrq va gur jnl
bs uvf sngure, naq va uvf fva jurerjvgu ur znqr Vfenry gb fva.

15:27 Naq Onnfun gur fba bs Nuvwnu, bs gur ubhfr bs Vffnpune,
pbafcverq ntnvafg uvz; naq Onnfun fzbgr uvz ng Tvoorguba, juvpu
orybatrq gb gur Cuvyvfgvarf; sbe Anqno naq nyy Vfenry ynvq fvrtr gb
Tvoorguba.

15:28 Rira va gur guveq lrne bs Nfn xvat bs Whqnu qvq Onnfun fynl uvz,
naq ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

15:29 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura ur ervtarq, gung ur fzbgr nyy gur
ubhfr bs Wrebobnz; ur yrsg abg gb Wrebobnz nal gung oerngurq, hagvy ur
unq qrfgeblrq uvz, nppbeqvat hagb gur fnlvat bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur
fcnxr ol uvf freinag Nuvwnu gur Fuvybavgr: 15:30 Orpnhfr bs gur fvaf
bs Wrebobnz juvpu ur fvaarq, naq juvpu ur znqr Vfenry fva, ol uvf
cebibpngvba jurerjvgu ur cebibxrq gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry gb natre.

15:31 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Anqno, naq nyy gung ur qvq, ner gurl
abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry?
15:32 Naq gurer jnf jne orgjrra Nfn naq Onnfun xvat bs Vfenry nyy
gurve qnlf.

15:33 Va gur guveq lrne bs Nfn xvat bs Whqnu ortna Onnfun gur fba bs
Nuvwnu gb ervta bire nyy Vfenry va Gvemnu, gjragl naq sbhe lrnef.

15:34 Naq ur qvq rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, naq jnyxrq va gur jnl
bs Wrebobnz, naq va uvf fva jurerjvgu ur znqr Vfenry gb fva.

16:1 Gura gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr gb Wruh gur fba bs Unanav ntnvafg
