Onnfun, fnlvat, 16:2 Sbenfzhpu nf V rknygrq gurr bhg bs gur qhfg, naq
znqr gurr cevapr bire zl crbcyr Vfenry; naq gubh unfg jnyxrq va gur
jnl bs Wrebobnz, naq unfg znqr zl crbcyr Vfenry gb fva, gb cebibxr zr
gb natre jvgu gurve fvaf; 16:3 Orubyq, V jvyy gnxr njnl gur cbfgrevgl
bs Onnfun, naq gur cbfgrevgl bs uvf ubhfr; naq jvyy znxr gul ubhfr
yvxr gur ubhfr bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong.

16:4 Uvz gung qvrgu bs Onnfun va gur pvgl funyy gur qbtf rng; naq uvz
gung qvrgu bs uvf va gur svryqf funyy gur sbjyf bs gur nve rng.

16:5 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Onnfun, naq jung ur qvq, naq uvf
zvtug, ner gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf
bs Vfenry?  16:6 Fb Onnfun fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq jnf ohevrq va
Gvemnu: naq Rynu uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

16:7 Naq nyfb ol gur unaq bs gur cebcurg Wruh gur fba bs Unanav pnzr
gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ ntnvafg Onnfun, naq ntnvafg uvf ubhfr, rira sbe
nyy gur rivy gung ur qvq va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, va cebibxvat uvz gb
natre jvgu gur jbex bs uvf unaqf, va orvat yvxr gur ubhfr bs Wrebobnz;
naq orpnhfr ur xvyyrq uvz.

16:8 Va gur gjragl naq fvkgu lrne bs Nfn xvat bs Whqnu ortna Rynu gur
fba bs Onnfun gb ervta bire Vfenry va Gvemnu, gjb lrnef.

16:9 Naq uvf freinag Mvzev, pncgnva bs unys uvf punevbgf, pbafcverq
ntnvafg uvz, nf ur jnf va Gvemnu, qevaxvat uvzfrys qehax va gur ubhfr
bs Nemn fgrjneq bs uvf ubhfr va Gvemnu.

16:10 Naq Mvzev jrag va naq fzbgr uvz, naq xvyyrq uvz, va gur gjragl
naq friragu lrne bs Nfn xvat bs Whqnu, naq ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

16:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura ur ortna gb ervta, nf fbba nf ur fng
ba uvf guebar, gung ur fyrj nyy gur ubhfr bs Onnfun: ur yrsg uvz abg
bar gung cvffrgu ntnvafg n jnyy, arvgure bs uvf xvafsbyxf, abe bs uvf
sevraqf.

16:12 Guhf qvq Mvzev qrfgebl nyy gur ubhfr bs Onnfun, nppbeqvat gb gur
jbeq bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur fcnxr ntnvafg Onnfun ol Wruh gur cebcurg.

16:13 Sbe nyy gur fvaf bs Onnfun, naq gur fvaf bs Rynu uvf fba, ol
juvpu gurl fvaarq, naq ol juvpu gurl znqr Vfenry gb fva, va cebibxvat
gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry gb natre jvgu gurve inavgvrf.

16:14 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Rynu, naq nyy gung ur qvq, ner gurl
abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry?
16:15 Va gur gjragl naq friragu lrne bs Nfn xvat bs Whqnu qvq Mvzev
ervta frira qnlf va Gvemnu. Naq gur crbcyr jrer rapnzcrq ntnvafg
Tvoorguba, juvpu orybatrq gb gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

16:16 Naq gur crbcyr gung jrer rapnzcrq urneq fnl, Mvzev ungu
pbafcverq, naq ungu nyfb fynva gur xvat: jurersber nyy Vfenry znqr
Bzev, gur pncgnva bs gur ubfg, xvat bire Vfenry gung qnl va gur pnzc.

16:17 Naq Bzev jrag hc sebz Tvoorguba, naq nyy Vfenry jvgu uvz, naq
gurl orfvrtrq Gvemnu.

16:18 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Mvzev fnj gung gur pvgl jnf gnxra,
gung ur jrag vagb gur cnynpr bs gur xvat'f ubhfr, naq oheag gur xvat'f
ubhfr bire uvz jvgu sver, naq qvrq.

16:19 Sbe uvf fvaf juvpu ur fvaarq va qbvat rivy va gur fvtug bs gur
YBEQ, va jnyxvat va gur jnl bs Wrebobnz, naq va uvf fva juvpu ur qvq,
gb znxr Vfenry gb fva.

16:20 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Mvzev, naq uvf gernfba gung ur
jebhtug, ner gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur
xvatf bs Vfenry?  16:21 Gura jrer gur crbcyr bs Vfenry qvivqrq vagb
gjb cnegf: unys bs gur crbcyr sbyybjrq Gvoav gur fba bs Tvangu, gb
znxr uvz xvat; naq unys sbyybjrq Bzev.

16:22 Ohg gur crbcyr gung sbyybjrq Bzev cerinvyrq ntnvafg gur crbcyr
gung sbyybjrq Gvoav gur fba bs Tvangu: fb Gvoav qvrq, naq Bzev
ervtarq.

16:23 Va gur guvegl naq svefg lrne bs Nfn xvat bs Whqnu ortna Bzev gb
ervta bire Vfenry, gjryir lrnef: fvk lrnef ervtarq ur va Gvemnu.

16:24 Naq ur obhtug gur uvyy Fnznevn bs Furzre sbe gjb gnyragf bs
fvyire, naq ohvyg ba gur uvyy, naq pnyyrq gur anzr bs gur pvgl juvpu
ur ohvyg, nsgre gur anzr bs Furzre, bjare bs gur uvyy, Fnznevn.

16:25 Ohg Bzev jebhtug rivy va gur rlrf bs gur YBEQ, naq qvq jbefr
guna nyy gung jrer orsber uvz.

16:26 Sbe ur jnyxrq va nyy gur jnl bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, naq
va uvf fva jurerjvgu ur znqr Vfenry gb fva, gb cebibxr gur YBEQ Tbq bs
Vfenry gb natre jvgu gurve inavgvrf.

16:27 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Bzev juvpu ur qvq, naq uvf zvtug
gung ur furjrq, ner gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs
gur xvatf bs Vfenry?  16:28 Fb Bzev fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq jnf
ohevrq va Fnznevn: naq Nuno uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

16:29 Naq va gur guvegl naq rvtugu lrne bs Nfn xvat bs Whqnu ortna
Nuno gur fba bs Bzev gb ervta bire Vfenry: naq Nuno gur fba bs Bzev
ervtarq bire Vfenry va Fnznevn gjragl naq gjb lrnef.

16:30 Naq Nuno gur fba bs Bzev qvq rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ nobir
nyy gung jrer orsber uvz.

16:31 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf vs vg unq orra n yvtug guvat sbe uvz gb
jnyx va gur fvaf bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, gung ur gbbx gb jvsr
Wrmrory gur qnhtugre bs Rguonny xvat bs gur Mvqbavnaf, naq jrag naq
freirq Onny, naq jbefuvccrq uvz.

16:32 Naq ur ernerq hc na nygne sbe Onny va gur ubhfr bs Onny, juvpu
ur unq ohvyg va Fnznevn.

16:33 Naq Nuno znqr n tebir; naq Nuno qvq zber gb cebibxr gur YBEQ Tbq
bs Vfenry gb natre guna nyy gur xvatf bs Vfenry gung jrer orsber uvz.

16:34 Va uvf qnlf qvq Uvry gur Orguryvgr ohvyq Wrevpub: ur ynvq gur
sbhaqngvba gurerbs va Novenz uvf svefgobea, naq frg hc gur tngrf
gurerbs va uvf lbhatrfg fba Frtho, nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ,
juvpu ur fcnxr ol Wbfuhn gur fba bs Aha.

17:1 Naq Ryvwnu gur Gvfuovgr, jub jnf bs gur vaunovgnagf bs Tvyrnq,
fnvq hagb Nuno, Nf gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry yvirgu, orsber jubz V fgnaq,
gurer funyy abg or qrj abe enva gurfr lrnef, ohg nppbeqvat gb zl jbeq.

17:2 Naq gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr hagb uvz, fnlvat, 17:3 Trg gurr
urapr, naq ghea gurr rnfgjneq, naq uvqr gulfrys ol gur oebbx Purevgu,
gung vf orsber Wbeqna.

17:4 Naq vg funyy or, gung gubh funyg qevax bs gur oebbx; naq V unir
pbzznaqrq gur eniraf gb srrq gurr gurer.

17:5 Fb ur jrag naq qvq nppbeqvat hagb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ: sbe ur
jrag naq qjryg ol gur oebbx Purevgu, gung vf orsber Wbeqna.

17:6 Naq gur eniraf oebhtug uvz oernq naq syrfu va gur zbeavat, naq
oernq naq syrfu va gur riravat; naq ur qenax bs gur oebbx.

17:7 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre n juvyr, gung gur oebbx qevrq hc,
orpnhfr gurer unq orra ab enva va gur ynaq.

17:8 Naq gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr hagb uvz, fnlvat, 17:9 Nevfr, trg
gurr gb Mnercungu, juvpu orybatrgu gb Mvqba, naq qjryy gurer: orubyq,
V unir pbzznaqrq n jvqbj jbzna gurer gb fhfgnva gurr.

17:10 Fb ur nebfr naq jrag gb Mnercungu. Naq jura ur pnzr gb gur tngr
bs gur pvgl, orubyq, gur jvqbj jbzna jnf gurer tngurevat bs fgvpxf:
naq ur pnyyrq gb ure, naq fnvq, Srgpu zr, V cenl gurr, n yvggyr jngre
va n irffry, gung V znl qevax.

17:11 Naq nf fur jnf tbvat gb srgpu vg, ur pnyyrq gb ure, naq fnvq,
Oevat zr, V cenl gurr, n zbefry bs oernq va guvar unaq.

17:12 Naq fur fnvq, Nf gur YBEQ gul Tbq yvirgu, V unir abg n pnxr, ohg
na unaqshy bs zrny va n oneery, naq n yvggyr bvy va n pehfr: naq,
orubyq, V nz tngurevat gjb fgvpxf, gung V znl tb va naq qerff vg sbe
zr naq zl fba, gung jr znl rng vg, naq qvr.

17:13 Naq Ryvwnu fnvq hagb ure, Srne abg; tb naq qb nf gubh unfg fnvq:
ohg znxr zr gurerbs n yvggyr pnxr svefg, naq oevat vg hagb zr, naq
nsgre znxr sbe gurr naq sbe gul fba.

17:14 Sbe guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, Gur oneery bs zrny funyy
abg jnfgr, arvgure funyy gur pehfr bs bvy snvy, hagvy gur qnl gung gur
YBEQ fraqrgu enva hcba gur rnegu.

17:15 Naq fur jrag naq qvq nppbeqvat gb gur fnlvat bs Ryvwnu: naq fur,
naq ur, naq ure ubhfr, qvq rng znal qnlf.

17:16 Naq gur oneery bs zrny jnfgrq abg, arvgure qvq gur pehfr bs bvy
snvy, nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur fcnxr ol Ryvwnu.

17:17 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre gurfr guvatf, gung gur fba bs gur
jbzna, gur zvfgerff bs gur ubhfr, sryy fvpx; naq uvf fvpxarff jnf fb
fber, gung gurer jnf ab oerngu yrsg va uvz.

17:18 Naq fur fnvq hagb Ryvwnu, Jung unir V gb qb jvgu gurr, B gubh
zna bs Tbq? neg gubh pbzr hagb zr gb pnyy zl fva gb erzrzoenapr, naq
gb fynl zl fba?  17:19 Naq ur fnvq hagb ure, Tvir zr gul fba. Naq ur
gbbx uvz bhg bs ure obfbz, naq pneevrq uvz hc vagb n ybsg, jurer ur
nobqr, naq ynvq uvz hcba uvf bja orq.

17:20 Naq ur pevrq hagb gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, B YBEQ zl Tbq, unfg gubh
nyfb oebhtug rivy hcba gur jvqbj jvgu jubz V fbwbhea, ol fynlvat ure
fba?  17:21 Naq ur fgergpurq uvzfrys hcba gur puvyq guerr gvzrf, naq
pevrq hagb gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, B YBEQ zl Tbq, V cenl gurr, yrg guvf
puvyq'f fbhy pbzr vagb uvz ntnva.

17:22 Naq gur YBEQ urneq gur ibvpr bs Ryvwnu; naq gur fbhy bs gur
puvyq pnzr vagb uvz ntnva, naq ur erivirq.

17:23 Naq Ryvwnu gbbx gur puvyq, naq oebhtug uvz qbja bhg bs gur
punzore vagb gur ubhfr, naq qryvirerq uvz hagb uvf zbgure: naq Ryvwnu
fnvq, Frr, gul fba yvirgu.

17:24 Naq gur jbzna fnvq gb Ryvwnu, Abj ol guvf V xabj gung gubh neg n
zna bs Tbq, naq gung gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ va gul zbhgu vf gehgu.

18:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre znal qnlf, gung gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ
pnzr gb Ryvwnu va gur guveq lrne, fnlvat, Tb, furj gulfrys hagb Nuno;
naq V jvyy fraq enva hcba gur rnegu.

18:2 Naq Ryvwnu jrag gb furj uvzfrys hagb Nuno. Naq gurer jnf n fber
snzvar va Fnznevn.

18:3 Naq Nuno pnyyrq Bonqvnu, juvpu jnf gur tbireabe bs uvf ubhfr.
(Abj Bonqvnu srnerq gur YBEQ terngyl: 18:4 Sbe vg jnf fb, jura Wrmrory
phg bss gur cebcurgf bs gur YBEQ, gung Bonqvnu gbbx na uhaqerq
cebcurgf, naq uvq gurz ol svsgl va n pnir, naq srq gurz jvgu oernq naq
jngre.)  18:5 Naq Nuno fnvq hagb Bonqvnu, Tb vagb gur ynaq, hagb nyy
sbhagnvaf bs jngre, naq hagb nyy oebbxf: crenqiragher jr znl svaq
tenff gb fnir gur ubefrf naq zhyrf nyvir, gung jr ybfr abg nyy gur
ornfgf.

18:6 Fb gurl qvivqrq gur ynaq orgjrra gurz gb cnff guebhtubhg vg: Nuno
jrag bar jnl ol uvzfrys, naq Bonqvnu jrag nabgure jnl ol uvzfrys.

18:7 Naq nf Bonqvnu jnf va gur jnl, orubyq, Ryvwnu zrg uvz: naq ur
xarj uvz, naq sryy ba uvf snpr, naq fnvq, Neg gubh gung zl ybeq
Ryvwnu?  18:8 Naq ur nafjrerq uvz, V nz: tb, gryy gul ybeq, Orubyq,
Ryvwnu vf urer.

18:9 Naq ur fnvq, Jung unir V fvaarq, gung gubh jbhyqrfg qryvire gul
freinag vagb gur unaq bs Nuno, gb fynl zr?  18:10 Nf gur YBEQ gul Tbq
yvirgu, gurer vf ab angvba be xvatqbz, juvgure zl ybeq ungu abg frag
gb frrx gurr: naq jura gurl fnvq, Ur vf abg gurer; ur gbbx na bngu bs
gur xvatqbz naq angvba, gung gurl sbhaq gurr abg.

18:11 Naq abj gubh fnlrfg, Tb, gryy gul ybeq, Orubyq, Ryvwnu vf urer.

18:12 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, nf fbba nf V nz tbar sebz gurr, gung
gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ funyy pneel gurr juvgure V xabj abg; naq fb
jura V pbzr naq gryy Nuno, naq ur pnaabg svaq gurr, ur funyy fynl zr:
ohg V gul freinag srne gur YBEQ sebz zl lbhgu.

18:13 Jnf vg abg gbyq zl ybeq jung V qvq jura Wrmrory fyrj gur
cebcurgf bs gur YBEQ, ubj V uvq na uhaqerq zra bs gur YBEQ'f cebcurgf
ol svsgl va n pnir, naq srq gurz jvgu oernq naq jngre?  18:14 Naq abj
gubh fnlrfg, Tb, gryy gul ybeq, Orubyq, Ryvwnu vf urer: naq ur funyy
fynl zr.

18:15 Naq Ryvwnu fnvq, Nf gur YBEQ bs ubfgf yvirgu, orsber jubz V
fgnaq, V jvyy fheryl furj zlfrys hagb uvz gb qnl.

18:16 Fb Bonqvnu jrag gb zrrg Nuno, naq gbyq uvz: naq Nuno jrag gb
zrrg Ryvwnu.

18:17 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Nuno fnj Ryvwnu, gung Nuno fnvq hagb
uvz, Neg gubh ur gung gebhoyrgu Vfenry?  18:18 Naq ur nafjrerq, V unir
abg gebhoyrq Vfenry; ohg gubh, naq gul sngure'f ubhfr, va gung lr unir
sbefnxra gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ, naq gubh unfg sbyybjrq Onnyvz.

18:19 Abj gurersber fraq, naq tngure gb zr nyy Vfenry hagb zbhag
Pnezry, naq gur cebcurgf bs Onny sbhe uhaqerq naq svsgl, naq gur
cebcurgf bs gur tebirf sbhe uhaqerq, juvpu rng ng Wrmrory'f gnoyr.

18:20 Fb Nuno frag hagb nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq tngurerq gur
cebcurgf gbtrgure hagb zbhag Pnezry.

18:21 Naq Ryvwnu pnzr hagb nyy gur crbcyr, naq fnvq, Ubj ybat unyg lr
orgjrra gjb bcvavbaf? vs gur YBEQ or Tbq, sbyybj uvz: ohg vs Onny,
gura sbyybj uvz. Naq gur crbcyr nafjrerq uvz abg n jbeq.

18:22 Gura fnvq Ryvwnu hagb gur crbcyr, V, rira V bayl, erznva n
cebcurg bs gur YBEQ; ohg Onny'f cebcurgf ner sbhe uhaqerq naq svsgl
zra.

18:23 Yrg gurz gurersber tvir hf gjb ohyybpxf; naq yrg gurz pubbfr bar
ohyybpx sbe gurzfryirf, naq phg vg va cvrprf, naq ynl vg ba jbbq, naq
chg ab sver haqre: naq V jvyy qerff gur bgure ohyybpx, naq ynl vg ba
jbbq, naq chg ab sver haqre: 18:24 Naq pnyy lr ba gur anzr bs lbhe
tbqf, naq V jvyy pnyy ba gur anzr bs gur YBEQ: naq gur Tbq gung
nafjrergu ol sver, yrg uvz or Tbq. Naq nyy gur crbcyr nafjrerq naq
fnvq, Vg vf jryy fcbxra.

18:25 Naq Ryvwnu fnvq hagb gur cebcurgf bs Onny, Pubbfr lbh bar
ohyybpx sbe lbhefryirf, naq qerff vg svefg; sbe lr ner znal; naq pnyy
ba gur anzr bs lbhe tbqf, ohg chg ab sver haqre.

18:26 Naq gurl gbbx gur ohyybpx juvpu jnf tvira gurz, naq gurl qerffrq
vg, naq pnyyrq ba gur anzr bs Onny sebz zbeavat rira hagvy abba,
fnlvat, B Onny, urne hf. Ohg gurer jnf ab ibvpr, abe nal gung
nafjrerq. Naq gurl yrncrq hcba gur nygne juvpu jnf znqr.

18:27 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng abba, gung Ryvwnu zbpxrq gurz, naq fnvq,
Pel nybhq: sbe ur vf n tbq; rvgure ur vf gnyxvat, be ur vf chefhvat,
be ur vf va n wbhearl, be crenqiragher ur fyrrcrgu, naq zhfg or
njnxrq.

18:28 Naq gurl pevrq nybhq, naq phg gurzfryirf nsgre gurve znaare jvgu
xavirf naq ynaprgf, gvyy gur oybbq thfurq bhg hcba gurz.

18:29 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura zvqqnl jnf cnfg, naq gurl cebcurfvrq
hagvy gur gvzr bs gur bssrevat bs gur riravat fnpevsvpr, gung gurer
jnf arvgure ibvpr, abe nal gb nafjre, abe nal gung ertneqrq.

18:30 Naq Ryvwnu fnvq hagb nyy gur crbcyr, Pbzr arne hagb zr. Naq nyy
gur crbcyr pnzr arne hagb uvz. Naq ur ercnverq gur nygne bs gur YBEQ
gung jnf oebxra qbja.

18:31 Naq Ryvwnu gbbx gjryir fgbarf, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs gur
gevorf bs gur fbaf bs Wnpbo, hagb jubz gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr,
fnlvat, Vfenry funyy or gul anzr: 18:32 Naq jvgu gur fgbarf ur ohvyg
na nygne va gur anzr bs gur YBEQ: naq ur znqr n gerapu nobhg gur
nygne, nf terng nf jbhyq pbagnva gjb zrnfherf bs frrq.

18:33 Naq ur chg gur jbbq va beqre, naq phg gur ohyybpx va cvrprf, naq
ynvq uvz ba gur jbbq, naq fnvq, Svyy sbhe oneeryf jvgu jngre, naq cbhe
vg ba gur oheag fnpevsvpr, naq ba gur jbbq.

18:34 Naq ur fnvq, Qb vg gur frpbaq gvzr. Naq gurl qvq vg gur frpbaq
gvzr.

Naq ur fnvq, Qb vg gur guveq gvzr. Naq gurl qvq vg gur guveq gvzr.

18:35 Naq gur jngre ena ebhaq nobhg gur nygne; naq ur svyyrq gur
gerapu nyfb jvgu jngre.

18:36 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur gvzr bs gur bssrevat bs gur riravat
fnpevsvpr, gung Ryvwnu gur cebcurg pnzr arne, naq fnvq, YBEQ Tbq bs
Noenunz, Vfnnp, naq bs Vfenry, yrg vg or xabja guvf qnl gung gubh neg
Tbq va Vfenry, naq gung V nz gul freinag, naq gung V unir qbar nyy
gurfr guvatf ng gul jbeq.

18:37 Urne zr, B YBEQ, urne zr, gung guvf crbcyr znl xabj gung gubh
neg gur YBEQ Tbq, naq gung gubh unfg ghearq gurve urneg onpx ntnva.

18:38 Gura gur sver bs gur YBEQ sryy, naq pbafhzrq gur oheag
fnpevsvpr, naq gur jbbq, naq gur fgbarf, naq gur qhfg, naq yvpxrq hc
gur jngre gung jnf va gur gerapu.

18:39 Naq jura nyy gur crbcyr fnj vg, gurl sryy ba gurve snprf: naq
gurl fnvq, Gur YBEQ, ur vf gur Tbq; gur YBEQ, ur vf gur Tbq.

18:40 Naq Ryvwnu fnvq hagb gurz, Gnxr gur cebcurgf bs Onny; yrg abg
bar bs gurz rfpncr. Naq gurl gbbx gurz: naq Ryvwnu oebhtug gurz qbja
gb gur oebbx Xvfuba, naq fyrj gurz gurer.

18:41 Naq Ryvwnu fnvq hagb Nuno, Trg gurr hc, rng naq qevax; sbe gurer
vf n fbhaq bs nohaqnapr bs enva.

18:42 Fb Nuno jrag hc gb rng naq gb qevax. Naq Ryvwnu jrag hc gb gur
gbc bs Pnezry; naq ur pnfg uvzfrys qbja hcba gur rnegu, naq chg uvf
snpr orgjrra uvf xarrf, 18:43 Naq fnvq gb uvf freinag, Tb hc abj, ybbx
gbjneq gur frn. Naq ur jrag hc, naq ybbxrq, naq fnvq, Gurer vf
abguvat. Naq ur fnvq, Tb ntnva frira gvzrf.

18:44 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur friragu gvzr, gung ur fnvq, Orubyq,
gurer nevfrgu n yvggyr pybhq bhg bs gur frn, yvxr n zna'f unaq. Naq ur
fnvq, Tb hc, fnl hagb Nuno, Cercner gul punevbg, naq trg gurr qbja
gung gur enva fgbc gurr abg.

18:45 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur zrna juvyr, gung gur urnira jnf oynpx
jvgu pybhqf naq jvaq, naq gurer jnf n terng enva. Naq Nuno ebqr, naq
jrag gb Wrmerry.

18:46 Naq gur unaq bs gur YBEQ jnf ba Ryvwnu; naq ur tveqrq hc uvf
ybvaf, naq ena orsber Nuno gb gur ragenapr bs Wrmerry.

19:1 Naq Nuno gbyq Wrmrory nyy gung Ryvwnu unq qbar, naq jvguny ubj ur
unq fynva nyy gur cebcurgf jvgu gur fjbeq.

19:2 Gura Wrmrory frag n zrffratre hagb Ryvwnu, fnlvat, Fb yrg gur
tbqf qb gb zr, naq zber nyfb, vs V znxr abg gul yvsr nf gur yvsr bs
bar bs gurz ol gb zbeebj nobhg guvf gvzr.

19:3 Naq jura ur fnj gung, ur nebfr, naq jrag sbe uvf yvsr, naq pnzr
gb Orrefuron, juvpu orybatrgu gb Whqnu, naq yrsg uvf freinag gurer.

19:4 Ohg ur uvzfrys jrag n qnl'f wbhearl vagb gur jvyqrearff, naq pnzr
naq fng qbja haqre n whavcre gerr: naq ur erdhrfgrq sbe uvzfrys gung
ur zvtug qvr; naq fnvq, Vg vf rabhtu; abj, B YBEQ, gnxr njnl zl yvsr;
sbe V nz abg orggre guna zl snguref.

19:5 Naq nf ur ynl naq fyrcg haqre n whavcre gerr, orubyq, gura na
natry gbhpurq uvz, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Nevfr naq rng.

19:6 Naq ur ybbxrq, naq, orubyq, gurer jnf n pnxr onxra ba gur pbnyf,
naq n pehfr bs jngre ng uvf urnq. Naq ur qvq rng naq qevax, naq ynvq
uvz qbja ntnva.

19:7 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ pnzr ntnva gur frpbaq gvzr, naq gbhpurq
uvz, naq fnvq, Nevfr naq rng; orpnhfr gur wbhearl vf gbb terng sbe
gurr.

19:8 Naq ur nebfr, naq qvq rng naq qevax, naq jrag va gur fgeratgu bs
gung zrng sbegl qnlf naq sbegl avtugf hagb Ubero gur zbhag bs Tbq.

19:9 Naq ur pnzr guvgure hagb n pnir, naq ybqtrq gurer; naq, orubyq,
gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr gb uvz, naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Jung qbrfg
gubh urer, Ryvwnu?  19:10 Naq ur fnvq, V unir orra irel wrnybhf sbe
gur YBEQ Tbq bs ubfgf: sbe gur puvyqera bs Vfenry unir sbefnxra gul
pbiranag, guebja qbja guvar nygnef, naq fynva gul cebcurgf jvgu gur
fjbeq; naq V, rira V bayl, nz yrsg; naq gurl frrx zl yvsr, gb gnxr vg
njnl.

19:11 Naq ur fnvq, Tb sbegu, naq fgnaq hcba gur zbhag orsber gur YBEQ.

Naq, orubyq, gur YBEQ cnffrq ol, naq n terng naq fgebat jvaq erag gur
zbhagnvaf, naq oenxr va cvrprf gur ebpxf orsber gur YBEQ; ohg gur YBEQ
jnf abg va gur jvaq: naq nsgre gur jvaq na rnegudhnxr; ohg gur YBEQ
jnf abg va gur rnegudhnxr: 19:12 Naq nsgre gur rnegudhnxr n sver; ohg
gur YBEQ jnf abg va gur sver: naq nsgre gur sver n fgvyy fznyy ibvpr.

19:13 Naq vg jnf fb, jura Ryvwnu urneq vg, gung ur jenccrq uvf snpr va
uvf znagyr, naq jrag bhg, naq fgbbq va gur ragrevat va bs gur pnir.
Naq, orubyq, gurer pnzr n ibvpr hagb uvz, naq fnvq, Jung qbrfg gubh
urer, Ryvwnu?  19:14 Naq ur fnvq, V unir orra irel wrnybhf sbe gur
YBEQ Tbq bs ubfgf: orpnhfr gur puvyqera bs Vfenry unir sbefnxra gul
pbiranag, guebja qbja guvar nygnef, naq fynva gul cebcurgf jvgu gur
fjbeq; naq V, rira V bayl, nz yrsg; naq gurl frrx zl yvsr, gb gnxr vg
njnl.

19:15 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, Tb, erghea ba gul jnl gb gur
jvyqrearff bs Qnznfphf: naq jura gubh pbzrfg, nabvag Unmnry gb or xvat
bire Flevn: 19:16 Naq Wruh gur fba bs Avzfuv funyg gubh nabvag gb or
xvat bire Vfenry: naq Ryvfun gur fba bs Funcung bs Noryzrubynu funyg
gubh nabvag gb or cebcurg va gul ebbz.

19:17 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, gung uvz gung rfpncrgu gur fjbeq bs
Unmnry funyy Wruh fynl: naq uvz gung rfpncrgu sebz gur fjbeq bs Wruh
funyy Ryvfun fynl.

19:18 Lrg V unir yrsg zr frira gubhfnaq va Vfenry, nyy gur xarrf juvpu
unir abg objrq hagb Onny, naq rirel zbhgu juvpu ungu abg xvffrq uvz.

19:19 Fb ur qrcnegrq gurapr, naq sbhaq Ryvfun gur fba bs Funcung, jub
jnf cybjvat jvgu gjryir lbxr bs bkra orsber uvz, naq ur jvgu gur
gjrysgu: naq Ryvwnu cnffrq ol uvz, naq pnfg uvf znagyr hcba uvz.

19:20 Naq ur yrsg gur bkra, naq ena nsgre Ryvwnu, naq fnvq, Yrg zr, V
cenl gurr, xvff zl sngure naq zl zbgure, naq gura V jvyy sbyybj gurr.
Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Tb onpx ntnva: sbe jung unir V qbar gb gurr?
19:21 Naq ur erghearq onpx sebz uvz, naq gbbx n lbxr bs bkra, naq fyrj
gurz, naq obvyrq gurve syrfu jvgu gur vafgehzragf bs gur bkra, naq
tnir hagb gur crbcyr, naq gurl qvq rng. Gura ur nebfr, naq jrag nsgre
Ryvwnu, naq zvavfgrerq hagb uvz.

20:1 Naq Oraunqnq gur xvat bs Flevn tngurerq nyy uvf ubfg gbtrgure:
naq gurer jrer guvegl naq gjb xvatf jvgu uvz, naq ubefrf, naq
punevbgf; naq ur jrag hc naq orfvrtrq Fnznevn, naq jneerq ntnvafg vg.

20:2 Naq ur frag zrffratref gb Nuno xvat bs Vfenry vagb gur pvgl, naq
fnvq hagb uvz, Guhf fnvgu Oraunqnq, 20:3 Gul fvyire naq gul tbyq vf
zvar; gul jvirf nyfb naq gul puvyqera, rira gur tbbqyvrfg, ner zvar.

20:4 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry nafjrerq naq fnvq, Zl ybeq, B xvat,
nppbeqvat gb gul fnlvat, V nz guvar, naq nyy gung V unir.

20:5 Naq gur zrffratref pnzr ntnva, naq fnvq, Guhf fcrnxrgu Oraunqnq,
fnlvat, Nygubhtu V unir frag hagb gurr, fnlvat, Gubh funyg qryvire zr
gul fvyire, naq gul tbyq, naq gul jvirf, naq gul puvyqera; 20:6 Lrg V
jvyy fraq zl freinagf hagb gurr gb zbeebj nobhg guvf gvzr, naq gurl
funyy frnepu guvar ubhfr, naq gur ubhfrf bs gul freinagf; naq vg funyy
or, gung jungfbrire vf cyrnfnag va guvar rlrf, gurl funyy chg vg va
gurve unaq, naq gnxr vg njnl.

20:7 Gura gur xvat bs Vfenry pnyyrq nyy gur ryqref bs gur ynaq, naq
fnvq, Znex, V cenl lbh, naq frr ubj guvf zna frrxrgu zvfpuvrs: sbe ur
frag hagb zr sbe zl jvirf, naq sbe zl puvyqera, naq sbe zl fvyire, naq
sbe zl tbyq; naq V qravrq uvz abg.

20:8 Naq nyy gur ryqref naq nyy gur crbcyr fnvq hagb uvz, Urnexra abg
hagb uvz, abe pbafrag.

20:9 Jurersber ur fnvq hagb gur zrffratref bs Oraunqnq, Gryy zl ybeq
gur xvat, Nyy gung gubh qvqfg fraq sbe gb gul freinag ng gur svefg V
jvyy qb: ohg guvf guvat V znl abg qb. Naq gur zrffratref qrcnegrq, naq
oebhtug uvz jbeq ntnva.

20:10 Naq Oraunqnq frag hagb uvz, naq fnvq, Gur tbqf qb fb hagb zr,
naq zber nyfb, vs gur qhfg bs Fnznevn funyy fhssvpr sbe unaqshyf sbe
nyy gur crbcyr gung sbyybj zr.

20:11 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry nafjrerq naq fnvq, Gryy uvz, Yrg abg uvz
gung tveqrgu ba uvf unearff obnfg uvzfrys nf ur gung chggrgu vg bss.

20:12 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Ora-unqnq urneq guvf zrffntr, nf ur
jnf qevaxvat, ur naq gur xvatf va gur cnivyvbaf, gung ur fnvq hagb uvf
freinagf, Frg lbhefryirf va neenl. Naq gurl frg gurzfryirf va neenl
ntnvafg gur pvgl.

20:13 Naq, orubyq, gurer pnzr n cebcurg hagb Nuno xvat bs Vfenry,
fnlvat, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Unfg gubh frra nyy guvf terng zhygvghqr?
orubyq, V jvyy qryvire vg vagb guvar unaq guvf qnl; naq gubh funyg
xabj gung V nz gur YBEQ.

20:14 Naq Nuno fnvq, Ol jubz? Naq ur fnvq, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Rira
ol gur lbhat zra bs gur cevaprf bs gur cebivaprf. Gura ur fnvq, Jub
funyy beqre gur onggyr? Naq ur nafjrerq, Gubh.

20:15 Gura ur ahzorerq gur lbhat zra bs gur cevaprf bs gur cebivaprf,
naq gurl jrer gjb uhaqerq naq guvegl gjb: naq nsgre gurz ur ahzorerq
nyy gur crbcyr, rira nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, orvat frira gubhfnaq.

20:16 Naq gurl jrag bhg ng abba. Ohg Oraunqnq jnf qevaxvat uvzfrys
qehax va gur cnivyvbaf, ur naq gur xvatf, gur guvegl naq gjb xvatf
gung urycrq uvz.

20:17 Naq gur lbhat zra bs gur cevaprf bs gur cebivaprf jrag bhg
svefg; naq Oraunqnq frag bhg, naq gurl gbyq uvz, fnlvat, Gurer ner zra
pbzr bhg bs Fnznevn.

20:18 Naq ur fnvq, Jurgure gurl or pbzr bhg sbe crnpr, gnxr gurz
nyvir; be jurgure gurl or pbzr bhg sbe jne, gnxr gurz nyvir.

20:19 Fb gurfr lbhat zra bs gur cevaprf bs gur cebivaprf pnzr bhg bs
gur pvgl, naq gur nezl juvpu sbyybjrq gurz.

20:20 Naq gurl fyrj rirel bar uvf zna: naq gur Flevnaf syrq; naq
Vfenry chefhrq gurz: naq Oraunqnq gur xvat bs Flevn rfpncrq ba na
ubefr jvgu gur ubefrzra.

20:21 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry jrag bhg, naq fzbgr gur ubefrf naq
punevbgf, naq fyrj gur Flevnaf jvgu n terng fynhtugre.

20:22 Naq gur cebcurg pnzr gb gur xvat bs Vfenry, naq fnvq hagb uvz,
Tb, fgeratgura gulfrys, naq znex, naq frr jung gubh qbrfg: sbe ng gur
erghea bs gur lrne gur xvat bs Flevn jvyy pbzr hc ntnvafg gurr.

20:23 Naq gur freinagf bs gur xvat bs Flevn fnvq hagb uvz, Gurve tbqf
ner tbqf bs gur uvyyf; gurersber gurl jrer fgebatre guna jr; ohg yrg
hf svtug ntnvafg gurz va gur cynva, naq fheryl jr funyy or fgebatre
guna gurl.

20:24 Naq qb guvf guvat, Gnxr gur xvatf njnl, rirel zna bhg bs uvf
cynpr, naq chg pncgnvaf va gurve ebbzf: 20:25 Naq ahzore gurr na nezl,
yvxr gur nezl gung gubh unfg ybfg, ubefr sbe ubefr, naq punevbg sbe
punevbg: naq jr jvyy svtug ntnvafg gurz va gur cynva, naq fheryl jr
funyy or fgebatre guna gurl. Naq ur urnexrarq hagb gurve ibvpr, naq
qvq fb.

20:26 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur erghea bs gur lrne, gung Oraunqnq
ahzorerq gur Flevnaf, naq jrag hc gb Ncurx, gb svtug ntnvafg Vfenry.

20:27 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrer ahzorerq, naq jrer nyy cerfrag,
naq jrag ntnvafg gurz: naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry cvgpurq orsber gurz
yvxr gjb yvggyr sybpxf bs xvqf; ohg gur Flevnaf svyyrq gur pbhagel.

20:28 Naq gurer pnzr n zna bs Tbq, naq fcnxr hagb gur xvat bs Vfenry,
naq fnvq, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Orpnhfr gur Flevnaf unir fnvq, Gur YBEQ
vf Tbq bs gur uvyyf, ohg ur vf abg Tbq bs gur inyyrlf, gurersber jvyy
V qryvire nyy guvf terng zhygvghqr vagb guvar unaq, naq lr funyy xabj
gung V nz gur YBEQ.

20:29 Naq gurl cvgpurq bar bire ntnvafg gur bgure frira qnlf. Naq fb
vg jnf, gung va gur friragu qnl gur onggyr jnf wbvarq: naq gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry fyrj bs gur Flevnaf na uhaqerq gubhfnaq sbbgzra va
bar qnl.

20:30 Ohg gur erfg syrq gb Ncurx, vagb gur pvgl; naq gurer n jnyy sryy
hcba gjragl naq frira gubhfnaq bs gur zra gung jrer yrsg. Naq Oraunqnq
syrq, naq pnzr vagb gur pvgl, vagb na vaare punzore.

20:31 Naq uvf freinagf fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq abj, jr unir urneq gung
gur xvatf bs gur ubhfr bs Vfenry ner zrepvshy xvatf: yrg hf, V cenl
gurr, chg fnpxpybgu ba bhe ybvaf, naq ebcrf hcba bhe urnqf, naq tb bhg
gb gur xvat bs Vfenry: crenqiragher ur jvyy fnir gul yvsr.

20:32 Fb gurl tveqrq fnpxpybgu ba gurve ybvaf, naq chg ebcrf ba gurve
urnqf, naq pnzr gb gur xvat bs Vfenry, naq fnvq, Gul freinag Oraunqnq
fnvgu, V cenl gurr, yrg zr yvir. Naq ur fnvq, Vf ur lrg nyvir? ur vf
zl oebgure.

20:33 Abj gur zra qvq qvyvtragyl bofreir jurgure nal guvat jbhyq pbzr
sebz uvz, naq qvq unfgvyl pngpu vg: naq gurl fnvq, Gul oebgure
Oraunqnq. Gura ur fnvq, Tb lr, oevat uvz. Gura Oraunqnq pnzr sbegu gb
uvz; naq ur pnhfrq uvz gb pbzr hc vagb gur punevbg.

20:34 Naq Ora-unqnq fnvq hagb uvz, Gur pvgvrf, juvpu zl sngure gbbx
sebz gul sngure, V jvyy erfgber; naq gubh funyg znxr fgerrgf sbe gurr
va Qnznfphf, nf zl sngure znqr va Fnznevn. Gura fnvq Nuno, V jvyy fraq
gurr njnl jvgu guvf pbiranag. Fb ur znqr n pbiranag jvgu uvz, naq frag
uvz njnl.

20:35 Naq n pregnva zna bs gur fbaf bs gur cebcurgf fnvq hagb uvf
arvtuobhe va gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ, Fzvgr zr, V cenl gurr. Naq gur zna
ershfrq gb fzvgr uvz.

20:36 Gura fnvq ur hagb uvz, Orpnhfr gubh unfg abg borlrq gur ibvpr bs
gur YBEQ, orubyq, nf fbba nf gubh neg qrcnegrq sebz zr, n yvba funyy
fynl gurr.

Naq nf fbba nf ur jnf qrcnegrq sebz uvz, n yvba sbhaq uvz, naq fyrj
uvz.

20:37 Gura ur sbhaq nabgure zna, naq fnvq, Fzvgr zr, V cenl gurr. Naq
gur zna fzbgr uvz, fb gung va fzvgvat ur jbhaqrq uvz.

20:38 Fb gur cebcurg qrcnegrq, naq jnvgrq sbe gur xvat ol gur jnl, naq
qvfthvfrq uvzfrys jvgu nfurf hcba uvf snpr.

20:39 Naq nf gur xvat cnffrq ol, ur pevrq hagb gur xvat: naq ur fnvq,
Gul freinag jrag bhg vagb gur zvqfg bs gur onggyr; naq, orubyq, n zna
ghearq nfvqr, naq oebhtug n zna hagb zr, naq fnvq, Xrrc guvf zna: vs
ol nal zrnaf ur or zvffvat, gura funyy gul yvsr or sbe uvf yvsr, be
ryfr gubh funyg cnl n gnyrag bs fvyire.

20:40 Naq nf gul freinag jnf ohfl urer naq gurer, ur jnf tbar. Naq gur
xvat bs Vfenry fnvq hagb uvz, Fb funyy gul whqtzrag or; gulfrys unfg
qrpvqrq vg.

20:41 Naq ur unfgrq, naq gbbx gur nfurf njnl sebz uvf snpr; naq gur
xvat bs Vfenry qvfprearq uvz gung ur jnf bs gur cebcurgf.

20:42 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Orpnhfr gubh unfg yrg
tb bhg bs gul unaq n zna jubz V nccbvagrq gb hggre qrfgehpgvba,
gurersber gul yvsr funyy tb sbe uvf yvsr, naq gul crbcyr sbe uvf
crbcyr.

20:43 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry jrag gb uvf ubhfr urnil naq qvfcyrnfrq,
naq pnzr gb Fnznevn.

21:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre gurfr guvatf, gung Anobgu gur
Wrmerryvgr unq n ivarlneq, juvpu jnf va Wrmerry, uneq ol gur cnynpr bs
Nuno xvat bs Fnznevn.

21:2 Naq Nuno fcnxr hagb Anobgu, fnlvat, Tvir zr gul ivarlneq, gung V
znl unir vg sbe n tneqra bs ureof, orpnhfr vg vf arne hagb zl ubhfr:
naq V jvyy tvir gurr sbe vg n orggre ivarlneq guna vg; be, vs vg frrz
tbbq gb gurr, V jvyy tvir gurr gur jbegu bs vg va zbarl.

21:3 Naq Anobgu fnvq gb Nuno, Gur YBEQ sbeovq vg zr, gung V fubhyq
tvir gur vaurevgnapr bs zl snguref hagb gurr.

21:4 Naq Nuno pnzr vagb uvf ubhfr urnil naq qvfcyrnfrq orpnhfr bs gur
jbeq juvpu Anobgu gur Wrmerryvgr unq fcbxra gb uvz: sbe ur unq fnvq, V
jvyy abg tvir gurr gur vaurevgnapr bs zl snguref. Naq ur ynvq uvz qbja
hcba uvf orq, naq ghearq njnl uvf snpr, naq jbhyq rng ab oernq.

21:5 Ohg Wrmrory uvf jvsr pnzr gb uvz, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Jul vf gul
fcvevg fb fnq, gung gubh rngrfg ab oernq?  21:6 Naq ur fnvq hagb ure,
Orpnhfr V fcnxr hagb Anobgu gur Wrmerryvgr, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Tvir zr
gul ivarlneq sbe zbarl; be ryfr, vs vg cyrnfr gurr, V jvyy tvir gurr
nabgure ivarlneq sbe vg: naq ur nafjrerq, V jvyy abg tvir gurr zl
ivarlneq.

21:7 Naq Wrmrory uvf jvsr fnvq hagb uvz, Qbfg gubh abj tbirea gur
xvatqbz bs Vfenry? nevfr, naq rng oernq, naq yrg guvar urneg or zreel:
V jvyy tvir gurr gur ivarlneq bs Anobgu gur Wrmerryvgr.

21:8 Fb fur jebgr yrggref va Nuno'f anzr, naq frnyrq gurz jvgu uvf
frny, naq frag gur yrggref hagb gur ryqref naq gb gur aboyrf gung jrer
va uvf pvgl, qjryyvat jvgu Anobgu.

21:9 Naq fur jebgr va gur yrggref, fnlvat, Cebpynvz n snfg, naq frg
Anobgu ba uvtu nzbat gur crbcyr: 21:10 Naq frg gjb zra, fbaf bs
Oryvny, orsber uvz, gb orne jvgarff ntnvafg uvz, fnlvat, Gubh qvqfg
oynfcurzr Tbq naq gur xvat. Naq gura pneel uvz bhg, naq fgbar uvz,
gung ur znl qvr.

21:11 Naq gur zra bs uvf pvgl, rira gur ryqref naq gur aboyrf jub jrer
gur vaunovgnagf va uvf pvgl, qvq nf Wrmrory unq frag hagb gurz, naq nf
vg jnf jevggra va gur yrggref juvpu fur unq frag hagb gurz.

21:12 Gurl cebpynvzrq n snfg, naq frg Anobgu ba uvtu nzbat gur crbcyr.

21:13 Naq gurer pnzr va gjb zra, puvyqera bs Oryvny, naq fng orsber
uvz: naq gur zra bs Oryvny jvgarffrq ntnvafg uvz, rira ntnvafg Anobgu,
va gur cerfrapr bs gur crbcyr, fnlvat, Anobgu qvq oynfcurzr Tbq naq
gur xvat. Gura gurl pneevrq uvz sbegu bhg bs gur pvgl, naq fgbarq uvz
jvgu fgbarf, gung ur qvrq.

21:14 Gura gurl frag gb Wrmrory, fnlvat, Anobgu vf fgbarq, naq vf
qrnq.

21:15 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Wrmrory urneq gung Anobgu jnf fgbarq,
naq jnf qrnq, gung Wrmrory fnvq gb Nuno, Nevfr, gnxr cbffrffvba bs gur
ivarlneq bs Anobgu gur Wrmerryvgr, juvpu ur ershfrq gb tvir gurr sbe
zbarl: sbe Anobgu vf abg nyvir, ohg qrnq.

21:16 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Nuno urneq gung Anobgu jnf qrnq, gung
Nuno ebfr hc gb tb qbja gb gur ivarlneq bs Anobgu gur Wrmerryvgr, gb
gnxr cbffrffvba bs vg.

21:17 Naq gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr gb Ryvwnu gur Gvfuovgr, fnlvat,
21:18 Nevfr, tb qbja gb zrrg Nuno xvat bs Vfenry, juvpu vf va Fnznevn:
orubyq, ur vf va gur ivarlneq bs Anobgu, juvgure ur vf tbar qbja gb
cbffrff vg.

21:19 Naq gubh funyg fcrnx hagb uvz, fnlvat, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Unfg
gubh xvyyrq, naq nyfb gnxra cbffrffvba? Naq gubh funyg fcrnx hagb uvz,
fnlvat, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Va gur cynpr jurer qbtf yvpxrq gur oybbq
bs Anobgu funyy qbtf yvpx gul oybbq, rira guvar.

21:20 Naq Nuno fnvq gb Ryvwnu, Unfg gubh sbhaq zr, B zvar rarzl? Naq
ur nafjrerq, V unir sbhaq gurr: orpnhfr gubh unfg fbyq gulfrys gb jbex
rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ.

21:21 Orubyq, V jvyy oevat rivy hcba gurr, naq jvyy gnxr njnl gul
cbfgrevgl, naq jvyy phg bss sebz Nuno uvz gung cvffrgu ntnvafg gur
jnyy, naq uvz gung vf fuhg hc naq yrsg va Vfenry, 21:22 Naq jvyy znxr
guvar ubhfr yvxr gur ubhfr bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, naq yvxr gur
ubhfr bs Onnfun gur fba bs Nuvwnu, sbe gur cebibpngvba jurerjvgu gubh
unfg cebibxrq zr gb natre, naq znqr Vfenry gb fva.

21:23 Naq bs Wrmrory nyfb fcnxr gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Gur qbtf funyy rng
Wrmrory ol gur jnyy bs Wrmerry.

21:24 Uvz gung qvrgu bs Nuno va gur pvgl gur qbtf funyy rng; naq uvz
gung qvrgu va gur svryq funyy gur sbjyf bs gur nve rng.

21:25 Ohg gurer jnf abar yvxr hagb Nuno, juvpu qvq fryy uvzfrys gb
jbex jvpxrqarff va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, jubz Wrmrory uvf jvsr
fgveerq hc.

21:26 Naq ur qvq irel nobzvanoyl va sbyybjvat vqbyf, nppbeqvat gb nyy
guvatf nf qvq gur Nzbevgrf, jubz gur YBEQ pnfg bhg orsber gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry.

21:27 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Nuno urneq gubfr jbeqf, gung ur erag
uvf pybgurf, naq chg fnpxpybgu hcba uvf syrfu, naq snfgrq, naq ynl va
fnpxpybgu, naq jrag fbsgyl.

21:28 Naq gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr gb Ryvwnu gur Gvfuovgr, fnlvat,
21:29 Frrfg gubh ubj Nuno uhzoyrgu uvzfrys orsber zr? orpnhfr ur
uhzoyrgu uvzfrys orsber zr, V jvyy abg oevat gur rivy va uvf qnlf: ohg
va uvf fba'f qnlf jvyy V oevat gur rivy hcba uvf ubhfr.

22:1 Naq gurl pbagvahrq guerr lrnef jvgubhg jne orgjrra Flevn naq
Vfenry.

22:2 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur guveq lrne, gung Wrubfuncung gur xvat
bs Whqnu pnzr qbja gb gur xvat bs Vfenry.

22:3 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry fnvq hagb uvf freinagf, Xabj lr gung
Enzbgu va Tvyrnq vf bhef, naq jr or fgvyy, naq gnxr vg abg bhg bs gur
unaq bs gur xvat bs Flevn?  22:4 Naq ur fnvq hagb Wrubfuncung, Jvyg
gubh tb jvgu zr gb onggyr gb Enzbgutvyrnq? Naq Wrubfuncung fnvq gb gur
xvat bs Vfenry, V nz nf gubh neg, zl crbcyr nf gul crbcyr, zl ubefrf
nf gul ubefrf.

22:5 Naq Wrubfuncung fnvq hagb gur xvat bs Vfenry, Radhver, V cenl
gurr, ng gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ gb qnl.

22:6 Gura gur xvat bs Vfenry tngurerq gur cebcurgf gbtrgure, nobhg
sbhe uhaqerq zra, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Funyy V tb ntnvafg Enzbgutvyrnq
gb onggyr, be funyy V sbeorne? Naq gurl fnvq, Tb hc; sbe gur YBEQ
funyy qryvire vg vagb gur unaq bs gur xvat.

22:7 Naq Wrubfuncung fnvq, Vf gurer abg urer n cebcurg bs gur YBEQ
orfvqrf, gung jr zvtug radhver bs uvz?  22:8 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry
fnvq hagb Wrubfuncung, Gurer vf lrg bar zna, Zvpnvnu gur fba bs Vzynu,
ol jubz jr znl radhver bs gur YBEQ: ohg V ungr uvz; sbe ur qbgu abg
cebcurfl tbbq pbapreavat zr, ohg rivy. Naq Wrubfuncung fnvq, Yrg abg
gur xvat fnl fb.

22:9 Gura gur xvat bs Vfenry pnyyrq na bssvpre, naq fnvq, Unfgra
uvgure Zvpnvnu gur fba bs Vzynu.

22:10 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry naq Wrubfuncung gur xvat bs Whqnu fng
rnpu ba uvf guebar, univat chg ba gurve eborf, va n ibvq cynpr va gur
ragenapr bs gur tngr bs Fnznevn; naq nyy gur cebcurgf cebcurfvrq
orsber gurz.

22:11 Naq Mrqrxvnu gur fba bs Purannanu znqr uvz ubeaf bs veba: naq ur
fnvq, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Jvgu gurfr funyg gubh chfu gur Flevnaf,
hagvy gubh unir pbafhzrq gurz.

22:12 Naq nyy gur cebcurgf cebcurfvrq fb, fnlvat, Tb hc gb
Enzbgutvyrnq, naq cebfcre: sbe gur YBEQ funyy qryvire vg vagb gur
xvat'f unaq.

22:13 Naq gur zrffratre gung jnf tbar gb pnyy Zvpnvnu fcnxr hagb uvz,
fnlvat, Orubyq abj, gur jbeqf bs gur cebcurgf qrpyner tbbq hagb gur
xvat jvgu bar zbhgu: yrg gul jbeq, V cenl gurr, or yvxr gur jbeq bs
bar bs gurz, naq fcrnx gung juvpu vf tbbq.

22:14 Naq Zvpnvnu fnvq, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, jung gur YBEQ fnvgu hagb
zr, gung jvyy V fcrnx.

22:15 Fb ur pnzr gb gur xvat. Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb uvz, Zvpnvnu,
funyy jr tb ntnvafg Enzbgutvyrnq gb onggyr, be funyy jr sbeorne? Naq
ur nafjrerq uvz, Tb, naq cebfcre: sbe gur YBEQ funyy qryvire vg vagb
gur unaq bs gur xvat.

22:16 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb uvz, Ubj znal gvzrf funyy V nqwher gurr
gung gubh gryy zr abguvat ohg gung juvpu vf gehr va gur anzr bs gur
YBEQ?  22:17 Naq ur fnvq, V fnj nyy Vfenry fpnggrerq hcba gur uvyyf,
nf furrc gung unir abg n furcureq: naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Gurfr unir ab
znfgre: yrg gurz erghea rirel zna gb uvf ubhfr va crnpr.

22:18 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry fnvq hagb Wrubfuncung, Qvq V abg gryy
gurr gung ur jbhyq cebcurfl ab tbbq pbapreavat zr, ohg rivy?  22:19
Naq ur fnvq, Urne gubh gurersber gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ: V fnj gur YBEQ
fvggvat ba uvf guebar, naq nyy gur ubfg bs urnira fgnaqvat ol uvz ba
uvf evtug unaq naq ba uvf yrsg.

22:20 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Jub funyy crefhnqr Nuno, gung ur znl tb hc
naq snyy ng Enzbgutvyrnq? Naq bar fnvq ba guvf znaare, naq nabgure
fnvq ba gung znaare.

22:21 Naq gurer pnzr sbegu n fcvevg, naq fgbbq orsber gur YBEQ, naq
fnvq, V jvyy crefhnqr uvz.

22:22 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, Jurerjvgu? Naq ur fnvq, V jvyy tb
sbegu, naq V jvyy or n ylvat fcvevg va gur zbhgu bs nyy uvf cebcurgf.
Naq ur fnvq, Gubh funyg crefhqr uvz, naq cerinvy nyfb: tb sbegu, naq
qb fb.

22:23 Abj gurersber, orubyq, gur YBEQ ungu chg n ylvat fcvevg va gur
zbhgu bs nyy gurfr gul cebcurgf, naq gur YBEQ ungu fcbxra rivy
pbapreavat gurr.

22:24 Ohg Mrqrxvnu gur fba bs Purannanu jrag arne, naq fzbgr Zvpnvnu
ba gur purrx, naq fnvq, Juvpu jnl jrag gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ sebz zr
gb fcrnx hagb gurr?  22:25 Naq Zvpnvnu fnvq, Orubyq, gubh funyg frr va
gung qnl, jura gubh funyg tb vagb na vaare punzore gb uvqr gulfrys.

22:26 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry fnvq, Gnxr Zvpnvnu, naq pneel uvz onpx
hagb Nzba gur tbireabe bs gur pvgl, naq gb Wbnfu gur xvat'f fba; 22:27
Naq fnl, Guhf fnvgu gur xvat, Chg guvf sryybj va gur cevfba, naq srrq
uvz jvgu oernq bs nssyvpgvba naq jvgu jngre bs nssyvpgvba, hagvy V
pbzr va crnpr.

22:28 Naq Zvpnvnu fnvq, Vs gubh erghea ng nyy va crnpr, gur YBEQ ungu
abg fcbxra ol zr. Naq ur fnvq, Urnexra, B crbcyr, rirel bar bs lbh.

22:29 Fb gur xvat bs Vfenry naq Wrubfuncung gur xvat bs Whqnu jrag hc
gb Enzbgutvyrnq.

22:30 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry fnvq hagb Wrubfuncung, V jvyy qvfthvfr
zlfrys, naq ragre vagb gur onggyr; ohg chg gubh ba gul eborf. Naq gur
xvat bs Vfenry qvfthvfrq uvzfrys, naq jrag vagb gur onggyr.

22:31 Ohg gur xvat bs Flevn pbzznaqrq uvf guvegl naq gjb pncgnvaf gung
unq ehyr bire uvf punevbgf, fnlvat, Svtug arvgure jvgu fznyy abe
terng, fnir bayl jvgu gur xvat bs Vfenry.

22:32 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur pncgnvaf bs gur punevbgf fnj
Wrubfuncung, gung gurl fnvq, Fheryl vg vf gur xvat bs Vfenry. Naq gurl
ghearq nfvqr gb svtug ntnvafg uvz: naq Wrubfuncung pevrq bhg.

22:33 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur pncgnvaf bs gur punevbgf creprvirq
gung vg jnf abg gur xvat bs Vfenry, gung gurl ghearq onpx sebz
chefhvat uvz.

22:34 Naq n pregnva zna qerj n obj ng n iragher, naq fzbgr gur xvat bs
Vfenry orgjrra gur wbvagf bs gur unearff: jurersber ur fnvq hagb gur
qevire bs uvf punevbg, Ghea guvar unaq, naq pneel zr bhg bs gur ubfg;
sbe V nz jbhaqrq.

22:35 Naq gur onggyr vapernfrq gung qnl: naq gur xvat jnf fgnlrq hc va
uvf punevbg ntnvafg gur Flevnaf, naq qvrq ng rira: naq gur oybbq ena
bhg bs gur jbhaq vagb gur zvqfg bs gur punevbg.

22:36 Naq gurer jrag n cebpynzngvba guebhtubhg gur ubfg nobhg gur
tbvat qbja bs gur fha, fnlvat, Rirel zna gb uvf pvgl, naq rirel zna gb
uvf bja pbhagel.

22:37 Fb gur xvat qvrq, naq jnf oebhtug gb Fnznevn; naq gurl ohevrq
gur xvat va Fnznevn.

22:38 Naq bar jnfurq gur punevbg va gur cbby bs Fnznevn; naq gur qbtf
yvpxrq hc uvf oybbq; naq gurl jnfurq uvf nezbhe; nppbeqvat hagb gur
jbeq bs gur YBEQ juvpu ur fcnxr.

22:39 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Nuno, naq nyy gung ur qvq, naq gur
vibel ubhfr juvpu ur znqr, naq nyy gur pvgvrf gung ur ohvyg, ner gurl
abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry?
22:40 Fb Nuno fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref; naq Nunmvnu uvf fba ervtarq va
uvf fgrnq.

22:41 Naq Wrubfuncung gur fba bs Nfn ortna gb ervta bire Whqnu va gur
sbhegu lrne bs Nuno xvat bs Vfenry.

22:42 Wrubfuncung jnf guvegl naq svir lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb
ervta; naq ur ervtarq gjragl naq svir lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf
zbgure'f anzr jnf Nmhonu gur qnhtugre bs Fuvyuv.

22:43 Naq ur jnyxrq va nyy gur jnlf bs Nfn uvf sngure; ur ghearq abg
nfvqr sebz vg, qbvat gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur rlrf bs gur YBEQ:
arireguryrff gur uvtu cynprf jrer abg gnxra njnl; sbe gur crbcyr
bssrerq naq oheag vaprafr lrg va gur uvtu cynprf.

22:44 Naq Wrubfuncung znqr crnpr jvgu gur xvat bs Vfenry.

22:45 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wrubfuncung, naq uvf zvtug gung ur
furjrq, naq ubj ur jneerq, ner gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur
puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu?  22:46 Naq gur erzanag bs gur
fbqbzvgrf, juvpu erznvarq va gur qnlf bs uvf sngure Nfn, ur gbbx bhg
bs gur ynaq.

22:47 Gurer jnf gura ab xvat va Rqbz: n qrchgl jnf xvat.

22:48 Wrubfuncung znqr fuvcf bs Gunefuvfu gb tb gb Bcuve sbe tbyq: ohg
gurl jrag abg; sbe gur fuvcf jrer oebxra ng Rmvbatrore.

22:49 Gura fnvq Nunmvnu gur fba bs Nuno hagb Wrubfuncung, Yrg zl
freinagf tb jvgu gul freinagf va gur fuvcf. Ohg Wrubfuncung jbhyq abg.

22:50 Naq Wrubfuncung fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq jnf ohevrq jvgu uvf
snguref va gur pvgl bs Qnivq uvf sngure: naq Wrubenz uvf fba ervtarq
va uvf fgrnq.

22:51 Nunmvnu gur fba bs Nuno ortna gb ervta bire Vfenry va Fnznevn
gur friragrragu lrne bs Wrubfuncung xvat bs Whqnu, naq ervtarq gjb
lrnef bire Vfenry.

22:52 Naq ur qvq rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, naq jnyxrq va gur jnl
bs uvf sngure, naq va gur jnl bs uvf zbgure, naq va gur jnl bs
Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, jub znqr Vfenry gb fva: 22:53 Sbe ur freirq
Onny, naq jbefuvccrq uvz, naq cebibxrq gb natre gur YBEQ Tbq bs
Vfenry, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung uvf sngure unq qbar.




Gur Frpbaq Obbx bs gur Xvatf

Pbzzbayl Pnyyrq:

Gur Sbhegu Obbx bs gur Xvatf


1:1 Gura Zbno eroryyrq ntnvafg Vfenry nsgre gur qrngu bs Nuno.

1:2 Naq Nunmvnu sryy qbja guebhtu n ynggvpr va uvf hccre punzore gung
jnf va Fnznevn, naq jnf fvpx: naq ur frag zrffratref, naq fnvq hagb
gurz, Tb, radhver bs Onnymroho gur tbq bs Rxeba jurgure V funyy
erpbire bs guvf qvfrnfr.

1:3 Ohg gur natry bs gur YBEQ fnvq gb Ryvwnu gur Gvfuovgr, Nevfr, tb
hc gb zrrg gur zrffratref bs gur xvat bs Fnznevn, naq fnl hagb gurz,
Vf vg abg orpnhfr gurer vf abg n Tbq va Vfenry, gung lr tb gb radhver
bs Onnymroho gur tbq bs Rxeba?  1:4 Abj gurersber guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ,
Gubh funyg abg pbzr qbja sebz gung orq ba juvpu gubh neg tbar hc, ohg
funyg fheryl qvr. Naq Ryvwnu qrcnegrq.

1:5 Naq jura gur zrffratref ghearq onpx hagb uvz, ur fnvq hagb gurz,
Jul ner lr abj ghearq onpx?  1:6 Naq gurl fnvq hagb uvz, Gurer pnzr n
zna hc gb zrrg hf, naq fnvq hagb hf, Tb, ghea ntnva hagb gur xvat gung
frag lbh, naq fnl hagb uvz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Vf vg abg orpnhfr
gurer vf abg n Tbq va Vfenry, gung gubh fraqrfg gb radhver bs
Onnymroho gur tbq bs Rxeba? gurersber gubh funyg abg pbzr qbja sebz
gung orq ba juvpu gubh neg tbar hc, ohg funyg fheryl qvr.

1:7 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Jung znaare bs zna jnf ur juvpu pnzr hc gb
zrrg lbh, naq gbyq lbh gurfr jbeqf?  1:8 Naq gurl nafjrerq uvz, Ur jnf
na unvel zna, naq tveg jvgu n tveqyr bs yrngure nobhg uvf ybvaf. Naq
ur fnvq, Vg vf Ryvwnu gur Gvfuovgr.

1:9 Gura gur xvat frag hagb uvz n pncgnva bs svsgl jvgu uvf svsgl. Naq
ur jrag hc gb uvz: naq, orubyq, ur fng ba gur gbc bs na uvyy. Naq ur
fcnxr hagb uvz, Gubh zna bs Tbq, gur xvat ungu fnvq, Pbzr qbja.

1:10 Naq Ryvwnu nafjrerq naq fnvq gb gur pncgnva bs svsgl, Vs V or n
zna bs Tbq, gura yrg sver pbzr qbja sebz urnira, naq pbafhzr gurr naq
gul svsgl.

Naq gurer pnzr qbja sver sebz urnira, naq pbafhzrq uvz naq uvf svsgl.

1:11 Ntnva nyfb ur frag hagb uvz nabgure pncgnva bs svsgl jvgu uvf
svsgl.

Naq ur nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb uvz, B zna bs Tbq, guhf ungu gur xvat
fnvq, Pbzr qbja dhvpxyl.

1:12 Naq Ryvwnu nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb gurz, Vs V or n zna bs Tbq, yrg
sver pbzr qbja sebz urnira, naq pbafhzr gurr naq gul svsgl. Naq gur
sver bs Tbq pnzr qbja sebz urnira, naq pbafhzrq uvz naq uvf svsgl.

1:13 Naq ur frag ntnva n pncgnva bs gur guveq svsgl jvgu uvf svsgl.
Naq gur guveq pncgnva bs svsgl jrag hc, naq pnzr naq sryy ba uvf xarrf
orsber Ryvwnu, naq orfbhtug uvz, naq fnvq hagb uvz, B zna bs Tbq, V
cenl gurr, yrg zl yvsr, naq gur yvsr bs gurfr svsgl gul freinagf, or
cerpvbhf va gul fvtug.

1:14 Orubyq, gurer pnzr sver qbja sebz urnira, naq oheag hc gur gjb
pncgnvaf bs gur sbezre svsgvrf jvgu gurve svsgvrf: gurersber yrg zl
yvsr abj or cerpvbhf va gul fvtug.

1:15 Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Ryvwnu, Tb qbja jvgu uvz: or
abg nsenvq bs uvz. Naq ur nebfr, naq jrag qbja jvgu uvz hagb gur xvat.

1:16 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Sbenfzhpu nf gubh unfg
frag zrffratref gb radhver bs Onnymroho gur tbq bs Rxeba, vf vg abg
orpnhfr gurer vf ab Tbq va Vfenry gb radhver bs uvf jbeq? gurersber
gubh funyg abg pbzr qbja bss gung orq ba juvpu gubh neg tbar hc, ohg
funyg fheryl qvr.

1:17 Fb ur qvrq nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ juvpu Ryvwnu unq
fcbxra.

Naq Wrubenz ervtarq va uvf fgrnq va gur frpbaq lrne bs Wrubenz gur fba
bs Wrubfuncung xvat bs Whqnu; orpnhfr ur unq ab fba.

1:18 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Nunmvnu juvpu ur qvq, ner gurl abg
jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry?  2:1 Naq
vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur YBEQ jbhyq gnxr hc Ryvwnu vagb urnira ol n
juveyjvaq, gung Ryvwnu jrag jvgu Ryvfun sebz Tvytny.

2:2 Naq Ryvwnu fnvq hagb Ryvfun, Gneel urer, V cenl gurr; sbe gur YBEQ
ungu frag zr gb Orgury. Naq Ryvfun fnvq hagb uvz, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu,
naq nf gul fbhy yvirgu, V jvyy abg yrnir gurr. Fb gurl jrag qbja gb
Orgury.

2:3 Naq gur fbaf bs gur cebcurgf gung jrer ng Orgury pnzr sbegu gb
Ryvfun, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Xabjrfg gubh gung gur YBEQ jvyy gnxr njnl
gul znfgre sebz gul urnq gb qnl? Naq ur fnvq, Lrn, V xabj vg; ubyq lr
lbhe crnpr.

2:4 Naq Ryvwnu fnvq hagb uvz, Ryvfun, gneel urer, V cenl gurr; sbe gur
YBEQ ungu frag zr gb Wrevpub. Naq ur fnvq, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, naq nf
gul fbhy yvirgu, V jvyy abg yrnir gurr. Fb gurl pnzr gb Wrevpub.

2:5 Naq gur fbaf bs gur cebcurgf gung jrer ng Wrevpub pnzr gb Ryvfun,
naq fnvq hagb uvz, Xabjrfg gubh gung gur YBEQ jvyy gnxr njnl gul
znfgre sebz gul urnq gb qnl? Naq ur nafjrerq, Lrn, V xabj vg; ubyq lr
lbhe crnpr.

2:6 Naq Ryvwnu fnvq hagb uvz, Gneel, V cenl gurr, urer; sbe gur YBEQ
ungu frag zr gb Wbeqna. Naq ur fnvq, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, naq nf gul
fbhy yvirgu, V jvyy abg yrnir gurr. Naq gurl gjb jrag ba.

2:7 Naq svsgl zra bs gur fbaf bs gur cebcurgf jrag, naq fgbbq gb ivrj
nsne bss: naq gurl gjb fgbbq ol Wbeqna.

2:8 Naq Ryvwnu gbbx uvf znagyr, naq jenccrq vg gbtrgure, naq fzbgr gur
jngref, naq gurl jrer qvivqrq uvgure naq guvgure, fb gung gurl gjb
jrag bire ba qel tebhaq.

2:9 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gurl jrer tbar bire, gung Ryvwnu fnvq
hagb Ryvfun, Nfx jung V funyy qb sbe gurr, orsber V or gnxra njnl sebz
gurr. Naq Ryvfun fnvq, V cenl gurr, yrg n qbhoyr cbegvba bs gul fcvevg
or hcba zr.

2:10 Naq ur fnvq, Gubh unfg nfxrq n uneq guvat: arireguryrff, vs gubh
frr zr jura V nz gnxra sebz gurr, vg funyy or fb hagb gurr; ohg vs
abg, vg funyy abg or fb.

2:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf gurl fgvyy jrag ba, naq gnyxrq, gung,
orubyq, gurer nccrnerq n punevbg bs sver, naq ubefrf bs sver, naq
cnegrq gurz obgu nfhaqre; naq Ryvwnu jrag hc ol n juveyjvaq vagb
urnira.

2:12 Naq Ryvfun fnj vg, naq ur pevrq, Zl sngure, zl sngure, gur
punevbg bs Vfenry, naq gur ubefrzra gurerbs. Naq ur fnj uvz ab zber:
naq ur gbbx ubyq bs uvf bja pybgurf, naq erag gurz va gjb cvrprf.

2:13 Ur gbbx hc nyfb gur znagyr bs Ryvwnu gung sryy sebz uvz, naq jrag
onpx, naq fgbbq ol gur onax bs Wbeqna; 2:14 Naq ur gbbx gur znagyr bs
Ryvwnu gung sryy sebz uvz, naq fzbgr gur jngref, naq fnvq, Jurer vf
gur YBEQ Tbq bs Ryvwnu? naq jura ur nyfb unq fzvggra gur jngref, gurl
cnegrq uvgure naq guvgure: naq Ryvfun jrag bire.

2:15 Naq jura gur fbaf bs gur cebcurgf juvpu jrer gb ivrj ng Wrevpub
fnj uvz, gurl fnvq, Gur fcvevg bs Ryvwnu qbgu erfg ba Ryvfun. Naq gurl
pnzr gb zrrg uvz, naq objrq gurzfryirf gb gur tebhaq orsber uvz.

2:16 Naq gurl fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq abj, gurer or jvgu gul freinagf
svsgl fgebat zra; yrg gurz tb, jr cenl gurr, naq frrx gul znfgre: yrfg
crenqiragher gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ ungu gnxra uvz hc, naq pnfg uvz
hcba fbzr zbhagnva, be vagb fbzr inyyrl. Naq ur fnvq, Lr funyy abg
fraq.

2:17 Naq jura gurl hetrq uvz gvyy ur jnf nfunzrq, ur fnvq, Fraq. Gurl
frag gurersber svsgl zra; naq gurl fbhtug guerr qnlf, ohg sbhaq uvz
abg.

2:18 Naq jura gurl pnzr ntnva gb uvz, (sbe ur gneevrq ng Wrevpub,) ur
fnvq hagb gurz, Qvq V abg fnl hagb lbh, Tb abg?  2:19 Naq gur zra bs
gur pvgl fnvq hagb Ryvfun, Orubyq, V cenl gurr, gur fvghngvba bs guvf
pvgl vf cyrnfnag, nf zl ybeq frrgu: ohg gur jngre vf anhtug, naq gur
tebhaq oneera.

2:20 Naq ur fnvq, Oevat zr n arj pehfr, naq chg fnyg gurerva. Naq gurl
oebhtug vg gb uvz.

2:21 Naq ur jrag sbegu hagb gur fcevat bs gur jngref, naq pnfg gur
fnyg va gurer, naq fnvq, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, V unir urnyrq gurfr
jngref; gurer funyy abg or sebz gurapr nal zber qrngu be oneera ynaq.

2:22 Fb gur jngref jrer urnyrq hagb guvf qnl, nppbeqvat gb gur fnlvat
bs Ryvfun juvpu ur fcnxr.

2:23 Naq ur jrag hc sebz gurapr hagb Orgury: naq nf ur jnf tbvat hc ol
gur jnl, gurer pnzr sbegu yvggyr puvyqera bhg bs gur pvgl, naq zbpxrq
uvz, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Tb hc, gubh onyq urnq; tb hc, gubh onyq urnq.

2:24 Naq ur ghearq onpx, naq ybbxrq ba gurz, naq phefrq gurz va gur
anzr bs gur YBEQ. Naq gurer pnzr sbegu gjb fur ornef bhg bs gur jbbq,
naq gner sbegl naq gjb puvyqera bs gurz.

2:25 Naq ur jrag sebz gurapr gb zbhag Pnezry, naq sebz gurapr ur
erghearq gb Fnznevn.

3:1 Abj Wrubenz gur fba bs Nuno ortna gb ervta bire Vfenry va Fnznevn
gur rvtugrragu lrne bs Wrubfuncung xvat bs Whqnu, naq ervtarq gjryir
lrnef.

3:2 Naq ur jebhtug rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ; ohg abg yvxr uvf
sngure, naq yvxr uvf zbgure: sbe ur chg njnl gur vzntr bs Onny gung
uvf sngure unq znqr.

3:3 Arireguryrff ur pyrnirq hagb gur fvaf bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs
Arong, juvpu znqr Vfenry gb fva; ur qrcnegrq abg gurersebz.

3:4 Naq Zrfun xvat bs Zbno jnf n furrcznfgre, naq eraqrerq hagb gur
xvat bs Vfenry na uhaqerq gubhfnaq ynzof, naq na uhaqerq gubhfnaq
enzf, jvgu gur jbby.

3:5 Ohg vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Nuno jnf qrnq, gung gur xvat bs Zbno
eroryyrq ntnvafg gur xvat bs Vfenry.

3:6 Naq xvat Wrubenz jrag bhg bs Fnznevn gur fnzr gvzr, naq ahzorerq
nyy Vfenry.

3:7 Naq ur jrag naq frag gb Wrubfuncung gur xvat bs Whqnu, fnlvat, Gur
xvat bs Zbno ungu eroryyrq ntnvafg zr: jvyg gubh tb jvgu zr ntnvafg
Zbno gb onggyr? Naq ur fnvq, V jvyy tb hc: V nz nf gubh neg, zl crbcyr
nf gul crbcyr, naq zl ubefrf nf gul ubefrf.

3:8 Naq ur fnvq, Juvpu jnl funyy jr tb hc? Naq ur nafjrerq, Gur jnl
guebhtu gur jvyqrearff bs Rqbz.

3:9 Fb gur xvat bs Vfenry jrag, naq gur xvat bs Whqnu, naq gur xvat bs
Rqbz: naq gurl srgpurq n pbzcnff bs frira qnlf' wbhearl: naq gurer jnf
ab jngre sbe gur ubfg, naq sbe gur pnggyr gung sbyybjrq gurz.

3:10 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry fnvq, Nynf! gung gur YBEQ ungu pnyyrq
gurfr guerr xvatf gbtrgure, gb qryvire gurz vagb gur unaq bs Zbno!
3:11 Ohg Wrubfuncung fnvq, Vf gurer abg urer n cebcurg bs gur YBEQ,
gung jr znl radhver bs gur YBEQ ol uvz? Naq bar bs gur xvat bs
Vfenry'f freinagf nafjrerq naq fnvq, Urer vf Ryvfun gur fba bs
Funcung, juvpu cbherq jngre ba gur unaqf bs Ryvwnu.

3:12 Naq Wrubfuncung fnvq, Gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ vf jvgu uvz. Fb gur
xvat bs Vfenry naq Wrubfuncung naq gur xvat bs Rqbz jrag qbja gb uvz.

3:13 Naq Ryvfun fnvq hagb gur xvat bs Vfenry, Jung unir V gb qb jvgu
gurr?  trg gurr gb gur cebcurgf bs gul sngure, naq gb gur cebcurgf bs
gul zbgure.

Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry fnvq hagb uvz, Anl: sbe gur YBEQ ungu pnyyrq
gurfr guerr xvatf gbtrgure, gb qryvire gurz vagb gur unaq bs Zbno.

3:14 Naq Ryvfun fnvq, Nf gur YBEQ bs ubfgf yvirgu, orsber jubz V
fgnaq, fheryl, jrer vg abg gung V ertneq gur cerfrapr bs Wrubfuncung
gur xvat bs Whqnu, V jbhyq abg ybbx gbjneq gurr, abe frr gurr.

3:15 Ohg abj oevat zr n zvafgery. Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur
zvafgery cynlrq, gung gur unaq bs gur YBEQ pnzr hcba uvz.

3:16 Naq ur fnvq, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Znxr guvf inyyrl shyy bs
qvgpurf.

3:17 Sbe guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Lr funyy abg frr jvaq, arvgure funyy lr
frr enva; lrg gung inyyrl funyy or svyyrq jvgu jngre, gung lr znl
qevax, obgu lr, naq lbhe pnggyr, naq lbhe ornfgf.

3:18 Naq guvf vf ohg n yvtug guvat va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ: ur jvyy
qryvire gur Zbnovgrf nyfb vagb lbhe unaq.

3:19 Naq lr funyy fzvgr rirel sraprq pvgl, naq rirel pubvpr pvgl, naq
funyy sryy rirel tbbq gerr, naq fgbc nyy jryyf bs jngre, naq zne rirel
tbbq cvrpr bs ynaq jvgu fgbarf.

3:20 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur zbeavat, jura gur zrng bssrevat jnf
bssrerq, gung, orubyq, gurer pnzr jngre ol gur jnl bs Rqbz, naq gur
pbhagel jnf svyyrq jvgu jngre.

3:21 Naq jura nyy gur Zbnovgrf urneq gung gur xvatf jrer pbzr hc gb
svtug ntnvafg gurz, gurl tngurerq nyy gung jrer noyr gb chg ba nezbhe,
naq hcjneq, naq fgbbq va gur obeqre.

3:22 Naq gurl ebfr hc rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq gur fha fubar hcba gur
jngre, naq gur Zbnovgrf fnj gur jngre ba gur bgure fvqr nf erq nf
oybbq: 3:23 Naq gurl fnvq, Guvf vf oybbq: gur xvatf ner fheryl fynva,
naq gurl unir fzvggra bar nabgure: abj gurersber, Zbno, gb gur fcbvy.

3:24 Naq jura gurl pnzr gb gur pnzc bs Vfenry, gur Vfenryvgrf ebfr hc
naq fzbgr gur Zbnovgrf, fb gung gurl syrq orsber gurz: ohg gurl jrag
sbejneq fzvgvat gur Zbnovgrf, rira va gurve pbhagel.

3:25 Naq gurl orng qbja gur pvgvrf, naq ba rirel tbbq cvrpr bs ynaq
pnfg rirel zna uvf fgbar, naq svyyrq vg; naq gurl fgbccrq nyy gur
jryyf bs jngre, naq sryyrq nyy gur tbbq gerrf: bayl va Xveunenfrgu
yrsg gurl gur fgbarf gurerbs; ubjorvg gur fyvatref jrag nobhg vg, naq
fzbgr vg.

3:26 Naq jura gur xvat bs Zbno fnj gung gur onggyr jnf gbb fber sbe
uvz, ur gbbx jvgu uvz frira uhaqerq zra gung qerj fjbeqf, gb oernx
guebhtu rira hagb gur xvat bs Rqbz: ohg gurl pbhyq abg.

3:27 Gura ur gbbx uvf ryqrfg fba gung fubhyq unir ervtarq va uvf
fgrnq, naq bssrerq uvz sbe n oheag bssrevat hcba gur jnyy. Naq gurer
jnf terng vaqvtangvba ntnvafg Vfenry: naq gurl qrcnegrq sebz uvz, naq
erghearq gb gurve bja ynaq.

4:1 Abj gurer pevrq n pregnva jbzna bs gur jvirf bs gur fbaf bs gur
cebcurgf hagb Ryvfun, fnlvat, Gul freinag zl uhfonaq vf qrnq; naq gubh
xabjrfg gung gul freinag qvq srne gur YBEQ: naq gur perqvgbe vf pbzr
gb gnxr hagb uvz zl gjb fbaf gb or obaqzra.

4:2 Naq Ryvfun fnvq hagb ure, Jung funyy V qb sbe gurr? gryy zr, jung
unfg gubh va gur ubhfr? Naq fur fnvq, Guvar unaqznvq ungu abg nal
guvat va gur ubhfr, fnir n cbg bs bvy.

4:3 Gura ur fnvq, Tb, obeebj gurr irffryf noebnq bs nyy gul
arvtuobhef, rira rzcgl irffryf; obeebj abg n srj.

4:4 Naq jura gubh neg pbzr va, gubh funyg fuhg gur qbbe hcba gurr naq
hcba gul fbaf, naq funyg cbhe bhg vagb nyy gubfr irffryf, naq gubh
funyg frg nfvqr gung juvpu vf shyy.

4:5 Fb fur jrag sebz uvz, naq fuhg gur qbbe hcba ure naq hcba ure
fbaf, jub oebhtug gur irffryf gb ure; naq fur cbherq bhg.

4:6 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur irffryf jrer shyy, gung fur fnvq
hagb ure fba, Oevat zr lrg n irffry. Naq ur fnvq hagb ure, Gurer vf
abg n irffry zber. Naq gur bvy fgnlrq.

4:7 Gura fur pnzr naq gbyq gur zna bs Tbq. Naq ur fnvq, Tb, fryy gur
bvy, naq cnl gul qrog, naq yvir gubh naq gul puvyqera bs gur erfg.

4:8 Naq vg sryy ba n qnl, gung Ryvfun cnffrq gb Fuharz, jurer jnf n
terng jbzna; naq fur pbafgenvarq uvz gb rng oernq. Naq fb vg jnf, gung
nf bsg nf ur cnffrq ol, ur ghearq va guvgure gb rng oernq.

4:9 Naq fur fnvq hagb ure uhfonaq, Orubyq abj, V creprvir gung guvf vf
na ubyl zna bs Tbq, juvpu cnffrgu ol hf pbagvahnyyl.

4:10 Yrg hf znxr n yvggyr punzore, V cenl gurr, ba gur jnyy; naq yrg
hf frg sbe uvz gurer n orq, naq n gnoyr, naq n fgbby, naq n
pnaqyrfgvpx: naq vg funyy or, jura ur pbzrgu gb hf, gung ur funyy ghea
va guvgure.

4:11 Naq vg sryy ba n qnl, gung ur pnzr guvgure, naq ur ghearq vagb
gur punzore, naq ynl gurer.

4:12 Naq ur fnvq gb Trunmv uvf freinag, Pnyy guvf Fuhanzzvgr. Naq jura
ur unq pnyyrq ure, fur fgbbq orsber uvz.

4:13 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Fnl abj hagb ure, Orubyq, gubh unfg orra
pnershy sbe hf jvgu nyy guvf pner; jung vf gb or qbar sbe gurr?
jbhyqrfg gubh or fcbxra sbe gb gur xvat, be gb gur pncgnva bs gur
ubfg? Naq fur nafjrerq, V qjryy nzbat zvar bja crbcyr.

4:14 Naq ur fnvq, Jung gura vf gb or qbar sbe ure? Naq Trunmv
nafjrerq, Irevyl fur ungu ab puvyq, naq ure uhfonaq vf byq.

4:15 Naq ur fnvq, Pnyy ure. Naq jura ur unq pnyyrq ure, fur fgbbq va
gur qbbe.

4:16 Naq ur fnvq, Nobhg guvf frnfba, nppbeqvat gb gur gvzr bs yvsr,
gubh funyg rzoenpr n fba. Naq fur fnvq, Anl, zl ybeq, gubh zna bs Tbq,
qb abg yvr hagb guvar unaqznvq.

4:17 Naq gur jbzna pbaprvirq, naq oner n fba ng gung frnfba gung
Ryvfun unq fnvq hagb ure, nppbeqvat gb gur gvzr bs yvsr.

4:18 Naq jura gur puvyq jnf tebja, vg sryy ba n qnl, gung ur jrag bhg
gb uvf sngure gb gur erncref.

4:19 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvf sngure, Zl urnq, zl urnq. Naq ur fnvq gb n
ynq, Pneel uvz gb uvf zbgure.

4:20 Naq jura ur unq gnxra uvz, naq oebhtug uvz gb uvf zbgure, ur fng
ba ure xarrf gvyy abba, naq gura qvrq.

4:21 Naq fur jrag hc, naq ynvq uvz ba gur orq bs gur zna bs Tbq, naq
fuhg gur qbbe hcba uvz, naq jrag bhg.

4:22 Naq fur pnyyrq hagb ure uhfonaq, naq fnvq, Fraq zr, V cenl gurr,
bar bs gur lbhat zra, naq bar bs gur nffrf, gung V znl eha gb gur zna
bs Tbq, naq pbzr ntnva.

4:23 Naq ur fnvq, Jurersber jvyg gubh tb gb uvz gb qnl? vg vf arvgure
arj zbba, abe fnoongu. Naq fur fnvq, Vg funyy or jryy.

4:24 Gura fur fnqqyrq na nff, naq fnvq gb ure freinag, Qevir, naq tb
sbejneq; fynpx abg gul evqvat sbe zr, rkprcg V ovq gurr.

4:25 Fb fur jrag naq pnzr hagb gur zna bs Tbq gb zbhag Pnezry. Naq vg
pnzr gb cnff, jura gur zna bs Tbq fnj ure nsne bss, gung ur fnvq gb
Trunmv uvf freinag, Orubyq, lbaqre vf gung Fuhanzzvgr: 4:26 Eha abj, V
cenl gurr, gb zrrg ure, naq fnl hagb ure, Vf vg jryy jvgu gurr? vf vg
jryy jvgu gul uhfonaq? vf vg jryy jvgu gur puvyq? Naq fur nafjrerq, Vg
vf jryy: 4:27 Naq jura fur pnzr gb gur zna bs Tbq gb gur uvyy, fur
pnhtug uvz ol gur srrg: ohg Trunmv pnzr arne gb guehfg ure njnl. Naq
gur zna bs Tbq fnvq, Yrg ure nybar; sbe ure fbhy vf irkrq jvguva ure:
naq gur YBEQ ungu uvq vg sebz zr, naq ungu abg gbyq zr.

4:28 Gura fur fnvq, Qvq V qrfver n fba bs zl ybeq? qvq V abg fnl, Qb
abg qrprvir zr?  4:29 Gura ur fnvq gb Trunmv, Tveq hc gul ybvaf, naq
gnxr zl fgnss va guvar unaq, naq tb gul jnl: vs gubh zrrg nal zna,
fnyhgr uvz abg; naq vs nal fnyhgr gurr, nafjre uvz abg ntnva: naq ynl
zl fgnss hcba gur snpr bs gur puvyq.

4:30 Naq gur zbgure bs gur puvyq fnvq, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, naq nf gul
fbhy yvirgu, V jvyy abg yrnir gurr. Naq ur nebfr, naq sbyybjrq ure.

4:31 Naq Trunmv cnffrq ba orsber gurz, naq ynvq gur fgnss hcba gur
snpr bs gur puvyq; ohg gurer jnf arvgure ibvpr, abe urnevat. Jurersber
ur jrag ntnva gb zrrg uvz, naq gbyq uvz, fnlvat, Gur puvyq vf abg
njnxrq.

4:32 Naq jura Ryvfun jnf pbzr vagb gur ubhfr, orubyq, gur puvyq jnf
qrnq, naq ynvq hcba uvf orq.

4:33 Ur jrag va gurersber, naq fuhg gur qbbe hcba gurz gjnva, naq
cenlrq hagb gur YBEQ.

4:34 Naq ur jrag hc, naq ynl hcba gur puvyq, naq chg uvf zbhgu hcba
uvf zbhgu, naq uvf rlrf hcba uvf rlrf, naq uvf unaqf hcba uvf unaqf:
naq fgergpurq uvzfrys hcba gur puvyq; naq gur syrfu bs gur puvyq jnkrq
jnez.

4:35 Gura ur erghearq, naq jnyxrq va gur ubhfr gb naq seb; naq jrag
hc, naq fgergpurq uvzfrys hcba uvz: naq gur puvyq farrmrq frira gvzrf,
naq gur puvyq bcrarq uvf rlrf.

4:36 Naq ur pnyyrq Trunmv, naq fnvq, Pnyy guvf Fuhanzzvgr. Fb ur
pnyyrq ure. Naq jura fur jnf pbzr va hagb uvz, ur fnvq, Gnxr hc gul
fba.

4:37 Gura fur jrag va, naq sryy ng uvf srrg, naq objrq urefrys gb gur
tebhaq, naq gbbx hc ure fba, naq jrag bhg.

4:38 Naq Ryvfun pnzr ntnva gb Tvytny: naq gurer jnf n qrnegu va gur
ynaq; naq gur fbaf bs gur cebcurgf jrer fvggvat orsber uvz: naq ur
fnvq hagb uvf freinag, Frg ba gur terng cbg, naq frrgur cbggntr sbe
gur fbaf bs gur cebcurgf.

4:39 Naq bar jrag bhg vagb gur svryq gb tngure ureof, naq sbhaq n jvyq
ivar, naq tngurerq gurerbs jvyq tbheqf uvf ync shyy, naq pnzr naq
fuerq gurz vagb gur cbg bs cbggntr: sbe gurl xarj gurz abg.

4:40 Fb gurl cbherq bhg sbe gur zra gb rng. Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf
gurl jrer rngvat bs gur cbggntr, gung gurl pevrq bhg, naq fnvq, B gubh
zna bs Tbq, gurer vf qrngu va gur cbg. Naq gurl pbhyq abg rng gurerbs.

4:41 Ohg ur fnvq, Gura oevat zrny. Naq ur pnfg vg vagb gur cbg; naq ur
fnvq, Cbhe bhg sbe gur crbcyr, gung gurl znl rng. Naq gurer jnf ab
unez va gur cbg.

4:42 Naq gurer pnzr n zna sebz Onnyfunyvfun, naq oebhtug gur zna bs
Tbq oernq bs gur svefgsehvgf, gjragl ybnirf bs oneyrl, naq shyy rnef
bs pbea va gur uhfx gurerbs. Naq ur fnvq, Tvir hagb gur crbcyr, gung
gurl znl rng.

4:43 Naq uvf freivgbe fnvq, Jung, fubhyq V frg guvf orsber na uhaqerq
zra?  Ur fnvq ntnva, Tvir gur crbcyr, gung gurl znl rng: sbe guhf
fnvgu gur YBEQ, Gurl funyy rng, naq funyy yrnir gurerbs.

4:44 Fb ur frg vg orsber gurz, naq gurl qvq rng, naq yrsg gurerbs,
nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ.

5:1 Abj Annzna, pncgnva bs gur ubfg bs gur xvat bs Flevn, jnf n terng
zna jvgu uvf znfgre, naq ubabhenoyr, orpnhfr ol uvz gur YBEQ unq tvira
qryvirenapr hagb Flevn: ur jnf nyfb n zvtugl zna va inybhe, ohg ur jnf
n yrcre.

5:2 Naq gur Flevnaf unq tbar bhg ol pbzcnavrf, naq unq oebhtug njnl
pncgvir bhg bs gur ynaq bs Vfenry n yvggyr znvq; naq fur jnvgrq ba
Annzna'f jvsr.

5:3 Naq fur fnvq hagb ure zvfgerff, Jbhyq Tbq zl ybeq jrer jvgu gur
cebcurg gung vf va Fnznevn! sbe ur jbhyq erpbire uvz bs uvf yrcebfl.

5:4 Naq bar jrag va, naq gbyq uvf ybeq, fnlvat, Guhf naq guhf fnvq gur
znvq gung vf bs gur ynaq bs Vfenry.

5:5 Naq gur xvat bs Flevn fnvq, Tb gb, tb, naq V jvyy fraq n yrggre
hagb gur xvat bs Vfenry. Naq ur qrcnegrq, naq gbbx jvgu uvz gra
gnyragf bs fvyire, naq fvk gubhfnaq cvrprf bs tbyq, naq gra punatrf bs
envzrag.

5:6 Naq ur oebhtug gur yrggre gb gur xvat bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Abj jura
guvf yrggre vf pbzr hagb gurr, orubyq, V unir gurerjvgu frag Annzna zl
freinag gb gurr, gung gubh znlrfg erpbire uvz bs uvf yrcebfl.

5:7 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur xvat bs Vfenry unq ernq gur yrggre,
gung ur erag uvf pybgurf, naq fnvq, Nz V Tbq, gb xvyy naq gb znxr
nyvir, gung guvf zna qbgu fraq hagb zr gb erpbire n zna bs uvf
yrcebfl? jurersber pbafvqre, V cenl lbh, naq frr ubj ur frrxrgu n
dhneery ntnvafg zr.

5:8 Naq vg jnf fb, jura Ryvfun gur zna bs Tbq unq urneq gung gur xvat
bs Vfenry unq erag uvf pybgurf, gung ur frag gb gur xvat, fnlvat,
Jurersber unfg gubh erag gul pybgurf? yrg uvz pbzr abj gb zr, naq ur
funyy xabj gung gurer vf n cebcurg va Vfenry.

5:9 Fb Annzna pnzr jvgu uvf ubefrf naq jvgu uvf punevbg, naq fgbbq ng
gur qbbe bs gur ubhfr bs Ryvfun.

5:10 Naq Ryvfun frag n zrffratre hagb uvz, fnlvat, Tb naq jnfu va
Wbeqna frira gvzrf, naq gul syrfu funyy pbzr ntnva gb gurr, naq gubh
funyg or pyrna.

5:11 Ohg Annzna jnf jebgu, naq jrag njnl, naq fnvq, Orubyq, V gubhtug,
Ur jvyy fheryl pbzr bhg gb zr, naq fgnaq, naq pnyy ba gur anzr bs gur
YBEQ uvf Tbq, naq fgevxr uvf unaq bire gur cynpr, naq erpbire gur
yrcre.

5:12 Ner abg Nonan naq Cunecne, eviref bs Qnznfphf, orggre guna nyy
gur jngref bs Vfenry? znl V abg jnfu va gurz, naq or pyrna? Fb ur
ghearq naq jrag njnl va n entr.

5:13 Naq uvf freinagf pnzr arne, naq fcnxr hagb uvz, naq fnvq, Zl
sngure, vs gur cebcurg unq ovq gurr qb fbzr terng guvat, jbhyqrfg gubh
abg unir qbar vg? ubj zhpu engure gura, jura ur fnvgu gb gurr, Jnfu,
naq or pyrna?  5:14 Gura jrag ur qbja, naq qvccrq uvzfrys frira gvzrf
va Wbeqna, nppbeqvat gb gur fnlvat bs gur zna bs Tbq: naq uvf syrfu
pnzr ntnva yvxr hagb gur syrfu bs n yvggyr puvyq, naq ur jnf pyrna.

5:15 Naq ur erghearq gb gur zna bs Tbq, ur naq nyy uvf pbzcnal, naq
pnzr, naq fgbbq orsber uvz: naq ur fnvq, Orubyq, abj V xabj gung gurer
vf ab Tbq va nyy gur rnegu, ohg va Vfenry: abj gurersber, V cenl gurr,
gnxr n oyrffvat bs gul freinag.

5:16 Ohg ur fnvq, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, orsber jubz V fgnaq, V jvyy
erprvir abar. Naq ur hetrq uvz gb gnxr vg; ohg ur ershfrq.

5:17 Naq Annzna fnvq, Funyy gurer abg gura, V cenl gurr, or tvira gb
gul freinag gjb zhyrf' oheqra bs rnegu? sbe gul freinag jvyy
uraprsbegu bssre arvgure oheag bssrevat abe fnpevsvpr hagb bgure tbqf,
ohg hagb gur YBEQ.

5:18 Va guvf guvat gur YBEQ cneqba gul freinag, gung jura zl znfgre
tbrgu vagb gur ubhfr bs Evzzba gb jbefuvc gurer, naq ur yrnargu ba zl
unaq, naq V obj zlfrys va gur ubhfr bs Evzzba: jura V obj qbja zlfrys
va gur ubhfr bs Evzzba, gur YBEQ cneqba gul freinag va guvf guvat.

5:19 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Tb va crnpr. Fb ur qrcnegrq sebz uvz n
yvggyr jnl.

5:20 Ohg Trunmv, gur freinag bs Ryvfun gur zna bs Tbq, fnvq, Orubyq,
zl znfgre ungu fcnerq Annzna guvf Flevna, va abg erprvivat ng uvf
unaqf gung juvpu ur oebhtug: ohg, nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, V jvyy eha nsgre
uvz, naq gnxr fbzrjung bs uvz.

5:21 Fb Trunmv sbyybjrq nsgre Annzna. Naq jura Annzna fnj uvz ehaavat
nsgre uvz, ur yvtugrq qbja sebz gur punevbg gb zrrg uvz, naq fnvq, Vf
nyy jryy?  5:22 Naq ur fnvq, Nyy vf jryy. Zl znfgre ungu frag zr,
fnlvat, Orubyq, rira abj gurer or pbzr gb zr sebz zbhag Rcuenvz gjb
lbhat zra bs gur fbaf bs gur cebcurgf: tvir gurz, V cenl gurr, n
gnyrag bs fvyire, naq gjb punatrf bs tnezragf.

5:23 Naq Annzna fnvq, Or pbagrag, gnxr gjb gnyragf. Naq ur hetrq uvz,
naq obhaq gjb gnyragf bs fvyire va gjb ontf, jvgu gjb punatrf bs
tnezragf, naq ynvq gurz hcba gjb bs uvf freinagf; naq gurl oner gurz
orsber uvz.

5:24 Naq jura ur pnzr gb gur gbjre, ur gbbx gurz sebz gurve unaq, naq
orfgbjrq gurz va gur ubhfr: naq ur yrg gur zra tb, naq gurl qrcnegrq.

5:25 Ohg ur jrag va, naq fgbbq orsber uvf znfgre. Naq Ryvfun fnvq hagb
uvz, Jurapr pbzrfg gubh, Trunmv? Naq ur fnvq, Gul freinag jrag ab
juvgure.

5:26 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz, Jrag abg zvar urneg jvgu gurr, jura gur zna
ghearq ntnva sebz uvf punevbg gb zrrg gurr? Vf vg n gvzr gb erprvir
zbarl, naq gb erprvir tnezragf, naq byvirlneqf, naq ivarlneqf, naq
furrc, naq bkra, naq zrafreinagf, naq znvqfreinagf?  5:27 Gur yrcebfl
gurersber bs Annzna funyy pyrnir hagb gurr, naq hagb gul frrq sbe
rire. Naq ur jrag bhg sebz uvf cerfrapr n yrcre nf juvgr nf fabj.

6:1 Naq gur fbaf bs gur cebcurgf fnvq hagb Ryvfun, Orubyq abj, gur
cynpr jurer jr qjryy jvgu gurr vf gbb fgenvg sbe hf.

6:2 Yrg hf tb, jr cenl gurr, hagb Wbeqna, naq gnxr gurapr rirel zna n
ornz, naq yrg hf znxr hf n cynpr gurer, jurer jr znl qjryy. Naq ur
nafjrerq, Tb lr.

6:3 Naq bar fnvq, Or pbagrag, V cenl gurr, naq tb jvgu gul freinagf.
Naq ur nafjrerq, V jvyy tb.

6:4 Fb ur jrag jvgu gurz. Naq jura gurl pnzr gb Wbeqna, gurl phg qbja
jbbq.

6:5 Ohg nf bar jnf sryyvat n ornz, gur nkr urnq sryy vagb gur jngre:
naq ur pevrq, naq fnvq, Nynf, znfgre! sbe vg jnf obeebjrq.

6:6 Naq gur zna bs Tbq fnvq, Jurer sryy vg? Naq ur furjrq uvz gur
cynpr.

Naq ur phg qbja n fgvpx, naq pnfg vg va guvgure; naq gur veba qvq
fjvz.

6:7 Gurersber fnvq ur, Gnxr vg hc gb gurr. Naq ur chg bhg uvf unaq,
naq gbbx vg.

6:8 Gura gur xvat bs Flevn jneerq ntnvafg Vfenry, naq gbbx pbhafry
jvgu uvf freinagf, fnlvat, Va fhpu naq fhpu n cynpr funyy or zl pnzc.

6:9 Naq gur zna bs Tbq frag hagb gur xvat bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Orjner
gung gubh cnff abg fhpu n cynpr; sbe guvgure gur Flevnaf ner pbzr
qbja.

6:10 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry frag gb gur cynpr juvpu gur zna bs Tbq
gbyq uvz naq jnearq uvz bs, naq fnirq uvzfrys gurer, abg bapr abe
gjvpr.

6:11 Gurersber gur urneg bs gur xvat bs Flevn jnf fber gebhoyrq sbe
guvf guvat; naq ur pnyyrq uvf freinagf, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Jvyy lr
abg furj zr juvpu bs hf vf sbe gur xvat bs Vfenry?  6:12 Naq bar bs
uvf freinagf fnvq, Abar, zl ybeq, B xvat: ohg Ryvfun, gur cebcurg gung
vf va Vfenry, gryyrgu gur xvat bs Vfenry gur jbeqf gung gubh fcrnxrfg
va gul orqpunzore.

6:13 Naq ur fnvq, Tb naq fcl jurer ur vf, gung V znl fraq naq srgpu
uvz.

Naq vg jnf gbyq uvz, fnlvat, Orubyq, ur vf va Qbguna.

6:14 Gurersber frag ur guvgure ubefrf, naq punevbgf, naq n terng ubfg:
naq gurl pnzr ol avtug, naq pbzcnffrq gur pvgl nobhg.

6:15 Naq jura gur freinag bs gur zna bs Tbq jnf evfra rneyl, naq tbar
sbegu, orubyq, na ubfg pbzcnffrq gur pvgl obgu jvgu ubefrf naq
punevbgf. Naq uvf freinag fnvq hagb uvz, Nynf, zl znfgre! ubj funyy jr
qb?  6:16 Naq ur nafjrerq, Srne abg: sbe gurl gung or jvgu hf ner zber
guna gurl gung or jvgu gurz.

6:17 Naq Ryvfun cenlrq, naq fnvq, YBEQ, V cenl gurr, bcra uvf rlrf,
gung ur znl frr. Naq gur YBEQ bcrarq gur rlrf bs gur lbhat zna; naq ur
fnj: naq, orubyq, gur zbhagnva jnf shyy bs ubefrf naq punevbgf bs sver
ebhaq nobhg Ryvfun.

6:18 Naq jura gurl pnzr qbja gb uvz, Ryvfun cenlrq hagb gur YBEQ, naq
fnvq, Fzvgr guvf crbcyr, V cenl gurr, jvgu oyvaqarff. Naq ur fzbgr
gurz jvgu oyvaqarff nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs Ryvfun.

6:19 Naq Ryvfun fnvq hagb gurz, Guvf vf abg gur jnl, arvgure vf guvf
gur pvgl: sbyybj zr, naq V jvyy oevat lbh gb gur zna jubz lr frrx. Ohg
ur yrq gurz gb Fnznevn.

6:20 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gurl jrer pbzr vagb Fnznevn, gung
Ryvfun fnvq, YBEQ, bcra gur rlrf bs gurfr zra, gung gurl znl frr. Naq
gur YBEQ bcrarq gurve rlrf, naq gurl fnj; naq, orubyq, gurl jrer va
gur zvqfg bs Fnznevn.

6:21 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry fnvq hagb Ryvfun, jura ur fnj gurz, Zl
sngure, funyy V fzvgr gurz? funyy V fzvgr gurz?  6:22 Naq ur nafjrerq,
Gubh funyg abg fzvgr gurz: jbhyqrfg gubh fzvgr gubfr jubz gubh unfg
gnxra pncgvir jvgu gul fjbeq naq jvgu gul obj? frg oernq naq jngre
orsber gurz, gung gurl znl rng naq qevax, naq tb gb gurve znfgre.

6:23 Naq ur cercnerq terng cebivfvba sbe gurz: naq jura gurl unq rngra
naq qehax, ur frag gurz njnl, naq gurl jrag gb gurve znfgre. Fb gur
onaqf bs Flevn pnzr ab zber vagb gur ynaq bs Vfenry.

6:24 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre guvf, gung Oraunqnq xvat bs Flevn
tngurerq nyy uvf ubfg, naq jrag hc, naq orfvrtrq Fnznevn.

6:25 Naq gurer jnf n terng snzvar va Fnznevn: naq, orubyq, gurl
orfvrtrq vg, hagvy na nff'f urnq jnf fbyq sbe sbhefpber cvrprf bs
fvyire, naq gur sbhegu cneg bs n pno bs qbir'f qhat sbe svir cvrprf bs
fvyire.

6:26 Naq nf gur xvat bs Vfenry jnf cnffvat ol hcba gur jnyy, gurer
pevrq n jbzna hagb uvz, fnlvat, Uryc, zl ybeq, B xvat.

6:27 Naq ur fnvq, Vs gur YBEQ qb abg uryc gurr, jurapr funyy V uryc
gurr?  bhg bs gur oneasybbe, be bhg bs gur jvarcerff?  6:28 Naq gur
xvat fnvq hagb ure, Jung nvyrgu gurr? Naq fur nafjrerq, Guvf jbzna
fnvq hagb zr, Tvir gul fba, gung jr znl rng uvz gb qnl, naq jr jvyy
rng zl fba gb zbeebj.

6:29 Fb jr obvyrq zl fba, naq qvq rng uvz: naq V fnvq hagb ure ba gur
arkg qnl, Tvir gul fba, gung jr znl rng uvz: naq fur ungu uvq ure fba.

6:30 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur xvat urneq gur jbeqf bs gur jbzna,
gung ur erag uvf pybgurf; naq ur cnffrq ol hcba gur jnyy, naq gur
crbcyr ybbxrq, naq, orubyq, ur unq fnpxpybgu jvguva hcba uvf syrfu.

6:31 Gura ur fnvq, Tbq qb fb naq zber nyfb gb zr, vs gur urnq bs
Ryvfun gur fba bs Funcung funyy fgnaq ba uvz guvf qnl.

6:32 Ohg Ryvfun fng va uvf ubhfr, naq gur ryqref fng jvgu uvz; naq gur
xvat frag n zna sebz orsber uvz: ohg rer gur zrffratre pnzr gb uvz, ur
fnvq gb gur ryqref, Frr lr ubj guvf fba bs n zheqrere ungu frag gb
gnxr njnl zvar urnq? ybbx, jura gur zrffratre pbzrgu, fuhg gur qbbe,
naq ubyq uvz snfg ng gur qbbe: vf abg gur fbhaq bs uvf znfgre'f srrg
oruvaq uvz?  6:33 Naq juvyr ur lrg gnyxrq jvgu gurz, orubyq, gur
zrffratre pnzr qbja hagb uvz: naq ur fnvq, Orubyq, guvf rivy vf bs gur
YBEQ; jung fubhyq V jnvg sbe gur YBEQ nal ybatre?  7:1 Gura Ryvfun
fnvq, Urne lr gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ; Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Gb zbeebj
nobhg guvf gvzr funyy n zrnfher bs svar sybhe or fbyq sbe n furxry,
naq gjb zrnfherf bs oneyrl sbe n furxry, va gur tngr bs Fnznevn.

7:2 Gura n ybeq ba jubfr unaq gur xvat yrnarq nafjrerq gur zna bs Tbq,
naq fnvq, Orubyq, vs gur YBEQ jbhyq znxr jvaqbjf va urnira, zvtug guvf
guvat or?  Naq ur fnvq, Orubyq, gubh funyg frr vg jvgu guvar rlrf, ohg
funyg abg rng gurerbs.

7:3 Naq gurer jrer sbhe yrcebhf zra ng gur ragrevat va bs gur tngr:
naq gurl fnvq bar gb nabgure, Jul fvg jr urer hagvy jr qvr?  7:4 Vs jr
fnl, Jr jvyy ragre vagb gur pvgl, gura gur snzvar vf va gur pvgl, naq
jr funyy qvr gurer: naq vs jr fvg fgvyy urer, jr qvr nyfb. Abj
gurersber pbzr, naq yrg hf snyy hagb gur ubfg bs gur Flevnaf: vs gurl
fnir hf nyvir, jr funyy yvir; naq vs gurl xvyy hf, jr funyy ohg qvr.

7:5 Naq gurl ebfr hc va gur gjvyvtug, gb tb hagb gur pnzc bs gur
Flevnaf: naq jura gurl jrer pbzr gb gur hggrezbfg cneg bs gur pnzc bs
Flevn, orubyq, gurer jnf ab zna gurer.

7:6 Sbe gur YBEQ unq znqr gur ubfg bs gur Flevnaf gb urne n abvfr bs
punevbgf, naq n abvfr bs ubefrf, rira gur abvfr bs n terng ubfg: naq
gurl fnvq bar gb nabgure, Yb, gur xvat bs Vfenry ungu uverq ntnvafg hf
gur xvatf bs gur Uvggvgrf, naq gur xvatf bs gur Rtlcgvnaf, gb pbzr
hcba hf.

7:7 Jurersber gurl nebfr naq syrq va gur gjvyvtug, naq yrsg gurve
gragf, naq gurve ubefrf, naq gurve nffrf, rira gur pnzc nf vg jnf, naq
syrq sbe gurve yvsr.

7:8 Naq jura gurfr yrcref pnzr gb gur hggrezbfg cneg bs gur pnzc, gurl
jrag vagb bar grag, naq qvq rng naq qevax, naq pneevrq gurapr fvyire,
naq tbyq, naq envzrag, naq jrag naq uvq vg; naq pnzr ntnva, naq
ragrerq vagb nabgure grag, naq pneevrq gurapr nyfb, naq jrag naq uvq
vg.

7:9 Gura gurl fnvq bar gb nabgure, Jr qb abg jryy: guvf qnl vf n qnl
bs tbbq gvqvatf, naq jr ubyq bhe crnpr: vs jr gneel gvyy gur zbeavat
yvtug, fbzr zvfpuvrs jvyy pbzr hcba hf: abj gurersber pbzr, gung jr
znl tb naq gryy gur xvat'f ubhfrubyq.

7:10 Fb gurl pnzr naq pnyyrq hagb gur cbegre bs gur pvgl: naq gurl
gbyq gurz, fnlvat, Jr pnzr gb gur pnzc bs gur Flevnaf, naq, orubyq,
gurer jnf ab zna gurer, arvgure ibvpr bs zna, ohg ubefrf gvrq, naq
nffrf gvrq, naq gur gragf nf gurl jrer.

7:11 Naq ur pnyyrq gur cbegref; naq gurl gbyq vg gb gur xvat'f ubhfr
jvguva.

7:12 Naq gur xvat nebfr va gur avtug, naq fnvq hagb uvf freinagf, V
jvyy abj furj lbh jung gur Flevnaf unir qbar gb hf. Gurl xabj gung jr
or uhatel; gurersber ner gurl tbar bhg bs gur pnzc gb uvqr gurzfryirf
va gur svryq, fnlvat, Jura gurl pbzr bhg bs gur pvgl, jr funyy pngpu
gurz nyvir, naq trg vagb gur pvgl.

7:13 Naq bar bs uvf freinagf nafjrerq naq fnvq, Yrg fbzr gnxr, V cenl
gurr, svir bs gur ubefrf gung erznva, juvpu ner yrsg va gur pvgl,
(orubyq, gurl ner nf nyy gur zhygvghqr bs Vfenry gung ner yrsg va vg:
orubyq, V fnl, gurl ner rira nf nyy gur zhygvghqr bs gur Vfenryvgrf
gung ner pbafhzrq:) naq yrg hf fraq naq frr.

7:14 Gurl gbbx gurersber gjb punevbg ubefrf; naq gur xvat frag nsgre
gur ubfg bs gur Flevnaf, fnlvat, Tb naq frr.

7:15 Naq gurl jrag nsgre gurz hagb Wbeqna: naq, yb, nyy gur jnl jnf
shyy bs tnezragf naq irffryf, juvpu gur Flevnaf unq pnfg njnl va gurve
unfgr. Naq gur zrffratref erghearq, naq gbyq gur xvat.

7:16 Naq gur crbcyr jrag bhg, naq fcbvyrq gur gragf bs gur Flevnaf. Fb
n zrnfher bs svar sybhe jnf fbyq sbe n furxry, naq gjb zrnfherf bs
oneyrl sbe n furxry, nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ.

7:17 Naq gur xvat nccbvagrq gur ybeq ba jubfr unaq ur yrnarq gb unir
gur punetr bs gur tngr: naq gur crbcyr gebqr hcba uvz va gur tngr, naq
ur qvrq, nf gur zna bs Tbq unq fnvq, jub fcnxr jura gur xvat pnzr qbja
gb uvz.

7:18 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nf gur zna bs Tbq unq fcbxra gb gur xvat,
fnlvat, Gjb zrnfherf bs oneyrl sbe n furxry, naq n zrnfher bs svar
sybhe sbe n furxry, funyy or gb zbeebj nobhg guvf gvzr va gur tngr bs
Fnznevn: 7:19 Naq gung ybeq nafjrerq gur zna bs Tbq, naq fnvq, Abj,
orubyq, vs gur YBEQ fubhyq znxr jvaqbjf va urnira, zvtug fhpu n guvat
or? Naq ur fnvq, Orubyq, gubh funyg frr vg jvgu guvar rlrf, ohg funyg
abg rng gurerbs.

7:20 Naq fb vg sryy bhg hagb uvz: sbe gur crbcyr gebqr hcba uvz va gur
tngr, naq ur qvrq.

8:1 Gura fcnxr Ryvfun hagb gur jbzna, jubfr fba ur unq erfgberq gb
yvsr, fnlvat, Nevfr, naq tb gubh naq guvar ubhfrubyq, naq fbwbhea
jurerfbrire gubh pnafg fbwbhea: sbe gur YBEQ ungu pnyyrq sbe n snzvar;
naq vg funyy nyfb pbzr hcba gur ynaq frira lrnef.

8:2 Naq gur jbzna nebfr, naq qvq nsgre gur fnlvat bs gur zna bs Tbq:
naq fur jrag jvgu ure ubhfrubyq, naq fbwbhearq va gur ynaq bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf frira lrnef.

8:3 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur frira lrnef' raq, gung gur jbzna
erghearq bhg bs gur ynaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf: naq fur jrag sbegu gb pel
hagb gur xvat sbe ure ubhfr naq sbe ure ynaq.

8:4 Naq gur xvat gnyxrq jvgu Trunmv gur freinag bs gur zna bs Tbq,
fnlvat, Gryy zr, V cenl gurr, nyy gur terng guvatf gung Ryvfun ungu
qbar.

8:5 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf ur jnf gryyvat gur xvat ubj ur unq
erfgberq n qrnq obql gb yvsr, gung, orubyq, gur jbzna, jubfr fba ur
unq erfgberq gb yvsr, pevrq gb gur xvat sbe ure ubhfr naq sbe ure
ynaq. Naq Trunmv fnvq, Zl ybeq, B xvat, guvf vf gur jbzna, naq guvf vf
ure fba, jubz Ryvfun erfgberq gb yvsr.

8:6 Naq jura gur xvat nfxrq gur jbzna, fur gbyq uvz. Fb gur xvat
nccbvagrq hagb ure n pregnva bssvpre, fnlvat, Erfgber nyy gung jnf
uref, naq nyy gur sehvgf bs gur svryq fvapr gur qnl gung fur yrsg gur
ynaq, rira hagvy abj.

8:7 Naq Ryvfun pnzr gb Qnznfphf; naq Oraunqnq gur xvat bs Flevn jnf
fvpx; naq vg jnf gbyq uvz, fnlvat, Gur zna bs Tbq vf pbzr uvgure.

8:8 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb Unmnry, Gnxr n cerfrag va guvar unaq, naq
tb, zrrg gur zna bs Tbq, naq radhver bs gur YBEQ ol uvz, fnlvat, Funyy
V erpbire bs guvf qvfrnfr?  8:9 Fb Unmnry jrag gb zrrg uvz, naq gbbx n
cerfrag jvgu uvz, rira bs rirel tbbq guvat bs Qnznfphf, sbegl pnzryf'
oheqra, naq pnzr naq fgbbq orsber uvz, naq fnvq, Gul fba Oraunqnq xvat
bs Flevn ungu frag zr gb gurr, fnlvat, Funyy V erpbire bs guvf
qvfrnfr?  8:10 Naq Ryvfun fnvq hagb uvz, Tb, fnl hagb uvz, Gubh znlrfg
pregnvayl erpbire: ubjorvg gur YBEQ ungu furjrq zr gung ur funyy
fheryl qvr.

8:11 Naq ur frggyrq uvf pbhagranapr fgrqsnfgyl, hagvy ur jnf nfunzrq:
naq gur zna bs Tbq jrcg.

8:12 Naq Unmnry fnvq, Jul jrrcrgu zl ybeq? Naq ur nafjrerq, Orpnhfr V
xabj gur rivy gung gubh jvyg qb hagb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: gurve
fgebat ubyqf jvyg gubh frg ba sver, naq gurve lbhat zra jvyg gubh fynl
jvgu gur fjbeq, naq jvyg qnfu gurve puvyqera, naq evc hc gurve jbzra
jvgu puvyq.

8:13 Naq Unmnry fnvq, Ohg jung, vf gul freinag n qbt, gung ur fubhyq
qb guvf terng guvat? Naq Ryvfun nafjrerq, Gur YBEQ ungu furjrq zr gung
gubh funyg or xvat bire Flevn.

8:14 Fb ur qrcnegrq sebz Ryvfun, naq pnzr gb uvf znfgre; jub fnvq gb
uvz, Jung fnvq Ryvfun gb gurr? Naq ur nafjrerq, Ur gbyq zr gung gubh
fubhyqrfg fheryl erpbire.

8:15 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur zbeebj, gung ur gbbx n guvpx pybgu,
naq qvccrq vg va jngre, naq fcernq vg ba uvf snpr, fb gung ur qvrq:
naq Unmnry ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

8:16 Naq va gur svsgu lrne bs Wbenz gur fba bs Nuno xvat bs Vfenry,
Wrubfuncung orvat gura xvat bs Whqnu, Wrubenz gur fba bs Wr ubfuncung
xvat bs Whqnu ortna gb ervta.

8:17 Guvegl naq gjb lrnef byq jnf ur jura ur ortna gb ervta; naq ur
ervtarq rvtug lrnef va Wrehfnyrz.

8:18 Naq ur jnyxrq va gur jnl bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry, nf qvq gur ubhfr
bs Nuno: sbe gur qnhtugre bs Nuno jnf uvf jvsr: naq ur qvq rivy va gur
fvtug bs gur YBEQ.
