8:19 Lrg gur YBEQ jbhyq abg qrfgebl Whqnu sbe Qnivq uvf freinag'f
fnxr, nf ur cebzvfrq uvz gb tvir uvz nyjnl n yvtug, naq gb uvf
puvyqera.

8:20 Va uvf qnlf Rqbz eribygrq sebz haqre gur unaq bs Whqnu, naq znqr
n xvat bire gurzfryirf.

8:21 Fb Wbenz jrag bire gb Mnve, naq nyy gur punevbgf jvgu uvz: naq ur
ebfr ol avtug, naq fzbgr gur Rqbzvgrf juvpu pbzcnffrq uvz nobhg, naq
gur pncgnvaf bs gur punevbgf: naq gur crbcyr syrq vagb gurve gragf.

8:22 Lrg Rqbz eribygrq sebz haqre gur unaq bs Whqnu hagb guvf qnl.
Gura Yvoanu eribygrq ng gur fnzr gvzr.

8:23 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wbenz, naq nyy gung ur qvq, ner gurl
abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu?  8:24
Naq Wbenz fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq jnf ohevrq jvgu uvf snguref va
gur pvgl bs Qnivq: naq Nunmvnu uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

8:25 Va gur gjrysgu lrne bs Wbenz gur fba bs Nuno xvat bs Vfenry qvq
Nunmvnu gur fba bs Wrubenz xvat bs Whqnu ortva gb ervta.

8:26 Gjb naq gjragl lrnef byq jnf Nunmvnu jura ur ortna gb ervta; naq
ur ervtarq bar lrne va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf Ngunyvnu,
gur qnhtugre bs Bzev xvat bs Vfenry.

8:27 Naq ur jnyxrq va gur jnl bs gur ubhfr bs Nuno, naq qvq rivy va
gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, nf qvq gur ubhfr bs Nuno: sbe ur jnf gur fba va
ynj bs gur ubhfr bs Nuno.

8:28 Naq ur jrag jvgu Wbenz gur fba bs Nuno gb gur jne ntnvafg Unmnry
xvat bs Flevn va Enzbgutvyrnq; naq gur Flevnaf jbhaqrq Wbenz.

8:29 Naq xvat Wbenz jrag onpx gb or urnyrq va Wrmerry bs gur jbhaqf
juvpu gur Flevnaf unq tvira uvz ng Enznu, jura ur sbhtug ntnvafg
Unmnry xvat bs Flevn. Naq Nunmvnu gur fba bs Wrubenz xvat bs Whqnu
jrag qbja gb frr Wbenz gur fba bs Nuno va Wrmerry, orpnhfr ur jnf
fvpx.

9:1 Naq Ryvfun gur cebcurg pnyyrq bar bs gur puvyqera bs gur cebcurgf,
naq fnvq hagb uvz, Tveq hc gul ybvaf, naq gnxr guvf obk bs bvy va
guvar unaq, naq tb gb Enzbgutvyrnq: 9:2 Naq jura gubh pbzrfg guvgure,
ybbx bhg gurer Wruh gur fba bs Wrubfuncung gur fba bs Avzfuv, naq tb
va, naq znxr uvz nevfr hc sebz nzbat uvf oerguera, naq pneel uvz gb na
vaare punzore; 9:3 Gura gnxr gur obk bs bvy, naq cbhe vg ba uvf urnq,
naq fnl, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, V unir nabvagrq gurr xvat bire Vfenry.
Gura bcra gur qbbe, naq syrr, naq gneel abg.

9:4 Fb gur lbhat zna, rira gur lbhat zna gur cebcurg, jrag gb
Enzbgutvyrnq.

9:5 Naq jura ur pnzr, orubyq, gur pncgnvaf bs gur ubfg jrer fvggvat;
naq ur fnvq, V unir na reenaq gb gurr, B pncgnva. Naq Wruh fnvq, Hagb
juvpu bs nyy hf? Naq ur fnvq, Gb gurr, B pncgnva.

9:6 Naq ur nebfr, naq jrag vagb gur ubhfr; naq ur cbherq gur bvy ba
uvf urnq, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, V unir
nabvagrq gurr xvat bire gur crbcyr bs gur YBEQ, rira bire Vfenry.

9:7 Naq gubh funyg fzvgr gur ubhfr bs Nuno gul znfgre, gung V znl
niratr gur oybbq bs zl freinagf gur cebcurgf, naq gur oybbq bs nyy gur
freinagf bs gur YBEQ, ng gur unaq bs Wrmrory.

9:8 Sbe gur jubyr ubhfr bs Nuno funyy crevfu: naq V jvyy phg bss sebz
Nuno uvz gung cvffrgu ntnvafg gur jnyy, naq uvz gung vf fuhg hc naq
yrsg va Vfenry: 9:9 Naq V jvyy znxr gur ubhfr bs Nuno yvxr gur ubhfr
bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, naq yvxr gur ubhfr bs Onnfun gur fba bs
Nuvwnu: 9:10 Naq gur qbtf funyy rng Wrmrory va gur cbegvba bs Wrmerry,
naq gurer funyy or abar gb ohel ure. Naq ur bcrarq gur qbbe, naq syrq.

9:11 Gura Wruh pnzr sbegu gb gur freinagf bs uvf ybeq: naq bar fnvq
hagb uvz, Vf nyy jryy? jurersber pnzr guvf znq sryybj gb gurr? Naq ur
fnvq hagb gurz, Lr xabj gur zna, naq uvf pbzzhavpngvba.

9:12 Naq gurl fnvq, Vg vf snyfr; gryy hf abj. Naq ur fnvq, Guhf naq
guhf fcnxr ur gb zr, fnlvat, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, V unir nabvagrq gurr
xvat bire Vfenry.

9:13 Gura gurl unfgrq, naq gbbx rirel zna uvf tnezrag, naq chg vg
haqre uvz ba gur gbc bs gur fgnvef, naq oyrj jvgu gehzcrgf, fnlvat,
Wruh vf xvat.

9:14 Fb Wruh gur fba bs Wrubfuncung gur fba bs Avzfuv pbafcverq
ntnvafg Wbenz. (Abj Wbenz unq xrcg Enzbgutvyrnq, ur naq nyy Vfenry,
orpnhfr bs Unmnry xvat bs Flevn.

9:15 Ohg xvat Wbenz jnf erghearq gb or urnyrq va Wrmerry bs gur jbhaqf
juvpu gur Flevnaf unq tvira uvz, jura ur sbhtug jvgu Unmnry xvat bs
Flevn.)  Naq Wruh fnvq, Vs vg or lbhe zvaqf, gura yrg abar tb sbegu
abe rfpncr bhg bs gur pvgl gb tb gb gryy vg va Wrmerry.

9:16 Fb Wruh ebqr va n punevbg, naq jrag gb Wrmerry; sbe Wbenz ynl
gurer.

Naq Nunmvnu xvat bs Whqnu jnf pbzr qbja gb frr Wbenz.

9:17 Naq gurer fgbbq n jngpuzna ba gur gbjre va Wrmerry, naq ur fcvrq
gur pbzcnal bs Wruh nf ur pnzr, naq fnvq, V frr n pbzcnal. Naq Wbenz
fnvq, Gnxr na ubefrzna, naq fraq gb zrrg gurz, naq yrg uvz fnl, Vf vg
crnpr?  9:18 Fb gurer jrag bar ba ubefronpx gb zrrg uvz, naq fnvq,
Guhf fnvgu gur xvat, Vf vg crnpr? Naq Wruh fnvq, Jung unfg gubh gb qb
jvgu crnpr? ghea gurr oruvaq zr. Naq gur jngpuzna gbyq, fnlvat, Gur
zrffratre pnzr gb gurz, ohg ur pbzrgu abg ntnva.

9:19 Gura ur frag bhg n frpbaq ba ubefronpx, juvpu pnzr gb gurz, naq
fnvq, Guhf fnvgu gur xvat, Vf vg crnpr? Naq Wruh nafjrerq, Jung unfg
gubh gb qb jvgu crnpr? ghea gurr oruvaq zr.

9:20 Naq gur jngpuzna gbyq, fnlvat, Ur pnzr rira hagb gurz, naq pbzrgu
abg ntnva: naq gur qevivat vf yvxr gur qevivat bs Wruh gur fba bs
Avzfuv; sbe ur qevirgu shevbhfyl.

9:21 Naq Wbenz fnvq, Znxr ernql. Naq uvf punevbg jnf znqr ernql. Naq
Wbenz xvat bs Vfenry naq Nunmvnu xvat bs Whqnu jrag bhg, rnpu va uvf
punevbg, naq gurl jrag bhg ntnvafg Wruh, naq zrg uvz va gur cbegvba bs
Anobgu gur Wrmerryvgr.

9:22 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Wbenz fnj Wruh, gung ur fnvq, Vf vg
crnpr, Wruh? Naq ur nafjrerq, Jung crnpr, fb ybat nf gur juberqbzf bs
gul zbgure Wrmrory naq ure jvgpupensgf ner fb znal?  9:23 Naq Wbenz
ghearq uvf unaqf, naq syrq, naq fnvq gb Nunmvnu, Gurer vf gernpurel, B
Nunmvnu.

9:24 Naq Wruh qerj n obj jvgu uvf shyy fgeratgu, naq fzbgr Wrubenz
orgjrra uvf nezf, naq gur neebj jrag bhg ng uvf urneg, naq ur fhax
qbja va uvf punevbg.

9:25 Gura fnvq Wruh gb Ovqxne uvf pncgnva, Gnxr hc, naq pnfg uvz va
gur cbegvba bs gur svryq bs Anobgu gur Wrmerryvgr: sbe erzrzore ubj
gung, jura V naq gubh ebqr gbtrgure nsgre Nuno uvf sngure, gur YBEQ
ynvq guvf oheqra hcba uvz; 9:26 Fheryl V unir frra lrfgreqnl gur oybbq
bs Anobgu, naq gur oybbq bs uvf fbaf, fnvgu gur YBEQ; naq V jvyy
erdhvgr gurr va guvf cyng, fnvgu gur YBEQ. Abj gurersber gnxr naq pnfg
uvz vagb gur cyng bs tebhaq, nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ.

9:27 Ohg jura Nunmvnu gur xvat bs Whqnu fnj guvf, ur syrq ol gur jnl
bs gur tneqra ubhfr. Naq Wruh sbyybjrq nsgre uvz, naq fnvq, Fzvgr uvz
nyfb va gur punevbg. Naq gurl qvq fb ng gur tbvat hc gb The, juvpu vf
ol Voyrnz.

Naq ur syrq gb Zrtvqqb, naq qvrq gurer.

9:28 Naq uvf freinagf pneevrq uvz va n punevbg gb Wrehfnyrz, naq
ohevrq uvz va uvf frchypuer jvgu uvf snguref va gur pvgl bs Qnivq.

9:29 Naq va gur ryriragu lrne bs Wbenz gur fba bs Nuno ortna Nunmvnu
gb ervta bire Whqnu.

9:30 Naq jura Wruh jnf pbzr gb Wrmerry, Wrmrory urneq bs vg; naq fur
cnvagrq ure snpr, naq gverq ure urnq, naq ybbxrq bhg ng n jvaqbj.

9:31 Naq nf Wruh ragrerq va ng gur tngr, fur fnvq, Unq Mvzev crnpr,
jub fyrj uvf znfgre?  9:32 Naq ur yvsgrq hc uvf snpr gb gur jvaqbj,
naq fnvq, Jub vf ba zl fvqr?  jub? Naq gurer ybbxrq bhg gb uvz gjb be
guerr rhahpuf.

9:33 Naq ur fnvq, Guebj ure qbja. Fb gurl guerj ure qbja: naq fbzr bs
ure oybbq jnf fcevaxyrq ba gur jnyy, naq ba gur ubefrf: naq ur gebqr
ure haqre sbbg.

9:34 Naq jura ur jnf pbzr va, ur qvq rng naq qevax, naq fnvq, Tb, frr
abj guvf phefrq jbzna, naq ohel ure: sbe fur vf n xvat'f qnhtugre.

9:35 Naq gurl jrag gb ohel ure: ohg gurl sbhaq ab zber bs ure guna gur
fxhyy, naq gur srrg, naq gur cnyzf bs ure unaqf.

9:36 Jurersber gurl pnzr ntnva, naq gbyq uvz. Naq ur fnvq, Guvf vf gur
jbeq bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur fcnxr ol uvf freinag Ryvwnu gur Gvfuovgr,
fnlvat, Va gur cbegvba bs Wrmerry funyy qbtf rng gur syrfu bs Wrmrory:
9:37 Naq gur pnepnfr bs Wrmrory funyy or nf qhat hcba gur snpr bs gur
svryq va gur cbegvba bs Wrmerry; fb gung gurl funyy abg fnl, Guvf vf
Wrmrory.

10:1 Naq Nuno unq friragl fbaf va Fnznevn. Naq Wruh jebgr yrggref, naq
frag gb Fnznevn, hagb gur ehyref bs Wrmerry, gb gur ryqref, naq gb
gurz gung oebhtug hc Nuno'f puvyqera, fnlvat, 10:2 Abj nf fbba nf guvf
yrggre pbzrgu gb lbh, frrvat lbhe znfgre'f fbaf ner jvgu lbh, naq
gurer ner jvgu lbh punevbgf naq ubefrf, n sraprq pvgl nyfb, naq
nezbhe; 10:3 Ybbx rira bhg gur orfg naq zrrgrfg bs lbhe znfgre'f fbaf,
naq frg uvz ba uvf sngure'f guebar, naq svtug sbe lbhe znfgre'f ubhfr.

10:4 Ohg gurl jrer rkprrqvatyl nsenvq, naq fnvq, Orubyq, gjb xvatf
fgbbq abg orsber uvz: ubj gura funyy jr fgnaq?  10:5 Naq ur gung jnf
bire gur ubhfr, naq ur gung jnf bire gur pvgl, gur ryqref nyfb, naq
gur oevatref hc bs gur puvyqera, frag gb Wruh, fnlvat, Jr ner gul
freinagf, naq jvyy qb nyy gung gubh funyg ovq hf; jr jvyy abg znxr nal
xvat: qb gubh gung juvpu vf tbbq va guvar rlrf.

10:6 Gura ur jebgr n yrggre gur frpbaq gvzr gb gurz, fnlvat, Vs lr or
zvar, naq vs lr jvyy urnexra hagb zl ibvpr, gnxr lr gur urnqf bs gur
zra lbhe znfgre'f fbaf, naq pbzr gb zr gb Wrmerry ol gb zbeebj guvf
gvzr. Abj gur xvat'f fbaf, orvat friragl crefbaf, jrer jvgu gur terng
zra bs gur pvgl, juvpu oebhtug gurz hc.

10:7 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur yrggre pnzr gb gurz, gung gurl gbbx
gur xvat'f fbaf, naq fyrj friragl crefbaf, naq chg gurve urnqf va
onfxrgf, naq frag uvz gurz gb Wrmerry.

10:8 Naq gurer pnzr n zrffratre, naq gbyq uvz, fnlvat, Gurl unir
oebhtug gur urnqf bs gur xvat'f fbaf. Naq ur fnvq, Ynl lr gurz va gjb
urncf ng gur ragrevat va bs gur tngr hagvy gur zbeavat.

10:9 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur zbeavat, gung ur jrag bhg, naq fgbbq,
naq fnvq gb nyy gur crbcyr, Lr or evtugrbhf: orubyq, V pbafcverq
ntnvafg zl znfgre, naq fyrj uvz: ohg jub fyrj nyy gurfr?  10:10 Xabj
abj gung gurer funyy snyy hagb gur rnegu abguvat bs gur jbeq bs gur
YBEQ, juvpu gur YBEQ fcnxr pbapreavat gur ubhfr bs Nuno: sbe gur YBEQ
ungu qbar gung juvpu ur fcnxr ol uvf freinag Ryvwnu.

10:11 Fb Wruh fyrj nyy gung erznvarq bs gur ubhfr bs Nuno va Wrmerry,
naq nyy uvf terng zra, naq uvf xvafsbyxf, naq uvf cevrfgf, hagvy ur
yrsg uvz abar erznvavat.

10:12 Naq ur nebfr naq qrcnegrq, naq pnzr gb Fnznevn. Naq nf ur jnf ng
gur furnevat ubhfr va gur jnl, 10:13 Wruh zrg jvgu gur oerguera bs
Nunmvnu xvat bs Whqnu, naq fnvq, Jub ner lr? Naq gurl nafjrerq, Jr ner
gur oerguera bs Nunmvnu; naq jr tb qbja gb fnyhgr gur puvyqera bs gur
xvat naq gur puvyqera bs gur dhrra.

10:14 Naq ur fnvq, Gnxr gurz nyvir. Naq gurl gbbx gurz nyvir, naq fyrj
gurz ng gur cvg bs gur furnevat ubhfr, rira gjb naq sbegl zra; arvgure
yrsg ur nal bs gurz.

10:15 Naq jura ur jnf qrcnegrq gurapr, ur yvtugrq ba Wrubanqno gur fba
bs Erpuno pbzvat gb zrrg uvz: naq ur fnyhgrq uvz, naq fnvq gb uvz, Vf
guvar urneg evtug, nf zl urneg vf jvgu gul urneg? Naq Wrubanqno
nafjrerq, Vg vf. Vs vg or, tvir zr guvar unaq. Naq ur tnir uvz uvf
unaq; naq ur gbbx uvz hc gb uvz vagb gur punevbg.

10:16 Naq ur fnvq, Pbzr jvgu zr, naq frr zl mrny sbe gur YBEQ. Fb gurl
znqr uvz evqr va uvf punevbg.

10:17 Naq jura ur pnzr gb Fnznevn, ur fyrj nyy gung erznvarq hagb Nuno
va Fnznevn, gvyy ur unq qrfgeblrq uvz, nppbeqvat gb gur fnlvat bs gur
YBEQ, juvpu ur fcnxr gb Ryvwnu.

10:18 Naq Wruh tngurerq nyy gur crbcyr gbtrgure, naq fnvq hagb gurz,
Nuno freirq Onny n yvggyr; ohg Wruh funyy freir uvz zhpu.

10:19 Abj gurersber pnyy hagb zr nyy gur cebcurgf bs Onny, nyy uvf
freinagf, naq nyy uvf cevrfgf; yrg abar or jnagvat: sbe V unir n terng
fnpevsvpr gb qb gb Onny; jubfbrire funyy or jnagvat, ur funyy abg
yvir. Ohg Wruh qvq vg va fhogvygl, gb gur vagrag gung ur zvtug qrfgebl
gur jbefuvccref bs Onny.

10:20 Naq Wruh fnvq, Cebpynvz n fbyrza nffrzoyl sbe Onny. Naq gurl
cebpynvzrq vg.

10:21 Naq Wruh frag guebhtu nyy Vfenry: naq nyy gur jbefuvccref bs
Onny pnzr, fb gung gurer jnf abg n zna yrsg gung pnzr abg. Naq gurl
pnzr vagb gur ubhfr bs Onny; naq gur ubhfr bs Onny jnf shyy sebz bar
raq gb nabgure.

10:22 Naq ur fnvq hagb uvz gung jnf bire gur irfgel, Oevat sbegu
irfgzragf sbe nyy gur jbefuvccref bs Onny. Naq ur oebhtug gurz sbegu
irfgzragf.

10:23 Naq Wruh jrag, naq Wrubanqno gur fba bs Erpuno, vagb gur ubhfr
bs Onny, naq fnvq hagb gur jbefuvccref bs Onny, Frnepu, naq ybbx gung
gurer or urer jvgu lbh abar bs gur freinagf bs gur YBEQ, ohg gur
jbefuvccref bs Onny bayl.

10:24 Naq jura gurl jrag va gb bssre fnpevsvprf naq oheag bssrevatf,
Wruh nccbvagrq sbhefpber zra jvgubhg, naq fnvq, Vs nal bs gur zra jubz
V unir oebhtug vagb lbhe unaqf rfpncr, ur gung yrggrgu uvz tb, uvf
yvsr funyy or sbe gur yvsr bs uvz.

10:25 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf fbba nf ur unq znqr na raq bs bssrevat
gur oheag bssrevat, gung Wruh fnvq gb gur thneq naq gb gur pncgnvaf,
Tb va, naq fynl gurz; yrg abar pbzr sbegu. Naq gurl fzbgr gurz jvgu
gur rqtr bs gur fjbeq; naq gur thneq naq gur pncgnvaf pnfg gurz bhg,
naq jrag gb gur pvgl bs gur ubhfr bs Onny.

10:26 Naq gurl oebhtug sbegu gur vzntrf bhg bs gur ubhfr bs Onny, naq
ohearq gurz.

10:27 Naq gurl oenxr qbja gur vzntr bs Onny, naq oenxr qbja gur ubhfr
bs Onny, naq znqr vg n qenhtug ubhfr hagb guvf qnl.

10:28 Guhf Wruh qrfgeblrq Onny bhg bs Vfenry.

10:29 Ubjorvg sebz gur fvaf bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, jub znqr
Vfenry gb fva, Wruh qrcnegrq abg sebz nsgre gurz, gb jvg, gur tbyqra
pnyirf gung jrer va Orgury, naq gung jrer va Qna.

10:30 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Wruh, Orpnhfr gubh unfg qbar jryy va
rkrphgvat gung juvpu vf evtug va zvar rlrf, naq unfg qbar hagb gur
ubhfr bs Nuno nppbeqvat gb nyy gung jnf va zvar urneg, gul puvyqera bs
gur sbhegu trarengvba funyy fvg ba gur guebar bs Vfenry.

10:31 Ohg Wruh gbbx ab urrq gb jnyx va gur ynj bs gur YBEQ Tbq bs
Vfenry jvgu nyy uvf urneg: sbe ur qrcnegrq abg sebz gur fvaf bs
Wrebobnz, juvpu znqr Vfenry gb fva.

10:32 Va gubfr qnlf gur YBEQ ortna gb phg Vfenry fubeg: naq Unmnry
fzbgr gurz va nyy gur pbnfgf bs Vfenry; 10:33 Sebz Wbeqna rnfgjneq,
nyy gur ynaq bs Tvyrnq, gur Tnqvgrf, naq gur Erhoravgrf, naq gur
Znanffvgrf, sebz Nebre, juvpu vf ol gur evire Neaba, rira Tvyrnq naq
Onfuna.

10:34 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wruh, naq nyy gung ur qvq, naq nyy
uvf zvtug, ner gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur
xvatf bs Vfenry?  10:35 Naq Wruh fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref: naq gurl
ohevrq uvz va Fnznevn. Naq Wrubnunm uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

10:36 Naq gur gvzr gung Wruh ervtarq bire Vfenry va Fnznevn jnf gjragl
naq rvtug lrnef.

11:1 Naq jura Ngunyvnu gur zbgure bs Nunmvnu fnj gung ure fba jnf
qrnq, fur nebfr naq qrfgeblrq nyy gur frrq eblny.

11:2 Ohg Wrubfuron, gur qnhtugre bs xvat Wbenz, fvfgre bs Nunmvnu,
gbbx Wbnfu gur fba bs Nunmvnu, naq fgbyr uvz sebz nzbat gur xvat'f
fbaf juvpu jrer fynva; naq gurl uvq uvz, rira uvz naq uvf ahefr, va
gur orqpunzore sebz Ngunyvnu, fb gung ur jnf abg fynva.

11:3 Naq ur jnf jvgu ure uvq va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ fvk lrnef. Naq
Ngunyvnu qvq ervta bire gur ynaq.

11:4 Naq gur friragu lrne Wrubvnqn frag naq srgpurq gur ehyref bire
uhaqerqf, jvgu gur pncgnvaf naq gur thneq, naq oebhtug gurz gb uvz
vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq znqr n pbiranag jvgu gurz, naq gbbx na
bngu bs gurz va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq furjrq gurz gur xvat'f fba.

11:5 Naq ur pbzznaqrq gurz, fnlvat, Guvf vf gur guvat gung lr funyy
qb; N guveq cneg bs lbh gung ragre va ba gur fnoongu funyy rira or
xrrcref bs gur jngpu bs gur xvat'f ubhfr; 11:6 Naq n guveq cneg funyy
or ng gur tngr bs Fhe; naq n guveq cneg ng gur tngr oruvaq gur thneq:
fb funyy lr xrrc gur jngpu bs gur ubhfr, gung vg or abg oebxra qbja.

11:7 Naq gjb cnegf bs nyy lbh gung tb sbegu ba gur fnoongu, rira gurl
funyy xrrc gur jngpu bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ nobhg gur xvat.

11:8 Naq lr funyy pbzcnff gur xvat ebhaq nobhg, rirel zna jvgu uvf
jrncbaf va uvf unaq: naq ur gung pbzrgu jvguva gur enatrf, yrg uvz or
fynva: naq or lr jvgu gur xvat nf ur tbrgu bhg naq nf ur pbzrgu va.

11:9 Naq gur pncgnvaf bire gur uhaqerqf qvq nppbeqvat gb nyy guvatf
gung Wrubvnqn gur cevrfg pbzznaqrq: naq gurl gbbx rirel zna uvf zra
gung jrer gb pbzr va ba gur fnoongu, jvgu gurz gung fubhyq tb bhg ba
gur fnoongu, naq pnzr gb Wrubvnqn gur cevrfg.

11:10 Naq gb gur pncgnvaf bire uhaqerqf qvq gur cevrfg tvir xvat
Qnivq'f fcrnef naq fuvryqf, gung jrer va gur grzcyr bs gur YBEQ.

11:11 Naq gur thneq fgbbq, rirel zna jvgu uvf jrncbaf va uvf unaq,
ebhaq nobhg gur xvat, sebz gur evtug pbeare bs gur grzcyr gb gur yrsg
pbeare bs gur grzcyr, nybat ol gur nygne naq gur grzcyr.

11:12 Naq ur oebhtug sbegu gur xvat'f fba, naq chg gur pebja hcba uvz,
naq tnir uvz gur grfgvzbal; naq gurl znqr uvz xvat, naq nabvagrq uvz;
naq gurl pynccrq gurve unaqf, naq fnvq, Tbq fnir gur xvat.

11:13 Naq jura Ngunyvnu urneq gur abvfr bs gur thneq naq bs gur
crbcyr, fur pnzr gb gur crbcyr vagb gur grzcyr bs gur YBEQ.

11:14 Naq jura fur ybbxrq, orubyq, gur xvat fgbbq ol n cvyyne, nf gur
znaare jnf, naq gur cevaprf naq gur gehzcrgref ol gur xvat, naq nyy
gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq erwbvprq, naq oyrj jvgu gehzcrgf: naq Ngunyvnu
erag ure pybgurf, naq pevrq, Gernfba, Gernfba.

11:15 Ohg Wrubvnqn gur cevrfg pbzznaqrq gur pncgnvaf bs gur uhaqerqf,
gur bssvpref bs gur ubfg, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Unir ure sbegu jvgubhg
gur enatrf: naq uvz gung sbyybjrgu ure xvyy jvgu gur fjbeq. Sbe gur
cevrfg unq fnvq, Yrg ure abg or fynva va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

11:16 Naq gurl ynvq unaqf ba ure; naq fur jrag ol gur jnl ol gur juvpu
gur ubefrf pnzr vagb gur xvat'f ubhfr: naq gurer jnf fur fynva.

11:17 Naq Wrubvnqn znqr n pbiranag orgjrra gur YBEQ naq gur xvat naq
gur crbcyr, gung gurl fubhyq or gur YBEQ'f crbcyr; orgjrra gur xvat
nyfb naq gur crbcyr.

11:18 Naq nyy gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq jrag vagb gur ubhfr bs Onny, naq
oenxr vg qbja; uvf nygnef naq uvf vzntrf oenxr gurl va cvrprf
gubebhtuyl, naq fyrj Znggna gur cevrfg bs Onny orsber gur nygnef. Naq
gur cevrfg nccbvagrq bssvpref bire gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

11:19 Naq ur gbbx gur ehyref bire uhaqerqf, naq gur pncgnvaf, naq gur
thneq, naq nyy gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq; naq gurl oebhtug qbja gur xvat
sebz gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq pnzr ol gur jnl bs gur tngr bs gur
thneq gb gur xvat'f ubhfr. Naq ur fng ba gur guebar bs gur xvatf.

11:20 Naq nyy gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq erwbvprq, naq gur pvgl jnf va
dhvrg: naq gurl fyrj Ngunyvnu jvgu gur fjbeq orfvqr gur xvat'f ubhfr.

11:21 Frira lrnef byq jnf Wrubnfu jura ur ortna gb ervta.

12:1 Va gur friragu lrne bs Wruh Wrubnfu ortna gb ervta; naq sbegl
lrnef ervtarq ur va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf Mvovnu bs
Orrefuron.

12:2 Naq Wrubnfu qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ nyy
uvf qnlf jurerva Wrubvnqn gur cevrfg vafgehpgrq uvz.

12:3 Ohg gur uvtu cynprf jrer abg gnxra njnl: gur crbcyr fgvyy
fnpevsvprq naq oheag vaprafr va gur uvtu cynprf.

12:4 Naq Wrubnfu fnvq gb gur cevrfgf, Nyy gur zbarl bs gur qrqvpngrq
guvatf gung vf oebhtug vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, rira gur zbarl bs
rirel bar gung cnffrgu gur nppbhag, gur zbarl gung rirel zna vf frg
ng, naq nyy gur zbarl gung pbzrgu vagb nal zna'f urneg gb oevat vagb
gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, 12:5 Yrg gur cevrfgf gnxr vg gb gurz, rirel zna
bs uvf npdhnvagnapr: naq yrg gurz ercnve gur oernpurf bs gur ubhfr,
jurerfbrire nal oernpu funyy or sbhaq.

12:6 Ohg vg jnf fb, gung va gur guerr naq gjragvrgu lrne bs xvat
Wrubnfu gur cevrfgf unq abg ercnverq gur oernpurf bs gur ubhfr.

12:7 Gura xvat Wrubnfu pnyyrq sbe Wrubvnqn gur cevrfg, naq gur bgure
cevrfgf, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Jul ercnve lr abg gur oernpurf bs gur
ubhfr? abj gurersber erprvir ab zber zbarl bs lbhe npdhnvagnapr, ohg
qryvire vg sbe gur oernpurf bs gur ubhfr.

12:8 Naq gur cevrfgf pbafragrq gb erprvir ab zber zbarl bs gur crbcyr,
arvgure gb ercnve gur oernpurf bs gur ubhfr.

12:9 Ohg Wrubvnqn gur cevrfg gbbx n purfg, naq oberq n ubyr va gur yvq
bs vg, naq frg vg orfvqr gur nygne, ba gur evtug fvqr nf bar pbzrgu
vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ: naq gur cevrfgf gung xrcg gur qbbe chg
gurerva nyy gur zbarl gung jnf oebhtug vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

12:10 Naq vg jnf fb, jura gurl fnj gung gurer jnf zhpu zbarl va gur
purfg, gung gur xvat'f fpevor naq gur uvtu cevrfg pnzr hc, naq gurl
chg hc va ontf, naq gbyq gur zbarl gung jnf sbhaq va gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ.

12:11 Naq gurl tnir gur zbarl, orvat gbyq, vagb gur unaqf bs gurz gung
qvq gur jbex, gung unq gur birefvtug bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ: naq
gurl ynvq vg bhg gb gur pnecragref naq ohvyqref, gung jebhtug hcba gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, 12:12 Naq gb znfbaf, naq urjref bs fgbar, naq gb
ohl gvzore naq urjrq fgbar gb ercnve gur oernpurf bs gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ, naq sbe nyy gung jnf ynvq bhg sbe gur ubhfr gb ercnve vg.

12:13 Ubjorvg gurer jrer abg znqr sbe gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ objyf bs
fvyire, fahssref, onfbaf, gehzcrgf, nal irffryf bs tbyq, be irffryf bs
fvyire, bs gur zbarl gung jnf oebhtug vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ:
12:14 Ohg gurl tnir gung gb gur jbexzra, naq ercnverq gurerjvgu gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

12:15 Zberbire gurl erpxbarq abg jvgu gur zra, vagb jubfr unaq gurl
qryvirerq gur zbarl gb or orfgbjrq ba jbexzra: sbe gurl qrnyg
snvgushyyl.

12:16 Gur gerfcnff zbarl naq fva zbarl jnf abg oebhtug vagb gur ubhfr
bs gur YBEQ: vg jnf gur cevrfgf'.

12:17 Gura Unmnry xvat bs Flevn jrag hc, naq sbhtug ntnvafg Tngu, naq
gbbx vg: naq Unmnry frg uvf snpr gb tb hc gb Wrehfnyrz.

12:18 Naq Wrubnfu xvat bs Whqnu gbbx nyy gur unyybjrq guvatf gung
Wrubfuncung, naq Wrubenz, naq Nunmvnu, uvf snguref, xvatf bs Whqnu,
unq qrqvpngrq, naq uvf bja unyybjrq guvatf, naq nyy gur tbyq gung jnf
sbhaq va gur gernfherf bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq va gur xvat'f
ubhfr, naq frag vg gb Unmnry xvat bs Flevn: naq ur jrag njnl sebz
Wrehfnyrz.

12:19 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wbnfu, naq nyy gung ur qvq, ner gurl
abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu?
12:20 Naq uvf freinagf nebfr, naq znqr n pbafcvenpl, naq fyrj Wbnfu va
gur ubhfr bs Zvyyb, juvpu tbrgu qbja gb Fvyyn.

12:21 Sbe Wbmnpune gur fba bs Fuvzrngu, naq Wrubmnonq gur fba bs
Fubzre, uvf freinagf, fzbgr uvz, naq ur qvrq; naq gurl ohevrq uvz jvgu
uvf snguref va gur pvgl bs Qnivq: naq Nznmvnu uvf fba ervtarq va uvf
fgrnq.

13:1 Va gur guerr naq gjragvrgu lrne bs Wbnfu gur fba bs Nunmvnu xvat
bs Whqnu Wrubnunm gur fba bs Wruh ortna gb ervta bire Vfenry va
Fnznevn, naq ervtarq friragrra lrnef.

13:2 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, naq
sbyybjrq gur fvaf bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, juvpu znqr Vfenry gb
fva; ur qrcnegrq abg gurersebz.

13:3 Naq gur natre bs gur YBEQ jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg Vfenry, naq ur
qryvirerq gurz vagb gur unaq bs Unmnry xvat bs Flevn, naq vagb gur
unaq bs Oraunqnq gur fba bs Unmnry, nyy gurve qnlf.

13:4 Naq Wrubnunm orfbhtug gur YBEQ, naq gur YBEQ urnexrarq hagb uvz:
sbe ur fnj gur bccerffvba bs Vfenry, orpnhfr gur xvat bs Flevn
bccerffrq gurz.

13:5 (Naq gur YBEQ tnir Vfenry n fnivbhe, fb gung gurl jrag bhg sebz
haqre gur unaq bs gur Flevnaf: naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qjryg va
gurve gragf, nf orsbergvzr.

13:6 Arireguryrff gurl qrcnegrq abg sebz gur fvaf bs gur ubhfr bs
Wrebobnz, jub znqr Vfenry fva, ohg jnyxrq gurerva: naq gurer erznvarq
gur tebir nyfb va Fnznevn.)  13:7 Arvgure qvq ur yrnir bs gur crbcyr
gb Wrubnunm ohg svsgl ubefrzra, naq gra punevbgf, naq gra gubhfnaq
sbbgzra; sbe gur xvat bs Flevn unq qrfgeblrq gurz, naq unq znqr gurz
yvxr gur qhfg ol guerfuvat.

13:8 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wrubnunm, naq nyy gung ur qvq, naq
uvf zvtug, ner gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur
xvatf bs Vfenry?  13:9 Naq Wrubnunm fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref; naq gurl
ohevrq uvz va Fnznevn: naq Wbnfu uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

13:10 Va gur guvegl naq friragu lrne bs Wbnfu xvat bs Whqnu ortna
Wrubnfu gur fba bs Wrubnunm gb ervta bire Vfenry va Fnznevn, naq
ervtarq fvkgrra lrnef.

13:11 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ; ur
qrcnegrq abg sebz nyy gur fvaf bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, jub znqr
Vfenry fva: ohg ur jnyxrq gurerva.

13:12 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wbnfu, naq nyy gung ur qvq, naq uvf
zvtug jurerjvgu ur sbhtug ntnvafg Nznmvnu xvat bs Whqnu, ner gurl abg
jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry?  13:13
Naq Wbnfu fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref; naq Wrebobnz fng hcba uvf guebar:
naq Wbnfu jnf ohevrq va Fnznevn jvgu gur xvatf bs Vfenry.

13:14 Abj Ryvfun jnf snyyra fvpx bs uvf fvpxarff jurerbs ur qvrq. Naq
Wbnfu gur xvat bs Vfenry pnzr qbja hagb uvz, naq jrcg bire uvf snpr,
naq fnvq, B zl sngure, zl sngure, gur punevbg bs Vfenry, naq gur
ubefrzra gurerbs.

13:15 Naq Ryvfun fnvq hagb uvz, Gnxr obj naq neebjf. Naq ur gbbx hagb
uvz obj naq neebjf.

13:16 Naq ur fnvq gb gur xvat bs Vfenry, Chg guvar unaq hcba gur obj.
Naq ur chg uvf unaq hcba vg: naq Ryvfun chg uvf unaqf hcba gur xvat'f
unaqf.

13:17 Naq ur fnvq, Bcra gur jvaqbj rnfgjneq. Naq ur bcrarq vg. Gura
Ryvfun fnvq, Fubbg. Naq ur fubg. Naq ur fnvq, Gur neebj bs gur YBEQ'f
qryvirenapr, naq gur neebj bs qryvirenapr sebz Flevn: sbe gubh funyg
fzvgr gur Flevnaf va Ncurx, gvyy gubh unir pbafhzrq gurz.

13:18 Naq ur fnvq, Gnxr gur neebjf. Naq ur gbbx gurz. Naq ur fnvq hagb
gur xvat bs Vfenry, Fzvgr hcba gur tebhaq. Naq ur fzbgr guevpr, naq
fgnlrq.

13:19 Naq gur zna bs Tbq jnf jebgu jvgu uvz, naq fnvq, Gubh fubhyqrfg
unir fzvggra svir be fvk gvzrf; gura unqfg gubh fzvggra Flevn gvyy
gubh unqfg pbafhzrq vg: jurernf abj gubh funyg fzvgr Flevn ohg guevpr.

13:20 Naq Ryvfun qvrq, naq gurl ohevrq uvz. Naq gur onaqf bs gur
Zbnovgrf vainqrq gur ynaq ng gur pbzvat va bs gur lrne.

13:21 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf gurl jrer ohelvat n zna, gung, orubyq,
gurl fcvrq n onaq bs zra; naq gurl pnfg gur zna vagb gur frchypuer bs
Ryvfun: naq jura gur zna jnf yrg qbja, naq gbhpurq gur obarf bs
Ryvfun, ur erivirq, naq fgbbq hc ba uvf srrg.

13:22 Ohg Unmnry xvat bs Flevn bccerffrq Vfenry nyy gur qnlf bs
Wrubnunm.

13:23 Naq gur YBEQ jnf tenpvbhf hagb gurz, naq unq pbzcnffvba ba gurz,
naq unq erfcrpg hagb gurz, orpnhfr bs uvf pbiranag jvgu Noenunz,
Vfnnp, naq Wnpbo, naq jbhyq abg qrfgebl gurz, arvgure pnfg ur gurz
sebz uvf cerfrapr nf lrg.

13:24 Fb Unmnry xvat bs Flevn qvrq; naq Oraunqnq uvf fba ervtarq va
uvf fgrnq.

13:25 Naq Wrubnfu gur fba bs Wrubnunm gbbx ntnva bhg bs gur unaq bs
Oraunqnq gur fba bs Unmnry gur pvgvrf, juvpu ur unq gnxra bhg bs gur
unaq bs Wrubnunm uvf sngure ol jne. Guerr gvzrf qvq Wbnfu orng uvz,
naq erpbirerq gur pvgvrf bs Vfenry.

14:1 Va gur frpbaq lrne bs Wbnfu fba bs Wrubnunm xvat bs Vfenry
ervtarq Nznmvnu gur fba bs Wbnfu xvat bs Whqnu.

14:2 Ur jnf gjragl naq svir lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq
ervtarq gjragl naq avar lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf
Wrubnqqna bs Wrehfnyrz.

14:3 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, lrg abg
yvxr Qnivq uvf sngure: ur qvq nppbeqvat gb nyy guvatf nf Wbnfu uvf
sngure qvq.

14:4 Ubjorvg gur uvtu cynprf jrer abg gnxra njnl: nf lrg gur crbcyr
qvq fnpevsvpr naq oheag vaprafr ba gur uvtu cynprf.

14:5 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf fbba nf gur xvatqbz jnf pbasvezrq va uvf
unaq, gung ur fyrj uvf freinagf juvpu unq fynva gur xvat uvf sngure.

14:6 Ohg gur puvyqera bs gur zheqreref ur fyrj abg: nppbeqvat hagb
gung juvpu vf jevggra va gur obbx bs gur ynj bs Zbfrf, jurerva gur
YBEQ pbzznaqrq, fnlvat, Gur snguref funyy abg or chg gb qrngu sbe gur
puvyqera, abe gur puvyqera or chg gb qrngu sbe gur snguref; ohg rirel
zna funyy or chg gb qrngu sbe uvf bja fva.

14:7 Ur fyrj bs Rqbz va gur inyyrl bs fnyg gra gubhfnaq, naq gbbx
Frynu ol jne, naq pnyyrq gur anzr bs vg Wbxgurry hagb guvf qnl.

14:8 Gura Nznmvnu frag zrffratref gb Wrubnfu, gur fba bs Wrubnunm fba
bs Wruh, xvat bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Pbzr, yrg hf ybbx bar nabgure va gur
snpr.

14:9 Naq Wrubnfu gur xvat bs Vfenry frag gb Nznmvnu xvat bs Whqnu,
fnlvat, Gur guvfgyr gung jnf va Yronaba frag gb gur prqne gung jnf va
Yronaba, fnlvat, Tvir gul qnhtugre gb zl fba gb jvsr: naq gurer cnffrq
ol n jvyq ornfg gung jnf va Yronaba, naq gebqr qbja gur guvfgyr.

14:10 Gubh unfg vaqrrq fzvggra Rqbz, naq guvar urneg ungu yvsgrq gurr
hc: tybel bs guvf, naq gneel ng ubzr: sbe jul fubhyqrfg gubh zrqqyr gb
gul uheg, gung gubh fubhyqrfg snyy, rira gubh, naq Whqnu jvgu gurr?
14:11 Ohg Nznmvnu jbhyq abg urne. Gurersber Wrubnfu xvat bs Vfenry
jrag hc; naq ur naq Nznmvnu xvat bs Whqnu ybbxrq bar nabgure va gur
snpr ng Orgufurzrfu, juvpu orybatrgu gb Whqnu.

14:12 Naq Whqnu jnf chg gb gur jbefr orsber Vfenry; naq gurl syrq
rirel zna gb gurve gragf.

14:13 Naq Wrubnfu xvat bs Vfenry gbbx Nznmvnu xvat bs Whqnu, gur fba
bs Wrubnfu gur fba bs Nunmvnu, ng Orgufurzrfu, naq pnzr gb Wrehfnyrz,
naq oenxr qbja gur jnyy bs Wrehfnyrz sebz gur tngr bs Rcuenvz hagb gur
pbeare tngr, sbhe uhaqerq phovgf.

14:14 Naq ur gbbx nyy gur tbyq naq fvyire, naq nyy gur irffryf gung
jrer sbhaq va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq va gur gernfherf bs gur
xvat'f ubhfr, naq ubfgntrf, naq erghearq gb Fnznevn.

14:15 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wrubnfu juvpu ur qvq, naq uvf zvtug,
naq ubj ur sbhtug jvgu Nznmvnu xvat bs Whqnu, ner gurl abg jevggra va
gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry?  14:16 Naq Wrubnfu
fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq jnf ohevrq va Fnznevn jvgu gur xvatf bs
Vfenry; naq Wrebobnz uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

14:17 Naq Nznmvnu gur fba bs Wbnfu xvat bs Whqnu yvirq nsgre gur qrngu
bs Wrubnfu fba bs Wrubnunm xvat bs Vfenry svsgrra lrnef.

14:18 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Nznmvnu, ner gurl abg jevggra va gur
obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu?  14:19 Abj gurl znqr n
pbafcvenpl ntnvafg uvz va Wrehfnyrz: naq ur syrq gb Ynpuvfu; ohg gurl
frag nsgre uvz gb Ynpuvfu, naq fyrj uvz gurer.

14:20 Naq gurl oebhtug uvz ba ubefrf: naq ur jnf ohevrq ng Wrehfnyrz
jvgu uvf snguref va gur pvgl bs Qnivq.

14:21 Naq nyy gur crbcyr bs Whqnu gbbx Nmnevnu, juvpu jnf fvkgrra
lrnef byq, naq znqr uvz xvat vafgrnq bs uvf sngure Nznmvnu.

14:22 Ur ohvyg Ryngu, naq erfgberq vg gb Whqnu, nsgre gung gur xvat
fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref.

14:23 Va gur svsgrragu lrne bs Nznmvnu gur fba bs Wbnfu xvat bs Whqnu
Wrebobnz gur fba bs Wbnfu xvat bs Vfenry ortna gb ervta va Fnznevn,
naq ervtarq sbegl naq bar lrnef.

14:24 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ: ur
qrcnegrq abg sebz nyy gur fvaf bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, jub znqr
Vfenry gb fva.

14:25 Ur erfgberq gur pbnfg bs Vfenry sebz gur ragrevat bs Unzngu hagb
gur frn bs gur cynva, nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry,
juvpu ur fcnxr ol gur unaq bs uvf freinag Wbanu, gur fba bs Nzvggnv,
gur cebcurg, juvpu jnf bs Tnguurcure.

14:26 Sbe gur YBEQ fnj gur nssyvpgvba bs Vfenry, gung vg jnf irel
ovggre: sbe gurer jnf abg nal fuhg hc, abe nal yrsg, abe nal urycre
sbe Vfenry.

14:27 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq abg gung ur jbhyq oybg bhg gur anzr bs Vfenry
sebz haqre urnira: ohg ur fnirq gurz ol gur unaq bs Wrebobnz gur fba
bs Wbnfu.

14:28 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wrebobnz, naq nyy gung ur qvq, naq
uvf zvtug, ubj ur jneerq, naq ubj ur erpbirerq Qnznfphf, naq Unzngu,
juvpu orybatrq gb Whqnu, sbe Vfenry, ner gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx
bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry?  14:29 Naq Wrebobnz fyrcg
jvgu uvf snguref, rira jvgu gur xvatf bs Vfenry; naq Mnpunevnu uvf fba
ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

15:1 Va gur gjragl naq friragu lrne bs Wrebobnz xvat bs Vfenry ortna
Nmnevnu fba bs Nznmvnu xvat bs Whqnu gb ervta.

15:2 Fvkgrra lrnef byq jnf ur jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur ervtarq
gjb naq svsgl lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf Wrpubyvnu
bs Wrehfnyrz.

15:3 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung uvf sngure Nznmvnu unq qbar; 15:4 Fnir gung gur
uvtu cynprf jrer abg erzbirq: gur crbcyr fnpevsvprq naq oheag vaprafr
fgvyy ba gur uvtu cynprf.

15:5 Naq gur YBEQ fzbgr gur xvat, fb gung ur jnf n yrcre hagb gur qnl
bs uvf qrngu, naq qjryg va n frireny ubhfr. Naq Wbgunz gur xvat'f fba
jnf bire gur ubhfr, whqtvat gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq.

15:6 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Nmnevnu, naq nyy gung ur qvq, ner
gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu?
15:7 Fb Nmnevnu fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref; naq gurl ohevrq uvz jvgu uvf
snguref va gur pvgl bs Qnivq: naq Wbgunz uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

15:8 Va gur guvegl naq rvtugu lrne bs Nmnevnu xvat bs Whqnu qvq
Mnpunevnu gur fba bs Wrebobnz ervta bire Vfenry va Fnznevn fvk zbaguf.

15:9 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, nf uvf
snguref unq qbar: ur qrcnegrq abg sebz gur fvaf bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs
Arong, jub znqr Vfenry gb fva.

15:10 Naq Funyyhz gur fba bs Wnorfu pbafcverq ntnvafg uvz, naq fzbgr
uvz orsber gur crbcyr, naq fyrj uvz, naq ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

15:11 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Mnpunevnu, orubyq, gurl ner jevggra
va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry.

15:12 Guvf jnf gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ juvpu ur fcnxr hagb Wruh, fnlvat,
Gul fbaf funyy fvg ba gur guebar bs Vfenry hagb gur sbhegu trarengvba.
Naq fb vg pnzr gb cnff.

15:13 Funyyhz gur fba bs Wnorfu ortna gb ervta va gur avar naq
guvegvrgu lrne bs Hmmvnu xvat bs Whqnu; naq ur ervtarq n shyy zbagu va
Fnznevn.

15:14 Sbe Zranurz gur fba bs Tnqv jrag hc sebz Gvemnu, naq pnzr gb
Fnznevn, naq fzbgr Funyyhz gur fba bs Wnorfu va Fnznevn, naq fyrj uvz,
naq ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

15:15 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Funyyhz, naq uvf pbafcvenpl juvpu ur
znqr, orubyq, gurl ner jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur
xvatf bs Vfenry.

15:16 Gura Zranurz fzbgr Gvcufnu, naq nyy gung jrer gurerva, naq gur
pbnfgf gurerbs sebz Gvemnu: orpnhfr gurl bcrarq abg gb uvz, gurersber
ur fzbgr vg; naq nyy gur jbzra gurerva gung jrer jvgu puvyq ur evccrq
hc.

15:17 Va gur avar naq guvegvrgu lrne bs Nmnevnu xvat bs Whqnu ortna
Zranurz gur fba bs Tnqv gb ervta bire Vfenry, naq ervtarq gra lrnef va
Fnznevn.

15:18 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ: ur
qrcnegrq abg nyy uvf qnlf sebz gur fvaf bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong,
jub znqr Vfenry gb fva.

15:19 Naq Chy gur xvat bs Nfflevn pnzr ntnvafg gur ynaq: naq Zranurz
tnir Chy n gubhfnaq gnyragf bs fvyire, gung uvf unaq zvtug or jvgu uvz
gb pbasvez gur xvatqbz va uvf unaq.

15:20 Naq Zranurz rknpgrq gur zbarl bs Vfenry, rira bs nyy gur zvtugl
zra bs jrnygu, bs rnpu zna svsgl furxryf bs fvyire, gb tvir gb gur
xvat bs Nfflevn. Fb gur xvat bs Nfflevn ghearq onpx, naq fgnlrq abg
gurer va gur ynaq.

15:21 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Zranurz, naq nyy gung ur qvq, ner
gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry?
15:22 Naq Zranurz fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref; naq Crxnuvnu uvf fba ervtarq
va uvf fgrnq.

15:23 Va gur svsgvrgu lrne bs Nmnevnu xvat bs Whqnu Crxnuvnu gur fba
bs Zranurz ortna gb ervta bire Vfenry va Fnznevn, naq ervtarq gjb
lrnef.

15:24 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ: ur
qrcnegrq abg sebz gur fvaf bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, jub znqr
Vfenry gb fva.

15:25 Ohg Crxnu gur fba bs Erznyvnu, n pncgnva bs uvf, pbafcverq
ntnvafg uvz, naq fzbgr uvz va Fnznevn, va gur cnynpr bs gur xvat'f
ubhfr, jvgu Netbo naq Nevru, naq jvgu uvz svsgl zra bs gur Tvyrnqvgrf:
naq ur xvyyrq uvz, naq ervtarq va uvf ebbz.

15:26 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Crxnuvnu, naq nyy gung ur qvq,
orubyq, gurl ner jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs
Vfenry.

15:27 Va gur gjb naq svsgvrgu lrne bs Nmnevnu xvat bs Whqnu Crxnu gur
fba bs Erznyvnu ortna gb ervta bire Vfenry va Fnznevn, naq ervtarq
gjragl lrnef.

15:28 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ: ur
qrcnegrq abg sebz gur fvaf bs Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, jub znqr
Vfenry gb fva.

15:29 Va gur qnlf bs Crxnu xvat bs Vfenry pnzr Gvtyngucvyrfre xvat bs
Nfflevn, naq gbbx Vwba, naq Noryorguznnpunu, naq Wnabnu, naq Xrqrfu,
naq Unmbe, naq Tvyrnq, naq Tnyvyrr, nyy gur ynaq bs Ancugnyv, naq
pneevrq gurz pncgvir gb Nfflevn.

15:30 Naq Ubfurn gur fba bs Rynu znqr n pbafcvenpl ntnvafg Crxnu gur
fba bs Erznyvnu, naq fzbgr uvz, naq fyrj uvz, naq ervtarq va uvf
fgrnq, va gur gjragvrgu lrne bs Wbgunz gur fba bs Hmmvnu.

15:31 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Crxnu, naq nyy gung ur qvq, orubyq,
gurl ner jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry.

15:32 Va gur frpbaq lrne bs Crxnu gur fba bs Erznyvnu xvat bs Vfenry
ortna Wbgunz gur fba bs Hmmvnu xvat bs Whqnu gb ervta.

15:33 Svir naq gjragl lrnef byq jnf ur jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur
ervtarq fvkgrra lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf Wrehfun,
gur qnhtugre bs Mnqbx.

15:34 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ: ur qvq
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung uvf sngure Hmmvnu unq qbar.

15:35 Ubjorvg gur uvtu cynprf jrer abg erzbirq: gur crbcyr fnpevsvprq
naq ohearq vaprafr fgvyy va gur uvtu cynprf. Ur ohvyg gur uvture tngr
bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

15:36 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wbgunz, naq nyy gung ur qvq, ner
gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu?
15:37 Va gubfr qnlf gur YBEQ ortna gb fraq ntnvafg Whqnu Ermva gur
xvat bs Flevn, naq Crxnu gur fba bs Erznyvnu.

15:38 Naq Wbgunz fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq jnf ohevrq jvgu uvf
snguref va gur pvgl bs Qnivq uvf sngure: naq Nunm uvf fba ervtarq va
uvf fgrnq.

16:1 Va gur friragrragu lrne bs Crxnu gur fba bs Erznyvnu Nunm gur fba
bs Wbgunz xvat bs Whqnu ortna gb ervta.

16:2 Gjragl lrnef byq jnf Nunm jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ervtarq
fvkgrra lrnef va Wrehfnyrz, naq qvq abg gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur
fvtug bs gur YBEQ uvf Tbq, yvxr Qnivq uvf sngure.

16:3 Ohg ur jnyxrq va gur jnl bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry, lrn, naq znqr
uvf fba gb cnff guebhtu gur sver, nppbeqvat gb gur nobzvangvbaf bs gur
urngura, jubz gur YBEQ pnfg bhg sebz orsber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

16:4 Naq ur fnpevsvprq naq oheag vaprafr va gur uvtu cynprf, naq ba
gur uvyyf, naq haqre rirel terra gerr.

16:5 Gura Ermva xvat bs Flevn naq Crxnu fba bs Erznyvnu xvat bs Vfenry
pnzr hc gb Wrehfnyrz gb jne: naq gurl orfvrtrq Nunm, ohg pbhyq abg
birepbzr uvz.

16:6 Ng gung gvzr Ermva xvat bs Flevn erpbirerq Ryngu gb Flevn, naq
qenir gur Wrjf sebz Ryngu: naq gur Flevnaf pnzr gb Ryngu, naq qjryg
gurer hagb guvf qnl.

16:7 Fb Nunm frag zrffratref gb Gvtyngucvyrfre xvat bs Nfflevn,
fnlvat, V nz gul freinag naq gul fba: pbzr hc, naq fnir zr bhg bs gur
unaq bs gur xvat bs Flevn, naq bhg bs gur unaq bs gur xvat bs Vfenry,
juvpu evfr hc ntnvafg zr.

16:8 Naq Nunm gbbx gur fvyire naq tbyq gung jnf sbhaq va gur ubhfr bs
gur YBEQ, naq va gur gernfherf bs gur xvat'f ubhfr, naq frag vg sbe n
cerfrag gb gur xvat bs Nfflevn.

16:9 Naq gur xvat bs Nfflevn urnexrarq hagb uvz: sbe gur xvat bs
Nfflevn jrag hc ntnvafg Qnznfphf, naq gbbx vg, naq pneevrq gur crbcyr
bs vg pncgvir gb Xve, naq fyrj Ermva.

16:10 Naq xvat Nunm jrag gb Qnznfphf gb zrrg Gvtyngucvyrfre xvat bs
Nfflevn, naq fnj na nygne gung jnf ng Qnznfphf: naq xvat Nunm frag gb
Hevwnu gur cevrfg gur snfuvba bs gur nygne, naq gur cnggrea bs vg,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gur jbexznafuvc gurerbs.

16:11 Naq Hevwnu gur cevrfg ohvyg na nygne nppbeqvat gb nyy gung xvat
Nunm unq frag sebz Qnznfphf: fb Hevwnu gur cevrfg znqr vg ntnvafg xvat
Nunm pnzr sebz Qnznfphf.

16:12 Naq jura gur xvat jnf pbzr sebz Qnznfphf, gur xvat fnj gur
nygne: naq gur xvat nccebnpurq gb gur nygne, naq bssrerq gurerba.

16:13 Naq ur oheag uvf oheag bssrevat naq uvf zrng bssrevat, naq
cbherq uvf qevax bssrevat, naq fcevaxyrq gur oybbq bs uvf crnpr
bssrevatf, hcba gur nygne.

16:14 Naq ur oebhtug nyfb gur oenfra nygne, juvpu jnf orsber gur YBEQ,
sebz gur sbersebag bs gur ubhfr, sebz orgjrra gur nygne naq gur ubhfr
bs gur YBEQ, naq chg vg ba gur abegu fvqr bs gur nygne.

16:15 Naq xvat Nunm pbzznaqrq Hevwnu gur cevrfg, fnlvat, Hcba gur
terng nygne ohea gur zbeavat oheag bssrevat, naq gur riravat zrng
bssrevat, naq gur xvat'f oheag fnpevsvpr, naq uvf zrng bssrevat, jvgu
gur oheag bssrevat bs nyy gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq, naq gurve zrng
bssrevat, naq gurve qevax bssrevatf; naq fcevaxyr hcba vg nyy gur
oybbq bs gur oheag bssrevat, naq nyy gur oybbq bs gur fnpevsvpr: naq
gur oenfra nygne funyy or sbe zr gb radhver ol.

16:16 Guhf qvq Hevwnu gur cevrfg, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung xvat Nunm
pbzznaqrq.

16:17 Naq xvat Nunm phg bss gur obeqref bs gur onfrf, naq erzbirq gur
ynire sebz bss gurz; naq gbbx qbja gur frn sebz bss gur oenfra bkra
gung jrer haqre vg, naq chg vg hcba gur cnirzrag bs fgbarf.

16:18 Naq gur pbireg sbe gur fnoongu gung gurl unq ohvyg va gur ubhfr,
naq gur xvat'f ragel jvgubhg, ghearq ur sebz gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ sbe
gur xvat bs Nfflevn.

16:19 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Nunm juvpu ur qvq, ner gurl abg
jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu?  16:20
Naq Nunm fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq jnf ohevrq jvgu uvf snguref va
gur pvgl bs Qnivq: naq Urmrxvnu uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

17:1 Va gur gjrysgu lrne bs Nunm xvat bs Whqnu ortna Ubfurn gur fba bs
Rynu gb ervta va Fnznevn bire Vfenry avar lrnef.

17:2 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, ohg abg
nf gur xvatf bs Vfenry gung jrer orsber uvz.

17:3 Ntnvafg uvz pnzr hc Funyznarfre xvat bs Nfflevn; naq Ubfurn
orpnzr uvf freinag, naq tnir uvz cerfragf.

17:4 Naq gur xvat bs Nfflevn sbhaq pbafcvenpl va Ubfurn: sbe ur unq
frag zrffratref gb Fb xvat bs Rtlcg, naq oebhtug ab cerfrag gb gur
xvat bs Nfflevn, nf ur unq qbar lrne ol lrne: gurersber gur xvat bs
Nfflevn fuhg uvz hc, naq obhaq uvz va cevfba.

17:5 Gura gur xvat bs Nfflevn pnzr hc guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq, naq
jrag hc gb Fnznevn, naq orfvrtrq vg guerr lrnef.

17:6 Va gur avagu lrne bs Ubfurn gur xvat bs Nfflevn gbbx Fnznevn, naq
pneevrq Vfenry njnl vagb Nfflevn, naq cynprq gurz va Unynu naq va
Unobe ol gur evire bs Tbmna, naq va gur pvgvrf bs gur Zrqrf.

17:7 Sbe fb vg jnf, gung gur puvyqera bs Vfenry unq fvaarq ntnvafg gur
YBEQ gurve Tbq, juvpu unq oebhtug gurz hc bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg,
sebz haqre gur unaq bs Cunenbu xvat bs Rtlcg, naq unq srnerq bgure
tbqf, 17:8 Naq jnyxrq va gur fgnghgrf bs gur urngura, jubz gur YBEQ
pnfg bhg sebz orsber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq bs gur xvatf bs
Vfenry, juvpu gurl unq znqr.

17:9 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq frpergyl gubfr guvatf gung jrer
abg evtug ntnvafg gur YBEQ gurve Tbq, naq gurl ohvyg gurz uvtu cynprf
va nyy gurve pvgvrf, sebz gur gbjre bs gur jngpuzra gb gur sraprq
pvgl.

17:10 Naq gurl frg gurz hc vzntrf naq tebirf va rirel uvtu uvyy, naq
haqre rirel terra gerr: 17:11 Naq gurer gurl oheag vaprafr va nyy gur
uvtu cynprf, nf qvq gur urngura jubz gur YBEQ pneevrq njnl orsber
gurz; naq jebhtug jvpxrq guvatf gb cebibxr gur YBEQ gb natre: 17:12
Sbe gurl freirq vqbyf, jurerbs gur YBEQ unq fnvq hagb gurz, Lr funyy
abg qb guvf guvat.

17:13 Lrg gur YBEQ grfgvsvrq ntnvafg Vfenry, naq ntnvafg Whqnu, ol nyy
gur cebcurgf, naq ol nyy gur frref, fnlvat, Ghea lr sebz lbhe rivy
jnlf, naq xrrc zl pbzznaqzragf naq zl fgnghgrf, nppbeqvat gb nyy gur
ynj juvpu V pbzznaqrq lbhe snguref, naq juvpu V frag gb lbh ol zl
freinagf gur cebcurgf.

17:14 Abgjvgufgnaqvat gurl jbhyq abg urne, ohg uneqrarq gurve arpxf,
yvxr gb gur arpx bs gurve snguref, gung qvq abg oryvrir va gur YBEQ
gurve Tbq.

17:15 Naq gurl erwrpgrq uvf fgnghgrf, naq uvf pbiranag gung ur znqr
jvgu gurve snguref, naq uvf grfgvzbavrf juvpu ur grfgvsvrq ntnvafg
gurz; naq gurl sbyybjrq inavgl, naq orpnzr inva, naq jrag nsgre gur
urngura gung jrer ebhaq nobhg gurz, pbapreavat jubz gur YBEQ unq
punetrq gurz, gung gurl fubhyq abg qb yvxr gurz.

17:16 Naq gurl yrsg nyy gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ gurve Tbq, naq
znqr gurz zbygra vzntrf, rira gjb pnyirf, naq znqr n tebir, naq
jbefuvccrq nyy gur ubfg bs urnira, naq freirq Onny.

17:17 Naq gurl pnhfrq gurve fbaf naq gurve qnhtugref gb cnff guebhtu
gur sver, naq hfrq qvivangvba naq rapunagzragf, naq fbyq gurzfryirf gb
qb rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, gb cebibxr uvz gb natre.

17:18 Gurersber gur YBEQ jnf irel natel jvgu Vfenry, naq erzbirq gurz
bhg bs uvf fvtug: gurer jnf abar yrsg ohg gur gevor bs Whqnu bayl.

17:19 Nyfb Whqnu xrcg abg gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ gurve Tbq, ohg
jnyxrq va gur fgnghgrf bs Vfenry juvpu gurl znqr.

17:20 Naq gur YBEQ erwrpgrq nyy gur frrq bs Vfenry, naq nssyvpgrq
gurz, naq qryvirerq gurz vagb gur unaq bs fcbvyref, hagvy ur unq pnfg
gurz bhg bs uvf fvtug.

17:21 Sbe ur erag Vfenry sebz gur ubhfr bs Qnivq; naq gurl znqr
Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong xvat: naq Wrebobnz qenir Vfenry sebz
sbyybjvat gur YBEQ, naq znqr gurz fva n terng fva.

17:22 Sbe gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jnyxrq va nyy gur fvaf bs Wrebobnz
juvpu ur qvq; gurl qrcnegrq abg sebz gurz; 17:23 Hagvy gur YBEQ
erzbirq Vfenry bhg bs uvf fvtug, nf ur unq fnvq ol nyy uvf freinagf
gur cebcurgf. Fb jnf Vfenry pneevrq njnl bhg bs gurve bja ynaq gb
Nfflevn hagb guvf qnl.

17:24 Naq gur xvat bs Nfflevn oebhtug zra sebz Onolyba, naq sebz
Phgunu, naq sebz Nin, naq sebz Unzngu, naq sebz Frcuneinvz, naq cynprq
gurz va gur pvgvrf bs Fnznevn vafgrnq bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry: naq
gurl cbffrffrq Fnznevn, naq qjryg va gur pvgvrf gurerbs.

17:25 Naq fb vg jnf ng gur ortvaavat bs gurve qjryyvat gurer, gung
gurl srnerq abg gur YBEQ: gurersber gur YBEQ frag yvbaf nzbat gurz,
juvpu fyrj fbzr bs gurz.

17:26 Jurersber gurl fcnxr gb gur xvat bs Nfflevn, fnlvat, Gur angvbaf
juvpu gubh unfg erzbirq, naq cynprq va gur pvgvrf bs Fnznevn, xabj abg
gur znaare bs gur Tbq bs gur ynaq: gurersber ur ungu frag yvbaf nzbat
gurz, naq, orubyq, gurl fynl gurz, orpnhfr gurl xabj abg gur znaare bs
gur Tbq bs gur ynaq.

17:27 Gura gur xvat bs Nfflevn pbzznaqrq, fnlvat, Pneel guvgure bar bs
gur cevrfgf jubz lr oebhtug sebz gurapr; naq yrg gurz tb naq qjryy
gurer, naq yrg uvz grnpu gurz gur znaare bs gur Tbq bs gur ynaq.

17:28 Gura bar bs gur cevrfgf jubz gurl unq pneevrq njnl sebz Fnznevn
pnzr naq qjryg va Orgury, naq gnhtug gurz ubj gurl fubhyq srne gur
YBEQ.

17:29 Ubjorvg rirel angvba znqr tbqf bs gurve bja, naq chg gurz va gur
ubhfrf bs gur uvtu cynprf juvpu gur Fnznevgnaf unq znqr, rirel angvba
va gurve pvgvrf jurerva gurl qjryg.

17:30 Naq gur zra bs Onolyba znqr Fhppbguorabgu, naq gur zra bs Phgu
znqr Aretny, naq gur zra bs Unzngu znqr Nfuvzn, 17:31 Naq gur Nivgrf
znqr Avounm naq Gnegnx, naq gur Frcuneivgrf oheag gurve puvyqera va
sver gb Nqenzzryrpu naq Nanzzryrpu, gur tbqf bs Frcuneinvz.

17:32 Fb gurl srnerq gur YBEQ, naq znqr hagb gurzfryirf bs gur ybjrfg
bs gurz cevrfgf bs gur uvtu cynprf, juvpu fnpevsvprq sbe gurz va gur
ubhfrf bs gur uvtu cynprf.

17:33 Gurl srnerq gur YBEQ, naq freirq gurve bja tbqf, nsgre gur
znaare bs gur angvbaf jubz gurl pneevrq njnl sebz gurapr.

17:34 Hagb guvf qnl gurl qb nsgre gur sbezre znaaref: gurl srne abg
gur YBEQ, arvgure qb gurl nsgre gurve fgnghgrf, be nsgre gurve
beqvanaprf, be nsgre gur ynj naq pbzznaqzrag juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq
gur puvyqera bs Wnpbo, jubz ur anzrq Vfenry; 17:35 Jvgu jubz gur YBEQ
unq znqr n pbiranag, naq punetrq gurz, fnlvat, Lr funyy abg srne bgure
tbqf, abe obj lbhefryirf gb gurz, abe freir gurz, abe fnpevsvpr gb
gurz: 17:36 Ohg gur YBEQ, jub oebhtug lbh hc bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg
jvgu terng cbjre naq n fgergpurq bhg nez, uvz funyy lr srne, naq uvz
funyy lr jbefuvc, naq gb uvz funyy lr qb fnpevsvpr.

17:37 Naq gur fgnghgrf, naq gur beqvanaprf, naq gur ynj, naq gur
pbzznaqzrag, juvpu ur jebgr sbe lbh, lr funyy bofreir gb qb sbe
rirezber; naq lr funyy abg srne bgure tbqf.

17:38 Naq gur pbiranag gung V unir znqr jvgu lbh lr funyy abg sbetrg;
arvgure funyy lr srne bgure tbqf.

17:39 Ohg gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq lr funyy srne; naq ur funyy qryvire lbh
bhg bs gur unaq bs nyy lbhe rarzvrf.

17:40 Ubjorvg gurl qvq abg urnexra, ohg gurl qvq nsgre gurve sbezre
znaare.

17:41 Fb gurfr angvbaf srnerq gur YBEQ, naq freirq gurve tenira
vzntrf, obgu gurve puvyqera, naq gurve puvyqera'f puvyqera: nf qvq
gurve snguref, fb qb gurl hagb guvf qnl.

18:1 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff va gur guveq lrne bs Ubfurn fba bs Rynu xvat
bs Vfenry, gung Urmrxvnu gur fba bs Nunm xvat bs Whqnu ortna gb ervta.

18:2 Gjragl naq svir lrnef byq jnf ur jura ur ortna gb ervta; naq ur
ervtarq gjragl naq avar lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Uvf zbgure'f anzr nyfb jnf
Nov, gur qnhtugre bs Mnpunevnu.

18:3 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung Qnivq uvf sngure qvq.

18:4 Ur erzbirq gur uvtu cynprf, naq oenxr gur vzntrf, naq phg qbja
gur tebirf, naq oenxr va cvrprf gur oenfra frecrag gung Zbfrf unq
znqr: sbe hagb gubfr qnlf gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq ohea vaprafr gb
vg: naq ur pnyyrq vg Aruhfugna.

18:5 Ur gehfgrq va gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry; fb gung nsgre uvz jnf abar
yvxr uvz nzbat nyy gur xvatf bs Whqnu, abe nal gung jrer orsber uvz.

18:6 Sbe ur pynir gb gur YBEQ, naq qrcnegrq abg sebz sbyybjvat uvz,
ohg xrcg uvf pbzznaqzragf, juvpu gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Zbfrf.

18:7 Naq gur YBEQ jnf jvgu uvz; naq ur cebfcrerq juvgurefbrire ur jrag
sbegu: naq ur eroryyrq ntnvafg gur xvat bs Nfflevn, naq freirq uvz
abg.

18:8 Ur fzbgr gur Cuvyvfgvarf, rira hagb Tnmn, naq gur obeqref
gurerbs, sebz gur gbjre bs gur jngpuzra gb gur sraprq pvgl.

18:9 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur sbhegu lrne bs xvat Urmrxvnu, juvpu
jnf gur friragu lrne bs Ubfurn fba bs Rynu xvat bs Vfenry, gung
Funyznarfre xvat bs Nfflevn pnzr hc ntnvafg Fnznevn, naq orfvrtrq vg.

18:10 Naq ng gur raq bs guerr lrnef gurl gbbx vg: rira va gur fvkgu
lrne bs Urmrxvnu, gung vf va gur avagu lrne bs Ubfurn xvat bs Vfenry,
Fnznevn jnf gnxra.

18:11 Naq gur xvat bs Nfflevn qvq pneel njnl Vfenry hagb Nfflevn, naq
chg gurz va Unynu naq va Unobe ol gur evire bs Tbmna, naq va gur
pvgvrf bs gur Zrqrf: 18:12 Orpnhfr gurl borlrq abg gur ibvpr bs gur
YBEQ gurve Tbq, ohg genafterffrq uvf pbiranag, naq nyy gung Zbfrf gur
freinag bs gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq, naq jbhyq abg urne gurz, abe qb gurz.

18:13 Abj va gur sbhegrragu lrne bs xvat Urmrxvnu qvq Fraanpurevo xvat
bs Nfflevn pbzr hc ntnvafg nyy gur sraprq pvgvrf bs Whqnu, naq gbbx
gurz.

18:14 Naq Urmrxvnu xvat bs Whqnu frag gb gur xvat bs Nfflevn gb
Ynpuvfu, fnlvat, V unir bssraqrq; erghea sebz zr: gung juvpu gubh
chggrfg ba zr jvyy V orne. Naq gur xvat bs Nfflevn nccbvagrq hagb
Urmrxvnu xvat bs Whqnu guerr uhaqerq gnyragf bs fvyire naq guvegl
gnyragf bs tbyq.

18:15 Naq Urmrxvnu tnir uvz nyy gur fvyire gung jnf sbhaq va gur ubhfr
bs gur YBEQ, naq va gur gernfherf bs gur xvat'f ubhfr.

18:16 Ng gung gvzr qvq Urmrxvnu phg bss gur tbyq sebz gur qbbef bs gur
grzcyr bs gur YBEQ, naq sebz gur cvyynef juvpu Urmrxvnu xvat bs Whqnu
unq bireynvq, naq tnir vg gb gur xvat bs Nfflevn.

18:17 Naq gur xvat bs Nfflevn frag Gnegna naq Enofnevf naq Enofunxru
sebz Ynpuvfu gb xvat Urmrxvnu jvgu n terng ubfg ntnvafg Wrehfnyrz. Naq
gurl jrag hc naq pnzr gb Wrehfnyrz. Naq jura gurl jrer pbzr hc, gurl
pnzr naq fgbbq ol gur pbaqhvg bs gur hccre cbby, juvpu vf va gur
uvtujnl bs gur shyyre'f svryq.

18:18 Naq jura gurl unq pnyyrq gb gur xvat, gurer pnzr bhg gb gurz
Ryvnxvz gur fba bs Uvyxvnu, juvpu jnf bire gur ubhfrubyq, naq Furoan
gur fpevor, naq Wbnu gur fba bs Nfncu gur erpbeqre.

18:19 Naq Enofunxru fnvq hagb gurz, Fcrnx lr abj gb Urmrxvnu, Guhf
fnvgu gur terng xvat, gur xvat bs Nfflevn, Jung pbasvqrapr vf guvf
jurerva gubh gehfgrfg?  18:20 Gubh fnlrfg, (ohg gurl ner ohg inva
jbeqf,) V unir pbhafry naq fgeratgu sbe gur jne. Abj ba jubz qbfg gubh
gehfg, gung gubh eroryyrfg ntnvafg zr?  18:21 Abj, orubyq, gubh
gehfgrfg hcba gur fgnss bs guvf oehvfrq errq, rira hcba Rtlcg, ba
juvpu vs n zna yrna, vg jvyy tb vagb uvf unaq, naq cvrepr vg: fb vf
Cunenbu xvat bs Rtlcg hagb nyy gung gehfg ba uvz.

18:22 Ohg vs lr fnl hagb zr, Jr gehfg va gur YBEQ bhe Tbq: vf abg gung
ur, jubfr uvtu cynprf naq jubfr nygnef Urmrxvnu ungu gnxra njnl, naq
ungu fnvq gb Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz, Lr funyy jbefuvc orsber guvf nygne
va Wrehfnyrz?  18:23 Abj gurersber, V cenl gurr, tvir cyrqtrf gb zl
ybeq gur xvat bs Nfflevn, naq V jvyy qryvire gurr gjb gubhfnaq ubefrf,
vs gubh or noyr ba gul cneg gb frg evqref hcba gurz.

18:24 Ubj gura jvyg gubh ghea njnl gur snpr bs bar pncgnva bs gur
yrnfg bs zl znfgre'f freinagf, naq chg gul gehfg ba Rtlcg sbe punevbgf
naq sbe ubefrzra?  18:25 Nz V abj pbzr hc jvgubhg gur YBEQ ntnvafg
guvf cynpr gb qrfgebl vg?  Gur YBEQ fnvq gb zr, Tb hc ntnvafg guvf
ynaq, naq qrfgebl vg.

18:26 Gura fnvq Ryvnxvz gur fba bs Uvyxvnu, naq Furoan, naq Wbnu, hagb
Enofunxru, Fcrnx, V cenl gurr, gb gul freinagf va gur Flevna ynathntr;
sbe jr haqrefgnaq vg: naq gnyx abg jvgu hf va gur Wrjf' ynathntr va
gur rnef bs gur crbcyr gung ner ba gur jnyy.

18:27 Ohg Enofunxru fnvq hagb gurz, Ungu zl znfgre frag zr gb gul
znfgre, naq gb gurr, gb fcrnx gurfr jbeqf? ungu ur abg frag zr gb gur
zra juvpu fvg ba gur jnyy, gung gurl znl rng gurve bja qhat, naq qevax
gurve bja cvff jvgu lbh?  18:28 Gura Enofunxru fgbbq naq pevrq jvgu n
ybhq ibvpr va gur Wrjf' ynathntr, naq fcnxr, fnlvat, Urne gur jbeq bs
gur terng xvat, gur xvat bs Nfflevn: 18:29 Guhf fnvgu gur xvat, Yrg
abg Urmrxvnu qrprvir lbh: sbe ur funyy abg or noyr gb qryvire lbh bhg
bs uvf unaq: 18:30 Arvgure yrg Urmrxvnu znxr lbh gehfg va gur YBEQ,
fnlvat, Gur YBEQ jvyy fheryl qryvire hf, naq guvf pvgl funyy abg or
qryvirerq vagb gur unaq bs gur xvat bs Nfflevn.

18:31 Urnexra abg gb Urmrxvnu: sbe guhf fnvgu gur xvat bs Nfflevn,
Znxr na nterrzrag jvgu zr ol n cerfrag, naq pbzr bhg gb zr, naq gura
rng lr rirel zna bs uvf bja ivar, naq rirel bar bs uvf svt gerr, naq
qevax lr rirel bar gur jngref bs uvf pvfgrea: 18:32 Hagvy V pbzr naq
gnxr lbh njnl gb n ynaq yvxr lbhe bja ynaq, n ynaq bs pbea naq jvar, n
ynaq bs oernq naq ivarlneqf, n ynaq bs bvy byvir naq bs ubarl, gung lr
znl yvir, naq abg qvr: naq urnexra abg hagb Urmrxvnu, jura ur
crefhnqrgu lbh, fnlvat, Gur YBEQ jvyy qryvire hf.

18:33 Ungu nal bs gur tbqf bs gur angvbaf qryvirerq ng nyy uvf ynaq
bhg bs gur unaq bs gur xvat bs Nfflevn?  18:34 Jurer ner gur tbqf bs
Unzngu, naq bs Necnq? jurer ner gur tbqf bs Frcuneinvz, Uran, naq
Vinu? unir gurl qryvirerq Fnznevn bhg bs zvar unaq?  18:35 Jub ner
gurl nzbat nyy gur tbqf bs gur pbhagevrf, gung unir qryvirerq gurve
pbhagel bhg bs zvar unaq, gung gur YBEQ fubhyq qryvire Wrehfnyrz bhg
bs zvar unaq?  18:36 Ohg gur crbcyr uryq gurve crnpr, naq nafjrerq uvz
abg n jbeq: sbe gur xvat'f pbzznaqzrag jnf, fnlvat, Nafjre uvz abg.

18:37 Gura pnzr Ryvnxvz gur fba bs Uvyxvnu, juvpu jnf bire gur
ubhfrubyq, naq Furoan gur fpevor, naq Wbnu gur fba bs Nfncu gur
erpbeqre, gb Urmrxvnu jvgu gurve pybgurf erag, naq gbyq uvz gur jbeqf
bs Enofunxru.

19:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura xvat Urmrxvnu urneq vg, gung ur erag
uvf pybgurf, naq pbirerq uvzfrys jvgu fnpxpybgu, naq jrag vagb gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

19:2 Naq ur frag Ryvnxvz, juvpu jnf bire gur ubhfrubyq, naq Furoan gur
fpevor, naq gur ryqref bs gur cevrfgf, pbirerq jvgu fnpxpybgu, gb
Vfnvnu gur cebcurg gur fba bs Nzbm.

19:3 Naq gurl fnvq hagb uvz, Guhf fnvgu Urmrxvnu, Guvf qnl vf n qnl bs
gebhoyr, naq bs erohxr, naq oynfcurzl; sbe gur puvyqera ner pbzr gb
gur ovegu, naq gurer vf abg fgeratgu gb oevat sbegu.

19:4 Vg znl or gur YBEQ gul Tbq jvyy urne nyy gur jbeqf bs Enofunxru,
jubz gur xvat bs Nfflevn uvf znfgre ungu frag gb ercebnpu gur yvivat
Tbq; naq jvyy ercebir gur jbeqf juvpu gur YBEQ gul Tbq ungu urneq:
jurersber yvsg hc gul cenlre sbe gur erzanag gung ner yrsg.

19:5 Fb gur freinagf bs xvat Urmrxvnu pnzr gb Vfnvnu.

19:6 Naq Vfnvnu fnvq hagb gurz, Guhf funyy lr fnl gb lbhe znfgre, Guhf
fnvgu gur YBEQ, Or abg nsenvq bs gur jbeqf juvpu gubh unfg urneq, jvgu
juvpu gur freinagf bs gur xvat bs Nfflevn unir oynfcurzrq zr.

19:7 Orubyq, V jvyy fraq n oynfg hcba uvz, naq ur funyy urne n ehzbhe,
naq funyy erghea gb uvf bja ynaq; naq V jvyy pnhfr uvz gb snyy ol gur
fjbeq va uvf bja ynaq.

19:8 Fb Enofunxru erghearq, naq sbhaq gur xvat bs Nfflevn jneevat
ntnvafg Yvoanu: sbe ur unq urneq gung ur jnf qrcnegrq sebz Ynpuvfu.

19:9 Naq jura ur urneq fnl bs Gveunxnu xvat bs Rguvbcvn, Orubyq, ur vf
pbzr bhg gb svtug ntnvafg gurr: ur frag zrffratref ntnva hagb
Urmrxvnu, fnlvat, 19:10 Guhf funyy lr fcrnx gb Urmrxvnu xvat bs Whqnu,
fnlvat, Yrg abg gul Tbq va jubz gubh gehfgrfg qrprvir gurr, fnlvat,
Wrehfnyrz funyy abg or qryvirerq vagb gur unaq bs gur xvat bs Nfflevn.

19:11 Orubyq, gubh unfg urneq jung gur xvatf bs Nfflevn unir qbar gb
nyy ynaqf, ol qrfgeblvat gurz hggreyl: naq funyg gubh or qryvirerq?
19:12 Unir gur tbqf bs gur angvbaf qryvirerq gurz juvpu zl snguref
unir qrfgeblrq; nf Tbmna, naq Unena, naq Ermrcu, naq gur puvyqera bs
Rqra juvpu jrer va Gurynfne?  19:13 Jurer vf gur xvat bs Unzngu, naq
gur xvat bs Necnq, naq gur xvat bs gur pvgl bs Frcuneinvz, bs Uran,
naq Vinu?  19:14 Naq Urmrxvnu erprvirq gur yrggre bs gur unaq bs gur
zrffratref, naq ernq vg: naq Urmrxvnu jrag hc vagb gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ, naq fcernq vg orsber gur YBEQ.

19:15 Naq Urmrxvnu cenlrq orsber gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, B YBEQ Tbq bs
Vfenry, juvpu qjryyrfg orgjrra gur purehovzf, gubh neg gur Tbq, rira
gubh nybar, bs nyy gur xvatqbzf bs gur rnegu; gubh unfg znqr urnira
naq rnegu.

19:16 YBEQ, obj qbja guvar rne, naq urne: bcra, YBEQ, guvar rlrf, naq
frr: naq urne gur jbeqf bs Fraanpurevo, juvpu ungu frag uvz gb
ercebnpu gur yvivat Tbq.

19:17 Bs n gehgu, YBEQ, gur xvatf bs Nfflevn unir qrfgeblrq gur
angvbaf naq gurve ynaqf, 19:18 Naq unir pnfg gurve tbqf vagb gur sver:
sbe gurl jrer ab tbqf, ohg gur jbex bs zra'f unaqf, jbbq naq fgbar:
gurersber gurl unir qrfgeblrq gurz.

19:19 Abj gurersber, B YBEQ bhe Tbq, V orfrrpu gurr, fnir gubh hf bhg
bs uvf unaq, gung nyy gur xvatqbzf bs gur rnegu znl xabj gung gubh neg
gur YBEQ Tbq, rira gubh bayl.

19:20 Gura Vfnvnu gur fba bs Nzbm frag gb Urmrxvnu, fnlvat, Guhf fnvgu
gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, Gung juvpu gubh unfg cenlrq gb zr ntnvafg
Fraanpurevo xvat bs Nfflevn V unir urneq.

19:21 Guvf vf gur jbeq gung gur YBEQ ungu fcbxra pbapreavat uvz; Gur
ivetva gur qnhtugre bs Mvba ungu qrfcvfrq gurr, naq ynhturq gurr gb
fpbea; gur qnhtugre bs Wrehfnyrz ungu funxra ure urnq ng gurr.

19:22 Jubz unfg gubh ercebnpurq naq oynfcurzrq? naq ntnvafg jubz unfg
gubh rknygrq gul ibvpr, naq yvsgrq hc guvar rlrf ba uvtu? rira ntnvafg
gur Ubyl Bar bs Vfenry.

19:23 Ol gul zrffratref gubh unfg ercebnpurq gur YBEQ, naq unfg fnvq,
Jvgu gur zhygvghqr bs zl punevbgf V nz pbzr hc gb gur urvtug bs gur
zbhagnvaf, gb gur fvqrf bs Yronaba, naq jvyy phg qbja gur gnyy prqne
gerrf gurerbs, naq gur pubvpr sve gerrf gurerbs: naq V jvyy ragre vagb
gur ybqtvatf bs uvf obeqref, naq vagb gur sberfg bs uvf Pnezry.

19:24 V unir qvttrq naq qehax fgenatr jngref, naq jvgu gur fbyr bs zl
srrg unir V qevrq hc nyy gur eviref bs orfvrtrq cynprf.

19:25 Unfg gubh abg urneq ybat ntb ubj V unir qbar vg, naq bs napvrag
gvzrf gung V unir sbezrq vg? abj unir V oebhtug vg gb cnff, gung gubh
fubhyqrfg or gb ynl jnfgr sraprq pvgvrf vagb ehvabhf urncf.

19:26 Gurersber gurve vaunovgnagf jrer bs fznyy cbjre, gurl jrer
qvfznlrq naq pbasbhaqrq; gurl jrer nf gur tenff bs gur svryq, naq nf
gur terra ureo, nf gur tenff ba gur ubhfr gbcf, naq nf pbea oynfgrq
orsber vg or tebja hc.

19:27 Ohg V xabj gul nobqr, naq gul tbvat bhg, naq gul pbzvat va, naq
gul entr ntnvafg zr.

19:28 Orpnhfr gul entr ntnvafg zr naq gul ghzhyg vf pbzr hc vagb zvar
rnef, gurersber V jvyy chg zl ubbx va gul abfr, naq zl oevqyr va gul
yvcf, naq V jvyy ghea gurr onpx ol gur jnl ol juvpu gubh pnzrfg.

19:29 Naq guvf funyy or n fvta hagb gurr, Lr funyy rng guvf lrne fhpu
guvatf nf tebj bs gurzfryirf, naq va gur frpbaq lrne gung juvpu
fcevatrgu bs gur fnzr; naq va gur guveq lrne fbj lr, naq ernc, naq
cynag ivarlneqf, naq rng gur sehvgf gurerbs.

19:30 Naq gur erzanag gung vf rfpncrq bs gur ubhfr bs Whqnu funyy lrg
ntnva gnxr ebbg qbjajneq, naq orne sehvg hcjneq.

19:31 Sbe bhg bs Wrehfnyrz funyy tb sbegu n erzanag, naq gurl gung
rfpncr bhg bs zbhag Mvba: gur mrny bs gur YBEQ bs ubfgf funyy qb guvf.

19:32 Gurersber guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ pbapreavat gur xvat bs Nfflevn, Ur
funyy abg pbzr vagb guvf pvgl, abe fubbg na neebj gurer, abe pbzr
orsber vg jvgu fuvryq, abe pnfg n onax ntnvafg vg.

19:33 Ol gur jnl gung ur pnzr, ol gur fnzr funyy ur erghea, naq funyy
abg pbzr vagb guvf pvgl, fnvgu gur YBEQ.

19:34 Sbe V jvyy qrsraq guvf pvgl, gb fnir vg, sbe zvar bja fnxr, naq
sbe zl freinag Qnivq'f fnxr.

19:35 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff gung avtug, gung gur natry bs gur YBEQ jrag
bhg, naq fzbgr va gur pnzc bs gur Nfflevnaf na uhaqerq sbhefpber naq
svir gubhfnaq: naq jura gurl nebfr rneyl va gur zbeavat, orubyq, gurl
jrer nyy qrnq pbecfrf.

19:36 Fb Fraanpurevo xvat bs Nfflevn qrcnegrq, naq jrag naq erghearq,
naq qjryg ng Avariru.

19:37 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf ur jnf jbefuvccvat va gur ubhfr bs
Avfebpu uvf tbq, gung Nqenzzryrpu naq Funermre uvf fbaf fzbgr uvz jvgu
gur fjbeq: naq gurl rfpncrq vagb gur ynaq bs Nezravn. Naq Rfneunqqba
uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

20:1 Va gubfr qnlf jnf Urmrxvnu fvpx hagb qrngu. Naq gur cebcurg
Vfnvnu gur fba bs Nzbm pnzr gb uvz, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Guhf fnvgu gur
YBEQ, Frg guvar ubhfr va beqre; sbe gubh funyg qvr, naq abg yvir.

20:2 Gura ur ghearq uvf snpr gb gur jnyy, naq cenlrq hagb gur YBEQ,
fnlvat, 20:3 V orfrrpu gurr, B YBEQ, erzrzore abj ubj V unir jnyxrq
orsber gurr va gehgu naq jvgu n cresrpg urneg, naq unir qbar gung
juvpu vf tbbq va gul fvtug. Naq Urmrxvnu jrcg fber.

20:4 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nsber Vfnvnu jnf tbar bhg vagb gur zvqqyr
pbheg, gung gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr gb uvz, fnlvat, 20:5 Ghea ntnva,
naq gryy Urmrxvnu gur pncgnva bs zl crbcyr, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, gur
Tbq bs Qnivq gul sngure, V unir urneq gul cenlre, V unir frra gul
grnef: orubyq, V jvyy urny gurr: ba gur guveq qnl gubh funyg tb hc
hagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

20:6 Naq V jvyy nqq hagb gul qnlf svsgrra lrnef; naq V jvyy qryvire
gurr naq guvf pvgl bhg bs gur unaq bs gur xvat bs Nfflevn; naq V jvyy
qrsraq guvf pvgl sbe zvar bja fnxr, naq sbe zl freinag Qnivq'f fnxr.

20:7 Naq Vfnvnu fnvq, Gnxr n yhzc bs svtf. Naq gurl gbbx naq ynvq vg
ba gur obvy, naq ur erpbirerq.

20:8 Naq Urmrxvnu fnvq hagb Vfnvnu, Jung funyy or gur fvta gung gur
YBEQ jvyy urny zr, naq gung V funyy tb hc vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ
gur guveq qnl?  20:9 Naq Vfnvnu fnvq, Guvf fvta funyg gubh unir bs gur
YBEQ, gung gur YBEQ jvyy qb gur guvat gung ur ungu fcbxra: funyy gur
funqbj tb sbejneq gra qrterrf, be tb onpx gra qrterrf?  20:10 Naq
Urmrxvnu nafjrerq, Vg vf n yvtug guvat sbe gur funqbj gb tb qbja gra
qrterrf: anl, ohg yrg gur funqbj erghea onpxjneq gra qrterrf.

20:11 Naq Vfnvnu gur cebcurg pevrq hagb gur YBEQ: naq ur oebhtug gur
funqbj gra qrterrf onpxjneq, ol juvpu vg unq tbar qbja va gur qvny bs
Nunm.

20:12 Ng gung gvzr Orebqnpuonynqna, gur fba bs Onynqna, xvat bs
Onolyba, frag yrggref naq n cerfrag hagb Urmrxvnu: sbe ur unq urneq
gung Urmrxvnu unq orra fvpx.

20:13 Naq Urmrxvnu urnexrarq hagb gurz, naq furjrq gurz nyy gur ubhfr
bs uvf cerpvbhf guvatf, gur fvyire, naq gur tbyq, naq gur fcvprf, naq
gur cerpvbhf bvagzrag, naq nyy gur ubhfr bs uvf nezbhe, naq nyy gung
jnf sbhaq va uvf gernfherf: gurer jnf abguvat va uvf ubhfr, abe va nyy
uvf qbzvavba, gung Urmrxvnu furjrq gurz abg.

20:14 Gura pnzr Vfnvnu gur cebcurg hagb xvat Urmrxvnu, naq fnvq hagb
uvz, Jung fnvq gurfr zra? naq sebz jurapr pnzr gurl hagb gurr? Naq
Urmrxvnu fnvq, Gurl ner pbzr sebz n sne pbhagel, rira sebz Onolyba.

20:15 Naq ur fnvq, Jung unir gurl frra va guvar ubhfr? Naq Urmrxvnu
nafjrerq, Nyy gur guvatf gung ner va zvar ubhfr unir gurl frra: gurer
vf abguvat nzbat zl gernfherf gung V unir abg furjrq gurz.

20:16 Naq Vfnvnu fnvq hagb Urmrxvnu, Urne gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ.

20:17 Orubyq, gur qnlf pbzr, gung nyy gung vf va guvar ubhfr, naq gung
juvpu gul snguref unir ynvq hc va fgber hagb guvf qnl, funyy or
pneevrq vagb Onolyba: abguvat funyy or yrsg, fnvgu gur YBEQ.

20:18 Naq bs gul fbaf gung funyy vffhr sebz gurr, juvpu gubh funyg
ortrg, funyy gurl gnxr njnl; naq gurl funyy or rhahpuf va gur cnynpr
bs gur xvat bs Onolyba.

20:19 Gura fnvq Urmrxvnu hagb Vfnvnu, Tbbq vf gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ
juvpu gubh unfg fcbxra. Naq ur fnvq, Vf vg abg tbbq, vs crnpr naq
gehgu or va zl qnlf?  20:20 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Urmrxvnu, naq
nyy uvf zvtug, naq ubj ur znqr n cbby, naq n pbaqhvg, naq oebhtug
jngre vagb gur pvgl, ner gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur
puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu?  20:21 Naq Urmrxvnu fyrcg jvgu uvf
snguref: naq Znanffru uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

21:1 Znanffru jnf gjryir lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ervtarq
svsgl naq svir lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf
Urcumvonu.

21:2 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, nsgre
gur nobzvangvbaf bs gur urngura, jubz gur YBEQ pnfg bhg orsber gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry.

21:3 Sbe ur ohvyg hc ntnva gur uvtu cynprf juvpu Urmrxvnu uvf sngure
unq qrfgeblrq; naq ur ernerq hc nygnef sbe Onny, naq znqr n tebir, nf
qvq Nuno xvat bs Vfenry; naq jbefuvccrq nyy gur ubfg bs urnira, naq
freirq gurz.

21:4 Naq ur ohvyg nygnef va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, bs juvpu gur YBEQ
fnvq, Va Wrehfnyrz jvyy V chg zl anzr.

21:5 Naq ur ohvyg nygnef sbe nyy gur ubfg bs urnira va gur gjb pbhegf
bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

21:6 Naq ur znqr uvf fba cnff guebhtu gur sver, naq bofreirq gvzrf,
naq hfrq rapunagzragf, naq qrnyg jvgu snzvyvne fcvevgf naq jvmneqf: ur
jebhtug zhpu jvpxrqarff va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, gb cebibxr uvz gb
natre.

21:7 Naq ur frg n tenira vzntr bs gur tebir gung ur unq znqr va gur
ubhfr, bs juvpu gur YBEQ fnvq gb Qnivq, naq gb Fbybzba uvf fba, Va
guvf ubhfr, naq va Wrehfnyrz, juvpu V unir pubfra bhg bs nyy gevorf bs
Vfenry, jvyy V chg zl anzr sbe rire: 21:8 Arvgure jvyy V znxr gur srrg
bs Vfenry zbir nal zber bhg bs gur ynaq juvpu V tnir gurve snguref;
bayl vs gurl jvyy bofreir gb qb nppbeqvat gb nyy gung V unir pbzznaqrq
gurz, naq nppbeqvat gb nyy gur ynj gung zl freinag Zbfrf pbzznaqrq
gurz.

21:9 Ohg gurl urnexrarq abg: naq Znanffru frqhprq gurz gb qb zber rivy
guna qvq gur angvbaf jubz gur YBEQ qrfgeblrq orsber gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry.

21:10 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr ol uvf freinagf gur cebcurgf, fnlvat, 21:11
Orpnhfr Znanffru xvat bs Whqnu ungu qbar gurfr nobzvangvbaf, naq ungu
qbar jvpxrqyl nobir nyy gung gur Nzbevgrf qvq, juvpu jrer orsber uvz,
naq ungu znqr Whqnu nyfb gb fva jvgu uvf vqbyf: 21:12 Gurersber guhf
fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, Orubyq, V nz oevatvat fhpu rivy hcba
Wrehfnyrz naq Whqnu, gung jubfbrire urnergu bs vg, obgu uvf rnef funyy
gvatyr.

21:13 Naq V jvyy fgergpu bire Wrehfnyrz gur yvar bs Fnznevn, naq gur
cyhzzrg bs gur ubhfr bs Nuno: naq V jvyy jvcr Wrehfnyrz nf n zna
jvcrgu n qvfu, jvcvat vg, naq gheavat vg hcfvqr qbja.

21:14 Naq V jvyy sbefnxr gur erzanag bs zvar vaurevgnapr, naq qryvire
gurz vagb gur unaq bs gurve rarzvrf; naq gurl funyy orpbzr n cerl naq
n fcbvy gb nyy gurve rarzvrf; 21:15 Orpnhfr gurl unir qbar gung juvpu
jnf rivy va zl fvtug, naq unir cebibxrq zr gb natre, fvapr gur qnl
gurve snguref pnzr sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg, rira hagb guvf qnl.

21:16 Zberbire Znanffru furq vaabprag oybbq irel zhpu, gvyy ur unq
svyyrq Wrehfnyrz sebz bar raq gb nabgure; orfvqr uvf fva jurerjvgu ur
znqr Whqnu gb fva, va qbvat gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur
YBEQ.

21:17 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Znanffru, naq nyy gung ur qvq, naq
uvf fva gung ur fvaarq, ner gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur
puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu?  21:18 Naq Znanffru fyrcg jvgu uvf
snguref, naq jnf ohevrq va gur tneqra bs uvf bja ubhfr, va gur tneqra
bs Hmmn: naq Nzba uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

21:19 Nzba jnf gjragl naq gjb lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur
ervtarq gjb lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf
Zrfuhyyrzrgu, gur qnhtugre bs Unehm bs Wbgonu.

21:20 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, nf uvf
sngure Znanffru qvq.

21:21 Naq ur jnyxrq va nyy gur jnl gung uvf sngure jnyxrq va, naq
freirq gur vqbyf gung uvf sngure freirq, naq jbefuvccrq gurz: 21:22
Naq ur sbefbbx gur YBEQ Tbq bs uvf snguref, naq jnyxrq abg va gur jnl
bs gur YBEQ.

21:23 Naq gur freinagf bs Nzba pbafcverq ntnvafg uvz, naq fyrj gur
xvat va uvf bja ubhfr.

21:24 Naq gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq fyrj nyy gurz gung unq pbafcverq
ntnvafg xvat Nzba; naq gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq znqr Wbfvnu uvf fba xvat
va uvf fgrnq.

21:25 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Nzba juvpu ur qvq, ner gurl abg
jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu?  21:26
Naq ur jnf ohevrq va uvf frchypuer va gur tneqra bs Hmmn: naq Wbfvnu
uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

22:1 Wbfvnu jnf rvtug lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur ervtarq
guvegl naq bar lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf Wrqvqnu,
gur qnhtugre bs Nqnvnu bs Obfpngu.

22:2 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, naq
jnyxrq va nyy gur jnl bs Qnivq uvf sngure, naq ghearq abg nfvqr gb gur
evtug unaq be gb gur yrsg.

22:3 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur rvtugrragu lrne bs xvat Wbfvnu, gung
gur xvat frag Funcuna gur fba bs Nmnyvnu, gur fba bs Zrfuhyynz, gur
fpevor, gb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, fnlvat, 22:4 Tb hc gb Uvyxvnu gur
uvtu cevrfg, gung ur znl fhz gur fvyire juvpu vf oebhtug vagb gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, juvpu gur xrrcref bs gur qbbe unir tngurerq bs gur
crbcyr: 22:5 Naq yrg gurz qryvire vg vagb gur unaq bs gur qbref bs gur
jbex, gung unir gur birefvtug bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ: naq yrg gurz
tvir vg gb gur qbref bs gur jbex juvpu vf va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, gb
ercnve gur oernpurf bs gur ubhfr, 22:6 Hagb pnecragref, naq ohvyqref,
naq znfbaf, naq gb ohl gvzore naq urja fgbar gb ercnve gur ubhfr.

22:7 Ubjorvg gurer jnf ab erpxbavat znqr jvgu gurz bs gur zbarl gung
jnf qryvirerq vagb gurve unaq, orpnhfr gurl qrnyg snvgushyyl.

22:8 Naq Uvyxvnu gur uvtu cevrfg fnvq hagb Funcuna gur fpevor, V unir
sbhaq gur obbx bs gur ynj va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ. Naq Uvyxvnu tnir
gur obbx gb Funcuna, naq ur ernq vg.

22:9 Naq Funcuna gur fpevor pnzr gb gur xvat, naq oebhtug gur xvat
jbeq ntnva, naq fnvq, Gul freinagf unir tngurerq gur zbarl gung jnf
sbhaq va gur ubhfr, naq unir qryvirerq vg vagb gur unaq bs gurz gung
qb gur jbex, gung unir gur birefvtug bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

22:10 Naq Funcuna gur fpevor furjrq gur xvat, fnlvat, Uvyxvnu gur
cevrfg ungu qryvirerq zr n obbx. Naq Funcuna ernq vg orsber gur xvat.

22:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur xvat unq urneq gur jbeqf bs gur
obbx bs gur ynj, gung ur erag uvf pybgurf.

22:12 Naq gur xvat pbzznaqrq Uvyxvnu gur cevrfg, naq Nuvxnz gur fba bs
Funcuna, naq Npuobe gur fba bs Zvpunvnu, naq Funcuna gur fpevor, naq
Nfnuvnu n freinag bs gur xvat'f, fnlvat, 22:13 Tb lr, radhver bs gur
YBEQ sbe zr, naq sbe gur crbcyr, naq sbe nyy Whqnu, pbapreavat gur
jbeqf bs guvf obbx gung vf sbhaq: sbe terng vf gur jengu bs gur YBEQ
gung vf xvaqyrq ntnvafg hf, orpnhfr bhe snguref unir abg urnexrarq
hagb gur jbeqf bs guvf obbx, gb qb nppbeqvat hagb nyy gung juvpu vf
jevggra pbapreavat hf.

22:14 Fb Uvyxvnu gur cevrfg, naq Nuvxnz, naq Npuobe, naq Funcuna, naq
Nfnuvnu, jrag hagb Uhyqnu gur cebcurgrff, gur jvsr bs Funyyhz gur fba
bs Gvxinu, gur fba bs Uneunf, xrrcre bs gur jneqebor; (abj fur qjryg
va Wrehfnyrz va gur pbyyrtr;) naq gurl pbzzharq jvgu ure.

22:15 Naq fur fnvq hagb gurz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, Gryy
gur zna gung frag lbh gb zr, 22:16 Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Orubyq, V jvyy
oevat rivy hcba guvf cynpr, naq hcba gur vaunovgnagf gurerbs, rira nyy
gur jbeqf bs gur obbx juvpu gur xvat bs Whqnu ungu ernq: 22:17 Orpnhfr
gurl unir sbefnxra zr, naq unir ohearq vaprafr hagb bgure tbqf, gung
gurl zvtug cebibxr zr gb natre jvgu nyy gur jbexf bs gurve unaqf;
gurersber zl jengu funyy or xvaqyrq ntnvafg guvf cynpr, naq funyy abg
or dhrapurq.

22:18 Ohg gb gur xvat bs Whqnu juvpu frag lbh gb radhver bs gur YBEQ,
guhf funyy lr fnl gb uvz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, Nf
gbhpuvat gur jbeqf juvpu gubh unfg urneq; 22:19 Orpnhfr guvar urneg
jnf graqre, naq gubh unfg uhzoyrq gulfrys orsber gur YBEQ, jura gubh
urneqrfg jung V fcnxr ntnvafg guvf cynpr, naq ntnvafg gur vaunovgnagf
gurerbs, gung gurl fubhyq orpbzr n qrfbyngvba naq n phefr, naq unfg
erag gul pybgurf, naq jrcg orsber zr; V nyfb unir urneq gurr, fnvgu
gur YBEQ.

22:20 Orubyq gurersber, V jvyy tngure gurr hagb gul snguref, naq gubh
funyg or tngurerq vagb gul tenir va crnpr; naq guvar rlrf funyy abg
frr nyy gur rivy juvpu V jvyy oevat hcba guvf cynpr. Naq gurl oebhtug
gur xvat jbeq ntnva.

23:1 Naq gur xvat frag, naq gurl tngurerq hagb uvz nyy gur ryqref bs
Whqnu naq bs Wrehfnyrz.

23:2 Naq gur xvat jrag hc vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq nyy gur zra
bs Whqnu naq nyy gur vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz jvgu uvz, naq gur
cevrfgf, naq gur cebcurgf, naq nyy gur crbcyr, obgu fznyy naq terng:
naq ur ernq va gurve rnef nyy gur jbeqf bs gur obbx bs gur pbiranag
juvpu jnf sbhaq va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

23:3 Naq gur xvat fgbbq ol n cvyyne, naq znqr n pbiranag orsber gur
YBEQ, gb jnyx nsgre gur YBEQ, naq gb xrrc uvf pbzznaqzragf naq uvf
grfgvzbavrf naq uvf fgnghgrf jvgu nyy gurve urneg naq nyy gurve fbhy,
gb cresbez gur jbeqf bs guvf pbiranag gung jrer jevggra va guvf obbx.
Naq nyy gur crbcyr fgbbq gb gur pbiranag.

23:4 Naq gur xvat pbzznaqrq Uvyxvnu gur uvtu cevrfg, naq gur cevrfgf
bs gur frpbaq beqre, naq gur xrrcref bs gur qbbe, gb oevat sbegu bhg
bs gur grzcyr bs gur YBEQ nyy gur irffryf gung jrer znqr sbe Onny, naq
sbe gur tebir, naq sbe nyy gur ubfg bs urnira: naq ur ohearq gurz
jvgubhg Wrehfnyrz va gur svryqf bs Xvqeba, naq pneevrq gur nfurf bs
gurz hagb Orgury.

23:5 Naq ur chg qbja gur vqbyngebhf cevrfgf, jubz gur xvatf bs Whqnu
unq beqnvarq gb ohea vaprafr va gur uvtu cynprf va gur pvgvrf bs
Whqnu, naq va gur cynprf ebhaq nobhg Wrehfnyrz; gurz nyfb gung ohearq
vaprafr hagb Onny, gb gur fha, naq gb gur zbba, naq gb gur cynargf,
naq gb nyy gur ubfg bs urnira.

23:6 Naq ur oebhtug bhg gur tebir sebz gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, jvgubhg
Wrehfnyrz, hagb gur oebbx Xvqeba, naq ohearq vg ng gur oebbx Xvqeba,
naq fgnzcrq vg fznyy gb cbjqre, naq pnfg gur cbjqre gurerbs hcba gur
tenirf bs gur puvyqera bs gur crbcyr.

23:7 Naq ur oenxr qbja gur ubhfrf bs gur fbqbzvgrf, gung jrer ol gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, jurer gur jbzra jbir unatvatf sbe gur tebir.

23:8 Naq ur oebhtug nyy gur cevrfgf bhg bs gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu, naq
qrsvyrq gur uvtu cynprf jurer gur cevrfgf unq ohearq vaprafr, sebz
Tron gb Orrefuron, naq oenxr qbja gur uvtu cynprf bs gur tngrf gung
jrer va gur ragrevat va bs gur tngr bs Wbfuhn gur tbireabe bs gur
pvgl, juvpu jrer ba n zna'f yrsg unaq ng gur tngr bs gur pvgl.

23:9 Arireguryrff gur cevrfgf bs gur uvtu cynprf pnzr abg hc gb gur
nygne bs gur YBEQ va Wrehfnyrz, ohg gurl qvq rng bs gur hayrnirarq
oernq nzbat gurve oerguera.

23:10 Naq ur qrsvyrq Gbcurgu, juvpu vf va gur inyyrl bs gur puvyqera
bs Uvaabz, gung ab zna zvtug znxr uvf fba be uvf qnhtugre gb cnff
guebhtu gur sver gb Zbyrpu.

23:11 Naq ur gbbx njnl gur ubefrf gung gur xvatf bs Whqnu unq tvira gb
gur fha, ng gur ragrevat va bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, ol gur punzore
bs Angunazryrpu gur punzoreynva, juvpu jnf va gur fhoheof, naq ohearq
gur punevbgf bs gur fha jvgu sver.

23:12 Naq gur nygnef gung jrer ba gur gbc bs gur hccre punzore bs
Nunm, juvpu gur xvatf bs Whqnu unq znqr, naq gur nygnef juvpu Znanffru
unq znqr va gur gjb pbhegf bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, qvq gur xvat orng
qbja, naq oenxr gurz qbja sebz gurapr, naq pnfg gur qhfg bs gurz vagb
gur oebbx Xvqeba.

23:13 Naq gur uvtu cynprf gung jrer orsber Wrehfnyrz, juvpu jrer ba
gur evtug unaq bs gur zbhag bs pbeehcgvba, juvpu Fbybzba gur xvat bs
Vfenry unq ohvyqrq sbe Nfugbergu gur nobzvangvba bs gur Mvqbavnaf, naq
sbe Purzbfu gur nobzvangvba bs gur Zbnovgrf, naq sbe Zvypbz gur
nobzvangvba bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, qvq gur xvat qrsvyr.

23:14 Naq ur oenxr va cvrprf gur vzntrf, naq phg qbja gur tebirf, naq
svyyrq gurve cynprf jvgu gur obarf bs zra.

23:15 Zberbire gur nygne gung jnf ng Orgury, naq gur uvtu cynpr juvpu
Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, jub znqr Vfenry gb fva, unq znqr, obgu gung
nygne naq gur uvtu cynpr ur oenxr qbja, naq ohearq gur uvtu cynpr, naq
fgnzcrq vg fznyy gb cbjqre, naq ohearq gur tebir.

23:16 Naq nf Wbfvnu ghearq uvzfrys, ur fcvrq gur frchypuerf gung jrer
gurer va gur zbhag, naq frag, naq gbbx gur obarf bhg bs gur
frchypuerf, naq ohearq gurz hcba gur nygne, naq cbyyhgrq vg, nppbeqvat
gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ juvpu gur zna bs Tbq cebpynvzrq, jub
cebpynvzrq gurfr jbeqf.

23:17 Gura ur fnvq, Jung gvgyr vf gung gung V frr? Naq gur zra bs gur
pvgl gbyq uvz, Vg vf gur frchypuer bs gur zna bs Tbq, juvpu pnzr sebz
Whqnu, naq cebpynvzrq gurfr guvatf gung gubh unfg qbar ntnvafg gur
nygne bs Orgury.

23:18 Naq ur fnvq, Yrg uvz nybar; yrg ab zna zbir uvf obarf. Fb gurl
yrg uvf obarf nybar, jvgu gur obarf bs gur cebcurg gung pnzr bhg bs
Fnznevn.

23:19 Naq nyy gur ubhfrf nyfb bs gur uvtu cynprf gung jrer va gur
pvgvrf bs Fnznevn, juvpu gur xvatf bs Vfenry unq znqr gb cebibxr gur
Ybeq gb natre, Wbfvnu gbbx njnl, naq qvq gb gurz nppbeqvat gb nyy gur
npgf gung ur unq qbar va Orgury.

23:20 Naq ur fyrj nyy gur cevrfgf bs gur uvtu cynprf gung jrer gurer
hcba gur nygnef, naq ohearq zra'f obarf hcba gurz, naq erghearq gb
Wrehfnyrz.

23:21 Naq gur xvat pbzznaqrq nyy gur crbcyr, fnlvat, Xrrc gur cnffbire
hagb gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, nf vg vf jevggra va gur obbx bs guvf pbiranag.

23:22 Fheryl gurer jnf abg ubyqra fhpu n cnffbire sebz gur qnlf bs gur
whqtrf gung whqtrq Vfenry, abe va nyy gur qnlf bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry,
abe bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu; 23:23 Ohg va gur rvtugrragu lrne bs xvat
Wbfvnu, jurerva guvf cnffbire jnf ubyqra gb gur YBEQ va Wrehfnyrz.

23:24 Zberbire gur jbexref jvgu snzvyvne fcvevgf, naq gur jvmneqf, naq
gur vzntrf, naq gur vqbyf, naq nyy gur nobzvangvbaf gung jrer fcvrq va
gur ynaq bs Whqnu naq va Wrehfnyrz, qvq Wbfvnu chg njnl, gung ur zvtug
cresbez gur jbeqf bs gur ynj juvpu jrer jevggra va gur obbx gung
Uvyxvnu gur cevrfg sbhaq va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

23:25 Naq yvxr hagb uvz jnf gurer ab xvat orsber uvz, gung ghearq gb
gur YBEQ jvgu nyy uvf urneg, naq jvgu nyy uvf fbhy, naq jvgu nyy uvf
zvtug, nppbeqvat gb nyy gur ynj bs Zbfrf; arvgure nsgre uvz nebfr
gurer nal yvxr uvz.

23:26 Abgjvgufgnaqvat gur YBEQ ghearq abg sebz gur svreprarff bs uvf
terng jengu, jurerjvgu uvf natre jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg Whqnu, orpnhfr bs
nyy gur cebibpngvbaf gung Znanffru unq cebibxrq uvz jvguny.

23:27 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, V jvyy erzbir Whqnu nyfb bhg bs zl fvtug, nf
V unir erzbirq Vfenry, naq jvyy pnfg bss guvf pvgl Wrehfnyrz juvpu V
unir pubfra, naq gur ubhfr bs juvpu V fnvq, Zl anzr funyy or gurer.

23:28 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wbfvnu, naq nyy gung ur qvq, ner
gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu?
23:29 Va uvf qnlf Cunenbuarpubu xvat bs Rtlcg jrag hc ntnvafg gur xvat
bs Nfflevn gb gur evire Rhcuengrf: naq xvat Wbfvnu jrag ntnvafg uvz;
naq ur fyrj uvz ng Zrtvqqb, jura ur unq frra uvz.

23:30 Naq uvf freinagf pneevrq uvz va n punevbg qrnq sebz Zrtvqqb, naq
oebhtug uvz gb Wrehfnyrz, naq ohevrq uvz va uvf bja frchypuer. Naq gur
crbcyr bs gur ynaq gbbx Wrubnunm gur fba bs Wbfvnu, naq nabvagrq uvz,
naq znqr uvz xvat va uvf sngure'f fgrnq.

23:31 Wrubnunm jnf gjragl naq guerr lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta;
