naq ur ervtarq guerr zbaguf va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf
Unzhgny, gur qnhtugre bs Wrerzvnu bs Yvoanu.

23:32 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung uvf snguref unq qbar.

23:33 Naq Cunenbuarpubu chg uvz va onaqf ng Evoynu va gur ynaq bs
Unzngu, gung ur zvtug abg ervta va Wrehfnyrz; naq chg gur ynaq gb n
gevohgr bs na uhaqerq gnyragf bs fvyire, naq n gnyrag bs tbyq.

23:34 Naq Cunenbuarpubu znqr Ryvnxvz gur fba bs Wbfvnu xvat va gur
ebbz bs Wbfvnu uvf sngure, naq ghearq uvf anzr gb Wrubvnxvz, naq gbbx
Wrubnunm njnl: naq ur pnzr gb Rtlcg, naq qvrq gurer.

23:35 Naq Wrubvnxvz tnir gur fvyire naq gur tbyq gb Cunenbu; ohg ur
gnkrq gur ynaq gb tvir gur zbarl nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs
Cunenbu: ur rknpgrq gur fvyire naq gur tbyq bs gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq,
bs rirel bar nppbeqvat gb uvf gnkngvba, gb tvir vg hagb Cunenbuarpubu.

23:36 Wrubvnxvz jnf gjragl naq svir lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta;
naq ur ervtarq ryrira lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf
Mrohqnu, gur qnhtugre bs Crqnvnu bs Ehznu.

23:37 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung uvf snguref unq qbar.

24:1 Va uvf qnlf Arohpunqarmmne xvat bs Onolyba pnzr hc, naq Wrubvnxvz
orpnzr uvf freinag guerr lrnef: gura ur ghearq naq eroryyrq ntnvafg
uvz.

24:2 Naq gur YBEQ frag ntnvafg uvz onaqf bs gur Punyqrrf, naq onaqf bs
gur Flevnaf, naq onaqf bs gur Zbnovgrf, naq onaqf bs gur puvyqera bs
Nzzba, naq frag gurz ntnvafg Whqnu gb qrfgebl vg, nppbeqvat gb gur
jbeq bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur fcnxr ol uvf freinagf gur cebcurgf.

24:3 Fheryl ng gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ pnzr guvf hcba Whqnu, gb
erzbir gurz bhg bs uvf fvtug, sbe gur fvaf bs Znanffru, nppbeqvat gb
nyy gung ur qvq; 24:4 Naq nyfb sbe gur vaabprag oybbq gung ur furq:
sbe ur svyyrq Wrehfnyrz jvgu vaabprag oybbq; juvpu gur YBEQ jbhyq abg
cneqba.

24:5 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wrubvnxvz, naq nyy gung ur qvq, ner
gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu?
24:6 Fb Wrubvnxvz fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref: naq Wrubvnpuva uvf fba
ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

24:7 Naq gur xvat bs Rtlcg pnzr abg ntnva nal zber bhg bs uvf ynaq:
sbe gur xvat bs Onolyba unq gnxra sebz gur evire bs Rtlcg hagb gur
evire Rhcuengrf nyy gung cregnvarq gb gur xvat bs Rtlcg.

24:8 Wrubvnpuva jnf rvtugrra lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur
ervtarq va Wrehfnyrz guerr zbaguf. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf Aruhfugn,
gur qnhtugre bs Ryanguna bs Wrehfnyrz.

24:9 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung uvf sngure unq qbar.

24:10 Ng gung gvzr gur freinagf bs Arohpunqarmmne xvat bs Onolyba pnzr
hc ntnvafg Wrehfnyrz, naq gur pvgl jnf orfvrtrq.

24:11 Naq Arohpunqarmmne xvat bs Onolyba pnzr ntnvafg gur pvgl, naq
uvf freinagf qvq orfvrtr vg.

24:12 Naq Wrubvnpuva gur xvat bs Whqnu jrag bhg gb gur xvat bs
Onolyba, ur, naq uvf zbgure, naq uvf freinagf, naq uvf cevaprf, naq
uvf bssvpref: naq gur xvat bs Onolyba gbbx uvz va gur rvtugu lrne bs
uvf ervta.

24:13 Naq ur pneevrq bhg gurapr nyy gur gernfherf bs gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ, naq gur gernfherf bs gur xvat'f ubhfr, naq phg va cvrprf nyy gur
irffryf bs tbyq juvpu Fbybzba xvat bs Vfenry unq znqr va gur grzcyr bs
gur YBEQ, nf gur YBEQ unq fnvq.

24:14 Naq ur pneevrq njnl nyy Wrehfnyrz, naq nyy gur cevaprf, naq nyy
gur zvtugl zra bs inybhe, rira gra gubhfnaq pncgvirf, naq nyy gur
pensgfzra naq fzvguf: abar erznvarq, fnir gur cbberfg fbeg bs gur
crbcyr bs gur ynaq.

24:15 Naq ur pneevrq njnl Wrubvnpuva gb Onolyba, naq gur xvat'f
zbgure, naq gur xvat'f jvirf, naq uvf bssvpref, naq gur zvtugl bs gur
ynaq, gubfr pneevrq ur vagb pncgvivgl sebz Wrehfnyrz gb Onolyba.

24:16 Naq nyy gur zra bs zvtug, rira frira gubhfnaq, naq pensgfzra naq
fzvguf n gubhfnaq, nyy gung jrer fgebat naq ncg sbe jne, rira gurz gur
xvat bs Onolyba oebhtug pncgvir gb Onolyba.

24:17 Naq gur xvat bs Onolyba znqr Znggnavnu uvf sngure'f oebgure xvat
va uvf fgrnq, naq punatrq uvf anzr gb Mrqrxvnu.

24:18 Mrqrxvnu jnf gjragl naq bar lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta,
naq ur ervtarq ryrira lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf
Unzhgny, gur qnhtugre bs Wrerzvnu bs Yvoanu.

24:19 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung Wrubvnxvz unq qbar.

24:20 Sbe guebhtu gur natre bs gur YBEQ vg pnzr gb cnff va Wrehfnyrz
naq Whqnu, hagvy ur unq pnfg gurz bhg sebz uvf cerfrapr, gung Mrqrxvnu
eroryyrq ntnvafg gur xvat bs Onolyba.

25:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur avagu lrne bs uvf ervta, va gur gragu
zbagu, va gur gragu qnl bs gur zbagu, gung Arohpunqarmmne xvat bs
Onolyba pnzr, ur, naq nyy uvf ubfg, ntnvafg Wrehfnyrz, naq cvgpurq
ntnvafg vg; naq gurl ohvyg sbegf ntnvafg vg ebhaq nobhg.

25:2 Naq gur pvgl jnf orfvrtrq hagb gur ryriragu lrne bs xvat
Mrqrxvnu.

25:3 Naq ba gur avagu qnl bs gur sbhegu zbagu gur snzvar cerinvyrq va
gur pvgl, naq gurer jnf ab oernq sbe gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq.

25:4 Naq gur pvgl jnf oebxra hc, naq nyy gur zra bs jne syrq ol avtug
ol gur jnl bs gur tngr orgjrra gjb jnyyf, juvpu vf ol gur xvat'f
tneqra: (abj gur Punyqrrf jrer ntnvafg gur pvgl ebhaq nobhg:) naq gur
xvat jrag gur jnl gbjneq gur cynva.

25:5 Naq gur nezl bs gur Punyqrrf chefhrq nsgre gur xvat, naq biregbbx
uvz va gur cynvaf bs Wrevpub: naq nyy uvf nezl jrer fpnggrerq sebz
uvz.

25:6 Fb gurl gbbx gur xvat, naq oebhtug uvz hc gb gur xvat bs Onolyba
gb Evoynu; naq gurl tnir whqtzrag hcba uvz.

25:7 Naq gurl fyrj gur fbaf bs Mrqrxvnu orsber uvf rlrf, naq chg bhg
gur rlrf bs Mrqrxvnu, naq obhaq uvz jvgu srggref bs oenff, naq pneevrq
uvz gb Onolyba.

25:8 Naq va gur svsgu zbagu, ba gur friragu qnl bs gur zbagu, juvpu vf
gur avargrragu lrne bs xvat Arohpunqarmmne xvat bs Onolyba, pnzr
Arohmnenqna, pncgnva bs gur thneq, n freinag bs gur xvat bs Onolyba,
hagb Wrehfnyrz: 25:9 Naq ur oheag gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq gur
xvat'f ubhfr, naq nyy gur ubhfrf bs Wrehfnyrz, naq rirel terng zna'f
ubhfr oheag ur jvgu sver.

25:10 Naq nyy gur nezl bs gur Punyqrrf, gung jrer jvgu gur pncgnva bs
gur thneq, oenxr qbja gur jnyyf bs Wrehfnyrz ebhaq nobhg.

25:11 Abj gur erfg bs gur crbcyr gung jrer yrsg va gur pvgl, naq gur
shtvgvirf gung sryy njnl gb gur xvat bs Onolyba, jvgu gur erzanag bs
gur zhygvghqr, qvq Arohmnenqna gur pncgnva bs gur thneq pneel njnl.

25:12 Ohg gur pncgnva bs gur thneq yrsg bs gur qbbe bs gur cbbe bs gur
ynaq gb or ivarqerffref naq uhfonaqzra.

25:13 Naq gur cvyynef bs oenff gung jrer va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq
gur onfrf, naq gur oenfra frn gung jnf va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, qvq
gur Punyqrrf oernx va cvrprf, naq pneevrq gur oenff bs gurz gb
Onolyba.

25:14 Naq gur cbgf, naq gur fubiryf, naq gur fahssref, naq gur fcbbaf,
naq nyy gur irffryf bs oenff jurerjvgu gurl zvavfgrerq, gbbx gurl
njnl.

25:15 Naq gur svercnaf, naq gur objyf, naq fhpu guvatf nf jrer bs
tbyq, va tbyq, naq bs fvyire, va fvyire, gur pncgnva bs gur thneq gbbx
njnl.

25:16 Gur gjb cvyynef, bar frn, naq gur onfrf juvpu Fbybzba unq znqr
sbe gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ; gur oenff bs nyy gurfr irffryf jnf jvgubhg
jrvtug.

25:17 Gur urvtug bs gur bar cvyyne jnf rvtugrra phovgf, naq gur
puncvgre hcba vg jnf oenff: naq gur urvtug bs gur puncvgre guerr
phovgf; naq gur jerngura jbex, naq cbzrtenangrf hcba gur puncvgre
ebhaq nobhg, nyy bs oenff: naq yvxr hagb gurfr unq gur frpbaq cvyyne
jvgu jerngura jbex.

25:18 Naq gur pncgnva bs gur thneq gbbx Frenvnu gur puvrs cevrfg, naq
Mrcunavnu gur frpbaq cevrfg, naq gur guerr xrrcref bs gur qbbe: 25:19
Naq bhg bs gur pvgl ur gbbx na bssvpre gung jnf frg bire gur zra bs
jne, naq svir zra bs gurz gung jrer va gur xvat'f cerfrapr, juvpu jrer
sbhaq va gur pvgl, naq gur cevapvcny fpevor bs gur ubfg, juvpu
zhfgrerq gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq, naq guerrfpber zra bs gur crbcyr bs
gur ynaq gung jrer sbhaq va gur pvgl: 25:20 Naq Arohmnenqna pncgnva bs
gur thneq gbbx gurfr, naq oebhtug gurz gb gur xvat bs Onolyba gb
Evoynu: 25:21 Naq gur xvat bs Onolyba fzbgr gurz, naq fyrj gurz ng
Evoynu va gur ynaq bs Unzngu. Fb Whqnu jnf pneevrq njnl bhg bs gurve
ynaq.

25:22 Naq nf sbe gur crbcyr gung erznvarq va gur ynaq bs Whqnu, jubz
Arohpunqarmmne xvat bs Onolyba unq yrsg, rira bire gurz ur znqr
Trqnyvnu gur fba bs Nuvxnz, gur fba bs Funcuna, ehyre.

25:23 Naq jura nyy gur pncgnvaf bs gur nezvrf, gurl naq gurve zra,
urneq gung gur xvat bs Onolyba unq znqr Trqnyvnu tbireabe, gurer pnzr
gb Trqnyvnu gb Zvmcnu, rira Vfuznry gur fba bs Argunavnu, naq Wbunana
gur fba bs Pnernu, naq Frenvnu gur fba bs Gnauhzrgu gur Argbcunguvgr,
naq Wnnmnavnu gur fba bs n Znnpunguvgr, gurl naq gurve zra.

25:24 Naq Trqnyvnu fjner gb gurz, naq gb gurve zra, naq fnvq hagb
gurz, Srne abg gb or gur freinagf bs gur Punyqrrf: qjryy va gur ynaq,
naq freir gur xvat bs Onolyba; naq vg funyy or jryy jvgu lbh.

25:25 Ohg vg pnzr gb cnff va gur friragu zbagu, gung Vfuznry gur fba
bs Argunavnu, gur fba bs Ryvfunzn, bs gur frrq eblny, pnzr, naq gra
zra jvgu uvz, naq fzbgr Trqnyvnu, gung ur qvrq, naq gur Wrjf naq gur
Punyqrrf gung jrer jvgu uvz ng Zvmcnu.

25:26 Naq nyy gur crbcyr, obgu fznyy naq terng, naq gur pncgnvaf bs
gur nezvrf, nebfr, naq pnzr gb Rtlcg: sbe gurl jrer nsenvq bs gur
Punyqrrf.

25:27 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur frira naq guvegvrgu lrne bs gur
pncgvivgl bs Wrubvnpuva xvat bs Whqnu, va gur gjrysgu zbagu, ba gur
frira naq gjragvrgu qnl bs gur zbagu, gung Rivyzrebqnpu xvat bs
Onolyba va gur lrne gung ur ortna gb ervta qvq yvsg hc gur urnq bs
Wrubvnpuva xvat bs Whqnu bhg bs cevfba; 25:28 Naq ur fcnxr xvaqyl gb
uvz, naq frg uvf guebar nobir gur guebar bs gur xvatf gung jrer jvgu
uvz va Onolyba; 25:29 Naq punatrq uvf cevfba tnezragf: naq ur qvq rng
oernq pbagvahnyyl orsber uvz nyy gur qnlf bs uvf yvsr.

25:30 Naq uvf nyybjnapr jnf n pbagvahny nyybjnapr tvira uvz bs gur
xvat, n qnvyl engr sbe rirel qnl, nyy gur qnlf bs uvf yvsr.




Gur Svefg Obbx bs gur Puebavpyrf


1:1 Nqnz, Furgu, Rabfu, 1:2 Xrana, Znunynyrry, Wrerq, 1:3 Urabpu,
Zrguhfrynu, Ynzrpu, 1:4 Abnu, Furz, Unz, naq Wncurgu.

1:5 Gur fbaf bs Wncurgu; Tbzre, naq Zntbt, naq Znqnv, naq Wnina, naq
Ghony, naq Zrfurpu, naq Gvenf.

1:6 Naq gur fbaf bs Tbzre; Nfupuranm, naq Evcungu, naq Gbtneznu.

1:7 Naq gur fbaf bs Wnina; Ryvfunu, naq Gnefuvfu, Xvggvz, naq Qbqnavz.

1:8 Gur fbaf bs Unz; Phfu, naq Zvmenvz, Chg, naq Pnanna.

1:9 Naq gur fbaf bs Phfu; Fron, naq Univynu, naq Fnogn, naq Ennznu,
naq Fnogrpun. Naq gur fbaf bs Ennznu; Furon, naq Qrqna.

1:10 Naq Phfu ortng Avzebq: ur ortna gb or zvtugl hcba gur rnegu.

1:11 Naq Zvmenvz ortng Yhqvz, naq Nanzvz, naq Yrunovz, naq Ancughuvz,
1:12 Naq Cnguehfvz, naq Pnfyhuvz, (bs jubz pnzr gur Cuvyvfgvarf,) naq
Pncugubevz.

1:13 Naq Pnanna ortng Mvqba uvf svefgobea, naq Urgu, 1:14 Gur Wrohfvgr
nyfb, naq gur Nzbevgr, naq gur Tvetnfuvgr, 1:15 Naq gur Uvivgr, naq
gur Nexvgr, naq gur Fvavgr, 1:16 Naq gur Neinqvgr, naq gur Mrznevgr,
naq gur Unznguvgr.

1:17 Gur fbaf bs Furz; Rynz, naq Nffuhe, naq Necunknq, naq Yhq, naq
Nenz, naq Hm, naq Uhy, naq Trgure, naq Zrfurpu.

1:18 Naq Necunknq ortng Furynu, naq Furynu ortng Rore.

1:19 Naq hagb Rore jrer obea gjb fbaf: gur anzr bs gur bar jnf Cryrt;
orpnhfr va uvf qnlf gur rnegu jnf qvivqrq: naq uvf oebgure'f anzr jnf
Wbxgna.

1:20 Naq Wbxgna ortng Nyzbqnq, naq Furyrcu, naq Unmneznirgu, naq
Wrenu, 1:21 Unqbenz nyfb, naq Hmny, naq Qvxynu, 1:22 Naq Rony, naq
Novznry, naq Furon, 1:23 Naq Bcuve, naq Univynu, naq Wbono. Nyy gurfr
jrer gur fbaf bs Wbxgna.

1:24 Furz, Necunknq, Furynu, 1:25 Rore, Cryrt, Erh, 1:26 Freht, Anube,
Grenu, 1:27 Noenz; gur fnzr vf Noenunz.

1:28 Gur fbaf bs Noenunz; Vfnnp, naq Vfuznry.

1:29 Gurfr ner gurve trarengvbaf: Gur svefgobea bs Vfuznry, Aronvbgu;
gura Xrqne, naq Nqorry, naq Zvofnz, 1:30 Zvfuzn, naq Qhznu, Znffn,
Unqnq, naq Grzn, 1:31 Wrghe, Ancuvfu, naq Xrqrznu. Gurfr ner gur fbaf
bs Vfuznry.

1:32 Abj gur fbaf bs Xrghenu, Noenunz'f pbaphovar: fur oner Mvzena,
naq Wbxfuna, naq Zrqna, naq Zvqvna, naq Vfuonx, naq Fuhnu. Naq gur
fbaf bs Wbxfuna; Furon, naq Qrqna.

1:33 Naq gur fbaf bs Zvqvna; Rcunu, naq Rcure, naq Urabpu, naq Novqn,
naq Ryqnnu. Nyy gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Xrghenu.

1:34 Naq Noenunz ortng Vfnnp. Gur fbaf bs Vfnnp; Rfnh naq Vfenry.

1:35 Gur fbaf bs Rfnh; Ryvcunm, Erhry, naq Wrhfu, naq Wnnynz, naq
Xbenu.

1:36 Gur fbaf bs Ryvcunm; Grzna, naq Bzne, Mrcuv, naq Tngnz, Xranm,
naq Gvzan, naq Nznyrx.

1:37 Gur fbaf bs Erhry; Anungu, Mrenu, Funzznu, naq Zvmmnu.

1:38 Naq gur fbaf bs Frve; Ybgna, naq Fubony, naq Mvorba, naq Nanu,
naq Qvfuba, naq Rmne, naq Qvfuna.

1:39 Naq gur fbaf bs Ybgna; Ubev, naq Ubznz: naq Gvzan jnf Ybgna'f
fvfgre.

1:40 Gur fbaf bs Fubony; Nyvna, naq Znanungu, naq Rony, Furcuv, naq
Banz.

naq gur fbaf bs Mvorba; Nvnu, naq Nanu.

1:41 Gur fbaf bs Nanu; Qvfuba. Naq gur fbaf bs Qvfuba; Nzenz, naq
Rfuona, naq Vguena, naq Purena.

1:42 Gur fbaf bs Rmre; Ovyuna, naq Mnina, naq Wnxna. Gur fbaf bs
Qvfuna; Hm, naq Nena.

1:43 Abj gurfr ner gur xvatf gung ervtarq va gur ynaq bs Rqbz orsber
nal xvat ervtarq bire gur puvyqera bs Vfenry; Oryn gur fba bs Orbe:
naq gur anzr bs uvf pvgl jnf Qvaunonu.

1:44 Naq jura Oryn jnf qrnq, Wbono gur fba bs Mrenu bs Obmenu ervtarq
va uvf fgrnq.

1:45 Naq jura Wbono jnf qrnq, Uhfunz bs gur ynaq bs gur Grznavgrf
ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

1:46 Naq jura Uhfunz jnf qrnq, Unqnq gur fba bs Orqnq, juvpu fzbgr
Zvqvna va gur svryq bs Zbno, ervtarq va uvf fgrnq: naq gur anzr bs uvf
pvgl jnf Nivgu.

1:47 Naq jura Unqnq jnf qrnq, Fnzynu bs Znferxnu ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

1:48 Naq jura Fnzynu jnf qrnq, Funhy bs Erubobgu ol gur evire ervtarq
va uvf fgrnq.

1:49 Naq jura Funhy jnf qrnq, Onnyunana gur fba bs Npuobe ervtarq va
uvf fgrnq.

1:50 Naq jura Onnyunana jnf qrnq, Unqnq ervtarq va uvf fgrnq: naq gur
anzr bs uvf pvgl jnf Cnv; naq uvf jvsr'f anzr jnf Zrurgnory, gur
qnhtugre bs Zngerq, gur qnhtugre bs Zrmnuno.

1:51 Unqnq qvrq nyfb. Naq gur qhxrf bs Rqbz jrer; qhxr Gvzanu, qhxr
Nyvnu, qhxr Wrgurgu, 1:52 Qhxr Nubyvonznu, qhxr Rynu, qhxr Cvaba, 1:53
Qhxr Xranm, qhxr Grzna, qhxr Zvomne, 1:54 Qhxr Zntqvry, qhxr Venz.
Gurfr ner gur qhxrf bs Rqbz.

2:1 Gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Vfenry; Erhora, Fvzrba, Yriv, naq Whqnu,
Vffnpune, naq Mrohyha, 2:2 Qna, Wbfrcu, naq Orawnzva, Ancugnyv, Tnq,
naq Nfure.

2:3 Gur fbaf bs Whqnu; Re, naq Bana, naq Furynu: juvpu guerr jrer obea
hagb uvz bs gur qnhtugre bs Fuhn gur Pnannavgrff. Naq Re, gur
svefgobea bs Whqnu, jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ; naq ur fyrj
uvz.

2:4 Naq Gnzne uvf qnhtugre va ynj ober uvz Cunerm naq Mrenu. Nyy gur
fbaf bs Whqnu jrer svir.

2:5 Gur fbaf bs Cunerm; Urmeba, naq Unzhy.

2:6 Naq gur fbaf bs Mrenu; Mvzev, naq Rguna, naq Urzna, naq Pnypby,
naq Qnen: svir bs gurz va nyy.

2:7 Naq gur fbaf bs Pnezv; Npune, gur gebhoyre bs Vfenry, jub
genafterffrq va gur guvat npphefrq.

2:8 Naq gur fbaf bs Rguna; Nmnevnu.

2:9 Gur fbaf nyfb bs Urmeba, gung jrer obea hagb uvz; Wrenuzrry, naq
Enz, naq Puryhonv.

2:10 Naq Enz ortng Nzzvanqno; naq Nzzvanqno ortng Anufuba, cevapr bs
gur puvyqera bs Whqnu; 2:11 Naq Anufuba ortng Fnyzn, naq Fnyzn ortng
Obnm, 2:12 Naq Obnm ortng Borq, naq Borq ortng Wrffr, 2:13 Naq Wrffr
ortng uvf svefgobea Ryvno, naq Novanqno gur frpbaq, naq Fuvzzn gur
guveq, 2:14 Argunarry gur sbhegu, Enqqnv gur svsgu, 2:15 Bmrz gur
fvkgu, Qnivq gur friragu: 2:16 Jubfr fvfgref jrer Mrehvnu, naq
Novtnvy. Naq gur fbaf bs Mrehvnu; Novfunv, naq Wbno, naq Nfnury,
guerr.

2:17 Naq Novtnvy oner Nznfn: naq gur sngure bs Nznfn jnf Wrgure gur
Vfuzrryvgr.

2:18 Naq Pnyro gur fba bs Urmeba ortng puvyqera bs Nmhonu uvf jvsr,
naq bs Wrevbgu: ure fbaf ner gurfr; Wrfure, naq Fubono, naq Neqba.

2:19 Naq jura Nmhonu jnf qrnq, Pnyro gbbx hagb uvz Rcuengu, juvpu oner
uvz Uhe.

2:20 Naq Uhe ortng Hev, naq Hev ortng Ormnyrry.

2:21 Naq nsgrejneq Urmeba jrag va gb gur qnhtugre bs Znpuve gur sngure
bs Tvyrnq, jubz ur zneevrq jura ur jnf guerrfpber lrnef byq; naq fur
oner uvz Frtho.

2:22 Naq Frtho ortng Wnve, jub unq guerr naq gjragl pvgvrf va gur ynaq
bs Tvyrnq.

2:23 Naq ur gbbx Trfuhe, naq Nenz, jvgu gur gbjaf bs Wnve, sebz gurz,
jvgu Xrangu, naq gur gbjaf gurerbs, rira guerrfpber pvgvrf. Nyy gurfr
orybatrq gb gur fbaf bs Znpuve gur sngure bs Tvyrnq.

2:24 Naq nsgre gung Urmeba jnf qrnq va Pnyrorcuengnu, gura Novnu
Urmeba'f jvsr oner uvz Nfuhe gur sngure bs Grxbn.

2:25 Naq gur fbaf bs Wrenuzrry gur svefgobea bs Urmeba jrer, Enz gur
svefgobea, naq Ohanu, naq Bera, naq Bmrz, naq Nuvwnu.

2:26 Wrenuzrry unq nyfb nabgure jvsr, jubfr anzr jnf Ngnenu; fur jnf
gur zbgure bs Banz.

2:27 Naq gur fbaf bs Enz gur svefgobea bs Wrenuzrry jrer, Znnm, naq
Wnzva, naq Rxre.

2:28 Naq gur fbaf bs Banz jrer, Funzznv, naq Wnqn. Naq gur fbaf bs
Funzznv; Anqno naq Novfuhe.

2:29 Naq gur anzr bs gur jvsr bs Novfuhe jnf Novunvy, naq fur oner uvz
Nuona, naq Zbyvq.

2:30 Naq gur fbaf bs Anqno; Fryrq, naq Nccnvz: ohg Fryrq qvrq jvgubhg
puvyqera.

2:31 Naq gur fbaf bs Nccnvz; Vfuv. Naq gur fbaf bs Vfuv; Furfuna. Naq
gur puvyqera bs Furfuna; Nuynv.

2:32 Naq gur fbaf bs Wnqn gur oebgure bs Funzznv; Wrgure, naq
Wbanguna: naq Wrgure qvrq jvgubhg puvyqera.

2:33 Naq gur fbaf bs Wbanguna; Cryrgu, naq Mnmn. Gurfr jrer gur fbaf
bs Wrenuzrry.

2:34 Abj Furfuna unq ab fbaf, ohg qnhtugref. Naq Furfuna unq n
freinag, na Rtlcgvna, jubfr anzr jnf Wneun.

2:35 Naq Furfuna tnir uvf qnhtugre gb Wneun uvf freinag gb jvsr; naq
fur oner uvz Nggnv.

2:36 Naq Nggnv ortng Anguna, naq Anguna ortng Mnonq, 2:37 Naq Mnonq
ortng Rcuyny, naq Rcuyny ortng Borq, 2:38 Naq Borq ortng Wruh, naq
Wruh ortng Nmnevnu, 2:39 Naq Nmnevnu ortng Uryrm, naq Uryrm ortng
Ryrnfnu, 2:40 Naq Ryrnfnu ortng Fvfnznv, naq Fvfnznv ortng Funyyhz,
2:41 Naq Funyyhz ortng Wrxnzvnu, naq Wrxnzvnu ortng Ryvfunzn.

2:42 Abj gur fbaf bs Pnyro gur oebgure bs Wrenuzrry jrer, Zrfun uvf
svefgobea, juvpu jnf gur sngure bs Mvcu; naq gur fbaf bs Znerfunu gur
sngure bs Uroeba.

2:43 Naq gur fbaf bs Uroeba; Xbenu, naq Gncchnu, naq Erxrz, naq Furzn.

2:44 Naq Furzn ortng Enunz, gur sngure bs Wbexbnz: naq Erxrz ortng
Funzznv.

2:45 Naq gur fba bs Funzznv jnf Znba: naq Znba jnf gur sngure bs
Orgumhe.

2:46 Naq Rcunu, Pnyro'f pbaphovar, oner Unena, naq Zbmn, naq Tnmrm:
naq Unena ortng Tnmrm.

2:47 Naq gur fbaf bs Wnuqnv; Ertrz, naq Wbgunz, naq Trfunz, naq Cryrg,
naq Rcunu, naq Funncu.

2:48 Znnpunu, Pnyro'f pbaphovar, oner Furore, naq Gveunanu.

2:49 Fur oner nyfb Funncu gur sngure bs Znqznaanu, Furin gur sngure bs
Znpuoranu, naq gur sngure bs Tvorn: naq gur qnhtugre bs Pnyro jnf
Npufn.

2:50 Gurfr jrer gur fbaf bs Pnyro gur fba bs Uhe, gur svefgobea bs
Rcuengnu; Fubony gur sngure bs Xvewnguwrnevz.

2:51 Fnyzn gur sngure bs Orguyrurz, Unercu gur sngure bs Orgutnqre.

2:52 Naq Fubony gur sngure bs Xvewnguwrnevz unq fbaf; Unebru, naq unys
bs gur Znanurguvgrf.

2:53 Naq gur snzvyvrf bs Xvewnguwrnevz; gur Vguevgrf, naq gur Chuvgrf,
naq gur Fuhznguvgrf, naq gur Zvfuenvgrf; bs gurz pnzr gur Mnernguvgrf,
naq gur Rfugnhyvgrf, 2:54 Gur fbaf bs Fnyzn; Orguyrurz, naq gur
Argbcunguvgrf, Ngnebgu, gur ubhfr bs Wbno, naq unys bs gur
Znanurguvgrf, gur Mbevgrf.

2:55 Naq gur snzvyvrf bs gur fpevorf juvpu qjryg ng Wnorm; gur
Gvenguvgrf, gur Fuvzrnguvgrf, naq Fhpunguvgrf. Gurfr ner gur Xravgrf
gung pnzr bs Urzngu, gur sngure bs gur ubhfr bs Erpuno.

3:1 Abj gurfr jrer gur fbaf bs Qnivq, juvpu jrer obea hagb uvz va
Uroeba; gur svefgobea Nzaba, bs Nuvabnz gur Wrmerryvgrff; gur frpbaq
Qnavry, bs Novtnvy gur Pnezryvgrff: 3:2 Gur guveq, Nofnybz gur fba bs
Znnpunu gur qnhtugre bs Gnyznv xvat bs Trfuhe: gur sbhegu, Nqbavwnu
gur fba bs Unttvgu: 3:3 Gur svsgu, Furcungvnu bs Novgny: gur fvkgu,
Vguernz ol Rtynu uvf jvsr.

3:4 Gurfr fvk jrer obea hagb uvz va Uroeba; naq gurer ur ervtarq frira
lrnef naq fvk zbaguf: naq va Wrehfnyrz ur ervtarq guvegl naq guerr
lrnef.

3:5 Naq gurfr jrer obea hagb uvz va Wrehfnyrz; Fuvzrn, naq Fubono, naq
Anguna, naq Fbybzba, sbhe, bs Ongufuhn gur qnhtugre bs Nzzvry: 3:6
Voune nyfb, naq Ryvfunzn, naq Ryvcuryrg, 3:7 Naq Abtnu, naq Arcurt,
naq Wncuvn, 3:8 Naq Ryvfunzn, naq Ryvnqn, naq Ryvcuryrg, avar.

3:9 Gurfr jrer nyy gur fbaf bs Qnivq, orfvqr gur fbaf bs gur
pbaphovarf, naq Gnzne gurve fvfgre.

3:10 Naq Fbybzba'f fba jnf Erubobnz, Novn uvf fba, Nfn uvf fba,
Wrubfuncung uvf fba, 3:11 Wbenz uvf fba, Nunmvnu uvf fba, Wbnfu uvf
fba, 3:12 Nznmvnu uvf fba, Nmnevnu uvf fba, Wbgunz uvf fba, 3:13 Nunm
uvf fba, Urmrxvnu uvf fba, Znanffru uvf fba, 3:14 Nzba uvf fba, Wbfvnu
uvf fba.

3:15 Naq gur fbaf bs Wbfvnu jrer, gur svefgobea Wbunana, gur frpbaq
Wrubvnxvz, gur guveq Mrqrxvnu, gur sbhegu Funyyhz.

3:16 Naq gur fbaf bs Wrubvnxvz: Wrpbavnu uvf fba, Mrqrxvnu uvf fba.

3:17 Naq gur fbaf bs Wrpbavnu; Nffve, Fnynguvry uvf fba, 3:18
Znypuvenz nyfb, naq Crqnvnu, naq Furanmne, Wrpnzvnu, Ubfunzn, naq
Arqnovnu.

3:19 Naq gur fbaf bs Crqnvnu jrer, Mrehoonory, naq Fuvzrv: naq gur
fbaf bs Mrehoonory; Zrfuhyynz, naq Unanavnu, naq Furybzvgu gurve
fvfgre: 3:20 Naq Unfuhonu, naq Bury, naq Orerpuvnu, naq Unfnqvnu,
Whfunourfrq, svir.

3:21 Naq gur fbaf bs Unanavnu; Cryngvnu, naq Wrfnvnu: gur fbaf bs
Ercunvnu, gur fbaf bs Neana, gur fbaf bs Bonqvnu, gur fbaf bs
Furpunavnu.

3:22 Naq gur fbaf bs Furpunavnu; Furznvnu: naq gur fbaf bs Furznvnu;
Ungghfu, naq Vtrny, naq Onevnu, naq Arnevnu, naq Funcung, fvk.

3:23 Naq gur fbaf bs Arnevnu; Ryvbranv, naq Urmrxvnu, naq Nmevxnz,
guerr.

3:24 Naq gur fbaf bs Ryvbranv jrer, Ubqnvnu, naq Ryvnfuvo, naq
Crynvnu, naq Nxxho, naq Wbunana, naq Qnynvnu, naq Nanav, frira.

4:1 Gur fbaf bs Whqnu; Cunerm, Urmeba, naq Pnezv, naq Uhe, naq Fubony.

4:2 Naq Ernvnu gur fba bs Fubony ortng Wnungu; naq Wnungu ortng
Nuhznv, naq Ynunq. Gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf bs gur Mbenguvgrf.

4:3 Naq gurfr jrer bs gur sngure bs Rgnz; Wrmerry, naq Vfuzn, naq
Vqonfu: naq gur anzr bs gurve fvfgre jnf Unmryrycbav: 4:4 Naq Crahry
gur sngure bs Trqbe, naq Rmre gur sngure bs Uhfunu. Gurfr ner gur fbaf
bs Uhe, gur svefgobea bs Rcuengnu, gur sngure bs Orguyrurz.

4:5 Naq Nfuhe gur sngure bs Grxbn unq gjb jvirf, Urynu naq Annenu.

4:6 Naq Annenu oner uvz Nuhmnz, naq Urcure, naq Grzrav, naq
Unnunfugnev.

Gurfr jrer gur fbaf bs Annenu.

4:7 Naq gur fbaf bs Urynu jrer, Mrergu, naq Wrmbne, naq Rguana.

4:8 Naq Pbm ortng Naho, naq Mboronu, naq gur snzvyvrf bs Nuneury gur
fba bs Unehz.

4:9 Naq Wnorm jnf zber ubabhenoyr guna uvf oerguera: naq uvf zbgure
pnyyrq uvf anzr Wnorm, fnlvat, Orpnhfr V oner uvz jvgu fbeebj.

4:10 Naq Wnorm pnyyrq ba gur Tbq bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Bu gung gubh
jbhyqrfg oyrff zr vaqrrq, naq raynetr zl pbnfg, naq gung guvar unaq
zvtug or jvgu zr, naq gung gubh jbhyqrfg xrrc zr sebz rivy, gung vg
znl abg tevrir zr! Naq Tbq tenagrq uvz gung juvpu ur erdhrfgrq.

4:11 Naq Puryho gur oebgure bs Fuhnu ortng Zruve, juvpu jnf gur sngure
bs Rfugba.

4:12 Naq Rfugba ortng Orguencun, naq Cnfrnu, naq Gruvaanu gur sngure
bs Veanunfu. Gurfr ner gur zra bs Erpunu.

4:13 Naq gur fbaf bs Xranm; Bguavry, naq Frenvnu: naq gur fbaf bs
Bguavry; Ungungu.

4:14 Naq Zrbabgunv ortng Bcuenu: naq Frenvnu ortng Wbno, gur sngure bs
gur inyyrl bs Punenfuvz; sbe gurl jrer pensgfzra.

4:15 Naq gur fbaf bs Pnyro gur fba bs Wrcuhaaru; Veh, Rynu, naq Annz:
naq gur fbaf bs Rynu, rira Xranm.

4:16 Naq gur fbaf bs Wrunyryrry; Mvcu, naq Mvcunu, Gvevn, naq Nfnerry.

4:17 Naq gur fbaf bs Rmen jrer, Wrgure, naq Zrerq, naq Rcure, naq
Wnyba: naq fur oner Zvevnz, naq Funzznv, naq Vfuonu gur sngure bs
Rfugrzbn.

4:18 Naq uvf jvsr Wruhqvwnu oner Wrerq gur sngure bs Trqbe, naq Urore
gur sngure bs Fbpub, naq Wrxhguvry gur sngure bs Mnabnu. Naq gurfr ner
gur fbaf bs Ovguvnu gur qnhtugre bs Cunenbu, juvpu Zrerq gbbx.

4:19 Naq gur fbaf bs uvf jvsr Ubqvnu gur fvfgre bs Anunz, gur sngure
bs Xrvynu gur Tnezvgr, naq Rfugrzbn gur Znnpunguvgr.

4:20 Naq gur fbaf bs Fuvzba jrer, Nzaba, naq Evaanu, Oraunana, naq
Gvyba.

Naq gur fbaf bs Vfuv jrer, Mburgu, naq Oramburgu.

4:21 Gur fbaf bs Furynu gur fba bs Whqnu jrer, Re gur sngure bs Yrpnu,
naq Ynnqnu gur sngure bs Znerfunu, naq gur snzvyvrf bs gur ubhfr bs
gurz gung jebhtug svar yvara, bs gur ubhfr bs Nfuorn, 4:22 Naq Wbxvz,
naq gur zra bs Pubmron, naq Wbnfu, naq Fnencu, jub unq gur qbzvavba va
Zbno, naq Wnfuhovyrurz. Naq gurfr ner napvrag guvatf.

4:23 Gurfr jrer gur cbggref, naq gubfr gung qjryg nzbat cynagf naq
urqtrf: gurer gurl qjryg jvgu gur xvat sbe uvf jbex.

4:24 Gur fbaf bs Fvzrba jrer, Arzhry, naq Wnzva, Wnevo, Mrenu, naq
Funhy: 4:25 Funyyhz uvf fba, Zvofnz uvf fba, Zvfuzn uvf fba.

4:26 Naq gur fbaf bs Zvfuzn; Unzhry uvf fba, Mnppuhe uvf fba, Fuvzrv
uvf fba.

4:27 Naq Fuvzrv unq fvkgrra fbaf naq fvk qnhtugref: ohg uvf oerguera
unq abg znal puvyqera, arvgure qvq nyy gurve snzvyl zhygvcyl, yvxr gb
gur puvyqera bs Whqnu.

4:28 Naq gurl qjryg ng Orrefuron, naq Zbynqnu, naq Unmnefuhny, 4:29
Naq ng Ovyunu, naq ng Rmrz, naq ng Gbynq, 4:30 Naq ng Orguhry, naq ng
Ubeznu, naq ng Mvxynt, 4:31 Naq ng Orguznepnobgu, naq Unmnefhfvz, naq
ng Orguoverv, naq ng Funnenvz. Gurfr jrer gurve pvgvrf hagb gur ervta
bs Qnivq.

4:32 Naq gurve ivyyntrf jrer, Rgnz, naq Nva, Evzzba, naq Gbpura, naq
Nfuna, svir pvgvrf: 4:33 Naq nyy gurve ivyyntrf gung jrer ebhaq nobhg
gur fnzr pvgvrf, hagb Onny. Gurfr jrer gurve unovgngvbaf, naq gurve
trarnybtl.

4:34 Naq Zrfubono, naq Wnzyrpu, naq Wbfunu, gur fba bs Nznmvnu, 4:35
Naq Wbry, naq Wruh gur fba bs Wbfvovnu, gur fba bs Frenvnu, gur fba bs
Nfvry, 4:36 Naq Ryvbranv, naq Wnnxbonu, naq Wrfubunvnu, naq Nfnvnu,
naq Nqvry, naq Wrfvzvry, naq Oranvnu, 4:37 Naq Mvmn gur fba bs Fuvcuv,
gur fba bs Nyyba, gur fba bs Wrqnvnu, gur fba bs Fuvzev, gur fba bs
Furznvnu; 4:38 Gurfr zragvbarq ol gurve anzrf jrer cevaprf va gurve
snzvyvrf: naq gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref vapernfrq terngyl.

4:39 Naq gurl jrag gb gur ragenapr bs Trqbe, rira hagb gur rnfg fvqr
bs gur inyyrl, gb frrx cnfgher sbe gurve sybpxf.

4:40 Naq gurl sbhaq sng cnfgher naq tbbq, naq gur ynaq jnf jvqr, naq
dhvrg, naq crnprnoyr; sbe gurl bs Unz unq qjryg gurer bs byq.

4:41 Naq gurfr jevggra ol anzr pnzr va gur qnlf bs Urmrxvnu xvat bs
Whqnu, naq fzbgr gurve gragf, naq gur unovgngvbaf gung jrer sbhaq
gurer, naq qrfgeblrq gurz hggreyl hagb guvf qnl, naq qjryg va gurve
ebbzf: orpnhfr gurer jnf cnfgher gurer sbe gurve sybpxf.

4:42 Naq fbzr bs gurz, rira bs gur fbaf bs Fvzrba, svir uhaqerq zra,
jrag gb zbhag Frve, univat sbe gurve pncgnvaf Cryngvnu, naq Arnevnu,
naq Ercunvnu, naq Hmmvry, gur fbaf bs Vfuv.

4:43 Naq gurl fzbgr gur erfg bs gur Nznyrxvgrf gung jrer rfpncrq, naq
qjryg gurer hagb guvf qnl.

5:1 Abj gur fbaf bs Erhora gur svefgobea bs Vfenry, (sbe ur jnf gur
svefgobea; ohg sbenfzhpu nf ur qrsvyrq uvf sngure'f orq, uvf
oveguevtug jnf tvira hagb gur fbaf bs Wbfrcu gur fba bs Vfenry: naq
gur trarnybtl vf abg gb or erpxbarq nsgre gur oveguevtug.

5:2 Sbe Whqnu cerinvyrq nobir uvf oerguera, naq bs uvz pnzr gur puvrs
ehyre; ohg gur oveguevtug jnf Wbfrcu'f:) 5:3 Gur fbaf, V fnl, bs
Erhora gur svefgobea bs Vfenry jrer, Unabpu, naq Cnyyh, Urmeba, naq
Pnezv.

5:4 Gur fbaf bs Wbry; Furznvnu uvf fba, Tbt uvf fba, Fuvzrv uvf fba,
5:5 Zvpnu uvf fba, Ernvn uvf fba, Onny uvf fba, 5:6 Orrenu uvf fba,
jubz Gvytngucvyarfre xvat bs Nfflevn pneevrq njnl pncgvir: ur jnf
cevapr bs gur Erhoravgrf.

5:7 Naq uvf oerguera ol gurve snzvyvrf, jura gur trarnybtl bs gurve
trarengvbaf jnf erpxbarq, jrer gur puvrs, Wrvry, naq Mrpunevnu, 5:8
Naq Oryn gur fba bs Nmnm, gur fba bs Furzn, gur fba bs Wbry, jub qjryg
va Nebre, rira hagb Arob naq Onnyzrba: 5:9 Naq rnfgjneq ur vaunovgrq
hagb gur ragrevat va bs gur jvyqrearff sebz gur evire Rhcuengrf:
orpnhfr gurve pnggyr jrer zhygvcyvrq va gur ynaq bs Tvyrnq.

5:10 Naq va gur qnlf bs Fnhy gurl znqr jne jvgu gur Untnevgrf, jub
sryy ol gurve unaq: naq gurl qjryg va gurve gragf guebhtubhg nyy gur
rnfg ynaq bs Tvyrnq.

5:11 Naq gur puvyqera bs Tnq qjryg bire ntnvafg gurz, va gur ynaq bs
Onfuna hagb Fnypnu: 5:12 Wbry gur puvrs, naq Funcunz gur arkg, naq
Wnnanv, naq Funcung va Onfuna.

5:13 Naq gurve oerguera bs gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref jrer, Zvpunry,
naq Zrfuhyynz, naq Furon, naq Wbenv, naq Wnpuna, naq Mvn, naq Urore,
frira.

5:14 Gurfr ner gur puvyqera bs Novunvy gur fba bs Uhev, gur fba bs
Wnebnu, gur fba bs Tvyrnq, gur fba bs Zvpunry, gur fba bs Wrfuvfunv,
gur fba bs Wnuqb, gur fba bs Ohm; 5:15 Nuv gur fba bs Noqvry, gur fba
bs Thav, puvrs bs gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref.

5:16 Naq gurl qjryg va Tvyrnq va Onfuna, naq va ure gbjaf, naq va nyy
gur fhoheof bs Funeba, hcba gurve obeqref.

5:17 Nyy gurfr jrer erpxbarq ol trarnybtvrf va gur qnlf bs Wbgunz xvat
bs Whqnu, naq va gur qnlf bs Wrebobnz xvat bs Vfenry.

5:18 Gur fbaf bs Erhora, naq gur Tnqvgrf, naq unys gur gevor bs
Znanffru, bs inyvnag zra, zra noyr gb orne ohpxyre naq fjbeq, naq gb
fubbg jvgu obj, naq fxvyshy va jne, jrer sbhe naq sbegl gubhfnaq frira
uhaqerq naq guerrfpber, gung jrag bhg gb gur jne.

5:19 Naq gurl znqr jne jvgu gur Untnevgrf, jvgu Wrghe, naq Arcuvfu,
naq Abqno.

5:20 Naq gurl jrer urycrq ntnvafg gurz, naq gur Untnevgrf jrer
qryvirerq vagb gurve unaq, naq nyy gung jrer jvgu gurz: sbe gurl pevrq
gb Tbq va gur onggyr, naq ur jnf vagerngrq bs gurz; orpnhfr gurl chg
gurve gehfg va uvz.

5:21 Naq gurl gbbx njnl gurve pnggyr; bs gurve pnzryf svsgl gubhfnaq,
naq bs furrc gjb uhaqerq naq svsgl gubhfnaq, naq bs nffrf gjb
gubhfnaq, naq bs zra na uhaqerq gubhfnaq.

5:22 Sbe gurer sryy qbja znal fynva, orpnhfr gur jne jnf bs Tbq. Naq
gurl qjryg va gurve fgrnqf hagvy gur pncgvivgl.

5:23 Naq gur puvyqera bs gur unys gevor bs Znanffru qjryg va gur ynaq:
gurl vapernfrq sebz Onfuna hagb Onnyurezba naq Frave, naq hagb zbhag
Urezba.

5:24 Naq gurfr jrer gur urnqf bs gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, rira
Rcure, naq Vfuv, naq Ryvry, naq Nmevry, naq Wrerzvnu, naq Ubqnivnu,
naq Wnuqvry, zvtugl zra bs inybhe, snzbhf zra, naq urnqf bs gur ubhfr
bs gurve snguref.

5:25 Naq gurl genafterffrq ntnvafg gur Tbq bs gurve snguref, naq jrag
n jubevat nsgre gur tbqf bs gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq, jubz Tbq qrfgeblrq
orsber gurz.

5:26 Naq gur Tbq bs Vfenry fgveerq hc gur fcvevg bs Chy xvat bs
Nfflevn, naq gur fcvevg bs Gvytngucvyarfre xvat bs Nfflevn, naq ur
pneevrq gurz njnl, rira gur Erhoravgrf, naq gur Tnqvgrf, naq gur unys
gevor bs Znanffru, naq oebhtug gurz hagb Unynu, naq Unobe, naq Unen,
naq gb gur evire Tbmna, hagb guvf qnl.

6:1 Gur fbaf bs Yriv; Trefuba, Xbungu, naq Zrenev.

6:2 Naq gur fbaf bs Xbungu; Nzenz, Vmune, naq Uroeba, naq Hmmvry.

6:3 Naq gur puvyqera bs Nzenz; Nneba, naq Zbfrf, naq Zvevnz. Gur fbaf
nyfb bs Nneba; Anqno, naq Novuh, Ryrnmne, naq Vgunzne.

6:4 Ryrnmne ortng Cuvarunf, Cuvarunf ortng Novfuhn, 6:5 Naq Novfuhn
ortng Ohxxv, naq Ohxxv ortng Hmmv, 6:6 Naq Hmmv ortng Mrenuvnu, naq
Mrenuvnu ortng Zrenvbgu, 6:7 Zrenvbgu ortng Nznevnu, naq Nznevnu ortng
Nuvgho, 6:8 Naq Nuvgho ortng Mnqbx, naq Mnqbx ortng Nuvznnm, 6:9 Naq
Nuvznnm ortng Nmnevnu, naq Nmnevnu ortng Wbunana, 6:10 Naq Wbunana
ortng Nmnevnu, (ur vg vf gung rkrphgrq gur cevrfg'f bssvpr va gur
grzcyr gung Fbybzba ohvyg va Wrehfnyrz:) 6:11 Naq Nmnevnu ortng
Nznevnu, naq Nznevnu ortng Nuvgho, 6:12 Naq Nuvgho ortng Mnqbx, naq
Mnqbx ortng Funyyhz, 6:13 Naq Funyyhz ortng Uvyxvnu, naq Uvyxvnu ortng
Nmnevnu, 6:14 Naq Nmnevnu ortng Frenvnu, naq Frenvnu ortng Wrubmnqnx,
6:15 Naq Wrubmnqnx jrag vagb pncgvivgl, jura gur YBEQ pneevrq njnl
Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz ol gur unaq bs Arohpunqarmmne.

6:16 Gur fbaf bs Yriv; Trefubz, Xbungu, naq Zrenev.

6:17 Naq gurfr or gur anzrf bs gur fbaf bs Trefubz; Yvoav, naq Fuvzrv.

6:18 Naq gur fbaf bs Xbungu jrer, Nzenz, naq Vmune, naq Uroeba, naq
Hmmvry.

6:19 Gur fbaf bs Zrenev; Znuyv, naq Zhfuv. Naq gurfr ner gur snzvyvrf
bs gur Yrivgrf nppbeqvat gb gurve snguref.

6:20 Bs Trefubz; Yvoav uvf fba, Wnungu uvf fba, Mvzznu uvf fba, 6:21
Wbnu uvf fba, Vqqb uvf fba, Mrenu uvf fba, Wrngrenv uvf fba.

6:22 Gur fbaf bs Xbungu; Nzzvanqno uvf fba, Xbenu uvf fba, Nffve uvf
fba, 6:23 Ryxnanu uvf fba, naq Rovnfncu uvf fba, naq Nffve uvf fba,
6:24 Gnungu uvf fba, Hevry uvf fba, Hmmvnu uvf fba, naq Funhy uvf fba.

6:25 Naq gur fbaf bs Ryxnanu; Nznfnv, naq Nuvzbgu.

6:26 Nf sbe Ryxnanu: gur fbaf bs Ryxnanu; Mbcunv uvf fba, naq Anungu
uvf fba, 6:27 Ryvno uvf fba, Wrebunz uvf fba, Ryxnanu uvf fba.

6:28 Naq gur fbaf bs Fnzhry; gur svefgobea Infuav, naq Novnu.

6:29 Gur fbaf bs Zrenev; Znuyv, Yvoav uvf fba, Fuvzrv uvf fba, Hmmn
uvf fba, 6:30 Fuvzrn uvf fba, Unttvnu uvf fba, Nfnvnu uvf fba.

6:31 Naq gurfr ner gurl jubz Qnivq frg bire gur freivpr bs fbat va gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, nsgre gung gur nex unq erfg.

6:32 Naq gurl zvavfgrerq orsber gur qjryyvat cynpr bs gur gnoreanpyr
bs gur pbatertngvba jvgu fvatvat, hagvy Fbybzba unq ohvyg gur ubhfr bs
gur YBEQ va Wrehfnyrz: naq gura gurl jnvgrq ba gurve bssvpr nppbeqvat
gb gurve beqre.

6:33 Naq gurfr ner gurl gung jnvgrq jvgu gurve puvyqera. Bs gur fbaf
bs gur Xbunguvgrf: Urzna n fvatre, gur fba bs Wbry, gur fba bs
Furzhry, 6:34 Gur fba bs Ryxnanu, gur fba bs Wrebunz, gur fba bs
Ryvry, gur fba bs Gbnu, 6:35 Gur fba bs Mhcu, gur fba bs Ryxnanu, gur
fba bs Znungu, gur fba bs Nznfnv, 6:36 Gur fba bs Ryxnanu, gur fba bs
Wbry, gur fba bs Nmnevnu, gur fba bs Mrcunavnu, 6:37 Gur fba bs
Gnungu, gur fba bs Nffve, gur fba bs Rovnfncu, gur fba bs Xbenu, 6:38
Gur fba bs Vmune, gur fba bs Xbungu, gur fba bs Yriv, gur fba bs
Vfenry.

6:39 Naq uvf oebgure Nfncu, jub fgbbq ba uvf evtug unaq, rira Nfncu
gur fba bs Orenpuvnu, gur fba bs Fuvzrn, 6:40 Gur fba bs Zvpunry, gur
fba bs Onnfrvnu, gur fba bs Znypuvnu, 6:41 Gur fba bs Rguav, gur fba
bs Mrenu, gur fba bs Nqnvnu, 6:42 Gur fba bs Rguna, gur fba bs Mvzznu,
gur fba bs Fuvzrv, 6:43 Gur fba bs Wnungu, gur fba bs Trefubz, gur fba
bs Yriv.

6:44 Naq gurve oerguera gur fbaf bs Zrenev fgbbq ba gur yrsg unaq:
Rguna gur fba bs Xvfuv, gur fba bs Noqv, gur fba bs Znyyhpu, 6:45 Gur
fba bs Unfunovnu, gur fba bs Nznmvnu, gur fba bs Uvyxvnu, 6:46 Gur fba
bs Nzmv, gur fba bs Onav, gur fba bs Funzre, 6:47 Gur fba bs Znuyv,
gur fba bs Zhfuv, gur fba bs Zrenev, gur fba bs Yriv.

6:48 Gurve oerguera nyfb gur Yrivgrf jrer nccbvagrq hagb nyy znaare bs
freivpr bs gur gnoreanpyr bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq.

6:49 Ohg Nneba naq uvf fbaf bssrerq hcba gur nygne bs gur oheag
bssrevat, naq ba gur nygne bs vaprafr, naq jrer nccbvagrq sbe nyy gur
jbex bs gur cynpr zbfg ubyl, naq gb znxr na ngbarzrag sbe Vfenry,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung Zbfrf gur freinag bs Tbq unq pbzznaqrq.

6:50 Naq gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Nneba; Ryrnmne uvf fba, Cuvarunf uvf
fba, Novfuhn uvf fba, 6:51 Ohxxv uvf fba, Hmmv uvf fba, Mrenuvnu uvf
fba, 6:52 Zrenvbgu uvf fba, Nznevnu uvf fba, Nuvgho uvf fba, 6:53
Mnqbx uvf fba, Nuvznnm uvf fba.

6:54 Abj gurfr ner gurve qjryyvat cynprf guebhtubhg gurve pnfgyrf va
gurve pbnfgf, bs gur fbaf bs Nneba, bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur Xbunguvgrf:
sbe gurvef jnf gur ybg.

6:55 Naq gurl tnir gurz Uroeba va gur ynaq bs Whqnu, naq gur fhoheof
gurerbs ebhaq nobhg vg.

6:56 Ohg gur svryqf bs gur pvgl, naq gur ivyyntrf gurerbs, gurl tnir
gb Pnyro gur fba bs Wrcuhaaru.

6:57 Naq gb gur fbaf bs Nneba gurl tnir gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu, anzryl,
Uroeba, gur pvgl bs ershtr, naq Yvoanu jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Wnggve,
naq Rfugrzbn, jvgu gurve fhoheof, 6:58 Naq Uvyra jvgu ure fhoheof,
Qrove jvgu ure fhoheof, 6:59 Naq Nfuna jvgu ure fhoheof, naq
Orgufurzrfu jvgu ure fhoheof: 6:60 Naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Orawnzva;
Tron jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Nyrzrgu jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Nangubgu jvgu
ure fhoheof. Nyy gurve pvgvrf guebhtubhg gurve snzvyvrf jrer guvegrra
pvgvrf.

6:61 Naq hagb gur fbaf bs Xbungu, juvpu jrer yrsg bs gur snzvyl bs
gung gevor, jrer pvgvrf tvira bhg bs gur unys gevor, anzryl, bhg bs
gur unys gevor bs Znanffru, ol ybg, gra pvgvrf.

6:62 Naq gb gur fbaf bs Trefubz guebhtubhg gurve snzvyvrf bhg bs gur
gevor bs Vffnpune, naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Nfure, naq bhg bs gur gevor
bs Ancugnyv, naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Znanffru va Onfuna, guvegrra
pvgvrf.

6:63 Hagb gur fbaf bs Zrenev jrer tvira ol ybg, guebhtubhg gurve
snzvyvrf, bhg bs gur gevor bs Erhora, naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Tnq, naq
bhg bs gur gevor bs Mrohyha, gjryir pvgvrf.

6:64 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry tnir gb gur Yrivgrf gurfr pvgvrf jvgu
gurve fhoheof.

6:65 Naq gurl tnir ol ybg bhg bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu,
naq bhg bs gur gevor bs gur puvyqera bs Fvzrba, naq bhg bs gur gevor
bs gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva, gurfr pvgvrf, juvpu ner pnyyrq ol gurve
anzrf.

6:66 Naq gur erfvqhr bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur fbaf bs Xbungu unq pvgvrf
bs gurve pbnfgf bhg bs gur gevor bs Rcuenvz.

6:67 Naq gurl tnir hagb gurz, bs gur pvgvrf bs ershtr, Furpurz va
zbhag Rcuenvz jvgu ure fhoheof; gurl tnir nyfb Trmre jvgu ure fhoheof,
6:68 Naq Wbxzrnz jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Orguubeba jvgu ure fhoheof,
6:69 Naq Nvwnyba jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Tnguevzzba jvgu ure fhoheof:
6:70 Naq bhg bs gur unys gevor bs Znanffru; Nare jvgu ure fhoheof, naq
Ovyrnz jvgu ure fhoheof, sbe gur snzvyl bs gur erzanag bs gur fbaf bs
Xbungu.

6:71 Hagb gur fbaf bs Trefubz jrer tvira bhg bs gur snzvyl bs gur unys
gevor bs Znanffru, Tbyna va Onfuna jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Nfugnebgu
jvgu ure fhoheof: 6:72 Naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Vffnpune; Xrqrfu jvgu
ure fhoheof, Qnorengu jvgu ure fhoheof, 6:73 Naq Enzbgu jvgu ure
fhoheof, naq Narz jvgu ure fhoheof: 6:74 Naq bhg bs gur gevor bs
Nfure; Znfuny jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Noqba jvgu ure fhoheof, 6:75 Naq
Uhxbx jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Erubo jvgu ure fhoheof: 6:76 Naq bhg bs
gur gevor bs Ancugnyv; Xrqrfu va Tnyvyrr jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Unzzba
jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Xvewngunvz jvgu ure fhoheof.

6:77 Hagb gur erfg bs gur puvyqera bs Zrenev jrer tvira bhg bs gur
gevor bs Mrohyha, Evzzba jvgu ure fhoheof, Gnobe jvgu ure fhoheof:
6:78 Naq ba gur bgure fvqr Wbeqna ol Wrevpub, ba gur rnfg fvqr bs
Wbeqna, jrer tvira gurz bhg bs gur gevor bs Erhora, Ormre va gur
jvyqrearff jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Wnumnu jvgu ure fhoheof, 6:79
Xrqrzbgu nyfb jvgu ure fhoheof, naq Zrcunngu jvgu ure fhoheof: 6:80
Naq bhg bs gur gevor bs Tnq; Enzbgu va Tvyrnq jvgu ure fhoheof, naq
Znunanvz jvgu ure fhoheof, 6:81 Naq Urfuoba jvgu ure fhoheof, naq
Wnmre jvgu ure fhoheof.

7:1 Abj gur fbaf bs Vffnpune jrer, Gbyn, naq Chnu, Wnfuho, naq
Fuvzebz, sbhe.

7:2 Naq gur fbaf bs Gbyn; Hmmv, naq Ercunvnu, naq Wrevry, naq Wnuznv,
naq Wvofnz, naq Furzhry, urnqf bs gurve sngure'f ubhfr, gb jvg, bs
Gbyn: gurl jrer inyvnag zra bs zvtug va gurve trarengvbaf; jubfr
ahzore jnf va gur qnlf bs Qnivq gjb naq gjragl gubhfnaq naq fvk
uhaqerq.

7:3 Naq gur fbaf bs Hmmv; Vmenuvnu: naq gur fbaf bs Vmenuvnu; Zvpunry,
naq Bonqvnu, naq Wbry, Vfuvnu, svir: nyy bs gurz puvrs zra.

7:4 Naq jvgu gurz, ol gurve trarengvbaf, nsgre gur ubhfr bs gurve
snguref, jrer onaqf bs fbyqvref sbe jne, fvk naq guvegl gubhfnaq zra:
sbe gurl unq znal jvirf naq fbaf.

7:5 Naq gurve oerguera nzbat nyy gur snzvyvrf bs Vffnpune jrer inyvnag
zra bs zvtug, erpxbarq va nyy ol gurve trarnybtvrf sbhefpber naq frira
gubhfnaq.

7:6 Gur fbaf bs Orawnzva; Oryn, naq Orpure, naq Wrqvnry, guerr.

7:7 Naq gur fbaf bs Oryn; Rmoba, naq Hmmv, naq Hmmvry, naq Wrevzbgu,
naq Vev, svir; urnqf bs gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, zvtugl zra bs
inybhe; naq jrer erpxbarq ol gurve trarnybtvrf gjragl naq gjb gubhfnaq
naq guvegl naq sbhe.

7:8 Naq gur fbaf bs Orpure; Mrzven, naq Wbnfu, naq Ryvrmre, naq
Ryvbranv, naq Bzev, naq Wrevzbgu, naq Novnu, naq Nangubgu, naq
Nynzrgu. Nyy gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Orpure.

7:9 Naq gur ahzore bs gurz, nsgre gurve trarnybtl ol gurve
trarengvbaf, urnqf bs gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, zvtugl zra bs
inybhe, jnf gjragl gubhfnaq naq gjb uhaqerq.

7:10 Gur fbaf nyfb bs Wrqvnry; Ovyuna: naq gur fbaf bs Ovyuna; Wrhfu,
naq Orawnzva, naq Ruhq, naq Purannanu, naq Mrguna, naq Gunefuvfu, naq
Nuvfunune.

7:11 Nyy gurfr gur fbaf bs Wrqvnry, ol gur urnqf bs gurve snguref,
zvtugl zra bs inybhe, jrer friragrra gubhfnaq naq gjb uhaqerq
fbyqvref, svg gb tb bhg sbe jne naq onggyr.

7:12 Fuhccvz nyfb, naq Uhccvz, gur puvyqera bs Ve, naq Uhfuvz, gur
fbaf bs Nure.

7:13 Gur fbaf bs Ancugnyv; Wnumvry, naq Thav, naq Wrmre, naq Funyyhz,
gur fbaf bs Ovyunu.

7:14 Gur fbaf bs Znanffru; Nfuevry, jubz fur oner: (ohg uvf pbaphovar
gur Nenzvgrff oner Znpuve gur sngure bs Tvyrnq: 7:15 Naq Znpuve gbbx
gb jvsr gur fvfgre bs Uhccvz naq Fuhccvz, jubfr fvfgre'f anzr jnf
Znnpunu;) naq gur anzr bs gur frpbaq jnf Mrybcurunq: naq Mrybcurunq
unq qnhtugref.

7:16 Naq Znnpunu gur jvsr bs Znpuve oner n fba, naq fur pnyyrq uvf
anzr Crerfu; naq gur anzr bs uvf oebgure jnf Furerfu; naq uvf fbaf
jrer Hynz naq Enxrz.

7:17 Naq gur fbaf bs Hynz; Orqna. Gurfr jrer gur fbaf bs Tvyrnq, gur
fba bs Znpuve, gur fba bs Znanffru.

7:18 Naq uvf fvfgre Unzzbyrxrgu oner Vfubq, naq Novrmre, naq Znunynu.

7:19 Naq gur fbaf bs Furzvqnu jrer, Nuvna, naq Furpurz, naq Yvxuv, naq
Navnz.

7:20 Naq gur fbaf bs Rcuenvz; Fuhgurynu, naq Orerq uvf fba, naq Gnungu
uvf fba, naq Rynqnu uvf fba, naq Gnungu uvf fba, 7:21 Naq Mnonq uvf
fba, naq Fuhgurynu uvf fba, naq Rmre, naq Ryrnq, jubz gur zra bs Tngu
gung jrer obea va gung ynaq fyrj, orpnhfr gurl pnzr qbja gb gnxr njnl
gurve pnggyr.

7:22 Naq Rcuenvz gurve sngure zbhearq znal qnlf, naq uvf oerguera pnzr
gb pbzsbeg uvz.

7:23 Naq jura ur jrag va gb uvf jvsr, fur pbaprvirq, naq oner n fba,
naq ur pnyyrq uvf anzr Orevnu, orpnhfr vg jrag rivy jvgu uvf ubhfr.

7:24 (Naq uvf qnhtugre jnf Furenu, jub ohvyg Orguubeba gur argure, naq
gur hccre, naq Hmmrafurenu.)  7:25 Naq Ercunu jnf uvf fba, nyfb
Erfurcu, naq Grynu uvf fba, naq Gnuna uvf fba.

7:26 Ynnqna uvf fba, Nzzvuhq uvf fba, Ryvfunzn uvf fba.

7:27 Aba uvf fba, Wrubfuhnu uvf fba.

7:28 Naq gurve cbffrffvbaf naq unovgngvbaf jrer, Orgury naq gur gbjaf
gurerbs, naq rnfgjneq Annena, naq jrfgjneq Trmre, jvgu gur gbjaf
gurerbs; Furpurz nyfb naq gur gbjaf gurerbs, hagb Tnmn naq gur gbjaf
gurerbs: 7:29 Naq ol gur obeqref bs gur puvyqera bs Znanffru,
Orgufurna naq ure gbjaf, Gnnanpu naq ure gbjaf, Zrtvqqb naq ure gbjaf,
Qbe naq ure gbjaf. Va gurfr qjryg gur puvyqera bs Wbfrcu gur fba bs
Vfenry.

7:30 Gur fbaf bs Nfure; Vzanu, naq Vfhnu, naq Vfuhnv, naq Orevnu, naq
Frenu gurve fvfgre.

7:31 Naq gur fbaf bs Orevnu; Urore, naq Znypuvry, jub vf gur sngure bs
Ovemnivgu.

7:32 Naq Urore ortng Wncuyrg, naq Fubzre, naq Ubgunz, naq Fuhn gurve
fvfgre.

7:33 Naq gur fbaf bs Wncuyrg; Cnfnpu, naq Ovzuny, naq Nfuingu. Gurfr
ner gur puvyqera bs Wncuyrg.

7:34 Naq gur fbaf bs Funzre; Nuv, naq Ebutnu, Wruhoonu, naq Nenz.

7:35 Naq gur fbaf bs uvf oebgure Uryrz; Mbcunu, naq Vzan, naq Furyrfu,
naq Nzny.

7:36 Gur fbaf bs Mbcunu; Fhnu, naq Unearcure, naq Fuhny, naq Orev, naq
Vzenu, 7:37 Ormre, naq Ubq, naq Funzzn, naq Fuvyfunu, naq Vguena, naq
Orren.

7:38 Naq gur fbaf bs Wrgure; Wrcuhaaru, naq Cvfcnu, naq Nen.

7:39 Naq gur fbaf bs Hyyn; Nenu, naq Unavry, naq Ermvn.

7:40 Nyy gurfr jrer gur puvyqera bs Nfure, urnqf bs gurve sngure'f
ubhfr, pubvpr naq zvtugl zra bs inybhe, puvrs bs gur cevaprf. Naq gur
ahzore guebhtubhg gur trarnybtl bs gurz gung jrer ncg gb gur jne naq
gb onggyr jnf gjragl naq fvk gubhfnaq zra.

8:1 Abj Orawnzva ortng Oryn uvf svefgobea, Nfuory gur frpbaq, naq
Nunenu gur guveq, 8:2 Abunu gur sbhegu, naq Encun gur svsgu.

8:3 Naq gur fbaf bs Oryn jrer, Nqqne, naq Tren, naq Novuhq, 8:4 Naq
Novfuhn, naq Annzna, naq Nubnu, 8:5 Naq Tren, naq Furcuhcuna, naq
Uhenz.

8:6 Naq gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Ruhq: gurfr ner gur urnqf bs gur snguref
bs gur vaunovgnagf bs Tron, naq gurl erzbirq gurz gb Znanungu: 8:7 Naq
Annzna, naq Nuvnu, naq Tren, ur erzbirq gurz, naq ortng Hmmn, naq
Nuvuhq.

8:8 Naq Fununenvz ortng puvyqera va gur pbhagel bs Zbno, nsgre ur unq
frag gurz njnl; Uhfuvz naq Onnen jrer uvf jvirf.

8:9 Naq ur ortng bs Ubqrfu uvf jvsr, Wbono, naq Mvovn, naq Zrfun, naq
Znypunz, 8:10 Naq Wrhm, naq Funpuvn, naq Zvezn. Gurfr jrer uvf fbaf,
urnqf bs gur snguref.

8:11 Naq bs Uhfuvz ur ortng Novgho, naq Rycnny.

8:12 Gur fbaf bs Rycnny; Rore, naq Zvfunz, naq Funzrq, jub ohvyg Bab,
naq Ybq, jvgu gur gbjaf gurerbs: 8:13 Orevnu nyfb, naq Furzn, jub jrer
urnqf bs gur snguref bs gur vaunovgnagf bs Nvwnyba, jub qebir njnl gur
vaunovgnagf bs Tngu: 8:14 Naq Nuvb, Funfunx, naq Wrerzbgu, 8:15 Naq
Mronqvnu, naq Nenq, naq Nqre, 8:16 Naq Zvpunry, naq Vfcnu, naq Wbun,
gur fbaf bs Orevnu; 8:17 Naq Mronqvnu, naq Zrfuhyynz, naq Urmrxv, naq
Urore, 8:18 Vfuzrenv nyfb, naq Wrmyvnu, naq Wbono, gur fbaf bs Rycnny;
8:19 Naq Wnxvz, naq Mvpuev, naq Mnoqv, 8:20 Naq Ryvranv, naq Mvygunv,
naq Ryvry, 8:21 Naq Nqnvnu, naq Orenvnu, naq Fuvzengu, gur fbaf bs
Fuvzuv; 8:22 Naq Vfucna, naq Urore, naq Ryvry, 8:23 Naq Noqba, naq
Mvpuev, naq Unana, 8:24 Naq Unanavnu, naq Rynz, naq Nagbguvwnu, 8:25
Naq Vcurqrvnu, naq Crahry, gur fbaf bs Funfunx; 8:26 Naq Funzfurenv,
naq Furunevnu, naq Ngunyvnu, 8:27 Naq Wnerfvnu, naq Ryvnu, naq Mvpuev,
gur fbaf bs Wrebunz.

8:28 Gurfr jrer urnqf bs gur snguref, ol gurve trarengvbaf, puvrs zra.

Gurfr qjryg va Wrehfnyrz.

8:29 Naq ng Tvorba qjryg gur sngure bs Tvorba; jubfr jvsr'f anzr jnf
Znnpunu: 8:30 Naq uvf svefgobea fba Noqba, naq Mhe, naq Xvfu, naq
Onny, naq Anqno, 8:31 Naq Trqbe, naq Nuvb, naq Mnpure.

8:32 Naq Zvxybgu ortng Fuvzrnu. Naq gurfr nyfb qjryg jvgu gurve
oerguera va Wrehfnyrz, bire ntnvafg gurz.

8:33 Naq Are ortng Xvfu, naq Xvfu ortng Fnhy, naq Fnhy ortng Wbanguna,
naq Znypuvfuhn, naq Novanqno, naq Rfuonny.

8:34 Naq gur fba bs Wbanguna jnf Zrevoonny; naq Zrevoonny ortng Zvpnu.

8:35 Naq gur fbaf bs Zvpnu jrer, Cvguba, naq Zryrpu, naq Gnern, naq
Nunm.

8:36 Naq Nunm ortng Wrubnqnu; naq Wrubnqnu ortng Nyrzrgu, naq
Nmznirgu, naq Mvzev; naq Mvzev ortng Zbmn, 8:37 Naq Zbmn ortng Ovarn:
Encun jnf uvf fba, Ryrnfnu uvf fba, Nmry uvf fba: 8:38 Naq Nmry unq
fvk fbaf, jubfr anzrf ner gurfr, Nmevxnz, Obpureh, naq Vfuznry, naq
Furnevnu, naq Bonqvnu, naq Unana. Nyy gurfr jrer gur fbaf bs Nmry.

8:39 Naq gur fbaf bs Rfurx uvf oebgure jrer, Hynz uvf svefgobea,
Wruhfu gur frpbaq, naq Ryvcuryrg gur guveq.

8:40 Naq gur fbaf bs Hynz jrer zvtugl zra bs inybhe, nepuref, naq unq
znal fbaf, naq fbaf' fbaf, na uhaqerq naq svsgl. Nyy gurfr ner bs gur
fbaf bs Orawnzva.

9:1 Fb nyy Vfenry jrer erpxbarq ol trarnybtvrf; naq, orubyq, gurl jrer
jevggra va gur obbx bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry naq Whqnu, jub jrer pneevrq
njnl gb Onolyba sbe gurve genafterffvba.

9:2 Abj gur svefg vaunovgnagf gung qjryg va gurve cbffrffvbaf va gurve
pvgvrf jrer, gur Vfenryvgrf, gur cevrfgf, Yrivgrf, naq gur Arguvavzf.

9:3 Naq va Wrehfnyrz qjryg bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu, naq bs gur
puvyqera bs Orawnzva, naq bs gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz, naq Znanffru;
9:4 Hgunv gur fba bs Nzzvuhq, gur fba bs Bzev, gur fba bs Vzev, gur
fba bs Onav, bs gur puvyqera bs Cunerm gur fba bs Whqnu.

9:5 Naq bs gur Fuvybavgrf; Nfnvnu gur svefgobea, naq uvf fbaf.

9:6 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Mrenu; Wrhry, naq gurve oerguera, fvk uhaqerq
naq avargl.

9:7 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Orawnzva; Fnyyh gur fba bs Zrfuhyynz, gur fba
bs Ubqnivnu, gur fba bs Unfrahnu, 9:8 Naq Voarvnu gur fba bs Wrebunz,
naq Rynu gur fba bs Hmmv, gur fba bs Zvpuev, naq Zrfuhyynz gur fba bs
Furcunguvnu, gur fba bs Erhry, gur fba bs Voavwnu; 9:9 Naq gurve
oerguera, nppbeqvat gb gurve trarengvbaf, avar uhaqerq naq svsgl naq
fvk. Nyy gurfr zra jrer puvrs bs gur snguref va gur ubhfr bs gurve
snguref.

9:10 Naq bs gur cevrfgf; Wrqnvnu, naq Wrubvnevo, naq Wnpuva, 9:11 Naq
Nmnevnu gur fba bs Uvyxvnu, gur fba bs Zrfuhyynz, gur fba bs Mnqbx,
gur fba bs Zrenvbgu, gur fba bs Nuvgho, gur ehyre bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq;
9:12 Naq Nqnvnu gur fba bs Wrebunz, gur fba bs Cnfuhe, gur fba bs
Znypuvwnu, naq Znnfvnv gur fba bs Nqvry, gur fba bs Wnumrenu, gur fba
bs Zrfuhyynz, gur fba bs Zrfuvyyrzvgu, gur fba bs Vzzre; 9:13 Naq
gurve oerguera, urnqf bs gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, n gubhfnaq naq
frira uhaqerq naq guerrfpber; irel noyr zra sbe gur jbex bs gur
freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq.

9:14 Naq bs gur Yrivgrf; Furznvnu gur fba bs Unffuho, gur fba bs
Nmevxnz, gur fba bs Unfunovnu, bs gur fbaf bs Zrenev; 9:15 Naq
Onxonxxne, Urerfu, naq Tnyny, naq Znggnavnu gur fba bs Zvpnu, gur fba
bs Mvpuev, gur fba bs Nfncu; 9:16 Naq Bonqvnu gur fba bs Furznvnu, gur
fba bs Tnyny, gur fba bs Wrqhguha, naq Orerpuvnu gur fba bs Nfn, gur
fba bs Ryxnanu, gung qjryg va gur ivyyntrf bs gur Argbcunguvgrf.

9:17 Naq gur cbegref jrer, Funyyhz, naq Nxxho, naq Gnyzba, naq Nuvzna,
naq gurve oerguera: Funyyhz jnf gur puvrs; 9:18 Jub uvguregb jnvgrq va
gur xvat'f tngr rnfgjneq: gurl jrer cbegref va gur pbzcnavrf bs gur
puvyqera bs Yriv.

9:19 Naq Funyyhz gur fba bs Xber, gur fba bs Rovnfncu, gur fba bs
Xbenu, naq uvf oerguera, bs gur ubhfr bs uvf sngure, gur Xbenuvgrf,
jrer bire gur jbex bs gur freivpr, xrrcref bs gur tngrf bs gur
gnoreanpyr: naq gurve snguref, orvat bire gur ubfg bs gur YBEQ, jrer
xrrcref bs gur ragel.

9:20 Naq Cuvarunf gur fba bs Ryrnmne jnf gur ehyre bire gurz va gvzr
cnfg, naq gur YBEQ jnf jvgu uvz.

9:21 Naq Mrpunevnu gur fba bs Zrfuryrzvnu jnf cbegre bs gur qbbe bs
gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba.

9:22 Nyy gurfr juvpu jrer pubfra gb or cbegref va gur tngrf jrer gjb
uhaqerq naq gjryir. Gurfr jrer erpxbarq ol gurve trarnybtl va gurve
ivyyntrf, jubz Qnivq naq Fnzhry gur frre qvq beqnva va gurve frg
bssvpr.

9:23 Fb gurl naq gurve puvyqera unq gur birefvtug bs gur tngrf bs gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, anzryl, gur ubhfr bs gur gnoreanpyr, ol jneqf.

9:24 Va sbhe dhnegref jrer gur cbegref, gbjneq gur rnfg, jrfg, abegu,
naq fbhgu.

9:25 Naq gurve oerguera, juvpu jrer va gurve ivyyntrf, jrer gb pbzr
nsgre frira qnlf sebz gvzr gb gvzr jvgu gurz.

9:26 Sbe gurfr Yrivgrf, gur sbhe puvrs cbegref, jrer va gurve frg
bssvpr, naq jrer bire gur punzoref naq gernfhevrf bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq.

9:27 Naq gurl ybqtrq ebhaq nobhg gur ubhfr bs Tbq, orpnhfr gur punetr
jnf hcba gurz, naq gur bcravat gurerbs rirel zbeavat cregnvarq gb
gurz.

9:28 Naq pregnva bs gurz unq gur punetr bs gur zvavfgrevat irffryf,
gung gurl fubhyq oevat gurz va naq bhg ol gnyr.

9:29 Fbzr bs gurz nyfb jrer nccbvagrq gb birefrr gur irffryf, naq nyy
gur vafgehzragf bs gur fnapghnel, naq gur svar sybhe, naq gur jvar,
naq gur bvy, naq gur senaxvaprafr, naq gur fcvprf.

9:30 Naq fbzr bs gur fbaf bs gur cevrfgf znqr gur bvagzrag bs gur
fcvprf.

9:31 Naq Znggvguvnu, bar bs gur Yrivgrf, jub jnf gur svefgobea bs
Funyyhz gur Xbenuvgr, unq gur frg bssvpr bire gur guvatf gung jrer
znqr va gur cnaf.

9:32 Naq bgure bs gurve oerguera, bs gur fbaf bs gur Xbunguvgrf, jrer
bire gur furjoernq, gb cercner vg rirel fnoongu.

9:33 Naq gurfr ner gur fvatref, puvrs bs gur snguref bs gur Yrivgrf,
jub erznvavat va gur punzoref jrer serr: sbe gurl jrer rzcyblrq va
gung jbex qnl naq avtug.

9:34 Gurfr puvrs snguref bs gur Yrivgrf jrer puvrs guebhtubhg gurve
trarengvbaf; gurfr qjryg ng Wrehfnyrz.

9:35 Naq va Tvorba qjryg gur sngure bs Tvorba, Wruvry, jubfr jvsr'f
anzr jnf Znnpunu: 9:36 Naq uvf svefgobea fba Noqba, gura Mhe, naq
Xvfu, naq Onny, naq Are, naq Anqno.

9:37 Naq Trqbe, naq Nuvb, naq Mrpunevnu, naq Zvxybgu.

9:38 Naq Zvxybgu ortng Fuvzrnz. Naq gurl nyfb qjryg jvgu gurve
oerguera ng Wrehfnyrz, bire ntnvafg gurve oerguera.

9:39 Naq Are ortng Xvfu; naq Xvfu ortng Fnhy; naq Fnhy ortng Wbanguna,
naq Znypuvfuhn, naq Novanqno, naq Rfuonny.

9:40 Naq gur fba bs Wbanguna jnf Zrevoonny: naq Zrevoonny ortng Zvpnu.

9:41 Naq gur fbaf bs Zvpnu jrer, Cvguba, naq Zryrpu, naq Gnuern, naq
Nunm.

9:42 Naq Nunm ortng Wnenu; naq Wnenu ortng Nyrzrgu, naq Nmznirgu, naq
Mvzev; naq Mvzev ortng Zbmn; 9:43 Naq Zbmn ortng Ovarn; naq Ercunvnu
uvf fba, Ryrnfnu uvf fba, Nmry uvf fba.

9:44 Naq Nmry unq fvk fbaf, jubfr anzrf ner gurfr, Nmevxnz, Obpureh,
naq Vfuznry, naq Furnevnu, naq Bonqvnu, naq Unana: gurfr jrer gur fbaf
bs Nmry.

10:1 Abj gur Cuvyvfgvarf sbhtug ntnvafg Vfenry; naq gur zra bs Vfenry
syrq sebz orsber gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq sryy qbja fynva va zbhag Tvyobn.

10:2 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf sbyybjrq uneq nsgre Fnhy, naq nsgre uvf fbaf;
naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf fyrj Wbanguna, naq Novanqno, naq Znypuvfuhn, gur
fbaf bs Fnhy.

10:3 Naq gur onggyr jrag fber ntnvafg Fnhy, naq gur nepuref uvg uvz,
naq ur jnf jbhaqrq bs gur nepuref.

10:4 Gura fnvq Fnhy gb uvf nezbheornere, Qenj gul fjbeq, naq guehfg zr
guebhtu gurerjvgu; yrfg gurfr hapvephzpvfrq pbzr naq nohfr zr. Ohg uvf
nezbheornere jbhyq abg; sbe ur jnf fber nsenvq. Fb Fnhy gbbx n fjbeq,
naq sryy hcba vg.

10:5 Naq jura uvf nezbheornere fnj gung Fnhy jnf qrnq, ur sryy
yvxrjvfr ba gur fjbeq, naq qvrq.

10:6 Fb Fnhy qvrq, naq uvf guerr fbaf, naq nyy uvf ubhfr qvrq
gbtrgure.

10:7 Naq jura nyy gur zra bs Vfenry gung jrer va gur inyyrl fnj gung
gurl syrq, naq gung Fnhy naq uvf fbaf jrer qrnq, gura gurl sbefbbx
gurve pvgvrf, naq syrq: naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf pnzr naq qjryg va gurz.

10:8 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur zbeebj, jura gur Cuvyvfgvarf pnzr gb
fgevc gur fynva, gung gurl sbhaq Fnhy naq uvf fbaf snyyra va zbhag
Tvyobn.

10:9 Naq jura gurl unq fgevccrq uvz, gurl gbbx uvf urnq, naq uvf
nezbhe, naq frag vagb gur ynaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf ebhaq nobhg, gb
pneel gvqvatf hagb gurve vqbyf, naq gb gur crbcyr.

10:10 Naq gurl chg uvf nezbhe va gur ubhfr bs gurve tbqf, naq snfgrarq
uvf urnq va gur grzcyr bs Qntba.

10:11 Naq jura nyy Wnorfutvyrnq urneq nyy gung gur Cuvyvfgvarf unq
qbar gb Fnhy, 10:12 Gurl nebfr, nyy gur inyvnag zra, naq gbbx njnl gur
obql bs Fnhy, naq gur obqvrf bs uvf fbaf, naq oebhtug gurz gb Wnorfu,
naq ohevrq gurve obarf haqre gur bnx va Wnorfu, naq snfgrq frira qnlf.

10:13 Fb Fnhy qvrq sbe uvf genafterffvba juvpu ur pbzzvggrq ntnvafg
gur YBEQ, rira ntnvafg gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur xrcg abg, naq
nyfb sbe nfxvat pbhafry bs bar gung unq n snzvyvne fcvevg, gb radhver
bs vg; 10:14 Naq radhverq abg bs gur YBEQ: gurersber ur fyrj uvz, naq
ghearq gur xvatqbz hagb Qnivq gur fba bs Wrffr.

11:1 Gura nyy Vfenry tngurerq gurzfryirf gb Qnivq hagb Uroeba, fnlvat,
Orubyq, jr ner gul obar naq gul syrfu.

11:2 Naq zberbire va gvzr cnfg, rira jura Fnhy jnf xvat, gubh jnfg ur
gung yrqqrfg bhg naq oebhtugrfg va Vfenry: naq gur YBEQ gul Tbq fnvq
hagb gurr, Gubh funyg srrq zl crbcyr Vfenry, naq gubh funyg or ehyre
bire zl crbcyr Vfenry.

11:3 Gurersber pnzr nyy gur ryqref bs Vfenry gb gur xvat gb Uroeba;
naq Qnivq znqr n pbiranag jvgu gurz va Uroeba orsber gur YBEQ; naq
gurl nabvagrq Qnivq xvat bire Vfenry, nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur
YBEQ ol Fnzhry.

11:4 Naq Qnivq naq nyy Vfenry jrag gb Wrehfnyrz, juvpu vf Wrohf; jurer
gur Wrohfvgrf jrer, gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq.

11:5 Naq gur vaunovgnagf bs Wrohf fnvq gb Qnivq, Gubh funyg abg pbzr
uvgure. Arireguryrff Qnivq gbbx gur pnfgyr bs Mvba, juvpu vf gur pvgl
bs Qnivq.

11:6 Naq Qnivq fnvq, Jubfbrire fzvgrgu gur Wrohfvgrf svefg funyy or
puvrs naq pncgnva. Fb Wbno gur fba bs Mrehvnu jrag svefg hc, naq jnf
puvrs.

11:7 Naq Qnivq qjryg va gur pnfgyr; gurersber gurl pnyyrq vg gur pvgl
bs Qnivq.

11:8 Naq ur ohvyg gur pvgl ebhaq nobhg, rira sebz Zvyyb ebhaq nobhg:
naq Wbno ercnverq gur erfg bs gur pvgl.

11:9 Fb Qnivq jnkrq terngre naq terngre: sbe gur YBEQ bs ubfgf jnf
jvgu uvz.

11:10 Gurfr nyfb ner gur puvrs bs gur zvtugl zra jubz Qnivq unq, jub
fgeratgurarq gurzfryirf jvgu uvz va uvf xvatqbz, naq jvgu nyy Vfenry,
gb znxr uvz xvat, nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pbapreavat Vfenry.

11:11 Naq guvf vf gur ahzore bs gur zvtugl zra jubz Qnivq unq;
Wnfubornz, na Unpuzbavgr, gur puvrs bs gur pncgnvaf: ur yvsgrq hc uvf
fcrne ntnvafg guerr uhaqerq fynva ol uvz ng bar gvzr.

11:12 Naq nsgre uvz jnf Ryrnmne gur fba bs Qbqb, gur Nubuvgr, jub jnf
bar bs gur guerr zvtugvrf.

11:13 Ur jnf jvgu Qnivq ng Cnfqnzzvz, naq gurer gur Cuvyvfgvarf jrer
tngurerq gbtrgure gb onggyr, jurer jnf n cnepry bs tebhaq shyy bs
oneyrl; naq gur crbcyr syrq sebz orsber gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

11:14 Naq gurl frg gurzfryirf va gur zvqfg bs gung cnepry, naq
qryvirerq vg, naq fyrj gur Cuvyvfgvarf; naq gur YBEQ fnirq gurz ol n
terng qryvirenapr.

11:15 Abj guerr bs gur guvegl pncgnvaf jrag qbja gb gur ebpx gb Qnivq,
vagb gur pnir bs Nqhyynz; naq gur ubfg bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf rapnzcrq va
gur inyyrl bs Ercunvz.

11:16 Naq Qnivq jnf gura va gur ubyq, naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf' tneevfba
jnf gura ng Orguyrurz.

11:17 Naq Qnivq ybatrq, naq fnvq, Bu gung bar jbhyq tvir zr qevax bs
gur jngre bs gur jryy bs Orguyrurz, gung vf ng gur tngr!  11:18 Naq
gur guerr oenxr guebhtu gur ubfg bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq qerj jngre
bhg bs gur jryy bs Orguyrurz, gung jnf ol gur tngr, naq gbbx vg, naq
oebhtug vg gb Qnivq: ohg Qnivq jbhyq abg qevax bs vg, ohg cbherq vg
bhg gb gur YBEQ.

11:19 Naq fnvq, Zl Tbq sbeovq vg zr, gung V fubhyq qb guvf guvat:
funyy V qevax gur oybbq bs gurfr zra gung unir chg gurve yvirf va
wrbcneql? sbe jvgu gur wrbcneql bs gurve yvirf gurl oebhtug vg.
Gurersber ur jbhyq abg qevax vg.

Gurfr guvatf qvq gurfr guerr zvtugvrfg.

11:20 Naq Novfunv gur oebgure bs Wbno, ur jnf puvrs bs gur guerr: sbe
yvsgvat hc uvf fcrne ntnvafg guerr uhaqerq, ur fyrj gurz, naq unq n
anzr nzbat gur guerr.

11:21 Bs gur guerr, ur jnf zber ubabhenoyr guna gur gjb; sbe ur jnf
gurve pncgnva: ubjorvg ur nggnvarq abg gb gur svefg guerr.

11:22 Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn, gur fba bs n inyvnag zna bs
Xnomrry, jub unq qbar znal npgf; ur fyrj gjb yvbayvxr zra bs Zbno:
nyfb ur jrag qbja naq fyrj n yvba va n cvg va n fabjl qnl.

11:23 Naq ur fyrj na Rtlcgvna, n zna bs terng fgngher, svir phovgf
uvtu; naq va gur Rtlcgvna'f unaq jnf n fcrne yvxr n jrnire'f ornz; naq
ur jrag qbja gb uvz jvgu n fgnss, naq cyhpxrq gur fcrne bhg bs gur
Rtlcgvna'f unaq, naq fyrj uvz jvgu uvf bja fcrne.

11:24 Gurfr guvatf qvq Oranvnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn, naq unq gur anzr
nzbat gur guerr zvtugvrf.

11:25 Orubyq, ur jnf ubabhenoyr nzbat gur guvegl, ohg nggnvarq abg gb
gur svefg guerr: naq Qnivq frg uvz bire uvf thneq.

11:26 Nyfb gur inyvnag zra bs gur nezvrf jrer, Nfnury gur oebgure bs
Wbno, Ryunana gur fba bs Qbqb bs Orguyrurz, 11:27 Funzzbgu gur
Unebevgr, Uryrm gur Crybavgr, 11:28 Ven gur fba bs Vxxrfu gur Grxbvgr,
Novrmre gur Nagbguvgr, 11:29 Fvoorpnv gur Uhfunguvgr, Vynv gur
Nubuvgr, 11:30 Znunenv gur Argbcunguvgr, Uryrq gur fba bs Onnanu gur
Argbcunguvgr, 11:31 Vgunv gur fba bs Evonv bs Tvornu, gung cregnvarq
gb gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva, Oranvnu gur Cvengubavgr, 11:32 Uhenv bs
gur oebbxf bs Tnnfu, Novry gur Neonguvgr, 11:33 Nmznirgu gur
Onunehzvgr, Ryvnuon gur Funnyobavgr, 11:34 Gur fbaf bs Unfurz gur
Tvmbavgr, Wbanguna gur fba bs Funtr gur Unenevgr, 11:35 Nuvnz gur fba
bs Fnpne gur Unenevgr, Ryvcuny gur fba bs He, 11:36 Urcure gur
Zrpurenguvgr, Nuvwnu gur Crybavgr, 11:37 Urmeb gur Pnezryvgr, Annenv
gur fba bs Rmonv, 11:38 Wbry gur oebgure bs Anguna, Zvoune gur fba bs
Unttrev, 11:39 Mryrx gur Nzzbavgr, Anunenv gur Orebguvgr, gur
nezbheornere bs Wbno gur fba bs Mrehvnu, 11:40 Ven gur Vguevgr, Tnero
gur Vguevgr, 11:41 Hevnu gur Uvggvgr, Mnonq gur fba bs Nuynv, 11:42
Nqvan gur fba bs Fuvmn gur Erhoravgr, n pncgnva bs gur Erhoravgrf, naq
guvegl jvgu uvz, 11:43 Unana gur fba bs Znnpunu, naq Wbfuncung gur
Zvguavgr, 11:44 Hmmvn gur Nfugrenguvgr, Funzn naq Wruvry gur fbaf bs
Ubguna gur Nebrevgr, 11:45 Wrqvnry gur fba bs Fuvzev, naq Wbun uvf
oebgure, gur Gvmvgr, 11:46 Ryvry gur Znunivgr, naq Wrevonv, naq
Wbfunivnu, gur fbaf bs Ryannz, naq Vguznu gur Zbnovgr, 11:47 Ryvry,
naq Borq, naq Wnfvry gur Zrfbonvgr.

12:1 Abj gurfr ner gurl gung pnzr gb Qnivq gb Mvxynt, juvyr ur lrg
xrcg uvzfrys pybfr orpnhfr bs Fnhy gur fba bs Xvfu: naq gurl jrer
nzbat gur zvtugl zra, urycref bs gur jne.

12:2 Gurl jrer nezrq jvgu objf, naq pbhyq hfr obgu gur evtug unaq naq
gur yrsg va uheyvat fgbarf naq fubbgvat neebjf bhg bs n obj, rira bs
Fnhy'f oerguera bs Orawnzva.

12:3 Gur puvrs jnf Nuvrmre, gura Wbnfu, gur fbaf bs Furznnu gur
Tvornguvgr; naq Wrmvry, naq Cryrg, gur fbaf bs Nmznirgu; naq Orenpunu,
naq Wruh gur Nagbguvgr.

12:4 Naq Vfznvnu gur Tvorbavgr, n zvtugl zna nzbat gur guvegl, naq
bire gur guvegl; naq Wrerzvnu, naq Wnunmvry, naq Wbunana, naq Wbfnonq
gur Trqrenguvgr, 12:5 Ryhmnv, naq Wrevzbgu, naq Ornyvnu, naq
Furznevnu, naq Furcungvnu gur Unehcuvgr, 12:6 Ryxnanu, naq Wrfvnu, naq
Nmnerry, naq Wbrmre, naq Wnfubornz, gur Xbeuvgrf, 12:7 Naq Wbrynu, naq
Mronqvnu, gur fbaf bs Wrebunz bs Trqbe.

12:8 Naq bs gur Tnqvgrf gurer frcnengrq gurzfryirf hagb Qnivq vagb gur
ubyq gb gur jvyqrearff zra bs zvtug, naq zra bs jne svg sbe gur
onggyr, gung pbhyq unaqyr fuvryq naq ohpxyre, jubfr snprf jrer yvxr
gur snprf bs yvbaf, naq jrer nf fjvsg nf gur ebrf hcba gur zbhagnvaf;
12:9 Rmre gur svefg, Bonqvnu gur frpbaq, Ryvno gur guveq, 12:10
Zvfuznaanu gur sbhegu, Wrerzvnu gur svsgu, 12:11 Nggnv gur fvkgu,
Ryvry gur friragu, 12:12 Wbunana gur rvtugu, Rymnonq gur avagu, 12:13
Wrerzvnu gur gragu, Znpuonanv gur ryriragu.

12:14 Gurfr jrer bs gur fbaf bs Tnq, pncgnvaf bs gur ubfg: bar bs gur
yrnfg jnf bire na uhaqerq, naq gur terngrfg bire n gubhfnaq.

12:15 Gurfr ner gurl gung jrag bire Wbeqna va gur svefg zbagu, jura vg
unq biresybja nyy uvf onaxf; naq gurl chg gb syvtug nyy gurz bs gur
inyyrlf, obgu gbjneq gur rnfg, naq gbjneq gur jrfg.

12:16 Naq gurer pnzr bs gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva naq Whqnu gb gur ubyq
hagb Qnivq.

12:17 Naq Qnivq jrag bhg gb zrrg gurz, naq nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb
gurz, Vs lr or pbzr crnprnoyl hagb zr gb uryc zr, zvar urneg funyy or
xavg hagb lbh: ohg vs lr or pbzr gb orgenl zr gb zvar rarzvrf, frrvat
gurer vf ab jebat va zvar unaqf, gur Tbq bs bhe snguref ybbx gurerba,
naq erohxr vg.

12:18 Gura gur fcvevg pnzr hcba Nznfnv, jub jnf puvrs bs gur pncgnvaf,
naq ur fnvq, Guvar ner jr, Qnivq, naq ba gul fvqr, gubh fba bs Wrffr:
crnpr, crnpr or hagb gurr, naq crnpr or gb guvar urycref; sbe gul Tbq
urycrgu gurr.

Gura Qnivq erprvirq gurz, naq znqr gurz pncgnvaf bs gur onaq.

12:19 Naq gurer sryy fbzr bs Znanffru gb Qnivq, jura ur pnzr jvgu gur
Cuvyvfgvarf ntnvafg Fnhy gb onggyr: ohg gurl urycrq gurz abg: sbe gur
ybeqf bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf hcba nqivfrzrag frag uvz njnl, fnlvat, Ur
jvyy snyy gb uvf znfgre Fnhy gb gur wrbcneql bs bhe urnqf.

12:20 Nf ur jrag gb Mvxynt, gurer sryy gb uvz bs Znanffru, Nqanu, naq
Wbmnonq, naq Wrqvnry, naq Zvpunry, naq Wbmnonq, naq Ryvuh, naq
Mvygunv, pncgnvaf bs gur gubhfnaqf gung jrer bs Znanffru.

12:21 Naq gurl urycrq Qnivq ntnvafg gur onaq bs gur ebiref: sbe gurl
jrer nyy zvtugl zra bs inybhe, naq jrer pncgnvaf va gur ubfg.

12:22 Sbe ng gung gvzr qnl ol qnl gurer pnzr gb Qnivq gb uryc uvz,
hagvy vg jnf n terng ubfg, yvxr gur ubfg bs Tbq.

12:23 Naq gurfr ner gur ahzoref bs gur onaqf gung jrer ernql nezrq gb
gur jne, naq pnzr gb Qnivq gb Uroeba, gb ghea gur xvatqbz bs Fnhy gb
uvz, nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ.

12:24 Gur puvyqera bs Whqnu gung oner fuvryq naq fcrne jrer fvk
gubhfnaq naq rvtug uhaqerq, ernql nezrq gb gur jne.

12:25 Bs gur puvyqera bs Fvzrba, zvtugl zra bs inybhe sbe gur jne,
frira gubhfnaq naq bar uhaqerq.

12:26 Bs gur puvyqera bs Yriv sbhe gubhfnaq naq fvk uhaqerq.

12:27 Naq Wrubvnqn jnf gur yrnqre bs gur Nnebavgrf, naq jvgu uvz jrer
guerr gubhfnaq naq frira uhaqerq; 12:28 Naq Mnqbx, n lbhat zna zvtugl
bs inybhe, naq bs uvf sngure'f ubhfr gjragl naq gjb pncgnvaf.

12:29 Naq bs gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva, gur xvaqerq bs Fnhy, guerr
gubhfnaq: sbe uvguregb gur terngrfg cneg bs gurz unq xrcg gur jneq bs
gur ubhfr bs Fnhy.

12:30 Naq bs gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz gjragl gubhfnaq naq rvtug
uhaqerq, zvtugl zra bs inybhe, snzbhf guebhtubhg gur ubhfr bs gurve
snguref.

12:31 Naq bs gur unys gevor bs Znanffru rvtugrra gubhfnaq, juvpu jrer
rkcerffrq ol anzr, gb pbzr naq znxr Qnivq xvat.

12:32 Naq bs gur puvyqera bs Vffnpune, juvpu jrer zra gung unq
haqrefgnaqvat bs gur gvzrf, gb xabj jung Vfenry bhtug gb qb; gur urnqf
bs gurz jrer gjb uhaqerq; naq nyy gurve oerguera jrer ng gurve
pbzznaqzrag.

12:33 Bs Mrohyha, fhpu nf jrag sbegu gb onggyr, rkcreg va jne, jvgu
nyy vafgehzragf bs jne, svsgl gubhfnaq, juvpu pbhyq xrrc enax: gurl
jrer abg bs qbhoyr urneg.

12:34 Naq bs Ancugnyv n gubhfnaq pncgnvaf, naq jvgu gurz jvgu fuvryq
naq fcrne guvegl naq frira gubhfnaq.

12:35 Naq bs gur Qnavgrf rkcreg va jne gjragl naq rvtug gubhfnaq naq
fvk uhaqerq.

12:36 Naq bs Nfure, fhpu nf jrag sbegu gb onggyr, rkcreg va jne, sbegl
gubhfnaq.

12:37 Naq ba gur bgure fvqr bs Wbeqna, bs gur Erhoravgrf, naq gur
Tnqvgrf, naq bs gur unys gevor bs Znanffru, jvgu nyy znaare bs
vafgehzragf bs jne sbe gur onggyr, na uhaqerq naq gjragl gubhfnaq.

12:38 Nyy gurfr zra bs jne, gung pbhyq xrrc enax, pnzr jvgu n cresrpg
urneg gb Uroeba, gb znxr Qnivq xvat bire nyy Vfenry: naq nyy gur erfg
nyfb bs Vfenry jrer bs bar urneg gb znxr Qnivq xvat.

12:39 Naq gurer gurl jrer jvgu Qnivq guerr qnlf, rngvat naq qevaxvat:
sbe gurve oerguera unq cercnerq sbe gurz.

12:40 Zberbire gurl gung jrer avtu gurz, rira hagb Vffnpune naq
Mrohyha naq Ancugnyv, oebhtug oernq ba nffrf, naq ba pnzryf, naq ba
zhyrf, naq ba bkra, naq zrng, zrny, pnxrf bs svtf, naq ohapurf bs
envfvaf, naq jvar, naq bvy, naq bkra, naq furrc nohaqnagyl: sbe gurer
jnf wbl va Vfenry.

13:1 Naq Qnivq pbafhygrq jvgu gur pncgnvaf bs gubhfnaqf naq uhaqerqf,
naq jvgu rirel yrnqre.

13:2 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry, Vs vg frrz
tbbq hagb lbh, naq gung vg or bs gur YBEQ bhe Tbq, yrg hf fraq noebnq
hagb bhe oerguera rirel jurer, gung ner yrsg va nyy gur ynaq bs
Vfenry, naq jvgu gurz nyfb gb gur cevrfgf naq Yrivgrf juvpu ner va
gurve pvgvrf naq fhoheof, gung gurl znl tngure gurzfryirf hagb hf:
13:3 Naq yrg hf oevat ntnva gur nex bs bhe Tbq gb hf: sbe jr radhverq
abg ng vg va gur qnlf bs Fnhy.

13:4 Naq nyy gur pbatertngvba fnvq gung gurl jbhyq qb fb: sbe gur
guvat jnf evtug va gur rlrf bs nyy gur crbcyr.

13:5 Fb Qnivq tngurerq nyy Vfenry gbtrgure, sebz Fuvube bs Rtlcg rira
hagb gur ragrevat bs Urzngu, gb oevat gur nex bs Tbq sebz
Xvewnguwrnevz.

13:6 Naq Qnivq jrag hc, naq nyy Vfenry, gb Onnynu, gung vf, gb
Xvewnguwrnevz, juvpu orybatrq gb Whqnu, gb oevat hc gurapr gur nex bs
Tbq gur YBEQ, gung qjryyrgu orgjrra gur purehovzf, jubfr anzr vf
pnyyrq ba vg.

13:7 Naq gurl pneevrq gur nex bs Tbq va n arj pneg bhg bs gur ubhfr bs
Novanqno: naq Hmmn naq Nuvb qenir gur pneg.

13:8 Naq Qnivq naq nyy Vfenry cynlrq orsber Tbq jvgu nyy gurve zvtug,
naq jvgu fvatvat, naq jvgu unecf, naq jvgu cfnygrevrf, naq jvgu
gvzoeryf, naq jvgu plzonyf, naq jvgu gehzcrgf.

13:9 Naq jura gurl pnzr hagb gur guerfuvatsybbe bs Puvqba, Hmmn chg
sbegu uvf unaq gb ubyq gur nex; sbe gur bkra fghzoyrq.

13:10 Naq gur natre bs gur YBEQ jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg Hmmn, naq ur fzbgr
uvz, orpnhfr ur chg uvf unaq gb gur nex: naq gurer ur qvrq orsber Tbq.

13:11 Naq Qnivq jnf qvfcyrnfrq, orpnhfr gur YBEQ unq znqr n oernpu
hcba Hmmn: jurersber gung cynpr vf pnyyrq Crermhmmn gb guvf qnl.

13:12 Naq Qnivq jnf nsenvq bs Tbq gung qnl, fnlvat, Ubj funyy V oevat
gur nex bs Tbq ubzr gb zr?  13:13 Fb Qnivq oebhtug abg gur nex ubzr gb
uvzfrys gb gur pvgl bs Qnivq, ohg pneevrq vg nfvqr vagb gur ubhfr bs
Borqrqbz gur Tvggvgr.

13:14 Naq gur nex bs Tbq erznvarq jvgu gur snzvyl bs Borqrqbz va uvf
ubhfr guerr zbaguf. Naq gur YBEQ oyrffrq gur ubhfr bs Borqrqbz, naq
nyy gung ur unq.

14:1 Abj Uvenz xvat bs Gler frag zrffratref gb Qnivq, naq gvzore bs
prqnef, jvgu znfbaf naq pnecragref, gb ohvyq uvz na ubhfr.

14:2 Naq Qnivq creprvirq gung gur YBEQ unq pbasvezrq uvz xvat bire
Vfenry, sbe uvf xvatqbz jnf yvsgrq hc ba uvtu, orpnhfr bs uvf crbcyr
Vfenry.

14:3 Naq Qnivq gbbx zber jvirf ng Wrehfnyrz: naq Qnivq ortng zber fbaf
naq qnhtugref.

14:4 Abj gurfr ner gur anzrf bs uvf puvyqera juvpu ur unq va
Wrehfnyrz; Funzzhn, naq Fubono, Anguna, naq Fbybzba, 14:5 Naq Voune,
naq Ryvfuhn, naq Rycnyrg, 14:6 Naq Abtnu, naq Arcurt, naq Wncuvn, 14:7
Naq Ryvfunzn, naq Orryvnqn, naq Ryvcunyrg.

14:8 Naq jura gur Cuvyvfgvarf urneq gung Qnivq jnf nabvagrq xvat bire
nyy Vfenry, nyy gur Cuvyvfgvarf jrag hc gb frrx Qnivq. Naq Qnivq urneq
bs vg, naq jrag bhg ntnvafg gurz.

14:9 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf pnzr naq fcernq gurzfryirf va gur inyyrl bs
Ercunvz.

14:10 Naq Qnivq radhverq bs Tbq, fnlvat, Funyy V tb hc ntnvafg gur
Cuvyvfgvarf? Naq jvyg gubh qryvire gurz vagb zvar unaq? Naq gur YBEQ
fnvq hagb uvz, Tb hc; sbe V jvyy qryvire gurz vagb guvar unaq.

14:11 Fb gurl pnzr hc gb Onnycrenmvz; naq Qnivq fzbgr gurz gurer. Gura
Qnivq fnvq, Tbq ungu oebxra va hcba zvar rarzvrf ol zvar unaq yvxr gur
oernxvat sbegu bs jngref: gurersber gurl pnyyrq gur anzr bs gung cynpr
Onnycrenmvz.

14:12 Naq jura gurl unq yrsg gurve tbqf gurer, Qnivq tnir n
pbzznaqzrag, naq gurl jrer ohearq jvgu sver.

14:13 Naq gur Cuvyvfgvarf lrg ntnva fcernq gurzfryirf noebnq va gur
inyyrl.

14:14 Gurersber Qnivq radhverq ntnva bs Tbq; naq Tbq fnvq hagb uvz, Tb
abg hc nsgre gurz; ghea njnl sebz gurz, naq pbzr hcba gurz bire
ntnvafg gur zhyoreel gerrf.

14:15 Naq vg funyy or, jura gubh funyg urne n fbhaq bs tbvat va gur
gbcf bs gur zhyoreel gerrf, gung gura gubh funyg tb bhg gb onggyr: sbe
Tbq vf tbar sbegu orsber gurr gb fzvgr gur ubfg bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

14:16 Qnivq gurersber qvq nf Tbq pbzznaqrq uvz: naq gurl fzbgr gur
ubfg bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf sebz Tvorba rira gb Tnmre.

14:17 Naq gur snzr bs Qnivq jrag bhg vagb nyy ynaqf; naq gur YBEQ
oebhtug gur srne bs uvz hcba nyy angvbaf.

15:1 Naq Qnivq znqr uvz ubhfrf va gur pvgl bs Qnivq, naq cercnerq n
cynpr sbe gur nex bs Tbq, naq cvgpurq sbe vg n grag.

15:2 Gura Qnivq fnvq, Abar bhtug gb pneel gur nex bs Tbq ohg gur
Yrivgrf: sbe gurz ungu gur YBEQ pubfra gb pneel gur nex bs Tbq, naq gb
zvavfgre hagb uvz sbe rire.

15:3 Naq Qnivq tngurerq nyy Vfenry gbtrgure gb Wrehfnyrz, gb oevat hc
gur nex bs gur YBEQ hagb uvf cynpr, juvpu ur unq cercnerq sbe vg.

15:4 Naq Qnivq nffrzoyrq gur puvyqera bs Nneba, naq gur Yrivgrf: 15:5
Bs gur fbaf bs Xbungu; Hevry gur puvrs, naq uvf oerguera na uhaqerq
naq gjragl: 15:6 Bs gur fbaf bs Zrenev; Nfnvnu gur puvrs, naq uvf
oerguera gjb uhaqerq naq gjragl: 15:7 Bs gur fbaf bs Trefubz; Wbry gur
puvrs naq uvf oerguera na uhaqerq naq guvegl: 15:8 Bs gur fbaf bs
Ryvmncuna; Furznvnu gur puvrs, naq uvf oerguera gjb uhaqerq: 15:9 Bs
gur fbaf bs Uroeba; Ryvry gur puvrs, naq uvf oerguera sbhefpber: 15:10
Bs gur fbaf bs Hmmvry; Nzzvanqno gur puvrs, naq uvf oerguera na
uhaqerq naq gjryir.

15:11 Naq Qnivq pnyyrq sbe Mnqbx naq Novngune gur cevrfgf, naq sbe gur
Yrivgrf, sbe Hevry, Nfnvnu, naq Wbry, Furznvnu, naq Ryvry, naq
Nzzvanqno, 15:12 Naq fnvq hagb gurz, Lr ner gur puvrs bs gur snguref
bs gur Yrivgrf: fnapgvsl lbhefryirf, obgu lr naq lbhe oerguera, gung
lr znl oevat hc gur nex bs gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry hagb gur cynpr gung
V unir cercnerq sbe vg.

15:13 Sbe orpnhfr lr qvq vg abg ng gur svefg, gur YBEQ bhe Tbq znqr n
oernpu hcba hf, sbe gung jr fbhtug uvz abg nsgre gur qhr beqre.

15:14 Fb gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf fnapgvsvrq gurzfryirf gb oevat hc
gur nex bs gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry.

15:15 Naq gur puvyqera bs gur Yrivgrf oner gur nex bs Tbq hcba gurve
fubhyqref jvgu gur fgnirf gurerba, nf Zbfrf pbzznaqrq nppbeqvat gb gur
jbeq bs gur YBEQ.

15:16 Naq Qnivq fcnxr gb gur puvrs bs gur Yrivgrf gb nccbvag gurve
oerguera gb or gur fvatref jvgu vafgehzragf bs zhfvpx, cfnygrevrf naq
unecf naq plzonyf, fbhaqvat, ol yvsgvat hc gur ibvpr jvgu wbl.

15:17 Fb gur Yrivgrf nccbvagrq Urzna gur fba bs Wbry; naq bs uvf
oerguera, Nfncu gur fba bs Orerpuvnu; naq bs gur fbaf bs Zrenev gurve
oerguera, Rguna gur fba bs Xhfunvnu; 15:18 Naq jvgu gurz gurve
oerguera bs gur frpbaq qrterr, Mrpunevnu, Ora, naq Wnnmvry, naq
Furzvenzbgu, naq Wruvry, naq Haav, Ryvno, naq Oranvnu, naq Znnfrvnu,
naq Znggvguvnu, naq Ryvcuryru, naq Zvxarvnu, naq Borqrqbz, naq Wrvry,
gur cbegref.

15:19 Fb gur fvatref, Urzna, Nfncu, naq Rguna, jrer nccbvagrq gb fbhaq
jvgu plzonyf bs oenff; 15:20 Naq Mrpunevnu, naq Nmvry, naq
Furzvenzbgu, naq Wruvry, naq Haav, naq Ryvno, naq Znnfrvnu, naq
Oranvnu, jvgu cfnygrevrf ba Nynzbgu; 15:21 Naq Znggvguvnu, naq
Ryvcuryru, naq Zvxarvnu, naq Borqrqbz, naq Wrvry, naq Nmnmvnu, jvgu
unecf ba gur Furzvavgu gb rkpry.

15:22 Naq Puranavnu, puvrs bs gur Yrivgrf, jnf sbe fbat: ur vafgehpgrq
nobhg gur fbat, orpnhfr ur jnf fxvyshy.

15:23 Naq Orerpuvnu naq Ryxnanu jrer qbbexrrcref sbe gur nex.

15:24 Naq Furonavnu, naq Wrubfuncung, naq Argunarry, naq Nznfnv, naq
Mrpunevnu, naq Oranvnu, naq Ryvrmre, gur cevrfgf, qvq oybj jvgu gur
gehzcrgf orsber gur nex bs Tbq: naq Borqrqbz naq Wruvnu jrer
qbbexrrcref sbe gur nex.

15:25 Fb Qnivq, naq gur ryqref bs Vfenry, naq gur pncgnvaf bire
gubhfnaqf, jrag gb oevat hc gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ bhg bs
gur ubhfr bs Borqrqbz jvgu wbl.

15:26 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Tbq urycrq gur Yrivgrf gung oner gur
nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ, gung gurl bssrerq frira ohyybpxf naq
frira enzf.

15:27 Naq Qnivq jnf pybgurq jvgu n ebor bs svar yvara, naq nyy gur
Yrivgrf gung oner gur nex, naq gur fvatref, naq Puranavnu gur znfgre
bs gur fbat jvgu gur fvatref: Qnivq nyfb unq hcba uvz na rcubq bs
yvara.

15:28 Guhf nyy Vfenry oebhtug hc gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ
jvgu fubhgvat, naq jvgu fbhaq bs gur pbearg, naq jvgu gehzcrgf, naq
jvgu plzonyf, znxvat n abvfr jvgu cfnygrevrf naq unecf.

15:29 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ pnzr
gb gur pvgl bs Qnivq, gung Zvpuny, gur qnhtugre bs Fnhy ybbxvat bhg ng
n jvaqbj fnj xvat Qnivq qnapvat naq cynlvat: naq fur qrfcvfrq uvz va
ure urneg.

16:1 Fb gurl oebhtug gur nex bs Tbq, naq frg vg va gur zvqfg bs gur
grag gung Qnivq unq cvgpurq sbe vg: naq gurl bssrerq oheag fnpevsvprf
naq crnpr bssrevatf orsber Tbq.

16:2 Naq jura Qnivq unq znqr na raq bs bssrevat gur oheag bssrevatf
naq gur crnpr bssrevatf, ur oyrffrq gur crbcyr va gur anzr bs gur
YBEQ.

16:3 Naq ur qrnyg gb rirel bar bs Vfenry, obgu zna naq jbzna, gb rirel
bar n ybns bs oernq, naq n tbbq cvrpr bs syrfu, naq n syntba bs jvar.

16:4 Naq ur nccbvagrq pregnva bs gur Yrivgrf gb zvavfgre orsber gur
nex bs gur YBEQ, naq gb erpbeq, naq gb gunax naq cenvfr gur YBEQ Tbq
bs Vfenry: 16:5 Nfncu gur puvrs, naq arkg gb uvz Mrpunevnu, Wrvry, naq
Furzvenzbgu, naq Wruvry, naq Znggvguvnu, naq Ryvno, naq Oranvnu, naq
Borqrqbz: naq Wrvry jvgu cfnygrevrf naq jvgu unecf; ohg Nfncu znqr n
fbhaq jvgu plzonyf; 16:6 Oranvnu nyfb naq Wnunmvry gur cevrfgf jvgu
gehzcrgf pbagvahnyyl orsber gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs Tbq.

16:7 Gura ba gung qnl Qnivq qryvirerq svefg guvf cfnyz gb gunax gur
YBEQ vagb gur unaq bs Nfncu naq uvf oerguera.

16:8 Tvir gunaxf hagb gur YBEQ, pnyy hcba uvf anzr, znxr xabja uvf
qrrqf nzbat gur crbcyr.

16:9 Fvat hagb uvz, fvat cfnyzf hagb uvz, gnyx lr bs nyy uvf jbaqebhf
jbexf.

16:10 Tybel lr va uvf ubyl anzr: yrg gur urneg bs gurz erwbvpr gung
frrx gur YBEQ.

16:11 Frrx gur YBEQ naq uvf fgeratgu, frrx uvf snpr pbagvahnyyl.

16:12 Erzrzore uvf zneiryybhf jbexf gung ur ungu qbar, uvf jbaqref,
naq gur whqtzragf bs uvf zbhgu; 16:13 B lr frrq bs Vfenry uvf freinag,
lr puvyqera bs Wnpbo, uvf pubfra barf.

16:14 Ur vf gur YBEQ bhe Tbq; uvf whqtzragf ner va nyy gur rnegu.

16:15 Or lr zvaqshy nyjnlf bs uvf pbiranag; gur jbeq juvpu ur
pbzznaqrq gb n gubhfnaq trarengvbaf; 16:16 Rira bs gur pbiranag juvpu
ur znqr jvgu Noenunz, naq bs uvf bngu hagb Vfnnp; 16:17 Naq ungu
pbasvezrq gur fnzr gb Wnpbo sbe n ynj, naq gb Vfenry sbe na
rireynfgvat pbiranag, 16:18 Fnlvat, Hagb gurr jvyy V tvir gur ynaq bs
Pnanna, gur ybg bs lbhe vaurevgnapr; 16:19 Jura lr jrer ohg srj, rira
n srj, naq fgenatref va vg.

16:20 Naq jura gurl jrag sebz angvba gb angvba, naq sebz bar xvatqbz
gb nabgure crbcyr; 16:21 Ur fhssrerq ab zna gb qb gurz jebat: lrn, ur
ercebirq xvatf sbe gurve fnxrf, 16:22 Fnlvat, Gbhpu abg zvar nabvagrq,
naq qb zl cebcurgf ab unez.

16:23 Fvat hagb gur YBEQ, nyy gur rnegu; furj sbegu sebz qnl gb qnl
uvf fnyingvba.

16:24 Qrpyner uvf tybel nzbat gur urngura; uvf zneiryybhf jbexf nzbat
nyy angvbaf.

16:25 Sbe terng vf gur YBEQ, naq terngyl gb or cenvfrq: ur nyfb vf gb
or srnerq nobir nyy tbqf.

16:26 Sbe nyy gur tbqf bs gur crbcyr ner vqbyf: ohg gur YBEQ znqr gur
urniraf.

16:27 Tybel naq ubabhe ner va uvf cerfrapr; fgeratgu naq tynqarff ner
va uvf cynpr.

16:28 Tvir hagb gur YBEQ, lr xvaqerqf bs gur crbcyr, tvir hagb gur
YBEQ tybel naq fgeratgu.

16:29 Tvir hagb gur YBEQ gur tybel qhr hagb uvf anzr: oevat na
bssrevat, naq pbzr orsber uvz: jbefuvc gur YBEQ va gur ornhgl bs
ubyvarff.

16:30 Srne orsber uvz, nyy gur rnegu: gur jbeyq nyfb funyy or fgnoyr,
gung vg or abg zbirq.

16:31 Yrg gur urniraf or tynq, naq yrg gur rnegu erwbvpr: naq yrg zra
fnl nzbat gur angvbaf, Gur YBEQ ervtargu.

16:32 Yrg gur frn ebne, naq gur shyarff gurerbs: yrg gur svryqf
erwbvpr, naq nyy gung vf gurerva.

16:33 Gura funyy gur gerrf bs gur jbbq fvat bhg ng gur cerfrapr bs gur
YBEQ, orpnhfr ur pbzrgu gb whqtr gur rnegu.

16:34 B tvir gunaxf hagb gur YBEQ; sbe ur vf tbbq; sbe uvf zrepl
raqhergu sbe rire.

16:35 Naq fnl lr, Fnir hf, B Tbq bs bhe fnyingvba, naq tngure hf
gbtrgure, naq qryvire hf sebz gur urngura, gung jr znl tvir gunaxf gb
gul ubyl anzr, naq tybel va gul cenvfr.

16:36 Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry sbe rire naq rire. Naq nyy gur
crbcyr fnvq, Nzra, naq cenvfrq gur YBEQ.

16:37 Fb ur yrsg gurer orsber gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ
Nfncu naq uvf oerguera, gb zvavfgre orsber gur nex pbagvahnyyl, nf
rirel qnl'f jbex erdhverq: 16:38 Naq Borqrqbz jvgu gurve oerguera,
guerrfpber naq rvtug; Borqrqbz nyfb gur fba bs Wrqhguha naq Ubfnu gb
or cbegref: 16:39 Naq Mnqbx gur cevrfg, naq uvf oerguera gur cevrfgf,
orsber gur gnoreanpyr bs gur YBEQ va gur uvtu cynpr gung jnf ng
Tvorba, 16:40 Gb bssre oheag bssrevatf hagb gur YBEQ hcba gur nygne bs
gur oheag bssrevat pbagvahnyyl zbeavat naq riravat, naq gb qb
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung vf jevggra va gur ynj bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur
pbzznaqrq Vfenry; 16:41 Naq jvgu gurz Urzna naq Wrqhguha, naq gur erfg
gung jrer pubfra, jub jrer rkcerffrq ol anzr, gb tvir gunaxf gb gur
YBEQ, orpnhfr uvf zrepl raqhergu sbe rire; 16:42 Naq jvgu gurz Urzna
naq Wrqhguha jvgu gehzcrgf naq plzonyf sbe gubfr gung fubhyq znxr n
fbhaq, naq jvgu zhfvpny vafgehzragf bs Tbq. Naq gur fbaf bs Wrqhguha
jrer cbegref.

16:43 Naq nyy gur crbcyr qrcnegrq rirel zna gb uvf ubhfr: naq Qnivq
erghearq gb oyrff uvf ubhfr.

17:1 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff, nf Qnivq fng va uvf ubhfr, gung Qnivq fnvq
gb Anguna gur cebcurg, Yb, V qjryy va na ubhfr bs prqnef, ohg gur nex
bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ erznvargu haqre phegnvaf.

17:2 Gura Anguna fnvq hagb Qnivq, Qb nyy gung vf va guvar urneg; sbe
Tbq vf jvgu gurr.

17:3 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff gur fnzr avtug, gung gur jbeq bs Tbq pnzr gb
Anguna, fnlvat, 17:4 Tb naq gryy Qnivq zl freinag, Guhf fnvgu gur
YBEQ, Gubh funyg abg ohvyq zr na ubhfr gb qjryy va: 17:5 Sbe V unir
abg qjryg va na ubhfr fvapr gur qnl gung V oebhtug hc Vfenry hagb guvf
qnl; ohg unir tbar sebz grag gb grag, naq sebz bar gnoreanpyr gb
nabgure.

17:6 Jurerfbrire V unir jnyxrq jvgu nyy Vfenry, fcnxr V n jbeq gb nal
bs gur whqtrf bs Vfenry, jubz V pbzznaqrq gb srrq zl crbcyr, fnlvat,
Jul unir lr abg ohvyg zr na ubhfr bs prqnef?  17:7 Abj gurersber guhf
funyg gubh fnl hagb zl freinag Qnivq, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ bs ubfgf, V
