gbbx gurr sebz gur furrcpbgr, rira sebz sbyybjvat gur furrc, gung gubh
fubhyqrfg or ehyre bire zl crbcyr Vfenry: 17:8 Naq V unir orra jvgu
gurr juvgurefbrire gubh unfg jnyxrq, naq unir phg bss nyy guvar
rarzvrf sebz orsber gurr, naq unir znqr gurr n anzr yvxr gur anzr bs
gur terng zra gung ner va gur rnegu.

17:9 Nyfb V jvyy beqnva n cynpr sbe zl crbcyr Vfenry, naq jvyy cynag
gurz, naq gurl funyy qjryy va gurve cynpr, naq funyy or zbirq ab zber;
arvgure funyy gur puvyqera bs jvpxrqarff jnfgr gurz nal zber, nf ng
gur ortvaavat, 17:10 Naq fvapr gur gvzr gung V pbzznaqrq whqtrf gb or
bire zl crbcyr Vfenry. Zberbire V jvyy fhoqhr nyy guvar rarzvrf.
Shegurezber V gryy gurr gung gur YBEQ jvyy ohvyq gurr na ubhfr.

17:11 Naq vg funyy pbzr gb cnff, jura gul qnlf or rkcverq gung gubh
zhfg tb gb or jvgu gul snguref, gung V jvyy envfr hc gul frrq nsgre
gurr, juvpu funyy or bs gul fbaf; naq V jvyy rfgnoyvfu uvf xvatqbz.

17:12 Ur funyy ohvyq zr na ubhfr, naq V jvyy fgnoyvfu uvf guebar sbe
rire.

17:13 V jvyy or uvf sngure, naq ur funyy or zl fba: naq V jvyy abg
gnxr zl zrepl njnl sebz uvz, nf V gbbx vg sebz uvz gung jnf orsber
gurr: 17:14 Ohg V jvyy frggyr uvz va zvar ubhfr naq va zl xvatqbz sbe
rire: naq uvf guebar funyy or rfgnoyvfurq sbe rirezber.

17:15 Nppbeqvat gb nyy gurfr jbeqf, naq nppbeqvat gb nyy guvf ivfvba,
fb qvq Anguna fcrnx hagb Qnivq.

17:16 Naq Qnivq gur xvat pnzr naq fng orsber gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, Jub
nz V, B YBEQ Tbq, naq jung vf zvar ubhfr, gung gubh unfg oebhtug zr
uvguregb?  17:17 Naq lrg guvf jnf n fznyy guvat va guvar rlrf, B Tbq;
sbe gubh unfg nyfb fcbxra bs gul freinag'f ubhfr sbe n terng juvyr gb
pbzr, naq unfg ertneqrq zr nppbeqvat gb gur rfgngr bs n zna bs uvtu
qrterr, B YBEQ Tbq.

17:18 Jung pna Qnivq fcrnx zber gb gurr sbe gur ubabhe bs gul freinag?
sbe gubh xabjrfg gul freinag.

17:19 B YBEQ, sbe gul freinag'f fnxr, naq nppbeqvat gb guvar bja
urneg, unfg gubh qbar nyy guvf terngarff, va znxvat xabja nyy gurfr
terng guvatf.

17:20 B YBEQ, gurer vf abar yvxr gurr, arvgure vf gurer nal Tbq orfvqr
gurr, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung jr unir urneq jvgu bhe rnef.

17:21 Naq jung bar angvba va gur rnegu vf yvxr gul crbcyr Vfenry, jubz
Tbq jrag gb erqrrz gb or uvf bja crbcyr, gb znxr gurr n anzr bs
terngarff naq greevoyrarff, ol qevivat bhg angvbaf sebz orsber gul
crbcyr jubz gubh unfg erqrrzrq bhg bs Rtlcg?  17:22 Sbe gul crbcyr
Vfenry qvqfg gubh znxr guvar bja crbcyr sbe rire; naq gubh, YBEQ,
orpnzrfg gurve Tbq.

17:23 Gurersber abj, YBEQ, yrg gur guvat gung gubh unfg fcbxra
pbapreavat gul freinag naq pbapreavat uvf ubhfr or rfgnoyvfurq sbe
rire, naq qb nf gubh unfg fnvq.

17:24 Yrg vg rira or rfgnoyvfurq, gung gul anzr znl or zntavsvrq sbe
rire, fnlvat, Gur YBEQ bs ubfgf vf gur Tbq bs Vfenry, rira n Tbq gb
Vfenry: naq yrg gur ubhfr bs Qnivq gul freinag or rfgnoyvfurq orsber
gurr.

17:25 Sbe gubh, B zl Tbq, unfg gbyq gul freinag gung gubh jvyg ohvyq
uvz na ubhfr: gurersber gul freinag ungu sbhaq va uvf urneg gb cenl
orsber gurr.

17:26 Naq abj, YBEQ, gubh neg Tbq, naq unfg cebzvfrq guvf tbbqarff
hagb gul freinag: 17:27 Abj gurersber yrg vg cyrnfr gurr gb oyrff gur
ubhfr bs gul freinag, gung vg znl or orsber gurr sbe rire: sbe gubh
oyrffrfg, B YBEQ, naq vg funyy or oyrffrq sbe rire.

18:1 Abj nsgre guvf vg pnzr gb cnff, gung Qnivq fzbgr gur Cuvyvfgvarf,
naq fhoqhrq gurz, naq gbbx Tngu naq ure gbjaf bhg bs gur unaq bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf.

18:2 Naq ur fzbgr Zbno; naq gur Zbnovgrf orpnzr Qnivq'f freinagf, naq
oebhtug tvsgf.

18:3 Naq Qnivq fzbgr Unqnermre xvat bs Mbonu hagb Unzngu, nf ur jrag
gb fgnoyvfu uvf qbzvavba ol gur evire Rhcuengrf.

18:4 Naq Qnivq gbbx sebz uvz n gubhfnaq punevbgf, naq frira gubhfnaq
ubefrzra, naq gjragl gubhfnaq sbbgzra: Qnivq nyfb ubhturq nyy gur
punevbg ubefrf, ohg erfreirq bs gurz na uhaqerq punevbgf.

18:5 Naq jura gur Flevnaf bs Qnznfphf pnzr gb uryc Unqnermre xvat bs
Mbonu, Qnivq fyrj bs gur Flevnaf gjb naq gjragl gubhfnaq zra.

18:6 Gura Qnivq chg tneevfbaf va Flevnqnznfphf; naq gur Flevnaf orpnzr
Qnivq'f freinagf, naq oebhtug tvsgf. Guhf gur YBEQ cerfreirq Qnivq
juvgurefbrire ur jrag.

18:7 Naq Qnivq gbbx gur fuvryqf bs tbyq gung jrer ba gur freinagf bs
Unqnermre, naq oebhtug gurz gb Wrehfnyrz.

18:8 Yvxrjvfr sebz Gvoungu, naq sebz Puha, pvgvrf bs Unqnermre,
oebhtug Qnivq irel zhpu oenff, jurerjvgu Fbybzba znqr gur oenfra frn,
naq gur cvyynef, naq gur irffryf bs oenff.

18:9 Abj jura Gbh xvat bs Unzngu urneq ubj Qnivq unq fzvggra nyy gur
ubfg bs Unqnermre xvat bs Mbonu; 18:10 Ur frag Unqbenz uvf fba gb xvat
Qnivq, gb radhver bs uvf jrysner, naq gb pbatenghyngr uvz, orpnhfr ur
unq sbhtug ntnvafg Unqnermre, naq fzvggra uvz; (sbe Unqnermre unq jne
jvgu Gbh;) naq jvgu uvz nyy znaare bs irffryf bs tbyq naq fvyire naq
oenff.

18:11 Gurz nyfb xvat Qnivq qrqvpngrq hagb gur YBEQ, jvgu gur fvyire
naq gur tbyq gung ur oebhtug sebz nyy gurfr angvbaf; sebz Rqbz, naq
sebz Zbno, naq sebz gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, naq sebz gur Cuvyvfgvarf,
naq sebz Nznyrx.

18:12 Zberbire Novfunv gur fba bs Mrehvnu fyrj bs gur Rqbzvgrf va gur
inyyrl bs fnyg rvtugrra gubhfnaq.

18:13 Naq ur chg tneevfbaf va Rqbz; naq nyy gur Rqbzvgrf orpnzr
Qnivq'f freinagf. Guhf gur YBEQ cerfreirq Qnivq juvgurefbrire ur jrag.

18:14 Fb Qnivq ervtarq bire nyy Vfenry, naq rkrphgrq whqtzrag naq
whfgvpr nzbat nyy uvf crbcyr.

18:15 Naq Wbno gur fba bs Mrehvnu jnf bire gur ubfg; naq Wrubfuncung
gur fba bs Nuvyhq, erpbeqre.

18:16 Naq Mnqbx gur fba bs Nuvgho, naq Novzryrpu gur fba bs Novngune,
jrer gur cevrfgf; naq Funifun jnf fpevor; 18:17 Naq Oranvnu gur fba bs
Wrubvnqn jnf bire gur Purerguvgrf naq gur Cryrguvgrf; naq gur fbaf bs
Qnivq jrer puvrs nobhg gur xvat.

19:1 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre guvf, gung Anunfu gur xvat bs gur
puvyqera bs Nzzba qvrq, naq uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

19:2 Naq Qnivq fnvq, V jvyy furj xvaqarff hagb Unaha gur fba bs
Anunfu, orpnhfr uvf sngure furjrq xvaqarff gb zr. Naq Qnivq frag
zrffratref gb pbzsbeg uvz pbapreavat uvf sngure. Fb gur freinagf bs
Qnivq pnzr vagb gur ynaq bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba gb Unaha, gb pbzsbeg
uvz.

19:3 Ohg gur cevaprf bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba fnvq gb Unaha, Guvaxrfg
gubh gung Qnivq qbgu ubabhe gul sngure, gung ur ungu frag pbzsbegref
hagb gurr?  ner abg uvf freinagf pbzr hagb gurr sbe gb frnepu, naq gb
bireguebj, naq gb fcl bhg gur ynaq?  19:4 Jurersber Unaha gbbx Qnivq'f
freinagf, naq funirq gurz, naq phg bss gurve tnezragf va gur zvqfg
uneq ol gurve ohggbpxf, naq frag gurz njnl.

19:5 Gura gurer jrag pregnva, naq gbyq Qnivq ubj gur zra jrer freirq.
Naq ur frag gb zrrg gurz: sbe gur zra jrer terngyl nfunzrq. Naq gur
xvat fnvq, Gneel ng Wrevpub hagvy lbhe orneqf or tebja, naq gura
erghea.

19:6 Naq jura gur puvyqera bs Nzzba fnj gung gurl unq znqr gurzfryirf
bqvbhf gb Qnivq, Unaha naq gur puvyqera bs Nzzba frag n gubhfnaq
gnyragf bs fvyire gb uver gurz punevbgf naq ubefrzra bhg bs
Zrfbcbgnzvn, naq bhg bs Flevnznnpunu, naq bhg bs Mbonu.

19:7 Fb gurl uverq guvegl naq gjb gubhfnaq punevbgf, naq gur xvat bs
Znnpunu naq uvf crbcyr; jub pnzr naq cvgpurq orsber Zrqron. Naq gur
puvyqera bs Nzzba tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure sebz gurve pvgvrf, naq
pnzr gb onggyr.

19:8 Naq jura Qnivq urneq bs vg, ur frag Wbno, naq nyy gur ubfg bs gur
zvtugl zra.

19:9 Naq gur puvyqera bs Nzzba pnzr bhg, naq chg gur onggyr va neenl
orsber gur tngr bs gur pvgl: naq gur xvatf gung jrer pbzr jrer ol
gurzfryirf va gur svryq.

19:10 Abj jura Wbno fnj gung gur onggyr jnf frg ntnvafg uvz orsber naq
oruvaq, ur pubfr bhg bs nyy gur pubvpr bs Vfenry, naq chg gurz va
neenl ntnvafg gur Flevnaf.

19:11 Naq gur erfg bs gur crbcyr ur qryvirerq hagb gur unaq bs Novfunv
uvf oebgure, naq gurl frg gurzfryirf va neenl ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs
Nzzba.

19:12 Naq ur fnvq, Vs gur Flevnaf or gbb fgebat sbe zr, gura gubh
funyg uryc zr: ohg vs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba or gbb fgebat sbe gurr,
gura V jvyy uryc gurr.

19:13 Or bs tbbq pbhentr, naq yrg hf orunir bhefryirf inyvnagyl sbe
bhe crbcyr, naq sbe gur pvgvrf bs bhe Tbq: naq yrg gur YBEQ qb gung
juvpu vf tbbq va uvf fvtug.

19:14 Fb Wbno naq gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz qerj avtu orsber gur
Flevnaf hagb gur onggyr; naq gurl syrq orsber uvz.

19:15 Naq jura gur puvyqera bs Nzzba fnj gung gur Flevnaf jrer syrq,
gurl yvxrjvfr syrq orsber Novfunv uvf oebgure, naq ragrerq vagb gur
pvgl. Gura Wbno pnzr gb Wrehfnyrz.

19:16 Naq jura gur Flevnaf fnj gung gurl jrer chg gb gur jbefr orsber
Vfenry, gurl frag zrffratref, naq qerj sbegu gur Flevnaf gung jrer
orlbaq gur evire: naq Fubcunpu gur pncgnva bs gur ubfg bs Unqnermre
jrag orsber gurz.

19:17 Naq vg jnf gbyq Qnivq; naq ur tngurerq nyy Vfenry, naq cnffrq
bire Wbeqna, naq pnzr hcba gurz, naq frg gur onggyr va neenl ntnvafg
gurz. Fb jura Qnivq unq chg gur onggyr va neenl ntnvafg gur Flevnaf,
gurl sbhtug jvgu uvz.

19:18 Ohg gur Flevnaf syrq orsber Vfenry; naq Qnivq fyrj bs gur
Flevnaf frira gubhfnaq zra juvpu sbhtug va punevbgf, naq sbegl
gubhfnaq sbbgzra, naq xvyyrq Fubcunpu gur pncgnva bs gur ubfg.

19:19 Naq jura gur freinagf bs Unqnermre fnj gung gurl jrer chg gb gur
jbefr orsber Vfenry, gurl znqr crnpr jvgu Qnivq, naq orpnzr uvf
freinagf: arvgure jbhyq gur Flevnaf uryc gur puvyqera bs Nzzba nal
zber.

20:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung nsgre gur lrne jnf rkcverq, ng gur gvzr
gung xvatf tb bhg gb onggyr, Wbno yrq sbegu gur cbjre bs gur nezl, naq
jnfgrq gur pbhagel bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, naq pnzr naq orfvrtrq
Enoonu. Ohg Qnivq gneevrq ng Wrehfnyrz. Naq Wbno fzbgr Enoonu, naq
qrfgeblrq vg.

20:2 Naq Qnivq gbbx gur pebja bs gurve xvat sebz bss uvf urnq, naq
sbhaq vg gb jrvtu n gnyrag bs tbyq, naq gurer jrer cerpvbhf fgbarf va
vg; naq vg jnf frg hcba Qnivq'f urnq: naq ur oebhtug nyfb rkprrqvat
zhpu fcbvy bhg bs gur pvgl.

20:3 Naq ur oebhtug bhg gur crbcyr gung jrer va vg, naq phg gurz jvgu
fnjf, naq jvgu uneebjf bs veba, naq jvgu nkrf. Rira fb qrnyg Qnivq
jvgu nyy gur pvgvrf bs gur puvyqera bs Nzzba. Naq Qnivq naq nyy gur
crbcyr erghearq gb Wrehfnyrz.

20:4 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre guvf, gung gurer nebfr jne ng Trmre
jvgu gur Cuvyvfgvarf; ng juvpu gvzr Fvoorpunv gur Uhfunguvgr fyrj
Fvccnv, gung jnf bs gur puvyqera bs gur tvnag: naq gurl jrer fhoqhrq.

20:5 Naq gurer jnf jne ntnva jvgu gur Cuvyvfgvarf; naq Ryunana gur fba
bs Wnve fyrj Ynuzv gur oebgure bs Tbyvngu gur Tvggvgr, jubfr fcrne
fgnss jnf yvxr n jrnire'f ornz.

20:6 Naq lrg ntnva gurer jnf jne ng Tngu, jurer jnf n zna bs terng
fgngher, jubfr svatref naq gbrf jrer sbhe naq gjragl, fvk ba rnpu
unaq, naq fvk ba rnpu sbbg naq ur nyfb jnf gur fba bs gur tvnag.

20:7 Ohg jura ur qrsvrq Vfenry, Wbanguna gur fba bs Fuvzrn Qnivq'f
oebgure fyrj uvz.

20:8 Gurfr jrer obea hagb gur tvnag va Tngu; naq gurl sryy ol gur unaq
bs Qnivq, naq ol gur unaq bs uvf freinagf.

21:1 Naq Fngna fgbbq hc ntnvafg Vfenry, naq cebibxrq Qnivq gb ahzore
Vfenry.

21:2 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Wbno naq gb gur ehyref bs gur crbcyr, Tb,
ahzore Vfenry sebz Orrefuron rira gb Qna; naq oevat gur ahzore bs gurz
gb zr, gung V znl xabj vg.

21:3 Naq Wbno nafjrerq, Gur YBEQ znxr uvf crbcyr na uhaqerq gvzrf fb
znal zber nf gurl or: ohg, zl ybeq gur xvat, ner gurl abg nyy zl
ybeq'f freinagf?  jul gura qbgu zl ybeq erdhver guvf guvat? jul jvyy
ur or n pnhfr bs gerfcnff gb Vfenry?  21:4 Arireguryrff gur xvat'f
jbeq cerinvyrq ntnvafg Wbno. Jurersber Wbno qrcnegrq, naq jrag
guebhtubhg nyy Vfenry, naq pnzr gb Wrehfnyrz.

21:5 Naq Wbno tnir gur fhz bs gur ahzore bs gur crbcyr hagb Qnivq. Naq
nyy gurl bs Vfenry jrer n gubhfnaq gubhfnaq naq na uhaqerq gubhfnaq
zra gung qerj fjbeq: naq Whqnu jnf sbhe uhaqerq guerrfpber naq gra
gubhfnaq zra gung qerj fjbeq.

21:6 Ohg Yriv naq Orawnzva pbhagrq ur abg nzbat gurz: sbe gur xvat'f
jbeq jnf nobzvanoyr gb Wbno.

21:7 Naq Tbq jnf qvfcyrnfrq jvgu guvf guvat; gurersber ur fzbgr
Vfenry.

21:8 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Tbq, V unir fvaarq terngyl, orpnhfr V unir
qbar guvf guvat: ohg abj, V orfrrpu gurr, qb njnl gur vavdhvgl bs gul
freinag; sbe V unir qbar irel sbbyvfuyl.

21:9 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr hagb Tnq, Qnivq'f frre, fnlvat, 21:10 Tb naq
gryy Qnivq, fnlvat, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, V bssre gurr guerr guvatf:
pubbfr gurr bar bs gurz, gung V znl qb vg hagb gurr.

21:11 Fb Tnq pnzr gb Qnivq, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ,
Pubbfr gurr 21:12 Rvgure guerr lrnef' snzvar; be guerr zbaguf gb or
qrfgeblrq orsber gul sbrf, juvyr gung gur fjbeq bs guvar rarzvrf
biregnxrgu gurr; be ryfr guerr qnlf gur fjbeq bs gur YBEQ, rira gur
crfgvyrapr, va gur ynaq, naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ qrfgeblvat
guebhtubhg nyy gur pbnfgf bs Vfenry. Abj gurersber nqivfr gulfrys jung
jbeq V funyy oevat ntnva gb uvz gung frag zr.

21:13 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Tnq, V nz va n terng fgenvg: yrg zr snyy abj
vagb gur unaq bs gur YBEQ; sbe irel terng ner uvf zrepvrf: ohg yrg zr
abg snyy vagb gur unaq bs zna.

21:14 Fb gur YBEQ frag crfgvyrapr hcba Vfenry: naq gurer sryy bs
Vfenry friragl gubhfnaq zra.

21:15 Naq Tbq frag na natry hagb Wrehfnyrz gb qrfgebl vg: naq nf ur
jnf qrfgeblvat, gur YBEQ oruryq, naq ur ercragrq uvz bs gur rivy, naq
fnvq gb gur natry gung qrfgeblrq, Vg vf rabhtu, fgnl abj guvar unaq.
Naq gur natry bs gur YBEQ fgbbq ol gur guerfuvatsybbe bs Beana gur
Wrohfvgr.

21:16 Naq Qnivq yvsgrq hc uvf rlrf, naq fnj gur natry bs gur YBEQ
fgnaq orgjrra gur rnegu naq gur urnira, univat n qenja fjbeq va uvf
unaq fgergpurq bhg bire Wrehfnyrz. Gura Qnivq naq gur ryqref bs
Vfenry, jub jrer pybgurq va fnpxpybgu, sryy hcba gurve snprf.

21:17 Naq Qnivq fnvq hagb Tbq, Vf vg abg V gung pbzznaqrq gur crbcyr
gb or ahzorerq? rira V vg vf gung unir fvaarq naq qbar rivy vaqrrq;
ohg nf sbe gurfr furrc, jung unir gurl qbar? yrg guvar unaq, V cenl
gurr, B YBEQ zl Tbq, or ba zr, naq ba zl sngure'f ubhfr; ohg abg ba
gul crbcyr, gung gurl fubhyq or cynthrq.

21:18 Gura gur natry bs gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq Tnq gb fnl gb Qnivq, gung
Qnivq fubhyq tb hc, naq frg hc na nygne hagb gur YBEQ va gur
guerfuvatsybbe bs Beana gur Wrohfvgr.

21:19 Naq Qnivq jrag hc ng gur fnlvat bs Tnq, juvpu ur fcnxr va gur
anzr bs gur YBEQ.

21:20 Naq Beana ghearq onpx, naq fnj gur natry; naq uvf sbhe fbaf jvgu
uvz uvq gurzfryirf. Abj Beana jnf guerfuvat jurng.

21:21 Naq nf Qnivq pnzr gb Beana, Beana ybbxrq naq fnj Qnivq, naq jrag
bhg bs gur guerfuvatsybbe, naq objrq uvzfrys gb Qnivq jvgu uvf snpr gb
gur tebhaq.

21:22 Gura Qnivq fnvq gb Beana, Tenag zr gur cynpr bs guvf
guerfuvatsybbe, gung V znl ohvyq na nygne gurerva hagb gur YBEQ: gubh
funyg tenag vg zr sbe gur shyy cevpr: gung gur cynthr znl or fgnlrq
sebz gur crbcyr.

21:23 Naq Beana fnvq hagb Qnivq, Gnxr vg gb gurr, naq yrg zl ybeq gur
xvat qb gung juvpu vf tbbq va uvf rlrf: yb, V tvir gurr gur bkra nyfb
sbe oheag bssrevatf, naq gur guerfuvat vafgehzragf sbe jbbq, naq gur
jurng sbe gur zrng bssrevat; V tvir vg nyy.

21:24 Naq xvat Qnivq fnvq gb Beana, Anl; ohg V jvyy irevyl ohl vg sbe
gur shyy cevpr: sbe V jvyy abg gnxr gung juvpu vf guvar sbe gur YBEQ,
abe bssre oheag bssrevatf jvgubhg pbfg.

21:25 Fb Qnivq tnir gb Beana sbe gur cynpr fvk uhaqerq furxryf bs tbyq
ol jrvtug.

21:26 Naq Qnivq ohvyg gurer na nygne hagb gur YBEQ, naq bssrerq oheag
bssrevatf naq crnpr bssrevatf, naq pnyyrq hcba gur YBEQ; naq ur
nafjrerq uvz sebz urnira ol sver hcba gur nygne bs oheag bssrevat.

21:27 Naq gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq gur natry; naq ur chg hc uvf fjbeq ntnva
vagb gur furngu gurerbs.

21:28 Ng gung gvzr jura Qnivq fnj gung gur YBEQ unq nafjrerq uvz va
gur guerfuvatsybbe bs Beana gur Wrohfvgr, gura ur fnpevsvprq gurer.

21:29 Sbe gur gnoreanpyr bs gur YBEQ, juvpu Zbfrf znqr va gur
jvyqrearff, naq gur nygne bs gur oheag bssrevat, jrer ng gung frnfba
va gur uvtu cynpr ng Tvorba.

21:30 Ohg Qnivq pbhyq abg tb orsber vg gb radhver bs Tbq: sbe ur jnf
nsenvq orpnhfr bs gur fjbeq bs gur natry bs gur YBEQ.

22:1 Gura Qnivq fnvq, Guvf vf gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ Tbq, naq guvf vf
gur nygne bs gur oheag bssrevat sbe Vfenry.

22:2 Naq Qnivq pbzznaqrq gb tngure gbtrgure gur fgenatref gung jrer va
gur ynaq bs Vfenry; naq ur frg znfbaf gb urj jebhtug fgbarf gb ohvyq
gur ubhfr bs Tbq.

22:3 Naq Qnivq cercnerq veba va nohaqnapr sbe gur anvyf sbe gur qbbef
bs gur tngrf, naq sbe gur wbvavatf; naq oenff va nohaqnapr jvgubhg
jrvtug; 22:4 Nyfb prqne gerrf va nohaqnapr: sbe gur Mvqbavnaf naq gurl
bs Gler oebhtug zhpu prqne jbbq gb Qnivq.

22:5 Naq Qnivq fnvq, Fbybzba zl fba vf lbhat naq graqre, naq gur ubhfr
gung vf gb or ohvyqrq sbe gur YBEQ zhfg or rkprrqvat zntavsvpny, bs
snzr naq bs tybel guebhtubhg nyy pbhagevrf: V jvyy gurersber abj znxr
cercnengvba sbe vg. Fb Qnivq cercnerq nohaqnagyl orsber uvf qrngu.

22:6 Gura ur pnyyrq sbe Fbybzba uvf fba, naq punetrq uvz gb ohvyq na
ubhfr sbe gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry.

22:7 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Fbybzba, Zl fba, nf sbe zr, vg jnf va zl zvaq
gb ohvyq na ubhfr hagb gur anzr bs gur YBEQ zl Tbq: 22:8 Ohg gur jbeq
bs gur YBEQ pnzr gb zr, fnlvat, Gubh unfg furq oybbq nohaqnagyl, naq
unfg znqr terng jnef: gubh funyg abg ohvyq na ubhfr hagb zl anzr,
orpnhfr gubh unfg furq zhpu oybbq hcba gur rnegu va zl fvtug.

22:9 Orubyq, n fba funyy or obea gb gurr, jub funyy or n zna bs erfg;
naq V jvyy tvir uvz erfg sebz nyy uvf rarzvrf ebhaq nobhg: sbe uvf
anzr funyy or Fbybzba, naq V jvyy tvir crnpr naq dhvrgarff hagb Vfenry
va uvf qnlf.

22:10 Ur funyy ohvyq na ubhfr sbe zl anzr; naq ur funyy or zl fba, naq
V jvyy or uvf sngure; naq V jvyy rfgnoyvfu gur guebar bs uvf xvatqbz
bire Vfenry sbe rire.

22:11 Abj, zl fba, gur YBEQ or jvgu gurr; naq cebfcre gubh, naq ohvyq
gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ gul Tbq, nf ur ungu fnvq bs gurr.

22:12 Bayl gur YBEQ tvir gurr jvfqbz naq haqrefgnaqvat, naq tvir gurr
punetr pbapreavat Vfenry, gung gubh znlrfg xrrc gur ynj bs gur YBEQ
gul Tbq.

22:13 Gura funyg gubh cebfcre, vs gubh gnxrfg urrq gb shysvy gur
fgnghgrf naq whqtzragf juvpu gur YBEQ punetrq Zbfrf jvgu pbapreavat
Vfenry: or fgebat, naq bs tbbq pbhentr; qernq abg, abe or qvfznlrq.

22:14 Abj, orubyq, va zl gebhoyr V unir cercnerq sbe gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ na uhaqerq gubhfnaq gnyragf bs tbyq, naq n gubhfnaq gubhfnaq
gnyragf bs fvyire; naq bs oenff naq veba jvgubhg jrvtug; sbe vg vf va
nohaqnapr: gvzore nyfb naq fgbar unir V cercnerq; naq gubh znlrfg nqq
gurergb.

22:15 Zberbire gurer ner jbexzra jvgu gurr va nohaqnapr, urjref naq
jbexref bs fgbar naq gvzore, naq nyy znaare bs phaavat zra sbe rirel
znaare bs jbex.

22:16 Bs gur tbyq, gur fvyire, naq gur oenff, naq gur veba, gurer vf
ab ahzore. Nevfr gurersber, naq or qbvat, naq gur YBEQ or jvgu gurr.

22:17 Qnivq nyfb pbzznaqrq nyy gur cevaprf bs Vfenry gb uryc Fbybzba
uvf fba, fnlvat, 22:18 Vf abg gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq jvgu lbh? naq ungu ur
abg tvira lbh erfg ba rirel fvqr? sbe ur ungu tvira gur vaunovgnagf bs
gur ynaq vagb zvar unaq; naq gur ynaq vf fhoqhrq orsber gur YBEQ, naq
orsber uvf crbcyr.

22:19 Abj frg lbhe urneg naq lbhe fbhy gb frrx gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq;
nevfr gurersber, naq ohvyq lr gur fnapghnel bs gur YBEQ Tbq, gb oevat
gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ, naq gur ubyl irffryf bs Tbq, vagb
gur ubhfr gung vf gb or ohvyg gb gur anzr bs gur YBEQ.

23:1 Fb jura Qnivq jnf byq naq shyy bs qnlf, ur znqr Fbybzba uvf fba
xvat bire Vfenry.

23:2 Naq ur tngurerq gbtrgure nyy gur cevaprf bs Vfenry, jvgu gur
cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf.

23:3 Abj gur Yrivgrf jrer ahzorerq sebz gur ntr bs guvegl lrnef naq
hcjneq: naq gurve ahzore ol gurve cbyyf, zna ol zna, jnf guvegl naq
rvtug gubhfnaq.

23:4 Bs juvpu, gjragl naq sbhe gubhfnaq jrer gb frg sbejneq gur jbex
bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ; naq fvk gubhfnaq jrer bssvpref naq whqtrf:
23:5 Zberbire sbhe gubhfnaq jrer cbegref; naq sbhe gubhfnaq cenvfrq
gur YBEQ jvgu gur vafgehzragf juvpu V znqr, fnvq Qnivq, gb cenvfr
gurerjvgu.

23:6 Naq Qnivq qvivqrq gurz vagb pbhefrf nzbat gur fbaf bs Yriv,
anzryl, Trefuba, Xbungu, naq Zrenev.

23:7 Bs gur Trefubavgrf jrer, Ynnqna, naq Fuvzrv.

23:8 Gur fbaf bs Ynnqna; gur puvrs jnf Wruvry, naq Mrgunz, naq Wbry,
guerr.

23:9 Gur fbaf bs Fuvzrv; Furybzvgu, naq Unmvry, naq Unena, guerr.
Gurfr jrer gur puvrs bs gur snguref bs Ynnqna.

23:10 Naq gur fbaf bs Fuvzrv jrer, Wnungu, Mvan, naq Wrhfu, naq
Orevnu.

Gurfr sbhe jrer gur fbaf bs Fuvzrv.

23:11 Naq Wnungu jnf gur puvrs, naq Mvmnu gur frpbaq: ohg Wrhfu naq
Orevnu unq abg znal fbaf; gurersber gurl jrer va bar erpxbavat,
nppbeqvat gb gurve sngure'f ubhfr.

23:12 Gur fbaf bs Xbungu; Nzenz, Vmune, Uroeba, naq Hmmvry, sbhe.

23:13 Gur fbaf bs Nzenz; Nneba naq Zbfrf: naq Nneba jnf frcnengrq,
gung ur fubhyq fnapgvsl gur zbfg ubyl guvatf, ur naq uvf fbaf sbe
rire, gb ohea vaprafr orsber gur YBEQ, gb zvavfgre hagb uvz, naq gb
oyrff va uvf anzr sbe rire.

23:14 Abj pbapreavat Zbfrf gur zna bs Tbq, uvf fbaf jrer anzrq bs gur
gevor bs Yriv.

23:15 Gur fbaf bs Zbfrf jrer, Trefubz, naq Ryvrmre.

23:16 Bs gur fbaf bs Trefubz, Furohry jnf gur puvrs.

23:17 Naq gur fbaf bs Ryvrmre jrer, Erunovnu gur puvrs. Naq Ryvrmre
unq abar bgure fbaf; ohg gur fbaf bs Erunovnu jrer irel znal.

23:18 Bs gur fbaf bs Vmune; Furybzvgu gur puvrs.

23:19 Bs gur fbaf bs Uroeba; Wrevnu gur svefg, Nznevnu gur frpbaq,
Wnunmvry gur guveq, naq Wrxnzrnz gur sbhegu.

23:20 Bs gur fbaf bs Hmmvry; Zvpnu gur svefg naq Wrfvnu gur frpbaq.

23:21 Gur fbaf bs Zrenev; Znuyv, naq Zhfuv. Gur fbaf bs Znuyv;
Ryrnmne, naq Xvfu.

23:22 Naq Ryrnmne qvrq, naq unq ab fbaf, ohg qnhtugref: naq gurve
oerguera gur fbaf bs Xvfu gbbx gurz.

23:23 Gur fbaf bs Zhfuv; Znuyv, naq Rqre, naq Wrerzbgu, guerr.

23:24 Gurfr jrer gur fbaf bs Yriv nsgre gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref;
rira gur puvrs bs gur snguref, nf gurl jrer pbhagrq ol ahzore bs anzrf
ol gurve cbyyf, gung qvq gur jbex sbe gur freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ, sebz gur ntr bs gjragl lrnef naq hcjneq.

23:25 Sbe Qnivq fnvq, Gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry ungu tvira erfg hagb uvf
crbcyr, gung gurl znl qjryy va Wrehfnyrz sbe rire: 23:26 Naq nyfb hagb
gur Yrivgrf; gurl funyy ab zber pneel gur gnoreanpyr, abe nal irffryf
bs vg sbe gur freivpr gurerbs.

23:27 Sbe ol gur ynfg jbeqf bs Qnivq gur Yrivgrf jrer ahzorerq sebz
gjragl lrnef byq naq nobir: 23:28 Orpnhfr gurve bssvpr jnf gb jnvg ba
gur fbaf bs Nneba sbe gur freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, va gur
pbhegf, naq va gur punzoref, naq va gur chevslvat bs nyy ubyl guvatf,
naq gur jbex bs gur freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq; 23:29 Obgu sbe gur
furjoernq, naq sbe gur svar sybhe sbe zrng bssrevat, naq sbe gur
hayrnirarq pnxrf, naq sbe gung juvpu vf onxrq va gur cna, naq sbe gung
juvpu vf sevrq, naq sbe nyy znaare bs zrnfher naq fvmr; 23:30 Naq gb
fgnaq rirel zbeavat gb gunax naq cenvfr gur YBEQ, naq yvxrjvfr ng
rira: 23:31 Naq gb bssre nyy oheag fnpevsvprf hagb gur YBEQ va gur
fnoonguf, va gur arj zbbaf, naq ba gur frg srnfgf, ol ahzore,
nppbeqvat gb gur beqre pbzznaqrq hagb gurz, pbagvahnyyl orsber gur
YBEQ: 23:32 Naq gung gurl fubhyq xrrc gur punetr bs gur gnoreanpyr bs
gur pbatertngvba, naq gur punetr bs gur ubyl cynpr, naq gur punetr bs
gur fbaf bs Nneba gurve oerguera, va gur freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ.

24:1 Abj gurfr ner gur qvivfvbaf bs gur fbaf bs Nneba. Gur fbaf bs
Nneba; Anqno, naq Novuh, Ryrnmne, naq Vgunzne.

24:2 Ohg Anqno naq Novuh qvrq orsber gurve sngure, naq unq ab
puvyqera: gurersber Ryrnmne naq Vgunzne rkrphgrq gur cevrfg'f bssvpr.

24:3 Naq Qnivq qvfgevohgrq gurz, obgu Mnqbx bs gur fbaf bs Ryrnmne,
naq Nuvzryrpu bs gur fbaf bs Vgunzne, nppbeqvat gb gurve bssvprf va
gurve freivpr.

24:4 Naq gurer jrer zber puvrs zra sbhaq bs gur fbaf bs Ryrnmne guna
bs gur fbaf bs Vgunzne, naq guhf jrer gurl qvivqrq. Nzbat gur fbaf bs
Ryrnmne gurer jrer fvkgrra puvrs zra bs gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref,
naq rvtug nzbat gur fbaf bs Vgunzne nppbeqvat gb gur ubhfr bs gurve
snguref.

24:5 Guhf jrer gurl qvivqrq ol ybg, bar fbeg jvgu nabgure; sbe gur
tbireabef bs gur fnapghnel, naq tbireabef bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq, jrer bs
gur fbaf bs Ryrnmne, naq bs gur fbaf bs Vgunzne.

24:6 Naq Furznvnu gur fba bs Argunarry gur fpevor, bar bs gur Yrivgrf,
jebgr gurz orsber gur xvat, naq gur cevaprf, naq Mnqbx gur cevrfg, naq
Nuvzryrpu gur fba bs Novngune, naq orsber gur puvrs bs gur snguref bs
gur cevrfgf naq Yrivgrf: bar cevapvcny ubhfrubyq orvat gnxra sbe
Ryrnmne, naq bar gnxra sbe Vgunzne.

24:7 Abj gur svefg ybg pnzr sbegu gb Wrubvnevo, gur frpbaq gb Wrqnvnu,
24:8 Gur guveq gb Unevz, gur sbhegu gb Frbevz, 24:9 Gur svsgu gb
Znypuvwnu, gur fvkgu gb Zvwnzva, 24:10 Gur friragu gb Unxxbm, gur
rvtugu gb Novwnu, 24:11 Gur avagu gb Wrfuhnu, gur gragu gb Furpnavnu,
24:12 Gur ryriragu gb Ryvnfuvo, gur gjrysgu gb Wnxvz, 24:13 Gur
guvegrragu gb Uhccnu, gur sbhegrragu gb Wrfurorno, 24:14 Gur svsgrragu
gb Ovytnu, gur fvkgrragu gb Vzzre, 24:15 Gur friragrragu gb Urmve, gur
rvtugrragu gb Ncufrf, 24:16 Gur avargrragu gb Crgunuvnu, gur gjragvrgu
gb Wrurmrxry, 24:17 Gur bar naq gjragvrgu gb Wnpuva, gur gjb naq
gjragvrgu gb Tnzhy, 24:18 Gur guerr naq gjragvrgu gb Qrynvnu, gur sbhe
naq gjragvrgu gb Znnmvnu.

24:19 Gurfr jrer gur beqrevatf bs gurz va gurve freivpr gb pbzr vagb
gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, nppbeqvat gb gurve znaare, haqre Nneba gurve
sngure, nf gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry unq pbzznaqrq uvz.

24:20 Naq gur erfg bs gur fbaf bs Yriv jrer gurfr: Bs gur fbaf bs
Nzenz; Fuhonry: bs gur fbaf bs Fuhonry; Wruqrvnu.

24:21 Pbapreavat Erunovnu: bs gur fbaf bs Erunovnu, gur svefg jnf
Vffuvnu.

24:22 Bs gur Vmunevgrf; Furybzbgu: bs gur fbaf bs Furybzbgu; Wnungu.

24:23 Naq gur fbaf bs Uroeba; Wrevnu gur svefg, Nznevnu gur frpbaq,
Wnunmvry gur guveq, Wrxnzrnz gur sbhegu.

24:24 Bs gur fbaf bs Hmmvry; Zvpunu: bs gur fbaf bs Zvpunu; Funzve.

24:25 Gur oebgure bs Zvpunu jnf Vffuvnu: bs gur fbaf bs Vffuvnu;
Mrpunevnu.

24:26 Gur fbaf bs Zrenev jrer Znuyv naq Zhfuv: gur fbaf bs Wnnmvnu;
Orab.

24:27 Gur fbaf bs Zrenev ol Wnnmvnu; Orab, naq Fubunz, naq Mnpphe, naq
Voev.

24:28 Bs Znuyv pnzr Ryrnmne, jub unq ab fbaf.

24:29 Pbapreavat Xvfu: gur fba bs Xvfu jnf Wrenuzrry.

24:30 Gur fbaf nyfb bs Zhfuv; Znuyv, naq Rqre, naq Wrevzbgu. Gurfr
jrer gur fbaf bs gur Yrivgrf nsgre gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref.

24:31 Gurfr yvxrjvfr pnfg ybgf bire ntnvafg gurve oerguera gur fbaf bs
Nneba va gur cerfrapr bs Qnivq gur xvat, naq Mnqbx, naq Nuvzryrpu, naq
gur puvrs bs gur snguref bs gur cevrfgf naq Yrivgrf, rira gur
cevapvcny snguref bire ntnvafg gurve lbhatre oerguera.

25:1 Zberbire Qnivq naq gur pncgnvaf bs gur ubfg frcnengrq gb gur
freivpr bs gur fbaf bs Nfncu, naq bs Urzna, naq bs Wrqhguha, jub
fubhyq cebcurfl jvgu unecf, jvgu cfnygrevrf, naq jvgu plzonyf: naq gur
ahzore bs gur jbexzra nppbeqvat gb gurve freivpr jnf: 25:2 Bs gur fbaf
bs Nfncu; Mnpphe, naq Wbfrcu, naq Argunavnu, naq Nfnerynu, gur fbaf bs
Nfncu haqre gur unaqf bs Nfncu, juvpu cebcurfvrq nppbeqvat gb gur
beqre bs gur xvat.

25:3 Bs Wrqhguha: gur fbaf bs Wrqhguha; Trqnyvnu, naq Mrev, naq
Wrfunvnu, Unfunovnu, naq Znggvguvnu, fvk, haqre gur unaqf bs gurve
sngure Wrqhguha, jub cebcurfvrq jvgu n unec, gb tvir gunaxf naq gb
cenvfr gur YBEQ.

25:4 Bs Urzna: gur fbaf bs Urzna: Ohxxvnu, Znggnavnu, Hmmvry, Furohry,
naq Wrevzbgu, Unanavnu, Unanav, Ryvngunu, Tvqqnygv, naq Ebznzgvrmre,
Wbfuorxnfunu, Znyybguv, Ubguve, naq Znunmvbgu: 25:5 Nyy gurfr jrer gur
fbaf bs Urzna gur xvat'f frre va gur jbeqf bs Tbq, gb yvsg hc gur
ubea. Naq Tbq tnir gb Urzna sbhegrra fbaf naq guerr qnhtugref.

25:6 Nyy gurfr jrer haqre gur unaqf bs gurve sngure sbe fbat va gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, jvgu plzonyf, cfnygrevrf, naq unecf, sbe gur
freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq, nppbeqvat gb gur xvat'f beqre gb Nfncu,
Wrqhguha, naq Urzna.

25:7 Fb gur ahzore bs gurz, jvgu gurve oerguera gung jrer vafgehpgrq
va gur fbatf bs gur YBEQ, rira nyy gung jrer phaavat, jnf gjb uhaqerq
sbhefpber naq rvtug.

25:8 Naq gurl pnfg ybgf, jneq ntnvafg jneq, nf jryy gur fznyy nf gur
terng, gur grnpure nf gur fpubyne.

25:9 Abj gur svefg ybg pnzr sbegu sbe Nfncu gb Wbfrcu: gur frpbaq gb
Trqnyvnu, jub jvgu uvf oerguera naq fbaf jrer gjryir: 25:10 Gur guveq
gb Mnpphe, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:11 Gur
sbhegu gb Vmev, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:12 Gur
svsgu gb Argunavnu, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:13
Gur fvkgu gb Ohxxvnu, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir:
25:14 Gur friragu gb Wrfunerynu, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer
gjryir: 25:15 Gur rvtugu gb Wrfunvnu, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera,
jrer gjryir: 25:16 Gur avagu gb Znggnavnu, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf
oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:17 Gur gragu gb Fuvzrv, ur, uvf fbaf, naq
uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:18 Gur ryriragu gb Nmnerry, ur, uvf
fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:19 Gur gjrysgu gb Unfunovnu,
ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:20 Gur guvegrragu gb
Fuhonry, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:21 Gur
sbhegrragu gb Znggvguvnu, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir:
25:22 Gur svsgrragu gb Wrerzbgu, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer
gjryir: 25:23 Gur fvkgrragu gb Unanavnu, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf
oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:24 Gur friragrragu gb Wbfuorxnfunu, ur, uvf
fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:25 Gur rvtugrragu gb Unanav,
ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:26 Gur avargrragu gb
Znyybguv, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:27 Gur
gjragvrgu gb Ryvngunu, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir:
25:28 Gur bar naq gjragvrgu gb Ubguve, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera,
jrer gjryir: 25:29 Gur gjb naq gjragvrgu gb Tvqqnygv, ur, uvf fbaf,
naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:30 Gur guerr naq gjragvrgu gb
Znunmvbgu, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer gjryir: 25:31 Gur sbhe
naq gjragvrgu gb Ebznzgvrmre, ur, uvf fbaf, naq uvf oerguera, jrer
gjryir.

26:1 Pbapreavat gur qvivfvbaf bs gur cbegref: Bs gur Xbeuvgrf jnf
Zrfuryrzvnu gur fba bs Xber, bs gur fbaf bs Nfncu.

26:2 Naq gur fbaf bs Zrfuryrzvnu jrer, Mrpunevnu gur svefgobea,
Wrqvnry gur frpbaq, Mronqvnu gur guveq, Wnguavry gur sbhegu, 26:3 Rynz
gur svsgu, Wrubunana gur fvkgu, Ryvbranv gur friragu.

26:4 Zberbire gur fbaf bs Borqrqbz jrer, Furznvnu gur svefgobea,
Wrubmnonq gur frpbaq, Wbnu gur guveq, naq Fnpne gur sbhegu, naq
Argunarry gur svsgu.

26:5 Nzzvry gur fvkgu, Vffnpune gur friragu, Crhygunv gur rvtugu: sbe
Tbq oyrffrq uvz.

26:6 Nyfb hagb Furznvnu uvf fba jrer fbaf obea, gung ehyrq guebhtubhg
gur ubhfr bs gurve sngure: sbe gurl jrer zvtugl zra bs inybhe.

26:7 Gur fbaf bs Furznvnu; Bguav, naq Ercunry, naq Borq, Rymnonq,
jubfr oerguera jrer fgebat zra, Ryvuh, naq Frznpuvnu.

26:8 Nyy gurfr bs gur fbaf bs Borqrqbz: gurl naq gurve fbaf naq gurve
oerguera, noyr zra sbe fgeratgu sbe gur freivpr, jrer guerrfpber naq
gjb bs Borqrqbz.

26:9 Naq Zrfuryrzvnu unq fbaf naq oerguera, fgebat zra, rvtugrra.

26:10 Nyfb Ubfnu, bs gur puvyqera bs Zrenev, unq fbaf; Fvzev gur
puvrs, (sbe gubhtu ur jnf abg gur svefgobea, lrg uvf sngure znqr uvz
gur puvrs;) 26:11 Uvyxvnu gur frpbaq, Gronyvnu gur guveq, Mrpunevnu
gur sbhegu: nyy gur fbaf naq oerguera bs Ubfnu jrer guvegrra.

26:12 Nzbat gurfr jrer gur qvivfvbaf bs gur cbegref, rira nzbat gur
puvrs zra, univat jneqf bar ntnvafg nabgure, gb zvavfgre va gur ubhfr
bs gur YBEQ.

26:13 Naq gurl pnfg ybgf, nf jryy gur fznyy nf gur terng, nppbeqvat gb
gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, sbe rirel tngr.

26:14 Naq gur ybg rnfgjneq sryy gb Furyrzvnu. Gura sbe Mrpunevnu uvf
fba, n jvfr pbhafryybe, gurl pnfg ybgf; naq uvf ybg pnzr bhg
abegujneq.

26:15 Gb Borqrqbz fbhgujneq; naq gb uvf fbaf gur ubhfr bs Nfhccvz.

26:16 Gb Fuhccvz naq Ubfnu gur ybg pnzr sbegu jrfgjneq, jvgu gur tngr
Funyyrpurgu, ol gur pnhfrjnl bs gur tbvat hc, jneq ntnvafg jneq.

26:17 Rnfgjneq jrer fvk Yrivgrf, abegujneq sbhe n qnl, fbhgujneq sbhe
n qnl, naq gbjneq Nfhccvz gjb naq gjb.

26:18 Ng Cneone jrfgjneq, sbhe ng gur pnhfrjnl, naq gjb ng Cneone.

26:19 Gurfr ner gur qvivfvbaf bs gur cbegref nzbat gur fbaf bs Xber,
naq nzbat gur fbaf bs Zrenev.

26:20 Naq bs gur Yrivgrf, Nuvwnu jnf bire gur gernfherf bs gur ubhfr
bs Tbq, naq bire gur gernfherf bs gur qrqvpngrq guvatf.

26:21 Nf pbapreavat gur fbaf bs Ynnqna; gur fbaf bs gur Trefubavgr
Ynnqna, puvrs snguref, rira bs Ynnqna gur Trefubavgr, jrer Wruvryv.

26:22 Gur fbaf bs Wruvryv; Mrgunz, naq Wbry uvf oebgure, juvpu jrer
bire gur gernfherf bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

26:23 Bs gur Nzenzvgrf, naq gur Vmunevgrf, gur Uroebavgrf, naq gur
Hmmvryvgrf: 26:24 Naq Furohry gur fba bs Trefubz, gur fba bs Zbfrf,
jnf ehyre bs gur gernfherf.

26:25 Naq uvf oerguera ol Ryvrmre; Erunovnu uvf fba, naq Wrfunvnu uvf
fba, naq Wbenz uvf fba, naq Mvpuev uvf fba, naq Furybzvgu uvf fba.

26:26 Juvpu Furybzvgu naq uvf oerguera jrer bire nyy gur gernfherf bs
gur qrqvpngrq guvatf, juvpu Qnivq gur xvat, naq gur puvrs snguref, gur
pncgnvaf bire gubhfnaqf naq uhaqerqf, naq gur pncgnvaf bs gur ubfg,
unq qrqvpngrq.

26:27 Bhg bs gur fcbvyf jba va onggyrf qvq gurl qrqvpngr gb znvagnva
gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

26:28 Naq nyy gung Fnzhry gur frre, naq Fnhy gur fba bs Xvfu, naq
Noare gur fba bs Are, naq Wbno gur fba bs Mrehvnu, unq qrqvpngrq; naq
jubfbrire unq qrqvpngrq nal guvat, vg jnf haqre gur unaq bs Furybzvgu,
naq bs uvf oerguera.

26:29 Bs gur Vmunevgrf, Puranavnu naq uvf fbaf jrer sbe gur bhgjneq
ohfvarff bire Vfenry, sbe bssvpref naq whqtrf.

26:30 Naq bs gur Uroebavgrf, Unfunovnu naq uvf oerguera, zra bs
inybhe, n gubhfnaq naq frira uhaqerq, jrer bssvpref nzbat gurz bs
Vfenry ba guvf fvqr Wbeqna jrfgjneq va nyy gur ohfvarff bs gur YBEQ,
naq va gur freivpr bs gur xvat.

26:31 Nzbat gur Uroebavgrf jnf Wrevwnu gur puvrs, rira nzbat gur
Uroebavgrf, nppbeqvat gb gur trarengvbaf bs uvf snguref. Va gur
sbegvrgu lrne bs gur ervta bs Qnivq gurl jrer fbhtug sbe, naq gurer
jrer sbhaq nzbat gurz zvtugl zra bs inybhe ng Wnmre bs Tvyrnq.

26:32 Naq uvf oerguera, zra bs inybhe, jrer gjb gubhfnaq naq frira
uhaqerq puvrs snguref, jubz xvat Qnivq znqr ehyref bire gur
Erhoravgrf, gur Tnqvgrf, naq gur unys gevor bs Znanffru, sbe rirel
znggre cregnvavat gb Tbq, naq nssnvef bs gur xvat.

27:1 Abj gur puvyqera bs Vfenry nsgre gurve ahzore, gb jvg, gur puvrs
snguref naq pncgnvaf bs gubhfnaqf naq uhaqerqf, naq gurve bssvpref
gung freirq gur xvat va nal znggre bs gur pbhefrf, juvpu pnzr va naq
jrag bhg zbagu ol zbagu guebhtubhg nyy gur zbaguf bs gur lrne, bs
rirel pbhefr jrer gjragl naq sbhe gubhfnaq.

27:2 Bire gur svefg pbhefr sbe gur svefg zbagu jnf Wnfubornz gur fba
bs Mnoqvry: naq va uvf pbhefr jrer gjragl naq sbhe gubhfnaq.

27:3 Bs gur puvyqera bs Crerm jnf gur puvrs bs nyy gur pncgnvaf bs gur
ubfg sbe gur svefg zbagu.

27:4 Naq bire gur pbhefr bs gur frpbaq zbagu jnf Qbqnv na Nubuvgr, naq
bs uvf pbhefr jnf Zvxybgu nyfb gur ehyre: va uvf pbhefr yvxrjvfr jrer
gjragl naq sbhe gubhfnaq.

27:5 Gur guveq pncgnva bs gur ubfg sbe gur guveq zbagu jnf Oranvnu gur
fba bs Wrubvnqn, n puvrs cevrfg: naq va uvf pbhefr jrer gjragl naq
sbhe gubhfnaq.

27:6 Guvf vf gung Oranvnu, jub jnf zvtugl nzbat gur guvegl, naq nobir
gur guvegl: naq va uvf pbhefr jnf Nzzvmnonq uvf fba.

27:7 Gur sbhegu pncgnva sbe gur sbhegu zbagu jnf Nfnury gur oebgure bs
Wbno, naq Mronqvnu uvf fba nsgre uvz: naq va uvf pbhefr jrer gjragl
naq sbhe gubhfnaq.

27:8 Gur svsgu pncgnva sbe gur svsgu zbagu jnf Funzuhgu gur Vmenuvgr:
naq va uvf pbhefr jrer gjragl naq sbhe gubhfnaq.

27:9 Gur fvkgu pncgnva sbe gur fvkgu zbagu jnf Ven gur fba bs Vxxrfu
gur Grxbvgr: naq va uvf pbhefr jrer gjragl naq sbhe gubhfnaq.

27:10 Gur friragu pncgnva sbe gur friragu zbagu jnf Uryrm gur
Crybavgr, bs gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz: naq va uvf pbhefr jrer gjragl
naq sbhe gubhfnaq.

27:11 Gur rvtugu pncgnva sbe gur rvtugu zbagu jnf Fvoorpnv gur
Uhfunguvgr, bs gur Mneuvgrf: naq va uvf pbhefr jrer gjragl naq sbhe
gubhfnaq.

27:12 Gur avagu pncgnva sbe gur avagu zbagu jnf Novrmre gur
Nargbguvgr, bs gur Orawnzvgrf: naq va uvf pbhefr jrer gjragl naq sbhe
gubhfnaq.

27:13 Gur gragu pncgnva sbe gur gragu zbagu jnf Znunenv gur
Argbcunguvgr, bs gur Mneuvgrf: naq va uvf pbhefr jrer gjragl naq sbhe
gubhfnaq.

27:14 Gur ryriragu pncgnva sbe gur ryriragu zbagu jnf Oranvnu gur
Cvengubavgr, bs gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz: naq va uvf pbhefr jrer gjragl
naq sbhe gubhfnaq.

27:15 Gur gjrysgu pncgnva sbe gur gjrysgu zbagu jnf Uryqnv gur
Argbcunguvgr, bs Bguavry: naq va uvf pbhefr jrer gjragl naq sbhe
gubhfnaq.

27:16 Shegurezber bire gur gevorf bs Vfenry: gur ehyre bs gur
Erhoravgrf jnf Ryvrmre gur fba bs Mvpuev: bs gur Fvzrbavgrf,
Furcungvnu gur fba bs Znnpunu: 27:17 Bs gur Yrivgrf, Unfunovnu gur fba
bs Xrzhry: bs gur Nnebavgrf, Mnqbx: 27:18 Bs Whqnu, Ryvuh, bar bs gur
oerguera bs Qnivq: bs Vffnpune, Bzev gur fba bs Zvpunry: 27:19 Bs
Mrohyha, Vfuznvnu gur fba bs Bonqvnu: bs Ancugnyv, Wrevzbgu gur fba bs
Nmevry: 27:20 Bs gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz, Ubfurn gur fba bs Nmnmvnu:
bs gur unys gevor bs Znanffru, Wbry gur fba bs Crqnvnu: 27:21 Bs gur
unys gevor bs Znanffru va Tvyrnq, Vqqb gur fba bs Mrpunevnu: bs
Orawnzva, Wnnfvry gur fba bs Noare: 27:22 Bs Qna, Nmnerry gur fba bs
Wrebunz. Gurfr jrer gur cevaprf bs gur gevorf bs Vfenry.

27:23 Ohg Qnivq gbbx abg gur ahzore bs gurz sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq
haqre: orpnhfr gur YBEQ unq fnvq ur jbhyq vapernfr Vfenry yvxr gb gur
fgnef bs gur urniraf.

27:24 Wbno gur fba bs Mrehvnu ortna gb ahzore, ohg ur svavfurq abg,
orpnhfr gurer sryy jengu sbe vg ntnvafg Vfenry; arvgure jnf gur ahzore
chg va gur nppbhag bs gur puebavpyrf bs xvat Qnivq.

27:25 Naq bire gur xvat'f gernfherf jnf Nmznirgu gur fba bs Nqvry: naq
bire gur fgberubhfrf va gur svryqf, va gur pvgvrf, naq va gur
ivyyntrf, naq va gur pnfgyrf, jnf Wrubanguna gur fba bs Hmmvnu: 27:26
Naq bire gurz gung qvq gur jbex bs gur svryq sbe gvyyntr bs gur tebhaq
jnf Rmev gur fba bs Puryho: 27:27 Naq bire gur ivarlneqf jnf Fuvzrv
gur Enznguvgr: bire gur vapernfr bs gur ivarlneqf sbe gur jvar pryynef
jnf Mnoqv gur Fuvcuzvgr: 27:28 Naq bire gur byvir gerrf naq gur
flpbzber gerrf gung jrer va gur ybj cynvaf jnf Onnyunana gur Trqrevgr:
naq bire gur pryynef bs bvy jnf Wbnfu: 27:29 Naq bire gur ureqf gung
srq va Funeba jnf Fuvgenv gur Funebavgr: naq bire gur ureqf gung jrer
va gur inyyrlf jnf Funcung gur fba bs Nqynv: 27:30 Bire gur pnzryf
nyfb jnf Bovy gur Vfuznryvgr: naq bire gur nffrf jnf Wruqrvnu gur
Zrebabguvgr: 27:31 Naq bire gur sybpxf jnf Wnmvm gur Untrevgr. Nyy
gurfr jrer gur ehyref bs gur fhofgnapr juvpu jnf xvat Qnivq'f.

27:32 Nyfb Wbanguna Qnivq'f hapyr jnf n pbhafryybe, n jvfr zna, naq n
fpevor: naq Wruvry gur fba bs Unpuzbav jnf jvgu gur xvat'f fbaf: 27:33
Naq Nuvgubcury jnf gur xvat'f pbhafryybe: naq Uhfunv gur Nepuvgr jnf
gur xvat'f pbzcnavba: 27:34 Naq nsgre Nuvgubcury jnf Wrubvnqn gur fba
bs Oranvnu, naq Novngune: naq gur trareny bs gur xvat'f nezl jnf Wbno.

28:1 Naq Qnivq nffrzoyrq nyy gur cevaprf bs Vfenry, gur cevaprf bs gur
gevorf, naq gur pncgnvaf bs gur pbzcnavrf gung zvavfgrerq gb gur xvat
ol pbhefr, naq gur pncgnvaf bire gur gubhfnaqf, naq pncgnvaf bire gur
uhaqerqf, naq gur fgrjneqf bire nyy gur fhofgnapr naq cbffrffvba bs
gur xvat, naq bs uvf fbaf, jvgu gur bssvpref, naq jvgu gur zvtugl zra,
naq jvgu nyy gur inyvnag zra, hagb Wrehfnyrz.

28:2 Gura Qnivq gur xvat fgbbq hc hcba uvf srrg, naq fnvq, Urne zr, zl
oerguera, naq zl crbcyr: Nf sbe zr, V unq va zvar urneg gb ohvyq na
ubhfr bs erfg sbe gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ, naq sbe gur
sbbgfgbby bs bhe Tbq, naq unq znqr ernql sbe gur ohvyqvat: 28:3 Ohg
Tbq fnvq hagb zr, Gubh funyg abg ohvyq na ubhfr sbe zl anzr, orpnhfr
gubh unfg orra n zna bs jne, naq unfg furq oybbq.

28:4 Ubjorvg gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry pubfr zr orsber nyy gur ubhfr bs
zl sngure gb or xvat bire Vfenry sbe rire: sbe ur ungu pubfra Whqnu gb
or gur ehyre; naq bs gur ubhfr bs Whqnu, gur ubhfr bs zl sngure; naq
nzbat gur fbaf bs zl sngure ur yvxrq zr gb znxr zr xvat bire nyy
Vfenry: 28:5 Naq bs nyy zl fbaf, (sbe gur YBEQ ungu tvira zr znal
fbaf,) ur ungu pubfra Fbybzba zl fba gb fvg hcba gur guebar bs gur
xvatqbz bs gur YBEQ bire Vfenry.

28:6 Naq ur fnvq hagb zr, Fbybzba gul fba, ur funyy ohvyq zl ubhfr naq
zl pbhegf: sbe V unir pubfra uvz gb or zl fba, naq V jvyy or uvf
sngure.

28:7 Zberbire V jvyy rfgnoyvfu uvf xvatqbz sbe rire, vs ur or pbafgnag
gb qb zl pbzznaqzragf naq zl whqtzragf, nf ng guvf qnl.

28:8 Abj gurersber va gur fvtug bs nyy Vfenry gur pbatertngvba bs gur
YBEQ, naq va gur nhqvrapr bs bhe Tbq, xrrc naq frrx sbe nyy gur
pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq: gung lr znl cbffrff guvf tbbq ynaq,
naq yrnir vg sbe na vaurevgnapr sbe lbhe puvyqera nsgre lbh sbe rire.

28:9 Naq gubh, Fbybzba zl fba, xabj gubh gur Tbq bs gul sngure, naq
freir uvz jvgu n cresrpg urneg naq jvgu n jvyyvat zvaq: sbe gur YBEQ
frnepurgu nyy urnegf, naq haqrefgnaqrgu nyy gur vzntvangvbaf bs gur
gubhtugf: vs gubh frrx uvz, ur jvyy or sbhaq bs gurr; ohg vs gubh
sbefnxr uvz, ur jvyy pnfg gurr bss sbe rire.

28:10 Gnxr urrq abj; sbe gur YBEQ ungu pubfra gurr gb ohvyq na ubhfr
sbe gur fnapghnel: or fgebat, naq qb vg.

28:11 Gura Qnivq tnir gb Fbybzba uvf fba gur cnggrea bs gur cbepu, naq
bs gur ubhfrf gurerbs, naq bs gur gernfhevrf gurerbs, naq bs gur hccre
punzoref gurerbs, naq bs gur vaare cneybhef gurerbs, naq bs gur cynpr
bs gur zrepl frng, 28:12 Naq gur cnggrea bs nyy gung ur unq ol gur
fcvevg, bs gur pbhegf bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq bs nyy gur
punzoref ebhaq nobhg, bs gur gernfhevrf bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq, naq bs
gur gernfhevrf bs gur qrqvpngrq guvatf: 28:13 Nyfb sbe gur pbhefrf bs
gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf, naq sbe nyy gur jbex bs gur freivpr bs
gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq sbe nyy gur irffryf bs freivpr va gur ubhfr
bs gur YBEQ.

28:14 Ur tnir bs tbyq ol jrvtug sbe guvatf bs tbyq, sbe nyy
vafgehzragf bs nyy znaare bs freivpr; fvyire nyfb sbe nyy vafgehzragf
bs fvyire ol jrvtug, sbe nyy vafgehzragf bs rirel xvaq bs freivpr:
28:15 Rira gur jrvtug sbe gur pnaqyrfgvpxf bs tbyq, naq sbe gurve
ynzcf bs tbyq, ol jrvtug sbe rirel pnaqyrfgvpx, naq sbe gur ynzcf
gurerbs: naq sbe gur pnaqyrfgvpxf bs fvyire ol jrvtug, obgu sbe gur
pnaqyrfgvpx, naq nyfb sbe gur ynzcf gurerbs, nppbeqvat gb gur hfr bs
rirel pnaqyrfgvpx.

28:16 Naq ol jrvtug ur tnir tbyq sbe gur gnoyrf bs furjoernq, sbe
rirel gnoyr; naq yvxrjvfr fvyire sbe gur gnoyrf bs fvyire: 28:17 Nyfb
cher tbyq sbe gur syrfuubbxf, naq gur objyf, naq gur phcf: naq sbe gur
tbyqra onfbaf ur tnir tbyq ol jrvtug sbe rirel onfba; naq yvxrjvfr
fvyire ol jrvtug sbe rirel onfba bs fvyire: 28:18 Naq sbe gur nygne bs
vaprafr ersvarq tbyq ol jrvtug; naq tbyq sbe gur cnggrea bs gur
punevbg bs gur purehovzf, gung fcernq bhg gurve jvatf, naq pbirerq gur
nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ.

28:19 Nyy guvf, fnvq Qnivq, gur YBEQ znqr zr haqrefgnaq va jevgvat ol
uvf unaq hcba zr, rira nyy gur jbexf bs guvf cnggrea.

28:20 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb Fbybzba uvf fba, Or fgebat naq bs tbbq
pbhentr, naq qb vg: srne abg, abe or qvfznlrq: sbe gur YBEQ Tbq, rira
zl Tbq, jvyy or jvgu gurr; ur jvyy abg snvy gurr, abe sbefnxr gurr,
hagvy gubh unfg svavfurq nyy gur jbex sbe gur freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs
gur YBEQ.

28:21 Naq, orubyq, gur pbhefrf bs gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf, rira
gurl funyy or jvgu gurr sbe nyy gur freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq: naq
gurer funyy or jvgu gurr sbe nyy znaare bs jbexznafuvc rirel jvyyvat
fxvyshy zna, sbe nal znaare bs freivpr: nyfb gur cevaprf naq nyy gur
crbcyr jvyy or jubyyl ng gul pbzznaqzrag.

29:1 Shegurezber Qnivq gur xvat fnvq hagb nyy gur pbatertngvba,
Fbybzba zl fba, jubz nybar Tbq ungu pubfra, vf lrg lbhat naq graqre,
naq gur jbex vf terng: sbe gur cnynpr vf abg sbe zna, ohg sbe gur YBEQ
Tbq.

29:2 Abj V unir cercnerq jvgu nyy zl zvtug sbe gur ubhfr bs zl Tbq gur
tbyq sbe guvatf gb or znqr bs tbyq, naq gur fvyire sbe guvatf bs
fvyire, naq gur oenff sbe guvatf bs oenff, gur veba sbe guvatf bs
veba, naq jbbq sbe guvatf bs jbbq; balk fgbarf, naq fgbarf gb or frg,
tyvfgrevat fgbarf, naq bs qviref pbybhef, naq nyy znaare bs cerpvbhf
fgbarf, naq zneoyr fgbarf va nohaqnapr.

29:3 Zberbire, orpnhfr V unir frg zl nssrpgvba gb gur ubhfr bs zl Tbq,
V unir bs zvar bja cebcre tbbq, bs tbyq naq fvyire, juvpu V unir tvira
gb gur ubhfr bs zl Tbq, bire naq nobir nyy gung V unir cercnerq sbe
gur ubyl ubhfr.

29:4 Rira guerr gubhfnaq gnyragf bs tbyq, bs gur tbyq bs Bcuve, naq
frira gubhfnaq gnyragf bs ersvarq fvyire, gb bireynl gur jnyyf bs gur
ubhfrf jvguny: 29:5 Gur tbyq sbe guvatf bs tbyq, naq gur fvyire sbe
guvatf bs fvyire, naq sbe nyy znaare bs jbex gb or znqr ol gur unaqf
bs negvsvpref. Naq jub gura vf jvyyvat gb pbafrpengr uvf freivpr guvf
qnl hagb gur YBEQ?  29:6 Gura gur puvrs bs gur snguref naq cevaprf bs
gur gevorf bs Vfenry naq gur pncgnvaf bs gubhfnaqf naq bs uhaqerqf,
jvgu gur ehyref bs gur xvat'f jbex, bssrerq jvyyvatyl, 29:7 Naq tnir
sbe gur freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq bs tbyq svir gubhfnaq gnyragf naq
gra gubhfnaq qenzf, naq bs fvyire gra gubhfnaq gnyragf, naq bs oenff
rvtugrra gubhfnaq gnyragf, naq bar uhaqerq gubhfnaq gnyragf bs veba.

29:8 Naq gurl jvgu jubz cerpvbhf fgbarf jrer sbhaq tnir gurz gb gur
gernfher bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, ol gur unaq bs Wruvry gur
Trefubavgr.

29:9 Gura gur crbcyr erwbvprq, sbe gung gurl bssrerq jvyyvatyl,
orpnhfr jvgu cresrpg urneg gurl bssrerq jvyyvatyl gb gur YBEQ: naq
Qnivq gur xvat nyfb erwbvprq jvgu terng wbl.

29:10 Jurersber Qnivq oyrffrq gur YBEQ orsber nyy gur pbatertngvba:
naq Qnivq fnvq, Oyrffrq or gubh, YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry bhe sngure, sbe
rire naq rire.

29:11 Guvar, B YBEQ vf gur terngarff, naq gur cbjre, naq gur tybel,
naq gur ivpgbel, naq gur znwrfgl: sbe nyy gung vf va gur urnira naq va
gur rnegu vf guvar; guvar vf gur xvatqbz, B YBEQ, naq gubh neg rknygrq
nf urnq nobir nyy.

29:12 Obgu evpurf naq ubabhe pbzr bs gurr, naq gubh ervtarfg bire nyy;
naq va guvar unaq vf cbjre naq zvtug; naq va guvar unaq vg vf gb znxr
terng, naq gb tvir fgeratgu hagb nyy.

29:13 Abj gurersber, bhe Tbq, jr gunax gurr, naq cenvfr gul tybevbhf
anzr.

29:14 Ohg jub nz V, naq jung vf zl crbcyr, gung jr fubhyq or noyr gb
bssre fb jvyyvatyl nsgre guvf fbeg? sbe nyy guvatf pbzr bs gurr, naq
bs guvar bja unir jr tvira gurr.

29:15 Sbe jr ner fgenatref orsber gurr, naq fbwbhearef, nf jrer nyy
bhe snguref: bhe qnlf ba gur rnegu ner nf n funqbj, naq gurer vf abar
novqvat.

29:16 B YBEQ bhe Tbq, nyy guvf fgber gung jr unir cercnerq gb ohvyq
gurr na ubhfr sbe guvar ubyl anzr pbzrgu bs guvar unaq, naq vf nyy
guvar bja.

29:17 V xabj nyfb, zl Tbq, gung gubh gevrfg gur urneg, naq unfg
cyrnfher va hcevtugarff. Nf sbe zr, va gur hcevtugarff bs zvar urneg V
unir jvyyvatyl bssrerq nyy gurfr guvatf: naq abj unir V frra jvgu wbl
gul crbcyr, juvpu ner cerfrag urer, gb bssre jvyyvatyl hagb gurr.

29:18 B YBEQ Tbq bs Noenunz, Vfnnp, naq bs Vfenry, bhe snguref, xrrc
guvf sbe rire va gur vzntvangvba bs gur gubhtugf bs gur urneg bs gul
crbcyr, naq cercner gurve urneg hagb gurr: 29:19 Naq tvir hagb Fbybzba
zl fba n cresrpg urneg, gb xrrc gul pbzznaqzragf, gul grfgvzbavrf, naq
gul fgnghgrf, naq gb qb nyy gurfr guvatf, naq gb ohvyq gur cnynpr, sbe
gur juvpu V unir znqr cebivfvba.

29:20 Naq Qnivq fnvq gb nyy gur pbatertngvba, Abj oyrff gur YBEQ lbhe
Tbq.

Naq nyy gur pbatertngvba oyrffrq gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve snguref, naq
objrq qbja gurve urnqf, naq jbefuvccrq gur YBEQ, naq gur xvat.

29:21 Naq gurl fnpevsvprq fnpevsvprf hagb gur YBEQ, naq bssrerq oheag
bssrevatf hagb gur YBEQ, ba gur zbeebj nsgre gung qnl, rira n gubhfnaq
ohyybpxf, n gubhfnaq enzf, naq n gubhfnaq ynzof, jvgu gurve qevax
bssrevatf, naq fnpevsvprf va nohaqnapr sbe nyy Vfenry: 29:22 Naq qvq
rng naq qevax orsber gur YBEQ ba gung qnl jvgu terng tynqarff. Naq
gurl znqr Fbybzba gur fba bs Qnivq xvat gur frpbaq gvzr, naq nabvagrq
uvz hagb gur YBEQ gb or gur puvrs tbireabe, naq Mnqbx gb or cevrfg.

29:23 Gura Fbybzba fng ba gur guebar bs gur YBEQ nf xvat vafgrnq bs
Qnivq uvf sngure, naq cebfcrerq; naq nyy Vfenry borlrq uvz.

29:24 Naq nyy gur cevaprf, naq gur zvtugl zra, naq nyy gur fbaf
yvxrjvfr bs xvat Qnivq, fhozvggrq gurzfryirf hagb Fbybzba gur xvat.

29:25 Naq gur YBEQ zntavsvrq Fbybzba rkprrqvatyl va gur fvtug bs nyy
Vfenry, naq orfgbjrq hcba uvz fhpu eblny znwrfgl nf unq abg orra ba
nal xvat orsber uvz va Vfenry.

29:26 Guhf Qnivq gur fba bs Wrffr ervtarq bire nyy Vfenry.

29:27 Naq gur gvzr gung ur ervtarq bire Vfenry jnf sbegl lrnef; frira
lrnef ervtarq ur va Uroeba, naq guvegl naq guerr lrnef ervtarq ur va
Wrehfnyrz.

29:28 Naq ur qvrq va n tbbq byq ntr, shyy bs qnlf, evpurf, naq ubabhe:
naq Fbybzba uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

29:29 Abj gur npgf bs Qnivq gur xvat, svefg naq ynfg, orubyq, gurl ner
jevggra va gur obbx bs Fnzhry gur frre, naq va gur obbx bs Anguna gur
cebcurg, naq va gur obbx bs Tnq gur frre, 29:30 Jvgu nyy uvf ervta naq
uvf zvtug, naq gur gvzrf gung jrag bire uvz, naq bire Vfenry, naq bire
nyy gur xvatqbzf bs gur pbhagevrf.




Gur Frpbaq Obbx bs gur Puebavpyrf


1:1 Naq Fbybzba gur fba bs Qnivq jnf fgeratgurarq va uvf xvatqbz, naq
gur YBEQ uvf Tbq jnf jvgu uvz, naq zntavsvrq uvz rkprrqvatyl.

1:2 Gura Fbybzba fcnxr hagb nyy Vfenry, gb gur pncgnvaf bs gubhfnaqf
naq bs uhaqerqf, naq gb gur whqtrf, naq gb rirel tbireabe va nyy
Vfenry, gur puvrs bs gur snguref.

1:3 Fb Fbybzba, naq nyy gur pbatertngvba jvgu uvz, jrag gb gur uvtu
cynpr gung jnf ng Tvorba; sbe gurer jnf gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba bs Tbq, juvpu Zbfrf gur freinag bs gur YBEQ unq znqr va
gur jvyqrearff.

1:4 Ohg gur nex bs Tbq unq Qnivq oebhtug hc sebz Xvewnguwrnevz gb gur
cynpr juvpu Qnivq unq cercnerq sbe vg: sbe ur unq cvgpurq n grag sbe
vg ng Wrehfnyrz.

1:5 Zberbire gur oenfra nygne, gung Ormnyrry gur fba bs Hev, gur fba
bs Uhe, unq znqr, ur chg orsber gur gnoreanpyr bs gur YBEQ: naq
Fbybzba naq gur pbatertngvba fbhtug hagb vg.

1:6 Naq Fbybzba jrag hc guvgure gb gur oenfra nygne orsber gur YBEQ,
juvpu jnf ng gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba, naq bssrerq n
gubhfnaq oheag bssrevatf hcba vg.

1:7 Va gung avtug qvq Tbq nccrne hagb Fbybzba, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Nfx
jung V funyy tvir gurr.

1:8 Naq Fbybzba fnvq hagb Tbq, Gubh unfg furjrq terng zrepl hagb Qnivq
zl sngure, naq unfg znqr zr gb ervta va uvf fgrnq.

1:9 Abj, B YBEQ Tbq, yrg gul cebzvfr hagb Qnivq zl sngure or
rfgnoyvfurq: sbe gubh unfg znqr zr xvat bire n crbcyr yvxr gur qhfg bs
gur rnegu va zhygvghqr.

1:10 Tvir zr abj jvfqbz naq xabjyrqtr, gung V znl tb bhg naq pbzr va
orsber guvf crbcyr: sbe jub pna whqtr guvf gul crbcyr, gung vf fb
terng?  1:11 Naq Tbq fnvq gb Fbybzba, Orpnhfr guvf jnf va guvar urneg,
naq gubh unfg abg nfxrq evpurf, jrnygu, be ubabhe, abe gur yvsr bs
guvar rarzvrf, arvgure lrg unfg nfxrq ybat yvsr; ohg unfg nfxrq jvfqbz
naq xabjyrqtr sbe gulfrys, gung gubh znlrfg whqtr zl crbcyr, bire jubz
V unir znqr gurr xvat: 1:12 Jvfqbz naq xabjyrqtr vf tenagrq hagb gurr;
naq V jvyy tvir gurr evpurf, naq jrnygu, naq ubabhe, fhpu nf abar bs
gur xvatf unir unq gung unir orra orsber gurr, arvgure funyy gurer nal
nsgre gurr unir gur yvxr.

1:13 Gura Fbybzba pnzr sebz uvf wbhearl gb gur uvtu cynpr gung jnf ng
Tvorba gb Wrehfnyrz, sebz orsber gur gnoreanpyr bs gur pbatertngvba,
naq ervtarq bire Vfenry.

1:14 Naq Fbybzba tngurerq punevbgf naq ubefrzra: naq ur unq n gubhfnaq
naq sbhe uhaqerq punevbgf, naq gjryir gubhfnaq ubefrzra, juvpu ur
cynprq va gur punevbg pvgvrf, naq jvgu gur xvat ng Wrehfnyrz.

1:15 Naq gur xvat znqr fvyire naq tbyq ng Wrehfnyrz nf cyragrbhf nf
fgbarf, naq prqne gerrf znqr ur nf gur flpbzber gerrf gung ner va gur
inyr sbe nohaqnapr.

1:16 Naq Fbybzba unq ubefrf oebhtug bhg bs Rtlcg, naq yvara lnea: gur
xvat'f zrepunagf erprvirq gur yvara lnea ng n cevpr.

1:17 Naq gurl srgpurq hc, naq oebhtug sbegu bhg bs Rtlcg n punevbg sbe
fvk uhaqerq furxryf bs fvyire, naq na ubefr sbe na uhaqerq naq svsgl:
naq fb oebhtug gurl bhg ubefrf sbe nyy gur xvatf bs gur Uvggvgrf, naq
sbe gur xvatf bs Flevn, ol gurve zrnaf.

2:1 Naq Fbybzba qrgrezvarq gb ohvyq na ubhfr sbe gur anzr bs gur YBEQ,
naq na ubhfr sbe uvf xvatqbz.

2:2 Naq Fbybzba gbyq bhg guerrfpber naq gra gubhfnaq zra gb orne
oheqraf, naq sbhefpber gubhfnaq gb urj va gur zbhagnva, naq guerr
gubhfnaq naq fvk uhaqerq gb birefrr gurz.

2:3 Naq Fbybzba frag gb Uhenz gur xvat bs Gler, fnlvat, Nf gubh qvqfg
qrny jvgu Qnivq zl sngure, naq qvqfg fraq uvz prqnef gb ohvyq uvz na
ubhfr gb qjryy gurerva, rira fb qrny jvgu zr.

2:4 Orubyq, V ohvyq na ubhfr gb gur anzr bs gur YBEQ zl Tbq, gb
qrqvpngr vg gb uvz, naq gb ohea orsber uvz fjrrg vaprafr, naq sbe gur
pbagvahny furjoernq, naq sbe gur oheag bssrevatf zbeavat naq riravat,
ba gur fnoonguf, naq ba gur arj zbbaf, naq ba gur fbyrza srnfgf bs gur
YBEQ bhe Tbq. Guvf vf na beqvanapr sbe rire gb Vfenry.

2:5 Naq gur ubhfr juvpu V ohvyq vf terng: sbe terng vf bhe Tbq nobir
nyy tbqf.

2:6 Ohg jub vf noyr gb ohvyq uvz na ubhfr, frrvat gur urnira naq
urnira bs urniraf pnaabg pbagnva uvz? jub nz V gura, gung V fubhyq
ohvyq uvz na ubhfr, fnir bayl gb ohea fnpevsvpr orsber uvz?  2:7 Fraq
zr abj gurersber n zna phaavat gb jbex va tbyq, naq va fvyire, naq va
oenff, naq va veba, naq va checyr, naq pevzfba, naq oyhr, naq gung pna
fxvyy gb tenir jvgu gur phaavat zra gung ner jvgu zr va Whqnu naq va
Wrehfnyrz, jubz Qnivq zl sngure qvq cebivqr.

2:8 Fraq zr nyfb prqne gerrf, sve gerrf, naq nythz gerrf, bhg bs
Yronaba: sbe V xabj gung gul freinagf pna fxvyy gb phg gvzore va
Yronaba; naq, orubyq, zl freinagf funyy or jvgu gul freinagf, 2:9 Rira
gb cercner zr gvzore va nohaqnapr: sbe gur ubhfr juvpu V nz nobhg gb
ohvyq funyy or jbaqreshy terng.

2:10 Naq, orubyq, V jvyy tvir gb gul freinagf, gur urjref gung phg
gvzore, gjragl gubhfnaq zrnfherf bs orngra jurng, naq gjragl gubhfnaq
zrnfherf bs oneyrl, naq gjragl gubhfnaq onguf bs jvar, naq gjragl
gubhfnaq onguf bs bvy.

2:11 Gura Uhenz gur xvat bs Gler nafjrerq va jevgvat, juvpu ur frag gb
Fbybzba, Orpnhfr gur YBEQ ungu ybirq uvf crbcyr, ur ungu znqr gurr
xvat bire gurz.

2:12 Uhenz fnvq zberbire, Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, gung znqr
urnira naq rnegu, jub ungu tvira gb Qnivq gur xvat n jvfr fba, raqhrq
jvgu cehqrapr naq haqrefgnaqvat, gung zvtug ohvyq na ubhfr sbe gur
YBEQ, naq na ubhfr sbe uvf xvatqbz.

2:13 Naq abj V unir frag n phaavat zna, raqhrq jvgu haqrefgnaqvat, bs
Uhenz zl sngure'f, 2:14 Gur fba bs n jbzna bs gur qnhtugref bs Qna,
naq uvf sngure jnf n zna bs Gler, fxvyshy gb jbex va tbyq, naq va
fvyire, va oenff, va veba, va fgbar, naq va gvzore, va checyr, va
oyhr, naq va svar yvara, naq va pevzfba; nyfb gb tenir nal znaare bs
tenivat, naq gb svaq bhg rirel qrivpr juvpu funyy or chg gb uvz, jvgu
gul phaavat zra, naq jvgu gur phaavat zra bs zl ybeq Qnivq gul sngure.

2:15 Abj gurersber gur jurng, naq gur oneyrl, gur bvy, naq gur jvar,
juvpu zl ybeq ungu fcbxra bs, yrg uvz fraq hagb uvf freinagf: 2:16 Naq
jr jvyy phg jbbq bhg bs Yronaba, nf zhpu nf gubh funyg arrq: naq jr
jvyy oevat vg gb gurr va sybngf ol frn gb Wbccn; naq gubh funyg pneel
vg hc gb Wrehfnyrz.

2:17 Naq Fbybzba ahzorerq nyy gur fgenatref gung jrer va gur ynaq bs
Vfenry, nsgre gur ahzorevat jurerjvgu Qnivq uvf sngure unq ahzorerq
gurz; naq gurl jrer sbhaq na uhaqerq naq svsgl gubhfnaq naq guerr
gubhfnaq naq fvk uhaqerq.

2:18 Naq ur frg guerrfpber naq gra gubhfnaq bs gurz gb or orneref bs
oheqraf, naq sbhefpber gubhfnaq gb or urjref va gur zbhagnva, naq
guerr gubhfnaq naq fvk uhaqerq birefrref gb frg gur crbcyr n jbex.

3:1 Gura Fbybzba ortna gb ohvyq gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ ng Wrehfnyrz va
zbhag Zbevnu, jurer gur Ybeq nccrnerq hagb Qnivq uvf sngure, va gur
cynpr gung Qnivq unq cercnerq va gur guerfuvatsybbe bs Beana gur
Wrohfvgr.

3:2 Naq ur ortna gb ohvyq va gur frpbaq qnl bs gur frpbaq zbagu, va
gur sbhegu lrne bs uvf ervta.

3:3 Abj gurfr ner gur guvatf jurerva Fbybzba jnf vafgehpgrq sbe gur
ohvyqvat bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq. Gur yratgu ol phovgf nsgre gur svefg
zrnfher jnf guerrfpber phovgf, naq gur oernqgu gjragl phovgf.

3:4 Naq gur cbepu gung jnf va gur sebag bs gur ubhfr, gur yratgu bs vg
jnf nppbeqvat gb gur oernqgu bs gur ubhfr, gjragl phovgf, naq gur
urvtug jnf na uhaqerq naq gjragl: naq ur bireynvq vg jvguva jvgu cher
tbyq.

3:5 Naq gur terngre ubhfr ur pvryrq jvgu sve gerr, juvpu ur bireynvq
jvgu svar tbyq, naq frg gurerba cnyz gerrf naq punvaf.

3:6 Naq ur tneavfurq gur ubhfr jvgu cerpvbhf fgbarf sbe ornhgl: naq
gur tbyq jnf tbyq bs Cneinvz.

3:7 Ur bireynvq nyfb gur ubhfr, gur ornzf, gur cbfgf, naq gur jnyyf
gurerbs, naq gur qbbef gurerbs, jvgu tbyq; naq tenirq purehovzf ba gur
jnyyf.

3:8 Naq ur znqr gur zbfg ubyl ubhfr, gur yratgu jurerbs jnf nppbeqvat
gb gur oernqgu bs gur ubhfr, gjragl phovgf, naq gur oernqgu gurerbs
gjragl phovgf: naq ur bireynvq vg jvgu svar tbyq, nzbhagvat gb fvk
uhaqerq gnyragf.

3:9 Naq gur jrvtug bs gur anvyf jnf svsgl furxryf bs tbyq. Naq ur
bireynvq gur hccre punzoref jvgu tbyq.

3:10 Naq va gur zbfg ubyl ubhfr ur znqr gjb purehovzf bs vzntr jbex,
naq bireynvq gurz jvgu tbyq.

3:11 Naq gur jvatf bs gur purehovzf jrer gjragl phovgf ybat: bar jvat
bs gur bar pureho jnf svir phovgf, ernpuvat gb gur jnyy bs gur ubhfr:
naq gur bgure jvat jnf yvxrjvfr svir phovgf, ernpuvat gb gur jvat bs
gur bgure pureho.

3:12 Naq bar jvat bs gur bgure pureho jnf svir phovgf, ernpuvat gb gur
jnyy bs gur ubhfr: naq gur bgure jvat jnf svir phovgf nyfb, wbvavat gb
gur jvat bs gur bgure pureho.

3:13 Gur jvatf bs gurfr purehovzf fcernq gurzfryirf sbegu gjragl
phovgf: naq gurl fgbbq ba gurve srrg, naq gurve snprf jrer vajneq.

3:14 Naq ur znqr gur invy bs oyhr, naq checyr, naq pevzfba, naq svar
yvara, naq jebhtug purehovzf gurerba.

3:15 Nyfb ur znqr orsber gur ubhfr gjb cvyynef bs guvegl naq svir
phovgf uvtu, naq gur puncvgre gung jnf ba gur gbc bs rnpu bs gurz jnf
svir phovgf.

3:16 Naq ur znqr punvaf, nf va gur benpyr, naq chg gurz ba gur urnqf
bs gur cvyynef; naq znqr na uhaqerq cbzrtenangrf, naq chg gurz ba gur
punvaf.

3:17 Naq ur ernerq hc gur cvyynef orsber gur grzcyr, bar ba gur evtug
unaq, naq gur bgure ba gur yrsg; naq pnyyrq gur anzr bs gung ba gur
evtug unaq Wnpuva, naq gur anzr bs gung ba gur yrsg Obnm.

4:1 Zberbire ur znqr na nygne bs oenff, gjragl phovgf gur yratgu
gurerbs, naq gjragl phovgf gur oernqgu gurerbs, naq gra phovgf gur
urvtug gurerbs.

4:2 Nyfb ur znqr n zbygra frn bs gra phovgf sebz oevz gb oevz, ebhaq
va pbzcnff, naq svir phovgf gur urvtug gurerbs; naq n yvar bs guvegl
phovgf qvq pbzcnff vg ebhaq nobhg.

4:3 Naq haqre vg jnf gur fvzvyvghqr bs bkra, juvpu qvq pbzcnff vg
ebhaq nobhg: gra va n phovg, pbzcnffvat gur frn ebhaq nobhg. Gjb ebjf
bs bkra jrer pnfg, jura vg jnf pnfg.

4:4 Vg fgbbq hcba gjryir bkra, guerr ybbxvat gbjneq gur abegu, naq
guerr ybbxvat gbjneq gur jrfg, naq guerr ybbxvat gbjneq gur fbhgu, naq
guerr ybbxvat gbjneq gur rnfg: naq gur frn jnf frg nobir hcba gurz,
naq nyy gurve uvaqre cnegf jrer vajneq.

4:5 Naq gur guvpxarff bs vg jnf na unaqoernqgu, naq gur oevz bs vg
yvxr gur jbex bs gur oevz bs n phc, jvgu sybjref bs yvyvrf; naq vg
erprvirq naq uryq guerr gubhfnaq onguf.

4:6 Ur znqr nyfb gra yniref, naq chg svir ba gur evtug unaq, naq svir
ba gur yrsg, gb jnfu va gurz: fhpu guvatf nf gurl bssrerq sbe gur
oheag bssrevat gurl jnfurq va gurz; ohg gur frn jnf sbe gur cevrfgf gb
jnfu va.

4:7 Naq ur znqr gra pnaqyrfgvpxf bs tbyq nppbeqvat gb gurve sbez, naq
frg gurz va gur grzcyr, svir ba gur evtug unaq, naq svir ba gur yrsg.

4:8 Ur znqr nyfb gra gnoyrf, naq cynprq gurz va gur grzcyr, svir ba
gur evtug fvqr, naq svir ba gur yrsg. Naq ur znqr na uhaqerq onfbaf bs
tbyq.

4:9 Shegurezber ur znqr gur pbheg bs gur cevrfgf, naq gur terng pbheg,
naq qbbef sbe gur pbheg, naq bireynvq gur qbbef bs gurz jvgu oenff.

4:10 Naq ur frg gur frn ba gur evtug fvqr bs gur rnfg raq, bire
ntnvafg gur fbhgu.

4:11 Naq Uhenz znqr gur cbgf, naq gur fubiryf, naq gur onfbaf. Naq
Uhenz svavfurq gur jbex gung ur jnf gb znxr sbe xvat Fbybzba sbe gur
ubhfr bs Tbq; 4:12 Gb jvg, gur gjb cvyynef, naq gur cbzzryf, naq gur
puncvgref juvpu jrer ba gur gbc bs gur gjb cvyynef, naq gur gjb
jernguf gb pbire gur gjb cbzzryf bs gur puncvgref juvpu jrer ba gur
gbc bs gur cvyynef; 4:13 Naq sbhe uhaqerq cbzrtenangrf ba gur gjb
jernguf; gjb ebjf bs cbzrtenangrf ba rnpu jerngu, gb pbire gur gjb
cbzzryf bs gur puncvgref juvpu jrer hcba gur cvyynef.

4:14 Ur znqr nyfb onfrf, naq yniref znqr ur hcba gur onfrf; 4:15 Bar
frn, naq gjryir bkra haqre vg.

4:16 Gur cbgf nyfb, naq gur fubiryf, naq gur syrfuubbxf, naq nyy gurve
vafgehzragf, qvq Uhenz uvf sngure znxr gb xvat Fbybzba sbe gur ubhfr
bs gur YBEQ bs oevtug oenff.

4:17 Va gur cynva bs Wbeqna qvq gur xvat pnfg gurz, va gur pynl tebhaq
orgjrra Fhppbgu naq Mrerqngunu.

4:18 Guhf Fbybzba znqr nyy gurfr irffryf va terng nohaqnapr: sbe gur
jrvtug bs gur oenff pbhyq abg or sbhaq bhg.

4:19 Naq Fbybzba znqr nyy gur irffryf gung jrer sbe gur ubhfr bs Tbq,
gur tbyqra nygne nyfb, naq gur gnoyrf jurerba gur furjoernq jnf frg;
4:20 Zberbire gur pnaqyrfgvpxf jvgu gurve ynzcf, gung gurl fubhyq ohea
nsgre gur znaare orsber gur benpyr, bs cher tbyq; 4:21 Naq gur
sybjref, naq gur ynzcf, naq gur gbatf, znqr ur bs tbyq, naq gung
cresrpg tbyq; 4:22 Naq gur fahssref, naq gur onfbaf, naq gur fcbbaf,
naq gur prafref, bs cher tbyq: naq gur ragel bs gur ubhfr, gur vaare
qbbef gurerbs sbe gur zbfg ubyl cynpr, naq gur qbbef bs gur ubhfr bs
gur grzcyr, jrer bs tbyq.

5:1 Guhf nyy gur jbex gung Fbybzba znqr sbe gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ jnf
svavfurq: naq Fbybzba oebhtug va nyy gur guvatf gung Qnivq uvf sngure
unq qrqvpngrq; naq gur fvyire, naq gur tbyq, naq nyy gur vafgehzragf,
chg ur nzbat gur gernfherf bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq.

5:2 Gura Fbybzba nffrzoyrq gur ryqref bs Vfenry, naq nyy gur urnqf bs
gur gevorf, gur puvrs bs gur snguref bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, hagb
Wrehfnyrz, gb oevat hc gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ bhg bs gur
pvgl bs Qnivq, juvpu vf Mvba.

5:3 Jurersber nyy gur zra bs Vfenry nffrzoyrq gurzfryirf hagb gur xvat
va gur srnfg juvpu jnf va gur friragu zbagu.

5:4 Naq nyy gur ryqref bs Vfenry pnzr; naq gur Yrivgrf gbbx hc gur
nex.

5:5 Naq gurl oebhtug hc gur nex, naq gur gnoreanpyr bs gur
pbatertngvba, naq nyy gur ubyl irffryf gung jrer va gur gnoreanpyr,
gurfr qvq gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf oevat hc.

5:6 Nyfb xvat Fbybzba, naq nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry gung jrer
nffrzoyrq hagb uvz orsber gur nex, fnpevsvprq furrc naq bkra, juvpu
pbhyq abg or gbyq abe ahzorerq sbe zhygvghqr.

5:7 Naq gur cevrfgf oebhtug va gur nex bs gur pbiranag bs gur YBEQ
hagb uvf cynpr, gb gur benpyr bs gur ubhfr, vagb gur zbfg ubyl cynpr,
rira haqre gur jvatf bs gur purehovzf: 5:8 Sbe gur purehovzf fcernq
sbegu gurve jvatf bire gur cynpr bs gur nex, naq gur purehovzf pbirerq
gur nex naq gur fgnirf gurerbs nobir.

5:9 Naq gurl qerj bhg gur fgnirf bs gur nex, gung gur raqf bs gur
fgnirf jrer frra sebz gur nex orsber gur benpyr; ohg gurl jrer abg
frra jvgubhg. Naq gurer vg vf hagb guvf qnl.

5:10 Gurer jnf abguvat va gur nex fnir gur gjb gnoyrf juvpu Zbfrf chg
gurerva ng Ubero, jura gur YBEQ znqr n pbiranag jvgu gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry, jura gurl pnzr bhg bs Rtlcg.

5:11 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur cevrfgf jrer pbzr bhg bs gur ubyl
cynpr: (sbe nyy gur cevrfgf gung jrer cerfrag jrer fnapgvsvrq, naq qvq
abg gura jnvg ol pbhefr: 5:12 Nyfb gur Yrivgrf juvpu jrer gur fvatref,
nyy bs gurz bs Nfncu, bs Urzna, bs Wrqhguha, jvgu gurve fbaf naq gurve
oerguera, orvat neenlrq va juvgr yvara, univat plzonyf naq cfnygrevrf
naq unecf, fgbbq ng gur rnfg raq bs gur nygne, naq jvgu gurz na
uhaqerq naq gjragl cevrfgf fbhaqvat jvgu gehzcrgf:) 5:13 Vg pnzr rira
gb cnff, nf gur gehzcrgref naq fvatref jrer nf bar, gb znxr bar fbhaq
gb or urneq va cenvfvat naq gunaxvat gur YBEQ; naq jura gurl yvsgrq hc
gurve ibvpr jvgu gur gehzcrgf naq plzonyf naq vafgehzragf bs zhfvpx,
naq cenvfrq gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Sbe ur vf tbbq; sbe uvf zrepl raqhergu
sbe rire: gung gura gur ubhfr jnf svyyrq jvgu n pybhq, rira gur ubhfr
bs gur YBEQ; 5:14 Fb gung gur cevrfgf pbhyq abg fgnaq gb zvavfgre ol
ernfba bs gur pybhq: sbe gur tybel bs gur YBEQ unq svyyrq gur ubhfr bs
Tbq.

6:1 Gura fnvq Fbybzba, Gur YBEQ ungu fnvq gung ur jbhyq qjryy va gur
guvpx qnexarff.

6:2 Ohg V unir ohvyg na ubhfr bs unovgngvba sbe gurr, naq n cynpr sbe
gul qjryyvat sbe rire.

6:3 Naq gur xvat ghearq uvf snpr, naq oyrffrq gur jubyr pbatertngvba
bs Vfenry: naq nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry fgbbq.

6:4 Naq ur fnvq, Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, jub ungu jvgu uvf
unaqf shysvyyrq gung juvpu ur fcnxr jvgu uvf zbhgu gb zl sngure Qnivq,
fnlvat, 6:5 Fvapr gur qnl gung V oebhtug sbegu zl crbcyr bhg bs gur
ynaq bs Rtlcg V pubfr ab pvgl nzbat nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry gb ohvyq
na ubhfr va, gung zl anzr zvtug or gurer; arvgure pubfr V nal zna gb
or n ehyre bire zl crbcyr Vfenry: 6:6 Ohg V unir pubfra Wrehfnyrz,
gung zl anzr zvtug or gurer; naq unir pubfra Qnivq gb or bire zl
crbcyr Vfenry.

6:7 Abj vg jnf va gur urneg bs Qnivq zl sngure gb ohvyq na ubhfr sbe
gur anzr bs gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry.

6:8 Ohg gur YBEQ fnvq gb Qnivq zl sngure, Sbenfzhpu nf vg jnf va guvar
urneg gb ohvyq na ubhfr sbe zl anzr, gubh qvqfg jryy va gung vg jnf va
guvar urneg: 6:9 Abgjvgufgnaqvat gubh funyg abg ohvyq gur ubhfr; ohg
gul fba juvpu funyy pbzr sbegu bhg bs gul ybvaf, ur funyy ohvyq gur
ubhfr sbe zl anzr.

6:10 Gur YBEQ gurersber ungu cresbezrq uvf jbeq gung ur ungu fcbxra:
sbe V nz evfra hc va gur ebbz bs Qnivq zl sngure, naq nz frg ba gur
guebar bs Vfenry, nf gur YBEQ cebzvfrq, naq unir ohvyg gur ubhfr sbe
gur anzr bs gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry.

6:11 Naq va vg unir V chg gur nex, jurerva vf gur pbiranag bs gur
YBEQ, gung ur znqr jvgu gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

6:12 Naq ur fgbbq orsber gur nygne bs gur YBEQ va gur cerfrapr bs nyy
gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry, naq fcernq sbegu uvf unaqf: 6:13 Sbe
Fbybzba unq znqr n oenfra fpnssbyq bs svir phovgf ybat, naq svir
phovgf oebnq, naq guerr phovgf uvtu, naq unq frg vg va gur zvqfg bs
gur pbheg: naq hcba vg ur fgbbq, naq xarryrq qbja hcba uvf xarrf
orsber nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry, naq fcernq sbegu uvf unaqf
gbjneq urnira.

6:14 Naq fnvq, B YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, gurer vf ab Tbq yvxr gurr va gur
urnira, abe va gur rnegu; juvpu xrrcrfg pbiranag, naq furjrfg zrepl
hagb gul freinagf, gung jnyx orsber gurr jvgu nyy gurve urnegf: 6:15
Gubh juvpu unfg xrcg jvgu gul freinag Qnivq zl sngure gung juvpu gubh
unfg cebzvfrq uvz; naq fcnxrfg jvgu gul zbhgu, naq unfg shysvyyrq vg
jvgu guvar unaq, nf vg vf guvf qnl.

6:16 Abj gurersber, B YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, xrrc jvgu gul freinag Qnivq
zl sngure gung juvpu gubh unfg cebzvfrq uvz, fnlvat, Gurer funyy abg
snvy gurr n zna va zl fvtug gb fvg hcba gur guebar bs Vfenry; lrg fb
gung gul puvyqera gnxr urrq gb gurve jnl gb jnyx va zl ynj, nf gubh
unfg jnyxrq orsber zr.

6:17 Abj gura, B YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, yrg gul jbeq or irevsvrq, juvpu
gubh unfg fcbxra hagb gul freinag Qnivq.

6:18 Ohg jvyy Tbq va irel qrrq qjryy jvgu zra ba gur rnegu? orubyq,
urnira naq gur urnira bs urniraf pnaabg pbagnva gurr; ubj zhpu yrff
guvf ubhfr juvpu V unir ohvyg!  6:19 Unir erfcrpg gurersber gb gur
cenlre bs gul freinag, naq gb uvf fhccyvpngvba, B YBEQ zl Tbq, gb
urnexra hagb gur pel naq gur cenlre juvpu gul freinag cenlrgu orsber
gurr: 6:20 Gung guvar rlrf znl or bcra hcba guvf ubhfr qnl naq avtug,
hcba gur cynpr jurerbs gubh unfg fnvq gung gubh jbhyqrfg chg gul anzr
gurer; gb urnexra hagb gur cenlre juvpu gul freinag cenlrgu gbjneq
guvf cynpr.

6:21 Urnexra gurersber hagb gur fhccyvpngvbaf bs gul freinag, naq bs
gul crbcyr Vfenry, juvpu gurl funyy znxr gbjneq guvf cynpr: urne gubh
sebz gul qjryyvat cynpr, rira sebz urnira; naq jura gubh urnerfg,
sbetvir.

6:22 Vs n zna fva ntnvafg uvf arvtuobhe, naq na bngu or ynvq hcba uvz
gb znxr uvz fjrne, naq gur bngu pbzr orsber guvar nygne va guvf ubhfr;
6:23 Gura urne gubh sebz urnira, naq qb, naq whqtr gul freinagf, ol
erdhvgvat gur jvpxrq, ol erpbzcrafvat uvf jnl hcba uvf bja urnq; naq
ol whfgvslvat gur evtugrbhf, ol tvivat uvz nppbeqvat gb uvf
evtugrbhfarff.

6:24 Naq vs gul crbcyr Vfenry or chg gb gur jbefr orsber gur rarzl,
orpnhfr gurl unir fvaarq ntnvafg gurr; naq funyy erghea naq pbasrff
gul anzr, naq cenl naq znxr fhccyvpngvba orsber gurr va guvf ubhfr;
6:25 Gura urne gubh sebz gur urniraf, naq sbetvir gur fva bs gul
crbcyr Vfenry, naq oevat gurz ntnva hagb gur ynaq juvpu gubh tnirfg gb
gurz naq gb gurve snguref.

6:26 Jura gur urnira vf fuhg hc, naq gurer vf ab enva, orpnhfr gurl
unir fvaarq ntnvafg gurr; lrg vs gurl cenl gbjneq guvf cynpr, naq
pbasrff gul anzr, naq ghea sebz gurve fva, jura gubh qbfg nssyvpg
gurz; 6:27 Gura urne gubh sebz urnira, naq sbetvir gur fva bs gul
freinagf, naq bs gul crbcyr Vfenry, jura gubh unfg gnhtug gurz gur
tbbq jnl, jurerva gurl fubhyq jnyx; naq fraq enva hcba gul ynaq, juvpu
gubh unfg tvira hagb gul crbcyr sbe na vaurevgnapr.

6:28 Vs gurer or qrnegu va gur ynaq, vs gurer or crfgvyrapr, vs gurer
or oynfgvat, be zvyqrj, ybphfgf, be pngrecvyyref; vs gurve rarzvrf
orfvrtr gurz va gur pvgvrf bs gurve ynaq; jungfbrire fber be
jungfbrire fvpxarff gurer or: 6:29 Gura jung cenlre be jung
fhccyvpngvba fbrire funyy or znqr bs nal zna, be bs nyy gul crbcyr
Vfenry, jura rirel bar funyy xabj uvf bja fber naq uvf bja tevrs, naq
funyy fcernq sbegu uvf unaqf va guvf ubhfr: 6:30 Gura urne gubh sebz
urnira gul qjryyvat cynpr, naq sbetvir, naq eraqre hagb rirel zna
nppbeqvat hagb nyy uvf jnlf, jubfr urneg gubh xabjrfg; (sbe gubh bayl
xabjrfg gur urnegf bs gur puvyqera bs zra:) 6:31 Gung gurl znl srne
gurr, gb jnyx va gul jnlf, fb ybat nf gurl yvir va gur ynaq juvpu gubh
tnirfg hagb bhe snguref.

6:32 Zberbire pbapreavat gur fgenatre, juvpu vf abg bs gul crbcyr
Vfenry, ohg vf pbzr sebz n sne pbhagel sbe gul terng anzr'f fnxr, naq
gul zvtugl unaq, naq gul fgergpurq bhg nez; vs gurl pbzr naq cenl va
guvf ubhfr; 6:33 Gura urne gubh sebz gur urniraf, rira sebz gul
qjryyvat cynpr, naq qb nppbeqvat gb nyy gung gur fgenatre pnyyrgu gb
gurr sbe; gung nyy crbcyr bs gur rnegu znl xabj gul anzr, naq srne
gurr, nf qbgu gul crbcyr Vfenry, naq znl xabj gung guvf ubhfr juvpu V
unir ohvyg vf pnyyrq ol gul anzr.

6:34 Vs gul crbcyr tb bhg gb jne ntnvafg gurve rarzvrf ol gur jnl gung
gubh funyg fraq gurz, naq gurl cenl hagb gurr gbjneq guvf pvgl juvpu
gubh unfg pubfra, naq gur ubhfr juvpu V unir ohvyg sbe gul anzr; 6:35
Gura urne gubh sebz gur urniraf gurve cenlre naq gurve fhccyvpngvba,
naq znvagnva gurve pnhfr.

6:36 Vs gurl fva ntnvafg gurr, (sbe gurer vf ab zna juvpu fvaargu
abg,) naq gubh or natel jvgu gurz, naq qryvire gurz bire orsber gurve
rarzvrf, naq gurl pneel gurz njnl pncgvirf hagb n ynaq sne bss be
arne; 6:37 Lrg vs gurl orguvax gurzfryirf va gur ynaq juvgure gurl ner
pneevrq pncgvir, naq ghea naq cenl hagb gurr va gur ynaq bs gurve
pncgvivgl, fnlvat, Jr unir fvaarq, jr unir qbar nzvff, naq unir qrnyg
jvpxrqyl; 6:38 Vs gurl erghea gb gurr jvgu nyy gurve urneg naq jvgu
nyy gurve fbhy va gur ynaq bs gurve pncgvivgl, juvgure gurl unir
pneevrq gurz pncgvirf, naq cenl gbjneq gurve ynaq, juvpu gubh tnirfg
hagb gurve snguref, naq gbjneq gur pvgl juvpu gubh unfg pubfra, naq
gbjneq gur ubhfr juvpu V unir ohvyg sbe gul anzr: 6:39 Gura urne gubh
sebz gur urniraf, rira sebz gul qjryyvat cynpr, gurve cenlre naq gurve
fhccyvpngvbaf, naq znvagnva gurve pnhfr, naq sbetvir gul crbcyr juvpu
unir fvaarq ntnvafg gurr.

6:40 Abj, zl Tbq, yrg, V orfrrpu gurr, guvar rlrf or bcra, naq yrg
guvar rnef or nggrag hagb gur cenlre gung vf znqr va guvf cynpr.

6:41 Abj gurersber nevfr, B YBEQ Tbq, vagb gul erfgvat cynpr, gubh,
naq gur nex bs gul fgeratgu: yrg gul cevrfgf, B YBEQ Tbq, or pybgurq
jvgu fnyingvba, naq yrg gul fnvagf erwbvpr va tbbqarff.

6:42 B YBEQ Tbq, ghea abg njnl gur snpr bs guvar nabvagrq: erzrzore
gur zrepvrf bs Qnivq gul freinag.

7:1 Abj jura Fbybzba unq znqr na raq bs cenlvat, gur sver pnzr qbja
sebz urnira, naq pbafhzrq gur oheag bssrevat naq gur fnpevsvprf; naq
gur tybel bs gur YBEQ svyyrq gur ubhfr.

7:2 Naq gur cevrfgf pbhyq abg ragre vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ,
orpnhfr gur tybel bs gur YBEQ unq svyyrq gur YBEQ'f ubhfr.

7:3 Naq jura nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fnj ubj gur sver pnzr qbja,
naq gur tybel bs gur YBEQ hcba gur ubhfr, gurl objrq gurzfryirf jvgu
gurve snprf gb gur tebhaq hcba gur cnirzrag, naq jbefuvccrq, naq
cenvfrq gur YBEQ, fnlvat, Sbe ur vf tbbq; sbe uvf zrepl raqhergu sbe
rire.

7:4 Gura gur xvat naq nyy gur crbcyr bssrerq fnpevsvprf orsber gur
YBEQ.

7:5 Naq xvat Fbybzba bssrerq n fnpevsvpr bs gjragl naq gjb gubhfnaq
bkra, naq na uhaqerq naq gjragl gubhfnaq furrc: fb gur xvat naq nyy
gur crbcyr qrqvpngrq gur ubhfr bs Tbq.

7:6 Naq gur cevrfgf jnvgrq ba gurve bssvprf: gur Yrivgrf nyfb jvgu
vafgehzragf bs zhfvpx bs gur YBEQ, juvpu Qnivq gur xvat unq znqr gb
cenvfr gur YBEQ, orpnhfr uvf zrepl raqhergu sbe rire, jura Qnivq
cenvfrq ol gurve zvavfgel; naq gur cevrfgf fbhaqrq gehzcrgf orsber
gurz, naq nyy Vfenry fgbbq.

7:7 Zberbire Fbybzba unyybjrq gur zvqqyr bs gur pbheg gung jnf orsber
gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ: sbe gurer ur bssrerq oheag bssrevatf, naq gur
sng bs gur crnpr bssrevatf, orpnhfr gur oenfra nygne juvpu Fbybzba unq
znqr jnf abg noyr gb erprvir gur oheag bssrevatf, naq gur zrng
bssrevatf, naq gur sng.

7:8 Nyfb ng gur fnzr gvzr Fbybzba xrcg gur srnfg frira qnlf, naq nyy
Vfenry jvgu uvz, n irel terng pbatertngvba, sebz gur ragrevat va bs
Unzngu hagb gur evire bs Rtlcg.

7:9 Naq va gur rvtugu qnl gurl znqr n fbyrza nffrzoyl: sbe gurl xrcg
gur qrqvpngvba bs gur nygne frira qnlf, naq gur srnfg frira qnlf.

7:10 Naq ba gur guerr naq gjragvrgu qnl bs gur friragu zbagu ur frag
gur crbcyr njnl vagb gurve gragf, tynq naq zreel va urneg sbe gur
tbbqarff gung gur YBEQ unq furjrq hagb Qnivq, naq gb Fbybzba, naq gb
Vfenry uvf crbcyr.

7:11 Guhf Fbybzba svavfurq gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq gur xvat'f
ubhfr: naq nyy gung pnzr vagb Fbybzba'f urneg gb znxr va gur ubhfr bs
gur YBEQ, naq va uvf bja ubhfr, ur cebfcrebhfyl rssrpgrq.

7:12 Naq gur YBEQ nccrnerq gb Fbybzba ol avtug, naq fnvq hagb uvz, V
unir urneq gul cenlre, naq unir pubfra guvf cynpr gb zlfrys sbe na
ubhfr bs fnpevsvpr.

7:13 Vs V fuhg hc urnira gung gurer or ab enva, be vs V pbzznaq gur
ybphfgf gb qribhe gur ynaq, be vs V fraq crfgvyrapr nzbat zl crbcyr;
7:14 Vs zl crbcyr, juvpu ner pnyyrq ol zl anzr, funyy uhzoyr
gurzfryirf, naq cenl, naq frrx zl snpr, naq ghea sebz gurve jvpxrq
jnlf; gura jvyy V urne sebz urnira, naq jvyy sbetvir gurve fva, naq
jvyy urny gurve ynaq.

7:15 Abj zvar rlrf funyy or bcra, naq zvar rnef nggrag hagb gur cenlre
gung vf znqr va guvf cynpr.

7:16 Sbe abj unir V pubfra naq fnapgvsvrq guvf ubhfr, gung zl anzr znl
or gurer sbe rire: naq zvar rlrf naq zvar urneg funyy or gurer
crecrghnyyl.

7:17 Naq nf sbe gurr, vs gubh jvyg jnyx orsber zr, nf Qnivq gul sngure
jnyxrq, naq qb nppbeqvat gb nyy gung V unir pbzznaqrq gurr, naq funyg
bofreir zl fgnghgrf naq zl whqtzragf; 7:18 Gura jvyy V fgnoyvfu gur
guebar bs gul xvatqbz, nppbeqvat nf V unir pbiranagrq jvgu Qnivq gul
sngure, fnlvat, Gurer funyy abg snvy gurr n zna gb or ehyre va Vfenry.

7:19 Ohg vs lr ghea njnl, naq sbefnxr zl fgnghgrf naq zl pbzznaqzragf,
juvpu V unir frg orsber lbh, naq funyy tb naq freir bgure tbqf, naq
jbefuvc gurz; 7:20 Gura jvyy V cyhpx gurz hc ol gur ebbgf bhg bs zl
ynaq juvpu V unir tvira gurz; naq guvf ubhfr, juvpu V unir fnapgvsvrq
sbe zl anzr, jvyy V pnfg bhg bs zl fvtug, naq jvyy znxr vg gb or n
cebireo naq n oljbeq nzbat nyy angvbaf.

7:21 Naq guvf ubhfr, juvpu vf uvtu, funyy or na nfgbavfuzrag gb rirel
bar gung cnffrgu ol vg; fb gung ur funyy fnl, Jul ungu gur YBEQ qbar
guhf hagb guvf ynaq, naq hagb guvf ubhfr?  7:22 Naq vg funyy or
nafjrerq, Orpnhfr gurl sbefbbx gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve snguref, juvpu
oebhtug gurz sbegu bhg bs gur ynaq bs Rtlcg, naq ynvq ubyq ba bgure
tbqf, naq jbefuvccrq gurz, naq freirq gurz: gurersber ungu ur oebhtug
nyy guvf rivy hcba gurz.

8:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur raq bs gjragl lrnef, jurerva Fbybzba
unq ohvyg gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq uvf bja ubhfr, 8:2 Gung gur
pvgvrf juvpu Uhenz unq erfgberq gb Fbybzba, Fbybzba ohvyg gurz, naq
pnhfrq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gb qjryy gurer.

8:3 Naq Fbybzba jrag gb Unzngumbonu, naq cerinvyrq ntnvafg vg.

8:4 Naq ur ohvyg Gnqzbe va gur jvyqrearff, naq nyy gur fgber pvgvrf,
juvpu ur ohvyg va Unzngu.

8:5 Nyfb ur ohvyg Orguubeba gur hccre, naq Orguubeba gur argure,
sraprq pvgvrf, jvgu jnyyf, tngrf, naq onef; 8:6 Naq Onnyngu, naq nyy
gur fgber pvgvrf gung Fbybzba unq, naq nyy gur punevbg pvgvrf, naq gur
pvgvrf bs gur ubefrzra, naq nyy gung Fbybzba qrfverq gb ohvyq va
Wrehfnyrz, naq va Yronaba, naq guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs uvf
qbzvavba.

8:7 Nf sbe nyy gur crbcyr gung jrer yrsg bs gur Uvggvgrf, naq gur
Nzbevgrf, naq gur Crevmmvgrf, naq gur Uvivgrf, naq gur Wrohfvgrf,
juvpu jrer abg bs Vfenry, 8:8 Ohg bs gurve puvyqera, jub jrer yrsg
nsgre gurz va gur ynaq, jubz gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pbafhzrq abg, gurz
qvq Fbybzba znxr gb cnl gevohgr hagvy guvf qnl.

8:9 Ohg bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry qvq Fbybzba znxr ab freinagf sbe uvf
jbex; ohg gurl jrer zra bs jne, naq puvrs bs uvf pncgnvaf, naq
pncgnvaf bs uvf punevbgf naq ubefrzra.

8:10 Naq gurfr jrer gur puvrs bs xvat Fbybzba'f bssvpref, rira gjb
uhaqerq naq svsgl, gung oner ehyr bire gur crbcyr.

8:11 Naq Fbybzba oebhtug hc gur qnhtugre bs Cunenbu bhg bs gur pvgl bs
Qnivq hagb gur ubhfr gung ur unq ohvyg sbe ure: sbe ur fnvq, Zl jvsr
funyy abg qjryy va gur ubhfr bs Qnivq xvat bs Vfenry, orpnhfr gur
cynprf ner ubyl, jurerhagb gur nex bs gur YBEQ ungu pbzr.

8:12 Gura Fbybzba bssrerq oheag bssrevatf hagb gur YBEQ ba gur nygne
bs gur YBEQ, juvpu ur unq ohvyg orsber gur cbepu, 8:13 Rira nsgre n
pregnva engr rirel qnl, bssrevat nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs
Zbfrf, ba gur fnoonguf, naq ba gur arj zbbaf, naq ba gur fbyrza
srnfgf, guerr gvzrf va gur lrne, rira va gur srnfg bs hayrnirarq
oernq, naq va gur srnfg bs jrrxf, naq va gur srnfg bs gnoreanpyrf.

8:14 Naq ur nccbvagrq, nppbeqvat gb gur beqre bs Qnivq uvf sngure, gur
pbhefrf bs gur cevrfgf gb gurve freivpr, naq gur Yrivgrf gb gurve
punetrf, gb cenvfr naq zvavfgre orsber gur cevrfgf, nf gur qhgl bs
rirel qnl erdhverq: gur cbegref nyfb ol gurve pbhefrf ng rirel tngr:
sbe fb unq Qnivq gur zna bs Tbq pbzznaqrq.

8:15 Naq gurl qrcnegrq abg sebz gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur xvat hagb gur
cevrfgf naq Yrivgrf pbapreavat nal znggre, be pbapreavat gur
gernfherf.

8:16 Abj nyy gur jbex bs Fbybzba jnf cercnerq hagb gur qnl bs gur
sbhaqngvba bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq hagvy vg jnf svavfurq. Fb gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ jnf cresrpgrq.

8:17 Gura jrag Fbybzba gb Rmvbatrore, naq gb Rybgu, ng gur frn fvqr va
gur ynaq bs Rqbz.

8:18 Naq Uhenz frag uvz ol gur unaqf bs uvf freinagf fuvcf, naq
freinagf gung unq xabjyrqtr bs gur frn; naq gurl jrag jvgu gur
freinagf bs Fbybzba gb Bcuve, naq gbbx gurapr sbhe uhaqerq naq svsgl
gnyragf bs tbyq, naq oebhtug gurz gb xvat Fbybzba.

9:1 Naq jura gur dhrra bs Furon urneq bs gur snzr bs Fbybzba, fur pnzr
gb cebir Fbybzba jvgu uneq dhrfgvbaf ng Wrehfnyrz, jvgu n irel terng
pbzcnal, naq pnzryf gung oner fcvprf, naq tbyq va nohaqnapr, naq
