cerpvbhf fgbarf: naq jura fur jnf pbzr gb Fbybzba, fur pbzzharq jvgu
uvz bs nyy gung jnf va ure urneg.

9:2 Naq Fbybzba gbyq ure nyy ure dhrfgvbaf: naq gurer jnf abguvat uvq
sebz Fbybzba juvpu ur gbyq ure abg.

9:3 Naq jura gur dhrra bs Furon unq frra gur jvfqbz bs Fbybzba, naq
gur ubhfr gung ur unq ohvyg, 9:4 Naq gur zrng bs uvf gnoyr, naq gur
fvggvat bs uvf freinagf, naq gur nggraqnapr bs uvf zvavfgref, naq
gurve nccnery; uvf phcorneref nyfb, naq gurve nccnery; naq uvf nfprag
ol juvpu ur jrag hc vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ; gurer jnf ab zber
fcvevg va ure.

9:5 Naq fur fnvq gb gur xvat, Vg jnf n gehr ercbeg juvpu V urneq va
zvar bja ynaq bs guvar npgf, naq bs gul jvfqbz: 9:6 Ubjorvg V oryvrirq
abg gurve jbeqf, hagvy V pnzr, naq zvar rlrf unq frra vg: naq, orubyq,
gur bar unys bs gur terngarff bs gul jvfqbz jnf abg gbyq zr: sbe gubh
rkprrqrfg gur snzr gung V urneq.

9:7 Unccl ner gul zra, naq unccl ner gurfr gul freinagf, juvpu fgnaq
pbagvahnyyl orsber gurr, naq urne gul jvfqbz.

9:8 Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ gul Tbq, juvpu qryvtugrq va gurr gb frg gurr
ba uvf guebar, gb or xvat sbe gur YBEQ gul Tbq: orpnhfr gul Tbq ybirq
Vfenry, gb rfgnoyvfu gurz sbe rire, gurersber znqr ur gurr xvat bire
gurz, gb qb whqtzrag naq whfgvpr.

9:9 Naq fur tnir gur xvat na uhaqerq naq gjragl gnyragf bs tbyq, naq
bs fcvprf terng nohaqnapr, naq cerpvbhf fgbarf: arvgure jnf gurer nal
fhpu fcvpr nf gur dhrra bs Furon tnir xvat Fbybzba.

9:10 Naq gur freinagf nyfb bs Uhenz, naq gur freinagf bs Fbybzba,
juvpu oebhtug tbyq sebz Bcuve, oebhtug nythz gerrf naq cerpvbhf
fgbarf.

9:11 Naq gur xvat znqr bs gur nythz gerrf greenprf gb gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ, naq gb gur xvat'f cnynpr, naq unecf naq cfnygrevrf sbe fvatref:
naq gurer jrer abar fhpu frra orsber va gur ynaq bs Whqnu.

9:12 Naq xvat Fbybzba tnir gb gur dhrra bs Furon nyy ure qrfver,
jungfbrire fur nfxrq, orfvqr gung juvpu fur unq oebhtug hagb gur xvat.
Fb fur ghearq, naq jrag njnl gb ure bja ynaq, fur naq ure freinagf.

9:13 Abj gur jrvtug bs tbyq gung pnzr gb Fbybzba va bar lrne jnf fvk
uhaqerq naq guerrfpber naq fvk gnyragf bs tbyq; 9:14 Orfvqr gung juvpu
punczra naq zrepunagf oebhtug. Naq nyy gur xvatf bs Nenovn naq
tbireabef bs gur pbhagel oebhtug tbyq naq fvyire gb Fbybzba.

9:15 Naq xvat Fbybzba znqr gjb uhaqerq gnetrgf bs orngra tbyq: fvk
uhaqerq furxryf bs orngra tbyq jrag gb bar gnetrg.

9:16 Naq guerr uhaqerq fuvryqf znqr ur bs orngra tbyq: guerr uhaqerq
furxryf bs tbyq jrag gb bar fuvryq. Naq gur xvat chg gurz va gur ubhfr
bs gur sberfg bs Yronaba.

9:17 Zberbire gur xvat znqr n terng guebar bs vibel, naq bireynvq vg
jvgu cher tbyq.

9:18 Naq gurer jrer fvk fgrcf gb gur guebar, jvgu n sbbgfgbby bs tbyq,
juvpu jrer snfgrarq gb gur guebar, naq fgnlf ba rnpu fvqr bs gur
fvggvat cynpr, naq gjb yvbaf fgnaqvat ol gur fgnlf: 9:19 Naq gjryir
yvbaf fgbbq gurer ba gur bar fvqr naq ba gur bgure hcba gur fvk fgrcf.
Gurer jnf abg gur yvxr znqr va nal xvatqbz.

9:20 Naq nyy gur qevaxvat irffryf bs xvat Fbybzba jrer bs tbyq, naq
nyy gur irffryf bs gur ubhfr bs gur sberfg bs Yronaba jrer bs cher
tbyq: abar jrer bs fvyire; vg jnf abg nal guvat nppbhagrq bs va gur
qnlf bs Fbybzba.

9:21 Sbe gur xvat'f fuvcf jrag gb Gnefuvfu jvgu gur freinagf bs Uhenz:
rirel guerr lrnef bapr pnzr gur fuvcf bs Gnefuvfu oevatvat tbyq, naq
fvyire, vibel, naq ncrf, naq crnpbpxf.

9:22 Naq xvat Fbybzba cnffrq nyy gur xvatf bs gur rnegu va evpurf naq
jvfqbz.

9:23 Naq nyy gur xvatf bs gur rnegu fbhtug gur cerfrapr bs Fbybzba, gb
urne uvf jvfqbz, gung Tbq unq chg va uvf urneg.

9:24 Naq gurl oebhtug rirel zna uvf cerfrag, irffryf bs fvyire, naq
irffryf bs tbyq, naq envzrag, unearff, naq fcvprf, ubefrf, naq zhyrf,
n engr lrne ol lrne.

9:25 Naq Fbybzba unq sbhe gubhfnaq fgnyyf sbe ubefrf naq punevbgf, naq
gjryir gubhfnaq ubefrzra; jubz ur orfgbjrq va gur punevbg pvgvrf, naq
jvgu gur xvat ng Wrehfnyrz.

9:26 Naq ur ervtarq bire nyy gur xvatf sebz gur evire rira hagb gur
ynaq bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq gb gur obeqre bs Rtlcg.

9:27 Naq gur xvat znqr fvyire va Wrehfnyrz nf fgbarf, naq prqne gerrf
znqr ur nf gur flpbzber gerrf gung ner va gur ybj cynvaf va nohaqnapr.

9:28 Naq gurl oebhtug hagb Fbybzba ubefrf bhg bs Rtlcg, naq bhg bs nyy
ynaqf.

9:29 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Fbybzba, svefg naq ynfg, ner gurl abg
jevggra va gur obbx bs Anguna gur cebcurg, naq va gur cebcurpl bs
Nuvwnu gur Fuvybavgr, naq va gur ivfvbaf bs Vqqb gur frre ntnvafg
Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong?  9:30 Naq Fbybzba ervtarq va Wrehfnyrz bire
nyy Vfenry sbegl lrnef.

9:31 Naq Fbybzba fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq ur jnf ohevrq va gur pvgl
bs Qnivq uvf sngure: naq Erubobnz uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

10:1 Naq Erubobnz jrag gb Furpurz: sbe gb Furpurz jrer nyy Vfenry pbzr
gb znxr uvz xvat.

10:2 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, jub jnf va
Rtlcg, juvgure ur syrq sebz gur cerfrapr bs Fbybzba gur xvat, urneq
vg, gung Wrebobnz erghearq bhg bs Rtlcg.

10:3 Naq gurl frag naq pnyyrq uvz. Fb Wrebobnz naq nyy Vfenry pnzr naq
fcnxr gb Erubobnz, fnlvat, 10:4 Gul sngure znqr bhe lbxr tevribhf: abj
gurersber rnfr gubh fbzrjung gur tevribhf freivghqr bs gul sngure, naq
uvf urnil lbxr gung ur chg hcba hf, naq jr jvyy freir gurr.

10:5 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Pbzr ntnva hagb zr nsgre guerr qnlf. Naq
gur crbcyr qrcnegrq.

10:6 Naq xvat Erubobnz gbbx pbhafry jvgu gur byq zra gung unq fgbbq
orsber Fbybzba uvf sngure juvyr ur lrg yvirq, fnlvat, Jung pbhafry
tvir lr zr gb erghea nafjre gb guvf crbcyr?  10:7 Naq gurl fcnxr hagb
uvz, fnlvat, Vs gubh or xvaq gb guvf crbcyr, naq cyrnfr gurz, naq
fcrnx tbbq jbeqf gb gurz, gurl jvyy or gul freinagf sbe rire.

10:8 Ohg ur sbefbbx gur pbhafry juvpu gur byq zra tnir uvz, naq gbbx
pbhafry jvgu gur lbhat zra gung jrer oebhtug hc jvgu uvz, gung fgbbq
orsber uvz.

10:9 Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Jung nqivpr tvir lr gung jr znl erghea
nafjre gb guvf crbcyr, juvpu unir fcbxra gb zr, fnlvat, Rnfr fbzrjung
gur lbxr gung gul sngure qvq chg hcba hf?  10:10 Naq gur lbhat zra
gung jrer oebhtug hc jvgu uvz fcnxr hagb uvz, fnlvat, Guhf funyg gubh
nafjre gur crbcyr gung fcnxr hagb gurr, fnlvat, Gul sngure znqr bhe
lbxr urnil, ohg znxr gubh vg fbzrjung yvtugre sbe hf; guhf funyg gubh
fnl hagb gurz, Zl yvggyr svatre funyy or guvpxre guna zl sngure'f
ybvaf.

10:11 Sbe jurernf zl sngure chg n urnil lbxr hcba lbh, V jvyy chg zber
gb lbhe lbxr: zl sngure punfgvfrq lbh jvgu juvcf, ohg V jvyy punfgvfr
lbh jvgu fpbecvbaf.

10:12 Fb Wrebobnz naq nyy gur crbcyr pnzr gb Erubobnz ba gur guveq
qnl, nf gur xvat onqr, fnlvat, Pbzr ntnva gb zr ba gur guveq qnl.

10:13 Naq gur xvat nafjrerq gurz ebhtuyl; naq xvat Erubobnz sbefbbx
gur pbhafry bs gur byq zra, 10:14 Naq nafjrerq gurz nsgre gur nqivpr
bs gur lbhat zra, fnlvat, Zl sngure znqr lbhe lbxr urnil, ohg V jvyy
nqq gurergb: zl sngure punfgvfrq lbh jvgu juvcf, ohg V jvyy punfgvfr
lbh jvgu fpbecvbaf.

10:15 Fb gur xvat urnexrarq abg hagb gur crbcyr: sbe gur pnhfr jnf bs
Tbq, gung gur YBEQ zvtug cresbez uvf jbeq, juvpu ur fcnxr ol gur unaq
bs Nuvwnu gur Fuvybavgr gb Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong.

10:16 Naq jura nyy Vfenry fnj gung gur xvat jbhyq abg urnexra hagb
gurz, gur crbcyr nafjrerq gur xvat, fnlvat, Jung cbegvba unir jr va
Qnivq?  naq jr unir abar vaurevgnapr va gur fba bs Wrffr: rirel zna gb
lbhe gragf, B Vfenry: naq abj, Qnivq, frr gb guvar bja ubhfr. Fb nyy
Vfenry jrag gb gurve gragf.

10:17 Ohg nf sbe gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gung qjryg va gur pvgvrf bs
Whqnu, Erubobnz ervtarq bire gurz.

10:18 Gura xvat Erubobnz frag Unqbenz gung jnf bire gur gevohgr; naq
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fgbarq uvz jvgu fgbarf, gung ur qvrq. Ohg xvat
Erubobnz znqr fcrrq gb trg uvz hc gb uvf punevbg, gb syrr gb
Wrehfnyrz.

10:19 Naq Vfenry eroryyrq ntnvafg gur ubhfr bs Qnivq hagb guvf qnl.

11:1 Naq jura Erubobnz jnf pbzr gb Wrehfnyrz, ur tngurerq bs gur ubhfr
bs Whqnu naq Orawnzva na uhaqerq naq sbhefpber gubhfnaq pubfra zra,
juvpu jrer jneevbef, gb svtug ntnvafg Vfenry, gung ur zvtug oevat gur
xvatqbz ntnva gb Erubobnz.

11:2 Ohg gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ pnzr gb Furznvnu gur zna bs Tbq, fnlvat,
11:3 Fcrnx hagb Erubobnz gur fba bs Fbybzba, xvat bs Whqnu, naq gb nyy
Vfenry va Whqnu naq Orawnzva, fnlvat, 11:4 Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Lr
funyy abg tb hc, abe svtug ntnvafg lbhe oerguera: erghea rirel zna gb
uvf ubhfr: sbe guvf guvat vf qbar bs zr. Naq gurl borlrq gur jbeqf bs
gur YBEQ, naq erghearq sebz tbvat ntnvafg Wrebobnz.

11:5 Naq Erubobnz qjryg va Wrehfnyrz, naq ohvyg pvgvrf sbe qrsrapr va
Whqnu.

11:6 Ur ohvyg rira Orguyrurz, naq Rgnz, naq Grxbn, 11:7 Naq Orgumhe,
naq Fubpb, naq Nqhyynz, 11:8 Naq Tngu, naq Znerfunu, naq Mvcu, 11:9
Naq Nqbenvz, naq Ynpuvfu, naq Nmrxnu, 11:10 Naq Mbenu, naq Nvwnyba,
naq Uroeba, juvpu ner va Whqnu naq va Orawnzva sraprq pvgvrf.

11:11 Naq ur sbegvsvrq gur fgebat ubyqf, naq chg pncgnvaf va gurz, naq
fgber bs ivpghny, naq bs bvy naq jvar.

11:12 Naq va rirel frireny pvgl ur chg fuvryqf naq fcrnef, naq znqr
gurz rkprrqvat fgebat, univat Whqnu naq Orawnzva ba uvf fvqr.

11:13 Naq gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf gung jrer va nyy Vfenry erfbegrq
gb uvz bhg bs nyy gurve pbnfgf.

11:14 Sbe gur Yrivgrf yrsg gurve fhoheof naq gurve cbffrffvba, naq
pnzr gb Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz: sbe Wrebobnz naq uvf fbaf unq pnfg gurz
bss sebz rkrphgvat gur cevrfg'f bssvpr hagb gur YBEQ: 11:15 Naq ur
beqnvarq uvz cevrfgf sbe gur uvtu cynprf, naq sbe gur qrivyf, naq sbe
gur pnyirf juvpu ur unq znqr.

11:16 Naq nsgre gurz bhg bs nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry fhpu nf frg gurve
urnegf gb frrx gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry pnzr gb Wrehfnyrz, gb fnpevsvpr
hagb gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve snguref.

11:17 Fb gurl fgeratgurarq gur xvatqbz bs Whqnu, naq znqr Erubobnz gur
fba bs Fbybzba fgebat, guerr lrnef: sbe guerr lrnef gurl jnyxrq va gur
jnl bs Qnivq naq Fbybzba.

11:18 Naq Erubobnz gbbx uvz Znunyngu gur qnhtugre bs Wrevzbgu gur fba
bs Qnivq gb jvsr, naq Novunvy gur qnhtugre bs Ryvno gur fba bs Wrffr;
11:19 Juvpu oner uvz puvyqera; Wrhfu, naq Funznevnu, naq Mnunz.

11:20 Naq nsgre ure ur gbbx Znnpunu gur qnhtugre bs Nofnybz; juvpu
oner uvz Novwnu, naq Nggnv, naq Mvmn, naq Furybzvgu.

11:21 Naq Erubobnz ybirq Znnpunu gur qnhtugre bs Nofnybz nobir nyy uvf
jvirf naq uvf pbaphovarf: (sbe ur gbbx rvtugrra jvirf, naq guerrfpber
pbaphovarf; naq ortng gjragl naq rvtug fbaf, naq guerrfpber
qnhtugref.)  11:22 Naq Erubobnz znqr Novwnu gur fba bs Znnpunu gur
puvrs, gb or ehyre nzbat uvf oerguera: sbe ur gubhtug gb znxr uvz
xvat.

11:23 Naq ur qrnyg jvfryl, naq qvfcrefrq bs nyy uvf puvyqera
guebhtubhg nyy gur pbhagevrf bs Whqnu naq Orawnzva, hagb rirel sraprq
pvgl: naq ur tnir gurz ivpghny va nohaqnapr. Naq ur qrfverq znal
jvirf.

12:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Erubobnz unq rfgnoyvfurq gur xvatqbz,
naq unq fgeratgurarq uvzfrys, ur sbefbbx gur ynj bs gur YBEQ, naq nyy
Vfenry jvgu uvz.

12:2 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung va gur svsgu lrne bs xvat Erubobnz
Fuvfunx xvat bs Rtlcg pnzr hc ntnvafg Wrehfnyrz, orpnhfr gurl unq
genafterffrq ntnvafg gur YBEQ, 12:3 Jvgu gjryir uhaqerq punevbgf, naq
guerrfpber gubhfnaq ubefrzra: naq gur crbcyr jrer jvgubhg ahzore gung
pnzr jvgu uvz bhg bs Rtlcg; gur Yhovzf, gur Fhxxvvzf, naq gur
Rguvbcvnaf.

12:4 Naq ur gbbx gur sraprq pvgvrf juvpu cregnvarq gb Whqnu, naq pnzr
gb Wrehfnyrz.

12:5 Gura pnzr Furznvnu gur cebcurg gb Erubobnz, naq gb gur cevaprf bs
Whqnu, gung jrer tngurerq gbtrgure gb Wrehfnyrz orpnhfr bs Fuvfunx,
naq fnvq hagb gurz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Lr unir sbefnxra zr, naq
gurersber unir V nyfb yrsg lbh va gur unaq bs Fuvfunx.

12:6 Jurerhcba gur cevaprf bs Vfenry naq gur xvat uhzoyrq gurzfryirf;
naq gurl fnvq, Gur YBEQ vf evtugrbhf.

12:7 Naq jura gur YBEQ fnj gung gurl uhzoyrq gurzfryirf, gur jbeq bs
gur YBEQ pnzr gb Furznvnu, fnlvat, Gurl unir uhzoyrq gurzfryirf;
gurersber V jvyy abg qrfgebl gurz, ohg V jvyy tenag gurz fbzr
qryvirenapr; naq zl jengu funyy abg or cbherq bhg hcba Wrehfnyrz ol
gur unaq bs Fuvfunx.

12:8 Arireguryrff gurl funyy or uvf freinagf; gung gurl znl xabj zl
freivpr, naq gur freivpr bs gur xvatqbzf bs gur pbhagevrf.

12:9 Fb Fuvfunx xvat bs Rtlcg pnzr hc ntnvafg Wrehfnyrz, naq gbbx njnl
gur gernfherf bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq gur gernfherf bs gur
xvat'f ubhfr; ur gbbx nyy: ur pneevrq njnl nyfb gur fuvryqf bs tbyq
juvpu Fbybzba unq znqr.

12:10 Vafgrnq bs juvpu xvat Erubobnz znqr fuvryqf bs oenff, naq
pbzzvggrq gurz gb gur unaqf bs gur puvrs bs gur thneq, gung xrcg gur
ragenapr bs gur xvat'f ubhfr.

12:11 Naq jura gur xvat ragrerq vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, gur thneq
pnzr naq srgpurq gurz, naq oebhtug gurz ntnva vagb gur thneq punzore.

12:12 Naq jura ur uhzoyrq uvzfrys, gur jengu bs gur YBEQ ghearq sebz
uvz, gung ur jbhyq abg qrfgebl uvz nygbtrgure: naq nyfb va Whqnu
guvatf jrag jryy.

12:13 Fb xvat Erubobnz fgeratgurarq uvzfrys va Wrehfnyrz, naq ervtarq:
sbe Erubobnz jnf bar naq sbegl lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq
ur ervtarq friragrra lrnef va Wrehfnyrz, gur pvgl juvpu gur YBEQ unq
pubfra bhg bs nyy gur gevorf bs Vfenry, gb chg uvf anzr gurer. Naq uvf
zbgure'f anzr jnf Annznu na Nzzbavgrff.

12:14 Naq ur qvq rivy, orpnhfr ur cercnerq abg uvf urneg gb frrx gur
YBEQ.

12:15 Abj gur npgf bs Erubobnz, svefg naq ynfg, ner gurl abg jevggra
va gur obbx bs Furznvnu gur cebcurg, naq bs Vqqb gur frre pbapreavat
trarnybtvrf? Naq gurer jrer jnef orgjrra Erubobnz naq Wrebobnz
pbagvahnyyl.

12:16 Naq Erubobnz fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq jnf ohevrq va gur pvgl
bs Qnivq: naq Novwnu uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

13:1 Abj va gur rvtugrragu lrne bs xvat Wrebobnz ortna Novwnu gb ervta
bire Whqnu.

13:2 Ur ervtarq guerr lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Uvf zbgure'f anzr nyfb jnf
Zvpunvnu gur qnhtugre bs Hevry bs Tvornu. Naq gurer jnf jne orgjrra
Novwnu naq Wrebobnz.

13:3 Naq Novwnu frg gur onggyr va neenl jvgu na nezl bs inyvnag zra bs
jne, rira sbhe uhaqerq gubhfnaq pubfra zra: Wrebobnz nyfb frg gur
onggyr va neenl ntnvafg uvz jvgu rvtug uhaqerq gubhfnaq pubfra zra,
orvat zvtugl zra bs inybhe.

13:4 Naq Novwnu fgbbq hc hcba zbhag Mrznenvz, juvpu vf va zbhag
Rcuenvz, naq fnvq, Urne zr, gubh Wrebobnz, naq nyy Vfenry; 13:5 Bhtug
lr abg gb xabj gung gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry tnir gur xvatqbz bire
Vfenry gb Qnivq sbe rire, rira gb uvz naq gb uvf fbaf ol n pbiranag bs
fnyg?  13:6 Lrg Wrebobnz gur fba bs Arong, gur freinag bs Fbybzba gur
fba bs Qnivq, vf evfra hc, naq ungu eroryyrq ntnvafg uvf ybeq.

13:7 Naq gurer ner tngurerq hagb uvz inva zra, gur puvyqera bs Oryvny,
naq unir fgeratgurarq gurzfryirf ntnvafg Erubobnz gur fba bs Fbybzba,
jura Erubobnz jnf lbhat naq graqreurnegrq, naq pbhyq abg jvgufgnaq
gurz.

13:8 Naq abj lr guvax gb jvgufgnaq gur xvatqbz bs gur YBEQ va gur unaq
bs gur fbaf bs Qnivq; naq lr or n terng zhygvghqr, naq gurer ner jvgu
lbhe tbyqra pnyirf, juvpu Wrebobnz znqr lbh sbe tbqf.

13:9 Unir lr abg pnfg bhg gur cevrfgf bs gur YBEQ, gur fbaf bs Nneba,
naq gur Yrivgrf, naq unir znqr lbh cevrfgf nsgre gur znaare bs gur
angvbaf bs bgure ynaqf? fb gung jubfbrire pbzrgu gb pbafrpengr uvzfrys
jvgu n lbhat ohyybpx naq frira enzf, gur fnzr znl or n cevrfg bs gurz
gung ner ab tbqf.

13:10 Ohg nf sbe hf, gur YBEQ vf bhe Tbq, naq jr unir abg sbefnxra
uvz; naq gur cevrfgf, juvpu zvavfgre hagb gur YBEQ, ner gur fbaf bs
Nneba, naq gur Yrivgrf jnvg hcba gurve ohfvarff: 13:11 Naq gurl ohea
hagb gur YBEQ rirel zbeavat naq rirel riravat oheag fnpevsvprf naq
fjrrg vaprafr: gur furjoernq nyfb frg gurl va beqre hcba gur cher
gnoyr; naq gur pnaqyrfgvpx bs tbyq jvgu gur ynzcf gurerbs, gb ohea
rirel riravat: sbe jr xrrc gur punetr bs gur YBEQ bhe Tbq; ohg lr unir
sbefnxra uvz.

13:12 Naq, orubyq, Tbq uvzfrys vf jvgu hf sbe bhe pncgnva, naq uvf
cevrfgf jvgu fbhaqvat gehzcrgf gb pel nynez ntnvafg lbh. B puvyqera bs
Vfenry, svtug lr abg ntnvafg gur YBEQ Tbq bs lbhe snguref; sbe lr
funyy abg cebfcre.

13:13 Ohg Wrebobnz pnhfrq na nzohfuzrag gb pbzr nobhg oruvaq gurz: fb
gurl jrer orsber Whqnu, naq gur nzohfuzrag jnf oruvaq gurz.

13:14 Naq jura Whqnu ybbxrq onpx, orubyq, gur onggyr jnf orsber naq
oruvaq: naq gurl pevrq hagb gur YBEQ, naq gur cevrfgf fbhaqrq jvgu gur
gehzcrgf.

13:15 Gura gur zra bs Whqnu tnir n fubhg: naq nf gur zra bs Whqnu
fubhgrq, vg pnzr gb cnff, gung Tbq fzbgr Wrebobnz naq nyy Vfenry
orsber Novwnu naq Whqnu.

13:16 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry syrq orsber Whqnu: naq Tbq qryvirerq
gurz vagb gurve unaq.

13:17 Naq Novwnu naq uvf crbcyr fyrj gurz jvgu n terng fynhtugre: fb
gurer sryy qbja fynva bs Vfenry svir uhaqerq gubhfnaq pubfra zra.

13:18 Guhf gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jrer oebhtug haqre ng gung gvzr, naq
gur puvyqera bs Whqnu cerinvyrq, orpnhfr gurl eryvrq hcba gur YBEQ Tbq
bs gurve snguref.

13:19 Naq Novwnu chefhrq nsgre Wrebobnz, naq gbbx pvgvrf sebz uvz,
Orgury jvgu gur gbjaf gurerbs, naq Wrfunanu jvgu gur gbjaf gurerbs,
naq Rcuenvz jvgu gur gbjaf gurerbs.

13:20 Arvgure qvq Wrebobnz erpbire fgeratgu ntnva va gur qnlf bs
Novwnu: naq gur YBEQ fgehpx uvz, naq ur qvrq.

13:21 Ohg Novwnu jnkrq zvtugl, naq zneevrq sbhegrra jvirf, naq ortng
gjragl naq gjb fbaf, naq fvkgrra qnhtugref.

13:22 Naq gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Novwnu, naq uvf jnlf, naq uvf
fnlvatf, ner jevggra va gur fgbel bs gur cebcurg Vqqb.

14:1 Fb Novwnu fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq gurl ohevrq uvz va gur pvgl
bs Qnivq: naq Nfn uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq. Va uvf qnlf gur ynaq
jnf dhvrg gra lrnef.

14:2 Naq Nfn qvq gung juvpu jnf tbbq naq evtug va gur rlrf bs gur YBEQ
uvf Tbq: 14:3 Sbe ur gbbx njnl gur nygnef bs gur fgenatr tbqf, naq gur
uvtu cynprf, naq oenxr qbja gur vzntrf, naq phg qbja gur tebirf: 14:4
Naq pbzznaqrq Whqnu gb frrx gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve snguref, naq gb qb
gur ynj naq gur pbzznaqzrag.

14:5 Nyfb ur gbbx njnl bhg bs nyy gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu gur uvtu cynprf
naq gur vzntrf: naq gur xvatqbz jnf dhvrg orsber uvz.

14:6 Naq ur ohvyg sraprq pvgvrf va Whqnu: sbe gur ynaq unq erfg, naq
ur unq ab jne va gubfr lrnef; orpnhfr gur YBEQ unq tvira uvz erfg.

14:7 Gurersber ur fnvq hagb Whqnu, Yrg hf ohvyq gurfr pvgvrf, naq znxr
nobhg gurz jnyyf, naq gbjref, tngrf, naq onef, juvyr gur ynaq vf lrg
orsber hf; orpnhfr jr unir fbhtug gur YBEQ bhe Tbq, jr unir fbhtug
uvz, naq ur ungu tvira hf erfg ba rirel fvqr. Fb gurl ohvyg naq
cebfcrerq.

14:8 Naq Nfn unq na nezl bs zra gung oner gnetrgf naq fcrnef, bhg bs
Whqnu guerr uhaqerq gubhfnaq; naq bhg bs Orawnzva, gung oner fuvryqf
naq qerj objf, gjb uhaqerq naq sbhefpber gubhfnaq: nyy gurfr jrer
zvtugl zra bs inybhe.

14:9 Naq gurer pnzr bhg ntnvafg gurz Mrenu gur Rguvbcvna jvgu na ubfg
bs n gubhfnaq gubhfnaq, naq guerr uhaqerq punevbgf; naq pnzr hagb
Znerfunu.

14:10 Gura Nfn jrag bhg ntnvafg uvz, naq gurl frg gur onggyr va neenl
va gur inyyrl bs Mrcungunu ng Znerfunu.

14:11 Naq Nfn pevrq hagb gur YBEQ uvf Tbq, naq fnvq, YBEQ, vg vf
abguvat jvgu gurr gb uryc, jurgure jvgu znal, be jvgu gurz gung unir
ab cbjre: uryc hf, B YBEQ bhe Tbq; sbe jr erfg ba gurr, naq va gul
anzr jr tb ntnvafg guvf zhygvghqr. B YBEQ, gubh neg bhe Tbq; yrg ab
zna cerinvy ntnvafg gurr.

14:12 Fb gur YBEQ fzbgr gur Rguvbcvnaf orsber Nfn, naq orsber Whqnu;
naq gur Rguvbcvnaf syrq.

14:13 Naq Nfn naq gur crbcyr gung jrer jvgu uvz chefhrq gurz hagb
Trene: naq gur Rguvbcvnaf jrer bireguebja, gung gurl pbhyq abg erpbire
gurzfryirf; sbe gurl jrer qrfgeblrq orsber gur YBEQ, naq orsber uvf
ubfg; naq gurl pneevrq njnl irel zhpu fcbvy.

14:14 Naq gurl fzbgr nyy gur pvgvrf ebhaq nobhg Trene; sbe gur srne bs
gur YBEQ pnzr hcba gurz: naq gurl fcbvyrq nyy gur pvgvrf; sbe gurer
jnf rkprrqvat zhpu fcbvy va gurz.

14:15 Gurl fzbgr nyfb gur gragf bs pnggyr, naq pneevrq njnl furrc naq
pnzryf va nohaqnapr, naq erghearq gb Wrehfnyrz.

15:1 Naq gur Fcvevg bs Tbq pnzr hcba Nmnevnu gur fba bs Bqrq: 15:2 Naq
ur jrag bhg gb zrrg Nfn, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Urne lr zr, Nfn, naq nyy
Whqnu naq Orawnzva; Gur YBEQ vf jvgu lbh, juvyr lr or jvgu uvz; naq vs
lr frrx uvz, ur jvyy or sbhaq bs lbh; ohg vs lr sbefnxr uvz, ur jvyy
sbefnxr lbh.

15:3 Abj sbe n ybat frnfba Vfenry ungu orra jvgubhg gur gehr Tbq, naq
jvgubhg n grnpuvat cevrfg, naq jvgubhg ynj.

15:4 Ohg jura gurl va gurve gebhoyr qvq ghea hagb gur YBEQ Tbq bs
Vfenry, naq fbhtug uvz, ur jnf sbhaq bs gurz.

15:5 Naq va gubfr gvzrf gurer jnf ab crnpr gb uvz gung jrag bhg, abe
gb uvz gung pnzr va, ohg terng irkngvbaf jrer hcba nyy gur vaunovgnagf
bs gur pbhagevrf.

15:6 Naq angvba jnf qrfgeblrq bs angvba, naq pvgl bs pvgl: sbe Tbq qvq
irk gurz jvgu nyy nqirefvgl.

15:7 Or lr fgebat gurersber, naq yrg abg lbhe unaqf or jrnx: sbe lbhe
jbex funyy or erjneqrq.

15:8 Naq jura Nfn urneq gurfr jbeqf, naq gur cebcurpl bs Bqrq gur
cebcurg, ur gbbx pbhentr, naq chg njnl gur nobzvanoyr vqbyf bhg bs nyy
gur ynaq bs Whqnu naq Orawnzva, naq bhg bs gur pvgvrf juvpu ur unq
gnxra sebz zbhag Rcuenvz, naq erarjrq gur nygne bs gur YBEQ, gung jnf
orsber gur cbepu bs gur YBEQ.

15:9 Naq ur tngurerq nyy Whqnu naq Orawnzva, naq gur fgenatref jvgu
gurz bhg bs Rcuenvz naq Znanffru, naq bhg bs Fvzrba: sbe gurl sryy gb
uvz bhg bs Vfenry va nohaqnapr, jura gurl fnj gung gur YBEQ uvf Tbq
jnf jvgu uvz.

15:10 Fb gurl tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure ng Wrehfnyrz va gur guveq
zbagu, va gur svsgrragu lrne bs gur ervta bs Nfn.

15:11 Naq gurl bssrerq hagb gur YBEQ gur fnzr gvzr, bs gur fcbvy juvpu
gurl unq oebhtug, frira uhaqerq bkra naq frira gubhfnaq furrc.

15:12 Naq gurl ragrerq vagb n pbiranag gb frrx gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve
snguref jvgu nyy gurve urneg naq jvgu nyy gurve fbhy; 15:13 Gung
jubfbrire jbhyq abg frrx gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry fubhyq or chg gb
qrngu, jurgure fznyy be terng, jurgure zna be jbzna.

15:14 Naq gurl fjner hagb gur YBEQ jvgu n ybhq ibvpr, naq jvgu
fubhgvat, naq jvgu gehzcrgf, naq jvgu pbeargf.

15:15 Naq nyy Whqnu erwbvprq ng gur bngu: sbe gurl unq fjbea jvgu nyy
gurve urneg, naq fbhtug uvz jvgu gurve jubyr qrfver; naq ur jnf sbhaq
bs gurz: naq gur YBEQ tnir gurz erfg ebhaq nobhg.

15:16 Naq nyfb pbapreavat Znnpunu gur zbgure bs Nfn gur xvat, ur
erzbirq ure sebz orvat dhrra, orpnhfr fur unq znqr na vqby va n tebir:
naq Nfn phg qbja ure vqby, naq fgnzcrq vg, naq oheag vg ng gur oebbx
Xvqeba.

15:17 Ohg gur uvtu cynprf jrer abg gnxra njnl bhg bs Vfenry:
arireguryrff gur urneg bs Nfn jnf cresrpg nyy uvf qnlf.

15:18 Naq ur oebhtug vagb gur ubhfr bs Tbq gur guvatf gung uvf sngure
unq qrqvpngrq, naq gung ur uvzfrys unq qrqvpngrq, fvyire, naq tbyq,
naq irffryf.

15:19 Naq gurer jnf ab zber jne hagb gur svir naq guvegvrgu lrne bs
gur ervta bs Nfn.

16:1 Va gur fvk naq guvegvrgu lrne bs gur ervta bs Nfn Onnfun xvat bs
Vfenry pnzr hc ntnvafg Whqnu, naq ohvyg Enznu, gb gur vagrag gung ur
zvtug yrg abar tb bhg be pbzr va gb Nfn xvat bs Whqnu.

16:2 Gura Nfn oebhtug bhg fvyire naq tbyq bhg bs gur gernfherf bs gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ naq bs gur xvat'f ubhfr, naq frag gb Oraunqnq xvat
bs Flevn, gung qjryg ng Qnznfphf, fnlvat, 16:3 Gurer vf n yrnthr
orgjrra zr naq gurr, nf gurer jnf orgjrra zl sngure naq gul sngure:
orubyq, V unir frag gurr fvyire naq tbyq; tb, oernx gul yrnthr jvgu
Onnfun xvat bs Vfenry, gung ur znl qrcneg sebz zr.

16:4 Naq Oraunqnq urnexrarq hagb xvat Nfn, naq frag gur pncgnvaf bs
uvf nezvrf ntnvafg gur pvgvrf bs Vfenry; naq gurl fzbgr Vwba, naq Qna,
naq Noryznvz, naq nyy gur fgber pvgvrf bs Ancugnyv.

16:5 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura Onnfun urneq vg, gung ur yrsg bss
ohvyqvat bs Enznu, naq yrg uvf jbex prnfr.

16:6 Gura Nfn gur xvat gbbx nyy Whqnu; naq gurl pneevrq njnl gur
fgbarf bs Enznu, naq gur gvzore gurerbs, jurerjvgu Onnfun jnf
ohvyqvat; naq ur ohvyg gurerjvgu Tron naq Zvmcnu.

16:7 Naq ng gung gvzr Unanav gur frre pnzr gb Nfn xvat bs Whqnu, naq
fnvq hagb uvz, Orpnhfr gubh unfg eryvrq ba gur xvat bs Flevn, naq abg
eryvrq ba gur YBEQ gul Tbq, gurersber vf gur ubfg bs gur xvat bs Flevn
rfpncrq bhg bs guvar unaq.

16:8 Jrer abg gur Rguvbcvnaf naq gur Yhovzf n uhtr ubfg, jvgu irel
znal punevbgf naq ubefrzra? lrg, orpnhfr gubh qvqfg eryl ba gur YBEQ,
ur qryvirerq gurz vagb guvar unaq.

16:9 Sbe gur rlrf bs gur YBEQ eha gb naq seb guebhtubhg gur jubyr
rnegu, gb furj uvzfrys fgebat va gur orunys bs gurz jubfr urneg vf
cresrpg gbjneq uvz. Urerva gubh unfg qbar sbbyvfuyl: gurersber sebz
uraprsbegu gubh funyg unir jnef.

16:10 Gura Nfn jnf jebgu jvgu gur frre, naq chg uvz va n cevfba ubhfr;
sbe ur jnf va n entr jvgu uvz orpnhfr bs guvf guvat. Naq Nfn bccerffrq
fbzr bs gur crbcyr gur fnzr gvzr.

16:11 Naq, orubyq, gur npgf bs Nfn, svefg naq ynfg, yb, gurl ner
jevggra va gur obbx bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu naq Vfenry.

16:12 Naq Nfn va gur guvegl naq avagu lrne bs uvf ervta jnf qvfrnfrq
va uvf srrg, hagvy uvf qvfrnfr jnf rkprrqvat terng: lrg va uvf qvfrnfr
ur fbhtug abg gb gur YBEQ, ohg gb gur culfvpvnaf.

16:13 Naq Nfn fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq qvrq va gur bar naq sbegvrgu
lrne bs uvf ervta.

16:14 Naq gurl ohevrq uvz va uvf bja frchypuerf, juvpu ur unq znqr sbe
uvzfrys va gur pvgl bs Qnivq, naq ynvq uvz va gur orq juvpu jnf svyyrq
jvgu fjrrg bqbhef naq qviref xvaqf bs fcvprf cercnerq ol gur
ncbgurpnevrf' neg: naq gurl znqr n irel terng oheavat sbe uvz.

17:1 Naq Wrubfuncung uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq, naq fgeratgurarq
uvzfrys ntnvafg Vfenry.

17:2 Naq ur cynprq sbeprf va nyy gur sraprq pvgvrf bs Whqnu, naq frg
tneevfbaf va gur ynaq bs Whqnu, naq va gur pvgvrf bs Rcuenvz, juvpu
Nfn uvf sngure unq gnxra.

17:3 Naq gur YBEQ jnf jvgu Wrubfuncung, orpnhfr ur jnyxrq va gur svefg
jnlf bs uvf sngure Qnivq, naq fbhtug abg hagb Onnyvz; 17:4 Ohg fbhtug
gb gur Ybeq Tbq bs uvf sngure, naq jnyxrq va uvf pbzznaqzragf, naq abg
nsgre gur qbvatf bs Vfenry.

17:5 Gurersber gur YBEQ fgnoyvfurq gur xvatqbz va uvf unaq; naq nyy
Whqnu oebhtug gb Wrubfuncung cerfragf; naq ur unq evpurf naq ubabhe va
nohaqnapr.

17:6 Naq uvf urneg jnf yvsgrq hc va gur jnlf bs gur YBEQ: zberbire ur
gbbx njnl gur uvtu cynprf naq tebirf bhg bs Whqnu.

17:7 Nyfb va gur guveq lrne bs uvf ervta ur frag gb uvf cevaprf, rira
gb Oraunvy, naq gb Bonqvnu, naq gb Mrpunevnu, naq gb Argunarry, naq gb
Zvpunvnu, gb grnpu va gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu.

17:8 Naq jvgu gurz ur frag Yrivgrf, rira Furznvnu, naq Argunavnu, naq
Mronqvnu, naq Nfnury, naq Furzvenzbgu, naq Wrubanguna, naq Nqbavwnu,
naq Gbovwnu, naq Gbonqbavwnu, Yrivgrf; naq jvgu gurz Ryvfunzn naq
Wrubenz, cevrfgf.

17:9 Naq gurl gnhtug va Whqnu, naq unq gur obbx bs gur ynj bs gur YBEQ
jvgu gurz, naq jrag nobhg guebhtubhg nyy gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu, naq
gnhtug gur crbcyr.

17:10 Naq gur srne bs gur YBEQ sryy hcba nyy gur xvatqbzf bs gur ynaqf
gung jrer ebhaq nobhg Whqnu, fb gung gurl znqr ab jne ntnvafg
Wrubfuncung.

17:11 Nyfb fbzr bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf oebhtug Wrubfuncung cerfragf, naq
gevohgr fvyire; naq gur Nenovnaf oebhtug uvz sybpxf, frira gubhfnaq
naq frira uhaqerq enzf, naq frira gubhfnaq naq frira uhaqerq ur tbngf.

17:12 Naq Wrubfuncung jnkrq terng rkprrqvatyl; naq ur ohvyg va Whqnu
pnfgyrf, naq pvgvrf bs fgber.

17:13 Naq ur unq zhpu ohfvarff va gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu: naq gur zra bs
jne, zvtugl zra bs inybhe, jrer va Wrehfnyrz.

17:14 Naq gurfr ner gur ahzoref bs gurz nppbeqvat gb gur ubhfr bs
gurve snguref: Bs Whqnu, gur pncgnvaf bs gubhfnaqf; Nqanu gur puvrs,
naq jvgu uvz zvtugl zra bs inybhe guerr uhaqerq gubhfnaq.

17:15 Naq arkg gb uvz jnf Wrubunana gur pncgnva, naq jvgu uvz gjb
uhaqerq naq sbhefpber gubhfnaq.

17:16 Naq arkg uvz jnf Nznfvnu gur fba bs Mvpuev, jub jvyyvatyl
bssrerq uvzfrys hagb gur YBEQ; naq jvgu uvz gjb uhaqerq gubhfnaq
zvtugl zra bs inybhe.

17:17 Naq bs Orawnzva; Ryvnqn n zvtugl zna bs inybhe, naq jvgu uvz
nezrq zra jvgu obj naq fuvryq gjb uhaqerq gubhfnaq.

17:18 Naq arkg uvz jnf Wrubmnonq, naq jvgu uvz na uhaqerq naq
sbhefpber gubhfnaq ernql cercnerq sbe gur jne.

17:19 Gurfr jnvgrq ba gur xvat, orfvqr gubfr jubz gur xvat chg va gur
sraprq pvgvrf guebhtubhg nyy Whqnu.

18:1 Abj Wrubfuncung unq evpurf naq ubabhe va nohaqnapr, naq wbvarq
nssvavgl jvgu Nuno.

18:2 Naq nsgre pregnva lrnef ur jrag qbja gb Nuno gb Fnznevn. Naq Nuno
xvyyrq furrc naq bkra sbe uvz va nohaqnapr, naq sbe gur crbcyr gung ur
unq jvgu uvz, naq crefhnqrq uvz gb tb hc jvgu uvz gb Enzbgutvyrnq.

18:3 Naq Nuno xvat bs Vfenry fnvq hagb Wrubfuncung xvat bs Whqnu, Jvyg
gubh tb jvgu zr gb Enzbgutvyrnq? Naq ur nafjrerq uvz, V nz nf gubh
neg, naq zl crbcyr nf gul crbcyr; naq jr jvyy or jvgu gurr va gur jne.

18:4 Naq Wrubfuncung fnvq hagb gur xvat bs Vfenry, Radhver, V cenl
gurr, ng gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ gb qnl.

18:5 Gurersber gur xvat bs Vfenry tngurerq gbtrgure bs cebcurgf sbhe
uhaqerq zra, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Funyy jr tb gb Enzbgutvyrnq gb
onggyr, be funyy V sbeorne? Naq gurl fnvq, Tb hc; sbe Tbq jvyy qryvire
vg vagb gur xvat'f unaq.

18:6 Ohg Wrubfuncung fnvq, Vf gurer abg urer n cebcurg bs gur YBEQ
orfvqrf, gung jr zvtug radhver bs uvz?  18:7 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry
fnvq hagb Wrubfuncung, Gurer vf lrg bar zna, ol jubz jr znl radhver bs
gur YBEQ: ohg V ungr uvz; sbe ur arire cebcurfvrq tbbq hagb zr, ohg
nyjnlf rivy: gur fnzr vf Zvpnvnu gur fba bs Vzyn. Naq Wrubfuncung
fnvq, Yrg abg gur xvat fnl fb.

18:8 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry pnyyrq sbe bar bs uvf bssvpref, naq fnvq,
Srgpu dhvpxyl Zvpnvnu gur fba bs Vzyn.

18:9 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry naq Wrubfuncung xvat bs Whqnu fng rvgure
bs gurz ba uvf guebar, pybgurq va gurve eborf, naq gurl fng va n ibvq
cynpr ng gur ragrevat va bs gur tngr bs Fnznevn; naq nyy gur cebcurgf
cebcurfvrq orsber gurz.

18:10 Naq Mrqrxvnu gur fba bs Purannanu unq znqr uvz ubeaf bs veba,
naq fnvq, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Jvgu gurfr gubh funyg chfu Flevn hagvy
gurl or pbafhzrq.

18:11 Naq nyy gur cebcurgf cebcurfvrq fb, fnlvat, Tb hc gb
Enzbgutvyrnq, naq cebfcre: sbe gur YBEQ funyy qryvire vg vagb gur unaq
bs gur xvat.

18:12 Naq gur zrffratre gung jrag gb pnyy Zvpnvnu fcnxr gb uvz,
fnlvat, Orubyq, gur jbeqf bs gur cebcurgf qrpyner tbbq gb gur xvat
jvgu bar nffrag; yrg gul jbeq gurersber, V cenl gurr, or yvxr bar bs
gurve'f, naq fcrnx gubh tbbq.

18:13 Naq Zvpnvnu fnvq, Nf gur YBEQ yvirgu, rira jung zl Tbq fnvgu,
gung jvyy V fcrnx.

18:14 Naq jura ur jnf pbzr gb gur xvat, gur xvat fnvq hagb uvz,
Zvpnvnu, funyy jr tb gb Enzbgutvyrnq gb onggyr, be funyy V sbeorne?
Naq ur fnvq, Tb lr hc, naq cebfcre, naq gurl funyy or qryvirerq vagb
lbhe unaq.

18:15 Naq gur xvat fnvq gb uvz, Ubj znal gvzrf funyy V nqwher gurr
gung gubh fnl abguvat ohg gur gehgu gb zr va gur anzr bs gur YBEQ?
18:16 Gura ur fnvq, V qvq frr nyy Vfenry fpnggrerq hcba gur zbhagnvaf,
nf furrc gung unir ab furcureq: naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Gurfr unir ab
znfgre; yrg gurz erghea gurersber rirel zna gb uvf ubhfr va crnpr.

18:17 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry fnvq gb Wrubfuncung, Qvq V abg gryy gurr
gung ur jbhyq abg cebcurfl tbbq hagb zr, ohg rivy?  18:18 Ntnva ur
fnvq, Gurersber urne gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ; V fnj gur YBEQ fvggvat hcba
uvf guebar, naq nyy gur ubfg bs urnira fgnaqvat ba uvf evtug unaq naq
ba uvf yrsg.

18:19 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq, Jub funyy ragvpr Nuno xvat bs Vfenry, gung ur
znl tb hc naq snyy ng Enzbgutvyrnq? Naq bar fcnxr fnlvat nsgre guvf
znaare, naq nabgure fnlvat nsgre gung znaare.

18:20 Gura gurer pnzr bhg n fcvevg, naq fgbbq orsber gur YBEQ, naq
fnvq, V jvyy ragvpr uvz. Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb uvz, Jurerjvgu?  18:21
Naq ur fnvq, V jvyy tb bhg, naq or n ylvat fcvevg va gur zbhgu bs nyy
uvf cebcurgf. Naq gur Ybeq fnvq, Gubh funyg ragvpr uvz, naq gubh funyg
nyfb cerinvy: tb bhg, naq qb rira fb.

18:22 Abj gurersber, orubyq, gur YBEQ ungu chg n ylvat fcvevg va gur
zbhgu bs gurfr gul cebcurgf, naq gur YBEQ ungu fcbxra rivy ntnvafg
gurr.

18:23 Gura Mrqrxvnu gur fba bs Purannanu pnzr arne, naq fzbgr Zvpnvnu
hcba gur purrx, naq fnvq, Juvpu jnl jrag gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ sebz
zr gb fcrnx hagb gurr?  18:24 Naq Zvpnvnu fnvq, Orubyq, gubh funyg frr
ba gung qnl jura gubh funyg tb vagb na vaare punzore gb uvqr gulfrys.

18:25 Gura gur xvat bs Vfenry fnvq, Gnxr lr Zvpnvnu, naq pneel uvz
onpx gb Nzba gur tbireabe bs gur pvgl, naq gb Wbnfu gur xvat'f fba;
18:26 Naq fnl, Guhf fnvgu gur xvat, Chg guvf sryybj va gur cevfba, naq
srrq uvz jvgu oernq bs nssyvpgvba naq jvgu jngre bs nssyvpgvba, hagvy
V erghea va crnpr.

18:27 Naq Zvpnvnu fnvq, Vs gubh pregnvayl erghea va crnpr, gura ungu
abg gur YBEQ fcbxra ol zr. Naq ur fnvq, Urnexra, nyy lr crbcyr.

18:28 Fb gur xvat bs Vfenry naq Wrubfuncung gur xvat bs Whqnu jrag hc
gb Enzbgutvyrnq.

18:29 Naq gur xvat bs Vfenry fnvq hagb Wrubfuncung, V jvyy qvfthvfr
zlfrys, naq V jvyy tb gb gur onggyr; ohg chg gubh ba gul eborf. Fb gur
xvat bs Vfenry qvfthvfrq uvzfrys; naq gurl jrag gb gur onggyr.

18:30 Abj gur xvat bs Flevn unq pbzznaqrq gur pncgnvaf bs gur punevbgf
gung jrer jvgu uvz, fnlvat, Svtug lr abg jvgu fznyy be terng, fnir
bayl jvgu gur xvat bs Vfenry.

18:31 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur pncgnvaf bs gur punevbgf fnj
Wrubfuncung, gung gurl fnvq, Vg vf gur xvat bs Vfenry. Gurersber gurl
pbzcnffrq nobhg uvz gb svtug: ohg Wrubfuncung pevrq bhg, naq gur YBEQ
urycrq uvz; naq Tbq zbirq gurz gb qrcneg sebz uvz.

18:32 Sbe vg pnzr gb cnff, gung, jura gur pncgnvaf bs gur punevbgf
creprvirq gung vg jnf abg gur xvat bs Vfenry, gurl ghearq onpx ntnva
sebz chefhvat uvz.

18:33 Naq n pregnva zna qerj n obj ng n iragher, naq fzbgr gur xvat bs
Vfenry orgjrra gur wbvagf bs gur unearff: gurersber ur fnvq gb uvf
punevbg zna, Ghea guvar unaq, gung gubh znlrfg pneel zr bhg bs gur
ubfg; sbe V nz jbhaqrq.

18:34 Naq gur onggyr vapernfrq gung qnl: ubjorvg gur xvat bs Vfenry
fgnlrq uvzfrys hc va uvf punevbg ntnvafg gur Flevnaf hagvy gur rira:
naq nobhg gur gvzr bs gur fha tbvat qbja ur qvrq.

19:1 Naq Wrubfuncung gur xvat bs Whqnu erghearq gb uvf ubhfr va crnpr
gb Wrehfnyrz.

19:2 Naq Wruh gur fba bs Unanav gur frre jrag bhg gb zrrg uvz, naq
fnvq gb xvat Wrubfuncung, Fubhyqrfg gubh uryc gur hatbqyl, naq ybir
gurz gung ungr gur YBEQ? gurersber vf jengu hcba gurr sebz orsber gur
YBEQ.

19:3 Arireguryrff gurer ner tbbq guvatf sbhaq va gurr, va gung gubh
unfg gnxra njnl gur tebirf bhg bs gur ynaq, naq unfg cercnerq guvar
urneg gb frrx Tbq.

19:4 Naq Wrubfuncung qjryg ng Wrehfnyrz: naq ur jrag bhg ntnva guebhtu
gur crbcyr sebz Orrefuron gb zbhag Rcuenvz, naq oebhtug gurz onpx hagb
gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve snguref.

19:5 Naq ur frg whqtrf va gur ynaq guebhtubhg nyy gur sraprq pvgvrf bs
Whqnu, pvgl ol pvgl, 19:6 Naq fnvq gb gur whqtrf, Gnxr urrq jung lr
qb: sbe lr whqtr abg sbe zna, ohg sbe gur YBEQ, jub vf jvgu lbh va gur
whqtzrag.

19:7 Jurersber abj yrg gur srne bs gur YBEQ or hcba lbh; gnxr urrq naq
qb vg: sbe gurer vf ab vavdhvgl jvgu gur YBEQ bhe Tbq, abe erfcrpg bs
crefbaf, abe gnxvat bs tvsgf.

19:8 Zberbire va Wrehfnyrz qvq Wrubfuncung frg bs gur Yrivgrf, naq bs
gur cevrfgf, naq bs gur puvrs bs gur snguref bs Vfenry, sbe gur
whqtzrag bs gur YBEQ, naq sbe pbagebirefvrf, jura gurl erghearq gb
Wrehfnyrz.

19:9 Naq ur punetrq gurz, fnlvat, Guhf funyy lr qb va gur srne bs gur
YBEQ, snvgushyyl, naq jvgu n cresrpg urneg.

19:10 Naq jung pnhfr fbrire funyy pbzr gb lbh bs lbhe oerguera gung
qjryy va lbhe pvgvrf, orgjrra oybbq naq oybbq, orgjrra ynj naq
pbzznaqzrag, fgnghgrf naq whqtzragf, lr funyy rira jnea gurz gung gurl
gerfcnff abg ntnvafg gur YBEQ, naq fb jengu pbzr hcba lbh, naq hcba
lbhe oerguera: guvf qb, naq lr funyy abg gerfcnff.

19:11 Naq, orubyq, Nznevnu gur puvrs cevrfg vf bire lbh va nyy znggref
bs gur YBEQ; naq Mronqvnu gur fba bs Vfuznry, gur ehyre bs gur ubhfr
bs Whqnu, sbe nyy gur xvat'f znggref: nyfb gur Yrivgrf funyy or
bssvpref orsber lbh. Qrny pbhentrbhfyl, naq gur YBEQ funyy or jvgu gur
tbbq.

20:1 Vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre guvf nyfb, gung gur puvyqera bs Zbno, naq
gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, naq jvgu gurz bgure orfvqr gur Nzzbavgrf, pnzr
ntnvafg Wrubfuncung gb onggyr.

20:2 Gura gurer pnzr fbzr gung gbyq Wrubfuncung, fnlvat, Gurer pbzrgu
n terng zhygvghqr ntnvafg gurr sebz orlbaq gur frn ba guvf fvqr Flevn;
naq, orubyq, gurl or va Unmnmbagnzne, juvpu vf Ratrqv.

20:3 Naq Wrubfuncung srnerq, naq frg uvzfrys gb frrx gur YBEQ, naq
cebpynvzrq n snfg guebhtubhg nyy Whqnu.

20:4 Naq Whqnu tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure, gb nfx uryc bs gur YBEQ:
rira bhg bs nyy gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu gurl pnzr gb frrx gur YBEQ.

20:5 Naq Wrubfuncung fgbbq va gur pbatertngvba bs Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz,
va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, orsber gur arj pbheg, 20:6 Naq fnvq, B YBEQ
Tbq bs bhe snguref, neg abg gubh Tbq va urnira? naq ehyrfg abg gubh
bire nyy gur xvatqbzf bs gur urngura? naq va guvar unaq vf gurer abg
cbjre naq zvtug, fb gung abar vf noyr gb jvgufgnaq gurr?  20:7 Neg abg
gubh bhe Tbq, jub qvqfg qevir bhg gur vaunovgnagf bs guvf ynaq orsber
gul crbcyr Vfenry, naq tnirfg vg gb gur frrq bs Noenunz gul sevraq sbe
rire?  20:8 Naq gurl qjryg gurerva, naq unir ohvyg gurr n fnapghnel
gurerva sbe gul anzr, fnlvat, 20:9 Vs, jura rivy pbzrgu hcba hf, nf
gur fjbeq, whqtzrag, be crfgvyrapr, be snzvar, jr fgnaq orsber guvf
ubhfr, naq va gul cerfrapr, (sbe gul anzr vf va guvf ubhfr,) naq pel
hagb gurr va bhe nssyvpgvba, gura gubh jvyg urne naq uryc.

20:10 Naq abj, orubyq, gur puvyqera bs Nzzba naq Zbno naq zbhag Frve,
jubz gubh jbhyqrfg abg yrg Vfenry vainqr, jura gurl pnzr bhg bs gur
ynaq bs Rtlcg, ohg gurl ghearq sebz gurz, naq qrfgeblrq gurz abg;
20:11 Orubyq, V fnl, ubj gurl erjneq hf, gb pbzr gb pnfg hf bhg bs gul
cbffrffvba, juvpu gubh unfg tvira hf gb vaurevg.

20:12 B bhe Tbq, jvyg gubh abg whqtr gurz? sbe jr unir ab zvtug
ntnvafg guvf terng pbzcnal gung pbzrgu ntnvafg hf; arvgure xabj jr
jung gb qb: ohg bhe rlrf ner hcba gurr.

20:13 Naq nyy Whqnu fgbbq orsber gur YBEQ, jvgu gurve yvggyr barf,
gurve jvirf, naq gurve puvyqera.

20:14 Gura hcba Wnunmvry gur fba bs Mrpunevnu, gur fba bs Oranvnu, gur
fba bs Wrvry, gur fba bs Znggnavnu, n Yrivgr bs gur fbaf bs Nfncu,
pnzr gur Fcvevg bs gur YBEQ va gur zvqfg bs gur pbatertngvba; 20:15
Naq ur fnvq, Urnexra lr, nyy Whqnu, naq lr vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz,
naq gubh xvat Wrubfuncung, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ hagb lbh, Or abg nsenvq
abe qvfznlrq ol ernfba bs guvf terng zhygvghqr; sbe gur onggyr vf abg
lbhef, ohg Tbq'f.

20:16 Gb zbeebj tb lr qbja ntnvafg gurz: orubyq, gurl pbzr hc ol gur
pyvss bs Mvm; naq lr funyy svaq gurz ng gur raq bs gur oebbx, orsber
gur jvyqrearff bs Wrehry.

20:17 Lr funyy abg arrq gb svtug va guvf onggyr: frg lbhefryirf, fgnaq
lr fgvyy, naq frr gur fnyingvba bs gur YBEQ jvgu lbh, B Whqnu naq
Wrehfnyrz: srne abg, abe or qvfznlrq; gb zbeebj tb bhg ntnvafg gurz:
sbe gur YBEQ jvyy or jvgu lbh.

20:18 Naq Wrubfuncung objrq uvf urnq jvgu uvf snpr gb gur tebhaq: naq
nyy Whqnu naq gur vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz sryy orsber gur YBEQ,
jbefuvccvat gur YBEQ.

20:19 Naq gur Yrivgrf, bs gur puvyqera bs gur Xbunguvgrf, naq bs gur
puvyqera bs gur Xbeuvgrf, fgbbq hc gb cenvfr gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry
jvgu n ybhq ibvpr ba uvtu.

20:20 Naq gurl ebfr rneyl va gur zbeavat, naq jrag sbegu vagb gur
jvyqrearff bs Grxbn: naq nf gurl jrag sbegu, Wrubfuncung fgbbq naq
fnvq, Urne zr, B Whqnu, naq lr vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz; Oryvrir va
gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, fb funyy lr or rfgnoyvfurq; oryvrir uvf cebcurgf,
fb funyy lr cebfcre.

20:21 Naq jura ur unq pbafhygrq jvgu gur crbcyr, ur nccbvagrq fvatref
hagb gur YBEQ, naq gung fubhyq cenvfr gur ornhgl bs ubyvarff, nf gurl
jrag bhg orsber gur nezl, naq gb fnl, Cenvfr gur YBEQ; sbe uvf zrepl
raqhergu sbe rire.

20:22 Naq jura gurl ortna gb fvat naq gb cenvfr, gur YBEQ frg
nzohfuzragf ntnvafg gur puvyqera bs Nzzba, Zbno, naq zbhag Frve, juvpu
jrer pbzr ntnvafg Whqnu; naq gurl jrer fzvggra.

20:23 Sbe gur puvyqera bs Nzzba naq Zbno fgbbq hc ntnvafg gur
vaunovgnagf bs zbhag Frve, hggreyl gb fynl naq qrfgebl gurz: naq jura
gurl unq znqr na raq bs gur vaunovgnagf bs Frve, rirel bar urycrq gb
qrfgebl nabgure.

20:24 Naq jura Whqnu pnzr gbjneq gur jngpu gbjre va gur jvyqrearff,
gurl ybbxrq hagb gur zhygvghqr, naq, orubyq, gurl jrer qrnq obqvrf
snyyra gb gur rnegu, naq abar rfpncrq.

20:25 Naq jura Wrubfuncung naq uvf crbcyr pnzr gb gnxr njnl gur fcbvy
bs gurz, gurl sbhaq nzbat gurz va nohaqnapr obgu evpurf jvgu gur qrnq
obqvrf, naq cerpvbhf wrjryf, juvpu gurl fgevccrq bss sbe gurzfryirf,
zber guna gurl pbhyq pneel njnl: naq gurl jrer guerr qnlf va tngurevat
bs gur fcbvy, vg jnf fb zhpu.

20:26 Naq ba gur sbhegu qnl gurl nffrzoyrq gurzfryirf va gur inyyrl bs
Orenpunu; sbe gurer gurl oyrffrq gur YBEQ: gurersber gur anzr bs gur
fnzr cynpr jnf pnyyrq, Gur inyyrl bs Orenpunu, hagb guvf qnl.

20:27 Gura gurl erghearq, rirel zna bs Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz, naq
Wrubfuncung va gur sbersebag bs gurz, gb tb ntnva gb Wrehfnyrz jvgu
wbl; sbe gur YBEQ unq znqr gurz gb erwbvpr bire gurve rarzvrf.

20:28 Naq gurl pnzr gb Wrehfnyrz jvgu cfnygrevrf naq unecf naq
gehzcrgf hagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

20:29 Naq gur srne bs Tbq jnf ba nyy gur xvatqbzf bs gubfr pbhagevrf,
jura gurl unq urneq gung gur YBEQ sbhtug ntnvafg gur rarzvrf bs
Vfenry.

20:30 Fb gur ernyz bs Wrubfuncung jnf dhvrg: sbe uvf Tbq tnir uvz erfg
ebhaq nobhg.

20:31 Naq Wrubfuncung ervtarq bire Whqnu: ur jnf guvegl naq svir lrnef
byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur ervtarq gjragl naq svir lrnef va
Wrehfnyrz.

Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr jnf Nmhonu gur qnhtugre bs Fuvyuv.

20:32 Naq ur jnyxrq va gur jnl bs Nfn uvf sngure, naq qrcnegrq abg
sebz vg, qbvat gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ.

20:33 Ubjorvg gur uvtu cynprf jrer abg gnxra njnl: sbe nf lrg gur
crbcyr unq abg cercnerq gurve urnegf hagb gur Tbq bs gurve snguref.

20:34 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wrubfuncung, svefg naq ynfg, orubyq,
gurl ner jevggra va gur obbx bs Wruh gur fba bs Unanav, jub vf
zragvbarq va gur obbx bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry.

20:35 Naq nsgre guvf qvq Wrubfuncung xvat bs Whqnu wbva uvzfrys jvgu
Nunmvnu xvat bs Vfenry, jub qvq irel jvpxrqyl: 20:36 Naq ur wbvarq
uvzfrys jvgu uvz gb znxr fuvcf gb tb gb Gnefuvfu: naq gurl znqr gur
fuvcf va Rmvbatnore.

20:37 Gura Ryvrmre gur fba bs Qbqninu bs Znerfunu cebcurfvrq ntnvafg
Wrubfuncung, fnlvat, Orpnhfr gubh unfg wbvarq gulfrys jvgu Nunmvnu,
gur YBEQ ungu oebxra gul jbexf. Naq gur fuvcf jrer oebxra, gung gurl
jrer abg noyr gb tb gb Gnefuvfu.

21:1 Abj Wrubfuncung fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq jnf ohevrq jvgu uvf
snguref va gur pvgl bs Qnivq. Naq Wrubenz uvf fba ervtarq va uvf
fgrnq.

21:2 Naq ur unq oerguera gur fbaf bs Wrubfuncung, Nmnevnu, naq Wruvry,
naq Mrpunevnu, naq Nmnevnu, naq Zvpunry, naq Furcungvnu: nyy gurfr
jrer gur fbaf bs Wrubfuncung xvat bs Vfenry.

21:3 Naq gurve sngure tnir gurz terng tvsgf bs fvyire, naq bs tbyq,
naq bs cerpvbhf guvatf, jvgu sraprq pvgvrf va Whqnu: ohg gur xvatqbz
tnir ur gb Wrubenz; orpnhfr ur jnf gur svefgobea.

21:4 Abj jura Wrubenz jnf evfra hc gb gur xvatqbz bs uvf sngure, ur
fgeratgurarq uvzfrys, naq fyrj nyy uvf oerguera jvgu gur fjbeq, naq
qviref nyfb bs gur cevaprf bs Vfenry.

21:5 Wrubenz jnf guvegl naq gjb lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq
ur ervtarq rvtug lrnef va Wrehfnyrz.

21:6 Naq ur jnyxrq va gur jnl bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry, yvxr nf qvq gur
ubhfr bs Nuno: sbe ur unq gur qnhtugre bs Nuno gb jvsr: naq ur jebhtug
gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur rlrf bs gur YBEQ.

21:7 Ubjorvg gur YBEQ jbhyq abg qrfgebl gur ubhfr bs Qnivq, orpnhfr bs
gur pbiranag gung ur unq znqr jvgu Qnivq, naq nf ur cebzvfrq gb tvir n
yvtug gb uvz naq gb uvf fbaf sbe rire.

21:8 Va uvf qnlf gur Rqbzvgrf eribygrq sebz haqre gur qbzvavba bs
Whqnu, naq znqr gurzfryirf n xvat.

21:9 Gura Wrubenz jrag sbegu jvgu uvf cevaprf, naq nyy uvf punevbgf
jvgu uvz: naq ur ebfr hc ol avtug, naq fzbgr gur Rqbzvgrf juvpu
pbzcnffrq uvz va, naq gur pncgnvaf bs gur punevbgf.

21:10 Fb gur Rqbzvgrf eribygrq sebz haqre gur unaq bs Whqnu hagb guvf
qnl.

Gur fnzr gvzr nyfb qvq Yvoanu eribyg sebz haqre uvf unaq; orpnhfr ur
unq sbefnxra gur YBEQ Tbq bs uvf snguref.

21:11 Zberbire ur znqr uvtu cynprf va gur zbhagnvaf bs Whqnu naq
pnhfrq gur vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz gb pbzzvg sbeavpngvba, naq
pbzcryyrq Whqnu gurergb.

21:12 Naq gurer pnzr n jevgvat gb uvz sebz Ryvwnu gur cebcurg, fnlvat,
Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Qnivq gul sngure, Orpnhfr gubh unfg abg
jnyxrq va gur jnlf bs Wrubfuncung gul sngure, abe va gur jnlf bs Nfn
xvat bs Whqnu, 21:13 Ohg unfg jnyxrq va gur jnl bs gur xvatf bs
Vfenry, naq unfg znqr Whqnu naq gur vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz gb tb n
jubevat, yvxr gb gur juberqbzf bs gur ubhfr bs Nuno, naq nyfb unfg
fynva gul oerguera bs gul sngure'f ubhfr, juvpu jrer orggre guna
gulfrys: 21:14 Orubyq, jvgu n terng cynthr jvyy gur YBEQ fzvgr gul
crbcyr, naq gul puvyqera, naq gul jvirf, naq nyy gul tbbqf: 21:15 Naq
gubh funyg unir terng fvpxarff ol qvfrnfr bs gul objryf, hagvy gul
objryf snyy bhg ol ernfba bs gur fvpxarff qnl ol qnl.

21:16 Zberbire gur YBEQ fgveerq hc ntnvafg Wrubenz gur fcvevg bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, naq bs gur Nenovnaf, gung jrer arne gur Rguvbcvnaf: 21:17
Naq gurl pnzr hc vagb Whqnu, naq oenxr vagb vg, naq pneevrq njnl nyy
gur fhofgnapr gung jnf sbhaq va gur xvat'f ubhfr, naq uvf fbaf nyfb,
naq uvf jvirf; fb gung gurer jnf arire n fba yrsg uvz, fnir Wrubnunm,
gur lbhatrfg bs uvf fbaf.

21:18 Naq nsgre nyy guvf gur YBEQ fzbgr uvz va uvf objryf jvgu na
vaphenoyr qvfrnfr.

21:19 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung va cebprff bs gvzr, nsgre gur raq bs
gjb lrnef, uvf objryf sryy bhg ol ernfba bs uvf fvpxarff: fb ur qvrq
bs fber qvfrnfrf. Naq uvf crbcyr znqr ab oheavat sbe uvz, yvxr gur
oheavat bs uvf snguref.

21:20 Guvegl naq gjb lrnef byq jnf ur jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur
ervtarq va Wrehfnyrz rvtug lrnef, naq qrcnegrq jvgubhg orvat qrfverq.
Ubjorvg gurl ohevrq uvz va gur pvgl bs Qnivq, ohg abg va gur
frchypuerf bs gur xvatf.

22:1 Naq gur vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz znqr Nunmvnu uvf lbhatrfg fba
xvat va uvf fgrnq: sbe gur onaq bs zra gung pnzr jvgu gur Nenovnaf gb
gur pnzc unq fynva nyy gur ryqrfg. Fb Nunmvnu gur fba bs Wrubenz xvat
bs Whqnu ervtarq.

22:2 Sbegl naq gjb lrnef byq jnf Nunmvnu jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq
ur ervtarq bar lrne va Wrehfnyrz. Uvf zbgure'f anzr nyfb jnf Ngunyvnu
gur qnhtugre bs Bzev.

22:3 Ur nyfb jnyxrq va gur jnlf bs gur ubhfr bs Nuno: sbe uvf zbgure
jnf uvf pbhafryybe gb qb jvpxrqyl.

22:4 Jurersber ur qvq rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ yvxr gur ubhfr bs
Nuno: sbe gurl jrer uvf pbhafryybef nsgre gur qrngu bs uvf sngure gb
uvf qrfgehpgvba.

22:5 Ur jnyxrq nyfb nsgre gurve pbhafry, naq jrag jvgu Wrubenz gur fba
bs Nuno xvat bs Vfenry gb jne ntnvafg Unmnry xvat bs Flevn ng
Enzbgutvyrnq: naq gur Flevnaf fzbgr Wbenz.

22:6 Naq ur erghearq gb or urnyrq va Wrmerry orpnhfr bs gur jbhaqf
juvpu jrer tvira uvz ng Enznu, jura ur sbhtug jvgu Unmnry xvat bs
Flevn. Naq Nmnevnu gur fba bs Wrubenz xvat bs Whqnu jrag qbja gb frr
Wrubenz gur fba bs Nuno ng Wrmerry, orpnhfr ur jnf fvpx.

22:7 Naq gur qrfgehpgvba bs Nunmvnu jnf bs Tbq ol pbzvat gb Wbenz: sbe
jura ur jnf pbzr, ur jrag bhg jvgu Wrubenz ntnvafg Wruh gur fba bs
Avzfuv, jubz gur YBEQ unq nabvagrq gb phg bss gur ubhfr bs Nuno.

22:8 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung, jura Wruh jnf rkrphgvat whqtzrag hcba
gur ubhfr bs Nuno, naq sbhaq gur cevaprf bs Whqnu, naq gur fbaf bs gur
oerguera bs Nunmvnu, gung zvavfgrerq gb Nunmvnu, ur fyrj gurz.

22:9 Naq ur fbhtug Nunmvnu: naq gurl pnhtug uvz, (sbe ur jnf uvq va
Fnznevn,) naq oebhtug uvz gb Wruh: naq jura gurl unq fynva uvz, gurl
ohevrq uvz: Orpnhfr, fnvq gurl, ur vf gur fba bs Wrubfuncung, jub
fbhtug gur YBEQ jvgu nyy uvf urneg. Fb gur ubhfr bs Nunmvnu unq ab
cbjre gb xrrc fgvyy gur xvatqbz.

22:10 Ohg jura Ngunyvnu gur zbgure bs Nunmvnu fnj gung ure fba jnf
qrnq, fur nebfr naq qrfgeblrq nyy gur frrq eblny bs gur ubhfr bs
Whqnu.

22:11 Ohg Wrubfunorngu, gur qnhtugre bs gur xvat, gbbx Wbnfu gur fba
bs Nunmvnu, naq fgbyr uvz sebz nzbat gur xvat'f fbaf gung jrer fynva,
naq chg uvz naq uvf ahefr va n orqpunzore. Fb Wrubfunorngu, gur
qnhtugre bs xvat Wrubenz, gur jvsr bs Wrubvnqn gur cevrfg, (sbe fur
jnf gur fvfgre bs Nunmvnu,) uvq uvz sebz Ngunyvnu, fb gung fur fyrj
uvz abg.

22:12 Naq ur jnf jvgu gurz uvq va gur ubhfr bs Tbq fvk lrnef: naq
Ngunyvnu ervtarq bire gur ynaq.

23:1 Naq va gur friragu lrne Wrubvnqn fgeratgurarq uvzfrys, naq gbbx
gur pncgnvaf bs uhaqerqf, Nmnevnu gur fba bs Wrebunz, naq Vfuznry gur
fba bs Wrubunana, naq Nmnevnu gur fba bs Borq, naq Znnfrvnu gur fba bs
Nqnvnu, naq Ryvfuncung gur fba bs Mvpuev, vagb pbiranag jvgu uvz.

23:2 Naq gurl jrag nobhg va Whqnu, naq tngurerq gur Yrivgrf bhg bs nyy
gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu, naq gur puvrs bs gur snguref bs Vfenry, naq gurl
pnzr gb Wrehfnyrz.

23:3 Naq nyy gur pbatertngvba znqr n pbiranag jvgu gur xvat va gur
ubhfr bs Tbq. Naq ur fnvq hagb gurz, Orubyq, gur xvat'f fba funyy
ervta, nf gur YBEQ ungu fnvq bs gur fbaf bs Qnivq.

23:4 Guvf vf gur guvat gung lr funyy qb; N guveq cneg bs lbh ragrevat
ba gur fnoongu, bs gur cevrfgf naq bs gur Yrivgrf, funyy or cbegref bs
gur qbbef; 23:5 Naq n guveq cneg funyy or ng gur xvat'f ubhfr; naq n
guveq cneg ng gur tngr bs gur sbhaqngvba: naq nyy gur crbcyr funyy or
va gur pbhegf bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

23:6 Ohg yrg abar pbzr vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, fnir gur cevrfgf,
naq gurl gung zvavfgre bs gur Yrivgrf; gurl funyy tb va, sbe gurl ner
ubyl: ohg nyy gur crbcyr funyy xrrc gur jngpu bs gur YBEQ.

23:7 Naq gur Yrivgrf funyy pbzcnff gur xvat ebhaq nobhg, rirel zna
jvgu uvf jrncbaf va uvf unaq; naq jubfbrire ryfr pbzrgu vagb gur
ubhfr, ur funyy or chg gb qrngu: ohg or lr jvgu gur xvat jura ur
pbzrgu va, naq jura ur tbrgu bhg.

23:8 Fb gur Yrivgrf naq nyy Whqnu qvq nppbeqvat gb nyy guvatf gung
Wrubvnqn gur cevrfg unq pbzznaqrq, naq gbbx rirel zna uvf zra gung
jrer gb pbzr va ba gur fnoongu, jvgu gurz gung jrer gb tb bhg ba gur
fnoongu: sbe Wrubvnqn gur cevrfg qvfzvffrq abg gur pbhefrf.

23:9 Zberbire Wrubvnqn gur cevrfg qryvirerq gb gur pncgnvaf bs
uhaqerqf fcrnef, naq ohpxyref, naq fuvryqf, gung unq orra xvat
Qnivq'f, juvpu jrer va gur ubhfr bs Tbq.

23:10 Naq ur frg nyy gur crbcyr, rirel zna univat uvf jrncba va uvf
unaq, sebz gur evtug fvqr bs gur grzcyr gb gur yrsg fvqr bs gur
grzcyr, nybat ol gur nygne naq gur grzcyr, ol gur xvat ebhaq nobhg.

23:11 Gura gurl oebhtug bhg gur xvat'f fba, naq chg hcba uvz gur
pebja, naq tnir uvz gur grfgvzbal, naq znqr uvz xvat. Naq Wrubvnqn naq
uvf fbaf nabvagrq uvz, naq fnvq, Tbq fnir gur xvat.

23:12 Abj jura Ngunyvnu urneq gur abvfr bs gur crbcyr ehaavat naq
cenvfvat gur xvat, fur pnzr gb gur crbcyr vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ:
23:13 Naq fur ybbxrq, naq, orubyq, gur xvat fgbbq ng uvf cvyyne ng gur
ragrevat va, naq gur cevaprf naq gur gehzcrgf ol gur xvat: naq nyy gur
crbcyr bs gur ynaq erwbvprq, naq fbhaqrq jvgu gehzcrgf, nyfb gur
fvatref jvgu vafgehzragf bs zhfvpx, naq fhpu nf gnhtug gb fvat cenvfr.
Gura Ngunyvnu erag ure pybgurf, naq fnvq, Gernfba, Gernfba.

23:14 Gura Wrubvnqn gur cevrfg oebhtug bhg gur pncgnvaf bs uhaqerqf
gung jrer frg bire gur ubfg, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Unir ure sbegu bs gur
enatrf: naq jubfb sbyybjrgu ure, yrg uvz or fynva jvgu gur fjbeq. Sbe
gur cevrfg fnvq, Fynl ure abg va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

23:15 Fb gurl ynvq unaqf ba ure; naq jura fur jnf pbzr gb gur ragrevat
bs gur ubefr tngr ol gur xvat'f ubhfr, gurl fyrj ure gurer.

23:16 Naq Wrubvnqn znqr n pbiranag orgjrra uvz, naq orgjrra nyy gur
crbcyr, naq orgjrra gur xvat, gung gurl fubhyq or gur YBEQ'f crbcyr.

23:17 Gura nyy gur crbcyr jrag gb gur ubhfr bs Onny, naq oenxr vg
qbja, naq oenxr uvf nygnef naq uvf vzntrf va cvrprf, naq fyrj Znggna
gur cevrfg bs Onny orsber gur nygnef.

23:18 Nyfb Wrubvnqn nccbvagrq gur bssvprf bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ ol
gur unaq bs gur cevrfgf gur Yrivgrf, jubz Qnivq unq qvfgevohgrq va gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, gb bssre gur oheag bssrevatf bs gur YBEQ, nf vg vf
jevggra va gur ynj bs Zbfrf, jvgu erwbvpvat naq jvgu fvatvat, nf vg
jnf beqnvarq ol Qnivq.

23:19 Naq ur frg gur cbegref ng gur tngrf bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ,
gung abar juvpu jnf hapyrna va nal guvat fubhyq ragre va.

23:20 Naq ur gbbx gur pncgnvaf bs uhaqerqf, naq gur aboyrf, naq gur
tbireabef bs gur crbcyr, naq nyy gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq, naq oebhtug
qbja gur xvat sebz gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ: naq gurl pnzr guebhtu gur
uvtu tngr vagb gur xvat'f ubhfr, naq frg gur xvat hcba gur guebar bs
gur xvatqbz.

23:21 Naq nyy gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq erwbvprq: naq gur pvgl jnf dhvrg,
nsgre gung gurl unq fynva Ngunyvnu jvgu gur fjbeq.

24:1 Wbnfu jnf frira lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur ervtarq
sbegl lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Uvf zbgure'f anzr nyfb jnf Mvovnu bs
Orrefuron.

24:2 Naq Wbnfu qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ nyy
gur qnlf bs Wrubvnqn gur cevrfg.

24:3 Naq Wrubvnqn gbbx sbe uvz gjb jvirf; naq ur ortng fbaf naq
qnhtugref.

24:4 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff nsgre guvf, gung Wbnfu jnf zvaqrq gb ercnve
gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

24:5 Naq ur tngurerq gbtrgure gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf, naq fnvq gb
gurz, Tb bhg hagb gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu, naq tngure bs nyy Vfenry zbarl
gb ercnve gur ubhfr bs lbhe Tbq sebz lrne gb lrne, naq frr gung lr
unfgra gur znggre. Ubjorvg gur Yrivgrf unfgrarq vg abg.

24:6 Naq gur xvat pnyyrq sbe Wrubvnqn gur puvrs, naq fnvq hagb uvz,
Jul unfg gubh abg erdhverq bs gur Yrivgrf gb oevat va bhg bs Whqnu naq
bhg bs Wrehfnyrz gur pbyyrpgvba, nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs Zbfrf
gur freinag bs gur YBEQ, naq bs gur pbatertngvba bs Vfenry, sbe gur
gnoreanpyr bs jvgarff?  24:7 Sbe gur fbaf bs Ngunyvnu, gung jvpxrq
jbzna, unq oebxra hc gur ubhfr bs Tbq; naq nyfb nyy gur qrqvpngrq
guvatf bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ qvq gurl orfgbj hcba Onnyvz.

24:8 Naq ng gur xvat'f pbzznaqzrag gurl znqr n purfg, naq frg vg
jvgubhg ng gur tngr bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

24:9 Naq gurl znqr n cebpynzngvba guebhtu Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz, gb
oevat va gb gur YBEQ gur pbyyrpgvba gung Zbfrf gur freinag bs Tbq ynvq
hcba Vfenry va gur jvyqrearff.

24:10 Naq nyy gur cevaprf naq nyy gur crbcyr erwbvprq, naq oebhtug va,
naq pnfg vagb gur purfg, hagvy gurl unq znqr na raq.

24:11 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff, gung ng jung gvzr gur purfg jnf oebhtug
hagb gur xvat'f bssvpr ol gur unaq bs gur Yrivgrf, naq jura gurl fnj
gung gurer jnf zhpu zbarl, gur xvat'f fpevor naq gur uvtu cevrfg'f
bssvpre pnzr naq rzcgvrq gur purfg, naq gbbx vg, naq pneevrq vg gb uvf
cynpr ntnva. Guhf gurl qvq qnl ol qnl, naq tngurerq zbarl va
nohaqnapr.

24:12 Naq gur xvat naq Wrubvnqn tnir vg gb fhpu nf qvq gur jbex bs gur
freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq uverq znfbaf naq pnecragref gb
ercnve gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq nyfb fhpu nf jebhtug veba naq oenff
gb zraq gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

24:13 Fb gur jbexzra jebhtug, naq gur jbex jnf cresrpgrq ol gurz, naq
gurl frg gur ubhfr bs Tbq va uvf fgngr, naq fgeratgurarq vg.

24:14 Naq jura gurl unq svavfurq vg, gurl oebhtug gur erfg bs gur
zbarl orsber gur xvat naq Wrubvnqn, jurerbs jrer znqr irffryf sbe gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, rira irffryf gb zvavfgre, naq gb bssre jvguny, naq
fcbbaf, naq irffryf bs tbyq naq fvyire. Naq gurl bssrerq oheag
bssrevatf va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ pbagvahnyyl nyy gur qnlf bs
Wrubvnqn.

24:15 Ohg Wrubvnqn jnkrq byq, naq jnf shyy bs qnlf jura ur qvrq; na
uhaqerq naq guvegl lrnef byq jnf ur jura ur qvrq.

24:16 Naq gurl ohevrq uvz va gur pvgl bs Qnivq nzbat gur xvatf,
orpnhfr ur unq qbar tbbq va Vfenry, obgu gbjneq Tbq, naq gbjneq uvf
ubhfr.

24:17 Abj nsgre gur qrngu bs Wrubvnqn pnzr gur cevaprf bs Whqnu, naq
znqr borvfnapr gb gur xvat. Gura gur xvat urnexrarq hagb gurz.

24:18 Naq gurl yrsg gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve snguref, naq
freirq tebirf naq vqbyf: naq jengu pnzr hcba Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz sbe
guvf gurve gerfcnff.

24:19 Lrg ur frag cebcurgf gb gurz, gb oevat gurz ntnva hagb gur YBEQ;
naq gurl grfgvsvrq ntnvafg gurz: ohg gurl jbhyq abg tvir rne.

24:20 Naq gur Fcvevg bs Tbq pnzr hcba Mrpunevnu gur fba bs Wrubvnqn
gur cevrfg, juvpu fgbbq nobir gur crbcyr, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Guhf
fnvgu Tbq, Jul genafterff lr gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ, gung lr
pnaabg cebfcre? orpnhfr lr unir sbefnxra gur YBEQ, ur ungu nyfb
sbefnxra lbh.

24:21 Naq gurl pbafcverq ntnvafg uvz, naq fgbarq uvz jvgu fgbarf ng
gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur xvat va gur pbheg bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

24:22 Guhf Wbnfu gur xvat erzrzorerq abg gur xvaqarff juvpu Wrubvnqn
uvf sngure unq qbar gb uvz, ohg fyrj uvf fba. Naq jura ur qvrq, ur
fnvq, Gur YBEQ ybbx hcba vg, naq erdhver vg.

24:23 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff ng gur raq bs gur lrne, gung gur ubfg bs
Flevn pnzr hc ntnvafg uvz: naq gurl pnzr gb Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz, naq
qrfgeblrq nyy gur cevaprf bs gur crbcyr sebz nzbat gur crbcyr, naq
frag nyy gur fcbvy bs gurz hagb gur xvat bs Qnznfphf.

24:24 Sbe gur nezl bs gur Flevnaf pnzr jvgu n fznyy pbzcnal bs zra,
naq gur YBEQ qryvirerq n irel terng ubfg vagb gurve unaq, orpnhfr gurl
unq sbefnxra gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve snguref. Fb gurl rkrphgrq whqtzrag
ntnvafg Wbnfu.

24:25 Naq jura gurl jrer qrcnegrq sebz uvz, (sbe gurl yrsg uvz va
terng qvfrnfrf,) uvf bja freinagf pbafcverq ntnvafg uvz sbe gur oybbq
bs gur fbaf bs Wrubvnqn gur cevrfg, naq fyrj uvz ba uvf orq, naq ur
qvrq: naq gurl ohevrq uvz va gur pvgl bs Qnivq, ohg gurl ohevrq uvz
abg va gur frchypuerf bs gur xvatf.

24:26 Naq gurfr ner gurl gung pbafcverq ntnvafg uvz; Mnonq gur fba bs
Fuvzrngu na Nzzbavgrff, naq Wrubmnonq gur fba bs Fuvzevgu n Zbnovgrff.

24:27 Abj pbapreavat uvf fbaf, naq gur terngarff bs gur oheqraf ynvq
hcba uvz, naq gur ercnvevat bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq, orubyq, gurl ner
jevggra va gur fgbel bs gur obbx bs gur xvatf. Naq Nznmvnu uvf fba
ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

25:1 Nznmvnu jnf gjragl naq svir lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq
ur ervtarq gjragl naq avar lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf zbgure'f anzr
jnf Wrubnqqna bs Wrehfnyrz.

25:2 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, ohg abg
jvgu n cresrpg urneg.

25:3 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur xvatqbz jnf rfgnoyvfurq gb uvz,
gung ur fyrj uvf freinagf gung unq xvyyrq gur xvat uvf sngure.

25:4 Ohg ur fyrj abg gurve puvyqera, ohg qvq nf vg vf jevggra va gur
ynj va gur obbx bs Zbfrf, jurer gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq, fnlvat, Gur
snguref funyy abg qvr sbe gur puvyqera, arvgure funyy gur puvyqera qvr
sbe gur snguref, ohg rirel zna funyy qvr sbe uvf bja fva.

25:5 Zberbire Nznmvnu tngurerq Whqnu gbtrgure, naq znqr gurz pncgnvaf
bire gubhfnaqf, naq pncgnvaf bire uhaqerqf, nppbeqvat gb gur ubhfrf bs
gurve snguref, guebhtubhg nyy Whqnu naq Orawnzva: naq ur ahzorerq gurz
sebz gjragl lrnef byq naq nobir, naq sbhaq gurz guerr uhaqerq gubhfnaq
pubvpr zra, noyr gb tb sbegu gb jne, gung pbhyq unaqyr fcrne naq
fuvryq.

25:6 Ur uverq nyfb na uhaqerq gubhfnaq zvtugl zra bs inybhe bhg bs
Vfenry sbe na uhaqerq gnyragf bs fvyire.

25:7 Ohg gurer pnzr n zna bs Tbq gb uvz, fnlvat, B xvat, yrg abg gur
nezl bs Vfenry tb jvgu gurr; sbe gur YBEQ vf abg jvgu Vfenry, gb jvg,
jvgu nyy gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz.

25:8 Ohg vs gubh jvyg tb, qb vg; or fgebat sbe gur onggyr: Tbq funyy
znxr gurr snyy orsber gur rarzl: sbe Tbq ungu cbjre gb uryc, naq gb
pnfg qbja.

25:9 Naq Nznmvnu fnvq gb gur zna bs Tbq, Ohg jung funyy jr qb sbe gur
uhaqerq gnyragf juvpu V unir tvira gb gur nezl bs Vfenry? Naq gur zna
bs Tbq nafjrerq, Gur YBEQ vf noyr gb tvir gurr zhpu zber guna guvf.

25:10 Gura Nznmvnu frcnengrq gurz, gb jvg, gur nezl gung jnf pbzr gb
uvz bhg bs Rcuenvz, gb tb ubzr ntnva: jurersber gurve natre jnf
terngyl xvaqyrq ntnvafg Whqnu, naq gurl erghearq ubzr va terng natre.

25:11 Naq Nznmvnu fgeratgurarq uvzfrys, naq yrq sbegu uvf crbcyr, naq
jrag gb gur inyyrl bs fnyg, naq fzbgr bs gur puvyqera bs Frve gra
gubhfnaq.

25:12 Naq bgure gra gubhfnaq yrsg nyvir qvq gur puvyqera bs Whqnu
pneel njnl pncgvir, naq oebhtug gurz hagb gur gbc bs gur ebpx, naq
pnfg gurz qbja sebz gur gbc bs gur ebpx, gung gurl nyy jrer oebxra va
cvrprf.

25:13 Ohg gur fbyqvref bs gur nezl juvpu Nznmvnu frag onpx, gung gurl
fubhyq abg tb jvgu uvz gb onggyr, sryy hcba gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu, sebz
Fnznevn rira hagb Orguubeba, naq fzbgr guerr gubhfnaq bs gurz, naq
gbbx zhpu fcbvy.

25:14 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff, nsgre gung Nznmvnu jnf pbzr sebz gur
fynhtugre bs gur Rqbzvgrf, gung ur oebhtug gur tbqf bs gur puvyqera bs
Frve, naq frg gurz hc gb or uvf tbqf, naq objrq qbja uvzfrys orsber
gurz, naq ohearq vaprafr hagb gurz.

25:15 Jurersber gur natre bs gur YBEQ jnf xvaqyrq ntnvafg Nznmvnu, naq
ur frag hagb uvz n cebcurg, juvpu fnvq hagb uvz, Jul unfg gubh fbhtug
nsgre gur tbqf bs gur crbcyr, juvpu pbhyq abg qryvire gurve bja crbcyr
bhg bs guvar unaq?  25:16 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, nf ur gnyxrq jvgu uvz,
gung gur xvat fnvq hagb uvz, Neg gubh znqr bs gur xvat'f pbhafry?
sbeorne; jul fubhyqrfg gubh or fzvggra? Gura gur cebcurg sbeoner, naq
fnvq, V xabj gung Tbq ungu qrgrezvarq gb qrfgebl gurr, orpnhfr gubh
unfg qbar guvf, naq unfg abg urnexrarq hagb zl pbhafry.

25:17 Gura Nznmvnu xvat bs Whqnu gbbx nqivpr, naq frag gb Wbnfu, gur
fba bs Wrubnunm, gur fba bs Wruh, xvat bs Vfenry, fnlvat, Pbzr, yrg hf
frr bar nabgure va gur snpr.

25:18 Naq Wbnfu xvat bs Vfenry frag gb Nznmvnu xvat bs Whqnu, fnlvat,
Gur guvfgyr gung jnf va Yronaba frag gb gur prqne gung jnf va Yronaba,
fnlvat, Tvir gul qnhtugre gb zl fba gb jvsr: naq gurer cnffrq ol n
jvyq ornfg gung jnf va Yronaba, naq gebqr qbja gur guvfgyr.

25:19 Gubh fnlrfg, Yb, gubh unfg fzvggra gur Rqbzvgrf; naq guvar urneg
yvsgrgu gurr hc gb obnfg: novqr abj ng ubzr; jul fubhyqrfg gubh zrqqyr
gb guvar uheg, gung gubh fubhyqrfg snyy, rira gubh, naq Whqnu jvgu
gurr?  25:20 Ohg Nznmvnu jbhyq abg urne; sbe vg pnzr bs Tbq, gung ur
zvtug qryvire gurz vagb gur unaq bs gurve rarzvrf, orpnhfr gurl fbhtug
nsgre gur tbqf bs Rqbz.

25:21 Fb Wbnfu gur xvat bs Vfenry jrag hc; naq gurl fnj bar nabgure va
gur snpr, obgu ur naq Nznmvnu xvat bs Whqnu, ng Orgufurzrfu, juvpu
orybatrgu gb Whqnu.

25:22 Naq Whqnu jnf chg gb gur jbefr orsber Vfenry, naq gurl syrq
rirel zna gb uvf grag.

25:23 Naq Wbnfu gur xvat bs Vfenry gbbx Nznmvnu xvat bs Whqnu, gur fba
bs Wbnfu, gur fba bs Wrubnunm, ng Orgufurzrfu, naq oebhtug uvz gb
Wrehfnyrz, naq oenxr qbja gur jnyy bs Wrehfnyrz sebz gur tngr bs
Rcuenvz gb gur pbeare tngr, sbhe uhaqerq phovgf.

25:24 Naq ur gbbx nyy gur tbyq naq gur fvyire, naq nyy gur irffryf
gung jrer sbhaq va gur ubhfr bs Tbq jvgu Borqrqbz, naq gur gernfherf
bs gur xvat'f ubhfr, gur ubfgntrf nyfb, naq erghearq gb Fnznevn.

25:25 Naq Nznmvnu gur fba bs Wbnfu xvat bs Whqnu yvirq nsgre gur qrngu
bs Wbnfu fba bs Wrubnunm xvat bs Vfenry svsgrra lrnef.

25:26 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Nznmvnu, svefg naq ynfg, orubyq, ner
gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu naq Vfenry?  25:27
Abj nsgre gur gvzr gung Nznmvnu qvq ghea njnl sebz sbyybjvat gur YBEQ
gurl znqr n pbafcvenpl ntnvafg uvz va Wrehfnyrz; naq ur syrq gb
Ynpuvfu: ohg gurl frag gb Ynpuvfu nsgre uvz, naq fyrj uvz gurer.

25:28 Naq gurl oebhtug uvz hcba ubefrf, naq ohevrq uvz jvgu uvf
snguref va gur pvgl bs Whqnu.

26:1 Gura nyy gur crbcyr bs Whqnu gbbx Hmmvnu, jub jnf fvkgrra lrnef
byq, naq znqr uvz xvat va gur ebbz bs uvf sngure Nznmvnu.

26:2 Ur ohvyg Rybgu, naq erfgberq vg gb Whqnu, nsgre gung gur xvat
fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref.

26:3 Fvkgrra lrnef byq jnf Hmmvnu jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur
ervtarq svsgl naq gjb lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Uvf zbgure'f anzr nyfb jnf
Wrpbyvnu bs Wrehfnyrz.

26:4 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung uvf sngure Nznmvnu qvq.

26:5 Naq ur fbhtug Tbq va gur qnlf bs Mrpunevnu, jub unq haqrefgnaqvat
va gur ivfvbaf bs Tbq: naq nf ybat nf ur fbhtug gur YBEQ, Tbq znqr uvz
gb cebfcre.

26:6 Naq ur jrag sbegu naq jneerq ntnvafg gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq oenxr
qbja gur jnyy bs Tngu, naq gur jnyy bs Wnoaru, naq gur jnyy bs Nfuqbq,
naq ohvyg pvgvrf nobhg Nfuqbq, naq nzbat gur Cuvyvfgvarf.

26:7 Naq Tbq urycrq uvz ntnvafg gur Cuvyvfgvarf, naq ntnvafg gur
Nenovnaf gung qjryg va Theonny, naq gur Zruhavzf.

26:8 Naq gur Nzzbavgrf tnir tvsgf gb Hmmvnu: naq uvf anzr fcernq
noebnq rira gb gur ragrevat va bs Rtlcg; sbe ur fgeratgurarq uvzfrys
rkprrqvatyl.

26:9 Zberbire Hmmvnu ohvyg gbjref va Wrehfnyrz ng gur pbeare tngr, naq
ng gur inyyrl tngr, naq ng gur gheavat bs gur jnyy, naq sbegvsvrq
gurz.

26:10 Nyfb ur ohvyg gbjref va gur qrfreg, naq qvttrq znal jryyf: sbe
ur unq zhpu pnggyr, obgu va gur ybj pbhagel, naq va gur cynvaf:
uhfonaqzra nyfb, naq ivar qerffref va gur zbhagnvaf, naq va Pnezry:
sbe ur ybirq uhfonaqel.

26:11 Zberbire Hmmvnu unq na ubfg bs svtugvat zra, gung jrag bhg gb
jne ol onaqf, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs gurve nppbhag ol gur unaq bs
Wrvry gur fpevor naq Znnfrvnu gur ehyre, haqre gur unaq bs Unanavnu,
bar bs gur xvat'f pncgnvaf.

26:12 Gur jubyr ahzore bs gur puvrs bs gur snguref bs gur zvtugl zra
bs inybhe jrer gjb gubhfnaq naq fvk uhaqerq.

26:13 Naq haqre gurve unaq jnf na nezl, guerr uhaqerq gubhfnaq naq
frira gubhfnaq naq svir uhaqerq, gung znqr jne jvgu zvtugl cbjre, gb
uryc gur xvat ntnvafg gur rarzl.

26:14 Naq Hmmvnu cercnerq sbe gurz guebhtubhg nyy gur ubfg fuvryqf,
naq fcrnef, naq uryzrgf, naq unoretrbaf, naq objf, naq fyvatf gb pnfg
fgbarf.

26:15 Naq ur znqr va Wrehfnyrz ratvarf, vairagrq ol phaavat zra, gb or
ba gur gbjref naq hcba gur ohyjnexf, gb fubbg neebjf naq terng fgbarf
jvguny.

Naq uvf anzr fcernq sne noebnq; sbe ur jnf zneiryybhfyl urycrq, gvyy
ur jnf fgebat.

26:16 Ohg jura ur jnf fgebat, uvf urneg jnf yvsgrq hc gb uvf
qrfgehpgvba: sbe ur genafterffrq ntnvafg gur YBEQ uvf Tbq, naq jrag
vagb gur grzcyr bs gur YBEQ gb ohea vaprafr hcba gur nygne bs vaprafr.

26:17 Naq Nmnevnu gur cevrfg jrag va nsgre uvz, naq jvgu uvz sbhefpber
cevrfgf bs gur YBEQ, gung jrer inyvnag zra: 26:18 Naq gurl jvgufgbbq
Hmmvnu gur xvat, naq fnvq hagb uvz, Vg nccregnvargu abg hagb gurr,
Hmmvnu, gb ohea vaprafr hagb gur YBEQ, ohg gb gur cevrfgf gur fbaf bs
Nneba, gung ner pbafrpengrq gb ohea vaprafr: tb bhg bs gur fnapghnel;
sbe gubh unfg gerfcnffrq; arvgure funyy vg or sbe guvar ubabhe sebz
gur YBEQ Tbq.

26:19 Gura Hmmvnu jnf jebgu, naq unq n prafre va uvf unaq gb ohea
vaprafr: naq juvyr ur jnf jebgu jvgu gur cevrfgf, gur yrcebfl rira
ebfr hc va uvf sberurnq orsber gur cevrfgf va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ,
sebz orfvqr gur vaprafr nygne.

26:20 Naq Nmnevnu gur puvrs cevrfg, naq nyy gur cevrfgf, ybbxrq hcba
uvz, naq, orubyq, ur jnf yrcebhf va uvf sberurnq, naq gurl guehfg uvz
bhg sebz gurapr; lrn, uvzfrys unfgrq nyfb gb tb bhg, orpnhfr gur YBEQ
unq fzvggra uvz.

26:21 Naq Hmmvnu gur xvat jnf n yrcre hagb gur qnl bs uvf qrngu, naq
qjryg va n frireny ubhfr, orvat n yrcre; sbe ur jnf phg bss sebz gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ: naq Wbgunz uvf fba jnf bire gur xvat'f ubhfr,
whqtvat gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq.

26:22 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Hmmvnu, svefg naq ynfg, qvq Vfnvnu
gur cebcurg, gur fba bs Nzbm, jevgr.

26:23 Fb Hmmvnu fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq gurl ohevrq uvz jvgu uvf
snguref va gur svryq bs gur ohevny juvpu orybatrq gb gur xvatf; sbe
gurl fnvq, Ur vf n yrcre: naq Wbgunz uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

27:1 Wbgunz jnf gjragl naq svir lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq
ur ervtarq fvkgrra lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Uvf zbgure'f anzr nyfb jnf
Wrehfunu, gur qnhtugre bs Mnqbx.

27:2 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung uvf sngure Hmmvnu qvq: ubjorvg ur ragrerq abg
vagb gur grzcyr bs gur YBEQ. Naq gur crbcyr qvq lrg pbeehcgyl.

27:3 Ur ohvyg gur uvtu tngr bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq ba gur jnyy
bs Bcury ur ohvyg zhpu.

27:4 Zberbire ur ohvyg pvgvrf va gur zbhagnvaf bs Whqnu, naq va gur
sberfgf ur ohvyg pnfgyrf naq gbjref.

27:5 Ur sbhtug nyfb jvgu gur xvat bs gur Nzzbavgrf, naq cerinvyrq
ntnvafg gurz. Naq gur puvyqera bs Nzzba tnir uvz gur fnzr lrne na
uhaqerq gnyragf bs fvyire, naq gra gubhfnaq zrnfherf bs jurng, naq gra
gubhfnaq bs oneyrl. Fb zhpu qvq gur puvyqera bs Nzzba cnl hagb uvz,
obgu gur frpbaq lrne, naq gur guveq.

27:6 Fb Wbgunz orpnzr zvtugl, orpnhfr ur cercnerq uvf jnlf orsber gur
YBEQ uvf Tbq.

27:7 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wbgunz, naq nyy uvf jnef, naq uvf
jnlf, yb, gurl ner jevggra va gur obbx bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry naq
Whqnu.

27:8 Ur jnf svir naq gjragl lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq
ervtarq fvkgrra lrnef va Wrehfnyrz.

27:9 Naq Wbgunz fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq gurl ohevrq uvz va gur
pvgl bs Qnivq: naq Nunm uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

28:1 Nunm jnf gjragl lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur ervtarq
fvkgrra lrnef va Wrehfnyrz: ohg ur qvq abg gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur
fvtug bs gur YBEQ, yvxr Qnivq uvf sngure: 28:2 Sbe ur jnyxrq va gur
jnlf bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry, naq znqr nyfb zbygra vzntrf sbe Onnyvz.

28:3 Zberbire ur oheag vaprafr va gur inyyrl bs gur fba bs Uvaabz, naq
oheag uvf puvyqera va gur sver, nsgre gur nobzvangvbaf bs gur urngura
jubz gur YBEQ unq pnfg bhg orsber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

28:4 Ur fnpevsvprq nyfb naq oheag vaprafr va gur uvtu cynprf, naq ba
gur uvyyf, naq haqre rirel terra gerr.

28:5 Jurersber gur YBEQ uvf Tbq qryvirerq uvz vagb gur unaq bs gur
xvat bs Flevn; naq gurl fzbgr uvz, naq pneevrq njnl n terng zhygvghqr
bs gurz pncgvirf, naq oebhtug gurz gb Qnznfphf. Naq ur jnf nyfb
qryvirerq vagb gur unaq bs gur xvat bs Vfenry, jub fzbgr uvz jvgu n
terng fynhtugre.

28:6 Sbe Crxnu gur fba bs Erznyvnu fyrj va Whqnu na uhaqerq naq gjragl
gubhfnaq va bar qnl, juvpu jrer nyy inyvnag zra; orpnhfr gurl unq
sbefnxra gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve snguref.

28:7 Naq Mvpuev, n zvtugl zna bs Rcuenvz, fyrj Znnfrvnu gur xvat'f
fba, naq Nmevxnz gur tbireabe bs gur ubhfr, naq Ryxnanu gung jnf arkg
gb gur xvat.

28:8 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry pneevrq njnl pncgvir bs gurve oerguera
gjb uhaqerq gubhfnaq, jbzra, fbaf, naq qnhtugref, naq gbbx nyfb njnl
zhpu fcbvy sebz gurz, naq oebhtug gur fcbvy gb Fnznevn.

28:9 Ohg n cebcurg bs gur YBEQ jnf gurer, jubfr anzr jnf Bqrq: naq ur
jrag bhg orsber gur ubfg gung pnzr gb Fnznevn, naq fnvq hagb gurz,
Orubyq, orpnhfr gur YBEQ Tbq bs lbhe snguref jnf jebgu jvgu Whqnu, ur
ungu qryvirerq gurz vagb lbhe unaq, naq lr unir fynva gurz va n entr
gung ernpurgu hc hagb urnira.

28:10 Naq abj lr checbfr gb xrrc haqre gur puvyqera bs Whqnu naq
Wrehfnyrz sbe obaqzra naq obaqjbzra hagb lbh: ohg ner gurer abg jvgu
lbh, rira jvgu lbh, fvaf ntnvafg gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq?  28:11 Abj urne zr
gurersber, naq qryvire gur pncgvirf ntnva, juvpu lr unir gnxra pncgvir
bs lbhe oerguera: sbe gur svrepr jengu bs gur YBEQ vf hcba lbh.

28:12 Gura pregnva bs gur urnqf bs gur puvyqera bs Rcuenvz, Nmnevnu
gur fba bs Wbunana, Orerpuvnu gur fba bs Zrfuvyyrzbgu, naq Wruvmxvnu
gur fba bs Funyyhz, naq Nznfn gur fba bs Unqynv, fgbbq hc ntnvafg gurz
gung pnzr sebz gur jne, 28:13 Naq fnvq hagb gurz, Lr funyy abg oevat
va gur pncgvirf uvgure: sbe jurernf jr unir bssraqrq ntnvafg gur YBEQ
nyernql, lr vagraq gb nqq zber gb bhe fvaf naq gb bhe gerfcnff: sbe
bhe gerfcnff vf terng, naq gurer vf svrepr jengu ntnvafg Vfenry.

28:14 Fb gur nezrq zra yrsg gur pncgvirf naq gur fcbvy orsber gur
cevaprf naq nyy gur pbatertngvba.

28:15 Naq gur zra juvpu jrer rkcerffrq ol anzr ebfr hc, naq gbbx gur
pncgvirf, naq jvgu gur fcbvy pybgurq nyy gung jrer anxrq nzbat gurz,
naq neenlrq gurz, naq fubq gurz, naq tnir gurz gb rng naq gb qevax,
naq nabvagrq gurz, naq pneevrq nyy gur srroyr bs gurz hcba nffrf, naq
oebhtug gurz gb Wrevpub, gur pvgl bs cnyz gerrf, gb gurve oerguera:
gura gurl erghearq gb Fnznevn.

28:16 Ng gung gvzr qvq xvat Nunm fraq hagb gur xvatf bs Nfflevn gb
uryc uvz.

28:17 Sbe ntnva gur Rqbzvgrf unq pbzr naq fzvggra Whqnu, naq pneevrq
njnl pncgvirf.

28:18 Gur Cuvyvfgvarf nyfb unq vainqrq gur pvgvrf bs gur ybj pbhagel,
naq bs gur fbhgu bs Whqnu, naq unq gnxra Orgufurzrfu, naq Nwnyba, naq
Trqrebgu, naq Fubpub jvgu gur ivyyntrf gurerbs, naq Gvzanu jvgu gur
ivyyntrf gurerbs, Tvzmb nyfb naq gur ivyyntrf gurerbs: naq gurl qjryg
gurer.

28:19 Sbe gur YBEQ oebhtug Whqnu ybj orpnhfr bs Nunm xvat bs Vfenry;
sbe ur znqr Whqnu anxrq, naq genafterffrq fber ntnvafg gur YBEQ.

28:20 Naq Gvytngucvyarfre xvat bs Nfflevn pnzr hagb uvz, naq
qvfgerffrq uvz, ohg fgeratgurarq uvz abg.

28:21 Sbe Nunm gbbx njnl n cbegvba bhg bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq
bhg bs gur ubhfr bs gur xvat, naq bs gur cevaprf, naq tnir vg hagb gur
xvat bs Nfflevn: ohg ur urycrq uvz abg.

28:22 Naq va gur gvzr bs uvf qvfgerff qvq ur gerfcnff lrg zber ntnvafg
gur YBEQ: guvf vf gung xvat Nunm.

28:23 Sbe ur fnpevsvprq hagb gur tbqf bs Qnznfphf, juvpu fzbgr uvz:
naq ur fnvq, Orpnhfr gur tbqf bs gur xvatf bs Flevn uryc gurz,
gurersber jvyy V fnpevsvpr gb gurz, gung gurl znl uryc zr. Ohg gurl
jrer gur ehva bs uvz, naq bs nyy Vfenry.

28:24 Naq Nunm tngurerq gbtrgure gur irffryf bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq, naq
phg va cvrprf gur irffryf bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq, naq fuhg hc gur qbbef
bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq ur znqr uvz nygnef va rirel pbeare bs
Wrehfnyrz.

28:25 Naq va rirel frireny pvgl bs Whqnu ur znqr uvtu cynprf gb ohea
vaprafr hagb bgure tbqf, naq cebibxrq gb natre gur YBEQ Tbq bs uvf
snguref.

28:26 Abj gur erfg bs uvf npgf naq bs nyy uvf jnlf, svefg naq ynfg,
orubyq, gurl ner jevggra va gur obbx bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu naq Vfenry.

28:27 Naq Nunm fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq gurl ohevrq uvz va gur
pvgl, rira va Wrehfnyrz: ohg gurl oebhtug uvz abg vagb gur frchypuerf
bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry: naq Urmrxvnu uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

29:1 Urmrxvnu ortna gb ervta jura ur jnf svir naq gjragl lrnef byq,
naq ur ervtarq avar naq gjragl lrnef va Wrehfnyrz. Naq uvf zbgure'f
anzr jnf Novwnu, gur qnhtugre bs Mrpunevnu.

29:2 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ,
nppbeqvat gb nyy gung Qnivq uvf sngure unq qbar.

29:3 Ur va gur svefg lrne bs uvf ervta, va gur svefg zbagu, bcrarq gur
qbbef bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq ercnverq gurz.

29:4 Naq ur oebhtug va gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf, naq tngurerq gurz
gbtrgure vagb gur rnfg fgerrg, 29:5 Naq fnvq hagb gurz, Urne zr, lr
Yrivgrf, fnapgvsl abj lbhefryirf, naq fnapgvsl gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ
Tbq bs lbhe snguref, naq pneel sbegu gur svyguvarff bhg bs gur ubyl
cynpr.

29:6 Sbe bhe snguref unir gerfcnffrq, naq qbar gung juvpu jnf rivy va
gur rlrf bs gur YBEQ bhe Tbq, naq unir sbefnxra uvz, naq unir ghearq
njnl gurve snprf sebz gur unovgngvba bs gur YBEQ, naq ghearq gurve
onpxf.

29:7 Nyfb gurl unir fuhg hc gur qbbef bs gur cbepu, naq chg bhg gur
ynzcf, naq unir abg ohearq vaprafr abe bssrerq oheag bssrevatf va gur
ubyl cynpr hagb gur Tbq bs Vfenry.

29:8 Jurersber gur jengu bs gur YBEQ jnf hcba Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz, naq
ur ungu qryvirerq gurz gb gebhoyr, gb nfgbavfuzrag, naq gb uvffvat, nf
lr frr jvgu lbhe rlrf.

29:9 Sbe, yb, bhe snguref unir snyyra ol gur fjbeq, naq bhe fbaf naq
bhe qnhtugref naq bhe jvirf ner va pncgvivgl sbe guvf.

29:10 Abj vg vf va zvar urneg gb znxr n pbiranag jvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs
Vfenry, gung uvf svrepr jengu znl ghea njnl sebz hf.

29:11 Zl fbaf, or abg abj artyvtrag: sbe gur YBEQ ungu pubfra lbh gb
fgnaq orsber uvz, gb freir uvz, naq gung lr fubhyq zvavfgre hagb uvz,
naq ohea vaprafr.

29:12 Gura gur Yrivgrf nebfr, Znungu gur fba bs Nznfnv, naq Wbry gur
fba bs Nmnevnu, bs gur fbaf bs gur Xbunguvgrf: naq bs gur fbaf bs
Zrenev, Xvfu gur fba bs Noqv, naq Nmnevnu gur fba bs Wrunyryry: naq bs
gur Trefubavgrf; Wbnu gur fba bs Mvzznu, naq Rqra gur fba bs Wbnu:
29:13 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Ryvmncuna; Fuvzev, naq Wrvry: naq bs gur fbaf
bs Nfncu; Mrpunevnu, naq Znggnavnu: 29:14 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Urzna;
Wruvry, naq Fuvzrv: naq bs gur fbaf bs Wrqhguha; Furznvnu, naq Hmmvry.

29:15 Naq gurl tngurerq gurve oerguera, naq fnapgvsvrq gurzfryirf, naq
pnzr, nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur xvat, ol gur jbeqf bs gur
YBEQ, gb pyrnafr gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

29:16 Naq gur cevrfgf jrag vagb gur vaare cneg bs gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ, gb pyrnafr vg, naq oebhtug bhg nyy gur hapyrnaarff gung gurl
sbhaq va gur grzcyr bs gur YBEQ vagb gur pbheg bs gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ. Naq gur Yrivgrf gbbx vg, gb pneel vg bhg noebnq vagb gur oebbx
Xvqeba.

29:17 Abj gurl ortna ba gur svefg qnl bs gur svefg zbagu gb fnapgvsl,
naq ba gur rvtugu qnl bs gur zbagu pnzr gurl gb gur cbepu bs gur YBEQ:
fb gurl fnapgvsvrq gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ va rvtug qnlf; naq va gur
fvkgrragu qnl bs gur svefg zbagu gurl znqr na raq.

29:18 Gura gurl jrag va gb Urmrxvnu gur xvat, naq fnvq, Jr unir
pyrnafrq nyy gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq gur nygne bs oheag bssrevat,
jvgu nyy gur irffryf gurerbs, naq gur furjoernq gnoyr, jvgu nyy gur
irffryf gurerbs.

29:19 Zberbire nyy gur irffryf, juvpu xvat Nunm va uvf ervta qvq pnfg
njnl va uvf genafterffvba, unir jr cercnerq naq fnapgvsvrq, naq,
orubyq, gurl ner orsber gur nygne bs gur YBEQ.

29:20 Gura Urmrxvnu gur xvat ebfr rneyl, naq tngurerq gur ehyref bs
gur pvgl, naq jrag hc gb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

29:21 Naq gurl oebhtug frira ohyybpxf, naq frira enzf, naq frira
ynzof, naq frira ur tbngf, sbe n fva bssrevat sbe gur xvatqbz, naq sbe
gur fnapghnel, naq sbe Whqnu. Naq ur pbzznaqrq gur cevrfgf gur fbaf bs
Nneba gb bssre gurz ba gur nygne bs gur YBEQ.

29:22 Fb gurl xvyyrq gur ohyybpxf, naq gur cevrfgf erprvirq gur oybbq,
naq fcevaxyrq vg ba gur nygne: yvxrjvfr, jura gurl unq xvyyrq gur
enzf, gurl fcevaxyrq gur oybbq hcba gur nygne: gurl xvyyrq nyfb gur
ynzof, naq gurl fcevaxyrq gur oybbq hcba gur nygne.

29:23 Naq gurl oebhtug sbegu gur ur tbngf sbe gur fva bssrevat orsber
gur xvat naq gur pbatertngvba; naq gurl ynvq gurve unaqf hcba gurz:
29:24 Naq gur cevrfgf xvyyrq gurz, naq gurl znqr erpbapvyvngvba jvgu
gurve oybbq hcba gur nygne, gb znxr na ngbarzrag sbe nyy Vfenry: sbe
gur xvat pbzznaqrq gung gur oheag bssrevat naq gur fva bssrevat fubhyq
or znqr sbe nyy Vfenry.

29:25 Naq ur frg gur Yrivgrf va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ jvgu plzonyf,
jvgu cfnygrevrf, naq jvgu unecf, nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs
Qnivq, naq bs Tnq gur xvat'f frre, naq Anguna gur cebcurg: sbe fb jnf
gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ ol uvf cebcurgf.

29:26 Naq gur Yrivgrf fgbbq jvgu gur vafgehzragf bs Qnivq, naq gur
cevrfgf jvgu gur gehzcrgf.

29:27 Naq Urmrxvnu pbzznaqrq gb bssre gur oheag bssrevat hcba gur
nygne.

Naq jura gur oheag bssrevat ortna, gur fbat bs gur YBEQ ortna nyfb
jvgu gur gehzcrgf, naq jvgu gur vafgehzragf beqnvarq ol Qnivq xvat bs
Vfenry.

29:28 Naq nyy gur pbatertngvba jbefuvccrq, naq gur fvatref fnat, naq
gur gehzcrgref fbhaqrq: naq nyy guvf pbagvahrq hagvy gur oheag
bssrevat jnf svavfurq.

29:29 Naq jura gurl unq znqr na raq bs bssrevat, gur xvat naq nyy gung
jrer cerfrag jvgu uvz objrq gurzfryirf, naq jbefuvccrq.

29:30 Zberbire Urmrxvnu gur xvat naq gur cevaprf pbzznaqrq gur Yrivgrf
gb fvat cenvfr hagb gur YBEQ jvgu gur jbeqf bs Qnivq, naq bs Nfncu gur
frre. Naq gurl fnat cenvfrf jvgu tynqarff, naq gurl objrq gurve urnqf
naq jbefuvccrq.

29:31 Gura Urmrxvnu nafjrerq naq fnvq, Abj lr unir pbafrpengrq
lbhefryirf hagb gur YBEQ, pbzr arne naq oevat fnpevsvprf naq gunax
bssrevatf vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ. Naq gur pbatertngvba oebhtug va
fnpevsvprf naq gunax bssrevatf; naq nf znal nf jrer bs n serr urneg
oheag bssrevatf.

29:32 Naq gur ahzore bs gur oheag bssrevatf, juvpu gur pbatertngvba
oebhtug, jnf guerrfpber naq gra ohyybpxf, na uhaqerq enzf, naq gjb
uhaqerq ynzof: nyy gurfr jrer sbe n oheag bssrevat gb gur YBEQ.

29:33 Naq gur pbafrpengrq guvatf jrer fvk uhaqerq bkra naq guerr
gubhfnaq furrc.

29:34 Ohg gur cevrfgf jrer gbb srj, fb gung gurl pbhyq abg synl nyy
