gur oheag bssrevatf: jurersber gurve oerguera gur Yrivgrf qvq uryc
gurz, gvyy gur jbex jnf raqrq, naq hagvy gur bgure cevrfgf unq
fnapgvsvrq gurzfryirf: sbe gur Yrivgrf jrer zber hcevtug va urneg gb
fnapgvsl gurzfryirf guna gur cevrfgf.

29:35 Naq nyfb gur oheag bssrevatf jrer va nohaqnapr, jvgu gur sng bs
gur crnpr bssrevatf, naq gur qevax bssrevatf sbe rirel oheag bssrevat.
Fb gur freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ jnf frg va beqre.

29:36 Naq Urmrxvnu erwbvprq, naq nyy gur crbcyr, gung Tbq unq cercnerq
gur crbcyr: sbe gur guvat jnf qbar fhqqrayl.

30:1 Naq Urmrxvnu frag gb nyy Vfenry naq Whqnu, naq jebgr yrggref nyfb
gb Rcuenvz naq Znanffru, gung gurl fubhyq pbzr gb gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ ng Wrehfnyrz, gb xrrc gur cnffbire hagb gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry.

30:2 Sbe gur xvat unq gnxra pbhafry, naq uvf cevaprf, naq nyy gur
pbatertngvba va Wrehfnyrz, gb xrrc gur cnffbire va gur frpbaq zbagu.

30:3 Sbe gurl pbhyq abg xrrc vg ng gung gvzr, orpnhfr gur cevrfgf unq
abg fnapgvsvrq gurzfryirf fhssvpvragyl, arvgure unq gur crbcyr
tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure gb Wrehfnyrz.

30:4 Naq gur guvat cyrnfrq gur xvat naq nyy gur pbatertngvba.

30:5 Fb gurl rfgnoyvfurq n qrperr gb znxr cebpynzngvba guebhtubhg nyy
Vfenry, sebz Orrefuron rira gb Qna, gung gurl fubhyq pbzr gb xrrc gur
cnffbire hagb gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry ng Wrehfnyrz: sbe gurl unq abg
qbar vg bs n ybat gvzr va fhpu fbeg nf vg jnf jevggra.

30:6 Fb gur cbfgf jrag jvgu gur yrggref sebz gur xvat naq uvf cevaprf
guebhtubhg nyy Vfenry naq Whqnu, naq nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs
gur xvat, fnlvat, Lr puvyqera bs Vfenry, ghea ntnva hagb gur YBEQ Tbq
bs Noenunz, Vfnnp, naq Vfenry, naq ur jvyy erghea gb gur erzanag bs
lbh, gung ner rfpncrq bhg bs gur unaq bs gur xvatf bs Nfflevn.

30:7 Naq or abg lr yvxr lbhe snguref, naq yvxr lbhe oerguera, juvpu
gerfcnffrq ntnvafg gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve snguref, jub gurersber tnir
gurz hc gb qrfbyngvba, nf lr frr.

30:8 Abj or lr abg fgvssarpxrq, nf lbhe snguref jrer, ohg lvryq
lbhefryirf hagb gur YBEQ, naq ragre vagb uvf fnapghnel, juvpu ur ungu
fnapgvsvrq sbe rire: naq freir gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq, gung gur svreprarff
bs uvf jengu znl ghea njnl sebz lbh.

30:9 Sbe vs lr ghea ntnva hagb gur YBEQ, lbhe oerguera naq lbhe
puvyqera funyy svaq pbzcnffvba orsber gurz gung yrnq gurz pncgvir, fb
gung gurl funyy pbzr ntnva vagb guvf ynaq: sbe gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq vf
tenpvbhf naq zrepvshy, naq jvyy abg ghea njnl uvf snpr sebz lbh, vs lr
erghea hagb uvz.

30:10 Fb gur cbfgf cnffrq sebz pvgl gb pvgl guebhtu gur pbhagel bs
Rcuenvz naq Znanffru rira hagb Mrohyha: ohg gurl ynhturq gurz gb
fpbea, naq zbpxrq gurz.

30:11 Arireguryrff qviref bs Nfure naq Znanffru naq bs Mrohyha uhzoyrq
gurzfryirf, naq pnzr gb Wrehfnyrz.

30:12 Nyfb va Whqnu gur unaq bs Tbq jnf gb tvir gurz bar urneg gb qb
gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur xvat naq bs gur cevaprf, ol gur jbeq bs gur
YBEQ.

30:13 Naq gurer nffrzoyrq ng Wrehfnyrz zhpu crbcyr gb xrrc gur srnfg
bs hayrnirarq oernq va gur frpbaq zbagu, n irel terng pbatertngvba.

30:14 Naq gurl nebfr naq gbbx njnl gur nygnef gung jrer va Wrehfnyrz,
naq nyy gur nygnef sbe vaprafr gbbx gurl njnl, naq pnfg gurz vagb gur
oebbx Xvqeba.

30:15 Gura gurl xvyyrq gur cnffbire ba gur sbhegrragu qnl bs gur
frpbaq zbagu: naq gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf jrer nfunzrq, naq
fnapgvsvrq gurzfryirf, naq oebhtug va gur oheag bssrevatf vagb gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

30:16 Naq gurl fgbbq va gurve cynpr nsgre gurve znaare, nppbeqvat gb
gur ynj bs Zbfrf gur zna bs Tbq: gur cevrfgf fcevaxyrq gur oybbq,
juvpu gurl erprvirq bs gur unaq bs gur Yrivgrf.

30:17 Sbe gurer jrer znal va gur pbatertngvba gung jrer abg
fnapgvsvrq: gurersber gur Yrivgrf unq gur punetr bs gur xvyyvat bs gur
cnffbiref sbe rirel bar gung jnf abg pyrna, gb fnapgvsl gurz hagb gur
YBEQ.

30:18 Sbe n zhygvghqr bs gur crbcyr, rira znal bs Rcuenvz, naq
Znanffru, Vffnpune, naq Mrohyha, unq abg pyrnafrq gurzfryirf, lrg qvq
gurl rng gur cnffbire bgurejvfr guna vg jnf jevggra. Ohg Urmrxvnu
cenlrq sbe gurz, fnlvat, Gur tbbq YBEQ cneqba rirel bar 30:19 Gung
cercnergu uvf urneg gb frrx Tbq, gur YBEQ Tbq bs uvf snguref, gubhtu
ur or abg pyrnafrq nppbeqvat gb gur chevsvpngvba bs gur fnapghnel.

30:20 Naq gur YBEQ urnexrarq gb Urmrxvnu, naq urnyrq gur crbcyr.

30:21 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gung jrer cerfrag ng Wrehfnyrz xrcg
gur srnfg bs hayrnirarq oernq frira qnlf jvgu terng tynqarff: naq gur
Yrivgrf naq gur cevrfgf cenvfrq gur YBEQ qnl ol qnl, fvatvat jvgu ybhq
vafgehzragf hagb gur YBEQ.

30:22 Naq Urmrxvnu fcnxr pbzsbegnoyl hagb nyy gur Yrivgrf gung gnhtug
gur tbbq xabjyrqtr bs gur YBEQ: naq gurl qvq rng guebhtubhg gur srnfg
frira qnlf, bssrevat crnpr bssrevatf, naq znxvat pbasrffvba gb gur
YBEQ Tbq bs gurve snguref.

30:23 Naq gur jubyr nffrzoyl gbbx pbhafry gb xrrc bgure frira qnlf:
naq gurl xrcg bgure frira qnlf jvgu tynqarff.

30:24 Sbe Urmrxvnu xvat bs Whqnu qvq tvir gb gur pbatertngvba n
gubhfnaq ohyybpxf naq frira gubhfnaq furrc; naq gur cevaprf tnir gb
gur pbatertngvba n gubhfnaq ohyybpxf naq gra gubhfnaq furrc: naq n
terng ahzore bs cevrfgf fnapgvsvrq gurzfryirf.

30:25 Naq nyy gur pbatertngvba bs Whqnu, jvgu gur cevrfgf naq gur
Yrivgrf, naq nyy gur pbatertngvba gung pnzr bhg bs Vfenry, naq gur
fgenatref gung pnzr bhg bs gur ynaq bs Vfenry, naq gung qjryg va
Whqnu, erwbvprq.

30:26 Fb gurer jnf terng wbl va Wrehfnyrz: sbe fvapr gur gvzr bs
Fbybzba gur fba bs Qnivq xvat bs Vfenry gurer jnf abg gur yvxr va
Wrehfnyrz.

30:27 Gura gur cevrfgf gur Yrivgrf nebfr naq oyrffrq gur crbcyr: naq
gurve ibvpr jnf urneq, naq gurve cenlre pnzr hc gb uvf ubyl qjryyvat
cynpr, rira hagb urnira.

31:1 Abj jura nyy guvf jnf svavfurq, nyy Vfenry gung jrer cerfrag jrag
bhg gb gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu, naq oenxr gur vzntrf va cvrprf, naq phg
qbja gur tebirf, naq guerj qbja gur uvtu cynprf naq gur nygnef bhg bs
nyy Whqnu naq Orawnzva, va Rcuenvz nyfb naq Znanffru, hagvy gurl unq
hggreyl qrfgeblrq gurz nyy. Gura nyy gur puvyqera bs Vfenry erghearq,
rirel zna gb uvf cbffrffvba, vagb gurve bja pvgvrf.

31:2 Naq Urmrxvnu nccbvagrq gur pbhefrf bs gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf
nsgre gurve pbhefrf, rirel zna nppbeqvat gb uvf freivpr, gur cevrfgf
naq Yrivgrf sbe oheag bssrevatf naq sbe crnpr bssrevatf, gb zvavfgre,
naq gb tvir gunaxf, naq gb cenvfr va gur tngrf bs gur gragf bs gur
YBEQ.

31:3 Ur nccbvagrq nyfb gur xvat'f cbegvba bs uvf fhofgnapr sbe gur
oheag bssrevatf, gb jvg, sbe gur zbeavat naq riravat oheag bssrevatf,
naq gur oheag bssrevatf sbe gur fnoonguf, naq sbe gur arj zbbaf, naq
sbe gur frg srnfgf, nf vg vf jevggra va gur ynj bs gur YBEQ.

31:4 Zberbire ur pbzznaqrq gur crbcyr gung qjryg va Wrehfnyrz gb tvir
gur cbegvba bs gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf, gung gurl zvtug or
rapbhentrq va gur ynj bs gur YBEQ.

31:5 Naq nf fbba nf gur pbzznaqzrag pnzr noebnq, gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry oebhtug va nohaqnapr gur svefgsehvgf bs pbea, jvar, naq bvy,
naq ubarl, naq bs nyy gur vapernfr bs gur svryq; naq gur gvgur bs nyy
guvatf oebhtug gurl va nohaqnagyl.

31:6 Naq pbapreavat gur puvyqera bs Vfenry naq Whqnu, gung qjryg va
gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu, gurl nyfb oebhtug va gur gvgur bs bkra naq furrc,
naq gur gvgur bs ubyl guvatf juvpu jrer pbafrpengrq hagb gur YBEQ
gurve Tbq, naq ynvq gurz ol urncf.

31:7 Va gur guveq zbagu gurl ortna gb ynl gur sbhaqngvba bs gur urncf,
naq svavfurq gurz va gur friragu zbagu.

31:8 Naq jura Urmrxvnu naq gur cevaprf pnzr naq fnj gur urncf, gurl
oyrffrq gur YBEQ, naq uvf crbcyr Vfenry.

31:9 Gura Urmrxvnu dhrfgvbarq jvgu gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf
pbapreavat gur urncf.

31:10 Naq Nmnevnu gur puvrs cevrfg bs gur ubhfr bs Mnqbx nafjrerq uvz,
naq fnvq, Fvapr gur crbcyr ortna gb oevat gur bssrevatf vagb gur ubhfr
bs gur YBEQ, jr unir unq rabhtu gb rng, naq unir yrsg cyragl: sbe gur
YBEQ ungu oyrffrq uvf crbcyr; naq gung juvpu vf yrsg vf guvf terng
fgber.

31:11 Gura Urmrxvnu pbzznaqrq gb cercner punzoref va gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ; naq gurl cercnerq gurz, 31:12 Naq oebhtug va gur bssrevatf naq
gur gvgurf naq gur qrqvpngrq guvatf snvgushyyl: bire juvpu Pbabavnu
gur Yrivgr jnf ehyre, naq Fuvzrv uvf oebgure jnf gur arkg.

31:13 Naq Wruvry, naq Nmnmvnu, naq Anungu, naq Nfnury, naq Wrevzbgu,
naq Wbmnonq, naq Ryvry, naq Vfznpuvnu, naq Znungu, naq Oranvnu, jrer
birefrref haqre gur unaq bs Pbabavnu naq Fuvzrv uvf oebgure, ng gur
pbzznaqzrag bs Urmrxvnu gur xvat, naq Nmnevnu gur ehyre bs gur ubhfr
bs Tbq.

31:14 Naq Xber gur fba bs Vzanu gur Yrivgr, gur cbegre gbjneq gur
rnfg, jnf bire gur serrjvyy bssrevatf bs Tbq, gb qvfgevohgr gur
boyngvbaf bs gur YBEQ, naq gur zbfg ubyl guvatf.

31:15 Naq arkg uvz jrer Rqra, naq Zvavnzva, naq Wrfuhn, naq Furznvnu,
Nznevnu, naq Furpnavnu, va gur pvgvrf bs gur cevrfgf, va gurve frg
bssvpr, gb tvir gb gurve oerguera ol pbhefrf, nf jryy gb gur terng nf
gb gur fznyy: 31:16 Orfvqr gurve trarnybtl bs znyrf, sebz guerr lrnef
byq naq hcjneq, rira hagb rirel bar gung ragrergu vagb gur ubhfr bs
gur YBEQ, uvf qnvyl cbegvba sbe gurve freivpr va gurve punetrf
nppbeqvat gb gurve pbhefrf; 31:17 Obgu gb gur trarnybtl bs gur cevrfgf
ol gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref, naq gur Yrivgrf sebz gjragl lrnef byq
naq hcjneq, va gurve punetrf ol gurve pbhefrf; 31:18 Naq gb gur
trarnybtl bs nyy gurve yvggyr barf, gurve jvirf, naq gurve fbaf, naq
gurve qnhtugref, guebhtu nyy gur pbatertngvba: sbe va gurve frg bssvpr
gurl fnapgvsvrq gurzfryirf va ubyvarff: 31:19 Nyfb bs gur fbaf bs
Nneba gur cevrfgf, juvpu jrer va gur svryqf bs gur fhoheof bs gurve
pvgvrf, va rirel frireny pvgl, gur zra gung jrer rkcerffrq ol anzr, gb
tvir cbegvbaf gb nyy gur znyrf nzbat gur cevrfgf, naq gb nyy gung jrer
erpxbarq ol trarnybtvrf nzbat gur Yrivgrf.

31:20 Naq guhf qvq Urmrxvnu guebhtubhg nyy Whqnu, naq jebhtug gung
juvpu jnf tbbq naq evtug naq gehgu orsber gur YBEQ uvf Tbq.

31:21 Naq va rirel jbex gung ur ortna va gur freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs
Tbq, naq va gur ynj, naq va gur pbzznaqzragf, gb frrx uvf Tbq, ur qvq
vg jvgu nyy uvf urneg, naq cebfcrerq.

32:1 Nsgre gurfr guvatf, naq gur rfgnoyvfuzrag gurerbs, Fraanpurevo
xvat bs Nfflevn pnzr, naq ragrerq vagb Whqnu, naq rapnzcrq ntnvafg gur
sraprq pvgvrf, naq gubhtug gb jva gurz sbe uvzfrys.

32:2 Naq jura Urmrxvnu fnj gung Fraanpurevo jnf pbzr, naq gung ur jnf
checbfrq gb svtug ntnvafg Wrehfnyrz, 32:3 Ur gbbx pbhafry jvgu uvf
cevaprf naq uvf zvtugl zra gb fgbc gur jngref bs gur sbhagnvaf juvpu
jrer jvgubhg gur pvgl: naq gurl qvq uryc uvz.

32:4 Fb gurer jnf tngurerq zhpu crbcyr gbtrgure, jub fgbccrq nyy gur
sbhagnvaf, naq gur oebbx gung ena guebhtu gur zvqfg bs gur ynaq,
fnlvat, Jul fubhyq gur xvatf bs Nfflevn pbzr, naq svaq zhpu jngre?
32:5 Nyfb ur fgeratgurarq uvzfrys, naq ohvyg hc nyy gur jnyy gung jnf
oebxra, naq envfrq vg hc gb gur gbjref, naq nabgure jnyy jvgubhg, naq
ercnverq Zvyyb va gur pvgl bs Qnivq, naq znqr qnegf naq fuvryqf va
nohaqnapr.

32:6 Naq ur frg pncgnvaf bs jne bire gur crbcyr, naq tngurerq gurz
gbtrgure gb uvz va gur fgerrg bs gur tngr bs gur pvgl, naq fcnxr
pbzsbegnoyl gb gurz, fnlvat, 32:7 Or fgebat naq pbhentrbhf, or abg
nsenvq abe qvfznlrq sbe gur xvat bs Nfflevn, abe sbe nyy gur zhygvghqr
gung vf jvgu uvz: sbe gurer or zber jvgu hf guna jvgu uvz: 32:8 Jvgu
uvz vf na nez bs syrfu; ohg jvgu hf vf gur YBEQ bhe Tbq gb uryc hf,
naq gb svtug bhe onggyrf. Naq gur crbcyr erfgrq gurzfryirf hcba gur
jbeqf bs Urmrxvnu xvat bs Whqnu.

32:9 Nsgre guvf qvq Fraanpurevo xvat bs Nfflevn fraq uvf freinagf gb
Wrehfnyrz, (ohg ur uvzfrys ynvq fvrtr ntnvafg Ynpuvfu, naq nyy uvf
cbjre jvgu uvz,) hagb Urmrxvnu xvat bs Whqnu, naq hagb nyy Whqnu gung
jrer ng Wrehfnyrz, fnlvat, 32:10 Guhf fnvgu Fraanpurevo xvat bs
Nfflevn, Jurerba qb lr gehfg, gung lr novqr va gur fvrtr va Wrehfnyrz?
32:11 Qbgu abg Urmrxvnu crefhnqr lbh gb tvir bire lbhefryirf gb qvr ol
snzvar naq ol guvefg, fnlvat, Gur YBEQ bhe Tbq funyy qryvire hf bhg bs
gur unaq bs gur xvat bs Nfflevn?  32:12 Ungu abg gur fnzr Urmrxvnu
gnxra njnl uvf uvtu cynprf naq uvf nygnef, naq pbzznaqrq Whqnu naq
Wrehfnyrz, fnlvat, Lr funyy jbefuvc orsber bar nygne, naq ohea vaprafr
hcba vg?  32:13 Xabj lr abg jung V naq zl snguref unir qbar hagb nyy
gur crbcyr bs bgure ynaqf? jrer gur tbqf bs gur angvbaf bs gubfr ynaqf
nal jnlf noyr gb qryvire gurve ynaqf bhg bs zvar unaq?  32:14 Jub jnf
gurer nzbat nyy gur tbqf bs gubfr angvbaf gung zl snguref hggreyl
qrfgeblrq, gung pbhyq qryvire uvf crbcyr bhg bs zvar unaq, gung lbhe
Tbq fubhyq or noyr gb qryvire lbh bhg bs zvar unaq?  32:15 Abj
gurersber yrg abg Urmrxvnu qrprvir lbh, abe crefhnqr lbh ba guvf
znaare, arvgure lrg oryvrir uvz: sbe ab tbq bs nal angvba be xvatqbz
jnf noyr gb qryvire uvf crbcyr bhg bs zvar unaq, naq bhg bs gur unaq
bs zl snguref: ubj zhpu yrff funyy lbhe Tbq qryvire lbh bhg bs zvar
unaq?  32:16 Naq uvf freinagf fcnxr lrg zber ntnvafg gur YBEQ Tbq, naq
ntnvafg uvf freinag Urmrxvnu.

32:17 Ur jebgr nyfb yrggref gb envy ba gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, naq gb
fcrnx ntnvafg uvz, fnlvat, Nf gur tbqf bs gur angvbaf bs bgure ynaqf
unir abg qryvirerq gurve crbcyr bhg bs zvar unaq, fb funyy abg gur Tbq
bs Urmrxvnu qryvire uvf crbcyr bhg bs zvar unaq.

32:18 Gura gurl pevrq jvgu n ybhq ibvpr va gur Wrjf' fcrrpu hagb gur
crbcyr bs Wrehfnyrz gung jrer ba gur jnyy, gb nssevtug gurz, naq gb
gebhoyr gurz; gung gurl zvtug gnxr gur pvgl.

32:19 Naq gurl fcnxr ntnvafg gur Tbq bs Wrehfnyrz, nf ntnvafg gur tbqf
bs gur crbcyr bs gur rnegu, juvpu jrer gur jbex bs gur unaqf bs zna.

32:20 Naq sbe guvf pnhfr Urmrxvnu gur xvat, naq gur cebcurg Vfnvnu gur
fba bs Nzbm, cenlrq naq pevrq gb urnira.

32:21 Naq gur YBEQ frag na natry, juvpu phg bss nyy gur zvtugl zra bs
inybhe, naq gur yrnqref naq pncgnvaf va gur pnzc bs gur xvat bs
Nfflevn. Fb ur erghearq jvgu funzr bs snpr gb uvf bja ynaq. Naq jura
ur jnf pbzr vagb gur ubhfr bs uvf tbq, gurl gung pnzr sbegu bs uvf bja
objryf fyrj uvz gurer jvgu gur fjbeq.

32:22 Guhf gur YBEQ fnirq Urmrxvnu naq gur vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz
sebz gur unaq bs Fraanpurevo gur xvat bs Nfflevn, naq sebz gur unaq bs
nyy bgure, naq thvqrq gurz ba rirel fvqr.

32:23 Naq znal oebhtug tvsgf hagb gur YBEQ gb Wrehfnyrz, naq cerfragf
gb Urmrxvnu xvat bs Whqnu: fb gung ur jnf zntavsvrq va gur fvtug bs
nyy angvbaf sebz guraprsbegu.

32:24 Va gubfr qnlf Urmrxvnu jnf fvpx gb gur qrngu, naq cenlrq hagb
gur YBEQ: naq ur fcnxr hagb uvz, naq ur tnir uvz n fvta.

32:25 Ohg Urmrxvnu eraqrerq abg ntnva nppbeqvat gb gur orarsvg qbar
hagb uvz; sbe uvf urneg jnf yvsgrq hc: gurersber gurer jnf jengu hcba
uvz, naq hcba Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz.

32:26 Abgjvgufgnaqvat Urmrxvnu uhzoyrq uvzfrys sbe gur cevqr bs uvf
urneg, obgu ur naq gur vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz, fb gung gur jengu bs
gur YBEQ pnzr abg hcba gurz va gur qnlf bs Urmrxvnu.

32:27 Naq Urmrxvnu unq rkprrqvat zhpu evpurf naq ubabhe: naq ur znqr
uvzfrys gernfhevrf sbe fvyire, naq sbe tbyq, naq sbe cerpvbhf fgbarf,
naq sbe fcvprf, naq sbe fuvryqf, naq sbe nyy znaare bs cyrnfnag
wrjryf; 32:28 Fgberubhfrf nyfb sbe gur vapernfr bs pbea, naq jvar, naq
bvy; naq fgnyyf sbe nyy znaare bs ornfgf, naq pbgrf sbe sybpxf.

32:29 Zberbire ur cebivqrq uvz pvgvrf, naq cbffrffvbaf bs sybpxf naq
ureqf va nohaqnapr: sbe Tbq unq tvira uvz fhofgnapr irel zhpu.

32:30 Guvf fnzr Urmrxvnu nyfb fgbccrq gur hccre jngrepbhefr bs Tvuba,
naq oebhtug vg fgenvtug qbja gb gur jrfg fvqr bs gur pvgl bs Qnivq.
Naq Urmrxvnu cebfcrerq va nyy uvf jbexf.

32:31 Ubjorvg va gur ohfvarff bs gur nzonffnqbef bs gur cevaprf bs
Onolyba, jub frag hagb uvz gb radhver bs gur jbaqre gung jnf qbar va
gur ynaq, Tbq yrsg uvz, gb gel uvz, gung ur zvtug xabj nyy gung jnf va
uvf urneg.

32:32 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Urmrxvnu, naq uvf tbbqarff, orubyq,
gurl ner jevggra va gur ivfvba bs Vfnvnu gur cebcurg, gur fba bs Nzbm,
naq va gur obbx bs gur xvatf bs Whqnu naq Vfenry.

32:33 Naq Urmrxvnu fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq gurl ohevrq uvz va gur
puvrsrfg bs gur frchypuerf bs gur fbaf bs Qnivq: naq nyy Whqnu naq gur
vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz qvq uvz ubabhe ng uvf qrngu. Naq Znanffru uvf
fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

33:1 Znanffru jnf gjryir lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur
ervtarq svsgl naq svir lrnef va Wrehfnyrz: 33:2 Ohg qvq gung juvpu jnf
rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, yvxr hagb gur nobzvangvbaf bs gur
urngura, jubz gur YBEQ unq pnfg bhg orsber gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

33:3 Sbe ur ohvyg ntnva gur uvtu cynprf juvpu Urmrxvnu uvf sngure unq
oebxra qbja, naq ur ernerq hc nygnef sbe Onnyvz, naq znqr tebirf, naq
jbefuvccrq nyy gur ubfg bs urnira, naq freirq gurz.

33:4 Nyfb ur ohvyg nygnef va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, jurerbs gur YBEQ
unq fnvq, Va Wrehfnyrz funyy zl anzr or sbe rire.

33:5 Naq ur ohvyg nygnef sbe nyy gur ubfg bs urnira va gur gjb pbhegf
bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

33:6 Naq ur pnhfrq uvf puvyqera gb cnff guebhtu gur sver va gur inyyrl
bs gur fba bs Uvaabz: nyfb ur bofreirq gvzrf, naq hfrq rapunagzragf,
naq hfrq jvgpupensg, naq qrnyg jvgu n snzvyvne fcvevg, naq jvgu
jvmneqf: ur jebhtug zhpu rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, gb cebibxr uvz
gb natre.

33:7 Naq ur frg n pneirq vzntr, gur vqby juvpu ur unq znqr, va gur
ubhfr bs Tbq, bs juvpu Tbq unq fnvq gb Qnivq naq gb Fbybzba uvf fba,
Va guvf ubhfr, naq va Wrehfnyrz, juvpu V unir pubfra orsber nyy gur
gevorf bs Vfenry, jvyy V chg zl anzr sbe rire: 33:8 Arvgure jvyy V nal
zber erzbir gur sbbg bs Vfenry sebz bhg bs gur ynaq juvpu V unir
nccbvagrq sbe lbhe snguref; fb gung gurl jvyy gnxr urrq gb qb nyy gung
V unir pbzznaqrq gurz, nppbeqvat gb gur jubyr ynj naq gur fgnghgrf naq
gur beqvanaprf ol gur unaq bs Zbfrf.

33:9 Fb Znanffru znqr Whqnu naq gur vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz gb ree,
naq gb qb jbefr guna gur urngura, jubz gur YBEQ unq qrfgeblrq orsber
gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

33:10 Naq gur YBEQ fcnxr gb Znanffru, naq gb uvf crbcyr: ohg gurl
jbhyq abg urnexra.

33:11 Jurersber gur YBEQ oebhtug hcba gurz gur pncgnvaf bs gur ubfg bs
gur xvat bs Nfflevn, juvpu gbbx Znanffru nzbat gur gubeaf, naq obhaq
uvz jvgu srggref, naq pneevrq uvz gb Onolyba.

33:12 Naq jura ur jnf va nssyvpgvba, ur orfbhtug gur YBEQ uvf Tbq, naq
uhzoyrq uvzfrys terngyl orsber gur Tbq bs uvf snguref, 33:13 Naq
cenlrq hagb uvz: naq ur jnf vagerngrq bs uvz, naq urneq uvf
fhccyvpngvba, naq oebhtug uvz ntnva gb Wrehfnyrz vagb uvf xvatqbz.
Gura Znanffru xarj gung gur YBEQ ur jnf Tbq.

33:14 Abj nsgre guvf ur ohvyg n jnyy jvgubhg gur pvgl bs Qnivq, ba gur
jrfg fvqr bs Tvuba, va gur inyyrl, rira gb gur ragrevat va ng gur svfu
tngr, naq pbzcnffrq nobhg Bcury, naq envfrq vg hc n irel terng urvtug,
naq chg pncgnvaf bs jne va nyy gur sraprq pvgvrf bs Whqnu.

33:15 Naq ur gbbx njnl gur fgenatr tbqf, naq gur vqby bhg bs gur ubhfr
bs gur YBEQ, naq nyy gur nygnef gung ur unq ohvyg va gur zbhag bs gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq va Wrehfnyrz, naq pnfg gurz bhg bs gur pvgl.

33:16 Naq ur ercnverq gur nygne bs gur YBEQ, naq fnpevsvprq gurerba
crnpr bssrevatf naq gunax bssrevatf, naq pbzznaqrq Whqnu gb freir gur
YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry.

33:17 Arireguryrff gur crbcyr qvq fnpevsvpr fgvyy va gur uvtu cynprf,
lrg hagb gur YBEQ gurve Tbq bayl.

33:18 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Znanffru, naq uvf cenlre hagb uvf
Tbq, naq gur jbeqf bs gur frref gung fcnxr gb uvz va gur anzr bs gur
YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, orubyq, gurl ner jevggra va gur obbx bs gur xvatf
bs Vfenry.

33:19 Uvf cenlre nyfb, naq ubj Tbq jnf vagerngrq bs uvz, naq nyy uvf
fvaf, naq uvf gerfcnff, naq gur cynprf jurerva ur ohvyg uvtu cynprf,
naq frg hc tebirf naq tenira vzntrf, orsber ur jnf uhzoyrq: orubyq,
gurl ner jevggra nzbat gur fnlvatf bs gur frref.

33:20 Fb Znanffru fyrcg jvgu uvf snguref, naq gurl ohevrq uvz va uvf
bja ubhfr: naq Nzba uvf fba ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

33:21 Nzba jnf gjb naq gjragl lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq
ervtarq gjb lrnef va Wrehfnyrz.

33:22 Ohg ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, nf qvq
Znanffru uvf sngure: sbe Nzba fnpevsvprq hagb nyy gur pneirq vzntrf
juvpu Znanffru uvf sngure unq znqr, naq freirq gurz; 33:23 Naq uhzoyrq
abg uvzfrys orsber gur YBEQ, nf Znanffru uvf sngure unq uhzoyrq
uvzfrys; ohg Nzba gerfcnffrq zber naq zber.

33:24 Naq uvf freinagf pbafcverq ntnvafg uvz, naq fyrj uvz va uvf bja
ubhfr.

33:25 Ohg gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq fyrj nyy gurz gung unq pbafcverq
ntnvafg xvat Nzba; naq gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq znqr Wbfvnu uvf fba xvat
va uvf fgrnq.

34:1 Wbfvnu jnf rvtug lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur ervtarq
va Wrehfnyrz bar naq guvegl lrnef.

34:2 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf evtug va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ, naq
jnyxrq va gur jnlf bs Qnivq uvf sngure, naq qrpyvarq arvgure gb gur
evtug unaq, abe gb gur yrsg.

34:3 Sbe va gur rvtugu lrne bs uvf ervta, juvyr ur jnf lrg lbhat, ur
ortna gb frrx nsgre gur Tbq bs Qnivq uvf sngure: naq va gur gjrysgu
lrne ur ortna gb chetr Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz sebz gur uvtu cynprf, naq
gur tebirf, naq gur pneirq vzntrf, naq gur zbygra vzntrf.

34:4 Naq gurl oenxr qbja gur nygnef bs Onnyvz va uvf cerfrapr; naq gur
vzntrf, gung jrer ba uvtu nobir gurz, ur phg qbja; naq gur tebirf, naq
gur pneirq vzntrf, naq gur zbygra vzntrf, ur oenxr va cvrprf, naq znqr
qhfg bs gurz, naq fgebjrq vg hcba gur tenirf bs gurz gung unq
fnpevsvprq hagb gurz.

34:5 Naq ur oheag gur obarf bs gur cevrfgf hcba gurve nygnef, naq
pyrnafrq Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz.

34:6 Naq fb qvq ur va gur pvgvrf bs Znanffru, naq Rcuenvz, naq Fvzrba,
rira hagb Ancugnyv, jvgu gurve znggbpxf ebhaq nobhg.

34:7 Naq jura ur unq oebxra qbja gur nygnef naq gur tebirf, naq unq
orngra gur tenira vzntrf vagb cbjqre, naq phg qbja nyy gur vqbyf
guebhtubhg nyy gur ynaq bs Vfenry, ur erghearq gb Wrehfnyrz.

34:8 Abj va gur rvtugrragu lrne bs uvf ervta, jura ur unq chetrq gur
ynaq, naq gur ubhfr, ur frag Funcuna gur fba bs Nmnyvnu, naq Znnfrvnu
gur tbireabe bs gur pvgl, naq Wbnu gur fba bs Wbnunm gur erpbeqre, gb
ercnve gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ uvf Tbq.

34:9 Naq jura gurl pnzr gb Uvyxvnu gur uvtu cevrfg, gurl qryvirerq gur
zbarl gung jnf oebhtug vagb gur ubhfr bs Tbq, juvpu gur Yrivgrf gung
xrcg gur qbbef unq tngurerq bs gur unaq bs Znanffru naq Rcuenvz, naq
bs nyy gur erzanag bs Vfenry, naq bs nyy Whqnu naq Orawnzva; naq gurl
erghearq gb Wrehfnyrz.

34:10 Naq gurl chg vg va gur unaq bs gur jbexzra gung unq gur
birefvtug bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq gurl tnir vg gb gur jbexzra
gung jebhtug va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, gb ercnve naq nzraq gur ubhfr:
34:11 Rira gb gur negvsvpref naq ohvyqref tnir gurl vg, gb ohl urja
fgbar, naq gvzore sbe pbhcyvatf, naq gb sybbe gur ubhfrf juvpu gur
xvatf bs Whqnu unq qrfgeblrq.

34:12 Naq gur zra qvq gur jbex snvgushyyl: naq gur birefrref bs gurz
jrer Wnungu naq Bonqvnu, gur Yrivgrf, bs gur fbaf bs Zrenev; naq
Mrpunevnu naq Zrfuhyynz, bs gur fbaf bs gur Xbunguvgrf, gb frg vg
sbejneq; naq bgure bs gur Yrivgrf, nyy gung pbhyq fxvyy bs vafgehzragf
bs zhfvpx.

34:13 Nyfb gurl jrer bire gur orneref bs oheqraf, naq jrer birefrref
bs nyy gung jebhtug gur jbex va nal znaare bs freivpr: naq bs gur
Yrivgrf gurer jrer fpevorf, naq bssvpref, naq cbegref.

34:14 Naq jura gurl oebhtug bhg gur zbarl gung jnf oebhtug vagb gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, Uvyxvnu gur cevrfg sbhaq n obbx bs gur ynj bs gur
YBEQ tvira ol Zbfrf.

34:15 Naq Uvyxvnu nafjrerq naq fnvq gb Funcuna gur fpevor, V unir
sbhaq gur obbx bs gur ynj va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ. Naq Uvyxvnu
qryvirerq gur obbx gb Funcuna.

34:16 Naq Funcuna pneevrq gur obbx gb gur xvat, naq oebhtug gur xvat
jbeq onpx ntnva, fnlvat, Nyy gung jnf pbzzvggrq gb gul freinagf, gurl
qb vg.

34:17 Naq gurl unir tngurerq gbtrgure gur zbarl gung jnf sbhaq va gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq unir qryvirerq vg vagb gur unaq bs gur
birefrref, naq gb gur unaq bs gur jbexzra.

34:18 Gura Funcuna gur fpevor gbyq gur xvat, fnlvat, Uvyxvnu gur
cevrfg ungu tvira zr n obbx. Naq Funcuna ernq vg orsber gur xvat.

34:19 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur xvat unq urneq gur jbeqf bs gur
ynj, gung ur erag uvf pybgurf.

34:20 Naq gur xvat pbzznaqrq Uvyxvnu, naq Nuvxnz gur fba bs Funcuna,
naq Noqba gur fba bs Zvpnu, naq Funcuna gur fpevor, naq Nfnvnu n
freinag bs gur xvat'f, fnlvat, 34:21 Tb, radhver bs gur YBEQ sbe zr,
naq sbe gurz gung ner yrsg va Vfenry naq va Whqnu, pbapreavat gur
jbeqf bs gur obbx gung vf sbhaq: sbe terng vf gur jengu bs gur YBEQ
gung vf cbherq bhg hcba hf, orpnhfr bhe snguref unir abg xrcg gur jbeq
bs gur YBEQ, gb qb nsgre nyy gung vf jevggra va guvf obbx.

34:22 Naq Uvyxvnu, naq gurl gung gur xvat unq nccbvagrq, jrag gb
Uhyqnu gur cebcurgrff, gur jvsr bs Funyyhz gur fba bs Gvxingu, gur fba
bs Unfenu, xrrcre bs gur jneqebor; (abj fur qjryg va Wrehfnyrz va gur
pbyyrtr:) naq gurl fcnxr gb ure gb gung rssrpg.

34:23 Naq fur nafjrerq gurz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, Gryy
lr gur zna gung frag lbh gb zr, 34:24 Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ, Orubyq, V
jvyy oevat rivy hcba guvf cynpr, naq hcba gur vaunovgnagf gurerbs,
rira nyy gur phefrf gung ner jevggra va gur obbx juvpu gurl unir ernq
orsber gur xvat bs Whqnu: 34:25 Orpnhfr gurl unir sbefnxra zr, naq
unir ohearq vaprafr hagb bgure tbqf, gung gurl zvtug cebibxr zr gb
natre jvgu nyy gur jbexf bs gurve unaqf; gurersber zl jengu funyy or
cbherq bhg hcba guvf cynpr, naq funyy abg or dhrapurq.

34:26 Naq nf sbe gur xvat bs Whqnu, jub frag lbh gb radhver bs gur
YBEQ, fb funyy lr fnl hagb uvz, Guhf fnvgu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry
pbapreavat gur jbeqf juvpu gubh unfg urneq; 34:27 Orpnhfr guvar urneg
jnf graqre, naq gubh qvqfg uhzoyr gulfrys orsber Tbq, jura gubh
urneqrfg uvf jbeqf ntnvafg guvf cynpr, naq ntnvafg gur vaunovgnagf
gurerbs, naq uhzoyrqfg gulfrys orsber zr, naq qvqfg eraq gul pybgurf,
naq jrrc orsber zr; V unir rira urneq gurr nyfb, fnvgu gur YBEQ.

34:28 Orubyq, V jvyy tngure gurr gb gul snguref, naq gubh funyg or
tngurerq gb gul tenir va crnpr, arvgure funyy guvar rlrf frr nyy gur
rivy gung V jvyy oevat hcba guvf cynpr, naq hcba gur vaunovgnagf bs
gur fnzr. Fb gurl oebhtug gur xvat jbeq ntnva.

34:29 Gura gur xvat frag naq tngurerq gbtrgure nyy gur ryqref bs Whqnu
naq Wrehfnyrz.

34:30 Naq gur xvat jrag hc vagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq nyy gur zra
bs Whqnu, naq gur vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz, naq gur cevrfgf, naq gur
Yrivgrf, naq nyy gur crbcyr, terng naq fznyy: naq ur ernq va gurve
rnef nyy gur jbeqf bs gur obbx bs gur pbiranag gung jnf sbhaq va gur
ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

34:31 Naq gur xvat fgbbq va uvf cynpr, naq znqr n pbiranag orsber gur
YBEQ, gb jnyx nsgre gur YBEQ, naq gb xrrc uvf pbzznaqzragf, naq uvf
grfgvzbavrf, naq uvf fgnghgrf, jvgu nyy uvf urneg, naq jvgu nyy uvf
fbhy, gb cresbez gur jbeqf bs gur pbiranag juvpu ner jevggra va guvf
obbx.

34:32 Naq ur pnhfrq nyy gung jrer cerfrag va Wrehfnyrz naq Orawnzva gb
fgnaq gb vg. Naq gur vaunovgnagf bs Wrehfnyrz qvq nppbeqvat gb gur
pbiranag bs Tbq, gur Tbq bs gurve snguref.

34:33 Naq Wbfvnu gbbx njnl nyy gur nobzvangvbaf bhg bs nyy gur
pbhagevrf gung cregnvarq gb gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq znqr nyy gung
jrer cerfrag va Vfenry gb freir, rira gb freir gur YBEQ gurve Tbq. Naq
nyy uvf qnlf gurl qrcnegrq abg sebz sbyybjvat gur YBEQ, gur Tbq bs
gurve snguref.

35:1 Zberbire Wbfvnu xrcg n cnffbire hagb gur YBEQ va Wrehfnyrz: naq
gurl xvyyrq gur cnffbire ba gur sbhegrragu qnl bs gur svefg zbagu.

35:2 Naq ur frg gur cevrfgf va gurve punetrf, naq rapbhentrq gurz gb
gur freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, 35:3 Naq fnvq hagb gur Yrivgrf
gung gnhtug nyy Vfenry, juvpu jrer ubyl hagb gur YBEQ, Chg gur ubyl
nex va gur ubhfr juvpu Fbybzba gur fba bs Qnivq xvat bs Vfenry qvq
ohvyq; vg funyy abg or n oheqra hcba lbhe fubhyqref: freir abj gur
YBEQ lbhe Tbq, naq uvf crbcyr Vfenry, 35:4 Naq cercner lbhefryirf ol
gur ubhfrf bs lbhe snguref, nsgre lbhe pbhefrf, nppbeqvat gb gur
jevgvat bs Qnivq xvat bs Vfenry, naq nppbeqvat gb gur jevgvat bs
Fbybzba uvf fba.

35:5 Naq fgnaq va gur ubyl cynpr nppbeqvat gb gur qvivfvbaf bs gur
snzvyvrf bs gur snguref bs lbhe oerguera gur crbcyr, naq nsgre gur
qvivfvba bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur Yrivgrf.

35:6 Fb xvyy gur cnffbire, naq fnapgvsl lbhefryirf, naq cercner lbhe
oerguera, gung gurl znl qb nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ ol gur
unaq bs Zbfrf.

35:7 Naq Wbfvnu tnir gb gur crbcyr, bs gur sybpx, ynzof naq xvqf, nyy
sbe gur cnffbire bssrevatf, sbe nyy gung jrer cerfrag, gb gur ahzore
bs guvegl gubhfnaq, naq guerr gubhfnaq ohyybpxf: gurfr jrer bs gur
xvat'f fhofgnapr.

35:8 Naq uvf cevaprf tnir jvyyvatyl hagb gur crbcyr, gb gur cevrfgf,
naq gb gur Yrivgrf: Uvyxvnu naq Mrpunevnu naq Wruvry, ehyref bs gur
ubhfr bs Tbq, tnir hagb gur cevrfgf sbe gur cnffbire bssrevatf gjb
gubhfnaq naq fvk uhaqerq fznyy pnggyr naq guerr uhaqerq bkra.

35:9 Pbanavnu nyfb, naq Furznvnu naq Argunarry, uvf oerguera, naq
Unfunovnu naq Wrvry naq Wbmnonq, puvrs bs gur Yrivgrf, tnir hagb gur
Yrivgrf sbe cnffbire bssrevatf svir gubhfnaq fznyy pnggyr, naq svir
uhaqerq bkra.

35:10 Fb gur freivpr jnf cercnerq, naq gur cevrfgf fgbbq va gurve
cynpr, naq gur Yrivgrf va gurve pbhefrf, nppbeqvat gb gur xvat'f
pbzznaqzrag.

35:11 Naq gurl xvyyrq gur cnffbire, naq gur cevrfgf fcevaxyrq gur
oybbq sebz gurve unaqf, naq gur Yrivgrf synlrq gurz.

35:12 Naq gurl erzbirq gur oheag bssrevatf, gung gurl zvtug tvir
nppbeqvat gb gur qvivfvbaf bs gur snzvyvrf bs gur crbcyr, gb bssre
hagb gur YBEQ, nf vg vf jevggra va gur obbx bs Zbfrf. Naq fb qvq gurl
jvgu gur bkra.

35:13 Naq gurl ebnfgrq gur cnffbire jvgu sver nppbeqvat gb gur
beqvanapr: ohg gur bgure ubyl bssrevatf fbq gurl va cbgf, naq va
pnyqebaf, naq va cnaf, naq qvivqrq gurz fcrrqvyl nzbat nyy gur crbcyr.

35:14 Naq nsgrejneq gurl znqr ernql sbe gurzfryirf, naq sbe gur
cevrfgf: orpnhfr gur cevrfgf gur fbaf bs Nneba jrer ohfvrq va bssrevat
bs oheag bssrevatf naq gur sng hagvy avtug; gurersber gur Yrivgrf
cercnerq sbe gurzfryirf, naq sbe gur cevrfgf gur fbaf bs Nneba.

35:15 Naq gur fvatref gur fbaf bs Nfncu jrer va gurve cynpr, nppbeqvat
gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs Qnivq, naq Nfncu, naq Urzna, naq Wrqhguha gur
xvat'f frre; naq gur cbegref jnvgrq ng rirel tngr; gurl zvtug abg
qrcneg sebz gurve freivpr; sbe gurve oerguera gur Yrivgrf cercnerq sbe
gurz.

35:16 Fb nyy gur freivpr bs gur YBEQ jnf cercnerq gur fnzr qnl, gb
xrrc gur cnffbire, naq gb bssre oheag bssrevatf hcba gur nygne bs gur
YBEQ, nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs xvat Wbfvnu.

35:17 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry gung jrer cerfrag xrcg gur cnffbire
ng gung gvzr, naq gur srnfg bs hayrnirarq oernq frira qnlf.

35:18 Naq gurer jnf ab cnffbire yvxr gb gung xrcg va Vfenry sebz gur
qnlf bs Fnzhry gur cebcurg; arvgure qvq nyy gur xvatf bs Vfenry xrrc
fhpu n cnffbire nf Wbfvnu xrcg, naq gur cevrfgf, naq gur Yrivgrf, naq
nyy Whqnu naq Vfenry gung jrer cerfrag, naq gur vaunovgnagf bs
Wrehfnyrz.

35:19 Va gur rvtugrragu lrne bs gur ervta bs Wbfvnu jnf guvf cnffbire
xrcg.

35:20 Nsgre nyy guvf, jura Wbfvnu unq cercnerq gur grzcyr, Arpub xvat
bs Rtlcg pnzr hc gb svtug ntnvafg Punepurzvfu ol Rhcuengrf: naq Wbfvnu
jrag bhg ntnvafg uvz.

35:21 Ohg ur frag nzonffnqbef gb uvz, fnlvat, Jung unir V gb qb jvgu
gurr, gubh xvat bs Whqnu? V pbzr abg ntnvafg gurr guvf qnl, ohg
ntnvafg gur ubhfr jurerjvgu V unir jne: sbe Tbq pbzznaqrq zr gb znxr
unfgr: sbeorne gurr sebz zrqqyvat jvgu Tbq, jub vf jvgu zr, gung ur
qrfgebl gurr abg.

35:22 Arireguryrff Wbfvnu jbhyq abg ghea uvf snpr sebz uvz, ohg
qvfthvfrq uvzfrys, gung ur zvtug svtug jvgu uvz, naq urnexrarq abg
hagb gur jbeqf bs Arpub sebz gur zbhgu bs Tbq, naq pnzr gb svtug va
gur inyyrl bs Zrtvqqb.

35:23 Naq gur nepuref fubg ng xvat Wbfvnu; naq gur xvat fnvq gb uvf
freinagf, Unir zr njnl; sbe V nz fber jbhaqrq.

35:24 Uvf freinagf gurersber gbbx uvz bhg bs gung punevbg, naq chg uvz
va gur frpbaq punevbg gung ur unq; naq gurl oebhtug uvz gb Wrehfnyrz,
naq ur qvrq, naq jnf ohevrq va bar bs gur frchypuerf bs uvf snguref.
Naq nyy Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz zbhearq sbe Wbfvnu.

35:25 Naq Wrerzvnu ynzragrq sbe Wbfvnu: naq nyy gur fvatvat zra naq
gur fvatvat jbzra fcnxr bs Wbfvnu va gurve ynzragngvbaf gb guvf qnl,
naq znqr gurz na beqvanapr va Vfenry: naq, orubyq, gurl ner jevggra va
gur ynzragngvbaf.

35:26 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wbfvnu, naq uvf tbbqarff, nppbeqvat
gb gung juvpu jnf jevggra va gur ynj bs gur YBEQ, 35:27 Naq uvf qrrqf,
svefg naq ynfg, orubyq, gurl ner jevggra va gur obbx bs gur xvatf bs
Vfenry naq Whqnu.

36:1 Gura gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq gbbx Wrubnunm gur fba bs Wbfvnu, naq
znqr uvz xvat va uvf sngure'f fgrnq va Wrehfnyrz.

36:2 Wrubnunm jnf gjragl naq guerr lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta,
naq ur ervtarq guerr zbaguf va Wrehfnyrz.

36:3 Naq gur xvat bs Rtlcg chg uvz qbja ng Wrehfnyrz, naq pbaqrzarq
gur ynaq va na uhaqerq gnyragf bs fvyire naq n gnyrag bs tbyq.

36:4 Naq gur xvat bs Rtlcg znqr Ryvnxvz uvf oebgure xvat bire Whqnu
naq Wrehfnyrz, naq ghearq uvf anzr gb Wrubvnxvz. Naq Arpub gbbx
Wrubnunm uvf oebgure, naq pneevrq uvz gb Rtlcg.

36:5 Wrubvnxvz jnf gjragl naq svir lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta,
naq ur ervtarq ryrira lrnef va Wrehfnyrz: naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf
rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ uvf Tbq.

36:6 Ntnvafg uvz pnzr hc Arohpunqarmmne xvat bs Onolyba, naq obhaq uvz
va srggref, gb pneel uvz gb Onolyba.

36:7 Arohpunqarmmne nyfb pneevrq bs gur irffryf bs gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ gb Onolyba, naq chg gurz va uvf grzcyr ng Onolyba.

36:8 Abj gur erfg bs gur npgf bs Wrubvnxvz, naq uvf nobzvangvbaf juvpu
ur qvq, naq gung juvpu jnf sbhaq va uvz, orubyq, gurl ner jevggra va
gur obbx bs gur xvatf bs Vfenry naq Whqnu: naq Wrubvnpuva uvf fba
ervtarq va uvf fgrnq.

36:9 Wrubvnpuva jnf rvtug lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta, naq ur
ervtarq guerr zbaguf naq gra qnlf va Wrehfnyrz: naq ur qvq gung juvpu
jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ.

36:10 Naq jura gur lrne jnf rkcverq, xvat Arohpunqarmmne frag, naq
oebhtug uvz gb Onolyba, jvgu gur tbbqyl irffryf bs gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ, naq znqr Mrqrxvnu uvf oebgure xvat bire Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz.

36:11 Mrqrxvnu jnf bar naq gjragl lrnef byq jura ur ortna gb ervta,
naq ervtarq ryrira lrnef va Wrehfnyrz.

36:12 Naq ur qvq gung juvpu jnf rivy va gur fvtug bs gur YBEQ uvf Tbq,
naq uhzoyrq abg uvzfrys orsber Wrerzvnu gur cebcurg fcrnxvat sebz gur
zbhgu bs gur YBEQ.

36:13 Naq ur nyfb eroryyrq ntnvafg xvat Arohpunqarmmne, jub unq znqr
uvz fjrne ol Tbq: ohg ur fgvssrarq uvf arpx, naq uneqrarq uvf urneg
sebz gheavat hagb gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry.

36:14 Zberbire nyy gur puvrs bs gur cevrfgf, naq gur crbcyr,
genafterffrq irel zhpu nsgre nyy gur nobzvangvbaf bs gur urngura; naq
cbyyhgrq gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ juvpu ur unq unyybjrq va Wrehfnyrz.

36:15 Naq gur YBEQ Tbq bs gurve snguref frag gb gurz ol uvf
zrffratref, evfvat hc orgvzrf, naq fraqvat; orpnhfr ur unq pbzcnffvba
ba uvf crbcyr, naq ba uvf qjryyvat cynpr: 36:16 Ohg gurl zbpxrq gur
zrffratref bs Tbq, naq qrfcvfrq uvf jbeqf, naq zvfhfrq uvf cebcurgf,
hagvy gur jengu bs gur YBEQ nebfr ntnvafg uvf crbcyr, gvyy gurer jnf
ab erzrql.

36:17 Gurersber ur oebhtug hcba gurz gur xvat bs gur Punyqrrf, jub
fyrj gurve lbhat zra jvgu gur fjbeq va gur ubhfr bs gurve fnapghnel,
naq unq ab pbzcnffvba hcba lbhat zna be znvqra, byq zna, be uvz gung
fgbbcrq sbe ntr: ur tnir gurz nyy vagb uvf unaq.

36:18 Naq nyy gur irffryf bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq, terng naq fznyy, naq
gur gernfherf bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ, naq gur gernfherf bs gur xvat,
naq bs uvf cevaprf; nyy gurfr ur oebhtug gb Onolyba.

36:19 Naq gurl oheag gur ubhfr bs Tbq, naq oenxr qbja gur jnyy bs
Wrehfnyrz, naq oheag nyy gur cnynprf gurerbs jvgu sver, naq qrfgeblrq
nyy gur tbbqyl irffryf gurerbs.

36:20 Naq gurz gung unq rfpncrq sebz gur fjbeq pneevrq ur njnl gb
Onolyba; jurer gurl jrer freinagf gb uvz naq uvf fbaf hagvy gur ervta
bs gur xvatqbz bs Crefvn: 36:21 Gb shysvy gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ ol gur
zbhgu bs Wrerzvnu, hagvy gur ynaq unq rawblrq ure fnoonguf: sbe nf
ybat nf fur ynl qrfbyngr fur xrcg fnoongu, gb shysvy guerrfpber naq
gra lrnef.

36:22 Abj va gur svefg lrne bs Plehf xvat bs Crefvn, gung gur jbeq bs
gur YBEQ fcbxra ol gur zbhgu bs Wrerzvnu zvtug or nppbzcyvfurq, gur
YBEQ fgveerq hc gur fcvevg bs Plehf xvat bs Crefvn, gung ur znqr n
cebpynzngvba guebhtubhg nyy uvf xvatqbz, naq chg vg nyfb va jevgvat,
fnlvat, 36:23 Guhf fnvgu Plehf xvat bs Crefvn, Nyy gur xvatqbzf bs gur
rnegu ungu gur YBEQ Tbq bs urnira tvira zr; naq ur ungu punetrq zr gb
ohvyq uvz na ubhfr va Wrehfnyrz, juvpu vf va Whqnu. Jub vf gurer nzbat
lbh bs nyy uvf crbcyr?  Gur YBEQ uvf Tbq or jvgu uvz, naq yrg uvz tb hc.




Rmen


1:1 Abj va gur svefg lrne bs Plehf xvat bs Crefvn, gung gur jbeq bs
gur YBEQ ol gur zbhgu bs Wrerzvnu zvtug or shysvyyrq, gur YBEQ fgveerq
hc gur fcvevg bs Plehf xvat bs Crefvn, gung ur znqr n cebpynzngvba
guebhtubhg nyy uvf xvatqbz, naq chg vg nyfb va jevgvat, fnlvat, 1:2
Guhf fnvgu Plehf xvat bs Crefvn, Gur YBEQ Tbq bs urnira ungu tvira zr
nyy gur xvatqbzf bs gur rnegu; naq ur ungu punetrq zr gb ohvyq uvz na
ubhfr ng Wrehfnyrz, juvpu vf va Whqnu.

1:3 Jub vf gurer nzbat lbh bs nyy uvf crbcyr? uvf Tbq or jvgu uvz, naq
yrg uvz tb hc gb Wrehfnyrz, juvpu vf va Whqnu, naq ohvyq gur ubhfr bs
gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, (ur vf gur Tbq,) juvpu vf va Wrehfnyrz.

1:4 Naq jubfbrire erznvargu va nal cynpr jurer ur fbwbheargu, yrg gur
zra bs uvf cynpr uryc uvz jvgu fvyire, naq jvgu tbyq, naq jvgu tbbqf,
naq jvgu ornfgf, orfvqr gur serrjvyy bssrevat sbe gur ubhfr bs Tbq
gung vf va Wrehfnyrz.

1:5 Gura ebfr hc gur puvrs bs gur snguref bs Whqnu naq Orawnzva, naq
gur cevrfgf, naq gur Yrivgrf, jvgu nyy gurz jubfr fcvevg Tbq unq
envfrq, gb tb hc gb ohvyq gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ juvpu vf va Wrehfnyrz.

1:6 Naq nyy gurl gung jrer nobhg gurz fgeratgurarq gurve unaqf jvgu
irffryf bs fvyire, jvgu tbyq, jvgu tbbqf, naq jvgu ornfgf, naq jvgu
cerpvbhf guvatf, orfvqr nyy gung jnf jvyyvatyl bssrerq.

1:7 Nyfb Plehf gur xvat oebhtug sbegu gur irffryf bs gur ubhfr bs gur
YBEQ, juvpu Arohpunqarmmne unq oebhtug sbegu bhg bs Wrehfnyrz, naq unq
chg gurz va gur ubhfr bs uvf tbqf; 1:8 Rira gubfr qvq Plehf xvat bs
Crefvn oevat sbegu ol gur unaq bs Zvguerqngu gur gernfhere, naq
ahzorerq gurz hagb Furfuonmmne, gur cevapr bs Whqnu.

1:9 Naq guvf vf gur ahzore bs gurz: guvegl punetref bs tbyq, n
gubhfnaq punetref bs fvyire, avar naq gjragl xavirf, 1:10 Guvegl
onfbaf bs tbyq, fvyire onfbaf bs n frpbaq fbeg sbhe uhaqerq naq gra,
naq bgure irffryf n gubhfnaq.

1:11 Nyy gur irffryf bs tbyq naq bs fvyire jrer svir gubhfnaq naq sbhe
uhaqerq. Nyy gurfr qvq Furfuonmmne oevat hc jvgu gurz bs gur pncgvivgl
gung jrer oebhtug hc sebz Onolyba hagb Wrehfnyrz.

2:1 Abj gurfr ner gur puvyqera bs gur cebivapr gung jrag hc bhg bs gur
pncgvivgl, bs gubfr juvpu unq orra pneevrq njnl, jubz Arohpunqarmmne
gur xvat bs Onolyba unq pneevrq njnl hagb Onolyba, naq pnzr ntnva hagb
Wrehfnyrz naq Whqnu, rirel bar hagb uvf pvgl; 2:2 Juvpu pnzr jvgu
Mrehoonory: Wrfuhn, Arurzvnu, Frenvnu, Errynvnu, Zbeqrpnv, Ovyfuna,
Zvmcne, Ovtinv, Eruhz, Onnanu. Gur ahzore bs gur zra bs gur crbcyr bs
Vfenry: 2:3 Gur puvyqera bs Cnebfu, gjb gubhfnaq na uhaqerq friragl
naq gjb.

2:4 Gur puvyqera bs Furcungvnu, guerr uhaqerq friragl naq gjb.

2:5 Gur puvyqera bs Nenu, frira uhaqerq friragl naq svir.

2:6 Gur puvyqera bs Cnunguzbno, bs gur puvyqera bs Wrfuhn naq Wbno,
gjb gubhfnaq rvtug uhaqerq naq gjryir.

2:7 Gur puvyqera bs Rynz, n gubhfnaq gjb uhaqerq svsgl naq sbhe.

2:8 Gur puvyqera bs Mnggh, avar uhaqerq sbegl naq svir.

2:9 Gur puvyqera bs Mnppnv, frira uhaqerq naq guerrfpber.

2:10 Gur puvyqera bs Onav, fvk uhaqerq sbegl naq gjb.

2:11 Gur puvyqera bs Oronv, fvk uhaqerq gjragl naq guerr.

2:12 Gur puvyqera bs Nmtnq, n gubhfnaq gjb uhaqerq gjragl naq gjb.

2:13 Gur puvyqera bs Nqbavxnz, fvk uhaqerq fvkgl naq fvk.

2:14 Gur puvyqera bs Ovtinv, gjb gubhfnaq svsgl naq fvk.

2:15 Gur puvyqera bs Nqva, sbhe uhaqerq svsgl naq sbhe.

2:16 Gur puvyqera bs Ngre bs Urmrxvnu, avargl naq rvtug.

2:17 Gur puvyqera bs Ormnv, guerr uhaqerq gjragl naq guerr.

2:18 Gur puvyqera bs Wbenu, na uhaqerq naq gjryir.

2:19 Gur puvyqera bs Unfuhz, gjb uhaqerq gjragl naq guerr.

2:20 Gur puvyqera bs Tvoone, avargl naq svir.

2:21 Gur puvyqera bs Orguyrurz, na uhaqerq gjragl naq guerr.

2:22 Gur zra bs Argbcunu, svsgl naq fvk.

2:23 Gur zra bs Nangubgu, na uhaqerq gjragl naq rvtug.

2:24 Gur puvyqera bs Nmznirgu, sbegl naq gjb.

2:25 Gur puvyqera bs Xvewngunevz, Purcuvenu, naq Orrebgu, frira
uhaqerq naq sbegl naq guerr.

2:26 Gur puvyqera bs Enznu naq Tnon, fvk uhaqerq gjragl naq bar.

2:27 Gur zra bs Zvpuznf, na uhaqerq gjragl naq gjb.

2:28 Gur zra bs Orgury naq Nv, gjb uhaqerq gjragl naq guerr.

2:29 Gur puvyqera bs Arob, svsgl naq gjb.

2:30 Gur puvyqera bs Zntovfu, na uhaqerq svsgl naq fvk.

2:31 Gur puvyqera bs gur bgure Rynz, n gubhfnaq gjb uhaqerq svsgl naq
sbhe.

2:32 Gur puvyqera bs Unevz, guerr uhaqerq naq gjragl.

2:33 Gur puvyqera bs Ybq, Unqvq, naq Bab, frira uhaqerq gjragl naq
svir.

2:34 Gur puvyqera bs Wrevpub, guerr uhaqerq sbegl naq svir.

2:35 Gur puvyqera bs Frannu, guerr gubhfnaq naq fvk uhaqerq naq
guvegl.

2:36 Gur cevrfgf: gur puvyqera bs Wrqnvnu, bs gur ubhfr bs Wrfuhn,
avar uhaqerq friragl naq guerr.

2:37 Gur puvyqera bs Vzzre, n gubhfnaq svsgl naq gjb.

2:38 Gur puvyqera bs Cnfuhe, n gubhfnaq gjb uhaqerq sbegl naq frira.

2:39 Gur puvyqera bs Unevz, n gubhfnaq naq friragrra.

2:40 Gur Yrivgrf: gur puvyqera bs Wrfuhn naq Xnqzvry, bs gur puvyqera
bs Ubqnivnu, friragl naq sbhe.

2:41 Gur fvatref: gur puvyqera bs Nfncu, na uhaqerq gjragl naq rvtug.

2:42 Gur puvyqera bs gur cbegref: gur puvyqera bs Funyyhz, gur
puvyqera bs Ngre, gur puvyqera bs Gnyzba, gur puvyqera bs Nxxho, gur
puvyqera bs Ungvgn, gur puvyqera bs Fubonv, va nyy na uhaqerq guvegl
naq avar.

2:43 Gur Arguvavzf: gur puvyqera bs Mvun, gur puvyqera bs Unfhcun, gur
puvyqera bs Gnoonbgu, 2:44 Gur puvyqera bs Xrebf, gur puvyqera bs
Fvnun, gur puvyqera bs Cnqba, 2:45 Gur puvyqera bs Yronanu, gur
puvyqera bs Untnonu, gur puvyqera bs Nxxho, 2:46 Gur puvyqera bs
Untno, gur puvyqera bs Funyznv, gur puvyqera bs Unana, 2:47 Gur
puvyqera bs Tvqqry, gur puvyqera bs Tnune, gur puvyqera bs Ernvnu,
2:48 Gur puvyqera bs Ermva, gur puvyqera bs Arxbqn, gur puvyqera bs
Tnmmnz, 2:49 Gur puvyqera bs Hmmn, gur puvyqera bs Cnfrnu, gur
puvyqera bs Orfnv, 2:50 Gur puvyqera bs Nfanu, gur puvyqera bs
Zruhavz, gur puvyqera bs Arcuhfvz, 2:51 Gur puvyqera bs Onxohx, gur
puvyqera bs Unxhcun, gur puvyqera bs Uneuhe, 2:52 Gur puvyqera bs
Onmyhgu, gur puvyqera bs Zruvqn, gur puvyqera bs Unefun, 2:53 Gur
puvyqera bs Onexbf, gur puvyqera bs Fvfren, gur puvyqera bs Gunznu,
2:54 Gur puvyqera bs Armvnu, gur puvyqera bs Ungvcun.

2:55 Gur puvyqera bs Fbybzba'f freinagf: gur puvyqera bs Fbgnv, gur
puvyqera bs Fbcurergu, gur puvyqera bs Crehqn, 2:56 Gur puvyqera bs
Wnnynu, gur puvyqera bs Qnexba, gur puvyqera bs Tvqqry, 2:57 Gur
puvyqera bs Furcungvnu, gur puvyqera bs Unggvy, gur puvyqera bs
Cbpurergu bs Mronvz, gur puvyqera bs Nzv.

2:58 Nyy gur Arguvavzf, naq gur puvyqera bs Fbybzba'f freinagf, jrer
guerr uhaqerq avargl naq gjb.

2:59 Naq gurfr jrer gurl juvpu jrag hc sebz Gryzrynu, Gryunefn,
Pureho, Nqqna, naq Vzzre: ohg gurl pbhyq abg furj gurve sngure'f
ubhfr, naq gurve frrq, jurgure gurl jrer bs Vfenry: 2:60 Gur puvyqera
bs Qrynvnu, gur puvyqera bs Gbovnu, gur puvyqera bs Arxbqn, fvk
uhaqerq svsgl naq gjb.

2:61 Naq bs gur puvyqera bs gur cevrfgf: gur puvyqera bs Unonvnu, gur
puvyqera bs Xbm, gur puvyqera bs Onemvyynv; juvpu gbbx n jvsr bs gur
qnhtugref bs Onemvyynv gur Tvyrnqvgr, naq jnf pnyyrq nsgre gurve anzr:
2:62 Gurfr fbhtug gurve ertvfgre nzbat gubfr gung jrer erpxbarq ol
trarnybtl, ohg gurl jrer abg sbhaq: gurersber jrer gurl, nf cbyyhgrq,
chg sebz gur cevrfgubbq.

2:63 Naq gur Gvefungun fnvq hagb gurz, gung gurl fubhyq abg rng bs gur
zbfg ubyl guvatf, gvyy gurer fgbbq hc n cevrfg jvgu Hevz naq jvgu
Guhzzvz.

2:64 Gur jubyr pbatertngvba gbtrgure jnf sbegl naq gjb gubhfnaq guerr
uhaqerq naq guerrfpber, 2:65 Orfvqr gurve freinagf naq gurve znvqf, bs
jubz gurer jrer frira gubhfnaq guerr uhaqerq guvegl naq frira: naq
gurer jrer nzbat gurz gjb uhaqerq fvatvat zra naq fvatvat jbzra.

2:66 Gurve ubefrf jrer frira uhaqerq guvegl naq fvk; gurve zhyrf, gjb
uhaqerq sbegl naq svir; 2:67 Gurve pnzryf, sbhe uhaqerq guvegl naq
svir; gurve nffrf, fvk gubhfnaq frira uhaqerq naq gjragl.

2:68 Naq fbzr bs gur puvrs bs gur snguref, jura gurl pnzr gb gur ubhfr
bs gur YBEQ juvpu vf ng Wrehfnyrz, bssrerq serryl sbe gur ubhfr bs Tbq
gb frg vg hc va uvf cynpr: 2:69 Gurl tnir nsgre gurve novyvgl hagb gur
gernfher bs gur jbex guerrfpber naq bar gubhfnaq qenzf bs tbyq, naq
svir gubhfnaq cbhaq bs fvyire, naq bar uhaqerq cevrfgf' tnezragf.

2:70 Fb gur cevrfgf, naq gur Yrivgrf, naq fbzr bs gur crbcyr, naq gur
fvatref, naq gur cbegref, naq gur Arguvavzf, qjryg va gurve pvgvrf,
naq nyy Vfenry va gurve pvgvrf.

3:1 Naq jura gur friragu zbagu jnf pbzr, naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
jrer va gur pvgvrf, gur crbcyr tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure nf bar zna
gb Wrehfnyrz.

3:2 Gura fgbbq hc Wrfuhn gur fba bs Wbmnqnx, naq uvf oerguera gur
cevrfgf, naq Mrehoonory gur fba bs Furnygvry, naq uvf oerguera, naq
ohvyqrq gur nygne bs gur Tbq bs Vfenry, gb bssre oheag bssrevatf
gurerba, nf vg vf jevggra va gur ynj bs Zbfrf gur zna bs Tbq.

3:3 Naq gurl frg gur nygne hcba uvf onfrf; sbe srne jnf hcba gurz
orpnhfr bs gur crbcyr bs gubfr pbhagevrf: naq gurl bssrerq oheag
bssrevatf gurerba hagb gur YBEQ, rira oheag bssrevatf zbeavat naq
riravat.

3:4 Gurl xrcg nyfb gur srnfg bs gnoreanpyrf, nf vg vf jevggra, naq
bssrerq gur qnvyl oheag bssrevatf ol ahzore, nppbeqvat gb gur phfgbz,
nf gur qhgl bs rirel qnl erdhverq; 3:5 Naq nsgrejneq bssrerq gur
pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, obgu bs gur arj zbbaf, naq bs nyy gur frg
srnfgf bs gur YBEQ gung jrer pbafrpengrq, naq bs rirel bar gung
jvyyvatyl bssrerq n serrjvyy bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ.

3:6 Sebz gur svefg qnl bs gur friragu zbagu ortna gurl gb bssre oheag
bssrevatf hagb gur YBEQ. Ohg gur sbhaqngvba bs gur grzcyr bs gur YBEQ
jnf abg lrg ynvq.

3:7 Gurl tnir zbarl nyfb hagb gur znfbaf, naq gb gur pnecragref; naq
zrng, naq qevax, naq bvy, hagb gurz bs Mvqba, naq gb gurz bs Gler, gb
oevat prqne gerrf sebz Yronaba gb gur frn bs Wbccn, nppbeqvat gb gur
tenag gung gurl unq bs Plehf xvat bs Crefvn.

3:8 Abj va gur frpbaq lrne bs gurve pbzvat hagb gur ubhfr bs Tbq ng
Wrehfnyrz, va gur frpbaq zbagu, ortna Mrehoonory gur fba bs Furnygvry,
naq Wrfuhn gur fba bs Wbmnqnx, naq gur erzanag bs gurve oerguera gur
cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf, naq nyy gurl gung jrer pbzr bhg bs gur
pncgvivgl hagb Wrehfnyrz; naq nccbvagrq gur Yrivgrf, sebz gjragl lrnef
byq naq hcjneq, gb frg sbejneq gur jbex bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

3:9 Gura fgbbq Wrfuhn jvgu uvf fbaf naq uvf oerguera, Xnqzvry naq uvf
fbaf, gur fbaf bs Whqnu, gbtrgure, gb frg sbejneq gur jbexzra va gur
ubhfr bs Tbq: gur fbaf bs Uranqnq, jvgu gurve fbaf naq gurve oerguera
gur Yrivgrf.

3:10 Naq jura gur ohvyqref ynvq gur sbhaqngvba bs gur grzcyr bs gur
YBEQ, gurl frg gur cevrfgf va gurve nccnery jvgu gehzcrgf, naq gur
Yrivgrf gur fbaf bs Nfncu jvgu plzonyf, gb cenvfr gur YBEQ, nsgre gur
beqvanapr bs Qnivq xvat bs Vfenry.

3:11 Naq gurl fnat gbtrgure ol pbhefr va cenvfvat naq tvivat gunaxf
hagb gur YBEQ; orpnhfr ur vf tbbq, sbe uvf zrepl raqhergu sbe rire
gbjneq Vfenry.

Naq nyy gur crbcyr fubhgrq jvgu n terng fubhg, jura gurl cenvfrq gur
YBEQ, orpnhfr gur sbhaqngvba bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ jnf ynvq.

3:12 Ohg znal bs gur cevrfgf naq Yrivgrf naq puvrs bs gur snguref, jub
jrer napvrag zra, gung unq frra gur svefg ubhfr, jura gur sbhaqngvba
bs guvf ubhfr jnf ynvq orsber gurve rlrf, jrcg jvgu n ybhq ibvpr; naq
znal fubhgrq nybhq sbe wbl: 3:13 Fb gung gur crbcyr pbhyq abg qvfprea
gur abvfr bs gur fubhg bs wbl sebz gur abvfr bs gur jrrcvat bs gur
crbcyr: sbe gur crbcyr fubhgrq jvgu n ybhq fubhg, naq gur abvfr jnf
urneq nsne bss.

4:1 Abj jura gur nqirefnevrf bs Whqnu naq Orawnzva urneq gung gur
puvyqera bs gur pncgvivgl ohvyqrq gur grzcyr hagb gur YBEQ Tbq bs
Vfenry; 4:2 Gura gurl pnzr gb Mrehoonory, naq gb gur puvrs bs gur
snguref, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Yrg hf ohvyq jvgu lbh: sbe jr frrx lbhe
Tbq, nf lr qb; naq jr qb fnpevsvpr hagb uvz fvapr gur qnlf bs
Rfneunqqba xvat bs Nffhe, juvpu oebhtug hf hc uvgure.

4:3 Ohg Mrehoonory, naq Wrfuhn, naq gur erfg bs gur puvrs bs gur
snguref bs Vfenry, fnvq hagb gurz, Lr unir abguvat gb qb jvgu hf gb
ohvyq na ubhfr hagb bhe Tbq; ohg jr bhefryirf gbtrgure jvyy ohvyq hagb
gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, nf xvat Plehf gur xvat bs Crefvn ungu
pbzznaqrq hf.

4:4 Gura gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq jrnxrarq gur unaqf bs gur crbcyr bs
Whqnu, naq gebhoyrq gurz va ohvyqvat, 4:5 Naq uverq pbhafryybef
ntnvafg gurz, gb sehfgengr gurve checbfr, nyy gur qnlf bs Plehf xvat
bs Crefvn, rira hagvy gur ervta bs Qnevhf xvat bs Crefvn.

4:6 Naq va gur ervta bs Nunfhrehf, va gur ortvaavat bs uvf ervta,
jebgr gurl hagb uvz na npphfngvba ntnvafg gur vaunovgnagf bs Whqnu naq
Wrehfnyrz.

4:7 Naq va gur qnlf bs Negnkrekrf jebgr Ovfuynz, Zvguerqngu, Gnorry,
naq gur erfg bs gurve pbzcnavbaf, hagb Negnkrekrf xvat bs Crefvn; naq
gur jevgvat bs gur yrggre jnf jevggra va gur Flevna gbathr, naq
vagrecergrq va gur Flevna gbathr.

4:8 Eruhz gur punapryybe naq Fuvzfunv gur fpevor jebgr n yrggre
ntnvafg Wrehfnyrz gb Negnkrekrf gur xvat va guvf fbeg: 4:9 Gura jebgr
Eruhz gur punapryybe, naq Fuvzfunv gur fpevor, naq gur erfg bs gurve
pbzcnavbaf; gur Qvanvgrf, gur Ncunefngupuvgrf, gur Gnecryvgrf, gur
Ncunefvgrf, gur Nepurivgrf, gur Onolybavnaf, gur Fhfnapuvgrf, gur
Qrunivgrf, naq gur Rynzvgrf, 4:10 Naq gur erfg bs gur angvbaf jubz gur
terng naq aboyr Nfanccre oebhtug bire, naq frg va gur pvgvrf bs
Fnznevn, naq gur erfg gung ner ba guvf fvqr gur evire, naq ng fhpu n
gvzr.

4:11 Guvf vf gur pbcl bs gur yrggre gung gurl frag hagb uvz, rira hagb
Negnkrekrf gur xvat; Gul freinagf gur zra ba guvf fvqr gur evire, naq
ng fhpu n gvzr.

4:12 Or vg xabja hagb gur xvat, gung gur Wrjf juvpu pnzr hc sebz gurr
gb hf ner pbzr hagb Wrehfnyrz, ohvyqvat gur eroryyvbhf naq gur onq
pvgl, naq unir frg hc gur jnyyf gurerbs, naq wbvarq gur sbhaqngvbaf.

4:13 Or vg xabja abj hagb gur xvat, gung, vs guvf pvgl or ohvyqrq, naq
gur jnyyf frg hc ntnva, gura jvyy gurl abg cnl gbyy, gevohgr, naq
phfgbz, naq fb gubh funyg raqnzntr gur erirahr bs gur xvatf.

4:14 Abj orpnhfr jr unir znvagranapr sebz gur xvat'f cnynpr, naq vg
jnf abg zrrg sbe hf gb frr gur xvat'f qvfubabhe, gurersber unir jr
frag naq pregvsvrq gur xvat; 4:15 Gung frnepu znl or znqr va gur obbx
bs gur erpbeqf bs gul snguref: fb funyg gubh svaq va gur obbx bs gur
erpbeqf, naq xabj gung guvf pvgl vf n eroryyvbhf pvgl, naq uhegshy
hagb xvatf naq cebivaprf, naq gung gurl unir zbirq frqvgvba jvguva gur
fnzr bs byq gvzr: sbe juvpu pnhfr jnf guvf pvgl qrfgeblrq.

4:16 Jr pregvsl gur xvat gung, vs guvf pvgl or ohvyqrq ntnva, naq gur
jnyyf gurerbs frg hc, ol guvf zrnaf gubh funyg unir ab cbegvba ba guvf
fvqr gur evire.

4:17 Gura frag gur xvat na nafjre hagb Eruhz gur punapryybe, naq gb
Fuvzfunv gur fpevor, naq gb gur erfg bs gurve pbzcnavbaf gung qjryy va
Fnznevn, naq hagb gur erfg orlbaq gur evire, Crnpr, naq ng fhpu n
gvzr.

4:18 Gur yrggre juvpu lr frag hagb hf ungu orra cynvayl ernq orsber
zr.

4:19 Naq V pbzznaqrq, naq frnepu ungu orra znqr, naq vg vf sbhaq gung
guvf pvgl bs byq gvzr ungu znqr vafheerpgvba ntnvafg xvatf, naq gung
eroryyvba naq frqvgvba unir orra znqr gurerva.

4:20 Gurer unir orra zvtugl xvatf nyfb bire Wrehfnyrz, juvpu unir
ehyrq bire nyy pbhagevrf orlbaq gur evire; naq gbyy, gevohgr, naq
phfgbz, jnf cnvq hagb gurz.

4:21 Tvir lr abj pbzznaqzrag gb pnhfr gurfr zra gb prnfr, naq gung
guvf pvgl or abg ohvyqrq, hagvy nabgure pbzznaqzrag funyy or tvira
sebz zr.

4:22 Gnxr urrq abj gung lr snvy abg gb qb guvf: jul fubhyq qnzntr tebj
gb gur uheg bs gur xvatf?  4:23 Abj jura gur pbcl bs xvat Negnkrekrf'
yrggre jnf ernq orsber Eruhz, naq Fuvzfunv gur fpevor, naq gurve
pbzcnavbaf, gurl jrag hc va unfgr gb Wrehfnyrz hagb gur Wrjf, naq znqr
gurz gb prnfr ol sbepr naq cbjre.

4:24 Gura prnfrq gur jbex bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq juvpu vf ng Wrehfnyrz.
Fb vg prnfrq hagb gur frpbaq lrne bs gur ervta bs Qnevhf xvat bs
Crefvn.

5:1 Gura gur cebcurgf, Unttnv gur cebcurg, naq Mrpunevnu gur fba bs
Vqqb, cebcurfvrq hagb gur Wrjf gung jrer va Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz va gur
anzr bs gur Tbq bs Vfenry, rira hagb gurz.

5:2 Gura ebfr hc Mrehoonory gur fba bs Furnygvry, naq Wrfuhn gur fba
bs Wbmnqnx, naq ortna gb ohvyq gur ubhfr bs Tbq juvpu vf ng Wrehfnyrz:
naq jvgu gurz jrer gur cebcurgf bs Tbq urycvat gurz.

5:3 Ng gur fnzr gvzr pnzr gb gurz Gnganv, tbireabe ba guvf fvqr gur
evire, naq Furguneobmanv naq gurve pbzcnavbaf, naq fnvq guhf hagb
gurz, Jub ungu pbzznaqrq lbh gb ohvyq guvf ubhfr, naq gb znxr hc guvf
jnyy?  5:4 Gura fnvq jr hagb gurz nsgre guvf znaare, Jung ner gur
anzrf bs gur zra gung znxr guvf ohvyqvat?  5:5 Ohg gur rlr bs gurve
Tbq jnf hcba gur ryqref bs gur Wrjf, gung gurl pbhyq abg pnhfr gurz gb
prnfr, gvyy gur znggre pnzr gb Qnevhf: naq gura gurl erghearq nafjre
ol yrggre pbapreavat guvf znggre.

5:6 Gur pbcl bs gur yrggre gung Gnganv, tbireabe ba guvf fvqr gur
evire, naq Furguneobmanv naq uvf pbzcnavbaf gur Ncunefnpuvgrf, juvpu
jrer ba guvf fvqr gur evire, frag hagb Qnevhf gur xvat: 5:7 Gurl frag
n yrggre hagb uvz, jurerva jnf jevggra guhf; Hagb Qnevhf gur xvat, nyy
crnpr.

5:8 Or vg xabja hagb gur xvat, gung jr jrag vagb gur cebivapr bs
Whqrn, gb gur ubhfr bs gur terng Tbq, juvpu vf ohvyqrq jvgu terng
fgbarf, naq gvzore vf ynvq va gur jnyyf, naq guvf jbex tbrgu snfg ba,
naq cebfcrergu va gurve unaqf.

5:9 Gura nfxrq jr gubfr ryqref, naq fnvq hagb gurz guhf, Jub pbzznaqrq
lbh gb ohvyq guvf ubhfr, naq gb znxr hc gurfr jnyyf?  5:10 Jr nfxrq
gurve anzrf nyfb, gb pregvsl gurr, gung jr zvtug jevgr gur anzrf bs
gur zra gung jrer gur puvrs bs gurz.

5:11 Naq guhf gurl erghearq hf nafjre, fnlvat, Jr ner gur freinagf bs
gur Tbq bs urnira naq rnegu, naq ohvyq gur ubhfr gung jnf ohvyqrq
gurfr znal lrnef ntb, juvpu n terng xvat bs Vfenry ohvyqrq naq frg hc.

5:12 Ohg nsgre gung bhe snguref unq cebibxrq gur Tbq bs urnira hagb
jengu, ur tnir gurz vagb gur unaq bs Arohpunqarmmne gur xvat bs
Onolyba, gur Punyqrna, jub qrfgeblrq guvf ubhfr, naq pneevrq gur
crbcyr njnl vagb Onolyba.

5:13 Ohg va gur svefg lrne bs Plehf gur xvat bs Onolyba gur fnzr xvat
Plehf znqr n qrperr gb ohvyq guvf ubhfr bs Tbq.

5:14 Naq gur irffryf nyfb bs tbyq naq fvyire bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq,
juvpu Arohpunqarmmne gbbx bhg bs gur grzcyr gung jnf va Wrehfnyrz, naq
oebhtug gurz vagb gur grzcyr bs Onolyba, gubfr qvq Plehf gur xvat gnxr
bhg bs gur grzcyr bs Onolyba, naq gurl jrer qryvirerq hagb bar, jubfr
anzr jnf Furfuonmmne, jubz ur unq znqr tbireabe; 5:15 Naq fnvq hagb
uvz, Gnxr gurfr irffryf, tb, pneel gurz vagb gur grzcyr gung vf va
Wrehfnyrz, naq yrg gur ubhfr bs Tbq or ohvyqrq va uvf cynpr.

5:16 Gura pnzr gur fnzr Furfuonmmne, naq ynvq gur sbhaqngvba bs gur
ubhfr bs Tbq juvpu vf va Wrehfnyrz: naq fvapr gung gvzr rira hagvy abj
ungu vg orra va ohvyqvat, naq lrg vg vf abg svavfurq.

5:17 Abj gurersber, vs vg frrz tbbq gb gur xvat, yrg gurer or frnepu
znqr va gur xvat'f gernfher ubhfr, juvpu vf gurer ng Onolyba, jurgure
vg or fb, gung n qrperr jnf znqr bs Plehf gur xvat gb ohvyq guvf ubhfr
bs Tbq ng Wrehfnyrz, naq yrg gur xvat fraq uvf cyrnfher gb hf
pbapreavat guvf znggre.

6:1 Gura Qnevhf gur xvat znqr n qrperr, naq frnepu jnf znqr va gur
ubhfr bs gur ebyyf, jurer gur gernfherf jrer ynvq hc va Onolyba.

6:2 Naq gurer jnf sbhaq ng Npuzrgun, va gur cnynpr gung vf va gur
cebivapr bs gur Zrqrf, n ebyy, naq gurerva jnf n erpbeq guhf jevggra:
6:3 Va gur svefg lrne bs Plehf gur xvat gur fnzr Plehf gur xvat znqr n
qrperr pbapreavat gur ubhfr bs Tbq ng Wrehfnyrz, Yrg gur ubhfr or
ohvyqrq, gur cynpr jurer gurl bssrerq fnpevsvprf, naq yrg gur
sbhaqngvbaf gurerbs or fgebatyl ynvq; gur urvtug gurerbs guerrfpber
phovgf, naq gur oernqgu gurerbs guerrfpber phovgf; 6:4 Jvgu guerr ebjf
bs terng fgbarf, naq n ebj bs arj gvzore: naq yrg gur rkcrafrf or
tvira bhg bs gur xvat'f ubhfr: 6:5 Naq nyfb yrg gur tbyqra naq fvyire
irffryf bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq, juvpu Arohpunqarmmne gbbx sbegu bhg bs
gur grzcyr juvpu vf ng Wrehfnyrz, naq oebhtug hagb Onolyba, or
erfgberq, naq oebhtug ntnva hagb gur grzcyr juvpu vf ng Wrehfnyrz,
rirel bar gb uvf cynpr, naq cynpr gurz va gur ubhfr bs Tbq.

6:6 Abj gurersber, Gnganv, tbireabe orlbaq gur evire, Furguneobmanv,
naq lbhe pbzcnavbaf gur Ncunefnpuvgrf, juvpu ner orlbaq gur evire, or
lr sne sebz gurapr: 6:7 Yrg gur jbex bs guvf ubhfr bs Tbq nybar; yrg
gur tbireabe bs gur Wrjf naq gur ryqref bs gur Wrjf ohvyq guvf ubhfr
bs Tbq va uvf cynpr.

6:8 Zberbire V znxr n qrperr jung lr funyy qb gb gur ryqref bs gurfr
Wrjf sbe gur ohvyqvat bs guvf ubhfr bs Tbq: gung bs gur xvat'f tbbqf,
rira bs gur gevohgr orlbaq gur evire, sbegujvgu rkcrafrf or tvira hagb
gurfr zra, gung gurl or abg uvaqrerq.

6:9 Naq gung juvpu gurl unir arrq bs, obgu lbhat ohyybpxf, naq enzf,
naq ynzof, sbe gur oheag bssrevatf bs gur Tbq bs urnira, jurng, fnyg,
jvar, naq bvy, nppbeqvat gb gur nccbvagzrag bs gur cevrfgf juvpu ner
ng Wrehfnyrz, yrg vg or tvira gurz qnl ol qnl jvgubhg snvy: 6:10 Gung
gurl znl bssre fnpevsvprf bs fjrrg fnibhef hagb gur Tbq bs urnira, naq
cenl sbe gur yvsr bs gur xvat, naq bs uvf fbaf.

6:11 Nyfb V unir znqr n qrperr, gung jubfbrire funyy nygre guvf jbeq,
yrg gvzore or chyyrq qbja sebz uvf ubhfr, naq orvat frg hc, yrg uvz or
unatrq gurerba; naq yrg uvf ubhfr or znqr n qhatuvyy sbe guvf.

6:12 Naq gur Tbq gung ungu pnhfrq uvf anzr gb qjryy gurer qrfgebl nyy
xvatf naq crbcyr, gung funyy chg gb gurve unaq gb nygre naq gb qrfgebl
guvf ubhfr bs Tbq juvpu vf ng Wrehfnyrz. V Qnevhf unir znqr n qrperr;
yrg vg or qbar jvgu fcrrq.

6:13 Gura Gnganv, tbireabe ba guvf fvqr gur evire, Furguneobmanv, naq
gurve pbzcnavbaf, nppbeqvat gb gung juvpu Qnevhf gur xvat unq frag, fb
gurl qvq fcrrqvyl.

6:14 Naq gur ryqref bs gur Wrjf ohvyqrq, naq gurl cebfcrerq guebhtu
gur cebcurflvat bs Unttnv gur cebcurg naq Mrpunevnu gur fba bs Vqqb.
Naq gurl ohvyqrq, naq svavfurq vg, nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur
Tbq bs Vfenry, naq nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs Plehf, naq Qnevhf,
naq Negnkrekrf xvat bs Crefvn.

6:15 Naq guvf ubhfr jnf svavfurq ba gur guveq qnl bs gur zbagu Nqne,
juvpu jnf va gur fvkgu lrne bs gur ervta bs Qnevhf gur xvat.

6:16 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, gur cevrfgf, naq gur Yrivgrf, naq gur
erfg bs gur puvyqera bs gur pncgvivgl, xrcg gur qrqvpngvba bs guvf
ubhfr bs Tbq jvgu wbl.

6:17 Naq bssrerq ng gur qrqvpngvba bs guvf ubhfr bs Tbq na uhaqerq
ohyybpxf, gjb uhaqerq enzf, sbhe uhaqerq ynzof; naq sbe n fva bssrevat
sbe nyy Vfenry, gjryir ur tbngf, nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs gur gevorf
bs Vfenry.

6:18 Naq gurl frg gur cevrfgf va gurve qvivfvbaf, naq gur Yrivgrf va
gurve pbhefrf, sbe gur freivpr bs Tbq, juvpu vf ng Wrehfnyrz; nf vg vf
jevggra va gur obbx bs Zbfrf.

6:19 Naq gur puvyqera bs gur pncgvivgl xrcg gur cnffbire hcba gur
sbhegrragu qnl bs gur svefg zbagu.

6:20 Sbe gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf jrer chevsvrq gbtrgure, nyy bs
gurz jrer cher, naq xvyyrq gur cnffbire sbe nyy gur puvyqera bs gur
pncgvivgl, naq sbe gurve oerguera gur cevrfgf, naq sbe gurzfryirf.

6:21 Naq gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, juvpu jrer pbzr ntnva bhg bs
pncgvivgl, naq nyy fhpu nf unq frcnengrq gurzfryirf hagb gurz sebz gur
svyguvarff bs gur urngura bs gur ynaq, gb frrx gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry,
qvq rng, 6:22 Naq xrcg gur srnfg bs hayrnirarq oernq frira qnlf jvgu
wbl: sbe gur YBEQ unq znqr gurz wblshy, naq ghearq gur urneg bs gur
xvat bs Nfflevn hagb gurz, gb fgeratgura gurve unaqf va gur jbex bs
gur ubhfr bs Tbq, gur Tbq bs Vfenry.

7:1 Abj nsgre gurfr guvatf, va gur ervta bs Negnkrekrf xvat bs Crefvn,
Rmen gur fba bs Frenvnu, gur fba bs Nmnevnu, gur fba bs Uvyxvnu, 7:2
Gur fba bs Funyyhz, gur fba bs Mnqbx, gur fba bs Nuvgho, 7:3 Gur fba
bs Nznevnu, gur fba bs Nmnevnu, gur fba bs Zrenvbgu, 7:4 Gur fba bs
Mrenuvnu, gur fba bs Hmmv, gur fba bs Ohxxv, 7:5 Gur fba bs Novfuhn,
gur fba bs Cuvarunf, gur fba bs Ryrnmne, gur fba bs Nneba gur puvrs
cevrfg: 7:6 Guvf Rmen jrag hc sebz Onolyba; naq ur jnf n ernql fpevor
va gur ynj bs Zbfrf, juvpu gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry unq tvira: naq gur
xvat tenagrq uvz nyy uvf erdhrfg, nppbeqvat gb gur unaq bs gur YBEQ
uvf Tbq hcba uvz.

7:7 Naq gurer jrag hc fbzr bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry, naq bs gur
cevrfgf, naq gur Yrivgrf, naq gur fvatref, naq gur cbegref, naq gur
Arguvavzf, hagb Wrehfnyrz, va gur friragu lrne bs Negnkrekrf gur xvat.

7:8 Naq ur pnzr gb Wrehfnyrz va gur svsgu zbagu, juvpu jnf va gur
friragu lrne bs gur xvat.

7:9 Sbe hcba gur svefg qnl bs gur svefg zbagu ortna ur gb tb hc sebz
Onolyba, naq ba gur svefg qnl bs gur svsgu zbagu pnzr ur gb Wrehfnyrz,
nppbeqvat gb gur tbbq unaq bs uvf Tbq hcba uvz.

7:10 Sbe Rmen unq cercnerq uvf urneg gb frrx gur ynj bs gur YBEQ, naq
gb qb vg, naq gb grnpu va Vfenry fgnghgrf naq whqtzragf.

7:11 Abj guvf vf gur pbcl bs gur yrggre gung gur xvat Negnkrekrf tnir
hagb Rmen gur cevrfg, gur fpevor, rira n fpevor bs gur jbeqf bs gur
pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ, naq bs uvf fgnghgrf gb Vfenry.

7:12 Negnkrekrf, xvat bs xvatf, hagb Rmen gur cevrfg, n fpevor bs gur
ynj bs gur Tbq bs urnira, cresrpg crnpr, naq ng fhpu n gvzr.

7:13 V znxr n qrperr, gung nyy gurl bs gur crbcyr bs Vfenry, naq bs
uvf cevrfgf naq Yrivgrf, va zl ernyz, juvpu ner zvaqrq bs gurve bja
serrjvyy gb tb hc gb Wrehfnyrz, tb jvgu gurr.

7:14 Sbenfzhpu nf gubh neg frag bs gur xvat, naq bs uvf frira
pbhafryybef, gb radhver pbapreavat Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz, nppbeqvat gb
gur ynj bs gul Tbq juvpu vf va guvar unaq; 7:15 Naq gb pneel gur
fvyire naq tbyq, juvpu gur xvat naq uvf pbhafryybef unir serryl
bssrerq hagb gur Tbq bs Vfenry, jubfr unovgngvba vf va Wrehfnyrz, 7:16
Naq nyy gur fvyire naq tbyq gung gubh pnafg svaq va nyy gur cebivapr
bs Onolyba, jvgu gur serrjvyy bssrevat bs gur crbcyr, naq bs gur
cevrfgf, bssrevat jvyyvatyl sbe gur ubhfr bs gurve Tbq juvpu vf va
Wrehfnyrz: 7:17 Gung gubh znlrfg ohl fcrrqvyl jvgu guvf zbarl
ohyybpxf, enzf, ynzof, jvgu gurve zrng bssrevatf naq gurve qevax
bssrevatf, naq bssre gurz hcba gur nygne bs gur ubhfr bs lbhe Tbq
juvpu vf va Wrehfnyrz.

7:18 Naq jungfbrire funyy frrz tbbq gb gurr, naq gb gul oerguera, gb
qb jvgu gur erfg bs gur fvyire naq gur tbyq, gung qb nsgre gur jvyy bs
lbhe Tbq.

7:19 Gur irffryf nyfb gung ner tvira gurr sbe gur freivpr bs gur ubhfr
bs gul Tbq, gubfr qryvire gubh orsber gur Tbq bs Wrehfnyrz.

7:20 Naq jungfbrire zber funyy or arrqshy sbe gur ubhfr bs gul Tbq,
juvpu gubh funyg unir bppnfvba gb orfgbj, orfgbj vg bhg bs gur xvat'f
gernfher ubhfr.

7:21 Naq V, rira V Negnkrekrf gur xvat, qb znxr n qrperr gb nyy gur
gernfheref juvpu ner orlbaq gur evire, gung jungfbrire Rmen gur
cevrfg, gur fpevor bs gur ynj bs gur Tbq bs urnira, funyy erdhver bs
lbh, vg or qbar fcrrqvyl, 7:22 Hagb na uhaqerq gnyragf bs fvyire, naq
gb na uhaqerq zrnfherf bs jurng, naq gb na uhaqerq onguf bs jvar, naq
gb na uhaqerq onguf bs bvy, naq fnyg jvgubhg cerfpevovat ubj zhpu.

7:23 Jungfbrire vf pbzznaqrq ol gur Tbq bs urnira, yrg vg or
qvyvtragyl qbar sbe gur ubhfr bs gur Tbq bs urnira: sbe jul fubhyq
gurer or jengu ntnvafg gur ernyz bs gur xvat naq uvf fbaf?  7:24 Nyfb
jr pregvsl lbh, gung gbhpuvat nal bs gur cevrfgf naq Yrivgrf, fvatref,
cbegref, Arguvavzf, be zvavfgref bs guvf ubhfr bs Tbq, vg funyy abg or
ynjshy gb vzcbfr gbyy, gevohgr, be phfgbz, hcba gurz.

7:25 Naq gubh, Rmen, nsgre gur jvfqbz bs gul Tbq, gung vf va guvar
unaq, frg zntvfgengrf naq whqtrf, juvpu znl whqtr nyy gur crbcyr gung
ner orlbaq gur evire, nyy fhpu nf xabj gur ynjf bs gul Tbq; naq grnpu
lr gurz gung xabj gurz abg.

7:26 Naq jubfbrire jvyy abg qb gur ynj bs gul Tbq, naq gur ynj bs gur
xvat, yrg whqtzrag or rkrphgrq fcrrqvyl hcba uvz, jurgure vg or hagb
qrngu, be gb onavfuzrag, be gb pbasvfpngvba bs tbbqf, be gb
vzcevfbazrag.

7:27 Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ Tbq bs bhe snguref, juvpu ungu chg fhpu n
guvat nf guvf va gur xvat'f urneg, gb ornhgvsl gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ
juvpu vf va Wrehfnyrz: 7:28 Naq ungu rkgraqrq zrepl hagb zr orsber gur
xvat, naq uvf pbhafryybef, naq orsber nyy gur xvat'f zvtugl cevaprf.
Naq V jnf fgeratgurarq nf gur unaq bs gur YBEQ zl Tbq jnf hcba zr, naq
V tngurerq gbtrgure bhg bs Vfenry puvrs zra gb tb hc jvgu zr.

8:1 Gurfr ner abj gur puvrs bs gurve snguref, naq guvf vf gur
trarnybtl bs gurz gung jrag hc jvgu zr sebz Onolyba, va gur ervta bs
Negnkrekrf gur xvat.

8:2 Bs gur fbaf bs Cuvarunf; Trefubz: bs gur fbaf bs Vgunzne; Qnavry:
bs gur fbaf bs Qnivq; Ungghfu.

8:3 Bs gur fbaf bs Furpunavnu, bs gur fbaf bs Cunebfu; Mrpunevnu: naq
jvgu uvz jrer erpxbarq ol trarnybtl bs gur znyrf na uhaqerq naq svsgl.

8:4 Bs gur fbaf bs Cnunguzbno; Ryvubranv gur fba bs Mrenuvnu, naq jvgu
uvz gjb uhaqerq znyrf.

8:5 Bs gur fbaf bs Furpunavnu; gur fba bs Wnunmvry, naq jvgu uvz guerr
uhaqerq znyrf.

8:6 Bs gur fbaf nyfb bs Nqva; Rorq gur fba bs Wbanguna, naq jvgu uvz
svsgl znyrf.

8:7 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Rynz; Wrfunvnu gur fba bs Ngunyvnu, naq jvgu
uvz friragl znyrf.

8:8 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Furcungvnu; Mronqvnu gur fba bs Zvpunry, naq
jvgu uvz sbhefpber znyrf.

8:9 Bs gur fbaf bs Wbno; Bonqvnu gur fba bs Wruvry, naq jvgu uvz gjb
uhaqerq naq rvtugrra znyrf.

8:10 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Furybzvgu; gur fba bs Wbfvcuvnu, naq jvgu uvz
na uhaqerq naq guerrfpber znyrf.

8:11 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Oronv; Mrpunevnu gur fba bs Oronv, naq jvgu
uvz gjragl naq rvtug znyrf.

8:12 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Nmtnq; Wbunana gur fba bs Unxxngna, naq jvgu
uvz na uhaqerq naq gra znyrf.

8:13 Naq bs gur ynfg fbaf bs Nqbavxnz, jubfr anzrf ner gurfr,
Ryvcuryrg, Wrvry, naq Furznvnu, naq jvgu gurz guerrfpber znyrf.

8:14 Bs gur fbaf nyfb bs Ovtinv; Hgunv, naq Mnoohq, naq jvgu gurz
friragl znyrf.

8:15 Naq V tngurerq gurz gbtrgure gb gur evire gung ehaargu gb Nunin;
naq gurer nobqr jr va gragf guerr qnlf: naq V ivrjrq gur crbcyr, naq
gur cevrfgf, naq sbhaq gurer abar bs gur fbaf bs Yriv.

8:16 Gura frag V sbe Ryvrmre, sbe Nevry, sbe Furznvnu, naq sbe
Ryanguna, naq sbe Wnevo, naq sbe Ryanguna, naq sbe Anguna, naq sbe
Mrpunevnu, naq sbe Zrfuhyynz, puvrs zra; nyfb sbe Wbvnevo, naq sbe
Ryanguna, zra bs haqrefgnaqvat.

8:17 Naq V frag gurz jvgu pbzznaqzrag hagb Vqqb gur puvrs ng gur cynpr
Pnfvcuvn, naq V gbyq gurz jung gurl fubhyq fnl hagb Vqqb, naq gb uvf
oerguera gur Arguvavzf, ng gur cynpr Pnfvcuvn, gung gurl fubhyq oevat
hagb hf zvavfgref sbe gur ubhfr bs bhe Tbq.

8:18 Naq ol gur tbbq unaq bs bhe Tbq hcba hf gurl oebhtug hf n zna bs
haqrefgnaqvat, bs gur fbaf bs Znuyv, gur fba bs Yriv, gur fba bs
Vfenry; naq Furerovnu, jvgu uvf fbaf naq uvf oerguera, rvtugrra; 8:19
Naq Unfunovnu, naq jvgu uvz Wrfunvnu bs gur fbaf bs Zrenev, uvf
oerguera naq gurve fbaf, gjragl; 8:20 Nyfb bs gur Arguvavzf, jubz
Qnivq naq gur cevaprf unq nccbvagrq sbe gur freivpr bs gur Yrivgrf,
gjb uhaqerq naq gjragl Arguvavzf: nyy bs gurz jrer rkcerffrq ol anzr.

8:21 Gura V cebpynvzrq n snfg gurer, ng gur evire bs Nunin, gung jr
zvtug nssyvpg bhefryirf orsber bhe Tbq, gb frrx bs uvz n evtug jnl sbe
hf, naq sbe bhe yvggyr barf, naq sbe nyy bhe fhofgnapr.

8:22 Sbe V jnf nfunzrq gb erdhver bs gur xvat n onaq bs fbyqvref naq
ubefrzra gb uryc hf ntnvafg gur rarzl va gur jnl: orpnhfr jr unq
fcbxra hagb gur xvat, fnlvat, Gur unaq bs bhe Tbq vf hcba nyy gurz sbe
tbbq gung frrx uvz; ohg uvf cbjre naq uvf jengu vf ntnvafg nyy gurz
gung sbefnxr uvz.

8:23 Fb jr snfgrq naq orfbhtug bhe Tbq sbe guvf: naq ur jnf vagerngrq
bs hf.

8:24 Gura V frcnengrq gjryir bs gur puvrs bs gur cevrfgf, Furerovnu,
Unfunovnu, naq gra bs gurve oerguera jvgu gurz, 8:25 Naq jrvturq hagb
gurz gur fvyire, naq gur tbyq, naq gur irffryf, rira gur bssrevat bs
gur ubhfr bs bhe Tbq, juvpu gur xvat, naq uvf pbhafryybef, naq uvf
ybeqf, naq nyy Vfenry gurer cerfrag, unq bssrerq: 8:26 V rira jrvturq
hagb gurve unaq fvk uhaqerq naq svsgl gnyragf bs fvyire, naq fvyire
irffryf na uhaqerq gnyragf, naq bs tbyq na uhaqerq gnyragf; 8:27 Nyfb
gjragl onfbaf bs tbyq, bs n gubhfnaq qenzf; naq gjb irffryf bs svar
pbccre, cerpvbhf nf tbyq.

8:28 Naq V fnvq hagb gurz, Lr ner ubyl hagb gur YBEQ; gur irffryf ner
ubyl nyfb; naq gur fvyire naq gur tbyq ner n serrjvyy bssrevat hagb
gur YBEQ Tbq bs lbhe snguref.

8:29 Jngpu lr, naq xrrc gurz, hagvy lr jrvtu gurz orsber gur puvrs bs
gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf, naq puvrs bs gur snguref bs Vfenry, ng
Wrehfnyrz, va gur punzoref bs gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ.

8:30 Fb gbbx gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf gur jrvtug bs gur fvyire, naq
gur tbyq, naq gur irffryf, gb oevat gurz gb Wrehfnyrz hagb gur ubhfr
bs bhe Tbq.

8:31 Gura jr qrcnegrq sebz gur evire bs Nunin ba gur gjrysgu qnl bs
gur svefg zbagu, gb tb hagb Wrehfnyrz: naq gur unaq bs bhe Tbq jnf
hcba hf, naq ur qryvirerq hf sebz gur unaq bs gur rarzl, naq bs fhpu
nf ynl va jnvg ol gur jnl.

8:32 Naq jr pnzr gb Wrehfnyrz, naq nobqr gurer guerr qnlf.

8:33 Abj ba gur sbhegu qnl jnf gur fvyire naq gur tbyq naq gur irffryf
jrvturq va gur ubhfr bs bhe Tbq ol gur unaq bs Zrerzbgu gur fba bs
Hevnu gur cevrfg; naq jvgu uvz jnf Ryrnmne gur fba bs Cuvarunf; naq
jvgu gurz jnf Wbmnonq gur fba bs Wrfuhn, naq Abnqvnu gur fba bs
Ovaahv, Yrivgrf; 8:34 Ol ahzore naq ol jrvtug bs rirel bar: naq nyy
gur jrvtug jnf jevggra ng gung gvzr.

8:35 Nyfb gur puvyqera bs gubfr gung unq orra pneevrq njnl, juvpu jrer
pbzr bhg bs gur pncgvivgl, bssrerq oheag bssrevatf hagb gur Tbq bs
Vfenry, gjryir ohyybpxf sbe nyy Vfenry, avargl naq fvk enzf, friragl
naq frira ynzof, gjryir ur tbngf sbe n fva bssrevat: nyy guvf jnf n
oheag bssrevat hagb gur YBEQ.

8:36 Naq gurl qryvirerq gur xvat'f pbzzvffvbaf hagb gur xvat'f
yvrhgranagf, naq gb gur tbireabef ba guvf fvqr gur evire: naq gurl
shegurerq gur crbcyr, naq gur ubhfr bs Tbq.

9:1 Abj jura gurfr guvatf jrer qbar, gur cevaprf pnzr gb zr, fnlvat,
Gur crbcyr bs Vfenry, naq gur cevrfgf, naq gur Yrivgrf, unir abg
frcnengrq gurzfryirf sebz gur crbcyr bs gur ynaqf, qbvat nppbeqvat gb
gurve nobzvangvbaf, rira bs gur Pnannavgrf, gur Uvggvgrf, gur
Crevmmvgrf, gur Wrohfvgrf, gur Nzzbavgrf, gur Zbnovgrf, gur Rtlcgvnaf,
naq gur Nzbevgrf.

9:2 Sbe gurl unir gnxra bs gurve qnhtugref sbe gurzfryirf, naq sbe
gurve fbaf: fb gung gur ubyl frrq unir zvatyrq gurzfryirf jvgu gur
crbcyr bs gubfr ynaqf: lrn, gur unaq bs gur cevaprf naq ehyref ungu
orra puvrs va guvf gerfcnff.

9:3 Naq jura V urneq guvf guvat, V erag zl tnezrag naq zl znagyr, naq
cyhpxrq bss gur unve bs zl urnq naq bs zl orneq, naq fng qbja
nfgbavrq.

9:4 Gura jrer nffrzoyrq hagb zr rirel bar gung gerzoyrq ng gur jbeqf
bs gur Tbq bs Vfenry, orpnhfr bs gur genafterffvba bs gubfr gung unq
orra pneevrq njnl; naq V fng nfgbavrq hagvy gur riravat fnpevsvpr.

9:5 Naq ng gur riravat fnpevsvpr V nebfr hc sebz zl urnivarff; naq
univat erag zl tnezrag naq zl znagyr, V sryy hcba zl xarrf, naq fcernq
bhg zl unaqf hagb gur YBEQ zl Tbq, 9:6 Naq fnvq, B zl Tbq, V nz
nfunzrq naq oyhfu gb yvsg hc zl snpr gb gurr, zl Tbq: sbe bhe
vavdhvgvrf ner vapernfrq bire bhe urnq, naq bhe gerfcnff vf tebja hc
hagb gur urniraf.

9:7 Fvapr gur qnlf bs bhe snguref unir jr orra va n terng gerfcnff
hagb guvf qnl; naq sbe bhe vavdhvgvrf unir jr, bhe xvatf, naq bhe
cevrfgf, orra qryvirerq vagb gur unaq bs gur xvatf bs gur ynaqf, gb
gur fjbeq, gb pncgvivgl, naq gb n fcbvy, naq gb pbashfvba bs snpr, nf
vg vf guvf qnl.

9:8 Naq abj sbe n yvggyr fcnpr tenpr ungu orra furjrq sebz gur YBEQ
bhe Tbq, gb yrnir hf n erzanag gb rfpncr, naq gb tvir hf n anvy va uvf
ubyl cynpr, gung bhe Tbq znl yvtugra bhe rlrf, naq tvir hf n yvggyr
erivivat va bhe obaqntr.

9:9 Sbe jr jrer obaqzra; lrg bhe Tbq ungu abg sbefnxra hf va bhe
obaqntr, ohg ungu rkgraqrq zrepl hagb hf va gur fvtug bs gur xvatf bs
Crefvn, gb tvir hf n erivivat, gb frg hc gur ubhfr bs bhe Tbq, naq gb
ercnve gur qrfbyngvbaf gurerbs, naq gb tvir hf n jnyy va Whqnu naq va
Wrehfnyrz.

9:10 Naq abj, B bhe Tbq, jung funyy jr fnl nsgre guvf? sbe jr unir
sbefnxra gul pbzznaqzragf, 9:11 Juvpu gubh unfg pbzznaqrq ol gul
freinagf gur cebcurgf, fnlvat, Gur ynaq, hagb juvpu lr tb gb cbffrff
vg, vf na hapyrna ynaq jvgu gur svyguvarff bs gur crbcyr bs gur ynaqf,
jvgu gurve nobzvangvbaf, juvpu unir svyyrq vg sebz bar raq gb nabgure
jvgu gurve hapyrnaarff.

9:12 Abj gurersber tvir abg lbhe qnhtugref hagb gurve fbaf, arvgure
gnxr gurve qnhtugref hagb lbhe fbaf, abe frrx gurve crnpr be gurve
jrnygu sbe rire: gung lr znl or fgebat, naq rng gur tbbq bs gur ynaq,
naq yrnir vg sbe na vaurevgnapr gb lbhe puvyqera sbe rire.

9:13 Naq nsgre nyy gung vf pbzr hcba hf sbe bhe rivy qrrqf, naq sbe
bhe terng gerfcnff, frrvat gung gubh bhe Tbq unfg chavfurq hf yrff
guna bhe vavdhvgvrf qrfreir, naq unfg tvira hf fhpu qryvirenapr nf
guvf; 9:14 Fubhyq jr ntnva oernx gul pbzznaqzragf, naq wbva va
nssvavgl jvgu gur crbcyr bs gurfr nobzvangvbaf? jbhyqrfg abg gubh or
natel jvgu hf gvyy gubh unqfg pbafhzrq hf, fb gung gurer fubhyq or ab
erzanag abe rfpncvat?  9:15 B YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry, gubh neg evtugrbhf:
sbe jr erznva lrg rfpncrq, nf vg vf guvf qnl: orubyq, jr ner orsber
gurr va bhe gerfcnffrf: sbe jr pnaabg fgnaq orsber gurr orpnhfr bs
guvf.

10:1 Abj jura Rmen unq cenlrq, naq jura ur unq pbasrffrq, jrrcvat naq
pnfgvat uvzfrys qbja orsber gur ubhfr bs Tbq, gurer nffrzoyrq hagb uvz
bhg bs Vfenry n irel terng pbatertngvba bs zra naq jbzra naq puvyqera:
sbe gur crbcyr jrcg irel fber.

10:2 Naq Furpunavnu gur fba bs Wruvry, bar bs gur fbaf bs Rynz,
nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb Rmen, Jr unir gerfcnffrq ntnvafg bhe Tbq, naq
unir gnxra fgenatr jvirf bs gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq: lrg abj gurer vf
ubcr va Vfenry pbapreavat guvf guvat.

10:3 Abj gurersber yrg hf znxr n pbiranag jvgu bhe Tbq gb chg njnl nyy
gur jvirf, naq fhpu nf ner obea bs gurz, nppbeqvat gb gur pbhafry bs
zl ybeq, naq bs gubfr gung gerzoyr ng gur pbzznaqzrag bs bhe Tbq; naq
yrg vg or qbar nppbeqvat gb gur ynj.

10:4 Nevfr; sbe guvf znggre orybatrgu hagb gurr: jr nyfb jvyy or jvgu
gurr: or bs tbbq pbhentr, naq qb vg.

10:5 Gura nebfr Rmen, naq znqr gur puvrs cevrfgf, gur Yrivgrf, naq nyy
Vfenry, gb fjrne gung gurl fubhyq qb nppbeqvat gb guvf jbeq. Naq gurl
fjner.

10:6 Gura Rmen ebfr hc sebz orsber gur ubhfr bs Tbq, naq jrag vagb gur
punzore bs Wbunana gur fba bs Ryvnfuvo: naq jura ur pnzr guvgure, ur
qvq rng ab oernq, abe qevax jngre: sbe ur zbhearq orpnhfr bs gur
genafterffvba bs gurz gung unq orra pneevrq njnl.

10:7 Naq gurl znqr cebpynzngvba guebhtubhg Whqnu naq Wrehfnyrz hagb
nyy gur puvyqera bs gur pncgvivgl, gung gurl fubhyq tngure gurzfryirf
gbtrgure hagb Wrehfnyrz; 10:8 Naq gung jubfbrire jbhyq abg pbzr jvguva
guerr qnlf, nppbeqvat gb gur pbhafry bs gur cevaprf naq gur ryqref,
nyy uvf fhofgnapr fubhyq or sbesrvgrq, naq uvzfrys frcnengrq sebz gur
pbatertngvba bs gubfr gung unq orra pneevrq njnl.

10:9 Gura nyy gur zra bs Whqnu naq Orawnzva tngurerq gurzfryirf
gbtrgure hagb Wrehfnyrz jvguva guerr qnlf. Vg jnf gur avagu zbagu, ba
gur gjragvrgu qnl bs gur zbagu; naq nyy gur crbcyr fng va gur fgerrg
bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq, gerzoyvat orpnhfr bs guvf znggre, naq sbe gur
terng enva.

10:10 Naq Rmen gur cevrfg fgbbq hc, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Lr unir
genafterffrq, naq unir gnxra fgenatr jvirf, gb vapernfr gur gerfcnff
bs Vfenry.

10:11 Abj gurersber znxr pbasrffvba hagb gur YBEQ Tbq bs lbhe snguref,
naq qb uvf cyrnfher: naq frcnengr lbhefryirf sebz gur crbcyr bs gur
ynaq, naq sebz gur fgenatr jvirf.

10:12 Gura nyy gur pbatertngvba nafjrerq naq fnvq jvgu n ybhq ibvpr,
Nf gubh unfg fnvq, fb zhfg jr qb.

10:13 Ohg gur crbcyr ner znal, naq vg vf n gvzr bs zhpu enva, naq jr
ner abg noyr gb fgnaq jvgubhg, arvgure vf guvf n jbex bs bar qnl be
gjb: sbe jr ner znal gung unir genafterffrq va guvf guvat.

10:14 Yrg abj bhe ehyref bs nyy gur pbatertngvba fgnaq, naq yrg nyy
gurz juvpu unir gnxra fgenatr jvirf va bhe pvgvrf pbzr ng nccbvagrq
gvzrf, naq jvgu gurz gur ryqref bs rirel pvgl, naq gur whqtrf gurerbs,
hagvy gur svrepr jengu bs bhe Tbq sbe guvf znggre or ghearq sebz hf.

10:15 Bayl Wbanguna gur fba bs Nfnury naq Wnunmvnu gur fba bs Gvxinu
jrer rzcyblrq nobhg guvf znggre: naq Zrfuhyynz naq Funoorgunv gur
Yrivgr urycrq gurz.

10:16 Naq gur puvyqera bs gur pncgvivgl qvq fb. Naq Rmen gur cevrfg,
jvgu pregnva puvrs bs gur snguref, nsgre gur ubhfr bs gurve snguref,
naq nyy bs gurz ol gurve anzrf, jrer frcnengrq, naq fng qbja va gur
svefg qnl bs gur gragu zbagu gb rknzvar gur znggre.

10:17 Naq gurl znqr na raq jvgu nyy gur zra gung unq gnxra fgenatr
jvirf ol gur svefg qnl bs gur svefg zbagu.

10:18 Naq nzbat gur fbaf bs gur cevrfgf gurer jrer sbhaq gung unq
gnxra fgenatr jvirf: anzryl, bs gur fbaf bs Wrfuhn gur fba bs Wbmnqnx,
naq uvf oerguera; Znnfrvnu, naq Ryvrmre, naq Wnevo, naq Trqnyvnu.

10:19 Naq gurl tnir gurve unaqf gung gurl jbhyq chg njnl gurve jvirf;
naq orvat thvygl, gurl bssrerq n enz bs gur sybpx sbe gurve gerfcnff.

10:20 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Vzzre; Unanav, naq Mronqvnu.

10:21 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Unevz; Znnfrvnu, naq Ryvwnu, naq Furznvnu,
naq Wruvry, naq Hmmvnu.

10:22 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Cnfuhe; Ryvbranv, Znnfrvnu, Vfuznry,
Argunarry, Wbmnonq, naq Rynfnu.

10:23 Nyfb bs gur Yrivgrf; Wbmnonq, naq Fuvzrv, naq Xrynvnu, (gur fnzr
vf Xryvgn,) Crgunuvnu, Whqnu, naq Ryvrmre.

10:24 Bs gur fvatref nyfb; Ryvnfuvo: naq bs gur cbegref; Funyyhz, naq
Gryrz, naq Hev.

10:25 Zberbire bs Vfenry: bs gur fbaf bs Cnebfu; Enzvnu, naq Wrmvnu,
naq Znypuvnu, naq Zvnzva, naq Ryrnmne, naq Znypuvwnu, naq Oranvnu.

10:26 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Rynz; Znggnavnu, Mrpunevnu, naq Wruvry, naq
Noqv, naq Wrerzbgu, naq Ryvnu.

10:27 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Mnggh; Ryvbranv, Ryvnfuvo, Znggnavnu, naq
Wrerzbgu, naq Mnonq, naq Nmvmn.

10:28 Bs gur fbaf nyfb bs Oronv; Wrubunana, Unanavnu, Mnoonv, naq
Nguynv.

10:29 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Onav; Zrfuhyynz, Znyyhpu, naq Nqnvnu, Wnfuho,
naq Furny, naq Enzbgu.

10:30 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Cnunguzbno; Nqan, naq Puryny, Oranvnu,
Znnfrvnu, Znggnavnu, Ormnyrry, naq Ovaahv, naq Znanffru.

10:31 Naq bs gur fbaf bs Unevz; Ryvrmre, Vfuvwnu, Znypuvnu, Furznvnu,
Fuvzrba, 10:32 Orawnzva, Znyyhpu, naq Furznevnu.

10:33 Bs gur fbaf bs Unfuhz; Znggranv, Znggngunu, Mnonq, Ryvcuryrg,
Wrerznv, Znanffru, naq Fuvzrv.

10:34 Bs gur fbaf bs Onav; Znnqnv, Nzenz, naq Hry, 10:35 Oranvnu,
Orqrvnu, Puryyhu, 10:36 Inavnu, Zrerzbgu, Ryvnfuvo, 10:37 Znggnavnu,
Znggranv, naq Wnnfnh, 10:38 Naq Onav, naq Ovaahv, Fuvzrv, 10:39 Naq
Furyrzvnu, naq Anguna, naq Nqnvnu, 10:40 Znpuanqronv, Funfunv, Funenv,
10:41 Nmnerry, naq Furyrzvnu, Furznevnu, 10:42 Funyyhz, Nznevnu, naq
Wbfrcu.

10:43 Bs gur fbaf bs Arob; Wrvry, Znggvguvnu, Mnonq, Mrovan, Wnqnh,
naq Wbry, Oranvnu.

10:44 Nyy gurfr unq gnxra fgenatr jvirf: naq fbzr bs gurz unq jvirf ol
jubz gurl unq puvyqera.




Gur Obbx bs Arurzvnu


1:1 Gur jbeqf bs Arurzvnu gur fba bs Unpunyvnu. Naq vg pnzr gb cnff
va gur zbagu Puvfyrh, va gur gjragvrgu lrne, nf V jnf va Fuhfuna gur
cnynpr, 1:2 Gung Unanav, bar bs zl oerguera, pnzr, ur naq pregnva zra
bs Whqnu; naq V nfxrq gurz pbapreavat gur Wrjf gung unq rfpncrq, juvpu
jrer yrsg bs gur pncgvivgl, naq pbapreavat Wrehfnyrz.
