1:3 Naq gurl fnvq hagb zr, Gur erzanag gung ner yrsg bs gur pncgvivgl
gurer va gur cebivapr ner va terng nssyvpgvba naq ercebnpu: gur jnyy
bs Wrehfnyrz nyfb vf oebxra qbja, naq gur tngrf gurerbs ner ohearq
jvgu sver.

1:4 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura V urneq gurfr jbeqf, gung V fng qbja naq
jrcg, naq zbhearq pregnva qnlf, naq snfgrq, naq cenlrq orsber gur Tbq
bs urnira, 1:5 Naq fnvq, V orfrrpu gurr, B YBEQ Tbq bs urnira, gur
terng naq greevoyr Tbq, gung xrrcrgu pbiranag naq zrepl sbe gurz gung
ybir uvz naq bofreir uvf pbzznaqzragf: 1:6 Yrg guvar rne abj or
nggragvir, naq guvar rlrf bcra, gung gubh znlrfg urne gur cenlre bs
gul freinag, juvpu V cenl orsber gurr abj, qnl naq avtug, sbe gur
puvyqera bs Vfenry gul freinagf, naq pbasrff gur fvaf bs gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry, juvpu jr unir fvaarq ntnvafg gurr: obgu V naq zl sngure'f
ubhfr unir fvaarq.

1:7 Jr unir qrnyg irel pbeehcgyl ntnvafg gurr, naq unir abg xrcg gur
pbzznaqzragf, abe gur fgnghgrf, abe gur whqtzragf, juvpu gubh
pbzznaqrqfg gul freinag Zbfrf.

1:8 Erzrzore, V orfrrpu gurr, gur jbeq gung gubh pbzznaqrqfg gul
freinag Zbfrf, fnlvat, Vs lr genafterff, V jvyy fpnggre lbh noebnq
nzbat gur angvbaf: 1:9 Ohg vs lr ghea hagb zr, naq xrrc zl
pbzznaqzragf, naq qb gurz; gubhtu gurer jrer bs lbh pnfg bhg hagb gur
hggrezbfg cneg bs gur urnira, lrg jvyy V tngure gurz sebz gurapr, naq
jvyy oevat gurz hagb gur cynpr gung V unir pubfra gb frg zl anzr
gurer.

1:10 Abj gurfr ner gul freinagf naq gul crbcyr, jubz gubh unfg
erqrrzrq ol gul terng cbjre, naq ol gul fgebat unaq.

1:11 B YBEQ, V orfrrpu gurr, yrg abj guvar rne or nggragvir gb gur
cenlre bs gul freinag, naq gb gur cenlre bs gul freinagf, jub qrfver
gb srne gul anzr: naq cebfcre, V cenl gurr, gul freinag guvf qnl, naq
tenag uvz zrepl va gur fvtug bs guvf zna. Sbe V jnf gur xvat'f
phcornere.

2:1 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff va gur zbagu Avfna, va gur gjragvrgu lrne bs
Negnkrekrf gur xvat, gung jvar jnf orsber uvz: naq V gbbx hc gur jvar,
naq tnir vg hagb gur xvat. Abj V unq abg orra orsbergvzr fnq va uvf
cerfrapr.

2:2 Jurersber gur xvat fnvq hagb zr, Jul vf gul pbhagranapr fnq,
frrvat gubh neg abg fvpx? guvf vf abguvat ryfr ohg fbeebj bs urneg.
Gura V jnf irel fber nsenvq, 2:3 Naq fnvq hagb gur xvat, Yrg gur xvat
yvir sbe rire: jul fubhyq abg zl pbhagranapr or fnq, jura gur pvgl,
gur cynpr bs zl snguref' frchypuerf, yvrgu jnfgr, naq gur tngrf
gurerbs ner pbafhzrq jvgu sver?  2:4 Gura gur xvat fnvq hagb zr, Sbe
jung qbfg gubh znxr erdhrfg? Fb V cenlrq gb gur Tbq bs urnira.

2:5 Naq V fnvq hagb gur xvat, Vs vg cyrnfr gur xvat, naq vs gul
freinag unir sbhaq snibhe va gul fvtug, gung gubh jbhyqrfg fraq zr
hagb Whqnu, hagb gur pvgl bs zl snguref' frchypuerf, gung V znl ohvyq
vg.

2:6 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb zr, (gur dhrra nyfb fvggvat ol uvz,) Sbe
ubj ybat funyy gul wbhearl or? naq jura jvyg gubh erghea? Fb vg
cyrnfrq gur xvat gb fraq zr; naq V frg uvz n gvzr.

2:7 Zberbire V fnvq hagb gur xvat, Vs vg cyrnfr gur xvat, yrg yrggref
or tvira zr gb gur tbireabef orlbaq gur evire, gung gurl znl pbairl zr
bire gvyy V pbzr vagb Whqnu; 2:8 Naq n yrggre hagb Nfncu gur xrrcre bs
gur xvat'f sberfg, gung ur znl tvir zr gvzore gb znxr ornzf sbe gur
tngrf bs gur cnynpr juvpu nccregnvarq gb gur ubhfr, naq sbe gur jnyy
bs gur pvgl, naq sbe gur ubhfr gung V funyy ragre vagb. Naq gur xvat
tenagrq zr, nppbeqvat gb gur tbbq unaq bs zl Tbq hcba zr.

2:9 Gura V pnzr gb gur tbireabef orlbaq gur evire, naq tnir gurz gur
xvat'f yrggref. Abj gur xvat unq frag pncgnvaf bs gur nezl naq
ubefrzra jvgu zr.

2:10 Jura Fnaonyyng gur Ubebavgr, naq Gbovnu gur freinag, gur
Nzzbavgr, urneq bs vg, vg tevrirq gurz rkprrqvatyl gung gurer jnf pbzr
n zna gb frrx gur jrysner bs gur puvyqera bs Vfenry.

2:11 Fb V pnzr gb Wrehfnyrz, naq jnf gurer guerr qnlf.

2:12 Naq V nebfr va gur avtug, V naq fbzr srj zra jvgu zr; arvgure
gbyq V nal zna jung zl Tbq unq chg va zl urneg gb qb ng Wrehfnyrz:
arvgure jnf gurer nal ornfg jvgu zr, fnir gur ornfg gung V ebqr hcba.

2:13 Naq V jrag bhg ol avtug ol gur tngr bs gur inyyrl, rira orsber
gur qentba jryy, naq gb gur qhat cbeg, naq ivrjrq gur jnyyf bs
Wrehfnyrz, juvpu jrer oebxra qbja, naq gur tngrf gurerbs jrer pbafhzrq
jvgu sver.

2:14 Gura V jrag ba gb gur tngr bs gur sbhagnva, naq gb gur xvat'f
cbby: ohg gurer jnf ab cynpr sbe gur ornfg gung jnf haqre zr gb cnff.

2:15 Gura jrag V hc va gur avtug ol gur oebbx, naq ivrjrq gur jnyy,
naq ghearq onpx, naq ragrerq ol gur tngr bs gur inyyrl, naq fb
erghearq.

2:16 Naq gur ehyref xarj abg juvgure V jrag, be jung V qvq; arvgure
unq V nf lrg gbyq vg gb gur Wrjf, abe gb gur cevrfgf, abe gb gur
aboyrf, abe gb gur ehyref, abe gb gur erfg gung qvq gur jbex.

2:17 Gura fnvq V hagb gurz, Lr frr gur qvfgerff gung jr ner va, ubj
Wrehfnyrz yvrgu jnfgr, naq gur tngrf gurerbs ner ohearq jvgu sver:
pbzr, naq yrg hf ohvyq hc gur jnyy bs Wrehfnyrz, gung jr or ab zber n
ercebnpu.

2:18 Gura V gbyq gurz bs gur unaq bs zl Tbq juvpu jnf tbbq hcba zr; nf
nyfb gur xvat'f jbeqf gung ur unq fcbxra hagb zr. Naq gurl fnvq, Yrg
hf evfr hc naq ohvyq. Fb gurl fgeratgurarq gurve unaqf sbe guvf tbbq
jbex.

2:19 Ohg jura Fnaonyyng gur Ubebavgr, naq Gbovnu gur freinag, gur
Nzzbavgr, naq Trfurz gur Nenovna, urneq vg, gurl ynhturq hf gb fpbea,
naq qrfcvfrq hf, naq fnvq, Jung vf guvf guvat gung lr qb? jvyy lr
erory ntnvafg gur xvat?  2:20 Gura nafjrerq V gurz, naq fnvq hagb
gurz, Gur Tbq bs urnira, ur jvyy cebfcre hf; gurersber jr uvf freinagf
jvyy nevfr naq ohvyq: ohg lr unir ab cbegvba, abe evtug, abe zrzbevny,
va Wrehfnyrz.

3:1 Gura Ryvnfuvo gur uvtu cevrfg ebfr hc jvgu uvf oerguera gur
cevrfgf, naq gurl ohvyqrq gur furrc tngr; gurl fnapgvsvrq vg, naq frg
hc gur qbbef bs vg; rira hagb gur gbjre bs Zrnu gurl fnapgvsvrq vg,
hagb gur gbjre bs Unanarry.

3:2 Naq arkg hagb uvz ohvyqrq gur zra bs Wrevpub. Naq arkg gb gurz
ohvyqrq Mnpphe gur fba bs Vzev.

3:3 Ohg gur svfu tngr qvq gur fbaf bs Unffrannu ohvyq, jub nyfb ynvq
gur ornzf gurerbs, naq frg hc gur qbbef gurerbs, gur ybpxf gurerbs,
naq gur onef gurerbs.

3:4 Naq arkg hagb gurz ercnverq Zrerzbgu gur fba bs Hevwnu, gur fba bs
Xbm. Naq arkg hagb gurz ercnverq Zrfuhyynz gur fba bs Orerpuvnu, gur
fba bs Zrfurmnorry. Naq arkg hagb gurz ercnverq Mnqbx gur fba bs
Onnan.

3:5 Naq arkg hagb gurz gur Grxbvgrf ercnverq; ohg gurve aboyrf chg abg
gurve arpxf gb gur jbex bs gurve YBEQ.

3:6 Zberbire gur byq tngr ercnverq Wrubvnqn gur fba bs Cnfrnu, naq
Zrfuhyynz gur fba bs Orfbqrvnu; gurl ynvq gur ornzf gurerbs, naq frg
hc gur qbbef gurerbs, naq gur ybpxf gurerbs, naq gur onef gurerbs.

3:7 Naq arkg hagb gurz ercnverq Zryngvnu gur Tvorbavgr, naq Wnqba gur
Zrebabguvgr, gur zra bs Tvorba, naq bs Zvmcnu, hagb gur guebar bs gur
tbireabe ba guvf fvqr gur evire.

3:8 Arkg hagb uvz ercnverq Hmmvry gur fba bs Uneunvnu, bs gur
tbyqfzvguf.

Arkg hagb uvz nyfb ercnverq Unanavnu gur fba bs bar bs gur
ncbgurpnevrf, naq gurl sbegvsvrq Wrehfnyrz hagb gur oebnq jnyy.

3:9 Naq arkg hagb gurz ercnverq Ercunvnu gur fba bs Uhe, gur ehyre bs
gur unys cneg bs Wrehfnyrz.

3:10 Naq arkg hagb gurz ercnverq Wrqnvnu gur fba bs Unehzncu, rira
bire ntnvafg uvf ubhfr. Naq arkg hagb uvz ercnverq Ungghfu gur fba bs
Unfunoavnu.

3:11 Znypuvwnu gur fba bs Unevz, naq Unfuho gur fba bs Cnunguzbno,
ercnverq gur bgure cvrpr, naq gur gbjre bs gur sheanprf.

3:12 Naq arkg hagb uvz ercnverq Funyyhz gur fba bs Unyburfu, gur ehyre
bs gur unys cneg bs Wrehfnyrz, ur naq uvf qnhtugref.

3:13 Gur inyyrl tngr ercnverq Unaha, naq gur vaunovgnagf bs Mnabnu;
gurl ohvyg vg, naq frg hc gur qbbef gurerbs, gur ybpxf gurerbs, naq
gur onef gurerbs, naq n gubhfnaq phovgf ba gur jnyy hagb gur qhat
tngr.

3:14 Ohg gur qhat tngr ercnverq Znypuvnu gur fba bs Erpuno, gur ehyre
bs cneg bs Orguunpprerz; ur ohvyg vg, naq frg hc gur qbbef gurerbs,
gur ybpxf gurerbs, naq gur onef gurerbs.

3:15 Ohg gur tngr bs gur sbhagnva ercnverq Funyyha gur fba bs
Pbyubmru, gur ehyre bs cneg bs Zvmcnu; ur ohvyg vg, naq pbirerq vg,
naq frg hc gur qbbef gurerbs, gur ybpxf gurerbs, naq gur onef gurerbs,
naq gur jnyy bs gur cbby bs Fvybnu ol gur xvat'f tneqra, naq hagb gur
fgnvef gung tb qbja sebz gur pvgl bs Qnivq.

3:16 Nsgre uvz ercnverq Arurzvnu gur fba bs Nmohx, gur ehyre bs gur
unys cneg bs Orgumhe, hagb gur cynpr bire ntnvafg gur frchypuerf bs
Qnivq, naq gb gur cbby gung jnf znqr, naq hagb gur ubhfr bs gur
zvtugl.

3:17 Nsgre uvz ercnverq gur Yrivgrf, Eruhz gur fba bs Onav. Arkg hagb
uvz ercnverq Unfunovnu, gur ehyre bs gur unys cneg bs Xrvynu, va uvf
cneg.

3:18 Nsgre uvz ercnverq gurve oerguera, Oninv gur fba bs Uranqnq, gur
ehyre bs gur unys cneg bs Xrvynu.

3:19 Naq arkg gb uvz ercnverq Rmre gur fba bs Wrfuhn, gur ehyre bs
Zvmcnu, nabgure cvrpr bire ntnvafg gur tbvat hc gb gur nezbhel ng gur
gheavat bs gur jnyy.

3:20 Nsgre uvz Onehpu gur fba bs Mnoonv rnearfgyl ercnverq gur bgure
cvrpr, sebz gur gheavat bs gur jnyy hagb gur qbbe bs gur ubhfr bs
Ryvnfuvo gur uvtu cevrfg.

3:21 Nsgre uvz ercnverq Zrerzbgu gur fba bs Hevwnu gur fba bs Xbm
nabgure cvrpr, sebz gur qbbe bs gur ubhfr bs Ryvnfuvo rira gb gur raq
bs gur ubhfr bs Ryvnfuvo.

3:22 Naq nsgre uvz ercnverq gur cevrfgf, gur zra bs gur cynva.

3:23 Nsgre uvz ercnverq Orawnzva naq Unfuho bire ntnvafg gurve ubhfr.

Nsgre uvz ercnverq Nmnevnu gur fba bs Znnfrvnu gur fba bs Nanavnu ol
uvf ubhfr.

3:24 Nsgre uvz ercnverq Ovaahv gur fba bs Uranqnq nabgure cvrpr, sebz
gur ubhfr bs Nmnevnu hagb gur gheavat bs gur jnyy, rira hagb gur
pbeare.

3:25 Cnyny gur fba bs Hmnv, bire ntnvafg gur gheavat bs gur jnyy, naq
gur gbjre juvpu yvrgu bhg sebz gur xvat'f uvtu ubhfr, gung jnf ol gur
pbheg bs gur cevfba. Nsgre uvz Crqnvnu gur fba bs Cnebfu.

3:26 Zberbire gur Arguvavzf qjryg va Bcury, hagb gur cynpr bire
ntnvafg gur jngre tngr gbjneq gur rnfg, naq gur gbjre gung yvrgu bhg.

3:27 Nsgre gurz gur Grxbvgrf ercnverq nabgure cvrpr, bire ntnvafg gur
terng gbjre gung yvrgu bhg, rira hagb gur jnyy bs Bcury.

3:28 Sebz nobir gur ubefr tngr ercnverq gur cevrfgf, rirel bar bire
ntnvafg uvf ubhfr.

3:29 Nsgre gurz ercnverq Mnqbx gur fba bs Vzzre bire ntnvafg uvf
ubhfr.

Nsgre uvz ercnverq nyfb Furznvnu gur fba bs Furpunavnu, gur xrrcre bs
gur rnfg tngr.

3:30 Nsgre uvz ercnverq Unanavnu gur fba bs Furyrzvnu, naq Unaha gur
fvkgu fba bs Mnyncu, nabgure cvrpr. Nsgre uvz ercnverq Zrfuhyynz gur
fba bs Orerpuvnu bire ntnvafg uvf punzore.

3:31 Nsgre uvz ercnverq Znypuvnu gur tbyqfzvgu'f fba hagb gur cynpr bs
gur Arguvavzf, naq bs gur zrepunagf, bire ntnvafg gur tngr Zvcuxnq,
naq gb gur tbvat hc bs gur pbeare.

3:32 Naq orgjrra gur tbvat hc bs gur pbeare hagb gur furrc tngr
ercnverq gur tbyqfzvguf naq gur zrepunagf.

4:1 Ohg vg pnzr gb cnff, gung jura Fnaonyyng urneq gung jr ohvyqrq gur
jnyy, ur jnf jebgu, naq gbbx terng vaqvtangvba, naq zbpxrq gur Wrjf.

4:2 Naq ur fcnxr orsber uvf oerguera naq gur nezl bs Fnznevn, naq
fnvq, Jung qb gurfr srroyr Wrjf? jvyy gurl sbegvsl gurzfryirf? jvyy
gurl fnpevsvpr?  jvyy gurl znxr na raq va n qnl? jvyy gurl erivir gur
fgbarf bhg bs gur urncf bs gur ehoovfu juvpu ner ohearq?  4:3 Abj
Gbovnu gur Nzzbavgr jnf ol uvz, naq ur fnvq, Rira gung juvpu gurl
ohvyq, vs n sbk tb hc, ur funyy rira oernx qbja gurve fgbar jnyy.

4:4 Urne, B bhe Tbq; sbe jr ner qrfcvfrq: naq ghea gurve ercebnpu hcba
gurve bja urnq, naq tvir gurz sbe n cerl va gur ynaq bs pncgvivgl: 4:5
Naq pbire abg gurve vavdhvgl, naq yrg abg gurve fva or oybggrq bhg
sebz orsber gurr: sbe gurl unir cebibxrq gurr gb natre orsber gur
ohvyqref.

4:6 Fb ohvyg jr gur jnyy; naq nyy gur jnyy jnf wbvarq gbtrgure hagb
gur unys gurerbs: sbe gur crbcyr unq n zvaq gb jbex.

4:7 Ohg vg pnzr gb cnff, gung jura Fnaonyyng, naq Gbovnu, naq gur
Nenovnaf, naq gur Nzzbavgrf, naq gur Nfuqbqvgrf, urneq gung gur jnyyf
bs Wrehfnyrz jrer znqr hc, naq gung gur oernpurf ortna gb or fgbccrq,
gura gurl jrer irel jebgu, 4:8 Naq pbafcverq nyy bs gurz gbtrgure gb
pbzr naq gb svtug ntnvafg Wrehfnyrz, naq gb uvaqre vg.

4:9 Arireguryrff jr znqr bhe cenlre hagb bhe Tbq, naq frg n jngpu
ntnvafg gurz qnl naq avtug, orpnhfr bs gurz.

4:10 Naq Whqnu fnvq, Gur fgeratgu bs gur orneref bs oheqraf vf
qrpnlrq, naq gurer vf zhpu ehoovfu; fb gung jr ner abg noyr gb ohvyq
gur jnyy.

4:11 Naq bhe nqirefnevrf fnvq, Gurl funyy abg xabj, arvgure frr, gvyy
jr pbzr va gur zvqfg nzbat gurz, naq fynl gurz, naq pnhfr gur jbex gb
prnfr.

4:12 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung jura gur Wrjf juvpu qjryg ol gurz pnzr,
gurl fnvq hagb hf gra gvzrf, Sebz nyy cynprf jurapr lr funyy erghea
hagb hf gurl jvyy or hcba lbh.

4:13 Gurersber frg V va gur ybjre cynprf oruvaq gur jnyy, naq ba gur
uvture cynprf, V rira frg gur crbcyr nsgre gurve snzvyvrf jvgu gurve
fjbeqf, gurve fcrnef, naq gurve objf.

4:14 Naq V ybbxrq, naq ebfr hc, naq fnvq hagb gur aboyrf, naq gb gur
ehyref, naq gb gur erfg bs gur crbcyr, Or abg lr nsenvq bs gurz:
erzrzore gur YBEQ, juvpu vf terng naq greevoyr, naq svtug sbe lbhe
oerguera, lbhe fbaf, naq lbhe qnhtugref, lbhe jvirf, naq lbhe ubhfrf.

4:15 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, jura bhe rarzvrf urneq gung vg jnf xabja
hagb hf, naq Tbq unq oebhtug gurve pbhafry gb abhtug, gung jr erghearq
nyy bs hf gb gur jnyy, rirel bar hagb uvf jbex.

4:16 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff sebz gung gvzr sbegu, gung gur unys bs zl
freinagf jebhtug va gur jbex, naq gur bgure unys bs gurz uryq obgu gur
fcrnef, gur fuvryqf, naq gur objf, naq gur unoretrbaf; naq gur ehyref
jrer oruvaq nyy gur ubhfr bs Whqnu.

4:17 Gurl juvpu ohvyqrq ba gur jnyy, naq gurl gung oner oheqraf, jvgu
gubfr gung ynqrq, rirel bar jvgu bar bs uvf unaqf jebhtug va gur jbex,
naq jvgu gur bgure unaq uryq n jrncba.

4:18 Sbe gur ohvyqref, rirel bar unq uvf fjbeq tveqrq ol uvf fvqr, naq
fb ohvyqrq. Naq ur gung fbhaqrq gur gehzcrg jnf ol zr.

4:19 Naq V fnvq hagb gur aboyrf, naq gb gur ehyref, naq gb gur erfg bs
gur crbcyr, Gur jbex vf terng naq ynetr, naq jr ner frcnengrq hcba gur
jnyy, bar sne sebz nabgure.

4:20 Va jung cynpr gurersber lr urne gur fbhaq bs gur gehzcrg, erfbeg
lr guvgure hagb hf: bhe Tbq funyy svtug sbe hf.

4:21 Fb jr ynobherq va gur jbex: naq unys bs gurz uryq gur fcrnef sebz
gur evfvat bs gur zbeavat gvyy gur fgnef nccrnerq.

4:22 Yvxrjvfr ng gur fnzr gvzr fnvq V hagb gur crbcyr, Yrg rirel bar
jvgu uvf freinag ybqtr jvguva Wrehfnyrz, gung va gur avtug gurl znl or
n thneq gb hf, naq ynobhe ba gur qnl.

4:23 Fb arvgure V, abe zl oerguera, abe zl freinagf, abe gur zra bs
gur thneq juvpu sbyybjrq zr, abar bs hf chg bss bhe pybgurf, fnivat
gung rirel bar chg gurz bss sbe jnfuvat.

5:1 Naq gurer jnf n terng pel bs gur crbcyr naq bs gurve jvirf ntnvafg
gurve oerguera gur Wrjf.

5:2 Sbe gurer jrer gung fnvq, Jr, bhe fbaf, naq bhe qnhtugref, ner
znal: gurersber jr gnxr hc pbea sbe gurz, gung jr znl rng, naq yvir.

5:3 Fbzr nyfb gurer jrer gung fnvq, Jr unir zbegtntrq bhe ynaqf,
ivarlneqf, naq ubhfrf, gung jr zvtug ohl pbea, orpnhfr bs gur qrnegu.

5:4 Gurer jrer nyfb gung fnvq, Jr unir obeebjrq zbarl sbe gur xvat'f
gevohgr, naq gung hcba bhe ynaqf naq ivarlneqf.

5:5 Lrg abj bhe syrfu vf nf gur syrfu bs bhe oerguera, bhe puvyqera nf
gurve puvyqera: naq, yb, jr oevat vagb obaqntr bhe fbaf naq bhe
qnhtugref gb or freinagf, naq fbzr bs bhe qnhtugref ner oebhtug hagb
obaqntr nyernql: arvgure vf vg va bhe cbjre gb erqrrz gurz; sbe bgure
zra unir bhe ynaqf naq ivarlneqf.

5:6 Naq V jnf irel natel jura V urneq gurve pel naq gurfr jbeqf.

5:7 Gura V pbafhygrq jvgu zlfrys, naq V erohxrq gur aboyrf, naq gur
ehyref, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Lr rknpg hfhel, rirel bar bs uvf oebgure.
Naq V frg n terng nffrzoyl ntnvafg gurz.

5:8 Naq V fnvq hagb gurz, Jr nsgre bhe novyvgl unir erqrrzrq bhe
oerguera gur Wrjf, juvpu jrer fbyq hagb gur urngura; naq jvyy lr rira
fryy lbhe oerguera? be funyy gurl or fbyq hagb hf? Gura uryq gurl
gurve crnpr, naq sbhaq abguvat gb nafjre.

5:9 Nyfb V fnvq, Vg vf abg tbbq gung lr qb: bhtug lr abg gb jnyx va
gur srne bs bhe Tbq orpnhfr bs gur ercebnpu bs gur urngura bhe
rarzvrf?  5:10 V yvxrjvfr, naq zl oerguera, naq zl freinagf, zvtug
rknpg bs gurz zbarl naq pbea: V cenl lbh, yrg hf yrnir bss guvf hfhel.

5:11 Erfgber, V cenl lbh, gb gurz, rira guvf qnl, gurve ynaqf, gurve
ivarlneqf, gurve byvirlneqf, naq gurve ubhfrf, nyfb gur uhaqerqgu cneg
bs gur zbarl, naq bs gur pbea, gur jvar, naq gur bvy, gung lr rknpg bs
gurz.

5:12 Gura fnvq gurl, Jr jvyy erfgber gurz, naq jvyy erdhver abguvat bs
gurz; fb jvyy jr qb nf gubh fnlrfg. Gura V pnyyrq gur cevrfgf, naq
gbbx na bngu bs gurz, gung gurl fubhyq qb nppbeqvat gb guvf cebzvfr.

5:13 Nyfb V fubbx zl ync, naq fnvq, Fb Tbq funxr bhg rirel zna sebz
uvf ubhfr, naq sebz uvf ynobhe, gung cresbezrgu abg guvf cebzvfr, rira
guhf or ur funxra bhg, naq rzcgvrq. Naq nyy gur pbatertngvba fnvq,
Nzra, naq cenvfrq gur YBEQ. Naq gur crbcyr qvq nppbeqvat gb guvf
cebzvfr.

5:14 Zberbire sebz gur gvzr gung V jnf nccbvagrq gb or gurve tbireabe
va gur ynaq bs Whqnu, sebz gur gjragvrgu lrne rira hagb gur gjb naq
guvegvrgu lrne bs Negnkrekrf gur xvat, gung vf, gjryir lrnef, V naq zl
oerguera unir abg rngra gur oernq bs gur tbireabe.

5:15 Ohg gur sbezre tbireabef gung unq orra orsber zr jrer punetrnoyr
hagb gur crbcyr, naq unq gnxra bs gurz oernq naq jvar, orfvqr sbegl
furxryf bs fvyire; lrn, rira gurve freinagf oner ehyr bire gur crbcyr:
ohg fb qvq abg V, orpnhfr bs gur srne bs Tbq.

5:16 Lrn, nyfb V pbagvahrq va gur jbex bs guvf jnyy, arvgure obhtug jr
nal ynaq: naq nyy zl freinagf jrer tngurerq guvgure hagb gur jbex.

5:17 Zberbire gurer jrer ng zl gnoyr na uhaqerq naq svsgl bs gur Wrjf
naq ehyref, orfvqr gubfr gung pnzr hagb hf sebz nzbat gur urngura gung
ner nobhg hf.

5:18 Abj gung juvpu jnf cercnerq sbe zr qnvyl jnf bar bk naq fvk
pubvpr furrc; nyfb sbjyf jrer cercnerq sbe zr, naq bapr va gra qnlf
fgber bs nyy fbegf bs jvar: lrg sbe nyy guvf erdhverq abg V gur oernq
bs gur tbireabe, orpnhfr gur obaqntr jnf urnil hcba guvf crbcyr.

5:19 Guvax hcba zr, zl Tbq, sbe tbbq, nppbeqvat gb nyy gung V unir
qbar sbe guvf crbcyr.

6:1 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff jura Fnaonyyng, naq Gbovnu, naq Trfurz gur
Nenovna, naq gur erfg bs bhe rarzvrf, urneq gung V unq ohvyqrq gur
jnyy, naq gung gurer jnf ab oernpu yrsg gurerva; (gubhtu ng gung gvzr
V unq abg frg hc gur qbbef hcba gur tngrf;) 6:2 Gung Fnaonyyng naq
Trfurz frag hagb zr, fnlvat, Pbzr, yrg hf zrrg gbtrgure va fbzr bar bs
gur ivyyntrf va gur cynva bs Bab. Ohg gurl gubhtug gb qb zr zvfpuvrs.

6:3 Naq V frag zrffratref hagb gurz, fnlvat, V nz qbvat n terng jbex,
fb gung V pnaabg pbzr qbja: jul fubhyq gur jbex prnfr, juvyfg V yrnir
vg, naq pbzr qbja gb lbh?  6:4 Lrg gurl frag hagb zr sbhe gvzrf nsgre
guvf fbeg; naq V nafjrerq gurz nsgre gur fnzr znaare.

6:5 Gura frag Fnaonyyng uvf freinag hagb zr va yvxr znaare gur svsgu
gvzr jvgu na bcra yrggre va uvf unaq; 6:6 Jurerva jnf jevggra, Vg vf
ercbegrq nzbat gur urngura, naq Tnfuzh fnvgu vg, gung gubh naq gur
Wrjf guvax gb erory: sbe juvpu pnhfr gubh ohvyqrfg gur jnyy, gung gubh
znlrfg or gurve xvat, nppbeqvat gb gurfr jbeqf.

6:7 Naq gubh unfg nyfb nccbvagrq cebcurgf gb cernpu bs gurr ng
Wrehfnyrz, fnlvat, Gurer vf n xvat va Whqnu: naq abj funyy vg or
ercbegrq gb gur xvat nppbeqvat gb gurfr jbeqf. Pbzr abj gurersber, naq
yrg hf gnxr pbhafry gbtrgure.

6:8 Gura V frag hagb uvz, fnlvat, Gurer ner ab fhpu guvatf qbar nf
gubh fnlrfg, ohg gubh srvtarfg gurz bhg bs guvar bja urneg.

6:9 Sbe gurl nyy znqr hf nsenvq, fnlvat, Gurve unaqf funyy or jrnxrarq
sebz gur jbex, gung vg or abg qbar. Abj gurersber, B Tbq, fgeratgura
zl unaqf.

6:10 Nsgrejneq V pnzr hagb gur ubhfr bs Furznvnu gur fba bs Qrynvnu
gur fba bs Zrurgnorry, jub jnf fuhg hc; naq ur fnvq, Yrg hf zrrg
gbtrgure va gur ubhfr bs Tbq, jvguva gur grzcyr, naq yrg hf fuhg gur
qbbef bs gur grzcyr: sbe gurl jvyy pbzr gb fynl gurr; lrn, va gur
avtug jvyy gurl pbzr gb fynl gurr.

6:11 Naq V fnvq, Fubhyq fhpu n zna nf V syrr? naq jub vf gurer, gung,
orvat nf V nz, jbhyq tb vagb gur grzcyr gb fnir uvf yvsr? V jvyy abg
tb va.

6:12 Naq, yb, V creprvirq gung Tbq unq abg frag uvz; ohg gung ur
cebabhaprq guvf cebcurpl ntnvafg zr: sbe Gbovnu naq Fnaonyyng unq
uverq uvz.

6:13 Gurersber jnf ur uverq, gung V fubhyq or nsenvq, naq qb fb, naq
fva, naq gung gurl zvtug unir znggre sbe na rivy ercbeg, gung gurl
zvtug ercebnpu zr.

6:14 Zl Tbq, guvax gubh hcba Gbovnu naq Fnaonyyng nppbeqvat gb gurfr
gurve jbexf, naq ba gur cebcurgrff Abnqvnu, naq gur erfg bs gur
cebcurgf, gung jbhyq unir chg zr va srne.

6:15 Fb gur jnyy jnf svavfurq va gur gjragl naq svsgu qnl bs gur zbagu
Ryhy, va svsgl naq gjb qnlf.

6:16 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung jura nyy bhe rarzvrf urneq gurerbs, naq
nyy gur urngura gung jrer nobhg hf fnj gurfr guvatf, gurl jrer zhpu
pnfg qbja va gurve bja rlrf: sbe gurl creprvirq gung guvf jbex jnf
jebhtug bs bhe Tbq.

6:17 Zberbire va gubfr qnlf gur aboyrf bs Whqnu frag znal yrggref hagb
Gbovnu, naq gur yrggref bs Gbovnu pnzr hagb gurz.

6:18 Sbe gurer jrer znal va Whqnu fjbea hagb uvz, orpnhfr ur jnf gur
fba va ynj bs Furpunavnu gur fba bs Nenu; naq uvf fba Wbunana unq
gnxra gur qnhtugre bs Zrfuhyynz gur fba bs Orerpuvnu.

6:19 Nyfb gurl ercbegrq uvf tbbq qrrqf orsber zr, naq hggrerq zl jbeqf
gb uvz. Naq Gbovnu frag yrggref gb chg zr va srne.

7:1 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur jnyy jnf ohvyg, naq V unq frg hc gur
qbbef, naq gur cbegref naq gur fvatref naq gur Yrivgrf jrer nccbvagrq,
7:2 Gung V tnir zl oebgure Unanav, naq Unanavnu gur ehyre bs gur
cnynpr, punetr bire Wrehfnyrz: sbe ur jnf n snvgushy zna, naq srnerq
Tbq nobir znal.

7:3 Naq V fnvq hagb gurz, Yrg abg gur tngrf bs Wrehfnyrz or bcrarq
hagvy gur fha or ubg; naq juvyr gurl fgnaq ol, yrg gurz fuhg gur
qbbef, naq one gurz: naq nccbvag jngpurf bs gur vaunovgnagf bs
Wrehfnyrz, rirel bar va uvf jngpu, naq rirel bar gb or bire ntnvafg
uvf ubhfr.

7:4 Abj gur pvgl jnf ynetr naq terng: ohg gur crbcyr jrer srj gurerva,
naq gur ubhfrf jrer abg ohvyqrq.

7:5 Naq zl Tbq chg vagb zvar urneg gb tngure gbtrgure gur aboyrf, naq
gur ehyref, naq gur crbcyr, gung gurl zvtug or erpxbarq ol trarnybtl.
Naq V sbhaq n ertvfgre bs gur trarnybtl bs gurz juvpu pnzr hc ng gur
svefg, naq sbhaq jevggra gurerva, 7:6 Gurfr ner gur puvyqera bs gur
cebivapr, gung jrag hc bhg bs gur pncgvivgl, bs gubfr gung unq orra
pneevrq njnl, jubz Arohpunqarmmne gur xvat bs Onolyba unq pneevrq
njnl, naq pnzr ntnva gb Wrehfnyrz naq gb Whqnu, rirel bar hagb uvf
pvgl; 7:7 Jub pnzr jvgu Mrehoonory, Wrfuhn, Arurzvnu, Nmnevnu,
Ennzvnu, Anunznav, Zbeqrpnv, Ovyfuna, Zvfcrergu, Ovtinv, Aruhz,
Onnanu. Gur ahzore, V fnl, bs gur zra bs gur crbcyr bs Vfenry jnf
guvf; 7:8 Gur puvyqera bs Cnebfu, gjb gubhfnaq na uhaqerq friragl naq
gjb.

7:9 Gur puvyqera bs Furcungvnu, guerr uhaqerq friragl naq gjb.

7:10 Gur puvyqera bs Nenu, fvk uhaqerq svsgl naq gjb.

7:11 Gur puvyqera bs Cnunguzbno, bs gur puvyqera bs Wrfuhn naq Wbno,
gjb gubhfnaq naq rvtug uhaqerq naq rvtugrra.

7:12 Gur puvyqera bs Rynz, n gubhfnaq gjb uhaqerq svsgl naq sbhe.

7:13 Gur puvyqera bs Mnggh, rvtug uhaqerq sbegl naq svir.

7:14 Gur puvyqera bs Mnppnv, frira uhaqerq naq guerrfpber.

7:15 Gur puvyqera bs Ovaahv, fvk uhaqerq sbegl naq rvtug.

7:16 Gur puvyqera bs Oronv, fvk uhaqerq gjragl naq rvtug.

7:17 Gur puvyqera bs Nmtnq, gjb gubhfnaq guerr uhaqerq gjragl naq gjb.

7:18 Gur puvyqera bs Nqbavxnz, fvk uhaqerq guerrfpber naq frira.

7:19 Gur puvyqera bs Ovtinv, gjb gubhfnaq guerrfpber naq frira.

7:20 Gur puvyqera bs Nqva, fvk uhaqerq svsgl naq svir.

7:21 Gur puvyqera bs Ngre bs Urmrxvnu, avargl naq rvtug.

7:22 Gur puvyqera bs Unfuhz, guerr uhaqerq gjragl naq rvtug.

7:23 Gur puvyqera bs Ormnv, guerr uhaqerq gjragl naq sbhe.

7:24 Gur puvyqera bs Unevcu, na uhaqerq naq gjryir.

7:25 Gur puvyqera bs Tvorba, avargl naq svir.

7:26 Gur zra bs Orguyrurz naq Argbcunu, na uhaqerq sbhefpber naq
rvtug.

7:27 Gur zra bs Nangubgu, na uhaqerq gjragl naq rvtug.

7:28 Gur zra bs Orgunmznirgu, sbegl naq gjb.

7:29 Gur zra bs Xvewnguwrnevz, Purcuvenu, naq Orrebgu, frira uhaqerq
sbegl naq guerr.

7:30 Gur zra bs Enznu naq Tnon, fvk uhaqerq gjragl naq bar.

7:31 Gur zra bs Zvpuznf, na uhaqerq naq gjragl naq gjb.

7:32 Gur zra bs Orgury naq Nv, na uhaqerq gjragl naq guerr.

7:33 Gur zra bs gur bgure Arob, svsgl naq gjb.

7:34 Gur puvyqera bs gur bgure Rynz, n gubhfnaq gjb uhaqerq svsgl naq
sbhe.

7:35 Gur puvyqera bs Unevz, guerr uhaqerq naq gjragl.

7:36 Gur puvyqera bs Wrevpub, guerr uhaqerq sbegl naq svir.

7:37 Gur puvyqera bs Ybq, Unqvq, naq Bab, frira uhaqerq gjragl naq
bar.

7:38 Gur puvyqera bs Frannu, guerr gubhfnaq avar uhaqerq naq guvegl.

7:39 Gur cevrfgf: gur puvyqera bs Wrqnvnu, bs gur ubhfr bs Wrfuhn,
avar uhaqerq friragl naq guerr.

7:40 Gur puvyqera bs Vzzre, n gubhfnaq svsgl naq gjb.

7:41 Gur puvyqera bs Cnfuhe, n gubhfnaq gjb uhaqerq sbegl naq frira.

7:42 Gur puvyqera bs Unevz, n gubhfnaq naq friragrra.

7:43 Gur Yrivgrf: gur puvyqera bs Wrfuhn, bs Xnqzvry, naq bs gur
puvyqera bs Ubqrinu, friragl naq sbhe.

7:44 Gur fvatref: gur puvyqera bs Nfncu, na uhaqerq sbegl naq rvtug.

7:45 Gur cbegref: gur puvyqera bs Funyyhz, gur puvyqera bs Ngre, gur
puvyqera bs Gnyzba, gur puvyqera bs Nxxho, gur puvyqera bs Ungvgn, gur
puvyqera bs Fubonv, na uhaqerq guvegl naq rvtug.

7:46 Gur Arguvavzf: gur puvyqera bs Mvun, gur puvyqera bs Unfuhcun,
gur puvyqera bs Gnoonbgu, 7:47 Gur puvyqera bs Xrebf, gur puvyqera bs
Fvn, gur puvyqera bs Cnqba, 7:48 Gur puvyqera bs Yronan, gur puvyqera
bs Untnon, gur puvyqera bs Funyznv, 7:49 Gur puvyqera bs Unana, gur
puvyqera bs Tvqqry, gur puvyqera bs Tnune, 7:50 Gur puvyqera bs
Ernvnu, gur puvyqera bs Ermva, gur puvyqera bs Arxbqn, 7:51 Gur
puvyqera bs Tnmmnz, gur puvyqera bs Hmmn, gur puvyqera bs Cunfrnu,
7:52 Gur puvyqera bs Orfnv, gur puvyqera bs Zrhavz, gur puvyqera bs
Arcuvfurfvz, 7:53 Gur puvyqera bs Onxohx, gur puvyqera bs Unxhcun, gur
puvyqera bs Uneuhe, 7:54 Gur puvyqera bs Onmyvgu, gur puvyqera bs
Zruvqn, gur puvyqera bs Unefun, 7:55 Gur puvyqera bs Onexbf, gur
puvyqera bs Fvfren, gur puvyqera bs Gnznu, 7:56 Gur puvyqera bs
Armvnu, gur puvyqera bs Ungvcun.

7:57 Gur puvyqera bs Fbybzba'f freinagf: gur puvyqera bs Fbgnv, gur
puvyqera bs Fbcurergu, gur puvyqera bs Crevqn, 7:58 Gur puvyqera bs
Wnnyn, gur puvyqera bs Qnexba, gur puvyqera bs Tvqqry, 7:59 Gur
puvyqera bs Furcungvnu, gur puvyqera bs Unggvy, gur puvyqera bs
Cbpurergu bs Mronvz, gur puvyqera bs Nzba.

7:60 Nyy gur Arguvavzf, naq gur puvyqera bs Fbybzba'f freinagf, jrer
guerr uhaqerq avargl naq gjb.

7:61 Naq gurfr jrer gurl juvpu jrag hc nyfb sebz Gryzrynu, Gryunerfun,
Pureho, Nqqba, naq Vzzre: ohg gurl pbhyq abg furj gurve sngure'f
ubhfr, abe gurve frrq, jurgure gurl jrer bs Vfenry.

7:62 Gur puvyqera bs Qrynvnu, gur puvyqera bs Gbovnu, gur puvyqera bs
Arxbqn, fvk uhaqerq sbegl naq gjb.

7:63 Naq bs gur cevrfgf: gur puvyqera bs Unonvnu, gur puvyqera bs Xbm,
gur puvyqera bs Onemvyynv, juvpu gbbx bar bs gur qnhtugref bs
Onemvyynv gur Tvyrnqvgr gb jvsr, naq jnf pnyyrq nsgre gurve anzr.

7:64 Gurfr fbhtug gurve ertvfgre nzbat gubfr gung jrer erpxbarq ol
trarnybtl, ohg vg jnf abg sbhaq: gurersber jrer gurl, nf cbyyhgrq, chg
sebz gur cevrfgubbq.

7:65 Naq gur Gvefungun fnvq hagb gurz, gung gurl fubhyq abg rng bs gur
zbfg ubyl guvatf, gvyy gurer fgbbq hc n cevrfg jvgu Hevz naq Guhzzvz.

7:66 Gur jubyr pbatertngvba gbtrgure jnf sbegl naq gjb gubhfnaq guerr
uhaqerq naq guerrfpber, 7:67 Orfvqr gurve znafreinagf naq gurve
znvqfreinagf, bs jubz gurer jrer frira gubhfnaq guerr uhaqerq guvegl
naq frira: naq gurl unq gjb uhaqerq sbegl naq svir fvatvat zra naq
fvatvat jbzra.

7:68 Gurve ubefrf, frira uhaqerq guvegl naq fvk: gurve zhyrf, gjb
uhaqerq sbegl naq svir: 7:69 Gurve pnzryf, sbhe uhaqerq guvegl naq
svir: fvk gubhfnaq frira uhaqerq naq gjragl nffrf.

7:70 Naq fbzr bs gur puvrs bs gur snguref tnir hagb gur jbex. Gur
Gvefungun tnir gb gur gernfher n gubhfnaq qenzf bs tbyq, svsgl onfbaf,
svir uhaqerq naq guvegl cevrfgf' tnezragf.

7:71 Naq fbzr bs gur puvrs bs gur snguref tnir gb gur gernfher bs gur
jbex gjragl gubhfnaq qenzf bs tbyq, naq gjb gubhfnaq naq gjb uhaqerq
cbhaq bs fvyire.

7:72 Naq gung juvpu gur erfg bs gur crbcyr tnir jnf gjragl gubhfnaq
qenzf bs tbyq, naq gjb gubhfnaq cbhaq bs fvyire, naq guerrfpber naq
frira cevrfgf' tnezragf.

7:73 Fb gur cevrfgf, naq gur Yrivgrf, naq gur cbegref, naq gur
fvatref, naq fbzr bs gur crbcyr, naq gur Arguvavzf, naq nyy Vfenry,
qjryg va gurve pvgvrf; naq jura gur friragu zbagu pnzr, gur puvyqera
bs Vfenry jrer va gurve pvgvrf.

8:1 Naq nyy gur crbcyr tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure nf bar zna vagb
gur fgerrg gung jnf orsber gur jngre tngr; naq gurl fcnxr hagb Rmen
gur fpevor gb oevat gur obbx bs gur ynj bs Zbfrf, juvpu gur YBEQ unq
pbzznaqrq gb Vfenry.

8:2 Naq Rmen gur cevrfg oebhtug gur ynj orsber gur pbatertngvba obgu
bs zra naq jbzra, naq nyy gung pbhyq urne jvgu haqrefgnaqvat, hcba gur
svefg qnl bs gur friragu zbagu.

8:3 Naq ur ernq gurerva orsber gur fgerrg gung jnf orsber gur jngre
tngr sebz gur zbeavat hagvy zvqqnl, orsber gur zra naq gur jbzra, naq
gubfr gung pbhyq haqrefgnaq; naq gur rnef bs nyy gur crbcyr jrer
nggragvir hagb gur obbx bs gur ynj.

8:4 Naq Rmen gur fpevor fgbbq hcba n chycvg bs jbbq, juvpu gurl unq
znqr sbe gur checbfr; naq orfvqr uvz fgbbq Znggvguvnu, naq Furzn, naq
Nanvnu, naq Hevwnu, naq Uvyxvnu, naq Znnfrvnu, ba uvf evtug unaq; naq
ba uvf yrsg unaq, Crqnvnu, naq Zvfunry, naq Znypuvnu, naq Unfuhz, naq
Unfuonqnan, Mrpunevnu, naq Zrfuhyynz.

8:5 Naq Rmen bcrarq gur obbx va gur fvtug bs nyy gur crbcyr; (sbe ur
jnf nobir nyy gur crbcyr;) naq jura ur bcrarq vg, nyy gur crbcyr fgbbq
hc: 8:6 Naq Rmen oyrffrq gur YBEQ, gur terng Tbq. Naq nyy gur crbcyr
nafjrerq, Nzra, Nzra, jvgu yvsgvat hc gurve unaqf: naq gurl objrq
gurve urnqf, naq jbefuvccrq gur YBEQ jvgu gurve snprf gb gur tebhaq.

8:7 Nyfb Wrfuhn, naq Onav, naq Furerovnu, Wnzva, Nxxho, Funoorgunv,
Ubqvwnu, Znnfrvnu, Xryvgn, Nmnevnu, Wbmnonq, Unana, Crynvnu, naq gur
Yrivgrf, pnhfrq gur crbcyr gb haqrefgnaq gur ynj: naq gur crbcyr fgbbq
va gurve cynpr.

8:8 Fb gurl ernq va gur obbx va gur ynj bs Tbq qvfgvapgyl, naq tnir
gur frafr, naq pnhfrq gurz gb haqrefgnaq gur ernqvat.

8:9 Naq Arurzvnu, juvpu vf gur Gvefungun, naq Rmen gur cevrfg gur
fpevor, naq gur Yrivgrf gung gnhtug gur crbcyr, fnvq hagb nyy gur
crbcyr, Guvf qnl vf ubyl hagb gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq; zbhea abg, abe jrrc.
Sbe nyy gur crbcyr jrcg, jura gurl urneq gur jbeqf bs gur ynj.

8:10 Gura ur fnvq hagb gurz, Tb lbhe jnl, rng gur sng, naq qevax gur
fjrrg, naq fraq cbegvbaf hagb gurz sbe jubz abguvat vf cercnerq: sbe
guvf qnl vf ubyl hagb bhe YBEQ: arvgure or lr fbeel; sbe gur wbl bs
gur YBEQ vf lbhe fgeratgu.

8:11 Fb gur Yrivgrf fgvyyrq nyy gur crbcyr, fnlvat, Ubyq lbhe crnpr,
sbe gur qnl vf ubyl; arvgure or lr tevrirq.

8:12 Naq nyy gur crbcyr jrag gurve jnl gb rng, naq gb qevax, naq gb
fraq cbegvbaf, naq gb znxr terng zvegu, orpnhfr gurl unq haqrefgbbq
gur jbeqf gung jrer qrpynerq hagb gurz.

8:13 Naq ba gur frpbaq qnl jrer tngurerq gbtrgure gur puvrs bs gur
snguref bs nyy gur crbcyr, gur cevrfgf, naq gur Yrivgrf, hagb Rmen gur
fpevor, rira gb haqrefgnaq gur jbeqf bs gur ynj.

8:14 Naq gurl sbhaq jevggra va gur ynj juvpu gur YBEQ unq pbzznaqrq ol
Zbfrf, gung gur puvyqera bs Vfenry fubhyq qjryy va obbguf va gur srnfg
bs gur friragu zbagu: 8:15 Naq gung gurl fubhyq choyvfu naq cebpynvz
va nyy gurve pvgvrf, naq va Wrehfnyrz, fnlvat, Tb sbegu hagb gur
zbhag, naq srgpu byvir oenapurf, naq cvar oenapurf, naq zlegyr
oenapurf, naq cnyz oenapurf, naq oenapurf bs guvpx gerrf, gb znxr
obbguf, nf vg vf jevggra.

8:16 Fb gur crbcyr jrag sbegu, naq oebhtug gurz, naq znqr gurzfryirf
obbguf, rirel bar hcba gur ebbs bs uvf ubhfr, naq va gurve pbhegf, naq
va gur pbhegf bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq, naq va gur fgerrg bs gur jngre
tngr, naq va gur fgerrg bs gur tngr bs Rcuenvz.

8:17 Naq nyy gur pbatertngvba bs gurz gung jrer pbzr ntnva bhg bs gur
pncgvivgl znqr obbguf, naq fng haqre gur obbguf: sbe fvapr gur qnlf bs
Wrfuhn gur fba bs Aha hagb gung qnl unq abg gur puvyqera bs Vfenry
qbar fb. Naq gurer jnf irel terng tynqarff.

8:18 Nyfb qnl ol qnl, sebz gur svefg qnl hagb gur ynfg qnl, ur ernq va
gur obbx bs gur ynj bs Tbq. Naq gurl xrcg gur srnfg frira qnlf; naq ba
gur rvtugu qnl jnf n fbyrza nffrzoyl, nppbeqvat hagb gur znaare.

9:1 Abj va gur gjragl naq sbhegu qnl bs guvf zbagu gur puvyqera bs
Vfenry jrer nffrzoyrq jvgu snfgvat, naq jvgu fnpxpybgurf, naq rnegu
hcba gurz.

9:2 Naq gur frrq bs Vfenry frcnengrq gurzfryirf sebz nyy fgenatref,
naq fgbbq naq pbasrffrq gurve fvaf, naq gur vavdhvgvrf bs gurve
snguref.

9:3 Naq gurl fgbbq hc va gurve cynpr, naq ernq va gur obbx bs gur ynj
bs gur YBEQ gurve Tbq bar sbhegu cneg bs gur qnl; naq nabgure sbhegu
cneg gurl pbasrffrq, naq jbefuvccrq gur YBEQ gurve Tbq.

9:4 Gura fgbbq hc hcba gur fgnvef, bs gur Yrivgrf, Wrfuhn, naq Onav,
Xnqzvry, Furonavnu, Ohaav, Furerovnu, Onav, naq Puranav, naq pevrq
jvgu n ybhq ibvpr hagb gur YBEQ gurve Tbq.

9:5 Gura gur Yrivgrf, Wrfuhn, naq Xnqzvry, Onav, Unfunoavnu,
Furerovnu, Ubqvwnu, Furonavnu, naq Crgunuvnu, fnvq, Fgnaq hc naq oyrff
gur YBEQ lbhe Tbq sbe rire naq rire: naq oyrffrq or gul tybevbhf anzr,
juvpu vf rknygrq nobir nyy oyrffvat naq cenvfr.

9:6 Gubh, rira gubh, neg YBEQ nybar; gubh unfg znqr urnira, gur urnira
bs urniraf, jvgu nyy gurve ubfg, gur rnegu, naq nyy guvatf gung ner
gurerva, gur frnf, naq nyy gung vf gurerva, naq gubh cerfreirfg gurz
nyy; naq gur ubfg bs urnira jbefuvccrgu gurr.

9:7 Gubh neg gur YBEQ gur Tbq, jub qvqfg pubbfr Noenz, naq oebhtugrfg
uvz sbegu bhg bs He bs gur Punyqrrf, naq tnirfg uvz gur anzr bs
Noenunz; 9:8 Naq sbhaqrfg uvf urneg snvgushy orsber gurr, naq znqrfg n
pbiranag jvgu uvz gb tvir gur ynaq bs gur Pnannavgrf, gur Uvggvgrf,
gur Nzbevgrf, naq gur Crevmmvgrf, naq gur Wrohfvgrf, naq gur
Tvetnfuvgrf, gb tvir vg, V fnl, gb uvf frrq, naq unfg cresbezrq gul
jbeqf; sbe gubh neg evtugrbhf: 9:9 Naq qvqfg frr gur nssyvpgvba bs bhe
snguref va Rtlcg, naq urneqrfg gurve pel ol gur Erq frn; 9:10 Naq
furjrqfg fvtaf naq jbaqref hcba Cunenbu, naq ba nyy uvf freinagf, naq
ba nyy gur crbcyr bs uvf ynaq: sbe gubh xarjrfg gung gurl qrnyg
cebhqyl ntnvafg gurz. Fb qvqfg gubh trg gurr n anzr, nf vg vf guvf
qnl.

9:11 Naq gubh qvqfg qvivqr gur frn orsber gurz, fb gung gurl jrag
guebhtu gur zvqfg bs gur frn ba gur qel ynaq; naq gurve crefrphgbef
gubh guerjrfg vagb gur qrrcf, nf n fgbar vagb gur zvtugl jngref.

9:12 Zberbire gubh yrqqrfg gurz va gur qnl ol n pybhql cvyyne; naq va
gur avtug ol n cvyyne bs sver, gb tvir gurz yvtug va gur jnl jurerva
gurl fubhyq tb.

9:13 Gubh pnzrfg qbja nyfb hcba zbhag Fvanv, naq fcnxrfg jvgu gurz
sebz urnira, naq tnirfg gurz evtug whqtzragf, naq gehr ynjf, tbbq
fgnghgrf naq pbzznaqzragf: 9:14 Naq znqrfg xabja hagb gurz gul ubyl
fnoongu, naq pbzznaqrqfg gurz cerprcgf, fgnghgrf, naq ynjf, ol gur
unaq bs Zbfrf gul freinag: 9:15 Naq tnirfg gurz oernq sebz urnira sbe
gurve uhatre, naq oebhtugrfg sbegu jngre sbe gurz bhg bs gur ebpx sbe
gurve guvefg, naq cebzvfrqfg gurz gung gurl fubhyq tb va gb cbffrff
gur ynaq juvpu gubh unqfg fjbea gb tvir gurz.

9:16 Ohg gurl naq bhe snguref qrnyg cebhqyl, naq uneqrarq gurve arpxf,
naq urnexrarq abg gb gul pbzznaqzragf, 9:17 Naq ershfrq gb borl,
arvgure jrer zvaqshy bs gul jbaqref gung gubh qvqfg nzbat gurz; ohg
uneqrarq gurve arpxf, naq va gurve eroryyvba nccbvagrq n pncgnva gb
erghea gb gurve obaqntr: ohg gubh neg n Tbq ernql gb cneqba, tenpvbhf
naq zrepvshy, fybj gb natre, naq bs terng xvaqarff, naq sbefbbxrfg
gurz abg.

9:18 Lrn, jura gurl unq znqr gurz n zbygra pnys, naq fnvq, Guvf vf gul
Tbq gung oebhtug gurr hc bhg bs Rtlcg, naq unq jebhtug terng
cebibpngvbaf; 9:19 Lrg gubh va gul znavsbyq zrepvrf sbefbbxrfg gurz
abg va gur jvyqrearff: gur cvyyne bs gur pybhq qrcnegrq abg sebz gurz
ol qnl, gb yrnq gurz va gur jnl; arvgure gur cvyyne bs sver ol avtug,
gb furj gurz yvtug, naq gur jnl jurerva gurl fubhyq tb.

9:20 Gubh tnirfg nyfb gul tbbq fcvevg gb vafgehpg gurz, naq
jvguuryqrfg abg gul znaan sebz gurve zbhgu, naq tnirfg gurz jngre sbe
gurve guvefg.

9:21 Lrn, sbegl lrnef qvqfg gubh fhfgnva gurz va gur jvyqrearff, fb
gung gurl ynpxrq abguvat; gurve pybgurf jnkrq abg byq, naq gurve srrg
fjryyrq abg.

9:22 Zberbire gubh tnirfg gurz xvatqbzf naq angvbaf, naq qvqfg qvivqr
gurz vagb pbearef: fb gurl cbffrffrq gur ynaq bs Fvuba, naq gur ynaq
bs gur xvat bs Urfuoba, naq gur ynaq bs Bt xvat bs Onfuna.

9:23 Gurve puvyqera nyfb zhygvcyvrqfg gubh nf gur fgnef bs urnira, naq
oebhtugrfg gurz vagb gur ynaq, pbapreavat juvpu gubh unqfg cebzvfrq gb
gurve snguref, gung gurl fubhyq tb va gb cbffrff vg.

9:24 Fb gur puvyqera jrag va naq cbffrffrq gur ynaq, naq gubh
fhoqhrqfg orsber gurz gur vaunovgnagf bs gur ynaq, gur Pnannavgrf, naq
tnirfg gurz vagb gurve unaqf, jvgu gurve xvatf, naq gur crbcyr bs gur
ynaq, gung gurl zvtug qb jvgu gurz nf gurl jbhyq.

9:25 Naq gurl gbbx fgebat pvgvrf, naq n sng ynaq, naq cbffrffrq ubhfrf
shyy bs nyy tbbqf, jryyf qvttrq, ivarlneqf, naq byvirlneqf, naq sehvg
gerrf va nohaqnapr: fb gurl qvq rng, naq jrer svyyrq, naq orpnzr sng,
naq qryvtugrq gurzfryirf va gul terng tbbqarff.

9:26 Arireguryrff gurl jrer qvfborqvrag, naq eroryyrq ntnvafg gurr,
naq pnfg gul ynj oruvaq gurve onpxf, naq fyrj gul cebcurgf juvpu
grfgvsvrq ntnvafg gurz gb ghea gurz gb gurr, naq gurl jebhtug terng
cebibpngvbaf.

9:27 Gurersber gubh qryvirerqfg gurz vagb gur unaq bs gurve rarzvrf,
jub irkrq gurz: naq va gur gvzr bs gurve gebhoyr, jura gurl pevrq hagb
gurr, gubh urneqrfg gurz sebz urnira; naq nppbeqvat gb gul znavsbyq
zrepvrf gubh tnirfg gurz fnivbhef, jub fnirq gurz bhg bs gur unaq bs
gurve rarzvrf.

9:28 Ohg nsgre gurl unq erfg, gurl qvq rivy ntnva orsber gurr:
gurersber yrsgrfg gubh gurz va gur ynaq bs gurve rarzvrf, fb gung gurl
unq gur qbzvavba bire gurz: lrg jura gurl erghearq, naq pevrq hagb
gurr, gubh urneqrfg gurz sebz urnira; naq znal gvzrf qvqfg gubh
qryvire gurz nppbeqvat gb gul zrepvrf; 9:29 Naq grfgvsvrqfg ntnvafg
gurz, gung gubh zvtugrfg oevat gurz ntnva hagb gul ynj: lrg gurl qrnyg
cebhqyl, naq urnexrarq abg hagb gul pbzznaqzragf, ohg fvaarq ntnvafg
gul whqtzragf, (juvpu vs n zna qb, ur funyy yvir va gurz;) naq
jvguqerj gur fubhyqre, naq uneqrarq gurve arpx, naq jbhyq abg urne.

9:30 Lrg znal lrnef qvqfg gubh sbeorne gurz, naq grfgvsvrqfg ntnvafg
gurz ol gul fcvevg va gul cebcurgf: lrg jbhyq gurl abg tvir rne:
gurersber tnirfg gubh gurz vagb gur unaq bs gur crbcyr bs gur ynaqf.

9:31 Arireguryrff sbe gul terng zrepvrf' fnxr gubh qvqfg abg hggreyl
pbafhzr gurz, abe sbefnxr gurz; sbe gubh neg n tenpvbhf naq zrepvshy
Tbq.

9:32 Abj gurersber, bhe Tbq, gur terng, gur zvtugl, naq gur greevoyr
Tbq, jub xrrcrfg pbiranag naq zrepl, yrg abg nyy gur gebhoyr frrz
yvggyr orsber gurr, gung ungu pbzr hcba hf, ba bhe xvatf, ba bhe
cevaprf, naq ba bhe cevrfgf, naq ba bhe cebcurgf, naq ba bhe snguref,
naq ba nyy gul crbcyr, fvapr gur gvzr bs gur xvatf bs Nfflevn hagb
guvf qnl.

9:33 Ubjorvg gubh neg whfg va nyy gung vf oebhtug hcba hf; sbe gubh
unfg qbar evtug, ohg jr unir qbar jvpxrqyl: 9:34 Arvgure unir bhe
xvatf, bhe cevaprf, bhe cevrfgf, abe bhe snguref, xrcg gul ynj, abe
urnexrarq hagb gul pbzznaqzragf naq gul grfgvzbavrf, jurerjvgu gubh
qvqfg grfgvsl ntnvafg gurz.

9:35 Sbe gurl unir abg freirq gurr va gurve xvatqbz, naq va gul terng
tbbqarff gung gubh tnirfg gurz, naq va gur ynetr naq sng ynaq juvpu
gubh tnirfg orsber gurz, arvgure ghearq gurl sebz gurve jvpxrq jbexf.

9:36 Orubyq, jr ner freinagf guvf qnl, naq sbe gur ynaq gung gubh
tnirfg hagb bhe snguref gb rng gur sehvg gurerbs naq gur tbbq gurerbs,
orubyq, jr ner freinagf va vg: 9:37 Naq vg lvryqrgu zhpu vapernfr hagb
gur xvatf jubz gubh unfg frg bire hf orpnhfr bs bhe fvaf: nyfb gurl
unir qbzvavba bire bhe obqvrf, naq bire bhe pnggyr, ng gurve cyrnfher,
naq jr ner va terng qvfgerff.

9:38 Naq orpnhfr bs nyy guvf jr znxr n fher pbiranag, naq jevgr vg;
naq bhe cevaprf, Yrivgrf, naq cevrfgf, frny hagb vg.

10:1 Abj gubfr gung frnyrq jrer, Arurzvnu, gur Gvefungun, gur fba bs
Unpunyvnu, naq Mvqxvwnu, 10:2 Frenvnu, Nmnevnu, Wrerzvnu, 10:3 Cnfuhe,
Nznevnu, Znypuvwnu, 10:4 Ungghfu, Furonavnu, Znyyhpu, 10:5 Unevz,
Zrerzbgu, Bonqvnu, 10:6 Qnavry, Tvaarguba, Onehpu, 10:7 Zrfuhyynz,
Novwnu, Zvwnzva, 10:8 Znnmvnu, Ovytnv, Furznvnu: gurfr jrer gur
cevrfgf.

10:9 Naq gur Yrivgrf: obgu Wrfuhn gur fba bs Nmnavnu, Ovaahv bs gur
fbaf bs Uranqnq, Xnqzvry; 10:10 Naq gurve oerguera, Furonavnu,
Ubqvwnu, Xryvgn, Crynvnu, Unana, 10:11 Zvpun, Erubo, Unfunovnu, 10:12
Mnpphe, Furerovnu, Furonavnu, 10:13 Ubqvwnu, Onav, Oravah.

10:14 Gur puvrs bs gur crbcyr; Cnebfu, Cnunguzbno, Rynz, Mngguh, Onav,
10:15 Ohaav, Nmtnq, Oronv, 10:16 Nqbavwnu, Ovtinv, Nqva, 10:17 Ngre,
Uvmxvwnu, Nmmhe, 10:18 Ubqvwnu, Unfuhz, Ormnv, 10:19 Unevcu, Nangubgu,
Aronv, 10:20 Zntcvnfu, Zrfuhyynz, Urmve, 10:21 Zrfurmnorry, Mnqbx,
Wnqqhn, 10:22 Cryngvnu, Unana, Nanvnu, 10:23 Ubfurn, Unanavnu, Unfuho,
10:24 Unyyburfu, Cvyrun, Fuborx, 10:25 Eruhz, Unfunoanu, Znnfrvnu,
10:26 Naq Nuvwnu, Unana, Nana, 10:27 Znyyhpu, Unevz, Onnanu.

10:28 Naq gur erfg bs gur crbcyr, gur cevrfgf, gur Yrivgrf, gur
cbegref, gur fvatref, gur Arguvavzf, naq nyy gurl gung unq frcnengrq
gurzfryirf sebz gur crbcyr bs gur ynaqf hagb gur ynj bs Tbq, gurve
jvirf, gurve fbaf, naq gurve qnhtugref, rirel bar univat xabjyrqtr,
naq univat haqrefgnaqvat; 10:29 Gurl pynir gb gurve oerguera, gurve
aboyrf, naq ragrerq vagb n phefr, naq vagb na bngu, gb jnyx va Tbq'f
ynj, juvpu jnf tvira ol Zbfrf gur freinag bs Tbq, naq gb bofreir naq
qb nyy gur pbzznaqzragf bs gur YBEQ bhe Ybeq, naq uvf whqtzragf naq
uvf fgnghgrf; 10:30 Naq gung jr jbhyq abg tvir bhe qnhtugref hagb gur
crbcyr bs gur ynaq, abg gnxr gurve qnhtugref sbe bhe fbaf: 10:31 Naq
vs gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq oevat jner be nal ivpghnyf ba gur fnoongu
qnl gb fryy, gung jr jbhyq abg ohl vg bs gurz ba gur fnoongu, be ba
gur ubyl qnl: naq gung jr jbhyq yrnir gur friragu lrne, naq gur
rknpgvba bs rirel qrog.

10:32 Nyfb jr znqr beqvanaprf sbe hf, gb punetr bhefryirf lrneyl jvgu
gur guveq cneg bs n furxry sbe gur freivpr bs gur ubhfr bs bhe Tbq;
10:33 Sbe gur furjoernq, naq sbe gur pbagvahny zrng bssrevat, naq sbe
gur pbagvahny oheag bssrevat, bs gur fnoonguf, bs gur arj zbbaf, sbe
gur frg srnfgf, naq sbe gur ubyl guvatf, naq sbe gur fva bssrevatf gb
znxr na ngbarzrag sbe Vfenry, naq sbe nyy gur jbex bs gur ubhfr bs bhe
Tbq.

10:34 Naq jr pnfg gur ybgf nzbat gur cevrfgf, gur Yrivgrf, naq gur
crbcyr, sbe gur jbbq bssrevat, gb oevat vg vagb gur ubhfr bs bhe Tbq,
nsgre gur ubhfrf bs bhe snguref, ng gvzrf nccbvagrq lrne ol lrne, gb
ohea hcba gur nygne bs gur YBEQ bhe Tbq, nf vg vf jevggra va gur ynj:
10:35 Naq gb oevat gur svefgsehvgf bs bhe tebhaq, naq gur svefgsehvgf
bs nyy sehvg bs nyy gerrf, lrne ol lrne, hagb gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ:
10:36 Nyfb gur svefgobea bs bhe fbaf, naq bs bhe pnggyr, nf vg vf
jevggra va gur ynj, naq gur svefgyvatf bs bhe ureqf naq bs bhe sybpxf,
gb oevat gb gur ubhfr bs bhe Tbq, hagb gur cevrfgf gung zvavfgre va
gur ubhfr bs bhe Tbq: 10:37 Naq gung jr fubhyq oevat gur svefgsehvgf
bs bhe qbhtu, naq bhe bssrevatf, naq gur sehvg bs nyy znaare bs gerrf,
bs jvar naq bs bvy, hagb gur cevrfgf, gb gur punzoref bs gur ubhfr bs
bhe Tbq; naq gur gvgurf bs bhe tebhaq hagb gur Yrivgrf, gung gur fnzr
Yrivgrf zvtug unir gur gvgurf va nyy gur pvgvrf bs bhe gvyyntr.

10:38 Naq gur cevrfg gur fba bs Nneba funyy or jvgu gur Yrivgrf, jura
gur Yrivgrf gnxr gvgurf: naq gur Yrivgrf funyy oevat hc gur gvgur bs
gur gvgurf hagb gur ubhfr bs bhe Tbq, gb gur punzoref, vagb gur
gernfher ubhfr.

10:39 Sbe gur puvyqera bs Vfenry naq gur puvyqera bs Yriv funyy oevat
gur bssrevat bs gur pbea, bs gur arj jvar, naq gur bvy, hagb gur
punzoref, jurer ner gur irffryf bs gur fnapghnel, naq gur cevrfgf gung
zvavfgre, naq gur cbegref, naq gur fvatref: naq jr jvyy abg sbefnxr
gur ubhfr bs bhe Tbq.

11:1 Naq gur ehyref bs gur crbcyr qjryg ng Wrehfnyrz: gur erfg bs gur
crbcyr nyfb pnfg ybgf, gb oevat bar bs gra gb qjryy va Wrehfnyrz gur
ubyl pvgl, naq avar cnegf gb qjryy va bgure pvgvrf.

11:2 Naq gur crbcyr oyrffrq nyy gur zra, gung jvyyvatyl bssrerq
gurzfryirf gb qjryy ng Wrehfnyrz.

11:3 Abj gurfr ner gur puvrs bs gur cebivapr gung qjryg va Wrehfnyrz:
ohg va gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu qjryg rirel bar va uvf cbffrffvba va gurve
pvgvrf, gb jvg, Vfenry, gur cevrfgf, naq gur Yrivgrf, naq gur
Arguvavzf, naq gur puvyqera bs Fbybzba'f freinagf.

11:4 Naq ng Wrehfnyrz qjryg pregnva bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu, naq bs
gur puvyqera bs Orawnzva. Bs gur puvyqera bs Whqnu; Ngunvnu gur fba bs
Hmmvnu, gur fba bs Mrpunevnu, gur fba bs Nznevnu, gur fba bs
Furcungvnu, gur fba bs Znunynyrry, bs gur puvyqera bs Crerm; 11:5 Naq
Znnfrvnu gur fba bs Onehpu, gur fba bs Pbyubmru, gur fba bs Unmnvnu,
gur fba bs Nqnvnu, gur fba bs Wbvnevo, gur fba bs Mrpunevnu, gur fba
bs Fuvybav.

11:6 Nyy gur fbaf bs Crerm gung qjryg ng Wrehfnyrz jrer sbhe uhaqerq
guerrfpber naq rvtug inyvnag zra.

11:7 Naq gurfr ner gur fbaf bs Orawnzva; Fnyyh gur fba bs Zrfuhyynz,
gur fba bs Wbrq, gur fba bs Crqnvnu, gur fba bs Xbynvnu, gur fba bs
Znnfrvnu, gur fba bs Vguvry, gur fba bs Wrfnvnu.

11:8 Naq nsgre uvz Tnoonv, Fnyynv, avar uhaqerq gjragl naq rvtug.

11:9 Naq Wbry gur fba bs Mvpuev jnf gurve birefrre: naq Whqnu gur fba
bs Frahnu jnf frpbaq bire gur pvgl.

11:10 Bs gur cevrfgf: Wrqnvnu gur fba bs Wbvnevo, Wnpuva.

11:11 Frenvnu gur fba bs Uvyxvnu, gur fba bs Zrfuhyynz, gur fba bs
Mnqbx, gur fba bs Zrenvbgu, gur fba bs Nuvgho, jnf gur ehyre bs gur
ubhfr bs Tbq.

11:12 Naq gurve oerguera gung qvq gur jbex bs gur ubhfr jrer rvtug
uhaqerq gjragl naq gjb: naq Nqnvnu gur fba bs Wrebunz, gur fba bs
Crynyvnu, gur fba bs Nzmv, gur fba bs Mrpunevnu, gur fba bs Cnfuhe,
gur fba bs Znypuvnu.

11:13 Naq uvf oerguera, puvrs bs gur snguref, gjb uhaqerq sbegl naq
gjb: naq Nznfunv gur fba bs Nmnerry, gur fba bs Nunfnv, gur fba bs
Zrfuvyyrzbgu, gur fba bs Vzzre, 11:14 Naq gurve oerguera, zvtugl zra
bs inybhe, na uhaqerq gjragl naq rvtug: naq gurve birefrre jnf
Mnoqvry, gur fba bs bar bs gur terng zra.

11:15 Nyfb bs gur Yrivgrf: Furznvnu gur fba bs Unfuho, gur fba bs
Nmevxnz, gur fba bs Unfunovnu, gur fba bs Ohaav; 11:16 Naq Funoorgunv
naq Wbmnonq, bs gur puvrs bs gur Yrivgrf, unq gur birefvtug bs gur
bhgjneq ohfvarff bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq.

11:17 Naq Znggnavnu gur fba bs Zvpun, gur fba bs Mnoqv, gur fba bs
Nfncu, jnf gur cevapvcny gb ortva gur gunaxftvivat va cenlre: naq
Onxohxvnu gur frpbaq nzbat uvf oerguera, naq Noqn gur fba bs Funzzhn,
gur fba bs Tnyny, gur fba bs Wrqhguha.

11:18 Nyy gur Yrivgrf va gur ubyl pvgl jrer gjb uhaqerq sbhefpber naq
sbhe.

11:19 Zberbire gur cbegref, Nxxho, Gnyzba, naq gurve oerguera gung
xrcg gur tngrf, jrer na uhaqerq friragl naq gjb.

11:20 Naq gur erfvqhr bs Vfenry, bs gur cevrfgf, naq gur Yrivgrf, jrer
va nyy gur pvgvrf bs Whqnu, rirel bar va uvf vaurevgnapr.

11:21 Ohg gur Arguvavzf qjryg va Bcury: naq Mvun naq Tvfcn jrer bire
gur Arguvavzf.

11:22 Gur birefrre nyfb bs gur Yrivgrf ng Wrehfnyrz jnf Hmmv gur fba
bs Onav, gur fba bs Unfunovnu, gur fba bs Znggnavnu, gur fba bs Zvpun.
Bs gur fbaf bs Nfncu, gur fvatref jrer bire gur ohfvarff bs gur ubhfr
bs Tbq.

11:23 Sbe vg jnf gur xvat'f pbzznaqzrag pbapreavat gurz, gung n
pregnva cbegvba fubhyq or sbe gur fvatref, qhr sbe rirel qnl.

11:24 Naq Crgunuvnu gur fba bs Zrfurmnorry, bs gur puvyqera bs Mrenu
gur fba bs Whqnu, jnf ng gur xvat'f unaq va nyy znggref pbapreavat gur
crbcyr.

11:25 Naq sbe gur ivyyntrf, jvgu gurve svryqf, fbzr bs gur puvyqera bs
Whqnu qjryg ng Xvewnguneon, naq va gur ivyyntrf gurerbs, naq ng Qvoba,
naq va gur ivyyntrf gurerbs, naq ng Wrxnomrry, naq va gur ivyyntrf
gurerbs, 11:26 Naq ng Wrfuhn, naq ng Zbynqnu, naq ng Orgucuryrg, 11:27
Naq ng Unmnefuhny, naq ng Orrefuron, naq va gur ivyyntrf gurerbs,
11:28 Naq ng Mvxynt, naq ng Zrxbanu, naq va gur ivyyntrf gurerbs,
11:29 Naq ng Raevzzba, naq ng Mnernu, naq ng Wnezhgu, 11:30 Mnabnu,
Nqhyynz, naq va gurve ivyyntrf, ng Ynpuvfu, naq gur svryqf gurerbs, ng
Nmrxnu, naq va gur ivyyntrf gurerbs. Naq gurl qjryg sebz Orrefuron
hagb gur inyyrl bs Uvaabz.

11:31 Gur puvyqera nyfb bs Orawnzva sebz Tron qjryg ng Zvpuznfu, naq
Nvwn, naq Orgury, naq va gurve ivyyntrf.

11:32 Naq ng Nangubgu, Abo, Nanavnu, 11:33 Unmbe, Enznu, Tvggnvz,
11:34 Unqvq, Mrobvz, Aronyyng, 11:35 Ybq, naq Bab, gur inyyrl bs
pensgfzra.

11:36 Naq bs gur Yrivgrf jrer qvivfvbaf va Whqnu, naq va Orawnzva.

12:1 Abj gurfr ner gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf gung jrag hc jvgu
Mrehoonory gur fba bs Furnygvry, naq Wrfuhn: Frenvnu, Wrerzvnu, Rmen,
12:2 Nznevnu, Znyyhpu, Ungghfu, 12:3 Furpunavnu, Eruhz, Zrerzbgu, 12:4
Vqqb, Tvaargub, Novwnu, 12:5 Zvnzva, Znnqvnu, Ovytnu, 12:6 Furznvnu,
naq Wbvnevo, Wrqnvnu, 12:7 Fnyyh, Nzbx, Uvyxvnu, Wrqnvnu. Gurfr jrer
gur puvrs bs gur cevrfgf naq bs gurve oerguera va gur qnlf bs Wrfuhn.

12:8 Zberbire gur Yrivgrf: Wrfuhn, Ovaahv, Xnqzvry, Furerovnu, Whqnu,
naq Znggnavnu, juvpu jnf bire gur gunaxftvivat, ur naq uvf oerguera.

12:9 Nyfb Onxohxvnu naq Haav, gurve oerguera, jrer bire ntnvafg gurz
va gur jngpurf.

12:10 Naq Wrfuhn ortng Wbvnxvz, Wbvnxvz nyfb ortng Ryvnfuvo, naq
Ryvnfuvo ortng Wbvnqn, 12:11 Naq Wbvnqn ortng Wbanguna, naq Wbanguna
ortng Wnqqhn.

12:12 Naq va gur qnlf bs Wbvnxvz jrer cevrfgf, gur puvrs bs gur
snguref: bs Frenvnu, Zrenvnu; bs Wrerzvnu, Unanavnu; 12:13 Bs Rmen,
Zrfuhyynz; bs Nznevnu, Wrubunana; 12:14 Bs Zryvph, Wbanguna; bs
Furonavnu, Wbfrcu; 12:15 Bs Unevz, Nqan; bs Zrenvbgu, Uryxnv; 12:16 Bs
Vqqb, Mrpunevnu; bs Tvaarguba, Zrfuhyynz; 12:17 Bs Novwnu, Mvpuev; bs
Zvavnzva, bs Zbnqvnu, Cvygnv: 12:18 Bs Ovytnu, Funzzhn; bs Furznvnu,
Wrubanguna; 12:19 Naq bs Wbvnevo, Znggranv; bs Wrqnvnu, Hmmv; 12:20 Bs
Fnyynv, Xnyynv; bs Nzbx, Rore; 12:21 Bs Uvyxvnu, Unfunovnu; bs
Wrqnvnu, Argunarry.

12:22 Gur Yrivgrf va gur qnlf bs Ryvnfuvo, Wbvnqn, naq Wbunana, naq
Wnqqhn, jrer erpbeqrq puvrs bs gur snguref: nyfb gur cevrfgf, gb gur
ervta bs Qnevhf gur Crefvna.

12:23 Gur fbaf bs Yriv, gur puvrs bs gur snguref, jrer jevggra va gur
obbx bs gur puebavpyrf, rira hagvy gur qnlf bs Wbunana gur fba bs
Ryvnfuvo.

12:24 Naq gur puvrs bs gur Yrivgrf: Unfunovnu, Furerovnu, naq Wrfuhn
gur fba bs Xnqzvry, jvgu gurve oerguera bire ntnvafg gurz, gb cenvfr
naq gb tvir gunaxf, nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs Qnivq gur zna bs
Tbq, jneq bire ntnvafg jneq.

12:25 Znggnavnu, naq Onxohxvnu, Bonqvnu, Zrfuhyynz, Gnyzba, Nxxho,
jrer cbegref xrrcvat gur jneq ng gur guerfubyqf bs gur tngrf.

12:26 Gurfr jrer va gur qnlf bs Wbvnxvz gur fba bs Wrfuhn, gur fba bs
Wbmnqnx, naq va gur qnlf bs Arurzvnu gur tbireabe, naq bs Rmen gur
cevrfg, gur fpevor.

12:27 Naq ng gur qrqvpngvba bs gur jnyy bs Wrehfnyrz gurl fbhtug gur
Yrivgrf bhg bs nyy gurve cynprf, gb oevat gurz gb Wrehfnyrz, gb xrrc
gur qrqvpngvba jvgu tynqarff, obgu jvgu gunaxftvivatf, naq jvgu
fvatvat, jvgu plzonyf, cfnygrevrf, naq jvgu unecf.

12:28 Naq gur fbaf bs gur fvatref tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure, obgu
bhg bs gur cynva pbhagel ebhaq nobhg Wrehfnyrz, naq sebz gur ivyyntrf
bs Argbcunguv; 12:29 Nyfb sebz gur ubhfr bs Tvytny, naq bhg bs gur
svryqf bs Tron naq Nmznirgu: sbe gur fvatref unq ohvyqrq gurz ivyyntrf
ebhaq nobhg Wrehfnyrz.

12:30 Naq gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf chevsvrq gurzfryirf, naq
chevsvrq gur crbcyr, naq gur tngrf, naq gur jnyy.

12:31 Gura V oebhtug hc gur cevaprf bs Whqnu hcba gur jnyy, naq
nccbvagrq gjb terng pbzcnavrf bs gurz gung tnir gunaxf, jurerbs bar
jrag ba gur evtug unaq hcba gur jnyy gbjneq gur qhat tngr: 12:32 Naq
nsgre gurz jrag Ubfunvnu, naq unys bs gur cevaprf bs Whqnu, 12:33 Naq
Nmnevnu, Rmen, naq Zrfuhyynz, 12:34 Whqnu, naq Orawnzva, naq Furznvnu,
naq Wrerzvnu, 12:35 Naq pregnva bs gur cevrfgf' fbaf jvgu gehzcrgf;
anzryl, Mrpunevnu gur fba bs Wbanguna, gur fba bs Furznvnu, gur fba bs
Znggnavnu, gur fba bs Zvpunvnu, gur fba bs Mnpphe, gur fba bs Nfncu:
12:36 Naq uvf oerguera, Furznvnu, naq Nmnenry, Zvynynv, Tvynynv, Znnv,
Argunarry, naq Whqnu, Unanav, jvgu gur zhfvpny vafgehzragf bs Qnivq
gur zna bs Tbq, naq Rmen gur fpevor orsber gurz.

12:37 Naq ng gur sbhagnva tngr, juvpu jnf bire ntnvafg gurz, gurl jrag
hc ol gur fgnvef bs gur pvgl bs Qnivq, ng gur tbvat hc bs gur jnyy,
nobir gur ubhfr bs Qnivq, rira hagb gur jngre tngr rnfgjneq.

12:38 Naq gur bgure pbzcnal bs gurz gung tnir gunaxf jrag bire ntnvafg
gurz, naq V nsgre gurz, naq gur unys bs gur crbcyr hcba gur jnyy, sebz
orlbaq gur gbjre bs gur sheanprf rira hagb gur oebnq jnyy; 12:39 Naq
sebz nobir gur tngr bs Rcuenvz, naq nobir gur byq tngr, naq nobir gur
svfu tngr, naq gur gbjre bs Unanarry, naq gur gbjre bs Zrnu, rira hagb
gur furrc tngr: naq gurl fgbbq fgvyy va gur cevfba tngr.

12:40 Fb fgbbq gur gjb pbzcnavrf bs gurz gung tnir gunaxf va gur ubhfr
bs Tbq, naq V, naq gur unys bs gur ehyref jvgu zr: 12:41 Naq gur
cevrfgf; Ryvnxvz, Znnfrvnu, Zvavnzva, Zvpunvnu, Ryvbranv, Mrpunevnu,
naq Unanavnu, jvgu gehzcrgf; 12:42 Naq Znnfrvnu, naq Furznvnu, naq
Ryrnmne, naq Hmmv, naq Wrubunana, naq Znypuvwnu, naq Rynz, naq Rmre.
Naq gur fvatref fnat ybhq, jvgu Wrmenuvnu gurve birefrre.

12:43 Nyfb gung qnl gurl bssrerq terng fnpevsvprf, naq erwbvprq: sbe
Tbq unq znqr gurz erwbvpr jvgu terng wbl: gur jvirf nyfb naq gur
puvyqera erwbvprq: fb gung gur wbl bs Wrehfnyrz jnf urneq rira nsne
bss.

12:44 Naq ng gung gvzr jrer fbzr nccbvagrq bire gur punzoref sbe gur
gernfherf, sbe gur bssrevatf, sbe gur svefgsehvgf, naq sbe gur gvgurf,
gb tngure vagb gurz bhg bs gur svryqf bs gur pvgvrf gur cbegvbaf bs
gur ynj sbe gur cevrfgf naq Yrivgrf: sbe Whqnu erwbvprq sbe gur
cevrfgf naq sbe gur Yrivgrf gung jnvgrq.

12:45 Naq obgu gur fvatref naq gur cbegref xrcg gur jneq bs gurve Tbq,
naq gur jneq bs gur chevsvpngvba, nppbeqvat gb gur pbzznaqzrag bs
Qnivq, naq bs Fbybzba uvf fba.

12:46 Sbe va gur qnlf bs Qnivq naq Nfncu bs byq gurer jrer puvrs bs
gur fvatref, naq fbatf bs cenvfr naq gunaxftvivat hagb Tbq.

12:47 Naq nyy Vfenry va gur qnlf bs Mrehoonory, naq va gur qnlf bs
Arurzvnu, tnir gur cbegvbaf bs gur fvatref naq gur cbegref, rirel qnl
uvf cbegvba: naq gurl fnapgvsvrq ubyl guvatf hagb gur Yrivgrf; naq gur
Yrivgrf fnapgvsvrq gurz hagb gur puvyqera bs Nneba.

13:1 Ba gung qnl gurl ernq va gur obbx bs Zbfrf va gur nhqvrapr bs gur
crbcyr; naq gurerva jnf sbhaq jevggra, gung gur Nzzbavgr naq gur
Zbnovgr fubhyq abg pbzr vagb gur pbatertngvba bs Tbq sbe rire; 13:2
Orpnhfr gurl zrg abg gur puvyqera bs Vfenry jvgu oernq naq jvgu jngre,
ohg uverq Onynnz ntnvafg gurz, gung ur fubhyq phefr gurz: ubjorvg bhe
Tbq ghearq gur phefr vagb n oyrffvat.

13:3 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gurl unq urneq gur ynj, gung gurl
frcnengrq sebz Vfenry nyy gur zvkrq zhygvghqr.

13:4 Naq orsber guvf, Ryvnfuvo gur cevrfg, univat gur birefvtug bs gur
punzore bs gur ubhfr bs bhe Tbq, jnf nyyvrq hagb Gbovnu: 13:5 Naq ur
unq cercnerq sbe uvz n terng punzore, jurer nsbergvzr gurl ynvq gur
zrng bssrevatf, gur senaxvaprafr, naq gur irffryf, naq gur gvgurf bs
gur pbea, gur arj jvar, naq gur bvy, juvpu jnf pbzznaqrq gb or tvira
gb gur Yrivgrf, naq gur fvatref, naq gur cbegref; naq gur bssrevatf bs
gur cevrfgf.

13:6 Ohg va nyy guvf gvzr jnf abg V ng Wrehfnyrz: sbe va gur gjb naq
guvegvrgu lrne bs Negnkrekrf xvat bs Onolyba pnzr V hagb gur xvat, naq
nsgre pregnva qnlf bognvarq V yrnir bs gur xvat: 13:7 Naq V pnzr gb
Wrehfnyrz, naq haqrefgbbq bs gur rivy gung Ryvnfuvo qvq sbe Gbovnu, va
cercnevat uvz n punzore va gur pbhegf bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq.

13:8 Naq vg tevrirq zr fber: gurersber V pnfg sbegu nyy gur ubhfrubyq
fghss gb Gbovnu bhg bs gur punzore.

13:9 Gura V pbzznaqrq, naq gurl pyrnafrq gur punzoref: naq guvgure
oebhtug V ntnva gur irffryf bs gur ubhfr bs Tbq, jvgu gur zrng
bssrevat naq gur senaxvaprafr.

13:10 Naq V creprvirq gung gur cbegvbaf bs gur Yrivgrf unq abg orra
tvira gurz: sbe gur Yrivgrf naq gur fvatref, gung qvq gur jbex, jrer
syrq rirel bar gb uvf svryq.

13:11 Gura pbagraqrq V jvgu gur ehyref, naq fnvq, Jul vf gur ubhfr bs
Tbq sbefnxra? Naq V tngurerq gurz gbtrgure, naq frg gurz va gurve
cynpr.

13:12 Gura oebhtug nyy Whqnu gur gvgur bs gur pbea naq gur arj jvar
naq gur bvy hagb gur gernfhevrf.

13:13 Naq V znqr gernfheref bire gur gernfhevrf, Furyrzvnu gur cevrfg,
naq Mnqbx gur fpevor, naq bs gur Yrivgrf, Crqnvnu: naq arkg gb gurz
jnf Unana gur fba bs Mnpphe, gur fba bs Znggnavnu: sbe gurl jrer
pbhagrq snvgushy, naq gurve bssvpr jnf gb qvfgevohgr hagb gurve
oerguera.

13:14 Erzrzore zr, B zl Tbq, pbapreavat guvf, naq jvcr abg bhg zl tbbq
qrrqf gung V unir qbar sbe gur ubhfr bs zl Tbq, naq sbe gur bssvprf
gurerbs.

13:15 Va gubfr qnlf fnj V va Whqnu fbzr gernqvat jvar cerffrf ba gur
fnoongu, naq oevatvat va furnirf, naq ynqvat nffrf; nf nyfb jvar,
tencrf, naq svtf, naq nyy znaare bs oheqraf, juvpu gurl oebhtug vagb
Wrehfnyrz ba gur fnoongu qnl: naq V grfgvsvrq ntnvafg gurz va gur qnl
jurerva gurl fbyq ivpghnyf.

13:16 Gurer qjryg zra bs Gler nyfb gurerva, juvpu oebhtug svfu, naq
nyy znaare bs jner, naq fbyq ba gur fnoongu hagb gur puvyqera bs
Whqnu, naq va Wrehfnyrz.

13:17 Gura V pbagraqrq jvgu gur aboyrf bs Whqnu, naq fnvq hagb gurz,
Jung rivy guvat vf guvf gung lr qb, naq cebsnar gur fnoongu qnl?
13:18 Qvq abg lbhe snguref guhf, naq qvq abg bhe Tbq oevat nyy guvf
rivy hcba hf, naq hcba guvf pvgl? lrg lr oevat zber jengu hcba Vfenry
ol cebsnavat gur fnoongu.

13:19 Naq vg pnzr gb cnff, gung jura gur tngrf bs Wrehfnyrz ortna gb
or qnex orsber gur fnoongu, V pbzznaqrq gung gur tngrf fubhyq or fuhg,
naq punetrq gung gurl fubhyq abg or bcrarq gvyy nsgre gur fnoongu: naq
fbzr bs zl freinagf frg V ng gur tngrf, gung gurer fubhyq ab oheqra or
oebhtug va ba gur fnoongu qnl.

13:20 Fb gur zrepunagf naq fryyref bs nyy xvaq bs jner ybqtrq jvgubhg
Wrehfnyrz bapr be gjvpr.

13:21 Gura V grfgvsvrq ntnvafg gurz, naq fnvq hagb gurz, Jul ybqtr lr
nobhg gur jnyy? vs lr qb fb ntnva, V jvyy ynl unaqf ba lbh. Sebz gung
gvzr sbegu pnzr gurl ab zber ba gur fnoongu.

13:22 Naq V pbzznaqrq gur Yrivgrf gung gurl fubhyq pyrnafr gurzfryirf,
naq gung gurl fubhyq pbzr naq xrrc gur tngrf, gb fnapgvsl gur fnoongu
qnl.

Erzrzore zr, B zl Tbq, pbapreavat guvf nyfb, naq fcner zr nppbeqvat gb
gur terngarff bs gul zrepl.

13:23 Va gubfr qnlf nyfb fnj V Wrjf gung unq zneevrq jvirf bs Nfuqbq,
bs Nzzba, naq bs Zbno: 13:24 Naq gurve puvyqera fcnxr unys va gur
fcrrpu bs Nfuqbq, naq pbhyq abg fcrnx va gur Wrjf' ynathntr, ohg
nppbeqvat gb gur ynathntr bs rnpu crbcyr.

13:25 Naq V pbagraqrq jvgu gurz, naq phefrq gurz, naq fzbgr pregnva bs
gurz, naq cyhpxrq bss gurve unve, naq znqr gurz fjrne ol Tbq, fnlvat,
Lr funyy abg tvir lbhe qnhtugref hagb gurve fbaf, abe gnxr gurve
qnhtugref hagb lbhe fbaf, be sbe lbhefryirf.

13:26 Qvq abg Fbybzba xvat bs Vfenry fva ol gurfr guvatf? lrg nzbat
znal angvbaf jnf gurer ab xvat yvxr uvz, jub jnf orybirq bs uvf Tbq,
naq Tbq znqr uvz xvat bire nyy Vfenry: arireguryrff rira uvz qvq
bhgynaqvfu jbzra pnhfr gb fva.

13:27 Funyy jr gura urnexra hagb lbh gb qb nyy guvf terng rivy, gb
genafterff ntnvafg bhe Tbq va zneelvat fgenatr jvirf?  13:28 Naq bar
bs gur fbaf bs Wbvnqn, gur fba bs Ryvnfuvo gur uvtu cevrfg, jnf fba va
ynj gb Fnaonyyng gur Ubebavgr: gurersber V punfrq uvz sebz zr.

13:29 Erzrzore gurz, B zl Tbq, orpnhfr gurl unir qrsvyrq gur
cevrfgubbq, naq gur pbiranag bs gur cevrfgubbq, naq bs gur Yrivgrf.

13:30 Guhf pyrnafrq V gurz sebz nyy fgenatref, naq nccbvagrq gur jneqf
bs gur cevrfgf naq gur Yrivgrf, rirel bar va uvf ohfvarff; 13:31 Naq
sbe gur jbbq bssrevat, ng gvzrf nccbvagrq, naq sbe gur svefgsehvgf.
Erzrzore zr, B zl Tbq, sbe tbbq.




Gur Obbx bs Rfgure


1:1 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff va gur qnlf bs Nunfhrehf, (guvf vf Nunfhrehf
juvpu ervtarq, sebz Vaqvn rira hagb Rguvbcvn, bire na uhaqerq naq
frira naq gjragl cebivaprf:) 1:2 Gung va gubfr qnlf, jura gur xvat
Nunfhrehf fng ba gur guebar bs uvf xvatqbz, juvpu jnf va Fuhfuna gur
cnynpr, 1:3 Va gur guveq lrne bs uvf ervta, ur znqr n srnfg hagb nyy
uvf cevaprf naq uvf freinagf; gur cbjre bs Crefvn naq Zrqvn, gur
aboyrf naq cevaprf bs gur cebivaprf, orvat orsber uvz: 1:4 Jura ur
furjrq gur evpurf bs uvf tybevbhf xvatqbz naq gur ubabhe bs uvf
rkpryyrag znwrfgl znal qnlf, rira na uhaqerq naq sbhefpber qnlf.

1:5 Naq jura gurfr qnlf jrer rkcverq, gur xvat znqr n srnfg hagb nyy
gur crbcyr gung jrer cerfrag va Fuhfuna gur cnynpr, obgu hagb terng
naq fznyy, frira qnlf, va gur pbheg bs gur tneqra bs gur xvat'f
cnynpr; 1:6 Jurer jrer juvgr, terra, naq oyhr, unatvatf, snfgrarq jvgu
pbeqf bs svar yvara naq checyr gb fvyire evatf naq cvyynef bs zneoyr:
gur orqf jrer bs tbyq naq fvyire, hcba n cnirzrag bs erq, naq oyhr,
naq juvgr, naq oynpx, zneoyr.

1:7 Naq gurl tnir gurz qevax va irffryf bs tbyq, (gur irffryf orvat
qvirefr bar sebz nabgure,) naq eblny jvar va nohaqnapr, nppbeqvat gb
gur fgngr bs gur xvat.

1:8 Naq gur qevaxvat jnf nppbeqvat gb gur ynj; abar qvq pbzcry: sbe fb
gur xvat unq nccbvagrq gb nyy gur bssvpref bs uvf ubhfr, gung gurl
fubhyq qb nppbeqvat gb rirel zna'f cyrnfher.

1:9 Nyfb Infugv gur dhrra znqr n srnfg sbe gur jbzra va gur eblny
ubhfr juvpu orybatrq gb xvat Nunfhrehf.

1:10 Ba gur friragu qnl, jura gur urneg bs gur xvat jnf zreel jvgu
jvar, ur pbzznaqrq Zruhzna, Ovmgun, Uneoban, Ovtgun, naq Nontgun,
Mrgune, naq Pnepnf, gur frira punzoreynvaf gung freirq va gur cerfrapr
bs Nunfhrehf gur xvat, 1:11 Gb oevat Infugv gur dhrra orsber gur xvat
jvgu gur pebja eblny, gb furj gur crbcyr naq gur cevaprf ure ornhgl:
sbe fur jnf snve gb ybbx ba.

1:12 Ohg gur dhrra Infugv ershfrq gb pbzr ng gur xvat'f pbzznaqzrag ol
uvf punzoreynvaf: gurersber jnf gur xvat irel jebgu, naq uvf natre
ohearq va uvz.

1:13 Gura gur xvat fnvq gb gur jvfr zra, juvpu xarj gur gvzrf, (sbe fb
jnf gur xvat'f znaare gbjneq nyy gung xarj ynj naq whqtzrag: 1:14 Naq
gur arkg hagb uvz jnf Pnefuran, Furgune, Nqzngun, Gnefuvfu, Zrerf,
Znefran, naq Zrzhpna, gur frira cevaprf bs Crefvn naq Zrqvn, juvpu fnj
gur xvat'f snpr, naq juvpu fng gur svefg va gur xvatqbz;) 1:15 Jung
funyy jr qb hagb gur dhrra Infugv nppbeqvat gb ynj, orpnhfr fur ungu
abg cresbezrq gur pbzznaqzrag bs gur xvat Nunfhrehf ol gur
punzoreynvaf?  1:16 Naq Zrzhpna nafjrerq orsber gur xvat naq gur
cevaprf, Infugv gur dhrra ungu abg qbar jebat gb gur xvat bayl, ohg
nyfb gb nyy gur cevaprf, naq gb nyy gur crbcyr gung ner va nyy gur
cebivaprf bs gur xvat Nunfhrehf.

1:17 Sbe guvf qrrq bs gur dhrra funyy pbzr noebnq hagb nyy jbzra, fb
gung gurl funyy qrfcvfr gurve uhfonaqf va gurve rlrf, jura vg funyy or
ercbegrq, Gur xvat Nunfhrehf pbzznaqrq Infugv gur dhrra gb or oebhtug
va orsber uvz, ohg fur pnzr abg.

1:18 Yvxrjvfr funyy gur ynqvrf bs Crefvn naq Zrqvn fnl guvf qnl hagb
nyy gur xvat'f cevaprf, juvpu unir urneq bs gur qrrq bs gur dhrra.
Guhf funyy gurer nevfr gbb zhpu pbagrzcg naq jengu.

1:19 Vs vg cyrnfr gur xvat, yrg gurer tb n eblny pbzznaqzrag sebz uvz,
naq yrg vg or jevggra nzbat gur ynjf bs gur Crefvnaf naq gur Zrqrf,
gung vg or abg nygrerq, Gung Infugv pbzr ab zber orsber xvat
Nunfhrehf; naq yrg gur xvat tvir ure eblny rfgngr hagb nabgure gung vf
orggre guna fur.

1:20 Naq jura gur xvat'f qrperr juvpu ur funyy znxr funyy or choyvfurq
guebhtubhg nyy uvf rzcver, (sbe vg vf terng,) nyy gur jvirf funyy tvir
gb gurve uhfonaqf ubabhe, obgu gb terng naq fznyy.

1:21 Naq gur fnlvat cyrnfrq gur xvat naq gur cevaprf; naq gur xvat qvq
nppbeqvat gb gur jbeq bs Zrzhpna: 1:22 Sbe ur frag yrggref vagb nyy
gur xvat'f cebivaprf, vagb rirel cebivapr nppbeqvat gb gur jevgvat
gurerbs, naq gb rirel crbcyr nsgre gurve ynathntr, gung rirel zna
fubhyq orne ehyr va uvf bja ubhfr, naq gung vg fubhyq or choyvfurq
nppbeqvat gb gur ynathntr bs rirel crbcyr.

2:1 Nsgre gurfr guvatf, jura gur jengu bs xvat Nunfhrehf jnf nccrnfrq,
ur erzrzorerq Infugv, naq jung fur unq qbar, naq jung jnf qrperrq
ntnvafg ure.

2:2 Gura fnvq gur xvat'f freinagf gung zvavfgrerq hagb uvz, Yrg gurer
or snve lbhat ivetvaf fbhtug sbe gur xvat: 2:3 Naq yrg gur xvat
nccbvag bssvpref va nyy gur cebivaprf bs uvf xvatqbz, gung gurl znl
tngure gbtrgure nyy gur snve lbhat ivetvaf hagb Fuhfuna gur cnynpr, gb
gur ubhfr bs gur jbzra, hagb gur phfgbql bs Urtr gur xvat'f
punzoreynva, xrrcre bs gur jbzra; naq yrg gurve guvatf sbe
chevsvpngvba or tvira gurz: 2:4 Naq yrg gur znvqra juvpu cyrnfrgu gur
xvat or dhrra vafgrnq bs Infugv.

Naq gur guvat cyrnfrq gur xvat; naq ur qvq fb.

2:5 Abj va Fuhfuna gur cnynpr gurer jnf n pregnva Wrj, jubfr anzr jnf
Zbeqrpnv, gur fba bs Wnve, gur fba bs Fuvzrv, gur fba bs Xvfu, n
Orawnzvgr; 2:6 Jub unq orra pneevrq njnl sebz Wrehfnyrz jvgu gur
pncgvivgl juvpu unq orra pneevrq njnl jvgu Wrpbavnu xvat bs Whqnu,
jubz Arohpunqarmmne gur xvat bs Onolyba unq pneevrq njnl.

2:7 Naq ur oebhtug hc Unqnffnu, gung vf, Rfgure, uvf hapyr'f qnhtugre:
sbe fur unq arvgure sngure abe zbgure, naq gur znvq jnf snve naq
ornhgvshy; jubz Zbeqrpnv, jura ure sngure naq zbgure jrer qrnq, gbbx
sbe uvf bja qnhtugre.

2:8 Fb vg pnzr gb cnff, jura gur xvat'f pbzznaqzrag naq uvf qrperr jnf
urneq, naq jura znal znvqraf jrer tngurerq gbtrgure hagb Fuhfuna gur
cnynpr, gb gur phfgbql bs Urtnv, gung Rfgure jnf oebhtug nyfb hagb gur
xvat'f ubhfr, gb gur phfgbql bs Urtnv, xrrcre bs gur jbzra.

2:9 Naq gur znvqra cyrnfrq uvz, naq fur bognvarq xvaqarff bs uvz; naq
ur fcrrqvyl tnir ure ure guvatf sbe chevsvpngvba, jvgu fhpu guvatf nf
orybatrq gb ure, naq frira znvqraf, juvpu jrer zrrg gb or tvira ure,
bhg bs gur xvat'f ubhfr: naq ur cersreerq ure naq ure znvqf hagb gur
orfg cynpr bs gur ubhfr bs gur jbzra.

2:10 Rfgure unq abg furjrq ure crbcyr abe ure xvaqerq: sbe Zbeqrpnv
unq punetrq ure gung fur fubhyq abg furj vg.

2:11 Naq Zbeqrpnv jnyxrq rirel qnl orsber gur pbheg bs gur jbzra'f
ubhfr, gb xabj ubj Rfgure qvq, naq jung fubhyq orpbzr bs ure.

2:12 Abj jura rirel znvq'f ghea jnf pbzr gb tb va gb xvat Nunfhrehf,
nsgre gung fur unq orra gjryir zbaguf, nppbeqvat gb gur znaare bs gur
jbzra, (sbe fb jrer gur qnlf bs gurve chevsvpngvbaf nppbzcyvfurq, gb
jvg, fvk zbaguf jvgu bvy bs zleeu, naq fvk zbaguf jvgu fjrrg bqbhef,
naq jvgu bgure guvatf sbe gur chevslvat bs gur jbzra;) 2:13 Gura guhf
pnzr rirel znvqra hagb gur xvat; jungfbrire fur qrfverq jnf tvira ure
gb tb jvgu ure bhg bs gur ubhfr bs gur jbzra hagb gur xvat'f ubhfr.

2:14 Va gur riravat fur jrag, naq ba gur zbeebj fur erghearq vagb gur
frpbaq ubhfr bs gur jbzra, gb gur phfgbql bs Funnfutnm, gur xvat'f
punzoreynva, juvpu xrcg gur pbaphovarf: fur pnzr va hagb gur xvat ab
zber, rkprcg gur xvat qryvtugrq va ure, naq gung fur jrer pnyyrq ol
anzr.

2:15 Abj jura gur ghea bs Rfgure, gur qnhtugre bs Novunvy gur hapyr bs
Zbeqrpnv, jub unq gnxra ure sbe uvf qnhtugre, jnf pbzr gb tb va hagb
gur xvat, fur erdhverq abguvat ohg jung Urtnv gur xvat'f punzoreynva,
gur xrrcre bs gur jbzra, nccbvagrq. Naq Rfgure bognvarq snibhe va gur
fvtug bs nyy gurz gung ybbxrq hcba ure.

2:16 Fb Rfgure jnf gnxra hagb xvat Nunfhrehf vagb uvf ubhfr eblny va
gur gragu zbagu, juvpu vf gur zbagu Grorgu, va gur friragu lrne bs uvf
ervta.

2:17 Naq gur xvat ybirq Rfgure nobir nyy gur jbzra, naq fur bognvarq
tenpr naq snibhe va uvf fvtug zber guna nyy gur ivetvaf; fb gung ur
frg gur eblny pebja hcba ure urnq, naq znqr ure dhrra vafgrnq bs
Infugv.

2:18 Gura gur xvat znqr n terng srnfg hagb nyy uvf cevaprf naq uvf
freinagf, rira Rfgure'f srnfg; naq ur znqr n eryrnfr gb gur cebivaprf,
naq tnir tvsgf, nppbeqvat gb gur fgngr bs gur xvat.

2:19 Naq jura gur ivetvaf jrer tngurerq gbtrgure gur frpbaq gvzr, gura
Zbeqrpnv fng va gur xvat'f tngr.

2:20 Rfgure unq abg lrg furjrq ure xvaqerq abe ure crbcyr; nf Zbeqrpnv
unq punetrq ure: sbe Rfgure qvq gur pbzznaqzrag bs Zbeqrpnv, yvxr nf
jura fur jnf oebhtug hc jvgu uvz.

2:21 Va gubfr qnlf, juvyr Zbeqrpnv fng va gur xvat'f tngr, gjb bs gur
xvat'f punzoreynvaf, Ovtguna naq Grerfu, bs gubfr juvpu xrcg gur qbbe,
jrer jebgu, naq fbhtug gb ynl unaqf ba gur xvat Nunfhrehf.

2:22 Naq gur guvat jnf xabja gb Zbeqrpnv, jub gbyq vg hagb Rfgure gur
dhrra; naq Rfgure pregvsvrq gur xvat gurerbs va Zbeqrpnv'f anzr.

2:23 Naq jura vadhvfvgvba jnf znqr bs gur znggre, vg jnf sbhaq bhg;
gurersber gurl jrer obgu unatrq ba n gerr: naq vg jnf jevggra va gur
obbx bs gur puebavpyrf orsber gur xvat.

3:1 Nsgre gurfr guvatf qvq xvat Nunfhrehf cebzbgr Unzna gur fba bs
Unzzrqngun gur Ntntvgr, naq nqinaprq uvz, naq frg uvf frng nobir nyy
gur cevaprf gung jrer jvgu uvz.

3:2 Naq nyy gur xvat'f freinagf, gung jrer va gur xvat'f tngr, objrq,
naq erireraprq Unzna: sbe gur xvat unq fb pbzznaqrq pbapreavat uvz.
Ohg Zbeqrpnv objrq abg, abe qvq uvz erirerapr.

3:3 Gura gur xvat'f freinagf, juvpu jrer va gur xvat'f tngr, fnvq hagb
Zbeqrpnv, Jul genafterffrfg gubh gur xvat'f pbzznaqzrag?  3:4 Abj vg
pnzr gb cnff, jura gurl fcnxr qnvyl hagb uvz, naq ur urnexrarq abg
hagb gurz, gung gurl gbyq Unzna, gb frr jurgure Zbeqrpnv'f znggref
jbhyq fgnaq: sbe ur unq gbyq gurz gung ur jnf n Wrj.

3:5 Naq jura Unzna fnj gung Zbeqrpnv objrq abg, abe qvq uvz erirerapr,
gura jnf Unzna shyy bs jengu.

3:6 Naq ur gubhtug fpbea gb ynl unaqf ba Zbeqrpnv nybar; sbe gurl unq
furjrq uvz gur crbcyr bs Zbeqrpnv: jurersber Unzna fbhtug gb qrfgebl
nyy gur Wrjf gung jrer guebhtubhg gur jubyr xvatqbz bs Nunfhrehf, rira
gur crbcyr bs Zbeqrpnv.

3:7 Va gur svefg zbagu, gung vf, gur zbagu Avfna, va gur gjrysgu lrne
bs xvat Nunfhrehf, gurl pnfg Che, gung vf, gur ybg, orsber Unzna sebz
qnl gb qnl, naq sebz zbagu gb zbagu, gb gur gjrysgu zbagu, gung vf,
gur zbagu Nqne.

3:8 Naq Unzna fnvq hagb xvat Nunfhrehf, Gurer vf n pregnva crbcyr
fpnggrerq noebnq naq qvfcrefrq nzbat gur crbcyr va nyy gur cebivaprf
bs gul xvatqbz; naq gurve ynjf ner qvirefr sebz nyy crbcyr; arvgure
xrrc gurl gur xvat'f ynjf: gurersber vg vf abg sbe gur xvat'f cebsvg
gb fhssre gurz.

3:9 Vs vg cyrnfr gur xvat, yrg vg or jevggra gung gurl znl or
qrfgeblrq: naq V jvyy cnl gra gubhfnaq gnyragf bs fvyire gb gur unaqf
bs gubfr gung unir gur punetr bs gur ohfvarff, gb oevat vg vagb gur
xvat'f gernfhevrf.

3:10 Naq gur xvat gbbx uvf evat sebz uvf unaq, naq tnir vg hagb Unzna
gur fba bs Unzzrqngun gur Ntntvgr, gur Wrjf' rarzl.

3:11 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb Unzna, Gur fvyire vf tvira gb gurr, gur
crbcyr nyfb, gb qb jvgu gurz nf vg frrzrgu tbbq gb gurr.

3:12 Gura jrer gur xvat'f fpevorf pnyyrq ba gur guvegrragu qnl bs gur
svefg zbagu, naq gurer jnf jevggra nppbeqvat gb nyy gung Unzna unq
pbzznaqrq hagb gur xvat'f yvrhgranagf, naq gb gur tbireabef gung jrer
bire rirel cebivapr, naq gb gur ehyref bs rirel crbcyr bs rirel
cebivapr nppbeqvat gb gur jevgvat gurerbs, naq gb rirel crbcyr nsgre
gurve ynathntr; va gur anzr bs xvat Nunfhrehf jnf vg jevggra, naq
frnyrq jvgu gur xvat'f evat.

3:13 Naq gur yrggref jrer frag ol cbfgf vagb nyy gur xvat'f cebivaprf,
gb qrfgebl, gb xvyy, naq gb pnhfr gb crevfu, nyy Wrjf, obgu lbhat naq
byq, yvggyr puvyqera naq jbzra, va bar qnl, rira hcba gur guvegrragu
qnl bs gur gjrysgu zbagu, juvpu vf gur zbagu Nqne, naq gb gnxr gur
fcbvy bs gurz sbe n cerl.

3:14 Gur pbcl bs gur jevgvat sbe n pbzznaqzrag gb or tvira va rirel
cebivapr jnf choyvfurq hagb nyy crbcyr, gung gurl fubhyq or ernql
ntnvafg gung qnl.

3:15 Gur cbfgf jrag bhg, orvat unfgrarq ol gur xvat'f pbzznaqzrag, naq
gur qrperr jnf tvira va Fuhfuna gur cnynpr. Naq gur xvat naq Unzna fng
qbja gb qevax; ohg gur pvgl Fuhfuna jnf crecyrkrq.

4:1 Jura Zbeqrpnv creprvirq nyy gung jnf qbar, Zbeqrpnv erag uvf
pybgurf, naq chg ba fnpxpybgu jvgu nfurf, naq jrag bhg vagb gur zvqfg
bs gur pvgl, naq pevrq jvgu n ybhq naq n ovggre pel; 4:2 Naq pnzr rira
orsber gur xvat'f tngr: sbe abar zvtug ragre vagb gur xvat'f tngr
pybgurq jvgu fnpxpybgu.

4:3 Naq va rirel cebivapr, juvgurefbrire gur xvat'f pbzznaqzrag naq
uvf qrperr pnzr, gurer jnf terng zbheavat nzbat gur Wrjf, naq snfgvat,
naq jrrcvat, naq jnvyvat; naq znal ynl va fnpxpybgu naq nfurf.

4:4 Fb Rfgure'f znvqf naq ure punzoreynvaf pnzr naq gbyq vg ure. Gura
jnf gur dhrra rkprrqvatyl tevrirq; naq fur frag envzrag gb pybgur
Zbeqrpnv, naq gb gnxr njnl uvf fnpxpybgu sebz uvz: ohg ur erprvirq vg
abg.

4:5 Gura pnyyrq Rfgure sbe Ungnpu, bar bs gur xvat'f punzoreynvaf,
jubz ur unq nccbvagrq gb nggraq hcba ure, naq tnir uvz n pbzznaqzrag
gb Zbeqrpnv, gb xabj jung vg jnf, naq jul vg jnf.

4:6 Fb Ungnpu jrag sbegu gb Zbeqrpnv hagb gur fgerrg bs gur pvgl,
juvpu jnf orsber gur xvat'f tngr.

4:7 Naq Zbeqrpnv gbyq uvz bs nyy gung unq unccrarq hagb uvz, naq bs
gur fhz bs gur zbarl gung Unzna unq cebzvfrq gb cnl gb gur xvat'f
gernfhevrf sbe gur Wrjf, gb qrfgebl gurz.

4:8 Nyfb ur tnir uvz gur pbcl bs gur jevgvat bs gur qrperr gung jnf
tvira ng Fuhfuna gb qrfgebl gurz, gb furj vg hagb Rfgure, naq gb
qrpyner vg hagb ure, naq gb punetr ure gung fur fubhyq tb va hagb gur
xvat, gb znxr fhccyvpngvba hagb uvz, naq gb znxr erdhrfg orsber uvz
sbe ure crbcyr.

4:9 Naq Ungnpu pnzr naq gbyq Rfgure gur jbeqf bs Zbeqrpnv.

4:10 Ntnva Rfgure fcnxr hagb Ungnpu, naq tnir uvz pbzznaqzrag hagb
Zbeqrpnv; 4:11 Nyy gur xvat'f freinagf, naq gur crbcyr bs gur xvat'f
cebivaprf, qb xabj, gung jubfbrire, jurgure zna be jbzra, funyy pbzr
hagb gur xvat vagb gur vaare pbheg, jub vf abg pnyyrq, gurer vf bar
ynj bs uvf gb chg uvz gb qrngu, rkprcg fhpu gb jubz gur xvat funyy
ubyq bhg gur tbyqra fprcger, gung ur znl yvir: ohg V unir abg orra
pnyyrq gb pbzr va hagb gur xvat gurfr guvegl qnlf.

4:12 Naq gurl gbyq gb Zbeqrpnv Rfgure'f jbeqf.

4:13 Gura Zbeqrpnv pbzznaqrq gb nafjre Rfgure, Guvax abg jvgu gulfrys
gung gubh funyg rfpncr va gur xvat'f ubhfr, zber guna nyy gur Wrjf.

4:14 Sbe vs gubh nygbtrgure ubyqrfg gul crnpr ng guvf gvzr, gura funyy
gurer raynetrzrag naq qryvirenapr nevfr gb gur Wrjf sebz nabgure
cynpr; ohg gubh naq gul sngure'f ubhfr funyy or qrfgeblrq: naq jub
xabjrgu jurgure gubh neg pbzr gb gur xvatqbz sbe fhpu n gvzr nf guvf?
4:15 Gura Rfgure onqr gurz erghea Zbeqrpnv guvf nafjre, 4:16 Tb,
tngure gbtrgure nyy gur Wrjf gung ner cerfrag va Fuhfuna, naq snfg lr
sbe zr, naq arvgure rng abe qevax guerr qnlf, avtug be qnl: V nyfb naq
zl znvqraf jvyy snfg yvxrjvfr; naq fb jvyy V tb va hagb gur xvat,
juvpu vf abg nppbeqvat gb gur ynj: naq vs V crevfu, V crevfu.

4:17 Fb Zbeqrpnv jrag uvf jnl, naq qvq nppbeqvat gb nyy gung Rfgure
unq pbzznaqrq uvz.

5:1 Abj vg pnzr gb cnff ba gur guveq qnl, gung Rfgure chg ba ure eblny
nccnery, naq fgbbq va gur vaare pbheg bs gur xvat'f ubhfr, bire
ntnvafg gur xvat'f ubhfr: naq gur xvat fng hcba uvf eblny guebar va
gur eblny ubhfr, bire ntnvafg gur tngr bs gur ubhfr.

5:2 Naq vg jnf fb, jura gur xvat fnj Rfgure gur dhrra fgnaqvat va gur
pbheg, gung fur bognvarq snibhe va uvf fvtug: naq gur xvat uryq bhg gb
Rfgure gur tbyqra fprcger gung jnf va uvf unaq. Fb Rfgure qerj arne,
naq gbhpurq gur gbc bs gur fprcger.

5:3 Gura fnvq gur xvat hagb ure, Jung jvyg gubh, dhrra Rfgure? naq
jung vf gul erdhrfg? vg funyy or rira tvira gurr gb gur unys bs gur
xvatqbz.

5:4 Naq Rfgure nafjrerq, Vs vg frrz tbbq hagb gur xvat, yrg gur xvat
naq Unzna pbzr guvf qnl hagb gur onadhrg gung V unir cercnerq sbe uvz.

5:5 Gura gur xvat fnvq, Pnhfr Unzna gb znxr unfgr, gung ur znl qb nf
Rfgure ungu fnvq. Fb gur xvat naq Unzna pnzr gb gur onadhrg gung
Rfgure unq cercnerq.

5:6 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb Rfgure ng gur onadhrg bs jvar, Jung vf gul
crgvgvba? naq vg funyy or tenagrq gurr: naq jung vf gul erdhrfg? rira
gb gur unys bs gur xvatqbz vg funyy or cresbezrq.

5:7 Gura nafjrerq Rfgure, naq fnvq, Zl crgvgvba naq zl erdhrfg vf; 5:8
Vs V unir sbhaq snibhe va gur fvtug bs gur xvat, naq vs vg cyrnfr gur
xvat gb tenag zl crgvgvba, naq gb cresbez zl erdhrfg, yrg gur xvat naq
Unzna pbzr gb gur onadhrg gung V funyy cercner sbe gurz, naq V jvyy qb
gb zbeebj nf gur xvat ungu fnvq.

5:9 Gura jrag Unzna sbegu gung qnl wblshy naq jvgu n tynq urneg: ohg
jura Unzna fnj Zbeqrpnv va gur xvat'f tngr, gung ur fgbbq abg hc, abe
zbirq sbe uvz, ur jnf shyy bs vaqvtangvba ntnvafg Zbeqrpnv.

5:10 Arireguryrff Unzna ersenvarq uvzfrys: naq jura ur pnzr ubzr, ur
frag naq pnyyrq sbe uvf sevraqf, naq Mrerfu uvf jvsr.

5:11 Naq Unzna gbyq gurz bs gur tybel bs uvf evpurf, naq gur zhygvghqr
bs uvf puvyqera, naq nyy gur guvatf jurerva gur xvat unq cebzbgrq uvz,
naq ubj ur unq nqinaprq uvz nobir gur cevaprf naq freinagf bs gur
xvat.

5:12 Unzna fnvq zberbire, Lrn, Rfgure gur dhrra qvq yrg ab zna pbzr va
jvgu gur xvat hagb gur onadhrg gung fur unq cercnerq ohg zlfrys; naq
gb zbeebj nz V vaivgrq hagb ure nyfb jvgu gur xvat.

5:13 Lrg nyy guvf ninvyrgu zr abguvat, fb ybat nf V frr Zbeqrpnv gur
Wrj fvggvat ng gur xvat'f tngr.

5:14 Gura fnvq Mrerfu uvf jvsr naq nyy uvf sevraqf hagb uvz, Yrg n
tnyybjf or znqr bs svsgl phovgf uvtu, naq gb zbeebj fcrnx gubh hagb
gur xvat gung Zbeqrpnv znl or unatrq gurerba: gura tb gubh va zreevyl
jvgu gur xvat hagb gur onadhrg. Naq gur guvat cyrnfrq Unzna; naq ur
pnhfrq gur tnyybjf gb or znqr.

6:1 Ba gung avtug pbhyq abg gur xvat fyrrc, naq ur pbzznaqrq gb oevat
gur obbx bs erpbeqf bs gur puebavpyrf; naq gurl jrer ernq orsber gur
xvat.

6:2 Naq vg jnf sbhaq jevggra, gung Zbeqrpnv unq gbyq bs Ovtgunan naq
Grerfu, gjb bs gur xvat'f punzoreynvaf, gur xrrcref bs gur qbbe, jub
fbhtug gb ynl unaq ba gur xvat Nunfhrehf.

6:3 Naq gur xvat fnvq, Jung ubabhe naq qvtavgl ungu orra qbar gb
Zbeqrpnv sbe guvf? Gura fnvq gur xvat'f freinagf gung zvavfgrerq hagb
uvz, Gurer vf abguvat qbar sbe uvz.

6:4 Naq gur xvat fnvq, Jub vf va gur pbheg? Abj Unzna jnf pbzr vagb
gur bhgjneq pbheg bs gur xvat'f ubhfr, gb fcrnx hagb gur xvat gb unat
Zbeqrpnv ba gur tnyybjf gung ur unq cercnerq sbe uvz.

6:5 Naq gur xvat'f freinagf fnvq hagb uvz, Orubyq, Unzna fgnaqrgu va
gur pbheg. Naq gur xvat fnvq, Yrg uvz pbzr va.

6:6 Fb Unzna pnzr va. Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb uvz, Jung funyy or qbar
hagb gur zna jubz gur xvat qryvtugrgu gb ubabhe? Abj Unzna gubhtug va
uvf urneg, Gb jubz jbhyq gur xvat qryvtug gb qb ubabhe zber guna gb
zlfrys?  6:7 Naq Unzna nafjrerq gur xvat, Sbe gur zna jubz gur xvat
qryvtugrgu gb ubabhe, 6:8 Yrg gur eblny nccnery or oebhtug juvpu gur
xvat hfrgu gb jrne, naq gur ubefr gung gur xvat evqrgu hcba, naq gur
pebja eblny juvpu vf frg hcba uvf urnq: 6:9 Naq yrg guvf nccnery naq
ubefr or qryvirerq gb gur unaq bs bar bs gur xvat'f zbfg aboyr
cevaprf, gung gurl znl neenl gur zna jvguny jubz gur xvat qryvtugrgu
gb ubabhe, naq oevat uvz ba ubefronpx guebhtu gur fgerrg bs gur pvgl,
naq cebpynvz orsber uvz, Guhf funyy vg or qbar gb gur zna jubz gur
xvat qryvtugrgu gb ubabhe.

6:10 Gura gur xvat fnvq gb Unzna, Znxr unfgr, naq gnxr gur nccnery naq
gur ubefr, nf gubh unfg fnvq, naq qb rira fb gb Zbeqrpnv gur Wrj, gung
fvggrgu ng gur xvat'f tngr: yrg abguvat snvy bs nyy gung gubh unfg
fcbxra.

6:11 Gura gbbx Unzna gur nccnery naq gur ubefr, naq neenlrq Zbeqrpnv,
naq oebhtug uvz ba ubefronpx guebhtu gur fgerrg bs gur pvgl, naq
cebpynvzrq orsber uvz, Guhf funyy vg or qbar hagb gur zna jubz gur
xvat qryvtugrgu gb ubabhe.
