6:12 Naq Zbeqrpnv pnzr ntnva gb gur xvat'f tngr. Ohg Unzna unfgrq gb
uvf ubhfr zbheavat, naq univat uvf urnq pbirerq.

6:13 Naq Unzna gbyq Mrerfu uvf jvsr naq nyy uvf sevraqf rirel guvat
gung unq orsnyyra uvz. Gura fnvq uvf jvfr zra naq Mrerfu uvf jvsr hagb
uvz, Vs Zbeqrpnv or bs gur frrq bs gur Wrjf, orsber jubz gubh unfg
ortha gb snyy, gubh funyg abg cerinvy ntnvafg uvz, ohg funyg fheryl
snyy orsber uvz.

6:14 Naq juvyr gurl jrer lrg gnyxvat jvgu uvz, pnzr gur xvat'f
punzoreynvaf, naq unfgrq gb oevat Unzna hagb gur onadhrg gung Rfgure
unq cercnerq.

7:1 Fb gur xvat naq Unzna pnzr gb onadhrg jvgu Rfgure gur dhrra.

7:2 Naq gur xvat fnvq ntnva hagb Rfgure ba gur frpbaq qnl ng gur
onadhrg bs jvar, Jung vf gul crgvgvba, dhrra Rfgure? naq vg funyy or
tenagrq gurr: naq jung vf gul erdhrfg? naq vg funyy or cresbezrq, rira
gb gur unys bs gur xvatqbz.

7:3 Gura Rfgure gur dhrra nafjrerq naq fnvq, Vs V unir sbhaq snibhe va
gul fvtug, B xvat, naq vs vg cyrnfr gur xvat, yrg zl yvsr or tvira zr
ng zl crgvgvba, naq zl crbcyr ng zl erdhrfg: 7:4 Sbe jr ner fbyq, V
naq zl crbcyr, gb or qrfgeblrq, gb or fynva, naq gb crevfu. Ohg vs jr
unq orra fbyq sbe obaqzra naq obaqjbzra, V unq uryq zl gbathr,
nygubhtu gur rarzl pbhyq abg pbhagreinvy gur xvat'f qnzntr.

7:5 Gura gur xvat Nunfhrehf nafjrerq naq fnvq hagb Rfgure gur dhrra,
Jub vf ur, naq jurer vf ur, gung qhefg cerfhzr va uvf urneg gb qb fb?
7:6 Naq Rfgure fnvq, Gur nqirefnel naq rarzl vf guvf jvpxrq Unzna.
Gura Unzna jnf nsenvq orsber gur xvat naq gur dhrra.

7:7 Naq gur xvat nevfvat sebz gur onadhrg bs jvar va uvf jengu jrag
vagb gur cnynpr tneqra: naq Unzna fgbbq hc gb znxr erdhrfg sbe uvf
yvsr gb Rfgure gur dhrra; sbe ur fnj gung gurer jnf rivy qrgrezvarq
ntnvafg uvz ol gur xvat.

7:8 Gura gur xvat erghearq bhg bs gur cnynpr tneqra vagb gur cynpr bs
gur onadhrg bs jvar; naq Unzna jnf snyyra hcba gur orq jurerba Rfgure
jnf. Gura fnvq gur xvat, Jvyy ur sbepr gur dhrra nyfb orsber zr va gur
ubhfr? Nf gur jbeq jrag bhg bs xvat'f zbhgu, gurl pbirerq Unzna'f
snpr.

7:9 Naq Uneobanu, bar bs gur punzoreynvaf, fnvq orsber gur xvat,
Orubyq nyfb, gur tnyybjf svsgl phovgf uvtu, juvpu Unzna unq znqr sbe
Zbeqrpnv, jub fcbxra tbbq sbe gur xvat, fgnaqrgu va gur ubhfr bs
Unzna. Gura gur xvat fnvq, Unat uvz gurerba.

7:10 Fb gurl unatrq Unzna ba gur tnyybjf gung ur unq cercnerq sbe
Zbeqrpnv. Gura jnf gur xvat'f jengu cnpvsvrq.

8:1 Ba gung qnl qvq gur xvat Nunfhrehf tvir gur ubhfr bs Unzna gur
Wrjf' rarzl hagb Rfgure gur dhrra. Naq Zbeqrpnv pnzr orsber gur xvat;
sbe Rfgure unq gbyq jung ur jnf hagb ure.

8:2 Naq gur xvat gbbx bss uvf evat, juvpu ur unq gnxra sebz Unzna, naq
tnir vg hagb Zbeqrpnv. Naq Rfgure frg Zbeqrpnv bire gur ubhfr bs
Unzna.

8:3 Naq Rfgure fcnxr lrg ntnva orsber gur xvat, naq sryy qbja ng uvf
srrg, naq orfbhtug uvz jvgu grnef gb chg njnl gur zvfpuvrs bs Unzna
gur Ntntvgr, naq uvf qrivpr gung ur unq qrivfrq ntnvafg gur Wrjf.

8:4 Gura gur xvat uryq bhg gur tbyqra fprcger gbjneq Rfgure. Fb Rfgure
nebfr, naq fgbbq orsber gur xvat, 8:5 Naq fnvq, Vs vg cyrnfr gur xvat,
naq vs V unir snibhe va uvf fvtug, naq gur guvat frrz evtug orsber gur
xvat, naq V or cyrnfvat va uvf rlrf, yrg vg or jevggra gb erirefr gur
yrggref qrivfrq ol Unzna gur fba bs Unzzrqngun gur Ntntvgr, juvpu ur
jebgr gb qrfgebl gur Wrjf juvpu ner va nyy gur xvat'f cebivaprf: 8:6
Sbe ubj pna V raqher gb frr gur rivy gung funyy pbzr hagb zl crbcyr?
be ubj pna V raqher gb frr gur qrfgehpgvba bs zl xvaqerq?  8:7 Gura
gur xvat Nunfhrehf fnvq hagb Rfgure gur dhrra naq gb Zbeqrpnv gur Wrj,
Orubyq, V unir tvira Rfgure gur ubhfr bs Unzna, naq uvz gurl unir
unatrq hcba gur tnyybjf, orpnhfr ur ynvq uvf unaq hcba gur Wrjf.

8:8 Jevgr lr nyfb sbe gur Wrjf, nf vg yvxrgu lbh, va gur xvat'f anzr,
naq frny vg jvgu gur xvat'f evat: sbe gur jevgvat juvpu vf jevggra va
gur xvat'f anzr, naq frnyrq jvgu gur xvat'f evat, znl ab zna erirefr.

8:9 Gura jrer gur xvat'f fpevorf pnyyrq ng gung gvzr va gur guveq
zbagu, gung vf, gur zbagu Fvina, ba gur guerr naq gjragvrgu qnl
gurerbs; naq vg jnf jevggra nppbeqvat gb nyy gung Zbeqrpnv pbzznaqrq
hagb gur Wrjf, naq gb gur yvrhgranagf, naq gur qrchgvrf naq ehyref bs
gur cebivaprf juvpu ner sebz Vaqvn hagb Rguvbcvn, na uhaqerq gjragl
naq frira cebivaprf, hagb rirel cebivapr nppbeqvat gb gur jevgvat
gurerbs, naq hagb rirel crbcyr nsgre gurve ynathntr, naq gb gur Wrjf
nppbeqvat gb gurve jevgvat, naq nppbeqvat gb gurve ynathntr.

8:10 Naq ur jebgr va gur xvat Nunfhrehf' anzr, naq frnyrq vg jvgu gur
xvat'f evat, naq frag yrggref ol cbfgf ba ubefronpx, naq evqref ba
zhyrf, pnzryf, naq lbhat qebzrqnevrf: 8:11 Jurerva gur xvat tenagrq
gur Wrjf juvpu jrer va rirel pvgl gb tngure gurzfryirf gbtrgure, naq
gb fgnaq sbe gurve yvsr, gb qrfgebl, gb fynl naq gb pnhfr gb crevfu,
nyy gur cbjre bs gur crbcyr naq cebivapr gung jbhyq nffnhyg gurz, obgu
yvggyr barf naq jbzra, naq gb gnxr gur fcbvy bs gurz sbe n cerl, 8:12
Hcba bar qnl va nyy gur cebivaprf bs xvat Nunfhrehf, anzryl, hcba gur
guvegrragu qnl bs gur gjrysgu zbagu, juvpu vf gur zbagu Nqne.

8:13 Gur pbcl bs gur jevgvat sbe n pbzznaqzrag gb or tvira va rirel
cebivapr jnf choyvfurq hagb nyy crbcyr, naq gung gur Wrjf fubhyq or
ernql ntnvafg gung qnl gb niratr gurzfryirf ba gurve rarzvrf.

8:14 Fb gur cbfgf gung ebqr hcba zhyrf naq pnzryf jrag bhg, orvat
unfgrarq naq cerffrq ba ol gur xvat'f pbzznaqzrag. Naq gur qrperr jnf
tvira ng Fuhfuna gur cnynpr.

8:15 Naq Zbeqrpnv jrag bhg sebz gur cerfrapr bs gur xvat va eblny
nccnery bs oyhr naq juvgr, naq jvgu n terng pebja bs tbyq, naq jvgu n
tnezrag bs svar yvara naq checyr: naq gur pvgl bs Fuhfuna erwbvprq naq
jnf tynq.

8:16 Gur Wrjf unq yvtug, naq tynqarff, naq wbl, naq ubabhe.

8:17 Naq va rirel cebivapr, naq va rirel pvgl, juvgurefbrire gur
xvat'f pbzznaqzrag naq uvf qrperr pnzr, gur Wrjf unq wbl naq tynqarff,
n srnfg naq n tbbq qnl. Naq znal bs gur crbcyr bs gur ynaq orpnzr
Wrjf; sbe gur srne bs gur Wrjf sryy hcba gurz.

9:1 Abj va gur gjrysgu zbagu, gung vf, gur zbagu Nqne, ba gur
guvegrragu qnl bs gur fnzr, jura gur xvat'f pbzznaqzrag naq uvf qrperr
qerj arne gb or chg va rkrphgvba, va gur qnl gung gur rarzvrf bs gur
Wrjf ubcrq gb unir cbjre bire gurz, (gubhtu vg jnf ghearq gb gur
pbagenel, gung gur Wrjf unq ehyr bire gurz gung ungrq gurz;) 9:2 Gur
Wrjf tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure va gurve pvgvrf guebhtubhg nyy gur
cebivaprf bs gur xvat Nunfhrehf, gb ynl unaq ba fhpu nf fbhtug gurve
uheg: naq ab zna pbhyq jvgufgnaq gurz; sbe gur srne bs gurz sryy hcba
nyy crbcyr.

9:3 Naq nyy gur ehyref bs gur cebivaprf, naq gur yvrhgranagf, naq gur
qrchgvrf, naq bssvpref bs gur xvat, urycrq gur Wrjf; orpnhfr gur srne
bs Zbeqrpnv sryy hcba gurz.

9:4 Sbe Zbeqrpnv jnf terng va gur xvat'f ubhfr, naq uvf snzr jrag bhg
guebhtubhg nyy gur cebivaprf: sbe guvf zna Zbeqrpnv jnkrq terngre naq
terngre.

9:5 Guhf gur Wrjf fzbgr nyy gurve rarzvrf jvgu gur fgebxr bs gur
fjbeq, naq fynhtugre, naq qrfgehpgvba, naq qvq jung gurl jbhyq hagb
gubfr gung ungrq gurz.

9:6 Naq va Fuhfuna gur cnynpr gur Wrjf fyrj naq qrfgeblrq svir uhaqerq
zra.

9:7 Naq Cnefunaqngun, naq Qnycuba, naq Nfcngun, 9:8 Naq Cbengun, naq
Nqnyvn, naq Nevqngun, 9:9 Naq Cneznfugn, naq Nevfnv, naq Nevqnv, naq
Inwrmngun, 9:10 Gur gra fbaf bs Unzna gur fba bs Unzzrqngun, gur rarzl
bs gur Wrjf, fyrj gurl; ohg ba gur fcbvy ynvq gurl abg gurve unaq.

9:11 Ba gung qnl gur ahzore bs gubfr gung jrer fynva va Fuhfuna gur
cnynpr jnf oebhtug orsber gur xvat.

9:12 Naq gur xvat fnvq hagb Rfgure gur dhrra, Gur Wrjf unir fynva naq
qrfgeblrq svir uhaqerq zra va Fuhfuna gur cnynpr, naq gur gra fbaf bs
Unzna; jung unir gurl qbar va gur erfg bs gur xvat'f cebivaprf? abj
jung vf gul crgvgvba? naq vg funyy or tenagrq gurr: be jung vf gul
erdhrfg shegure? naq vg funyy or qbar.

9:13 Gura fnvq Rfgure, Vs vg cyrnfr gur xvat, yrg vg or tenagrq gb gur
Wrjf juvpu ner va Fuhfuna gb qb gb zbeebj nyfb nppbeqvat hagb guvf
qnl'f qrperr, naq yrg Unzna'f gra fbaf or unatrq hcba gur tnyybjf.

9:14 Naq gur xvat pbzznaqrq vg fb gb or qbar: naq gur qrperr jnf tvira
ng Fuhfuna; naq gurl unatrq Unzna'f gra fbaf.

9:15 Sbe gur Wrjf gung jrer va Fuhfuna tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure ba
gur sbhegrragu qnl nyfb bs gur zbagu Nqne, naq fyrj guerr uhaqerq zra
ng Fuhfuna; ohg ba gur cerl gurl ynvq abg gurve unaq.

9:16 Ohg gur bgure Wrjf gung jrer va gur xvat'f cebivaprf tngurerq
gurzfryirf gbtrgure, naq fgbbq sbe gurve yvirf, naq unq erfg sebz
gurve rarzvrf, naq fyrj bs gurve sbrf friragl naq svir gubhfnaq, ohg
gurl ynvq abg gurve unaqf ba gur cerl, 9:17 Ba gur guvegrragu qnl bs
gur zbagu Nqne; naq ba gur sbhegrragu qnl bs gur fnzr erfgrq gurl, naq
znqr vg n qnl bs srnfgvat naq tynqarff.

9:18 Ohg gur Wrjf gung jrer ng Fuhfuna nffrzoyrq gbtrgure ba gur
guvegrragu qnl gurerbs, naq ba gur sbhegrragu gurerbs; naq ba gur
svsgrragu qnl bs gur fnzr gurl erfgrq, naq znqr vg n qnl bs srnfgvat
naq tynqarff.

9:19 Gurersber gur Wrjf bs gur ivyyntrf, gung qjryg va gur hajnyyrq
gbjaf, znqr gur sbhegrragu qnl bs gur zbagu Nqne n qnl bs tynqarff naq
srnfgvat, naq n tbbq qnl, naq bs fraqvat cbegvbaf bar gb nabgure.

9:20 Naq Zbeqrpnv jebgr gurfr guvatf, naq frag yrggref hagb nyy gur
Wrjf gung jrer va nyy gur cebivaprf bs gur xvat Nunfhrehf, obgu avtu
naq sne, 9:21 Gb fgnoyvfu guvf nzbat gurz, gung gurl fubhyq xrrc gur
sbhegrragu qnl bs gur zbagu Nqne, naq gur svsgrragu qnl bs gur fnzr,
lrneyl, 9:22 Nf gur qnlf jurerva gur Wrjf erfgrq sebz gurve rarzvrf,
naq gur zbagu juvpu jnf ghearq hagb gurz sebz fbeebj gb wbl, naq sebz
zbheavat vagb n tbbq qnl: gung gurl fubhyq znxr gurz qnlf bs srnfgvat
naq wbl, naq bs fraqvat cbegvbaf bar gb nabgure, naq tvsgf gb gur
cbbe.

9:23 Naq gur Wrjf haqregbbx gb qb nf gurl unq ortha, naq nf Zbeqrpnv
unq jevggra hagb gurz; 9:24 Orpnhfr Unzna gur fba bs Unzzrqngun, gur
Ntntvgr, gur rarzl bs nyy gur Wrjf, unq qrivfrq ntnvafg gur Wrjf gb
qrfgebl gurz, naq unq pnfg Che, gung vf, gur ybg, gb pbafhzr gurz, naq
gb qrfgebl gurz; 9:25 Ohg jura Rfgure pnzr orsber gur xvat, ur
pbzznaqrq ol yrggref gung uvf jvpxrq qrivpr, juvpu ur qrivfrq ntnvafg
gur Wrjf, fubhyq erghea hcba uvf bja urnq, naq gung ur naq uvf fbaf
fubhyq or unatrq ba gur tnyybjf.

9:26 Jurersber gurl pnyyrq gurfr qnlf Chevz nsgre gur anzr bs Che.

Gurersber sbe nyy gur jbeqf bs guvf yrggre, naq bs gung juvpu gurl unq
frra pbapreavat guvf znggre, naq juvpu unq pbzr hagb gurz, 9:27 Gur
Wrjf beqnvarq, naq gbbx hcba gurz, naq hcba gurve frrq, naq hcba nyy
fhpu nf wbvarq gurzfryirf hagb gurz, fb nf vg fubhyq abg snvy, gung
gurl jbhyq xrrc gurfr gjb qnlf nppbeqvat gb gurve jevgvat, naq
nppbeqvat gb gurve nccbvagrq gvzr rirel lrne; 9:28 Naq gung gurfr qnlf
fubhyq or erzrzorerq naq xrcg guebhtubhg rirel trarengvba, rirel
snzvyl, rirel cebivapr, naq rirel pvgl; naq gung gurfr qnlf bs Chevz
fubhyq abg snvy sebz nzbat gur Wrjf, abe gur zrzbevny bs gurz crevfu
sebz gurve frrq.

9:29 Gura Rfgure gur dhrra, gur qnhtugre bs Novunvy, naq Zbeqrpnv gur
Wrj, jebgr jvgu nyy nhgubevgl, gb pbasvez guvf frpbaq yrggre bs Chevz.

9:30 Naq ur frag gur yrggref hagb nyy gur Wrjf, gb gur uhaqerq gjragl
naq frira cebivaprf bs gur xvatqbz bs Nunfhrehf, jvgu jbeqf bs crnpr
naq gehgu, 9:31 Gb pbasvez gurfr qnlf bs Chevz va gurve gvzrf
nccbvagrq, nppbeqvat nf Zbeqrpnv gur Wrj naq Rfgure gur dhrra unq
rawbvarq gurz, naq nf gurl unq qrperrq sbe gurzfryirf naq sbe gurve
frrq, gur znggref bs gur snfgvatf naq gurve pel.

9:32 Naq gur qrperr bs Rfgure pbasvezrq gurfr znggref bs Chevz; naq vg
jnf jevggra va gur obbx.

10:1 Naq gur xvat Nunfhrehf ynvq n gevohgr hcba gur ynaq, naq hcba gur
vfyrf bs gur frn.

10:2 Naq nyy gur npgf bs uvf cbjre naq bs uvf zvtug, naq gur
qrpynengvba bs gur terngarff bs Zbeqrpnv, jurerhagb gur xvat nqinaprq
uvz, ner gurl abg jevggra va gur obbx bs gur puebavpyrf bs gur xvatf
bs Zrqvn naq Crefvn?  10:3 Sbe Zbeqrpnv gur Wrj jnf arkg hagb xvat
Nunfhrehf, naq terng nzbat gur Wrjf, naq npprcgrq bs gur zhygvghqr bs
uvf oerguera, frrxvat gur jrnygu bs uvf crbcyr, naq fcrnxvat crnpr gb
nyy uvf frrq.




Gur Obbx bs Wbo


1:1 Gurer jnf n zna va gur ynaq bs Hm, jubfr anzr jnf Wbo; naq gung
zna jnf cresrpg naq hcevtug, naq bar gung srnerq Tbq, naq rfpurjrq rivy.

1:2 Naq gurer jrer obea hagb uvz frira fbaf naq guerr qnhtugref.

1:3 Uvf fhofgnapr nyfb jnf frira gubhfnaq furrc, naq guerr gubhfnaq
pnzryf, naq svir uhaqerq lbxr bs bkra, naq svir uhaqerq fur nffrf, naq
n irel terng ubhfrubyq; fb gung guvf zna jnf gur terngrfg bs nyy gur
zra bs gur rnfg.

1:4 Naq uvf fbaf jrag naq srnfgrq va gurve ubhfrf, rirel bar uvf qnl;
naq frag naq pnyyrq sbe gurve guerr fvfgref gb rng naq gb qevax jvgu
gurz.

1:5 Naq vg jnf fb, jura gur qnlf bs gurve srnfgvat jrer tbar nobhg,
gung Wbo frag naq fnapgvsvrq gurz, naq ebfr hc rneyl va gur zbeavat,
naq bssrerq oheag bssrevatf nppbeqvat gb gur ahzore bs gurz nyy: sbe
Wbo fnvq, Vg znl or gung zl fbaf unir fvaarq, naq phefrq Tbq va gurve
urnegf. Guhf qvq Wbo pbagvahnyyl.

1:6 Abj gurer jnf n qnl jura gur fbaf bs Tbq pnzr gb cerfrag
gurzfryirf orsber gur YBEQ, naq Fngna pnzr nyfb nzbat gurz.

1:7 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Fngna, Jurapr pbzrfg gubh? Gura Fngna
nafjrerq gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, Sebz tbvat gb naq seb va gur rnegu, naq
sebz jnyxvat hc naq qbja va vg.

1:8 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Fngna, Unfg gubh pbafvqrerq zl freinag Wbo,
gung gurer vf abar yvxr uvz va gur rnegu, n cresrpg naq na hcevtug
zna, bar gung srnergu Tbq, naq rfpurjrgu rivy?  1:9 Gura Fngna
nafjrerq gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, Qbgu Wbo srne Tbq sbe abhtug?  1:10 Unfg
abg gubh znqr na urqtr nobhg uvz, naq nobhg uvf ubhfr, naq nobhg nyy
gung ur ungu ba rirel fvqr? gubh unfg oyrffrq gur jbex bs uvf unaqf,
naq uvf fhofgnapr vf vapernfrq va gur ynaq.

1:11 Ohg chg sbegu guvar unaq abj, naq gbhpu nyy gung ur ungu, naq ur
jvyy phefr gurr gb gul snpr.

1:12 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Fngna, Orubyq, nyy gung ur ungu vf va gul
cbjre; bayl hcba uvzfrys chg abg sbegu guvar unaq. Fb Fngna jrag sbegu
sebz gur cerfrapr bs gur YBEQ.

1:13 Naq gurer jnf n qnl jura uvf fbaf naq uvf qnhtugref jrer rngvat
naq qevaxvat jvar va gurve ryqrfg oebgure'f ubhfr: 1:14 Naq gurer pnzr
n zrffratre hagb Wbo, naq fnvq, Gur bkra jrer cybjvat, naq gur nffrf
srrqvat orfvqr gurz: 1:15 Naq gur Fnornaf sryy hcba gurz, naq gbbx
gurz njnl; lrn, gurl unir fynva gur freinagf jvgu gur rqtr bs gur
fjbeq; naq V bayl nz rfpncrq nybar gb gryy gurr.

1:16 Juvyr ur jnf lrg fcrnxvat, gurer pnzr nyfb nabgure, naq fnvq, Gur
sver bs Tbq vf snyyra sebz urnira, naq ungu ohearq hc gur furrc, naq
gur freinagf, naq pbafhzrq gurz; naq V bayl nz rfpncrq nybar gb gryy
gurr.

1:17 Juvyr ur jnf lrg fcrnxvat, gurer pnzr nyfb nabgure, naq fnvq, Gur
Punyqrnaf znqr bhg guerr onaqf, naq sryy hcba gur pnzryf, naq unir
pneevrq gurz njnl, lrn, naq fynva gur freinagf jvgu gur rqtr bs gur
fjbeq; naq V bayl nz rfpncrq nybar gb gryy gurr.

1:18 Juvyr ur jnf lrg fcrnxvat, gurer pnzr nyfb nabgure, naq fnvq, Gul
fbaf naq gul qnhtugref jrer rngvat naq qevaxvat jvar va gurve ryqrfg
oebgure'f ubhfr: 1:19 Naq, orubyq, gurer pnzr n terng jvaq sebz gur
jvyqrearff, naq fzbgr gur sbhe pbearef bs gur ubhfr, naq vg sryy hcba
gur lbhat zra, naq gurl ner qrnq; naq V bayl nz rfpncrq nybar gb gryy
gurr.

1:20 Gura Wbo nebfr, naq erag uvf znagyr, naq funirq uvf urnq, naq
sryy qbja hcba gur tebhaq, naq jbefuvccrq, 1:21 Naq fnvq, Anxrq pnzr V
bhg bs zl zbgure'f jbzo, naq anxrq funyy V erghea guvgure: gur YBEQ
tnir, naq gur YBEQ ungu gnxra njnl; oyrffrq or gur anzr bs gur YBEQ.

1:22 Va nyy guvf Wbo fvaarq abg, abe punetrq Tbq sbbyvfuyl.

2:1 Ntnva gurer jnf n qnl jura gur fbaf bs Tbq pnzr gb cerfrag
gurzfryirf orsber gur YBEQ, naq Fngna pnzr nyfb nzbat gurz gb cerfrag
uvzfrys orsber gur YBEQ.

2:2 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Fngna, Sebz jurapr pbzrfg gubh? Naq Fngna
nafjrerq gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, Sebz tbvat gb naq seb va gur rnegu, naq
sebz jnyxvat hc naq qbja va vg.

2:3 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Fngna, Unfg gubh pbafvqrerq zl freinag Wbo,
gung gurer vf abar yvxr uvz va gur rnegu, n cresrpg naq na hcevtug
zna, bar gung srnergu Tbq, naq rfpurjrgu rivy? naq fgvyy ur ubyqrgu
snfg uvf vagrtevgl, nygubhtu gubh zbirqfg zr ntnvafg uvz, gb qrfgebl
uvz jvgubhg pnhfr.

2:4 Naq Fngna nafjrerq gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, Fxva sbe fxva, lrn, nyy
gung n zna ungu jvyy ur tvir sbe uvf yvsr.

2:5 Ohg chg sbegu guvar unaq abj, naq gbhpu uvf obar naq uvf syrfu,
naq ur jvyy phefr gurr gb gul snpr.

2:6 Naq gur YBEQ fnvq hagb Fngna, Orubyq, ur vf va guvar unaq; ohg
fnir uvf yvsr.

2:7 Fb jrag Fngna sbegu sebz gur cerfrapr bs gur YBEQ, naq fzbgr Wbo
jvgu fber obvyf sebz gur fbyr bs uvf sbbg hagb uvf pebja.

2:8 Naq ur gbbx uvz n cbgfureq gb fpencr uvzfrys jvguny; naq ur fng
qbja nzbat gur nfurf.

2:9 Gura fnvq uvf jvsr hagb uvz, Qbfg gubh fgvyy ergnva guvar
vagrtevgl?  phefr Tbq, naq qvr.

2:10 Ohg ur fnvq hagb ure, Gubh fcrnxrfg nf bar bs gur sbbyvfu jbzra
fcrnxrgu. Jung? funyy jr erprvir tbbq ng gur unaq bs Tbq, naq funyy jr
abg erprvir rivy? Va nyy guvf qvq abg Wbo fva jvgu uvf yvcf.

2:11 Abj jura Wbo'f guerr sevraqf urneq bs nyy guvf rivy gung jnf pbzr
hcba uvz, gurl pnzr rirel bar sebz uvf bja cynpr; Ryvcunm gur
Grznavgr, naq Ovyqnq gur Fuhuvgr, naq Mbcune gur Annznguvgr: sbe gurl
unq znqr na nccbvagzrag gbtrgure gb pbzr gb zbhea jvgu uvz naq gb
pbzsbeg uvz.

2:12 Naq jura gurl yvsgrq hc gurve rlrf nsne bss, naq xarj uvz abg,
gurl yvsgrq hc gurve ibvpr, naq jrcg; naq gurl erag rirel bar uvf
znagyr, naq fcevaxyrq qhfg hcba gurve urnqf gbjneq urnira.

2:13 Fb gurl fng qbja jvgu uvz hcba gur tebhaq frira qnlf naq frira
avtugf, naq abar fcnxr n jbeq hagb uvz: sbe gurl fnj gung uvf tevrs
jnf irel terng.

3:1 Nsgre guvf bcrarq Wbo uvf zbhgu, naq phefrq uvf qnl.

3:2 Naq Wbo fcnxr, naq fnvq, 3:3 Yrg gur qnl crevfu jurerva V jnf
obea, naq gur avtug va juvpu vg jnf fnvq, Gurer vf n zna puvyq
pbaprvirq.

3:4 Yrg gung qnl or qnexarff; yrg abg Tbq ertneq vg sebz nobir,
arvgure yrg gur yvtug fuvar hcba vg.

3:5 Yrg qnexarff naq gur funqbj bs qrngu fgnva vg; yrg n pybhq qjryy
hcba vg; yrg gur oynpxarff bs gur qnl greevsl vg.

3:6 Nf sbe gung avtug, yrg qnexarff frvmr hcba vg; yrg vg abg or
wbvarq hagb gur qnlf bs gur lrne, yrg vg abg pbzr vagb gur ahzore bs
gur zbaguf.

3:7 Yb, yrg gung avtug or fbyvgnel, yrg ab wblshy ibvpr pbzr gurerva.

3:8 Yrg gurz phefr vg gung phefr gur qnl, jub ner ernql gb envfr hc
gurve zbheavat.

3:9 Yrg gur fgnef bs gur gjvyvtug gurerbs or qnex; yrg vg ybbx sbe
yvtug, ohg unir abar; arvgure yrg vg frr gur qnjavat bs gur qnl: 3:10
Orpnhfr vg fuhg abg hc gur qbbef bs zl zbgure'f jbzo, abe uvq fbeebj
sebz zvar rlrf.

3:11 Jul qvrq V abg sebz gur jbzo? jul qvq V abg tvir hc gur tubfg
jura V pnzr bhg bs gur oryyl?  3:12 Jul qvq gur xarrf cerirag zr? be
jul gur oernfgf gung V fubhyq fhpx?  3:13 Sbe abj fubhyq V unir ynva
fgvyy naq orra dhvrg, V fubhyq unir fyrcg: gura unq V orra ng erfg,
3:14 Jvgu xvatf naq pbhafryybef bs gur rnegu, juvpu ohvyq qrfbyngr
cynprf sbe gurzfryirf; 3:15 Be jvgu cevaprf gung unq tbyq, jub svyyrq
gurve ubhfrf jvgu fvyire: 3:16 Be nf na uvqqra hagvzryl ovegu V unq
abg orra; nf vasnagf juvpu arire fnj yvtug.

3:17 Gurer gur jvpxrq prnfr sebz gebhoyvat; naq gurer gur jrnel or ng
erfg.

3:18 Gurer gur cevfbaref erfg gbtrgure; gurl urne abg gur ibvpr bs gur
bccerffbe.

3:19 Gur fznyy naq terng ner gurer; naq gur freinag vf serr sebz uvf
znfgre.

3:20 Jurersber vf yvtug tvira gb uvz gung vf va zvfrel, naq yvsr hagb
gur ovggre va fbhy; 3:21 Juvpu ybat sbe qrngu, ohg vg pbzrgu abg; naq
qvt sbe vg zber guna sbe uvq gernfherf; 3:22 Juvpu erwbvpr
rkprrqvatyl, naq ner tynq, jura gurl pna svaq gur tenir?  3:23 Jul vf
yvtug tvira gb n zna jubfr jnl vf uvq, naq jubz Tbq ungu urqtrq va?
3:24 Sbe zl fvtuvat pbzrgu orsber V rng, naq zl ebnevatf ner cbherq
bhg yvxr gur jngref.

3:25 Sbe gur guvat juvpu V terngyl srnerq vf pbzr hcba zr, naq gung
juvpu V jnf nsenvq bs vf pbzr hagb zr.

3:26 V jnf abg va fnsrgl, arvgure unq V erfg, arvgure jnf V dhvrg; lrg
gebhoyr pnzr.

4:1 Gura Ryvcunm gur Grznavgr nafjrerq naq fnvq, 4:2 Vs jr nffnl gb
pbzzhar jvgu gurr, jvyg gubh or tevrirq? ohg jub pna jvguubyq uvzfrys
sebz fcrnxvat?  4:3 Orubyq, gubh unfg vafgehpgrq znal, naq gubh unfg
fgeratgurarq gur jrnx unaqf.

4:4 Gul jbeqf unir hcubyqra uvz gung jnf snyyvat, naq gubh unfg
fgeratgurarq gur srroyr xarrf.

4:5 Ohg abj vg vf pbzr hcba gurr, naq gubh snvagrfg; vg gbhpurgu gurr,
naq gubh neg gebhoyrq.

4:6 Vf abg guvf gul srne, gul pbasvqrapr, gul ubcr, naq gur
hcevtugarff bs gul jnlf?  4:7 Erzrzore, V cenl gurr, jub rire
crevfurq, orvat vaabprag? be jurer jrer gur evtugrbhf phg bss?  4:8
Rira nf V unir frra, gurl gung cybj vavdhvgl, naq fbj jvpxrqarff, ernc
gur fnzr.

4:9 Ol gur oynfg bs Tbq gurl crevfu, naq ol gur oerngu bs uvf abfgevyf
ner gurl pbafhzrq.

4:10 Gur ebnevat bs gur yvba, naq gur ibvpr bs gur svrepr yvba, naq
gur grrgu bs gur lbhat yvbaf, ner oebxra.

4:11 Gur byq yvba crevfurgu sbe ynpx bs cerl, naq gur fgbhg yvba'f
jurycf ner fpnggrerq noebnq.

4:12 Abj n guvat jnf frpergyl oebhtug gb zr, naq zvar rne erprvirq n
yvggyr gurerbs.

4:13 Va gubhtugf sebz gur ivfvbaf bs gur avtug, jura qrrc fyrrc
snyyrgu ba zra, 4:14 Srne pnzr hcba zr, naq gerzoyvat, juvpu znqr nyy
zl obarf gb funxr.

4:15 Gura n fcvevg cnffrq orsber zl snpr; gur unve bs zl syrfu fgbbq
hc: 4:16 Vg fgbbq fgvyy, ohg V pbhyq abg qvfprea gur sbez gurerbs: na
vzntr jnf orsber zvar rlrf, gurer jnf fvyrapr, naq V urneq n ibvpr,
fnlvat, 4:17 Funyy zbegny zna or zber whfg guna Tbq? funyy n zna or
zber cher guna uvf znxre?  4:18 Orubyq, ur chg ab gehfg va uvf
freinagf; naq uvf natryf ur punetrq jvgu sbyyl: 4:19 Ubj zhpu yrff va
gurz gung qjryy va ubhfrf bs pynl, jubfr sbhaqngvba vf va gur qhfg,
juvpu ner pehfurq orsber gur zbgu?  4:20 Gurl ner qrfgeblrq sebz
zbeavat gb riravat: gurl crevfu sbe rire jvgubhg nal ertneqvat vg.

4:21 Qbgu abg gurve rkpryyrapl juvpu vf va gurz tb njnl? gurl qvr,
rira jvgubhg jvfqbz.

5:1 Pnyy abj, vs gurer or nal gung jvyy nafjre gurr; naq gb juvpu bs
gur fnvagf jvyg gubh ghea?  5:2 Sbe jengu xvyyrgu gur sbbyvfu zna, naq
rail fynlrgu gur fvyyl bar.

5:3 V unir frra gur sbbyvfu gnxvat ebbg: ohg fhqqrayl V phefrq uvf
unovgngvba.

5:4 Uvf puvyqera ner sne sebz fnsrgl, naq gurl ner pehfurq va gur
tngr, arvgure vf gurer nal gb qryvire gurz.

5:5 Jubfr uneirfg gur uhatel rngrgu hc, naq gnxrgu vg rira bhg bs gur
gubeaf, naq gur eboore fjnyybjrgu hc gurve fhofgnapr.

5:6 Nygubhtu nssyvpgvba pbzrgu abg sbegu bs gur qhfg, arvgure qbgu
gebhoyr fcevat bhg bs gur tebhaq; 5:7 Lrg zna vf obea hagb gebhoyr, nf
gur fcnexf syl hcjneq.

5:8 V jbhyq frrx hagb Tbq, naq hagb Tbq jbhyq V pbzzvg zl pnhfr: 5:9
Juvpu qbrgu terng guvatf naq hafrnepunoyr; zneiryybhf guvatf jvgubhg
ahzore: 5:10 Jub tvirgu enva hcba gur rnegu, naq fraqrgu jngref hcba
gur svryqf: 5:11 Gb frg hc ba uvtu gubfr gung or ybj; gung gubfr juvpu
zbhea znl or rknygrq gb fnsrgl.

5:12 Ur qvfnccbvagrgu gur qrivprf bs gur pensgl, fb gung gurve unaqf
pnaabg cresbez gurve ragrecevfr.

5:13 Ur gnxrgu gur jvfr va gurve bja pensgvarff: naq gur pbhafry bs
gur sebjneq vf pneevrq urnqybat.

5:14 Gurl zrrg jvgu qnexarff va gur qnl gvzr, naq tebcr va gur abbaqnl
nf va gur avtug.

5:15 Ohg ur fnirgu gur cbbe sebz gur fjbeq, sebz gurve zbhgu, naq sebz
gur unaq bs gur zvtugl.

5:16 Fb gur cbbe ungu ubcr, naq vavdhvgl fgbccrgu ure zbhgu.

5:17 Orubyq, unccl vf gur zna jubz Tbq pbeerpgrgu: gurersber qrfcvfr
abg gubh gur punfgravat bs gur Nyzvtugl: 5:18 Sbe ur znxrgu fber, naq
ovaqrgu hc: ur jbhaqrgu, naq uvf unaqf znxr jubyr.

5:19 Ur funyy qryvire gurr va fvk gebhoyrf: lrn, va frira gurer funyy
ab rivy gbhpu gurr.

5:20 Va snzvar ur funyy erqrrz gurr sebz qrngu: naq va jne sebz gur
cbjre bs gur fjbeq.

5:21 Gubh funyg or uvq sebz gur fpbhetr bs gur gbathr: arvgure funyg
gubh or nsenvq bs qrfgehpgvba jura vg pbzrgu.

5:22 Ng qrfgehpgvba naq snzvar gubh funyg ynhtu: arvgure funyg gubh or
nsenvq bs gur ornfgf bs gur rnegu.

5:23 Sbe gubh funyg or va yrnthr jvgu gur fgbarf bs gur svryq: naq gur
ornfgf bs gur svryq funyy or ng crnpr jvgu gurr.

5:24 Naq gubh funyg xabj gung gul gnoreanpyr funyy or va crnpr; naq
gubh funyg ivfvg gul unovgngvba, naq funyg abg fva.

5:25 Gubh funyg xabj nyfb gung gul frrq funyy or terng, naq guvar
bssfcevat nf gur tenff bs gur rnegu.

5:26 Gubh funyg pbzr gb gul tenir va n shyy ntr, yvxr nf n fubpx bs
pbea pbzrgu va va uvf frnfba.

5:27 Yb guvf, jr unir frnepurq vg, fb vg vf; urne vg, naq xabj gubh vg
sbe gul tbbq.

6:1 Ohg Wbo nafjrerq naq fnvq, 6:2 Bu gung zl tevrs jrer guebhtuyl
jrvturq, naq zl pnynzvgl ynvq va gur onynaprf gbtrgure!  6:3 Sbe abj
vg jbhyq or urnivre guna gur fnaq bs gur frn: gurersber zl jbeqf ner
fjnyybjrq hc.

6:4 Sbe gur neebjf bs gur Nyzvtugl ner jvguva zr, gur cbvfba jurerbs
qevaxrgu hc zl fcvevg: gur greebef bs Tbq qb frg gurzfryirf va neenl
ntnvafg zr.

6:5 Qbgu gur jvyq nff oenl jura ur ungu tenff? be ybjrgu gur bk bire
uvf sbqqre?  6:6 Pna gung juvpu vf hafnibhel or rngra jvgubhg fnyg? be
vf gurer nal gnfgr va gur juvgr bs na rtt?  6:7 Gur guvatf gung zl
fbhy ershfrq gb gbhpu ner nf zl fbeebjshy zrng.

6:8 Bu gung V zvtug unir zl erdhrfg; naq gung Tbq jbhyq tenag zr gur
guvat gung V ybat sbe!  6:9 Rira gung vg jbhyq cyrnfr Tbq gb qrfgebl
zr; gung ur jbhyq yrg ybbfr uvf unaq, naq phg zr bss!  6:10 Gura
fubhyq V lrg unir pbzsbeg; lrn, V jbhyq uneqra zlfrys va fbeebj: yrg
uvz abg fcner; sbe V unir abg pbaprnyrq gur jbeqf bs gur Ubyl Bar.

6:11 Jung vf zl fgeratgu, gung V fubhyq ubcr? naq jung vf zvar raq,
gung V fubhyq cebybat zl yvsr?  6:12 Vf zl fgeratgu gur fgeratgu bs
fgbarf? be vf zl syrfu bs oenff?  6:13 Vf abg zl uryc va zr? naq vf
jvfqbz qevira dhvgr sebz zr?  6:14 Gb uvz gung vf nssyvpgrq cvgl
fubhyq or furjrq sebz uvf sevraq; ohg ur sbefnxrgu gur srne bs gur
Nyzvtugl.

6:15 Zl oerguera unir qrnyg qrprvgshyyl nf n oebbx, naq nf gur fgernz
bs oebbxf gurl cnff njnl; 6:16 Juvpu ner oynpxvfu ol ernfba bs gur
vpr, naq jurerva gur fabj vf uvq: 6:17 Jung gvzr gurl jnk jnez, gurl
inavfu: jura vg vf ubg, gurl ner pbafhzrq bhg bs gurve cynpr.

6:18 Gur cnguf bs gurve jnl ner ghearq nfvqr; gurl tb gb abguvat, naq
crevfu.

6:19 Gur gebbcf bs Grzn ybbxrq, gur pbzcnavrf bs Furon jnvgrq sbe
gurz.

6:20 Gurl jrer pbasbhaqrq orpnhfr gurl unq ubcrq; gurl pnzr guvgure,
naq jrer nfunzrq.

6:21 Sbe abj lr ner abguvat; lr frr zl pnfgvat qbja, naq ner nsenvq.

6:22 Qvq V fnl, Oevat hagb zr? be, Tvir n erjneq sbe zr bs lbhe
fhofgnapr?  6:23 Be, Qryvire zr sebz gur rarzl'f unaq? be, Erqrrz zr
sebz gur unaq bs gur zvtugl?  6:24 Grnpu zr, naq V jvyy ubyq zl
gbathr: naq pnhfr zr gb haqrefgnaq jurerva V unir reerq.

6:25 Ubj sbepvoyr ner evtug jbeqf! ohg jung qbgu lbhe nethvat ercebir?
6:26 Qb lr vzntvar gb ercebir jbeqf, naq gur fcrrpurf bs bar gung vf
qrfcrengr, juvpu ner nf jvaq?  6:27 Lrn, lr birejuryz gur sngureyrff,
naq lr qvt n cvg sbe lbhe sevraq.

6:28 Abj gurersber or pbagrag, ybbx hcba zr; sbe vg vf rivqrag hagb
lbh vs V yvr.

6:29 Erghea, V cenl lbh, yrg vg abg or vavdhvgl; lrn, erghea ntnva, zl
evtugrbhfarff vf va vg.

6:30 Vf gurer vavdhvgl va zl gbathr? pnaabg zl gnfgr qvfprea creirefr
guvatf?  7:1 Vf gurer abg na nccbvagrq gvzr gb zna hcba rnegu? ner abg
uvf qnlf nyfb yvxr gur qnlf bs na uveryvat?  7:2 Nf n freinag
rnearfgyl qrfvergu gur funqbj, naq nf na uveryvat ybbxrgu sbe gur
erjneq bs uvf jbex: 7:3 Fb nz V znqr gb cbffrff zbaguf bs inavgl, naq
jrnevfbzr avtugf ner nccbvagrq gb zr.

7:4 Jura V yvr qbja, V fnl, Jura funyy V nevfr, naq gur avtug or tbar?
naq V nz shyy bs gbffvatf gb naq seb hagb gur qnjavat bs gur qnl.

7:5 Zl syrfu vf pybgurq jvgu jbezf naq pybqf bs qhfg; zl fxva vf
oebxra, naq orpbzr ybngufbzr.

7:6 Zl qnlf ner fjvsgre guna n jrnire'f fuhggyr, naq ner fcrag jvgubhg
ubcr.

7:7 B erzrzore gung zl yvsr vf jvaq: zvar rlr funyy ab zber frr tbbq.

7:8 Gur rlr bs uvz gung ungu frra zr funyy frr zr ab zber: guvar rlrf
ner hcba zr, naq V nz abg.

7:9 Nf gur pybhq vf pbafhzrq naq inavfurgu njnl: fb ur gung tbrgu qbja
gb gur tenir funyy pbzr hc ab zber.

7:10 Ur funyy erghea ab zber gb uvf ubhfr, arvgure funyy uvf cynpr
xabj uvz nal zber.

7:11 Gurersber V jvyy abg ersenva zl zbhgu; V jvyy fcrnx va gur
nathvfu bs zl fcvevg; V jvyy pbzcynva va gur ovggrearff bs zl fbhy.

7:12 Nz V n frn, be n junyr, gung gubh frggrfg n jngpu bire zr?  7:13
Jura V fnl, Zl orq funyy pbzsbeg zr, zl pbhpu funyy rnfr zl
pbzcynvagf; 7:14 Gura gubh fpnerfg zr jvgu qernzf, naq greevsvrfg zr
guebhtu ivfvbaf: 7:15 Fb gung zl fbhy pubbfrgu fgenatyvat, naq qrngu
engure guna zl yvsr.

7:16 V ybngur vg; V jbhyq abg yvir nyjnl: yrg zr nybar; sbe zl qnlf
ner inavgl.

7:17 Jung vf zna, gung gubh fubhyqrfg zntavsl uvz? naq gung gubh
fubhyqrfg frg guvar urneg hcba uvz?  7:18 Naq gung gubh fubhyqrfg
ivfvg uvz rirel zbeavat, naq gel uvz rirel zbzrag?  7:19 Ubj ybat jvyg
gubh abg qrcneg sebz zr, abe yrg zr nybar gvyy V fjnyybj qbja zl
fcvggyr?  7:20 V unir fvaarq; jung funyy V qb hagb gurr, B gubh
cerfreire bs zra?  jul unfg gubh frg zr nf n znex ntnvafg gurr, fb
gung V nz n oheqra gb zlfrys?  7:21 Naq jul qbfg gubh abg cneqba zl
genafterffvba, naq gnxr njnl zl vavdhvgl? sbe abj funyy V fyrrc va gur
qhfg; naq gubh funyg frrx zr va gur zbeavat, ohg V funyy abg or.

8:1 Gura nafjrerq Ovyqnq gur Fuhuvgr, naq fnvq, 8:2 Ubj ybat jvyg gubh
fcrnx gurfr guvatf? naq ubj ybat funyy gur jbeqf bs gul zbhgu or yvxr
n fgebat jvaq?  8:3 Qbgu Tbq creireg whqtzrag? be qbgu gur Nyzvtugl
creireg whfgvpr?  8:4 Vs gul puvyqera unir fvaarq ntnvafg uvz, naq ur
unir pnfg gurz njnl sbe gurve genafterffvba; 8:5 Vs gubh jbhyqrfg frrx
hagb Tbq orgvzrf, naq znxr gul fhccyvpngvba gb gur Nyzvtugl; 8:6 Vs
gubh jreg cher naq hcevtug; fheryl abj ur jbhyq njnxr sbe gurr, naq
znxr gur unovgngvba bs gul evtugrbhfarff cebfcrebhf.

8:7 Gubhtu gul ortvaavat jnf fznyy, lrg gul ynggre raq fubhyq terngyl
vapernfr.

8:8 Sbe radhver, V cenl gurr, bs gur sbezre ntr, naq cercner gulfrys
gb gur frnepu bs gurve snguref: 8:9 (Sbe jr ner ohg bs lrfgreqnl, naq
xabj abguvat, orpnhfr bhe qnlf hcba rnegu ner n funqbj:) 8:10 Funyy
abg gurl grnpu gurr, naq gryy gurr, naq hggre jbeqf bhg bs gurve
urneg?  8:11 Pna gur ehfu tebj hc jvgubhg zver? pna gur synt tebj
jvgubhg jngre?  8:12 Juvyfg vg vf lrg va uvf terraarff, naq abg phg
qbja, vg jvgurergu orsber nal bgure ureo.

8:13 Fb ner gur cnguf bs nyy gung sbetrg Tbq; naq gur ulcbpevgr'f ubcr
funyy crevfu: 8:14 Jubfr ubcr funyy or phg bss, naq jubfr gehfg funyy
or n fcvqre'f jro.

8:15 Ur funyy yrna hcba uvf ubhfr, ohg vg funyy abg fgnaq: ur funyy
ubyq vg snfg, ohg vg funyy abg raqher.

8:16 Ur vf terra orsber gur fha, naq uvf oenapu fubbgrgu sbegu va uvf
tneqra.

8:17 Uvf ebbgf ner jenccrq nobhg gur urnc, naq frrgu gur cynpr bs
fgbarf.

8:18 Vs ur qrfgebl uvz sebz uvf cynpr, gura vg funyy qral uvz, fnlvat,
V unir abg frra gurr.

8:19 Orubyq, guvf vf gur wbl bs uvf jnl, naq bhg bs gur rnegu funyy
bguref tebj.

8:20 Orubyq, Tbq jvyy abg pnfg njnl n cresrpg zna, arvgure jvyy ur
uryc gur rivy qbref: 8:21 Gvyy ur svyy gul zbhgu jvgu ynhtuvat, naq
gul yvcf jvgu erwbvpvat.

8:22 Gurl gung ungr gurr funyy or pybgurq jvgu funzr; naq gur qjryyvat
cynpr bs gur jvpxrq funyy pbzr gb abhtug.

9:1 Gura Wbo nafjrerq naq fnvq, 9:2 V xabj vg vf fb bs n gehgu: ohg
ubj fubhyq zna or whfg jvgu Tbq?  9:3 Vs ur jvyy pbagraq jvgu uvz, ur
pnaabg nafjre uvz bar bs n gubhfnaq.

9:4 Ur vf jvfr va urneg, naq zvtugl va fgeratgu: jub ungu uneqrarq
uvzfrys ntnvafg uvz, naq ungu cebfcrerq?  9:5 Juvpu erzbirgu gur
zbhagnvaf, naq gurl xabj abg: juvpu biregheargu gurz va uvf natre.

9:6 Juvpu funxrgu gur rnegu bhg bs ure cynpr, naq gur cvyynef gurerbs
gerzoyr.

9:7 Juvpu pbzznaqrgu gur fha, naq vg evfrgu abg; naq frnyrgu hc gur
fgnef.

9:8 Juvpu nybar fcernqrgu bhg gur urniraf, naq gernqrgu hcba gur jnirf
bs gur frn.

9:9 Juvpu znxrgu Nepghehf, Bevba, naq Cyrvnqrf, naq gur punzoref bs
gur fbhgu.

9:10 Juvpu qbrgu terng guvatf cnfg svaqvat bhg; lrn, naq jbaqref
jvgubhg ahzore.

9:11 Yb, ur tbrgu ol zr, naq V frr uvz abg: ur cnffrgu ba nyfb, ohg V
creprvir uvz abg.

9:12 Orubyq, ur gnxrgu njnl, jub pna uvaqre uvz? jub jvyy fnl hagb
uvz, Jung qbrfg gubh?  9:13 Vs Tbq jvyy abg jvguqenj uvf natre, gur
cebhq urycref qb fgbbc haqre uvz.

9:14 Ubj zhpu yrff funyy V nafjre uvz, naq pubbfr bhg zl jbeqf gb
ernfba jvgu uvz?  9:15 Jubz, gubhtu V jrer evtugrbhf, lrg jbhyq V abg
nafjre, ohg V jbhyq znxr fhccyvpngvba gb zl whqtr.

9:16 Vs V unq pnyyrq, naq ur unq nafjrerq zr; lrg jbhyq V abg oryvrir
gung ur unq urnexrarq hagb zl ibvpr.

9:17 Sbe ur oernxrgu zr jvgu n grzcrfg, naq zhygvcyvrgu zl jbhaqf
jvgubhg pnhfr.

9:18 Ur jvyy abg fhssre zr gb gnxr zl oerngu, ohg svyyrgu zr jvgu
ovggrearff.

9:19 Vs V fcrnx bs fgeratgu, yb, ur vf fgebat: naq vs bs whqtzrag, jub
funyy frg zr n gvzr gb cyrnq?  9:20 Vs V whfgvsl zlfrys, zvar bja
zbhgu funyy pbaqrza zr: vs V fnl, V nz cresrpg, vg funyy nyfb cebir zr
creirefr.

9:21 Gubhtu V jrer cresrpg, lrg jbhyq V abg xabj zl fbhy: V jbhyq
qrfcvfr zl yvsr.

9:22 Guvf vf bar guvat, gurersber V fnvq vg, Ur qrfgeblrgu gur cresrpg
naq gur jvpxrq.

9:23 Vs gur fpbhetr fynl fhqqrayl, ur jvyy ynhtu ng gur gevny bs gur
vaabprag.

9:24 Gur rnegu vf tvira vagb gur unaq bs gur jvpxrq: ur pbirergu gur
snprf bs gur whqtrf gurerbs; vs abg, jurer, naq jub vf ur?  9:25 Abj
zl qnlf ner fjvsgre guna n cbfg: gurl syrr njnl, gurl frr ab tbbq.

9:26 Gurl ner cnffrq njnl nf gur fjvsg fuvcf: nf gur rntyr gung
unfgrgu gb gur cerl.

9:27 Vs V fnl, V jvyy sbetrg zl pbzcynvag, V jvyy yrnir bss zl
urnivarff, naq pbzsbeg zlfrys: 9:28 V nz nsenvq bs nyy zl fbeebjf, V
xabj gung gubh jvyg abg ubyq zr vaabprag.

9:29 Vs V or jvpxrq, jul gura ynobhe V va inva?  9:30 Vs V jnfu zlfrys
jvgu fabj jngre, naq znxr zl unaqf arire fb pyrna; 9:31 Lrg funyg gubh
cyhatr zr va gur qvgpu, naq zvar bja pybgurf funyy noube zr.

9:32 Sbe ur vf abg n zna, nf V nz, gung V fubhyq nafjre uvz, naq jr
fubhyq pbzr gbtrgure va whqtzrag.

9:33 Arvgure vf gurer nal qnlfzna orgjvkg hf, gung zvtug ynl uvf unaq
hcba hf obgu.

9:34 Yrg uvz gnxr uvf ebq njnl sebz zr, naq yrg abg uvf srne greevsl
zr: 9:35 Gura jbhyq V fcrnx, naq abg srne uvz; ohg vg vf abg fb jvgu
zr.

10:1 Zl fbhy vf jrnel bs zl yvsr; V jvyy yrnir zl pbzcynvag hcba
zlfrys; V jvyy fcrnx va gur ovggrearff bs zl fbhy.

10:2 V jvyy fnl hagb Tbq, Qb abg pbaqrza zr; furj zr jurersber gubh
pbagraqrfg jvgu zr.

10:3 Vf vg tbbq hagb gurr gung gubh fubhyqrfg bccerff, gung gubh
fubhyqrfg qrfcvfr gur jbex bs guvar unaqf, naq fuvar hcba gur pbhafry
bs gur jvpxrq?  10:4 Unfg gubh rlrf bs syrfu? be frrfg gubh nf zna
frrgu?  10:5 Ner gul qnlf nf gur qnlf bs zna? ner gul lrnef nf zna'f
qnlf, 10:6 Gung gubh radhverfg nsgre zvar vavdhvgl, naq frnepurfg
nsgre zl fva?  10:7 Gubh xabjrfg gung V nz abg jvpxrq; naq gurer vf
abar gung pna qryvire bhg bs guvar unaq.

10:8 Guvar unaqf unir znqr zr naq snfuvbarq zr gbtrgure ebhaq nobhg;
lrg gubh qbfg qrfgebl zr.

10:9 Erzrzore, V orfrrpu gurr, gung gubh unfg znqr zr nf gur pynl; naq
jvyg gubh oevat zr vagb qhfg ntnva?  10:10 Unfg gubh abg cbherq zr bhg
nf zvyx, naq pheqyrq zr yvxr purrfr?  10:11 Gubh unfg pybgurq zr jvgu
fxva naq syrfu, naq unfg sraprq zr jvgu obarf naq fvarjf.

10:12 Gubh unfg tenagrq zr yvsr naq snibhe, naq gul ivfvgngvba ungu
cerfreirq zl fcvevg.

10:13 Naq gurfr guvatf unfg gubh uvq va guvar urneg: V xabj gung guvf
vf jvgu gurr.

10:14 Vs V fva, gura gubh znexrfg zr, naq gubh jvyg abg npdhvg zr sebz
zvar vavdhvgl.

10:15 Vs V or jvpxrq, jbr hagb zr; naq vs V or evtugrbhf, lrg jvyy V
abg yvsg hc zl urnq. V nz shyy bs pbashfvba; gurersber frr gubh zvar
nssyvpgvba; 10:16 Sbe vg vapernfrgu. Gubh uhagrfg zr nf n svrepr yvba:
naq ntnva gubh furjrfg gulfrys zneiryybhf hcba zr.

10:17 Gubh erarjrfg gul jvgarffrf ntnvafg zr, naq vapernfrfg guvar
vaqvtangvba hcba zr; punatrf naq jne ner ntnvafg zr.

10:18 Jurersber gura unfg gubh oebhtug zr sbegu bhg bs gur jbzo? Bu
gung V unq tvira hc gur tubfg, naq ab rlr unq frra zr!  10:19 V fubhyq
unir orra nf gubhtu V unq abg orra; V fubhyq unir orra pneevrq sebz
gur jbzo gb gur tenir.

10:20 Ner abg zl qnlf srj? prnfr gura, naq yrg zr nybar, gung V znl
gnxr pbzsbeg n yvggyr, 10:21 Orsber V tb jurapr V funyy abg erghea,
rira gb gur ynaq bs qnexarff naq gur funqbj bs qrngu; 10:22 N ynaq bs
qnexarff, nf qnexarff vgfrys; naq bs gur funqbj bs qrngu, jvgubhg nal
beqre, naq jurer gur yvtug vf nf qnexarff.

11:1 Gura nafjrerq Mbcune gur Annznguvgr, naq fnvq, 11:2 Fubhyq abg
gur zhygvghqr bs jbeqf or nafjrerq? naq fubhyq n zna shyy bs gnyx or
whfgvsvrq?  11:3 Fubhyq gul yvrf znxr zra ubyq gurve crnpr? naq jura
gubh zbpxrfg, funyy ab zna znxr gurr nfunzrq?  11:4 Sbe gubh unfg
fnvq, Zl qbpgevar vf cher, naq V nz pyrna va guvar rlrf.

11:5 Ohg bu gung Tbq jbhyq fcrnx, naq bcra uvf yvcf ntnvafg gurr; 11:6
Naq gung ur jbhyq furj gurr gur frpergf bs jvfqbz, gung gurl ner
qbhoyr gb gung juvpu vf! Xabj gurersber gung Tbq rknpgrgu bs gurr yrff
guna guvar vavdhvgl qrfreirgu.

11:7 Pnafg gubh ol frnepuvat svaq bhg Tbq? pnafg gubh svaq bhg gur
Nyzvtugl hagb cresrpgvba?  11:8 Vg vf nf uvtu nf urnira; jung pnafg
gubh qb? qrrcre guna uryy; jung pnafg gubh xabj?  11:9 Gur zrnfher
gurerbs vf ybatre guna gur rnegu, naq oebnqre guna gur frn.

11:10 Vs ur phg bss, naq fuhg hc, be tngure gbtrgure, gura jub pna
uvaqre uvz?  11:11 Sbe ur xabjrgu inva zra: ur frrgu jvpxrqarff nyfb;
jvyy ur abg gura pbafvqre vg?  11:12 Sbe inva zra jbhyq or jvfr,
gubhtu zna or obea yvxr n jvyq nff'f pbyg.

11:13 Vs gubh cercner guvar urneg, naq fgergpu bhg guvar unaqf gbjneq
uvz; 11:14 Vs vavdhvgl or va guvar unaq, chg vg sne njnl, naq yrg abg
jvpxrqarff qjryy va gul gnoreanpyrf.

11:15 Sbe gura funyg gubh yvsg hc gul snpr jvgubhg fcbg; lrn, gubh
funyg or fgrqsnfg, naq funyg abg srne: 11:16 Orpnhfr gubh funyg sbetrg
gul zvfrel, naq erzrzore vg nf jngref gung cnff njnl: 11:17 Naq guvar
ntr funyy or pyrnere guna gur abbaqnl: gubh funyg fuvar sbegu, gubh
funyg or nf gur zbeavat.

11:18 Naq gubh funyg or frpher, orpnhfr gurer vf ubcr; lrn, gubh funyg
qvt nobhg gurr, naq gubh funyg gnxr gul erfg va fnsrgl.

11:19 Nyfb gubh funyg yvr qbja, naq abar funyy znxr gurr nsenvq; lrn,
znal funyy znxr fhvg hagb gurr.

11:20 Ohg gur rlrf bs gur jvpxrq funyy snvy, naq gurl funyy abg
rfpncr, naq gurve ubcr funyy or nf gur tvivat hc bs gur tubfg.

12:1 Naq Wbo nafjrerq naq fnvq, 12:2 Ab qbhog ohg lr ner gur crbcyr,
naq jvfqbz funyy qvr jvgu lbh.

12:3 Ohg V unir haqrefgnaqvat nf jryy nf lbh; V nz abg vasrevbe gb
lbh: lrn, jub xabjrgu abg fhpu guvatf nf gurfr?  12:4 V nz nf bar
zbpxrq bs uvf arvtuobhe, jub pnyyrgu hcba Tbq, naq ur nafjrergu uvz:
gur whfg hcevtug zna vf ynhturq gb fpbea.

12:5 Ur gung vf ernql gb fyvc jvgu uvf srrg vf nf n ynzc qrfcvfrq va
gur gubhtug bs uvz gung vf ng rnfr.

12:6 Gur gnoreanpyrf bs ebooref cebfcre, naq gurl gung cebibxr Tbq ner
frpher; vagb jubfr unaq Tbq oevatrgu nohaqnagyl.

12:7 Ohg nfx abj gur ornfgf, naq gurl funyy grnpu gurr; naq gur sbjyf
bs gur nve, naq gurl funyy gryy gurr: 12:8 Be fcrnx gb gur rnegu, naq
vg funyy grnpu gurr: naq gur svfurf bs gur frn funyy qrpyner hagb
gurr.

12:9 Jub xabjrgu abg va nyy gurfr gung gur unaq bs gur YBEQ ungu
jebhtug guvf?  12:10 Va jubfr unaq vf gur fbhy bs rirel yvivat guvat,
naq gur oerngu bs nyy znaxvaq.

12:11 Qbgu abg gur rne gel jbeqf? naq gur zbhgu gnfgr uvf zrng?  12:12
Jvgu gur napvrag vf jvfqbz; naq va yratgu bs qnlf haqrefgnaqvat.

12:13 Jvgu uvz vf jvfqbz naq fgeratgu, ur ungu pbhafry naq
haqrefgnaqvat.

12:14 Orubyq, ur oernxrgu qbja, naq vg pnaabg or ohvyg ntnva: ur
fuhggrgu hc n zna, naq gurer pna or ab bcravat.

12:15 Orubyq, ur jvguubyqrgu gur jngref, naq gurl qel hc: nyfb ur
fraqrgu gurz bhg, naq gurl bireghea gur rnegu.

12:16 Jvgu uvz vf fgeratgu naq jvfqbz: gur qrprvirq naq gur qrprvire
ner uvf.

12:17 Ur yrnqrgu pbhafryybef njnl fcbvyrq, naq znxrgu gur whqtrf
sbbyf.

12:18 Ur ybbfrgu gur obaq bs xvatf, naq tveqrgu gurve ybvaf jvgu n
tveqyr.

12:19 Ur yrnqrgu cevaprf njnl fcbvyrq, naq bireguebjrgu gur zvtugl.

12:20 Ur erzbirgu njnl gur fcrrpu bs gur gehfgl, naq gnxrgu njnl gur
haqrefgnaqvat bs gur ntrq.

12:21 Ur cbhergu pbagrzcg hcba cevaprf, naq jrnxrargu gur fgeratgu bs
gur zvtugl.

12:22 Ur qvfpbirergu qrrc guvatf bhg bs qnexarff, naq oevatrgu bhg gb
yvtug gur funqbj bs qrngu.

12:23 Ur vapernfrgu gur angvbaf, naq qrfgeblrgu gurz: ur raynetrgu gur
angvbaf, naq fgenvgrargu gurz ntnva.

12:24 Ur gnxrgu njnl gur urneg bs gur puvrs bs gur crbcyr bs gur
rnegu, naq pnhfrgu gurz gb jnaqre va n jvyqrearff jurer gurer vf ab
jnl.

12:25 Gurl tebcr va gur qnex jvgubhg yvtug, naq ur znxrgu gurz gb
fgnttre yvxr n qehaxra zna.

13:1 Yb, zvar rlr ungu frra nyy guvf, zvar rne ungu urneq naq
haqrefgbbq vg.

13:2 Jung lr xabj, gur fnzr qb V xabj nyfb: V nz abg vasrevbe hagb
lbh.

13:3 Fheryl V jbhyq fcrnx gb gur Nyzvtugl, naq V qrfver gb ernfba jvgu
Tbq.

13:4 Ohg lr ner sbetref bs yvrf, lr ner nyy culfvpvnaf bs ab inyhr.

13:5 B gung lr jbhyq nygbtrgure ubyq lbhe crnpr! naq vg fubhyq or lbhe
jvfqbz.

13:6 Urne abj zl ernfbavat, naq urnexra gb gur cyrnqvatf bs zl yvcf.

13:7 Jvyy lr fcrnx jvpxrqyl sbe Tbq? naq gnyx qrprvgshyyl sbe uvz?
13:8 Jvyy lr npprcg uvf crefba? jvyy lr pbagraq sbe Tbq?  13:9 Vf vg
tbbq gung ur fubhyq frnepu lbh bhg? be nf bar zna zbpxrgu nabgure, qb
lr fb zbpx uvz?  13:10 Ur jvyy fheryl ercebir lbh, vs lr qb frpergyl
npprcg crefbaf.

13:11 Funyy abg uvf rkpryyrapl znxr lbh nsenvq? naq uvf qernq snyy
hcba lbh?  13:12 Lbhe erzrzoenaprf ner yvxr hagb nfurf, lbhe obqvrf gb
obqvrf bs pynl.

13:13 Ubyq lbhe crnpr, yrg zr nybar, gung V znl fcrnx, naq yrg pbzr ba
zr jung jvyy.

13:14 Jurersber qb V gnxr zl syrfu va zl grrgu, naq chg zl yvsr va
zvar unaq?  13:15 Gubhtu ur fynl zr, lrg jvyy V gehfg va uvz: ohg V
jvyy znvagnva zvar bja jnlf orsber uvz.

13:16 Ur nyfb funyy or zl fnyingvba: sbe na ulcbpevgr funyy abg pbzr
orsber uvz.

13:17 Urne qvyvtragyl zl fcrrpu, naq zl qrpynengvba jvgu lbhe rnef.

13:18 Orubyq abj, V unir beqrerq zl pnhfr; V xabj gung V funyy or
whfgvsvrq.

13:19 Jub vf ur gung jvyy cyrnq jvgu zr? sbe abj, vs V ubyq zl gbathr,
V funyy tvir hc gur tubfg.

13:20 Bayl qb abg gjb guvatf hagb zr: gura jvyy V abg uvqr zlfrys sebz
gurr.

13:21 Jvguqenj guvar unaq sne sebz zr: naq yrg abg gul qernq znxr zr
nsenvq.

13:22 Gura pnyy gubh, naq V jvyy nafjre: be yrg zr fcrnx, naq nafjre
gubh zr.

13:23 Ubj znal ner zvar vavdhvgvrf naq fvaf? znxr zr gb xabj zl
genafterffvba naq zl fva.

13:24 Jurersber uvqrfg gubh gul snpr, naq ubyqrfg zr sbe guvar rarzl?
13:25 Jvyg gubh oernx n yrns qevira gb naq seb? naq jvyg gubh chefhr
gur qel fghooyr?  13:26 Sbe gubh jevgrfg ovggre guvatf ntnvafg zr, naq
znxrfg zr gb cbffrff gur vavdhvgvrf bs zl lbhgu.

13:27 Gubh chggrfg zl srrg nyfb va gur fgbpxf, naq ybbxrfg aneebjyl
hagb nyy zl cnguf; gubh frggrfg n cevag hcba gur urryf bs zl srrg.

13:28 Naq ur, nf n ebggra guvat, pbafhzrgu, nf n tnezrag gung vf zbgu
rngra.

14:1 Zna gung vf obea bs n jbzna vf bs srj qnlf naq shyy bs gebhoyr.

14:2 Ur pbzrgu sbegu yvxr n sybjre, naq vf phg qbja: ur syrrgu nyfb nf
n funqbj, naq pbagvahrgu abg.

14:3 Naq qbgu gubh bcra guvar rlrf hcba fhpu na bar, naq oevatrfg zr
vagb whqtzrag jvgu gurr?  14:4 Jub pna oevat n pyrna guvat bhg bs na
hapyrna? abg bar.

14:5 Frrvat uvf qnlf ner qrgrezvarq, gur ahzore bs uvf zbaguf ner jvgu
gurr, gubh unfg nccbvagrq uvf obhaqf gung ur pnaabg cnff; 14:6 Ghea
sebz uvz, gung ur znl erfg, gvyy ur funyy nppbzcyvfu, nf na uveryvat,
uvf qnl.

14:7 Sbe gurer vf ubcr bs n gerr, vs vg or phg qbja, gung vg jvyy
fcebhg ntnva, naq gung gur graqre oenapu gurerbs jvyy abg prnfr.

14:8 Gubhtu gur ebbg gurerbs jnk byq va gur rnegu, naq gur fgbpx
gurerbs qvr va gur tebhaq; 14:9 Lrg guebhtu gur fprag bs jngre vg jvyy
ohq, naq oevat sbegu obhtuf yvxr n cynag.

14:10 Ohg zna qvrgu, naq jnfgrgu njnl: lrn, zna tvirgu hc gur tubfg,
naq jurer vf ur?  14:11 Nf gur jngref snvy sebz gur frn, naq gur sybbq
qrpnlrgu naq qevrgu hc: 14:12 Fb zna yvrgu qbja, naq evfrgu abg: gvyy
gur urniraf or ab zber, gurl funyy abg njnxr, abe or envfrq bhg bs
gurve fyrrc.

14:13 B gung gubh jbhyqrfg uvqr zr va gur tenir, gung gubh jbhyqrfg
xrrc zr frperg, hagvy gul jengu or cnfg, gung gubh jbhyqrfg nccbvag zr
n frg gvzr, naq erzrzore zr!  14:14 Vs n zna qvr, funyy ur yvir ntnva?
nyy gur qnlf bs zl nccbvagrq gvzr jvyy V jnvg, gvyy zl punatr pbzr.

14:15 Gubh funyg pnyy, naq V jvyy nafjre gurr: gubh jvyg unir n qrfver
gb gur jbex bs guvar unaqf.

14:16 Sbe abj gubh ahzorerfg zl fgrcf: qbfg gubh abg jngpu bire zl
fva?  14:17 Zl genafterffvba vf frnyrq hc va n ont, naq gubh frjrfg hc
zvar vavdhvgl.

14:18 Naq fheryl gur zbhagnvaf snyyvat pbzrgu gb abhtug, naq gur ebpx
vf erzbirq bhg bs uvf cynpr.

14:19 Gur jngref jrne gur fgbarf: gubh jnfurfg njnl gur guvatf juvpu
tebj bhg bs gur qhfg bs gur rnegu; naq gubh qrfgeblrfg gur ubcr bs
zna.

14:20 Gubh cerinvyrfg sbe rire ntnvafg uvz, naq ur cnffrgu: gubh
punatrfg uvf pbhagranapr, naq fraqrfg uvz njnl.

14:21 Uvf fbaf pbzr gb ubabhe, naq ur xabjrgu vg abg; naq gurl ner
oebhtug ybj, ohg ur creprvirgu vg abg bs gurz.

14:22 Ohg uvf syrfu hcba uvz funyy unir cnva, naq uvf fbhy jvguva uvz
funyy zbhea.

15:1 Gura nafjrerq Ryvcunm gur Grznavgr, naq fnvq, 15:2 Fubhyq n jvfr
zna hggre inva xabjyrqtr, naq svyy uvf oryyl jvgu gur rnfg jvaq?  15:3
Fubhyq ur ernfba jvgu hacebsvgnoyr gnyx? be jvgu fcrrpurf jurerjvgu ur
pna qb ab tbbq?  15:4 Lrn, gubh pnfgrfg bss srne, naq erfgenvarfg
cenlre orsber Tbq.

15:5 Sbe gul zbhgu hggrergu guvar vavdhvgl, naq gubh pubbfrfg gur
gbathr bs gur pensgl.

15:6 Guvar bja zbhgu pbaqrzargu gurr, naq abg V: lrn, guvar bja yvcf
grfgvsl ntnvafg gurr.

15:7 Neg gubh gur svefg zna gung jnf obea? be jnfg gubh znqr orsber
gur uvyyf?  15:8 Unfg gubh urneq gur frperg bs Tbq? naq qbfg gubh
erfgenva jvfqbz gb gulfrys?  15:9 Jung xabjrfg gubh, gung jr xabj abg?
jung haqrefgnaqrfg gubh, juvpu vf abg va hf?  15:10 Jvgu hf ner obgu
gur tenlurnqrq naq irel ntrq zra, zhpu ryqre guna gul sngure.

15:11 Ner gur pbafbyngvbaf bs Tbq fznyy jvgu gurr? vf gurer nal frperg
guvat jvgu gurr?  15:12 Jul qbgu guvar urneg pneel gurr njnl? naq jung
qb gul rlrf jvax ng, 15:13 Gung gubh ghearfg gul fcvevg ntnvafg Tbq,
naq yrggrfg fhpu jbeqf tb bhg bs gul zbhgu?  15:14 Jung vf zna, gung
ur fubhyq or pyrna? naq ur juvpu vf obea bs n jbzna, gung ur fubhyq or
evtugrbhf?  15:15 Orubyq, ur chggrgu ab gehfg va uvf fnvagf; lrn, gur
urniraf ner abg pyrna va uvf fvtug.

15:16 Ubj zhpu zber nobzvanoyr naq svygul vf zna, juvpu qevaxrgu
vavdhvgl yvxr jngre?  15:17 V jvyy furj gurr, urne zr; naq gung juvpu
V unir frra V jvyy qrpyner; 15:18 Juvpu jvfr zra unir gbyq sebz gurve
snguref, naq unir abg uvq vg: 15:19 Hagb jubz nybar gur rnegu jnf
tvira, naq ab fgenatre cnffrq nzbat gurz.

15:20 Gur jvpxrq zna geninvyrgu jvgu cnva nyy uvf qnlf, naq gur ahzore
bs lrnef vf uvqqra gb gur bccerffbe.

15:21 N qernqshy fbhaq vf va uvf rnef: va cebfcrevgl gur qrfgeblre
funyy pbzr hcba uvz.

15:22 Ur oryvrirgu abg gung ur funyy erghea bhg bs qnexarff, naq ur vf
jnvgrq sbe bs gur fjbeq.

15:23 Ur jnaqrergu noebnq sbe oernq, fnlvat, Jurer vf vg? ur xabjrgu
gung gur qnl bs qnexarff vf ernql ng uvf unaq.

15:24 Gebhoyr naq nathvfu funyy znxr uvz nsenvq; gurl funyy cerinvy
ntnvafg uvz, nf n xvat ernql gb gur onggyr.

15:25 Sbe ur fgergpurgu bhg uvf unaq ntnvafg Tbq, naq fgeratgurargu
uvzfrys ntnvafg gur Nyzvtugl.

15:26 Ur ehaargu hcba uvz, rira ba uvf arpx, hcba gur guvpx obffrf bs
uvf ohpxyref: 15:27 Orpnhfr ur pbirergu uvf snpr jvgu uvf sngarff, naq
znxrgu pbyybcf bs sng ba uvf synaxf.

15:28 Naq ur qjryyrgu va qrfbyngr pvgvrf, naq va ubhfrf juvpu ab zna
vaunovgrgu, juvpu ner ernql gb orpbzr urncf.

15:29 Ur funyy abg or evpu, arvgure funyy uvf fhofgnapr pbagvahr,
arvgure funyy ur cebybat gur cresrpgvba gurerbs hcba gur rnegu.

15:30 Ur funyy abg qrcneg bhg bs qnexarff; gur synzr funyy qel hc uvf
oenapurf, naq ol gur oerngu bs uvf zbhgu funyy ur tb njnl.

15:31 Yrg abg uvz gung vf qrprvirq gehfg va inavgl: sbe inavgl funyy
or uvf erpbzcrapr.

15:32 Vg funyy or nppbzcyvfurq orsber uvf gvzr, naq uvf oenapu funyy
abg or terra.

15:33 Ur funyy funxr bss uvf haevcr tencr nf gur ivar, naq funyy pnfg
bss uvf sybjre nf gur byvir.

15:34 Sbe gur pbatertngvba bs ulcbpevgrf funyy or qrfbyngr, naq sver
funyy pbafhzr gur gnoreanpyrf bs oevorel.

15:35 Gurl pbaprvir zvfpuvrs, naq oevat sbegu inavgl, naq gurve oryyl
cercnergu qrprvg.

16:1 Gura Wbo nafjrerq naq fnvq, 16:2 V unir urneq znal fhpu guvatf:
zvfrenoyr pbzsbegref ner lr nyy.

16:3 Funyy inva jbeqf unir na raq? be jung rzobyqrargu gurr gung gubh
nafjrerfg?  16:4 V nyfb pbhyq fcrnx nf lr qb: vs lbhe fbhy jrer va zl
fbhy'f fgrnq, V pbhyq urnc hc jbeqf ntnvafg lbh, naq funxr zvar urnq
ng lbh.

16:5 Ohg V jbhyq fgeratgura lbh jvgu zl zbhgu, naq gur zbivat bs zl
yvcf fubhyq nffjntr lbhe tevrs.

16:6 Gubhtu V fcrnx, zl tevrs vf abg nffjntrq: naq gubhtu V sbeorne,
jung nz V rnfrq?  16:7 Ohg abj ur ungu znqr zr jrnel: gubh unfg znqr
qrfbyngr nyy zl pbzcnal.

16:8 Naq gubh unfg svyyrq zr jvgu jevaxyrf, juvpu vf n jvgarff ntnvafg
zr: naq zl yrnaarff evfvat hc va zr ornergu jvgarff gb zl snpr.

16:9 Ur grnergu zr va uvf jengu, jub ungrgu zr: ur tanfurgu hcba zr
jvgu uvf grrgu; zvar rarzl funecrargu uvf rlrf hcba zr.

16:10 Gurl unir tncrq hcba zr jvgu gurve zbhgu; gurl unir fzvggra zr
hcba gur purrx ercebnpushyyl; gurl unir tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure
ntnvafg zr.

16:11 Tbq ungu qryvirerq zr gb gur hatbqyl, naq ghearq zr bire vagb
gur unaqf bs gur jvpxrq.

16:12 V jnf ng rnfr, ohg ur ungu oebxra zr nfhaqre: ur ungu nyfb gnxra
zr ol zl arpx, naq funxra zr gb cvrprf, naq frg zr hc sbe uvf znex.

16:13 Uvf nepuref pbzcnff zr ebhaq nobhg, ur pyrnirgu zl ervaf
nfhaqre, naq qbgu abg fcner; ur cbhergu bhg zl tnyy hcba gur tebhaq.

16:14 Ur oernxrgu zr jvgu oernpu hcba oernpu, ur ehaargu hcba zr yvxr
n tvnag.

16:15 V unir frjrq fnpxpybgu hcba zl fxva, naq qrsvyrq zl ubea va gur
qhfg.

16:16 Zl snpr vf sbhy jvgu jrrcvat, naq ba zl rlryvqf vf gur funqbj bs
qrngu; 16:17 Abg sbe nal vawhfgvpr va zvar unaqf: nyfb zl cenlre vf
cher.

16:18 B rnegu, pbire abg gubh zl oybbq, naq yrg zl pel unir ab cynpr.

16:19 Nyfb abj, orubyq, zl jvgarff vf va urnira, naq zl erpbeq vf ba
uvtu.

16:20 Zl sevraqf fpbea zr: ohg zvar rlr cbhergu bhg grnef hagb Tbq.

16:21 B gung bar zvtug cyrnq sbe n zna jvgu Tbq, nf n zna cyrnqrgu sbe
uvf arvtuobhe!  16:22 Jura n srj lrnef ner pbzr, gura V funyy tb gur
jnl jurapr V funyy abg erghea.

17:1 Zl oerngu vf pbeehcg, zl qnlf ner rkgvapg, gur tenirf ner ernql
sbe zr.

17:2 Ner gurer abg zbpxref jvgu zr? naq qbgu abg zvar rlr pbagvahr va
gurve cebibpngvba?  17:3 Ynl qbja abj, chg zr va n fhergl jvgu gurr;
jub vf ur gung jvyy fgevxr unaqf jvgu zr?  17:4 Sbe gubh unfg uvq
gurve urneg sebz haqrefgnaqvat: gurersber funyg gubh abg rknyg gurz.

17:5 Ur gung fcrnxrgu synggrel gb uvf sevraqf, rira gur rlrf bs uvf
puvyqera funyy snvy.

17:6 Ur ungu znqr zr nyfb n oljbeq bs gur crbcyr; naq nsbergvzr V jnf
nf n gnoerg.

17:7 Zvar rlr nyfb vf qvz ol ernfba bs fbeebj, naq nyy zl zrzoref ner
nf n funqbj.

17:8 Hcevtug zra funyy or nfgbavrq ng guvf, naq gur vaabprag funyy
fgve hc uvzfrys ntnvafg gur ulcbpevgr.

17:9 Gur evtugrbhf nyfb funyy ubyq ba uvf jnl, naq ur gung ungu pyrna
unaqf funyy or fgebatre naq fgebatre.

17:10 Ohg nf sbe lbh nyy, qb lr erghea, naq pbzr abj: sbe V pnaabg
svaq bar jvfr zna nzbat lbh.

17:11 Zl qnlf ner cnfg, zl checbfrf ner oebxra bss, rira gur gubhtugf
bs zl urneg.

17:12 Gurl punatr gur avtug vagb qnl: gur yvtug vf fubeg orpnhfr bs
qnexarff.

17:13 Vs V jnvg, gur tenir vf zvar ubhfr: V unir znqr zl orq va gur
qnexarff.

17:14 V unir fnvq gb pbeehcgvba, Gubh neg zl sngure: gb gur jbez, Gubh
neg zl zbgure, naq zl fvfgre.

17:15 Naq jurer vf abj zl ubcr? nf sbe zl ubcr, jub funyy frr vg?
17:16 Gurl funyy tb qbja gb gur onef bs gur cvg, jura bhe erfg
gbtrgure vf va gur qhfg.

18:1 Gura nafjrerq Ovyqnq gur Fuhuvgr, naq fnvq, 18:2 Ubj ybat jvyy vg
or rer lr znxr na raq bs jbeqf? znex, naq nsgrejneqf jr jvyy fcrnx.

18:3 Jurersber ner jr pbhagrq nf ornfgf, naq erchgrq ivyr va lbhe
fvtug?  18:4 Ur grnergu uvzfrys va uvf natre: funyy gur rnegu or
sbefnxra sbe gurr? naq funyy gur ebpx or erzbirq bhg bs uvf cynpr?
18:5 Lrn, gur yvtug bs gur jvpxrq funyy or chg bhg, naq gur fcnex bs
uvf sver funyy abg fuvar.

18:6 Gur yvtug funyy or qnex va uvf gnoreanpyr, naq uvf pnaqyr funyy
or chg bhg jvgu uvz.

18:7 Gur fgrcf bs uvf fgeratgu funyy or fgenvgrarq, naq uvf bja
pbhafry funyy pnfg uvz qbja.

18:8 Sbe ur vf pnfg vagb n arg ol uvf bja srrg, naq ur jnyxrgu hcba n
faner.

18:9 Gur tva funyy gnxr uvz ol gur urry, naq gur eboore funyy cerinvy
ntnvafg uvz.

18:10 Gur faner vf ynvq sbe uvz va gur tebhaq, naq n genc sbe uvz va
gur jnl.

18:11 Greebef funyy znxr uvz nsenvq ba rirel fvqr, naq funyy qevir uvz
gb uvf srrg.

18:12 Uvf fgeratgu funyy or uhatreovggra, naq qrfgehpgvba funyy or
ernql ng uvf fvqr.

18:13 Vg funyy qribhe gur fgeratgu bs uvf fxva: rira gur svefgobea bs
qrngu funyy qribhe uvf fgeratgu.

18:14 Uvf pbasvqrapr funyy or ebbgrq bhg bs uvf gnoreanpyr, naq vg
funyy oevat uvz gb gur xvat bs greebef.

18:15 Vg funyy qjryy va uvf gnoreanpyr, orpnhfr vg vf abar bs uvf:
oevzfgbar funyy or fpnggrerq hcba uvf unovgngvba.

18:16 Uvf ebbgf funyy or qevrq hc orarngu, naq nobir funyy uvf oenapu
or phg bss.

18:17 Uvf erzrzoenapr funyy crevfu sebz gur rnegu, naq ur funyy unir
ab anzr va gur fgerrg.

18:18 Ur funyy or qevira sebz yvtug vagb qnexarff, naq punfrq bhg bs
gur jbeyq.

18:19 Ur funyy arvgure unir fba abe arcurj nzbat uvf crbcyr, abe nal
erznvavat va uvf qjryyvatf.

18:20 Gurl gung pbzr nsgre uvz funyy or nfgbavrq ng uvf qnl, nf gurl
gung jrag orsber jrer nssevtugrq.

18:21 Fheryl fhpu ner gur qjryyvatf bs gur jvpxrq, naq guvf vf gur
cynpr bs uvz gung xabjrgu abg Tbq.

19:1 Gura Wbo nafjrerq naq fnvq, 19:2 Ubj ybat jvyy lr irk zl fbhy,
naq oernx zr va cvrprf jvgu jbeqf?  19:3 Gurfr gra gvzrf unir lr
ercebnpurq zr: lr ner abg nfunzrq gung lr znxr lbhefryirf fgenatr gb
zr.

19:4 Naq or vg vaqrrq gung V unir reerq, zvar reebe erznvargu jvgu
zlfrys.

19:5 Vs vaqrrq lr jvyy zntavsl lbhefryirf ntnvafg zr, naq cyrnq
ntnvafg zr zl ercebnpu: 19:6 Xabj abj gung Tbq ungu bireguebja zr, naq
ungu pbzcnffrq zr jvgu uvf arg.

19:7 Orubyq, V pel bhg bs jebat, ohg V nz abg urneq: V pel nybhq, ohg
gurer vf ab whqtzrag.

19:8 Ur ungu sraprq hc zl jnl gung V pnaabg cnff, naq ur ungu frg
qnexarff va zl cnguf.

19:9 Ur ungu fgevccrq zr bs zl tybel, naq gnxra gur pebja sebz zl
urnq.

19:10 Ur ungu qrfgeblrq zr ba rirel fvqr, naq V nz tbar: naq zvar ubcr
ungu ur erzbirq yvxr n gerr.

19:11 Ur ungu nyfb xvaqyrq uvf jengu ntnvafg zr, naq ur pbhagrgu zr
hagb uvz nf bar bs uvf rarzvrf.

19:12 Uvf gebbcf pbzr gbtrgure, naq envfr hc gurve jnl ntnvafg zr, naq
rapnzc ebhaq nobhg zl gnoreanpyr.

19:13 Ur ungu chg zl oerguera sne sebz zr, naq zvar npdhnvagnapr ner
irevyl rfgenatrq sebz zr.

19:14 Zl xvafsbyx unir snvyrq, naq zl snzvyvne sevraqf unir sbetbggra
zr.

19:15 Gurl gung qjryy va zvar ubhfr, naq zl znvqf, pbhag zr sbe n
fgenatre: V nz na nyvra va gurve fvtug.

19:16 V pnyyrq zl freinag, naq ur tnir zr ab nafjre; V vagerngrq uvz
jvgu zl zbhgu.

19:17 Zl oerngu vf fgenatr gb zl jvsr, gubhtu V vagerngrq sbe gur
puvyqera'f fnxr bs zvar bja obql.

19:18 Lrn, lbhat puvyqera qrfcvfrq zr; V nebfr, naq gurl fcnxr ntnvafg
zr.

19:19 Nyy zl vajneq sevraqf noubeerq zr: naq gurl jubz V ybirq ner
ghearq ntnvafg zr.

19:20 Zl obar pyrnirgu gb zl fxva naq gb zl syrfu, naq V nz rfpncrq
jvgu gur fxva bs zl grrgu.

19:21 Unir cvgl hcba zr, unir cvgl hcba zr, B lr zl sevraqf; sbe gur
unaq bs Tbq ungu gbhpurq zr.

19:22 Jul qb lr crefrphgr zr nf Tbq, naq ner abg fngvfsvrq jvgu zl
syrfu?  19:23 Bu gung zl jbeqf jrer abj jevggra! bu gung gurl jrer
cevagrq va n obbx!  19:24 Gung gurl jrer tenira jvgu na veba cra naq
yrnq va gur ebpx sbe rire!  19:25 Sbe V xabj gung zl erqrrzre yvirgu,
naq gung ur funyy fgnaq ng gur ynggre qnl hcba gur rnegu: 19:26 Naq
gubhtu nsgre zl fxva jbezf qrfgebl guvf obql, lrg va zl syrfu funyy V
frr Tbq: 19:27 Jubz V funyy frr sbe zlfrys, naq zvar rlrf funyy
orubyq, naq abg nabgure; gubhtu zl ervaf or pbafhzrq jvguva zr.

19:28 Ohg lr fubhyq fnl, Jul crefrphgr jr uvz, frrvat gur ebbg bs gur
znggre vf sbhaq va zr?  19:29 Or lr nsenvq bs gur fjbeq: sbe jengu
oevatrgu gur chavfuzragf bs gur fjbeq, gung lr znl xabj gurer vf n
whqtzrag.

20:1 Gura nafjrerq Mbcune gur Annznguvgr, naq fnvq, 20:2 Gurersber qb
zl gubhtugf pnhfr zr gb nafjre, naq sbe guvf V znxr unfgr.

20:3 V unir urneq gur purpx bs zl ercebnpu, naq gur fcvevg bs zl
haqrefgnaqvat pnhfrgu zr gb nafjre.

20:4 Xabjrfg gubh abg guvf bs byq, fvapr zna jnf cynprq hcba rnegu,
20:5 Gung gur gevhzcuvat bs gur jvpxrq vf fubeg, naq gur wbl bs gur
ulcbpevgr ohg sbe n zbzrag?  20:6 Gubhtu uvf rkpryyrapl zbhag hc gb
gur urniraf, naq uvf urnq ernpu hagb gur pybhqf; 20:7 Lrg ur funyy
crevfu sbe rire yvxr uvf bja qhat: gurl juvpu unir frra uvz funyy fnl,
Jurer vf ur?  20:8 Ur funyy syl njnl nf n qernz, naq funyy abg or
sbhaq: lrn, ur funyy or punfrq njnl nf n ivfvba bs gur avtug.

20:9 Gur rlr nyfb juvpu fnj uvz funyy frr uvz ab zber; arvgure funyy
uvf cynpr nal zber orubyq uvz.

20:10 Uvf puvyqera funyy frrx gb cyrnfr gur cbbe, naq uvf unaqf funyy
erfgber gurve tbbqf.

20:11 Uvf obarf ner shyy bs gur fva bs uvf lbhgu, juvpu funyy yvr qbja
jvgu uvz va gur qhfg.

20:12 Gubhtu jvpxrqarff or fjrrg va uvf zbhgu, gubhtu ur uvqr vg haqre
uvf gbathr; 20:13 Gubhtu ur fcner vg, naq sbefnxr vg abg; ohg xrrc vg
fgvyy jvguva uvf zbhgu: 20:14 Lrg uvf zrng va uvf objryf vf ghearq, vg
vf gur tnyy bs nfcf jvguva uvz.

20:15 Ur ungu fjnyybjrq qbja evpurf, naq ur funyy ibzvg gurz hc ntnva:
Tbq funyy pnfg gurz bhg bs uvf oryyl.

20:16 Ur funyy fhpx gur cbvfba bs nfcf: gur ivcre'f gbathr funyy fynl
uvz.

20:17 Ur funyy abg frr gur eviref, gur sybbqf, gur oebbxf bs ubarl naq
ohggre.

20:18 Gung juvpu ur ynobherq sbe funyy ur erfgber, naq funyy abg
fjnyybj vg qbja: nppbeqvat gb uvf fhofgnapr funyy gur erfgvghgvba or,
naq ur funyy abg erwbvpr gurerva.

20:19 Orpnhfr ur ungu bccerffrq naq ungu sbefnxra gur cbbe; orpnhfr ur
ungu ivbyragyl gnxra njnl na ubhfr juvpu ur ohvyqrq abg; 20:20 Fheryl
ur funyy abg srry dhvrgarff va uvf oryyl, ur funyy abg fnir bs gung
juvpu ur qrfverq.

20:21 Gurer funyy abar bs uvf zrng or yrsg; gurersber funyy ab zna
ybbx sbe uvf tbbqf.

20:22 Va gur shyarff bs uvf fhssvpvrapl ur funyy or va fgenvgf: rirel
unaq bs gur jvpxrq funyy pbzr hcba uvz.

20:23 Jura ur vf nobhg gb svyy uvf oryyl, Tbq funyy pnfg gur shel bs
uvf jengu hcba uvz, naq funyy enva vg hcba uvz juvyr ur vf rngvat.

20:24 Ur funyy syrr sebz gur veba jrncba, naq gur obj bs fgrry funyy
fgevxr uvz guebhtu.

20:25 Vg vf qenja, naq pbzrgu bhg bs gur obql; lrn, gur tyvggrevat
fjbeq pbzrgu bhg bs uvf tnyy: greebef ner hcba uvz.

20:26 Nyy qnexarff funyy or uvq va uvf frperg cynprf: n sver abg oybja
funyy pbafhzr uvz; vg funyy tb vyy jvgu uvz gung vf yrsg va uvf
gnoreanpyr.

20:27 Gur urnira funyy erirny uvf vavdhvgl; naq gur rnegu funyy evfr
hc ntnvafg uvz.

20:28 Gur vapernfr bs uvf ubhfr funyy qrcneg, naq uvf tbbqf funyy sybj
njnl va gur qnl bs uvf jengu.

20:29 Guvf vf gur cbegvba bs n jvpxrq zna sebz Tbq, naq gur urevgntr
nccbvagrq hagb uvz ol Tbq.

21:1 Ohg Wbo nafjrerq naq fnvq, 21:2 Urne qvyvtragyl zl fcrrpu, naq
yrg guvf or lbhe pbafbyngvbaf.

21:3 Fhssre zr gung V znl fcrnx; naq nsgre gung V unir fcbxra, zbpx
ba.

21:4 Nf sbe zr, vf zl pbzcynvag gb zna? naq vs vg jrer fb, jul fubhyq
abg zl fcvevg or gebhoyrq?  21:5 Znex zr, naq or nfgbavfurq, naq ynl
lbhe unaq hcba lbhe zbhgu.

21:6 Rira jura V erzrzore V nz nsenvq, naq gerzoyvat gnxrgu ubyq ba zl
syrfu.

21:7 Jurersber qb gur jvpxrq yvir, orpbzr byq, lrn, ner zvtugl va
cbjre?  21:8 Gurve frrq vf rfgnoyvfurq va gurve fvtug jvgu gurz, naq
gurve bssfcevat orsber gurve rlrf.

21:9 Gurve ubhfrf ner fnsr sebz srne, arvgure vf gur ebq bs Tbq hcba
gurz.

21:10 Gurve ohyy traqrergu, naq snvyrgu abg; gurve pbj pnyirgu, naq
pnfgrgu abg ure pnys.

21:11 Gurl fraq sbegu gurve yvggyr barf yvxr n sybpx, naq gurve
puvyqera qnapr.

21:12 Gurl gnxr gur gvzoery naq unec, naq erwbvpr ng gur fbhaq bs gur
betna.

21:13 Gurl fcraq gurve qnlf va jrnygu, naq va n zbzrag tb qbja gb gur
tenir.

21:14 Gurersber gurl fnl hagb Tbq, Qrcneg sebz hf; sbe jr qrfver abg
gur xabjyrqtr bs gul jnlf.

21:15 Jung vf gur Nyzvtugl, gung jr fubhyq freir uvz? naq jung cebsvg
fubhyq jr unir, vs jr cenl hagb uvz?  21:16 Yb, gurve tbbq vf abg va
gurve unaq: gur pbhafry bs gur jvpxrq vf sne sebz zr.

21:17 Ubj bsg vf gur pnaqyr bs gur jvpxrq chg bhg! naq ubj bsg pbzrgu
gurve qrfgehpgvba hcba gurz! Tbq qvfgevohgrgu fbeebjf va uvf natre.

21:18 Gurl ner nf fghooyr orsber gur jvaq, naq nf punss gung gur fgbez
pneevrgu njnl.

21:19 Tbq ynlrgu hc uvf vavdhvgl sbe uvf puvyqera: ur erjneqrgu uvz,
naq ur funyy xabj vg.

21:20 Uvf rlrf funyy frr uvf qrfgehpgvba, naq ur funyy qevax bs gur
jengu bs gur Nyzvtugl.

21:21 Sbe jung cyrnfher ungu ur va uvf ubhfr nsgre uvz, jura gur
ahzore bs uvf zbaguf vf phg bss va gur zvqfg?  21:22 Funyy nal grnpu
Tbq xabjyrqtr? frrvat ur whqtrgu gubfr gung ner uvtu.

21:23 Bar qvrgu va uvf shyy fgeratgu, orvat jubyyl ng rnfr naq dhvrg.

21:24 Uvf oernfgf ner shyy bs zvyx, naq uvf obarf ner zbvfgrarq jvgu
zneebj.

21:25 Naq nabgure qvrgu va gur ovggrearff bs uvf fbhy, naq arire
rngrgu jvgu cyrnfher.

21:26 Gurl funyy yvr qbja nyvxr va gur qhfg, naq gur jbezf funyy pbire
gurz.

21:27 Orubyq, V xabj lbhe gubhtugf, naq gur qrivprf juvpu lr
jebatshyyl vzntvar ntnvafg zr.

21:28 Sbe lr fnl, Jurer vf gur ubhfr bs gur cevapr? naq jurer ner gur
qjryyvat cynprf bs gur jvpxrq?  21:29 Unir lr abg nfxrq gurz gung tb
ol gur jnl? naq qb lr abg xabj gurve gbxraf, 21:30 Gung gur jvpxrq vf
erfreirq gb gur qnl bs qrfgehpgvba? gurl funyy or oebhtug sbegu gb gur
qnl bs jengu.

21:31 Jub funyy qrpyner uvf jnl gb uvf snpr? naq jub funyy ercnl uvz
jung ur ungu qbar?  21:32 Lrg funyy ur or oebhtug gb gur tenir, naq
funyy erznva va gur gbzo.

21:33 Gur pybqf bs gur inyyrl funyy or fjrrg hagb uvz, naq rirel zna
funyy qenj nsgre uvz, nf gurer ner vaahzrenoyr orsber uvz.

21:34 Ubj gura pbzsbeg lr zr va inva, frrvat va lbhe nafjref gurer
erznvargu snyfrubbq?  22:1 Gura Ryvcunm gur Grznavgr nafjrerq naq
fnvq, 22:2 Pna n zna or cebsvgnoyr hagb Tbq, nf ur gung vf jvfr znl or
cebsvgnoyr hagb uvzfrys?  22:3 Vf vg nal cyrnfher gb gur Nyzvtugl,
gung gubh neg evtugrbhf? be vf vg tnva gb uvz, gung gubh znxrfg gul
jnlf cresrpg?  22:4 Jvyy ur ercebir gurr sbe srne bs gurr? jvyy ur
ragre jvgu gurr vagb whqtzrag?  22:5 Vf abg gul jvpxrqarff terng? naq
guvar vavdhvgvrf vasvavgr?  22:6 Sbe gubh unfg gnxra n cyrqtr sebz gul
oebgure sbe abhtug, naq fgevccrq gur anxrq bs gurve pybguvat.

22:7 Gubh unfg abg tvira jngre gb gur jrnel gb qevax, naq gubh unfg
jvguubyqra oernq sebz gur uhatel.

22:8 Ohg nf sbe gur zvtugl zna, ur unq gur rnegu; naq gur ubabhenoyr
zna qjryg va vg.

22:9 Gubh unfg frag jvqbjf njnl rzcgl, naq gur nezf bs gur sngureyrff
unir orra oebxra.

22:10 Gurersber fanerf ner ebhaq nobhg gurr, naq fhqqra srne gebhoyrgu
gurr; 22:11 Be qnexarff, gung gubh pnafg abg frr; naq nohaqnapr bs
jngref pbire gurr.

22:12 Vf abg Tbq va gur urvtug bs urnira? naq orubyq gur urvtug bs gur
fgnef, ubj uvtu gurl ner!  22:13 Naq gubh fnlrfg, Ubj qbgu Tbq xabj?
pna ur whqtr guebhtu gur qnex pybhq?  22:14 Guvpx pybhqf ner n
pbirevat gb uvz, gung ur frrgu abg; naq ur jnyxrgu va gur pvephvg bs
urnira.

22:15 Unfg gubh znexrq gur byq jnl juvpu jvpxrq zra unir gebqqra?
22:16 Juvpu jrer phg qbja bhg bs gvzr, jubfr sbhaqngvba jnf biresybja
jvgu n sybbq: 22:17 Juvpu fnvq hagb Tbq, Qrcneg sebz hf: naq jung pna
gur Nyzvtugl qb sbe gurz?  22:18 Lrg ur svyyrq gurve ubhfrf jvgu tbbq
guvatf: ohg gur pbhafry bs gur jvpxrq vf sne sebz zr.

22:19 Gur evtugrbhf frr vg, naq ner tynq: naq gur vaabprag ynhtu gurz
gb fpbea.

22:20 Jurernf bhe fhofgnapr vf abg phg qbja, ohg gur erzanag bs gurz
gur sver pbafhzrgu.

22:21 Npdhnvag abj gulfrys jvgu uvz, naq or ng crnpr: gurerol tbbq
funyy pbzr hagb gurr.

22:22 Erprvir, V cenl gurr, gur ynj sebz uvf zbhgu, naq ynl hc uvf
jbeqf va guvar urneg.

22:23 Vs gubh erghea gb gur Nyzvtugl, gubh funyg or ohvyg hc, gubh
funyg chg njnl vavdhvgl sne sebz gul gnoreanpyrf.

22:24 Gura funyg gubh ynl hc tbyq nf qhfg, naq gur tbyq bs Bcuve nf
gur fgbarf bs gur oebbxf.

22:25 Lrn, gur Nyzvtugl funyy or gul qrsrapr, naq gubh funyg unir
cyragl bs fvyire.

22:26 Sbe gura funyg gubh unir gul qryvtug va gur Nyzvtugl, naq funyg
yvsg hc gul snpr hagb Tbq.

22:27 Gubh funyg znxr gul cenlre hagb uvz, naq ur funyy urne gurr, naq
gubh funyg cnl gul ibjf.

22:28 Gubh funyg nyfb qrperr n guvat, naq vg funyy or rfgnoyvfurq hagb
gurr: naq gur yvtug funyy fuvar hcba gul jnlf.

22:29 Jura zra ner pnfg qbja, gura gubh funyg fnl, Gurer vf yvsgvat
hc; naq ur funyy fnir gur uhzoyr crefba.

22:30 Ur funyy qryvire gur vfynaq bs gur vaabprag: naq vg vf qryvirerq
ol gur cherarff bs guvar unaqf.

23:1 Gura Wbo nafjrerq naq fnvq, 23:2 Rira gb qnl vf zl pbzcynvag
ovggre: zl fgebxr vf urnivre guna zl tebnavat.

23:3 Bu gung V xarj jurer V zvtug svaq uvz! gung V zvtug pbzr rira gb
uvf frng!  23:4 V jbhyq beqre zl pnhfr orsber uvz, naq svyy zl zbhgu
jvgu nethzragf.

23:5 V jbhyq xabj gur jbeqf juvpu ur jbhyq nafjre zr, naq haqrefgnaq
jung ur jbhyq fnl hagb zr.

23:6 Jvyy ur cyrnq ntnvafg zr jvgu uvf terng cbjre? Ab; ohg ur jbhyq
chg fgeratgu va zr.

23:7 Gurer gur evtugrbhf zvtug qvfchgr jvgu uvz; fb fubhyq V or
qryvirerq sbe rire sebz zl whqtr.

23:8 Orubyq, V tb sbejneq, ohg ur vf abg gurer; naq onpxjneq, ohg V
pnaabg creprvir uvz: 23:9 Ba gur yrsg unaq, jurer ur qbgu jbex, ohg V
pnaabg orubyq uvz: ur uvqrgu uvzfrys ba gur evtug unaq, gung V pnaabg
frr uvz: 23:10 Ohg ur xabjrgu gur jnl gung V gnxr: jura ur ungu gevrq
zr, V funyy pbzr sbegu nf tbyq.

23:11 Zl sbbg ungu uryq uvf fgrcf, uvf jnl unir V xrcg, naq abg
qrpyvarq.

23:12 Arvgure unir V tbar onpx sebz gur pbzznaqzrag bs uvf yvcf; V
unir rfgrrzrq gur jbeqf bs uvf zbhgu zber guna zl arprffnel sbbq.

23:13 Ohg ur vf va bar zvaq, naq jub pna ghea uvz? naq jung uvf fbhy
qrfvergu, rira gung ur qbrgu.

23:14 Sbe ur cresbezrgu gur guvat gung vf nccbvagrq sbe zr: naq znal
fhpu guvatf ner jvgu uvz.

23:15 Gurersber nz V gebhoyrq ng uvf cerfrapr: jura V pbafvqre, V nz
nsenvq bs uvz.

23:16 Sbe Tbq znxrgu zl urneg fbsg, naq gur Nyzvtugl gebhoyrgu zr:
23:17 Orpnhfr V jnf abg phg bss orsber gur qnexarff, arvgure ungu ur
pbirerq gur qnexarff sebz zl snpr.

24:1 Jul, frrvat gvzrf ner abg uvqqra sebz gur Nyzvtugl, qb gurl gung
xabj uvz abg frr uvf qnlf?  24:2 Fbzr erzbir gur ynaqznexf; gurl
ivbyragyl gnxr njnl sybpxf, naq srrq gurerbs.

24:3 Gurl qevir njnl gur nff bs gur sngureyrff, gurl gnxr gur jvqbj'f
bk sbe n cyrqtr.

24:4 Gurl ghea gur arrql bhg bs gur jnl: gur cbbe bs gur rnegu uvqr
gurzfryirf gbtrgure.

24:5 Orubyq, nf jvyq nffrf va gur qrfreg, tb gurl sbegu gb gurve jbex;
evfvat orgvzrf sbe n cerl: gur jvyqrearff lvryqrgu sbbq sbe gurz naq
sbe gurve puvyqera.

24:6 Gurl ernc rirel bar uvf pbea va gur svryq: naq gurl tngure gur
ivagntr bs gur jvpxrq.

24:7 Gurl pnhfr gur anxrq gb ybqtr jvgubhg pybguvat, gung gurl unir ab
pbirevat va gur pbyq.

24:8 Gurl ner jrg jvgu gur fubjref bs gur zbhagnvaf, naq rzoenpr gur
ebpx sbe jnag bs n furygre.

24:9 Gurl cyhpx gur sngureyrff sebz gur oernfg, naq gnxr n cyrqtr bs
gur cbbe.

24:10 Gurl pnhfr uvz gb tb anxrq jvgubhg pybguvat, naq gurl gnxr njnl
gur furns sebz gur uhatel; 24:11 Juvpu znxr bvy jvguva gurve jnyyf,
naq gernq gurve jvarcerffrf, naq fhssre guvefg.

24:12 Zra tebna sebz bhg bs gur pvgl, naq gur fbhy bs gur jbhaqrq
pevrgu bhg: lrg Tbq ynlrgu abg sbyyl gb gurz.

24:13 Gurl ner bs gubfr gung erory ntnvafg gur yvtug; gurl xabj abg
gur jnlf gurerbs, abe novqr va gur cnguf gurerbs.

24:14 Gur zheqrere evfvat jvgu gur yvtug xvyyrgu gur cbbe naq arrql,
naq va gur avtug vf nf n guvrs.

24:15 Gur rlr nyfb bs gur nqhygrere jnvgrgu sbe gur gjvyvtug, fnlvat,
Ab rlr funyy frr zr: naq qvfthvfrgu uvf snpr.

24:16 Va gur qnex gurl qvt guebhtu ubhfrf, juvpu gurl unq znexrq sbe
gurzfryirf va gur qnlgvzr: gurl xabj abg gur yvtug.

24:17 Sbe gur zbeavat vf gb gurz rira nf gur funqbj bs qrngu: vs bar
xabj gurz, gurl ner va gur greebef bs gur funqbj bs qrngu.

24:18 Ur vf fjvsg nf gur jngref; gurve cbegvba vf phefrq va gur rnegu:
ur orubyqrgu abg gur jnl bs gur ivarlneqf.

24:19 Qebhtug naq urng pbafhzr gur fabj jngref: fb qbgu gur tenir
gubfr juvpu unir fvaarq.

24:20 Gur jbzo funyy sbetrg uvz; gur jbez funyy srrq fjrrgyl ba uvz;
ur funyy or ab zber erzrzorerq; naq jvpxrqarff funyy or oebxra nf n
gerr.

24:21 Ur rivy ragerngrgu gur oneera gung ornergu abg: naq qbrgu abg
tbbq gb gur jvqbj.

24:22 Ur qenjrgu nyfb gur zvtugl jvgu uvf cbjre: ur evfrgu hc, naq ab
zna vf fher bs yvsr.

24:23 Gubhtu vg or tvira uvz gb or va fnsrgl, jurerba ur erfgrgu; lrg
uvf rlrf ner hcba gurve jnlf.

24:24 Gurl ner rknygrq sbe n yvggyr juvyr, ohg ner tbar naq oebhtug
ybj; gurl ner gnxra bhg bs gur jnl nf nyy bgure, naq phg bss nf gur
gbcf bs gur rnef bs pbea.

24:25 Naq vs vg or abg fb abj, jub jvyy znxr zr n yvne, naq znxr zl
fcrrpu abguvat jbegu?  25:1 Gura nafjrerq Ovyqnq gur Fuhuvgr, naq
fnvq, 25:2 Qbzvavba naq srne ner jvgu uvz, ur znxrgu crnpr va uvf uvtu
cynprf.

25:3 Vf gurer nal ahzore bs uvf nezvrf? naq hcba jubz qbgu abg uvf
yvtug nevfr?  25:4 Ubj gura pna zna or whfgvsvrq jvgu Tbq? be ubj pna
ur or pyrna gung vf obea bs n jbzna?  25:5 Orubyq rira gb gur zbba,
naq vg fuvargu abg; lrn, gur fgnef ner abg cher va uvf fvtug.

25:6 Ubj zhpu yrff zna, gung vf n jbez? naq gur fba bs zna, juvpu vf n
jbez?  26:1 Ohg Wbo nafjrerq naq fnvq, 26:2 Ubj unfg gubh urycrq uvz
gung vf jvgubhg cbjre? ubj fnirfg gubh gur nez gung ungu ab fgeratgu?
26:3 Ubj unfg gubh pbhafryyrq uvz gung ungu ab jvfqbz? naq ubj unfg
gubh cyragvshyyl qrpynerq gur guvat nf vg vf?  26:4 Gb jubz unfg gubh
hggrerq jbeqf? naq jubfr fcvevg pnzr sebz gurr?  26:5 Qrnq guvatf ner
sbezrq sebz haqre gur jngref, naq gur vaunovgnagf gurerbs.

26:6 Uryy vf anxrq orsber uvz, naq qrfgehpgvba ungu ab pbirevat.

26:7 Ur fgergpurgu bhg gur abegu bire gur rzcgl cynpr, naq unatrgu gur
rnegu hcba abguvat.

26:8 Ur ovaqrgu hc gur jngref va uvf guvpx pybhqf; naq gur pybhq vf
abg erag haqre gurz.

26:9 Ur ubyqrgu onpx gur snpr bs uvf guebar, naq fcernqrgu uvf pybhq
hcba vg.

26:10 Ur ungu pbzcnffrq gur jngref jvgu obhaqf, hagvy gur qnl naq
avtug pbzr gb na raq.

26:11 Gur cvyynef bs urnira gerzoyr naq ner nfgbavfurq ng uvf ercebbs.

26:12 Ur qvivqrgu gur frn jvgu uvf cbjre, naq ol uvf haqrefgnaqvat ur
fzvgrgu guebhtu gur cebhq.

26:13 Ol uvf fcvevg ur ungu tneavfurq gur urniraf; uvf unaq ungu
sbezrq gur pebbxrq frecrag.

26:14 Yb, gurfr ner cnegf bs uvf jnlf: ohg ubj yvggyr n cbegvba vf
urneq bs uvz? ohg gur guhaqre bs uvf cbjre jub pna haqrefgnaq?  27:1
Zberbire Wbo pbagvahrq uvf cnenoyr, naq fnvq, 27:2 Nf Tbq yvirgu, jub
ungu gnxra njnl zl whqtzrag; naq gur Nyzvtugl, jub ungu irkrq zl fbhy;
27:3 Nyy gur juvyr zl oerngu vf va zr, naq gur fcvevg bs Tbq vf va zl
abfgevyf; 27:4 Zl yvcf funyy abg fcrnx jvpxrqarff, abe zl gbathr hggre
qrprvg.

27:5 Tbq sbeovq gung V fubhyq whfgvsl lbh: gvyy V qvr V jvyy abg
erzbir zvar vagrtevgl sebz zr.

27:6 Zl evtugrbhfarff V ubyq snfg, naq jvyy abg yrg vg tb: zl urneg
funyy abg ercebnpu zr fb ybat nf V yvir.

27:7 Yrg zvar rarzl or nf gur jvpxrq, naq ur gung evfrgu hc ntnvafg zr
nf gur haevtugrbhf.

27:8 Sbe jung vf gur ubcr bs gur ulcbpevgr, gubhtu ur ungu tnvarq,
jura Tbq gnxrgu njnl uvf fbhy?  27:9 Jvyy Tbq urne uvf pel jura
gebhoyr pbzrgu hcba uvz?  27:10 Jvyy ur qryvtug uvzfrys va gur
Nyzvtugl? jvyy ur nyjnlf pnyy hcba Tbq?  27:11 V jvyy grnpu lbh ol gur
unaq bs Tbq: gung juvpu vf jvgu gur Nyzvtugl jvyy V abg pbaprny.

27:12 Orubyq, nyy lr lbhefryirf unir frra vg; jul gura ner lr guhf
nygbtrgure inva?  27:13 Guvf vf gur cbegvba bs n jvpxrq zna jvgu Tbq,
naq gur urevgntr bs bccerffbef, juvpu gurl funyy erprvir bs gur
Nyzvtugl.

27:14 Vs uvf puvyqera or zhygvcyvrq, vg vf sbe gur fjbeq: naq uvf
bssfcevat funyy abg or fngvfsvrq jvgu oernq.

27:15 Gubfr gung erznva bs uvz funyy or ohevrq va qrngu: naq uvf
jvqbjf funyy abg jrrc.

27:16 Gubhtu ur urnc hc fvyire nf gur qhfg, naq cercner envzrag nf gur
pynl; 27:17 Ur znl cercner vg, ohg gur whfg funyy chg vg ba, naq gur
vaabprag funyy qvivqr gur fvyire.

27:18 Ur ohvyqrgu uvf ubhfr nf n zbgu, naq nf n obbgu gung gur xrrcre
znxrgu.

27:19 Gur evpu zna funyy yvr qbja, ohg ur funyy abg or tngurerq: ur
bcrargu uvf rlrf, naq ur vf abg.

27:20 Greebef gnxr ubyq ba uvz nf jngref, n grzcrfg fgrnyrgu uvz njnl
va gur avtug.

27:21 Gur rnfg jvaq pneevrgu uvz njnl, naq ur qrcnegrgu: naq nf n
fgbez uheyrgu uvz bhg bs uvf cynpr.

27:22 Sbe Tbq funyy pnfg hcba uvz, naq abg fcner: ur jbhyq snva syrr
bhg bs uvf unaq.

27:23 Zra funyy pync gurve unaqf ng uvz, naq funyy uvff uvz bhg bs uvf
cynpr.

28:1 Fheryl gurer vf n irva sbe gur fvyire, naq n cynpr sbe tbyq jurer
gurl svar vg.

28:2 Veba vf gnxra bhg bs gur rnegu, naq oenff vf zbygra bhg bs gur
fgbar.

28:3 Ur frggrgu na raq gb qnexarff, naq frnepurgu bhg nyy cresrpgvba:
gur fgbarf bs qnexarff, naq gur funqbj bs qrngu.

28:4 Gur sybbq oernxrgu bhg sebz gur vaunovgnag; rira gur jngref
sbetbggra bs gur sbbg: gurl ner qevrq hc, gurl ner tbar njnl sebz zra.

28:5 Nf sbe gur rnegu, bhg bs vg pbzrgu oernq: naq haqre vg vf ghearq
hc nf vg jrer sver.

28:6 Gur fgbarf bs vg ner gur cynpr bs fnccuverf: naq vg ungu qhfg bs
tbyq.

28:7 Gurer vf n cngu juvpu ab sbjy xabjrgu, naq juvpu gur ihygher'f
rlr ungu abg frra: 28:8 Gur yvba'f jurycf unir abg gebqqra vg, abe gur
svrepr yvba cnffrq ol vg.

28:9 Ur chggrgu sbegu uvf unaq hcba gur ebpx; ur biregheargu gur
zbhagnvaf ol gur ebbgf.

28:10 Ur phggrgu bhg eviref nzbat gur ebpxf; naq uvf rlr frrgu rirel
cerpvbhf guvat.

28:11 Ur ovaqrgu gur sybbqf sebz biresybjvat; naq gur guvat gung vf
uvq oevatrgu ur sbegu gb yvtug.

28:12 Ohg jurer funyy jvfqbz or sbhaq? naq jurer vf gur cynpr bs
haqrefgnaqvat?  28:13 Zna xabjrgu abg gur cevpr gurerbs; arvgure vf vg
sbhaq va gur ynaq bs gur yvivat.

28:14 Gur qrcgu fnvgu, Vg vf abg va zr: naq gur frn fnvgu, Vg vf abg
jvgu zr.

28:15 Vg pnaabg or tbggra sbe tbyq, arvgure funyy fvyire or jrvturq
sbe gur cevpr gurerbs.

28:16 Vg pnaabg or inyhrq jvgu gur tbyq bs Bcuve, jvgu gur cerpvbhf
balk, be gur fnccuver.

28:17 Gur tbyq naq gur pelfgny pnaabg rdhny vg: naq gur rkpunatr bs vg
funyy abg or sbe wrjryf bs svar tbyq.

28:18 Ab zragvba funyy or znqr bs pbeny, be bs crneyf: sbe gur cevpr
bs jvfqbz vf nobir ehovrf.

28:19 Gur gbcnm bs Rguvbcvn funyy abg rdhny vg, arvgure funyy vg or
inyhrq jvgu cher tbyq.

28:20 Jurapr gura pbzrgu jvfqbz? naq jurer vf gur cynpr bs
haqrefgnaqvat?  28:21 Frrvat vg vf uvq sebz gur rlrf bs nyy yvivat,
naq xrcg pybfr sebz gur sbjyf bs gur nve.

28:22 Qrfgehpgvba naq qrngu fnl, Jr unir urneq gur snzr gurerbs jvgu
bhe rnef.

28:23 Tbq haqrefgnaqrgu gur jnl gurerbs, naq ur xabjrgu gur cynpr
gurerbs.

28:24 Sbe ur ybbxrgu gb gur raqf bs gur rnegu, naq frrgu haqre gur
jubyr urnira; 28:25 Gb znxr gur jrvtug sbe gur jvaqf; naq ur jrvturgu
gur jngref ol zrnfher.

28:26 Jura ur znqr n qrperr sbe gur enva, naq n jnl sbe gur yvtugavat
bs gur guhaqre: 28:27 Gura qvq ur frr vg, naq qrpyner vg; ur cercnerq
vg, lrn, naq frnepurq vg bhg.

28:28 Naq hagb zna ur fnvq, Orubyq, gur srne bs gur YBEQ, gung vf
jvfqbz; naq gb qrcneg sebz rivy vf haqrefgnaqvat.

29:1 Zberbire Wbo pbagvahrq uvf cnenoyr, naq fnvq, 29:2 Bu gung V jrer
nf va zbaguf cnfg, nf va gur qnlf jura Tbq cerfreirq zr; 29:3 Jura uvf
pnaqyr fuvarq hcba zl urnq, naq jura ol uvf yvtug V jnyxrq guebhtu
qnexarff; 29:4 Nf V jnf va gur qnlf bs zl lbhgu, jura gur frperg bs
Tbq jnf hcba zl gnoreanpyr; 29:5 Jura gur Nyzvtugl jnf lrg jvgu zr,
jura zl puvyqera jrer nobhg zr; 29:6 Jura V jnfurq zl fgrcf jvgu
ohggre, naq gur ebpx cbherq zr bhg eviref bs bvy; 29:7 Jura V jrag bhg
gb gur tngr guebhtu gur pvgl, jura V cercnerq zl frng va gur fgerrg!
29:8 Gur lbhat zra fnj zr, naq uvq gurzfryirf: naq gur ntrq nebfr, naq
fgbbq hc.

29:9 Gur cevaprf ersenvarq gnyxvat, naq ynvq gurve unaq ba gurve
zbhgu.

29:10 Gur aboyrf uryq gurve crnpr, naq gurve gbathr pyrnirq gb gur
ebbs bs gurve zbhgu.

29:11 Jura gur rne urneq zr, gura vg oyrffrq zr; naq jura gur rlr fnj
zr, vg tnir jvgarff gb zr: 29:12 Orpnhfr V qryvirerq gur cbbe gung
pevrq, naq gur sngureyrff, naq uvz gung unq abar gb uryc uvz.

29:13 Gur oyrffvat bs uvz gung jnf ernql gb crevfu pnzr hcba zr: naq V
pnhfrq gur jvqbj'f urneg gb fvat sbe wbl.

29:14 V chg ba evtugrbhfarff, naq vg pybgurq zr: zl whqtzrag jnf nf n
ebor naq n qvnqrz.

29:15 V jnf rlrf gb gur oyvaq, naq srrg jnf V gb gur ynzr.

29:16 V jnf n sngure gb gur cbbe: naq gur pnhfr juvpu V xarj abg V
frnepurq bhg.

29:17 Naq V oenxr gur wnjf bs gur jvpxrq, naq cyhpxrq gur fcbvy bhg bs
uvf grrgu.

29:18 Gura V fnvq, V funyy qvr va zl arfg, naq V funyy zhygvcyl zl
qnlf nf gur fnaq.

29:19 Zl ebbg jnf fcernq bhg ol gur jngref, naq gur qrj ynl nyy avtug
hcba zl oenapu.

29:20 Zl tybel jnf serfu va zr, naq zl obj jnf erarjrq va zl unaq.

29:21 Hagb zr zra tnir rne, naq jnvgrq, naq xrcg fvyrapr ng zl
pbhafry.

29:22 Nsgre zl jbeqf gurl fcnxr abg ntnva; naq zl fcrrpu qebccrq hcba
gurz.

29:23 Naq gurl jnvgrq sbe zr nf sbe gur enva; naq gurl bcrarq gurve
zbhgu jvqr nf sbe gur ynggre enva.

29:24 Vs V ynhturq ba gurz, gurl oryvrirq vg abg; naq gur yvtug bs zl
pbhagranapr gurl pnfg abg qbja.

29:25 V pubfr bhg gurve jnl, naq fng puvrs, naq qjryg nf n xvat va gur
nezl, nf bar gung pbzsbegrgu gur zbhearef.

30:1 Ohg abj gurl gung ner lbhatre guna V unir zr va qrevfvba, jubfr
snguref V jbhyq unir qvfqnvarq gb unir frg jvgu gur qbtf bs zl sybpx.

30:2 Lrn, jurergb zvtug gur fgeratgu bs gurve unaqf cebsvg zr, va jubz
byq ntr jnf crevfurq?  30:3 Sbe jnag naq snzvar gurl jrer fbyvgnel;
syrrvat vagb gur jvyqrearff va sbezre gvzr qrfbyngr naq jnfgr.

30:4 Jub phg hc znyybjf ol gur ohfurf, naq whavcre ebbgf sbe gurve
zrng.

30:5 Gurl jrer qevira sbegu sebz nzbat zra, (gurl pevrq nsgre gurz nf
nsgre n guvrs;) 30:6 Gb qjryy va gur pyvssf bs gur inyyrlf, va pnirf
bs gur rnegu, naq va gur ebpxf.

30:7 Nzbat gur ohfurf gurl oenlrq; haqre gur arggyrf gurl jrer
tngurerq gbtrgure.
