30:8 Gurl jrer puvyqera bs sbbyf, lrn, puvyqera bs onfr zra: gurl jrer
ivyre guna gur rnegu.

30:9 Naq abj nz V gurve fbat, lrn, V nz gurve oljbeq.

30:10 Gurl noube zr, gurl syrr sne sebz zr, naq fcner abg gb fcvg va
zl snpr.

30:11 Orpnhfr ur ungu ybbfrq zl pbeq, naq nssyvpgrq zr, gurl unir nyfb
yrg ybbfr gur oevqyr orsber zr.

30:12 Hcba zl evtug unaq evfr gur lbhgu; gurl chfu njnl zl srrg, naq
gurl envfr hc ntnvafg zr gur jnlf bs gurve qrfgehpgvba.

30:13 Gurl zne zl cngu, gurl frg sbejneq zl pnynzvgl, gurl unir ab
urycre.

30:14 Gurl pnzr hcba zr nf n jvqr oernxvat va bs jngref: va gur
qrfbyngvba gurl ebyyrq gurzfryirf hcba zr.

30:15 Greebef ner ghearq hcba zr: gurl chefhr zl fbhy nf gur jvaq: naq
zl jrysner cnffrgu njnl nf n pybhq.

30:16 Naq abj zl fbhy vf cbherq bhg hcba zr; gur qnlf bs nssyvpgvba
unir gnxra ubyq hcba zr.

30:17 Zl obarf ner cvreprq va zr va gur avtug frnfba: naq zl fvarjf
gnxr ab erfg.

30:18 Ol gur terng sbepr bs zl qvfrnfr vf zl tnezrag punatrq: vg
ovaqrgu zr nobhg nf gur pbyyne bs zl pbng.

30:19 Ur ungu pnfg zr vagb gur zver, naq V nz orpbzr yvxr qhfg naq
nfurf.

30:20 V pel hagb gurr, naq gubh qbfg abg urne zr: V fgnaq hc, naq gubh
ertneqrfg zr abg.

30:21 Gubh neg orpbzr pehry gb zr: jvgu gul fgebat unaq gubh bccbfrfg
gulfrys ntnvafg zr.

30:22 Gubh yvsgrfg zr hc gb gur jvaq; gubh pnhfrfg zr gb evqr hcba vg,
naq qvffbyirfg zl fhofgnapr.

30:23 Sbe V xabj gung gubh jvyg oevat zr gb qrngu, naq gb gur ubhfr
nccbvagrq sbe nyy yvivat.

30:24 Ubjorvg ur jvyy abg fgergpu bhg uvf unaq gb gur tenir, gubhtu
gurl pel va uvf qrfgehpgvba.

30:25 Qvq abg V jrrc sbe uvz gung jnf va gebhoyr? jnf abg zl fbhy
tevrirq sbe gur cbbe?  30:26 Jura V ybbxrq sbe tbbq, gura rivy pnzr
hagb zr: naq jura V jnvgrq sbe yvtug, gurer pnzr qnexarff.

30:27 Zl objryf obvyrq, naq erfgrq abg: gur qnlf bs nssyvpgvba
ceriragrq zr.

30:28 V jrag zbheavat jvgubhg gur fha: V fgbbq hc, naq V pevrq va gur
pbatertngvba.

30:29 V nz n oebgure gb qentbaf, naq n pbzcnavba gb bjyf.

30:30 Zl fxva vf oynpx hcba zr, naq zl obarf ner ohearq jvgu urng.

30:31 Zl unec nyfb vf ghearq gb zbheavat, naq zl betna vagb gur ibvpr
bs gurz gung jrrc.

31:1 V znqr n pbiranag jvgu zvar rlrf; jul gura fubhyq V guvax hcba n
znvq?  31:2 Sbe jung cbegvba bs Tbq vf gurer sebz nobir? naq jung
vaurevgnapr bs gur Nyzvtugl sebz ba uvtu?  31:3 Vf abg qrfgehpgvba gb
gur jvpxrq? naq n fgenatr chavfuzrag gb gur jbexref bs vavdhvgl?  31:4
Qbgu abg ur frr zl jnlf, naq pbhag nyy zl fgrcf?  31:5 Vs V unir
jnyxrq jvgu inavgl, be vs zl sbbg ungu unfgrq gb qrprvg; 31:6 Yrg zr
or jrvturq va na rira onynapr gung Tbq znl xabj zvar vagrtevgl.

31:7 Vs zl fgrc ungu ghearq bhg bs gur jnl, naq zvar urneg jnyxrq
nsgre zvar rlrf, naq vs nal oybg ungu pyrnirq gb zvar unaqf; 31:8 Gura
yrg zr fbj, naq yrg nabgure rng; lrn, yrg zl bssfcevat or ebbgrq bhg.

31:9 Vs zvar urneg unir orra qrprvirq ol n jbzna, be vs V unir ynvq
jnvg ng zl arvtuobhe'f qbbe; 31:10 Gura yrg zl jvsr tevaq hagb
nabgure, naq yrg bguref obj qbja hcba ure.

31:11 Sbe guvf vf na urvabhf pevzr; lrn, vg vf na vavdhvgl gb or
chavfurq ol gur whqtrf.

31:12 Sbe vg vf n sver gung pbafhzrgu gb qrfgehpgvba, naq jbhyq ebbg
bhg nyy zvar vapernfr.

31:13 Vs V qvq qrfcvfr gur pnhfr bs zl znafreinag be bs zl
znvqfreinag, jura gurl pbagraqrq jvgu zr; 31:14 Jung gura funyy V qb
jura Tbq evfrgu hc? naq jura ur ivfvgrgu, jung funyy V nafjre uvz?
31:15 Qvq abg ur gung znqr zr va gur jbzo znxr uvz? naq qvq abg bar
snfuvba hf va gur jbzo?  31:16 Vs V unir jvguuryq gur cbbe sebz gurve
qrfver, be unir pnhfrq gur rlrf bs gur jvqbj gb snvy; 31:17 Be unir
rngra zl zbefry zlfrys nybar, naq gur sngureyrff ungu abg rngra
gurerbs; 31:18 (Sbe sebz zl lbhgu ur jnf oebhtug hc jvgu zr, nf jvgu n
sngure, naq V unir thvqrq ure sebz zl zbgure'f jbzo;) 31:19 Vs V unir
frra nal crevfu sbe jnag bs pybguvat, be nal cbbe jvgubhg pbirevat;
31:20 Vs uvf ybvaf unir abg oyrffrq zr, naq vs ur jrer abg jnezrq jvgu
gur syrrpr bs zl furrc; 31:21 Vs V unir yvsgrq hc zl unaq ntnvafg gur
sngureyrff, jura V fnj zl uryc va gur tngr: 31:22 Gura yrg zvar nez
snyy sebz zl fubhyqre oynqr, naq zvar nez or oebxra sebz gur obar.

31:23 Sbe qrfgehpgvba sebz Tbq jnf n greebe gb zr, naq ol ernfba bs
uvf uvtuarff V pbhyq abg raqher.

31:24 Vs V unir znqr tbyq zl ubcr, be unir fnvq gb gur svar tbyq, Gubh
neg zl pbasvqrapr; 31:25 Vs V erwbvpr orpnhfr zl jrnygu jnf terng, naq
orpnhfr zvar unaq unq tbggra zhpu; 31:26 Vs V oruryq gur fha jura vg
fuvarq, be gur zbba jnyxvat va oevtugarff; 31:27 Naq zl urneg ungu
orra frpergyl ragvprq, be zl zbhgu ungu xvffrq zl unaq: 31:28 Guvf
nyfb jrer na vavdhvgl gb or chavfurq ol gur whqtr: sbe V fubhyq unir
qravrq gur Tbq gung vf nobir.

31:29 Vs V erwbvpr ng gur qrfgehpgvba bs uvz gung ungrq zr, be yvsgrq
hc zlfrys jura rivy sbhaq uvz: 31:30 Arvgure unir V fhssrerq zl zbhgu
gb fva ol jvfuvat n phefr gb uvf fbhy.

31:31 Vs gur zra bs zl gnoreanpyr fnvq abg, Bu gung jr unq bs uvf
syrfu!  jr pnaabg or fngvfsvrq.

31:32 Gur fgenatre qvq abg ybqtr va gur fgerrg: ohg V bcrarq zl qbbef
gb gur geniryyre.

31:33 Vs V pbirerq zl genafterffvbaf nf Nqnz, ol uvqvat zvar vavdhvgl
va zl obfbz: 31:34 Qvq V srne n terng zhygvghqr, be qvq gur pbagrzcg
bs snzvyvrf greevsl zr, gung V xrcg fvyrapr, naq jrag abg bhg bs gur
qbbe?  31:35 Bu gung bar jbhyq urne zr! orubyq, zl qrfver vf, gung gur
Nyzvtugl jbhyq nafjre zr, naq gung zvar nqirefnel unq jevggra n obbx.

31:36 Fheryl V jbhyq gnxr vg hcba zl fubhyqre, naq ovaq vg nf n pebja
gb zr.

31:37 V jbhyq qrpyner hagb uvz gur ahzore bs zl fgrcf; nf n cevapr
jbhyq V tb arne hagb uvz.

31:38 Vs zl ynaq pel ntnvafg zr, be gung gur sheebjf yvxrjvfr gurerbs
pbzcynva; 31:39 Vs V unir rngra gur sehvgf gurerbs jvgubhg zbarl, be
unir pnhfrq gur bjaref gurerbs gb ybfr gurve yvsr: 31:40 Yrg guvfgyrf
tebj vafgrnq bs jurng, naq pbpxyr vafgrnq bs oneyrl.

Gur jbeqf bs Wbo ner raqrq.

32:1 Fb gurfr guerr zra prnfrq gb nafjre Wbo, orpnhfr ur jnf evtugrbhf
va uvf bja rlrf.

32:2 Gura jnf xvaqyrq gur jengu bs Ryvuh gur fba bs Onenpury gur
Ohmvgr, bs gur xvaqerq bs Enz: ntnvafg Wbo jnf uvf jengu xvaqyrq,
orpnhfr ur whfgvsvrq uvzfrys engure guna Tbq.

32:3 Nyfb ntnvafg uvf guerr sevraqf jnf uvf jengu xvaqyrq, orpnhfr
gurl unq sbhaq ab nafjre, naq lrg unq pbaqrzarq Wbo.

32:4 Abj Ryvuh unq jnvgrq gvyy Wbo unq fcbxra, orpnhfr gurl jrer ryqre
guna ur.

32:5 Jura Ryvuh fnj gung gurer jnf ab nafjre va gur zbhgu bs gurfr
guerr zra, gura uvf jengu jnf xvaqyrq.

32:6 Naq Ryvuh gur fba bs Onenpury gur Ohmvgr nafjrerq naq fnvq, V nz
lbhat, naq lr ner irel byq; jurersber V jnf nsenvq, naq qhefg abg furj
lbh zvar bcvavba.

32:7 V fnvq, Qnlf fubhyq fcrnx, naq zhygvghqr bs lrnef fubhyq grnpu
jvfqbz.

32:8 Ohg gurer vf n fcvevg va zna: naq gur vafcvengvba bs gur Nyzvtugl
tvirgu gurz haqrefgnaqvat.

32:9 Terng zra ner abg nyjnlf jvfr: arvgure qb gur ntrq haqrefgnaq
whqtzrag.

32:10 Gurersber V fnvq, Urnexra gb zr; V nyfb jvyy furj zvar bcvavba.

32:11 Orubyq, V jnvgrq sbe lbhe jbeqf; V tnir rne gb lbhe ernfbaf,
juvyfg lr frnepurq bhg jung gb fnl.

32:12 Lrn, V nggraqrq hagb lbh, naq, orubyq, gurer jnf abar bs lbh
gung pbaivaprq Wbo, be gung nafjrerq uvf jbeqf: 32:13 Yrfg lr fubhyq
fnl, Jr unir sbhaq bhg jvfqbz: Tbq guehfgrgu uvz qbja, abg zna.

32:14 Abj ur ungu abg qverpgrq uvf jbeqf ntnvafg zr: arvgure jvyy V
nafjre uvz jvgu lbhe fcrrpurf.

32:15 Gurl jrer nznmrq, gurl nafjrerq ab zber: gurl yrsg bss fcrnxvat.

32:16 Jura V unq jnvgrq, (sbe gurl fcnxr abg, ohg fgbbq fgvyy, naq
nafjrerq ab zber;) 32:17 V fnvq, V jvyy nafjre nyfb zl cneg, V nyfb
jvyy furj zvar bcvavba.

32:18 Sbe V nz shyy bs znggre, gur fcvevg jvguva zr pbafgenvargu zr.

32:19 Orubyq, zl oryyl vf nf jvar juvpu ungu ab irag; vg vf ernql gb
ohefg yvxr arj obggyrf.

32:20 V jvyy fcrnx, gung V znl or erserfurq: V jvyy bcra zl yvcf naq
nafjre.

32:21 Yrg zr abg, V cenl lbh, npprcg nal zna'f crefba, arvgure yrg zr
tvir synggrevat gvgyrf hagb zna.

32:22 Sbe V xabj abg gb tvir synggrevat gvgyrf; va fb qbvat zl znxre
jbhyq fbba gnxr zr njnl.

33:1 Jurersber, Wbo, V cenl gurr, urne zl fcrrpurf, naq urnexra gb nyy
zl jbeqf.

33:2 Orubyq, abj V unir bcrarq zl zbhgu, zl gbathr ungu fcbxra va zl
zbhgu.

33:3 Zl jbeqf funyy or bs gur hcevtugarff bs zl urneg: naq zl yvcf
funyy hggre xabjyrqtr pyrneyl.

33:4 Gur fcvevg bs Tbq ungu znqr zr, naq gur oerngu bs gur Nyzvtugl
ungu tvira zr yvsr.

33:5 Vs gubh pnafg nafjre zr, frg gul jbeqf va beqre orsber zr, fgnaq
hc.

33:6 Orubyq, V nz nppbeqvat gb gul jvfu va Tbq'f fgrnq: V nyfb nz
sbezrq bhg bs gur pynl.

33:7 Orubyq, zl greebe funyy abg znxr gurr nsenvq, arvgure funyy zl
unaq or urnil hcba gurr.

33:8 Fheryl gubh unfg fcbxra va zvar urnevat, naq V unir urneq gur
ibvpr bs gul jbeqf, fnlvat, 33:9 V nz pyrna jvgubhg genafterffvba, V
nz vaabprag; arvgure vf gurer vavdhvgl va zr.

33:10 Orubyq, ur svaqrgu bppnfvbaf ntnvafg zr, ur pbhagrgu zr sbe uvf
rarzl, 33:11 Ur chggrgu zl srrg va gur fgbpxf, ur znexrgu nyy zl
cnguf.

33:12 Orubyq, va guvf gubh neg abg whfg: V jvyy nafjre gurr, gung Tbq
vf terngre guna zna.

33:13 Jul qbfg gubh fgevir ntnvafg uvz? sbe ur tvirgu abg nppbhag bs
nal bs uvf znggref.

33:14 Sbe Tbq fcrnxrgu bapr, lrn gjvpr, lrg zna creprvirgu vg abg.

33:15 Va n qernz, va n ivfvba bs gur avtug, jura qrrc fyrrc snyyrgu
hcba zra, va fyhzorevatf hcba gur orq; 33:16 Gura ur bcrargu gur rnef
bs zra, naq frnyrgu gurve vafgehpgvba, 33:17 Gung ur znl jvguqenj zna
sebz uvf checbfr, naq uvqr cevqr sebz zna.

33:18 Ur xrrcrgu onpx uvf fbhy sebz gur cvg, naq uvf yvsr sebz
crevfuvat ol gur fjbeq.

33:19 Ur vf punfgrarq nyfb jvgu cnva hcba uvf orq, naq gur zhygvghqr
bs uvf obarf jvgu fgebat cnva: 33:20 Fb gung uvf yvsr noubeergu oernq,
naq uvf fbhy qnvagl zrng.

33:21 Uvf syrfu vf pbafhzrq njnl, gung vg pnaabg or frra; naq uvf
obarf gung jrer abg frra fgvpx bhg.

33:22 Lrn, uvf fbhy qenjrgu arne hagb gur tenir, naq uvf yvsr gb gur
qrfgeblref.

33:23 Vs gurer or n zrffratre jvgu uvz, na vagrecergre, bar nzbat n
gubhfnaq, gb furj hagb zna uvf hcevtugarff: 33:24 Gura ur vf tenpvbhf
hagb uvz, naq fnvgu, Qryvire uvz sebz tbvat qbja gb gur cvg: V unir
sbhaq n enafbz.

33:25 Uvf syrfu funyy or serfure guna n puvyq'f: ur funyy erghea gb
gur qnlf bs uvf lbhgu: 33:26 Ur funyy cenl hagb Tbq, naq ur jvyy or
snibhenoyr hagb uvz: naq ur funyy frr uvf snpr jvgu wbl: sbe ur jvyy
eraqre hagb zna uvf evtugrbhfarff.

33:27 Ur ybbxrgu hcba zra, naq vs nal fnl, V unir fvaarq, naq
creiregrq gung juvpu jnf evtug, naq vg cebsvgrq zr abg; 33:28 Ur jvyy
qryvire uvf fbhy sebz tbvat vagb gur cvg, naq uvf yvsr funyy frr gur
yvtug.

33:29 Yb, nyy gurfr guvatf jbexrgu Tbq bsgragvzrf jvgu zna, 33:30 Gb
oevat onpx uvf fbhy sebz gur cvg, gb or rayvtugrarq jvgu gur yvtug bs
gur yvivat.

33:31 Znex jryy, B Wbo, urnexra hagb zr: ubyq gul crnpr, naq V jvyy
fcrnx.

33:32 Vs gubh unfg nalguvat gb fnl, nafjre zr: fcrnx, sbe V qrfver gb
whfgvsl gurr.

33:33 Vs abg, urnexra hagb zr: ubyq gul crnpr, naq V funyy grnpu gurr
jvfqbz.

34:1 Shegurezber Ryvuh nafjrerq naq fnvq, 34:2 Urne zl jbeqf, B lr
jvfr zra; naq tvir rne hagb zr, lr gung unir xabjyrqtr.

34:3 Sbe gur rne gevrgu jbeqf, nf gur zbhgu gnfgrgu zrng.

34:4 Yrg hf pubbfr gb hf whqtzrag: yrg hf xabj nzbat bhefryirf jung vf
tbbq.

34:5 Sbe Wbo ungu fnvq, V nz evtugrbhf: naq Tbq ungu gnxra njnl zl
whqtzrag.

34:6 Fubhyq V yvr ntnvafg zl evtug? zl jbhaq vf vaphenoyr jvgubhg
genafterffvba.

34:7 Jung zna vf yvxr Wbo, jub qevaxrgu hc fpbeavat yvxr jngre?  34:8
Juvpu tbrgu va pbzcnal jvgu gur jbexref bs vavdhvgl, naq jnyxrgu jvgu
jvpxrq zra.

34:9 Sbe ur ungu fnvq, Vg cebsvgrgu n zna abguvat gung ur fubhyq
qryvtug uvzfrys jvgu Tbq.

34:10 Gurersber urnexra hagb zr lr zra bs haqrefgnaqvat: sne or vg
sebz Tbq, gung ur fubhyq qb jvpxrqarff; naq sebz gur Nyzvtugl, gung ur
fubhyq pbzzvg vavdhvgl.

34:11 Sbe gur jbex bs n zna funyy ur eraqre hagb uvz, naq pnhfr rirel
zna gb svaq nppbeqvat gb uvf jnlf.

34:12 Lrn, fheryl Tbq jvyy abg qb jvpxrqyl, arvgure jvyy gur Nyzvtugl
creireg whqtzrag.

34:13 Jub ungu tvira uvz n punetr bire gur rnegu? be jub ungu qvfcbfrq
gur jubyr jbeyq?  34:14 Vs ur frg uvf urneg hcba zna, vs ur tngure
hagb uvzfrys uvf fcvevg naq uvf oerngu; 34:15 Nyy syrfu funyy crevfu
gbtrgure, naq zna funyy ghea ntnva hagb qhfg.

34:16 Vs abj gubh unfg haqrefgnaqvat, urne guvf: urnexra gb gur ibvpr
bs zl jbeqf.

34:17 Funyy rira ur gung ungrgu evtug tbirea? naq jvyg gubh pbaqrza
uvz gung vf zbfg whfg?  34:18 Vf vg svg gb fnl gb n xvat, Gubh neg
jvpxrq? naq gb cevaprf, Lr ner hatbqyl?  34:19 Ubj zhpu yrff gb uvz
gung npprcgrgu abg gur crefbaf bs cevaprf, abe ertneqrgu gur evpu zber
guna gur cbbe? sbe gurl nyy ner gur jbex bs uvf unaqf.

34:20 Va n zbzrag funyy gurl qvr, naq gur crbcyr funyy or gebhoyrq ng
zvqavtug, naq cnff njnl: naq gur zvtugl funyy or gnxra njnl jvgubhg
unaq.

34:21 Sbe uvf rlrf ner hcba gur jnlf bs zna, naq ur frrgu nyy uvf
tbvatf.

34:22 Gurer vf ab qnexarff, abe funqbj bs qrngu, jurer gur jbexref bs
vavdhvgl znl uvqr gurzfryirf.

34:23 Sbe ur jvyy abg ynl hcba zna zber guna evtug; gung ur fubhyq
ragre vagb whqtzrag jvgu Tbq.

34:24 Ur funyy oernx va cvrprf zvtugl zra jvgubhg ahzore, naq frg
bguref va gurve fgrnq.

34:25 Gurersber ur xabjrgu gurve jbexf, naq ur biregheargu gurz va gur
avtug, fb gung gurl ner qrfgeblrq.

34:26 Ur fgevxrgu gurz nf jvpxrq zra va gur bcra fvtug bs bguref;
34:27 Orpnhfr gurl ghearq onpx sebz uvz, naq jbhyq abg pbafvqre nal bs
uvf jnlf: 34:28 Fb gung gurl pnhfr gur pel bs gur cbbe gb pbzr hagb
uvz, naq ur urnergu gur pel bs gur nssyvpgrq.

34:29 Jura ur tvirgu dhvrgarff, jub gura pna znxr gebhoyr? naq jura ur
uvqrgu uvf snpr, jub gura pna orubyq uvz? jurgure vg or qbar ntnvafg n
angvba, be ntnvafg n zna bayl: 34:30 Gung gur ulcbpevgr ervta abg,
yrfg gur crbcyr or rafanerq.

34:31 Fheryl vg vf zrrg gb or fnvq hagb Tbq, V unir obear
punfgvfrzrag, V jvyy abg bssraq nal zber: 34:32 Gung juvpu V frr abg
grnpu gubh zr: vs V unir qbar vavdhvgl, V jvyy qb ab zber.

34:33 Fubhyq vg or nppbeqvat gb gul zvaq? ur jvyy erpbzcrafr vg,
jurgure gubh ershfr, be jurgure gubh pubbfr; naq abg V: gurersber
fcrnx jung gubh xabjrfg.

34:34 Yrg zra bs haqrefgnaqvat gryy zr, naq yrg n jvfr zna urnexra
hagb zr.

34:35 Wbo ungu fcbxra jvgubhg xabjyrqtr, naq uvf jbeqf jrer jvgubhg
jvfqbz.

34:36 Zl qrfver vf gung Wbo znl or gevrq hagb gur raq orpnhfr bs uvf
nafjref sbe jvpxrq zra.

34:37 Sbe ur nqqrgu eroryyvba hagb uvf fva, ur pynccrgu uvf unaqf
nzbat hf, naq zhygvcyvrgu uvf jbeqf ntnvafg Tbq.

35:1 Ryvuh fcnxr zberbire, naq fnvq, 35:2 Guvaxrfg gubh guvf gb or
evtug, gung gubh fnvqfg, Zl evtugrbhfarff vf zber guna Tbq'f?  35:3
Sbe gubh fnvqfg, Jung nqinagntr jvyy vg or hagb gurr? naq, Jung cebsvg
funyy V unir, vs V or pyrnafrq sebz zl fva?  35:4 V jvyy nafjre gurr,
naq gul pbzcnavbaf jvgu gurr.

35:5 Ybbx hagb gur urniraf, naq frr; naq orubyq gur pybhqf juvpu ner
uvture guna gubh.

35:6 Vs gubh fvaarfg, jung qbrfg gubh ntnvafg uvz? be vs gul
genafterffvbaf or zhygvcyvrq, jung qbrfg gubh hagb uvz?  35:7 Vs gubh
or evtugrbhf, jung tvirfg gubh uvz? be jung erprvirgu ur bs guvar
unaq?  35:8 Gul jvpxrqarff znl uheg n zna nf gubh neg; naq gul
evtugrbhfarff znl cebsvg gur fba bs zna.

35:9 Ol ernfba bs gur zhygvghqr bs bccerffvbaf gurl znxr gur bccerffrq
gb pel: gurl pel bhg ol ernfba bs gur nez bs gur zvtugl.

35:10 Ohg abar fnvgu, Jurer vf Tbq zl znxre, jub tvirgu fbatf va gur
avtug; 35:11 Jub grnpurgu hf zber guna gur ornfgf bs gur rnegu, naq
znxrgu hf jvfre guna gur sbjyf bs urnira?  35:12 Gurer gurl pel, ohg
abar tvirgu nafjre, orpnhfr bs gur cevqr bs rivy zra.

35:13 Fheryl Tbq jvyy abg urne inavgl, arvgure jvyy gur Nyzvtugl
ertneq vg.

35:14 Nygubhtu gubh fnlrfg gubh funyg abg frr uvz, lrg whqtzrag vf
orsber uvz; gurersber gehfg gubh va uvz.

35:15 Ohg abj, orpnhfr vg vf abg fb, ur ungu ivfvgrq va uvf natre; lrg
ur xabjrgu vg abg va terng rkgerzvgl: 35:16 Gurersber qbgu Wbo bcra
uvf zbhgu va inva; ur zhygvcyvrgu jbeqf jvgubhg xabjyrqtr.

36:1 Ryvuh nyfb cebprrqrq, naq fnvq, 36:2 Fhssre zr n yvggyr, naq V
jvyy furj gurr gung V unir lrg gb fcrnx ba Tbq'f orunys.

36:3 V jvyy srgpu zl xabjyrqtr sebz nsne, naq jvyy nfpevor
evtugrbhfarff gb zl Znxre.

36:4 Sbe gehyl zl jbeqf funyy abg or snyfr: ur gung vf cresrpg va
xabjyrqtr vf jvgu gurr.

36:5 Orubyq, Tbq vf zvtugl, naq qrfcvfrgu abg nal: ur vf zvtugl va
fgeratgu naq jvfqbz.

36:6 Ur cerfreirgu abg gur yvsr bs gur jvpxrq: ohg tvirgu evtug gb gur
cbbe.

36:7 Ur jvguqenjrgu abg uvf rlrf sebz gur evtugrbhf: ohg jvgu xvatf
ner gurl ba gur guebar; lrn, ur qbgu rfgnoyvfu gurz sbe rire, naq gurl
ner rknygrq.

36:8 Naq vs gurl or obhaq va srggref, naq or ubyqra va pbeqf bs
nssyvpgvba; 36:9 Gura ur furjrgu gurz gurve jbex, naq gurve
genafterffvbaf gung gurl unir rkprrqrq.

36:10 Ur bcrargu nyfb gurve rne gb qvfpvcyvar, naq pbzznaqrgu gung
gurl erghea sebz vavdhvgl.

36:11 Vs gurl borl naq freir uvz, gurl funyy fcraq gurve qnlf va
cebfcrevgl, naq gurve lrnef va cyrnfherf.

36:12 Ohg vs gurl borl abg, gurl funyy crevfu ol gur fjbeq, naq gurl
funyy qvr jvgubhg xabjyrqtr.

36:13 Ohg gur ulcbpevgrf va urneg urnc hc jengu: gurl pel abg jura ur
ovaqrgu gurz.

36:14 Gurl qvr va lbhgu, naq gurve yvsr vf nzbat gur hapyrna.

36:15 Ur qryvirergu gur cbbe va uvf nssyvpgvba, naq bcrargu gurve rnef
va bccerffvba.

36:16 Rira fb jbhyq ur unir erzbirq gurr bhg bs gur fgenvg vagb n
oebnq cynpr, jurer gurer vf ab fgenvgarff; naq gung juvpu fubhyq or
frg ba gul gnoyr fubhyq or shyy bs sngarff.

36:17 Ohg gubh unfg shysvyyrq gur whqtzrag bs gur jvpxrq: whqtzrag naq
whfgvpr gnxr ubyq ba gurr.

36:18 Orpnhfr gurer vf jengu, orjner yrfg ur gnxr gurr njnl jvgu uvf
fgebxr: gura n terng enafbz pnaabg qryvire gurr.

36:19 Jvyy ur rfgrrz gul evpurf? ab, abg tbyq, abe nyy gur sbeprf bs
fgeratgu.

36:20 Qrfver abg gur avtug, jura crbcyr ner phg bss va gurve cynpr.

36:21 Gnxr urrq, ertneq abg vavdhvgl: sbe guvf unfg gubh pubfra engure
guna nssyvpgvba.

36:22 Orubyq, Tbq rknygrgu ol uvf cbjre: jub grnpurgu yvxr uvz?  36:23
Jub ungu rawbvarq uvz uvf jnl? be jub pna fnl, Gubh unfg jebhtug
vavdhvgl?  36:24 Erzrzore gung gubh zntavsl uvf jbex, juvpu zra
orubyq.

36:25 Rirel zna znl frr vg; zna znl orubyq vg nsne bss.

36:26 Orubyq, Tbq vf terng, naq jr xabj uvz abg, arvgure pna gur
ahzore bs uvf lrnef or frnepurq bhg.

36:27 Sbe ur znxrgu fznyy gur qebcf bs jngre: gurl cbhe qbja enva
nppbeqvat gb gur incbhe gurerbs: 36:28 Juvpu gur pybhqf qb qebc naq
qvfgvy hcba zna nohaqnagyl.

36:29 Nyfb pna nal haqrefgnaq gur fcernqvatf bs gur pybhqf, be gur
abvfr bs uvf gnoreanpyr?  36:30 Orubyq, ur fcernqrgu uvf yvtug hcba
vg, naq pbirergu gur obggbz bs gur frn.

36:31 Sbe ol gurz whqtrgu ur gur crbcyr; ur tvirgu zrng va nohaqnapr.

36:32 Jvgu pybhqf ur pbirergu gur yvtug; naq pbzznaqrgu vg abg gb
fuvar ol gur pybhq gung pbzrgu orgjvkg.

36:33 Gur abvfr gurerbs furjrgu pbapreavat vg, gur pnggyr nyfb
pbapreavat gur incbhe.

37:1 Ng guvf nyfb zl urneg gerzoyrgu, naq vf zbirq bhg bs uvf cynpr.

37:2 Urne nggragviryl gur abvfr bs uvf ibvpr, naq gur fbhaq gung tbrgu
bhg bs uvf zbhgu.

37:3 Ur qverpgrgu vg haqre gur jubyr urnira, naq uvf yvtugavat hagb
gur raqf bs gur rnegu.

37:4 Nsgre vg n ibvpr ebnergu: ur guhaqrergu jvgu gur ibvpr bs uvf
rkpryyrapl; naq ur jvyy abg fgnl gurz jura uvf ibvpr vf urneq.

37:5 Tbq guhaqrergu zneiryybhfyl jvgu uvf ibvpr; terng guvatf qbrgu
ur, juvpu jr pnaabg pbzceruraq.

37:6 Sbe ur fnvgu gb gur fabj, Or gubh ba gur rnegu; yvxrjvfr gb gur
fznyy enva, naq gb gur terng enva bs uvf fgeratgu.

37:7 Ur frnyrgu hc gur unaq bs rirel zna; gung nyy zra znl xabj uvf
jbex.

37:8 Gura gur ornfgf tb vagb qraf, naq erznva va gurve cynprf.

37:9 Bhg bs gur fbhgu pbzrgu gur juveyjvaq: naq pbyq bhg bs gur abegu.

37:10 Ol gur oerngu bs Tbq sebfg vf tvira: naq gur oernqgu bs gur
jngref vf fgenvgrarq.

37:11 Nyfb ol jngrevat ur jrnevrgu gur guvpx pybhq: ur fpnggrergu uvf
oevtug pybhq: 37:12 Naq vg vf ghearq ebhaq nobhg ol uvf pbhafryf: gung
gurl znl qb jungfbrire ur pbzznaqrgu gurz hcba gur snpr bs gur jbeyq
va gur rnegu.

37:13 Ur pnhfrgu vg gb pbzr, jurgure sbe pbeerpgvba, be sbe uvf ynaq,
be sbe zrepl.

37:14 Urnexra hagb guvf, B Wbo: fgnaq fgvyy, naq pbafvqre gur jbaqebhf
jbexf bs Tbq.

37:15 Qbfg gubh xabj jura Tbq qvfcbfrq gurz, naq pnhfrq gur yvtug bs
uvf pybhq gb fuvar?  37:16 Qbfg gubh xabj gur onynapvatf bs gur
pybhqf, gur jbaqebhf jbexf bs uvz juvpu vf cresrpg va xabjyrqtr?
37:17 Ubj gul tnezragf ner jnez, jura ur dhvrgrgu gur rnegu ol gur
fbhgu jvaq?  37:18 Unfg gubh jvgu uvz fcernq bhg gur fxl, juvpu vf
fgebat, naq nf n zbygra ybbxvat tynff?  37:19 Grnpu hf jung jr funyy
fnl hagb uvz; sbe jr pnaabg beqre bhe fcrrpu ol ernfba bs qnexarff.

37:20 Funyy vg or gbyq uvz gung V fcrnx? vs n zna fcrnx, fheryl ur
funyy or fjnyybjrq hc.

37:21 Naq abj zra frr abg gur oevtug yvtug juvpu vf va gur pybhqf: ohg
gur jvaq cnffrgu, naq pyrnafrgu gurz.

37:22 Snve jrngure pbzrgu bhg bs gur abegu: jvgu Tbq vf greevoyr
znwrfgl.

37:23 Gbhpuvat gur Nyzvtugl, jr pnaabg svaq uvz bhg: ur vf rkpryyrag
va cbjre, naq va whqtzrag, naq va cyragl bs whfgvpr: ur jvyy abg
nssyvpg.

37:24 Zra qb gurersber srne uvz: ur erfcrpgrgu abg nal gung ner jvfr
bs urneg.

38:1 Gura gur YBEQ nafjrerq Wbo bhg bs gur juveyjvaq, naq fnvq, 38:2
Jub vf guvf gung qnexrargu pbhafry ol jbeqf jvgubhg xabjyrqtr?  38:3
Tveq hc abj gul ybvaf yvxr n zna; sbe V jvyy qrznaq bs gurr, naq
nafjre gubh zr.

38:4 Jurer jnfg gubh jura V ynvq gur sbhaqngvbaf bs gur rnegu?
qrpyner, vs gubh unfg haqrefgnaqvat.

38:5 Jub ungu ynvq gur zrnfherf gurerbs, vs gubh xabjrfg? be jub ungu
fgergpurq gur yvar hcba vg?  38:6 Jurerhcba ner gur sbhaqngvbaf
gurerbs snfgrarq? be jub ynvq gur pbeare fgbar gurerbs; 38:7 Jura gur
zbeavat fgnef fnat gbtrgure, naq nyy gur fbaf bs Tbq fubhgrq sbe wbl?
38:8 Be jub fuhg hc gur frn jvgu qbbef, jura vg oenxr sbegu, nf vs vg
unq vffhrq bhg bs gur jbzo?  38:9 Jura V znqr gur pybhq gur tnezrag
gurerbs, naq guvpx qnexarff n fjnqqyvatonaq sbe vg, 38:10 Naq oenxr hc
sbe vg zl qrperrq cynpr, naq frg onef naq qbbef, 38:11 Naq fnvq,
Uvguregb funyg gubh pbzr, ohg ab shegure: naq urer funyy gul cebhq
jnirf or fgnlrq?  38:12 Unfg gubh pbzznaqrq gur zbeavat fvapr gul
qnlf; naq pnhfrq gur qnlfcevat gb xabj uvf cynpr; 38:13 Gung vg zvtug
gnxr ubyq bs gur raqf bs gur rnegu, gung gur jvpxrq zvtug or funxra
bhg bs vg?  38:14 Vg vf ghearq nf pynl gb gur frny; naq gurl fgnaq nf
n tnezrag.

38:15 Naq sebz gur jvpxrq gurve yvtug vf jvguubyqra, naq gur uvtu nez
funyy or oebxra.

38:16 Unfg gubh ragrerq vagb gur fcevatf bs gur frn? be unfg gubh
jnyxrq va gur frnepu bs gur qrcgu?  38:17 Unir gur tngrf bs qrngu orra
bcrarq hagb gurr? be unfg gubh frra gur qbbef bs gur funqbj bs qrngu?
38:18 Unfg gubh creprvirq gur oernqgu bs gur rnegu? qrpyner vs gubh
xabjrfg vg nyy.

38:19 Jurer vf gur jnl jurer yvtug qjryyrgu? naq nf sbe qnexarff,
jurer vf gur cynpr gurerbs, 38:20 Gung gubh fubhyqrfg gnxr vg gb gur
obhaq gurerbs, naq gung gubh fubhyqrfg xabj gur cnguf gb gur ubhfr
gurerbs?  38:21 Xabjrfg gubh vg, orpnhfr gubh jnfg gura obea? be
orpnhfr gur ahzore bs gul qnlf vf terng?  38:22 Unfg gubh ragrerq vagb
gur gernfherf bs gur fabj? be unfg gubh frra gur gernfherf bs gur
unvy, 38:23 Juvpu V unir erfreirq ntnvafg gur gvzr bs gebhoyr, ntnvafg
gur qnl bs onggyr naq jne?  38:24 Ol jung jnl vf gur yvtug cnegrq,
juvpu fpnggrergu gur rnfg jvaq hcba gur rnegu?  38:25 Jub ungu qvivqrq
n jngrepbhefr sbe gur biresybjvat bs jngref, be n jnl sbe gur
yvtugavat bs guhaqre; 38:26 Gb pnhfr vg gb enva ba gur rnegu, jurer ab
zna vf; ba gur jvyqrearff, jurerva gurer vf ab zna; 38:27 Gb fngvfsl
gur qrfbyngr naq jnfgr tebhaq; naq gb pnhfr gur ohq bs gur graqre ureo
gb fcevat sbegu?  38:28 Ungu gur enva n sngure? be jub ungu ortbggra
gur qebcf bs qrj?  38:29 Bhg bs jubfr jbzo pnzr gur vpr? naq gur ubnel
sebfg bs urnira, jub ungu traqrerq vg?  38:30 Gur jngref ner uvq nf
jvgu n fgbar, naq gur snpr bs gur qrrc vf sebmra.

38:31 Pnafg gubh ovaq gur fjrrg vasyhraprf bs Cyrvnqrf, be ybbfr gur
onaqf bs Bevba?  38:32 Pnafg gubh oevat sbegu Znmmnebgu va uvf frnfba?
be pnafg gubh thvqr Nepghehf jvgu uvf fbaf?  38:33 Xabjrfg gubh gur
beqvanaprf bs urnira? pnafg gubh frg gur qbzvavba gurerbs va gur
rnegu?  38:34 Pnafg gubh yvsg hc gul ibvpr gb gur pybhqf, gung
nohaqnapr bs jngref znl pbire gurr?  38:35 Pnafg gubh fraq yvtugavatf,
gung gurl znl tb naq fnl hagb gurr, Urer jr ner?  38:36 Jub ungu chg
jvfqbz va gur vajneq cnegf? be jub ungu tvira haqrefgnaqvat gb gur
urneg?  38:37 Jub pna ahzore gur pybhqf va jvfqbz? be jub pna fgnl gur
obggyrf bs urnira, 38:38 Jura gur qhfg tebjrgu vagb uneqarff, naq gur
pybqf pyrnir snfg gbtrgure?  38:39 Jvyg gubh uhag gur cerl sbe gur
yvba? be svyy gur nccrgvgr bs gur lbhat yvbaf, 38:40 Jura gurl pbhpu
va gurve qraf, naq novqr va gur pbireg gb yvr va jnvg?  38:41 Jub
cebivqrgu sbe gur enira uvf sbbq? jura uvf lbhat barf pel hagb Tbq,
gurl jnaqre sbe ynpx bs zrng.

39:1 Xabjrfg gubh gur gvzr jura gur jvyq tbngf bs gur ebpx oevat
sbegu? be pnafg gubh znex jura gur uvaqf qb pnyir?  39:2 Pnafg gubh
ahzore gur zbaguf gung gurl shysvy? be xabjrfg gubh gur gvzr jura gurl
oevat sbegu?  39:3 Gurl obj gurzfryirf, gurl oevat sbegu gurve lbhat
barf, gurl pnfg bhg gurve fbeebjf.

39:4 Gurve lbhat barf ner va tbbq yvxvat, gurl tebj hc jvgu pbea; gurl
tb sbegu, naq erghea abg hagb gurz.

39:5 Jub ungu frag bhg gur jvyq nff serr? be jub ungu ybbfrq gur onaqf
bs gur jvyq nff?  39:6 Jubfr ubhfr V unir znqr gur jvyqrearff, naq gur
oneera ynaq uvf qjryyvatf.

39:7 Ur fpbeargu gur zhygvghqr bs gur pvgl, arvgure ertneqrgu ur gur
pelvat bs gur qevire.

39:8 Gur enatr bs gur zbhagnvaf vf uvf cnfgher, naq ur frnepurgu nsgre
rirel terra guvat.

39:9 Jvyy gur havpbea or jvyyvat gb freir gurr, be novqr ol gul pevo?
39:10 Pnafg gubh ovaq gur havpbea jvgu uvf onaq va gur sheebj? be jvyy
ur uneebj gur inyyrlf nsgre gurr?  39:11 Jvyg gubh gehfg uvz, orpnhfr
uvf fgeratgu vf terng? be jvyg gubh yrnir gul ynobhe gb uvz?  39:12
Jvyg gubh oryvrir uvz, gung ur jvyy oevat ubzr gul frrq, naq tngure vg
vagb gul onea?  39:13 Tnirfg gubh gur tbbqyl jvatf hagb gur crnpbpxf?
be jvatf naq srnguref hagb gur bfgevpu?  39:14 Juvpu yrnirgu ure rttf
va gur rnegu, naq jnezrgu gurz va qhfg, 39:15 Naq sbetrggrgu gung gur
sbbg znl pehfu gurz, be gung gur jvyq ornfg znl oernx gurz.

39:16 Fur vf uneqrarq ntnvafg ure lbhat barf, nf gubhtu gurl jrer abg
ure'f: ure ynobhe vf va inva jvgubhg srne; 39:17 Orpnhfr Tbq ungu
qrcevirq ure bs jvfqbz, arvgure ungu ur vzcnegrq gb ure haqrefgnaqvat.

39:18 Jung gvzr fur yvsgrgu hc urefrys ba uvtu, fur fpbeargu gur ubefr
naq uvf evqre.

39:19 Unfg gubh tvira gur ubefr fgeratgu? unfg gubh pybgurq uvf arpx
jvgu guhaqre?  39:20 Pnafg gubh znxr uvz nsenvq nf n tenffubccre? gur
tybel bs uvf abfgevyf vf greevoyr.

39:21 Ur cnjrgu va gur inyyrl, naq erwbvprgu va uvf fgeratgu: ur tbrgu
ba gb zrrg gur nezrq zra.

39:22 Ur zbpxrgu ng srne, naq vf abg nssevtugrq; arvgure gheargu ur
onpx sebz gur fjbeq.

39:23 Gur dhvire enggyrgu ntnvafg uvz, gur tyvggrevat fcrne naq gur
fuvryq.

39:24 Ur fjnyybjrgu gur tebhaq jvgu svreprarff naq entr: arvgure
oryvrirgu ur gung vg vf gur fbhaq bs gur gehzcrg.

39:25 Ur fnvgu nzbat gur gehzcrgf, Un, un; naq ur fzryyrgu gur onggyr
nsne bss, gur guhaqre bs gur pncgnvaf, naq gur fubhgvat.

39:26 Qbgu gur unjx syl ol gul jvfqbz, naq fgergpu ure jvatf gbjneq
gur fbhgu?  39:27 Qbgu gur rntyr zbhag hc ng gul pbzznaq, naq znxr ure
arfg ba uvtu?  39:28 Fur qjryyrgu naq novqrgu ba gur ebpx, hcba gur
pent bs gur ebpx, naq gur fgebat cynpr.

39:29 Sebz gurapr fur frrxrgu gur cerl, naq ure rlrf orubyq nsne bss.

39:30 Ure lbhat barf nyfb fhpx hc oybbq: naq jurer gur fynva ner,
gurer vf fur.

40:1 Zberbire gur YBEQ nafjrerq Wbo, naq fnvq, 40:2 Funyy ur gung
pbagraqrgu jvgu gur Nyzvtugl vafgehpg uvz? ur gung ercebirgu Tbq, yrg
uvz nafjre vg.

40:3 Gura Wbo nafjrerq gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, 40:4 Orubyq, V nz ivyr;
jung funyy V nafjre gurr? V jvyy ynl zvar unaq hcba zl zbhgu.

40:5 Bapr unir V fcbxra; ohg V jvyy abg nafjre: lrn, gjvpr; ohg V jvyy
cebprrq ab shegure.

40:6 Gura nafjrerq gur YBEQ hagb Wbo bhg bs gur juveyjvaq, naq fnvq,
40:7 Tveq hc gul ybvaf abj yvxr n zna: V jvyy qrznaq bs gurr, naq
qrpyner gubh hagb zr.

40:8 Jvyg gubh nyfb qvfnaahy zl whqtzrag? jvyg gubh pbaqrza zr, gung
gubh znlrfg or evtugrbhf?  40:9 Unfg gubh na nez yvxr Tbq? be pnafg
gubh guhaqre jvgu n ibvpr yvxr uvz?  40:10 Qrpx gulfrys abj jvgu
znwrfgl naq rkpryyrapl; naq neenl gulfrys jvgu tybel naq ornhgl.

40:11 Pnfg noebnq gur entr bs gul jengu: naq orubyq rirel bar gung vf
cebhq, naq nonfr uvz.

40:12 Ybbx ba rirel bar gung vf cebhq, naq oevat uvz ybj; naq gernq
qbja gur jvpxrq va gurve cynpr.

40:13 Uvqr gurz va gur qhfg gbtrgure; naq ovaq gurve snprf va frperg.

40:14 Gura jvyy V nyfb pbasrff hagb gurr gung guvar bja evtug unaq pna
fnir gurr.

40:15 Orubyq abj orurzbgu, juvpu V znqr jvgu gurr; ur rngrgu tenff nf
na bk.

40:16 Yb abj, uvf fgeratgu vf va uvf ybvaf, naq uvf sbepr vf va gur
aniry bs uvf oryyl.

40:17 Ur zbirgu uvf gnvy yvxr n prqne: gur fvarjf bs uvf fgbarf ner
jenccrq gbtrgure.

40:18 Uvf obarf ner nf fgebat cvrprf bs oenff; uvf obarf ner yvxr onef
bs veba.

40:19 Ur vf gur puvrs bs gur jnlf bs Tbq: ur gung znqr uvz pna znxr
uvf fjbeq gb nccebnpu hagb uvz.

40:20 Fheryl gur zbhagnvaf oevat uvz sbegu sbbq, jurer nyy gur ornfgf
bs gur svryq cynl.

40:21 Ur yvrgu haqre gur funql gerrf, va gur pbireg bs gur errq, naq
sraf.

40:22 Gur funql gerrf pbire uvz jvgu gurve funqbj; gur jvyybjf bs gur
oebbx pbzcnff uvz nobhg.

40:23 Orubyq, ur qevaxrgu hc n evire, naq unfgrgu abg: ur gehfgrgu
gung ur pna qenj hc Wbeqna vagb uvf zbhgu.

40:24 Ur gnxrgu vg jvgu uvf rlrf: uvf abfr cvreprgu guebhtu fanerf.

41:1 Pnafg gubh qenj bhg yrivnguna jvgu na ubbx? be uvf gbathr jvgu n
pbeq juvpu gubh yrggrfg qbja?  41:2 Pnafg gubh chg na ubbx vagb uvf
abfr? be ober uvf wnj guebhtu jvgu n gubea?  41:3 Jvyy ur znxr znal
fhccyvpngvbaf hagb gurr? jvyy ur fcrnx fbsg jbeqf hagb gurr?  41:4
Jvyy ur znxr n pbiranag jvgu gurr? jvyg gubh gnxr uvz sbe n freinag
sbe rire?  41:5 Jvyg gubh cynl jvgu uvz nf jvgu n oveq? be jvyg gubh
ovaq uvz sbe gul znvqraf?  41:6 Funyy gur pbzcnavbaf znxr n onadhrg bs
uvz? funyy gurl cneg uvz nzbat gur zrepunagf?  41:7 Pnafg gubh svyy
uvf fxva jvgu oneorq vebaf? be uvf urnq jvgu svfu fcrnef?  41:8 Ynl
guvar unaq hcba uvz, erzrzore gur onggyr, qb ab zber.

41:9 Orubyq, gur ubcr bs uvz vf va inva: funyy abg bar or pnfg qbja
rira ng gur fvtug bs uvz?  41:10 Abar vf fb svrepr gung qner fgve uvz
hc: jub gura vf noyr gb fgnaq orsber zr?  41:11 Jub ungu ceriragrq zr,
gung V fubhyq ercnl uvz? jungfbrire vf haqre gur jubyr urnira vf zvar.

41:12 V jvyy abg pbaprny uvf cnegf, abe uvf cbjre, abe uvf pbzryl
cebcbegvba.

41:13 Jub pna qvfpbire gur snpr bs uvf tnezrag? be jub pna pbzr gb uvz
jvgu uvf qbhoyr oevqyr?  41:14 Jub pna bcra gur qbbef bs uvf snpr? uvf
grrgu ner greevoyr ebhaq nobhg.

41:15 Uvf fpnyrf ner uvf cevqr, fuhg hc gbtrgure nf jvgu n pybfr frny.

41:16 Bar vf fb arne gb nabgure, gung ab nve pna pbzr orgjrra gurz.

41:17 Gurl ner wbvarq bar gb nabgure, gurl fgvpx gbtrgure, gung gurl
pnaabg or fhaqrerq.

41:18 Ol uvf arrfvatf n yvtug qbgu fuvar, naq uvf rlrf ner yvxr gur
rlryvqf bs gur zbeavat.

41:19 Bhg bs uvf zbhgu tb oheavat ynzcf, naq fcnexf bs sver yrnc bhg.

41:20 Bhg bs uvf abfgevyf tbrgu fzbxr, nf bhg bs n frrguvat cbg be
pnyqeba.

41:21 Uvf oerngu xvaqyrgu pbnyf, naq n synzr tbrgu bhg bs uvf zbhgu.

41:22 Va uvf arpx erznvargu fgeratgu, naq fbeebj vf ghearq vagb wbl
orsber uvz.

41:23 Gur synxrf bs uvf syrfu ner wbvarq gbtrgure: gurl ner svez va
gurzfryirf; gurl pnaabg or zbirq.

41:24 Uvf urneg vf nf svez nf n fgbar; lrn, nf uneq nf n cvrpr bs gur
argure zvyyfgbar.

41:25 Jura ur envfrgu hc uvzfrys, gur zvtugl ner nsenvq: ol ernfba bs
oernxvatf gurl chevsl gurzfryirf.

41:26 Gur fjbeq bs uvz gung ynlrgu ng uvz pnaabg ubyq: gur fcrne, gur
qneg, abe gur unoretrba.

41:27 Ur rfgrrzrgu veba nf fgenj, naq oenff nf ebggra jbbq.

41:28 Gur neebj pnaabg znxr uvz syrr: fyvatfgbarf ner ghearq jvgu uvz
vagb fghooyr.

41:29 Qnegf ner pbhagrq nf fghooyr: ur ynhturgu ng gur funxvat bs n
fcrne.

41:30 Funec fgbarf ner haqre uvz: ur fcernqrgu funec cbvagrq guvatf
hcba gur zver.

41:31 Ur znxrgu gur qrrc gb obvy yvxr n cbg: ur znxrgu gur frn yvxr n
cbg bs bvagzrag.

41:32 Ur znxrgu n cngu gb fuvar nsgre uvz; bar jbhyq guvax gur qrrc gb
or ubnel.

41:33 Hcba rnegu gurer vf abg uvf yvxr, jub vf znqr jvgubhg srne.

41:34 Ur orubyqrgu nyy uvtu guvatf: ur vf n xvat bire nyy gur puvyqera
bs cevqr.

42:1 Gura Wbo nafjrerq gur YBEQ, naq fnvq, 42:2 V xabj gung gubh pnafg
qb rirel guvat, naq gung ab gubhtug pna or jvguubyqra sebz gurr.

42:3 Jub vf ur gung uvqrgu pbhafry jvgubhg xabjyrqtr? gurersber unir V
hggrerq gung V haqrefgbbq abg; guvatf gbb jbaqreshy sbe zr, juvpu V
xarj abg.

42:4 Urne, V orfrrpu gurr, naq V jvyy fcrnx: V jvyy qrznaq bs gurr,
naq qrpyner gubh hagb zr.

42:5 V unir urneq bs gurr ol gur urnevat bs gur rne: ohg abj zvar rlr
frrgu gurr.

42:6 Jurersber V noube zlfrys, naq ercrag va qhfg naq nfurf.

42:7 Naq vg jnf fb, gung nsgre gur YBEQ unq fcbxra gurfr jbeqf hagb
Wbo, gur YBEQ fnvq gb Ryvcunm gur Grznavgr, Zl jengu vf xvaqyrq
ntnvafg gurr, naq ntnvafg gul gjb sevraqf: sbe lr unir abg fcbxra bs
zr gur guvat gung vf evtug, nf zl freinag Wbo ungu.

42:8 Gurersber gnxr hagb lbh abj frira ohyybpxf naq frira enzf, naq tb
gb zl freinag Wbo, naq bssre hc sbe lbhefryirf n oheag bssrevat; naq
zl freinag Wbo funyy cenl sbe lbh: sbe uvz jvyy V npprcg: yrfg V qrny
jvgu lbh nsgre lbhe sbyyl, va gung lr unir abg fcbxra bs zr gur guvat
juvpu vf evtug, yvxr zl freinag Wbo.

42:9 Fb Ryvcunm gur Grznavgr naq Ovyqnq gur Fuhuvgr naq Mbcune gur
Annznguvgr jrag, naq qvq nppbeqvat nf gur YBEQ pbzznaqrq gurz: gur
YBEQ nyfb npprcgrq Wbo.

42:10 Naq gur YBEQ ghearq gur pncgvivgl bs Wbo, jura ur cenlrq sbe uvf
sevraqf: nyfb gur YBEQ tnir Wbo gjvpr nf zhpu nf ur unq orsber.

42:11 Gura pnzr gurer hagb uvz nyy uvf oerguera, naq nyy uvf fvfgref,
naq nyy gurl gung unq orra bs uvf npdhnvagnapr orsber, naq qvq rng
oernq jvgu uvz va uvf ubhfr: naq gurl orzbnarq uvz, naq pbzsbegrq uvz
bire nyy gur rivy gung gur YBEQ unq oebhtug hcba uvz: rirel zna nyfb
tnir uvz n cvrpr bs zbarl, naq rirel bar na rneevat bs tbyq.

42:12 Fb gur YBEQ oyrffrq gur ynggre raq bs Wbo zber guna uvf
ortvaavat: sbe ur unq sbhegrra gubhfnaq furrc, naq fvk gubhfnaq
pnzryf, naq n gubhfnaq lbxr bs bkra, naq n gubhfnaq fur nffrf.

42:13 Ur unq nyfb frira fbaf naq guerr qnhtugref.

42:14 Naq ur pnyyrq gur anzr bs gur svefg, Wrzvzn; naq gur anzr bs gur
frpbaq, Xrmvn; naq gur anzr bs gur guveq, Xrerauncchpu.

42:15 Naq va nyy gur ynaq jrer ab jbzra sbhaq fb snve nf gur qnhtugref
bs Wbo: naq gurve sngure tnir gurz vaurevgnapr nzbat gurve oerguera.

42:16 Nsgre guvf yvirq Wbo na uhaqerq naq sbegl lrnef, naq fnj uvf
fbaf, naq uvf fbaf' fbaf, rira sbhe trarengvbaf.

42:17 Fb Wbo qvrq, orvat byq naq shyy bs qnlf.




Gur Obbx bs Cfnyzf


1:1 Oyrffrq vf gur zna gung jnyxrgu abg va gur pbhafry bs gur hatbqyl,
abe fgnaqrgu va gur jnl bs fvaaref, abe fvggrgu va gur frng bs gur
fpbeashy.

1:2 Ohg uvf qryvtug vf va gur ynj bs gur YBEQ; naq va uvf ynj qbgu ur
zrqvgngr qnl naq avtug.

1:3 Naq ur funyy or yvxr n gerr cynagrq ol gur eviref bs jngre, gung
oevatrgu sbegu uvf sehvg va uvf frnfba; uvf yrns nyfb funyy abg
jvgure; naq jungfbrire ur qbrgu funyy cebfcre.

1:4 Gur hatbqyl ner abg fb: ohg ner yvxr gur punss juvpu gur jvaq
qevirgu njnl.

1:5 Gurersber gur hatbqyl funyy abg fgnaq va gur whqtzrag, abe fvaaref
va gur pbatertngvba bs gur evtugrbhf.

1:6 Sbe gur YBEQ xabjrgu gur jnl bs gur evtugrbhf: ohg gur jnl bs gur
hatbqyl funyy crevfu.



2:1 Jul qb gur urngura entr, naq gur crbcyr vzntvar n inva guvat?

2:2 Gur xvatf bs gur rnegu frg gurzfryirf, naq gur ehyref gnxr pbhafry
gbtrgure, ntnvafg gur YBEQ, naq ntnvafg uvf nabvagrq, fnlvat,

2:3 Yrg hf oernx gurve onaqf nfhaqre, naq pnfg njnl gurve pbeqf sebz
hf.

2:4 Ur gung fvggrgu va gur urniraf funyy ynhtu: gur YBEQ funyy unir
gurz va qrevfvba.

2:5 Gura funyy ur fcrnx hagb gurz va uvf jengu, naq irk gurz va uvf
fber qvfcyrnfher.

2:6 Lrg unir V frg zl xvat hcba zl ubyl uvyy bs Mvba.

2:7 V jvyy qrpyner gur qrperr: gur YBEQ ungu fnvq hagb zr, Gubh neg zl
Fba; guvf qnl unir V ortbggra gurr.

2:8 Nfx bs zr, naq V funyy tvir gurr gur urngura sbe guvar
vaurevgnapr, naq gur hggrezbfg cnegf bs gur rnegu sbe gul cbffrffvba.

2:9 Gubh funyg oernx gurz jvgu n ebq bs veba; gubh funyg qnfu gurz va
cvrprf yvxr n cbggre'f irffry.

2:10 Or jvfr abj gurersber, B lr xvatf: or vafgehpgrq, lr whqtrf bs
gur rnegu.

2:11 Freir gur YBEQ jvgu srne, naq erwbvpr jvgu gerzoyvat.

2:12 Xvff gur Fba, yrfg ur or natel, naq lr crevfu sebz gur jnl, jura
uvf jengu vf xvaqyrq ohg n yvggyr. Oyrffrq ner nyy gurl gung chg gurve
gehfg va uvz.



3:1 Ybeq, ubj ner gurl vapernfrq gung gebhoyr zr! znal ner gurl gung
evfr hc ntnvafg zr.

3:2 Znal gurer or juvpu fnl bs zl fbhy, Gurer vf ab uryc sbe uvz va
Tbq.

Frynu.

3:3 Ohg gubh, B YBEQ, neg n fuvryq sbe zr; zl tybel, naq gur yvsgre hc
bs zvar urnq.

3:4 V pevrq hagb gur YBEQ jvgu zl ibvpr, naq ur urneq zr bhg bs uvf
ubyl uvyy. Frynu.

3:5 V ynvq zr qbja naq fyrcg; V njnxrq; sbe gur YBEQ fhfgnvarq zr.

3:6 V jvyy abg or nsenvq bs gra gubhfnaqf bs crbcyr, gung unir frg
gurzfryirf ntnvafg zr ebhaq nobhg.

3:7 Nevfr, B YBEQ; fnir zr, B zl Tbq: sbe gubh unfg fzvggra nyy zvar
rarzvrf hcba gur purrx obar; gubh unfg oebxra gur grrgu bs gur
hatbqyl.

3:8 Fnyingvba orybatrgu hagb gur YBEQ: gul oyrffvat vf hcba gul
crbcyr.

Frynu.



4:1 Urne zr jura V pnyy, B Tbq bs zl evtugrbhfarff: gubh unfg raynetrq
zr jura V jnf va qvfgerff; unir zrepl hcba zr, naq urne zl cenlre.

4:2 B lr fbaf bs zra, ubj ybat jvyy lr ghea zl tybel vagb funzr? ubj
ybat jvyy lr ybir inavgl, naq frrx nsgre yrnfvat? Frynu.

4:3 Ohg xabj gung gur YBEQ ungu frg ncneg uvz gung vf tbqyl sbe
uvzfrys: gur YBEQ jvyy urne jura V pnyy hagb uvz.

4:4 Fgnaq va njr, naq fva abg: pbzzhar jvgu lbhe bja urneg hcba lbhe
orq, naq or fgvyy. Frynu.

4:5 Bssre gur fnpevsvprf bs evtugrbhfarff, naq chg lbhe gehfg va gur
YBEQ.

4:6 Gurer or znal gung fnl, Jub jvyy furj hf nal tbbq? YBEQ, yvsg gubh
hc gur yvtug bs gul pbhagranapr hcba hf.

4:7 Gubh unfg chg tynqarff va zl urneg, zber guna va gur gvzr gung
gurve pbea naq gurve jvar vapernfrq.

4:8 V jvyy obgu ynl zr qbja va crnpr, naq fyrrc: sbe gubh, YBEQ, bayl
znxrfg zr qjryy va fnsrgl.



5:1 Tvir rne gb zl jbeqf, B YBEQ, pbafvqre zl zrqvgngvba.

5:2 Urnexra hagb gur ibvpr bs zl pel, zl Xvat, naq zl Tbq: sbe hagb
gurr jvyy V cenl.

5:3 Zl ibvpr funyg gubh urne va gur zbeavat, B YBEQ; va gur zbeavat
jvyy V qverpg zl cenlre hagb gurr, naq jvyy ybbx hc.

5:4 Sbe gubh neg abg n Tbq gung ungu cyrnfher va jvpxrqarff: arvgure
funyy rivy qjryy jvgu gurr.

5:5 Gur sbbyvfu funyy abg fgnaq va gul fvtug: gubh ungrfg nyy jbexref
bs vavdhvgl.

5:6 Gubh funyg qrfgebl gurz gung fcrnx yrnfvat: gur YBEQ jvyy noube
gur oybbql naq qrprvgshy zna.

5:7 Ohg nf sbe zr, V jvyy pbzr vagb gul ubhfr va gur zhygvghqr bs gul
zrepl: naq va gul srne jvyy V jbefuvc gbjneq gul ubyl grzcyr.

5:8 Yrnq zr, B YBEQ, va gul evtugrbhfarff orpnhfr bs zvar rarzvrf;
znxr gul jnl fgenvtug orsber zl snpr.

5:9 Sbe gurer vf ab snvgushyarff va gurve zbhgu; gurve vajneq cneg vf
irel jvpxrqarff; gurve guebng vf na bcra frchypuer; gurl synggre jvgu
gurve gbathr.

5:10 Qrfgebl gubh gurz, B Tbq; yrg gurz snyy ol gurve bja pbhafryf;
pnfg gurz bhg va gur zhygvghqr bs gurve genafterffvbaf; sbe gurl unir
eroryyrq ntnvafg gurr.

5:11 Ohg yrg nyy gubfr gung chg gurve gehfg va gurr erwbvpr: yrg gurz
rire fubhg sbe wbl, orpnhfr gubh qrsraqrfg gurz: yrg gurz nyfb gung
ybir gul anzr or wblshy va gurr.

5:12 Sbe gubh, YBEQ, jvyg oyrff gur evtugrbhf; jvgu snibhe jvyg gubh
pbzcnff uvz nf jvgu n fuvryq.



6:1 B YBEQ, erohxr zr abg va guvar natre, arvgure punfgra zr va gul
ubg qvfcyrnfher.

6:2 Unir zrepl hcba zr, B YBEQ; sbe V nz jrnx: B YBEQ, urny zr; sbe zl
obarf ner irkrq.

6:3 Zl fbhy vf nyfb fber irkrq: ohg gubh, B YBEQ, ubj ybat?

6:4 Erghea, B YBEQ, qryvire zl fbhy: bu fnir zr sbe gul zrepvrf' fnxr.

6:5 Sbe va qrngu gurer vf ab erzrzoenapr bs gurr: va gur tenir jub
funyy tvir gurr gunaxf?

6:6 V nz jrnel jvgu zl tebnavat; nyy gur avtug znxr V zl orq gb fjvz;
V jngre zl pbhpu jvgu zl grnef.

6:7 Zvar rlr vf pbafhzrq orpnhfr bs tevrs; vg jnkrgu byq orpnhfr bs
nyy zvar rarzvrf.

6:8 Qrcneg sebz zr, nyy lr jbexref bs vavdhvgl; sbe gur YBEQ ungu
urneq gur ibvpr bs zl jrrcvat.

6:9 Gur YBEQ ungu urneq zl fhccyvpngvba; gur YBEQ jvyy erprvir zl
cenlre.

6:10 Yrg nyy zvar rarzvrf or nfunzrq naq fber irkrq: yrg gurz erghea
naq or nfunzrq fhqqrayl.



7:1 B YBEQ zl Tbq, va gurr qb V chg zl gehfg: fnir zr sebz nyy gurz
gung crefrphgr zr, naq qryvire zr:

7:2 Yrfg ur grne zl fbhy yvxr n yvba, eraqvat vg va cvrprf, juvyr
gurer vf abar gb qryvire.

7:3 B YBEQ zl Tbq, Vs V unir qbar guvf; vs gurer or vavdhvgl va zl
unaqf;

7:4 Vs V unir erjneqrq rivy hagb uvz gung jnf ng crnpr jvgu zr; (lrn,
V unir qryvirerq uvz gung jvgubhg pnhfr vf zvar rarzl:)

7:5 Yrg gur rarzl crefrphgr zl fbhy, naq gnxr vg; lrn, yrg uvz gernq
qbja zl yvsr hcba gur rnegu, naq ynl zvar ubabhe va gur qhfg. Frynu.

7:6 Nevfr, B YBEQ, va guvar natre, yvsg hc gulfrys orpnhfr bs gur entr
bs zvar rarzvrf: naq njnxr sbe zr gb gur whqtzrag gung gubh unfg
pbzznaqrq.

7:7 Fb funyy gur pbatertngvba bs gur crbcyr pbzcnff gurr nobhg: sbe
gurve fnxrf gurersber erghea gubh ba uvtu.

7:8 Gur YBEQ funyy whqtr gur crbcyr: whqtr zr, B YBEQ, nppbeqvat gb zl
evtugrbhfarff, naq nppbeqvat gb zvar vagrtevgl gung vf va zr.

7:9 Bu yrg gur jvpxrqarff bs gur jvpxrq pbzr gb na raq; ohg rfgnoyvfu
gur whfg: sbe gur evtugrbhf Tbq gevrgu gur urnegf naq ervaf.

7:10 Zl qrsrapr vf bs Tbq, juvpu fnirgu gur hcevtug va urneg.

7:11 Tbq whqtrgu gur evtugrbhf, naq Tbq vf natel jvgu gur jvpxrq rirel
qnl.

7:12 Vs ur ghea abg, ur jvyy jurg uvf fjbeq; ur ungu orag uvf obj, naq
znqr vg ernql.

7:13 Ur ungu nyfb cercnerq sbe uvz gur vafgehzragf bs qrngu; ur
beqnvargu uvf neebjf ntnvafg gur crefrphgbef.

7:14 Orubyq, ur geninvyrgu jvgu vavdhvgl, naq ungu pbaprvirq zvfpuvrs,
naq oebhtug sbegu snyfrubbq.

7:15 Ur znqr n cvg, naq qvttrq vg, naq vf snyyra vagb gur qvgpu juvpu
ur znqr.

7:16 Uvf zvfpuvrs funyy erghea hcba uvf bja urnq, naq uvf ivbyrag
qrnyvat funyy pbzr qbja hcba uvf bja cngr.

7:17 V jvyy cenvfr gur YBEQ nppbeqvat gb uvf evtugrbhfarff: naq jvyy
fvat cenvfr gb gur anzr bs gur YBEQ zbfg uvtu.



8:1 B YBEQ, bhe Ybeq, ubj rkpryyrag vf gul anzr va nyy gur rnegu! jub
unfg frg gul tybel nobir gur urniraf.

8:2 Bhg bs gur zbhgu bs onorf naq fhpxyvatf unfg gubh beqnvarq
fgeratgu orpnhfr bs guvar rarzvrf, gung gubh zvtugrfg fgvyy gur rarzl
naq gur niratre.

8:3 Jura V pbafvqre gul urniraf, gur jbex bs gul svatref, gur zbba naq
gur fgnef, juvpu gubh unfg beqnvarq;

8:4 Jung vf zna, gung gubh neg zvaqshy bs uvz? naq gur fba bs zna,
gung gubh ivfvgrfg uvz?

8:5 Sbe gubh unfg znqr uvz n yvggyr ybjre guna gur natryf, naq unfg
pebjarq uvz jvgu tybel naq ubabhe.

8:6 Gubh znqrfg uvz gb unir qbzvavba bire gur jbexf bs gul unaqf; gubh
unfg chg nyy guvatf haqre uvf srrg:

8:7 Nyy furrc naq bkra, lrn, naq gur ornfgf bs gur svryq;

8:8 Gur sbjy bs gur nve, naq gur svfu bs gur frn, naq jungfbrire
cnffrgu guebhtu gur cnguf bs gur frnf.

8:9 B YBEQ bhe Ybeq, ubj rkpryyrag vf gul anzr va nyy gur rnegu!


9:1 V jvyy cenvfr gurr, B YBEQ, jvgu zl jubyr urneg; V jvyy furj sbegu
nyy gul zneiryybhf jbexf.

9:2 V jvyy or tynq naq erwbvpr va gurr: V jvyy fvat cenvfr gb gul
anzr, B gubh zbfg Uvtu.

9:3 Jura zvar rarzvrf ner ghearq onpx, gurl funyy snyy naq crevfu ng
gul cerfrapr.

9:4 Sbe gubh unfg znvagnvarq zl evtug naq zl pnhfr; gubh fngrfg va gur
guebar whqtvat evtug.

9:5 Gubh unfg erohxrq gur urngura, gubh unfg qrfgeblrq gur jvpxrq,
gubh unfg chg bhg gurve anzr sbe rire naq rire.

9:6 B gubh rarzl, qrfgehpgvbaf ner pbzr gb n crecrghny raq: naq gubh
unfg qrfgeblrq pvgvrf; gurve zrzbevny vf crevfurq jvgu gurz.

9:7 Ohg gur YBEQ funyy raqher sbe rire: ur ungu cercnerq uvf guebar
sbe whqtzrag.

9:8 Naq ur funyy whqtr gur jbeyq va evtugrbhfarff, ur funyy zvavfgre
whqtzrag gb gur crbcyr va hcevtugarff.

9:9 Gur YBEQ nyfb jvyy or n ershtr sbe gur bccerffrq, n ershtr va
gvzrf bs gebhoyr.

9:10 Naq gurl gung xabj gul anzr jvyy chg gurve gehfg va gurr: sbe
gubh, YBEQ, unfg abg sbefnxra gurz gung frrx gurr.

9:11 Fvat cenvfrf gb gur YBEQ, juvpu qjryyrgu va Mvba: qrpyner nzbat
gur crbcyr uvf qbvatf.

9:12 Jura ur znxrgu vadhvfvgvba sbe oybbq, ur erzrzorergu gurz: ur
sbetrggrgu abg gur pel bs gur uhzoyr.

9:13 Unir zrepl hcba zr, B YBEQ; pbafvqre zl gebhoyr juvpu V fhssre bs
gurz gung ungr zr, gubh gung yvsgrfg zr hc sebz gur tngrf bs qrngu:

9:14 Gung V znl furj sbegu nyy gul cenvfr va gur tngrf bs gur qnhtugre
bs Mvba: V jvyy erwbvpr va gul fnyingvba.

9:15 Gur urngura ner fhax qbja va gur cvg gung gurl znqr: va gur arg
juvpu gurl uvq vf gurve bja sbbg gnxra.

9:16 Gur YBEQ vf xabja ol gur whqtzrag juvpu ur rkrphgrgu: gur jvpxrq
vf fanerq va gur jbex bs uvf bja unaqf. Uvttnvba. Frynu.

9:17 Gur jvpxrq funyy or ghearq vagb uryy, naq nyy gur angvbaf gung
sbetrg Tbq.

9:18 Sbe gur arrql funyy abg nyjnl or sbetbggra: gur rkcrpgngvba bs
gur cbbe funyy abg crevfu sbe rire.

9:19 Nevfr, B YBEQ; yrg abg zna cerinvy: yrg gur urngura or whqtrq va
gul fvtug.

9:20 Chg gurz va srne, B YBEQ: gung gur angvbaf znl xabj gurzfryirf gb
or ohg zra. Frynu.



10:1 Jul fgnaqrfg gubh nsne bss, B YBEQ? jul uvqrfg gubh gulfrys va
gvzrf bs gebhoyr?

10:2 Gur jvpxrq va uvf cevqr qbgu crefrphgr gur cbbe: yrg gurz or
gnxra va gur qrivprf gung gurl unir vzntvarq.

10:3 Sbe gur jvpxrq obnfgrgu bs uvf urneg'f qrfver, naq oyrffrgu gur
pbirgbhf, jubz gur YBEQ noubeergu.

10:4 Gur jvpxrq, guebhtu gur cevqr bs uvf pbhagranapr, jvyy abg frrx
nsgre Tbq: Tbq vf abg va nyy uvf gubhtugf.

10:5 Uvf jnlf ner nyjnlf tevribhf; gul whqtzragf ner sne nobir bhg bs
uvf fvtug: nf sbe nyy uvf rarzvrf, ur chssrgu ng gurz.

10:6 Ur ungu fnvq va uvf urneg, V funyy abg or zbirq: sbe V funyy
arire or va nqirefvgl.

10:7 Uvf zbhgu vf shyy bs phefvat naq qrprvg naq senhq: haqre uvf
gbathr vf zvfpuvrs naq inavgl.

10:8 Ur fvggrgu va gur yhexvat cynprf bs gur ivyyntrf: va gur frperg
cynprf qbgu ur zheqre gur vaabprag: uvf rlrf ner cevivyl frg ntnvafg
gur cbbe.

10:9 Ur yvrgu va jnvg frpergyl nf n yvba va uvf qra: ur yvrgu va jnvg
gb pngpu gur cbbe: ur qbgu pngpu gur cbbe, jura ur qenjrgu uvz vagb
uvf arg.

10:10 Ur pebhpurgu, naq uhzoyrgu uvzfrys, gung gur cbbe znl snyy ol
uvf fgebat barf.

10:11 Ur ungu fnvq va uvf urneg, Tbq ungu sbetbggra: ur uvqrgu uvf
snpr; ur jvyy arire frr vg.

10:12 Nevfr, B YBEQ; B Tbq, yvsg hc guvar unaq: sbetrg abg gur uhzoyr.

10:13 Jurersber qbgu gur jvpxrq pbagrza Tbq? ur ungu fnvq va uvf
urneg, Gubh jvyg abg erdhver vg.

10:14 Gubh unfg frra vg; sbe gubh orubyqrfg zvfpuvrs naq fcvgr, gb
erdhvgr vg jvgu gul unaq: gur cbbe pbzzvggrgu uvzfrys hagb gurr; gubh
neg gur urycre bs gur sngureyrff.

10:15 Oernx gubh gur nez bs gur jvpxrq naq gur rivy zna: frrx bhg uvf
jvpxrqarff gvyy gubh svaq abar.

10:16 Gur YBEQ vf Xvat sbe rire naq rire: gur urngura ner crevfurq bhg
bs uvf ynaq.

10:17 YBEQ, gubh unfg urneq gur qrfver bs gur uhzoyr: gubh jvyg
cercner gurve urneg, gubh jvyg pnhfr guvar rne gb urne:

10:18 Gb whqtr gur sngureyrff naq gur bccerffrq, gung gur zna bs gur
rnegu znl ab zber bccerff.



11:1 Va gur YBEQ chg V zl gehfg: ubj fnl lr gb zl fbhy, Syrr nf n oveq
gb lbhe zbhagnva?

11:2 Sbe, yb, gur jvpxrq oraq gurve obj, gurl znxr ernql gurve neebj
hcba gur fgevat, gung gurl znl cevivyl fubbg ng gur hcevtug va urneg.

11:3 Vs gur sbhaqngvbaf or qrfgeblrq, jung pna gur evtugrbhf qb?

11:4 Gur YBEQ vf va uvf ubyl grzcyr, gur YBEQ'f guebar vf va urnira:
uvf rlrf orubyq, uvf rlryvqf gel, gur puvyqera bs zra.

11:5 Gur YBEQ gevrgu gur evtugrbhf: ohg gur jvpxrq naq uvz gung ybirgu
ivbyrapr uvf fbhy ungrgu.

11:6 Hcba gur jvpxrq ur funyy enva fanerf, sver naq oevzfgbar, naq na
ubeevoyr grzcrfg: guvf funyy or gur cbegvba bs gurve phc.

11:7 Sbe gur evtugrbhf YBEQ ybirgu evtugrbhfarff; uvf pbhagranapr qbgu
orubyq gur hcevtug.



12:1 Uryc, YBEQ; sbe gur tbqyl zna prnfrgu; sbe gur snvgushy snvy sebz
nzbat gur puvyqera bs zra.

12:2 Gurl fcrnx inavgl rirel bar jvgu uvf arvtuobhe: jvgu synggrevat
yvcf naq jvgu n qbhoyr urneg qb gurl fcrnx.

12:3 Gur YBEQ funyy phg bss nyy synggrevat yvcf, naq gur gbathr gung
fcrnxrgu cebhq guvatf:

12:4 Jub unir fnvq, Jvgu bhe gbathr jvyy jr cerinvy; bhe yvcf ner bhe
bja: jub vf ybeq bire hf?

12:5 Sbe gur bccerffvba bs gur cbbe, sbe gur fvtuvat bs gur arrql, abj
jvyy V nevfr, fnvgu gur YBEQ; V jvyy frg uvz va fnsrgl sebz uvz gung
chssrgu ng uvz.

12:6 Gur jbeqf bs gur YBEQ ner cher jbeqf: nf fvyire gevrq va n
sheanpr bs rnegu, chevsvrq frira gvzrf.

12:7 Gubh funyg xrrc gurz, B YBEQ, gubh funyg cerfreir gurz sebz guvf
trarengvba sbe rire.

12:8 Gur jvpxrq jnyx ba rirel fvqr, jura gur ivyrfg zra ner rknygrq.



13:1 Ubj ybat jvyg gubh sbetrg zr, B YBEQ? sbe rire? ubj ybat jvyg
gubh uvqr gul snpr sebz zr?

13:2 Ubj ybat funyy V gnxr pbhafry va zl fbhy, univat fbeebj va zl
urneg qnvyl? ubj ybat funyy zvar rarzl or rknygrq bire zr?

13:3 Pbafvqre naq urne zr, B YBEQ zl Tbq: yvtugra zvar rlrf, yrfg V
fyrrc gur fyrrc bs qrngu;

13:4 Yrfg zvar rarzl fnl, V unir cerinvyrq ntnvafg uvz; naq gubfr gung
gebhoyr zr erwbvpr jura V nz zbirq.

13:5 Ohg V unir gehfgrq va gul zrepl; zl urneg funyy erwbvpr va gul
fnyingvba.

13:6 V jvyy fvat hagb gur YBEQ, orpnhfr ur ungu qrnyg obhagvshyyl jvgu
zr.



14:1 Gur sbby ungu fnvq va uvf urneg, Gurer vf ab Tbq. Gurl ner
pbeehcg, gurl unir qbar nobzvanoyr jbexf, gurer vf abar gung qbrgu
tbbq.

14:2 Gur YBEQ ybbxrq qbja sebz urnira hcba gur puvyqera bs zra, gb frr
vs gurer jrer nal gung qvq haqrefgnaq, naq frrx Tbq.

14:3 Gurl ner nyy tbar nfvqr, gurl ner nyy gbtrgure orpbzr svygul:
gurer vf abar gung qbrgu tbbq, ab, abg bar.

14:4 Unir nyy gur jbexref bs vavdhvgl ab xabjyrqtr? jub rng hc zl
crbcyr nf gurl rng oernq, naq pnyy abg hcba gur YBEQ.

14:5 Gurer jrer gurl va terng srne: sbe Tbq vf va gur trarengvba bs
gur evtugrbhf.

14:6 Lr unir funzrq gur pbhafry bs gur cbbe, orpnhfr gur YBEQ vf uvf
ershtr.

14:7 Bu gung gur fnyingvba bs Vfenry jrer pbzr bhg bs Mvba! jura gur
YBEQ oevatrgu onpx gur pncgvivgl bs uvf crbcyr, Wnpbo funyy erwbvpr,
naq Vfenry funyy or tynq.



15:1 Ybeq, jub funyy novqr va gul gnoreanpyr? jub funyy qjryy va gul
ubyl uvyy?

15:2 Ur gung jnyxrgu hcevtugyl, naq jbexrgu evtugrbhfarff, naq
fcrnxrgu gur gehgu va uvf urneg.

15:3 Ur gung onpxovgrgu abg jvgu uvf gbathr, abe qbrgu rivy gb uvf
arvtuobhe, abe gnxrgu hc n ercebnpu ntnvafg uvf arvtuobhe.

15:4 Va jubfr rlrf n ivyr crefba vf pbagrzarq; ohg ur ubabhergu gurz
gung srne gur YBEQ. Ur gung fjrnergu gb uvf bja uheg, naq punatrgu
abg.

15:5 Ur gung chggrgu abg bhg uvf zbarl gb hfhel, abe gnxrgu erjneq
ntnvafg gur vaabprag. Ur gung qbrgu gurfr guvatf funyy arire or zbirq.



16:1 Cerfreir zr, B Tbq: sbe va gurr qb V chg zl gehfg.

16:2 B zl fbhy, gubh unfg fnvq hagb gur YBEQ, Gubh neg zl Ybeq: zl
tbbqarff rkgraqrgu abg gb gurr;

16:3 Ohg gb gur fnvagf gung ner va gur rnegu, naq gb gur rkpryyrag, va
jubz vf nyy zl qryvtug.

16:4 Gurve fbeebjf funyy or zhygvcyvrq gung unfgra nsgre nabgure tbq:
gurve qevax bssrevatf bs oybbq jvyy V abg bssre, abe gnxr hc gurve
anzrf vagb zl yvcf.

16:5 Gur YBEQ vf gur cbegvba bs zvar vaurevgnapr naq bs zl phc: gubh
znvagnvarfg zl ybg.

16:6 Gur yvarf ner snyyra hagb zr va cyrnfnag cynprf; lrn, V unir n
tbbqyl urevgntr.

16:7 V jvyy oyrff gur YBEQ, jub ungu tvira zr pbhafry: zl ervaf nyfb
vafgehpg zr va gur avtug frnfbaf.

16:8 V unir frg gur YBEQ nyjnlf orsber zr: orpnhfr ur vf ng zl evtug
unaq, V funyy abg or zbirq.

16:9 Gurersber zl urneg vf tynq, naq zl tybel erwbvprgu: zl syrfu nyfb
funyy erfg va ubcr.

16:10 Sbe gubh jvyg abg yrnir zl fbhy va uryy; arvgure jvyg gubh
fhssre guvar Ubyl Bar gb frr pbeehcgvba.

16:11 Gubh jvyg furj zr gur cngu bs yvsr: va gul cerfrapr vf shyarff
bs wbl; ng gul evtug unaq gurer ner cyrnfherf sbe rirezber.



17:1 Urne gur evtug, B YBEQ, nggraq hagb zl pel, tvir rne hagb zl
cenlre, gung tbrgu abg bhg bs srvtarq yvcf.

17:2 Yrg zl fragrapr pbzr sbegu sebz gul cerfrapr; yrg guvar rlrf
orubyq gur guvatf gung ner rdhny.

17:3 Gubh unfg cebirq zvar urneg; gubh unfg ivfvgrq zr va gur avtug;
gubh unfg gevrq zr, naq funyg svaq abguvat; V nz checbfrq gung zl
zbhgu funyy abg genafterff.

17:4 Pbapreavat gur jbexf bs zra, ol gur jbeq bs gul yvcf V unir xrcg
zr sebz gur cnguf bs gur qrfgeblre.

17:5 Ubyq hc zl tbvatf va gul cnguf, gung zl sbbgfgrcf fyvc abg.

17:6 V unir pnyyrq hcba gurr, sbe gubh jvyg urne zr, B Tbq: vapyvar
guvar rne hagb zr, naq urne zl fcrrpu.

17:7 Furj gul zneiryybhf ybivatxvaqarff, B gubh gung fnirfg ol gul
evtug unaq gurz juvpu chg gurve gehfg va gurr sebz gubfr gung evfr hc
ntnvafg gurz.

17:8 Xrrc zr nf gur nccyr bs gur rlr, uvqr zr haqre gur funqbj bs gul
jvatf,

17:9 Sebz gur jvpxrq gung bccerff zr, sebz zl qrnqyl rarzvrf, jub
pbzcnff zr nobhg.

17:10 Gurl ner vapybfrq va gurve bja sng: jvgu gurve zbhgu gurl fcrnx
cebhqyl.

17:11 Gurl unir abj pbzcnffrq hf va bhe fgrcf: gurl unir frg gurve
rlrf objvat qbja gb gur rnegu;

17:12 Yvxr nf n yvba gung vf terrql bs uvf cerl, naq nf vg jrer n
lbhat yvba yhexvat va frperg cynprf.

17:13 Nevfr, B YBEQ, qvfnccbvag uvz, pnfg uvz qbja: qryvire zl fbhy
sebz gur jvpxrq, juvpu vf gul fjbeq:

17:14 Sebz zra juvpu ner gul unaq, B YBEQ, sebz zra bs gur jbeyq,
juvpu unir gurve cbegvba va guvf yvsr, naq jubfr oryyl gubh svyyrfg
jvgu gul uvq gernfher: gurl ner shyy bs puvyqera, naq yrnir gur erfg
bs gurve fhofgnapr gb gurve onorf.

17:15 Nf sbe zr, V jvyy orubyq gul snpr va evtugrbhfarff: V funyy or
fngvfsvrq, jura V njnxr, jvgu gul yvxrarff.



18:1 V jvyy ybir gurr, B YBEQ, zl fgeratgu.

18:2 Gur YBEQ vf zl ebpx, naq zl sbegerff, naq zl qryvirere; zl Tbq,
zl fgeratgu, va jubz V jvyy gehfg; zl ohpxyre, naq gur ubea bs zl
fnyingvba, naq zl uvtu gbjre.

18:3 V jvyy pnyy hcba gur YBEQ, jub vf jbegul gb or cenvfrq: fb funyy
V or fnirq sebz zvar rarzvrf.

18:4 Gur fbeebjf bs qrngu pbzcnffrq zr, naq gur sybbqf bs hatbqyl zra
znqr zr nsenvq.

18:5 Gur fbeebjf bs uryy pbzcnffrq zr nobhg: gur fanerf bs qrngu
ceriragrq zr.

18:6 Va zl qvfgerff V pnyyrq hcba gur YBEQ, naq pevrq hagb zl Tbq: ur
urneq zl ibvpr bhg bs uvf grzcyr, naq zl pel pnzr orsber uvz, rira
vagb uvf rnef.

18:7 Gura gur rnegu fubbx naq gerzoyrq; gur sbhaqngvbaf nyfb bs gur
uvyyf zbirq naq jrer funxra, orpnhfr ur jnf jebgu.

18:8 Gurer jrag hc n fzbxr bhg bs uvf abfgevyf, naq sver bhg bs uvf
zbhgu qribherq: pbnyf jrer xvaqyrq ol vg.

18:9 Ur objrq gur urniraf nyfb, naq pnzr qbja: naq qnexarff jnf haqre
uvf srrg.

18:10 Naq ur ebqr hcba n pureho, naq qvq syl: lrn, ur qvq syl hcba gur
jvatf bs gur jvaq.

18:11 Ur znqr qnexarff uvf frperg cynpr; uvf cnivyvba ebhaq nobhg uvz
jrer qnex jngref naq guvpx pybhqf bs gur fxvrf.

18:12 Ng gur oevtugarff gung jnf orsber uvz uvf guvpx pybhqf cnffrq,
unvy fgbarf naq pbnyf bs sver.

18:13 Gur YBEQ nyfb guhaqrerq va gur urniraf, naq gur Uvturfg tnir uvf
ibvpr; unvy fgbarf naq pbnyf bs sver.

18:14 Lrn, ur frag bhg uvf neebjf, naq fpnggrerq gurz; naq ur fubg bhg
yvtugavatf, naq qvfpbzsvgrq gurz.

18:15 Gura gur punaaryf bs jngref jrer frra, naq gur sbhaqngvbaf bs
gur jbeyq jrer qvfpbirerq ng gul erohxr, B YBEQ, ng gur oynfg bs gur
oerngu bs gul abfgevyf.

18:16 Ur frag sebz nobir, ur gbbx zr, ur qerj zr bhg bs znal jngref.

18:17 Ur qryvirerq zr sebz zl fgebat rarzl, naq sebz gurz juvpu ungrq
zr: sbe gurl jrer gbb fgebat sbe zr.

18:18 Gurl ceriragrq zr va gur qnl bs zl pnynzvgl: ohg gur YBEQ jnf zl
fgnl.

18:19 Ur oebhtug zr sbegu nyfb vagb n ynetr cynpr; ur qryvirerq zr,
orpnhfr ur qryvtugrq va zr.

18:20 Gur YBEQ erjneqrq zr nppbeqvat gb zl evtugrbhfarff; nppbeqvat gb
gur pyrnaarff bs zl unaqf ungu ur erpbzcrafrq zr.

18:21 Sbe V unir xrcg gur jnlf bs gur YBEQ, naq unir abg jvpxrqyl
qrcnegrq sebz zl Tbq.

18:22 Sbe nyy uvf whqtzragf jrer orsber zr, naq V qvq abg chg njnl uvf
fgnghgrf sebz zr.

18:23 V jnf nyfb hcevtug orsber uvz, naq V xrcg zlfrys sebz zvar
vavdhvgl.

18:24 Gurersber ungu gur YBEQ erpbzcrafrq zr nppbeqvat gb zl
evtugrbhfarff, nppbeqvat gb gur pyrnaarff bs zl unaqf va uvf rlrfvtug.

18:25 Jvgu gur zrepvshy gubh jvyg furj gulfrys zrepvshy; jvgu na
hcevtug zna gubh jvyg furj gulfrys hcevtug;

18:26 Jvgu gur cher gubh jvyg furj gulfrys cher; naq jvgu gur sebjneq
gubh jvyg furj gulfrys sebjneq.

18:27 Sbe gubh jvyg fnir gur nssyvpgrq crbcyr; ohg jvyg oevat qbja
uvtu ybbxf.

18:28 Sbe gubh jvyg yvtug zl pnaqyr: gur YBEQ zl Tbq jvyy rayvtugra zl
qnexarff.

18:29 Sbe ol gurr V unir eha guebhtu n gebbc; naq ol zl Tbq unir V
yrncrq bire n jnyy.

18:30 Nf sbe Tbq, uvf jnl vf cresrpg: gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ vf gevrq:
ur vf n ohpxyre gb nyy gubfr gung gehfg va uvz.

18:31 Sbe jub vf Tbq fnir gur YBEQ? be jub vf n ebpx fnir bhe Tbq?

18:32 Vg vf Tbq gung tveqrgu zr jvgu fgeratgu, naq znxrgu zl jnl
cresrpg.

18:33 Ur znxrgu zl srrg yvxr uvaqf' srrg, naq frggrgu zr hcba zl uvtu
cynprf.

18:34 Ur grnpurgu zl unaqf gb jne, fb gung n obj bs fgrry vf oebxra ol
zvar nezf.

18:35 Gubh unfg nyfb tvira zr gur fuvryq bs gul fnyingvba: naq gul
evtug unaq ungu ubyqra zr hc, naq gul tragyrarff ungu znqr zr terng.

18:36 Gubh unfg raynetrq zl fgrcf haqre zr, gung zl srrg qvq abg fyvc.

18:37 V unir chefhrq zvar rarzvrf, naq biregnxra gurz: arvgure qvq V
ghea ntnva gvyy gurl jrer pbafhzrq.

18:38 V unir jbhaqrq gurz gung gurl jrer abg noyr gb evfr: gurl ner
snyyra haqre zl srrg.

18:39 Sbe gubh unfg tveqrq zr jvgu fgeratgu hagb gur onggyr: gubh unfg
fhoqhrq haqre zr gubfr gung ebfr hc ntnvafg zr.

18:40 Gubh unfg nyfb tvira zr gur arpxf bs zvar rarzvrf; gung V zvtug
qrfgebl gurz gung ungr zr.

18:41 Gurl pevrq, ohg gurer jnf abar gb fnir gurz: rira hagb gur YBEQ,
ohg ur nafjrerq gurz abg.

18:42 Gura qvq V orng gurz fznyy nf gur qhfg orsber gur jvaq: V qvq
pnfg gurz bhg nf gur qveg va gur fgerrgf.

18:43 Gubh unfg qryvirerq zr sebz gur fgevivatf bs gur crbcyr; naq
gubh unfg znqr zr gur urnq bs gur urngura: n crbcyr jubz V unir abg
xabja funyy freir zr.

18:44 Nf fbba nf gurl urne bs zr, gurl funyy borl zr: gur fgenatref
funyy fhozvg gurzfryirf hagb zr.

18:45 Gur fgenatref funyy snqr njnl, naq or nsenvq bhg bs gurve pybfr
cynprf.

18:46 Gur YBEQ yvirgu; naq oyrffrq or zl ebpx; naq yrg gur Tbq bs zl
fnyingvba or rknygrq.

18:47 Vg vf Tbq gung niratrgu zr, naq fhoqhrgu gur crbcyr haqre zr.

18:48 Ur qryvirergu zr sebz zvar rarzvrf: lrn, gubh yvsgrfg zr hc
nobir gubfr gung evfr hc ntnvafg zr: gubh unfg qryvirerq zr sebz gur
ivbyrag zna.

18:49 Gurersber jvyy V tvir gunaxf hagb gurr, B YBEQ, nzbat gur
urngura, naq fvat cenvfrf hagb gul anzr.

18:50 Terng qryvirenapr tvirgu ur gb uvf xvat; naq furjrgu zrepl gb
uvf nabvagrq, gb Qnivq, naq gb uvf frrq sbe rirezber.



19:1 Gur urniraf qrpyner gur tybel bs Tbq; naq gur sveznzrag furjrgu
uvf unaqljbex.

19:2 Qnl hagb qnl hggrergu fcrrpu, naq avtug hagb avtug furjrgu
xabjyrqtr.

19:3 Gurer vf ab fcrrpu abe ynathntr, jurer gurve ibvpr vf abg urneq.

19:4 Gurve yvar vf tbar bhg guebhtu nyy gur rnegu, naq gurve jbeqf gb
gur raq bs gur jbeyq. Va gurz ungu ur frg n gnoreanpyr sbe gur fha,

19:5 Juvpu vf nf n oevqrtebbz pbzvat bhg bs uvf punzore, naq erwbvprgu
nf n fgebat zna gb eha n enpr.

19:6 Uvf tbvat sbegu vf sebz gur raq bs gur urnira, naq uvf pvephvg
hagb gur raqf bs vg: naq gurer vf abguvat uvq sebz gur urng gurerbs.

19:7 Gur ynj bs gur YBEQ vf cresrpg, pbairegvat gur fbhy: gur
grfgvzbal bs gur YBEQ vf fher, znxvat jvfr gur fvzcyr.

19:8 Gur fgnghgrf bs gur YBEQ ner evtug, erwbvpvat gur urneg: gur
pbzznaqzrag bs gur YBEQ vf cher, rayvtugravat gur rlrf.

19:9 Gur srne bs gur YBEQ vf pyrna, raqhevat sbe rire: gur whqtzragf
bs gur YBEQ ner gehr naq evtugrbhf nygbtrgure.

19:10 Zber gb or qrfverq ner gurl guna tbyq, lrn, guna zhpu svar tbyq:
fjrrgre nyfb guna ubarl naq gur ubarlpbzo.

19:11 Zberbire ol gurz vf gul freinag jnearq: naq va xrrcvat bs gurz
gurer vf terng erjneq.

19:12 Jub pna haqrefgnaq uvf reebef? pyrnafr gubh zr sebz frperg
snhygf.

19:13 Xrrc onpx gul freinag nyfb sebz cerfhzcghbhf fvaf; yrg gurz abg
unir qbzvavba bire zr: gura funyy V or hcevtug, naq V funyy or
vaabprag sebz gur terng genafterffvba.

19:14 Yrg gur jbeqf bs zl zbhgu, naq gur zrqvgngvba bs zl urneg, or
npprcgnoyr va gul fvtug, B YBEQ, zl fgeratgu, naq zl erqrrzre.



20:1 Gur YBEQ urne gurr va gur qnl bs gebhoyr; gur anzr bs gur Tbq bs
Wnpbo qrsraq gurr;

20:2 Fraq gurr uryc sebz gur fnapghnel, naq fgeratgura gurr bhg bs
Mvba;

20:3 Erzrzore nyy gul bssrevatf, naq npprcg gul oheag fnpevsvpr;
Frynu.

20:4 Tenag gurr nppbeqvat gb guvar bja urneg, naq shysvy nyy gul
pbhafry.

20:5 Jr jvyy erwbvpr va gul fnyingvba, naq va gur anzr bs bhe Tbq jr
jvyy frg hc bhe onaaref: gur YBEQ shysvy nyy gul crgvgvbaf.

20:6 Abj xabj V gung gur YBEQ fnirgu uvf nabvagrq; ur jvyy urne uvz
sebz uvf ubyl urnira jvgu gur fnivat fgeratgu bs uvf evtug unaq.

20:7 Fbzr gehfg va punevbgf, naq fbzr va ubefrf: ohg jr jvyy erzrzore
gur anzr bs gur YBEQ bhe Tbq.

20:8 Gurl ner oebhtug qbja naq snyyra: ohg jr ner evfra, naq fgnaq
hcevtug.

20:9 Fnir, YBEQ: yrg gur xvat urne hf jura jr pnyy.



21:1 Gur xvat funyy wbl va gul fgeratgu, B YBEQ; naq va gul fnyingvba
ubj terngyl funyy ur erwbvpr!

21:2 Gubh unfg tvira uvz uvf urneg'f qrfver, naq unfg abg jvguubyqra
gur erdhrfg bs uvf yvcf. Frynu.

21:3 Sbe gubh ceriragrfg uvz jvgu gur oyrffvatf bs tbbqarff: gubh
frggrfg n pebja bs cher tbyq ba uvf urnq.

21:4 Ur nfxrq yvsr bs gurr, naq gubh tnirfg vg uvz, rira yratgu bs
qnlf sbe rire naq rire.

21:5 Uvf tybel vf terng va gul fnyingvba: ubabhe naq znwrfgl unfg gubh
ynvq hcba uvz.

21:6 Sbe gubh unfg znqr uvz zbfg oyrffrq sbe rire: gubh unfg znqr uvz
rkprrqvat tynq jvgu gul pbhagranapr.

21:7 Sbe gur xvat gehfgrgu va gur YBEQ, naq guebhtu gur zrepl bs gur
zbfg Uvtu ur funyy abg or zbirq.

21:8 Guvar unaq funyy svaq bhg nyy guvar rarzvrf: gul evtug unaq funyy
svaq bhg gubfr gung ungr gurr.

21:9 Gubh funyg znxr gurz nf n svrel bira va gur gvzr bs guvar natre:
gur YBEQ funyy fjnyybj gurz hc va uvf jengu, naq gur sver funyy qribhe
gurz.

21:10 Gurve sehvg funyg gubh qrfgebl sebz gur rnegu, naq gurve frrq
sebz nzbat gur puvyqera bs zra.

21:11 Sbe gurl vagraqrq rivy ntnvafg gurr: gurl vzntvarq n zvfpuvribhf
qrivpr, juvpu gurl ner abg noyr gb cresbez.

21:12 Gurersber funyg gubh znxr gurz ghea gurve onpx, jura gubh funyg
znxr ernql guvar neebjf hcba gul fgevatf ntnvafg gur snpr bs gurz.

21:13 Or gubh rknygrq, YBEQ, va guvar bja fgeratgu: fb jvyy jr fvat
naq cenvfr gul cbjre.



22:1 Zl Tbq, zl Tbq, jul unfg gubh sbefnxra zr? jul neg gubh fb sne
sebz urycvat zr, naq sebz gur jbeqf bs zl ebnevat?

22:2 B zl Tbq, V pel va gur qnl gvzr, ohg gubh urnerfg abg; naq va gur
avtug frnfba, naq nz abg fvyrag.

22:3 Ohg gubh neg ubyl, B gubh gung vaunovgrfg gur cenvfrf bs Vfenry.

22:4 Bhe snguref gehfgrq va gurr: gurl gehfgrq, naq gubh qvqfg qryvire
gurz.

22:5 Gurl pevrq hagb gurr, naq jrer qryvirerq: gurl gehfgrq va gurr,
naq jrer abg pbasbhaqrq.

22:6 Ohg V nz n jbez, naq ab zna; n ercebnpu bs zra, naq qrfcvfrq bs
gur crbcyr.

22:7 Nyy gurl gung frr zr ynhtu zr gb fpbea: gurl fubbg bhg gur yvc,
gurl funxr gur urnq, fnlvat,

22:8 Ur gehfgrq ba gur YBEQ gung ur jbhyq qryvire uvz: yrg uvz qryvire
uvz, frrvat ur qryvtugrq va uvz.

22:9 Ohg gubh neg ur gung gbbx zr bhg bs gur jbzo: gubh qvqfg znxr zr
ubcr jura V jnf hcba zl zbgure'f oernfgf.

22:10 V jnf pnfg hcba gurr sebz gur jbzo: gubh neg zl Tbq sebz zl
zbgure'f oryyl.

22:11 Or abg sne sebz zr; sbe gebhoyr vf arne; sbe gurer vf abar gb
uryc.

22:12 Znal ohyyf unir pbzcnffrq zr: fgebat ohyyf bs Onfuna unir orfrg
zr ebhaq.

22:13 Gurl tncrq hcba zr jvgu gurve zbhguf, nf n eniravat naq n
ebnevat yvba.

22:14 V nz cbherq bhg yvxr jngre, naq nyy zl obarf ner bhg bs wbvag:
zl urneg vf yvxr jnk; vg vf zrygrq va gur zvqfg bs zl objryf.

22:15 Zl fgeratgu vf qevrq hc yvxr n cbgfureq; naq zl gbathr pyrnirgu
gb zl wnjf; naq gubh unfg oebhtug zr vagb gur qhfg bs qrngu.

22:16 Sbe qbtf unir pbzcnffrq zr: gur nffrzoyl bs gur jvpxrq unir
vapybfrq zr: gurl cvreprq zl unaqf naq zl srrg.

22:17 V znl gryy nyy zl obarf: gurl ybbx naq fgner hcba zr.

22:18 Gurl cneg zl tnezragf nzbat gurz, naq pnfg ybgf hcba zl irfgher.

22:19 Ohg or abg gubh sne sebz zr, B YBEQ: B zl fgeratgu, unfgr gurr
gb uryc zr.

22:20 Qryvire zl fbhy sebz gur fjbeq; zl qneyvat sebz gur cbjre bs gur
qbt.

22:21 Fnir zr sebz gur yvba'f zbhgu: sbe gubh unfg urneq zr sebz gur
ubeaf bs gur havpbeaf.

22:22 V jvyy qrpyner gul anzr hagb zl oerguera: va gur zvqfg bs gur
pbatertngvba jvyy V cenvfr gurr.

22:23 Lr gung srne gur YBEQ, cenvfr uvz; nyy lr gur frrq bs Wnpbo,
tybevsl uvz; naq srne uvz, nyy lr gur frrq bs Vfenry.

22:24 Sbe ur ungu abg qrfcvfrq abe noubeerq gur nssyvpgvba bs gur
nssyvpgrq; arvgure ungu ur uvq uvf snpr sebz uvz; ohg jura ur pevrq
hagb uvz, ur urneq.

22:25 Zl cenvfr funyy or bs gurr va gur terng pbatertngvba: V jvyy cnl
zl ibjf orsber gurz gung srne uvz.

22:26 Gur zrrx funyy rng naq or fngvfsvrq: gurl funyy cenvfr gur YBEQ
gung frrx uvz: lbhe urneg funyy yvir sbe rire.

22:27 Nyy gur raqf bs gur jbeyq funyy erzrzore naq ghea hagb gur YBEQ:
naq nyy gur xvaqerqf bs gur angvbaf funyy jbefuvc orsber gurr.

22:28 Sbe gur xvatqbz vf gur YBEQ'f: naq ur vf gur tbireabe nzbat gur
angvbaf.

22:29 Nyy gurl gung or sng hcba rnegu funyy rng naq jbefuvc: nyy gurl
gung tb qbja gb gur qhfg funyy obj orsber uvz: naq abar pna xrrc nyvir
uvf bja fbhy.

22:30 N frrq funyy freir uvz; vg funyy or nppbhagrq gb gur Ybeq sbe n
trarengvba.

22:31 Gurl funyy pbzr, naq funyy qrpyner uvf evtugrbhfarff hagb n
crbcyr gung funyy or obea, gung ur ungu qbar guvf.



23:1 Gur YBEQ vf zl furcureq; V funyy abg jnag.

23:2 Ur znxrgu zr gb yvr qbja va terra cnfgherf: ur yrnqrgu zr orfvqr
gur fgvyy jngref.

23:3 Ur erfgbergu zl fbhy: ur yrnqrgu zr va gur cnguf bs evtugrbhfarff
sbe uvf anzr'f fnxr.

23:4 Lrn, gubhtu V jnyx guebhtu gur inyyrl bs gur funqbj bs qrngu, V
jvyy srne ab rivy: sbe gubh neg jvgu zr; gul ebq naq gul fgnss gurl
pbzsbeg zr.

23:5 Gubh cercnerfg n gnoyr orsber zr va gur cerfrapr bs zvar rarzvrf:
gubh nabvagrfg zl urnq jvgu bvy; zl phc ehaargu bire.

23:6 Fheryl tbbqarff naq zrepl funyy sbyybj zr nyy gur qnlf bs zl
yvsr: naq V jvyy qjryy va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ sbe rire.



24:1 Gur rnegu vf gur YBEQ'f, naq gur shyarff gurerbs; gur jbeyq, naq
gurl gung qjryy gurerva.

24:2 Sbe ur ungu sbhaqrq vg hcba gur frnf, naq rfgnoyvfurq vg hcba gur
sybbqf.

24:3 Jub funyy nfpraq vagb gur uvyy bs gur YBEQ? be jub funyy fgnaq va
uvf ubyl cynpr?

24:4 Ur gung ungu pyrna unaqf, naq n cher urneg; jub ungu abg yvsgrq
hc uvf fbhy hagb inavgl, abe fjbea qrprvgshyyl.

24:5 Ur funyy erprvir gur oyrffvat sebz gur YBEQ, naq evtugrbhfarff
sebz gur Tbq bs uvf fnyingvba.

24:6 Guvf vf gur trarengvba bs gurz gung frrx uvz, gung frrx gul snpr,
B Wnpbo. Frynu.

24:7 Yvsg hc lbhe urnqf, B lr tngrf; naq or lr yvsg hc, lr rireynfgvat
qbbef; naq gur Xvat bs tybel funyy pbzr va.

24:8 Jub vf guvf Xvat bs tybel? Gur YBEQ fgebat naq zvtugl, gur YBEQ
zvtugl va onggyr.

24:9 Yvsg hc lbhe urnqf, B lr tngrf; rira yvsg gurz hc, lr rireynfgvat
qbbef; naq gur Xvat bs tybel funyy pbzr va.

24:10 Jub vf guvf Xvat bs tybel? Gur YBEQ bs ubfgf, ur vf gur Xvat bs
tybel. Frynu.



25:1 Hagb gurr, B YBEQ, qb V yvsg hc zl fbhy.

25:2 B zl Tbq, V gehfg va gurr: yrg zr abg or nfunzrq, yrg abg zvar
rarzvrf gevhzcu bire zr.

25:3 Lrn, yrg abar gung jnvg ba gurr or nfunzrq: yrg gurz or nfunzrq
juvpu genafterff jvgubhg pnhfr.

25:4 Furj zr gul jnlf, B YBEQ; grnpu zr gul cnguf.

25:5 Yrnq zr va gul gehgu, naq grnpu zr: sbe gubh neg gur Tbq bs zl
fnyingvba; ba gurr qb V jnvg nyy gur qnl.

25:6 Erzrzore, B YBEQ, gul graqre zrepvrf naq gul ybivatxvaqarffrf;
sbe gurl unir orra rire bs byq.

25:7 Erzrzore abg gur fvaf bs zl lbhgu, abe zl genafterffvbaf:
nppbeqvat gb gul zrepl erzrzore gubh zr sbe gul tbbqarff' fnxr, B
YBEQ.

25:8 Tbbq naq hcevtug vf gur YBEQ: gurersber jvyy ur grnpu fvaaref va
gur jnl.

25:9 Gur zrrx jvyy ur thvqr va whqtzrag: naq gur zrrx jvyy ur grnpu
uvf jnl.

25:10 Nyy gur cnguf bs gur YBEQ ner zrepl naq gehgu hagb fhpu nf xrrc
uvf pbiranag naq uvf grfgvzbavrf.

25:11 Sbe gul anzr'f fnxr, B YBEQ, cneqba zvar vavdhvgl; sbe vg vf
terng.

25:12 Jung zna vf ur gung srnergu gur YBEQ? uvz funyy ur grnpu va gur
jnl gung ur funyy pubbfr.

25:13 Uvf fbhy funyy qjryy ng rnfr; naq uvf frrq funyy vaurevg gur
rnegu.

25:14 Gur frperg bs gur YBEQ vf jvgu gurz gung srne uvz; naq ur jvyy
furj gurz uvf pbiranag.

25:15 Zvar rlrf ner rire gbjneq gur YBEQ; sbe ur funyy cyhpx zl srrg
bhg bs gur arg.

25:16 Ghea gurr hagb zr, naq unir zrepl hcba zr; sbe V nz qrfbyngr naq
nssyvpgrq.

25:17 Gur gebhoyrf bs zl urneg ner raynetrq: B oevat gubh zr bhg bs zl
qvfgerffrf.

25:18 Ybbx hcba zvar nssyvpgvba naq zl cnva; naq sbetvir nyy zl fvaf.

25:19 Pbafvqre zvar rarzvrf; sbe gurl ner znal; naq gurl ungr zr jvgu
pehry ungerq.

25:20 B xrrc zl fbhy, naq qryvire zr: yrg zr abg or nfunzrq; sbe V chg
zl gehfg va gurr.

25:21 Yrg vagrtevgl naq hcevtugarff cerfreir zr; sbe V jnvg ba gurr.

25:22 Erqrrz Vfenry, B Tbq, bhg bs nyy uvf gebhoyrf.



26:1 Whqtr zr, B YBEQ; sbe V unir jnyxrq va zvar vagrtevgl: V unir
gehfgrq nyfb va gur YBEQ; gurersber V funyy abg fyvqr.

26:2 Rknzvar zr, B YBEQ, naq cebir zr; gel zl ervaf naq zl urneg.

26:3 Sbe gul ybivatxvaqarff vf orsber zvar rlrf: naq V unir jnyxrq va
gul gehgu.

26:4 V unir abg fng jvgu inva crefbaf, arvgure jvyy V tb va jvgu
qvffrzoyref.

26:5 V unir ungrq gur pbatertngvba bs rivy qbref; naq jvyy abg fvg
jvgu gur jvpxrq.

26:6 V jvyy jnfu zvar unaqf va vaabprapl: fb jvyy V pbzcnff guvar
nygne, B YBEQ:

26:7 Gung V znl choyvfu jvgu gur ibvpr bs gunaxftvivat, naq gryy bs
nyy gul jbaqebhf jbexf.

26:8 YBEQ, V unir ybirq gur unovgngvba bs gul ubhfr, naq gur cynpr
jurer guvar ubabhe qjryyrgu.

26:9 Tngure abg zl fbhy jvgu fvaaref, abe zl yvsr jvgu oybbql zra:

26:10 Va jubfr unaqf vf zvfpuvrs, naq gurve evtug unaq vf shyy bs
oevorf.

26:11 Ohg nf sbe zr, V jvyy jnyx va zvar vagrtevgl: erqrrz zr, naq or
zrepvshy hagb zr.

26:12 Zl sbbg fgnaqrgu va na rira cynpr: va gur pbatertngvbaf jvyy V
oyrff gur YBEQ.



27:1 Gur YBEQ vf zl yvtug naq zl fnyingvba; jubz funyy V srne? gur
YBEQ vf gur fgeratgu bs zl yvsr; bs jubz funyy V or nsenvq?

27:2 Jura gur jvpxrq, rira zvar rarzvrf naq zl sbrf, pnzr hcba zr gb
rng hc zl syrfu, gurl fghzoyrq naq sryy.

27:3 Gubhtu na ubfg fubhyq rapnzc ntnvafg zr, zl urneg funyy abg srne:
gubhtu jne fubhyq evfr ntnvafg zr, va guvf jvyy V or pbasvqrag.

27:4 Bar guvat unir V qrfverq bs gur YBEQ, gung jvyy V frrx nsgre;
gung V znl qjryy va gur ubhfr bs gur YBEQ nyy gur qnlf bs zl yvsr, gb
orubyq gur ornhgl bs gur YBEQ, naq gb radhver va uvf grzcyr.

27:5 Sbe va gur gvzr bs gebhoyr ur funyy uvqr zr va uvf cnivyvba: va
gur frperg bs uvf gnoreanpyr funyy ur uvqr zr; ur funyy frg zr hc hcba
n ebpx.

27:6 Naq abj funyy zvar urnq or yvsgrq hc nobir zvar rarzvrf ebhaq
nobhg zr: gurersber jvyy V bssre va uvf gnoreanpyr fnpevsvprf bs wbl;
V jvyy fvat, lrn, V jvyy fvat cenvfrf hagb gur YBEQ.

27:7 Urne, B YBEQ, jura V pel jvgu zl ibvpr: unir zrepl nyfb hcba zr,
naq nafjre zr.

27:8 Jura gubh fnvqfg, Frrx lr zl snpr; zl urneg fnvq hagb gurr, Gul
snpr, YBEQ, jvyy V frrx.

27:9 Uvqr abg gul snpr sne sebz zr; chg abg gul freinag njnl va natre:
gubh unfg orra zl uryc; yrnir zr abg, arvgure sbefnxr zr, B Tbq bs zl
fnyingvba.

27:10 Jura zl sngure naq zl zbgure sbefnxr zr, gura gur YBEQ jvyy gnxr
zr hc.

27:11 Grnpu zr gul jnl, B YBEQ, naq yrnq zr va n cynva cngu, orpnhfr
bs zvar rarzvrf.

27:12 Qryvire zr abg bire hagb gur jvyy bs zvar rarzvrf: sbe snyfr
jvgarffrf ner evfra hc ntnvafg zr, naq fhpu nf oerngur bhg pehrygl.

27:13 V unq snvagrq, hayrff V unq oryvrirq gb frr gur tbbqarff bs gur
YBEQ va gur ynaq bs gur yvivat.

27:14 Jnvg ba gur YBEQ: or bs tbbq pbhentr, naq ur funyy fgeratgura
guvar urneg: jnvg, V fnl, ba gur YBEQ.



28:1 Hagb gurr jvyy V pel, B YBEQ zl ebpx; or abg fvyrag gb zr: yrfg,
vs gubh or fvyrag gb zr, V orpbzr yvxr gurz gung tb qbja vagb gur cvg.

28:2 Urne gur ibvpr bs zl fhccyvpngvbaf, jura V pel hagb gurr, jura V
yvsg hc zl unaqf gbjneq gul ubyl benpyr.

28:3 Qenj zr abg njnl jvgu gur jvpxrq, naq jvgu gur jbexref bs
vavdhvgl, juvpu fcrnx crnpr gb gurve arvtuobhef, ohg zvfpuvrs vf va
gurve urnegf.

28:4 Tvir gurz nppbeqvat gb gurve qrrqf, naq nppbeqvat gb gur
jvpxrqarff bs gurve raqrnibhef: tvir gurz nsgre gur jbex bs gurve
unaqf; eraqre gb gurz gurve qrfreg.

28:5 Orpnhfr gurl ertneq abg gur jbexf bs gur YBEQ, abe gur bcrengvba
bs uvf unaqf, ur funyy qrfgebl gurz, naq abg ohvyq gurz hc.

28:6 Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ, orpnhfr ur ungu urneq gur ibvpr bs zl
fhccyvpngvbaf.

28:7 Gur YBEQ vf zl fgeratgu naq zl fuvryq; zl urneg gehfgrq va uvz,
naq V nz urycrq: gurersber zl urneg terngyl erwbvprgu; naq jvgu zl
fbat jvyy V cenvfr uvz.

28:8 Gur YBEQ vf gurve fgeratgu, naq ur vf gur fnivat fgeratgu bs uvf
nabvagrq.

28:9 Fnir gul crbcyr, naq oyrff guvar vaurevgnapr: srrq gurz nyfb, naq
yvsg gurz hc sbe rire.



29:1 Tvir hagb gur YBEQ, B lr zvtugl, tvir hagb gur YBEQ tybel naq
fgeratgu.

29:2 Tvir hagb gur YBEQ gur tybel qhr hagb uvf anzr; jbefuvc gur YBEQ
va gur ornhgl bs ubyvarff.

29:3 Gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ vf hcba gur jngref: gur Tbq bs tybel
guhaqrergu: gur YBEQ vf hcba znal jngref.

29:4 Gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ vf cbjreshy; gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ vf shyy
bs znwrfgl.

29:5 Gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ oernxrgu gur prqnef; lrn, gur YBEQ oernxrgu
gur prqnef bs Yronaba.

29:6 Ur znxrgu gurz nyfb gb fxvc yvxr n pnys; Yronaba naq Fvevba yvxr
n lbhat havpbea.

29:7 Gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ qvivqrgu gur synzrf bs sver.

29:8 Gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ funxrgu gur jvyqrearff; gur YBEQ funxrgu
gur jvyqrearff bs Xnqrfu.

29:9 Gur ibvpr bs gur YBEQ znxrgu gur uvaqf gb pnyir, naq qvfpbirergu
gur sberfgf: naq va uvf grzcyr qbgu rirel bar fcrnx bs uvf tybel.

29:10 Gur YBEQ fvggrgu hcba gur sybbq; lrn, gur YBEQ fvggrgu Xvat sbe
rire.

29:11 Gur YBEQ jvyy tvir fgeratgu hagb uvf crbcyr; gur YBEQ jvyy oyrff
uvf crbcyr jvgu crnpr.



30:1 V jvyy rkgby gurr, B YBEQ; sbe gubh unfg yvsgrq zr hc, naq unfg
abg znqr zl sbrf gb erwbvpr bire zr.

30:2 B YBEQ zl Tbq, V pevrq hagb gurr, naq gubh unfg urnyrq zr.

30:3 B YBEQ, gubh unfg oebhtug hc zl fbhy sebz gur tenir: gubh unfg
xrcg zr nyvir, gung V fubhyq abg tb qbja gb gur cvg.

30:4 Fvat hagb gur YBEQ, B lr fnvagf bs uvf, naq tvir gunaxf ng gur
erzrzoenapr bs uvf ubyvarff.

30:5 Sbe uvf natre raqhergu ohg n zbzrag; va uvf snibhe vf yvsr:
jrrcvat znl raqher sbe n avtug, ohg wbl pbzrgu va gur zbeavat.

30:6 Naq va zl cebfcrevgl V fnvq, V funyy arire or zbirq.

30:7 YBEQ, ol gul snibhe gubh unfg znqr zl zbhagnva gb fgnaq fgebat:
gubh qvqfg uvqr gul snpr, naq V jnf gebhoyrq.

30:8 V pevrq gb gurr, B YBEQ; naq hagb gur YBEQ V znqr fhccyvpngvba.

30:9 Jung cebsvg vf gurer va zl oybbq, jura V tb qbja gb gur cvg?
Funyy gur qhfg cenvfr gurr? funyy vg qrpyner gul gehgu?

30:10 Urne, B YBEQ, naq unir zrepl hcba zr: YBEQ, or gubh zl urycre.

30:11 Gubh unfg ghearq sbe zr zl zbheavat vagb qnapvat: gubh unfg chg
bss zl fnpxpybgu, naq tveqrq zr jvgu tynqarff;

30:12 Gb gur raq gung zl tybel znl fvat cenvfr gb gurr, naq abg or
fvyrag.

B YBEQ zl Tbq, V jvyy tvir gunaxf hagb gurr sbe rire.



31:1 Va gurr, B YBEQ, qb V chg zl gehfg; yrg zr arire or nfunzrq:
qryvire zr va gul evtugrbhfarff.

31:2 Obj qbja guvar rne gb zr; qryvire zr fcrrqvyl: or gubh zl fgebat
ebpx, sbe na ubhfr bs qrsrapr gb fnir zr.

31:3 Sbe gubh neg zl ebpx naq zl sbegerff; gurersber sbe gul anzr'f
fnxr yrnq zr, naq thvqr zr.

31:4 Chyy zr bhg bs gur arg gung gurl unir ynvq cevivyl sbe zr: sbe
gubh neg zl fgeratgu.

31:5 Vagb guvar unaq V pbzzvg zl fcvevg: gubh unfg erqrrzrq zr, B YBEQ
Tbq bs gehgu.

31:6 V unir ungrq gurz gung ertneq ylvat inavgvrf: ohg V gehfg va gur
YBEQ.

31:7 V jvyy or tynq naq erwbvpr va gul zrepl: sbe gubh unfg pbafvqrerq
zl gebhoyr; gubh unfg xabja zl fbhy va nqirefvgvrf;

31:8 Naq unfg abg fuhg zr hc vagb gur unaq bs gur rarzl: gubh unfg frg
zl srrg va n ynetr ebbz.

31:9 Unir zrepl hcba zr, B YBEQ, sbe V nz va gebhoyr: zvar rlr vf
pbafhzrq jvgu tevrs, lrn, zl fbhy naq zl oryyl.

31:10 Sbe zl yvsr vf fcrag jvgu tevrs, naq zl lrnef jvgu fvtuvat: zl
fgeratgu snvyrgu orpnhfr bs zvar vavdhvgl, naq zl obarf ner pbafhzrq.

31:11 V jnf n ercebnpu nzbat nyy zvar rarzvrf, ohg rfcrpvnyyl nzbat zl
arvtuobhef, naq n srne gb zvar npdhnvagnapr: gurl gung qvq frr zr
jvgubhg syrq sebz zr.

31:12 V nz sbetbggra nf n qrnq zna bhg bs zvaq: V nz yvxr n oebxra
irffry.

31:13 Sbe V unir urneq gur fynaqre bs znal: srne jnf ba rirel fvqr:
juvyr gurl gbbx pbhafry gbtrgure ntnvafg zr, gurl qrivfrq gb gnxr njnl
zl yvsr.

31:14 Ohg V gehfgrq va gurr, B YBEQ: V fnvq, Gubh neg zl Tbq.

31:15 Zl gvzrf ner va gul unaq: qryvire zr sebz gur unaq bs zvar
rarzvrf, naq sebz gurz gung crefrphgr zr.

31:16 Znxr gul snpr gb fuvar hcba gul freinag: fnir zr sbe gul
zrepvrf' fnxr.

31:17 Yrg zr abg or nfunzrq, B YBEQ; sbe V unir pnyyrq hcba gurr: yrg
gur jvpxrq or nfunzrq, naq yrg gurz or fvyrag va gur tenir.

31:18 Yrg gur ylvat yvcf or chg gb fvyrapr; juvpu fcrnx tevribhf
guvatf cebhqyl naq pbagrzcghbhfyl ntnvafg gur evtugrbhf.

31:19 Bu ubj terng vf gul tbbqarff, juvpu gubh unfg ynvq hc sbe gurz
gung srne gurr; juvpu gubh unfg jebhtug sbe gurz gung gehfg va gurr
orsber gur fbaf bs zra!

31:20 Gubh funyg uvqr gurz va gur frperg bs gul cerfrapr sebz gur
cevqr bs zna: gubh funyg xrrc gurz frpergyl va n cnivyvba sebz gur
fgevsr bs gbathrf.

31:21 Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ: sbe ur ungu furjrq zr uvf zneiryybhf
xvaqarff va n fgebat pvgl.
