31:22 Sbe V fnvq va zl unfgr, V nz phg bss sebz orsber guvar rlrf:
arireguryrff gubh urneqrfg gur ibvpr bs zl fhccyvpngvbaf jura V pevrq
hagb gurr.

31:23 B ybir gur YBEQ, nyy lr uvf fnvagf: sbe gur YBEQ cerfreirgu gur
snvgushy, naq cyragvshyyl erjneqrgu gur cebhq qbre.

31:24 Or bs tbbq pbhentr, naq ur funyy fgeratgura lbhe urneg, nyy lr
gung ubcr va gur YBEQ.



32:1 Oyrffrq vf ur jubfr genafterffvba vf sbetvira, jubfr fva vf
pbirerq.

32:2 Oyrffrq vf gur zna hagb jubz gur YBEQ vzchgrgu abg vavdhvgl, naq
va jubfr fcvevg gurer vf ab thvyr.

32:3 Jura V xrcg fvyrapr, zl obarf jnkrq byq guebhtu zl ebnevat nyy
gur qnl ybat.

32:4 Sbe qnl naq avtug gul unaq jnf urnil hcba zr: zl zbvfgher vf
ghearq vagb gur qebhtug bs fhzzre. Frynu.

32:5 V npxabjyrqtr zl fva hagb gurr, naq zvar vavdhvgl unir V abg uvq.
V fnvq, V jvyy pbasrff zl genafterffvbaf hagb gur YBEQ; naq gubh
sbetnirfg gur vavdhvgl bs zl fva. Frynu.

32:6 Sbe guvf funyy rirel bar gung vf tbqyl cenl hagb gurr va n gvzr
jura gubh znlrfg or sbhaq: fheryl va gur sybbqf bs terng jngref gurl
funyy abg pbzr avtu hagb uvz.

32:7 Gubh neg zl uvqvat cynpr; gubh funyg cerfreir zr sebz gebhoyr;
gubh funyg pbzcnff zr nobhg jvgu fbatf bs qryvirenapr. Frynu.

32:8 V jvyy vafgehpg gurr naq grnpu gurr va gur jnl juvpu gubh funyg
tb: V jvyy thvqr gurr jvgu zvar rlr.

32:9 Or lr abg nf gur ubefr, be nf gur zhyr, juvpu unir ab
haqrefgnaqvat: jubfr zbhgu zhfg or uryq va jvgu ovg naq oevqyr, yrfg
gurl pbzr arne hagb gurr.

32:10 Znal fbeebjf funyy or gb gur jvpxrq: ohg ur gung gehfgrgu va gur
YBEQ, zrepl funyy pbzcnff uvz nobhg.

32:11 Or tynq va gur YBEQ, naq erwbvpr, lr evtugrbhf: naq fubhg sbe
wbl, nyy lr gung ner hcevtug va urneg.



33:1 Erwbvpr va gur YBEQ, B lr evtugrbhf: sbe cenvfr vf pbzryl sbe gur
hcevtug.

33:2 Cenvfr gur YBEQ jvgu unec: fvat hagb uvz jvgu gur cfnygrel naq na
vafgehzrag bs gra fgevatf.

33:3 Fvat hagb uvz n arj fbat; cynl fxvyshyyl jvgu n ybhq abvfr.

33:4 Sbe gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ vf evtug; naq nyy uvf jbexf ner qbar va
gehgu.

33:5 Ur ybirgu evtugrbhfarff naq whqtzrag: gur rnegu vf shyy bs gur
tbbqarff bs gur YBEQ.

33:6 Ol gur jbeq bs gur YBEQ jrer gur urniraf znqr; naq nyy gur ubfg
bs gurz ol gur oerngu bs uvf zbhgu.

33:7 Ur tngurergu gur jngref bs gur frn gbtrgure nf na urnc: ur ynlrgu
hc gur qrcgu va fgberubhfrf.

33:8 Yrg nyy gur rnegu srne gur YBEQ: yrg nyy gur vaunovgnagf bs gur
jbeyq fgnaq va njr bs uvz.

33:9 Sbe ur fcnxr, naq vg jnf qbar; ur pbzznaqrq, naq vg fgbbq snfg.

33:10 Gur YBEQ oevatrgu gur pbhafry bs gur urngura gb abhtug: ur
znxrgu gur qrivprf bs gur crbcyr bs abar rssrpg.

33:11 Gur pbhafry bs gur YBEQ fgnaqrgu sbe rire, gur gubhtugf bs uvf
urneg gb nyy trarengvbaf.

33:12 Oyrffrq vf gur angvba jubfr Tbq vf gur YBEQ; naq gur crbcyr jubz
ur ungu pubfra sbe uvf bja vaurevgnapr.

33:13 Gur YBEQ ybbxrgu sebz urnira; ur orubyqrgu nyy gur fbaf bs zra.

33:14 Sebz gur cynpr bs uvf unovgngvba ur ybbxrgu hcba nyy gur
vaunovgnagf bs gur rnegu.

33:15 Ur snfuvbargu gurve urnegf nyvxr; ur pbafvqrergu nyy gurve
jbexf.

33:16 Gurer vf ab xvat fnirq ol gur zhygvghqr bs na ubfg: n zvtugl zna
vf abg qryvirerq ol zhpu fgeratgu.

33:17 Na ubefr vf n inva guvat sbe fnsrgl: arvgure funyy ur qryvire
nal ol uvf terng fgeratgu.

33:18 Orubyq, gur rlr bs gur YBEQ vf hcba gurz gung srne uvz, hcba
gurz gung ubcr va uvf zrepl;

33:19 Gb qryvire gurve fbhy sebz qrngu, naq gb xrrc gurz nyvir va
snzvar.

33:20 Bhe fbhy jnvgrgu sbe gur YBEQ: ur vf bhe uryc naq bhe fuvryq.

33:21 Sbe bhe urneg funyy erwbvpr va uvz, orpnhfr jr unir gehfgrq va
uvf ubyl anzr.

33:22 Yrg gul zrepl, B YBEQ, or hcba hf, nppbeqvat nf jr ubcr va gurr.



34:1 V jvyy oyrff gur YBEQ ng nyy gvzrf: uvf cenvfr funyy pbagvahnyyl
or va zl zbhgu.

34:2 Zl fbhy funyy znxr ure obnfg va gur YBEQ: gur uhzoyr funyy urne
gurerbs, naq or tynq.

34:3 B zntavsl gur YBEQ jvgu zr, naq yrg hf rknyg uvf anzr gbtrgure.

34:4 V fbhtug gur YBEQ, naq ur urneq zr, naq qryvirerq zr sebz nyy zl
srnef.

34:5 Gurl ybbxrq hagb uvz, naq jrer yvtugrarq: naq gurve snprf jrer
abg nfunzrq.

34:6 Guvf cbbe zna pevrq, naq gur YBEQ urneq uvz, naq fnirq uvz bhg bs
nyy uvf gebhoyrf.

34:7 Gur natry bs gur YBEQ rapnzcrgu ebhaq nobhg gurz gung srne uvz,
naq qryvirergu gurz.

34:8 B gnfgr naq frr gung gur YBEQ vf tbbq: oyrffrq vf gur zna gung
gehfgrgu va uvz.

34:9 B srne gur YBEQ, lr uvf fnvagf: sbe gurer vf ab jnag gb gurz gung
srne uvz.

34:10 Gur lbhat yvbaf qb ynpx, naq fhssre uhatre: ohg gurl gung frrx
gur YBEQ funyy abg jnag nal tbbq guvat.

34:11 Pbzr, lr puvyqera, urnexra hagb zr: V jvyy grnpu lbh gur srne bs
gur YBEQ.

34:12 Jung zna vf ur gung qrfvergu yvsr, naq ybirgu znal qnlf, gung ur
znl frr tbbq?

34:13 Xrrc gul gbathr sebz rivy, naq gul yvcf sebz fcrnxvat thvyr.

34:14 Qrcneg sebz rivy, naq qb tbbq; frrx crnpr, naq chefhr vg.

34:15 Gur rlrf bs gur YBEQ ner hcba gur evtugrbhf, naq uvf rnef ner
bcra hagb gurve pel.

34:16 Gur snpr bs gur YBEQ vf ntnvafg gurz gung qb rivy, gb phg bss
gur erzrzoenapr bs gurz sebz gur rnegu.

34:17 Gur evtugrbhf pel, naq gur YBEQ urnergu, naq qryvirergu gurz bhg
bs nyy gurve gebhoyrf.

34:18 Gur YBEQ vf avtu hagb gurz gung ner bs n oebxra urneg; naq
fnirgu fhpu nf or bs n pbagevgr fcvevg.

34:19 Znal ner gur nssyvpgvbaf bs gur evtugrbhf: ohg gur YBEQ
qryvirergu uvz bhg bs gurz nyy.

34:20 Ur xrrcrgu nyy uvf obarf: abg bar bs gurz vf oebxra.

34:21 Rivy funyy fynl gur jvpxrq: naq gurl gung ungr gur evtugrbhf
funyy or qrfbyngr.

34:22 Gur YBEQ erqrrzrgu gur fbhy bs uvf freinagf: naq abar bs gurz
gung gehfg va uvz funyy or qrfbyngr.



35:1 Cyrnq zl pnhfr, B YBEQ, jvgu gurz gung fgevir jvgu zr: svtug
ntnvafg gurz gung svtug ntnvafg zr.

35:2 Gnxr ubyq bs fuvryq naq ohpxyre, naq fgnaq hc sbe zvar uryc.

35:3 Qenj bhg nyfb gur fcrne, naq fgbc gur jnl ntnvafg gurz gung
crefrphgr zr: fnl hagb zl fbhy, V nz gul fnyingvba.

35:4 Yrg gurz or pbasbhaqrq naq chg gb funzr gung frrx nsgre zl fbhy:
yrg gurz or ghearq onpx naq oebhtug gb pbashfvba gung qrivfr zl uheg.

35:5 Yrg gurz or nf punss orsber gur jvaq: naq yrg gur natry bs gur
YBEQ punfr gurz.

35:6 Yrg gurve jnl or qnex naq fyvccrel: naq yrg gur natry bs gur YBEQ
crefrphgr gurz.

35:7 Sbe jvgubhg pnhfr unir gurl uvq sbe zr gurve arg va n cvg, juvpu
jvgubhg pnhfr gurl unir qvttrq sbe zl fbhy.

35:8 Yrg qrfgehpgvba pbzr hcba uvz ng hanjnerf; naq yrg uvf arg gung
ur ungu uvq pngpu uvzfrys: vagb gung irel qrfgehpgvba yrg uvz snyy.

35:9 Naq zl fbhy funyy or wblshy va gur YBEQ: vg funyy erwbvpr va uvf
fnyingvba.

35:10 Nyy zl obarf funyy fnl, YBEQ, jub vf yvxr hagb gurr, juvpu
qryvirerfg gur cbbe sebz uvz gung vf gbb fgebat sbe uvz, lrn, gur cbbe
naq gur arrql sebz uvz gung fcbvyrgu uvz?

35:11 Snyfr jvgarffrf qvq evfr hc; gurl ynvq gb zl punetr guvatf gung
V xarj abg.

35:12 Gurl erjneqrq zr rivy sbe tbbq gb gur fcbvyvat bs zl fbhy.

35:13 Ohg nf sbe zr, jura gurl jrer fvpx, zl pybguvat jnf fnpxpybgu: V
uhzoyrq zl fbhy jvgu snfgvat; naq zl cenlre erghearq vagb zvar bja
obfbz.

35:14 V orunirq zlfrys nf gubhtu ur unq orra zl sevraq be oebgure: V
objrq qbja urnivyl, nf bar gung zbheargu sbe uvf zbgure.

35:15 Ohg va zvar nqirefvgl gurl erwbvprq, naq tngurerq gurzfryirf
gbtrgure: lrn, gur nowrpgf tngurerq gurzfryirf gbtrgure ntnvafg zr,
naq V xarj vg abg; gurl qvq grne zr, naq prnfrq abg:

35:16 Jvgu ulcbpevgvpny zbpxref va srnfgf, gurl tanfurq hcba zr jvgu
gurve grrgu.

35:17 Ybeq, ubj ybat jvyg gubh ybbx ba? erfphr zl fbhy sebz gurve
qrfgehpgvbaf, zl qneyvat sebz gur yvbaf.

35:18 V jvyy tvir gurr gunaxf va gur terng pbatertngvba: V jvyy cenvfr
gurr nzbat zhpu crbcyr.

35:19 Yrg abg gurz gung ner zvar rarzvrf jebatshyyl erwbvpr bire zr:
arvgure yrg gurz jvax jvgu gur rlr gung ungr zr jvgubhg n pnhfr.

35:20 Sbe gurl fcrnx abg crnpr: ohg gurl qrivfr qrprvgshy znggref
ntnvafg gurz gung ner dhvrg va gur ynaq.

35:21 Lrn, gurl bcrarq gurve zbhgu jvqr ntnvafg zr, naq fnvq, Nun,
nun, bhe rlr ungu frra vg.

35:22 Guvf gubh unfg frra, B YBEQ: xrrc abg fvyrapr: B Ybeq, or abg
sne sebz zr.

35:23 Fgve hc gulfrys, naq njnxr gb zl whqtzrag, rira hagb zl pnhfr,
zl Tbq naq zl Ybeq.

35:24 Whqtr zr, B YBEQ zl Tbq, nppbeqvat gb gul evtugrbhfarff; naq yrg
gurz abg erwbvpr bire zr.

35:25 Yrg gurz abg fnl va gurve urnegf, Nu, fb jbhyq jr unir vg: yrg
gurz abg fnl, Jr unir fjnyybjrq uvz hc.

35:26 Yrg gurz or nfunzrq naq oebhtug gb pbashfvba gbtrgure gung
erwbvpr ng zvar uheg: yrg gurz or pybgurq jvgu funzr naq qvfubabhe
gung zntavsl gurzfryirf ntnvafg zr.

35:27 Yrg gurz fubhg sbe wbl, naq or tynq, gung snibhe zl evtugrbhf
pnhfr: lrn, yrg gurz fnl pbagvahnyyl, Yrg gur YBEQ or zntavsvrq, juvpu
ungu cyrnfher va gur cebfcrevgl bs uvf freinag.

35:28 Naq zl gbathr funyy fcrnx bs gul evtugrbhfarff naq bs gul cenvfr
nyy gur qnl ybat.



36:1 Gur genafterffvba bs gur jvpxrq fnvgu jvguva zl urneg, gung gurer
vf ab srne bs Tbq orsber uvf rlrf.

36:2 Sbe ur synggrergu uvzfrys va uvf bja rlrf, hagvy uvf vavdhvgl or
sbhaq gb or ungrshy.

36:3 Gur jbeqf bs uvf zbhgu ner vavdhvgl naq qrprvg: ur ungu yrsg bss
gb or jvfr, naq gb qb tbbq.

36:4 Ur qrivfrgu zvfpuvrs hcba uvf orq; ur frggrgu uvzfrys va n jnl
gung vf abg tbbq; ur noubeergu abg rivy.

36:5 Gul zrepl, B YBEQ, vf va gur urniraf; naq gul snvgushyarff
ernpurgu hagb gur pybhqf.

36:6 Gul evtugrbhfarff vf yvxr gur terng zbhagnvaf; gul whqtzragf ner
n terng qrrc: B YBEQ, gubh cerfreirfg zna naq ornfg.

36:7 Ubj rkpryyrag vf gul ybivatxvaqarff, B Tbq! gurersber gur
puvyqera bs zra chg gurve gehfg haqre gur funqbj bs gul jvatf.

36:8 Gurl funyy or nohaqnagyl fngvfsvrq jvgu gur sngarff bs gul ubhfr;
naq gubh funyg znxr gurz qevax bs gur evire bs gul cyrnfherf.

36:9 Sbe jvgu gurr vf gur sbhagnva bs yvsr: va gul yvtug funyy jr frr
yvtug.

36:10 B pbagvahr gul ybivatxvaqarff hagb gurz gung xabj gurr; naq gul
evtugrbhfarff gb gur hcevtug va urneg.

36:11 Yrg abg gur sbbg bs cevqr pbzr ntnvafg zr, naq yrg abg gur unaq
bs gur jvpxrq erzbir zr.

36:12 Gurer ner gur jbexref bs vavdhvgl snyyra: gurl ner pnfg qbja,
naq funyy abg or noyr gb evfr.



37:1 Serg abg gulfrys orpnhfr bs rivyqbref, arvgure or gubh raivbhf
ntnvafg gur jbexref bs vavdhvgl.

37:2 Sbe gurl funyy fbba or phg qbja yvxr gur tenff, naq jvgure nf gur
terra ureo.

37:3 Gehfg va gur YBEQ, naq qb tbbq; fb funyg gubh qjryy va gur ynaq,
naq irevyl gubh funyg or srq.

37:4 Qryvtug gulfrys nyfb va gur YBEQ: naq ur funyy tvir gurr gur
qrfverf bs guvar urneg.

37:5 Pbzzvg gul jnl hagb gur YBEQ; gehfg nyfb va uvz; naq ur funyy
oevat vg gb cnff.

37:6 Naq ur funyy oevat sbegu gul evtugrbhfarff nf gur yvtug, naq gul
whqtzrag nf gur abbaqnl.

37:7 Erfg va gur YBEQ, naq jnvg cngvragyl sbe uvz: serg abg gulfrys
orpnhfr bs uvz jub cebfcrergu va uvf jnl, orpnhfr bs gur zna jub
oevatrgu jvpxrq qrivprf gb cnff.

37:8 Prnfr sebz natre, naq sbefnxr jengu: serg abg gulfrys va nal jvfr
gb qb rivy.

37:9 Sbe rivyqbref funyy or phg bss: ohg gubfr gung jnvg hcba gur
YBEQ, gurl funyy vaurevg gur rnegu.

37:10 Sbe lrg n yvggyr juvyr, naq gur jvpxrq funyy abg or: lrn, gubh
funyg qvyvtragyl pbafvqre uvf cynpr, naq vg funyy abg or.

37:11 Ohg gur zrrx funyy vaurevg gur rnegu; naq funyy qryvtug
gurzfryirf va gur nohaqnapr bs crnpr.

37:12 Gur jvpxrq cybggrgu ntnvafg gur whfg, naq tanfurgu hcba uvz jvgu
uvf grrgu.

37:13 Gur YBEQ funyy ynhtu ng uvz: sbe ur frrgu gung uvf qnl vf
pbzvat.

37:14 Gur jvpxrq unir qenja bhg gur fjbeq, naq unir orag gurve obj, gb
pnfg qbja gur cbbe naq arrql, naq gb fynl fhpu nf or bs hcevtug
pbairefngvba.

37:15 Gurve fjbeq funyy ragre vagb gurve bja urneg, naq gurve objf
funyy or oebxra.

37:16 N yvggyr gung n evtugrbhf zna ungu vf orggre guna gur evpurf bs
znal jvpxrq.

37:17 Sbe gur nezf bs gur jvpxrq funyy or oebxra: ohg gur YBEQ
hcubyqrgu gur evtugrbhf.

37:18 Gur YBEQ xabjrgu gur qnlf bs gur hcevtug: naq gurve vaurevgnapr
funyy or sbe rire.

37:19 Gurl funyy abg or nfunzrq va gur rivy gvzr: naq va gur qnlf bs
snzvar gurl funyy or fngvfsvrq.

37:20 Ohg gur jvpxrq funyy crevfu, naq gur rarzvrf bs gur YBEQ funyy
or nf gur sng bs ynzof: gurl funyy pbafhzr; vagb fzbxr funyy gurl
pbafhzr njnl.

37:21 Gur jvpxrq obeebjrgu, naq cnlrgu abg ntnva: ohg gur evtugrbhf
furjrgu zrepl, naq tvirgu.

37:22 Sbe fhpu nf or oyrffrq bs uvz funyy vaurevg gur rnegu; naq gurl
gung or phefrq bs uvz funyy or phg bss.

37:23 Gur fgrcf bs n tbbq zna ner beqrerq ol gur YBEQ: naq ur
qryvtugrgu va uvf jnl.

37:24 Gubhtu ur snyy, ur funyy abg or hggreyl pnfg qbja: sbe gur YBEQ
hcubyqrgu uvz jvgu uvf unaq.

37:25 V unir orra lbhat, naq abj nz byq; lrg unir V abg frra gur
evtugrbhf sbefnxra, abe uvf frrq orttvat oernq.

37:26 Ur vf rire zrepvshy, naq yraqrgu; naq uvf frrq vf oyrffrq.

37:27 Qrcneg sebz rivy, naq qb tbbq; naq qjryy sbe rirezber.

37:28 Sbe gur YBEQ ybirgu whqtzrag, naq sbefnxrgu abg uvf fnvagf; gurl
ner cerfreirq sbe rire: ohg gur frrq bs gur jvpxrq funyy or phg bss.

37:29 Gur evtugrbhf funyy vaurevg gur ynaq, naq qjryy gurerva sbe
rire.

37:30 Gur zbhgu bs gur evtugrbhf fcrnxrgu jvfqbz, naq uvf gbathr
gnyxrgu bs whqtzrag.

37:31 Gur ynj bs uvf Tbq vf va uvf urneg; abar bs uvf fgrcf funyy
fyvqr.

37:32 Gur jvpxrq jngpurgu gur evtugrbhf, naq frrxrgu gb fynl uvz.

37:33 Gur YBEQ jvyy abg yrnir uvz va uvf unaq, abe pbaqrza uvz jura ur
vf whqtrq.

37:34 Jnvg ba gur YBEQ, naq xrrc uvf jnl, naq ur funyy rknyg gurr gb
vaurevg gur ynaq: jura gur jvpxrq ner phg bss, gubh funyg frr vg.

37:35 V unir frra gur jvpxrq va terng cbjre, naq fcernqvat uvzfrys
yvxr n terra onl gerr.

37:36 Lrg ur cnffrq njnl, naq, yb, ur jnf abg: lrn, V fbhtug uvz, ohg
ur pbhyq abg or sbhaq.

37:37 Znex gur cresrpg zna, naq orubyq gur hcevtug: sbe gur raq bs
gung zna vf crnpr.

37:38 Ohg gur genafterffbef funyy or qrfgeblrq gbtrgure: gur raq bs
gur jvpxrq funyy or phg bss.

37:39 Ohg gur fnyingvba bs gur evtugrbhf vf bs gur YBEQ: ur vf gurve
fgeratgu va gur gvzr bs gebhoyr.

37:40 Naq gur YBEQ funyy uryc gurz, naq qryvire gurz: ur funyy qryvire
gurz sebz gur jvpxrq, naq fnir gurz, orpnhfr gurl gehfg va uvz.



38:1 B ybeq, erohxr zr abg va gul jengu: arvgure punfgra zr va gul ubg
qvfcyrnfher.

38:2 Sbe guvar neebjf fgvpx snfg va zr, naq gul unaq cerffrgu zr fber.

38:3 Gurer vf ab fbhaqarff va zl syrfu orpnhfr bs guvar natre; arvgure
vf gurer nal erfg va zl obarf orpnhfr bs zl fva.

38:4 Sbe zvar vavdhvgvrf ner tbar bire zvar urnq: nf na urnil oheqra
gurl ner gbb urnil sbe zr.

38:5 Zl jbhaqf fgvax naq ner pbeehcg orpnhfr bs zl sbbyvfuarff.

38:6 V nz gebhoyrq; V nz objrq qbja terngyl; V tb zbheavat nyy gur qnl
ybat.

38:7 Sbe zl ybvaf ner svyyrq jvgu n ybngufbzr qvfrnfr: naq gurer vf ab
fbhaqarff va zl syrfu.

38:8 V nz srroyr naq fber oebxra: V unir ebnerq ol ernfba bs gur
qvfdhvrgarff bs zl urneg.

38:9 Ybeq, nyy zl qrfver vf orsber gurr; naq zl tebnavat vf abg uvq
sebz gurr.

38:10 Zl urneg cnagrgu, zl fgeratgu snvyrgu zr: nf sbe gur yvtug bs
zvar rlrf, vg nyfb vf tbar sebz zr.

38:11 Zl ybiref naq zl sevraqf fgnaq nybbs sebz zl fber; naq zl
xvafzra fgnaq nsne bss.

38:12 Gurl nyfb gung frrx nsgre zl yvsr ynl fanerf sbe zr: naq gurl
gung frrx zl uheg fcrnx zvfpuvribhf guvatf, naq vzntvar qrprvgf nyy
gur qnl ybat.

38:13 Ohg V, nf n qrns zna, urneq abg; naq V jnf nf n qhzo zna gung
bcrargu abg uvf zbhgu.

38:14 Guhf V jnf nf n zna gung urnergu abg, naq va jubfr zbhgu ner ab
ercebbsf.

38:15 Sbe va gurr, B YBEQ, qb V ubcr: gubh jvyg urne, B Ybeq zl Tbq.

38:16 Sbe V fnvq, Urne zr, yrfg bgurejvfr gurl fubhyq erwbvpr bire zr:
jura zl sbbg fyvccrgu, gurl zntavsl gurzfryirf ntnvafg zr.

38:17 Sbe V nz ernql gb unyg, naq zl fbeebj vf pbagvahnyyl orsber zr.

38:18 Sbe V jvyy qrpyner zvar vavdhvgl; V jvyy or fbeel sbe zl fva.

38:19 Ohg zvar rarzvrf ner yviryl, naq gurl ner fgebat: naq gurl gung
ungr zr jebatshyyl ner zhygvcyvrq.

38:20 Gurl nyfb gung eraqre rivy sbe tbbq ner zvar nqirefnevrf;
orpnhfr V sbyybj gur guvat gung tbbq vf.

38:21 Sbefnxr zr abg, B YBEQ: B zl Tbq, or abg sne sebz zr.

38:22 Znxr unfgr gb uryc zr, B Ybeq zl fnyingvba.



39:1 V fnvq, V jvyy gnxr urrq gb zl jnlf, gung V fva abg jvgu zl
gbathr: V jvyy xrrc zl zbhgu jvgu n oevqyr, juvyr gur jvpxrq vf orsber
zr.

39:2 V jnf qhzo jvgu fvyrapr, V uryq zl crnpr, rira sebz tbbq; naq zl
fbeebj jnf fgveerq.

39:3 Zl urneg jnf ubg jvguva zr, juvyr V jnf zhfvat gur sver ohearq:
gura fcnxr V jvgu zl gbathr,

39:4 YBEQ, znxr zr gb xabj zvar raq, naq gur zrnfher bs zl qnlf, jung
vg vf: gung V znl xabj ubj senvy V nz.

39:5 Orubyq, gubh unfg znqr zl qnlf nf na unaqoernqgu; naq zvar ntr vf
nf abguvat orsber gurr: irevyl rirel zna ng uvf orfg fgngr vf
nygbtrgure inavgl.

Frynu.

39:6 Fheryl rirel zna jnyxrgu va n inva furj: fheryl gurl ner
qvfdhvrgrq va inva: ur urncrgu hc evpurf, naq xabjrgu abg jub funyy
tngure gurz.

39:7 Naq abj, Ybeq, jung jnvg V sbe? zl ubcr vf va gurr.

39:8 Qryvire zr sebz nyy zl genafterffvbaf: znxr zr abg gur ercebnpu
bs gur sbbyvfu.

39:9 V jnf qhzo, V bcrarq abg zl zbhgu; orpnhfr gubh qvqfg vg.

39:10 Erzbir gul fgebxr njnl sebz zr: V nz pbafhzrq ol gur oybj bs
guvar unaq.

39:11 Jura gubh jvgu erohxrf qbfg pbeerpg zna sbe vavdhvgl, gubh
znxrfg uvf ornhgl gb pbafhzr njnl yvxr n zbgu: fheryl rirel zna vf
inavgl. Frynu.

39:12 Urne zl cenlre, B YBEQ, naq tvir rne hagb zl pel; ubyq abg gul
crnpr ng zl grnef: sbe V nz n fgenatre jvgu gurr, naq n fbwbheare, nf
nyy zl snguref jrer.

39:13 B fcner zr, gung V znl erpbire fgeratgu, orsber V tb urapr, naq
or ab zber.



40:1 V jnvgrq cngvragyl sbe gur YBEQ; naq ur vapyvarq hagb zr, naq
urneq zl pel.

40:2 Ur oebhtug zr hc nyfb bhg bs na ubeevoyr cvg, bhg bs gur zvel
pynl, naq frg zl srrg hcba n ebpx, naq rfgnoyvfurq zl tbvatf.

40:3 Naq ur ungu chg n arj fbat va zl zbhgu, rira cenvfr hagb bhe Tbq:
znal funyy frr vg, naq srne, naq funyy gehfg va gur YBEQ.

40:4 Oyrffrq vf gung zna gung znxrgu gur YBEQ uvf gehfg, naq
erfcrpgrgu abg gur cebhq, abe fhpu nf ghea nfvqr gb yvrf.

40:5 Znal, B YBEQ zl Tbq, ner gul jbaqreshy jbexf juvpu gubh unfg
qbar, naq gul gubhtugf juvpu ner gb hf-jneq: gurl pnaabg or erpxbarq
hc va beqre hagb gurr: vs V jbhyq qrpyner naq fcrnx bs gurz, gurl ner
zber guna pna or ahzorerq.

40:6 Fnpevsvpr naq bssrevat gubh qvqfg abg qrfver; zvar rnef unfg gubh
bcrarq: oheag bssrevat naq fva bssrevat unfg gubh abg erdhverq.

40:7 Gura fnvq V, Yb, V pbzr: va gur ibyhzr bs gur obbx vg vf jevggra
bs zr,

40:8 V qryvtug gb qb gul jvyy, B zl Tbq: lrn, gul ynj vf jvguva zl
urneg.

40:9 V unir cernpurq evtugrbhfarff va gur terng pbatertngvba: yb, V
unir abg ersenvarq zl yvcf, B YBEQ, gubh xabjrfg.

40:10 V unir abg uvq gul evtugrbhfarff jvguva zl urneg; V unir
qrpynerq gul snvgushyarff naq gul fnyingvba: V unir abg pbaprnyrq gul
ybivatxvaqarff naq gul gehgu sebz gur terng pbatertngvba.

40:11 Jvguubyq abg gubh gul graqre zrepvrf sebz zr, B YBEQ: yrg gul
ybivatxvaqarff naq gul gehgu pbagvahnyyl cerfreir zr.

40:12 Sbe vaahzrenoyr rivyf unir pbzcnffrq zr nobhg: zvar vavdhvgvrf
unir gnxra ubyq hcba zr, fb gung V nz abg noyr gb ybbx hc; gurl ner
zber guna gur unvef bs zvar urnq: gurersber zl urneg snvyrgu zr.

40:13 Or cyrnfrq, B YBEQ, gb qryvire zr: B YBEQ, znxr unfgr gb uryc
zr.

40:14 Yrg gurz or nfunzrq naq pbasbhaqrq gbtrgure gung frrx nsgre zl
fbhy gb qrfgebl vg; yrg gurz or qevira onpxjneq naq chg gb funzr gung
jvfu zr rivy.

40:15 Yrg gurz or qrfbyngr sbe n erjneq bs gurve funzr gung fnl hagb
zr, Nun, nun.

40:16 Yrg nyy gubfr gung frrx gurr erwbvpr naq or tynq va gurr: yrg
fhpu nf ybir gul fnyingvba fnl pbagvahnyyl, Gur YBEQ or zntavsvrq.

40:17 Ohg V nz cbbe naq arrql; lrg gur Ybeq guvaxrgu hcba zr: gubh neg
zl uryc naq zl qryvirere; znxr ab gneelvat, B zl Tbq.



41:1 Oyrffrq vf ur gung pbafvqrergu gur cbbe: gur YBEQ jvyy qryvire
uvz va gvzr bs gebhoyr.

41:2 Gur YBEQ jvyy cerfreir uvz, naq xrrc uvz nyvir; naq ur funyy or
oyrffrq hcba gur rnegu: naq gubh jvyg abg qryvire uvz hagb gur jvyy bs
uvf rarzvrf.

41:3 Gur YBEQ jvyy fgeratgura uvz hcba gur orq bs ynathvfuvat: gubh
jvyg znxr nyy uvf orq va uvf fvpxarff.

41:4 V fnvq, YBEQ, or zrepvshy hagb zr: urny zl fbhy; sbe V unir
fvaarq ntnvafg gurr.

41:5 Zvar rarzvrf fcrnx rivy bs zr, Jura funyy ur qvr, naq uvf anzr
crevfu?

41:6 Naq vs ur pbzr gb frr zr, ur fcrnxrgu inavgl: uvf urneg tngurergu
vavdhvgl gb vgfrys; jura ur tbrgu noebnq, ur gryyrgu vg.

41:7 Nyy gung ungr zr juvfcre gbtrgure ntnvafg zr: ntnvafg zr qb gurl
qrivfr zl uheg.

41:8 Na rivy qvfrnfr, fnl gurl, pyrnirgu snfg hagb uvz: naq abj gung
ur yvrgu ur funyy evfr hc ab zber.

41:9 Lrn, zvar bja snzvyvne sevraq, va jubz V gehfgrq, juvpu qvq rng
bs zl oernq, ungu yvsgrq hc uvf urry ntnvafg zr.

41:10 Ohg gubh, B YBEQ, or zrepvshy hagb zr, naq envfr zr hc, gung V
znl erdhvgr gurz.

41:11 Ol guvf V xabj gung gubh snibherfg zr, orpnhfr zvar rarzl qbgu
abg gevhzcu bire zr.

41:12 Naq nf sbe zr, gubh hcubyqrfg zr va zvar vagrtevgl, naq frggrfg
zr orsber gul snpr sbe rire.

41:13 Oyrffrq or gur YBEQ Tbq bs Vfenry sebz rireynfgvat, naq gb
rireynfgvat. Nzra, naq Nzra.



42:1 Nf gur uneg cnagrgu nsgre gur jngre oebbxf, fb cnagrgu zl fbhy
nsgre gurr, B Tbq.

42:2 Zl fbhy guvefgrgu sbe Tbq, sbe gur yvivat Tbq: jura funyy V pbzr
naq nccrne orsber Tbq?

42:3 Zl grnef unir orra zl zrng qnl naq avtug, juvyr gurl pbagvahnyyl
fnl hagb zr, Jurer vf gul Tbq?

42:4 Jura V erzrzore gurfr guvatf, V cbhe bhg zl fbhy va zr: sbe V unq
tbar jvgu gur zhygvghqr, V jrag jvgu gurz gb gur ubhfr bs Tbq, jvgu
gur ibvpr bs wbl naq cenvfr, jvgu n zhygvghqr gung xrcg ubylqnl.

42:5 Jul neg gubh pnfg qbja, B zl fbhy? naq jul neg gubh qvfdhvrgrq va
zr?  ubcr gubh va Tbq: sbe V funyy lrg cenvfr uvz sbe gur uryc bs uvf
pbhagranapr.

42:6 B zl Tbq, zl fbhy vf pnfg qbja jvguva zr: gurersber jvyy V
erzrzore gurr sebz gur ynaq bs Wbeqna, naq bs gur Urezbavgrf, sebz gur
uvyy Zvmne.

42:7 Qrrc pnyyrgu hagb qrrc ng gur abvfr bs gul jngrefcbhgf: nyy gul
jnirf naq gul ovyybjf ner tbar bire zr.

42:8 Lrg gur YBEQ jvyy pbzznaq uvf ybivatxvaqarff va gur qnl gvzr, naq
va gur avtug uvf fbat funyy or jvgu zr, naq zl cenlre hagb gur Tbq bs
zl yvsr.

42:9 V jvyy fnl hagb Tbq zl ebpx, Jul unfg gubh sbetbggra zr? jul tb V
zbheavat orpnhfr bs gur bccerffvba bs gur rarzl?

42:10 Nf jvgu n fjbeq va zl obarf, zvar rarzvrf ercebnpu zr; juvyr
gurl fnl qnvyl hagb zr, Jurer vf gul Tbq?

42:11 Jul neg gubh pnfg qbja, B zl fbhy? naq jul neg gubh qvfdhvrgrq
jvguva zr? ubcr gubh va Tbq: sbe V funyy lrg cenvfr uvz, jub vf gur
urnygu bs zl pbhagranapr, naq zl Tbq.



43:1 Whqtr zr, B Tbq, naq cyrnq zl pnhfr ntnvafg na hatbqyl angvba: B
qryvire zr sebz gur qrprvgshy naq hawhfg zna.

43:2 Sbe gubh neg gur Tbq bs zl fgeratgu: jul qbfg gubh pnfg zr bss?
jul tb V zbheavat orpnhfr bs gur bccerffvba bs gur rarzl?

43:3 B fraq bhg gul yvtug naq gul gehgu: yrg gurz yrnq zr; yrg gurz
oevat zr hagb gul ubyl uvyy, naq gb gul gnoreanpyrf.

43:4 Gura jvyy V tb hagb gur nygne bs Tbq, hagb Tbq zl rkprrqvat wbl:
lrn, hcba gur unec jvyy V cenvfr gurr, B Tbq zl Tbq.

43:5 Jul neg gubh pnfg qbja, B zl fbhy? naq jul neg gubh qvfdhvrgrq
jvguva zr? ubcr va Tbq: sbe V funyy lrg cenvfr uvz, jub vf gur urnygu
bs zl pbhagranapr, naq zl Tbq.



44:1 Jr unir urneq jvgu bhe rnef, B Tbq, bhe snguref unir gbyq hf,
jung jbex gubh qvqfg va gurve qnlf, va gur gvzrf bs byq.

44:2 Ubj gubh qvqfg qevir bhg gur urngura jvgu gul unaq, naq cynagrqfg
gurz; ubj gubh qvqfg nssyvpg gur crbcyr, naq pnfg gurz bhg.

44:3 Sbe gurl tbg abg gur ynaq va cbffrffvba ol gurve bja fjbeq,
arvgure qvq gurve bja nez fnir gurz: ohg gul evtug unaq, naq guvar
nez, naq gur yvtug bs gul pbhagranapr, orpnhfr gubh unqfg n snibhe
hagb gurz.

44:4 Gubh neg zl Xvat, B Tbq: pbzznaq qryvirenaprf sbe Wnpbo.

44:5 Guebhtu gurr jvyy jr chfu qbja bhe rarzvrf: guebhtu gul anzr jvyy
jr gernq gurz haqre gung evfr hc ntnvafg hf.

44:6 Sbe V jvyy abg gehfg va zl obj, arvgure funyy zl fjbeq fnir zr.

44:7 Ohg gubh unfg fnirq hf sebz bhe rarzvrf, naq unfg chg gurz gb
funzr gung ungrq hf.

44:8 Va Tbq jr obnfg nyy gur qnl ybat, naq cenvfr gul anzr sbe rire.

Frynu.

44:9 Ohg gubh unfg pnfg bss, naq chg hf gb funzr; naq tbrfg abg sbegu
jvgu bhe nezvrf.

44:10 Gubh znxrfg hf gb ghea onpx sebz gur rarzl: naq gurl juvpu ungr
hf fcbvy sbe gurzfryirf.

44:11 Gubh unfg tvira hf yvxr furrc nccbvagrq sbe zrng; naq unfg
fpnggrerq hf nzbat gur urngura.

44:12 Gubh fryyrfg gul crbcyr sbe abhtug, naq qbfg abg vapernfr gul
jrnygu ol gurve cevpr.

44:13 Gubh znxrfg hf n ercebnpu gb bhe arvtuobhef, n fpbea naq n
qrevfvba gb gurz gung ner ebhaq nobhg hf.

44:14 Gubh znxrfg hf n oljbeq nzbat gur urngura, n funxvat bs gur urnq
nzbat gur crbcyr.

44:15 Zl pbashfvba vf pbagvahnyyl orsber zr, naq gur funzr bs zl snpr
ungu pbirerq zr,

44:16 Sbe gur ibvpr bs uvz gung ercebnpurgu naq oynfcurzrgu; ol ernfba
bs gur rarzl naq niratre.

44:17 Nyy guvf vf pbzr hcba hf; lrg unir jr abg sbetbggra gurr,
arvgure unir jr qrnyg snyfryl va gul pbiranag.

44:18 Bhe urneg vf abg ghearq onpx, arvgure unir bhe fgrcf qrpyvarq
sebz gul jnl;

44:19 Gubhtu gubh unfg fber oebxra hf va gur cynpr bs qentbaf, naq
pbirerq hf jvgu gur funqbj bs qrngu.

44:20 Vs jr unir sbetbggra gur anzr bs bhe Tbq, be fgergpurq bhg bhe
unaqf gb n fgenatr tbq;

44:21 Funyy abg Tbq frnepu guvf bhg? sbe ur xabjrgu gur frpergf bs gur
urneg.

44:22 Lrn, sbe gul fnxr ner jr xvyyrq nyy gur qnl ybat; jr ner pbhagrq
nf furrc sbe gur fynhtugre.

44:23 Njnxr, jul fyrrcrfg gubh, B Ybeq? nevfr, pnfg hf abg bss sbe
rire.

44:24 Jurersber uvqrfg gubh gul snpr, naq sbetrggrfg bhe nssyvpgvba
naq bhe bccerffvba?

44:25 Sbe bhe fbhy vf objrq qbja gb gur qhfg: bhe oryyl pyrnirgu hagb
gur rnegu.

44:26 Nevfr sbe bhe uryc, naq erqrrz hf sbe gul zrepvrf' fnxr.



45:1 Zl urneg vf vaqvgvat n tbbq znggre: V fcrnx bs gur guvatf juvpu V
unir znqr gbhpuvat gur xvat: zl gbathr vf gur cra bs n ernql jevgre.

45:2 Gubh neg snvere guna gur puvyqera bs zra: tenpr vf cbherq vagb
gul yvcf: gurersber Tbq ungu oyrffrq gurr sbe rire.

45:3 Tveq gul fjbeq hcba gul guvtu, B zbfg zvtugl, jvgu gul tybel naq
gul znwrfgl.

45:4 Naq va gul znwrfgl evqr cebfcrebhfyl orpnhfr bs gehgu naq
zrrxarff naq evtugrbhfarff; naq gul evtug unaq funyy grnpu gurr
greevoyr guvatf.

45:5 Guvar neebjf ner funec va gur urneg bs gur xvat'f rarzvrf;
jurerol gur crbcyr snyy haqre gurr.

45:6 Gul guebar, B Tbq, vf sbe rire naq rire: gur fprcger bs gul
xvatqbz vf n evtug fprcger.

45:7 Gubh ybirfg evtugrbhfarff, naq ungrfg jvpxrqarff: gurersber Tbq,
gul Tbq, ungu nabvagrq gurr jvgu gur bvy bs tynqarff nobir gul
sryybjf.

45:8 Nyy gul tnezragf fzryy bs zleeu, naq nybrf, naq pnffvn, bhg bs
gur vibel cnynprf, jurerol gurl unir znqr gurr tynq.

45:9 Xvatf' qnhtugref jrer nzbat gul ubabhenoyr jbzra: hcba gul evtug
unaq qvq fgnaq gur dhrra va tbyq bs Bcuve.

45:10 Urnexra, B qnhtugre, naq pbafvqre, naq vapyvar guvar rne; sbetrg
nyfb guvar bja crbcyr, naq gul sngure'f ubhfr;

45:11 Fb funyy gur xvat terngyl qrfver gul ornhgl: sbe ur vf gul Ybeq;
naq jbefuvc gubh uvz.

45:12 Naq gur qnhtugre bs Gler funyy or gurer jvgu n tvsg; rira gur
evpu nzbat gur crbcyr funyy vagerng gul snibhe.

45:13 Gur xvat'f qnhtugre vf nyy tybevbhf jvguva: ure pybguvat vf bs
jebhtug tbyq.

45:14 Fur funyy or oebhtug hagb gur xvat va envzrag bs arrqyrjbex: gur
ivetvaf ure pbzcnavbaf gung sbyybj ure funyy or oebhtug hagb gurr.

45:15 Jvgu tynqarff naq erwbvpvat funyy gurl or oebhtug: gurl funyy
ragre vagb gur xvat'f cnynpr.

45:16 Vafgrnq bs gul snguref funyy or gul puvyqera, jubz gubh znlrfg
znxr cevaprf va nyy gur rnegu.

45:17 V jvyy znxr gul anzr gb or erzrzorerq va nyy trarengvbaf:
gurersber funyy gur crbcyr cenvfr gurr sbe rire naq rire.



46:1 Tbq vf bhe ershtr naq fgeratgu, n irel cerfrag uryc va gebhoyr.

46:2 Gurersber jvyy abg jr srne, gubhtu gur rnegu or erzbirq, naq
gubhtu gur zbhagnvaf or pneevrq vagb gur zvqfg bs gur frn;

46:3 Gubhtu gur jngref gurerbs ebne naq or gebhoyrq, gubhtu gur
zbhagnvaf funxr jvgu gur fjryyvat gurerbs. Frynu.

46:4 Gurer vf n evire, gur fgernzf jurerbs funyy znxr tynq gur pvgl bs
Tbq, gur ubyl cynpr bs gur gnoreanpyrf bs gur zbfg Uvtu.

46:5 Tbq vf va gur zvqfg bs ure; fur funyy abg or zbirq: Tbq funyy
uryc ure, naq gung evtug rneyl.

46:6 Gur urngura entrq, gur xvatqbzf jrer zbirq: ur hggrerq uvf ibvpr,
gur rnegu zrygrq.

46:7 Gur YBEQ bs ubfgf vf jvgu hf; gur Tbq bs Wnpbo vf bhe ershtr.
Frynu.

46:8 Pbzr, orubyq gur jbexf bs gur YBEQ, jung qrfbyngvbaf ur ungu znqr
va gur rnegu.

46:9 Ur znxrgu jnef gb prnfr hagb gur raq bs gur rnegu; ur oernxrgu
gur obj, naq phggrgu gur fcrne va fhaqre; ur oheargu gur punevbg va
gur sver.

46:10 Or fgvyy, naq xabj gung V nz Tbq: V jvyy or rknygrq nzbat gur
urngura, V jvyy or rknygrq va gur rnegu.

46:11 Gur YBEQ bs ubfgf vf jvgu hf; gur Tbq bs Wnpbo vf bhe ershtr.
Frynu.



47:1 B pync lbhe unaqf, nyy lr crbcyr; fubhg hagb Tbq jvgu gur ibvpr
bs gevhzcu.

47:2 Sbe gur YBEQ zbfg uvtu vf greevoyr; ur vf n terng Xvat bire nyy
gur rnegu.

47:3 Ur funyy fhoqhr gur crbcyr haqre hf, naq gur angvbaf haqre bhe
srrg.

47:4 Ur funyy pubbfr bhe vaurevgnapr sbe hf, gur rkpryyrapl bs Wnpbo
jubz ur ybirq. Frynu.

47:5 Tbq vf tbar hc jvgu n fubhg, gur YBEQ jvgu gur fbhaq bs n
gehzcrg.

47:6 Fvat cenvfrf gb Tbq, fvat cenvfrf: fvat cenvfrf hagb bhe Xvat,
fvat cenvfrf.

47:7 Sbe Tbq vf gur Xvat bs nyy gur rnegu: fvat lr cenvfrf jvgu
haqrefgnaqvat.

47:8 Tbq ervtargu bire gur urngura: Tbq fvggrgu hcba gur guebar bs uvf
ubyvarff.

47:9 Gur cevaprf bs gur crbcyr ner tngurerq gbtrgure, rira gur crbcyr
bs gur Tbq bs Noenunz: sbe gur fuvryqf bs gur rnegu orybat hagb Tbq:
ur vf terngyl rknygrq.



48:1 Terng vf gur YBEQ, naq terngyl gb or cenvfrq va gur pvgl bs bhe
Tbq, va gur zbhagnva bs uvf ubyvarff.

48:2 Ornhgvshy sbe fvghngvba, gur wbl bs gur jubyr rnegu, vf zbhag
Mvba, ba gur fvqrf bs gur abegu, gur pvgl bs gur terng Xvat.

48:3 Tbq vf xabja va ure cnynprf sbe n ershtr.

48:4 Sbe, yb, gur xvatf jrer nffrzoyrq, gurl cnffrq ol gbtrgure.

48:5 Gurl fnj vg, naq fb gurl zneiryyrq; gurl jrer gebhoyrq, naq
unfgrq njnl.

48:6 Srne gbbx ubyq hcba gurz gurer, naq cnva, nf bs n jbzna va
geninvy.

48:7 Gubh oernxrfg gur fuvcf bs Gnefuvfu jvgu na rnfg jvaq.

48:8 Nf jr unir urneq, fb unir jr frra va gur pvgl bs gur YBEQ bs
ubfgf, va gur pvgl bs bhe Tbq: Tbq jvyy rfgnoyvfu vg sbe rire. Frynu.

48:9 Jr unir gubhtug bs gul ybivatxvaqarff, B Tbq, va gur zvqfg bs gul
grzcyr.

48:10 Nppbeqvat gb gul anzr, B Tbq, fb vf gul cenvfr hagb gur raqf bs
gur rnegu: gul evtug unaq vf shyy bs evtugrbhfarff.

48:11 Yrg zbhag Mvba erwbvpr, yrg gur qnhtugref bs Whqnu or tynq,
orpnhfr bs gul whqtzragf.

48:12 Jnyx nobhg Mvba, naq tb ebhaq nobhg ure: gryy gur gbjref
gurerbs.

48:13 Znex lr jryy ure ohyjnexf, pbafvqre ure cnynprf; gung lr znl
gryy vg gb gur trarengvba sbyybjvat.

48:14 Sbe guvf Tbq vf bhe Tbq sbe rire naq rire: ur jvyy or bhe thvqr
rira hagb qrngu.



49:1 Urne guvf, nyy lr crbcyr; tvir rne, nyy lr vaunovgnagf bs gur
jbeyq:

49:2 Obgu ybj naq uvtu, evpu naq cbbe, gbtrgure.

49:3 Zl zbhgu funyy fcrnx bs jvfqbz; naq gur zrqvgngvba bs zl urneg
funyy or bs haqrefgnaqvat.

49:4 V jvyy vapyvar zvar rne gb n cnenoyr: V jvyy bcra zl qnex fnlvat
hcba gur unec.

49:5 Jurersber fubhyq V srne va gur qnlf bs rivy, jura gur vavdhvgl bs
zl urryf funyy pbzcnff zr nobhg?

49:6 Gurl gung gehfg va gurve jrnygu, naq obnfg gurzfryirf va gur
zhygvghqr bs gurve evpurf;

49:7 Abar bs gurz pna ol nal zrnaf erqrrz uvf oebgure, abe tvir gb Tbq
n enafbz sbe uvz:

49:8 (Sbe gur erqrzcgvba bs gurve fbhy vf cerpvbhf, naq vg prnfrgu sbe
rire:)

49:9 Gung ur fubhyq fgvyy yvir sbe rire, naq abg frr pbeehcgvba.

49:10 Sbe ur frrgu gung jvfr zra qvr, yvxrjvfr gur sbby naq gur
oehgvfu crefba crevfu, naq yrnir gurve jrnygu gb bguref.

49:11 Gurve vajneq gubhtug vf, gung gurve ubhfrf funyy pbagvahr sbe
rire, naq gurve qjryyvat cynprf gb nyy trarengvbaf; gurl pnyy gurve
ynaqf nsgre gurve bja anzrf.

49:12 Arireguryrff zna orvat va ubabhe novqrgu abg: ur vf yvxr gur
ornfgf gung crevfu.

49:13 Guvf gurve jnl vf gurve sbyyl: lrg gurve cbfgrevgl nccebir gurve
fnlvatf. Frynu.

49:14 Yvxr furrc gurl ner ynvq va gur tenir; qrngu funyy srrq ba gurz;
naq gur hcevtug funyy unir qbzvavba bire gurz va gur zbeavat; naq
gurve ornhgl funyy pbafhzr va gur tenir sebz gurve qjryyvat.

49:15 Ohg Tbq jvyy erqrrz zl fbhy sebz gur cbjre bs gur tenir: sbe ur
funyy erprvir zr. Frynu.

49:16 Or abg gubh nsenvq jura bar vf znqr evpu, jura gur tybel bs uvf
ubhfr vf vapernfrq;

49:17 Sbe jura ur qvrgu ur funyy pneel abguvat njnl: uvf tybel funyy
abg qrfpraq nsgre uvz.

49:18 Gubhtu juvyr ur yvirq ur oyrffrq uvf fbhy: naq zra jvyy cenvfr
gurr, jura gubh qbrfg jryy gb gulfrys.

49:19 Ur funyy tb gb gur trarengvba bs uvf snguref; gurl funyy arire
frr yvtug.

49:20 Zna gung vf va ubabhe, naq haqrefgnaqrgu abg, vf yvxr gur ornfgf
gung crevfu.



50:1 Gur zvtugl Tbq, rira gur YBEQ, ungu fcbxra, naq pnyyrq gur rnegu
sebz gur evfvat bs gur fha hagb gur tbvat qbja gurerbs.

50:2 Bhg bs Mvba, gur cresrpgvba bs ornhgl, Tbq ungu fuvarq.

50:3 Bhe Tbq funyy pbzr, naq funyy abg xrrc fvyrapr: n sver funyy
qribhe orsber uvz, naq vg funyy or irel grzcrfghbhf ebhaq nobhg uvz.

50:4 Ur funyy pnyy gb gur urniraf sebz nobir, naq gb gur rnegu, gung
ur znl whqtr uvf crbcyr.

50:5 Tngure zl fnvagf gbtrgure hagb zr; gubfr gung unir znqr n
pbiranag jvgu zr ol fnpevsvpr.

50:6 Naq gur urniraf funyy qrpyner uvf evtugrbhfarff: sbe Tbq vf whqtr
uvzfrys. Frynu.

50:7 Urne, B zl crbcyr, naq V jvyy fcrnx; B Vfenry, naq V jvyy grfgvsl
ntnvafg gurr: V nz Tbq, rira gul Tbq.

50:8 V jvyy abg ercebir gurr sbe gul fnpevsvprf be gul oheag
bssrevatf, gb unir orra pbagvahnyyl orsber zr.

50:9 V jvyy gnxr ab ohyybpx bhg bs gul ubhfr, abe ur tbngf bhg bs gul
sbyqf.

50:10 Sbe rirel ornfg bs gur sberfg vf zvar, naq gur pnggyr hcba n
gubhfnaq uvyyf.

50:11 V xabj nyy gur sbjyf bs gur zbhagnvaf: naq gur jvyq ornfgf bs
gur svryq ner zvar.

50:12 Vs V jrer uhatel, V jbhyq abg gryy gurr: sbe gur jbeyq vf zvar,
naq gur shyarff gurerbs.

50:13 Jvyy V rng gur syrfu bs ohyyf, be qevax gur oybbq bs tbngf?

50:14 Bssre hagb Tbq gunaxftvivat; naq cnl gul ibjf hagb gur zbfg
Uvtu:

50:15 Naq pnyy hcba zr va gur qnl bs gebhoyr: V jvyy qryvire gurr, naq
gubh funyg tybevsl zr.

50:16 Ohg hagb gur jvpxrq Tbq fnvgu, Jung unfg gubh gb qb gb qrpyner
zl fgnghgrf, be gung gubh fubhyqrfg gnxr zl pbiranag va gul zbhgu?

50:17 Frrvat gubh ungrfg vafgehpgvba, naq pnfgrgu zl jbeqf oruvaq
gurr.

50:18 Jura gubh fnjrfg n guvrs, gura gubh pbafragrqfg jvgu uvz, naq
unfg orra cnegnxre jvgu nqhygreref.

50:19 Gubh tvirfg gul zbhgu gb rivy, naq gul gbathr senzrgu qrprvg.

50:20 Gubh fvggrfg naq fcrnxrfg ntnvafg gul oebgure; gubh fynaqrerfg
guvar bja zbgure'f fba.

50:21 Gurfr guvatf unfg gubh qbar, naq V xrcg fvyrapr; gubh gubhtugrfg
gung V jnf nygbtrgure fhpu na bar nf gulfrys: ohg V jvyy ercebir gurr,
naq frg gurz va beqre orsber guvar rlrf.

50:22 Abj pbafvqre guvf, lr gung sbetrg Tbq, yrfg V grne lbh va
cvrprf, naq gurer or abar gb qryvire.

50:23 Jubfb bssrergu cenvfr tybevsvrgu zr: naq gb uvz gung beqrergu
uvf pbairefngvba nevtug jvyy V furj gur fnyingvba bs Tbq.



51:1 Unir zrepl hcba zr, B Tbq, nppbeqvat gb gul ybivatxvaqarff:
nppbeqvat hagb gur zhygvghqr bs gul graqre zrepvrf oybg bhg zl
genafterffvbaf.

51:2 Jnfu zr guebhtuyl sebz zvar vavdhvgl, naq pyrnafr zr sebz zl fva.

51:3 Sbe V npxabjyrqtr zl genafterffvbaf: naq zl fva vf rire orsber
zr.

51:4 Ntnvafg gurr, gurr bayl, unir V fvaarq, naq qbar guvf rivy va gul
fvtug: gung gubh zvtugrfg or whfgvsvrq jura gubh fcrnxrfg, naq or
pyrne jura gubh whqtrfg.

51:5 Orubyq, V jnf funcra va vavdhvgl; naq va fva qvq zl zbgure
pbaprvir zr.

51:6 Orubyq, gubh qrfverfg gehgu va gur vajneq cnegf: naq va gur
uvqqra cneg gubh funyg znxr zr gb xabj jvfqbz.

51:7 Chetr zr jvgu ulffbc, naq V funyy or pyrna: jnfu zr, naq V funyy
or juvgre guna fabj.

51:8 Znxr zr gb urne wbl naq tynqarff; gung gur obarf juvpu gubh unfg
oebxra znl erwbvpr.

51:9 Uvqr gul snpr sebz zl fvaf, naq oybg bhg nyy zvar vavdhvgvrf.

51:10 Perngr va zr n pyrna urneg, B Tbq; naq erarj n evtug fcvevg
jvguva zr.

51:11 Pnfg zr abg njnl sebz gul cerfrapr; naq gnxr abg gul ubyl fcvevg
sebz zr.

51:12 Erfgber hagb zr gur wbl bs gul fnyingvba; naq hcubyq zr jvgu gul
serr fcvevg.

51:13 Gura jvyy V grnpu genafterffbef gul jnlf; naq fvaaref funyy or
pbairegrq hagb gurr.

51:14 Qryvire zr sebz oybbqthvygvarff, B Tbq, gubh Tbq bs zl
fnyingvba: naq zl gbathr funyy fvat nybhq bs gul evtugrbhfarff.

51:15 B Ybeq, bcra gubh zl yvcf; naq zl zbhgu funyy furj sbegu gul
cenvfr.

51:16 Sbe gubh qrfverfg abg fnpevsvpr; ryfr jbhyq V tvir vg: gubh
qryvtugrfg abg va oheag bssrevat.

51:17 Gur fnpevsvprf bs Tbq ner n oebxra fcvevg: n oebxra naq n
pbagevgr urneg, B Tbq, gubh jvyg abg qrfcvfr.

51:18 Qb tbbq va gul tbbq cyrnfher hagb Mvba: ohvyq gubh gur jnyyf bs
Wrehfnyrz.

51:19 Gura funyg gubh or cyrnfrq jvgu gur fnpevsvprf bs evtugrbhfarff,
jvgu oheag bssrevat naq jubyr oheag bssrevat: gura funyy gurl bssre
ohyybpxf hcba guvar nygne.



52:1 Jul obnfgrfg gubh gulfrys va zvfpuvrs, B zvtugl zna? gur tbbqarff
bs Tbq raqhergu pbagvahnyyl.

52:2 Gur gbathr qrivfrgu zvfpuvrsf; yvxr n funec enmbe, jbexvat
qrprvgshyyl.

52:3 Gubh ybirfg rivy zber guna tbbq; naq ylvat engure guna gb fcrnx
evtugrbhfarff. Frynu.

52:4 Gubh ybirfg nyy qribhevat jbeqf, B gubh qrprvgshy gbathr.

52:5 Tbq funyy yvxrjvfr qrfgebl gurr sbe rire, ur funyy gnxr gurr
njnl, naq cyhpx gurr bhg bs gul qjryyvat cynpr, naq ebbg gurr bhg bs
gur ynaq bs gur yvivat. Frynu.

52:6 Gur evtugrbhf nyfb funyy frr, naq srne, naq funyy ynhtu ng uvz:

52:7 Yb, guvf vf gur zna gung znqr abg Tbq uvf fgeratgu; ohg gehfgrq
va gur nohaqnapr bs uvf evpurf, naq fgeratgurarq uvzfrys va uvf
jvpxrqarff.

52:8 Ohg V nz yvxr n terra byvir gerr va gur ubhfr bs Tbq: V gehfg va
gur zrepl bs Tbq sbe rire naq rire.

52:9 V jvyy cenvfr gurr sbe rire, orpnhfr gubh unfg qbar vg: naq V
jvyy jnvg ba gul anzr; sbe vg vf tbbq orsber gul fnvagf.



53:1 Gur sbby ungu fnvq va uvf urneg, Gurer vf ab Tbq. Pbeehcg ner
gurl, naq unir qbar nobzvanoyr vavdhvgl: gurer vf abar gung qbrgu
tbbq.

53:2 Tbq ybbxrq qbja sebz urnira hcba gur puvyqera bs zra, gb frr vs
gurer jrer nal gung qvq haqrefgnaq, gung qvq frrx Tbq.

53:3 Rirel bar bs gurz vf tbar onpx: gurl ner nygbtrgure orpbzr
svygul; gurer vf abar gung qbrgu tbbq, ab, abg bar.

53:4 Unir gur jbexref bs vavdhvgl ab xabjyrqtr? jub rng hc zl crbcyr
nf gurl rng oernq: gurl unir abg pnyyrq hcba Tbq.

53:5 Gurer jrer gurl va terng srne, jurer ab srne jnf: sbe Tbq ungu
fpnggrerq gur obarf bs uvz gung rapnzcrgu ntnvafg gurr: gubh unfg chg
gurz gb funzr, orpnhfr Tbq ungu qrfcvfrq gurz.

53:6 Bu gung gur fnyingvba bs Vfenry jrer pbzr bhg bs Mvba! Jura Tbq
oevatrgu onpx gur pncgvivgl bs uvf crbcyr, Wnpbo funyy erwbvpr, naq
Vfenry funyy or tynq.



54:1 Fnir zr, B Tbq, ol gul anzr, naq whqtr zr ol gul fgeratgu.

54:2 Urne zl cenlre, B Tbq; tvir rne gb gur jbeqf bs zl zbhgu.

54:3 Sbe fgenatref ner evfra hc ntnvafg zr, naq bccerffbef frrx nsgre
zl fbhy: gurl unir abg frg Tbq orsber gurz. Frynu.

54:4 Orubyq, Tbq vf zvar urycre: gur Ybeq vf jvgu gurz gung hcubyq zl
fbhy.

54:5 Ur funyy erjneq rivy hagb zvar rarzvrf: phg gurz bss va gul
gehgu.

54:6 V jvyy serryl fnpevsvpr hagb gurr: V jvyy cenvfr gul anzr, B
YBEQ; sbe vg vf tbbq.

54:7 Sbe ur ungu qryvirerq zr bhg bs nyy gebhoyr: naq zvar rlr ungu
frra uvf qrfver hcba zvar rarzvrf.



55:1 Tvir rne gb zl cenlre, B Tbq; naq uvqr abg gulfrys sebz zl
fhccyvpngvba.

55:2 Nggraq hagb zr, naq urne zr: V zbhea va zl pbzcynvag, naq znxr n
abvfr;

55:3 Orpnhfr bs gur ibvpr bs gur rarzl, orpnhfr bs gur bccerffvba bs
gur jvpxrq: sbe gurl pnfg vavdhvgl hcba zr, naq va jengu gurl ungr zr.

55:4 Zl urneg vf fber cnvarq jvguva zr: naq gur greebef bs qrngu ner
snyyra hcba zr.

55:5 Srneshyarff naq gerzoyvat ner pbzr hcba zr, naq ubeebe ungu
birejuryzrq zr.

55:6 Naq V fnvq, Bu gung V unq jvatf yvxr n qbir! sbe gura jbhyq V syl
njnl, naq or ng erfg.

55:7 Yb, gura jbhyq V jnaqre sne bss, naq erznva va gur jvyqrearff.
Frynu.

55:8 V jbhyq unfgra zl rfpncr sebz gur jvaql fgbez naq grzcrfg.

55:9 Qrfgebl, B Ybeq, naq qvivqr gurve gbathrf: sbe V unir frra
ivbyrapr naq fgevsr va gur pvgl.

55:10 Qnl naq avtug gurl tb nobhg vg hcba gur jnyyf gurerbs: zvfpuvrs
nyfb naq fbeebj ner va gur zvqfg bs vg.

55:11 Jvpxrqarff vf va gur zvqfg gurerbs: qrprvg naq thvyr qrcneg abg
sebz ure fgerrgf.

55:12 Sbe vg jnf abg na rarzl gung ercebnpurq zr; gura V pbhyq unir
obear vg: arvgure jnf vg ur gung ungrq zr gung qvq zntavsl uvzfrys
ntnvafg zr; gura V jbhyq unir uvq zlfrys sebz uvz:

55:13 Ohg vg jnf gubh, n zna zvar rdhny, zl thvqr, naq zvar
npdhnvagnapr.

55:14 Jr gbbx fjrrg pbhafry gbtrgure, naq jnyxrq hagb gur ubhfr bs Tbq
va pbzcnal.

55:15 Yrg qrngu frvmr hcba gurz, naq yrg gurz tb qbja dhvpx vagb uryy:
sbe jvpxrqarff vf va gurve qjryyvatf, naq nzbat gurz.

55:16 Nf sbe zr, V jvyy pnyy hcba Tbq; naq gur YBEQ funyy fnir zr.

55:17 Riravat, naq zbeavat, naq ng abba, jvyy V cenl, naq pel nybhq:
naq ur funyy urne zl ibvpr.

55:18 Ur ungu qryvirerq zl fbhy va crnpr sebz gur onggyr gung jnf
ntnvafg zr: sbe gurer jrer znal jvgu zr.

55:19 Tbq funyy urne, naq nssyvpg gurz, rira ur gung novqrgu bs byq.

Frynu. Orpnhfr gurl unir ab punatrf, gurersber gurl srne abg Tbq.

55:20 Ur ungu chg sbegu uvf unaqf ntnvafg fhpu nf or ng crnpr jvgu
uvz: ur ungu oebxra uvf pbiranag.

55:21 Gur jbeqf bs uvf zbhgu jrer fzbbgure guna ohggre, ohg jne jnf va
uvf urneg: uvf jbeqf jrer fbsgre guna bvy, lrg jrer gurl qenja fjbeqf.

55:22 Pnfg gul oheqra hcba gur YBEQ, naq ur funyy fhfgnva gurr: ur
funyy arire fhssre gur evtugrbhf gb or zbirq.

55:23 Ohg gubh, B Tbq, funyg oevat gurz qbja vagb gur cvg bs
qrfgehpgvba: oybbql naq qrprvgshy zra funyy abg yvir bhg unys gurve
qnlf; ohg V jvyy gehfg va gurr.



56:1 Or zrepvshy hagb zr, B Tbq: sbe zna jbhyq fjnyybj zr hc; ur
svtugvat qnvyl bccerffrgu zr.

56:2 Zvar rarzvrf jbhyq qnvyl fjnyybj zr hc: sbe gurl or znal gung
svtug ntnvafg zr, B gubh zbfg Uvtu.

56:3 Jung gvzr V nz nsenvq, V jvyy gehfg va gurr.

56:4 Va Tbq V jvyy cenvfr uvf jbeq, va Tbq V unir chg zl gehfg; V jvyy
abg srne jung syrfu pna qb hagb zr.

56:5 Rirel qnl gurl jerfg zl jbeqf: nyy gurve gubhtugf ner ntnvafg zr
sbe rivy.

56:6 Gurl tngure gurzfryirf gbtrgure, gurl uvqr gurzfryirf, gurl znex
zl fgrcf, jura gurl jnvg sbe zl fbhy.

56:7 Funyy gurl rfpncr ol vavdhvgl? va guvar natre pnfg qbja gur
crbcyr, B Tbq.

56:8 Gubh gryyrfg zl jnaqrevatf: chg gubh zl grnef vagb gul obggyr:
ner gurl abg va gul obbx?

56:9 Jura V pel hagb gurr, gura funyy zvar rarzvrf ghea onpx: guvf V
xabj; sbe Tbq vf sbe zr.

56:10 Va Tbq jvyy V cenvfr uvf jbeq: va gur YBEQ jvyy V cenvfr uvf
jbeq.

56:11 Va Tbq unir V chg zl gehfg: V jvyy abg or nsenvq jung zna pna qb
hagb zr.

56:12 Gul ibjf ner hcba zr, B Tbq: V jvyy eraqre cenvfrf hagb gurr.

56:13 Sbe gubh unfg qryvirerq zl fbhy sebz qrngu: jvyg abg gubh
qryvire zl srrg sebz snyyvat, gung V znl jnyx orsber Tbq va gur yvtug
bs gur yvivat?



57:1 Or zrepvshy hagb zr, B Tbq, or zrepvshy hagb zr: sbe zl fbhy
gehfgrgu va gurr: lrn, va gur funqbj bs gul jvatf jvyy V znxr zl
ershtr, hagvy gurfr pnynzvgvrf or birecnfg.

57:2 V jvyy pel hagb Tbq zbfg uvtu; hagb Tbq gung cresbezrgu nyy
guvatf sbe zr.

57:3 Ur funyy fraq sebz urnira, naq fnir zr sebz gur ercebnpu bs uvz
gung jbhyq fjnyybj zr hc. Frynu. Tbq funyy fraq sbegu uvf zrepl naq
uvf gehgu.

57:4 Zl fbhy vf nzbat yvbaf: naq V yvr rira nzbat gurz gung ner frg ba
sver, rira gur fbaf bs zra, jubfr grrgu ner fcrnef naq neebjf, naq
gurve gbathr n funec fjbeq.

57:5 Or gubh rknygrq, B Tbq, nobir gur urniraf; yrg gul tybel or nobir
nyy gur rnegu.

57:6 Gurl unir cercnerq n arg sbe zl fgrcf; zl fbhy vf objrq qbja:
gurl unir qvttrq n cvg orsber zr, vagb gur zvqfg jurerbs gurl ner
snyyra gurzfryirf. Frynu.

57:7 Zl urneg vf svkrq, B Tbq, zl urneg vf svkrq: V jvyy fvat naq tvir
cenvfr.

57:8 Njnxr hc, zl tybel; njnxr, cfnygrel naq unec: V zlfrys jvyy njnxr
rneyl.

57:9 V jvyy cenvfr gurr, B Ybeq, nzbat gur crbcyr: V jvyy fvat hagb
gurr nzbat gur angvbaf.

57:10 Sbe gul zrepl vf terng hagb gur urniraf, naq gul gehgu hagb gur
pybhqf.

57:11 Or gubh rknygrq, B Tbq, nobir gur urniraf: yrg gul tybel or
nobir nyy gur rnegu.



58:1 Qb lr vaqrrq fcrnx evtugrbhfarff, B pbatertngvba? qb lr whqtr
hcevtugyl, B lr fbaf bs zra?

58:2 Lrn, va urneg lr jbex jvpxrqarff; lr jrvtu gur ivbyrapr bs lbhe
unaqf va gur rnegu.

58:3 Gur jvpxrq ner rfgenatrq sebz gur jbzo: gurl tb nfgenl nf fbba nf
gurl or obea, fcrnxvat yvrf.

58:4 Gurve cbvfba vf yvxr gur cbvfba bs n frecrag: gurl ner yvxr gur
qrns nqqre gung fgbccrgu ure rne;

58:5 Juvpu jvyy abg urnexra gb gur ibvpr bs punezref, punezvat arire
fb jvfryl.

58:6 Oernx gurve grrgu, B Tbq, va gurve zbhgu: oernx bhg gur terng
grrgu bs gur lbhat yvbaf, B YBEQ.

58:7 Yrg gurz zryg njnl nf jngref juvpu eha pbagvahnyyl: jura ur
oraqrgu uvf obj gb fubbg uvf neebjf, yrg gurz or nf phg va cvrprf.

58:8 Nf n fanvy juvpu zrygrgu, yrg rirel bar bs gurz cnff njnl: yvxr
gur hagvzryl ovegu bs n jbzna, gung gurl znl abg frr gur fha.

58:9 Orsber lbhe cbgf pna srry gur gubeaf, ur funyy gnxr gurz njnl nf
jvgu n juveyjvaq, obgu yvivat, naq va uvf jengu.

58:10 Gur evtugrbhf funyy erwbvpr jura ur frrgu gur iratrnapr: ur
funyy jnfu uvf srrg va gur oybbq bs gur jvpxrq.

58:11 Fb gung n zna funyy fnl, Irevyl gurer vf n erjneq sbe gur
evtugrbhf: irevyl ur vf n Tbq gung whqtrgu va gur rnegu.



59:1 Qryvire zr sebz zvar rarzvrf, B zl Tbq: qrsraq zr sebz gurz gung
evfr hc ntnvafg zr.

59:2 Qryvire zr sebz gur jbexref bs vavdhvgl, naq fnir zr sebz oybbql
zra.

59:3 Sbe, yb, gurl yvr va jnvg sbe zl fbhy: gur zvtugl ner tngurerq
ntnvafg zr; abg sbe zl genafterffvba, abe sbe zl fva, B YBEQ.

59:4 Gurl eha naq cercner gurzfryirf jvgubhg zl snhyg: njnxr gb uryc
zr, naq orubyq.

59:5 Gubh gurersber, B YBEQ Tbq bs ubfgf, gur Tbq bs Vfenry, njnxr gb
ivfvg nyy gur urngura: or abg zrepvshy gb nal jvpxrq genafterffbef.
Frynu.

59:6 Gurl erghea ng riravat: gurl znxr n abvfr yvxr n qbt, naq tb
ebhaq nobhg gur pvgl.

59:7 Orubyq, gurl orypu bhg jvgu gurve zbhgu: fjbeqf ner va gurve
yvcf: sbe jub, fnl gurl, qbgu urne?

59:8 Ohg gubh, B YBEQ, funyg ynhtu ng gurz; gubh funyg unir nyy gur
urngura va qrevfvba.

59:9 Orpnhfr bs uvf fgeratgu jvyy V jnvg hcba gurr: sbe Tbq vf zl
qrsrapr.

59:10 Gur Tbq bs zl zrepl funyy cerirag zr: Tbq funyy yrg zr frr zl
qrfver hcba zvar rarzvrf.

59:11 Fynl gurz abg, yrfg zl crbcyr sbetrg: fpnggre gurz ol gul cbjre;
naq oevat gurz qbja, B Ybeq bhe fuvryq.

59:12 Sbe gur fva bs gurve zbhgu naq gur jbeqf bs gurve yvcf yrg gurz
rira or gnxra va gurve cevqr: naq sbe phefvat naq ylvat juvpu gurl
fcrnx.

59:13 Pbafhzr gurz va jengu, pbafhzr gurz, gung gurl znl abg or: naq
yrg gurz xabj gung Tbq ehyrgu va Wnpbo hagb gur raqf bs gur rnegu.
Frynu.

59:14 Naq ng riravat yrg gurz erghea; naq yrg gurz znxr n abvfr yvxr n
qbt, naq tb ebhaq nobhg gur pvgl.

59:15 Yrg gurz jnaqre hc naq qbja sbe zrng, naq tehqtr vs gurl or abg
fngvfsvrq.

59:16 Ohg V jvyy fvat bs gul cbjre; lrn, V jvyy fvat nybhq bs gul
zrepl va gur zbeavat: sbe gubh unfg orra zl qrsrapr naq ershtr va gur
qnl bs zl gebhoyr.

59:17 Hagb gurr, B zl fgeratgu, jvyy V fvat: sbe Tbq vf zl qrsrapr,
naq gur Tbq bs zl zrepl.



60:1 B Tbq, gubh unfg pnfg hf bss, gubh unfg fpnggrerq hf, gubh unfg
orra qvfcyrnfrq; B ghea gulfrys gb hf ntnva.

60:2 Gubh unfg znqr gur rnegu gb gerzoyr; gubh unfg oebxra vg: urny
gur oernpurf gurerbs; sbe vg funxrgu.

60:3 Gubh unfg furjrq gul crbcyr uneq guvatf: gubh unfg znqr hf gb
qevax gur jvar bs nfgbavfuzrag.

60:4 Gubh unfg tvira n onaare gb gurz gung srne gurr, gung vg znl or
qvfcynlrq orpnhfr bs gur gehgu. Frynu.

60:5 Gung gul orybirq znl or qryvirerq; fnir jvgu gul evtug unaq, naq
urne zr.

60:6 Tbq ungu fcbxra va uvf ubyvarff; V jvyy erwbvpr, V jvyy qvivqr
Furpurz, naq zrgr bhg gur inyyrl bs Fhppbgu.

60:7 Tvyrnq vf zvar, naq Znanffru vf zvar; Rcuenvz nyfb vf gur
fgeratgu bs zvar urnq; Whqnu vf zl ynjtvire;

60:8 Zbno vf zl jnfucbg; bire Rqbz jvyy V pnfg bhg zl fubr: Cuvyvfgvn,
gevhzcu gubh orpnhfr bs zr.

60:9 Jub jvyy oevat zr vagb gur fgebat pvgl? jub jvyy yrnq zr vagb
Rqbz?

60:10 Jvyg abg gubh, B Tbq, juvpu unqfg pnfg hf bss? naq gubh, B Tbq,
juvpu qvqfg abg tb bhg jvgu bhe nezvrf?

60:11 Tvir hf uryc sebz gebhoyr: sbe inva vf gur uryc bs zna.

60:12 Guebhtu Tbq jr funyy qb inyvnagyl: sbe ur vg vf gung funyy gernq
qbja bhe rarzvrf.



61:1 Urne zl pel, B Tbq; nggraq hagb zl cenlre.

61:2 Sebz gur raq bs gur rnegu jvyy V pel hagb gurr, jura zl urneg vf
birejuryzrq: yrnq zr gb gur ebpx gung vf uvture guna V.

61:3 Sbe gubh unfg orra n furygre sbe zr, naq n fgebat gbjre sebz gur
rarzl.

61:4 V jvyy novqr va gul gnoreanpyr sbe rire: V jvyy gehfg va gur
pbireg bs gul jvatf. Frynu.

61:5 Sbe gubh, B Tbq, unfg urneq zl ibjf: gubh unfg tvira zr gur
urevgntr bs gubfr gung srne gul anzr.

61:6 Gubh jvyg cebybat gur xvat'f yvsr: naq uvf lrnef nf znal
trarengvbaf.

61:7 Ur funyy novqr orsber Tbq sbe rire: B cercner zrepl naq gehgu,
juvpu znl cerfreir uvz.

61:8 Fb jvyy V fvat cenvfr hagb gul anzr sbe rire, gung V znl qnvyl
cresbez zl ibjf.



62:1 Gehyl zl fbhy jnvgrgu hcba Tbq: sebz uvz pbzrgu zl fnyingvba.

62:2 Ur bayl vf zl ebpx naq zl fnyingvba; ur vf zl qrsrapr; V funyy
abg or terngyl zbirq.

62:3 Ubj ybat jvyy lr vzntvar zvfpuvrs ntnvafg n zna? lr funyy or
fynva nyy bs lbh: nf n objvat jnyy funyy lr or, naq nf n gbggrevat
srapr.

62:4 Gurl bayl pbafhyg gb pnfg uvz qbja sebz uvf rkpryyrapl: gurl
qryvtug va yvrf: gurl oyrff jvgu gurve zbhgu, ohg gurl phefr vajneqyl.
Frynu.

62:5 Zl fbhy, jnvg gubh bayl hcba Tbq; sbe zl rkcrpgngvba vf sebz uvz.

62:6 Ur bayl vf zl ebpx naq zl fnyingvba: ur vf zl qrsrapr; V funyy
abg or zbirq.

62:7 Va Tbq vf zl fnyingvba naq zl tybel: gur ebpx bs zl fgeratgu, naq
zl ershtr, vf va Tbq.

62:8 Gehfg va uvz ng nyy gvzrf; lr crbcyr, cbhe bhg lbhe urneg orsber
uvz: Tbq vf n ershtr sbe hf. Frynu.

62:9 Fheryl zra bs ybj qrterr ner inavgl, naq zra bs uvtu qrterr ner n
yvr: gb or ynvq va gur onynapr, gurl ner nygbtrgure yvtugre guna
inavgl.

62:10 Gehfg abg va bccerffvba, naq orpbzr abg inva va eboorel: vs
evpurf vapernfr, frg abg lbhe urneg hcba gurz.

62:11 Tbq ungu fcbxra bapr; gjvpr unir V urneq guvf; gung cbjre
orybatrgu hagb Tbq.

62:12 Nyfb hagb gurr, B Ybeq, orybatrgu zrepl: sbe gubh eraqrerfg gb
rirel zna nppbeqvat gb uvf jbex.



63:1 B Tbq, gubh neg zl Tbq; rneyl jvyy V frrx gurr: zl fbhy guvefgrgu
sbe gurr, zl syrfu ybatrgu sbe gurr va n qel naq guvefgl ynaq, jurer
ab jngre vf;

63:2 Gb frr gul cbjre naq gul tybel, fb nf V unir frra gurr va gur
fnapghnel.

63:3 Orpnhfr gul ybivatxvaqarff vf orggre guna yvsr, zl yvcf funyy
cenvfr gurr.

63:4 Guhf jvyy V oyrff gurr juvyr V yvir: V jvyy yvsg hc zl unaqf va
gul anzr.

63:5 Zl fbhy funyy or fngvfsvrq nf jvgu zneebj naq sngarff; naq zl
zbhgu funyy cenvfr gurr jvgu wblshy yvcf:

63:6 Jura V erzrzore gurr hcba zl orq, naq zrqvgngr ba gurr va gur
avtug jngpurf.

63:7 Orpnhfr gubh unfg orra zl uryc, gurersber va gur funqbj bs gul
jvatf jvyy V erwbvpr.

63:8 Zl fbhy sbyybjrgu uneq nsgre gurr: gul evtug unaq hcubyqrgu zr.

63:9 Ohg gubfr gung frrx zl fbhy, gb qrfgebl vg, funyy tb vagb gur
ybjre cnegf bs gur rnegu.

63:10 Gurl funyy snyy ol gur fjbeq: gurl funyy or n cbegvba sbe sbkrf.

63:11 Ohg gur xvat funyy erwbvpr va Tbq; rirel bar gung fjrnergu ol
uvz funyy tybel: ohg gur zbhgu bs gurz gung fcrnx yvrf funyy or
fgbccrq.



64:1 Urne zl ibvpr, B Tbq, va zl cenlre: cerfreir zl yvsr sebz srne bs
gur rarzl.

64:2 Uvqr zr sebz gur frperg pbhafry bs gur jvpxrq; sebz gur
vafheerpgvba bs gur jbexref bs vavdhvgl:

64:3 Jub jurg gurve gbathr yvxr n fjbeq, naq oraq gurve objf gb fubbg
gurve neebjf, rira ovggre jbeqf:

64:4 Gung gurl znl fubbg va frperg ng gur cresrpg: fhqqrayl qb gurl
fubbg ng uvz, naq srne abg.

64:5 Gurl rapbhentr gurzfryirf va na rivy znggre: gurl pbzzhar bs
ynlvat fanerf cevivyl; gurl fnl, Jub funyy frr gurz?

64:6 Gurl frnepu bhg vavdhvgvrf; gurl nppbzcyvfu n qvyvtrag frnepu:
obgu gur vajneq gubhtug bs rirel bar bs gurz, naq gur urneg, vf qrrc.

64:7 Ohg Tbq funyy fubbg ng gurz jvgu na neebj; fhqqrayl funyy gurl or
jbhaqrq.

64:8 Fb gurl funyy znxr gurve bja gbathr gb snyy hcba gurzfryirf: nyy
gung frr gurz funyy syrr njnl.

64:9 Naq nyy zra funyy srne, naq funyy qrpyner gur jbex bs Tbq; sbe
gurl funyy jvfryl pbafvqre bs uvf qbvat.

64:10 Gur evtugrbhf funyy or tynq va gur YBEQ, naq funyy gehfg va uvz;
naq nyy gur hcevtug va urneg funyy tybel.



65:1 Cenvfr jnvgrgu sbe gurr, B Tbq, va Fvba: naq hagb gurr funyy gur
ibj or cresbezrq.

65:2 B gubh gung urnerfg cenlre, hagb gurr funyy nyy syrfu pbzr.

65:3 Vavdhvgvrf cerinvy ntnvafg zr: nf sbe bhe genafterffvbaf, gubh
funyg chetr gurz njnl.

65:4 Oyrffrq vf gur zna jubz gubh pubbfrfg, naq pnhfrfg gb nccebnpu
hagb gurr, gung ur znl qjryy va gul pbhegf: jr funyy or fngvfsvrq jvgu
gur tbbqarff bs gul ubhfr, rira bs gul ubyl grzcyr.

65:5 Ol greevoyr guvatf va evtugrbhfarff jvyg gubh nafjre hf, B Tbq bs
bhe fnyingvba; jub neg gur pbasvqrapr bs nyy gur raqf bs gur rnegu,
naq bs gurz gung ner nsne bss hcba gur frn:

65:6 Juvpu ol uvf fgeratgu frggrgu snfg gur zbhagnvaf; orvat tveqrq
jvgu cbjre:

65:7 Juvpu fgvyyrgu gur abvfr bs gur frnf, gur abvfr bs gurve jnirf,
naq gur ghzhyg bs gur crbcyr.

65:8 Gurl nyfb gung qjryy va gur hggrezbfg cnegf ner nsenvq ng gul
gbxraf: gubh znxrfg gur bhgtbvatf bs gur zbeavat naq riravat gb
erwbvpr.

65:9 Gubh ivfvgrfg gur rnegu, naq jngrerfg vg: gubh terngyl raevpurfg
vg jvgu gur evire bs Tbq, juvpu vf shyy bs jngre: gubh cercnerfg gurz
pbea, jura gubh unfg fb cebivqrq sbe vg.

65:10 Gubh jngrerfg gur evqtrf gurerbs nohaqnagyl: gubh frggyrfg gur
sheebjf gurerbs: gubh znxrfg vg fbsg jvgu fubjref: gubh oyrffrfg gur
fcevatvat gurerbs.

65:11 Gubh pebjarfg gur lrne jvgu gul tbbqarff; naq gul cnguf qebc
sngarff.

65:12 Gurl qebc hcba gur cnfgherf bs gur jvyqrearff: naq gur yvggyr
uvyyf erwbvpr ba rirel fvqr.

65:13 Gur cnfgherf ner pybgurq jvgu sybpxf; gur inyyrlf nyfb ner
pbirerq bire jvgu pbea; gurl fubhg sbe wbl, gurl nyfb fvat.



66:1 Znxr n wblshy abvfr hagb Tbq, nyy lr ynaqf:

66:2 Fvat sbegu gur ubabhe bs uvf anzr: znxr uvf cenvfr tybevbhf.

66:3 Fnl hagb Tbq, Ubj greevoyr neg gubh va gul jbexf! guebhtu gur
terngarff bs gul cbjre funyy guvar rarzvrf fhozvg gurzfryirf hagb
gurr.

66:4 Nyy gur rnegu funyy jbefuvc gurr, naq funyy fvat hagb gurr; gurl
funyy fvat gb gul anzr. Frynu.

66:5 Pbzr naq frr gur jbexf bs Tbq: ur vf greevoyr va uvf qbvat gbjneq
gur puvyqera bs zra.

66:6 Ur ghearq gur frn vagb qel ynaq: gurl jrag guebhtu gur sybbq ba
sbbg: gurer qvq jr erwbvpr va uvz.

66:7 Ur ehyrgu ol uvf cbjre sbe rire; uvf rlrf orubyq gur angvbaf: yrg
abg gur eroryyvbhf rknyg gurzfryirf. Frynu.

66:8 B oyrff bhe Tbq, lr crbcyr, naq znxr gur ibvpr bs uvf cenvfr gb
or urneq:

66:9 Juvpu ubyqrgu bhe fbhy va yvsr, naq fhssrergu abg bhe srrg gb or
zbirq.

66:10 Sbe gubh, B Tbq, unfg cebirq hf: gubh unfg gevrq hf, nf fvyire
vf gevrq.

66:11 Gubh oebhtugrfg hf vagb gur arg; gubh ynvqfg nssyvpgvba hcba bhe
ybvaf.

66:12 Gubh unfg pnhfrq zra gb evqr bire bhe urnqf; jr jrag guebhtu
sver naq guebhtu jngre: ohg gubh oebhtugrfg hf bhg vagb n jrnygul
cynpr.

66:13 V jvyy tb vagb gul ubhfr jvgu oheag bssrevatf: V jvyy cnl gurr
zl ibjf,

66:14 Juvpu zl yvcf unir hggrerq, naq zl zbhgu ungu fcbxra, jura V jnf
va gebhoyr.

66:15 V jvyy bssre hagb gurr oheag fnpevsvprf bs sngyvatf, jvgu gur
